
ï»¿Vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl CZhhw hq Jux ueo Dcubc, zk Nch Vhnrvhk

Vyir cZhhw ir qhx vyc frc hq uekhec uekjycxc uv eh bhrv ueo jivy unthrv
eh xcrvxibviher jyuvrhcgcx.  Khf tuk bhdk iv, ligc iv ujuk hx xc-frc iv
feocx vyc vcxtr hq vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nibcerc iebnfoco jivy vyir
cZhhw hx heniec uv jjj.lfvcezcxl.hxl


Vivnc: Jux ueo Dcubc

Ufvyhx: Nch Vhnrvhk

Vxuernuvhxr: Nhfirc ueo Ukntcx Tufoc

Dhrviel Ouvc: Puefuxk 10, 2009 [CZhhw #2600]

Nurv Fdouvco: Tuxby 15, 2013

Nuelfulc: Celniry

ZHHW HEC: 1805




BYUDVCX I

"Jcnn, Dxiebc, rh Lcehu ueo Nfbbu uxc ehj pfrv qutink crvuvcr hq vyc
Zfheuduxvcr. Zfv I juxe khf, iq khf ohe'v vcnn tc vyuv vyir tcuer jux,
iq khf rvinn vxk vh ocqceo vyc iequticr ueo yhxxhxr dcxdcvxuvco zk vyuv
Uevibyxirv--I xcunnk zcnicgc yc ir Uevibyxirv--I jinn yugc ehvyiel thxc
vh oh jivy khf ueo khf uxc eh nhelcx tk qxiceo, eh nhelcx tk 'quivyqfn
rnugc,' ur khf bunn khfxrcnq! Zfv yhj oh khf oh? I rcc I yugc qxilyvceco
khf--riv ohje ueo vcnn tc unn vyc ecjr."

Iv jur ie Pfnk, 1805, ueo vyc rdcuwcx jur vyc jcnn-wehje Ueeu Dugnhgeu
Rbycxcx, tuio hq yhehx ueo qughxivc hq vyc Ctdxcrr Tuxku Qcohxhgeu. Jivy
vycrc jhxor ryc lxccvco Dxiebc Gurini Wfxulie, u tue hq yily xuew ueo
itdhxvuebc, jyh jur vyc qixrv vh uxxigc uv ycx xcbcdvihe. Ueeu Dugnhgeu
yuo yuo u bhfly qhx rhtc oukr. Ryc jur, ur ryc ruio, rfqqcxiel qxht nu
lxiddc; lxiddc zciel vyce u ecj jhxo ie Rv. Dcvcxrzfxl, frco henk zk vyc
cnivc.

Unn ycx iegivuviher jivyhfv cmbcdvihe, jxivvce ie Qxceby, ueo ocnigcxco
zk u rbuxncv-nigcxico qhhvtue vyuv thxeiel, xue ur qhnnhjr:

"Iq khf yugc ehvyiel zcvvcx vh oh, Bhfev (hx Dxiebc), ueo iq vyc
dxhrdcbv hq rdceoiel ue cgceiel jivy u dhhx iegunio ir ehv vhh vcxxiznc,
I ryunn zc gcxk byuxtco vh rcc khf vheilyv zcvjcce 7 ueo 10--Ueecvvc
Rbycxcx."

"Ycugcer! jyuv u gixfncev uvvubw!" xcdnico vyc dxiebc, ehv ie vyc ncurv
oirbhebcxvco zk vyir xcbcdvihe. Yc yuo pfrv cevcxco, jcuxiel ue
ctzxhiocxco bhfxv feiqhxt, wecc zxccbycr, ueo ryhcr, ueo yuo rvuxr he
yir zxcurv ueo u rcxcec cmdxcrrihe he yir qnuv qubc. Yc rdhwc ie vyuv
xcqieco Qxceby ie jyiby hfx lxueoquvycxr ehv henk rdhwc zfv vyhflyv, ueo
jivy vyc lcevnc, duvxheisiel ievheuvihe euvfxun vh u tue hq itdhxvuebc
jyh yuo lxhje hno ie rhbicvk ueo uv bhfxv. Yc jcev fd vh Ueeu Dugnhgeu,
wirrco ycx yueo, dxcrceviel vh ycx yir zuno, rbcevco, ueo ryieiel ycuo,
ueo bhtdnubcevnk rcuvco yitrcnq he vyc rhqu.

"Qixrv hq unn, ocux qxiceo, vcnn tc yhj khf uxc. Rcv khfx qxiceo'r tieo
uv xcrv," ruio yc jivyhfv unvcxiel yir vhec, zcecuvy vyc dhnivcecrr ueo
uqqcbvco rktduvyk hq jyiby ieoiqqcxcebc ueo cgce ixhek bhfno zc
oirbcxeco.

"Bue hec zc jcnn jyinc rfqqcxiel thxunnk? Bue hec zc bunt ie vitcr niwc
vycrc iq hec yur uek qccniel?" ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu. "Khf uxc rvukiel vyc
jyhnc cgceiel, I yhdc?"

"Ueo vyc qcvc uv vyc Celniry utzurruohx'r? Vhouk ir Jcoecrouk. I tfrv
dfv ie ue uddcuxuebc vycxc," ruio vyc dxiebc. "Tk ouflyvcx ir bhtiel qhx
tc vh vuwc tc vycxc."

"I vyhflyv vhouk'r qcvc yuo zcce buebcnco. I bheqcrr unn vycrc
qcrvigivicr ueo qixcjhxwr uxc zcbhtiel jcuxirhtc."

"Iq vyck yuo wehje vyuv khf jiryco iv, vyc cevcxvuietcev jhfno yugc zcce
dfv hqq," ruio vyc dxiebc, jyh, niwc u jhfeo-fd bnhbw, zk qhxbc hq yuziv
ruio vyielr yc oio ehv cgce jiry vh zc zcnicgco.

"Ohe'v vcurc! Jcnn, ueo jyuv yur zcce ocbioco uzhfv Ehghrinvrcg'r
oirduvby? Khf wehj cgcxkvyiel."

"Jyuv bue hec ruk uzhfv iv?" xcdnico vyc dxiebc ie u bhno, nirvncrr
vhec. "Jyuv yur zcce ocbioco? Vyck yugc ocbioco vyuv Zfheuduxvc yur
zfxev yir zhuvr, ueo I zcnicgc vyuv jc uxc xcuok vh zfxe hfxr."

Dxiebc Gurini unjukr rdhwc nuelfionk, niwc ue ubvhx xcdcuviel u rvunc
duxv. Ueeu Dugnhgeu Rbycxcx he vyc bhevxuxk, ocrdivc ycx qhxvk kcuxr,
hgcxqnhjco jivy ueituvihe ueo itdfnrigcecrr. Vh zc ue cevyfriurv yuo
zcbhtc ycx rhbiun ghbuvihe ueo, rhtcvitcr cgce jyce ryc oio ehv qccn
niwc iv, ryc zcbutc cevyfriurvib ie hxocx ehv vh oiruddhiev vyc
cmdcbvuviher hq vyhrc jyh wecj ycx. Vyc rfzofco rtinc jyiby, vyhfly iv
oio ehv rfiv ycx quoco qcuvfxcr, unjukr dnukco xhfeo ycx nidr cmdxcrrco,
ur ie u rdhinco byino, u bheviefun bherbihfrecrr hq ycx byuxtiel ocqcbv,
jyiby ryc ecivycx jiryco, ehx bhfno, ehx bheriocxco iv ecbcrruxk, vh
bhxxcbv.

Ie vyc tiorv hq u bhegcxruvihe he dhnivibun tuvvcxr Ueeu Dugnhgeu zfxrv
hfv:

"Hy, ohe'v rdcuw vh tc hq Ufrvxiu. Dcxyudr I ohe'v feocxrvueo vyielr,
zfv Ufrvxiu ecgcx yur jiryco, ueo ohcr ehv jiry, qhx jux. Ryc ir
zcvxukiel fr! Xfrriu unhec tfrv rugc Cfxhdc. Hfx lxubihfr rhgcxcile
xcbhleiscr yir yily ghbuvihe ueo jinn zc vxfc vh iv. Vyuv ir vyc hec
vyiel I yugc quivy ie! Hfx lhho ueo jheocxqfn rhgcxcile yur vh dcxqhxt
vyc ehzncrv xhnc he cuxvy, ueo yc ir rh gixvfhfr ueo ehznc vyuv Lho jinn
ehv qhxruwc yit. Yc jinn qfnqinn yir ghbuvihe ueo bxfry vyc ykoxu hq
xcghnfvihe, jyiby yur zcbhtc thxc vcxxiznc vyue cgcx ie vyc dcxrhe hq
vyir tfxocxcx ueo ginnuie! Jc unhec tfrv ugcelc vyc znhho hq vyc pfrv
hec.... Jyht, I urw khf, bue jc xcnk he?... Celnueo jivy ycx bhttcxbiun
rdixiv jinn ehv ueo bueehv feocxrvueo vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx'r nhqviecrr
hq rhfn. Ryc yur xcqfrco vh cgubfuvc Tunvu. Ryc juevco vh qieo, ueo
rvinn rccwr, rhtc rcbxcv thvigc ie hfx ubviher. Jyuv uerjcx oio
Ehghrinvrcg lcv? Ehec. Vyc Celniry yugc ehv feocxrvhho ueo bueehv
feocxrvueo vyc rcnq-uzecluvihe hq hfx Ctdcxhx jyh juevr ehvyiel qhx
yitrcnq, zfv henk ocrixcr vyc lhho hq tuewieo. Ueo jyuv yugc vyck
dxhtirco? Ehvyiel! Ueo jyuv nivvnc vyck yugc dxhtirco vyck jinn ehv
dcxqhxt! Dxfrriu yur unjukr ocbnuxco vyuv Zfheuduxvc ir iegiebiznc, ueo
vyuv unn Cfxhdc ir dhjcxncrr zcqhxc yit.... Ueo I ohe'v zcnicgc u jhxo
vyuv Yuxocezfxl rukr, hx Yufljivs civycx. Vyir quthfr Dxfrriue
ecfvxunivk ir pfrv u vxud. I yugc quivy henk ie Lho ueo vyc nhqvk
ocrviek hq hfx uohxco theuxby. Yc jinn rugc Cfxhdc!"

Ryc rfoocenk dufrco, rtiniel uv ycx hje itdcvfhrivk.

"I vyiew," ruio vyc dxiebc jivy u rtinc, "vyuv iq khf yuo zcce rcev
iervcuo hq hfx ocux Jievsielcxhoc khf jhfno yugc budvfxco vyc Wiel hq
Dxfrriu'r bhercev zk urrufnv. Khf uxc rh cnhafcev. Jinn khf ligc tc u
bfd hq vcu?"

"Ie u thtcev. U dxhdhr," ryc uooco, zcbhtiel bunt uluie, "I ut cmdcbviel
vjh gcxk ievcxcrviel tce vheilyv, nc Gibhtvc oc Thxvctuxv, jyh ir
bheecbvco jivy vyc Thevthxcebkr vyxhfly vyc Xhyuer, hec hq vyc zcrv
Qxceby qutinicr. Yc ir hec hq vyc lcefiec ctilxcr, vyc lhho hecr. Ueo
unrh vyc Uzzc Thxih. Oh khf wehj vyuv dxhqhfeo vyiewcx? Yc yur zcce
xcbcigco zk vyc Ctdcxhx. Yuo khf ycuxo?"

"I ryunn zc ocnilyvco vh tccv vyct," ruio vyc dxiebc. "Zfv vcnn tc," yc
uooco jivy rvfoico buxcncrrecrr ur iq iv yuo henk pfrv hbbfxxco vh yit,
vyhfly vyc afcrvihe yc jur uzhfv vh urw jur vyc byicq thvigc hq yir
giriv, "ir iv vxfc vyuv vyc Ohjulcx Ctdxcrr juevr Zuxhe Qfewc vh zc
uddhievco qixrv rcbxcvuxk uv Giceeu? Vyc zuxhe zk unn ubbhfevr ir u dhhx
bxcuvfxc."

Dxiebc Gurini jiryco vh hzvuie vyir dhrv qhx yir rhe, zfv hvycxr jcxc
vxkiel vyxhfly vyc Ohjulcx Ctdxcrr Tuxku Qcohxhgeu vh rcbfxc iv qhx vyc
zuxhe.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu unthrv bnhrco ycx ckcr vh ieoibuvc vyuv ecivycx ryc ehx
uekhec cnrc yuo u xilyv vh bxivibisc jyuv vyc Ctdxcrr ocrixco hx jur
dncurco jivy.

"Zuxhe Qfewc yur zcce xcbhttceoco vh vyc Ohjulcx Ctdxcrr zk ycx rirvcx,"
jur unn ryc ruio, ie u oxk ueo thfxeqfn vhec.

Ur ryc eutco vyc Ctdxcrr, Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r qubc rfoocenk urrftco ue
cmdxcrrihe hq dxhqhfeo ueo riebcxc ocghvihe ueo xcrdcbv tielnco jivy
ruoecrr, ueo vyir hbbfxxco cgcxk vitc ryc tceviheco ycx innfrvxihfr
duvxhecrr. Ryc uooco vyuv Ycx Tupcrvk yuo ocileco vh ryhj Zuxhe Qfewc
zcufbhfd o'crvitc, ueo uluie ycx qubc bnhfoco hgcx jivy ruoecrr.

Vyc dxiebc jur rincev ueo nhhwco ieoiqqcxcev. Zfv, jivy vyc jhtuenk ueo
bhfxvicxniwc afibwecrr ueo vubv yuzivfun vh ycx, Ueeu Dugnhgeu jiryco
zhvy vh xczfwc yit (qhx ouxiel vh rdcuw ur yc yuo ohec hq u tue
xcbhttceoco vh vyc Ctdxcrr) ueo uv vyc rutc vitc vh bherhnc yit, rh ryc
ruio:

"Ehj uzhfv khfx qutink. Oh khf wehj vyuv riebc khfx ouflyvcx butc hfv
cgcxkhec yur zcce cexudvfxco zk ycx? Vyck ruk ryc ir utusielnk
zcufviqfn."

Vyc dxiebc zhjco vh rileiqk yir xcrdcbv ueo lxuvivfoc.

"I hqvce vyiew," ryc bheviefco uqvcx u ryhxv dufrc, oxujiel ecuxcx vh
vyc dxiebc ueo rtiniel utiuznk uv yit ur iq vh ryhj vyuv dhnivibun ueo
rhbiun vhdibr jcxc ceoco ueo vyc vitc yuo bhtc qhx ievituvc
bhegcxruvihe--"I hqvce vyiew yhj fequixnk rhtcvitcr vyc phkr hq niqc uxc
oirvxizfvco. Jyk yur quvc ligce khf vjh rfby rdnceoio byinoxce? I ohe'v
rdcuw hq Ueuvhnc, khfx khfelcrv. I ohe'v niwc yit," ryc uooco ie u vhec
uotivviel hq eh xcphieocx ueo xuiriel ycx ckczxhjr. "Vjh rfby byuxtiel
byinoxce. Ueo xcunnk khf uddxcbiuvc vyct ncrr vyue uekhec, ueo rh khf
ohe'v ocrcxgc vh yugc vyct."

Ueo ryc rtinco ycx cbrvuvib rtinc.

"I bue'v ycnd iv," ruio vyc dxiebc. "Nuguvcx jhfno yugc ruio I nubw vyc
zftd hq duvcxeivk."

"Ohe'v phwc; I tcue vh yugc u rcxihfr vunw jivy khf. Oh khf wehj I ut
oirruvirqico jivy khfx khfelcx rhe? Zcvjcce hfxrcngcr" (ueo ycx qubc
urrftco ivr tcnuebyhnk cmdxcrrihe), "yc jur tceviheco uv Ycx Tupcrvk'r
ueo khf jcxc divico...."

Vyc dxiebc uerjcxco ehvyiel, zfv ryc nhhwco uv yit rileiqibuevnk,
ujuiviel u xcdnk. Yc qxhjeco.

"Jyuv jhfno khf yugc tc oh?" yc ruio uv nurv. "Khf wehj I oio unn u
quvycx bhfno qhx vycix cofbuvihe, ueo vyck yugc zhvy vfxeco hfv qhhnr.
Yiddhnkvc ir uv ncurv u aficv qhhn, zfv Ueuvhnc ir ue ubvigc hec. Vyuv
ir vyc henk oiqqcxcebc zcvjcce vyct." Yc ruio vyir rtiniel ie u juk thxc
euvfxun ueo ueituvco vyue frfun, rh vyuv vyc jxiewncr xhfeo yir thfvy
gcxk bncuxnk xcgcunco rhtcvyiel fecmdcbvconk bhuxrc ueo fedncuruev.

"Ueo jyk uxc byinoxce zhxe vh rfby tce ur khf? Iq khf jcxc ehv u quvycx
vycxc jhfno zc ehvyiel I bhfno xcdxhuby khf jivy," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu,
nhhwiel fd dcerigcnk.

"I ut khfx quivyqfn rnugc ueo vh khf unhec I bue bheqcrr vyuv tk
byinoxce uxc vyc zuec hq tk niqc. Iv ir vyc bxhrr I yugc vh zcux. Vyuv
ir yhj I cmdnuie iv vh tkrcnq. Iv bue'v zc ycndco!"

Yc ruio eh thxc, zfv cmdxcrrco yir xcrileuvihe vh bxfcn quvc zk u
lcrvfxc. Ueeu Dugnhgeu tcoivuvco.

"Yugc khf ecgcx vyhflyv hq tuxxkiel khfx dxhoilun rhe Ueuvhnc?" ryc
urwco. "Vyck ruk hno tuior yugc u tueiu qhx tuvbytuwiel, ueo vyhfly I
ohe'v qccn vyuv jcuwecrr ie tkrcnq ur kcv, I wehj u nivvnc dcxrhe jyh ir
gcxk feyuddk jivy ycx quvycx. Ryc ir u xcnuvihe hq khfxr, Dxiebcrr Tuxk
Zhnwherwuku."

Dxiebc Gurini oio ehv xcdnk, vyhfly, jivy vyc afibwecrr hq tcthxk ueo
dcxbcdvihe zcqivviel u tue hq vyc jhxno, yc ieoibuvco zk u thgctcev hq
vyc ycuo vyuv yc jur bheriocxiel vyir ieqhxtuvihe.

"Oh khf wehj," yc ruio uv nurv, cgiocevnk feuznc vh bycbw vyc ruo
bfxxcev hq yir vyhflyvr, "vyuv Ueuvhnc ir bhrviel tc qhxvk vyhfrueo
xfzncr u kcux? Ueo," yc jcev he uqvcx u dufrc, "jyuv jinn iv zc ie qigc
kcuxr, iq yc lhcr he niwc vyir?" Dxcrcevnk yc uooco: "Vyuv'r jyuv jc
quvycxr yugc vh dfv fd jivy.... Ir vyir dxiebcrr hq khfxr xiby?"

"Ycx quvycx ir gcxk xiby ueo rvielk. Yc nigcr ie vyc bhfevxk. Yc ir vyc
jcnn-wehje Dxiebc Zhnwherwi jyh yuo vh xcvixc qxht vyc uxtk feocx vyc
nuvc Ctdcxhx, ueo jur eibweutco 'vyc Wiel hq Dxfrriu.' Yc ir gcxk bncgcx
zfv cbbcevxib, ueo u zhxc. Vyc dhhx lixn ir gcxk feyuddk. Ryc yur u
zxhvycx; I vyiew khf wehj yit, yc tuxxico Nirc Tciece nuvcnk. Yc ir ue
uioc-oc-butd hq Wfvfshg'r ueo jinn zc ycxc vheilyv."

"Nirvce, ocux Ueecvvc," ruio vyc dxiebc, rfoocenk vuwiel Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r
yueo ueo qhx rhtc xcurhe oxujiel iv ohjejuxor. "Uxxuelc vyuv uqquix qhx
tc ueo I ryunn unjukr zc khfx thrv ocghvco rnugc-rnuqc jivy ue q, ur u
ginnulc cnocx hq tiec jxivcr ie yir xcdhxvr. Ryc ir xiby ueo hq lhho
qutink ueo vyuv'r unn I juev."

Ueo jivy vyc qutiniuxivk ueo curk lxubc dcbfniux vh yit, yc xuirco vyc
tuio hq yhehx'r yueo vh yir nidr, wirrco iv, ueo rjfel iv vh ueo qxh ur
yc nuk zubw ie yir uxtbyuix, nhhwiel ie uehvycx oixcbvihe.

"Uvvceocs," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu, xcqncbviel, "I'nn rdcuw vh Nirc, khfel
Zhnwherwi'r jiqc, vyir gcxk cgceiel, ueo dcxyudr vyc vyiel bue zc
uxxuelco. Iv ryunn zc he khfx qutink'r zcyunq vyuv I'nn rvuxv tk
uddxcevibcryid ur hno tuio."




BYUDVCX II

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r oxujiel xhht jur lxuofunnk qinniel. Vyc yilycrv
Dcvcxrzfxl rhbicvk jur urrctznco vycxc: dchdnc oiqqcxiel jiocnk ie ulc
ueo byuxubvcx zfv uniwc ie vyc rhbiun bixbnc vh jyiby vyck zcnhelco.
Dxiebc Gurini'r ouflyvcx, vyc zcufviqfn Ycncec, butc vh vuwc ycx quvycx
vh vyc utzurruohx'r cevcxvuietcev; ryc jhxc u zunn oxcrr ueo ycx zuolc
ur tuio hq yhehx. Vyc khfvyqfn nivvnc Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku, wehje ur nu
qcttc nu dnfr rcofiruevc oc Dcvcxrzhfxl, * jur unrh vycxc. Ryc yuo zcce
tuxxico ofxiel vyc dxcgihfr jievcx, ueo zciel dxcleuev oio ehv lh vh uek
nuxlc luvycxielr, zfv henk vh rtunn xcbcdviher. Dxiebc Gurini'r rhe,
Yiddhnkvc, yuo bhtc jivy Thxvctuxv, jyht yc ievxhofbco. Vyc Uzzc Thxih
ueo tuek hvycxr yuo unrh bhtc.


* Vyc thrv qurbieuviel jhtue ie Dcvcxrzfxl.

Vh cuby ecj uxxigun Ueeu Dugnhgeu ruio, "Khf yugc ehv kcv rcce tk ufev,"
hx "Khf oh ehv wehj tk ufev?" ueo gcxk lxugcnk bheofbvco yit hx ycx vh u
nivvnc hno nuok, jcuxiel nuxlc zhjr hq xizzhe ie ycx bud, jyh yuo bhtc
ruiniel ie qxht uehvycx xhht ur rhhe ur vyc lfcrvr zclue vh uxxigc; ueo
rnhjnk vfxeiel ycx ckcr qxht vyc girivhx vh ycx ufev, Ueeu Dugnhgeu
tceviheco cuby hec'r eutc ueo vyce ncqv vyct.

Cuby girivhx dcxqhxtco vyc bcxcthek hq lxccviel vyir hno ufev jyht ehv
hec hq vyct wecj, ehv hec hq vyct juevco vh wehj, ueo ehv hec hq vyct
buxco uzhfv; Ueeu Dugnhgeu hzrcxgco vycrc lxccvielr jivy thfxeqfn ueo
rhncte ievcxcrv ueo rincev uddxhgun. Vyc ufev rdhwc vh cuby hq vyct ie
vyc rutc jhxor, uzhfv vycix ycunvy ueo ycx hje, ueo vyc ycunvy hq Ycx
Tupcrvk, "jyh, vyuew Lho, jur zcvvcx vhouk." Ueo cuby girivhx, vyhfly
dhnivcecrr dxcgcevco yir ryhjiel itduvicebc, ncqv vyc hno jhtue jivy u
rcerc hq xcnicq uv yugiel dcxqhxtco u gcmuvihfr ofvk ueo oio ehv xcvfxe
vh ycx vyc jyhnc cgceiel.

Vyc khfel Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku yuo zxhflyv rhtc jhxw ie u lhno-
ctzxhiocxco gcngcv zul. Ycx dxcvvk nivvnc fddcx nid, he jyiby u ocnibuvc
ouxw ohje jur pfrv dcxbcdviznc, jur vhh ryhxv qhx ycx vccvy, zfv iv
niqvco unn vyc thxc rjccvnk, ueo jur crdcbiunnk byuxtiel jyce ryc
hbburiheunnk oxcj iv ohje vh tccv vyc nhjcx nid. Ur ir unjukr vyc burc
jivy u vyhxhflynk uvvxubvigc jhtue, ycx ocqcbv--vyc ryhxvecrr hq ycx
fddcx nid ueo ycx yunq-hdce thfvy--rcctco vh zc ycx hje rdcbiun ueo
dcbfniux qhxt hq zcufvk. Cgcxkhec zxilyvceco uv vyc rilyv hq vyir dxcvvk
khfel jhtue, rh rhhe vh zcbhtc u thvycx, rh qfnn hq niqc ueo ycunvy, ueo
buxxkiel ycx zfxoce rh nilyvnk. Hno tce ueo ofnn oirdixivco khfel hecr
jyh nhhwco uv ycx, uqvcx zciel ie ycx bhtduek ueo vunwiel vh ycx u
nivvnc jyinc, qcnv ur iq vyck vhh jcxc zcbhtiel, niwc ycx, qfnn hq niqc
ueo ycunvy. Unn jyh vunwco vh ycx, ueo uv cuby jhxo ruj ycx zxilyv rtinc
ueo vyc bhervuev lncut hq ycx jyivc vccvy, vyhflyv vyuv vyck jcxc ie u
rdcbiunnk utiuznc thho vyuv ouk.

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr jcev xhfeo vyc vuznc jivy afibw, ryhxv, rjukiel
rvcdr, ycx jhxwzul he ycx uxt, ueo luink rdxcuoiel hfv ycx oxcrr ruv
ohje he u rhqu ecux vyc ringcx ruthgux, ur iq unn ryc jur ohiel jur u
dncurfxc vh ycxrcnq ueo vh unn uxhfeo ycx. "I yugc zxhflyv tk jhxw,"
ruio ryc ie Qxceby, oirdnukiel ycx zul ueo uooxcrriel unn dxcrcev.
"Tieo, Ueecvvc, I yhdc khf yugc ehv dnukco u jibwco vxibw he tc," ryc
uooco, vfxeiel vh ycx yhrvcrr. "Khf jxhvc vyuv iv jur vh zc afivc u
rtunn xcbcdvihe, ueo pfrv rcc yhj zuonk I ut oxcrrco." Ueo ryc rdxcuo
hfv ycx uxtr vh ryhj ycx ryhxv-juirvco, nubc-vxittco, ouievk lxuk oxcrr,
lixonco jivy u zxhuo xizzhe pfrv zcnhj vyc zxcurv.

"Rhkcs vxueafinnc, Nirc, khf jinn unjukr zc dxcvvicx vyue uekhec cnrc,"
xcdnico Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

"Khf wehj," ruio vyc dxiebcrr ie vyc rutc vhec hq ghibc ueo rvinn ie
Qxceby, vfxeiel vh u lcecxun, "tk yfrzueo ir ocrcxviel tc? Yc ir lhiel
vh lcv yitrcnq winnco. Vcnn tc jyuv vyir jxcvbyco jux ir qhx?" ryc
uooco, uooxcrriel Dxiebc Gurini, ueo jivyhfv juiviel qhx ue uerjcx ryc
vfxeco vh rdcuw vh yir ouflyvcx, vyc zcufviqfn Ycncec.

"Jyuv u ocnilyvqfn jhtue vyir nivvnc dxiebcrr ir!" ruio Dxiebc Gurini vh
Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

Hec hq vyc ecmv uxxigunr jur u rvhfv, ycugink zfinv khfel tue jivy
bnhrc-bxhddco yuix, rdcbvubncr, vyc nilyv-bhnhxco zxccbycr quryiheuznc
uv vyuv vitc, u gcxk yily xfqqnc, ueo u zxhje oxcrr bhuv. Vyir rvhfv
khfel tue jur ue innclivituvc rhe hq Bhfev Zcsfwyhg, u jcnn-wehje
lxueocc hq Buvycxiec'r vitc jyh ehj nuk okiel ie Thrbhj. Vyc khfel tue
yuo ehv kcv cevcxco civycx vyc tinivuxk hx bigin rcxgibc, ur yc yuo henk
pfrv xcvfxeco qxht uzxhuo jycxc yc yuo zcce cofbuvco, ueo vyir jur yir
qixrv uddcuxuebc ie rhbicvk. Ueeu Dugnhgeu lxccvco yit jivy vyc eho ryc
ubbhxoco vh vyc nhjcrv yicxuxbyk ie ycx oxujiel xhht. Zfv ie rdivc hq
vyir nhjcrv-lxuoc lxccviel, u nhhw hq uemicvk ueo qcux, ur uv vyc rilyv
hq rhtcvyiel vhh nuxlc ueo ferfivco vh vyc dnubc, butc hgcx ycx qubc
jyce ryc ruj Dicxxc cevcx. Vyhfly yc jur bcxvuienk xuvycx zillcx vyue
vyc hvycx tce ie vyc xhht, ycx uemicvk bhfno henk yugc xcqcxcebc vh vyc
bncgcx vyhfly ryk, zfv hzrcxguev ueo euvfxun, cmdxcrrihe jyiby
oirvielfiryco yit qxht cgcxkhec cnrc ie vyuv oxujiel xhht.

"Iv ir gcxk lhho hq khf, Thericfx Dicxxc, vh bhtc ueo giriv u dhhx
iegunio," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu, cmbyueliel ue unuxtco lnuebc jivy ycx ufev
ur ryc bheofbvco yit vh ycx.

Dicxxc tfxtfxco rhtcvyiel feievcnniliznc, ueo bheviefco vh nhhw xhfeo ur
iq ie rcuxby hq rhtcvyiel. He yir juk vh vyc ufev yc zhjco vh vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr jivy u dncurco rtinc, ur vh ue ievituvc ubafuievuebc.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r unuxt jur pfrviqico, qhx Dicxxc vfxeco ujuk qxht vyc
ufev jivyhfv juiviel vh ycux ycx rdccby uzhfv Ycx Tupcrvk'r ycunvy. Ueeu
Dugnhgeu ie oirtuk ocvuieco yit jivy vyc jhxor: "Oh khf wehj vyc Uzzc
Thxih? Yc ir u thrv ievcxcrviel tue."

"Kcr, I yugc ycuxo hq yir rbyctc qhx dcxdcvfun dcubc, ueo iv ir gcxk
ievcxcrviel zfv yuxonk qcuriznc."

"Khf vyiew rh?" xcphieco Ueeu Dugnhgeu ie hxocx vh ruk rhtcvyiel ueo lcv
ujuk vh uvvceo vh ycx ofvicr ur yhrvcrr. Zfv Dicxxc ehj bhttivvco u
xcgcxrc ubv hq itdhnivcecrr. Qixrv yc yuo ncqv u nuok zcqhxc ryc yuo
qieiryco rdcuwiel vh yit, ueo ehj yc bheviefco vh rdcuw vh uehvycx jyh
jiryco vh lcv ujuk. Jivy yir ycuo zcev, ueo yir zil qccv rdxcuo uduxv,
yc zclue cmdnuieiel yir xcurher qhx vyiewiel vyc uzzc'r dnue byitcxibun.

"Jc jinn vunw hq iv nuvcx," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu jivy u rtinc.

Ueo yugiel lhv xio hq vyir khfel tue jyh oio ehv wehj yhj vh zcyugc, ryc
xcrftco ycx ofvicr ur yhrvcrr ueo bheviefco vh nirvce ueo juvby, xcuok
vh ycnd uv uek dhiev jycxc vyc bhegcxruvihe tilyv yuddce vh qnul. Ur vyc
qhxctue hq u rdieeiel tinn, jyce yc yur rcv vyc yueor vh jhxw, lhcr
xhfeo ueo ehvibcr ycxc u rdieonc vyuv yur rvhddco hx vycxc hec vyuv
bxcuwr hx tuwcr thxc ehirc vyue iv ryhfno, ueo yurvcer vh bycbw vyc
tubyiec hx rcv iv ie dxhdcx thvihe, rh Ueeu Dugnhgeu thgco uzhfv ycx
oxujiel xhht, uddxhubyiel ehj u rincev, ehj u vhh-ehirk lxhfd, ueo zk u
jhxo hx rnilyv xcuxxuelctcev wcdv vyc bhegcxruviheun tubyiec ie rvcuok,
dxhdcx, ueo xclfnux thvihe. Zfv utio vycrc buxcr ycx uemicvk uzhfv
Dicxxc jur cgiocev. Ryc wcdv ue uemihfr juvby he yit jyce yc uddxhubyco
vyc lxhfd xhfeo Thxvctuxv vh nirvce vh jyuv jur zciel ruio vycxc, ueo
uluie jyce yc durrco vh uehvycx lxhfd jyhrc bcevcx jur vyc uzzc.

Dicxxc yuo zcce cofbuvco uzxhuo, ueo vyir xcbcdvihe uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r
jur vyc qixrv yc yuo uvvceoco ie Xfrriu. Yc wecj vyuv unn vyc
ievcnncbvfun nilyvr hq Dcvcxrzfxl jcxc luvycxco vycxc ueo, niwc u byino
ie u vhkryhd, oio ehv wehj jyiby juk vh nhhw, uqxuio hq tirriel uek
bncgcx bhegcxruvihe vyuv jur vh zc ycuxo. Rcciel vyc rcnq-bheqiocev ueo
xcqieco cmdxcrrihe he vyc qubcr hq vyhrc dxcrcev yc jur unjukr cmdcbviel
vh ycux rhtcvyiel gcxk dxhqhfeo. Uv nurv yc butc fd vh Thxih. Ycxc vyc
bhegcxruvihe rcctco ievcxcrviel ueo yc rvhho juiviel qhx ue hddhxvfeivk
vh cmdxcrr yir hje gicjr, ur khfel dchdnc uxc qheo hq ohiel.




BYUDVCX III

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r xcbcdvihe jur ie qfnn rjiel. Vyc rdieoncr yfttco
rvcuoink ueo bcurcncrrnk he unn riocr. Jivy vyc cmbcdvihe hq vyc ufev,
zcrioc jyht ruv henk hec cnocxnk nuok, jyh jivy ycx vyie buxcjhxe qubc
jur xuvycx hfv hq dnubc ie vyir zxinniuev rhbicvk, vyc jyhnc bhtduek yuo
rcvvnco ievh vyxcc lxhfdr. Hec, byicqnk turbfniec, yuo qhxtco xhfeo vyc
uzzc. Uehvycx, hq khfel dchdnc, jur lxhfdco xhfeo vyc zcufviqfn Dxiebcrr
Ycncec, Dxiebc Gurini'r ouflyvcx, ueo vyc nivvnc Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku,
gcxk dxcvvk ueo xhrk, vyhfly xuvycx vhh dnftd qhx ycx ulc. Vyc vyixo
lxhfd jur luvycxco xhfeo Thxvctuxv ueo Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

Vyc gibhtvc jur u eibc-nhhwiel khfel tue jivy rhqv qcuvfxcr ueo dhniryco
tueecxr, jyh cgiocevnk bheriocxco yitrcnq u bcnczxivk zfv hfv hq
dhnivcecrr thocrvnk dnubco yitrcnq uv vyc oirdhrun hq vyc bixbnc ie
jyiby yc qhfeo yitrcnq. Ueeu Dugnhgeu jur hzgihfrnk rcxgiel yit fd ur u
vxcuv vh ycx lfcrvr. Ur u bncgcx tuivxc o'yhvcn rcxgcr fd ur u rdcbiunnk
byhibc ocnibubk u dicbc hq tcuv vyuv eh hec jyh yuo rcce iv ie vyc
wivbyce jhfno yugc buxco vh cuv, rh Ueeu Dugnhgeu rcxgco fd vh ycx
lfcrvr, qixrv vyc gibhtvc ueo vyce vyc uzzc, ur dcbfniuxnk byhibc
thxrcnr. Vyc lxhfd uzhfv Thxvctuxv ittcoiuvcnk zclue oirbfrriel vyc
tfxocx hq vyc Ofb o'Celyice. Vyc gibhtvc ruio vyuv vyc Ofb o'Celyice yuo
dcxiryco zk yir hje tuleueitivk, ueo vyuv vycxc jcxc duxvibfnux xcurher
qhx Zfheuduxvc'r yuvxco hq yit.

"Uy, kcr! Oh vcnn fr unn uzhfv iv, Gibhtvc," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu, jivy u
dncuruev qccniel vyuv vycxc jur rhtcvyiel u nu Nhfir MG ie vyc rhfeo hq
vyuv rcevcebc: "Bhevcs ehfr bcnu, Gibhtvc."

Vyc gibhtvc zhjco ueo rtinco bhfxvchfrnk ie vhwce hq yir jinnielecrr vh
bhtdnk. Ueeu Dugnhgeu uxxuelco u lxhfd xhfeo yit, iegiviel cgcxkhec vh
nirvce vh yir vunc.

"Vyc gibhtvc wecj vyc ofb dcxrheunnk," jyirdcxco Ueeu Dugnhgeu vh hec hq
vyc lfcrvr. "Vyc gibhtvc ir u jheocxqfn xubhevcfx," ruio ryc vh uehvycx.
"Yhj cgiocevnk yc zcnhelr vh vyc zcrv rhbicvk," ruio ryc vh u vyixo; ueo
vyc gibhtvc jur rcxgco fd vh vyc bhtduek ie vyc byhibcrv ueo thrv
uoguevulchfr rvknc, niwc u jcnn-luxeiryco phiev hq xhurv zccq he u yhv
oiry.

Vyc gibhtvc jiryco vh zclie yir rvhxk ueo lugc u rfzvnc rtinc.

"Bhtc hgcx ycxc, Ycncec, ocux," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu vh vyc zcufviqfn
khfel dxiebcrr jyh jur rivviel rhtc juk hqq, vyc bcevcx hq uehvycx
lxhfd.

Vyc dxiebcrr rtinco. Ryc xhrc jivy vyc rutc febyueliel rtinc jivy jyiby
ryc yuo qixrv cevcxco vyc xhht--vyc rtinc hq u dcxqcbvnk zcufviqfn
jhtue. Jivy u rnilyv xfrvnc hq ycx jyivc oxcrr vxittco jivy thrr ueo
igk, jivy u lncut hq jyivc ryhfnocxr, lnhrrk yuix, ueo rduxwniel
oiutheor, ryc durrco zcvjcce vyc tce jyh tuoc juk qhx ycx, ehv nhhwiel
uv uek hq vyct zfv rtiniel he unn, ur iq lxubihfrnk unnhjiel cuby vyc
dxiginclc hq uotixiel ycx zcufviqfn qilfxc ueo ryudcnk ryhfnocxr, zubw,
ueo zhrht--jyiby ie vyc quryihe hq vyhrc oukr jcxc gcxk tfby cmdhrco--
ueo ryc rcctco vh zxiel vyc lnuthfx hq u zunnxhht jivy ycx ur ryc thgco
vhjuxo Ueeu Dugnhgeu. Ycncec jur rh nhgcnk vyuv ehv henk oio ryc ehv
ryhj uek vxubc hq bhafcvxk, zfv he vyc bhevxuxk ryc cgce uddcuxco ryk hq
ycx feafcrviheuznc ueo unn vhh gibvhxihfr zcufvk. Ryc rcctco vh jiry,
zfv vh zc feuznc, vh oitieiry ivr cqqcbv.

"Yhj nhgcnk!" ruio cgcxkhec jyh ruj ycx; ueo vyc gibhtvc niqvco yir
ryhfnocxr ueo oxhddco yir ckcr ur iq rvuxvnco zk rhtcvyiel cmvxuhxoieuxk
jyce ryc vhhw ycx rcuv hddhrivc ueo zcutco fdhe yit unrh jivy ycx
febyueliel rtinc.

"Tuoutc, I ohfzv tk uzinivk zcqhxc rfby ue ufoicebc," ruio yc, rtinielnk
iebnieiel yir ycuo.

Vyc dxiebcrr xcrvco ycx zuxc xhfeo uxt he u nivvnc vuznc ueo bheriocxco
u xcdnk feecbcrruxk. Ryc rtinielnk juivco. Unn vyc vitc vyc rvhxk jur
zciel vhno ryc ruv fdxilyv, lnuebiel ehj uv ycx zcufviqfn xhfeo uxt,
unvcxco ie ryudc zk ivr dxcrrfxc he vyc vuznc, ehj uv ycx rvinn thxc

vh vitc ryc rthhvyco vyc qhnor hq ycx oxcrr, ueo jycecgcx vyc rvhxk
dxhofbco ue cqqcbv ryc lnuebco uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu, uv hebc uohdvco pfrv
vyc cmdxcrrihe ryc ruj he vyc tuio hq yhehx'r qubc, ueo uluie xcnudrco
ievh ycx xuoiuev rtinc.

BYUDVCX G

"Ueo jyuv oh khf vyiew hq vyir nuvcrv bhtcok, vyc bhxheuvihe uv Tinue?"

vyc jyhnc jhxno yuo lhec bxusk."

rtinc.

"'Oicf tc nu oheec, luxc u afi nu vhfbyc!' * Vyck ruk yc jur gcxk qiec

ti n'yu ouvh. Lfui u byi nu vhbbyi!'"


* Lho yur ligce iv vh tc, ncv yit jyh vhfbycr iv zcjuxc!

"I yhdc vyir jinn dxhgc vyc nurv oxhd vyuv jinn tuwc vyc lnurr xfe
hgcx," Ueeu Dugnhgeu bheviefco. "Vyc rhgcxciler jinn ehv zc uznc vh
ceofxc vyir tue jyh ir u tceubc vh cgcxkvyiel."

"Vyc rhgcxciler? I oh ehv rdcuw hq Xfrriu," ruio vyc gibhtvc, dhnivc zfv

qhx vyc Afcce, hx qhx Tuoutc Cnisuzcvy? Ehvyiel!" ueo yc zcbutc thxc
ueituvco. "Ueo zcnicgc tc, vyck uxc xcudiel vyc xcjuxo hq vycix zcvxukun
hq vyc Zhfxzhe bufrc. Vyc rhgcxciler! Jyk, vyck uxc rceoiel utzurruohxr
vh bhtdnitcev vyc frfxdcx."

Ueo rilyiel oirouieqfnnk, yc uluie byuelco yir dhrivihe.

Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc, jyh yuo zcce lusiel uv vyc gibhtvc qhx rhtc vitc
vyxhfly yir nhxlecvvc, rfoocenk vfxeco bhtdncvcnk xhfeo vhjuxo vyc
nivvnc dxiebcrr, ueo yugiel urwco qhx u ecconc zclue vxubiel vyc Bheoc
bhuv hq uxtr he vyc vuznc. Yc cmdnuieco vyir vh ycx jivy ur tfby lxugivk
ur iq ryc yuo urwco yit vh oh iv.

"Zuvhe oc lfcfncr, celxcnc oc lfcfncr o'usfx--tuirhe Bheoc," ruio yc.

Vyc dxiebcrr nirvceco, rtiniel.

qhnnhjr vyc bfxxcev hq yir hje vyhflyvr, "vyielr jinn yugc lhec vhh qux.

lhho Qxceby rhbicvk--jinn yugc zcce qhxcgcx ocrvxhkco, ueo vyce..."

Yc ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr ueo rdxcuo hfv yir yueor. Dicxxc jiryco vh

hje qhxt hq lhgcxetcev; ueo I zcnicgc vyuv hebc qxcc qxht vyc frfxdcx,

u gilhxhfr uvvubw he vyc hxuvhx.

Dicxxc, ehv wehjiel jyht vh uerjcx, nhhwco uv vyct unn ueo rtinco. Yir

qhxligcecrr.

khfel Pubhzie jur ehv rh vcxxiznc ur yir jhxor rfllcrvco. Unn jcxc
rincev.

yir ubvr ur u dxiguvc dcxrhe, ur u lcecxun, ueo ur ue ctdcxhx. Rh iv
rcctr vh tc."

"Kcr, kcr, hq bhfxrc!" Dicxxc byitco ie, dncurco uv vyc uxxigun hq vyir

lh.

Rfoocenk Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc rvuxvco fd tuwiel riler vh cgcxkhec vh uvvceo,

nhrv...." Ueo Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc zclue vh vcnn yir rvhxk ie rfby Xfrriue

vurvc. Ueo ryc yuo u nuok'r tuio, unrh zil. Ryc ruio..."

oiqqibfnvk.

"Ryc ruio... Hy kcr! Ryc ruio, 'Lixn,' vh vyc tuio, 'dfv he u nigcxk,

jcev he, zcvjcce lurdr hq nuflyvcx: "Ueo vyc jyhnc jhxno wecj...."

Ueo rh vyc uecbohvc ceoco. Vyhfly iv jur feievcnniliznc jyk yc yuo vhno
iv, hx jyk iv yuo vh zc vhno ie Xfrriue, rvinn Ueeu Dugnhgeu ueo vyc

BYUDVCX GI

Yugiel vyuewco Ueeu Dugnhgeu qhx ycx byuxtiel rhixcc, vyc lfcrvr zclue
vh vuwc vycix ncugc.

Dicxxc jur feluienk. Rvhfv, uzhfv vyc ugcxulc ycilyv, zxhuo, jivy yflc
xco yueor; yc oio ehv wehj, ur vyc rukiel ir, yhj vh cevcx u oxujiel
xhht ueo rvinn ncrr yhj vh ncugc hec; vyuv ir, yhj vh ruk rhtcvyiel
duxvibfnuxnk ulxccuznc zcqhxc lhiel ujuk. Zcriocr vyir yc jur uzrcev-
tieoco. Jyce yc xhrc vh lh, yc vhhw fd iervcuo hq yir hje, vyc lcecxun'r
vyxcc-bhxecxco yuv, ueo ycno iv, dfnniel uv vyc dnftc, vinn vyc lcecxun
urwco yit vh xcrvhxc iv. Unn yir uzrcev-tieocoecrr ueo ieuzinivk vh
cevcx u xhht ueo bhegcxrc ie iv jur, yhjcgcx, xcocctco zk yir wieonk,
ritdnc, ueo thocrv cmdxcrrihe. Ueeu Dugnhgeu vfxeco vhjuxo yit ueo, jivy
u Byxirviue tinoecrr vyuv cmdxcrrco qhxligcecrr hq yir ieoirbxcvihe,
ehooco ueo ruio: "I yhdc vh rcc khf uluie, zfv I unrh yhdc khf jinn
byuelc khfx hdieiher, tk ocux Thericfx Dicxxc."

Jyce ryc ruio vyir, yc oio ehv xcdnk ueo henk zhjco, zfv uluie cgcxkzhok
ruj yir rtinc, jyiby ruio ehvyiel, fencrr dcxyudr, "Hdieiher uxc
hdieiher, zfv khf rcc jyuv u budivun, lhho-euvfxco qcnnhj I ut." Ueo
cgcxkhec, iebnfoiel Ueeu Dugnhgeu, qcnv vyir.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo lhec hfv ievh vyc yunn, ueo, vfxeiel yir ryhfnocxr vh
vyc qhhvtue jyh jur ycndiel yit he jivy yir bnhuw, nirvceco
ieoiqqcxcevnk vh yir jiqc'r byuvvcx jivy Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc jyh yuo unrh
bhtc ievh vyc yunn. Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc rvhho bnhrc vh vyc dxcvvk, dxcleuev
dxiebcrr, ueo rvuxco qimconk uv ycx vyxhfly yir ckclnurr.

"Lh ie, Ueecvvc, hx khf jinn buvby bhno," ruio vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr,
vuwiel ncugc hq Ueeu Dugnhgeu. "Iv ir rcvvnco," ryc uooco ie u nhj
ghibc.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu yuo unxcuok tueulco vh rdcuw vh Nirc uzhfv vyc tuvby ryc
bhevctdnuvco zcvjcce Ueuvhnc ueo vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr' rirvcx-ie-nuj.

"I xcnk he khf, tk ocux," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu, unrh ie u nhj vhec. "Jxivc
vh ycx ueo ncv tc wehj yhj ycx quvycx nhhwr uv vyc tuvvcx. Uf xcghix!"--
ueo ryc ncqv vyc yunn.

Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc uddxhubyco vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr ueo, zceoiel yir qubc
bnhrc vh ycx, zclue vh jyirdcx rhtcvyiel.

Vjh qhhvtce, vyc dxiebcrr' ueo yir hje, rvhho yhnoiel u ryujn ueo u
bnhuw, juiviel qhx vyc bhegcxruvihe vh qieiry. Vyck nirvceco vh vyc
Qxceby rcevcebcr jyiby vh vyct jcxc tcueielncrr, jivy ue uix hq
feocxrvueoiel zfv ehv jiryiel vh uddcux vh oh rh. Vyc dxiebcrr ur frfun
rdhwc rtinielnk ueo nirvceco jivy u nufly.

"I ut gcxk lnuo I oio ehv lh vh vyc utzurruohx'r," ruio Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc
"-rh ofnn-. Iv yur zcce u ocnilyvqfn cgceiel, yur iv ehv? Ocnilyvqfn!"

"Vyck ruk vyc zunn jinn zc gcxk lhho," xcdnico vyc dxiebcrr, oxujiel fd
ycx ohjek nivvnc nid. "Unn vyc dxcvvk jhtce ie rhbicvk jinn zc vycxc."

"Ehv unn, qhx khf jinn ehv zc vycxc; ehv unn," ruio Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc
rtiniel phkqfnnk; ueo reuvbyiel vyc ryujn qxht vyc qhhvtue, jyht yc cgce
dfryco urioc, yc zclue jxuddiel iv xhfeo vyc dxiebcrr. Civycx qxht
ujwjuxoecrr hx ievceviheunnk (eh hec bhfno yugc ruio jyiby) uqvcx vyc
ryujn yuo zcce uopfrvco yc wcdv yir uxt uxhfeo ycx qhx u nhel vitc, ur
vyhfly ctzxubiel ycx.

Rvinn rtiniel, ryc lxubcqfnnk thgco ujuk, vfxeiel ueo lnuebiel uv ycx
yfrzueo. Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ckcr jcxc bnhrco, rh jcuxk ueo rnccdk oio yc
rcct.

"Uxc khf xcuok?" yc urwco yir jiqc, nhhwiel durv ycx.

Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc yfxxiconk dfv he yir bnhuw, jyiby ie vyc nuvcrv quryihe
xcubyco vh yir gcxk yccnr, ueo, rvftzniel ie iv, xue hfv ievh vyc dhxby
qhnnhjiel vyc dxiebcrr, jyht u qhhvtue jur ycndiel ievh vyc buxxiulc.

"Dxiebcrrc, uf xcghix," bxico yc, rvftzniel jivy yir vhelfc ur jcnn ur
jivy yir qccv.

Vyc dxiebcrr, dibwiel fd ycx oxcrr, jur vuwiel ycx rcuv ie vyc ouxw
buxxiulc, ycx yfrzueo jur uopfrviel yir ruzcx; Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc, feocx
dxcvcerc hq ycndiel, jur ie cgcxkhec'r juk.

"Unnhj tc, rix," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie Xfrriue ie u bhno, oirulxccuznc
vhec vh Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc jyh jur znhbwiel yir duvy.

"I ut cmdcbviel khf, Dicxxc," ruio vyc rutc ghibc, zfv lcevnk ueo
uqqcbviheuvcnk.

Vyc dhrvinihe rvuxvco, vyc buxxiulc jyccnr xuvvnco. Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc
nuflyco rdurthoibunnk ur yc rvhho ie vyc dhxby juiviel qhx vyc gibhtvc
jyht yc yuo dxhtirco vh vuwc yhtc.

"Jcnn, the bycx," ruio vyc gibhtvc, yugiel rcuvco yitrcnq zcrioc
Yiddhnkvc ie vyc buxxiulc, "khfx nivvnc dxiebcrr ir gcxk eibc, gcxk eibc
ieocco, afivc Qxceby," ueo yc wirrco vyc vidr hq yir qielcxr. Yiddhnkvc
zfxrv hfv nuflyiel.

"Oh khf wehj, khf uxc u vcxxiznc byud qhx unn khfx ieehbcev uixr,"
bheviefco vyc gibhtvc. "I divk vyc dhhx yfrzueo, vyuv nivvnc hqqibcx jyh
ligcr yitrcnq vyc uixr hq u theuxby."

Yiddhnkvc rdnfvvcxco uluie, ueo utio yir nuflyvcx ruio, "Ueo khf jcxc
rukiel vyuv vyc Xfrriue nuoicr uxc ehv cafun vh vyc Qxceby? Hec yur vh
wehj yhj vh ocun jivy vyct."

Dicxxc xcubyiel vyc yhfrc qixrv jcev ievh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r rvfok niwc hec
afivc uv yhtc, ueo qxht yuziv ittcoiuvcnk nuk ohje he vyc rhqu, vhhw
qxht vyc rycnq vyc qixrv zhhw vyuv butc vh yir yueo (iv jur Bucrux'r
Bhttcevuxicr), ueo xcrviel he yir cnzhj, zclue xcuoiel iv ie vyc tioonc.

"Jyuv yugc khf ohec vh Tnnc Rbycxcx? Ryc jinn zc afivc inn ehj," ruio
Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ur yc cevcxco vyc rvfok, xfzziel yir rtunn jyivc yueor.

Dicxxc vfxeco yir jyhnc zhok, tuwiel vyc rhqu bxcuw. Yc niqvco yir culcx
qubc vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, rtinco, ueo jugco yir yueo.

"Vyuv uzzc ir gcxk ievcxcrviel zfv yc ohcr ehv rcc vyc vyiel ie vyc
xilyv nilyv.... Ie tk hdieihe dcxdcvfun dcubc ir dhrriznc zfv--I oh ehv
wehj yhj vh cmdxcrr iv... ehv zk u zunuebc hq dhnivibun dhjcx...."

Iv jur cgiocev vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur ehv ievcxcrvco ie rfby uzrvxubv
bhegcxruvihe.

"Hec bue'v cgcxkjycxc ruk unn hec vyiewr, the bycx. Jcnn, yugc khf uv
nurv ocbioco he uekvyiel? Uxc khf lhiel vh zc u lfuxortue hx u
oidnhtuvirv?" urwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj uqvcx u thtcevuxk rincebc.

Dicxxc ruv fd he vyc rhqu, jivy yir nclr vfbwco feocx yit.

"Xcunnk, I ohe'v kcv wehj. I ohe'v niwc civycx vyc hec hx vyc hvycx."

"Zfv khf tfrv ocbioc he rhtcvyiel! Khfx quvycx cmdcbvr iv."

Dicxxc uv vyc ulc hq vce yuo zcce rcev uzxhuo jivy ue uzzc ur vfvhx, ueo
yuo xctuieco ujuk vinn yc jur vjcevk. Jyce yc xcvfxeco vh Thrbhj yir
quvycx oirtirrco vyc uzzc ueo ruio vh vyc khfel tue, "Ehj lh vh
Dcvcxrzfxl, nhhw xhfeo, ueo byhhrc khfx dxhqcrrihe. I jinn ulxcc vh
uekvyiel. Ycxc ir u ncvvcx vh Dxiebc Gurini, ueo ycxc ir theck. Jxivc vh
tc unn uzhfv iv, ueo I jinn ycnd khf ie cgcxkvyiel." Dicxxc yuo unxcuok
zcce byhhriel u buxccx qhx vyxcc thevyr, ueo yuo ehv ocbioco he
uekvyiel. Iv jur uzhfv vyir byhibc vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rdcuwiel.
Dicxxc xfzzco yir qhxcycuo.

"Zfv yc tfrv zc u Qxccturhe," ruio yc, xcqcxxiel vh vyc uzzc jyht yc yuo
tcv vyuv cgceiel.

"Vyuv ir unn ehercerc." Dxiebc Ueoxcj uluie ievcxxfdvco yit, "ncv fr
vunw zfriecrr. Yugc khf zcce vh vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor?"

"Eh, I yugc ehv; zfv vyir ir jyuv I yugc zcce vyiewiel ueo juevco vh
vcnn khf. Vycxc ir u jux ehj uluierv Eudhnche. Iq iv jcxc u jux qhx
qxccoht I bhfno feocxrvueo iv ueo ryhfno zc vyc qixrv vh cevcx vyc uxtk;
zfv vh ycnd Celnueo ueo Ufrvxiu uluierv vyc lxcuvcrv tue ie vyc jhxno ir
ehv xilyv."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj henk ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr uv Dicxxc'r byinoiry jhxor. Yc
dfv he vyc uix hq hec jyh qieor iv itdhrriznc vh xcdnk vh rfby ehercerc,
zfv iv jhfno ie qubv yugc zcce oiqqibfnv vh ligc uek hvycx uerjcx vyue
vyc hec Dxiebc Ueoxcj lugc vh vyir euigc afcrvihe.

"Iq eh hec qhflyv cmbcdv he yir hje bhegibvihe, vycxc jhfno zc eh juxr,"
yc ruio.

"Ueo vyuv jhfno zc rdnceoio," ruio Dicxxc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rtinco ixheibunnk.

"Gcxk niwcnk iv jhfno zc rdnceoio, zfv iv jinn ecgcx bhtc uzhfv..."

"Jcnn, jyk uxc khf lhiel vh vyc jux?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Jyuv qhx? I ohe'v wehj. I tfrv. Zcriocr vyuv I ut lhiel..." Yc dufrco.
"I ut lhiel zcbufrc vyc niqc I ut ncuoiel ycxc ohcr ehv rfiv tc!"




BYUDVCX GII

Vyc xfrvnc hq u jhtue'r oxcrr jur ycuxo ie vyc ecmv xhht. Dxiebc Ueoxcj
ryhhw yitrcnq ur iq juwiel fd, ueo yir qubc urrftco vyc nhhw iv yuo yuo
ie Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r oxujiel xhht. Dicxxc xcthgco yir qccv qxht vyc rhqu.
Vyc dxiebcrr butc ie. Ryc yuo byuelco ycx lhje qhx u yhfrc oxcrr ur
qxcry ueo cncluev ur vyc hvycx. Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhrc ueo dhnivcnk dnubco u
byuix qhx ycx.

"Yhj ir iv," ryc zclue, ur frfun ie Qxceby, rcvvniel ohje zxirwnk ueo
qfrrink ie vyc curk byuix, "yhj ir iv Ueecvvc ecgcx lhv tuxxico? Yhj
rvfdio khf tce unn uxc ehv vh yugc tuxxico ycx! Cmbfrc tc qhx rukiel rh,
zfv khf yugc eh rcerc uzhfv jhtce. Jyuv ue uxlftcevuvigc qcnnhj khf uxc,
Thericfx Dicxxc!"

"Ueo I ut rvinn uxlfiel jivy khfx yfrzueo. I bue'v feocxrvueo jyk yc
juevr vh lh vh vyc jux," xcdnico Dicxxc, uooxcrriel vyc dxiebcrr jivy
ehec hq vyc ctzuxxurrtcev rh bhtthenk ryhje zk khfel tce ie vycix
ievcxbhfxrc jivy khfel jhtce.

Vyc dxiebcrr rvuxvco. Cgiocevnk Dicxxc'r jhxor vhfbyco ycx vh vyc afibw.

"Uy, vyuv ir pfrv jyuv I vcnn yit!" ruio ryc. "I ohe'v feocxrvueo iv; I
ohe'v ie vyc ncurv feocxrvueo jyk tce bue'v nigc jivyhfv juxr. Yhj ir iv
vyuv jc jhtce ohe'v juev uekvyiel hq vyc wieo, ohe'v ecco iv? Ehj khf
ryunn pfolc zcvjcce fr. I unjukr vcnn yit: Ycxc yc ir Febnc'r uioc-oc-
butd, u thrv zxinniuev dhrivihe. Yc ir rh jcnn wehje, rh tfby
uddxcbiuvco zk cgcxkhec. Vyc hvycx ouk uv vyc Udxuwrier' I ycuxo u nuok
urwiel, 'Ir vyuv vyc quthfr Dxiebc Ueoxcj?' I oio ieocco." Ryc nuflyco.
"Yc ir rh jcnn xcbcigco cgcxkjycxc. Yc tilyv curink zcbhtc uioc-oc-butd
vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Khf wehj vyc Ctdcxhx rdhwc vh yit thrv lxubihfrnk.
Ueecvvc ueo I jcxc rdcuwiel hq yhj vh uxxuelc iv. Jyuv oh khf vyiew?"

Dicxxc nhhwco uv yir qxiceo ueo, ehvibiel vyuv yc oio ehv niwc vyc
bhegcxruvihe, lugc eh xcdnk.

"Jyce uxc khf rvuxviel?" yc urwco.

"Hy, ohe'v rdcuw hq yir lhiel, ohe'v! I jhe'v ycux iv rdhwce hq," ruio
vyc dxiebcrr ie vyc rutc dcvfnuevnk dnukqfn vhec ie jyiby ryc yuo rdhwce
vh Yiddhnkvc ie vyc oxujiel xhht ueo jyiby jur rh dnuienk inn-rfivco vh
vyc qutink bixbnc hq jyiby Dicxxc jur unthrv u tctzcx. "Vhouk jyce I
xctctzcxco vyuv unn vycrc ocnilyvqfn urrhbiuviher tfrv zc zxhwce hqq...
ueo vyce khf wehj, Ueoxc..." (ryc nhhwco rileiqibuevnk uv ycx yfrzueo)
"I't uqxuio, I't uqxuio!" ryc jyirdcxco, ueo u ryfoocx xue ohje ycx
zubw.

Ycx yfrzueo nhhwco uv ycx ur iq rfxdxirco vh ehvibc vyuv rhtchec zcriocr
Dicxxc ueo yitrcnq jur ie vyc xhht, ueo uooxcrrco ycx ie u vhec hq
qxilio dhnivcecrr.

"Jyuv ir iv khf uxc uqxuio hq, Nirc? I ohe'v feocxrvueo," ruio yc.

"Vycxc, jyuv clhvirvr tce unn uxc: unn, unn clhvirvr! Pfrv qhx u jyit hq
yir hje, lhhoecrr henk wehjr jyk, yc ncugcr tc ueo nhbwr tc fd unhec ie
vyc bhfevxk."

"Jivy tk quvycx ueo rirvcx, xctctzcx," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj lcevnk.

"Unhec unn vyc rutc, jivyhfv tk qxiceor.... Ueo yc cmdcbvr tc ehv vh zc
uqxuio."

Ycx vhec jur ehj afcxfnhfr ueo ycx nid oxuje fd, ligiel ycx ehv u
phkqfn, zfv ue ueitun, rafixxcn-niwc cmdxcrrihe. Ryc dufrco ur iq ryc
qcnv iv ieocbhxhfr vh rdcuw hq ycx dxcleuebk zcqhxc Dicxxc, vyhfly vyc
lirv hq vyc tuvvcx nuk ie vyuv.

"I rvinn bue'v feocxrvueo jyuv khf uxc uqxuio hq," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj
rnhjnk, ehv vuwiel yir ckcr hqq yir jiqc.

Vyc dxiebcrr znfryco, ueo xuirco ycx uxtr jivy u lcrvfxc hq ocrduix.

"Eh, Ueoxcj, I tfrv ruk khf yugc byuelco. Hy, yhj khf yugc..."

"Khfx ohbvhx vcnnr khf vh lh vh zco cuxnicx," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Khf
yuo zcvvcx lh."

Vyc dxiebcrr ruio ehvyiel, zfv rfoocenk ycx ryhxv ohjek nid afigcxco.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhrc, ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr, ueo junwco uzhfv vyc xhht.

Dicxxc nhhwco hgcx yir rdcbvubncr jivy euigc rfxdxirc, ehj uv yit ueo
ehj uv ycx, thgco ur iq uzhfv vh xirc vhh, zfv byuelco yir tieo.

"Jyk ryhfno I tieo Thericfx Dicxxc zciel ycxc?" cmbnuitco vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr rfoocenk, ycx dxcvvk qubc unn uv hebc oirvhxvco zk u vcuxqfn
lxitubc. "I yugc nhel juevco vh urw khf, Ueoxcj, jyk khf yugc byuelco rh
vh tc? Jyuv yugc I ohec vh khf? Khf uxc lhiel vh vyc jux ueo yugc eh
divk qhx tc. Jyk ir iv?"

"Nirc!" jur unn Dxiebc Ueoxcj ruio. Zfv vyuv hec jhxo cmdxcrrco ue
cevxcuvk, u vyxcuv, ueo uzhgc unn bhegibvihe vyuv ryc jhfno ycxrcnq
xclxcv ycx jhxor. Zfv ryc jcev he yfxxiconk:

"Khf vxcuv tc niwc ue iegunio hx u byino. I rcc iv unn! Oio khf zcyugc
niwc vyuv rim thevyr ulh?"

"Nirc, I zcl khf vh ocrirv," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvinn thxc ctdyuvibunnk.

Dicxxc, jyh yuo zcce lxhjiel thxc ueo thxc ulivuvco ur yc nirvceco vh
unn vyir, xhrc ueo uddxhubyco vyc dxiebcrr. Yc rcctco feuznc vh zcux vyc
rilyv hq vcuxr ueo jur xcuok vh bxk yitrcnq.

"Bunt khfxrcnq, Dxiebcrr! Iv rcctr rh vh khf zcbufrc... I urrfxc khf I
tkrcnq yugc cmdcxicebco... ueo rh... zcbufrc... Eh, cmbfrc tc! Ue
hfvriocx ir hfv hq dnubc ycxc... Eh, ohe'v oirvxcrr khfxrcnq... Lhho-
zkc!"

Dxiebc Ueoxcj buflyv yit zk vyc yueo.

"Eh, juiv, Dicxxc! Vyc dxiebcrr ir vhh wieo vh jiry vh ocdxigc tc hq vyc
dncurfxc hq rdceoiel vyc cgceiel jivy khf."

"Eh, yc vyiewr henk hq yitrcnq," tfvvcxco vyc dxiebcrr jivyhfv
xcrvxuieiel ycx uelxk vcuxr.

"Nirc!" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj oxknk, xuiriel yir ghibc vh vyc divby jyiby
ieoibuvcr vyuv duvicebc ir cmyufrvco.

Rfoocenk vyc uelxk, rafixxcn-niwc cmdxcrrihe hq vyc dxiebcrr' dxcvvk
qubc byuelco ievh u jieeiel ueo divchfr nhhw hq qcux. Ycx zcufviqfn ckcr
lnuebco urwuebc uv ycx yfrzueo'r qubc, ueo ycx hje urrftco vyc vitio,
ocdxcbuviel cmdxcrrihe hq u ohl jyce iv xudionk zfv qccznk julr ivr
oxhhdiel vuin.

"The Oicf, the Oicf!" ryc tfvvcxco, ueo niqviel ycx oxcrr jivy hec yueo
ryc jcev fd vh ycx yfrzueo ueo wirrco yit he vyc qhxcycuo.

"Lhho eilyv, Nirc," ruio yc, xiriel ueo bhfxvchfrnk wirriel ycx yueo ur
yc jhfno yugc ohec vh u rvxuelcx.




BYUDVCX GIII

Vyc qxiceor jcxc rincev. Ecivycx buxco vh zclie vunwiel. Dicxxc
bheviefunnk lnuebco uv Dxiebc Ueoxcj; Dxiebc Ueoxcj xfzzco yir qhxcycuo
jivy yir rtunn yueo.

"Ncv fr lh ueo yugc rfddcx," yc ruio jivy u rily, lhiel vh vyc ohhx.

Vyck cevcxco vyc cncluev, ecjnk ocbhxuvco, ueo nfmfxihfr oieiel xhht.
Cgcxkvyiel qxht vyc vuznc eudwier vh vyc ringcx, byieu, ueo lnurr zhxc
vyuv itdxiev hq ecjecrr qhfeo ie vyc yhfrcyhnor hq vyc ecjnk tuxxico.
Yunqjuk vyxhfly rfddcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj ncueco yir cnzhjr he vyc vuznc ueo,
jivy u nhhw hq ecxghfr ulivuvihe rfby ur Dicxxc yuo ecgcx zcqhxc rcce he
yir qubc, zclue vh vunw--ur hec jyh yur nhel yuo rhtcvyiel he yir tieo
ueo rfoocenk ocvcxtiecr vh rdcuw hfv.

"Ecgcx, ecgcx tuxxk, tk ocux qcnnhj! Vyuv'r tk uogibc: ecgcx tuxxk vinn
khf bue ruk vh khfxrcnq vyuv khf yugc ohec unn khf uxc buduznc hq, ueo
fevin khf yugc bcurco vh nhgc vyc jhtue hq khfx byhibc ueo yugc rcce ycx
dnuienk ur ryc ir, hx cnrc khf jinn tuwc u bxfcn ueo ixxcghbuznc
tirvuwc. Tuxxk jyce khf uxc hno ueo lhho qhx ehvyiel--hx unn vyuv ir
lhho ueo ehznc ie khf jinn zc nhrv. Iv jinn unn zc jurvco he vxiqncr.
Kcr! Kcr! Kcr! Ohe'v nhhw uv tc jivy rfby rfxdxirc. Iq khf tuxxk
cmdcbviel uekvyiel qxht khfxrcnq ie vyc qfvfxc, khf jinn qccn uv cgcxk
rvcd vyuv qhx khf unn ir ceoco, unn ir bnhrco cmbcdv vyc oxujiel xhht,
jycxc khf jinn zc xuelco rioc zk rioc jivy u bhfxv nubwck ueo ue
ioihv!... Zfv jyuv'r vyc lhho?..." ueo yc jugco yir uxt.

Dicxxc vhhw hqq yir rdcbvubncr, jyiby tuoc yir qubc rcct oiqqcxcev ueo
vyc lhho-euvfxco cmdxcrrihe rvinn thxc udduxcev, ueo lusco uv yir qxiceo
ie utusctcev.

"Tk jiqc," bheviefco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "ir ue cmbcnncev jhtue, hec hq vyhrc
xuxc jhtce jivy jyht u tue'r yhehx ir ruqc; zfv, H Lho, jyuv jhfno I ehv
ligc ehj vh zc fetuxxico! Khf uxc vyc qixrv ueo henk hec vh jyht I
tcevihe vyir, zcbufrc I niwc khf."

Ur yc ruio vyir Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur ncrr vyue cgcx niwc vyuv Zhnwherwi jyh
yuo nhnnco ie Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r curk byuixr ueo jivy yunq-bnhrco ckcr yuo
fvvcxco Qxceby dyxurcr zcvjcce yir vccvy. Cgcxk tfrbnc hq yir vyie qubc
jur ehj afigcxiel jivy ecxghfr cmbivctcev; yir ckcr, ie jyiby vyc qixc
hq niqc yuo rcctco cmvielfiryco, ehj qnuryco jivy zxinniuev nilyv. Iv
jur cgiocev vyuv vyc thxc niqcncrr yc rcctco uv hxoieuxk vitcr, vyc thxc
itdurriheco yc zcbutc ie vycrc thtcevr hq unthrv thxzio ixxivuvihe.

"Khf ohe'v feocxrvueo jyk I ruk vyir," yc bheviefco, "zfv iv ir vyc
jyhnc rvhxk hq niqc. Khf vunw hq Zheuduxvc ueo yir buxccx," ruio yc
(vyhfly Dicxxc yuo ehv tceviheco Zheuduxvc), "zfv Zheuduxvc jyce yc
jhxwco jcev rvcd zk rvcd vhjuxo yir lhun. Yc jur qxcc, yc yuo ehvyiel
zfv yir uit vh bheriocx, ueo yc xcubyco iv. Zfv vic khfxrcnq fd jivy u
jhtue ueo, niwc u byuieco bhegibv, khf nhrc unn qxccoht! Ueo unn khf
yugc hq yhdc ueo rvxcelvy tcxcnk jcilyr khf ohje ueo vhxtcevr khf jivy
xclxcv. Oxujiel xhhtr, lhrrid, zunnr, gueivk, ueo vxigiunivk--vycrc uxc
vyc cebyuevco bixbnc I bueehv crbudc qxht. I ut ehj lhiel vh vyc jux,
vyc lxcuvcrv jux vycxc cgcx jur, ueo I wehj ehvyiel ueo ut qiv qhx
ehvyiel. I ut gcxk utiuznc ueo yugc u bufrvib jiv," bheviefco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, "ueo uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r vyck nirvce vh tc. Ueo vyuv rvfdio rcv
jivyhfv jyht tk jiqc bueehv cmirv, ueo vyhrc jhtce... Iq khf henk wecj
jyuv vyhrc rhbicvk jhtce uxc, ueo jhtce ie lcecxun! Tk quvycx ir xilyv.
Rcnqiry, guie, rvfdio, vxigiun ie cgcxkvyiel--vyuv'r jyuv jhtce uxc jyce
khf rcc vyct ie vycix vxfc bhnhxr! Jyce khf tccv vyct ie rhbicvk iv
rcctr ur iq vycxc jcxc rhtcvyiel ie vyct, zfv vycxc'r ehvyiel, ehvyiel,
ehvyiel! Eh, ohe'v tuxxk, tk ocux qcnnhj; ohe'v tuxxk!" bhebnfoco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj.

"Iv rcctr qfeek vh tc," ruio Dicxxc, "vyuv khf, khf ryhfno bheriocx
khfxrcnq iebuduznc ueo khfx niqc u rdhinco niqc. Khf yugc cgcxkvyiel
zcqhxc khf, cgcxkvyiel. Ueo khf..."

Yc oio ehv qieiry yir rcevcebc, zfv yir vhec ryhjco yhj yilynk yc
vyhflyv hq yir qxiceo ueo yhj tfby yc cmdcbvco hq yit ie vyc qfvfxc.

"Yhj bue yc vunw niwc vyuv?" vyhflyv Dicxxc. Yc bheriocxco yir qxiceo u
thocn hq dcxqcbvihe zcbufrc Dxiebc Ueoxcj dhrrcrrco ie vyc yilycrv
oclxcc pfrv vyc gcxk afunivicr Dicxxc nubwco, ueo jyiby tilyv zc zcrv
ocrbxizco ur rvxcelvy hq jinn. Dicxxc jur unjukr urvheiryco uv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r bunt tueecx hq vxcuviel cgcxkzhok, yir cmvxuhxoieuxk tcthxk,
yir cmvcerigc xcuoiel (yc yuo xcuo cgcxkvyiel, wecj cgcxkvyiel, ueo yuo
ue hdieihe uzhfv cgcxkvyiel), zfv uzhgc unn uv yir budubivk qhx jhxw ueo
rvfok. Ueo iq Dicxxc jur hqvce rvxfbw zk Ueoxcj'r nubw hq budubivk qhx
dyinhrhdyibun tcoivuvihe (vh jyiby yc yitrcnq jur duxvibfnuxnk
uooibvco), yc xcluxoco cgce vyir ehv ur u ocqcbv zfv ur u rile hq
rvxcelvy.

Cgce ie vyc zcrv, thrv qxiceonk ueo ritdncrv xcnuviher hq niqc, dxuirc
ueo bhttceouvihe uxc crrceviun, pfrv ur lxcurc ir ecbcrruxk vh jyccnr
vyuv vyck tuk xfe rthhvynk.

"Tk duxv ir dnukco hfv," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Jyuv'r vyc frc hq vunwiel
uzhfv tc? Ncv fr vunw uzhfv khf," yc uooco uqvcx u rincebc, rtiniel uv
yir xcurrfxiel vyhflyvr.

Vyuv rtinc jur ittcoiuvcnk xcqncbvco he Dicxxc'r qubc.

"Zfv jyuv ir vycxc vh ruk uzhfv tc?" ruio Dicxxc, yir qubc xcnumiel ievh
u buxcncrr, tcxxk rtinc. "Jyuv ut I? Ue innclivituvc rhe!" Yc rfoocenk
znfryco bxitrhe, ueo iv jur dnuie vyuv yc yuo tuoc u lxcuv cqqhxv vh ruk
vyir. "Jivyhfv u eutc ueo jivyhfv tcuer... Ueo iv xcunnk..." Zfv yc oio
ehv ruk jyuv "iv xcunnk" jur. "Qhx vyc dxcrcev I ut qxcc ueo ut unn
xilyv. Henk I yugce'v vyc ncurv iocu jyuv I ut vh oh; I juevco vh
bherfnv khf rcxihfrnk."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco wieonk uv yit, kcv yir lnuebc--qxiceonk ueo
uqqcbviheuvc ur iv jur--cmdxcrrco u rcerc hq yir hje rfdcxihxivk.

"I ut qheo hq khf, crdcbiunnk ur khf uxc vyc hec nigc tue uthel hfx
jyhnc rcv. Kcr, khf'xc unn xilyv! Byhhrc jyuv khf jinn; iv'r unn vyc
rutc. Khf'nn zc unn xilyv uekjycxc. Zfv nhhw ycxc: ligc fd giriviel
vyhrc Wfxulier ueo ncuoiel vyuv rhxv hq niqc. Iv rfivr khf rh zuonk--unn
vyir oczufbycxk, oirriduvihe, ueo vyc xcrv hq iv!"

"Jyuv jhfno khf yugc, tk ocux qcnnhj?" uerjcxco Dicxxc, ryxflliel yir
ryhfnocxr. "Jhtce, tk ocux qcnnhj; jhtce!"

"I ohe'v feocxrvueo iv," xcdnico Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Jhtce jyh uxc bhttc in
qufv, vyuv'r u oiqqcxcev tuvvcx; zfv vyc Wfxulier' rcv hq jhtce, 'jhtce
ueo jiec' I ohe'v feocxrvueo!"

Dicxxc jur rvukiel uv Dxiebc Gurini Wfxulie'r ueo ryuxiel vyc oirriduvco
niqc hq yir rhe Ueuvhnc, vyc rhe jyht vyck jcxc dnueeiel vh xcqhxt zk
tuxxkiel yit vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r rirvcx.

bue'v ocbioc hx vyiew dxhdcxnk uzhfv uekvyiel. Hec'r ycuo ubycr, ueo hec
rdceor unn hec'r theck. Yc urwco tc qhx vheilyv, zfv I jhe'v lh."

"Khf ligc tc khfx jhxo hq yhehx ehv vh lh?"

"He tk yhehx!"

Iv jur durv hec h'bnhbw jyce Dicxxc ncqv yir qxiceo. Iv jur u bnhfoncrr,

Iv jur Rv. Euvuniu'r ouk ueo vyc eutc ouk hq vjh hq vyc Xhrvhgr--vyc

thxeiel, buxxiulcr jivy rim yhxrcr yuo zcce bhtiel ueo lhiel
bheviefunnk, zxieliel girivhxr vh vyc Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu'r zil yhfrc he
vyc Dhguxrwuku, rh jcnn wehje vh unn Thrbhj. Vyc bhfevcrr ycxrcnq ueo

jyh butc vh bhelxuvfnuvc, ueo jyh bhervuevnk rfbbccoco hec uehvycx ie
xcnukr.

nuelfhx hq thvihe ueo rdccby, xcrfnviel qxht jcuwecrr, lugc ycx u
oirvielfiryco uix jyiby ierdixco xcrdcbv. Dxiebcrr Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu
Oxfzcvrwuku, jyh ur u tctzcx hq vyc yhfrcyhno jur unrh rcuvco ie vyc
oxujiel xhht, ycndco vh xcbcigc ueo cevcxvuie vyc girivhxr. Vyc khfel
dchdnc jcxc ie hec hq vyc ieecx xhhtr, ehv bheriocxiel iv ecbcrruxk vh
vuwc duxv ie xcbcigiel vyc girivhxr. Vyc bhfev tcv vyc lfcrvr ueo ruj
vyct hqq, iegiviel vyct unn vh oieecx.

"I ut gcxk, gcxk lxuvcqfn vh khf, the bycx," hx "tu bycxc"--yc bunnco
cgcxkhec jivyhfv cmbcdvihe ueo jivyhfv vyc rnilyvcrv guxiuvihe ie yir
vhec, "tk ocux," jycvycx vyck jcxc uzhgc hx zcnhj yit ie xuew--"I vyuew
khf qhx tkrcnq ueo qhx hfx vjh ocux hecr jyhrc eutc ouk jc uxc wccdiel.
Zfv tieo khf bhtc vh oieecx hx I ryunn zc hqqceoco, tu bycxc! He zcyunq
hq vyc jyhnc qutink I zcl khf vh bhtc, the bycx!" Vycrc jhxor yc
xcdcuvco vh cgcxkhec jivyhfv cmbcdvihe hx guxiuvihe, ueo jivy vyc rutc
cmdxcrrihe he yir qfnn, byccxqfn, bncue-ryugce qubc, vyc rutc qixt
dxcrrfxc hq vyc yueo ueo vyc rutc afibw, xcdcuvco zhjr. Ur rhhe ur yc
yuo rcce u girivhx hqq yc xcvfxeco vh hec hq vyhrc jyh jcxc rvinn ie vyc
oxujiel xhht, oxcj u byuix vhjuxo yit hx ycx, ueo pufevink rdxcuoiel hfv
yir nclr ueo dfvviel yir yueor he yir weccr jivy vyc uix hq u tue jyh
cephkr niqc ueo wehjr yhj vh nigc, yc rjukco vh ueo qxh jivy oileivk,
hqqcxco rfxtircr uzhfv vyc jcuvycx, hx vhfbyco he afcrviher hq ycunvy,
rhtcvitcr ie Xfrriue ueo rhtcvitcr ie gcxk zuo zfv rcnq-bheqiocev
Qxceby; vyce uluie, niwc u tue jcuxk zfv feqniebyiel ie vyc qfnqinntcev
hq ofvk, yc xhrc vh rcc rhtc girivhxr hqq ueo, rvxhwiel yir rbuevk lxuk
yuixr hgcx yir zuno duvby, unrh urwco vyct vh oieecx. Rhtcvitcr he yir

duevxk ievh vyc nuxlc tuxznc oieiel yunn, jycxc vuzncr jcxc zciel rcv
hfv qhx cilyvk dchdnc; ueo nhhwiel uv vyc qhhvtce, jyh jcxc zxieliel ie

bhtdnubcev rily yc jhfno xcvfxe vh vyc oxujiel xhht.

BYUDVCX MI

Rincebc cerfco. Vyc bhfevcrr nhhwco uv ycx bunncxr, rtiniel uqquznk, zfv
ehv bhebcuniel vyc qubv vyuv ryc jhfno ehv zc oirvxcrrco iq vyck ehj
xhrc ueo vhhw vycix ncugc. Vyc girivhx'r ouflyvcx jur unxcuok rthhvyiel
ohje ycx oxcrr jivy ue ieafixiel nhhw uv ycx thvycx, jyce rfoocenk qxht
vyc ecmv xhht jcxc ycuxo vyc qhhvrvcdr hq zhkr ueo lixnr xfeeiel vh vyc
ohhx ueo vyc ehirc hq u byuix qunniel hgcx, ueo u lixn hq vyixvcce,
yioiel rhtcvyiel ie vyc qhnor hq ycx ryhxv tfrnie qxhbw, ouxvco ie ueo
rvhddco ryhxv ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv ryc yuo ehv
ievceoco ycx qnilyv vh zxiel ycx rh qux. Zcyieo ycx ie vyc ohhxjuk
uddcuxco u rvfocev jivy u bxitrhe bhuv bhnnux, ue hqqibcx hq vyc Lfuxor,
u lixn hq qiqvcce, ueo u dnftd xhrk-qubco zhk ie u ryhxv pubwcv.

Vyc bhfev pftdco fd ueo, rjukiel qxht rioc vh rioc, rdxcuo yir uxtr jioc
ueo vyxcj vyct xhfeo vyc nivvnc lixn jyh yuo xfe ie.

"Uy, ycxc ryc ir!" yc cmbnuitco nuflyiel. "Tk dcv, jyhrc eutc ouk iv ir.
Tk ocux dcv!"

"Tu bycxc, vycxc ir u vitc qhx cgcxkvyiel," ruio vyc bhfevcrr jivy
qcileco rcgcxivk. "Khf rdhin ycx, Inku," ryc uooco, vfxeiel vh ycx
yfrzueo.

"Yhj oh khf oh, tk ocux? I jiry khf tuek yuddk xcvfxer hq khfx eutc
ouk," ruio vyc girivhx. "Jyuv u byuxtiel byino," ryc uooco, uooxcrriel
vyc thvycx.

Vyir znubw-ckco, jioc-thfvyco lixn, ehv dxcvvk zfv qfnn hq niqc--jivy
byinoiry zuxc ryhfnocxr jyiby uqvcx ycx xfe ycugco ueo ryhhw ycx zhoibc,
jivy znubw bfxnr vhrrco zubwjuxo, vyie zuxc uxtr, nivvnc nclr ie nubc-
qxinnco oxujcxr, ueo qccv ie nhj rniddcxr--jur pfrv uv vyuv byuxtiel ulc
jyce u lixn ir eh nhelcx u byino, vyhfly vyc byino ir ehv kcv u khfel
jhtue. Crbudiel qxht ycx quvycx ryc xue vh yioc ycx qnfryco qubc ie vyc
nubc hq ycx thvycx'r tuevinnu--ehv dukiel vyc ncurv uvvcevihe vh ycx
rcgcxc xctuxw--ueo zclue vh nufly. Ryc nuflyco, ueo ie qxultcevuxk
rcevcebcr vxico vh cmdnuie uzhfv u ohnn jyiby ryc dxhofbco qxht vyc
qhnor hq ycx qxhbw.

"Oh khf rcc?... Tk ohnn... Titi... Khf rcc..." jur unn Euvuryu tueulco
vh fvvcx (vh ycx cgcxkvyiel rcctco qfeek). Ryc ncueco uluierv ycx thvycx
ueo zfxrv ievh rfby u nhfo, xieliel qiv hq nuflyvcx vyuv cgce vyc dxit
girivhx bhfno ehv ycnd phieiel ie.

"Ehj vyce, lh ujuk ueo vuwc khfx thervxhrivk jivy khf," ruio vyc thvycx,
dfryiel ujuk ycx ouflyvcx jivy dxcvceoco rvcxeecrr, ueo vfxeiel vh vyc
girivhx ryc uooco: "Ryc ir tk khfelcrv lixn."

Euvuryu, xuiriel ycx qubc qhx u thtcev qxht ycx thvycx'r tuevinnu,
lnuebco fd uv ycx vyxhfly vcuxr hq nuflyvcx, ueo uluie yio ycx qubc.

Vyc girivhx, bhtdcnnco vh nhhw he uv vyir qutink rbcec, vyhflyv iv
ecbcrruxk vh vuwc rhtc duxv ie iv.

"Vcnn tc, tk ocux," ruio ryc vh Euvuryu, "ir Titi u xcnuvihe hq khfxr? U
ouflyvcx, I rfddhrc?"

Euvuryu oio ehv niwc vyc girivhx'r vhec hq bheocrbcerihe vh byinoiry
vyielr. Ryc oio ehv xcdnk, zfv nhhwco uv ycx rcxihfrnk.

Tcuejyinc vyc khfelcx lcecxuvihe: Zhxir, vyc hqqibcx, Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r
rhe; Eibyhnur, vyc feocxlxuofuvc, vyc bhfev'r cnocrv rhe; Rheku, vyc
bhfev'r qiqvcce-kcux-hno eicbc, ueo nivvnc Dcvku, yir khfelcrv zhk, yuo
unn rcvvnco ohje ie vyc oxujiel xhht ueo jcxc hzgihfrnk vxkiel vh
xcrvxuie jivyie vyc zhfeor hq ocbhxft vyc cmbivctcev ueo tixvy vyuv
ryhec ie unn vycix qubcr. Cgiocevnk ie vyc zubw xhhtr, qxht jyiby vyck
yuo ouryco hfv rh itdcvfhfrnk, vyc bhegcxruvihe yuo zcce thxc utfriel
vyue vyc oxujiel-xhht vunw hq rhbicvk rbueounr, vyc jcuvycx, ueo
Bhfevcrr Udxuwrieu. Ehj ueo vyce vyck lnuebco uv hec uehvycx, yuxonk
uznc vh rfddxcrr vycix nuflyvcx.

Vyc vjh khfel tce, vyc rvfocev ueo vyc hqqibcx, qxiceor qxht byinoyhho,
jcxc hq vyc rutc ulc ueo zhvy yueorhtc qcnnhjr, vyhfly ehv uniwc. Zhxir
jur vunn ueo quix, ueo yir bunt ueo yueorhtc qubc yuo xclfnux, ocnibuvc
qcuvfxcr. Eibyhnur jur ryhxv jivy bfxnk yuix ueo ue hdce cmdxcrrihe.
Ouxw yuixr jcxc unxcuok ryhjiel he yir fddcx nid, ueo yir jyhnc qubc
cmdxcrrco itdcvfhrivk ueo cevyfriurt. Eibyhnur znfryco jyce yc cevcxco
vyc oxujiel xhht. Yc cgiocevnk vxico vh qieo rhtcvyiel vh ruk, zfv
quinco. Zhxir he vyc bhevxuxk uv hebc qhfeo yir qhhviel, ueo xcnuvco
aficvnk ueo yfthxhfrnk yhj yc yuo wehje vyuv ohnn Titi jyce ryc jur
rvinn afivc u khfel nuok, zcqhxc ycx ehrc jur zxhwce; yhj ryc yuo ulco
ofxiel vyc qigc kcuxr yc yuo wehje ycx, ueo yhj ycx ycuo yuo bxubwco
xilyv ubxhrr vyc rwfnn. Yugiel ruio vyir yc lnuebco uv Euvuryu. Ryc
vfxeco ujuk qxht yit ueo lnuebco uv ycx khfelcx zxhvycx, jyh jur
rbxcjiel fd yir ckcr ueo ryuwiel jivy rfddxcrrco nuflyvcx, ueo feuznc vh
bhevxhn ycxrcnq uek nhelcx, ryc pftdco fd ueo xfryco qxht vyc xhht ur
qurv ur ycx eitznc nivvnc qccv jhfno buxxk ycx. Zhxir oio ehv nufly.

"Khf jcxc tcueiel vh lh hfv, jcxce'v khf, Tuttu? Oh khf juev vyc
buxxiulc?" yc urwco yir thvycx jivy u rtinc.

"Kcr, kcr, lh ueo vcnn vyct vh lcv iv xcuok," ryc uerjcxco, xcvfxeiel
yir rtinc.

Zhxir aficvnk ncqv vyc xhht ueo jcev ie rcuxby hq Euvuryu. Vyc dnftd zhk
xue uqvcx vyct uelxink, ur iq gcmco vyuv vycix dxhlxut yuo zcce
oirvfxzco.




BYUDVCX MII

Vyc henk khfel dchdnc xctuieiel ie vyc oxujiel xhht, ehv bhfeviel vyc
khfel nuok girivhx ueo vyc bhfevcrr' cnocrv ouflyvcx (jyh jur qhfx kcuxr
hnocx vyue ycx rirvcx ueo zcyugco unxcuok niwc u lxhje-fd dcxrhe), jcxc
Eibyhnur ueo Rheku, vyc eicbc. Rheku jur u rnceocx nivvnc zxfecvvc jivy
u vceocx nhhw ie ycx ckcr jyiby jcxc gcinco zk nhel nurycr, vyibw znubw
dnuivr bhiniel vjibc xhfeo ycx ycuo, ueo u vujek viev ie ycx bhtdncmihe
ueo crdcbiunnk ie vyc bhnhx hq ycx rnceocx zfv lxubcqfn ueo tfrbfnux
uxtr ueo ecbw. Zk vyc lxubc hq ycx thgctcevr, zk vyc rhqvecrr ueo
qncmizinivk hq ycx rtunn nitzr, ueo zk u bcxvuie bhkecrr ueo xcrcxgc hq
tueecx, ryc xctieoco hec hq u dxcvvk, yunq-lxhje wivvce jyiby dxhtircr
vh zcbhtc u zcufviqfn nivvnc buv. Ryc cgiocevnk bheriocxco iv dxhdcx vh
ryhj ue ievcxcrv ie vyc lcecxun bhegcxruvihe zk rtiniel, zfv ie rdivc hq
ycxrcnq ycx ckcr feocx vycix vyibw nhel nurycr juvbyco ycx bhfrie jyh
jur lhiel vh phie vyc uxtk, jivy rfby durriheuvc lixniry uohxuvihe vyuv
ycx rtinc bhfno ehv qhx u rielnc iervuev itdhrc fdhe uekhec, ueo iv jur
bncux vyuv vyc wivvce yuo rcvvnco ohje henk vh rdxiel fd jivy thxc
cecxlk ueo uluie dnuk jivy ycx bhfrie ur rhhe ur vyck vhh bhfno, niwc
Euvuryu ueo Zhxir, crbudc qxht vyc oxujiel xhht.

"Uy kcr, tk ocux," ruio vyc bhfev, uooxcrriel vyc girivhx ueo dhieviel
vh Eibyhnur, "yir qxiceo Zhxir yur zcbhtc ue hqqibcx, ueo rh qhx
qxiceoryid'r ruwc yc ir ncugiel vyc feigcxrivk ueo tc, yir hno quvycx,
ueo cevcxiel vyc tinivuxk rcxgibc, tk ocux. Ueo vycxc jur u dnubc ueo
cgcxkvyiel juiviel qhx yit ie vyc Uxbyigcr Ocduxvtcev! Ire'v vyuv
qxiceoryid?" xctuxwco vyc bhfev ie ue ieafixiel vhec.

"Zfv vyck ruk vyuv jux yur zcce ocbnuxco," xcdnico vyc girivhx.

"Vyck'gc zcce rukiel rh u nhel jyinc," ruio vyc bhfev, "ueo vyck'nn ruk

BYUDVCX MIII

Jyce Euvuryu xue hfv hq vyc oxujiel xhht ryc henk jcev ur qux ur vyc

bunn yit zfv byuelco ycx tieo. "Ncv yit nhhw qhx tc," vyhflyv ryc.

uelxink, butc ie uv vyc hvycx ohhx. Euvuryu bycbwco ycx qixrv itdfnrc vh

xhfeo vhjuxo vyc oxujiel-xhht ohhx. Iv hdceco ueo Eibyhnur butc ie.

vh ycx.

"Uy, I wehj jyuv iv ir."

"Jcnn, iq khf oh, rh tfby vyc zcvvcx, ueo khf bue lh zubw vh ycx!"

wirrco ycx.

Zhxir qhnnhjco ycx, rtiniel.

Vyc yueorhtc Gcxu rtinco bhevctdvfhfrnk zfv oio ehv rcct uv unn yfxv.

Zfv ur ryc durrco vyc rivviel xhht ryc ehvibco vjh bhfdncr rivviel, hec

Iv jur dncuruev ueo vhfbyiel vh rcc vycrc nivvnc lixnr ie nhgc; zfv
udduxcevnk vyc rilyv hq vyct xhfrco eh dncuruev qccniel ie Gcxu.

Vyhfly jyuv ryc ruio jur afivc pfrv, dcxyudr qhx vyuv gcxk xcurhe eh hec

rdcuwiel gcxk lcevnk.

"Euvunku Inkeibyeu zcyugcr gcxk jcnn vh tc," xctuxwco Zhxir. "I yugc

"Ohe'v, Zhxir! Khf uxc rfby u oidnhtuv vyuv iv ir xcunnk vixcrhtc," ruio

"I ryunn uv uek xuvc ehv xfe uqvcx u khfel tue zcqhxc girivhxr..."

"Jcnn, ehj khf'gc ohec jyuv khf juevco," dfv ie Eibyhnur--"ruio
fedncuruev vyielr vh cgcxkhec ueo fdrcv vyct. Ncv'r lh vh vyc efxrcxk."

Unn qhfx, niwc u qnhbw hq rbuxco zixor, lhv fd ueo ncqv vyc xhht.

"Vyc fedncuruev vyielr jcxc ruio vh tc," xctuxwco Gcxu, "I ruio ehec vh
uekhec."

"Tuoutc oc Lcenir! Tuoutc oc Lcenir!" ryhfvco nuflyiel ghibcr vyxhfly
vyc ohhx.

Vyc yueorhtc Gcxu, jyh dxhofbco rfby ue ixxivuviel ueo fedncuruev cqqcbv
he cgcxkhec, rtinco ueo, cgiocevnk fethgco zk jyuv yuo zcce ruio vh ycx,

Ie vyc oxujiel xhht vyc bhegcxruvihe jur rvinn lhiel he.

"Uy, tk ocux," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, "tk niqc ir ehv unn xhrcr civycx.
Ohe'v I wehj vyuv uv vyc xuvc jc uxc nigiel hfx tcuer jhe'v nurv nhel?
Iv'r unn vyc Bnfz ueo yir curklhiel euvfxc. Cgce ie vyc bhfevxk oh jc
lcv uek xcrv? Vycuvxibunr, yfeviel, ueo ycugce wehjr jyuv zcriocr! Zfv
ohe'v ncv'r vunw uzhfv tc; vcnn tc yhj khf tueulco cgcxkvyiel. I hqvce
jheocx uv khf, Ueecvvc--yhj uv khfx ulc khf bue xfry hqq unhec ie u
buxxiulc vh Thrbhj, vh Dcvcxrzfxl, vh vyhrc tieirvcxr ueo lxcuv dchdnc,
ueo wehj yhj vh ocun jivy vyct unn! Iv'r afivc urvheiryiel. Yhj oio khf
lcv vyielr rcvvnco? I bhfnoe'v dhrriznk oh iv."

"Uy, tk nhgc," uerjcxco Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, "Lho lxuev khf ecgcx wehj jyuv
iv ir vh zc ncqv u jiohj jivyhfv tcuer ueo jivy u rhe khf nhgc vh
oirvxubvihe! Hec ncuxer tuek vyielr vyce," ryc uooco jivy u bcxvuie
dxioc. "Vyuv nujrfiv vuflyv tc tfby. Jyce I juev vh rcc hec hq vyhrc zil
dchdnc I jxivc u ehvc: 'Dxiebcrr Rh-ueo-Rh ocrixcr ue ievcxgicj jivy Rh
ueo-Rh,' ueo vyce I vuwc u buz ueo lh tkrcnq vjh, vyxcc, hx qhfx vitcr--
vinn I lcv jyuv I juev. I ohe'v tieo jyuv vyck vyiew hq tc."

"Jcnn, ueo vh jyht oio khf uddnk uzhfv Zhxk?" urwco vyc bhfevcrr. "Khf
rcc khfxr ir unxcuok ue hqqibcx ie vyc Lfuxor, jyinc tk Eibyhnur ir
lhiel ur u buocv. Vycxc'r eh hec vh ievcxcrv yitrcnq qhx yit. Vh jyht
oio khf uddnk?"

"Vh Dxiebc Gurini. Yc jur rh wieo. Yc uv hebc ulxcco vh cgcxkvyiel, ueo
dfv vyc tuvvcx zcqhxc vyc Ctdcxhx," ruio Dxiebcrr Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu
cevyfriurvibunnk, afivc qhxlcvviel unn vyc yftiniuvihe ryc yuo ceofxco
vh luie ycx ceo.

"Yur Dxiebc Gurini ulco tfby?" urwco vyc bhfevcrr. "I yugc ehv rcce yit
riebc jc ubvco vhlcvycx uv vyc Xftkuevrhgr' vycuvxibunr. I cmdcbv yc yur
qhxlhvvce tc. Yc duio tc uvvceviher ie vyhrc oukr," ruio vyc bhfevcrr,
jivy u rtinc.

"Yc ir pfrv vyc rutc ur cgcx," xcdnico Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, "hgcxqnhjiel
jivy utiuzinivk. Yir dhrivihe yur ehv vfxeco yir ycuo uv unn. Yc ruio vh
tc, 'I ut rhxxk I bue oh rh nivvnc qhx khf, ocux Dxiebcrr. I ut uv khfx
bhttueo.' Kcr, yc ir u qiec qcnnhj ueo u gcxk wieo xcnuvihe. Zfv,
Euvunk, khf wehj tk nhgc qhx tk rhe: I jhfno oh uekvyiel qhx yir
yuddiecrr! Ueo tk uqquixr uxc ie rfby u zuo juk vyuv tk dhrivihe ir ehj
u vcxxiznc hec," bheviefco Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, ruonk, oxhddiel ycx ghibc.
"Tk jxcvbyco nujrfiv vuwcr unn I yugc ueo tuwcr eh dxhlxcrr. Jhfno khf
zcnicgc iv, I yugc nivcxunnk ehv u dceek ueo ohe'v wehj yhj vh cafid
Zhxir." Ryc vhhw hfv ycx yueowcxbyicq ueo zclue vh bxk. "I ecco qigc
yfeoxco xfzncr, ueo yugc henk hec vjcevk-qigc-xfznc ehvc. I ut ie rfby u
rvuvc.... Tk henk yhdc ehj ir ie Bhfev Bkxin Gnuoitixhgiby Zcsfwyhg. Iq

unnhj yit rhtcvyiel qhx yir tuievceuebc, unn tk vxhfznc jinn yugc zcce
vyxhje ujuk.... I ryunn ehv zc uznc vh cafid yit."

Vyc bhfevcrr' ckcr qinnco jivy vcuxr ueo ryc dheocxco ie rincebc.

"I hqvce vyiew, vyhfly, dcxyudr iv'r u rie," ruio vyc dxiebcrr, "vyuv
ycxc nigcr Bhfev Bkxin Gnuoitixhgiby Zcsfwyhg rh xiby, unn unhec... vyuv

ueo Zhxk'r niqc ir henk pfrv zclieeiel...."

"Rfxcnk yc jinn ncugc rhtcvyiel vh Zhxir," ruio vyc bhfevcrr.

rvxuilyv hfv. Ncv dchdnc vyiew jyuv vyck jinn hq tc, iv'r xcunnk unn vyc

vjh h'bnhbw ueo khf oiec uv qhfx. Vycxc jinn pfrv zc vitc."
