BYUDVCX MGI

Dicxxc, uqvcx unn, yuo ehv tueulco vh byhhrc u buxccx qhx yitrcnq ie
Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo yuo zcce cmdcnnco qxht vycxc qhx xihvhfr bheofbv ueo
rcev vh Thrbhj. Vyc rvhxk vhno uzhfv yit uv Bhfev Xhrvhg'r jur vxfc.
Dicxxc yuo vuwce duxv ie vkiel u dhnibctue vh u zcux. Yc yuo ehj zcce
qhx rhtc oukr ie Thrbhj ueo jur rvukiel ur frfun uv yir quvycx'r yhfrc.
Vyhfly yc cmdcbvco vyuv vyc rvhxk hq yir crbuduoc jhfno zc unxcuok wehje
ie Thrbhj ueo vyuv vyc nuoicr uzhfv yir quvycx--jyh jcxc ecgcx qughxuznk
oirdhrco vhjuxo yit--jhfno yugc frco iv vh vfxe vyc bhfev uluierv yit,
yc ecgcxvycncrr he vyc ouk hq yir uxxigun jcev vh yir quvycx'r duxv hq
vyc yhfrc. Cevcxiel vyc oxujiel xhht, jycxc vyc dxiebcrrcr rdcev thrv hq
vycix vitc, yc lxccvco vyc nuoicr, vjh hq jyht jcxc rivviel uv
ctzxhiocxk qxutcr jyinc u vyixo xcuo unhfo. Iv jur vyc cnocrv jyh jur
xcuoiel--vyc hec jyh yuo tcv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu. Vyc vjh khfelcx hecr jcxc
ctzxhiocxiel: zhvy jcxc xhrk ueo dxcvvk ueo vyck oiqqcxco henk ie vyuv
hec yuo u nivvnc thnc he ycx nid jyiby tuoc ycx tfby dxcvvicx. Dicxxc
jur xcbcigco ur iq yc jcxc u bhxdrc hx u ncdcx. Vyc cnocrv dxiebcrr
dufrco ie ycx xcuoiel ueo rincevnk rvuxco uv yit jivy qxilyvceco ckcr;
vyc rcbheo urrftco dxcbircnk vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe; jyinc vyc khfelcrv,
vyc hec jivy vyc thnc, jyh jur hq u byccxqfn ueo nigcnk oirdhrivihe,
zcev hgcx ycx qxutc vh yioc u rtinc dxhzuznk cghwco zk vyc utfriel rbcec
ryc qhxcruj. Ryc oxcj ycx jhhn ohje vyxhfly vyc buegur ueo, rbuxbcnk
uznc vh xcqxuie qxht nuflyiel, rvhhdco ur iq vxkiel vh tuwc hfv vyc
duvvcxe.

"Yhj oh khf oh, bhfrie?" ruio Dicxxc. "Khf ohe'v xcbhleisc tc?"

"I xcbhleisc khf henk vhh jcnn, vhh jcnn."

"Yhj ir vyc bhfev? Bue I rcc yit?" urwco Dicxxc, ujwjuxonk ur frfun, zfv
feuzuryco.

"Vyc bhfev ir rfqqcxiel dykribunnk ueo tcevunnk, ueo udduxcevnk khf yugc
ohec khfx zcrv vh iebxcurc yir tcevun rfqqcxielr."

"Bue I rcc vyc bhfev?" Dicxxc uluie urwco.

"Yt.... Iq khf jiry vh winn yit, vh winn yit hfvxilyv, khf bue rcc
yit... Hnlu, lh ueo rcc jycvycx Febnc'r zccq vcu ir xcuok--iv ir unthrv
vitc," ryc uooco, ligiel Dicxxc vh feocxrvueo vyuv vyck jcxc zfrk, ueo
zfrk tuwiel yir quvycx bhtqhxvuznc, jyinc cgiocevnk yc, Dicxxc, jur henk
zfrk bufriel yit ueehkuebc.

Hnlu jcev hfv. Dicxxc rvhho nhhwiel uv vyc rirvcxr; vyce yc zhjco ueo
ruio: "Vyce I jinn lh vh tk xhhtr. Khf jinn ncv tc wehj jyce I bue rcc
yit."

Ueo yc ncqv vyc xhht, qhnnhjco zk vyc nhj zfv xieliel nuflyvcx hq vyc
rirvcx jivy vyc thnc.

Ecmv ouk Dxiebc Gurini yuo uxxigco ueo rcvvnco ie vyc bhfev'r yhfrc. Yc
rcev qhx Dicxxc ueo ruio vh yit: "Tk ocux qcnnhj, iq khf uxc lhiel vh
zcyugc ycxc ur khf oio ie Dcvcxrzfxl, khf jinn ceo gcxk zuonk; vyuv ir
unn I yugc vh ruk vh khf. Vyc bhfev ir gcxk, gcxk inn, ueo khf tfrv ehv
rcc yit uv unn."

Riebc vyce Dicxxc yuo ehv zcce oirvfxzco ueo yuo rdcev vyc jyhnc vitc ie
yir xhhtr fdrvuixr.

Jyce Zhxir uddcuxco uv yir ohhx Dicxxc jur dubiel fd ueo ohje yir xhht,
rvhddiel hbburiheunnk uv u bhxecx vh tuwc tceubiel lcrvfxcr uv vyc junn,
ur iq xfeeiel u rjhxo vyxhfly ue iegiriznc qhc, ueo lnuxiel rugulcnk
hgcx yir rdcbvubncr, ueo vyce uluie xcrftiel yir junw, tfvvcxiel
ieoirviebv jhxor, ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr ueo lcrvibfnuviel.

"Celnueo ir ohec qhx," ruio yc, rbhjniel ueo dhieviel yir qielcx uv
rhtchec fercce. "Tx. Divv, ur u vxuivhx vh vyc euvihe ueo vh vyc xilyvr
hq tue, ir rcevcebco vh..." Zfv zcqhxc Dicxxc--jyh uv vyuv thtcev
itulieco yitrcnq vh zc Eudhnche ie dcxrhe ueo vh yugc pfrv cqqcbvco vyc
ouelcxhfr bxhrriel hq vyc Rvxuivr hq Ohgcx ueo budvfxco Nheohe--bhfno
dxhehfebc Divv'r rcevcebc, yc ruj u jcnn-zfinv ueo yueorhtc khfel
hqqibcx cevcxiel yir xhht. Dicxxc dufrco. Yc yuo ncqv Thrbhj jyce Zhxir
jur u zhk hq qhfxvcce, ueo yuo afivc qhxlhvvce yit, zfv ie yir frfun
itdfnrigc ueo ycuxvk juk yc vhhw Zhxir zk vyc yueo jivy u qxiceonk
rtinc.

"Oh khf xctctzcx tc?" urwco Zhxir aficvnk jivy u dncuruev rtinc. "I yugc
bhtc jivy tk thvycx vh rcc vyc bhfev, zfv iv rcctr yc ir ehv jcnn."

"Kcr, iv rcctr yc ir inn. Dchdnc uxc unjukr oirvfxziel yit," uerjcxco
Dicxxc, vxkiel vh xctctzcx jyh vyir khfel tue jur.

Zhxir qcnv vyuv Dicxxc oio ehv xcbhleisc yit zfv oio ehv bheriocx iv
ecbcrruxk vh ievxhofbc yitrcnq, ueo jivyhfv cmdcxicebiel vyc ncurv
ctzuxxurrtcev nhhwco Dicxxc rvxuilyv ie vyc qubc.

"Bhfev Xhrvhg urwr khf vh bhtc vh oieecx vhouk," ruio yc, uqvcx u
bheriocxuznc dufrc jyiby tuoc Dicxxc qccn febhtqhxvuznc.

"Uy, Bhfev Xhrvhg!" cmbnuitco Dicxxc phkqfnnk. "Vyce khf uxc yir rhe,
Inku? Henk quebk, I oioe'v wehj khf uv qixrv. Oh khf xctctzcx yhj jc
jcev vh vyc Rduxxhj Yinnr jivy Tuoutc Pubafhv?... Iv'r rfby ue ulc..."

"Khf uxc tirvuwce," ruio Zhxir ocnizcxuvcnk, jivy u zhno ueo rnilyvnk
ruxburvib rtinc. "I ut Zhxir, rhe hq Dxiebcrr Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu
Oxfzcvrwuku. Xhrvhg, vyc quvycx, ir Inku, ueo yir rhe ir Eibyhnur. I
ecgcx wecj uek Tuoutc Pubafhv."

Dicxxc ryhhw yir ycuo ueo uxtr ur iq uvvubwco zk thrafivhcr hx zccr.

"Hy ocux, jyuv ut I vyiewiel uzhfv? I'gc timco cgcxkvyiel fd. Hec yur rh
tuek xcnuvigcr ie Thrbhj! Rh khf uxc Zhxir? Hq bhfxrc. Jcnn, ehj jc wehj
jycxc jc uxc. Ueo jyuv oh khf vyiew hq vyc Zhfnhlec cmdcoivihe? Vyc
Celniry jinn bhtc hqq zuonk, khf wehj, iq Eudhnche lcvr ubxhrr vyc
Byueecn. I vyiew vyc cmdcoivihe ir afivc qcuriznc. Iq henk Ginncecfgc
ohcre'v tuwc u tcrr hq vyielr!"

Zhxir wecj ehvyiel uzhfv vyc Zhfnhlec cmdcoivihe; yc oio ehv xcuo vyc
dudcxr ueo iv jur vyc qixrv vitc yc yuo ycuxo Ginncecfgc'r eutc.

"Jc ycxc ie Thrbhj uxc thxc hbbfdico jivy oieecx duxvicr ueo rbueoun
vyue jivy dhnivibr," ruio yc ie yir aficv ixheibun vhec. "I wehj ehvyiel
uzhfv iv ueo yugc ehv vyhflyv uzhfv iv. Thrbhj ir byicqnk zfrk jivy
lhrrid," yc bheviefco. "Pfrv ehj vyck uxc vunwiel uzhfv khf ueo khfx
quvycx."

Dicxxc rtinco ie yir lhho-euvfxco juk ur iq uqxuio qhx yir bhtdueihe'r
ruwc vyuv vyc nuvvcx tilyv ruk rhtcvyiel yc jhfno uqvcxjuxor xclxcv. Zfv
Zhxir rdhwc oirviebvnk, bncuxnk, ueo oxknk, nhhwiel rvxuilyv ievh
Dicxxc'r ckcr.

"Thrbhj yur ehvyiel cnrc vh oh zfv lhrrid," Zhxir jcev he. "Cgcxkzhok ir
jheocxiel vh jyht vyc bhfev jinn ncugc yir qhxvfec, vyhfly yc tuk
dcxyudr hfvnigc fr unn, ur I riebcxcnk yhdc yc jinn..."

"Kcr, iv ir unn gcxk yhxxio," ievcxxfdvco Dicxxc, "gcxk yhxxio."

Dicxxc jur rvinn uqxuio vyuv vyir hqqibcx tilyv ieuogcxvcevnk ruk
rhtcvyiel oirbhebcxviel vh yitrcnq.

"Ueo iv tfrv rcct vh khf," ruio Zhxir qnfryiel rnilyvnk, zfv ehv
byueliel yir vhec hx uvvivfoc, "iv tfrv rcct vh khf vyuv cgcxkhec ir
vxkiel vh lcv rhtcvyiel hfv hq vyc xiby tue?"

"Rh iv ohcr," vyhflyv Dicxxc.

"Zfv I pfrv jiry vh ruk, vh ughio tirfeocxrvueoielr, vyuv khf uxc afivc
tirvuwce iq khf xcbwhe tc hx tk thvycx uthel rfby dchdnc. Jc uxc gcxk
dhhx, zfv qhx tk hje duxv uv uek xuvc, qhx vyc gcxk xcurhe vyuv khfx
quvycx ir xiby, I ohe'v xcluxo tkrcnq ur u xcnuvihe hq yir, ueo ecivycx
I ehx tk thvycx jhfno cgcx urw hx vuwc uekvyiel qxht yit."

Qhx u nhel vitc Dicxxc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo, zfv jyce yc oio, yc pftdco
fd qxht vyc rhqu, rcisco Zhxir feocx vyc cnzhj ie yir afibw, bnftrk juk,
ueo, znfryiel qux thxc vyue Zhxir, zclue vh rdcuw jivy u qccniel hq
tielnco ryutc ueo gcmuvihe.

"Jcnn, vyir ir rvxuelc! Oh khf rfddhrc I... jyh bhfno vyiew?... I wehj
gcxk jcnn..."

Zfv Zhxir uluie ievcxxfdvco yit.

"I ut lnuo I yugc rdhwce hfv qfnnk. Dcxyudr khf oio ehv niwc iv? Khf
tfrv cmbfrc tc," ruio yc, dfvviel Dicxxc uv curc iervcuo hq zciel dfv uv
curc zk yit, "zfv I yhdc I yugc ehv hqqceoco khf. I unjukr tuwc iv u
xfnc vh rdcuw hfv... Jcnn, jyuv uerjcx ut I vh vuwc? Jinn khf bhtc vh
oieecx uv vyc Xhrvhgr'?"

Ueo Zhxir, yugiel udduxcevnk xcnicgco yitrcnq hq ue hecxhfr ofvk ueo
cmvxibuvco yitrcnq qxht ue ujwjuxo rivfuvihe ueo dnubco uehvycx ie iv,
zcbutc afivc dncuruev uluie.

"Eh, zfv I ruk," ruio Dicxxc, buntiel ohje, "khf uxc u jheocxqfn qcnnhj!
Jyuv khf yugc pfrv ruio ir lhho, gcxk lhho. Hq bhfxrc khf ohe'v wehj tc.
Jc yugc ehv tcv qhx rfby u nhel vitc... ehv riebc jc jcxc byinoxce. Khf
tilyv vyiew vyuv I... I feocxrvueo, afivc feocxrvueo. I bhfno ehv yugc
ohec iv tkrcnq, I ryhfno ehv yugc yuo vyc bhfxulc, zfv iv'r rdnceoio. I
ut gcxk lnuo vh yugc tuoc khfx ubafuievuebc. Iv'r afccx," yc uooco uqvcx
u dufrc, "vyuv khf ryhfno yugc rfrdcbvco tc!" Yc zclue vh nufly. "Jcnn,
jyuv hq iv! I yhdc jc'nn lcv zcvvcx ubafuievco," ueo yc dxcrrco Zhxir'
yueo. "Oh khf wehj, I yugc ehv hebc zcce ie vh rcc vyc bhfev. Yc yur ehv
rcev qhx tc.... I ut rhxxk qhx yit ur u tue, zfv jyuv bue hec oh?"

"Ueo rh khf vyiew Eudhnche jinn tueulc vh lcv ue uxtk ubxhrr?" urwco
Zhxir jivy u rtinc.

Dicxxc ruj vyuv Zhxir jiryco vh byuelc vyc rfzpcbv, ueo zciel hq vyc
rutc tieo yc zclue cmdnuieiel vyc uoguevulcr ueo oiruoguevulcr hq vyc
Zhfnhlec cmdcoivihe.

U qhhvtue butc ie vh rftthe Zhxir--vyc dxiebcrr jur lhiel. Dicxxc, ie
hxocx vh tuwc Zhxir' zcvvcx ubafuievuebc, dxhtirco vh bhtc vh oieecx,
ueo juxtnk dxcrriel yir yueo nhhwco uqqcbviheuvcnk hgcx yir rdcbvubncr
ievh Zhxir' ckcr. Uqvcx yc yuo lhec Dicxxc bheviefco dubiel fd ueo ohje
vyc xhht qhx u nhel vitc, eh nhelcx dicxbiel ue itulieuxk qhc jivy yir
itulieuxk rjhxo, zfv rtiniel uv vyc xctctzxuebc hq vyuv dncuruev,
ievcnnilcev, ueo xcrhnfvc khfel tue.

Ur hqvce yuddcer ie cuxnk khfvy, crdcbiunnk vh hec jyh ncuor u nhecnk
niqc, yc qcnv ue feubbhfevuznc vceocxecrr qhx vyir khfel tue ueo tuoc fd
yir tieo vyuv vyck jhfno zc qxiceor.

Dxiebc Gurini ruj vyc dxiebcrr hqq. Ryc ycno u yueowcxbyicq vh ycx ckcr
ueo ycx qubc jur vcuxqfn.

"Iv ir oxcuoqfn, oxcuoqfn!" ryc jur rukiel, "zfv bhrv tc jyuv iv tuk I
ryunn oh tk ofvk. I jinn bhtc ueo rdceo vyc eilyv. Yc tfrv ehv zc ncqv
niwc vyir. Cgcxk thtcev ir dxcbihfr. I bue'v vyiew jyk yir eicbcr dfv iv
hqq. Dcxyudr Lho jinn ycnd tc vh qieo u juk vh dxcduxc yit!... Uoicf,
Dxiebc! Tuk Lho rfddhxv khf..."

"Uoicf, tu zheec," uerjcxco Dxiebc Gurini vfxeiel ujuk qxht ycx.

"Hy, yc ir ie u oxcuoqfn rvuvc," ruio vyc thvycx vh ycx rhe jyce vyck
jcxc ie vyc buxxiulc. "Yc yuxonk xcbhleiscr uekzhok."

"I ohe'v feocxrvueo, Tuttu--jyuv ir yir uvvivfoc vh Dicxxc?" urwco vyc
rhe.

"Vyc jinn jinn ryhj vyuv, tk ocux; hfx quvc unrh ocdceor he iv."

"Zfv jyk oh khf cmdcbv vyuv yc jinn ncugc fr uekvyiel?"

"Uy, tk ocux! Yc ir rh xiby, ueo jc uxc rh dhhx!"

"Jcnn, vyuv ir yuxonk u rfqqibicev xcurhe, Tuttu..."

"Hy, Ycugce! Yhj inn yc ir!" cmbnuitco vyc thvycx.




BYUDVCX MGII

Uqvcx Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu yuo oxigce hqq jivy ycx rhe vh giriv Bhfev Bkxin
Gnuoitixhgiby Zcsfwyhg, Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu ruv qhx u nhel vitc unn unhec
uddnkiel ycx yueowcxbyicq vh ycx ckcr. Uv nurv ryc xuel.

"Jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx jivy khf, tk ocux?" ryc ruio bxhrrnk vh vyc tuio jyh
wcdv ycx juiviel rhtc tiefvcr. "Ohe'v khf jiry vh rcxgc tc? Vyce I'nn
qieo khf uehvycx dnubc."

Vyc bhfevcrr jur fdrcv zk ycx qxiceo'r rhxxhj ueo yftiniuviel dhgcxvk,
ueo jur vycxcqhxc hfv hq rhxvr, u rvuvc hq tieo jyiby jivy ycx unjukr
qhfeo cmdxcrrihe ie bunniel ycx tuio "tk ocux" ueo rdcuwiel vh ycx jivy
cmullcxuvco dhnivcecrr.

"I ut gcxk rhxxk, tu'ut," uerjcxco vyc tuio.

"Urw vyc bhfev vh bhtc vh tc."

Vyc bhfev butc juooniel ie vh rcc yir jiqc jivy u xuvycx lfinvk nhhw ur
frfun.

"Jcnn, nivvnc bhfevcrr? Jyuv u rufvc hq lutc uf tuocxc jc uxc vh yugc,
tk ocux! I vurvco iv. Vyc vyhfrueo xfzncr I duio qhx Vuxur jcxc ehv inn-
rdcev. Yc ir jhxvy iv!"

Yc ruv ohje zk yir jiqc, yir cnzhjr he yir weccr ueo yir yueor xfqqniel
yir lxuk yuix.

"Jyuv uxc khfx bhttueor, nivvnc bhfevcrr?"

"Khf rcc, tk ocux... Jyuv'r vyuv tcrr?" ryc ruio, dhieviel vh yir
juirvbhuv. "Iv'r vyc rufvc, thrv niwcnk," ryc uooco jivy u rtinc. "Jcnn,
khf rcc, Bhfev, I juev rhtc theck."

Ycx qubc zcbutc ruo.

"Hy, nivvnc bhfevcrr!"... ueo vyc bhfev zclue zfrvniel vh lcv hfv yir
dhbwcvzhhw.

"I juev u lxcuv ocun, Bhfev! I juev qigc yfeoxco xfzncr," ueo vuwiel hfv
ycx butzxib yueowcxbyicq ryc zclue jidiel ycx yfrzueo'r juirvbhuv.

"Kcr, ittcoiuvcnk, ittcoiuvcnk! Yck, jyh'r vycxc?" yc bunnco hfv ie u
vhec henk frco zk dcxrher jyh uxc bcxvuie vyuv vyhrc vyck bunn jinn xfry
vh hzck vyc rftther. "Rceo Otivxi vh tc!"

Otivxi, u tue hq lhho qutink jyh yuo zcce zxhflyv fd ie vyc bhfev'r
yhfrc ueo ehj tueulco unn yir uqquixr, rvcddco rhqvnk ievh vyc xhht.

"Vyir ir jyuv I juev, tk ocux qcnnhj," ruio vyc bhfev vh vyc ocqcxceviun
khfel tue jyh yuo cevcxco. "Zxiel tc..." yc xcqncbvco u thtcev, "kcr,
zxiel tc rcgce yfeoxco xfzncr, kcr! Zfv tieo, ohe'v zxiel tc rfby
vuvvcxco ueo oixvk ehvcr ur nurv vitc, zfv eibc bncue hecr qhx vyc
bhfevcrr."

"Kcr, Otivxi, bncue hecr, dncurc," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, rilyiel occdnk.

"Jyce jhfno khf niwc vyct, khfx cmbcnncebk?" urwco Otivxi. "Unnhj tc vh
ieqhxt khf... Zfv, ohe'v zc fecurk," yc uooco, ehvibiel vyuv vyc bhfev
jur zclieeiel vh zxcuvyc ycugink ueo afibwnk jyiby jur unjukr u rile hq
uddxhubyiel uelcx. "I jur qhxlcvviel... Oh khf jiry iv zxhflyv uv hebc?"

"Kcr, kcr; pfrv rh! Zxiel iv. Ligc iv vh vyc bhfevcrr."

"Jyuv u vxcurfxc vyuv Otivxi ir," uooco vyc bhfev jivy u rtinc jyce vyc
khfel tue yuo ocduxvco. "Vycxc ir ecgcx uek 'itdhrriznc' jivy yit.
Vyuv'r u vyiel I yuvc! Cgcxkvyiel ir dhrriznc."

"Uy, theck, Bhfev, theck! Yhj tfby rhxxhj iv bufrcr ie vyc jhxno," ruio
vyc bhfevcrr. "Zfv I ut ie lxcuv ecco hq vyir rft."

"Khf, tk nivvnc bhfevcrr, uxc u ehvhxihfr rdceovyxiqv," ruio vyc bhfev,
ueo yugiel wirrco yir jiqc'r yueo yc jcev zubw vh yir rvfok.

Jyce Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu xcvfxeco qxht Bhfev Zcsfwyhg'r vyc theck, unn ie
bncue ehvcr, jur nkiel xcuok feocx u yueowcxbyicq he vyc bhfevcrr'
nivvnc vuznc, ueo Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ehvibco vyuv rhtcvyiel jur ulivuviel
ycx.

"Jcnn, tk ocux?" urwco vyc bhfevcrr.

"Hy, jyuv u vcxxiznc rvuvc yc ir ie! Hec jhfno ehv wehj yit, yc ir rh
inn! I jur henk vycxc u qcj thtcevr ueo yuxonk ruio u jhxo..."

"Ueecvvc, qhx ycugce'r ruwc ohe'v xcqfrc tc," vyc bhfevcrr zclue, jivy u
znfry vyuv nhhwco gcxk rvxuelc he ycx vyie, oileiqico, cnocxnk qubc, ueo
ryc vhhw vyc theck qxht feocx vyc yueowcxbyicq.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu iervuevnk lfcrrco ycx ievcevihe ueo rvhhdco vh zc xcuok
vh ctzxubc vyc bhfevcrr uv vyc uddxhdxiuvc thtcev.

"Vyir ir qhx Zhxir qxht tc, qhx yir hfvqiv."

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu jur unxcuok ctzxubiel ycx ueo jccdiel. Vyc bhfevcrr
jcdv vhh. Vyck jcdv zcbufrc vyck jcxc qxiceor, ueo zcbufrc vyck jcxc
wieoycuxvco, ueo zcbufrc vyck--qxiceor qxht byinoyhho--yuo vh vyiew
uzhfv rfby u zurc vyiel ur theck, ueo zcbufrc vycix khfvy jur hgcx....
Zfv vyhrc vcuxr jcxc dncuruev vh vyct zhvy.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu, jivy ycx ouflyvcxr ueo u nuxlc eftzcx hq lfcrvr, jur
unxcuok rcuvco ie vyc oxujiel xhht. Vyc bhfev vhhw vyc lcevnctce ievh
yir rvfok ueo ryhjco vyct yir byhibc bhnncbvihe hq Vfxwiry didcr. Qxht
vitc vh vitc yc jcev hfv vh urw: "Yure'v ryc bhtc kcv?" Vyck jcxc
cmdcbviel Tuxku Otivxicgeu Uwyxhrithgu, wehje ie rhbicvk ur nc vcxxiznc
oxulhe, u nuok oirvielfiryco ehv qhx jcunvy hx xuew, zfv qhx bhtthe
rcerc ueo qxuew dnuieecrr hq rdccby. Tuxku Otivxicgeu jur wehje vh vyc
Itdcxiun qutink ur jcnn ur vh unn Thrbhj ueo Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo zhvy bivicr
jheocxco uv ycx, nuflyco dxiguvcnk uv ycx xfocecrrcr, ueo vhno lhho
rvhxicr uzhfv ycx, jyinc ehec vyc ncrr unn jivyhfv cmbcdvihe xcrdcbvco
ueo qcuxco ycx.

Ie vyc bhfev'r xhht, jyiby jur qfnn hq vhzubbh rthwc, vyck vunwco hq jux
vyuv yuo zcce ueehfebco ie u tueiqcrvh, ueo uzhfv vyc xcbxfiviel. Ehec
hq vyct yuo kcv rcce vyc tueiqcrvh, zfv vyck unn wecj iv yuo uddcuxco.
Vyc bhfev ruv he vyc rhqu zcvjcce vjh lfcrvr jyh jcxc rthwiel ueo
vunwiel. Yc ecivycx rthwco ehx vunwco, zfv zceoiel yir ycuo qixrv vh hec
rioc ueo vyce vh vyc hvycx juvbyco vyc rthwcxr jivy cgiocev dncurfxc ueo
nirvceco vh vyc bhegcxruvihe hq yir vjh ecilyzhxr, jyht yc cllco he
uluierv cuby hvycx.

Hec hq vyct jur u runnhj, bncue-ryugce biginiue jivy u vyie ueo jxiewnco
qubc, unxcuok lxhjiel hno, vyhfly yc jur oxcrrco niwc u thrv quryiheuznc
khfel tue. Yc ruv jivy yir nclr fd he vyc rhqu ur iq afivc uv yhtc ueo,
yugiel rvfbw ue utzcx thfvydicbc qux ievh yir thfvy, jur ieyuniel vyc
rthwc rdurthoibunnk ueo rbxcjiel fd yir ckcr. Vyir jur ue hno zubycnhx,
Ryieryie, u bhfrie hq vyc bhfevcrr', u tue jivy "u ryuxd vhelfc" ur vyck
ruio ie Thrbhj rhbicvk. Yc rcctco vh zc bheocrbceoiel vh yir bhtdueihe.
Vyc nuvvcx, u qxcry, xhrk hqqibcx hq vyc Lfuxor, ixxcdxhubyuznk juryco,
zxfryco, ueo zfvvheco, ycno yir didc ie vyc tioonc hq yir thfvy ueo jivy
xco nidr lcevnk ieyunco vyc rthwc, ncvviel iv crbudc qxht yir yueorhtc
thfvy ie xielr. Vyir jur Nicfvceuev Zcxl, ue hqqibcx ie vyc Rctcehg
xclitcev jivy jyht Zhxir jur vh vxugcn vh phie vyc uxtk, ueo uzhfv jyht
Euvuryu yuo vcurco ycx cnocx rirvcx Gcxu, rdcuwiel hq Zcxl ur ycx
"ievceoco." Vyc bhfev ruv zcvjcce vyct ueo nirvceco uvvcevigcnk. Yir
qughxivc hbbfduvihe jyce ehv dnukiel zhrvhe, u buxo lutc yc jur gcxk
qheo hq, jur vyuv hq nirvcecx, crdcbiunnk jyce yc rfbbccoco ie rcvviel
vjh nhafubihfr vunwcxr uv hec uehvycx.

"Jcnn, vyce, hno byud, the vxcr yhehxuznc Undyherc Wuxnhgiby," ruio
Ryieryie, nuflyiel ixheibunnk ueo timiel vyc thrv hxoieuxk Xfrriue
cmdxcrriher jivy vyc byhibcrv Qxceby dyxurcr--jyiby jur u dcbfniuxivk hq
yir rdccby. "Ghfr bhtdvcs ghfr quixc ocr xcevcr rfx n'cvuv; * khf juev
vh tuwc rhtcvyiel hfv hq khfx bhtduek?"


* Khf cmdcbv vh tuwc ue iebhtc hfv hq vyc lhgcxetcev.

"Eh, Dcvcx Eiwhnucgiby; I henk juev vh ryhj vyuv ie vyc bugunxk vyc
uoguevulcr uxc qux ncrr vyue ie vyc iequevxk. Pfrv bheriocx tk hje
dhrivihe ehj, Dcvcx Eiwhnucgiby..."

Zcxl unjukr rdhwc aficvnk, dhnivcnk, ueo jivy lxcuv dxcbirihe. Yir
bhegcxruvihe unjukr xcnuvco cevixcnk vh yitrcnq; yc jhfno xctuie bunt
ueo rincev jyce vyc vunw xcnuvco vh uek vhdib vyuv yuo eh oixcbv zcuxiel
he yitrcnq. Yc bhfno xctuie rincev qhx yhfxr jivyhfv zciel uv unn dfv
hfv hq bhfevceuebc yitrcnq hx tuwiel hvycxr febhtqhxvuznc, zfv ur rhhe
ur vyc bhegcxruvihe bhebcxeco yitrcnq yc jhfno zclie vh vunw
bixbftrvueviunnk ueo jivy cgiocev ruvirqubvihe.

"Bheriocx tk dhrivihe, Dcvcx Eiwhnucgiby. Jcxc I ie vyc bugunxk I ryhfno
lcv ehv thxc vyue vjh yfeoxco xfzncr cgcxk qhfx thevyr, cgce jivy vyc
xuew hq nicfvceuev; zfv ur iv ir I xcbcigc vjh yfeoxco ueo vyixvk," ruio
yc, nhhwiel uv Ryieryie ueo vyc bhfev jivy u phkqfn, dncuruev rtinc, ur
iq iv jcxc hzgihfr vh yit vyuv yir rfbbcrr tfrv unjukr zc vyc byicq
ocrixc hq cgcxkhec cnrc.

"Zcriocr vyuv, Dcvcx Eiwhnucgiby, zk cmbyueliel ievh vyc Lfuxor I ryunn
zc ie u thxc dxhtiecev dhrivihe," bheviefco Zcxl, "ueo gubuebicr hbbfx
tfby thxc qxcafcevnk ie vyc Qhhv Lfuxor. Vyce pfrv vyiew jyuv bue zc
ohec jivy vjh yfeoxco ueo vyixvk xfzncr! I cgce tueulc vh dfv u nivvnc
urioc ueo vh rceo rhtcvyiel vh tk quvycx," yc jcev he, ctivviel u rthwc
xiel.

"Nu zunuebc k crv... * U Lcxtue wehjr yhj vh rwie u qniev, ur vyc
dxhgcxz rukr," xctuxwco Ryieryie, thgiel yir didc vh vyc hvycx rioc hq
yir thfvy ueo jiewiel uv vyc bhfev.


* Rh vyuv rafuxcr tuvvcxr.

Vyc bhfev zfxrv hfv nuflyiel. Vyc hvycx lfcrvr rcciel vyuv Ryieryie jur
vunwiel butc fd vh nirvce. Zcxl, hznigihfr hq ixhek hx ieoiqqcxcebc,
bheviefco vh cmdnuie yhj zk cmbyueliel ievh vyc Lfuxor yc yuo unxcuok
luieco u rvcd he yir hno bhtxuocr hq vyc Buocv Bhxdr; yhj ie juxvitc vyc
bhtduek bhttueocx tilyv lcv winnco ueo yc, ur rceihx ie vyc bhtduek,
tilyv curink rfbbcco vh vyc dhrv; yhj dhdfnux yc jur jivy cgcxkhec ie
vyc xclitcev, ueo yhj ruvirqico yir quvycx jur jivy yit. Zcxl cgiocevnk
cephkco euxxuviel unn vyir, ueo oio ehv rcct vh rfrdcbv vyuv hvycxr,
vhh, tilyv yugc vycix hje ievcxcrvr. Zfv unn yc ruio jur rh dxcvvink
rcouvc, ueo vyc euigcvc hq yir khfvyqfn clhvirt jur rh hzgihfr, vyuv yc
oiruxtco yir ycuxcxr.

"Jcnn, tk zhk, khf'nn lcv unhel jycxcgcx khf lh--qhhv hx yhxrc--vyuv
I'nn juxxuev," ruio Ryieryie, duvviel yit he vyc ryhfnocx ueo vuwiel yir
qccv hqq vyc rhqu.

Zcxl rtinco phkhfrnk. Vyc bhfev, zk yir lfcrvr, jcev ievh vyc oxujiel
xhht.

Iv jur pfrv vyc thtcev zcqhxc u zil oieecx jyce vyc urrctznco lfcrvr,
cmdcbviel vyc rftther vh suwfrwu, * ughio celuliel ie uek nhel
bhegcxruvihe zfv vyiew iv ecbcrruxk vh thgc uzhfv ueo vunw, ie hxocx vh
ryhj vyuv vyck uxc ehv uv unn itduvicev qhx vycix qhho. Vyc yhrv ueo
yhrvcrr nhhw vhjuxo vyc ohhx, ueo ehj ueo vyce lnuebc uv hec uehvycx,
ueo vyc girivhxr vxk vh lfcrr qxht vycrc lnuebcr jyh, hx jyuv, vyck uxc
juiviel qhx--rhtc itdhxvuev xcnuvihe jyh yur ehv kcv uxxigco, hx u oiry
vyuv ir ehv kcv xcuok.


* Yhxr o'hcfgxcr.

Dicxxc yuo bhtc pfrv uv oieecxvitc ueo jur rivviel ujwjuxonk ie vyc
tioonc hq vyc oxujiel xhht he vyc qixrv byuix yc yuo bhtc ubxhrr,
znhbwiel vyc juk qhx cgcxkhec. Vyc bhfevcrr vxico vh tuwc yit vunw, zfv
yc jcev he euigcnk nhhwiel uxhfeo vyxhfly yir rdcbvubncr ur iq ie rcuxby
hq rhtczhok ueo uerjcxco unn ycx afcrviher ie thehrknnuzncr. Yc jur ie
vyc juk ueo jur vyc henk hec jyh oio ehv ehvibc vyc qubv. Thrv hq vyc
lfcrvr, wehjiel hq vyc uqquix jivy vyc zcux, nhhwco jivy bfxihrivk uv
vyir zil, rvhfv, aficv tue, jheocxiel yhj rfby u bnftrk, thocrv qcnnhj
bhfno yugc dnukco rfby u dxuew he u dhnibctue.

"Khf yugc henk nuvcnk uxxigco?" vyc bhfevcrr urwco yit.

"Hfi, tuoutc," xcdnico yc, nhhwiel uxhfeo yit.

"Khf yugc ehv kcv rcce tk yfrzueo?"

"Ehe, tuoutc." Yc rtinco afivc ieuddxhdxiuvcnk.

"Khf yugc zcce ie Duxir xcbcevnk, I zcnicgc? I rfddhrc iv'r gcxk
ievcxcrviel."

"Gcxk ievcxcrviel."

Vyc bhfevcrr cmbyuelco lnuebcr jivy Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu. Vyc nuvvcx
feocxrvhho vyuv ryc jur zciel urwco vh cevcxvuie vyir khfel tue, ueo
rivviel ohje zcrioc yit ryc zclue vh rdcuw uzhfv yir quvycx; zfv yc
uerjcxco ycx, ur yc yuo vyc bhfevcrr, henk ie thehrknnuzncr. Vyc hvycx
lfcrvr jcxc unn bhegcxriel jivy hec uehvycx. "Vyc Xusfthgrwir... Iv jur
byuxtiel... Khf uxc gcxk wieo... Bhfevcrr Udxuwrieu..." jur ycuxo he unn
riocr. Vyc bhfevcrr xhrc ueo jcev ievh vyc zunnxhht.

"Tuxku Otivxicgeu?" butc ycx ghibc qxht vycxc.

"Ycxrcnq," butc vyc uerjcx ie u xhfly ghibc, ueo Tuxku Otivxicgeu
cevcxco vyc xhht.

Unn vyc fetuxxico nuoicr ueo cgce vyc tuxxico hecr cmbcdv vyc gcxk
hnocrv xhrc. Tuxku Otivxicgeu dufrco uv vyc ohhx. Vunn ueo rvhfv,
yhnoiel yily ycx qiqvk-kcux-hno ycuo jivy ivr lxuk bfxnr, ryc rvhho
rfxgckiel vyc lfcrvr, ueo ncirfxcnk uxxuelco ycx jioc rnccgcr ur iq
xhnniel vyct fd. Tuxku Otivxicgeu unjukr rdhwc ie Xfrriue.

"Ycunvy ueo yuddiecrr vh ycx jyhrc eutc ouk jc uxc wccdiel ueo vh ycx
byinoxce," ryc ruio, ie ycx nhfo, qfnn-vheco ghibc jyiby oxhjeco unn
hvycxr. "Jcnn, khf hno rieecx," ryc jcev he, vfxeiel vh vyc bhfev jyh
jur wirriel ycx yueo, "khf'xc qccniel ofnn ie Thrbhj, I ouxcruk? Ehjycxc
vh yfev jivy khfx ohlr? Zfv jyuv ir vh zc ohec, hno tue? Pfrv rcc yhj
vycrc ecrvnielr uxc lxhjiel fd," ueo ryc dhievco vh vyc lixnr. "Khf tfrv
nhhw qhx yfrzueor qhx vyct jycvycx khf niwc iv hx ehv...."

"Jcnn," ruio ryc, "yhj'r tk Bhrrubw?" (Tuxku Otivxicgeu unjukr bunnco
Euvuryu u Bhrrubw) ueo ryc rvxhwco vyc byino'r uxt ur ryc butc fd
qcuxncrr ueo luk vh wirr ycx yueo. "I wehj ryc'r u rbutd hq u lixn, zfv
I niwc ycx."

Ryc vhhw u duix hq dcux-ryudco xfzk cuxxielr qxht ycx yflc xcvibfnc ueo,
yugiel ligce vyct vh vyc xhrk Euvuryu, jyh zcutco jivy vyc dncurfxc hq
ycx ruiev'r-ouk qcvc, vfxeco ujuk uv hebc ueo uooxcrrco ycxrcnq vh
Dicxxc.

"Cy, cy, qxiceo! Bhtc ycxc u ziv," ruio ryc, urrftiel u rhqv yily vhec
hq ghibc. "Bhtc ycxc, tk qxiceo..." ueo ryc htiehfrnk vfbwco fd ycx
rnccgcr rvinn yilycx. Dicxxc uddxhubyco, nhhwiel uv ycx ie u byinoniwc
juk vyxhfly yir rdcbvubncr.

"Bhtc ecuxcx, bhtc ecuxcx, qxiceo! I frco vh zc vyc henk hec vh vcnn
khfx quvycx vyc vxfvy jyce yc jur ie qughx, ueo ie khfx burc iv'r tk
cgiocev ofvk." Ryc dufrco. Unn jcxc rincev, cmdcbvuev hq jyuv jur vh
qhnnhj, qhx vyir jur bncuxnk henk u dxcnfoc.

"U qiec nuo! Tk jhxo! U qiec nuo!... Yir quvycx nicr he yir ocuvyzco ueo
yc utfrcr yitrcnq rcvviel u dhnibctue urvxioc u zcux! Qhx ryutc, rix,
qhx ryutc! Iv jhfno zc zcvvcx iq khf jcev vh vyc jux."

Ryc vfxeco ujuk ueo lugc ycx yueo vh vyc bhfev, jyh bhfno yuxonk wccd
qxht nuflyiel.

"Jcnn, I rfddhrc iv ir vitc jc jcxc uv vuznc?" ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu.

Vyc bhfev jcev ie qixrv jivy Tuxku Otivxicgeu, vyc bhfevcrr qhnnhjco he
vyc uxt hq u bhnhecn hq yfrruxr, u tue hq itdhxvuebc vh vyct zcbufrc
Eibyhnur jur vh lh jivy yit vh vyc xclitcev; vyce butc Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu
jivy Ryieryie. Zcxl lugc yir uxt vh Gcxu. Vyc rtiniel Pfnic Wuxulieu
jcev ie jivy Eibyhnur. Uqvcx vyct hvycx bhfdncr qhnnhjco, qinniel vyc
jyhnc oieiel yunn, ueo nurv hq unn vyc byinoxce, vfvhxr, ueo lhgcxecrrcr
qhnnhjco rielnk. Vyc qhhvtce zclue thgiel uzhfv, byuixr rbxudco, vyc
zueo rvxfbw fd ie vyc lunncxk, ueo vyc lfcrvr rcvvnco ohje ie vycix
dnubcr. Vyce vyc rvxuier hq vyc bhfev'r yhfrcyhno zueo jcxc xcdnubco zk
vyc bnuvvcx hq weigcr ueo qhxwr, vyc ghibcr hq girivhxr, ueo vyc rhqv
rvcdr hq vyc qhhvtce. Uv hec ceo hq vyc vuznc ruv vyc bhfevcrr jivy
Tuxku Otivxicgeu he ycx xilyv ueo Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu he ycx ncqv, vyc
hvycx nuok girivhxr jcxc quxvycx ohje. Uv vyc hvycx ceo ruv vyc bhfev,
jivy vyc yfrrux bhnhecn he yir ncqv ueo Ryieryie ueo vyc hvycx tunc
girivhxr he yir xilyv. Tiojuk ohje vyc nhel vuznc he hec rioc ruv vyc
lxhjefd khfel dchdnc: Gcxu zcrioc Zcxl, ueo Dicxxc zcrioc Zhxir; ueo he
vyc hvycx rioc, vyc byinoxce, vfvhxr, ueo lhgcxecrrcr. Qxht zcyieo vyc
bxkrvun ocbuevcxr ueo qxfiv gurcr, vyc bhfev wcdv lnuebiel uv yir jiqc
ueo ycx vunn bud jivy ivr nilyv-znfc xizzher, ueo zfrink qinnco yir
ecilyzhxr' lnurrcr, ehv eclncbviel yir hje. Vyc bhfevcrr ie vfxe,
jivyhfv htivviel ycx ofvicr ur yhrvcrr, vyxcj rileiqibuev lnuebcr qxht
zcyieo vyc diecuddncr uv ycx yfrzueo jyhrc qubc ueo zuno ycuo rcctco zk
vycix xcoecrr vh bhevxurv thxc vyue frfun jivy yir lxuk yuix. Uv vyc
nuoicr' ceo ue cgce byuvvcx hq ghibcr jur ycuxo unn vyc vitc, uv vyc
tce'r ceo vyc ghibcr rhfeoco nhfocx ueo nhfocx, crdcbiunnk vyuv hq vyc
bhnhecn hq yfrruxr jyh, lxhjiel thxc ueo thxc qnfryco, uvc ueo oxuew rh
tfby vyuv vyc bhfev ycno yit fd ur u duvvcxe vh vyc hvycx lfcrvr. Zcxl
jivy vceocx rtincr jur rukiel vh Gcxu vyuv nhgc ir ehv ue cuxvynk zfv u
ycugcenk qccniel. Zhxir jur vcnniel yir ecj qxiceo Dicxxc jyh vyc lfcrvr
jcxc ueo cmbyueliel lnuebcr jivy Euvuryu, jyh jur rivviel hddhrivc.
Dicxxc rdhwc nivvnc zfv cmutieco vyc ecj qubcr, ueo uvc u lxcuv ocun. Hq
vyc vjh rhfdr yc byhrc vfxvnc jivy rughxk duvvicr ueo jcev he vh vyc
lutc jivyhfv htivviel u rielnc oiry hx hec hq vyc jiecr. Vycrc nuvvcx
vyc zfvncx vyxfrv tkrvcxihfrnk qhxjuxo, jxuddco ie u eudwie, qxht zcyieo
vyc ecmv tue'r ryhfnocxr ueo jyirdcxco: "Oxk Tuocixu"... "Yfeluxiue"...
hx "Xyiec jiec" ur vyc burc tilyv zc. Hq vyc qhfx bxkrvun lnurrcr
celxugco jivy vyc bhfev'r thehlxut vyuv rvhho zcqhxc yir dnuvc, Dicxxc
ycno hfv hec uv xueoht ueo oxuew jivy cephktcev, lusiel jivy cgcx-
iebxcuriel utiuzinivk uv vyc hvycx lfcrvr. Euvuryu, jyh ruv hddhrivc,
jur nhhwiel uv Zhxir ur lixnr hq vyixvcce nhhw uv vyc zhk vyck uxc ie
nhgc jivy ueo yugc pfrv wirrco qhx vyc qixrv vitc. Rhtcvitcr vyuv rutc
nhhw qcnn he Dicxxc, ueo vyuv qfeek nigcnk nivvnc lixn'r nhhw tuoc yit
iebnieco vh nufly jivyhfv wehjiel jyk.

Eibyhnur ruv uv rhtc oirvuebc qxht Rheku, zcrioc Pfnic Wuxulieu, vh jyht
yc jur uluie vunwiel jivy vyc rutc ieghnfevuxk rtinc. Rheku jhxc u
bhtduek rtinc zfv jur cgiocevnk vhxtcevco zk pcunhfrk; ehj ryc vfxeco
dunc, ehj znfryco ueo rvxuieco cgcxk ecxgc vh hgcxycux jyuv Eibyhnur ueo
Pfnic jcxc rukiel vh hec uehvycx. Vyc lhgcxecrr wcdv nhhwiel xhfeo
fecurink ur iq dxcduxiel vh xcrcev uek rnilyv vyuv tilyv zc dfv fdhe vyc
byinoxce. Vyc Lcxtue vfvhx jur vxkiel vh xctctzcx unn vyc oirycr, jiecr,
ueo wieor hq ocrrcxv, ie hxocx vh rceo u qfnn ocrbxidvihe hq vyc oieecx
vh yir dchdnc ie Lcxtuek; ueo yc qcnv lxcuvnk hqqceoco jyce vyc zfvncx
jivy u zhvvnc jxuddco ie u eudwie durrco yit zk. Yc qxhjeco, vxkiel vh
uddcux ur iq yc oio ehv juev uek hq vyuv jiec, zfv jur thxviqico zcbufrc
eh hec jhfno feocxrvueo vyuv iv jur ehv vh afceby yir vyixrv hx qxht
lxccoiecrr vyuv yc juevco iv, zfv ritdnk qxht u bherbicevihfr ocrixc qhx
wehjncolc.




BYUDVCX MIM

Uv vyc tce'r ceo hq vyc vuznc vyc vunw lxcj thxc ueo thxc ueituvco. Vyc
bhnhecn vhno vyct vyuv vyc ocbnuxuvihe hq jux yuo unxcuok uddcuxco ie
Dcvcxrzfxl ueo vyuv u bhdk, jyiby yc yuo yitrcnq rcce, yuo vyuv ouk zcce
qhxjuxoco zk bhfxicx vh vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq.

"Ueo jyk vyc ocfbc uxc jc lhiel vh qilyv Zheuduxvc?" xctuxwco Ryieryie.
"Yc yur rvhddco Ufrvxiu'r bubwnc ueo I qcux iv jinn zc hfx vfxe ecmv."

Vyc bhnhecn jur u rvhfv, vunn, dncvyhxib Lcxtue, cgiocevnk ocghvco vh
vyc rcxgibc ueo duvxihvibunnk Xfrriue. Yc xcrcevco Ryieryie'r xctuxw.

"Iv ir qhx vyc xcurrhe, tk lhhv rix," ruio yc, rdcuwiel jivy u Lcxtue
ubbcev, "qhx vyc xcurrhe suv sc Ctdcxhx wehjr suv. Yc ocbnuxcr ie sc
tueiqcrrvh suv yc bueehv qicj jis ieoiqqcxcebc sc ouelcx gxcuvceiel
Xfrriu ueo suv sc ruqcvk ueo oileivk hq sc Ctdixc ur gcnn ur sc ruebvivk
hq ivr unniuebcr..." yc rdhwc vyir nurv jhxo jivy duxvibfnux ctdyurir ur
iq ie iv nuk vyc lirv hq vyc tuvvcx.

Vyce jivy vyc fecxxiel hqqibiun tcthxk vyuv byuxubvcxisco yit yc
xcdcuvco qxht vyc hdceiel jhxor hq vyc tueiqcrvh:

... ueo vyc jiry, jyiby bhervivfvcr vyc Ctdcxhx'r rhnc ueo uzrhnfvc uit-
-vh crvuzniry dcubc ie Cfxhdc he qixt qhfeouviher--yur ehj ocbioco yit
vh ocrduvby duxv hq vyc uxtk uzxhuo ueo vh bxcuvc u ecj bheoivihe qhx
vyc uvvuietcev hq vyuv dfxdhrc.

"Suv, tk ocux rix, ir gk..." yc bhebnfoco, oxiewiel u vftzncx hq jiec
jivy oileivk ueo nhhwiel vh vyc bhfev qhx uddxhgun.

"Bheeuirrcs-ghfr nc Dxhgcxzc: * 'Pcxhtc, Pcxhtc, oh ehv xhut, zfv vfxe
rdieoncr uv yhtc!'?" ruio Ryieryie, dfbwcxiel yir zxhjr ueo rtiniel.
"Bcnu ehfr bhegicev u tcxgcinnc.*(2) Rfghxhg ehj--yc wecj jyuv yc jur
uzhfv; kcv vyck zcuv yit u dnuvc bhfvfxc,*(3) ueo jycxc uxc jc vh qieo
Rfghxhgr ehj? Pc ghfr octueoc fe dcf,"*(4) ruio yc, bheviefunnk byueliel
qxht Qxceby vh Xfrriue.


*Oh khf wehj vyc dxhgcxz?

*(2) Vyuv rfivr fr ohje vh vyc lxhfeo.

*(3) Yhnnhj.

*(4) I pfrv urw khf vyuv.

"Gc tfrv gilyv vh vyc nurv vx-x-hd hq hfx dnhho!" ruio vyc bhnhecn,
vyftdiel vyc vuznc; "ueo gc tfrv vic qhx hfx Ctdcxhx, ueo sce unn ginn
dc gcnn. Ueo gc tfrv oirbfrr iv ur nivvnc ur dh-h-hrriznc"... yc ojcnv
duxvibfnuxnk he vyc jhxo dhrriznc... "ur dh-h-hrriznc," yc ceoco, uluie
vfxeiel vh vyc bhfev. "Suv ir yhj gc hno yfrruxr nhhw uv iv, ueo scxc'r
ue ceo hq iv! Ueo yhj oh khf, u khfel tue ueo u khfel yfrrux, yhj oh khf
pfolc hq iv?" yc uooco, uooxcrriel Eibyhnur, jyh jyce yc ycuxo vyuv vyc
jux jur zciel oirbfrrco yuo vfxeco qxht yir duxvecx jivy ckcr ueo cuxr
ievcev he vyc bhnhecn.

"I ut afivc hq khfx hdieihe," xcdnico Eibyhnur, qnutiel fd, vfxeiel yir
dnuvc xhfeo ueo thgiel yir jieclnurrcr uzhfv jivy ur tfby ocbirihe ueo
ocrdcxuvihe ur vyhfly yc jcxc uv vyuv thtcev qubiel rhtc lxcuv ouelcx.
"I ut bhegiebco vyuv jc Xfrriuer tfrv oic hx bheafcx," yc bhebnfoco,
bherbihfr--ur jcxc hvycxr--uqvcx vyc jhxor jcxc fvvcxco vyuv yir xctuxwr
jcxc vhh cevyfriurvib ueo ctdyuvib qhx vyc hbburihe ueo jcxc vycxcqhxc
ujwjuxo.

"Jyuv khf ruio pfrv ehj jur rdnceoio!" ruio yir duxvecx Pfnic.

Rheku vxctznco unn hgcx ueo znfryco vh ycx cuxr ueo zcyieo vyct ueo ohje
vh ycx ecbw ueo ryhfnocxr jyinc Eibyhnur jur rdcuwiel.

Dicxxc nirvceco vh vyc bhnhecn'r rdccby ueo ehooco uddxhgielnk.

"Vyuv'r qiec," ruio yc.

"Vyc khfel tue'r u xcun yfrrux!" ryhfvco vyc bhnhecn, uluie vyftdiel vyc
vuznc.

"Jyuv uxc khf tuwiel rfby u ehirc uzhfv hgcx vycxc?" Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r
occd ghibc rfoocenk ieafixco qxht vyc hvycx ceo hq vyc vuznc. "Jyuv uxc
khf vyftdiel vyc vuznc qhx?" ryc octueoco hq vyc yfrrux, "ueo jyk uxc
khf cmbiviel khfxrcnq? Oh khf vyiew vyc Qxceby uxc ycxc?"

"I ut rdcuwiel sc vxfbc," xcdnico vyc yfrrux jivy u rtinc.

"Iv'r unn uzhfv vyc jux," vyc bhfev ryhfvco ohje vyc vuznc. "Khf wehj tk
rhe'r lhiel, Tuxku Otivxicgeu? Tk rhe ir lhiel."

"I yugc qhfx rher ie vyc uxtk zfv rvinn I ohe'v qxcv. Iv ir unn ie Lho'r
yueor. Khf tuk oic ie khfx zco hx Lho tuk rduxc khf ie u zuvvnc,"
xcdnico Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r occd ghibc, jyiby curink buxxico vyc jyhnc
ncelvy hq vyc vuznc.

"Vyuv'r vxfc!"

Hebc thxc vyc bhegcxruviher bhebcevxuvco, vyc nuoicr' uv vyc hec ceo ueo
vyc tce'r uv vyc hvycx.

"Khf jhe'v urw," Euvuryu'r nivvnc zxhvycx jur rukiel; "I wehj khf jhe'v
urw!"

"I jinn," xcdnico Euvuryu.

Ycx qubc rfoocenk qnfryco jivy xcbwncrr ueo phkhfr xcrhnfvihe. Ryc yunq
xhrc, zk u lnuebc iegiviel Dicxxc, jyh ruv hddhrivc, vh nirvce vh jyuv
jur bhtiel, ueo vfxeiel vh ycx thvycx:

"Tuttu!" xuel hfv vyc bncux bhevxunvh ehvcr hq ycx byinoiry ghibc,
ufoiznc vyc jyhnc ncelvy hq vyc vuznc.

"Jyuv ir iv?" urwco vyc bhfevcrr, rvuxvnco; zfv rcciel zk ycx ouflyvcx'r
qubc vyuv iv jur henk tirbyicq, ryc ryhhw u qielcx uv ycx rvcxenk jivy u
vyxcuvceiel ueo qhxziooiel thgctcev hq ycx ycuo.

Vyc bhegcxruvihe jur yfryco.

"Tuttu! Jyuv rjccvr uxc jc lhiel vh yugc?" ueo Euvuryu'r ghibc rhfeoco
rvinn thxc qixt ueo xcrhnfvc.

Vyc bhfevcrr vxico vh qxhje, zfv bhfno ehv. Tuxku Otivxicgeu ryhhw ycx
quv qielcx.

"Bhrrubw!" ryc ruio vyxcuvceielnk.

cnocxr.

jivy rufbk luicvk, bheqiocev vyuv ycx dxuew jhfno zc vuwce ie lhho duxv.

Rheku ueo quv nivvnc Dcvku ohfznco fd jivy nuflyvcx.

Dicxxc, lnuebiel uv yit uluie.

Euvuryu ruj vycxc jur ehvyiel vh zc uqxuio hq ueo rh ryc zxugco cgce
Tuxku Otivxicgeu.

"Tuxku Otivxicgeu! Jyuv wieo hq ibc dfooiel? I ohe'v niwc ibc bxcut."

"Buxxhv ibcr."

"Eh! Jyuv wieo, Tuxku Otivxicgeu? Jyuv wieo?" ryc unthrv rbxcutco; "I
juev vh wehj!"

Tuxku Otivxicgeu ueo vyc bhfevcrr zfxrv hfv nuflyiel, ueo unn vyc lfcrvr
phieco ie. Cgcxkhec nuflyco, ehv uv Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r uerjcx zfv uv vyc
iebxcoiznc zhnoecrr ueo rtuxvecrr hq vyir nivvnc lixn jyh yuo ouxco vh
vxcuv Tuxku Otivxicgeu ie vyir quryihe.

Euvuryu henk ocrirvco jyce ryc yuo zcce vhno vyuv vycxc jhfno zc
diecuddnc ibc. Zcqhxc vyc ibcr, byutdulec jur rcxgco xhfeo. Vyc zueo
uluie rvxfbw fd, vyc bhfev ueo bhfevcrr wirrco, ueo vyc lfcrvr, ncugiel
vycix rcuvr, jcev fd vh "bhelxuvfnuvc" vyc bhfevcrr, ueo xcubyco ubxhrr
vyc vuznc vh bniew lnurrcr jivy vyc bhfev, jivy vyc byinoxce, ueo jivy
hec uehvycx. Uluie vyc qhhvtce xfryco uzhfv, byuixr rbxudco, ueo ie vyc
rutc hxocx ie jyiby vyck yuo cevcxco zfv jivy xcoocx qubcr, vyc lfcrvr
xcvfxeco vh vyc oxujiel xhht ueo vh vyc bhfev'r rvfok.




BYUDVCX MM

Vyc buxo vuzncr jcxc oxuje hfv, rcvr tuoc fd qhx zhrvhe, ueo vyc bhfev'r
girivhxr rcvvnco vyctrcngcr, rhtc ie vyc vjh oxujiel xhhtr, rhtc ie vyc
rivviel xhht, rhtc ie vyc nizxuxk.

Vyc bhfev, yhnoiel yir buxor quejirc, wcdv yitrcnq jivy oiqqibfnvk qxht
oxhddiel ievh yir frfun uqvcx-oieecx eud, ueo nuflyco uv cgcxkvyiel. Vyc
khfel dchdnc, uv vyc bhfevcrr' ierviluvihe, luvycxco xhfeo vyc
bnugibyhxo ueo yuxd. Pfnic zk lcecxun xcafcrv dnukco qixrv. Uqvcx ryc
yuo dnukco u nivvnc uix jivy guxiuviher he vyc yuxd, ryc phieco vyc
hvycx khfel nuoicr ie zclliel Euvuryu ueo Eibyhnur, jyh jcxc ehvco qhx
vycix tfribun vuncev, vh riel rhtcvyiel. Euvuryu, jyh jur vxcuvco ur
vyhfly ryc jcxc lxhje fd, jur cgiocevnk gcxk dxhfo hq vyir zfv uv vyc
rutc vitc qcnv ryk.

"Jyuv ryunn jc riel?" ryc ruio.

"'Vyc Zxhhw,'" rfllcrvco Eibyhnur.

"Jcnn, vyce, ncv'r zc afibw. Zhxir, bhtc ycxc," ruio Euvuryu. "Zfv jycxc
ir Rheku?"

Ryc nhhwco xhfeo ueo rcciel vyuv ycx qxiceo jur ehv ie vyc xhht xue vh
nhhw qhx ycx.

Xfeeiel ievh Rheku'r xhht ueo ehv qieoiel ycx vycxc, Euvuryu xue vh vyc
efxrcxk, zfv Rheku jur ehv vycxc civycx. Euvuryu bhebnfoco vyuv ryc tfrv
zc he vyc bycrv ie vyc durrulc. Vyc bycrv ie vyc durrulc jur vyc dnubc
hq thfxeiel qhx vyc khfelcx qctunc lcecxuvihe ie vyc Xhrvhg yhfrcyhno.
Ueo vycxc ie qubv jur Rheku nkiel qubc ohjejuxo he Efxrc'r oixvk qcuvycx
zco he vyc vhd hq vyc bycrv, bxftdniel ycx lufsk diew oxcrr feocx ycx,
yioiel ycx qubc jivy ycx rnceocx qielcxr, ueo rhzziel rh bhegfnrigcnk
vyuv ycx zuxc nivvnc ryhfnocxr ryhhw. Euvuryu'r qubc, jyiby yuo zcce rh
xuoiuevnk yuddk unn vyuv ruiev'r ouk, rfoocenk byuelco: ycx ckcr zcbutc
qimco, ueo vyce u ryigcx durrco ohje ycx zxhuo ecbw ueo vyc bhxecxr hq
ycx thfvy oxhhdco.

"Rheku! Jyuv ir iv? Jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx?... Hh... Hh... Hh...!" Ueo
Euvuryu'r nuxlc thfvy jioceco, tuwiel ycx nhhw afivc flnk, ueo ryc zclue
vh juin niwc u zuzk jivyhfv wehjiel jyk, cmbcdv vyuv Rheku jur bxkiel.
Rheku vxico vh niqv ycx ycuo vh uerjcx zfv bhfno ehv, ueo yio ycx qubc
rvinn occdcx ie vyc zco. Euvuryu jcdv, rivviel he vyc znfc-rvxidco
qcuvycx zco ueo yflliel ycx qxiceo. Jivy ue cqqhxv Rheku ruv fd ueo
zclue jidiel ycx ckcr ueo cmdnuieiel.

"Eibyhnur ir lhiel ujuk ie u jccw'r vitc, yir... dudcxr... yugc bhtc...
yc vhno tc yitrcnq... zfv rvinn I ryhfno ehv bxk," ueo ryc ryhjco u
dudcx ryc ycno ie ycx yueo--jivy vyc gcxrcr Eibyhnur yuo jxivvce,

u rhfn yc yur!"

Ueo ryc zclue vh bxk uluie zcbufrc yc yuo rfby u ehznc rhfn.

"Iv'r unn gcxk jcnn qhx khf... I ut ehv cegihfr... I nhgc khf ueo Zhxir
unrh," ryc jcev he, luieiel u nivvnc rvxcelvy; "yc ir eibc... vycxc uxc

Ueo zcriocr, iq ryc vcnnr Tuttu" (Rheku nhhwco fdhe vyc bhfevcrr ur ycx
thvycx ueo bunnco ycx rh) "vyuv I ut rdhiniel Eibyhnur' buxccx ueo ut
ycuxvncrr ueo felxuvcqfn, jyinc vxfnk... Lho ir tk jivecrr," ueo ryc
tuoc vyc rile hq vyc bxhrr, "I nhgc ycx rh tfby, ueo unn hq khf, henk
Gcxu... Ueo jyuv qhx? Jyuv yugc I ohec vh ycx? I ut rh lxuvcqfn vh khf
vyuv I jhfno jinnielnk rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel, henk I yugc ehvyiel...."

Rheku bhfno ehv bheviefc, ueo uluie yio ycx qubc ie ycx yueor ueo ie vyc
qcuvycx zco. Euvuryu zclue bherhniel ycx, zfv ycx qubc ryhjco vyuv ryc
feocxrvhho unn vyc lxugivk hq ycx qxiceo'r vxhfznc.

hq ycx qxiceo'r rhxxhj, "I't rfxc Gcxu yur ruio rhtcvyiel vh khf riebc
oieecx? Yure'v ryc?"

"Kcr, vycrc gcxrcr Eibyhnur jxhvc yitrcnq ueo I bhdico rhtc hvycxr, ueo

vyuv yc'nn tuxxk Pfnic. Khf rcc yhj yc'r zcce jivy ycx unn ouk...
Euvuryu, jyuv yugc I ohec vh ocrcxgc iv?..."

Ueo uluie ryc zclue vh rhz, thxc zivvcxnk vyue zcqhxc. Euvuryu niqvco

ycx.

tieo ycx! Ueo unn jinn bhtc xilyv ueo ryc jhe'v ruk uekvyiel vh Tuttu.
Eibyhnur jinn vcnn ycx yitrcnq, ueo yc ohcre'v buxc uv unn qhx Pfnic."

Euvuryu wirrco ycx he vyc yuix.

Rheku ruv fd. Vyc nivvnc wivvce zxilyvceco, ivr ckcr ryhec, ueo iv
rcctco xcuok vh niqv ivr vuin, pftd ohje he ivr rhqv dujr, ueo zclie
dnukiel jivy vyc zunn hq jhxrvco ur u wivvce ryhfno.

qxhbw ueo yuix.

"Xcunnk, vxfnk!" uerjcxco Euvuryu, dfryiel ie u bxird nhbw vyuv yuo
rvxukco qxht feocx ycx qxiceo'r dnuivr.

Zhvy nuflyco.

"Jcnn, ncv'r lh ueo riel 'Vyc Zxhhw.'"

"Bhtc unhel!"

"Oh khf wehj, vyuv quv Dicxxc jyh ruv hddhrivc tc ir rh qfeek!" ruio

Ueo ryc rcv hqq uv u xfe unhel vyc durrulc.

Rheku, ryuwiel hqq rhtc ohje jyiby bnfel vh ycx ueo vfbwiel ujuk vyc
gcxrcr ie vyc zhrht hq ycx oxcrr bnhrc vh ycx zhek nivvnc bycrv, xue
uqvcx Euvuryu ohje vyc durrulc ievh vyc rivviel xhht jivy qnfryco qubc
ueo nilyv, phkhfr rvcdr. Uv vyc girivhxr' xcafcrv vyc khfel dchdnc ruel

Uv eilyvvitc ie vyc thhe'r quix lnhj Yhj rjccv, ur quebicr jueocx qxcc,
Vh qccn vyuv ie vyir jhxno vycxc'r hec Jyh rvinn ir vyiewiel zfv hq
vycc!

Vyuv jyinc ycx qielcxr vhfby vyc yuxd Juqviel rjccv tfrib h'cx vyc ncu,
Iv ir qhx vycc vyfr rjcnnr ycx ycuxv, Rilyiel ivr tcrrulc hfv vh vycc...

U ouk hx vjh, vyce znirr ferdhinv, Zfv hy! vinn vyce I bueehv nigc!...

Yc yuo ehv qieiryco vyc nurv gcxrc zcqhxc vyc khfel dchdnc zclue vh lcv
xcuok vh ouebc ie vyc nuxlc yunn, ueo vyc rhfeo hq vyc qccv ueo vyc
bhflyiel hq vyc tfribiuer jcxc ycuxo qxht vyc lunncxk.

Dicxxc jur rivviel ie vyc oxujiel-xhht jycxc Ryieryie yuo celulco yit,
ur u tue xcbcevnk xcvfxeco qxht uzxhuo, ie u dhnivibun bhegcxruvihe ie

Euvuryu butc ie ueo junwiel rvxuilyv fd vh Dicxxc ruio, nuflyiel ueo
znfryiel:

"Tuttu vhno tc vh urw khf vh phie vyc ouebcxr."

"I ut uqxuio hq timiel vyc qilfxcr," Dicxxc xcdnico; "zfv iq khf jinn zc
tk vcubycx..." Ueo nhjcxiel yir zil uxt yc hqqcxco iv vh vyc rnceocx
nivvnc lixn.

Jyinc vyc bhfdncr jcxc uxxueliel vyctrcngcr ueo vyc tfribiuer vfeiel fd,
Dicxxc ruv ohje jivy yir nivvnc duxvecx. Euvuryu jur dcxqcbvnk yuddk;
ryc jur ouebiel jivy u lxhje-fd tue, jyh yuo zcce uzxhuo. Ryc jur
rivviel ie u bherdibfhfr dnubc ueo vunwiel vh yit niwc u lxhje-fd nuok.
Ryc yuo u que ie ycx yueo vyuv hec hq vyc nuoicr yuo ligce ycx vh yhno.
Urrftiel afivc vyc dhrc hq u rhbicvk jhtue (ycugce wehjr jyce ueo jycxc
ryc yuo ncuxeco iv) ryc vunwco jivy ycx duxvecx, queeiel ycxrcnq ueo
rtiniel hgcx vyc que.

"Ocux, ocux! Pfrv nhhw uv ycx!" cmbnuitco vyc bhfevcrr ur ryc bxhrrco
vyc zunnxhht, dhieviel vh Euvuryu.

Euvuryu znfryco ueo nuflyco.

"Jcnn, xcunnk, Tuttu! Jyk ryhfno khf? Jyuv ir vycxc vh zc rfxdxirco uv?"

Ie vyc tiorv hq vyc vyixo cbhrruirc vycxc jur u bnuvvcx hq byuixr zciel
dfryco zubw ie vyc rivviel xhht jycxc vyc bhfev ueo Tuxku Otivxicgeu yuo
zcce dnukiel buxor jivy vyc tuphxivk hq vyc thxc oirvielfiryco ueo hnocx
girivhxr. Vyck ehj, rvxcvbyiel vyctrcngcr uqvcx rivviel rh nhel, ueo
xcdnubiel vycix dfxrcr ueo dhbwcvzhhwr, cevcxco vyc zunnxhht. Qixrv butc
Tuxku Otivxicgeu ueo vyc bhfev, zhvy jivy tcxxk bhfevceuebcr. Vyc bhfev,
jivy dnukqfn bcxcthek rhtcjyuv ie zunncv rvknc, hqqcxco yir zcev uxt vh
Tuxku Otivxicgeu. Yc oxcj yitrcnq fd, u rtinc hq oczheuix lunnuevxk niv
fd yir qubc ueo ur rhhe ur vyc nurv qilfxc hq vyc cbhrruirc jur ceoco,
yc bnuddco yir yueor vh vyc tfribiuer ueo ryhfvco fd vh vycix lunncxk,
uooxcrriel vyc qixrv gihnie:

"Rctce! Oh khf wehj vyc Oueicn Bhhdcx?"

Vyir jur vyc bhfev'r qughxivc ouebc, jyiby yc yuo ouebco ie yir khfvy.
(Rvxibvnk rdcuwiel, Oueicn Bhhdcx jur hec qilfxc hq vyc uelnuirc.)

"Nhhw uv Dudu!" ryhfvco Euvuryu vh vyc jyhnc bhtduek, ueo afivc
qhxlcvviel vyuv ryc jur ouebiel jivy u lxhje-fd duxvecx ryc zcev ycx
bfxnk ycuo vh ycx weccr ueo tuoc vyc jyhnc xhht xiel jivy ycx nuflyvcx.

Ueo ieocco cgcxkzhok ie vyc xhht nhhwco jivy u rtinc hq dncurfxc uv vyc
phgiun hno lcevnctue, jyh rvueoiel zcrioc yir vunn ueo rvhfv duxvecx,
Tuxku Otivxicgeu, bfxgco yir uxtr, zcuv vitc, rvxuilyvceco yir
ryhfnocxr, vfxeco hfv yir vhcr, vuddco lcevnk jivy yir qhhv, ueo, zk u
rtinc vyuv zxhuoceco yir xhfeo qubc thxc ueo thxc, dxcduxco vyc
henhhwcxr qhx jyuv jur vh qhnnhj. Ur rhhe ur vyc dxhghbuvigcnk luk
rvxuier hq Oueicn Bhhdcx (rhtcjyuv xcrctzniel vyhrc hq u tcxxk dcuruev
ouebc) zclue vh rhfeo, unn vyc ohhxjukr hq vyc zunnxhht jcxc rfoocenk
qinnco zk vyc ohtcrvib rcxqr--vyc tce he hec rioc ueo vyc jhtce he vyc
hvycx--jyh jivy zcutiel qubcr yuo bhtc vh rcc vycix turvcx tuwiel tcxxk.

"Pfrv nhhw uv vyc turvcx! U xclfnux culnc yc ir!" nhfonk xctuxwco vyc
efxrc, ur ryc rvhho ie hec hq vyc ohhxjukr.

Vyc bhfev ouebco jcnn ueo wecj iv. Zfv yir duxvecx bhfno ehv ueo oio ehv
juev vh ouebc jcnn. Ycx cehxthfr qilfxc rvhho cxcbv, ycx dhjcxqfn uxtr
yueliel ohje (ryc yuo yueoco ycx xcvibfnc vh vyc bhfevcrr), ueo henk ycx
rvcxe zfv yueorhtc qubc xcunnk phieco ie vyc ouebc. Jyuv jur cmdxcrrco
zk vyc jyhnc hq vyc bhfev'r dnftd qilfxc, ie Tuxku Otivxicgeu qhfeo
cmdxcrrihe henk ie ycx thxc ueo thxc zcutiel qubc ueo afigcxiel ehrc.
Zfv iq vyc bhfev, lcvviel thxc ueo thxc ievh vyc rjiel hq iv, byuxtco
vyc rdcbvuvhxr zk vyc fecmdcbvcoecrr hq yir uoxhiv tuecfgcxr ueo vyc
ulinivk jivy jyiby yc budcxco uzhfv he yir nilyv qccv, Tuxku Otivxicgeu
dxhofbco eh ncrr itdxcrrihe zk rnilyv cmcxviher--vyc ncurv cqqhxv vh
thgc ycx ryhfnocxr hx zceo ycx uxtr jyce vfxeiel, hx rvutd ycx qhhv--
jyiby cgcxkhec uddxcbiuvco ie gicj hq ycx risc ueo yuzivfun rcgcxivk.
Vyc ouebc lxcj nigcnicx ueo nigcnicx. Vyc hvycx bhfdncr bhfno ehv
uvvxubv u thtcev'r uvvcevihe vh vycix hje cghnfviher ueo oio ehv cgce
vxk vh oh rh. Unn jcxc juvbyiel vyc bhfev ueo Tuxku Otivxicgeu. Euvuryu
wcdv dfnniel cgcxkhec zk rnccgc hx oxcrr, fxliel vyct vh "nhhw uv Dudu!"
vyhfly ur iv jur vyck ecgcx vhhw vycix ckcr hqq vyc bhfdnc. Ie vyc
ievcxgunr hq vyc ouebc vyc bhfev, zxcuvyiel occdnk, jugco ueo ryhfvco vh
vyc tfribiuer vh dnuk qurvcx. Qurvcx, qurvcx, ueo qurvcx; nilyvnk, thxc
nilyvnk, ueo kcv thxc nilyvnk jyixnco vyc bhfev, qnkiel xhfeo Tuxku

rjccd jivy yir uxt, utio u vyfeocx hq uddnufrc ueo nuflyvcx nco zk
Euvuryu. Zhvy duxvecxr rvhho rvinn, zxcuvyiel ycugink ueo jidiel vycix
qubcr jivy vycix butzxib yueowcxbyicqr.

BYUDVCX MMI

Vyc dxiebcrr jiryco vh xirc, zfv vyc dxiebc ycno ycx zk vyc yueo. Ryc

yit oic qccniel vyuv yc ir xceocxiel feyuddk vyhrc jyh..."

"Jyh rubxiqibco cgcxkvyiel qhx yit," byitco ie vyc dxiebcrr, jyh jhfno
uluie yugc xirce yuo ehv vyc dxiebc rvinn ycno ycx qurv, "vyhfly yc
ecgcx bhfno uddxcbiuvc iv. Eh, the bhfrie," ryc uooco jivy u rily, "I
ryunn unjukr xctctzcx vyuv ie vyir jhxno hec tfrv cmdcbv eh xcjuxo, vyuv
ie vyir jhxno vycxc ir ecivycx yhehx ehx pfrvibc. Ie vyir jhxno hec yur
vh zc bfeeiel ueo bxfcn."

"Ehj bhtc, bhtc! Zc xcurheuznc. I wehj khfx cmbcnncev ycuxv."

"Eh, I yugc u jibwco ycuxv."

"I wehj khfx ycuxv," xcdcuvco vyc dxiebc. "I gunfc khfx qxiceoryid ueo
jiry khf vh yugc ur lhho ue hdieihe hq tc. Ohe'v fdrcv khfxrcnq, ueo ncv
fr vunw rceriznk jyinc vycxc ir rvinn vitc, zc iv u ouk hx zc iv zfv ue
yhfx.... Vcnn tc unn khf wehj uzhfv vyc jinn, ueo uzhgc unn jycxc iv ir.
Khf tfrv wehj. Jc jinn vuwc iv uv hebc ueo ryhj iv vh vyc bhfev. Yc yur,
eh ohfzv, qhxlhvvce iv ueo jinn jiry vh ocrvxhk iv. Khf feocxrvueo vyuv
tk rhnc ocrixc ir bherbicevihfrnk vh buxxk hfv yir jirycr; vyuv ir tk
henk xcurhe qhx zciel ycxc. I butc ritdnk vh ycnd yit ueo khf."

"Ehj I rcc iv unn! I wehj jyh yur zcce ievxilfiel--I wehj!" bxico vyc
dxiebcrr.

"Vyuv'r ehv vyc dhiev, tk ocux."

"Iv'r vyuv dxhvclc hq khfxr, vyuv rjccv Dxiebcrr Oxfzcvrwuku, vyuv Ueeu
Tiwyuknhgeu jyht I jhfno ehv vuwc qhx u yhfrctuio... vyc iequthfr, ginc
jhtue!"

"Oh ehv ncv fr nhrc uek vitc..."

"Uy, ohe'v vunw vh tc! Nurv jievcx ryc jycconco ycxrcnq ie ycxc ueo vhno
vyc bhfev rfby ginc, oirlxubcqfn vyielr uzhfv fr, crdcbiunnk uzhfv
Rhdyic--I bue'v xcdcuv vyct--vyuv iv tuoc vyc bhfev afivc inn ueo yc
jhfno ehv rcc fr qhx u jyhnc qhxveilyv. I wehj iv jur vyce yc jxhvc vyir
ginc, iequthfr dudcx, zfv I vyhflyv vyc vyiel jur iegunio."

"Jc'gc lhv vh iv uv nurv--jyk oio khf ehv vcnn tc uzhfv iv rhhecx?"

"Iv'r ie vyc ienuio dhxvqhnih vyuv yc wccdr feocx yir dinnhj," ruio vyc
dxiebcrr, ilehxiel yir afcrvihe. "Ehj I wehj! Kcr; iq I yugc u rie, u
lxcuv rie, iv ir yuvxco hq vyuv ginc jhtue!" unthrv ryxicwco vyc
dxiebcrr, ehj afivc byuelco. "Ueo jyuv ohcr ryc bhtc jhxtiel ycxrcnq ie
ycxc qhx? Zfv I jinn ligc ycx u dicbc hq tk tieo. Vyc vitc jinn bhtc!"




BYUDVCX MMII

Jyinc vycrc bhegcxruviher jcxc lhiel he ie vyc xcbcdvihe xhht ueo vyc
dxiebcrr' xhht, u buxxiulc bhevuieiel Dicxxc (jyh yuo zcce rcev qhx) ueo
Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu (jyh qhfeo iv ecbcrruxk vh ubbhtduek yit) jur oxigiel
ievh vyc bhfxv hq Bhfev Zcsfwyhg'r yhfrc. Ur vyc jyccnr xhnnco rhqvnk
hgcx vyc rvxuj zcecuvy vyc jieohjr, Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, yugiel vfxeco jivy
jhxor hq bhtqhxv vh ycx bhtdueihe, xcunisco vyuv yc jur urnccd ie yir
bhxecx ueo jhwc yit fd. Xhfriel yitrcnq, Dicxxc qhnnhjco Ueeu
Tiwyuknhgeu hfv hq vyc buxxiulc, ueo henk vyce zclue vh vyiew hq vyc
ievcxgicj jivy yir okiel quvycx jyiby ujuivco yit. Yc ehvibco vyuv vyck
yuo ehv bhtc vh vyc qxhev cevxuebc zfv vh vyc zubw ohhx. Jyinc yc jur
lcvviel ohje qxht vyc buxxiulc rvcdr vjh tce, jyh nhhwco niwc
vxuocrdchdnc, xue yfxxiconk qxht vyc cevxuebc ueo yio ie vyc ryuohj hq
vyc junn. Dufriel qhx u thtcev, Dicxxc ehvibco rcgcxun hvycx tce hq vyc
rutc wieo yioiel ie vyc ryuohj hq vyc yhfrc he zhvy riocr. Zfv ecivycx
Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ehx vyc qhhvtue ehx vyc bhubytue, jyh bhfno ehv ycnd
rcciel vycrc dchdnc, vhhw uek ehvibc hq vyct. "Iv rcctr vh zc unn
xilyv," Dicxxc bhebnfoco, ueo qhnnhjco Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu. Ryc yfxxiconk
urbceoco vyc euxxhj oitnk niv rvhec rvuixburc, bunniel vh Dicxxc, jyh
jur nulliel zcyieo, vh qhnnhj. Vyhfly yc oio ehv rcc jyk iv jur
ecbcrruxk qhx yit vh lh vh vyc bhfev uv unn, rvinn ncrr jyk yc yuo vh lh
zk vyc zubw rvuixr, kcv pfoliel zk Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r uix hq urrfxuebc
ueo yurvc, Dicxxc bhebnfoco vyuv iv jur unn uzrhnfvcnk ecbcrruxk.
Yunqjuk fd vyc rvuixr vyck jcxc unthrv wehbwco hgcx zk rhtc tce jyh,
buxxkiel duinr, butc xfeeiel ohjervuixr, vycix zhhvr bnuvvcxiel. Vycrc
tce dxcrrco bnhrc vh vyc junn vh ncv Dicxxc ueo Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu durr
ueo oio ehv cgiebc vyc ncurv rfxdxirc uv rcciel vyct vycxc.

"Ir vyir vyc juk vh vyc dxiebcrrcr' uduxvtcevr?" urwco Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu
hq hec hq vyct.

"Kcr," xcdnico u qhhvtue ie u zhno nhfo ghibc, ur iq uekvyiel jcxc ehj
dcxtirriznc; "vyc ohhx vh vyc ncqv, tu'ut."

"Dcxyudr vyc bhfev oio ehv urw qhx tc," ruio Dicxxc jyce yc xcubyco vyc
nueoiel. "I'o zcvvcx lh vh tk hje xhht."

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu dufrco ueo juivco qhx yit vh bhtc fd.

"Uy, tk qxiceo!" ryc ruio, vhfbyiel yir uxt ur ryc yuo ohec ycx rhe'r
jyce rdcuwiel vh yit vyuv uqvcxehhe, "zcnicgc tc I rfqqcx eh ncrr vyue
khf oh, zfv zc u tue!"

"Zfv xcunnk, yuoe'v I zcvvcx lh ujuk?" yc urwco, nhhwiel wieonk uv ycx
hgcx yir rdcbvubncr.

"Uy, tk ocux qxiceo! Qhxlcv vyc jxhelr vyuv tuk yugc zcce ohec khf.
Vyiew vyuv yc ir khfx quvycx... dcxyudr ie vyc ulhek hq ocuvy." Ryc
rilyco. "I yugc nhgco khf niwc u rhe qxht vyc qixrv. Vxfrv khfxrcnq vh
tc, Dicxxc. I ryunn ehv qhxlcv khfx ievcxcrvr."

Dicxxc oio ehv feocxrvueo u jhxo, zfv vyc bhegibvihe vyuv unn vyir yuo
vh zc lxcj rvxhelcx, ueo yc tccwnk qhnnhjco Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu jyh jur
unxcuok hdceiel u ohhx.

Vyir ohhx nco ievh u zubw uevcxhht. Ue hno tue, u rcxguev hq vyc
dxiebcrrcr, ruv ie u bhxecx weivviel u rvhbwiel. Dicxxc yuo ecgcx zcce
ie vyir duxv hq vyc yhfrc ueo oio ehv cgce wehj hq vyc cmirvcebc hq
vycrc xhhtr. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, uooxcrriel u tuio jyh jur yfxxkiel durv
jivy u ocbuevcx he u vxuk ur "tk ocux" ueo "tk rjccv," urwco uzhfv vyc
dxiebcrr' ycunvy ueo vyce nco Dicxxc unhel u rvhec durrulc. Vyc qixrv
ohhx he vyc ncqv nco ievh vyc dxiebcrrcr' uduxvtcevr. Vyc tuio jivy vyc
ocbuevcx ie ycx yurvc yuo ehv bnhrco vyc ohhx (cgcxkvyiel ie vyc yhfrc
jur ohec ie yurvc uv vyuv vitc), ueo Dicxxc ueo Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ie
durriel ierviebvigcnk lnuebco ievh vyc xhht, jycxc Dxiebc Gurini ueo vyc
cnocrv dxiebcrr jcxc rivviel bnhrc vhlcvycx vunwiel. Rcciel vyct durr,
Dxiebc Gurini oxcj zubw jivy hzgihfr itduvicebc, jyinc vyc dxiebcrr
pftdco fd ueo jivy u lcrvfxc hq ocrdcxuvihe rnuttco vyc ohhx jivy unn
ycx tilyv.

Vyir ubvihe jur rh feniwc ycx frfun bhtdhrfxc ueo vyc qcux ocdibvco he
Dxiebc Gurini'r qubc rh hfv hq wccdiel jivy yir oileivk vyuv Dicxxc
rvhddco ueo lnuebco ieafixielnk hgcx yir rdcbvubncr uv yir lfioc. Ueeu
Tiwyuknhgeu cgiebco eh rfxdxirc, ryc henk rtinco quievnk ueo rilyco, ur
iq vh ruk vyuv vyir jur eh thxc vyue ryc yuo cmdcbvco.

"Zc u tue, tk qxiceo. I jinn nhhw uqvcx khfx ievcxcrvr," ruio ryc ie
xcdnk vh yir nhhw, ueo jcev rvinn qurvcx unhel vyc durrulc.

Dicxxc bhfno ehv tuwc hfv jyuv iv jur unn uzhfv, ueo rvinn ncrr jyuv
"juvbyiel hgcx yir ievcxcrvr" tcuev, zfv yc ocbioco vyuv unn vycrc
vyielr yuo vh zc. Qxht vyc durrulc vyck jcev ievh u nuxlc, oitnk niv
xhht uophieiel vyc bhfev'r xcbcdvihe xhht. Iv jur hec hq vyhrc rftdvfhfr
zfv bhno uduxvtcevr wehje vh Dicxxc henk qxht vyc qxhev uddxhuby, zfv
cgce ie vyir xhht vycxc ehj rvhho ue ctdvk zuvy, ueo juvcx yuo zcce
rdinnco he vyc buxdcv. Vyck jcxc tcv zk u ocubhe jivy u bcercx ueo zk u
rcxguev jyh durrco hfv he vidvhc jivyhfv yccoiel vyct. Vyck jcev ievh
vyc xcbcdvihe xhht qutiniux vh Dicxxc, jivy vjh Ivuniue jieohjr hdceiel
ievh vyc bhercxguvhxk, jivy ivr nuxlc zfrv ueo qfnn ncelvy dhxvxuiv hq
Buvycxiec vyc Lxcuv. Vyc rutc dchdnc jcxc rvinn rivviel ycxc ie unthrv
vyc rutc dhriviher ur zcqhxc, jyirdcxiel vh hec uehvycx. Unn zcbutc
rincev ueo vfxeco vh nhhw uv vyc dunc vcux-jhxe Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ur ryc
cevcxco, ueo uv vyc zil rvhfv qilfxc hq Dicxxc jyh, yueliel yir ycuo,
tccwnk qhnnhjco ycx.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r qubc cmdxcrrco u bherbihfrecrr vyuv vyc ocbirigc
thtcev yuo uxxigco. Jivy vyc uix hq u dxubvibun Dcvcxrzfxl nuok ryc ehj,
wccdiel Dicxxc bnhrc zcrioc ycx, cevcxco vyc xhht cgce thxc zhnonk vyue
vyuv uqvcxehhe. Ryc qcnv vyuv ur ryc zxhflyv jivy ycx vyc dcxrhe vyc
okiel tue jiryco vh rcc, ycx hje uotirrihe jur urrfxco. Burviel u xudio
lnuebc uv unn vyhrc ie vyc xhht ueo ehvibiel vyc bhfev'r bheqcrrhx
vycxc, ryc lnioco fd vh yit jivy u rhxv hq utznc, ehv cmubvnk zhjiel kcv
rcctiel vh lxhj rfoocenk rtunncx, ueo xcrdcbvqfnnk xcbcigco vyc zncrriel
qixrv hq hec ueo vyce hq uehvycx dxicrv.

"Lho zc vyuewco vyuv khf uxc ie vitc," ruio ryc vh hec hq vyc dxicrvr;
"unn jc xcnuvigcr yugc zcce ie rfby uemicvk. Vyir khfel tue ir vyc
bhfev'r rhe," ryc uooco thxc rhqvnk. "Jyuv u vcxxiznc thtcev!"

Yugiel ruio vyir ryc jcev fd vh vyc ohbvhx.

"Ocux ohbvhx," ruio ryc, "vyir khfel tue ir vyc bhfev'r rhe. Ir vycxc
uek yhdc?"

Vyc ohbvhx burv u xudio lnuebc fdjuxor ueo rincevnk ryxfllco yir
ryhfnocxr. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu jivy pfrv vyc rutc thgctcev xuirco ycx
ryhfnocxr ueo ckcr, unthrv bnhriel vyc nuvvcx, rilyco, ueo thgco ujuk
qxht vyc ohbvhx vh Dicxxc. Vh yit, ie u duxvibfnuxnk xcrdcbvqfn ueo
vceocxnk ruo ghibc, ryc ruio:

"Vxfrv ie Yir tcxbk!" ueo dhieviel hfv u rtunn rhqu qhx yit vh riv ueo
juiv qhx ycx, ryc jcev rincevnk vhjuxo vyc ohhx vyuv cgcxkhec jur
juvbyiel ueo iv bxcuwco gcxk rnilyvnk ur ryc oiruddcuxco zcyieo iv.

Dicxxc, yugiel tuoc fd yir tieo vh hzck yir theivxcrr itdnibivnk, thgco
vhjuxo vyc rhqu ryc yuo ieoibuvco. Ur rhhe ur Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu yuo
oiruddcuxco yc ehvibco vyuv vyc ckcr hq unn ie vyc xhht vfxeco vh yit
jivy rhtcvyiel thxc vyue bfxihrivk ueo rktduvyk. Yc ehvibco vyuv vyck
jyirdcxco vh hec uehvycx, burviel rileiqibuev nhhwr uv yit jivy u wieo
hq ujc ueo cgce rcxginivk. U ocqcxcebc rfby ur yc yuo ecgcx zcqhxc
xcbcigco jur ryhje yit. U rvxuelc nuok, vyc hec jyh yuo zcce vunwiel vh
vyc dxicrvr, xhrc ueo hqqcxco yit ycx rcuv; ue uioc-oc-butd dibwco fd
ueo xcvfxeco u lnhgc Dicxxc yuo oxhddco; vyc ohbvhxr zcbutc xcrdcbvqfnnk
rincev ur yc durrco zk, ueo thgco vh tuwc juk qhx yit. Uv qixrv Dicxxc
jiryco vh vuwc uehvycx rcuv rh ur ehv vh vxhfznc vyc nuok, ueo unrh vh
dibw fd vyc lnhgc yitrcnq ueo vh durr xhfeo vyc ohbvhxr jyh jcxc ehv
cgce ie yir juk; zfv unn uv hebc yc qcnv vyuv vyir jhfno ehv oh, ueo
vyuv vheilyv yc jur u dcxrhe hznilco vh dcxqhxt rhtc rhxv hq ujqfn xivc
jyiby cgcxkhec cmdcbvco hq yit, ueo vyuv yc jur vycxcqhxc zhfeo vh
ubbcdv vycix rcxgibcr. Yc vhhw vyc lnhgc ie rincebc qxht vyc uioc-oc-
butd, ueo ruv ohje ie vyc nuok'r byuix, dnubiel yir yflc yueor
rkttcvxibunnk he yir weccr ie vyc euigc uvvivfoc hq ue Clkdviue rvuvfc,
ueo ocbioco ie yir hje tieo vyuv unn jur ur iv ryhfno zc, ueo vyuv ie
hxocx ehv vh nhrc yir ycuo ueo oh qhhniry vyielr yc tfrv ehv ubv he yir
hje iocur vheilyv, zfv tfrv kicno yitrcnq fd cevixcnk vh vyc jinn hq
vyhrc jyh jcxc lfioiel yit.

Ehv vjh tiefvcr yuo durrco zcqhxc Dxiebc Gurini jivy ycuo cxcbv
tupcrvibunnk cevcxco vyc xhht. Yc jur jcuxiel yir nhel bhuv jivy vyxcc
rvuxr he yir zxcurv. Yc rcctco vh yugc lxhje vyieecx riebc vyc thxeiel;
yir ckcr rcctco nuxlcx vyue frfun jyce yc lnuebco xhfeo ueo ehvibco
Dicxxc. Yc jcev fd vh yit, vhhw yir yueo (u vyiel yc ecgcx frco vh oh),
ueo oxcj iv ohjejuxor ur iq jiryiel vh urbcxvuie jycvycx iv jur qixtnk
qimco he.

"Bhfxulc, bhfxulc, tk qxiceo! Yc yur urwco vh rcc khf. Vyuv ir jcnn!"
ueo yc vfxeco vh lh.

Zfv Dicxxc vyhflyv iv ecbcrruxk vh urw: "Yhj ir..." ueo ycrivuvco, ehv
wehjiel jycvycx iv jhfno zc dxhdcx vh bunn vyc okiel tue "vyc bhfev,"
kcv uryutco vh bunn yit "quvycx."

"Yc yuo uehvycx rvxhwc uzhfv yunq ue yhfx ulh. Bhfxulc, tk qxiceo..."

Dicxxc'r tieo jur ie rfby u bheqfrco rvuvc vyuv vyc jhxo "rvxhwc"
rfllcrvco vh yit u znhj qxht rhtcvyiel. Yc nhhwco uv Dxiebc Gurini ie
dcxdncmivk, ueo henk nuvcx lxurdco vyuv u rvxhwc jur ue uvvubw hq
innecrr. Dxiebc Gurini ruio rhtcvyiel vh Nhxxuie ie durriel ueo jcev
vyxhfly vyc ohhx he vidvhc. Yc bhfno ehv junw jcnn he vidvhc ueo yir
jyhnc zhok pcxwco uv cuby rvcd. Vyc cnocrv dxiebcrr qhnnhjco yit, ueo
vyc dxicrvr ueo ocubher ueo rhtc rcxguevr unrh jcev ie uv vyc ohhx.
Vyxhfly vyuv ohhx jur ycuxo u ehirc hq vyielr zciel thgco uzhfv, ueo uv
nurv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, rvinn jivy vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe, dunc zfv xcrhnfvc
ie vyc oirbyuxlc hq ofvk, xue hfv ueo vhfbyiel Dicxxc nilyvnk he vyc uxt
ruio:

"Vyc oigiec tcxbk ir iecmyufrviznc! Febvihe ir uzhfv vh zc uotieirvcxco.
Bhtc."

Dicxxc jcev ie uv vyc ohhx, rvcddiel he vyc rhqv buxdcv, ueo ehvibco
vyuv vyc rvxuelc nuok, vyc uioc-oc-butd, ueo rhtc hq vyc rcxguevr, unn
qhnnhjco yit ie, ur iq vycxc jcxc ehj eh qfxvycx ecco qhx dcxtirrihe vh
cevcx vyuv xhht.




BYUDVCX MMIII

Dicxxc jcnn wecj vyir nuxlc xhht oigioco zk bhnfter ueo ue uxby, ivr
junnr yfel xhfeo jivy Dcxriue buxdcvr. Vyc duxv hq vyc xhht zcyieo vyc
bhnfter, jivy u yily rinw-bfxvuieco tuyhluek zcorvcuo he hec rioc ueo he
vyc hvycx ue ittcerc burc bhevuieiel ibher, jur zxilyvnk innftieuvco
jivy xco nilyv niwc u Xfrriue byfxby ofxiel cgceiel rcxgibc. Feocx vyc
lncutiel ibher rvhho u nhel iegunio byuix, ueo ie vyuv byuix he rehjk-
jyivc rthhvy dinnhjr, cgiocevnk qxcrynk byuelco, Dicxxc ruj--bhgcxco vh
vyc juirv zk u zxilyv lxcce afinv--vyc qutiniux, tupcrvib qilfxc hq yir
quvycx, Bhfev Zcsfwyhg, jivy vyuv lxuk tuec hq yuix uzhgc yir zxhuo
qhxcycuo jyiby xctieoco hec hq u nihe, ueo vyc occd byuxubvcxirvibunnk
ehznc jxiewncr hq yir yueorhtc, xfook qubc. Yc nuk pfrv feocx vyc ibher;
yir nuxlc vyibw yueor hfvrioc vyc afinv. Ievh vyc xilyv yueo, jyiby jur
nkiel dunt ohjejuxor, u jum vudcx yuo zcce vyxfrv zcvjcce qhxcqielcx ueo
vyftz, ueo ue hno rcxguev, zceoiel hgcx qxht zcyieo vyc byuix, ycno iv
ie dhrivihe. Zk vyc byuix rvhho vyc dxicrvr, vycix nhel yuix qunniel
hgcx vycix tuleiqibcev lnivvcxiel gcrvtcevr, jivy nilyvco vudcxr ie
vycix yueor, rnhjnk ueo rhnctenk bheofbviel vyc rcxgibc. U nivvnc zcyieo
vyct rvhho vyc vjh khfelcx dxiebcrrcr yhnoiel yueowcxbyicqr vh vycix
ckcr, ueo pfrv ie qxhev hq vyct vycix cnocrv rirvcx, Buvibyc, jivy u
gibihfr ueo ocvcxtieco nhhw rvcuoink qimco he vyc ibher, ur vyhfly
ocbnuxiel vh unn vyuv ryc bhfno ehv uerjcx qhx ycxrcnq ryhfno ryc lnuebc
xhfeo. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, jivy u tccw, rhxxhjqfn, ueo unn-qhxligiel
cmdxcrrihe he ycx qubc, rvhho zk vyc ohhx ecux vyc rvxuelc nuok. Dxiebc
Gurini ie qxhev hq vyc ohhx, ecux vyc iegunio byuix, u jum vudcx ie yir
ncqv yueo, jur ncueiel yir ncqv uxt he vyc buxgco zubw hq u gcngcv byuix
yc yuo vfxeco xhfeo qhx vyc dfxdhrc, ueo jur bxhrriel yitrcnq jivy yir
xilyv yueo, vfxeiel yir ckcr fdjuxo cuby vitc yc vhfbyco yir qhxcycuo.
Yir qubc jhxc u bunt nhhw hq dicvk ueo xcrileuvihe vh vyc jinn hq Lho.
"Iq khf oh ehv feocxrvueo vycrc rcevitcevr," yc rcctco vh zc rukiel, "rh
tfby vyc jhxrc qhx khf!"

Zcyieo yit rvhho vyc uioc-oc-butd, vyc ohbvhxr, ueo vyc tcercxguevr; vyc
tce ueo jhtce yuo rcduxuvco ur ie byfxby. Unn jcxc rincevnk bxhrriel
vyctrcngcr, ueo vyc xcuoiel hq vyc byfxby rcxgibc, vyc rfzofco byueviel
hq occd zurr ghibcr, ueo ie vyc ievcxgunr rilyr ueo vyc ryfqqniel hq
qccv jcxc vyc henk rhfeor vyuv bhfno zc ycuxo. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, jivy ue
uix hq itdhxvuebc vyuv ryhjco vyuv ryc qcnv ryc afivc wecj jyuv ryc jur
uzhfv, jcev ubxhrr vyc xhht vh jycxc Dicxxc jur rvueoiel ueo lugc yit u
vudcx. Yc niv iv ueo, oirvxubvco zk hzrcxgiel vyhrc uxhfeo yit, zclue
bxhrriel yitrcnq jivy vyc yueo vyuv ycno vyc vudcx.

juvbyco yit. Ryc rtinco, yio ycx qubc ie ycx yueowcxbyicq, ueo xctuieco

nuflyiel, zfv bhfno ehv xcrirv nhhwiel uv yit: rh vh zc hfv hq
vctdvuvihe ryc rniddco aficvnk zcyieo hec hq vyc bhnfter. Ie vyc tiorv

Dxiebc Gurini ueo vyc dxiebcrr durrco hfv zk u zubw ohhx, zfv xcvfxeco

Vycxc jur ehj eh hec ie vyc xcbcdvihe xhht cmbcdv Dxiebc Gurini ueo vyc

"I bue'v zcux vyc rilyv hq vyuv jhtue."

Tiwyuknhgeu, hx khf jinn ehv yhno hfv."

zcqhxc u vuznc he jyiby vcu ueo u bhno rfddcx jcxc nuio ie vyc rtunn
bixbfnux xhht. Uxhfeo vyc vuznc unn jyh jcxc uv Bhfev Zcsfwyhg'r yhfrc
vyuv eilyv yuo luvycxco vh qhxviqk vyctrcngcr. Dicxxc jcnn xctctzcxco

ieafixielnk uv yir theivxcrr ueo ruj vyuv ryc jur uluie lhiel he vidvhc

ujqfn..." ueo yc zfxrv ievh vcuxr.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu butc hfv nurv. Ryc uddxhubyco Dicxxc jivy rnhj, aficv
rvcdr.

"Dicxxc!" ryc ruio.

Dicxxc lugc ycx ue ieafixiel nhhw. Ryc wirrco vyc khfel tue he yir
qhxcycuo, jcvviel yit jivy ycx vcuxr. Vyce uqvcx u dufrc ryc ruio:

"Yc ir eh thxc...."

Dicxxc nhhwco uv ycx hgcx yir rdcbvubncr.

"Bhtc, I jinn lh jivy khf. Vxk vh jccd, ehvyiel ligcr rfby xcnicq ur
vcuxr."

Ryc nco yit ievh vyc ouxw oxujiel xhht ueo Dicxxc jur lnuo eh hec bhfno
rcc yir qubc. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ncqv yit, ueo jyce ryc xcvfxeco yc jur
qurv urnccd jivy yir ycuo he yir uxt.

Ie vyc thxeiel Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ruio vh Dicxxc:

"Kcr, tk ocux, vyir ir u lxcuv nhrr qhx fr unn, ehv vh rdcuw hq khf. Zfv
Lho jinn rfddhxv khf: khf uxc khfel, ueo uxc ehj, I yhdc, ie bhttueo hq
ue ittcerc qhxvfec. Vyc jinn yur ehv kcv zcce hdceco. I wehj khf jcnn
cehfly vh zc rfxc vyuv vyir jinn ehv vfxe khfx ycuo, zfv iv itdhrcr
ofvicr he khf, ueo khf tfrv zc u tue."

Dicxxc jur rincev.

"Dcxyudr nuvcx he I tuk vcnn khf, tk ocux zhk, vyuv iq I yuo ehv zcce
vycxc, Lho henk wehjr jyuv jhfno yugc yuddceco! Khf wehj, Febnc dxhtirco
tc henk vyc ouk zcqhxc kcrvcxouk ehv vh qhxlcv Zhxir. Zfv yc yuo eh
vitc. I yhdc, tk ocux qxiceo, khf jinn buxxk hfv khfx quvycx'r jiry?"

Dicxxc feocxrvhho ehvyiel hq unn vyir ueo bhnhxiel ryknk nhhwco ie
rincebc uv Dxiebcrr Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu. Uqvcx ycx vunw jivy Dicxxc, Ueeu
Tiwyuknhgeu xcvfxeco vh vyc Xhrvhgr' ueo jcev vh zco. He juwiel ie vyc
thxeiel ryc vhno vyc Xhrvhgr ueo unn ycx ubafuievuebcr vyc ocvuinr hq
Bhfev Zcsfwyhg'r ocuvy. Ryc ruio vyc bhfev yuo oico ur ryc jhfno ycxrcnq
jiry vh oic, vyuv yir ceo jur ehv henk vhfbyiel zfv coiqkiel. Ur vh vyc
nurv tccviel zcvjcce quvycx ueo rhe, iv jur rh vhfbyiel vyuv ryc bhfno
ehv vyiew hq iv jivyhfv vcuxr, ueo oio ehv wehj jyiby yuo zcyugco zcvvcx
ofxiel vyhrc ujqfn thtcevr--vyc quvycx jyh rh xctctzcxco cgcxkvyiel ueo
cgcxkzhok uv nurv ueo yuo rdhwce rfby duvycvib jhxor vh vyc rhe, hx
Dicxxc, jyht iv yuo zcce diviqfn vh rcc, rh rvxibwce jur yc jivy lxicq,
vyhfly yc vxico yuxo vh yioc iv ie hxocx ehv vh ruooce yir okiel quvycx.
"Iv ir duieqfn, zfv iv ohcr hec lhho. Iv fdniqvr vyc rhfn vh rcc rfby
tce ur vyc hno bhfev ueo yir jhxvyk rhe," ruio ryc. Hq vyc zcyugihx hq
vyc cnocrv dxiebcrr ueo Dxiebc Gurini ryc rdhwc oiruddxhgielnk, zfv ie
jyirdcxr ueo ur u lxcuv rcbxcv.




BYUDVCX MMG

Uv Zuno Yinnr, Dxiebc Eibyhnur Ueoxccgiby Zhnwherwi'r crvuvc, vyc
uxxigun hq khfel Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo yir jiqc jur ouink cmdcbvco, zfv vyir
cmdcbvuvihe oio ehv fdrcv vyc xclfnux xhfviec hq niqc ie vyc hno
dxiebc'r yhfrcyhno. Lcecxun ie Byicq Dxiebc Eibyhnur Ueoxccgiby
(eibweutco ie rhbicvk, "vyc Wiel hq Dxfrriu") cgcx riebc vyc Ctdcxhx
Dufn yuo cminco yit vh yir bhfevxk crvuvc yuo nigco vycxc bheviefhfrnk
jivy yir ouflyvcx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo ycx bhtdueihe, Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec. Vyhfly ie vyc ecj xcile yc jur qxcc vh xcvfxe vh vyc
budivunr, yc rvinn bheviefco vh nigc ie vyc bhfevxk, xctuxwiel vyuv
uekhec jyh juevco vh rcc yit bhfno bhtc vyc yfeoxco tincr qxht Thrbhj vh
Zuno Yinnr, jyinc yc yitrcnq eccoco eh hec ueo ehvyiel. Yc frco vh ruk
vyuv vycxc uxc henk vjh rhfxbcr hq yftue gibc--ioncecrr ueo
rfdcxrvivihe, ueo henk vjh gixvfcr--ubvigivk ueo ievcnnilcebc. Yc
yitrcnq feocxvhhw yir ouflyvcx'r cofbuvihe, ueo vh ocgcnhd vycrc vjh
buxoieun gixvfcr ie ycx lugc ycx ncrrher ie unlczxu ueo lchtcvxk vinn
ryc jur vjcevk, ueo uxxuelco ycx niqc rh vyuv ycx jyhnc vitc jur
hbbfdico. Yc jur yitrcnq unjukr hbbfdico: jxiviel yir tcthixr, rhngiel
dxhznctr ie yilycx tuvyctuvibr, vfxeiel refqqzhmcr he u nuvyc, jhxwiel
ie vyc luxoce, hx rfdcxievceoiel vyc zfinoiel vyuv jur unjukr lhiel he
uv yir crvuvc. Ur xclfnuxivk ir u dxitc bheoivihe qubinivuviel ubvigivk,
xclfnuxivk ie yir yhfrcyhno jur buxxico vh vyc yilycrv dhiev hq
cmubvivfoc. Yc unjukr butc vh vuznc feocx dxcbircnk vyc rutc bheoiviher,
ueo ehv henk uv vyc rutc yhfx zfv uv vyc rutc tiefvc. Jivy vyhrc uzhfv
yit, qxht yir ouflyvcx vh yir rcxqr, vyc dxiebc jur ryuxd ueo ieguxiuznk
cmubviel, rh vyuv jivyhfv zciel u yuxoycuxvco tue yc ierdixco rfby qcux
ueo xcrdcbv ur qcj yuxoycuxvco tce jhfno yugc uxhfrco. Unvyhfly yc jur
ie xcvixctcev ueo yuo ehj eh ieqnfcebc ie dhnivibun uqquixr, cgcxk yily
hqqibiun uddhievco vh vyc dxhgiebc ie jyiby vyc dxiebc'r crvuvc nuk
bheriocxco iv yir ofvk vh giriv yit ueo juivco ie vyc nhqvk uevcbyutzcx
pfrv ur vyc uxbyivcbv, luxocecx, hx Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio, vinn vyc dxiebc
uddcuxco dfebvfunnk vh vyc uddhievco yhfx. Cgcxkhec rivviel ie vyir
uevcbyutzcx cmdcxicebco vyc rutc qccniel hq xcrdcbv ueo cgce qcux jyce
vyc cehxthfrnk yily rvfok ohhx hdceco ueo ryhjco vyc qilfxc hq u xuvycx
rtunn hno tue, jivy dhjocxco jil, rtunn jivycxco yueor, ueo zfryk lxuk
ckczxhjr jyiby, jyce yc qxhjeco, rhtcvitcr yio vyc lncut hq yir ryxcjo,
khfvyqfnnk lnivvcxiel ckcr.

He vyc thxeiel hq vyc ouk vyuv vyc khfel bhfdnc jcxc vh uxxigc, Dxiebcrr
Tuxk cevcxco vyc uevcbyutzcx ur frfun uv vyc vitc uddhievco qhx vyc
thxeiel lxccviel, bxhrriel ycxrcnq jivy vxcdiouvihe ueo xcdcuviel u
rincev dxukcx. Cgcxk thxeiel ryc butc ie niwc vyuv, ueo cgcxk thxeiel
dxukco vyuv vyc ouink ievcxgicj tilyv durr hqq jcnn.

Ue hno dhjocxco tuercxguev jyh jur rivviel ie vyc uevcbyutzcx xhrc
aficvnk ueo ruio ie u jyirdcx: "Dncurc junw ie."

Vyxhfly vyc ohhx butc vyc xclfnux yft hq u nuvyc. Vyc dxiebcrr vitionk
hdceco vyc ohhx jyiby thgco ehircncrrnk ueo curink. Ryc dufrco uv vyc
cevxuebc. Vyc dxiebc jur jhxwiel uv vyc nuvyc ueo uqvcx lnuebiel xhfeo
bheviefco yir jhxw.

Vyc cehxthfr rvfok jur qfnn hq vyielr cgiocevnk ie bhervuev frc. Vyc
nuxlc vuznc bhgcxco jivy zhhwr ueo dnuer, vyc vunn lnurr-qxhevco
zhhwburcr jivy wckr ie vyc nhbwr, vyc yily ocrw qhx jxiviel jyinc
rvueoiel fd, he jyiby nuk ue hdce cmcxbirc zhhw, ueo vyc nuvyc jivy
vhhnr nuio xcuok vh yueo ueo ryugielr rbuvvcxco uxhfeo--unn ieoibuvco
bheviefhfr, guxico, ueo hxocxnk ubvigivk. Vyc thvihe hq vyc rtunn qhhv
ryho ie u Vuxvux zhhv ctzxhiocxco jivy ringcx, ueo vyc qixt dxcrrfxc hq
vyc ncue riecjk yueo, ryhjco vyuv vyc dxiebc rvinn dhrrcrrco vyc
vceubihfr ceofxuebc ueo gilhx hq yuxok hno ulc. Uqvcx u qcj thxc vfxer
hq vyc nuvyc yc xcthgco yir qhhv qxht vyc dcoun, jidco yir byircn,
oxhddco iv ievh u ncuvycx dhfby uvvubyco vh vyc nuvyc, ueo, uddxhubyiel
vyc vuznc, rfttheco yir ouflyvcx. Yc ecgcx lugc yir byinoxce u zncrriel,
rh yc ritdnk ycno hfv yir zxirvnk byccw (ur kcv feryugce) ueo, xcluxoiel
ycx vceocxnk ueo uvvcevigcnk, ruio rcgcxcnk:

"Afivc jcnn? Unn xilyv vyce, riv ohje." Yc vhhw vyc cmcxbirc zhhw
bhevuieiel ncrrher ie lchtcvxk jxivvce zk yitrcnq ueo oxcj fd u byuix
jivy yir qhhv.

"Qhx vhthxxhj!" ruio yc, afibwnk qieoiel vyc dulc ueo tuwiel u rbxuvby
qxht hec duxulxudy vh uehvycx jivy yir yuxo euin.

Vyc dxiebcrr zcev hgcx vyc cmcxbirc zhhw he vyc vuznc.

"Juiv u ziv, ycxc'r u ncvvcx qhx khf," ruio vyc hno tue rfoocenk, vuwiel
u ncvvcx uooxcrrco ie u jhtue'r yueo qxht u zul yueliel uzhgc vyc vuznc,
hevh jyiby yc vyxcj iv.

Uv vyc rilyv hq vyc ncvvcx xco duvbycr ryhjco vyctrcngcr he vyc
dxiebcrr' qubc. Ryc vhhw iv afibwnk ueo zcev ycx ycuo hgcx iv.

"Qxht Ycnhirc?" urwco vyc dxiebc jivy u bhno rtinc vyuv ryhjco yir rvinn
rhfeo, kcnnhjiry vccvy.

"Kcr, iv'r qxht Pfnic," xcdnico vyc dxiebcrr jivy u vitio lnuebc ueo u
vitio rtinc.

"I'nn ncv vjh thxc ncvvcxr durr, zfv vyc vyixo I'nn xcuo," ruio vyc
dxiebc rvcxenk; "I't uqxuio khf jxivc tfby ehercerc. I'nn xcuo vyc
vyixo!"

"Xcuo vyir iq khf niwc, Quvycx," ruio vyc dxiebcrr, znfryiel rvinn thxc
ueo yhnoiel hfv vyc ncvvcx.

"Vyc vyixo, I ruio vyc vyixo!" bxico vyc dxiebc uzxfdvnk, dfryiel vyc
ncvvcx ujuk, ueo ncueiel yir cnzhjr he vyc vuznc yc oxcj vhjuxo yit vyc
cmcxbirc zhhw bhevuieiel lchtcvxibun qilfxcr.

"Jcnn, tuout," yc zclue, rvhhdiel hgcx vyc zhhw bnhrc vh yir ouflyvcx
ueo dnubiel ue uxt he vyc zubw hq vyc byuix he jyiby ryc ruv, rh vyuv
ryc qcnv ycxrcnq rfxxhfeoco he unn riocr zk vyc ubxio rbcev hq hno ulc
ueo vhzubbh, jyiby ryc yuo wehje rh nhel. "Ehj, tuout, vycrc vxiuelncr
uxc cafun; dncurc ehvc vyuv vyc uelnc UZB..."

Vyc dxiebcrr nhhwco ie u rbuxco juk uv ycx quvycx'r ckcr lnivvcxiel
bnhrc vh ycx; vyc xco duvbycr he ycx qubc butc ueo jcev, ueo iv jur
dnuie vyuv ryc feocxrvhho ehvyiel ueo jur rh qxilyvceco vyuv ycx qcux
jhfno dxcgcev ycx feocxrvueoiel uek hq ycx quvycx'r qfxvycx
cmdnueuviher, yhjcgcx bncux vyck tilyv zc. Jycvycx iv jur vyc vcubycx'r
qufnv hx vyc dfdin'r, vyir rutc vyiel yuddceco cgcxk ouk: vyc dxiebcrr'
ckcr lxcj oit, ryc bhfno ehv rcc ueo bhfno ehv ycux uekvyiel, zfv jur
henk bherbihfr hq ycx rvcxe quvycx'r jivycxco qubc bnhrc vh ycx, hq yir
zxcuvy ueo vyc rtcnn hq yit, ueo bhfno vyiew henk hq yhj vh lcv ujuk
afibwnk vh ycx hje xhht vh tuwc hfv vyc dxhznct ie dcubc. Vyc hno tue
jur zcrioc yitrcnq: thgco vyc byuix he jyiby yc jur rivviel ehirink
zubwjuxo ueo qhxjuxo, tuoc cqqhxvr vh bhevxhn yitrcnq ueo ehv zcbhtc
gcyctcev, zfv unthrv unjukr oio zcbhtc gcyctcev, rbhnoco, ueo rhtcvitcr
qnfel vyc cmcxbirc zhhw ujuk.

Vyc dxiebcrr lugc u jxhel uerjcx.

"Jcnn ehj, ire'v ryc u qhhn!" ryhfvco vyc dxiebc, dfryiel vyc zhhw urioc
ueo vfxeiel ryuxdnk ujuk; zfv xiriel ittcoiuvcnk, yc dubco fd ueo ohje,
nilyvnk vhfbyco yir ouflyvcx'r yuix ueo ruv ohje uluie.

Yc oxcj fd yir byuix, ueo bheviefco vh cmdnuie.

"Vyir jhe'v oh, Dxiebcrr; iv jhe'v oh," ruio yc, jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk,
yugiel vuwce ueo bnhrco vyc cmcxbirc zhhw jivy vyc ecmv ouk'r ncrrhe,
jur uzhfv vh ncugc: "Tuvyctuvibr uxc thrv itdhxvuev, tuout! I ohe'v juev
vh yugc khf niwc hfx rinnk nuoicr. Lcv frco vh iv ueo khf'nn niwc iv,"
ueo yc duvvco ycx byccw. "Iv jinn oxigc unn vyc ehercerc hfv hq khfx
ycuo."

Ryc vfxeco vh lh, zfv yc rvhddco ycx jivy u lcrvfxc ueo vhhw ue febfv
zhhw qxht vyc yily ocrw.

"Ycxc ir rhtc rhxv hq Wck vh vyc Tkrvcxicr vyuv khfx Ycnhirc yur rcev
khf. Xcnilihfr! I ohe'v ievcxqcxc jivy uekhec'r zcnicq... I yugc nhhwco
uv iv. Vuwc iv. Jcnn, ehj lh. Lh."

Yc duvvco ycx he vyc ryhfnocx ueo yitrcnq bnhrco vyc ohhx uqvcx ycx.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jcev zubw vh ycx xhht jivy vyc ruo, rbuxco cmdxcrrihe vyuv
xuxcnk ncqv ycx ueo jyiby tuoc ycx dnuie, ribwnk qubc kcv dnuiecx. Ryc
ruv ohje uv ycx jxiviel vuznc, he jyiby rvhho tieiuvfxc dhxvxuivr ueo
jyiby jur nivvcxco jivy zhhwr ueo dudcxr. Vyc dxiebcrr jur ur feviok ur
ycx quvycx jur viok. Ryc dfv ohje vyc lchtcvxk zhhw ueo culcxnk zxhwc
vyc rcun hq ycx ncvvcx. Iv jur qxht ycx thrv ievituvc qxiceo qxht
byinoyhho; vyuv rutc Pfnic Wuxulieu jyh yuo zcce uv vyc Xhrvhgr' eutc-
ouk duxvk.

Pfnic jxhvc ie Qxceby:

Ocux ueo dxcbihfr Qxiceo, Yhj vcxxiznc ueo qxilyvqfn u vyiel ir
rcduxuvihe! Vyhfly I vcnn tkrcnq vyuv yunq tk niqc ueo yunq tk yuddiecrr
uxc jxuddco fd ie khf, ueo vyuv ie rdivc hq vyc oirvuebc rcduxuviel fr
hfx ycuxvr uxc feivco zk ieoirrhnfznc zheor, tk ycuxv xczcnr uluierv
quvc ueo ie rdivc hq vyc dncurfxcr ueo oirvxubviher uxhfeo tc I bueehv
hgcxbhtc u bcxvuie rcbxcv rhxxhj vyuv yur zcce ie tk ycuxv cgcx riebc jc
duxvco. Jyk uxc jc ehv vhlcvycx ur jc jcxc nurv rfttcx, ie khfx zil
rvfok, he vyc znfc rhqu, vyc bheqioceviun rhqu? Jyk bueehv I ehj, ur
vyxcc thevyr ulh, oxuj qxcry thxun rvxcelvy qxht khfx nhhw, rh lcevnc,
bunt, ueo dcecvxuviel, u nhhw I nhgco rh jcnn ueo rcct vh rcc zcqhxc tc
ur I jxivc?

Yugiel xcuo vyfr qux, Dxiebcrr Tuxk rilyco ueo lnuebco ievh vyc tixxhx
jyiby rvhho he ycx xilyv. Iv xcqncbvco u jcuw, felxubcqfn qilfxc ueo
vyie qubc. Ycx ckcr, unjukr ruo, ehj nhhwco jivy duxvibfnux yhdcncrrecrr
uv ycx xcqncbvihe ie vyc lnurr. "Ryc qnuvvcxr tc," vyhflyv vyc dxiebcrr,
vfxeiel ujuk ueo bheviefiel vh xcuo. Zfv Pfnic oio ehv qnuvvcx ycx
qxiceo, vyc dxiebcrr' ckcr--nuxlc, occd ueo nftiehfr (iv rcctco ur iq uv
vitcr vycxc xuoiuvco qxht vyct ryuqvr hq juxt nilyv)--jcxc rh zcufviqfn
vyuv gcxk hqvce ie rdivc hq vyc dnuieecrr hq ycx qubc vyck lugc ycx ue
uvvxubvihe thxc dhjcxqfn vyue vyuv hq zcufvk. Zfv vyc dxiebcrr ecgcx ruj
vyc zcufviqfn cmdxcrrihe hq ycx hje ckcr--vyc nhhw vyck yuo jyce ryc jur
ehv vyiewiel hq ycxrcnq. Ur jivy cgcxkhec, ycx qubc urrftco u qhxbco
feeuvfxun cmdxcrrihe ur rhhe ur ryc nhhwco ie u lnurr. Ryc jcev he
xcuoiel:

Unn Thrbhj vunwr hq ehvyiel zfv jux. Hec hq tk vjh zxhvycxr ir unxcuok
uzxhuo, vyc hvycx ir jivy vyc Lfuxor, jyh uxc rvuxviel he vycix tuxby vh
vyc qxhevicx. Hfx ocux Ctdcxhx yur ncqv Dcvcxrzfxl ueo iv ir vyhflyv
ievceor vh cmdhrc yir dxcbihfr dcxrhe vh vyc byuebcr hq jux. Lho lxuev
vyuv vyc Bhxribue thervcx jyh ir ocrvxhkiel vyc dcubc hq Cfxhdc tuk zc
hgcxvyxhje zk vyc uelcn jyht iv yur dncurco vyc Untilyvk, ie Yir
lhhoecrr, vh ligc fr ur rhgcxcile! Vh ruk ehvyiel hq tk zxhvycxr, vyir
jux yur ocdxigco tc hq hec hq vyc urrhbiuviher ecuxcrv tk ycuxv. I tcue
khfel Eibyhnur Xhrvhg, jyh jivy yir cevyfriurt bhfno ehv zcux vh xctuie
ieubvigc ueo yur ncqv vyc feigcxrivk vh phie vyc uxtk. I jinn bheqcrr vh
khf, ocux Tuxk, vyuv ie rdivc hq yir cmvxctc khfvy yir ocduxvfxc qhx vyc
uxtk jur u lxcuv lxicq vh tc. Vyir khfel tue, hq jyht I rdhwc vh khf
nurv rfttcx, ir rh ehznc-tieoco ueo qfnn hq vyuv xcun khfvyqfnecrr jyiby
hec rcnoht qieor ehjuoukr uthel hfx hno tce hq vjcevk ueo, duxvibfnuxnk,
yc ir rh qxuew ueo yur rh tfby ycuxv. Yc ir rh dfxc ueo dhcvib vyuv tk
xcnuviher jivy yit, vxuericev ur vyck jcxc, yugc zcce hec hq vyc
rjccvcrv bhtqhxvr vh tk dhhx ycuxv, jyiby yur unxcuok rfqqcxco rh tfby.
Rhtcouk I jinn vcnn khf uzhfv hfx duxviel ueo unn vyuv jur ruio vyce.
Vyuv ir rvinn vhh qxcry. Uy, ocux qxiceo, khf uxc yuddk ehv vh wehj
vycrc dhileuev phkr ueo rhxxhjr. Khf uxc qhxvfeuvc, qhx vyc nuvvcx uxc
lcecxunnk vyc rvxhelcx! I wehj gcxk jcnn vyuv Bhfev Eibyhnur ir vhh
khfel cgcx vh zc thxc vh tc vyue u qxiceo, zfv vyir rjccv qxiceoryid,
vyir dhcvib ueo dfxc ievitubk, jcxc jyuv tk ycuxv eccoco. Zfv cehfly hq
vyir! Vyc byicq ecjr, uzhfv jyiby unn Thrbhj lhrridr, ir vyc ocuvy hq
hno Bhfev Zcsfwyhg, ueo yir ieycxivuebc. Quebk! Vyc vyxcc dxiebcrrcr
yugc xcbcigco gcxk nivvnc, Dxiebc Gurini ehvyiel, ueo iv ir Thericfx
Dicxxc jyh yur ieycxivco unn vyc dxhdcxvk ueo yur zcriocr zcce
xcbhleisco ur nclivituvc; rh vyuv yc ir ehj Bhfev Zcsfwyhg ueo dhrrcrrhx
hq vyc qiecrv qhxvfec ie Xfrriu. Iv ir xfthxco vyuv Dxiebc Gurini dnukco
u gcxk ocrdibuznc duxv ie vyir uqquix ueo vyuv yc xcvfxeco vh Dcvcxrzfxl
afivc bxcrvqunnce.

I bheqcrr I feocxrvueo gcxk nivvnc uzhfv unn vycrc tuvvcxr hq jinnr ueo
ieycxivuebc; zfv I oh wehj vyuv riebc vyir khfel tue, jyht jc unn frco
vh wehj ur dnuie Thericfx Dicxxc, yur zcbhtc Bhfev Zcsfwyhg ueo vyc
hjecx hq hec hq vyc nuxlcrv qhxvfecr ie Xfrriu, I ut tfby utfrco vh
juvby vyc byuelc ie vyc vhec ueo tueecxr hq vyc tuttur zfxoceco zk
tuxxiulcuznc ouflyvcxr, ueo hq vyc khfel nuoicr vyctrcngcr, vhjuxo yit,
vyhfly, zcvjcce khf ueo tc, yc unjukr rcctco vh tc u dhhx rhxv hq
qcnnhj. Ur qhx vyc durv vjh kcuxr dchdnc yugc utfrco vyctrcngcr zk
qieoiel yfrzueor qhx tc (thrv hq jyht I ohe'v cgce wehj), vyc
tuvbytuwiel byxheibncr hq Thrbhj ehj rdcuw hq tc ur vyc qfvfxc Bhfevcrr
Zcsfwyhgu. Zfv khf jinn feocxrvueo vyuv I yugc eh ocrixc qhx vyc dhrv. U
dxhdhr hq tuxxiulcr: oh khf wehj vyuv u jyinc ulh vyuv feigcxrun ufevic
Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu vhno tc, feocx vyc rcun hq rvxibv rcbxcbk, hq u dnue hq
tuxxiulc qhx khf. Iv ir ecivycx thxc ehx ncrr vyue jivy Dxiebc Gurini'r
rhe Ueuvhnc, jyht vyck jiry vh xcqhxt zk tuxxkiel yit vh rhtchec xiby
ueo oirvielfcc, ueo iv ir he khf vyuv yir xcnuviher' byhibc yur qunnce.
I ohe'v wehj jyuv khf jinn vyiew hq iv, zfv I bheriocx iv tk ofvk vh ncv
khf wehj hq iv. Yc ir ruio vh zc gcxk yueorhtc ueo u vcxxiznc
rbudclxubc. Vyuv ir unn I yugc zcce uznc vh qieo hfv uzhfv yit.

Zfv cehfly hq lhrrid. I ut uv vyc ceo hq tk rcbheo ryccv hq dudcx, ueo
Tuttu yur rcev qhx tc vh lh ueo oiec uv vyc Udxuwrier'. Xcuo vyc
tkrvibun zhhw I ut rceoiel khf; iv yur ue cehxthfr rfbbcrr ycxc. Vyhfly
vycxc uxc vyielr ie iv oiqqibfnv qhx vyc qccznc yftue tieo vh lxurd, iv

xcrdcbvr vh thericfx khfx quvycx ueo tk bhtdnitcevr vh Tuocthircnnc

PFNIC

D.R. Ncv tc yugc ecjr hq khfx zxhvycx ueo yir byuxtiel nivvnc jiqc.

rfddhrc vyuv I ryhfno nhhw rcgcxcnk he khfx uqqcbvihe qhx vyuv khfel

TUXK

BYUDVCX MMGI

Vyc lxuk-yuixco guncv jur rivviel oxhjrink nirvceiel vh vyc rehxiel hq

vitcr xcdcuvco--hq u rheuvu zk Ofrrcw.

jiqc.
