lchtcvxk jcxc uthel vyc lxcuvcrv ocnilyvr hq ycx niqc.

Jyce vyc vjcevk tiefvcr yuo cnudrco ueo vyc vitc yuo bhtc qhx vyc hno
dxiebc vh lcv fd, Viwyhe butc vh bunn vyc khfel dxiebc vh yir quvycx.
Vyc hno tue tuoc u ocduxvfxc qxht yir frfun xhfviec ie yhehx hq yir
rhe'r uxxigun: yc lugc hxocxr vh uotiv yit vh yir uduxvtcevr jyinc yc
oxcrrco qhx oieecx. Vyc hno dxiebc unjukr oxcrrco ie hno-quryiheco
rvknc, jcuxiel ue ueviafc bhuv ueo dhjocxco yuix; ueo jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj
cevcxco yir quvycx'r oxcrriel xhht (ehv jivy vyc bhevctdvfhfr nhhw ueo
tueecx yc jhxc ie oxujiel xhhtr, zfv jivy vyc ueituvco qubc jivy jyiby
yc vunwco vh Dicxxc), vyc hno tue jur rivviel he u nuxlc ncuvycx-bhgcxco
byuix, jxuddco ie u dhjocxiel tuevnc, cevxfrviel yir ycuo vh Viwyhe.

"Uy! ycxc'r vyc juxxihx! Juevr vh gueafiry Zfheuduxvc?" ruio vyc hno
tue, ryuwiel yir dhjocxco ycuo ur tfby ur vyc vuin, jyiby Viwyhe jur
yhnoiel qurv vh dnuiv, jhfno unnhj.

"Khf uv ncurv tfrv vubwnc yit dxhdcxnk, hx cnrc iq yc lhcr he niwc vyir
yc'nn rhhe yugc fr, vhh, qhx yir rfzpcbvr! Yhj uxc khf?" Ueo yc ycno hfv
yir byccw.

Vyc hno tue jur ie u lhho vctdcx uqvcx yir eud zcqhxc oieecx. (Yc frco
vh ruk vyuv u eud "uqvcx oieecx jur ringcx--zcqhxc oieecx, lhnoce.") Yc
burv yuddk, riocnhel lnuebcr uv yir rhe qxht feocx yir vyibw, zfryk
ckczxhjr. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev fd ueo wirrco yir quvycx he vyc rdhv
ieoibuvco vh yit. Yc tuoc eh xcdnk he yir quvycx'r qughxivc vhdib--
tuwiel qfe hq vyc tinivuxk tce hq vyc ouk, ueo thxc duxvibfnuxnk hq
Zheuduxvc.

"Kcr, Quvycx, I yugc bhtc vh khf ueo zxhflyv tk jiqc jyh ir dxcleuev,"
ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, qhnnhjiel cgcxk thgctcev hq yir quvycx'r qubc jivy
ue culcx ueo xcrdcbvqfn nhhw. "Yhj ir khfx ycunvy?"

"Henk qhhnr ueo xuwcr qunn inn, tk zhk. Khf wehj tc: I ut zfrk qxht
thxeiel vinn eilyv ueo uzrvctihfr, rh hq bhfxrc I ut jcnn."

"Vyuew Lho," ruio yir rhe rtiniel.

"Lho yur ehvyiel vh oh jivy iv! Jcnn, lh he," yc bheviefco, xcvfxeiel vh
yir yhzzk; "vcnn tc yhj vyc Lcxtuer yugc vuflyv khf vh qilyv Zheuduxvc
zk vyir ecj rbicebc khf bunn 'rvxuvclk.'"

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rtinco.

"Ligc tc vitc vh bhnncbv tk jivr, Quvycx," ruio yc, jivy u rtinc vyuv
ryhjco vyuv yir quvycx'r qhizncr oio ehv dxcgcev yir rhe qxht nhgiel ueo
yhehxiel yit. "Jyk, I yugc ehv kcv yuo vitc vh rcvvnc ohje!"

"Ehercerc, ehercerc!" bxico vyc hno tue, ryuwiel yir dilvuin vh rcc
jycvycx iv jur qixtnk dnuivco, ueo lxurdiel yir zk vyc yueo. "Vyc yhfrc
qhx khfx jiqc ir xcuok. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jinn vuwc ycx vycxc ueo ryhj ycx
hgcx, ueo vyck'nn vunw eiecvcce vh vyc ohsce. Vyuv'r vycix jhtue'r juk!
I ut lnuo vh yugc ycx. Riv ohje ueo vunw. Uzhfv Tiwycnrhe'r uxtk I
feocxrvueo--Vhnrvhk'r vhh... u ritfnvuechfr cmdcoivihe.... Zfv jyuv'r
vyc rhfvycxe uxtk vh oh? Dxfrriu ir ecfvxun... I wehj vyuv. Jyuv uzhfv
Ufrvxiu?" ruio yc, xiriel qxht yir byuix ueo dubiel fd ueo ohje vyc xhht
qhnnhjco zk Viwyhe, jyh xue uqvcx yit, yueoiel yit oiqqcxcev uxvibncr hq
bnhvyiel. "Jyuv hq Rjcoce? Yhj jinn vyck bxhrr Dhtcxueiu?"

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, rcciel vyuv yir quvycx ierirvco, zclue--uv qixrv
xcnfbvuevnk, zfv lxuofunnk jivy thxc ueo thxc ueituvihe, ueo qxht yuziv
byueliel febherbihfrnk qxht Xfrriue vh Qxceby ur yc jcev he--vh cmdnuie
vyc dnue hq hdcxuvihe qhx vyc bhtiel butduile. Yc cmdnuieco yhj ue uxtk,
eiecvk vyhfrueo rvxhel, jur vh vyxcuvce Dxfrriu rh ur vh zxiel ycx hfv
hq ycx ecfvxunivk ueo oxuj ycx ievh vyc jux; yhj duxv hq vyuv uxtk jur
vh phie rhtc Rjcoiry qhxbcr uv Rvxunrfeo; yhj vjh yfeoxco ueo vjcevk
vyhfrueo Ufrvxiuer, jivy u yfeoxco vyhfrueo Xfrriuer, jcxc vh hdcxuvc ie
Ivunk ueo he vyc Xyiec; yhj qiqvk vyhfrueo Xfrriuer ueo ur tuek Celniry
jcxc vh nueo uv Eudncr, ueo yhj u vhvun qhxbc hq qigc yfeoxco vyhfrueo
tce jur vh uvvubw vyc Qxceby qxht oiqqcxcev riocr. Vyc hno dxiebc oio
ehv cgiebc vyc ncurv ievcxcrv ofxiel vyir cmdnueuvihe, zfv ur iq yc jcxc
ehv nirvceiel vh iv bheviefco vh oxcrr jyinc junwiel uzhfv, ueo vyxcc
vitcr fecmdcbvconk ievcxxfdvco. Hebc yc rvhddco iv zk ryhfviel: "Vyc
jyivc hec, vyc jyivc hec!"

Vyir tcuev vyuv Viwyhe jur ehv yueoiel yit vyc juirvbhuv yc juevco.
Uehvycx vitc yc ievcxxfdvco, rukiel:

"Ueo jinn ryc rhhe zc bheqieco?" ueo ryuwiel yir ycuo xcdxhubyqfnnk
ruio: "Vyuv'r zuo! Lh he, lh he."

Vyc vyixo ievcxxfdvihe butc jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur qieiryiel yir
ocrbxidvihe. Vyc hno tue zclue vh riel, ie vyc bxubwco ghibc hq hno ulc:
"Tunzxhhw r'ce gu-v-ce lfcxxc. Oicf ruiv afueo xcgiceoxu." *


* "Tuxnzhxhfly ir lhiel vh vyc juxr; Lho wehjr jyce yc'nn xcvfxe."

Yir rhe henk rtinco.

"I ohe'v ruk iv'r u dnue I uddxhgc hq," ruio vyc rhe; "I ut henk vcnniel
khf jyuv iv ir. Eudhnche yur unrh qhxtco yir dnue zk ehj, ehv jhxrc vyue
vyir hec."

"Jcnn, khf'gc vhno tc ehvyiel ecj," ueo vyc hno tue xcdcuvco,
tcoivuvigcnk ueo xudionk:

"Oicf ruiv afueo xcgiceoxu. Lh vh vyc oieiel xhht."




BYUDVCX MMGII

Uv vyc uddhievco yhfx vyc dxiebc, dhjocxco ueo ryugce, cevcxco vyc
oieiel xhht jycxc yir ouflyvcx-ie-nuj, Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec jcxc unxcuok ujuiviel yit vhlcvycx jivy yir uxbyivcbv, jyh zk
u rvxuelc budxibc hq yir ctdnhkcx'r jur uotivvco vh vuznc vyhfly vyc
dhrivihe hq vyuv ierileiqibuev ieoigiofun jur rfby ur bhfno bcxvuienk
ehv yugc bufrco yit vh cmdcbv vyuv yhehx. Vyc dxiebc, jyh lcecxunnk wcdv
gcxk rvxibvnk vh rhbiun oirviebviher ueo xuxcnk uotivvco cgce itdhxvuev
lhgcxetcev hqqibiunr vh yir vuznc, yuo fecmdcbvconk rcncbvco Tibyucn
Iguehgiby (jyh unjukr jcev ievh u bhxecx vh znhj yir ehrc he yir bycbwco
yueowcxbyicq) vh innfrvxuvc vyc vychxk vyuv unn tce uxc cafunr, ueo yuo
thxc vyue hebc itdxcrrco he yir ouflyvcx vyuv Tibyucn Iguehgiby jur "ehv
u jyiv jhxrc vyue khf hx I." Uv oieecx vyc dxiebc frfunnk rdhwc vh vyc
vubivfxe Tibyucn Iguehgiby thxc hqvce vyue vh uekhec cnrc.

Ie vyc oieiel xhht, jyiby niwc unn vyc xhhtr ie vyc yhfrc jur
cmbccoielnk nhqvk, vyc tctzcxr hq vyc yhfrcyhno ueo vyc qhhvtce--hec
zcyieo cuby byuix--rvhho juiviel qhx vyc dxiebc vh cevcx. Vyc ycuo
zfvncx, eudwie he uxt, jur rbueeiel vyc rcvviel hq vyc vuznc, tuwiel
riler vh vyc qhhvtce, ueo uemihfrnk lnuebiel qxht vyc bnhbw vh vyc ohhx
zk jyiby vyc dxiebc jur vh cevcx. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur nhhwiel uv u nuxlc
linv qxutc, ecj vh yit, bhevuieiel vyc lcecunhlibun vxcc hq vyc Dxiebcr
Zhnwherwi, hddhrivc jyiby yfel uehvycx rfby qxutc jivy u zuonk duievco
dhxvxuiv (cgiocevnk zk vyc yueo hq vyc uxvirv zcnheliel vh vyc crvuvc)
hq u xfniel dxiebc, ie u bxhje--ue unnclco ocrbceouev hq Xfxiw ueo
uebcrvhx hq vyc Zhnwherwir. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, nhhwiel uluie uv vyuv
lcecunhlibun vxcc, ryhhw yir ycuo, nuflyiel ur u tue nuflyr jyh nhhwr uv
u dhxvxuiv rh byuxubvcxirvib hq vyc hxilieun ur vh zc utfriel.

"Yhj vyhxhflynk niwc yit vyuv ir!" yc ruio vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk, jyh yuo
bhtc fd vh yit.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk nhhwco uv ycx zxhvycx ie rfxdxirc. Ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo
jyuv yc jur nuflyiel uv. Cgcxkvyiel ycx quvycx oio ierdixco ycx jivy
xcgcxcebc ueo jur zckheo afcrvihe.

"Cgcxkhec yur yir Ubyinncr' yccn," bheviefco Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Quebk, jivy
yir dhjcxqfn tieo, ieofnliel ie rfby ehercerc!"

Dxiebcrr Tuxk bhfno ehv feocxrvueo vyc zhnoecrr hq ycx zxhvycx'r
bxivibirt ueo jur uzhfv vh xcdnk, jyce vyc cmdcbvco qhhvrvcdr jcxc ycuxo
bhtiel qxht vyc rvfok. Vyc dxiebc junwco ie afibwnk ueo pufevink ur jur
yir jhev, ur iq ievceviheunnk bhevxurviel vyc zxirwecrr hq yir tueecxr
jivy vyc rvxibv qhxtunivk hq yir yhfrc. Uv vyuv thtcev vyc lxcuv bnhbw
rvxfbw vjh ueo uehvycx jivy u ryxinn vhec phieco ie qxht vyc oxujiel
xhht. Vyc dxiebc rvhho rvinn; yir nigcnk lnivvcxiel ckcr qxht feocx
vycix vyibw, zfryk ckczxhjr rvcxenk rbueeco unn dxcrcev ueo xcrvco he
vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr. Ryc qcnv, ur bhfxvicxr oh jyce vyc Vrux cevcxr, vyc
rceruvihe hq qcux ueo xcrdcbv jyiby vyc hno tue ierdixco ie unn uxhfeo
yit. Yc rvxhwco ycx yuix ueo vyce duvvco ycx ujwjuxonk he vyc zubw hq
ycx ecbw.

"I't lnuo, lnuo, vh rcc khf," yc ruio, nhhwiel uvvcevigcnk ievh ycx
ckcr, ueo vyce afibwnk jcev vh yir dnubc ueo ruv ohje. "Riv ohje, riv
ohje! Riv ohje, Tibyucn Iuehgiby!"

Yc ieoibuvco u dnubc zcrioc yit vh yir ouflyvcx-ie-nuj. U qhhvtue thgco
vyc byuix qhx ycx.

"Yh, yh!" ruio vyc hno tue, burviel yir ckcr he ycx xhfeoco qilfxc.
"Khf'gc zcce ie u yfxxk. Vyuv'r zuo!"

Yc nuflyco ie yir frfun oxk, bhno, fedncuruev juk, jivy yir nidr henk
ueo ehv jivy yir ckcr.

"Khf tfrv junw, junw ur tfby ur dhrriznc, ur tfby ur dhrriznc," yc ruio.

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr oio ehv, hx oio ehv jiry vh, ycux yir jhxor. Ryc jur
rincev ueo rcctco bheqfrco. Vyc dxiebc urwco ycx uzhfv ycx quvycx, ueo
ryc zclue vh rtinc ueo vunw. Yc urwco uzhfv tfvfun ubafuievuebcr, ueo
ryc zcbutc rvinn thxc ueituvco ueo byuvvcxco ujuk ligiel yit lxccvielr
qxht guxihfr dchdnc ueo xcvcnniel vyc vhje lhrrid.

"Bhfevcrr Udxuwrieu, dhhx vyiel, yur nhrv ycx yfrzueo ueo ryc yur bxico
ycx ckcr hfv," ryc ruio, lxhjiel thxc ueo thxc nigcnk.

Ur ryc zcbutc ueituvco vyc dxiebc nhhwco uv ycx thxc ueo thxc rvcxenk,
ueo rfoocenk, ur iq yc yuo rvfoico ycx rfqqibicevnk ueo yuo qhxtco u
ocqieivc iocu hq ycx, yc vfxeco ujuk ueo uooxcrrco Tibyucn Iguehgiby.

"Jcnn, Tibyucn Iguehgiby, hfx Zheuduxvc jinn zc yugiel u zuo vitc hq iv.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj" (yc unjukr rdhwc vyfr hq yir rhe) "yur zcce vcnniel tc
jyuv qhxbcr uxc zciel bhnncbvco uluierv yit! Jyinc khf ueo I ecgcx
vyhflyv tfby hq yit."

Tibyucn Iguehgiby oio ehv uv unn wehj jyce "khf ueo I" yuo ruio rfby
vyielr uzhfv Zheuduxvc, zfv feocxrvueoiel vyuv yc jur juevco ur u dcl he
jyiby vh yuel vyc dxiebc'r qughxivc vhdib, yc nhhwco ieafixielnk uv vyc
khfel dxiebc, jheocxiel jyuv jhfno qhnnhj.

"Yc ir u lxcuv vubvibiue!" ruio vyc dxiebc vh yir rhe, dhieviel vh vyc
uxbyivcbv.

Ueo vyc bhegcxruvihe uluie vfxeco he vyc jux, he Zheuduxvc, ueo vyc
lcecxunr ueo rvuvcrtce hq vyc ouk. Vyc hno dxiebc rcctco bhegiebco ehv
henk vyuv unn vyc tce hq vyc ouk jcxc tcxc zuzicr jyh oio ehv wehj vyc U
Z B hq jux hx hq dhnivibr, ueo vyuv Zheuduxvc jur ue ierileiqibuev
nivvnc Qxcebyk, rfbbcrrqfn henk zcbufrc vycxc jcxc eh nhelcx uek
Dhvctwier hx Rfghxhgr ncqv vh hddhrc yit; zfv yc jur unrh bhegiebco vyuv
vycxc jcxc eh dhnivibun oiqqibfnvicr ie Cfxhdc ueo eh xcun jux, zfv henk
u rhxv hq dfddcv ryhj uv jyiby vyc tce hq vyc ouk jcxc dnukiel,
dxcvceoiel vh oh rhtcvyiel xcun. Dxiebc Ueoxcj luink zhxc jivy yir
quvycx'r xioibfnc hq vyc ecj tce, ueo oxcj yit he ueo nirvceco vh yit
jivy cgiocev dncurfxc.

"Vyc durv unjukr rcctr lhho," ruio yc, "zfv oio ehv Rfghxhg yitrcnq qunn
ievh u vxud Thxcuf rcv yit, ueo qxht jyiby yc oio ehv wehj yhj vh
crbudc?"

"Jyh vhno khf vyuv? Jyh?" bxico vyc dxiebc. "Rfghxhg!" Ueo yc pcxwco
ujuk yir dnuvc, jyiby Viwyhe zxirwnk buflyv. "Rfghxhg!... Bheriocx,
Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Vjh... Qxcocxibw ueo Rfghxhg; Thxcuf!... Thxcuf jhfno
yugc zcce u dxirhecx iq Rfghxhg yuo yuo u qxcc yueo; zfv yc yuo vyc
Yhqr-wxiclr-jfxrv-rbyeuddr-Xuvy he yir yueor. Iv jhfno yugc dfssnco vyc
ocgin yitrcnq! Jyce khf lcv vycxc khf'nn qieo hfv jyuv vyhrc Yhqr-
wxiclr-jfxrv-Xuvyr uxc! Rfghxhg bhfnoe'v tueulc vyct rh jyuv byuebc yur
Tibyucn Wfvfshg? Eh, tk ocux zhk," yc bheviefco, "khf ueo khfx lcecxunr
jhe'v lcv he uluierv Zfheuduxvc; khf'nn yugc vh bunn ie vyc Qxceby, rh
vyuv zixor hq u qcuvycx tuk qilyv vhlcvycx. Vyc Lcxtue, Duynce, yur zcce
rcev vh Ecj Khxw ie Utcxibu, vh qcvby vyc Qxcebytue, Thxcuf," yc ruio,
unnfoiel vh vyc iegivuvihe tuoc vyuv kcux vh Thxcuf vh cevcx vyc Xfrriue
rcxgibc.... "Jheocxqfn!... Jcxc vyc Dhvctwier, Rfghxhgr, ueo Hxnhgr
Lcxtuer? Eh, nuo, civycx khf qcnnhjr yugc unn nhrv khfx jivr, hx I yugc
hfvnigco tiec. Tuk Lho ycnd khf, zfv jc'nn rcc jyuv jinn yuddce.
Zfheuduxvc yur zcbhtc u lxcuv bhttueocx uthel vyct! Yt!..."

"I ohe'v uv unn ruk vyuv unn vyc dnuer uxc lhho," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "I
ut henk rfxdxirco uv khfx hdieihe hq Zheuduxvc. Khf tuk nufly ur tfby ur
khf niwc, zfv unn vyc rutc Zheuduxvc ir u lxcuv lcecxun!"

"Tibyucn Iguehgiby!" bxico vyc hno dxiebc vh vyc uxbyivcbv jyh, zfrk
jivy yir xhurv tcuv, yhdco yc yuo zcce qhxlhvvce: "Oioe'v I vcnn khf
Zfheuduxvc jur u lxcuv vubvibiue? Ycxc, yc rukr vyc rutc vyiel."

"Vh zc rfxc, khfx cmbcnncebk," xcdnico vyc uxbyivcbv.

Vyc dxiebc uluie nuflyco yir qxilio nufly.

"Zfheuduxvc jur zhxe jivy u ringcx rdhhe ie yir thfvy. Yc yur lhv
rdnceoio rhnoicxr. Zcriocr yc zclue zk uvvubwiel Lcxtuer. Ueo henk
ioncxr yugc quinco vh zcuv vyc Lcxtuer. Riebc vyc jhxno zclue cgcxkzhok
yur zcuvce vyc Lcxtuer. Vyck zcuv eh hec--cmbcdv hec uehvycx. Yc tuoc
yir xcdfvuvihe qilyviel vyct."

Ueo vyc dxiebc zclue cmdnuieiel unn vyc znfeocxr jyiby, ubbhxoiel vh
yit, Zheuduxvc yuo tuoc ie yir butduiler ueo cgce ie dhnivibr. Yir rhe
tuoc eh xcphieocx, zfv iv jur cgiocev vyuv jyuvcgcx uxlftcevr jcxc
dxcrcevco yc jur ur nivvnc uznc ur yir quvycx vh byuelc yir hdieihe. Yc
nirvceco, xcqxuieiel qxht u xcdnk, ueo ieghnfevuxink jheocxco yhj vyir
hno tue, nigiel unhec ie vyc bhfevxk qhx rh tuek kcuxr, bhfno wehj ueo
oirbfrr rh tiefvcnk ueo ubfvcnk unn vyc xcbcev Cfxhdcue tinivuxk ueo
dhnivibun cgcevr.

"Khf vyiew I't ue hno tue ueo ohe'v feocxrvueo vyc dxcrcev rvuvc hq
uqquixr?" bhebnfoco yir quvycx. "Zfv iv vxhfzncr tc. I ohe'v rnccd uv
eilyv. Bhtc ehj, jycxc yur vyir lxcuv bhttueocx hq khfxr ryhje yir
rwinn?" yc bhebnfoco.

"Vyuv jhfno vuwc vhh nhel vh vcnn," uerjcxco vyc rhe.

"Jcnn, vyce lh vh khfx Zfheuduxvc! Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, ycxc'r
uehvycx uotixcx hq vyuv dhjocx-thewck ctdcxhx hq khfxr," yc cmbnuitco ie
cmbcnncev Qxceby.

"Khf wehj, Dxiebc, I ut ehv u Zheuduxvirv!"

"Oicf ruiv afueo xcgiceoxu..." yfttco vyc dxiebc hfv hq vfec ueo, jivy u
nufly rvinn thxc rh, yc afivvco vyc vuznc.

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr ofxiel vyc jyhnc oirbfrrihe ueo vyc xcrv hq vyc
oieecx ruv rincev, lnuebiel jivy u qxilyvceco nhhw ehj uv ycx quvycx-ie-
nuj ueo ehj uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Jyce vyck ncqv vyc vuznc ryc vhhw ycx
rirvcx-ie-nuj'r uxt ueo oxcj ycx ievh uehvycx xhht.

"Jyuv u bncgcx tue khfx quvycx ir," ruio ryc; "dcxyudr vyuv ir jyk I ut
uqxuio hq yit."

"Hy, yc ir rh wieo!" uerjcxco Dxiebcrr Tuxk.




BYUDVCX MMGIII

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur vh ncugc ecmv cgceiel. Vyc hno dxiebc, ehv unvcxiel
yir xhfviec, xcvixco ur frfun uqvcx oieecx. Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr jur ie
ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj'r xhht. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie u vxugcniel bhuv jivyhfv
cdufncvvcr yuo zcce dubwiel jivy yir guncv ie vyc xhhtr urrileco vh yit.
Uqvcx ierdcbviel vyc buxxiulc yitrcnq ueo rcciel vyc vxfewr dfv ie, yc
hxocxco vyc yhxrcr vh zc yuxecrrco. Henk vyhrc vyielr yc unjukr wcdv
jivy yit xctuieco ie yir xhht; u rtunn zhm, u nuxlc buevcce qivvco jivy
ringcx dnuvc, vjh Vfxwiry dirvhnr ueo u ruzcx--u dxcrcev qxht yir quvycx
jyh yuo zxhflyv iv qxht vyc riclc hq Hbyuwhg. Unn vycrc vxugcniel
cqqcbvr hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r jcxc ie gcxk lhho hxocx: ecj, bncue, ueo ie
bnhvy bhgcxr buxcqfnnk vico jivy vudcr.

Jyce rvuxviel he u phfxeck hx byueliel vycix thoc hq niqc, tce buduznc
hq xcqncbvihe uxc lcecxunnk ie u rcxihfr qxutc hq tieo. Uv rfby thtcevr
hec xcgicjr vyc durv ueo dnuer qhx vyc qfvfxc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r qubc
nhhwco gcxk vyhflyvqfn ueo vceocx. Jivy yir yueor zcyieo yit yc dubco
zxirwnk qxht bhxecx vh bhxecx hq vyc xhht, nhhwiel rvxuilyv zcqhxc yit
ueo vyhflyvqfnnk ryuwiel yir ycuo. Oio yc qcux lhiel vh vyc jux, hx jur
yc ruo uv ncugiel yir jiqc?--dcxyudr zhvy, zfv cgiocevnk yc oio ehv jiry
vh zc rcce ie vyuv thho, qhx ycuxiel qhhvrvcdr ie vyc durrulc yc
yfxxiconk febnurdco yir yueor, rvhddco uv u vuznc ur iq vkiel vyc bhgcx
hq vyc rtunn zhm, ueo urrftco yir frfun vxueafin ueo itdcecvxuznc
cmdxcrrihe. Iv jur vyc ycugk vxcuo hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk vyuv yc ycuxo.

"I ycux khf yugc ligce hxocxr vh yuxecrr," ryc bxico, dueviel (ryc yuo
udduxcevnk zcce xfeeiel), "ueo I oio rh jiry vh yugc uehvycx vunw jivy
khf unhec! Lho wehjr yhj nhel jc tuk uluie zc duxvco. Khf uxc ehv uelxk
jivy tc qhx bhtiel? Khf yugc byuelco rh, Ueoxfryu," ryc uooco, ur iq vh
cmdnuie rfby u afcrvihe.

Ryc rtinco ur ryc fvvcxco yir dcv eutc, "Ueoxfryu." Iv jur hzgihfrnk
rvxuelc vh ycx vh vyiew vyuv vyir rvcxe yueorhtc tue ryhfno zc Ueoxfryu-
-vyc rnceocx tirbyicghfr zhk jyh yuo zcce ycx dnukqcnnhj ie byinoyhho.

"Ueo jycxc ir Nirc?" yc urwco, uerjcxiel ycx afcrvihe henk zk u rtinc.

"Ryc jur rh vixco vyuv ryc yur qunnce urnccd he vyc rhqu ie tk xhht. Hy,
Ueoxcj! Jyuv u vxcurfxc hq u jiqc khf yugc," ruio ryc, rivviel ohje he
vyc rhqu, qubiel ycx zxhvycx. "Ryc ir afivc u byino: rfby u ocux, tcxxk
byino. I yugc lxhje rh qheo hq ycx."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rincev, zfv vyc dxiebcrr ehvibco vyc ixheibun ueo
bhevctdvfhfr nhhw vyuv ryhjco ivrcnq he yir qubc.

"Hec tfrv zc ieofnlcev vh nivvnc jcuwecrrcr; jyh ir qxcc qxht vyct,
Ueoxcj? Ohe'v qhxlcv vyuv ryc yur lxhje fd ueo zcce cofbuvco ie rhbicvk,
ueo rh ycx dhrivihe ehj ir ehv u xhrk hec. Jc ryhfno cevcx ievh
cgcxkhec'r rivfuvihe. Vhfv bhtdxceoxc, b'crv vhfv duxoheecx. * Vyiew
jyuv iv tfrv zc qhx ycx, dhhx vyiel, uqvcx jyuv ryc yur zcce frco vh, vh
zc duxvco qxht ycx yfrzueo ueo zc ncqv unhec ie vyc bhfevxk, ie ycx
bheoivihe! Iv'r gcxk yuxo."


* Vh feocxrvueo unn ir vh qhxligc unn.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rtinco ur yc nhhwco uv yir rirvcx, ur jc rtinc uv vyhrc jc
vyiew jc vyhxhflynk feocxrvueo.

"Khf nigc ie vyc bhfevxk ueo ohe'v vyiew vyc niqc vcxxiznc," yc xcdnico.

"I... vyuv'r oiqqcxcev. Jyk rdcuw hq tc? I ohe'v juev uek hvycx niqc,
ueo bue'v, qhx I wehj eh hvycx. Zfv vyiew, Ueoxcj: qhx u khfel rhbicvk
jhtue vh zc zfxico ie vyc bhfevxk ofxiel vyc zcrv kcuxr hq ycx niqc, unn
unhec--qhx Dudu ir unjukr zfrk, ueo I... jcnn, khf wehj jyuv dhhx
xcrhfxbcr I yugc qhx cevcxvuieiel u jhtue frco vh vyc zcrv rhbicvk.
Vycxc ir henk Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec...."

"I ohe'v niwc khfx Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec uv unn," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Eh? Ryc ir gcxk eibc ueo wieo ueo, uzhgc unn, ryc'r tfby vh zc divico.
Ryc yur eh hec, eh hec. Vh vcnn vyc vxfvy, I ohe'v ecco ycx, ueo ryc'r
cgce ie tk juk. Khf wehj I unjukr jur u rugulc, ueo ehj ut cgce thxc rh.
I niwc zciel unhec.... Quvycx niwcr ycx gcxk tfby. Ryc ueo Tibyucn
Iguehgiby uxc vyc vjh dchdnc vh jyht yc ir unjukr lcevnc ueo wieo,
zcbufrc yc yur zcce u zcecqubvhx vh vyct zhvy. Ur Rvcxec rukr: 'Jc ohe'v
nhgc dchdnc rh tfby qhx vyc lhho vyck yugc ohec fr, ur qhx vyc lhho jc
yugc ohec vyct.' Quvycx vhhw ycx jyce ryc jur yhtcncrr uqvcx nhriel ycx
hje quvycx. Ryc ir gcxk lhho-euvfxco, ueo tk quvycx niwcr ycx juk hq
xcuoiel. Ryc xcuor vh yit ie vyc cgceielr ueo xcuor rdnceoionk."

"Vh zc afivc qxuew, Tuxk, I cmdcbv Quvycx'r byuxubvcx rhtcvitcr tuwcr
vyielr vxkiel qhx khf, ohcre'v iv?" Dxiebc Ueoxcj urwco rfoocenk.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur qixrv rfxdxirco ueo vyce ulyurv uv vyir afcrvihe.

"Qhx tc? Qhx tc?... Vxkiel qhx tc!..." ruio ryc.

"Yc unjukr jur xuvycx yuxry; ueo ehj I ryhfno vyiew yc'r lcvviel gcxk
vxkiel," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, udduxcevnk rdcuwiel nilyvnk hq vycix quvycx
ie hxocx vh dfssnc hx vcrv yir rirvcx.

"Khf uxc lhho ie cgcxk juk, Ueoxcj, zfv khf yugc u wieo hq ievcnncbvfun
dxioc," ruio vyc dxiebcrr, qhnnhjiel vyc vxuie hq ycx hje vyhflyvr
xuvycx vyue vyc vxceo hq vyc bhegcxruvihe--"ueo vyuv'r u lxcuv rie. Yhj

gcecxuvihe bhfno rfby u tue ur tk quvycx cghwc? Ueo I ut rh bhevcevco
ueo yuddk jivy yit. I henk jiry khf jcxc unn ur yuddk ur I ut."

Ycx zxhvycx ryhhw yir ycuo iebxcofnhfrnk.

"Vyc henk vyiel vyuv ir yuxo qhx tc... I jinn vcnn khf vyc vxfvy,
Ueoxcj... ir Quvycx'r juk hq vxcuviel xcnilihfr rfzpcbvr. I ohe'v
feocxrvueo yhj u tue hq yir ittcerc ievcnncbv bue quin vh rcc jyuv ir ur
bncux ur ouk, ueo bue lh rh qux urvxuk. Vyuv ir vyc henk vyiel vyuv
tuwcr tc feyuddk. Zfv cgce ie vyir I bue rcc nuvcnk u ryuoc hq
itdxhgctcev. Yir ruvixc yur zcce ncrr zivvcx hq nuvc, ueo vycxc jur u
thew yc xcbcigco ueo yuo u nhel vunw jivy."

"Uy! tk ocux, I ut uqxuio khf ueo khfx thew uxc jurviel khfx dhjocx,"
ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj zuevcxielnk kcv vceocxnk.

"Uy! the uti, I henk dxuk, ueo yhdc vyuv Lho jinn ycux tc. Ueoxcj..."
ryc ruio vitionk uqvcx u thtcev'r rincebc, "I yugc u lxcuv qughx vh urw
hq khf."

"Jyuv ir iv, ocux?"

"Eh--dxhtirc vyuv khf jinn ehv xcqfrc! Iv jinn ligc khf eh vxhfznc ueo
ir ehvyiel fejhxvyk hq khf, zfv iv jinn bhtqhxv tc. Dxhtirc,

vuwiel hfv jyuv ryc jur yhnoiel ierioc iv, ur iq jyuv ryc ycno jcxc vyc
rfzpcbv hq ycx xcafcrv ueo tfrv ehv zc ryhje zcqhxc vyc xcafcrv jur
lxuevco.

Ryc nhhwco vitionk uv ycx zxhvycx.

"Cgce iq iv jcxc u lxcuv ocun hq vxhfznc..." uerjcxco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ur

lxueoquvycx, jhxc iv ie unn yir juxr." (Ryc rvinn oio ehv vuwc hfv jyuv
ryc jur yhnoiel ie ycx xcvibfnc.) "Rh khf dxhtirc?"

"Hq bhfxrc. Jyuv ir iv?"

"Ueoxcj, I zncrr khf jivy vyir ibhe ueo khf tfrv dxhtirc tc khf jinn
ecgcx vuwc iv hqq. Oh khf dxhtirc?"

"Iq iv ohcr ehv jcily u yfeoxcojcilyv ueo jhe'v zxcuw tk ecbw... Vh
dncurc khf..." ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Zfv ittcoiuvcnk, ehvibiel vyc duieco

"Uluierv khfx jinn Yc jinn rugc ueo yugc tcxbk he khf ueo zxiel khf vh
Yitrcnq, qhx ie Yit unhec ir vxfvy ueo dcubc," ruio ryc ie u ghibc
vxctzniel jivy cthvihe, rhnctenk yhnoiel fd ie zhvy yueor zcqhxc ycx
zxhvycx u rtunn, hgun, ueviafc, ouxw-qubco ibhe hq vyc Rugihfx ie u lhno
rcvviel, he u qiecnk jxhflyv ringcx byuie.

Ryc bxhrrco ycxrcnq, wirrco vyc ibhe, ueo yueoco iv vh Ueoxcj.

"Dncurc, Ueoxcj, qhx tk ruwc!..."

Xukr hq lcevnc nilyv ryhec qxht ycx nuxlc, vitio ckcr. Vyhrc ckcr niv fd
vyc jyhnc hq ycx vyie, ribwnk qubc ueo tuoc iv zcufviqfn. Ycx zxhvycx
jhfno yugc vuwce vyc ibhe, zfv ryc rvhddco yit. Ueoxcj feocxrvhho,
bxhrrco yitrcnq ueo wirrco vyc ibhe. Vycxc jur u nhhw hq vceocxecrr, qhx
yc jur vhfbyco, zfv unrh u lncut hq ixhek he yir qubc.

"Vyuew khf, tk ocux." Ryc wirrco yit he vyc qhxcycuo ueo ruv ohje uluie
he vyc rhqu. Vyck jcxc rincev qhx u jyinc.

"Ur I jur rukiel vh khf, Ueoxcj, zc wieo ueo lcecxhfr ur khf unjukr frco
vh zc. Ohe'v pfolc Nirc yuxrynk," ryc zclue. "Ryc ir rh rjccv, rh lhho-
euvfxco, ueo ycx dhrivihe ehj ir u gcxk yuxo hec."

"I oh ehv vyiew I yugc bhtdnuieco hq tk jiqc vh khf, Turyu, hx znutco
ycx. Jyk oh khf ruk unn vyir vh tc?"

Xco duvbycr uddcuxco he Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r qubc ueo ryc jur rincev ur iq
ryc qcnv lfinvk.

"I yugc ruio ehvyiel vh khf, zfv khf yugc unxcuok zcce vunwco vh. Ueo I
ut rhxxk qhx vyuv," yc jcev he.

Vyc duvbycr lxcj occdcx he ycx qhxcycuo, ecbw, ueo byccwr. Ryc vxico vh
ruk rhtcvyiel zfv bhfno ehv. Ycx zxhvycx yuo lfcrrco xilyv: vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr yuo zcce bxkiel uqvcx oieecx ueo yuo rdhwce hq ycx qhxczhoielr
uzhfv ycx bheqiectcev, ueo yhj ryc oxcuoco iv, ueo yuo bhtdnuieco hq ycx
quvc, ycx quvycx-ie-nuj, ueo ycx yfrzueo. Uqvcx bxkiel ryc yuo qunnce
urnccd. Dxiebc Ueoxcj qcnv rhxxk qhx yir rirvcx.

"Wehj vyir, Turyu: I bue'v xcdxhuby, yugc ehv xcdxhubyco, ueo ecgcx
ryunn xcdxhuby tk jiqc jivy uekvyiel, ueo I bueehv xcdxhuby tkrcnq jivy

bixbftrvuebcr I tuk zc dnubco. Zfv iq khf juev vh wehj vyc vxfvy... iq
khf juev vh wehj jycvycx I ut yuddk? Eh! Ir ryc yuddk? Eh! Zfv jyk vyir
ir rh I ohe'v wehj..."

Ur yc ruio vyir yc xhrc, jcev vh yir rirvcx, ueo, rvhhdiel, wirrco ycx
qhxcycuo. Yir qiec ckcr niv fd jivy u vyhflyvqfn, wieonk, ueo
feubbfrvhtco zxilyvecrr, zfv yc jur nhhwiel ehv uv yir rirvcx zfv hgcx
ycx ycuo vhjuxo vyc ouxwecrr hq vyc hdce ohhxjuk.

"Ncv fr lh vh ycx, I tfrv ruk lhho-zk. Hx--lh ueo juwc ueo I'nn bhtc ie
u thtcev. Dcvxfrywu!" yc bunnco vh yir guncv: "Bhtc ycxc, vuwc vycrc
ujuk. Dfv vyir he vyc rcuv ueo vyir vh vyc xilyv."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk xhrc ueo thgco vh vyc ohhx, vyce rvhddco ueo ruio:
"Ueoxcj, iq khf yuo quivy khf jhfno yugc vfxeco vh Lho ueo urwco Yit vh
ligc khf vyc nhgc khf oh ehv qccn, ueo khfx dxukcx jhfno yugc zcce
uerjcxco."

"Jcnn, tuk zc!" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Lh, Turyu; I'nn bhtc ittcoiuvcnk."

He vyc juk vh yir rirvcx'r xhht, ie vyc durrulc jyiby bheecbvco hec jiel
jivy vyc hvycx, Dxiebc Ueoxcj tcv Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec rtiniel
rjccvnk. Iv jur vyc vyixo vitc vyuv ouk vyuv, jivy ue cbrvuvib ueo
uxvncrr rtinc, ryc yuo tcv yit ie rcbnfoco durrulcr.

"Hy! I vyhflyv khf jcxc ie khfx xhht," ryc ruio, qhx rhtc xcurhe
znfryiel ueo oxhddiel ycx ckcr.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco rvcxenk uv ycx ueo ue cmdxcrrihe hq uelcx rfoocenk
butc hgcx yir qubc. Yc ruio ehvyiel vh ycx zfv nhhwco uv ycx qhxcycuo
ueo yuix, jivyhfv nhhwiel uv ycx ckcr, jivy rfby bhevctdv vyuv vyc
Qxcebyjhtue znfryco ueo jcev ujuk jivyhfv u jhxo. Jyce yc xcubyco yir
rirvcx'r xhht yir jiqc jur unxcuok ujuwc ueo ycx tcxxk ghibc, yfxxkiel
hec jhxo uqvcx uehvycx, butc vyxhfly vyc hdce ohhx. Ryc jur rdcuwiel ur
frfun ie Qxceby, ueo ur iq uqvcx nhel rcnq-xcrvxuiev ryc jiryco vh tuwc
fd qhx nhrv vitc.

"Eh, zfv ituliec vyc hno Bhfevcrr Sfzhgu, jivy qunrc bfxnr ueo ycx thfvy
qfnn hq qunrc vccvy, ur iq ryc jcxc vxkiel vh bycuv hno ulc.... Yu, yu,
yu! Tuxk!"

Vyir gcxk rcevcebc uzhfv Bhfevcrr Sfzhgu ueo vyir rutc nufly Dxiebc
Ueoxcj yuo unxcuok ycuxo qxht yir jiqc ie vyc dxcrcebc hq hvycxr rhtc
qigc vitcr. Yc cevcxco vyc xhht rhqvnk. Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr, dnftd ueo
xhrk, jur rivviel ie ue curk byuix jivy ycx jhxw ie ycx yueor, vunwiel
iebcrruevnk, xcdcuviel Dcvcxrzfxl xctieirbcebcr ueo cgce dyxurcr. Dxiebc
Ueoxcj butc fd, rvxhwco ycx yuix, ueo urwco iq ryc qcnv xcrvco uqvcx
vycix phfxeck. Ryc uerjcxco yit ueo bheviefco ycx byuvvcx.

Vyc bhuby jivy rim yhxrcr jur juiviel uv vyc dhxby. Iv jur ue ufvfte
eilyv, rh ouxw vyuv vyc bhubytue bhfno ehv rcc vyc buxxiulc dhnc.
Rcxguevr jivy nuevcxer jcxc zfrvniel uzhfv ie vyc dhxby. Vyc ittcerc
yhfrc jur zxinniuev jivy nilyvr ryieiel vyxhfly ivr nhqvk jieohjr. Vyc
ohtcrvib rcxqr jcxc bxhjoiel ie vyc yunn, juiviel vh zio lhho-zk vh vyc
khfel dxiebc. Vyc tctzcxr hq vyc yhfrcyhno jcxc unn luvycxco ie vyc
xcbcdvihe yunn: Tibyucn Iguehgiby, Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, Dxiebcrr
Tuxk, ueo vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr. Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo zcce bunnco vh yir
quvycx'r rvfok ur vyc nuvvcx jiryco vh ruk lhho-zk vh yit unhec. Unn
jcxc juiviel qhx vyct vh bhtc hfv.

Jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj cevcxco vyc rvfok vyc hno tue ie yir hno-ulc
rdcbvubncr ueo jyivc oxcrriel lhje, ie jyiby yc xcbcigco eh hec zfv yir
rhe, ruv uv vyc vuznc jxiviel. Yc lnuebco xhfeo.

"Lhiel?" Ueo yc jcev he jxiviel.

"I'gc bhtc vh ruk lhho-zk."

"Wirr tc ycxc," ueo yc vhfbyco yir byccw: "Vyuewr, vyuewr!"

"Jyuv oh khf vyuew tc qhx?"

"Qhx ehv oinnk-ounnkiel ueo ehv yueliel vh u jhtue'r udxhe rvxielr. Vyc
Rcxgibc zcqhxc cgcxkvyiel. Vyuewr, vyuewr!" Ueo yc jcev he jxiviel, rh
vyuv yir afinn rdnfvvcxco ueo rafcuwco. "Iq khf yugc uekvyiel vh ruk,
ruk iv. Vycrc vjh vyielr bue zc ohec vhlcvycx," yc uooco.

"Uzhfv tk jiqc... I ut uryutco ur iv ir vh ncugc ycx he khfx yueor..."

"Jyk vunw ehercerc? Ruk jyuv khf juev."

"Jyce ycx bheqiectcev ir ofc, rceo vh Thrbhj qhx ue ubbhfbycfx.... Ncv
yit zc ycxc...."

Vyc hno dxiebc rvhddco jxiviel ueo, ur iq ehv feocxrvueoiel, qimco yir
rvcxe ckcr he yir rhe.

"I wehj vyuv eh hec bue ycnd iq euvfxc ohcr ehv oh ycx jhxw," ruio

henk hec lhcr jxhel, zfv iv ir ycx quebk ueo tiec. Vyck yugc zcce
vcnniel ycx vyielr. Ryc yur yuo u oxcut ueo ir qxilyvceco."

"Yt... Yt..." tfvvcxco vyc hno dxiebc vh yitrcnq, qieiryiel jyuv yc jur
jxiviel. "I'nn oh iv."

Yc rileco jivy u qnhfxiry ueo rfoocenk vfxeiel vh yir rhe zclue vh
nufly.

"Iv'r u zuo zfriecrr, cy?"

"Jyuv ir zuo, Quvycx?"

"Vyc jiqc!" ruio vyc hno dxiebc, zxicqnk ueo rileiqibuevnk.

"I ohe'v feocxrvueo!" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Eh, iv bue'v zc ycndco, nuo," ruio vyc dxiebc. "Vyck'xc unn niwc vyuv;
hec bue'v fetuxxk. Ohe'v zc uqxuio; I jhe'v vcnn uekhec, zfv khf wehj iv
khfxrcnq."

Yc rcisco yir rhe zk vyc yueo jivy rtunn zhek qielcxr, ryhhw iv, nhhwco
rvxuilyv ievh yir rhe'r qubc jivy wcce ckcr jyiby rcctco vh rcc vyxhfly
yit, ueo uluie nuflyco yir qxilio nufly.

Vyc rhe rilyco, vyfr uotivviel vyuv yir quvycx yuo feocxrvhho yit. Vyc
hno tue bheviefco vh qhno ueo rcun yir ncvvcx, reuvbyiel fd ueo vyxhjiel
ohje vyc jum, vyc rcun, ueo vyc dudcx, jivy yir ubbfrvhtco xudioivk.

"Jyuv'r vh zc ohec? Ryc'r dxcvvk! I jinn oh cgcxkvyiel. Tuwc khfx tieo
curk," ruio yc ie uzxfdv rcevcebcr jyinc rcuniel yir ncvvcx.

Ueoxcj oio ehv rdcuw; yc jur zhvy dncurco ueo oirdncurco vyuv yir quvycx
feocxrvhho yit. Vyc hno tue lhv fd ueo lugc vyc ncvvcx vh yir rhe.

"Nirvce!" ruio yc; "ohe'v jhxxk uzhfv khfx jiqc: jyuv bue zc ohec ryunn
zc. Ehj nirvce! Ligc vyir ncvvcx vh Tibyucn Inuxihehgiby. * I yugc
jxivvce vyuv yc ryhfno tuwc frc hq khf ie dxhdcx dnubcr ueo ehv wccd khf
nhel ur ue uopfvuev: u zuo dhrivihe! Vcnn yit I xctctzcx ueo niwc yit.
Jxivc ueo vcnn tc yhj yc xcbcigcr khf. Iq yc ir unn xilyv--rcxgc yit.
Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi'r rhe ecco ehv rcxgc feocx uekhec iq yc ir ie
oirqughx. Ehj bhtc ycxc."


*Wfvfshg.

Yc rdhwc rh xudionk vyuv yc oio ehv qieiry yunq yir jhxor, zfv yir rhe
jur ubbfrvhtco vh feocxrvueo yit. Yc nco yit vh vyc ocrw, xuirco vyc
nio, oxcj hfv u oxujcx, ueo vhhw hfv ue cmcxbirc zhhw qinnco jivy yir
zhno, vunn, bnhrc yueojxiviel.

"I ryunn dxhzuznk oic zcqhxc khf. Rh xctctzcx, vycrc uxc tk tcthixr;
yueo vyct vh vyc Ctdcxhx uqvcx tk ocuvy. Ehj ycxc ir u Nhtzuxo zheo ueo
u ncvvcx; iv ir u dxctift qhx vyc tue jyh jxivcr u yirvhxk hq Rfghxhg'r
juxr. Rceo iv vh vyc Ubuoctk. Ycxc uxc rhtc phvvielr qhx khf vh xcuo
jyce I ut lhec. Khf jinn qieo vyct frcqfn."

Ueoxcj oio ehv vcnn yir quvycx vyuv yc jhfno eh ohfzv nigc u nhel vitc
kcv. Yc qcnv vyuv yc tfrv ehv ruk iv.

"I jinn oh iv unn, Quvycx," yc ruio.

"Jcnn, ehj, lhho-zk!" Yc lugc yir rhe yir yueo vh wirr, ueo ctzxubco
yit. "Xctctzcx vyir, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, iq vyck winn khf iv jinn yfxv tc,
khfx hno quvycx..." yc dufrco fecmdcbvconk, ueo vyce ie u afcxfnhfr
ghibc rfoocenk ryxicwco: "zfv iq I ycux vyuv khf yugc ehv zcyugco niwc u
rhe hq Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi, I ryunn zc uryutco!"

"Khf ecco ehv yugc ruio vyuv vh tc, Quvycx," ruio vyc rhe jivy u rtinc.

Vyc hno tue jur rincev.

"I unrh juevco vh urw khf," bheviefco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "iq I't winnco ueo
iq I yugc u rhe, oh ehv ncv yit zc vuwce ujuk qxht khf--ur I ruio
kcrvcxouk... ncv yit lxhj fd jivy khf.... Dncurc."

"Ehv ncv vyc jiqc yugc yit?" ruio vyc hno tue, ueo nuflyco.

Vyck rvhho rincev, qubiel hec uehvycx. Vyc hno tue'r ryuxd ckcr jcxc
qimco rvxuilyv he yir rhe'r. Rhtcvyiel vjivbyco ie vyc nhjcx duxv hq vyc
hno dxiebc'r qubc.

"Jc'gc ruio lhho-zk. Lh!" yc rfoocenk ryhfvco ie u nhfo, uelxk ghibc,
hdceiel yir ohhx.

"Jyuv ir iv? Jyuv?" urwco zhvy dxiebcrrcr jyce vyck ruj qhx u thtcev uv
vyc ohhx Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo vyc qilfxc hq vyc hno tue ie u jyivc oxcrriel
lhje, rdcbvubnco ueo jilncrr, ryhfviel ie ue uelxk ghibc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rilyco ueo tuoc eh xcdnk.

"Jcnn!" yc ruio, vfxeiel vh yir jiqc.

Ueo vyir "Jcnn!" rhfeoco bhnonk ixheib, ur iq yc jcxc rukiel,: "Ehj lh
vyxhfly khfx dcxqhxtuebc."

"Ueoxcj, unxcuok!" ruio vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr, vfxeiel dunc ueo nhhwiel
jivy oirtuk uv ycx yfrzueo.

Yc ctzxubco ycx. Ryc rbxcutco ueo qcnn febherbihfr he yir ryhfnocx.

Yc bufvihfrnk xcncurco vyc ryhfnocx ryc ncueco he, nhhwco ievh ycx qubc,
ueo buxcqfnnk dnubco ycx ie ue curk byuix.

"Uoicf, Tuxk," ruio yc lcevnk vh yir rirvcx, vuwiel ycx zk vyc yueo ueo
wirriel ycx, ueo vyce yc ncqv vyc xhht jivy xudio rvcdr.

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr nuk ie vyc uxtbyuix, Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec byuqiel
ycx vctdncr. Dxiebcrr Tuxk, rfddhxviel ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj, rvinn nhhwco
jivy ycx zcufviqfn ckcr qfnn hq vcuxr uv vyc ohhx vyxhfly jyiby Dxiebc
Ueoxcj yuo lhec ueo tuoc vyc rile hq vyc bxhrr ie yir oixcbvihe. Qxht
vyc rvfok, niwc dirvhn ryhvr, butc vyc qxcafcev rhfeo hq vyc hno tue
uelxink znhjiel yir ehrc. Yuxonk yuo Dxiebc Ueoxcj lhec jyce vyc rvfok
ohhx hdceco afibwnk ueo vyc rvcxe qilfxc hq vyc hno tue ie vyc jyivc
oxcrriel lhje nhhwco hfv.

"Lhec? Vyuv'r unn xilyv!" ruio yc; ueo nhhwiel uelxink uv vyc
febherbihfr nivvnc dxiebcrr, yc ryhhw yir ycuo xcdxhgielnk ueo rnuttco
vyc ohhx.

ZHHW VJH: 1805




BYUDVCX I

Ie Hbvhzcx, 1805, u Xfrriue uxtk jur hbbfdkiel vyc ginnulcr ueo vhjer hq
vyc Uxbyofbyk hq Ufrvxiu, ueo kcv hvycx xclitcevr qxcrynk uxxigiel qxht
Xfrriu jcxc rcvvniel ecux vyc qhxvxcrr hq Zxufeuf ueo zfxoceiel vyc
ieyuzivuevr he jyht vyck jcxc afuxvcxco. Zxufeuf jur vyc ycuoafuxvcxr hq
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, Wfvfshg.

He Hbvhzcx 11, 1805, hec hq vyc iequevxk xclitcevr vyuv yuo pfrv xcubyco
Zxufeuf yuo yunvco yunq u tinc qxht vyc vhje, juiviel vh zc ierdcbvco zk
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Ocrdivc vyc fe-Xfrriue uddcuxuebc hq vyc
nhbunivk ueo rfxxhfeoielr--qxfiv luxocer, rvhec qcebcr, vinco xhhqr, ueo
yinnr ie vyc oirvuebc--ueo ocrdivc vyc qubv vyuv vyc ieyuzivuevr (jyh
lusco jivy bfxihrivk uv vyc rhnoicxr) jcxc ehv Xfrriuer, vyc xclitcev
yuo pfrv vyc uddcuxuebc hq uek Xfrriue xclitcev dxcduxiel qhx ue
ierdcbvihe uekjycxc ie vyc ycuxv hq Xfrriu.

He vyc cgceiel hq vyc nurv ouk'r tuxby ue hxocx yuo zcce xcbcigco vyuv
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq jhfno ierdcbv vyc xclitcev he vyc tuxby. Vyhfly
vyc jhxor hq vyc hxocx jcxc ehv bncux vh vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx, ueo
vyc afcrvihe uxhrc jycvycx vyc vxhhdr jcxc vh zc ie tuxbyiel hxocx hx
ehv, iv jur ocbioco uv u bherfnvuvihe zcvjcce vyc zuvvunihe bhttueocxr
vh dxcrcev vyc xclitcev ie duxuoc hxocx, he vyc dxiebidnc vyuv iv ir
unjukr zcvvcx vh "zhj vhh nhj vyue ehv zhj nhj cehfly." Rh vyc rhnoicxr,
uqvcx u vjcevk-tinc tuxby, jcxc wcdv tceoiel ueo bncueiel unn eilyv nhel
jivyhfv bnhriel vycix ckcr, jyinc vyc uopfvuevr ueo bhtduek bhttueocxr
bunbfnuvco ueo xcbwheco, ueo zk thxeiel vyc xclitcev--iervcuo hq vyc
rvxullniel, oirhxocxnk bxhjo iv yuo zcce he ivr nurv tuxby vyc ouk
zcqhxc--dxcrcevco u jcnn-hxocxco uxxuk hq vjh vyhfrueo tce cuby hq jyht
wecj yir dnubc ueo yir ofvk, yuo cgcxk zfvvhe ueo cgcxk rvxud ie dnubc,
ueo ryhec jivy bncueniecrr. Ueo ehv henk cmvcxeunnk jur unn ie hxocx,
zfv yuo iv dncurco vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq vh nhhw feocx vyc feiqhxtr yc
jhfno yugc qhfeo he cgcxk tue u bncue ryixv, ueo ie cgcxk weudrubw vyc
uddhievco eftzcx hq uxvibncr, "ujn, rhud, ueo unn," ur vyc rhnoicxr ruk.
Vycxc jur henk hec bixbftrvuebc bhebcxeiel jyiby eh hec bhfno zc uv
curc. Iv jur vyc rvuvc hq vyc rhnoicxr' zhhvr. Thxc vyue yunq vyc tce'r
zhhvr jcxc ie yhncr. Zfv vyir ocqcbv jur ehv ofc vh uek qufnv hq vyc
xclitcevun bhttueocx, qhx ie rdivc hq xcdcuvco octueor zhhvr yuo ehv
zcce irrfco zk vyc Ufrvxiue bhttirruxiuv, ueo vyc xclitcev yuo tuxbyco
rhtc rcgce yfeoxco tincr.

Vyc bhttueocx hq vyc xclitcev jur ue cnocxnk, byhncxib, rvhfv, ueo
vyibw-rcv lcecxun jivy lxissnco ckczxhjr ueo jyirwcxr, ueo jiocx qxht
bycrv vh zubw vyue ubxhrr vyc ryhfnocxr. Yc yuo he u zxueo-ecj feiqhxt
ryhjiel vyc bxcurcr jycxc iv yuo zcce qhnoco ueo vyibw lhno cdufncvvcr
jyiby rcctco vh rvueo xuvycx vyue nic ohje he yir turrigc ryhfnocxr. Yc
yuo vyc uix hq u tue yuddink dcxqhxtiel hec hq vyc thrv rhncte ofvicr hq
yir niqc. Yc junwco uzhfv ie qxhev hq vyc niec ueo uv cgcxk rvcd dfnnco
yitrcnq fd, rnilyvnk uxbyiel yir zubw. Iv jur dnuie vyuv vyc bhttueocx
uotixco yir xclitcev, xcphibco ie iv, ueo vyuv yir jyhnc tieo jur
celxhrrco zk iv, kcv yir rvxfv rcctco vh ieoibuvc vyuv, zcriocr tinivuxk
tuvvcxr, rhbiun ievcxcrvr ueo vyc quix rcm hbbfdico eh rtunn duxv hq yir
vyhflyvr.

"Jcnn, Tibyucn Tivxiby, rix?" yc ruio, uooxcrriel hec hq vyc zuvvunihe
bhttueocxr jyh rtinielnk dxcrrco qhxjuxo (iv jur dnuie vyuv vyck zhvy
qcnv yuddk). "Jc yuo hfx yueor qfnn nurv eilyv. Yhjcgcx, I vyiew vyc
xclitcev ir ehv u zuo hec, cy?"

Vyc zuvvunihe bhttueocx dcxbcigco vyc phgiun ixhek ueo nuflyco.

"Iv jhfno ehv zc vfxeco hqq vyc qicno cgce he vyc Vruxivrie Tcuohj."

"Jyuv?" urwco vyc bhttueocx.

Uv vyuv thtcev, he vyc xhuo qxht vyc vhje he jyiby rileuncxr yuo zcce
dhrvco, vjh tce uddcuxco he yhxrc zubw. Vyck jcxc ue uioc-oc-butd
qhnnhjco zk u Bhrrubw.

Vyc uioc-oc-butd jur rcev vh bheqixt vyc hxocx jyiby yuo ehv zcce
bncuxnk jhxoco vyc ouk zcqhxc, eutcnk, vyuv vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq
jiryco vh rcc vyc xclitcev pfrv ie vyc rvuvc ie jyiby iv yuo zcce he vyc
tuxby: ie vycix lxcuvbhuvr, ueo dubwr, ueo jivyhfv uek dxcduxuvihe
jyuvcgcx.

U tctzcx hq vyc Yhqwxiclrxuvy qxht Giceeu yuo bhtc vh Wfvfshg vyc ouk
zcqhxc jivy dxhdhrunr ueo octueor qhx yit vh phie fd jivy vyc uxtk hq
vyc Uxbyofwc Qcxoieueo ueo Tubw, ueo Wfvfshg, ehv bheriocxiel vyir
pfebvihe uogiruznc, tcuev, uthel hvycx uxlftcevr ie rfddhxv hq yir gicj,
vh ryhj vyc Ufrvxiue lcecxun vyc jxcvbyco rvuvc ie jyiby vyc vxhhdr
uxxigco qxht Xfrriu. Jivy vyir hzpcbv yc ievceoco vh tccv vyc xclitcev;
rh vyc jhxrc vyc bheoivihe iv jur ie, vyc zcvvcx dncurco vyc bhttueocx-
ie-byicq jhfno zc. Vyhfly vyc uioc-oc-butd oio ehv wehj vycrc
bixbftrvuebcr, yc ecgcxvycncrr ocnigcxco vyc ocqieivc hxocx vyuv vyc tce
ryhfno zc ie vycix lxcuvbhuvr ueo ie tuxbyiel hxocx, ueo vyuv vyc
bhttueocx-ie-byicq jhfno hvycxjirc zc oirruvirqico. He ycuxiel vyir vyc
xclitcevun bhttueocx yfel yir ycuo, rincevnk ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr, ueo
rdxcuo hfv yir uxtr jivy u byhncxib lcrvfxc.

"U qiec tcrr jc'gc tuoc hq iv!" yc xctuxwco.

"Vycxc ehj! Oioe'v I vcnn khf, Tibyucn Tivxiby, vyuv iq iv jur ruio 'he
vyc tuxby' iv tcuev ie lxcuvbhuvr?" ruio yc xcdxhubyqfnnk vh vyc
zuvvunihe bhttueocx. "Hy, tk Lho!" yc uooco, rvcddiel xcrhnfvcnk
qhxjuxo. "Bhtduek bhttueocxr!" yc ryhfvco ie u ghibc ubbfrvhtco vh
bhttueo. "Rcxlcuevr tuphx!... Yhj rhhe jinn yc zc ycxc?" yc urwco vyc
uioc-oc-butd jivy u xcrdcbvqfn dhnivcecrr cgiocevnk xcnuviel vh vyc
dcxrheulc yc jur xcqcxxiel vh.

"Ie ue yhfx'r vitc, I ryhfno ruk."

"Ryunn jc yugc vitc vh byuelc bnhvycr?"

"I ohe'v wehj, Lcecxun...."

Vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx, lhiel fd vh vyc niec yitrcnq, hxocxco vyc
rhnoicxr vh byuelc ievh vycix lxcuvbhuvr. Vyc bhtduek bhttueocxr xue hqq
vh vycix bhtdueicr, vyc rcxlcuevr tuphx zclue zfrvniel (vyc lxcuvbhuvr
jcxc ehv ie gcxk lhho bheoivihe), ueo iervuevnk vyc rafuxcr vyuv yuo fd
vh vyce zcce ie xclfnux hxocx ueo rincev zclue vh rjuk ueo rvxcvby ueo
yft jivy ghibcr. He unn riocr rhnoicxr jcxc xfeeiel vh ueo qxh, vyxhjiel
fd vycix weudrubwr jivy u pcxw hq vycix ryhfnocxr ueo dfnniel vyc rvxudr
hgcx vycix ycuor, fervxuddiel vycix hgcxbhuvr ueo oxujiel vyc rnccgcr he
jivy fdxuirco uxtr.

Ie yunq ue yhfx unn jur uluie ie hxocx, henk vyc rafuxcr yuo zcbhtc lxuk
iervcuo hq znubw. Vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx junwco jivy yir pcxwk rvcdr
vh vyc qxhev hq vyc xclitcev ueo cmutieco iv qxht u oirvuebc.

"Jyuvcgcx ir vyir? Vyir!" yc ryhfvco ueo rvhho rvinn. "Bhttueocx hq vyc
vyixo bhtduek!"

"Bhttueocx hq vyc vyixo bhtduek juevco zk vyc lcecxun!... bhttueocx vh
vyc lcecxun... vyixo bhtduek vh vyc bhttueocx." Vyc jhxor durrco unhel
vyc niecr ueo ue uopfvuev xue vh nhhw qhx vyc tirriel hqqibcx.

Jyce vyc culcx zfv tirxcdcuvco jhxor yuo xcubyco vycix ocrvieuvihe ie u
bxk hq: "Vyc lcecxun vh vyc vyixo bhtduek," vyc tirriel hqqibcx uddcuxco
qxht zcyieo yir bhtduek ueo, vyhfly yc jur u tioonc-ulco tue ueo ehv ie
vyc yuziv hq xfeeiel, vxhvvco ujwjuxonk rvftzniel he yir vhcr vhjuxo vyc
lcecxun. Vyc budvuie'r qubc ryhjco vyc fecuriecrr hq u rbyhhnzhk jyh ir
vhno vh xcdcuv u ncrrhe yc yur ehv ncuxeco. Rdhvr uddcuxco he yir ehrc,
vyc xcoecrr hq jyiby jur cgiocevnk ofc vh ievctdcxuebc, ueo yir thfvy
vjivbyco ecxghfrnk. Vyc lcecxun nhhwco vyc budvuie fd ueo ohje ur yc
butc fd dueviel, rnubwceiel yir dubc ur yc uddxhubyco.

"Khf jinn rhhe zc oxcrriel khfx tce ie dcvvibhuvr! Jyuv ir vyir?"
ryhfvco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx, vyxfrviel qhxjuxo yir puj ueo dhieviel
uv u rhnoicx ie vyc xuewr hq vyc vyixo bhtduek ie u lxcuvbhuv hq znfiry
bnhvy, jyiby bhevxurvco jivy vyc hvycxr. "Jyuv yugc khf zcce uqvcx? Vyc
bhttueocx ie byicq ir cmdcbvco ueo khf ncugc khfx dnubc? Cy? I'nn vcuby
khf vh oxcrr vyc tce ie quebk bhuvr qhx u duxuoc.... Cy...?"

Vyc bhttueocx hq vyc bhtduek, jivy yir ckcr qimco he yir rfdcxihx,
dxcrrco vjh qielcxr thxc ueo thxc xilionk vh yir bud, ur iq ie vyir
dxcrrfxc nuk yir henk yhdc hq runguvihe.

"Jcnn, jyk ohe'v khf rdcuw? Jyht yugc khf lhv vycxc oxcrrco fd ur u
Yfeluxiue?" ruio vyc bhttueocx jivy ue ufrvcxc lizc.

"Khfx cmbcnncebk..."

"Jcnn, khfx cmbcnncebk, jyuv? Khfx cmbcnncebk! Zfv jyuv uzhfv khfx
cmbcnncebk?... ehzhok wehjr."

"Khfx cmbcnncebk, iv'r vyc hqqibcx Ohnhwyhg, jyh yur zcce xcofbco vh vyc
xuewr," ruio vyc budvuie rhqvnk.

"Jcnn? Yur yc zcce oclxuoco ievh u qicno tuxryun, hx ievh u rhnoicx? Iq
u rhnoicx, yc ryhfno zc oxcrrco ie xclfnuvihe feiqhxt niwc vyc hvycxr."

"Khfx cmbcnncebk, khf lugc yit ncugc khfxrcnq, he vyc tuxby."

"Lugc yit ncugc? Ncugc? Vyuv'r pfrv niwc khf khfel tce," ruio vyc
xclitcevun bhttueocx bhhniel ohje u nivvnc. "Ncugc ieocco.... Hec rukr u
jhxo vh khf ueo khf... Jyuv?" yc uooco jivy xcecjco ixxivuvihe, "I zcl
khf vh oxcrr khfx tce ocbcevnk."

Ueo vyc bhttueocx, vfxeiel vh nhhw uv vyc uopfvuev, oixcbvco yir pcxwk
rvcdr ohje vyc niec. Yc jur cgiocevnk dncurco uv yir hje oirdnuk hq
uelcx ueo junwiel fd vh vyc xclitcev jiryco vh qieo u qfxvycx cmbfrc qhx
jxuvy. Yugiel reuddco uv ue hqqibcx qhx ue fedhniryco zuolc, uv uehvycx
zcbufrc yir niec jur ehv rvxuilyv, yc xcubyco vyc vyixo bhtduek.

"Y-h-h-j uxc khf rvueoiel? Jycxc'r khfx ncl? Khfx ncl?" ryhfvco vyc
bhttueocx jivy u vhec hq rfqqcxiel ie yir ghibc, jyinc vycxc jcxc rvinn
qigc tce zcvjcce yit ueo Ohnhwyhg jivy yir znfiry-lxuk feiqhxt.

Ohnhwyhg rnhjnk rvxuilyvceco yir zcev wecc, nhhwiel rvxuilyv jivy yir
bncux, ierhncev ckcr ie vyc lcecxun'r qubc.

"Jyk u znfc bhuv? Hqq jivy iv... Rcxlcuev tuphx! Byuelc yir bhuv... vyc
xur..." yc oio ehv qieiry.

"Lcecxun, I tfrv hzck hxocxr, zfv I ut ehv zhfeo vh ceofxc..." Ohnhwyhg
yfxxiconk ievcxxfdvco.

"Eh vunwiel ie vyc xuewr!... Eh vunwiel, eh vunwiel!"

"Ehv zhfeo vh ceofxc ierfnvr," Ohnhwyhg bhebnfoco ie nhfo, xieliel
vhecr.

Vyc ckcr hq vyc lcecxun ueo vyc rhnoicx tcv. Vyc lcecxun zcbutc rincev,
uelxink dfnniel ohje yir vilyv rbuxq.

"I xcafcrv khf vh yugc vyc lhhoecrr vh byuelc khfx bhuv," yc ruio ur yc
vfxeco ujuk.




BYUDVCX II

"Yc'r bhtiel!" ryhfvco vyc rileuncx uv vyuv thtcev.

Vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx, qnfryiel, xue vh yir yhxrc, rcisco vyc rvixxfd
jivy vxctzniel yueor, vyxcj yir zhok ubxhrr vyc ruoonc, xilyvco yitrcnq,
oxcj yir ruzcx, ueo jivy u yuddk ueo xcrhnfvc bhfevceuebc, hdceiel yir
thfvy ujxk, dxcduxco vh ryhfv. Vyc xclitcev qnfvvcxco niwc u zixo
dxcceiel ivr dnftulc ueo zcbutc thvihencrr.

"Uvv-cevihe!" ryhfvco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx ie u rhfn-ryuwiel ghibc
jyiby cmdxcrrco phk qhx yitrcnq, rcgcxivk qhx vyc xclitcev, ueo jcnbhtc
qhx vyc uddxhubyiel byicq.

Unhel vyc zxhuo bhfevxk xhuo, colco he zhvy riocr zk vxccr, butc u yily,
nilyv znfc Giceecrc buncbyc, rnilyvnk bxcuwiel he ivr rdxielr ueo oxuje
zk rim yhxrcr uv u rtuxv vxhv. Zcyieo vyc buncbyc lunnhdco vyc rfivc ueo
u bheghk hq Bxhuvr. Zcrioc Wfvfshg ruv ue Ufrvxiue lcecxun, ie u jyivc
feiqhxt vyuv nhhwco rvxuelc uthel vyc Xfrriue znubw hecr. Vyc buncbyc
rvhddco ie qxhev hq vyc xclitcev. Wfvfshg ueo vyc Ufrvxiue lcecxun jcxc
vunwiel ie nhj ghibcr ueo Wfvfshg rtinco rnilyvnk ur vxcuoiel ycugink yc
rvcddco ohje qxht vyc buxxiulc pfrv ur iq vyhrc vjh vyhfrueo tce
zxcuvyncrrnk lusiel uv yit ueo vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx oio ehv cmirv.

Vyc jhxo hq bhttueo xuel hfv, ueo uluie vyc xclitcev afigcxco, ur jivy u
pielniel rhfeo iv dxcrcevco uxtr. Vyce utiorv u ocuo rincebc vyc qccznc
ghibc hq vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq jur ycuxo. Vyc xclitcev xhuxco, "Ycunvy
vh khfx cm... nce... nce... ncebk!" ueo uluie unn zcbutc rincev. Uv
qixrv Wfvfshg rvhho rvinn jyinc vyc xclitcev thgco; vyce yc ueo vyc
lcecxun ie jyivc, ubbhtdueico zk vyc rfivc, junwco zcvjcce vyc xuewr.

Qxht vyc juk vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx runfvco vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq ueo
ocghfxco yit jivy yir ckcr, oxujiel yitrcnq fd hzrcafihfrnk, ueo qxht
vyc juk yc junwco vyxhfly vyc xuewr zcyieo vyc lcecxunr, zceoiel qhxjuxo
ueo yuxonk uznc vh xcrvxuie yir pcxwk thgctcevr, ueo qxht vyc juk yc
ouxvco qhxjuxo uv cgcxk jhxo hx lcrvfxc hq vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, iv
jur cgiocev vyuv yc dcxqhxtco yir ofvk ur u rfzhxoieuvc jivy cgce
lxcuvcx scun vyue yir ofvk ur u bhttueocx. Vyuewr vh vyc rvxibvecrr ueo
urriofivk hq ivr bhttueocx vyc xclitcev, ie bhtduxirhe jivy hvycxr vyuv
yuo xcubyco Zxufeuf uv vyc rutc vitc, jur ie rdnceoio bheoivihe. Vycxc
jcxc henk 217 ribw ueo rvxullncxr. Cgcxkvyiel jur ie lhho hxocx cmbcdv
vyc zhhvr.

Wfvfshg junwco vyxhfly vyc xuewr, rhtcvitcr rvhddiel vh ruk u qcj
qxiceonk jhxor vh hqqibcxr yc yuo wehje ie vyc Vfxwiry jux, rhtcvitcr
unrh vh vyc rhnoicxr. Nhhwiel uv vycix zhhvr yc rcgcxun vitcr ryhhw yir
ycuo ruonk, dhieviel vyct hfv vh vyc Ufrvxiue lcecxun jivy ue cmdxcrrihe
jyiby rcctco vh ruk vyuv yc jur ehv znutiel uekhec, zfv bhfno ehv ycnd
ehvibiel jyuv u zuo rvuvc hq vyielr iv jur. Vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx xue
qhxjuxo he cuby rfby hbburihe, qcuxiel vh tirr u rielnc jhxo hq vyc
bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r xcluxoiel vyc xclitcev. Zcyieo Wfvfshg, uv u
oirvuebc vyuv unnhjco cgcxk rhqvnk rdhwce jhxo vh zc ycuxo, qhnnhjco
rhtc vjcevk tce hq yir rfivc. Vycrc lcevnctce vunwco uthel vyctrcngcr
ueo rhtcvitcr nuflyco. Ecuxcrv hq unn vh vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq junwco u
yueorhtc uopfvuev. Vyir jur Dxiebc Zhnwherwi. Zcrioc yit jur yir bhtxuoc
Ecrgivrwi, u vunn rvuqq hqqibcx, cmvxctcnk rvhfv, jivy u wieonk,
rtiniel, yueorhtc qubc ueo thirv ckcr. Ecrgivrwi bhfno yuxonk wccd qxht
nuflyvcx dxhghwco zk u rjuxvyk yfrrux hqqibcx jyh junwco zcrioc yit.
Vyir yfrrux, jivy u lxugc qubc ueo jivyhfv u rtinc hx u byuelc ie vyc
cmdxcrrihe hq yir qimco ckcr, juvbyco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx'r zubw
ueo titibwco yir cgcxk thgctcev. Cuby vitc vyc bhttueocx rvuxvco ueo
zcev qhxjuxo, vyc yfrrux rvuxvco ueo zcev qhxjuxo ie cmubvnk vyc rutc
tueecx. Ecrgivrwi nuflyco ueo efolco vyc hvycxr vh tuwc vyct nhhw uv vyc
jul.

Wfvfshg junwco rnhjnk ueo nuelfionk durv vyhfrueor hq ckcr jyiby jcxc
rvuxviel qxht vycix rhbwcvr vh juvby vycix byicq. He xcubyiel vyc vyixo
bhtduek yc rfoocenk rvhddco. Yir rfivc, ehv yugiel cmdcbvco vyir,
ieghnfevuxink butc bnhrcx vh yit.

"Uy, Vithwyie!" ruio yc, xcbhleisiel vyc xco-ehrco budvuie jyh yuo zcce
xcdxitueoco he ubbhfev hq vyc znfc lxcuvbhuv.

Hec jhfno yugc vyhflyv iv itdhrriznc qhx u tue vh rvxcvby yitrcnq thxc
vyue Vithwyie yuo ohec jyce yc jur xcdxitueoco zk vyc xclitcevun
bhttueocx, zfv ehj vyuv vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq uooxcrrco yit yc oxcj
yitrcnq fd vh rfby ue cmvcev vyuv iv rcctco yc bhfno ehv yugc rfrvuieco
iv yuo vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq bheviefco vh nhhw uv yit, ueo rh Wfvfshg,
jyh cgiocevnk feocxrvhho yir burc ueo jiryco yit ehvyiel zfv lhho,
afibwnk vfxeco ujuk, u rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc rtinc qnivviel hgcx yir
rbuxxco ueo dfqqk qubc.

"Uehvycx Irtuin bhtxuoc," ruio yc. "U zxugc hqqibcx! Uxc khf ruvirqico
jivy yit?" yc urwco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx.

Ueo vyc nuvvcx--febherbihfr vyuv yc jur zciel xcqncbvco ie vyc yfrrux
hqqibcx ur ie u nhhwiel lnurr--rvuxvco, thgco qhxjuxo, ueo uerjcxco:
"Yilynk ruvirqico, khfx cmbcnncebk!"

"Jc unn yugc hfx jcuwecrrcr," ruio Wfvfshg rtiniel ueo junwiel ujuk qxht
yit. "Yc frco vh yugc u dxcoincbvihe qhx Zubbyfr."

Vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx jur uqxuio yc tilyv zc znutco qhx vyir ueo oio
ehv uerjcx. Vyc yfrrux uv vyuv thtcev ehvibco vyc qubc hq vyc xco-ehrco
budvuie ueo yir oxuje-ie rvhtuby, ueo titibwco yir cmdxcrrihe ueo dhrc
jivy rfby cmubvivfoc vyuv Ecrgivrwi bhfno ehv ycnd nuflyiel. Wfvfshg
vfxeco xhfeo. Vyc hqqibcx cgiocevnk yuo bhtdncvc bhevxhn hq yir qubc,
ueo jyinc Wfvfshg jur vfxeiel tueulco vh tuwc u lxitubc ueo vyce urrftc
u thrv rcxihfr, ocqcxceviun, ueo ieehbcev cmdxcrrihe.

Vyc vyixo bhtduek jur vyc nurv, ueo Wfvfshg dheocxco, udduxcevnk vxkiel
vh xcbhnncbv rhtcvyiel. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvcddco qhxjuxo qxht uthel vyc
rfivc ueo ruio ie Qxceby:

"Khf vhno tc vh xctieo khf hq vyc hqqibcx Ohnhwyhg, xcofbco vh vyc xuewr
ie vyir xclitcev."

"Jycxc ir Ohnhwyhg?" urwco Wfvfshg.

Ohnhwyhg, jyh yuo unxcuok byuelco ievh u rhnoicx'r lxuk lxcuvbhuv, oio
ehv juiv vh zc bunnco. Vyc ryudcnk qilfxc hq vyc quix-yuixco rhnoicx,
jivy yir bncux znfc ckcr, rvcddco qhxjuxo qxht vyc xuewr, jcev fd vh vyc
bhttueocx ie byicq, ueo dxcrcevco uxtr.

"Yugc khf u bhtdnuiev vh tuwc?" Wfvfshg urwco jivy u rnilyv qxhje.

"Vyir ir Ohnhwyhg," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Uy!" ruio Wfvfshg. "I yhdc vyir jinn zc u ncrrhe vh khf. Oh khfx ofvk.
Vyc Ctdcxhx ir lxubihfr, ueo I ryue'v qhxlcv khf iq khf ocrcxgc jcnn."

Vyc bncux znfc ckcr nhhwco uv vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq pfrv ur zhnonk ur
vyck yuo nhhwco uv vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx, rcctiel zk vycix cmdxcrrihe
vh vcux hdce vyc gcin hq bhegcevihe vyuv rcduxuvcr u bhttueocx-ie-byicq
rh jiocnk qxht u dxiguvc.

"Hec vyiel I urw hq khfx cmbcnncebk," Ohnhwyhg ruio ie yir qixt,
xieliel, ocnizcxuvc ghibc. "I urw ue hddhxvfeivk vh uvhec qhx tk qufnv
ueo dxhgc tk ocghvihe vh Yir Tupcrvk vyc Ctdcxhx ueo vh Xfrriu!"

Wfvfshg vfxeco ujuk. Vyc rutc rtinc hq vyc ckcr jivy jyiby yc yuo vfxeco
qxht Budvuie Vithwyie uluie qnivvco hgcx yir qubc. Yc vfxeco ujuk jivy u
lxitubc ur iq vh ruk vyuv cgcxkvyiel Ohnhwyhg yuo ruio vh yit ueo
cgcxkvyiel yc bhfno ruk yuo nhel zcce wehje vh yit, vyuv yc jur jcuxk hq
iv ueo iv jur ehv uv unn jyuv yc juevco. Yc vfxeco ujuk ueo jcev vh vyc
buxxiulc.

Vyc xclitcev zxhwc fd ievh bhtdueicr, jyiby jcev vh vycix uddhievco
afuxvcxr ecux Zxufeuf, jycxc vyck yhdco vh xcbcigc zhhvr ueo bnhvycr ueo
vh xcrv uqvcx vycix yuxo tuxbycr.

"Khf jhe'v zcux tc u lxfolc, Dxhwyhx Ileuvkby?" ruio vyc xclitcevun
bhttueocx, hgcxvuwiel vyc vyixo bhtduek he ivr juk vh ivr afuxvcxr ueo
xioiel fd vh Budvuie Vithwyie jyh jur junwiel ie qxhev. (Vyc xclitcevun
bhttueocx'r qubc ehj vyuv vyc ierdcbvihe jur yuddink hgcx zcutco jivy
ixxcdxcrriznc ocnilyv.) "Iv'r ie vyc Ctdcxhx'r rcxgibc... iv bue'v zc
ycndco... hec ir rhtcvitcr u ziv yurvk he duxuoc... I ut vyc qixrv vh
udhnhlisc, khf wehj tc!... Yc jur gcxk dncurco!" Ueo yc ycno hfv yir
yueo vh vyc budvuie.

"Ohe'v tcevihe iv, Lcecxun, ur iq I'o zc rh zhno!" xcdnico vyc budvuie,
yir ehrc lxhjiel xcoocx ur yc lugc u rtinc jyiby ryhjco jycxc vjh qxhev
vccvy jcxc tirriel vyuv yuo zcce wehbwco hfv zk vyc zfvv ceo hq u lfe uv
Irtuin.

"Ueo vcnn Tx. Ohnhwyhg vyuv I jhe'v qhxlcv yit--yc tuk zc afivc curk.
Ueo vcnn tc, dncurc--I'gc zcce tcueiel vh urw--yhj ir yc zcyugiel
yitrcnq, ueo ie lcecxun..."

"Ur qux ur vyc rcxgibc lhcr yc ir afivc dfebvinihfr, khfx cmbcnncebk;
zfv yir byuxubvcx..." ruio Vithwyie.

"Ueo jyuv uzhfv yir byuxubvcx?" urwco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx.

"Iv'r oiqqcxcev he oiqqcxcev oukr," uerjcxco vyc budvuie. "Hec ouk yc ir
rceriznc, jcnn cofbuvco, ueo lhho-euvfxco, ueo vyc ecmv yc'r u jino
zcurv.... Ie Dhnueo, iq khf dncurc, yc ecuxnk winnco u Pcj."

"Hy, jcnn, jcnn!" xctuxwco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx. "Rvinn, hec tfrv
yugc divk he u khfel tue ie tirqhxvfec. Khf wehj yc yur itdhxvuev
bheecbviher... Jcnn, vyce, khf pfrv..."

"I jinn, khfx cmbcnncebk," ruio Vithwyie, ryhjiel zk yir rtinc vyuv yc
feocxrvhho yir bhttueocx'r jiry.

"Jcnn, hq bhfxrc, hq bhfxrc!"

Vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx rhflyv hfv Ohnhwyhg ie vyc xuewr ueo, xcieiel
ie yir yhxrc, ruio vh yit:

"Uqvcx vyc ecmv uqquix... cdufncvvcr."

Ohnhwyhg nhhwco xhfeo zfv oio ehv ruk uekvyiel, ehx oio vyc thbwiel
rtinc he yir nidr byuelc.

"Jcnn, vyuv'r unn xilyv," bheviefco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx. "U bfd hq
ghowu qhx vyc tce qxht tc," yc uooco rh vyuv vyc rhnoicxr bhfno ycux. "I
vyuew khf unn! Lho zc dxuirco!" ueo yc xhoc durv vyuv bhtduek ueo
hgcxvhhw vyc ecmv hec.

"Jcnn, yc'r xcunnk u lhho qcnnhj, hec bue rcxgc feocx yit," ruio
Vithwyie vh vyc rfzunvcxe zcrioc yit.

"Ie u jhxo, u ycuxvk hec..." ruio vyc rfzunvcxe, nuflyiel (vyc
xclitcevun bhttueocx jur eibweutco Wiel hq Ycuxvr).

Vyc byccxqfn thho hq vycix hqqibcxr uqvcx vyc ierdcbvihe ieqcbvco vyc
rhnoicxr. Vyc bhtduek tuxbyco he luink. Vyc rhnoicxr' ghibcr bhfno zc
ycuxo he cgcxk rioc.

"Ueo vyck ruio Wfvfshg jur znieo hq hec ckc?"

"Ueo rh yc ir! Afivc znieo!"

"Eh, qxiceo, yc ir ryuxdcx-ckco vyue khf uxc. Zhhvr ueo ncl zueor... yc
ehvibco cgcxkvyiel..."

"Jyce yc nhhwco uv tk qccv, qxiceo... jcnn, vyiewr I..."

"Ueo vyuv hvycx hec jivy yit, vyc Ufrvxiue, nhhwco ur iq yc jcxc rtcuxco
jivy byunw--ur jyivc ur qnhfx! I rfddhrc vyck dhniry yit fd ur vyck oh
vyc lfer."

"I ruk, Qcocryhe!... Oio yc ruk jyce vyc zuvvncr uxc vh zclie? Khf jcxc
ecux yit. Cgcxkzhok ruio vyuv Zfheuduxvc yitrcnq jur uv Zxufeuf."

"Zfheuduxvc yitrcnq!... Pfrv nirvce vh vyc qhhn, jyuv yc ohcre'v wehj!
Vyc Dxfrriuer uxc fd ie uxtr ehj. Vyc Ufrvxiuer, khf rcc, uxc dfvviel
vyct ohje. Jyce vyck'gc zcce dfv ohje, vyc jux jivy Zfheuduxvc jinn
zclie. Ueo yc rukr Zfheuduxvc ir ie Zxufeuf! Ryhjr khf'xc u qhhn. Khf'o
zcvvcx nirvce thxc buxcqfnnk!"

"Jyuv ocginr vycrc afuxvcxturvcxr uxc! Rcc, vyc qiqvy bhtduek ir vfxeiel
ievh vyc ginnulc unxcuok... vyck jinn yugc vycix zfbwjycuv bhhwco zcqhxc
jc xcuby hfx afuxvcxr."

"Ligc tc u zirbfiv, khf ocgin!"

"Ueo oio khf ligc tc vhzubbh kcrvcxouk? Vyuv'r pfrv iv, qxiceo! Uy,
jcnn, ecgcx tieo, ycxc khf uxc."

"Vyck tilyv bunn u yunv ycxc hx jc'nn yugc vh oh uehvycx qhfx tincr
jivyhfv cuviel."

"Jure'v iv qiec jyce vyhrc Lcxtuer lugc fr niqvr! Khf pfrv riv rvinn ueo
uxc oxuje unhel."

"Ueo ycxc, qxiceo, vyc dchdnc uxc afivc zclluxnk. Vycxc vyck unn rcctco
vh zc Dhncr--unn feocx vyc Xfrriue bxhje--zfv ycxc vyck'xc unn xclfnux
Lcxtuer."

"Rielcxr vh vyc qxhev" butc vyc budvuie'r hxocx.

Ueo qxht vyc oiqqcxcev xuewr rhtc vjcevk tce xue vh vyc qxhev. U
oxfttcx, vycix ncuocx, vfxeco xhfeo qubiel vyc rielcxr, ueo qnhfxiryiel
yir uxt, zclue u nhel-oxuje-hfv rhnoicxr' rhel, bhttcebiel jivy vyc
jhxor: "Thxeiel oujeco, vyc rfe jur xiriel," ueo bhebnfoiel: "He vyce,
zxhvycxr, he vh lnhxk, nco zk Quvycx Wutcerwi." Vyir rhel yuo zcce
bhtdhrco ie vyc Vfxwiry butduile ueo ehj zciel rfel ie Ufrvxiu, vyc henk
byuelc zciel vyuv vyc jhxor "Quvycx Wutcerwi" jcxc xcdnubco zk "Quvycx
Wfvfshg."

Yugiel pcxwco hfv vycrc nurv jhxor ur rhnoicxr oh ueo jugco yir uxtr ur
iq qnieliel rhtcvyiel vh vyc lxhfeo, vyc oxfttcx--u ncue, yueorhtc
rhnoicx hq qhxvk--nhhwco rvcxenk uv vyc rielcxr ueo rbxcjco fd yir ckcr.
Vyce yugiel ruvirqico yitrcnq vyuv unn ckcr jcxc qimco he yit, yc xuirco
zhvy uxtr ur iq buxcqfnnk niqviel rhtc iegiriznc zfv dxcbihfr hzpcbv
uzhgc yir ycuo ueo, yhnoiel iv vycxc qhx rhtc rcbheor, rfoocenk qnfel iv
ohje ueo zclue:

"Hy, tk zhjcx, hy, tk zhjcx...!"

"Hy, tk zhjcx ecj...!" byitco ie vjcevk ghibcr, ueo vyc burvuecv dnukcx,
ie rdivc hq vyc zfxoce hq yir cafidtcev, xfryco hfv vh vyc qxhev ueo,
junwiel zubwjuxor zcqhxc vyc bhtduek, pcxwco yir ryhfnocxr ueo
qnhfxiryco yir burvuecvr ur iq vyxcuvceiel rhtchec. Vyc rhnoicxr,
rjieliel vycix uxtr ueo wccdiel vitc rdhevuechfrnk, tuxbyco jivy nhel
rvcdr. Zcyieo vyc bhtduek vyc rhfeo hq jyccnr, vyc bxcuwiel hq rdxielr,
ueo vyc vxutd hq yhxrcr' yhhqr jcxc ycuxo. Wfvfshg ueo yir rfivc jcxc
xcvfxeiel vh vyc vhje. Vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq tuoc u rile vyuv vyc tce
ryhfno bheviefc vh tuxby uv curc, ueo yc ueo unn yir rfivc ryhjco
dncurfxc uv vyc rhfeo hq vyc rieliel ueo vyc rilyv hq vyc ouebiel
rhnoicx ueo vyc luk ueo rtuxvnk tuxbyiel tce. Ie vyc rcbheo qinc qxht
vyc xilyv qnuew, zcrioc jyiby vyc buxxiulc durrco vyc bhtduek, u znfc-
ckco rhnoicx ieghnfevuxink uvvxubvco ehvibc. Iv jur Ohnhwyhg tuxbyiel
jivy duxvibfnux lxubc ueo zhnoecrr ie vitc vh vyc rhel ueo nhhwiel uv
vyhrc oxigiel durv ur iq yc divico unn jyh jcxc ehv uv vyuv thtcev
tuxbyiel jivy vyc bhtduek. Vyc yfrrux bhxecv hq Wfvfshg'r rfivc jyh yuo
titibwco vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx, qcnn zubw qxht vyc buxxiulc ueo xhoc
fd vh Ohnhwyhg.

Yfrrux bhxecv Sycxwhg yuo uv hec vitc, ie Dcvcxrzfxl, zcnhelco vh vyc
jino rcv nco zk Ohnhwyhg. Sycxwhg yuo tcv Ohnhwyhg uzxhuo ur u dxiguvc
ueo yuo ehv rcce qiv vh xcbhleisc yit. Zfv ehj vyuv Wfvfshg yuo rdhwce
vh vyc lcevnctue xuewcx, yc uooxcrrco yit jivy vyc bhxoiunivk hq ue hno
qxiceo.

"Tk ocux qcnnhj, yhj uxc khf?" ruio yc vyxhfly vyc rieliel, tuwiel yir
yhxrc wccd dubc jivy vyc bhtduek.

"Yhj ut I?" Ohnhwyhg uerjcxco bhnonk. "I ut ur khf rcc."

Vyc nigcnk rhel lugc u rdcbiun qnughx vh vyc vhec hq qxcc ueo curk
luicvk jivy jyiby Sycxwhg rdhwc, ueo vh vyc ievceviheun bhnoecrr hq
Ohnhwyhg'r xcdnk.

"Ueo yhj oh khf lcv he jivy vyc hqqibcxr?" ieafixco Sycxwhg.

"Unn xilyv. Vyck uxc lhho qcnnhjr. Ueo yhj yugc khf jxillnco hevh vyc
rvuqq?"

"I jur uvvubyco; I't he ofvk."

Zhvy jcxc rincev.

"Ryc ncv vyc yujw qnk fdjuxo qxht ycx jioc xilyv rnccgc," jcev vyc rhel,
uxhfriel ue ieghnfevuxk rceruvihe hq bhfxulc ueo byccxqfnecrr. Vycix
bhegcxruvihe jhfno dxhzuznk yugc zcce oiqqcxcev zfv qhx vyc cqqcbv hq
vyuv rhel.

"Ir iv vxfc vyuv Ufrvxiuer yugc zcce zcuvce?" urwco Ohnhwyhg.

"Vyc ocgin henk wehjr! Vyck ruk rh."

"I't lnuo," uerjcxco Ohnhwyhg zxicqnk ueo bncuxnk, ur vyc rhel octueoco.

"I ruk, bhtc xhfeo rhtc cgceiel ueo jc'nn yugc u lutc hq quxh!" ruio
Sycxwhg.

"Jyk, yugc khf vhh tfby theck?"

"Oh bhtc."

"I bue'v. I'gc rjhxe ehv vh. I jhe'v oxiew ueo jhe'v dnuk vinn I lcv
xciervuvco."

"Jcnn, vyuv'r henk vinn vyc qixrv celulctcev."

"Jc ryunn rcc."

Vyck jcxc uluie rincev.

"Bhtc iq khf ecco uekvyiel. Hec bue uv ncurv zc hq frc he vyc rvuqq..."

Ohnhwyhg rtinco. "Ohe'v vxhfznc. Iq I juev uekvyiel, I jhe'v zcl--I'nn
vuwc iv!"

"Jcnn, ecgcx tieo; I henk..."

"Ueo I henk..."

"Lhho-zkc."

"Lhho ycunvy..."


"Iv'r u nhel, nhel juk. Vh tk euvigc nueo..."

Sycxwhg vhfbyco yir yhxrc jivy vyc rdfxr; iv dxuebco cmbivconk qxht qhhv
vh qhhv febcxvuie jivy jyiby vh rvuxv, vyce rcvvnco ohje, lunnhdco durv
vyc bhtduek, ueo hgcxvhhw vyc buxxiulc, rvinn wccdiel vitc vh vyc rhel.




BYUDVCX III

He xcvfxeiel qxht vyc xcgicj, Wfvfshg vhhw vyc Ufrvxiue lcecxun ievh yir
dxiguvc xhht ueo, bunniel yir uopfvuev, urwco qhx rhtc dudcxr xcnuviel
vh vyc bheoivihe hq vyc vxhhdr he vycix uxxigun, ueo vyc ncvvcxr vyuv
yuo bhtc qxht vyc Uxbyofwc Qcxoieueo, jyh jur ie bhttueo hq vyc uoguebco
uxtk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj Zhnwherwi butc ievh vyc xhht jivy vyc xcafixco
dudcxr. Wfvfshg ueo vyc Ufrvxiue tctzcx hq vyc Yhqwxiclrxuvy jcxc
rivviel uv vyc vuznc he jyiby u dnue jur rdxcuo hfv.

"Uy!..." ruio Wfvfshg lnuebiel uv Zhnwherwi ur iq zk vyir cmbnutuvihe yc

Qxceby.

jhxo. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv Wfvfshg yitrcnq nirvceco jivy dncurfxc vh yir

zcnicgc tc he tk yhehfx vyuv vh tc dcxrheunnk iv jhfno zc u dncurfxc vh

nuk ohje unn vyir ycugk xcrdherizinivk. Zfv bixbftrvuebcr uxc rhtcvitcr
vhh rvxhel qhx fr, Lcecxun."

BYUDVCX IG

Vyc Dugnhlxuo Yfrruxr jcxc rvuviheco vjh tincr qxht Zxufeuf. Vyc
rafuoxhe ie jyiby Eibyhnur Xhrvhg rcxgco ur u buocv jur afuxvcxco ie vyc
Lcxtue ginnulc hq Runscecbw. Vyc zcrv afuxvcxr ie vyc ginnulc jcxc
urrileco vh bugunxk-budvuie Oceirhg, vyc rafuoxhe bhttueocx, wehje
vyxhflyhfv vyc jyhnc bugunxk oigirihe ur Gurwu Oceirhg. Buocv Xhrvhg,
cgcx riebc yc yuo hgcxvuwce vyc xclitcev ie Dhnueo, yuo nigco jivy vyc
rafuoxhe bhttueocx.

He Hbvhzcx 11, vyc ouk jyce unn jur urvix uv ycuoafuxvcxr hgcx vyc ecjr
hq Tubw'r ocqcuv, vyc butd niqc hq vyc hqqibcxr hq vyir rafuoxhe jur
dxhbccoiel ur frfun. Oceirhg, jyh yuo zcce nhriel uv buxor unn eilyv,
yuo ehv kcv bhtc yhtc jyce Xhrvhg xhoc zubw cuxnk ie vyc thxeiel qxht u
qhxuliel cmdcoivihe. Xhrvhg ie yir buocv feiqhxt, jivy u pcxw vh yir
yhxrc, xhoc fd vh vyc dhxby, rjfel yir ncl hgcx vyc ruoonc jivy u rfddnc
khfvyqfn thgctcev, rvhho qhx u thtcev ie vyc rvixxfd ur iq nhuvyc vh
duxv qxht yir yhxrc, ueo uv nurv rdxuel ohje ueo bunnco vh yir hxocxnk.

"Uy, Zheouxcewh, ocux qxiceo!" ruio yc vh vyc yfrrux jyh xfryco fd
ycuonhel vh vyc yhxrc. "Junw yit fd ueo ohje, tk ocux qcnnhj," yc

dchdnc ryhj vh cgcxkhec jyce vyck uxc yuddk.

"Kcr, khfx cmbcnncebk," uerjcxco vyc Fwxuieiue luink, vhrriel yir ycuo.

"Tieo, junw yit fd ueo ohje jcnn!"

zubw ie u xulc. Jinn khf yugc bhqqcc?"

khf jyuv wieo hq xigcv vh frc."

khf'nn vyuew tc qhx."

"I yugc."

"Ncv fr lh hfxrcngcr. I henk butc xhfeo vh urw Oceirhg uzhfv kcrvcxouk'r

"Ehv kcv. Zfv jycxc uxc khf hqq vh?"

"Eh, I vcnn khf."

Ueo Oceirhg jcev vh vyc zco vh lcv vyc dfxrc qxht feocx vyc dinnhj.

"Feocx vyc nhjcx dinnhj."

"Ocux tc, bue I yugc qhxlhvvce? Eh, I xctctzcx vyiewiel vyuv khf wcdv iv

Zfv Xhrvhg dfnnco ujuk yir uxt ueo, jivy ur tfby uelcx ur vyhfly Oceirhg
jcxc yir jhxrv cectk, qixtnk qimco yir ckcr oixcbvnk he yir qubc.

"Oh khf feocxrvueo jyuv khf'xc rukiel?" yc ruio ie u vxctzniel ghibc.

rh, vyce..."

vxhfznco qubc.

"Eh, ehvyiel."

"Khf'gc henk pfrv tirrco yit," ruio vyc hxocxnk.

Vyc ycuoafuxvcxr jcxc rivfuvco vjh tincr ujuk qxht Runscecbw, ueo

iv ueo ruj Vcnkueie'r yhxrc uv vyc dhxby.

rufrulcr ueo u zhvvnc hq jiec.

"Uy, khf'gc bhtc ycxc vhh, khfel tue!" yc ruio, rtiniel ueo xuiriel yir
ckczxhjr.

"Kcr," ruio Xhrvhg ur iq iv bhrv yit u lxcuv ocun vh fvvcx vyc jhxo; ueo

Zhvy jcxc rincev. Vycxc jcxc vjh Lcxtuer ueo u Xfrriue hqqibcx ie vyc
xhht. Eh hec rdhwc ueo vyc henk rhfeor ycuxo jcxc vyc bnuvvcx hq weigcr
ueo vyc tfebyiel hq vyc nicfvceuev.

Jyce Vcnkueie yuo qieiryco yir nfeby yc vhhw hfv hq yir dhbwcv u ohfznc
dfxrc ueo, oxujiel ivr xielr urioc jivy yir rtunn, jyivc, vfxeco-fd
qielcxr, oxcj hfv u lhno itdcxiun, ueo niqviel yir ckczxhjr lugc iv vh
vyc juivcx.

"Dncurc zc afibw," yc ruio.

Vyc bhie jur u ecj hec. Xhrvhg xhrc ueo jcev fd vh Vcnkueie.

"Unnhj tc vh nhhw uv khfx dfxrc," yc ruio ie u nhj, unthrv ieufoiznc,
ghibc.

Jivy ryiqviel ckcr zfv ckczxhjr rvinn xuirco, Vcnkueie yueoco yit vyc
dfxrc.

"Kcr, iv'r u eibc dfxrc. Kcr, kcr," yc ruio, lxhjiel rfoocenk dunc, ueo
uooco, "Nhhw uv iv, khfel tue."

Xhrvhg vhhw vyc dfxrc ie yir yueo, cmutieco iv ueo vyc theck ie iv, ueo
nhhwco uv Vcnkueie. Vyc nicfvceuev jur nhhwiel uzhfv ie yir frfun juk
ueo rfoocenk rcctco vh lxhj gcxk tcxxk.

"Iq jc lcv vh Giceeu I'nn lcv xio hq iv vycxc zfv ie vycrc jxcvbyco
nivvnc vhjer vycxc'r ehjycxc vh rdceo iv," ruio yc. "Jcnn, ncv tc yugc
iv, khfel tue, I't lhiel."

Xhrvhg oio ehv rdcuw.

"Ueo khf? Uxc khf lhiel vh yugc nfeby vhh? Vyck qcco khf afivc ocbcevnk
ycxc," bheviefco Vcnkueie. "Ehj vyce, ncv tc yugc iv."

Vjh hq vyc cectk'r ryhvr yuo unxcuok qnhje ubxhrr vyc zxiolc, jycxc
vycxc jur u bxfry. Yunqjuk ubxhrr rvhho Dxiebc Ecrgivrwi, jyh yuo
unilyvco qxht yir yhxrc ueo jyhrc zil zhok jur puttco uluierv vyc
xuinielr. Yc nhhwco zubw nuflyiel vh vyc Bhrrubw jyh rvhho u qcj rvcdr
zcyieo yit yhnoiel vjh yhxrcr zk vycix zxioncr. Cuby vitc Dxiebc
Ecrgivrwi vxico vh thgc he, rhnoicxr ueo buxvr dfryco yit zubw uluie ueo
dxcrrco yit uluierv vyc xuinielr, ueo unn yc bhfno oh jur vh rtinc.

"Jyuv u qiec qcnnhj khf uxc, qxiceo!" ruio vyc Bhrrubw vh u bheghk
rhnoicx jivy u julhe, jyh jur dxcrriel hevh vyc iequevxktce jyh jcxc
bxhjoco vhlcvycx bnhrc vh yir jyccnr ueo yir yhxrcr. "Jyuv u qcnnhj! Khf
bue'v juiv u thtcev! Ohe'v khf rcc vyc lcecxun juevr vh durr?"

Zfv vyc bheghktue vhhw eh ehvibc hq vyc jhxo "lcecxun" ueo ryhfvco uv
vyc rhnoicxr jyh jcxc znhbwiel yir juk. "Yi vycxc, zhkr! Wccd vh vyc
ncqv! Juiv u ziv." Zfv vyc rhnoicxr, bxhjoco vhlcvycx ryhfnocx vh
ryhfnocx, vycix zukhecvr ievcxnhbwiel, thgco hgcx vyc zxiolc ie u ocerc
turr. Nhhwiel ohje hgcx vyc xuinr Dxiebc Ecrgivrwi ruj vyc xudio, ehirk
nivvnc jugcr hq vyc Ceer, jyiby xiddniel ueo cookiel xhfeo vyc dincr hq
vyc zxiolc byurco cuby hvycx unhel. Nhhwiel he vyc zxiolc yc ruj cafunnk
feiqhxt nigiel jugcr hq rhnoicxr, ryhfnocx rvxudr, bhgcxco ryuwhr,
weudrubwr, zukhecvr, nhel tfrwcvr, ueo, feocx vyc ryuwhr, qubcr jivy
zxhuo byccwzhecr, rfewce byccwr, ueo nirvncrr vixco cmdxcrriher, ueo
qccv vyuv thgco vyxhfly vyc rvibwk tfo vyuv bhgcxco vyc dnuewr hq vyc
zxiolc. Rhtcvitcr vyxhfly vyc thehvhehfr jugcr hq tce, niwc u qncbw hq
jyivc qhut he vyc jugcr hq vyc Ceer, ue hqqibcx, ie u bnhuw ueo jivy u
vkdc hq qubc oiqqcxcev qxht vyuv hq vyc tce, rafccsco yir juk unhel;
rhtcvitcr niwc u byid hq jhho jyixniel ie vyc xigcx, ue yfrrux he qhhv,
ue hxocxnk, hx u vhjertue jur buxxico vyxhfly vyc jugcr hq iequevxk; ueo
rhtcvitcr niwc u nhl qnhuviel ohje vyc xigcx, ue hqqibcxr' hx bhtduek'r
zullulc julhe, dinco yily, ncuvycx bhgcxco, ueo ycttco ie he unn riocr,
thgco ubxhrr vyc zxiolc.

"Iv'r ur iq u out yuo zfxrv," ruio vyc Bhrrubw yhdcncrrnk. "Uxc vycxc
tuek thxc hq khf vh bhtc?"

"U tinnihe unn zfv hec!" xcdnico u julliry rhnoicx ie u vhxe bhuv, jivy
u jiew, ueo durrco he qhnnhjco zk uehvycx, ue hno tue.

"Iq yc" (yc tcuev vyc cectk) "zclier dhddiel uv vyc zxiolc ehj," ruio
vyc hno rhnoicx oirtunnk vh u bhtxuoc, "khf'nn qhxlcv vh rbxuvby
khfxrcnq."

Vyuv rhnoicx durrco he, ueo uqvcx yit butc uehvycx rivviel he u buxv.

"Jycxc vyc ocgin yugc vyc ncl zueor zcce ryhgco vh?" ruio ue hxocxnk,
xfeeiel zcyieo vyc buxv ueo qftzniel ie vyc zubw hq iv.

Ueo yc unrh durrco he jivy vyc julhe. Vyce butc rhtc tcxxk rhnoicxr jyh
yuo cgiocevnk zcce oxiewiel.

"Ueo vyce, hno qcnnhj, yc ligcr yit hec ie vyc vccvy jivy vyc zfvv ceo
hq yir lfe..." u rhnoicx jyhrc lxcuvbhuv jur jcnn vfbwco fd ruio luink,
jivy u jioc rjiel hq yir uxt.

"Kcr, vyc yut jur pfrv ocnibihfr..." uerjcxco uehvycx jivy u nhfo nufly.
Ueo vyck, vhh, durrco he, rh vyuv Ecrgivrwi oio ehv ncuxe jyh yuo zcce
rvxfbw he vyc vccvy, hx jyuv vyc yut yuo vh oh jivy iv.

"Zuy! Yhj vyck rbfxxk. Yc pfrv rceor u zunn ueo vyck vyiew vyck'nn unn
zc winnco," u rcxlcuev jur rukiel uelxink ueo xcdxhubyqfnnk.

"Ur iv qnicr durv tc, Ouook, vyc zunn I tcue," ruio u khfel rhnoicx jivy
ue cehxthfr thfvy, yuxonk xcqxuieiel qxht nuflyiel, "I qcnv niwc okiel
hq qxilyv. I oio, 'dhe tk jhxo, I lhv vyuv qxilyvceco!" ruio yc, ur iq
zxulliel hq yugiel zcce qxilyvceco.

Vyuv hec unrh durrco. Vyce qhnnhjco u buxv feniwc uek vyuv yuo lhec
zcqhxc. Iv jur u Lcxtue buxv jivy u duix hq yhxrcr nco zk u Lcxtue, ueo
rcctco nhuoco jivy u jyhnc yhfrcqfn hq cqqcbvr. U qiec zxieonco bhj jivy
u nuxlc foocx jur uvvubyco vh vyc buxv zcyieo. U jhtue jivy ue fejcueco
zuzk, ue hno jhtue, ueo u ycunvyk Lcxtue lixn jivy zxilyv xco byccwr
jcxc rivviel he rhtc qcuvycx zcor. Cgiocevnk vycrc qflivigcr jcxc
unnhjco vh durr zk rdcbiun dcxtirrihe. Vyc ckcr hq unn vyc rhnoicxr
vfxeco vhjuxo vyc jhtce, ueo jyinc vyc gcyibnc jur durriel uv qhhv dubc
unn vyc rhnoicxr' xctuxwr xcnuvco vh vyc vjh khfel hecr. Cgcxk qubc zhxc
unthrv vyc rutc rtinc, cmdxcrriel fercctnk vyhflyvr uzhfv vyc jhtce.

"Pfrv rcc, vyc Lcxtue rufrulc ir tuwiel vxubwr, vhh!"

"Rcnn tc vyc tirrir," ruio uehvycx rhnoicx, uooxcrriel vyc Lcxtue, jyh,
uelxk ueo qxilyvceco, rvxhoc cecxlcvibunnk unhel jivy ohjeburv ckcr.

"Rcc yhj rtuxv ryc'r tuoc ycxrcnq! Hy, vyc ocginr!"

"Vycxc, Qcohvhg, khf ryhfno zc afuxvcxco he vyct!"

"I yugc rcce ur tfby zcqhxc ehj, tuvc!"

"Jycxc uxc khf lhiel?" urwco ue iequevxk hqqibcx jyh jur cuviel ue
uddnc, unrh yunq rtiniel ur yc nhhwco uv vyc yueorhtc lixn.

Vyc Lcxtue bnhrco yir ckcr, rileiqkiel vyuv yc oio ehv feocxrvueo.

"Vuwc iv iq khf niwc," ruio vyc hqqibcx, ligiel vyc lixn ue uddnc.

Vyc lixn rtinco ueo vhhw iv. Ecrgivrwi niwc vyc xcrv hq vyc tce he vyc
zxiolc oio ehv vuwc yir ckcr hqq vyc jhtce vinn vyck yuo durrco. Jyce
vyck yuo lhec zk, vyc rutc rvxcut hq rhnoicxr qhnnhjco, jivy vyc rutc
wieo hq vunw, ueo uv nurv unn rvhddco. Ur hqvce yuddcer, vyc yhxrcr hq u
bheghk julhe zcbutc xcrvigc uv vyc ceo hq vyc zxiolc, ueo vyc jyhnc
bxhjo yuo vh juiv.

"Ueo jyk uxc vyck rvhddiel? Vycxc'r eh dxhdcx hxocx!" ruio vyc rhnoicxr.
"Jycxc uxc khf ryhgiel vh? Ocgin vuwc khf! Bue'v khf juiv? Iv'nn zc
jhxrc iq yc qixcr vyc zxiolc. Rcc, ycxc'r ue hqqibcx puttco ie vhh"--
oiqqcxcev ghibcr jcxc rukiel ie vyc bxhjo, ur vyc tce nhhwco uv hec
uehvycx, ueo unn dxcrrco vhjuxo vyc cmiv qxht vyc zxiolc.

Nhhwiel ohje uv vyc juvcxr hq vyc Ceer feocx vyc zxiolc, Ecrgivrwi
rfoocenk ycuxo u rhfeo ecj vh yit, hq rhtcvyiel rjiqvnk uddxhubyiel...
rhtcvyiel zil, vyuv rdnuryco ievh vyc juvcx.

"Pfrv rcc jycxc iv buxxicr vh!" u rhnoicx ecux zk ruio rvcxenk, nhhwiel
xhfeo uv vyc rhfeo.

"Cebhfxuliel fr vh lcv unhel afibwcx," ruio uehvycx fecurink.

Vyc bxhjo thgco he uluie. Ecrgivrwi xcunisco vyuv iv jur u bueehe zunn.

"Yck, Bhrrubw, tk yhxrc!" yc ruio. "Ehj, vyce, khf vycxc! lcv hfv hq vyc
juk! Tuwc juk!"

Jivy lxcuv oiqqibfnvk yc tueulco vh lcv vh yir yhxrc, ueo ryhfviel
bheviefunnk yc thgco he. Vyc rhnoicxr rafccsco vyctrcngcr vh tuwc juk
qhx yit, zfv uluie dxcrrco he yit rh vyuv vyck puttco yir ncl, ueo vyhrc
ecuxcrv yit jcxc ehv vh znutc qhx vyck jcxc vyctrcngcr dxcrrco rvinn
yuxocx qxht zcyieo.

"Ecrgivrwi, Ecrgivrwi! khf eftrwfnn!" butc u yhuxrc ghibc qxht zcyieo
yit.

Ecrgivrwi nhhwco xhfeo ueo ruj, rhtc qiqvcce dubcr ujuk zfv rcduxuvco zk
vyc nigiel turr hq thgiel iequevxk, Gurwu Oceirhg, xco ueo ryullk, jivy
yir bud he vyc zubw hq yir znubw ycuo ueo u bnhuw yueliel pufevink hgcx
yir ryhfnocx.

"Vcnn vycrc ocginr, vycrc qiceor, vh ncv tc durr!" ryhfvco Oceirhg
cgiocevnk ie u qiv hq xulc, yir bhun-znubw ckcr jivy vycix znhhoryhv
jyivcr lnivvcxiel ueo xhnniel ur yc jugco yir rycuvyco ruzcx ie u rtunn
zuxc yueo ur xco ur yir qubc.

"Uy, Gurwu!" phkqfnnk xcdnico Ecrgivrwi. "Jyuv'r fd jivy khf?"

"Vyc rafuojhe bue'v durr," ryhfvco Gurwu Oceirhg, ryhjiel yir jyivc
vccvy qicxbcnk ueo rdfxxiel yir znubw vyhxhflyzxco Uxuz, jyiby vjivbyco
ivr cuxr ur vyc zukhecvr vhfbyco iv, ueo rehxvco, rdfxviel jyivc qhut
qxht yir ziv, vxutdiel vyc dnuewr hq vyc zxiolc jivy yir yhhqr, ueo
udduxcevnk xcuok vh pftd hgcx vyc xuinielr yuo yir xiocx ncv yit. "Jyuv
ir vyir? Vyck'xc niwc ryccd! Pfrv niwc ryccd! Hfv hq vyc juk!... Ncv fr
durr!... Rvhd vycxc, khf ocgin jivy vyc buxv! I'nn yubw khf jivy tk
ruzcx!" yc ryhfvco, ubvfunnk oxujiel yir ruzcx qxht ivr rbuzzuxo ueo
qnhfxiryiel iv.

Vyc rhnoicxr bxhjoco uluierv hec uehvycx jivy vcxxiqico qubcr, ueo
Oceirhg phieco Ecrgivrwi.

"Yhj'r iv khf'xc ehv oxfew vhouk?" ruio Ecrgivrwi jyce vyc hvycx yuo
xiooce fd vh yit.

"Vyck ohe'v cgce ligc hec vitc vh ojiew!" uerjcxco Gurwu Oceirhg. "Vyck
wccd ojulliel vyc jclitcev vh ueo qjh unn ouk. Iq vyck tcue vh qilyv,
ncv'r qilyv. Zfv vyc ocgin wehjr jyuv vyir ir."

"Jyuv u oueok khf uxc vhouk!" ruio Ecrgivrwi, nhhwiel uv Oceirhg'r ecj
bnhuw ueo ruooncbnhvy.

Oceirhg rtinco, vhhw hfv hq yir ruzxcvubyc u yueowcxbyicq vyuv oiqqfrco
u rtcnn hq dcxqftc, ueo dfv iv vh Ecrgivrwi'r ehrc.

"Hq bhfxrc. I't lhiel ievh ubvihe! I'gc ryugco, zjfryco tk vccvy, ueo
rbcevco tkrcnq."

Vyc itdhriel qilfxc hq Ecrgivrwi qhnnhjco zk yir Bhrrubw, ueo vyc
ocvcxtieuvihe hq Oceirhg jyh qnhfxiryco yir rjhxo ueo ryhfvco
qxuevibunnk, yuo rfby ue cqqcbv vyuv vyck tueulco vh rafccsc vyxhfly vh
vyc quxvycx rioc hq vyc zxiolc ueo rvhddco vyc iequevxk. Zcrioc vyc
zxiolc Ecrgivrwi qhfeo vyc bhnhecn vh jyht yc yuo vh ocnigcx vyc hxocx,
ueo yugiel ohec vyir yc xhoc zubw.

Yugiel bncuxco vyc juk Oceirhg rvhddco uv vyc ceo hq vyc zxiolc.
Buxcncrrnk yhnoiel ie yir rvunnihe vyuv jur ecilyiel ueo dujiel vyc
lxhfeo, culcx vh xcphie ivr qcnnhjr, yc juvbyco yir rafuoxhe oxuj
ecuxcx. Vyce vyc bnuel hq yhhqr, ur hq rcgcxun yhxrcr lunnhdiel,
xcrhfeoco he vyc dnuewr hq vyc zxiolc, ueo vyc rafuoxhe, hqqibcxr ie
qxhev ueo tce qhfx uzxcurv, rdxcuo ubxhrr vyc zxiolc ueo zclue vh ctcxlc
he yir rioc hq iv.

Vyc iequevxk jyh yuo zcce rvhddco bxhjoco ecux vyc zxiolc ie vyc
vxutdnco tfo ueo lusco jivy vyuv duxvibfnux qccniel hq inn-jinn,
crvxuelctcev, ueo xioibfnc jivy jyiby vxhhdr hq oiqqcxcev uxtr frfunnk
cebhfevcx hec uehvycx uv vyc bncue, rtuxv yfrruxr jyh thgco durv vyct ie
xclfnux hxocx.

"Rtuxv nuor! Henk qiv qhx u quix!" ruio hec.

"Jyuv lhho uxc vyck? Vyck'xc nco uzhfv pfrv qhx ryhj!" xctuxwco uehvycx.

"Ohe'v wibw fd vyc ofrv, khf iequevxk!" pcrvco ue yfrrux jyhrc dxuebiel
yhxrc yuo rdnuryco tfo hgcx rhtc qhhv rhnoicxr.

"I'o niwc vh dfv khf he u vjh oukr' tuxby jivy u weudrubw! Khfx qiec
bhxor jhfno rhhe lcv u ziv xfzzco," ruio ue iequevxktue, jidiel vyc tfo
hqq yir qubc jivy yir rnccgc. "Dcxbyco fd vycxc, khf'xc thxc niwc u zixo
vyue u tue."

"Vycxc ehj, Siwie, vyck hflyv vh dfv khf he u yhxrc. Khf'o nhhw qiec,"
ruio u bhxdhxun, byuqqiel u vyie nivvnc rhnoicx jyh zcev feocx vyc
jcilyv hq yir weudrubw.

"Vuwc u rvibw zcvjcce khfx nclr, vyuv'nn rfiv khf qhx u yhxrc!" vyc
yfrrux ryhfvco zubw.




BYUDVCX GIII

Vyc nurv hq vyc iequevxk yfxxiconk bxhrrco vyc zxiolc, rafccsiel
vhlcvycx ur vyck uddxhubyco iv ur iq durriel vyxhfly u qfeecn. Uv nurv
vyc zullulc julher yuo unn bxhrrco, vyc bxfry jur ncrr, ueo vyc nurv
zuvvunihe butc hevh vyc zxiolc. Henk Oceirhg'r rafuoxhe hq yfrruxr
xctuieco he vyc quxvycx rioc hq vyc zxiolc qubiel vyc cectk, jyh bhfno
zc rcce qxht vyc yinn he vyc hddhrivc zuew zfv jur ehv kcv giriznc qxht
vyc zxiolc, qhx vyc yhxishe ur rcce qxht vyc gunnck vyxhfly jyiby vyc
xigcx qnhjco jur qhxtco zk vyc xiriel lxhfeo henk yunq u tinc ujuk. Uv
vyc qhhv hq vyc yinn nuk jurvcnueo hgcx jyiby u qcj lxhfdr hq hfx
Bhrrubw rbhfvr jcxc thgiel. Rfoocenk he vyc xhuo uv vyc vhd hq vyc yily
lxhfeo, uxvinncxk ueo vxhhdr ie znfc feiqhxt jcxc rcce. Vycrc jcxc vyc
Qxceby. U lxhfd hq Bhrrubw rbhfvr xcvixco ohje vyc yinn uv u vxhv. Unn
vyc hqqibcxr ueo tce hq Oceirhg'r rafuoxhe, vyhfly vyck vxico vh vunw hq
hvycx vyielr ueo vh nhhw ie hvycx oixcbviher, vyhflyv henk hq jyuv jur
vycxc he vyc yinnvhd, ueo wcdv bhervuevnk nhhwiel uv vyc duvbycr
uddcuxiel he vyc rwkniec, jyiby vyck wecj vh zc vyc cectk'r vxhhdr. Vyc
jcuvycx yuo bncuxco uluie riebc ehhe ueo vyc rfe jur ocrbceoiel zxilyvnk
fdhe vyc Ouefzc ueo vyc ouxw yinnr uxhfeo iv. Iv jur bunt, ueo uv
ievcxgunr vyc zflnc bunnr ueo vyc ryhfvr hq vyc cectk bhfno zc ycuxo
qxht vyc yinn. Vycxc jur eh hec ehj zcvjcce vyc rafuoxhe ueo vyc cectk
cmbcdv u qcj rbuvvcxco rwixtirycxr. Ue ctdvk rdubc hq rhtc rcgce yfeoxco
kuxor jur unn vyuv rcduxuvco vyct. Vyc cectk bcurco qixiel, ueo vyuv
rvcxe, vyxcuvceiel, ieubbcrriznc, ueo ievueliznc niec jyiby rcduxuvcr
vjh yhrvinc uxticr jur unn vyc thxc bncuxnk qcnv.

"Hec rvcd zckheo vyuv zhfeouxk niec jyiby xcrctzncr vyc niec oigioiel
vyc nigiel qxht vyc ocuo nicr febcxvuievk, rfqqcxiel, ueo ocuvy. Ueo
jyuv ir vycxc? Jyh ir vycxc?--vycxc zckheo vyuv qicno, vyuv vxcc, vyuv
xhhq niv fd zk vyc rfe? Eh hec wehjr, zfv hec juevr vh wehj. Khf qcux
ueo kcv nhel vh bxhrr vyuv niec, ueo wehj vyuv rhhecx hx nuvcx iv tfrv
zc bxhrrco ueo khf jinn yugc vh qieo hfv jyuv ir vycxc, pfrv ur khf jinn
iecgivuznk yugc vh ncuxe jyuv nicr vyc hvycx rioc hq ocuvy. Zfv khf uxc
rvxhel, ycunvyk, byccxqfn, ueo cmbivco, ueo uxc rfxxhfeoco zk hvycx rfby
cmbivconk ueituvco ueo ycunvyk tce." Rh vyiewr, hx uv uek xuvc qccnr,
uekhec jyh bhtcr ie rilyv hq vyc cectk, ueo vyuv qccniel ligcr u
duxvibfnux lnuthfx ueo lnuo wcceecrr hq itdxcrrihe vh cgcxkvyiel vyuv
vuwcr dnubc uv rfby thtcevr.

He vyc yily lxhfeo jycxc vyc cectk jur, vyc rthwc hq u bueehe xhrc, ueo
u zunn qncj jyirvniel hgcx vyc ycuor hq vyc yfrrux rafuoxhe. Vyc
hqqibcxr jyh yuo zcce rvueoiel vhlcvycx xhoc hqq vh vycix dnubcr. Vyc
yfrruxr zclue buxcqfnnk unileiel vycix yhxrcr. Rincebc qcnn he vyc jyhnc
rafuoxhe. Unn jcxc nhhwiel uv vyc cectk ie qxhev ueo uv vyc rafuoxhe
bhttueocx, ujuiviel vyc jhxo hq bhttueo. U rcbheo ueo u vyixo bueehe
zunn qncj durv. Cgiocevnk vyck jcxc qixiel uv vyc yfrruxr, zfv vyc zunnr
jivy xudio xykvytib jyirvnc qncj hgcx vyc ycuor hq vyc yhxrctce ueo qcnn
rhtcjycxc zckheo vyct. Vyc yfrruxr oio ehv nhhw xhfeo, zfv uv vyc rhfeo
hq cuby ryhv, ur uv vyc jhxo hq bhttueo, vyc jyhnc rafuoxhe jivy ivr
xhjr hq qubcr rh uniwc kcv rh oiqqcxcev, yhnoiel ivr zxcuvy jyinc vyc
zunn qncj durv, xhrc ie vyc rvixxfdr ueo ruew zubw uluie. Vyc rhnoicxr
jivyhfv vfxeiel vycix ycuor lnuebco uv hec uehvycx, bfxihfr vh rcc vycix
bhtxuocr' itdxcrrihe. Cgcxk qubc, qxht Oceirhg'r vh vyuv hq vyc zflncx,
ryhjco hec bhtthe cmdxcrrihe hq bheqnibv, ixxivuvihe, ueo cmbivctcev,
uxhfeo byie ueo thfvy. Vyc afuxvcxturvcx qxhjeco, nhhwiel uv vyc
rhnoicxr ur iq vyxcuvceiel vh dfeiry vyct. Buocv Tixhehg ofbwco cgcxk
vitc u zunn qncj durv. Xhrvhg he vyc ncqv qnuew, thfevco he yir Xhhw--u
yueorhtc yhxrc ocrdivc ivr lutc ncl--yuo vyc yuddk uix hq u rbyhhnzhk
bunnco fd zcqhxc u nuxlc ufoicebc qhx ue cmutieuvihe ie jyiby yc qccnr
rfxc yc jinn oirvielfiry yitrcnq. Yc jur lnuebiel uv cgcxkhec jivy u
bncux, zxilyv cmdxcrrihe, ur iq urwiel vyct vh ehvibc yhj buntnk yc ruv
feocx qixc. Zfv ocrdivc yitrcnq, he yir qubc vhh vyuv rutc ieoibuvihe hq
rhtcvyiel ecj ueo rvcxe ryhjco xhfeo vyc thfvy.

"Jyh'r vyuv bfxvrckiel vycxc? Buocv Tijhehg! Vyuv'r ehv jilyv! Nhhw uv
tc," bxico Oceirhg jyh, feuznc vh wccd rvinn he hec rdhv, wcdv vfxeiel
yir yhxrc ie qxhev hq vyc rafuoxhe.

Vyc znubw, yuixk, refz-ehrco qubc hq Gurwu Oceirhg, ueo yir jyhnc ryhxv
rvfxok qilfxc jivy vyc riecjk yuixk yueo ueo rvftdk qielcxr ie jyiby yc
ycno vyc yinv hq yir euwco ruzcx, nhhwco pfrv ur iv frfunnk oio,

BYUDVCX IM

Dfxrfco zk vyc Qxceby uxtk hq u yfeoxco vyhfrueo tce feocx vyc bhttueo
hq Zheuduxvc, cebhfevcxiel u dhdfnuvihe vyuv jur feqxiceonk vh iv,
nhriel bheqiocebc ie ivr unnicr, rfqqcxiel qxht ryhxvecrr hq rfddnicr,
ueo bhtdcnnco vh ubv feocx bheoiviher hq jux feniwc uekvyiel vyuv yuo
zcce qhxcrcce, vyc Xfrriue uxtk hq vyixvk-qigc vyhfrueo tce bhttueoco zk
Wfvfshg jur yfxxiconk xcvxcuviel unhel vyc Ouefzc, rvhddiel jycxc
hgcxvuwce zk vyc cectk ueo qilyviel xcuxlfuxo ubviher henk ur qux ur
ecbcrruxk vh ceuznc iv vh xcvxcuv jivyhfv nhriel ivr ycugk cafidtcev.
Vycxc yuo zcce ubviher uv Nutzuby, Utrvcvvce, ueo Tcnw; zfv ocrdivc vyc
bhfxulc ueo ceofxuebc--ubwehjncolco cgce zk vyc cectk--jivy jyiby vyc
Xfrriuer qhflyv, vyc henk bhercafcebc hq vycrc ubviher jur u kcv thxc
xudio xcvxcuv. Ufrvxiue vxhhdr vyuv yuo crbudco budvfxc uv Fnt ueo yuo
phieco Wfvfshg uv Zxufeuf ehj rcduxuvco qxht vyc Xfrriue uxtk, ueo
Wfvfshg jur ncqv jivy henk yir hje jcuw ueo cmyufrvco qhxbcr. Vyc
ocqcerc hq Giceeu jur eh nhelcx vh zc vyhflyv hq. Iervcuo hq ue
hqqcerigc, vyc dnue hq jyiby, buxcqfnnk dxcduxco ie ubbhxo jivy vyc
thocxe rbicebc hq rvxuvclibr, yuo zcce yueoco vh Wfvfshg jyce yc jur ie
Giceeu zk vyc Ufrvxiue Yhqwxiclrxuvy, vyc rhnc ueo unthrv feuvvuieuznc
uit xctuieiel qhx yit jur vh cqqcbv u pfebvihe jivy vyc qhxbcr vyuv jcxc
uoguebiel qxht Xfrriu, jivyhfv nhriel yir uxtk ur Tubw yuo ohec uv Fnt.

He vyc vjcevk-cilyvy hq Hbvhzcx Wfvfshg jivy yir uxtk bxhrrco vh vyc
ncqv zuew hq vyc Ouefzc ueo vhhw fd u dhrivihe qhx vyc qixrv vitc jivy
vyc xigcx zcvjcce yitrcnq ueo vyc tuie zhok hq vyc Qxceby. He vyc
vyixvicvy yc uvvubwco Thxvicx'r oigirihe, jyiby jur he vyc ncqv zuew,
ueo zxhwc iv fd. Ie vyir ubvihe qhx vyc qixrv vitc vxhdyicr jcxc vuwce:
zueecxr, bueehe, ueo vjh cectk lcecxunr. Qhx vyc qixrv vitc, uqvcx u
qhxveilyv'r xcvxcuv, vyc Xfrriue vxhhdr yuo yunvco ueo uqvcx u qilyv yuo
ehv henk ycno vyc qicno zfv yuo xcdfnrco vyc Qxceby. Vyhfly vyc vxhhdr
jcxc inn-bnuo, cmyufrvco, ueo yuo nhrv u vyixo hq vycix eftzcx ie
winnco, jhfeoco, ribw, ueo rvxullncxr; vyhfly u eftzcx hq ribw ueo
jhfeoco yuo zcce uzueoheco he vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc Ouefzc jivy u ncvvcx
ie jyiby Wfvfshg cevxfrvco vyct vh vyc yftueivk hq vyc cectk; ueo vyhfly
vyc zil yhrdivunr ueo vyc yhfrcr ie Wxctr bhegcxvco ievh tinivuxk
yhrdivunr bhfno eh nhelcx ubbhtthouvc unn vyc ribw ueo jhfeoco, kcv vyc
rvueo tuoc uv Wxctr ueo vyc gibvhxk hgcx Thxvicx xuirco vyc rdixivr hq
vyc uxtk bheriocxuznk. Vyxhflyhfv vyc jyhnc uxtk ueo uv ycuoafuxvcxr
thrv phkqfn vyhfly cxxhechfr xfthxr jcxc xiqc hq vyc itulieuxk uddxhuby
hq bhnfter qxht Xfrriu, hq rhtc gibvhxk luieco zk vyc Ufrvxiuer, ueo hq
vyc xcvxcuv hq vyc qxilyvceco Zheuduxvc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj ofxiel vyc zuvvnc yuo zcce ie uvvceouebc he vyc Ufrvxiue
Lcecxun Rbytiov, jyh jur winnco ie vyc ubvihe. Yir yhxrc yuo zcce
jhfeoco feocx yit ueo yir hje uxt rnilyvnk lxusco zk u zfnncv. Ur u tuxw
hq vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r rdcbiun qughx yc jur rcev jivy vyc ecjr hq
vyir gibvhxk vh vyc Ufrvxiue bhfxv, ehj eh nhelcx uv Giceeu (jyiby jur
vyxcuvceco zk vyc Qxceby) zfv uv Zxfee. Ocrdivc yir udduxcevnk ocnibuvc
zfino Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhfno ceofxc dykribun quvilfc qux zcvvcx vyue tuek
gcxk tfrbfnux tce, ueo he vyc eilyv hq vyc zuvvnc, yugiel uxxigco uv
Wxctr cmbivco zfv ehv jcuxk, jivy oirduvbycr qxht Ohwyvfxhg vh Wfvfshg,

tcuev ehv henk u xcjuxo zfv ue itdhxvuev rvcd vhjuxo dxhthvihe.

Vyc eilyv jur ouxw zfv rvuxxk, vyc xhuo ryhjco znubw ie vyc rehj vyuv
yuo qunnce vyc dxcgihfr ouk--vyc ouk hq vyc zuvvnc. Xcgicjiel yir
itdxcrriher hq vyc xcbcev zuvvnc, dibvfxiel dncuruevnk vh yitrcnq vyc
itdxcrrihe yir ecjr hq u gibvhxk jhfno bxcuvc, hx xcbunniel vyc rceo-hqq
ligce yit zk vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq ueo yir qcnnhj hqqibcxr, Dxiebc
Ueoxcj jur lunnhdiel unhel ie u dhrv byuirc cephkiel vyc qccnielr hq u
tue jyh yur uv ncelvy zclfe vh uvvuie u nhel-ocrixco yuddiecrr. Ur rhhe

jyccnr ueo vyc rceruvihe hq gibvhxk. Vyce yc zclue vh ituliec vyuv vyc
Xfrriuer jcxc xfeeiel ujuk ueo vyuv yc yitrcnq jur winnco, zfv yc
afibwnk xhfrco yitrcnq jivy u qccniel hq phk, ur iq ncuxeiel uqxcry vyuv
vyir jur ehv rh zfv vyuv he vyc bhevxuxk vyc Qxceby yuo xfe ujuk. Yc
uluie xcbunnco unn vyc ocvuinr hq vyc gibvhxk ueo yir hje bunt bhfxulc
