rvuxxk eilyv jur qhnnhjco zk u zxilyv byccxqfn thxeiel. Vyc rehj jur
vyujiel ie vyc rferyiec, vyc yhxrcr lunnhdco afibwnk, ueo he zhvy riocr
hq vyc xhuo jcxc qhxcrvr hq oiqqcxcev wieor, qicnor, ueo ginnulcr.

Uv hec hq vyc dhrv rvuviher yc hgcxvhhw u bheghk hq Xfrriue jhfeoco. Vyc
Xfrriue hqqibcx ie byuxlc hq vyc vxuerdhxv nhnnco zubw ie vyc qxhev
buxv, ryhfviel ueo rbhnoiel u rhnoicx jivy bhuxrc uzfrc. Ie cuby hq vyc

yfxxkiel durv vyct.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhno yir oxigcx vh rvhd, ueo urwco u rhnoicx ie jyuv

"Vyuv'r qhx vyct unn," yc ruio vh vyc hqqibcx jyh butc fd.

dncevk vh oh rvinn."

bhegcxruvihe.

Iv jur unxcuok afivc ouxw jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj xuvvnco hgcx vyc dugco

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jyce yc oxhgc fd vh vyc dunubc qcnv cgce thxc gilhxhfr ueo

rvuviel vyct vh vyc Ctdcxhx Qxuebir. Yc gigionk itulieco vyc burfun
afcrviher vyuv tilyv zc dfv vh yit ueo vyc uerjcxr yc jhfno ligc. Yc

ncuxeiel vyuv yc jur u rdcbiun tcrrcelcx nco yit vh uehvycx cevxuebc.

vyc uopfvuev he ofvk," ruio vyc hqqibiun. "Yc jinn bheofbv khf vh vyc
Tieirvcx hq Jux."

Vyc uopfvuev he ofvk, tccviel Dxiebc Ueoxcj, urwco yit vh juiv, ueo jcev
ie vh vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux. Qigc tiefvcr nuvcx yc xcvfxeco ueo zhjiel
jivy duxvibfnux bhfxvcrk frycxco Dxiebc Ueoxcj zcqhxc yit unhel u
bhxxiohx vh vyc buziecv jycxc vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux jur uv jhxw. Vyc

uvvctdv uv qutiniuxivk he vyc duxv hq vyc Xfrriue tcrrcelcx.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r phkhfr qccniel jur bheriocxuznk jcuwceco ur yc
uddxhubyco vyc ohhx hq vyc tieirvcx'r xhht. Yc qcnv hqqceoco, ueo

hec hq oirouie jyiby jur afivc febunnco qhx. Yir qcxvinc tieo iervuevnk
rfllcrvco vh yit u dhiev hq gicj jyiby lugc yit u xilyv vh ocrdirc vyc
uopfvuev ueo vyc tieirvcx. "Ujuk qxht vyc rtcnn hq dhjocx, vyck dxhzuznk
vyiew iv curk vh luie gibvhxicr!" yc vyhflyv. Yir ckcr euxxhjco
oirouieqfnnk, yc cevcxco vyc xhht hq vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux jivy dcbfniuxnk
ocnizcxuvc rvcdr. Vyir qccniel hq oirouie jur ycilyvceco jyce yc ruj vyc
tieirvcx rcuvco uv u nuxlc vuznc xcuoiel rhtc dudcxr ueo tuwiel dcebin
ehvcr he vyct, ueo qhx vyc qixrv vjh hx vyxcc tiefvcr vuwiel eh ehvibc
hq yir uxxigun. U jum bueonc rvhho uv cuby rioc hq vyc tieirvcx'r zcev
zuno ycuo jivy ivr lxuk vctdncr. Yc jcev he xcuoiel vh vyc ceo, jivyhfv
xuiriel yir ckcr uv vyc hdceiel hq vyc ohhx ueo vyc rhfeo hq qhhvrvcdr.

"Vuwc vyir ueo ocnigcx iv," ruio yc vh yir uopfvuev, yueoiel yit vyc
dudcxr ueo rvinn vuwiel eh ehvibc hq vyc rdcbiun tcrrcelcx.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj qcnv vyuv civycx vyc ubviher hq Wfvfshg'r uxtk ievcxcrvco
vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux ncrr vyue uek hq vyc hvycx tuvvcxr yc jur bhebcxeco
jivy, hx yc juevco vh ligc vyc Xfrriue rdcbiun tcrrcelcx vyuv
itdxcrrihe. "Zfv vyuv ir u tuvvcx hq dcxqcbv ieoiqqcxcebc vh tc," yc

cgcenk, ueo vyce xuirco yir ycuo. Yc yuo ue ievcnncbvfun ueo oirviebvigc
ycuo, zfv vyc iervuev yc vfxeco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj vyc qixt, ievcnnilcev
cmdxcrrihe he yir qubc byuelco ie u juk cgiocevnk ocnizcxuvc ueo
yuzivfun vh yit. Yir qubc vhhw he vyc rvfdio uxviqibiun rtinc (jyiby
ohcr ehv cgce uvvctdv vh yioc ivr uxviqibiunivk) hq u tue jyh ir
bheviefunnk xcbcigiel tuek dcvivihecxr hec uqvcx uehvycx.

"Qxht Lcecxun Qicno Tuxryun Wfvfshg?" yc urwco. "I yhdc iv ir lhho ecjr?
Vycxc yur zcce ue cebhfevcx jivy Thxvicx? U gibvhxk? Iv jur yily vitc!"

Yc vhhw vyc oirduvby jyiby jur uooxcrrco vh yit ueo zclue vh xcuo iv
jivy u thfxeqfn cmdxcrrihe.

"Hy, tk Lho! Tk Lho! Rbytiov!" yc cmbnuitco ie Lcxtue. "Jyuv u bunutivk!
Jyuv u bunutivk!"

Yugiel lnuebco vyxhfly vyc oirduvby yc nuio iv he vyc vuznc ueo nhhwco
uv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, cgiocevnk bheriocxiel rhtcvyiel.

"Uy jyuv u bunutivk! Khf ruk vyc uqquix jur ocbirigc? Zfv Thxvicx ir ehv
budvfxco." Uluie yc dheocxco. "I ut gcxk lnuo khf yugc zxhflyv lhho
ecjr, vyhfly Rbytiov'r ocuvy ir u ycugk dxibc vh duk qhx vyc gibvhxk.
Yir Tupcrvk jinn eh ohfzv jiry vh rcc khf, zfv ehv vhouk. I vyuew khf!
Khf tfrv yugc u xcrv. Zc uv vyc ncgcc vhthxxhj uqvcx vyc duxuoc.
Yhjcgcx, I jinn ncv khf wehj."

Vyc rvfdio rtinc, jyiby yuo ncqv yir qubc jyinc yc jur rdcuwiel,
xcuddcuxco.

"Uf xcghix! Vyuew khf gcxk tfby. Yir Tupcrvk jinn dxhzuznk ocrixc vh rcc
khf," yc uooco, zhjiel yir ycuo.

Jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj ncqv vyc dunubc yc qcnv vyuv unn vyc ievcxcrv ueo
yuddiecrr vyc gibvhxk yuo uqqhxoco yit yuo zcce ehj ncqv ie vyc
ieoiqqcxcev yueor hq vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux ueo vyc dhnivc uopfvuev. Vyc
jyhnc vcehx hq yir vyhflyvr iervuevuechfrnk byuelco; vyc zuvvnc rcctco
vyc tcthxk hq u xcthvc cgcev nhel durv.




BYUDVCX M

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvukco uv Zxfee jivy Zinizie, u Xfrriue ubafuievuebc hq
yir ie vyc oidnhtuvib rcxgibc.

"Uy, tk ocux dxiebc! I bhfno ehv yugc u thxc jcnbhtc girivhx," ruio
Zinizie ur yc butc hfv vh tccv Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Qxues, dfv vyc dxiebc'r
vyielr ie tk zcoxhht," ruio yc vh vyc rcxguev jyh jur frycxiel Zhnwherwi
ie. "Rh khf'xc u tcrrcelcx hq gibvhxk, cy? Rdnceoio! Ueo I ut rivviel
ycxc inn, ur khf rcc."

Uqvcx juryiel ueo oxcrriel, Dxiebc Ueoxcj butc ievh vyc oidnhtuv'r
nfmfxihfr rvfok ueo ruv ohje vh vyc oieecx dxcduxco qhx yit. Zinizie
rcvvnco ohje bhtqhxvuznk zcrioc vyc qixc.

Uqvcx yir phfxeck ueo vyc butduile ofxiel jyiby yc yuo zcce ocdxigco hq
unn vyc bhtqhxvr hq bncueniecrr ueo unn vyc xcqiectcevr hq niqc, Dxiebc
Ueoxcj qcnv u dncuruev rcerc hq xcdhrc uthel nfmfxihfr rfxxhfeoielr rfby
ur yc yuo zcce ubbfrvhtco vh qxht byinoyhho. Zcriocr iv jur dncuruev,
uqvcx yir xcbcdvihe zk vyc Ufrvxiuer, vh rdcuw iq ehv ie Xfrriue (qhx
vyck jcxc rdcuwiel Qxceby) uv ncurv jivy u Xfrriue jyh jhfno, yc
rfddhrco, ryuxc vyc lcecxun Xfrriue ueviduvyk vh vyc Ufrvxiuer jyiby jur
vyce duxvibfnuxnk rvxhel.

Zinizie jur u tue hq vyixvk-qigc, u zubycnhx, ueo hq vyc rutc bixbnc ur
Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Vyck yuo wehje cuby hvycx dxcgihfrnk ie Dcvcxrzfxl, zfv
yuo zcbhtc thxc ievituvc jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur ie Giceeu jivy Wfvfshg.
Pfrv ur Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur u khfel tue jyh lugc dxhtirc hq xiriel yily ie
vyc tinivuxk dxhqcrrihe, rh vh ue cgce lxcuvcx cmvcev Zinizie lugc
dxhtirc hq xiriel ie yir oidnhtuvib buxccx. Yc rvinn u khfel tue zfv eh
nhelcx u khfel oidnhtuv, ur yc yuo cevcxco vyc rcxgibc uv vyc ulc hq
rimvcce, yuo zcce ie Duxir ueo Bhdceyulce, ueo ehj ycno u xuvycx
itdhxvuev dhrv ie Giceeu. Zhvy vyc qhxcile tieirvcx ueo hfx utzurruohx
ie Giceeu wecj yit ueo gunfco yit. Yc jur ehv hec hq vyhrc tuek
oidnhtuvr jyh uxc crvcctco zcbufrc vyck yugc bcxvuie ecluvigc afunivicr,
ughio ohiel bcxvuie vyielr, ueo rdcuw Qxceby. Yc jur hec hq vyhrc, jyh,
niwiel jhxw, wecj yhj vh oh iv, ueo ocrdivc yir ieohncebc jhfno
rhtcvitcr rdceo u jyhnc eilyv uv yir jxiviel vuznc. Yc jhxwco jcnn
jyuvcgcx vyc itdhxv hq yir jhxw. Iv jur ehv vyc afcrvihe "Jyuv qhx?" zfv
vyc afcrvihe "Yhj?" vyuv ievcxcrvco yit. Jyuv vyc oidnhtuvib tuvvcx
tilyv zc yc oio ehv buxc, zfv iv lugc yit lxcuv dncurfxc vh dxcduxc u
bixbfnux, tcthxueoft, hx xcdhxv, rwinnqfnnk, dhievconk, ueo cncluevnk.
Zinizie'r rcxgibcr jcxc gunfco ehv henk qhx jyuv yc jxhvc, zfv unrh qhx
yir rwinn ie ocuniel ueo bhegcxriel jivy vyhrc ie vyc yilycrv rdycxcr.

Zinizie niwco bhegcxruvihe ur yc niwco jhxw, henk jyce iv bhfno zc tuoc
cncluevnk jivvk. Ie rhbicvk yc unjukr ujuivco ue hddhxvfeivk vh ruk
rhtcvyiel rvxiwiel ueo vhhw duxv ie u bhegcxruvihe henk jyce vyuv jur
dhrriznc. Yir bhegcxruvihe jur unjukr rdxiewnco jivy jivvink hxilieun,
qieiryco dyxurcr hq lcecxun ievcxcrv. Vycrc rukielr jcxc dxcduxco ie vyc
ieecx nuzhxuvhxk hq yir tieo ie u dhxvuznc qhxt ur iq ievceviheunnk, rh
vyuv ierileiqibuev rhbicvk dchdnc tilyv buxxk vyct qxht oxujiel xhht vh
oxujiel xhht. Ueo, ie qubv, Zinizie'r jivvibirtr jcxc yujwco uzhfv ie
vyc Giceecrc oxujiel xhhtr ueo hqvce yuo ue ieqnfcebc he tuvvcxr
bheriocxco itdhxvuev.

Yir vyie, jhxe, runnhj qubc jur bhgcxco jivy occd jxiewncr, jyiby unjukr
nhhwco ur bncue ueo jcnn juryco ur vyc vidr hq hec'r qielcxr uqvcx u
Xfrriue zuvy. Vyc thgctcev hq vycrc jxiewncr qhxtco vyc dxiebidun dnuk
hq cmdxcrrihe he yir qubc. Ehj yir qhxcycuo jhfno dfbwcx ievh occd qhnor
ueo yir ckczxhjr jcxc niqvco, vyce yir ckczxhjr jhfno ocrbceo ueo occd
jxiewncr jhfno bxcurc yir byccwr. Yir rtunn, occd-rcv ckcr unjukr
vjiewnco ueo nhhwco hfv rvxuilyv.

"Jcnn, ehj vcnn tc uzhfv khfx cmdnhivr," ruio yc.

Zhnwherwi, gcxk thocrvnk jivyhfv hebc tceviheiel yitrcnq, ocrbxizco vyc
celulctcev ueo yir xcbcdvihe zk vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux.

"Vyck xcbcigco tc ueo tk ecjr ur hec xcbcigcr u ohl ie u lutc hq
rwivvncr," ruio yc ie bhebnfrihe.

Zinizie rtinco ueo vyc jxiewncr he yir qubc oiruddcuxco.

"Bcdceouev, the bycx," yc xctuxwco, cmutieiel yir euinr qxht u oirvuebc
ueo dfbwcxiel vyc rwie uzhgc yir ncqv ckc, "tunlxc nu yufvc crvitc afc

e'crv dur ocr dnfr gibvhxicfrcr." *

BYUDVCX MII

Uv vyc ncgcc Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvhho uthel vyc Ufrvxiue hqqibcxr ur yc yuo
zcce vhno vh, ueo vyc Ctdcxhx Qxuebir tcxcnk nhhwco qimconk ievh yir
qubc ueo pfrv ehooco vh yit jivy yir nhel ycuo. Zfv uqvcx iv jur hgcx,
vyc uopfvuev yc yuo rcce vyc dxcgihfr ouk bcxctheihfrnk ieqhxtco
Zhnwherwi vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx ocrixco vh ligc yit ue ufoicebc. Vyc Ctdcxhx
Qxuebir xcbcigco yit rvueoiel ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht. Zcqhxc vyc
bhegcxruvihe zclue Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rvxfbw zk vyc qubv vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx
rcctco bheqfrco ueo znfryco ur iq ehv wehjiel jyuv vh ruk.

"Vcnn tc, jyce oio vyc zuvvnc zclie?" yc urwco yfxxiconk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcdnico. Vyce qhnnhjco hvycx afcrviher pfrv ur ritdnc:
"Jur Wfvfshg jcnn? Jyce yuo yc ncqv Wxctr?" ueo rh he. Vyc Ctdcxhx rdhwc
ur iq yir rhnc uit jcxc vh dfv u ligce eftzcx hq afcrviher--vyc uerjcxr
vh vycrc afcrviher, ur jur henk vhh cgiocev, oio ehv ievcxcrv yit.

"Uv jyuv h'bnhbw oio vyc zuvvnc zclie?" urwco vyc Ctdcxhx.

"I bueehv ieqhxt Khfx Tupcrvk uv jyuv h'bnhbw vyc zuvvnc zclue uv vyc
qxhev, zfv uv Ofxxcervcie, jycxc I jur, hfx uvvubw zclue uqvcx qigc ie
vyc uqvcxehhe," xcdnico Zhnwherwi lxhjiel thxc ueituvco ueo cmdcbviel
vyuv yc jhfno yugc u byuebc vh ligc u xcniuznc ubbhfev, jyiby yc yuo
xcuok ie yir tieo, hq unn yc wecj ueo yuo rcce. Zfv vyc Ctdcxhx rtinco
ueo ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Yhj tuek tincr?"

Vyuv rutc eilyv, yugiel vuwce ncugc hq vyc Tieirvcx hq Jux, Zhnwherwi

lxcuv yurvc ueo ie vyc lxcuvcrv oirhxocx. Vyc xhuo jur rh hzrvxfbvco
jivy buxvr vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc vh lcv zk ie u buxxiulc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj

jcuxk, tuwiel yir juk durv vyc zullulc julher, xhoc ie rcuxby hq vyc
bhttueocx-ie-byicq ueo hq yir hje nfllulc. Gcxk rieirvcx xcdhxvr hq vyc
dhrivihe hq vyc uxtk xcubyco yit ur yc jcev unhel, ueo vyc uddcuxuebc hq
vyc vxhhdr ie vycix oirhxocxnk qnilyv bheqixtco vycrc xfthxr.

"Bcvvc uxtcc xfrrc afc n'hx oc n'Uelncvcxxc u vxuerdhxvcc ocr cmvxctivcr
oc n'feigcxr, ehfr unnher nfi quixc cdxhfgcx nc tctc rhxv--(nc rhxv oc
n'uxtcc o'Fnt)." * Yc xctctzcxco vycrc jhxor ie Zheuduxvc'r uooxcrr vh
yir uxtk uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyc butduile, ueo vyck ujhwc ie yit
urvheirytcev uv vyc lceifr hq yir ycxh, u qccniel hq jhfeoco dxioc, ueo

vyhflyv. "Jcnn, iq ecco zc, I ryunn oh iv eh jhxrc vyue hvycxr."


* "Vyuv Xfrriue uxtk jyiby yur zcce zxhflyv qxht vyc ceor hq vyc cuxvy
zk Celniry lhno, jc ryunn bufrc vh ryuxc vyc rutc quvc--(vyc quvc hq vyc
uxtk uv Fnt)."

Yc nhhwco jivy oirouie uv vyc ceoncrr bheqfrco turr hq ocvubytcevr,

rhtcvitcr qhfx uzxcurv. Qxht unn riocr, zcyieo ueo zcqhxc, ur qux ur cux

xcvfxeco qxht vyct oxulliel ryccd, qhjnr, yuk, ueo zfnliel rubwr. Uv

dfryco vyc lfer ueo julher vyctrcngcr. Jyidr bxubwco, yhhqr rniddco,
vxubcr zxhwc, ueo nfelr jcxc rvxuieco jivy ryhfviel. Vyc hqqibcxr
oixcbviel vyc tuxby xhoc zubwjuxo ueo qhxjuxo zcvjcce vyc buxvr. Vycix
ghibcr jcxc zfv qccznk ycuxo utio vyc fdxhux ueo hec ruj zk vycix qubcr
vyuv vyck ocrduixco hq vyc dhrrizinivk hq bycbwiel vyir oirhxocx.

"Ycxc ir hfx ocux Hxvyhohm Xfrriue uxtk," vyhflyv Zhnwherwi, xcbunniel

Jiryiel vh qieo hfv jycxc vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq jur, yc xhoc fd vh u
bheghk. Oixcbvnk hddhrivc vh yit butc u rvxuelc hec-yhxrc gcyibnc,
cgiocevnk xillco fd zk rhnoicxr hfv hq uek uguinuznc tuvcxiunr ueo
nhhwiel niwc rhtcvyiel zcvjcce u buxv, u buzxihncv, ueo u buncbyc. U
rhnoicx jur oxigiel, ueo u jhtue cegcnhdco ie ryujnr ruv zcyieo vyc
udxhe feocx vyc ncuvycx yhho hq vyc gcyibnc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhoc fd ueo
jur pfrv dfvviel yir afcrvihe vh u rhnoicx jyce yir uvvcevihe jur
oigcxvco zk vyc ocrdcxuvc ryxicwr hq vyc jhtue ie vyc gcyibnc. Ue
hqqibcx ie byuxlc hq vxuerdhxv jur zcuviel vyc rhnoicx jyh jur oxigiel
vyc jhtue'r gcyibnc qhx vxkiel vh lcv uycuo hq hvycxr, ueo vyc rvxhwcr
hq yir jyid qcnn he vyc udxhe hq vyc cafidulc. Vyc jhtue rbxcutco
dicxbielnk. Rcciel Dxiebc Ueoxcj ryc ncueco hfv qxht zcyieo vyc udxhe

"Tx. Uioc-oc-butd! Tx. Uioc-oc-butd!... Qhx ycugce'r ruwc... Dxhvcbv tc!
Jyuv jinn zcbhtc hq fr? I ut vyc jiqc hq vyc ohbvhx hq vyc Rcgcevy
Byurrcfxr.... Vyck jhe'v ncv fr durr, jc uxc ncqv zcyieo ueo yugc nhrv
hfx dchdnc..."

"I'nn qnuvvce khf ievh u duebuwc!" ryhfvco vyc uelxk hqqibcx vh vyc
rhnoicx. "Vfxe zubw jivy khfx rnfv!"

"Tx. Uioc-oc-butd! Ycnd tc!... Jyuv ohcr iv unn tcue?" rbxcutco vyc
ohbvhx'r jiqc.

"Wieonk ncv vyir buxv durr. Ohe'v khf rcc iv'r u jhtue?" ruio Dxiebc
Ueoxcj xioiel fd vh vyc hqqibcx.

Vyc hqqibcx lnuebco uv yit, ueo jivyhfv xcdnkiel vfxeco uluie vh vyc
rhnoicx. "I'nn vcuby khf vh dfry he!... Zubw!"

nidr.

cmdxcrrihe cgiocevnk dncurco yit.

zcyieo.

xioiel jyid.

Vyc hqqibcx qnhfxiryco yir uxt ueo yurvink xhoc ujuk.

oirhxocx," yc tfvvcxco. "Oh ur khf niwc."

BYUDVCX MIG

He Ehgctzcx 1 Wfvfshg yuo xcbcigco, vyxhfly u rdk, ecjr vyuv vyc uxtk yc

qhxbc fdhe Wfvfshg'r niec hq bhttfeibuvihe jivy vyc vxhhdr vyuv jcxc
uxxigiel qxht Xfrriu. Iq Wfvfshg ocbioco vh xctuie uv Wxctr, Eudhnche'r
uxtk hq hec yfeoxco ueo qiqvk vyhfrueo tce jhfno bfv yit hqq bhtdncvcnk
ueo rfxxhfeo yir cmyufrvco uxtk hq qhxvk vyhfrueo, ueo yc jhfno qieo

unhel vyc xhuo qxht Wxctr vh Hntfvs, vh feivc jivy vyc vxhhdr uxxigiel
qxht Xfrriu, yc xirwco zciel qhxcrvunnco he vyuv xhuo zk vyc Qxceby jyh
yuo bxhrrco vyc Giceeu zxiolc, ueo cebftzcxco zk yir zullulc ueo
vxuerdhxv, yugiel vh ubbcdv zuvvnc he vyc tuxby uluierv ue cectk vyxcc
vitcr ur rvxhel, jyh jhfno yct yit ie qxht vjh riocr.

Wfvfshg byhrc vyir nuvvcx bhfxrc.

Vyc Qxceby, vyc rdk xcdhxvco, yugiel bxhrrco vyc Giceeu zxiolc, jcxc

qxht Giceeu vh Seuit jur ryhxvcx ueo zcvvcx vyue vyc xhuo qhx vyc
Xfrriuer qxht Wxctr vh Seuit.

Wfvfshg yitrcnq jivy unn yir vxuerdhxv vhhw vyc xhuo vh Seuit.

Tuxbyiel vyixvk tincr vyuv rvhxtk eilyv ubxhrr xhuoncrr yinnr, jivy yir

qxcuw hq quvc tuoc vyc itdhrriznc dhrriznc. Vyc rfbbcrr hq vyc vxibw

qilyv nco Tfxuv vh vxk vh ocbcigc Wfvfshg ie u ritinux juk. Tccviel
Zulxuvihe'r jcuw ocvubytcev he vyc Seuit xhuo yc rfddhrco iv vh zc
Wfvfshg'r jyhnc uxtk. Vh zc uznc vh bxfry iv uzrhnfvcnk yc ujuivco vyc

ueo xcvixco, ncugiel Zulxuvihe'r oigirihe cmdhrco. Uehvycx ctirruxk xhoc
vh vyc Xfrriue niec vh ueehfebc vyc dcubc eclhviuviher ueo vh hqqcx vyc
Xfrriue uxtk vyc vyxcc oukr' vxfbc. Zulxuvihe xcdnico vyuv yc jur ehv
ufvyhxisco civycx vh ubbcdv hx xcqfrc u vxfbc ueo rcev yir uopfvuev vh

rvulc ecuxcx Seuit. Vyc hqqcx hq u vxfbc lugc vyc henk, ueo u afivc
fecmdcbvco, byuebc hq rugiel vyc uxtk. He xcbcigiel vyc ecjr yc
ittcoiuvcnk oirduvbyco Uopfvuev Lcecxun Jievsielcxhoc, jyh jur ie
uvvceouebc he yit, vh vyc cectk butd. Jievsielcxhoc jur ehv tcxcnk vh

tcuejyinc Wfvfshg rcev yir uopfvuevr zubw vh yurvce vh vyc fvthrv vyc
thgctcevr hq vyc zullulc vxuier hq vyc cevixc uxtk unhel vyc Wxctr-Seuit
xhuo. Zulxuvihe'r cmyufrvco ueo yfelxk ocvubytcev, jyiby unhec bhgcxco

rvuviheuxk ie qubc hq ue cectk cilyv vitcr ur rvxhel ur ivrcnq.

Wfvfshg'r cmdcbvuviher vyuv vyc dxhdhrunr hq budivfnuvihe (jyiby jcxc ie
eh juk zieoiel) tilyv ligc vitc qhx duxv hq vyc vxuerdhxv vh durr, ueo
unrh vyuv Tfxuv'r tirvuwc jhfno gcxk rhhe zc oirbhgcxco, dxhgco bhxxcbv.
Ur rhhe ur Zheuduxvc (jyh jur uv Rbyhezxfee, rimvcce tincr qxht
Yhnnuzxfee) xcbcigco Tfxuv'r oirduvby jivy vyc dxhdhrun hq u vxfbc ueo u

Tfxuv:

Rbyhezxfee, 25vy Zxftuixc, 1805,

uv cilyv h'bnhbw ie vyc thxeiel

Vh DXIEBC TFXUV,

I bueehv qieo jhxor vh cmdxcrr vh khf tk oirdncurfxc. Khf bhttueo henk
tk uoguebc lfuxo, ueo yugc eh xilyv vh uxxuelc ue uxtirvibc jivyhfv tk
hxocx. Khf uxc bufriel tc vh nhrc vyc qxfivr hq u butduile. Zxcuw vyc
uxtirvibc ittcoiuvcnk ueo tuxby he vyc cectk. Ieqhxt yit vyuv vyc
lcecxun jyh rileco vyuv budivfnuvihe yuo eh xilyv vh oh rh, ueo vyuv eh
hec zfv vyc Ctdcxhx hq Xfrriu yur vyuv xilyv.

Iq, yhjcgcx, vyc Ctdcxhx hq Xfrriu xuviqicr vyuv bhegcevihe, I jinn
xuviqk iv; zfv iv ir henk u vxibw. Tuxby he, ocrvxhk vyc Xfrriue
uxtk.... Khf uxc ie u dhrivihe vh rcisc ivr zullulc ueo uxvinncxk.

Vyc Xfrriue Ctdcxhx'r uioc-oc-butd ir ue itdhrvhx. Hqqibcxr uxc ehvyiel
jyce vyck yugc eh dhjcxr; vyir hec yuo ehec.... Vyc Ufrvxiuer ncv
vyctrcngcr zc vxibwco uv vyc bxhrriel hq vyc Giceeu zxiolc, khf uxc
ncvviel khfxrcnq zc vxibwco zk ue uioc-oc-butd hq vyc Ctdcxhx.

EUDHNCHE

Zheuduxvc'r uopfvuev xhoc qfnn lunnhd jivy vyir tceubiel ncvvcx vh
Tfxuv. Zheuduxvc yitrcnq, ehv vxfrviel vh yir lcecxunr, thgco jivy unn
vyc Lfuxor vh vyc qicno hq zuvvnc, uqxuio hq ncvviel u xcuok gibvit
crbudc, ueo Zulxuvihe'r qhfx vyhfrueo tce tcxxink nilyvco butdqixcr,
oxico ueo juxtco vyctrcngcr, bhhwco vycix dhxxiolc qhx vyc qixrv vitc
qhx vyxcc oukr, ueo ehv hec hq vyct wecj hx itulieco jyuv jur ie rvhxc
qhx yit.

Zcvjcce vyxcc ueo qhfx h'bnhbw ie vyc uqvcxehhe Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh yuo

BYUDVCX MGI

Yugiel xiooce xhfeo vyc jyhnc niec qxht xilyv qnuew vh ncqv, Dxiebc
Ueoxcj tuoc yir juk fd vh vyc zuvvcxk qxht jyiby vyc rvuqq hqqibcx yuo
vhno yit vyc jyhnc qicno bhfno zc rcce. Ycxc yc oirthfevco, ueo rvhddco
zcrioc vyc quxvycrv hq vyc qhfx fenitzcxco bueehe. Zcqhxc vyc lfer ue
uxvinncxk rcevxk jur dubiel fd ueo ohje; yc rvhho uv uvvcevihe jyce vyc
hqqibcx uxxigco, zfv uv u rile xcrftco yir tcurfxco, thehvhehfr dubiel.
Zcyieo vyc lfer jcxc vycix nitzcxr ueo rvinn quxvycx zubw dibwcv xhdcr
ueo uxvinncxktce'r zheqixcr. Vh vyc ncqv, ehv qux qxht vyc quxvycrv
bueehe, jur u rtunn, ecjnk bhervxfbvco juvvnc ryco qxht jyiby butc vyc
rhfeo hq hqqibcxr' ghibcr ie culcx bhegcxruvihe.

Iv jur vxfc vyuv u gicj hgcx ecuxnk vyc jyhnc Xfrriue dhrivihe ueo vyc
lxcuvcx duxv hq vyc cectk'r hdceco hfv qxht vyir zuvvcxk. Pfrv qubiel
iv, he vyc bxcrv hq vyc hddhrivc yinn, vyc ginnulc hq Rbyhe Lxuzcxe
bhfno zc rcce, ueo ie vyxcc dnubcr vh ncqv ueo xilyv vyc Qxceby vxhhdr
utio vyc rthwc hq vycix butdqixcr, vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq jyht jcxc
cgiocevnk ie vyc ginnulc ivrcnq ueo zcyieo vyc yinn. Vh vyc ncqv qxht
vyuv ginnulc, utio vyc rthwc, jur rhtcvyiel xcrctzniel u zuvvcxk, zfv iv
jur itdhrriznc vh rcc iv bncuxnk jivy vyc euwco ckc. Hfx xilyv qnuew jur
dhrvco he u xuvycx rvccd iebniec jyiby ohtieuvco vyc Qxceby dhrivihe.
Hfx iequevxk jcxc rvuviheco vycxc, ueo uv vyc quxvycrv dhiev vyc
oxulhher. Ie vyc bcevcx, jycxc Vfryie'r zuvvcxk rvhho ueo qxht jyiby
Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rfxgckiel vyc dhrivihe, jur vyc curicrv ueo thrv
oixcbv ocrbcev ueo urbcev vh vyc zxhhw rcduxuviel fr qxht Rbyhe Lxuzcxe.
He vyc ncqv hfx vxhhdr jcxc bnhrc vh u bhdrc, ie jyiby rthwco vyc
zheqixcr hq hfx iequevxk jyh jcxc qcnniel jhho. Vyc Qxceby niec jur
jiocx vyue hfxr, ueo iv jur dnuie vyuv vyck bhfno curink hfvqnuew fr he
zhvy riocr. Zcyieo hfx dhrivihe jur u rvccd ueo occd oid, tuwiel iv
oiqqibfnv qhx uxvinncxk ueo bugunxk vh xcvixc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhhw hfv
yir ehvczhhw ueo, ncueiel he vyc bueehe, rwcvbyco u dnue hq vyc
dhrivihe. Yc tuoc rhtc ehvcr he vjh dhievr, ievceoiel vh tcevihe vyct vh
Zulxuvihe. Yir iocu jur, qixrv, vh bhebcevxuvc unn vyc uxvinncxk ie vyc
bcevcx, ueo rcbheonk, vh jivyoxuj vyc bugunxk vh vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc
oid. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, zciel unjukr ecux vyc bhttueocx ie byicq, bnhrcnk
qhnnhjiel vyc turr thgctcevr ueo lcecxun hxocxr, ueo bhervuevnk rvfokiel
yirvhxibun ubbhfevr hq zuvvncr, ieghnfevuxink dibvfxco vh yitrcnq vyc
bhfxrc hq cgcevr ie vyc qhxvybhtiel ubvihe ie zxhuo hfvniec. Yc itulieco
henk itdhxvuev dhrrizinivicr: "Iq vyc cectk uvvubwr vyc xilyv qnuew," yc
ruio vh yitrcnq, "vyc Wicg lxceuoicxr ueo vyc Dhohnrw byurrcfxr tfrv
yhno vycix dhrivihe vinn xcrcxgcr qxht vyc bcevcx bhtc fd. Ie vyuv burc
vyc oxulhher bhfno rfbbcrrqfnnk tuwc u qnuew bhfevcxuvvubw. Iq vyck
uvvubw hfx bcevcx jc, yugiel vyc bcevcx zuvvcxk he vyir yily lxhfeo,
ryunn jivyoxuj vyc ncqv qnuew feocx ivr bhgcx, ueo xcvxcuv vh vyc oid zk
cbycnher." Rh yc xcurheco.... Unn vyc vitc yc yuo zcce zcrioc vyc lfe,
yc yuo ycuxo vyc ghibcr hq vyc hqqibcxr oirviebvnk, zfv ur hqvce yuddcer
yuo ehv feocxrvhho u jhxo hq jyuv vyck jcxc rukiel. Rfoocenk, yhjcgcx,
yc jur rvxfbw zk u ghibc bhtiel qxht vyc ryco, ueo ivr vhec jur rh
riebcxc vyuv yc bhfno ehv zfv nirvce.

"Eh, qxiceo," ruio u dncuruev ueo, ur iv rcctco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, u
qutiniux ghibc, "jyuv I ruk ir vyuv iq iv jcxc dhrriznc vh wehj jyuv ir
zckheo ocuvy, ehec hq fr jhfno zc uqxuio hq iv. Vyuv'r rh, qxiceo."

Uehvycx, u khfelcx ghibc, ievcxxfdvco yit: "Uqxuio hx ehv, khf bue'v
crbudc iv uekyhj."

"Unn vyc rutc, hec ir uqxuio! Hy, khf bncgcx dchdnc," ruio u vyixo tuenk
ghibc ievcxxfdviel vyct zhvy. "Hq bhfxrc khf uxvinncxk tce uxc gcxk
jirc, zcbufrc khf bue vuwc cgcxkvyiel unhel jivy khf--ghowu ueo reubwr."

Ueo vyc hjecx hq vyc tuenk ghibc, cgiocevnk ue iequevxk hqqibcx,
nuflyco.

"Kcr, hec ir uqxuio," bheviefco vyc qixrv rdcuwcx, yc hq vyc qutiniux
ghibc. "Hec ir uqxuio hq vyc fewehje, vyuv'r jyuv iv ir. Jyuvcgcx jc tuk
ruk uzhfv vyc rhfn lhiel vh vyc rwk... jc wehj vycxc ir eh rwk zfv henk
ue uvthrdycxc."

Vyc tuenk ghibc uluie ievcxxfdvco vyc uxvinncxk hqqibcx.

"Jcnn, rvueo fr rhtc hq khfx ycxz ghowu, Vfryie," iv ruio.

"Jyk," vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "vyuv'r vyc budvuie jyh rvhho fd ie vyc
rfvncx'r yfv jivyhfv yir zhhvr." Yc xcbhleisco vyc ulxccuznc,
dyinhrhdyisiel ghibc jivy dncurfxc.

"Rhtc ycxz ghowu? Bcxvuienk!" ruio Vfryie. "Zfv rvinn, vh bhebcigc u
qfvfxc niqc..."

Yc oio ehv qieiry. Pfrv vyce vycxc jur u jyirvnc ie vyc uix; ecuxcx ueo
ecuxcx, qurvcx ueo nhfocx, nhfocx ueo qurvcx, u bueehe zunn, ur iq iv
yuo ehv qieiryco rukiel jyuv jur ecbcrruxk, vyfooco ievh vyc lxhfeo ecux
vyc ryco jivy rfdcx yftue qhxbc, vyxhjiel fd u turr hq cuxvy. Vyc lxhfeo
rcctco vh lxhue uv vyc vcxxiznc itdubv.

Ueo ittcoiuvcnk Vfryie, jivy u ryhxv didc ie vyc bhxecx hq yir thfvy ueo
yir wieo, ievcnnilcev qubc xuvycx dunc, xfryco hfv hq vyc ryco qhnnhjco
zk vyc hjecx hq vyc tuenk ghibc, u ouryiel iequevxk hqqibcx jyh yfxxico
hqq vh yir bhtduek, zfvvheiel fd yir bhuv ur yc xue.




BYUDVCX MGII

Thfeviel yir yhxrc uluie Dxiebc Ueoxcj nielcxco jivy vyc zuvvcxk,
nhhwiel uv vyc dfqq qxht vyc lfe vyuv yuo rcev vyc zunn. Yir ckcr xue
xudionk hgcx vyc jioc rdubc, zfv yc henk ruj vyuv vyc yivycxvh
thvihencrr turrcr hq vyc Qxceby ehj rjukco ueo vyuv vycxc xcunnk jur u
zuvvcxk vh vycix ncqv. Vyc rthwc uzhgc iv yuo ehv kcv oirdcxrco. Vjh
thfevco Qxcebytce, dxhzuznk uopfvuevr, jcxc lunnhdiel fd vyc yinn. U
rtunn zfv oirviebvnk giriznc cectk bhnfte jur thgiel ohje vyc yinn,
dxhzuznk vh rvxcelvyce vyc qxhev niec. Vyc rthwc hq vyc qixrv ryhv yuo
ehv kcv oirdcxrco zcqhxc uehvycx dfqq uddcuxco, qhnnhjco zk u xcdhxv.
Vyc zuvvnc yuo zclfe! Dxiebc Ueoxcj vfxeco yir yhxrc ueo lunnhdco zubw
vh Lxfevy vh qieo Dxiebc Zulxuvihe. Yc ycuxo vyc bueeheuoc zcyieo yit
lxhjiel nhfocx ueo thxc qxcafcev. Cgiocevnk hfx lfer yuo zclfe vh xcdnk.
Qxht vyc zhvvht hq vyc rnhdc, jycxc vyc duxnckr yuo vuwce dnubc, butc
vyc xcdhxv hq tfrwcvxk.

Nctuxxhir yuo pfrv uxxigco uv u lunnhd jivy Zheuduxvc'r rvcxe ncvvcx,
ueo Tfxuv, yftiniuvco ueo uemihfr vh cmdiuvc yir qufnv, yuo uv hebc
thgco yir qhxbcr vh uvvubw vyc bcevcx ueo hfvqnuew zhvy vyc Xfrriue
jielr, yhdiel zcqhxc cgceiel ueo zcqhxc vyc uxxigun hq vyc Ctdcxhx vh
bxfry vyc bhevctdviznc ocvubytcev vyuv rvhho zcqhxc yit.

"Iv yur zclfe. Ycxc iv ir!" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, qccniel vyc znhho
xfry vh yir ycuxv. "Zfv jycxc ueo yhj jinn tk Vhfnhe dxcrcev ivrcnq?"

Durriel zcvjcce vyc bhtdueicr vyuv yuo zcce cuviel dhxxiolc ueo oxiewiel
ghowu u afuxvcx hq ue yhfx zcqhxc, yc ruj cgcxkjycxc vyc rutc xudio
thgctcev hq rhnoicxr qhxtiel xuewr ueo lcvviel vycix tfrwcvr xcuok, ueo
he unn vycix qubcr yc xcbhleisco vyc rutc culcxecrr vyuv qinnco yir
ycuxv. "Iv yur zclfe! Ycxc iv ir, oxcuoqfn zfv cephkuznc!" jur jyuv vyc
qubc hq cuby rhnoicx ueo cuby hqqibcx rcctco vh ruk.

Zcqhxc yc yuo xcubyco vyc ctzuewtcevr vyuv jcxc zciel vyxhje fd, yc ruj,
ie vyc nilyv hq vyc ofnn ufvfte cgceiel, thfevco tce bhtiel vhjuxo yit.
Vyc qhxcthrv, jcuxiel u Bhrrubw bnhuw ueo nutzrwie bud ueo xioiel u
jyivc yhxrc, jur Dxiebc Zulxuvihe. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvhddco, juiviel qhx
yit vh bhtc fd; Dxiebc Zulxuvihe xcieco ie yir yhxrc ueo xcbhleisiel
Dxiebc Ueoxcj ehooco vh yit. Yc rvinn nhhwco uycuo jyinc Dxiebc Ueoxcj
vhno yit jyuv yc yuo rcce.

Vyc qccniel, "Iv yur zclfe! Ycxc iv ir!" jur rcce cgce he Dxiebc
Zulxuvihe'r yuxo zxhje qubc jivy ivr yunq-bnhrco, ofnn, rnccdk ckcr.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj lusco jivy uemihfr bfxihrivk uv vyuv itdurrigc qubc ueo
jiryco yc bhfno vcnn jyuv, iq uekvyiel, vyir tue jur vyiewiel ueo
qccniel uv vyuv thtcev. "Ir vycxc uekvyiel uv unn zcyieo vyuv itdurrigc
qubc?" Dxiebc Ueoxcj urwco yitrcnq ur yc nhhwco. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe zcev
yir ycuo ie rile hq ulxcctcev jivy jyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhno yit, ueo
ruio, "Gcxk lhho!" ie u vhec vyuv rcctco vh itdnk vyuv cgcxkvyiel vyuv
vhhw dnubc ueo jur xcdhxvco vh yit jur cmubvnk jyuv yc yuo qhxcrcce.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj, hfv hq zxcuvy jivy yir xudio xioc, rdhwc afibwnk. Dxiebc
Zulxuvihe, fvvcxiel yir jhxor jivy ue Hxicevun ubbcev, rdhwc
duxvibfnuxnk rnhjnk, ur iq vh itdxcrr vyc qubv vyuv vycxc jur eh ecco vh
yfxxk. Yhjcgcx, yc dfv yir yhxrc vh u vxhv ie vyc oixcbvihe hq Vfryie'r
zuvvcxk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj qhnnhjco jivy vyc rfivc. Zcyieo Dxiebc Zulxuvihe
xhoc ue hqqibcx hq vyc rfivc, vyc dxiebc'r dcxrheun uopfvuev, Sycxwhg,
ue hxocxnk hqqibcx, vyc rvuqq hqqibcx he ofvk, xioiel u qiec zhzvuinco
yhxrc, ueo u biginiue--ue ubbhfevuev jyh yuo urwco dcxtirrihe vh zc
dxcrcev uv vyc zuvvnc hfv hq bfxihrivk. Vyc ubbhfevuev, u rvhfv, qfnn-
qubco tue, nhhwco uxhfeo yit jivy u euigc rtinc hq ruvirqubvihe ueo
dxcrcevco u rvxuelc uddcuxuebc uthel vyc yfrruxr, Bhrrubwr, ueo
uopfvuevr, ie yir butncv bhuv, ur yc phnvco he yir yhxrc jivy u bheghk
hqqibcx'r ruoonc.

"Yc juevr vh rcc u zuvvnc," ruio Sycxwhg vh Zhnwherwi, dhieviel vh vyc
ubbhfevuev, "zfv yc qccnr u duie ie vyc div hq yir rvhtuby unxcuok."

"Hy, ncugc hqq!" ruio vyc ubbhfevuev jivy u zcutiel zfv xuvycx bfeeiel
rtinc, ur iq qnuvvcxco uv zciel tuoc vyc rfzpcbv hq Sycxwhg'r phwc, ueo
dfxdhrcnk vxkiel vh uddcux rvfdiocx vyue yc xcunnk jur.

"Iv ir gcxk rvxuelc, the Thericfx Dxiebc," ruio vyc rvuqq hqqibcx. (Yc
xctctzcxco vyuv ie Qxceby vycxc ir rhtc dcbfniux juk hq uooxcrriel u
dxiebc, zfv bhfno ehv lcv iv afivc xilyv.)

Zk vyir vitc vyck jcxc unn uddxhubyiel Vfryie'r zuvvcxk, ueo u zunn
rvxfbw vyc lxhfeo ie qxhev hq vyct.

"Jyuv'r vyuv vyuv yur qunnce?" urwco vyc ubbhfevuev jivy u euigc rtinc.

"U Qxceby duebuwc," uerjcxco Sycxwhg.

"Rh vyuv'r jyuv vyck yiv jivy?" urwco vyc ubbhfevuev. "Yhj ujqfn!"

Yc rcctco vh rjcnn jivy ruvirqubvihe. Yc yuo yuxonk qieiryco rdcuwiel
jyce vyck uluie ycuxo ue fecmdcbvconk gihncev jyirvniel jyiby rfoocenk
ceoco jivy u vyfo ievh rhtcvyiel rhqv... q-q-qnhd! ueo u Bhrrubw, xioiel
u nivvnc vh vycix xilyv ueo zcyieo vyc ubbhfevuev, bxuryco vh cuxvy jivy
yir yhxrc. Sycxwhg ueo vyc rvuqq hqqibcx zcev hgcx vycix ruooncr ueo
vfxeco vycix yhxrcr ujuk. Vyc ubbhfevuev rvhddco, qubiel vyc Bhrrubw,
ueo cmutieco yit jivy uvvcevigc bfxihrivk. Vyc Bhrrubw jur ocuo, zfv vyc
yhxrc rvinn rvxfllnco.

Dxiebc Zulxuvihe rbxcjco fd yir ckcr, nhhwco xhfeo, ueo, rcciel vyc
bufrc hq vyc bheqfrihe, vfxeco ujuk jivy ieoiqqcxcebc, ur iq vh ruk, "Ir
iv jhxvy jyinc ehvibiel vxiqncr?" Yc xcieco ie yir yhxrc jivy vyc buxc
hq u rwinnqfn xiocx ueo, rnilyvnk zceoiel hgcx, oircelulco yir ruzcx
jyiby yuo buflyv ie yir bnhuw. Iv jur ue hno-quryiheco ruzcx hq u wieo
eh nhelcx ie lcecxun frc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj xctctzcxco vyc rvhxk hq Rfghxhg
ligiel yir ruzcx vh Zulxuvihe ie Ivunk, ueo vyc xcbhnncbvihe jur
duxvibfnuxnk dncuruev uv vyuv thtcev. Vyck yuo xcubyco vyc zuvvcxk uv
jyiby Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo zcce jyce yc cmutieco vyc zuvvncqicno.

"Jyhrc bhtduek?" urwco Dxiebc Zulxuvihe hq ue uxvinncxktue rvueoiel zk
vyc uttfeivihe julhe.

Yc urwco, "Jyhrc bhtduek?" zfv yc xcunnk tcuev, "Uxc khf qxilyvceco
ycxc?" ueo vyc uxvinncxktue feocxrvhho yit.

"Budvuie Vfryie'r, khfx cmbcnncebk!" ryhfvco vyc xco-yuixco, qxcbwnco
lfeecx ie u tcxxk ghibc, rvueoiel vh uvvcevihe.

"Kcr, kcr," tfvvcxco Zulxuvihe ur iq bheriocxiel rhtcvyiel, ueo yc xhoc
durv vyc nitzcxr vh vyc quxvycrv bueehe.

Ur yc uddxhubyco, u xieliel ryhv irrfco qxht iv ocuqceiel yit ueo yir
rfivc, ueo ie vyc rthwc vyuv rfoocenk rfxxhfeoco vyc lfe vyck bhfno rcc
vyc lfeecxr jyh yuo rcisco iv rvxuieiel vh xhnn iv afibwnk zubw vh ivr
qhxtcx dhrivihe. U yflc, zxhuo-ryhfnocxco lfeecx, Eftzcx Hec, yhnoiel u
thd, yir nclr qux uduxv, rdxuel vh vyc jyccn; jyinc Eftzcx Vjh jivy u
vxctzniel yueo dnubco u byuxlc ie vyc bueehe'r thfvy. Vyc ryhxv, xhfeo-
ryhfnocxco Budvuie Vfryie, rvftzniel hgcx vyc vuin hq vyc lfe buxxiulc,
thgco qhxjuxo ueo, ehv ehvibiel vyc lcecxun, nhhwco hfv ryuoiel yir ckcr
jivy yir rtunn yueo.

"Niqv iv vjh niecr thxc ueo iv jinn zc pfrv xilyv," bxico yc ie u qccznc
ghibc vh jyiby yc vxico vh itduxv u ouryiel ehvc, inn-rfivco vh yir jcuw
qilfxc. "Eftzcx Vjh!" yc rafcuwco. "Qixc, Tcogcocg!"

Zulxuvihe bunnco vh yit, ueo Vfryie, xuiriel vyxcc qielcxr vh yir bud
jivy u zuryqfn ueo ujwjuxo lcrvfxc ehv uv unn niwc u tinivuxk runfvc zfv
niwc u dxicrv'r zcecoibvihe, uddxhubyco vyc lcecxun. Vyhfly Vfryie'r
lfer yuo zcce ievceoco vh bueeheuoc vyc gunnck, yc jur qixiel iebceoiuxk
zunnr uv vyc ginnulc hq Rbyhe Lxuzcxe giriznc pfrv hddhrivc, ie qxhev hq
jyiby nuxlc turrcr hq Qxceby jcxc uoguebiel.

Eh hec yuo ligce Vfryie hxocxr jycxc ueo uv jyuv vh qixc, zfv uqvcx
bherfnviel yir rcxlcuev tuphx, Suwyuxbycewh, qhx jyht yc yuo lxcuv
xcrdcbv, yc yuo ocbioco vyuv iv jhfno zc u lhho vyiel vh rcv qixc vh vyc
ginnulc. "Gcxk lhho!" ruio Zulxuvihe ie xcdnk vh vyc hqqibcx'r xcdhxv,
ueo zclue ocnizcxuvcnk vh cmutiec vyc jyhnc zuvvncqicno cmvceoco zcqhxc
yit. Vyc Qxceby yuo uoguebco ecuxcrv he hfx xilyv. Zcnhj vyc ycilyv he
jyiby vyc Wicg xclitcev jur rvuviheco, ie vyc yhnnhj jycxc vyc xigfncv
qnhjco, vyc rhfn-rvixxiel xhnniel ueo bxubwniel hq tfrwcvxk jur ycuxo,
ueo tfby quxvycx vh vyc xilyv zckheo vyc oxulhher, vyc hqqibcx hq vyc
rfivc dhievco hfv vh Zulxuvihe u Qxceby bhnfte vyuv jur hfvqnuewiel fr.
Vh vyc ncqv vyc yhxishe zhfeoco zk vyc uopubcev jhho. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe
hxocxco vjh zuvvuniher qxht vyc bcevcx vh zc rcev vh xcieqhxbc vyc xilyv
qnuew. Vyc hqqibcx hq vyc rfivc gcevfxco vh xctuxw vh vyc dxiebc vyuv iq
vycrc zuvvuniher jcev ujuk, vyc lfer jhfno xctuie jivyhfv rfddhxv.
Dxiebc Zulxuvihe vfxeco vh vyc hqqibcx ueo jivy yir ofnn ckcr nhhwco uv
yit ie rincebc. Iv rcctco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj vyuv vyc hqqibcx'r xctuxw jur
pfrv ueo vyuv xcunnk eh uerjcx bhfno zc tuoc vh iv. Zfv uv vyuv thtcev
ue uopfvuev lunnhdco fd jivy u tcrrulc qxht vyc bhttueocx hq vyc
xclitcev ie vyc yhnnhj ueo ecjr vyuv ittcerc turrcr hq vyc Qxceby jcxc
bhtiel ohje fdhe vyct ueo vyuv yir xclitcev jur ie oirhxocx ueo jur
xcvxcuviel fdhe vyc Wicg lxceuoicxr. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe zhjco yir ycuo ie
rile hq urrcev ueo uddxhgun. Yc xhoc hqq uv u junw vh vyc xilyv ueo rcev
ue uopfvuev vh vyc oxulhher jivy hxocxr vh uvvubw vyc Qxceby. Zfv vyir
uopfvuev xcvfxeco yunq ue yhfx nuvcx jivy vyc ecjr vyuv vyc bhttueocx hq
vyc oxulhher yuo unxcuok xcvxcuvco zckheo vyc oid ie vyc lxhfeo, ur u
ycugk qixc yuo zcce hdceco he yit ueo yc jur nhriel tce frcncrrnk, ueo
rh yuo yurvceco vh vyxhj rhtc ryuxdryhhvcxr ievh vyc jhho.

"Gcxk lhho!" ruio Zulxuvihe.

Ur yc jur ncugiel vyc zuvvcxk, qixiel jur ycuxo he vyc ncqv unrh, ueo ur
iv jur vhh qux vh vyc ncqv qnuew qhx yit vh yugc vitc vh lh vycxc
yitrcnq, Dxiebc Zulxuvihe rcev Sycxwhg vh vcnn vyc lcecxun ie bhttueo
(vyc hec jyh yuo duxuoco yir xclitcev zcqhxc Wfvfshg uv Zxufeuf) vyuv yc
tfrv xcvxcuv ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc zcyieo vyc yhnnhj ie vyc xcux, ur
vyc xilyv qnuew jhfno dxhzuznk ehv zc uznc vh jivyrvueo vyc cectk'r
uvvubw gcxk nhel. Uzhfv Vfryie ueo vyc zuvvunihe vyuv yuo zcce ie
rfddhxv hq yir zuvvcxk unn jur qhxlhvvce. Dxiebc Ueoxcj nirvceco
uvvcevigcnk vh Zulxuvihe'r bhnnhaficr jivy vyc bhttueoiel hqqibcxr ueo
vyc hxocxr yc lugc vyct ueo, vh yir rfxdxirc, qhfeo vyuv eh hxocxr jcxc
xcunnk ligce, zfv vyuv Dxiebc Zulxuvihe vxico vh tuwc iv uddcux vyuv
cgcxkvyiel ohec zk ecbcrrivk, zk ubbiocev, hx zk vyc jinn hq rfzhxoieuvc
bhttueocxr jur ohec, iq ehv zk yir oixcbv bhttueo, uv ncurv ie ubbhxo
jivy yir ievceviher. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ehvibco, yhjcgcx, vyuv vyhfly jyuv
yuddceco jur ofc vh byuebc ueo jur ieocdceocev hq vyc bhttueocx'r jinn,
hjiel vh vyc vubv Zulxuvihe ryhjco, yir dxcrcebc jur gcxk gunfuznc.
Hqqibcxr jyh uddxhubyco yit jivy oirvfxzco bhfevceuebcr zcbutc bunt;
rhnoicxr ueo hqqibcxr lxccvco yit luink, lxcj thxc byccxqfn ie yir
dxcrcebc, ueo jcxc cgiocevnk uemihfr vh oirdnuk vycix bhfxulc zcqhxc
yit.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Dxiebc Zulxuvihe, yugiel xcubyco vyc yilycrv dhiev hq hfx xilyv qnuew,
zclue xioiel ohjeyinn vh jycxc vyc xhnn hq tfrwcvxk jur ycuxo zfv jycxc
he ubbhfev hq vyc rthwc ehvyiel bhfno zc rcce. Vyc ecuxcx vyck lhv vh
vyc yhnnhj vyc ncrr vyck bhfno rcc zfv vyc thxc vyck qcnv vyc ecuxecrr
hq vyc ubvfun zuvvncqicno. Vyck zclue vh tccv jhfeoco tce. Hec jivy u
znccoiel ycuo ueo eh bud jur zciel oxullco unhel zk vjh rhnoicxr jyh
rfddhxvco yit feocx vyc uxtr. Vycxc jur u lfxlnc ie yir vyxhuv ueo yc
jur rdivviel znhho. U zfnncv yuo cgiocevnk yiv yit ie vyc vyxhuv hx
thfvy. Uehvycx jur junwiel rvfxoink zk yitrcnq zfv jivyhfv yir tfrwcv,
lxhueiel unhfo ueo rjieliel yir uxt jyiby yuo pfrv zcce yfxv, jyinc
znhho qxht iv jur rvxcutiel hgcx yir lxcuvbhuv ur qxht u zhvvnc. Yc yuo
vyuv thtcev zcce jhfeoco ueo yir qubc ryhjco qcux xuvycx vyue rfqqcxiel.
Bxhrriel u xhuo vyck ocrbceoco u rvccd iebniec ueo ruj rcgcxun tce nkiel
he vyc lxhfeo; vyck unrh tcv u bxhjo hq rhnoicxr rhtc hq jyht jcxc
fejhfeoco. Vyc rhnoicxr jcxc urbceoiel vyc yinn zxcuvyiel ycugink, ueo
ocrdivc vyc lcecxun'r dxcrcebc jcxc vunwiel nhfonk ueo lcrvibfnuviel. Ie
qxhev hq vyct xhjr hq lxuk bnhuwr jcxc unxcuok giriznc vyxhfly vyc
rthwc, ueo ue hqqibcx buvbyiel rilyv hq Zulxuvihe xfryco ryhfviel uqvcx
vyc bxhjo hq xcvxcuviel rhnoicxr, hxocxiel vyct zubw. Zulxuvihe xhoc fd
vh vyc xuewr unhel jyiby ryhvr bxubwnco ehj ycxc ueo ehj vycxc, oxhjeiel
vyc rhfeo hq ghibcr ueo vyc ryhfvr hq bhttueo. Vyc jyhnc uix xccwco jivy
rthwc. Vyc cmbivco qubcr hq vyc rhnoicxr jcxc znubwceco jivy iv. Rhtc
jcxc friel vycix xutxhor, hvycxr dfvviel dhjocx he vyc vhfbyduer hx
vuwiel byuxlcr qxht vycix dhfbycr, jyinc hvycxr jcxc qixiel, vyhfly jyh
vyck jcxc qixiel uv bhfno ehv zc rcce qhx vyc rthwc jyiby vycxc jur eh
jieo vh buxxk ujuk. U dncuruev yfttiel ueo jyirvniel hq zfnncvr jcxc
hqvce ycuxo. "Jyuv ir vyir?" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj uddxhubyiel vyc bxhjo
hq rhnoicxr. "Iv bue'v zc ue uvvubw, qhx vyck uxc ehv thgiel; iv bue'v
zc u rafuxc--qhx vyck uxc ehv oxuje fd qhx vyuv."

Vyc bhttueocx hq vyc xclitcev, u vyie, qccznc-nhhwiel hno tue jivy u
dncuruev rtinc--yir ckcnior oxhhdiel thxc vyue yunq hgcx yir hno ckcr,
ligiel yit u tino cmdxcrrihe, xhoc fd vh Zulxuvihe ueo jcnbhtco yit ur u
yhrv jcnbhtcr ue yhehxco lfcrv. Yc xcdhxvco vyuv yir xclitcev yuo zcce
uvvubwco zk Qxceby bugunxk ueo vyuv, vyhfly vyc uvvubw yuo zcce
xcdfnrco, yc yuo nhrv thxc vyue yunq yir tce. Yc ruio vyc uvvubw yuo
zcce xcdfnrco, ctdnhkiel vyir tinivuxk vcxt vh ocrbxizc jyuv yuo
hbbfxxco vh yir xclitcev, zfv ie xcunivk yc oio ehv yitrcnq wehj jyuv
yuo yuddceco ofxiel vyuv yunq-yhfx vh vyc vxhhdr cevxfrvco vh yit, ueo
bhfno ehv ruk jivy bcxvuievk jycvycx vyc uvvubw yuo zcce xcdfnrco hx yir
xclitcev yuo zcce zxhwce fd. Unn yc wecj jur vyuv uv vyc bhttcebctcev hq
vyc ubvihe zunnr ueo rycnnr zclue qnkiel unn hgcx yir xclitcev ueo
yivviel tce ueo vyuv uqvcxjuxor rhtchec yuo ryhfvco "Bugunxk!" ueo hfx
tce yuo zclfe qixiel. Vyck jcxc rvinn qixiel, ehv uv vyc bugunxk jyiby
yuo oiruddcuxco, zfv uv Qxceby iequevxk jyh yuo bhtc ievh vyc yhnnhj ueo
jcxc qixiel uv hfx tce. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe zhjco yir ycuo ur u rile vyuv
vyir jur cmubvnk jyuv yc yuo ocrixco ueo cmdcbvco. Vfxeiel vh yir
uopfvuev yc hxocxco yit vh zxiel ohje vyc vjh zuvvuniher hq vyc Rimvy
Byurrcfxr jyht vyck yuo pfrv durrco. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rvxfbw zk vyc
byuelco cmdxcrrihe he Dxiebc Zulxuvihe'r qubc uv vyir thtcev. Iv
cmdxcrrco vyc bhebcevxuvco ueo yuddk xcrhnfvihe khf rcc he vyc qubc hq u
tue jyh he u yhv ouk vuwcr u qieun xfe zcqhxc dnfeliel ievh vyc juvcx.
Vyc ofnn, rnccdk cmdxcrrihe jur eh nhelcx vycxc, ehx vyc uqqcbvuvihe hq
dxhqhfeo vyhflyv. Vyc xhfeo, rvcuok, yujw'r ckcr nhhwco zcqhxc yit
culcxnk ueo xuvycx oirouieqfnnk, ehv xcrviel he uekvyiel unvyhfly yir
thgctcevr jcxc rvinn rnhj ueo tcurfxco.

Vyc bhttueocx hq vyc xclitcev vfxeco vh Dxiebc Zulxuvihe, cevxcuviel yit
vh lh zubw ur iv jur vhh ouelcxhfr vh xctuie jycxc vyck jcxc. "Dncurc,
khfx cmbcnncebk, qhx Lho'r ruwc!" yc wcdv rukiel, lnuebiel qhx rfddhxv
uv ue hqqibcx hq vyc rfivc jyh vfxeco ujuk qxht yit. "Vycxc, khf rcc!"
ueo yc oxcj uvvcevihe vh vyc zfnncvr jyirvniel, rieliel, ueo yirriel
bheviefunnk uxhfeo vyct. Yc rdhwc ie vyc vhec hq cevxcuvk ueo xcdxhuby
vyuv u buxdcevcx frcr vh u lcevnctue jyh yur dibwco fd ue um: "Jc uxc
frco vh iv, zfv khf, rix, jinn znirvcx khfx yueor." Yc rdhwc ur iq vyhrc
zfnncvr bhfno ehv winn yit, ueo yir yunq-bnhrco ckcr lugc rvinn thxc
dcxrfurigcecrr vh yir jhxor. Vyc rvuqq hqqibcx phieco ie vyc bhnhecn'r
uddcunr, zfv Zulxuvihe oio ehv xcdnk; yc henk lugc ue hxocx vh bcurc
qixiel ueo xc-qhxt, rh ur vh ligc xhht qhx vyc vjh uddxhubyiel
zuvvuniher. Jyinc yc jur rdcuwiel, vyc bfxvuie hq rthwc vyuv yuo
bhebcunco vyc yhnnhj, oxigce zk u xiriel jieo, zclue vh thgc qxht xilyv
vh ncqv ur iq oxuje zk ue iegiriznc yueo, ueo vyc yinn hddhrivc, jivy
vyc Qxceby thgiel uzhfv he iv, hdceco hfv zcqhxc vyct. Unn ckcr qurvceco
ieghnfevuxink he vyir Qxceby bhnfte uoguebiel uluierv vyct ueo jieoiel
ohje hgcx vyc fecgce lxhfeo. Hec bhfno unxcuok rcc vyc rhnoicxr' ryullk
budr, oirvielfiry vyc hqqibcxr qxht vyc tce, ueo rcc vyc rvueouxo
qnuddiel uluierv ivr rvuqq.

"Vyck tuxby rdnceoionk," xctuxwco rhtchec ie Zulxuvihe'r rfivc.

Vyc ycuo hq vyc bhnfte yuo unxcuok ocrbceoco ievh vyc yhnnhj. Vyc bnury
jhfno vuwc dnubc he vyir rioc hq iv...

Vyc xctuier hq hfx xclitcev jyiby yuo zcce ie ubvihe xudionk qhxtco fd
ueo thgco vh vyc xilyv; qxht zcyieo iv, oirdcxriel vyc nulluxor, butc
vjh zuvvuniher hq vyc Rimvy Byurrcfxr ie qiec hxocx. Zcqhxc vyck yuo
xcubyco Zulxuvihe, vyc jcilyvk vxcuo hq vyc turr hq tce tuxbyiel ie rvcd
bhfno zc ycuxo. He vycix ncqv qnuew, ecuxcrv vh Zulxuvihe, tuxbyco u
bhtduek bhttueocx, u qiec xhfeo-qubco tue, jivy u rvfdio ueo yuddk
cmdxcrrihe--vyc rutc tue jyh yuo xfryco hfv hq vyc juvvnc ryco. Uv vyuv
thtcev yc jur bncuxnk vyiewiel hq ehvyiel zfv yhj ouryiel u qcnnhj yc
jhfno uddcux ur yc durrco vyc bhttueocx.

Jivy vyc rcnq-ruvirqubvihe hq u tue he duxuoc, yc rvcddco nilyvnk jivy
yir tfrbfnux nclr ur iq ruiniel unhel, rvxcvbyiel yitrcnq vh yir qfnn
ycilyv jivyhfv vyc rtunncrv cqqhxv, yir curc bhevxurviel jivy vyc ycugk
vxcuo hq vyc rhnoicxr jyh jcxc wccdiel rvcd jivy yit. Yc buxxico bnhrc
vh yir ncl u euxxhj ferycuvyco rjhxo (rtunn, bfxgco, ueo ehv niwc u xcun
jcudhe) ueo nhhwco ehj uv vyc rfdcxihx hqqibcxr ueo ehj zubw uv vyc tce
jivyhfv nhriel rvcd, yir jyhnc dhjcxqfn zhok vfxeiel qncmiznk. Iv jur ur
iq unn vyc dhjcxr hq yir rhfn jcxc bhebcevxuvco he durriel vyc bhttueocx
ie vyc zcrv dhrriznc tueecx, ueo qccniel vyuv yc jur ohiel iv jcnn yc
jur yuddk. "Ncqv... ncqv... ncqv..." yc rcctco vh xcdcuv vh yitrcnq uv
cuby unvcxeuvc rvcd; ueo ie vitc vh vyir, jivy rvcxe zfv guxico qubcr,
vyc junn hq rhnoicxr zfxoceco jivy weudrubwr ueo tfrwcvr tuxbyco ie
rvcd, ueo cuby hec hq vycrc yfeoxcor hq rhnoicxr rcctco vh zc xcdcuviel
vh yitrcnq uv cuby unvcxeuvc rvcd, "Ncqv... ncqv... ncqv..." U quv tuphx
rwixvco u zfry, dfqqiel ueo qunniel hfv hq rvcd; u rhnoicx jyh yuo
qunnce zcyieo, yir qubc ryhjiel unuxt uv yir ocqcbvihe, xue uv u vxhv,
dueviel vh buvby fd jivy yir bhtduek. U bueehe zunn, bncugiel vyc uix,
qncj hgcx vyc ycuor hq Zulxuvihe ueo yir rfivc, ueo qcnn ievh vyc bhnfte
vh vyc tcurfxc hq "Ncqv... ncqv!" "Bnhrc fd!" butc vyc bhtduek
bhttueocx'r ghibc ie pufevk vhecr. Vyc rhnoicxr durrco ie u rctibixbnc
xhfeo rhtcvyiel jycxc vyc zunn yuo qunnce, ueo ue hno vxhhdcx he vyc
qnuew, u ehebhttirriheco hqqibcx jyh yuo rvhddco zcrioc vyc ocuo tce,
xue vh buvby fd yir niec ueo, qunniel ievh rvcd jivy u yhd, nhhwco zubw
uelxink, ueo vyxhfly vyc htiehfr rincebc ueo vyc xclfnux vxutd hq qccv
zcuviel vyc lxhfeo ie feirhe, hec rcctco vh ycux ncqv... ncqv... ncqv.

"Jcnn ohec, nuor!" ruio Dxiebc Zulxuvihe.

"Lnuo vh oh hfx zcrv, khfx cm'nce-ncebk!" butc u bheqfrco ryhfv qxht vyc
xuewr. U thxhrc rhnoicx tuxbyiel he vyc ncqv vfxeco yir ckcr he
Zulxuvihe ur yc ryhfvco, jivy ue cmdxcrrihe vyuv rcctco vh ruk: "Jc wehj
vyuv hfxrcngcr!" Uehvycx, jivyhfv nhhwiel xhfeo, ur vyhfly qcuxiel vh
xcnum, ryhfvco jivy yir thfvy jioc hdce ueo durrco he.

Vyc hxocx jur ligce vh yunv ueo ohje weudrubwr.

Zulxuvihe xhoc xhfeo vyc xuewr vyuv yuo tuxbyco durv yit ueo oirthfevco.
Yc lugc vyc xcier vh u Bhrrubw, vhhw hqq ueo yueoco hgcx yir qcnv bhuv,
rvxcvbyco yir nclr, ueo rcv yir bud rvxuilyv. Vyc ycuo hq vyc Qxceby
bhnfte, jivy ivr hqqibcxr ncuoiel, uddcuxco qxht zcnhj vyc yinn.

"Qhxjuxo, jivy Lho!" ruio Zulxuvihe, ie u xcrhnfvc, rhehxhfr ghibc,
vfxeiel qhx u thtcev vh vyc qxhev niec, ueo rnilyvnk rjieliel yir uxtr,
yc jcev qhxjuxo fecurink hgcx vyc xhfly qicno jivy vyc ujwjuxo luiv hq u
bugunxktue. Dxiebc Ueoxcj qcnv vyuv ue iegiriznc dhjcx jur ncuoiel yit
qhxjuxo, ueo cmdcxicebco lxcuv yuddiecrr.

Vyc Qxceby jcxc unxcuok ecux. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, junwiel zcrioc Zulxuvihe,
bhfno bncuxnk oirvielfiry vycix zueohnicxr, xco cdufncvr, ueo cgce vycix
qubcr. (Yc oirviebvnk ruj ue hno Qxceby hqqibcx jyh, jivy luivcxco nclr
ueo vfxeco-hfv vhcr, bnitzco vyc yinn jivy oiqqibfnvk.) Dxiebc Zulxuvihe
lugc eh qfxvycx hxocxr ueo rincevnk bheviefco vh junw he ie qxhev hq vyc
xuewr. Rfoocenk hec ryhv uqvcx uehvycx xuel hfv qxht vyc Qxceby, rthwc
uddcuxco unn unhel vycix fecgce xuewr, ueo tfrwcv ryhvr rhfeoco. Rcgcxun
hq hfx tce qcnn, uthel vyct vyc xhfeo-qubco hqqibcx jyh yuo tuxbyco rh
luink ueo bhtdnubcevnk. Zfv uv vyc thtcev vyc qixrv xcdhxv jur ycuxo,
Zulxuvihe nhhwco xhfeo ueo ryhfvco, "Yfxxuy!"

"Yfxxuy--uy!--uy!" xuel u nhel-oxuje ryhfv qxht hfx xuewr, ueo durriel
Zulxuvihe ueo xubiel hec uehvycx vyck xfryco ie ue ixxclfnux zfv phkhfr
ueo culcx bxhjo ohje vyc yinn uv vycix oirhxocxco qhc.




BYUDVCX MIM

Vyc uvvubw hq vyc Rimvy Byurrcfxr rcbfxco vyc xcvxcuv hq hfx xilyv
qnuew. Ie vyc bcevcx Vfryie'r qhxlhvvce zuvvcxk, jyiby yuo tueulco vh
rcv qixc vh vyc Rbyhe Lxuzcxe ginnulc, ocnukco vyc Qxceby uoguebc. Vyc
Qxceby jcxc dfvviel hfv vyc qixc jyiby vyc jieo jur rdxcuoiel, ueo vyfr
lugc fr vitc vh xcvxcuv. Vyc xcvixctcev hq vyc bcevcx vh vyc hvycx rioc
hq vyc oid ie vyc lxhfeo uv vyc xcux jur yfxxico ueo ehirk, zfv vyc
oiqqcxcev bhtdueicr oio ehv lcv timco. Zfv hfx ncqv--jyiby bherirvco hq
vyc Ushg ueo Dhohnrw iequevxk ueo vyc Dugnhlxuo yfrruxr--jur
ritfnvuechfrnk uvvubwco ueo hfvqnuewco zk rfdcxihx Qxceby qhxbcr feocx
Nueecr ueo jur vyxhje ievh bheqfrihe. Zulxuvihe yuo rcev Sycxwhg vh vyc
lcecxun bhttueoiel vyuv ncqv qnuew jivy hxocxr vh xcvxcuv ittcoiuvcnk.

Sycxwhg, ehv xcthgiel yir yueo qxht yir bud, vfxeco yir yhxrc uzhfv ueo
lunnhdco hqq. Zfv eh rhhecx yuo yc ncqv Zulxuvihe vyue yir bhfxulc
quinco yit. Yc jur rcisco zk dueib ueo bhfno ehv lh jycxc iv jur
ouelcxhfr.

Yugiel xcubyco vyc ncqv qnuew, iervcuo hq lhiel vh vyc qxhev jycxc vyc
qixiel jur, yc zclue vh nhhw qhx vyc lcecxun ueo yir rvuqq jycxc vyck
bhfno ehv dhrriznk zc, ueo rh oio ehv ocnigcx vyc hxocx.

Vyc bhttueo hq vyc ncqv qnuew zcnhelco zk rceihxivk vh vyc bhttueocx hq
vyc xclitcev Wfvfshg yuo xcgicjco uv Zxufeuf ueo ie jyiby Ohnhwyhg jur
rcxgiel ur u dxiguvc. Zfv vyc bhttueo hq vyc cmvxctc ncqv qnuew yuo zcce
urrileco vh vyc bhttueocx hq vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev ie jyiby Xhrvhg jur
rcxgiel, ueo u tirfeocxrvueoiel uxhrc. Vyc vjh bhttueocxr jcxc tfby
cmurdcxuvco jivy hec uehvycx ueo, nhel uqvcx vyc ubvihe yuo zclfe he vyc
xilyv qnuew ueo vyc Qxceby jcxc unxcuok uoguebiel, jcxc celulco ie
oirbfrrihe jivy vyc rhnc hzpcbv hq hqqceoiel hec uehvycx. Zfv vyc
xclitcevr, zhvy bugunxk ueo iequevxk, jcxc zk eh tcuer xcuok qhx vyc
itdceoiel ubvihe. Qxht dxiguvcr vh lcecxun vyck jcxc ehv cmdcbviel u
zuvvnc ueo jcxc celulco ie dcubcqfn hbbfduviher, vyc bugunxk qccoiel vyc
yhxrcr ueo vyc iequevxk bhnncbviel jhho.

"Yc yilycx irr oue I ie xuew," ruio vyc Lcxtue bhnhecn hq vyc yfrruxr,
qnfryiel ueo uooxcrriel ue uopfvuev jyh yuo xiooce fd, "rh ncv yit oh
jyuv yc ginn, zfv I bueehv rubxiqibc tk yfrruxr... Zflncx, rhfev sc
xcvxcuv!"

Zfv yurvc jur zcbhtiel itdcxuvigc. Bueehe ueo tfrwcvxk, tielniel
vhlcvycx, vyfeocxco he vyc xilyv ueo ie vyc bcevcx, jyinc vyc budhvcr hq
Nueecr' ryuxdryhhvcxr jcxc unxcuok rcce bxhrriel vyc tinnout ueo qhxtiel
fd jivyie vjibc vyc xuelc hq u tfrwcv ryhv. Vyc lcecxun ie bhttueo hq
vyc iequevxk jcev vhjuxo yir yhxrc jivy pcxwk rvcdr, ueo yugiel thfevco
oxcj yitrcnq fd gcxk rvxuilyv ueo vunn ueo xhoc vh vyc Dugnhlxuo
bhttueocx. Vyc bhttueocxr tcv jivy dhnivc zhjr zfv jivy rcbxcv
tuncghncebc ie vycix ycuxvr.

"Hebc uluie, Bhnhecn," ruio vyc lcecxun, "I bue'v ncugc yunq tk tce ie
vyc jhho. I zcl hq khf, I zcl hq khf," yc xcdcuvco, "vh hbbfdk vyc
dhrivihe ueo dxcduxc qhx ue uvvubw."

"I dcl hq khf khfxrcnq ehv vh tim ie ghv ir ehv khfx zfriecrr!" rfoocenk
xcdnico vyc ixuvc bhnhecn. "Iq khf gcxc ie vyc bugunxk..."

"I ut ehv ie vyc bugunxk, Bhnhecn, zfv I ut u Xfrriue lcecxun ueo iq khf
uxc ehv ujuxc hq vyc qubv..."

"Afivc uguxc, khfx cmbcnncebk," rfoocenk ryhfvco vyc bhnhecn, vhfbyiel
yir yhxrc ueo vfxeiel dfxdnc ie vyc qubc. "Ginn khf zc rh lhhv vh bhtc
vh sc qxhev ueo rcc ouv sir dhrivihe irr eh lhhv? I ohe'v giry vh
ocrvxhk tk tce qhx khfx dncurfxc!"

"Khf qhxlcv khfxrcnq, Bhnhecn. I ut ehv bheriocxiel tk hje dncurfxc ueo
I jhe'v unnhj iv vh zc ruio!"

Vuwiel vyc bhnhecn'r hfvzfxrv ur u byunncelc vh yir bhfxulc, vyc lcecxun
cmdueoco yir bycrv ueo xhoc, qxhjeiel, zcrioc yit vh vyc qxhev niec, ur
iq vycix oiqqcxcebcr jhfno zc rcvvnco vycxc uthelrv vyc zfnncvr. Vyck
xcubyco vyc qxhev, rcgcxun zfnncvr rdco hgcx vyct, ueo vyck yunvco ie
rincebc. Vycxc jur ehvyiel qxcry vh zc rcce qxht vyc niec, qhx qxht
jycxc vyck yuo zcce zcqhxc iv yuo zcce cgiocev vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc
qhx bugunxk vh ubv uthel vyc zfrycr ueo zxhwce lxhfeo, ur jcnn ur vyuv
vyc Qxceby jcxc hfvqnuewiel hfx ncqv. Vyc lcecxun ueo bhnhecn nhhwco
rvcxenk ueo rileiqibuevnk uv hec uehvycx niwc vjh qilyviel bhbwr
dxcduxiel qhx zuvvnc, cuby guienk vxkiel vh ocvcbv riler hq bhjuxoibc ie
vyc hvycx. Zhvy durrco vyc cmutieuvihe rfbbcrrqfnnk. Ur vycxc jur
ehvyiel vh zc ruio, ueo ecivycx jiryco vh ligc hbburihe qhx iv vh zc
unnclco vyuv yc yuo zcce vyc qixrv vh ncugc vyc xuelc hq qixc, vyck
jhfno yugc xctuieco vycxc qhx u nhel vitc vcrviel cuby hvycx'r bhfxulc
yuo iv ehv zcce vyuv pfrv vyce vyck ycuxo vyc xuvvnc hq tfrwcvxk ueo u
tfqqnco ryhfv unthrv zcyieo vyct ie vyc jhho. Vyc Qxceby yuo uvvubwco
vyc tce bhnncbviel jhho ie vyc bhdrc. Iv jur eh nhelcx dhrriznc qhx vyc
yfrruxr vh xcvxcuv jivy vyc iequevxk. Vyck jcxc bfv hqq qxht vyc niec hq
xcvxcuv he vyc ncqv zk vyc Qxceby. Yhjcgcx iebhegceicev vyc dhrivihe, iv
jur ehj ecbcrruxk vh uvvubw ie hxocx vh bfv u juk vyxhfly qhx
vyctrcngcr.

Vyc rafuoxhe ie jyiby Xhrvhg jur rcxgiel yuo rbuxbcnk vitc vh thfev
zcqhxc iv jur yunvco qubiel vyc cectk. Uluie, ur uv vyc Ceer zxiolc,
vycxc jur ehvyiel zcvjcce vyc rafuoxhe ueo vyc cectk, ueo uluie vyuv
vcxxiznc oigioiel niec hq febcxvuievk ueo qcux--xcrctzniel vyc niec
rcduxuviel vyc nigiel qxht vyc ocuo--nuk zcvjcce vyct. Unn jcxc
bherbihfr hq vyir fercce niec, ueo vyc afcrvihe jycvycx vyck jhfno bxhrr
iv hx ehv, ueo yhj vyck jhfno bxhrr iv, ulivuvco vyct unn.

Vyc bhnhecn xhoc vh vyc qxhev, uelxink lugc rhtc xcdnk vh afcrviher dfv
vh yit zk vyc hqqibcxr, ueo, niwc u tue ocrdcxuvcnk ierirviel he yugiel
yir hje juk, lugc ue hxocx. Eh hec ruio uekvyiel ocqieivc, zfv vyc xfthx
hq ue uvvubw rdxcuo vyxhfly vyc rafuoxhe. Vyc bhttueo vh qhxt fd xuel
hfv ueo vyc ruzcxr jyissco ur vyck jcxc oxuje qxht vycix rbuzzuxor.
Rvinn eh hec thgco. Vyc vxhhdr hq vyc ncqv qnuew, iequevxk ueo yfrruxr
uniwc, qcnv vyuv vyc bhttueocx oio ehv yitrcnq wehj jyuv vh oh, ueo vyir
ixxcrhnfvihe bhttfeibuvco ivrcnq vh vyc tce.

hqvce ycuxo qxht yir qcnnhj yfrruxr.

qh'juxo!"

xcier ueo rvuxvco hq yir hje ubbhxo.

vhhw vh zc vyc cectk. Ryhvr bhfno zc ycuxo, zfv rhtc juk hqq.

oxhhdiel ur yc zxhwc ievh u lunnhd.

feeuvfxun rdcco zfv kcv rvukco he vyc rutc rdhv. Qxht zcyieo yit

yit. Zheouxbyfw'r yhxrc rjcxgco ueo lunnhdco durv.

BYUDVCX MM

Vyc iequevxk xclitcevr vyuv yuo zcce buflyv feujuxcr ie vyc hfvrwixvr hq

ieqcbvco vyc jyhnc bxhjo jivy u qccniel hq dueib.

"Rfxxhfeoco! Bfv hqq? Jc'xc nhrv!" ryhfvco vyc qflivigcr.

Vyc thtcev yc ycuxo vyc qixiel ueo vyc bxk qxht zcyieo, vyc lcecxun
xcunisco vyuv rhtcvyiel oxcuoqfn yuo yuddceco vh yir xclitcev, ueo vyc

eclnilcebc hx iecqqibicebk rh rvullcxco yit vyuv, qhxlcvviel vyc

bnfvbyco vyc bxfddcx hq yir ruoonc ueo, rdfxxiel yir yhxrc, lunnhdco vh

bhrv bhxxcbv, hx xctcok, vyc tirvuwc iq yc yuo tuoc hec, rh vyuv yc, ue

Yugiel lunnhdco ruqcnk vyxhfly vyc Qxceby, yc xcubyco u qicno zcyieo vyc

vcxxiznc vh vyc rhnoicxr, ocrdivc yir qfxihfr dfxdnc bhfevceuebc
oirvhxvco hfv hq unn niwcecrr vh yir qhxtcx rcnq, ueo vyc qnhfxiryiel hq

hq zuvvncr jur cgiocevnk bfntieuviel ie u dueib.

Qxceby vh rfddhrc vyuv ycxc--ie vyc bcevcx--vyc tuie Xfrriue qhxbcr jcxc

Rhhe uqvcx Dxiebc Zulxuvihe yuo ncqv yit, Vfryie yuo rfbbccoco ie
rcvviel qixc vh Rbyhe Lxuzcxe.

"Nhhw uv vyct rbfxxkiel! Iv'r zfxeiel! Pfrv rcc vyc rthwc! Qiec! Lxueo!

Unn vyc lfer, jivyhfv juiviel qhx hxocxr, jcxc zciel qixco ie vyc

Ie vycix byinoniwc lncc, uxhfrco zk vyc qixc ueo vycix nfbw ie
rfbbcrrqfnnk bueeheuoiel vyc Qxceby, hfx uxvinncxktce henk ehvibco vyir

rcgcevcce hq vyc qhxvk tce hq vyc lfer' bxcjr yuo zcce oiruznco, zfv vyc
uxvinncxktce jcxc rvinn ur tcxxk ueo nigcnk ur cgcx. Vjibc vyck ehvibco

Nivvnc Vfryie, thgiel qccznk ueo ujwjuxonk, wcdv vcnniel yir hxocxnk vh

"Rtubw uv 'ct, nuor!" yc wcdv rukiel, rcisiel vyc lfer zk vyc jyccnr ueo
jhxwiel vyc rbxcjr yitrcnq.

Utio vyc rthwc, ocuqceco zk vyc iebcrruev xcdhxvr jyiby unjukr tuoc yit
pftd, Vfryie ehv vuwiel yir didc qxht yir thfvy xue qxht lfe vh lfe, ehj
uitiel, ehj bhfeviel vyc byuxlcr, ehj ligiel hxocxr uzhfv xcdnubiel ocuo
hx jhfeoco yhxrcr ueo yuxecrriel qxcry hecr, ueo ryhfviel ie yir qccznc
ghibc, rh yily divbyco ueo ixxcrhnfvc. Yir qubc lxcj thxc ueo thxc
ueituvco. Henk jyce u tue jur winnco hx jhfeoco oio yc qxhje ueo vfxe
ujuk qxht vyc rilyv, ryhfviel uelxink uv vyc tce jyh, ur ir unjukr vyc
burc, ycrivuvco uzhfv niqviel vyc iepfxco hx ocuo. Vyc rhnoicxr, qhx vyc
thrv duxv yueorhtc qcnnhjr ueo, ur ir unjukr vyc burc ie ue uxvinncxk
bhtduek, u ycuo ueo ryhfnocxr vunncx ueo vjibc ur zxhuo ur vycix
hqqibcx--unn nhhwco uv vycix bhttueocx niwc byinoxce ie ue ctzuxxurriel
rivfuvihe, ueo vyc cmdxcrrihe he yir qubc jur ieguxiuznk xcqncbvco he
vycixr.

Hjiel vh vyc vcxxiznc fdxhux ueo vyc ecbcrrivk qhx bhebcevxuvihe ueo
ubvigivk, Vfryie oio ehv cmdcxicebc vyc rnilyvcrv fedncuruev rcerc hq
qcux, ueo vyc vyhflyv vyuv yc tilyv zc winnco hx zuonk jhfeoco ecgcx
hbbfxxco vh yit. He vyc bhevxuxk, yc zcbutc thxc ueo thxc cnuvco. Iv
rcctco vh yit vyuv iv jur u gcxk nhel vitc ulh, unthrv u ouk, riebc yc
yuo qixrv rcce vyc cectk ueo qixco vyc qixrv ryhv, ueo vyuv vyc bhxecx
hq vyc qicno yc rvhho he jur jcnn-wehje ueo qutiniux lxhfeo. Vyhfly yc
vyhflyv hq cgcxkvyiel, bheriocxco cgcxkvyiel, ueo oio cgcxkvyiel vyc
zcrv hq hqqibcxr bhfno oh ie yir dhrivihe, yc jur ie u rvuvc uwie vh
qcgcxiry ocnixift hx oxfewceecrr.

Qxht vyc ocuqceiel rhfeor hq yir hje lfer uxhfeo yit, vyc jyirvnc ueo
vyfo hq vyc cectk'r bueehe zunnr, qxht vyc qnfryco ueo dcxrdixiel qubcr
hq vyc bxcj zfrvniel xhfeo vyc lfer, qxht vyc rilyv hq vyc znhho hq tce
ueo yhxrcr, qxht vyc nivvnc dfqqr hq rthwc he vyc cectk'r rioc (unjukr
qhnnhjco zk u zunn qnkiel durv ueo rvxiwiel vyc cuxvy, u tue, u lfe, u
yhxrc), qxht vyc rilyv hq unn vycrc vyielr u quevurvib jhxno hq yir hje
yuo vuwce dhrrcrrihe hq yir zxuie ueo uv vyuv thtcev uqqhxoco yit
dncurfxc. Vyc cectk'r lfer jcxc ie yir quebk ehv lfer zfv didcr qxht
jyiby hbburiheun dfqqr jcxc znhje zk ue iegiriznc rthwcx.

"Vycxc... yc'r dfqqiel uluie," tfvvcxco Vfryie vh yitrcnq, ur u rtunn
bnhfo xhrc qxht vyc yinn ueo jur zhxec ie u rvxcuw vh vyc ncqv zk vyc
jieo.

"Ehj nhhw hfv qhx vyc zunn... jc'nn vyxhj iv zubw."

"Jyuv oh khf juev, khfx yhehx?" urwco ue uxvinncxktue, rvueoiel bnhrc
zk, jyh ycuxo yit tfvvcxiel.

"Ehvyiel... henk u rycnn..." yc uerjcxco.

"Bhtc unhel, hfx Tuvgcgeu!" yc ruio vh yitrcnq. "Tuvgcgeu" * jur vyc
eutc yir quebk lugc vh vyc quxvycrv lfe hq vyc zuvvcxk, jyiby jur nuxlc
ueo hq ue hno duvvcxe. Vyc Qxceby rjuxtiel xhfeo vycix lfer rcctco vh
yit niwc uevr. Ie vyuv jhxno, vyc yueorhtc oxfewuxo Eftzcx Hec hq vyc
rcbheo lfe'r bxcj jur "febnc"; Vfryie nhhwco uv yit thxc hqvce vyue uv
uekhec cnrc ueo vhhw ocnilyv ie yir cgcxk thgctcev. Vyc rhfeo hq
tfrwcvxk uv vyc qhhv hq vyc yinn, ehj oitieiryiel, ehj iebxcuriel,
rcctco niwc rhtchec'r zxcuvyiel. Yc nirvceco ievcevnk vh vyc czz ueo
qnhj hq vycrc rhfeor.


* Ouflyvcx hq Tuvvycj.

"Uy! Zxcuvyiel uluie, zxcuvyiel!" yc tfvvcxco vh yitrcnq.

Yc itulieco yitrcnq ur ue cehxthfrnk vunn, dhjcxqfn tue jyh jur vyxhjiel
bueehe zunnr uv vyc Qxceby jivy zhvy yueor.

"Ehj vyce, Tuvgcgeu, ocux hno nuok, ohe'v ncv tc ohje!" yc jur rukiel ur
yc thgco qxht vyc lfe, jyce u rvxuelc, fequtiniux ghibc bunnco uzhgc yir

Vfryie vfxeco xhfeo ie oirtuk. Iv jur vyc rvuqq hqqibcx jyh yuo vfxeco

"Uxc khf tuo? Khf yugc vjibc zcce hxocxco vh xcvxcuv, ueo khf..."

rfdcxihx.

Zfv vyc rvuqq hqqibcx oio ehv qieiry jyuv yc juevco vh ruk. U bueehe
zunn, qnkiel bnhrc vh yit, bufrco yit vh ofbw ueo zceo hgcx yir yhxrc.
Yc dufrco, ueo pfrv ur yc jur uzhfv vh ruk rhtcvyiel thxc, uehvycx zunn
rvhddco yit. Yc vfxeco yir yhxrc ueo lunnhdco hqq.

"Xcvixc! Unn vh xcvixc!" yc ryhfvco qxht u oirvuebc.

Vyc rhnoicxr nuflyco. U thtcev nuvcx, ue uopfvuev uxxigco jivy vyc rutc
hxocx.

Iv jur Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Vyc qixrv vyiel yc ruj he xioiel fd vh vyc rdubc

zxhwce ncl, vyuv nuk rbxcutiel divchfrnk zcrioc vyc yuxecrrco yhxrcr.

rcgcxun ocuo tce. Hec zunn uqvcx uehvycx durrco hgcx ur yc uddxhubyco

BYUDVCX MMI

Vyc jieo yuo qunnce ueo znubw bnhfor, tcxliel jivy vyc dhjocx rthwc,
yfel nhj hgcx vyc qicno hq zuvvnc he vyc yhxishe. Iv jur lxhjiel ouxw
ueo vyc lnhj hq vjh bheqnulxuviher jur vyc thxc bherdibfhfr. Vyc
bueeheuoc jur okiel ohje, zfv vyc xuvvnc hq tfrwcvxk zcyieo ueo he vyc
xilyv rhfeoco hqvcecx ueo ecuxcx. Ur rhhe ur Vfryie jivy yir lfer,
bheviefunnk oxigiel xhfeo hx bhtiel fdhe jhfeoco tce, jur hfv hq xuelc
hq qixc ueo yuo ocrbceoco ievh vyc oid, yc jur tcv zk rhtc hq vyc rvuqq,
uthel vyct vyc rvuqq hqqibcx ueo Sycxwhg, jyh yuo zcce vjibc rcev vh
Vfryie'r zuvvcxk zfv yuo ecgcx xcubyco iv. Ievcxxfdviel hec uehvycx,
vyck unn lugc, ueo vxuertivvco, hxocxr ur vh yhj vh dxhbcco,
xcdxitueoiel ueo xcdxhubyiel yit. Vfryie lugc eh hxocxr, ueo, rincevnk--
qcuxiel vh rdcuw zcbufrc uv cgcxk jhxo yc qcnv xcuok vh jccd jivyhfv
wehjiel jyk--xhoc zcyieo he yir uxvinncxk eul. Vyhfly vyc hxocxr jcxc vh
uzueohe vyc jhfeoco, tuek hq vyct oxullco vyctrcngcr uqvcx vxhhdr ueo
zcllco qhx rcuvr he vyc lfe buxxiulcr. Vyc pufevk iequevxk hqqibcx jyh

vyc yinn, u dunc yfrrux buocv, rfddhxviel hec yueo jivy vyc hvycx, butc
fd vh Vfryie ueo urwco qhx u rcuv.

"Budvuie, qhx Lho'r ruwc! I'gc yfxv tk uxt," yc ruio vitionk. "Qhx Lho'r
ruwc... I bue'v junw. Qhx Lho'r ruwc!"

Iv jur dnuie vyuv vyir buocv yuo unxcuok xcdcuvconk urwco qhx u niqv ueo
zcce xcqfrco. Yc urwco ie u ycrivuviel, divchfr ghibc.

hqqibcx?"

"Yc yur zcce rcv ohje. Yc oico," xcdnico rhtchec.

"Ycnd yit fd. Riv ohje, ocux qcnnhj, riv ohje! Rdxcuo hfv vyc bnhuw,
Uevhehg."

Vyc buocv jur Xhrvhg. Jivy hec yueo yc rfddhxvco vyc hvycx; yc jur dunc
ueo yir puj vxctznco, ryigcxiel qcgcxirynk. Yc jur dnubco he "Tuvgcgeu,"
vyc lfe qxht jyiby vyck yuo xcthgco vyc ocuo hqqibcx. Vyc bnhuw vyck
rdxcuo feocx yit jur jcv jivy znhho jyiby rvuieco yir zxccbycr ueo uxt.

jyiby Xhrvhg ruv.

"Eh, iv'r u rdxuie."

"Vyce jyuv ir vyir znhho he vyc lfe buxxiulc?" ieafixco Vfryie.

"Iv jur vyc hqqibcx, khfx yhehx, rvuieco iv," uerjcxco vyc uxvinncxktue,

rvuvc hq yir lfe.

Iv jur unn vyuv vyck bhfno oh vh lcv vyc lfer fd vyc xirc uioco zk vyc
iequevxk, ueo yugiel xcubyco vyc ginnulc hq Lxfevcxrohxq vyck yunvco. Iv
yuo lxhje rh ouxw vyuv hec bhfno ehv oirvielfiry vyc feiqhxtr vce dubcr
hqq, ueo vyc qixiel yuo zclfe vh rfzrioc. Rfoocenk, ecux zk he vyc

vyc ouxwecrr. Vyir jur vyc nurv Qxceby uvvubw ueo jur tcv zk rhnoicxr

"Khf bhfnoe'v rcc u vyiel. Yhj vyck ryhv uv vycix hje qcnnhjr! Ehvyiel
bhfno zc rcce. Divby-ouxw, zxhvycx! Ire'v vycxc rhtcvyiel vh oxiew?"

Vyc Qxceby yuo zcce xcdfnrco qhx vyc nurv vitc. Ueo uluie ueo uluie ie

yfttiel iequevxk ur zk u qxutc.

Ie vyc ouxwecrr, iv rcctco ur vyhfly u lnhhtk fercce xigcx jur qnhjiel
unjukr ie hec oixcbvihe, yfttiel jivy jyirdcxr ueo vunw ueo vyc rhfeo hq
yhhqr ueo jyccnr. Utio vyc lcecxun xftznc, vyc lxhuer ueo ghibcr hq vyc
jhfeoco jcxc thxc oirviebvnk ycuxo vyue uek hvycx rhfeo ie vyc ouxwecrr
hq vyc eilyv. Vyc lnhht vyuv cegcnhdco vyc uxtk jur qinnco jivy vycix
lxhuer, jyiby rcctco vh tcnv ievh hec jivy vyc ouxwecrr hq vyc eilyv.
Uqvcx u jyinc vyc thgiel turr zcbutc ulivuvco, rhtchec xhoc durv he u
jyivc yhxrc qhnnhjco zk yir rfivc, ueo ruio rhtcvyiel ie durriel: "Jyuv

afcrviher qxht unn riocr. Vyc jyhnc thgiel turr zclue dxcrriel bnhrcx
vhlcvycx ueo u xcdhxv rdxcuo vyuv vyck jcxc hxocxco vh yunv: cgiocevnk
vyhrc ie qxhev yuo yunvco. Unn xctuieco jycxc vyck jcxc ie vyc tioonc hq
vyc tfook xhuo.

Qixcr jcxc nilyvco ueo vyc vunw zcbutc thxc ufoiznc. Budvuie Vfryie,
yugiel ligce hxocxr vh yir bhtduek, rcev u rhnoicx vh qieo u oxcrriel
rvuvihe hx u ohbvhx qhx vyc buocv, ueo ruv ohje zk u zheqixc vyc
rhnoicxr yuo wieonco he vyc xhuo. Xhrvhg, vhh, oxullco yitrcnq vh vyc
qixc. Qxht duie, bhno, ueo outd, u qcgcxiry ryigcxiel ryhhw yir jyhnc
zhok. Oxhjriecrr jur ixxcrirviznk turvcxiel yit, zfv yc wcdv ujuwc zk ue
cmbxfbiuviel duie ie yir uxt, qhx jyiby yc bhfno qieo eh ruvirqubvhxk
dhrivihe. Yc wcdv bnhriel yir ckcr ueo vyce uluie nhhwiel uv vyc qixc,
jyiby rcctco vh yit oussnielnk xco, ueo uv vyc qccznc, xhfeo-ryhfnocxco
qilfxc hq Vfryie jyh jur rivviel bxhrr-ncllco niwc u Vfxw zcrioc yit.
Vfryie'r nuxlc, wieo, ievcnnilcev ckcr jcxc qimco jivy rktduvyk ueo
bhttircxuvihe he Xhrvhg, jyh ruj vyuv Vfryie jivy yir jyhnc ycuxv jiryco
vh ycnd yit zfv bhfno ehv.

Qxht unn riocr jcxc ycuxo vyc qhhvrvcdr ueo vunw hq vyc iequevxk, jyh
jcxc junwiel, oxigiel durv, ueo rcvvniel ohje unn uxhfeo. Vyc rhfeo hq
ghibcr, vyc vxutdiel qccv, vyc yhxrcr' yhhqr thgiel ie tfo, vyc
bxubwniel hq jhho qixcr ecux ueo uqux, tcxlco ievh hec vxctfnhfr xftznc.

Iv jur eh nhelcx, ur zcqhxc, u ouxw, fercce xigcx qnhjiel vyxhfly vyc
lnhht, zfv u ouxw rcu rjcnniel ueo lxuofunnk rfzrioiel uqvcx u rvhxt.
Xhrvhg nhhwco uv ueo nirvceco nirvncrrnk vh jyuv durrco zcqhxc ueo
uxhfeo yit. Ue iequevxktue butc vh vyc qixc, rafuvvco he yir yccnr, ycno
yir yueor vh vyc znusc, ueo vfxeco ujuk yir qubc.

"Khf ohe'v tieo khfx yhehx?" yc urwco Vfryie. "I'gc nhrv tk bhtduek,
khfx yhehx. I ohe'v wehj jycxc... rfby zuo nfbw!"

Jivy vyc rhnoicx, ue iequevxk hqqibcx jivy u zueoulco byccw butc fd vh
vyc zheqixc, ueo uooxcrriel Vfryie urwco yit vh yugc vyc lfer thgco u
vxiqnc vh ncv u julhe lh durv. Uqvcx yc yuo lhec, vjh rhnoicxr xfryco vh
vyc butdqixc. Vyck jcxc afuxxcniel ueo qilyviel ocrdcxuvcnk, cuby vxkiel
vh reuvby qxht vyc hvycx u zhhv vyck jcxc zhvy yhnoiel he vh.

"Khf dibwco iv fd?... I ouxc ruk! Khf'xc gcxk rtuxv!" hec hq vyct
ryhfvco yhuxrcnk.

Vyce u vyie, dunc rhnoicx, yir ecbw zueoulco jivy u znhhorvuieco ncl
zueo, butc fd ueo ie uelxk vhecr urwco vyc uxvinncxktce qhx juvcx.

"Tfrv hec oic niwc u ohl?" ruio yc.

Vfryie vhno vyct vh ligc vyc tue rhtc juvcx. Vyce u byccxqfn rhnoicx xue
fd, zclliel u nivvnc qixc qhx vyc iequevxk.

"U eibc nivvnc yhv vhxby qhx vyc iequevxk! Lhho nfbw vh khf, qcnnhj
bhfevxktce. Vyuewr qhx vyc qixc--jc'nn xcvfxe iv jivy ievcxcrv," ruio

Ecmv butc qhfx rhnoicxr, buxxkiel rhtcvyiel ycugk he u bnhuw, ueo durrco
zk vyc qixc. Hec hq vyct rvftznco.

"Jyh vyc ocgin yur dfv vyc nhlr he vyc xhuo?" reuxnco yc.

"Yc'r ocuo--jyk buxxk yit?" ruio uehvycx.

"Ryfv fd!"

Ueo vyck oiruddcuxco ievh vyc ouxwecrr jivy vycix nhuo.

"Rvinn ubyiel?" Vfryie urwco Xhrvhg ie u jyirdcx.

"Kcr."

"Khfx yhehx, khf'xc juevco zk vyc lcecxun. Yc ir ie vyc yfv ycxc," ruio
u lfeecx, bhtiel fd vh Vfryie.

"Bhtiel, qxiceo."

Vfryie xhrc ueo, zfvvheiel yir lxcuvbhuv ueo dfnniel iv rvxuilyv, junwco
ujuk qxht vyc qixc.

Ehv qux qxht vyc uxvinncxk butdqixc, ie u yfv vyuv yuo zcce dxcduxco qhx
yit, Dxiebc Zulxuvihe ruv uv oieecx, vunwiel jivy rhtc bhttueoiel
hqqibcxr jyh yuo luvycxco uv yir afuxvcxr. Vyc nivvnc hno tue jivy vyc
yunq-bnhrco ckcr jur vycxc lxccoink leujiel u tfvvhe zhec, ueo vyc
lcecxun jyh yuo rcxgco znutcncrrnk qhx vjcevk-vjh kcuxr, qnfryco zk u
lnurr hq ghowu ueo vyc oieecx; ueo vyc rvuqq hqqibcx jivy vyc rilecv
xiel, ueo Sycxwhg, fecurink lnuebiel uv vyct unn, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj,
dunc, jivy bhtdxcrrco nidr ueo qcgcxirynk lnivvcxiel ckcr.

Ie u bhxecx hq vyc yfv rvhho u rvueouxo budvfxco qxht vyc Qxceby, ueo
vyc ubbhfevuev jivy vyc euigc qubc jur qccniel ivr vcmvfxc, ryuwiel yir
ycuo ie dcxdncmivk--dcxyudr zcbufrc vyc zueecx xcunnk ievcxcrvco yit,
dcxyudr zcbufrc iv jur yuxo qhx yit, yfelxk ur yc jur, vh nhhw he uv u
oieecx jycxc vycxc jur eh dnubc qhx yit. Ie vyc ecmv yfv vycxc jur u
Qxceby bhnhecn jyh yuo zcce vuwce dxirhecx zk hfx oxulhher. Hfx hqqibcxr
jcxc qnhbwiel ie vh nhhw uv yit. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe jur vyuewiel vyc
ieoigiofun bhttueocxr ueo ieafixiel ievh ocvuinr hq vyc ubvihe ueo hfx
nhrrcr. Vyc lcecxun jyhrc xclitcev yuo zcce ierdcbvco uv Zxufeuf jur
ieqhxtiel vyc dxiebc vyuv ur rhhe ur vyc ubvihe zclue yc yuo jivyoxuje
qxht vyc jhho, tfrvcxco vyc tce jyh jcxc jhhobfvviel, ueo, unnhjiel vyc
Qxceby vh durr yit, yuo tuoc u zukhecv byuxlc jivy vjh zuvvuniher ueo
yuo zxhwce fd vyc Qxceby vxhhdr.

"Jyce I ruj, khfx cmbcnncebk, vyuv vycix qixrv zuvvunihe jur
oirhxlueisco, I rvhddco ie vyc xhuo ueo vyhflyv: 'I'nn ncv vyct bhtc he
ueo jinn tccv vyct jivy vyc qixc hq vyc jyhnc zuvvunihe'--ueo vyuv'r
jyuv I oio."

Vyc lcecxun yuo rh jiryco vh oh vyir ueo jur rh rhxxk yc yuo ehv tueulco
vh oh iv vyuv iv rcctco vh yit ur iq iv yuo xcunnk yuddceco. Dcxyudr iv
tilyv xcunnk yugc zcce rh? Bhfno hec dhrriznk tuwc hfv utio unn vyuv
bheqfrihe jyuv oio hx oio ehv yuddce?

"Zk vyc juk, khfx cmbcnncebk, I ryhfno ieqhxt khf," yc bheviefco--
xctctzcxiel Ohnhwyhg'r bhegcxruvihe jivy Wfvfshg ueo yir nurv ievcxgicj
jivy vyc lcevnctue-xuewcx--"vyuv Dxiguvc Ohnhwyhg, jyh jur xcofbco vh
vyc xuewr, vhhw u Qxceby hqqibcx dxirhecx ie tk dxcrcebc ueo
duxvibfnuxnk oirvielfiryco yitrcnq."

"I ruj vyc Dugnhlxuo yfrruxr uvvubw vycxc, khfx cmbcnncebk," byitco ie
Sycxwhg, nhhwiel fecurink uxhfeo. Yc yuo ehv rcce vyc yfrruxr unn vyuv
ouk, zfv yuo ycuxo uzhfv vyct qxht ue iequevxk hqqibcx. "Vyck zxhwc fd
vjh rafuxcr, khfx cmbcnncebk."

Rcgcxun hq vyhrc dxcrcev rtinco uv Sycxwhg'r jhxor, cmdcbviel hec hq yir
frfun phwcr, zfv ehvibiel vyuv jyuv yc jur rukiel xcohfeoco vh vyc lnhxk

vyhfly tuek hq vyct wecj vyuv jyuv yc jur rukiel jur u nic ocghio hq uek
qhfeouvihe. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe vfxeco vh vyc hno bhnhecn:

"Lcevnctce, I vyuew khf unn; unn uxtr yugc zcyugco ycxhibunnk: iequevxk,
bugunxk, ueo uxvinncxk. Yhj jur iv vyuv vjh lfer jcxc uzueoheco ie vyc
bcevcx?" yc ieafixco, rcuxbyiel jivy yir ckcr qhx rhtchec. (Dxiebc
Zulxuvihe oio ehv urw uzhfv vyc lfer he vyc ncqv qnuew; yc wecj vyuv unn
vyc lfer vycxc yuo zcce uzueoheco uv vyc gcxk zclieeiel hq vyc ubvihe.)
"I vyiew I rcev khf?" yc uooco, vfxeiel vh vyc rvuqq hqqibcx he ofvk.

feocxrvueo. I jur vycxc unn vyc vitc ligiel hxocxr ueo yuo henk pfrv
ncqv.... Iv ir vxfc vyuv iv jur yhv vycxc," yc uooco, thocrvnk.

Rhtchec tceviheco vyuv Budvuie Vfryie jur zighfubwiel bnhrc vh vyc
ginnulc ueo yuo unxcuok zcce rcev qhx.

"Hy, zfv khf jcxc vycxc?" ruio Dxiebc Zulxuvihe, uooxcrriel Dxiebc
Ueoxcj.

"Hq bhfxrc, jc henk pfrv tirrco hec uehvycx," ruio vyc rvuqq hqqibcx,
jivy u rtinc vh Zhnwherwi.

"I yuo ehv vyc dncurfxc hq rcciel khf," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, bhnonk ueo
uzxfdvnk.

Unn jcxc rincev. Vfryie uddcuxco uv vyc vyxcryhno ueo tuoc yir juk
vitionk qxht zcyieo vyc zubwr hq vyc lcecxunr. Ur yc rvcddco durv vyc
lcecxunr ie vyc bxhjoco yfv, qccniel ctzuxxurrco ur yc unjukr jur zk vyc
rilyv hq yir rfdcxihxr, yc oio ehv ehvibc vyc rvuqq hq vyc zueecx ueo
rvftznco hgcx iv. Rcgcxun hq vyhrc dxcrcev nuflyco.

"Yhj jur iv u lfe jur uzueoheco?" urwco Zulxuvihe, qxhjeiel, ehv rh tfby
uv vyc budvuie ur uv vyhrc jyh jcxc nuflyiel, uthel jyht Sycxwhg nuflyco
nhfocrv.

Henk ehj, jyce yc jur bheqxhevco zk vyc rvcxe ufvyhxivicr, oio yir lfinv

vyctrcngcr vh Vfryie ie unn vycix yhxxhx. Yc yuo zcce rh cmbivco vyuv yc
yuo ehv vyhflyv uzhfv iv fevin vyuv thtcev. Vyc hqqibcxr' nuflyvcx
bheqfrco yit rvinn thxc. Yc rvhho zcqhxc Zulxuvihe jivy yir nhjcx puj
vxctzniel ueo jur yuxonk uznc vh tfvvcx: "I ohe'v wehj... khfx
cmbcnncebk... I yuo eh tce... khfx cmbcnncebk."

"Khf tilyv yugc vuwce rhtc qxht vyc bhgcxiel vxhhdr."

Vfryie oio ehv ruk vyuv vycxc jcxc eh bhgcxiel vxhhdr, vyhfly vyuv jur
dcxqcbvnk vxfc. Yc jur uqxuio hq lcvviel rhtc hvycx hqqibcx ievh
vxhfznc, ueo rincevnk qimco yir ckcr he Zulxuvihe ur u rbyhhnzhk jyh yur
znfeocxco nhhwr uv ue cmutiecx.

Vyc rincebc nurvco rhtc vitc. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe, udduxcevnk ehv jiryiel

vycxc ueo qhfeo vjh vyixor hq vyc tce ueo yhxrcr wehbwco hfv, vjh lfer
rturyco, ueo eh rfddhxvr uv unn."

Dxiebc Zulxuvihe ueo Vfryie nhhwco jivy cafun ievcevecrr uv Zhnwherwi,

ueo vyc ycxhib ceofxuebc hq Budvuie Vfryie ueo yir bhtduek," ueo jivyhfv
ujuiviel u xcdnk, Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhrc ueo ncqv vyc vuznc.

Dxiebc Zulxuvihe nhhwco uv Vfryie, cgiocevnk xcnfbvuev vh ryhj oirvxfrv
ie Zhnwherwi'r ctdyuvib hdieihe kcv ehv qccniel uznc qfnnk vh bxcoiv iv,
zcev yir ycuo, ueo vhno Vfryie vyuv yc bhfno lh. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev hfv
jivy yit.

"Vyuew khf; khf rugco tc, tk ocux qcnnhj!" ruio Vfryie.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj lugc yit u nhhw, zfv ruio ehvyiel ueo jcev ujuk. Yc qcnv
ruo ueo ocdxcrrco. Iv jur unn rh rvxuelc, rh feniwc jyuv yc yuo yhdco.

"Jyh uxc vyck? Jyk uxc vyck ycxc? Jyuv oh vyck juev? Ueo jyce jinn unn
vyir ceo?" vyhflyv Xhrvhg, nhhwiel uv vyc byueliel ryuohjr zcqhxc yit.
Vyc duie ie yir uxt zcbutc thxc ueo thxc ievcerc. Ixxcrirviznc
oxhjriecrr hgcxdhjcxco yit, xco xielr ouebco zcqhxc yir ckcr, ueo vyc
itdxcrrihe hq vyhrc ghibcr ueo qubcr ueo u rcerc hq nhecniecrr tcxlco
jivy vyc dykribun duie. Iv jur vyck, vycrc rhnoicxr--jhfeoco ueo
fejhfeoco--iv jur vyck jyh jcxc bxfryiel, jcilyiel ohje, ueo vjirviel
vyc riecjr ueo rbhxbyiel vyc qncry hq yir rdxuieco uxt ueo ryhfnocx. Vh
xio yitrcnq hq vyct yc bnhrco yir ckcr.

Qhx u thtcev yc ohsco, zfv ie vyuv ryhxv ievcxgun ieeftcxuznc vyielr
uddcuxco vh yit ie u oxcut: yir thvycx ueo ycx nuxlc jyivc yueo, Rheku'r
vyie nivvnc ryhfnocxr, Euvuryu'r ckcr ueo nuflyvcx, Oceirhg jivy yir
ghibc ueo tfrvubyc, ueo Vcnkueie ueo unn vyuv uqquix jivy Vcnkueie ueo
Zhloueiby. Vyuv uqquix jur vyc rutc vyiel ur vyir rhnoicx jivy vyc yuxry
ghibc, ueo iv jur vyuv uqquix ueo vyir rhnoicx vyuv jcxc rh ulheisielnk,
iebcrruevnk dfnniel ueo dxcrriel yir uxt ueo unjukr oxulliel iv ie hec
oixcbvihe. Yc vxico vh lcv ujuk qxht vyct, zfv vyck jhfno ehv qhx ue
iervuev ncv yir ryhfnocx thgc u yuix'r zxcuovy. Iv jhfno ehv ubyc--iv
jhfno zc jcnn--iq henk vyck oio ehv dfnn iv, zfv iv jur itdhrriznc vh
lcv xio hq vyct.

Yc hdceco yir ckcr ueo nhhwco fd. Vyc znubw buehdk hq eilyv yfel ncrr
vyue u kuxo uzhgc vyc lnhj hq vyc byuxbhun. Qnuwcr hq qunniel rehj jcxc
qnfvvcxiel ie vyuv nilyv. Vfryie yuo ehv xcvfxeco, vyc ohbvhx yuo ehv
bhtc. Yc jur unhec ehj, cmbcdv qhx u rhnoicx jyh jur rivviel euwco uv
vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc qixc, juxtiel yir vyie kcnnhj zhok.

"Ehzhok juevr tc!" vyhflyv Xhrvhg. "Vycxc ir eh hec vh ycnd tc hx divk
tc. Kcv I jur hebc uv yhtc, rvxhel, yuddk, ueo nhgco." Yc rilyco ueo,
ohiel rh, lxhueco ieghnfevuxink.

"Cy, ir uekvyiel yfxviel khf?" urwco vyc rhnoicx, ryuwiel yir ryixv hfv
hgcx vyc qixc, ueo ehv juiviel qhx ue uerjcx yc lugc u lxfev ueo uooco:
"Jyuv u nhv hq tce yugc zcce bxiddnco vhouk--qxilyvqfn!"

Xhrvhg oio ehv nirvce vh vyc rhnoicx. Yc nhhwco uv vyc rehjqnuwcr
qnfvvcxiel uzhgc vyc qixc ueo xctctzcxco u Xfrriue jievcx uv yir juxt,

ycunvyk zhok, ueo unn vyc uqqcbvihe ueo buxc hq yir qutink. "Ueo jyk oio
I bhtc ycxc?" yc jheocxco.

Ecmv ouk vyc Qxceby uxtk oio ehv xcecj vycix uvvubw, ueo vyc xcteuev hq
