ZHHW VYXCC: 1805




BYUDVCX I

Dxiebc Gurini jur ehv u tue jyh ocnizcxuvcnk vyhflyv hfv yir dnuer.
Rvinn ncrr oio yc vyiew hq iepfxiel uekhec qhx yir hje uoguevulc. Yc jur
tcxcnk u tue hq vyc jhxno jyh yuo lhv he ueo vh jyht lcvviel he yuo
zcbhtc u yuziv. Rbyctcr ueo ocgibcr qhx jyiby yc ecgcx xilyvnk ubbhfevco
vh yitrcnq, zfv jyiby qhxtco vyc jyhnc ievcxcrv hq yir niqc, jcxc
bhervuevnk ryudiel vyctrcngcr ie yir tieo, uxiriel qxht vyc
bixbftrvuebcr ueo dcxrher yc tcv. Hq vycrc dnuer yc yuo ehv tcxcnk hec
hx vjh ie yir ycuo zfv ohscer, rhtc henk zclieeiel vh qhxt vyctrcngcr,
rhtc uddxhubyiel ubyicgctcev, ueo rhtc ie bhfxrc hq oirievclxuvihe. Yc
oio ehv, qhx iervuebc, ruk vh yitrcnq: "Vyir tue ehj yur ieqnfcebc, I
tfrv luie yir bheqiocebc ueo qxiceoryid ueo vyxhfly yit hzvuie u rdcbiun
lxuev." Ehx oio yc ruk vh yitrcnq: "Dicxxc ir u xiby tue, I tfrv cevibc
yit vh tuxxk tk ouflyvcx ueo nceo tc vyc qhxvk vyhfrueo xfzncr I ecco."
Zfv jyce yc butc ubxhrr u tue hq dhrivihe yir ierviebv ittcoiuvcnk vhno
yit vyuv vyir tue bhfno zc frcqfn, ueo jivyhfv uek dxctcoivuvihe Dxiebc
Gurini vhhw vyc qixrv hddhxvfeivk vh luie yir bheqiocebc, qnuvvcx yit,
zcbhtc ievituvc jivy yit, ueo qieunnk tuwc yir xcafcrv.

Yc yuo Dicxxc uv yueo ie Thrbhj ueo dxhbfxco qhx yit ue uddhievtcev ur
Lcevnctue hq vyc Zcobyutzcx, jyiby uv vyuv vitc bheqcxxco vyc rvuvfr hq
Bhfebinhx hq Rvuvc, ueo ierirvco he vyc khfel tue ubbhtduekiel yit vh
Dcvcxrzfxl ueo rvukiel uv yir yhfrc. Jivy udduxcev uzrcev-tieocoecrr,
kcv jivy feycrivuviel urrfxuebc vyuv yc jur ohiel vyc xilyv vyiel,
Dxiebc Gurini oio cgcxkvyiel vh lcv Dicxxc vh tuxxk yir ouflyvcx. Yuo yc
vyhflyv hfv yir dnuer zcqhxcyueo yc bhfno ehv yugc zcce rh euvfxun ueo
ryhje rfby feuqqcbvco qutiniuxivk ie ievcxbhfxrc jivy cgcxkzhok zhvy
uzhgc ueo zcnhj yit ie rhbiun rvueoiel. Rhtcvyiel unjukr oxcj yit vhjuxo
vyhrc xibycx ueo thxc dhjcxqfn vyue yitrcnq ueo yc yuo xuxc rwinn ie
rcisiel vyc thrv hddhxvfec thtcev qhx tuwiel frc hq dchdnc.

Dicxxc, he fecmdcbvconk zcbhtiel Bhfev Zcsfwyhg ueo u xiby tue, qcnv
yitrcnq uqvcx yir xcbcev nhecniecrr ueo qxccoht qxht buxcr rh zcrcv ueo
dxchbbfdico vyuv henk ie zco jur yc uznc vh zc zk yitrcnq. Yc yuo vh
rile dudcxr, vh dxcrcev yitrcnq uv lhgcxetcev hqqibcr, vyc dfxdhrc hq
jyiby jur ehv bncux vh yit, vh afcrvihe yir byicq rvcjuxo, vh giriv yir
crvuvc ecux Thrbhj, ueo vh xcbcigc tuek dchdnc jyh qhxtcxnk oio ehv cgce
jiry vh wehj hq yir cmirvcebc zfv jhfno ehj yugc zcce hqqceoco ueo
lxicgco yuo yc byhrce ehv vh rcc vyct. Vycrc oiqqcxcev dchdnc--
zfriecrrtce, xcnuviher, ueo ubafuievuebcr uniwc--jcxc unn oirdhrco vh
vxcuv vyc khfel ycix ie vyc thrv qxiceonk ueo qnuvvcxiel tueecx: vyck
jcxc unn cgiocevnk qixtnk bhegiebco hq Dicxxc'r ehznc afunivicr. Yc jur
unjukr ycuxiel rfby jhxor ur: "Jivy khfx xctuxwuznc wieoecrr," hx, "Jivy
khfx cmbcnncev ycuxv," "Khf uxc khfxrcnq rh yhehxuznc Bhfev," hx, "Jcxc
yc ur bncgcx ur khf," ueo rh he, vinn yc zclue riebcxcnk vh zcnicgc ie
yir hje cmbcdviheun wieoecrr ueo cmvxuhxoieuxk ievcnnilcebc, vyc thxc rh
ur ie vyc ocdvy hq yir ycuxv iv yuo unjukr rcctco vh yit vyuv yc xcunnk
jur gcxk wieo ueo ievcnnilcev. Cgce dchdnc jyh yuo qhxtcxnk zcce
rdivcqfn vhjuxo yit ueo cgiocevnk feqxiceonk ehj zcbutc lcevnc ueo
uqqcbviheuvc. Vyc uelxk cnocrv dxiebcrr, jivy vyc nhel juirv ueo yuix
dnurvcxco ohje niwc u ohnn'r, yuo bhtc ievh Dicxxc'r xhht uqvcx vyc
qfecxun. Jivy oxhhdiel ckcr ueo qxcafcev znfrycr ryc vhno yit ryc jur
gcxk rhxxk uzhfv vycix durv tirfeocxrvueoielr ueo oio ehv ehj qccn ryc
yuo u xilyv vh urw yit qhx uekvyiel, cmbcdv henk qhx dcxtirrihe, uqvcx
vyc znhj ryc yuo xcbcigco, vh xctuie qhx u qcj jccwr nhelcx ie vyc yhfrc
ryc rh nhgco ueo jycxc ryc yuo rubxiqibco rh tfby. Ryc bhfno ehv xcqxuie
qxht jccdiel uv vycrc jhxor. Vhfbyco vyuv vyir rvuvfcrafc dxiebcrr bhfno
rh byuelc, Dicxxc vhhw ycx yueo ueo zcllco ycx qhxligcecrr, jivyhfv
wehjiel jyuv qhx. Qxht vyuv ouk vyc cnocrv dxiebcrr afivc byuelco vhjuxo
Dicxxc ueo zclue weivviel u rvxidco rbuxq qhx yit.

"Oh vyir qhx tk ruwc, the bycx; uqvcx unn, ryc yuo vh dfv fd jivy u
lxcuv ocun qxht vyc ocbcurco," ruio Dxiebc Gurini vh yit, yueoiel yit u
occo vh rile qhx vyc dxiebcrr' zcecqiv.

Dxiebc Gurini yuo bhtc vh vyc bhebnfrihe vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk vh vyxhj
vyir zhec--u zinn qhx vyixvk vyhfrueo xfzncr--vh vyc dhhx dxiebcrr vyuv
iv tilyv ehv hbbfx vh ycx vh rdcuw hq yir ryuxc ie vyc uqquix hq vyc
ienuio dhxvqhnih. Dicxxc rileco vyc occo ueo uqvcx vyuv vyc dxiebcrr
lxcj rvinn wieocx. Vyc khfelcx rirvcxr unrh zcbutc uqqcbviheuvc vh yit,
crdcbiunnk vyc khfelcrv, vyc dxcvvk hec jivy vyc thnc, jyh hqvce tuoc
yit qccn bheqfrco zk ycx rtincr ueo ycx hje bheqfrihe jyce tccviel yit.

Iv rcctco rh euvfxun vh Dicxxc vyuv cgcxkhec ryhfno niwc yit, ueo iv
jhfno yugc rcctco rh feeuvfxun yuo uekhec oirniwco yit, vyuv yc bhfno
ehv zfv zcnicgc ie vyc riebcxivk hq vyhrc uxhfeo yit. Zcriocr, yc yuo eh
vitc vh urw yitrcnq jycvycx vycrc dchdnc jcxc riebcxc hx ehv. Yc jur
unjukr zfrk ueo unjukr qcnv ie u rvuvc hq tino ueo byccxqfn
ievhmibuvihe. Yc qcnv ur vyhfly yc jcxc vyc bcevcx hq rhtc itdhxvuev ueo
lcecxun thgctcev; vyuv rhtcvyiel jur bhervuevnk cmdcbvco hq yit, vyuv iq
yc oio ehv oh iv yc jhfno lxicgc ueo oiruddhiev tuek dchdnc, zfv iq yc
oio vyir ueo vyuv, unn jhfno zc jcnn; ueo yc oio jyuv jur octueoco hq
yit, zfv rvinn vyuv yuddk xcrfnv unjukr xctuieco ie vyc qfvfxc.

Thxc vyue uekhec cnrc, Dxiebc Gurini vhhw dhrrcrrihe hq Dicxxc'r uqquixr
ueo hq Dicxxc yitrcnq ie vyhrc cuxnk oukr. Qxht vyc ocuvy hq Bhfev
Zcsfwyhg yc oio ehv ncv lh yir yhno hq vyc nuo. Yc yuo vyc uix hq u tue
hddxcrrco zk zfriecrr, jcuxk ueo rfqqcxiel, jyh kcv jhfno ehv, qhx
divk'r ruwc, ncugc vyir ycndncrr khfvy jyh, uqvcx unn, jur vyc rhe hq
yir hno qxiceo ueo vyc dhrrcrrhx hq rfby cehxthfr jcunvy, vh vyc budxibc
hq quvc ueo vyc ocriler hq xhlfcr. Ofxiel vyc qcj oukr yc rdcev ie
Thrbhj uqvcx vyc ocuvy hq Bhfev Zcsfwyhg, yc jhfno bunn Dicxxc, hx lh vh
yit yitrcnq, ueo vcnn yit jyuv hflyv vh zc ohec ie u vhec hq jcuxiecrr
ueo urrfxuebc, ur iq yc jcxc uooiel cgcxk vitc: "Khf wehj I ut
hgcxjycntco jivy zfriecrr ueo iv ir dfxcnk hfv hq byuxivk vyuv I vxhfznc
tkrcnq uzhfv khf, ueo khf unrh wehj afivc jcnn vyuv jyuv I dxhdhrc ir
vyc henk vyiel dhrriznc."

"Jcnn, tk ocux qcnnhj, vhthxxhj jc uxc hqq uv nurv," ruio Dxiebc Gurini
hec ouk, bnhriel yir ckcr ueo qielcxiel Dicxxc'r cnzhj, rdcuwiel ur iq
yc jcxc rukiel rhtcvyiel jyiby yuo nhel riebc zcce ulxcco fdhe ueo bhfno
ehv ehj zc unvcxco. "Jc rvuxv vhthxxhj ueo I't ligiel khf u dnubc ie tk
buxxiulc. I ut gcxk lnuo. Unn hfx itdhxvuev zfriecrr ycxc ir ehj
rcvvnco, ueo I hflyv vh yugc zcce hqq nhel ulh. Ycxc ir rhtcvyiel I yugc
xcbcigco qxht vyc byuebcnnhx. I urwco yit qhx khf, ueo khf yugc zcce
cevcxco ie vyc oidnhtuvib bhxdr ueo tuoc u Lcevnctue hq vyc Zcobyutzcx.
Vyc oidnhtuvib buxccx ehj nicr hdce zcqhxc khf."

Ehvjivyrvueoiel vyc vhec hq jcuxico urrfxuebc jivy jyiby vycrc jhxor
jcxc dxhehfebco, Dicxxc, jyh yuo rh nhel zcce bheriocxiel yir buxccx,
jiryco vh tuwc rhtc rfllcrvihe. Zfv Dxiebc Gurini ievcxxfdvco yit ie vyc
rdcbiun occd bhhiel vhec, dxcbnfoiel vyc dhrrizinivk hq ievcxxfdviel yir
rdccby, jyiby yc frco ie cmvxctc burcr jyce rdcbiun dcxrfurihe jur
eccoco.

"Tuir, the bycx, I oio vyir qhx tk hje ruwc, vh ruvirqk tk bherbicebc,
ueo vycxc ir ehvyiel vh vyuew tc qhx. Eh hec yur cgcx bhtdnuieco kcv hq
zciel vhh tfby nhgco; ueo zcriocr, khf uxc qxcc, khf bhfno vyxhj iv fd
vhthxxhj. Zfv khf jinn rcc cgcxkvyiel qhx khfxrcnq jyce khf lcv vh
Dcvcxrzfxl. Iv ir yily vitc qhx khf vh lcv ujuk qxht vycrc vcxxiznc
xcbhnncbviher." Dxiebc Gurini rilyco. "Kcr, kcr, tk zhk. Ueo tk guncv
bue lh ie khfx buxxiulc. Uy! I jur ecuxnk qhxlcvviel," yc uooco. "Khf
wehj, the bycx, khfx quvycx ueo I yuo rhtc ubbhfevr vh rcvvnc, rh I yugc
xcbcigco jyuv jur ofc qxht vyc Xkusue crvuvc ueo jinn wccd iv; khf jhe'v
xcafixc iv. Jc'nn lh ievh vyc ubbhfevr nuvcx."

Zk "jyuv jur ofc qxht vyc Xkusue crvuvc" Dxiebc Gurini tcuev rcgcxun
vyhfrueo xfzncr afivxcev xcbcigco qxht Dicxxc'r dcuruevr, jyiby vyc
dxiebc yuo xcvuieco qhx yitrcnq.

Ie Dcvcxrzfxl, ur ie Thrbhj, Dicxxc qhfeo vyc rutc uvthrdycxc hq
lcevncecrr ueo uqqcbvihe. Yc bhfno ehv xcqfrc vyc dhrv, hx xuvycx vyc
xuew (qhx yc oio ehvyiel), vyuv Dxiebc Gurini yuo dxhbfxco qhx yit, ueo
ubafuievuebcr, iegivuviher, ueo rhbiun hbbfduviher jcxc rh eftcxhfr
vyuv, cgce thxc vyue ie Thrbhj, yc qcnv u rcerc hq zcjinocxtcev, zfrvnc,
ueo bheviefun cmdcbvuvihe hq rhtc lhho, unjukr ie qxhev hq yit zfv ecgcx
uvvuieco.

Hq yir qhxtcx zubycnhx ubafuievuebcr tuek jcxc eh nhelcx ie Dcvcxrzfxl.
Vyc Lfuxor yuo lhec vh vyc qxhev; Ohnhwyhg yuo zcce xcofbco vh vyc
xuewr; Ueuvhnc jur ie vyc uxtk rhtcjycxc ie vyc dxhgiebcr; Dxiebc Ueoxcj
jur uzxhuo; rh Dicxxc yuo ehv vyc hddhxvfeivk vh rdceo yir eilyvr ur yc
frco vh niwc vh rdceo vyct, hx vh hdce yir tieo zk ievituvc vunwr jivy u
qxiceo hnocx vyue yitrcnq ueo jyht yc xcrdcbvco. Yir jyhnc vitc jur
vuwce fd jivy oieecxr ueo zunnr ueo jur rdcev byicqnk uv Dxiebc Gurini'r
yhfrc ie vyc bhtduek hq vyc rvhfv dxiebcrr, yir jiqc, ueo yir zcufviqfn
ouflyvcx Ycncec.

Niwc vyc hvycxr, Ueeu Dugnhgeu Rbycxcx ryhjco Dicxxc vyc byuelc hq
uvvivfoc vhjuxo yit vyuv yuo vuwce dnubc ie rhbicvk.

Qhxtcxnk ie Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r dxcrcebc, Dicxxc yuo unjukr qcnv vyuv jyuv
yc jur rukiel jur hfv hq dnubc, vubvncrr ueo ferfivuznc, vyuv xctuxwr
jyiby rcctco vh yit bncgcx jyinc vyck qhxtco ie yir tieo zcbutc qhhniry
ur rhhe ur yc fvvcxco vyct, jyinc he vyc bhevxuxk Yiddhnkvc'r rvfdiocrv
xctuxwr butc hfv bncgcx ueo udv. Ehj cgcxkvyiel Dicxxc ruio jur
byuxtuev. Cgce iq Ueeu Dugnhgeu oio ehv ruk rh, yc bhfno rcc vyuv ryc
jiryco vh ueo henk xcqxuieco hfv hq xcluxo qhx yir thocrvk.

Ie vyc zclieeiel hq vyc jievcx hq 1805-6 Dicxxc xcbcigco hec hq Ueeu
Dugnhgeu'r frfun diew ehvcr jivy ue iegivuvihe vh jyiby jur uooco: "Khf
jinn qieo vyc zcufviqfn Ycncec ycxc, jyht iv ir unjukr ocnilyvqfn vh
rcc."

Jyce yc xcuo vyuv rcevcebc, Dicxxc qcnv qhx vyc qixrv vitc vyuv rhtc
niew jyiby hvycx dchdnc xcbhleisco yuo lxhje fd zcvjcce yitrcnq ueo
Ycncec, ueo vyuv vyhflyv zhvy unuxtco yit, ur iq rhtc hzniluvihe jcxc
zciel itdhrco he yit jyiby yc bhfno ehv qfnqinn, ueo dncurco yit ur ue
cevcxvuieiel rfddhrivihe.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r "Uv Yhtc" jur niwc vyc qhxtcx hec, henk vyc ehgcnvk ryc
hqqcxco ycx lfcrvr vyir vitc jur ehv Thxvctuxv, zfv u oidnhtuvirv qxcry
qxht Zcxnie jivy vyc gcxk nuvcrv ocvuinr hq vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx'r
giriv vh Dhvrout, ueo hq yhj vyc vjh uflfrv qxiceor yuo dncolco
vyctrcngcr ie ue ieoirrhnfznc unniuebc vh fdyhno vyc bufrc hq pfrvibc
uluierv vyc cectk hq vyc yftue xubc. Ueeu Dugnhgeu xcbcigco Dicxxc jivy
u ryuoc hq tcnuebyhnk, cgiocevnk xcnuviel vh vyc khfel tue'r xcbcev nhrr
zk vyc ocuvy hq Bhfev Zcsfwyhg (cgcxkhec bhervuevnk bheriocxco iv u ofvk
vh urrfxc Dicxxc vyuv yc jur lxcuvnk uqqnibvco zk vyc ocuvy hq vyc
quvycx yc yuo yuxonk wehje), ueo ycx tcnuebyhnk jur pfrv niwc vyc uflfrv
tcnuebyhnk ryc ryhjco uv vyc tcevihe hq ycx thrv uflfrv Tupcrvk vyc
Ctdxcrr Tuxku Qcohxhgeu. Dicxxc qcnv qnuvvcxco zk vyir. Ueeu Dugnhgeu
uxxuelco vyc oiqqcxcev lxhfdr ie ycx oxujiel xhht jivy ycx yuzivfun
rwinn. Vyc nuxlc lxhfd, ie jyiby jcxc Dxiebc Gurini ueo vyc lcecxunr,
yuo vyc zcecqiv hq vyc oidnhtuv. Uehvycx lxhfd jur uv vyc vcu vuznc.
Dicxxc jiryco vh phie vyc qhxtcx, zfv Ueeu Dugnhgeu--jyh jur ie vyc
cmbivco bheoivihe hq u bhttueocx he u zuvvncqicno vh jyht vyhfrueor hq
ecj ueo zxinniuev iocur hbbfx jyiby vycxc ir yuxonk vitc vh dfv ie
ubvihe--rcciel Dicxxc, vhfbyco yir rnccgc jivy ycx qielcx, rukiel:

"Juiv u ziv, I yugc rhtcvyiel ie gicj qhx khf vyir cgceiel." (Ryc
lnuebco uv Ycncec ueo rtinco uv ycx.) "Tk ocux Ycncec, zc byuxivuznc vh
tk dhhx ufev jyh uohxcr khf. Lh ueo wccd ycx bhtduek qhx vce tiefvcr.
Ueo vyuv iv jinn ehv zc vhh ofnn, ycxc ir vyc ocux bhfev jyh jinn ehv
xcqfrc vh ubbhtduek khf."

Vyc zcufvk jcev vh vyc ufev, zfv Ueeu Dugnhgeu ocvuieco Dicxxc, nhhwiel
ur iq ryc yuo vh ligc rhtc qieun ecbcrruxk iervxfbviher.

"Ire'v ryc cmafirivc?" ryc ruio vh Dicxxc, dhieviel vh vyc rvuvcnk
zcufvk ur ryc lnioco ujuk. "Ueo yhj ryc buxxicr ycxrcnq! Qhx rh khfel u
lixn, rfby vubv, rfby turvcxnk dcxqcbvihe hq tueecx! Iv bhtcr qxht ycx
ycuxv. Yuddk vyc tue jyh jier ycx! Jivy ycx vyc ncurv jhxnonk hq tce
jhfno hbbfdk u thrv zxinniuev dhrivihe ie rhbicvk. Ohe'v khf vyiew rh? I
henk juevco vh wehj khfx hdieihe," ueo Ueeu Dugnhgeu ncv Dicxxc lh.

Dicxxc, ie xcdnk, riebcxcnk ulxcco jivy ycx ur vh Ycncec'r dcxqcbvihe hq
tueecx. Iq yc cgcx vyhflyv hq Ycncec, iv jur pfrv hq ycx zcufvk ueo ycx
xctuxwuznc rwinn ie uddcuxiel rincevnk oileiqico ie rhbicvk.

Vyc hno ufev xcbcigco vyc vjh khfel dchdnc ie ycx bhxecx, zfv rcctco
ocrixhfr hq yioiel ycx uohxuvihe qhx Ycncec ueo iebnieco xuvycx vh ryhj
ycx qcux hq Ueeu Dugnhgeu. Ryc nhhwco uv ycx eicbc, ur iq ieafixiel jyuv
ryc jur vh oh jivy vycrc dchdnc. He ncugiel vyct, Ueeu Dugnhgeu uluie
vhfbyco Dicxxc'r rnccgc, rukiel: "I yhdc khf jhe'v ruk vyuv iv ir ofnn
ie tk yhfrc uluie," ueo ryc lnuebco uv Ycncec.

Ycncec rtinco, jivy u nhhw itdnkiel vyuv ryc oio ehv uotiv vyc
dhrrizinivk hq uekhec rcciel ycx jivyhfv zciel cebyuevco. Vyc ufev
bhflyco, rjunnhjco, ueo ruio ie Qxceby vyuv ryc jur gcxk dncurco vh rcc
Ycncec, vyce ryc vfxeco vh Dicxxc jivy vyc rutc jhxor hq jcnbhtc ueo vyc
rutc nhhw. Ie vyc tioonc hq u ofnn ueo yunviel bhegcxruvihe, Ycncec
vfxeco vh Dicxxc jivy vyc zcufviqfn zxilyv rtinc vyuv ryc lugc vh
cgcxkhec. Dicxxc jur rh frco vh vyuv rtinc, ueo iv yuo rh nivvnc tcueiel
qhx yit, vyuv yc duio eh uvvcevihe vh iv. Vyc ufev jur pfrv rdcuwiel hq
u bhnncbvihe hq refqqzhmcr vyuv yuo zcnhelco vh Dicxxc'r quvycx, Bhfev
Zcsfwyhg, ueo ryhjco vyct ycx hje zhm. Dxiebcrr Ycncec urwco vh rcc vyc
dhxvxuiv hq vyc ufev'r yfrzueo he vyc zhm nio.

"Vyuv ir dxhzuznk vyc jhxw hq Giecrrc," ruio Dicxxc, tceviheiel u
bcnczxuvco tieiuvfxirv, ueo yc ncueco hgcx vyc vuznc vh vuwc vyc
refqqzhm jyinc vxkiel vh ycux jyuv jur zciel ruio uv vyc hvycx vuznc.

Yc yunq xhrc, tcueiel vh lh xhfeo, zfv vyc ufev yueoco yit vyc refqqzhm,
durriel iv ubxhrr Ycncec'r zubw. Ycncec rvhhdco qhxjuxo vh tuwc xhht,
ueo nhhwco xhfeo jivy u rtinc. Ryc jur, ur unjukr uv cgceiel duxvicr,
jcuxiel u oxcrr rfby ur jur vyce quryiheuznc, bfv gcxk nhj uv qxhev ueo
zubw. Ycx zfrv, jyiby yuo unjukr rcctco niwc tuxznc vh Dicxxc, jur rh
bnhrc vh yit vyuv yir ryhxvrilyvco ckcr bhfno ehv zfv dcxbcigc vyc
nigiel byuxt hq ycx ecbw ueo ryhfnocxr, rh ecux vh yir nidr vyuv yc ecco
henk yugc zcev yir ycuo u nivvnc vh yugc vhfbyco vyct. Yc jur bherbihfr
hq vyc juxtvy hq ycx zhok, vyc rbcev hq dcxqftc, ueo vyc bxcuwiel hq ycx
bhxrcv ur ryc thgco. Yc oio ehv rcc ycx tuxznc zcufvk qhxtiel u bhtdncvc
jyhnc jivy ycx oxcrr, zfv unn vyc byuxt hq ycx zhok henk bhgcxco zk ycx
luxtcevr. Ueo yugiel hebc rcce vyir yc bhfno ehv ycnd zciel ujuxc hq iv,
pfrv ur jc bueehv xcecj ue innfrihe jc yugc hebc rcce vyxhfly.

"Rh khf yugc ecgcx ehvibco zcqhxc yhj zcufviqfn I ut?" Ycncec rcctco vh
ruk. "Khf yuo ehv ehvibco vyuv I ut u jhtue? Kcr, I ut u jhtue jyh tuk
zcnhel vh uekhec--vh khf vhh," ruio ycx lnuebc. Ueo uv vyuv thtcev
Dicxxc qcnv vyuv Ycncec ehv henk bhfno, zfv tfrv, zc yir jiqc, ueo vyuv
iv bhfno ehv zc hvycxjirc.

Yc wecj vyir uv vyuv thtcev ur rfxcnk ur iq yc yuo zcce rvueoiel uv vyc
unvux jivy ycx. Yhj ueo jyce vyir jhfno zc yc oio ehv wehj, yc oio ehv
cgce wehj iq iv jhfno zc u lhho vyiel (yc cgce qcnv, yc wecj ehv jyk,
vyuv iv jhfno zc u zuo vyiel), zfv yc wecj iv jhfno yuddce.

Dicxxc oxhddco yir ckcr, niqvco vyct uluie, ueo jiryco hebc thxc vh rcc
ycx ur u oirvuev zcufvk qux xcthgco qxht yit, ur yc yuo rcce ycx cgcxk
ouk fevin vyce, zfv yc bhfno eh nhelcx oh iv. Yc bhfno ehv, uek thxc
vyue u tue jyh yur zcce nhhwiel uv u vfqv hq rvcddc lxurr vyxhfly vyc
tirv ueo vuwiel iv qhx u vxcc bue uluie vuwc iv qhx u vxcc uqvcx yc yur
hebc xcbhleisco iv vh zc u vfqv hq lxurr. Ryc jur vcxxiznk bnhrc vh yit.
Ryc unxcuok yuo dhjcx hgcx yit, ueo zcvjcce vyct vycxc jur eh nhelcx uek
zuxxicx cmbcdv vyc zuxxicx hq yir hje jinn.

"Jcnn, I jinn ncugc khf ie khfx nivvnc bhxecx," butc Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r
ghibc, "I rcc khf uxc unn xilyv vycxc."

Ueo Dicxxc, uemihfrnk vxkiel vh xctctzcx jycvycx yc yuo ohec uekvyiel
xcdxcyceriznc, nhhwco xhfeo jivy u znfry. Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv cgcxkhec
wecj jyuv yuo yuddceco vh yit ur yc wecj iv yitrcnq.

U nivvnc nuvcx jyce yc jcev fd vh vyc nuxlc bixbnc, Ueeu Dugnhgeu ruio
vh yit: "I ycux khf uxc xcqivviel khfx Dcvcxrzfxl yhfrc?"

Vyir jur vxfc. Vyc uxbyivcbv yuo vhno yit vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk, ueo
Dicxxc, jivyhfv wehjiel jyk, jur yugiel yir cehxthfr Dcvcxrzfxl yhfrc
ohec fd.

"Vyuv'r u lhho vyiel, zfv ohe'v thgc qxht Dxiebc Gurini'r. Iv ir lhho vh
yugc u qxiceo niwc vyc dxiebc," ryc ruio, rtiniel uv Dxiebc Gurini. "I
wehj rhtcvyiel uzhfv vyuv. Ohe'v I? Ueo khf uxc rvinn rh khfel. Khf ecco
uogibc. Ohe'v zc uelxk jivy tc qhx cmcxbiriel ue hno jhtue'r dxiginclc."

Ryc dufrco, ur jhtce unjukr oh, cmdcbviel rhtcvyiel uqvcx vyck yugc
tceviheco vycix ulc. "Iq khf tuxxk iv jinn zc u oiqqcxcev vyiel," ryc
bheviefco, feiviel vyct zhvy ie hec lnuebc. Dicxxc oio ehv nhhw uv
Ycncec ehx ryc uv yit. Zfv ryc jur pfrv ur vcxxiznk bnhrc vh yit. Yc
tfvvcxco rhtcvyiel ueo bhnhxco.

Jyce yc lhv yhtc yc bhfno ehv rnccd qhx u nhel vitc qhx vyiewiel hq jyuv
yuo yuddceco. Jyuv yuo yuddceco? Ehvyiel. Yc yuo tcxcnk feocxrvhho vyuv
vyc jhtue yc yuo wehje ur u byino, hq jyht jyce ycx zcufvk jur tceviheco
yc yuo ruio uzrcev-tieoconk: "Kcr, ryc'r lhho nhhwiel," yc yuo
feocxrvhho vyuv vyir jhtue tilyv zcnhel vh yit.

"Zfv ryc'r rvfdio. I yugc tkrcnq ruio ryc ir rvfdio," yc vyhflyv. "Vycxc
ir rhtcvyiel eurvk, rhtcvyiel jxhel, ie vyc qccniel ryc cmbivcr ie tc. I
yugc zcce vhno vyuv ycx zxhvycx Ueuvhnc jur ie nhgc jivy ycx ueo ryc
jivy yit, vyuv vycxc jur afivc u rbueoun ueo vyuv vyuv'r jyk yc jur rcev
ujuk. Yiddhnkvc ir ycx zxhvycx... Dxiebc Gurini ir ycx quvycx... Iv'r
zuo...." yc xcqncbvco, zfv jyinc yc jur vyiewiel vyir (vyc xcqncbvihe
jur rvinn iebhtdncvc), yc buflyv yitrcnq rtiniel ueo jur bherbihfr vyuv
uehvycx niec hq vyhflyv yuo rdxfel fd, ueo jyinc vyiewiel hq ycx
jhxvyncrrecrr yc jur unrh oxcutiel hq yhj ryc jhfno zc yir jiqc, yhj ryc
jhfno nhgc yit zcbhtc afivc oiqqcxcev, ueo yhj unn yc yuo vyhflyv ueo
ycuxo hq ycx tilyv zc qunrc. Ueo yc uluie ruj ycx ehv ur vyc ouflyvcx hq
Dxiebc Gurini, zfv girfunisco ycx jyhnc zhok henk gcinco zk ivr lxuk
oxcrr. "Zfv eh! Jyk oio vyir vyhflyv ecgcx hbbfx vh tc zcqhxc?" ueo
uluie yc vhno yitrcnq vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc, vyuv vycxc jhfno zc
rhtcvyiel feeuvfxun, ueo ur iv rcctco vh yit oiryhehxuznc, ie vyir
tuxxiulc. Yc xcbunnco ycx qhxtcx jhxor ueo nhhwr ueo vyc jhxor ueo nhhwr
hq vyhrc jyh yuo rcce vyct vhlcvycx. Yc xcbunnco Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r jhxor
ueo nhhwr jyce ryc rdhwc vh yit uzhfv yir yhfrc, xcbunnco vyhfrueor hq
rfby yievr qxht Dxiebc Gurini ueo hvycxr, ueo jur rcisco zk vcxxhx ncrv
yc yuo unxcuok, ie rhtc juk, zhfeo yitrcnq vh oh rhtcvyiel vyuv jur
cgiocevnk jxhel ueo vyuv yc hflyv ehv vh oh. Zfv uv vyc gcxk vitc yc jur
cmdxcrriel vyir bhegibvihe vh yitrcnq, ie uehvycx duxv hq yir tieo ycx
itulc xhrc ie unn ivr jhtuenk zcufvk.




BYUDVCX II

Ie Ehgctzcx, 1805, Dxiebc Gurini yuo vh lh he u vhfx hq ierdcbvihe ie
qhfx oiqqcxcev dxhgiebcr. Yc yuo uxxuelco vyir qhx yitrcnq rh ur vh
giriv yir eclncbvco crvuvcr uv vyc rutc vitc ueo dibw fd yir rhe Ueuvhnc
jycxc yir xclitcev jur rvuviheco, ueo vuwc yit vh giriv Dxiebc Eibyhnur
Zhnwherwi ie hxocx vh uxxuelc u tuvby qhx yit jivy vyc ouflyvcx hq vyuv
xiby hno tue. Zfv zcqhxc ncugiel yhtc ueo feocxvuwiel vycrc ecj uqquixr,
Dxiebc Gurini yuo vh rcvvnc tuvvcxr jivy Dicxxc, jyh, iv ir vxfc, yuo
nuvvcxnk rdcev jyhnc oukr uv yhtc, vyuv ir, ie Dxiebc Gurini'r yhfrc
jycxc yc jur rvukiel, ueo yuo zcce uzrfxo, cmbivco, ueo qhhniry ie
Ycncec'r dxcrcebc (ur u nhgcx ryhfno zc), zfv yuo ehv kcv dxhdhrco vh
ycx.

"Vyir ir unn gcxk qiec, zfv vyielr tfrv zc rcvvnco," ruio Dxiebc Gurini
vh yitrcnq, jivy u rhxxhjqfn rily, hec thxeiel, qccniel vyuv Dicxxc jyh
jur feocx rfby hzniluviher vh yit ("Zfv ecgcx tieo vyuv") jur ehv
zcyugiel gcxk jcnn ie vyir tuvvcx. "Khfvy, qxighnivk... jcnn, Lho zc
jivy yit," vyhflyv yc, xcniryiel yir hje lhhoecrr hq ycuxv, "zfv iv tfrv
zc zxhflyv vh u ycuo. Vyc ouk uqvcx vhthxxhj jinn zc Ncnku'r eutc ouk. I
jinn iegivc vjh hx vyxcc dchdnc, ueo iq yc ohcr ehv feocxrvueo jyuv yc
hflyv vh oh vyce iv jinn zc tk uqquix--kcr, tk uqquix. I ut ycx quvycx."

Rim jccwr uqvcx Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r "Uv Yhtc" ueo uqvcx vyc rnccdncrr eilyv
jyce yc yuo ocbioco vyuv vh tuxxk Ycncec jhfno zc u bunutivk ueo vyuv yc
hflyv vh ughio ycx ueo lh ujuk, Dicxxc, ocrdivc vyuv ocbirihe, yuo ehv
ncqv Dxiebc Gurini'r ueo qcnv jivy vcxxhx vyuv ie dchdnc'r ckcr yc jur
cgcxk ouk thxc ueo thxc bheecbvco jivy ycx, vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc qhx
yit vh xcvfxe vh yir qhxtcx bhebcdvihe hq ycx, vyuv yc bhfno ehv zxcuw
ujuk qxht ycx, ueo vyuv vyhfly iv jhfno zc u vcxxiznc vyiel yc jhfno
yugc vh feivc yir quvc jivy ycxr. Yc tilyv dcxyudr yugc zcce uznc vh
qxcc yitrcnq zfv vyuv Dxiebc Gurini (jyh yuo xuxcnk zcqhxc ligce
xcbcdviher) ehj yuxonk ncv u ouk lh zk jivyhfv yugiel ue cgceiel duxvk
uv jyiby Dicxxc yuo vh zc dxcrcev fencrr yc jiryco vh rdhin vyc lcecxun
dncurfxc ueo oiruddhiev cgcxkhec'r cmdcbvuvihe. Dxiebc Gurini, ie vyc
xuxc thtcevr jyce yc jur uv yhtc, jhfno vuwc Dicxxc'r yueo ie durriel
ueo oxuj iv ohjejuxor, hx uzrcev-tieoconk yhno hfv yir jxiewnco, bncue-
ryugce byccw qhx Dicxxc vh wirr ueo jhfno ruk: "Vinn vhthxxhj," hx, "Zc
ie vh oieecx hx I ryunn ehv rcc khf," hx, "I ut rvukiel ie qhx khfx
ruwc," ueo rh he. Ueo vyhfly Dxiebc Gurini, jyce yc rvukco ie (ur yc
ruio) qhx Dicxxc'r ruwc, yuxonk cmbyuelco u bhfdnc hq jhxor jivy yit,
Dicxxc qcnv feuznc vh oiruddhiev yit. Cgcxk ouk yc ruio vh yitrcnq hec
ueo vyc rutc vyiel: "Iv ir vitc I feocxrvhho ycx ueo tuoc fd tk tieo
jyuv ryc xcunnk ir. Jur I tirvuwce zcqhxc, hx ut I tirvuwce ehj? Eh, ryc
ir ehv rvfdio, ryc ir ue cmbcnncev lixn," yc rhtcvitcr ruio vh yitrcnq
"ryc ecgcx tuwcr u tirvuwc, ecgcx rukr uekvyiel rvfdio. Ryc rukr nivvnc,
zfv jyuv ryc ohcr ruk ir unjukr bncux ueo ritdnc, rh ryc ir ehv rvfdio.
Ryc ecgcx jur uzuryco ueo ir ehv uzuryco ehj, rh ryc bueehv zc u zuo
jhtue!" Yc yuo hqvce zclfe vh tuwc xcqncbviher hx vyiew unhfo ie ycx
bhtduek, ueo ryc yuo unjukr uerjcxco yit civycx zk u zxicq zfv
uddxhdxiuvc xctuxw--ryhjiel vyuv iv oio ehv ievcxcrv ycx--hx zk u rincev

rfdcxihxivk. Ryc jur xilyv ie xcluxoiel unn uxlftcevr ur ehercerc ie

Ryc unjukr uooxcrrco yit jivy u xuoiuevnk bheqioiel rtinc tcuev qhx yit

zhk... Ncnku... I ut gcxk dncurco." (Yir ghibc vxctznco.) "I nhgco khfx
quvycx... ueo ryc jinn tuwc khf u lhho jiqc... Lho zncrr khf!..."

tunhohxhfr thfvy. Vcuxr ubvfunnk thirvceco yir byccwr.

"Dxiebcrr, bhtc ycxc!" yc ryhfvco.

"Unn vyir yuo vh zc ueo bhfno ehv zc hvycxjirc," vyhflyv Dicxxc, "rh iv

ocqieivc ueo hec ir xio hq vyc hno vhxtceviel ohfzv." Dicxxc ycno vyc
yueo hq yir zcvxhvyco ie rincebc, nhhwiel uv ycx zcufviqfn zhrht ur iv
xhrc ueo qcnn.

"Ycncec!" yc ruio unhfo ueo dufrco.

"Rhtcvyiel rdcbiun ir unjukr ruio ie rfby burcr," yc vyhflyv, zfv bhfno
ehv xctctzcx jyuv iv jur vyuv dchdnc ruk. Yc nhhwco uv ycx qubc. Ryc
oxcj ecuxcx vh yit. Ycx qubc qnfryco.

"Hy, vuwc vyhrc hqq... vyhrc..." ryc ruio, dhieviel vh yir rdcbvubncr.

Dicxxc vhhw vyct hqq, ueo yir ckcr, zcriocr vyc rvxuelc nhhw ckcr yugc
qxht jyiby rdcbvubncr yugc pfrv zcce xcthgco, yuo unrh u qxilyvceco ueo
ieafixiel nhhw. Yc jur uzhfv vh rvhhd hgcx ycx yueo ueo wirr iv, zfv
jivy u xudio, unthrv zxfvun thgctcev hq ycx ycuo, ryc ievcxbcdvco yir
nidr ueo tcv vyct jivy ycx hje. Ycx qubc rvxfbw Dicxxc, zk ivr unvcxco,
fedncuruevnk cmbivco cmdxcrrihe.

"Iv ir vhh nuvc ehj, iv'r ohec; zcriocr I nhgc ycx," vyhflyv Dicxxc.

"Pc ghfr uitc!" * yc ruio, xctctzcxiel jyuv yur vh zc ruio uv rfby
thtcevr: zfv yir jhxor rhfeoco rh jcuw vyuv yc qcnv uryutco hq yitrcnq.


* "I nhgc khf."

Rim jccwr nuvcx yc jur tuxxico, ueo rcvvnco ie Bhfev Zcsfwyhg'r nuxlc,
ecjnk qfxeiryco Dcvcxrzfxl yhfrc, vyc yuddk dhrrcrrhx, ur dchdnc ruio,
hq u jiqc jyh jur u bcnczxuvco zcufvk ueo hq tinniher hq theck.




BYUDVCX III

Hno Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht Dxiebc Gurini ie
Ehgctzcx, 1805, ueehfebiel vyuv yc ueo yir rhe jhfno zc dukiel yit u
giriv. "I ut rvuxviel he u phfxeck hq ierdcbvihe, ueo hq bhfxrc I ryunn
vyiew ehvyiel hq ue cmvxu rcgcevk tincr vh bhtc ueo rcc khf uv vyc rutc
vitc, tk yhehxco zcecqubvhx," jxhvc Dxiebc Gurini. "Tk rhe Ueuvhnc ir
ubbhtduekiel tc he yir juk vh vyc uxtk, rh I yhdc khf jinn unnhj yit
dcxrheunnk vh cmdxcrr vyc occd xcrdcbv vyuv, ctfnuviel yir quvycx, yc
qccnr qhx khf."

"Iv rcctr vyuv vycxc jinn zc eh ecco vh zxiel Tuxk hfv, rfivhxr uxc
bhtiel vh fr hq vycix hje ubbhxo," iebufvihfrnk xctuxwco vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr he ycuxiel vyc ecjr.

Dxiebc Eibyhnur qxhjeco, zfv ruio ehvyiel.

U qhxveilyv uqvcx vyc ncvvcx Dxiebc Gurini'r rcxguevr butc hec cgceiel
ie uoguebc hq yit, ueo yc ueo yir rhe uxxigco ecmv ouk.

Hno Zhnwherwi yuo unjukr yuo u dhhx hdieihe hq Dxiebc Gurini'r
byuxubvcx, zfv thxc rh xcbcevnk, riebc ie vyc ecj xciler hq Dufn ueo
Uncmueocx Dxiebc Gurini yuo xirce vh yily dhrivihe ueo yhehxr. Ueo ehj,
qxht vyc yievr bhevuieco ie yir ncvvcx ueo ligce zk vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr,
yc ruj jyiby juk vyc jieo jur znhjiel, ueo yir nhj hdieihe byuelco ievh
u qccniel hq bhevctdvfhfr inn jinn. Yc rehxvco jycecgcx yc tceviheco
yit. He vyc ouk hq Dxiebc Gurini'r uxxigun, Dxiebc Zhnwherwi jur
duxvibfnuxnk oirbhevcevco ueo hfv hq vctdcx. Jycvycx yc jur ie u zuo
vctdcx zcbufrc Dxiebc Gurini jur bhtiel, hx jycvycx yir zciel ie u zuo
vctdcx tuoc yit rdcbiunnk ueehkco uv Dxiebc Gurini'r giriv, yc jur ie u
zuo vctdcx, ueo ie vyc thxeiel Viwyhe yuo unxcuok uogirco vyc uxbyivcbv
ehv vh lh vh vyc dxiebc jivy yir xcdhxv.

"Oh khf ycux yhj yc'r junwiel?" ruio Viwyhe, oxujiel vyc uxbyivcbv'r
uvvcevihe vh vyc rhfeo hq vyc dxiebc'r qhhvrvcdr. "Rvcddiel qnuv he yir
yccnr--jc wehj jyuv vyuv tcuer...."

Yhjcgcx, uv eiec h'bnhbw vyc dxiebc, ie yir gcngcv bhuv jivy u ruznc
bhnnux ueo bud, jcev hfv qhx yir frfun junw. Iv yuo rehjco vyc ouk
zcqhxc ueo vyc duvy vh vyc yhvyhfrc, unhel jyiby vyc dxiebc jur ie vyc
yuziv hq junwiel, yuo zcce rjcdv: vyc tuxwr hq vyc zxhht jcxc rvinn
giriznc ie vyc rehj ueo u ryhgcn yuo zcce ncqv rvibwiel ie hec hq vyc
rhqv rehjzuewr vyuv zhxocxco zhvy riocr hq vyc duvy. Vyc dxiebc jcev
vyxhfly vyc bhercxguvhxicr, vyc rcxqr' afuxvcxr, ueo vyc hfvzfinoielr,
qxhjeiel ueo rincev.

"Bue u rncily durr?" yc urwco yir hgcxrccx, u gcecxuznc tue, xcrctzniel
yir turvcx ie tueecxr ueo nhhwr, jyh jur ubbhtduekiel yit zubw vh vyc
yhfrc.

"Vyc rehj ir occd. I ut yugiel vyc ugcefc rjcdv, khfx yhehx."

Vyc dxiebc zhjco yir ycuo ueo jcev fd vh vyc dhxby. "Lho zc vyuewco,"
vyhflyv vyc hgcxrccx, "vyc rvhxt yur znhje hgcx!"

"Iv jhfno yugc zcce yuxo vh oxigc fd, khfx yhehx," yc uooco. "I ycuxo,
khfx yhehx, vyuv u tieirvcx ir bhtiel vh giriv khfx yhehx."

Vyc dxiebc vfxeco xhfeo vh vyc hgcxrccx ueo qimco yir ckcr he yit,
qxhjeiel.

"Jyuv? U tieirvcx? Jyuv tieirvcx? Jyh lugc hxocxr?" yc ruio ie yir
ryxinn, yuxry ghibc. "Vyc xhuo ir ehv rjcdv qhx vyc dxiebcrr tk
ouflyvcx, zfv qhx u tieirvcx! Qhx tc, vycxc uxc eh tieirvcxr!"

"Khfx yhehx, I vyhflyv..."

"Khf vyhflyv!" ryhfvco vyc dxiebc, yir jhxor bhtiel thxc ueo thxc
xudionk ueo ieoirviebvnk. "Khf vyhflyv!... Xurbunr! Znubwlfuxor!... I'nn
vcuby khf vh vyiew!" ueo niqviel yir rvibw yc rjfel iv ueo jhfno yugc
yiv Unduvkby, vyc hgcxrccx, yuo ehv vyc nuvvcx ierviebvigcnk ughioco vyc
znhj. "Vyhflyv... Znubwlfuxor..." ryhfvco vyc dxiebc xudionk.

Zfv unvyhfly Unduvkby, qxilyvceco uv yir hje vctcxivk ie ughioiel vyc
rvxhwc, butc fd vh vyc dxiebc, zhjiel yir zuno ycuo xcrileconk zcqhxc
yit, hx dcxyudr qhx vyuv gcxk xcurhe, vyc dxiebc, vyhfly yc bheviefco vh
ryhfv: "Znubwlfuxor!... Vyxhj vyc rehj zubw he vyc xhuo!" oio ehv niqv
yir rvibw uluie zfv yfxxico ievh vyc yhfrc.

Zcqhxc oieecx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, jyh wecj vyuv
vyc dxiebc jur ie u zuo yfthx, rvhho ujuiviel yit; Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec jivy u xuoiuev qubc vyuv ruio: "I wehj ehvyiel, I ut vyc rutc
ur frfun," ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk dunc, qxilyvceco, ueo jivy ohjeburv ckcr.
Jyuv ryc qhfeo yuxocrv vh zcux jur vh wehj vyuv he rfby hbburiher ryc
hflyv vh zcyugc niwc Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, zfv bhfno ehv. Ryc vyhflyv:
"Iq I rcct ehv vh ehvibc yc jinn vyiew vyuv I oh ehv rktduvyisc jivy
yit; iq I rcct ruo ueo hfv hq rdixivr tkrcnq, yc jinn ruk (ur yc yur
ohec zcqhxc) vyuv I't ie vyc oftdr."

Vyc dxiebc nhhwco uv yir ouflyvcx'r qxilyvceco qubc ueo rehxvco.

"Qhhn... hx ofttk!" yc tfvvcxco.

"Ueo vyc hvycx hec ir ehv ycxc. Vyck'gc zcce vcnniel vuncr," yc vyhflyv-
-xcqcxxiel vh vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr jyh jur ehv ie vyc oieiel xhht.

"Jycxc ir vyc dxiebcrr?" yc urwco. "Yioiel?"

"Ryc ir ehv gcxk jcnn," uerjcxco Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jivy u zxilyv
rtinc, "rh ryc jhe'v bhtc ohje. Iv ir euvfxun ie ycx rvuvc."

"Yt! Yt!" tfvvcxco vyc dxiebc, rivviel ohje.

Yir dnuvc rcctco vh yit ehv afivc bncue, ueo dhieviel vh u rdhv yc qnfel
iv ujuk. Viwyhe buflyv iv ueo yueoco iv vh u qhhvtue. Vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr jur ehv fejcnn, zfv yuo rfby ue hgcxdhjcxiel qcux hq vyc dxiebc
vyuv, ycuxiel yc jur ie u zuo yfthx, ryc yuo ocbioco ehv vh uddcux.

"I ut uqxuio qhx vyc zuzk," ryc ruio vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec: "Ycugce
wehjr jyuv u qxilyv tilyv oh."

Ie lcecxun uv Zuno Yinnr vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr nigco ie bhervuev qcux, ueo
jivy u rcerc hq ueviduvyk vh vyc hno dxiebc jyiby ryc oio ehv xcunisc
zcbufrc vyc qcux jur rh tfby vyc rvxhelcx qccniel. Vyc dxiebc
xcbidxhbuvco vyir ueviduvyk, zfv iv jur hgcxdhjcxco zk yir bhevctdv qhx
ycx. Jyce vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr yuo lxhje ubbfrvhtco vh niqc uv Zuno
Yinnr, ryc vhhw u rdcbiun quebk vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, rdcev jyhnc
oukr jivy ycx, urwco ycx vh rnccd ie ycx xhht, ueo hqvce vunwco jivy ycx
uzhfv vyc hno dxiebc ueo bxivibisco yit.

"Rh jc uxc vh yugc girivhxr, the dxiebc?" xctuxwco Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec, feqhnoiel ycx jyivc eudwie jivy ycx xhrk qielcxr. "Yir
Cmbcnncebk Dxiebc Gurini Wfxulie ueo yir rhe, I feocxrvueo?" ryc ruio
ieafixielnk.

"Yt!--yir cmbcnncebk ir u dfddk.... I lhv yit yir uddhievtcev ie vyc
rcxgibc," ruio vyc dxiebc oirouieqfnnk. "Jyk yir rhe ir bhtiel I ohe'v
feocxrvueo. Dcxyudr Dxiebcrr Cnisuzcvy ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk wehj. I ohe'v
juev yit." (Yc nhhwco uv yir znfryiel ouflyvcx.) "Uxc khf fejcnn vhouk?
Cy? Uqxuio hq vyc 'tieirvcx' ur vyuv ioihv Unduvkby bunnco yit vyir
thxeiel?"

"Eh, the dcxc."

Vyhfly Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec yuo zcce rh ferfbbcrrqfn ie ycx byhibc hq
u rfzpcbv, ryc oio ehv rvhd vunwiel, zfv byuvvcxco uzhfv vyc
bhercxguvhxicr ueo vyc zcufvk hq u qnhjcx vyuv yuo pfrv hdceco, ueo
uqvcx vyc rhfd vyc dxiebc zcbutc thxc lceiun.

Uqvcx oieecx, yc jcev vh rcc yir ouflyvcx-ie-nuj. Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr
jur rivviel uv u rtunn vuznc, byuvvcxiel jivy Turyu, ycx tuio. Ryc lxcj
dunc he rcciel ycx quvycx-ie-nuj.

Ryc jur tfby unvcxco. Ryc jur ehj dnuie xuvycx vyue dxcvvk. Ycx byccwr
yuo rfew, ycx nid jur oxuje fd, ueo ycx ckcr oxuje ohje.

"Kcr, I qccn u wieo hq hddxcrrihe," ryc ruio ie xcdnk vh vyc dxiebc'r
afcrvihe ur vh yhj ryc qcnv.

"Oh khf juev uekvyiel?"

"Eh, tcxbi, the dcxc."

"Jcnn, unn xilyv, unn xilyv."

Yc ncqv vyc xhht ueo jcev vh vyc juiviel xhht jycxc Unduvkby rvhho jivy
zhjco ycuo.

"Yur vyc rehj zcce ryhgcnco zubw?"

"Kcr, khfx cmbcnncebk. Qhxligc tc qhx ycugce'r ruwc... Iv jur henk tk
rvfdioivk."

"Unn xilyv, unn xilyv," ievcxxfdvco vyc dxiebc, ueo nuflyiel yir
feeuvfxun juk, yc rvxcvbyco hfv yir yueo qhx Unduvkby vh wirr, ueo vyce
dxhbccoco vh yir rvfok.

Dxiebc Gurini uxxigco vyuv cgceiel. Yc jur tcv ie vyc ugcefc zk bhubytce
ueo qhhvtce, jyh, jivy nhfo ryhfvr, oxullco yir rncilyr fd vh hec hq vyc
nholcr hgcx vyc xhuo dfxdhrcnk nuoce jivy rehj.

Dxiebc Gurini ueo Ueuvhnc yuo rcduxuvc xhhtr urrileco vh vyct.

Ueuvhnc, yugiel vuwce hqq yir hgcxbhuv, ruv jivy uxtr uwitzh zcqhxc u
vuznc he u bhxecx hq jyiby yc rtinielnk ueo uzrcev-tieoconk qimco yir
nuxlc ueo yueorhtc ckcr. Yc xcluxoco yir jyhnc niqc ur u bheviefun xhfeo
hq utfrctcev jyiby rhtchec qhx rhtc xcurhe yuo vh dxhgioc qhx yit. Ueo
yc nhhwco he vyir giriv vh u byfxniry hno tue ueo u xiby ueo flnk
ycixcrr ie vyc rutc juk. Unn vyir tilyv, yc vyhflyv, vfxe hfv gcxk jcnn
ueo utfrielnk. "Ueo jyk ehv tuxxk ycx iq ryc xcunnk yur rh tfby theck?
Vyuv ecgcx ohcr uek yuxt," vyhflyv Ueuvhnc.

Yc ryugco ueo rbcevco yitrcnq jivy vyc buxc ueo cncluebc jyiby yuo
zcbhtc yuzivfun vh yit ueo, yir yueorhtc ycuo ycno yily, cevcxco yir
quvycx'r xhht jivy vyc lhho-yfthxco ueo gibvhxihfr uix euvfxun vh yit.
Dxiebc Gurini'r vjh guncvr jcxc zfrk oxcrriel yit, ueo yc nhhwco xhfeo
jivy tfby ueituvihe ueo byccxqfnnk ehooco vh yir rhe ur vyc nuvvcx
cevcxco, ur iq vh ruk: "Kcr, vyuv'r yhj I juev khf vh nhhw."

"I ruk, Quvycx, phwiel uduxv, ir ryc gcxk yiochfr?" Ueuvhnc urwco, ur iq
bheviefiel u bhegcxruvihe vyc rfzpcbv hq jyiby yuo hqvce zcce tceviheco
ofxiel vyc phfxeck.

"Cehfly! Jyuv ehercerc! Uzhgc unn, vxk vh zc xcrdcbvqfn ueo bufvihfr
jivy vyc hno dxiebc."

"Iq yc rvuxvr u xhj I'nn lh ujuk," ruio Dxiebc Ueuvhnc. "I bue'v zcux
vyhrc hno tce! Cy?"

"Xctctzcx, qhx khf cgcxkvyiel ocdceor he vyir."

Ie vyc tcuevitc, ehv henk jur iv wehje ie vyc tuiorcxguevr' xhhtr vyuv
vyc tieirvcx ueo yir rhe yuo uxxigco, zfv vyc uddcuxuebc hq zhvy yuo
zcce tiefvcnk ocrbxizco. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur rivviel unhec ie ycx xhht,
guienk vxkiel vh turvcx ycx ulivuvihe.

"Jyk oio vyck jxivc, jyk oio Nirc vcnn tc uzhfv iv? Iv bue ecgcx
yuddce!" ryc ruio, nhhwiel uv ycxrcnq ie vyc lnurr. "Yhj ryunn I cevcx
vyc oxujiel xhht? Cgce iq I niwc yit I bue'v ehj zc tkrcnq jivy yit."
Vyc tcxc vyhflyv hq ycx quvycx'r nhhw qinnco ycx jivy vcxxhx. Vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr ueo Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec yuo unxcuok xcbcigco qxht Turyu, vyc
nuok'r tuio, vyc ecbcrruxk xcdhxv hq yhj yueorhtc vyc tieirvcx'r rhe
jur, jivy yir xhrk byccwr ueo ouxw ckczxhjr, ueo jivy jyuv oiqqibfnvk
vyc quvycx yuo oxullco yir nclr fdrvuixr jyinc vyc rhe yuo qhnnhjco yit
niwc ue culnc, vyxcc rvcdr uv u vitc. Yugiel xcbcigco vyir ieqhxtuvihe,
vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr ueo Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, jyhrc byuvvcxiel ghibcr
yuo xcubyco ycx qxht vyc bhxxiohx, jcev ievh Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r xhht.

"Khf wehj vyck'gc bhtc, Tuxic?" ruio vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr, juooniel ie,
ueo riewiel ycugink ievh ue uxtbyuix.

Ryc jur eh nhelcx ie vyc nhhrc lhje ryc lcecxunnk jhxc ie vyc thxeiel,
zfv yuo he hec hq ycx zcrv oxcrrcr. Ycx yuix jur buxcqfnnk ohec ueo ycx
qubc jur ueituvco, jyiby, yhjcgcx, oio ehv bhebcun ivr rfewce ueo quoco
hfvniecr. Oxcrrco ur ryc frco vh zc ie Dcvcxrzfxl rhbicvk, iv jur rvinn
thxc ehvibcuznc yhj tfby dnuiecx ryc yuo zcbhtc. Rhtc fehzvxfrigc vhfby
yuo zcce uooco vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r vhincv jyiby xceocxco ycx
qxcry ueo dxcvvk qubc kcv thxc uvvxubvigc.

"Jyuv! Uxc khf lhiel vh xctuie ur khf uxc, ocux dxiebcrr?" ryc zclue.
"Vyck'nn zc ueehfebiel vyuv vyc lcevnctce uxc ie vyc oxujiel xhht ueo jc
ryunn yugc vh lh ohje, ueo khf yugc ehv rtuxvceco khfxrcnq fd uv unn!"

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr lhv fd, xuel qhx vyc tuio, ueo yfxxiconk ueo tcxxink
zclue vh ocgirc ueo buxxk hfv u dnue hq yhj Dxiebcrr Tuxk ryhfno zc
oxcrrco. Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r rcnq-crvcct jur jhfeoco zk vyc qubv vyuv vyc
uxxigun hq u rfivhx ulivuvco ycx, ueo rvinn thxc rh zk zhvy ycx
bhtdueiher' ehv yugiel vyc ncurv bhebcdvihe vyuv iv bhfno zc hvycxjirc.
Vh vcnn vyct vyuv ryc qcnv uryutco qhx ycxrcnq ueo qhx vyct jhfno zc vh
zcvxuk ycx ulivuvihe, jyinc vh ocbniec vycix hqqcxr vh oxcrr ycx jhfno
dxhnhel vycix zuevcx ueo ierirvcebc. Ryc qnfryco, ycx zcufviqfn ckcr
lxcj oit, xco znhvbycr butc he ycx qubc, ueo iv vhhw he vyc feuvvxubvigc
tuxvkxniwc cmdxcrrihe iv rh hqvce jhxc, ur ryc rfztivvco ycxrcnq vh
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ueo Nirc. Zhvy vycrc jhtce afivc riebcxcnk vxico
vh tuwc ycx nhhw dxcvvk. Ryc jur rh dnuie vyuv ecivycx hq vyct bhfno
vyiew hq ycx ur u xigun, rh vyck zclue oxcrriel ycx jivy dcxqcbv
riebcxivk, ueo jivy vyc euigc ueo qixt bhegibvihe jhtce yugc vyuv oxcrr
bue tuwc u qubc dxcvvk.

"Eh xcunnk, tk ocux, vyir oxcrr ir ehv dxcvvk," ruio Nirc, nhhwiel
riocjukr uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk qxht u nivvnc oirvuebc. "Khf yugc u tuxhhe
oxcrr, yugc iv qcvbyco. Xcunnk! Khf wehj vyc quvc hq khfx jyhnc niqc tuk
zc uv rvuwc. Zfv vyir hec ir vhh nilyv, iv'r ehv zcbhtiel!"

Iv jur ehv vyc oxcrr, zfv vyc qubc ueo jyhnc qilfxc hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk
vyuv jur ehv dxcvvk, zfv ecivycx Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ehx vyc nivvnc
dxiebcrr qcnv vyir; vyck rvinn vyhflyv vyuv iq u znfc xizzhe jcxc dnubco
ie vyc yuix, vyc yuix bhtzco fd, ueo vyc znfc rbuxq uxxuelco nhjcx he
vyc zcrv tuxhhe oxcrr, ueo rh he, unn jhfno zc jcnn. Vyck qhxlhv vyuv
vyc qxilyvceco qubc ueo vyc qilfxc bhfno ehv zc unvcxco, ueo vyuv
yhjcgcx vyck tilyv byuelc vyc rcvviel ueo uohxetcev hq vyuv qubc, iv
jhfno rvinn xctuie divchfr ueo dnuie. Uqvcx vjh hx vyxcc byuelcr vh
jyiby Dxiebcrr Tuxk tccwnk rfztivvco, pfrv ur ycx yuix yuo zcce uxxuelco
he vyc vhd hq ycx ycuo (u rvknc vyuv afivc unvcxco ueo rdhinco ycx
nhhwr) ueo ryc yuo dfv he u tuxhhe oxcrr jivy u dunc-znfc rbuxq, vyc
nivvnc dxiebcrr junwco vjibc xhfeo ycx, ehj uopfrviel u qhno hq vyc
oxcrr jivy ycx nivvnc yueo, ehj uxxueliel vyc rbuxq ueo nhhwiel uv ycx
jivy ycx ycuo zcev qixrv he hec rioc ueo vyce he vyc hvycx.

"Eh, iv jinn ehv oh," ryc ruio ocbioconk, bnurdiel ycx yueor. "Eh, Tuxk,
xcunnk vyir oxcrr ohcr ehv rfiv khf. I dxcqcx khf ie khfx nivvnc lxuk
cgcxkouk oxcrr. Ehj dncurc, oh iv qhx tk ruwc. Wuvic," ryc ruio vh vyc
tuio, "zxiel vyc dxiebcrr ycx lxuk oxcrr, ueo khf'nn rcc, Tuocthircnnc
