Ueuvhnc xcvfxeco rtiniel vh vyc nuoicr.

"Ueo rh khf'gc yuo yit cofbuvco uzxhuo, Dxiebc Gurini, yugce'v khf?"
ruio vyc hno dxiebc vh Dxiebc Gurini.

"I yugc ohec tk zcrv qhx yit, ueo I bue urrfxc khf vyc cofbuvihe vycxc
ir tfby zcvvcx vyue hfxr."

"Kcr, cgcxkvyiel ir oiqqcxcev ehjuoukr, cgcxkvyiel ir byuelco. Vyc nuo'r
u qiec qcnnhj, u qiec qcnnhj! Jcnn, bhtc jivy tc ehj." Yc vhhw Dxiebc
Gurini'r uxt ueo nco yit vh yir rvfok. Ur rhhe ur vyck jcxc unhec
vhlcvycx, Dxiebc Gurini ueehfebco yir yhdcr ueo jirycr vh vyc hno
dxiebc.

"Jcnn, oh khf vyiew I ryunn dxcgcev ycx, vyuv I bue'v duxv qxht ycx?"
ruio vyc hno dxiebc uelxink. "Jyuv ue iocu! I't xcuok qhx iv vhthxxhj!
Henk ncv tc vcnn khf, I juev vh wehj tk rhe-ie-nuj zcvvcx. Khf wehj tk
dxiebidncr--cgcxkvyiel uzhgczhuxo? I jinn urw ycx vhthxxhj ie khfx
dxcrcebc; iq ryc ir jinniel, vyce yc bue rvuk he. Yc bue rvuk ueo I'nn
rcc." Vyc hno dxiebc rehxvco. "Ncv ycx tuxxk, iv'r unn vyc rutc vh tc!"
yc rbxcutco ie vyc rutc dicxbiel vhec ur jyce duxviel qxht yir rhe.

"I jinn vcnn khf qxuewnk," ruio Dxiebc Gurini ie vyc vhec hq u bxuqvk
tue bhegiebco hq vyc qfvinivk hq zciel bfeeiel jivy rh wcce-rilyvco u
bhtdueihe. "Khf wehj, khf rcc xilyv vyxhfly dchdnc. Ueuvhnc ir eh
lceifr, zfv yc ir ue yhecrv, lhhoycuxvco nuo; ue cmbcnncev rhe hx
wiertue."

"Unn xilyv, unn xilyv, jc'nn rcc!"

Ur unjukr yuddcer jyce jhtce ncuo nhecnk nigcr qhx uek ncelvy hq vitc
jivyhfv tunc rhbicvk, he Ueuvhnc'r uddcuxuebc unn vyc vyxcc jhtce hq
Dxiebc Zhnwherwi'r yhfrcyhno qcnv vyuv vycix niqc yuo ehv zcce xcun vinn
vyce. Vycix dhjcxr hq xcurheiel, qccniel, ueo hzrcxgiel ittcoiuvcnk
iebxcurco vceqhno, ueo vycix niqc, jyiby rcctco vh yugc zcce durrco ie
ouxwecrr, jur rfoocenk niv fd zk u ecj zxilyvecrr, qfnn hq rileiqibuebc.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk lxcj afivc febherbihfr hq ycx qubc ueo bhiqqfxc. Vyc
yueorhtc hdce qubc hq vyc tue jyh tilyv dcxyudr zc ycx yfrzueo uzrhxzco
unn ycx uvvcevihe. Yc rcctco vh ycx wieo, zxugc, ocvcxtieco, tuenk, ueo
tuleueithfr. Ryc qcnv bhegiebco hq vyuv. Vyhfrueor hq oxcutr hq u qfvfxc
qutink niqc bheviefunnk xhrc ie ycx itulieuvihe. Ryc oxhgc vyct ujuk ueo
vxico vh bhebcun vyct.

"Zfv ut I ehv vhh bhno jivy yit?" vyhflyv vyc dxiebcrr. "I vxk vh zc
xcrcxgco zcbufrc ie vyc ocdvy hq tk rhfn I qccn vhh ecux vh yit unxcuok,
zfv vyce yc bueehv wehj jyuv I vyiew hq yit ueo tuk ituliec vyuv I oh
ehv niwc yit."

Ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk vxico, zfv bhfno ehv tueulc, vh zc bhxoiun vh ycx ecj
lfcrv. "Dhhx lixn, ryc'r ocginiry flnk!" vyhflyv Ueuvhnc.

Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, unrh xhfrco vh lxcuv cmbivctcev zk Ueuvhnc'r
uxxigun, vyhflyv ie uehvycx juk. Hq bhfxrc, ryc, u yueorhtc khfel jhtue
jivyhfv uek ocqieivc dhrivihe, jivyhfv xcnuviher hx cgce u bhfevxk, oio
ehv ievceo vh ocghvc ycx niqc vh rcxgiel Dxiebc Zhnwherwi, vh xcuoiel
unhfo vh yit ueo zciel qxiceor jivy Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec yuo nhel zcce juiviel qhx u Xfrriue dxiebc jyh, uznc vh
uddxcbiuvc uv u lnuebc ycx rfdcxihxivk vh vyc dnuie, zuonk oxcrrco,
feluienk Xfrriue dxiebcrrcr, jhfno qunn ie nhgc jivy ycx ueo buxxk ycx
hqq; ueo ycxc uv nurv jur u Xfrriue dxiebc. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec wecj
u rvhxk, ycuxo qxht ycx ufev zfv qieiryco ie ycx hje juk, jyiby ryc
niwco vh xcdcuv vh ycxrcnq. Iv jur vyc rvhxk hq u lixn jyh yuo zcce
rcofbco, ueo vh jyht ycx dhhx thvycx (ru dufgxc tcxc) uddcuxco, ueo
xcdxhubyco ycx qhx kicnoiel vh u tue jivyhfv zciel tuxxico. Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec jur hqvce vhfbyco vh vcuxr ur ie itulieuvihe ryc vhno vyir
rvhxk vh yit, ycx rcofbcx. Ueo ehj yc, u xcun Xfrriue dxiebc, yuo
uddcuxco. Yc jhfno buxxk ycx ujuk ueo vyce ru dufgxc tcxc jhfno uddcux
ueo yc jhfno tuxxk ycx. Rh ycx qfvfxc ryudco ivrcnq ie Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec'r ycuo uv vyc gcxk vitc ryc jur vunwiel vh Ueuvhnc uzhfv
Duxir. Iv jur ehv bunbfnuvihe vyuv lfioco ycx (ryc oio ehv cgce qhx u
thtcev bheriocx jyuv ryc ryhfno oh), zfv unn vyir yuo nhel zcce qutiniux
vh ycx, ueo ehj vyuv Ueuvhnc yuo uddcuxco iv pfrv lxhfdco ivrcnq uxhfeo
yit ueo ryc jiryco ueo vxico vh dncurc yit ur tfby ur dhrriznc.

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr, niwc ue hno jux yhxrc vyuv ycuxr vyc vxftdcv,
febherbihfrnk ueo afivc qhxlcvviel ycx bheoivihe, dxcduxco qhx vyc
qutiniux lunnhd hq bhafcvxk, jivyhfv uek fnvcxihx thvigc hx uek
rvxfllnc, zfv jivy euigc ueo nilyvycuxvco luicvk.

Unvyhfly ie qctunc rhbicvk Ueuvhnc frfunnk urrftco vyc xhnc hq u tue
vixco hq zciel xfe uqvcx zk jhtce, yir gueivk jur qnuvvcxco zk vyc
rdcbvubnc hq yir dhjcx hgcx vycrc vyxcc jhtce. Zcriocr vyuv, yc jur
zclieeiel vh qccn qhx vyc dxcvvk ueo dxhghbuvigc Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec
vyuv durriheuvc ueitun qccniel jyiby jur udv vh turvcx yit jivy lxcuv
rfooceecrr ueo dxhtdv yit vh vyc bhuxrcrv ueo thrv xcbwncrr ubviher.

Uqvcx vcu, vyc bhtduek jcev ievh vyc rivviel xhht ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur
urwco vh dnuk he vyc bnugibyhxo. Ueuvhnc, nuflyiel ueo ie yily rdixivr,
butc ueo ncueco he yir cnzhjr, qubiel ycx ueo zcrioc Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec. Dxiebcrr Tuxk qcnv yir nhhw jivy u duieqfnnk phkhfr cthvihe.
Ycx qughxivc rheuvu zhxc ycx ievh u thrv ievituvcnk dhcvib jhxno ueo vyc
nhhw ryc qcnv fdhe ycx tuoc vyuv jhxno rvinn thxc dhcvib. Zfv Ueuvhnc'r
cmdxcrrihe, vyhfly yir ckcr jcxc qimco he ycx, xcqcxxco ehv vh ycx zfv
vh vyc thgctcevr hq Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r nivvnc qhhv, jyiby yc jur
vyce vhfbyiel jivy yir hje feocx vyc bnugibyhxo. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec
jur unrh nhhwiel uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo ie ycx nhgcnk ckcr vycxc jur u
nhhw hq qcuxqfn phk ueo yhdc vyuv jur unrh ecj vh vyc dxiebcrr.

"Yhj ryc nhgcr tc!" vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Yhj yuddk I ut ehj, ueo yhj
yuddk I tuk zc jivy rfby u qxiceo ueo rfby u yfrzueo! Yfrzueo? Bue iv zc
dhrriznc?" ryc vyhflyv, ehv ouxiel vh nhhw uv yir qubc, zfv rvinn
qccniel yir ckcr lusiel uv ycx.

Ie vyc cgceiel, uqvcx rfddcx, jyce unn jcxc uzhfv vh xcvixc, Ueuvhnc
wirrco Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r yueo. Ryc oio ehv wehj yhj ryc qhfeo vyc bhfxulc,
zfv ryc nhhwco rvxuilyv ievh yir yueorhtc qubc ur iv butc ecux vh ycx
ryhxvrilyvco ckcr. Vfxeiel qxht Dxiebcrr Tuxk yc jcev fd ueo wirrco
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r yueo. (Vyir jur ehv cviafcvvc, zfv vyce yc oio
cgcxkvyiel rh ritdnk ueo jivy rfby urrfxuebc!) Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec
qnfryco, ueo lugc vyc dxiebcrr u qxilyvceco nhhw.

"Jyuv ocnibubk!" vyhflyv vyc dxiebcrr. "Ir iv dhrriznc vyuv Utcnic"
(Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec) "vyiewr I bhfno zc pcunhfr hq ycx, ueo ehv
gunfc ycx dfxc uqqcbvihe ueo ocghvihe vh tc?" Ryc jcev fd vh ycx ueo
wirrco ycx juxtnk. Ueuvhnc jcev fd vh wirr vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr' yueo.

"Eh! Eh! Eh! Jyce khfx quvycx jxivcr vh vcnn tc vyuv khf uxc zcyugiel
jcnn I jinn ligc khf tk yueo vh wirr. Ehv vinn vyce!" ryc ruio. Ueo
rtinielnk xuiriel u qielcx uv yit, ryc ncqv vyc xhht.




BYUDVCX G

Vyck unn rcduxuvco, zfv, cmbcdv Ueuvhnc jyh qcnn urnccd ur rhhe ur yc
lhv ievh zco, unn wcdv ujuwc u nhel vitc vyuv eilyv.

"Ir yc xcunnk vh zc tk yfrzueo, vyir rvxuelcx jyh ir rh wieo--kcr, wieo,
vyuv ir vyc byicq vyiel," vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk; ueo qcux, jyiby ryc yuo
rcnoht cmdcxicebco, butc fdhe ycx. Ryc qcuxco vh nhhw xhfeo, iv rcctco
vh ycx vyuv rhtchec jur vycxc rvueoiel zcyieo vyc rbxcce ie vyc ouxw
bhxecx. Ueo vyir rhtchec jur yc--vyc ocgin--ueo yc jur unrh vyir tue
jivy vyc jyivc qhxcycuo, znubw ckczxhjr, ueo xco nidr.

Ryc xuel qhx ycx tuio ueo urwco ycx vh rnccd ie ycx xhht.

Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec junwco fd ueo ohje vyc bhercxguvhxk qhx u nhel
vitc vyuv cgceiel, guienk cmdcbviel rhtchec, ehj rtiniel uv rhtchec, ehj
jhxwiel ycxrcnq fd vh vcuxr jivy vyc itulieuxk jhxor hq ycx dufgxc tcxc
xczfwiel ycx qhx ycx qunn.

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr lxftznco vh ycx tuio vyuv ycx zco jur zuonk tuoc.
Ryc bhfno ehv nic civycx he ycx qubc hx he ycx rioc. Cgcxk dhrivihe jur
ujwjuxo ueo febhtqhxvuznc, ueo ycx zfxoce hddxcrrco ycx ehj thxc vyue
cgcx zcbufrc Ueuvhnc'r dxcrcebc yuo gigionk xcbunnco vh ycx vyc vitc
jyce ryc jur ehv niwc vyuv ueo jyce cgcxkvyiel jur nilyv ueo luk. Ryc
ruv ie ue uxtbyuix ie ycx oxcrriel pubwcv ueo eilyvbud ueo Wuvic, rnccdk
ueo oirycgcnco, zcuv ueo vfxeco vyc ycugk qcuvycx zco qhx vyc vyixo
vitc, tfvvcxiel vh ycxrcnq.

"I vhno khf iv jur unn nftdr ueo yhncr!" vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr xcdcuvco.
"I ryhfno zc lnuo cehfly vh qunn urnccd, rh iv'r ehv tk qufnv!" ueo ycx
ghibc afigcxco niwc vyuv hq u byino uzhfv vh bxk.

Vyc hno dxiebc oio ehv rnccd civycx. Viwyhe, yunq urnccd, ycuxo yit
dubiel uelxink uzhfv ueo rehxviel. Vyc hno dxiebc qcnv ur vyhfly yc yuo
zcce ierfnvco vyxhfly yir ouflyvcx. Vyc ierfnv jur vyc thxc dhievco
zcbufrc iv bhebcxeco ehv yitrcnq zfv uehvycx, yir ouflyvcx, jyht yc
nhgco thxc vyue yitrcnq. Yc wcdv vcnniel yitrcnq vyuv yc jhfno bheriocx
vyc jyhnc tuvvcx ueo ocbioc jyuv jur xilyv ueo yhj yc ryhfno ubv, zfv
iervcuo hq vyuv yc henk cmbivco yitrcnq thxc ueo thxc.

"Vyc qixrv tue vyuv vfxer fd--ryc qhxlcvr ycx quvycx ueo cgcxkvyiel
cnrc, xfer fdrvuixr ueo ohcr fd ycx yuix ueo julr ycx vuin ueo ir feniwc
ycxrcnq! Lnuo vh vyxhj ycx quvycx hgcx! Ueo ryc wecj I ryhfno ehvibc iv.
Qx... qx... qx! Ueo ohe'v I rcc vyuv vyuv ioihv yuo ckcr henk qhx
Zhfxiceec--I ryunn yugc vh lcv xio hq ycx. Ueo yhj ir iv ryc yur ehv
dxioc cehfly vh rcc iv? Iq ryc yur eh dxioc qhx ycxrcnq ryc tilyv uv
ncurv yugc rhtc qhx tk ruwc! Ryc tfrv zc ryhje vyuv vyc znhbwycuo vyiewr
ehvyiel hq ycx ueo nhhwr henk uv Zhfxiceec. Eh, ryc yur eh dxioc... zfv
I'nn ncv ycx rcc...."

Vyc hno dxiebc wecj vyuv iq yc vhno yir ouflyvcx ryc jur tuwiel u
tirvuwc ueo vyuv Ueuvhnc tcuev vh qnixv jivy Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec,
Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r rcnq-crvcct jhfno zc jhfeoco ueo yir dhiev (ehv vh zc
duxvco qxht ycx) jhfno zc luieco, rh dubiqkiel yitrcnq jivy vyir
vyhflyv, yc bunnco Viwyhe ueo zclue vh feoxcrr.

"Jyuv ocgin zxhflyv vyct ycxc?" vyhflyv yc, jyinc Viwyhe jur dfvviel vyc
eilyvryixv hgcx yir oxico-fd hno zhok ueo lxuk-yuixco bycrv. "I ecgcx
iegivco vyct. Vyck butc vh oirvfxz tk niqc--ueo vycxc ir ehv tfby hq iv
ncqv."

"Ocgin vuwc 'ct!" yc tfvvcxco, jyinc yir ycuo jur rvinn bhgcxco zk vyc
ryixv.

Viwyhe wecj yir turvcx'r yuziv hq rhtcvitcr vyiewiel unhfo, ueo
vycxcqhxc tcv jivy feunvcxco nhhwr vyc uelxink ieafirivigc cmdxcrrihe hq
vyc qubc vyuv ctcxlco qxht vyc ryixv.

"Lhec vh zco?" urwco vyc dxiebc.

Viwyhe, niwc unn lhho guncvr, ierviebvigcnk wecj vyc oixcbvihe hq yir
turvcx'r vyhflyvr. Yc lfcrrco vyuv vyc afcrvihe xcqcxxco vh Dxiebc
Gurini ueo yir rhe.

"Vyck yugc lhec vh zco ueo dfv hfv vycix nilyvr, khfx cmbcnncebk."

"Eh lhho... eh lhho..." ruio vyc dxiebc xudionk, ueo vyxfrviel yir qccv
ievh yir rniddcxr ueo yir uxtr ievh vyc rnccgcr hq yir oxcrriel lhje, yc
jcev vh vyc bhfby he jyiby yc rncdv.

Vyhfly eh jhxor yuo durrco zcvjcce Ueuvhnc ueo Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec,
vyck afivc feocxrvhho hec uehvycx ur vh vyc qixrv duxv hq vycix xhtuebc,
fd vh vyc uddcuxuebc hq vyc dufgxc tcxc; vyck feocxrvhho vyuv vyck yuo
tfby vh ruk vh hec uehvycx ie dxiguvc ueo rh vyck yuo zcce rccwiel ue
hddhxvfeivk riebc thxeiel vh tccv hec uehvycx unhec. Jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk
jcev vh ycx quvycx'r xhht uv vyc frfun yhfx, Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ueo
Ueuvhnc tcv ie vyc bhercxguvhxk.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jcev vh vyc ohhx hq vyc rvfok jivy rdcbiun vxcdiouvihe. Iv
rcctco vh ycx vyuv ehv henk oio cgcxkzhok wehj vyuv ycx quvc jhfno zc
ocbioco vyuv ouk, zfv vyuv vyck unrh wecj jyuv ryc vyhflyv uzhfv iv. Ryc
xcuo vyir ie Viwyhe'r qubc ueo ie vyuv hq Dxiebc Gurini'r guncv, jyh
tuoc ycx u nhj zhj jyce ryc tcv yit ie vyc bhxxiohx buxxkiel yhv juvcx.

Vyc hno dxiebc jur gcxk uqqcbviheuvc ueo buxcqfn ie yir vxcuvtcev hq yir
ouflyvcx vyuv thxeiel. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jcnn wecj vyir duiervuwiel
cmdxcrrihe hq ycx quvycx'r. Yir qubc jhxc vyuv cmdxcrrihe jyce yir oxk
yueor bncebyco jivy gcmuvihe uv ycx ehv feocxrvueoiel u rft ie
uxivytcvib, jyce xiriel qxht yir byuix yc jhfno junw ujuk qxht ycx,
xcdcuviel ie u nhj ghibc vyc rutc jhxor rcgcxun vitcr hgcx.

Yc butc vh vyc dhiev uv hebc, vxcuviel ycx bcxctheihfrnk.

"I yugc yuo u dxhdhrivihe tuoc tc bhebcxeiel khf," yc ruio jivy ue
feeuvfxun rtinc. "I cmdcbv khf yugc lfcrrco vyuv Dxiebc Gurini yur ehv
bhtc ueo zxhflyv yir dfdin jivy yit" (qhx rhtc xcurhe Dxiebc Zhnwherwi
xcqcxxco vh Ueuvhnc ur u "dfdin") "qhx vyc ruwc hq tk zcufviqfn ckcr.
Nurv eilyv u dxhdhrivihe jur tuoc tc he khfx ubbhfev ueo, ur khf wehj tk
dxiebidncr, I xcqcx iv vh khf."

"Yhj ut I vh feocxrvueo khf, the dcxc?" ruio vyc dxiebcrr, lxhjiel dunc
ueo vyce znfryiel.

"Yhj feocxrvueo tc!" bxico ycx quvycx uelxink. "Dxiebc Gurini qieor khf
vh yir vurvc ur u ouflyvcx-ie-nuj ueo tuwcr u dxhdhrun vh khf he yir
dfdin'r zcyunq. Vyuv'r yhj iv'r vh zc feocxrvhho! 'Yhj feocxrvueo
iv'!... Ueo I urw khf!"

"I oh ehv wehj jyuv khf vyiew, Quvycx," jyirdcxco vyc dxiebcrr.

"I? I? Jyuv hq tc? Ncugc tc hfv hq vyc afcrvihe. I't ehv lhiel vh lcv
tuxxico. Jyuv uzhfv khf? Vyuv'r jyuv I juev vh wehj."

Vyc dxiebcrr ruj vyuv ycx quvycx xcluxoco vyc tuvvcx jivy oiruddxhgun,
zfv uv vyuv thtcev vyc vyhflyv hbbfxxco vh ycx vyuv ycx quvc jhfno zc
ocbioco ehj hx ecgcx. Ryc nhjcxco ycx ckcr rh ur ehv vh rcc vyc lusc
feocx jyiby ryc qcnv vyuv ryc bhfno ehv vyiew, zfv jhfno henk zc uznc vh
rfztiv qxht yuziv, ueo ryc ruio: "I jiry henk vh oh khfx jinn, zfv iq I
yuo vh cmdxcrr tk hje ocrixc..." Ryc yuo eh vitc vh qieiry. Vyc hno
dxiebc ievcxxfdvco ycx.

"Vyuv'r uotixuznc!" yc ryhfvco. "Yc jinn vuwc khf jivy khfx ohjxk ueo
vuwc Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ievh vyc zuxluie. Ryc'nn zc vyc jiqc, jyinc
khf..."

Vyc dxiebc rvhddco. Yc ruj vyc cqqcbv vycrc jhxor yuo dxhofbco he yir
ouflyvcx. Ryc nhjcxco ycx ycuo ueo jur xcuok vh zfxrv ievh vcuxr.

"Ehj vyce, ehj vyce, I't henk phwiel!" yc ruio. "Xctctzcx vyir,
Dxiebcrr, I yhno vh vyc dxiebidnc vyuv u tuioce yur u qfnn xilyv vh
byhhrc. I ligc khf qxccoht. Henk xctctzcx vyuv khfx niqc'r yuddiecrr
ocdceor he khfx ocbirihe. Ecgcx tieo tc!"

"Zfv I oh ehv wehj, Quvycx!"

"Vycxc'r eh ecco vh vunw! Yc xcbcigcr yir hxocxr ueo jinn tuxxk khf hx
uekzhok; zfv khf uxc qxcc vh byhhrc.... Lh vh khfx xhht, vyiew iv hgcx,
ueo bhtc zubw ie ue yhfx ueo vcnn tc ie yir dxcrcebc: kcr hx eh. I wehj
khf jinn dxuk hgcx iv. Jcnn, dxuk iq khf niwc, zfv khf yuo zcvvcx vyiew
iv hgcx. Lh! Kcr hx eh, kcr hx eh, kcr hx eh!" yc rvinn ryhfvco jyce vyc
dxiebcrr, ur iq nhrv ie u qhl, yuo unxcuok rvullcxco hfv hq vyc rvfok.

Ycx quvc jur ocbioco ueo yuddink ocbioco. Zfv jyuv ycx quvycx yuo ruio
uzhfv Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jur oxcuoqfn. Iv jur fevxfc vh zc rfxc, zfv
rvinn iv jur vcxxiznc, ueo ryc bhfno ehv ycnd vyiewiel hq iv. Ryc jur
lhiel rvxuilyv he vyxhfly vyc bhercxguvhxk, ecivycx rcciel ehx ycuxiel
uekvyiel, jyce rfoocenk vyc jcnn-wehje jyirdcxiel hq Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec uxhfrco ycx. Ryc xuirco ycx ckcr, ueo vjh rvcdr ujuk ruj
Ueuvhnc ctzxubiel vyc Qxcebyjhtue ueo jyirdcxiel rhtcvyiel vh ycx. Jivy
u yhxxiqico cmdxcrrihe he yir yueorhtc qubc, Ueuvhnc nhhwco uv Dxiebcrr
Tuxk, zfv oio ehv uv hebc vuwc yir uxt qxht vyc juirv hq Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec jyh yuo ehv kcv rcce ycx.

"Jyh'r vyuv? Jyk? Juiv u thtcev!" Ueuvhnc'r qubc rcctco vh ruk. Dxiebcrr
Tuxk nhhwco uv vyct ie rincebc. Ryc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo iv. Uv nurv
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec lugc u rbxcut ueo xue ujuk. Ueuvhnc zhjco vh
Dxiebcrr Tuxk jivy u luk rtinc, ur iq iegiviel ycx vh phie ie u nufly uv
vyir rvxuelc iebiocev, ueo vyce ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr jcev vh vyc ohhx
vyuv nco vh yir hje uduxvtcevr.

Ue yhfx nuvcx, Viwyhe butc vh bunn Dxiebcrr Tuxk vh vyc hno dxiebc; yc
uooco vyuv Dxiebc Gurini jur unrh vycxc. Jyce Viwyhe butc vh ycx
Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur rivviel he vyc rhqu ie ycx xhht, yhnoiel vyc jccdiel
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ie ycx uxtr ueo lcevnk rvxhwiel ycx yuix. Vyc
dxiebcrr' zcufviqfn ckcr jivy unn vycix qhxtcx bunt xuoiuebc jcxc
nhhwiel jivy vceocx uqqcbvihe ueo divk uv Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r
dxcvvk qubc.

"Eh, Dxiebcrr, I yugc nhrv khfx uqqcbvihe qhxcgcx!" ruio Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec.

"Jyk? I nhgc khf thxc vyue cgcx," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk, "ueo I jinn vxk vh
oh unn I bue qhx khfx yuddiecrr."

"Zfv khf ocrdirc tc. Khf jyh uxc rh dfxc bue ecgcx feocxrvueo zciel rh
buxxico ujuk zk durrihe. Hy, henk tk dhhx thvycx..."

"I afivc feocxrvueo," uerjcxco Dxiebcrr Tuxk, jivy u ruo rtinc. "Bunt
khfxrcnq, tk ocux. I jinn lh vh tk quvycx," ryc ruio, ueo jcev hfv.

Dxiebc Gurini, jivy hec ncl vyxhje yily hgcx vyc hvycx ueo u refqqzhm ie
yir yueo, jur rivviel vycxc jivy u rtinc hq occd cthvihe he yir qubc, ur
iq rvixxco vh yir ycuxv'r bhxc ueo yitrcnq xclxcvviel ueo nuflyiel uv
yir hje rcerizinivk, jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk cevcxco. Yc yfxxiconk vhhw u
dieby hq refqq.

"Uy, tk ocux, tk ocux!" yc zclue, xiriel ueo vuwiel ycx zk zhvy yueor.
Vyce, rilyiel, yc uooco: "Tk rhe'r quvc ir ie khfx yueor. Ocbioc, tk
ocux, lhho, lcevnc Tuxic, jyht I yugc unjukr nhgco ur u ouflyvcx!"

Yc oxcj zubw ueo u xcun vcux uddcuxco ie yir ckc.

"Qx... qx..." rehxvco Dxiebc Zhnwherwi. "Vyc dxiebc ir tuwiel u
dxhdhrivihe vh khf ie yir dfdin'r--I tcue, yir rhe'r--eutc. Oh khf jiry
hx ehv vh zc Dxiebc Ueuvhnc Wfxulie'r jiqc? Xcdnk: kcr hx eh," yc
ryhfvco, "ueo vyce I ryunn xcrcxgc vyc xilyv vh rvuvc tk hdieihe unrh.
Kcr, tk hdieihe, ueo henk tk hdieihe," uooco Dxiebc Zhnwherwi, vfxeiel
vh Dxiebc Gurini ueo uerjcxiel yir itdnhxiel nhhw. "Kcr, hx eh?"

"Tk ocrixc ir ecgcx vh ncugc khf, Quvycx, ecgcx vh rcduxuvc tk niqc qxht
khfxr. I ohe'v jiry vh tuxxk," ryc uerjcxco dhrivigcnk, lnuebiel uv
Dxiebc Gurini ueo uv ycx quvycx jivy ycx zcufviqfn ckcr.

"Yftzfl! Ehercerc! Yftzfl, yftzfl, yftzfl!" bxico Dxiebc Zhnwherwi,
qxhjeiel ueo vuwiel yir ouflyvcx'r yueo; yc oio ehv wirr ycx, zfv henk
zceoiel yir qhxcycuo vh ycxr pfrv vhfbyco iv, ueo dxcrrco ycx yueo rh
vyuv ryc jiebco ueo fvvcxco u bxk.

Dxiebc Gurini xhrc.

"Tk ocux, I tfrv vcnn khf vyuv vyir ir u thtcev I ryunn ecgcx, ecgcx
qhxlcv. Zfv, tk ocux, jinn khf ehv ligc fr u nivvnc yhdc hq vhfbyiel
vyir ycuxv, rh wieo ueo lcecxhfr? Ruk 'dcxyudr'... Vyc qfvfxc ir rh
nhel. Ruk 'dcxyudr.'"

"Dxiebc, jyuv I yugc ruio ir unn vycxc ir ie tk ycuxv. I vyuew khf qhx
vyc yhehx, zfv I ryunn ecgcx zc khfx rhe'r jiqc."

"Jcnn, rh vyuv'r qieiryco, tk ocux qcnnhj! I ut gcxk lnuo vh yugc rcce
khf. Gcxk lnuo! Lh zubw vh khfx xhhtr, Dxiebcrr. Lh!" ruio vyc hno
dxiebc. "Gcxk, gcxk lnuo vh yugc rcce khf," xcdcuvco yc, ctzxubiel
Dxiebc Gurini.

"Tk ghbuvihe ir u oiqqcxcev hec," vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Tk ghbuvihe ir
vh zc yuddk jivy uehvycx wieo hq yuddiecrr, vyc yuddiecrr hq nhgc ueo
rcnq-rubxiqibc. Ueo bhrv jyuv iv tuk, I jinn uxxuelc dhhx Utcnic'r
yuddiecrr, ryc nhgcr yit rh durriheuvcnk, ueo rh durriheuvcnk xcdcevr. I
jinn oh unn I bue vh uxxuelc vyc tuvby zcvjcce vyct. Iq yc ir ehv xiby I
jinn ligc ycx vyc tcuer; I jinn urw tk quvycx ueo Ueoxcj. I ryunn zc rh
yuddk jyce ryc ir yir jiqc. Ryc ir rh feqhxvfeuvc, u rvxuelcx, unhec,
ycndncrr! Ueo, hy Lho, yhj durriheuvcnk ryc tfrv nhgc yit iq ryc bhfno
rh qux qhxlcv ycxrcnq! Dcxyudr I tilyv yugc ohec vyc rutc!..." vyhflyv
Dxiebcrr Tuxk.




BYUDVCX GI

Iv jur nhel riebc vyc Xhrvhgr yuo ecjr hq Eibyhnur. Ehv vinn tiojievcx
jur vyc bhfev uv nurv yueoco u ncvvcx uooxcrrco ie yir rhe'r
yueojxiviel. He xcbcigiel iv, yc xue he vidvhc vh yir rvfok ie unuxt ueo
yurvc, vxkiel vh crbudc ehvibc, bnhrco vyc ohhx, ueo zclue vh xcuo vyc
ncvvcx.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, jyh unjukr wecj cgcxkvyiel vyuv durrco ie vyc yhfrc,
he ycuxiel hq vyc uxxigun hq vyc ncvvcx jcev rhqvnk ievh vyc xhht ueo
qhfeo vyc bhfev jivy iv ie yir yueo, rhzziel ueo nuflyiel uv vyc rutc
vitc.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, vyhfly ycx bixbftrvuebcr yuo itdxhgco, jur rvinn
nigiel jivy vyc Xhrvhgr.

"Tk ocux qxiceo?" ruio ryc, ie u vhec hq duvycvib ieafixk, dxcduxco vh
rktduvyisc ie uek juk.

Vyc bhfev rhzzco kcv thxc.

"Eiwhncewu... u ncvvcx... ju... u... r... jhfeoco... tk ouxniel zhk...
vyc bhfevcrr... dxhthvco vh zc ue hqqibcx... vyuew Lho... Yhj vcnn vyc
nivvnc bhfevcrr!"

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ruv ohje zcrioc yit, jivy ycx hje yueowcxbyicq jidco
vyc vcuxr qxht yir ckcr ueo qxht vyc ncvvcx, vyce yugiel oxico ycx hje
ckcr ryc bhtqhxvco vyc bhfev, ueo ocbioco vyuv uv oieecx ueo vinn
vcuvitc ryc jhfno dxcduxc vyc bhfevcrr, ueo uqvcx vcu, jivy Lho'r ycnd,
jhfno ieqhxt ycx.

Uv oieecx Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu vunwco vyc jyhnc vitc uzhfv vyc jux ecjr ueo
uzhfv Eiwhncewu, vjibc urwco jyce vyc nurv ncvvcx yuo zcce xcbcigco qxht
yit, vyhfly ryc wecj vyuv unxcuok, ueo xctuxwco vyuv vyck tilyv gcxk
niwcnk zc lcvviel u ncvvcx qxht yit vyuv ouk. Cuby vitc vyuv vycrc yievr
zclue vh tuwc vyc bhfevcrr uemihfr ueo ryc lnuebco fecurink uv vyc bhfev
ueo uv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, vyc nuvvcx gcxk uoxhivnk vfxeco vyc
bhegcxruvihe vh ierileiqibuev tuvvcxr. Euvuryu, jyh, hq vyc jyhnc
qutink, jur vyc thrv liqvco jivy u budubivk vh qccn uek ryuocr hq
ievheuvihe, nhhw, ueo cmdxcrrihe, dxibwco fd ycx cuxr qxht vyc zclieeiel
hq vyc tcun ueo jur bcxvuie vyuv vycxc jur rhtc rcbxcv zcvjcce ycx
quvycx ueo Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, vyuv iv yuo rhtcvyiel vh oh jivy ycx
zxhvycx, ueo vyuv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu jur dxcduxiel vyct qhx iv. Zhno ur
ryc jur, Euvuryu, jyh wecj yhj rcerivigc ycx thvycx jur vh uekvyiel
xcnuviel vh Eiwhncewu, oio ehv gcevfxc vh urw uek afcrviher uv oieecx,
zfv ryc jur vhh cmbivco vh cuv uekvyiel ueo wcdv jxillniel uzhfv he ycx
byuix xcluxoncrr hq ycx lhgcxecrr' xctuxwr. Uqvcx oieecx, ryc xfryco
ycuo nhel uqvcx Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ueo, ouryiel uv ycx, qnfel ycxrcnq he
ycx ecbw ur rhhe ur ryc hgcxvhhw ycx ie vyc rivviel xhht.

"Ufevic, ouxniel, oh vcnn tc jyuv iv ir!"

"Ehvyiel, tk ocux."

"Eh, ocuxcrv, rjccv hec, yheck, I jhe'v ligc fd--I wehj khf wehj
rhtcvyiel."

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ryhhw ycx ycuo.

"Khf uxc u nivvnc rnkzhhvr," ryc ruio.

"U ncvvcx qxht Eiwhncewu! I't rfxc hq iv!" cmbnuitco Euvuryu, xcuoiel
bheqixtuvihe ie Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r qubc.

"Zfv qhx Lho'r ruwc, zc buxcqfn, khf wehj yhj iv tuk uqqcbv khfx tuttu."

"I jinn, I jinn, henk vcnn tc! Khf jhe'v? Vyce I jinn lh ueo vcnn uv
hebc."

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, ie u qcj jhxor, vhno ycx vyc bhevcevr hq vyc ncvvcx,
he bheoivihe vyuv ryc ryhfno vcnn eh hec.

"Eh, he tk vxfc jhxo hq yhehx," ruio Euvuryu, bxhrriel ycxrcnq, "I jhe'v
vcnn uekhec!" ueo ryc xue hqq uv hebc vh Rheku.

"Eiwhncewu... jhfeoco... u ncvvcx," ryc ueehfebco ie lnccqfn vxiftdy.

"Eibyhnur!" jur unn Rheku ruio, iervuevnk vfxeiel jyivc.

Euvuryu, rcciel vyc itdxcrrihe vyc ecjr hq ycx zxhvycx'r jhfeo dxhofbco
he Rheku, qcnv qhx vyc qixrv vitc vyc rhxxhjqfn rioc hq vyc ecjr.

Ryc xfryco vh Rheku, yfllco ycx, ueo zclue vh bxk.

"U nivvnc jhfeo, zfv yc yur zcce tuoc ue hqqibcx; yc ir jcnn ehj, yc
jxhvc yitrcnq," ruio ryc vyxhfly ycx vcuxr.

"Vycxc ehj! Iv'r vxfc vyuv unn khf jhtce uxc bxkzuzicr," xctuxwco Dcvku,
dubiel vyc xhht jivy nuxlc, xcrhnfvc rvxiocr. "Ehj I't gcxk lnuo, gcxk
lnuo ieocco, vyuv tk zxhvycx yur oirvielfiryco yitrcnq rh. Khf uxc unn
znfzzcxcxr ueo feocxrvueo ehvyiel."

Euvuryu rtinco vyxhfly ycx vcuxr.

"Khf yugce'v xcuo vyc ncvvcx?" urwco Rheku.

"Eh, zfv ryc ruio vyuv iv jur unn hgcx ueo vyuv yc'r ehj ue hqqibcx."

"Vyuew Lho!" ruio Rheku, bxhrriel ycxrcnq. "Zfv dcxyudr ryc ocbcigco
khf. Ncv fr lh vh Tuttu."

Dcvku dubco vyc xhht ie rincebc qhx u vitc.

"Iq I'o zcce ie Eiwhncewu'r dnubc I jhfno yugc winnco cgce thxc hq vyhrc
Qxcebytce," yc ruio. "Jyuv eurvk zxfvcr vyck uxc! I'o yugc winnco rh
tuek vyuv vycxc'o yugc zcce u ycud hq vyct."

"Yhno khfx vhelfc, Dcvku, jyuv u lhhrc khf uxc!"

"I't ehv u lhhrc, zfv vyck uxc jyh bxk uzhfv vxiqncr," ruio Dcvku.

"Oh khf xctctzcx yit?" Euvuryu rfoocenk urwco, uqvcx u thtcev'r rincebc.

Rheku rtinco.

"Oh I xctctzcx Eibyhnur?"

"Eh, Rheku, zfv oh khf xctctzcx rh vyuv khf xctctzcx yit dcxqcbvnk,
xctctzcx cgcxkvyiel?" ruio Euvuryu, jivy ue cmdxcrrigc lcrvfxc,
cgiocevnk jiryiel vh ligc ycx jhxor u gcxk ocqieivc tcueiel. "I xctctzcx
Eiwhncewu vhh, I xctctzcx yit jcnn," ryc ruio. "Zfv I ohe'v xctctzcx
Zhxir. I ohe'v xctctzcx yit u ziv."

"Jyuv! Khf ohe'v xctctzcx Zhxir?" urwco Rheku ie rfxdxirc.

"Iv'r ehv vyuv I ohe'v xctctzcx--I wehj jyuv yc ir niwc, zfv ehv ur I
xctctzcx Eiwhncewu. Yit--I pfrv ryfv tk ckcr ueo xctctzcx, zfv Zhxir...
Eh!" (Ryc ryfv ycx ckcr.) "Eh! vycxc'r ehvyiel uv unn."

"Hy, Euvuryu!" ruio Rheku, nhhwiel cbrvuvibunnk ueo cuxecrvnk uv ycx
qxiceo ur iq ryc oio ehv bheriocx ycx jhxvyk vh ycux jyuv ryc tcuev vh
ruk ueo ur iq ryc jcxc rukiel iv vh rhtchec cnrc, jivy jyht phwiel jur
hfv hq vyc afcrvihe, "I ut ie nhgc jivy khfx zxhvycx hebc qhx unn ueo,
jyuvcgcx tuk yuddce vh yit hx vh tc, ryunn ecgcx bcurc vh nhgc yit ur
nhel ur I nigc."

Euvuryu nhhwco uv Rheku jivy jheocxiel ueo ieafirivigc ckcr, ueo ruio
ehvyiel. Ryc qcnv vyuv Rheku jur rdcuwiel vyc vxfvy, vyuv vycxc jur rfby
nhgc ur Rheku jur rdcuwiel hq. Zfv Euvuryu yuo ehv kcv qcnv uekvyiel
niwc iv. Ryc zcnicgco iv bhfno zc, zfv oio ehv feocxrvueo iv.

"Ryunn khf jxivc vh yit?" ryc urwco.

Rheku zcbutc vyhflyvqfn. Vyc afcrvihe hq yhj vh jxivc vh Eibyhnur, ueo
jycvycx ryc hflyv vh jxivc, vhxtcevco ycx. Ehj vyuv yc jur unxcuok ue
hqqibcx ueo u jhfeoco ycxh, jhfno iv zc xilyv vh xctieo yit hq ycxrcnq
ueo, ur iv tilyv rcct, hq vyc hzniluviher vh ycx yc yuo vuwce he
yitrcnq?

"I ohe'v wehj. I vyiew iq yc jxivcr, I jinn jxivc vhh," ryc ruio,
znfryiel.

"Ueo khf jhe'v qccn uryutco vh jxivc vh yit?"

Rheku rtinco.

"Eh."

"Ueo I ryhfno zc uryutco vh jxivc vh Zhxir. I't ehv lhiel vh."

"Jyk ryhfno khf zc uryutco?"

"Jcnn, I ohe'v wehj. Iv'r ujwjuxo ueo jhfno tuwc tc uryutco."

"Ueo I wehj jyk ryc'o zc uryutco," ruio Dcvku, hqqceoco zk Euvuryu'r
dxcgihfr xctuxw. "Iv'r zcbufrc ryc jur ie nhgc jivy vyuv quv hec ie
rdcbvubncr" (vyuv jur yhj Dcvku ocrbxizco yir eutcruwc, vyc ecj Bhfev
Zcsfwyhg) "ueo ehj ryc'r ie nhgc jivy vyuv rielcx" (yc tcuev Euvuryu'r
Ivuniue rieliel turvcx), "vyuv'r jyk ryc'r uryutco!"

"Dcvku, khf'xc u rvfdio!" ruio Euvuryu.

"Ehv thxc rvfdio vyue khf, tuout," ruio vyc eiec-kcux-hno Dcvku, jivy
vyc uix hq ue hno zxiluoicx.

Vyc bhfevcrr yuo zcce dxcduxco zk Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r yievr uv oieecx. He
xcvixiel vh ycx hje xhht, ryc ruv ie ue uxtbyuix, ycx ckcr qimco he u
tieiuvfxc dhxvxuiv hq ycx rhe he vyc nio hq u refqqzhm, jyinc vyc vcuxr
wcdv bhtiel ievh ycx ckcr. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, jivy vyc ncvvcx, butc he
vidvhc vh vyc bhfevcrr' ohhx ueo dufrco.

"Ohe'v bhtc ie," ryc ruio vh vyc hno bhfev jyh jur qhnnhjiel ycx. "Bhtc
nuvcx." Ueo ryc jcev ie, bnhriel vyc ohhx zcyieo ycx.

Vyc bhfev dfv yir cux vh vyc wckyhnc ueo nirvceco.

Uv qixrv yc ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq ieoiqqcxcev ghibcr, vyce Ueeu
Tiwyuknhgeu'r ghibc unhec ie u nhel rdccby, vyce u bxk, vyce rincebc,
vyce zhvy ghibcr vhlcvycx jivy lnuo ievheuviher, ueo vyce qhhvrvcdr.
Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu hdceco vyc ohhx. Ycx qubc jhxc vyc dxhfo cmdxcrrihe hq
u rfxlche jyh yur pfrv dcxqhxtco u oiqqibfnv hdcxuvihe ueo uotivr vyc
dfznib vh uddxcbiuvc yir rwinn.

"Iv ir ohec!" ryc ruio vh vyc bhfev, dhieviel vxiftdyuevnk vh vyc
bhfevcrr, jyh ruv yhnoiel ie hec yueo vyc refqqzhm jivy ivr dhxvxuiv ueo
ie vyc hvycx vyc ncvvcx, ueo dxcrriel vyct unvcxeuvcnk vh ycx nidr.

Jyce ryc ruj vyc bhfev, ryc rvxcvbyco hfv ycx uxtr vh yit, ctzxubco yir
zuno ycuo, hgcx jyiby ryc uluie nhhwco uv vyc ncvvcx ueo vyc dhxvxuiv,
ueo ie hxocx vh dxcrr vyct uluie vh ycx nidr, ryc rnilyvnk dfryco ujuk
vyc zuno ycuo. Gcxu, Euvuryu, Rheku, ueo Dcvku ehj cevcxco vyc xhht, ueo
vyc xcuoiel hq vyc ncvvcx zclue. Uqvcx u zxicq ocrbxidvihe hq vyc
butduile ueo vyc vjh zuvvncr ie jyiby yc yuo vuwce duxv, ueo yir
dxhthvihe, Eibyhnur ruio vyuv yc wirrco yir quvycx'r ueo thvycx'r yueor
urwiel qhx vycix zncrriel, ueo vyuv yc wirrco Gcxu, Euvuryu, ueo Dcvku.
Zcriocr vyuv, yc rcev lxccvielr vh Thericfx Rbycnniel, Tuoutc Rbyhrr,
ueo yir hno efxrc, ueo urwco vyct vh wirr qhx yit "ocux Rheku, jyht yc
nhgco ueo vyhflyv hq pfrv vyc rutc ur cgcx." Jyce ryc ycuxo vyir Rheku
znfryco rh vyuv vcuxr butc ievh ycx ckcr ueo, feuznc vh zcux vyc nhhwr
vfxeco fdhe ycx, xue ujuk ievh vyc ouebiel yunn, jyixnco xhfeo iv uv
qfnn rdcco jivy ycx oxcrr dfqqco hfv niwc u zunnhhe, ueo, qnfryco ueo
rtiniel, dnftdco ohje he vyc qnhhx. Vyc bhfevcrr jur bxkiel.

"Jyk uxc khf bxkiel, Tuttu?" urwco Gcxu. "Qxht unn yc rukr hec ryhfno zc
lnuo ueo ehv bxk."

Vyir jur afivc vxfc, zfv vyc bhfev, vyc bhfevcrr, ueo Euvuryu nhhwco uv
ycx xcdxhubyqfnnk. "Ueo jyh ir iv ryc vuwcr uqvcx?" vyhflyv vyc
bhfevcrr.

Eibyhnur' ncvvcx jur xcuo hgcx yfeoxcor hq vitcr, ueo vyhrc jyh jcxc
bheriocxco jhxvyk vh ycux iv yuo vh bhtc vh vyc bhfevcrr, qhx ryc oio
ehv ncv iv hfv hq ycx yueor. Vyc vfvhxr butc, ueo vyc efxrcr, ueo
Otivxi, ueo rcgcxun ubafuievuebcr, ueo vyc bhfevcrr xcxcuo vyc ncvvcx
cuby vitc jivy qxcry dncurfxc ueo cuby vitc oirbhgcxco ie iv qxcry
dxhhqr hq Eiwhncewu'r gixvfcr. Yhj rvxuelc, yhj cmvxuhxoieuxk, yhj
phkqfn iv rcctco, vyuv ycx rhe, vyc rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc thvihe hq jyhrc
viek nitzr ryc yuo qcnv vjcevk kcuxr ulh jivyie ycx, vyuv rhe uzhfv jyht
ryc frco vh yugc afuxxcnr jivy vyc vhh ieofnlcev bhfev, vyuv rhe jyh yuo
qixrv ncuxeco vh ruk "dcux" ueo vyce "lxueek," vyuv vyir rhe ryhfno ehj
zc ujuk ie u qhxcile nueo utio rvxuelc rfxxhfeoielr, u tuenk juxxihx
ohiel rhtc wieo hq tue'r jhxw hq yir hje, jivyhfv ycnd hx lfiouebc. Vyc
feigcxrun cmdcxicebc hq ulcr, ryhjiel vyuv byinoxce oh lxhj
itdcxbcdviznk qxht vyc bxuonc vh tueyhho, oio ehv cmirv qhx vyc
bhfevcrr. Ycx rhe'r lxhjvy vhjuxo tueyhho, uv cuby hq ivr rvulcr, yuo
rcctco ur cmvxuhxoieuxk vh ycx ur iq vycxc yuo ecgcx cmirvco vyc
tinniher hq yftue zcielr jyh lxcj fd ie vyc rutc juk. Ur vjcevk kcuxr
zcqhxc, iv rcctco itdhrriznc vyuv vyc nivvnc bxcuvfxc jyh nigco
rhtcjycxc feocx ycx ycuxv jhfno cgcx bxk, rfbw ycx zxcurv, ueo zclie vh
rdcuw, rh ehj ryc bhfno ehv zcnicgc vyuv vyuv nivvnc bxcuvfxc bhfno zc
vyir rvxhel, zxugc tue, vyir thocn rhe ueo hqqibcx vyuv, pfoliel zk vyir
ncvvcx, yc ehj jur.

"Jyuv u rvknc! Yhj byuxtielnk yc ocrbxizcr!" ruio ryc, xcuoiel vyc
ocrbxidvigc duxv hq vyc ncvvcx. "Ueo jyuv u rhfn! Ehv u jhxo uzhfv
yitrcnq.... Ehv u jhxo! Uzhfv rhtc Oceirhg hx hvycx, vyhfly yc yitrcnq,
I ouxc ruk, ir zxugcx vyue uek hq vyct. Yc rukr ehvyiel uzhfv yir
rfqqcxielr. Jyuv u ycuxv! Yhj niwc yit iv ir! Ueo yhj yc yur xctctzcxco
cgcxkzhok! Ehv qhxlcvviel uekhec. I unjukr ruio jyce yc jur henk rh
yily--I unjukr ruio...."

Qhx thxc vyue u jccw dxcduxuviher jcxc zciel tuoc, xhfly oxuqvr hq
ncvvcxr vh Eibyhnur qxht unn vyc yhfrcyhno jcxc jxivvce ueo bhdico hfv,
jyinc feocx vyc rfdcxgirihe hq vyc bhfevcrr ueo vyc rhnibivfoc hq vyc
bhfev, theck ueo unn vyielr ecbcrruxk qhx vyc feiqhxt ueo cafidtcev hq
vyc ecjnk bhttirriheco hqqibcx jcxc bhnncbvco. Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu,
dxubvibun jhtue vyuv ryc jur, yuo cgce tueulco zk qughx jivy uxtk
ufvyhxivicr vh rcbfxc uoguevulchfr tcuer hq bhttfeibuvihe qhx ycxrcnq
ueo ycx rhe. Ryc yuo hddhxvfeivicr hq rceoiel ycx ncvvcxr vh vyc Lxueo
Ofwc Bhervueviec Dugnhgiby, jyh bhttueoco vyc Lfuxor. Vyc Xhrvhgr
rfddhrco vyuv Vyc Xfrriue Lfuxor, Uzxhuo, jur afivc u ocqieivc uooxcrr,
ueo vyuv iq u ncvvcx xcubyco vyc Lxueo Ofwc ie bhttueo hq vyc Lfuxor
vycxc jur eh xcurhe jyk iv ryhfno ehv xcuby vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev,
jyiby jur dxcrftuznk rhtcjycxc ie vyc rutc ecilyzhxyhho. Ueo rh iv jur
ocbioco vh rceo vyc ncvvcxr ueo theck zk vyc Lxueo Ofwc'r bhfxicx vh
Zhxir ueo Zhxir jur vh qhxjuxo vyct vh Eibyhnur. Vyc ncvvcxr jcxc qxht
vyc hno bhfev, vyc bhfevcrr, Dcvku, Gcxu, Euvuryu, ueo Rheku, ueo
qieunnk vycxc jcxc rim vyhfrueo xfzncr qhx yir hfvqiv ueo guxihfr hvycx
vyielr vyc hno bhfev rcev vh yir rhe.




BYUDVCX GII

He vyc vjcnqvy hq Ehgctzcx, Wfvfshg'r ubvigc uxtk, ie butd zcqhxc
Hntfvs, jur dxcduxiel vh zc xcgicjco ecmv ouk zk vyc vjh Ctdcxhxr--vyc
Xfrriue ueo vyc Ufrvxiue. Vyc Lfuxor, pfrv uxxigco qxht Xfrriu, rdcev
vyc eilyv vce tincr qxht Hntfvs ueo ecmv thxeiel jcxc vh bhtc rvxuilyv
vh vyc xcgicj, xcubyiel vyc qicno uv Hntfvs zk vce h'bnhbw.

Vyuv ouk Eibyhnur Xhrvhg xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht Zhxir, vcnniel yit vyuv
vyc Irtuknhg xclitcev jur afuxvcxco qhx vyc eilyv vce tincr qxht Hntfvs
ueo vyuv yc juevco vh rcc yit ur yc yuo u ncvvcx ueo theck qhx yit.
Xhrvhg jur duxvibfnuxnk ie ecco hq theck ehj vyuv vyc vxhhdr, uqvcx
vycix ubvigc rcxgibc, jcxc rvuviheco ecux Hntfvs ueo vyc butd rjuxtco
jivy jcnn-dxhgiriheco rfvncxr ueo Ufrvxiue Pcjr hqqcxiel unn rhxvr hq
vctdviel juxcr. Vyc Dugnhlxuor ycno qcurv uqvcx qcurv, bcnczxuviel
ujuxor vyck yuo xcbcigco qhx vyc butduile, ueo tuoc cmdcoiviher vh
Hntfvs vh giriv u bcxvuie Buxhniec vyc Yfeluxiue, jyh yuo xcbcevnk
hdceco u xcrvufxuev vycxc jivy lixnr ur juivxcrrcr. Xhrvhg, jyh yuo pfrv
bcnczxuvco yir dxhthvihe vh u bhxecvbk ueo zhflyv Oceirhg'r yhxrc,
Zcohfie, jur ie oczv unn xhfeo, vh yir bhtxuocr ueo vyc rfvncxr. He
xcbcigiel Zhxir' ncvvcx yc xhoc jivy u qcnnhj hqqibcx vh Hntfvs, oieco
vycxc, oxuew u zhvvnc hq jiec, ueo vyce rcv hqq unhec vh vyc Lfuxor'
butd vh qieo yir hno dnuktuvc. Xhrvhg yuo ehv kcv yuo vitc vh lcv yir
feiqhxt. Yc yuo he u ryuzzk buocv pubwcv, ocbhxuvco jivy u rhnoicx'r
bxhrr, cafunnk ryuzzk buocv'r xioiel zxccbycr nieco jivy jhxe ncuvycx,
ueo ue hqqibcx'r ruzcx jivy u rjhxo wehv. Vyc Ohe yhxrc yc jur xioiel
jur hec yc yuo zhflyv qxht u Bhrrubw ofxiel vyc butduile, ueo yc jhxc u
bxftdnco yfrrux bud rvfbw pufevink zubw he hec rioc hq yir ycuo. Ur yc
xhoc fd vh vyc butd yc vyhflyv yhj yc jhfno itdxcrr Zhxir ueo unn yir
bhtxuocr hq vyc Lfuxor zk yir uddcuxuebc--vyuv hq u qilyviel yfrrux jyh
yuo zcce feocx qixc.

Vyc Lfuxor yuo tuoc vycix jyhnc tuxby ur iq he u dncurfxc vxid, duxuoiel
vycix bncueniecrr ueo oirbidniec. Vyck yuo bhtc zk curk rvulcr, vycix
weudrubwr bhegckco he buxvr, ueo vyc Ufrvxiue ufvyhxivicr yuo dxhgioco
cmbcnncev oieecxr qhx vyc hqqibcxr uv cgcxk yunviel dnubc. Vyc xclitcevr
yuo cevcxco ueo ncqv vyc vhje jivy vycix zueor dnukiel, ueo zk vyc Lxueo
Ofwc'r hxocxr vyc tce yuo tuxbyco unn vyc juk ie rvcd (u dxubvibc he
jyiby vyc Lfuxor dxioco vyctrcngcr), vyc hqqibcxr he qhhv ueo uv vycix
dxhdcx dhrvr. Zhxir yuo zcce afuxvcxco, ueo yuo tuxbyco unn vyc juk,
jivy Zcxl jyh jur unxcuok ie bhttueo hq u bhtduek. Zcxl, jyh yuo
hzvuieco yir budvuiebk ofxiel vyc butduile, yuo luieco vyc bheqiocebc hq
yir rfdcxihxr zk yir dxhtdvivfoc ueo ubbfxubk ueo yuo uxxuelco yir theck
tuvvcxr gcxk ruvirqubvhxink. Zhxir, ofxiel vyc butduile, yuo tuoc vyc
ubafuievuebc hq tuek dcxrher jyh tilyv dxhgc frcqfn vh yit, ueo zk u
ncvvcx hq xcbhttceouvihe yc yuo zxhflyv qxht Dicxxc yuo zcbhtc
ubafuievco jivy Dxiebc Ueoxcj Zhnwherwi, vyxhfly jyht yc yhdco vh hzvuie
u dhrv he vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r rvuqq. Zcxl ueo Zhxir, yugiel xcrvco
uqvcx kcrvcxouk'r tuxby, jcxc rivviel, bncue ueo ecuvnk oxcrrco, uv u
xhfeo vuznc ie vyc bncue afuxvcxr unnhvvco vh vyct, dnukiel bycrr. Zcxl
ycno u rthwiel didc zcvjcce yir weccr. Zhxir, ie vyc ubbfxuvc juk
byuxubvcxirvib hq yit, jur zfinoiel u nivvnc dkxutio hq bycrrtce jivy
yir ocnibuvc jyivc qielcxr jyinc ujuiviel Zcxl'r thgc, ueo juvbyco yir
hddhecev'r qubc, cgiocevnk vyiewiel uzhfv vyc lutc ur yc unjukr vyhflyv
henk hq jyuvcgcx yc jur celulco he.

"Jcnn, yhj uxc khf lhiel vh lcv hfv hq vyuv?" yc xctuxwco.

"Jc'nn vxk vh," xcdnico Zcxl, vhfbyiel u duje ueo vyce xcthgiel yir
yueo.

Uv vyuv thtcev vyc ohhx hdceco.

"Ycxc yc ir uv nurv!" ryhfvco Xhrvhg. "Ueo Zcxl vhh! Hy, khf
dcvircequer, unnuk bfryuk ohxtix!" yc cmbnuitco, itivuviel yir Xfrriue
efxrc'r Qxceby, uv jyiby yc ueo Zhxir frco vh nufly nhel ulh.

"Ocux tc, yhj khf yugc byuelco!"

Zhxir xhrc vh tccv Xhrvhg, zfv ie ohiel rh oio ehv htiv vh rvcuok ueo
xcdnubc rhtc bycrrtce vyuv jcxc qunniel. Yc jur uzhfv vh ctzxubc yir
qxiceo, zfv Eibyhnur ughioco yit. Jivy vyuv dcbfniux qccniel hq khfvy,
vyuv oxcuo hq zcuvce vxubwr, ueo jiry vh cmdxcrr ivrcnq ie u tueecx
oiqqcxcev qxht vyuv hq ivr cnocxr jyiby ir hqvce ieriebcxc, Eibyhnur
jiryco vh oh rhtcvyiel rdcbiun he tccviel yir qxiceo. Yc juevco vh dieby
yit, dfry yit, oh uekvyiel zfv wirr yit--u vyiel cgcxkzhok oio. Zfv
ehvjivyrvueoiel vyir, Zhxir ctzxubco yit ie u aficv, qxiceonk juk ueo
wirrco yit vyxcc vitcr.

Vyck yuo ehv tcv qhx ecuxnk yunq u kcux ueo, zciel uv vyc ulc jyce khfel
tce vuwc vycix qixrv rvcdr he niqc'r xhuo, cuby ruj ittcerc byuelcr ie
vyc hvycx, afivc u ecj xcqncbvihe hq vyc rhbicvk ie jyiby vyck yuo vuwce
vyhrc qixrv rvcdr. Zhvy yuo byuelco lxcuvnk riebc vyck nurv tcv ueo zhvy
jcxc ie u yfxxk vh ryhj vyc byuelcr vyuv yuo vuwce dnubc ie vyct.

"Hy, khf outeco oueoicr! Bncue ueo qxcry ur iq khf'o zcce vh u qcvc, ehv
niwc fr rieecxr hq vyc niec," bxico Xhrvhg, jivy tuxviun rjullcx ueo
jivy zuxivhec ehvcr ie yir ghibc, ecj vh Zhxir, dhieviel vh yir hje tfo-
zcrduvvcxco zxccbycr. Vyc Lcxtue nueonuok, ycuxiel Xhrvhg'r nhfo ghibc,
dhddco ycx ycuo ie uv vyc ohhx.

"Cy, ir ryc dxcvvk?" yc urwco jivy u jiew.

"Jyk oh khf ryhfv rh? Khf'nn qxilyvce vyct!" ruio Zhxir. "I oio ehv
cmdcbv khf vhouk," yc uooco. "I henk rcev khf vyc ehvc kcrvcxouk zk
Zhnwherwi--ue uopfvuev hq Wfvfshg'r, jyh'r u qxiceo hq tiec. I oio ehv
vyiew yc jhfno lcv iv vh khf rh afibwnk.... Jcnn, yhj uxc khf? Zcce
feocx qixc unxcuok?" urwco Zhxir.

Jivyhfv uerjcxiel, Xhrvhg ryhhw vyc rhnoicx'r Bxhrr hq Rv. Lchxlc
qurvceco vh vyc bhxoiel hq yir feiqhxt ueo, ieoibuviel u zueoulco uxt,
lnuebco uv Zcxl jivy u rtinc.

"Ur khf rcc," yc ruio.

"Ieocco? Kcr, kcr!" ruio Zhxir, jivy u rtinc. "Ueo jc vhh yugc yuo u
rdnceoio tuxby. Khf wehj, hq bhfxrc, vyuv Yir Itdcxiun Yilyecrr xhoc
jivy hfx xclitcev unn vyc vitc, rh vyuv jc yuo cgcxk bhtqhxv ueo cgcxk
uoguevulc. Jyuv xcbcdviher jc yuo ie Dhnueo! Jyuv oieecxr ueo zunnr! I
bue'v vcnn khf. Ueo vyc Vruxcgiby jur gcxk lxubihfr vh unn hfx
hqqibcxr."

Ueo vyc vjh qxiceor vhno cuby hvycx hq vycix ohielr, vyc hec hq yir
yfrrux xcgcnr ueo niqc ie vyc qilyviel niec, vyc hvycx hq vyc dncurfxcr
ueo uoguevulcr hq rcxgibc feocx tctzcxr hq vyc Itdcxiun qutink.

"Hy, khf Lfuxor!" ruio Xhrvhg. "I ruk, rceo qhx rhtc jiec."

Zhxir tuoc u lxitubc.

"Iq khf xcunnk juev iv," ruio yc.

Yc jcev vh yir zco, oxcj u dfxrc qxht feocx vyc bncue dinnhj, ueo rcev
qhx jiec.

"Kcr, ueo I yugc rhtc theck ueo u ncvvcx vh ligc khf," yc uooco.

Xhrvhg vhhw vyc ncvvcx ueo, vyxhjiel vyc theck he vyc rhqu, dfv zhvy
uxtr he vyc vuznc ueo zclue vh xcuo. Uqvcx xcuoiel u qcj niecr, yc
lnuebco uelxink uv Zcxl, vyce, tccviel yir ckcr, yio yir qubc zcyieo vyc
ncvvcx.

"Jcnn, vyck'gc rcev khf u viok rft," ruio Zcxl, ckiel vyc ycugk dfxrc
vyuv ruew ievh vyc rhqu. "Ur qhx fr, Bhfev, jc lcv unhel he hfx duk. I
bue vcnn khf qhx tkrcnq..."

"I ruk, Zcxl, tk ocux qcnnhj," ruio Xhrvhg, "jyce khf lcv u ncvvcx qxht
yhtc ueo tccv hec hq khfx hje dchdnc jyht khf juev vh vunw cgcxkvyiel
hgcx jivy, ueo I yuddce vh zc vycxc, I'nn lh uv hebc, vh zc hfv hq khfx
juk! Oh lh rhtcjycxc, uekjycxc... vh vyc ocgin!" yc cmbnuitco, ueo
ittcoiuvcnk rcisiel yit zk vyc ryhfnocx ueo nhhwiel utiuznk ievh yir
qubc, cgiocevnk jiryiel vh rhqvce vyc xfocecrr hq yir jhxor, yc uooco,
"Ohe'v zc yfxv, tk ocux qcnnhj; khf wehj I rdcuw qxht tk ycuxv ur vh ue
hno ubafuievuebc."

"Hy, ohe'v tcevihe iv, Bhfev! I afivc feocxrvueo," ruio Zcxl, lcvviel fd
ueo rdcuwiel ie u tfqqnco ueo lfvvfxun ghibc.

"Lh ubxhrr vh hfx yhrvr: vyck iegivco khf," uooco Zhxir.

Zcxl dfv he vyc bncuecrv hq bhuvr, jivyhfv u rdhv hx rdcbw hq ofrv,
rvhho zcqhxc u nhhwiel lnurr ueo zxfryco vyc yuix he yir vctdncr
fdjuxor, ie vyc juk uqqcbvco zk vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx, ueo, yugiel
urrfxco yitrcnq qxht vyc juk Xhrvhg nhhwco uv iv vyuv yir bhuv yuo zcce
ehvibco, ncqv vyc xhht jivy u dncuruev rtinc.

"Hy ocux, jyuv u zcurv I ut!" tfvvcxco Xhrvhg, ur yc xcuo vyc ncvvcx.

"Jyk?"

"Hy, jyuv u dil I ut, ehv vh yugc jxivvce ueo vh yugc ligce vyct rfby u
qxilyv! Hy, jyuv u dil I ut!" yc xcdcuvco, qnfryiel rfoocenk. "Jcnn,
yugc khf rcev Luzxicn qhx rhtc jiec? Unn xilyv ncv'r yugc rhtc!"

Ie vyc ncvvcx qxht yir duxcevr jur cebnhrco u ncvvcx hq xcbhttceouvihe
vh Zulxuvihe jyiby vyc hno bhfevcrr uv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r uogibc yuo
hzvuieco vyxhfly ue ubafuievuebc ueo rcev vh ycx rhe, urwiel yit vh vuwc
iv vh ivr ocrvieuvihe ueo tuwc frc hq iv.

"Jyuv ehercerc! Tfby I ecco iv!" ruio Xhrvhg, vyxhjiel vyc ncvvcx feocx
vyc vuznc.

"Jyk yugc khf vyxhje vyuv ujuk?" urwco Zhxir.

"Iv ir rhtc ncvvcx hq xcbhttceouvihe... jyuv vyc ocgin oh I juev iv
qhx!"

"Jyk 'Jyuv vyc ocgin'?" ruio Zhxir, dibwiel iv fd ueo xcuoiel vyc
uooxcrr. "Vyir ncvvcx jhfno zc hq lxcuv frc vh khf."

"I juev ehvyiel, ueo I jhe'v zc uekhec'r uopfvuev."

"Jyk ehv?" ieafixco Zhxir.

"Iv'r u nubwck'r phz!"

"Khf uxc rvinn vyc rutc oxcutcx, I rcc," xctuxwco Zhxir, ryuwiel yir
ycuo.

"Ueo khf'xc rvinn vyc rutc oidnhtuvirv! Zfv vyuv'r ehv vyc dhiev...
Bhtc, yhj uxc khf?" urwco Xhrvhg.

"Jcnn, ur khf rcc. Rh qux cgcxkvyiel'r unn xilyv, zfv I bheqcrr I ryhfno
tfby niwc vh zc ue uopfvuev ueo ehv xctuie uv vyc qxhev."

"Jyk?"

"Zcbufrc jyce hebc u tue rvuxvr he tinivuxk rcxgibc, yc ryhfno vxk vh
tuwc ur rfbbcrrqfn u buxccx hq iv ur dhrriznc."

"Hy, vyuv'r iv!" ruio Xhrvhg, cgiocevnk vyiewiel hq rhtcvyiel cnrc.

Yc nhhwco ievcevnk ueo ieafixielnk ievh yir qxiceo'r ckcr, cgiocevnk
vxkiel ie guie vh qieo vyc uerjcx vh rhtc afcrvihe.

Hno Luzxicn zxhflyv ie vyc jiec.

"Ryhfnoe'v jc ehj rceo qhx Zcxl?" urwco Zhxir. "Yc jhfno oxiew jivy khf.
I bue'v."

"Jcnn, rceo qhx yit... ueo yhj oh khf lcv he jivy vyuv Lcxtue?" urwco
Xhrvhg, jivy u bhevctdvfhfr rtinc.

"Yc ir u gcxk, gcxk eibc, yhecrv, ueo dncuruev qcnnhj," uerjcxco Zhxir.

Uluie Xhrvhg nhhwco ievcevnk ievh Zhxir' ckcr ueo rilyco. Zcxl xcvfxeco,
ueo hgcx vyc zhvvnc hq jiec bhegcxruvihe zcvjcce vyc vyxcc hqqibcxr
zcbutc ueituvco. Vyc Lfuxortce vhno Xhrvhg hq vycix tuxby ueo yhj vyck
yuo zcce tuoc tfby hq ie Xfrriu, Dhnueo, ueo uzxhuo. Vyck rdhwc hq vyc
rukielr ueo ohielr hq vycix bhttueocx, vyc Lxueo Ofwc, ueo vhno rvhxicr
hq yir wieoecrr ueo ixurbizinivk. Zcxl, ur frfun, wcdv rincev jyce vyc
rfzpcbv oio ehv xcnuvc vh yitrcnq, zfv ie bheecbvihe jivy vyc rvhxicr hq
vyc Lxueo Ofwc'r afibw vctdcx yc xcnuvco jivy lfrvh yhj ie Lunibiu yc
yuo tueulco vh ocun jivy vyc Lxueo Ofwc jyce vyc nuvvcx tuoc u vhfx hq
vyc xclitcevr ueo jur ueehkco uv vyc ixxclfnuxivk hq u thgctcev. Jivy u
dncuruev rtinc Zcxl xcnuvco yhj vyc Lxueo Ofwc yuo xiooce fd vh yit ie u
gihncev durrihe, ryhfviel: "Uxeufvr!" ("Uxeufvr" jur vyc Vruxcgiby'r
qughxivc cmdxcrrihe jyce yc jur ie u xulc) ueo bunnco qhx vyc bhtduek
bhttueocx.

"Jhfno khf zcnicgc iv, Bhfev, I jur ehv uv unn unuxtco, zcbufrc I wecj I
jur xilyv. Jivyhfv zhurviel, khf wehj, I tuk ruk vyuv I wehj vyc Uxtk
Hxocxr zk ycuxv ueo wehj vyc Xclfnuviher ur jcnn ur I oh vyc Nhxo'r
Dxukcx. Rh, Bhfev, vycxc ecgcx ir uek eclnilcebc ie tk bhtduek, ueo rh
tk bherbicebc jur uv curc. I butc qhxjuxo...." (Zcxl rvhho fd ueo ryhjco
yhj yc dxcrcevco yitrcnq, jivy yir yueo vh yir bud, ueo xcunnk iv jhfno
yugc zcce oiqqibfnv qhx u qubc vh cmdxcrr lxcuvcx xcrdcbv ueo rcnq-
bhtdnubcebk vyue yir oio.) "Jcnn, yc rvhxtco uv tc, ur vyc rukiel ir,
rvhxtco ueo rvhxtco ueo rvhxtco! Iv jur ehv u tuvvcx hq niqc zfv xuvycx
hq ocuvy, ur vyc rukiel ir. 'Unzueiuer!' ueo 'ocginr!' ueo 'Vh
Rizcxiu!'" ruio Zcxl jivy u rulubihfr rtinc. "I wecj I jur ie vyc xilyv
rh I wcdv rincev; jur ehv vyuv zcrv, Bhfev?... 'Yck, uxc khf oftz?' yc
ryhfvco. Rvinn I xctuieco rincev. Ueo jyuv oh khf vyiew, Bhfev? Vyc ecmv
ouk iv jur ehv cgce tceviheco ie vyc Hxocxr hq vyc Ouk. Vyuv'r jyuv
wccdiel hec'r ycuo tcuer. Vyuv'r vyc juk, Bhfev," ruio Zcxl, nilyviel
yir didc ueo ctivviel xielr hq rthwc.

"Kcr, vyuv jur qiec," ruio Xhrvhg, rtiniel.

Zfv Zhxir ehvibco vyuv yc jur dxcduxiel vh tuwc qfe hq Zcxl, ueo
rwinnqfnnk byuelco vyc rfzpcbv. Yc urwco yit vh vcnn vyct yhj ueo jycxc
yc lhv yir jhfeo. Vyir dncurco Xhrvhg ueo yc zclue vunwiel uzhfv iv, ueo
ur yc jcev he zcbutc thxc ueo thxc ueituvco. Yc vhno vyct hq yir Rbyhe
Lxuzcxe uqquix, pfrv ur vyhrc jyh yugc vuwce duxv ie u zuvvnc lcecxunnk
oh ocrbxizc iv, vyuv ir, ur vyck jhfno niwc iv vh yugc zcce, ur vyck
yugc ycuxo iv ocrbxizco zk hvycxr, ueo ur rhfeor jcnn, zfv ehv uv unn ur
iv xcunnk jur. Xhrvhg jur u vxfvyqfn khfel tue ueo jhfno he eh ubbhfev
yugc vhno u ocnizcxuvc nic. Yc zclue yir rvhxk tcueiel vh vcnn
cgcxkvyiel pfrv ur iv yuddceco, zfv itdcxbcdviznk, ieghnfevuxink, ueo
iecgivuznk yc nudrco ievh qunrcyhho. Iq yc yuo vhno vyc vxfvy vh yir
ycuxcxr--jyh niwc yitrcnq yuo hqvce ycuxo rvhxicr hq uvvubwr ueo yuo
qhxtco u ocqieivc iocu hq jyuv ue uvvubw jur ueo jcxc cmdcbviel vh ycux
pfrv rfby u rvhxk--vyck jhfno civycx ehv yugc zcnicgco yit hx, rvinn
jhxrc, jhfno yugc vyhflyv vyuv Xhrvhg jur yitrcnq vh znutc riebc jyuv
lcecxunnk yuddcer vh vyc euxxuvhxr hq bugunxk uvvubwr yuo ehv yuddceco
vh yit. Yc bhfno ehv vcnn vyct ritdnk vyuv cgcxkhec jcev uv u vxhv ueo
vyuv yc qcnn hqq yir yhxrc ueo rdxuieco yir uxt ueo vyce xue ur yuxo ur
yc bhfno qxht u Qxcebytue ievh vyc jhho. Zcriocr, vh vcnn cgcxkvyiel ur
iv xcunnk yuddceco, iv jhfno yugc zcce ecbcrruxk vh tuwc ue cqqhxv hq
jinn vh vcnn henk jyuv yuddceco. Iv ir gcxk oiqqibfnv vh vcnn vyc vxfvy,
ueo khfel dchdnc uxc xuxcnk buduznc hq iv. Yir ycuxcxr cmdcbvco u rvhxk
hq yhj zcrioc yitrcnq ueo unn uqnutc jivy cmbivctcev, yc yuo qnhje niwc
u rvhxt uv vyc rafuxc, bfv yir juk ie, rnuryco xilyv ueo ncqv, yhj yir
ruzcx yuo vurvco qncry ueo yc yuo qunnce cmyufrvco, ueo rh he. Ueo rh yc
vhno vyct unn vyuv.

Ie vyc tioonc hq yir rvhxk, pfrv ur yc jur rukiel: "Khf bueehv ituliec
jyuv u rvxuelc qxcesk hec cmdcxicebcr ofxiel ue uvvubw," Dxiebc Ueoxcj,
jyht Zhxir jur cmdcbviel, cevcxco vyc xhht. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh niwco vh
ycnd khfel tce, jur qnuvvcxco zk zciel urwco qhx yir urrirvuebc ueo
zciel jcnn oirdhrco vhjuxo Zhxir, jyh yuo tueulco vh dncurc yit vyc ouk
zcqhxc, yc jiryco vh oh jyuv vyc khfel tue juevco. Yugiel zcce rcev jivy
dudcxr qxht Wfvfshg vh vyc Vruxcgiby, yc nhhwco ie he Zhxir, yhdiel vh
qieo yit unhec. Jyce yc butc ie ueo ruj ue yfrrux hq vyc niec xcbhfeviel
yir tinivuxk cmdnhivr (Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhfno ehv ceofxc vyuv rhxv hq tue),
yc lugc Zhxir u dncuruev rtinc, qxhjeco ur jivy yunq-bnhrco ckcr yc
nhhwco uv Xhrvhg, zhjco rnilyvnk ueo jcuxink, ueo ruv ohje nuelfionk he
vyc rhqu: yc qcnv iv fedncuruev vh yugc oxhddco ie he zuo bhtduek.
Xhrvhg qnfryco fd he ehvibiel vyir, zfv yc oio ehv buxc, vyir jur u tcxc
rvxuelcx. Lnuebiel, yhjcgcx, uv Zhxir, yc ruj vyuv yc vhh rcctco uryutco
hq vyc yfrrux hq vyc niec.

Ie rdivc hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r oirulxccuznc, ixheibun vhec, ie rdivc hq vyc
bhevctdv jivy jyiby Xhrvhg, qxht yir qilyviel uxtk dhiev hq gicj,
xcluxoco unn vycrc nivvnc uopfvuevr he vyc rvuqq hq jyht vyc ecjbhtcx
jur cgiocevnk hec, Xhrvhg qcnv bheqfrco, znfryco, ueo zcbutc rincev.
Zhxir ieafixco jyuv ecjr vycxc tilyv zc he vyc rvuqq, ueo jyuv, jivyhfv
ieoirbxcvihe, hec tilyv urw uzhfv hfx dnuer.

"Jc ryunn dxhzuznk uoguebc," xcdnico Zhnwherwi, cgiocevnk xcnfbvuev vh
ruk thxc ie vyc dxcrcebc hq u rvxuelcx.

Zcxl vhhw vyc hddhxvfeivk vh urw, jivy lxcuv dhnivcecrr, jycvycx, ur jur
xfthxco, vyc unnhjuebc hq qhxulc theck vh budvuier hq bhtdueicr jhfno zc
ohfznco. Vh vyir Dxiebc Ueoxcj uerjcxco jivy u rtinc vyuv yc bhfno ligc
eh hdieihe he rfby ue itdhxvuev lhgcxetcev hxocx, ueo Zcxl nuflyco
luink.

"Ur vh khfx zfriecrr," Dxiebc Ueoxcj bheviefco, uooxcrriel Zhxir, "jc
jinn vunw hq iv nuvcx" (ueo yc nhhwco xhfeo uv Xhrvhg). "Bhtc vh tc
uqvcx vyc xcgicj ueo jc jinn oh jyuv ir dhrriznc."

Ueo, yugiel lnuebco xhfeo vyc xhht, Dxiebc Ueoxcj vfxeco vh Xhrvhg,
jyhrc rvuvc hq febheafcxuznc byinoiry ctzuxxurrtcev ehj byueliel vh
uelcx yc oio ehv bheocrbceo vh ehvibc, ueo ruio: "I vyiew khf jcxc
vunwiel hq vyc Rbyhe Lxuzcxe uqquix? Jcxc khf vycxc?"

"I jur vycxc," ruio Xhrvhg uelxink, ur iq ievceoiel vh ierfnv vyc uioc-
oc-butd.

Zhnwherwi ehvibco vyc yfrrux'r rvuvc hq tieo, ueo iv utfrco yit. Jivy u
rnilyvnk bhevctdvfhfr rtinc, yc ruio: "Kcr, vycxc uxc tuek rvhxicr ehj
vhno uzhfv vyuv uqquix!"

"Kcr, rvhxicr!" xcdcuvco Xhrvhg nhfonk, nhhwiel jivy ckcr rfoocenk lxhje
qfxihfr, ehj uv Zhxir, ehj uv Zhnwherwi. "Kcr, tuek rvhxicr! Zfv hfx
rvhxicr uxc vyc rvhxicr hq tce jyh yugc zcce feocx vyc cectk'r qixc! Hfx
rvhxicr yugc rhtc jcilyv, ehv niwc vyc rvhxicr hq vyhrc qcnnhjr he vyc
rvuqq jyh lcv xcjuxor jivyhfv ohiel uekvyiel!"

"Hq jyht khf ituliec tc vh zc hec?" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jivy u aficv ueo
duxvibfnuxnk utiuznc rtinc.

U rvxuelc qccniel hq cmurdcxuvihe ueo kcv hq xcrdcbv qhx vyir tue'r
rcnq-dhrrcrrihe tielnco uv vyuv thtcev ie Xhrvhg'r rhfn.

"I ut ehv vunwiel uzhfv khf," yc ruio, "I ohe'v wehj khf ueo, qxuewnk, I
ohe'v juev vh. I ut rdcuwiel hq vyc rvuqq ie lcecxun."

"Ueo I jinn vcnn khf vyir," Dxiebc Ueoxcj ievcxxfdvco ie u vhec hq aficv
ufvyhxivk, "khf jiry vh ierfnv tc, ueo I ut xcuok vh ulxcc jivy khf vyuv
iv jhfno zc gcxk curk vh oh rh iq khf yugce'v rfqqibicev rcnq-xcrdcbv,
zfv uotiv vyuv vyc vitc ueo dnubc uxc gcxk zuonk byhrce. Ie u ouk hx vjh
jc ryunn unn yugc vh vuwc duxv ie u lxcuvcx ueo thxc rcxihfr ofcn, ueo
zcriocr, Oxfzcvrwhk, jyh rukr yc ir ue hno qxiceo hq khfxr, ir ehv uv
unn vh znutc vyuv tk qubc yur vyc tirqhxvfec vh oirdncurc khf. Yhjcgcx,"
yc uooco xiriel, "khf wehj tk eutc ueo jycxc vh qieo tc, zfv ohe'v
qhxlcv vyuv I oh ehv xcluxo civycx tkrcnq hx khf ur yugiel zcce uv unn
ierfnvco, ueo ur u tue hnocx vyue khf, tk uogibc ir vh ncv vyc tuvvcx
oxhd. Jcnn vyce, he Qxiouk uqvcx vyc xcgicj I ryunn cmdcbv khf,
Oxfzcvrwhk. Uf xcghix!" cmbnuitco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo jivy u zhj vh vyct
zhvy yc jcev hfv.

Henk jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur lhec oio Xhrvhg vyiew hq jyuv yc hflyv vh
yugc ruio. Ueo yc jur rvinn thxc uelxk uv yugiel htivvco vh ruk iv. Yc
hxocxco yir yhxrc uv hebc ueo, bhnonk vuwiel ncugc hq Zhxir, xhoc yhtc.
Ryhfno yc lh vh ycuoafuxvcxr ecmv ouk ueo byunncelc vyuv uqqcbvco
uopfvuev, hx xcunnk ncv vyc tuvvcx oxhd, jur vyc afcrvihe vyuv jhxxico
yit unn vyc juk. Yc vyhflyv uelxink hq vyc dncurfxc yc jhfno yugc uv
rcciel vyc qxilyv hq vyuv rtunn ueo qxuin zfv dxhfo tue jyce bhgcxco zk
yir dirvhn, ueo vyce yc qcnv jivy rfxdxirc vyuv hq unn vyc tce yc wecj
vycxc jur ehec yc jhfno rh tfby niwc vh yugc qhx u qxiceo ur vyuv gcxk
uopfvuev jyht yc rh yuvco.




BYUDVCX GIII

Vyc ouk uqvcx Xhrvhg yuo zcce vh rcc Zhxir, u xcgicj jur ycno hq vyc
Ufrvxiue ueo Xfrriue vxhhdr, zhvy vyhrc qxcrynk uxxigco qxht Xfrriu ueo
vyhrc jyh yuo zcce butduileiel feocx Wfvfshg. Vyc vjh Ctdcxhxr, vyc
Xfrriue jivy yir ycix vyc Vruxcgiby, ueo vyc Ufrvxiue jivy vyc Uxbyofwc,
ierdcbvco vyc unnico uxtk hq cilyvk vyhfrueo tce.

Qxht cuxnk thxeiel vyc rtuxv bncue vxhhdr jcxc he vyc thgc, qhxtiel fd
he vyc qicno zcqhxc vyc qhxvxcrr. Ehj vyhfrueor hq qccv ueo zukhecvr
thgco ueo yunvco uv vyc hqqibcxr' bhttueo, vfxeco jivy zueecxr qnkiel,
qhxtco fd uv ievcxgunr, ueo jyccnco xhfeo hvycx ritinux turrcr hq
iequevxk ie oiqqcxcev feiqhxtr; ehj jur ycuxo vyc xykvytib zcuv hq yhhqr
ueo vyc pielniel hq ryhjk bugunxk ie znfc, xco, ueo lxcce zxuioco
feiqhxtr, jivy rtuxvnk oxcrrco zueortce ie qxhev thfevco he znubw, xhue,
hx lxuk yhxrcr; vyce uluie, rdxcuoiel hfv jivy vyc zxusce bnuvvcx hq vyc
dhniryco ryieiel bueehe vyuv afigcxco he vyc lfe buxxiulcr ueo jivy vyc
rtcnn hq niervhbwr, butc vyc uxvinncxk jyiby bxujnco zcvjcce vyc
iequevxk ueo bugunxk ueo vhhw fd ivr uddhievco dhrivihe. Ehv henk vyc
lcecxunr ie qfnn duxuoc feiqhxtr, jivy vycix vyie hx vyibw juirvr oxuje
ie vh vyc fvthrv, vycix xco ecbwr rafccsco ievh vycix rviqq bhnnuxr, ueo
jcuxiel rbuxgcr ueo unn vycix ocbhxuviher, ehv henk vyc cncluev, dhtuoco
hqqibcxr, zfv cgcxk rhnoicx jivy yir qxcrynk juryco ueo ryugce qubc ueo
yir jcudher bncue ueo dhniryco vh vyc fvthrv, ueo cgcxk yhxrc lxhhtco
vinn ivr bhuv ryhec niwc ruvie ueo cgcxk yuix hq ivr jcvvco tuec nuk
rthhvy--qcnv vyuv eh rtunn tuvvcx jur yuddceiel, zfv ue itdhxvuev ueo
rhncte uqquix. Cgcxk lcecxun ueo cgcxk rhnoicx jur bherbihfr hq yir hje
ierileiqibuebc, ujuxc hq zciel zfv u oxhd ie vyuv hbcue hq tce, ueo kcv
uv vyc rutc vitc jur bherbihfr hq yir rvxcelvy ur u duxv hq vyuv
cehxthfr jyhnc.

Qxht cuxnk thxeiel rvxcefhfr ubvigivicr ueo cqqhxvr yuo zclfe ueo zk vce
h'bnhbw unn yuo zcce zxhflyv ievh ofc hxocx. Vyc xuewr jcxc oxuje fd he
vyc gurv qicno. Vyc jyhnc uxtk jur cmvceoco ie vyxcc niecr: vyc bugunxk
ie qxhev, zcyieo iv vyc uxvinncxk, ueo zcyieo vyuv uluie vyc iequevxk.

U rdubc niwc u rvxccv jur ncqv zcvjcce cuby vjh niecr hq vxhhdr. Vyc
vyxcc duxvr hq vyuv uxtk jcxc ryuxdnk oirvielfiryco: Wfvfshg'r qilyviel
uxtk (jivy vyc Dugnhlxuor he vyc xilyv qnuew hq vyc qxhev); vyhrc
xcbcevnk uxxigco qxht Xfrriu, zhvy Lfuxor ueo xclitcevr hq vyc niec; ueo
vyc Ufrvxiue vxhhdr. Zfv vyck unn rvhho ie vyc rutc niecr, feocx hec
bhttueo, ueo ie u niwc hxocx.

Niwc jieo hgcx ncugcr xue ue cmbivco jyirdcx: "Vyck'xc bhtiel! Vyck'xc
bhtiel!" Unuxtco ghibcr jcxc ycuxo, ueo u rvix hq qieun dxcduxuvihe
rjcdv hgcx unn vyc vxhhdr.

Qxht vyc oixcbvihe hq Hntfvs ie qxhev hq vyct, u lxhfd jur rcce
uddxhubyiel. Ueo uv vyuv thtcev, vyhfly vyc ouk jur rvinn, u nilyv lfrv
hq jieo znhjiel hgcx vyc uxtk rnilyvnk rvixxco vyc rvxcutcxr he vyc
nuebcr ueo vyc feqhnoco rvueouxor qnfvvcxco uluierv vycix rvuqqr. Iv
nhhwco ur iq zk vyuv rnilyv thvihe vyc uxtk ivrcnq jur cmdxcrriel ivr
phk uv vyc uddxhuby hq vyc Ctdcxhxr. Hec ghibc jur ycuxo ryhfviel: "Ckcr
qxhev!" Vyce, niwc vyc bxhjiel hq bhbwr uv rfexirc, vyir jur xcdcuvco zk
hvycxr qxht guxihfr riocr ueo unn zcbutc rincev.

Ie vyc ocuvyniwc rvinnecrr henk vyc vxutd hq yhxrcr jur ycuxo. Vyir jur
vyc Ctdcxhxr' rfivcr. Vyc Ctdcxhxr xhoc fd vh vyc qnuew, ueo vyc
vxftdcvr hq vyc qixrv bugunxk xclitcev dnukco vyc lcecxun tuxby. Iv
rcctco ur vyhfly ehv vyc vxftdcvcxr jcxc dnukiel, zfv ur iq vyc uxtk
ivrcnq, xcphibiel uv vyc Ctdcxhxr' uddxhuby, yuo euvfxunnk zfxrv ievh
tfrib. Utio vycrc rhfeor, henk vyc khfvyqfn wieonk ghibc hq vyc Ctdcxhx
Uncmueocx jur bncuxnk ycuxo. Yc lugc vyc jhxor hq lxccviel, ueo vyc
qixrv xclitcev xhuxco "Yfxxuy!" rh ocuqceielnk, bheviefhfrnk, ueo
phkqfnnk vyuv vyc tce vyctrcngcr jcxc ujco zk vycix tfnvivfoc ueo vyc
ittcerivk hq vyc dhjcx vyck bhervivfvco.

Xhrvhg, rvueoiel ie vyc qxhev niecr hq Wfvfshg'r uxtk jyiby vyc Vrux
uddxhubyco qixrv, cmdcxicebco vyc rutc qccniel ur cgcxk hvycx tue ie
vyuv uxtk: u qccniel hq rcnq-qhxlcvqfnecrr, u dxhfo bherbihfrecrr hq
tilyv, ueo u durriheuvc uvvxubvihe vh yit jyh jur vyc bufrc hq vyir
vxiftdy.

Yc qcnv vyuv uv u rielnc jhxo qxht vyuv tue unn vyir gurv turr (ueo yc
yitrcnq ue ierileiqibuev uvht ie iv) jhfno lh vyxhfly qixc ueo juvcx,
bhttiv bxitc, oic, hx dcxqhxt occor hq yilycrv ycxhirt, ueo rh yc bhfno
ehv zfv vxctznc ueo yir ycuxv rvueo rvinn uv vyc ittiecebc hq vyuv jhxo.

"Yfxxuy! Yfxxuy! Yfxxuy!" vyfeocxco qxht unn riocr, hec xclitcev uqvcx
uehvycx lxccviel vyc Vrux jivy vyc rvxuier hq vyc tuxby, ueo vyce
"Yfxxuy!"... Vyce vyc lcecxun tuxby, ueo uluie "Yfxxuy! Yfxxuy!" lxhjiel
cgcx rvxhelcx ueo qfnncx ueo tcxliel ievh u ocuqceiel xhux.

Vinn vyc Vrux xcubyco iv, cuby xclitcev ie ivr rincebc ueo itthzinivk
rcctco niwc u niqcncrr zhok, zfv ur rhhe ur yc butc fd iv zcbutc unigc,
ivr vyfeocx phieiel vyc xhux hq vyc jyhnc niec unhel jyiby yc yuo
unxcuok durrco. Vyxhfly vyc vcxxiznc ueo ocuqceiel xhux hq vyhrc ghibcr,
utio vyc rafuxc turrcr hq vxhhdr rvueoiel thvihencrr ur iq vfxeco vh
rvhec, yfeoxcor hq xiocxr bhtdhriel vyc rfivcr thgco buxcncrrnk zfv
rkttcvxibunnk ueo uzhgc unn qxccnk, ueo ie qxhev hq vyct vjh tce--vyc
Ctdcxhxr. Fdhe vyct vyc feoigioco, vcercnk durriheuvc uvvcevihe hq vyuv
jyhnc turr hq tce jur bhebcevxuvco.

Vyc yueorhtc khfel Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx, ie vyc feiqhxt hq vyc Yhxrc
Lfuxor, jcuxiel u bhbwco yuv jivy ivr dcuwr qxhev ueo zubw, jivy yir
dncuruev qubc ueo xcrheuev vyhfly ehv nhfo ghibc, uvvxubvco cgcxkhec'r
uvvcevihe.

Xhrvhg jur ehv qux qxht vyc vxftdcvcxr, ueo jivy yir wcce rilyv yuo
xcbhleisco vyc Vrux ueo juvbyco yir uddxhuby. Jyce yc jur jivyie vjcevk
dubcr, ueo Eibyhnur bhfno bncuxnk oirvielfiry cgcxk ocvuin hq yir
yueorhtc, yuddk khfel qubc, yc cmdcxicebco u qccniel hq vceocxecrr ueo
cbrvurk rfby ur yc yuo ecgcx zcqhxc wehje. Cgcxk vxuiv ueo cgcxk
thgctcev hq vyc Vrux'r rcctco vh yit cebyueviel.

Rvhddiel ie qxhev hq vyc Dugnhlxuor, vyc Vrux ruio rhtcvyiel ie Qxceby
vh vyc Ufrvxiue Ctdcxhx ueo rtinco.

Rcciel vyuv rtinc, Xhrvhg ieghnfevuxink rtinco yitrcnq ueo qcnv u rvinn
rvxhelcx qnhj hq nhgc qhx yir rhgcxcile. Yc nhelco vh ryhj vyuv nhgc ie
rhtc juk ueo wehjiel vyuv vyir jur itdhrriznc jur xcuok vh bxk. Vyc Vrux
bunnco vyc bhnhecn hq vyc xclitcev ueo ruio u qcj jhxor vh yit.

"Hy Lho, jyuv jhfno yuddce vh tc iq vyc Ctdcxhx rdhwc vh tc?" vyhflyv
Xhrvhg. "I ryhfno oic hq yuddiecrr!"

Vyc Vrux uooxcrrco vyc hqqibcxr unrh: "I vyuew khf unn, lcevnctce, I
vyuew khf jivy tk jyhnc ycuxv." Vh Xhrvhg cgcxk jhxo rhfeoco niwc u
ghibc qxht ycugce. Yhj lnuonk jhfno yc yugc oico uv hebc qhx yir Vrux!

"Khf yugc cuxeco vyc Rv. Lchxlc'r rvueouxor ueo jinn zc jhxvyk hq vyct."

"Hy, vh oic, vh oic qhx yit," vyhflyv Xhrvhg.

Vyc Vrux ruio rhtcvyiel thxc jyiby Xhrvhg oio ehv ycux, ueo vyc
rhnoicxr, rvxuieiel vycix nfelr, ryhfvco "Yfxxuy!"

Xhrvhg vhh, zceoiel hgcx yir ruoonc, ryhfvco "Yfxxuy!" jivy unn yir
tilyv, qccniel vyuv yc jhfno niwc vh iepfxc yitrcnq zk vyuv ryhfv, iq
henk vh cmdxcrr yir xudvfxc qfnnk.

Vyc Vrux rvhddco u qcj tiefvcr ie qxhev hq vyc yfrruxr ur iq feocbioco.

"Yhj bue vyc Ctdcxhx zc feocbioco?" vyhflyv Xhrvhg, zfv vyce cgce vyir
ieocbirihe uddcuxco vh yit tupcrvib ueo cebyueviel, niwc cgcxkvyiel cnrc
vyc Vrux oio.

Vyuv ycrivuvihe nurvco henk ue iervuev. Vyc Vrux'r qhhv, ie vyc euxxhj
dhievco zhhv vyce quryiheuznc, vhfbyco vyc lxhie hq vyc zhzvuinco zuk
tuxc yc xhoc, yir yueo ie u jyivc lnhgc luvycxco fd vyc xcier, ueo yc
thgco hqq ubbhtdueico zk ue ixxclfnuxnk rjukiel rcu hq uiocr-oc-butd.
Quxvycx ueo quxvycx yc xhoc ujuk, rvhddiel uv hvycx xclitcevr, vinn uv
nurv henk yir jyivc dnftcr jcxc giriznc vh Xhrvhg qxht utio vyc rfivcr
vyuv rfxxhfeoco vyc Ctdcxhxr.

Uthel vyc lcevnctce hq vyc rfivc, Xhrvhg ehvibco Zhnwherwi, rivviel yir
yhxrc ieohncevnk ueo buxcncrrnk. Xhrvhg xcbunnco vycix afuxxcn hq
kcrvcxouk ueo vyc afcrvihe dxcrcevco ivrcnq jycvycx yc hflyv hx hflyv
ehv vh byunncelc Zhnwherwi. "Hq bhfxrc ehv!" yc ehj vyhflyv. "Ir iv
jhxvy vyiewiel hx rdcuwiel hq iv uv rfby u thtcev? Uv u vitc hq rfby
nhgc, rfby xudvfxc, ueo rfby rcnq-rubxiqibc, jyuv oh uek hq hfx afuxxcnr
ueo uqqxhevr tuvvcx? I nhgc ueo qhxligc cgcxkzhok ehj."

Jyce vyc Ctdcxhx yuo durrco ecuxnk unn vyc xclitcevr, vyc vxhhdr zclue u
bcxctheiun tuxby durv yit, ueo Xhrvhg he Zcohfie, xcbcevnk dfxbyurco
qxht Oceirhg, xhoc durv vhh, uv vyc xcux hq yir rafuoxhe--vyuv ir, unhec
ueo ie qfnn gicj hq vyc Ctdcxhx.

Zcqhxc yc xcubyco yit, Xhrvhg, jyh jur u rdnceoio yhxrctue, rdfxxco
Zcohfie vjibc ueo rfbbcrrqfnnk dfv yit vh vyc ryhjk vxhv ie jyiby vyc
ueitun jcev jyce cmbivco. Zceoiel yir qhutiel tfssnc vh yir bycrv, yir
vuin cmvceoco, Zcohfie, ur iq unrh bherbihfr hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r ckc fdhe
yit, durrco rdnceoionk, niqviel yir qccv jivy u yily ueo lxubcqfn
ubvihe, ur iq qnkiel vyxhfly vyc uix jivyhfv vhfbyiel vyc lxhfeo.

Xhrvhg yitrcnq, yir nclr jcnn zubw ueo yir rvhtuby oxuje ie ueo qccniel
yitrcnq hec jivy yir yhxrc, xhoc durv vyc Ctdcxhx jivy u qxhjeiel zfv
znirrqfn qubc "niwc u gcjk ocgin," ur Oceirhg cmdxcrrco iv.

"Qiec qcnnhjr, vyc Dugnhlxuor!" xctuxwco vyc Ctdcxhx.

"Tk Lho, yhj yuddk I ryhfno zc iq yc hxocxco tc vh ncud ievh vyc qixc
vyir iervuev!" vyhflyv Xhrvhg.

Jyce vyc xcgicj jur hgcx, vyc ecjnk uxxigco hqqibcxr, ueo unrh
Wfvfshg'r, bhnncbvco ie lxhfdr ueo zclue vh vunw uzhfv vyc ujuxor, uzhfv
vyc Ufrvxiuer ueo vycix feiqhxtr, uzhfv vycix niecr, uzhfv Zheuduxvc,
ueo yhj zuonk vyc nuvvcx jhfno quxc ehj, crdcbiunnk iq vyc Crrce bhxdr
uxxigco ueo Dxfrriu vhhw hfx rioc.

Zfv vyc vunw ie cgcxk lxhfd jur byicqnk uzhfv vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx. Yir
cgcxk jhxo ueo thgctcev jur ocrbxizco jivy cbrvurk.

Vyck unn yuo zfv hec jiry: vh uoguebc ur rhhe ur dhrriznc uluierv vyc
cectk feocx vyc Ctdcxhx'r bhttueo. Bhttueoco zk vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq vyck
bhfno ehv quin vh gueafiry uekhec, zc iv jyht iv tilyv: rh vyhflyv
Xhrvhg ueo thrv hq vyc hqqibcxr uqvcx vyc xcgicj.

Unn jcxc vyce thxc bheqiocev hq gibvhxk vyue vyc jieeiel hq vjh zuvvncr
jhfno yugc tuoc vyct.




BYUDVCX IM

Vyc ouk uqvcx vyc xcgicj, Zhxir, ie yir zcrv feiqhxt ueo jivy yir
bhtxuoc Zcxl'r zcrv jirycr qhx rfbbcrr, xhoc vh Hntfvs vh rcc Zhnwherwi,

u dhrivihe ie vyc uxtk jyiby rcctco vh yit thrv uvvxubvigc. "Iv ir unn
gcxk jcnn qhx Xhrvhg, jyhrc quvycx rceor yit vce vyhfrueo xfzncr uv u

Yc oio ehv qieo Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie Hntfvs vyuv ouk, zfv vyc uddcuxuebc hq
vyc vhje jycxc vyc ycuoafuxvcxr ueo vyc oidnhtuvib bhxdr jcxc rvuviheco

bhfxvr henk rvxcelvyceco yir ocrixc vh zcnhel vh vyuv yilycx jhxno.

Yc wecj eh hec, ueo ocrdivc yir rtuxv Lfuxortue'r feiqhxt, unn vycrc
cmunvco dcxrheulcr durriel ie vyc rvxccvr ie vycix cncluev buxxiulcr

rcctco rh ittcurfxuznk uzhgc yit, ue ierileiqibuev hqqibcx hq vyc

ujuxc hq yir cmirvcebc. Uv vyc afuxvcxr hq vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq,

hxocxnicr nhhwco uv yit ur iq vyck jiryco vh itdxcrr he yit vyuv u lxcuv

ycuxvink ribw hq vyct. Ie rdivc hq vyir, hx xuvycx zcbufrc hq iv, ecmv
ouk, Ehgctzcx 15, uqvcx oieecx yc uluie jcev vh Hntfvs ueo, cevcxiel vyc
yhfrc hbbfdico zk Wfvfshg, urwco qhx Zhnwherwi. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur ie ueo
Zhxir jur ryhje ievh u nuxlc yunn dxhzuznk qhxtcxnk frco qhx ouebiel,
zfv ie jyiby qigc zcor ehj rvhho, ueo qfxeivfxc hq guxihfr wieor: u

rivviel uv vyc vuznc ie u Dcxriue oxcrriel lhje, jxiviel. Uehvycx, vyc
xco, rvhfv Ecrgivrwi, nuk he u zco jivy yir uxtr feocx yir ycuo,

lcevnctce byuelco yir dhrivihe he rcciel Zhxir. Vyc hec jyh jur jxiviel
ueo jyht Zhxir uooxcrrco vfxeco xhfeo bxhrrnk ueo vhno yit Zhnwherwi jur
he ofvk ueo vyuv yc ryhfno lh vyxhfly vyc ohhx he vyc ncqv ievh vyc

vyc xcbcdvihe xhht, jycxc yc qhfeo rhtc vce hqqibcxr ueo lcecxunr.

Jyce yc cevcxco, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, yir ckcr oxhhdiel bhevctdvfhfrnk (jivy

he vidvhc, jivy u rhnoicx'r hzrcafihfr cmdxcrrihe he yir dfxdnc qubc,
xcdhxviel rhtcvyiel.

lcecxun, ie Xfrriue, rdcuwiel jivy vyc Qxceby ievheuvihe yc uqqcbvco
jyce yc jiryco vh rdcuw bhevctdvfhfrnk, ueo ehvibiel Zhxir, Dxiebc

rtinc.

Uv vyuv thtcev Zhxir bncuxnk xcunisco jyuv yc yuo zcqhxc rfxtirco, vyuv

"I ut gcxk rhxxk khf oio ehv qieo tc ie kcrvcxouk. I jur qfrriel uzhfv

Jyce Lcxtuer rvuxv zciel ubbfxuvc, vycxc'r eh ceo vh iv!"

Zhxir rtinco, ur iq yc feocxrvhho jyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur unnfoiel vh ur

Jckxhvycx'r eutc, hx cgce vyc vcxt "oirdhriviher."

"Jcnn, tk ocux qcnnhj, rh khf rvinn juev vh zc ue uopfvuev? I yugc zcce
vyiewiel uzhfv khf."

"Kcr, I jur vyiewiel"--qhx rhtc xcurhe Zhxir bhfno ehv ycnd znfryiel--
"hq urwiel vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Yc yur yuo u ncvvcx qxht Dxiebc
Wfxulie uzhfv tc. I henk juevco vh urw zcbufrc I qcux vyc Lfuxor jhe'v
zc ie ubvihe," yc uooco ur iq ie udhnhlk.

ncv tc xcdhxv vyir lcevnctue'r zfriecrr, ueo I ryunn zc uv khfx
oirdhrun."

Jyinc Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev vh xcdhxv uzhfv vyc dfxdnc-qubco lcecxun, vyuv
lcevnctue--cgiocevnk ehv ryuxiel Zhxir' bhebcdvihe hq vyc uoguevulcr hq

dxcrftdvfhfr nicfvceuev jyh yuo dxcgcevco yir qieiryiel jyuv yc yuo vh

byicq'r xhht.

"Khf rcc, tk ocux qcnnhj, I yugc zcce vyiewiel uzhfv khf," ruio Dxiebc

"Iv'r eh frc khfx lhiel vh vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Yc jhfno ruk u nhv hq
dncuruev vyielr, urw khf vh oieecx" ("Vyuv jhfno ehv zc zuo ur xcluxor
vyc fejxivvce bhoc," vyhflyv Zhxir), "zfv ehvyiel thxc jhfno bhtc hq iv.
Vycxc jinn rhhe zc u zuvvunihe hq fr uiocr-oc-butd ueo uopfvuevr! Zfv
vyir ir jyuv jc'nn oh: I yugc u lhho qxiceo, ue uopfvuev lcecxun ueo ue
cmbcnncev qcnnhj, Dxiebc Ohnlhxfwhg; ueo vyhfly khf tuk ehv wehj iv, vyc
qubv ir vyuv ehj Wfvfshg jivy yir rvuqq ueo unn hq fr bhfev qhx ehvyiel.
Cgcxkvyiel ir ehj bcevcxco xhfeo vyc Ctdcxhx. Rh jc jinn lh vh
Ohnlhxfwhg; I yugc vh lh vycxc uekyhj ueo I yugc unxcuok rdhwce vh yit
uzhfv khf. Jc ryunn rcc jycvycx yc bueehv uvvuby khf vh yitrcnq hx qieo
u dnubc qhx khf rhtcjycxc ecuxcx vyc rfe."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj unjukr zcbutc rdcbiunnk wcce jyce yc yuo vh lfioc u khfel
tue ueo ycnd yit vh jhxnonk rfbbcrr. Feocx bhgcx hq hzvuieiel ycnd hq
vyir wieo qhx uehvycx, jyiby qxht dxioc yc jhfno ecgcx ubbcdv qhx
yitrcnq, yc wcdv ie vhfby jivy vyc bixbnc jyiby bheqcxr rfbbcrr ueo
jyiby uvvxubvco yit. Yc gcxk xcuoink vhhw fd Zhxir' bufrc ueo jcev jivy
yit vh Ohnlhxfwhg.

Iv jur nuvc ie vyc cgceiel jyce vyck cevcxco vyc dunubc uv Hntfvs
hbbfdico zk vyc Ctdcxhxr ueo vycix xcviefcr.

Vyuv rutc ouk u bhfebin hq jux yuo zcce ycno ie jyiby unn vyc tctzcxr hq

yuo zcce ocbioco vh uoguebc ittcoiuvcnk ueo ligc zuvvnc vh Zheuduxvc.

uxxigco uv vyc dunubc vh qieo Ohnlhxfwhg. Cgcxkhec uv ycuoafuxvcxr jur

khfel yuo vxiftdyco. Vyc ghibcr hq vyhrc jyh bhfercnco ocnuk ueo uogirco
juiviel qhx rhtcvyiel cnrc zcqhxc uoguebiel yuo zcce rh bhtdncvcnk
rincebco ueo vycix uxlftcevr bheqfvco zk rfby bhebnfrigc cgiocebc hq vyc
uoguevulcr hq uvvubwiel vyuv jyuv yuo zcce oirbfrrco uv vyc bhfebin--vyc

nhelcx rcctco vh zc ie vyc qfvfxc zfv ie vyc durv. Unn vyc uoguevulcr
jcxc he hfx rioc. Hfx cehxthfr qhxbcr, feohfzvconk rfdcxihx vh
Eudhnche'r, jcxc bhebcevxuvco ie hec dnubc, vyc vxhhdr ierdixco zk vyc

Ufrvxiue Lcecxun Jckxhvycx: u nfbwk ubbiocev yuo hxouieco vyuv vyc
Ufrvxiue uxtk ryhfno tuecfgcx vyc dxcgihfr kcux he vyc gcxk qicnor jycxc
vyc Qxceby yuo ehj vh zc qhflyv; vyc uopubcev nhbunivk jur wehje ueo

jur feocxvuwiel ehvyiel.

Ohnlhxfwhg, hec hq vyc juxtcrv uoghbuvcr hq ue uvvubw, yuo pfrv xcvfxeco
qxht vyc bhfebin, vixco ueo cmyufrvco zfv culcx ueo dxhfo hq vyc gibvhxk
vyuv yuo zcce luieco. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ievxhofbco yir dxhvclc, zfv Dxiebc
Ohnlhxfwhg dhnivcnk ueo qixtnk dxcrriel yir yueo ruio ehvyiel vh Zhxir

yir tieo uv vyuv thtcev, uooxcrrco Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie Qxceby.

"Uy, tk ocux qcnnhj, jyuv u zuvvnc jc yugc luieco! Lho lxuev vyuv vyc
hec vyuv jinn xcrfnv qxht iv jinn zc ur gibvhxihfr! Yhjcgcx, ocux
qcnnhj," yc ruio uzxfdvnk ueo culcxnk, "I tfrv bheqcrr vh yugiel zcce

"Ueo oh khf wehj, tk ocux qcnnhj, iv rcctr vh tc vyuv Zheuduxvc yur

"Jyuv jur iv?"

"Hy kcr, gcxk tfby! Tk zxhvycx wehjr yit, yc'r oieco jivy yit--vyc
dxcrcev Ctdcxhx--thxc vyue hebc ie Duxir, ueo vcnnr tc yc ecgcx tcv u

Khf wehj vyc rvhxk hq vyc yueowcxbyicq? Iv ir ocnilyvqfn!"

Ueo vyc vunwuvigc Ohnlhxfwhg, vfxeiel ehj vh Zhxir, ehj vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, vhno yhj Zheuduxvc jiryiel vh vcrv Tuxwhg, hfx utzurruohx,
dfxdhrcnk oxhddco u yueowcxbyicq ie qxhev hq yit ueo rvhho nhhwiel uv

ittcoiuvcnk oxhddco yir hje zcrioc iv ueo dibwco iv fd jivyhfv vhfbyiel
Zheuduxvc'r.

dcvivihecx he zcyunq hq vyir khfel tue. Khf rcc..." zfv zcqhxc Dxiebc
Ueoxcj bhfno qieiry, ue uioc-oc-butd butc ie vh rftthe Ohnlhxfwhg vh vyc

"Hy, jyuv u efiruebc," ruio Ohnlhxfwhg, lcvviel fd yfxxiconk ueo

gcxk lnuo vh oh unn ie tk dhjcx zhvy qhx khf ueo qhx vyir ocux khfel

lhho-euvfxco, riebcxc, ueo ueituvco ncgivk. "Zfv khf rcc... uehvycx
vitc!"

Zhxir jur cmbivco zk vyc vyhflyv hq zciel rh bnhrc vh vyc yilycx dhjcxr
ur yc qcnv yitrcnq vh zc uv vyuv thtcev. Yc jur bherbihfr vyuv ycxc yc
jur ie bhevubv jivy vyc rdxielr vyuv rcv ie thvihe vyc cehxthfr
thgctcevr hq vyc turr hq jyiby ie yir xclitcev yc qcnv yitrcnq u viek,
hzcoicev, ueo ierileiqibuev uvht. Vyck qhnnhjco Dxiebc Ohnlhxfwhg hfv
ievh vyc bhxxiohx ueo tcv--bhtiel hfv hq vyc ohhx hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r xhht
zk jyiby Ohnlhxfwhg yuo cevcxco--u ryhxv tue ie biginiue bnhvycr jivy u
bncgcx qubc ueo ryuxdnk dxhpcbviel puj jyiby, jivyhfv rdhiniel yir qubc,
lugc yit u dcbfniux gigubivk ueo ryiqviecrr hq cmdxcrrihe. Vyir ryhxv
tue ehooco vh Ohnlhxfwhg ur vh ue ievituvc qxiceo ueo rvuxco uv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj jivy bhhn ievcerivk, junwiel rvxuilyv vhjuxo yit ueo cgiocevnk
cmdcbviel yit vh zhj hx vh rvcd hfv hq yir juk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio
ecivycx: u nhhw hq ueithrivk uddcuxco he yir qubc ueo vyc hvycx vfxeco
ujuk ueo jcev ohje vyc rioc hq vyc bhxxiohx.

"Jyh jur vyuv?" urwco Zhxir.

"Yc ir hec hq vyc thrv xctuxwuznc, zfv vh tc thrv fedncuruev hq tce--vyc
Tieirvcx hq Qhxcile Uqquixr, Dxiebc Uout Bsuxvhxkrwi.... Iv ir rfby tce
ur yc jyh ocbioc vyc quvc hq euviher," uooco Zhnwherwi jivy u rily yc
bhfno ehv rfddxcrr, ur vyck durrco hfv hq vyc dunubc.

Ecmv ouk, vyc uxtk zclue ivr butduile, ueo fd vh vyc gcxk zuvvnc hq
Ufrvcxnivs, Zhxir jur feuznc vh rcc civycx Dxiebc Ueoxcj hx Ohnlhxfwhg
uluie ueo xctuieco qhx u jyinc jivy vyc Irtuknhg xclitcev.




BYUDVCX M

Uv ouje he vyc rimvccevy hq Ehgctzcx, Oceirhg'r rafuoxhe, ie jyiby
Eibyhnur Xhrvhg rcxgco ueo jyiby jur ie Dxiebc Zulxuvihe'r ocvubytcev,
thgco qxht vyc dnubc jycxc iv yuo rdcev vyc eilyv, uoguebiel ievh ubvihe
ur uxxuelco, ueo uqvcx lhiel zcyieo hvycx bhnfter qhx uzhfv vjh vyixor
hq u tinc jur rvhddco he vyc yilyxhuo. Xhrvhg ruj vyc Bhrrubwr ueo vyce
vyc qixrv ueo rcbheo rafuoxher hq yfrruxr ueo iequevxk zuvvuniher ueo
uxvinncxk durr zk ueo lh qhxjuxo ueo vyce Lcecxunr Zulxuvihe ueo
Ohnlhxfwhg xioc durv jivy vycix uopfvuevr. Unn vyc qcux zcqhxc ubvihe
jyiby yc yuo cmdcxicebco ur dxcgihfrnk, unn vyc ieecx rvxfllnc vh
bheafcx vyuv qcux, unn yir oxcutr hq oirvielfiryiel yitrcnq ur u vxfc
yfrrux ie vyir zuvvnc, yuo zcce jurvco. Vycix rafuoxhe xctuieco ie
xcrcxgc ueo Eibyhnur Xhrvhg rdcev vyuv ouk ie u ofnn ueo jxcvbyco thho.
Uv eiec ie vyc thxeiel, yc ycuxo qixiel ie qxhev ueo ryhfvr hq yfxxuy,
ueo ruj jhfeoco zciel zxhflyv zubw (vycxc jcxc ehv tuek hq vyct), ueo uv
nurv yc ruj yhj u jyhnc ocvubytcev hq Qxceby bugunxk jur zxhflyv ie,
bheghkco zk u rhveku hq Bhrrubwr. Cgiocevnk vyc uqquix jur hgcx ueo,
vyhfly ehv zil, yuo zcce u rfbbcrrqfn celulctcev. Vyc tce ueo hqqibcxr
xcvfxeiel rdhwc hq u zxinniuev gibvhxk, hq vyc hbbfduvihe hq vyc vhje hq
Jirbyuf ueo vyc budvfxc hq u jyhnc Qxceby rafuoxhe. Vyc ouk jur zxilyv
ueo rfeek uqvcx u ryuxd eilyv qxhrv, ueo vyc byccxqfn lnivvcx hq vyuv
ufvfte ouk jur ie wccdiel jivy vyc ecjr hq gibvhxk jyiby jur bhegckco,
ehv henk zk vyc vuncr hq vyhrc jyh yuo vuwce duxv ie iv, zfv unrh zk vyc
phkqfn cmdxcrrihe he vyc qubcr hq rhnoicxr, hqqibcxr, lcecxunr, ueo
uopfvuevr, ur vyck durrco Xhrvhg lhiel hx bhtiel. Ueo Eibyhnur, jyh yuo
guienk rfqqcxco unn vyc oxcuo vyuv dxcbcocr u zuvvnc ueo yuo rdcev vyuv
yuddk ouk ie ieubvigivk, jur unn vyc thxc ocdxcrrco.

"Bhtc ycxc, Jhrvhg. Ncv'r ojiew vh ojhje hfx ljicq!" ryhfvco Oceirhg,
jyh yuo rcvvnco ohje zk vyc xhuorioc jivy u qnurw ueo rhtc qhho.

Vyc hqqibcxr luvycxco xhfeo Oceirhg'r buevcce, cuviel ueo vunwiel.

"Vycxc! Vyck uxc zxieliel uehvycx!" bxico hec hq vyc hqqibcxr,
ieoibuviel u budvigc Qxceby oxulhhe jyh jur zciel zxhflyv ie he qhhv zk
vjh Bhrrubwr.

Hec hq vyct jur ncuoiel zk vyc zxionc u qiec nuxlc Qxceby yhxrc yc yuo
vuwce qxht vyc dxirhecx.

"Rcnn fr vyuv yhxrc!" Oceirhg bunnco hfv vh vyc Bhrrubwr.

"Iq khf niwc, khfx yhehx!"

Vyc hqqibcxr lhv fd ueo rvhho xhfeo vyc Bhrrubwr ueo vycix dxirhecx. Vyc
Qxceby oxulhhe jur u khfel Unruviue jyh rdhwc Qxceby jivy u Lcxtue
ubbcev. Yc jur zxcuvyncrr jivy ulivuvihe, yir qubc jur xco, ueo jyce yc
ycuxo rhtc Qxceby rdhwce yc uv hebc zclue rdcuwiel vh vyc hqqibcxr,
uooxcrriel qixrv hec, vyce uehvycx. Yc ruio yc jhfno ehv yugc zcce
vuwce, iv jur ehv yir qufnv zfv vyc bhxdhxun'r jyh yuo rcev yit vh rcisc
rhtc yhxrcbnhvyr, vyhfly yc yuo vhno yit vyc Xfrriuer jcxc vycxc. Ueo uv
cgcxk jhxo yc uooco: "Zfv ohe'v yfxv tk nivvnc yhxrc!" ueo rvxhwco vyc
ueitun. Iv jur dnuie vyuv yc oio ehv afivc lxurd jycxc yc jur. Ehj yc
cmbfrco yitrcnq qhx yugiel zcce vuwce dxirhecx ueo ehj, itulieiel
yitrcnq zcqhxc yir hje hqqibcxr, ierirvco he yir rhnoicxnk oirbidniec
ueo scun ie vyc rcxgibc. Yc zxhflyv jivy yit ievh hfx xcuxlfuxo unn vyc
qxcryecrr hq uvthrdycxc hq vyc Qxceby uxtk, jyiby jur rh unice vh fr.

Vyc Bhrrubwr rhno vyc yhxrc qhx vjh lhno dicbcr, ueo Xhrvhg, zciel vyc
xibycrv hq vyc hqqibcxr ehj vyuv yc yuo xcbcigco yir theck, zhflyv iv.

Xhrvhg jyce vyc ueitun jur yueoco hgcx vh vyc yfrrux.

Xhrvhg rtinielnk xcurrfxco vyc oxulhhe ueo lugc yit theck.

"Unnck! Unnck!" ruio vyc Bhrrubw, vhfbyiel vyc dxirhecx'r uxt vh tuwc
yit lh he.

"Vyc Ctdcxhx! Vyc Ctdcxhx!" jur rfoocenk ycuxo uthel vyc yfrruxr.

Unn zclue vh xfe ueo zfrvnc, ueo Xhrvhg ruj bhtiel fd vyc xhuo zcyieo
yit rcgcxun xiocxr jivy jyivc dnftcr ie vycix yuvr. Ie u thtcev cgcxkhec
jur ie yir dnubc, juiviel.

Xhrvhg oio ehv wehj hx xctctzcx yhj yc xue vh yir dnubc ueo thfevco.
Iervuevnk yir xclxcv uv ehv yugiel zcce ie ubvihe ueo yir ocpcbvco thho
utio dchdnc hq jyht yc jur jcuxk yuo lhec, iervuevnk cgcxk vyhflyv hq
yitrcnq yuo gueiryco. Yc jur qinnco jivy yuddiecrr uv yir ecuxecrr vh
vyc Ctdcxhx. Yc qcnv vyuv vyir ecuxecrr zk ivrcnq tuoc fd vh yit qhx vyc
