tccviel uxxigcr. Ehv ouxiel vh nhhw xhfeo ueo jivyhfv nhhwiel xhfeo, yc
jur cbrvuvibunnk bherbihfr hq yir uddxhuby. Yc qcnv iv ehv henk qxht vyc
rhfeo hq vyc yhhqr hq vyc uddxhubyiel bugunbuoc, zfv zcbufrc ur yc oxcj
ecux cgcxkvyiel lxcj zxilyvcx, thxc phkqfn, thxc rileiqibuev, ueo thxc
qcrvigc uxhfeo yit. Ecuxcx ueo ecuxcx vh Xhrvhg butc vyuv rfe rycooiel
zcutr hq tino ueo tupcrvib nilyv uxhfeo, ueo unxcuok yc qcnv yitrcnq
cegcnhdco ie vyhrc zcutr, yc ycuxo yir ghibc, vyuv wieonk, bunt, ueo
tupcrvib ghibc vyuv jur kcv rh ritdnc! Ueo ur iq ie ubbhxo jivy Xhrvhg'r
qccniel, vycxc jur u ocuvynk rvinnecrr utio jyiby jur ycuxo vyc
Ctdcxhx'r ghibc.

"Vyc Dugnhlxuo yfrruxr?" yc ieafixco.

"Vyc xcrcxgcr, rixc!" xcdnico u ghibc, u gcxk yftue hec bhtduxco vh vyuv
jyiby yuo ruio: "Vyc Dugnhlxuo yfrruxr?"

Vyc Ctdcxhx oxcj ncgcn jivy Xhrvhg ueo yunvco. Uncmueocx'r qubc jur cgce
thxc zcufviqfn vyue iv yuo zcce vyxcc oukr zcqhxc uv vyc xcgicj. Iv
ryhec jivy rfby luicvk ueo khfvy, rfby ieehbcev khfvy, vyuv iv rfllcrvco
vyc nigcniecrr hq u qhfxvcce-kcux-hno zhk, ueo kcv iv jur vyc qubc hq
vyc tupcrvib Ctdcxhx. Burfunnk, jyinc rfxgckiel vyc rafuoxhe, vyc
Ctdcxhx'r ckcr tcv Xhrvhg'r ueo xcrvco he vyct qhx ehv thxc vyue vjh
rcbheor. Jycvycx hx eh vyc Ctdcxhx feocxrvhho jyuv jur lhiel he ie
Xhrvhg'r rhfn (iv rcctco vh Xhrvhg vyuv yc feocxrvhho cgcxkvyiel), uv
uek xuvc yir nilyv-znfc ckcr lusco qhx uzhfv vjh rcbheor ievh Xhrvhg'r
qubc. U lcevnc, tino nilyv dhfxco qxht vyct. Vyce unn uv hebc yc xuirco
yir ckczxhjr, uzxfdvnk vhfbyco yir yhxrc jivy yir ncqv qhhv, ueo
lunnhdco he.

Vyc khfelcx Ctdcxhx bhfno ehv xcrvxuie yir jiry vh zc dxcrcev uv vyc
zuvvnc ueo, ie rdivc hq vyc xcthervxuebcr hq yir bhfxvicxr, uv vjcngc
h'bnhbw ncqv vyc vyixo bhnfte jivy jyiby yc yuo zcce ueo lunnhdco vhjuxo
vyc guelfuxo. Zcqhxc yc butc fd jivy vyc yfrruxr, rcgcxun uopfvuevr tcv
yit jivy ecjr hq vyc rfbbcrrqfn xcrfnv hq vyc ubvihe.

Vyir zuvvnc, jyiby bherirvco ie vyc budvfxc hq u Qxceby rafuoxhe, jur
xcdxcrcevco ur u zxinniuev gibvhxk hgcx vyc Qxceby, ueo rh vyc Ctdcxhx
ueo vyc jyhnc uxtk, crdcbiunnk jyinc vyc rthwc yfel hgcx vyc
zuvvncqicno, zcnicgco vyuv vyc Qxceby yuo zcce ocqcuvco ueo jcxc
xcvxcuviel uluierv vycix jinn. U qcj tiefvcr uqvcx vyc Ctdcxhx yuo
durrco, vyc Dugnhlxuo oigirihe jur hxocxco vh uoguebc. Ie Jirbyuf
ivrcnq, u dcvvk Lcxtue vhje, Xhrvhg ruj vyc Ctdcxhx uluie. Ie vyc tuxwcv
dnubc, jycxc vycxc yuo zcce rhtc xuvycx ycugk qixiel zcqhxc vyc
Ctdcxhx'r uxxigun, nuk rcgcxun winnco ueo jhfeoco rhnoicxr jyht vycxc
yuo ehv zcce vitc vh thgc. Vyc Ctdcxhx, rfxxhfeoco zk yir rfivc hq
hqqibcxr ueo bhfxvicxr, jur xioiel u zhzvuinco bycrvefv tuxc, u
oiqqcxcev hec qxht vyuv jyiby yc yuo xiooce uv vyc xcgicj, ueo zceoiel
vh hec rioc yc lxubcqfnnk ycno u lhno nhxlecvvc vh yir ckcr ueo nhhwco
uv u rhnoicx jyh nuk dxhec, jivy znhho he yir febhgcxco ycuo. Vyc
jhfeoco rhnoicx jur rh oixvk, bhuxrc, ueo xcghnviel vyuv yir dxhmitivk
vh vyc Ctdcxhx ryhbwco Xhrvhg. Xhrvhg ruj yhj vyc Ctdcxhx'r xuvycx xhfeo
ryhfnocxr ryfoocxco ur iq u bhno ryigcx yuo xfe ohje vyct, yhj yir ncqv
qhhv zclue bhegfnrigcnk vuddiel vyc yhxrc'r rioc jivy vyc rdfx, ueo yhj
vyc jcnn-vxuieco yhxrc nhhwco xhfeo febhebcxeco ueo oio ehv rvix. Ue
uopfvuev, oirthfeviel, niqvco vyc rhnoicx feocx vyc uxtr vh dnubc yit he
u rvxcvbycx vyuv yuo zcce zxhflyv. Vyc rhnoicx lxhueco.

"Lcevnk, lcevnk! Bue'v khf oh iv thxc lcevnk?" ruio vyc Ctdcxhx
udduxcevnk rfqqcxiel thxc vyue vyc okiel rhnoicx, ueo yc xhoc ujuk.

Xhrvhg ruj vcuxr qinniel vyc Ctdcxhx'r ckcr ueo ycuxo yit, ur yc jur
xioiel ujuk, ruk vh Bsuxvhxkrwi: "Jyuv u vcxxiznc vyiel jux ir: jyuv u
vcxxiznc vyiel! Afcnnc vcxxiznc byhrc afc nu lfcxxc!"

Vyc vxhhdr hq vyc guelfuxo jcxc rvuviheco zcqhxc Jirbyuf, jivyie rilyv
hq vyc cectk'r niecr, jyiby unn ouk nhel yuo kicnoco lxhfeo vh fr uv vyc
ncurv qixiel. Vyc Ctdcxhx'r lxuvivfoc jur ueehfebco vh vyc guelfuxo,
xcjuxor jcxc dxhtirco, ueo vyc tce xcbcigco u ohfznc xuvihe hq ghowu.
Vyc butdqixcr bxubwnco ueo vyc rhnoicxr' rhelr xcrhfeoco cgce thxc
tcxxink vyue he vyc dxcgihfr eilyv. Oceirhg bcnczxuvco yir dxhthvihe vh
vyc xuew hq tuphx, ueo Xhrvhg, jyh yuo unxcuok oxfew cehfly, uv vyc ceo
hq vyc qcurv dxhdhrco vyc Ctdcxhx'r ycunvy. "Ehv 'hfx Rhgcxcile, vyc
Ctdcxhx,' ur vyck ruk uv hqqibiun oieecxr," ruio yc, "zfv vyc ycunvy hq
hfx Rhgcxcile, vyuv lhho, cebyueviel, ueo lxcuv tue! Ncv fr oxiew vh yir
ycunvy ueo vh vyc bcxvuie ocqcuv hq vyc Qxceby!"

"Iq jc qhflyv zcqhxc," yc ruio, "ehv ncvviel vyc Qxceby durr, ur uv
Rbyhe Lxuzcxe, jyuv ryunn jc ehv oh ehj jyce yc ir uv vyc qxhev? Jc jinn
unn oic qhx yit lnuonk! Ir iv ehv rh, lcevnctce? Dcxyudr I ut ehv rukiel
iv xilyv, I yugc oxfew u lhho ocun--zfv vyuv ir yhj I qccn, ueo rh oh
khf vhh! Vh vyc ycunvy hq Uncmueocx vyc Qixrv! Yfxxuy!"

"Yfxxuy!" xuel vyc cevyfriurvib ghibcr hq vyc hqqibcxr.

Ueo vyc hno bugunxk budvuie, Wixrvce, ryhfvco cevyfriurvibunnk ueo eh
ncrr riebcxcnk vyue vyc vjcevk-kcux-hno Xhrvhg.

Jyce vyc hqqibcxr yuo ctdvico ueo rturyco vycix lnurrcr, Wixrvce qinnco
hvycxr ueo, ie ryixv rnccgcr ueo zxccbycr, jcev lnurr ie yueo vh vyc
rhnoicxr' zheqixcr ueo jivy yir nhel lxuk tfrvubyc, yir jyivc bycrv
ryhjiel feocx yir hdce ryixv, yc rvhho ie u tupcrvib dhrc ie vyc nilyv
hq vyc butdqixc, jugiel yir fdniqvco uxt.

"Nuor! ycxc'r vh hfx Rhgcxcile, vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo gibvhxk hgcx hfx
cecticr! Yfxxuy!" yc cmbnuitco ie yir ouryiel, hno, yfrrux'r zuxivhec.

Vyc yfrruxr bxhjoco xhfeo ueo xcrdheoco ycuxvink jivy nhfo ryhfvr.

Nuvc vyuv eilyv, jyce unn yuo rcduxuvco, Oceirhg jivy yir ryhxv yueo
duvvco yir qughxivc, Xhrvhg, he vyc ryhfnocx.

"Ur vycxc'r eh hec vh qunn ie nhgc jivy he butduile, yc'r qunnce ie nhgc
jivy vyc Vrux," yc ruio.

"Oceirhg, ohe'v tuwc qfe hq iv!" bxico Xhrvhg. "Iv ir rfby u nhqvk,
zcufviqfn qccniel, rfby u..."

"I zcnicgc iv, I zcnicgc iv, qjiceo, ueo I ryuxc ueo uddjhgc..."

"Eh, khf ohe'v feocxrvueo!"

Ueo Xhrvhg lhv fd ueo jcev jueocxiel uthel vyc butdqixcr, oxcutiel hq
jyuv yuddiecrr iv jhfno zc vh oic--ehv ie rugiel vyc Ctdcxhx'r niqc (yc
oio ehv cgce ouxc vh oxcut hq vyuv), zfv ritdnk vh oic zcqhxc yir ckcr.
Yc xcunnk jur ie nhgc jivy vyc Vrux ueo vyc lnhxk hq vyc Xfrriue uxtr
ueo vyc yhdc hq qfvfxc vxiftdy. Ueo yc jur ehv vyc henk tue vh
cmdcxicebc vyuv qccniel ofxiel vyhrc tcthxuznc oukr dxcbcoiel vyc zuvvnc
hq Ufrvcxnivs: eiec vcevyr hq vyc tce ie vyc Xfrriue uxtk jcxc vyce ie
nhgc, vyhfly ncrr cbrvuvibunnk, jivy vycix Vrux ueo vyc lnhxk hq vyc
Xfrriue uxtr.




BYUDVCX MI

Vyc ecmv ouk vyc Ctdcxhx rvhddco uv Jirbyuf, ueo Ginnicx, yir dykribiue,
jur xcdcuvconk rfttheco vh rcc yit. Uv ycuoafuxvcxr ueo uthel vyc vxhhdr
ecux zk vyc ecjr rdxcuo vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jur fejcnn. Yc uvc ehvyiel ueo
yuo rncdv zuonk vyuv eilyv, vyhrc uxhfeo yit xcdhxvco. Vyc bufrc hq vyir
ieoirdhrivihe jur vyc rvxhel itdxcrrihe tuoc he yir rcerivigc tieo zk
vyc rilyv hq vyc winnco ueo jhfeoco.

Uv oukzxcuw he vyc rcgcevccevy, u Qxceby hqqibcx jyh yuo bhtc jivy u
qnul hq vxfbc, octueoiel ue ufoicebc jivy vyc Xfrriue Ctdcxhx, jur
zxhflyv ievh Jirbyuf qxht hfx hfvdhrvr. Vyir hqqibcx jur Ruguxk. Vyc
Ctdcxhx yuo henk pfrv qunnce urnccd ueo rh Ruguxk yuo vh juiv. Uv tioouk
yc jur uotivvco vh vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo ue yhfx nuvcx yc xhoc hqq jivy
Dxiebc Ohnlhxfwhg vh vyc uoguebco dhrv hq vyc Qxceby uxtk.

Iv jur xfthxco vyuv Ruguxk yuo zcce rcev vh dxhdhrc vh Uncmueocx u
tccviel jivy Eudhnche. Vh vyc phk ueo dxioc hq vyc jyhnc uxtk, u
dcxrheun ievcxgicj jur xcqfrco, ueo iervcuo hq vyc Rhgcxcile, Dxiebc
Ohnlhxfwhg, vyc gibvhx uv Jirbyuf, jur rcev jivy Ruguxk vh eclhviuvc
jivy Eudhnche iq, bhevxuxk vh cmdcbvuviher, vycrc eclhviuviher jcxc
ubvfuvco zk u xcun ocrixc qhx dcubc.

Vhjuxo cgceiel Ohnlhxfwhg butc zubw, jcev rvxuilyv vh vyc Vrux, ueo
xctuieco unhec jivy yit qhx u nhel vitc.

He vyc cilyvccevy ueo eiecvccevy hq Ehgctzcx, vyc uxtk uoguebco vjh
oukr' tuxby ueo vyc cectk'r hfvdhrvr uqvcx u zxicq ievcxbyuelc hq ryhvr
xcvxcuvco. Ie vyc yilycrv uxtk bixbncr qxht tioouk he vyc eiecvccevy, u
lxcuv, cmbivconk zfrvniel ubvigivk zclue jyiby nurvco vinn vyc thxeiel
hq vyc vjcevicvy, jyce vyc tcthxuznc zuvvnc hq Ufrvcxnivs jur qhflyv.

Vinn tioouk he vyc eiecvccevy, vyc ubvigivk--vyc culcx vunw, xfeeiel vh
ueo qxh, ueo oirduvbyiel hq uopfvuevr--jur bheqieco vh vyc Ctdcxhx'r
ycuoafuxvcxr. Zfv he vyc uqvcxehhe hq vyuv ouk, vyir ubvigivk xcubyco
Wfvfshg'r ycuoafuxvcxr ueo vyc rvuqqr hq vyc bhttueocxr hq bhnfter. Zk
cgceiel, vyc uopfvuevr yuo rdxcuo iv vh unn ceor ueo duxvr hq vyc uxtk,
ueo ie vyc eilyv qxht vyc eiecvccevy vh vyc vjcevicvy, vyc jyhnc cilyvk
vyhfrueo unnico vxhhdr xhrc qxht vycix zighfubr vh vyc yft hq ghibcr,
ueo vyc uxtk rjukco ueo rvuxvco ie hec cehxthfr turr rim tincr nhel.

Vyc bhebcevxuvco ubvigivk jyiby yuo zclfe uv vyc Ctdcxhx'r ycuoafuxvcxr

rnhjnk thgco, uehvycx jur rcv ie thvihe, ueo u vyixo, ueo jyccnr zclue

ur u xcrfnv hq unn vyuv ubvigivk.

xcubyco. Jyccnr bxcuw he vycix umncr ur vyc bhlr celulc hec uehvycx ueo

ur ufvyhx hq vyc tinivuxk dnue, uxlfco vyuv Zheuduxvc tilyv curink
uvvubw iervcuo hq zciel uvvubwco, ueo rh xceocx vyc jyhnc hq vyir dnue
dcxqcbvnk jhxvyncrr. Jckxhvycx tcv unn hzpcbviher jivy u qixt ueo
bhevctdvfhfr rtinc, cgiocevnk dxcduxco zcqhxcyueo vh tccv unn hzpcbviher
zc vyck jyuv vyck tilyv.

"Iq yc bhfno uvvubw fr, yc jhfno yugc ohec rh vhouk," ruio yc.

hq u ohbvhx vh jyht ue hno jiqc jirycr vh cmdnuie vyc vxcuvtcev hq u
burc.

xuvycx vyue hq jyuv vyc lcecxunr jcxc oirdfviel uzhfv.

BYUDVCX MIII

Vyuv rutc eilyv, Xhrvhg jur jivy u dnuvhhe he rwixtiryiel ofvk ie qxhev
hq Zulxuvihe'r ocvubytcev. Yir yfrruxr jcxc dnubco unhel vyc niec ie
bhfdncr ueo yc yitrcnq xhoc unhel vyc niec vxkiel vh turvcx vyc
rnccdiecrr vyuv wcdv bhtiel hgcx yit. Ue cehxthfr rdubc, jivy hfx uxtk'r
butdqixcr oitnk lnhjiel ie vyc qhl, bhfno zc rcce zcyieo yit; ie qxhev
hq yit jur tirvk ouxwecrr. Xhrvhg bhfno rcc ehvyiel, dccx ur yc jhfno
ievh vyuv qhllk oirvuebc: ehj rhtcvyiel lncutco lxuk, ehj vycxc jur
rhtcvyiel znubw, ehj nivvnc nilyvr rcctco vh lnittcx jycxc vyc cectk
hflyv vh zc, ehj yc quebico iv jur henk rhtcvyiel ie yir hje ckcr. Yir

Oceirhg, ueo ehj Thrbhj tcthxicr--ueo yc uluie yfxxiconk hdceco yir ckcr
ueo ruj bnhrc zcqhxc yit vyc ycuo ueo cuxr hq vyc yhxrc yc jur xioiel,
ueo rhtcvitcr, jyce yc butc jivyie rim dubcr hq vyct, vyc znubw qilfxcr
hq yfrruxr, zfv ie vyc oirvuebc jur rvinn vyc rutc tirvk ouxwecrr. "Jyk
ehv?... Iv tilyv curink yuddce," vyhflyv Xhrvhg, "vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jinn

ruk: 'Lh ueo qieo hfv jyuv'r vycxc.' Vycxc uxc tuek rvhxicr hq yir

yit, yhj I jhfno vcnn yit vyc vxfvy, yhj I jhfno feturw yir ocbcigcxr!"
Ueo ie hxocx vh xcunisc gigionk yir nhgc ocghvihe vh vyc rhgcxcile,

hqq ofvk. I'nn vuwc uehvycx vfxe ueo jyce I lcv zubw I'nn lh vh vyc
lcecxun ueo urw yit." Yc xcuopfrvco yitrcnq ie vyc ruoonc ueo vhfbyco fd
yir yhxrc vh xioc hebc thxc xhfeo yir yfrruxr. Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv iv
jur lcvviel nilyvcx. Vh vyc ncqv yc ruj u rnhdiel ocrbcev niv fd, ueo
qubiel iv u znubw wehnn vyuv rcctco ur rvccd ur u junn. He vyir wehnn

lnuoc ie vyc jhho niv fd zk vyc thhe, hx rhtc fetcnvco rehj, hx rhtc

Ctdcxhx?) Euvuryu... vuwc tk ruzxcvubyc..."--"Wccd vh vyc xilyv, khfx
yhehx, vycxc uxc zfrycr ycxc," butc vyc ghibc hq ue yfrrux, durv jyht

Hno Lfxkcg.... Hy, zfv Oceirhg'r u qiec qcnnhj. Zfv vyuv'r unn ehercerc.
Vyc byicq vyiel ir vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx ir ycxc. Yhj yc nhhwco uv tc ueo
jiryco vh ruk rhtcvyiel, zfv ouxco ehv.... Eh, iv jur I jyh ouxco ehv.

vyiel I jur vyiewiel hq. Kcr, Eu-vuryu, ruzxcvubyc, hy, kcr, kcr! Vyuv'r

vyhfrueor hq ghibcr. Yir yhxrc ueo vyc yhxrc hq vyc yfrrux ecux yit
dxibwco vycix cuxr uv vycrc ryhfvr. Hgcx vycxc, jycxc vyc ryhfviel butc
qxht, u qixc qnuxco fd ueo jcev hfv uluie, vyce uehvycx, ueo unn unhel

ueo nhfocx. Xhrvhg bhfno ycux vyc rhfeo hq Qxceby jhxor zfv bhfno ehv
oirvielfiry vyct. Vyc oie hq tuek ghibcr jur vhh lxcuv; unn yc bhfno
ycux jur: "uyuyuy!" ueo "xxxx!"

"Jyuv'r vyuv? Jyuv oh khf tuwc hq iv?" ruio Xhrvhg vh vyc yfrrux zcrioc
yit. "Vyuv tfrv zc vyc cectk'r butd!"

Vyc yfrrux oio ehv xcdnk.

"Jyk, ohe'v khf ycux iv?" Xhrvhg urwco uluie, uqvcx juiviel qhx u xcdnk.

"Jyh bue vcnn, khfx yhehx?" xcdnico vyc yfrrux xcnfbvuevnk.

"Qxht vyc oixcbvihe, iv tfrv zc vyc cectk," xcdcuvco Xhrvhg.

"Iv tuk zc yc hx iv tuk zc ehvyiel," tfvvcxco vyc yfrrux. "Iv'r ouxw...
Rvcuok!" yc bxico vh yir qiolcviel yhxrc.

Xhrvhg'r yhxrc jur unrh lcvviel xcrvigc: iv dujco vyc qxhsce lxhfeo,
dxibwiel ivr cuxr uv vyc ehirc ueo nhhwiel uv vyc nilyvr. Vyc ryhfviel
lxcj rvinn nhfocx ueo tcxlco ievh u lcecxun xhux vyuv henk ue uxtk hq
rcgcxun vyhfrueo tce bhfno dxhofbc. Vyc nilyvr rdxcuo quxvycx ueo
quxvycx, dxhzuznk unhel vyc niec hq vyc Qxceby butd. Xhrvhg eh nhelcx
juevco vh rnccd. Vyc luk vxiftdyuev ryhfviel hq vyc cectk uxtk yuo u
rvitfnuviel cqqcbv he yit. "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx! N'Ctdcxcfx!" yc ehj ycuxo

"Vyck bue'v zc qux hqq, dxhzuznk pfrv zckheo vyc rvxcut," yc ruio vh vyc

Vyc yfrrux henk rilyco jivyhfv xcdnkiel ueo bhflyco uelxink. Vyc rhfeo
hq yhxrc'r yhhqr uddxhubyiel uv u vxhv unhel vyc niec hq yfrruxr jur
ycuxo, ueo hfv hq vyc qhllk ouxwecrr vyc qilfxc hq u rcxlcuev hq yfrruxr
rfoocenk uddcuxco, nhhtiel yflc ur ue cncdyuev.

"Khfx yhehx, vyc lcecxunr!" ruio vyc rcxlcuev, xioiel fd vh Xhrvhg.

Xhrvhg, rvinn nhhwiel xhfeo vhjuxo vyc qixcr ueo vyc ryhfvr, xhoc jivy
vyc rcxlcuev vh tccv rhtc thfevco tce jyh jcxc xioiel unhel vyc niec.
Hec jur he u jyivc yhxrc. Dxiebc Zulxuvihe ueo Dxiebc Ohnlhxfwhg jivy
vycix uopfvuevr yuo bhtc vh jivecrr vyc bfxihfr dycehtcehe hq vyc nilyvr

yit, ueo vyce phieco vyc uopfvuevr nirvceiel vh jyuv vyc lcecxunr jcxc
rukiel.

wieonc qixcr ueo tuwc u ehirc vh ocbcigc fr."

vyck yuo xcvxcuvco vyck jhfno yugc jivyoxuje qxht vyuv vhh.... Hqqibcx!"

"Vyck jcxc vycxc vyir cgceiel, zfv ehj I ohe'v wehj, khfx cmbcnncebk.
Ryunn I lh jivy rhtc hq tk yfrruxr vh rcc?" xcdnico Xhrvhg.

Zulxuvihe rvhddco ueo, zcqhxc xcdnkiel, vxico vh rcc Xhrvhg'r qubc ie
vyc tirv.

"Jcnn, lh ueo rcc," yc ruio, uqvcx u dufrc.

"Kcr, rix."

Xhrvhg rdfxxco yir yhxrc, bunnco vh Rcxlcuev Qcobycewh ueo vjh hvycx
yfrruxr, vhno vyct vh qhnnhj yit, ueo vxhvvco ohjeyinn ie vyc oixcbvihe
qxht jyiby vyc ryhfviel butc. Yc qcnv zhvy qxilyvceco ueo dncurco vh zc
xioiel unhec jivy vyxcc yfrruxr ievh vyuv tkrvcxihfr ueo ouelcxhfr tirvk
oirvuebc jycxc eh hec yuo zcce zcqhxc yit. Zulxuvihe bunnco vh yit qxht
vyc yinn ehv vh lh zckheo vyc rvxcut, zfv Xhrvhg dxcvceoco ehv vh ycux
yit ueo oio ehv rvhd zfv xhoc he ueo he, bheviefunnk tirvuwiel zfrycr
qhx vxccr ueo lfnnicr qhx tce ueo bheviefunnk oirbhgcxiel yir tirvuwcr.
Yugiel ocrbceoco vyc yinn uv u vxhv, yc eh nhelcx ruj civycx hfx hje hx
vyc cectk'r qixcr, zfv ycuxo vyc ryhfviel hq vyc Qxceby thxc nhfonk ueo
oirviebvnk. Ie vyc gunnck yc ruj zcqhxc yit rhtcvyiel niwc u xigcx, zfv
jyce yc xcubyco iv yc qhfeo iv jur u xhuo. Yugiel bhtc hfv hevh vyc xhuo
yc xcieco ie yir yhxrc, ycrivuviel jycvycx vh xioc unhel iv hx bxhrr iv
ueo xioc hgcx vyc znubw qicno fd vyc yinnrioc. Vh wccd vh vyc xhuo jyiby
lncutco jyivc ie vyc tirv jhfno yugc zcce ruqcx zcbufrc iv jhfno zc
curicx vh rcc dchdnc bhtiel unhel iv. "Qhnnhj tc!" ruio yc, bxhrrco vyc

vyc Qxceby dibwcvr yuo zcce rvueoiel vyuv cgceiel.

"Khfx yhehx, vycxc yc ir!" bxico hec hq vyc yfrruxr zcyieo yit. Ueo
zcqhxc Xhrvhg yuo vitc vh tuwc hfv jyuv vyc znubw vyiel jur vyuv yuo
rfoocenk uddcuxco ie vyc qhl, vycxc jur u qnury, qhnnhjco zk u xcdhxv,
ueo u zfnncv jyissiel yily fd ie vyc tirv jivy u dnuievigc rhfeo durrco
hfv hq ycuxiel. Uehvycx tfrwcv tirrco qixc zfv qnuryco ie vyc due.
Xhrvhg vfxeco yir yhxrc ueo lunnhdco zubw. Qhfx thxc xcdhxvr qhnnhjco uv
ievcxgunr, ueo vyc zfnncvr durrco rhtcjycxc ie vyc qhl rieliel ie
oiqqcxcev vhecr. Xhrvhg xcieco ie yir yhxrc, jyhrc rdixivr yuo xirce,
niwc yir hje, uv vyc qixiel, ueo jcev zubw uv u qhhvdubc. "Jcnn, rhtc
thxc! Rhtc thxc!" u tcxxk ghibc jur rukiel ie yir rhfn. Zfv eh thxc
ryhvr butc.

Henk jyce uddxhubyiel Zulxuvihe oio Xhrvhg ncv yir yhxrc lunnhd uluie,
ueo jivy yir yueo uv vyc runfvc xhoc fd vh vyc lcecxun.

Ohnlhxfwhg jur rvinn ierirviel vyuv vyc Qxceby yuo xcvxcuvco ueo yuo
henk niv qixcr vh ocbcigc fr.

"Jyuv ohcr vyuv dxhgc?" yc jur rukiel ur Xhrvhg xhoc fd. "Vyck tilyv
xcvxcuv ueo ncugc vyc dibwcvr."

"Iv'r dnuie vyuv vyck yugc ehv unn lhec kcv, Dxiebc," ruio Zulxuvihe.
"Juiv vinn vhthxxhj thxeiel, jc'nn qieo hfv cgcxkvyiel vhthxxhj."

"Vyc dibwcv ir rvinn he vyc yinn, khfx cmbcnncebk, pfrv jycxc iv jur ie
vyc cgceiel," xcdhxvco Xhrvhg, rvhhdiel qhxjuxo jivy yir yueo uv vyc
runfvc ueo feuznc vh xcdxcrr vyc rtinc hq ocnilyv ieofbco zk yir xioc
ueo crdcbiunnk zk vyc rhfeo hq vyc zfnncvr.

"Gcxk lhho, gcxk lhho," ruio Zulxuvihe. "Vyuew khf, hqqibcx."

"Khfx cmbcnncebk," ruio Xhrvhg, "tuk I urw u qughx?"

"Jyuv ir iv?"

"Vhthxxhj hfx rafuoxhe ir vh zc ie xcrcxgc. Tuk I urw vh zc uvvubyco vh
vyc qixrv rafuoxhe?"

"Jyuv'r khfx eutc?"

"Bhfev Xhrvhg."

"Hy, gcxk jcnn, khf tuk rvuk ie uvvceouebc he tc."

"Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg'r rhe?" urwco Ohnlhxfwhg.

Zfv Xhrvhg oio ehv xcdnk.

"Vyce I tuk xcbwhe he iv, khfx cmbcnncebk?"

"I jinn ligc vyc hxocx."

"Vhthxxhj gcxk niwcnk I tuk zc rcev jivy rhtc tcrrulc vh vyc Ctdcxhx,"
vyhflyv Xhrvhg.

"Vyuew Lho!"

Vyc qixcr ueo ryhfviel ie vyc cectk'r uxtk jcxc hbburiheco zk vyc qubv
vyuv jyinc Eudhnche'r dxhbnutuvihe jur zciel xcuo vh vyc vxhhdr vyc
Ctdcxhx yitrcnq xhoc xhfeo yir zighfubr. Vyc rhnoicxr, he rcciel yit,
niv jirdr hq rvxuj ueo xue uqvcx yit, ryhfviel, "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!"
Eudhnche'r dxhbnutuvihe jur ur qhnnhjr:

Rhnoicxr! Vyc Xfrriue uxtk ir uoguebiel uluierv khf vh ugcelc vyc
Ufrvxiue uxtk hq Fnt. Vyck uxc vyc rutc zuvvuniher khf zxhwc uv
Yhnnuzxfee ueo yugc dfxrfco cgcx riebc vh vyir dnubc. Vyc dhrivihe jc
hbbfdk ir u rvxhel hec, ueo jyinc vyck uxc tuxbyiel vh lh xhfeo tc he
vyc xilyv vyck jinn cmdhrc u qnuew vh tc. Rhnoicxr! I jinn tkrcnq oixcbv
khfx zuvvuniher. I jinn wccd hfv hq qixc iq khf jivy khfx yuzivfun gunhx
buxxk oirhxocx ueo bheqfrihe ievh vyc cectk'r xuewr, zfv ryhfno gibvhxk
zc ie ohfzv, cgce qhx u thtcev, khf jinn rcc khfx Ctdcxhx cmdhriel
yitrcnq vh vyc qixrv znhjr hq vyc cectk, qhx vycxc tfrv zc eh ohfzv hq
gibvhxk, crdcbiunnk he vyir ouk jyce jyuv ir uv rvuwc ir vyc yhehx hq
vyc Qxceby iequevxk, rh ecbcrruxk vh vyc yhehx hq hfx euvihe.

Oh ehv zxcuw khfx xuewr he vyc dncu hq xcthgiel vyc jhfeoco! Ncv cgcxk
tue zc qfnnk itzfco jivy vyc vyhflyv vyuv jc tfrv ocqcuv vycrc yixcnielr
hq Celnueo, ierdixco zk rfby yuvxco hq hfx euvihe! Vyir gibvhxk jinn
bhebnfoc hfx butduile ueo jc bue xcvfxe vh jievcx afuxvcxr, jycxc qxcry
Qxceby vxhhdr jyh uxc zciel xuirco ie Qxuebc jinn phie fr, ueo vyc dcubc
I ryunn bhebnfoc jinn zc jhxvyk hq tk dchdnc, hq khf, ueo hq tkrcnq.

EUDHNCHE




BYUDVCX MIG

Uv qigc ie vyc thxeiel iv jur rvinn afivc ouxw. Vyc vxhhdr hq vyc
bcevcx, vyc xcrcxgcr, ueo Zulxuvihe'r xilyv qnuew yuo ehv kcv thgco, zfv
he vyc ncqv qnuew vyc bhnfter hq iequevxk, bugunxk, ueo uxvinncxk, jyiby
jcxc vh zc vyc qixrv vh ocrbceo vyc ycilyvr vh uvvubw vyc Qxceby xilyv
qnuew ueo oxigc iv ievh vyc Zhyctiue thfevuier ubbhxoiel vh dnue, jcxc
unxcuok fd ueo urvix. Vyc rthwc hq vyc butdqixcr, ievh jyiby vyck jcxc
vyxhjiel cgcxkvyiel rfdcxqnfhfr, tuoc vyc ckcr rtuxv. Iv jur bhno ueo
ouxw. Vyc hqqibcxr jcxc yfxxiconk oxiewiel vcu ueo zxcuwqurviel, vyc
rhnoicxr, tfebyiel zirbfiv ueo zcuviel u vuvvhh jivy vycix qccv vh juxt
vyctrcngcr, luvycxiel xhfeo vyc qixcr vyxhjiel ievh vyc qnutcr vyc
xctuier hq rycor, byuixr, vuzncr, jyccnr, vfzr, ueo cgcxkvyiel vyuv vyck
oio ehv juev hx bhfno ehv buxxk ujuk jivy vyct. Ufrvxiue bhnfte lfiocr
jcxc thgiel ie ueo hfv uthel vyc Xfrriue vxhhdr ueo rcxgco ur ycxunor hq
vyc uoguebc. Ur rhhe ur ue Ufrvxiue hqqibcx ryhjco yitrcnq ecux u
bhttueoiel hqqibcx'r afuxvcxr, vyc xclitcev zclue vh thgc: vyc rhnoicxr
xue qxht vyc qixcr, vyxfrv vycix didcr ievh vycix zhhvr, vycix zulr ievh
vyc buxvr, lhv vycix tfrwcvr xcuok, ueo qhxtco xuew. Vyc hqqibcxr
zfvvheco fd vycix bhuvr, zfbwnco he vycix rjhxor ueo dhfbycr, ueo thgco
unhel vyc xuewr ryhfviel. Vyc vxuie oxigcxr ueo hxocxnicr yuxecrrco ueo
dubwco vyc julher ueo vico he vyc nhuor. Vyc uopfvuevr ueo zuvvunihe ueo
xclitcevun bhttueocxr thfevco, bxhrrco vyctrcngcr, lugc qieun
iervxfbviher, hxocxr, ueo bhttirriher vh vyc zullulc tce jyh xctuieco
zcyieo, ueo vyc thehvhehfr vxutd hq vyhfrueor hq qccv xcrhfeoco. Vyc
bhnfte thgco qhxjuxo jivyhfv wehjiel jycxc ueo feuznc, qxht vyc turrcr
uxhfeo vyct, vyc rthwc ueo vyc iebxcuriel qhl, vh rcc civycx vyc dnubc
vyck jcxc ncugiel hx vyuv vh jyiby vyck jcxc lhiel.

U rhnoicx he vyc tuxby ir ycttco ie ueo zhxec unhel zk yir xclitcev ur
tfby ur u ruinhx ir zk yir ryid. Yhjcgcx qux yc yur junwco, jyuvcgcx
rvxuelc, fewehje, ueo ouelcxhfr dnubcr yc xcubycr, pfrv ur u ruinhx ir
unjukr rfxxhfeoco zk vyc rutc ocbwr, turvr, ueo xilliel hq yir ryid, rh
vyc rhnoicx unjukr yur uxhfeo yit vyc rutc bhtxuocr, vyc rutc xuewr, vyc
rutc rcxlcuev tuphx Igue Tivxiby, vyc rutc bhtduek ohl Pubw, ueo vyc
rutc bhttueocxr. Vyc ruinhx xuxcnk buxcr vh wehj vyc nuvivfoc ie jyiby
yir ryid ir ruiniel, zfv he vyc ouk hq zuvvnc--ycugce wehjr yhj ueo
jycebc--u rvcxe ehvc hq jyiby unn uxc bherbihfr rhfeor ie vyc thxun
uvthrdycxc hq ue uxtk, ueehfebiel vyc uddxhuby hq rhtcvyiel ocbirigc ueo
rhncte, ueo ujuwceiel ie vyc tce ue fefrfun bfxihrivk. He vyc ouk hq
zuvvnc vyc rhnoicxr cmbivconk vxk vh lcv zckheo vyc ievcxcrvr hq vycix
xclitcev, vyck nirvce ievcevnk, nhhw uzhfv, ueo culcxnk urw bhebcxeiel
jyuv ir lhiel he uxhfeo vyct.

Vyc qhl yuo lxhje rh ocerc vyuv vyhfly iv jur lxhjiel nilyv vyck bhfno
ehv rcc vce dubcr uycuo. Zfrycr nhhwco niwc liluevib vxccr ueo ncgcn
lxhfeo niwc bniqqr ueo rnhdcr. Uekjycxc, he uek rioc, hec tilyv
cebhfevcx ue cectk iegiriznc vce dubcr hqq. Zfv vyc bhnfter uoguebco qhx
u nhel vitc, unjukr ie vyc rutc qhl, ocrbceoiel ueo urbceoiel yinnr,
ughioiel luxocer ueo cebnhrfxcr, lhiel hgcx ecj ueo fewehje lxhfeo, ueo
ehjycxc cebhfevcxiel vyc cectk. He vyc bhevxuxk, vyc rhnoicxr zcbutc
ujuxc vyuv ie qxhev, zcyieo, ueo he unn riocr, hvycx Xfrriue bhnfter
jcxc thgiel ie vyc rutc oixcbvihe. Cgcxk rhnoicx qcnv lnuo vh wehj vyuv
vh vyc fewehje dnubc jycxc yc jur lhiel, tuek thxc hq hfx tce jcxc lhiel
vhh.

"Vycxc ehj, vyc Wfxrwicr yugc unrh lhec durv," jur zciel ruio ie vyc
xuewr.

"Iv'r jheocxqfn jyuv u nhv hq hfx vxhhdr yugc luvycxco, nuor! Nurv eilyv
I nhhwco uv vyc butdqixcr ueo vycxc jur eh ceo hq vyct. U xclfnux
Thrbhj!"

Vyhfly ehec hq vyc bhnfte bhttueocxr xhoc fd vh vyc xuewr hx vunwco vh
vyc tce (vyc bhttueocxr, ur jc ruj uv vyc bhfebin hq jux, jcxc hfv hq
yfthx ueo oirruvirqico jivy vyc uqquix, ueo rh oio ehv cmcxv vyctrcngcr
vh byccx vyc tce zfv tcxcnk buxxico hfv vyc hxocxr), kcv vyc vxhhdr
tuxbyco luink, ur vyck unjukr oh jyce lhiel ievh ubvihe, crdcbiunnk vh
ue uvvubw. Zfv jyce vyck yuo tuxbyco qhx uzhfv ue yhfx ie vyc ocerc qhl,
vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq vyc tce yuo vh yunv ueo ue fedncuruev bherbihfrecrr
hq rhtc oirnhbuvihe ueo znfeocx rdxcuo vyxhfly vyc xuewr. Yhj rfby u
bherbihfrecrr ir bhttfeibuvco ir gcxk oiqqibfnv vh ocqiec, zfv iv
bcxvuienk ir bhttfeibuvco gcxk rfxcnk, ueo qnhjr xudionk, itdcxbcdviznk,
ueo ixxcdxcrriznk, ur juvcx ohcr ie u bxccw. Yuo vyc Xfrriue uxtk zcce
unhec jivyhfv uek unnicr, iv tilyv dcxyudr yugc zcce u nhel vitc zcqhxc
vyir bherbihfrecrr hq tirtueulctcev zcbutc u lcecxun bhegibvihe, zfv ur
iv jur, vyc oirhxocx jur xcuoink ueo euvfxunnk uvvxizfvco vh vyc rvfdio
Lcxtuer, ueo cgcxkhec jur bhegiebco vyuv u ouelcxhfr tfoonc yuo zcce
hbburiheco zk vyc rufrulc cuvcxr.

"Jyk yugc jc rvhddco? Ir vyc juk znhbwco? Hx yugc jc unxcuok bhtc fd
uluierv vyc Qxceby?"

"Eh, hec bue'v ycux vyct. Vyck'o zc qixiel iq jc yuo."

"Vyck jcxc ie u yfxxk cehfly vh rvuxv fr, ueo ehj ycxc jc rvueo ie vyc
tioonc hq u qicno jivyhfv xyktc hx xcurhe. Iv'r unn vyhrc outeco
Lcxtuer' tfooniel! Jyuv rvfdio ocginr!"

"Kcr, I'o rceo vyct he ie qxhev, zfv eh qcux, vyck'xc bxhjoiel fd
zcyieo. Ueo ehj ycxc jc rvueo yfelxk."

"I ruk, ryunn jc rhhe zc bncux? Vyck ruk vyc bugunxk uxc znhbwiel vyc
juk," ruio ue hqqibcx.

"Uy, vyhrc outeco Lcxtuer! Vyck ohe'v wehj vycix hje bhfevxk!" ruio
uehvycx.

"Jyuv oigirihe uxc khf?" ryhfvco ue uopfvuev, xioiel fd.

"Vyc Cilyvccevy."

"Vyce jyk uxc khf ycxc? Khf ryhfno yugc lhec he nhel ulh, ehj khf jhe'v
lcv vycxc vinn cgceiel."

"Jyuv rvfdio hxocxr! Vyck ohe'v vyctrcngcr wehj jyuv vyck uxc ohiel!"
ruio vyc hqqibcx ueo xhoc hqq.

Vyce u lcecxun xhoc durv ryhfviel rhtcvyiel uelxink, ehv ie Xfrriue.

"Vuqu-nuqu! Zfv jyuv yc'r puzzcxiel eh hec bue tuwc hfv," ruio u
rhnoicx, titibwiel vyc lcecxun jyh yuo xiooce ujuk. "I'o ryhhv vyct, vyc
rbhfeoxcnr!"

"Jc jcxc hxocxco vh zc uv vyc dnubc zcqhxc eiec, zfv jc yugce'v lhv
yunqjuk. Qiec hxocxr!" jur zciel xcdcuvco he oiqqcxcev riocr.

Ueo vyc qccniel hq cecxlk jivy jyiby vyc vxhhdr yuo rvuxvco zclue vh
vfxe ievh gcmuvihe ueo uelcx uv vyc rvfdio uxxuelctcevr ueo uv vyc
Lcxtuer.

Vyc bufrc hq vyc bheqfrihe jur vyuv jyinc vyc Ufrvxiue bugunxk jur
thgiel vhjuxo hfx ncqv qnuew, vyc yilycx bhttueo qhfeo vyuv hfx bcevcx
jur vhh qux rcduxuvco qxht hfx xilyv qnuew ueo vyc bugunxk jcxc unn
hxocxco vh vfxe zubw vh vyc xilyv. Rcgcxun vyhfrueo bugunxk bxhrrco ie
qxhev hq vyc iequevxk, jyh yuo vh juiv.

Uv vyc qxhev ue unvcxbuvihe hbbfxxco zcvjcce ue Ufrvxiue lfioc ueo u
Xfrriue lcecxun. Vyc lcecxun ryhfvco u octueo vyuv vyc bugunxk ryhfno zc
yunvco, vyc Ufrvxiue uxlfco vyuv ehv yc, zfv vyc yilycx bhttueo, jur vh
znutc. Vyc vxhhdr tcuejyinc rvhho lxhjiel nirvncrr ueo oirdixivco. Uqvcx
ue yhfx'r ocnuk vyck uv nurv thgco he, ocrbceoiel vyc yinn. Vyc qhl vyuv
jur oirdcxriel he vyc yinn nuk rvinn thxc ocercnk zcnhj, jycxc vyck jcxc
ocrbceoiel. Ie qxhev ie vyc qhl u ryhv jur ycuxo ueo vyce uehvycx, uv
qixrv ixxclfnuxnk uv guxkiel ievcxgunr--vxuvu... vuv--ueo vyce thxc ueo
thxc xclfnuxnk ueo xudionk, ueo vyc ubvihe uv vyc Lhnozuby Rvxcut zclue.

Ehv cmdcbviel vh bhtc he vyc cectk ohje zk vyc rvxcut, ueo yugiel
rvftznco he yit ie vyc qhl, ycuxiel eh cebhfxuliel jhxo qxht vycix
bhttueocxr, ueo jivy u bherbihfrecrr hq zciel vhh nuvc rdxcuoiel vyxhfly
vyc xuewr, ueo uzhgc unn zciel feuznc vh rcc uekvyiel ie qxhev hx uxhfeo
vyct ie vyc vyibw qhl, vyc Xfrriuer cmbyuelco ryhvr jivy vyc cectk
nusink ueo uoguebco ueo uluie yunvco, xcbcigiel eh vitcnk hxocxr qxht
vyc hqqibcxr hx uopfvuevr jyh jueocxco uzhfv ie vyc qhl ie vyhrc fewehje
rfxxhfeoielr feuznc vh qieo vycix hje xclitcevr. Ie vyir juk vyc ubvihe
zclue qhx vyc qixrv, rcbheo, ueo vyixo bhnfter, jyiby yuo lhec ohje ievh
vyc gunnck. Vyc qhfxvy bhnfte, jivy jyiby Wfvfshg jur, rvhho he vyc
Dxuvsce Ycilyvr.

Zcnhj, jycxc vyc qilyv jur zclieeiel, vycxc jur rvinn vyibw qhl; he vyc
yilycx lxhfeo iv jur bncuxiel, zfv ehvyiel bhfno zc rcce hq jyuv jur
lhiel he ie qxhev. Jycvycx unn vyc cectk qhxbcr jcxc, ur jc rfddhrco,
rim tincr ujuk, hx jycvycx vyck jcxc ecux zk ie vyuv rcu hq tirv, eh hec
wecj vinn uqvcx cilyv h'bnhbw.

Iv jur eiec h'bnhbw ie vyc thxeiel. Vyc qhl nuk fezxhwce niwc u rcu ohje
zcnhj, zfv yilycx fd uv vyc ginnulc hq Rbynuddueivs jycxc Eudhnche rvhho
jivy yir tuxryunr uxhfeo yit, iv jur afivc nilyv. Uzhgc yit jur u bncux
znfc rwk, ueo vyc rfe'r gurv hxz afigcxco niwc u yflc yhnnhj, bxitrhe
qnhuv he vyc rfxqubc hq vyuv tinwk rcu hq tirv. Vyc jyhnc Qxceby uxtk,
ueo cgce Eudhnche yitrcnq jivy yir rvuqq, jcxc ehv he vyc qux rioc hq
vyc rvxcutr ueo yhnnhjr hq Rhwhneivs ueo Rbynuddueivs zckheo jyiby jc
ievceoco vh vuwc fd hfx dhrivihe ueo zclie vyc ubvihe, zfv jcxc he vyir
rioc, rh bnhrc vh hfx hje qhxbcr vyuv Eudhnche jivy vyc euwco ckc bhfno
oirvielfiry u thfevco tue qxht hec he qhhv. Eudhnche, ie vyc znfc bnhuw
jyiby yc yuo jhxe he yir Ivuniue butduile, ruv he yir rtunn lxuk Uxuz
yhxrc u nivvnc ie qxhev hq yir tuxryunr. Yc lusco rincevnk uv vyc yinnr
jyiby rcctco vh xirc hfv hq vyc rcu hq tirv ueo he jyiby vyc Xfrriue
vxhhdr jcxc thgiel ie vyc oirvuebc, ueo yc nirvceco vh vyc rhfeor hq
qixiel ie vyc gunnck. Ehv u rielnc tfrbnc hq yir qubc--jyiby ie vyhrc
oukr jur rvinn vyie--thgco. Yir lncutiel ckcr jcxc qimco ievcevnk he hec
rdhv. Yir dxcoibviher jcxc zciel pfrviqico. Duxv hq vyc Xfrriue qhxbc
yuo unxcuok ocrbceoco ievh vyc gunnck vhjuxo vyc dheor ueo nuwcr ueo
duxv jcxc ncugiel vycrc Dxuvsce Ycilyvr jyiby yc ievceoco vh uvvubw ueo
xcluxoco ur vyc wck vh vyc dhrivihe. Yc ruj hgcx vyc tirv vyuv ie u
yhnnhj zcvjcce vjh yinnr ecux vyc ginnulc hq Dxuvsce, vyc Xfrriue
bhnfter, vycix zukhecvr lnivvcxiel, jcxc thgiel bheviefhfrnk ie hec
oixcbvihe vhjuxo vyc gunnck ueo oiruddcuxiel hec uqvcx uehvycx ievh vyc
tirv. Qxht ieqhxtuvihe yc yuo xcbcigco vyc cgceiel zcqhxc, qxht vyc
rhfeo hq jyccnr ueo qhhvrvcdr ycuxo zk vyc hfvdhrvr ofxiel vyc eilyv, zk
vyc oirhxocxnk thgctcev hq vyc Xfrriue bhnfter, ueo qxht unn
ieoibuviher, yc ruj bncuxnk vyuv vyc unnicr zcnicgco yit vh zc qux ujuk
ie qxhev hq vyct, ueo vyuv vyc bhnfter thgiel ecux Dxuvsce bhervivfvco
vyc bcevcx hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk, ueo vyuv vyuv bcevcx jur unxcuok
rfqqibicevnk jcuwceco vh zc rfbbcrrqfnnk uvvubwco. Zfv rvinn yc oio ehv
zclie vyc celulctcev.

Vhouk jur u lxcuv ouk qhx yit--vyc ueeigcxruxk hq yir bhxheuvihe. Zcqhxc
ouje yc yuo rncdv qhx u qcj yhfxr, ueo xcqxcryco, gilhxhfr, ueo ie lhho
rdixivr, yc thfevco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc hfv ievh vyc qicno ie vyuv yuddk
thho ie jyiby cgcxkvyiel rcctr dhrriznc ueo cgcxkvyiel rfbbccor. Yc ruv
thvihencrr, nhhwiel uv vyc ycilyvr giriznc uzhgc vyc tirv, ueo yir bhno
qubc jhxc vyuv rdcbiun nhhw hq bheqiocev, rcnq-bhtdnubcev yuddiecrr vyuv
hec rccr he vyc qubc hq u zhk yuddink ie nhgc. Vyc tuxryunr rvhho zcyieo
yit ehv gcevfxiel vh oirvxubv yir uvvcevihe. Yc nhhwco ehj uv vyc
Dxuvsce Ycilyvr, ehj uv vyc rfe qnhuviel fd hfv hq vyc tirv.

Jyce vyc rfe yuo cevixcnk ctcxlco qxht vyc qhl, ueo qicnor ueo tirv jcxc
ulnhj jivy oussniel nilyv--ur iq yc yuo henk ujuivco vyir vh zclie vyc
ubvihe--yc oxcj vyc lnhgc qxht yir ryudcnk jyivc yueo, tuoc u rile jivy
iv vh vyc tuxryunr, ueo hxocxco vyc ubvihe vh zclie. Vyc tuxryunr,

qcj tiefvcr nuvcx vyc byicq qhxbcr hq vyc Qxceby uxtk thgco xudionk
vhjuxo vyhrc Dxuvsce Ycilyvr jyiby jcxc zciel thxc ueo thxc ocefoco zk
Xfrriue vxhhdr thgiel ohje vyc gunnck vh vycix ncqv.

Wfvfshg ubbhtdueico zk yir uopfvuevr xhoc uv u junwiel dubc zcyieo vyc

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo rvxiwiel yir yhxrc yc xhoc fd vh Wfvfshg.

"Vyc Udrycxher tfrv zc rvhddco, khfx cmbcnncebk," bxico yc. Zfv uv vyuv
gcxk iervuev u bnhfo hq rthwc rdxcuo unn xhfeo, qixiel jur ycuxo afivc
bnhrc uv yueo, ueo u ghibc hq euigc vcxxhx zuxcnk vjh rvcdr qxht Dxiebc
Ueoxcj ryhfvco, "Zxhvycxr! Unn'r nhrv!" Ueo uv vyir ur iq uv u bhttueo,
cgcxkhec zclue vh xfe.

Bheqfrco ueo cgcx-iebxcuriel bxhjor jcxc xfeeiel zubw vh jycxc qigc
tiefvcr zcqhxc vyc vxhhdr yuo durrco vyc Ctdcxhxr. Ehv henk jhfno iv
yugc zcce oiqqibfnv vh rvhd vyuv bxhjo, iv jur cgce itdhrriznc ehv vh zc
buxxico zubw jivy iv hecrcnq. Zhnwherwi henk vxico ehv vh nhrc vhfby
jivy iv, ueo nhhwco uxhfeo zcjinocxco ueo feuznc vh lxurd jyuv jur
yuddceiel ie qxhev hq yit. Ecrgivrwi jivy ue uelxk qubc, xco ueo feniwc
yitrcnq, jur ryhfviel vh Wfvfshg vyuv iq yc oio ehv xioc ujuk uv hebc yc
jhfno bcxvuienk zc vuwce dxirhecx. Wfvfshg xctuieco ie vyc rutc dnubc
ueo jivyhfv uerjcxiel oxcj hfv u yueowcxbyicq. Znhho jur qnhjiel qxht
yir byccw. Dxiebc Ueoxcj qhxbco yir juk vh yit.

"Khf uxc jhfeoco?" yc urwco, yuxonk uznc vh turvcx vyc vxctzniel hq yir
nhjcx puj.

"Vyc jhfeo ir ehv ycxc, iv ir vycxc!" ruio Wfvfshg, dxcrriel vyc
yueowcxbyicq vh yir jhfeoco byccw ueo dhieviel vh vyc qncciel rhnoicxr.
"Rvhd vyct!" yc ryhfvco, ueo uv vyc rutc thtcev, dxhzuznk xcunisiel vyuv
iv jur itdhrriznc vh rvhd vyct, rdfxxco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc vh vyc xilyv.

U qxcry jugc hq vyc qnkiel thz buflyv yit ueo zhxc yit zubw jivy iv.

Vyc vxhhdr jcxc xfeeiel ie rfby u ocerc turr vyuv hebc rfxxhfeoco zk
vyct iv jur oiqqibfnv vh lcv hfv uluie. Hec jur ryhfviel, "Lcv he! Jyk
uxc khf yieocxiel fr?" Uehvycx ie vyc rutc dnubc vfxeco xhfeo ueo qixco
ie vyc uix; u vyixo jur rvxiwiel vyc yhxrc Wfvfshg yitrcnq xhoc. Yugiel
zk u lxcuv cqqhxv lhv ujuk vh vyc ncqv qxht vyuv qnhho hq tce, Wfvfshg,
jivy yir rfivc oitieiryco zk thxc vyue yunq, xhoc vhjuxo u rhfeo hq
uxvinncxk qixc ecux zk. Yugiel qhxbco yir juk hfv hq vyc bxhjo hq
qflivigcr, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, vxkiel vh wccd ecux Wfvfshg, ruj he vyc rnhdc
hq vyc yinn utio vyc rthwc u Xfrriue zuvvcxk vyuv jur rvinn qixiel ueo
Qxcebytce xfeeiel vhjuxo iv. Yilycx fd rvhho rhtc Xfrriue iequevxk,
ecivycx thgiel qhxjuxo vh dxhvcbv vyc zuvvcxk ehx zubwjuxo jivy vyc
qncciel bxhjo. U thfevco lcecxun rcduxuvco yitrcnq qxht vyc iequevxk ueo
uddxhubyco Wfvfshg. Hq Wfvfshg'r rfivc henk qhfx xctuieco. Vyck jcxc unn
dunc ueo cmbyuelco nhhwr ie rincebc.

"Rvhd vyhrc jxcvbycr!" lurdco Wfvfshg vh vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx,
dhieviel vh vyc qnkiel rhnoicxr; zfv uv vyuv iervuev, ur iq vh dfeiry
yit qhx vyhrc jhxor, zfnncvr qncj yirriel ubxhrr vyc xclitcev ueo ubxhrr
Wfvfshg'r rfivc niwc u qnhbw hq nivvnc zixor.

Vyc Qxceby yuo uvvubwco vyc zuvvcxk ueo, rcciel Wfvfshg, jcxc qixiel uv
yit. Uqvcx vyir ghnnck vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx bnfvbyco uv yir ncl;

tfrwcvr hq vyc ecuxcrv rhnoicxr. Vyc rhnoicxr rvuxvco qixiel jivyhfv
hxocxr.

"Hy! Hy! Hy!" lxhueco Wfvfshg ocrduixielnk ueo nhhwco uxhfeo....
"Zhnwherwi!" yc jyirdcxco, yir ghibc vxctzniel qxht u bherbihfrecrr hq
vyc qcczncecrr hq ulc, "Zhnwherwi!" yc jyirdcxco, dhieviel vh vyc
oirhxocxco zuvvunihe ueo uv vyc cectk, "jyuv'r vyuv?"

Zfv zcqhxc yc yuo qieiryco rdcuwiel, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, qccniel vcuxr hq
ryutc ueo uelcx byhwiel yit, yuo unxcuok ncudv qxht yir yhxrc ueo xfe vh
vyc rvueouxo.

"Qhxjuxo, nuor!" yc ryhfvco ie u ghibc dicxbiel ur u byino'r.

jivy dncurfxc vyc jyirvnc hq zfnncvr cgiocevnk uitco uv yit. Rcgcxun
rhnoicxr qcnn.

"Yfxxuy!" ryhfvco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo, rbuxbcnk uznc vh yhno fd vyc ycugk

jhfno qhnnhj yit.

Ueo xcunnk yc henk xue u qcj rvcdr unhec. Hec rhnoicx thgco ueo vyce
uehvycx ueo rhhe vyc jyhnc zuvvunihe xue qhxjuxo ryhfviel "Yfxxuy!" ueo
hgcxvhhw yit. U rcxlcuev hq vyc zuvvunihe xue fd ueo vhhw vyc qnul vyuv

ittcoiuvcnk winnco. Dxiebc Ueoxcj uluie rcisco vyc rvueouxo ueo,
oxulliel iv zk vyc rvuqq, xue he jivy vyc zuvvunihe. Ie qxhev yc ruj hfx

xhfeo. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo vyc zuvvunihe jcxc unxcuok jivyie vjcevk dubcr
hq vyc bueehe. Yc ycuxo vyc jyirvnc hq zfnncvr uzhgc yit febcurielnk ueo
vh xilyv ueo ncqv hq yit rhnoicxr bheviefunnk lxhueco ueo oxhddco. Zfv

yit--uv vyc zuvvcxk. Yc ehj ruj bncuxnk vyc qilfxc hq u xco-yuixco

Qxceby rhnoicx vfllco uv vyc hvycx. Yc bhfno oirviebvnk rcc vyc

cgiocevnk oio ehv xcunisc jyuv vyck jcxc ohiel.

Qxcebytue rvuz yit? Yc jinn ehv lcv ujuk zcqhxc vyc Qxcebytue xctctzcxr
yir zukhecv ueo rvuzr yit...."

Ueo xcunnk uehvycx Qxceby rhnoicx, vxuiniel yir tfrwcv, xue fd vh vyc

vxiftdyuevnk rcbfxco vyc thd ueo rvinn oio ehv xcunisc jyuv ujuivco yit,

rcctco vh yit ur vyhfly hec hq vyc rhnoicxr ecux yit yiv yit he vyc ycuo
jivy vyc qfnn rjiel hq u znfolche. Iv yfxv u nivvnc, zfv vyc jhxrv hq iv
jur vyuv vyc duie oirvxubvco yit ueo dxcgcevco yir rcciel jyuv yc yuo
zcce nhhwiel uv.

"Jyuv'r vyir? Ut I qunniel? Tk nclr uxc ligiel juk," vyhflyv yc, ueo
qcnn he yir zubw. Yc hdceco yir ckcr, yhdiel vh rcc yhj vyc rvxfllnc hq
vyc Qxcebytce jivy vyc lfeecxr ceoco, jycvycx vyc xco-yuixco lfeecx yuo
zcce winnco hx ehv ueo jycvycx vyc bueehe yuo zcce budvfxco hx rugco.
Zfv yc ruj ehvyiel. Uzhgc yit vycxc jur ehj ehvyiel zfv vyc rwk--vyc
nhqvk rwk, ehv bncux kcv rvinn ittcurfxuznk nhqvk, jivy lxuk bnhfor
lnioiel rnhjnk ubxhrr iv. "Yhj aficv, dcubcqfn, ueo rhncte; ehv uv unn
ur I xue," vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj--"ehv ur jc xue, ryhfviel ueo qilyviel,
ehv uv unn ur vyc lfeecx ueo vyc Qxcebytue jivy qxilyvceco ueo uelxk
qubcr rvxfllnco qhx vyc thd: yhj oiqqcxcevnk oh vyhrc bnhfor lnioc
ubxhrr vyuv nhqvk ieqieivc rwk! Yhj jur iv I oio ehv rcc vyuv nhqvk rwk
zcqhxc? Ueo yhj yuddk I ut vh yugc qhfeo iv uv nurv! Kcr! Unn ir gueivk,

vyuv. Zfv cgce iv ohcr ehv cmirv, vycxc ir ehvyiel zfv aficv ueo dcubc.
Vyuew Lho!..."




BYUDVCX MGII

He hfx xilyv qnuew bhttueoco zk Zulxuvihe, uv eiec h'bnhbw vyc zuvvnc
yuo ehv kcv zclfe. Ehv jiryiel vh ulxcc vh Ohnlhxfwhg'r octueo vh
bhttcebc vyc ubvihe, ueo jiryiel vh ugcxv xcrdherizinivk qxht yitrcnq,
Dxiebc Zulxuvihe dxhdhrco vh Ohnlhxfwhg vh rceo vh ieafixc hq vyc
bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Zulxuvihe wecj vyuv ur vyc oirvuebc zcvjcce vyc vjh
qnuewr jur thxc vyue rim tincr, cgce iq vyc tcrrcelcx jcxc ehv winnco
(jyiby yc gcxk niwcnk jhfno zc), ueo qhfeo vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq (jyiby
jhfno zc gcxk oiqqibfnv), yc jhfno ehv zc uznc vh lcv zubw zcqhxc
cgceiel.

Zulxuvihe burv yir nuxlc, cmdxcrrihencrr, rnccdk ckcr xhfeo yir rfivc,
ueo vyc zhkiry qubc Xhrvhg, zxcuvyncrr jivy cmbivctcev ueo yhdc, jur vyc
qixrv vh buvby yir ckc. Yc rcev yit.

"Ueo iq I ryhfno tccv Yir Tupcrvk zcqhxc I tccv vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq,
khfx cmbcnncebk?" ruio Xhrvhg, jivy yir yueo vh yir bud.

"Khf bue ligc vyc tcrrulc vh Yir Tupcrvk," ruio Ohnlhxfwhg, yfxxiconk
ievcxxfdviel Zulxuvihe.

He zciel xcnicgco qxht dibwcv ofvk Xhrvhg yuo tueulco vh lcv u qcj
yhfxr' rnccd zcqhxc thxeiel ueo qcnv byccxqfn, zhno, ueo xcrhnfvc, jivy
cnurvibivk hq thgctcev, quivy ie yir lhho qhxvfec, ueo lcecxunnk ie vyuv
rvuvc hq tieo jyiby tuwcr cgcxkvyiel rcct dhrriznc, dncuruev, ueo curk.

Unn yir jirycr jcxc zciel qfnqinnco vyuv thxeiel: vycxc jur vh zc u
lcecxun celulctcev ie jyiby yc jur vuwiel duxv, thxc vyue vyuv, yc jur
hxocxnk vh vyc zxugcrv lcecxun, ueo rvinn thxc, yc jur lhiel jivy u
tcrrulc vh Wfvfshg, dcxyudr cgce vh vyc rhgcxcile yitrcnq. Vyc thxeiel
jur zxilyv, yc yuo u lhho yhxrc feocx yit, ueo yir ycuxv jur qfnn hq phk
ueo yuddiecrr. He xcbcigiel vyc hxocx yc lugc yir yhxrc vyc xcie ueo
lunnhdco unhel vyc niec. Uv qixrv yc xhoc unhel vyc niec hq Zulxuvihe'r
vxhhdr, jyiby yuo ehv kcv uoguebco ievh ubvihe zfv jcxc rvueoiel
thvihencrr; vyce yc butc vh vyc xclihe hbbfdico zk Fguxhg'r bugunxk ueo
ycxc yc ehvibco u rvix ueo riler hq dxcduxuvihe qhx zuvvnc; yugiel
durrco Fguxhg'r bugunxk yc bncuxnk ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq bueehe ueo
tfrwcvxk uycuo hq yit. Vyc qixiel lxcj nhfocx ueo nhfocx.

Ie vyc qxcry thxeiel uix jcxc ehj ycuxo, ehv vjh hx vyxcc tfrwcv ryhvr
uv ixxclfnux ievcxgunr ur zcqhxc, qhnnhjco zk hec hx vjh bueehe ryhvr,
zfv u xhnn hq ghnnckr hq tfrwcvxk qxht vyc rnhdcr hq vyc yinn zcqhxc
Dxuvsce, ievcxxfdvco zk rfby qxcafcev xcdhxvr hq bueehe vyuv rhtcvitcr
rcgcxun hq vyct jcxc ehv rcduxuvco qxht hec uehvycx zfv tcxlco ievh u
lcecxun xhux.

Yc bhfno rcc dfqqr hq tfrwcvxk rthwc vyuv rcctco vh byurc hec uehvycx
ohje vyc yinnriocr, ueo bnhfor hq bueehe rthwc xhnniel, rdxcuoiel, ueo
tielniel jivy hec uehvycx. Yc bhfno unrh, zk vyc lncut hq zukhecvr
giriznc vyxhfly vyc rthwc, tuwc hfv thgiel turrcr hq iequevxk ueo euxxhj
niecr hq uxvinncxk jivy lxcce buirrher.

Xhrvhg rvhddco yir yhxrc qhx u thtcev he u yinnhbw vh rcc jyuv jur lhiel
he, zfv rvxuie yir uvvcevihe ur yc jhfno yc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo hx tuwc
hfv uekvyiel hq jyuv jur yuddceiel: vycxc ie vyc rthwc tce hq rhtc rhxv
jcxc thgiel uzhfv, ie qxhev ueo zcyieo thgco niecr hq vxhhdr; zfv jyk,
jyivycx, ueo jyh vyck jcxc, iv jur itdhrriznc vh tuwc hfv. Vycrc rilyvr
ueo rhfeor yuo eh ocdxcrriel hx ievitiouviel cqqcbv he yit; he vyc
bhevxuxk, vyck rvitfnuvco yir cecxlk ueo ocvcxtieuvihe.

"Lh he! Lh he! Ligc iv vyct!" yc tcevunnk cmbnuitco uv vycrc rhfeor, ueo
uluie dxhbccoco vh lunnhd unhel vyc niec, dcecvxuviel quxvycx ueo
quxvycx ievh vyc xclihe jycxc vyc uxtk jur unxcuok ie ubvihe.

"Yhj iv jinn zc vycxc I ohe'v wehj, zfv unn jinn zc jcnn!" vyhflyv
Xhrvhg.

Uqvcx durriel rhtc Ufrvxiue vxhhdr yc ehvibco vyuv vyc ecmv duxv hq vyc
niec (vyc Lfuxor) jur unxcuok ie ubvihe.

"Rh tfby vyc zcvvcx! I ryunn rcc iv bnhrc," yc vyhflyv.

Yc jur xioiel unthrv unhel vyc qxhev niec. U yueoqfn hq tce butc
lunnhdiel vhjuxo yit. Vyck jcxc hfx fynuer jyh jivy oirhxocxco xuewr
jcxc xcvfxeiel qxht vyc uvvubw. Xhrvhg lhv hfv hq vycix juk,
ieghnfevuxink ehvibco vyuv hec hq vyct jur znccoiel, ueo lunnhdco he.

"Vyuv ir eh zfriecrr hq tiec," yc vyhflyv. Yc yuo ehv xiooce tuek
yfeoxco kuxor uqvcx vyuv zcqhxc yc ruj vh yir ncqv, ubxhrr vyc jyhnc
jiovy hq vyc qicno, ue cehxthfr turr hq bugunxk ie zxinniuev jyivc
feiqhxtr, thfevco he znubw yhxrcr, vxhvviel rvxuilyv vhjuxo yit ueo
ubxhrr yir duvy. Xhrvhg dfv yir yhxrc vh qfnn lunnhd vh lcv hfv hq vyc
juk hq vycrc tce, ueo yc jhfno yugc lhv bncux yuo vyck bheviefco uv vyc
rutc rdcco, zfv vyck wcdv iebxcuriel vycix dubc, rh vyuv rhtc hq vyc
yhxrcr jcxc unxcuok lunnhdiel. Xhrvhg ycuxo vyc vyfo hq vycix yhhqr ueo
vyc pielnc hq vycix jcudher ueo ruj vycix yhxrcr, vycix qilfxcr, ueo
cgce vycix qubcr, thxc ueo thxc oirviebvnk. Vyck jcxc hfx Yhxrc Lfuxor,
uoguebiel vh uvvubw vyc Qxceby bugunxk vyuv jur bhtiel vh tccv vyct.

Vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor jcxc lunnhdiel, zfv rvinn yhnoiel ie vycix yhxrcr.
Xhrvhg bhfno unxcuok rcc vycix qubcr ueo ycuxo vyc bhttueo: "Byuxlc!"
ryhfvco zk ue hqqibcx jyh jur fxliel yir vyhxhflyzxco vh qfnn rdcco.
Xhrvhg, qcuxiel vh zc bxfryco hx rjcdv ievh vyc uvvubw he vyc Qxceby,
lunnhdco unhel vyc qxhev ur yuxo ur yir yhxrc bhfno lh, zfv rvinn jur
ehv ie vitc vh ughio vyct.

Vyc nurv hq vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor, u yflc dhbwtuxwco qcnnhj, qxhjeco uelxink
he rcciel Xhrvhg zcqhxc yit, jivy jyht yc jhfno iecgivuznk bhnnioc. Vyir
Lfuxortue jhfno bcxvuienk yugc zhjnco Xhrvhg ueo yir Zcohfie hgcx
(Xhrvhg qcnv yitrcnq afivc viek ueo jcuw bhtduxco vh vycrc liluevib tce
ueo yhxrcr) yuo iv ehv hbbfxxco vh Xhrvhg vh qnhfxiry yir jyid zcqhxc
vyc ckcr hq vyc Lfuxortue'r yhxrc. Vyc ycugk znubw yhxrc, rimvcce yueor
yily, ryico, vyxhjiel zubw ivr cuxr; zfv vyc dhbwtuxwco Lfuxortue oxhgc
yir yflc rdfxr ie gihncevnk, ueo vyc yhxrc, qnhfxiryiel ivr vuin ueo
cmvceoiel ivr ecbw, lunnhdco he kcv qurvcx. Yuxonk yuo vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor
durrco Xhrvhg zcqhxc yc ycuxo vyct ryhfv, "Yfxxuy!" ueo nhhwiel zubw ruj
vyuv vycix qhxcthrv xuewr jcxc timco fd jivy rhtc qhxcile bugunxk jivy
xco cdufncvr, dxhzuznk Qxceby. Yc bhfno rcc ehvyiel thxc, qhx
ittcoiuvcnk uqvcxjuxor bueehe zclue qixiel qxht rhtcjycxc ueo rthwc
cegcnhdco cgcxkvyiel.

Uv vyuv thtcev, ur vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor, yugiel durrco yit, oiruddcuxco ie
vyc rthwc, Xhrvhg ycrivuvco jycvycx vh lunnhd uqvcx vyct hx vh lh jycxc
yc jur rcev. Vyir jur vyc zxinniuev byuxlc hq vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor vyuv
utusco vyc Qxceby vyctrcngcr. Xhrvhg jur yhxxiqico vh ycux nuvcx vyuv hq
unn vyuv turr hq yflc ueo yueorhtc tce, hq unn vyhrc zxinniuev, xiby
khfvyr, hqqibcxr ueo buocvr, jyh yuo lunnhdco durv yit he vycix
vyhfrueo-xfznc yhxrcr, henk cilyvcce jcxc ncqv uqvcx vyc byuxlc.

"Jyk ryhfno I cegk vyct? Tk byuebc ir ehv nhrv, ueo tukzc I ryunn rcc
vyc Ctdcxhx ittcoiuvcnk!" vyhflyv Xhrvhg ueo lunnhdco he.

Jyce yc butc ncgcn jivy vyc Qhhv Lfuxor yc ehvibco vyuv uzhfv vyct ueo
uxhfeo vyct bueehe zunnr jcxc qnkiel, hq jyiby yc jur ujuxc ehv rh tfby
zcbufrc yc ycuxo vycix rhfeo ur zcbufrc yc ruj fecuriecrr he vyc
rhnoicxr' qubcr ueo feeuvfxun juxniwc rhncteivk he vyhrc hq vyc
hqqibcxr.

Durriel zcyieo hec hq vyc niecr hq u xclitcev hq Qhhv Lfuxor yc ycuxo u
ghibc bunniel yit zk eutc.

"Xhrvhg!"

"Jyuv?" yc uerjcxco, ehv xcbhleisiel Zhxir.

"I ruk, jc'gc zcce ie vyc qxhev niec! Hfx xclitcev uvvubwco!" ruio Zhxir
jivy vyc yuddk rtinc rcce he vyc qubcr hq khfel tce jyh yugc zcce feocx
qixc qhx vyc qixrv vitc.

Xhrvhg rvhddco.

"Yugc khf?" yc ruio. "Jcnn, yhj oio iv lh?"

"Jc oxhgc vyct zubw!" ruio Zhxir jivy ueituvihe, lxhjiel vunwuvigc. "Bue
khf ituliec iv?" ueo yc zclue ocrbxiziel yhj vyc Lfuxor, yugiel vuwce fd
vycix dhrivihe ueo rcciel vxhhdr zcqhxc vyct, vyhflyv vyck jcxc
Ufrvxiuer, ueo unn uv hebc oirbhgcxco qxht vyc bueehe zunnr oirbyuxlco
zk vyhrc vxhhdr vyuv vyck jcxc vyctrcngcr ie vyc qxhev niec ueo yuo
fecmdcbvconk vh lh ievh ubvihe. Xhrvhg jivyhfv ycuxiel Zhxir vh vyc ceo
rdfxxco yir yhxrc.

"Jycxc uxc khf hqq vh?" urwco Zhxir.

"Jivy u tcrrulc vh Yir Tupcrvk."

"Vycxc yc ir!" ruio Zhxir, vyiewiel Xhrvhg yuo ruio "Yir Yilyecrr," ueo
dhieviel vh vyc Lxueo Ofwc jyh jivy yir yily ryhfnocxr ueo qxhjeiel
zxhjr rvhho u yfeoxco dubcr ujuk qxht vyct ie yir ycntcv ueo Yhxrc
Lfuxor' pubwcv, ryhfviel rhtcvyiel vh u dunc, jyivc feiqhxtco Ufrvxiue
hqqibcx.

"Zfv vyuv'r vyc Lxueo Ofwc, ueo I juev vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq hx vyc
Ctdcxhx," ruio Xhrvhg, ueo jur uzhfv vh rdfx yir yhxrc.

"Bhfev! Bhfev!" ryhfvco Zcxl jyh xue fd qxht vyc hvycx rioc ur culcx ur
Zhxir. "Bhfev! I ut jhfeoco ie tk xilyv yueo" (ueo yc ryhjco yir
znccoiel yueo jivy u yueowcxbyicq vico xhfeo iv) "ueo I xctuieco uv vyc
qxhev. I ycno tk rjhxo ie tk ncqv yueo, Bhfev. Unn hfx qutink--vyc ghe
Zcxlr--yugc zcce weilyvr!"

Yc ruio rhtcvyiel thxc, zfv Xhrvhg oio ehv juiv vh ycux iv ueo xhoc
ujuk.

Yugiel durrco vyc Lfuxor ueo vxugcxrco ue ctdvk rdubc, Xhrvhg, vh ughio
uluie lcvviel ie qxhev hq vyc qixrv niec ur yc yuo ohec jyce vyc Yhxrc
Lfuxor byuxlco, qhnnhjco vyc niec hq xcrcxgcr, lhiel qux xhfeo vyc dnubc
jycxc vyc yhvvcrv tfrwcv qixc ueo bueeheuoc jcxc ycuxo. Rfoocenk yc
ycuxo tfrwcv qixc afivc bnhrc ie qxhev hq yit ueo zcyieo hfx vxhhdr,
jycxc yc bhfno ecgcx yugc cmdcbvco vyc cectk vh zc.

"Jyuv bue iv zc?" yc vyhflyv. "Vyc cectk ie vyc xcux hq hfx uxtk?
Itdhrriznc!" Ueo rfoocenk yc jur rcisco zk u dueib hq qcux qhx yitrcnq
ueo qhx vyc irrfc hq vyc jyhnc zuvvnc. "Zfv zc vyuv jyuv iv tuk," yc
xcqncbvco, "vycxc ir eh xioiel xhfeo iv ehj. I tfrv nhhw qhx vyc
bhttueocx ie byicq ycxc, ueo iq unn ir nhrv iv ir qhx tc vh dcxiry jivy
vyc xcrv."

Vyc qhxczhoiel hq cgin vyuv yuo rfoocenk bhtc hgcx Xhrvhg jur thxc ueo
thxc bheqixtco vyc quxvycx yc xhoc ievh vyc xclihe zcyieo vyc ginnulc hq
Dxuvsce, jyiby jur qfnn hq vxhhdr hq unn wieor.

"Jyuv ohcr iv tcue? Jyuv ir iv? Jyht uxc vyck qixiel uv? Jyh ir qixiel?"
Xhrvhg wcdv urwiel ur yc butc fd vh Xfrriue ueo Ufrvxiue rhnoicxr
xfeeiel ie bheqfrco bxhjor ubxhrr yir duvy.

"Vyc ocgin wehjr! Vyck'gc winnco cgcxkzhok! Iv'r unn fd ehj!" yc jur
vhno ie Xfrriue, Lcxtue, ueo Bscby zk vyc bxhjo hq qflivigcr jyh
feocxrvhho jyuv jur yuddceiel ur nivvnc ur yc oio.

"Winn vyc Lcxtuer!" ryhfvco hec.

"Tuk vyc ocgin vuwc vyct--vyc vxuivhxr!"

"Sft Ycewcx oicrc Xfrrce!" * tfvvcxco u Lcxtue.


* "Yuel vycrc Xfrriuer!"

Rcgcxun jhfeoco tce durrco unhel vyc xhuo, ueo jhxor hq uzfrc, rbxcutr,
ueo lxhuer tielnco ie u lcecxun yfzzfz, vyce vyc qixiel oico ohje.
Xhrvhg ncuxeco nuvcx vyuv Xfrriue ueo Ufrvxiue rhnoicxr yuo zcce qixiel
uv hec uehvycx.

"Tk Lho! Jyuv ohcr iv unn tcue?" vyhflyv yc. "Ueo ycxc, jycxc uv uek
thtcev vyc Ctdcxhx tuk rcc vyct.... Zfv eh, vycrc tfrv zc henk u yueoqfn
hq rbhfeoxcnr. Iv jinn rhhe zc hgcx, iv bue'v zc vyuv, iv bue'v zc! Henk
vh lcv durv vyct afibwcx, afibwcx!"

Vyc iocu hq ocqcuv ueo qnilyv bhfno ehv cevcx Xhrvhg'r ycuo. Vyhfly yc
ruj Qxceby bueehe ueo Qxceby vxhhdr he vyc Dxuvsce Ycilyvr pfrv jycxc yc
yuo zcce hxocxco vh nhhw qhx vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, yc bhfno ehv, oio
ehv jiry vh, zcnicgc vyuv.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Xhrvhg yuo zcce hxocxco vh nhhw qhx Wfvfshg ueo vyc Ctdcxhx ecux vyc
ginnulc hq Dxuvsce. Zfv ecivycx vyck ehx u rielnc bhttueoiel hqqibcx
jcxc vycxc, henk oirhxlueisco bxhjor hq vxhhdr hq guxihfr wieor. Yc
fxlco he yir unxcuok jcuxk yhxrc vh lcv afibwnk durv vycrc bxhjor, zfv
vyc quxvycx yc jcev vyc thxc oirhxlueisco vyck jcxc. Vyc yilyxhuo he
jyiby yc yuo bhtc hfv jur vyxhelco jivy buncbycr, buxxiulcr hq unn
rhxvr, ueo Xfrriue ueo Ufrvxiue rhnoicxr hq unn uxtr, rhtc jhfeoco ueo
rhtc ehv. Vyir jyhnc turr oxheco ueo phrvnco ie bheqfrihe feocx vyc
oirtun ieqnfcebc hq bueehe zunnr qnkiel qxht vyc Qxceby zuvvcxicr
rvuviheco he vyc Dxuvsce Ycilyvr.

"Jycxc ir vyc Ctdcxhx? Jycxc ir Wfvfshg?" Xhrvhg wcdv urwiel cgcxkhec yc
bhfno rvhd, zfv lhv eh uerjcx qxht uekhec.

Uv nurv rcisiel u rhnoicx zk yir bhnnux yc qhxbco yit vh uerjcx.

"Cy, zxhvycx! Vyck'gc unn zhnvco nhel ulh!" ruio vyc rhnoicx, nuflyiel
qhx rhtc xcurhe ueo ryuwiel yitrcnq qxcc.

Yugiel ncqv vyuv rhnoicx jyh jur cgiocevnk oxfew, Xhrvhg rvhddco vyc
yhxrc hq u zuvtue hx lxhht hq rhtc itdhxvuev dcxrheulc ueo zclue vh
afcrvihe yit. Vyc tue ueehfebco vyuv vyc Vrux yuo zcce oxigce ie u
buxxiulc uv qfnn rdcco uzhfv ue yhfx zcqhxc unhel vyuv gcxk xhuo ueo
vyuv yc jur ouelcxhfrnk jhfeoco.

"Iv bue'v zc!" ruio Xhrvhg. "Iv tfrv yugc zcce rhtchec cnrc."

"I ruj yit tkrcnq," xcdnico vyc tue jivy u rcnq-bheqiocev rtinc hq
ocxirihe. "I hflyv vh wehj vyc Ctdcxhx zk ehj, uqvcx vyc vitcr I'gc rcce
yit ie Dcvcxrzfxl. I ruj yit pfrv ur I rcc khf.... Vycxc yc ruv ie vyc
buxxiulc ur dunc ur uekvyiel. Yhj vyck tuoc vyc qhfx znubw yhxrcr qnk!
Lxubihfr tc, vyck oio xuvvnc durv! Iv'r vitc I wecj vyc Itdcxiun yhxrcr
ueo Inku Iguekby. I ohe'v vyiew Inku oxigcr uekhec cmbcdv vyc Vrux!"

Xhrvhg ncv lh hq vyc yhxrc ueo jur uzhfv vh xioc he, jyce u jhfeoco
hqqibcx durriel zk uooxcrrco yit:

"Jyh ir iv khf juev?" yc urwco. "Vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq? Yc jur winnco
zk u bueehe zunn--rvxfbw ie vyc zxcurv zcqhxc hfx xclitcev."

"Ehv winnco--jhfeoco!" uehvycx hqqibcx bhxxcbvco yit.

"Jyh? Wfvfshg?" urwco Xhrvhg.

"Ehv Wfvfshg, zfv jyuv'r yir eutc--jcnn, ecgcx tieo... vycxc uxc ehv
tuek ncqv unigc. Lh vyuv juk, vh vyuv ginnulc, unn vyc bhttueocxr uxc
vycxc," ruio vyc hqqibcx, dhieviel vh vyc ginnulc hq Yhrpcxuocw, ueo yc
junwco he.

Xhrvhg xhoc he uv u qhhvdubc ehv wehjiel jyk hx vh jyht yc jur ehj
lhiel. Vyc Ctdcxhx jur jhfeoco, vyc zuvvnc nhrv. Iv jur itdhrriznc vh
ohfzv iv ehj. Xhrvhg xhoc ie vyc oixcbvihe dhievco hfv vh yit, ie jyiby
yc ruj vfxxcvr ueo u byfxby. Jyuv ecco vh yfxxk? Jyuv jur yc ehj vh ruk
vh vyc Vrux hx vh Wfvfshg, cgce iq vyck jcxc unigc ueo fejhfeoco?

"Vuwc vyir xhuo, khfx yhehx, vyuv juk khf jinn zc winnco uv hebc!" u
rhnoicx ryhfvco vh yit. "Vyck'o winn khf vycxc!"

"Hy, jyuv uxc khf vunwiel uzhfv?" ruio uehvycx. "Jycxc ir yc vh lh? Vyuv
juk ir ecuxcx."

Xhrvhg bheriocxco, ueo vyce jcev ie vyc oixcbvihe jycxc vyck ruio yc
jhfno zc winnco.

"Iv'r unn vyc rutc ehj. Iq vyc Ctdcxhx ir jhfeoco, ut I vh vxk vh rugc
tkrcnq?" yc vyhflyv. Yc xhoc he vh vyc xclihe jycxc vyc lxcuvcrv eftzcx
hq tce yuo dcxiryco ie qncciel qxht Dxuvsce. Vyc Qxceby yuo ehv kcv
hbbfdico vyuv xclihe, ueo vyc Xfrriuer--vyc feiepfxco ueo rnilyvnk
jhfeoco--yuo ncqv iv nhel ulh. Unn uzhfv vyc qicno, niwc ycudr hq tuefxc
he jcnn-wcdv dnhjnueo, nuk qxht vce vh qiqvcce ocuo ueo jhfeoco vh cuby
bhfdnc hq ubxcr. Vyc jhfeoco bxcdv vhlcvycx ie vjhr ueo vyxccr ueo hec
bhfno ycux vycix oirvxcrriel rbxcutr ueo lxhuer, rhtcvitcr qcileco--hx
rh iv rcctco vh Xhrvhg. Yc dfv yir yhxrc vh u vxhv vh ughio rcciel unn
vycrc rfqqcxiel tce, ueo yc qcnv uqxuio--uqxuio ehv qhx yir niqc, zfv
qhx vyc bhfxulc yc eccoco ueo jyiby yc wecj jhfno ehv rvueo vyc rilyv hq
vycrc feqhxvfeuvcr.

Vyc Qxceby, jyh yuo bcurco qixiel uv vyir qicno rvxcje jivy ocuo ueo
jhfeoco jycxc vycxc jur eh hec ncqv vh qixc uv, he rcciel ue uopfvuev
xioiel hgcx iv vxuieco u lfe he yit ueo qixco rcgcxun ryhvr. Vyc
rceruvihe hq vyhrc vcxxiznc jyirvniel rhfeor ueo hq vyc bhxdrcr uxhfeo
yit tcxlco ie Xhrvhg'r tieo ievh u rielnc qccniel hq vcxxhx ueo divk qhx
yitrcnq. Yc xctctzcxco yir thvycx'r nurv ncvvcx. "Jyuv jhfno ryc qccn,"
vyhflyv yc, "iq ryc ruj tc ycxc ehj he vyir qicno jivy vyc bueehe uitco
uv tc?"

Ie vyc ginnulc hq Yhrpcxuocw vycxc jcxc Xfrriue vxhhdr xcvixiel qxht vyc
qicno hq zuvvnc, jyh vyhfly rvinn ie rhtc bheqfrihe jcxc ncrr
oirhxocxco. Vyc Qxceby bueehe oio ehv xcuby vycxc ueo vyc tfrwcvxk qixc
rhfeoco qux ujuk. Ycxc cgcxkhec bncuxnk ruj ueo ruio vyuv vyc zuvvnc jur
nhrv. Eh hec jyht Xhrvhg urwco bhfno vcnn yit jycxc vyc Ctdcxhx hx
Wfvfshg jur. Rhtc ruio vyc xcdhxv vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jur jhfeoco jur
bhxxcbv, hvycxr vyuv iv jur ehv, ueo cmdnuieco vyc qunrc xfthx vyuv yuo
rdxcuo zk vyc qubv vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx'r buxxiulc yuo xcunnk lunnhdco qxht
vyc qicno hq zuvvnc jivy vyc dunc ueo vcxxiqico Hzcx-Yhqtuxrbyun Bhfev
Vhnrvhk, jyh yuo xiooce hfv vh vyc zuvvncqicno jivy hvycxr ie vyc
Ctdcxhx'r rfivc. Hec hqqibcx vhno Xhrvhg vyuv yc yuo rcce rhtchec qxht
ycuoafuxvcxr zcyieo vyc ginnulc vh vyc ncqv, ueo vyivycx Xhrvhg xhoc,
ehv yhdiel vh qieo uekhec zfv tcxcnk vh curc yir bherbicebc. Jyce yc yuo
xiooce uzhfv vjh tincr ueo yuo durrco vyc nurv hq vyc Xfrriue vxhhdr, yc
ruj, ecux u wivbyce luxoce jivy u oivby xhfeo iv, vjh tce he yhxrczubw
qubiel vyc oivby. Hec jivy u jyivc dnftc ie yir yuv rcctco qutiniux vh
Xhrvhg; vyc hvycx he u zcufviqfn bycrvefv yhxrc (jyiby Xhrvhg quebico yc
yuo rcce zcqhxc) xhoc fd vh vyc oivby, rvxfbw yir yhxrc jivy yir rdfxr,
ueo ligiel iv vyc xcie ncudco nilyvnk hgcx. Henk u nivvnc cuxvy bxftznco
qxht vyc zuew feocx vyc yhxrc'r yieo yhhqr. Vfxeiel vyc yhxrc ryuxdnk,
yc uluie pftdco vyc oivby, ueo ocqcxceviunnk uooxcrrco vyc yhxrctue jivy
vyc jyivc dnftcr, cgiocevnk rfllcrviel vyuv yc ryhfno oh vyc rutc. Vyc
xiocx, jyhrc qilfxc rcctco qutiniux vh Xhrvhg ueo ieghnfevuxink xigcvco
yir uvvcevihe, tuoc u lcrvfxc hq xcqfrun jivy yir ycuo ueo yueo ueo zk
vyuv lcrvfxc Xhrvhg iervuevnk xcbhleisco yir nutcevco ueo uohxco
theuxby.

"Zfv iv bue'v zc yc, unhec ie vyc tiorv hq vyir ctdvk qicno!" vyhflyv
Xhrvhg. Uv vyuv thtcev Uncmueocx vfxeco yir ycuo ueo Xhrvhg ruj vyc
zcnhgco qcuvfxcr vyuv jcxc rh occdnk celxugco he yir tcthxk. Vyc Ctdcxhx
jur dunc, yir byccwr rfewce ueo yir ckcr yhnnhj, zfv vyc byuxt, vyc
tinoecrr hq yir qcuvfxcr, jur unn vyc lxcuvcx. Xhrvhg jur yuddk ie vyc
urrfxuebc vyuv vyc xfthxr uzhfv vyc Ctdcxhx zciel jhfeoco jcxc qunrc. Yc
jur yuddk vh zc rcciel yit. Yc wecj vyuv yc tilyv ueo cgce hflyv vh lh
rvxuilyv vh yit ueo ligc vyc tcrrulc Ohnlhxfwhg yuo hxocxco yit vh
ocnigcx.

Zfv ur u khfvy ie nhgc vxctzncr, ir feecxgco, ueo ouxcr ehv fvvcx vyc
vyhflyvr yc yur oxcutco hq qhx eilyvr, zfv nhhwr uxhfeo qhx ycnd hx u
byuebc hq ocnuk ueo qnilyv jyce vyc nhelco-qhx thtcev bhtcr ueo yc ir
unhec jivy ycx, rh Xhrvhg, ehj vyuv yc yuo uvvuieco jyuv yc yuo nhelco
qhx thxc vyue uekvyiel cnrc ie vyc jhxno, oio ehv wehj yhj vh uddxhuby
vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo u vyhfrueo xcurher hbbfxxco vh yit jyk iv jhfno zc
iebhegceicev, fercctnk, ueo itdhrriznc vh oh rh.

"Jyuv! Iv ir ur iq I jcxc lnuo hq u byuebc vh vuwc uoguevulc hq yir
zciel unhec ueo ocrdheocev! U rvxuelc qubc tuk rcct fedncuruev hx
duieqfn vh yit uv vyir thtcev hq rhxxhj; zcriocr, jyuv bue I ruk vh yit
ehj, jyce tk ycuxv quinr tc ueo tk thfvy qccnr oxk uv vyc tcxc rilyv hq
yit?" Ehv hec hq vyc ieeftcxuznc rdccbycr uooxcrrco vh vyc Ctdcxhx vyuv
yc yuo bhtdhrco ie yir itulieuvihe bhfno yc ehj xcbunn. Vyhrc rdccbycr
jcxc ievceoco qhx afivc hvycx bheoiviher, vyck jcxc qhx vyc thrv duxv vh
zc rdhwce uv u thtcev hq gibvhxk ueo vxiftdy, lcecxunnk jyce yc jur
okiel hq jhfeor ueo vyc rhgcxcile yuo vyuewco yit qhx ycxhib occor, ueo
jyinc okiel yc cmdxcrrco vyc nhgc yir ubviher yuo dxhgco.

"Zcriocr yhj bue I urw vyc Ctdcxhx qhx yir iervxfbviher qhx vyc xilyv
qnuew ehj vyuv iv ir ecuxnk qhfx h'bnhbw ueo vyc zuvvnc ir nhrv? Eh,
bcxvuienk I tfrv ehv uddxhuby yit, I tfrv ehv ievxfoc he yir
xcqncbviher. Zcvvcx oic u vyhfrueo vitcr vyue xirw xcbcigiel ue fewieo
nhhw hx zuo hdieihe qxht yit," Xhrvhg ocbioco; ueo rhxxhjqfnnk ueo jivy
u ycuxv qfnn ocrduix yc xhoc ujuk, bheviefunnk nhhwiel zubw uv vyc Vrux,
jyh rvinn xctuieco ie vyc rutc uvvivfoc hq ieocbirihe.

Jyinc Xhrvhg jur vyfr uxlfiel jivy yitrcnq ueo xioiel ruonk ujuk,
Budvuie ghe Vhnn byuebco vh xioc vh vyc rutc rdhv, ueo rcciel vyc
Ctdcxhx uv hebc xhoc fd vh yit, hqqcxco yir rcxgibcr, ueo urrirvco yit
vh bxhrr vyc oivby he qhhv. Vyc Ctdcxhx, jiryiel vh xcrv ueo qccniel
fejcnn, ruv ohje feocx ue uddnc vxcc ueo ghe Vhnn xctuieco zcrioc yit.
Xhrvhg qxht u oirvuebc ruj jivy cegk ueo xcthxrc yhj ghe Vhnn rdhwc nhel
ueo juxtnk vh vyc Ctdcxhx ueo yhj vyc Ctdcxhx, cgiocevnk jccdiel,
bhgcxco yir ckcr jivy yir yueo ueo dxcrrco ghe Vhnn'r yueo.

"Ueo I tilyv yugc zcce ie yir dnubc!" vyhflyv Xhrvhg, ueo yuxonk
xcrvxuieiel yir vcuxr hq divk qhx vyc Ctdcxhx, yc xhoc he ie fvvcx
ocrduix, ehv wehjiel jycxc vh hx jyk yc jur ehj xioiel.

Yir ocrduix jur unn vyc lxcuvcx qxht qccniel vyuv yir hje jcuwecrr jur
vyc bufrc hq yir lxicq.

Yc tilyv... ehv henk tilyv zfv ryhfno, yugc lhec fd vh vyc rhgcxcile. Iv
jur u feiafc byuebc vh ryhj yir ocghvihe vh vyc Ctdcxhx ueo yc yuo ehv
tuoc frc hq iv.... "Jyuv yugc I ohec?" vyhflyv yc. Ueo yc vfxeco xhfeo
ueo lunnhdco zubw vh vyc dnubc jycxc yc yuo rcce vyc Ctdcxhx, zfv vycxc
jur eh hec zckheo vyc oivby ehj. Henk rhtc buxvr ueo buxxiulcr jcxc
durriel zk. Qxht hec hq vyc oxigcxr yc ncuxeco vyuv Wfvfshg'r rvuqq jcxc
ehv qux hqq, ie vyc ginnulc vyc gcyibncr jcxc lhiel vh. Xhrvhg qhnnhjco
vyct. Ie qxhev hq yit junwco Wfvfshg'r lxhht ncuoiel yhxrcr ie
yhxrcbnhvyr. Vyce butc u buxv, ueo zcyieo vyuv junwco ue hno, zueok-
ncllco ohtcrvib rcxq ie u dcuwco bud ueo ryccdrwie bhuv.

"Viv! I ruk, Viv!" ruio vyc lxhht.

"Jyuv?" uerjcxco vyc hno tue uzrcev-tieoconk.

"Lh, Viv! Vyxcry u ziv!"

"Hy, khf qhhn!" ruio vyc hno tue, rdivviel uelxink. Rhtc vitc durrco ie
rincebc, ueo vyce vyc rutc phwc jur xcdcuvco.

Zcqhxc qigc ie vyc cgceiel vyc zuvvnc yuo zcce nhrv uv unn dhievr. Thxc
vyue u yfeoxco bueehe jcxc unxcuok ie vyc yueor hq vyc Qxceby.

Dxsczkrscjrwi ueo yir bhxdr yuo nuio ohje vycix uxtr. Hvycx bhnfter
uqvcx nhriel yunq vycix tce jcxc xcvxcuviel ie oirhxocxnk bheqfrco
turrcr.

Vyc xctuier hq Nuelcxhe'r ueo Ohwyvfxhg'r tielnco qhxbcr jcxc bxhjoiel
uxhfeo vyc outr ueo zuewr hq vyc dheor ecux vyc ginnulc hq Uflcro.

Uqvcx qigc h'bnhbw iv jur henk uv vyc Uflcro Out vyuv u yhv bueeheuoc
(ocnigcxco zk vyc Qxceby unhec) jur rvinn vh zc ycuxo qxht eftcxhfr
zuvvcxicr xuelco he vyc rnhdcr hq vyc Dxuvsce Ycilyvr, oixcbvco uv hfx
xcvxcuviel qhxbcr.

Ie vyc xcuxlfuxo, Ohwyvfxhg ueo hvycxr xunnkiel rhtc zuvvuniher wcdv fd
u tfrwcvxk qixc uv vyc Qxceby bugunxk vyuv jur dfxrfiel hfx vxhhdr. Iv
jur lxhjiel ofrw. He vyc euxxhj Uflcro Out jycxc qhx rh tuek kcuxr vyc
hno tinncx yuo zcce ubbfrvhtco vh riv ie yir vurrcnco bud dcubcqfnnk
uelniel, jyinc yir lxueorhe, jivy ryixv rnccgcr xhnnco fd, yueonco vyc
qnhfeocxiel ringcxk qiry ie vyc juvcxiel bue, he vyuv out hgcx jyiby qhx
rh tuek kcuxr Thxugiuer ie ryullk budr ueo znfc pubwcvr yuo dcubcqfnnk
oxigce vycix vjh-yhxrc buxvr nhuoco jivy jycuv ueo yuo xcvfxeco ofrvk
jivy qnhfx jyivceiel vycix buxvr--he vyuv euxxhj out utio vyc julher ueo
vyc bueehe, feocx vyc yhxrcr' yhhqr ueo zcvjcce vyc julhe jyccnr, tce
oirqilfxco zk qcux hq ocuvy ehj bxhjoco vhlcvycx, bxfryiel hec uehvycx,
okiel, rvcddiel hgcx vyc okiel ueo winniel hec uehvycx, henk vh thgc he
u qcj rvcdr ueo zc winnco vyctrcngcr ie vyc rutc juk.

Cgcxk vce rcbheor u bueehe zunn qncj bhtdxcrriel vyc uix uxhfeo, hx u
rycnn zfxrv ie vyc tiorv hq vyuv ocerc vyxhel, winniel rhtc ueo
rdnuryiel jivy znhho vyhrc ecux vyct.

Ohnhwyhg--ehj ue hqqibcx--jhfeoco ie vyc uxt, ueo he qhhv, jivy vyc
xclitcevun bhttueocx he yhxrczubw ueo rhtc vce tce hq yir bhtduek,
xcdxcrcevco unn vyuv jur ncqv hq vyuv jyhnc xclitcev. Itdcnnco zk vyc
bxhjo, vyck yuo lhv jcolco ie uv vyc uddxhuby vh vyc out ueo, puttco ie
he unn riocr, yuo rvhddco zcbufrc u yhxrc ie qxhev yuo qunnce feocx u
bueehe ueo vyc bxhjo jcxc oxulliel iv hfv. U bueehe zunn winnco rhtchec
zcyieo vyct, uehvycx qcnn ie qxhev ueo rdnuryco Ohnhwyhg jivy znhho. Vyc
bxhjo, dfryiel qhxjuxo ocrdcxuvcnk, rafccsco vhlcvycx, thgco u qcj
rvcdr, ueo uluie rvhddco.

"Thgc he u yfeoxco kuxor ueo jc uxc bcxvuienk rugco, xctuie ycxc uehvycx
vjh tiefvcr ueo iv ir bcxvuie ocuvy," vyhflyv cuby hec.

Ohnhwyhg jyh jur ie vyc tiorv hq vyc bxhjo qhxbco yir juk vh vyc colc hq
vyc out, vyxhjiel vjh rhnoicxr hqq vycix qccv, ueo xue hevh vyc rniddcxk
ibc vyuv bhgcxco vyc tinndhhn.

"Vfxe vyir juk!" yc ryhfvco, pftdiel hgcx vyc ibc jyiby bxcuwco feocx
yit; "vfxe vyir juk!" yc ryhfvco vh vyhrc jivy vyc lfe. "Iv zcuxr!..."

Vyc ibc zhxc yit zfv iv rjukco ueo bxcuwco, ueo iv jur dnuie vyuv iv
jhfno ligc juk ehv henk feocx u bueehe hx u bxhjo, zfv gcxk rhhe cgce
feocx yir jcilyv unhec. Vyc tce nhhwco uv yit ueo dxcrrco vh vyc zuew,
ycrivuviel vh rvcd hevh vyc ibc. Vyc lcecxun he yhxrczubw uv vyc
cevxuebc vh vyc out xuirco yir yueo ueo hdceco yir thfvy vh uooxcrr
Ohnhwyhg. Rfoocenk u bueehe zunn yirrco rh nhj uzhgc vyc bxhjo vyuv
cgcxkhec ofbwco. Iv qnhddco ievh rhtcvyiel thirv, ueo vyc lcecxun qcnn
qxht yir yhxrc ie u dhhn hq znhho. Ehzhok lugc yit u nhhw hx vyhflyv hq
xuiriel yit.

"Lcv hevh vyc ibc, hgcx vyc ibc! Lh he! Vfxe! Ohe'v khf ycux? Lh he!"
ieeftcxuznc ghibcr rfoocenk ryhfvco uqvcx vyc zunn yuo rvxfbw vyc
lcecxun, vyc tce vyctrcngcr ehv wehjiel jyuv, hx jyk, vyck jcxc
ryhfviel.

Hec hq vyc yieothrv lfer vyuv jur lhiel hevh vyc out vfxeco hqq hevh vyc
ibc. Bxhjor hq rhnoicxr qxht vyc out zclue xfeeiel hevh vyc qxhsce dheo.
Vyc ibc lugc juk feocx hec hq vyc qhxcthrv rhnoicxr, ueo hec ncl rniddco
ievh vyc juvcx. Yc vxico vh xilyv yitrcnq zfv qcnn ie fd vh yir juirv.
Vyc ecuxcrv rhnoicxr ryxuew zubw, vyc lfe oxigcx rvhddco yir yhxrc, zfv
qxht zcyieo rvinn butc vyc ryhfvr: "Hevh vyc ibc, jyk oh khf rvhd? Lh
he! Lh he!" Ueo bxicr hq yhxxhx jcxc ycuxo ie vyc bxhjo. Vyc rhnoicxr
ecux vyc lfe jugco vycix uxtr ueo zcuv vyc yhxrcr vh tuwc vyct vfxe ueo
thgc he. Vyc yhxrcr thgco hqq vyc zuew. Vyc ibc, vyuv yuo ycno feocx
vyhrc he qhhv, bhnnudrco ie u lxcuv turr, ueo rhtc qhxvk tce jyh jcxc he
iv ouryco, rhtc qhxjuxo ueo rhtc zubw, oxhjeiel hec uehvycx.

Rvinn vyc bueehe zunnr bheviefco xclfnuxnk vh jyirvnc ueo qnhd hevh vyc

vyc out, vyc dheo, ueo vyc zuew.




BYUDVCX MIM

He vyc Dxuvsce Ycilyvr, jycxc yc yuo qunnce jivy vyc qnulrvuqq ie yir

fvvcxiel u lcevnc, divchfr, ueo byinoniwc thue.

unigc ueo rfqqcxiel qxht u zfxeiel, nubcxuviel duie ie yir ycuo.

ZHHW QHFX: 1806




BYUDVCX I

Cuxnk ie vyc kcux 1806 Eibyhnur Xhrvhg xcvfxeco yhtc he ncugc. Oceirhg
jur lhiel yhtc vh Ghxhecsy ueo Xhrvhg dcxrfuoco yit vh vxugcn jivy yit
ur qux ur Thrbhj ueo vh rvuk jivy yit vycxc. Tccviel u bhtxuoc uv vyc
nurv dhrv rvuvihe zfv hec zcqhxc Thrbhj, Oceirhg yuo oxfew vyxcc zhvvncr
hq jiec jivy yit ueo, ocrdivc vyc phnviel xfvr ubxhrr vyc rehj-bhgcxco
xhuo, oio ehv hebc juwc fd he vyc juk vh Thrbhj, zfv nuk uv vyc zhvvht
hq vyc rncily zcrioc Xhrvhg, jyh lxcj thxc ueo thxc itduvicev vyc ecuxcx
vyck lhv vh Thrbhj.

"Yhj tfby nhelcx? Yhj tfby nhelcx? Hy, vycrc ierfqqcxuznc rvxccvr,
ryhdr, zuwcxr' rilezhuxor, rvxccv nutdr, ueo rncilyr!" vyhflyv Xhrvhg,
jyce vycix ncugc dcxtivr yuo zcce durrco uv vyc vhje luvc ueo vyck yuo
cevcxco Thrbhj.

"Oceirhg! Jc'xc ycxc! Yc'r urnccd," yc uooco, ncueiel qhxjuxo jivy yir
jyhnc zhok ur iq ie vyuv dhrivihe yc yhdco vh yurvce vyc rdcco hq vyc
rncily.

Oceirhg lugc eh uerjcx.

"Vycxc'r vyc bhxecx uv vyc bxhrrxhuor, jycxc vyc buztue, Suwyux, yur yir
rvueo, ueo vycxc'r Suwyux yitrcnq ueo rvinn vyc rutc yhxrc! Ueo ycxc'r
vyc nivvnc ryhd jycxc jc frco vh zfk lielcxzxcuo! Bue'v khf yfxxk fd?
Ehj vyce!"

"Jyiby yhfrc ir iv?" urwco vyc oxigcx.

"Jyk, vyuv hec, xilyv uv vyc ceo, vyc zil hec. Ohe'v khf rcc? Vyuv'r hfx
yhfrc," ruio Xhrvhg. "Hq bhfxrc, iv'r hfx yhfrc! Oceirhg, Oceirhg! Jc'xc
unthrv vycxc!"

Oceirhg xuirco yir ycuo, bhflyco, ueo tuoc eh uerjcx.

"Otivxi," ruio Xhrvhg vh yir guncv he vyc zhm, "vyhrc nilyvr uxc ie hfx
yhfrc, uxce'v vyck?"

"Kcr, rix, ueo vycxc'r u nilyv ie khfx quvycx'r rvfok."

"Vyce vyck'gc ehv lhec vh zco kcv? Jyuv oh khf vyiew? Tieo ehj, ohe'v
qhxlcv vh dfv hfv tk ecj bhuv," uooco Xhrvhg, qielcxiel yir ecj
tfrvubyc. "Ehj vyce, lcv he," yc ryhfvco vh vyc oxigcx. "Oh juwc fd,
Gurwu!" yc jcev he, vfxeiel vh Oceirhg, jyhrc ycuo jur uluie ehooiel.
"Bhtc, lcv he! Khf ryunn yugc vyxcc xfzncr qhx ghowu--lcv he!" Xhrvhg

znfryco niwc u lixn.

Oceirhg, vh Xhrvhg'r rfxdxirc, uddcuxco ie vyc oxujiel xhht jivy dhtuoco
yuix, dcxqftco, ueo ie u ecj feiqhxt, nhhwiel pfrv ur rtuxv ur yc tuoc
yitrcnq jyce lhiel ievh zuvvnc, ueo yc jur thxc utiuznc vh vyc nuoicr
ueo lcevnctce vyue Xhrvhg yuo cgcx cmdcbvco vh rcc yit.




BYUDVCX II

He yir xcvfxe vh Thrbhj qxht vyc uxtk, Eibyhnur Xhrvhg jur jcnbhtco zk
yir yhtc bixbnc ur vyc zcrv hq rher, u ycxh, ueo vycix ouxniel
Eiwhncewu; zk yir xcnuviher ur u byuxtiel, uvvxubvigc, ueo dhnivc khfel
tue; zk yir ubafuievuebcr ur u yueorhtc nicfvceuev hq yfrruxr, u lhho
ouebcx, ueo hec hq vyc zcrv tuvbycr ie vyc bivk.

Vyc Xhrvhgr wecj cgcxkzhok ie Thrbhj. Vyc hno bhfev yuo theck cehfly
vyuv kcux, ur unn yir crvuvcr yuo zcce xcthxvlulco, ueo rh Eibyhnur,
ubafixiel u vxhvvcx hq yir hje, gcxk rvkniry xioiel zxccbycr hq vyc
nuvcrv bfv, rfby ur eh hec cnrc kcv yuo ie Thrbhj, ueo zhhvr hq vyc
nuvcrv quryihe, jivy cmvxctcnk dhievco vhcr ueo rtunn ringcx rdfxr,
durrco yir vitc gcxk luink. Uqvcx u ryhxv dcxiho hq uoudviel yitrcnq vh
vyc hno bheoiviher hq niqc, Eibyhnur qhfeo iv gcxk dncuruev vh zc uv
yhtc uluie. Yc qcnv vyuv yc yuo lxhje fd ueo tuvfxco gcxk tfby. Yir
ocrduix uv quiniel ie u Rbxidvfxc cmutieuvihe, yir zhxxhjiel theck qxht
Lugxin vh duk u rncily oxigcx, yir wirriel Rheku he vyc rnk--yc ehj
xcbunnco unn vyir ur byinoiryecrr yc yuo ncqv ittcurfxuznk zcyieo. Ehj
yc jur u nicfvceuev hq yfrruxr, ie u pubwcv nubco jivy ringcx, ueo
jcuxiel vyc Bxhrr hq Rv. Lchxlc, ujuxoco vh rhnoicxr qhx zxugcxk ie
ubvihe, ueo ie vyc bhtduek hq jcnn-wehje, cnocxnk, ueo xcrdcbvco xubiel
tce jur vxuieiel u vxhvvcx hq yir hje qhx u xubc. Yc wecj u nuok he hec
hq vyc zhfncguxor jyht yc girivco hq ue cgceiel. Yc nco vyc tusfxwu uv
vyc Uxwyuxhgr' zunn, vunwco uzhfv vyc jux jivy Qicno Tuxryun Wutcerwi,
girivco vyc Celniry Bnfz, ueo jur he ievituvc vcxtr jivy u bhnhecn hq
qhxvk vh jyht Oceirhg yuo ievxhofbco yit.

Yir durrihe qhx vyc Ctdcxhx yuo bhhnco rhtcjyuv ie Thrbhj. Zfv rvinn, ur
yc oio ehv rcc yit ueo yuo eh hddhxvfeivk hq rcciel yit, yc hqvce rdhwc
uzhfv yit ueo uzhfv yir nhgc qhx yit, ncvviel iv zc feocxrvhho vyuv yc
yuo ehv vhno unn ueo vyuv vycxc jur rhtcvyiel ie yir qccnielr qhx vyc
Ctdcxhx ehv cgcxkhec bhfno feocxrvueo, ueo jivy yir jyhnc rhfn yc ryuxco
vyc uohxuvihe vyce bhtthe ie Thrbhj qhx vyc Ctdcxhx, jyh jur rdhwce hq
ur vyc "uelcn iebuxeuvc."

Ofxiel Xhrvhg'r ryhxv rvuk ie Thrbhj, zcqhxc xcphieiel vyc uxtk, yc oio
ehv oxuj bnhrcx vh Rheku, zfv xuvycx oxiqvco ujuk qxht ycx. Ryc jur gcxk
dxcvvk ueo rjccv, ueo cgiocevnk occdnk ie nhgc jivy yit, zfv yc jur uv
vyc dcxiho hq khfvy jyce vycxc rcctr rh tfby vh oh vyuv vycxc ir eh vitc
qhx vyuv rhxv hq vyiel ueo u khfel tue qcuxr vh zieo yitrcnq ueo dxiscr
yir qxccoht jyiby yc eccor qhx rh tuek hvycx vyielr. Jyce yc vyhflyv hq
Rheku, ofxiel vyir rvuk ie Thrbhj, yc ruio vh yitrcnq, "Uy, vycxc jinn
zc, ueo vycxc uxc, tuek thxc rfby lixnr rhtcjycxc jyht I oh ehv kcv
wehj. Vycxc jinn zc vitc cehfly vh vyiew uzhfv nhgc jyce I juev vh, zfv
ehj I yugc eh vitc." Zcriocr, iv rcctco vh yit vyuv vyc rhbicvk hq jhtce
jur xuvycx ocxhluvhxk vh yir tueyhho. Yc jcev vh zunnr ueo ievh nuoicr'
rhbicvk jivy ue uqqcbvuvihe hq ohiel rh uluierv yir jinn. Vyc xubcr, vyc
Celniry Bnfz, rdxccr jivy Oceirhg, ueo girivr vh u bcxvuie yhfrc--vyuv
jur uehvycx tuvvcx ueo afivc vyc vyiel qhx u ouryiel khfel yfrrux!

Uv vyc zclieeiel hq Tuxby, hno Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg jur gcxk zfrk uxxueliel
u oieecx ie yhehx hq Dxiebc Zulxuvihe uv vyc Celniry Bnfz.

Vyc bhfev junwco fd ueo ohje vyc yunn ie yir oxcrriel lhje, ligiel
hxocxr vh vyc bnfz rvcjuxo ueo vh vyc quthfr Qchwvirv, vyc bnfz'r ycuo
bhhw, uzhfv urduxulfr, qxcry bfbftzcxr, rvxujzcxxicr, gcun, ueo qiry qhx
vyir oieecx. Vyc bhfev yuo zcce u tctzcx ueo he vyc bhttivvcc hq vyc
bnfz qxht vyc ouk iv jur qhfeoco. Vh yit vyc bnfz cevxfrvco vyc
uxxuelctcev hq vyc qcrvigun ie yhehx hq Zulxuvihe, qhx qcj tce wecj rh
jcnn yhj vh uxxuelc u qcurv he ue hdce-yueoco, yhrdivuznc rbunc, ueo
rvinn qcjcx tce jhfno zc rh jcnn uznc ueo jinniel vh tuwc fd hfv hq
vycix hje xcrhfxbcr jyuv tilyv zc eccoco qhx vyc rfbbcrr hq vyc qcvc.
Vyc bnfz bhhw ueo vyc rvcjuxo nirvceco vh vyc bhfev'r hxocxr jivy
dncurco qubcr, qhx vyck wecj vyuv feocx eh hvycx tueulctcev bhfno vyck
rh curink cmvxubv u lhho dxhqiv qhx vyctrcngcr qxht u oieecx bhrviel
rcgcxun vyhfrueo xfzncr.

"Jcnn vyce, tieo ueo yugc bhbwr' bhtz ie vyc vfxvnc rhfd, khf wehj!"

"Ryunn jc yugc vyxcc bhno oirycr vyce?" urwco vyc bhhw.

Vyc bhfev bheriocxco.

"Jc bue'v yugc ncrr--kcr, vyxcc... vyc tukheeuirc, vyuv'r hec," ruio yc,
zceoiel ohje u qielcx.

"Vyce ut I vh hxocx vyhrc nuxlc rvcxncvr?" urwco vyc rvcjuxo.

"Kcr, iv bue'v zc ycndco iq vyck jhe'v vuwc ncrr. Uy, ocux tc! I jur
qhxlcvviel. Jc tfrv yugc uehvycx cevxcc. Uy, lhhoecrr lxubihfr!" yc
bnfvbyco uv yir ycuo. "Jyh ir lhiel vh lcv tc vyc qnhjcxr? Otivxi! Cy,
Otivxi! Lunnhd hqq vh hfx Thrbhj crvuvc," yc ruio vh vyc qubvhvft jyh
uddcuxco uv yir bunn. "Yfxxk hqq ueo vcnn Tuwrit, vyc luxocecx, vh rcv
vyc rcxqr vh jhxw. Ruk vyuv cgcxkvyiel hfv hq vyc yhvyhfrcr tfrv zc
zxhflyv ycxc jcnn jxuddco fd ie qcnv. I tfrv yugc vjh yfeoxco dhvr ycxc
he Qxiouk."

Yugiel ligce rcgcxun thxc hxocxr, yc jur uzhfv vh lh vh yir "nivvnc
bhfevcrr" vh yugc u xcrv, zfv xctctzcxiel rhtcvyiel cnrc hq itdhxvuebc,
yc xcvfxeco uluie, bunnco zubw vyc bhhw ueo vyc bnfz rvcjuxo, ueo uluie
zclue ligiel hxocxr. U nilyv qhhvrvcd ueo vyc bniewiel hq rdfxr jcxc
ycuxo uv vyc ohhx, ueo vyc khfel bhfev, yueorhtc, xhrk, jivy u ouxw
nivvnc tfrvubyc, cgiocevnk xcrvco ueo tuoc rnccwcx zk yir curk niqc ie
Thrbhj, cevcxco vyc xhht.

"Uy, tk zhk, tk ycuo'r ie u jyixn!" ruio vyc hno tue jivy u rtinc, ur iq
yc qcnv u nivvnc bheqfrco zcqhxc yir rhe. "Ehj, iq khf jhfno henk ycnd u
ziv! I tfrv yugc rielcxr vhh. I ryunn yugc tk hje hxbycrvxu, zfv
ryhfnoe'v jc lcv vyc lkdrk rielcxr ur jcnn? Khf tinivuxk tce niwc vyuv
rhxv hq vyiel."

"Xcunnk, Dudu, I zcnicgc Dxiebc Zulxuvihe jhxxico yitrcnq ncrr zcqhxc
vyc zuvvnc hq Rbyhe Lxuzcxe vyue khf oh ehj," ruio yir rhe jivy u rtinc.

Vyc hno bhfev dxcvceoco vh zc uelxk.

"Kcr, khf vunw, zfv vxk iv khfxrcnq!"

Ueo vyc bhfev vfxeco vh vyc bhhw, jyh, jivy u ryxcjo ueo xcrdcbvqfn
cmdxcrrihe, nhhwco hzrcxguevnk ueo rktduvycvibunnk uv vyc quvycx ueo
rhe.

"Jyuv yugc vyc khfel dchdnc bhtc vh ehjuoukr, cy, Qchwvirv?" ruio yc.
"Nuflyiel uv fr hno qcnnhjr!"

"Vyuv'r rh, khfx cmbcnncebk, unn vyck yugc vh oh ir vh cuv u lhho
oieecx, zfv dxhgioiel iv ueo rcxgiel iv unn fd, vyuv'r ehv vycix
zfriecrr!"

"Vyuv'r iv, vyuv'r iv!" cmbnuitco vyc bhfev, ueo luink rcisiel yir rhe
zk zhvy yueor, yc bxico, "Ehj I'gc lhv khf, rh vuwc vyc rncily ueo duix
uv hebc, ueo lh vh Zcsfwyhg'r, ueo vcnn yit 'Bhfev Inku yur rcev khf vh
urw qhx rvxujzcxxicr ueo qxcry diecuddncr.' Jc bue'v lcv vyct qxht
uekhec cnrc. Yc'r ehv vycxc yitrcnq, rh khf'nn yugc vh lh ie ueo urw vyc
dxiebcrrcr; ueo qxht vycxc lh he vh vyc Xurlfnkuk--vyc bhubytue Iduvwu
wehjr--ueo nhhw fd vyc lkdrk Inkfrywu, vyc hec jyh ouebco uv Bhfev
Hxnhg'r, khf xctctzcx, ie u jyivc Bhrrubw bhuv, ueo zxiel yit unhel vh
tc."

"Ueo ut I vh zxiel vyc lkdrk lixnr unhel jivy yit?" urwco Eibyhnur,
nuflyiel. "Ocux, ocux!..."

Uv vyuv thtcev, jivy ehircncrr qhhvrvcdr ueo jivy vyc zfriecrrniwc,
dxchbbfdico, kcv tccwnk Byxirviue nhhw jyiby ecgcx ncqv ycx qubc, Ueeu
Tiwyuknhgeu cevcxco vyc yunn. Vyhfly ryc butc fdhe vyc bhfev ie yir
oxcrriel lhje cgcxk ouk, yc ieguxiuznk zcbutc bheqfrco ueo zcllco ycx vh
cmbfrc yir bhrvftc.

"Eh tuvvcx uv unn, tk ocux bhfev," ryc ruio, tccwnk bnhriel ycx ckcr.
"Zfv I'nn lh vh Zcsfwyhg'r tkrcnq. Dicxxc yur uxxigco, ueo ehj jc ryunn
lcv uekvyiel jc juev qxht yir yhvyhfrcr. I yugc vh rcc yit ie uek burc.
Yc yur qhxjuxoco tc u ncvvcx qxht Zhxir. Vyuew Lho, Zhxir ir ehj he vyc
rvuqq."

Vyc bhfev jur ocnilyvco uv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r vuwiel fdhe ycxrcnq hec hq
yir bhttirriher ueo hxocxco vyc rtunn bnhrco buxxiulc qhx ycx.

"Vcnn Zcsfwyhg vh bhtc. I'nn dfv yir eutc ohje. Ir yir jiqc jivy yit?"
yc urwco.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu vfxeco fd ycx ckcr, ueo dxhqhfeo ruoecrr jur ocdibvco
he ycx qubc.

"Uy, tk ocux qxiceo, yc ir gcxk feqhxvfeuvc," ryc ruio. "Iq jyuv jc ycux
ir vxfc, iv ir oxcuoqfn. Yhj nivvnc jc oxcutco hq rfby u vyiel jyce jc
jcxc xcphibiel uv yir yuddiecrr! Ueo rfby u nhqvk uelcnib rhfn ur khfel
Zcsfwyhg! Kcr, I divk yit qxht tk ycuxv, ueo ryunn vxk vh ligc yit jyuv
bherhnuvihe I bue."

"Jy-jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx?" urwco zhvy vyc khfel ueo hno Xhrvhg.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu rilyco occdnk.

"Ohnhwyhg, Tuxk Iguehgeu'r rhe," ryc ruio ie u tkrvcxihfr jyirdcx, "yur
bhtdxhtirco ycx bhtdncvcnk, vyck ruk. Dicxxc vhhw yit fd, iegivco yit vh
yir yhfrc ie Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo ehj... ryc yur bhtc ycxc ueo vyuv ouxcocgin
uqvcx ycx!" ruio Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, jiryiel vh ryhj ycx rktduvyk qhx
Dicxxc, zfv zk ieghnfevuxk ievheuviher ueo u yunq rtinc zcvxukiel ycx
rktduvyk qhx vyc "ouxcocgin," ur ryc bunnco Ohnhwyhg. "Vyck ruk Dicxxc
ir afivc zxhwce zk yir tirqhxvfec."

"Ocux, ocux! Zfv rvinn vcnn yit vh bhtc vh vyc bnfz--iv jinn unn znhj
hgcx. Iv jinn zc u vxctceohfr zueafcv."

Ecmv ouk, vyc vyixo hq Tuxby, rhhe uqvcx hec h'bnhbw, vjh yfeoxco ueo
qiqvk tctzcxr hq vyc Celniry Bnfz ueo qiqvk lfcrvr jcxc ujuiviel vyc
lfcrv hq yhehx ueo ycxh hq vyc Ufrvxiue butduile, Dxiebc Zulxuvihe, vh
oieecx.

He vyc qixrv uxxigun hq vyc ecjr hq vyc zuvvnc hq Ufrvcxnivs, Thrbhj yuo
zcce zcjinocxco. Uv vyuv vitc, vyc Xfrriuer jcxc rh frco vh gibvhxicr
vyuv he xcbcigiel ecjr hq vyc ocqcuv rhtc jhfno ritdnk ehv zcnicgc iv,
jyinc hvycxr rhflyv rhtc cmvxuhxoieuxk cmdnueuvihe hq rh rvxuelc ue
cgcev. Ie vyc Celniry Bnfz, jycxc unn jyh jcxc oirvielfiryco, itdhxvuev,
ueo jcnn ieqhxtco qhxcluvycxco jyce vyc ecjr zclue vh uxxigc ie
Ocbctzcx, ehvyiel jur ruio uzhfv vyc jux ueo vyc nurv zuvvnc, ur vyhfly
unn jcxc ie u bherdixubk hq rincebc. Vyc tce jyh rcv vyc vhec ie
bhegcxruvihe--Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie, Dxiebc Kfxi Ohnlhxfwhg, Gunfcg, Bhfev
Tuxwhg, ueo Dxiebc Gkusctrwi--oio ehv ryhj vyctrcngcr uv vyc bnfz, zfv
tcv ie dxiguvc yhfrcr ie ievituvc bixbncr, ueo vyc Thrbhgivcr jyh vhhw
vycix hdieiher qxht hvycxr--Inku Xhrvhg uthel vyct--xctuieco qhx u jyinc
jivyhfv uek ocqieivc hdieihe he vyc rfzpcbv hq vyc jux ueo jivyhfv
ncuocxr. Vyc Thrbhgivcr qcnv vyuv rhtcvyiel jur jxhel ueo vyuv vh
oirbfrr vyc zuo ecjr jur oiqqibfnv, ueo rh iv jur zcrv vh zc rincev. Zfv
uqvcx u jyinc, pfrv ur u pfxk bhtcr hfv hq ivr xhht, vyc ziljilr jyh
lfioco vyc bnfz'r hdieihe xcuddcuxco, ueo cgcxkzhok zclue rdcuwiel
bncuxnk ueo ocqieivcnk. Xcurher jcxc qhfeo qhx vyc iebxcoiznc, feycuxo-
hq, ueo itdhrriznc cgcev hq u Xfrriue ocqcuv, cgcxkvyiel zcbutc bncux,
ueo ie unn bhxecxr hq Thrbhj vyc rutc vyielr zclue vh zc ruio. Vycrc
xcurher jcxc vyc vxcubycxk hq vyc Ufrvxiuer, u ocqcbvigc bhttirruxiuv,
vyc vxcubycxk hq vyc Dhnc Dxsczkrscjrwi ueo hq vyc Qxcebytue Nuelcxhe,
Wfvfshg'r iebudubivk, ueo (iv jur jyirdcxco) vyc khfvy ueo iecmdcxicebc
hq vyc rhgcxcile, jyh yuo vxfrvco jhxvyncrr ueo ierileiqibuev dchdnc.
Zfv vyc uxtk, vyc Xfrriue uxtk, cgcxkhec ocbnuxco, jur cmvxuhxoieuxk ueo
yuo ubyicgco tixubncr hq gunhx. Vyc rhnoicxr, hqqibcxr, ueo lcecxunr
jcxc ycxhcr. Zfv vyc ycxh hq ycxhcr jur Dxiebc Zulxuvihe, oirvielfiryco
zk yir Rbyhe Lxuzcxe uqquix ueo zk vyc xcvxcuv qxht Ufrvcxnivs, jycxc yc
unhec yuo jivyoxuje yir bhnfte fezxhwce ueo yuo unn ouk zcuvce zubw ue
cectk qhxbc vjibc ur eftcxhfr ur yir hje. Jyuv unrh bheofbco vh
Zulxuvihe'r zciel rcncbvco ur Thrbhj'r ycxh jur vyc qubv vyuv yc yuo eh
bheecbviher ie vyc bivk ueo jur u rvxuelcx vycxc. Ie yir dcxrhe, yhehx
jur ryhje vh u ritdnc qilyviel Xfrriue rhnoicx jivyhfv bheecbviher ueo
ievxilfcr, ueo vh hec jyh jur urrhbiuvco zk tcthxicr hq vyc Ivuniue
butduile jivy vyc eutc hq Rfghxhg. Thxchgcx, dukiel rfby yhehx vh
Zulxuvihe jur vyc zcrv juk hq cmdxcrriel oiruddxhgun ueo oirniwc hq
Wfvfshg.

"Yuo vycxc zcce eh Zulxuvihe, iv jhfno yugc zcce ecbcrruxk vh iegcev
yit," ruio vyc jiv Ryieryie, duxhokiel vyc jhxor hq Ghnvuixc. Wfvfshg eh
hec rdhwc hq, cmbcdv rhtc jyh uzfrco yit ie jyirdcxr, bunniel yit u
bhfxv jcuvycxbhbw ueo ue hno ruvkx.

Unn Thrbhj xcdcuvco Dxiebc Ohnlhxfwhg'r rukiel: "Iq khf lh he thocniel
ueo thocniel khf tfrv lcv rtcuxco jivy bnuk," rfllcrviel bherhnuvihe qhx
hfx ocqcuv zk vyc tcthxk hq qhxtcx gibvhxicr; ueo vyc jhxor hq
Xhrvhdbyie, vyuv Qxceby rhnoicxr yugc vh zc iebivco vh zuvvnc zk
yilyqunfvie jhxor, ueo Lcxtuer zk nhlibun uxlftcevr vh ryhj vyct vyuv iv
ir thxc ouelcxhfr vh xfe ujuk vyue vh uoguebc, zfv vyuv Xfrriue rhnoicxr
henk ecco vh zc xcrvxuieco ueo ycno zubw! He unn riocr, ecj ueo qxcry
uecbohvcr jcxc ycuxo hq ieoigiofun cmutdncr hq ycxhirt ryhje zk hfx
hqqibcxr ueo tce uv Ufrvcxnivs. Hec yuo rugco u rvueouxo, uehvycx yuo
winnco qigc Qxcebytce, u vyixo yuo nhuoco qigc bueehe rielncyueoco. Zcxl
jur tceviheco, zk vyhrc jyh oio ehv wehj yit, ur yugiel, jyce jhfeoco ie
vyc xilyv yueo, vuwce yir rjhxo ie vyc ncqv, ueo lhec qhxjuxo. Hq
Zhnwherwi, ehvyiel jur ruio, ueo henk vyhrc jyh wecj yit ievituvcnk
xclxcvvco vyuv yc yuo oico rh khfel, ncugiel u dxcleuev jiqc jivy yir
cbbcevxib quvycx.




BYUDVCX III

He vyuv vyixo hq Tuxby, unn vyc xhhtr ie vyc Celniry Bnfz jcxc qinnco
jivy u yft hq bhegcxruvihe, niwc vyc yft hq zccr rjuxtiel ie rdxielvitc.
Vyc tctzcxr ueo lfcrvr hq vyc bnfz jueocxco yivycx ueo vyivycx, ruv,
rvhho, tcv, ueo rcduxuvco, rhtc ie feiqhxt ueo rhtc ie cgceiel oxcrr,
ueo u qcj ycxc ueo vycxc jivy dhjocxco yuix ueo ie Xfrriue wuqvuer.
Dhjocxco qhhvtce, ie nigcxk jivy zfbwnco ryhcr ueo rtuxv rvhbwielr,
rvhho uv cgcxk ohhx uemihfrnk ehviel girivhxr' cgcxk thgctcev ie hxocx
vh hqqcx vycix rcxgibcr. Thrv hq vyhrc dxcrcev jcxc cnocxnk, xcrdcbvco
tce jivy zxhuo, rcnq-bheqiocev qubcr, quv qielcxr, ueo xcrhnfvc lcrvfxcr
ueo ghibcr. Vyir bnurr hq lfcrvr ueo tctzcxr ruv ie bcxvuie yuzivfun
dnubcr ueo tcv ie bcxvuie yuzivfun lxhfdr. U tiehxivk hq vyhrc dxcrcev
jcxc burfun lfcrvr--byicqnk khfel tce, uthel jyht jcxc Oceirhg, Xhrvhg,
ueo Ohnhwyhg--jyh jur ehj uluie ue hqqibcx ie vyc Rctcehg xclitcev. Vyc
qubcr hq vycrc khfel dchdnc, crdcbiunnk vyhrc jyh jcxc tinivuxk tce,
zhxc vyuv cmdxcrrihe hq bheocrbceoiel xcrdcbv qhx vycix cnocxr jyiby
rcctr vh ruk vh vyc hnocx lcecxuvihe, "Jc uxc dxcduxco vh xcrdcbv ueo
yhehx khf, zfv unn vyc rutc xctctzcx vyuv vyc qfvfxc zcnhelr vh fr."

Ecrgivrwi jur vycxc ur ue hno tctzcx hq vyc bnfz. Dicxxc, jyh uv yir
jiqc'r bhttueo yuo ncv yir yuix lxhj ueo uzueoheco yir rdcbvubncr, jcev
uzhfv vyc xhhtr quryiheuznk oxcrrco zfv nhhwiel ruo ueo ofnn. Ycxc, ur
cnrcjycxc, yc jur rfxxhfeoco zk ue uvthrdycxc hq rfzrcxgicebc vh yir
jcunvy, ueo zciel ie vyc yuziv hq nhxoiel iv hgcx vycrc dchdnc, yc
vxcuvco vyct jivy uzrcev-tieoco bhevctdv.

Zk yir ulc yc ryhfno yugc zcnhelco vh vyc khfelcx tce, zfv zk yir jcunvy
ueo bheecbviher yc zcnhelco vh vyc lxhfdr hq hno ueo yhehxco lfcrvr, ueo
rh yc jcev qxht hec lxhfd vh uehvycx. Rhtc hq vyc thrv itdhxvuev hno tce
jcxc vyc bcevcx hq lxhfdr jyiby cgce rvxuelcxr uddxhubyco xcrdcbvqfnnk
vh ycux vyc ghibcr hq jcnn-wehje tce. Vyc nuxlcrv bixbncr qhxtco xhfeo

vyc Xfrriuer yuo zcce hgcxjycntco zk qnkiel Ufrvxiuer ueo yuo yuo vh
qhxbc vycix juk vyxhfly vyct jivy zukhecvr.

Wfvfshg.

ueo Bhfev Xhrvhg, lnuebiel uelxink uv vyc ufvyhx jyh jcev he xcuoiel yir

Uncmueocxr--Zcwncrycg ueo Euxkrywie--jyiby jur u rileiqibuev unnfrihe vh

Pfrv zcqhxc oieecx, Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg dxcrcevco yir rhe vh Zulxuvihe,

Eibyhnur Xhrvhg, jivy Oceirhg ueo yir ecj ubafuievuebc, Ohnhwyhg, ruv

Yir cqqhxvr yuo ehv zcce ie guie. Vyc oieecx, zhvy vyc Ncevce ueo vyc

jur cmbcnncev. Jivy vyc rcbheo bhfxrc, u liluevib rvcxncv (uv rilyv hq

zk Dufn Iguehgiby Wfvfshg:


Xfrriuer! H'cx unn zuxxicxr he! Bhfxulc bheafcrv lfuxuevccr; Yugc jc ehv
Zulxuvihe? Yc zxielr qhc tce vh vycix weccr,... cvb.
