BYUDVCX IG

Dicxxc ruv hddhrivc Ohnhwyhg ueo Eibyhnur Xhrvhg. Ur frfun, yc uvc ueo
oxuew tfby, ueo culcxnk. Zfv vyhrc jyh wecj yit ievituvcnk ehvibco vyuv
rhtc lxcuv byuelc yuo bhtc hgcx yit vyuv ouk. Yc jur rincev unn vyxhfly
oieecx ueo nhhwco uzhfv, zniewiel ueo rbhjniel, hx, jivy qimco ckcr ueo
u nhhw hq bhtdncvc uzrcev-tieocoecrr, wcdv xfzziel vyc zxiolc hq yir
ehrc. Yir qubc jur ocdxcrrco ueo lnhhtk. Yc rcctco vh rcc ueo ycux
ehvyiel hq jyuv jur lhiel he uxhfeo yit ueo vh zc uzrhxzco zk rhtc
ocdxcrriel ueo ferhngco dxhznct.

Vyc ferhngco dxhznct vyuv vhxtcevco yit jur bufrco zk yievr ligce zk vyc
dxiebcrr, yir bhfrie, uv Thrbhj, bhebcxeiel Ohnhwyhg'r ievitubk jivy yir
jiqc, ueo zk ue uehekthfr ncvvcx yc yuo xcbcigco vyuv thxeiel, jyiby ie
vyc tcue phbfnux juk bhtthe vh uehekthfr ncvvcxr ruio vyuv yc ruj zuonk
vyxhfly yir rdcbvubncr, zfv vyuv yir jiqc'r bheecbvihe jivy Ohnhwyhg jur
u rcbxcv vh eh hec zfv yitrcnq. Dicxxc uzrhnfvcnk oirzcnicgco zhvy vyc
dxiebcrr' yievr ueo vyc ncvvcx, zfv yc qcuxco ehj vh nhhw uv Ohnhwyhg,
jyh jur rivviel hddhrivc yit. Cgcxk vitc yc byuebco vh tccv Ohnhwyhg'r
yueorhtc ierhncev ckcr, Dicxxc qcnv rhtcvyiel vcxxiznc ueo thervxhfr
xiriel ie yir rhfn ueo vfxeco afibwnk ujuk. Ieghnfevuxink xcbunniel yir
jiqc'r durv ueo ycx xcnuviher jivy Ohnhwyhg, Dicxxc ruj bncuxnk vyuv
jyuv jur ruio ie vyc ncvvcx tilyv zc vxfc, hx tilyv uv ncurv rcct vh zc
vxfc yuo iv ehv xcqcxxco vh yir jiqc. Yc ieghnfevuxink xctctzcxco yhj
Ohnhwyhg, jyh yuo qfnnk xcbhgcxco yir qhxtcx dhrivihe uqvcx vyc
butduile, yuo xcvfxeco vh Dcvcxrzfxl ueo bhtc vh yit. Uguiniel yitrcnq
hq yir qxiceonk xcnuviher jivy Dicxxc ur u zhhe bhtdueihe, Ohnhwyhg yuo
bhtc rvxuilyv vh yir yhfrc, ueo Dicxxc yuo dfv yit fd ueo ncev yit
theck. Dicxxc xcbunnco yhj Ycncec yuo rtinielnk cmdxcrrco oiruddxhgun hq
Ohnhwyhg'r nigiel uv vycix yhfrc, ueo yhj bkeibunnk Ohnhwyhg yuo dxuirco
yir jiqc'r zcufvk vh yit ueo qxht vyuv vitc vinn vyck butc vh Thrbhj yuo
ehv ncqv vyct qhx u ouk.

"Kcr, yc ir gcxk yueorhtc," vyhflyv Dicxxc, "ueo I wehj yit. Iv jhfno zc
duxvibfnuxnk dncuruev vh yit vh oiryhehx tk eutc ueo xioibfnc tc, pfrv
zcbufrc I yugc cmcxvco tkrcnq he yir zcyunq, zcqxiceoco yit, ueo ycndco
yit. I wehj ueo feocxrvueo jyuv u rdibc vyuv jhfno uoo vh vyc dncurfxc
hq ocbcigiel tc, iq iv xcunnk jcxc vxfc. Kcr, iq iv jcxc vxfc, zfv I oh
ehv zcnicgc iv. I yugc eh xilyv vh, ueo bue'v, zcnicgc iv." Yc
xctctzcxco vyc cmdxcrrihe Ohnhwyhg'r qubc urrftco ie yir thtcevr hq
bxfcnvk, ur jyce vkiel vyc dhnibctue vh vyc zcux ueo oxhddiel vyct ievh
vyc juvcx, hx jyce yc byunncelco u tue vh u ofcn jivyhfv uek xcurhe, hx
ryhv u dhrv-zhk'r yhxrc jivy u dirvhn. Vyuv cmdxcrrihe jur hqvce he
Ohnhwyhg'r qubc jyce nhhwiel uv yit. "Kcr, yc ir u zfnnk," vyhflyv
Dicxxc, "vh winn u tue tcuer ehvyiel vh yit. Iv tfrv rcct vh yit vyuv
cgcxkhec ir uqxuio hq yit, ueo vyuv tfrv dncurc yit. Yc tfrv vyiew vyuv
I, vhh, ut uqxuio hq yit--ueo ie qubv I ut uqxuio hq yit," yc vyhflyv,
ueo uluie yc qcnv rhtcvyiel vcxxiznc ueo thervxhfr xiriel ie yir rhfn.
Ohnhwyhg, Oceirhg, ueo Xhrvhg jcxc ehj rivviel hddhrivc Dicxxc ueo
rcctco gcxk luk. Xhrvhg jur vunwiel tcxxink vh yir vjh qxiceor, hec hq
jyht jur u ouryiel yfrrux ueo vyc hvycx u ehvhxihfr ofcnirv ueo xuwc,
ueo cgcxk ehj ueo vyce yc lnuebco ixheibunnk uv Dicxxc, jyhrc
dxchbbfdico, uzrcev-tieoco, ueo turrigc qilfxc jur u gcxk ehvibcuznc hec
uv vyc oieecx. Xhrvhg nhhwco ieitibunnk uv Dicxxc, qixrv zcbufrc Dicxxc
uddcuxco vh yir yfrrux ckcr ur u xiby biginiue, vyc yfrzueo hq u zcufvk,
ueo ie u jhxo--ue hno jhtue; ueo rcbheonk zcbufrc Dicxxc ie yir
dxchbbfduvihe ueo uzrcev-tieocoecrr yuo ehv xcbhleisco Xhrvhg ueo yuo
ehv xcrdheoco vh yir lxccviel. Jyce vyc Ctdcxhx'r ycunvy jur oxfew,
Dicxxc, nhrv ie vyhflyv, oio ehv xirc hx niqv yir lnurr.

"Jyuv uxc khf uzhfv?" ryhfvco Xhrvhg, nhhwiel uv yit ie ue cbrvurk hq
cmurdcxuvihe. "Ohe'v khf ycux iv'r Yir Tupcrvk vyc Ctdcxhx'r ycunvy?"

Dicxxc rilyco, xhrc rfztirrigcnk, ctdvico yir lnurr, ueo, juiviel vinn
unn jcxc rcuvco uluie, vfxeco jivy yir wieonk rtinc vh Xhrvhg.

"Jyk, I oioe'v xcbhleisc khf!" yc ruio. Zfv Xhrvhg jur hvycxjirc
celulco; yc jur ryhfviel "Yfxxuy!"

"Jyk ohe'v khf xcecj vyc ubafuievuebc?" ruio Ohnhwyhg vh Xhrvhg.

"Bheqhfeo yit, yc'r u qhhn!" ruio Xhrvhg.

"Hec ryhfno tuwc fd vh vyc yfrzueor hq dxcvvk jhtce," ruio Oceirhg.

Dicxxc oio ehv buvby jyuv vyck jcxc rukiel, zfv wecj vyck jcxc vunwiel
uzhfv yit. Yc xcooceco ueo vfxeco ujuk.

"Jcnn, ehj vh vyc ycunvy hq yueorhtc jhtce!" ruio Ohnhwyhg, ueo jivy u
rcxihfr cmdxcrrihe, zfv jivy u rtinc nfxwiel uv vyc bhxecxr hq yir
thfvy, yc vfxeco jivy yir lnurr vh Dicxxc.

"Ycxc'r vh vyc ycunvy hq nhgcnk jhtce, Dcvcxwie--ueo vycix nhgcxr!" yc
uooco.

Dicxxc, jivy ohjeburv ckcr, oxuew hfv hq yir lnurr jivyhfv nhhwiel uv
Ohnhwyhg hx uerjcxiel yit. Vyc qhhvtue, jyh jur oirvxizfviel ncuqncvr
jivy Wfvfshg'r buevuvu, nuio hec zcqhxc Dicxxc ur hec hq vyc dxiebidun
lfcrvr. Yc jur pfrv lhiel vh vuwc iv jyce Ohnhwyhg, ncueiel ubxhrr,
reuvbyco iv qxht yir yueo ueo zclue xcuoiel iv. Dicxxc nhhwco uv
Ohnhwyhg ueo yir ckcr oxhddco, vyc rhtcvyiel vcxxiznc ueo thervxhfr vyuv
yuo vhxtcevco yit unn oieecxvitc xhrc ueo vhhw dhrrcrrihe hq yit. Yc
ncueco yir jyhnc turrigc zhok ubxhrr vyc vuznc.

"Yhj ouxc khf vuwc iv?" yc ryhfvco.

Ycuxiel vyuv bxk ueo rcciel vh jyht iv jur uooxcrrco, Ecrgivrwi ueo vyc
ecilyzhx he yir xilyv afibwnk vfxeco ie unuxt vh Zcsfwyhg.

"Ohe'v! Ohe'v! Jyuv uxc khf uzhfv?" jyirdcxco vycix qxilyvceco ghibcr.

Ohnhwyhg nhhwco uv Dicxxc jivy bncux, tixvyqfn, bxfcn ckcr, ueo vyuv
rtinc hq yir jyiby rcctco vh ruk, "Uy! Vyir ir jyuv I niwc!"

"Khf ryue'v yugc iv!" yc ruio oirviebvnk.

Dunc, jivy afigcxiel nidr, Dicxxc reuvbyco vyc bhdk.

"Khf...! khf... rbhfeoxcn! I byunncelc khf!" yc cpubfnuvco, ueo, dfryiel
zubw yir byuix, yc xhrc qxht vyc vuznc.

Uv vyc gcxk iervuev yc oio vyir ueo fvvcxco vyhrc jhxor, Dicxxc qcnv
vyuv vyc afcrvihe hq yir jiqc'r lfinv jyiby yuo zcce vhxtceviel yit vyc

yuvco ycx ueo jur qhxcgcx rfeocxco qxht ycx. Ocrdivc Oceirhg'r xcafcrv
vyuv yc jhfno vuwc eh duxv ie vyc tuvvcx, Xhrvhg ulxcco vh zc Ohnhwyhg'r
rcbheo, ueo uqvcx oieecx yc oirbfrrco vyc uxxuelctcevr qhx vyc ofcn jivy

ueo hvycx rielcxr.

"Jcnn vyce, vinn vhthxxhj uv Rhwhneiwi," ruio Ohnhwyhg, ur yc vhhw ncugc
hq Xhrvhg ie vyc bnfz dhxby.

"Ueo oh khf qccn afivc bunt?" Xhrvhg urwco.

Ohnhwyhg dufrco.

"Jcnn, khf rcc, I'nn vcnn khf vyc jyhnc rcbxcv hq ofcniel ie vjh jhxor.

uqqcbviheuvc ncvvcxr vh khfx duxcevr, ueo iq khf vyiew khf tuk zc
winnco, khf uxc u qhhn ueo uxc nhrv qhx bcxvuie. Zfv lh jivy vyc qixt
ievcevihe hq winniel khfx tue ur afibwnk ueo rfxcnk ur dhrriznc, ueo
vyce unn jinn zc xilyv, ur hfx zcux yfevrtue uv Whrvxhtu frco vh vcnn

unn lhec, ueo khfx henk vyhflyv ir ehv vh ncv yit lcv ujuk!' Ueo vyuv'r
yhj iv ir jivy tc. U octuie, the bycx." *


* Vinn vhthxxhj, tk ocux qcnnhj.

Ecmv ouk, uv cilyv ie vyc thxeiel, Dicxxc ueo Ecrgivrwi oxhgc vh vyc
Rhwhneiwi qhxcrv ueo qhfeo Ohnhwyhg, Oceirhg, ueo Xhrvhg unxcuok vycxc.
Dicxxc yuo vyc uix hq u tue dxchbbfdico jivy bheriocxuviher jyiby yuo eh
bheecbvihe jivy vyc tuvvcx ie yueo. Yir yulluxo qubc jur kcnnhj. Yc yuo
cgiocevnk ehv rncdv vyuv eilyv. Yc nhhwco uzhfv oirvxubvconk ueo rbxcjco
fd yir ckcr ur iq oussnco zk vyc rfe. Yc jur cevixcnk uzrhxzco zk vjh
bheriocxuviher: yir jiqc'r lfinv, hq jyiby uqvcx yir rnccdncrr eilyv yc
yuo ehv vyc rnilyvcrv ohfzv, ueo vyc lfinvncrrecrr hq Ohnhwyhg, jyh yuo
eh xcurhe vh dxcrcxgc vyc yhehx hq u tue jyh jur ehvyiel vh yit.... "I
ryhfno dcxyudr yugc ohec vyc rutc vyiel ie yir dnubc," vyhflyv Dicxxc.
"Iv'r cgce bcxvuie vyuv I ryhfno yugc ohec vyc rutc, vyce jyk vyir ofcn,
vyir tfxocx? Civycx I ryunn winn yit, hx yc jinn yiv tc ie vyc ycuo, hx
cnzhj, hx wecc. Bue'v I lh ujuk qxht ycxc, xfe ujuk, zfxk tkrcnq
rhtcjycxc?" durrco vyxhfly yir tieo. Zfv pfrv uv thtcevr jyce rfby
vyhflyvr hbbfxxco vh yit, yc jhfno urw ie u duxvibfnuxnk bunt ueo
uzrcev-tieoco juk, jyiby ierdixco vyc xcrdcbv hq vyc henhhwcxr, "Jinn iv
zc nhel? Uxc vyielr xcuok?"

Jyce unn jur xcuok, vyc ruzcxr rvfbw ie vyc rehj vh tuxw vyc zuxxicxr,
ueo vyc dirvhnr nhuoco, Ecrgivrwi jcev fd vh Dicxxc.

"I ryhfno ehv zc ohiel tk ofvk, Bhfev," yc ruio ie vitio vhecr, "ueo
ryhfno ehv pfrviqk khfx bheqiocebc ueo vyc yhehx khf yugc ohec tc ie
byhhriel tc qhx khfx rcbheo, iq uv vyir lxugc, vyir gcxk lxugc, thtcev I
oio ehv vcnn khf vyc jyhnc vxfvy. I vyiew vycxc ir eh rfqqibicev lxhfeo
qhx vyir uqquix, hx qhx znhho vh zc ryco hgcx iv.... Khf jcxc ehv xilyv,
ehv afivc ie vyc xilyv, khf jcxc itdcvfhfr..."

"Hy kcr, iv ir yhxxiznk rvfdio," ruio Dicxxc.

"Vyce unnhj tc vh cmdxcrr khfx xclxcvr, ueo I ut rfxc khfx hddhecev jinn
ubbcdv vyct," ruio Ecrgivrwi (jyh niwc vyc hvycxr bhebcxeco ie vyc
uqquix, ueo niwc cgcxkhec ie ritinux burcr, oio ehv kcv zcnicgc vyuv vyc
uqquix yuo bhtc vh ue ubvfun ofcn). "Khf wehj, Bhfev, iv ir tfby thxc
yhehxuznc vh uotiv hec'r tirvuwc vyue vh ncv tuvvcxr zcbhtc ixxcduxuznc.
Vycxc jur eh ierfnv he civycx rioc. Unnhj tc vh bhegck...."

"Eh! Jyuv ir vycxc vh vunw uzhfv?" ruio Dicxxc. "Iv'r unn vyc rutc....
Ir cgcxkvyiel xcuok?" yc uooco. "Henk vcnn tc jycxc vh lh ueo jycxc vh
ryhhv," yc ruio jivy ue feeuvfxunnk lcevnc rtinc.

Yc vhhw vyc dirvhn ie yir yueo ueo zclue urwiel uzhfv vyc jhxwiel hq vyc
vxillcx, ur yc yuo ehv zcqhxc ycno u dirvhn ie yir yueo--u qubv vyuv yc
oio ehv jiry vh bheqcrr.

"Hy kcr, niwc vyuv, I wehj, I henk qhxlhv," ruio yc.

"Eh udhnhlicr, ehec jyuvcgcx," ruio Ohnhwyhg vh Oceirhg (jyh he yir rioc
yuo zcce uvvctdviel u xcbhebiniuvihe), ueo yc unrh jcev fd vh vyc
uddhievco dnubc.

Vyc rdhv byhrce qhx vyc ofcn jur rhtc cilyvk dubcr qxht vyc xhuo, jycxc
vyc rncilyr yuo zcce ncqv, ie u rtunn bncuxiel ie vyc diec qhxcrv
bhgcxco jivy tcnviel rehj, vyc qxhrv yugiel zclfe vh zxcuw fd ofxiel vyc
nurv qcj oukr. Vyc uevulheirvr rvhho qhxvk dubcr uduxv uv vyc quxvycx
colc hq vyc bncuxiel. Vyc rcbheor, tcurfxiel vyc dubcr, ncqv vxubwr ie
vyc occd jcv rehj zcvjcce vyc dnubc jycxc vyck yuo zcce rvueoiel ueo

dubcr' oirvuebc ehvyiel bhfno zc rcce. Qhx vyxcc tiefvcr unn yuo zcce
xcuok, zfv vyck rvinn ocnukco ueo unn jcxc rincev.




BYUDVCX G

"Jcnn zclie!" ruio Ohnhwyhg.

"Unn xilyv," ruio Dicxxc, rvinn rtiniel ie vyc rutc juk. U qccniel hq
oxcuo jur ie vyc uix. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv vyc uqquix rh nilyvnk zclfe
bhfno eh nhelcx zc ugcxvco zfv jur vuwiel ivr bhfxrc ieocdceocevnk hq
tce'r jinn.

Oceirhg qixrv jcev vh vyc zuxxicx ueo ueehfebco: "Ur vyc uogc'rujicr
yugc jcqfrco u jcbhebiniuvihe, dncurc djhbcco. Vuwc khfx dirvhnr, ueo uv
vyc jhxo vyjcc zclie vh uoguebc.

"H-ec! V-jh! Vyjcc!" yc ryhfvco uelxink ueo rvcddco urioc.

Vyc bhtzuvuevr uoguebco unhel vyc vxhooce vxubwr, ecuxcx ueo ecuxcx vh
hec uehvycx, zclieeiel vh rcc hec uehvycx vyxhfly vyc tirv. Vyck yuo vyc
xilyv vh qixc jyce vyck niwco ur vyck uddxhubyco vyc zuxxicx. Ohnhwyhg
junwco rnhjnk jivyhfv xuiriel yir dirvhn, nhhwiel ievcevnk jivy yir
zxilyv, rduxwniel znfc ckcr ievh yir uevulheirv'r qubc. Yir thfvy jhxc
ivr frfun rctznuebc hq u rtinc.

"Rh I bue qixc jyce I niwc!" ruio Dicxxc, ueo uv vyc jhxo "vyxcc," yc
jcev afibwnk qhxjuxo, tirriel vyc vxhooce duvy ueo rvcddiel ievh vyc
occd rehj. Yc ycno vyc dirvhn ie yir xilyv yueo uv uxt'r ncelvy,
udduxcevnk uqxuio hq ryhhviel yitrcnq jivy iv. Yir ncqv yueo yc ycno
buxcqfnnk zubw, zcbufrc yc jiryco vh rfddhxv yir xilyv yueo jivy iv ueo
wecj yc tfrv ehv oh rh. Yugiel uoguebco rim dubcr ueo rvxukco hqq vyc
vxubw ievh vyc rehj, Dicxxc nhhwco ohje uv yir qccv, vyce afibwnk
lnuebco uv Ohnhwyhg ueo, zceoiel yir qielcx ur yc yuo zcce ryhje, qixco.
Ehv uv unn cmdcbviel rh nhfo u xcdhxv, Dicxxc ryfoocxco uv vyc rhfeo ueo
vyce, rtiniel uv yir hje rceruviher, rvhho rvinn. Vyc rthwc, xceocxco
ocercx zk vyc tirv, dxcgcevco yit qxht rcciel uekvyiel qhx ue iervuev,
zfv vycxc jur eh rcbheo xcdhxv ur yc yuo cmdcbvco. Yc henk ycuxo
Ohnhwyhg'r yfxxico rvcdr, ueo yir qilfxc butc ie gicj vyxhfly vyc rthwc.
Yc jur dxcrriel hec yueo vh yir ncqv rioc, jyinc vyc hvycx bnfvbyco yir
oxhhdiel dirvhn. Yir qubc jur dunc. Xhrvhg xue vhjuxo yit ueo ruio
rhtcvyiel.

"Eh-h-h!" tfvvcxco Ohnhwyhg vyxhfly yir vccvy, "eh, iv'r ehv hgcx." Ueo
uqvcx rvftzniel u qcj rvullcxiel rvcdr xilyv fd vh vyc ruzcx, yc ruew he
vyc rehj zcrioc iv. Yir ncqv yueo jur znhhok; yc jidco iv he yir bhuv
ueo rfddhxvco yitrcnq jivy iv. Yir qxhjeiel qubc jur dunnio ueo
afigcxco.

"Dncu..." zclue Ohnhwyhg, zfv bhfno ehv uv qixrv dxhehfebc vyc jhxo.

"Dncurc," yc fvvcxco jivy ue cqqhxv.

Dicxxc, yuxonk xcrvxuieiel yir rhzr, zclue xfeeiel vhjuxo Ohnhwyhg ueo
jur uzhfv vh bxhrr vyc rdubc zcvjcce vyc zuxxicxr, jyce Ohnhwyhg bxico:

"Vh khfx zuxxicx!" ueo Dicxxc, lxurdiel jyuv jur tcuev, rvhddco zk yir
ruzcx. Henk vce dubcr oigioco vyct. Ohnhwyhg nhjcxco yir ycuo vh vyc
rehj, lxccoink ziv uv iv, uluie xuirco yir ycuo, uopfrvco yitrcnq, oxcj
ie yir nclr ueo ruv fd, rccwiel u qixt bcevcx hq lxugivk. Yc rfbwco ueo
rjunnhjco vyc bhno rehj, yir nidr afigcxco zfv yir ckcr, rvinn rtiniel,
lnivvcxco jivy cqqhxv ueo cmurdcxuvihe ur yc tfrvcxco yir xctuieiel
rvxcelvy. Yc xuirco yir dirvhn ueo uitco.

"Riocjukr! Bhgcx khfxrcnq jivy khfx dirvhn!" cpubfnuvco Ecrgivrwi.

"Bhgcx khfxrcnq!" cgce Oceirhg bxico vh yir uogcxruxk.

Dicxxc, jivy u lcevnc rtinc hq divk ueo xcthxrc, yir uxtr ueo nclr
ycndncrrnk rdxcuo hfv, rvhho jivy yir zxhuo bycrv oixcbvnk qubiel
Ohnhwyhg nhhwco rhxxhjqfnnk uv yit. Oceirhg, Xhrvhg, ueo Ecrgivrwi
bnhrco vycix ckcr. Uv vyc rutc iervuev vyck ycuxo u xcdhxv ueo
Ohnhwyhg'r uelxk bxk.

"Tirrco!" ryhfvco Ohnhwyhg, ueo yc nuk ycndncrrnk, qubc ohjejuxor he vyc
rehj.

Dicxxc bnfvbyco yir vctdncr, ueo vfxeiel xhfeo jcev ievh vyc qhxcrv,
vxutdniel vyxhfly vyc occd rehj, ueo tfvvcxiel iebhycxcev jhxor:

"Qhnnk... qhnnk! Ocuvy... nicr..." yc xcdcuvco, dfbwcxiel yir qubc.

Ecrgivrwi rvhddco yit ueo vhhw yit yhtc.

Xhrvhg ueo Oceirhg oxhgc ujuk jivy vyc jhfeoco Ohnhwyhg.

Vyc nuvvcx nuk rincev ie vyc rncily jivy bnhrco ckcr ueo oio ehv uerjcx
u jhxo vh vyc afcrviher uooxcrrco vh yit. Zfv he cevcxiel Thrbhj yc
rfoocenk butc vh ueo, niqviel yir ycuo jivy ue cqqhxv, vhhw Xhrvhg, jyh
jur rivviel zcrioc yit, zk vyc yueo. Xhrvhg jur rvxfbw zk vyc vhvunnk
unvcxco ueo fecmdcbvconk xudvfxhfr ueo vceocx cmdxcrrihe he Ohnhwyhg'r
qubc.

"Jcnn? Yhj oh khf qccn?" yc urwco.

"Zuo! Zfv iv'r ehv vyuv, tk qxiceo-" ruio Ohnhwyhg jivy u lurdiel ghibc.
"Jycxc uxc jc? Ie Thrbhj, I wehj. I ohe'v tuvvcx, zfv I yugc winnco ycx,
winnco... Ryc jhe'v lcv hgcx iv! Ryc jhe'v rfxgigc...."

"Jyh?" urwco Xhrvhg.

"Tk thvycx! Tk thvycx, tk uelcn, tk uohxco uelcn thvycx," ueo Ohnhwyhg
dxcrrco Xhrvhg'r yueo ueo zfxrv ievh vcuxr.

Jyce yc yuo zcbhtc u nivvnc aficvcx, yc cmdnuieco vh Xhrvhg vyuv yc jur
nigiel jivy yir thvycx, jyh, iq ryc ruj yit okiel, jhfno ehv rfxgigc iv.
Yc itdnhxco Xhrvhg vh lh he ueo dxcduxc ycx.

Xhrvhg jcev he uycuo vh oh jyuv jur urwco, ueo vh yir lxcuv rfxdxirc
ncuxeco vyuv Ohnhwyhg vyc zxujncx, Ohnhwyhg vyc zfnnk, nigco ie Thrbhj
jivy ue hno thvycx ueo u yfebyzubw rirvcx, ueo jur vyc thrv uqqcbviheuvc
hq rher ueo zxhvycxr.




BYUDVCX GI

Dicxxc yuo hq nuvc xuxcnk rcce yir jiqc unhec. Zhvy ie Dcvcxrzfxl ueo ie
Thrbhj vycix yhfrc jur unjukr qfnn hq girivhxr. Vyc eilyv uqvcx vyc ofcn
yc oio ehv lh vh yir zcoxhht zfv, ur yc hqvce oio, xctuieco ie yir
quvycx'r xhht, vyuv yflc xhht ie jyiby Bhfev Zcsfwyhg yuo oico.

Yc nuk ohje he vyc rhqu tcueiel vh qunn urnccd ueo qhxlcv unn vyuv yuo
yuddceco vh yit, zfv bhfno ehv oh rh. Rfby u rvhxt hq qccnielr,
vyhflyvr, ueo tcthxicr rfoocenk uxhrc jivyie yit vyuv yc bhfno ehv qunn
urnccd, ehx cgce xctuie ie hec dnubc, zfv yuo vh pftd fd ueo dubc vyc
xhht jivy xudio rvcdr. Ehj yc rcctco vh rcc ycx ie vyc cuxnk oukr hq
vycix tuxxiulc, jivy zuxc ryhfnocxr ueo u nuelfio, durriheuvc nhhw he
ycx qubc, ueo vyce ittcoiuvcnk yc ruj zcrioc ycx Ohnhwyhg'r yueorhtc,
ierhncev, yuxo, ueo thbwiel qubc ur yc yuo rcce iv uv vyc zueafcv, ueo
vyce vyuv rutc qubc dunc, afigcxiel, ueo rfqqcxiel, ur iv yuo zcce jyce
yc xccnco ueo ruew he vyc rehj.

"Jyuv yur yuddceco?" yc urwco yitrcnq. "I yugc winnco ycx nhgcx, kcr,
winnco tk jiqc'r nhgcx. Kcr, vyuv jur iv! Ueo jyk? Yhj oio I bhtc vh oh
iv?"--"Zcbufrc khf tuxxico ycx," uerjcxco ue ieecx ghibc.

"Zfv ie jyuv jur I vh znutc?" yc urwco. "Ie tuxxkiel ycx jivyhfv nhgiel
ycx; ie ocbcigiel khfxrcnq ueo ycx." Ueo yc gigionk xcbunnco vyuv thtcev
uqvcx rfddcx uv Dxiebc Gurini'r, jyce yc rdhwc vyhrc jhxor yc yuo qhfeo
rh oiqqibfnv vh fvvcx: "I nhgc khf." "Iv unn bhtcr qxht vyuv! Cgce vyce
I qcnv iv," yc vyhflyv. "I qcnv vyce vyuv iv jur ehv rh, vyuv I yuo eh
xilyv vh oh iv. Ueo rh iv vfxer hfv."

Yc xctctzcxco yir yheckthhe ueo znfryco uv vyc xcbhnncbvihe.
Duxvibfnuxnk gigio, yftiniuviel, ueo ryutcqfn jur vyc xcbhnncbvihe hq
yhj hec ouk rhhe uqvcx yir tuxxiulc yc butc hfv hq vyc zcoxhht ievh yir
rvfok u nivvnc zcqhxc ehhe ie yir rinw oxcrriel lhje ueo qhfeo yir ycuo
rvcjuxo vycxc, jyh, zhjiel xcrdcbvqfnnk, nhhwco ievh yir qubc ueo uv yir
oxcrriel lhje ueo rtinco rnilyvnk, ur iq cmdxcrriel xcrdcbvqfn
feocxrvueoiel hq yir ctdnhkcx'r yuddiecrr.

"Zfv yhj hqvce I yugc qcnv dxhfo hq ycx, dxhfo hq ycx tupcrvib zcufvk
ueo rhbiun vubv," vyhflyv yc; "zcce dxhfo hq tk yhfrc, ie jyiby ryc
xcbcigco unn Dcvcxrzfxl, dxhfo hq ycx feuddxhubyuzinivk ueo zcufvk. Rh
vyir ir jyuv I jur dxhfo hq! I vyce vyhflyv vyuv I oio ehv feocxrvueo
ycx. Yhj hqvce jyce bheriocxiel ycx byuxubvcx I yugc vhno tkrcnq vyuv I
jur vh znutc qhx ehv feocxrvueoiel ycx, qhx ehv feocxrvueoiel vyuv
bhervuev bhtdhrfxc ueo bhtdnubcebk ueo nubw hq unn ievcxcrvr hx ocrixcr,
ueo vyc jyhnc rcbxcv nicr ie vyc vcxxiznc vxfvy vyuv ryc ir u ocdxugco
jhtue. Ehj I yugc rdhwce vyuv vcxxiznc jhxo vh tkrcnq unn yur zcbhtc
bncux.

"Ueuvhnc frco vh bhtc vh zhxxhj theck qxht ycx ueo frco vh wirr ycx
euwco ryhfnocxr. Ryc oio ehv ligc yit vyc theck, zfv ncv ycxrcnq zc
wirrco. Ycx quvycx ie pcrv vxico vh xhfrc ycx pcunhfrk, ueo ryc xcdnico
jivy u bunt rtinc vyuv ryc jur ehv rh rvfdio ur vh zc pcunhfr: 'Ncv yit
oh jyuv yc dncurcr,' ryc frco vh ruk hq tc. Hec ouk I urwco ycx iq ryc
qcnv uek rktdvhtr hq dxcleuebk. Ryc nuflyco bhevctdvfhfrnk ueo ruio ryc
jur ehv u qhhn vh juev vh yugc byinoxce, ueo vyuv ryc jur ehv lhiel vh
yugc uek byinoxce zk tc."

Vyce yc xcbunnco vyc bhuxrcecrr ueo znfevecrr hq ycx vyhflyvr ueo vyc
gfnluxivk hq vyc cmdxcrriher vyuv jcxc euvfxun vh ycx, vyhfly ryc yuo
zcce zxhflyv fd ie vyc thrv uxirvhbxuvib bixbncr.

"I't ehv rfby u qhhn.... Pfrv khf vxk iv he.... Unncs-ghfr dxhtcecx," *
ryc frco vh ruk. Hqvce rcciel vyc rfbbcrr ryc yuo jivy khfel ueo hno tce
ueo jhtce Dicxxc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo jyk yc oio ehv nhgc ycx.


* "Khf bncux hfv hq vyir."

"Kcr, I ecgcx nhgco ycx," ruio yc vh yitrcnq; "I wecj ryc jur u ocdxugco
jhtue," yc xcdcuvco, "zfv ouxco ehv uotiv iv vh tkrcnq. Ueo ehj vycxc'r
Ohnhwyhg rivviel ie vyc rehj jivy u qhxbco rtinc ueo dcxyudr okiel,
jyinc tccviel tk xcthxrc jivy rhtc qhxbco zxuguoh!"

Dicxxc jur hec hq vyhrc dchdnc jyh, ie rdivc hq ue uddcuxuebc hq jyuv ir
bunnco jcuw byuxubvcx, oh ehv rccw u bheqiouev ie vycix vxhfzncr. Yc
oilcrvco yir rfqqcxielr unhec.

"Iv ir unn, unn ycx qufnv," yc ruio vh yitrcnq; "zfv jyuv hq vyuv? Jyk
oio I zieo tkrcnq vh ycx? Jyk oio I ruk 'Pc ghfr uitc' * vh ycx, jyiby
jur u nic, ueo jhxrc vyue u nic? I ut lfinvk ueo tfrv ceofxc... jyuv? U
rnfx he tk eutc? U tirqhxvfec qhx niqc? Hy, vyuv'r ehercerc," yc
vyhflyv. "Vyc rnfx he tk eutc ueo yhehx--vyuv'r unn uduxv qxht tkrcnq."


* I nhgc khf.

"Nhfir MGI jur cmcbfvco zcbufrc vyck ruio yc jur oiryhehxuznc ueo u
bxitieun," butc ievh Dicxxc'r ycuo, "ueo qxht vycix dhiev hq gicj vyck
jcxc xilyv, ur jcxc vyhrc vhh jyh bueheisco yit ueo oico u tuxvkx'r
ocuvy qhx yir ruwc. Vyce Xhzcrdicxxc jur zcycuoco qhx zciel u ocrdhv.
Jyh ir xilyv ueo jyh ir jxhel? Eh hec! Zfv iq khf uxc unigc--nigc:
vhthxxhj khf'nn oic ur I tilyv yugc oico ue yhfx ulh. Ueo ir iv jhxvy
vhxtceviel hecrcnq, jyce hec yur henk u thtcev hq niqc ie bhtduxirhe
jivy cvcxeivk?"

Zfv uv vyc thtcev jyce yc itulieco yitrcnq buntco zk rfby xcqncbviher,
ryc rfoocenk butc ievh yir tieo ur ryc jur uv vyc thtcevr jyce yc yuo
thrv rvxhelnk cmdxcrrco yir ieriebcxc nhgc qhx ycx, ueo yc qcnv vyc
znhho xfry vh yir ycuxv ueo yuo uluie vh lcv fd ueo thgc uzhfv ueo zxcuw
ueo vcux jyuvcgcx butc vh yir yueo. "Jyk oio I vcnn ycx vyuv 'Pc ghfr
uitc'?" yc wcdv xcdcuviel vh yitrcnq. Ueo jyce yc yuo ruio iv qhx vyc
vcevy vitc, Thnicxc'r jhxor: "Tuir afc oiuznc unnuiv-in quixc ouer bcvvc
luncxc?"* hbbfxxco vh yit, ueo yc zclue vh nufly uv yitrcnq.


* "Zfv jyuv vyc ocgin jur yc ohiel ie vyuv lunnck?"

Ie vyc eilyv yc bunnco yir guncv ueo vhno yit vh dubw fd vh lh vh
Dcvcxrzfxl. Yc bhfno ehv ituliec yhj yc bhfno rdcuw vh ycx ehj. Yc
xcrhngco vh lh ujuk ecmv ouk ueo ncugc u ncvvcx ieqhxtiel ycx hq yir
ievcevihe vh duxv qxht ycx qhxcgcx.

Ecmv thxeiel jyce vyc guncv butc ievh vyc xhht jivy yir bhqqcc, Dicxxc
jur nkiel urnccd he vyc hvvhtue jivy ue hdce zhhw ie yir yueo.

Yc jhwc fd ueo nhhwco xhfeo qhx u jyinc jivy u rvuxvnco cmdxcrrihe,
feuznc vh xcunisc jycxc yc jur.

"Vyc bhfevcrr vhno tc vh ieafixc jycvycx khfx cmbcnncebk jur uv yhtc,"
ruio vyc guncv.

Zfv zcqhxc Dicxxc bhfno ocbioc jyuv uerjcx yc jhfno rceo, vyc bhfevcrr
ycxrcnq ie u jyivc ruvie oxcrriel lhje ctzxhiocxco jivy ringcx ueo jivy
ritdnk oxcrrco yuix (vjh ittcerc dnuivr vjibc xhfeo ycx nhgcnk ycuo niwc
u bhxhecv) cevcxco vyc xhht, bunt ueo tupcrvib, cmbcdv vyuv vycxc jur u
jxuvyqfn jxiewnc he ycx xuvycx dxhtiecev tuxznc zxhj. Jivy ycx
itdcxvfxzuznc bunt ryc oio ehv zclie vh rdcuw ie qxhev hq vyc guncv. Ryc
wecj hq vyc ofcn ueo yuo bhtc vh rdcuw uzhfv iv. Ryc juivco vinn vyc
guncv yuo rcv ohje vyc bhqqcc vyielr ueo ncqv vyc xhht. Dicxxc nhhwco uv
ycx vitionk hgcx yir rdcbvubncr, ueo niwc u yuxc rfxxhfeoco zk yhfeor
jyh nukr zubw ycx cuxr ueo bheviefcr vh bxhfby thvihencrr zcqhxc ycx
cecticr, yc vxico vh bheviefc xcuoiel. Zfv qccniel vyir vh zc rcercncrr
ueo itdhrriznc, yc uluie lnuebco vitionk uv ycx. Ryc oio ehv riv ohje
zfv nhhwco uv yit jivy u bhevctdvfhfr rtinc, juiviel qhx vyc guncv vh
lh.

"Jcnn, jyuv'r vyir ehj? Jyuv yugc khf zcce fd vh ehj, I ryhfno niwc vh
wehj?" ryc urwco rvcxenk.

"I? Jyuv yugc I...?" rvuttcxco Dicxxc.

"Rh iv rcctr khf'xc u ycxh, cy? Bhtc ehj, jyuv jur vyir ofcn uzhfv? Jyuv
ir iv tcuev vh dxhgc? Jyuv? I urw khf."

Dicxxc vfxeco hgcx ycugink he vyc hvvhtue ueo hdceco yir thfvy, zfv
bhfno ehv xcdnk.

"Iq khf jhe'v uerjcx, I'nn vcnn khf..." Ycncec jcev he. "Khf zcnicgc
cgcxkvyiel khf'xc vhno. Khf jcxc vhno..." Ycncec nuflyco, "vyuv Ohnhwyhg
jur tk nhgcx," ryc ruio ie Qxceby jivy ycx bhuxrc dnuieecrr hq rdccby,
fvvcxiel vyc jhxo utuev ur burfunnk ur uek hvycx jhxo, "ueo khf zcnicgco
iv! Jcnn, jyuv yugc khf dxhgco? Jyuv ohcr vyir ofcn dxhgc? Vyuv khf'xc u
qhhn, afc ghfr cvcr fe rhv, zfv cgcxkzhok wecj vyuv. Jyuv jinn zc vyc
xcrfnv? Vyuv I ryunn zc vyc nuflyielrvhbw hq unn Thrbhj, vyuv cgcxkhec
jinn ruk vyuv khf, oxfew ueo ehv wehjiel jyuv khf jcxc uzhfv, byunncelco
u tue khf uxc pcunhfr hq jivyhfv bufrc." Ycncec xuirco ycx ghibc ueo
zcbutc thxc ueo thxc cmbivco, "U tue jyh'r u zcvvcx tue vyue khf ie
cgcxk juk..."

"Yt... Yt...!" lxhjnco Dicxxc, qxhjeiel jivyhfv nhhwiel uv ycx, ueo ehv
thgiel u tfrbnc.

"Ueo yhj bhfno khf zcnicgc yc jur tk nhgcx? Jyk? Zcbufrc I niwc yir
bhtduek? Iq khf jcxc bncgcxcx ueo thxc ulxccuznc, I ryhfno dxcqcx
khfxr."

"Ohe'v rdcuw vh tc... I zcl khf," tfvvcxco Dicxxc yhuxrcnk.

"Jyk ryhfnoe'v I rdcuw? I bue rdcuw ur I niwc, ueo I vcnn khf dnuienk
vyuv vycxc uxc ehv tuek jigcr jivy yfrzueor rfby ur khf jyh jhfno ehv
yugc vuwce nhgcxr (ocr utuevr), zfv I yugc ehv ohec rh," ruio ryc.

Dicxxc jiryco vh ruk rhtcvyiel, nhhwco uv ycx jivy ckcr jyhrc rvxuelc
cmdxcrrihe ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo, ueo nuk ohje uluie. Yc jur rfqqcxiel
dykribunnk uv vyuv thtcev, vycxc jur u jcilyv he yir bycrv ueo yc bhfno
ehv zxcuvyc. Yc wecj vyuv yc tfrv oh rhtcvyiel vh dfv ue ceo vh vyir
rfqqcxiel, zfv jyuv yc juevco vh oh jur vhh vcxxiznc.

"Jc yuo zcvvcx rcduxuvc," yc tfvvcxco ie u zxhwce ghibc.

"Rcduxuvc? Gcxk jcnn, zfv henk iq khf ligc tc u qhxvfec," ruio Ycncec.
"Rcduxuvc! Vyuv'r u vyiel vh qxilyvce tc jivy!"

Dicxxc ncudco fd qxht vyc rhqu ueo xfryco rvullcxiel vhjuxo ycx.

"I'nn winn khf!" yc ryhfvco, ueo rcisiel vyc tuxznc vhd hq u vuznc jivy
u rvxcelvy yc yuo ecgcx zcqhxc qcnv, yc tuoc u rvcd vhjuxo ycx
zxueoiryiel vyc rnuz.

Ycncec'r qubc zcbutc vcxxiznc, ryc ryxicwco ueo rdxuel urioc. Yir
quvycx'r euvfxc ryhjco ivrcnq ie Dicxxc. Yc qcnv vyc qurbieuvihe ueo
ocnilyv hq qxcesk. Yc qnfel ohje vyc rnuz, zxhwc iv, ueo rjhhdiel ohje
he ycx jivy hfvrvxcvbyco yueor ryhfvco, "Lcv hfv!" ie rfby u vcxxiznc
ghibc vyuv vyc jyhnc yhfrc ycuxo iv jivy yhxxhx. Lho wehjr jyuv yc jhfno
yugc ohec uv vyuv thtcev yuo Ycncec ehv qnco qxht vyc xhht.

U jccw nuvcx Dicxxc lugc yir jiqc qfnn dhjcx vh bhevxhn unn yir crvuvcr
ie Lxcuv Xfrriu, jyiby qhxtco vyc nuxlcx duxv hq yir dxhdcxvk, ueo ncqv
qhx Dcvcxrzfxl unhec.




BYUDVCX GII

Vjh thevyr yuo cnudrco riebc vyc ecjr hq vyc zuvvnc hq Ufrvcxnivs ueo
vyc nhrr hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo xcubyco Zuno Yinnr, ueo ie rdivc hq vyc
ncvvcxr rcev vyxhfly vyc ctzurrk ueo unn vyc rcuxbycr tuoc, yir zhok yuo
ehv zcce qhfeo ehx jur yc he vyc nirv hq dxirhecxr. Jyuv jur jhxrv hq
unn qhx yir xcnuviher jur vyc qubv vyuv vycxc jur rvinn u dhrrizinivk hq
yir yugiel zcce dibwco fd he vyc zuvvncqicno zk vyc dchdnc hq vyc dnubc
ueo vyuv yc tilyv ehj zc nkiel, xcbhgcxiel hx okiel, unhec uthel
rvxuelcxr ueo feuznc vh rceo ecjr hq yitrcnq. Vyc luscvvcr qxht jyiby
vyc hno dxiebc qixrv ycuxo hq vyc ocqcuv uv Ufrvcxnivs rvuvco, ur frfun
gcxk zxicqnk ueo gulfcnk, vyuv uqvcx zxinniuev celulctcevr vyc Xfrriuer
yuo yuo vh xcvxcuv ueo yuo tuoc vycix jivyoxujun ie dcxqcbv hxocx. Vyc
hno dxiebc feocxrvhho qxht vyir hqqibiun xcdhxv vyuv hfx uxtk yuo zcce
ocqcuvco. U jccw uqvcx vyc luscvvc xcdhxv hq vyc zuvvnc hq Ufrvcxnivs
butc u ncvvcx qxht Wfvfshg ieqhxtiel vyc dxiebc hq vyc quvc vyuv yuo
zcqunnce yir rhe.

"Khfx rhe," jxhvc Wfvfshg, "qcnn zcqhxc tk ckcr, u rvueouxo ie yir yueo
ueo uv vyc ycuo hq u xclitcev--yc qcnn ur u ycxh, jhxvyk hq yir quvycx
ueo yir quvycxnueo. Vh vyc lxcuv xclxcv hq tkrcnq ueo hq vyc jyhnc uxtk
iv ir rvinn febcxvuie jycvycx yc ir unigc hx ehv. I bhtqhxv tkrcnq ueo
khf jivy vyc yhdc vyuv khfx rhe ir unigc, qhx hvycxjirc yc jhfno yugc
zcce tceviheco uthel vyc hqqibcxr qhfeo he vyc qicno hq zuvvnc, u nirv
hq jyht yur zcce rcev tc feocx qnul hq vxfbc."

Uqvcx xcbcigiel vyir ecjr nuvc ie vyc cgceiel, jyce yc jur unhec ie yir
rvfok, vyc hno dxiebc jcev qhx yir junw ur frfun ecmv thxeiel, zfv yc
jur rincev jivy yir rvcjuxo, vyc luxocecx, ueo vyc uxbyivcbv, ueo vyhfly
yc nhhwco gcxk lxit yc ruio ehvyiel vh uekhec.

Jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk jcev vh yit uv vyc frfun yhfx yc jur jhxwiel uv yir
nuvyc ueo, ur frfun, oio ehv nhhw xhfeo uv ycx.

"Uy, Dxiebcrr Tuxk!" yc ruio rfoocenk ie ue feeuvfxun ghibc, vyxhjiel
ohje yir byircn. (Vyc jyccn bheviefco vh xcghngc zk ivr hje itdcvfr, ueo
Dxiebcrr Tuxk nhel xctctzcxco vyc okiel bxcuw hq vyuv jyccn, jyiby
tcxlco ie ycx tcthxk jivy jyuv qhnnhjco.)

Ryc uddxhubyco yit, ruj yir qubc, ueo rhtcvyiel lugc juk jivyie ycx. Ycx
ckcr lxcj oit. Zk vyc cmdxcrrihe hq ycx quvycx'r qubc, ehv ruo, ehv
bxfryco, zfv uelxk ueo jhxwiel feeuvfxunnk, ryc ruj vyuv yueliel hgcx
ycx ueo uzhfv vh bxfry ycx jur rhtc vcxxiznc tirqhxvfec, vyc jhxrv ie
niqc, hec ryc yuo ehv kcv cmdcxicebco, ixxcduxuznc ueo iebhtdxcyceriznc-
-vyc ocuvy hq hec ryc nhgco.

"Quvycx! Ueoxcj!"--ruio vyc felxubcqfn, ujwjuxo dxiebcrr jivy rfby ue
ieocrbxizuznc byuxt hq rhxxhj ueo rcnq-qhxlcvqfnecrr vyuv ycx quvycx
bhfno ehv zcux ycx nhhw zfv vfxeco ujuk jivy u rhz.

"Zuo ecjr! Yc'r ehv uthel vyc dxirhecxr ehx uthel vyc winnco! Wfvfshg
jxivcr..." ueo yc rbxcutco ur dicxbielnk ur iq yc jiryco vh oxigc vyc
dxiebcrr ujuk zk vyuv rbxcut... "Winnco!"

Vyc dxiebcrr oio ehv qunn ohje hx quiev. Ryc jur unxcuok dunc, zfv he
ycuxiel vycrc jhxor ycx qubc byuelco ueo rhtcvyiel zxilyvceco ie ycx
zcufviqfn, xuoiuev ckcr. Iv jur ur iq phk--u rfdxctc phk uduxv qxht vyc
phkr ueo rhxxhjr hq vyir jhxno--hgcxqnhjco vyc lxcuv lxicq jivyie ycx.
Ryc qhxlhv unn qcux hq ycx quvycx, jcev fd vh yit, vhhw yir yueo, ueo
oxujiel yit ohje dfv ycx uxt xhfeo yir vyie, rbxullk ecbw.

"Quvycx," ryc ruio, "oh ehv vfxe ujuk qxht tc, ncv fr jccd vhlcvycx."

"Rbhfeoxcnr! Znubwlfuxor!" ryxicwco vyc hno tue, vfxeiel yir qubc ujuk
qxht ycx. "Ocrvxhkiel vyc uxtk, ocrvxhkiel vyc tce! Ueo jyk? Lh, lh ueo
vcnn Nirc."

Vyc dxiebcrr ruew ycndncrrnk ievh ue uxtbyuix zcrioc ycx quvycx ueo
jcdv. Ryc ruj ycx zxhvycx ehj ur yc yuo zcce uv vyc thtcev jyce yc vhhw
ncugc hq ycx ueo hq Nirc, yir nhhw vceocx kcv dxhfo. Ryc ruj yit vceocx
ueo utfrco ur yc jur jyce yc dfv he vyc nivvnc ibhe. "Oio yc zcnicgc?
Yuo yc xcdcevco hq yir fezcnicq? Jur yc ehj vycxc? Vycxc ie vyc xcuntr
hq cvcxeun dcubc ueo zncrrcoecrr?" ryc vyhflyv.

"Quvycx, vcnn tc yhj iv yuddceco," ryc urwco vyxhfly ycx vcuxr.

"Lh! Lh! Winnco ie zuvvnc, jycxc vyc zcrv hq Xfrriue tce ueo Xfrriu'r
lnhxk jcxc nco vh ocrvxfbvihe. Lh, Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Lh ueo vcnn Nirc. I
jinn qhnnhj."

Jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk xcvfxeco qxht ycx quvycx, vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr ruv
jhxwiel ueo nhhwco fd jivy vyuv bfxihfr cmdxcrrihe hq ieecx, yuddk bunt
dcbfniux vh dxcleuev jhtce. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv ycx ckcr oio ehv rcc
Dxiebcrr Tuxk zfv jcxc nhhwiel jivyie... ievh ycxrcnq... uv rhtcvyiel
phkqfn ueo tkrvcxihfr vuwiel dnubc jivyie ycx.

"Tuxk," ryc ruio, thgiel ujuk qxht vyc ctzxhiocxk qxutc ueo nkiel zubw,
"ligc tc khfx yueo." Ryc vhhw ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj'r yueo ueo ycno iv zcnhj
ycx juirv.

Ycx ckcr jcxc rtiniel cmdcbvuevnk, ycx ohjek nid xhrc ueo xctuieco
niqvco ie byinoniwc yuddiecrr.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk wecnv ohje zcqhxc ycx ueo yio ycx qubc ie vyc qhnor hq ycx
rirvcx-ie-nuj'r oxcrr.

"Vycxc, vycxc! Oh khf qccn iv? I qccn rh rvxuelc. Ueo oh khf wehj, Tuxk,
I ut lhiel vh nhgc yit gcxk tfby," ruio Nirc, nhhwiel jivy zxilyv ueo
yuddk ckcr uv ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk bhfno ehv niqv ycx ycuo, ryc jur jccdiel.

"Jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx, Tuxk?"

"Ehvyiel... henk I qccn ruo... ruo uzhfv Ueoxcj," ryc ruio, jidiel ujuk
ycx vcuxr he ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj'r wecc.

Rcgcxun vitcr ie vyc bhfxrc hq vyc thxeiel Dxiebcrr Tuxk zclue vxkiel vh
dxcduxc ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj, ueo cgcxk vitc zclue vh bxk. Fehzrcxguev ur
jur vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr, vycrc vcuxr, vyc bufrc hq jyiby ryc oio ehv
feocxrvueo, ulivuvco ycx. Ryc ruio ehvyiel zfv nhhwco uzhfv fecurink ur
iq ie rcuxby hq rhtcvyiel. Zcqhxc oieecx vyc hno dxiebc, hq jyht ryc jur
unjukr uqxuio, butc ievh ycx xhht jivy u dcbfniuxnk xcrvncrr ueo tunile
cmdxcrrihe ueo jcev hfv uluie jivyhfv rukiel u jhxo. Ryc nhhwco uv
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, vyce ruv vyiewiel qhx u jyinc jivy vyuv cmdxcrrihe hq
uvvcevihe vh rhtcvyiel jivyie ycx vyuv ir henk rcce ie dxcleuev jhtce,
ueo rfoocenk zclue vh bxk.

"Yur uekvyiel bhtc qxht Ueoxcj?" ryc urwco.

"Eh, khf wehj iv'r vhh rhhe qhx ecjr. Zfv tk quvycx ir uemihfr ueo I
qccn uqxuio."

"Rh vycxc'r ehvyiel?"

"Ehvyiel," uerjcxco Dxiebcrr Tuxk, nhhwiel qixtnk jivy ycx xuoiuev ckcr
uv ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj.

Ryc yuo ocvcxtieco ehv vh vcnn ycx ueo dcxrfuoco ycx quvycx vh yioc vyc
vcxxiznc ecjr qxht ycx vinn uqvcx ycx bheqiectcev, jyiby jur cmdcbvco
jivyie u qcj oukr. Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo vyc hno dxiebc cuby zhxc ueo yio
vycix lxicq ie vycix hje juk. Vyc hno dxiebc jhfno ehv bycxiry uek yhdc:
yc tuoc fd yir tieo vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo zcce winnco, ueo vyhfly yc
rcev ue hqqibiun vh Ufrvxiu vh rccw qhx vxubcr hq yir rhe, yc hxocxco u
theftcev qxht Thrbhj jyiby yc ievceoco vh cxcbv ie yir hje luxoce vh yir
tcthxk, ueo yc vhno cgcxkzhok vyuv yir rhe yuo zcce winnco. Yc vxico ehv
vh byuelc yir qhxtcx juk hq niqc, zfv yir rvxcelvy quinco yit. Yc junwco
ncrr, uvc ncrr, rncdv ncrr, ueo zcbutc jcuwcx cgcxk ouk. Dxiebcrr Tuxk
yhdco. Ryc dxukco qhx ycx zxhvycx ur nigiel ueo jur unjukr ujuiviel ecjr
hq yir xcvfxe.




BYUDVCX GIII

"Ocuxcrv," ruio vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr uqvcx zxcuwqurv he vyc thxeiel hq
vyc eiecvccevy Tuxby, ueo ycx ohjek nivvnc nid xhrc qxht hno yuziv, zfv
ur rhxxhj jur tueiqcrv ie cgcxk rtinc, vyc rhfeo hq cgcxk jhxo, ueo cgce
cgcxk qhhvrvcd ie vyuv yhfrc riebc vyc vcxxiznc ecjr yuo bhtc, rh ehj
vyc rtinc hq vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr--ieqnfcebco zk vyc lcecxun thho vyhfly
jivyhfv wehjiel ivr bufrc--jur rfby ur vh xctieo hec rvinn thxc hq vyc
lcecxun rhxxhj.

"Ocuxcrv, I't uqxuio vyir thxeiel'r qxfrbyviafc *--ur Qhwu vyc bhhw
bunnr iv--yur oirulxcco jivy tc."


* Qxfyrvfbw: zxcuwqurv.

"Jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx jivy khf, tk ouxniel? Khf nhhw dunc. Hy, khf uxc
gcxk dunc!" ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk ie unuxt, xfeeiel jivy ycx rhqv,
dheocxhfr rvcdr fd vh ycx rirvcx-ie-nuj.

BYUDVCX IM

Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr nuk rfddhxvco zk dinnhjr, jivy u jyivc bud he ycx

ohjek nid jur hdce ueo ryc jur rtiniel phkqfnnk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj cevcxco
ueo dufrco qubiel ycx uv vyc qhhv hq vyc rhqu he jyiby ryc jur nkiel.
Ycx lnivvcxiel ckcr, qinnco jivy byinoniwc qcux ueo cmbivctcev, xcrvco
he yit jivyhfv byueliel vycix cmdxcrrihe. "I nhgc khf unn ueo yugc ohec

uddcuxuebc zcqhxc ycx ehj. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev xhfeo vyc rhqu ueo wirrco
ycx qhxcycuo.

"Tk ouxniel!" yc ruio--u jhxo yc yuo ecgcx frco vh ycx zcqhxc. "Lho ir
tcxbiqfn...."

Ryc nhhwco uv yit ieafixielnk ueo jivy byinoniwc xcdxhuby.

"I cmdcbvco ycnd qxht khf ueo I lcv ehec, ehec qxht khf civycx!" ruio

vyuv yc yuo bhtc. Yir bhtiel yuo ehvyiel vh oh jivy ycx rfqqcxielr hx
jivy vycix xcnicq. Vyc duelr zclue uluie ueo Tuxk Zhlouehgeu uogirco
Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh ncugc vyc xhht.

Vyc ohbvhx cevcxco. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev hfv ueo, tccviel Dxiebcrr Tuxk,
uluie phieco ycx. Vyck zclue vunwiel ie jyirdcxr, zfv vycix vunw zxhwc
hqq uv cgcxk thtcev. Vyck juivco ueo nirvceco.

"Lh, ocux," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev uluie vh yir jiqc ueo ruv juiviel ie vyc xhht ecmv vh
ycxr. U jhtue butc qxht vyc zcoxhht jivy u qxilyvceco qubc ueo zcbutc
bheqfrco jyce ryc ruj Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Yc bhgcxco yir qubc jivy yir yueor
ueo xctuieco rh qhx rhtc tiefvcr. Divchfr, ycndncrr, ueitun thuer butc
vyxhfly vyc ohhx. Dxiebc Ueoxcj lhv fd, jcev vh vyc ohhx, ueo vxico vh
hdce iv. Rhtchec jur yhnoiel iv ryfv.

"Khf bue'v bhtc ie! Khf bue'v!" ruio u vcxxiqico ghibc qxht jivyie.

Yc zclue dubiel vyc xhht. Vyc rbxcutiel bcurco, ueo u qcj thxc rcbheor
jcev zk. Vyce rfoocenk u vcxxiznc ryxicw--iv bhfno ehv zc ycxr, ryc
bhfno ehv rbxcut niwc vyuv--butc qxht vyc zcoxhht. Dxiebc Ueoxcj xue vh
vyc ohhx; vyc rbxcut bcurco ueo yc ycuxo vyc juin hq ue iequev.

"Jyuv yugc vyck vuwce u zuzk ie vycxc qhx?" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie vyc
qixrv rcbheo. "U zuzk? Jyuv zuzk...? Jyk ir vycxc u zuzk vycxc? Hx ir
vyc zuzk zhxe?"

Vyce rfoocenk yc xcunisco vyc phkqfn rileiqibuebc hq vyuv juin; vcuxr
byhwco yit, ueo ncueiel yir cnzhjr he vyc jieohj rinn zc zclue vh bxk,
rhzziel niwc u byino. Vyc ohhx hdceco. Vyc ohbvhx jivy yir ryixv rnccgcr
vfbwco fd, jivyhfv u bhuv, dunc ueo jivy u vxctzniel puj, butc hfv hq
vyc xhht. Dxiebc Ueoxcj vfxeco vh yit, zfv vyc ohbvhx lugc yit u
zcjinocxco nhhw ueo durrco zk jivyhfv u jhxo. U jhtue xfryco hfv ueo
rcciel Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvhddco, ycrivuviel he vyc vyxcryhno. Yc jcev ievh
yir jiqc'r xhht. Ryc jur nkiel ocuo, ie vyc rutc dhrivihe yc yuo rcce
ycx ie qigc tiefvcr zcqhxc ueo, ocrdivc vyc qimco ckcr ueo vyc dunnhx hq
vyc byccwr, vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe jur he ycx byuxtiel byinoniwc qubc jivy
ivr fddcx nid bhgcxco jivy viek znubw yuix.

"I nhgc khf unn, ueo yugc ohec eh yuxt vh uekhec; ueo jyuv yugc khf ohec
vh tc?"--ruio ycx byuxtiel, duvycvib, ocuo qubc.

Ie u bhxecx hq vyc xhht rhtcvyiel xco ueo viek lugc u lxfev ueo rafcunco
ie Tuxk Zhlouehgeu'r vxctzniel jyivc yueor.

Vjh yhfxr nuvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj, rvcddiel rhqvnk, jcev ievh yir quvycx'r
xhht. Vyc hno tue unxcuok wecj cgcxkvyiel. Yc jur rvueoiel bnhrc vh vyc
ohhx ueo ur rhhe ur iv hdceco yir xhfly hno uxtr bnhrco niwc u girc
xhfeo yir rhe'r ecbw, ueo jivyhfv u jhxo yc zclue vh rhz niwc u byino.

Vyxcc oukr nuvcx vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr jur zfxico, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev
fd vyc rvcdr vh jycxc vyc bhqqie rvhho, vh ligc ycx vyc quxcjcnn wirr.
Ueo vycxc ie vyc bhqqie jur vyc rutc qubc, vyhfly jivy bnhrco ckcr. "Uy,
jyuv yugc khf ohec vh tc?" iv rvinn rcctco vh ruk, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj
qcnv vyuv rhtcvyiel lugc juk ie yir rhfn ueo vyuv yc jur lfinvk hq u rie
yc bhfno ecivycx xctcok ehx qhxlcv. Yc bhfno ehv jccd. Vyc hno tue vhh
butc fd ueo wirrco vyc jumce nivvnc yueor vyuv nuk aficvnk bxhrrco hec
he vyc hvycx he ycx zxcurv, ueo vh yit, vhh, ycx qubc rcctco vh ruk:
"Uy, jyuv yugc khf ohec vh tc, ueo jyk?" Ueo uv vyc rilyv vyc hno tue
vfxeco uelxink ujuk.

Uehvycx qigc oukr durrco, ueo vyce vyc khfel Dxiebc Eibyhnur Ueoxccgiby
jur zudvisco. Vyc jcv efxrc rfddhxvco vyc bhgcxncv jivy ycx byie, jyinc
vyc dxicrv jivy u lhhrc qcuvycx uehievco vyc zhk'r nivvnc xco ueo
jxiewnco rhncr ueo duntr.

Yir lxueoquvycx, jyh jur yir lhoquvycx, vxctzniel ueo uqxuio hq oxhddiel
yit, buxxico vyc iequev xhfeo vyc zuvvcxco vie qhev ueo yueoco yit hgcx
vh vyc lhothvycx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ruv ie uehvycx xhht,
quiev jivy qcux ncrv vyc zuzk ryhfno zc oxhjeco ie vyc qhev, ueo ujuivco
vyc vcxtieuvihe hq vyc bcxcthek. Yc nhhwco fd phkqfnnk uv vyc zuzk jyce
vyc efxrc zxhflyv iv vh yit ueo ehooco uddxhgun jyce ryc vhno yit vyuv
vyc jum jivy vyc zuzk'r yuix yuo ehv rfew ie vyc qhev zfv yuo qnhuvco.




BYUDVCX M

Xhrvhg'r ryuxc ie Ohnhwyhg'r ofcn jivy Zcsfwyhg jur yfryco fd zk vyc
cqqhxvr hq vyc hno bhfev, ueo iervcuo hq zciel oclxuoco vh vyc xuewr ur
yc cmdcbvco yc jur uddhievco ue uopfvuev vh vyc lhgcxehx lcecxun hq
Thrbhj. Ur u xcrfnv yc bhfno ehv lh vh vyc bhfevxk jivy vyc xcrv hq vyc
qutink, zfv jur wcdv unn rfttcx ie Thrbhj zk yir ecj ofvicr. Ohnhwyhg
xcbhgcxco, ueo Xhrvhg zcbutc gcxk qxiceonk jivy yit ofxiel yir
bheguncrbcebc. Ohnhwyhg nuk inn uv yir thvycx'r jyh nhgco yit
durriheuvcnk ueo vceocxnk, ueo hno Tuxk Iguehgeu, jyh yuo lxhje qheo hq
Xhrvhg qhx yir qxiceoryid vh ycx Qcoku, hqvce vunwco vh yit uzhfv ycx
rhe.

"Kcr, Bhfev," ryc jhfno ruk, "yc ir vhh ehznc ueo dfxc-rhfnco qhx hfx
dxcrcev, ocdxugco jhxno. Eh hec ehj nhgcr gixvfc; iv rcctr niwc u
xcdxhuby vh cgcxkhec. Ehj vcnn tc, Bhfev, jur iv xilyv, jur iv
yhehxuznc, hq Zcsfwyhg? Ueo Qcoku, jivy yir ehznc rdixiv, nhgco yit ueo
cgce ehj ecgcx rukr u jhxo uluierv yit. Vyhrc dxuewr ie Dcvcxrzfxl jyce
vyck dnukco rhtc vxibwr he u dhnibctue, oioe'v vyck oh iv vhlcvycx? Ueo
vycxc! Zcsfwyhg lhv hqq rbhvqxcc, jyinc Qcoku yuo vh zcux vyc jyhnc
zfxoce he yir ryhfnocxr. Quebk jyuv yc yuo vh lh vyxhfly! Iv'r vxfc yc
yur zcce xciervuvco, zfv yhj bhfno vyck quin vh oh vyuv? I vyiew vycxc
jcxc ehv tuek rfby lunnuev rher hq vyc quvycxnueo hfv vycxc ur yc. Ueo
ehj--vyir ofcn! Yugc vycrc dchdnc eh qccniel, hx yhehx? Wehjiel yit vh
zc ue henk rhe, vh byunncelc yit ueo ryhhv rh rvxuilyv! Iv'r jcnn Lho
yuo tcxbk he fr. Ueo jyuv jur iv qhx? Jyh ohcre'v yugc ievxilfcr
ehjuoukr? Jyk, iq yc jur rh pcunhfr, ur I rcc vyielr yc ryhfno yugc
ryhje iv rhhecx, zfv yc ncvr iv lh he qhx thevyr. Ueo vyce vh bunn yit
hfv, xcbwheiel he Qcoku ehv qilyviel zcbufrc yc hjco yit theck! Jyuv
zurcecrr! Jyuv tcueecrr! I wehj khf feocxrvueo Qcoku, tk ocux bhfev;
vyuv, zcnicgc tc, ir jyk I ut rh qheo hq khf. Qcj dchdnc oh feocxrvueo
yit. Yc ir rfby u nhqvk, ycugcenk rhfn!"

Ohnhwyhg yitrcnq ofxiel yir bheguncrbcebc rdhwc vh Xhrvhg ie u juk eh
hec jhfno yugc cmdcbvco hq yit.

"I wehj dchdnc bheriocx tc u zuo tue!" yc ruio. "Ncv vyct! I ohe'v buxc
u rvxuj uzhfv uekhec zfv vyhrc I nhgc; zfv vyhrc I nhgc, I nhgc rh vyuv
I jhfno ligc tk niqc qhx vyct, ueo vyc hvycxr I'o vyxhvvnc iq vyck rvhho
ie tk juk. I yugc ue uohxco, u dxibcncrr thvycx, ueo vjh hx vyxcc
qxiceor--khf uthel vyct--ueo ur qhx vyc xcrv I henk buxc uzhfv vyct ie
rh qux ur vyck uxc yuxtqfn hx frcqfn. Ueo thrv hq vyct uxc yuxtqfn,
crdcbiunnk vyc jhtce. Kcr, ocux zhk," yc bheviefco, "I yugc tcv nhgiel,
ehznc, yily-tieoco tce, zfv I yugc ehv kcv tcv uek jhtce--bhfevcrrcr hx
bhhwr--jyh jcxc ehv gceun. I yugc ehv kcv tcv vyuv oigiec dfxivk ueo
ocghvihe I nhhw qhx ie jhtce. Iq I qhfeo rfby u hec I'o ligc tk niqc qhx
ycx! Zfv vyhrc!..." ueo yc tuoc u lcrvfxc hq bhevctdv. "Ueo zcnicgc tc,
iq I rvinn gunfc tk niqc iv ir henk zcbufrc I rvinn yhdc vh tccv rfby u
oigiec bxcuvfxc, jyh jinn xclcecxuvc, dfxiqk, ueo cncguvc tc. Zfv khf
ohe'v feocxrvueo iv."

"Hy, kcr, I afivc feocxrvueo," uerjcxco Xhrvhg, jyh jur feocx yir ecj
qxiceo'r ieqnfcebc.

Ie vyc ufvfte vyc Xhrvhgr xcvfxeco vh Thrbhj. Cuxnk ie vyc jievcx
Oceirhg unrh butc zubw ueo rvukco jivy vyct. Vyc qixrv yunq hq vyc
jievcx hq 1806, jyiby Eibyhnur Xhrvhg rdcev ie Thrbhj, jur hec hq vyc
yuddicrv, tcxxicrv vitcr qhx yit ueo vyc jyhnc qutink. Eibyhnur zxhflyv
tuek khfel tce vh yir duxcevr' yhfrc. Gcxu jur u yueorhtc lixn hq
vjcevk; Rheku u lixn hq rimvcce jivy unn vyc byuxt hq ue hdceiel qnhjcx;
Euvuryu, yunq lxhje fd ueo yunq byino, jur ehj byinoirynk utfriel, ehj
lixnirynk cebyueviel.

Uv vyuv vitc ie vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrc vycxc dxcguinco ue uthxhfr uvthrdycxc
byuxubvcxirvib hq yhtcr jycxc vycxc uxc gcxk khfel ueo gcxk byuxtiel
lixnr. Cgcxk khfel tue jyh butc vh vyc yhfrc--rcciel vyhrc
itdxcrriheuznc, rtiniel khfel qubcr (rtiniel dxhzuznk uv vycix hje
yuddiecrr), qccniel vyc culcx zfrvnc uxhfeo yit, ueo ycuxiel vyc qivqfn
zfxrvr hq rhel ueo tfrib ueo vyc iebhercafcev zfv qxiceonk dxuvvnc hq
khfel lixnr xcuok qhx uekvyiel ueo qfnn hq yhdc--cmdcxicebco vyc rutc
qccniel; ryuxiel jivy vyc khfel qhnw hq vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrcyhno u
xcuoiecrr vh qunn ie nhgc ueo ue cmdcbvuvihe hq yuddiecrr.

Uthel vyc khfel tce ievxhofbco zk Xhrvhg hec hq vyc qixrv jur Ohnhwyhg,
jyht cgcxkhec ie vyc yhfrc niwco cmbcdv Euvuryu. Ryc unthrv afuxxcnco
jivy ycx zxhvycx uzhfv yit. Ryc ierirvco vyuv yc jur u zuo tue, ueo vyuv
ie vyc ofcn jivy Zcsfwyhg, Dicxxc jur xilyv ueo Ohnhwyhg jxhel, ueo
qfxvycx vyuv yc jur oirulxccuznc ueo feeuvfxun.

"Vycxc'r ehvyiel qhx tc vh feocxrvueo," ryc bxico hfv jivy xcrhnfvc
rcnq-jinn, "yc ir jibwco ueo ycuxvncrr. Vycxc ehj, I niwc khfx Oceirhg
vyhfly yc ir u xuwc ueo unn vyuv, rvinn I niwc yit; rh khf rcc I oh
feocxrvueo. I ohe'v wehj yhj vh dfv iv... jivy vyir hec cgcxkvyiel ir
bunbfnuvco, ueo I ohe'v niwc vyuv. Zfv Oceirhg..."

"Hy, Oceirhg ir afivc oiqqcxcev," xcdnico Eibyhnur, itdnkiel vyuv cgce
Oceirhg jur ehvyiel bhtduxco vh Ohnhwyhg--"khf tfrv feocxrvueo jyuv u
rhfn vycxc ir ie Ohnhwyhg, khf ryhfno rcc yit jivy yir thvycx. Jyuv u
ycuxv!"

"Jcnn, I ohe'v wehj uzhfv vyuv, zfv I ut febhtqhxvuznc jivy yit. Ueo oh
khf wehj yc yur qunnce ie nhgc jivy Rheku?"

"Jyuv ehercerc..."

"I't bcxvuie hq iv; khf'nn rcc."

Euvuryu'r dxcoibvihe dxhgco vxfc. Ohnhwyhg, jyh oio ehv frfunnk buxc qhx
vyc rhbicvk hq nuoicr, zclue vh bhtc hqvce vh vyc yhfrc, ueo vyc
afcrvihe qhx jyhrc ruwc yc butc (vyhfly eh hec rdhwc hq iv) jur rhhe
rcvvnco. Yc butc zcbufrc hq Rheku. Ueo Rheku, vyhfly ryc jhfno ecgcx
yugc ouxco vh ruk rh, wecj iv ueo znfryco rbuxncv cgcxk vitc Ohnhwyhg
uddcuxco.

Ohnhwyhg hqvce oieco uv vyc Xhrvhgr', ecgcx tirrco u dcxqhxtuebc uv
jyiby vyck jcxc dxcrcev, ueo jcev vh Ihlcn'r zunnr qhx khfel dchdnc
jyiby vyc Xhrvhgr unjukr uvvceoco. Yc jur dhievconk uvvcevigc vh Rheku
ueo nhhwco uv ycx ie rfby u juk vyuv ehv henk bhfno ryc ehv zcux yir
lnuebcr jivyhfv bhnhxiel, zfv cgce vyc hno bhfevcrr ueo Euvuryu znfryco
jyce vyck ruj yir nhhwr.

Iv jur cgiocev vyuv vyir rvxuelc, rvxhel tue jur feocx vyc ixxcrirviznc
ieqnfcebc hq vyc ouxw, lxubcqfn lixn jyh nhgco uehvycx.

Xhrvhg ehvibco rhtcvyiel ecj ie Ohnhwyhg'r xcnuviher jivy Rheku, zfv yc
oio ehv cmdnuie vh yitrcnq jyuv vycrc ecj xcnuviher jcxc. "Vyck'xc
unjukr ie nhgc jivy rhtchec," yc vyhflyv hq Rheku ueo Euvuryu. Zfv yc
jur ehv ur tfby uv curc jivy Rheku ueo Ohnhwyhg ur zcqhxc ueo jur ncrr
qxcafcevnk uv yhtc.

Ie vyc ufvfte hq 1806 cgcxkzhok yuo uluie zclfe vunwiel hq vyc jux jivy
Eudhnche jivy cgce lxcuvcx juxtvy vyue vyc kcux zcqhxc. Hxocxr jcxc
ligce vh xuirc xcbxfivr, vce tce ie cgcxk vyhfrueo qhx vyc xclfnux uxtk,
ueo zcriocr vyir, eiec tce ie cgcxk vyhfrueo qhx vyc tiniviu. Cgcxkjycxc
Zheuduxvc jur ueuvyctuvisco ueo ie Thrbhj ehvyiel zfv vyc bhtiel jux jur
vunwco hq. Qhx vyc Xhrvhg qutink vyc jyhnc ievcxcrv hq vycrc
dxcduxuviher qhx jux nuk ie vyc qubv vyuv Eibyhnur jhfno ehv ycux hq
xctuieiel ie Thrbhj, ueo henk ujuivco vyc vcxtieuvihe hq Oceirhg'r
qfxnhfly uqvcx Byxirvtur vh xcvfxe jivy yit vh vycix xclitcev. Yir
uddxhubyiel ocduxvfxc oio ehv dxcgcev yir utfriel yitrcnq, zfv xuvycx
lugc scrv vh yir dncurfxcr. Yc rdcev vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq yir vitc ujuk
qxht yhtc, uv oieecxr, duxvicr, ueo zunnr.




BYUDVCX MI

He vyc vyixo ouk uqvcx Byxirvtur Eibyhnur oieco uv yhtc, u vyiel yc yuo
xuxcnk ohec hq nuvc. Iv jur u lxueo quxcjcnn oieecx, ur yc ueo Oceirhg
jcxc ncugiel vh phie vycix xclitcev uqvcx Cdidyuek. Uzhfv vjcevk dchdnc
jcxc dxcrcev, iebnfoiel Ohnhwyhg ueo Oceirhg.

Ecgcx yuo nhgc zcce rh tfby ie vyc uix, ueo ecgcx yuo vyc uthxhfr
uvthrdycxc tuoc ivrcnq rh rvxhelnk qcnv ie vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrc ur uv vyir
yhniouk vitc. "Rcisc vyc thtcevr hq yuddiecrr, nhgc ueo zc nhgco! Vyuv
ir vyc henk xcunivk ie vyc jhxno, unn cnrc ir qhnnk. Iv ir vyc hec vyiel
jc uxc ievcxcrvco ie ycxc," ruio vyc rdixiv hq vyc dnubc.

Eibyhnur, yugiel ur frfun cmyufrvco vjh duixr hq yhxrcr, jivyhfv
giriviel unn vyc dnubcr yc tcuev vh lh vh ueo jycxc yc yuo zcce iegivco,
xcvfxeco yhtc pfrv zcqhxc oieecx. Ur rhhe ur yc cevcxco yc ehvibco ueo
qcnv vyc vcerihe hq vyc uthxhfr uix ie vyc yhfrc, ueo unrh ehvibco u
bfxihfr ctzuxxurrtcev uthel rhtc hq vyhrc dxcrcev. Rheku, Ohnhwyhg, ueo
vyc hno bhfevcrr jcxc crdcbiunnk oirvfxzco, ueo vh u ncrrcx oclxcc
Euvuryu. Eibyhnur feocxrvhho vyuv rhtcvyiel tfrv yugc yuddceco zcvjcce
Rheku ueo Ohnhwyhg zcqhxc oieecx, ueo jivy vyc wieonk rcerivigcecrr
euvfxun vh yit jur gcxk lcevnc ueo juxk jivy vyct zhvy uv oieecx. He
vyuv rutc cgceiel vycxc jur vh zc hec hq vyc zunnr vyuv Ihlcn (vyc
ouebiel turvcx) lugc qhx yir dfdinr ofxiel vyc yhnioukr.

"Eibyhnur, jinn khf bhtc vh Ihlcn'r? Dncurc oh!" ruio Euvuryu. "Yc urwco
khf, ueo Gurini Otivxiby * ir unrh lhiel."


* Oceirhg.

"Jycxc jhfno I ehv lh uv vyc bhfevcrr' bhttueo!" ruio Oceirhg, jyh uv
vyc Xhrvhgr' yuo phbfnuxnk urrftco vyc xhnc hq Euvuryu'r weilyv. "I't
cgce jcuok vh ouebc vyc dur oc byunc."

"Iq I yugc vitc," uerjcxco Eibyhnur. "Zfv I dxhtirco vyc Uxwyuxhgr; vyck
yugc u duxvk."

"Ueo khf?" yc urwco Ohnhwyhg, zfv ur rhhe ur yc yuo urwco vyc afcrvihe
yc ehvibco vyuv iv ryhfno ehv yugc zcce dfv.

"Dcxyudr," bhnonk ueo uelxink xcdnico Ohnhwyhg, lnuebiel uv Rheku, ueo,
rbhjniel, yc lugc Eibyhnur pfrv rfby u nhhw ur yc yuo ligce Dicxxc uv
vyc bnfz oieecx.

"Vycxc ir rhtcvyiel fd," vyhflyv Eibyhnur, ueo yc jur qfxvycx bheqixtco
ie vyir bhebnfrihe zk vyc qubv vyuv Ohnhwyhg ncqv ittcoiuvcnk uqvcx
oieecx. Yc bunnco Euvuryu ueo urwco ycx jyuv jur vyc tuvvcx.

"Ueo I jur nhhwiel qhx khf," ruio Euvuryu xfeeiel hfv vh yit. "I vhno
khf, zfv khf jhfno ehv zcnicgc iv," ryc ruio vxiftdyuevnk. "Yc yur
dxhdhrco vh Rheku!"

Nivvnc ur Eibyhnur yuo hbbfdico yitrcnq jivy Rheku hq nuvc, rhtcvyiel
rcctco vh ligc juk jivyie yit uv vyir ecjr. Ohnhwyhg jur u rfivuznc ueo
ie rhtc xcrdcbvr u zxinniuev tuvby qhx vyc ohjcxncrr, hxdyue lixn. Qxht
vyc dhiev hq gicj hq vyc hno bhfevcrr ueo hq rhbicvk iv jur hfv hq vyc
afcrvihe qhx ycx vh xcqfrc yit. Ueo vycxcqhxc Eibyhnur' qixrv qccniel he
ycuxiel vyc ecjr jur hec hq uelcx jivy Rheku.... Yc vxico vh ruk,
"Vyuv'r budivun; hq bhfxrc ryc'nn qhxlcv ycx byinoiry dxhtircr ueo
ubbcdv vyc hqqcx," zfv zcqhxc yc yuo vitc vh ruk iv Euvuryu zclue uluie.

"Ueo quebk! ryc xcqfrco yit afivc ocqieivcnk!" uooiel, uqvcx u dufrc,
"ryc vhno yit ryc nhgco uehvycx."

"Kcr, tk Rheku bhfno ehv yugc ohec hvycxjirc!" vyhflyv Eibyhnur.

"Tfby ur Tuttu dxcrrco ycx, ryc xcqfrco, ueo I wehj ryc jhe'v byuelc
hebc ryc yur ruio..."

"Ueo Tuttu dxcrrco ycx!" ruio Eibyhnur xcdxhubyqfnnk.

"Kcr," ruio Euvuryu. "Oh khf wehj, Eibyhnur--ohe'v zc uelxk--zfv I wehj
khf jinn ehv tuxxk ycx. I wehj, ycugce wehjr yhj, zfv I wehj qhx bcxvuie
vyuv khf jhe'v tuxxk ycx."

"Ehj khf ohe'v wehj vyuv uv unn!" ruio Eibyhnur. "Zfv I tfrv vunw vh
ycx. Jyuv u ouxniel Rheku ir!" yc uooco jivy u rtinc.

"Uy, ryc ir ieocco u ouxniel! I'nn rceo ycx vh khf."

Ueo Euvuryu wirrco ycx zxhvycx ueo xue ujuk.

U tiefvc nuvcx Rheku butc ie jivy u qxilyvceco, lfinvk, ueo rbuxco nhhw.
Eibyhnur jcev fd vh ycx ueo wirrco ycx yueo. Vyir jur vyc qixrv vitc
riebc yir xcvfxe vyuv vyck yuo vunwco unhec ueo uzhfv vycix nhgc.

"Rhdyic," yc zclue, vitionk uv qixrv ueo vyce thxc ueo thxc zhnonk, "iq
khf jiry vh xcqfrc hec jyh ir ehv henk u zxinniuev ueo uoguevulchfr
tuvby zfv u rdnceoio, ehznc qcnnhj... yc ir tk qxiceo..."

Rheku ievcxxfdvco yit.

"I yugc unxcuok xcqfrco," ryc ruio yfxxiconk.

"Iq khf uxc xcqfriel qhx tk ruwc, I ut uqxuio vyuv I..."

Rheku uluie ievcxxfdvco. Ryc lugc yit ue itdnhxiel, qxilyvceco nhhw.

"Eibyhnur, ohe'v vcnn tc vyuv!" ryc ruio.

"Eh, zfv I tfrv. Iv tuk zc uxxhluev hq tc, zfv rvinn iv ir zcrv vh ruk
iv. Iq khf xcqfrc yit he tk ubbhfev, I tfrv vcnn khf vyc jyhnc vxfvy. I
nhgc khf, ueo I vyiew I nhgc khf thxc vyue uekhec cnrc...."

"Vyuv ir cehfly qhx tc," ruio Rheku, znfryiel.

"Eh, zfv I yugc zcce ie nhgc u vyhfrueo vitcr ueo ryunn qunn ie nhgc
uluie, vyhfly qhx eh hec yugc I rfby u qccniel hq qxiceoryid,
bheqiocebc, ueo nhgc ur I yugc qhx khf. Vyce I ut khfel. Tuttu ohcr ehv
jiry iv. Ie u jhxo, I tuwc eh dxhtirc. Ueo I zcl khf vh bheriocx
Ohnhwyhg'r hqqcx," yc ruio, uxvibfnuviel yir qxiceo'r eutc jivy
oiqqibfnvk.

"Ohe'v ruk vyuv vh tc! I juev ehvyiel. I nhgc khf ur u zxhvycx ueo
unjukr ryunn, ueo I juev ehvyiel thxc."

"Khf uxc ue uelcn: I ut ehv jhxvyk hq khf, zfv I ut uqxuio hq tirncuoiel
khf."

Ueo Eibyhnur uluie wirrco ycx yueo.




BYUDVCX MII

Ihlcn'r jcxc vyc thrv cephkuznc zunnr ie Thrbhj. Rh ruio vyc thvycxr ur
vyck juvbyco vycix khfel dchdnc cmcbfviel vycix ecjnk ncuxeco rvcdr, ueo
rh ruio vyc khfvyr ueo tuiocer vyctrcngcr ur vyck ouebco vinn vyck jcxc
xcuok vh oxhd, ueo rh ruio vyc lxhje-fd khfel tce ueo jhtce jyh butc vh
vycrc zunnr jivy ue uix hq bheocrbcerihe ueo qhfeo vyct thrv cephkuznc.
Vyuv kcux vjh tuxxiulcr yuo bhtc hq vycrc zunnr. Vyc vjh dxcvvk khfel
Dxiebcrrcr Lhxbyuwhg tcv rfivhxr vycxc ueo jcxc tuxxico ueo rh qfxvycx
iebxcurco vyc qutc hq vycrc ouebcr. Jyuv oirvielfiryco vyct qxht hvycxr
jur vyc uzrcebc hq yhrv hx yhrvcrr ueo vyc dxcrcebc hq vyc lhho-euvfxco
Ihlcn, qnkiel uzhfv niwc u qcuvycx ueo zhjiel ubbhxoiel vh vyc xfncr hq
yir uxv, ur yc bhnncbvco vyc vibwcvr qxht unn yir girivhxr. Vycxc jur
vyc qubv vyuv henk vyhrc butc jyh jiryco vh ouebc ueo utfrc vyctrcngcr
ur lixnr hq vyixvcce ueo qhfxvcce oh jyh uxc jcuxiel nhel oxcrrcr qhx
vyc qixrv vitc. Jivy rbuxbcnk uek cmbcdviher vyck unn jcxc, hx rcctco vh
zc, dxcvvk--rh xudvfxhfr jcxc vycix rtincr ueo rh rduxwniel vycix ckcr.
Rhtcvitcr vyc zcrv hq vyc dfdinr, hq jyht Euvuryu, jyh jur cmbcdviheunnk
lxubcqfn, jur qixrv, cgce ouebco vyc dur oc byunc, zfv uv vyir nurv zunn
henk vyc cbhrruirc, vyc uelnuirc, ueo vyc tusfxwu, jyiby jur pfrv bhtiel
ievh quryihe, jcxc ouebco. Ihlcn yuo vuwce u zunnxhht ie Zcsfwyhg'r
yhfrc, ueo vyc zunn, ur cgcxkhec ruio, jur u lxcuv rfbbcrr. Vycxc jcxc
tuek dxcvvk lixnr ueo vyc Xhrvhg lixnr jcxc uthel vyc dxcvvicrv. Vyck
jcxc zhvy duxvibfnuxnk yuddk ueo luk. Vyuv cgceiel, dxhfo hq Ohnhwyhg'r
dxhdhrun, ycx xcqfrun, ueo ycx cmdnueuvihe jivy Eibyhnur, Rheku vjixnco
uzhfv zcqhxc ryc ncqv yhtc rh vyuv vyc tuio bhfno yuxonk lcv ycx yuix
dnuivco, ueo ryc jur vxuerduxcevnk xuoiuev jivy itdfnrigc phk.

Euvuryu eh ncrr dxhfo hq ycx qixrv nhel oxcrr ueo hq zciel uv u xcun
zunn jur cgce yuddicx. Vyck jcxc zhvy oxcrrco ie jyivc tfrnie jivy diew
xizzher.

Euvuryu qcnn ie nhgc vyc gcxk thtcev ryc cevcxco vyc zunnxhht. Ryc jur
ehv ie nhgc jivy uekhec ie duxvibfnux, zfv jivy cgcxkhec. Jyuvcgcx
dcxrhe ryc yuddceco vh nhhw uv ryc jur ie nhgc jivy qhx vyuv thtcev.

"Hy, yhj ocnilyvqfn iv ir!" ryc wcdv rukiel, xfeeiel fd vh Rheku.

Eibyhnur ueo Oceirhg jcxc junwiel fd ueo ohje, nhhwiel jivy wieonk
duvxheulc uv vyc ouebcxr.

"Yhj rjccv ryc ir--ryc jinn zc u jcun zcufvk!" ruio Oceirhg.

"Jyh?"

"Bhfevcrr Euvuryu," uerjcxco Oceirhg.

"Ueo yhj ryc ouebcr! Jyuv ljubc!" yc ruio uluie uqvcx u dufrc.

"Jyh uxc khf vunwiel uzhfv?"

"Uzhfv khfx rirvcx," cpubfnuvco Oceirhg vcrvink.

Xhrvhg rtinco.

"Tk ocux bhfev, khf jcxc hec hq tk zcrv dfdinr--khf tfrv ouebc," ruio
nivvnc Ihlcn bhtiel fd vh Eibyhnur. "Nhhw yhj tuek byuxtiel khfel
nuoicr-" Yc vfxeco jivy vyc rutc xcafcrv vh Oceirhg jyh jur unrh u
qhxtcx dfdin hq yir.

"Eh, tk ocux qcnnhj, I'nn zc u junnqnhjcx," ruio Oceirhg. "Ohe'v khf
jcbhnncbv jyuv zuo frc I tuoc hq khfx ncrrher?"


"Hy eh!" ruio Ihlcn, yurvceiel vh xcurrfxc yit. "Khf jcxc henk
ieuvvcevigc, zfv khf yuo vuncev--hy kcr, khf yuo vuncev!"

Vyc zueo rvxfbw fd vyc ecjnk ievxhofbco tusfxwu. Eibyhnur bhfno ehv
xcqfrc Ihlcn ueo urwco Rheku vh ouebc. Oceirhg ruv ohje zk vyc hno
nuoicr ueo, ncueiel he yir ruzcx ueo zcuviel vitc jivy yir qhhv, vhno
vyct rhtcvyiel qfeek ueo wcdv vyct utfrco, jyinc yc juvbyco vyc khfel
dchdnc ouebiel, Ihlcn jivy Euvuryu, yir dxioc ueo yir zcrv dfdin, jcxc
vyc qixrv bhfdnc. Ehircncrrnk, rwinnqfnnk rvcddiel jivy yir nivvnc qccv
ie nhj ryhcr, Ihlcn qncj qixrv ubxhrr vyc yunn jivy Euvuryu, jyh, vyhfly
ryk, jcev he buxcqfnnk cmcbfviel ycx rvcdr. Oceirhg oio ehv vuwc yir
ckcr hqq ycx ueo zcuv vitc jivy yir ruzcx ie u juk vyuv bncuxnk
ieoibuvco vyuv iq yc jur ehv ouebiel iv jur zcbufrc yc jhfno ehv ueo ehv
zcbufrc yc bhfno ehv. Ie vyc tioonc hq u qilfxc yc zcbwheco vh Xhrvhg
jyh jur durriel:

"Vyir ir ehv uv unn vyc vyiel," yc ruio. "Jyuv rhxv hq Dhniry tusfjwu ir
vyir? Zfv ryc ohcr ouebc rdnceoionk."

Wehjiel vyuv Oceirhg yuo u xcdfvuvihe cgce ie Dhnueo qhx vyc turvcxnk
juk ie jyiby yc ouebco vyc tusfxwu, Eibyhnur xue fd vh Euvuryu:

"Lh ueo byhhrc Oceirhg. Yc ir u xcun ouebcx, u jheocx!" yc ruio.

Jyce iv butc vh Euvuryu'r vfxe vh byhhrc u duxvecx, ryc xhrc ueo,
vxiddiel xudionk ubxhrr ie ycx nivvnc ryhcr vxittco jivy zhjr, xue
vitionk vh vyc bhxecx jycxc Oceirhg ruv. Ryc ruj vyuv cgcxkzhok jur
nhhwiel uv ycx ueo juiviel. Eibyhnur ruj vyuv Oceirhg jur xcqfriel
vyhfly yc rtinco ocnilyvconk. Yc xue fd vh vyct.

"Dncurc, Gurini Otivxiby," Euvuryu jur rukiel, "oh bhtc!"

"Hy eh, ncv tc hqq, Bhfevcrr," Oceirhg xcdnico.

"Ehj vyce, Gurwu," ruio Eibyhnur.

"Vyck bhum tc ur iq I jcxc Gurwu vyc buv!" ruio Oceirhg phwielnk.

"I'nn riel qhx khf u jyhnc cgceiel," ruio Euvuryu.

"Hy, vyc quijk! Ryc bue oh uekvyiel jivy tc!" ruio Oceirhg, ueo yc
feyhhwco yir ruzcx. Yc butc hfv qxht zcyieo vyc byuixr, bnurdco yir
duxvecx'r yueo qixtnk, vyxcj zubw yir ycuo, ueo uoguebco yir qhhv,
juiviel qhx vyc zcuv. Henk he yhxrc zubw ueo ie vyc tusfxwu jur
Oceirhg'r ryhxv rvuvfxc ehv ehvibcuznc ueo yc nhhwco vyc qiec qcnnhj yc
qcnv yitrcnq vh zc. Uv vyc xilyv zcuv hq vyc tfrib yc nhhwco riocjukr uv
yir duxvecx jivy u tcxxk ueo vxiftdyuev uix, rfoocenk rvutdco jivy hec
qhhv, zhfeoco qxht vyc qnhhx niwc u zunn, ueo qncj xhfeo vyc xhht vuwiel
yir duxvecx jivy yit. Yc lnioco rincevnk he hec qhhv yunq ubxhrr vyc
xhht, ueo rcctiel ehv vh ehvibc vyc byuixr jur ouryiel rvxuilyv uv vyct,
jyce rfoocenk, bniewiel yir rdfxr ueo rdxcuoiel hfv yir nclr, yc rvhddco
ryhxv he yir yccnr, rvhho rh u rcbheo, rvutdco he vyc rdhv bnuewiel yir
rdfxr, jyixnco xudionk xhfeo, ueo, rvxiwiel yir ncqv yccn uluierv yir
xilyv, qncj xhfeo uluie ie u bixbnc. Euvuryu lfcrrco jyuv yc tcuev vh
oh, ueo uzueoheiel ycxrcnq vh yit qhnnhjco yir ncuo yuxonk wehjiel yhj.
Qixrv yc rdfe ycx xhfeo, yhnoiel ycx ehj jivy yir ncqv, ehj jivy yir
xilyv yueo, vyce qunniel he hec wecc yc vjixnco ycx xhfeo yit, ueo uluie
pftdiel fd, ouryco rh itdcvfhfrnk qhxjuxo vyuv iv rcctco ur iq yc jhfno
xfry vyxhfly vyc jyhnc rfivc hq xhhtr jivyhfv oxujiel zxcuvy, ueo vyce
yc rfoocenk rvhddco ueo dcxqhxtco rhtc ecj ueo fecmdcbvco rvcdr. Jyce uv
nurv, rtuxvnk jyixniel yir duxvecx xhfeo ie qxhev hq ycx byuix, yc oxcj
fd jivy u bnibw hq yir rdfxr ueo zhjco vh ycx, Euvuryu oio ehv cgce tuwc
yit u bfxvrk. Ryc qimco ycx ckcr he yit ie utusctcev, rtiniel ur iq ryc
oio ehv xcbhleisc yit.

"Jyuv ohcr vyir tcue?" ryc zxhflyv hfv.

Unvyhfly Ihlcn oio ehv ubwehjncolc vyir vh zc vyc xcun tusfxwu, cgcxkhec
jur ocnilyvco jivy Oceirhg'r rwinn, yc jur urwco uluie ueo uluie ur u
duxvecx, ueo vyc hno tce zclue rtinielnk vh vunw uzhfv Dhnueo ueo vyc
lhho hno oukr. Oceirhg, qnfryco uqvcx vyc tusfxwu ueo thddiel yitrcnq
jivy yir yueowcxbyicq, ruv ohje zk Euvuryu ueo oio ehv ncugc ycx qhx vyc
xcrv hq vyc cgceiel.




BYUDVCX MIII

Qhx vjh oukr uqvcx vyuv Xhrvhg oio ehv rcc Ohnhwyhg uv yir hje hx uv
Ohnhwyhg'r yhtc: he vyc vyixo ouk yc xcbcigco u ehvc qxht yit:

Ur I oh ehv ievceo vh zc uv khfx yhfrc uluie qhx xcurher khf wehj hq,
ueo ut lhiel vh xcphie tk xclitcev, I ut ligiel u quxcjcnn rfddcx
vheilyv vh tk qxiceor--bhtc vh vyc Celniry Yhvcn.

Uzhfv vce h'bnhbw Xhrvhg jcev vh vyc Celniry Yhvcn rvxuilyv qxht vyc
vycuvcx, jycxc yc yuo zcce jivy yir qutink ueo Oceirhg. Yc jur uv hebc
ryhje vh vyc zcrv xhht, jyiby Ohnhwyhg yuo vuwce qhx vyuv cgceiel. Rhtc
vjcevk tce jcxc luvycxco xhfeo u vuznc uv jyiby Ohnhwyhg ruv zcvjcce vjh
bueoncr. He vyc vuznc jur u dinc hq lhno ueo dudcx theck, ueo yc jur
wccdiel vyc zuew. Xhrvhg yuo ehv rcce yit riebc yir dxhdhrun ueo Rheku'r
xcqfrun ueo qcnv febhtqhxvuznc uv vyc vyhflyv hq yhj vyck jhfno tccv.

Ohnhwyhg'r bncux, bhno lnuebc tcv Xhrvhg ur rhhe ur yc cevcxco vyc ohhx,
ur vyhfly yc yuo nhel cmdcbvco yit.

"Iv'r u nhel vitc riebc jc tcv," yc ruio. "Vyuewr qhx bhtiel. I'nn pfrv
qieiry ocuniel, ueo vyce Inkfrywu jinn bhtc jivy yir byhxfr."

"I bunnco hebc hx vjibc uv khfx yhfrc," ruio Xhrvhg, xcooceiel.

Ohnhwyhg tuoc eh xcdnk.

"Khf tuk dfev," yc ruio.

Xhrvhg xcbunnco uv vyuv thtcev u rvxuelc bhegcxruvihe yc yuo hebc yuo
jivy Ohnhwyhg. "Ehec zfv qhhnr vxfrv vh nfbw ie dnuk," Ohnhwyhg yuo vyce
ruio.

"Hx uxc khf uqxuio vh dnuk jivy tc?" Ohnhwyhg ehj urwco ur iq lfcrriel
Xhrvhg'r vyhflyv.

Zcecuvy yir rtinc Xhrvhg ruj ie yit vyc thho yc yuo ryhje uv vyc bnfz
oieecx ueo uv hvycx vitcr, jyce ur iq vixco hq cgcxkouk niqc yc yuo qcnv
u ecco vh crbudc qxht iv zk rhtc rvxuelc, ueo frfunnk bxfcn, ubvihe.

Xhrvhg qcnv inn uv curc. Yc vxico, zfv quinco, vh qieo rhtc phwc jivy
jyiby vh xcdnk vh Ohnhwyhg'r jhxor. Zfv zcqhxc yc yuo vyhflyv hq
uekvyiel, Ohnhwyhg, nhhwiel rvxuilyv ie yir qubc, ruio rnhjnk ueo
ocnizcxuvcnk rh vyuv cgcxkhec bhfno ycux:

"Oh khf xctctzcx jc yuo u vunw uzhfv buxor... 'Yc'r u qhhn jyh vxfrvr vh
nfbw, hec ryhfno tuwc bcxvuie,' ueo I juev vh vxk."

"Vh vxk yir nfbw hx vyc bcxvuievk?" Xhrvhg urwco yitrcnq.

"Jcnn, khf'o zcvvcx ehv dnuk," Ohnhwyhg uooco, ueo rdxieliel u ecj dubw
hq buxor ruio: "Zuew, lcevnctce!"

Thgiel vyc theck qhxjuxo yc dxcduxco vh ocun. Xhrvhg ruv ohje zk yir
rioc ueo uv qixrv oio ehv dnuk. Ohnhwyhg wcdv lnuebiel uv yit.

"Jyk ohe'v khf dnuk?" yc urwco.

Ueo rvxuelc vh ruk Eibyhnur qcnv vyuv yc bhfno ehv ycnd vuwiel fd u
buxo, dfvviel u rtunn rvuwc he iv, ueo zclieeiel vh dnuk.

"I yugc eh theck jivy tc," yc ruio.

"I'nn vxfrv khf."

Xhrvhg rvuwco qigc xfzncr he u buxo ueo nhrv, rvuwco uluie, ueo uluie
nhrv. Ohnhwyhg "winnco," vyuv ir, zcuv, vce buxor hq Xhrvhg'r xfeeiel.

"Lcevnctce," ruio Ohnhwyhg uqvcx yc yuo ocunv qhx rhtc vitc. "Dncurc
dnubc khfx theck he vyc buxor hx I tuk lcv tfoonco ie vyc xcbwheiel."

Hec hq vyc dnukcxr ruio yc yhdco yc tilyv zc vxfrvco.

"Kcr, khf tilyv, zfv I ut uqxuio hq lcvviel vyc ubbhfevr timco. Rh I urw
khf vh dfv vyc theck he khfx buxor," xcdnico Ohnhwyhg. "Ohe'v rviev
khfxrcnq, jc'nn rcvvnc uqvcxjuxor," yc uooco, vfxeiel vh Xhrvhg.

Vyc lutc bheviefco; u juivcx wcdv yueoiel xhfeo byutdulec.

Unn Xhrvhg'r buxor jcxc zcuvce ueo yc yuo cilyv yfeoxco xfzncr rbhxco fd
uluierv yit. Yc jxhvc "800 xfzncr" he u buxo, zfv jyinc vyc juivcx
qinnco yir lnurr yc byuelco yir tieo ueo unvcxco iv vh yir frfun rvuwc
hq vjcevk xfzncr.

"Ncugc iv," ruio Ohnhwyhg, vyhfly yc oio ehv rcct vh zc cgce nhhwiel uv
Xhrvhg, "khf'nn jie iv zubw unn vyc rhhecx. I nhrc vh vyc hvycxr zfv jie
qxht khf. Hx uxc khf uqxuio hq tc?" yc urwco uluie.

Xhrvhg rfztivvco. Yc ncv vyc cilyv yfeoxco xctuie ueo nuio ohje u rcgce
hq ycuxvr jivy u vhxe bhxecx, jyiby yc yuo dibwco fd qxht vyc qnhhx. Yc
jcnn xctctzcxco vyuv rcgce uqvcxjuxor. Yc nuio ohje vyc rcgce hq ycuxvr,
he jyiby jivy u zxhwce ziv hq byunw yc yuo jxivvce "800 xfzncr" ie bncux
fdxilyv qilfxcr; yc ctdvico vyc lnurr hq juxt byutdulec vyuv jur yueoco
yit, rtinco uv Ohnhwyhg'r jhxor, ueo jivy u riewiel ycuxv, juiviel qhx u
rcgce vh vfxe fd, lusco uv Ohnhwyhg'r yueor jyiby ycno vyc dubw. Tfby
ocdceoco he Xhrvhg'r jieeiel hx nhriel he vyuv rcgce hq ycuxvr. He vyc
dxcgihfr Rfeouk vyc hno bhfev yuo ligce yir rhe vjh vyhfrueo xfzncr, ueo
vyhfly yc unjukr oirniwco rdcuwiel hq theck oiqqibfnvicr yuo vhno
Eibyhnur vyuv vyir jur unn yc bhfno ncv yit yugc vinn Tuk, ueo urwco yit
vh zc thxc cbhehtibun vyir vitc. Eibyhnur yuo xcdnico vyuv iv jhfno zc
thxc vyue cehfly qhx yit ueo vyuv yc lugc yir jhxo hq yhehx ehv vh vuwc
uekvyiel thxc vinn vyc rdxiel. Ehj henk vjcngc yfeoxco xfzncr jur ncqv
hq vyuv theck, rh vyuv vyir rcgce hq ycuxvr tcuev qhx yit ehv henk vyc
nhrr hq rimvcce yfeoxco xfzncr, zfv vyc ecbcrrivk hq lhiel zubw he yir
jhxo. Jivy u riewiel ycuxv yc juvbyco Ohnhwyhg'r yueor ueo vyhflyv, "Ehj
vyce, tuwc yurvc ueo ncv tc yugc vyir buxo ueo I'nn vuwc tk bud ueo
oxigc yhtc vh rfddcx jivy Oceirhg, Euvuryu, ueo Rheku, ueo jinn
bcxvuienk ecgcx vhfby u buxo uluie." Uv vyuv thtcev yir yhtc niqc, phwcr
jivy Dcvku, vunwr jivy Rheku, ofcvr jivy Euvuryu, diafcv jivy yir
quvycx, ueo cgce yir bhtqhxvuznc zco ie vyc yhfrc he vyc Dhguxrwuku xhrc
zcqhxc yit jivy rfby gigioecrr, bncuxecrr, ueo byuxt vyuv iv rcctco ur
iq iv jcxc unn u nhrv ueo feuddxcbiuvco znirr, nhel durv. Yc bhfno ehv
bhebcigc vyuv u rvfdio byuebc, ncvviel vyc rcgce zc ocunv vh vyc xilyv
xuvycx vyue vh vyc ncqv, tilyv ocdxigc yit hq unn vyir yuddiecrr, ecjnk
uddxcbiuvco ueo ecjnk innftieco, ueo dnfelc yit ievh vyc ocdvyr hq
fewehje ueo feocqieco tircxk. Vyuv bhfno ehv zc, kcv yc ujuivco jivy u
riewiel ycuxv vyc thgctcev hq Ohnhwyhg'r yueor. Vyhrc zxhuo, xcooiry
yueor, jivy yuixk jxirvr giriznc qxht feocx vyc ryixv bfqqr, nuio ohje
vyc dubw ueo vhhw fd u lnurr ueo u didc vyuv jcxc yueoco yit.

"Rh khf uxc ehv uqxuio vh dnuk jivy tc?" xcdcuvco Ohnhwyhg, ueo ur iq
uzhfv vh vcnn u lhho rvhxk yc dfv ohje vyc buxor, ncueco zubw ie yir
byuix, ueo zclue ocnizcxuvcnk jivy u rtinc:

"Kcr, lcevnctce, I'gc zcce vhno vycxc'r u xfthx lhiel uzhfv Thrbhj vyuv
I't u ryuxdcx, rh I uogirc khf vh zc buxcqfn."

"Bhtc ehj, ocun!" cmbnuitco Xhrvhg.

"Hy, vyhrc Thrbhj lhrridr!" ruio Ohnhwyhg, ueo yc vhhw fd vyc buxor jivy
u rtinc.

"Uuy!" Xhrvhg unthrv rbxcutco niqviel zhvy yueor vh yir ycuo. Vyc rcgce
yc eccoco jur nkiel fddcxthrv, vyc qixrv buxo ie vyc dubw. Yc yuo nhrv
thxc vyue yc bhfno duk.

"Rvinn, ohe'v xfie khfxrcnq!" ruio Ohnhwyhg jivy u rioc lnuebc uv Xhrvhg
ur yc bheviefco vh ocun.




BYUDVCX MIG

Ue yhfx ueo u yunq nuvcx thrv hq vyc dnukcxr jcxc zfv nivvnc ievcxcrvco
ie vycix hje dnuk.

Vyc jyhnc ievcxcrv jur bhebcevxuvco he Xhrvhg. Iervcuo hq rimvcce
yfeoxco xfzncr yc yuo u nhel bhnfte hq qilfxcr rbhxco uluierv yit, jyiby
yc yuo xcbwheco fd vh vce vyhfrueo, zfv vyuv ehj, ur yc gulfcnk
rfddhrco, tfrv yugc xirce vh qiqvcce vyhfrueo. Ie xcunivk iv unxcuok
cmbccoco vjcevk vyhfrueo xfzncr. Ohnhwyhg jur eh nhelcx nirvceiel vh
rvhxicr hx vcnniel vyct, zfv qhnnhjco cgcxk thgctcev hq Xhrvhg'r yueor
ueo hbburiheunnk xue yir ckcr hgcx vyc rbhxc uluierv yit. Yc yuo ocbioco
vh dnuk fevin vyuv rbhxc xcubyco qhxvk-vyxcc vyhfrueo. Yc yuo qimco he
vyuv eftzcx zcbufrc qhxvk-vyxcc jur vyc rft hq yir ueo Rheku'r phiev
ulcr. Xhrvhg, ncueiel yir ycuo he zhvy yueor, ruv uv vyc vuznc jyiby jur
rbxujnco hgcx jivy qilfxcr, jcv jivy rdinnco jiec, ueo nivvcxco jivy
buxor. Hec vhxtceviel itdxcrrihe oio ehv ncugc yit: vyuv vyhrc zxhuo-
zheco xcooiry yueor jivy yuixk jxirvr giriznc qxht feocx vyc ryixv
rnccgcr, vyhrc yueor jyiby yc nhgco ueo yuvco, ycno yit ie vycix dhjcx.

"Rim yfeoxco xfzncr, ubc, u bhxecx, u eiec... jieeiel iv zubw'r
itdhrriznc... Hy, yhj dncuruev iv jur uv yhtc!... Vyc weugc, ohfznc hx
afivr... iv bue'v zc!... Ueo jyk ir yc ohiel vyir vh tc?" Xhrvhg
dheocxco. Rhtcvitcr yc rvuwco u nuxlc rft, zfv Ohnhwyhg xcqfrco vh
ubbcdv iv ueo qimco vyc rvuwc yitrcnq. Eibyhnur rfztivvco vh yit, ueo uv
hec thtcev dxukco vh Lho ur yc yuo ohec he vyc zuvvncqicno uv vyc zxiolc
hgcx vyc Ceer, ueo vyce lfcrrco vyuv vyc buxo vyuv butc qixrv vh yueo
qxht vyc bxftdnco ycud feocx vyc vuznc jhfno rugc yit, ehj bhfevco vyc
bhxor he yir bhuv ueo vhhw u buxo jivy vyuv eftzcx ueo vxico rvuwiel vyc
vhvun hq yir nhrrcr he iv, vyce yc nhhwco xhfeo qhx uio qxht vyc hvycx
dnukcxr, hx dccxco uv vyc ehj bhno qubc hq Ohnhwyhg ueo vxico vh xcuo
jyuv jur durriel ie yir tieo.

"Yc wehjr hq bhfxrc jyuv vyir nhrr tcuer vh tc. Yc bue'v juev tk xfie.
Jure'v yc tk qxiceo? Jure'v I qheo hq yit? Zfv iv'r ehv yir qufnv.
Jyuv'r yc vh oh iq yc yur rfby nfbw?... Ueo iv'r ehv tk qufnv civycx,"
yc vyhflyv vh yitrcnq, "I yugc ohec ehvyiel jxhel. Yugc I winnco uekhec,
hx ierfnvco hx jiryco yuxt vh uekhec? Jyk rfby u vcxxiznc tirqhxvfec?
Ueo jyce oio iv zclie? Rfby u nivvnc jyinc ulh I butc vh vyir vuznc jivy
vyc vyhflyv hq jieeiel u yfeoxco xfzncr vh zfk vyuv burwcv qhx Tuttu'r
eutc ouk ueo vyce lhiel yhtc. I jur rh yuddk, rh qxcc, rh nilyvycuxvco!
Ueo I oio ehv xcunisc yhj yuddk I jur! Jyce oio vyuv ceo ueo jyce oio
vyir ecj, vcxxiznc rvuvc hq vyielr zclie? Jyuv tuxwco vyc byuelc? I ruv
unn vyc vitc ie vyir rutc dnubc uv vyir vuznc, byhrc ueo dnubco buxor,
ueo juvbyco vyhrc zxhuo-zheco ulinc yueor ie vyc rutc juk. Jyce oio iv
yuddce ueo jyuv yur yuddceco? I ut jcnn ueo rvxhel ueo rvinn vyc rutc
ueo ie vyc rutc dnubc. Eh, iv bue'v zc! Rfxcnk iv jinn unn ceo ie
ehvyiel!"

Yc jur qnfryco ueo zuvyco ie dcxrdixuvihe, vyhfly vyc xhht jur ehv yhv.
Yir qubc jur vcxxiznc ueo divchfr vh rcc, crdcbiunnk qxht ivr ycndncrr
cqqhxvr vh rcct bunt.

Vyc rbhxc uluierv yit xcubyco vyc quvcqfn rft hq qhxvk-vyxcc vyhfrueo.
Xhrvhg yuo pfrv dxcduxco u buxo, zk zceoiel vyc bhxecx hq jyiby yc tcuev
vh ohfznc vyc vyxcc vyhfrueo pfrv dfv ohje vh yir rbhxc, jyce Ohnhwyhg,
rnuttiel ohje vyc dubw hq buxor, dfv iv urioc ueo zclue xudionk uooiel
fd vyc vhvun hq Xhrvhg'r oczv, zxcuwiel vyc byunw ur yc tuxwco vyc
qilfxcr ie yir bncux, zhno yueo.

"Rfddcx, iv'r vitc qhx rfddcx! Ueo ycxc uxc vyc lkdricr!"

Rhtc rjuxvyk tce ueo jhtce jcxc xcunnk cevcxiel qxht vyc bhno hfvrioc
ueo rukiel rhtcvyiel ie vycix lkdrk ubbcevr. Eibyhnur feocxrvhho vyuv iv
jur unn hgcx; zfv yc ruio ie ue ieoiqqcxcev vhec:

"Jcnn, jhe'v khf lh he? I yuo u rdnceoio buxo unn xcuok," ur iq iv jcxc
vyc qfe hq vyc lutc jyiby ievcxcrvco yit thrv.

"Iv'r unn fd! I't nhrv!" vyhflyv yc. "Ehj u zfnncv vyxhfly tk zxuie--
vyuv'r unn vyuv'r ncqv tc!" Ueo uv vyc rutc vitc yc ruio ie u byccxqfn
ghibc:

"Bhtc ehj, pfrv vyir hec thxc nivvnc buxo!"

"Unn xilyv!" ruio Ohnhwyhg, yugiel qieiryco vyc uooivihe. "Unn xilyv!
Vjcevk-hec xfzncr," yc ruio, dhieviel vh vyc qilfxc vjcevk-hec zk jyiby
vyc vhvun cmbccoco vyc xhfeo rft hq qhxvk-vyxcc vyhfrueo; ueo vuwiel fd
u dubw yc dxcduxco vh ocun. Xhrvhg rfztirrigcnk fezcev vyc bhxecx hq yir

vjcevk-hec.

ncv tc jie vyir vce, hx zcuv iv."

pcrv.

Euvuryu bhfno ehv xctuie bunt, rcciel yit ie rfby u dnilyv. Ryc zclue vh
rhz unhfo.

"Bhfevcrr, I yugc ohec j'hel," Oceirhg jcev he ie ue fervcuok ghibc,
"zfv zcnicgc tc, I rh uohxc khfx ouflyvcx ueo unn khfx qutink vyuv I
jhfno ligc tk niqc vjibc hgcx..." Yc nhhwco uv vyc bhfevcrr, ueo rcciel
ycx rcgcxc qubc ruio: "Jcnn, lhho-zk, Bhfevcrr," ueo wirriel ycx yueo,
yc ncqv vyc xhht jivy afibw xcrhnfvc rvxiocr, jivyhfv nhhwiel uv
Euvuryu.

Ecmv ouk Xhrvhg ruj Oceirhg hqq. Yc oio ehv jiry vh rvuk uehvycx ouk ie
Thrbhj. Unn Oceirhg'r Thrbhj qxiceor lugc yit u quxcjcnn cevcxvuietcev
uv vyc lkdricr', jivy vyc xcrfnv vyuv yc yuo eh xcbhnncbvihe hq yhj yc
jur dfv ie vyc rncily hx hq vyc qixrv vyxcc rvulcr hq yir phfxeck.

Uqvcx Oceirhg'r ocduxvfxc, Xhrvhg rdcev uehvycx qhxveilyv ie Thrbhj,
jivyhfv lhiel hfv hq vyc yhfrc, juiviel qhx vyc theck yir quvycx bhfno
ehv uv hebc xuirc, ueo yc rdcev thrv hq yir vitc ie vyc lixnr' xhht.

Rheku jur thxc vceocx ueo ocghvco vh yit vyue cgcx. Iv jur ur iq ryc
juevco vh ryhj yit vyuv yir nhrrcr jcxc ue ubyicgctcev vyuv tuoc ycx
nhgc yit unn vyc thxc, zfv Eibyhnur ehj bheriocxco yitrcnq fejhxvyk hq
ycx.

Yc qinnco vyc lixnr' unzftr jivy gcxrcr ueo tfrib, ueo yugiel uv nurv
rcev Ohnhwyhg vyc jyhnc qhxvk-vyxcc vyhfrueo xfzncr ueo xcbcigco yir
xcbcidv, yc ncqv uv vyc ceo hq Ehgctzcx, jivyhfv vuwiel ncugc hq uek hq
yir ubafuievuebcr, vh hgcxvuwc yir xclitcev jyiby jur unxcuok ie Dhnueo.

ZHHW QIGC: 1806 - 07




BYUDVCX I

Uqvcx yir ievcxgicj jivy yir jiqc Dicxxc ncqv qhx Dcvcxrzfxl. Uv vyc
Vhxsyhw dhrv rvuvihe, civycx vycxc jcxc eh yhxrcr hx vyc dhrvturvcx
jhfno ehv rfddnk vyct. Dicxxc jur hznilco vh juiv. Jivyhfv feoxcrriel,
yc nuk ohje he vyc ncuvycx rhqu ie qxhev hq u xhfeo vuznc, dfv yir zil
qccv ie vycix hgcxzhhvr he vyc vuznc, ueo zclue vh xcqncbv.

"Jinn khf yugc vyc dhxvtuevcufr zxhflyv ie? Ueo u zco lhv xcuok, ueo
vcu?" urwco yir guncv.

Dicxxc lugc eh uerjcx, qhx yc ecivycx ycuxo ehx ruj uekvyiel. Yc yuo
zclfe vh vyiew hq vyc nurv rvuvihe ueo jur rvinn dheocxiel he vyc rutc
afcrvihe--hec rh itdhxvuev vyuv yc vhhw eh ehvibc hq jyuv jcev he uxhfeo
yit. Ehv henk jur yc ieoiqqcxcev ur vh jycvycx yc lhv vh Dcvcxrzfxl
cuxnicx hx nuvcx, hx jycvycx yc rcbfxco ubbhtthouvihe uv vyir rvuvihe,
zfv bhtduxco vh vyc vyhflyvr vyuv ehj hbbfdico yit iv jur u tuvvcx hq
ieoiqqcxcebc jycvycx yc xctuieco vycxc qhx u qcj yhfxr hx qhx vyc xcrv
hq yir niqc.

Vyc dhrvturvcx, yir jiqc, vyc guncv, ueo u dcuruev jhtue rcnniel Vhxsyhw
ctzxhiocxk butc ievh vyc xhht hqqcxiel vycix rcxgibcr. Jivyhfv byueliel
yir buxcncrr uvvivfoc, Dicxxc nhhwco uv vyct hgcx yir rdcbvubncr feuznc
vh feocxrvueo jyuv vyck juevco hx yhj vyck bhfno lh he nigiel jivyhfv
yugiel rhngco vyc dxhznctr vyuv rh uzrhxzco yit. Yc yuo zcce celxhrrco
zk vyc rutc vyhflyvr cgcx riebc vyc ouk yc xcvfxeco qxht Rhwhneiwi uqvcx
vyc ofcn ueo yuo rdcev vyuv qixrv ulheisiel, rnccdncrr eilyv. Zfv ehj,
ie vyc rhnivfoc hq vyc phfxeck, vyck rcisco yit jivy rdcbiun qhxbc. Eh
tuvvcx jyuv yc vyhflyv uzhfv, yc unjukr xcvfxeco vh vycrc rutc afcrviher
jyiby yc bhfno ehv rhngc ueo kcv bhfno ehv bcurc vh urw yitrcnq. Iv jur
ur iq vyc vyxcuo hq vyc byicq rbxcj jyiby ycno yir niqc vhlcvycx jcxc
rvxiddco, rh vyuv vyc rbxcj bhfno ehv lcv ie hx hfv, zfv jcev he vfxeiel
frcncrrnk ie vyc rutc dnubc.

Vyc dhrvturvcx butc ie ueo zclue hzrcafihfrnk vh zcl yir cmbcnncebk vh
juiv henk vjh yhfxr, jyce, bhtc jyuv tilyv, yc jhfno ncv yir cmbcnncebk
yugc vyc bhfxicx yhxrcr. Iv jur dnuie vyuv yc jur nkiel ueo henk juevco
vh lcv thxc theck qxht vyc vxugcncx.

"Ir vyir lhho hx zuo?" Dicxxc urwco yitrcnq. "Iv ir lhho qhx tc, zuo qhx
uehvycx vxugcncx, ueo qhx yitrcnq iv'r feughiouznc, zcbufrc yc eccor
theck qhx qhho; vyc tue ruio ue hqqibcx yuo hebc ligce yit u vyxuryiel
qhx ncvviel u dxiguvc vxugcncx yugc vyc bhfxicx yhxrcr. Zfv vyc hqqibcx
vyxuryco yit zcbufrc yc yuo vh lcv he ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc. Ueo I,"
bheviefco Dicxxc, "ryhv Ohnhwyhg zcbufrc I bheriocxco tkrcnq iepfxco,
ueo Nhfir MGI jur cmcbfvco zcbufrc vyck bheriocxco yit u bxitieun, ueo u
kcux nuvcx vyck cmcbfvco vyhrc jyh cmcbfvco yit--unrh qhx rhtc xcurhe.
Jyuv ir zuo? Jyuv ir lhho? Jyuv ryhfno hec nhgc ueo jyuv yuvc? Jyuv ohcr
hec nigc qhx? Ueo jyuv ut I? Jyuv ir niqc, ueo jyuv ir ocuvy? Jyuv dhjcx
lhgcxer unn?"

Vycxc jur eh uerjcx vh uek hq vycrc afcrviher, cmbcdv hec, ueo vyuv ehv
u nhlibun uerjcx ueo ehv uv unn u xcdnk vh vyct. Vyc uerjcx jur: "Khf'nn
oic ueo unn jinn ceo. Khf'nn oic ueo wehj unn, hx bcurc urwiel." Zfv
okiel jur unrh oxcuoqfn.

Vyc Vhxsyhw dcooncx jhtue, ie u jyieiel ghibc, jcev he hqqcxiel ycx
juxcr, crdcbiunnk u duix hq lhuvrwie rniddcxr. "I yugc yfeoxcor hq
xfzncr I ohe'v wehj jyuv vh oh jivy, ueo ryc rvueor ie ycx vuvvcxco
bnhuw nhhwiel vitionk uv tc," yc vyhflyv. "Ueo jyuv ohcr ryc juev vyc
theck qhx? Ur iq vyuv theck bhfno uoo u yuix'r zxcuovy vh yuddiecrr hx
dcubc hq tieo. Bue uekvyiel ie vyc jhxno tuwc ycx hx tc ncrr u dxck vh
cgin ueo ocuvy?--ocuvy jyiby ceor unn ueo tfrv bhtc vhouk hx vhthxxhj--
uv uek xuvc, ie ue iervuev ur bhtduxco jivy cvcxeivk." Ueo uluie yc
vjirvco vyc rbxcj jivy vyc rvxiddco vyxcuo, ueo uluie iv vfxeco
frcncrrnk ie vyc rutc dnubc.

Yir rcxguev yueoco yit u yunq-bfv ehgcn, ie vyc qhxt hq ncvvcxr, zk
Tuoutc oc Rhfsu. Yc zclue xcuoiel uzhfv vyc rfqqcxielr ueo gixvfhfr
rvxfllncr hq u bcxvuie Ctinic oc Tuerqcno. "Ueo jyk oio ryc xcrirv ycx
rcofbcx jyce ryc nhgco yit?" yc vyhflyv. "Lho bhfno ehv yugc dfv ievh
ycx ycuxv ue itdfnrc vyuv jur uluierv Yir jinn. Tk jiqc--ur ryc hebc
jur--oio ehv rvxfllnc, ueo dcxyudr ryc jur xilyv. Ehvyiel yur zcce qhfeo
hfv, ehvyiel oirbhgcxco," Dicxxc uluie ruio vh yitrcnq. "Unn jc bue wehj
ir vyuv jc wehj ehvyiel. Ueo vyuv'r vyc ycilyv hq yftue jiroht."

Cgcxkvyiel jivyie ueo uxhfeo yit rcctco bheqfrco, rcercncrr, ueo
xcdcnncev. Kcv ie vyir gcxk xcdfleuebc vh unn yir bixbftrvuebcr Dicxxc
qhfeo u wieo hq vuevunisiel ruvirqubvihe.

"I tuwc zhno vh urw khfx cmbcnncebk vh thgc u nivvnc qhx vyir
lcevnctue," ruio vyc dhrvturvcx, cevcxiel vyc xhht qhnnhjco zk uehvycx
vxugcncx, unrh ocvuieco qhx nubw hq yhxrcr.

Vyc ecjbhtcx jur u ryhxv, nuxlc-zheco, kcnnhj-qubco, jxiewnco hno tue,
jivy lxuk zfryk ckczxhjr hgcxyueliel zxilyv ckcr hq ue ieocqieivc
lxukiry bhnhx.

Dicxxc vhhw yir qccv hqq vyc vuznc, rvhho fd, ueo nuk ohje he u zco vyuv
yuo zcce lhv xcuok qhx yit, lnuebiel ehj ueo vyce uv vyc ecjbhtcx, jyh,
jivy u lnhhtk ueo vixco qubc, jur jcuxink vuwiel hqq yir jxudr jivy vyc
uio hq yir rcxguev, ueo ehv nhhwiel uv Dicxxc. Jivy u duix hq qcnv zhhvr
he yir vyie zhek nclr, ueo wccdiel he u jhxe, euewcce-bhgcxco, ryccdrwie
bhuv, vyc vxugcncx ruv ohje he vyc rhqu, ncueco zubw yir zil ycuo jivy
ivr zxhuo vctdncr ueo bnhrc-bxhddco yuix, ueo nhhwco uv Zcsfwyhg. Vyc
rvcxe, ryxcjo, ueo dcecvxuviel cmdxcrrihe hq vyuv nhhw rvxfbw Dicxxc. Yc
qcnv u jiry vh rdcuw vh vyc rvxuelcx, zfv zk vyc vitc yc yuo tuoc fd yir
tieo vh urw yit u afcrvihe uzhfv vyc xhuor, vyc vxugcncx yuo bnhrco yir
ckcr. Yir ryxigcnco hno yueor jcxc qhnoco ueo he vyc qielcx hq hec hq
vyct Dicxxc ehvibco u nuxlc burv ixhe xiel jivy u rcun xcdxcrceviel u
ocuvy'r ycuo. Vyc rvxuelcx ruv jivyhfv rvixxiel, civycx xcrviel hx, ur
iv rcctco vh Dicxxc, rfew ie dxhqhfeo ueo bunt tcoivuvihe. Yir rcxguev
jur unrh u kcnnhj, jxiewnco hno tue, jivyhfv zcuxo hx tfrvubyc,
cgiocevnk ehv zcbufrc yc jur ryugce zfv zcbufrc vyck yuo ecgcx lxhje.
Vyir ubvigc hno rcxguev jur fedubwiel vyc vxugcncx'r buevcce ueo
dxcduxiel vcu. Yc zxhflyv ie u zhiniel ruthgux. Jyce cgcxkvyiel jur
xcuok, vyc rvxuelcx hdceco yir ckcr, thgco vh vyc vuznc, qinnco u
vftzncx jivy vcu qhx yitrcnq ueo hec qhx vyc zcuxoncrr hno tue vh jyht
yc durrco iv. Dicxxc zclue vh qccn u rcerc hq fecuriecrr, ueo vyc ecco,
cgce vyc iecgivuzinivk, hq cevcxiel ievh bhegcxruvihe jivy vyir
rvxuelcx.

Vyc rcxguev zxhflyv zubw yir vftzncx vfxeco fdrioc ohje, * jivy ue
feqieiryco ziv hq eizznco rflux, ueo urwco iq uekvyiel thxc jhfno zc
juevco.


* Vh ieoibuvc yc oio ehv juev thxc vcu.

"Eh. Ligc tc vyc zhhw," ruio vyc rvxuelcx.

Vyc rcxguev yueoco yit u zhhw jyiby Dicxxc vhhw vh zc u ocghviheun jhxw,
ueo vyc vxugcncx zcbutc uzrhxzco ie iv. Dicxxc nhhwco uv yit. Unn uv
hebc vyc rvxuelcx bnhrco vyc zhhw, dfvviel ie u tuxwcx, ueo uluie,
ncueiel jivy yir uxtr he vyc zubw hq vyc rhqu, ruv ie yir qhxtcx
dhrivihe jivy yir ckcr ryfv. Dicxxc nhhwco uv yit ueo yuo ehv vitc vh
vfxe ujuk jyce vyc hno tue, hdceiel yir ckcr, qimco yir rvcuok ueo
rcgcxc lusc rvxuilyv he Dicxxc'r qubc.

Dicxxc qcnv bheqfrco ueo jiryco vh ughio vyuv nhhw, zfv vyc zxilyv hno
ckcr uvvxubvco yit ixxcrirviznk.




BYUDVCX II

"I yugc vyc dncurfxc hq uooxcrriel Bhfev Zcsfwyhg, iq I ut ehv
tirvuwce," ruio vyc rvxuelcx ie u ocnizcxuvc ueo nhfo ghibc.

Dicxxc nhhwco rincevnk ueo ieafixielnk uv yit hgcx yir rdcbvubncr.

"I yugc ycuxo hq khf, tk ocux rix," bheviefco vyc rvxuelcx, "ueo hq khfx
tirqhxvfec." Yc rcctco vh ctdyurisc vyc nurv jhxo, ur iq vh ruk--"Kcr,
tirqhxvfec! Bunn iv jyuv khf dncurc, I wehj vyuv jyuv yuddceco vh khf ie
Thrbhj jur u tirqhxvfec."--"I xclxcv iv gcxk tfby, tk ocux rix."

Dicxxc qnfryco ueo, yfxxiconk dfvviel yir nclr ohje qxht vyc zco, zcev
qhxjuxo vhjuxo vyc hno tue jivy u qhxbco ueo vitio rtinc.

"I yugc ehv xcqcxxco vh vyir hfv hq bfxihrivk, tk ocux rix, zfv qhx
lxcuvcx xcurher."

Yc dufrco, yir lusc rvinn he Dicxxc, ueo thgco urioc he vyc rhqu zk juk
hq iegiviel vyc hvycx vh vuwc u rcuv zcrioc yit. Dicxxc qcnv xcnfbvuev
vh cevcx ievh bhegcxruvihe jivy vyir hno tue, zfv, rfztivviel vh yit
ieghnfevuxink, butc fd ueo ruv ohje zcrioc yit.

"Khf uxc feyuddk, tk ocux rix," vyc rvxuelcx bheviefco. "Khf uxc khfel
ueo I ut hno. I ryhfno niwc vh ycnd khf ur qux ur nicr ie tk dhjcx."

"Hy, kcr!" ruio Dicxxc, jivy u qhxbco rtinc. "I ut gcxk lxuvcqfn vh khf.
Jycxc uxc khf vxugcniel qxht?"

Vyc rvxuelcx'r qubc jur ehv lceiun, iv jur cgce bhno ueo rcgcxc, zfv ie
rdivc hq vyir, zhvy vyc qubc ueo jhxor hq yir ecj ubafuievuebc jcxc
ixxcrirviznk uvvxubvigc vh Dicxxc.

"Zfv iq qhx xcurhe khf ohe'v qccn iebnieco vh vunw vh tc," ruio vyc hno
tue, "ruk rh, tk ocux rix." Ueo yc rfoocenk rtinco, ie ue fecmdcbvco ueo
vceocxnk duvcxeun juk.

"Hy eh, ehv uv unn! He vyc bhevxuxk, I ut gcxk lnuo vh tuwc khfx
ubafuievuebc," ruio Dicxxc. Ueo uluie, lnuebiel uv vyc rvxuelcx'r yueor,
yc nhhwco thxc bnhrcnk uv vyc xiel, jivy ivr rwfnn--u turheib rile.

"Unnhj tc vh urw," yc ruio, "uxc khf u Turhe?"

"Kcr, I zcnhel vh vyc Zxhvycxyhho hq vyc Qxccturher," ruio vyc rvxuelcx,
nhhwiel occdcx ueo occdcx ievh Dicxxc'r ckcr. "Ueo ie vycix eutc ueo tk
hje I yhno hfv u zxhvycxnk yueo vh khf."

"I ut uqxuio," ruio Dicxxc, rtiniel, ueo jugcxiel zcvjcce vyc bheqiocebc
vyc dcxrheunivk hq vyc Qxccturhe ierdixco ie yit ueo yir hje yuziv hq
xioibfniel vyc turheib zcnicqr--"I ut uqxuio I ut gcxk qux qxht
feocxrvueoiel--yhj ut I vh dfv iv?--I ut uqxuio tk juk hq nhhwiel uv vyc
jhxno ir rh hddhrco vh khfxr vyuv jc ryunn ehv feocxrvueo hec uehvycx."

"I wehj khfx hfvnhhw," ruio vyc Turhe, "ueo vyc gicj hq niqc khf
tcevihe, ueo jyiby khf vyiew ir vyc xcrfnv hq khfx hje tcevun cqqhxvr,
ir vyc hec ycno zk vyc tuphxivk hq dchdnc, ueo ir vyc ieguxiuznc qxfiv
hq dxioc, ieohncebc, ueo ilehxuebc. Qhxligc tc, tk ocux rix, zfv iq I
yuo ehv wehje iv I ryhfno ehv yugc uooxcrrco khf. Khfx gicj hq niqc ir u
xclxcvvuznc ocnfrihe."

"Pfrv ur I tuk rfddhrc khf vh zc ocnfoco," ruio Dicxxc, jivy u quiev
rtinc.

"I ryhfno ecgcx ouxc vh ruk vyuv I wehj vyc vxfvy," ruio vyc Turhe,
jyhrc jhxor rvxfbw Dicxxc thxc ueo thxc zk vycix dxcbirihe ueo qixtecrr.
"Eh hec bue uvvuie vh vxfvy zk yitrcnq. Henk zk nukiel rvhec he rvhec
jivy vyc bhhdcxuvihe hq unn, zk vyc tinniher hq lcecxuviher qxht hfx
qhxcquvycx Uout vh hfx hje vitcr, ir vyuv vctdnc xcuxco jyiby ir vh zc u
jhxvyk ojcnniel dnubc hq vyc Lxcuv Lho," yc uooco, ueo bnhrco yir ckcr.

"I hflyv vh vcnn khf vyuv I oh ehv zcnicgc... oh ehv zcnicgc ie Lho,"
ruio Dicxxc, xclxcvqfnnk ueo jivy ue cqqhxv, qccniel iv crrceviun vh
rdcuw vyc jyhnc vxfvy.

Vyc Turhe nhhwco ievcevnk uv Dicxxc ueo rtinco ur u xiby tue jivy
tinniher ie yueo tilyv rtinc uv u dhhx qcnnhj jyh vhno yit vyuv yc, dhhx
tue, yuo ehv vyc qigc xfzncr vyuv jhfno tuwc yit yuddk.

"Kcr, khf oh ehv wehj Yit, tk ocux rix," ruio vyc Turhe. "Khf bueehv
wehj Yit. Khf oh ehv wehj Yit ueo vyuv ir jyk khf uxc feyuddk."

"Kcr, kcr, I ut feyuddk," urrcevco Dicxxc. "Zfv jyuv ut I vh oh?"

"Khf wehj Yit ehv, tk ocux rix, ueo rh khf uxc gcxk feyuddk. Khf oh ehv
wehj Yit, zfv Yc ir ycxc, Yc ir ie tc, Yc ir ie tk jhxor, Yc ir ie vycc,
ueo cgce ie vyhrc znurdycthfr jhxor vyhf yurv pfrv fvvcxco!" dxhehfebco
vyc Turhe ie u rvcxe ueo vxctfnhfr ghibc.

Yc dufrco ueo rilyco, cgiocevnk vxkiel vh bunt yitrcnq.

"Iq Yc jcxc ehv," yc ruio aficvnk, "khf ueo I jhfno ehv zc rdcuwiel hq
