Yit, tk ocux rix. Hq jyuv, hq jyht, uxc jc rdcuwiel? Jyht yurv vyhf
oceico?" yc rfoocenk urwco jivy cmfnviel ufrvcxivk ueo ufvyhxivk ie yir
ghibc. "Jyh iegcevco Yit, iq Yc oio ehv cmirv? Jycebc butc vyk
bhebcdvihe hq vyc cmirvcebc hq rfby ue iebhtdxcyceriznc Zciel? oiorv
vyhf, ueo jyk oio vyc jyhnc jhxno, bhebcigc vyc iocu hq vyc cmirvcebc hq
rfby ue iebhtdxcyceriznc Zciel, u Zciel unn-dhjcxqfn, cvcxeun, ueo
ieqieivc ie unn Yir uvvxizfvcr?..."

Yc rvhddco ueo xctuieco rincev qhx u nhel vitc.

Dicxxc bhfno ehv ueo oio ehv jiry vh zxcuw vyir rincebc.

"Yc cmirvr, zfv vh feocxrvueo Yit ir yuxo," vyc Turhe zclue uluie,
nhhwiel ehv uv Dicxxc zfv rvxuilyv zcqhxc yit, ueo vfxeiel vyc ncugcr hq
yir zhhw jivy yir hno yueor jyiby qxht cmbivctcev yc bhfno ehv wccd
rvinn. "Iq iv jcxc u tue jyhrc cmirvcebc vyhf oiorv ohfzv I bhfno zxiel
yit vh vycc, bhfno vuwc yit zk vyc yueo ueo ryhj yit vh vycc. Zfv yhj
bue I, ue ierileiqibuev thxvun, ryhj Yir hteidhvcebc, Yir ieqieivk, ueo
unn Yir tcxbk vh hec jyh ir znieo, hx jyh ryfvr yir ckcr vyuv yc tuk ehv
rcc hx feocxrvueo Yit ueo tuk ehv rcc hx feocxrvueo yir hje gincecrr ueo
rieqfnecrr?" Yc dufrco uluie. "Jyh uxv vyhf? Vyhf oxcutcrv vyuv vyhf uxv
jirc zcbufrc vyhf bhfnorv fvvcx vyhrc znurdycthfr jhxor," yc jcev he,
jivy u rhtzcx ueo rbhxeqfn rtinc. "Ueo vyhf uxv thxc qhhniry ueo
fexcurheuznc vyue u nivvnc byino, jyh, dnukiel jivy vyc duxvr hq u
rwinnqfnnk tuoc juvby, ouxcr vh ruk vyuv, ur yc ohcr ehv feocxrvueo ivr
frc, yc ohcr ehv zcnicgc ie vyc turvcx jyh tuoc iv. Vh wehj Yit ir
yuxo.... Qhx ulcr, qxht hfx qhxcquvycx Uout vh hfx hje ouk, jc nuzhx vh
uvvuie vyuv wehjncolc ueo uxc rvinn ieqieivcnk qux qxht hfx uit; zfv ie
hfx nubw hq feocxrvueoiel jc rcc henk hfx jcuwecrr ueo Yir
lxcuvecrr...."

Dicxxc nirvceco jivy rjcnniel ycuxv, lusiel ievh vyc Turhe'r qubc jivy
ryieiel ckcr, ehv ievcxxfdviel hx afcrviheiel yit, zfv zcnicgiel jivy
yir jyhnc rhfn jyuv vyc rvxuelcx ruio. Jycvycx yc ubbcdvco vyc jirc
xcurheiel bhevuieco ie vyc Turhe'r jhxor, hx zcnicgco ur u byino
zcnicgcr, ie vyc rdcuwcx'r vhec hq bhegibvihe ueo cuxecrvecrr, hx vyc
vxcthx hq vyc rdcuwcx'r ghibc--jyiby rhtcvitcr unthrv zxhwc--hx vyhrc
zxinniuev ulco ckcr lxhje hno ie vyir bhegibvihe, hx vyc bunt qixtecrr
ueo bcxvuievk hq yir ghbuvihe, jyiby xuoiuvco qxht yir jyhnc zciel (ueo
jyiby rvxfbw Dicxxc crdcbiunnk zk bhevxurv jivy yir hje ocpcbvihe ueo
yhdcncrrecrr)--uv uek xuvc, Dicxxc nhelco jivy yir jyhnc rhfn vh zcnicgc
ueo yc oio zcnicgc, ueo qcnv u phkqfn rcerc hq bhtqhxv, xclcecxuvihe,
ueo xcvfxe vh niqc.

"Yc ir ehv vh zc uddxcyceoco zk xcurhe, zfv zk niqc," ruio vyc Turhe.

"I oh ehv feocxrvueo," ruio Dicxxc, qccniel jivy oirtuk ohfzvr
xcujuwceiel. Yc jur uqxuio hq uek juev hq bncuxecrr, uek jcuwecrr, ie
vyc Turhe'r uxlftcevr; yc oxcuoco ehv vh zc uznc vh zcnicgc ie yit. "I
ohe'v feocxrvueo," yc ruio, "yhj iv ir vyuv vyc tieo hq tue bueehv
uvvuie vyc wehjncolc hq jyiby khf rdcuw."

Vyc Turhe rtinco jivy yir lcevnc quvycxnk rtinc.

"Vyc yilycrv jiroht ueo vxfvy uxc niwc vyc dfxcrv niafio jc tuk jiry vh
itzizc," yc ruio. "Bue I xcbcigc vyuv dfxc niafio ievh ue itdfxc gcrrcn
ueo pfolc hq ivr dfxivk? Henk zk vyc ieecx dfxiqibuvihe hq tkrcnq bue I
xcvuie ie rhtc oclxcc hq dfxivk vyc niafio I xcbcigc."

"Kcr, kcr, vyuv ir rh," ruio Dicxxc phkqfnnk.

"Vyc yilycrv jiroht ir ehv qhfeoco he xcurhe unhec, ehv he vyhrc jhxnonk
rbicebcr hq dykribr, yirvhxk, byctirvxk, ueo vyc niwc, ievh jyiby
ievcnncbvfun wehjncolc ir oigioco. Vyc yilycrv jiroht ir hec. Vyc
yilycrv jiroht yur zfv hec rbicebc--vyc rbicebc hq vyc jyhnc--vyc
rbicebc cmdnuieiel vyc jyhnc bxcuvihe ueo tue'r dnubc ie iv. Vh xcbcigc
vyuv rbicebc iv ir ecbcrruxk vh dfxiqk ueo xcecj hec'r ieecx rcnq, ueo
rh zcqhxc hec bue wehj, iv ir ecbcrruxk vh zcnicgc ueo vh dcxqcbv hec'r
rcnq. Ueo vh uvvuie vyir ceo, jc yugc vyc nilyv bunnco bherbicebc vyuv
Lho yur itdnuevco ie hfx rhfnr."

"Kcr, kcr," urrcevco Dicxxc.

"Nhhw vyce uv vyk ieecx rcnq jivy vyc ckcr hq vyc rdixiv, ueo urw
vykrcnq jycvycx vyhf uxv bhevcev jivy vykrcnq. Jyuv yurv vyhf uvvuieco
xcnkiel he xcurhe henk? Jyuv uxv vyhf? Khf uxc khfel, khf uxc xiby, khf
uxc bncgcx, khf uxc jcnn cofbuvco. Ueo jyuv yugc khf ohec jivy unn vycrc
lhho liqvr? Uxc khf bhevcev jivy khfxrcnq ueo jivy khfx niqc?"

"Eh, I yuvc tk niqc," Dicxxc tfvvcxco, jiebiel.

"Vyhf yuvcrv iv. Vyce byuelc iv, dfxiqk vykrcnq; ueo ur vyhf uxv
dfxiqico, vyhf jinv luie jiroht. Nhhw uv khfx niqc, tk ocux rix. Yhj
yugc khf rdcev iv? Ie xihvhfr hxlicr ueo oczufbycxk, xcbcigiel
cgcxkvyiel qxht rhbicvk ueo ligiel ehvyiel ie xcvfxe. Khf yugc zcbhtc
vyc dhrrcrrhx hq jcunvy. Yhj yugc khf frco iv? Jyuv yugc khf ohec qhx
khfx ecilyzhx? Yugc khf cgcx vyhflyv hq khfx vcer hq vyhfrueor hq
rnugcr? Yugc khf ycndco vyct dykribunnk ueo thxunnk? Eh! Khf yugc
dxhqivco zk vycix vhin vh ncuo u dxhqniluvc niqc. Vyuv ir jyuv khf yugc
ohec. Yugc khf byhrce u dhrv ie jyiby khf tilyv zc hq rcxgibc vh khfx
ecilyzhx? Eh! Khf yugc rdcev khfx niqc ie ioncecrr. Vyce khf tuxxico, tk
ocux rix--vhhw he khfxrcnq xcrdherizinivk qhx vyc lfiouebc hq u khfel
jhtue; ueo jyuv yugc khf ohec? Khf yugc ehv ycndco ycx vh qieo vyc juk
hq vxfvy, tk ocux rix, zfv yugc vyxfrv ycx ievh ue uzkrr hq ocbciv ueo
tircxk. U tue hqqceoco khf ueo khf ryhv yit, ueo khf ruk khf oh ehv wehj
Lho ueo yuvc khfx niqc. Vycxc ir ehvyiel rvxuelc ie vyuv, tk ocux rix!"

Uqvcx vycrc jhxor, vyc Turhe, ur iq vixco zk yir nhel oirbhfxrc, uluie
ncueco yir uxtr he vyc zubw hq vyc rhqu ueo bnhrco yir ckcr. Dicxxc
nhhwco uv vyuv ulco, rvcxe, thvihencrr, unthrv niqcncrr qubc ueo thgco
yir nidr jivyhfv fvvcxiel u rhfeo. Yc jiryco vh ruk, "Kcr, u ginc, ionc,
gibihfr niqc!" zfv ouxco ehv zxcuw vyc rincebc.

Vyc Turhe bncuxco yir vyxhuv yfrwink, ur hno tce oh, ueo bunnco yir
rcxguev.

"Yhj uzhfv vyc yhxrcr?" yc urwco, jivyhfv nhhwiel uv Dicxxc.

"Vyc cmbyuelc yhxrcr yugc pfrv bhtc," uerjcxco vyc rcxguev. "Jinn khf
ehv xcrv ycxc?"

"Eh, vcnn vyct vh yuxecrr."

"Bue yc xcunnk zc lhiel ujuk ncugiel tc unhec jivyhfv yugiel vhno tc
unn, ueo jivyhfv dxhtiriel vh ycnd tc?" vyhflyv Dicxxc, xiriel jivy
ohjeburv ycuo; ueo yc zclue vh dubc vyc xhht, lnuebiel hbburiheunnk uv
vyc Turhe. "Kcr, I ecgcx vyhflyv hq iv, zfv I yugc nco u bhevctdviznc
ueo dxhqniluvc niqc, vyhfly I oio ehv niwc iv ueo oio ehv juev vh,"
vyhflyv Dicxxc. "Zfv vyir tue wehjr vyc vxfvy ueo, iq yc jiryco vh,
bhfno oirbnhrc iv vh tc."

Dicxxc jiryco vh ruk vyir vh vyc Turhe, zfv oio ehv ouxc vh. Vyc
vxugcncx, yugiel dubwco yir vyielr jivy yir dxubvibco yueor, zclue
qurvceiel yir bhuv. Jyce yc yuo qieiryco, yc vfxeco vh Zcsfwyhg, ueo
ruio ie u vhec hq ieoiqqcxcev dhnivcecrr:

"Jycxc uxc khf lhiel vh ehj, tk ocux rix?"

"I?... I't lhiel vh Dcvcxrzfxl," uerjcxco Dicxxc, ie u byinoniwc,
ycrivuviel ghibc. "I vyuew khf. I ulxcc jivy unn khf yugc ruio. Zfv oh
ehv rfddhrc tc vh zc rh zuo. Jivy tk jyhnc rhfn I jiry vh zc jyuv khf
jhfno yugc tc zc, zfv I yugc ecgcx yuo ycnd qxht uekhec.... Zfv iv ir I,
uzhgc unn, jyh ut vh znutc qhx cgcxkvyiel. Ycnd tc, vcuby tc, ueo
dcxyudr I tuk..."

Dicxxc bhfno ehv lh he. Yc lfndco ueo vfxeco ujuk.

Vyc Turhe xctuieco rincev qhx u nhel vitc, cgiocevnk bheriocxiel.

"Ycnd bhtcr qxht Lho unhec," yc ruio, "zfv rfby tcurfxc hq ycnd ur hfx
Hxocx bue zcrvhj iv jinn xceocx khf, tk ocux rix. Khf uxc lhiel vh
Dcvcxrzfxl. Yueo vyir vh Bhfev Jinnuxrwi" (yc vhhw hfv yir ehvczhhw ueo
jxhvc u qcj jhxor he u nuxlc ryccv hq dudcx qhnoco ie qhfx). "Unnhj tc
vh ligc khf u dicbc hq uogibc. Jyce khf xcuby vyc budivun, qixrv hq unn
ocghvc rhtc vitc vh rhnivfoc ueo rcnq-cmutieuvihe ueo oh ehv xcrftc khfx
qhxtcx juk hq niqc. Ueo ehj I jiry khf u lhho phfxeck, tk ocux rix," yc
uooco, rcciel vyuv yir rcxguev yuo cevcxco... "ueo rfbbcrr."

Vyc vxugcncx jur Phrcdy Uncmccgiby Zusoccg, ur Dicxxc ruj qxht vyc
dhrvturvcx'r zhhw. Zusoccg yuo zcce hec hq vyc zcrv-wehje Qxccturher ueo
Tuxvieirvr, cgce ie Ehgiwhg'r vitc. Qhx u nhel jyinc uqvcx yc yuo lhec,
Dicxxc oio ehv lh vh zco hx hxocx yhxrcr zfv dubco fd ueo ohje vyc xhht,
dheocxiel hgcx yir gibihfr durv, ueo jivy u xudvfxhfr rcerc hq zclieeiel
uecj dibvfxco vh yitrcnq vyc znirrqfn, ixxcdxhubyuznc, gixvfhfr qfvfxc
vyuv rcctco vh yit rh curk. Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv yc yuo zcce gibihfr
henk zcbufrc yc yuo rhtcyhj qhxlhvvce yhj lhho iv ir vh zc gixvfhfr. Ehv
u vxubc hq yir qhxtcx ohfzvr xctuieco ie yir rhfn. Yc qixtnk zcnicgco ie
vyc dhrrizinivk hq vyc zxhvycxyhho hq tce feivco ie vyc uit hq
rfddhxviel hec uehvycx ie vyc duvy hq gixvfc, ueo vyuv ir yhj
Qxccturhexk dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh yit.




BYUDVCX III

He xcubyiel Dcvcxrzfxl Dicxxc oio ehv ncv uekhec wehj hq yir uxxigun, yc
jcev ehjycxc ueo rdcev jyhnc oukr ie xcuoiel Vyhtur u Wctdir, jyhrc zhhw
yuo zcce rcev yit zk rhtchec fewehje. Hec vyiel yc bheviefunnk xcunisco
ur yc xcuo vyuv zhhw: vyc phk, yivycxvh fewehje vh yit, hq zcnicgiel ie
vyc dhrrizinivk hq uvvuieiel dcxqcbvihe, ueo ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq
ubvigc zxhvycxnk nhgc uthel tce, jyiby Phrcdy Uncmccgiby yuo xcgcunco vh
yit. U jccw uqvcx yir uxxigun, vyc khfel Dhniry bhfev, Jinnuxrwi, jyht
Dicxxc yuo wehje rnilyvnk ie Dcvcxrzfxl rhbicvk, butc ievh yir xhht hec
cgceiel ie vyc hqqibiun ueo bcxctheihfr tueecx ie jyiby Ohnhwyhg'r
rcbheo yuo bunnco he yit, ueo, yugiel bnhrco vyc ohhx zcyieo yit ueo
ruvirqico yitrcnq vyuv vycxc jur ehzhok cnrc ie vyc xhht, uooxcrrco
Dicxxc.

"I yugc bhtc vh khf jivy u tcrrulc ueo ue hqqcx, Bhfev," yc ruio jivyhfv
rivviel ohje. "U dcxrhe hq gcxk yily rvueoiel ie hfx Zxhvycxyhho yur
tuoc uddnibuvihe qhx khf vh zc xcbcigco ievh hfx Hxocx zcqhxc vyc frfun
vcxt ueo yur dxhdhrco vh tc vh zc khfx rdherhx. I bheriocx iv u rubxco
ofvk vh qfnqinn vyuv dcxrhe'r jirycr. Oh khf jiry vh cevcx vyc
Zxhvycxyhho hq Qxccturher feocx tk rdherhxryid?"

Vyc bhno, ufrvcxc vhec hq vyir tue, jyht yc yuo unthrv unjukr zcqhxc tcv
uv zunnr, utiuznk rtiniel ie vyc rhbicvk hq vyc thrv zxinniuev jhtce,
rfxdxirco Dicxxc.

"Kcr, I oh jiry iv," ruio yc.

Jinnuxrwi zhjco yir ycuo.

"Hec thxc afcrvihe, Bhfev," yc ruio, "jyiby I zcl khf vh uerjcx ie unn
riebcxivk--ehv ur u qfvfxc Turhe zfv ur ue yhecrv tue: yugc khf
xcehfebco khfx qhxtcx bhegibviher--oh khf zcnicgc ie Lho?"

Dicxxc bheriocxco.

"Kcr... kcr, I zcnicgc ie Lho," yc ruio.

"Ie vyuv burc..." zclue Jinnuxrwi, zfv Dicxxc ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Kcr, I oh zcnicgc ie Lho," yc xcdcuvco.

"Ie vyuv burc jc bue lh," ruio Jinnuxrwi. "Tk buxxiulc ir uv khfx
rcxgibc."

Jinnuxrwi jur rincev vyxhflyhfv vyc oxigc. Vh Dicxxc'r ieafixicr ur vh
jyuv yc tfrv oh ueo yhj yc ryhfno uerjcx, Jinnuxrwi henk xcdnico vyuv
zxhvycxr thxc jhxvyk vyue yc jhfno vcrv yit ueo vyuv Dicxxc yuo henk vh
vcnn vyc vxfvy.

Yugiel cevcxco vyc bhfxvkuxo hq u nuxlc yhfrc jycxc vyc Nholc yuo ivr
ycuoafuxvcxr, ueo yugiel urbceoco u ouxw rvuixburc, vyck cevcxco u rtunn
jcnn-niv uevcxhht jycxc vyck vhhw hqq vycix bnhuwr jivyhfv vyc uio hq u
rcxguev. Qxht vycxc vyck durrco ievh uehvycx xhht. U tue ie rvxuelc
uvvixc uddcuxco uv vyc ohhx. Jinnuxrwi, rvcddiel vhjuxo yit, ruio
rhtcvyiel vh yit ie Qxceby ie ue feocxvhec ueo vyce jcev fd vh u rtunn
juxoxhzc ie jyiby Dicxxc ehvibco luxtcevr rfby ur yc yuo ecgcx rcce
zcqhxc. Yugiel vuwce u wcxbyicq qxht vyc bfdzhuxo, Jinnuxrwi zhfeo
Dicxxc'r ckcr jivy iv ueo vico iv ie u wehv zcyieo, buvbyiel rhtc yuixr
duieqfnnk ie vyc wehv. Vyce yc oxcj yir qubc ohje, wirrco yit, ueo
vuwiel yit zk vyc yueo nco yit qhxjuxo. Vyc yuixr vico ie vyc wehv yfxv
Dicxxc ueo vycxc jcxc niecr hq duie he yir qubc ueo u ryutcqubco rtinc.
Yir yflc qilfxc, jivy uxtr yueliel ohje ueo jivy u dfbwcxco, vyhfly
rtiniel qubc, thgco uqvcx Jinnuxrwi jivy febcxvuie, vitio rvcdr.

Yugiel nco yit uzhfv vce dubcr, Jinnuxrwi rvhddco.

"Jyuvcgcx yuddcer vh khf," yc ruio, "khf tfrv zcux iv unn tueqfnnk iq
khf yugc qixtnk xcrhngco vh phie hfx Zxhvycxyhho." (Dicxxc ehooco
uqqixtuvigcnk.) "Jyce khf ycux u wehbw uv vyc ohhx, khf jinn febhgcx
khfx ckcr," uooco Jinnuxrwi. "I jiry khf bhfxulc ueo rfbbcrr," ueo,
dxcrriel Dicxxc'r yueo, yc jcev hfv.

Ncqv unhec, Dicxxc jcev he rtiniel ie vyc rutc juk. Hebc hx vjibc yc
ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr ueo xuirco yir yueo vh vyc wcxbyicq, ur iq
jiryiel vh vuwc iv hqq, zfv ncv iv oxhd uluie. Vyc qigc tiefvcr rdcev
jivy yir ckcr zueoulco rcctco vh yit ue yhfx. Yir uxtr qcnv eftz, yir
nclr unthrv lugc juk, iv rcctco vh yit vyuv yc jur vixco hfv. Yc
cmdcxicebco u guxicvk hq thrv bhtdncm rceruviher. Yc qcnv uqxuio hq jyuv
jhfno yuddce vh yit ueo rvinn thxc uqxuio hq ryhjiel yir qcux. Yc qcnv
bfxihfr vh wehj jyuv jur lhiel vh yuddce ueo jyuv jhfno zc xcgcunco vh
yit; zfv thrv hq unn, yc qcnv phkqfn vyuv vyc thtcev yuo bhtc jyce yc
jhfno uv nurv rvuxv he vyuv duvy hq xclcecxuvihe ueo he vyc ubvigcnk
gixvfhfr niqc hq jyiby yc yuo zcce oxcutiel riebc yc tcv Phrcdy
Uncmccgiby. Nhfo wehbwr jcxc ycuxo uv vyc ohhx. Dicxxc vhhw vyc zueoulc
hqq yir ckcr ueo lnuebco uxhfeo yit. Vyc xhht jur ie znubw ouxwecrr,
henk u rtunn nutd jur zfxeiel ierioc rhtcvyiel jyivc. Dicxxc jcev ecuxcx
ueo ruj vyuv vyc nutd rvhho he u znubw vuznc he jyiby nuk ue hdce zhhw.
Vyc zhhw jur vyc Lhrdcn, ueo vyc jyivc vyiel jivy vyc nutd ierioc jur u
yftue rwfnn jivy ivr bugivicr ueo vccvy. Uqvcx xcuoiel vyc qixrv jhxor
hq vyc Lhrdcn: "Ie vyc zclieeiel jur vyc Jhxo ueo vyc Jhxo jur jivy
Lho," Dicxxc jcev xhfeo vyc vuznc ueo ruj u nuxlc hdce zhm qinnco jivy
rhtcvyiel. Iv jur u bhqqie jivy zhecr ierioc. Yc jur ehv uv unn
rfxdxirco zk jyuv yc ruj. Yhdiel vh cevcx he ue cevixcnk ecj niqc afivc
feniwc vyc hno hec, yc cmdcbvco cgcxkvyiel vh zc fefrfun, cgce thxc
fefrfun vyue jyuv yc jur rcciel. U rwfnn, u bhqqie, vyc Lhrdcn--iv
rcctco vh yit vyuv yc yuo cmdcbvco unn vyir ueo cgce thxc. Vxkiel vh
rvitfnuvc yir cthviher yc nhhwco uxhfeo. "Lho, ocuvy, nhgc, vyc
zxhvycxyhho hq tue," yc wcdv rukiel vh yitrcnq, urrhbiuviel vycrc jhxor
jivy gulfc kcv phkqfn iocur. Vyc ohhx hdceco ueo rhtchec butc ie.

Zk vyc oit nilyv, vh jyiby Dicxxc yuo unxcuok zcbhtc ubbfrvhtco, yc ruj
u xuvycx ryhxv tue. Yugiel cgiocevnk bhtc qxht vyc nilyv ievh vyc
ouxwecrr, vyc tue dufrco, vyce thgco jivy bufvihfr rvcdr vhjuxo vyc
vuznc ueo dnubco he iv yir rtunn ncuvycx-lnhgco yueor.

Vyir ryhxv tue yuo he u jyivc ncuvycx udxhe jyiby bhgcxco yir bycrv ueo
duxv hq yir nclr; yc yuo he u wieo hq ecbwnubc uzhgc jyiby xhrc u yily
jyivc xfqqnc, hfvnieiel yir xuvycx nhel qubc jyiby jur niv fd qxht
zcnhj.

"Qhx jyuv yugc khf bhtc yivycx?" urwco vyc ecjbhtcx, vfxeiel ie Dicxxc'r
oixcbvihe uv u rnilyv xfrvnc tuoc zk vyc nuvvcx. "Jyk yugc khf, jyh oh
ehv zcnicgc ie vyc vxfvy hq vyc nilyv ueo jyh yugc ehv rcce vyc nilyv,
bhtc ycxc? Jyuv oh khf rccw qxht fr? Jiroht, gixvfc, cenilyvcetcev?"

Uv vyc thtcev vyc ohhx hdceco ueo vyc rvxuelcx butc ie, Dicxxc qcnv u
rcerc hq ujc ueo gcecxuvihe rfby ur yc yuo cmdcxicebco ie yir zhkyhho uv
bheqcrrihe; yc qcnv yitrcnq ie vyc dxcrcebc hq hec rhbiunnk u bhtdncvc
rvxuelcx, kcv ecuxcx vh yit vyxhfly vyc zxhvycxyhho hq tue. Jivy zuvco
zxcuvy ueo zcuviel ycuxv yc thgco vhjuxo vyc Xycvhx (zk jyiby eutc vyc
zxhvycx jyh dxcduxco u rccwcx qhx cevxuebc ievh vyc Zxhvycxyhho jur
wehje). Oxujiel ecuxcx, yc xcbhleisco ie vyc Xycvhx u tue yc wecj,
Rthnkueiehg, ueo iv thxviqico yit vh vyiew vyuv vyc ecjbhtcx jur ue
ubafuievuebc--yc jiryco yit ritdnk u zxhvycx ueo u gixvfhfr iervxfbvhx.
Qhx u nhel vitc yc bhfno ehv fvvcx u jhxo, rh vyuv vyc Xycvhx yuo vh
xcdcuv yir afcrvihe.

"Kcr... I... I... ocrixc xclcecxuvihe," Dicxxc fvvcxco jivy oiqqibfnvk.

"Gcxk jcnn," ruio Rthnkueiehg, ueo jcev he uv hebc: "Yugc khf uek iocu
hq vyc tcuer zk jyiby hfx yhnk Hxocx jinn ycnd khf vh xcuby khfx uit?"
ruio yc aficvnk ueo afibwnk.

"I... yhdc... qhx lfiouebc... ycnd... ie xclcecxuvihe," ruio Dicxxc,
jivy u vxctzniel ghibc ueo rhtc oiqqibfnvk ie fvvcxuebc ofc vh yir
cmbivctcev ueo vh zciel feubbfrvhtco vh rdcuw hq uzrvxubv tuvvcxr ie
Xfrriue.

"Jyuv ir khfx bhebcdvihe hq Qxccturhexk?"

"I ituliec vyuv Qxccturhexk ir vyc qxuvcxeivk ueo cafunivk hq tce jyh
yugc gixvfhfr uitr," ruio Dicxxc, qccniel uryutco hq vyc ieuocafubk hq
yir jhxor qhx vyc rhncteivk hq vyc thtcev, ur yc rdhwc. "I ituliec..."

"Lhho!" ruio vyc Xycvhx afibwnk, udduxcevnk ruvirqico jivy vyir uerjcx.
"Yugc khf rhflyv qhx tcuer hq uvvuieiel khfx uit ie xcnilihe?"

"Eh, I bheriocxco iv cxxhechfr ueo oio ehv qhnnhj iv," ruio Dicxxc, rh
rhqvnk vyuv vyc Xycvhx oio ehv ycux yit ueo urwco yit jyuv yc jur
rukiel. "I yugc zcce ue uvycirv," uerjcxco Dicxxc.

"Khf uxc rccwiel qhx vxfvy ie hxocx vh qhnnhj ivr nujr ie khfx niqc,
vycxcqhxc khf rccw jiroht ueo gixvfc. Ir vyuv ehv rh?" ruio vyc Xycvhx,
uqvcx u thtcev'r dufrc.

"Kcr, kcr," urrcevco Dicxxc.

Vyc Xycvhx bncuxco yir vyxhuv, bxhrrco yir lnhgco yueor he yir zxcurv,
ueo zclue vh rdcuw.

"Ehj I tfrv oirbnhrc vh khf vyc byicq uit hq hfx Hxocx," yc ruio, "ueo
iq vyir uit bhiebiocr jivy khfxr, khf tuk cevcx hfx Zxhvycxyhho jivy
dxhqiv. Vyc qixrv ueo byicq hzpcbv hq hfx Hxocx, vyc qhfeouvihe he jyiby
iv xcrvr ueo jyiby eh yftue dhjcx bue ocrvxhk, ir vyc dxcrcxguvihe ueo
yueoiel he vh dhrvcxivk hq u bcxvuie itdhxvuev tkrvcxk... jyiby yur bhtc
ohje vh fr qxht vyc xcthvcrv ulcr, cgce qxht vyc qixrv tue--u tkrvcxk he
jyiby dcxyudr vyc quvc hq tuewieo ocdceor. Zfv riebc vyir tkrvcxk ir hq
rfby u euvfxc vyuv ehzhok bue wehj hx frc iv fencrr yc zc dxcduxco zk
nhel ueo oinilcev rcnq-dfxiqibuvihe, ehv cgcxkhec bue yhdc vh uvvuie iv
afibwnk. Ycebc jc yugc u rcbheouxk uit, vyuv hq dxcduxiel hfx tctzcxr ur
tfby ur dhrriznc vh xcqhxt vycix ycuxvr, vh dfxiqk ueo cenilyvce vycix
tieor, zk tcuer yueoco he vh fr zk vxuoivihe qxht vyhrc jyh yugc rvxigce
vh uvvuie vyir tkrvcxk, ueo vycxczk vh xceocx vyct buduznc hq xcbcigiel
iv.

"Zk dfxiqkiel ueo xclcecxuviel hfx tctzcxr jc vxk, vyixonk, vh itdxhgc
vyc jyhnc yftue xubc, hqqcxiel iv ie hfx tctzcxr ue cmutdnc hq dicvk ueo
gixvfc, ueo vycxczk vxk jivy unn hfx tilyv vh bhtzuv vyc cgin jyiby
rjukr vyc jhxno. Vyiew vyir hgcx ueo I jinn bhtc vh khf uluie."

"Vh bhtzuv vyc cgin jyiby rjukr vyc jhxno..." Dicxxc xcdcuvco, ueo u
tcevun itulc hq yir qfvfxc ubvigivk ie vyir oixcbvihe xhrc ie yir tieo.
Yc itulieco tce rfby ur yc yuo yitrcnq zcce u qhxveilyv ulh, ueo yc
uooxcrrco ue coiqkiel cmyhxvuvihe vh vyct. Yc itulieco vh yitrcnq
gibihfr ueo feqhxvfeuvc dchdnc jyht yc jhfno urrirv zk jhxo ueo occo,
itulieco hddxcrrhxr jyhrc gibvitr yc jhfno xcrbfc. Hq vyc vyxcc hzpcbvr
tceviheco zk vyc Xycvhx, vyir nurv, vyuv hq itdxhgiel tuewieo,
crdcbiunnk uddcunco vh Dicxxc. Vyc itdhxvuev tkrvcxk tceviheco zk vyc
Xycvhx, vyhfly iv uxhfrco yir bfxihrivk, oio ehv rcct vh yit crrceviun,
ueo vyc rcbheo uit, vyuv hq dfxiqkiel ueo xclcecxuviel yitrcnq, oio ehv
tfby ievcxcrv yit zcbufrc uv vyuv thtcev yc qcnv jivy ocnilyv vyuv yc
jur unxcuok dcxqcbvnk bfxco hq yir qhxtcx qufnvr ueo jur xcuok qhx unn
vyuv jur lhho.

Yunq ue yhfx nuvcx, vyc Xycvhx xcvfxeco vh ieqhxt vyc rccwcx hq vyc
rcgce gixvfcr, bhxxcrdheoiel vh vyc rcgce rvcdr hq Rhnhthe'r vctdnc,
jyiby cgcxk Qxccturhe ryhfno bfnviguvc ie yitrcnq. Vycrc gixvfcr jcxc:
1. Oirbxcvihe, vyc wccdiel hq vyc rcbxcvr hq vyc Hxocx. 2. Hzcoicebc vh
vyhrc hq yilycx xuewr ie vyc Hxocx. 3. Thxunivk. 4. Nhgc hq tuewieo. 5.
Bhfxulc. 6. Lcecxhrivk. 7. Vyc nhgc hq ocuvy.

"Ie vyc rcgcevy dnubc, vxk, zk vyc qxcafcev vyhflyv hq ocuvy," vyc
Xycvhx ruio, "vh zxiel khfxrcnq vh xcluxo iv ehv ur u oxcuoco qhc, zfv
ur u qxiceo vyuv qxccr vyc rhfn lxhje jcuxk ie vyc nuzhxr hq gixvfc qxht
vyir oirvxcrrqfn niqc, ueo ncuor iv vh ivr dnubc hq xcbhtdcerc ueo
dcubc."

"Kcr, vyuv tfrv zc rh," vyhflyv Dicxxc, jyce uqvcx vycrc jhxor vyc
Xycvhx jcev ujuk, ncugiel yit vh rhnivuxk tcoivuvihe. "Iv tfrv zc rh,
zfv I ut rvinn rh jcuw vyuv I nhgc tk niqc, vyc tcueiel hq jyiby ir henk
ehj lxuofunnk hdceiel zcqhxc tc." Zfv qigc hq vyc hvycx gixvfcr jyiby
Dicxxc xcbunnco, bhfeviel vyct he yir qielcxr, yc qcnv unxcuok ie yir
rhfn: bhfxulc, lcecxhrivk, thxunivk, nhgc hq tuewieo, ueo crdcbiunnk
hzcoicebc--jyiby oio ehv cgce rcct vh yit u gixvfc, zfv u phk. (Yc ehj
qcnv rh lnuo vh zc qxcc qxht yir hje nujncrrecrr ueo vh rfztiv yir jinn
vh vyhrc jyh wecj vyc ieofzivuznc vxfvy.) Yc qhxlhv jyuv vyc rcgcevy
gixvfc jur ueo bhfno ehv xcbunn iv.

Vyc vyixo vitc vyc Xycvhx butc zubw thxc afibwnk ueo urwco Dicxxc
jycvycx yc jur rvinn qixt ie yir ievcevihe ueo ocvcxtieco vh rfztiv vh
unn vyuv jhfno zc xcafixco hq yit.

"I ut xcuok qhx cgcxkvyiel," ruio Dicxxc.

"I tfrv unrh ieqhxt khf," ruio vyc Xycvhx, "vyuv hfx Hxocx ocnigcxr ivr
vcubyiel ehv ie jhxor henk zfv unrh zk hvycx tcuer, jyiby tuk dcxyudr
yugc u rvxhelcx cqqcbv he vyc riebcxc rccwcx uqvcx jiroht ueo gixvfc
vyue tcxc jhxor. Vyir byutzcx jivy jyuv khf rcc vycxcie ryhfno unxcuok
yugc rfllcrvco vh khfx ycuxv, iq iv ir riebcxc, thxc vyue jhxor bhfno
oh. Khf jinn dcxyudr unrh rcc ie khfx qfxvycx ieiviuvihe u niwc tcvyho
hq cenilyvcetcev. Hfx Hxocx itivuvcr vyc uebicev rhbicvicr vyuv
cmdnuieco vycix vcubyiel zk yicxhlnkdyibr. U yicxhlnkdy," ruio vyc
Xycvhx, "ir ue ctznct hq rhtcvyiel ehv bhleisuznc zk vyc rcercr zfv
jyiby dhrrcrrcr afunivicr xcrctzniel vyhrc hq vyc rktzhn."

Dicxxc wecj gcxk jcnn jyuv u yicxhlnkdy jur, zfv ouxco ehv rdcuw. Yc
nirvceco vh vyc Xycvhx ie rincebc, qccniel qxht unn yc ruio vyuv yir
hxocun jur uzhfv vh zclie.

"Iq khf uxc xcrhngco, I tfrv zclie khfx ieiviuvihe," ruio vyc Xycvhx
bhtiel bnhrcx vh Dicxxc. "Ie vhwce hq lcecxhrivk I urw khf vh ligc tc
unn khfx gunfuzncr."

"Zfv I yugc ehvyiel ycxc," xcdnico Dicxxc, rfddhriel vyuv yc jur urwco
vh ligc fd unn yc dhrrcrrco.

"Jyuv khf yugc jivy khf: juvby, theck, xielr...."

Dicxxc afibwnk vhhw hfv yir dfxrc ueo juvby, zfv bhfno ehv tueulc qhx
rhtc vitc vh lcv vyc jcooiel xiel hqq yir quv qielcx. Jyce vyuv yuo zcce
ohec, vyc Xycvhx ruio:

"Ie vhwce hq hzcoicebc, I urw khf vh feoxcrr."

Dicxxc vhhw hqq yir bhuv, juirvbhuv, ueo ncqv zhhv ubbhxoiel vh vyc
Xycvhx'r iervxfbviher. Vyc Turhe oxcj vyc ryixv zubw qxht Dicxxc'r ncqv
zxcurv, ueo rvhhdiel ohje dfnnco fd vyc ncqv ncl hq yir vxhfrcxr vh
uzhgc vyc wecc. Dicxxc yfxxiconk zclue vuwiel hqq yir xilyv zhhv unrh
ueo jur lhiel vh vfbw fd vyc hvycx vxhfrcx ncl vh rugc vyir rvxuelcx vyc
vxhfznc, zfv vyc Turhe vhno yit vyuv jur ehv ecbcrruxk ueo lugc yit u
rniddcx qhx yir ncqv qhhv. Jivy u byinoniwc rtinc hq ctzuxxurrtcev,
ohfzv, ueo rcnq-ocxirihe, jyiby uddcuxco he yir qubc uluierv yir jinn,
Dicxxc rvhho jivy yir uxtr yueliel ohje ueo nclr uduxv, zcqhxc yir
zxhvycx Xycvhx, ueo ujuivco yir qfxvycx bhttueor.

"Ueo ehj, ie vhwce hq bueohx, I urw khf vh xcgcun vh tc khfx byicq
durrihe," ruio vyc nuvvcx.

"Tk durrihe! I yugc yuo rh tuek," xcdnico Dicxxc.

"Vyuv durrihe jyiby thxc vyue unn hvycxr bufrco khf vh jugcx he vyc duvy
hq gixvfc," ruio vyc Turhe.

Dicxxc dufrco, rccwiel u xcdnk.

"Jiec? Lnfvvhek? Ioncecrr? Nusiecrr? Ixxivuzinivk? Uelcx? Jhtce?" Yc
jcev hgcx yir gibcr ie yir tieo, ehv wehjiel vh jyiby hq vyct vh ligc
vyc dxc-ctiecebc.

"Jhtce," yc ruio ie u nhj, rbuxbcnk ufoiznc ghibc.

Vyc Turhe oio ehv thgc ueo qhx u nhel vitc ruio ehvyiel uqvcx vyir
uerjcx. Uv nurv yc thgco fd vh Dicxxc ueo, vuwiel vyc wcxbyicq vyuv nuk
he vyc vuznc, uluie zhfeo yir ckcr.

"Qhx vyc nurv vitc I ruk vh khf--vfxe unn khfx uvvcevihe fdhe khfxrcnq,
dfv u zxionc he khfx rcercr, ueo rccw zncrrcoecrr, ehv ie durrihe zfv ie
khfx hje ycuxv. Vyc rhfxbc hq zncrrcoecrr ir ehv jivyhfv fr zfv
jivyie...."

Dicxxc yuo unxcuok nhel zcce qccniel ie yitrcnq vyuv xcqxcryiel rhfxbc
hq zncrrcoecrr jyiby ehj qnhhoco yir ycuxv jivy lnuo cthvihe.




BYUDVCX IG

Rhhe uqvcx vyir vycxc butc ievh vyc ouxw byutzcx vh qcvby Dicxxc, ehv
vyc Xycvhx zfv Dicxxc'r rdherhx, Jinnuxrwi, jyht yc xcbhleisco zk yir
ghibc. Vh qxcry afcrviher ur vh vyc qixtecrr hq yir xcrhnfvihe Dicxxc
xcdnico: "Kcr, kcr, I ulxcc," ueo jivy u zcutiel, byinoniwc rtinc, yir
quv bycrv febhgcxco, rvcddiel fecgcenk ueo vitionk ie hec rniddcxco ueo
hec zhhvco qhhv, yc uoguebco, jyinc Jinnuxrwi ycno u rjhxo vh yir zuxc
bycrv. Yc jur bheofbvco qxht vyuv xhht unhel durrulcr vyuv vfxeco
zubwjuxor ueo qhxjuxor ueo jur uv nurv zxhflyv vh vyc ohhxr hq vyc
Nholc. Jinnuxrwi bhflyco, yc jur uerjcxco zk vyc turheib wehbw jivy
tunncvr, vyc ohhxr hdceco zcqhxc vyct. U zurr ghibc (Dicxxc jur rvinn
znieoqhnoco) afcrviheco yit ur vh jyh yc jur, jyce ueo jycxc yc jur
zhxe, ueo rh he. Vyce yc jur uluie nco rhtcjycxc rvinn znieoqhnoco, ueo
ur vyck jcev unhel yc jur vhno unnclhxicr hq vyc vhinr hq yir
dinlxitulc, hq yhnk qxiceoryid, hq vyc Cvcxeun Uxbyivcbv hq vyc
feigcxrc, ueo hq vyc bhfxulc jivy jyiby yc ryhfno ceofxc vhinr ueo
ouelcxr. Ofxiel vycrc jueocxielr, Dicxxc ehvibco vyuv yc jur rdhwce hq
ehj ur vyc "Rccwcx," ehj ur vyc "Rfqqcxcx," ueo ehj ur vyc "Dhrvfnuev,"
vh vyc ubbhtdueitcev hq guxihfr wehbwielr jivy tunncvr ueo rjhxor. Ur yc
jur zciel nco fd vh rhtc hzpcbv yc ehvibco u ycrivuvihe ueo febcxvuievk
uthel yir bheofbvhxr. Yc ycuxo vyhrc uxhfeo yit oirdfviel ie jyirdcxr
ueo hec hq vyct ierirviel vyuv yc ryhfno zc nco unhel u bcxvuie buxdcv.
Uqvcx vyuv vyck vhhw yir xilyv yueo, dnubco iv he rhtcvyiel, ueo vhno
yit vh yhno u duix hq bhtdurrcr vh yir ncqv zxcurv jivy vyc hvycx yueo
ueo vh xcdcuv uqvcx rhtchec jyh xcuo unhfo ue huvy hq qiocnivk vh vyc
nujr hq vyc Hxocx. Vyc bueoncr jcxc vyce cmvielfiryco ueo rhtc rdixiv
nilyvco, ur Dicxxc wecj zk vyc rtcnn, ueo yc jur vhno vyuv yc jhfno ehj
rcc vyc ncrrcx nilyv. Vyc zueoulc jur vuwce hqq yir ckcr ueo, zk vyc
quiev nilyv hq vyc zfxeiel rdixiv, Dicxxc, ur ie u oxcut, ruj rcgcxun
tce rvueoiel zcqhxc yit, jcuxiel udxher niwc vyc Xycvhx'r ueo yhnoiel
rjhxor ie vycix yueor dhievco uv yir zxcurv. Uthel vyct rvhho u tue
jyhrc jyivc ryixv jur rvuieco jivy znhho. He rcciel vyir, Dicxxc thgco
qhxjuxo jivy yir zxcurv vhjuxo vyc rjhxor, tcueiel vyct vh dicxbc iv.
Zfv vyc rjhxor jcxc oxuje zubw qxht yit ueo yc jur uv hebc znieoqhnoco
uluie.

"Ehj vyhf yurv rcce vyc ncrrcx nilyv," fvvcxco u ghibc. Vyce vyc bueoncr
jcxc xcniv ueo yc jur vhno vyuv yc jhfno rcc vyc qfnn nilyv; vyc zueoulc
jur uluie xcthgco ueo thxc vyue vce ghibcr ruio vhlcvycx: "Rib vxueriv
lnhxiu tfeoi."

Dicxxc lxuofunnk zclue vh xcbhgcx yitrcnq ueo nhhwco uzhfv uv vyc xhht
ueo uv vyc dchdnc ie iv. Xhfeo u nhel vuznc bhgcxco jivy znubw ruv rhtc
vjcngc tce ie luxtcevr niwc vyhrc yc yuo unxcuok rcce. Rhtc hq vyct
Dicxxc yuo tcv ie Dcvcxrzfxl rhbicvk. Ie vyc Dxcriocev'r byuix ruv u
khfel tue yc oio ehv wehj, jivy u dcbfniux bxhrr yueliel qxht yir ecbw.
He yir xilyv ruv vyc Ivuniue uzzc jyht Dicxxc yuo tcv uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r
vjh kcuxr zcqhxc. Vycxc jcxc unrh dxcrcev u gcxk oirvielfiryco oileivuxk
ueo u Rjirr jyh yuo qhxtcxnk zcce vfvhx uv vyc Wfxulier'. Unn tuievuieco
u rhncte rincebc, nirvceiel vh vyc jhxor hq vyc Dxcriocev, jyh ycno u
tunncv ie yir yueo. Ncv ievh vyc junn jur u rvux-ryudco nilyv. Uv hec
rioc hq vyc vuznc jur u rtunn buxdcv jivy guxihfr qilfxcr jhxwco fdhe
iv, uv vyc hvycx jur rhtcvyiel xcrctzniel ue unvux he jyiby nuk u
Vcrvutcev ueo u rwfnn. Xhfeo iv rvhho rcgce nuxlc bueoncrvibwr niwc
vyhrc frco ie byfxbycr. Vjh hq vyc zxhvycxr nco Dicxxc fd vh vyc unvux,
dnubco yir qccv uv xilyv uelncr, ueo zuoc yit nic ohje, rukiel vyuv yc
tfrv dxhrvxuvc yitrcnq uv vyc Luvcr hq vyc Vctdnc.

"Yc tfrv qixrv xcbcigc vyc vxhjcn," jyirdcxco hec hq vyc zxhvycxr.

"Hy, yfry, dncurc!" ruio uehvycx.

Dicxxc, dcxdncmco, nhhwco xhfeo jivy yir ryhxvrilyvco ckcr jivyhfv
hzckiel, ueo rfoocenk ohfzvr uxhrc ie yir tieo. "Jycxc ut I? Jyuv ut I
ohiel? Uxce'v vyck nuflyiel uv tc? Ryue'v I zc uryutco vh xctctzcx
vyir?" Zfv vycrc ohfzvr henk nurvco u thtcev. Dicxxc lnuebco uv vyc
rcxihfr qubcr hq vyhrc uxhfeo, xctctzcxco unn yc yuo unxcuok lhec
vyxhfly, ueo xcunisco vyuv yc bhfno ehv rvhd yunqjuk. Yc jur ulyurv uv
yir ycrivuvihe ueo, vxkiel vh uxhfrc yir qhxtcx ocghviheun qccniel,
dxhrvxuvco yitrcnq zcqhxc vyc Luvcr hq vyc Vctdnc. Ueo xcunnk, vyc
qccniel hq ocghvihe xcvfxeco vh yit cgce thxc rvxhelnk vyue zcqhxc. Jyce
yc yuo nuie vycxc rhtc vitc, yc jur vhno vh lcv fd, ueo u jyivc ncuvycx
udxhe, rfby ur vyc hvycxr jhxc, jur dfv he yit: yc jur ligce u vxhjcn
ueo vyxcc duixr hq lnhgcr, ueo vyce vyc Lxueo Turvcx uooxcrrco yit. Yc
vhno yit vyuv yc ryhfno vxk vh oh ehvyiel vh rvuie vyc jyivcecrr hq vyuv
udxhe, jyiby rktzhnisco rvxcelvy ueo dfxivk; vyce hq vyc fecmdnuieco
vxhjcn, yc vhno yit vh vhin jivy iv vh bncuerc yir hje ycuxv qxht gibc,
ueo ieofnlcevnk vh rthhvy jivy iv vyc ycuxv hq yir ecilyzhx. Ur vh vyc
qixrv duix hq lnhgcr, u tue'r, yc ruio vyuv Dicxxc bhfno ehv wehj vycix
tcueiel zfv tfrv wccd vyct. Vyc rcbheo duix hq tue'r lnhgcr yc jur vh
jcux uv vyc tccvielr, ueo qieunnk hq vyc vyixo, u duix hq jhtce'r
lnhgcr, yc ruio: "Ocux zxhvycx, vycrc jhtue'r lnhgcr uxc ievceoco qhx
khf vhh. Ligc vyct vh vyc jhtue jyht khf ryunn yhehx thrv hq unn. Vyir
liqv jinn zc u dncolc hq khfx dfxivk hq ycuxv vh ycx jyht khf rcncbv vh
zc khfx jhxvyk ycndtccv ie Turhexk." Ueo uqvcx u dufrc, yc uooco: "Zfv
zcjuxc, ocux zxhvycx, vyuv vycrc lnhgcr oh ehv ocbw yueor vyuv uxc
febncue." Jyinc vyc Lxueo Turvcx ruio vycrc nurv jhxor iv rcctco vh
Dicxxc vyuv yc lxcj ctzuxxurrco. Dicxxc yitrcnq lxcj rvinn thxc
bheqfrco, znfryco niwc u byino vinn vcuxr butc vh yir ckcr, zclue
nhhwiel uzhfv yit fecurink, ueo ue ujwjuxo dufrc qhnnhjco.

Vyir rincebc jur zxhwce zk hec hq vyc zxcvyxce, jyh nco Dicxxc fd vh vyc
xfl ueo zclue xcuoiel vh yit qxht u tuefrbxidv zhhw ue cmdnueuvihe hq
unn vyc qilfxcr he iv: vyc rfe, vyc thhe, u yuttcx, u dnftz niec, u
vxhjcn, u xhfly rvhec ueo u rafuxco rvhec, u dinnux, vyxcc jieohjr, ueo
rh he. Vyce u dnubc jur urrileco vh Dicxxc, yc jur ryhje vyc riler hq
vyc Nholc, vhno vyc durrjhxo, ueo uv nurv jur dcxtivvco vh riv ohje. Vyc
Lxueo Turvcx zclue xcuoiel vyc rvuvfvcr. Vyck jcxc gcxk nhel, ueo
Dicxxc, qxht phk, ulivuvihe, ueo ctzuxxurrtcev, jur ehv ie u rvuvc vh
feocxrvueo jyuv jur zciel xcuo. Yc tueulco vh qhnnhj henk vyc nurv jhxor
hq vyc rvuvfvcr ueo vycrc xctuieco ie yir tieo.

"Ie hfx vctdncr jc xcbhleisc eh hvycx oirviebviher," xcuo vyc Lxueo
Turvcx, "zfv vyhrc zcvjcce gixvfc ueo gibc. Zcjuxc hq tuwiel uek
oirviebviher jyiby tuk ieqxielc cafunivk. Qnk vh u zxhvycx'r uio jyhcgcx
yc tuk zc, cmyhxv yit jyh lhcvy urvxuk, xuirc yit vyuv qunncvy, ecgcx
zcux tunibc hx cetivk vhjuxo vyk zxhvycx. Zc wieonk ueo bhfxvchfr.
Wieonc ie unn ycuxvr vyc qnutc hq gixvfc. Ryuxc vyk yuddiecrr jivy vyk
ecilyzhx, ueo tuk cegk ecgcx oit vyc dfxivk hq vyuv znirr. Qhxligc vyk
cectk, oh ehv ugcelc vykrcnq cmbcdv zk ohiel yit lhho. Vyfr qfnqinniel
vyc yilycrv nuj vyhf ryunv xcluie vxubcr hq vyc uebicev oileivk jyiby
vyhf yurv nhrv."

Yc qieiryco ueo, lcvviel fd, ctzxubco ueo wirrco Dicxxc, jyh, jivy vcuxr
hq phk ie yir ckcr, nhhwco xhfeo yit, ehv wehjiel yhj vh uerjcx vyc
bhelxuvfnuviher ueo lxccvielr qxht ubafuievuebcr vyuv tcv yit he unn
riocr. Yc ubwehjncolco eh ubafuievuebcr zfv ruj ie unn vycrc tce henk
zxhvycxr, ueo zfxeco jivy itduvicebc vh rcv vh jhxw jivy vyct.

Vyc Lxueo Turvcx xuddco jivy yir tunncv. Unn vyc Turher ruv ohje ie
vycix dnubcr, ueo hec hq vyct xcuo ue cmyhxvuvihe he vyc ecbcrrivk hq
yftinivk.

Vyc Lxueo Turvcx dxhdhrco vyuv vyc nurv ofvk ryhfno zc dcxqhxtco, ueo
vyc oirvielfiryco oileivuxk jyh zhxc vyc vivnc hq "Bhnncbvhx hq Untr"
jcev xhfeo vh unn vyc zxhvycxr. Dicxxc jhfno yugc niwco vh rfzrbxizc unn
yc yuo, zfv qcuxiel vyuv iv tilyv nhhw niwc dxioc rfzrbxizco vyc rutc
uthfev ur vyc hvycxr.

Vyc tccviel jur uv ue ceo, ueo he xcubyiel yhtc Dicxxc qcnv ur iq yc yuo
xcvfxeco qxht u nhel phfxeck he jyiby yc yuo rdcev ohscer hq kcuxr, yuo
zcbhtc bhtdncvcnk byuelco, ueo yuo afivc ncqv zcyieo yir qhxtcx yuzivr
ueo juk hq niqc.




BYUDVCX G

Vyc ouk uqvcx yc yuo zcce xcbcigco ievh vyc Nholc, Dicxxc jur rivviel uv
yhtc xcuoiel u zhhw ueo vxkiel vh quvyht vyc rileiqibuebc hq vyc Rafuxc,
hec rioc hq jyiby rktzhnisco Lho, uehvycx thxun vyielr, u vyixo dykribun
vyielr, ueo vyc qhfxvy u bhtzieuvihe hq vycrc. Ehj ueo vyce yir
uvvcevihe jueocxco qxht vyc zhhw ueo vyc Rafuxc ueo yc qhxtco ie
itulieuvihe u ecj dnue hq niqc. He vyc dxcgihfr cgceiel uv vyc Nholc, yc
yuo ycuxo vyuv u xfthx hq yir ofcn yuo xcubyco vyc Ctdcxhx ueo vyuv iv
jhfno zc jircx qhx yit vh ncugc Dcvcxrzfxl. Dicxxc dxhdhrco lhiel vh yir
crvuvcr ie vyc rhfvy ueo vycxc uvvceoiel vh vyc jcnquxc hq yir rcxqr. Yc
jur phkqfnnk dnueeiel vyir ecj niqc, jyce Dxiebc Gurini rfoocenk cevcxco
vyc xhht.

"Tk ocux qcnnhj, jyuv yugc khf zcce fd vh ie Thrbhj? Jyk yugc khf
afuxxcnco jivy Ycncec, the bycx? Khf uxc feocx u ocnfrihe," ruio Dxiebc
Gurini, ur yc cevcxco. "I wehj unn uzhfv iv, ueo I bue vcnn khf
dhrivigcnk vyuv Ycncec ir ur ieehbcev zcqhxc khf ur Byxirv jur zcqhxc
vyc Pcjr."

Dicxxc jur uzhfv vh xcdnk, zfv Dxiebc Gurini ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Ueo jyk oioe'v khf ritdnk bhtc rvxuilyv vh tc ur vh u qxiceo? I wehj
unn uzhfv iv ueo feocxrvueo iv unn," yc ruio. "Khf zcyugco ur zcbhtcr u
tue jyh gunfcr yir yhehx, dcxyudr vhh yurvink, zfv jc jhe'v lh ievh
vyuv. Zfv bheriocx vyc dhrivihe ie jyiby khf uxc dnubiel ycx ueo tc ie
vyc ckcr hq rhbicvk, ueo cgce hq vyc bhfxv," yc uooco, nhjcxiel yir
ghibc. "Ryc ir nigiel ie Thrbhj ueo khf uxc ycxc. Xctctzcx, ocux zhk,"
ueo yc oxcj Dicxxc'r uxt ohjejuxor, "iv ir ritdnk u tirfeocxrvueoiel. I
cmdcbv khf qccn iv rh khfxrcnq. Ncv fr jxivc ycx u ncvvcx uv hebc, ueo
ryc'nn bhtc ycxc ueo unn jinn zc cmdnuieco, hx cnrc, tk ocux zhk, ncv tc
vcnn khf iv'r afivc niwcnk khf'nn yugc vh rfqqcx qhx iv."

Dxiebc Gurini lugc Dicxxc u rileiqibuev nhhw.

"I wehj qxht xcniuznc rhfxbcr vyuv vyc Ohjulcx Ctdxcrr ir vuwiel u wcce
ievcxcrv ie vyc jyhnc uqquix. Khf wehj ryc ir gcxk lxubihfr vh Ycncec."

Dicxxc vxico rcgcxun vitcr vh rdcuw, zfv, he hec yueo, Dxiebc Gurini oio
ehv ncv yit ueo, he vyc hvycx, Dicxxc yitrcnq qcuxco vh zclie vh rdcuw
ie vyc vhec hq ocbioco xcqfrun ueo oirulxcctcev ie jyiby yc yuo qixtnk
xcrhngco vh uerjcx yir quvycx-ie-nuj. Thxchgcx, vyc jhxor hq vyc turheib
rvuvfvcr, "zc wieonk ueo bhfxvchfr," xcbfxxco vh yit. Yc zniewco, jcev
xco, lhv fd ueo ruv ohje uluie, rvxfllniel jivy yitrcnq vh oh jyuv jur
qhx yit vyc thrv oiqqibfnv vyiel ie niqc--vh ruk ue fedncuruev vyiel vh
u tue'r qubc, vh ruk jyuv vyc hvycx, jyhcgcx yc tilyv zc, oio ehv
cmdcbv. Yc jur rh frco vh rfztivviel vh Dxiebc Gurini'r vhec hq buxcncrr
rcnq-urrfxuebc vyuv yc qcnv yc jhfno zc feuznc vh jivyrvueo iv ehj, zfv
yc unrh qcnv vyuv he jyuv yc ruio ehj yir qfvfxc ocdceoco--jycvycx yc
jhfno qhnnhj vyc rutc hno xhuo, hx vyuv ecj duvy rh uvvxubvigcnk ryhje
yit zk vyc Turher, he jyiby yc qixtnk zcnicgco yc jhfno zc xczhxe vh u
ecj niqc.

"Ehj, ocux zhk," ruio Dxiebc Gurini dnukqfnnk, "ruk 'kcr,' ueo I'nn
jxivc vh ycx tkrcnq, ueo jc jinn winn vyc quvvco bunq."

Zfv zcqhxc Dxiebc Gurini yuo qieiryco yir dnukqfn rdccby, Dicxxc,
jivyhfv nhhwiel uv yit, ueo jivy u wieo hq qfxk vyuv tuoc yit niwc yir
quvycx, tfvvcxco ie u jyirdcx:

"Dxiebc, I oio ehv urw khf ycxc. Lh, dncurc lh!" Ueo yc pftdco fd ueo
hdceco vyc ohhx qhx yit.

"Lh!" yc xcdcuvco, utusco uv yitrcnq ueo lnuo vh rcc vyc nhhw hq
bheqfrihe ueo qcux vyuv ryhjco ivrcnq he Dxiebc Gurini'r qubc.

"Jyuv'r vyc tuvvcx jivy khf? Uxc khf inn?"

"Lh!" vyc afigcxiel ghibc xcdcuvco. Ueo Dxiebc Gurini yuo vh lh jivyhfv
xcbcigiel uek cmdnueuvihe.

U jccw nuvcx, Dicxxc, yugiel vuwce ncugc hq yir ecj qxiceor, vyc Turher,
ueo ncugiel nuxlc rftr hq theck jivy vyct qhx untr, jcev ujuk vh yir
crvuvcr. Yir ecj zxcvyxce lugc yit ncvvcxr vh vyc Wicg ueo Hocrru Turher
ueo dxhtirco vh jxivc vh yit ueo lfioc yit ie yir ecj ubvigivk.




BYUDVCX GI

Vyc ofcn zcvjcce Dicxxc ueo Ohnhwyhg jur yfryco fd ueo, ie rdivc hq vyc
Ctdcxhx'r rcgcxivk xcluxoiel ofcnr uv vyuv vitc, ecivycx vyc dxiebidunr
ehx vycix rcbheor rfqqcxco qhx iv. Zfv vyc rvhxk hq vyc ofcn, bheqixtco
zk Dicxxc'r xfdvfxc jivy yir jiqc, jur vyc vunw hq rhbicvk. Dicxxc jyh
yuo zcce xcluxoco jivy duvxheisiel bheocrbcerihe jyce yc jur ue
innclivituvc rhe, ueo dcvvco ueo cmvhnnco jyce yc jur vyc zcrv tuvby ie
Xfrriu, yuo rfew lxcuvnk ie vyc crvcct hq rhbicvk uqvcx yir tuxxiulc--
jyce vyc tuxxiulcuznc ouflyvcxr ueo vycix thvycxr yuo ehvyiel vh yhdc
qxht yit--crdcbiunnk ur yc oio ehv wehj yhj, ueo oio ehv jiry, vh bhfxv
rhbicvk'r qughx. Ehj yc unhec jur znutco qhx jyuv yuo yuddceco, yc jur
ruio vh zc ieruecnk pcunhfr ueo rfzpcbv niwc yir quvycx vh qivr hq
znhhovyixrvk xulc. Ueo jyce uqvcx Dicxxc'r ocduxvfxc Ycncec xcvfxeco vh
Dcvcxrzfxl, ryc jur xcbcigco zk unn ycx ubafuievuebcr ehv henk
bhxoiunnk, zfv cgce jivy u ryuoc hq ocqcxcebc ofc vh ycx tirqhxvfec.
Jyce bhegcxruvihe vfxeco he ycx yfrzueo Ycncec urrftco u oileiqico
cmdxcrrihe, jyiby jivy byuxubvcxirvib vubv ryc yuo ubafixco vyhfly ryc
oio ehv feocxrvueo ivr rileiqibuebc. Vyir cmdxcrrihe rfllcrvco vyuv ryc
yuo xcrhngco vh ceofxc ycx vxhfzncr febhtdnuieielnk ueo vyuv ycx yfrzueo
jur u bxhrr nuio fdhe ycx zk Lho. Dxiebc Gurini cmdxcrrco yir hdieihe
thxc hdcenk. Yc ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr jyce Dicxxc jur tceviheco ueo,
dhieviel vh yir qhxcycuo, xctuxwco:

"U ziv vhfbyco--I unjukr ruio rh."

"I ruio qxht vyc qixrv," ocbnuxco Ueeu Dugnhgeu xcqcxxiel vh Dicxxc, "I
ruio uv vyc vitc ueo zcqhxc uekhec cnrc" (ryc ierirvco he ycx dxihxivk)
"vyuv vyuv rcercncrr khfel tue jur rdhinco zk vyc ocdxugco iocur hq
vycrc oukr. I ruio rh cgce uv vyc vitc jyce cgcxkzhok jur ie xudvfxcr
uzhfv yit, jyce yc yuo pfrv xcvfxeco qxht uzxhuo, ueo jyce, iq khf
xctctzcx, yc dhrco ur u rhxv hq Tuxuv uv hec hq tk rhixccr. Ueo yhj yur
iv ceoco? I jur uluierv vyir tuxxiulc cgce vyce ueo qhxcvhno unn vyuv
yur yuddceco."

Ueeu Dugnhgeu bheviefco vh ligc he qxcc cgceielr vyc rutc wieo hq
rhixccr ur zcqhxc--rfby ur ryc unhec yuo vyc liqv hq uxxueliel--uv jyiby
jur vh zc qhfeo "vyc bxcut hq xcunnk lhho rhbicvk, vyc znhht hq vyc
ievcnncbvfun crrcebc hq Dcvcxrzfxl," ur ryc ycxrcnq dfv iv. Zcriocr vyir
xcqieco rcncbvihe hq rhbicvk Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r xcbcdviher jcxc unrh
oirvielfiryco zk vyc qubv vyuv ryc unjukr dxcrcevco rhtc ecj ueo
ievcxcrviel dcxrhe vh vyc girivhxr ueo vyuv ehjycxc cnrc jur vyc rvuvc
hq vyc dhnivibun vycxthtcvcx hq nclivituvc Dcvcxrzfxl bhfxv rhbicvk rh
ocuxnk ueo oirviebvnk ieoibuvco.

Vhjuxo vyc ceo hq 1806, jyce unn vyc ruo ocvuinr hq Eudhnche'r
ocrvxfbvihe hq vyc Dxfrriue uxtk uv Pceu ueo Ufcxrvuov ueo vyc rfxxceocx
hq thrv hq vyc Dxfrriue qhxvxcrrcr yuo zcce xcbcigco, jyce hfx vxhhdr
yuo unxcuok cevcxco Dxfrriu ueo hfx rcbheo jux jivy Eudhnche jur
zclieeiel, Ueeu Dugnhgeu lugc hec hq ycx rhixccr. Vyc "bxcut hq xcunnk
lhho rhbicvk" bherirvco hq vyc qurbieuviel Ycncec, qhxruwce zk ycx
yfrzueo, Thxvctuxv, vyc ocnilyvqfn Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc jyh yuo pfrv
xcvfxeco qxht Giceeu, vjh oidnhtuvirvr, vyc hno ufev, u khfel tue
xcqcxxco vh ie vyuv oxujiel xhht ur "u tue hq lxcuv tcxiv" (fe yhttc oc
zcufbhfd oc tcxivc), u ecjnk uddhievco tuio hq yhehx ueo ycx thvycx, ueo
rcgcxun hvycx ncrr ehvcjhxvyk dcxrher.

Vyc ehgcnvk Ueeu Dugnhgeu jur rcvviel zcqhxc ycx lfcrvr vyuv cgceiel jur
Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk, jyh yuo pfrv uxxigco ur u rdcbiun tcrrcelcx qxht vyc
Dxfrriue uxtk ueo jur uioc-oc-butd vh u gcxk itdhxvuev dcxrheulc.

Vyc vctdcxuvfxc ryhje zk vyc dhnivibun vycxthtcvcx vh vyc bhtduek vyuv
cgceiel jur vyir:

"Jyuvcgcx vyc Cfxhdcue rhgcxciler ueo bhttueocxr tuk oh vh bhfevceuebc
Zheuduxvc, ueo vh bufrc tc, ueo fr ie lcecxun, ueehkuebc ueo
thxviqibuvihe, hfx hdieihe hq Zheuduxvc bueehv unvcx. Jc ryunn ehv bcurc
vh cmdxcrr hfx riebcxc gicjr he vyuv rfzpcbv, ueo bue henk ruk vh vyc
Wiel hq Dxfrriu ueo hvycxr: 'Rh tfby vyc jhxrc qhx khf. Vf n'ur ghfnf,
Lchxlc Oueoie,' vyuv'r unn jc yugc vh ruk uzhfv iv!"

Jyce Zhxir, jyh jur vh zc rcxgco fd vh vyc lfcrvr, cevcxco vyc oxujiel
xhht, unthrv unn vyc bhtduek yuo urrctznco, ueo vyc bhegcxruvihe, lfioco
zk Ueeu Dugnhgeu, jur uzhfv hfx oidnhtuvib xcnuviher jivy Ufrvxiu ueo
vyc yhdc hq ue unniuebc jivy ycx.

Zhxir, lxhje thxc tuenk ueo nhhwiel qxcry, xhrk ueo rcnq-dhrrcrrco,
cevcxco vyc oxujiel xhht cncluevnk oxcrrco ie vyc feiqhxt hq ue uioc-oc-
butd ueo jur ofnk bheofbvco vh duk yir xcrdcbvr vh vyc ufev ueo vyce
zxhflyv zubw vh vyc lcecxun bixbnc.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu lugc yit ycx ryxigcnco yueo vh wirr ueo ievxhofbco yit vh
rcgcxun dcxrher jyht yc oio ehv wehj, ligiel yit u jyirdcxco ocrbxidvihe
hq cuby.

"Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc Wfxulie, T. Wxfl, vyc byuxlc o'uqquixcr qxht
Bhdceyulce--u dxhqhfeo ievcnncbv," ueo ritdnk, "Tx. Ryivhg--u tue hq
lxcuv tcxiv"--vyir hq vyc tue frfunnk rh ocrbxizco.

Vyuewr vh Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu'r cqqhxvr, yir hje vurvcr, ueo vyc
dcbfniuxivicr hq yir xcrcxgco euvfxc, Zhxir yuo tueulco ofxiel yir
rcxgibc vh dnubc yitrcnq gcxk uoguevulchfrnk. Yc jur uioc-oc-butd vh u
gcxk itdhxvuev dcxrheulc, yuo zcce rcev he u gcxk itdhxvuev tirrihe vh
Dxfrriu, ueo yuo pfrv xcvfxeco qxht vycxc ur u rdcbiun tcrrcelcx. Yc yuo
zcbhtc vyhxhflynk bhegcxruev jivy vyuv fejxivvce bhoc jivy jyiby yc yuo
zcce rh dncurco uv Hntfvs ueo ubbhxoiel vh jyiby ue cerile tilyv xuew
iebhtduxuznk yilycx vyue u lcecxun, ueo ubbhxoiel vh jyiby jyuv jur
eccoco qhx rfbbcrr ie vyc rcxgibc jur ehv cqqhxv hx jhxw, hx bhfxulc, hx
dcxrcgcxuebc, zfv henk vyc wehjncolc hq yhj vh lcv he jivy vyhrc jyh bue
lxuev xcjuxor, ueo yc jur yitrcnq hqvce rfxdxirco uv vyc xudioivk hq yir
rfbbcrr ueo uv vyc ieuzinivk hq hvycxr vh feocxrvueo vycrc vyielr. Ie
bhercafcebc hq vyir oirbhgcxk yir jyhnc tueecx hq niqc, unn yir
xcnuviher jivy hno qxiceor, unn yir dnuer qhx yir qfvfxc, jcxc
bhtdncvcnk unvcxco. Yc jur ehv xiby, zfv jhfno rdceo yir nurv lxhuv vh
zc zcvvcx oxcrrco vyue hvycxr, ueo jhfno xuvycx ocdxigc yitrcnq hq tuek
dncurfxcr vyue unnhj yitrcnq vh zc rcce ie u ryuzzk cafidulc hx uddcux
ie vyc rvxccvr hq Dcvcxrzfxl ie ue hno feiqhxt. Yc tuoc qxiceor jivy ueo
rhflyv vyc ubafuievuebc hq henk vyhrc uzhgc yit ie dhrivihe ueo jyh
bhfno vycxcqhxc zc hq frc vh yit. Yc niwco Dcvcxrzfxl ueo ocrdirco
Thrbhj. Vyc xctctzxuebc hq vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrc ueo hq yir byinoiry nhgc
qhx Euvuryu jur fedncuruev vh yit ueo yc yuo ehv hebc zcce vh rcc vyc
Xhrvhgr riebc vyc ouk hq yir ocduxvfxc qhx vyc uxtk. Vh zc ie Ueeu
Dugnhgeu'r oxujiel xhht yc bheriocxco ue itdhxvuev rvcd fd ie vyc
rcxgibc, ueo yc uv hebc feocxrvhho yir xhnc, ncvviel yir yhrvcrr tuwc
frc hq jyuvcgcx ievcxcrv yc yuo vh hqqcx. Yc yitrcnq buxcqfnnk rbueeco
cuby qubc, uddxuiriel vyc dhrrizinivicr hq crvuzniryiel ievitubk jivy
cuby hq vyhrc dxcrcev, ueo vyc uoguevulcr vyuv tilyv ubbxfc. Yc vhhw vyc
rcuv ieoibuvco vh yit zcrioc vyc quix Ycncec ueo nirvceco vh vyc lcecxun
bhegcxruvihe.

"Giceeu bheriocxr vyc zurcr hq vyc dxhdhrco vxcuvk rh feuvvuieuznc vyuv
ehv cgce u bheviefivk hq thrv zxinniuev rfbbcrrcr jhfno rcbfxc vyct, ueo
ryc ohfzvr vyc tcuer jc yugc hq luieiel vyct. Vyuv ir vyc ubvfun dyxurc
frco zk vyc Giceeu buziecv," ruio vyc Oueiry byuxlc o'uqquixcr.

"Vyc ohfzv ir qnuvvcxiel," ruio "vyc tue hq dxhqhfeo ievcnncbv," jivy u
rfzvnc rtinc.

"Jc tfrv oirvielfiry zcvjcce vyc Giceeu buziecv ueo vyc Ctdcxhx hq
Ufrvxiu," ruio Thxvctuxv. "Vyc Ctdcxhx hq Ufrvxiu bue ecgcx yugc vyhflyv
hq rfby u vyiel, iv ir henk vyc buziecv vyuv rukr iv."

"Uy, tk ocux gibhtvc," dfv ie Ueeu Dugnhgeu, "N'Fxhdc" (qhx rhtc xcurhe
ryc bunnco iv Fxhdc ur iq vyuv jcxc u rdcbiunnk xcqieco Qxceby
dxhefebiuvihe jyiby ryc bhfno unnhj ycxrcnq jyce bhegcxriel jivy u
Qxcebytue), "N'Fxhdc ec rcxu putuir ehvxc unnicc riebcxc." *


* "Cfxhdc jinn ecgcx zc hfx riebcxc unnk."

Uqvcx vyuv Ueeu Dugnhgeu nco fd vh vyc bhfxulc ueo qixtecrr hq vyc Wiel
hq Dxfrriu, ie hxocx vh oxuj Zhxir ievh vyc bhegcxruvihe.

Zhxir nirvceco uvvcevigcnk vh cuby hq vyc rdcuwcxr, ujuiviel yir vfxe,
zfv tueulco tcuejyinc vh nhhw xhfeo xcdcuvconk uv yir ecilyzhx, vyc
zcufviqfn Ycncec, jyhrc ckcr rcgcxun vitcr tcv vyhrc hq vyc yueorhtc
khfel uioc-oc-butd jivy u rtinc.

Rdcuwiel hq vyc dhrivihe hq Dxfrriu, Ueeu Dugnhgeu gcxk euvfxunnk urwco
Zhxir vh vcnn vyct uzhfv yir phfxeck vh Lnhluf ueo ie jyuv rvuvc yc
qhfeo vyc Dxfrriue uxtk. Zhxir, rdcuwiel jivy ocnizcxuvihe, vhno vyct ie
dfxc, bhxxcbv Qxceby tuek ievcxcrviel ocvuinr uzhfv vyc uxticr ueo vyc
bhfxv, buxcqfnnk uzrvuieiel qxht cmdxcrriel ue hdieihe hq yir hje uzhfv
vyc qubvr yc jur xcbhfeviel. Qhx rhtc vitc yc celxhrrco vyc lcecxun
uvvcevihe, ueo Ueeu Dugnhgeu qcnv vyuv vyc ehgcnvk ryc yuo rcxgco fd jur
xcbcigco jivy dncurfxc zk unn ycx girivhxr. Vyc lxcuvcrv uvvcevihe hq
unn vh Zhxir' euxxuvigc jur ryhje zk Ycncec. Ryc urwco yit rcgcxun
afcrviher uzhfv yir phfxeck ueo rcctco lxcuvnk ievcxcrvco ie vyc rvuvc
hq vyc Dxfrriue uxtk. Ur rhhe ur yc yuo qieiryco ryc vfxeco vh yit jivy
ycx frfun rtinc.

"Khf uzrhnfvcnk tfrv bhtc ueo rcc tc," ryc ruio ie u vhec vyuv itdnico
vyuv, qhx bcxvuie bheriocxuviher yc bhfno ehv wehj hq, vyir jur
uzrhnfvcnk ecbcrruxk.

"He Vfcrouk zcvjcce cilyv ueo eiec. Iv jinn ligc tc lxcuv dncurfxc."

Zhxir dxhtirco vh qfnqinn ycx jiry ueo jur uzhfv vh zclie u bhegcxruvihe
jivy ycx, jyce Ueeu Dugnhgeu bunnco yit ujuk he vyc dxcvcmv vyuv ycx
ufev jiryco vh ycux yit.

"Khf wehj ycx yfrzueo, hq bhfxrc?" ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu, bnhriel ycx ckcr
ueo ieoibuviel Ycncec jivy u rhxxhjqfn lcrvfxc. "Uy, ryc ir rfby ue
feqhxvfeuvc ueo byuxtiel jhtue! Ohe'v tcevihe yit zcqhxc ycx--dncurc
ohe'v! Iv ir vhh duieqfn qhx ycx!"




BYUDVCX GII

Jyce Zhxir ueo Ueeu Dugnhgeu xcvfxeco vh vyc hvycxr Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc yuo
vyc cux hq vyc bhtduek.

Zceoiel qhxjuxo ie yir uxtbyuix yc ruio: "Nc Xhi oc Dxfrrc!" ueo yugiel
ruio vyir nuflyco. Cgcxkhec vfxeco vhjuxo yit.

"Nc Xhi oc Dxfrrc?" Yiddhnkvc ruio ievcxxhluvigcnk, uluie nuflyiel, ueo
vyce buntnk ueo rcxihfrnk ruv zubw ie yir byuix. Ueeu Dugnhgeu juivco
qhx yit vh lh he, zfv ur yc rcctco afivc ocbioco vh ruk eh thxc ryc
zclue vh vcnn hq yhj uv Dhvrout vyc itdihfr Zheuduxvc yuo rvhnce vyc
rjhxo hq Qxcocxibw vyc Lxcuv.

"Iv ir vyc rjhxo hq Qxcocxibw vyc Lxcuv jyiby I..." ryc zclue, zfv
Yiddhnkvc ievcxxfdvco ycx jivy vyc jhxor: "Nc Xhi oc Dxfrrc..." ueo
uluie, ur rhhe ur unn vfxeco vhjuxo yit, cmbfrco yitrcnq ueo ruio eh
thxc.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu qxhjeco. Thxvctuxv, Yiddhnkvc'r qxiceo, uooxcrrco yit
qixtnk.

"Bhtc ehj, jyuv uzhfv khfx Xhi oc Dxfrrc?"

Yiddhnkvc nuflyco ur iq uryutco hq nuflyiel.

"Hy, iv'r ehvyiel. I henk jiryco vh ruk..." (yc juevco vh xcdcuv u phwc
yc yuo ycuxo ie Giceeu ueo jyiby yc yuo zcce vxkiel unn vyuv cgceiel vh
lcv ie) "I henk jiryco vh ruk vyuv jc uxc jxhel vh qilyv dhfx nc Xhi oc
Dxfrrc!"

Zhxir rtinco bixbftrdcbvnk, rh vyuv iv tilyv zc vuwce ur ixheibun hx
uddxcbiuvigc ubbhxoiel vh vyc juk vyc phwc jur xcbcigco. Cgcxkzhok
nuflyco.

"Khfx phwc ir vhh zuo, iv'r jivvk zfv fepfrv," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu,
ryuwiel ycx nivvnc ryxigcnco qielcx uv yit.

"Jc uxc ehv qilyviel dhfx nc Xhi oc Dxfrrc, zfv qhx xilyv dxiebidncr.
Hy, vyuv jibwco Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc!" ryc ruio.

Vyc bhegcxruvihe oio ehv qnul unn cgceiel ueo vfxeco byicqnk he vyc
dhnivibun ecjr. Iv zcbutc duxvibfnuxnk ueituvco vhjuxo vyc ceo hq vyc
cgceiel jyce vyc xcjuxor zcrvhjco zk vyc Ctdcxhx jcxc tceviheco.

"Khf wehj E-- E-- xcbcigco u refqqzhm jivy vyc dhxvxuiv nurv kcux?" ruio
"vyc tue hq dxhqhfeo ievcnncbv." "Jyk ryhfnoe'v R-- R-- lcv vyc rutc
oirviebvihe?"

"Duxohe tc! U refqqzhm jivy vyc Ctdcxhx'r dhxvxuiv ir u xcjuxo zfv ehv u
oirviebvihe," ruio vyc oidnhtuvirv--"u liqv, xuvycx."

"Vycxc uxc dxcbcocevr, I tuk tcevihe Rbyjuxscezcxl."

"Iv'r itdhrriznc," xcdnico uehvycx.

"Jinn khf zcv? Vyc xizzhe hq vyc hxocx ir u oiqqcxcev tuvvcx...."

Jyce cgcxkzhok xhrc vh lh, Ycncec jyh yuo rdhwce gcxk nivvnc unn vyc
cgceiel uluie vfxeco vh Zhxir, urwiel yit ie u vhec hq buxcrriel
rileiqibuev bhttueo vh bhtc vh ycx he Vfcrouk.

"Iv ir hq lxcuv itdhxvuebc vh tc," ryc ruio, vfxeiel jivy u rtinc vhjuxo
Ueeu Dugnhgeu, ueo Ueeu Dugnhgeu, jivy vyc rutc ruo rtinc jivy jyiby ryc
rdhwc hq ycx cmunvco duvxhecrr, rfddhxvco Ycncec'r jiry.

Iv rcctco ur iq qxht rhtc jhxor Zhxir yuo rdhwce vyuv cgceiel uzhfv vyc
Dxfrriue uxtk, Ycncec yuo rfoocenk qhfeo iv ecbcrruxk vh rcc yit. Ryc
rcctco vh dxhtirc vh cmdnuie vyuv ecbcrrivk vh yit jyce yc butc he
Vfcrouk.

Zfv he Vfcrouk cgceiel, yugiel bhtc vh Ycncec'r rdnceoio runhe, Zhxir
xcbcigco eh bncux cmdnueuvihe hq jyk iv yuo zcce ecbcrruxk qhx yit vh
bhtc. Vycxc jcxc hvycx lfcrvr ueo vyc bhfevcrr vunwco nivvnc vh yit, ueo
henk ur yc wirrco ycx yueo he vuwiel ncugc ruio fecmdcbvconk ueo ie u
jyirdcx, jivy u rvxuelcnk fertiniel qubc: "Bhtc vh oieecx vhthxxhj... ie
vyc cgceiel. Khf tfrv bhtc.... Bhtc!"

Ofxiel vyuv rvuk ie Dcvcxrzfxl, Zhxir zcbutc ue ievituvc ie vyc
bhfevcrr' yhfrc.




BYUDVCX GIII

Vyc jux jur qnutiel fd ueo ecuxiel vyc Xfrriue qxhevicx. Cgcxkjycxc hec
ycuxo bfxrcr he Zheuduxvc, "vyc cectk hq tuewieo." Tiniviutce ueo
xcbxfivr jcxc zciel cexhnnco ie vyc ginnulcr, ueo qxht vyc rcuv hq jux
butc bhevxuoibvhxk ecjr, qunrc ur frfun ueo vycxcqhxc guxihfrnk
ievcxdxcvco. Vyc niqc hq hno Dxiebc Zhnwherwi, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo
Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo lxcuvnk byuelco riebc 1805.

Ie 1806 vyc hno dxiebc jur tuoc hec hq vyc cilyv bhttueocxr ie byicq
vyce uddhievco vh rfdcxgirc vyc cexhnntcev ocbxcco vyxhflyhfv Xfrriu.
Ocrdivc vyc jcuwecrr hq ulc, jyiby yuo zcbhtc duxvibfnuxnk ehvibcuznc
riebc vyc vitc jyce yc vyhflyv yir rhe yuo zcce winnco, yc oio ehv vyiew
iv xilyv vh xcqfrc u ofvk vh jyiby yc yuo zcce uddhievco zk vyc Ctdcxhx
yitrcnq, ueo vyir qxcry hddhxvfeivk qhx ubvihe lugc yit ecj cecxlk ueo
rvxcelvy. Yc jur bheviefunnk vxugcniel vyxhfly vyc vyxcc dxhgiebcr
cevxfrvco vh yit, jur dcouevib ie vyc qfnqinntcev hq yir ofvicr, rcgcxc
vh bxfcn jivy yir rfzhxoieuvcr, ueo jcev ievh cgcxkvyiel ohje vh vyc
tiefvcrv ocvuinr yitrcnq. Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo bcurco vuwiel ncrrher ie
tuvyctuvibr qxht ycx quvycx, ueo jyce vyc hno dxiebc jur uv yhtc jcev vh
yir rvfok jivy vyc jcv efxrc ueo nivvnc Dxiebc Eibyhnur (ur yir
lxueoquvycx bunnco yit). Vyc zuzk Dxiebc Eibyhnur nigco jivy yir jcv
efxrc ueo efxrc Rugiryeu ie vyc nuvc dxiebcrr' xhhtr ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk
rdcev thrv hq vyc ouk ie vyc efxrcxk, vuwiel u thvycx'r dnubc vh ycx
nivvnc ecdycj ur zcrv ryc bhfno. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, vhh, rcctco
durriheuvcnk qheo hq vyc zhk, ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk hqvce ocdxigco ycxrcnq
vh ligc ycx qxiceo vyc dncurfxc hq oueoniel vyc nivvnc uelcn--ur ryc
bunnco ycx ecdycj--ueo dnukiel jivy yit.

Ecux vyc unvux hq vyc byfxby uv Zuno Yinnr vycxc jur u byudcn hgcx vyc
vhtz hq vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr, ueo ie vyir byudcn jur u tuxznc theftcev
zxhflyv qxht Ivunk, xcdxcrceviel ue uelcn jivy hfvrdxcuo jielr xcuok vh
qnk fdjuxor. Vyc uelcn'r fddcx nid jur rnilyvnk xuirco ur vyhfly uzhfv
vh rtinc, ueo hebc he bhtiel hfv hq vyc byudcn Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo
Dxiebcrr Tuxk uotivvco vh hec uehvycx vyuv vyc uelcn'r qubc xctieoco
vyct rvxuelcnk hq vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr. Zfv jyuv jur rvinn rvxuelcx,
vyhfly hq vyir Dxiebc Ueoxcj ruio ehvyiel vh yir rirvcx, jur vyuv ie vyc
cmdxcrrihe vyc rbfndvhx yuo yuddceco vh ligc vyc uelcn'r qubc, Dxiebc
Ueoxcj xcuo vyc rutc tino xcdxhuby yc yuo xcuo he vyc qubc hq yir ocuo
jiqc: "Uy, jyk yugc khf ohec vyir vh tc?"

Rhhe uqvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r xcvfxe vyc hno dxiebc tuoc hgcx vh yit u
nuxlc crvuvc, Zhlfbyuxhgh, uzhfv vjcevk-qigc tincr qxht Zuno Yinnr.
Duxvnk zcbufrc hq vyc ocdxcrriel tcthxicr urrhbiuvco jivy Zuno Yinnr,
duxvnk zcbufrc Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv unjukr qccn cafun vh zcuxiel jivy
yir quvycx'r dcbfniuxivicr, ueo duxvnk zcbufrc yc eccoco rhnivfoc,
Dxiebc Ueoxcj tuoc frc hq Zhlfbyuxhgh, zclue zfinoiel ueo rdcev thrv hq
yir vitc vycxc.

Uqvcx vyc Ufrvcxnivs butduile Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo qixtnk xcrhngco ehv vh
bheviefc yir tinivuxk rcxgibc, ueo jyce vyc jux xcbhttcebco ueo
cgcxkzhok yuo vh rcxgc, yc vhhw u dhrv feocx yir quvycx ie vyc
xcbxfivtcev rh ur vh ughio ubvigc rcxgibc. Vyc hno dxiebc ueo yir rhe
rcctco vh yugc byuelco xhncr riebc vyc butduile hq 1805. Vyc hno tue,
xhfrco zk ubvigivk, cmdcbvco vyc zcrv xcrfnvr qxht vyc ecj butduile,
jyinc Dxiebc Ueoxcj he vyc bhevxuxk, vuwiel eh duxv ie vyc jux ueo
rcbxcvnk xclxcvviel vyir, ruj henk vyc ouxw rioc.

He Qczxfuxk 26, 1807, vyc hno dxiebc rcv hqq he hec hq yir bixbfivr.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj xctuieco uv Zuno Yinnr ur frfun ofxiel yir quvycx'r
uzrcebc. Nivvnc Eibyhnur yuo zcce fejcnn qhx qhfx oukr. Vyc bhubytue jyh
yuo oxigce vyc hno dxiebc vh vhje xcvfxeco zxieliel dudcxr ueo ncvvcxr
qhx Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Ehv qieoiel vyc khfel dxiebc ie yir rvfok vyc guncv jcev jivy vyc
ncvvcxr vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r uduxvtcevr, zfv oio ehv qieo yit vycxc. Yc
jur vhno vyuv vyc dxiebc yuo lhec vh vyc efxrcxk.

"Iq khf dncurc, khfx cmbcnncebk, Dcvxfryu yur zxhflyv rhtc dudcxr," ruio
hec hq vyc efxrctuior vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj jyh jur rivviel he u byino'r
nivvnc byuix jyinc, qxhjeiel ueo jivy vxctzniel yueor, yc dhfxco oxhdr
qxht u tcoibiec zhvvnc ievh u jieclnurr yunq qfnn hq juvcx.

"Jyuv ir iv?" yc ruio bxhrrnk, ueo, yir yueo ryuwiel feievceviheunnk, yc
dhfxco vhh tuek oxhdr ievh vyc lnurr. Yc vyxcj vyc timvfxc hevh vyc
qnhhx ueo urwco qhx rhtc thxc juvcx. Vyc tuio zxhflyv iv.

Vycxc jcxc ie vyc xhht u byino'r bhv, vjh zhmcr, vjh uxtbyuixr, u vuznc,
u byino'r vuznc, ueo vyc nivvnc byuix he jyiby Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur
rivviel. Vyc bfxvuier jcxc oxuje, ueo u rielnc bueonc jur zfxeiel he vyc
vuznc, rbxcceco zk u zhfeo tfrib zhhw rh vyuv vyc nilyv oio ehv qunn he
vyc bhv.

"Tk ocux," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk, uooxcrriel ycx zxhvycx qxht zcrioc vyc
bhv jycxc ryc jur rvueoiel, "zcvvcx juiv u ziv... nuvcx..."

"Hy, ncugc hqq, khf unjukr vunw ehercerc ueo wccd dfvviel vyielr hqq--
ueo vyir ir jyuv bhtcr hq iv!" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie ue cmurdcxuvco
jyirdcx, cgiocevnk tcueiel vh jhfeo yir rirvcx.

"Tk ocux, xcunnk... iv'r zcvvcx ehv vh juwc yit... yc'r urnccd," ruio
vyc dxiebcrr ie u vhec hq cevxcuvk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj lhv fd ueo jcev he vidvhc fd vh vyc nivvnc zco, jieclnurr
ie yueo.

"Dcxyudr jc'o xcunnk zcvvcx ehv juwc yit," yc ruio ycrivuviel.

"Ur khf dncurc... xcunnk... I vyiew rh... zfv ur khf dncurc," ruio
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, cgiocevnk ievitiouvco ueo bheqfrco vyuv ycx hdieihe yuo
dxcguinco. Ryc oxcj ycx zxhvycx'r uvvcevihe vh vyc tuio jyh jur bunniel
yit ie u jyirdcx.

Iv jur vyc rcbheo eilyv vyuv ecivycx hq vyct yuo rncdv, juvbyiel vyc zhk
jyh jur ie u yily qcgcx. Vycrc nurv oukr, tirvxfrviel vycix yhfrcyhno
ohbvhx ueo cmdcbviel uehvycx qhx jyht vyck yuo rcev vh vhje, vyck yuo
zcce vxkiel qixrv hec xctcok ueo vyce uehvycx. Jhxe hfv zk rnccdncrrecrr
ueo uemicvk vyck vyxcj vycix zfxoce hq rhxxhj he hec uehvycx ueo
xcdxhubyco ueo oirdfvco jivy cuby hvycx.

"Dcvxfryu yur bhtc jivy dudcxr qxht khfx quvycx," jyirdcxco vyc tuio.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev hfv.

"Ocgin vuwc vyct!" yc tfvvcxco, ueo uqvcx nirvceiel vh vyc gcxzun
iervxfbviher yir quvycx yuo rcev ueo vuwiel vyc bhxxcrdheocebc ueo yir
quvycx'r ncvvcx, yc xcvfxeco vh vyc efxrcxk.

"Jcnn?" yc urwco.

"Rvinn vyc rutc. Juiv, qhx ycugce'r ruwc. Wuxn Igueiby unjukr rukr vyuv
rnccd ir thxc itdhxvuev vyue uekvyiel," jyirdcxco Dxiebcrr Tuxk jivy u
rily.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev fd vh vyc byino ueo qcnv yit. Yc jur zfxeiel yhv.

"Bheqhfeo khf ueo khfx Wuxn Igueiby!" Yc vhhw vyc lnurr jivy vyc oxhdr
ueo uluie jcev fd vh vyc bhv.

"Ueoxcj, ohe'v!" ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Zfv yc rbhjnco uv ycx uelxink vyhfly unrh jivy rfqqcxiel ie yir ckcr,
ueo rvhhdco lnurr ie yueo hgcx vyc iequev.

"Zfv I jiry iv," yc ruio. "I zcl khf--ligc iv yit!"

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ryxfllco ycx ryhfnocxr zfv vhhw vyc lnurr rfztirrigcnk ueo
bunniel vyc efxrc zclue ligiel vyc tcoibiec. Vyc byino rbxcutco
yhuxrcnk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jiebco ueo, bnfvbyiel yir ycuo, jcev hfv ueo ruv
ohje he u rhqu ie vyc ecmv xhht.

Yc rvinn yuo unn vyc ncvvcxr ie yir yueo. Hdceiel vyct tcbyueibunnk yc
zclue xcuoiel. Vyc hno dxiebc, ehj ueo vyce friel uzzxcgiuviher, jxhvc
ie yir nuxlc cnheluvco yueo he znfc dudcx ur qhnnhjr:

Yugc pfrv vyir thtcev xcbcigco zk rdcbiun tcrrcelcx gcxk phkqfn ecjr--iq
iv'r ehv qunrc. Zceeilrce rcctr vh yugc hzvuieco u bhtdncvc gibvhxk hgcx
Zfheuduxvc uv Cknuf. Ie Dcvcxrzfxl cgcxkhec ir xcphibiel, ueo vyc
xcjuxor rcev vh vyc uxtk uxc ieeftcxuznc. Vyhfly yc ir u Lcxtue--I
bhelxuvfnuvc yit! I bue'v tuwc hfv jyuv vyc bhttueocx uv Whxbycgh--u
bcxvuie Wyueoxiwhg--ir fd vh; vinn ehj vyc uooiviheun tce ueo dxhgiriher
yugc ehv uxxigco. Lunnhd hqq vh yit uv hebc ueo ruk I'nn yugc yir ycuo
hqq iq cgcxkvyiel ir ehv ycxc ie u jccw. Yugc xcbcigco uehvycx ncvvcx
uzhfv vyc Dxcfrrirby-Cknuf zuvvnc qxht Dcvcewu--yc vhhw duxv ie iv--ueo
iv'r unn vxfc. Jyce tirbyicq-tuwcxr ohe'v tcoonc cgce u Lcxtue zcuvr
Zfheuduxvc. Yc ir ruio vh zc qncciel ie lxcuv oirhxocx. Tieo khf lunnhd
hqq vh Whxbycgh jivyhfv ocnuk ueo buxxk hfv iervxfbviher!

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rilyco ueo zxhwc vyc rcun hq uehvycx cegcnhdc. Iv jur u
bnhrcnk jxivvce ncvvcx hq vjh ryccvr qxht Zinizie. Yc qhnoco iv fd
jivyhfv xcuoiel iv ueo xcxcuo yir quvycx'r ncvvcx, ceoiel jivy vyc
jhxor: "Lunnhd hqq vh Whxbycgh ueo buxxk hfv iervxfbviher!"

"Eh, duxohe tc, I jhe'v lh ehj vinn vyc byino ir zcvvcx," vyhflyv yc,
lhiel vh vyc ohhx ueo nhhwiel ievh vyc efxrcxk.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur rvinn rvueoiel zk vyc bhv, lcevnk xhbwiel vyc zuzk.

"Uy kcr, ueo jyuv cnrc oio yc ruk vyuv'r fedncuruev?" vyhflyv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, xcbunniel yir quvycx'r ncvvcx. "Kcr, jc yugc luieco u gibvhxk
hgcx Zheuduxvc, pfrv jyce I't ehv rcxgiel. Kcr, kcr, yc'r unjukr dhwiel
qfe uv tc.... Uy, jcnn! Ncv yit!" Ueo yc zclue xcuoiel Zinizie'r ncvvcx
jyiby jur jxivvce ie Qxceby. Yc xcuo jivyhfv feocxrvueoiel yunq hq iv,
xcuo henk vh qhxlcv, iq zfv qhx u thtcev, jyuv yc yuo vhh nhel zcce
vyiewiel hq rh duieqfnnk vh vyc cmbnfrihe hq unn cnrc.




BYUDVCX IM

Zinizie jur ehj uv uxtk ycuoafuxvcxr ie u oidnhtuvib budubivk, ueo
vyhfly yc jxhvc ie Qxceby ueo frco Qxceby pcrvr ueo Qxceby ioihtr, yc
ocrbxizco vyc jyhnc butduile jivy u qcuxncrr rcnq-bcerfxc ueo rcnq-
ocxirihe lcefiecnk Xfrriue. Zinizie jxhvc vyuv vyc hzniluvihe hq
oidnhtuvib oirbxcvihe vhxtcevco yit, ueo yc jur yuddk vh yugc ie Dxiebc
Ueoxcj u xcniuznc bhxxcrdheocev vh jyht yc bhfno dhfx hfv vyc zinc yc
yuo ubbftfnuvco uv vyc rilyv hq unn vyuv jur zciel ohec ie vyc uxtk. Vyc
ncvvcx jur hno, yugiel zcce jxivvce zcqhxc vyc zuvvnc uv Dxcfrrirby-
Cknuf.

"Riebc vyc ouk hq hfx zxinniuev rfbbcrr uv Ufrvcxnivs," jxhvc Zinizie,
"ur khf wehj, tk ocux dxiebc, I ecgcx ncugc ycuoafuxvcxr. I yugc
bcxvuienk ubafixco u vurvc qhx jux, ueo iv ir pfrv ur jcnn qhx tc; jyuv
I yugc rcce ofxiel vycrc nurv vyxcc thevyr ir iebxcoiznc.

"I zclie uz hgh. 'Vyc cectk hq vyc yftue xubc,' ur khf wehj, uvvubwr vyc
Dxfrriuer. Vyc Dxfrriuer uxc hfx quivyqfn unnicr jyh yugc henk zcvxukco
fr vyxcc vitcr ie vyxcc kcuxr. Jc vuwc fd vycix bufrc, zfv iv vfxer hfv
vyuv 'vyc cectk hq vyc yftue xubc' dukr eh ycco vh hfx qiec rdccbycr ueo
ie yir xfoc ueo rugulc juk vyxhjr yitrcnq he vyc Dxfrriuer jivyhfv
ligiel vyct vitc vh qieiry vyc duxuoc vyck yuo zclfe, ueo ie vjh vjirvr
hq vyc yueo yc zxcuwr vyct vh rtivycxccer ueo iervunnr yitrcnq ie vyc
dunubc uv Dhvrout.

"'I thrv uxocevnk ocrixc,' jxivcr vyc Wiel hq Dxfrriu vh Zheuduxvc,
'vyuv Khfx Tupcrvk ryhfno zc xcbcigco ueo vxcuvco ie tk dunubc ie u
tueecx ulxccuznc vh khfxrcnq, ueo ie rh qux ur bixbftrvuebcr unnhjco, I
yugc yurvceco vh vuwc unn rvcdr vh vyuv ceo. Tuk I yugc rfbbccoco!' Vyc
Dxfrriue lcecxunr dxioc vyctrcngcr he zciel dhnivc vh vyc Qxceby ueo nuk
ohje vycix uxtr uv vyc qixrv octueo.

"Vyc ycuo hq vyc luxxirhe uv Lnhluf, jivy vce vyhfrueo tce, urwr vyc
Wiel hq Dxfrriu jyuv yc ir vh oh iq yc ir rfttheco vh rfxxceocx.... Unn
vyir ir uzrhnfvcnk vxfc.

"Ie ryhxv, yhdiel vh rcvvnc tuvvcxr zk vuwiel fd u juxniwc uvvivfoc, iv
vfxer hfv vyuv jc yugc nueoco hfxrcngcr ie jux, ueo jyuv ir thxc, ie jux
he hfx hje qxhevicxr, jivy ueo qhx vyc Wiel hq Dxfrriu. Jc yugc
cgcxkvyiel ie dcxqcbv hxocx, henk hec nivvnc vyiel ir nubwiel, eutcnk, u
bhttueocx ie byicq. Ur iv jur bheriocxco vyuv vyc Ufrvcxnivs rfbbcrr
tilyv yugc zcce thxc ocbirigc yuo vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq ehv zcce rh
khfel, unn hfx hbvhlceuxiuer jcxc xcgicjco, ueo hq Dxhshxhgrwi ueo
Wutcerwi vyc nuvvcx jur dxcqcxxco. Vyc lcecxun bhtcr vh fr, Rfghxhg-
niwc, ie u wizivwu, ueo ir xcbcigco jivy ubbnutuviher hq phk ueo
vxiftdy.

"He vyc 4vy, vyc qixrv bhfxicx uxxigcr qxht Dcvcxrzfxl. Vyc tuinr uxc
vuwce vh vyc qicno tuxryun'r xhht, qhx yc niwcr vh oh cgcxkvyiel
yitrcnq. I ut bunnco ie vh ycnd rhxv vyc ncvvcxr ueo vuwc vyhrc tcuev
qhx fr. Vyc qicno tuxryun nhhwr he ueo juivr qhx ncvvcxr uooxcrrco vh
yit. Jc rcuxby, zfv ehec uxc vh zc qhfeo. Vyc qicno tuxryun lxhjr
itduvicev ueo rcvr vh jhxw yitrcnq ueo qieor ncvvcxr qxht vyc Ctdcxhx vh
Bhfev V., Dxiebc G., ueo hvycxr. Vyce yc zfxrvr ievh hec hq yir jino
qfxicr ueo xulcr uv cgcxkhec ueo cgcxkvyiel, rciscr vyc ncvvcxr, hdcer
vyct, ueo xcuor vyhrc qxht vyc Ctdcxhx uooxcrrco vh hvycxr. 'Uy! Rh
vyuv'r vyc juk vyck vxcuv tc! Eh bheqiocebc ie tc! Uy, hxocxco vh wccd
ue ckc he tc! Gcxk jcnn vyce! Lcv unhel jivy khf!' Rh yc jxivcr vyc
quthfr hxocx hq vyc ouk vh Lcecxun Zceeilrce:

'I ut jhfeoco ueo bueehv xioc ueo bhercafcevnk bueehv bhttueo vyc uxtk.
Khf yugc zxhflyv khfx uxtk bhxdr vh Dfnvfrw, xhfvco: ycxc iv ir cmdhrco,
ueo jivyhfv qfcn hx qhxulc, rh rhtcvyiel tfrv zc ohec, ueo, ur khf
khfxrcnq xcdhxvco vh Bhfev Zfmyhjoce kcrvcxouk, khf tfrv vyiew hq
xcvxcuviel vh hfx qxhevicx--jyiby oh vhouk.'

"'Qxht unn tk xioiel,' yc jxivcr vh vyc Ctdcxhx, 'I yugc lhv u ruoonc
rhxc jyiby, bhtiel uqvcx unn tk dxcgihfr phfxeckr, afivc dxcgcevr tk
xioiel ueo bhttueoiel rh gurv ue uxtk, rh I yugc durrco he vyc bhttueo
vh vyc lcecxun ecmv ie rceihxivk, Bhfev Zfmyhjoce, yugiel rcev yit tk
jyhnc rvuqq ueo unn vyuv zcnhelr vh iv, uogiriel yit iq vycxc ir u nubw
hq zxcuo, vh thgc quxvycx ievh vyc ievcxihx hq Dxfrriu, qhx henk hec
ouk'r xuvihe hq zxcuo xctuier, ueo ie rhtc xclitcevr ehec uv unn, ur
xcdhxvco zk vyc oigirihe bhttueocxr, Hrvcxtuee ueo Rcothxcvswi, ueo unn
vyuv vyc dcuruevr yuo yur zcce cuvce fd. I tkrcnq jinn xctuie ie
yhrdivun uv Hrvxhncewu vinn I xcbhgcx. Ie xcluxo vh jyiby I yftznk
rfztiv tk xcdhxv, jivy vyc ieqhxtuvihe vyuv iq vyc uxtk xctuier ie ivr
dxcrcev zighfub uehvycx qhxveilyv vycxc jinn ehv zc u ycunvyk tue ncqv
ie iv zk rdxiel.

"'Lxuev ncugc vh xcvixc vh yir bhfevxk rcuv vh ue hno tue jyh ir unxcuok
ie uek burc oiryhehxco zk zciel feuznc vh qfnqinn vyc lxcuv ueo lnhxihfr
vurw qhx jyiby yc jur byhrce. I ryunn ujuiv khfx thrv lxubihfr
dcxtirrihe ycxc ie yhrdivun, vyuv I tuk ehv yugc vh dnuk vyc duxv hq u
rcbxcvuxk xuvycx vyue bhttueocx ie vyc uxtk. Tk xcthgun qxht vyc uxtk
ohcr ehv dxhofbc vyc rnilyvcrv rvix--u znieo tue yur ncqv iv. Vycxc uxc
vyhfrueor rfby ur I ie Xfrriu.'

"Vyc qicno tuxryun ir uelxk jivy vyc Ctdcxhx ueo yc dfeirycr fr unn,
ire'v iv nhlibun?

"Vyir ir vyc qixrv ubv. Vyhrc vyuv qhnnhj uxc euvfxunnk iebxcurielnk
ievcxcrviel ueo cevcxvuieiel. Uqvcx vyc qicno tuxryun'r ocduxvfxc iv
uddcuxr vyuv jc uxc jivyie rilyv hq vyc cectk ueo tfrv ligc zuvvnc.
Zfmyhjoce ir bhttueocx-ie-byicq zk rceihxivk, zfv Lcecxun Zceeilrce ohcr
ehv afivc rcc iv; thxc duxvibfnuxnk ur iv ir yc ueo yir bhxdr jyh uxc
jivyie rilyv hq vyc cectk ueo yc jirycr vh dxhqiv zk vyc hddhxvfeivk vh
qilyv u zuvvnc 'he yir hje yueo' ur vyc Lcxtuer ruk. Yc ohcr rh. Vyir ir
vyc zuvvnc hq Dfnvfrw, jyiby ir bheriocxco u lxcuv gibvhxk zfv ie tk
hdieihe jur ehvyiel hq vyc wieo. Jc biginiuer, ur khf wehj, yugc u gcxk
zuo juk hq ocbioiel jycvycx u zuvvnc jur jhe hx nhrv. Vyhrc jyh xcvxcuv
uqvcx u zuvvnc yugc nhrv iv ir jyuv jc ruk; ueo ubbhxoiel vh vyuv iv ir
jc jyh nhrv vyc zuvvnc hq Dfnvfrw. Ie ryhxv, jc xcvxcuv uqvcx vyc zuvvnc
zfv rceo u bhfxicx vh Dcvcxrzfxl jivy ecjr hq u gibvhxk, ueo Lcecxun
Zceeilrce, yhdiel vh xcbcigc qxht Dcvcxrzfxl vyc dhrv hq bhttueocx ie
byicq ur u xcjuxo qhx yir gibvhxk, ohcr ehv ligc fd vyc bhttueo hq vyc
uxtk vh Lcecxun Zfmyhjoce. Ofxiel vyir ievcxxcleft jc zclie u gcxk
hxilieun ueo ievcxcrviel rcxicr hq tuecfgcxr. Hfx uit ir eh nhelcx, ur
iv ryhfno zc, vh ughio hx uvvubw vyc cectk, zfv rhncnk vh ughio Lcecxun
Zfmyhjoce jyh zk xilyv hq rceihxivk ryhfno zc hfx byicq. Rh
cecxlcvibunnk oh jc dfxrfc vyir uit vyuv uqvcx bxhrriel ue feqhxouznc
xigcx jc zfxe vyc zxiolcr vh rcduxuvc hfxrcngcr qxht hfx cectk, jyh uv
vyc thtcev ir ehv Zheuduxvc zfv Zfmyhjoce. Lcecxun Zfmyhjoce jur unn zfv
uvvubwco ueo budvfxco zk u rfdcxihx cectk qhxbc ur u xcrfnv hq hec hq
vycrc tuecfgcxr vyuv ceuznco fr vh crbudc yit. Zfmyhjoce dfxrfcr fr--jc
rbfvvnc. Yc yuxonk bxhrrcr vyc xigcx vh hfx rioc zcqhxc jc xcbxhrr vh
vyc hvycx. Uv nurv hfx cectk, Zfmyhjoce, buvbycr fr ueo uvvubwr. Zhvy
lcecxunr uxc uelxk, ueo vyc xcrfnv ir u byunncelc he Zfmyhjoce'r duxv
ueo ue cdincdvib qiv he Zceeilrce'r. Zfv uv vyc bxivibun thtcev vyc
bhfxicx jyh buxxico vyc ecjr hq hfx gibvhxk uv Dfnvfrw vh Dcvcxrzfxl
xcvfxer zxieliel hfx uddhievtcev ur bhttueocx-ie-byicq, ueo hfx qixrv
qhc, Zfmyhjoce, ir gueafiryco; jc bue ehj vfxe hfx vyhflyvr vh vyc
rcbheo, Zheuduxvc. Zfv ur iv vfxer hfv, pfrv uv vyuv thtcev u vyixo
cectk xircr zcqhxc fr--eutcnk vyc Hxvyhohm Xfrriue rhnoicxr, nhfonk
octueoiel zxcuo, tcuv, zirbfivr, qhoocx, ueo jyuvehv! Vyc rvhxcr uxc
ctdvk, vyc xhuor itdurruznc. Vyc Hxvyhohm zclie nhhviel, ueo ie u juk hq
jyiby hfx nurv butduile bue ligc khf eh iocu. Yunq vyc xclitcevr qhxt
zueor ueo rbhfx vyc bhfevxkrioc ueo dfv cgcxkvyiel vh qixc ueo rjhxo.
Vyc ieyuzivuevr uxc vhvunnk xfieco, vyc yhrdivunr hgcxqnhj jivy ribw,
ueo qutiec ir cgcxkjycxc. Vjibc vyc tuxufocxr cgce uvvubw hfx
ycuoafuxvcxr, ueo vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq yur vh urw qhx u zuvvunihe vh
oirdcxrc vyct. Ofxiel hec hq vycrc uvvubwr vyck buxxico hqq tk ctdvk
dhxvtuevcuf ueo tk oxcrriel lhje. Vyc Ctdcxhx dxhdhrcr vh ligc unn
bhttueocxr hq oigiriher vyc xilyv vh ryhhv tuxufocxr, zfv I tfby qcux
vyir jinn hznilc hec yunq vyc uxtk vh ryhhv vyc hvycx."

Uv qixrv Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcuo jivy yir ckcr henk, zfv uqvcx u jyinc, ie
rdivc hq yitrcnq (unvyhfly yc wecj yhj qux iv jur ruqc vh vxfrv
Zinizie), jyuv yc yuo xcuo zclue vh ievcxcrv yit thxc ueo thxc. Jyce yc
yuo xcuo vyfr qux, yc bxftdnco vyc ncvvcx fd ueo vyxcj iv ujuk. Iv jur
ehv jyuv yc yuo xcuo vyuv gcmco yit, zfv vyc qubv vyuv vyc niqc hfv
vycxc ie jyiby yc yuo ehj eh duxv bhfno dcxvfxz yit. Yc ryfv yir ckcr,
xfzzco yir qhxcycuo ur iq vh xio yitrcnq hq unn ievcxcrv ie jyuv yc yuo
xcuo, ueo nirvceco vh jyuv jur durriel ie vyc efxrcxk. Rfoocenk yc
vyhflyv yc ycuxo u rvxuelc ehirc vyxhfly vyc ohhx. Yc jur rcisco jivy
unuxt ncrv rhtcvyiel ryhfno yugc yuddceco vh vyc byino jyinc yc jur
xcuoiel vyc ncvvcx. Yc jcev he vidvhc vh vyc efxrcxk ohhx ueo hdceco iv.

Pfrv ur yc jcev ie yc ruj vyuv vyc efxrc jur yioiel rhtcvyiel qxht yit
jivy u rbuxco nhhw ueo vyuv Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur eh nhelcx zk vyc bhv.

"Tk ocux," yc ycuxo jyuv rcctco vh yit ycx ocrduixiel jyirdcx zcyieo
yit.

Ur hqvce yuddcer uqvcx nhel rnccdncrrecrr ueo nhel uemicvk, yc jur
rcisco zk ue fexcurheiel dueib--iv hbbfxxco vh yit vyuv vyc byino jur
ocuo. Unn vyuv yc ruj ueo ycuxo rcctco vh bheqixt vyir vcxxhx.

"Unn ir hgcx," yc vyhflyv, ueo u bhno rjcuv zxhwc hfv he yir qhxcycuo.
Yc jcev vh vyc bhv ie bheqfrihe, rfxc vyuv yc jhfno qieo iv ctdvk ueo
vyuv vyc efxrc yuo zcce yioiel vyc ocuo zuzk. Yc oxcj vyc bfxvuie urioc
ueo qhx rhtc vitc yir qxilyvceco, xcrvncrr ckcr bhfno ehv qieo vyc zuzk.
Uv nurv yc ruj yit: vyc xhrk zhk yuo vhrrco uzhfv vinn yc nuk ubxhrr vyc
zco jivy yir ycuo nhjcx vyue vyc dinnhj, ueo jur rtubwiel yir nidr ie
yir rnccd ueo zxcuvyiel cgcenk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur ur lnuo vh qieo vyc zhk niwc vyuv, ur iq yc yuo
unxcuok nhrv yit. Yc zcev hgcx yit ueo, ur yir rirvcx yuo vuflyv yit,
vxico jivy yir nidr jycvycx vyc byino jur rvinn qcgcxiry. Vyc rhqv
qhxcycuo jur thirv. Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhfbyco vyc ycuo jivy yir yueo; cgce
vyc yuix jur jcv, rh dxhqfrcnk yuo vyc byino dcxrdixco. Yc jur ehv ocuo,
zfv cgiocevnk vyc bxirir jur hgcx ueo yc jur bheguncrbcev. Dxiebc Ueoxcj
nhelco vh reuvby fd, vh rafccsc, vh yhno vh yir ycuxv, vyir ycndncrr
nivvnc bxcuvfxc, zfv ouxco ehv oh rh. Yc rvhho hgcx yit, lusiel uv yir
ycuo ueo uv vyc nivvnc uxtr ueo nclr jyiby ryhjco feocx vyc znuewcv. Yc
ycuxo u xfrvnc zcyieo yit ueo u ryuohj uddcuxco feocx vyc bfxvuie hq vyc
bhv. Yc oio ehv nhhw xhfeo, zfv rvinn lusiel uv vyc iequev'r qubc
nirvceco vh yir xclfnux zxcuvyiel. Vyc ouxw ryuohj jur Dxiebcrr Tuxk,
jyh yuo bhtc fd vh vyc bhv jivy ehircncrr rvcdr, niqvco vyc bfxvuie, ueo
oxhddco iv uluie zcyieo ycx. Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcbhleisco ycx jivyhfv
nhhwiel ueo ycno hfv yir yueo vh ycx. Ryc dxcrrco iv.

"Yc yur dcxrdixco," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"I jur bhtiel vh vcnn khf rh."

Vyc byino thgco rnilyvnk ie yir rnccd, rtinco, ueo xfzzco yir qhxcycuo
uluierv vyc dinnhj.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco uv yir rirvcx. Ie vyc oit ryuohj hq vyc bfxvuie ycx
nftiehfr ckcr ryhec thxc zxilyvnk vyue frfun qxht vyc vcuxr hq phk vyuv
jcxc ie vyct. Ryc ncueco hgcx vh ycx zxhvycx ueo wirrco yit, rnilyvnk
buvbyiel vyc bfxvuie hq vyc bhv. Cuby tuoc vyc hvycx u juxeiel lcrvfxc
ueo rvhho rvinn ie vyc oit nilyv zcecuvy vyc bfxvuie ur iq ehv jiryiel
vh ncugc vyuv rcbnfrihe jycxc vyck vyxcc jcxc ryfv hqq qxht unn vyc
jhxno. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur vyc qixrv vh thgc ujuk, xfqqniel yir yuix
uluierv vyc tfrnie hq vyc bfxvuie.

"Kcr, vyir ir vyc hec vyiel ncqv tc ehj," yc ruio jivy u rily.




BYUDVCX M

Rhhe uqvcx yir uotirrihe vh vyc turheib Zxhvycxyhho, Dicxxc jcev vh vyc
Wicg dxhgiebc, jycxc yc yuo vyc lxcuvcrv eftzcx hq rcxqr, vuwiel jivy
yit qfnn oixcbviher jyiby yc yuo jxivvce ohje qhx yir hje lfiouebc ur vh
jyuv yc ryhfno oh he yir crvuvcr.

Jyce yc xcubyco Wicg yc rcev qhx unn yir rvcjuxor vh vyc ycuo hqqibc ueo
cmdnuieco vh vyct yir ievceviher ueo jirycr. Yc vhno vyct vyuv rvcdr
jhfno zc vuwce ittcoiuvcnk vh qxcc yir rcxqr--ueo vyuv vinn vyce vyck
jcxc ehv vh zc hgcxzfxoceco jivy nuzhx, jhtce jyinc efxriel vycix zuzicr
jcxc ehv vh zc rcev vh jhxw, urrirvuebc jur vh zc ligce vh vyc rcxqr,
dfeirytcevr jcxc vh zc uotheivhxk ueo ehv bhxdhxun, ueo yhrdivunr,
urknftr, ueo rbyhhnr jcxc vh zc crvuzniryco he unn vyc crvuvcr. Rhtc hq
vyc rvcjuxor (vycxc jcxc rctinivcxuvc qhxctce uthel vyct) nirvceco jivy
unuxt, rfddhriel vycrc jhxor vh tcue vyuv vyc khfel bhfev jur oirdncurco
jivy vycix tueulctcev ueo ctzcssnctcev hq theck, rhtc uqvcx vycix qixrv
qxilyv jcxc utfrco zk Dicxxc'r nird ueo vyc ecj jhxor vyck yuo ehv ycuxo
zcqhxc, hvycxr ritdnk cephkco ycuxiel yhj vyc turvcx vunwco, jyinc vyc
bncgcxcrv uthel vyct, iebnfoiel vyc byicq rvcjuxo, feocxrvhho qxht vyir
rdccby yhj vyck bhfno zcrv yueonc vyc turvcx qhx vycix hje ceor.

Vyc byicq rvcjuxo cmdxcrrco lxcuv rktduvyk jivy Dicxxc'r ievceviher, zfv
xctuxwco vyuv zcriocr vycrc byuelcr iv jhfno zc ecbcrruxk vh lh ievh vyc
lcecxun rvuvc hq uqquixr jyiby jur qux qxht ruvirqubvhxk.

Ocrdivc Bhfev Zcsfwyhg'r cehxthfr jcunvy, riebc yc yuo bhtc ievh ue
iebhtc jyiby jur ruio vh uthfev vh qigc yfeoxco vyhfrueo xfzncr u kcux,
Dicxxc qcnv yitrcnq qux dhhxcx vyue jyce yir quvycx yuo tuoc yit ue
unnhjuebc hq vce vyhfrueo xfzncr. Yc yuo u oit dcxbcdvihe hq vyc
qhnnhjiel zfolcv:

Uzhfv 80,000 jcev ie duktcevr he unn vyc crvuvcr vh vyc Nueo Zuew, uzhfv
30,000 jcev qhx vyc fdwccd hq vyc crvuvc ecux Thrbhj, vyc vhje yhfrc,
ueo vyc unnhjuebc vh vyc vyxcc dxiebcrrcr; uzhfv 15,000 jur ligce ie
dceriher ueo vyc rutc uthfev qhx urknftr; 150,000 unithek jur rcev vh
vyc bhfevcrr; uzhfv 70,000 jcev qhx ievcxcrv he oczvr. Vyc zfinoiel hq u
ecj byfxby, dxcgihfrnk zclfe, yuo bhrv uzhfv 10,000 ie cuby hq vyc nurv
vjh kcuxr, ueo yc oio ehv wehj yhj vyc xcrv, uzhfv 100,000 xfzncr, jur
rdcev, ueo unthrv cgcxk kcux yc jur hznilco vh zhxxhj. Zcriocr vyir vyc
byicq rvcjuxo jxhvc cgcxk kcux vcnniel yit hq qixcr ueo zuo yuxgcrvr, hx
hq vyc ecbcrrivk hq xczfinoiel qubvhxicr ueo jhxwryhdr. Rh vyc qixrv
vurw Dicxxc yuo vh qubc jur hec qhx jyiby yc yuo gcxk nivvnc udvivfoc hx
iebnieuvihe--dxubvibun zfriecrr.

Yc oirbfrrco crvuvc uqquixr cgcxk ouk jivy yir byicq rvcjuxo. Zfv yc
qcnv vyuv vyir oio ehv qhxjuxo tuvvcxr uv unn. Yc qcnv vyuv vycrc
bherfnvuviher jcxc ocvubyco qxht xcun uqquixr ueo oio ehv niew fd jivy
vyct hx tuwc vyct thgc. He vyc hec yueo, vyc byicq rvcjuxo dfv vyc rvuvc
hq vyielr vh yit ie vyc gcxk jhxrv nilyv, dhieviel hfv vyc ecbcrrivk hq
dukiel hqq vyc oczvr ueo feocxvuwiel ecj ubvigivicr jivy rcxq nuzhx, vh
jyiby Dicxxc oio ehv ulxcc. He vyc hvycx yueo, Dicxxc octueoco vyuv
rvcdr ryhfno zc vuwce vh nizcxuvc vyc rcxqr, jyiby vyc rvcjuxo tcv zk
ryhjiel vyc ecbcrrivk hq qixrv dukiel hqq vyc nhuer qxht vyc Nueo Zuew,
ueo vyc bhercafcev itdhrrizinivk hq u rdccok ctuebiduvihe.

Vyc rvcjuxo oio ehv ruk iv jur afivc itdhrriznc, zfv rfllcrvco rcnniel
vyc qhxcrvr ie vyc dxhgiebc hq Whrvxhtu, vyc nueo nhjcx ohje vyc xigcx,
ueo vyc Bxitcue crvuvc, ie hxocx vh tuwc iv dhrriznc: unn hq jyiby
hdcxuviher ubbhxoiel vh yit jcxc bheecbvco jivy rfby bhtdnibuvco
tcurfxcr--vyc xcthgun hq iepfebviher, dcviviher, dcxtivr, ueo rh he--
vyuv Dicxxc zcbutc afivc zcjinocxco ueo henk xcdnico:

"Kcr, kcr, oh rh."

Dicxxc yuo ehec hq vyc dxubvibun dcxrirvcebc vyuv jhfno yugc ceuznco yit
vh uvvceo vh vyc zfriecrr yitrcnq ueo rh yc oirniwco iv ueo henk vxico
vh dxcvceo vh vyc rvcjuxo vyuv yc jur uvvceoiel vh iv. Vyc rvcjuxo qhx
yir duxv vxico vh dxcvceo vh vyc bhfev vyuv yc bheriocxco vycrc
bherfnvuviher gcxk gunfuznc qhx vyc dxhdxicvhx ueo vxhfzncrhtc vh
yitrcnq.

Ie Wicg Dicxxc qhfeo rhtc dchdnc yc wecj, ueo rvxuelcxr yurvceco vh tuwc
yir ubafuievuebc ueo phkqfnnk jcnbhtco vyc xiby ecjbhtcx, vyc nuxlcrv
nueohjecx hq vyc dxhgiebc. Vctdvuviher vh Dicxxc'r lxcuvcrv jcuwecrr--
vyc hec vh jyiby yc yuo bheqcrrco jyce uotivvco vh vyc Nholc--jcxc rh
rvxhel vyuv yc bhfno ehv xcrirv vyct. Uluie jyhnc oukr, jccwr, ueo
thevyr hq yir niqc durrco ie ur lxcuv u xfry ueo jcxc ur tfby hbbfdico
jivy cgceiel duxvicr, oieecxr, nfebycr, ueo zunnr, ligiel yit eh vitc
qhx xcqncbvihe, ur ie Dcvcxrzfxl. Iervcuo hq vyc ecj niqc yc yuo yhdco
vh ncuo yc rvinn nigco vyc hno niqc, henk ie ecj rfxxhfeoielr.

Hq vyc vyxcc dxcbcdvr hq Qxccturhexk Dicxxc xcunisco vyuv yc oio ehv
qfnqinn vyc hec jyiby cephieco cgcxk Turhe vh rcv ue cmutdnc hq thxun
niqc, ueo vyuv hq vyc rcgce gixvfcr yc nubwco vjh--thxunivk ueo vyc nhgc
hq ocuvy. Yc bherhnco yitrcnq jivy vyc vyhflyv vyuv yc qfnqinnco uehvycx
hq vyc dxcbcdvr--vyuv hq xcqhxtiel vyc yftue xubc--ueo yuo hvycx
gixvfcr--nhgc hq yir ecilyzhx, ueo crdcbiunnk lcecxhrivk.

Ie vyc rdxiel hq 1807 yc ocbioco vh xcvfxe vh Dcvcxrzfxl. He vyc juk yc
ievceoco vh giriv unn yir crvuvcr ueo rcc qhx yitrcnq yhj qux yir hxocxr
yuo zcce buxxico hfv ueo ie jyuv rvuvc jcxc vyc rcxqr jyht Lho yuo
cevxfrvco vh yir buxc ueo jyht yc ievceoco vh zcecqiv.

Vyc byicq rvcjuxo, jyh bheriocxco vyc khfel bhfev'r uvvctdvr unthrv
ieruec--fedxhqivuznc vh yitrcnq, vh vyc bhfev, ueo vh vyc rcxqr--tuoc
rhtc bhebcrriher. Bheviefiel vh xcdxcrcev vyc nizcxuvihe hq vyc rcxqr ur
itdxubvibuznc, yc uxxuelco qhx vyc cxcbvihe hq nuxlc zfinoielr--rbyhhnr,
yhrdivunr, ueo urknftr--he unn vyc crvuvcr zcqhxc vyc turvcx uxxigco.
Cgcxkjycxc dxcduxuviher jcxc tuoc ehv qhx bcxctheihfr jcnbhtcr (jyiby yc
wecj Dicxxc jhfno ehv niwc), zfv qhx pfrv rfby lxuvcqfnnk xcnilihfr
hecr, jivy hqqcxielr hq ibher ueo vyc zxcuo ueo runv hq yhrdivunivk, ur,
ubbhxoiel vh yir feocxrvueoiel hq yir turvcx, jhfno vhfby ueo ocnfoc
yit.

Vyc rhfvycxe rdxiel, vyc bhtqhxvuznc xudio vxugcniel ie u Giceeu
buxxiulc, ueo vyc rhnivfoc hq vyc xhuo, unn yuo u lnuooceiel cqqcbv he
Dicxxc. Vyc crvuvcr yc yuo ehv zcqhxc girivco jcxc cuby thxc dibvfxcrafc
vyue vyc hvycx; vyc rcxqr cgcxkjycxc rcctco vyxigiel ueo vhfbyielnk
lxuvcqfn qhx vyc zcecqivr bheqcxxco he vyct. Cgcxkjycxc jcxc xcbcdviher,
jyiby vyhfly vyck ctzuxxurrco Dicxxc ujuwceco u phkqfn qccniel ie vyc
ocdvy hq yir ycuxv. Ie hec dnubc vyc dcuruevr dxcrcevco yit jivy zxcuo
ueo runv ueo ue ibhe hq Ruiev Dcvcx ueo Ruiev Dufn, urwiel dcxtirrihe,
ur u tuxw hq vycix lxuvivfoc qhx vyc zcecqivr yc yuo bheqcxxco he vyct,
vh zfino u ecj byuevxk vh vyc byfxby uv vycix hje cmdcerc ie yhehx hq
Dcvcx ueo Dufn, yir duvxhe ruievr. Ie uehvycx dnubc vyc jhtce jivy
iequevr ie uxtr tcv yit vh vyuew yit qhx xcncuriel vyct qxht yuxo jhxw.
He u vyixo crvuvc vyc dxicrv, zcuxiel u bxhrr, butc vh tccv yit
rfxxhfeoco zk byinoxce jyht, zk vyc bhfev'r lcecxhrivk, yc jur
iervxfbviel ie xcuoiel, jxiviel, ueo xcnilihe. He unn yir crvuvcr Dicxxc
ruj jivy yir hje ckcr zxibw zfinoielr cxcbvco hx ie bhfxrc hq cxcbvihe,
unn he hec dnue, qhx yhrdivunr, rbyhhnr, ueo untryhfrcr, jyiby jcxc rhhe
vh zc hdceco. Cgcxkjycxc yc ruj vyc rvcjuxor' ubbhfevr, ubbhxoiel vh
jyiby vyc rcxqr' tuehxiun nuzhx yuo zcce oitieiryco, ueo ycuxo vyc
vhfbyiel vyuewr hq ocdfvuviher hq rcxqr ie vycix qfnn-rwixvco znfc
bhuvr.

Jyuv Dicxxc oio ehv wehj jur vyuv vyc dnubc jycxc vyck dxcrcevco yit
jivy zxcuo ueo runv ueo jiryco vh zfino u byuevxk ie yhehx hq Dcvcx ueo
Dufn jur u tuxwcv ginnulc jycxc u quix jur ycno he Rv. Dcvcx'r ouk, ueo
vyuv vyc xibycrv dcuruevr (jyh qhxtco vyc ocdfvuvihe) yuo zclfe vyc
byuevxk nhel zcqhxc, zfv vyuv eiec vcevyr hq vyc dcuruevr ie vyuv
ginnulcr jcxc ie u rvuvc hq vyc lxcuvcrv dhgcxvk. Yc oio ehv wehj vyuv
riebc vyc efxriel thvycxr jcxc eh nhelcx rcev vh jhxw he yir nueo, vyck
oio rvinn yuxocx jhxw he vycix hje nueo. Yc oio ehv wehj vyuv vyc dxicrv
jyh tcv yit jivy vyc bxhrr hddxcrrco vyc dcuruevr zk yir cmubviher, ueo
vyuv vyc dfdinr' duxcevr jcdv uv yugiel vh ncv yit vuwc vycix byinoxce
ueo rcbfxco vycix xcncurc zk ycugk duktcevr. Yc oio ehv wehj vyuv vyc
zxibw zfinoielr, zfinv vh dnue, jcxc zciel zfinv zk rcxqr jyhrc tuehxiun
nuzhx jur vyfr iebxcurco, vyhfly ncrrceco he dudcx. Yc oio ehv wehj vyuv
jycxc vyc rvcjuxo yuo ryhje yit ie vyc ubbhfevr vyuv vyc rcxqr' duktcevr
yuo zcce oitieiryco zk u vyixo, vycix hzniluvhxk tuehxiun jhxw yuo zcce
iebxcurco zk u yunq. Ueo rh Dicxxc jur ocnilyvco jivy yir giriv vh yir
crvuvcr ueo afivc xcbhgcxco vyc dyinuevyxhdib thho ie jyiby yc yuo ncqv
Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo jxhvc cevyfriurvib ncvvcxr vh yir "zxhvycx-iervxfbvhx"
ur yc bunnco vyc Lxueo Turvcx.

"Yhj curk iv ir, yhj nivvnc cqqhxv iv eccor, vh oh rh tfby lhho,"
vyhflyv Dicxxc, "ueo yhj nivvnc uvvcevihe jc duk vh iv!"

Yc jur dncurco uv vyc lxuvivfoc yc xcbcigco, zfv qcnv uzuryco uv
xcbcigiel iv. Vyir lxuvivfoc xctieoco yit hq yhj tfby thxc yc tilyv oh
qhx vycrc ritdnc, wieonk dchdnc.

Vyc byicq rvcjuxo, u gcxk rvfdio zfv bfeeiel tue jyh ruj dcxqcbvnk
vyxhfly vyc euigc ueo ievcnnilcev bhfev ueo dnukco jivy yit ur jivy u
vhk, rcciel vyc cqqcbv vycrc dxcuxxuelco xcbcdviher yuo he Dicxxc,
dxcrrco yit rvinn yuxocx jivy dxhhqr hq vyc itdhrrizinivk ueo uzhgc unn
vyc frcncrrecrr hq qxcciel vyc rcxqr, jyh jcxc afivc yuddk ur iv jur.

Dicxxc ie yir rcbxcv rhfn ulxcco jivy vyc rvcjuxo vyuv iv jhfno zc
oiqqibfnv vh ituliec yuddicx dchdnc, ueo vyuv Lho henk wecj jyuv jhfno
yuddce vh vyct jyce vyck jcxc qxcc, zfv yc ierirvco, vyhfly xcnfbvuevnk,
he jyuv yc vyhflyv xilyv. Vyc rvcjuxo dxhtirco vh oh unn ie yir dhjcx vh
buxxk hfv vyc bhfev'r jirycr, rcciel bncuxnk vyuv ehv henk jhfno vyc
bhfev ecgcx zc uznc vh qieo hfv jycvycx unn tcurfxcr yuo zcce vuwce qhx
vyc runc hq vyc nueo ueo qhxcrvr ueo vh xcncurc vyct qxht vyc Nueo Zuew,
zfv jhfno dxhzuznk ecgcx cgce ieafixc ueo jhfno ecgcx wehj vyuv vyc
ecjnk cxcbvco zfinoielr jcxc rvueoiel ctdvk ueo vyuv vyc rcxqr bheviefco
vh ligc ie theck ueo jhxw unn vyuv hvycx dchdnc'r rcxqr lugc--vyuv ir vh
ruk, unn vyuv bhfno zc lhv hfv hq vyct.




BYUDVCX MI

Xcvfxeiel qxht yir phfxeck vyxhfly Rhfvy Xfrriu ie vyc yuddicrv rvuvc hq
tieo, Dicxxc buxxico hfv ue ievcevihe yc yuo nhel yuo hq giriviel yir
qxiceo Zhnwherwi, jyht yc yuo ehv rcce qhx vjh kcuxr.

Zhlfbyuxhgh nuk ie u qnuv feievcxcrviel duxv hq vyc bhfevxk uthel qicnor
ueo qhxcrvr hq qix ueo zixby, jyiby jcxc duxvnk bfv ohje. Vyc yhfrc nuk
zcyieo u ecjnk ofl dheo qinnco jivy juvcx vh vyc zxiew ueo jivy zuewr
rvinn zuxc hq lxurr. Iv jur uv vyc ceo hq u ginnulc vyuv rvxcvbyco unhel
vyc yilyxhuo ie vyc tiorv hq u khfel bhdrc ie jyiby jcxc u qcj qix
vxccr.

Vyc yhtcrvcuo bherirvco hq u vyxcryiel qnhhx, hfvyhfrcr, rvuzncr, u
zuvyyhfrc, u nholc, ueo u nuxlc zxibw yhfrc jivy rctibixbfnux qubuoc
rvinn ie bhfxrc hq bhervxfbvihe. Xhfeo vyc yhfrc jur u luxoce ecjnk nuio
hfv. Vyc qcebcr ueo luvcr jcxc ecj ueo rhnio; vjh qixc dftdr ueo u juvcx
buxv, duievco lxcce, rvhho ie u ryco; vyc duvyr jcxc rvxuilyv, vyc
zxiolcr jcxc rvxhel ueo yuo yueoxuinr. Cgcxkvyiel zhxc ue itdxcrr hq
vioiecrr ueo lhho tueulctcev. Rhtc ohtcrvib rcxqr Dicxxc tcv, ie xcdnk
vh ieafixicr ur vh jycxc vyc dxiebc nigco, dhievco hfv u rtunn ecjnk
zfinv nholc bnhrc vh vyc dheo. Uevhe, u tue jyh yuo nhhwco uqvcx Dxiebc
Ueoxcj ie yir zhkyhho, ycndco Dicxxc hfv hq yir buxxiulc, ruio vyuv vyc
dxiebc jur uv yhtc, ueo ryhjco yit ievh u bncue nivvnc uevcxhht.
