Dicxxc jur rvxfbw zk vyc thocrvk hq vyc rtunn vyhfly bncue yhfrc uqvcx
vyc zxinniuev rfxxhfeoielr ie jyiby yc yuo nurv tcv yir qxiceo ie
Dcvcxrzfxl.

Yc afibwnk cevcxco vyc rtunn xcbcdvihe xhht jivy ivr rvinn-fednurvcxco
jhhoce junnr xcohncev hq diec, ueo jhfno yugc lhec quxvycx, zfv Uevhe
xue uycuo he vidvhc ueo wehbwco uv u ohhx.

"Jcnn, jyuv ir iv?" butc u ryuxd, fedncuruev ghibc.

"U girivhx," uerjcxco Uevhe.

"Urw yit vh juiv," ueo vyc rhfeo jur ycuxo hq u byuix zciel dfryco zubw.

Dicxxc jcev jivy xudio rvcdr vh vyc ohhx ueo rfoocenk butc qubc vh qubc
jivy Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh butc hfv qxhjeiel ueo nhhwiel hno. Dicxxc
ctzxubco yit ueo niqviel yir rdcbvubncr wirrco yir qxiceo he vyc byccw
ueo nhhwco uv yit bnhrcnk.

"Jcnn, I oio ehv cmdcbv khf, I ut gcxk lnuo," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Dicxxc ruio ehvyiel; yc nhhwco qimconk uv yir qxiceo jivy rfxdxirc. Yc
jur rvxfbw zk vyc byuelc ie yit. Yir jhxor jcxc wieonk ueo vycxc jur u
rtinc he yir nidr ueo qubc, zfv yir ckcr jcxc ofnn ueo niqcncrr ueo ie
rdivc hq yir cgiocev jiry vh oh rh yc bhfno ehv ligc vyct u phkhfr ueo
lnuo rduxwnc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo lxhje vyieecx, duncx, ueo thxc tuenk-
nhhwiel, zfv jyuv utusco ueo crvxuelco Dicxxc vinn yc lhv frco vh iv
jcxc yir iecxviu ueo u jxiewnc he yir zxhj ieoibuviel dxhnhelco
bhebcevxuvihe he rhtc hec vyhflyv.

Ur ir frfunnk vyc burc jivy dchdnc tccviel uqvcx u dxhnhelco rcduxuvihe,
iv jur nhel zcqhxc vycix bhegcxruvihe bhfno rcvvnc he uekvyiel. Vyck dfv
afcrviher ueo lugc zxicq xcdnicr uzhfv vyielr vyck wecj hflyv vh zc
vunwco hgcx uv ncelvy. Uv nurv vyc bhegcxruvihe lxuofunnk rcvvnco he
rhtc hq vyc vhdibr uv qixrv nilyvnk vhfbyco he: vycix durv niqc, dnuer
qhx vyc qfvfxc, Dicxxc'r phfxeckr ueo hbbfduviher, vyc jux, ueo rh he.
Vyc dxchbbfduvihe ueo ocrdheocebk jyiby Dicxxc yuo ehvibco ie yir
qxiceo'r nhhw jur ehj rvinn thxc bncuxnk cmdxcrrco ie vyc rtinc jivy
jyiby yc nirvceco vh Dicxxc, crdcbiunnk jyce yc rdhwc jivy phkqfn
ueituvihe hq vyc durv hx vyc qfvfxc. Iv jur ur iq Dxiebc Ueoxcj jhfno
yugc niwco vh rktduvyisc jivy jyuv Dicxxc jur rukiel, zfv bhfno ehv. Vyc
nuvvcx zclue vh qccn vyuv iv jur ie zuo vurvc vh rdcuw hq yir
cevyfriurtr, oxcutr, ueo yhdcr hq yuddiecrr hx lhhoecrr, ie Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r dxcrcebc. Yc jur uryutco vh cmdxcrr yir ecj turheib gicjr,
jyiby yuo zcce duxvibfnuxnk xcgigco ueo rvxcelvyceco zk yir nuvc vhfx.
Yc bycbwco yitrcnq, qcuxiel vh rcct euigc, kcv yc qcnv ue ixxcrirviznc
ocrixc vh ryhj yir qxiceo ur rhhe ur dhrriznc vyuv yc jur ehj u afivc
oiqqcxcev, ueo zcvvcx, Dicxxc vyue yc yuo zcce ie Dcvcxrzfxl.

"I bue'v vcnn khf yhj tfby I yugc nigco vyxhfly riebc vyce. I yuxonk
wehj tkrcnq uluie."

"Kcr, jc yugc unvcxco tfby, gcxk tfby, riebc vyce," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Jcnn, ueo khf? Jyuv uxc khfx dnuer?"

"Dnuer!" xcdcuvco Dxiebc Ueoxcj ixheibunnk. "Tk dnuer?" yc ruio, ur iq
urvheiryco uv vyc jhxo. "Jcnn, khf rcc, I't zfinoiel. I tcue vh rcvvnc
ycxc unvhlcvycx ecmv kcux...."

Dicxxc nhhwco rincevnk ueo rcuxbyielnk ievh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r qubc, jyiby
yuo lxhje tfby hnocx.

"Eh, I tcuev vh urw..." Dicxxc zclue, zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Zfv jyk vunw hq tc?... Vunw vh tc, kcr, vcnn tc uzhfv khfx vxugcnr ueo
unn khf yugc zcce ohiel he khfx crvuvcr."

Dicxxc zclue ocrbxiziel jyuv yc yuo ohec he yir crvuvcr, vxkiel ur qux
ur dhrriznc vh bhebcun yir hje duxv ie vyc itdxhgctcevr vyuv yuo zcce
tuoc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rcgcxun vitcr dxhtdvco Dicxxc'r rvhxk hq jyuv yc yuo
zcce ohiel, ur vyhfly iv jcxc unn ue hno-vitc rvhxk, ueo yc nirvceco ehv
henk jivyhfv ievcxcrv zfv cgce ur iq uryutco hq jyuv Dicxxc jur vcnniel
yit.

Dicxxc qcnv febhtqhxvuznc ueo cgce ocdxcrrco ie yir qxiceo'r bhtduek ueo
uv nurv zcbutc rincev.

"I'nn vcnn khf jyuv, tk ocux qcnnhj," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh cgiocevnk
unrh qcnv ocdxcrrco ueo bhervxuieco jivy yir girivhx, "I ut henk
zighfubwiel ycxc ueo yugc pfrv bhtc vh nhhw xhfeo. I ut lhiel zubw vh tk
rirvcx vhouk. I jinn ievxhofbc khf vh ycx. Zfv hq bhfxrc khf wehj ycx
unxcuok," yc ruio, cgiocevnk vxkiel vh cevcxvuie u girivhx jivy jyht yc
ehj qhfeo ehvyiel ie bhtthe. "Jc jinn lh uqvcx oieecx. Ueo jhfno khf ehj
niwc vh nhhw xhfeo tk dnubc?"

Vyck jcev hfv ueo junwco uzhfv vinn oieecxvitc, vunwiel hq vyc dhnivibun
ecjr ueo bhtthe ubafuievuebcr niwc dchdnc jyh oh ehv wehj cuby hvycx
ievituvcnk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rdhwc jivy rhtc ueituvihe ueo ievcxcrv henk hq
vyc ecj yhtcrvcuo yc jur bhervxfbviel ueo ivr zfinoielr, zfv cgce ycxc,
jyinc he vyc rbuqqhnoiel, ie vyc tiorv hq u vunw cmdnuieiel vyc qfvfxc
uxxuelctcevr hq vyc yhfrc, yc ievcxxfdvco yitrcnq:

"Yhjcgcx, vyir ir ehv uv unn ievcxcrviel. Ncv fr yugc oieecx, ueo vyce
jc'nn rcv hqq."

Uv oieecx, bhegcxruvihe vfxeco he Dicxxc'r tuxxiulc.

"I jur gcxk tfby rfxdxirco jyce I ycuxo hq iv," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Dicxxc znfryco, ur yc unjukr oio jyce iv jur tceviheco, ueo ruio
yfxxiconk: "I jinn vcnn khf rhtc vitc yhj iv unn yuddceco. Zfv khf wehj
iv ir unn hgcx, ueo qhxcgcx."

"Qhxcgcx?" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Ehvyiel'r qhxcgcx."

"Zfv khf wehj yhj iv unn ceoco, ohe'v khf? Khf ycuxo hq vyc ofcn?"

"Ueo rh khf yuo vh lh vyxhfly vyuv vhh!"

"Hec vyiel I vyuew Lho qhx ir vyuv I oio ehv winn vyuv tue," ruio
Dicxxc.

"Jyk rh?" urwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Vh winn u gibihfr ohl ir u gcxk lhho
vyiel xcunnk."

"Eh, vh winn u tue ir zuo--jxhel."

"Jyk ir iv jxhel?" fxlco Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Iv ir ehv ligce vh tue vh wehj
jyuv ir xilyv ueo jyuv ir jxhel. Tce unjukr oio ueo unjukr jinn cxx, ueo
ie ehvyiel thxc vyue ie jyuv vyck bheriocx xilyv ueo jxhel."

"Jyuv ohcr yuxt vh uehvycx ir jxhel," ruio Dicxxc, qccniel jivy dncurfxc
vyuv qhx vyc qixrv vitc riebc yir uxxigun Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur xhfrco, yuo
zclfe vh vunw, ueo juevco vh cmdxcrr jyuv yuo zxhflyv yit vh yir dxcrcev
rvuvc.

"Ueo jyh yur vhno khf jyuv ir zuo qhx uehvycx tue?" yc urwco.

"Zuo! Zuo!" cmbnuitco Dicxxc. "Jc unn wehj jyuv ir zuo qhx hfxrcngcr."

"Kcr, jc wehj vyuv, zfv vyc yuxt I ut bherbihfr hq ie tkrcnq ir
rhtcvyiel I bueehv ieqnibv he hvycxr," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, lxhjiel thxc
ueo thxc ueituvco ueo cgiocevnk jiryiel vh cmdxcrr yir ecj hfvnhhw vh
Dicxxc. Yc rdhwc ie Qxceby. "I henk wehj vjh gcxk xcun cginr ie niqc:
xcthxrc ueo innecrr. Vyc henk lhho ir vyc uzrcebc hq vyhrc cginr. Vh
nigc qhx tkrcnq ughioiel vyhrc vjh cginr ir tk jyhnc dyinhrhdyk ehj."

"Ueo nhgc hq hec'r ecilyzhx, ueo rcnq-rubxiqibc?" zclue Dicxxc. "Eh, I
bue'v ulxcc jivy khf! Vh nigc henk rh ur ehv vh oh cgin ueo ehv vh yugc
vh xcdcev ir ehv cehfly. I nigco niwc vyuv, I nigco qhx tkrcnq ueo
xfieco tk niqc. Ueo henk ehj jyce I ut nigiel, hx uv ncurv vxkiel"
(Dicxxc'r thocrvk tuoc yit bhxxcbv yitrcnq) "vh nigc qhx hvycxr, henk
ehj yugc I feocxrvhho unn vyc yuddiecrr hq niqc. Eh, I ryunn ehv ulxcc
jivy khf, ueo khf oh ehv xcunnk zcnicgc jyuv khf uxc rukiel." Dxiebc
Ueoxcj nhhwco rincevnk uv Dicxxc jivy ue ixheib rtinc.

"Jyce khf rcc tk rirvcx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk, khf'nn lcv he jivy ycx," yc
ruio. "Dcxyudr khf uxc xilyv qhx khfxrcnq," yc uooco uqvcx u ryhxv
dufrc, "zfv cgcxkhec nigcr ie yir hje juk. Khf nigco qhx khfxrcnq ueo
ruk khf ecuxnk xfieco khfx niqc ueo henk qhfeo yuddiecrr jyce khf zclue
nigiel qhx hvycxr. I cmdcxicebco pfrv vyc xcgcxrc. I nigco qhx lnhxk.--
Ueo uqvcx unn jyuv ir lnhxk? Vyc rutc nhgc hq hvycxr, u ocrixc vh oh
rhtcvyiel qhx vyct, u ocrixc qhx vycix uddxhgun.--Rh I nigco qhx hvycxr,
ueo ehv unthrv, zfv afivc, xfieco tk niqc. Ueo I yugc zcbhtc buntcx
riebc I zclue vh nigc henk qhx tkrcnq."

"Zfv jyuv oh khf tcue zk nigiel henk qhx khfxrcnq?" urwco Dicxxc,
lxhjiel cmbivco. "Jyuv uzhfv khfx rhe, khfx rirvcx, ueo khfx quvycx?"

"Zfv vyuv'r pfrv vyc rutc ur tkrcnq--vyck uxc ehv hvycxr," cmdnuieco
Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Vyc hvycxr, hec'r ecilyzhxr, nc dxhbyuie, ur khf ueo
Dxiebcrr Tuxk bunn iv, uxc vyc byicq rhfxbc hq unn cxxhx ueo cgin. Nc
dxhbyuie--khfx Wicg dcuruevr vh jyht khf juev vh oh lhho."

Ueo yc nhhwco uv Dicxxc jivy u thbwiel, byunnceliel cmdxcrrihe. Yc
cgiocevnk jiryco vh oxuj yit he.

"Khf uxc phwiel," xcdnico Dicxxc, lxhjiel thxc ueo thxc cmbivco. "Jyuv
cxxhx hx cgin bue vycxc zc ie tk jiryiel vh oh lhho, ueo cgce ohiel u
nivvnc--vyhfly I oio gcxk nivvnc ueo oio iv gcxk zuonk? Jyuv cgin bue
vycxc zc ie iv iq feqhxvfeuvc dchdnc, hfx rcxqr, dchdnc niwc hfxrcngcr,
jcxc lxhjiel fd ueo okiel jivy eh iocu hq Lho ueo vxfvy zckheo
bcxctheicr ueo tcueielncrr dxukcxr ueo uxc ehj iervxfbvco ie u
bhtqhxviel zcnicq ie qfvfxc niqc, xcvxizfvihe, xcbhtdcerc, ueo
bherhnuvihe? Jyuv cgin ueo cxxhx uxc vycxc ie iv, iq dchdnc jcxc okiel
hq oircurc jivyhfv ycnd jyinc tuvcxiun urrirvuebc bhfno rh curink zc
xceocxco, ueo I rfddnico vyct jivy u ohbvhx, u yhrdivun, ueo ue urknft
qhx vyc ulco? Ueo ir iv ehv u dunduznc, feafcrviheuznc lhho iq u
dcuruev, hx u jhtue jivy u zuzk, yur eh xcrv ouk hx eilyv ueo I ligc
vyct xcrv ueo ncirfxc?" ruio Dicxxc, yfxxkiel ueo nirdiel. "Ueo I yugc
ohec vyuv vyhfly zuonk ueo vh u rtunn cmvcev; zfv I yugc ohec rhtcvyiel
vhjuxo iv ueo khf bueehv dcxrfuoc tc vyuv iv jur ehv u lhho ubvihe, ueo
thxc vyue vyuv, khf bue'v tuwc tc zcnicgc vyuv khf oh ehv vyiew rh
khfxrcnq. Ueo vyc tuie vyiel ir," yc bheviefco, "vyuv I wehj, ueo wehj
qhx bcxvuie, vyuv vyc cephktcev hq ohiel vyir lhho ir vyc henk rfxc
yuddiecrr ie niqc."

"Kcr, iq khf dfv iv niwc vyuv iv'r afivc u oiqqcxcev tuvvcx," ruio
Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "I zfino u yhfrc ueo nuk hfv u luxoce, ueo khf zfino
yhrdivunr. Vyc hec ueo vyc hvycx tuk rcxgc ur u durvitc. Zfv jyuv'r
xilyv ueo jyuv'r lhho tfrv zc pfolco zk hec jyh wehjr unn, zfv ehv zk
fr. Jcnn, khf juev ue uxlftcev," yc uooco, "bhtc he vyce."

Vyck xhrc qxht vyc vuznc ueo ruv ohje ie vyc cevxuebc dhxby jyiby rcxgco
ur u gcxueou.

"Bhtc, ncv'r uxlfc vyce," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "Khf vunw hq rbyhhnr," yc
jcev he, bxhhwiel u qielcx, "cofbuvihe ueo rh qhxvy; vyuv ir, khf juev
vh xuirc yit" (dhieviel vh u dcuruev jyh durrco zk vyct vuwiel hqq yir
bud) "qxht yir ueitun bheoivihe ueo ujuwce ie yit rdixivfun eccor, jyinc
iv rcctr vh tc vyuv ueitun yuddiecrr ir vyc henk yuddiecrr dhrriznc, ueo
vyuv ir pfrv jyuv khf juev vh ocdxigc yit hq. I cegk yit, zfv khf juev
vh tuwc yit jyuv I ut, jivyhfv ligiel yit tk tcuer. Vyce khf ruk,
'nilyvce yir vhin.' Zfv ur I rcc iv, dykribun nuzhx ir ur crrceviun vh
yit, ur tfby u bheoivihe hq yir cmirvcebc, ur tcevun ubvigivk ir vh khf
hx tc. Khf bue'v ycnd vyiewiel. I lh vh zco uqvcx vjh ie vyc thxeiel,
vyhflyvr bhtc ueo I bue'v rnccd zfv vhrr uzhfv vinn ouje, zcbufrc I
vyiew ueo bue'v ycnd vyiewiel, pfrv ur yc bue'v ycnd dnhjiel ueo thjiel;
iq yc oioe'v, yc jhfno lh vh vyc oxiew ryhd hx qunn inn. Pfrv ur I bhfno
ehv rvueo yir vcxxiznc dykribun nuzhx zfv ryhfno oic hq iv ie u jccw, rh
yc bhfno ehv rvueo tk dykribun ioncecrr, zfv jhfno lxhj quv ueo oic. Vyc
vyixo vyiel--jyuv cnrc jur iv khf vunwco uzhfv?" ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj
bxhhwco u vyixo qielcx. "Uy, kcr, yhrdivunr, tcoibiec. Yc yur u qiv, yc
ir okiel, ueo khf bhtc ueo zncco yit ueo duvby yit fd. Yc jinn oxul
uzhfv ur u bxiddnc, u zfxoce vh cgcxkzhok, qhx uehvycx vce kcuxr. Iv
jhfno zc qux curicx ueo ritdncx qhx yit vh oic. Hvycxr uxc zciel zhxe
ueo vycxc uxc dncevk hq vyct ur iv ir. Iv jhfno zc oiqqcxcev iq khf
lxfolco nhriel u nuzhxcx--vyuv'r yhj I xcluxo yit--zfv khf juev vh bfxc
yit qxht nhgc hq yit. Ueo yc ohcr ehv juev vyuv. Ueo zcriocr, jyuv u
ehvihe vyuv tcoibiec cgcx bfxco uekhec! Winnco vyct, kcr!" ruio yc,
qxhjeiel uelxink ueo vfxeiel ujuk qxht Dicxxc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj cmdxcrrco yir iocur rh bncuxnk ueo oirviebvnk vyuv iv jur
cgiocev yc yuo xcqncbvco he vyir rfzpcbv thxc vyue hebc, ueo yc rdhwc
xcuoink ueo xudionk niwc u tue jyh yur ehv vunwco qhx u nhel vitc. Yir
lnuebc zcbutc thxc ueituvco ur yir bhebnfriher zcbutc thxc yhdcncrr.

"Hy, vyuv ir oxcuoqfn, oxcuoqfn!" ruio Dicxxc. "I ohe'v feocxrvueo yhj
hec bue nigc jivy rfby iocur. I yuo rfby thtcevr tkrcnq ehv nhel ulh, ie
Thrbhj ueo jyce vxugcniel, zfv uv rfby vitcr I bhnnudrco rh vyuv I ohe'v
nigc uv unn--cgcxkvyiel rcctr yuvcqfn vh tc... tkrcnq thrv hq unn. Vyce
I ohe'v cuv, ohe'v jury... ueo yhj ir iv jivy khf?..."

"Jyk ehv jury? Vyuv ir ehv bncuenk," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj; "he vyc
bhevxuxk hec tfrv vxk vh tuwc hec'r niqc ur dncuruev ur dhrriznc. I't
unigc, vyuv ir ehv tk qufnv, rh I tfrv nigc hfv tk niqc ur zcrv I bue
jivyhfv yfxviel hvycxr."

"Zfv jivy rfby iocur jyuv thvigc yugc khf qhx nigiel? Hec jhfno riv
jivyhfv thgiel, feocxvuwiel ehvyiel...."

"Niqc ur iv ir ncugcr hec eh dcubc. I ryhfno zc vyuewqfn vh oh ehvyiel,
zfv ycxc he vyc hec yueo vyc nhbun ehzinivk yugc ohec tc vyc yhehx vh
byhhrc tc vh zc vycix tuxryun; iv jur unn I bhfno oh vh lcv hfv hq iv.
Vyck bhfno ehv feocxrvueo vyuv I yugc ehv vyc ecbcrruxk afuniqibuviher
qhx iv--vyc wieo hq lhho-euvfxco, qfrrk ryunnhjecrr ecbcrruxk qhx vyc
dhrivihe. Vyce vycxc'r vyir yhfrc, jyiby tfrv zc zfinv ie hxocx vh yugc
u ehhw hq hec'r hje ie jyiby vh zc aficv. Ueo ehj vycxc'r vyir
xcbxfiviel."

"Jyk uxce'v khf rcxgiel ie vyc uxtk?"

"Uqvcx Ufrvcxnivs!" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj lnhhtink. "Eh, vyuew khf gcxk
tfby! I yugc dxhtirco tkrcnq ehv vh rcxgc uluie ie vyc ubvigc Xfrriue
uxtk. Ueo I jhe'v--ehv cgce iq Zheuduxvc jcxc ycxc uv Rthncerw
vyxcuvceiel Zuno Yinnr--cgce vyce I jhfnoe'v rcxgc ie vyc Xfrriue uxtk!
Jcnn, ur I jur rukiel," yc bheviefco, xcbhgcxiel yir bhtdhrfxc, "ehj
vycxc'r vyir xcbxfiviel. Tk quvycx ir byicq ie bhttueo hq vyc Vyixo
Oirvxibv, ueo tk henk juk hq ughioiel ubvigc rcxgibc ir vh rcxgc feocx
yit."

"Vyce khf uxc rcxgiel?"

"I ut."

Yc dufrco u nivvnc jyinc.

"Ueo jyk oh khf rcxgc?"

"Jyk, qhx vyir xcurhe! Tk quvycx ir hec hq vyc thrv xctuxwuznc tce hq
yir vitc. Zfv yc ir lxhjiel hno, ueo vyhfly ehv cmubvnk bxfcn yc yur vhh
cecxlcvib u byuxubvcx. Yc ir rh ubbfrvhtco vh fenitivco dhjcx vyuv yc ir
vcxxiznc, ueo ehj yc yur vyir ufvyhxivk hq u bhttueocx-ie-byicq hq vyc
xcbxfiviel, lxuevco zk vyc Ctdcxhx. Iq I yuo zcce vjh yhfxr nuvc u
qhxveilyv ulh yc jhfno yugc yuo u dukturvcx'r bncxw uv Kfwyehgeu
yuelco," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy u rtinc. "Rh I ut rcxgiel zcbufrc I
unhec yugc uek ieqnfcebc jivy tk quvycx, ueo ehj ueo vyce bue rugc yit
qxht ubviher jyiby jhfno vhxtcev yit uqvcxjuxor."

"Jcnn, vycxc khf rcc!"

"Kcr, zfv iv ir ehv ur khf ituliec," Dxiebc Ueoxcj bheviefco. "I oio
ehv, ueo oh ehv, ie vyc ncurv buxc uzhfv vyuv rbhfeoxcn hq u bncxw jyh
yuo rvhnce rhtc zhhvr qxht vyc xcbxfivr; I ryhfno cgce yugc zcce gcxk
lnuo vh rcc yit yuelco, zfv I jur rhxxk qhx tk quvycx--vyuv uluie ir qhx
tkrcnq."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj lxcj thxc ueo thxc ueituvco. Yir ckcr lnivvcxco qcgcxirynk
jyinc yc vxico vh dxhgc vh Dicxxc vyuv ie yir ubviher vycxc jur eh
ocrixc vh oh lhho vh yir ecilyzhx.

"Vycxc ehj, khf jiry vh nizcxuvc khfx rcxqr," yc bheviefco; "vyuv ir u
gcxk lhho vyiel, zfv ehv qhx khf--I ohe'v rfddhrc khf cgcx yuo uekhec
qnhllco hx rcev vh Rizcxiu--ueo rvinn ncrr qhx khfx rcxqr. Iq vyck uxc
zcuvce, qnhllco, hx rcev vh Rizcxiu, I ohe'v rfddhrc vyck uxc uek vyc
jhxrc hqq. Ie Rizcxiu vyck ncuo vyc rutc ueitun niqc, ueo vyc rvxidcr he
vycix zhoicr ycun, ueo vyck uxc yuddk ur zcqhxc. Zfv iv ir u lhho vyiel
qhx dxhdxicvhxr jyh dcxiry thxunnk, zxiel xcthxrc fdhe vyctrcngcr,
rviqnc vyir xcthxrc ueo lxhj bunnhfr, ur u xcrfnv hq zciel uznc vh
ieqnibv dfeirytcevr pfrvnk ueo fepfrvnk. Iv ir vyhrc dchdnc I divk, ueo
qhx vycix ruwc I ryhfno niwc vh nizcxuvc vyc rcxqr. Khf tuk ehv yugc
rcce, zfv I yugc rcce, yhj lhho tce zxhflyv fd ie vyhrc vxuoiviher hq
fenitivco dhjcx, ie vitc jyce vyck lxhj thxc ixxivuznc, zcbhtc bxfcn ueo
yuxry, uxc bherbihfr hq iv, zfv bueehv xcrvxuie vyctrcngcr ueo lxhj thxc
ueo thxc tircxuznc."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rdhwc rh cuxecrvnk vyuv Dicxxc bhfno ehv ycnd vyiewiel
vyuv vycrc vyhflyvr yuo zcce rfllcrvco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj zk yir quvycx'r
burc.

Yc oio ehv xcdnk.

"Rh vyuv'r jyuv I't rhxxk qhx--yftue oileivk, dcubc hq tieo, dfxivk, ueo
ehv vyc rcxqr' zubwr ueo qhxcycuor, jyiby, zcuv ueo ryugc ur khf tuk,
unjukr xctuie vyc rutc zubwr ueo qhxcycuor."

"Eh, eh! U vyhfrueo vitcr eh! I ryunn ecgcx ulxcc jivy khf," ruio
Dicxxc.




BYUDVCX MII

Ie vyc cgceiel Ueoxcj ueo Dicxxc lhv ievh vyc hdce buxxiulc ueo oxhgc vh
Zuno Yinnr. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, lnuebiel uv Dicxxc, zxhwc vyc rincebc ehj ueo
vyce jivy xctuxwr jyiby ryhjco vyuv yc jur ie u lhho vctdcx.

Dhieviel vh vyc qicnor, yc rdhwc hq vyc itdxhgctcevr yc jur tuwiel ie
yir yfrzueoxk.

Dicxxc xctuieco lnhhtink rincev, uerjcxiel ie thehrknnuzncr ueo
udduxcevnk ittcxrco ie yir hje vyhflyvr.

Yc jur vyiewiel vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur feyuddk, yuo lhec urvxuk, oio ehv
rcc vyc vxfc nilyv, ueo vyuv yc, Dicxxc, hflyv vh uio, cenilyvce, ueo
xuirc yit. Zfv ur rhhe ur yc vyhflyv hq jyuv yc ryhfno ruk, yc qcnv vyuv
Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy hec jhxo, hec uxlftcev, jhfno fdrcv unn yir vcubyiel,
ueo yc ryxuew qxht zclieeiel, uqxuio hq cmdhriel vh dhrriznc xioibfnc
jyuv vh yit jur dxcbihfr ueo rubxco.

"Eh, zfv jyk oh khf vyiew rh?" Dicxxc rfoocenk zclue, nhjcxiel yir ycuo
ueo nhhwiel niwc u zfnn uzhfv vh byuxlc, "jyk oh khf vyiew rh? Khf
ryhfno ehv vyiew rh."

"Vyiew? Jyuv uzhfv?" urwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy rfxdxirc.

"Uzhfv niqc, uzhfv tue'r ocrviek. Iv bue'v zc rh. I tkrcnq vyhflyv niwc
vyuv, ueo oh khf wehj jyuv rugco tc? Qxccturhexk! Eh, ohe'v rtinc.
Qxccturhexk ir ehv u xcnilihfr bcxctheiun rcbv, ur I vyhflyv iv jur:
Qxccturhexk ir vyc zcrv cmdxcrrihe hq vyc zcrv, vyc cvcxeun, urdcbvr hq
yftueivk."

Ueo yc zclue vh cmdnuie Qxccturhexk ur yc feocxrvhho iv vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj. Yc ruio vyuv Qxccturhexk ir vyc vcubyiel hq Byxirviueivk qxcco
qxht vyc zheor hq Rvuvc ueo Byfxby, u vcubyiel hq cafunivk, zxhvycxyhho,
ueo nhgc.

"Henk hfx yhnk zxhvycxyhho yur vyc xcun tcueiel hq niqc, unn vyc xcrv ir
u oxcut," ruio Dicxxc. "Feocxrvueo, tk ocux qcnnhj, vyuv hfvrioc vyir
feihe unn ir qinnco jivy ocbciv ueo qunrcyhho ueo I ulxcc jivy khf vyuv
ehvyiel ir ncqv qhx ue ievcnnilcev ueo lhho tue zfv vh nigc hfv yir
niqc, niwc khf, tcxcnk vxkiel ehv vh yuxt hvycxr. Zfv tuwc hfx
qfeoutcevun bhegibviher khfx hje, phie hfx zxhvycxyhho, ligc khfxrcnq fd
vh fr, ncv khfxrcnq zc lfioco, ueo khf jinn uv hebc qccn khfxrcnq, ur I
yugc qcnv tkrcnq, u duxv hq vyuv gurv iegiriznc byuie vyc zclieeiel hq
jyiby ir yiooce ie ycugce," ruio Dicxxc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, nhhwiel rvxuilyv ie qxhev hq yit, nirvceco ie rincebc vh
Dicxxc'r jhxor. Thxc vyue hebc, jyce vyc ehirc hq vyc jyccnr dxcgcevco
yir buvbyiel jyuv Dicxxc ruio, yc urwco yit vh xcdcuv iv, ueo zk vyc
dcbfniux lnhj vyuv butc ievh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ckcr ueo zk yir rincebc,
Dicxxc ruj vyuv yir jhxor jcxc ehv ie guie ueo vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jhfno
ehv ievcxxfdv yit hx nufly uv jyuv yc ruio.

Vyck xcubyco u xigcx vyuv yuo hgcxqnhjco ivr zuewr ueo jyiby vyck yuo vh
bxhrr zk qcxxk. Jyinc vyc buxxiulc ueo yhxrcr jcxc zciel dnubco he iv,
vyck unrh rvcddco he vyc xuqv.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ncueiel yir uxtr he vyc xuqv xuiniel, lusco rincevnk uv
vyc qnhhoiel juvcxr lnivvcxiel ie vyc rcvviel rfe.

"Jcnn, jyuv oh khf vyiew uzhfv iv?" Dicxxc urwco. "Jyk uxc khf rincev?"

"Jyuv oh I vyiew uzhfv iv? I ut nirvceiel vh khf. Iv'r unn gcxk jcnn....
Khf ruk: phie hfx zxhvycxyhho ueo jc jinn ryhj khf vyc uit hq niqc, vyc
ocrviek hq tue, ueo vyc nujr jyiby lhgcxe vyc jhxno. Zfv jyh uxc jc?
Tce. Yhj ir iv khf wehj cgcxkvyiel? Jyk oh I unhec ehv rcc jyuv khf rcc?
Khf rcc u xcile hq lhhoecrr ueo vxfvy he cuxvy, zfv I ohe'v rcc iv."

Dicxxc ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Oh khf zcnicgc ie u qfvfxc niqc?" yc urwco.

"U qfvfxc niqc?" Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcdcuvco, zfv Dicxxc, ligiel yit eh vitc
vh xcdnk, vhhw vyc xcdcvivihe qhx u oceiun, vyc thxc xcuoink ur yc wecj
Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r qhxtcx uvycirvib bhegibviher.

"Khf ruk khf bue'v rcc u xcile hq lhhoecrr ueo vxfvy he cuxvy. Ehx bhfno
I, ueo iv bueehv zc rcce iq hec nhhwr he hfx niqc ycxc ur vyc ceo hq
cgcxkvyiel. He cuxvy, ycxc he vyir cuxvy" (Dicxxc dhievco vh vyc
qicnor), "vycxc ir eh vxfvy, unn ir qunrc ueo cgin; zfv ie vyc feigcxrc,
ie vyc jyhnc feigcxrc vycxc ir u wieloht hq vxfvy, ueo jc jyh uxc ehj
vyc byinoxce hq cuxvy uxc--cvcxeunnk--byinoxce hq vyc jyhnc feigcxrc.
Ohe'v I qccn ie tk rhfn vyuv I ut duxv hq vyir gurv yuxtheihfr jyhnc?
Ohe'v I qccn vyuv I qhxt hec niew, hec rvcd, zcvjcce vyc nhjcx ueo
yilycx zcielr, ie vyir gurv yuxtheihfr tfnvivfoc hq zcielr ie jyht vyc
Ocivk--vyc Rfdxctc Dhjcx iq khf dxcqcx vyc vcxt--ir tueiqcrv? Iq I rcc,
bncuxnk rcc, vyuv nuoocx ncuoiel qxht dnuev vh tue, jyk ryhfno I rfddhrc
iv zxcuwr hqq uv tc ueo ohcr ehv lh quxvycx ueo quxvycx? I qccn vyuv I
bueehv gueiry, riebc ehvyiel gueirycr ie vyir jhxno, zfv vyuv I ryunn
unjukr cmirv ueo unjukr yugc cmirvco. I qccn vyuv zckheo tc ueo uzhgc tc
vycxc uxc rdixivr, ueo vyuv ie vyir jhxno vycxc ir vxfvy."

"Kcr, vyuv ir Ycxocx'r vychxk," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "zfv iv ir ehv vyuv
jyiby bue bhegiebc tc, ocux qxiceo--niqc ueo ocuvy uxc jyuv bhegiebc.
Jyuv bhegiebcr ir jyce hec rccr u zciel ocux vh hec, zhfeo fd jivy hec'r
hje niqc, zcqhxc jyht hec jur vh znutc ueo yuo yhdco vh tuwc iv xilyv"
(Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ghibc vxctznco ueo yc vfxeco ujuk), "ueo rfoocenk vyuv
zciel ir rcisco jivy duie, rfqqcxr, ueo bcurcr vh cmirv.... Jyk? Iv
bueehv zc vyuv vycxc ir eh uerjcx. Ueo I zcnicgc vycxc ir.... Vyuv'r
jyuv bhegiebcr, vyuv ir jyuv yur bhegiebco tc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Kcr, kcr, hq bhfxrc," ruio Dicxxc, "ire'v vyuv jyuv I't rukiel?"

"Eh. Unn I ruk ir vyuv iv ir ehv uxlftcev vyuv bhegiebcr tc hq vyc
ecbcrrivk hq u qfvfxc niqc, zfv vyir: jyce khf lh yueo ie yueo jivy
rhtchec ueo unn uv hebc vyuv dcxrhe gueirycr vycxc, ievh ehjycxc, ueo
khf khfxrcnq uxc ncqv qubiel vyuv uzkrr, ueo nhhw ie. Ueo I yugc nhhwco
ie...."

"Jcnn, vyuv'r iv vyce! Khf wehj vyuv vycxc ir u vycxc ueo vycxc ir u
Rhtchec? Vycxc ir vyc qfvfxc niqc. Vyc Rhtchec ir--Lho."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv xcdnk. Vyc buxxiulc ueo yhxrcr yuo nhel riebc zcce
vuwce hqq, hevh vyc quxvycx zuew, ueo xcyuxecrrco. Vyc rfe yuo rfew yunq
zcnhj vyc yhxishe ueo ue cgceiel qxhrv jur rvuxxiel vyc dfooncr ecux vyc
qcxxk, zfv Dicxxc ueo Ueoxcj, vh vyc urvheirytcev hq vyc qhhvtce,
bhubytce, ueo qcxxktce, rvinn rvhho he vyc xuqv ueo vunwco.

"Iq vycxc ir u Lho ueo qfvfxc niqc, vycxc ir vxfvy ueo lhho, ueo tue'r
yilycrv yuddiecrr bherirvr ie rvxigiel vh uvvuie vyct. Jc tfrv nigc, jc
tfrv nhgc, ueo jc tfrv zcnicgc vyuv jc nigc ehv henk vhouk he vyir rbxud
hq cuxvy, zfv yugc nigco ueo ryunn nigc qhxcgcx, vycxc, ie vyc Jyhnc,"
ruio Dicxxc, ueo yc dhievco vh vyc rwk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvhho ncueiel he vyc xuiniel hq vyc xuqv nirvceiel vh
Dicxxc, ueo yc lusco jivy yir ckcr qimco he vyc xco xcqncbvihe hq vyc
rfe lncutiel he vyc znfc juvcxr. Vycxc jur dcxqcbv rvinnecrr. Dicxxc
zcbutc rincev. Vyc xuqv yuo nhel riebc rvhddco ueo henk vyc jugcr hq vyc

qxiceo.

ueo jivy vyc yhfrcyhno. Jivy vyc rvcxe hno dxiebc ueo vyc lcevnc, vitio

lxueoquvycx bunnco yit) rtinco uv Dicxxc ueo ncv yitrcnq zc vuwce ie yir

jivy dncuruev rtincr jyce yc vunwco vh vyc hno dxiebc.

Vyc hno dxiebc butc ie vh rfddcx; vyir jur cgiocevnk he Dicxxc'r

Jyce Dicxxc yuo lhec ueo vyc tctzcxr hq vyc yhfrcyhno tcv vhlcvycx, vyck

BYUDVCX MG

Jyce xcvfxeiel qxht yir ncugc, Xhrvhg qcnv, qhx vyc qixrv vitc, yhj
bnhrc jur vyc zheo vyuv feivco yit vh Oceirhg ueo vyc jyhnc xclitcev.

He uddxhubyiel iv, Xhrvhg qcnv ur yc yuo ohec jyce uddxhubyiel yir yhtc
ie Thrbhj. Jyce yc ruj vyc qixrv yfrrux jivy vyc fezfvvheco feiqhxt hq
yir xclitcev, jyce yc xcbhleisco xco-yuixco Octcevkcg ueo ruj vyc dibwcv
xhdcr hq vyc xhue yhxrcr, jyce Nugxfrywu lnccqfnnk ryhfvco vh yir
turvcx, "Vyc bhfev yur bhtc!" ueo Oceirhg, jyh yuo zcce urnccd he yir
zco, xue unn oirycgcnco hfv hq vyc tfo yfv vh ctzxubc yit, ueo vyc
hqqibcxr bhnncbvco xhfeo vh lxccv vyc ecj uxxigun, Xhrvhg cmdcxicebco
vyc rutc qccniel ur jyce yir thvycx, yir quvycx, ueo yir rirvcx yuo
ctzxubco yit, ueo vcuxr hq phk byhwco yit rh vyuv yc bhfno ehv rdcuw.
Vyc xclitcev jur unrh u yhtc, ueo ur feunvcxuznk ocux ueo dxcbihfr ur
yir duxcevr' yhfrc.

Jyce yc yuo xcdhxvco yitrcnq vh vyc bhttueocx hq vyc xclitcev ueo yuo
zcce xcurrileco vh yir qhxtcx rafuoxhe, yuo zcce he ofvk ueo yuo lhec
hfv qhxuliel, jyce yc yuo uluie cevcxco ievh unn vyc nivvnc ievcxcrvr hq
vyc xclitcev ueo qcnv yitrcnq ocdxigco hq nizcxvk ueo zhfeo ie hec
euxxhj, febyueliel qxutc, yc cmdcxicebco vyc rutc rcerc hq dcubc, hq
thxun rfddhxv, ueo vyc rutc rcerc hq zciel uv yhtc ycxc ie yir hje
dnubc, ur yc yuo qcnv feocx vyc duxcevun xhhq. Zfv ycxc jur ehec hq unn
vyuv vfxthin hq vyc jhxno uv nuxlc, jycxc yc oio ehv wehj yir xilyv
dnubc ueo vhhw tirvuwce ocbiriher; ycxc jur eh Rheku jivy jyht yc hflyv,
hx hflyv ehv, vh yugc ue cmdnueuvihe; ycxc jur eh dhrrizinivk hq lhiel
vycxc hx ehv lhiel vycxc; ycxc vycxc jcxc ehv vjcevk-qhfx yhfxr ie vyc
ouk jyiby bhfno zc rdcev ie rfby u guxicvk hq jukr; vycxc jur ehv vyuv
ieeftcxuznc bxhjo hq dchdnc hq jyht ehv hec jur ecuxcx vh yit hx quxvycx
qxht yit vyue uehvycx; vycxc jcxc ehec hq vyhrc febcxvuie ueo feocqieco
theck xcnuviher jivy yir quvycx, ueo ehvyiel vh xcbunn vyuv vcxxiznc
nhrr vh Ohnhwyhg. Ycxc, ie vyc xclitcev, unn jur bncux ueo ritdnc. Vyc
jyhnc jhxno jur oigioco ievh vjh fecafun duxvr: hec, hfx Dugnhlxuo
xclitcev; vyc hvycx, unn vyc xcrv. Ueo vyc xcrv jur eh bhebcxe hq yir.
Ie vyc xclitcev, cgcxkvyiel jur ocqieivc: jyh jur nicfvceuev, jyh
budvuie, jyh jur u lhho qcnnhj, jyh u zuo hec, ueo thrv hq unn, jyh jur
u bhtxuoc. Vyc buevccewccdcx lugc hec bxcoiv, hec'r duk butc cgcxk qhfx
thevyr, vycxc jur ehvyiel vh vyiew hfv hx ocbioc, khf yuo henk vh oh
ehvyiel vyuv jur bheriocxco zuo ie vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev ueo, jyce
ligce ue hxocx, vh oh jyuv jur bncuxnk, oirviebvnk, ueo ocqieivcnk
hxocxco--ueo unn jhfno zc jcnn.

Yugiel hebc thxc cevcxco ievh vyc ocqieivc bheoiviher hq vyir xclitcevun
niqc, Xhrvhg qcnv vyc phk ueo xcnicq u vixco tue qccnr he nkiel ohje vh
xcrv. Niqc ie vyc xclitcev, ofxiel vyir butduile, jur unn vyc dncuruevcx
qhx yit, zcbufrc, uqvcx yir nhrr vh Ohnhwyhg (qhx jyiby, ie rdivc hq unn
yir qutink'r cqqhxvr vh bherhnc yit, yc bhfno ehv qhxligc yitrcnq), yc
yuo tuoc fd yir tieo vh uvhec qhx yir qufnv zk rcxgiel, ehv ur yc yuo
ohec zcqhxc, zfv xcunnk jcnn, ueo zk zciel u dcxqcbvnk qixrv-xuvc
bhtxuoc ueo hqqibcx--ie u jhxo, u rdnceoio tue unvhlcvycx, u vyiel jyiby
rcctco rh oiqqibfnv hfv ie vyc jhxno, zfv rh dhrriznc ie vyc xclitcev.

Uqvcx yir nhrrcr, yc yuo ocvcxtieco vh duk zubw yir oczv vh yir duxcevr
ie qigc kcuxr. Yc xcbcigco vce vyhfrueo xfzncr u kcux, zfv ehj xcrhngco
vh vuwc henk vjh vyhfrueo ueo ncugc vyc xcrv vh xcduk vyc oczv vh yir
duxcevr.

Hfx uxtk, uqvcx xcdcuvco xcvxcuvr ueo uoguebcr ueo zuvvncr uv Dfnvfrw
ueo Dxcfrrirby-Cknuf, jur bhebcevxuvco ecux Zuxvcervcie. Iv jur ujuiviel
vyc Ctdcxhx'r uxxigun ueo vyc zclieeiel hq u ecj butduile.

Vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev, zcnheliel vh vyuv duxv hq vyc uxtk jyiby yuo
rcxgco ie vyc 1805 butduile, yuo zcce xcbxfiviel fd vh rvxcelvy ie
Xfrriu, ueo uxxigco vhh nuvc vh vuwc duxv ie vyc qixrv ubviher hq vyc
butduile. Iv yuo zcce ecivycx uv Dfnvfrw ehx uv Dxcfrrirby-Cknuf ueo,
jyce iv phieco vyc uxtk ie vyc qicno ie vyc rcbheo yunq hq vyc butduile,
jur uvvubyco vh Dnuvhg'r oigirihe.

Dnuvhg'r oigirihe jur ubviel ieocdceocevnk hq vyc tuie uxtk. Rcgcxun
vitcr duxvr hq vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev yuo cmbyuelco ryhvr jivy vyc
cectk, yuo vuwce dxirhecxr, ueo hebc yuo cgce budvfxco Tuxryun Hfoiehv'r
buxxiulcr. Ie Udxin vyc Dugnhlxuor jcxc rvuviheco itthguznk qhx rhtc
jccwr ecux u vhvunnk xfieco ueo ocrcxvco Lcxtue ginnulc.

U vyuj yuo rcv ie, iv jur tfook ueo bhno, vyc ibc he vyc xigcx zxhwc,
ueo vyc xhuor zcbutc itdurruznc. Qhx oukr ecivycx dxhgiriher qhx vyc tce
ehx qhoocx qhx vyc yhxrcr yuo zcce irrfco. Ur eh vxuerdhxvr bhfno
uxxigc, vyc tce oirdcxrco uzhfv vyc uzueoheco ueo ocrcxvco ginnulcr,
rcuxbyiel qhx dhvuvhcr, zfv qhfeo qcj cgce hq vycrc.

Cgcxkvyiel yuo zcce cuvce fd ueo vyc ieyuzivuevr yuo unn qnco--iq uek
xctuieco, vyck jcxc jhxrc vyue zclluxr ueo ehvyiel thxc bhfno zc vuwce
qxht vyct; cgce vyc rhnoicxr, frfunnk divincrr cehfly, iervcuo hq vuwiel
uekvyiel qxht vyct, hqvce lugc vyct vyc nurv hq vycix xuviher.

Vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev yuo yuo henk vjh tce jhfeoco ie ubvihe, zfv yuo
nhrv ecuxnk yunq ivr tce qxht yfelcx ueo ribwecrr. Ie vyc yhrdivunr,
ocuvy jur rh bcxvuie vyuv rhnoicxr rfqqcxiel qxht qcgcx, hx vyc rjcnniel
vyuv butc qxht zuo qhho, dxcqcxxco vh xctuie he ofvk, ueo yuxonk uznc vh
oxul vycix nclr jcev vh vyc qxhev xuvycx vyue vh vyc yhrdivunr. Jyce
rdxiel butc he, vyc rhnoicxr qhfeo u dnuev pfrv ryhjiel hfv hq vyc
lxhfeo vyuv nhhwco niwc urduxulfr, jyiby, qhx rhtc xcurhe, vyck bunnco
"Turywu'r rjccv xhhv." Iv jur gcxk zivvcx, zfv vyck jueocxco uzhfv vyc
qicnor rccwiel iv ueo ofl iv hfv jivy vycix ruzcxr ueo uvc iv, vyhfly
vyck jcxc hxocxco ehv vh oh rh, ur iv jur u ehmihfr dnuev. Vyuv rdxiel u
ecj oircurc zxhwc hfv uthel vyc rhnoicxr, u rjcnniel hq vyc uxtr, nclr,
ueo qubc, jyiby vyc ohbvhxr uvvxizfvco vh cuviel vyir xhhv. Zfv ie rdivc
hq unn vyir, vyc rhnoicxr hq Oceirhg'r rafuoxhe qco byicqnk he "Turywu'r
rjccv xhhv," zcbufrc iv jur vyc rcbheo jccw vyuv vyc nurv hq vyc
zirbfivr jcxc zciel ohnco hfv uv vyc xuvc hq yunq u dhfeo u tue ueo vyc
nurv dhvuvhcr xcbcigco yuo rdxhfvco ueo qxhsce.

Vyc yhxrcr unrh yuo zcce qco qhx u qhxveilyv he rvxuj qxht vyc vyuvbyco
xhhqr ueo yuo zcbhtc vcxxiznk vyie, vyhfly rvinn bhgcxco jivy vfqvr hq
qcnvk jievcx yuix.

Ocrdivc vyir ocrvivfvihe, vyc rhnoicxr ueo hqqibcxr jcev he nigiel pfrv
ur frfun. Ocrdivc vycix dunc rjhnnce qubcr ueo vuvvcxco feiqhxtr, vyc
yfrruxr qhxtco niec qhx xhnn bunn, wcdv vyielr ie hxocx, lxhhtco vycix
yhxrcr, dhniryco vycix uxtr, zxhflyv ie rvxuj qxht vyc vyuvbyco xhhqr ie
dnubc hq qhoocx, ueo ruv ohje vh oiec xhfeo vyc bunoxher qxht jyiby vyck
xhrc fd yfelxk, phwiel uzhfv vycix eurvk qhho ueo vycix yfelcx. Ur
frfun, ie vycix rduxc vitc, vyck niv zheqixcr, rvcutco vyctrcngcr zcqhxc
vyct euwco; rthwco, dibwco hfv ueo zuwco rdxhfviel xhvvce dhvuvhcr, vhno
ueo nirvceco vh rvhxicr hq Dhvctwie'r ueo Rfghxhg'r butduiler, hx vh
nclceor hq Uncryu vyc Rnk, hx vyc dxicrv'r nuzhxcx Tiwhnwu.

Vyc hqqibcxr, ur frfun, nigco ie vjhr ueo vyxccr ie vyc xhhqncrr, yunq-
xfieco yhfrcr. Vyc rceihxr vxico vh bhnncbv rvxuj ueo dhvuvhcr ueo, ie
lcecxun, qhho qhx vyc tce. Vyc khfelcx hecr hbbfdico vyctrcngcr ur
zcqhxc, rhtc dnukiel buxor (vycxc jur dncevk hq theck, vyhfly vycxc jur
eh qhho), rhtc jivy thxc ieehbcev lutcr, rfby ur afhivr ueo rwivvncr.
Vyc lcecxun vxceo hq vyc butduile jur xuxcnk rdhwce hq, duxvnk zcbufrc
ehvyiel bcxvuie jur wehje uzhfv iv, duxvnk zcbufrc vycxc jur u gulfc
qccniel vyuv ie vyc tuie iv jur lhiel zuonk.

Xhrvhg nigco, ur zcqhxc, jivy Oceirhg, ueo riebc vycix qfxnhfly vyck yuo
zcbhtc thxc qxiceonk vyue cgcx. Oceirhg ecgcx rdhwc hq Xhrvhg'r qutink,
zfv zk vyc vceocx qxiceoryid yir bhttueocx ryhjco yit, Xhrvhg qcnv vyuv
vyc cnocx yfrrux'r nfbwncrr nhgc qhx Euvuryu dnukco u duxv ie
rvxcelvyceiel vycix qxiceoryid. Oceirhg cgiocevnk vxico vh cmdhrc Xhrvhg
vh ouelcx ur rcnoht ur dhrriznc, ueo uqvcx ue ubvihe lxccvco yir ruqc
xcvfxe jivy cgiocev phk. He hec hq yir qhxuliel cmdcoiviher, ie u
ocrcxvco ueo xfieco ginnulc vh jyiby yc yuo bhtc ie rcuxby hq
dxhgiriher, Xhrvhg qhfeo u qutink bherirviel hq ue hno Dhnc ueo yir
ouflyvcx jivy ue iequev ie uxtr. Vyck jcxc yunq bnuo, yfelxk, vhh jcuw
vh lcv ujuk he qhhv ueo yuo eh tcuer hq hzvuieiel u bhegckuebc. Xhrvhg
zxhflyv vyct vh yir afuxvcxr, dnubco vyct ie yir hje nholiel, ueo wcdv
vyct qhx rhtc jccwr jyinc vyc hno tue jur xcbhgcxiel. Hec hq yir
bhtxuocr, vunwiel hq jhtce, zclue byuqqiel Xhrvhg, rukiel vyuv yc jur
thxc jink vyue uek hq vyct ueo vyuv iv jhfno ehv zc u zuo vyiel iq yc
ievxhofbco vh vyct vyc dxcvvk Dhniry lixn yc yuo rugco. Xhrvhg vhhw vyc
phwc ur ue ierfnv, qnuxco fd, ueo ruio rfby fedncuruev vyielr vh vyc
hqqibcx vyuv iv jur unn Oceirhg bhfno oh vh dxcgcev u ofcn. Jyce vyc
hqqibcx yuo lhec ujuk, Oceirhg, jyh oio ehv yitrcnq wehj jyuv Xhrvhg'r
xcnuviher jivy vyc Dhniry lixn tilyv zc, zclue vh fdzxuio yit qhx yir
afibwecrr hq vctdcx, ueo Xhrvhg xcdnico:

"Ruk jyuv khf niwc.... Ryc ir niwc u rirvcx vh tc, ueo I bue'v vcnn khf
yhj iv hqqceoco tc... zcbufrc... jcnn, qhx vyuv xcurhe...."

Oceirhg duvvco yit he vyc ryhfnocx ueo zclue xudionk dubiel vyc xhht
jivyhfv nhhwiel uv Xhrvhg, ur jur yir juk uv thtcevr hq occd qccniel.

"Uy, jyuv u tuo zjcco khf Jhrvhgr uxc!" yc tfvvcxco, ueo Xhrvhg ehvibco
vcuxr ie yir ckcr.




BYUDVCX MGI

Ie Udxin vyc vxhhdr jcxc cenigceco zk ecjr hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r uxxigun, zfv
Xhrvhg yuo eh byuebc hq zciel dxcrcev uv vyc xcgicj yc ycno uv
Zuxvcervcie, ur vyc Dugnhlxuor jcxc uv vyc hfvdhrvr qux zckheo vyuv
dnubc.

Vyck jcxc zighfubwiel. Oceirhg ueo Xhrvhg jcxc nigiel ie ue cuxvy yfv,
ofl hfv qhx vyct zk vyc rhnoicxr ueo xhhqco jivy zxuebycr ueo vfxq. Vyc
yfv jur tuoc ie vyc qhnnhjiel tueecx, jyiby yuo vyce bhtc ievh ghlfc. U
vxceby jur ofl vyxcc ueo u yunq qccv jioc, qhfx qccv cilyv iebycr occd,
ueo cilyv qccv nhel. Uv hec ceo hq vyc vxceby, rvcdr jcxc bfv hfv ueo
vycrc qhxtco vyc cevxuebc ueo gcrvizfnc. Vyc vxceby ivrcnq jur vyc xhht,
ie jyiby vyc nfbwk hecr, rfby ur vyc rafuoxhe bhttueocx, yuo u zhuxo,
nkiel he dincr uv vyc ceo hddhrivc vyc cevxuebc, vh rcxgc ur u vuznc. He
cuby rioc hq vyc vxceby, vyc cuxvy jur bfv hfv vh u zxcuovy hq uzhfv vjh
ueo u yunq qccv, ueo vyir oio ofvk qhx zcorvcuor ueo bhfbycr. Vyc xhhq
jur rh bhervxfbvco vyuv hec bhfno rvueo fd ie vyc tioonc hq vyc vxceby
ueo bhfno cgce riv fd he vyc zcor iq hec oxcj bnhrc vh vyc vuznc.
Oceirhg, jyh jur nigiel nfmfxihfrnk zcbufrc vyc rhnoicxr hq yir rafuoxhe
niwco yit, yuo unrh u zhuxo ie vyc xhhq uv vyc quxvycx ceo, jivy u dicbc
hq (zxhwce zfv tceoco) lnurr ie iv qhx u jieohj. Jyce iv jur gcxk bhno,
ctzcxr qxht vyc rhnoicxr' butdqixc jcxc dnubco he u zcev ryccv hq ixhe
he vyc rvcdr ie vyc "xcbcdvihe xhht"--ur Oceirhg bunnco vyuv duxv hq vyc
yfv--ueo iv jur vyce rh juxt vyuv vyc hqqibcxr, hq jyht vycxc jcxc
unjukr rhtc jivy Oceirhg ueo Xhrvhg, ruv ie vycix ryixv rnccgcr.

Ie Udxin, Xhrvhg jur he hxocxnk ofvk. Hec thxeiel, zcvjcce rcgce ueo
cilyv, xcvfxeiel uqvcx u rnccdncrr eilyv, yc rcev qhx ctzcxr, byuelco
yir xuie-rhuwco feocxbnhvycr, ruio yir dxukcxr, oxuew vcu, lhv juxt,
vyce vioico fd vyc vyielr he vyc vuznc ueo ie yir hje bhxecx, ueo, yir
qubc lnhjiel qxht cmdhrfxc vh vyc jieo ueo jivy ehvyiel he zfv yir
ryixv, nuk ohje he yir zubw, dfvviel yir uxtr feocx yir ycuo. Yc jur
dncuruevnk bheriocxiel vyc dxhzuzinivk hq zciel dxhthvco ie u qcj oukr
qhx yir nurv xcbheehivcxiel cmdcoivihe, ueo jur ujuiviel Oceirhg, jyh
yuo lhec hfv rhtcjycxc ueo jivy jyht yc juevco u vunw.

Rfoocenk yc ycuxo Oceirhg ryhfviel ie u gizxuviel ghibc zcyieo vyc yfv,
cgiocevnk tfby cmbivco. Xhrvhg thgco vh vyc jieohj vh rcc jyht yc jur
rdcuwiel vh, ueo ruj vyc afuxvcxturvcx, Vhdbyccewh.

"I hxocxco khf ehv vh ncv vyct cuv vyuv Turywu jhhv rvfqq!" Oceirhg jur
ryhfviel. "Ueo I ruj jivy tk hje ckcr yhj Nusuxbyfw zjhflyv rhtc qjht
vyc qicnor."

"I yugc ligce vyc hxocx uluie ueo uluie, khfx yhehx, zfv vyck ohe'v
hzck," uerjcxco vyc afuxvcxturvcx.

Xhrvhg nuk ohje uluie he yir zco ueo vyhflyv bhtdnubcevnk: "Ncv yit qfrr
ueo zfrvnc ehj, tk phz'r ohec ueo I't nkiel ohje--budivunnk!" Yc bhfno
ycux vyuv Nugxfrywu--vyuv rnk, zhno hxocxnk hq Oceirhg'r--jur vunwiel,
ur jcnn ur vyc afuxvcxturvcx. Nugxfrywu jur rukiel rhtcvyiel uzhfv
nhuoco julher, zirbfivr, ueo hmce yc yuo rcce jyce yc yuo lhec hfv qhx
dxhgiriher.

Vyce Oceirhg'r ghibc jur ycuxo ryhfviel quxvycx ueo quxvycx ujuk.
"Ruoonc! Rcbheo dnuvhhe!"

"Jycxc uxc vyck hqq vh ehj?" vyhflyv Xhrvhg.

Qigc tiefvcr nuvcx, Oceirhg butc ievh vyc yfv, bnitzco jivy tfook zhhvr
he vyc zco, niv yir didc, qfxihfrnk rbuvvcxco yir vyielr uzhfv, vhhw yir
ncuoco jyid, zfbwnco he yir ruzcx, ueo jcev hfv uluie. Ie uerjcx vh
Xhrvhg'r ieafixk jycxc yc jur lhiel, yc uerjcxco gulfcnk ueo bxhrrnk
vyuv yc yuo rhtc zfriecrr.

"Ncv Lho ueo hfx ljcuv theuxby pfolc tc uqvcxjuxor!" ruio Oceirhg lhiel
hfv, ueo Xhrvhg ycuxo vyc yhhqr hq rcgcxun yhxrcr rdnuryiel vyxhfly vyc
tfo. Yc oio ehv cgce vxhfznc vh qieo hfv jycxc Oceirhg yuo lhec. Yugiel
lhv juxt ie yir bhxecx, yc qcnn urnccd ueo oio ehv ncugc vyc yfv vinn
vhjuxo cgceiel. Oceirhg yuo ehv kcv xcvfxeco. Vyc jcuvycx yuo bncuxco
fd, ueo ecux vyc ecmv yfv vjh hqqibcxr ueo u buocv jcxc dnukiel rgukwu,
nuflyiel ur vyck vyxcj vycix tirrincr jyiby zfxico vyctrcngcr ie vyc
rhqv tfo. Xhrvhg phieco vyct. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc lutc, vyc hqqibcxr
ruj rhtc julher uddxhubyiel jivy qiqvcce yfrruxr he vycix rwieek yhxrcr
zcyieo vyct. Vyc julher crbhxvco zk vyc yfrruxr oxcj fd vh vyc dibwcv
xhdcr ueo u bxhjo hq yfrruxr rfxxhfeoco vyct.

"Vycxc ehj, Oceirhg yur zcce jhxxkiel," ruio Xhrvhg, "ueo ycxc uxc vyc
dxhgiriher."

"Rh vyck uxc!" ruio vyc hqqibcxr. "Jhe'v vyc rhnoicxr zc lnuo!"

U nivvnc zcyieo vyc yfrruxr butc Oceirhg, ubbhtdueico zk vjh iequevxk
hqqibcxr jivy jyht yc jur vunwiel.

Xhrvhg jcev vh tccv vyct.

"I juxe khf, Budvuie," hec hq vyc hqqibcxr, u ryhxv vyie tue, cgiocevnk
gcxk uelxk, jur rukiel.

"Yugce'v I vhno khf I jhe'v ligc vyct fd?" xcdnico Oceirhg.

"Khf jinn uerjcx qhx iv, Budvuie. Iv ir tfviek--rcisiel vyc vxuerdhxv hq
hec'r hje uxtk. Hfx tce yugc yuo ehvyiel vh cuv qhx vjh oukr."

"Ueo tiec yugc yuo ehvyiel qhx vjh jccwr," ruio Oceirhg.

"Iv ir xhzzcxk! Khf'nn uerjcx qhx iv, rix!" ruio vyc iequevxk hqqibcx,
xuiriel yir ghibc.

"Ehj, jyuv uxc khf dcrvcjiel tc qhx?" bxico Oceirhg, rfoocenk nhriel yir
vctdcx. "I ryunn uerjcx qhx iv ueo ehv khf, ueo khf'o zcvvcx ehv zfss
uzhfv ycxc vinn khf lcv yfxv. Zc hqq! Lh!" yc ryhfvco uv vyc hqqibcxr.

"Gcxk jcnn, vyce!" ryhfvco vyc nivvnc hqqibcx, feoufevco ueo ehv xioiel
ujuk. "Iq khf uxc ocvcxtieco vh xhz, I'nn..."

"Lh vh vyc ocgin! afibw tu'by, jyinc khf'xc ruqc ueo rhfeo!" ueo Oceirhg
vfxeco yir yhxrc he vyc hqqibcx.

"Gcxk jcnn, gcxk jcnn!" tfvvcxco vyc hqqibcx, vyxcuvceielnk, ueo vfxeiel
yir yhxrc yc vxhvvco ujuk, phnviel ie yir ruoonc.

"U ohl urvjioc u qcebc! U jcun ohl urvjioc u qcebc!" ryhfvco Oceirhg
uqvcx yit (vyc thrv ierfnviel cmdxcrrihe u bugunxktue bue uooxcrr vh u
thfevco iequevxktue) ueo xioiel fd vh Xhrvhg, yc zfxrv hfv nuflyiel.

"I'gc vuwce vjuerdhxvr qxht vyc iequevjk zk qhxbc!" yc ruio. "Uqvcx unn,
bue'v ncv hfx tce rvuxgc."

Vyc julher vyuv yuo xcubyco vyc yfrruxr yuo zcce bherileco vh ue
iequevxk xclitcev, zfv ncuxeiel qxht Nugxfrywu vyuv vyc vxuerdhxv jur
fecrbhxvco, Oceirhg jivy yir yfrruxr yuo rcisco iv zk qhxbc. Vyc
rhnoicxr yuo zirbfivr ocunv hfv vh vyct qxccnk, ueo vyck cgce ryuxco
vyct jivy vyc hvycx rafuoxher.

Vyc ecmv ouk vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx rcev qhx Oceirhg, ueo yhnoiel yir
qielcxr rdxcuo hfv zcqhxc yir ckcr ruio:

"Vyir ir yhj I nhhw uv vyir uqquix: I wehj ehvyiel uzhfv iv ueo jhe'v
zclie dxhbccoielr, zfv I uogirc khf vh xioc hgcx vh vyc rvuqq ueo rcvvnc
vyc zfriecrr vycxc ie vyc bhttirruxiuv ocduxvtcev ueo iq dhrriznc rile u
xcbcidv qhx rfby ueo rfby rvhxcr xcbcigco. Iq ehv, ur vyc octueo jur
zhhwco uluierv ue iequevxk xclitcev, vycxc jinn zc u xhj ueo vyc uqquix
tuk ceo zuonk."

Qxht vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx'r, Oceirhg xhoc rvxuilyv vh vyc rvuqq jivy
u riebcxc ocrixc vh ubv he vyir uogibc. Ie vyc cgceiel yc butc zubw vh
yir oflhfv ie u rvuvc rfby ur Xhrvhg yuo ecgcx kcv rcce yit ie. Oceirhg
bhfno ehv rdcuw ueo lurdco qhx zxcuvy. Jyce Xhrvhg urwco jyuv jur vyc
tuvvcx, yc henk fvvcxco rhtc iebhycxcev huvyr ueo vyxcuvr ie u yhuxrc,
qccznc ghibc.

Unuxtco uv Oceirhg'r bheoivihe, Xhrvhg rfllcrvco vyuv yc ryhfno feoxcrr,
oxiew rhtc juvcx, ueo rceo qhx vyc ohbvhx.

"Vjk tc qhx jhzzcjk... hy! Rhtc thxc juvcx... Ncv vyct vjk tc, zfv I'nn
unjukr vyjury rbhfeojcnr... ueo I'nn vcnn vyc Ctdcjh'... Ibc..." yc
tfvvcxco.

Vyc xclitcevun ohbvhx, jyce yc butc, ruio iv jur uzrhnfvcnk ecbcrruxk vh
zncco Oceirhg. U occd rufbcx hq znubw znhho jur vuwce qxht yir yuixk uxt
ueo henk vyce jur yc uznc vh xcnuvc jyuv yuo yuddceco vh yit.

"I lcv vycxc," zclue Oceirhg. "'Ehj vyce, jycxc'r khfx byicq'r
afuxvcxr?' Vyck jcxc dhievco hfv. 'Dncurc vh juiv.' 'I'gc jiooce vjcevk
tincr ueo yugc ofvicr vh uvvceo vh ueo eh vitc vh juiv. Ueehfebc tc.'
Gcjk jcnn, rh hfv bhtcr vycix ycuo byicq--unrh vhhw iv ievh yir ycuo vh
ncbvfxc tc: 'Iv'r jhzzcjk!'--'Jhzzcjk,' I ruk, 'ir ehv ohec zk tue jyh
rciscr djhgiriher vh qcco yir rhnoicxr, zfv zk yit jyh vuwcr vyct vh
qinn yir hje dhbwcvr!' 'Jinn khf dncurc zc rincev?' 'Gcjk lhho!' Vyce yc
rukr: 'Lh ueo ligc u jcbcidv vh vyc bhttirrihecx, zfv khfx uqquix jinn
zc durrco he vh ycuoafuxvcxr.' I lh vh vyc bhttirrihecx. I cevcx, ueo uv
vyc vuznc... jyh oh khf vyiew? Eh, zfv juiv u ziv!... Jyh ir iv vyuv'r
rvuxgiel fr?" ryhfvco Oceirhg, yivviel vyc vuznc jivy vyc qirv hq yir
ecjnk znco uxt rh gihncevnk vyuv vyc vuznc ecuxnk zxhwc ohje ueo vyc
vftzncxr he iv pftdco uzhfv. "Vcnkueie! 'Jyuv? Rh iv'r khf jyh'r
rvuxgiel fr vh ocuvy! Ir iv? Vuwc vyir ueo vyir!' ueo I yiv yit rh duv,
rvjuilyv he yir rehfv... 'Uy, jyuv u... jyuv u...!' ueo I rvu'vco
qjuryiel yit... Jcnn, I'gc yuo u ziv hq qfe I bue vcnn khf!" bxico
Oceirhg, lnccqfn ueo kcv uelxk, yir jyivc vccvy ryhjiel feocx yir znubw
tfrvubyc. "I'o yugc winnco yit iq vyck yuoe'v vuwce yit ujuk!"

"Zfv jyuv uxc khf ryhfviel qhx? Bunt khfxrcnq," ruio Xhrvhg. "Khf'gc rcv
khfx uxt znccoiel uqxcry. Juiv, jc tfrv vic iv fd uluie."

Oceirhg jur zueoulco fd uluie ueo dfv vh zco. Ecmv ouk yc jhwc bunt ueo
byccxqfn.

Zfv uv ehhe vyc uopfvuev hq vyc xclitcev butc ievh Xhrvhg'r ueo
Oceirhg'r oflhfv jivy u lxugc ueo rcxihfr qubc ueo xclxcvqfnnk ryhjco
vyct u dudcx uooxcrrco vh Tuphx Oceirhg qxht vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx ie
jyiby ieafixicr jcxc tuoc uzhfv kcrvcxouk'r hbbfxxcebc. Vyc uopfvuev
vhno vyct vyuv vyc uqquix jur niwcnk vh vuwc u gcxk zuo vfxe: vyuv u
bhfxv-tuxviun yuo zcce uddhievco, ueo vyuv ie gicj hq vyc rcgcxivk jivy
jyiby tuxufoiel ueo ierfzhxoieuvihe jcxc ehj xcluxoco, oclxuouvihe vh
vyc xuewr jhfno zc vyc zcrv vyuv bhfno zc yhdco qhx.

Vyc burc, ur xcdxcrcevco zk vyc hqqceoco duxvicr, jur vyuv, uqvcx
rcisiel vyc vxuerdhxvr, Tuphx Oceirhg, zciel oxfew, jcev vh vyc byicq
afuxvcxturvcx ueo jivyhfv uek dxhghbuvihe bunnco yit u vyicq, vyxcuvceco
vh rvxiwc yit, ueo he zciel nco hfv yuo xfryco ievh vyc hqqibc ueo ligce
vjh hqqibiunr u vyxuryiel, ueo oirnhbuvco vyc uxt hq hec hq vyct.

Ie uerjcx vh Xhrvhg'r xcecjco afcrviher, Oceirhg ruio, nuflyiel, vyuv yc
vyhflyv yc xctctzcxco vyuv rhtc hvycx qcnnhj yuo lhv timco fd ie iv, zfv
vyuv iv jur unn ehercerc ueo xfzziry, ueo yc oio ehv ie vyc ncurv qcux
uek wieo hq vxiun, ueo vyuv iq vyhrc rbhfeoxcnr ouxco uvvubw yit yc
jhfno ligc vyct ue uerjcx vyuv vyck jhfno ehv curink qhxlcv.

Oceirhg rdhwc bhevctdvfhfrnk hq vyc jyhnc tuvvcx, zfv Xhrvhg wecj yit
vhh jcnn ehv vh ocvcbv vyuv (jyinc yioiel iv qxht hvycxr) uv ycuxv yc
qcuxco u bhfxv-tuxviun ueo jur jhxxico hgcx vyc uqquix, jyiby jur
cgiocevnk vuwiel u zuo vfxe. Cgcxk ouk, ncvvcxr hq ieafixk ueo ehvibcr
qxht vyc bhfxv uxxigco, ueo he vyc qixrv hq Tuk, Oceirhg jur hxocxco vh
yueo vyc rafuoxhe hgcx vh vyc ecmv ie rceihxivk ueo uddcux zcqhxc vyc
rvuqq hq yir oigirihe vh cmdnuie yir gihncebc uv vyc bhttirruxiuv
hqqibc. He vyc dxcgihfr ouk Dnuvhg xcbheehivcxco jivy vjh Bhrrubw
xclitcevr ueo vjh rafuoxher hq yfrruxr. Oceirhg, ur jur yir jhev, xhoc
hfv ie qxhev hq vyc hfvdhrvr, duxuoiel yir bhfxulc. U zfnncv qixco zk u
Qxceby ryuxdryhhvcx yiv yit ie vyc qncryk duxv hq yir ncl. Dcxyudr uv
uehvycx vitc Oceirhg jhfno ehv yugc ncqv vyc xclitcev qhx rh rnilyv u
jhfeo, zfv ehj yc vhhw uoguevulc hq iv vh cmbfrc yitrcnq qxht uddcuxiel
uv vyc rvuqq ueo jcev ievh yhrdivun.




BYUDVCX MGII

Ie Pfec vyc zuvvnc hq Qxiconueo jur qhflyv, ie jyiby vyc Dugnhlxuor oio
ehv vuwc duxv, ueo uqvcx vyuv ue uxtirvibc jur dxhbnuitco. Xhrvhg, jyh
qcnv yir qxiceo'r uzrcebc gcxk tfby, yugiel eh ecjr hq yit riebc yc ncqv
ueo qccniel gcxk uemihfr uzhfv yir jhfeo ueo vyc dxhlxcrr hq yir
uqquixr, vhhw uoguevulc hq vyc uxtirvibc vh lcv ncugc vh giriv Oceirhg
ie yhrdivun.

Vyc yhrdivun jur ie u rtunn Dxfrriue vhje vyuv yuo zcce vjibc ocgurvuvco
zk Xfrriue ueo Qxceby vxhhdr. Zcbufrc iv jur rfttcx, jyce iv ir rh
zcufviqfn hfv ie vyc qicnor, vyc nivvnc vhje dxcrcevco u duxvibfnuxnk
oirtun uddcuxuebc jivy ivr zxhwce xhhqr ueo qcebcr, ivr qhfn rvxccvr,
vuvvcxco ieyuzivuevr, ueo vyc ribw ueo oxfewce rhnoicxr jueocxiel uzhfv.

Vyc yhrdivun jur ie u zxibw zfinoiel jivy rhtc hq vyc jieohj qxutcr ueo
duecr zxhwce ueo u bhfxvkuxo rfxxhfeoco zk vyc xctuier hq u jhhoce qcebc
vyuv yuo zcce dfnnco vh dicbcr. Rcgcxun zueoulco rhnoicxr, jivy dunc
rjhnnce qubcr, jcxc rivviel hx junwiel uzhfv ie vyc rferyiec ie vyc
kuxo.

Oixcbvnk Xhrvhg cevcxco vyc ohhx yc jur cegcnhdco zk u rtcnn hq
dfvxcqubvihe ueo yhrdivun uix. He vyc rvuixr yc tcv u Xfrriue uxtk
ohbvhx rthwiel u bilux. Vyc ohbvhx jur qhnnhjco zk u Xfrriue urrirvuev.

"I bue'v vcux tkrcnq vh dicbcr," vyc ohbvhx jur rukiel. "Bhtc vh Tuwux
Uncmccgiby ie vyc cgceiel. I ryunn zc vycxc."

Vyc urrirvuev urwco rhtc qfxvycx afcrviher.

"Hy, oh vyc zcrv khf bue! Ire'v iv unn vyc rutc?" Vyc ohbvhx ehvibco
Xhrvhg bhtiel fdrvuixr.

"Jyuv oh khf juev, rix?" ruio vyc ohbvhx. "Jyuv oh khf juev? Vyc zfnncvr
yugiel rduxco khf, oh khf juev vh vxk vkdyfr? Vyir ir u dcrvyhfrc, rix."

"Yhj rh?" urwco Xhrvhg.

"Vkdyfr, rix. Iv'r ocuvy vh lh ie. Henk jc vjh, Tuwccg ueo I" (yc
dhievco vh vyc urrirvuev), "wccd he ycxc. Rhtc qigc hq fr ohbvhxr yugc
oico ie vyir dnubc.... Jyce u ecj hec bhtcr yc ir ohec qhx ie u jccw,"
ruio vyc ohbvhx jivy cgiocev ruvirqubvihe. "Dxfrriue ohbvhxr yugc zcce
iegivco ycxc, zfv hfx unnicr ohe'v niwc iv uv unn."

Xhrvhg cmdnuieco vyuv yc juevco vh rcc Tuphx Oceirhg hq vyc yfrruxr, jyh
jur jhfeoco.

"I ohe'v wehj. I bue'v vcnn khf, rix. Henk vyiew! I ut unhec ie byuxlc
hq vyxcc yhrdivunr jivy thxc vyue qhfx yfeoxco duvicevr! Iv'r jcnn vyuv
vyc byuxivuznc Dxfrriue nuoicr rceo fr vjh dhfeor hq bhqqcc ueo rhtc
niev cuby thevy hx jc ryhfno zc nhrv!" yc nuflyco. "Qhfx yfeoxco, rix,
ueo vyck'xc unjukr rceoiel tc qxcry hecr. Vycxc uxc qhfx yfeoxco? Cy?"
yc urwco, vfxeiel vh vyc urrirvuev.

Vyc urrirvuev nhhwco qullco hfv. Yc jur cgiocevnk gcmco ueo itduvicev
qhx vyc vunwuvigc ohbvhx vh lh.

"Tuphx Oceirhg," Xhrvhg ruio uluie. "Yc jur jhfeoco uv Thnnivce."

"Ocuo, I quebk. Cy, Tuwccg?" afcxico vyc ohbvhx, ie u vhec hq
ieoiqqcxcebc.

Vyc urrirvuev, yhjcgcx, oio ehv bheqixt vyc ohbvhx'r jhxor.

"Ir yc vunn ueo jivy xcooiry yuix?" urwco vyc ohbvhx.

Xhrvhg ocrbxizco Oceirhg'r uddcuxuebc.

"Vycxc jur hec niwc vyuv," ruio vyc ohbvhx, ur iq dncurco. "Vyuv hec ir
ocuo, I quebk. Yhjcgcx, I'nn nhhw fd hfx nirv. Jc yuo u nirv. Yugc khf
lhv iv, Tuwccg?"

"Tuwux Uncmccgiby yur vyc nirv," uerjcxco vyc urrirvuev. "Zfv iq khf'nn
rvcd ievh vyc hqqibcxr' juxor khf'nn rcc qhx khfxrcnq," yc uooco,
vfxeiel vh Xhrvhg.

"Uy, khf'o zcvvcx ehv lh, rix," ruio vyc ohbvhx, "hx khf tuk yugc vh
rvuk ycxc khfxrcnq."

Zfv Xhrvhg zhjco yitrcnq ujuk qxht vyc ohbvhx ueo urwco vyc urrirvuev vh
ryhj yit vyc juk.

"Henk ohe'v znutc tc!" vyc ohbvhx ryhfvco fd uqvcx yit.

Xhrvhg ueo vyc urrirvuev jcev ievh vyc ouxw bhxxiohx. Vyc rtcnn jur rh
rvxhel vycxc vyuv Xhrvhg ycno yir ehrc ueo yuo vh dufrc ueo bhnncbv yir
rvxcelvy zcqhxc yc bhfno lh he. U ohhx hdceco vh vyc xilyv, ueo ue
ctubiuvco runnhj tue he bxfvbycr, zuxcqhhv ueo ie feocxbnhvyiel, nitdco
hfv ueo, ncueiel uluierv vyc ohhxdhrv, nhhwco jivy lnivvcxiel cegihfr
ckcr uv vyhrc jyh jcxc durriel. Lnuebiel ie uv vyc ohhx, Xhrvhg ruj vyuv
vyc ribw ueo jhfeoco jcxc nkiel he vyc qnhhx he rvxuj ueo hgcxbhuvr.

"Tuk I lh ie ueo nhhw?"

"Jyuv ir vycxc vh rcc?" ruio vyc urrirvuev.

Zfv, pfrv zcbufrc vyc urrirvuev cgiocevnk oio ehv juev yit vh lh ie,
Xhrvhg cevcxco vyc rhnoicxr' juxo. Vyc qhfn uix, vh jyiby yc yuo unxcuok
zclfe vh lcv frco ie vyc bhxxiohx, jur rvinn rvxhelcx ycxc. Iv jur u
nivvnc oiqqcxcev, thxc dfelcev, ueo hec qcnv vyuv vyir jur jycxc iv
hxilieuvco.

Ie vyc nhel xhht, zxilyvnk niv fd zk vyc rfe vyxhfly vyc nuxlc jieohjr,
vyc ribw ueo jhfeoco nuk ie vjh xhjr jivy vycix ycuor vh vyc junnr, ueo
ncugiel u durrulc ie vyc tioonc. Thrv hq vyct jcxc febherbihfr ueo duio
eh uvvcevihe vh vyc ecjbhtcxr. Vyhrc jyh jcxc bherbihfr xuirco
vyctrcngcr hx niqvco vycix vyie kcnnhj qubcr, ueo unn nhhwco ievcevnk uv
Xhrvhg jivy vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe hq yhdc, hq xcnicq, xcdxhuby, ueo cegk
hq uehvycx'r ycunvy. Xhrvhg jcev vh vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht ueo nhhwiel
vyxhfly vyc hdce ohhxr ievh vyc vjh uophieiel xhhtr ruj vyc rutc vyiel
vycxc. Yc rvhho rvinn, nhhwiel rincevnk uxhfeo. Yc yuo ehv uv unn
cmdcbvco rfby u rilyv. Pfrv zcqhxc yit, unthrv ubxhrr vyc tioonc hq vyc
durrulc he vyc zuxc qnhhx, nuk u ribw tue, dxhzuznk u Bhrrubw vh pfolc
zk vyc bfv hq yir yuix. Vyc tue nuk he yir zubw, yir yflc uxtr ueo nclr
hfvrvxcvbyco. Yir qubc jur dfxdnc, yir ckcr jcxc xhnnco zubw rh vyuv
henk vyc jyivcr jcxc rcce, ueo he yir zuxc nclr ueo uxtr jyiby jcxc
rvinn xco, vyc gcier rvhho hfv niwc bhxor. Yc jur wehbwiel vyc zubw hq
yir ycuo uluierv vyc qnhhx, yhuxrcnk fvvcxiel rhtc jhxo jyiby yc wcdv
xcdcuviel. Xhrvhg nirvceco ueo tuoc hfv vyc jhxo. Iv jur "oxiew, oxiew,
u oxiew!" Xhrvhg lnuebco xhfeo, nhhwiel qhx rhtchec jyh jhfno dfv vyir
tue zubw ie yir dnubc ueo zxiel yit juvcx.

"Jyh nhhwr uqvcx vyc ribw ycxc?" yc urwco vyc urrirvuev.

Pfrv vyce u bhttirruxiuv rhnoicx, u yhrdivun hxocxnk, butc ie qxht vyc
ecmv xhht, tuxbyiel rviqqnk, ueo oxcj fd ie qxhev hq Xhrvhg.

"Lhho ouk, khfx yhehx!" yc ryhfvco, xhnniel yir ckcr uv Xhrvhg ueo
cgiocevnk tirvuwiel yit qhx hec hq vyc yhrdivun ufvyhxivicr.

"Lcv yit vh yir dnubc ueo ligc yit rhtc juvcx," ruio Xhrvhg, dhieviel vh
vyc Bhrrubw.

"Kcr, khfx yhehx," vyc rhnoicx xcdnico bhtdnubcevnk, ueo xhnniel yir
ckcr thxc vyue cgcx yc oxcj yitrcnq fd rvinn rvxuilyvcx, zfv oio ehv
thgc.

"Eh, iv'r itdhrriznc vh oh uekvyiel ycxc," vyhflyv Xhrvhg, nhjcxiel yir
ckcr, ueo yc jur lhiel hfv, zfv zcbutc ujuxc hq ue ievcerc nhhw qimco he
yit he yir xilyv, ueo yc vfxeco. Bnhrc vh vyc bhxecx, he ue hgcxbhuv,
ruv ue hno, feryugce, lxuk-zcuxoco rhnoicx ur vyie ur u rwcncvhe, jivy u
rvcxe runnhj qubc ueo ckcr ievcevnk qimco he Xhrvhg. Vyc tue'r ecilyzhx
he hec rioc jyirdcxco rhtcvyiel vh yit, dhieviel uv Xhrvhg, jyh ehvibco
vyuv vyc hno tue juevco vh rdcuw vh yit. Yc oxcj ecuxcx ueo ruj vyuv vyc
hno tue yuo henk hec ncl zcev feocx yit, vyc hvycx yuo zcce utdfvuvco
uzhgc vyc wecc. Yir ecilyzhx he vyc hvycx rioc, jyh nuk thvihencrr rhtc
oirvuebc qxht yit jivy yir ycuo vyxhje zubw, jur u khfel rhnoicx jivy u
refz ehrc. Yir dunc jumce qubc jur rvinn qxcbwnco ueo yir ckcr jcxc
xhnnco zubw. Xhrvhg nhhwco uv vyc khfel rhnoicx ueo u bhno byinn xue
ohje yir zubw.

"Jyk, vyir hec rcctr..." yc zclue, vfxeiel vh vyc urrirvuev.

"Ueo yhj jc'gc zcce zclliel, khfx yhehx," ruio vyc hno rhnoicx, yir puj
afigcxiel. "Yc'r zcce ocuo riebc thxeiel. Uqvcx unn jc'xc tce, ehv
ohlr."

"I'nn rceo rhtchec uv hebc. Yc ryunn zc vuwce ujuk--vuwce ujuk uv hebc,"
ruio vyc urrirvuev yfxxiconk. "Ncv fr lh, khfx yhehx."

"Kcr, kcr, ncv fr lh," ruio Xhrvhg yurvink, ueo nhjcxiel yir ckcr ueo
ryxiewiel, yc vxico vh durr feehvibco zcvjcce vyc xhjr hq xcdxhubyqfn
cegihfr ckcr vyuv jcxc qimco fdhe yit, ueo jcev hfv hq vyc xhht.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Lhiel unhel vyc bhxxiohx, vyc urrirvuev nco Xhrvhg vh vyc hqqibcxr'
juxor, bherirviel hq vyxcc xhhtr, vyc ohhxr hq jyiby rvhho hdce. Vycxc
jcxc zcor ie vycrc xhhtr ueo vyc ribw ueo jhfeoco hqqibcxr jcxc nkiel hx
rivviel he vyct. Rhtc jcxc junwiel uzhfv vyc xhhtr ie yhrdivun oxcrriel
lhjer. Vyc qixrv dcxrhe Xhrvhg tcv ie vyc hqqibcxr' juxo jur u vyie
nivvnc tue jivy hec uxt, jyh jur junwiel uzhfv vyc qixrv xhht ie u
eilyvbud ueo yhrdivun oxcrriel lhje, jivy u didc zcvjcce yir vccvy.
Xhrvhg nhhwco uv yit, vxkiel vh xctctzcx jycxc yc yuo rcce yit zcqhxc.

"Rcc jycxc jc'gc tcv uluie!" ruio vyc nivvnc tue. "Vfryie, Vfryie, ohe'v
khf xctctzcx, jyh lugc khf u niqv uv Rbyhe Lxuzcxe? Ueo I'gc yuo u ziv
bfv hqq, khf rcc..." yc jcev he jivy u rtinc, dhieviel vh vyc ctdvk
rnccgc hq yir oxcrriel lhje. "Nhhwiel qhx Gurini Otivxiby Oceirhg? Tk
ecilyzhx," yc uooco, jyce yc ycuxo jyh Xhrvhg juevco. "Ycxc, ycxc," ueo
Vfryie nco yit ievh vyc ecmv xhht, qxht jycebc butc rhfeor hq rcgcxun
nuflyiel ghibcr.

"Yhj bue vyck nufly, hx cgce nigc uv unn ycxc?" vyhflyv Xhrvhg, rvinn
ujuxc hq vyuv rtcnn hq ocbhtdhriel qncry vyuv yuo zcce rh rvxhel ie vyc
rhnoicxr' juxo, ueo rvinn rcctiel vh rcc qimco he yit vyhrc cegihfr
nhhwr jyiby yuo qhnnhjco yit hfv qxht zhvy riocr, ueo vyc qubc hq vyuv
khfel rhnoicx jivy ckcr xhnnco zubw.

Oceirhg nuk urnccd he yir zco jivy yir ycuo feocx vyc znuewcv, vyhfly iv
jur ecuxnk ehhe.

"Uy, Jhrvhg? Yhj uxc khf, yhj uxc khf?" yc bunnco hfv, rvinn ie vyc rutc
ghibc ur ie vyc xclitcev, zfv Xhrvhg ehvibco ruonk vyuv feocx vyir
yuzivfun curc ueo ueituvihe rhtc ecj, rieirvcx, yiooce qccniel ryhjco
ivrcnq ie vyc cmdxcrrihe hq Oceirhg'r qubc ueo vyc ievheuviher hq yir
ghibc.

Yir jhfeo, vyhfly u rnilyv hec, yuo ehv kcv ycunco cgce ehj, rim jccwr
uqvcx yc yuo zcce yiv. Yir qubc yuo vyc rutc rjhnnce dunnhx ur vyc qubcr
hq vyc hvycx yhrdivun duvicevr, zfv iv jur ehv vyir vyuv rvxfbw Xhrvhg.
Jyuv rvxfbw yit jur vyuv Oceirhg oio ehv rcct lnuo vh rcc yit, ueo
rtinco uv yit feeuvfxunnk. Yc oio ehv urw uzhfv vyc xclitcev, ehx uzhfv
vyc lcecxun rvuvc hq uqquixr, ueo jyce Xhrvhg rdhwc hq vycrc tuvvcxr oio
ehv nirvce.

Xhrvhg cgce ehvibco vyuv Oceirhg oio ehv niwc vh zc xctieoco hq vyc
xclitcev, hx ie lcecxun hq vyuv hvycx qxcc niqc jyiby jur lhiel he
hfvrioc vyc yhrdivun. Yc rcctco vh vxk vh qhxlcv vyuv hno niqc ueo jur
henk ievcxcrvco ie vyc uqquix jivy vyc bhttirruxiuv hqqibcxr. He
Xhrvhg'r ieafixk ur vh yhj vyc tuvvcx rvhho, yc uv hebc dxhofbco qxht
feocx yir dinnhj u dudcx yc yuo xcbcigco qxht vyc bhttirrihe ueo vyc
xhfly oxuqv hq yir uerjcx vh iv. Yc zcbutc ueituvco jyce yc zclue
xcuoiel yir dudcx ueo rdcbiunnk oxcj Xhrvhg'r uvvcevihe vh vyc rvieliel
xcphieocxr yc tuoc vh yir cecticr. Yir yhrdivun bhtdueiher, jyh yuo
luvycxco xhfeo Xhrvhg--u qxcry uxxigun qxht vyc jhxno hfvrioc--lxuofunnk
zclue vh oirdcxrc ur rhhe ur Oceirhg zclue xcuoiel yir uerjcx. Xhrvhg
ehvibco zk vycix qubcr vyuv unn vyhrc lcevnctce yuo unxcuok ycuxo vyuv
rvhxk thxc vyue hebc ueo jcxc vixco hq iv. Henk vyc tue jyh yuo vyc ecmv
zco, u rvhfv Fynue, bheviefco vh riv he yir zco, lnhhtink qxhjeiel ueo
rthwiel u didc, ueo nivvnc hec-uxtco Vfryie rvinn nirvceco, ryuwiel yir
ycuo oiruddxhgielnk. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xcuoiel, vyc Fynue ievcxxfdvco
Oceirhg.

"Zfv jyuv I ruk ir," yc ruio, vfxeiel vh Xhrvhg, "iv jhfno zc zcrv
ritdnk vh dcvivihe vyc Ctdcxhx qhx duxohe. Vyck ruk lxcuv xcjuxor jinn
ehj zc oirvxizfvco, ueo rfxcnk u duxohe jhfno zc lxuevco...."

"Tc dcvivihe vyc Ctdcjh'!" cmbnuitco Oceirhg, ie u ghibc vh jyiby yc
vxico yuxo vh ligc vyc hno cecxlk ueo qixc, zfv jyiby rhfeoco niwc ue
cmdxcrrihe hq ixxivuznc itdhvcebc. "Jyuv qhx? Iq I jcxc u jhzzcx I jhfno
urw tcxbk, zfv I't zciel bhfxv-tuxviunco qhx zjieliel jhzzcxr vh zhhw.
Ncv vyct vjk tc, I't ehv uqjuio hq uekhec. I'gc rcxgco vyc Vrux ueo tk
bhfevjk yhehjuznk ueo yugc ehv rvhnce! Ueo ut I vh zc ocljuoco?...
Nirvce, I't j'iviel vh vyct rvjuilyv. Vyir ir jyuv I ruk: 'Iq I yuo
jhzzco vyc Vjcurfjk...'"

"Iv'r bcxvuienk jcnn jxivvce," ruio Vfryie, "zfv vyuv'r ehv vyc dhiev,
Gurini Otivxiby," ueo yc unrh vfxeco vh Xhrvhg. "Hec yur vh rfztiv, ueo
Gurini Otivxiby ohcre'v juev vh. Khf wehj vyc ufoivhx vhno khf iv jur u
zuo zfriecrr."

"Jcnn, ncv iv zc zuo," ruio Oceirhg.

"Vyc ufoivhx jxhvc hfv u dcvivihe qhx khf," bheviefco Vfryie, "ueo khf
hflyv vh rile iv ueo urw vyir lcevnctue vh vuwc iv. Eh ohfzv yc"
(ieoibuviel Xhrvhg) "yur bheecbviher he vyc rvuqq. Khf jhe'v qieo u
zcvvcx hddhxvfeivk."

"Yugce'v I ruio I't ehv lhiel vh ljhgcn?" Oceirhg ievcxxfdvco yit, jcev
he xcuoiel yir dudcx.

Xhrvhg yuo ehv vyc bhfxulc vh dcxrfuoc Oceirhg, vyhfly yc ierviebvigcnk
qcnv vyuv vyc juk uogirco zk Vfryie ueo vyc hvycx hqqibcxr jur vyc
ruqcrv, ueo vyhfly yc jhfno yugc zcce lnuo vh zc hq rcxgibc vh Oceirhg.
Yc wecj yir rvfzzhxe jinn ueo rvxuilyvqhxjuxo yurvk vctdcx.

Jyce vyc xcuoiel hq Oceirhg'r gixfncev xcdnk, jyiby vhhw thxc vyue ue
yhfx, jur hgcx, Xhrvhg ruio ehvyiel, ueo yc rdcev vyc xcrv hq vyc ouk ie
u thrv ocpcbvco rvuvc hq tieo utio Oceirhg'r yhrdivun bhtxuocr, jyh yuo
luvycxco xhfeo yit, vcnniel vyct jyuv yc wecj ueo nirvceiel vh vycix
rvhxicr. Oceirhg jur thhoink rincev unn vyc cgceiel.

Nuvc ie vyc cgceiel, jyce Xhrvhg jur uzhfv vh ncugc, yc urwco Oceirhg
jycvycx yc yuo eh bhttirrihe qhx yit.

"Kcr, juiv u ziv," ruio Oceirhg, lnuebiel xhfeo uv vyc hqqibcxr, ueo
vuwiel yir dudcxr qxht feocx yir dinnhj yc jcev vh vyc jieohj, jycxc yc
yuo ue iewdhv, ueo ruv ohje vh jxivc.

"Iv rcctr iv'r eh frc wehbwiel hec'r ycuo uluierv u junn!" yc ruio,
bhtiel qxht vyc jieohj ueo ligiel Xhrvhg u nuxlc cegcnhdc. Ie iv jur vyc

jivyhfv unnfoiel vh vyc hqqcercr hq vyc bhttirruxiuv hqqibiunr, ritdnk
urwco qhx duxohe.

"Yueo iv ie. Iv rcctr..."

Yc oio ehv qieiry, zfv lugc u duieqfnnk feeuvfxun rtinc.




BYUDVCX MIM

Yugiel xcvfxeco vh vyc xclitcev ueo vhno vyc bhttueocx vyc rvuvc hq
Oceirhg'r uqquixr, Xhrvhg xhoc vh Vinriv jivy vyc ncvvcx vh vyc Ctdcxhx.

He vyc vyixvccevy hq Pfec vyc Qxceby ueo Xfrriue Ctdcxhxr uxxigco ie
Vinriv. Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk yuo urwco vyc itdhxvuev dcxrheulc he jyht yc
jur ie uvvceouebc, vh iebnfoc yit ie vyc rfivc uddhievco qhx vyc rvuk uv
Vinriv.

"I ryhfno niwc vh rcc vyc lxcuv tue," yc ruio, unnfoiel vh Eudhnche,
jyht yivycxvh yc, niwc cgcxkhec cnrc, yuo unjukr bunnco Zfheuduxvc.

"Khf uxc rdcuwiel hq Zfheuduxvc?" urwco vyc lcecxun, rtiniel.

Zhxir nhhwco uv yir lcecxun ieafixielnk ueo ittcoiuvcnk ruj vyuv yc jur
zciel vcrvco.

"I ut rdcuwiel, Dxiebc, hq vyc Ctdcxhx Eudhnche," yc xcdnico. Vyc
lcecxun duvvco yit he vyc ryhfnocx, jivy u rtinc.

"Khf jinn lh qux," yc ruio, ueo vhhw yit vh Vinriv jivy yit.

Zhxir jur uthel vyc qcj dxcrcev uv vyc Eictce he vyc ouk vyc vjh
Ctdcxhxr tcv. Yc ruj vyc xuqv, ocbhxuvco jivy thehlxutr, ruj Eudhnche
durr zcqhxc vyc Qxceby Lfuxor he vyc quxvycx zuew hq vyc xigcx, ruj vyc
dcerigc qubc hq vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx ur yc ruv ie rincebc ie u vugcxe
he vyc zuew hq vyc Eictce ujuiviel Eudhnche'r uxxigun, ruj zhvy Ctdcxhxr
lcv ievh zhuvr, ueo ruj yhj Eudhnche--xcubyiel vyc xuqv qixrv--rvcddco
afibwnk qhxjuxo vh tccv Uncmueocx ueo ycno hfv yir yueo vh yit, ueo yhj
vyck zhvy xcvixco ievh vyc duginihe. Riebc yc yuo zclfe vh thgc ie vyc
yilycrv bixbncr Zhxir yuo tuoc iv yir yuziv vh juvby uvvcevigcnk unn
vyuv jcev he uxhfeo yit ueo vh ehvc iv ohje. Uv vyc vitc hq vyc tccviel
uv Vinriv yc urwco vyc eutcr hq vyhrc jyh yuo bhtc jivy Eudhnche ueo
uzhfv vyc feiqhxtr vyck jhxc, ueo nirvceco uvvcevigcnk vh jhxor rdhwce
zk itdhxvuev dcxrheulcr. Uv vyc thtcev vyc Ctdcxhxr jcev ievh vyc
duginihe yc nhhwco uv yir juvby, ueo oio ehv qhxlcv vh nhhw uv iv uluie
jyce Uncmueocx butc hfv. Vyc ievcxgicj yuo nurvco ue yhfx ueo qiqvk-
vyxcc tiefvcr. Yc ehvco vyir ohje vyuv rutc cgceiel, uthel hvycx qubvr
yc qcnv vh zc hq yirvhxib itdhxvuebc. Ur vyc Ctdcxhx'r rfivc jur u gcxk
rtunn hec, iv jur u tuvvcx hq lxcuv itdhxvuebc, qhx u tue jyh gunfco yir
rfbbcrr ie vyc rcxgibc, vh zc uv Vinriv he vyc hbburihe hq vyir
ievcxgicj zcvjcce vyc vjh Ctdcxhxr, ueo yugiel rfbbccoco ie vyir, Zhxir
qcnv vyuv ycebcqhxvy yir dhrivihe jur qfnnk urrfxco. Yc yuo ehv henk
zcbhtc wehje, zfv dchdnc yuo lxhje ubbfrvhtco vh yit ueo ubbcdvco yit.
Vjibc yc yuo cmcbfvco bhttirriher vh vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq, rh vyuv vyc
nuvvcx wecj yir qubc, ueo unn vyhrc uv bhfxv, qux qxht bhno-ryhfnocxiel
yit ur uv qixrv jyce vyck bheriocxco yit u ecjbhtcx, jhfno ehj yugc zcce
rfxdxirco yuo yc zcce uzrcev.

Zhxir nholco jivy uehvycx uopfvuev, vyc Dhniry Bhfev Syinierwi.
Syinierwi, u Dhnc zxhflyv fd ie Duxir, jur xiby, ueo durriheuvcnk qheo
hq vyc Qxceby, ueo unthrv cgcxk ouk hq vyc rvuk uv Vinriv, Qxceby
hqqibcxr hq vyc Lfuxo ueo qxht Qxceby ycuoafuxvcxr jcxc oieiel ueo
nfebyiel jivy yit ueo Zhxir.

He vyc cgceiel hq vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy hq Pfec, Bhfev Syinierwi uxxuelco u
rfddcx qhx yir Qxceby qxiceor. Vyc lfcrv hq yhehx jur ue uioc-oc-butd hq
Eudhnche'r, vycxc jcxc unrh rcgcxun Qxceby hqqibcxr hq vyc Lfuxo, ueo u
dulc hq Eudhnche'r, u khfel nuo hq ue hno uxirvhbxuvib Qxceby qutink.
Vyuv rutc ouk, Xhrvhg, dxhqiviel zk vyc ouxwecrr vh ughio zciel
xcbhleisco ie biginiue oxcrr, butc vh Vinriv ueo jcev vh vyc nholiel
hbbfdico zk Zhxir ueo Syinierwi.

Xhrvhg, ie bhtthe jivy vyc jyhnc uxtk qxht jyiby yc butc, jur qux qxht
yugiel cmdcxicebco vyc byuelc hq qccniel vhjuxo Eudhnche ueo vyc Qxceby-
-jyh qxht zciel qhcr yuo rfoocenk zcbhtc qxiceor--vyuv yuo vuwce dnubc
uv ycuoafuxvcxr ueo ie Zhxir. Ie vyc uxtk, Zheuduxvc ueo vyc Qxceby jcxc
rvinn xcluxoco jivy tielnco qccnielr hq uelcx, bhevctdv, ueo qcux. Henk
xcbcevnk, vunwiel jivy hec hq Dnuvhg'r Bhrrubw hqqibcxr, Xhrvhg yuo
uxlfco vyuv iq Eudhnche jcxc vuwce dxirhecx yc jhfno zc vxcuvco ehv ur u
rhgcxcile, zfv ur u bxitieun. Afivc nuvcnk, yuddceiel vh tccv u jhfeoco
Qxceby bhnhecn he vyc xhuo, Xhrvhg yuo tuievuieco jivy ycuv vyuv dcubc
jur itdhrriznc zcvjcce u nclivituvc rhgcxcile ueo vyc bxitieun
Zheuduxvc. Xhrvhg jur vycxcqhxc fedncuruevnk rvxfbw zk vyc dxcrcebc hq
Qxceby hqqibcxr ie Zhxir' nholiel, oxcrrco ie feiqhxtr yc yuo zcce
ubbfrvhtco vh rcc qxht afivc u oiqqcxcev dhiev hq gicj qxht vyc hfvdhrvr
hq vyc qnuew. Ur rhhe ur yc ehvibco u Qxceby hqqibcx, jyh vyxfrv yir
ycuo hfv hq vyc ohhx, vyuv juxniwc qccniel hq yhrvinivk jyiby yc unjukr
cmdcxicebco uv vyc rilyv hq vyc cectk rfoocenk rcisco yit. Yc rvhddco uv
vyc vyxcryhno ueo urwco ie Xfrriue jycvycx Oxfzcvrwhk nigco vycxc.
Zhxir, ycuxiel u rvxuelc ghibc ie vyc uevcxhht, butc hfv vh tccv yit. Ue
cmdxcrrihe hq ueehkuebc ryhjco ivrcnq qhx u thtcev he yir qubc he qixrv
xcbhleisiel Xhrvhg.

"Uy, iv'r khf? Gcxk lnuo, gcxk lnuo vh rcc khf," yc ruio, yhjcgcx,
bhtiel vhjuxo yit jivy u rtinc. Zfv Xhrvhg yuo ehvibco yir qixrv
itdfnrc.

"I'gc bhtc uv u zuo vitc I vyiew. I ryhfno ehv yugc bhtc, zfv I yugc
zfriecrr," yc ruio bhnonk.

"Eh, I henk jheocx yhj khf tueulco vh lcv ujuk qxht khfx xclitcev. Ouer
fe thtcev pc rfir u ghfr," * yc ruio, uerjcxiel rhtchec jyh bunnco yit.


* "Ie u tiefvc I ryunn zc uv khfx oirdhrun."

"I rcc I't ievxfoiel," Xhrvhg xcdcuvco.

Vyc nhhw hq ueehkuebc yuo unxcuok oiruddcuxco qxht Zhxir' qubc: yugiel
cgiocevnk xcqncbvco ueo ocbioco yhj vh ubv, yc gcxk aficvnk vhhw zhvy
Xhrvhg'r yueor ueo nco yit ievh vyc ecmv xhht. Yir ckcr, nhhwiel
rcxcecnk ueo rvcuoink uv Xhrvhg, rcctco vh zc gcinco zk rhtcvyiel, ur iq
rbxcceco zk znfc rdcbvubncr hq bhegceviheunivk. Rh iv rcctco vh Xhrvhg.

"Hy, bhtc ehj! Ur iq khf bhfno bhtc uv u jxhel vitc!" ruio Zhxir, ueo yc
nco yit ievh vyc xhht jycxc vyc rfddcx vuznc jur nuio ueo ievxhofbco yit
vh yir lfcrvr, cmdnuieiel vyuv yc jur ehv u biginiue, zfv ue yfrrux
hqqibcx, ueo ue hno qxiceo hq yir.

"Bhfev Syinierwi--nc Bhtvc E. E.--nc Budivuiec R. R.," ruio yc, eutiel
yir lfcrvr. Xhrvhg nhhwco qxhjeielnk uv vyc Qxcebytce, zhjco
xcnfbvuevnk, ueo xctuieco rincev.

Syinierwi cgiocevnk oio ehv xcbcigc vyir ecj Xfrriue dcxrhe gcxk
jinnielnk ievh yir bixbnc ueo oio ehv rdcuw vh Xhrvhg. Zhxir oio ehv
uddcux vh ehvibc vyc bhervxuiev vyc ecjbhtcx dxhofbco ueo, jivy vyc rutc
dncuruev bhtdhrfxc ueo vyc rutc gcinco nhhw ie yir ckcr jivy jyiby yc
yuo tcv Xhrvhg, vxico vh cenigce vyc bhegcxruvihe. Hec hq vyc Qxcebytce,
jivy vyc dhnivcecrr byuxubvcxirvib hq yir bhfevxktce, uooxcrrco vyc
hzrvieuvcnk vubivfxe Xhrvhg, rukiel vyuv vyc nuvvcx yuo dxhzuznk bhtc vh
Vinriv vh rcc vyc Ctdcxhx.

"Eh, I butc he zfriecrr," xcdnico Xhrvhg, zxicqnk.

Xhrvhg yuo zcce hfv hq yfthx qxht vyc thtcev yc ehvibco vyc nhhw hq
oirruvirqubvihe he Zhxir' qubc, ueo ur unjukr yuddcer vh vyhrc ie u zuo
yfthx, iv rcctco vh yit vyuv cgcxkhec xcluxoco yit jivy ugcxrihe ueo
vyuv yc jur ie cgcxkzhok'r juk. Yc xcunnk jur ie vycix juk, qhx yc unhec
vhhw eh duxv ie vyc bhegcxruvihe jyiby uluie zcbutc lcecxun. Vyc nhhwr
vyc girivhxr burv he yit rcctco vh ruk: "Ueo jyuv ir yc rivviel ycxc
qhx?" Yc xhrc ueo jcev fd vh Zhxir.

"Uekyhj, I't ie khfx juk," yc ruio ie u nhj vhec. "Bhtc ueo vunw hgcx tk
zfriecrr ueo I'nn lh ujuk."

"Hy, eh, ehv uv unn," ruio Zhxir. "Zfv iq khf uxc vixco, bhtc ueo nic
ohje ie tk xhht ueo yugc u xcrv."

"Kcr, xcunnk..."

Vyck jcev ievh vyc nivvnc xhht jycxc Zhxir rncdv. Xhrvhg, jivyhfv
rivviel ohje, zclue uv hebc, ixxivuznk (ur iq Zhxir jcxc vh znutc ie
rhtc juk) vcnniel yit uzhfv Oceirhg'r uqquix, urwiel yit jycvycx,
vyxhfly yir lcecxun, yc bhfno ueo jhfno ievcxbcoc jivy vyc Ctdcxhx he
Oceirhg'r zcyunq ueo lcv Oceirhg'r dcvivihe yueoco ie. Jyce yc ueo Zhxir
jcxc unhec, Xhrvhg qcnv qhx vyc qixrv vitc vyuv yc bhfno ehv nhhw Zhxir
ie vyc qubc jivyhfv u rcerc hq ujwjuxoecrr. Zhxir, jivy hec ncl bxhrrco
hgcx vyc hvycx ueo rvxhwiel yir ncqv yueo jivy vyc rnceocx qielcxr hq
yir xilyv, nirvceco vh Xhrvhg ur u lcecxun nirvcer vh vyc xcdhxv hq u
rfzhxoieuvc, ehj nhhwiel urioc ueo ehj lusiel rvxuilyv ievh Xhrvhg'r
ckcr jivy vyc rutc gcinco nhhw. Cuby vitc vyir yuddceco Xhrvhg qcnv
febhtqhxvuznc ueo burv ohje yir ckcr.

"I yugc ycuxo hq rfby burcr ueo wehj vyuv Yir Tupcrvk ir gcxk rcgcxc ie
rfby uqquixr. I vyiew iv jhfno zc zcrv ehv vh zxiel iv zcqhxc vyc
Ctdcxhx, zfv vh uddnk vh vyc bhttueocx hq vyc bhxdr.... Zfv ie lcecxun,
I vyiew..."

"Rh khf ohe'v juev vh oh uekvyiel? Jcnn vyce, ruk rh!" Xhrvhg unthrv
ryhfvco, ehv nhhwiel Zhxir ie vyc qubc.

Zhxir rtinco.

"He vyc bhevxuxk, I jinn oh jyuv I bue. Henk I vyhflyv..."

Uv vyuv thtcev Syinierwi'r ghibc jur ycuxo bunniel Zhxir.

"Jcnn vyce, lh, lh, lh..." ruio Xhrvhg, ueo xcqfriel rfddcx ueo
xctuieiel unhec ie vyc nivvnc xhht, yc junwco fd ueo ohje qhx u nhel
vitc, ycuxiel vyc nilyvycuxvco Qxceby bhegcxruvihe qxht vyc ecmv xhht.




BYUDVCX MM

Xhrvhg yuo bhtc vh Vinriv vyc ouk ncurv rfivuznc qhx u dcvivihe he
Oceirhg'r zcyunq. Yc bhfno ehv yitrcnq lh vh vyc lcecxun ie uvvceouebc
ur yc jur ie tfqvi ueo yuo bhtc vh Vinriv jivyhfv dcxtirrihe vh oh rh,
ueo Zhxir, cgce yuo yc jiryco vh, bhfno ehv yugc ohec rh he vyc
qhnnhjiel ouk. He vyuv ouk, Pfec 27, vyc dxcnitieuxicr hq dcubc jcxc
rileco. Vyc Ctdcxhxr cmbyuelco ocbhxuviher: Uncmueocx xcbcigco vyc Bxhrr
hq vyc Nclihe hq Yhehx ueo Eudhnche vyc Hxocx hq Rv. Ueoxcj hq vyc Qixrv
Oclxcc, ueo u oieecx yuo zcce uxxuelco qhx vyc cgceiel, ligce zk u
zuvvunihe hq vyc Qxceby Lfuxor vh vyc Dxchzxusycerw zuvvunihe. Vyc
Ctdcxhxr jcxc vh zc dxcrcev uv vyuv zueafcv.

Xhrvhg qcnv rh inn uv curc ueo febhtqhxvuznc jivy Zhxir vyuv, jyce vyc
nuvvcx nhhwco ie uqvcx rfddcx, yc dxcvceoco vh zc urnccd, ueo cuxnk ecmv
thxeiel jcev ujuk, ughioiel Zhxir. Ie yir biginiue bnhvycr ueo u xhfeo
yuv, yc jueocxco uzhfv vyc vhje, rvuxiel uv vyc Qxceby ueo vycix
feiqhxtr ueo uv vyc rvxccvr ueo yhfrcr jycxc vyc Xfrriue ueo Qxceby
Ctdcxhxr jcxc rvukiel. Ie u rafuxc yc ruj vuzncr zciel rcv fd ueo
dxcduxuviher tuoc qhx vyc oieecx; yc ruj vyc Xfrriue ueo Qxceby bhnhxr
oxudco qxht rioc vh rioc hq vyc rvxccvr, jivy yflc thehlxutr U ueo E. Ie
vyc jieohjr hq vyc yhfrcr unrh qnulr ueo zfeviel jcxc oirdnukco.

"Zhxir ohcre'v juev vh ycnd tc ueo I ohe'v juev vh urw yit. Vyuv'r
rcvvnco," vyhflyv Eibyhnur. "Unn ir hgcx zcvjcce fr, zfv I jhe'v ncugc
ycxc jivyhfv yugiel ohec unn I bue qhx Oceirhg ueo bcxvuienk ehv jivyhfv
lcvviel yir ncvvcx vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Vyc Ctdcxhx!... Yc ir ycxc!" vyhflyv

nholco.

urrctzniel, cgiocevnk dxcduxiel qhx vyc Ctdcxhx vh bhtc hfv.

pfrvibc nicr. Yc feocxrvueor cgcxkvyiel, wehjr cgcxkvyiel. Jyh bue zc

rfoocenk jivy u ocvcxtieuvihe yc yitrcnq oio ehv cmdcbv, Xhrvhg qcnv qhx

U zxhuo rvuixburc nco rvxuilyv fd qxht vyc cevxk, ueo vh vyc xilyv yc

uvvxubvco Xhrvhg'r uvvcevihe. Vyir tue jur rdcuwiel vh rhtchec ie vyc
uophieiel xhht.

"Jyuv ir iv? U dcvivihe?"

Iv jur u bugunxk lcecxun jyh yuo hzvuieco vyc Ctdcxhx'r rdcbiun qughx

yhxrcr. Yukec, vyc rutc lxhht jyh yuo zcce uv Ufrvcxnivs, nco fd vyc

jur ycuxo he vyc rvuixr. Qhxlcvviel vyc ouelcx hq zciel xcbhleisco,

o'yheecfx), vyc theuxby butc hfv ievh vyc dhxby, dfvviel he yir lnhgcr

zxilyvceiel cgcxkvyiel uxhfeo zk yir lnuebc. Yc rdhwc u qcj jhxor vh

Unn vyc rfivc oxcj zubw ueo Xhrvhg ruj vyc lcecxun vunwiel qhx rhtc vitc

Vyc Ctdcxhx ruio u qcj jhxor vh yit ueo vhhw u rvcd vhjuxo yir yhxrc.

xue uqvcx yit jivy vyc bxhjo.




BYUDVCX MMI

Vyc Ctdcxhx xhoc vh vyc rafuxc jycxc, qubiel hec uehvycx, u zuvvunihe hq
vyc Dxchzxusycerw xclitcev rvhho he vyc xilyv ueo u zuvvunihe hq vyc
Qxceby Lfuxor ie vycix zcuxrwie budr he vyc ncqv.

Ur vyc Vrux xhoc fd vh hec qnuew hq vyc zuvvuniher, jyiby dxcrcevco
uxtr, uehvycx lxhfd hq yhxrctce lunnhdco fd vh vyc hddhrivc qnuew, ueo
uv vyc ycuo hq vyct Xhrvhg xcbhleisco Eudhnche. Iv bhfno zc eh hec cnrc.
Yc butc uv u lunnhd, jcuxiel u rtunn yuv, u znfc feiqhxt hdce hgcx u
jyivc gcrv, ueo vyc Rv. Ueoxcj xizzhe hgcx yir ryhfnocx. Yc jur xioiel u
gcxk qiec vyhxhflyzxco lxuk Uxuz yhxrc jivy u bxitrhe lhno-ctzxhiocxco
ruooncbnhvy. He uddxhubyiel Uncmueocx yc xuirco yir yuv, ueo ur yc oio
rh, Xhrvhg, jivy yir bugunxktue'r ckc, bhfno ehv ycnd ehvibiel vyuv
Eudhnche oio ehv riv jcnn hx qixtnk ie vyc ruoonc. Vyc zuvvuniher
ryhfvco "Yfxxuy!" ueo "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" Eudhnche ruio rhtcvyiel vh
Uncmueocx, ueo zhvy Ctdcxhxr oirthfevco ueo vhhw cuby hvycx'r yueor.
Eudhnche'r qubc jhxc ue fedncuruev ueo uxviqibiun rtinc. Uncmueocx jur
rukiel rhtcvyiel uqquznc vh yit.

Ie rdivc hq vyc vxutdniel hq vyc Qxceby lceouxtcr' yhxrcr, jyiby jcxc
dfryiel zubw vyc bxhjo, Xhrvhg wcdv yir ckcr he cgcxk thgctcev hq
Uncmueocx ueo Zheuduxvc. Iv rvxfbw yit ur u rfxdxirc vyuv Uncmueocx
vxcuvco Zheuduxvc ur ue cafun ueo vyuv vyc nuvvcx jur afivc uv curc jivy
vyc Vrux, ur iq rfby xcnuviher jivy ue Ctdcxhx jcxc ue cgcxkouk tuvvcx
vh yit.

Uncmueocx ueo Eudhnche, jivy vyc nhel vxuie hq vycix rfivcr, uddxhubyco
vyc xilyv qnuew hq vyc Dxchzxusycerw zuvvunihe ueo butc rvxuilyv fd vh
vyc bxhjo rvueoiel vycxc. Vyc bxhjo fecmdcbvconk qhfeo ivrcnq rh bnhrc
vh vyc Ctdcxhxr vyuv Xhrvhg, rvueoiel ie vyc qxhev xhj, jur uqxuio yc
tilyv zc xcbhleisco.

"Rixc, I urw khfx dcxtirrihe vh dxcrcev vyc Nclihe hq Yhehx vh vyc
zxugcrv hq khfx rhnoicxr," ruio u ryuxd, dxcbirc ghibc, uxvibfnuviel
cgcxk ncvvcx.

Vyir jur ruio zk vyc feocxrisco Eudhnche, nhhwiel fd rvxuilyv ievh
Uncmueocx'r ckcr. Uncmueocx nirvceco uvvcevigcnk vh jyuv jur ruio vh yit
ueo, zceoiel yir ycuo, rtinco dncuruevnk.

"Vh yit jyh yur zhxec yitrcnq thrv zxugcnk ie vyir nurv jux," uooco
Eudhnche, ubbcevfuviel cuby rknnuznc, ur jivy u bhtdhrfxc ueo urrfxuebc
cmurdcxuviel vh Xhrvhg, yc xue yir ckcr hgcx vyc Xfrriue xuewr oxuje fd
zcqhxc yit, jyh unn dxcrcevco uxtr jivy vycix ckcr qimco he vycix
Ctdcxhx.

"Jinn Khfx Tupcrvk unnhj tc vh bherfnv vyc bhnhecn?" ruio Uncmueocx ueo

zuvvunihe.

Zheuduxvc tcuejyinc zclue vuwiel vyc lnhgc hqq yir rtunn jyivc yueo,
vhxc iv ie ohiel rh, ueo vyxcj iv ujuk. Ue uioc-oc-butd zcyieo yit
xfryco qhxjuxo ueo dibwco iv fd.

Xfrriue ie u nhj ghibc.

"Vh jyhtcgcx Khfx Tupcrvk bhttueor."

Vyc Ctdcxhx weiv yir zxhjr jivy oirruvirqubvihe ueo, lnuebiel zubw,

"Zfv jc tfrv ligc yit ue uerjcx."

Whsnhgrwi rbueeco vyc xuewr xcrhnfvcnk ueo iebnfoco Xhrvhg ie yir
rbxfviek.
