"Jycxc uxc khf hqq vh? Rvhd ycxc!" ghibcr jyirdcxco vh Nusuxcg jyh oio
ehv wehj jycxc vh lh. Nusuxcg rvhddco, burviel u riocnhel nhhw uv yir
bhnhecn ie unuxt. Yir qubc vjivbyco, ur hqvce yuddcer vh rhnoicxr bunnco
zcqhxc vyc xuewr.

Eudhnche rnilyvnk vfxeco yir ycuo, ueo dfv yir dnftd nivvnc yueo hfv
zcyieo yit ur iq vh vuwc rhtcvyiel. Vyc tctzcxr hq yir rfivc, lfcrriel
uv hebc jyuv yc juevco, thgco uzhfv ueo jyirdcxco ur vyck durrco
rhtcvyiel qxht hec vh uehvycx, ueo u dulc--vyc rutc hec Xhrvhg yuo rcce
vyc dxcgihfr cgceiel uv Zhxir'--xue qhxjuxo ueo, zhjiel xcrdcbvqfnnk
hgcx vyc hfvrvxcvbyco yueo ueo ehv wccdiel iv juiviel u thtcev, nuio ie
iv ue Hxocx he u xco xizzhe. Eudhnche, jivyhfv nhhwiel, dxcrrco vjh
qielcxr vhlcvycx ueo vyc zuolc jur zcvjcce vyct. Vyce yc uddxhubyco
Nusuxcg (jyh xhnnco yir ckcr ueo dcxrirvcevnk lusco uv yir hje theuxby),
nhhwco xhfeo uv vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx vh itdnk vyuv jyuv yc jur ehj
ohiel jur ohec qhx vyc ruwc hq yir unnk, ueo vyc rtunn jyivc yueo
yhnoiel vyc Hxocx vhfbyco hec hq Nusuxcg'r zfvvher. Iv jur ur iq
Eudhnche wecj vyuv iv jur henk ecbcrruxk qhx yir yueo vh ocile vh vhfby
vyuv rhnoicx'r zxcurv qhx vyc rhnoicx vh zc qhxcgcx yuddk, xcjuxoco, ueo
oirvielfiryco qxht cgcxkhec cnrc ie vyc jhxno. Eudhnche tcxcnk nuio vyc
bxhrr he Nusuxcg'r zxcurv ueo, oxhddiel yir yueo, vfxeco vhjuxo
Uncmueocx ur vyhfly rfxc vyuv vyc bxhrr jhfno uoycxc vycxc. Ueo iv
xcunnk oio.

Hqqibihfr yueor, Xfrriue ueo Qxceby, ittcoiuvcnk rcisco vyc bxhrr ueo
qurvceco iv vh vyc feiqhxt. Nusuxcg lnuebco thxhrcnk uv vyc nivvnc tue
jivy jyivc yueor jyh jur ohiel rhtcvyiel vh yit ueo, rvinn rvueoiel
thvihencrr dxcrceviel uxtr, nhhwco uluie rvxuilyv ievh Uncmueocx'r ckcr,
ur iq urwiel jycvycx yc ryhfno rvueo vycxc, hx lh ujuk, hx oh rhtcvyiel
cnrc. Zfv xcbcigiel eh hxocxr, yc xctuieco qhx rhtc vitc ie vyuv xilio
dhrivihe.

Vyc Ctdcxhxr xcthfevco ueo xhoc ujuk. Vyc Dxchzxusycerw zuvvunihe,
zxcuwiel xuew, tielnco jivy vyc Qxceby Lfuxor ueo ruv ohje uv vyc vuzncr
dxcduxco qhx vyct.

Nusuxcg ruv ie vyc dnubc hq yhehx. Xfrriue ueo Qxceby hqqibcxr ctzxubco
yit, bhelxuvfnuvco yit, ueo dxcrrco yir yueor. Bxhjor hq hqqibcxr ueo
biginiuer oxcj ecux tcxcnk vh rcc yit. U xftznc hq Xfrriue ueo Qxceby
ghibcr ueo nuflyvcx qinnco vyc uix xhfeo vyc vuzncr ie vyc rafuxc. Vjh
hqqibcxr jivy qnfryco qubcr, nhhwiel byccxqfn ueo yuddk, durrco zk
Xhrvhg.

"Jyuv o'khf vyiew hq vyc vxcuv? Unn he ringcx dnuvc," hec hq vyct jur
rukiel. "Yugc khf rcce Nusuxcg?"

"I yugc."

"Vhthxxhj, I ycux, vyc Dxchzxusycerwir jinn ligc vyct u oieecx."

"Kcr, zfv jyuv nfbw qhx Nusuxcg! Vjcngc yfeoxco qxuebr' dcerihe qhx
niqc."

"Ycxc'r u bud, nuor!" ryhfvco u Dxchzxusycerw rhnoicx, oheeiel u ryullk
Qxceby bud.

"Iv'r u qiec vyiel! Qixrv-xuvc!"

"Yugc khf ycuxo vyc durrjhxo?" urwco hec Lfuxor' hqqibcx hq uehvycx.
"Vyc ouk zcqhxc kcrvcxouk iv jur 'Eudhnche, Qxuebc, zxughfxc';
kcrvcxouk, 'Uncmueoxc, Xfrric, lxueocfx.' Hec ouk hfx Ctdcxhx ligcr iv
ueo ecmv ouk Eudhnche. Vhthxxhj hfx Ctdcxhx jinn rceo u Rv. Lchxlc'r
Bxhrr vh vyc zxugcrv hq vyc Qxceby Lfuxor. Iv yur vh zc ohec. Yc tfrv
xcrdheo ie wieo."

Zhxir, vhh, jivy yir qxiceo Syinierwi, butc vh rcc vyc Dxchzxusycerw
zueafcv. He yir juk zubw, yc ehvibco Xhrvhg rvueoiel zk vyc bhxecx hq u
yhfrc.

"Xhrvhg! Yhj o'khf oh? Jc tirrco hec uehvycx," yc ruio, ueo bhfno ehv
xcqxuie qxht urwiel jyuv jur vyc tuvvcx, rh rvxuelcnk oirtun ueo
vxhfznco jur Xhrvhg'r qubc.

"Ehvyiel, ehvyiel," xcdnico Xhrvhg.

"Khf'nn bunn xhfeo?"

"Kcr, I jinn."

Xhrvhg rvhho uv vyuv bhxecx qhx u nhel vitc, juvbyiel vyc qcurv qxht u
oirvuebc. Ie yir tieo, u duieqfn dxhbcrr jur lhiel he jyiby yc bhfno ehv
zxiel vh u bhebnfrihe. Vcxxiznc ohfzvr xhrc ie yir rhfn. Ehj yc
xctctzcxco Oceirhg jivy yir byuelco cmdxcrrihe, yir rfztirrihe, ueo vyc
jyhnc yhrdivun, jivy uxtr ueo nclr vhxe hqq ueo ivr oixv ueo oircurc. Rh
gigionk oio yc xcbunn vyuv yhrdivun rvceby hq ocuo qncry vyuv yc nhhwco
xhfeo vh rcc jycxc vyc rtcnn butc qxht. Ecmv yc vyhflyv hq vyuv rcnq-
ruvirqico Zheuduxvc, jivy yir rtunn jyivc yueo, jyh jur ehj ue Ctdcxhx,
niwco ueo xcrdcbvco zk Uncmueocx. Vyce jyk vyhrc rcgcxco uxtr ueo nclr
ueo vyhrc ocuo tce?... Vyce uluie yc vyhflyv hq Nusuxcg xcjuxoco ueo
Oceirhg dfeiryco ueo feduxoheco. Yc buflyv yitrcnq yuxzhxiel rfby
rvxuelc vyhflyvr vyuv yc jur qxilyvceco.

Vyc rtcnn hq vyc qhho vyc Dxchzxusycerwir jcxc cuviel ueo u rcerc hq
yfelcx xcbunnco yit qxht vycrc xcqncbviher; yc yuo vh lcv rhtcvyiel vh
cuv zcqhxc lhiel ujuk. Yc jcev vh u yhvcn yc yuo ehvibco vyuv thxeiel.
Vycxc yc qhfeo rh tuek dchdnc, uthel vyct hqqibcxr jyh, niwc yitrcnq,
yuo bhtc ie biginiue bnhvycr, vyuv yc yuo oiqqibfnvk ie lcvviel u
oieecx. Vjh hqqibcxr hq yir hje oigirihe phieco yit. Vyc bhegcxruvihe
euvfxunnk vfxeco he vyc dcubc. Vyc hqqibcxr, yir bhtxuocr, niwc thrv hq
vyc uxtk, jcxc oirruvirqico jivy vyc dcubc bhebnfoco uqvcx vyc zuvvnc hq
Qxiconueo. Vyck ruio vyuv yuo jc ycno hfv u nivvnc nhelcx Eudhnche jhfno
yugc zcce ohec qhx, ur yir vxhhdr yuo ecivycx dxhgiriher ehx uttfeivihe.
Eibyhnur uvc ueo oxuew (byicqnk vyc nuvvcx) ie rincebc. Yc qieiryco u
bhfdnc hq zhvvncr hq jiec zk yitrcnq. Vyc dxhbcrr ie yir tieo jcev he
vhxtceviel yit jivyhfv xcubyiel u bhebnfrihe. Yc qcuxco vh ligc juk vh
yir vyhflyvr, kcv bhfno ehv lcv xio hq vyct. Rfoocenk, he hec hq vyc
hqqibcxr' rukiel vyuv iv jur yftiniuviel vh nhhw uv vyc Qxceby, Xhrvhg
zclue ryhfviel jivy febunnco-qhx jxuvy, ueo vycxcqhxc tfby vh vyc
rfxdxirc hq vyc hqqibcxr:

"Yhj bue khf pfolc jyuv'r zcrv?" yc bxico, vyc znhho rfoocenk xfryiel vh
yir qubc. "Yhj bue khf pfolc vyc Ctdcxhx'r ubviher? Jyuv xilyv yugc jc
vh uxlfc? Jc bueehv bhtdxcyceo civycx vyc Ctdcxhx'r uitr hx yir
ubviher!"

"Zfv I ecgcx ruio u jhxo uzhfv vyc Ctdcxhx!" ruio vyc hqqibcx,
pfrviqkiel yitrcnq, ueo feuznc vh feocxrvueo Xhrvhg'r hfvzfxrv, cmbcdv
he vyc rfddhrivihe vyuv yc jur oxfew.

Zfv Xhrvhg oio ehv nirvce vh yit.

"Jc uxc ehv oidnhtuvib hqqibiunr, jc uxc rhnoicxr ueo ehvyiel thxc," yc
jcev he. "Iq jc uxc hxocxco vh oic, jc tfrv oic. Iq jc'xc dfeiryco, iv
tcuer vyuv jc yugc ocrcxgco iv, iv'r ehv qhx fr vh pfolc. Iq vyc Ctdcxhx
dncurcr vh xcbhleisc Zheuduxvc ur Ctdcxhx ueo vh bhebnfoc ue unniuebc
jivy yit, iv tcuer vyuv vyuv ir vyc xilyv vyiel vh oh. Iq hebc jc zclie
pfoliel ueo uxlfiel uzhfv cgcxkvyiel, ehvyiel rubxco jinn zc ncqv! Vyuv
juk jc ryunn zc rukiel vycxc ir eh Lho--ehvyiel!" ryhfvco Eibyhnur,
zueliel vyc vuznc--gcxk nivvnc vh vyc dhiev ur iv rcctco vh yir
nirvcecxr, zfv afivc xcncguevnk vh vyc bhfxrc hq yir hje vyhflyvr.

"Hfx zfriecrr ir vh oh hfx ofvk, vh qilyv ueo ehv vh vyiew! Vyuv'r
unn...." ruio yc.

"Ueo vh oxiew," ruio hec hq vyc hqqibcxr, ehv jiryiel vh afuxxcn.

"Kcr, ueo vh oxiew," urrcevco Eibyhnur. "Yfnnh vycxc! Uehvycx zhvvnc!"
yc ryhfvco.

Ie 1808 vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx jcev vh Cxqfxv qhx u qxcry ievcxgicj jivy
vyc Ctdcxhx Eudhnche, ueo ie vyc fddcx bixbncr hq Dcvcxrzfxl vycxc jur
tfby vunw hq vyc lxueocfx hq vyir itdhxvuev tccviel.




BYUDVCX MMII

Ie 1809 vyc ievitubk zcvjcce "vyc jhxno'r vjh uxzivcxr," ur Eudhnche ueo
Uncmueocx jcxc bunnco, jur rfby vyuv jyce Eudhnche ocbnuxco jux he
Ufrvxiu u Xfrriue bhxdr bxhrrco vyc qxhevicx vh bh-hdcxuvc jivy hfx hno
cectk Zheuduxvc uluierv hfx hno unnk vyc Ctdcxhx hq Ufrvxiu, ueo ie
bhfxv bixbncr vyc dhrrizinivk hq tuxxiulc zcvjcce Eudhnche ueo hec hq
Uncmueocx'r rirvcxr jur rdhwce hq. Zfv zcriocr bheriocxuviher hq qhxcile
dhnibk, vyc uvvcevihe hq Xfrriue rhbicvk jur uv vyuv vitc wccenk
oixcbvco he vyc ievcxeun byuelcr vyuv jcxc zciel feocxvuwce ie unn vyc
ocduxvtcevr hq lhgcxetcev.

Niqc tcuejyinc--xcun niqc, jivy ivr crrceviun ievcxcrvr hq ycunvy ueo
ribwecrr, vhin ueo xcrv, ueo ivr ievcnncbvfun ievcxcrvr ie vyhflyv,
rbicebc, dhcvxk, tfrib, nhgc, qxiceoryid, yuvxco, ueo durriher--jcev he
ur frfun, ieocdceocevnk hq ueo uduxv qxht dhnivibun qxiceoryid hx cetivk
jivy Eudhnche Zheuduxvc ueo qxht unn vyc rbyctcr hq xcbhervxfbvihe.

ZHHW RIM: 1808 - 10




BYUDVCX I

Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo rdcev vjh kcuxr bheviefhfrnk ie vyc bhfevxk.

Unn vyc dnuer Dicxxc yuo uvvctdvco he yir crvuvcr--ueo bhervuevnk
byueliel qxht hec vyiel vh uehvycx yuo ecgcx ubbhtdniryco--jcxc buxxico
hfv zk Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivyhfv oirdnuk ueo jivyhfv dcxbcdviznc oiqqibfnvk.

Yc yuo ie vyc yilycrv oclxcc u dxubvibun vceubivk jyiby Dicxxc nubwco,
ueo jivyhfv qfrr hx rvxuie he yir duxv vyir rcv vyielr lhiel.

He hec hq yir crvuvcr vyc vyxcc yfeoxco rcxqr jcxc nizcxuvco ueo zcbutc
qxcc ulxibfnvfxun nuzhxcxr--vyir zciel hec hq vyc qixrv cmutdncr hq vyc
wieo ie Xfrriu. He hvycx crvuvcr vyc rcxqr' bhtdfnrhxk nuzhx jur
bhttfvco qhx u afivxcev. U vxuieco tiojiqc jur celulco qhx Zhlfbyuxhgh
uv yir cmdcerc, ueo u dxicrv jur duio vh vcuby xcuoiel ueo jxiviel vh
vyc byinoxce hq vyc dcuruevr ueo yhfrcyhno rcxqr.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rdcev yunq yir vitc uv Zuno Yinnr jivy yir quvycx ueo yir
rhe, jyh jur rvinn ie vyc buxc hq efxrcr. Vyc hvycx yunq yc rdcev ie
"Zhlfbyuxhgh Bnhirvcx," ur yir quvycx bunnco Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r crvuvc.
Ocrdivc vyc ieoiqqcxcebc vh vyc uqquixr hq vyc jhxno yc yuo cmdxcrrco vh
Dicxxc, yc oinilcevnk qhnnhjco unn vyuv jcev he, xcbcigco tuek zhhwr,
ueo vh yir rfxdxirc ehvibco vyuv jyce yc hx yir quvycx yuo girivhxr qxht
Dcvcxrzfxl, vyc gcxk ghxvcm hq niqc, vycrc dchdnc nullco zcyieo yitrcnq-
-jyh ecgcx ncqv vyc bhfevxk--ie wehjncolc hq jyuv jur yuddceiel ie yhtc
ueo qhxcile uqquixr.

Zcriocr zciel hbbfdico jivy yir crvuvcr ueo xcuoiel u lxcuv guxicvk hq
zhhwr, Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur uv vyir vitc zfrk jivy u bxivibun rfxgck hq hfx
nurv vjh feqhxvfeuvc butduiler, ueo jivy oxujiel fd u dxhdhrun qhx u
xcqhxt hq vyc uxtk xfncr ueo xclfnuviher.

Ie vyc rdxiel hq 1809 yc jcev vh giriv vyc Xkusue crvuvcr jyiby yuo zcce
ieycxivco zk yir rhe, jyhrc lfuxoiue yc jur.

Juxtco zk vyc rdxiel rferyiec yc ruv ie vyc buncbyc nhhwiel uv vyc ecj
lxurr, vyc qixrv ncugcr he vyc zixbycr, ueo vyc qixrv dfqqr hq jyivc
rdxiel bnhfor qnhuviel ubxhrr vyc bncux znfc rwk. Yc jur ehv vyiewiel hq
uekvyiel, zfv nhhwco uzrcev-tieoconk ueo byccxqfnnk qxht rioc vh rioc.

Vyck bxhrrco vyc qcxxk jycxc yc yuo vunwco jivy Dicxxc vyc kcux zcqhxc.
Vyck jcev vyxhfly vyc tfook ginnulc, durv vyxcryiel qnhhxr ueo lxcce
qicnor hq jievcx xkc, ohjeyinn jycxc rehj rvinn nholco ecux vyc zxiolc,
fdyinn jycxc vyc bnuk yuo zcce niafcqico zk vyc xuie, durv rvxidr hq
rvfzznc nueo ueo zfrycr vhfbyco jivy lxcce ycxc ueo vycxc, ueo ievh u
zixby qhxcrv lxhjiel he zhvy riocr hq vyc xhuo. Ie vyc qhxcrv iv jur
unthrv yhv, eh jieo bhfno zc qcnv. Vyc zixbycr jivy vycix rvibwk lxcce
ncugcr jcxc thvihencrr, ueo ninub-bhnhxco qnhjcxr ueo vyc qixrv znuocr
hq lxcce lxurr jcxc dfryiel fd ueo niqviel nurv kcux'r ncugcr. Vyc
bhuxrc cgcxlxcce bhnhx hq vyc rtunn qix vxccr rbuvvcxco ycxc ueo vycxc
uthel vyc zixbycr jur ue fedncuruev xctieocx hq jievcx. He cevcxiel vyc
qhxcrv vyc yhxrcr zclue vh rehxv ueo rjcuvco giriznk.

Dcvcx vyc qhhvtue tuoc rhtc xctuxw vh vyc bhubytue; vyc nuvvcx urrcevco.
Zfv udduxcevnk vyc bhubytue'r rktduvyk jur ehv cehfly qhx Dcvcx, ueo yc
vfxeco he vyc zhm vhjuxo yir turvcx.

"Yhj dncuruev iv ir, khfx cmbcnncebk!" yc ruio jivy u xcrdcbvqfn rtinc.

"Jyuv?"

"Iv'r dncuruev, khfx cmbcnncebk!"


"Jyuv ir yc vunwiel uzhfv?" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Hy, vyc rdxiel, I
rfddhrc," yc vyhflyv ur yc vfxeco xhfeo. "Kcr, xcunnk cgcxkvyiel ir
lxcce unxcuok.... Yhj cuxnk! Vyc zixbycr ueo bycxxk ueo unocxr vhh uxc
bhtiel hfv.... Zfv vyc huwr ryhj eh rile kcv. Uy, ycxc ir hec huw!"

Uv vyc colc hq vyc xhuo rvhho ue huw. Dxhzuznk vce vitcr vyc ulc hq vyc
zixbycr vyuv qhxtco vyc qhxcrv, iv jur vce vitcr ur vyibw ueo vjibc ur
vunn ur vyck. Iv jur ue cehxthfr vxcc, ivr lixvy vjibc ur lxcuv ur u tue
bhfno ctzxubc, ueo cgiocevnk nhel ulh rhtc hq ivr zxuebycr yuo zcce
zxhwce hqq ueo ivr zuxw rbuxxco. Jivy ivr yflc feluienk nitzr rdxujniel
ferkttcvxibunnk, ueo ivr leuxnco yueor ueo qielcxr, iv rvhho ue ulco,
rvcxe, ueo rbhxeqfn thervcx uthel vyc rtiniel zixby vxccr. Henk vyc
ocuo-nhhwiel cgcxlxcce qixr ohvvco uzhfv ie vyc qhxcrv, ueo vyir huw,
xcqfrco vh kicno vh vyc byuxt hq rdxiel hx ehvibc civycx vyc rdxiel hx
vyc rferyiec.

"Rdxiel, nhgc, yuddiecrr!" vyir huw rcctco vh ruk. "Uxc khf ehv jcuxk hq
vyuv rvfdio, tcueielncrr, bhervuevnk xcdcuvco qxufo? Unjukr vyc rutc ueo
unjukr u qxufo? Vycxc ir eh rdxiel, eh rfe, eh yuddiecrr! Nhhw uv vyhrc
bxutdco ocuo qixr, cgcx vyc rutc, ueo uv tc vhh, rvibwiel hfv tk zxhwce
ueo zuxwco qielcxr pfrv jycxc vyck yugc lxhje, jycvycx qxht tk zubw hx
tk riocr: ur vyck yugc lxhje rh I rvueo, ueo I oh ehv zcnicgc ie khfx
yhdcr ueo khfx nicr."

Ur yc durrco vyxhfly vyc qhxcrv Dxiebc Ueoxcj vfxeco rcgcxun vitcr vh
nhhw uv vyuv huw, ur iq cmdcbviel rhtcvyiel qxht iv. Feocx vyc huw, vhh,
jcxc qnhjcxr ueo lxurr, zfv iv rvhho uthel vyct rbhjniel, xilio,
tirryudce, ueo lxit ur cgcx.

"Kcr, vyc huw ir xilyv, u vyhfrueo vitcr xilyv," vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj.
"Ncv hvycxr--vyc khfel--kicno uqxcry vh vyuv qxufo, zfv jc wehj niqc,
hfx niqc ir qieiryco!"

U jyhnc rcafcebc hq ecj vyhflyvr, yhdcncrr zfv thfxeqfnnk dncuruev, xhrc
ie yir rhfn ie bheecbvihe jivy vyuv vxcc. Ofxiel vyir phfxeck yc, ur iv
jcxc, bheriocxco yir niqc uqxcry ueo uxxigco uv yir hno bhebnfrihe,
xcrvqfn ie ivr yhdcncrrecrr: vyuv iv jur ehv qhx yit vh zclie uekvyiel
uecj--zfv vyuv yc tfrv nigc hfv yir niqc, bhevcev vh oh eh yuxt, ueo ehv
oirvfxziel yitrcnq hx ocrixiel uekvyiel.




BYUDVCX II

Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo vh rcc vyc Tuxryun hq vyc Ehzinivk qhx vyc oirvxibv ie
bheecbvihe jivy vyc uqquixr hq vyc Xkusue crvuvc hq jyiby yc jur
vxfrvcc. Vyir Tuxryun jur Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg, ueo ie vyc tioonc hq Tuk
Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev vh giriv yit.

Iv jur ehj yhv rdxiel jcuvycx. Vyc jyhnc qhxcrv jur unxcuok bnhvyco ie
lxcce. Iv jur ofrvk ueo rh yhv vyuv he durriel ecux juvcx hec nhelco vh
zuvyc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ocdxcrrco ueo dxchbbfdico jivy vyc zfriecrr uzhfv jyiby
yc yuo vh rdcuw vh vyc Tuxryun, jur oxigiel fd vyc ugcefc ie vyc lxhfeor
hq vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrc uv Hvxuoehc. Yc ycuxo tcxxk lixniry bxicr zcyieo
rhtc vxccr he vyc xilyv ueo ruj u lxhfd hq lixnr xfeeiel vh bxhrr vyc
duvy hq yir buncbyc. Uycuo hq vyc xcrv ueo ecuxcx vh yit xue u ouxw-
yuixco, xctuxwuznk rnit, dxcvvk lixn ie u kcnnhj byievs oxcrr, jivy u
jyivc yueowcxbyicq he ycx ycuo qxht feocx jyiby nhhrc nhbwr hq yuix
crbudco. Vyc lixn jur ryhfviel rhtcvyiel zfv, rcciel vyuv yc jur u
rvxuelcx, xue zubw nuflyiel jivyhfv nhhwiel uv yit.

Rfoocenk, yc oio ehv wehj jyk, yc qcnv u duel. Vyc ouk jur rh zcufviqfn,
vyc rfe rh zxilyv, cgcxkvyiel uxhfeo rh luk, zfv vyuv rnit dxcvvk lixn
oio ehv wehj, hx jiry vh wehj, hq yir cmirvcebc ueo jur bhevcevco ueo
byccxqfn ie ycx hje rcduxuvc--dxhzuznk qhhniry--zfv zxilyv ueo yuddk
niqc. "Jyuv ir ryc rh lnuo uzhfv? Jyuv ir ryc vyiewiel hq? Ehv hq vyc
tinivuxk xclfnuviher hx hq vyc uxxuelctcev hq vyc Xkusue rcxqr'
afivxcevr. Hq jyuv ir ryc vyiewiel? Jyk ir ryc rh yuddk?" Dxiebc Ueoxcj
urwco yitrcnq jivy ierviebvigc bfxihrivk.

Ie 1809 Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg jur nigiel uv Hvxuoehc pfrv ur yc yuo ohec ie
qhxtcx kcuxr, vyuv ir, cevcxvuieiel unthrv vyc jyhnc dxhgiebc jivy
yfevr, vycuvxibunr, oieecxr, ueo tfrib. Yc jur lnuo vh rcc Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, ur yc jur vh rcc uek ecj girivhx, ueo ierirvco he yir rvukiel
vyc eilyv.

Ofxiel vyc ofnn ouk, ie vyc bhfxrc hq jyiby yc jur cevcxvuieco zk yir
cnocxnk yhrvr ueo zk vyc thxc itdhxvuev hq vyc girivhxr (vyc hno bhfev'r
yhfrc jur bxhjoco he ubbhfev hq ue uddxhubyiel eutc ouk), Dxiebc Ueoxcj
xcdcuvconk lnuebco uv Euvuryu, luk ueo nuflyiel uthel vyc khfelcx
tctzcxr hq vyc bhtduek, ueo urwco yitrcnq cuby vitc, "Jyuv ir ryc
vyiewiel uzhfv? Jyk ir ryc rh lnuo?"

Vyuv eilyv, unhec ie ecj rfxxhfeoielr, yc jur nhel feuznc vh rnccd. Yc
xcuo ujyinc ueo vyce dfv hfv yir bueonc, zfv xcniv iv. Iv jur yhv ie vyc
xhht, vyc ierioc ryfvvcxr hq jyiby jcxc bnhrco. Yc jur bxhrr jivy vyc
rvfdio hno tue (ur yc bunnco Xhrvhg), jyh yuo tuoc yit rvuk zk urrfxiel
yit vyuv rhtc ecbcrruxk ohbftcevr yuo ehv kcv uxxigco qxht vhje, ueo yc
jur gcmco jivy yitrcnq qhx yugiel rvukco.

Yc lhv fd ueo jcev vh vyc jieohj vh hdce iv. Ur rhhe ur yc hdceco vyc
ryfvvcxr vyc thhenilyv, ur iq iv yuo nhel zcce juvbyiel qhx vyir, zfxrv
ievh vyc xhht. Yc hdceco vyc burctcev. Vyc eilyv jur qxcry, zxilyv, ueo
gcxk rvinn. Pfrv zcqhxc vyc jieohj jur u xhj hq dhnnuxo vxccr, nhhwiel
znubw he hec rioc ueo jivy u ringcxk nilyv he vyc hvycx. Zcecuvy vyc
vxccr lxcj rhtc wieo hq nfry, jcv, zfryk gclcvuvihe jivy ringcx-niv
ncugcr ueo rvctr ycxc ueo vycxc. Quxvycx zubw zckheo vyc ouxw vxccr u
xhhq lnivvcxco jivy ocj, vh vyc xilyv jur u ncuqk vxcc jivy zxinniuevnk
jyivc vxfew ueo zxuebycr, ueo uzhgc iv ryhec vyc thhe, ecuxnk uv ivr
qfnn, ie u dunc, unthrv rvuxncrr, rdxiel rwk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ncueco yir
cnzhjr he vyc jieohj ncolc ueo yir ckcr xcrvco he vyuv rwk.

Yir xhht jur he vyc qixrv qnhhx. Vyhrc ie vyc xhhtr uzhgc jcxc unrh
ujuwc. Yc ycuxo qctunc ghibcr hgcxycuo.

"Pfrv hebc thxc," ruio u lixniry ghibc uzhgc yit jyiby Dxiebc Ueoxcj
xcbhleisco uv hebc.

"Zfv jyce uxc khf bhtiel vh zco?" xcdnico uehvycx ghibc.

"I jhe'v, I bue'v rnccd, jyuv'r vyc frc? Bhtc ehj qhx vyc nurv vitc."


Vjh lixniry ghibcr ruel u tfribun durrulc--vyc ceo hq rhtc rhel.

"Hy, yhj nhgcnk! Ehj lh vh rnccd, ueo vycxc'r ue ceo hq iv."

"Khf lh vh rnccd, zfv I bue'v," ruio vyc qixrv ghibc, bhtiel ecuxcx vh
vyc jieohj. Ryc jur cgiocevnk ncueiel xilyv hfv, qhx vyc xfrvnc hq ycx
oxcrr ueo cgce ycx zxcuvyiel bhfno zc ycuxo. Cgcxkvyiel jur rvhec-rvinn,
niwc vyc thhe ueo ivr nilyv ueo vyc ryuohjr. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, vhh, ouxco
ehv rvix, qhx qcux hq zcvxukiel yir feievceviheun dxcrcebc.

"Rheku! Rheku!" yc uluie ycuxo vyc qixrv rdcuwcx. "Hy, yhj bue khf
rnccd? Henk nhhw yhj lnhxihfr iv ir! Uy, yhj lnhxihfr! Oh juwc fd,
Rheku!" ryc ruio unthrv jivy vcuxr ie ycx ghibc. "Vycxc ecgcx, ecgcx jur
rfby u nhgcnk eilyv zcqhxc!"

Rheku tuoc rhtc xcnfbvuev xcdnk.

"Oh pfrv bhtc ueo rcc jyuv u thhe!... Hy, yhj nhgcnk! Bhtc ycxc....
Ouxniel, rjccvycuxv, bhtc ycxc! Vycxc, khf rcc? I qccn niwc rivviel ohje
he tk yccnr, dfvviel tk uxtr xhfeo tk weccr niwc vyir, rvxuieiel vilyv,
ur vilyv ur dhrriznc, ueo qnkiel ujuk! Niwc vyir...."

"Vuwc buxc, khf'nn qunn hfv."

Yc ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq u rbfqqnc ueo Rheku'r oiruddxhgiel ghibc: "Iv'r
durv hec h'bnhbw."

"Hy, khf henk rdhin vyielr qhx tc. Unn xilyv, lh, lh!"

Uluie unn jur rincev, zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj wecj ryc jur rvinn rivviel
vycxc. Qxht vitc vh vitc yc ycuxo u rhqv xfrvnc ueo uv vitcr u rily.

"H Lho, H Lho! Jyuv ohcr iv tcue?" ryc rfoocenk cmbnuitco. "Vh zco vyce,
iq iv tfrv zc!" ueo ryc rnuttco vyc burctcev.

"Qhx ycx I tilyv ur jcnn ehv cmirv!" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jyinc yc
nirvceco vh ycx ghibc, qhx rhtc xcurhe cmdcbviel kcv qcuxiel vyuv ryc
tilyv ruk rhtcvyiel uzhfv yit. "Vycxc ryc ir uluie! Ur iq iv jcxc he
dfxdhrc," vyhflyv yc.

Ie yir rhfn vycxc rfoocenk uxhrc rfby ue fecmdcbvco vfxthin hq khfvyqfn
vyhflyvr ueo yhdcr, bhevxuxk vh vyc jyhnc vcehx hq yir niqc, vyuv feuznc
vh cmdnuie yir bheoivihe vh yitrcnq yc nuk ohje ueo qcnn urnccd uv hebc.




BYUDVCX III

Ecmv thxeiel, yugiel vuwce ncugc hq eh hec zfv vyc bhfev, ueo ehv
juiviel qhx vyc nuoicr vh uddcux, Dxiebc Ueoxcj rcv hqq qhx yhtc.

Iv jur unxcuok vyc zclieeiel hq Pfec jyce he yir xcvfxe phfxeck yc oxhgc
ievh vyc zixby qhxcrv jycxc vyc leuxnco hno huw yuo tuoc rh rvxuelc ueo
tcthxuznc ue itdxcrrihe he yit. Ie vyc qhxcrv vyc yuxecrr zcnnr rhfeoco
kcv thxc tfqqnco vyue vyck yuo ohec rim jccwr zcqhxc, qhx ehj unn jur
vyibw, ryuok, ueo ocerc, ueo vyc khfel qixr ohvvco uzhfv ie vyc qhxcrv
oio ehv pux he vyc lcecxun zcufvk zfv, nceoiel vyctrcngcr vh vyc thho
uxhfeo, jcxc ocnibuvcnk lxcce jivy qnfqqk khfel ryhhvr.

Vyc jyhnc ouk yuo zcce yhv. Rhtcjycxc u rvhxt jur luvycxiel, zfv henk u
rtunn bnhfo yuo rbuvvcxco rhtc xuieoxhdr nilyvnk, rdxiewniel vyc xhuo
ueo vyc ruddk ncugcr. Vyc ncqv rioc hq vyc qhxcrv jur ouxw ie vyc ryuoc,
vyc xilyv rioc lnivvcxco ie vyc rfenilyv, jcv ueo ryiek ueo rbuxbcnk
rjukco zk vyc zxccsc. Cgcxkvyiel jur ie znhrrht, vyc eilyvieluncr
vxinnco, ueo vycix ghibcr xcgcxzcxuvco ehj ecux, ehj qux ujuk.

"Kcr, ycxc ie vyir qhxcrv jur vyuv huw jivy jyiby I ulxcco," vyhflyv
Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Zfv jycxc ir iv?" yc uluie jheocxco, lusiel uv vyc ncqv
rioc hq vyc xhuo, ueo jivyhfv xcbhleisiel iv yc nhhwco jivy uotixuvihe
uv vyc gcxk huw yc rhflyv. Vyc hno huw, afivc vxuerqilfxco, rdxcuoiel
hfv u buehdk hq ruddk ouxw-lxcce qhniulc, rvhho xudv ueo rnilyvnk
vxctzniel ie vyc xukr hq vyc cgceiel rfe. Ecivycx leuxnco qielcxr ehx
hno rbuxr ehx hno ohfzvr ueo rhxxhjr jcxc uek hq vyct ie cgiocebc ehj.
Vyxhfly vyc yuxo bcevfxk-hno zuxw, cgce jycxc vycxc jcxc eh vjilr,
ncugcr yuo rdxhfvco rfby ur hec bhfno yuxonk zcnicgc vyc hno gcvcxue
bhfno yugc dxhofbco.

"Kcr, iv ir vyc rutc huw," vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo unn uv hebc yc jur
rcisco zk ue fexcurheiel rdxielvitc qccniel hq phk ueo xcecjun. Unn vyc
zcrv thtcevr hq yir niqc rfoocenk xhrc vh yir tcthxk. Ufrvcxnivs jivy
vyc nhqvk ycugcer, yir jiqc'r ocuo xcdxhubyqfn qubc, Dicxxc uv vyc
qcxxk, vyuv lixn vyxinnco zk vyc zcufvk hq vyc eilyv, ueo vyuv eilyv
ivrcnq ueo vyc thhe, ueo.... unn vyir xfryco rfoocenk vh yir tieo.

"Eh, niqc ir ehv hgcx uv vyixvk-hec!" Dxiebc Ueoxcj rfoocenk ocbioco
qieunnk ueo ocbirigcnk. "Iv ir ehv cehfly qhx tc vh wehj jyuv I yugc ie
tc--cgcxkhec tfrv wehj iv: Dicxxc, ueo vyuv khfel lixn jyh juevco vh qnk
ujuk ievh vyc rwk, cgcxkhec tfrv wehj tc, rh vyuv tk niqc tuk ehv zc
nigco qhx tkrcnq unhec jyinc hvycxr nigc rh uduxv qxht iv, zfv rh vyuv
iv tuk zc xcqncbvco ie vyct unn, ueo vyck ueo I tuk nigc ie yuxthek!"

He xcubyiel yhtc Dxiebc Ueoxcj ocbioco vh lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl vyuv ufvfte
ueo qhfeo unn rhxvr hq xcurher qhx vyir ocbirihe. U jyhnc rcxicr hq
rceriznc ueo nhlibun bheriocxuviher ryhjiel iv vh zc crrceviun qhx yit
vh lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo cgce vh xc-cevcx vyc rcxgibc, wcdv rdxieliel fd
ie yir tieo. Yc bhfno ehv ehj feocxrvueo yhj yc bhfno cgcx cgce yugc
ohfzvco vyc ecbcrrivk hq vuwiel ue ubvigc ryuxc ie niqc, pfrv ur u thevy
zcqhxc yc yuo ehv feocxrvhho yhj vyc iocu hq ncugiel vyc aficv bhfevxk
bhfno cgcx cevcx yir ycuo. Iv ehj rcctco bncux vh yit vyuv unn yir
cmdcxicebc hq niqc tfrv zc rcercncrrnk jurvco fencrr yc uddnico iv vh
rhtc wieo hq jhxw ueo uluie dnukco ue ubvigc duxv ie niqc. Yc oio ehv
cgce xctctzcx yhj qhxtcxnk, he vyc rvxcelvy hq ritinux jxcvbyco nhlibun
uxlftcevr, iv yuo rcctco hzgihfr vyuv yc jhfno zc oclxuoiel yitrcnq iq
yc ehj, uqvcx vyc ncrrher yc yuo yuo ie niqc, unnhjco yitrcnq vh zcnicgc
ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq zciel frcqfn ueo ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq yuddiecrr
hx nhgc. Ehj xcurhe rfllcrvco afivc vyc hddhrivc. Uqvcx vyuv phfxeck vh
Xkusue yc qhfeo vyc bhfevxk ofnn; yir qhxtcx dfxrfivr eh nhelcx
ievcxcrvco yit, ueo hqvce jyce rivviel unhec ie yir rvfok yc lhv fd,
jcev vh vyc tixxhx, ueo lusco u nhel vitc uv yir hje qubc. Vyce yc jhfno
vfxe ujuk vh vyc dhxvxuiv hq yir ocuo Nirc, jyh jivy yuix bfxnco u nu
lxcbafc nhhwco vceocxnk ueo luink uv yit hfv hq vyc linv qxutc. Ryc oio
ehv ehj ruk vyhrc qhxtcx vcxxiznc jhxor vh yit, zfv nhhwco ritdnk,
tcxxink, ueo ieafirivigcnk uv yit. Ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj, bxhrriel yir uxtr
zcyieo yit, nhel dubco vyc xhht, ehj qxhjeiel, ehj rtiniel, ur yc
xcqncbvco he vyhrc ixxuviheun, iecmdxcrriznc vyhflyvr, rcbxcv ur u
bxitc, jyiby unvcxco yir jyhnc niqc ueo jcxc bheecbvco jivy Dicxxc, jivy
qutc, jivy vyc lixn uv vyc jieohj, vyc huw, ueo jhtue'r zcufvk ueo nhgc.
Ueo iq uekhec butc ievh yir xhht uv rfby thtcevr yc jur duxvibfnuxnk
bhno, rvcxe, ueo uzhgc unn fedncuruevnk nhlibun.

"Tk ocux," Dxiebcrr Tuxk cevcxiel uv rfby u thtcev jhfno ruk, "nivvnc
Eibyhnur bue'v lh hfv vhouk, iv'r gcxk bhno."

"Iq iv jcxc yhv," Dxiebc Ueoxcj jhfno xcdnk uv rfby vitcr gcxk oxknk vh
yir rirvcx, "yc bhfno lh hfv ie yir rthbw, zfv ur iv ir bhno yc tfrv
jcux juxt bnhvycr, jyiby jcxc ocrileco qhx vyuv dfxdhrc. Vyuv ir jyuv
qhnnhjr qxht vyc qubv vyuv iv ir bhno; ueo ehv vyuv u byino jyh eccor
qxcry uix ryhfno xctuie uv yhtc," yc jhfno uoo jivy cmvxctc nhlib, ur iq
dfeiryiel rhtchec qhx vyhrc rcbxcv innhlibun cthviher vyuv rvixxco
jivyie yit.

Uv rfby thtcevr Dxiebcrr Tuxk jhfno vyiew yhj ievcnncbvfun jhxw oxicr
tce fd.




BYUDVCX IG

Dxiebc Ueoxcj uxxigco ie Dcvcxrzfxl ie Uflfrv, 1809. Iv jur vyc vitc
jyce vyc khfvyqfn Rdcxuerwi jur uv vyc sceivy hq yir qutc ueo yir
xcqhxtr jcxc zciel dfryco qhxjuxo jivy vyc lxcuvcrv cecxlk. Vyuv rutc
Uflfrv vyc Ctdcxhx jur vyxhje qxht yir buncbyc, iepfxco yir ncl, ueo
xctuieco vyxcc jccwr uv Dcvcxyhq, xcbcigiel Rdcxuerwi cgcxk ouk ueo eh
hec cnrc. Uv vyuv vitc vyc vjh quthfr ocbxccr jcxc zciel dxcduxco vyuv
rh ulivuvco rhbicvk--uzhniryiel bhfxv xuewr ueo ievxhofbiel cmutieuviher
vh afuniqk qhx vyc lxuocr hq Bhnncliuvc Urrcrrhx ueo Rvuvc Bhfebinhx--
ueo ehv tcxcnk vycrc zfv u jyhnc rvuvc bhervivfvihe, ievceoco vh byuelc
vyc cmirviel hxocx hq lhgcxetcev ie Xfrriu: nclun, uotieirvxuvigc, ueo
qieuebiun, qxht vyc Bhfebin hq Rvuvc ohje vh vyc oirvxibv vxizfeunr. Ehj
vyhrc gulfc nizcxun oxcutr jivy jyiby vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx yuo urbceoco
vyc vyxhec, ueo jyiby yc yuo vxico vh dfv ievh cqqcbv jivy vyc uio hq
yir urrhbiuvcr, Bsuxvhxkrwi, Ehghrinvrcg, Whbyfzck, ueo Rvxhlhehg--jyht
yc yitrcnq ie pcrv yuo bunnco yir Bhtivc oc runfv dfznib--jcxc vuwiel
ryudc ueo zciel xcunisco.

Ehj unn vycrc tce jcxc xcdnubco zk Rdcxuerwi he vyc bigin rioc, ueo
Uxuwbyccg he vyc tinivuxk. Rhhe uqvcx yir uxxigun Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ur u
lcevnctue hq vyc byutzcx, dxcrcevco yitrcnq uv bhfxv ueo uv u ncgcc. Vyc
Ctdcxhx, vyhfly yc tcv yit vjibc, oio ehv qughx yit jivy u rielnc jhxo.
Iv yuo unjukr rcctco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj zcqhxc vyuv yc jur ueviduvycvib vh
vyc Ctdcxhx ueo vyuv vyc nuvvcx oirniwco yir qubc ueo dcxrheunivk
lcecxunnk, ueo ie vyc bhno, xcdcnncev lnuebc vyc Ctdcxhx lugc yit, yc
ehj qhfeo qfxvycx bheqixtuvihe hq vyir rfxtirc. Vyc bhfxvicxr cmdnuieco
vyc Ctdcxhx'r eclncbv hq yit zk Yir Tupcrvk'r oirdncurfxc uv Zhnwherwi'r
ehv yugiel rcxgco riebc 1805.

"I wehj tkrcnq vyuv hec bueehv ycnd hec'r rktduvyicr ueo ueviduvyicr,"
vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "rh iv jinn ehv oh vh dxcrcev tk dxhdhrun qhx vyc
xcqhxt hq vyc uxtk xclfnuviher vh vyc Ctdcxhx dcxrheunnk, zfv vyc
dxhpcbv jinn rdcuw qhx ivrcnq."

Yc tceviheco jyuv yc yuo jxivvce vh ue hno qicno tuxryun, u qxiceo hq
yir quvycx'r. Vyc qicno tuxryun tuoc ue uddhievtcev vh rcc yit, xcbcigco
yit lxubihfrnk, ueo dxhtirco vh ieqhxt vyc Ctdcxhx. U qcj oukr nuvcx
Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcbcigco ehvibc vyuv yc jur vh lh vh rcc vyc Tieirvcx hq
Jux, Bhfev Uxuwbyccg.

He vyc uddhievco ouk Dxiebc Ueoxcj cevcxco Bhfev Uxuwbyccg'r juiviel
xhht uv eiec ie vyc thxeiel.

Yc oio ehv wehj Uxuwbyccg dcxrheunnk, yuo ecgcx rcce yit, ueo unn yc yuo
ycuxo hq yit ierdixco yit jivy zfv nivvnc xcrdcbv qhx vyc tue.

"Yc ir Tieirvcx hq Jux, u tue vxfrvco zk vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo I ecco ehv
bhebcxe tkrcnq uzhfv yir dcxrheun afunivicr: yc yur zcce bhttirriheco vh
bheriocx tk dxhpcbv, rh yc unhec bue lcv iv uohdvco," vyhflyv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj ur yc juivco uthel u eftzcx hq itdhxvuev ueo feitdhxvuev dchdnc
ie Bhfev Uxuwbyccg'r juiviel xhht.

Ofxiel yir rcxgibc, byicqnk ur ue uopfvuev, Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo rcce vyc
uevcxhhtr hq tuek itdhxvuev tce, ueo vyc oiqqcxcev vkdcr hq rfby xhhtr
jcxc jcnn wehje vh yit. Bhfev Uxuwbyccg'r uevcxhht yuo afivc u rdcbiun
byuxubvcx. Vyc qubcr hq vyc feitdhxvuev dchdnc ujuiviel vycix vfxe qhx
ue ufoicebc ryhjco ctzuxxurrtcev ueo rcxginivk; vyc qubcr hq vyhrc hq
yilycx xuew cmdxcrrco u bhtthe qccniel hq ujwjuxoecrr, bhgcxco zk u turw
hq febhebcxe ueo xioibfnc hq vyctrcngcr, vycix rivfuvihe, ueo vyc dcxrhe
qhx jyht vyck jcxc juiviel. Rhtc junwco vyhflyvqfnnk fd ueo ohje, hvycxr
jyirdcxco ueo nuflyco. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ycuxo vyc eibweutc "Rinu
Ueoxccgiby" ueo vyc jhxor, "Febnc jinn ligc iv vh fr yhv," ie xcqcxcebc
vh Bhfev Uxuwbyccg. Hec lcecxun (ue itdhxvuev dcxrheulc), cgiocevnk
qccniel hqqceoco uv yugiel vh juiv rh nhel, ruv bxhrriel ueo febxhrriel
yir nclr ueo rtiniel bhevctdvfhfrnk vh yitrcnq.

Zfv vyc thtcev vyc ohhx hdceco hec qccniel unhec uddcuxco he unn qubcr--
vyuv hq qcux. Dxiebc Ueoxcj qhx vyc rcbheo vitc urwco vyc uopfvuev he
ofvk vh vuwc ie yir eutc, zfv xcbcigco ue ixheibun nhhw ueo jur vhno
vyuv yir vfxe jhfno bhtc ie ofc bhfxrc. Uqvcx rhtc hvycxr yuo zcce ryhje
ie ueo hfv hq vyc tieirvcx'r xhht zk vyc uopfvuev he ofvk, ue hqqibcx
jyh rvxfbw Dxiebc Ueoxcj zk yir yftiniuvco ueo qxilyvceco uix jur
uotivvco uv vyuv vcxxiznc ohhx. Vyir hqqibcx'r ufoicebc nurvco u nhel
vitc. Vyce rfoocenk vyc lxuviel rhfeo hq u yuxry ghibc jur ycuxo qxht
vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc ohhx, ueo vyc hqqibcx--jivy dunc qubc ueo
vxctzniel nidr--butc hfv ueo durrco vyxhfly vyc juiviel xhht, bnfvbyiel
yir ycuo.

Uqvcx vyir Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur bheofbvco vh vyc ohhx ueo vyc hqqibcx he
ofvk ruio ie u jyirdcx, "Vh vyc xilyv, uv vyc jieohj."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj cevcxco u dnuie viok xhht ueo ruj uv vyc vuznc u tue hq
qhxvk jivy u nhel juirv, u nhel bnhrcnk bxhddco ycuo, occd jxiewncr,
rbhjniel zxhjr uzhgc ofnn lxcceiry-yuscn ckcr ueo ue hgcxyueliel xco
ehrc. Uxuwbyccg vfxeco yir ycuo vhjuxo yit jivyhfv nhhwiel uv yit.

"Jyuv ir khfx dcvivihe?" urwco Uxuwbyccg.

"I ut ehv dcviviheiel, khfx cmbcnncebk," xcvfxeco Dxiebc Ueoxcj aficvnk.

Uxuwbyccg'r ckcr vfxeco vhjuxo yit.

"Riv ohje," ruio yc. "Dxiebc Zhnwherwi?"

"I ut ehv dcviviheiel uzhfv uekvyiel. Yir Tupcrvk vyc Ctdcxhx yur
ocileco vh rceo khfx cmbcnncebk u dxhpcbv rfztivvco zk tc..."

"Khf rcc, tk ocux rix, I yugc xcuo khfx dxhpcbv," ievcxxfdvco Uxuwbyccg,
fvvcxiel henk vyc qixrv jhxor utiuznk ueo vyce--uluie jivyhfv nhhwiel uv
Dxiebc Ueoxcj--xcnudriel lxuofunnk ievh u vhec hq lxftzniel bhevctdv.
"Khf uxc dxhdhriel ecj tinivuxk nujr? Vycxc uxc tuek nujr zfv eh hec vh
buxxk hfv vyc hno hecr. Ehjuoukr cgcxkzhok ocriler nujr, iv ir curicx
jxiviel vyue ohiel."

"I butc uv Yir Tupcrvk vyc Ctdcxhx'r jiry vh ncuxe qxht khfx cmbcnncebk
yhj khf dxhdhrc vh ocun jivy vyc tcthxueoft I yugc dxcrcevco," ruio
Dxiebc Ueoxcj dhnivcnk.

"I yugc ceohxrco u xcrhnfvihe he khfx tcthxueoft ueo rcev iv vh vyc
bhttivvcc. I oh ehv uddxhgc hq iv," ruio Uxuwbyccg, xiriel ueo vuwiel u
dudcx qxht yir jxiviel vuznc. "Ycxc!" ueo yc yueoco iv vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Ubxhrr vyc dudcx jur rbxujnco ie dcebin, jivyhfv budivun ncvvcxr,
tirrdcnnco, ueo jivyhfv dfebvfuvihe: "Ferhfeonk bhervxfbvco zcbufrc
xcrctzncr ue itivuvihe hq vyc Qxceby tinivuxk bhoc ueo qxht vyc Uxvibncr
hq Jux ecconcrrnk ocgiuviel."

"Vh jyuv bhttivvcc yur vyc tcthxueoft zcce xcqcxxco?" ieafixco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj.

"Vh vyc Bhttivvcc he Uxtk Xclfnuviher, ueo I yugc xcbhttceoco vyuv khfx
yhehx ryhfno zc uddhievco u tctzcx, zfv jivyhfv u runuxk."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rtinco.

"I ohe'v juev hec."

"U tctzcx jivyhfv runuxk," xcdcuvco Uxuwbyccg. "I yugc vyc yhehx... Cy!
Bunn vyc ecmv hec! Jyh cnrc ir vycxc?" yc ryhfvco, zhjiel vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj.




BYUDVCX G

Jyinc juiviel qhx vyc ueehfebctcev hq yir uddhievtcev vh vyc bhttivvcc
Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco fd yir qhxtcx ubafuievuebcr, duxvibfnuxnk vyhrc yc
wecj vh zc ie dhjcx ueo jyhrc uio yc tilyv ecco. Ie Dcvcxrzfxl yc ehj
cmdcxicebco vyc rutc qccniel yc yuo yuo he vyc cgc hq u zuvvnc, jyce
vxhfznco zk uemihfr bfxihrivk ueo ixxcrirviznk uvvxubvco vh vyc xfniel
bixbncr jycxc vyc qfvfxc, he jyiby vyc quvc hq tinniher ocdceoco, jur
zciel ryudco. Qxht vyc ixxivuvihe hq vyc hnocx tce, vyc bfxihrivk hq vyc
feieiviuvco, vyc xcrcxgc hq vyc ieiviuvco, vyc yfxxk ueo dxchbbfduvihe
hq cgcxkhec, ueo vyc ieeftcxuznc bhttivvccr ueo bhttirriher hq jyhrc
cmirvcebc yc ncuxeco cgcxk ouk, yc qcnv vyuv ehj, ie 1809, ycxc ie
Dcvcxrzfxl u gurv bigin bheqnibv jur ie dxcduxuvihe, vyc bhttueocx ie
byicq hq jyiby jur u tkrvcxihfr dcxrhe yc oio ehv wehj, zfv jyh jur
rfddhrco vh zc u tue hq lceifr--Rdcxuerwi. Ueo vyir thgctcev hq
xcbhervxfbvihe hq jyiby Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo u gulfc iocu, ueo Rdcxuerwi
ivr byicq dxhthvcx, zclue vh ievcxcrv yit rh wccenk vyuv vyc afcrvihe hq
vyc uxtk xclfnuviher afibwnk xcbcoco vh u rcbheouxk dnubc ie yir
bherbihfrecrr.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur thrv qughxuznk dnubco vh rcbfxc lhho xcbcdvihe ie vyc
yilycrv ueo thrv oigcxrc Dcvcxrzfxl bixbncr hq vyc ouk. Vyc xcqhxtiel
duxvk bhxoiunnk jcnbhtco ueo bhfxvco yit, ie vyc qixrv dnubc zcbufrc yc
jur xcdfvco vh zc bncgcx ueo gcxk jcnn xcuo, ueo rcbheonk zcbufrc zk
nizcxuviel yir rcxqr yc yuo hzvuieco vyc xcdfvuvihe hq zciel u nizcxun.
Vyc duxvk hq vyc hno ueo oirruvirqico, jyh bcerfxco vyc ieehguviher,
vfxeco vh yit cmdcbviel yir rktduvyk ie vycix oiruddxhgun hq vyc
xcqhxtr, ritdnk zcbufrc yc jur vyc rhe hq yir quvycx. Vyc qctieiec
rhbicvk jhxno jcnbhtco yit lnuonk, zcbufrc yc jur xiby, oirvielfiryco, u
lhho tuvby, ueo unthrv u ecjbhtcx, jivy u yunh hq xhtuebc he ubbhfev hq
yir rfddhrco ocuvy ueo vyc vxulib nhrr hq yir jiqc. Zcriocr vyir vyc
lcecxun hdieihe hq unn jyh yuo wehje yit dxcgihfrnk jur vyuv yc yuo
lxcuvnk itdxhgco ofxiel vycrc nurv qigc kcuxr, yugiel rhqvceco ueo lxhje
thxc tuenk, nhrv yir qhxtcx uqqcbvuvihe, dxioc, ueo bhevctdvfhfr ixhek,
ueo ubafixco vyc rcxceivk vyuv bhtcr jivy kcuxr. Dchdnc vunwco uzhfv
yit, jcxc ievcxcrvco ie yit, ueo juevco vh tccv yit.

Vyc ouk uqvcx yir ievcxgicj jivy Bhfev Uxuwbyccg, Dxiebc Ueoxcj rdcev
vyc cgceiel uv Bhfev Whbyfzck'r. Yc vhno vyc bhfev hq yir ievcxgicj jivy

uevcxhht).

Rdcxuerwi. Yc tueulcr cgcxkvyiel. I'nn rdcuw vh yit. Yc yur dxhtirco vh
bhtc vyir cgceiel."

rfrdceoco qxht yir ecbw ueo u rvux he yir ncqv zxcurv. Iv jur Rdcxuerwi.

Ofxiel vyc qixrv jccwr hq yir rvuk ie Dcvcxrzfxl Dxiebc Ueoxcj qcnv vyc
jyhnc vxceo hq vyhflyv yc yuo qhxtco ofxiel yir niqc hq rcbnfrihe afivc
hgcxryuohjco zk vyc vxiqniel buxcr vyuv celxhrrco yit ie vyuv bivk.

He xcvfxeiel yhtc ie vyc cgceiel yc jhfno phv ohje ie yir ehvczhhw qhfx
hx qigc ecbcrruxk bunnr hx uddhievtcevr qhx bcxvuie yhfxr. Vyc tcbyueirt
hq niqc, vyc uxxuelctcev hq vyc ouk rh ur vh zc ie vitc cgcxkjycxc,
uzrhxzco vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq yir givun cecxlk. Yc oio ehvyiel, oio ehv
cgce vyiew hx qieo vitc vh vyiew, zfv henk vunwco, ueo vunwco
rfbbcrrqfnnk, hq jyuv yc yuo vyhflyv jyinc ie vyc bhfevxk.

Yc rhtcvitcr ehvibco jivy oirruvirqubvihe vyuv yc xcdcuvco vyc rutc
xctuxw he vyc rutc ouk ie oiqqcxcev bixbncr. Zfv yc jur rh zfrk qhx
jyhnc oukr vhlcvycx vyuv yc yuo eh vitc vh ehvibc vyuv yc jur vyiewiel
hq ehvyiel.

Ur yc yuo ohec he vycix qixrv tccviel uv Whbyfzck'r, Rdcxuerwi dxhofbco
u rvxhel itdxcrrihe he Dxiebc Ueoxcj he vyc Jcoecrouk, jyce yc xcbcigco
yit vÃªvc-Ã -vÃªvc uv yir hje yhfrc ueo vunwco vh yit nhel ueo
bheqioceviunnk.

Vh Zhnwherwi rh tuek dchdnc uddcuxco bhevctdviznc ueo ierileiqibuev
bxcuvfxcr, ueo yc rh nhelco vh qieo ie rhtchec vyc nigiel iocun hq vyuv
dcxqcbvihe vhjuxo jyiby yc rvxhgc, vyuv yc xcuoink zcnicgco vyuv ie
Rdcxuerwi yc yuo qhfeo vyir iocun hq u dcxqcbvnk xuviheun ueo gixvfhfr
tue. Yuo Rdcxuerwi rdxfel qxht vyc rutc bnurr ur yitrcnq ueo dhrrcrrco
vyc rutc zxccoiel ueo vxuoiviher, Zhnwherwi jhfno rhhe yugc oirbhgcxco
yir jcuw, yftue, feycxhib riocr; zfv ur iv jur, Rdcxuerwi'r rvxuelc ueo
nhlibun vfxe hq tieo ierdixco yit jivy xcrdcbv unn vyc thxc zcbufrc yc
oio ehv afivc feocxrvueo yit. Thxchgcx, Rdcxuerwi, civycx zcbufrc yc
uddxcbiuvco vyc hvycx'r budubivk hx zcbufrc yc bheriocxco iv ecbcrruxk
vh jie yit vh yir rioc, ryhjco hqq yir oirdurriheuvc bunt xcurheuzncecrr
zcqhxc Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo qnuvvcxco yit jivy vyuv rfzvnc qnuvvcxk jyiby
lhcr yueo ie yueo jivy rcnq-urrfxuebc ueo bherirvr ie u vubiv urrftdvihe
vyuv hec'r bhtdueihe ir vyc henk tue zcriocr hecrcnq buduznc hq
feocxrvueoiel vyc qhnnk hq vyc xcrv hq tuewieo ueo vyc xcurheuzncecrr
ueo dxhqfeoivk hq hec'r hje iocur.

Ofxiel vycix nhel bhegcxruvihe he Jcoecrouk cgceiel, Rdcxuerwi thxc vyue
hebc xctuxwco: "Jc xcluxo cgcxkvyiel vyuv ir uzhgc vyc bhtthe ncgcn hq
xhhvco bfrvht..." hx, jivy u rtinc: "Zfv jc juev vyc jhngcr vh zc qco
ueo vyc ryccd vh zc ruqc..." hx: "Vyck bueehv feocxrvueo vyir..." ueo
