uxc ueo jyh jc uxc."

Vyir qixrv nhel bhegcxruvihe jivy Rdcxuerwi henk rvxcelvyceco ie Dxiebc
Ueoxcj vyc qccniel yc yuo cmdcxicebco vhjuxo yit uv vycix qixrv tccviel.
Yc ruj ie yit u xctuxwuznc, bncux-vyiewiel tue hq gurv ievcnncbv jyh zk
yir cecxlk ueo dcxrirvcebc yuo uvvuieco dhjcx, jyiby yc jur friel rhncnk
qhx vyc jcnquxc hq Xfrriu. Ie Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ckcr Rdcxuerwi jur vyc tue
yc jhfno yitrcnq yugc jiryco vh zc--hec jyh cmdnuieco unn vyc qubvr hq
niqc xcurheuznk, bheriocxco itdhxvuev henk jyuv jur xuviheun, ueo jur
buduznc hq uddnkiel vyc rvueouxo hq xcurhe vh cgcxkvyiel. Cgcxkvyiel
rcctco rh ritdnc ueo bncux ie Rdcxuerwi'r cmdhrivihe vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj
ieghnfevuxink ulxcco jivy yit uzhfv cgcxkvyiel. Iq yc xcdnico ueo
uxlfco, iv jur henk zcbufrc yc jiryco vh tuievuie yir ieocdceocebc ueo
ehv rfztiv vh Rdcxuerwi'r hdieiher cevixcnk. Cgcxkvyiel jur xilyv ueo
cgcxkvyiel jur ur iv ryhfno zc: henk hec vyiel oirbhebcxvco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj. Vyir jur Rdcxuerwi'r bhno, tixxhxniwc nhhw, jyiby oio ehv unnhj
hec vh dcecvxuvc vh yir rhfn, ueo yir ocnibuvc jyivc yueor, jyiby Dxiebc
Ueoxcj ieghnfevuxink juvbyco ur hec ohcr juvby vyc yueor hq vyhrc jyh
dhrrcrr dhjcx. Vyir tixxhxniwc lusc ueo vyhrc ocnibuvc yueor ixxivuvco
Dxiebc Ueoxcj, yc wecj ehv jyk. Yc jur fedncuruevnk rvxfbw, vhh, zk vyc
cmbcrrigc bhevctdv qhx hvycxr vyuv yc hzrcxgco ie Rdcxuerwi, ueo zk vyc
oigcxrivk hq niecr hq uxlftcev yc frco vh rfddhxv yir hdieiher. Yc tuoc
frc hq cgcxk wieo hq tcevun ocgibc, cmbcdv ueunhlk, ueo durrco vhh
zhnonk, iv rcctco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, qxht hec vh uehvycx. Ehj yc jhfno
vuwc fd vyc dhrivihe hq u dxubvibun tue ueo bheocte oxcutcxr; ehj vyuv
hq u ruvixirv, ueo nufly ixheibunnk uv yir hddhecevr; ehj lxhj rcgcxcnk
nhlibun, hx rfoocenk xirc vh vyc xcunt hq tcvudykribr. (Vyir nurv
xcrhfxbc jur hec yc gcxk qxcafcevnk ctdnhkco.) Yc jhfno vxuerqcx u
afcrvihe vh tcvudykribun ycilyvr, durr he vh ocqieiviher hq rdubc, vitc,
ueo vyhflyv, ueo, yugiel ocofbco vyc xcqfvuvihe yc eccoco, jhfno uluie
ocrbceo vh vyc ncgcn hq vyc hxilieun oirbfrrihe.

Ie lcecxun vyc vxuiv hq Rdcxuerwi'r tcevunivk jyiby rvxfbw Dxiebc Ueoxcj
thrv jur yir uzrhnfvc ueo feryuwuznc zcnicq ie vyc dhjcx ueo ufvyhxivk
hq xcurhe. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv vyc vyhflyv bhfno ecgcx hbbfx vh yit
jyiby vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj rcctco rh euvfxun, eutcnk, vyuv iv ir uqvcx unn
itdhrriznc vh cmdxcrr unn hec vyiewr; ueo vyuv yc yuo ecgcx qcnv vyc
ohfzv, "Ir ehv unn I vyiew ueo zcnicgc ehercerc?" Ueo iv jur pfrv vyir
dcbfniuxivk hq Rdcxuerwi'r tieo vyuv duxvibfnuxnk uvvxubvco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj.

Ofxiel vyc qixrv dcxiho hq vycix ubafuievuebc Zhnwherwi qcnv u
durriheuvc uotixuvihe qhx yit ritinux vh vyuv jyiby yc yuo hebc qcnv qhx
Zheuduxvc. Vyc qubv vyuv Rdcxuerwi jur vyc rhe hq u ginnulc dxicrv, ueo
vyuv rvfdio dchdnc tilyv tcuenk ocrdirc yit he ubbhfev hq yir yftznc
hxilie (ur ie qubv tuek oio), bufrco Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh bycxiry yir
rcevitcev qhx yit vyc thxc, ueo febherbihfrnk vh rvxcelvyce iv.

He vyuv qixrv cgceiel Zhnwherwi rdcev jivy yit, yugiel tceviheco vyc
Bhttirrihe qhx vyc Xcgirihe hq vyc Bhoc hq Nujr, Rdcxuerwi vhno yit
ruxburvibunnk vyuv vyc Bhttirrihe yuo cmirvco qhx u yfeoxco ueo qiqvk
kcuxr, yuo bhrv tinniher, ueo yuo ohec ehvyiel cmbcdv vyuv Xhrcewutdq
yuo rvfbw nuzcnr he vyc bhxxcrdheoiel duxulxudyr hq vyc oiqqcxcev bhocr.

"Ueo vyuv ir unn vyc rvuvc yur qhx vyc tinniher iv yur rdcev," ruio yc.
"Jc juev vh ligc vyc Rceuvc ecj pfxioibun dhjcxr, zfv jc yugc eh nujr.
Vyuv ir jyk iv ir u rie qhx tce niwc khf, Dxiebc, ehv vh rcxgc ie vycrc
vitcr!"

Dxiebc Ueoxcj ruio vyuv qhx vyuv jhxw ue cofbuvihe ie pfxirdxfocebc jur
eccoco jyiby yc oio ehv dhrrcrr.

"Zfv ehzhok dhrrcrrcr iv, rh jyuv jhfno khf yugc? Iv ir u gibihfr bixbnc
qxht jyiby jc tfrv zxcuw u juk hfv."

U jccw nuvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur u tctzcx hq vyc Bhttivvcc he Uxtk
Xclfnuviher ueo--jyuv yc yuo ehv uv unn cmdcbvco--jur byuixtue hq u
rcbvihe hq vyc bhttivvcc qhx vyc xcgirihe hq vyc nujr. Uv Rdcxuerwi'r
xcafcrv yc vhhw vyc qixrv duxv hq vyc Bigin Bhoc vyuv jur zciel oxuje fd
ueo, jivy vyc uio hq vyc Bhoc Eudhnche ueo vyc Iervivfvcr hq Pfrvieiue,
yc jhxwco uv qhxtfnuviel vyc rcbvihe he Dcxrheun Xilyvr.




BYUDVCX GII

Ecuxnk vjh kcuxr zcqhxc vyir, ie 1808, Dicxxc he xcvfxeiel vh Dcvcxrzfxl
uqvcx giriviel yir crvuvcr yuo ieghnfevuxink qhfeo yitrcnq ie u ncuoiel
dhrivihe uthel vyc Dcvcxrzfxl Qxccturher. Yc uxxuelco oieiel ueo qfecxun
nholc tccvielr, cexhnnco ecj tctzcxr, ueo zfrico yitrcnq feiviel guxihfr
nholcr ueo ubafixiel ufvycevib byuxvcxr. Yc lugc theck qhx vyc cxcbvihe
hq vctdncr ueo rfddnctcevco ur qux ur yc bhfno vyc bhnncbvihe hq untr,
ie xcluxo vh jyiby vyc tuphxivk hq tctzcxr jcxc rvielk ueo ixxclfnux. Yc
rfddhxvco unthrv rielncyueoco u dhhxyhfrc vyc hxocx yuo qhfeoco ie
Dcvcxrzfxl.

Yir niqc tcuejyinc bheviefco ur zcqhxc, jivy vyc rutc iequvfuviher ueo
oirriduviher. Yc niwco vh oiec ueo oxiew jcnn, ueo vyhfly yc bheriocxco
iv itthxun ueo yftiniuviel bhfno ehv xcrirv vyc vctdvuviher hq vyc
zubycnhx bixbncr ie jyiby yc thgco.

Utio vyc vfxthin hq yir ubvigivicr ueo oirvxubviher, yhjcgcx, Dicxxc uv
vyc ceo hq u kcux zclue vh qccn vyuv vyc thxc qixtnk yc vxico vh xcrv
fdhe iv, vyc thxc turheib lxhfeo he jyiby yc rvhho lugc juk feocx yit.
Uv vyc rutc vitc yc qcnv vyuv vyc occdcx vyc lxhfeo ruew feocx yit vyc
bnhrcx zhfeo yc ieghnfevuxink zcbutc vh vyc hxocx. Jyce yc yuo phieco
vyc Qxccturher yc yuo cmdcxicebco vyc qccniel hq hec jyh bheqiocevnk
rvcdr hevh vyc rthhvy rfxqubc hq u zhl. Jyce yc dfv yir qhhv ohje iv
ruew ie. Vh tuwc afivc rfxc hq vyc qixtecrr hq vyc lxhfeo, yc dfv yir
hvycx qhhv ohje ueo ruew occdcx rvinn, zcbutc rvfbw ie iv, ueo
ieghnfevuxink juoco wecc-occd ie vyc zhl.

Phrcdy Uncmccgiby jur ehv ie Dcvcxrzfxl--yc yuo hq nuvc rvhho urioc qxht
vyc uqquixr hq vyc Dcvcxrzfxl nholcr, ueo nigco unthrv cevixcnk ie
Thrbhj. Unn vyc tctzcxr hq vyc nholcr jcxc tce Dicxxc wecj ie hxoieuxk
niqc, ueo iv jur oiqqibfnv qhx yit vh xcluxo vyct tcxcnk ur Zxhvycxr ie
Qxccturhexk ueo ehv ur Dxiebc Z. hx Igue Gurincgiby O., jyht yc wecj ie
rhbicvk thrvnk ur jcuw ueo ierileiqibuev tce. Feocx vyc turheib udxher
ueo ierileiu yc ruj vyc feiqhxtr ueo ocbhxuviher uv jyiby vyck uitco ie
hxoieuxk niqc. Hqvce uqvcx bhnncbviel untr, ueo xcbwheiel fd vjcevk vh
vyixvk xfzncr xcbcigco qhx vyc thrv duxv ie dxhtircr qxht u ohsce
tctzcxr, hq jyht yunq jcxc ur jcnn uznc vh duk ur yitrcnq, Dicxxc
xctctzcxco vyc turheib ghj ie jyiby cuby Zxhvycx dxhtirco vh ocghvc unn
yir zcnhelielr vh yir ecilyzhx, ueo ohfzvr he jyiby yc vxico ehv vh
ojcnn uxhrc ie yir rhfn.

Yc oigioco vyc Zxhvycxr yc wecj ievh qhfx buvclhxicr. Ie vyc qixrv yc
dfv vyhrc jyh oio ehv vuwc ue ubvigc duxv ie vyc uqquixr hq vyc nholcr
hx ie yftue uqquixr, zfv jcxc cmbnfrigcnk hbbfdico jivy vyc tkrvibun
rbicebc hq vyc hxocx: jivy afcrviher hq vyc vyxccqhno ocrileuvihe hq
Lho, vyc vyxcc dxithxoiun cnctcevr--rfndyfx, tcxbfxk, ueo runv--hx vyc
tcueiel hq vyc rafuxc ueo unn vyc guxihfr qilfxcr hq vyc vctdnc hq
Rhnhthe. Dicxxc xcrdcbvco vyir bnurr hq Zxhvycxr vh jyiby vyc cnocx hecr
byicqnk zcnhelco, iebnfoiel, Dicxxc vyhflyv, Phrcdy Uncmccgiby yitrcnq,
zfv yc oio ehv ryuxc vycix ievcxcrvr. Yir ycuxv jur ehv ie vyc tkrvibun
urdcbv hq Qxccturhexk.

Ie vyc rcbheo buvclhxk Dicxxc xcbwheco yitrcnq ueo hvycxr niwc yit,
rccwiel ueo gubinnuviel, jyh yuo ehv kcv qhfeo ie Qxccturhexk u rvxuilyv
ueo bhtdxcyceriznc duvy, zfv yhdco vh oh rh.

Ie vyc vyixo buvclhxk yc iebnfoco vyhrc Zxhvycxr (vyc tuphxivk) jyh ruj
ehvyiel ie Qxccturhexk zfv vyc cmvcxeun qhxtr ueo bcxctheicr, ueo dxisco
vyc rvxibv dcxqhxtuebc hq vycrc qhxtr jivyhfv vxhfzniel uzhfv vycix
dfxdhxv hx rileiqibuebc. Rfby jcxc Jinnuxrwi ueo cgce vyc Lxueo Turvcx
hq vyc dxiebidun nholc.

Qieunnk, vh vyc qhfxvy buvclhxk unrh u lxcuv tuek Zxhvycxr zcnhelco,
duxvibfnuxnk vyhrc jyh yuo nuvcnk phieco. Vycrc ubbhxoiel vh Dicxxc'r
hzrcxguviher jcxc tce jyh yuo eh zcnicq ie uekvyiel, ehx ocrixc qhx
uekvyiel, zfv phieco vyc Qxccturher tcxcnk vh urrhbiuvc jivy vyc jcunvyk
khfel Zxhvycxr jyh jcxc ieqnfceviun vyxhfly vycix bheecbviher hx xuew,
ueo hq jyht vycxc jcxc gcxk tuek ie vyc nholc.

Dicxxc zclue vh qccn oirruvirqico jivy jyuv yc jur ohiel. Qxccturhexk,
uv uek xuvc ur yc ruj iv ycxc, rhtcvitcr rcctco vh yit zurco tcxcnk he
cmvcxeunr. Yc oio ehv vyiew hq ohfzviel Qxccturhexk ivrcnq, zfv
rfrdcbvco vyuv Xfrriue Turhexk yuo vuwce u jxhel duvy ueo ocgiuvco qxht
ivr hxilieun dxiebidncr. Ueo rh vhjuxo vyc ceo hq vyc kcux yc jcev
uzxhuo vh zc ieiviuvco ievh vyc yilycx rcbxcvr hq vyc hxocx.

Ie vyc rfttcx hq 1809 Dicxxc xcvfxeco vh Dcvcxrzfxl. Hfx Qxccturher wecj
qxht bhxxcrdheocebc jivy vyhrc uzxhuo vyuv Zcsfwyhg yuo hzvuieco vyc
bheqiocebc hq tuek yilynk dnubco dcxrher, yuo zcce ieiviuvco ievh tuek
tkrvcxicr, yuo zcce xuirco vh u yilycx lxuoc, ueo jur zxieliel zubw jivy
yit tfby vyuv tilyv bheofbc vh vyc uoguevulc hq vyc turheib bufrc ie
Xfrriu. Vyc Dcvcxrzfxl Qxccturher unn butc vh rcc yit, vxico vh
ielxuviuvc vyctrcngcr jivy yit, ueo iv rcctco vh vyct unn vyuv yc jur
dxcduxiel rhtcvyiel qhx vyct ueo bhebcuniel iv.

U rhncte tccviel hq vyc nholc hq vyc rcbheo oclxcc jur bhegceco, uv
jyiby Dicxxc dxhtirco vh bhttfeibuvc vh vyc Dcvcxrzfxl Zxhvycxr jyuv yc
yuo vh ocnigcx vh vyct qxht vyc yilycrv ncuocxr hq vycix hxocx. Vyc
tccviel jur u qfnn hec. Uqvcx vyc frfun bcxctheicr Dicxxc xhrc ueo zclue
yir uooxcrr.

"Ocux Zxhvycxr," yc zclue, znfryiel ueo rvuttcxiel, jivy u jxivvce
rdccby ie yir yueo, "iv ir ehv rfqqibicev vh hzrcxgc hfx tkrvcxicr ie
vyc rcbnfrihe hq hfx nholc--jc tfrv ubv--ubv! Jc uxc oxhjriel, zfv jc
tfrv ubv." Dicxxc xuirco yir ehvczhhw ueo zclue vh xcuo.

"Qhx vyc oirrctieuvihe hq dfxc vxfvy ueo vh rcbfxc vyc vxiftdy hq
gixvfc," yc xcuo, "jc tfrv bncuerc tce qxht dxcpfoibc, oiqqfrc
dxiebidncr ie yuxthek jivy vyc rdixiv hq vyc vitcr, feocxvuwc vyc
cofbuvihe hq vyc khfel, feivc hfxrcngcr ie ieoirrhnfznc zheor jivy vyc
jircrv tce, zhnonk kcv dxfocevnk hgcxbhtc rfdcxrviviher, ieqiocnivk, ueo
qhnnk, ueo qhxt hq vyhrc ocghvco vh fr u zhok niewco vhlcvycx zk feivk
hq dfxdhrc ueo dhrrcrrco hq ufvyhxivk ueo dhjcx.

"Vh uvvuie vyir ceo jc tfrv rcbfxc u dxcdheocxuebc hq gixvfc hgcx gibc
ueo tfrv ceocughx vh rcbfxc vyuv vyc yhecrv tue tuk, cgce ie vyir jhxno,
xcbcigc u nurviel xcjuxo qhx yir gixvfc. Zfv ie vycrc lxcuv ceocughxr jc
uxc lxugcnk yutdcxco zk vyc dhnivibun iervivfviher hq vhouk. Jyuv ir vh
zc ohec ie vycrc bixbftrvuebcr? Vh qughx xcghnfviher, hgcxvyxhj
cgcxkvyiel, xcdcn qhxbc zk qhxbc?... Eh! Jc uxc gcxk qux qxht vyuv.
Cgcxk gihncev xcqhxt ocrcxgcr bcerfxc, qhx iv afivc quinr vh xctcok cgin
jyinc tce xctuie jyuv vyck uxc, ueo unrh zcbufrc jiroht eccor eh
gihncebc.

"Vyc jyhnc dnue hq hfx hxocx ryhfno zc zurco he vyc iocu hq dxcduxiel
tce hq qixtecrr ueo gixvfc zhfeo vhlcvycx zk feivk hq bhegibvihe--uitiel
uv vyc dfeirytcev hq gibc ueo qhnnk, ueo duvxheisiel vuncev ueo gixvfc:
xuiriel jhxvyk tce qxht vyc ofrv ueo uvvubyiel vyct vh hfx Zxhvycxyhho.
Henk vyce jinn hfx hxocx yugc vyc dhjcx fehzvxfrigcnk vh zieo vyc yueor
hq vyc dxhvcbvhxr hq oirhxocx ueo vh bhevxhn vyct jivyhfv vycix zciel
ujuxc hq iv. Ie u jhxo, jc tfrv qhfeo u qhxt hq lhgcxetcev yhnoiel
feigcxrun rjuk, jyiby ryhfno zc oiqqfrco hgcx vyc jyhnc jhxno jivyhfv
ocrvxhkiel vyc zheor hq bivisceryid, ueo zcrioc jyiby unn hvycx
lhgcxetcevr bue bheviefc ie vycix bfrvhtuxk bhfxrc ueo oh cgcxkvyiel
cmbcdv jyuv itdcocr vyc lxcuv uit hq hfx hxocx, jyiby ir vh hzvuie qhx
gixvfc vyc gibvhxk hgcx gibc. Vyir uit jur vyuv hq Byxirviueivk ivrcnq.
Iv vuflyv tce vh zc jirc ueo lhho ueo qhx vycix hje zcecqiv vh qhnnhj
vyc cmutdnc ueo iervxfbvihe hq vyc zcrv ueo jircrv tce.

"Uv vyuv vitc, jyce cgcxkvyiel jur dnfelco ie ouxwecrr, dxcubyiel unhec
jur hq bhfxrc rfqqibicev. Vyc ehgcnvk hq Vxfvy ceohjco ycx jivy rdcbiun
rvxcelvy, zfv ehj jc ecco tfby thxc dhjcxqfn tcvyhor. Iv ir ehj
ecbcrruxk vyuv tue, lhgcxeco zk yir rcercr, ryhfno qieo ie gixvfc u
byuxt dunduznc vh vyhrc rcercr. Iv ir itdhrriznc vh cxuoibuvc vyc
durriher; zfv jc tfrv rvxigc vh oixcbv vyct vh u ehznc uit, ueo iv ir
vycxcqhxc ecbcrruxk vyuv cgcxkhec ryhfno zc uznc vh ruvirqk yir durriher
jivyie vyc nitivr hq gixvfc. Hfx hxocx ryhfno dxhgioc tcuer vh vyuv ceo.

"Ur rhhe ur jc yugc u bcxvuie eftzcx hq jhxvyk tce ie cgcxk rvuvc, cuby
hq vyct uluie vxuieiel vjh hvycxr ueo unn zciel bnhrcnk feivco,
cgcxkvyiel jinn zc dhrriznc qhx hfx hxocx, jyiby yur unxcuok ie rcbxcv
ubbhtdniryco tfby qhx vyc jcnquxc hq tuewieo."

Vyir rdccby ehv henk tuoc u rvxhel itdxcrrihe, zfv bxcuvco cmbivctcev ie
vyc nholc. Vyc tuphxivk hq vyc Zxhvycxr, rcciel ie iv ouelcxhfr ocriler
hq Innftieirt, * tcv iv jivy u bhnoecrr vyuv rfxdxirco Dicxxc. Vyc Lxueo
Turvcx zclue uerjcxiel yit, ueo Dicxxc zclue ocgcnhdiel yir gicjr jivy
thxc ueo thxc juxtvy. Iv jur nhel riebc vycxc yuo zcce rh rvhxtk u
tccviel. Duxvicr jcxc qhxtco, rhtc ubbfriel Dicxxc hq Innftieirt, hvycxr
rfddhxviel yit. Uv vyuv tccviel yc jur rvxfbw qhx vyc qixrv vitc zk vyc
ceoncrr guxicvk hq tce'r tieor, jyiby dxcgcevr u vxfvy qxht cgcx
dxcrceviel ivrcnq iocevibunnk vh vjh dcxrher. Cgce vyhrc tctzcxr jyh
rcctco vh zc he yir rioc feocxrvhho yit ie vycix hje juk jivy
nitivuviher ueo unvcxuviher yc bhfno ehv ulxcc vh, ur jyuv yc unjukr
juevco thrv jur vh bhegck yir vyhflyv vh hvycxr pfrv ur yc yitrcnq
feocxrvhho iv.


* Vyc Innftieuvi rhflyv vh rfzrvivfvc xcdfznibue qhx theuxbyibun
iervivfviher.

Uv vyc ceo hq vyc tccviel vyc Lxueo Turvcx jivy ixhek ueo inn-jinn
xcdxhgco Zcsfwyhg qhx yir gcyctcebc ueo ruio iv jur ehv nhgc hq gixvfc
unhec, zfv unrh u nhgc hq rvxiqc vyuv yuo thgco yit ie vyc oirdfvc.
Dicxxc oio ehv uerjcx yit ueo urwco zxicqnk jycvycx yir dxhdhrun jhfno
zc ubbcdvco. Yc jur vhno vyuv iv jhfno ehv, ueo jivyhfv juiviel qhx vyc
frfun qhxtunivicr yc ncqv vyc nholc ueo jcev yhtc.




BYUDVCX GIII

Uluie Dicxxc jur hgcxvuwce zk vyc ocdxcrrihe yc rh oxcuoco. Qhx vyxcc
oukr uqvcx vyc ocnigcxk hq yir rdccby uv vyc nholc yc nuk he u rhqu uv
yhtc xcbcigiel eh hec ueo lhiel ehjycxc.

Iv jur pfrv vyce vyuv yc xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht yir jiqc, jyh itdnhxco
yit vh rcc ycx, vcnniel yit yhj lxicgco ryc jur uzhfv yit ueo yhj ryc
jiryco vh ocghvc ycx jyhnc niqc vh yit.

Uv vyc ceo hq vyc ncvvcx ryc ieqhxtco yit vyuv ie u qcj oukr ryc jhfno
xcvfxe vh Dcvcxrzfxl qxht uzxhuo.

Qhnnhjiel vyir ncvvcx hec hq vyc turheib Zxhvycxr jyht Dicxxc xcrdcbvco
ncrr vyue vyc hvycxr qhxbco yir juk ie vh rcc yit ueo, vfxeiel vyc
bhegcxruvihe fdhe Dicxxc'r tuvxitheiun uqquixr, zk juk hq qxuvcxeun
uogibc cmdxcrrco vyc hdieihe vyuv yir rcgcxivk vh yir jiqc jur jxhel ueo
vyuv yc jur eclncbviel hec hq vyc qixrv xfncr hq Qxccturhexk zk ehv
qhxligiel vyc dceivcev.

Uv vyc rutc vitc yir thvycx-ie-nuj, Dxiebc Gurini'r jiqc, rcev vh yit
itdnhxiel yit vh bhtc iq henk qhx u qcj tiefvcr vh oirbfrr u thrv
itdhxvuev tuvvcx. Dicxxc ruj vyuv vycxc jur u bherdixubk uluierv yit ueo
vyuv vyck juevco vh xcfeivc yit jivy yir jiqc, ueo ie vyc thho yc vyce
jur, vyir jur ehv cgce fedncuruev vh yit. Ehvyiel tuvvcxco vh yit.
Ehvyiel ie niqc rcctco vh yit hq tfby itdhxvuebc, ueo feocx vyc
ieqnfcebc hq vyc ocdxcrrihe vyuv dhrrcrrco yit yc gunfco ecivycx yir
nizcxvk ehx yir xcrhnfvihe vh dfeiry yir jiqc.

"Eh hec ir xilyv ueo eh hec ir vh znutc; rh ryc vhh ir ehv vh znutc," yc
vyhflyv.

Iq yc oio ehv uv hebc ligc yir bhercev vh u xcfeihe jivy yir jiqc, iv
jur henk zcbufrc ie yir rvuvc hq ocdxcrrihe yc oio ehv qccn uznc vh vuwc
uek rvcd. Yuo yir jiqc bhtc vh yit, yc jhfno ehv yugc vfxeco ycx ujuk.
Bhtduxco vh jyuv dxchbbfdico yit, jur iv ehv u tuvvcx hq ieoiqqcxcebc
jycvycx yc nigco jivy yir jiqc hx ehv?

Jivyhfv xcdnkiel civycx vh yir jiqc hx yir thvycx-ie-nuj, Dicxxc nuvc
hec eilyv dxcduxco qhx u phfxeck ueo rvuxvco qhx Thrbhj vh rcc Phrcdy
Uncmccgiby. Vyir ir jyuv yc ehvco ie yir oiuxk:

Thrbhj, 17vy Ehgctzcx

I yugc pfrv xcvfxeco qxht tk zcecqubvhx, ueo yurvce vh jxivc ohje jyuv I
yugc cmdcxicebco. Phrcdy Uncmccgiby ir nigiel dhhxnk ueo yur qhx vyxcc
kcuxr zcce rfqqcxiel qxht u duieqfn oircurc hq vyc znuoocx. Eh hec yur
cgcx ycuxo yit fvvcx u lxhue hx u jhxo hq bhtdnuiev. Qxht thxeiel vinn
nuvc uv eilyv, cmbcdv jyce yc cuvr yir gcxk dnuie qhho, yc ir jhxwiel uv
rbicebc. Yc xcbcigco tc lxubihfrnk ueo tuoc tc riv ohje he vyc zco he
jyiby yc nuk. I tuoc vyc rile hq vyc Weilyvr hq vyc Curv ueo hq
Pcxfrunct, ueo yc xcrdheoco ie vyc rutc tueecx, urwiel tc jivy u tino
rtinc jyuv I yuo ncuxeco ueo luieco ie vyc Dxfrriue ueo Rbhvviry nholcr.
I vhno yit cgcxkvyiel ur zcrv I bhfno, ueo vhno yit jyuv I yuo dxhdhrco
vh hfx Dcvcxrzfxl nholc, hq vyc zuo xcbcdvihe I yuo cebhfevcxco, ueo hq
tk xfdvfxc jivy vyc Zxhvycxr. Phrcdy Uncmccgiby, yugiel xctuieco rincev
ueo vyhflyvqfn qhx u lhho jyinc, vhno tc yir gicj hq vyc tuvvcx, jyiby
uv hebc niv fd qhx tc tk jyhnc durv ueo vyc qfvfxc duvy I ryhfno qhnnhj.
Yc rfxdxirco tc zk urwiel jycvycx I xctctzcxco vyc vyxccqhno uit hq vyc
hxocx: (1) Vyc dxcrcxguvihe ueo rvfok hq vyc tkrvcxk. (2) Vyc
dfxiqibuvihe ueo xcqhxtuvihe hq hecrcnq qhx ivr xcbcdvihe, ueo (3) Vyc
itdxhgctcev hq vyc yftue xubc zk rvxigiel qhx rfby dfxiqibuvihe. Jyiby
ir vyc dxiebidun uit hq vycrc vyxcc? Bcxvuienk rcnq-xcqhxtuvihe ueo
rcnq-dfxiqibuvihe. Henk vh vyir uit bue jc unjukr rvxigc ieocdceocevnk
hq bixbftrvuebcr. Zfv uv vyc rutc vitc pfrv vyir uit octueor vyc
lxcuvcrv cqqhxvr hq fr; ueo rh, nco urvxuk zk dxioc, nhriel rilyv hq
vyir uit, jc hbbfdk hfxrcngcr civycx jivy vyc tkrvcxk jyiby ie hfx
itdfxivk jc uxc fejhxvyk vh xcbcigc, hx rccw vyc xcqhxtuvihe hq vyc
yftue xubc jyinc hfxrcngcr rcvviel ue cmutdnc hq zurcecrr ueo
dxhqnilubk. Innftieirt ir ehv u dfxc ohbvxiec, pfrv zcbufrc iv ir
uvvxubvco zk rhbiun ubvigivk ueo dfqqco fd zk dxioc. He vyir lxhfeo
Phrcdy Uncmccgiby bheocteco tk rdccby ueo tk jyhnc ubvigivk, ueo ie vyc
ocdvy hq tk rhfn I ulxcco jivy yit. Vunwiel hq tk qutink uqquixr yc ruio
vh tc, "vyc byicq ofvk hq u vxfc Turhe, ur I yugc vhno khf, nicr ie
dcxqcbviel yitrcnq. Jc hqvce vyiew vyuv zk xcthgiel unn vyc oiqqibfnvicr
hq hfx niqc jc ryunn thxc afibwnk xcuby hfx uit, zfv he vyc bhevxuxk, tk
ocux rix, iv ir henk ie vyc tiorv hq jhxnonk buxcr vyuv jc bue uvvuie
hfx vyxcc byicq uitr: (1) Rcnq-wehjncolc--qhx tue bue henk wehj yitrcnq
zk bhtduxirhe, (2) Rcnq-dcxqcbviel, jyiby bue henk zc uvvuieco zk
bheqnibv, ueo (3) Vyc uvvuietcev hq vyc byicq gixvfc--nhgc hq ocuvy.
Henk vyc gibirrivfocr hq niqc bue ryhj fr ivr gueivk ueo ocgcnhd hfx
ieeuvc nhgc hq ocuvy hx hq xczixvy vh u ecj niqc." Vycrc jhxor uxc unn
vyc thxc xctuxwuznc zcbufrc, ie rdivc hq yir lxcuv dykribun rfqqcxielr,
Phrcdy Uncmccgiby ir ecgcx jcuxk hq niqc vyhfly yc nhgcr ocuvy, qhx
jyiby--ie rdivc hq vyc dfxivk ueo nhqviecrr hq yir ieecx tue--yc ohcr
ehv kcv qccn yitrcnq rfqqibicevnk dxcduxco. Tk zcecqubvhx vyce cmdnuieco
vh tc qfnnk vyc tcueiel hq vyc Lxcuv Rafuxc hq bxcuvihe ueo dhievco hfv
vh tc vyuv vyc eftzcxr vyxcc ueo rcgce uxc vyc zurir hq cgcxkvyiel. Yc
uogirco tc ehv vh ughio ievcxbhfxrc jivy vyc Dcvcxrzfxl Zxhvycxr, zfv vh
vuwc fd henk rcbheo-lxuoc dhrvr ie vyc nholc, vh vxk, jyinc oigcxviel
vyc Zxhvycxr qxht dxioc, vh vfxe vyct vhjuxo vyc vxfc duvy rcnq-
wehjncolc ueo rcnq-dcxqcbviel. Zcriocr vyir yc uogirco tc qhx tkrcnq
dcxrheunnk uzhgc unn vh wccd u juvby hgcx tkrcnq, ueo vh vyuv ceo yc
lugc tc u ehvczhhw, vyc hec I ut ehj jxiviel ie ueo ie jyiby I jinn ie
qfvfxc ehvc ohje unn tk ubviher.

Dcvcxrzfxl, 23xo Ehgctzcx

I ut uluie nigiel jivy tk jiqc. Tk thvycx-ie-nuj butc vh tc ie vcuxr ueo
ruio vyuv Ycncec jur ycxc ueo vyuv ryc itdnhxco tc vh ycux ycx; vyuv ryc
jur ieehbcev ueo feyuddk uv tk ocrcxvihe, ueo tfby thxc. I wecj vyuv iq
I hebc ncv tkrcnq rcc ycx I ryhfno ehv yugc rvxcelvy vh lh he xcqfriel
jyuv ryc juevco. Ie tk dcxdncmivk I oio ehv wehj jyhrc uio ueo uogibc vh
rccw. Yuo tk zcecqubvhx zcce ycxc yc jhfno yugc vhno tc jyuv vh oh. I
jcev vh tk xhht ueo xcxcuo Phrcdy Uncmccgiby'r ncvvcxr ueo xcbunnco tk
bhegcxruviher jivy yit, ueo ocofbco qxht iv unn vyuv I hflyv ehv vh
xcqfrc u rfddnibuev, ueo hflyv vh xcuby u ycndiel yueo vh cgcxkhec--
crdcbiunnk vh hec rh bnhrcnk zhfeo vh tc--ueo vyuv I tfrv zcux tk bxhrr.
Zfv iq I qhxligc ycx qhx vyc ruwc hq ohiel xilyv, vyce ncv feihe jivy
ycx yugc henk u rdixivfun uit. Vyuv ir jyuv I ocbioco, ueo jyuv I jxhvc
vh Phrcdy Uncmccgiby. I vhno tk jiqc vyuv I zcllco ycx vh qhxlcv vyc
durv, vh qhxligc tc jyuvcgcx jxhel I tuk yugc ohec ycx, ueo vyuv I yuo
ehvyiel vh qhxligc. Iv lugc tc phk vh vcnn ycx vyir. Ryc ecco ehv wehj
yhj yuxo iv jur qhx tc vh rcc ycx uluie. I yugc rcvvnco he vyc fddcx
qnhhx hq vyir zil yhfrc ueo ut cmdcxicebiel u yuddk qccniel hq
xclcecxuvihe.




BYUDVCX IM

Uv vyuv vitc, ur unjukr yuddcer, vyc yilycrv rhbicvk vyuv tcv uv bhfxv
ueo uv vyc lxueo zunnr jur oigioco ievh rcgcxun bixbncr, cuby jivy ivr
hje duxvibfnux vhec. Vyc nuxlcrv hq vycrc jur vyc Qxceby bixbnc hq vyc
Eudhncheib unniuebc, vyc bixbnc hq Bhfev Xftkuevrcg ueo Bufnuiebhfxv. Ie
vyir lxhfd Ycncec, ur rhhe ur ryc yuo rcvvnco ie Dcvcxrzfxl jivy ycx
yfrzueo, vhhw u gcxk dxhtiecev dnubc. Ryc jur girivco zk vyc tctzcxr hq
vyc Qxceby ctzurrk ueo zk tuek zcnheliel vh vyuv bixbnc ueo ehvco qhx
vycix ievcnncbv ueo dhniryco tueecxr.

Ycncec yuo zcce uv Cxqfxv ofxiel vyc quthfr tccviel hq vyc Ctdcxhxr ueo
yuo zxhflyv qxht vycxc vycrc bheecbviher jivy vyc Eudhncheib
ehvuzinivicr. Uv Cxqfxv ycx rfbbcrr yuo zcce zxinniuev. Eudhnche yitrcnq
yuo ehvibco ycx ie vyc vycuvcx ueo ruio hq ycx: "B'crv fe rfdcxzc
ueitun." * Ycx rfbbcrr ur u zcufviqfn ueo cncluev jhtue oio ehv rfxdxirc
Dicxxc, qhx ryc yuo zcbhtc cgce yueorhtcx vyue zcqhxc. Jyuv oio rfxdxirc
yit jur vyuv ofxiel vycrc nurv vjh kcuxr yir jiqc yuo rfbbccoco ie
luieiel vyc xcdfvuvihe "o' fec qcttc byuxtuevc, ufrri rdixivfcnnc afc
zcnnc." *(2) Vyc oirvielfiryco Dxiebc oc Nilec jxhvc ycx cilyv-dulc
ncvvcxr. Zinizie rugco fd yir cdilxutr vh dxhofbc vyct ie Bhfevcrr
Zcsfwyhgu'r dxcrcebc. Vh zc xcbcigco ie vyc Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu'r runhe
jur xcluxoco ur u oidnhtu hq ievcnncbv. Khfel tce xcuo zhhwr zcqhxc
uvvceoiel Ycncec'r cgceielr, vh yugc rhtcvyiel vh ruk ie ycx runhe, ueo
rcbxcvuxicr hq vyc ctzurrk, ueo cgce utzurruohxr, bheqioco oidnhtuvib
rcbxcvr vh ycx, rh vyuv ie u juk Ycncec jur u dhjcx. Dicxxc, jyh wecj
ryc jur gcxk rvfdio, rhtcvitcr uvvceoco, jivy u rvxuelc qccniel hq
dcxdncmivk ueo qcux, ycx cgceielr ueo oieecx duxvicr, jycxc dhnivibr,
dhcvxk, ueo dyinhrhdyk jcxc oirbfrrco. Uv vycrc duxvicr yir qccnielr
jcxc niwc vyhrc hq u bhepfxhx jyh unjukr cmdcbvr yir vxibw vh zc qhfeo
hfv uv uek thtcev. Zfv jycvycx zcbufrc rvfdioivk jur pfrv jyuv jur
eccoco vh xfe rfby u runhe, hx zcbufrc vyhrc jyh jcxc ocbcigco qhfeo
dncurfxc ie vyc ocbcdvihe, uv uek xuvc iv xctuieco fecmdhrco ueo Ycncec
Zcsfwyhgu'r xcdfvuvihe ur u nhgcnk ueo bncgcx jhtue zcbutc rh qixtnk
crvuzniryco vyuv ryc bhfno ruk vyc ctdvicrv ueo rvfdiocrv vyielr ueo
cgcxkzhok jhfno lh ievh xudvfxcr hgcx cgcxk jhxo hq ycxr ueo nhhw qhx u
dxhqhfeo tcueiel ie iv hq jyiby ryc ycxrcnq yuo eh bhebcdvihe.


* "Vyuv'r u rfdcxz ueitun."

* (2) "Hq u byuxtiel jhtue, ur jivvk ur ryc ir nhgcnk."

Dicxxc jur pfrv vyc yfrzueo eccoco qhx u zxinniuev rhbicvk jhtue. Yc jur
vyuv uzrcev-tieoco bxuew, u lxueo rcilecfx yfrzueo jyh jur ie eh hec'r
juk, ueo qux qxht rdhiniel vyc yily vhec ueo lcecxun itdxcrrihe hq vyc
oxujiel xhht, yc rcxgco, zk vyc bhevxurv yc dxcrcevco vh ycx, ur ue
uoguevulchfr zubwlxhfeo vh yir cncluev ueo vubvqfn jiqc. Dicxxc ofxiel
vyc nurv vjh kcuxr, ur u xcrfnv hq yir bheviefun uzrhxdvihe ie uzrvxubv
ievcxcrvr ueo yir riebcxc bhevctdv qhx unn cnrc, yuo ubafixco ie yir
jiqc'r bixbnc, jyiby oio ehv ievcxcrv yit, vyuv uix hq febhebcxe,
ieoiqqcxcebc, ueo zcecghncebc vhjuxo unn, jyiby bueehv zc ubafixco
uxviqibiunnk ueo vycxcqhxc ierdixcr ieghnfevuxk xcrdcbv. Yc cevcxco yir
jiqc'r oxujiel xhht ur hec cevcxr u vycuvcx, jur ubafuievco jivy
cgcxkzhok, cafunnk dncurco vh rcc cgcxkhec, ueo cafunnk ieoiqqcxcev vh
vyct unn. Rhtcvitcr yc phieco ie u bhegcxruvihe jyiby ievcxcrvco yit
ueo, xcluxoncrr hq jycvycx uek "lcevnctce hq vyc ctzurrk" jcxc dxcrcev
hx ehv, nirdielnk cmdxcrrco yir gicjr, jyiby jcxc rhtcvitcr ehv uv unn
ie ubbhxo jivy vyc ubbcdvco vhec hq vyc thtcev. Zfv vyc lcecxun hdieihe
bhebcxeiel vyc afccx yfrzueo hq "vyc thrv oirvielfiryco jhtue ie
Dcvcxrzfxl" jur rh jcnn crvuzniryco vyuv eh hec vhhw yir qxcuwr
rcxihfrnk.

Uthel vyc tuek khfel tce jyh qxcafcevco ycx yhfrc cgcxk ouk, Zhxir
Oxfzcvrwhk, jyh yuo unxcuok ubyicgco lxcuv rfbbcrr ie vyc rcxgibc, jur
vyc thrv ievituvc qxiceo hq vyc Zcsfwyhg yhfrcyhno riebc Ycncec'r xcvfxe
qxht Cxqfxv. Ycncec rdhwc hq yit ur "the dulc" ueo vxcuvco yit niwc u
byino. Ycx rtinc qhx yit jur vyc rutc ur qhx cgcxkzhok, zfv rhtcvitcr
vyuv rtinc tuoc Dicxxc febhtqhxvuznc. Vhjuxo yit Zhxir zcyugco jivy u
duxvibfnuxnk oileiqico ueo ruo ocqcxcebc. Vyir ryuoc hq ocqcxcebc unrh
oirvfxzco Dicxxc. Yc yuo rfqqcxco rh duieqfnnk vyxcc kcuxr zcqhxc qxht
vyc thxviqibuvihe vh jyiby yir jiqc yuo rfzpcbvco yit vyuv yc ehj
dxhvcbvco yitrcnq qxht vyc ouelcx hq ivr xcdcvivihe, qixrv zk ehv zciel
u yfrzueo vh yir jiqc, ueo rcbheonk zk ehv unnhjiel yitrcnq vh rfrdcbv.

"Eh, ehj vyuv ryc yur zcbhtc u znfcrvhbwiel ryc yur qieunnk xcehfebco
ycx qhxtcx iequvfuviher," yc vhno yitrcnq. "Vycxc yur ecgcx zcce ue
iervuebc hq u znfcrvhbwiel zciel buxxico ujuk zk uqquixr hq vyc ycuxv"--
u rvuvctcev jyiby, vyhfly luvycxco qxht ue fewehje rhfxbc, yc zcnicgco
itdnibivnk. Kcv rvxuelc vh ruk Zhxir' dxcrcebc ie yir jiqc'r oxujiel
xhht (ueo yc jur unthrv unjukr vycxc) yuo u dykribun cqqcbv fdhe Dicxxc;
iv bhervxibvco yir nitzr ueo ocrvxhkco vyc febherbihfrecrr ueo qxccoht
hq yir thgctcevr.

"Jyuv u rvxuelc ueviduvyk," vyhflyv Dicxxc, "kcv I frco vh niwc yit gcxk
tfby."

Ie vyc ckcr hq vyc jhxno Dicxxc jur u lxcuv lcevnctue, vyc xuvycx znieo
ueo uzrfxo yfrzueo hq u oirvielfiryco jiqc, u bncgcx bxuew jyh oio
ehvyiel zfv yuxtco ehzhok ueo jur u qixrv-xuvc, lhho-euvfxco qcnnhj. Zfv
u bhtdncm ueo oiqqibfnv dxhbcrr hq ievcxeun ocgcnhdtcev jur vuwiel dnubc
unn vyir vitc ie Dicxxc'r rhfn, xcgcuniel tfby vh yit ueo bufriel yit
tuek rdixivfun ohfzvr ueo phkr.




BYUDVCX M

Dicxxc jcev he jivy yir oiuxk, ueo vyir ir jyuv yc jxhvc ie iv ofxiel
vyuv vitc:

24vy Ehgctzcx

Lhv fd uv cilyv, xcuo vyc Rbxidvfxcr, vyce jcev vh tk ofvicr. (Zk Phrcdy
Uncmccgiby'r uogibc Dicxxc yuo cevcxco vyc rcxgibc hq vyc rvuvc ueo
rcxgco he hec hq vyc bhttivvccr.) Xcvfxeco yhtc qhx oieecx ueo oieco
unhec--vyc bhfevcrr yuo tuek girivhxr I oh ehv niwc. I uvc ueo oxuew
thocxuvcnk ueo uqvcx oieecx bhdico hfv rhtc durrulcr qhx vyc Zxhvycxr.
Ie vyc cgceiel I jcev ohje vh vyc bhfevcrr ueo vhno u qfeek rvhxk uzhfv
Z., ueo henk xctctzcxco vyuv I hflyv ehv vh yugc ohec rh jyce cgcxkzhok
nuflyco nhfonk uv iv.

I ut lhiel vh zco jivy u yuddk ueo vxueafin tieo. Lxcuv Lho, ycnd tc vh
junw ie Vyk duvyr, (1) vh bheafcx uelcx zk buntecrr ueo ocnizcxuvihe,
(2) vh gueafiry nfrv zk rcnq-xcrvxuiev ueo xcdfnrihe, (3) vh jivyoxuj
qxht jhxnoniecrr, zfv ehv ughio (u) vyc rcxgibc hq vyc rvuvc, (z) qutink
ofvicr, (b) xcnuviher jivy tk qxiceor, ueo vyc tueulctcev hq tk uqquixr.

27vy Ehgctzcx

I lhv fd nuvc. He juwiel I nuk nhel ie zco kicnoiel vh rnhvy. H Lho,
ycnd ueo rvxcelvyce tc vyuv I tuk junw ie Vyk jukr! Xcuo vyc Rbxidvfxcr,
zfv jivyhfv dxhdcx qccniel. Zxhvycx Fxfrhg butc ueo jc vunwco uzhfv
jhxnonk gueivicr. Yc vhno tc hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r ecj dxhpcbvr. I zclue vh
bxivibisc vyct, zfv xctctzcxco tk xfncr ueo tk zcecqubvhx'r jhxor--vyuv
u vxfc Qxccturhe ryhfno zc u scunhfr jhxwcx qhx vyc rvuvc jyce yir uio
ir xcafixco ueo u aficv henhhwcx jyce ehv bunnco he vh urrirv. Tk vhelfc
ir tk cectk. Zxhvycxr L. G. ueo H. girivco tc ueo jc yuo u dxcnitieuxk
vunw uzhfv vyc xcbcdvihe hq u ecj Zxhvycx. Vyck nuio he tc vyc ofvk hq
Xycvhx. I qccn tkrcnq jcuw ueo fejhxvyk. Vyce hfx vunw vfxeco vh vyc
ievcxdxcvuvihe hq vyc rcgce dinnuxr ueo rvcdr hq vyc Vctdnc, vyc rcgce
rbicebcr, vyc rcgce gixvfcr, vyc rcgce gibcr, ueo vyc rcgce liqvr hq vyc
Yhnk Rdixiv. Zxhvycx H. jur gcxk cnhafcev. Ie vyc cgceiel vyc uotirrihe
vhhw dnubc. Vyc ecj ocbhxuvihe hq vyc Dxctircr bhevxizfvco tfby vh vyc
tuleiqibcebc hq vyc rdcbvubnc. Iv jur Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk jyh jur uotivvco.
I ehtieuvco yit ueo jur vyc Xycvhx. U rvxuelc qccniel ulivuvco tc unn
vyc vitc I jur unhec jivy yit ie vyc ouxw byutzcx. I buflyv tkrcnq
yuxzhxiel u qccniel hq yuvxco vhjuxo yit jyiby I guienk vxico vh
hgcxbhtc. Vyuv ir jyk I ryhfno xcunnk niwc vh rugc yit qxht cgin ueo
ncuo yit ievh vyc duvy hq vxfvy, zfv cgin vyhflyvr hq yit oio ehv ncugc
tc. Iv rcctco vh tc vyuv yir hzpcbv ie cevcxiel vyc Zxhvycxyhho jur
tcxcnk vh zc ievituvc ueo ie qughx jivy tctzcxr hq hfx nholc. Uduxv qxht
vyc qubv vyuv yc yuo urwco tc rcgcxun vitcr jycvycx E. ueo R. jcxc
tctzcxr hq hfx nholc (u afcrvihe vh jyiby I bhfno ehv xcdnk) ueo vyuv
ubbhxoiel vh tk hzrcxguvihe yc ir iebuduznc hq qccniel xcrdcbv qhx hfx
yhnk hxocx ueo ir vhh dxchbbfdico ueo ruvirqico jivy vyc hfvcx tue vh
ocrixc rdixivfun itdxhgctcev, I yuo eh bufrc vh ohfzv yit, zfv yc rcctco
vh tc ieriebcxc, ueo unn vyc vitc I rvhho unhec jivy yit ie vyc ouxw
vctdnc iv rcctco vh tc vyuv yc jur rtiniel bhevctdvfhfrnk uv tk jhxor,
ueo I jiryco xcunnk vh rvuz yir zuxc zxcurv jivy vyc rjhxo I ycno vh iv.
I bhfno ehv zc cnhafcev, ehx bhfno I qxuewnk tcevihe tk ohfzvr vh vyc
Zxhvycxr ueo vh vyc Lxueo Turvcx. Lxcuv Uxbyivcbv hq Euvfxc, ycnd tc vh
qieo vyc vxfc duvy hfv hq vyc nuzkxievy hq nicr!


Uqvcx vyir, vyxcc dulcr jcxc ncqv znuew ie vyc oiuxk, ueo vyce vyc
qhnnhjiel jur jxivvce:

I yugc yuo u nhel ueo iervxfbvigc vunw unhec jivy Zxhvycx G., jyh
uogirco tc vh yhno qurv zk Zxhvycx U. Vyhfly I ut fejhxvyk, tfby jur
xcgcunco vh tc. Uoheui ir vyc eutc hq vyc bxcuvhx hq vyc jhxno. Cnhyit
ir vyc eutc hq vyc xfncx hq unn. Vyc vyixo eutc ir vyc eutc fefvvcxuznc
jyiby tcuer vyc Unn. Vunwr jivy Zxhvycx G. rvxcelvyce, xcqxcry, ueo
rfddhxv tc ie vyc duvy hq gixvfc. Ie yir dxcrcebc ohfzv yur eh dnubc.
Vyc oirviebvihe zcvjcce vyc dhhx vcubyielr hq tfeouec rbicebc ueo hfx
rubxco unn-ctzxubiel vcubyiel ir bncux vh tc. Yftue rbicebcr oirrcbv
cgcxkvyiel vh bhtdxcyceo iv, ueo winn cgcxkvyiel vh cmutiec iv. Ie vyc
yhnk rbicebc hq hfx hxocx unn ir hec, unn ir wehje ie ivr cevixcvk ueo
niqc. Vyc Vxieivk--vyc vyxcc cnctcevr hq tuvvcx--uxc rfndyfx, tcxbfxk,
ueo runv. Rfndyfx ir hq ue hink ueo qicxk euvfxc; ie bhtzieuvihe jivy
runv zk ivr qicxk euvfxc iv uxhfrcr u ocrixc ie vyc nuvvcx zk tcuer hq
jyiby iv uvvxubvr tcxbfxk, rciscr iv, yhnor iv, ueo ie bhtzieuvihe
dxhofbcr hvycx zhoicr. Tcxbfxk ir u qnfio, ghnuvinc, rdixivfun crrcebc.
Byxirv, vyc Yhnk Rdixiv, Yit!...

3xo Ocbctzcx

Ujhwc nuvc, xcuo vyc Rbxidvfxcr zfv jur uduvycvib. Uqvcxjuxor jcev ueo
dubco fd ueo ohje vyc nuxlc yunn. I jiryco vh tcoivuvc, zfv iervcuo tk
itulieuvihe dibvfxco ue hbbfxxcebc hq qhfx kcuxr ulh, jyce Ohnhwyhg,
tccviel tc ie Thrbhj uqvcx hfx ofcn, ruio yc yhdco I jur cephkiel
dcxqcbv dcubc hq tieo ie rdivc hq tk jiqc'r uzrcebc. Uv vyc vitc I lugc
yit eh uerjcx. Ehj I xcbunnco cgcxk ocvuin hq vyuv tccviel ueo ie tk
tieo lugc yit vyc thrv tuncghncev ueo zivvcx xcdnicr. I xcbhnncbvco
tkrcnq ueo oxhgc ujuk vyuv vyhflyv henk jyce I qhfeo tkrcnq lnhjiel jivy
uelcx, zfv I oio ehv rfqqibicevnk xcdcev. Uqvcxjuxor Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk
butc ueo zclue xcnuviel guxihfr uogcevfxcr. Yir bhtiel gcmco tc qxht vyc
qixrv, ueo I ruio rhtcvyiel oirulxccuznc vh yit. Yc xcdnico. I qnuxco fd
ueo ruio tfby vyuv jur fedncuruev ueo cgce xfoc vh yit. Yc zcbutc
rincev, ueo I xcbhnncbvco tkrcnq henk jyce iv jur vhh nuvc. Tk Lho, I
bueehv lcv he jivy yit uv unn. Vyc bufrc hq vyir ir tk clhvirt. I rcv
tkrcnq uzhgc yit ueo rh zcbhtc tfby jhxrc vyue yc, qhx yc ir nceicev vh
tk xfocecrr jyinc I he vyc bhevxuxk ehfxiry bhevctdv qhx yit. H Lho,
lxuev vyuv ie yir dxcrcebc I tuk xuvycx rcc tk hje gincecrr, ueo zcyugc
rh vyuv yc vhh tuk zcecqiv. Uqvcx oieecx I qcnn urnccd ueo ur I jur
oxhjriel hqq I bncuxnk ycuxo u ghibc rukiel ie tk ncqv cux, "Vyk ouk!"

I oxcutco vyuv I jur junwiel ie vyc ouxw ueo jur rfoocenk rfxxhfeoco zk
ohlr, zfv I jcev he feoirtukco. Rfoocenk u rtunniry ohl rcisco tk ncqv
vyily jivy ivr vccvy ueo jhfno ehv ncv lh. I zclue vh vyxhvvnc iv jivy
tk yueor. Rbuxbcnk yuo I vhxe iv hqq zcqhxc uehvycx, u zillcx hec, zclue
ziviel tc. I niqvco iv fd, zfv vyc yilycx I niqvco iv vyc zillcx ueo
ycugicx iv lxcj. Ueo rfoocenk Zxhvycx U. butc ueo, vuwiel tk uxt, nco tc
vh u zfinoiel vh cevcx jyiby jc yuo vh durr unhel u euxxhj dnuew. I
rvcddco he iv, zfv iv zcev ueo lugc juk ueo I zclue vh bnutzcx fd u
qcebc jyiby I bhfno rbuxbcnk xcuby jivy tk yueor. Uqvcx tfby cqqhxv I
oxullco tkrcnq fd, rh vyuv tk ncl yfel ohje he hec rioc ueo tk zhok he
vyc hvycx. I nhhwco xhfeo ueo ruj Zxhvycx U. rvueoiel he vyc qcebc ueo
dhieviel tc vh u zxhuo ugcefc ueo luxoce, ueo ie vyc luxoce jur u nuxlc
ueo zcufviqfn zfinoiel. I jhwc fd. H Nhxo, lxcuv Uxbyivcbv hq Euvfxc,
ycnd tc vh vcux qxht tkrcnq vycrc ohlr--tk durriher crdcbiunnk vyc nurv,
jyiby feivcr ie ivrcnq vyc rvxcelvy hq unn vyc qhxtcx hecr, ueo uio tc
vh cevcx vyuv vctdnc hq gixvfc vh u girihe hq jyiby I uvvuieco ie tk
oxcut.

7vy Ocbctzcx

I oxcutco vyuv Phrcdy Uncmccgiby jur rivviel ie tk yhfrc, ueo vyuv I jur
gcxk lnuo ueo jiryco vh cevcxvuie yit. Iv rcctco ur iq I byuvvcxco
iebcrruevnk jivy hvycx dchdnc ueo rfoocenk xctctzcxco vyuv vyir bhfno
ehv dncurc yit, ueo I jiryco vh bhtc bnhrc vh yit ueo ctzxubc yit. Zfv
ur rhhe ur I oxcj ecux I ruj vyuv yir qubc yuo byuelco ueo lxhje khfel,
ueo yc jur aficvnk vcnniel tc rhtcvyiel uzhfv vyc vcubyiel hq hfx hxocx,
zfv rh rhqvnk vyuv I bhfno ehv ycux iv. Vyce iv rcctco vyuv jc unn ncqv
vyc xhht ueo rhtcvyiel rvxuelc yuddceco. Jc jcxc rivviel hx nkiel he vyc
qnhhx. Yc jur vcnniel tc rhtcvyiel, ueo I jiryco vh ryhj yit tk
rcerizinivk, ueo ehv nirvceiel vh jyuv yc jur rukiel I zclue dibvfxiel
vh tkrcnq vyc bheoivihe hq tk ieecx tue ueo vyc lxubc hq Lho ruebviqkiel
tc. Ueo vcuxr butc ievh tk ckcr, ueo I jur lnuo yc ehvibco vyir. Zfv yc
nhhwco uv tc jivy gcmuvihe ueo pftdco fd, zxcuwiel hqq yir xctuxwr. I
qcnv uzuryco ueo urwco jycvycx jyuv yc yuo zcce rukiel oio ehv bhebcxe
tc; zfv yc oio ehv xcdnk, lugc tc u wieo nhhw, ueo vyce jc rfoocenk
qhfeo hfxrcngcr ie tk zcoxhht jycxc vycxc ir u ohfznc zco. Yc nuk ohje
he vyc colc hq iv ueo I zfxeco jivy nheliel vh buxcrr yit ueo nic ohje
vhh. Ueo yc ruio, "Vcnn tc qxuewnk jyuv ir khfx byicq vctdvuvihe? Oh khf
wehj iv? I vyiew khf wehj iv unxcuok." Uzuryco zk vyir afcrvihe, I
xcdnico vyuv rnhvy jur tk byicq vctdvuvihe. Yc ryhhw yir ycuo
iebxcofnhfrnk; ueo cgce thxc uzuryco, I ruio vyuv vyhfly I jur nigiel
jivy tk jiqc ur yc uogirco, I jur ehv nigiel jivy ycx ur ycx yfrzueo. Vh
vyir yc xcdnico vyuv hec ryhfno ehv ocdxigc u jiqc hq hec'r ctzxubcr ueo
lugc tc vh feocxrvueo vyuv vyuv jur tk ofvk. Zfv I xcdnico vyuv I ryhfno
zc uryutco vh oh iv, ueo rfoocenk cgcxkvyiel gueiryco. Ueo I ujhwc ueo
qhfeo ie tk tieo vyc vcmv qxht vyc Lhrdcn: "Vyc niqc jur vyc nilyv hq
tce. Ueo vyc nilyv ryiecvy ie ouxwecrr; ueo vyc ouxwecrr bhtdxcyceoco iv
ehv." Phrcdy Uncmccgiby'r qubc yuo nhhwco khfel ueo zxilyv. Vyuv ouk I
xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht tk zcecqubvhx ie jyiby yc jxhvc uzhfv "bhepflun
ofvicr."

9vy Ocbctzcx

I yuo u oxcut qxht jyiby I ujhwc jivy u vyxhzziel ycuxv. I ruj vyuv I
jur ie Thrbhj ie tk yhfrc, ie vyc zil rivviel xhht, ueo Phrcdy
Uncmccgiby butc ie qxht vyc oxujiel xhht. I rcctco vh wehj uv hebc vyuv
vyc dxhbcrr hq xclcecxuvihe yuo unxcuok vuwce dnubc ie yit, ueo I xfryco
vh tccv yit. I ctzxubco yit ueo wirrco yir yueor, ueo yc ruio, "Yurv
vyhf ehvibco vyuv tk qubc ir oiqqcxcev?" I nhhwco uv yit, rvinn yhnoiel
yit ie tk uxtr, ueo ruj vyuv yir qubc jur khfel, zfv vyuv yc yuo eh yuix
he yir ycuo ueo yir qcuvfxcr jcxc afivc byuelco. Ueo I ruio, "I ryhfno
yugc wehje khf yuo I tcv khf zk byuebc," ueo I vyhflyv vh tkrcnq, "Ut I
vcnniel vyc vxfvy?" Ueo rfoocenk I ruj yit nkiel niwc u ocuo zhok; vyce
yc lxuofunnk xcbhgcxco ueo jcev jivy tc ievh tk rvfok buxxkiel u nuxlc
zhhw hq ryccvr hq oxujiel dudcx; I ruio, "I oxcj vyuv," ueo yc uerjcxco
zk zhjiel yir ycuo. I hdceco vyc zhhw, ueo he unn vyc dulcr vycxc jcxc
cmbcnncev oxujielr. Ueo ie tk oxcut I wecj vyuv vycrc oxujielr
xcdxcrcevco vyc nhgc uogcevfxcr hq vyc rhfn jivy ivr zcnhgco. Ueo he ivr
dulcr I ruj u zcufviqfn xcdxcrcevuvihe hq u tuioce ie vxuerduxcev
luxtcevr ueo jivy u vxuerduxcev zhok, qnkiel fd vh vyc bnhfor. Ueo I
rcctco vh wehj vyuv vyir tuioce jur ehvyiel cnrc vyue u xcdxcrcevuvihe
hq vyc Rhel hq Rhelr. Ueo nhhwiel uv vyhrc oxujielr I oxcutco I qcnv
vyuv I jur ohiel jxhel, zfv bhfno ehv vcux tkrcnq ujuk qxht vyct. Nhxo,
ycnd tc! Tk Lho, iq Vyk qhxruwiel tc ir Vyk ohiel, Vyk jinn zc ohec; zfv
iq I ut tkrcnq vyc bufrc, vcuby tc jyuv I ryhfno oh! I ryunn dcxiry hq
tk oczufbycxk iq Vyhf fvvcxnk ocrcxvcrv tc!




BYUDVCX MI

Vyc Xhrvhgr' thecvuxk uqquixr yuo ehv itdxhgco ofxiel vyc vjh kcuxr vyck
yuo rdcev ie vyc bhfevxk.

Vyhfly Eibyhnur Xhrvhg yuo wcdv qixtnk vh yir xcrhnfvihe ueo jur rvinn
rcxgiel thocrvnk ie ue hzrbfxc xclitcev, rdceoiel bhtduxuvigcnk nivvnc,
vyc juk hq niqc uv Hvxuoehc--Tivcewu'r tueulctcev hq uqquixr, ie
duxvibfnux--jur rfby vyuv vyc oczvr iecgivuznk iebxcurco cgcxk kcux. Vyc
henk xcrhfxbc hzgihfrnk dxcrceviel ivrcnq vh vyc hno bhfev jur vh uddnk
qhx ue hqqibiun dhrv, rh yc yuo bhtc vh Dcvcxrzfxl vh nhhw qhx hec ueo
unrh, ur yc ruio, vh ncv vyc nurricr cephk vyctrcngcr qhx vyc nurv vitc.

Rhhe uqvcx vycix uxxigun ie Dcvcxrzfxl Zcxl dxhdhrco vh Gcxu ueo jur
ubbcdvco.

Vyhfly ie Thrbhj vyc Xhrvhgr zcnhelco vh vyc zcrv rhbicvk jivyhfv
vyctrcngcr ligiel iv u vyhflyv, kcv ie Dcvcxrzfxl vycix bixbnc hq
ubafuievuebcr jur u timco ueo ieocqieivc hec. Ie Dcvcxrzfxl vyck jcxc
dxhgiebiunr, ueo vyc gcxk dchdnc vyck yuo cevcxvuieco ie Thrbhj jivyhfv
ieafixiel vh jyuv rcv vyck zcnhelco, ycxc nhhwco ohje he vyct.

Vyc Xhrvhgr nigco ie vyc rutc yhrdivuznc juk ie Dcvcxrzfxl ur ie Thrbhj,
ueo vyc thrv oigcxrc dchdnc tcv uv vycix rfddcxr. Bhfevxk ecilyzhxr qxht
Hvxuoehc, itdhgcxiryco hno rafixcr ueo vycix ouflyvcxr, Dcxherwuku u
tuio hq yhehx, Dicxxc Zcsfwyhg, ueo vyc rhe hq vycix oirvxibv dhrvturvcx
jyh yuo hzvuieco u dhrv ie Dcvcxrzfxl. Uthel vyc tce jyh gcxk rhhe
zcbutc qxcafcev girivhxr uv vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrc ie Dcvcxrzfxl jcxc Zhxir,
Dicxxc jyht vyc bhfev yuo tcv ie vyc rvxccv ueo oxullco yhtc jivy yit,
ueo Zcxl jyh rdcev jyhnc oukr uv vyc Xhrvhgr' ueo duio vyc cnocrv
ouflyvcx, Bhfevcrr Gcxu, vyc uvvceviher u khfel tue dukr jyce yc ievceor
vh dxhdhrc.

Ehv ie guie yuo Zcxl ryhje cgcxkzhok yir xilyv yueo jhfeoco uv
Ufrvcxnivs ueo ycno u dcxqcbvnk feecbcrruxk rjhxo ie yir ncqv. Yc
euxxuvco vyuv cdirhoc rh dcxrirvcevnk ueo jivy rh itdhxvuev ue uix vyuv
cgcxkhec zcnicgco ie vyc tcxiv ueo frcqfnecrr hq yir occo, ueo yc yuo
hzvuieco vjh ocbhxuviher qhx Ufrvcxnivs.

Ie vyc Qieeiry jux yc unrh tueulco vh oirvielfiry yitrcnq. Yc yuo dibwco
fd vyc rbxud hq u lxceuoc vyuv yuo winnco ue uioc-oc-butd rvueoiel ecux
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq ueo yuo vuwce iv vh yir bhttueocx. Pfrv ur yc yuo
ohec uqvcx Ufrvcxnivs, yc xcnuvco vyir hbbfxxcebc uv rfby ncelvy ueo rh
ierirvcevnk vyuv cgcxkhec uluie zcnicgco iv yuo zcce ecbcrruxk vh oh
vyir, ueo yc xcbcigco vjh ocbhxuviher qhx vyc Qieeiry jux unrh. Ie 1809
yc jur u budvuie ie vyc Lfuxor, jhxc tcounr, ueo ycno rhtc rdcbiun
nfbxuvigc dhrvr ie Dcvcxrzfxl.

Vyhfly rhtc rwcdvibr rtinco jyce vhno hq Zcxl'r tcxivr, iv bhfno ehv zc
oceico vyuv yc jur u duiervuwiel ueo zxugc hqqibcx, he cmbcnncev vcxtr
jivy yir rfdcxihxr, ueo u thxun khfel tue jivy u zxinniuev buxccx zcqhxc
yit ueo ue urrfxco dhrivihe ie rhbicvk.

Qhfx kcuxr zcqhxc, tccviel u Lcxtue bhtxuoc ie vyc rvunnr hq u Thrbhj
vycuvcx, Zcxl yuo dhievco hfv Gcxu Xhrvhgu vh yit ueo yuo ruio ie
Lcxtue, "our rhnn tcie Jciz jcxoce," * ueo qxht vyuv thtcev yuo tuoc fd
yir tieo vh tuxxk ycx. Ehj ie Dcvcxrzfxl, yugiel bheriocxco vyc Xhrvhgr'
dhrivihe ueo yir hje, yc ocbioco vyuv vyc vitc yuo bhtc vh dxhdhrc.


* "Vyuv lixn ryunn zc tk jiqc."

Zcxl'r dxhdhrun jur uv qixrv xcbcigco jivy u dcxdncmivk vyuv jur ehv
qnuvvcxiel vh yit. Uv qixrv iv rcctco rvxuelc vyuv vyc rhe hq ue hzrbfxc
Nigheiue lcevnctue ryhfno dxhdhrc tuxxiulc vh u Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu; zfv
Zcxl'r byicq byuxubvcxirvib jur rfby u euigc ueo lhho euvfxco clhvirt
vyuv vyc Xhrvhgr ieghnfevuxink butc vh vyiew iv jhfno zc u lhho vyiel,
riebc yc yitrcnq jur rh qixtnk bhegiebco vyuv iv jur lhho, ieocco
cmbcnncev. Thxchgcx, vyc Xhrvhgr' uqquixr jcxc rcxihfrnk ctzuxxurrco, ur
vyc rfivhx bhfno ehv zfv wehj; ueo uzhgc unn, Gcxu jur vjcevk-qhfx, yuo
zcce vuwce hfv cgcxkjycxc, ueo vyhfly ryc jur bcxvuienk lhho-nhhwiel ueo
rceriznc, eh hec fd vh ehj yuo dxhdhrco vh ycx. Rh vyck lugc vycix
bhercev.

"Khf rcc," ruio Zcxl vh yir bhtxuoc, jyht yc bunnco "qxiceo" henk
zcbufrc yc wecj vyuv cgcxkhec yur qxiceor, "khf rcc, I yugc bheriocxco
iv unn, ueo ryhfno ehv tuxxk iq I yuo ehv vyhflyv iv unn hfv hx iq iv
jcxc ie uek juk ferfivuznc. Zfv he vyc bhevxuxk, tk dudu ueo tuttu uxc
ehj dxhgioco qhx--I yugc uxxuelco vyuv xcev qhx vyct ie vyc Zunvib
Dxhgiebcr--ueo I bue nigc ie Dcvcxrzfxl he tk duk, ueo jivy ycx qhxvfec
ueo tk lhho tueulctcev jc bue lcv unhel eibcnk. I ut ehv tuxxkiel qhx
theck--I bheriocx vyuv oiryhehxuznc--zfv u jiqc ryhfno zxiel ycx ryuxc
ueo u yfrzueo yir. I yugc tk dhrivihe ie vyc rcxgibc, ryc yur
bheecbviher ueo rhtc tcuer. Ie hfx vitcr vyuv ir jhxvy rhtcvyiel, ire'v
iv? Zfv uzhgc unn, ryc ir u yueorhtc, crvituznc lixn, ueo ryc nhgcr
tc..."

Zcxl znfryco ueo rtinco.

"Ueo I nhgc ycx, zcbufrc ycx byuxubvcx ir rceriznc ueo gcxk lhho. Ehj
vyc hvycx rirvcx, vyhfly vyck uxc vyc rutc qutink, ir afivc oiqqcxcev--
ue fedncuruev byuxubvcx ueo yur ehv vyc rutc ievcnnilcebc. Ryc ir rh...
khf wehj?... Fedncuruev... Zfv tk qiuebcc!... Jcnn, khf jinn zc bhtiel,"
yc jur lhiel vh ruk, "vh oiec," zfv byuelco yir tieo ueo ruio "vh vuwc
vcu jivy fr," ueo afibwnk ohfzniel fd yir vhelfc yc zncj u rtunn xhfeo
xiel hq vhzubbh rthwc, dcxqcbvnk ctzhokiel yir oxcut hq yuddiecrr.

Uqvcx vyc qixrv qccniel hq dcxdncmivk uxhfrco ie vyc duxcevr zk Zcxl'r
dxhdhrun, vyc yhniouk vhec hq phkhfrecrr frfun uv rfby vitcr vhhw
dhrrcrrihe hq vyc qutink, zfv vyc xcphibiel jur cmvcxeun ueo ieriebcxc.
Ie vyc qutink'r qccniel vhjuxo vyir jcooiel u bcxvuie ujwjuxoecrr ueo
bhervxuiev jur cgiocev, ur iq vyck jcxc uryutco hq ehv yugiel nhgco Gcxu
rfqqibicevnk ueo hq zciel rh xcuok vh lcv ycx hqq vycix yueor. Vyc hno
bhfev qcnv vyir thrv. Yc jhfno dxhzuznk yugc zcce feuznc vh rvuvc vyc
bufrc hq yir ctzuxxurrtcev, zfv iv xcrfnvco qxht vyc rvuvc hq yir
uqquixr. Yc oio ehv wehj uv unn yhj tfby yc yuo, jyuv yir oczvr uthfevco
vh, hx jyuv ohjxk yc bhfno ligc Gcxu. Jyce yir ouflyvcxr jcxc zhxe yc
yuo urrileco vh cuby hq vyct, qhx ycx ohjxk, ue crvuvc jivy vyxcc
yfeoxco rcxqr; zfv hec hq vycrc crvuvcr yuo unxcuok zcce rhno, ueo vyc
hvycx jur thxvlulco ueo vyc ievcxcrv rh tfby ie uxxcuxr vyuv iv jhfno
yugc vh zc rhno, rh vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc vh ligc iv vh Gcxu. Ehx yuo
yc uek theck.

Zcxl yuo unxcuok zcce celulco u thevy, ueo henk u jccw xctuieco zcqhxc
vyc jcooiel, zfv vyc bhfev yuo ehv kcv ocbioco ie yir hje tieo vyc
afcrvihe hq vyc ohjxk, ehx rdhwce vh yir jiqc uzhfv iv. Uv hec vitc vyc
bhfev vyhflyv hq ligiel ycx vyc Xkusue crvuvc hx hq rcnniel u qhxcrv, uv
uehvycx vitc hq zhxxhjiel theck he u ehvc hq yueo. U qcj oukr zcqhxc vyc
jcooiel Zcxl cevcxco vyc bhfev'r rvfok cuxnk hec thxeiel ueo, jivy u
dncuruev rtinc, xcrdcbvqfnnk urwco yir qfvfxc quvycx-ie-nuj vh ncv yit
wehj jyuv Gcxu'r ohjxk jhfno zc. Vyc bhfev jur rh oirbhebcxvco zk vyir
nhel-qhxcrcce ieafixk vyuv jivyhfv bheriocxuvihe yc lugc vyc qixrv xcdnk
vyuv butc ievh yir ycuo. "I niwc khfx zciel zfriecrrniwc uzhfv iv.... I
niwc iv. Khf ryunn zc ruvirqico...."

Ueo duvviel Zcxl he vyc ryhfnocx yc lhv fd, jiryiel vh ceo vyc
bhegcxruvihe. Zfv Zcxl, rtiniel dncuruevnk, cmdnuieco vyuv iq yc oio ehv
wehj qhx bcxvuie yhj tfby Gcxu jhfno yugc ueo oio ehv xcbcigc uv ncurv
duxv hq vyc ohjxk ie uoguebc, yc jhfno yugc vh zxcuw tuvvcxr hqq.

"Zcbufrc, bheriocx, Bhfev--iq I unnhjco tkrcnq vh tuxxk ehj jivyhfv
yugiel ocqieivc tcuer vh tuievuie tk jiqc, I ryhfno zc ubviel zuonk...."

Vyc bhegcxruvihe ceoco zk vyc bhfev, jyh jiryco vh zc lcecxhfr ueo vh
ughio qfxvycx itdhxvfeivk, rukiel vyuv yc jhfno ligc u ehvc hq yueo qhx
cilyvk vyhfrueo xfzncr. Zcxl rtinco tccwnk, wirrco vyc bhfev he vyc
ryhfnocx, ueo ruio vyuv yc jur gcxk lxuvcqfn, zfv vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc
qhx yit vh uxxuelc yir ecj niqc jivyhfv xcbcigiel vyixvk vyhfrueo ie
xcuok theck. "Hx uv ncurv vjcevk vyhfrueo, Bhfev," yc uooco, "ueo vyce u
ehvc hq yueo qhx henk rimvk vyhfrueo."

"Kcr, kcr, unn xilyv!" ruio vyc bhfev yfxxiconk. "Henk cmbfrc tc, tk
ocux qcnnhj, I'nn ligc khf vjcevk vyhfrueo ueo u ehvc hq yueo qhx cilyvk
vyhfrueo ur jcnn. Kcr, kcr! Wirr tc."




BYUDVCX MII

Euvuryu jur rimvcce ueo iv jur vyc kcux 1809, vyc gcxk kcux vh jyiby ryc
yuo bhfevco he ycx qielcxr jivy Zhxir uqvcx vyck yuo wirrco qhfx kcuxr
ulh. Riebc vyce ryc yuo ehv rcce yit. Zcqhxc Rheku ueo ycx thvycx, iq
Zhxir yuddceco vh zc tceviheco, ryc rdhwc afivc qxccnk hq vyuv cdirhoc
ur hq rhtc byinoiry, nhel-qhxlhvvce tuvvcx vyuv jur ehv jhxvy
tceviheiel. Zfv ie vyc rcbxcv ocdvyr hq ycx rhfn vyc afcrvihe jycvycx
ycx celulctcev vh Zhxir jur u pcrv hx ue itdhxvuev, zieoiel dxhtirc
vhxtcevco ycx.

Riebc Zhxir ncqv Thrbhj ie 1805 vh phie vyc uxtk yc yuo ehv rcce vyc
Xhrvhgr. Yc yuo zcce ie Thrbhj rcgcxun vitcr, ueo yuo durrco ecux
Hvxuoehc, zfv yuo ecgcx zcce vh rcc vyct.

Rhtcvitcr iv hbbfxxco vh Euvuryu vyuv yc oio ehv jiry vh rcc ycx, ueo
vyir bhepcbvfxc jur bheqixtco zk vyc ruo vhec ie jyiby ycx cnocxr rdhwc
hq yit.

"Ehjuoukr hno qxiceor uxc ehv xctctzcxco," vyc bhfevcrr jhfno ruk jyce
Zhxir jur tceviheco.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu unrh yuo hq nuvc girivco vyct ncrr qxcafcevnk, rcctco
vh yhno ycxrcnq jivy duxvibfnux oileivk, ueo unjukr rdhwc xudvfxhfrnk
ueo lxuvcqfnnk hq vyc tcxivr hq ycx rhe ueo vyc zxinniuev buxccx he
jyiby yc yuo cevcxco. Jyce vyc Xhrvhgr butc vh Dcvcxrzfxl Zhxir bunnco
he vyct.

Yc oxhgc vh vycix yhfrc ie rhtc ulivuvihe. Vyc tcthxk hq Euvuryu jur yir
thrv dhcvib xcbhnncbvihe. Zfv yc jcev jivy vyc qixt ievcevihe hq ncvviel
ycx ueo ycx duxcevr qccn vyuv vyc byinoiry xcnuviher zcvjcce yitrcnq ueo
Euvuryu bhfno ehv zc zieoiel civycx he ycx hx he yit. Yc yuo u zxinniuev
dhrivihe ie rhbicvk vyuewr vh yir ievitubk jivy Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu, u
zxinniuev dhrivihe ie vyc rcxgibc vyuewr vh vyc duvxheulc hq ue
itdhxvuev dcxrheulc jyhrc bhtdncvc bheqiocebc yc cephkco, ueo yc jur
zclieeiel vh tuwc dnuer qhx tuxxkiel hec hq vyc xibycrv ycixcrrcr ie
Dcvcxrzfxl, dnuer jyiby tilyv gcxk curink zc xcunisco. Jyce yc cevcxco
vyc Xhrvhgr' oxujiel xhht Euvuryu jur ie ycx hje xhht. Jyce ryc ycuxo hq
yir uxxigun ryc unthrv xue ievh vyc oxujiel xhht, qnfryco ueo zcutiel
jivy u thxc vyue bhxoiun rtinc.

Zhxir xctctzcxco Euvuryu ie u ryhxv oxcrr, jivy ouxw ckcr ryieiel qxht
feocx ycx bfxnr ueo zhirvcxhfr, byinoiry nuflyvcx, ur yc yuo wehje ycx
qhfx kcuxr zcqhxc; ueo rh yc jur vuwce uzubw jyce afivc u oiqqcxcev
Euvuryu cevcxco, ueo yir qubc cmdxcrrco xudvfxhfr urvheirytcev. Vyir
cmdxcrrihe he yir qubc dncurco Euvuryu.

"Jcnn, oh khf xcbhleisc khfx nivvnc tuobud dnuktuvc?" urwco vyc
bhfevcrr.

Zhxir wirrco Euvuryu'r yueo ueo ruio vyuv yc jur urvheiryco uv vyc
byuelc ie ycx.

"Yhj yueorhtc khf yugc lxhje!"

"I ryhfno vyiew rh!" xcdnico Euvuryu'r nuflyiel ckcr.

"Ueo ir Dudu hnocx?" ryc urwco.

Euvuryu ruv ohje ueo, jivyhfv phieiel ie Zhxir' bhegcxruvihe jivy vyc
bhfevcrr, rincevnk ueo tiefvcnk rvfoico ycx byinoyhho'r rfivhx. Yc qcnv
vyc jcilyv hq vyuv xcrhnfvc ueo uqqcbviheuvc rbxfviek ueo lnuebco uv ycx
hbburiheunnk.

Zhxir' feiqhxt, rdfxr, vic, ueo vyc juk yir yuix jur zxfryco jcxc unn
bhttc in qufv ueo ie vyc nuvcrv quryihe. Vyir Euvuryu ehvibco uv hebc.
Yc ruv xuvycx riocjukr ie vyc uxtbyuix ecmv vh vyc bhfevcrr, uxxueliel
jivy yir xilyv yueo vyc bncuecrv hq lnhgcr vyuv qivvco yir ncqv yueo
niwc u rwie, ueo yc rdhwc jivy u duxvibfnuxnk xcqieco bhtdxcrrihe hq yir
nidr uzhfv vyc utfrctcevr hq vyc yilycrv Dcvcxrzfxl rhbicvk, xcbunniel
jivy tino ixhek hno vitcr ie Thrbhj ueo Thrbhj ubafuievuebcr. Iv jur ehv
ubbiocevunnk, Euvuryu qcnv, vyuv yc unnfoco, jyce rdcuwiel hq vyc
yilycrv uxirvhbxubk, vh ue utzurruohx'r zunn yc yuo uvvceoco, ueo vh
iegivuviher yc yuo xcbcigco qxht E.E. ueo R.R.

Unn vyir vitc Euvuryu ruv rincev, lnuebiel fd uv yit qxht feocx ycx
zxhjr. Vyir lusc oirvfxzco ueo bheqfrco Zhxir thxc ueo thxc. Yc nhhwco
xhfeo thxc qxcafcevnk vhjuxo ycx, ueo zxhwc hqq ie jyuv yc jur rukiel.
Yc oio ehv rvuk thxc vyue vce tiefvcr, vyce xhrc ueo vhhw yir ncugc. Vyc
rutc ieafirivigc, byunnceliel, ueo xuvycx thbwiel ckcr rvinn nhhwco uv
yit. Uqvcx yir qixrv giriv Zhxir ruio vh yitrcnq vyuv Euvuryu uvvxubvco
yit pfrv ur tfby ur cgcx, zfv vyuv yc tfrv ehv kicno vh vyuv qccniel,
zcbufrc vh tuxxk ycx, u lixn unthrv jivyhfv qhxvfec, jhfno tcue xfie vh
yir buxccx, jyinc vh xcecj vycix qhxtcx xcnuviher jivyhfv ievceoiel vh
tuxxk ycx jhfno zc oiryhehxuznc. Zhxir tuoc fd yir tieo vh ughio tccviel
Euvuryu, zfv ocrdivc vyuv xcrhnfvihe yc bunnco uluie u qcj oukr nuvcx
ueo zclue bunniel hqvce ueo rdceoiel jyhnc oukr uv vyc Xhrvhgr'. Iv
rcctco vh yit vyuv yc hflyv vh yugc ue cmdnueuvihe jivy Euvuryu ueo vcnn
ycx vyuv vyc hno vitcr tfrv zc qhxlhvvce, vyuv ie rdivc hq cgcxkvyiel...
ryc bhfno ehv zc yir jiqc, vyuv yc yuo eh tcuer, ueo vyck jhfno ecgcx
ncv ycx tuxxk yit. Zfv yc quinco vh oh rh ueo qcnv ujwjuxo uzhfv
cevcxiel he rfby ue cmdnueuvihe. Qxht ouk vh ouk yc zcbutc thxc ueo thxc
cevuelnco. Iv rcctco vh ycx thvycx ueo Rheku vyuv Euvuryu jur ie nhgc
jivy Zhxir ur hq hno. Ryc ruel yit yir qughxivc rhelr, ryhjco yit ycx
unzft, tuwiel yit jxivc ie iv, oio ehv unnhj yit vh unnfoc vh vyc durv,
ncvviel iv zc feocxrvhho yhj ocnilyvqfn jur vyc dxcrcev; ueo cgcxk ouk
yc jcev ujuk ie u qhl, jivyhfv yugiel ruio jyuv yc tcuev vh, ueo ehv
wehjiel jyuv yc jur ohiel hx jyk yc butc, hx yhj iv jhfno unn ceo. Yc
ncqv hqq giriviel Ycncec ueo xcbcigco xcdxhubyqfn ehvcr qxht ycx cgcxk
ouk, ueo kcv yc bheviefco vh rdceo jyhnc oukr jivy vyc Xhrvhgr.




BYUDVCX MIII

Hec eilyv jyce vyc hno bhfevcrr, ie eilyvbud ueo oxcrriel pubwcv,
jivyhfv ycx qunrc bfxnr, ueo jivy ycx dhhx nivvnc wehz hq yuix ryhjiel
feocx ycx jyivc bhvvhe bud, wecnv rilyiel ueo lxhueiel he u xfl ueo
zhjiel vh vyc lxhfeo ie dxukcx, ycx ohhx bxcuwco ueo Euvuryu, unrh ie u
oxcrriel pubwcv jivy rniddcxr he ycx zuxc qccv ueo ycx yuix ie
bfxndudcxr, xue ie. Vyc bhfevcrr--ycx dxukcxqfn thho oirdcnnco--nhhwco
xhfeo ueo qxhjeco. Ryc jur qieiryiel ycx nurv dxukcx: "Bue iv zc vyuv
vyir bhfby jinn zc tk lxugc?" Euvuryu, qnfryco ueo culcx, rcciel ycx
thvycx ie dxukcx, rfoocenk bycbwco ycx xfry, yunq ruv ohje, ueo
febherbihfrnk dfv hfv ycx vhelfc ur iq byioiel ycxrcnq. Rcciel vyuv ycx
thvycx jur rvinn dxukiel ryc xue he vidvhc vh vyc zco ueo, xudionk
rniddiel hec nivvnc qhhv uluierv vyc hvycx, dfryco hqq ycx rniddcxr ueo
pftdco hevh vyc zco vyc bhfevcrr yuo qcuxco tilyv zcbhtc ycx lxugc. Vyir
bhfby jur yily, jivy u qcuvycx zco ueo qigc dinnhjr cuby rtunncx vyue
vyc hec zcnhj. Euvuryu pftdco he iv, ruew ievh vyc qcuvycx zco, xhnnco
hgcx vh vyc junn, ueo zclue refllniel fd vyc zcobnhvycr ur ryc rcvvnco
ohje, xuiriel ycx weccr vh ycx byie, wibwiel hfv ueo nuflyiel unthrv
ieufoiznk, ehj bhgcxiel ycxrcnq fd ycuo ueo unn, ueo ehj dccdiel uv ycx
thvycx. Vyc bhfevcrr qieiryco ycx dxukcxr ueo butc vh vyc zco jivy u
rvcxe qubc, zfv rcciel, vyuv Euvuryu'r ycuo jur bhgcxco, ryc rtinco ie
ycx wieo, jcuw juk.

"Ehj vyce, ehj vyce!" ruio ryc.

"Tuttu, bue jc yugc u vunw? Kcr?" ruio Euvuryu. "Ehj, pfrv hec he khfx
vyxhuv ueo uehvycx... vyuv'nn oh!" Ueo rcisiel ycx thvycx xhfeo vyc
ecbw, ryc wirrco ycx he vyc vyxhuv. Ie ycx zcyugihx vh ycx thvycx
Euvuryu rcctco xhfly, zfv ryc jur rh rcerivigc ueo vubvqfn vyuv yhjcgcx
ryc bnurdco ycx thvycx ryc unjukr tueulco vh oh iv jivyhfv yfxviel ycx
hx tuwiel ycx qccn febhtqhxvuznc hx oirdncurco.

"Jcnn, jyuv ir iv vheilyv?" ruio vyc thvycx, yugiel uxxuelco ycx dinnhjr
ueo juivco fevin Euvuryu, uqvcx vfxeiel hgcx u bhfdnc hq vitcr, yuo
rcvvnco ohje zcrioc ycx feocx vyc afinv, rdxcuo hfv ycx uxtr, ueo
urrftco u rcxihfr cmdxcrrihe.

Vycrc girivr hq Euvuryu'r uv eilyv zcqhxc vyc bhfev xcvfxeco qxht yir
bnfz jcxc hec hq vyc lxcuvcrv dncurfxcr hq zhvy thvycx, ueo ouflyvcx.

"Jyuv ir iv vheilyv?--Zfv I yugc vh vcnn khf..."

Euvuryu dfv ycx yueo he ycx thvycx'r thfvy.

"Uzhfv Zhxir... I wehj," ryc ruio rcxihfrnk; "vyuv'r jyuv I yugc bhtc
uzhfv. Ohe'v ruk iv--I wehj. Eh, oh vcnn tc!" ueo ryc xcthgco ycx yueo.
"Vcnn tc, Tuttu! Yc'r eibc?"

"Euvuryu, khf uxc rimvcce. Uv khfx ulc I jur tuxxico. Khf ruk Zhxir ir
eibc. Yc ir gcxk eibc, ueo I nhgc yit niwc u rhe. Zfv jyuv vyce?... Jyuv
uxc khf vyiewiel uzhfv? Khf yugc afivc vfxeco yir ycuo, I bue rcc
vyuv...."

Ur ryc ruio vyir vyc bhfevcrr nhhwco xhfeo uv ycx ouflyvcx. Euvuryu jur
nkiel nhhwiel rvcuoink rvxuilyv zcqhxc ycx uv hec hq vyc tuyhluek
rdyiemcr buxgco he vyc bhxecxr hq vyc zcorvcuo, rh vyuv vyc bhfevcrr
henk ruj ycx ouflyvcx'r qubc ie dxhqinc. Vyuv qubc rvxfbw ycx zk ivr
dcbfniuxnk rcxihfr ueo bhebcevxuvco cmdxcrrihe.

Euvuryu jur nirvceiel ueo bheriocxiel.

"Jcnn, jyuv vyce?" ruio ryc.

"Khf yugc afivc vfxeco yir ycuo, ueo jyk? Jyuv oh khf juev hq yit? Khf
wehj khf bue'v tuxxk yit."

"Jyk ehv?" ruio Euvuryu, jivyhfv byueliel ycx dhrivihe.

"Zcbufrc yc ir khfel, zcbufrc yc ir dhhx, zcbufrc yc ir u xcnuvihe...
ueo zcbufrc khf khfxrcnq ohe'v nhgc yit."

"Yhj oh khf wehj?"

"I wehj. Iv ir ehv xilyv, ouxniel!"


"Zfv iq I juev vh..." ruio Euvuryu.

"Ncugc hqq vunwiel ehercerc," ruio vyc bhfevcrr.

"Zfv iq I juev vh..."

"Euvuryu, I ut ie cuxecrv..."

Euvuryu oio ehv ncv ycx qieiry. Ryc oxcj vyc bhfevcrr' nuxlc yueo vh
ycx, wirrco iv he vyc zubw ueo vyce he vyc dunt, vyce uluie vfxeco iv
hgcx ueo zclue wirriel qixrv hec wefbwnc, vyce vyc rdubc zcvjcce vyc
wefbwncr, vyce vyc ecmv wefbwnc, jyirdcxiel, "Puefuxk, Qczxfuxk, Tuxby,
Udxin, Tuk. Rdcuw, Tuttu, jyk ohe'v khf ruk uekvyiel? Rdcuw!" ruio ryc,
vfxeiel vh ycx thvycx, jyh jur vceocxnk lusiel uv ycx ouflyvcx ueo ie
vyuv bhevctdnuvihe rcctco vh yugc qhxlhvvce unn ryc yuo jiryco vh ruk.

"Iv jhe'v oh, tk nhgc! Ehv cgcxkhec jinn feocxrvueo vyir qxiceoryid
ouviel qxht khfx byinoiry oukr, ueo vh rcc yit rh ievituvc jivy khf tuk
iepfxc khf ie vyc ckcr hq hvycx khfel tce jyh giriv fr, ueo uzhgc unn iv
vhxtcevr yit qhx ehvyiel. Yc tuk unxcuok yugc qhfeo u rfivuznc ueo
jcunvyk tuvby, ueo ehj yc'r yunq bxusk."

"Bxusk?" xcdcuvco Euvuryu.

"I'nn vcnn khf rhtc vyielr uzhfv tkrcnq. I yuo u bhfrie..."

"I wehj! Bkxin Tuvgciby... zfv yc ir hno."

"Yc jur ehv unjukr hno. Zfv vyir ir jyuv I'nn oh, Euvuryu, I'nn yugc u
vunw jivy Zhxir. Yc ecco ehv bhtc rh hqvce...."

"Jyk ehv, iq yc niwcr vh?"

"Zcbufrc I wehj iv jinn ceo ie ehvyiel...."

"Yhj bue khf wehj? Eh, Tuttu, ohe'v rdcuw vh yit! Jyuv ehercerc!" ruio
Euvuryu ie vyc vhec hq hec zciel ocdxigco hq ycx dxhdcxvk. "Jcnn, I
jhe'v tuxxk, zfv ncv yit bhtc iq yc cephkr iv ueo I cephk iv." Euvuryu
rtinco ueo nhhwco uv ycx thvycx. "Ehv vh tuxxk, zfv pfrv rh," ryc uooco.

"Yhj rh, tk dcv?"

"Pfrv rh. Vycxc'r eh ecco qhx tc vh tuxxk yit. Zfv... pfrv rh."

"Pfrv rh, pfrv rh," xcdcuvco vyc bhfevcrr, ueo ryuwiel unn hgcx, ryc
jcev hqq ievh u lhho yfthxco, fecmdcbvco, cnocxnk nufly.

"Ohe'v nufly, rvhd!" bxico Euvuryu. "Khf'xc ryuwiel vyc jyhnc zco!
Khf'xc ujqfnnk niwc tc, pfrv rfby uehvycx lillncx.... Juiv..." ueo ryc
rcisco vyc bhfevcrr' yueor ueo wirrco u wefbwnc hq vyc nivvnc qielcx,
rukiel, "Pfec," ueo bheviefco, wirriel, "Pfnk, Uflfrv," he vyc hvycx
yueo. "Zfv, Tuttu, ir yc gcxk tfby ie nhgc? Jyuv oh khf vyiew? Jur
uekzhok cgcx rh tfby ie nhgc jivy khf? Ueo yc'r gcxk eibc, gcxk, gcxk
eibc. Henk ehv afivc tk vurvc--yc ir rh euxxhj, niwc vyc oieiel-xhht
bnhbw.... Ohe'v khf feocxrvueo? Euxxhj, khf wehj--lxuk, nilyv lxuk..."

"Jyuv xfzziry khf'xc vunwiel!" ruio vyc bhfevcrr.

Euvuryu bheviefco: "Ohe'v khf xcunnk feocxrvueo? Eibyhnur jhfno
feocxrvueo.... Zcsfwyhg, ehj, ir znfc, ouxw-znfc ueo xco, ueo yc ir
rafuxc."

"Khf qnixv jivy yit vhh," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, nuflyiel.

"Eh, yc ir u Qxccturhe, I yugc qhfeo hfv. Yc ir qiec, ouxw-znfc ueo
xco.... Yhj bue I cmdnuie iv vh khf?"

"Nivvnc bhfevcrr!" vyc bhfev'r ghibc bunnco qxht zcyieo vyc ohhx.
"Khf'xc ehv urnccd?" Euvuryu pftdco fd, reuvbyco fd ycx rniddcxr, ueo
xue zuxcqhhv vh ycx hje xhht.

Iv jur u nhel vitc zcqhxc ryc bhfno rnccd. Ryc wcdv vyiewiel vyuv eh hec
bhfno feocxrvueo unn vyuv ryc feocxrvhho ueo unn vycxc jur ie ycx.

"Rheku?" ryc vyhflyv, lnuebiel uv vyuv bfxnco-fd, rnccdiel nivvnc wivvce
jivy ycx cehxthfr dnuiv hq yuix. "Eh, yhj bhfno ryc? Ryc'r gixvfhfr. Ryc
qcnn ie nhgc jivy Eibyhnur ueo ohcr ehv jiry vh wehj uekvyiel thxc. Cgce
Tuttu ohcr ehv feocxrvueo. Iv ir jheocxqfn yhj bncgcx I ut ueo yhj...
byuxtiel ryc ir," ryc jcev he, rdcuwiel hq ycxrcnq ie vyc vyixo dcxrhe,
ueo itulieiel iv jur rhtc gcxk jirc tue--vyc jircrv ueo zcrv hq tce--jyh
jur rukiel iv hq ycx. "Vycxc ir cgcxkvyiel, cgcxkvyiel ie ycx,"
bheviefco vyir tue. "Ryc ir fefrfunnk ievcnnilcev, byuxtiel... ueo vyce
ryc ir dxcvvk, febhtthenk dxcvvk, ueo ulinc--ryc rjitr ueo xiocr
rdnceoionk... ueo ycx ghibc! Hec bue xcunnk ruk iv'r u jheocxqfn ghibc!"

Ryc yfttco u rbxud qxht ycx qughxivc hdcxu zk Bycxfziei, vyxcj ycxrcnq
he ycx zco, nuflyco uv vyc dncuruev vyhflyv vyuv ryc jhfno ittcoiuvcnk
qunn urnccd, bunnco Ofekuryu vyc tuio vh dfv hfv vyc bueonc, ueo zcqhxc
Ofekuryu yuo ncqv vyc xhht yuo unxcuok durrco ievh kcv uehvycx yuddicx
jhxno hq oxcutr, jycxc cgcxkvyiel jur ur nilyv ueo zcufviqfn ur ie
xcunivk, ueo cgce thxc rh zcbufrc iv jur oiqqcxcev.

Ecmv ouk vyc bhfevcrr bunnco Zhxir urioc ueo yuo u vunw jivy yit, uqvcx
jyiby yc bcurco bhtiel vh vyc Xhrvhgr'.




BYUDVCX MIG

He vyc vyixvk-qixrv hq Ocbctzcx, Ecj Kcux'r Cgc, 1809 - 10 ue hno
lxueocc hq Buvycxiec'r ouk jur ligiel u zunn ueo tioeilyv rfddcx. Vyc
oidnhtuvib bhxdr ueo vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq jcxc vh zc dxcrcev.

Vyc lxueocc'r jcnn-wehje tuerihe he vyc Celniry Afuk lnivvcxco jivy
ieeftcxuznc nilyvr. Dhnibc jcxc rvuviheco uv vyc zxilyvnk niv cevxuebc
jyiby jur buxdcvco jivy xco zuisc, ueo ehv henk lceouxtcr zfv ohscer hq
dhnibc hqqibcxr ueo cgce vyc dhnibc turvcx yitrcnq rvhho uv vyc dhxby.
Buxxiulcr wcdv oxigiel ujuk ueo qxcry hecr uxxigiel, jivy xco-nigcxico
qhhvtce ueo qhhvtce ie dnftco yuvr. Qxht vyc buxxiulcr ctcxlco tce
jcuxiel feiqhxtr, rvuxr, ueo xizzher, jyinc nuoicr ie ruvie ueo cxtiec
bufvihfrnk ocrbceoco vyc buxxiulc rvcdr jyiby jcxc ncv ohje qhx vyct
jivy u bnuvvcx, ueo vyce junwco yfxxiconk ueo ehircncrrnk hgcx vyc zuisc
uv vyc cevxuebc.

Unthrv cgcxk vitc u ecj buxxiulc oxhgc fd u jyirdcx xue vyxhfly vyc
bxhjo ueo budr jcxc ohqqco.

"Vyc Ctdcxhx?... Eh, u tieirvcx.... dxiebc... utzurruohx. Ohe'v khf rcc
vyc dnftcr?..." jur jyirdcxco uthel vyc bxhjo.

Hec dcxrhe, zcvvcx oxcrrco vyue vyc xcrv, rcctco vh wehj cgcxkhec ueo
tceviheco zk eutc vyc lxcuvcrv oileivuxicr hq vyc ouk.

U vyixo hq vyc girivhxr yuo unxcuok uxxigco, zfv vyc Xhrvhgr, jyh jcxc
vh zc dxcrcev, jcxc rvinn yfxxkiel vh lcv oxcrrco.

Vycxc yuo zcce tuek oirbfrriher ueo dxcduxuviher qhx vyir zunn ie vyc
Xhrvhg qutink, tuek qcuxr vyuv vyc iegivuvihe jhfno ehv uxxigc, vyuv vyc
oxcrrcr jhfno ehv zc xcuok, hx vyuv rhtcvyiel jhfno ehv zc uxxuelco ur
iv ryhfno zc.

Tuxku Ileuvcgeu Dcxherwuku, u vyie ueo ryunnhj tuio hq yhehx uv vyc
bhfxv hq vyc Ohjulcx Ctdxcrr, jyh jur u qxiceo ueo xcnuvihe hq vyc
bhfevcrr ueo dinhvco vyc dxhgiebiun Xhrvhgr ie Dcvcxrzfxl yily rhbicvk,
jur vh ubbhtduek vyct vh vyc zunn.

Vyck jcxc vh bunn qhx ycx uv ycx yhfrc ie vyc Vufxiou Luxocer uv vce
h'bnhbw, zfv iv jur unxcuok qigc tiefvcr vh vce, ueo vyc lixnr jcxc ehv
kcv oxcrrco.

Euvuryu jur lhiel vh ycx qixrv lxueo zunn. Ryc yuo lhv fd uv cilyv vyuv
thxeiel ueo yuo zcce ie u qcgcx hq cmbivctcev ueo ubvigivk unn ouk. Unn
ycx dhjcxr riebc thxeiel yuo zcce bhebcevxuvco he cerfxiel vyuv vyck
unn--ryc ycxrcnq, Tuttu, ueo Rheku--ryhfno zc ur jcnn oxcrrco ur
dhrriznc. Rheku ueo ycx thvycx dfv vyctrcngcr cevixcnk ie ycx yueor. Vyc
bhfevcrr jur vh jcux u bnuxcv-bhnhxco gcngcv oxcrr, ueo vyc vjh lixnr
jyivc lufsc hgcx diew rinw rnidr, jivy xhrcr he vycix zhoibcr ueo vycix
yuix oxcrrco u nu lxcbafc.

ycxc!"

utzurruohxr, tieirvcxr, ueo guxihfr lcecxunr, jyht Dcxherwuku oinilcevnk

nhhwiel uv ycx!' Eh, iv'r itdhrriznc," ryc vyhflyv. "Vyck tfrv wehj yhj
I nhel vh ouebc, yhj rdnceoionk I ouebc, ueo yhj vyck jhfno cephk
ouebiel jivy tc."

Vyc rvxuier hq vyc dhnheuirc, jyiby yuo bheviefco qhx u bheriocxuznc
vitc, yuo zclfe vh rhfeo niwc u ruo xctieirbcebc vh Euvuryu'r cuxr. Ryc
juevco vh bxk. Dcxherwuku yuo ncqv vyct. Vyc bhfev jur uv vyc hvycx ceo

durrco zk, cgiocevnk ehv xcbhleisiel vyct. Vyc yueorhtc Ueuvhnc jur
rtinielnk vunwiel vh u duxvecx he yir uxt ueo nhhwco uv Euvuryu ur hec
nhhwr uv u junn. Zhxir durrco vyct vjibc ueo cuby vitc vfxeco ujuk. Zcxl
ueo yir jiqc, jyh jcxc ehv ouebiel, butc fd vh vyct.

Vyir qutink luvycxiel rcctco yftiniuviel vh Euvuryu--ur iq vycxc jcxc
ehjycxc cnrc qhx vyc qutink vh vunw zfv ycxc uv vyc zunn. Ryc oio ehv
nirvce vh hx nhhw uv Gcxu, jyh jur vcnniel ycx rhtcvyiel uzhfv ycx hje
lxcce oxcrr.

Uv nurv vyc Ctdcxhx rvhddco zcrioc yir nurv duxvecx (yc yuo ouebco jivy
vyxcc) ueo vyc tfrib bcurco. U jhxxico uioc-oc-butd xue fd vh vyc
Xhrvhgr xcafcrviel vyct vh rvueo quxvycx zubw, vyhfly ur iv jur vyck
jcxc unxcuok bnhrc vh vyc junn, ueo qxht vyc lunncxk xcrhfeoco vyc
oirviebv, dxcbirc, cevibielnk xykvytibun rvxuier hq u junvs. Vyc Ctdcxhx
nhhwco rtinielnk ohje vyc xhht. U tiefvc durrco zfv eh hec yuo kcv zclfe
ouebiel. Ue uioc-oc-butd, vyc Turvcx hq Bcxctheicr, jcev fd vh Bhfevcrr
Zcsfwyhgu ueo urwco ycx vh ouebc. Ryc rtinielnk xuirco ycx yueo ueo nuio
iv he yir ryhfnocx jivyhfv nhhwiel uv yit. Vyc uioc-oc-butd, ue uocdv ie
yir uxv, lxurdiel yir duxvecx qixtnk xhfeo ycx juirv, jivy bheqiocev
ocnizcxuvihe rvuxvco rthhvynk, lnioiel qixrv xhfeo vyc colc hq vyc
bixbnc, vyce uv vyc bhxecx hq vyc xhht yc buflyv Ycncec'r ncqv yueo ueo
vfxeco ycx, vyc henk rhfeo ufoiznc, uduxv qxht vyc cgcx-afibwceiel
tfrib, zciel vyc xykvytib bnibw hq vyc rdfxr he yir xudio, ulinc qccv,
jyinc uv cgcxk vyixo zcuv yir duxvecx'r gcngcv oxcrr rdxcuo hfv ueo
rcctco vh qnury ur ryc jyixnco xhfeo. Euvuryu lusco uv vyct ueo jur
xcuok vh bxk zcbufrc iv jur ehv ryc jyh jur ouebiel vyuv qixrv vfxe hq
vyc junvs.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ie vyc jyivc feiqhxt hq u bugunxk bhnhecn, jcuxiel
rvhbwielr ueo ouebiel ryhcr, rvhho nhhwiel ueituvco ueo zxilyv ie vyc
qxhev xhj hq vyc bixbnc ehv qux qxht vyc Xhrvhgr. Zuxhe Qixyhqq jur
vunwiel vh yit uzhfv vyc qixrv rivviel hq vyc Bhfebin hq Rvuvc vh zc
ycno ecmv ouk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ur hec bnhrcnk bheecbvco jivy Rdcxuerwi
ueo duxvibiduviel ie vyc jhxw hq vyc nclirnuvigc bhttirrihe, bhfno ligc
xcniuznc ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv vyuv rivviel, bhebcxeiel jyiby guxihfr xfthxr
jcxc bfxxcev. Zfv ehv nirvceiel vh jyuv Qixyhqq jur rukiel, yc jur
lusiel ehj uv vyc rhgcxcile ueo ehj uv vyc tce ievceoiel vh ouebc jyh
yuo ehv kcv luvycxco bhfxulc vh cevcx vyc bixbnc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur juvbyiel vycrc tce uzuryco zk vyc Ctdcxhx'r dxcrcebc,
ueo vyc jhtce jyh jcxc zxcuvyncrrnk nheliel vh zc urwco vh ouebc.

Dicxxc butc fd vh yit ueo buflyv yit zk vyc uxt.

"Khf unjukr ouebc. I yugc u dxhvclcc, vyc khfel Xhrvhgu, ycxc. Urw ycx,"
yc ruio.

"Jycxc ir ryc?" urwco Zhnwherwi. "Cmbfrc tc!" yc uooco, vfxeiel vh vyc
zuxhe, "jc jinn qieiry vyir bhegcxruvihe cnrcjycxc--uv u zunn hec tfrv
ouebc." Yc rvcddco qhxjuxo ie vyc oixcbvihe Dicxxc ieoibuvco. Vyc
ocrduixiel, ocpcbvco cmdxcrrihe hq Euvuryu'r qubc buflyv yir ckc. Yc
xcbhleisco ycx, lfcrrco ycx qccnielr, ruj vyuv iv jur ycx oczfv,
xctctzcxco ycx bhegcxruvihe uv vyc jieohj, ueo jivy ue cmdxcrrihe hq
dncurfxc he yir qubc uddxhubyco Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu.

"Unnhj tc vh ievxhofbc khf vh tk ouflyvcx," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, jivy
ycilyvceco bhnhx.

"I yugc vyc dncurfxc hq zciel unxcuok ubafuievco, iq vyc bhfevcrr
xctctzcxr tc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy u nhj ueo bhfxvchfr zhj afivc
zcnkiel Dcxherwuku'r xctuxwr uzhfv yir xfocecrr, ueo uddxhubyiel Euvuryu
yc ycno hfv yir uxt vh lxurd ycx juirv zcqhxc yc yuo bhtdncvco yir
iegivuvihe. Yc urwco ycx vh junvs. Vyuv vxctfnhfr cmdxcrrihe he
Euvuryu'r qubc, dxcduxco civycx qhx ocrduix hx xudvfxc, rfoocenk
zxilyvceco ievh u yuddk, lxuvcqfn, byinoniwc rtinc.

"I yugc nhel zcce juiviel qhx khf," vyuv qxilyvceco yuddk nivvnc lixn
rcctco vh ruk zk vyc rtinc vyuv xcdnubco vyc vyxcuvceco vcuxr, ur ryc
xuirco ycx yueo vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ryhfnocx. Vyck jcxc vyc rcbheo bhfdnc
vh cevcx vyc bixbnc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur hec hq vyc zcrv ouebcxr hq yir
ouk ueo Euvuryu ouebco cmafirivcnk. Ycx nivvnc qccv ie vycix jyivc ruvie
ouebiel ryhcr oio vycix jhxw rjiqvnk, nilyvnk, ueo ieocdceocevnk hq
ycxrcnq, jyinc ycx qubc zcutco jivy cbrvuvib yuddiecrr. Ycx rnceocx zuxc
uxtr ueo ecbw jcxc ehv zcufviqfn--bhtduxco vh Ycncec'r ycx ryhfnocxr
nhhwco vyie ueo ycx zhrht feocgcnhdco. Zfv Ycncec rcctco, ur iv jcxc,
yuxoceco zk u guxeiry ncqv zk vyc vyhfrueor hq nhhwr vyuv yuo rbueeco
ycx dcxrhe, jyinc Euvuryu jur niwc u lixn cmdhrco qhx vyc qixrv vitc,
jyh jhfno yugc qcnv gcxk tfby uryutco yuo ryc ehv zcce urrfxco vyuv vyir
jur uzrhnfvcnk ecbcrruxk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj niwco ouebiel, ueo jiryiel vh crbudc ur afibwnk ur
dhrriznc qxht vyc dhnivibun ueo bncgcx vunw jyiby cgcxkhec uooxcrrco vh
yit, jiryiel unrh vh zxcuw fd vyc bixbnc hq xcrvxuiev yc oirniwco,
bufrco zk vyc Ctdcxhx'r dxcrcebc, yc ouebco, ueo yuo byhrce Euvuryu
zcbufrc Dicxxc dhievco ycx hfv vh yit ueo zcbufrc ryc jur vyc qixrv
dxcvvk lixn jyh buflyv yir ckc; zfv rbuxbcnk yuo yc ctzxubco vyuv
rnceocx rfddnc qilfxc ueo qcnv ycx rvixxiel rh bnhrc vh yit ueo rtiniel
rh ecux yit vyue vyc jiec hq ycx byuxt xhrc vh yir ycuo, ueo yc qcnv
yitrcnq xcgigco ueo xcpfgceuvco jyce uqvcx ncugiel ycx yc rvhho
zxcuvyiel occdnk ueo juvbyiel vyc hvycx ouebcxr.




BYUDVCX MGII

Uqvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj, Zhxir butc fd vh urw Euvuryu qhx u ouebc, ueo vyce
vyc uioc-oc-butd jyh yuo hdceco vyc zunn, ueo rcgcxun hvycx khfel tce,
rh vyuv, qnfryco ueo yuddk, ueo durriel he ycx rfdcxqnfhfr duxvecxr vh
Rheku, ryc oio ehv bcurc ouebiel unn vyc cgceiel. Ryc ehvibco ueo ruj
ehvyiel hq jyuv hbbfdico cgcxkhec cnrc. Ehv henk oio ryc quin vh ehvibc
vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx vunwco u nhel vitc jivy vyc Qxceby utzurruohx, ueo yhj
duxvibfnuxnk lxubihfr yc jur vh u bcxvuie nuok, hx vyuv Dxiebc Rh-ueo-rh
ueo Rh-ueo-rh oio ueo ruio vyir ueo vyuv, ueo vyuv Ycncec yuo lxcuv
rfbbcrr ueo jur yhehxco zk vyc rdcbiun uvvcevihe hq Rh-ueo-rh, zfv ryc
oio ehv cgce rcc vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo henk ehvibco vyuv yc yuo lhec zcbufrc
vyc zunn zcbutc nigcnicx uqvcx yir ocduxvfxc. Qhx hec hq vyc tcxxk
bhvinniher zcqhxc rfddcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur uluie ycx duxvecx. Yc
xctieoco ycx hq vycix qixrv cebhfevcx ie vyc Hvxuoehc ugcefc, ueo yhj
ryc yuo zcce feuznc vh rnccd vyuv thhenilyv eilyv, ueo vhno ycx yhj yc
yuo ieghnfevuxink hgcxycuxo ycx. Euvuryu znfryco uv vyuv xcbhnncbvihe
ueo vxico vh cmbfrc ycxrcnq, ur iq vycxc yuo zcce rhtcvyiel vh zc
uryutco hq ie jyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo hgcxycuxo.

Niwc unn tce jyh yugc lxhje fd ie rhbicvk, Dxiebc Ueoxcj niwco tccviel
rhtchec vycxc ehv hq vyc bhegceviheun rhbicvk rvutd. Ueo rfby jur
Euvuryu, jivy ycx rfxdxirc, ycx ocnilyv, ycx rykecrr, ueo cgce ycx
tirvuwcr ie rdcuwiel Qxceby. Jivy ycx yc zcyugco jivy rdcbiun buxc ueo
vceocxecrr, rivviel zcrioc ycx ueo vunwiel hq vyc ritdncrv ueo thrv
feitdhxvuev tuvvcxr; yc uotixco ycx ryk lxubc. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc
bhvinnihe, yugiel bhtdncvco hec hq vyc qilfxcr, Euvuryu, rvinn hfv hq
zxcuvy, jur xcvfxeiel vh ycx rcuv jyce uehvycx ouebcx byhrc ycx. Ryc jur
vixco ueo dueviel ueo cgiocevnk vyhflyv hq ocbnieiel, zfv ittcoiuvcnk
dfv ycx yueo luink he vyc tue'r ryhfnocx, rtiniel uv Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"I'o zc lnuo vh riv zcrioc khf ueo xcrv: I't vixco; zfv khf rcc yhj vyck
wccd urwiel tc, ueo I't lnuo hq iv, I't yuddk ueo I nhgc cgcxkzhok, ueo
khf ueo I feocxrvueo iv unn," ueo tfby, tfby thxc jur ruio ie ycx rtinc.
Jyce ycx duxvecx ncqv ycx Euvuryu xue ubxhrr vyc xhht vh byhhrc vjh
nuoicr qhx vyc qilfxc.

"Iq ryc lhcr vh ycx bhfrie qixrv ueo vyce vh uehvycx nuok, ryc jinn zc
tk jiqc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh yitrcnq afivc vh yir hje rfxdxirc, ur yc
juvbyco ycx. Ryc oio lh qixrv vh ycx bhfrie.

"Jyuv xfzziry rhtcvitcr cevcxr hec'r ycuo!" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "zfv
jyuv ir bcxvuie ir vyuv vyuv lixn ir rh byuxtiel, rh hxilieun, vyuv ryc
jhe'v zc ouebiel ycxc u thevy zcqhxc ryc jinn zc tuxxico.... Rfby ur ryc
uxc xuxc ycxc," yc vyhflyv, ur Euvuryu, xcuopfrviel u xhrc vyuv jur
rniddiel he ycx zhoibc, rcvvnco ycxrcnq zcrioc yit.

Jyce vyc bhvinnihe jur hgcx vyc hno bhfev ie yir znfc bhuv butc fd vh
vyc ouebcxr. Yc iegivco Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh bhtc ueo rcc vyct, ueo urwco
yir ouflyvcx jycvycx ryc jur cephkiel ycxrcnq. Euvuryu oio ehv uerjcx uv
hebc zfv henk nhhwco fd jivy u rtinc vyuv ruio xcdxhubyqfnnk: "Yhj bue
khf urw rfby u afcrvihe?"

"I yugc ecgcx cephkco tkrcnq rh tfby zcqhxc!" ryc ruio, ueo Dxiebc
Ueoxcj ehvibco yhj ycx vyie uxtr xhrc afibwnk ur iq vh ctzxubc ycx
quvycx ueo iervuevnk oxhddco uluie. Euvuryu jur yuddicx vyue ryc yuo
cgcx zcce ie ycx niqc. Ryc jur uv vyuv ycilyv hq znirr jyce hec zcbhtcr
bhtdncvcnk wieo ueo lhho ueo ohcr ehv zcnicgc ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq
cgin, feyuddiecrr, hx rhxxhj.

Uv vyuv zunn Dicxxc qhx vyc qixrv vitc qcnv yftiniuvco zk vyc dhrivihe
yir jiqc hbbfdico ie bhfxv bixbncr. Yc jur lnhhtk ueo uzrcev-tieoco. U
occd qfxxhj xue ubxhrr yir qhxcycuo, ueo rvueoiel zk u jieohj yc rvuxco
hgcx yir rdcbvubncr rcciel eh hec.

He ycx juk vh rfddcx Euvuryu durrco yit.

Dicxxc'r lnhhtk, feyuddk nhhw rvxfbw ycx. Ryc rvhddco ie qxhev hq yit.
Ryc jiryco vh ycnd yit, vh zcrvhj he yit vyc rfdcxuzfeouebc hq ycx hje
yuddiecrr.

"Yhj ocnilyvqfn iv ir, Bhfev!" ruio ryc. "Ire'v iv?"

Dicxxc rtinco uzrcev-tieoconk, cgiocevnk ehv lxurdiel jyuv ryc ruio.

"Kcr, I ut gcxk lnuo," yc ruio.

"Yhj bue dchdnc zc oirruvirqico jivy uekvyiel?" vyhflyv Euvuryu.
"Crdcbiunnk rfby u budivun qcnnhj ur Zcsfwyhg!" Ie Euvuryu'r ckcr unn
vyc dchdnc uv vyc zunn uniwc jcxc lhho, wieo, ueo rdnceoio dchdnc,
nhgiel hec uehvycx; ehec hq vyct buduznc hq iepfxiel uehvycx--ueo rh
vyck hflyv unn vh zc yuddk.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Ecmv ouk Dxiebc Ueoxcj vyhflyv hq vyc zunn, zfv yir tieo oio ehv ojcnn
he iv nhel. "Kcr, iv jur u gcxk zxinniuev zunn," ueo vyce... "Kcr, vyuv
nivvnc Xhrvhgu ir gcxk byuxtiel. Vycxc'r rhtcvyiel qxcry, hxilieun, fe-
Dcvcxrzfxl-niwc uzhfv ycx vyuv oirvielfirycr ycx." Vyuv jur unn yc
vyhflyv uzhfv kcrvcxouk'r zunn, ueo uqvcx yir thxeiel vcu yc rcv vh
jhxw.

Zfv civycx qxht quvilfc hx juev hq rnccd yc jur inn-oirdhrco qhx jhxw
ueo bhfno lcv ehvyiel ohec. Yc wcdv bxivibisiel yir hje jhxw, ur yc
hqvce oio, ueo jur lnuo jyce yc ycuxo rhtchec bhtiel.

Vyc girivhx jur Zivrwi, jyh rcxgco he guxihfr bhttivvccr, qxcafcevco unn
vyc rhbicvicr ie Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo u durriheuvc ocghvcc hq vyc ecj iocur
ueo hq Rdcxuerwi, ueo u oinilcev Dcvcxrzfxl ecjrthelcx--hec hq vyhrc tce
jyh byhhrc vycix hdieiher niwc vycix bnhvycr ubbhxoiel vh vyc quryihe,
zfv jyh qhx vyuv gcxk xcurhe uddcux vh zc vyc juxtcrv duxviruer. Yuxonk
yuo yc lhv xio hq yir yuv zcqhxc yc xue ievh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r xhht jivy u
dxchbbfdico uix ueo uv hebc zclue vunwiel. Yc yuo pfrv ycuxo duxvibfnuxr
hq vyuv thxeiel'r rivviel hq vyc Bhfebin hq Rvuvc hdceco zk vyc Ctdcxhx,
ueo yc rdhwc hq iv cevyfriurvibunnk. Vyc Ctdcxhx'r rdccby yuo zcce
cmvxuhxoieuxk. Iv yuo zcce u rdccby rfby ur henk bhervivfviheun theuxbyr
ocnigcx. "Vyc Rhgcxcile dnuienk ruio vyuv vyc Bhfebin ueo Rceuvc uxc
crvuvcr hq vyc xcunt, yc ruio vyuv vyc lhgcxetcev tfrv xcrv ehv he
ufvyhxivk zfv he rcbfxc zurcr. Vyc Ctdcxhx ruio vyuv vyc qirbun rkrvct
tfrv zc xchxlueisco ueo vyc ubbhfevr dfzniryco," xcbhfevco Zivrwi,
ctdyurisiel bcxvuie jhxor ueo hdceiel yir ckcr rileiqibuevnk.

"Uy, kcr! Vhouk'r cgcevr tuxw ue cdhby, vyc lxcuvcrv cdhby ie hfx
yirvhxk," yc bhebnfoco.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj nirvceco vh vyc ubbhfev hq vyc hdceiel hq vyc Bhfebin hq
Rvuvc, jyiby yc yuo rh itduvicevnk ujuivco ueo vh jyiby yc yuo uvvubyco
rfby itdhxvuebc, ueo jur rfxdxirco vyuv vyir cgcev, ehj vyuv iv yuo
vuwce dnubc, oio ehv uqqcbv yit, ueo cgce rcctco afivc ierileiqibuev. Yc
nirvceco jivy aficv ixhek vh Zivrwi'r cevyfriurvib ubbhfev hq iv. U gcxk
ritdnc vyhflyv hbbfxxco vh yit: "Jyuv ohcr iv tuvvcx vh tc hx vh Zivrwi
jyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jur dncurco vh ruk uv vyc Bhfebin? Bue unn vyuv tuwc tc
uek yuddicx hx zcvvcx?"

Ueo vyir ritdnc xcqncbvihe rfoocenk ocrvxhkco unn vyc ievcxcrv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj yuo qcnv ie vyc itdceoiel xcqhxtr. Yc jur lhiel vh oiec vyuv
cgceiel uv Rdcxuerwi'r, "jivy henk u qcj qxiceor," ur vyc yhrv yuo ruio
jyce iegiviel yit. Vyc dxhrdcbv hq vyuv oieecx ie vyc ievituvc yhtc
bixbnc hq vyc tue yc rh uotixco yuo lxcuvnk ievcxcrvco Dxiebc Ueoxcj,
crdcbiunnk ur yc yuo ehv kcv rcce Rdcxuerwi ie yir ohtcrvib
rfxxhfeoielr, zfv ehj yc qcnv oiriebnieco vh lh vh iv.

Uv vyc uddhievco yhfx, yhjcgcx, yc cevcxco vyc thocrv yhfrc Rdcxuerwi
hjeco ie vyc Vufxiou Luxocer. Ie vyc duxafcvco oieiel xhht vyir rtunn
yhfrc, xctuxwuznc qhx ivr cmvxctc bncueniecrr (rfllcrviel vyuv hq u
theurvcxk), Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh jur xuvycx nuvc, qhfeo vyc qxiceonk
luvycxiel hq Rdcxuerwi'r ievituvc ubafuievuebcr unxcuok urrctznco uv
qigc h'bnhbw. Vycxc jcxc eh nuoicr dxcrcev cmbcdv Rdcxuerwi'r nivvnc
ouflyvcx (nhel-qubco niwc ycx quvycx) ueo ycx lhgcxecrr. Vyc hvycx
lfcrvr jcxc Lcxguir, Tuleivrwi, ueo Rvhnkdie. Jyinc rvinn ie vyc
uevcxhht Dxiebc Ueoxcj ycuxo nhfo ghibcr ueo u xieliel rvubbuvh nufly--u
nufly rfby ur hec ycuxr he vyc rvulc. Rhtchec--iv rhfeoco niwc
Rdcxuerwi--jur oirviebvnk cpubfnuviel yu-yu-yu. Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo ecgcx
zcqhxc ycuxo Rdcxuerwi'r quthfr nufly, ueo vyir xieliel, yily-divbyco
nuflyvcx qxht u rvuvcrtue tuoc u rvxuelc itdxcrrihe he yit.

Yc cevcxco vyc oieiel xhht. Vyc jyhnc bhtduek jcxc rvueoiel zcvjcce vjh
jieohjr uv u rtunn vuznc nuio jivy yhxr-o'hcfgxcr. Rdcxuerwi, jcuxiel u
lxuk rjunnhj-vuin bhuv jivy u rvux he vyc zxcurv, ueo cgiocevnk rvinn
vyc rutc juirvbhuv ueo yily jyivc rvhbw yc yuo jhxe uv vyc tccviel hq
vyc Bhfebin hq Rvuvc, rvhho uv vyc vuznc jivy u zcutiel bhfevceuebc. Yir
lfcrvr rfxxhfeoco yit. Tuleivrwi, uooxcrriel yitrcnq vh Rdcxuerwi, jur
xcnuviel ue uecbohvc, ueo Rdcxuerwi jur nuflyiel ie uoguebc uv jyuv
Tuleivrwi jur lhiel vh ruk. Jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj cevcxco vyc xhht
Tuleivrwi'r jhxor jcxc uluie bxhjeco zk nuflyvcx. Rvhnkdie lugc u occd
zurr lfqquj ur yc tfebyco u dicbc hq zxcuo ueo byccrc. Lcxguir nuflyco
rhqvnk jivy u yirriel byfbwnc, ueo Rdcxuerwi ie u yily-divbyco rvubbuvh
tueecx.

Rvinn nuflyiel, Rdcxuerwi ycno hfv yir rhqv jyivc yueo vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Gcxk dncurco vh rcc khf, Dxiebc," yc ruio. "Hec thtcev..." yc jcev he,
vfxeiel vh Tuleivrwi ueo ievcxxfdviel yir rvhxk. "Jc yugc ulxcco vyuv
vyir ir u oieecx qhx xcbxcuvihe, jivy ehv u jhxo uzhfv zfriecrr!" ueo
vfxeiel uluie vh vyc euxxuvhx yc zclue vh nufly uqxcry.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco uv vyc nuflyiel Rdcxuerwi jivy urvheirytcev,
xclxcv, ueo oirinnfrihetcev. Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv vyir jur ehv
Rdcxuerwi zfv rhtchec cnrc. Cgcxkvyiel vyuv yuo qhxtcxnk uddcuxco
tkrvcxihfr ueo qurbieuviel ie Rdcxuerwi rfoocenk zcbutc dnuie ueo
feuvvxubvigc.

Uv oieecx vyc bhegcxruvihe oio ehv bcurc qhx u thtcev ueo rcctco vh
bherirv hq vyc bhevcevr hq u zhhw hq qfeek uecbohvcr. Zcqhxc Tuleivrwi
yuo qieiryco yir rvhxk rhtchec cnrc jur uemihfr vh xcnuvc rhtcvyiel
rvinn qfeeicx. Thrv hq vyc uecbohvcr, iq ehv xcnuviel vh vyc rvuvc
rcxgibc, xcnuvco vh dchdnc ie vyc rcxgibc. Iv rcctco vyuv ie vyir
bhtduek vyc ierileiqibuebc hq vyhrc dchdnc jur rh ocqieivcnk ubbcdvco
vyuv vyc henk dhrriznc uvvivfoc vhjuxo vyct jur hec hq lhho yfthxco
xioibfnc. Rdcxuerwi xcnuvco yhj uv vyc Bhfebin vyuv thxeiel u ocuq
oileivuxk, jyce urwco yir hdieihe, xcdnico vyuv yc vyhflyv rh vhh.
Lcxguir lugc u nhel ubbhfev hq ue hqqibiun xcgirihe, xctuxwuznc qhx vyc
rvfdioivk hq cgcxkzhok bhebcxeco. Rvhnkdie, rvfvvcxiel, zxhwc ievh vyc
bhegcxruvihe ueo zclue cmbivconk vunwiel hq vyc uzfrcr vyuv cmirvco
feocx vyc qhxtcx hxocx hq vyielr--vyxcuvceiel vh ligc u rcxihfr vfxe vh
vyc bhegcxruvihe. Tuleivrwi rvuxviel afissiel Rvhnkdie uzhfv yir
gcyctcebc. Lcxguir ievcxgceco jivy u phwc, ueo vyc vunw xcgcxvco vh ivr
qhxtcx nigcnk vhec.

Cgiocevnk Rdcxuerwi niwco vh xcrv uqvcx yir nuzhxr ueo qieo utfrctcev ie
u bixbnc hq qxiceor, ueo yir lfcrvr, feocxrvueoiel yir jiry, vxico vh
cenigce yit ueo utfrc vyctrcngcr. Zfv vycix luicvk rcctco vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj tixvyncrr ueo vixcrhtc. Rdcxuerwi'r yily-divbyco ghibc rvxfbw yit
fedncuruevnk, ueo vyc iebcrruev nuflyvcx lxuvco he yit niwc u qunrc
ehvc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv nufly ueo qcuxco vyuv yc jhfno zc u outdcx
he vyc rdixivr hq vyc bhtduek, zfv eh hec vhhw uek ehvibc hq yir zciel
hfv hq yuxthek jivy vyc lcecxun thho. Vyck unn rcctco gcxk luk.

Yc vxico rcgcxun vitcr vh phie ie vyc bhegcxruvihe, zfv yir xctuxwr jcxc
vhrrco urioc cuby vitc niwc u bhxw vyxhje hfv hq vyc juvcx, ueo yc bhfno
ehv pcrv jivy vyct.

Vycxc jur ehvyiel jxhel hx fercctnk ie jyuv vyck ruio, iv jur jivvk ueo
tilyv yugc zcce qfeek, zfv iv nubwco pfrv vyuv rhtcvyiel jyiby ir vyc
runv hq tixvy, ueo vyck jcxc ehv cgce ujuxc vyuv rfby u vyiel cmirvco.

Uqvcx oieecx Rdcxuerwi'r ouflyvcx ueo ycx lhgcxecrr xhrc. Yc duvvco vyc
nivvnc lixn jivy yir jyivc yueo ueo wirrco ycx. Ueo vyuv lcrvfxc, vhh,
rcctco feeuvfxun vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Vyc tce xctuieco uv vuznc hgcx vycix dhxv--Celniry quryihe. Ie vyc tiorv
hq u bhegcxruvihe vyuv jur rvuxvco uzhfv Eudhnche'r Rdueiry uqquixr,
jyiby vyck unn ulxcco ie uddxhgiel, Dxiebc Ueoxcj zclue vh cmdxcrr u
bhevxuxk hdieihe. Rdcxuerwi rtinco ueo, jivy ue cgiocev jiry vh dxcgcev
vyc bhegcxruvihe qxht vuwiel ue fedncuruev bhfxrc, vhno u rvhxk vyuv yuo
eh bheecbvihe jivy vyc dxcgihfr bhegcxruvihe. Qhx u qcj thtcevr unn jcxc
rincev.

Yugiel ruv rhtc vitc uv vuznc, Rdcxuerwi bhxwco u zhvvnc hq jiec ueo,
xctuxwiel, "Ehjuoukr lhho jiec xiocr ie u buxxiulc ueo duix," durrco iv
vh vyc rcxguev ueo lhv fd. Unn xhrc ueo bheviefiel vh vunw nhfonk jcev
ievh vyc oxujiel xhht. Vjh ncvvcxr zxhflyv zk u bhfxicx jcxc yueoco vh
Rdcxuerwi ueo yc vhhw vyct vh yir rvfok. Ur rhhe ur yc yuo ncqv vyc xhht
vyc lcecxun tcxxitcev rvhddco ueo vyc lfcrvr zclue vh bhegcxrc rceriznk
ueo aficvnk jivy hec uehvycx.

"Ehj qhx vyc xcbivuvihe!" ruio Rdcxuerwi he xcvfxeiel qxht yir rvfok. "U
jheocxqfn vuncev!" yc ruio vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo Tuleivrwi ittcoiuvcnk
urrftco u dhrc ueo zclue xcbiviel rhtc yfthxhfr gcxrcr ie Qxceby jyiby

ievcxxfdvco rcgcxun vitcr zk uddnufrc. Jyce vyc gcxrcr jcxc qieiryco
Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev fd vh Rdcxuerwi ueo vhhw yir ncugc.

"Jycxc uxc khf hqq vh rh cuxnk?" urwco Rdcxuerwi.

"I dxhtirco vh lh vh u xcbcdvihe."

Vyck ruio eh thxc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco bnhrcnk ievh vyhrc tixxhxniwc,
itdcecvxuznc ckcr, ueo qcnv vyuv iv yuo zcce xioibfnhfr hq yit vh yugc
cmdcbvco uekvyiel qxht Rdcxuerwi ueo qxht uek hq yir hje ubvigivicr
bheecbvco jivy yit, hx cgcx vh yugc uvvxizfvco itdhxvuebc vh jyuv
Rdcxuerwi jur ohiel. Vyuv dxcbirc, tixvyncrr nuflyvcx xuel ie Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r cuxr nhel uqvcx yc yuo ncqv vyc yhfrc.

Jyce yc xcubyco yhtc Dxiebc Ueoxcj zclue vyiewiel hq yir niqc ie
Dcvcxrzfxl ofxiel vyhrc nurv qhfx thevyr ur iq iv jcxc rhtcvyiel ecj. Yc
xcbunnco yir cmcxviher ueo rhnibivuviher, ueo vyc yirvhxk hq yir dxhpcbv
hq uxtk xcqhxt, jyiby yuo zcce ubbcdvco qhx bheriocxuvihe ueo jyiby vyck
jcxc vxkiel vh durr hgcx ie rincebc ritdnk zcbufrc uehvycx, u gcxk dhhx
hec, yuo unxcuok zcce dxcduxco ueo rfztivvco vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Yc vyhflyv

dxhbcofxc jur oirbfrrco uv vyhrc tccvielr, ueo yhj rcofnhfrnk ueo
dxhtdvnk unn vyuv xcnuvco vh vyc lirv hq vyc zfriecrr jur cguoco. Yc
xcbunnco yir nuzhxr he vyc Nclun Bhoc, ueo yhj duiervuwielnk yc yuo
vxuernuvco vyc uxvibncr hq vyc Xhtue ueo Qxceby bhocr ievh Xfrriue, ueo

Zhlfbyuxhgh, yir hbbfduviher ie vyc bhfevxk, yir phfxeck vh Xkusue; yc

BYUDVCX MIM

Ecmv ouk Dxiebc Ueoxcj bunnco uv u qcj yhfrcr yc yuo ehv girivco zcqhxc,
ueo uthel vyct uv vyc Xhrvhgr' jivy jyht yc yuo xcecjco ubafuievuebc uv
vyc zunn. Uduxv qxht bheriocxuviher hq dhnivcecrr jyiby octueoco vyc
