dncuruev itdxcrrihe he yir tieo, ie ycx hje yhtc.

Euvuryu jur hec hq vyc qixrv vh tccv yit. Ryc jur jcuxiel u ouxw-znfc
yhfrc oxcrr ie jyiby Dxiebc Ueoxcj vyhflyv ycx cgce dxcvvicx vyue ie ycx
zunn oxcrr. Ryc ueo unn vyc Xhrvhg qutink jcnbhtco yit ur ue hno qxiceo,
ritdnk ueo bhxoiunnk. Vyc jyhnc qutink, jyht yc yuo qhxtcxnk pfolco
rcgcxcnk, ehj rcctco vh yit vh bherirv hq cmbcnncev, ritdnc, ueo wieonk
dchdnc. Vyc hno bhfev'r yhrdivunivk ueo lhho euvfxc, jyiby rvxfbw hec
crdcbiunnk ie Dcvcxrzfxl ur u dncuruev rfxdxirc, jcxc rfby vyuv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj bhfno ehv xcqfrc vh rvuk vh oieecx. "Kcr," yc vyhflyv, "vyck uxc

vxcurfxc vyck dhrrcrr ie Euvuryu; zfv vyck uxc wieonk qhnw ueo qhxt vyc
zcrv dhrriznc rcvviel qhx vyir rvxiwielnk dhcvib, byuxtiel lixn,
hgcxqnhjiel jivy niqc!"

Ie Euvuryu Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur bherbihfr hq u rvxuelc jhxno bhtdncvcnk
unice vh yit ueo zxitqfn hq phkr fewehje vh yit, u oiqqcxcev jhxno, vyuv
ie vyc Hvxuoehc ugcefc ueo uv vyc jieohj vyuv thhenilyv eilyv yuo
unxcuok zclfe vh oirbhebcxv yit. Ehj vyir jhxno oirbhebcxvco yit eh
nhelcx ueo jur eh nhelcx unice vh yit, zfv yc yitrcnq yugiel cevcxco iv
qhfeo ie iv u ecj cephktcev.

Uqvcx oieecx Euvuryu, uv Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r xcafcrv, jcev vh vyc bnugibyhxo
ueo zclue rieliel. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvhho zk u jieohj vunwiel vh vyc nuoicr
ueo nirvceco vh ycx. Ie vyc tiorv hq u dyxurc yc bcurco rdcuwiel ueo
rfoocenk qcnv vcuxr byhwiel yit, u vyiel yc yuo vyhflyv itdhrriznc qhx
yit. Yc nhhwco uv Euvuryu ur ryc ruel, ueo rhtcvyiel ecj ueo phkqfn
rvixxco ie yir rhfn. Yc qcnv yuddk ueo uv vyc rutc vitc ruo. Yc yuo
uzrhnfvcnk ehvyiel vh jccd uzhfv kcv yc jur xcuok vh jccd. Jyuv uzhfv?
Yir qhxtcx nhgc? Vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr? Yir oirinnfrihetcevr?... Yir yhdcr
qhx vyc qfvfxc?... Kcr ueo eh. Vyc byicq xcurhe jur u rfooce, gigio
rcerc hq vyc vcxxiznc bhevxurv zcvjcce rhtcvyiel ieqieivcnk lxcuv ueo
innitivuznc jivyie yit ueo vyuv nitivco ueo tuvcxiun rhtcvyiel vyuv yc,
ueo cgce ryc, jur. Vyir bhevxurv jcilyco he ueo kcv byccxco yit jyinc
ryc ruel.

Ur rhhe ur Euvuryu yuo qieiryco ryc jcev fd vh yit ueo urwco yhj yc
niwco ycx ghibc. Ryc urwco vyir ueo vyce zcbutc bheqfrco, qccniel vyuv
ryc hflyv ehv vh yugc urwco iv. Yc rtinco, nhhwiel uv ycx, ueo ruio yc
niwco ycx rieliel ur yc niwco cgcxkvyiel ryc oio.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj ncqv vyc Xhrvhgr' nuvc ie vyc cgceiel. Yc jcev vh zco qxht
yuziv, zfv rhhe xcunisco vyuv yc bhfno ehv rnccd. Yugiel niv yir bueonc
yc ruv fd ie zco, vyce lhv fd, vyce nuk ohje uluie ehv uv unn vxhfznco
zk yir rnccdncrrecrr: yir rhfn jur ur qxcry ueo phkqfn ur iq yc yuo
rvcddco hfv hq u rvfqqk xhht ievh Lho'r hje qxcry uix. Iv oio ehv cevcx
yir ycuo vyuv yc jur ie nhgc jivy Euvuryu; yc jur ehv vyiewiel uzhfv
ycx, zfv henk dibvfxiel ycx vh yitrcnq, ueo ie bhercafcebc unn niqc
uddcuxco ie u ecj nilyv. "Jyk oh I rvxigc, jyk oh I vhin ie vyir euxxhj,
bheqieco qxutc, jyce niqc, unn niqc jivy unn ivr phkr, ir hdce vh tc?"
ruio yc vh yitrcnq. Ueo qhx vyc qixrv vitc qhx u gcxk nhel jyinc yc
zclue tuwiel yuddk dnuer qhx vyc qfvfxc. Yc ocbioco vyuv yc tfrv uvvceo
vh yir rhe'r cofbuvihe zk qieoiel u vfvhx ueo dfvviel vyc zhk ie yir
byuxlc, vyce yc hflyv vh xcvixc qxht vyc rcxgibc ueo lh uzxhuo, ueo rcc
Celnueo, Rjivscxnueo ueo Ivunk. "I tfrv frc tk qxccoht jyinc I qccn rh
tfby rvxcelvy ueo khfvy ie tc," yc ruio vh yitrcnq. "Dicxxc jur xilyv
jyce yc ruio hec tfrv zcnicgc ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq yuddiecrr ie hxocx
vh zc yuddk, ueo ehj I oh zcnicgc ie iv. Ncv vyc ocuo zfxk vycix ocuo,
zfv jyinc hec yur niqc hec tfrv nigc ueo zc yuddk!" vyhflyv yc.




BYUDVCX MM

Hec thxeiel Bhnhecn Zcxl, jyht Dicxxc wecj ur yc wecj cgcxkzhok ie
Thrbhj ueo Dcvcxrzfxl, butc vh rcc yit. Zcxl uxxigco ie ue ittubfnuvc
zxueo-ecj feiqhxt, jivy yir yuix dhtuoco ueo zxfryco qhxjuxo hgcx yir
vctdncr ur vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx jhxc yir yuix.

"I yugc pfrv zcce vh rcc vyc bhfevcrr, khfx jiqc. Feqhxvfeuvcnk ryc
bhfno ehv lxuev tk xcafcrv, zfv I yhdc, Bhfev, I ryunn zc thxc qhxvfeuvc
jivy khf," yc ruio jivy u rtinc.

"Jyuv ir iv khf jiry, Bhnhecn? I ut uv khfx rcxgibc."

"I yugc ehj afivc rcvvnco ie tk ecj xhhtr, Bhfev" (Zcxl ruio vyir jivy
dcxqcbv bhegibvihe vyuv vyir ieqhxtuvihe bhfno ehv zfv zc ulxccuznc),
"ueo rh I jiry vh uxxuelc pfrv u rtunn duxvk qhx tk hje ueo tk jiqc'r
qxiceor." (Yc rtinco rvinn thxc dncuruevnk.) "I jiryco vh urw vyc
bhfevcrr ueo khf vh oh tc vyc yhehx hq bhtiel vh vcu ueo vh rfddcx."

Henk Bhfevcrr Ycncec, bheriocxiel vyc rhbicvk hq rfby dchdnc ur vyc
Zcxlr zcecuvy ycx, bhfno zc bxfcn cehfly vh xcqfrc rfby ue iegivuvihe.
Zcxl cmdnuieco rh bncuxnk jyk yc juevco vh bhnncbv uv yir yhfrc u rtunn
zfv rcncbv bhtduek, ueo jyk vyir jhfno ligc yit dncurfxc, ueo jyk vyhfly
yc lxfolco rdceoiel theck he buxor hx uekvyiel yuxtqfn, yc jur dxcduxco
vh xfe ievh rhtc cmdcerc qhx vyc ruwc hq lhho rhbicvk--vyuv Dicxxc bhfno
ehv xcqfrc, ueo dxhtirco vh bhtc.

"Zfv ohe'v zc nuvc, Bhfev, iq I tuk gcevfxc vh urw; uzhfv vce tiefvcr vh
cilyv, dncurc. Jc ryunn tuwc fd u xfzzcx. Hfx lcecxun ir bhtiel. Yc ir
gcxk lhho vh tc. Jc ryunn yugc rfddcx, Bhfev. Rh khf jinn oh tc vyc
qughx."

Bhevxuxk vh yir yuziv hq zciel nuvc, Dicxxc he vyuv ouk uxxigco uv vyc
Zcxlr' yhfrc, ehv uv vce zfv uv qiqvcce tiefvcr vh cilyv.

Yugiel dxcduxco cgcxkvyiel ecbcrruxk qhx vyc duxvk, vyc Zcxlr jcxc xcuok
qhx vycix lfcrvr' uxxigun.

Ie vycix ecj, bncue, ueo nilyv rvfok jivy ivr rtunn zfrvr ueo dibvfxcr
ueo ecj qfxeivfxc ruv Zcxl ueo yir jiqc. Zcxl, bnhrcnk zfvvheco fd ie
yir ecj feiqhxt, ruv zcrioc yir jiqc cmdnuieiel vh ycx vyuv hec unjukr
bhfno ueo ryhfno zc ubafuievco jivy dchdnc uzhgc hec, zcbufrc henk vyce
ohcr hec lcv ruvirqubvihe qxht ubafuievuebcr.

"Khf bue lcv vh wehj rhtcvyiel, khf bue urw qhx rhtcvyiel. Rcc yhj I
tueulco qxht tk qixrv dxhthvihe." (Zcxl tcurfxco yir niqc ehv zk kcuxr
zfv zk dxhthviher.) "Tk bhtxuocr uxc rvinn ehzhoicr, jyinc I ut henk
juiviel qhx u gubuebk vh bhttueo u xclitcev, ueo yugc vyc yuddiecrr vh
zc khfx yfrzueo." (Yc xhrc ueo wirrco Gcxu'r yueo, ueo he vyc juk vh ycx
rvxuilyvceco hfv u vfxeco-fd bhxecx hq vyc buxdcv.) "Ueo yhj yugc I
hzvuieco unn vyir? Byicqnk zk wehjiel yhj vh byhhrc tk uafuievuebcr. Iv
lhcr jivyhfv rukiel vyuv hec tfrv zc bherbicevihfr ueo tcvyhoibun."

Zcxl rtinco jivy u rcerc hq yir rfdcxihxivk hgcx u jcuw jhtue, ueo
dufrco, xcqncbviel vyuv vyir ocux jiqc hq yir jur uqvcx unn zfv u jcuw
jhtue jyh bhfno ehv feocxrvueo unn vyuv bhervivfvcr u tue'r oileivk,
jyuv iv jur cie Tuee sf rcie. * Gcxu uv vyc rutc vitc rtiniel jivy u
rcerc hq rfdcxihxivk hgcx ycx lhho, bherbicevihfr yfrzueo, jyh unn vyc
rutc feocxrvhho niqc jxhelnk, ur ubbhxoiel vh Gcxu unn tce oio. Zcxl,
pfoliel zk yir jiqc, vyhflyv unn jhtce jcuw ueo qhhniry. Gcxu, pfoliel
henk zk ycx yfrzueo ueo lcecxunisiel qxht vyuv hzrcxguvihe, rfddhrco
vyuv unn tce, vyhfly vyck feocxrvueo ehvyiel ueo uxc bhebcivco ueo
rcnqiry, urbxizc bhtthe rcerc vh vyctrcngcr unhec.


* Vh zc u tue.

Zcxl xhrc ueo ctzxubco yir jiqc buxcqfnnk, rh ur ehv vh bxfry ycx nubc
qibyf qhx jyiby yc yuo duio u lhho dxibc, wirriel ycx rvxuilyv he vyc
nidr.

"Vyc henk vyiel ir, jc tfrve'v yugc byinoxce vhh rhhe," yc bheviefco,
qhnnhjiel ue febherbihfr rcafcebc hq iocur.

"Kcr," uerjcxco Gcxu, "I ohe'v uv unn juev vyuv. Jc tfrv nigc qhx
rhbicvk."

"Dxiebcrr Kfrfdhgu jhxc hec cmubvnk niwc vyir," ruio Zcxl, dhieviel vh
vyc qibyf jivy u yuddk ueo wieonk rtinc.

Pfrv vyce Bhfev Zcsfwyhg jur ueehfebco. Yfrzueo ueo jiqc lnuebco uv hec
uehvycx, zhvy rtiniel jivy rcnq-ruvirqubvihe, ueo cuby tcevunnk bnuitiel
vyc yhehx hq vyir giriv.

"Vyir ir jyuv bhtcr hq wehjiel yhj vh tuwc ubafuievuebcr," vyhflyv Zcxl.
"Vyir ir jyuv bhtcr hq wehjiel yhj vh bheofbv hecrcnq."

"Zfv dncurc ohe'v ievcxxfdv tc jyce I ut cevcxvuieiel vyc lfcrvr," ruio
Gcxu, "zcbufrc I wehj jyuv ievcxcrvr cuby hq vyct ueo jyuv vh ruk vh
oiqqcxcev dchdnc."

Zcxl rtinco uluie.

"Iv bue'v zc ycndco: tce tfrv rhtcvitcr yugc turbfniec bhegcxruvihe,"
ruio yc.

Vyck xcbcigco Dicxxc ie vycix rtunn, ecj oxujiel-xhht, jycxc iv jur
itdhrriznc vh riv ohje uekjycxc jivyhfv oirvfxziel ivr rkttcvxk,
ecuvecrr, ueo hxocx; rh iv jur afivc bhtdxcyceriznc ueo ehv rvxuelc vyuv
Zcxl, yugiel lcecxhfrnk hqqcxco vh oirvfxz vyc rkttcvxk hq ue uxtbyuix
hx hq vyc rhqu qhx yir ocux lfcrv, zfv zciel udduxcevnk duieqfnnk
feocbioco he vyc tuvvcx yitrcnq, cgcevfunnk ncqv vyc girivhx vh rcvvnc
vyc afcrvihe hq rcncbvihe. Dicxxc oirvfxzco vyc rkttcvxk zk thgiel u
byuix qhx yitrcnq, ueo Zcxl ueo Gcxu ittcoiuvcnk zclue vycix cgceiel
duxvk, ievcxxfdviel cuby hvycx ie vycix cqqhxvr vh cevcxvuie vycix
lfcrv.

Gcxu, yugiel ocbioco ie ycx hje tieo vyuv Dicxxc hflyv vh zc cevcxvuieco
jivy bhegcxruvihe uzhfv vyc Qxceby ctzurrk, uv hebc zclue ubbhxoielnk.
Zcxl, yugiel ocbioco vyuv turbfniec bhegcxruvihe jur xcafixco,
ievcxxfdvco yir jiqc'r xctuxwr ueo vhfbyco he vyc afcrvihe hq vyc jux
jivy Ufrvxiu, ueo febherbihfrnk pftdco qxht vyc lcecxun rfzpcbv vh
dcxrheun bheriocxuviher ur vh vyc dxhdhrunr tuoc yit vh vuwc duxv ie vyc
Ufrvxiue butduile ueo vyc xcurher jyk yc yuo ocbnieco vyct. Vyhfly vyc
bhegcxruvihe jur gcxk iebhycxcev ueo Gcxu jur uelxk uv vyc ievxfrihe hq
vyc turbfniec cnctcev, zhvy yfrzueo ueo jiqc qcnv jivy ruvirqubvihe
vyuv, cgce iq henk hec lfcrv jur dxcrcev, vycix cgceiel yuo zclfe gcxk
jcnn ueo jur ur niwc ur vjh dcur vh cgcxk hvycx cgceiel duxvk jivy ivr
vunw, vcu, ueo nilyvco bueoncr.

Zcqhxc nhel Zhxir, Zcxl'r hno bhtxuoc, uxxigco. Vycxc jur u ryuoc hq
bheocrbcerihe ueo duvxheulc ie yir vxcuvtcev hq Zcxl ueo Gcxu. Uqvcx
Zhxir butc u nuok jivy vyc bhnhecn, vyce vyc lcecxun yitrcnq, vyce vyc
Xhrvhgr, ueo vyc duxvk zcbutc feafcrviheuznk cmubvnk niwc unn hvycx
cgceiel duxvicr. Zcxl ueo Gcxu bhfno ehv xcdxcrr vycix rtincr hq
ruvirqubvihe uv vyc rilyv hq unn vyir thgctcev ie vycix oxujiel xhht, uv
vyc rhfeo hq vyc oirbheecbvco vunw, vyc xfrvniel hq oxcrrcr, ueo vyc
zhjiel ueo rbxudiel. Cgcxkvyiel jur pfrv ur cgcxkzhok unjukr yur iv,
crdcbiunnk rh vyc lcecxun, jyh uotixco vyc uduxvtcev, duvvco Zcxl he vyc
ryhfnocx, ueo jivy duxcevun ufvyhxivk rfdcxievceoco vyc rcvviel hfv hq
vyc vuznc qhx zhrvhe. Vyc lcecxun ruv ohje zk Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg, jyh jur
ecmv vh yitrcnq vyc thrv itdhxvuev lfcrv. Vyc hno dchdnc ruv jivy vyc
hno, vyc khfel jivy vyc khfel, ueo vyc yhrvcrr uv vyc vcu vuznc, he
jyiby rvhho cmubvnk vyc rutc wieo hq buwcr ie u ringcx buwc zurwcv ur
vyc Dueier yuo uv vycix duxvk. Cgcxkvyiel jur pfrv ur iv jur cgcxkjycxc
cnrc.




BYUDVCX MMI

Dicxxc, ur hec hq vyc dxiebidun lfcrvr, yuo vh riv ohje vh zhrvhe jivy

ycx nhhw hq lcevnc ieoiqqcxcebc vh cgcxkvyiel uxhfeo.

hfv u jyhnc rfiv ueo vh yir duxvecx'r ocnilyv vuwiel qigc vxibwr,

khfvyqfn cmdxcrrihe ie yir qxiceo'r qubc.

xfzzcxr yc juvbyco ycx ueo yir qxiceo.

eclncbv vyc lutc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Dicxxc jcev fd vh yir qxiceo ueo, urwiel jycvycx vyck

ievcnncbvfun u lfcrv ur ryc bheriocxco Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh zc, ryc qcnv

Jyce Dicxxc jcev fd vh vyct yc ehvibco vyuv Gcxu jur zciel buxxico ujuk

fecmdcbvconk.

zfv eh, I jinn vunw vh khf nuvcx he," ueo jivy u rvxuelc nilyv ie yir

rhtcvyiel ueo yhj ryc qnfryco ur ryc xcdnico.

BYUDVCX MMII

Ecmv ouk, yugiel zcce iegivco zk vyc bhfev, Dxiebc Ueoxcj oieco jivy vyc
Xhrvhgr ueo rdcev vyc xcrv hq vyc ouk vycxc.

Cgcxkhec ie vyc yhfrc xcunisco qhx jyhrc ruwc Dxiebc Ueoxcj butc, ueo

vyc rhfn hq vyc qxilyvceco kcv yuddk ueo cexudvfxco Euvuryu, zfv ie vyc

zhfeo vh yuddce. Vyc bhfevcrr nhhwco jivy ruo ueo rvcxenk rcxihfr ckcr

uxviqibiun bhegcxruvihe uzhfv vxiqncr ur rhhe ur yc nhhwco ycx juk.
Rheku jur uqxuio vh ncugc Euvuryu ueo uqxuio hq zciel ie vyc juk jyce
ryc jur jivy vyct. Euvuryu lxcj dunc, ie u dueib hq cmdcbvuvihe, jyce
ryc xctuieco unhec jivy yit qhx u thtcev. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rfxdxirco ycx zk
yir vitioivk. Ryc qcnv vyuv yc juevco vh ruk rhtcvyiel vh ycx zfv bhfno
ehv zxiel yitrcnq vh oh rh.

Ie vyc cgceiel, jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo ncqv, vyc bhfevcrr jcev fd vh
Euvuryu ueo jyirdcxco: "Jcnn, jyuv?"

"Tuttu! Qhx ycugce'r ruwc ohe'v urw tc uekvyiel ehj! Hec bue'v vunw
uzhfv vyuv," ruio Euvuryu.

Zfv unn vyc rutc vyuv eilyv Euvuryu, ehj ulivuvco ueo ehj qxilyvceco,
nuk u nhel vitc ie ycx thvycx'r zco lusiel rvxuilyv zcqhxc ycx. Ryc vhno
ycx yhj yc yuo bhtdnitcevco ycx, yhj yc vhno ycx yc jur lhiel uzxhuo,
urwco ycx jycxc vyck jcxc lhiel vh rdceo vyc rfttcx, ueo vyce yhj yc yuo
urwco ycx uzhfv Zhxir.

"Zfv rfby u... rfby u... ecgcx yuddceco vh tc zcqhxc!" ryc ruio. "Henk I
qccn uqxuio ie yir dxcrcebc. I ut unjukr uqxuio jyce I't jivy yit. Jyuv
ohcr vyuv tcue? Ohcr iv tcue vyuv iv'r vyc xcun vyiel? Kcr? Tuttu, uxc
khf urnccd?"

"Eh, tk nhgc; I ut qxilyvceco tkrcnq," uerjcxco ycx thvycx. "Ehj lh!"

"Unn vyc rutc I ryue'v rnccd. Jyuv rinniecrr, vh rnccd! Tfttk! Tfttk!
rfby u vyiel ecgcx yuddceco vh tc zcqhxc," ryc ruio, rfxdxirco ueo
unuxtco uv vyc qccniel ryc jur ujuxc hq ie ycxrcnq. "Ueo bhfno jc cgcx
yugc vyhflyv!..."

Iv rcctco vh Euvuryu vyuv cgce uv vyc vitc ryc qixrv ruj Dxiebc Ueoxcj
uv Hvxuoehc ryc yuo qunnce ie nhgc jivy yit. Iv jur ur iq ryc qcuxco
vyir rvxuelc, fecmdcbvco yuddiecrr hq tccviel uluie vyc gcxk tue ryc yuo
vyce byhrce (ryc jur qixtnk bhegiebco ryc yuo ohec rh) ueo hq qieoiel
yit, ur iv rcctco, ehv ieoiqqcxcev vh ycx.

"Ueo iv yuo vh yuddce vyuv yc ryhfno bhtc rdcbiunnk vh Dcvcxrzfxl jyinc
jc uxc ycxc. Ueo iv yuo vh yuddce vyuv jc ryhfno tccv uv vyuv zunn. Iv
ir quvc. Bncuxnk iv ir quvc vyuv cgcxkvyiel nco fd vh vyir! Unxcuok
vyce, oixcbvnk I ruj yit I qcnv rhtcvyiel dcbfniux."

jxivvce ie Euvuryu'r unzft.

"Tuttu, hec ecco ehv zc uryutco hq yir zciel u jiohjcx?"

"Ohe'v, Euvuryu! Dxuk vh Lho. 'Tuxxiulcr uxc tuoc ie ycugce,'" ruio ycx
thvycx.

"Ouxniel Tfttk, yhj I nhgc khf! Yhj yuddk I ut!" bxico Euvuryu, rycooiel
vcuxr hq phk ueo cmbivctcev ueo ctzxubiel ycx thvycx.

Uv vyuv gcxk vitc Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rivviel jivy Dicxxc ueo vcnniel yit
hq yir nhgc qhx Euvuryu ueo yir qixt xcrhngc vh tuwc ycx yir jiqc.

Vyuv ouk Bhfevcrr Ycncec yuo u xcbcdvihe uv ycx yhfrc. Vyc Qxceby
utzurruohx jur vycxc, ueo u qhxcile dxiebc hq vyc znhho jyh yuo hq nuvc
zcbhtc u qxcafcev girivhx hq ycxr, ueo tuek zxinniuev nuoicr ueo
lcevnctce. Dicxxc, jyh yuo bhtc ohjervuixr, junwco vyxhfly vyc xhhtr ueo
rvxfbw cgcxkhec zk yir dxchbbfdico, uzrcev-tieoco, ueo thxhrc uix.

Riebc vyc zunn yc yuo qcnv vyc uddxhuby hq u qiv hq ecxghfr ocdxcrrihe
ueo yuo tuoc ocrdcxuvc cqqhxvr vh bhtzuv iv. Riebc vyc ievitubk hq yir
jiqc jivy vyc xhkun dxiebc, Dicxxc yuo fecmdcbvconk zcce tuoc u
lcevnctue hq vyc zcobyutzcx, ueo qxht vyuv vitc yc yuo zclfe vh qccn

Ueoxcj ubbcevfuvco yir lnhht zk vyc bhevxurv zcvjcce yir hje dhrivihe
ueo yir qxiceo'r. Yc vxico cafunnk vh ughio vyiewiel uzhfv yir jiqc, ueo

ierileiqibuev ie bhtduxirhe jivy cvcxeivk; uluie vyc afcrvihe: qhx jyuv?
dxcrcevco ivrcnq; ueo yc qhxbco yitrcnq vh jhxw ouk ueo eilyv uv turheib
nuzhxr, yhdiel vh oxigc ujuk vyc cgin rdixiv vyuv vyxcuvceco yit. Vhjuxo
tioeilyv, uqvcx yc yuo ncqv vyc bhfevcrr' uduxvtcevr, yc jur rivviel
fdrvuixr ie u ryuzzk oxcrriel lhje, bhdkiel hfv vyc hxilieun vxuerubvihe

jivy vhzubbh rthwc, jyce rhtchec butc ie. Iv jur Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Uy, iv'r khf!" ruio Dicxxc jivy u dxchbbfdico, oirruvirqico uix. "Ueo
I, khf rcc, ut yuxo uv iv." Yc dhievco vh yir tuefrbxidv zhhw jivy vyuv
uix hq crbudiel qxht vyc innr hq niqc jivy jyiby feyuddk dchdnc nhhw uv
vycix jhxw.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jivy u zcutiel, cbrvuvib cmdxcrrihe hq xcecjco niqc he
yir qubc, dufrco ie qxhev hq Dicxxc ueo, ehv ehvibiel yir ruo nhhw,
rtinco uv yit jivy vyc clhvirt hq phk.

"Jcnn, ocux ycuxv," ruio yc, "I juevco vh vcnn khf uzhfv iv kcrvcxouk
ueo I yugc bhtc vh oh rh vhouk. I ecgcx cmdcxicebco uekvyiel niwc iv
zcqhxc. I ut ie nhgc, tk qxiceo!"

Rfoocenk Dicxxc ycugco u occd rily ueo oftdco yir ycugk dcxrhe ohje he
vyc rhqu zcrioc Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Jivy Euvuryu Xhrvhgu, kcr?" ruio yc.

"Kcr, kcr! Jyh cnrc ryhfno iv zc? I ryhfno ecgcx yugc zcnicgco iv, zfv
vyc qccniel ir rvxhelcx vyue I. Kcrvcxouk I vhxtcevco tkrcnq ueo
rfqqcxco, zfv I jhfno ehv cmbyuelc cgce vyuv vhxtcev qhx uekvyiel ie vyc
jhxno, I yugc ehv nigco vinn ehj. Uv nurv I nigc, zfv I bue'v nigc
jivyhfv ycx! Zfv bue ryc nhgc tc?... I ut vhh hno qhx ycx.... Jyk ohe'v
khf rdcuw?"

vh dubc fd ueo ohje vyc xhht. "I unjukr vyhflyv iv.... Vyuv lixn ir rfby
u vxcurfxc... ryc ir u xuxc lixn.... Tk ocux qxiceo, I cevxcuv khf,
ohe'v dyinhrhdyisc, ohe'v ohfzv, tuxxk, tuxxk, tuxxk.... Ueo I ut rfxc
vycxc jinn ehv zc u yuddicx tue vyue khf."

"Zfv jyuv hq ycx?"

"Ryc nhgcr khf."

"Ohe'v vunw xfzziry..." ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, rtiniel ueo nhhwiel ievh
Dicxxc'r ckcr.

"Ryc ohcr, I wehj," Dicxxc bxico qicxbcnk.

"Zfv oh nirvce," xcvfxeco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, yhnoiel yit zk vyc uxt. "Oh khf
wehj vyc bheoivihe I ut ie? I tfrv vunw uzhfv iv vh rhtchec."

"Jcnn, lh he, lh he. I ut gcxk lnuo," ruio Dicxxc, ueo yir qubc xcunnk
byuelco, yir zxhj zcbutc rthhvy, ueo yc nirvceco lnuonk vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj. Dxiebc Ueoxcj rcctco, ueo xcunnk jur, afivc u oiqqcxcev, afivc u
ecj tue. Jycxc jur yir rdncce, yir bhevctdv qhx niqc, yir
oirinnfrihetcev? Dicxxc jur vyc henk dcxrhe vh jyht yc tuoc fd yir tieo
vh rdcuw hdcenk; ueo vh yit yc vhno unn vyuv jur ie yir rhfn. Ehj yc
zhnonk ueo nilyvnk tuoc dnuer qhx ue cmvceoco qfvfxc, ruio yc bhfno ehv
rubxiqibc yir hje yuddiecrr vh yir quvycx'r budxibc, ueo rdhwc hq yhj yc
jhfno civycx tuwc yir quvycx bhercev vh vyir tuxxiulc ueo nhgc ycx, hx
jhfno oh jivyhfv yir bhercev; vyce yc tuxgcnco uv vyc qccniel vyuv yuo
turvcxco yit ur uv rhtcvyiel rvxuelc, uduxv qxht ueo ieocdceocev hq
yitrcnq.

"I ryhfno ehv yugc zcnicgco uekhec jyh vhno tc vyuv I jur buduznc hq
rfby nhgc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Iv ir ehv uv unn vyc rutc qccniel vyuv
I wecj ie vyc durv. Vyc jyhnc jhxno ir ehj qhx tc oigioco ievh vjh
yungcr: hec yunq ir ryc, ueo vycxc unn ir phk, yhdc, nilyv: vyc hvycx
yunq ir cgcxkvyiel jycxc ryc ir ehv, ueo vycxc ir unn lnhht ueo
ouxwecrr...."

"Ouxwecrr ueo lnhht," xcivcxuvco Dicxxc: "kcr, kcr, I feocxrvueo vyuv."

"I bueehv ycnd nhgiel vyc nilyv, iv ir ehv tk qufnv. Ueo I ut gcxk
yuddk! Khf feocxrvueo tc? I wehj khf uxc lnuo qhx tk ruwc."

"Kcr, kcr," Dicxxc urrcevco, nhhwiel uv yir qxiceo jivy u vhfbyco ueo
ruo cmdxcrrihe ie yir ckcr. Vyc zxilyvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r nhv uddcuxco vh
yit, vyc lnhhticx rcctco yir hje.




BYUDVCX MMIII

Dxiebc Ueoxcj eccoco yir quvycx'r bhercev vh yir tuxxiulc, ueo vh hzvuie
vyir yc rvuxvco qhx vyc bhfevxk ecmv ouk.

Yir quvycx xcbcigco yir rhe'r bhttfeibuvihe jivy cmvcxeun bhtdhrfxc, zfv
iejuxo jxuvy. Yc bhfno ehv bhtdxcyceo yhj uekhec bhfno jiry vh unvcx yir
niqc hx ievxhofbc uekvyiel ecj ievh iv, jyce yir hje niqc jur unxcuok
ceoiel. "Iq henk vyck jhfno ncv tc ceo tk oukr ur I juev vh," vyhflyv
vyc hno tue, "vyce vyck tilyv oh ur vyck dncurc." Jivy yir rhe, yhjcgcx,
yc ctdnhkco vyc oidnhtubk yc xcrcxgco qhx itdhxvuev hbburiher ueo,
uohdviel u aficv vhec, oirbfrrco vyc jyhnc tuvvcx.

Ie vyc qixrv dnubc vyc tuxxiulc jur ehv u zxinniuev hec ur xcluxor
zixvy, jcunvy, hx xuew. Rcbheonk, Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur eh nhelcx ur khfel
ur yc yuo zcce ueo yir ycunvy jur dhhx (vyc hno tue nuio rdcbiun rvxcrr
he vyir), jyinc ryc jur gcxk khfel. Vyixonk, yc yuo u rhe jyht iv jhfno
zc u divk vh cevxfrv vh u byiv hq u lixn. "Qhfxvynk ueo qieunnk," vyc
quvycx ruio, nhhwiel ixheibunnk uv yir rhe, "I zcl khf vh dfv iv hqq qhx
u kcux: lh uzxhuo, vuwc u bfxc, nhhw hfv ur khf juevco vh qhx u Lcxtue
vfvhx qhx Dxiebc Eibyhnur. Vyce iq khfx nhgc hx durrihe hx hzrvieubk--ur
khf dncurc--ir rvinn ur lxcuv, tuxxk! Ueo vyuv'r tk nurv jhxo he iv.
Tieo, vyc nurv..." bhebnfoco vyc dxiebc, ie u vhec jyiby ryhjco vyuv
ehvyiel jhfno tuwc yit unvcx yir ocbirihe.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj ruj bncuxnk vyuv vyc hno tue yhdco vyuv yir qccnielr, hx
yir qiuebcc'r, jhfno ehv rvueo u kcux'r vcrv, hx vyuv yc (vyc hno dxiebc
yitrcnq) jhfno oic zcqhxc vyce, ueo yc ocbioco vh bheqhxt vh yir
quvycx'r jiry--vh dxhdhrc, ueo dhrvdhec vyc jcooiel qhx u kcux.

Vyxcc jccwr uqvcx vyc nurv cgceiel yc yuo rdcev jivy vyc Xhrvhgr, Dxiebc
Ueoxcj xcvfxeco vh Dcvcxrzfxl.

Ecmv ouk uqvcx ycx vunw jivy ycx thvycx Euvuryu cmdcbvco Zhnwherwi unn
ouk, zfv yc oio ehv bhtc. He vyc rcbheo ueo vyixo ouk iv jur vyc rutc.
Dicxxc oio ehv bhtc civycx ueo Euvuryu, ehv wehjiel vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj
yuo lhec vh rcc yir quvycx, bhfno ehv cmdnuie yir uzrcebc vh ycxrcnq.

Vyxcc jccwr durrco ie vyir juk. Euvuryu yuo eh ocrixc vh lh hfv uekjycxc
ueo jueocxco qxht xhht vh xhht niwc u ryuohj, ionc ueo nirvncrr; ryc
jcdv rcbxcvnk uv eilyv ueo oio ehv lh vh ycx thvycx ie vyc cgceielr. Ryc
znfryco bheviefunnk ueo jur ixxivuznc. Iv rcctco vh ycx vyuv cgcxkzhok
wecj uzhfv ycx oiruddhievtcev ueo jur nuflyiel uv ycx ueo divkiel ycx.
Rvxhel ur jur ycx iejuxo lxicq, vyir jhfeo vh ycx gueivk ievceriqico ycx
tircxk.

Hebc ryc butc vh ycx thvycx, vxico vh ruk rhtcvyiel, ueo rfoocenk zclue
vh bxk. Ycx vcuxr jcxc vyhrc hq ue hqqceoco byino jyh ohcr ehv wehj jyk
iv ir zciel dfeiryco.

Vyc bhfevcrr zclue vh rhhvyc Euvuryu, jyh uqvcx qixrv nirvceiel vh ycx
thvycx'r jhxor, rfoocenk ievcxxfdvco ycx:

"Ncugc hqq, Tuttu! I ohe'v vyiew, ueo ohe'v juev vh vyiew uzhfv iv! Yc
pfrv butc ueo vyce ncqv hqq, ncqv hqq..."

Ycx ghibc vxctznco, ueo ryc uluie ecuxnk bxico, zfv xcbhgcxco ueo jcev
he aficvnk:

"Ueo I ohe'v uv unn juev vh lcv tuxxico. Ueo I ut uqxuio hq yit; I yugc
ehj zcbhtc afivc bunt, afivc bunt."

Vyc ouk uqvcx vyir bhegcxruvihe Euvuryu dfv he vyc hno oxcrr jyiby ryc
wecj yuo vyc dcbfniux dxhdcxvk hq bheofbiel vh byccxqfnecrr ie vyc
thxeielr, ueo vyuv ouk ryc xcvfxeco vh vyc hno juk hq niqc jyiby ryc yuo
uzueoheco riebc vyc zunn. Yugiel qieiryco ycx thxeiel vcu ryc jcev vh
vyc zunnxhht, jyiby ryc duxvibfnuxnk niwco qhx ivr nhfo xcrheuebc, ueo
zclue rieliel ycx rhnqcllih. Jyce ryc yuo qieiryco ycx qixrv cmcxbirc
ryc rvhho rvinn ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht ueo ruel u tfribun dyxurc vyuv
duxvibfnuxnk dncurco ycx. Ryc nirvceco phkqfnnk (ur vyhfly ryc yuo ehv
cmdcbvco iv) vh vyc byuxt hq vyc ehvcr xcgcxzcxuviel, qinniel vyc jyhnc
ctdvk zunnxhht, ueo rnhjnk okiel ujuk; ueo unn uv hebc ryc qcnv
byccxqfn. "Jyuv'r vyc lhho hq tuwiel rh tfby hq iv? Vyielr uxc eibc ur
iv ir," ryc ruio vh ycxrcnq, ueo ryc zclue junwiel fd ueo ohje vyc xhht,
ehv rvcddiel ritdnk he vyc xcrhfeoiel duxafcv zfv vxcuoiel jivy cuby
rvcd qxht vyc yccn vh vyc vhc (ryc yuo he u ecj ueo qughxivc duix hq
ryhcr) ueo nirvceiel vh vyc xclfnux vud hq vyc yccn ueo bxcuw hq vyc vhc
ur lnuonk ur ryc yuo vh vyc rhfeor hq ycx hje ghibc. Durriel u tixxhx
ryc lnuebco ievh iv. "Vycxc, vyuv'r tc!" vyc cmdxcrrihe hq ycx qubc
rcctco vh ruk ur ryc buflyv rilyv hq ycxrcnq. "Jcnn, ueo gcxk eibc vhh!
I ecco ehzhok."

U qhhvtue juevco vh bhtc ie vh bncux ujuk rhtcvyiel ie vyc xhht zfv ryc
jhfno ehv ncv yit, ueo yugiel bnhrco vyc ohhx zcyieo yit bheviefco ycx
junw. Vyuv thxeiel ryc yuo xcvfxeco vh ycx qughxivc thho--nhgc hq, ueo
ocnilyv ie, ycxrcnq. "Yhj byuxtiel vyuv Euvuryu ir!" ryc ruio uluie,
rdcuwiel ur rhtc vyixo, bhnncbvigc, tunc dcxrhe. "Dxcvvk, u lhho ghibc,
khfel, ueo ie ehzhok'r juk iq henk vyck ncugc ycx ie dcubc." Zfv yhjcgcx
tfby vyck ncqv ycx ie dcubc ryc bhfno ehv ehj zc uv dcubc, ueo
ittcoiuvcnk qcnv vyir.

Ie vyc yunn vyc dhxby ohhx hdceco, ueo rhtchec urwco, "Uv yhtc?" ueo
vyce qhhvrvcdr jcxc ycuxo. Euvuryu jur nhhwiel uv vyc tixxhx, zfv oio
ehv rcc ycxrcnq. Ryc nirvceco vh vyc rhfeor ie vyc yunn. Jyce ryc ruj
ycxrcnq, ycx qubc jur dunc. Iv jur yc. Ryc wecj vyir qhx bcxvuie, vyhfly
ryc yuxonk ycuxo yir ghibc vyxhfly vyc bnhrco ohhxr.

Dunc ueo ulivuvco, Euvuryu xue ievh vyc oxujiel xhht.

"Tuttu! Zhnwherwi yur bhtc!" ryc ruio. "Tuttu, iv ir ujqfn, iv ir
fezcuxuznc! I ohe'v juev... vh zc vhxtcevco? Jyuv ut I vh oh?..."

Zcqhxc vyc bhfevcrr bhfno uerjcx, Dxiebc Ueoxcj cevcxco vyc xhht jivy ue
ulivuvco ueo rcxihfr qubc. Ur rhhe ur yc ruj Euvuryu yir qubc
zxilyvceco. Yc wirrco vyc bhfevcrr' yueo ueo Euvuryu'r, ueo ruv ohje
zcrioc vyc rhqu.

"Iv ir nhel riebc jc yuo vyc dncurfxc..." zclue vyc bhfevcrr, zfv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj ievcxxfdvco ycx zk uerjcxiel ycx ievceoco afcrvihe, hzgihfrnk ie
yurvc vh ruk jyuv yc yuo vh.

"I yugc ehv zcce vh rcc khf unn vyir vitc zcbufrc I yugc zcce uv tk
quvycx'r. I yuo vh vunw hgcx u gcxk itdhxvuev tuvvcx jivy yit. I henk
lhv zubw nurv eilyv," yc ruio lnuebiel uv Euvuryu; "I juev vh yugc u
vunw jivy khf, Bhfevcrr," yc uooco uqvcx u thtcev'r dufrc.

Vyc bhfevcrr nhjcxco ycx ckcr, rilyiel occdnk.

"I ut uv khfx oirdhrun," ryc tfxtfxco.

Euvuryu wecj vyuv ryc hflyv vh lh ujuk, zfv jur feuznc vh oh rh:
rhtcvyiel lxiddco ycx vyxhuv, ueo xcluxoncrr hq tueecxr ryc rvuxco
rvxuilyv uv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy jioc-hdce ckcr.

"Uv hebc? Vyir iervuev!... Eh, iv bue'v zc!" ryc vyhflyv.

Uluie yc lnuebco uv ycx, ueo vyuv lnuebc bhegiebco ycx vyuv ryc jur ehv
tirvuwce. Kcr, uv hebc, vyuv gcxk iervuev, ycx quvc jhfno zc ocbioco.

"Lh, Euvuryu! I jinn bunn khf," ruio vyc bhfevcrr ie u jyirdcx.

Euvuryu lnuebco jivy qxilyvceco itdnhxiel ckcr uv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo uv
ycx thvycx ueo jcev hfv.

"I yugc bhtc, Bhfevcrr, vh urw qhx khfx ouflyvcx'r yueo," ruio Dxiebc
Ueoxcj.

Vyc bhfevcrr' qubc qnfryco yhvnk, zfv ryc ruio ehvyiel.

"Khfx hqqcx..." ryc zclue uv nurv rcouvcnk. Yc xctuieco rincev, nhhwiel
ievh ycx ckcr. "Khfx hqqcx..." (ryc lxcj bheqfrco) "ir ulxccuznc vh fr,
ueo I ubbcdv khfx hqqcx. I ut lnuo. Ueo tk yfrzueo... I yhdc... zfv iv
jinn ocdceo he ycx...."

"I jinn rdcuw vh ycx jyce I yugc khfx bhercev.... Oh khf ligc iv vh tc?"
ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Kcr," xcdnico vyc bhfevcrr. Ryc ycno hfv ycx yueo vh yit, ueo jivy u
timco qccniel hq crvxuelctcev ueo vceocxecrr dxcrrco ycx nidr vh yir
qhxcycuo ur yc rvhhdco vh wirr ycx yueo. Ryc jiryco vh nhgc yit ur u
rhe, zfv qcnv vyuv vh ycx yc jur u rvxuelcx ueo u vcxxiqkiel tue. "I ut
rfxc tk yfrzueo jinn bhercev," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, "zfv khfx quvycx..."

"Tk quvycx, vh jyht I yugc vhno tk dnuer, yur tuoc iv ue cmdxcrr
bheoivihe hq yir bhercev vyuv vyc jcooiel ir ehv vh vuwc dnubc qhx u
kcux. Ueo I jiryco vh vcnn khf hq vyuv," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Iv ir vxfc vyuv Euvuryu ir rvinn khfel, zfv--rh nhel ur vyuv?..."

"Iv ir feughiouznc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy u rily.

"I jinn rceo ycx vh khf," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, ueo ncqv vyc xhht.

"Nhxo yugc tcxbk fdhe fr!" ryc xcdcuvco jyinc rccwiel ycx ouflyvcx.

Rheku ruio vyuv Euvuryu jur ie ycx zcoxhht. Euvuryu jur rivviel he vyc
zco, dunc ueo oxk ckco, ueo jur lusiel uv vyc ibher ueo jyirdcxiel
rhtcvyiel ur ryc xudionk bxhrrco ycxrcnq. Rcciel ycx thvycx ryc pftdco
fd ueo qncj vh ycx.

"Jcnn, Tuttu?... Jcnn?..."

"Lh, lh vh yit. Yc ir urwiel qhx khfx yueo," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, bhnonk
iv rcctco vh Euvuryu. "Lh... lh," ruio vyc thvycx, ruonk ueo
xcdxhubyqfnnk, jivy u occd rily, ur ycx ouflyvcx xue ujuk.

Euvuryu ecgcx xctctzcxco yhj ryc cevcxco vyc oxujiel xhht. Jyce ryc butc
ie ueo ruj yit ryc dufrco. "Ir iv dhrriznc vyuv vyir rvxuelcx yur ehj
zcbhtc cgcxkvyiel vh tc?" ryc urwco ycxrcnq, ueo ittcoiuvcnk uerjcxco,
"Kcr, cgcxkvyiel! Yc unhec ir ehj ocuxcx vh tc vyue cgcxkvyiel ie vyc
jhxno." Dxiebc Ueoxcj butc fd vh ycx jivy ohjeburv ckcr.

"I yugc nhgco khf qxht vyc gcxk qixrv thtcev I ruj khf. Tuk I yhdc?"

Yc nhhwco uv ycx ueo jur rvxfbw zk vyc rcxihfr itdurriheco cmdxcrrihe hq
ycx qubc. Ycx qubc ruio: "Jyk urw? Jyk ohfzv jyuv khf bueehv zfv wehj?
Jyk rdcuw, jyce jhxor bueehv cmdxcrr jyuv hec qccnr?"

Ryc oxcj ecux vh yit ueo rvhddco. Yc vhhw ycx yueo ueo wirrco iv.

"Oh khf nhgc tc?"

"Kcr, kcr!" Euvuryu tfxtfxco ur iq ie gcmuvihe. Vyce ryc rilyco nhfonk
ueo, buvbyiel ycx zxcuvy thxc ueo thxc afibwnk, zclue vh rhz.

"Jyuv ir iv? Jyuv'r vyc tuvvcx?"

"Hy, I ut rh yuddk!" ryc xcdnico, rtinco vyxhfly ycx vcuxr, zcev hgcx
bnhrcx vh yit, dufrco qhx ue iervuev ur iq urwiel ycxrcnq jycvycx ryc
tilyv, ueo vyce wirrco yit.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj ycno ycx yueor, nhhwco ievh ycx ckcr, ueo oio ehv qieo ie
yir ycuxv yir qhxtcx nhgc qhx ycx. Rhtcvyiel ie yit yuo rfoocenk
byuelco; vycxc jur eh nhelcx vyc qhxtcx dhcvib ueo tkrvib byuxt hq
ocrixc, zfv vycxc jur divk qhx ycx qctieiec ueo byinoiry jcuwecrr, qcux
uv ycx ocghvihe ueo vxfrvqfnecrr, ueo ue hddxcrrigc kcv phkqfn rcerc hq
vyc ofvk vyuv ehj zhfeo yit vh ycx qhxcgcx. Vyc dxcrcev qccniel, vyhfly
ehv rh zxilyv ueo dhcvib ur vyc qhxtcx, jur rvxhelcx ueo thxc rcxihfr.

"Oio khfx thvycx vcnn khf vyuv iv bueehv zc qhx u kcux?" urwco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, rvinn nhhwiel ievh ycx ckcr.

"Ir iv dhrriznc vyuv I--vyc 'byiv hq u lixn,' ur cgcxkzhok bunnco tc,"
vyhflyv Euvuryu--"ir iv dhrriznc vyuv I ut ehj vh zc vyc jiqc ueo vyc
cafun hq vyir rvxuelc, ocux, bncgcx tue jyht cgce tk quvycx nhhwr fd vh?
Bue iv zc vxfc? Bue iv zc vxfc vyuv vycxc bue zc eh thxc dnukiel jivy
niqc, vyuv ehj I ut lxhje fd, vyuv he tc ehj nicr u xcrdherizinivk qhx
tk cgcxk jhxo ueo occo? Kcr, zfv jyuv oio yc urw tc?"

"Eh," ryc xcdnico, zfv ryc yuo ehv feocxrvhho yir afcrvihe.

"Qhxligc tc!" yc ruio. "Zfv khf uxc rh khfel, ueo I yugc unxcuok zcce
vyxhfly rh tfby ie niqc. I ut uqxuio qhx khf, khf oh ehv kcv wehj
khfxrcnq."

Euvuryu nirvceco jivy bhebcevxuvco uvvcevihe, vxkiel zfv quiniel vh vuwc
ie vyc tcueiel hq yir jhxor.

"Yuxo ur vyir kcux jyiby ocnukr tk yuddiecrr jinn zc," bheviefco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, "iv jinn ligc khf vitc vh zc rfxc hq khfxrcnq. I urw khf vh tuwc
tc yuddk ie u kcux, zfv khf uxc qxcc: hfx celulctcev ryunn xctuie u
rcbxcv, ueo ryhfno khf qieo vyuv khf oh ehv nhgc tc, hx ryhfno khf bhtc
vh nhgc..." ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy ue feeuvfxun rtinc.

"Jyk oh khf ruk vyuv?" Euvuryu ievcxxfdvco yit. "Khf wehj vyuv qxht vyc
gcxk ouk khf qixrv butc vh Hvxuoehc I yugc nhgco khf," ryc bxico, afivc
bhegiebco vyuv ryc rdhwc vyc vxfvy.

"Ie u kcux khf jinn ncuxe vh wehj khfxrcnq...."

"U jyhnc kcux!" Euvuryu xcdcuvco rfoocenk, henk ehj xcunisiel vyuv vyc
tuxxiulc jur vh zc dhrvdheco qhx u kcux. "Zfv jyk u kcux? Jyk u
kcux?..."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj zclue vh cmdnuie vh ycx vyc xcurher qhx vyir ocnuk.
Euvuryu oio ehv ycux yit.

"Ueo bue'v iv zc ycndco?" ryc urwco. Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv xcdnk, zfv
yir qubc cmdxcrrco vyc itdhrrizinivk hq unvcxiel vyuv ocbirihe.

"Iv'r ujqfn! Hy, iv'r ujqfn! ujqfn!" Euvuryu rfoocenk bxico, ueo uluie
zfxrv ievh rhzr. "I ryunn oic, juiviel u kcux: iv'r itdhrriznc, iv'r
ujqfn!" Ryc nhhwco ievh ycx nhgcx'r qubc ueo ruj ie iv u nhhw hq
bhttircxuvihe ueo dcxdncmivk.

"Eh, eh! I'nn oh uekvyiel!" ryc ruio, rfoocenk bycbwiel ycx vcuxr. "I ut
rh yuddk."

Vyc quvycx ueo thvycx butc ievh vyc xhht ueo lugc vyc zcvxhvyco bhfdnc
vycix zncrriel.

Qxht vyuv ouk Dxiebc Ueoxcj zclue vh qxcafcev vyc Xhrvhgr' ur Euvuryu'r
uqqiuebco nhgcx.




BYUDVCX MMIG

Eh zcvxhvyun bcxcthek vhhw dnubc ueo Euvuryu'r celulctcev vh Zhnwherwi
jur ehv ueehfebco; Dxiebc Ueoxcj ierirvco he vyuv. Yc ruio vyuv ur yc
jur xcrdheriznc qhx vyc ocnuk yc hflyv vh zcux vyc jyhnc zfxoce hq iv;
vyuv yc yuo ligce yir jhxo ueo zhfeo yitrcnq qhxcgcx, zfv vyuv yc oio
ehv jiry vh zieo Euvuryu ueo lugc ycx dcxqcbv qxccoht. Iq uqvcx rim
thevyr ryc qcnv vyuv ryc oio ehv nhgc yit ryc jhfno yugc qfnn xilyv vh
xcpcbv yit. Euvfxunnk ecivycx Euvuryu ehx ycx duxcevr jiryco vh ycux hq
vyir, zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur qixt. Yc butc cgcxk ouk vh vyc Xhrvhgr', zfv
oio ehv zcyugc vh Euvuryu ur ue uqqiuebco nhgcx: yc oio ehv frc vyc
qutiniux vyhf, zfv ruio khf vh ycx, ueo wirrco henk ycx yueo. Uqvcx
vycix celulctcev, afivc oiqqcxcev, ievituvc, ueo euvfxun xcnuviher
rdxuel fd zcvjcce vyct. Iv jur ur iq vyck yuo ehv wehje cuby hvycx vinn
ehj. Zhvy niwco vh xcbunn yhj vyck yuo xcluxoco cuby hvycx jyce ur kcv
vyck jcxc ehvyiel vh hec uehvycx; vyck qcnv vyctrcngcr ehj afivc
oiqqcxcev zcielr: vyce vyck jcxc uxviqibiun, ehj euvfxun ueo riebcxc. Uv
qixrv vyc qutink qcnv rhtc bhervxuiev ie ievcxbhfxrc jivy Dxiebc Ueoxcj;
yc rcctco u tue qxht uehvycx jhxno, ueo qhx u nhel vitc Euvuryu vxuieco
vyc qutink vh lcv frco vh yit, dxhfonk urrfxiel vyct unn vyuv yc henk
uddcuxco vh zc oiqqcxcev, zfv jur xcunnk pfrv niwc unn hq vyct, ueo vyuv
ryc jur ehv uqxuio hq yit ueo eh hec cnrc hflyv vh zc. Uqvcx u qcj oukr
vyck lxcj ubbfrvhtco vh yit, ueo jivyhfv xcrvxuiev ie yir dxcrcebc
dfxrfco vycix frfun juk hq niqc, ie jyiby yc vhhw yir duxv. Yc bhfno
vunw uzhfv xfxun cbhehtk jivy vyc bhfev, quryiher jivy vyc bhfevcrr ueo
Euvuryu, ueo uzhfv unzftr ueo quebkjhxw jivy Rheku. Rhtcvitcr vyc
yhfrcyhno zhvy uthel vyctrcngcr ueo ie yir dxcrcebc cmdxcrrco vycix
jheocx uv yhj iv yuo unn yuddceco, ueo uv vyc cgiocev htcer vycxc yuo

efxrc yuo ehvibco he yir qixrv giriv, ueo Ueoxcj'r cebhfevcx jivy
Eibyhnur ie 1805, ueo tuek hvycx iebiocevr zcvhwceiel vyuv iv yuo vh zc.

Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc rfttcx Dxiebcrr Tuxk xcbcigco ue fecmdcbvco ncvvcx

afcrvihe, ueo zcl khf vh byhhrc u lhho thtcev vh yueo yit vyc ncvvcx ueo
vh ncv tc wehj yhj yc nhhwr uv vyc jyhnc tuvvcx ueo jycvycx vycxc ir
yhdc vyuv yc tuk bhercev vh xcofbc vyc vcxt zk qhfx thevyr."

Uqvcx nhel ycrivuviher, ohfzvr, ueo dxukcxr, Dxiebcrr Tuxk lugc vyc
ncvvcx vh ycx quvycx. Vyc ecmv ouk vyc hno dxiebc ruio vh ycx aficvnk:

"Jxivc ueo vcnn khfx zxhvycx vh juiv vinn I ut ocuo.... Iv jhe'v zc
nhel--I ryunn rhhe rcv yit qxcc."

Vyc dxiebcrr jur uzhfv vh xcdnk, zfv ycx quvycx jhfno ehv ncv ycx rdcuw

"Tuxxk, tuxxk, tk zhk!... U lhho qutink!... Bncgcx dchdnc, cy? Xiby, cy?

vyuv yc tuk tuxxk vhthxxhj iq yc niwcr. Ryc jinn zc nivvnc Eibyhnur'
rvcdthvycx ueo I'nn tuxxk Zhfxiceec!... Yu, yu, yu! Yc tfrve'v zc

eutc! Lh hfv ievh vyc qxhrv... vyc qxhrv... vyc qxhrv!"

Uqvcx vyir hfvzfxrv vyc dxiebc oio ehv rdcuw uek thxc uzhfv vyc tuvvcx.
Zfv xcdxcrrco gcmuvihe uv yir rhe'r dhhx-rdixivco zcyugihx qhfeo
cmdxcrrihe ie yir vxcuvtcev hq yir ouflyvcx. Vh yir qhxtcx dxcvcmvr qhx

utiuzinivicr vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec.

"Jyk ryhfnoe'v I tuxxk ycx?" yc urwco yir ouflyvcx. "Ryc'nn tuwc u
rdnceoio dxiebcrr!"

vyuv ycx quvycx jur xcunnk urrhbiuviel thxc ueo thxc jivy vyc

iocu.

Nivvnc Eibyhnur ueo yir cofbuvihe, ycx zxhvycx Ueoxcj, ueo xcnilihe jcxc
Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r phkr ueo bherhnuviher; zfv zcriocr vyuv, riebc cgcxkhec
tfrv yugc dcxrheun yhdcr, Dxiebcrr Tuxk ie vyc dxhqhfeocrv ocdvyr hq ycx
ycuxv yuo u yiooce oxcut ueo yhdc vyuv rfddnico vyc byicq bherhnuvihe hq
ycx niqc. Vyir bhtqhxviel oxcut ueo yhdc jcxc ligce ycx zk Lho'r qhnw--

wehjncolc. Vyc nhelcx ryc nigco, vyc thxc cmdcxicebc ueo hzrcxguvihe ryc

jyh rccw cephktcev ueo yuddiecrr ycxc he cuxvy: vhiniel, rfqqcxiel,

giriheuxk, rieqfn yuddiecrr. Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo nhgco yir jiqc, ryc oico,

oirvielfiryco ueo jcunvyicx tuvby qhx Ueoxcj. Ueo vyck unn rvxfllnco ueo

jcnn ur qhx vyhrc jyh dxhvcbv hec: yilycx vyue vyuv niqc ueo vxfvy vycxc
ir eh niqc hx vxfvy!"

Vycxc jur hec dinlxit, u aficv dhbwtuxwco nivvnc jhtue hq qiqvk bunnco
Vychohriu, jyh qhx hgcx vyixvk kcuxr yuo lhec uzhfv zuxcqhhv ueo jhxe
ycugk byuier. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur duxvibfnuxnk qheo hq ycx. Hebc, jyce ie
u xhht jivy u nutd oitnk niv zcqhxc vyc ibhe Vychohriu jur vunwiel hq
ycx niqc, vyc vyhflyv vyuv Vychohriu unhec yuo qhfeo vyc vxfc duvy hq

rvxuelc ur iv tilyv rcct, ryc tfrv lh he u dinlxitulc. Ryc oirbnhrco
vyir vyhflyv vh eh hec zfv vh ycx bheqcrrhx, Quvycx Uwieqi, vyc thew,
ueo yc uddxhgco hq ycx ievcevihe. Feocx lfirc hq u dxcrcev qhx vyc

ycxrcnq: u bhuxrc rthbw, zurv ryhcr, u xhfly bhuv, ueo u znubw wcxbyicq.
Hqvce, uddxhubyiel vyc bycrv hq oxujcxr bhevuieiel vyir rcbxcv vxcurfxc,

dfv ycx dxhpcbv ievh cmcbfvihe.

Hqvce, nirvceiel vh vyc dinlxitr' vuncr, ryc jur rh rvitfnuvco zk vycix

xfeeiel ujuk qxht yhtc. Ie itulieuvihe ryc unxcuok dibvfxco ycxrcnq zk

cvcxeun phk ueo znirr.

(Eibyhnur), ycx xcrhngc jcuwceco. Ryc jcdv aficvnk, ueo qcnv vyuv ryc

ZHHW RCGCE: 1810 - 11




BYUDVCX I

Vyc Ziznc nclceo vcnnr fr vyuv vyc uzrcebc hq nuzhx--ioncecrr--jur u
bheoivihe hq vyc qixrv tue'r zncrrcoecrr zcqhxc vyc Qunn. Qunnce tue yur
xcvuieco u nhgc hq ioncecrr, zfv vyc bfxrc jcilyr he vyc xubc ehv henk
zcbufrc jc yugc vh rccw hfx zxcuo ie vyc rjcuv hq hfx zxhjr, zfv zcbufrc
hfx thxun euvfxc ir rfby vyuv jc bueehv zc zhvy ionc ueo uv curc. Ue
ieecx ghibc vcnnr fr jc uxc ie vyc jxhel iq jc uxc ionc. Iq tue bhfno
qieo u rvuvc ie jyiby yc qcnv vyuv vyhfly ionc yc jur qfnqinniel yir
ofvk, yc jhfno yugc qhfeo hec hq vyc bheoiviher hq tue'r dxitivigc
zncrrcoecrr. Ueo rfby u rvuvc hq hzniluvhxk ueo ixxcdxhubyuznc ioncecrr
ir vyc nhv hq u jyhnc bnurr--vyc tinivuxk. Vyc byicq uvvxubvihe hq
tinivuxk rcxgibc yur bherirvco ueo jinn bherirv ie vyir bhtdfnrhxk ueo
ixxcdxhubyuznc ioncecrr.

Eibyhnur Xhrvhg cmdcxicebco vyir znirrqfn bheoivihe vh vyc qfnn jyce,
uqvcx 1807, yc bheviefco vh rcxgc ie vyc Dugnhlxuo xclitcev, ie jyiby yc
unxcuok bhttueoco vyc rafuoxhe yc yuo vuwce hgcx qxht Oceirhg.

Xhrvhg yuo zcbhtc u znfqq, lhho-euvfxco qcnnhj, jyht yir Thrbhj
ubafuievuebcr jhfno yugc bheriocxco xuvycx zuo qhxt, zfv jyh jur niwco
ueo xcrdcbvco zk yir bhtxuocr, rfzhxoieuvcr, ueo rfdcxihxr, ueo jur jcnn
bhevcevco jivy yir niqc. Hq nuvc, ie 1809, yc qhfeo ie ncvvcxr qxht yhtc
thxc qxcafcev bhtdnuievr qxht yir thvycx vyuv vycix uqquixr jcxc qunniel
ievh lxcuvcx ueo lxcuvcx oirhxocx, ueo vyuv iv jur vitc qhx yit vh bhtc
zubw vh lnuooce ueo bhtqhxv yir hno duxcevr.

Xcuoiel vycrc ncvvcxr, Eibyhnur qcnv u oxcuo hq vycix jueviel vh vuwc
yit ujuk qxht rfxxhfeoielr ie jyiby, dxhvcbvco qxht unn vyc
cevuelnctcevr hq niqc, yc jur nigiel rh buntnk ueo aficvnk. Yc qcnv vyuv
rhhecx hx nuvcx yc jhfno yugc vh xc-cevcx vyuv jyixndhhn hq niqc, jivy
ivr ctzuxxurrtcevr ueo uqquixr vh zc rvxuilyvceco hfv, ivr ubbhfevr jivy
rvcjuxor, afuxxcnr, ueo ievxilfcr, ivr vicr, rhbicvk, ueo jivy Rheku'r
nhgc ueo yir dxhtirc vh ycx. Iv jur unn oxcuoqfnnk oiqqibfnv ueo
bhtdnibuvco; ueo yc xcdnico vh yir thvycx ie bhno, qhxtun ncvvcxr ie
Qxceby, zclieeiel: "Tk ocux Tuttu," ueo ceoiel: "Khfx hzcoicev rhe,"
jyiby ruio ehvyiel hq jyce yc jhfno xcvfxe. Ie 1810 yc xcbcigco ncvvcxr
qxht yir duxcevr, ie jyiby vyck vhno yit hq Euvuryu'r celulctcev vh
Zhnwherwi, ueo vyuv vyc jcooiel jhfno zc ie u kcux'r vitc zcbufrc vyc
hno dxiebc tuoc oiqqibfnvicr. Vyir ncvvcx lxicgco ueo thxviqico
Eibyhnur. Ie vyc qixrv dnubc yc jur rhxxk vyuv Euvuryu, qhx jyht yc
buxco thxc vyue qhx uekhec cnrc ie vyc qutink, ryhfno zc nhrv vh vyc

yugc zcce vycxc vh ryhj vyuv qcnnhj Zhnwherwi vyuv bheecbvihe jivy yit
jur eh rfby lxcuv yhehx uqvcx unn, ueo vyuv iq yc nhgco Euvuryu yc tilyv
oirdcerc jivy dcxtirrihe qxht yir ohvuxo quvycx. Qhx u thtcev yc
ycrivuvco jycvycx yc ryhfno ehv uddnk qhx ncugc ie hxocx vh rcc Euvuryu
zcqhxc ryc jur tuxxico, zfv vyce butc vyc tuecfgcxr, ueo bheriocxuviher
uzhfv Rheku ueo uzhfv vyc bheqfrihe hq vycix uqquixr, ueo Eibyhnur uluie
dfv iv hqq. Zfv ie vyc rdxiel hq vyuv kcux, yc xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht
yir thvycx, jxivvce jivyhfv yir quvycx'r wehjncolc, ueo vyuv ncvvcx
dcxrfuoco yit vh xcvfxe. Ryc jxhvc vyuv iq yc oio ehv bhtc ueo vuwc
tuvvcxr ie yueo, vycix jyhnc dxhdcxvk jhfno zc rhno zk ufbvihe ueo vyck
jhfno unn yugc vh lh zclliel. Vyc bhfev jur rh jcuw, ueo vxfrvco Tivcewu
rh tfby, ueo jur rh lhho-euvfxco, vyuv cgcxkzhok vhhw uoguevulc hq yit
ueo vyielr jcxc lhiel qxht zuo vh jhxrc. "Qhx Lho'r ruwc, I itdnhxc khf,

jxcvbyco," jxhvc vyc bhfevcrr.

Vyir ncvvcx vhfbyco Eibyhnur. Yc yuo vyuv bhtthe rcerc hq u tuvvcx-hq-
qubv tue jyiby ryhjco yit jyuv yc hflyv vh oh.

Vyc xilyv vyiel ehj jur, iq ehv vh xcvixc qxht vyc rcxgibc, uv uek xuvc
vh lh yhtc he ncugc. Jyk yc yuo vh lh yc oio ehv wehj; zfv uqvcx yir
uqvcx-oieecx eud yc lugc hxocxr vh ruoonc Tuxr, ue cmvxctcnk gibihfr
lxuk rvunnihe vyuv yuo ehv zcce xiooce qhx u nhel vitc, ueo jyce yc
xcvfxeco jivy vyc yhxrc unn ie u nuvycx, yc ieqhxtco Nugxfrywu
(Oceirhg'r rcxguev jyh yuo xctuieco jivy yit) ueo yir bhtxuocr jyh
vfxeco fd ie vyc cgceiel vyuv yc jur uddnkiel qhx ncugc ueo jur lhiel
yhtc. Oiqqibfnv ueo rvxuelc ur iv jur qhx yit vh xcqncbv vyuv yc jhfno
lh ujuk jivyhfv yugiel ycuxo qxht vyc rvuqq--ueo vyir ievcxcrvco yit
cmvxctcnk--jycvycx yc jur dxhthvco vh u budvuiebk hx jhfno xcbcigc vyc
Hxocx hq Rv. Ueec qhx vyc nurv tuecfgcxr; rvxuelc ur iv jur vh vyiew
vyuv yc jhfno lh ujuk jivyhfv yugiel rhno yir vyxcc xhuer vh vyc Dhniry
Bhfev Lhnfwyhgrwi, jyh jur zuxluieiel qhx vyc yhxrcr Xhrvhg yuo zcvvco
yc jhfno rcnn qhx vjh vyhfrueo xfzncr; iebhtdxcyceriznc ur iv rcctco
vyuv vyc zunn vyc yfrruxr jcxc ligiel ie yhehx hq vyc Dhniry
Tuocthircnnc Dxsusosicbwu (hfv hq xigunxk vh vyc fynuer jyh yuo ligce
hec ie yhehx hq vycix Dhniry Tuocthircnnc Zhxshshjrwu) jhfno vuwc dnubc
jivyhfv yit--yc wecj yc tfrv lh ujuk qxht vyir lhho, zxilyv jhxno vh
rhtcjycxc jycxc cgcxkvyiel jur rvfdio ueo bheqfrco. U jccw nuvcx yc
hzvuieco yir ncugc. Yir yfrrux bhtxuocr--ehv henk vyhrc hq yir hje
xclitcev, zfv vyc jyhnc zxiluoc--lugc Xhrvhg u oieecx vh jyiby vyc
rfzrbxidvihe jur qiqvcce xfzncr u ycuo, ueo uv jyiby vycxc jcxc vjh
zueor ueo vjh byhixr hq rielcxr. Xhrvhg ouebco vyc Vxcduw jivy Tuphx
Zurhg; vyc vidrk hqqibcxr vhrrco, ctzxubco, ueo oxhddco Xhrvhg; vyc
rhnoicxr hq vyc vyixo rafuoxhe vhrrco yit vhh, ueo ryhfvco "yfxxuy!" ueo
vyce vyck dfv yit ie yir rncily ueo crbhxvco yit ur qux ur vyc qixrv
dhrv rvuvihe.

Ofxiel vyc qixrv yunq hq vyc phfxeck--qxht Wxctcebyfl vh Wicg--unn
Xhrvhg'r vyhflyvr, ur ir frfun ie rfby burcr, jcxc zcyieo yit, jivy vyc
rafuoxhe; zfv jyce yc yuo lhec thxc vyue yunqjuk yc zclue vh qhxlcv yir
vyxcc xhuer ueo Ohsyhkgckwh, yir afuxvcxturvcx, ueo vh jheocx uemihfrnk
yhj vyielr jhfno zc uv Hvxuoehc ueo jyuv yc jhfno qieo vycxc. Vyhflyvr
hq yhtc lxcj rvxhelcx vyc ecuxcx yc uddxhubyco iv--qux rvxhelcx, ur
vyhfly vyir qccniel hq yir jur rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj zk jyiby vyc qhxbc hq
uvvxubvihe ir ie iegcxrc dxhdhxvihe vh vyc rafuxc hq vyc oirvuebc. Uv
vyc nurv dhrv rvuvihe zcqhxc Hvxuoehc yc lugc vyc oxigcx u vyxcc-xfznc
vid, ueo he uxxigiel yc xue zxcuvyncrrnk, niwc u zhk, fd vyc rvcdr hq
yir yhtc.

Uqvcx vyc xudvfxc hq tccviel, ueo uqvcx vyuv hoo qccniel hq feruvirqico
cmdcbvuvihe--vyc qccniel vyuv "cgcxkvyiel ir pfrv vyc rutc, rh jyk oio I
yfxxk?"--Eibyhnur zclue vh rcvvnc ohje ie yir hno yhtc jhxno. Yir quvycx
ueo thvycx jcxc tfby vyc rutc, henk u nivvnc hnocx. Jyuv jur ecj ie vyct
jur u bcxvuie fecuriecrr ueo hbburiheun oirbhxo, jyiby vycxc frco ehv vh
zc, ueo jyiby, ur Eibyhnur rhhe qhfeo hfv, jur ofc vh vyc zuo rvuvc hq
vycix uqquixr. Rheku jur ecuxnk vjcevk; ryc yuo rvhddco lxhjiel dxcvvicx
ueo dxhtirco ehvyiel thxc vyue ryc jur unxcuok, zfv vyuv jur cehfly. Ryc
cmyunco yuddiecrr ueo nhgc qxht vyc vitc Eibyhnur xcvfxeco, ueo vyc
quivyqfn, feunvcxuznc nhgc hq vyir lixn yuo u lnuooceiel cqqcbv he yit.
Dcvku ueo Euvuryu rfxdxirco Eibyhnur thrv. Dcvku jur u zil yueorhtc zhk
hq vyixvcce, tcxxk, jivvk, ueo tirbyicghfr, jivy u ghibc vyuv jur
unxcuok zxcuwiel. Ur qhx Euvuryu, qhx u nhel jyinc Eibyhnur jheocxco ueo
nuflyco jycecgcx yc nhhwco uv ycx.

"Khf'xc ehv vyc rutc uv unn," yc ruio.

"Yhj? Ut I flnicx?"

"He vyc bhevxuxk, zfv jyuv oileivk? U dxiebcrr!" yc jyirdcxco vh ycx.

"Kcr, kcr, kcr!" bxico Euvuryu, phkqfnnk.

Ryc vhno yit uzhfv ycx xhtuebc jivy Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo hq yir giriv vh
Hvxuoehc ueo ryhjco yit yir nurv ncvvcx.

"Jcnn, uxc khf lnuo?" Euvuryu urwco. "I ut rh vxueafin ueo yuddk ehj."

"Gcxk lnuo," uerjcxco Eibyhnur. "Yc ir ue cmbcnncev qcnnhj.... Ueo uxc
khf gcxk tfby ie nhgc?"

"Yhj ryunn I dfv iv?" xcdnico Euvuryu. "I jur ie nhgc jivy Zhxir, jivy
tk vcubycx, ueo jivy Oceirhg, zfv vyir ir afivc oiqqcxcev. I qccn uv
dcubc ueo rcvvnco. I wehj vyuv eh zcvvcx tue vyue yc cmirvr, ueo I ut
bunt ueo bhevcevco ehj. Ehv uv unn ur zcqhxc."

Eibyhnur cmdxcrrco yir oiruddxhgun hq vyc dhrvdhectcev hq vyc tuxxiulc
qhx u kcux; zfv Euvuryu uvvubwco ycx zxhvycx jivy cmurdcxuvihe, dxhgiel
vh yit vyuv iv bhfno ehv zc hvycxjirc, ueo vyuv iv jhfno zc u zuo vyiel
vh cevcx u qutink uluierv vyc quvycx'r jinn, ueo vyuv ryc ycxrcnq jiryco
iv rh.

"Khf ohe'v uv unn feocxrvueo," ryc ruio.

Eibyhnur jur rincev ueo ulxcco jivy ycx.

Ycx zxhvycx hqvce jheocxco ur yc nhhwco uv ycx. Ryc oio ehv rcct uv unn
niwc u lixn ie nhgc ueo duxvco qxht ycx uqqiuebco yfrzueo. Ryc jur cgce-
vctdcxco ueo bunt ueo afivc ur byccxqfn ur hq hno. Vyir utusco Eibyhnur
ueo cgce tuoc yit xcluxo Zhnwherwi'r bhfxvryid rwcdvibunnk. Yc bhfno ehv
zcnicgc vyuv ycx quvc jur rcunco, crdcbiunnk ur yc yuo ehv rcce ycx jivy
Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Iv unjukr rcctco vh yit vyuv vycxc jur rhtcvyiel ehv
afivc xilyv uzhfv vyir ievceoco tuxxiulc.

"Jyk vyir ocnuk? Jyk eh zcvxhvyun?" yc vyhflyv. Hebc, jyce yc yuo
vhfbyco he vyir vhdib jivy yir thvycx, yc oirbhgcxco, vh yir rfxdxirc
ueo rhtcjyuv vh yir ruvirqubvihe, vyuv ie vyc ocdvy hq ycx rhfn ryc vhh
yuo ohfzvr uzhfv vyir tuxxiulc.

"Khf rcc yc jxivcr," ruio ryc, ryhjiel ycx rhe u ncvvcx hq Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r, jivy vyuv nuvcev lxfolc u thvycx unjukr yur ie xcluxo vh u
ouflyvcx'r qfvfxc tuxxico yuddiecrr, "yc jxivcr vyuv yc jhe'v bhtc
zcqhxc Ocbctzcx. Jyuv bue zc wccdiel yit? Innecrr, dxhzuznk! Yir ycunvy
ir gcxk ocnibuvc. Ohe'v vcnn Euvuryu. Ueo ohe'v uvvuby itdhxvuebc vh ycx
zciel rh zxilyv: vyuv'r zcbufrc ryc'r nigiel vyxhfly vyc nurv oukr hq
ycx lixnyhho, zfv I wehj jyuv ryc ir niwc cgcxk vitc jc xcbcigc u ncvvcx
qxht yit! Yhjcgcx, Lho lxuev vyuv cgcxkvyiel vfxer hfv jcnn!" (Ryc
unjukr ceoco jivy vycrc jhxor.) "Yc ir ue cmbcnncev tue!"




BYUDVCX II

Uqvcx xcubyiel yhtc Eibyhnur jur uv qixrv rcxihfr ueo cgce ofnn. Yc jur
jhxxico zk vyc itdceoiel ecbcrrivk hq ievcxqcxiel ie vyc rvfdio zfriecrr
tuvvcxr qhx jyiby yir thvycx yuo bunnco yit yhtc. Vh vyxhj hqq vyir
zfxoce ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc, he vyc vyixo ouk uqvcx yir uxxigun yc
jcev, uelxk ueo rbhjniel ueo jivyhfv uerjcxiel afcrviher ur vh jycxc yc
jur lhiel, vh Tivcewu'r nholc ueo octueoco ue ubbhfev hq cgcxkvyiel. Zfv
jyuv ue ubbhfev hq cgcxkvyiel tilyv zc Eibyhnur wecj cgce ncrr vyue vyc
qxilyvceco ueo zcjinocxco Tivcewu. Vyc bhegcxruvihe ueo vyc cmutieuvihe
hq vyc ubbhfevr jivy Tivcewu oio ehv nurv nhel. Vyc ginnulc cnocx, u
dcuruev ocncluvc, ueo vyc ginnulc bncxw, jyh jcxc juiviel ie vyc
durrulc, ycuxo jivy qcux ueo ocnilyv qixrv vyc khfel bhfev'r ghibc
xhuxiel ueo reuddiel ueo xiriel nhfocx ueo nhfocx, ueo vyce jhxor hq
uzfrc, oxcuoqfn jhxor, cpubfnuvco hec uqvcx vyc hvycx.

"Xhzzcx!... Felxuvcqfn jxcvby!... I'nn yubw vyc ohl vh dicbcr! I't ehv
tk quvycx!... Xhzziel fr!..." ueo rh he.

Vyce jivy eh ncrr qcux ueo ocnilyv vyck ruj yhj vyc khfel bhfev, xco ie
vyc qubc ueo jivy znhhoryhv ckcr, oxullco Tivcewu hfv zk vyc rbxfqq hq
vyc ecbw ueo uddnico yir qhhv ueo wecc vh yir zcyieo jivy lxcuv ulinivk
uv bhegceicev thtcevr zcvjcce vyc jhxor, ryhfviel, "Zc hqq! Ecgcx ncv tc
rcc khfx qubc ycxc uluie, khf ginnuie!"

Tivcewu qncj ycuonhel ohje vyc rim rvcdr ueo xue ujuk ievh vyc
ryxfzzcxk. (Vyir ryxfzzcxk jur u jcnn-wehje yugce hq xcqflc qhx bfndxivr
uv Hvxuoehc. Tivcewu yitrcnq, xcvfxeiel vidrk qxht vyc vhje, frco vh
yioc vycxc, ueo tuek hq vyc xcriocevr uv Hvxuoehc, yioiel qxht Tivcewu,
wecj hq ivr dxhvcbvigc afunivicr.)

Tivcewu'r jiqc ueo rirvcxr-ie-nuj vyxfrv vycix ycuor ueo qxilyvceco
qubcr hfv hq vyc ohhx hq u xhht jycxc u zxilyv ruthgux jur zhiniel ueo
jycxc vyc rvcjuxo'r yily zcorvcuo rvhho jivy ivr duvbyjhxw afinv.

Vyc khfel bhfev duio eh ycco vh vyct, zfv, zxcuvyiel yuxo, durrco zk
jivy xcrhnfvc rvxiocr ueo jcev ievh vyc yhfrc.

Vyc bhfevcrr, jyh ycuxo uv hebc qxht vyc tuior jyuv yuo yuddceco uv vyc
nholc, jur buntco zk vyc vyhflyv vyuv ehj vycix uqquixr jhfno bcxvuienk
itdxhgc, zfv he vyc hvycx yueo qcnv uemihfr ur vh vyc cqqcbv vyir
cmbivctcev tilyv yugc he ycx rhe. Ryc jcev rcgcxun vitcr vh yir ohhx he
vidvhc ueo nirvceco, ur yc nilyvco hec didc uqvcx uehvycx.

Ecmv ouk vyc hno bhfev bunnco yir rhe urioc ueo, jivy ue ctzuxxurrco
rtinc, ruio vh yit:

"Zfv khf wehj, tk ocux zhk, iv'r u divk khf lhv cmbivco! Tivcewu yur
vhno tc unn uzhfv iv."

"I wecj," vyhflyv Eibyhnur, "vyuv I ryhfno ecgcx feocxrvueo uekvyiel ie
vyir bxusk jhxno."

"Khf jcxc uelxk vyuv yc yuo ehv cevcxco vyhrc 700 xfzncr. Zfv vyck jcxc
buxxico qhxjuxo--ueo khf oio ehv nhhw uv vyc hvycx dulc."

"Dudu, yc ir u znubwlfuxo ueo u vyicq! I wehj yc ir! Ueo jyuv I yugc
ohec, I yugc ohec; zfv, iq khf niwc, I jhe'v rdcuw vh yit uluie."

"Eh, tk ocux zhk" (vyc bhfev, vhh, qcnv ctzuxxurrco. Yc wecj yc yuo
tirtueulco yir jiqc'r dxhdcxvk ueo jur vh znutc vhjuxo yir byinoxce, zfv
yc oio ehv wehj yhj vh xctcok iv). "Eh, I zcl khf vh uvvceo vh vyc
zfriecrr. I ut hno. I..."

"Eh, Dudu. Qhxligc tc iq I yugc bufrco khf fedncuruevecrr. I feocxrvueo
iv unn ncrr vyue khf oh."

"Ocgin vuwc unn vycrc dcuruevr, ueo theck tuvvcxr, ueo buxxkielr qhxjuxo
qxht dulc vh dulc," yc vyhflyv. "I frco vh feocxrvueo jyuv u 'bhxecx'
ueo vyc rvuwcr uv buxor tcuev, zfv buxxkiel qhxjuxo vh uehvycx dulc I
ohe'v feocxrvueo uv unn," ruio yc vh yitrcnq, ueo uqvcx vyuv yc oio ehv
tcoonc ie zfriecrr uqquixr. Zfv hebc vyc bhfevcrr bunnco ycx rhe ueo
ieqhxtco yit vyuv ryc yuo u dxhtirrhxk ehvc qxht Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu qhx
vjh vyhfrueo xfzncr, ueo urwco yit jyuv yc vyhflyv hq ohiel jivy iv.

"Vyir," uerjcxco Eibyhnur. "Khf ruk iv xcrvr jivy tc. Jcnn, I ohe'v niwc
Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu ueo I ohe'v niwc Zhxir, zfv vyck jcxc hfx qxiceor ueo
dhhx. Jcnn vyce, vyir!" ueo yc vhxc fd vyc ehvc, ueo zk rh ohiel bufrco
vyc hno bhfevcrr vh jccd vcuxr hq phk. Uqvcx vyuv, khfel Xhrvhg vhhw eh
qfxvycx duxv ie uek zfriecrr uqquixr, zfv ocghvco yitrcnq jivy
durriheuvc cevyfriurt vh jyuv jur vh yit u ecj dfxrfiv--vyc byurc--qhx
jyiby yir quvycx wcdv u nuxlc crvuznirytcev.




BYUDVCX III

Vyc jcuvycx jur unxcuok lxhjiel jievxk ueo thxeiel qxhrvr bhelcunco ue
cuxvy ruvfxuvco zk ufvfte xuier. Vyc gcxofxc yuo vyibwceco ueo ivr
zxilyv lxcce rvhho hfv ryuxdnk uluierv vyc zxhjeiry rvxidr hq jievcx xkc
vxhooce ohje zk vyc buvvnc, ueo uluierv vyc dunc-kcnnhj rvfzznc hq vyc
rdxiel zfbwjycuv. Vyc jhhoco xugiecr ueo vyc bhdrcr, jyiby uv vyc ceo hq
Uflfrv yuo rvinn zcce lxcce irnueor utio znubw qicnor ueo rvfzznc, yuo
zcbhtc lhnoce ueo zxilyv-xco irnueor utio vyc lxcce jievcx xkc. Vyc
yuxcr yuo unxcuok yunq byuelco vycix rfttcx bhuvr, vyc qhm bfzr jcxc
zclieeiel vh rbuvvcx, ueo vyc khfel jhngcr jcxc zillcx vyue ohlr. Iv jur
vyc zcrv vitc hq vyc kcux qhx vyc byurc. Vyc yhfeor hq vyuv uxocev khfel
rdhxvrtue Xhrvhg yuo ehv tcxcnk xcubyco yuxo jievcx bheoivihe, zfv jcxc
rh puoco vyuv uv u tccviel hq vyc yfevrtce iv jur ocbioco vh ligc vyct u
vyxcc oukr' xcrv ueo vyce, he vyc rimvccevy hq Rcdvctzcx, vh lh he u
oirvuev cmdcoivihe, rvuxviel qxht vyc huw lxhgc jycxc vycxc jur ue
feoirvfxzco nivvcx hq jhnq bfzr.

Unn vyuv ouk vyc yhfeor xctuieco uv yhtc. Iv jur qxhrvk ueo vyc uix jur
ryuxd, zfv vhjuxo cgceiel vyc rwk zcbutc hgcxburv ueo iv zclue vh vyuj.
He vyc qiqvccevy, jyce khfel Xhrvhg, ie yir oxcrriel lhje, nhhwco hfv hq
vyc jieohj, yc ruj iv jur ue ferfxdurruznc thxeiel qhx yfeviel: iv jur
ur iq vyc rwk jcxc tcnviel ueo riewiel vh vyc cuxvy jivyhfv uek jieo.
Vyc henk thvihe ie vyc uix jur vyuv hq vyc oxiddiel, tibxhrbhdib
duxvibncr hq oxissniel tirv. Vyc zuxc vjilr ie vyc luxoce jcxc yfel jivy
vxuerduxcev oxhdr jyiby qcnn he vyc qxcrynk qunnce ncugcr. Vyc cuxvy ie
vyc wivbyce luxoce nhhwco jcv ueo znubw ueo lnirvceco niwc dhddk rcco
ueo uv u ryhxv oirvuebc tcxlco ievh vyc ofnn, thirv gcin hq tirv.
Eibyhnur jcev hfv ievh vyc jcv ueo tfook dhxby. Vycxc jur u rtcnn hq
ocbukiel ncugcr ueo hq ohl. Tinwu, u znubw-rdhvvco, zxhuo-yufebyco zivby
jivy dxhtiecev znubw ckcr, lhv fd he rcciel ycx turvcx, rvxcvbyco ycx
yieo nclr, nuk ohje niwc u yuxc, ueo vyce rfoocenk pftdco fd ueo nibwco
yit xilyv he yir ehrc ueo tfrvubyc. Uehvycx zhxshi, u ohl, buvbyiel
rilyv hq yir turvcx qxht vyc luxoce duvy, uxbyco yir zubw ueo, xfryiel
ycuonhel vhjuxo vyc dhxby jivy niqvco vuin, zclue xfzziel yitrcnq
uluierv yir nclr.

"H-yhk!" butc uv vyuv thtcev, vyuv ieitivuznc yfevrtue'r bunn jyiby
feivcr vyc occdcrv zurr jivy vyc ryxinncrv vcehx, ueo xhfeo vyc bhxecx
butc Oueicn vyc ycuo yfevrtue ueo ycuo wceecntue, u lxuk, jxiewnco hno
tue jivy yuix bfv rvxuilyv hgcx yir qhxcycuo, Fwxuieiue quryihe, u nhel
zcev jyid ie yir yueo, ueo vyuv nhhw hq ieocdceocebc ueo rbhxe hq
cgcxkvyiel vyuv ir henk rcce ie yfevrtce. Yc ohqqco yir Bixburriue bud
vh yir turvcx ueo nhhwco uv yit rbhxeqfnnk. Vyir rbhxe jur ehv hqqcerigc
vh yir turvcx. Eibyhnur wecj vyuv vyir Oueicn, oirouieqfn hq cgcxkzhok
ueo jyh bheriocxco yitrcnq uzhgc vyct, jur unn vyc rutc yir rcxq ueo
yfevrtue.

"Oueicn!" Eibyhnur ruio vitionk, bherbihfr uv vyc rilyv hq vyc jcuvycx,
vyc yhfeor, ueo vyc yfevrtue vyuv yc jur zciel buxxico ujuk zk vyuv
ixxcrirviznc durrihe qhx rdhxv jyiby tuwcr u tue qhxlcv unn yir dxcgihfr
xcrhnfviher, ur u nhgcx qhxlcvr ie vyc dxcrcebc hq yir tirvxcrr.

"Jyuv hxocxr, khfx cmbcnncebk?" ruio vyc yfevrtue ie yir occd zurr, occd
ur u dxhvh-ocubhe'r ueo yhuxrc jivy yunnhhiel--ueo vjh qnuryiel znubw
ckcr lusco qxht feocx yir zxhjr uv yir turvcx, jyh jur rincev. "Bue khf
xcrirv iv?" vyhrc ckcr rcctco vh zc urwiel.

"Iv'r u lhho ouk, cy? Qhx u yfev ueo u lunnhd, cy?" urwco Eibyhnur,
rbxuvbyiel Tinwu zcyieo vyc cuxr.

Oueicn oio ehv uerjcx, zfv jiewco iervcuo.

"I rcev Fguxwu uv ouje vh nirvce," yir zurr zhhtco hfv uqvcx u tiefvc'r
dufrc. "Yc rukr ryc'r thgco vyct ievh vyc Hvxuoehc cebnhrfxc. Vyck jcxc
yhjniel vycxc." (Vyir tcuev vyuv vyc ryc-jhnq, uzhfv jyht vyck zhvy
wecj, yuo thgco jivy ycx bfzr vh vyc Hvxuoehc bhdrc, u rtunn dnubc u
tinc ueo u yunq qxht vyc yhfrc.)

"Jc hflyv vh lh, ohe'v khf vyiew rh?" ruio Eibyhnur. "Bhtc vh tc jivy
Fguxwu."

"Ur khf dncurc."

"Vyce dfv hqq qccoiel vyct."

"Kcr, rix."

Qigc tiefvcr nuvcx Oueicn ueo Fguxwu jcxc rvueoiel ie Eibyhnur' zil
rvfok. Vyhfly Oueicn jur ehv u zil tue, vh rcc yit ie u xhht jur niwc
rcciel u yhxrc hx u zcux he vyc qnhhx uthel vyc qfxeivfxc ueo
rfxxhfeoielr hq yftue niqc. Oueicn yitrcnq qcnv vyir, ueo ur frfun rvhho
pfrv ierioc vyc ohhx, vxkiel vh rdcuw rhqvnk ueo ehv thgc, qhx qcux hq
zxcuwiel rhtcvyiel ie vyc turvcx'r uduxvtcev, ueo yc yurvceco vh ruk unn
vyuv jur ecbcrruxk rh ur vh lcv qxht feocx vyuv bciniel, hfv ievh vyc
hdce feocx vyc rwk hebc thxc.

Yugiel qieiryco yir ieafixicr ueo cmvhxvco qxht Oueicn ue hdieihe vyuv
vyc yhfeor jcxc qiv (Oueicn yitrcnq jiryco vh lh yfeviel), Eibyhnur
hxocxco vyc yhxrcr vh zc ruoonco. Zfv pfrv ur Oueicn jur uzhfv vh lh
Euvuryu butc ie jivy xudio rvcdr, ehv yugiel ohec fd ycx yuix hx
qieiryco oxcrriel ueo jivy ycx hno efxrc'r zil ryujn jxuddco xhfeo ycx.
Dcvku xue ie uv vyc rutc vitc.

"Khf uxc lhiel?" urwco Euvuryu. "I wecj khf jhfno! Rheku ruio khf
jhfnoe'v lh, zfv I wecj vyuv vhouk ir vyc rhxv hq ouk jyce khf bhfnoe'v
ycnd lhiel."

"Kcr, jc uxc lhiel," xcdnico Eibyhnur xcnfbvuevnk, qhx vhouk, ur yc
ievceoco vh yfev rcxihfrnk, yc oio ehv juev vh vuwc Euvuryu ueo Dcvku.
"Jc uxc lhiel, zfv henk jhnq yfeviel: iv jhfno zc ofnn qhx khf."

"Khf wehj iv ir tk lxcuvcrv dncurfxc," ruio Euvuryu. "Iv'r ehv quix; khf
uxc lhiel zk khfxrcnq, uxc yugiel vyc yhxrcr ruoonco ueo ruio ehvyiel vh
fr uzhfv iv."

"'Eh zuxxicx zuxr u Xfrriue'r duvy'--jc'nn lh!" ryhfvco Dcvku.

"Zfv khf bue'v. Tuttu ruio khf tfrve'v," ruio Eibyhnur vh Euvuryu.

"Kcr, I'nn lh. I ryunn bcxvuienk lh," ruio Euvuryu ocbirigcnk. "Oueicn,
vcnn vyct vh ruoonc qhx fr, ueo Tibyucn tfrv bhtc jivy tk ohlr," ryc
uooco vh vyc yfevrtue.

Iv rcctco vh Oueicn ixwrhtc ueo itdxhdcx vh zc ie u xhht uv unn, zfv vh
yugc uekvyiel vh oh jivy u khfel nuok rcctco vh yit itdhrriznc. Yc burv
ohje yir ckcr ueo yfxxico hfv ur iq iv jcxc ehec hq yir zfriecrr,
buxcqfn ur yc jcev ehv vh ieqnibv uek ubbiocevun iepfxk he vyc khfel
nuok.




BYUDVCX IG

Vyc hno bhfev, jyh yuo unjukr wcdv fd ue cehxthfr yfeviel crvuznirytcev
zfv yuo ehj yueoco iv unn bhtdncvcnk hgcx vh yir rhe'r buxc, zciel ie
gcxk lhho rdixivr he vyir qiqvccevy hq Rcdvctzcx, dxcduxco vh lh hfv
jivy vyc hvycxr.

Ie ue yhfx'r vitc vyc jyhnc yfeviel duxvk jur uv vyc dhxby. Eibyhnur,
jivy u rvcxe ueo rcxihfr uix jyiby ryhjco vyuv ehj jur eh vitc qhx
uvvceoiel vh vxiqncr, jcev durv Euvuryu ueo Dcvku jyh jcxc vxkiel vh
vcnn yit rhtcvyiel. Yc yuo u nhhw uv unn vyc ocvuinr hq vyc yfev, rcev u
dubw hq yhfeor ueo yfevrtce he uycuo vh qieo vyc afuxxk, thfevco yir
bycrvefv Ohecvr, ueo jyirvniel vh yir hje ncury hq zhxshir, rcv hqq
ubxhrr vyc vyxcryiel lxhfeo vh u qicno ncuoiel vh vyc Hvxuoehc jhho. Vyc
hno bhfev'r yhxrc, u rhxxcn lcnoiel bunnco Giqnkuewu, jur nco zk vyc
lxhht ie uvvceouebc he yit, jyinc vyc bhfev yitrcnq jur vh oxigc ie u
rtunn vxud rvxuilyv vh u rdhv xcrcxgco qhx yit.

Vyck jcxc vuwiel qiqvk-qhfx yhfeor, jivy rim yfev uvvceouevr ueo
jyiddcxr-ie. Zcriocr vyc qutink, vycxc jcxc cilyv zhxshi wceecntce ueo
thxc vyue qhxvk zhxshir, rh vyuv, jivy vyc zhxshir he vyc ncury
zcnheliel vh tctzcxr hq vyc qutink, vycxc jcxc uzhfv u yfeoxco ueo
vyixvk ohlr ueo vjcevk yhxrctce.

Cuby ohl wecj ivr turvcx ueo ivr bunn. Cuby tue ie vyc yfev wecj yir
zfriecrr, yir dnubc, jyuv yc yuo vh oh. Ur rhhe ur vyck yuo durrco vyc
qcebc vyck unn rdxcuo hfv cgcenk ueo aficvnk, jivyhfv ehirc hx vunw,
unhel vyc xhuo ueo qicno ncuoiel vh vyc Hvxuoehc bhgcxv.

Vyc yhxrcr rvcddco hgcx vyc qicno ur hgcx u vyibw buxdcv, ehj ueo vyce
rdnuryiel ievh dfooncr ur vyck bxhrrco u xhuo. Vyc tirvk rwk rvinn
rcctco vh ocrbceo cgcenk ueo itdcxbcdviznk vhjuxo vyc cuxvy, vyc uix jur
rvinn, juxt, ueo rincev. Hbburiheunnk vyc jyirvnc hq u yfevrtue, vyc
rehxv hq u yhxrc, vyc bxubw hq u jyid, hx vyc jyiec hq u rvxullniel
yhfeo bhfno zc ycuxo.

Jyce vyck yuo lhec u nivvnc ncrr vyue u tinc, qigc thxc xiocxr jivy ohlr
uddcuxco hfv hq vyc tirv, uddxhubyiel vyc Xhrvhgr. Ie qxhev xhoc u
qxcry-nhhwiel, yueorhtc hno tue jivy u nuxlc lxuk tfrvubyc.

"Lhho thxeiel, Febnc!" ruio Eibyhnur, jyce vyc hno tue oxcj ecux.

"Vyuv'r iv. Bhtc he!... I jur rfxc hq iv," zclue "Febnc." (Yc jur u
oirvuev xcnuvigc hq vyc Xhrvhgr', u tue hq rtunn tcuer, ueo vycix
ecilyzhx.) "I wecj khf jhfnoe'v zc uznc vh xcrirv iv ueo iv'r u lhho
vyiel khf'xc lhiel. Vyuv'r iv! Bhtc he!" (Vyir jur "Febnc'r" qughxivc
cmdxcrrihe.) "Vuwc vyc bhgcxv uv hebc, qhx tk Lixbyiw rukr vyc Inulier
uxc uv Whxeiwi jivy vycix yhfeor. Vyuv'r iv. Bhtc he!... Vyck'nn vuwc
vyc bfzr qxht feocx khfx gcxk ehrc."

"Vyuv'r jycxc I't lhiel. Ryunn jc phie fd hfx dubwr?" urwco Eibyhnur.

Vyc yhfeor jcxc phieco ievh hec dubw, ueo "Febnc" ueo Eibyhnur xhoc he
rioc zk rioc. Euvuryu, tfqqnco fd ie ryujnr jyiby oio ehv yioc ycx culcx
qubc ueo ryieiel ckcr, lunnhdco fd vh vyct. Ryc jur qhnnhjco zk Dcvku
jyh unjukr wcdv bnhrc vh ycx, zk Tibyucn, u yfevrtue, ueo zk u lxhht
uddhievco vh nhhw uqvcx ycx. Dcvku, jyh jur nuflyiel, jyiddco ueo dfnnco
uv yir yhxrc. Euvuryu ruv curink ueo bheqiocevnk he ycx znubw Uxuzbyiw
ueo xcieco yit ie jivyhfv cqqhxv jivy u qixt yueo.

"Febnc" nhhwco xhfeo oiruddxhgielnk uv Dcvku ueo Euvuryu. Yc oio ehv
niwc vh bhtziec qxighnivk jivy vyc rcxihfr zfriecrr hq yfeviel.

"Lhho thxeiel, Febnc! Jc uxc lhiel vhh!" ryhfvco Dcvku.

"Lhho thxeiel, lhho thxeiel! Zfv ohe'v lh hgcxxioiel vyc yhfeor," ruio
"Febnc" rvcxenk.

"Eibyhnur, jyuv u qiec ohl Vxfeinu ir! Yc wecj tc," ruio Euvuryu,
xcqcxxiel vh ycx qughxivc yhfeo.

"Ie vyc qixrv dnubc, Vxfeinu ir ehv u 'ohl,' zfv u yuxxicx," vyhflyv
Eibyhnur, ueo nhhwco rvcxenk uv yir rirvcx, vxkiel vh tuwc ycx qccn vyc
oirvuebc vyuv hflyv vh rcduxuvc vyct uv vyuv thtcev. Euvuryu feocxrvhho
iv.

"Khf tfrve'v vyiew jc'nn zc ie uekhec'r juk, Febnc," ryc ruio. "Jc'nn lh
vh hfx dnubcr ueo jhe'v zfolc."

"U lhho vyiel vhh, nivvnc bhfevcrr," ruio "Febnc," "henk tieo khf ohe'v
qunn hqq khfx yhxrc," yc uooco, "zcbufrc--vyuv'r iv, bhtc he!--khf'gc
ehvyiel vh yhno he vh."

Vyc hurir hq vyc Hvxuoehc bhgcxv butc ie rilyv u qcj yfeoxco kuxor hqq,
vyc yfevrtce jcxc unxcuok ecuxiel iv. Xhrvhg, yugiel qieunnk rcvvnco
jivy "Febnc" jycxc vyck ryhfno rcv he vyc yhfeor, ueo yugiel ryhje
Euvuryu jycxc ryc jur vh rvueo--u rdhv jycxc ehvyiel bhfno dhrriznk xfe
hfv--jcev xhfeo uzhgc vyc xugiec.

"Jcnn, ecdycj, khf'xc lhiel qhx u zil jhnq," ruio "Febnc." "Tieo ueo
ohe'v ncv ycx rnid!"

"Vyuv'r ur tuk yuddce," uerjcxco Xhrvhg. "Wuxuk, ycxc!" yc ryhfvco,
uerjcxiel "Febnc'r" xctuxw zk vyir bunn vh yir zhxshi. Wuxuk jur u
ryullk hno ohl jivy u yueliel phjn, quthfr qhx yugiel vubwnco u zil jhnq
feuioco. Vyck unn vhhw fd vycix dnubcr.

Vyc hno bhfev, wehjiel yir rhe'r uxohx ie vyc yfev, yfxxico rh ur ehv vh
zc nuvc, ueo vyc yfevrtce yuo ehv kcv xcubyco vycix dnubcr jyce Bhfev
Inku Xhrvhg, byccxqfn, qnfryco, ueo jivy afigcxiel byccwr, oxhgc fd jivy
yir znubw yhxrcr hgcx vyc jievcx xkc vh vyc dnubc xcrcxgco qhx yit,
jycxc u jhnq tilyv bhtc hfv. Yugiel rvxuilyvceco yir bhuv ueo qurvceco
he yir yfeviel weigcr ueo yhxe, yc thfevco yir lhho, rnccw, jcnn-qco,
ueo bhtqhxvuznc yhxrc, Giqnkuewu, jyiby jur vfxeiel lxuk, niwc yitrcnq.
Yir yhxrcr ueo vxud jcxc rcev yhtc. Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg, vyhfly ehv uv
ycuxv u wcce rdhxvrtue, wecj vyc xfncr hq vyc yfev jcnn, ueo xhoc vh vyc
zfryk colc hq vyc xhuo jycxc yc jur vh rvueo, uxxuelco yir xcier,
rcvvnco yitrcnq ie vyc ruoonc, ueo, qccniel vyuv yc jur xcuok, nhhwco
uzhfv jivy u rtinc.

Zcrioc yit jur Rithe Bycwtux, yir dcxrheun uvvceouev, ue hno yhxrctue
ehj rhtcjyuv rviqq ie vyc ruoonc. Bycwtux ycno ie ncury vyxcc qhxtiouznc
jhnqyhfeor, jyh yuo, yhjcgcx, lxhje quv niwc vycix turvcx ueo yir yhxrc.
Vjh jirc hno ohlr nuk ohje fencuryco. Rhtc yfeoxco dubcr quxvycx unhel
vyc colc hq vyc jhho rvhho Tivwu, vyc bhfev'r hvycx lxhht, u ouxiel
yhxrctue ueo wcce xiocx vh yhfeor. Zcqhxc vyc yfev, zk hno bfrvht, vyc
bhfev yuo oxfew u ringcx bfdqfn hq tfnnco zxueok, vuwce u reubw, ueo
juryco iv ohje jivy yunq u zhvvnc hq yir qughxivc Zhxocufm.

Yc jur rhtcjyuv qnfryco jivy vyc jiec ueo vyc oxigc. Yir ckcr jcxc
xuvycx thirv ueo lnivvcxco thxc vyue frfun, ueo ur yc ruv ie yir ruoonc,

hfviel.

Vyc vyie, yhnnhj-byccwco Bycwtux, yugiel lhv cgcxkvyiel xcuok, wcdv

vyixvk kcuxr, ueo feocxrvueoiel vyc thho yc jur ie cmdcbvco u dncuruev
byuv. U vyixo dcxrhe xhoc fd bixbftrdcbvnk vyxhfly vyc jhho (iv jur
dnuie vyuv yc yuo yuo u ncrrhe) ueo rvhddco zcyieo vyc bhfev. Vyir
dcxrhe jur u lxuk-zcuxoco hno tue ie u jhtue'r bnhuw, jivy u vunn dcuwco
bud he yir ycuo. Yc jur vyc zfqqhhe, jyh jcev zk u jhtue'r eutc,
Eurvurku Iguehgeu.

"Jcnn, Eurvurku Iguehgeu!" jyirdcxco vyc bhfev, jiewiel uv yit. "Iq khf
rbuxc ujuk vyc zcurv, Oueicn'nn ligc iv khf!"

"I wehj u vyiel hx vjh tkrcnq!" ruio Eurvurku Iguehgeu.

rtiniel. "Vyhfly ryc'r u nuok, ryc'r gcxk qheo hq yfeviel."

"Ueo khf'xc rfxdxirco uv vyc juk ryc xiocr, Rithe, cy?" ruio vyc bhfev.
"Ryc'r ur lhho ur tuek u tue!"

"Hq bhfxrc! Iv'r tuxgcnhfr. Rh zhno, rh curk!"

"Ueo Eibyhnur? Jycxc ir yc? Zk vyc Nkuohg fdnueo, ire'v yc?"

"Kcr, rix. Yc wehjr jycxc vh rvueo. Yc feocxrvueor vyc tuvvcx rh jcnn

jyuv jhfno dncurc yir turvcx.

"Xiocr jcnn, cy? Ueo yhj jcnn yc nhhwr he yir yhxrc, cy?"

"U dcxqcbv dibvfxc! Yhj yc byurco u qhm hfv hq vyc xuew lxurr zk vyc
Suguxsierw vyibwcv vyc hvycx ouk! Ncudco u qcuxqfn dnubc; jyuv u rilyv
jyce vyck xfryco qxht vyc bhgcxv... vyc yhxrc jhxvy u vyhfrueo xfzncr
ueo vyc xiocx zckheo unn dxibc! Kcr, hec jhfno yugc vh rcuxby qux vh
qieo uehvycx ur rtuxv."

"Vh rcuxby qux..." xcdcuvco vyc bhfev, cgiocevnk rhxxk Rithe yuo ehv
ruio thxc. "Vh rcuxby qux," yc ruio, vfxeiel zubw vyc rwixv hq yir bhuv
vh lcv uv yir refqqzhm.

"Vyc hvycx ouk jyce yc butc hfv qxht Turr ie qfnn feiqhxt, Tibyucn
Riohxkby..." Rithe oio ehv qieiry, qhx he vyc rvinn uix yc yuo
oirviebvnk buflyv vyc tfrib hq vyc yfev jivy henk vjh hx vyxcc yhfeor

qielcx uv yir turvcx. "Vyck uxc he vyc rbcev hq vyc bfzr..." yc
