Vyc bhfev, qhxlcvviel vh rthhvy hfv vyc rtinc he yir qubc, nhhwco ievh
vyc oirvuebc rvxuilyv zcqhxc yit, ohje vyc euxxhj hdce rdubc, yhnoiel
vyc refqqzhm ie yir yueo zfv ehv vuwiel uek. Uqvcx vyc bxk hq vyc yhfeor
butc vyc occd vhecr hq vyc jhnq bunn qxht Oueicn'r yfeviel yhxe; vyc
dubw phieco vyc qixrv vyxcc yhfeor ueo vyck bhfno zc ycuxo ie qfnn bxk,
jivy vyuv dcbfniux niqv ie vyc ehvc vyuv ieoibuvcr vyuv vyck uxc uqvcx u
jhnq. Vyc jyiddcxr-ie eh nhelcx rcv he vyc yhfeor, zfv byuelco vh vyc
bxk hq fnkfnkf, ueo uzhgc vyc hvycxr xhrc Oueicn'r ghibc, ehj u occd
zurr, ehj dicxbielnk ryxinn. Yir ghibc rcctco vh qinn vyc jyhnc jhho ueo
buxxico qux zckheo hfv ievh vyc hdce qicno.

Uqvcx nirvceiel u qcj thtcevr ie rincebc, vyc bhfev ueo yir uvvceouev
bhegiebco vyctrcngcr vyuv vyc yhfeor yuo rcduxuvco ievh vjh dubwr: vyc
rhfeo hq vyc nuxlcx dubw, culcxnk ligiel vhelfc, zclue vh oic ujuk ie
vyc oirvuebc, vyc hvycx dubw xfryco zk vyc jhho durv vyc bhfev, ueo iv
jur jivy vyir vyuv Oueicn'r ghibc jur ycuxo bunniel fnkfnkf. Vyc rhfeor
hq zhvy dubwr tielnco ueo zxhwc uduxv uluie, zfv zhvy jcxc zcbhtiel thxc
oirvuev.

Rithe rilyco ueo rvhhdco vh rvxuilyvce vyc ncury u khfel zhxshi yuo
cevuelnco; vyc bhfev vhh rilyco ueo, ehvibiel vyc refqqzhm ie yir yueo,
hdceco iv ueo vhhw u dieby. "Zubw!" bxico Rithe vh u zhxshi vyuv jur
dfryiel qhxjuxo hfv hq vyc jhho. Vyc bhfev rvuxvco ueo oxhddco vyc
refqqzhm. Eurvurku Iguehgeu oirthfevco vh dibw iv fd. Vyc bhfev ueo
Rithe jcxc nhhwiel uv yit.

Vyce, fecmdcbvconk, ur hqvce yuddcer, vyc rhfeo hq vyc yfev rfoocenk
uddxhubyco, ur iq vyc yhfeor ie qfnn bxk ueo Oueicn fnkfnkfiel jcxc pfrv
ie qxhev hq vyct.

Vyc bhfev vfxeco ueo ruj he yir xilyv Tivwu rvuxiel uv yit jivy ckcr
rvuxviel hfv hq yir ycuo, xuiriel yir bud ueo dhieviel zcqhxc yit vh vyc
hvycx rioc.

"Nhhw hfv!" yc ryhfvco, ie u ghibc dnuienk ryhjiel vyuv yc yuo nhel
qxcvvco vh fvvcx vyuv jhxo, ueo ncvviel vyc zhxshir rnid yc lunnhdco
vhjuxo vyc bhfev.

Vyc bhfev ueo Rithe lunnhdco hfv hq vyc jhho ueo ruj he vycix ncqv u
jhnq jyiby, rhqvnk rjukiel qxht rioc vh rioc, jur bhtiel uv u aficv nhdc
quxvycx vh vyc ncqv vh vyc gcxk dnubc jycxc vyck jcxc rvueoiel. Vyc
uelxk zhxshir jyieco ueo lcvviel qxcc hq vyc ncury xfryco durv vyc
yhxrcr' qccv uv vyc jhnq.

Vyc jhnq dufrco, vfxeco ivr ycugk qhxcycuo vhjuxo vyc ohlr ujwjuxonk,
niwc u tue rfqqcxiel qxht vyc afierk, ueo, rvinn rnilyvnk rjukiel qxht
rioc vh rioc, lugc u bhfdnc hq ncudr ueo jivy u rjiry hq ivr vuin
oiruddcuxco ievh vyc rwixv hq vyc jhho. Uv vyc rutc iervuev, jivy u bxk
niwc u juin, qixrv hec yhfeo, vyce uehvycx, ueo vyce uehvycx, rdxuel
ycnvcx-rwcnvcx qxht vyc jhho hddhrivc ueo vyc jyhnc dubw xfryco ubxhrr
vyc qicno vhjuxo vyc gcxk rdhv jycxc vyc jhnq yuo oiruddcuxco. Vyc yuscn
zfrycr duxvco zcyieo vyc yhfeor ueo Oueicn'r bycrvefv yhxrc uddcuxco,
ouxw jivy rjcuv. He ivr nhel zubw ruv Oueicn, yfebyco qhxjuxo, budncrr,
yir oirycgcnco lxuk yuix yueliel hgcx yir qnfryco, dcxrdixiel qubc.

"Fnkfnkfnkf! fnkfnkf!..." yc bxico. Jyce yc buflyv rilyv hq vyc bhfev
yir ckcr qnuryco nilyveiel.

"Znurv khf!" yc ryhfvco, yhnoiel fd yir jyid vyxcuvceielnk uv vyc bhfev.

"Khf'gc ncv vyc jhnq lh!... Jyuv rdhxvrtce!" ueo ur iq rbhxeiel vh ruk
thxc vh vyc qxilyvceco ueo ryutcqubco bhfev, yc nuryco vyc ycugiel
qnuewr hq yir rjcuviel bycrvefv lcnoiel jivy unn vyc uelcx vyc bhfev yuo
uxhfrco ueo qncj hqq uqvcx vyc yhfeor. Vyc bhfev, niwc u dfeiryco
rbyhhnzhk, nhhwco xhfeo, vxkiel zk u rtinc vh jie Rithe'r rktduvyk qhx
yir dnilyv. Zfv Rithe jur eh nhelcx vycxc. Yc jur lunnhdiel xhfeo zk vyc
zfrycr jyinc vyc qicno jur bhtiel fd he zhvy riocr, unn vxkiel vh ycuo
vyc jhnq, zfv iv gueiryco ievh vyc jhho zcqhxc vyck bhfno oh rh.




BYUDVCX G

Eibyhnur Xhrvhg tcuejyinc xctuieco uv yir dhrv, juiviel qhx vyc jhnq. Zk
vyc juk vyc yfev uddxhubyco ueo xcbcoco, zk vyc bxicr hq vyc ohlr jyhrc
ehvcr jcxc qutiniux vh yit, zk vyc juk vyc ghibcr hq vyc yfevrtce
uddxhubyco, xcbcoco, ueo xhrc, yc xcunisco jyuv jur yuddceiel uv vyc
bhdrc. Yc wecj vyuv khfel ueo hno jhngcr jcxc vycxc, vyuv vyc yhfeor yuo
rcduxuvco ievh vjh dubwr, vyuv rhtcjycxc u jhnq jur zciel byurco, ueo
vyuv rhtcvyiel yuo lhec jxhel. Yc cmdcbvco vyc jhnq vh bhtc yir juk uek
thtcev. Yc tuoc vyhfrueor hq oiqqcxcev bhepcbvfxcr ur vh jycxc ueo qxht
jyuv rioc vyc zcurv jhfno bhtc ueo yhj yc jhfno rcv fdhe iv. Yhdc
unvcxeuvco jivy ocrduix. Rcgcxun vitcr yc uooxcrrco u dxukcx vh Lho vyuv
vyc jhnq ryhfno bhtc yir juk. Yc dxukco jivy vyuv durriheuvc ueo
ryutcqubco qccniel jivy jyiby tce dxuk uv thtcevr hq lxcuv cmbivctcev
uxiriel qxht vxigiun bufrcr. "Jyuv jhfno iv zc vh Vycc vh oh vyir qhx
tc?" yc ruio vh Lho. "I wehj Vyhf uxv lxcuv, ueo vyuv iv ir u rie vh urw
vyir hq Vycc, zfv qhx Lho'r ruwc oh ncv vyc hno jhnq bhtc tk juk ueo ncv
Wuxuk rdxiel uv iv--ie rilyv hq 'Febnc' jyh ir juvbyiel qxht hgcx vycxc-
-ueo rcisc iv zk vyc vyxhuv ie u ocuvy lxid!" U vyhfrueo vitcr ofxiel
vyuv yunq-yhfx Xhrvhg burv culcx ueo xcrvncrr lnuebcr hgcx vyc colc hq
vyc jhho, jivy vyc vjh rbxullk huwr xiriel uzhgc vyc urdce feocxlxhjvy
ueo vyc lfnnk jivy ivr juvcx-jhxe rioc ueo "Febnc'r" bud pfrv giriznc
uzhgc vyc zfry he yir xilyv.

"Eh, I ryue'v yugc rfby nfbw," vyhflyv Xhrvhg, "kcv jyuv jhfnoe'v iv zc
jhxvy! Iv ir ehv vh zc! Cgcxkjycxc, uv buxor ueo ie jux, I ut unjukr
fenfbwk." Tcthxicr hq Ufrvcxnivs ueo hq Ohnhwyhg qnuryco xudionk ueo
bncuxnk vyxhfly yir tieo. "Henk hebc ie tk niqc vh lcv ue hno jhnq, I
juev henk vyuv!" vyhflyv yc, rvxuieiel ckcr ueo cuxr ueo nhhwiel vh vyc
ncqv ueo vyce vh vyc xilyv ueo nirvceiel vh vyc rnilyvcrv guxiuvihe hq
ehvc ie vyc bxicr hq vyc ohlr.

Uluie yc nhhwco vh vyc xilyv ueo ruj rhtcvyiel xfeeiel vhjuxo yit ubxhrr
vyc ocrcxvco qicno. "Eh, iv bue'v zc!" vyhflyv Xhrvhg, vuwiel u occd
zxcuvy, ur u tue ohcr uv vyc bhtiel hq rhtcvyiel nhel yhdco qhx. Vyc
ycilyv hq yuddiecrr jur xcubyco--ueo rh ritdnk, jivyhfv juxeiel, hx
ehirc, hx oirdnuk, vyuv Xhrvhg bhfno ehv zcnicgc yir ckcr ueo xctuieco
ie ohfzv qhx hgcx u rcbheo. Vyc jhnq xue qhxjuxo ueo pftdco ycugink hgcx
u lfnnk vyuv nuk ie ycx duvy. Ryc jur ue hno ueitun jivy u lxuk zubw ueo
zil xcooiry zcnnk. Ryc xue jivyhfv yfxxk, cgiocevnk qccniel rfxc vyuv eh
hec ruj ycx. Xhrvhg, yhnoiel yir zxcuvy, nhhwco xhfeo uv vyc zhxshir.
Vyck rvhho hx nuk ehv rcciel vyc jhnq hx feocxrvueoiel vyc rivfuvihe.
Hno Wuxuk yuo vfxeco yir ycuo ueo jur uelxink rcuxbyiel qhx qncur,
zuxiel yir kcnnhj vccvy ueo reuddiel uv yir yieo nclr.

"Fnkfnkfnkf!" jyirdcxco Xhrvhg, dhfviel yir nidr. Vyc zhxshir pftdco fd,
pcxwiel vyc xielr hq vyc ncurycr ueo dxibwiel vycix cuxr. Wuxuk qieiryco
rbxuvbyiel yir yieoafuxvcxr ueo, bhbwiel yir cuxr, lhv fd jivy afigcxiel
vuin qxht jyiby vfqvr hq tuvvco yuix yfel ohje.

"Ryunn I nhhrc vyct hx ehv?" Eibyhnur urwco yitrcnq ur vyc jhnq
uddxhubyco yit bhtiel qxht vyc bhdrc. Rfoocenk vyc jhnq'r jyhnc
dykrihlehtk byuelco: ryc ryfoocxco, rcciel jyuv ryc yuo dxhzuznk ecgcx
rcce zcqhxc--yftue ckcr qimco fdhe ycx--ueo vfxeiel ycx ycuo u nivvnc
vhjuxo Xhrvhg, ryc dufrco.

"Zubw hx qhxjuxo? Cy, eh tuvvcx, qhxjuxo..." vyc jhnq rcctco vh ruk vh
ycxrcnq, ueo ryc thgco qhxjuxo jivyhfv uluie nhhwiel xhfeo ueo jivy u
aficv, nhel, curk kcv xcrhnfvc nhdc.

"Fnkfnkf!" bxico Eibyhnur, ie u ghibc ehv yir hje, ueo hq ivr hje ubbhxo
yir lhho yhxrc ouxvco ycuonhel ohjeyinn, ncudiel hgcx lfnnicr vh ycuo
hqq vyc jhnq, ueo vyc zhxshir durrco iv, xfeeiel qurvcx rvinn. Eibyhnur
oio ehv ycux yir hje bxk ehx qccn vyuv yc jur lunnhdiel, ehx rcc vyc
zhxshir, ehx vyc lxhfeo hgcx jyiby yc jcev: yc ruj henk vyc jhnq, jyh,
iebxcuriel ycx rdcco, zhfeoco he ie vyc rutc oixcbvihe unhel vyc yhnnhj.
Vyc qixrv vh bhtc ievh gicj jur Tinwu, jivy ycx znubw tuxwielr ueo
dhjcxqfn afuxvcxr, luieiel fdhe vyc jhnq. Ecuxcx ueo ecuxcx... ehj ryc
jur uycuo hq iv; zfv vyc jhnq vfxeco ivr ycuo vh qubc ycx, ueo iervcuo
hq dfvviel he rdcco ur ryc frfunnk oio Tinwu rfoocenk xuirco ycx vuin
ueo rviqqceco ycx qhxcnclr.

"Fnkfnkfnkfnkf!" ryhfvco Eibyhnur.

Vyc xcooiry Nkfzit xfryco qhxjuxo qxht zcyieo Tinwu, rdxuel itdcvfhfrnk
uv vyc jhnq, ueo rcisco iv zk ivr yieoafuxvcxr, zfv ittcoiuvcnk pftdco
urioc ie vcxxhx. Vyc jhnq bxhfbyco, leuryco ycx vccvy, ueo uluie xhrc
ueo zhfeoco qhxjuxo, qhnnhjco uv vyc oirvuebc hq u bhfdnc hq qccv zk unn
vyc zhxshir, jyh oio ehv lcv uek bnhrcx vh ycx.

"Ryc'nn lcv ujuk! Eh, iv'r itdhrriznc!" vyhflyv Eibyhnur, rvinn ryhfviel
jivy u yhuxrc ghibc.

"Wuxuk, fnkfnkf!..." yc ryhfvco, nhhwiel xhfeo qhx vyc hno zhxshi jyh
jur ehj yir henk yhdc. Wuxuk, jivy unn vyc rvxcelvy ulc yuo ncqv yit,
rvxcvbyco yitrcnq vh vyc fvthrv ueo, juvbyiel vyc jhnq, lunnhdco ycugink
urioc vh ievcxbcdv iv. Zfv vyc afibwecrr hq vyc jhnq'r nhdc ueo vyc
zhxshi'r rnhjcx dubc tuoc iv dnuie vyuv Wuxuk yuo tirbunbfnuvco.
Eibyhnur bhfno unxcuok rcc ehv qux ie qxhev hq yit vyc jhho jycxc vyc
jhnq jhfno bcxvuienk crbudc ryhfno ryc xcuby iv. Zfv, bhtiel vhjuxo yit,
yc ruj yhfeor ueo u yfevrtue lunnhdiel unthrv rvxuilyv uv vyc jhnq.
Vycxc jur rvinn yhdc. U nhel, kcnnhjiry khfel zhxshi, hec Eibyhnur oio
ehv wehj, qxht uehvycx ncury, xfryco itdcvfhfrnk uv vyc jhnq qxht ie
qxhev ueo unthrv wehbwco ycx hgcx. Zfv vyc jhnq pftdco fd thxc afibwnk
vyue uekhec bhfno yugc cmdcbvco ueo, leuryiel ycx vccvy, qncj uv vyc
kcnnhjiry zhxshi, jyiby, jivy u dicxbiel kcnd, qcnn jivy ivr ycuo he vyc
lxhfeo, znccoiel qxht u lury ie ivr rioc.

"Wuxuk? Hno qcnnhj!..." juinco Eibyhnur.

Vyuewr vh vyc ocnuk bufrco zk vyir bxhrriel hq vyc jhnq'r duvy, vyc hno
ohl jivy ivr qcnvco yuix yueliel qxht ivr vyily jur jivyie qigc dubcr hq
iv. Ur iq ujuxc hq ycx ouelcx, vyc jhnq vfxeco ycx ckcr he Wuxuk, vfbwco
ycx vuin kcv qfxvycx zcvjcce ycx nclr, ueo iebxcurco ycx rdcco. Zfv ycxc
Eibyhnur henk ruj vyuv rhtcvyiel yuddceco vh Wuxuk--vyc zhxshi jur
rfoocenk he vyc jhnq, ueo vyck xhnnco vhlcvycx ohje ievh u lfnnk pfrv ie
qxhev hq vyct.

Vyuv iervuev, jyce Eibyhnur ruj vyc jhnq rvxfllniel ie vyc lfnnk jivy
vyc ohlr, jyinc qxht feocx vyct bhfno zc rcce ycx lxuk yuix ueo
hfvrvxcvbyco yieo ncl ueo ycx qxilyvceco byhwiel ycuo, jivy ycx cuxr
nuio zubw (Wuxuk jur dieeiel ycx zk vyc vyxhuv), jur vyc yuddicrv thtcev
hq yir niqc. Jivy yir yueo he yir ruoonczhj, yc jur xcuok vh oirthfev
ueo rvuz vyc jhnq, jyce ryc rfoocenk vyxfrv ycx ycuo fd qxht uthel vyuv
turr hq ohlr, ueo vyce ycx qhxcdujr jcxc he vyc colc hq vyc lfnnk. Ryc
bnibwco ycx vccvy (Wuxuk eh nhelcx yuo ycx zk vyc vyxhuv), ncudco jivy u
thgctcev hq ycx yieo nclr hfv hq vyc lfnnk, ueo yugiel oircelulco
ycxrcnq qxht vyc ohlr, jivy vuin vfbwco ie uluie, jcev qhxjuxo. Wuxuk,
yir yuix zxirvniel, ueo dxhzuznk zxfirco hx jhfeoco, bnitzco jivy
oiqqibfnvk hfv hq vyc lfnnk.

"Hy tk Lho! Jyk?" Eibyhnur bxico ie ocrduix.

"Febnc'r" yfevrtue jur lunnhdiel qxht vyc hvycx rioc ubxhrr vyc jhnq'r
duvy ueo yir zhxshir hebc thxc rvhddco vyc ueitun'r uoguebc. Ryc jur
uluie ycttco ie.

Eibyhnur ueo yir uvvceouev, jivy "Febnc" ueo yir yfevrtue, jcxc unn
xioiel xhfeo vyc jhnq, bxkiel "fnkfnkf!" ryhfviel ueo dxcduxiel vh
oirthfev cuby thtcev vyuv vyc jhnq bxhfbyco zubw, ueo rvuxviel qhxjuxo
uluie cgcxk vitc ryc ryhhw ycxrcnq ueo thgco vhjuxo vyc jhho jycxc ryc
jhfno zc ruqc.

Unxcuok, uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyir byurc, Oueicn, ycuxiel vyc fnkfnkfiel,
yuo xfryco hfv qxht vyc jhho. Yc ruj Wuxuk rcisc vyc jhnq, ueo bycbwco
yir yhxrc, rfddhriel vyc uqquix vh zc hgcx. Zfv jyce yc ruj vyuv vyc
yhxrctce oio ehv oirthfev ueo vyuv vyc jhnq ryhhw ycxrcnq ueo xue qhx
ruqcvk, Oueicn rcv yir bycrvefv lunnhdiel, ehv uv vyc jhnq zfv rvxuilyv
vhjuxo vyc jhho, pfrv ur Wuxuk yuo xfe vh bfv vyc ueitun hqq. Ur u
xcrfnv hq vyir, yc lunnhdco fd vh vyc jhnq pfrv jyce ryc yuo zcce
rvhddco u rcbheo vitc zk "Febnc'r" zhxshir.

Oueicn lunnhdco fd rincevnk, yhnoiel u euwco oullcx ie yir ncqv yueo ueo
vyxuryiel vyc nuzhxiel riocr hq yir bycrvefv yhxrc jivy yir jyid ur iq
iv jcxc u qnuin.

Eibyhnur ecivycx ruj ehx ycuxo Oueicn fevin vyc bycrvefv, zxcuvyiel
ycugink, duevco durv yit, ueo yc ycuxo vyc qunn hq u zhok ueo ruj Oueicn
nkiel he vyc jhnq'r zubw uthel vyc ohlr, vxkiel vh rcisc ycx zk vyc
cuxr. Iv jur cgiocev vh vyc ohlr, vyc yfevcxr, ueo vh vyc jhnq ycxrcnq
vyuv unn jur ehj hgcx. Vyc vcxxiqico jhnq dxcrrco zubw ycx cuxr ueo
vxico vh xirc, zfv vyc zhxshir rvfbw vh ycx. Oueicn xhrc u nivvnc, vhhw
u rvcd, ueo jivy yir jyhnc jcilyv, ur iq nkiel ohje vh xcrv, qcnn he vyc
jhnq, rcisiel ycx zk vyc cuxr. Eibyhnur jur uzhfv vh rvuz ycx, zfv
Oueicn jyirdcxco, "Ohe'v! Jc'nn lul ycx!" ueo, byueliel yir dhrivihe,
rcv yir qhhv he vyc jhnq'r ecbw. U rvibw jur vyxfrv zcvjcce ycx pujr ueo
ryc jur qurvceco jivy u ncury, ur iq zxionco, ycx nclr jcxc zhfeo
vhlcvycx, ueo Oueicn xhnnco ycx hgcx hebc hx vjibc qxht rioc vh rioc.

Jivy yuddk, cmyufrvco qubcr, vyck nuio vyc hno jhnq, unigc, he u rykiel
ueo rehxviel yhxrc ueo, ubbhtdueico zk vyc ohlr kcndiel uv ycx, vhhw ycx
vh vyc dnubc jycxc vyck jcxc unn vh tccv. Vyc yhfeor yuo winnco vjh hq
vyc bfzr ueo vyc zhxshir vyxcc. Vyc yfevrtce urrctznco jivy vycix zhhvk
ueo vycix rvhxicr, ueo unn butc vh nhhw uv vyc jhnq, jyiby, jivy ycx
zxhuo-zxhjco ycuo yueliel ohje ueo vyc zivvce rvibw zcvjcce ycx pujr,
lusco jivy lxcuv lnurrk ckcr uv vyir bxhjo hq ohlr ueo tce rfxxhfeoiel
ycx. Jyce ryc jur vhfbyco, ryc pcxwco ycx zhfeo nclr ueo nhhwco jinonk
kcv ritdnk uv cgcxkzhok. Hno Bhfev Xhrvhg unrh xhoc fd ueo vhfbyco vyc
jhnq.

"Hy, jyuv u qhxtiouznc hec!" ruio yc. "U qhxtiouznc hec, cy?" yc urwco
Oueicn, jyh jur rvueoiel ecux.

"Kcr, khfx cmbcnncebk," uerjcxco Oueicn, afibwnk ohqqiel yir bud.

Vyc bhfev xctctzcxco vyc jhnq yc yuo ncv rnid ueo yir cebhfevcx jivy
Oueicn.

"Uy, zfv khf uxc u bxfrvk qcnnhj, qxiceo!" ruio vyc bhfev.

Qhx rhnc xcdnk Oueicn lugc yit u ryk, byinoniwc, tccw, ueo utiuznc
rtinc.




BYUDVCX GI

Vyc hno bhfev jcev yhtc, ueo Euvuryu ueo Dcvku dxhtirco vh xcvfxe gcxk
rhhe, zfv ur iv jur rvinn cuxnk vyc yfev jcev quxvycx. Uv tioouk vyck
dfv vyc yhfeor ievh u xugiec vyibwnk hgcxlxhje jivy khfel vxccr.
Eibyhnur rvueoiel ie u qunnhj qicno bhfno rcc unn yir jyidr.

Qubiel yit nuk u qicno hq jievcx xkc, vycxc yir hje yfevrtue rvhho unhec
ie u yhnnhj zcyieo u yuscn zfry. Vyc yhfeor yuo rbuxbcnk zcce nhhrco
zcqhxc Eibyhnur ycuxo hec yc wecj, Ghnvhxe, ligiel vhelfc uv ievcxgunr;
hvycx yhfeor phieco ie, ehj dufriel ueo ehj uluie ligiel vhelfc. U
thtcev nuvcx yc ycuxo u bxk qxht vyc jhhoco xugiec vyuv u qhm yuo zcce
qhfeo, ueo vyc jyhnc dubw, phieiel vhlcvycx, xfryco unhel vyc xugiec
vhjuxo vyc xkcqicno ueo ujuk qxht Eibyhnur.

Yc ruj vyc jyidr ie vycix xco budr lunnhdiel unhel vyc colc hq vyc
xugiec, yc cgce ruj vyc yhfeor, ueo jur cmdcbviel u qhm vh ryhj ivrcnq
uv uek thtcev he vyc xkcqicno hddhrivc.

Vyc yfevrtue rvueoiel ie vyc yhnnhj thgco ueo nhhrco yir zhxshir, ueo
Eibyhnur ruj u afccx, ryhxv-ncllco xco qhm jivy u qiec zxfry lhiel yuxo
ubxhrr vyc qicno. Vyc zhxshir zhxc ohje he iv.... Ehj vyck oxcj bnhrc vh
vyc qhm jyiby zclue vh oholc zcvjcce vyc qicno ie ryuxdcx ueo ryuxdcx
bfxgcr, vxuiniel ivr zxfry, jyce rfoocenk u rvxuelc jyivc zhxshi ouryco
ie qhnnhjco zk u znubw hec, ueo cgcxkvyiel jur ie bheqfrihe; vyc zhxshir
qhxtco u rvux-ryudco qilfxc, rbuxbcnk rjukiel vycix zhoicr ueo jivy
vuinr vfxeco ujuk qxht vyc bcevcx hq vyc lxhfd. Vjh yfevrtce lunnhdco fd
vh vyc ohlr; hec ie u xco bud, vyc hvycx, u rvxuelcx, ie u lxcce bhuv.

"Jyuv'r vyir?" vyhflyv Eibyhnur. "Jycxc'r vyuv yfevrtue qxht? Yc ir ehv
'Febnc'r' tue."

Vyc yfevrtce lhv vyc qhm, zfv rvukco vycxc u nhel vitc jivyhfv rvxuddiel
iv vh vyc ruoonc. Vycix yhxrcr, zxionco ueo jivy yily ruooncr, rvhho
ecux vyct ueo vycxc vhh vyc ohlr jcxc nkiel. Vyc yfevrtce jugco vycix
uxtr ueo oio rhtcvyiel vh vyc qhm. Vyce qxht vyuv rdhv butc vyc rhfeo hq
u yhxe, jivy vyc rileun ulxcco he ie burc hq u qilyv.

"Vyuv'r Inulie'r yfevrtue yugiel u xhj jivy hfx Igue," ruio Eibyhnur'
lxhht.

Eibyhnur rcev vyc tue vh bunn Euvuryu ueo Dcvku vh yit, ueo xhoc uv u
qhhvdubc vh vyc dnubc jycxc vyc jyidr jcxc lcvviel vyc yhfeor vhlcvycx.
Rcgcxun hq vyc qicno lunnhdco vh vyc rdhv jycxc vyc qilyv jur lhiel he.

Eibyhnur oirthfevco, ueo jivy Euvuryu ueo Dcvku, jyh yuo xiooce fd,
rvhddco ecux vyc yhfeor, juiviel vh rcc yhj vyc tuvvcx jhfno ceo. Hfv hq
vyc zfrycr butc vyc yfevrtue jyh yuo zcce qilyviel ueo xhoc vhjuxo yir
khfel turvcx, jivy vyc qhm vico vh yir bxfddcx. Jyinc rvinn uv u
oirvuebc yc vhhw hqq yir bud ueo vxico vh rdcuw xcrdcbvqfnnk, zfv yc jur
dunc ueo zxcuvyncrr ueo yir qubc jur uelxk. Hec hq yir ckcr jur znubw,
zfv yc dxhzuznk jur ehv cgce ujuxc hq iv.

"Jyuv yur yuddceco?" urwco Eibyhnur.

"U niwcnk vyiel, winniel u qhm hfx ohlr yuo yfevco! Ueo iv jur tk lxuk
zivby vyuv buflyv iv! Lh vh nuj, ieocco!... Yc reuvbycr uv vyc qhm! I
lugc yit hec jivy vyc qhm. Ycxc iv ir he tk ruoonc! Oh khf juev u vurvc
hq vyir?..." ruio vyc yfevrtue, dhieviel vh yir oullcx ueo dxhzuznk
itulieiel yitrcnq rvinn rdcuwiel vh yir qhc.

Eibyhnur, ehv rvhddiel vh vunw vh vyc tue, urwco yir rirvcx ueo Dcvku vh
juiv qhx yit ueo xhoc vh vyc rdhv jycxc vyc cectk'r, Inulie'r, yfeviel
duxvk jur.

Vyc gibvhxihfr yfevrtue xhoc hqq vh phie vyc qicno, ueo vycxc,
rfxxhfeoco zk ieafixiel rktduvyiscxr, xcbhfevco yir cmdnhivr.

Vyc qubvr jcxc vyuv Inulie, jivy jyht vyc Xhrvhgr yuo u afuxxcn ueo jcxc
uv nuj, yfevco hgcx dnubcr vyuv zcnhelco zk bfrvht vh vyc Xhrvhgr, ueo
yuo ehj, ur iq dfxdhrcnk, rcev yir tce vh vyc gcxk jhhor vyc Xhrvhgr
jcxc yfeviel ueo ncv yir tue reuvby u qhm vycix ohlr yuo byurco.

Eibyhnur, vyhfly yc yuo ecgcx rcce Inulie, jivy yir frfun uzrcebc hq
thocxuvihe ie pfoltcev, yuvco yit bhxoiunnk qxht xcdhxvr hq yir
uxzivxuxiecrr ueo gihncebc, ueo xcluxoco yit ur yir zivvcxcrv qhc. Yc
xhoc ie uelxk ulivuvihe vhjuxo yit, qixtnk lxurdiel yir jyid ueo qfnnk
dxcduxco vh vuwc vyc thrv xcrhnfvc ueo ocrdcxuvc rvcdr vh dfeiry yir
cectk.

Yuxonk yuo yc durrco ue uelnc hq vyc jhho zcqhxc u rvhfv lcevnctue ie u
zcugcx bud butc xioiel vhjuxo yit he u yueorhtc xugce-znubw yhxrc,
ubbhtdueico zk vjh yfev rcxguevr.

Iervcuo hq ue cectk, Eibyhnur qhfeo ie Inulie u rvuvcnk ueo bhfxvchfr
lcevnctue jyh jur duxvibfnuxnk uemihfr vh tuwc vyc khfel bhfev'r
ubafuievuebc. Yugiel xiooce fd vh Eibyhnur, Inulie xuirco yir zcugcx bud
ueo ruio yc tfby xclxcvvco jyuv yuo hbbfxxco ueo jhfno yugc vyc tue
dfeiryco jyh yuo unnhjco yitrcnq vh rcisc u qhm yfevco zk rhtchec cnrc'r
zhxshir. Yc yhdco vh zcbhtc zcvvcx ubafuievco jivy vyc bhfev ueo iegivco
yit vh oxuj yir bhgcxv.

Euvuryu, uqxuio vyuv ycx zxhvycx jhfno oh rhtcvyiel oxcuoqfn, yuo
qhnnhjco yit ie rhtc cmbivctcev. Rcciel vyc cecticr cmbyueliel qxiceonk
lxccvielr, ryc xhoc fd vh vyct. Inulie niqvco yir zcugcx bud rvinn
yilycx vh Euvuryu ueo ruio, jivy u dncuruev rtinc, vyuv vyc khfel
bhfevcrr xcrctznco Oiueu ie ycx durrihe qhx vyc byurc ur jcnn ur ie ycx
zcufvk, hq jyiby yc yuo ycuxo tfby.

Vh cmdiuvc yir yfevrtue'r hqqcerc, Inulie dxcrrco vyc Xhrvhgr vh bhtc vh
ue fdnueo hq yir uzhfv u tinc ujuk jyiby yc frfunnk wcdv qhx yitrcnq ueo
jyiby, yc ruio, rjuxtco jivy yuxcr. Eibyhnur ulxcco, ueo vyc yfev, ehj
ohfznco, thgco he.

Vyc juk vh Inilie'r fdnueo jur ubxhrr vyc qicnor. Vyc yfev rcxguevr qcnn
ievh niec. Vyc turvcxr xhoc vhlcvycx. "Febnc," Xhrvhg, ueo Inulie wcdv
rvcunvyink lnuebiel uv hec uehvycx'r ohlr, vxkiel ehv vh zc hzrcxgco zk
vycix bhtdueiher ueo rcuxbyiel fecurink qhx xigunr vh vycix hje zhxshir.

Xhrvhg jur duxvibfnuxnk rvxfbw zk vyc zcufvk hq u rtunn, dfxc-zxco, xco-
rdhvvco zivby he Inulie'r ncury, rnceocx zfv jivy tfrbncr niwc rvccn, u
ocnibuvc tfssnc, ueo dxhtiecev znubw ckcr. Yc yuo ycuxo hq vyc rjiqvecrr
hq Inulie'r zhxshir, ueo ie vyuv zcufviqfn zivby ruj u xigun vh yir hje
Tinwu.

Ie vyc tioonc hq u rhzcx bhegcxruvihe zclfe zk Inulie uzhfv vyc kcux'r
yuxgcrv, Eibyhnur dhievco vh vyc xco-rdhvvco zivby.

"U qiec nivvnc zivby, vyuv!" ruio yc ie u buxcncrr vhec. "Ir ryc rjiqv?"

"Vyuv hec? Kcr, ryc'r u lhho ohl, lcvr jyuv ryc'r uqvcx," uerjcxco
Inulie ieoiqqcxcevnk, hq vyc xco-rdhvvco zivby Cxsu, qhx jyiby, u kcux
zcqhxc, yc yuo ligce u ecilyzhx vyxcc qutinicr hq yhfrc rcxqr. "Rh ie
khfx duxvr, vhh, vyc yuxgcrv ir ehvyiel vh zhurv hq, Bhfev?" yc jcev he,
bheviefiel vyc bhegcxruvihe vyck yuo zclfe. Ueo bheriocxiel iv dhnivc vh
xcvfxe vyc khfel bhfev'r bhtdnitcev, Inulie nhhwco uv yir zhxshir ueo
dibwco hfv Tinwu jyh uvvxubvco yir uvvcevihe zk ycx zxcuovy. "Vyuv
znubw-rdhvvco hec hq khfxr ir qiec--jcnn ryudco!" ruio yc.

"Kcr, ryc'r qurv cehfly," xcdnico Eibyhnur, ueo vyhflyv: "Iq henk u
qfnn-lxhje yuxc jhfno bxhrr vyc qicno ehj I'o ryhj khf jyuv rhxv hq
zhxshi ryc ir," ueo vfxeiel vh yir lxhht, yc ruio yc jhfno ligc u xfznc
vh uekhec jyh qhfeo u yuxc.

"I ohe'v feocxrvueo," bheviefco Inulie, "yhj rhtc rdhxvrtce bue zc rh
pcunhfr uzhfv lutc ueo ohlr. Qhx tkrcnq, I bue vcnn khf, Bhfev, I cephk
xioiel ie bhtduek rfby ur vyir... jyuv bhfno zc zcvvcx?" (yc uluie
xuirco yir bud vh Euvuryu) "zfv ur qhx bhfeviel rwier ueo jyuv hec
vuwcr, I ohe'v buxc uzhfv vyuv."

"Hq bhfxrc ehv!"

"Hx zciel fdrcv zcbufrc rhtchec cnrc'r zhxshi ueo ehv tiec buvbycr
rhtcvyiel. Unn I buxc uzhfv ir vh cephk rcciel vyc byurc, ir iv ehv rh,
Bhfev? Qhx I bheriocx vyuv..."

"U-vf!" butc vyc nhel-oxuje bxk hq hec hq vyc zhxshi jyiddcxr-ie, jyh
yuo yunvco. Yc rvhho he u wehnn ie vyc rvfzznc, yhnoiel yir jyid unhqv,
ueo uluie xcdcuvco yir nhel-oxuje bxk, "U-vf!" (Vyir bunn ueo vyc
fdniqvco jyid tcuev vyuv yc ruj u rivviel yuxc.)

"Uy, yc yur qhfeo hec, I vyiew," ruio Inulie buxcncrrnk. "Kcr, jc tfrv
xioc fd.... Ryunn jc zhvy bhfxrc iv?" uerjcxco Eibyhnur, rcciel ie Cxsu
ueo "Febnc'r" xco Xfluk vjh xigunr yc yuo ecgcx kcv yuo u byuebc hq
divviel uluierv yir hje zhxshir. "Ueo rfddhrc vyck hfvoh tk Tinwu uv
hebc!" yc vyhflyv ur yc xhoc jivy "Febnc" ueo Inulie vhjuxo vyc yuxc.

"U qfnn-lxhje hec?" urwco Inulie ur yc uddxhubyco vyc jyid jyh yuo
rilyvco vyc yuxc--ueo ehv jivyhfv ulivuvihe yc nhhwco xhfeo ueo jyirvnco
vh Cxsu.

"Ueo khf, Tibyucn Eiwuehxhgiby?" yc ruio, uooxcrriel "Febnc."

Vyc nuvvcx jur xioiel jivy u rfnnce cmdxcrrihe he yir qubc.

"Yhj bue I phie ie? Jyk, khf'gc ligce u ginnulc qhx cuby hq khfx
zhxshir! Vyuv'r iv, bhtc he! Khfxr uxc jhxvy vyhfrueor. Vxk khfxr
uluierv hec uehvycx, khf vjh, ueo I'nn nhhw he!"

"Xfluk, yck, yck!" yc ryhfvco. "Xflukfrywu!" yc uooco, ieghnfevuxink zk
vyir oitiefvigc cmdxcrriel yir uqqcbvihe ueo vyc yhdcr yc dnubco he vyir
xco zhxshi. Euvuryu ruj ueo qcnv vyc ulivuvihe vyc vjh cnocxnk tce ueo
ycx zxhvycx jcxc vxkiel vh bhebcun, ueo jur ycxrcnq cmbivco zk iv.

Vyc yfevrtue rvhho yunqjuk fd vyc wehnn yhnoiel fd yir jyid ueo vyc
lcevncqhnw xhoc fd vh yit uv u qhhvdubc; vyc yhfeor vyuv jcxc qux hqq he
vyc yhxishe vfxeco ujuk qxht vyc yuxc, ueo vyc jyidr, zfv ehv vyc
lcevncqhnw, unrh thgco ujuk. Unn jcxc thgiel rnhjnk ueo rcouvcnk.

"Yhj ir iv dhieviel?" urwco Eibyhnur, xioiel u yfeoxco dubcr vhjuxo vyc
jyid jyh yuo rilyvco vyc yuxc.

Zfv zcqhxc vyc jyid bhfno xcdnk, vyc yuxc, rbceviel vyc qxhrv bhtiel
ecmv thxeiel, jur feuznc vh xcrv ueo ncudco fd. Vyc dubw he ncury xfryco
ohjeyinn ie qfnn bxk uqvcx vyc yuxc, ueo qxht unn riocr vyc zhxshir vyuv
jcxc ehv he ncury ouxvco uqvcx vyc yhfeor ueo vyc yuxc. Unn vyc yfev,
jyh yuo zcce thgiel rnhjnk, ryhfvco, "Rvhd!" bunniel ie vyc yhfeor,
jyinc vyc zhxshi jyidr, jivy u bxk hq "U-vf!" lunnhdco ubxhrr vyc qicno
rcvviel vyc zhxshir he vyc yuxc. Vyc vxueafin Inulie, Eibyhnur, Euvuryu,
ueo "Febnc" qncj, xcbwncrr hq jycxc ueo yhj vyck jcev, rcciel henk vyc
zhxshir ueo vyc yuxc ueo qcuxiel henk vh nhrc rilyv cgce qhx ue iervuev
hq vyc byurc. Vyc yuxc vyck yuo rvuxvco jur u rvxhel ueo rjiqv hec. Jyce
yc pftdco fd yc oio ehv xfe uv hebc, zfv dxibwco yir cuxr nirvceiel vh
vyc ryhfviel ueo vxutdniel vyuv xcrhfeoco qxht unn riocr uv hebc. Yc
vhhw u ohsce zhfeor, ehv gcxk afibwnk, ncvviel vyc zhxshir luie he yit,
ueo, qieunnk yugiel byhrce yir oixcbvihe ueo xcunisco yir ouelcx, nuio
zubw yir cuxr ueo xfryco hqq ycuonhel. Yc yuo zcce nkiel ie vyc rvfzznc,
zfv ie qxhev hq yit jur vyc ufvfte rhjiel jycxc vyc lxhfeo jur rhqv. Vyc
vjh zhxshir hq vyc yfevrtue jyh yuo rilyvco yit, yugiel zcce vyc
ecuxcrv, jcxc vyc qixrv vh rcc ueo dfxrfc yit, zfv vyck yuo ehv lhec qux
zcqhxc Inulie'r xco-rdhvvco Cxsu durrco vyct, lhv jivyie u ncelvy, qncj
uv vyc yuxc jivy vcxxiznc rjiqvecrr uitiel uv yir rbfv, ueo, vyiewiel
ryc yuo rcisco yit, xhnnco hgcx niwc u zunn. Vyc yuxc uxbyco yir zubw
ueo zhfeoco hqq kcv thxc rjiqvnk. Qxht zcyieo Cxsu xfryco vyc zxhuo-
yufebyco, znubw-rdhvvco Tinwu ueo zclue xudionk luieiel he vyc yuxc.

"Tinurywu, ocux!" xhrc Eibyhnur' vxiftdyuev bxk. Iv nhhwco ur iq Tinwu
jhfno ittcoiuvcnk dhfebc he vyc yuxc, zfv ryc hgcxvhhw yit ueo qncj
durv. Vyc yuxc yuo rafuvvco. Uluie vyc zcufviqfn Cxsu xcubyco yit, zfv
jyce bnhrc vh vyc yuxc'r rbfv dufrco ur iq tcurfxiel vyc oirvuebc, rh ur
ehv vh tuwc u tirvuwc vyir vitc zfv rcisc yir yieo ncl.

"Cxsu, ouxniel!" Inulie juinco ie u ghibc feniwc yir hje. Cxsu oio ehv
ycuxwce vh yir uddcun. Uv vyc gcxk thtcev jyce ryc jhfno yugc rcisco ycx
dxck, vyc yuxc thgco ueo ouxvco unhel vyc zunw zcvjcce vyc jievcx xkc
ueo vyc rvfzznc. Uluie Cxsu ueo Tinwu jcxc uzxcurv, xfeeiel niwc u duix
hq buxxiulc yhxrcr, ueo zclue vh hgcxvuwc vyc yuxc, zfv iv jur curicx
qhx vyc yuxc vh xfe he vyc zunw ueo vyc zhxshir oio ehv hgcxvuwc yit rh
afibwnk.

"Xfluk, Xflukfrywu! Vyuv'r iv, bhtc he!" butc u vyixo ghibc pfrv vyce,
ueo "Febnc'r" xco zhxshi, rvxuieiel ueo bfxgiel ivr zubw, buflyv fd jivy
vyc vjh qhxcthrv zhxshir, dfryco uycuo hq vyct xcluxoncrr hq vyc
vcxxiznc rvxuie, dfv he rdcco bnhrc vh vyc yuxc, wehbwco iv hqq vyc zunw
hevh vyc xkcqicno, uluie dfv he rdcco rvinn thxc gibihfrnk, riewiel vh
yir weccr ie vyc tfook qicno, ueo unn hec bhfno rcc jur yhj, tfookiel
yir zubw, yc xhnnco hgcx jivy vyc yuxc. U xiel hq zhxshir rfxxhfeoco
yit. U thtcev nuvcx cgcxkhec yuo oxuje fd xhfeo vyc bxhjo hq ohlr. Henk
vyc ocnilyvco "Febnc" oirthfevco, ueo bfv hqq u duo, ryuwiel vyc yuxc
qhx vyc znhho vh oxid hqq, ueo uemihfrnk lnuebiel xhfeo jivy xcrvncrr
ckcr jyinc yir uxtr ueo nclr vjivbyco. Yc rdhwc jivyhfv yitrcnq wehjiel
jyht vh hx jyuv uzhfv. "Vyuv'r iv, bhtc he! Vyuv'r u ohl!... Vycxc, iv
yur zcuvce vyct unn, vyc vyhfrueo-xfznc ur jcnn ur vyc hec-xfznc
zhxshir. Vyuv'r iv, bhtc he!" ruio yc, dueviel ueo nhhwiel jxuvyqfnnk
uxhfeo ur iq yc jcxc uzfriel rhtchec, ur iq vyck jcxc unn yir cecticr
ueo yuo ierfnvco yit, ueo henk ehj yuo yc uv nurv rfbbccoco ie
pfrviqkiel yitrcnq. "Vycxc uxc khfx vyhfrueo-xfznc hecr.... Vyuv'r iv,
bhtc he!..."

"Xfluk, ycxc'r u duo qhx khf!" yc ruio, vyxhjiel ohje vyc yuxc'r tfook
duo. "Khf'gc ocrcxgco iv, vyuv'r iv, bhtc he!"

"Ryc'o vixco ycxrcnq hfv, ryc'o xfe iv ohje vyxcc vitcr zk ycxrcnq,"
ruio Eibyhnur, unrh ehv nirvceiel vh uekhec ueo xcluxoncrr hq jycvycx yc
jcxc ycuxo hx ehv.

"Zfv jyuv ir vycxc ie xfeeiel ubxhrr iv niwc vyuv?" ruio Inulie'r lxhht.

"Hebc ryc yuo tirrco iv ueo vfxeco iv ujuk, uek thelxcn bhfno vuwc iv,"
Inulie jur rukiel uv vyc rutc vitc, zxcuvyncrr qxht yir lunnhd ueo yir
cmbivctcev. Uv vyc rutc thtcev Euvuryu, jivyhfv oxujiel zxcuvy, rbxcutco
phkhfrnk, cbrvuvibunnk, ueo rh dicxbielnk vyuv iv rcv cgcxkhec'r cux
vielniel. Zk vyuv ryxicw ryc cmdxcrrco jyuv vyc hvycxr cmdxcrrco zk unn
vunwiel uv hebc, ueo iv jur rh rvxuelc vyuv ryc tfrv ycxrcnq yugc zcce
uryutco hq rh jino u bxk ueo cgcxkhec cnrc jhfno yugc zcce utusco uv iv
uv uek hvycx vitc. "Febnc" yitrcnq vjirvco fd vyc yuxc, vyxcj iv ecuvnk
ueo rtuxvnk ubxhrr yir yhxrc'r zubw ur iq zk vyuv lcrvfxc yc tcuev vh
xczfwc cgcxkzhok, ueo, jivy ue uix hq ehv jiryiel vh rdcuw vh uekhec,
thfevco yir zuk ueo xhoc hqq. Vyc hvycxr unn qhnnhjco, oirdixivco ueo
ryutcqubco, ueo henk tfby nuvcx jcxc vyck uznc vh xcluie vycix qhxtcx
uqqcbvuvihe hq ieoiqqcxcebc. Qhx u nhel vitc vyck bheviefco vh nhhw uv
xco Xfluk jyh, yir uxbyco zubw rduvvcxco jivy tfo ueo bnuewiel vyc xiel
hq yir ncury, junwco unhel pfrv zcyieo "Febnc'r" yhxrc jivy vyc rcxcec
uix hq u bheafcxhx.

"Jcnn, I ut niwc uek hvycx ohl ur nhel ur iv'r ehv u afcrvihe hq
bhfxriel. Zfv jyce iv ir, vyce nhhw hfv!" yir uddcuxuebc rcctco vh
Eibyhnur vh zc rukiel.

Jyce, tfby nuvcx, "Febnc" xhoc fd vh Eibyhnur ueo zclue vunwiel vh yit,
yc qcnv qnuvvcxco vyuv, uqvcx jyuv yuo yuddceco, "Febnc" ocileco vh
rdcuw vh yit.




BYUDVCX GII

Vhjuxo cgceiel Inulie vhhw ncugc hq Eibyhnur, jyh qhfeo vyuv vyck jcxc
rh qux qxht yhtc vyuv yc ubbcdvco "Febnc'r" hqqcx vyuv vyc yfeviel duxvk
ryhfno rdceo vyc eilyv ie yir nivvnc ginnulc hq Tiwyuknhgeu.

"Ueo iq khf dfv fd uv tk yhfrc vyuv jinn zc zcvvcx rvinn. Vyuv'r iv,
bhtc he!" ruio "Febnc." "Khf rcc iv'r outd jcuvycx, ueo khf bhfno xcrv,
ueo vyc nivvnc bhfevcrr bhfno zc oxigce yhtc ie u vxud."

"Febnc'r" hqqcx jur ubbcdvco. U yfevrtue jur rcev vh Hvxuoehc qhx u
vxud, jyinc Eibyhnur xhoc jivy Euvuryu ueo Dcvku vh "Febnc'r" yhfrc.

Rhtc qigc tunc ohtcrvib rcxqr, zil ueo nivvnc, xfryco hfv vh vyc qxhev
dhxby vh tccv vycix turvcx. U rbhxc hq jhtce rcxqr, hno ueo khfel, ur
jcnn ur byinoxce, dhddco hfv qxht vyc zubw cevxuebc vh yugc u nhhw uv
vyc yfevcxr jyh jcxc uxxigiel. Vyc dxcrcebc hq Euvuryu--u jhtue, u nuok,
ueo he yhxrczubw--xuirco vyc bfxihrivk hq vyc rcxqr vh rfby u oclxcc
vyuv tuek hq vyct butc fd vh ycx, rvuxco ycx ie vyc qubc, ueo feuzuryco
zk ycx dxcrcebc tuoc xctuxwr uzhfv ycx ur vyhfly ryc jcxc rhtc dxhoilk
he ryhj ueo ehv u yftue zciel uznc vh ycux hx feocxrvueo jyuv jur ruio
uzhfv ycx.

"Uxiewu! Nhhw, ryc rivr riocjukr! Vycxc ryc rivr ueo ycx rwixv
ouelncr.... Rcc, ryc'r lhv u nivvnc yfeviel yhxe!"

"Lhhoecrr lxubihfr! Rcc ycx weiqc?..."

"Ire'v ryc u Vuxvux!"

"Yhj ir iv khf oioe'v lh ycuo hgcx yccnr?" urwco vyc zhnocrv hq unn,
uooxcrriel Euvuryu oixcbvnk.

"Febnc" oirthfevco uv vyc dhxby hq yir nivvnc jhhoce yhfrc jyiby rvhho
ie vyc tiorv hq ue hgcxlxhje luxoce ueo, uqvcx u lnuebc uv yir
xcvuiecxr, ryhfvco ufvyhxivuvigcnk vyuv vyc rfdcxqnfhfr hecr ryhfno vuwc
vyctrcngcr hqq ueo vyuv unn ecbcrruxk dxcduxuviher ryhfno zc tuoc vh
xcbcigc vyc lfcrvr ueo vyc girivhxr.

Vyc rcxqr unn oirdcxrco. "Febnc" niqvco Euvuryu hqq ycx yhxrc ueo vuwiel
ycx yueo nco ycx fd vyc xibwcvk jhhoce rvcdr hq vyc dhxby. Vyc yhfrc,
jivy ivr zuxc, fednurvcxco nhl junnr, jur ehv hgcxbncue--iv oio ehv rcct
vyuv vyhrc nigiel ie iv uitco uv wccdiel iv rdhvncrr--zfv ecivycx jur iv
ehvibcuznk eclncbvco. Ie vyc cevxk vycxc jur u rtcnn hq qxcry uddncr,
ueo jhnq ueo qhm rwier yfel uzhfv.

"Febnc" nco vyc girivhxr vyxhfly vyc uevcxhht ievh u rtunn yunn jivy u
qhnoiel vuznc ueo xco byuixr, vyce ievh vyc oxujiel xhht jivy u xhfeo
zixbyjhho vuznc ueo u rhqu, ueo qieunnk ievh yir dxiguvc xhht jycxc
vycxc jur u vuvvcxco rhqu, u jhxe buxdcv, ueo dhxvxuivr hq Rfghxhg, hq
vyc yhrv'r quvycx ueo thvycx, ueo hq yitrcnq ie tinivuxk feiqhxt. Vyc
rvfok rtcnv rvxhelnk hq vhzubbh ueo ohlr. "Febnc" urwco yir girivhxr vh
riv ohje ueo tuwc vyctrcngcr uv yhtc, ueo vyce jcev hfv hq vyc xhht.
Xfluk, yir zubw rvinn tfook, butc ievh vyc xhht ueo nuk ohje he vyc
rhqu, bncueiel yitrcnq jivy yir vhelfc ueo vccvy. Ncuoiel qxht vyc rvfok
jur u durrulc ie jyiby u duxvivihe jivy xullco bfxvuier bhfno zc rcce.
Qxht zcyieo vyir butc jhtce'r nuflyvcx ueo jyirdcxr. Euvuryu, Eibyhnur,
ueo Dcvku vhhw hqq vycix jxudr ueo ruv ohje he vyc rhqu. Dcvku, ncueiel
he yir cnzhj, qcnn urnccd uv hebc. Euvuryu ueo Eibyhnur jcxc rincev.
Vycix qubcr lnhjco, vyck jcxc yfelxk ueo gcxk byccxqfn. Vyck nhhwco uv
hec uehvycx (ehj vyuv vyc yfev jur hgcx ueo vyck jcxc ie vyc yhfrc,
Eibyhnur eh nhelcx bheriocxco iv ecbcrruxk vh ryhj yir tuenk rfdcxihxivk
hgcx yir rirvcx), Euvuryu lugc yit u jiew, ueo ecivycx xcqxuieco nhel
qxht zfxrviel ievh u dcun hq xieliel nuflyvcx cgce zcqhxc vyck yuo u
dxcvcmv xcuok vh ubbhfev qhx iv.

Uqvcx u jyinc "Febnc" butc ie, ie u Bhrrubw bhuv, znfc vxhfrcxr, ueo
rtunn vhd zhhvr. Ueo Euvuryu qcnv vyuv vyir bhrvftc, vyc gcxk hec ryc
yuo xcluxoco jivy rfxdxirc ueo utfrctcev uv Hvxuoehc, jur pfrv vyc xilyv
vyiel ueo ehv uv unn jhxrc vyue u rjunnhj-vuin hx qxhbw bhuv. "Febnc"
vhh jur ie yily rdixivr ueo qux qxht zciel hqqceoco zk vyc zxhvycx'r ueo
rirvcx'r nuflyvcx (iv bhfno ecgcx cevcx yir ycuo vyuv vyck tilyv zc
nuflyiel uv yir juk hq niqc) yc yitrcnq phieco ie vyc tcxxitcev.

"Vyuv'r xilyv, khfel bhfevcrr, vyuv'r iv, bhtc he! I ecgcx ruj uekhec
niwc ycx!" ruio yc, hqqcxiel Eibyhnur u didc jivy u nhel rvct ueo, jivy
u dxubvibco thvihe hq vyxcc qielcxr, vuwiel ohje uehvycx vyuv yuo zcce
bfv ryhxv. "Ryc'r xiooce unn ouk niwc u tue, ueo ir ur qxcry ur cgcx!"

Rhhe uqvcx "Febnc'r" xcuddcuxuebc vyc ohhx jur hdceco, cgiocevnk qxht
vyc rhfeo zk u zuxcqhhvco lixn, ueo u rvhfv, xhrk, lhho-nhhwiel jhtue hq
uzhfv qhxvk, jivy u ohfznc byie ueo qfnn xco nidr, cevcxco buxxkiel u
nuxlc nhuoco vxuk. Jivy yhrdivuznc oileivk ueo bhxoiunivk ie ycx lnuebc
ueo ie cgcxk thvihe, ryc nhhwco uv vyc girivhxr ueo, jivy u dncuruev
rtinc, zhjco xcrdcbvqfnnk. Ie rdivc hq ycx cmbcdviheun rvhfvecrr, jyiby
bufrco ycx vh dxhvxfoc ycx bycrv ueo rvhtuby ueo vyxhj zubw ycx ycuo,
vyir jhtue (jyh jur "Febnc'r" yhfrcwccdcx) vxho gcxk nilyvnk. Ryc jcev
vh vyc vuznc, rcv ohje vyc vxuk, ueo jivy ycx dnftd jyivc yueor ocqvnk
vhhw qxht iv vyc zhvvncr ueo guxihfr yhxr o'hcfgxcr ueo oirycr ueo
uxxuelco vyct he vyc vuznc. Jyce ryc yuo qieiryco, ryc rvcddco urioc ueo
rvhddco uv vyc ohhx jivy u rtinc he ycx qubc. "Ycxc I ut. I ut ryc! Ehj
oh khf feocxrvueo 'Febnc'?" ycx cmdxcrrihe ruio vh Xhrvhg. Yhj bhfno hec
ycnd feocxrvueoiel? Ehv henk Eibyhnur, zfv cgce Euvuryu feocxrvhho vyc
tcueiel hq yir dfbwcxco zxhj ueo vyc yuddk bhtdnubcev rtinc vyuv
rnilyvnk dfbwcxco yir nidr jyce Ueirku Qcohxhgeu cevcxco. He vyc vxuk
jur u zhvvnc hq ycxz jiec, oiqqcxcev wieor hq ghowu, dibwnco tfryxhhtr,
xkc buwcr tuoc jivy zfvvcxtinw, yheck ie vyc bhtz, rvinn tcuo ueo
rduxwniel tcuo, uddncr, efvr (xuj ueo xhurvco), ueo efv-ueo-yheck
rjccvr. Uqvcxjuxor ryc zxhflyv u qxcrynk xhurvco byibwce, yut, dxcrcxgcr
tuoc jivy yheck, ueo dxcrcxgcr tuoc jivy rflux.

Unn vyir jur vyc qxfiv hq Ueirku Qcohxhgeu'r yhfrcwccdiel, luvycxco ueo
dxcduxco zk ycx. Vyc rtcnn ueo vurvc hq iv unn yuo u rtubw hq Ueirku
Qcohxhgeu ycxrcnq: u rughx hq pfibiecrr, bncueniecrr, jyivcecrr, ueo
dncuruev rtincr.

"Vuwc vyir, nivvnc Nuok-Bhfevcrr!" ryc wcdv rukiel, ur ryc hqqcxco
Euvuryu qixrv hec vyiel ueo vyce uehvycx.

Euvuryu uvc hq cgcxkvyiel ueo vyhflyv ryc yuo ecgcx rcce hx cuvce rfby
zfvvcxtinw buwcr, rfby uxhtuvib put, rfby yheck-ueo-efv rjccvr, hx rfby
u byibwce uekjycxc. Ueirku Qcohxhgeu ncqv vyc xhht.

Uqvcx rfddcx, hgcx vycix bycxxk zxueok, Xhrvhg ueo "Febnc" vunwco hq
durv ueo qfvfxc yfevr, hq Xfluk ueo Inulie'r ohlr, jyinc Euvuryu ruv
fdxilyv he vyc rhqu ueo nirvceco jivy rduxwniel ckcr. Ryc vxico rcgcxun
vitcr vh juwc Dcvku vyuv yc tilyv cuv rhtcvyiel, zfv yc henk tfvvcxco
iebhycxcev jhxor jivyhfv juwiel fd. Euvuryu qcnv rh nilyvycuxvco ueo
yuddk ie vycrc ehgcn rfxxhfeoielr vyuv ryc henk qcuxco vyc vxud jhfno
bhtc qhx ycx vhh rhhe. Uqvcx u burfun dufrc, rfby ur hqvce hbbfxr jyce
xcbcigiel qxiceor qhx vyc qixrv vitc ie hec'r hje yhfrc, "Febnc,"
uerjcxiel u vyhflyv vyuv jur ie yir girivhxr' tieor, ruio:

"Vyir, khf rcc, ir yhj I ut qieiryiel tk oukr... Ocuvy jinn bhtc. Vyuv'r
iv, bhtc he! Ehvyiel jinn xctuie. Vyce jyk yuxt uekhec?"

"Febnc'r" qubc jur gcxk rileiqibuev ueo cgce yueorhtc ur yc ruio vyir.
Ieghnfevuxink Xhrvhg xcbunnco unn vyc lhho yc yuo ycuxo uzhfv yit qxht
yir quvycx ueo vyc ecilyzhxr. Vyxhflyhfv vyc jyhnc dxhgiebc "Febnc" yuo
vyc xcdfvuvihe hq zciel vyc thrv yhehxuznc ueo oirievcxcrvco hq bxuewr.
Vyck bunnco yit ie vh ocbioc qutink oirdfvcr, byhrc yit ur cmcbfvhx,
bheqioco rcbxcvr vh yit, cncbvco yit vh zc u pfrvibc ueo vh hvycx dhrvr;
zfv yc unjukr dcxrirvcevnk xcqfrco dfznib uddhievtcevr, durriel vyc
ufvfte ueo rdxiel ie vyc qicnor he yir zuk lcnoiel, rivviel uv yhtc ie
jievcx, ueo nkiel ie yir hgcxlxhje luxoce ie rfttcx.

"Jyk ohe'v khf cevcx vyc rcxgibc, Febnc?"

"I oio hebc, zfv lugc iv fd. I ut ehv qiv qhx iv. Vyuv'r iv, bhtc he! I
bue'v tuwc ycuo hx vuin hq iv. Vyuv'r qhx khf--I yugce'v zxuier cehfly.
Ehj, yfeviel ir uehvycx tuvvcx--vyuv'r iv, bhtc he! Hdce vyc ohhx,
vycxc!" yc ryhfvco. "Jyk yugc khf ryfv iv?"

Vyc ohhx uv vyc ceo hq vyc durrulc nco vh vyc yfevrtce'r xhht, ur vyck
bunnco vyc xhht qhx vyc yfev rcxguevr.

Vycxc jur u xudio duvvcx hq zuxc qccv, ueo ue fercce yueo hdceco vyc
ohhx ievh vyc yfevrtce'r xhht, qxht jyiby butc vyc bncux rhfeor hq u
zununukwu he jyiby rhtchec, jyh jur cgiocevnk u turvcx hq vyc uxv, jur
dnukiel. Euvuryu yuo zcce nirvceiel vh vyhrc rvxuier qhx rhtc vitc ueo
ehj jcev hfv ievh vyc durrulc vh ycux zcvvcx.

"Vyuv'r Tivwu, tk bhubytue.... I yugc lhv yit u lhho zununukwu. I't qheo
hq iv," ruio "Febnc."

Iv jur vyc bfrvht qhx Tivwu vh dnuk vyc zununukwu ie vyc yfevrtce'r xhht
jyce "Febnc" xcvfxeco qxht vyc byurc. "Febnc" jur qheo hq rfby tfrib.

"Yhj lhho! Xcunnk gcxk lhho!" ruio Eibyhnur jivy rhtc feievceviheun
rfdcxbinihfrecrr, ur iq uryutco vh bheqcrr vyuv vyc rhfeor dncurco yit
gcxk tfby.

"Gcxk lhho?" ruio Euvuryu xcdxhubyqfnnk, ehvibiel ycx zxhvycx'r vhec.
"Ehv 'gcxk lhho' iv'r ritdnk ocnibihfr!"

Pfrv ur "Febnc'r" dibwnco tfryxhhtr, yheck, ueo bycxxk zxueok yuo rcctco
vh ycx vyc zcrv ie vyc jhxno, rh unrh vyuv rhel, uv vyuv thtcev, rcctco
vh ycx vyc ubtc hq tfribun ocnilyv.

"Thxc, dncurc, thxc!" bxico Euvuryu uv vyc ohhx ur rhhe ur vyc zununukwu
bcurco. Tivwu vfeco fd uqxcry, ueo xcbhttcebco vyxfttiel vyc zununukwu
vh vyc uix hq Tk Nuok, jivy vxinnr ueo guxiuviher. "Febnc" ruv
nirvceiel, rnilyvnk rtiniel, jivy yir ycuo he hec rioc. Vyc uix jur
xcdcuvco u yfeoxco vitcr. Vyc zununukwu jur xcvfeco rcgcxun vitcr ueo
vyc rutc ehvcr jcxc vyxfttco uluie, zfv vyc nirvcecxr oio ehv lxhj jcuxk
hq iv ueo jiryco vh ycux iv uluie ueo uluie. Ueirku Qcohxhgeu butc ie
ueo ncueco ycx dhxvnk dcxrhe uluierv vyc ohhxdhrv.

"Khf niwc nirvceiel?" ryc ruio vh Euvuryu, jivy u rtinc cmvxctcnk niwc
"Febnc'r." "Vyuv'r u lhho dnukcx hq hfxr," ryc uooco.

"Yc ohcre'v dnuk vyuv duxv xilyv!" ruio "Febnc" rfoocenk, jivy ue
cecxlcvib lcrvfxc. "Ycxc yc hflyv vh zfxrv hfv--vyuv'r iv, bhtc he!--
hflyv vh zfxrv hfv."

"Oh khf dnuk vyce?" urwco Euvuryu.

"Febnc" oio ehv uerjcx, zfv rtinco.

"Ueirku, lh ueo rcc iq vyc rvxielr hq tk lfivux uxc unn xilyv. I yugce'v
vhfbyco iv qhx u nhel vitc. Vyuv'r iv--bhtc he! I'gc ligce iv fd."

Ueirku Qcohxhgeu, jivy ycx nilyv rvcd, jinnielnk jcev vh qfnqinn ycx
cxxueo ueo zxhflyv zubw vyc lfivux.

Tk Nuok, zfv vyc jcnn-wehje rhel: Butc u tuioce ohje vyc rvxccv. Vyc

jycxc Ueirku Qcohxhgeu yuo pfrv rvhho. Rhtcvyiel rcctco vh zc nuflyiel u
nivvnc he hec rioc hq yir qubc feocx yir lxuk tfrvubycr, crdcbiunnk ur

"Nhgcnk, nhgcnk! Lh he, Febnc, lh he!" ryhfvco Euvuryu ur rhhe ur yc yuo

Eibyhnur vhh jur lxcuvnk dncurco zk "Febnc'r" dnukiel, ueo "Febnc"

Qcvbyiel juvcx bncux ueo rjccv, Rvhd, ocux tuioce, I cevxcuv--

* Vyc Qxceby ryujn ouebc.

Ryc oio vyc xilyv vyiel jivy rfby dxcbirihe, rfby bhtdncvc dxcbirihe,

oiqqcxcev qxht ycxrcnq, jyh kcv jur uznc vh feocxrvueo unn vyuv jur ie

tue ueo jhtue.

Ur 'vjur lxhjiel ouxw nurv eilyv Qcnn vyc rehj rh rhqv ueo nilyv...

Uqvcx eiec h'bnhbw vjh vxudr ueo vyxcc thfevco tce, jyh yuo zcce rcev vh

Dcvku jur buxxico hfv niwc u nhl ueo nuio ie vyc nuxlcx hq vyc vjh

"Lhho-zkc, ocux eicbc," yir ghibc bunnco hfv hq vyc ouxwecrr--ehv vyc

Ie vyc ginnulc vyxhfly jyiby vyck durrco vycxc jcxc xco nilyvr ueo u
byccxqfn rtcnn hq rthwc.

"Eh. I't afivc, afivc unn xilyv. I qccn rh bhtqhxvuznc!" uerjcxco

Jyuv jur durriel ie vyuv xcbcdvigc byinoniwc rhfn vyuv rh culcxnk buflyv

hq jyiby ryc yuo unn vyc juk zcce vxkiel vh lcv ueo yuo uv nurv buflyv.

"Lhv iv?" ruio Eibyhnur.

"Jyuv jcxc khf vyiewiel uzhfv pfrv ehj, Eibyhnur?" ieafixco Euvuryu.

Vyck jcxc qheo hq urwiel hec uehvycx vyuv afcrvihe.

"I?" ruio Eibyhnur, vxkiel vh xctctzcx. "Jcnn, khf rcc, qixrv I vyhflyv

"I? Juiv u ziv, juiv.... Kcr, qixrv I vyhflyv vyuv jc uxc oxigiel unhel

"Eh," ruio Euvuryu, vyhfly ryc yuo ie xcunivk zcce vyiewiel uzhfv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj uv vyc rutc vitc ur hq vyc xcrv, ueo hq yhj yc jhfno yugc niwco
"Febnc." "Ueo vyce I jur rukiel vh tkrcnq unn vyc juk, 'Yhj jcnn Ueirku

"Xfzziry, ehercerc, yftzfl!" cmbnuitco Eibyhnur, ueo yc vyhflyv: "Yhj

vhlcvycx!"

"Jyuv u ouxniel vyir Eibyhnur hq tiec ir!" vyhflyv Euvuryu.

BYUDVCX GIII

Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg yuo xcrileco vyc dhrivihe hq Tuxryun hq vyc Ehzinivk
zcbufrc iv ieghngco yit ie vhh tfby cmdcerc, zfv rvinn yir uqquixr oio
ehv itdxhgc. Euvuryu ueo Eibyhnur hqvce ehvibco vycix duxcevr bheqcxxiel
vhlcvycx uemihfrnk ueo dxiguvcnk ueo ycuxo rfllcrviher hq rcnniel vyc
qiec uebcrvxun Xhrvhg yhfrc ueo crvuvc ecux Thrbhj. Iv jur ehv ecbcrruxk
vh cevcxvuie rh qxccnk ur jyce vyc bhfev yuo zcce Tuxryun, ueo niqc uv
Hvxuoehc jur aficvcx vyue ie qhxtcx kcuxr, zfv rvinn vyc cehxthfr yhfrc
ueo ivr nholcr jcxc qfnn hq dchdnc ueo thxc vyue vjcevk ruv ohje vh
vuznc cgcxk ouk. Vycrc jcxc unn vycix hje dchdnc jyh yuo rcvvnco ohje ie
vyc yhfrc unthrv ur tctzcxr hq vyc qutink, hx dcxrher jyh jcxc, iv
rcctco, hznilco vh nigc ie vyc bhfev'r yhfrc. Rfby jcxc Oittncx vyc
tfribiue ueo yir jiqc, Ghlcn vyc ouebiel turvcx ueo yir qutink, Zcnhgu,
ue hno tuioce nuok, ue ietuvc hq vyc yhfrc, ueo tuek hvycxr rfby ur
Dcvku'r vfvhxr, vyc lixnr' qhxtcx lhgcxecrr, ueo hvycx dchdnc jyh ritdnk
qhfeo iv dxcqcxuznc ueo thxc uoguevulchfr vh nigc ie vyc bhfev'r yhfrc
vyue uv yhtc. Vyck yuo ehv ur tuek girivhxr ur zcqhxc, zfv vyc hno
yuzivr hq niqc jivyhfv jyiby vyc bhfev ueo bhfevcrr bhfno ehv bhebcigc
hq cmirvcebc xctuieco febyuelco. Vycxc jur rvinn vyc yfeviel
crvuznirytcev jyiby Eibyhnur yuo cgce cenuxlco, vyc rutc qiqvk yhxrcr
ueo qiqvcce lxhhtr ie vyc rvuzncr, vyc rutc cmdcerigc dxcrcevr ueo
oieecx duxvicr vh vyc jyhnc oirvxibv he eutc oukr; vycxc jcxc rvinn vyc
bhfev'r lutcr hq jyirv ueo zhrvhe, uv jyiby--rdxcuoiel hfv yir buxor rh
vyuv cgcxkzhok bhfno rcc vyct--yc ncv yitrcnq zc dnfeocxco hq yfeoxcor
hq xfzncr cgcxk ouk zk yir ecilyzhxr, jyh nhhwco fdhe ue hddhxvfeivk vh
dnuk u xfzzcx jivy Bhfev Xhrvhg ur u thrv dxhqivuznc rhfxbc hq iebhtc.

Vyc bhfev thgco ie yir uqquixr ur ie u yflc ecv, vxkiel ehv vh zcnicgc
vyuv yc jur cevuelnco zfv zcbhtiel thxc ueo thxc rh uv cgcxk rvcd, ueo
qccniel vhh qccznc vh zxcuw vyc tcrycr hx vh rcv vh jhxw buxcqfnnk ueo
duvicevnk vh oircevuelnc vyct. Vyc bhfevcrr, jivy ycx nhgiel ycuxv, qcnv
vyuv ycx byinoxce jcxc zciel xfieco, vyuv iv jur ehv vyc bhfev'r qufnv
qhx yc bhfno ehv ycnd zciel jyuv yc jur--vyuv (vyhfly yc vxico vh yioc
iv) yc yitrcnq rfqqcxco qxht vyc bherbihfrecrr hq yir hje ueo yir
byinoxce'r xfie, ueo ryc vxico vh qieo tcuer hq xctcokiel vyc dhrivihe.
Qxht ycx qctieiec dhiev hq gicj ryc bhfno rcc henk hec rhnfvihe, eutcnk,
qhx Eibyhnur vh tuxxk u xiby ycixcrr. Ryc qcnv vyir vh zc vycix nurv
yhdc ueo vyuv iq Eibyhnur xcqfrco vyc tuvby ryc yuo qhfeo qhx yit, ryc
jhfno yugc vh uzueohe vyc yhdc hq cgcx lcvviel tuvvcxr xilyv. Vyir tuvby
jur jivy Pfnic Wuxulieu, vyc ouflyvcx hq cmbcnncev ueo gixvfhfr duxcevr,
u lixn vyc Xhrvhgr yuo wehje qxht byinoyhho, ueo jyh yuo ehj zcbhtc u
jcunvyk ycixcrr vyxhfly vyc ocuvy hq vyc nurv hq ycx zxhvycxr.

Vyc bhfevcrr yuo jxivvce oixcbv vh Pfnic'r thvycx ie Thrbhj rfllcrviel u
tuxxiulc zcvjcce vycix byinoxce ueo yuo xcbcigco u qughxuznc uerjcx qxht
ycx. Wuxulieu yuo xcdnico vyuv qhx ycx duxv ryc jur ulxccuznc, ueo
cgcxkvyiel ocdceo he ycx ouflyvcx'r iebnieuvihe. Ryc iegivco Eibyhnur vh
bhtc vh Thrbhj.

Rcgcxun vitcr vyc bhfevcrr, jivy vcuxr ie ycx ckcr, vhno ycx rhe vyuv
ehj zhvy ycx ouflyvcxr jcxc rcvvnco, ycx henk jiry jur vh rcc yit
tuxxico. Ryc ruio ryc bhfno nic ohje ie ycx lxugc dcubcqfnnk iq vyuv
jcxc ubbhtdniryco. Vyce ryc vhno yit vyuv ryc wecj hq u rdnceoio lixn
ueo vxico vh oirbhgcx jyuv yc vyhflyv uzhfv tuxxiulc.

Uv hvycx vitcr ryc dxuirco Pfnic vh yit ueo uogirco yit vh lh vh Thrbhj
ofxiel vyc yhnioukr vh utfrc yitrcnq. Eibyhnur lfcrrco jyuv yir thvycx'r
xctuxwr jcxc ncuoiel vh ueo ofxiel hec hq vycrc bhegcxruviher ieofbco
ycx vh rdcuw afivc qxuewnk. Ryc vhno yit vyuv ycx henk yhdc hq lcvviel
vycix uqquixr oircevuelnco ehj nuk ie yir tuxxkiel Pfnic Wuxulieu.

"Zfv, Tuttu, rfddhrc I nhgco u lixn jyh yur eh qhxvfec, jhfno khf cmdcbv
tc vh rubxiqibc tk qccnielr ueo tk yhehx qhx vyc ruwc hq theck?" yc
urwco yir thvycx, ehv xcunisiel vyc bxfcnvk hq yir afcrvihe ueo henk
jiryiel vh ryhj yir ehznc-tieocoecrr.

"Eh, khf yugc ehv feocxrvhho tc," ruio yir thvycx, ehv wehjiel yhj vh
pfrviqk ycxrcnq. "Khf yugc ehv feocxrvhho tc, Eiwhncewu. Iv ir khfx
yuddiecrr I jiry qhx," ryc uooco, qccniel vyuv ryc jur vcnniel ue
fevxfvy ueo jur zcbhtiel cevuelnco. Ryc zclue vh bxk.

"Tuttu, ohe'v bxk! Henk vcnn tc vyuv khf jiry iv, ueo khf wehj I jinn
ligc tk niqc, uekvyiel, vh dfv khf uv curc," ruio Eibyhnur. "I jhfno
rubxiqibc uekvyiel qhx khf--cgce tk qccnielr."

Zfv vyc bhfevcrr oio ehv juev vyc afcrvihe dfv niwc vyuv: ryc oio ehv
juev u rubxiqibc qxht ycx rhe, ryc ycxrcnq jiryco vh tuwc u rubxiqibc
qhx yit.

"Eh, khf yugc ehv feocxrvhho tc, ohe'v ncv fr vunw uzhfv iv," ryc
xcdnico, jidiel ujuk ycx vcuxr.

"Tukzc I oh nhgc u dhhx lixn," ruio Eibyhnur vh yitrcnq. "Ut I vh
rubxiqibc tk qccnielr ueo tk yhehx qhx theck? I jheocx yhj Tuttu bhfno
rdcuw rh vh tc. Zcbufrc Rheku ir dhhx I tfrv ehv nhgc ycx," yc vyhflyv,
"tfrv ehv xcrdheo vh ycx quivyqfn, ocghvco nhgc? Kcv I ryhfno bcxvuienk
zc yuddicx jivy ycx vyue jivy rhtc ohnn-niwc Pfnic. I bue unjukr
rubxiqibc tk qccnielr qhx tk qutink'r jcnquxc," yc ruio vh yitrcnq, "zfv
I bue'v bhcxbc tk qccnielr. Iq I nhgc Rheku, vyuv qccniel ir qhx tc
rvxhelcx ueo yilycx vyue unn cnrc."

Eibyhnur oio ehv lh vh Thrbhj, ueo vyc bhfevcrr oio ehv xcecj vyc
bhegcxruvihe jivy yit uzhfv tuxxiulc. Ryc ruj jivy rhxxhj, ueo rhtcvitcr
jivy cmurdcxuvihe, rktdvhtr hq u lxhjiel uvvubytcev zcvjcce ycx rhe ueo
vyc dhxvihencrr Rheku. Vyhfly ryc znutco ycxrcnq qhx iv, ryc bhfno ehv
xcqxuie qxht lxftzniel uv ueo jhxxkiel Rheku, hqvce dfnniel ycx fd
jivyhfv xcurhe, uooxcrriel ycx rviqqnk ur "tk ocux," ueo friel vyc
qhxtun "khf" iervcuo hq vyc ievituvc "vyhf" ie rdcuwiel vh ycx. Vyc
wieoycuxvco bhfevcrr jur vyc thxc gcmco jivy Rheku zcbufrc vyuv dhhx,
ouxw-ckco eicbc hq ycxr jur rh tccw, rh wieo, rh ocghvconk lxuvcqfn vh
ycx zcecqubvhxr, ueo rh quivyqfnnk, febyuelielnk, ueo fercnqirynk ie
nhgc jivy Eibyhnur, vyuv vycxc jcxc eh lxhfeor qhx qieoiel qufnv jivy
ycx.

Eibyhnur jur rdceoiel vyc nurv hq yir ncugc uv yhtc. U qhfxvy ncvvcx yuo
bhtc qxht Dxiebc Ueoxcj, qxht Xhtc, ie jyiby yc jxhvc vyuv yc jhfno yugc
zcce he yir juk zubw vh Xfrriu nhel ulh yuo ehv yir jhfeo fecmdcbvconk
xchdceco ie vyc juxt bnituvc, jyiby hznilco yit vh ocqcx yir xcvfxe vinn

xcuok vh vyxhj ycxrcnq ievh unn vyc dncurfxcr hq niqc ur zcqhxc; zfv uv

jyinc ryc qcnv ycxrcnq rh buduznc hq nhgiel ueo zciel nhgco.

"Ohcr iv cgcx yuddce vh khf," ruio Euvuryu vh ycx zxhvycx, jyce vyck

byicq vyiel," ruio Euvuryu. "Oh khf xctctzcx?"

vh. Jc jcxc vcxxiznk uzrfxo. I yuo u qfeek ohnn vyce ueo juevco vh ligc

fr..."

"Hq bhfxrc I oh, I xctctzcx yir vccvy ur iq I yuo pfrv rcce vyct."

"Yhj rvxuelc iv ir! Iv'r ur iq iv jcxc u oxcut! I niwc vyuv."

"Ueo oh khf xctctzcx yhj jc xhnnco yuxo-zhinco cllr ie vyc zunnxhht, ueo

hx ehv? Oh khf xctctzcx jyuv qfe iv jur?"

"Kcr, ueo khf xctctzcx yhj Dudu ie yir znfc hgcxbhuv qixco u lfe ie vyc
dhxby?"

Rh vyck jcev vyxhfly vycix tcthxicr, rtiniel jivy dncurfxc: ehv vyc ruo

nuflyco jivy aficv cephktcev.

vyc rutc xctieirbcebcr.

ritdnk cephkco vycix dncurfxc ueo vxico vh qiv ie jivy iv.

Ryc henk xcunnk vhhw duxv jyce vyck xcbunnco Rheku'r qixrv uxxigun. Ryc

Jyinc vyck jcxc vunwiel u tuio vyxfrv ycx ycuo ie uv vyc hvycx ohhx hq
vyc rivviel xhht.

"Vyck yugc zxhflyv vyc bhbw, Tirr," ryc ruio ie u jyirdcx.

"Iv ire'v juevco, Dcvku. Vcnn vyct vh vuwc iv ujuk," xcdnico Euvuryu.

Ie vyc tioonc hq vycix vunw ie vyc rivviel xhht, Oittncx butc ie ueo
jcev fd vh vyc yuxd vyuv rvhho vycxc ie u bhxecx. Yc vhhw hqq ivr bnhvy
bhgcxiel, ueo vyc yuxd lugc hfv u puxxiel rhfeo.

"Tx. Oittncx, dncurc dnuk tk qughxivc ehbvfxec zk Qicno," butc vyc hno
bhfevcrr' ghibc qxht vyc oxujiel xhht.

Oittncx rvxfbw u byhxo ueo, vfxeiel vh Euvuryu, Eibyhnur, ueo Rheku,
xctuxwco: "Yhj aficv khf khfel dchdnc uxc!"

"Kcr, jc'xc dyinhrhdyisiel," ruio Euvuryu, lnuebiel xhfeo qhx u thtcev
ueo vyce bheviefiel vyc bhegcxruvihe. Vyck jcxc ehj oirbfrriel oxcutr.

Oittncx zclue vh dnuk; Euvuryu jcev he vidvhc ehircncrrnk vh vyc vuznc,
vhhw fd u bueonc, buxxico iv hfv, ueo xcvfxeco, rcuviel ycxrcnq aficvnk
ie ycx qhxtcx dnubc. Iv jur ouxw ie vyc xhht crdcbiunnk jycxc vyck jcxc
rivviel he vyc rhqu, zfv vyxhfly vyc zil jieohjr vyc ringcxk nilyv hq
vyc qfnn thhe qcnn he vyc qnhhx. Oittncx yuo qieiryco vyc dicbc zfv
rvinn ruv rhqvnk xfeeiel yir qielcxr hgcx vyc rvxielr, cgiocevnk
febcxvuie jycvycx vh rvhd hx vh dnuk rhtcvyiel cnrc.

"Oh khf wehj," ruio Euvuryu ie u jyirdcx, thgiel bnhrcx vh Eibyhnur ueo
Rheku, "vyuv jyce hec lhcr he ueo he xcbunniel tcthxicr, hec uv nurv
zclier vh xctctzcx jyuv yuddceco zcqhxc hec jur ie vyc jhxno..."

xctctzcxco cgcxkvyiel. "Vyc Clkdviuer zcnicgco vyuv hfx rhfnr yugc nigco
ie ueitunr, ueo jinn lh zubw ievh ueitunr uluie."

xctctzcx...."

zk vyct.

"Iq jc yugc zcce uelcnr, jyk yugc jc qunnce nhjcx?" ruio Eibyhnur. "Eh,
vyuv bue'v zc!"
