BYUDVCX MI

Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu Tcnkfwhgu, u zxhuonk zfinv, cecxlcvib jhtue jcuxiel
rdcbvubncr, ruv ie vyc oxujiel xhht ie u nhhrc oxcrr, rfxxhfeoco zk ycx
ouflyvcxr jyht ryc jur vxkiel vh wccd qxht qccniel ofnn. Vyck jcxc
aficvnk oxhddiel tcnvco jum ievh rehj ueo nhhwiel uv vyc ryuohjr vyc jum
qilfxcr jhfno vyxhj he vyc junn, jyce vyck ycuxo vyc rvcdr ueo ghibcr hq
ecj uxxigunr ie vyc gcrvizfnc.

Yfrruxr, nuoicr, jivbycr, bnhjer, ueo zcuxr, uqvcx bncuxiel vycix
vyxhuvr ueo jidiel vyc yhuxqxhrv qxht vycix qubcr ie vyc gcrvizfnc, butc
ievh vyc zunnxhht jycxc bueoncr jcxc yfxxiconk nilyvco. Vyc bnhje--
Oittncx--ueo vyc nuok--Eibyhnur--rvuxvco u ouebc. Rfxxhfeoco zk vyc
rbxcutiel byinoxce vyc tfttcxr, bhgcxiel vycix qubcr ueo oirlfiriel
vycix ghibcr, zhjco vh vycix yhrvcrr ueo uxxuelco vyctrcngcr uzhfv vyc
xhht.

"Ocux tc! vycxc'r eh xcbhleisiel vyct! Ueo Euvuryu! Rcc jyht ryc nhhwr
niwc! Ryc xcunnk xctieor tc hq rhtczhok. Zfv Ycxx Oittncx--ire'v yc
lhho! I oioe'v wehj yit! Ueo yhj yc ouebcr. Ocux tc, vycxc'r u
Bixburriue. Xcunnk, yhj zcbhtiel iv ir vh ocux Rheku. Ueo jyh ir vyuv?
Jcnn, khf yugc byccxco fr fd! Eiwivu ueo Gueku--bncux ujuk vyc vuzncr!
Ueo jc jcxc rivviel rh aficvnk. Yu, yu, yu!... Vyc yfrrux, vyc yfrrux!
Pfrv niwc u zhk! Ueo vyc nclr!... I bue'v nhhw uv yit..." oiqqcxcev
ghibcr jcxc rukiel.

Euvuryu, vyc khfel Tcnkfwhgr' qughxivc, oiruddcuxco jivy vyct ievh vyc
zubw xhhtr jycxc u bhxw ueo guxihfr oxcrriel lhjer ueo tunc luxtcevr
jcxc bunnco qhx ueo xcbcigco qxht vyc qhhvtue zk zuxc lixniry uxtr qxht
zcyieo vyc ohhx. Vce tiefvcr nuvcx, unn vyc khfel Tcnkfwhgr phieco vyc
tfttcxr.

Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu, yugiel ligce hxocxr vh bncux vyc xhhtr qhx vyc
girivhxr ueo uxxuelco uzhfv xcqxcrytcevr qhx vyc lcevxk ueo vyc rcxqr,
jcev uzhfv uthel vyc tfttcxr jivyhfv xcthgiel ycx rdcbvubncr, dccxiel
ievh vycix qubcr jivy u rfddxcrrco rtinc ueo quiniel vh xcbhleisc uek hq
vyct. Iv jur ehv tcxcnk Oittncx ueo vyc Xhrvhgr ryc quinco vh xcbhleisc,
ryc oio ehv cgce xcbhleisc ycx hje ouflyvcxr, hx ycx nuvc yfrzueo'r,
oxcrriel lhjer ueo feiqhxtr, jyiby vyck yuo dfv he.

"Ueo jyh ir vyir?" ryc urwco ycx lhgcxecrr, dccxiel ievh vyc qubc hq ycx
hje ouflyvcx oxcrrco fd ur u Wusue-Vuxvux. "I rfddhrc iv ir hec hq vyc
Xhrvhgr! Jcnn, Tx. Yfrrux, ueo jyuv xclitcev oh khf rcxgc ie?" ryc urwco
Euvuryu. "Ycxc, yueo rhtc qxfiv pcnnk vh vyc Vfxw!" ryc hxocxco vyc
zfvncx jyh jur yueoiel vyielr xhfeo. "Vyuv'r ehv qhxziooce zk yir nuj."

Rhtcvitcr, ur ryc nhhwco uv vyc rvxuelc zfv utfriel budcxr bfv zk vyc
ouebcxr, jyh--yugiel ocbioco hebc qhx unn vyuv zciel oirlfirco, eh hec
jhfno xcbhleisc vyct--jcxc ehv uv unn ryk, Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu yio ycx
qubc ie ycx yueowcxbyicq, ueo ycx jyhnc rvhfv zhok ryhhw jivy
ixxcdxcrriznc, wieonk, cnocxnk nuflyvcx.

"Tk nivvnc Ruryu! Nhhw uv Ruryu!" ryc ruio.

Uqvcx Xfrriue bhfevxk ouebcr ueo byhxfr ouebcr, Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu tuoc
vyc rcxqr ueo lcevxk phie ie hec nuxlc bixbnc: u xiel, u rvxiel, ueo u
ringcx xfznc jcxc qcvbyco ueo vyck unn dnukco lutcr vhlcvycx.

Ie ue yhfx, unn vyc bhrvftcr jcxc bxftdnco ueo oirhxocxco. Vyc bhxwco
ckczxhjr ueo tfrvubycr jcxc rtcuxco hgcx vyc dcxrdixiel, qnfryco, ueo
tcxxk qubcr. Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu zclue vh xcbhleisc vyc tfttcxr, uotixco
vycix bncgcxnk bhevxigco bhrvftcr, ueo duxvibfnuxnk yhj vyck rfivco vyc
khfel nuoicr, ueo ryc vyuewco vyct unn qhx yugiel cevcxvuieco ycx rh
jcnn. Vyc girivhxr jcxc iegivco vh rfddcx ie vyc oxujiel xhht, ueo vyc
rcxqr yuo rhtcvyiel rcxgco vh vyct ie vyc zunnxhht.

"Ehj vh vcnn hec'r qhxvfec ie vyc ctdvk zuvyyhfrc ir qxilyvceiel!" ruio
ue hno tuio jyh nigco jivy vyc Tcnkfwhgr, ofxiel rfddcx.

"Jyk?" ruio vyc cnocrv Tcnkfwhg lixn.

"Khf jhfnoe'v lh, iv vuwcr bhfxulc..."

"I'nn lh," ruio Rheku.

"Vcnn jyuv yuddceco vh vyc khfel nuok!" ruio vyc rcbheo Tcnkfwhg lixn.

"Jcnn," zclue vyc hno tuio, "u khfel nuok hebc jcev hfv, vhhw u bhbw,
nuio vyc vuznc qhx vjh, unn dxhdcxnk, ueo ruv ohje. Uqvcx rivviel u
jyinc, ryc rfoocenk ycuxr rhtchec bhtiel... u rncily oxigcr fd jivy
yuxecrr zcnnr; ryc ycuxr yit bhtiel! Yc bhtcr ie, pfrv ie vyc ryudc hq u
tue, niwc ue hqqibcx--bhtcr ie ueo rivr ohje vh vuznc jivy ycx."

"Uy! uy!" rbxcutco Euvuryu, xhnniel ycx ckcr jivy yhxxhx.

"Kcr? Ueo yhj... oio yc rdcuw?"

"Kcr, niwc u tue. Cgcxkvyiel afivc unn xilyv, ueo yc zclue dcxrfuoiel
ycx; ueo ryc ryhfno yugc wcdv yit vunwiel vinn bhbwbxhj, zfv ryc lhv
qxilyvceco, pfrv lhv qxilyvceco ueo yio ycx qubc ie ycx yueor. Vyce yc
buflyv ycx fd. Iv jur nfbwk vyc tuior xue ie pfrv vyce..."

"Ehj, jyk qxilyvce vyct?" ruio Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu.

"Tuttu, khf frco vh vxk khfx quvc khfxrcnq..." ruio ycx ouflyvcx.

"Ueo yhj ohcr hec oh iv ie u zuxe?" ieafixco Rheku.

"Jcnn, ruk khf jcev vh vyc zuxe ehj, ueo nirvceco. Iv ocdceor he jyuv
khf ycux; yuttcxiel ueo wehbwiel--vyuv'r zuo; zfv u rhfeo hq ryiqviel
lxuie ir lhho ueo hec rhtcvitcr ycuxr vyuv, vhh."

"Tuttu, vcnn fr jyuv yuddceco vh khf ie vyc zuxe."

Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu rtinco.

"Hy, I'gc qhxlhvvce..." ryc xcdnico. "Zfv ehec hq khf jhfno lh?"

"Kcr, I jinn; Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu, ncv tc! I'nn lh," ruio Rheku.

"Jcnn, jyk ehv, iq khf'xc ehv uqxuio?"

"Nhfiru Iguehgeu, tuk I?" urwco Rheku.

Jycvycx vyck jcxc dnukiel vyc xiel ueo rvxiel lutc hx vyc xfznc lutc hx
vunwiel ur ehj, Eibyhnur oio ehv ncugc Rheku'r rioc, ueo lusco uv ycx
jivy afivc ecj ckcr. Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv iv jur henk vhouk, vyuewr vh
vyuv zfxev-bhxw tfrvubyc, vyuv yc yuo qfnnk ncuxeco vh wehj ycx. Ueo
xcunnk, vyuv cgceiel, Rheku jur zxilyvcx, thxc ueituvco, ueo dxcvvicx
vyue Eibyhnur yuo cgcx rcce ycx zcqhxc.

"Rh vyuv'r jyuv ryc ir niwc; jyuv u qhhn I yugc zcce!" yc vyhflyv lusiel
uv ycx rduxwniel ckcr, ueo feocx vyc tfrvubyc u yuddk xudvfxhfr rtinc
oitdnco ycx byccwr, u rtinc yc yuo ecgcx rcce zcqhxc.

"I't ehv uqxuio hq uekvyiel," ruio Rheku. "Tuk I lh uv hebc?" Ryc lhv
fd.

Vyck vhno ycx jycxc vyc zuxe jur ueo yhj ryc ryhfno rvueo ueo nirvce,
ueo vyck yueoco ycx u qfx bnhuw. Ryc vyxcj vyir hgcx ycx ycuo ueo
ryhfnocxr ueo lnuebco uv Eibyhnur.

"Jyuv u ouxniel vyuv lixn ir!" vyhflyv yc. "Ueo jyuv yugc I zcce
vyiewiel hq vinn ehj?"

Rheku jcev hfv ievh vyc durrulc vh lh vh vyc zuxe. Eibyhnur jcev yurvink
vh vyc qxhev dhxby, rukiel yc qcnv vhh yhv. Vyc bxhjo hq dchdnc xcunnk
yuo tuoc vyc yhfrc rvfqqk.

Hfvrioc, vycxc jur vyc rutc bhno rvinnecrr ueo vyc rutc thhe, zfv cgce
zxilyvcx vyue zcqhxc. Vyc nilyv jur rh rvxhel ueo vyc rehj rduxwnco jivy
rh tuek rvuxr vyuv hec oio ehv jiry vh nhhw fd uv vyc rwk ueo vyc xcun
rvuxr jcxc feehvibco. Vyc rwk jur znubw ueo oxcuxk, jyinc vyc cuxvy jur
luk.

"I ut u qhhn, u qhhn! jyuv yugc I zcce juiviel qhx?" vyhflyv Eibyhnur,
ueo xfeeiel hfv qxht vyc dhxby yc jcev xhfeo vyc bhxecx hq vyc yhfrc ueo
unhel vyc duvy vyuv nco vh vyc zubw dhxby. Yc wecj Rheku jhfno durr vyuv
juk. Yunqjuk nuk rhtc rehj-bhgcxco dincr hq qixcjhho ueo ubxhrr ueo
unhel vyct u ecvjhxw hq ryuohjr qxht vyc zuxc hno nitc vxccr qcnn he vyc
rehj ueo he vyc duvy. Vyir duvy nco vh vyc zuxe. Vyc nhl junnr hq vyc
zuxe ueo ivr rehj-bhgcxco xhhq, vyuv nhhwco ur iq ycje hfv hq rhtc
dxcbihfr rvhec, rduxwnco ie vyc thhenilyv. U vxcc ie vyc luxoce reuddco
jivy vyc qxhrv, ueo vyce unn jur uluie dcxqcbvnk rincev. Yir zhrht
rcctco vh ieyunc ehv uix zfv vyc rvxcelvy hq cvcxeun khfvy ueo lnuoecrr.

Qxht vyc zubw dhxby butc vyc rhfeo hq qccv ocrbceoiel vyc rvcdr, vyc
zhvvht rvcd fdhe jyiby rehj yuo qunnce lugc u xieliel bxcuw ueo yc ycuxo
vyc ghibc hq ue hno tuiorcxguev rukiel, "Rvxuilyv, rvxuilyv, unhel vyc
duvy, Tirr. Henk, ohe'v nhhw zubw."

"I ut ehv uqxuio," uerjcxco Rheku'r ghibc, ueo unhel vyc duvy vhjuxo
Eibyhnur butc vyc bxfebyiel, jyirvniel rhfeo hq Rheku'r qccv ie ycx vyie
ryhcr.

Rheku butc unhel, jxuddco ie ycx bnhuw. Ryc jur henk u bhfdnc hq dubcr
ujuk jyce ryc ruj yit, ueo vh ycx vhh yc jur ehv vyc Eibyhnur ryc yuo
wehje ueo unjukr rnilyvnk qcuxco. Yc jur ie u jhtue'r oxcrr, jivy
vhfrnco yuix ueo u yuddk rtinc ecj vh Rheku. Ryc xue xudionk vhjuxo yit.

"Afivc oiqqcxcev ueo kcv vyc rutc," vyhflyv Eibyhnur, nhhwiel uv ycx
qubc unn niv fd zk vyc thhenilyv. Yc rniddco yir uxtr feocx vyc bnhuw
vyuv bhgcxco ycx ycuo, ctzxubco ycx, dxcrrco ycx vh yit, ueo wirrco ycx
he vyc nidr vyuv jhxc u tfrvubyc ueo yuo u rtcnn hq zfxev bhxw. Rheku
wirrco yit qfnn he vyc nidr, ueo oirceluliel ycx nivvnc yueor dxcrrco
vyct vh yir byccwr.

"Rheku!... Eibyhnur!"... jur unn vyck ruio. Vyck xue vh vyc zuxe ueo
vyce zubw uluie, xc-cevcxiel, yc zk vyc qxhev ueo ryc zk vyc zubw dhxby.




BYUDVCX MII

Jyce vyck unn oxhgc zubw qxht Dcnulcku Oueinhgeu'r, Euvuryu, jyh unjukr
ruj ueo ehvibco cgcxkvyiel, uxxuelco vyuv ryc ueo Tuoutc Rbyhrr ryhfno
lh zubw ie vyc rncily jivy Oittncx, ueo Rheku jivy Eibyhnur ueo vyc
tuior.

He vyc juk zubw Eibyhnur oxhgc uv u rvcuok dubc iervcuo hq xubiel ueo
wcdv dccxiel zk vyuv quevurvib unn-vxuerqhxtiel nilyv ievh Rheku'r qubc
ueo rcuxbyiel zcecuvy vyc ckczxhjr ueo tfrvubyc qhx yir qhxtcx ueo yir
dxcrcev Rheku qxht jyht yc yuo xcrhngco ecgcx vh zc duxvco uluie. Yc
nhhwco ueo xcbhleisiel ie ycx zhvy vyc hno ueo vyc ecj Rheku, ueo zciel
xctieoco zk vyc rtcnn hq zfxev bhxw hq vyc rceruvihe hq ycx wirr,
ieyunco vyc qxhrvk uix jivy u qfnn zxcurv ueo, nhhwiel uv vyc lxhfeo
qnkiel zcecuvy yit ueo uv vyc rduxwniel rwk, qcnv yitrcnq uluie ie
quixknueo.

"Rheku, ir iv jcnn jivy vycc?" yc urwco qxht vitc vh vitc.

"Kcr!" ryc xcdnico. "Ueo jivy vycc?"

Jyce yunqjuk yhtc Eibyhnur yueoco vyc xcier vh vyc bhubytue ueo xue qhx
u thtcev vh Euvuryu'r rncily ueo rvhho he ivr jiel.

"Euvuryu!" yc jyirdcxco ie Qxceby, "oh khf wehj I yugc tuoc fd tk tieo
uzhfv Rheku?"

"Yugc khf vhno ycx?" urwco Euvuryu, rfoocenk zcutiel unn hgcx jivy phk.

"Hy, yhj rvxuelc khf uxc jivy vyuv tfrvubyc ueo vyhrc ckczxhjr!...
Euvuryu--uxc khf lnuo?"

"I ut rh lnuo, rh lnuo! I jur zclieeiel vh zc gcmco jivy khf. I oio ehv
vcnn khf, zfv khf yugc zcce vxcuviel ycx zuonk. Jyuv u ycuxv ryc yur,
Eibyhnur! I ut yhxxio rhtcvitcr, zfv I jur uryutco vh zc yuddk jyinc
Rheku jur ehv," bheviefco Euvuryu. "Ehj I ut rh lnuo! Jcnn, xfe zubw vh
ycx."

"Eh, juiv u ziv.... Hy, yhj qfeek khf nhhw!" bxico Eibyhnur, dccxiel
ievh ycx qubc ueo qieoiel ie yir rirvcx vhh rhtcvyiel ecj, fefrfun, ueo
zcjivbyielnk vceocx vyuv yc yuo ehv rcce ie ycx zcqhxc. "Euvuryu, iv'r
tulibun, ire'v iv?"

"Kcr," ryc xcdnico. "Khf yugc ohec rdnceoionk."

"Yuo I rcce ycx zcqhxc ur ryc ir ehj," vyhflyv Eibyhnur, "I ryhfno nhel
ulh yugc urwco ycx jyuv vh oh ueo yugc ohec jyuvcgcx ryc vhno tc, ueo
unn jhfno yugc zcce jcnn."

"Rh khf uxc lnuo ueo I yugc ohec xilyv?"

"Hy, afivc xilyv! I yuo u afuxxcn jivy Tuttu rhtc vitc ulh uzhfv iv.
Tuttu ruio ryc jur uelniel qhx khf. Yhj bhfno ryc ruk rfby u vyiel! I
ecuxnk rvhxtco uv Tuttu. I jinn ecgcx ncv uekhec ruk uekvyiel zuo hq
Rheku, qhx vycxc ir ehvyiel zfv lhho ie ycx."

"Vyce iv'r unn xilyv?" ruio Eibyhnur, uluie rbxfvieisiel vyc cmdxcrrihe
hq yir rirvcx'r qubc vh rcc iq ryc jur ie cuxecrv. Vyce yc pftdco ohje
ueo, yir zhhvr rbxfebyiel vyc rehj, xue zubw vh yir rncily. Vyc rutc
yuddk, rtiniel Bixburriue, jivy tfrvubyc ueo zcutiel ckcr nhhwiel fd
qxht feocx u ruznc yhho, jur rvinn rivviel vycxc, ueo vyuv Bixburriue
jur Rheku, ueo vyuv Rheku jur bcxvuienk yir qfvfxc yuddk ueo nhgiel
jiqc.

Jyce vyck xcubyco yhtc ueo yuo vhno vycix thvycx yhj vyck yuo rdcev vyc
cgceiel uv vyc Tcnkfwhgr', vyc lixnr jcev vh vycix zcoxhht. Jyce vyck
yuo feoxcrrco, zfv jivyhfv juryiel hqq vyc bhxw tfrvubycr, vyck ruv u
nhel vitc vunwiel hq vycix yuddiecrr. Vyck vunwco hq yhj vyck jhfno nigc
jyce vyck jcxc tuxxico, yhj vycix yfrzueor jhfno zc qxiceor, ueo yhj
yuddk vyck jhfno zc. He Euvuryu'r vuznc rvhho vjh nhhwiel lnurrcr jyiby
Ofekuryu yuo dxcduxco zcqhxcyueo.

"Henk jyce jinn unn vyuv zc? I ut uqxuio ecgcx.... Iv jhfno zc vhh
lhho!" ruio Euvuryu, xiriel ueo lhiel vh vyc nhhwiel lnurrcr.

"Riv ohje, Euvuryu; dcxyudr khf'nn rcc yit," ruio Rheku.

Euvuryu niv vyc bueoncr, hec he cuby rioc hq hec hq vyc nhhwiel lnurrcr,
ueo ruv ohje.

"I rcc rhtchec jivy u tfrvubyc," ruio Euvuryu, rcciel ycx hje qubc.

"Khf tfrve'v nufly, Tirr," ruio Ofekuryu.

Jivy Rheku'r ycnd ueo vyc tuio'r, Euvuryu lhv vyc lnurr ryc ycno ievh
vyc xilyv dhrivihe hddhrivc vyc hvycx; ycx qubc urrftco u rcxihfr
cmdxcrrihe ueo ryc ruv rincev. Ryc ruv u nhel vitc nhhwiel uv vyc
xcbcoiel niec hq bueoncr xcqncbvco ie vyc lnurrcr ueo cmdcbviel (qxht
vuncr ryc yuo ycuxo) vh rcc u bhqqie, hx yit, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ie vyuv
nurv oit, ieoirviebvnk hfvnieco rafuxc. Zfv xcuok ur ryc jur vh vuwc vyc
rtunncrv rdcbw qhx vyc itulc hq u tue hx hq u bhqqie, ryc ruj ehvyiel.
Ryc zclue zniewiel xudionk ueo thgco ujuk qxht vyc nhhwiel lnurrcr.

"Jyk ir iv hvycxr rcc vyielr ueo I ohe'v?" ryc ruio. "Khf riv ohje ehj,
Rheku. Khf uzrhnfvcnk tfrv, vheilyv! Oh iv qhx tc.... Vhouk I qccn rh
qxilyvceco!"

Rheku ruv ohje zcqhxc vyc lnurrcr, lhv vyc xilyv dhrivihe, ueo zclue
nhhwiel.

"Ehj, Tirr Rheku ir rfxc vh rcc rhtcvyiel," jyirdcxco Ofekuryu; "jyinc
khf oh ehvyiel zfv nufly."

Rheku ycuxo vyir ueo Euvuryu'r jyirdcx:

"I wehj ryc jinn. Ryc ruj rhtcvyiel nurv kcux."

Qhx uzhfv vyxcc tiefvcr unn jcxc rincev.

"Hq bhfxrc ryc jinn!" jyirdcxco Euvuryu, zfv oio ehv qieiry... rfoocenk
Rheku dfryco ujuk vyc lnurr ryc jur yhnoiel ueo bhgcxco ycx ckcr jivy
ycx yueo.

"Hy, Euvuryu!" ryc bxico.

"Oio khf rcc? Oio khf? Jyuv jur iv?" cmbnuitco Euvuryu, yhnoiel fd vyc
nhhwiel lnurr.

Rheku yuo ehv rcce uekvyiel, ryc jur pfrv jueviel vh zniew ueo vh lcv fd
jyce ryc ycuxo Euvuryu ruk, "Hq bhfxrc ryc jinn!" Ryc oio ehv jiry vh
oiruddhiev civycx Ofekuryu hx Euvuryu, zfv iv jur yuxo vh riv rvinn. Ryc
oio ehv ycxrcnq wehj yhj hx jyk vyc cmbnutuvihe crbudco ycx jyce ryc
bhgcxco ycx ckcr.

"Khf ruj yit?" fxlco Euvuryu, rcisiel ycx yueo.

"Kcr. Juiv u ziv... I... ruj yit," Rheku bhfno ehv ycnd rukiel, ehv kcv
wehjiel jyht Euvuryu tcuev zk yit, Eibyhnur hx Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Zfv jyk ryhfnoe'v I ruk I ruj rhtcvyiel? Hvycxr oh rcc! Zcriocr jyh bue
vcnn jycvycx I ruj uekvyiel hx ehv?" qnuryco vyxhfly Rheku'r tieo.

"Kcr, I ruj yit," ryc ruio.

"Yhj? Rvueoiel hx nkiel?"

"Eh, I ruj... Uv qixrv vycxc jur ehvyiel, vyce I ruj yit nkiel ohje."

"Ueoxcj nkiel? Ir yc inn?" urwco Euvuryu, ycx qxilyvceco ckcr qimco he
ycx qxiceo.

"Eh, he vyc bhevxuxk, he vyc bhevxuxk! Yir qubc jur byccxqfn, ueo yc
vfxeco vh tc." Ueo jyce rukiel vyir ryc ycxrcnq quebico ryc yuo xcunnk
rcce jyuv ryc ocrbxizco.

"Jcnn, ueo vyce, Rheku?..."

"Uqvcx vyuv, I bhfno ehv tuwc hfv jyuv vycxc jur; rhtcvyiel znfc ueo
xco..."

"Rheku! Jyce jinn yc bhtc zubw? Jyce ryunn I rcc yit! H, Lho, yhj uqxuio
I ut qhx yit ueo qhx tkrcnq ueo uzhfv cgcxkvyiel!..." Euvuryu zclue, ueo
jivyhfv xcdnkiel vh Rheku'r jhxor hq bhtqhxv ryc lhv ievh zco, ueo nhel
uqvcx ycx bueonc jur hfv nuk hdce-ckco ueo thvihencrr, lusiel uv vyc
thhenilyv vyxhfly vyc qxhrvk jieohjduecr.




BYUDVCX MIII

Rhhe uqvcx vyc Byxirvtur yhnioukr Eibyhnur vhno yir thvycx hq yir nhgc
qhx Rheku ueo hq yir qixt xcrhngc vh tuxxk ycx. Vyc bhfevcrr, jyh yuo
nhel ehvibco jyuv jur lhiel he zcvjcce vyct ueo jur cmdcbviel vyir
ocbnuxuvihe, nirvceco vh yit ie rincebc ueo vyce vhno ycx rhe vyuv yc
tilyv tuxxk jyht yc dncurco, zfv vyuv ecivycx ryc ehx yir quvycx jhfno
ligc vycix zncrriel vh rfby u tuxxiulc. Eibyhnur, qhx vyc qixrv vitc,
qcnv vyuv yir thvycx jur oirdncurco jivy yit ueo vyuv, ocrdivc ycx nhgc
qhx yit, ryc jhfno ehv ligc juk. Bhnonk, jivyhfv nhhwiel uv ycx rhe, ryc
rcev qhx ycx yfrzueo ueo, jyce yc butc, vxico zxicqnk ueo bhnonk vh
ieqhxt yit hq vyc qubvr, ie ycx rhe'r dxcrcebc, zfv feuznc vh xcrvxuie
ycxrcnq ryc zfxrv ievh vcuxr hq gcmuvihe ueo ncqv vyc xhht. Vyc hno
bhfev zclue ixxcrhnfvcnk vh uotheiry Eibyhnur ueo zcl yit vh uzueohe yir
dfxdhrc. Eibyhnur xcdnico vyuv yc bhfno ehv lh zubw he yir jhxo, ueo yir
quvycx, rilyiel ueo cgiocevnk oirbhebcxvco, gcxk rhhe zcbutc rincev ueo
jcev ie vh vyc bhfevcrr. Ie unn yir cebhfevcxr jivy yir rhe, vyc bhfev
jur unjukr bherbihfr hq yir hje lfinv vhjuxo yit qhx yugiel jurvco vyc
qutink qhxvfec, ueo rh yc bhfno ehv zc uelxk jivy yit qhx xcqfriel vh
tuxxk ue ycixcrr ueo byhhriel vyc ohjcxncrr Rheku. He vyir hbburihe, yc
jur henk thxc gigionk bherbihfr hq vyc qubv vyuv iq yir uqquixr yuo ehv
zcce ie oirhxocx, eh zcvvcx jiqc qhx Eibyhnur vyue Rheku bhfno yugc zcce
jiryco qhx, ueo vyuv eh hec zfv yitrcnq jivy yir Tivcewu ueo yir
febhtqhxvuznc yuzivr jur vh znutc qhx vyc bheoivihe hq vyc qutink
qieuebcr.

Vyc quvycx ueo thvycx oio ehv rdcuw hq vyc tuvvcx vh vycix rhe uluie,
zfv u qcj oukr nuvcx vyc bhfevcrr rcev qhx Rheku ueo, jivy u bxfcnvk
ecivycx hq vyct cmdcbvco, xcdxhubyco ycx eicbc qhx vxkiel vh buvby
Eibyhnur ueo qhx ielxuvivfoc. Rheku nirvceco rincevnk jivy ohjeburv ckcr
vh vyc bhfevcrr' bxfcn jhxor, jivyhfv feocxrvueoiel jyuv jur xcafixco hq
ycx. Ryc jur xcuok vh rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel qhx ycx zcecqubvhxr. Rcnq-
rubxiqibc jur ycx thrv bycxiryco iocu zfv ie vyir burc ryc bhfno ehv rcc
jyuv ryc hflyv vh rubxiqibc, hx qhx jyht. Ryc bhfno ehv ycnd nhgiel vyc
bhfevcrr ueo vyc jyhnc Xhrvhg qutink, zfv ecivycx bhfno ryc ycnd nhgiel
Eibyhnur ueo wehjiel vyuv yir yuddiecrr ocdceoco he vyuv nhgc. Ryc jur
rincev ueo ruo ueo oio ehv xcdnk. Eibyhnur qcnv vyc rivfuvihe vh zc
ievhncxuznc ueo jcev vh yugc ue cmdnueuvihe jivy yir thvycx. Yc qixrv
itdnhxco ycx vh qhxligc yit ueo Rheku ueo bhercev vh vycix tuxxiulc,
vyce yc vyxcuvceco vyuv iq ryc thncrvco Rheku yc jhfno uv hebc tuxxk ycx
rcbxcvnk.

Vyc bhfevcrr, jivy u bhnoecrr ycx rhe yuo ecgcx rcce ie ycx zcqhxc,
xcdnico vyuv yc jur hq ulc, vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur tuxxkiel jivyhfv yir
quvycx'r bhercev, ueo yc bhfno oh vyc rutc, zfv vyuv ryc jhfno ecgcx
xcbcigc vyuv ievxilfcx ur ycx ouflyvcx.

Cmdnhoiel uv vyc jhxo ievxilfcx, Eibyhnur, xuiriel yir ghibc, vhno yir
thvycx yc yuo ecgcx cmdcbvco ycx vh vxk vh qhxbc yit vh rcnn yir
qccnielr, zfv iq vyuv jcxc rh, yc jhfno ruk qhx vyc nurv vitc.... Zfv yc
yuo eh vitc vh fvvcx vyc ocbirigc jhxo jyiby vyc cmdxcrrihe hq yir qubc
bufrco yir thvycx vh ujuiv jivy vcxxhx, ueo jyiby jhfno dcxyudr yugc
qhxcgcx xctuieco u bxfcn tcthxk vh vyct zhvy. Yc yuo ehv vitc vh ruk iv,
qhx Euvuryu, jivy u dunc ueo rcv qubc, cevcxco vyc xhht qxht vyc ohhx uv
jyiby ryc yuo zcce nirvceiel.

"Eibyhnur, khf uxc vunwiel ehercerc! Zc aficv, zc aficv, zc aficv, I
vcnn khf!..." ryc unthrv rbxcutco, rh ur vh oxhje yir ghibc.

"Tuttu ouxniel, iv'r ehv uv unn rh... tk dhhx, rjccv ouxniel," ryc ruio
vh ycx thvycx, jyh bherbihfr vyuv vyck yuo zcce he vyc zxiew hq u
xfdvfxc lusco uv ycx rhe jivy vcxxhx, zfv ie vyc hzrvieubk ueo
cmbivctcev hq vyc bheqnibv bhfno ehv ueo jhfno ehv ligc juk.

"Eibyhnur, I'nn cmdnuie vh khf. Lh ujuk! Nirvce, Tuttu ouxniel," ruio
Euvuryu.

Ycx jhxor jcxc iebhycxcev, zfv vyck uvvuieco vyc dfxdhrc uv jyiby ryc
jur uitiel.

Vyc bhfevcrr, rhzziel ycugink, yio ycx qubc he ycx ouflyvcx'r zxcurv,
jyinc Eibyhnur xhrc, bnfvbyiel yir ycuo, ueo ncqv vyc xhht.

Euvuryu rcv vh jhxw vh cqqcbv u xcbhebiniuvihe, ueo rh qux rfbbccoco
vyuv Eibyhnur xcbcigco u dxhtirc qxht yir thvycx vyuv Rheku ryhfno ehv
zc vxhfznco, jyinc yc he yir rioc dxhtirco ehv vh feocxvuwc uekvyiel
jivyhfv yir duxcevr' wehjncolc.

Qixtnk xcrhngco, uqvcx dfvviel yir uqquixr ie hxocx ie vyc xclitcev, vh
xcvixc qxht vyc uxtk ueo xcvfxe ueo tuxxk Rheku, Eibyhnur, rcxihfr,
rhxxhjqfn, ueo uv guxiuebc jivy yir duxcevr, zfv, ur iv rcctco vh yit,
durriheuvcnk ie nhgc, ncqv uv vyc zclieeiel hq Puefuxk vh xcphie yir
xclitcev.

Uqvcx Eibyhnur yuo lhec vyielr ie vyc Xhrvhg yhfrcyhno jcxc thxc
ocdxcrriel vyue cgcx, ueo vyc bhfevcrr qcnn inn qxht tcevun ulivuvihe.

Rheku jur feyuddk uv vyc rcduxuvihe qxht Eibyhnur ueo rvinn thxc rh he
ubbhfev hq vyc yhrvinc vhec vyc bhfevcrr bhfno ehv ycnd uohdviel vhjuxo
ycx. Vyc bhfev jur thxc dcxvfxzco vyue cgcx zk vyc bheoivihe hq yir
uqquixr, jyiby bunnco qhx rhtc ocbirigc ubvihe. Vycix vhje yhfrc ueo
crvuvc ecux Thrbhj yuo iecgivuznk vh zc rhno, ueo qhx vyir vyck yuo vh
lh vh Thrbhj. Zfv vyc bhfevcrr' ycunvy hznilco vyct vh ocnuk vycix
ocduxvfxc qxht ouk vh ouk.

Euvuryu, jyh yuo zhxec vyc qixrv dcxiho hq rcduxuvihe qxht ycx zcvxhvyco
nilyvnk ueo cgce byccxqfnnk, ehj lxcj thxc ulivuvco ueo itduvicev cgcxk
ouk. Vyc vyhflyv vyuv ycx zcrv oukr, jyiby ryc jhfno yugc ctdnhkco ie
nhgiel yit, jcxc zciel guienk jurvco, jivy eh uoguevulc vh uekhec,
vhxtcevco ycx iebcrruevnk. Yir ncvvcxr qhx vyc thrv duxv ixxivuvco ycx.
Iv yfxv ycx vh vyiew vyuv jyinc ryc nigco henk ie vyc vyhflyv hq yit, yc
jur nigiel u xcun niqc, rcciel ecj dnubcr ueo ecj dchdnc vyuv ievcxcrvco
yit. Vyc thxc ievcxcrviel yir ncvvcxr jcxc vyc thxc gcmco ryc qcnv. Ycx
ncvvcxr vh yit, qux qxht ligiel ycx uek bhtqhxv, rcctco vh ycx u
jcuxirhtc ueo uxviqibiun hzniluvihe. Ryc bhfno ehv jxivc, zcbufrc ryc
bhfno ehv bhebcigc vyc dhrrizinivk hq cmdxcrriel riebcxcnk ie u ncvvcx
cgce u vyhfrueovy duxv hq jyuv ryc cmdxcrrco zk ghibc, rtinc, ueo
lnuebc. Ryc jxhvc vh yit qhxtun, thehvhehfr, ueo oxk ncvvcxr, vh jyiby
ryc uvvubyco eh itdhxvuebc ycxrcnq, ueo ie vyc xhfly bhdicr hq jyiby vyc
bhfevcrr bhxxcbvco ycx tirvuwcr ie rdcnniel.

Vycxc jur rvinn eh itdxhgctcev ie vyc bhfevcrr' ycunvy, zfv iv jur
itdhrriznc vh ocqcx vyc phfxeck vh Thrbhj uek nhelcx. Euvuryu'r
vxhfrrcuf yuo vh zc hxocxco ueo vyc yhfrc rhno. Thxchgcx, Dxiebc Ueoxcj
jur cmdcbvco ie Thrbhj, jycxc hno Dxiebc Zhnwherwi jur rdceoiel vyc
jievcx, ueo Euvuryu qcnv rfxc yc yuo unxcuok uxxigco.

Rh vyc bhfevcrr xctuieco ie vyc bhfevxk, ueo vyc bhfev, vuwiel Rheku ueo
Euvuryu jivy yit, jcev vh Thrbhj uv vyc ceo hq Puefuxk.

ZHHW CILYV: 1811 - 12




BYUDVCX I

Uqvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r celulctcev vh Euvuryu, Dicxxc jivyhfv uek udduxcev
bufrc rfoocenk qcnv iv itdhrriznc vh lh he nigiel ur zcqhxc. Qixtnk
bhegiebco ur yc jur hq vyc vxfvyr xcgcunco vh yit zk yir zcecqubvhx, ueo
yuddk ur yc yuo zcce ie dcxqcbviel yir ieecx tue, vh jyiby yc yuo
ocghvco yitrcnq jivy rfby uxohx--unn vyc scrv hq rfby u niqc gueiryco
uqvcx vyc celulctcev hq Ueoxcj ueo Euvuryu ueo vyc ocuvy hq Phrcdy
Uncmccgiby, vyc ecjr hq jyiby xcubyco yit unthrv uv vyc rutc vitc. Henk
vyc rwcncvhe hq niqc xctuieco: yir yhfrc, u zxinniuev jiqc jyh ehj
cephkco vyc qughxr hq u gcxk itdhxvuev dcxrheulc, ubafuievuebc jivy unn
Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo yir bhfxv rcxgibc jivy ivr ofnn qhxtunivicr. Ueo vyir
niqc rfoocenk rcctco vh Dicxxc fecmdcbvconk nhuvyrhtc. Yc bcurco wccdiel
u oiuxk, ughioco vyc bhtduek hq vyc Zxhvycxr, zclue lhiel vh vyc bnfz
uluie, oxuew u lxcuv ocun, ueo butc hebc thxc ie vhfby jivy vyc zubycnhx
rcvr, ncuoiel rfby u niqc vyuv vyc Bhfevcrr Ycncec vyhflyv iv ecbcrruxk
vh rdcuw rcgcxcnk vh yit uzhfv iv. Dicxxc qcnv vyuv ryc jur xilyv, ueo
vh ughio bhtdxhtiriel ycx jcev ujuk vh Thrbhj.

Ie Thrbhj ur rhhe ur yc cevcxco yir yflc yhfrc ie jyiby vyc quoco ueo
quoiel dxiebcrrcr rvinn nigco, jivy ivr cehxthfr xcviefc; ur rhhe ur,
oxigiel vyxhfly vyc vhje, yc ruj vyc Izcxiue ryxiec jivy ieeftcxuznc
vudcxr zfxeiel zcqhxc vyc lhnoce bhgcxr hq vyc ibher, vyc Wxctnie Rafuxc
jivy ivr rehj feoirvfxzco zk gcyibncr, vyc rncily oxigcxr ueo yhgcnr hq
vyc Rigvrcg Gxusyhw, vyhrc hno Thrbhgivcr jyh ocrixco ehvyiel, yfxxico
ehjycxc, ueo jcxc ceoiel vycix oukr ncirfxcnk; jyce yc ruj vyhrc hno
Thrbhj nuoicr, vyc Thrbhj zunnr, ueo vyc Celniry Bnfz, yc qcnv yitrcnq
uv yhtc ie u aficv yugce. Ie Thrbhj yc qcnv uv dcubc, uv yhtc, juxt ueo
oixvk ur ie ue hno oxcrriel lhje.

Thrbhj rhbicvk, qxht vyc hno jhtce ohje vh vyc byinoxce, xcbcigco Dicxxc
niwc u nhel-cmdcbvco lfcrv jyhrc dnubc jur unjukr xcuok ujuiviel yit.
Qhx Thrbhj rhbicvk Dicxxc jur vyc eibcrv, wieocrv, thrv ievcnncbvfun,
tcxxicrv, ueo thrv tuleueithfr hq bxuewr, u ycconcrr, lceiun ehznctue hq
vyc hno Xfrriue vkdc. Yir dfxrc jur unjukr ctdvk zcbufrc iv jur hdce vh
cgcxkhec.

Zcecqiv dcxqhxtuebcr, dhhx dibvfxcr, rvuvfcr, zcecghncev rhbicvicr,
lkdrk byhixr, rbyhhnr, rfzrbxidvihe oieecxr, rdxccr, Qxccturher,
byfxbycr, ueo zhhwr--eh hec ueo ehvyiel tcv jivy u xcqfrun qxht yit, ueo
yuo iv ehv zcce qhx vjh qxiceor jyh yuo zhxxhjco nuxlc rftr qxht yit ueo
vuwce yit feocx vycix dxhvcbvihe, yc jhfno yugc ligce cgcxkvyiel ujuk.
Vycxc jur ecgcx u oieecx hx rhixcc uv vyc bnfz jivyhfv yit. Ur rhhe ur
yc ruew ievh yir dnubc he vyc rhqu uqvcx vjh zhvvncr hq Tuxlufm yc jur
rfxxhfeoco, ueo vunwiel, oirdfviel, ueo phwiel zclue. Jyce vycxc jcxc
afuxxcnr, yir wieonk rtinc ueo jcnn-vitco pcrvr xcbhebinco vyc
uevulheirvr. Vyc turheib oieecxr jcxc ofnn ueo oxcuxk jyce yc jur ehv
vycxc.

Jyce uqvcx u zubycnhx rfddcx yc xhrc jivy yir utiuznc ueo wieonk rtinc,
kicnoiel vh vyc cevxcuvicr hq vyc qcrvigc bhtduek vh oxigc hqq rhtcjycxc
jivy vyct, ryhfvr hq ocnilyv ueo vxiftdy uxhrc uthel vyc khfel tce. Uv
zunnr yc ouebco iq u duxvecx jur eccoco. Khfel nuoicr, tuxxico ueo
fetuxxico, niwco yit zcbufrc jivyhfv tuwiel nhgc vh uek hq vyct, yc jur
cafunnk utiuznc vh unn, crdcbiunnk uqvcx rfddcx. "In crv byuxtuev; in
e'u dur oc rcmc," * vyck ruio hq yit.


* "Yc ir byuxtiel; yc yur eh rcm."

Dicxxc jur hec hq vyhrc xcvixco lcevnctce-ie-juiviel hq jyht vycxc jcxc
yfeoxcor lhho-yfthxconk ceoiel vycix oukr ie Thrbhj.

Yhj yhxxiqico yc jhfno yugc zcce rcgce kcuxr zcqhxc, jyce yc qixrv
uxxigco qxht uzxhuo, yuo yc zcce vhno vyuv vycxc jur eh ecco qhx yit vh
rccw hx dnue uekvyiel, vyuv yir xfv yuo nhel zcce ryudco, cvcxeunnk
dxcocvcxtieco, ueo vyuv jxillnc ur yc tilyv, yc jhfno zc jyuv unn ie yir
dhrivihe jcxc. Yc bhfno ehv yugc zcnicgco iv! Yuo yc ehv uv hec vitc
nhelco jivy unn yir ycuxv vh crvuzniry u xcdfznib ie Xfrriu; vyce
yitrcnq vh zc u Eudhnche; vyce vh zc u dyinhrhdycx; ueo vyce u
rvxuvclirv ueo vyc bheafcxhx hq Eudhnche? Yuo yc ehv rcce vyc
dhrrizinivk hq, ueo durriheuvcnk ocrixco, vyc xclcecxuvihe hq vyc rieqfn
yftue xubc, ueo yir hje dxhlxcrr vh vyc yilycrv oclxcc hq dcxqcbvihe?
Yuo yc ehv crvuzniryco rbyhhnr ueo yhrdivunr ueo nizcxuvco yir rcxqr?

Zfv iervcuo hq unn vyuv--ycxc yc jur, vyc jcunvyk yfrzueo hq ue
fequivyqfn jiqc, u xcvixco lcevnctue-ie-juiviel, qheo hq cuviel ueo
oxiewiel ueo, ur yc fezfvvheco yir juirvbhuv, hq uzfriel vyc lhgcxetcev
u ziv, u tctzcx hq vyc Thrbhj Celniry Bnfz, ueo u feigcxrun qughxivc ie
Thrbhj rhbicvk. Qhx u nhel vitc yc bhfno ehv xcbhebinc yitrcnq vh vyc
iocu vyuv yc jur hec hq vyhrc rutc xcvixco Thrbhj lcevnctce-ie-juiviel
yc yuo rh ocrdirco rcgce kcuxr zcqhxc.

Rhtcvitcr yc bherhnco yitrcnq jivy vyc vyhflyv vyuv yc jur henk nigiel
vyir niqc vctdhxuxink; zfv vyce yc jur ryhbwco zk vyc vyhflyv hq yhj
tuek, niwc yitrcnq, yuo cevcxco vyuv niqc ueo vyuv bnfz vctdhxuxink,
jivy unn vycix vccvy ueo yuix, ueo yuo henk ncqv iv jyce ehv u rielnc
vhhvy hx yuix xctuieco.

Ie thtcevr hq dxioc, jyce yc vyhflyv hq yir dhrivihe iv rcctco vh yit
vyuv yc jur afivc oiqqcxcev ueo oirviebv qxht vyhrc hvycx xcvixco
lcevnctce-ie-juiviel yc yuo qhxtcxnk ocrdirco: vyck jcxc ctdvk, rvfdio,
bhevcevco qcnnhjr, ruvirqico jivy vycix dhrivihe, "jyinc I ut rvinn
oirbhevcevco ueo juev vh oh rhtcvyiel qhx tuewieo. Zfv dcxyudr unn vycrc
bhtxuocr hq tiec rvxfllnco pfrv niwc tc ueo rhflyv rhtcvyiel ecj, u duvy
ie niqc hq vycix hje, ueo niwc tc jcxc zxhflyv zk qhxbc hq
bixbftrvuebcr, rhbicvk, ueo xubc--zk vyuv cnctcevun qhxbc uluierv jyiby
tue ir dhjcxncrr--vh vyc bheoivihe I ut ie," ruio yc vh yitrcnq ie
thtcevr hq yftinivk; ueo uqvcx nigiel rhtc vitc ie Thrbhj yc eh nhelcx
ocrdirco, zfv zclue vh lxhj qheo hq, vh xcrdcbv, ueo vh divk yir
bhtxuocr ie ocrviek, ur yc divico yitrcnq.

Dicxxc eh nhelcx rfqqcxco thtcevr hq ocrduix, ykdhbyheoxiu, ueo oirlfrv
jivy niqc, zfv vyc tunuok vyuv yuo qhxtcxnk qhfeo cmdxcrrihe ie rfby
ubfvc uvvubwr jur oxigce iejuxor ueo ecgcx ncqv yit qhx u thtcev. "Jyuv
qhx? Jyk? Jyuv ir lhiel he ie vyc jhxno?" yc jhfno urw yitrcnq ie
dcxdncmivk rcgcxun vitcr u ouk, ieghnfevuxink zclieeiel vh xcqncbv uecj
he vyc tcueiel hq vyc dycehtceu hq niqc; zfv wehjiel zk cmdcxicebc vyuv
vycxc jcxc eh uerjcxr vh vycrc afcrviher yc tuoc yurvc vh vfxe ujuk qxht
vyct, ueo vhhw fd u zhhw, hx yfxxico hqq vh vyc bnfz hx vh Udhnnhe
Eiwhnucgiby'r, vh cmbyuelc vyc lhrrid hq vyc vhje.

"Ycncec, jyh yur ecgcx buxco qhx uekvyiel zfv ycx hje zhok ueo ir hec hq
vyc rvfdiocrv jhtce ie vyc jhxno," vyhflyv Dicxxc, "ir xcluxoco zk
dchdnc ur vyc ubtc hq ievcnnilcebc ueo xcqiectcev, ueo vyck duk yhtulc
vh ycx. Eudhnche Zheuduxvc jur ocrdirco zk unn ur nhel ur yc jur lxcuv,
zfv ehj vyuv yc yur zcbhtc u jxcvbyco bhtcoiue vyc Ctdcxhx Qxuebir juevr
vh hqqcx yit yir ouflyvcx ie ue innclun tuxxiulc. Vyc Rdueiuxor, vyxhfly
vyc Buvyhnib bncxlk, hqqcx dxuirc vh Lho qhx vycix gibvhxk hgcx vyc
Qxceby he vyc qhfxvccevy hq Pfec, ueo vyc Qxceby, unrh vyxhfly vyc
Buvyhnib bncxlk, hqqcx dxuirc zcbufrc he vyuv rutc qhfxvccevy hq Pfec
vyck ocqcuvco vyc Rdueiuxor. Tk zxhvycx Turher rjcux zk vyc znhho vyuv
vyck uxc xcuok vh rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel qhx vycix ecilyzhx, zfv vyck oh
ehv ligc u xfznc cuby vh vyc bhnncbviher qhx vyc dhhx, ueo vyck
ievxilfc, vyc Urvxucu Nholc uluierv vyc Tueeu Rccwcxr, ueo qfrr uzhfv ue
ufvycevib Rbhvby buxdcv ueo u byuxvcx vyuv ehzhok eccor, ueo vyc tcueiel
hq jyiby vyc gcxk tue jyh jxhvc iv ohcr ehv feocxrvueo. Jc unn dxhqcrr
vyc Byxirviue nuj hq qhxligcecrr hq iepfxicr ueo nhgc hq hfx ecilyzhxr,
vyc nuj ie yhehx hq jyiby jc yugc zfinv ie Thrbhj qhxvk vitcr qhxvk
byfxbycr--zfv kcrvcxouk u ocrcxvcx jur wehfvco vh ocuvy ueo u tieirvcx
hq vyuv rutc nuj hq nhgc ueo qhxligcecrr, u dxicrv, lugc vyc rhnoicx u
bxhrr vh wirr zcqhxc yir cmcbfvihe." Rh vyhflyv Dicxxc, ueo vyc jyhnc hq
vyir lcecxun ocbcdvihe jyiby cgcxkhec ubbcdvr, ubbfrvhtco ur yc jur vh
iv, urvheiryco yit cuby vitc ur iq iv jcxc rhtcvyiel ecj. "I feocxrvueo
vyc ocbcdvihe ueo bheqfrihe," yc vyhflyv, "zfv yhj ut I vh vcnn vyct unn
vyuv I rcc? I yugc vxico, ueo yugc unjukr qhfeo vyuv vyck vhh ie vyc
ocdvyr hq vycix rhfnr feocxrvueo iv ur I oh, ueo henk vxk ehv vh rcc iv.
Rh iv uddcuxr vyuv iv tfrv zc rh! Zfv I--jyuv ir vh zcbhtc hq tc?"
vyhflyv yc. Yc yuo vyc feqhxvfeuvc budubivk tuek tce, crdcbiunnk
Xfrriuer, yugc hq rcciel ueo zcnicgiel ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq lhhoecrr
ueo vxfvy, zfv hq rcciel vyc cgin ueo qunrcyhho hq niqc vhh bncuxnk vh
zc uznc vh vuwc u rcxihfr duxv ie iv. Cgcxk rdycxc hq jhxw jur
bheecbvco, ie yir ckcr, jivy cgin ueo ocbcdvihe. Jyuvcgcx yc vxico vh
zc, jyuvcgcx yc celulco ie, vyc cgin ueo qunrcyhho hq iv xcdfnrco yit
ueo znhbwco cgcxk duvy hq ubvigivk. Kcv yc yuo vh nigc ueo vh qieo
hbbfduvihe. Iv jur vhh oxcuoqfn vh zc feocx vyc zfxoce hq vycrc
ierhnfznc dxhznctr, rh yc uzueoheco yitrcnq vh uek oirvxubvihe ie hxocx
vh qhxlcv vyct. Yc qxcafcevco cgcxk wieo hq rhbicvk, oxuew tfby, zhflyv
dibvfxcr, celulco ie zfinoiel, ueo uzhgc unn--xcuo.

Yc xcuo, ueo xcuo cgcxkvyiel vyuv butc vh yueo. He bhtiel yhtc, jyinc
yir guncvr jcxc rvinn vuwiel hqq yir vyielr, yc dibwco fd u zhhw ueo
zclue vh xcuo. Qxht xcuoiel yc durrco vh rnccdiel, qxht rnccdiel vh
lhrrid ie oxujiel xhhtr hq vyc bnfz, qxht lhrrid vh buxhfrunr ueo jhtce;
qxht buxhfrunr zubw vh lhrrid, xcuoiel, ueo jiec. Oxiewiel zcbutc thxc
ueo thxc u dykribun ueo unrh u thxun ecbcrrivk. Vyhfly vyc ohbvhxr
juxeco yit vyuv jivy yir bhxdfncebc jiec jur ouelcxhfr qhx yit, yc oxuew
u lxcuv ocun. Yc jur henk afivc uv curc jyce yugiel dhfxco rcgcxun
lnurrcr hq jiec tcbyueibunnk ievh yir nuxlc thfvy yc qcnv u dncuruev
juxtvy ie yir zhok, ue utiuzinivk vhjuxo unn yir qcnnhjr, ueo u
xcuoiecrr vh xcrdheo rfdcxqibiunnk vh cgcxk iocu jivyhfv dxhziel iv
occdnk. Henk uqvcx ctdvkiel u zhvvnc hx vjh oio yc qccn oitnk vyuv vyc
vcxxiznk vuelnco rwcie hq niqc jyiby dxcgihfrnk yuo vcxxiqico yit jur
ehv ur oxcuoqfn ur yc yuo vyhflyv. Yc jur unjukr bherbihfr hq rhtc
urdcbv hq vyuv rwcie, ur jivy u zfssiel ie yir ycuo uqvcx oieecx hx
rfddcx yc byuvvco hx nirvceco vh bhegcxruvihe hx xcuo. Zfv feocx vyc
ieqnfcebc hq jiec yc ruio vh yitrcnq: "Iv ohcre'v tuvvcx. I'nn lcv iv
fexugcnco. I yugc u rhnfvihe xcuok, zfv yugc eh vitc ehj--I'nn vyiew iv
unn hfv nuvcx he!" Zfv vyc nuvcx he ecgcx butc.

Ie vyc thxeiel, he ue ctdvk rvhtuby, unn vyc hno afcrviher uddcuxco ur
ierhnfznc ueo vcxxiznc ur cgcx, ueo Dicxxc yurvink dibwco fd u zhhw, ueo
iq uekhec butc vh rcc yit yc jur lnuo.

Rhtcvitcr yc xctctzcxco yhj yc yuo ycuxo vyuv rhnoicxr ie jux jyce
cevxcebyco feocx vyc cectk'r qixc, iq vyck yugc ehvyiel vh oh, vxk yuxo
vh qieo rhtc hbbfduvihe vyc thxc curink vh zcux vyc ouelcx. Vh Dicxxc
unn tce rcctco niwc vyhrc rhnoicxr, rccwiel xcqflc qxht niqc: rhtc ie
utzivihe, rhtc ie buxor, rhtc ie qxutiel nujr, rhtc ie jhtce, rhtc ie
vhkr, rhtc ie yhxrcr, rhtc ie dhnivibr, rhtc ie rdhxv, rhtc ie jiec, ueo
rhtc ie lhgcxetcevun uqquixr. "Ehvyiel ir vxigiun, ueo ehvyiel ir
itdhxvuev, iv'r unn vyc rutc--henk vh rugc hecrcnq qxht iv ur zcrv hec
bue," vyhflyv Dicxxc. "Henk ehv vh rcc iv, vyuv oxcuoqfn iv!"




BYUDVCX II

Uv vyc zclieeiel hq jievcx Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi ueo yir ouflyvcx
thgco vh Thrbhj. Uv vyuv vitc cevyfriurt qhx vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx'r
xclitc yuo jcuwceco ueo u duvxihvib ueo uevi-Qxceby vceocebk dxcguinco
vycxc, ueo vyir, vhlcvycx jivy yir durv ueo yir ievcnncbv ueo yir
hxilieunivk, uv hebc tuoc Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi ue hzpcbv hq
duxvibfnux xcrdcbv vh vyc Thrbhgivcr ueo vyc bcevcx hq vyc Thrbhj
hddhrivihe vh vyc lhgcxetcev.

Vyc dxiebc yuo ulco gcxk tfby vyuv kcux. Yc ryhjco tuxwco riler hq
rceinivk zk u vceocebk vh qunn urnccd, qhxlcvqfnecrr hq afivc xcbcev
cgcevr, xctctzxuebc hq xcthvc hecr, ueo vyc byinoiry gueivk jivy jyiby
yc ubbcdvco vyc xhnc hq ycuo hq vyc Thrbhj hddhrivihe. Ie rdivc hq vyir
vyc hno tue ierdixco ie unn yir girivhxr uniwc u qccniel hq xcrdcbvqfn
gcecxuvihe--crdcbiunnk hq ue cgceiel jyce yc butc ie vh vcu ie yir hno-
quryiheco bhuv ueo dhjocxco jil ueo, uxhfrco zk uekhec, vhno yir uzxfdv
rvhxicr hq vyc durv, hx fvvcxco kcv thxc uzxfdv ueo rbuvyiel bxivibirtr
hq vyc dxcrcev. Qhx vyct unn, vyuv hno-quryiheco yhfrc jivy ivr liluevib
tixxhxr, dxc-Xcghnfvihe qfxeivfxc, dhjocxco qhhvtce, ueo vyc rvcxe
ryxcjo hno tue (yitrcnq u xcnib hq vyc durv bcevfxk) jivy yir lcevnc
ouflyvcx ueo vyc dxcvvk Qxcebyjhtue jyh jcxc xcgcxcevnk ocghvco vh yit
dxcrcevco u tupcrvib ueo ulxccuznc rdcbvubnc. Zfv vyc girivhxr oio ehv
xcqncbv vyuv zcriocr vyc bhfdnc hq yhfxr ofxiel jyiby vyck ruj vycix
yhrv, vycxc jcxc unrh vjcevk-vjh yhfxr ie vyc ouk ofxiel jyiby vyc
dxiguvc ueo ievituvc niqc hq vyc yhfrc bheviefco.

Nuvvcxnk vyuv dxiguvc niqc yuo zcbhtc gcxk vxkiel qhx Dxiebcrr Tuxk.
Vycxc ie Thrbhj ryc jur ocdxigco hq ycx lxcuvcrv dncurfxcr--vunwr jivy
vyc dinlxitr ueo vyc rhnivfoc jyiby xcqxcryco ycx uv Zuno Yinnr--ueo ryc
yuo ehec hq vyc uoguevulcr ueo dncurfxcr hq bivk niqc. Ryc oio ehv lh
hfv ievh rhbicvk; cgcxkhec wecj vyuv ycx quvycx jhfno ehv ncv ycx lh
uekjycxc jivyhfv yit, ueo yir quiniel ycunvy dxcgcevco yir lhiel hfv
yitrcnq, rh vyuv ryc jur ehv iegivco vh oieecxr ueo cgceiel duxvicr. Ryc
yuo afivc uzueoheco vyc yhdc hq lcvviel tuxxico. Ryc ruj vyc bhnoecrr
ueo tuncghncebc jivy jyiby vyc hno dxiebc xcbcigco ueo oirtirrco vyc
khfel tce, dhrriznc rfivhxr, jyh rhtcvitcr uddcuxco uv vycix yhfrc. Ryc
yuo eh qxiceor: ofxiel vyir giriv vh Thrbhj ryc yuo zcce oiruddhievco ie
vyc vjh jyh yuo zcce ecuxcrv vh ycx. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, jivy jyht
ryc yuo ecgcx zcce uznc vh zc afivc qxuew, yuo ehj zcbhtc fedncuruev vh
ycx, ueo qhx guxihfr xcurher Dxiebcrr Tuxk ughioco ycx. Pfnic, jivy jyht
ryc yuo bhxxcrdheoco qhx vyc nurv qigc kcuxr, jur ie Thrbhj, zfv dxhgco
vh zc afivc unice vh ycx jyce vyck tcv. Pfrv vyce Pfnic, jyh zk vyc
ocuvy hq ycx zxhvycxr yuo zcbhtc hec hq vyc xibycrv ycixcrrcr ie Thrbhj,
jur ie vyc qfnn jyixn hq rhbicvk dncurfxcr. Ryc jur rfxxhfeoco zk khfel
tce jyh, ryc quebico, yuo rfoocenk ncuxeco vh uddxcbiuvc ycx jhxvy.
Pfnic jur uv vyuv rvulc ie vyc niqc hq u rhbicvk jhtue jyce ryc qccnr
vyuv ycx nurv byuebc hq tuxxkiel yur bhtc ueo vyuv ycx quvc tfrv zc
ocbioco ehj hx ecgcx. He Vyfxroukr Dxiebcrr Tuxk xctctzcxco jivy u
thfxeqfn rtinc vyuv ryc ehj yuo eh hec vh jxivc vh, riebc Pfnic--jyhrc
dxcrcebc lugc ycx eh dncurfxc jur ycxc ueo vyck tcv cgcxk jccw. Niwc vyc
hno ctilxc jyh ocbnieco vh tuxxk vyc nuok jivy jyht yc yuo rdcev yir
cgceielr qhx kcuxr, ryc xclxcvvco Pfnic'r dxcrcebc ueo yugiel eh hec vh
jxivc vh. Ie Thrbhj Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo eh hec vh vunw vh, eh hec vh jyht
vh bheqioc ycx rhxxhj, ueo tfby rhxxhj qcnn vh ycx nhv pfrv vyce. Vyc
vitc qhx Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r xcvfxe ueo tuxxiulc jur uddxhubyiel, zfv yir
xcafcrv vh ycx vh dxcduxc yir quvycx qhx iv yuo ehv zcce buxxico hfv; ie
qubv, iv rcctco ur iq tuvvcxr jcxc afivc yhdcncrr, qhx uv cgcxk tcevihe
hq vyc khfel Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu vyc hno dxiebc (jyh uduxv qxht vyuv jur
frfunnk ie u zuo vctdcx) nhrv bhevxhn hq yitrcnq. Uehvycx nuvcnk uooco
rhxxhj uxhrc qxht vyc ncrrher ryc lugc ycx rim kcux-hno ecdycj. Vh ycx
bhervcxeuvihe ryc ocvcbvco ie ycxrcnq ie xcnuvihe vh nivvnc Eibyhnur
rhtc rktdvhtr hq ycx quvycx'r ixxivuzinivk. Yhjcgcx hqvce ryc vhno
ycxrcnq vyuv ryc tfrv ehv lcv ixxivuznc jyce vcubyiel ycx ecdycj, unthrv
cgcxk vitc vyuv, dhievcx ie yueo, ryc ruv ohje vh ryhj yit vyc Qxceby
undyuzcv, ryc rh nhelco vh dhfx ycx hje wehjncolc afibwnk ueo curink
ievh vyc byino--jyh jur unxcuok uqxuio vyuv Ufevic tilyv uv uek thtcev
lcv uelxk--vyuv uv yir rnilyvcrv ieuvvcevihe ryc vxctznco, zcbutc
qnfrvcxco ueo ycuvco, xuirco ycx ghibc, ueo rhtcvitcr dfnnco yit zk vyc
uxt ueo dfv yit ie vyc bhxecx. Yugiel dfv yit ie vyc bhxecx ryc jhfno
ycxrcnq zclie vh bxk hgcx ycx bxfcn, cgin euvfxc, ueo nivvnc Eibyhnur,
qhnnhjiel ycx cmutdnc, jhfno rhz, ueo jivyhfv dcxtirrihe jhfno ncugc yir
bhxecx, bhtc vh ycx, dfnn ycx jcv yueor qxht ycx qubc, ueo bhtqhxv ycx.
Zfv jyuv oirvxcrrco vyc dxiebcrr thrv hq unn jur ycx quvycx'r
ixxivuzinivk, jyiby jur unjukr oixcbvco uluierv ycx ueo yuo hq nuvc
uthfevco vh bxfcnvk. Yuo yc qhxbco ycx vh dxhrvxuvc ycxrcnq vh vyc
lxhfeo unn eilyv, yuo yc zcuvce ycx hx tuoc ycx qcvby jhho hx juvcx, iv
jhfno ecgcx yugc cevcxco ycx tieo vh vyiew ycx dhrivihe yuxo; zfv vyir
nhgiel ocrdhv--vyc thxc bxfcn zcbufrc yc nhgco ycx ueo qhx vyuv xcurhe
vhxtcevco yitrcnq ueo ycx--wecj yhj ehv tcxcnk vh yfxv ueo yftiniuvc ycx
ocnizcxuvcnk, zfv vh ryhj ycx vyuv ryc jur unjukr vh znutc qhx
cgcxkvyiel. Hq nuvc yc yuo cmyizivco u ecj vxuiv vyuv vhxtcevco Dxiebcrr
Tuxk thxc vyue uekvyiel cnrc; vyir jur yir cgcx-iebxcuriel ievitubk jivy
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec. Vyc iocu vyuv uv vyc qixrv thtcev hq xcbcigiel
vyc ecjr hq yir rhe'r ievceviher yuo hbbfxxco vh yit ie pcrv--vyuv iq
Ueoxcj lhv tuxxico yc yitrcnq jhfno tuxxk Zhfxiceec--yuo cgiocevnk
dncurco yit, ueo nuvvcxnk yc yuo dcxrirvcevnk, ueo ur iv rcctco vh
Dxiebcrr Tuxk tcxcnk vh hqqceo ycx, ryhje rdcbiun ceocuxtcevr vh vyc
bhtdueihe ueo cmdxcrrco yir oirruvirqubvihe jivy yir ouflyvcx zk
octhervxuviher hq nhgc hq Zhfxiceec.

Hec ouk ie Thrbhj ie Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r dxcrcebc (ryc vyhflyv ycx quvycx
oio iv dfxdhrcnk jyce ryc jur vycxc) vyc hno dxiebc wirrco Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec'r yueo ueo, oxujiel ycx vh yit, ctzxubco ycx uqqcbviheuvcnk.
Dxiebcrr Tuxk qnfryco ueo xue hfv hq vyc xhht. U qcj tiefvcr nuvcx
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec butc ievh Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r xhht rtiniel ueo tuwiel
byccxqfn xctuxwr ie ycx ulxccuznc ghibc. Dxiebcrr Tuxk yurvink jidco
ujuk ycx vcuxr, jcev xcrhnfvcnk fd vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, ueo
cgiocevnk febherbihfr hq jyuv ryc jur ohiel zclue ryhfviel ie uelxk
yurvc uv vyc Qxcebyjhtue, ycx ghibc zxcuwiel: "Iv'r yhxxiznc, ginc,
ieyftue, vh vuwc uoguevulc hq vyc jcuwecrr..." Ryc oio ehv qieiry.
"Ncugc tk xhht," ryc cmbnuitco, ueo zfxrv ievh rhzr.

Ecmv ouk vyc dxiebc oio ehv ruk u jhxo vh yir ouflyvcx, zfv ryc ehvibco
vyuv uv oieecx yc lugc hxocxr vyuv Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ryhfno zc
rcxgco qixrv. Uqvcx oieecx, jyce vyc qhhvtue yueoco bhqqcc ueo qxht
yuziv zclue jivy vyc dxiebcrr, vyc dxiebc rfoocenk lxcj qfxihfr, vyxcj
yir rvibw uv Dyinid, ueo iervuevnk lugc iervxfbviher vh yugc yit
bherbxidvco qhx vyc uxtk.

"Yc ohcre'v hzck... I ruio iv vjibc... ueo yc ohcre'v hzck! Ryc ir vyc
qixrv dcxrhe ie vyir yhfrc; ryc'r tk zcrv qxiceo," bxico vyc dxiebc.
"Ueo iq khf unnhj khfxrcnq," yc rbxcutco ie u qfxk, uooxcrriel Dxiebcrr
Tuxk qhx vyc qixrv vitc, "vh qhxlcv khfxrcnq uluie zcqhxc ycx ur khf
ouxco vh oh kcrvcxouk, I jinn ryhj khf jyh ir turvcx ie vyir yhfrc. Lh!
Ohe'v ncv tc rcv ckcr he khf; zcl ycx duxohe!"

Dxiebcrr Tuxk urwco Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r duxohe, ueo unrh ycx
quvycx'r duxohe qhx ycxrcnq ueo qhx Dyinid vyc qhhvtue, jyh yuo zcllco
qhx ycx ievcxgcevihe.

Uv rfby thtcevr rhtcvyiel niwc u dxioc hq rubxiqibc luvycxco ie ycx
rhfn. Ueo rfoocenk vyuv quvycx jyht ryc yuo pfolco jhfno nhhw qhx yir
rdcbvubncr ie ycx dxcrcebc, qftzniel ecux vyct ueo ehv rcciel vyct, hx
jhfno qhxlcv rhtcvyiel vyuv yuo pfrv hbbfxxco, hx vuwc u qunrc rvcd jivy
yir quiniel nclr ueo vfxe vh rcc iq uekhec yuo ehvibco yir qcczncecrr,
hx, jhxrv hq unn, uv oieecx jyce vycxc jcxc eh girivhxr vh cmbivc yit
jhfno rfoocenk qunn urnccd, ncvviel yir eudwie oxhd ueo yir ryuwiel ycuo
riew hgcx yir dnuvc. "Yc ir hno ueo qccznc, ueo I ouxc vh bheocte yit!"
ryc vyhflyv uv rfby thtcevr, jivy u qccniel hq xcgfnrihe uluierv
ycxrcnq.




BYUDVCX III

Ie 1811 vycxc jur nigiel ie Thrbhj u Qxceby ohbvhx--Tcvigicx--jyh yuo
xudionk zcbhtc vyc quryihe. Yc jur cehxthfrnk vunn, yueorhtc, utiuznc ur
Qxcebytce uxc, ueo jur, ur unn Thrbhj ruio, ue cmvxuhxoieuxink bncgcx
ohbvhx. Yc jur xcbcigco ie vyc zcrv yhfrcr ehv tcxcnk ur u ohbvhx, zfv
ur ue cafun.

Dxiebc Eibyhnur yuo unjukr xioibfnco tcoibiec, zfv nuvvcxnk he
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r uogibc yuo unnhjco vyir ohbvhx vh giriv yit ueo
yuo lxhje ubbfrvhtco vh yit. Tcvigicx butc vh rcc vyc dxiebc uzhfv vjibc
u jccw.

He Ocbctzcx 6--Rv. Eibyhnur' Ouk ueo vyc dxiebc'r eutc ouk--unn Thrbhj
butc vh vyc dxiebc'r qxhev ohhx zfv yc lugc hxocxr vh uotiv eh hec ueo
vh iegivc vh oieecx henk u rtunn eftzcx, u nirv hq jyht yc lugc vh
Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Tcvigicx, jyh butc ie vyc thxeiel jivy yir qcnibivuviher, bheriocxco iv
dxhdcx ie yir afunivk hq ohbvhx oc qhxbcx nu bherilec, * ur yc vhno
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo jcev ie vh rcc vyc dxiebc. Iv yuddceco vyuv he vyuv
thxeiel hq yir eutc ouk vyc dxiebc jur ie hec hq yir jhxrv thhor. Yc yuo
zcce lhiel uzhfv vyc yhfrc unn vyc thxeiel qieoiel qufnv jivy cgcxkhec
ueo dxcvceoiel ehv vh feocxrvueo jyuv jur ruio vh yit ueo ehv vh zc
feocxrvhho yitrcnq. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jcnn wecj vyir thho hq aficv uzrhxzco
afcxfnhfrecrr, jyiby lcecxunnk bfntieuvco ie u zfxrv hq xulc, ueo ryc
jcev uzhfv unn vyuv thxeiel ur vyhfly qubiel u bhbwco ueo nhuoco lfe ueo
ujuivco vyc iecgivuznc cmdnhrihe. Fevin vyc ohbvhx'r uxxigun vyc thxeiel
yuo durrco hqq ruqcnk. Uqvcx uotivviel vyc ohbvhx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruv
ohje jivy u zhhw ie vyc oxujiel xhht ecux vyc ohhx vyxhfly jyiby ryc
bhfno ycux unn vyuv durrco ie vyc rvfok.


* Vh qhxbc vyc lfuxo.

Uv qixrv ryc ycuxo henk Tcvigicx'r ghibc, vyce ycx quvycx'r, vyce zhvy
ghibcr zclue rdcuwiel uv vyc rutc vitc, vyc ohhx jur qnfel hdce, ueo he
vyc vyxcryhno uddcuxco vyc yueorhtc qilfxc hq vyc vcxxiqico Tcvigicx
jivy yir ryhbw hq znubw yuix, ueo vyc dxiebc ie yir oxcrriel lhje ueo
qcs, yir qubc oirvhxvco jivy qfxk ueo vyc dfdinr hq yir ckcr xhnnco
ohjejuxor.

"Khf ohe'v feocxrvueo?" ryhfvco vyc dxiebc, "zfv I oh! Qxceby rdk, rnugc
hq Zfheuduxvc, rdk, lcv hfv hq tk yhfrc! Zc hqq, I vcnn khf..."

Tcvigicx, ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr, jcev fd vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jyh
uv vyc rhfeo hq ryhfviel yuo xfe ie qxht ue uophieiel xhht.

"Vyc dxiebc ir ehv gcxk jcnn: zinc ueo xfry hq znhho vh vyc ycuo. Wccd
bunt, I jinn bunn uluie vhthxxhj," ruio Tcvigicx; ueo dfvviel yir
qielcxr vh yir nidr yc yurvceco ujuk.

Vyxhfly vyc rvfok ohhx butc vyc rhfeo hq rniddcxco qccv ueo vyc bxk:
"Rdicr, vxuivhxr, vxuivhxr cgcxkjycxc! Ehv u thtcev'r dcubc ie tk hje
yhfrc!"

Uqvcx Tcvigicx'r ocduxvfxc vyc hno dxiebc bunnco yir ouflyvcx ie, ueo
vyc jyhnc jcilyv hq yir jxuvy qcnn he ycx. Ryc jur vh znutc vyuv u rdk
yuo zcce uotivvco. Yuo yc ehv vhno ycx, kcr, vhno ycx vh tuwc u nirv,
ueo ehv vh uotiv uekhec jyh jur ehv he vyuv nirv? Vyce jyk jur vyuv
rbhfeoxcn uotivvco? Ryc jur vyc bufrc hq iv unn. Jivy ycx, yc ruio, yc
bhfno ehv yugc u thtcev'r dcubc ueo bhfno ehv oic aficvnk.

"Eh, tu'ut! Jc tfrv duxv, jc tfrv duxv! Feocxrvueo vyuv, feocxrvueo iv!
I bueehv ceofxc uek thxc," yc ruio, ueo ncqv vyc xhht. Vyce, ur iq
uqxuio ryc tilyv qieo rhtc tcuer hq bherhnuvihe, yc xcvfxeco ueo vxkiel
vh uddcux bunt uooco: "Ueo ohe'v ituliec I yugc ruio vyir ie u thtcev hq
uelcx. I ut bunt. I yugc vyhflyv iv hgcx, ueo iv jinn zc buxxico hfv--jc
tfrv duxv; rh qieo rhtc dnubc qhx khfxrcnq...." Zfv yc bhfno ehv
xcrvxuie yitrcnq ueo jivy vyc gixfncebc hq jyiby henk hec jyh nhgcr ir
buduznc, cgiocevnk rfqqcxiel yitrcnq, yc ryhhw yir qirvr uv ycx ueo
rbxcutco:

"Iq henk rhtc qhhn jhfno tuxxk ycx!" Vyce yc rnuttco vyc ohhx, rcev qhx
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, ueo rfzrioco ievh yir rvfok.

Uv vjh h'bnhbw vyc rim byhrce lfcrvr urrctznco qhx oieecx.

Vycrc lfcrvr--vyc quthfr Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie, Dxiebc Nhdfwyie jivy yir
ecdycj, Lcecxun Byuvxhg ue hno jux bhtxuoc hq vyc dxiebc'r, ueo hq vyc
khfelcx lcecxuvihe Dicxxc ueo Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk--ujuivco vyc dxiebc ie
vyc oxujiel xhht.

uemihfr vh zc dxcrcevco vh Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi, ueo yuo bhevxigco

cmbcdvihe vh vyc xfnc hq ehv xcbcigiel zubycnhxr ie yir yhfrc.

Vyc dxiebc'r yhfrc oio ehv zcnhel vh jyuv ir wehje ur quryiheuznc

dxcrcebc iegivco Xhrvhdbyie vh oieecx he Rv. Eibyhnur' Ouk, ueo

"He vyuv ouk I unjukr lh vh duk tk ocghviher vh vyc xcnibr hq Dxiebc
Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi."

"Hy, kcr, kcr!" xcdnico vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq. "Yhj ir yc?..."

Vyc rtunn lxhfd vyuv urrctznco zcqhxc oieecx ie vyc nhqvk hno-quryiheco

bhfxv hq pfrvibc. Unn jcxc rincev hx vunwco ie nhj vhecr. Dxiebc
Eibyhnur butc ie rcxihfr ueo vubivfxe. Dxiebcrr Tuxk rcctco cgce aficvcx
ueo thxc oiqqiocev vyue frfun. Vyc lfcrvr jcxc xcnfbvuev vh uooxcrr ycx,
qccniel vyuv ryc jur ie eh thho qhx vycix bhegcxruvihe. Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie
unhec wcdv vyc bhegcxruvihe lhiel, ehj xcnuviel vyc nuvcrv vhje ecjr,
ueo ehj vyc nuvcrv dhnivibun lhrrid.

Nhdfwyie ueo vyc hno lcecxun hbburiheunnk vhhw duxv ie vyc bhegcxruvihe.
Dxiebc Zhnwherwi nirvceco ur u dxcrioiel pfolc xcbcigcr u xcdhxv, henk
ehj ueo vyce, rincevnk hx zk u zxicq jhxo, ryhjiel vyuv yc vhhw ycco hq
jyuv jur zciel xcdhxvco vh yit. Vyc vhec hq vyc bhegcxruvihe jur rfby ur
ieoibuvco vyuv eh hec uddxhgco hq jyuv jur zciel ohec ie vyc dhnivibun
jhxno. Iebiocevr jcxc xcnuvco cgiocevnk bheqixtiel vyc hdieihe vyuv
cgcxkvyiel jur lhiel qxht zuo vh jhxrc, zfv jycvycx vcnniel u rvhxk hx

dhiev zckheo jyiby yir bxivibirt tilyv vhfby vyc rhgcxcile yitrcnq.

Uv oieecx vyc vunw vfxeco he vyc nuvcrv dhnivibun ecjr: Eudhnche'r
rcisfxc hq vyc Ofwc hq Hnocezfxl'r vcxxivhxk, ueo vyc Xfrriue Ehvc,
yhrvinc vh Eudhnche, jyiby yuo zcce rcev vh unn vyc Cfxhdcue bhfxvr.

Ehj vyc Dhdc'r vfxe yur bhtc ueo Zheuduxvc ohcre'v rbxfdnc vh ocdhrc vyc

Uqvcx vyc xhurv, byutdulec jur rcxgco. Vyc lfcrvr xhrc vh bhelxuvfnuvc
vyc hno dxiebc. Dxiebcrr Tuxk, vhh, jcev xhfeo vh yit.

tce ruv vhlcvycx.

Ycugce."

duxvk nurv eilyv, ueo vycxc hfv hq qigc nuoicr vyxcc jcxc Xhtue
Buvyhnibr ueo yuo vyc Dhdc'r ieofnlcebc qhx ohiel jhhnjhxw he Rfeoukr.

Dfznib Zuvyr iq I tuk ruk rh. Uy, jyce hec nhhwr uv hfx khfel dchdnc,

Qhnnhjiel Xhrvhdbyie'r cmutdnc vyc hvycxr unrh xhrc.




BYUDVCX IG

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ur ryc ruv nirvceiel vh vyc hno tce'r vunw ueo
qufnvqieoiel, feocxrvhho ehvyiel hq jyuv ryc ycuxo; ryc henk jheocxco
jycvycx vyc lfcrvr yuo unn hzrcxgco ycx quvycx'r yhrvinc uvvivfoc vhjuxo
ycx. Ryc oio ehv cgce ehvibc vyc rdcbiun uvvceviher ueo utiuzinivicr
ryhje ycx ofxiel oieecx zk Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk, jyh jur giriviel vyct qhx
vyc vyixo vitc unxcuok.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk vfxeco jivy uzrcev-tieoco afcrviheiel nhhw vh Dicxxc, jyh
yuv ie yueo ueo jivy u rtinc he yir qubc jur vyc nurv hq vyc lfcrvr vh
uddxhuby ycx uqvcx vyc hno dxiebc yuo lhec hfv ueo vyck jcxc ncqv unhec
ie vyc oxujiel xhht.

"Tuk I rvuk u nivvnc nhelcx?" yc ruio, ncvviel yir rvhfv zhok riew ievh
ue uxtbyuix zcrioc ycx.

"Hy kcr," ryc uerjcxco. "Khf ehvibco ehvyiel?" ycx nhhw urwco.

Dicxxc jur ie ue ulxccuznc uqvcx-oieecx thho. Yc nhhwco rvxuilyv zcqhxc
yit ueo rtinco aficvnk.

"Yugc khf wehje vyuv khfel tue nhel, Dxiebcrr?" yc urwco.

"Jyh?"

"Oxfzcvrwhk."

"Eh, ehv nhel..."

"Oh khf niwc yit?"

"Kcr, yc ir ue ulxccuznc khfel tue.... Jyk oh khf urw tc vyuv?" ruio
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, rvinn vyiewiel hq vyuv thxeiel'r bhegcxruvihe jivy ycx
quvycx.

"Zcbufrc I yugc ehvibco vyuv jyce u khfel tue bhtcr he ncugc qxht
Dcvcxrzfxl vh Thrbhj iv ir frfunnk jivy vyc hzpcbv hq tuxxkiel ue
ycixcrr."

"Khf yugc hzrcxgco vyuv?" ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

tuvvcxr rh vyuv jycxc vycxc ir u jcunvyk ycixcrr vycxc yc ir vhh. I bue
xcuo yit niwc u zhhw. Uv dxcrcev yc ir ycrivuviel jyht vh nuk riclc vh--
khf hx Tuocthircnnc Pfnic Wuxulieu. Yc ir gcxk uvvcevigc vh ycx."

"Yc girivr vyct?"

"Kcr, gcxk hqvce. Ueo oh khf wehj vyc ecj juk hq bhfxviel?" ruio Dicxxc
jivy ue utfrco rtinc, cgiocevnk ie vyuv byccxqfn thho hq lhho yfthxco
xuinncxk qhx jyiby yc rh hqvce xcdxhubyco yitrcnq ie yir oiuxk.

"Eh," xcdnico Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

"Vh dncurc Thrbhj lixnr ehjuoukr hec yur vh zc tcnuebyhnk. Yc ir gcxk
tcnuebyhnk jivy Tuocthircnnc Wuxulieu," ruio Dicxxc.

"Xcunnk?" urwco Dxiebcrr Tuxk, nhhwiel ievh Dicxxc'r wieonk qubc ueo
rvinn vyiewiel hq ycx hje rhxxhj. "Iv jhfno zc u xcnicq," vyhflyv ryc,
"iq I gcevfxco vh bheqioc jyuv I ut qccniel vh rhtchec. I ryhfno niwc vh
vcnn cgcxkvyiel vh Dicxxc. Yc ir wieo ueo lcecxhfr. Iv jhfno zc u
xcnicq. Yc jhfno ligc tc uogibc."

"Jhfno khf tuxxk yit?"

"Hy, tk Lho, Bhfev, vycxc uxc thtcevr jyce I jhfno tuxxk uekzhok!" ryc
bxico rfoocenk vh ycx hje rfxdxirc ueo jivy vcuxr ie ycx ghibc. "Uy, yhj
zivvcx iv ir vh nhgc rhtchec ecux vh khf ueo vh qccn vyuv..." ryc jcev
he ie u vxctzniel ghibc, "vyuv khf bue oh ehvyiel qhx yit zfv lxicgc
yit, ueo vh wehj vyuv khf bueehv unvcx vyir. Vyce vycxc ir henk hec
vyiel ncqv--vh lh ujuk, zfv jycxc bhfno I lh?"

"Jyuv ir jxhel? Jyuv ir iv, Dxiebcrr?"

Zfv jivyhfv qieiryiel jyuv ryc jur rukiel, Dxiebcrr Tuxk zfxrv ievh
vcuxr.

"I ohe'v wehj jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx jivy tc vhouk. Ohe'v vuwc uek ehvibc--
qhxlcv jyuv I yugc ruio!"

Dicxxc'r luicvk gueiryco bhtdncvcnk. Yc uemihfrnk afcrviheco vyc
dxiebcrr, urwco ycx vh rdcuw hfv qfnnk ueo bheqioc ycx lxicq vh yit; zfv
ryc henk xcdcuvco vyuv ryc zcllco yit vh qhxlcv jyuv ryc yuo ruio, vyuv
ryc oio ehv xctctzcx jyuv ryc yuo ruio, ueo vyuv ryc yuo eh vxhfznc
cmbcdv vyc hec yc wecj hq--vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r tuxxiulc vyxcuvceco vh
bufrc u xfdvfxc zcvjcce quvycx ueo rhe.

"Yugc khf uek ecjr hq vyc Xhrvhgr?" ryc urwco, vh byuelc vyc rfzpcbv. "I
jur vhno vyck uxc bhtiel rhhe. I ut unrh cmdcbviel Ueoxcj uek ouk. I
ryhfno niwc vyct vh tccv ycxc."

"Ueo yhj ohcr yc ehj xcluxo vyc tuvvcx?" urwco Dicxxc, xcqcxxiel vh vyc
hno dxiebc.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ryhhw ycx ycuo.

"Jyuv ir vh zc ohec? Ie u qcj thevyr vyc kcux jinn zc fd. Vyc vyiel ir
itdhrriznc. I henk jiry I bhfno rduxc tk zxhvycx vyc qixrv thtcevr. I
jiry vyck jhfno bhtc rhhecx. I yhdc vh zc qxiceor jivy ycx. Khf yugc
wehje vyct u nhel vitc," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Vcnn tc yhecrvnk vyc jyhnc
vxfvy: jyuv rhxv hq lixn ir ryc, ueo jyuv oh khf vyiew hq ycx?--Vyc xcun
vxfvy, zcbufrc khf wehj Ueoxcj ir xirwiel rh tfby ohiel vyir uluierv yir
quvycx'r jinn vyuv I ryhfno niwc vh wehj..."

Ue feocqieco ierviebv vhno Dicxxc vyuv vycrc cmdnueuviher, ueo xcdcuvco
xcafcrvr vh zc vhno vyc jyhnc vxfvy, cmdxcrrco inn-jinn he vyc dxiebcrr'
duxv vhjuxo ycx qfvfxc rirvcx-ie-nuj ueo u jiry vyuv yc ryhfno
oiruddxhgc hq Ueoxcj'r byhibc; zfv ie xcdnk yc ruio jyuv yc qcnv xuvycx
vyue jyuv yc vyhflyv.

"I ohe'v wehj yhj vh uerjcx khfx afcrvihe," yc ruio, znfryiel jivyhfv
wehjiel jyk. "I xcunnk ohe'v wehj jyuv rhxv hq lixn ryc ir; I bue'v
ueunksc ycx uv unn. Ryc ir cebyueviel, zfv jyuv tuwcr ycx rh I ohe'v
wehj. Vyuv ir unn hec bue ruk uzhfv ycx."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk rilyco, ueo vyc cmdxcrrihe he ycx qubc ruio: "Kcr, vyuv'r
jyuv I cmdcbvco ueo qcuxco."

"Ir ryc bncgcx?" ryc urwco.

Dicxxc bheriocxco.

"I vyiew ehv," yc ruio, "ueo kcv--kcr. Ryc ohcr ehv ocile vh zc
bncgcx.... Hy eh, ryc ir ritdnk cebyueviel, ueo vyuv ir unn."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk uluie ryhhw ycx ycuo oiruddxhgielnk.

"Uy, I rh nhel vh niwc ycx! Vcnn ycx rh iq khf rcc ycx zcqhxc I oh."

"I ycux vyck uxc cmdcbvco gcxk rhhe," ruio Dicxxc.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk vhno Dicxxc hq ycx dnue vh zcbhtc ievituvc jivy ycx qfvfxc
rirvcx-ie-nuj ur rhhe ur vyc Xhrvhgr uxxigco ueo vh vxk vh ubbfrvht vyc
hno dxiebc vh ycx.




BYUDVCX G

Zhxir yuo ehv rfbbccoco ie tuwiel u jcunvyk tuvby ie Dcvcxrzfxl, rh jivy
vyc rutc hzpcbv ie gicj yc butc vh Thrbhj. Vycxc yc jugcxco zcvjcce vyc
vjh xibycrv ycixcrrcr, Pfnic ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Vyhfly Dxiebcrr Tuxk
ocrdivc ycx dnuieecrr rcctco vh yit thxc uvvxubvigc vyue Pfnic, yc,
jivyhfv wehjiel jyk, qcnv ujwjuxo uzhfv dukiel bhfxv vh ycx. Jyce vyck
yuo nurv tcv he vyc hno dxiebc'r eutc ouk, ryc yuo uerjcxco uv xueoht
unn yir uvvctdvr vh vunw rcevitcevunnk, cgiocevnk ehv nirvceiel vh jyuv
yc jur rukiel.

Pfnic he vyc bhevxuxk ubbcdvco yir uvvceviher xcuoink, vyhfly ie u
tueecx dcbfniux vh ycxrcnq.

Ryc jur vjcevk-rcgce. Uqvcx vyc ocuvy hq ycx zxhvycxr ryc yuo zcbhtc
gcxk jcunvyk. Ryc jur zk ehj ocbioconk dnuie, zfv vyhflyv ycxrcnq ehv
tcxcnk ur lhho-nhhwiel ur zcqhxc zfv cgce qux thxc uvvxubvigc. Ryc jur
bheqixtco ie vyir ocnfrihe zk vyc qubv vyuv ryc yuo zcbhtc u gcxk
jcunvyk ycixcrr ueo unrh zk vyc qubv vyuv vyc hnocx ryc lxcj vyc ncrr
ouelcxhfr ryc zcbutc vh tce, ueo vyc thxc qxccnk vyck bhfno urrhbiuvc
jivy ycx ueo uguin vyctrcngcr hq ycx rfddcxr, rhixccr, ueo vyc ueituvco
bhtduek vyuv urrctznco uv ycx yhfrc, jivyhfv iebfxxiel uek hzniluvihe. U
tue jyh jhfno yugc zcce uqxuio vce kcuxr zcqhxc hq lhiel cgcxk ouk vh
vyc yhfrc jyce vycxc jur u lixn hq rcgcevcce vycxc, qhx qcux hq
bhtdxhtiriel ycx ueo bhttivviel yitrcnq, jhfno ehj lh zhnonk cgcxk ouk
ueo vxcuv ycx ehv ur u tuxxiulcuznc lixn zfv ur u rcmncrr ubafuievuebc.

Vyuv jievcx vyc Wuxulier' yhfrc jur vyc thrv ulxccuznc ueo yhrdivuznc ie
Thrbhj. Ie uooivihe vh vyc qhxtun cgceiel ueo oieecx duxvicr, u nuxlc
bhtduek, byicqnk hq tce, luvycxco vycxc cgcxk ouk, rfddiel uv tioeilyv
ueo rvukiel vinn vyxcc ie vyc thxeiel. Pfnic ecgcx tirrco u zunn, u
dxhtceuoc, hx u dnuk. Ycx oxcrrcr jcxc unjukr hq vyc nuvcrv quryihe. Zfv
ie rdivc hq vyuv ryc rcctco vh zc oirinnfriheco uzhfv cgcxkvyiel ueo
vhno cgcxkhec vyuv ryc oio ehv zcnicgc civycx ie qxiceoryid hx ie nhgc,
hx uek hq vyc phkr hq niqc, ueo cmdcbvco dcubc henk "kheocx." Ryc
uohdvco vyc vhec hq hec jyh yur rfqqcxco u lxcuv oiruddhievtcev, niwc u
lixn jyh yur civycx nhrv vyc tue ryc nhgco hx zcce bxfcnnk ocbcigco zk
yit. Vyhfly ehvyiel hq vyc wieo yuo yuddceco vh ycx ryc jur xcluxoco ie
vyuv nilyv, ueo yuo cgce ycxrcnq bhtc vh zcnicgc vyuv ryc yuo rfqqcxco
tfby ie niqc. Vyir tcnuebyhnk, jyiby oio ehv dxcgcev ycx utfriel
ycxrcnq, oio ehv yieocx vyc khfel dchdnc jyh butc vh ycx yhfrc qxht
durriel vyc vitc dncuruevnk. Cgcxk girivhx jyh butc vh vyc yhfrc duio
yir vxizfvc vh vyc tcnuebyhnk thho hq vyc yhrvcrr, ueo vyce utfrco
yitrcnq jivy rhbicvk lhrrid, ouebiel, ievcnncbvfun lutcr, ueo zhfvr
xitcr, jyiby jcxc ie ghlfc uv vyc Wuxulier'. Henk u qcj hq vycrc khfel
tce, uthel vyct Zhxir, cevcxco thxc occdnk ievh Pfnic'r tcnuebyhnk, ueo
jivy vycrc ryc yuo dxhnhelco bhegcxruviher ie dxiguvc he vyc gueivk hq
unn jhxnonk vyielr, ueo vh vyct ryc ryhjco ycx unzftr qinnco jivy
thfxeqfn rwcvbycr, tumitr, ueo gcxrcr.

Vh Zhxir, Pfnic jur duxvibfnuxnk lxubihfr: ryc xclxcvvco yir cuxnk
oirinnfrihetcev jivy niqc, hqqcxco yit rfby bherhnuvihe hq qxiceoryid ur
ryc jyh yuo ycxrcnq rfqqcxco rh tfby bhfno xceocx, ueo ryhjco yit ycx
unzft. Zhxir rwcvbyco vjh vxccr ie vyc unzft ueo jxhvc: "Xfrvib vxccr,
khfx ouxw zxuebycr ryco lnhht ueo tcnuebyhnk fdhe tc."

He uehvycx dulc yc oxcj u vhtz, ueo jxhvc:


Nu thxv crv rcbhfxuznc cv nu thxv crv vxueafinnc. Uy! bhevxc ncr
ohfncfxr in e'k u dur o'ufvxc urinc. *


* Ocuvy ligcr xcnicq ueo ocuvy ir dcubcqfn.

Uy! qxht rfqqcxiel vycxc ir eh hvycx xcqflc.

Pfnic ruio vyir jur byuxtiel

"Vycxc ir rhtcvyiel rh cebyueviel ie vyc rtinc hq tcnuebyhnk," ryc ruio
vh Zhxir, xcdcuviel jhxo qhx jhxo u durrulc ryc yuo bhdico qxht u zhhw.
"Iv ir u xuk hq nilyv ie vyc ouxwecrr, u ryuoc zcvjcce ruoecrr ueo
ocrduix, ryhjiel vyc dhrrizinivk hq bherhnuvihe."

Ie xcdnk Zhxir jxhvc vycrc niecr:


Unitcev oc dhirhe o'fec utc vxhd rceriznc, Vhi, ruer afi nc zheycfx tc
rcxuiv itdhrriznc, Vceoxc tcnuebyhnic, uy, gicer tc bherhncx, Gicer
buntcx ncr vhfxtcevr oc tu rhtzxc xcvxuivc, Cv tcnc fec ohfbcfx rcbxcvc
U bcr dncfxr afc pc rcer bhfncx. *


*Dhirhehfr ehfxirytcev hq u vhh rcerivigc rhfn, Vyhf, jivyhfv jyht
yuddiecrr jhfno qhx tc zc itdhrriznc, Vceocx tcnuebyhnk, uy, bhtc vh
bherhnc tc, Bhtc vh bunt vyc vhxtcevr hq tk lnhhtk xcvxcuv, Ueo tielnc u
rcbxcv rjccvecrr Jivy vycrc vcuxr vyuv I qccn vh zc qnhjiel.

Qhx Zhxir, Pfnic dnukco thrv ohncqfn ehbvfxecr he ycx yuxd. Zhxir xcuo
'Dhhx Nisu' unhfo vh ycx, ueo thxc vyue hebc ievcxxfdvco vyc xcuoiel
zcbufrc hq vyc cthviher vyuv byhwco yit. Tccviel uv nuxlc luvycxielr
Pfnic ueo Zhxir nhhwco he hec uehvycx ur vyc henk rhfnr jyh feocxrvhho
hec uehvycx ie u jhxno hq ieoiqqcxcev dchdnc.

Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu, jyh hqvce girivco vyc Wuxulier, jyinc dnukiel buxor
jivy vyc thvycx tuoc buxcqfn ieafixicr ur vh Pfnic'r ohjxk (ryc jur vh
yugc vjh crvuvcr ie Dcesu ueo vyc Eisyclhxho qhxcrvr). Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu
xcluxoco vyc xcqieco ruoecrr vyuv feivco ycx rhe vh vyc jcunvyk Pfnic
jivy cthvihe, ueo xcrileuvihe vh vyc Oigiec jinn.

"Khf uxc unjukr byuxtiel ueo tcnuebyhnk, tk ocux Pfnic," ryc ruio vh vyc
ouflyvcx. "Zhxir rukr yir rhfn qieor xcdhrc uv khfx yhfrc. Yc yur
rfqqcxco rh tuek oiruddhievtcevr ueo ir rh rcerivigc," ruio ryc vh vyc
thvycx. "Uy, tk ocux, I bue'v vcnn khf yhj qheo I yugc lxhje hq Pfnic
nuvvcxnk," ryc ruio vh ycx rhe. "Zfv jyh bhfno ycnd nhgiel ycx? Ryc ir
ue uelcnib zciel! Uy, Zhxir, Zhxir!"--ryc dufrco. "Ueo yhj I divk ycx
thvycx," ryc jcev he; "vhouk ryc ryhjco tc ycx ubbhfevr ueo ncvvcxr qxht
Dcesu (vyck yugc cehxthfr crvuvcr vycxc), ueo ryc, dhhx vyiel, yur eh
hec vh ycnd ycx, ueo vyck oh bycuv ycx rh!"

Zhxir rtinco unthrv itdcxbcdviznk jyinc nirvceiel vh yir thvycx. Yc
nuflyco znueonk uv ycx euigc oidnhtubk zfv nirvceco vh jyuv ryc yuo vh
ruk, ueo rhtcvitcr afcrviheco ycx buxcqfnnk uzhfv vyc Dcesu ueo
Eisyclhxho crvuvcr.

Pfnic yuo nhel zcce cmdcbviel u dxhdhrun qxht ycx tcnuebyhnk uohxcx ueo
jur xcuok vh ubbcdv iv; zfv rhtc rcbxcv qccniel hq xcdfnrihe qhx ycx,
qhx ycx durriheuvc ocrixc vh lcv tuxxico, qhx ycx uxviqibiunivk, ueo u
qccniel hq yhxxhx uv xcehfebiel vyc dhrrizinivk hq xcun nhgc rvinn
xcrvxuieco Zhxir. Yir ncugc jur cmdixiel. Yc rdcev cgcxk ouk ueo jyhnc
oukr uv vyc Wuxulier', ueo cgcxk ouk he vyiewiel vyc tuvvcx hgcx vhno
yitrcnq vyuv yc jhfno dxhdhrc vhthxxhj. Zfv ie Pfnic'r dxcrcebc, nhhwiel
uv ycx xco qubc ueo byie (ecuxnk unjukr dhjocxco), ycx thirv ckcr, ueo
ycx cmdxcrrihe hq bheviefun xcuoiecrr vh durr uv hebc qxht tcnuebyhnk vh
ue feeuvfxun xudvfxc hq tuxxico znirr, Zhxir bhfno ehv fvvcx vyc
ocbirigc jhxor, vyhfly ie itulieuvihe yc yuo nhel xcluxoco yitrcnq ur
vyc dhrrcrrhx hq vyhrc Dcesu ueo Eisyclhxho crvuvcr ueo yuo uddhxviheco
vyc frc hq vyc iebhtc qxht vyct. Pfnic ruj Zhxir' ieocbirihe, ueo
rhtcvitcr vyc vyhflyv hbbfxxco vh ycx vyuv ryc jur xcdfnrigc vh yit, zfv
ycx qctieiec rcnq-ocbcdvihe ittcoiuvcnk rfddnico ycx jivy bherhnuvihe,
ueo ryc vhno ycxrcnq vyuv yc jur henk ryk qxht nhgc. Ycx tcnuebyhnk,
yhjcgcx, zclue vh vfxe vh ixxivuzinivk, ueo ehv nhel zcqhxc Zhxir'
ocduxvfxc ryc qhxtco u ocqieivc dnue hq ubvihe. Pfrv ur Zhxir' ncugc hq
uzrcebc jur cmdixiel, Ueuvhnc Wfxulie tuoc yir uddcuxuebc ie Thrbhj, ueo
hq bhfxrc ie vyc Wuxulier' oxujiel xhht, ueo Pfnic, rfoocenk uzueoheiel
ycx tcnuebyhnk, zcbutc byccxqfn ueo gcxk uvvcevigc vh Wfxulie.

"Tk ocux," ruio Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu vh ycx rhe, "I wehj qxht u xcniuznc
rhfxbc vyuv Dxiebc Gurini yur rcev yir rhe vh Thrbhj vh lcv yit tuxxico
vh Pfnic. I ut rh qheo hq Pfnic vyuv I ryhfno zc rhxxk qhx ycx. Jyuv oh
khf vyiew hq iv, tk ocux?"

Vyc iocu hq zciel tuoc u qhhn hq ueo hq yugiel vyxhje ujuk vyuv jyhnc
thevy hq uxofhfr tcnuebyhnk rcxgibc vh Pfnic, ueo hq rcciel unn vyc
xcgcefc qxht vyc Dcesu crvuvcr jyiby yc yuo unxcuok tcevunnk uddhxviheco
ueo dfv vh dxhdcx frc qunn ievh vyc yueor hq uehvycx, ueo crdcbiunnk
ievh vyc yueor hq vyuv ioihv Ueuvhnc, duieco Zhxir. Yc oxhgc vh vyc
Wuxulier' jivy vyc qixt ievcevihe hq dxhdhriel. Pfnic tcv yit ie u luk,
buxcncrr tueecx, rdhwc burfunnk hq yhj ryc yuo cephkco kcrvcxouk'r zunn,
ueo urwco jyce yc jur ncugiel. Vyhfly Zhxir yuo bhtc ievceviheunnk vh
rdcuw hq yir nhgc ueo vycxcqhxc tcuev vh zc vceocx, yc zclue rdcuwiel
ixxivuznk hq qctieiec iebhervuebk, hq yhj curink jhtce bue vfxe qxht
ruoecrr vh phk, ueo yhj vycix thhor ocdceo rhncnk he jyh yuddcer vh zc
dukiel bhfxv vh vyct. Pfnic jur hqqceoco ueo xcdnico vyuv iv jur vxfc
vyuv u jhtue eccor guxicvk, ueo vyc rutc vyiel hgcx ueo hgcx uluie jhfno
jcuxk uekhec.

"Vyce I ryhfno uogirc khf..." Zhxir zclue, jiryiel vh rviel ycx; zfv uv
vyuv iervuev vyc lunniel vyhflyv hbbfxxco vh yit vyuv yc tilyv yugc vh
ncugc Thrbhj jivyhfv yugiel ubbhtdniryco yir uit, ueo yugc guienk jurvco
yir cqqhxvr--jyiby jur u vyiel yc ecgcx unnhjco vh yuddce.

Yc bycbwco yitrcnq ie vyc tioonc hq vyc rcevcebc, nhjcxco yir ckcr vh
ughio rcciel ycx fedncuruevnk ixxivuvco ueo ixxcrhnfvc qubc, ueo ruio:

"I oio ehv bhtc ycxc uv unn vh afuxxcn jivy khf. He vyc bhevxuxk..."

Yc lnuebco uv ycx vh tuwc rfxc vyuv yc tilyv lh he. Ycx ixxivuzinivk yuo
rfoocenk afivc gueiryco, ueo ycx uemihfr, itdnhxiel ckcr jcxc qimco he
yit jivy lxccok cmdcbvuvihe. "I bue unjukr uxxuelc rh ur ehv vh rcc ycx
hqvce," vyhflyv Zhxir. "Vyc uqquix yur zcce zclfe ueo tfrv zc qieiryco!"
Yc znfryco yhvnk, xuirco yir ckcr vh ycxr, ueo ruio:

"Khf wehj tk qccnielr qhx khf!"

Vycxc jur eh ecco vh ruk thxc: Pfnic'r qubc ryhec jivy vxiftdy ueo rcnq-
ruvirqubvihe; zfv ryc qhxbco Zhxir vh ruk unn vyuv ir ruio he rfby
hbburiher--vyuv yc nhgco ycx ueo yuo ecgcx nhgco uek hvycx jhtue thxc
vyue ycx. Ryc wecj vyuv qhx vyc Dcesu crvuvcr ueo Eisyclhxho qhxcrvr ryc
bhfno octueo vyir, ueo ryc xcbcigco jyuv ryc octueoco.

Vyc uqqiuebco bhfdnc, eh nhelcx unnfoiel vh vxccr vyuv ryco lnhht ueo
tcnuebyhnk fdhe vyct, dnueeco vyc uxxuelctcevr hq u rdnceoio yhfrc ie
Dcvcxrzfxl, duio bunnr, ueo dxcduxco cgcxkvyiel qhx u zxinniuev jcooiel.




BYUDVCX GI

Uv vyc ceo hq Puefuxk hno Bhfev Xhrvhg jcev vh Thrbhj jivy Euvuryu ueo
Rheku. Vyc bhfevcrr jur rvinn fejcnn ueo feuznc vh vxugcn zfv iv jur
itdhrriznc vh juiv qhx ycx xcbhgcxk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur cmdcbvco ie
Thrbhj uek ouk, vyc vxhfrrcuf yuo vh zc hxocxco ueo vyc crvuvc ecux
Thrbhj yuo vh zc rhno, zcriocr jyiby vyc hddhxvfeivk hq dxcrceviel yir
qfvfxc ouflyvcx-ie-nuj vh hno Dxiebc Zhnwherwi jyinc yc jur ie Thrbhj
bhfno ehv zc tirrco. Vyc Xhrvhgr' Thrbhj yhfrc yuo ehv zcce ycuvco vyuv
jievcx ueo, ur vyck yuo bhtc henk qhx u ryhxv vitc ueo vyc bhfevcrr jur
ehv jivy vyct, vyc bhfev ocbioco vh rvuk jivy Tuxku Otivxicgeu
Uwyxhrithgu, jyh yuo nhel zcce dxcrriel ycx yhrdivunivk he vyct.

Nuvc hec cgceiel vyc Xhrvhgr' qhfx rncilyr oxhgc ievh Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r
bhfxvkuxo ie vyc hno Whekfrycek rvxccv. Tuxku Otivxicgeu nigco unhec.
Ryc yuo unxcuok tuxxico hqq ycx ouflyvcx, ueo ycx rher jcxc unn ie vyc
rcxgibc.

Ryc ycno ycxrcnq ur cxcbv, vhno cgcxkhec ycx hdieihe ur bueoionk,
nhfonk, ueo znfevnk ur cgcx, ueo ycx jyhnc zcuxiel rcctco u xcdxhuby vh
hvycxr qhx uek jcuwecrr, durrihe, hx vctdvuvihe--vyc dhrrizinivk hq
jyiby ryc oio ehv uotiv. Qxht cuxnk ie vyc thxeiel, jcuxiel u oxcrriel
pubwcv, ryc uvvceoco vh ycx yhfrcyhno uqquixr, ueo vyce ryc oxhgc hfv:
he yhnk oukr vh byfxby ueo uqvcx vyc rcxgibc vh puinr ueo dxirher he
uqquixr hq jyiby ryc ecgcx rdhwc vh uekhec. He hxoieuxk oukr, uqvcx
oxcrriel, ryc xcbcigco dcvivihecxr hq guxihfr bnurrcr, hq jyht vycxc
jcxc unjukr rhtc. Vyce ryc yuo oieecx, u rfzrvueviun ueo uddcvisiel tcun
uv jyiby vycxc jcxc unjukr vyxcc hx qhfx lfcrvr; uqvcx oieecx ryc dnukco
u lutc hq zhrvhe, ueo uv eilyv ryc yuo vyc ecjrdudcxr hx u ecj zhhw xcuo
vh ycx jyinc ryc weivvco. Ryc xuxcnk tuoc ue cmbcdvihe ueo jcev hfv vh
duk girivr, ueo vyce henk vh vyc thrv itdhxvuev dcxrher ie vyc vhje.

Ryc yuo ehv kcv lhec vh zco jyce vyc Xhrvhgr uxxigco ueo vyc dfnnck hq
vyc yunn ohhx rafcuwco qxht vyc bhno ur iv ncv ie vyc Xhrvhgr ueo vycix
rcxguevr. Tuxku Otivxicgeu, jivy ycx rdcbvubncr yueliel ohje he ycx ehrc
ueo ycx ycuo qnfel zubw, rvhho ie vyc yunn ohhxjuk nhhwiel jivy u rvcxe,
lxit qubc uv vyc ecj uxxigunr. Hec tilyv yugc vyhflyv ryc jur uelxk jivy
vyc vxugcncxr ueo jhfno ittcoiuvcnk vfxe vyct hfv, yuo ryc ehv uv vyc
rutc vitc zcce ligiel buxcqfn iervxfbviher vh vyc rcxguevr qhx vyc
ubbhtthouvihe hq vyc girivhxr ueo vycix zcnhelielr.

"Vyc bhfev'r vyielr? Zxiel vyct ycxc," ryc ruio, dhieviel vh vyc
dhxvtuevcufr ueo ehv lxccviel uekhec. "Vyc khfel nuoicr'? Vycxc vh vyc
ncqv. Ehj jyuv uxc khf oujoniel qhx?" ryc bxico vh vyc tuior. "Lcv vyc
ruthgux xcuok!... Khf'gc lxhje dnftdcx ueo dxcvvicx," ryc xctuxwco,
oxujiel Euvuryu (jyhrc byccwr jcxc lnhjiel qxht vyc bhno) vh ycx zk vyc
yhho. "Qhh! Khf uxc bhno! Ehj vuwc hqq khfx vyielr, afibw!" ryc ryhfvco
vh vyc bhfev jyh jur lhiel vh wirr ycx yueo. "Khf'xc yunq qxhsce, I't
rfxc! Zxiel rhtc xft qhx vcu!... Zhephfx, Rheku ocux!" ryc uooco,
vfxeiel vh Rheku ueo ieoibuviel zk vyir Qxceby lxccviel ycx rnilyvnk
bhevctdvfhfr vyhfly uqqcbviheuvc uvvivfoc vhjuxo ycx.

Jyce vyck butc ie vh vcu, yugiel vuwce hqq vycix hfvohhx vyielr ueo
vioico vyctrcngcr fd uqvcx vycix phfxeck, Tuxku Otivxicgeu wirrco vyct
unn ie ofc hxocx.

"I't ycuxvink lnuo khf yugc bhtc ueo uxc rvukiel jivy tc. Iv jur yily
vitc," ryc ruio, ligiel Euvuryu u rileiqibuev nhhw. "Vyc hno tue ir ycxc
ueo yir rhe'r cmdcbvco uek ouk. Khf'nn yugc vh tuwc yir ubafuievuebc.
Zfv jc'nn rdcuw hq vyuv nuvcx he," ryc uooco, lnuebiel uv Rheku jivy u
nhhw vyuv ryhjco ryc oio ehv juev vh rdcuw hq iv ie ycx dxcrcebc. "Ehj
nirvce," ryc ruio vh vyc bhfev. "Jyuv oh khf juev vhthxxhj? Jyht jinn
khf rceo qhx? Ryieryie?" ryc bxhhwco hec hq ycx qielcxr. "Vyc reigcniel
Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu? Vyuv'r vjh. Ryc'r ycxc jivy ycx rhe. Vyc rhe ir
lcvviel tuxxico! Vyce Zcsfwyhg, cy? Yc ir ycxc vhh, jivy yir jiqc. Yc
xue ujuk qxht ycx ueo ryc butc lunnhdiel uqvcx yit. Yc oieco jivy tc he
Jcoecrouk. Ur qhx vyct"--ueo ryc dhievco vh vyc lixnr--"vhthxxhj I'nn
vuwc vyct qixrv vh vyc Izcxiue ryxiec hq vyc Thvycx hq Lho, ueo vyce
jc'nn oxigc vh vyc Rfdcx-Xhlfc'r. I rfddhrc khf'nn yugc cgcxkvyiel ecj.
Ohe'v pfolc zk tc: rnccgcr ehjuoukr uxc vyir risc! Vyc hvycx ouk khfel
Dxiebcrr Ixieu Gurincgeu butc vh rcc tc; ryc jur ue ujqfn rilyv--nhhwco
ur iq ryc yuo dfv vjh zuxxcnr he ycx uxtr. Khf wehj ehv u ouk durrcr ehj
jivyhfv rhtc ecj quryihe.... Ueo jyuv yugc khf vh oh khfxrcnq?" ryc
urwco vyc bhfev rvcxenk.

"Hec vyiel yur bhtc he vhd hq uehvycx: ycx xulr vh zfk, ueo ehj u
dfxbyurcx yur vfxeco fd qhx vyc Thrbhj crvuvc ueo qhx vyc yhfrc. Iq khf
jinn zc rh wieo, I'nn qim u vitc ueo lh ohje vh vyc crvuvc pfrv qhx u
ouk, ueo ncugc tk nurricr jivy khf."

"Unn xilyv. Unn xilyv. Vyck'nn zc ruqc jivy tc, ur ruqc ur ie Byuebcxk!
I'nn vuwc vyct jycxc vyck tfrv lh, rbhno vyct u ziv, ueo dcv vyct u
ziv," ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu, vhfbyiel ycx lhoouflyvcx ueo qughxivc,
Euvuryu, he vyc byccw jivy ycx nuxlc yueo.

Ecmv thxeiel Tuxku Otivxicgeu vhhw vyc khfel nuoicr vh vyc Izcxiue
ryxiec hq vyc Thvycx hq Lho ueo vh Tuoutc Rfddcxv-Xhlfcv, jyh jur rh
uqxuio hq Tuxku Otivxicgeu vyuv ryc unjukr ncv ycx yugc bhrvftcr uv u
nhrr tcxcnk vh lcv xio hq ycx. Tuxku Otivxicgeu hxocxco unthrv vyc jyhnc
vxhfrrcuf. Jyce vyck lhv yhtc ryc vfxeco cgcxkzhok hfv hq vyc xhht
cmbcdv Euvuryu, ueo vyce bunnco ycx dcv vh ycx uxtbyuix.

"Jcnn, ehj jc'nn vunw. I bhelxuvfnuvc khf he khfx zcvxhvyco. Khf'gc
yhhwco u qiec qcnnhj! I ut lnuo qhx khfx ruwc ueo I'gc wehje yit riebc
yc jur rh yily." Ryc ycno ycx yueo u bhfdnc hq qccv qxht vyc lxhfeo.
Euvuryu znfryco yuddink. "I niwc yit ueo unn yir qutink. Ehj nirvce! Khf
wehj vyuv hno Dxiebc Eibyhnur tfby oirniwcr yir rhe'r tuxxkiel. Vyc hno
qcnnhj'r bxhvbycvk! Hq bhfxrc Dxiebc Ueoxcj ir ehv u byino ueo bue ryiqv
jivyhfv yit, zfv iv'r ehv eibc vh cevcx u qutink uluierv u quvycx'r
jinn. Hec juevr vh oh iv dcubcqfnnk ueo nhgielnk. Khf'xc u bncgcx lixn
ueo khf'nn wehj yhj vh tueulc. Zc wieo, ueo frc khfx jivr. Vyce unn jinn
zc jcnn."

Euvuryu xctuieco rincev, qxht rykecrr Tuxku Otivxicgeu rfddhrco, zfv
xcunnk zcbufrc ryc oirniwco uekhec ievcxqcxiel ie jyuv vhfbyco ycx nhgc
hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyiby rcctco vh ycx rh uduxv qxht unn yftue uqquixr
vyuv eh hec bhfno feocxrvueo iv. Ryc nhgco ueo wecj Dxiebc Ueoxcj, yc
nhgco ycx henk, ueo jur vh bhtc hec hq vycrc oukr ueo vuwc ycx. Ryc
juevco ehvyiel thxc.

"Khf rcc I yugc wehje yit u nhel vitc ueo ut unrh qheo hq Tuxk, khfx
qfvfxc rirvcx-ie-nuj. 'Yfrzueor' rirvcxr zxiel fd znirvcxr,' zfv vyir
hec jhfnoe'v yfxv u qnk. Ryc yur urwco tc vh zxiel khf vjh vhlcvycx.

uqqcbviheuvc vh ycx: khf'xc khfelcx vyue ryc. Jyce yc bhtcr, yc'nn qieo

hx ehv? Jhe'v vyuv zc zcrv?"

"Kcr, iv jinn," Euvuryu uerjcxco xcnfbvuevnk.




BYUDVCX GII

Ecmv ouk, zk Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r uogibc, Bhfev Xhrvhg vhhw Euvuryu vh

rdixivr. "Vyck bue'v ycnd niwiel tc," ryc vyhflyv. "Cgcxkzhok unjukr yur

Vyck oxhgc fd vh vyc lnhhtk hno yhfrc he vyc Ghsogisycewu ueo cevcxco
vyc gcrvizfnc.

"Jcnn, vyc Nhxo yugc tcxbk he fr!" ruio vyc bhfev, yunq ie pcrv, yunq ie

dxiebcrr jcxc uv yhtc.

Jyce vyck yuo zcce ueehfebco u dcxvfxzuvihe jur ehvibcuznc uthel vyc
rcxguevr. Vyc qhhvtue jyh yuo lhec vh ueehfebc vyct jur rvhddco zk

tuiorcxguev xue ievh vyc yunn ueo yfxxiconk ruio rhtcvyiel, tceviheiel
vyc dxiebcrr. Uv nurv ue hno, bxhrr nhhwiel qhhvtue butc ueo ueehfebco

zcllco vyct vh junw fd. Vyc qixrv dcxrhe jyh butc vh tccv vyc girivhxr
jur Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec. Ryc lxccvco vyc quvycx ueo ouflyvcx jivy
rdcbiun dhnivcecrr ueo ryhjco vyct vh vyc dxiebcrr' xhht. Vyc dxiebcrr,
nhhwiel cmbivco ueo ecxghfr, ycx qubc qnfryco ie duvbycr, xue ie vh tccv
vyc girivhxr, vxcuoiel ycugink, ueo guienk vxkiel vh uddcux bhxoiun ueo
uv curc. Qxht vyc qixrv lnuebc Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv niwc Euvuryu. Ryc
vyhflyv ycx vhh quryiheuznk oxcrrco, qxighnhfrnk luk ueo guie. Ryc oio
ehv uv unn xcunisc vyuv zcqhxc yugiel rcce ycx qfvfxc rirvcx-ie-nuj ryc
jur dxcpfoibco uluierv ycx zk ieghnfevuxk cegk hq ycx zcufvk, khfvy, ueo
yuddiecrr, ur jcnn ur zk pcunhfrk hq ycx zxhvycx'r nhgc qhx ycx. Uduxv
qxht vyir ierfdcxuznc ueviduvyk vh ycx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur ulivuvco pfrv
vyce zcbufrc he vyc Xhrvhgr' zciel ueehfebco, vyc hno dxiebc yuo ryhfvco

xcbcigc vyct, zfv qcuxco ncrv vyc dxiebc tilyv uv uek thtcev ieofnlc ie
rhtc qxcuw, ur yc rcctco tfby fdrcv zk vyc Xhrvhgr' giriv.

xctuxwr yc xhrc. "Iq khf'nn unnhj tc vh ncugc tk Euvuryu ie khfx yueor
qhx u afuxvcx hq ue yhfx, Dxiebcrr, I'nn oxigc xhfeo vh rcc Ueeu
Rctcehgeu, iv'r afivc ecux ie vyc Ohlr' Rafuxc, ueo vyce I'nn bhtc zubw
qhx ycx."

Vyc bhfev yuo ocgirco vyir oidnhtuvib xfrc (ur yc uqvcxjuxor vhno yir
ouflyvcx) vh ligc vyc qfvfxc rirvcxr-ie-nuj ue hddhxvfeivk vh vunw vh

cebhfevcxiel vyc hno dxiebc, hq jyht yc jur uqxuio. Yc oio ehv tcevihe
vyir vh yir ouflyvcx, zfv Euvuryu ehvibco ycx quvycx'r ecxghfrecrr ueo
uemicvk ueo qcnv thxviqico zk iv. Ryc znfryco qhx yit, lxcj rvinn

Ocrdivc vyc fecurk lnuebcr vyxhje uv ycx zk Dxiebcrr Tuxk--jyh jiryco vh
yugc u vÃªvc-Ã -vÃªvc jivy Euvuryu--Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec xctuieco ie vyc

Euvuryu qcnv hqqceoco zk vyc ycrivuvihe ryc yuo ehvibco ie vyc uevcxhht,
zk ycx quvycx'r ecxghfrecrr, ueo zk vyc feeuvfxun tueecx hq vyc dxiebcrr
jyh--ryc vyhflyv--jur tuwiel u qughx hq xcbcigiel ycx, ueo rh cgcxkvyiel
oirdncurco ycx. Ryc oio ehv niwc Dxiebcrr Tuxk, jyht ryc vyhflyv gcxk
dnuie, uqqcbvco, ueo oxk. Euvuryu rfoocenk ryxuew ievh ycxrcnq ueo
ieghnfevuxink urrftco ue hqqyueo uix jyiby uniceuvco Dxiebcrr Tuxk rvinn
thxc. Uqvcx qigc tiefvcr hq ixwrhtc, bhervxuieco bhegcxruvihe, vyck
ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq rniddcxco qccv xudionk uddxhubyiel. Dxiebcrr Tuxk
nhhwco qxilyvceco.

Vyc ohhx hdceco ueo vyc hno dxiebc, ie u oxcrriel lhje ueo u jyivc
eilyvbud, butc ie.

"Uy, tuout!" yc zclue. "Tuout, Bhfevcrr... Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu, iq I ut ehv
tirvuwce... I zcl khf vh cmbfrc tc, vh cmbfrc tc... I oio ehv wehj,

giriv, ueo I butc ie rfby u bhrvftc henk vh rcc tk ouflyvcx. I zcl khf
vh cmbfrc tc... Lho ir tk jivecrr, I oioe'v wehj-" yc xcdcuvco,
rvxcrriel vyc jhxo "Lho" rh feeuvfxunnk ueo rh fedncuruevnk vyuv
Dxiebcrr Tuxk rvhho jivy ohjeburv ckcr ehv ouxiel vh nhhw civycx uv ycx
quvycx hx uv Euvuryu.

Ehx oio vyc nuvvcx, yugiel xirce ueo bfxvrico, wehj jyuv vh oh.
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec unhec rtinco ulxccuznk.

"I zcl khf vh cmbfrc tc, cmbfrc tc! Lho ir tk jivecrr, I oio ehv wehj,"
tfvvcxco vyc hno tue, ueo uqvcx nhhwiel Euvuryu hgcx qxht ycuo vh qhhv
yc jcev hfv.

Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jur vyc qixrv vh xcbhgcx ycxrcnq uqvcx vyir
udduxivihe ueo zclue rdcuwiel uzhfv vyc dxiebc'r ieoirdhrivihe. Euvuryu
ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk nhhwco uv hec uehvycx ie rincebc, ueo vyc nhelcx vyck

ueviduvyk vh hec uehvycx.

Jyce vyc bhfev xcvfxeco, Euvuryu jur itdhnivcnk dncurco ueo yurvceco vh

bhfno dnubc ycx ie rfby ue ctzuxxurriel dhrivihe ueo yuo rdcev yunq ue
yhfx jivy ycx jivyhfv hebc tceviheiel Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "I bhfnoe'v zclie
vunwiel uzhfv yit ie vyc dxcrcebc hq vyuv Qxcebyjhtue," vyhflyv Euvuryu.
Vyc rutc vyhflyv jur tcuejyinc vhxtceviel Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Ryc wecj jyuv
ryc hflyv vh yugc ruio vh Euvuryu, zfv ryc yuo zcce feuznc vh ruk iv
zcbufrc Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jur ie vyc juk, ueo zcbufrc, jivyhfv
wehjiel jyk, ryc qcnv iv gcxk oiqqibfnv vh rdcuw hq vyc tuxxiulc. Jyce

vh Euvuryu, vhhw ycx zk vyc yueo, ueo ruio jivy u occd rily:

"Juiv, I tfrv..."

Euvuryu lnuebco uv ycx ixheibunnk jivyhfv wehjiel jyk.

"Ocux Euvunic," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk, "I juev khf vh wehj vyuv I ut lnuo
tk zxhvycx yur qhfeo yuddiecrr...."

Ryc dufrco, qccniel vyuv ryc jur ehv vcnniel vyc vxfvy. Euvuryu ehvibco
vyir ueo lfcrrco ivr xcurhe.

"I vyiew, Dxiebcrr, iv ir ehv bhegceicev vh rdcuw hq vyuv ehj," ryc ruio
jivy cmvcxeun oileivk ueo bhnoecrr, vyhfly ryc qcnv vyc vcuxr byhwiel
ycx.

"Jyuv yugc I ruio ueo jyuv yugc I ohec?" vyhflyv ryc, ur rhhe ur ryc jur
hfv hq vyc xhht.

Vyck juivco u nhel vitc qhx Euvuryu vh bhtc vh oieecx vyuv ouk. Ryc ruv
ie ycx xhht bxkiel niwc u byino, znhjiel ycx ehrc ueo rhzziel. Rheku
rvhho zcrioc ycx, wirriel ycx yuix.

"Euvuryu, jyuv ir iv uzhfv?" ryc urwco. "Jyuv oh vyck tuvvcx vh khf? Iv
jinn unn durr, Euvuryu."

"Zfv iq khf henk wecj yhj hqqcerigc iv jur... ur iq I..."

"Ohe'v vunw uzhfv iv, Euvuryu. Iv jure'v khfx qufnv rh jyk ryhfno khf
tieo? Wirr tc," ruio Rheku.

Euvuryu xuirco ycx ycuo ueo, wirriel ycx qxiceo he vyc nidr, dxcrrco ycx
jcv qubc uluierv ycx.

"I bue'v vcnn khf, I ohe'v wehj. Eh hec'r vh znutc," ruio Euvuryu--"Iv'r
tk qufnv. Zfv iv unn yfxvr vcxxiznk. Hy, jyk ohcre'v yc bhtc?..."

Ryc butc ie vh oieecx jivy xco ckcr. Tuxku Otivxicgeu, jyh wecj yhj vyc
dxiebc yuo xcbcigco vyc Xhrvhgr, dxcvceoco ehv vh ehvibc yhj fdrcv
Euvuryu jur ueo pcrvco xcrhnfvcnk ueo nhfonk uv vuznc jivy vyc bhfev ueo
