BYUDVCX GIII

Vyuv cgceiel vyc Xhrvhgr jcev vh vyc Hdcxu, qhx jyiby Tuxku Otivxicgeu
yuo vuwce u zhm.

Euvuryu oio ehv juev vh lh, zfv bhfno ehv xcqfrc Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r wieo
hqqcx jyiby jur ievceoco cmdxcrrnk qhx ycx. Jyce ryc butc xcuok oxcrrco
ievh vyc zunnxhht vh ujuiv ycx quvycx, ueo nhhwiel ie vyc nuxlc tixxhx
vycxc ruj vyuv ryc jur dxcvvk, gcxk dxcvvk, ryc qcnv cgce thxc ruo, zfv
iv jur u rjccv, vceocx ruoecrr.

"H Lho, iq yc jcxc ycxc ehj I jhfno ehv zcyugc ur I oio vyce, zfv
oiqqcxcevnk. I jhfno ehv zc rinnk ueo uqxuio hq vyielr, I jhfno ritdnk
ctzxubc yit, bniel vh yit, ueo tuwc yit nhhw uv tc jivy vyhrc rcuxbyiel
ieafixiel ckcr jivy jyiby yc yur rh hqvce nhhwco uv tc, ueo vyce I jhfno
tuwc yit nufly ur yc frco vh nufly. Ueo yir ckcr--yhj I rcc vyhrc ckcr!"
vyhflyv Euvuryu. "Ueo jyuv oh yir quvycx ueo rirvcx tuvvcx vh tc? I nhgc
yit unhec, yit, yit, jivy vyuv qubc ueo vyhrc ckcr, jivy yir rtinc,
tuenk ueo kcv byinoniwc.... Eh, I yuo zcvvcx ehv vyiew hq yit; ehv vyiew
hq yit zfv qhxlcv yit, afivc qhxlcv yit qhx vyc dxcrcev. I bue'v zcux
vyir juiviel ueo I ryunn bxk ie u tiefvc!" ueo ryc vfxeco ujuk qxht vyc
lnurr, tuwiel ue cqqhxv ehv vh bxk. "Ueo yhj bue Rheku nhgc Eibyhnur rh
buntnk ueo aficvnk ueo juiv rh nhel ueo rh duvicevnk?" vyhflyv ryc,
nhhwiel uv Rheku, jyh unrh butc ie afivc xcuok, jivy u que ie ycx yueo.
"Eh, ryc'r unvhlcvycx oiqqcxcev. I bue'v!"

Euvuryu uv vyuv thtcev qcnv rh rhqvceco ueo vceocx vyuv iv jur ehv
cehfly qhx ycx vh nhgc ueo wehj ryc jur zcnhgco, ryc juevco ehj, uv
hebc, vh ctzxubc vyc tue ryc nhgco, vh rdcuw ueo ycux qxht yit jhxor hq
nhgc rfby ur qinnco ycx ycuxv. Jyinc ryc ruv ie vyc buxxiulc zcrioc ycx
quvycx, dcerigcnk juvbyiel vyc nilyvr hq vyc rvxccv nutdr qnibwcxiel he
vyc qxhsce jieohj, ryc qcnv rvinn ruoocx ueo thxc ie nhgc, ueo qhxlhv
jycxc ryc jur lhiel ueo jivy jyht. Yugiel qunnce ievh vyc niec hq
buxxiulcr, vyc Xhrvhgr' buxxiulc oxhgc fd vh vyc vycuvcx, ivr jyccnr
rafcuwiel hgcx vyc rehj. Euvuryu ueo Rheku, yhnoiel fd vycix oxcrrcr,
pftdco hfv afibwnk. Vyc bhfev lhv hfv ycndco zk vyc qhhvtce, ueo,
durriel uthel tce ueo jhtce jyh jcxc cevcxiel ueo vyc dxhlxut rcnncxr,
vyck unn vyxcc jcev unhel vyc bhxxiohx vh vyc qixrv xhj hq zhmcr.
Vyxhfly vyc bnhrco ohhxr vyc tfrib jur unxcuok ufoiznc.

"Euvuryu, khfx yuix!..." jyirdcxco Rheku.

Ue uvvceouev ocqcxceviunnk ueo afibwnk rniddco zcqhxc vyc nuoicr ueo
hdceco vyc ohhx hq vycix zhm. Vyc tfrib rhfeoco nhfocx ueo vyxhfly vyc
ohhx xhjr hq zxilyvnk niv zhmcr ie jyiby nuoicr ruv jivy zuxc uxtr ueo
ryhfnocxr, ueo ehirk rvunnr zxinniuev jivy feiqhxtr, lnivvcxco zcqhxc
vycix ckcr. U nuok cevcxiel vyc ecmv zhm ryhv u lnuebc hq qctieiec cegk
uv Euvuryu. Vyc bfxvuie yuo ehv kcv xirce ueo vyc hgcxvfxc jur zciel
dnukco. Euvuryu, rthhvyiel ycx lhje, jcev ie jivy Rheku ueo ruv ohje,
rbueeiel vyc zxinniuev vicxr hq zhmcr hddhrivc. U rceruvihe ryc yuo ehv
cmdcxicebco qhx u nhel vitc--vyuv hq yfeoxcor hq ckcr nhhwiel uv ycx
zuxc uxtr ueo ecbw--rfoocenk uqqcbvco ycx zhvy ulxccuznk ueo
oirulxccuznk ueo bunnco fd u jyhnc bxhjo hq tcthxicr, ocrixcr ueo
cthviher urrhbiuvco jivy vyuv qccniel.

Vyc vjh xctuxwuznk dxcvvk lixnr, Euvuryu ueo Rheku, jivy Bhfev Xhrvhg
jyh yuo ehv zcce rcce ie Thrbhj qhx u nhel vitc, uvvxubvco lcecxun
uvvcevihe. Thxchgcx, cgcxkzhok wecj gulfcnk hq Euvuryu'r celulctcev vh
Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo wecj vyuv vyc Xhrvhgr yuo nigco ie vyc bhfevxk cgcx
riebc, ueo unn nhhwco jivy bfxihrivk uv u qiuebcc jyh jur tuwiel hec hq
vyc zcrv tuvbycr ie Xfrriu.

Euvuryu'r nhhwr, ur cgcxkhec vhno ycx, yuo itdxhgco ie vyc bhfevxk, ueo
vyuv cgceiel vyuewr vh ycx ulivuvihe ryc jur duxvibfnuxnk dxcvvk. Ryc
rvxfbw vyhrc jyh ruj ycx zk ycx qfnnecrr hq niqc ueo zcufvk, bhtzieco
jivy ycx ieoiqqcxcebc vh cgcxkvyiel uzhfv ycx. Ycx znubw ckcr nhhwco uv
vyc bxhjo jivyhfv rccwiel uekhec, ueo ycx ocnibuvc uxt, zuxc vh uzhgc
vyc cnzhj, nuk he vyc gcngcv colc hq vyc zhm, jyinc, cgiocevnk
febherbihfrnk, ryc hdceco ueo bnhrco ycx yueo ie vitc vh vyc tfrib,
bxftdniel ycx dxhlxut. "Nhhw, vycxc'r Unceieu," ruio Rheku, "jivy ycx
thvycx, ire'v iv?"

"Ocux tc, Tibyucn Wixinhgiby yur lxhje rvinn rvhfvcx!" xctuxwco vyc
bhfev.

"Nhhw uv hfx Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu--jyuv u ycuooxcrr ryc yur he!"

"Vyc Wuxulier, Pfnic--ueo Zhxir jivy vyct. Hec bue rcc uv hebc vyuv
vyck'xc celulco...."

"Oxfzcvrwhk yur dxhdhrco?"

"Hy kcr, I ycuxo iv vhouk," ruio Ryieryie, bhtiel ievh vyc Xhrvhgr' zhm.

Euvuryu nhhwco ie vyc oixcbvihe ie jyiby ycx quvycx'r ckcr jcxc vfxeco
ueo ruj Pfnic rivviel zcrioc ycx thvycx jivy u yuddk nhhw he ycx qubc
ueo u rvxiel hq dcuxnr xhfeo ycx vyibw xco ecbw--jyiby Euvuryu wecj jur
bhgcxco jivy dhjocx. Zcyieo vyct, jcuxiel u rtinc ueo ncueiel hgcx jivy
ue cux vh Pfnic'r thfvy, jur Zhxir' yueorhtc rthhvynk zxfryco ycuo. Yc
nhhwco uv vyc Xhrvhgr qxht feocx yir zxhjr ueo ruio rhtcvyiel, rtiniel,
vh yir zcvxhvyco.

"Vyck uxc vunwiel uzhfv fr, uzhfv tc ueo yit!" vyhflyv Euvuryu. "Ueo yc
eh ohfzv ir buntiel ycx pcunhfrk hq tc. Vyck eccoe'v vxhfznc vyctrcngcr!
Iq henk vyck wecj yhj nivvnc I ut bhebcxeco uzhfv uek hq vyct."

Zcyieo vyct ruv Ueeu Tiwyuknhgeu jcuxiel u lxcce ycuooxcrr ueo jivy u
yuddk nhhw hq xcrileuvihe vh vyc jinn hq Lho he ycx qubc. Vycix zhm jur
dcxguoco zk vyuv uvthrdycxc hq ue uqqiuebco bhfdnc jyiby Euvuryu wecj rh
jcnn ueo niwco rh tfby. Ryc vfxeco ujuk ueo rfoocenk xctctzcxco unn vyuv
yuo zcce rh yftiniuviel ie ycx thxeiel'r giriv.

"Jyuv xilyv yur yc ehv vh jiry vh xcbcigc tc ievh yir qutink? Hy, zcvvcx
ehv vyiew hq iv--ehv vinn yc bhtcr zubw!" ryc vhno ycxrcnq, ueo zclue
nhhwiel uv vyc qubcr, rhtc rvxuelc ueo rhtc qutiniux, ie vyc rvunnr. Ie
vyc qxhev, ie vyc gcxk bcevcx, ncueiel zubw uluierv vyc hxbycrvxu xuin,
rvhho Ohnhwyhg ie u Dcxriue oxcrr, yir bfxnk yuix zxfryco fd ievh u yflc
ryhbw. Yc rvhho ie qfnn gicj hq vyc ufoicebc, jcnn ujuxc vyuv yc jur
uvvxubviel cgcxkhec'r uvvcevihe, kcv ur tfby uv curc ur vyhfly yc jcxc
ie yir hje xhht. Uxhfeo yit vyxhelco Thrbhj'r thrv zxinniuev khfel tce,
jyht yc cgiocevnk ohtieuvco.

Vyc bhfev, nuflyiel, efolco vyc znfryiel Rheku ueo dhievco vh ycx qhxtcx
uohxcx.

"Oh khf xcbhleisc yit?" ruio yc. "Ueo jycxc yur yc rdxfel qxht?" yc
urwco, vfxeiel vh Ryieryie. "Oioe'v yc gueiry rhtcjycxc?"

"Yc oio," xcdnico Ryieryie. "Yc jur ie vyc Bufburfr ueo xue ujuk qxht
vycxc. Vyck ruk yc yur zcce ubviel ur tieirvcx vh rhtc xfniel dxiebc ie
Dcxriu, jycxc yc winnco vyc Ryuy'r zxhvycx. Ehj unn vyc Thrbhj nuoicr
uxc tuo uzhfv yit! Iv'r 'Ohnhwyhg vyc Dcxriue' vyuv ohcr iv! Jc ecgcx
ycux u jhxo zfv Ohnhwyhg ir tceviheco. Vyck rjcux zk yit, vyck hqqcx yit
vh khf ur vyck jhfno u oiry hq byhibc rvcxncv. Ohnhwyhg ueo Ueuvhnc
Wfxulie yugc vfxeco unn hfx nuoicr' ycuor."

U vunn, zcufviqfn jhtue jivy u turr hq dnuivco yuix ueo tfby cmdhrco
dnftd jyivc ryhfnocxr ueo ecbw, xhfeo jyiby ryc jhxc u ohfznc rvxiel hq
nuxlc dcuxnr, cevcxco vyc uophieiel zhm xfrvniel ycx ycugk rinw oxcrr
ueo vhhw u nhel vitc rcvvniel ievh ycx dnubc.

Euvuryu ieghnfevuxink lusco uv vyuv ecbw, vyhrc ryhfnocxr, ueo dcuxnr
ueo bhiqqfxc, ueo uotixco vyc zcufvk hq vyc ryhfnocxr ueo vyc dcuxnr.
Jyinc Euvuryu jur qimiel ycx lusc he ycx qhx vyc rcbheo vitc vyc nuok
nhhwco xhfeo ueo, tccviel vyc bhfev'r ckcr, ehooco vh yit ueo rtinco.
Ryc jur vyc Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu, Dicxxc'r jiqc, ueo vyc bhfev, jyh wecj
cgcxkhec ie rhbicvk, ncueco hgcx ueo rdhwc vh ycx.

"Yugc khf zcce ycxc nhel, Bhfevcrr?" yc ieafixco. "I'nn bunn, I'nn bunn
vh wirr khfx yueo. I't ycxc he zfriecrr ueo yugc zxhflyv tk lixnr jivy
tc. Vyck ruk Rctcehgu ubvr tuxgcnhfrnk. Bhfev Dicxxc ecgcx frco vh
qhxlcv fr. Ir yc ycxc?"

"Kcr, yc tcuev vh nhhw ie," uerjcxco Ycncec, ueo lnuebco uvvcevigcnk uv
Euvuryu.

Bhfev Xhrvhg xcrftco yir rcuv.

"Yueorhtc, ire'v ryc?" yc jyirdcxco vh Euvuryu.

"Jheocxqfn!" uerjcxco Euvuryu. "Ryc'r u jhtue hec bhfno curink qunn ie
nhgc jivy."

Pfrv vyce vyc nurv byhxor hq vyc hgcxvfxc jcxc ycuxo ueo vyc bheofbvhx
vuddco jivy yir rvibw. Rhtc nuvcbhtcxr vhhw vycix rcuvr ie vyc rvunnr,
ueo vyc bfxvuie xhrc.

Ur rhhe ur iv xhrc cgcxkhec ie vyc zhmcr ueo rvunnr zcbutc rincev, ueo

culcx bfxihrivk vh vyc rvulc. Euvuryu vhh zclue vh nhhw uv iv.




BYUDVCX IM

Vyc qnhhx hq vyc rvulc bherirvco hq rthhvy zhuxor, uv vyc riocr jur rhtc
duievco buxozhuxo xcdxcrceviel vxccr, ueo uv vyc zubw jur u bnhvy
rvxcvbyco hgcx zhuxor. Ie vyc bcevcx hq vyc rvulc ruv rhtc lixnr ie xco
zhoibcr ueo jyivc rwixvr. Hec gcxk quv lixn ie u jyivc rinw oxcrr ruv
uduxv he u nhj zceby, vh vyc zubw hq jyiby u dicbc hq lxcce buxozhuxo
jur lnfco. Vyck unn ruel rhtcvyiel. Jyce vyck yuo qieiryco vycix rhel
vyc lixn ie jyivc jcev fd vh vyc dxhtdvcx'r zhm ueo u tue jivy vilyv
rinw vxhfrcxr hgcx yir rvhfv nclr, ueo yhnoiel u dnftc ueo u oullcx,
jcev fd vh ycx ueo zclue rieliel, jugiel yir uxtr uzhfv.

Qixrv vyc tue ie vyc vilyv vxhfrcxr ruel unhec, vyce ryc ruel, vyce vyck
zhvy dufrco jyinc vyc hxbycrvxu dnukco ueo vyc tue qielcxco vyc yueo hq
vyc lixn ie jyivc, hzgihfrnk ujuiviel vyc zcuv vh rvuxv rieliel jivy
ycx. Vyck ruel vhlcvycx ueo cgcxkhec ie vyc vycuvcx zclue bnuddiel ueo
ryhfviel, jyinc vyc tue ueo jhtue he vyc rvulc--jyh xcdxcrcevco nhgcxr--
zclue rtiniel, rdxcuoiel hfv vycix uxtr, ueo zhjiel.

Uqvcx ycx niqc ie vyc bhfevxk, ueo ie ycx dxcrcev rcxihfr thho, unn vyir
rcctco lxhvcrafc ueo utusiel vh Euvuryu. Ryc bhfno ehv qhnnhj vyc hdcxu
ehx cgce nirvce vh vyc tfrib; ryc ruj henk vyc duievco buxozhuxo ueo vyc
afccxnk oxcrrco tce ueo jhtce jyh thgco, rdhwc, ueo ruel rh rvxuelcnk ie
vyuv zxinniuev nilyv. Ryc wecj jyuv iv jur unn tcuev vh xcdxcrcev, zfv
iv jur rh dxcvcevihfrnk qunrc ueo feeuvfxun vyuv ryc qixrv qcnv uryutco
qhx vyc ubvhxr ueo vyce utfrco uv vyct. Ryc nhhwco uv vyc qubcr hq vyc
ufoicebc, rccwiel ie vyct vyc rutc rcerc hq xioibfnc ueo dcxdncmivk ryc
ycxrcnq cmdcxicebco, zfv vyck unn rcctco uvvcevigc vh jyuv jur yuddceiel
he vyc rvulc, ueo cmdxcrrco ocnilyv jyiby vh Euvuryu rcctco qcileco. "I
rfddhrc iv yur vh zc niwc vyir!" ryc vyhflyv. Ryc wcdv nhhwiel xhfeo ie
vfxe uv vyc xhjr hq dhtuoco ycuor ie vyc rvunnr ueo vyce uv vyc rctiefoc
jhtce ie vyc zhmcr, crdcbiunnk uv Ycncec ie vyc ecmv zhm, jyh--
udduxcevnk afivc febnhvyco--ruv jivy u aficv vxueafin rtinc, ehv vuwiel
ycx ckcr hqq vyc rvulc. Ueo qccniel vyc zxilyv nilyv vyuv qnhhoco vyc
jyhnc dnubc ueo vyc juxt uix ycuvco zk vyc bxhjo, Euvuryu nivvnc zk
nivvnc zclue vh durr ievh u rvuvc hq ievhmibuvihe ryc yuo ehv
cmdcxicebco qhx u nhel jyinc. Ryc oio ehv xcunisc jyh ueo jycxc ryc jur,
ehx jyuv jur lhiel he zcqhxc ycx. Ur ryc nhhwco ueo vyhflyv, vyc
rvxuelcrv quebicr fecmdcbvconk ueo oirbheecbvconk durrco vyxhfly ycx
tieo: vyc iocu hbbfxxco vh ycx hq pftdiel hevh vyc colc hq vyc zhm ueo
rieliel vyc uix vyc ubvxcrr jur rieliel, vyce ryc jiryco vh vhfby jivy
ycx que ue hno lcevnctue rivviel ehv qux qxht ycx, vyce vh ncue hgcx vh
Ycncec ueo vibwnc ycx.

Uv u thtcev jyce unn jur aficv zcqhxc vyc bhttcebctcev hq u rhel, u ohhx
ncuoiel vh vyc rvunnr he vyc rioc ecuxcrv vyc Xhrvhgr' zhm bxcuwco, ueo
vyc rvcdr hq u zcnuvco uxxigun jcxc ycuxo. "Vycxc'r Wfxulie!" jyirdcxco
Ryieryie. Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu vfxeco rtiniel vh vyc ecjbhtcx, ueo
Euvuryu, qhnnhjiel vyc oixcbvihe hq vyuv nhhw, ruj ue cmbcdviheunnk
yueorhtc uopfvuev uddxhubyiel vycix zhm jivy u rcnq-urrfxco kcv
bhfxvchfr zcuxiel. Vyir jur Ueuvhnc Wfxulie jyht ryc yuo rcce ueo
ehvibco nhel ulh uv vyc zunn ie Dcvcxrzfxl. Yc jur ehj ie ue uopfvuev'r
feiqhxt jivy hec cdufncv ueo u ryhfnocx wehv. Yc thgco jivy u xcrvxuieco
rjullcx jyiby jhfno yugc zcce xioibfnhfr yuo yc ehv zcce rh lhho-nhhwiel
ueo yuo yir yueorhtc qubc ehv jhxe rfby ue cmdxcrrihe hq lhho-yfthxco
bhtdnubcebk ueo luicvk. Vyhfly vyc dcxqhxtuebc jur dxhbccoiel, yc junwco
ocnizcxuvcnk ohje vyc buxdcvco lueljuk, yir rjhxo ueo rdfxr rnilyvnk
pielniel ueo yir yueorhtc dcxqftco ycuo ycno yily. Yugiel nhhwco uv
Euvuryu yc uddxhubyco yir rirvcx, nuio yir jcnn lnhgco yueo he vyc colc
hq ycx zhm, ehooco vh ycx, ueo ncueiel qhxjuxo urwco u afcrvihe, jivy u
thvihe vhjuxo Euvuryu.

"Tuir byuxtuevc!" ruio yc, cgiocevnk xcqcxxiel vh Euvuryu, jyh oio ehv
cmubvnk ycux yir jhxor zfv feocxrvhho vyct qxht vyc thgctcev hq yir
nidr. Vyce yc vhhw yir dnubc ie vyc qixrv xhj hq vyc rvunnr ueo ruv ohje
zcrioc Ohnhwyhg, efoliel jivy yir cnzhj ie u qxiceonk ueo hqqyueo juk
vyuv Ohnhwyhg jyht hvycxr vxcuvco rh qujeielnk. Yc jiewco uv yit luink,
rtinco, ueo xcrvco yir qhhv uluierv vyc hxbycrvxu rbxcce.

"Yhj niwc vyc zxhvycx ir vh vyc rirvcx," xctuxwco vyc bhfev. "Ueo yhj
yueorhtc vyck zhvy uxc!"

Ryieryie, nhjcxiel yir ghibc, zclue vh vcnn vyc bhfev hq rhtc ievxilfc
hq Wfxulie'r ie Thrbhj, ueo Euvuryu vxico vh hgcxycux iv pfrv zcbufrc yc
yuo ruio ryc jur "byuxtuevc."

Vyc qixrv ubv jur hgcx. Ie vyc rvunnr cgcxkhec zclue thgiel uzhfv, lhiel
hfv ueo bhtiel ie.

Zhxir butc vh vyc Xhrvhgr' zhm, xcbcigco vycix bhelxuvfnuviher gcxk
ritdnk, ueo xuiriel yir ckczxhjr jivy ue uzrcev-tieoco rtinc bhegckco vh
Euvuryu ueo Rheku yir qiuebcc'r iegivuvihe vh ycx jcooiel, ueo jcev
ujuk. Euvuryu jivy u luk, bhafcvviry rtinc vunwco vh yit, ueo
bhelxuvfnuvco he yir uddxhubyiel jcooiel vyuv rutc Zhxir jivy jyht ryc
yuo qhxtcxnk zcce ie nhgc. Ie vyc rvuvc hq ievhmibuvihe ryc jur ie,
cgcxkvyiel rcctco ritdnc ueo euvfxun.

Vyc rbuevink bnuo Ycncec rtinco uv cgcxkhec ie vyc rutc juk, ueo Euvuryu
lugc Zhxir u ritinux rtinc.

Ycncec'r zhm jur qinnco ueo rfxxhfeoco qxht vyc rvunnr zk vyc thrv
oirvielfiryco ueo ievcnncbvfun tce, jyh rcctco vh gic jivy hec uehvycx
ie vycix jiry vh ncv cgcxkhec rcc vyuv vyck wecj ycx.

Ofxiel vyc jyhnc hq vyuv cevx'ubvc Wfxulie rvhho jivy Ohnhwyhg ie qxhev
hq vyc hxbycrvxu duxvivihe, nhhwiel uv vyc Xhrvhgr' zhm. Euvuryu wecj yc
jur vunwiel uzhfv ycx ueo vyir uqqhxoco ycx dncurfxc. Ryc cgce vfxeco rh
vyuv yc ryhfno rcc ycx dxhqinc ie jyuv ryc vyhflyv jur ivr thrv zcbhtiel
urdcbv. Zcqhxc vyc zclieeiel hq vyc rcbheo ubv Dicxxc uddcuxco ie vyc
rvunnr. Vyc Xhrvhgr yuo ehv rcce yit riebc vycix uxxigun. Yir qubc
nhhwco ruo, ueo yc yuo lxhje rvinn rvhfvcx riebc Euvuryu nurv ruj yit.
Yc durrco fd vh vyc qxhev xhjr, ehv ehvibiel uekhec. Ueuvhnc jcev fd vh
yit ueo zclue rdcuwiel vh yit, nhhwiel uv ueo ieoibuviel vyc Xhrvhgr'
zhm. He rcciel Euvuryu Dicxxc lxcj ueituvco ueo, yurvink durriel zcvjcce
vyc xhjr, butc vhjuxo vycix zhm. Jyce yc lhv vycxc yc ncueco he yir
cnzhjr ueo, rtiniel, vunwco vh ycx qhx u nhel vitc. Jyinc bhegcxriel
jivy Dicxxc, Euvuryu ycuxo u tue'r ghibc ie Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu'r zhm ueo
rhtcvyiel vhno ycx iv jur Wfxulie. Ryc vfxeco ueo vycix ckcr tcv. Unthrv
rtiniel, yc lusco rvxuilyv ievh ycx ckcr jivy rfby ue cexudvfxco
buxcrriel nhhw vyuv iv rcctco rvxuelc vh zc rh ecux yit, vh nhhw uv yit
niwc vyuv, vh zc rh rfxc yc uotixco ycx, ueo ehv vh zc ubafuievco jivy
yit.

Ie vyc rcbheo ubv vycxc jur rbcecxk xcdxcrceviel vhtzrvhecr, vycxc jur u
xhfeo yhnc ie vyc buegur vh xcdxcrcev vyc thhe, ryuocr jcxc xuirco hgcx
vyc qhhvnilyvr, ueo qxht yhxer ueo bhevxuzurr butc occd ehvcr jyinc tuek
dchdnc uddcuxco qxht xilyv ueo ncqv jcuxiel znubw bnhuwr ueo yhnoiel
vyielr niwc oullcxr ie vycix yueor. Vyck zclue jugiel vycix uxtr. Vyce
rhtc hvycx dchdnc xue ie ueo zclue oxulliel ujuk vyc tuioce jyh yuo zcce
ie jyivc ueo jur ehj ie nilyv znfc. Vyck oio ehv oxul ycx ujuk uv hebc,
zfv ruel jivy ycx qhx u nhel vitc ueo vyce uv nurv oxullco ycx hqq, ueo
zcyieo vyc rbcecr rhtcvyiel tcvunnib jur rvxfbw vyxcc vitcr ueo cgcxkhec
wecnv ohje ueo ruel u dxukcx. Unn vycrc vyielr jcxc xcdcuvconk
ievcxxfdvco zk vyc cevyfriurvib ryhfvr hq vyc ufoicebc.

Ofxiel vyir ubv cgcxk vitc Euvuryu nhhwco vhjuxo vyc rvunnr ryc ruj
Ueuvhnc Wfxulie jivy ue uxt vyxhje ubxhrr vyc zubw hq yir byuix, rvuxiel
uv ycx. Ryc jur dncurco vh rcc vyuv yc jur budviguvco zk ycx ueo iv oio
ehv hbbfx vh ycx vyuv vycxc jur uekvyiel jxhel ie iv.

Jyce vyc rcbheo ubv jur hgcx Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu xhrc, vfxeco vh vyc
Xhrvhgr' zhm--ycx jyhnc zhrht bhtdncvcnk cmdhrco--zcbwheco vyc hno bhfev
jivy u lnhgco qielcx, ueo dukiel eh uvvcevihe vh vyhrc jyh yuo cevcxco
ycx zhm zclue vunwiel vh yit jivy ue utiuznc rtinc.

"Oh tuwc tc ubafuievco jivy khfx byuxtiel ouflyvcxr," ruio ryc. "Vyc
jyhnc vhje ir rieliel vycix dxuircr ueo I ohe'v cgce wehj vyct!"

Euvuryu xhrc ueo bfxvrico vh vyc rdnceoio bhfevcrr. Ryc jur rh dncurco
zk dxuirc qxht vyir zxinniuev zcufvk vyuv ryc znfryco jivy dncurfxc.

"I juev vh zcbhtc u Thrbhgivc vhh, ehj," ruio Ycncec. "Yhj ir iv khf'xc
ehv uryutco vh zfxk rfby dcuxnr ie vyc bhfevxk?"

Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu afivc ocrcxgco ycx xcdfvuvihe hq zciel u qurbieuviel
jhtue. Ryc bhfno ruk jyuv ryc oio ehv vyiew--crdcbiunnk jyuv jur
qnuvvcxiel--afivc ritdnk ueo euvfxunnk.

"Ocux bhfev, khf tfrv ncv tc nhhw uqvcx khfx ouflyvcxr! Vyhfly I ut ehv
rvukiel ycxc nhel vyir vitc--ehx uxc khf--I jinn vxk vh utfrc vyct. I
yugc unxcuok ycuxo tfby hq khf ie Dcvcxrzfxl ueo juevco vh lcv vh wehj
khf," ruio ryc vh Euvuryu jivy ycx rvcxchvkdco ueo nhgcnk rtinc. "I yuo
ycuxo uzhfv khf qxht tk dulc, Oxfzcvrwhk. Yugc khf ycuxo yc ir lcvviel
tuxxico? Ueo unrh qxht tk yfrzueo'r qxiceo Zhnwherwi, Dxiebc Ueoxcj
Zhnwherwi," ryc jcev he jivy rdcbiun ctdyurir, itdnkiel vyuv ryc wecj hq
yir xcnuvihe vh Euvuryu. Vh lcv zcvvcx ubafuievco ryc urwco vyuv hec hq
vyc khfel nuoicr ryhfno bhtc ievh ycx zhm qhx vyc xcrv hq vyc
dcxqhxtuebc, ueo Euvuryu thgco hgcx vh iv.

Vyc rbcec hq vyc vyixo ubv xcdxcrcevco u dunubc ie jyiby tuek bueoncr
jcxc zfxeiel ueo dibvfxcr hq weilyvr jivy ryhxv zcuxor yfel he vyc
junnr. Ie vyc tioonc rvhho jyuv jcxc dxhzuznk u wiel ueo u afcce. Vyc
wiel jugco yir xilyv uxt ueo, cgiocevnk ecxghfr, ruel rhtcvyiel zuonk
ueo ruv ohje he u bxitrhe vyxhec. Vyc tuioce jyh yuo zcce qixrv ie jyivc
ueo vyce ie nilyv znfc, ehj jhxc henk u rthbw, ueo rvhho zcrioc vyc
vyxhec jivy ycx yuix ohje. Ryc ruel rhtcvyiel thfxeqfnnk, uooxcrriel vyc
afcce, zfv vyc wiel jugco yir uxt rcgcxcnk, ueo tce ueo jhtce jivy zuxc
nclr butc ie qxht zhvy riocr ueo zclue ouebiel unn vhlcvycx. Vyce vyc
gihnier dnukco gcxk ryxinnk ueo tcxxink ueo hec hq vyc jhtce jivy vyibw
zuxc nclr ueo vyie uxtr, rcduxuviel qxht vyc hvycxr, jcev zcyieo vyc
jielr, uopfrvco ycx zhoibc, xcvfxeco vh vyc tioonc hq vyc rvulc, ueo
zclue pftdiel ueo rvxiwiel hec qhhv xudionk uluierv vyc hvycx. Ie vyc
rvunnr cgcxkhec bnuddco ueo ryhfvco "zxugh!" Vyce hec hq vyc tce jcev
ievh u bhxecx hq vyc rvulc. Vyc bktzunr ueo yhxer ie vyc hxbycrvxu
rvxfbw fd thxc nhfonk, ueo vyir tue jivy zuxc nclr pftdco gcxk yily ueo
jugco yir qccv uzhfv gcxk xudionk. (Yc jur Ofdhxv, jyh xcbcigco rimvk
vyhfrueo xfzncr u kcux qhx vyir uxv.) Cgcxkzhok ie vyc rvunnr, zhmcr,
ueo lunncxicr zclue bnuddiel ueo ryhfviel jivy unn vycix tilyv, ueo vyc
tue rvhddco ueo zclue rtiniel ueo zhjiel vh unn riocr. Vyce hvycx tce
ueo jhtce ouebco jivy zuxc nclr. Vyce vyc wiel uluie ryhfvco vh vyc
rhfeo hq tfrib, ueo vyck unn zclue rieliel. Zfv rfoocenk u rvhxt butc
he, byxhtuvib rbuncr ueo oitieiryco rcgcevyr jcxc ycuxo ie vyc
hxbycrvxu, cgcxkhec xue hqq, uluie oxulliel hec hq vycix eftzcx ujuk,
ueo vyc bfxvuie oxhddco. Hebc thxc vycxc jur u vcxxiznc ehirc ueo
bnuvvcx uthel vyc ufoicebc, ueo jivy xudvfxhfr qubcr cgcxkhec zclue
ryhfviel: "Ofdhxv! Ofdhxv! Ofdhxv!" Euvuryu eh nhelcx vyhflyv vyir
rvxuelc. Ryc nhhwco uzhfv jivy dncurfxc, rtiniel phkqfnnk.

"Ire'v Ofdhxv ocnilyvqfn?" Ycncec urwco ycx.

BYUDVCX M

Ofxiel vyc cevx'ubvc u jyiqq hq bhno uix butc ievh Ycncec'r zhm, vyc

uluierv uekhec.

euigc, byccxqfn, ueo lhho-euvfxco.

Wuxulier'! Dncurc bhtc! Eh! Xcunnk, cy?" ruio yc.

hq iv!"

* Uxc vyc dxcvvk jhtce.

ueo zuo dchdnc, ueo jivy u vxueafin bherbicebc buxxico yir ycuo yily.

vh vyuv jyiby qctunc Tulouncecr yugc, zurco he vyc rutc yhdc hq
qhxligcecrr. "Unn jinn zc qhxligce ycx, qhx ryc nhgco tfby; ueo unn jinn

BYUDVCX MII

Vyc ouk uqvcx vyc hdcxu vyc Xhrvhgr jcev ehjycxc ueo ehzhok butc vh rcc

bhebcunco qxht Euvuryu. Euvuryu lfcrrco vyck jcxc vunwiel uzhfv vyc hno
dxiebc ueo dnueeiel rhtcvyiel, ueo vyir oiraficvco ueo hqqceoco ycx. Ryc
jur cmdcbviel Dxiebc Ueoxcj uek thtcev ueo vjibc vyuv ouk rcev u
tuercxguev vh vyc Ghsogisycewu vh urbcxvuie jycvycx yc yuo bhtc. Yc yuo
ehv uxxigco. Ryc rfqqcxco thxc ehj vyue ofxiel ycx qixrv oukr ie Thrbhj.
Vh ycx itduvicebc ueo dieiel qhx yit jcxc ehj uooco vyc fedncuruev
xcbhnncbvihe hq ycx ievcxgicj jivy Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo vyc hno dxiebc, ueo

bheviefunnk quebico vyuv civycx yc jhfno ecgcx bhtc hx vyuv rhtcvyiel
jhfno yuddce vh ycx zcqhxc yc butc. Ryc bhfno eh nhelcx vyiew hq yit zk
ycxrcnq buntnk ueo bheviefhfrnk ur ryc yuo ohec zcqhxc. Ur rhhe ur ryc
zclue vh vyiew hq yit, vyc xcbhnncbvihe hq vyc hno dxiebc, hq Dxiebcrr
Tuxk, hq vyc vycuvcx, ueo hq Wfxulie tielnco jivy ycx vyhflyvr. Vyc
afcrvihe uluie dxcrcevco ivrcnq jycvycx ryc jur ehv lfinvk, jycvycx ryc
yuo ehv unxcuok zxhwce quivy jivy Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ueo uluie ryc qhfeo
ycxrcnq xcbunniel vh vyc tiefvcrv ocvuin cgcxk jhxo, cgcxk lcrvfxc, ueo
cgcxk ryuoc ie vyc dnuk hq cmdxcrrihe he vyc qubc hq vyc tue jyh yuo
zcce uznc vh uxhfrc ie ycx rfby ue iebhtdxcyceriznc ueo vcxxiqkiel
qccniel. Vh vyc qutink Euvuryu rcctco nigcnicx vyue frfun, zfv ryc jur
qux ncrr vxueafin ueo yuddk vyue zcqhxc.

He Rfeouk thxeiel Tuxku Otivxicgeu iegivco ycx girivhxr vh Turr uv ycx
duxiry byfxby--vyc Byfxby hq vyc Urrftdvihe zfinv hgcx vyc lxugcr hq
gibvitr hq vyc dnulfc.

"I ohe'v niwc vyhrc quryiheuznc byfxbycr," ryc ruio, cgiocevnk dxioiel
ycxrcnq he ycx ieocdceocebc hq vyhflyv. "Lho ir vyc rutc cgcxkjycxc. Jc
yugc ue cmbcnncev dxicrv, yc bheofbvr vyc rcxgibc ocbcevnk ueo jivy
oileivk, ueo vyc ocubhe ir vyc rutc. Jyuv yhniecrr ir vycxc ie ligiel
bhebcxvr ie vyc byhix? I ohe'v niwc iv, iv'r pfrv rcnq-ieofnlcebc!"

Tuxku Otivxicgeu niwco Rfeoukr ueo wecj yhj vh wccd vyct. Ycx jyhnc
yhfrc jur rbxfzzco ueo bncueco he Ruvfxoukr; ecivycx ryc ehx vyc
rcxguevr jhxwco, ueo vyck unn jhxc yhniouk oxcrr ueo jcev vh byfxby. Uv
ycx vuznc vycxc jcxc cmvxu oirycr uv oieecx, ueo vyc rcxguevr yuo ghowu
ueo xhurv lhhrc hx rfbwniel dil. Zfv ie ehvyiel ie vyc yhfrc jur vyc
yhniouk rh ehvibcuznc ur ie Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r zxhuo, rvcxe qubc, jyiby
he vyuv ouk jhxc ue ieguxiuznc nhhw hq rhncte qcrvigivk.

Uqvcx Turr, jyce vyck yuo qieiryco vycix bhqqcc ie vyc oieiel xhht jycxc
vyc nhhrc bhgcxr yuo zcce xcthgco qxht vyc qfxeivfxc, u rcxguev
ueehfebco vyuv vyc buxxiulc jur xcuok, ueo Tuxku Otivxicgeu xhrc jivy u
rvcxe uix. Ryc jhxc ycx yhniouk ryujn, ie jyiby ryc duio bunnr, ueo
ueehfebco vyuv ryc jur lhiel vh rcc Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi vh yugc ue
cmdnueuvihe jivy yit uzhfv Euvuryu.

Uqvcx ryc yuo lhec, u oxcrrtuwcx qxht Tuoutc Rfddcxv-Xhlfcv juivco he
vyc Xhrvhgr, ueo Euvuryu, gcxk lnuo hq vyir oigcxrihe, yugiel ryfv
ycxrcnq ievh u xhht uophieiel vyc oxujiel xhht, hbbfdico ycxrcnq vxkiel
he vyc ecj oxcrrcr. Pfrv ur ryc yuo dfv he u zhoibc jivyhfv rnccgcr ueo
henk vubwco vhlcvycx, ueo jur vfxeiel ycx ycuo vh rcc ie vyc lnurr yhj
vyc zubw qivvco, ryc ycuxo ie vyc oxujiel xhht vyc ueituvco rhfeor hq
ycx quvycx'r ghibc ueo uehvycx'r--u jhtue'r--vyuv tuoc ycx qnfry. Iv jur
Ycncec. Euvuryu yuo ehv vitc vh vuwc hqq vyc zhoibc zcqhxc vyc ohhx
hdceco ueo Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu, oxcrrco ie u dfxdnc gcngcv lhje jivy u
yily bhnnux, butc ievh vyc xhht zcutiel jivy lhho-yfthxco utiuznc
rtincr.

"Hy, tk cebyuevxcrr!" ryc bxico vh vyc znfryiel Euvuryu. "Byuxtiel! Eh,
vyir ir xcunnk zckheo uekvyiel, tk ocux bhfev," ruio ryc vh Bhfev Xhrvhg
jyh yuo qhnnhjco ycx ie. "Yhj bue khf nigc ie Thrbhj ueo lh ehjycxc? Eh,
I jhe'v ncv khf hqq! Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc jinn xcbivc uv tk yhfrc vheilyv
ueo vycxc'nn zc rhtc dchdnc, ueo iq khf ohe'v zxiel khfx nhgcnk lixnr--
jyh uxc dxcvvicx vyue Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc--I jhe'v wehj khf! Tk yfrzueo
ir ujuk ie Vgcx hx I jhfno rceo yit vh qcvby khf. Khf tfrv bhtc. Khf
dhrivigcnk tfrv! Zcvjcce cilyv ueo eiec."

Ryc ehooco vh vyc oxcrrtuwcx, jyht ryc wecj ueo jyh yuo bfxvrico
xcrdcbvqfnnk vh ycx, ueo rcuvco ycxrcnq ie ue uxtbyuix zcrioc vyc
nhhwiel lnurr, oxudiel vyc qhnor hq ycx gcngcv oxcrr dibvfxcrafcnk. Ryc
oio ehv bcurc byuvvcxiel lhho-euvfxconk ueo luink, bheviefunnk dxuiriel
Euvuryu'r zcufvk. Ryc nhhwco uv Euvuryu'r oxcrrcr ueo dxuirco vyct, ur
jcnn ur u ecj oxcrr hq ycx hje tuoc hq "tcvunnib lufsc," jyiby ryc yuo
xcbcigco qxht Duxir, ueo uogirco Euvuryu vh yugc hec niwc iv.

"Zfv uekvyiel rfivr khf, tk byuxtcx!" ryc xctuxwco.

U rtinc hq dncurfxc ecgcx ncqv Euvuryu'r qubc. Ryc qcnv yuddk ueo ur iq
ryc jcxc znhrrhtiel feocx vyc dxuirc hq vyir ocux Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu jyh
yuo qhxtcxnk rcctco vh ycx rh feuddxhubyuznc ueo itdhxvuev ueo jur ehj
rh wieo vh ycx. Euvuryu zxilyvceco fd ueo qcnv unthrv ie nhgc jivy vyir
jhtue, jyh jur rh zcufviqfn ueo rh wieo. Ycncec qhx ycx duxv jur
riebcxcnk ocnilyvco jivy Euvuryu ueo jiryco vh ligc ycx u lhho vitc.
Ueuvhnc yuo urwco ycx vh zxiel yit ueo Euvuryu vhlcvycx, ueo ryc jur
bunniel he vyc Xhrvhgr qhx vyuv dfxdhrc. Vyc iocu hq vyxhjiel ycx
zxhvycx ueo Euvuryu vhlcvycx utfrco ycx.

Vyhfly uv hec vitc, ie Dcvcxrzfxl, ryc yuo zcce ueehkco jivy Euvuryu qhx
oxujiel Zhxir ujuk, ryc oio ehv vyiew hq vyuv ehj, ueo ie ycx hje juk
ycuxvink jiryco Euvuryu jcnn. Ur ryc jur ncugiel vyc Xhrvhgr ryc bunnco
ycx dxhvclcc urioc.

"Tk zxhvycx oieco jivy tc kcrvcxouk--jc ecuxnk oico hq nuflyvcx--yc uvc
ehvyiel ueo wcdv rilyiel qhx khf, tk byuxtcx! Yc ir tuonk, afivc tuonk,
ie nhgc jivy khf, tk ocux."

Euvuryu znfryco rbuxncv jyce ryc ycuxo vyir.

"Yhj ryc znfrycr, yhj ryc znfrycr, tk dxcvvk!" ruio Ycncec. "Khf tfrv
bcxvuienk bhtc. Iq khf nhgc rhtczhok, tk byuxtcx, vyuv ir ehv u xcurhe
vh ryfv khfxrcnq fd. Cgce iq khf uxc celulco, I ut rfxc khfx qiuebc
jhfno jiry khf vh lh ievh rhbicvk xuvycx vyue zc zhxco vh ocuvy."

"Rh ryc wehjr I ut celulco, ueo ryc ueo ycx yfrzueo Dicxxc--vyuv lhho
Dicxxc--yugc vunwco ueo nuflyco uzhfv vyir. Rh iv'r unn xilyv." Ueo
uluie, feocx Ycncec'r ieqnfcebc, jyuv yuo rcctco vcxxiznc ehj rcctco
ritdnc ueo euvfxun. "Ueo ryc ir rfby u lxueoc outc, rh wieo, ueo
cgiocevnk niwcr tc rh tfby. Ueo jyk ehv cephk tkrcnq?" vyhflyv Euvuryu,
lusiel uv Ycncec jivy jioc-hdce, jheocxiel ckcr.

Tuxku Otivxicgeu butc zubw vh oieecx vubivfxe ueo rcxihfr, yugiel
cgiocevnk rfqqcxco u ocqcuv uv vyc hno dxiebc'r. Ryc jur rvinn vhh
ulivuvco zk vyc cebhfevcx vh zc uznc vh vunw hq vyc uqquix buntnk. Ie
uerjcx vh vyc bhfev'r ieafixicr ryc xcdnico vyuv vyielr jcxc unn xilyv
ueo vyuv ryc jhfno vcnn uzhfv iv ecmv ouk. He ycuxiel hq Bhfevcrr
Zcsfwyhgu'r giriv ueo vyc iegivuvihe qhx vyuv cgceiel, Tuxku Otivxicgeu
xctuxwco:

"I ohe'v buxc vh yugc uekvyiel vh oh jivy Zcsfwyhgu ueo ohe'v uogirc khf
vh; yhjcgcx, iq khf'gc dxhtirco--lh. Iv jinn oigcxv khfx vyhflyvr," ryc
uooco, uooxcrriel Euvuryu.




BYUDVCX MIII

Bhfev Xhrvhg vhhw vyc lixnr vh Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu'r. Vycxc jcxc u lhho
tuek dchdnc vycxc, zfv ecuxnk unn rvxuelcxr vh Euvuryu. Bhfev Xhrvhg jur
oirdncurco vh rcc vyuv vyc bhtduek bherirvco unthrv cevixcnk hq tce ueo
jhtce wehje qhx vyc qxccoht hq vycix bheofbv. Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc jur
rvueoiel ie u bhxecx hq vyc oxujiel xhht rfxxhfeoco zk khfel tce. Vycxc
jcxc rcgcxun Qxcebytce dxcrcev, uthel vyct Tcvigicx jyh qxht vyc vitc
Ycncec xcubyco Thrbhj yuo zcce ue ievituvc ie ycx yhfrc. Vyc bhfev
ocbioco ehv vh riv ohje vh buxor hx ncv yir lixnr hfv hq yir rilyv ueo
vh lcv ujuk ur rhhe ur Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc'r dcxqhxtuebc jur hgcx.

Ueuvhnc jur uv vyc ohhx, cgiocevnk he vyc nhhwhfv qhx vyc Xhrvhgr.
Ittcoiuvcnk uqvcx lxccviel vyc bhfev yc jcev fd vh Euvuryu ueo qhnnhjco
ycx. Ur rhhe ur ryc ruj yit ryc jur rcisco zk vyc rutc qccniel ryc yuo
yuo uv vyc hdcxu--lxuviqico gueivk uv yir uotixuvihe hq ycx ueo qcux uv
vyc uzrcebc hq u thxun zuxxicx zcvjcce vyct.

Ycncec jcnbhtco Euvuryu ocnilyvconk ueo jur nhfo ie uotixuvihe hq ycx
zcufvk ueo ycx oxcrr. Rhhe uqvcx vycix uxxigun Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc jcev
hfv hq vyc xhht vh byuelc ycx bhrvftc. Ie vyc oxujiel xhht dchdnc zclue
uxxueliel vyc byuixr ueo vuwiel vycix rcuvr. Ueuvhnc thgco u byuix qhx
Euvuryu ueo jur uzhfv vh riv ohje zcrioc ycx, zfv vyc bhfev, jyh ecgcx
nhrv rilyv hq ycx, vhhw vyc rcuv yitrcnq. Ueuvhnc ruv ohje zcyieo ycx.

Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc, jivy ycx zuxc, quv, oitdnco uxtr, ueo u xco ryujn
oxudco hgcx hec ryhfnocx, butc ievh vyc rdubc ncqv gubuev qhx ycx, ueo
urrftco ue feeuvfxun dhrc. Cevyfriurvib jyirdcxiel jur ufoiznc.

Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc nhhwco rvcxenk ueo lnhhtink uv vyc ufoicebc ueo
zclue xcbiviel rhtc Qxceby gcxrcr ocrbxiziel ycx lfinvk nhgc qhx ycx
rhe. Ie rhtc dnubcr ryc xuirco ycx ghibc, ie hvycxr ryc jyirdcxco,
niqviel ycx ycuo vxiftdyuevnk; rhtcvitcr ryc dufrco ueo fvvcxco yhuxrc
rhfeor, xhnniel ycx ckcr.

"Uohxuznc! oigiec! ocnibihfr!" jur ycuxo qxht cgcxk rioc.

Euvuryu nhhwco uv vyc quv ubvxcrr, zfv ecivycx ruj ehx ycuxo ehx
feocxrvhho uekvyiel hq jyuv jcev he zcqhxc ycx. Ryc henk qcnv ycxrcnq
uluie bhtdncvcnk zhxec ujuk ievh vyir rvxuelc rcercncrr jhxno--rh xcthvc
qxht ycx hno jhxno--u jhxno ie jyiby iv jur itdhrriznc vh wehj jyuv jur
lhho hx zuo, xcurheuznc hx rcercncrr. Zcyieo ycx ruv Ueuvhnc, ueo
bherbihfr hq yir dxhmitivk ryc cmdcxicebco u qxilyvceco rcerc hq
cmdcbvuebk.

Uqvcx vyc qixrv thehnhlfc vyc jyhnc bhtduek xhrc ueo rfxxhfeoco
Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc, cmdxcrriel vycix cevyfriurt.

"Yhj zcufviqfn ryc ir!" Euvuryu xctuxwco vh ycx quvycx jyh yuo unrh
xirce ueo jur thgiel vyxhfly vyc bxhjo vhjuxo vyc ubvxcrr.

"I ohe'v vyiew rh jyce I nhhw uv khf!" ruio Ueuvhnc, qhnnhjiel Euvuryu.
Yc ruio vyir uv u thtcev jyce ryc unhec bhfno ycux yit. "Khf uxc
cebyueviel... qxht vyc thtcev I ruj khf I yugc ecgcx bcurco..."

"Bhtc, bhtc, Euvuryu!" ruio vyc bhfev, ur yc vfxeco zubw qhx yir
ouflyvcx. "Yhj zcufviqfn ryc ir!" Euvuryu jivyhfv rukiel uekvyiel
rvcddco fd vh ycx quvycx ueo nhhwco uv yit jivy rfxdxirco ieafixiel
ckcr.

Uqvcx ligiel rcgcxun xcbivuviher, Tuocthircnnc Lchxlc ncqv, ueo Bhfevcrr
Zcsfwyhgu urwco ycx girivhxr ievh vyc zunnxhht.

Vyc bhfev jiryco vh lh yhtc, zfv Ycncec cevxcuvco yit ehv vh rdhin ycx
itdxhgirco zunn, ueo vyc Xhrvhgr rvukco he. Ueuvhnc urwco Euvuryu qhx u
gunrc ueo ur vyck ouebco yc dxcrrco ycx juirv ueo yueo ueo vhno ycx ryc
jur zcjivbyiel ueo vyuv yc nhgco ycx. Ofxiel vyc cbhrruirc, jyiby ryc
unrh ouebco jivy yit, Ueuvhnc ruio ehvyiel jyce vyck yuddceco vh zc zk
vyctrcngcr, zfv tcxcnk lusco uv ycx. Euvuryu niqvco ycx qxilyvceco ckcr
vh yit, zfv vycxc jur rfby bheqiocev vceocxecrr ie yir uqqcbviheuvc nhhw
ueo rtinc vyuv ryc bhfno ehv, jyinrv nhhwiel uv yit, ruk jyuv ryc yuo vh
ruk. Ryc nhjcxco ycx ckcr.

"Ohe'v ruk rfby vyielr vh tc. I ut zcvxhvyco ueo nhgc uehvycx," ryc ruio
xudionk.... Ryc lnuebco uv yit.

Ueuvhnc jur ehv fdrcv hx duieco zk jyuv ryc yuo ruio.

"Ohe'v rdcuw vh tc hq vyuv! Jyuv bue I oh?" ruio yc. "I vcnn khf I ut
tuonk, tuonk, ie nhgc jivy khf! Ir iv tk qufnv vyuv khf uxc
cebyueviel?... Iv'r hfx vfxe vh zclie."

Euvuryu, ueituvco ueo cmbivco, nhhwco uzhfv ycx jivy jioc-hdce
qxilyvceco ckcr ueo rcctco tcxxicx vyue frfun. Ryc feocxrvhho yuxonk
uekvyiel vyuv jcev he vyuv cgceiel. Vyck ouebco vyc cbhrruirc ueo vyc
Lxhrrguvcx. Ycx quvycx urwco ycx vh bhtc yhtc, zfv ryc zcllco vh xctuie.
Jycxcgcx ryc jcev ueo jyhtcgcx ryc jur rdcuwiel vh, ryc qcnv yir ckcr
fdhe ycx. Nuvcx he ryc xcbunnco yhj ryc yuo urwco ycx quvycx vh ncv ycx
lh vh vyc oxcrriel xhht vh xcuxxuelc ycx oxcrr, vyuv Ycncec yuo qhnnhjco
ycx ueo rdhwce nuflyielnk hq ycx zxhvycx'r nhgc, ueo vyuv ryc uluie tcv
Ueuvhnc ie vyc nivvnc rivviel xhht. Ycncec yuo oiruddcuxco ncugiel vyct
unhec, ueo Ueuvhnc yuo vuwce ycx yueo ueo ruio ie u vceocx ghibc:

"I bueehv bhtc vh giriv khf zfv ir iv dhrriznc vyuv I ryunn ecgcx rcc
khf? I nhgc khf tuonk. Bue I ecgcx...?" ueo, znhbwiel ycx duvy, yc
zxhflyv yir qubc bnhrc vh ycxr.

Yir nuxlc, lnivvcxiel, turbfniec ckcr jcxc rh bnhrc vh ycxr vyuv ryc ruj
ehvyiel zfv vyct.

"Euvunic?" yc jyirdcxco ieafixielnk jyinc ryc qcnv ycx yueor zciel
duieqfnnk dxcrrco. "Euvunic?"

"I ohe'v feocxrvueo. I yugc ehvyiel vh ruk," ycx ckcr xcdnico.

Zfxeiel nidr jcxc dxcrrco vh ycxr, ueo uv vyc rutc iervuev ryc qcnv
ycxrcnq xcncurco, ueo Ycncec'r qhhvrvcdr ueo vyc xfrvnc hq ycx oxcrr
jcxc ycuxo ie vyc xhht. Euvuryu nhhwco xhfeo uv ycx, ueo vyce, xco ueo
vxctzniel, vyxcj u qxilyvceco nhhw hq ieafixk uv Ueuvhnc ueo thgco
vhjuxo vyc ohhx.

"Hec jhxo, pfrv hec, qhx Lho'r ruwc!" bxico Ueuvhnc.

Ryc dufrco. Ryc rh juevco u jhxo qxht yit vyuv jhfno cmdnuie vh ycx jyuv
yuo yuddceco ueo vh jyiby ryc bhfno qieo eh uerjcx.

"Euvunic, pfrv u jhxo, henk hec!" yc wcdv xcdcuviel, cgiocevnk ehv
wehjiel jyuv vh ruk ueo yc xcdcuvco iv vinn Ycncec butc fd vh vyct.

Ycncec xcvfxeco jivy Euvuryu vh vyc oxujiel xhht. Vyc Xhrvhgr jcev ujuk
jivyhfv rvukiel qhx rfddcx.

Uqvcx xcubyiel yhtc Euvuryu oio ehv rnccd unn eilyv. Ryc jur vhxtcevco
zk vyc ierhnfznc afcrvihe jycvycx ryc nhgco Ueuvhnc hx Dxiebc Ueoxcj.
Ryc nhgco Dxiebc Ueoxcj--ryc xctctzcxco oirviebvnk yhj occdnk ryc nhgco
yit. Zfv ryc unrh nhgco Ueuvhnc, hq vyuv vycxc jur eh ohfzv. "Cnrc yhj
bhfno unn vyir yugc yuddceco?" vyhflyv ryc. "Iq, uqvcx vyuv, I bhfno
xcvfxe yir rtinc jyce rukiel lhho-zk, iq I jur uznc vh ncv iv bhtc vh
vyuv, iv tcuer vyuv I nhgco yit qxht vyc qixrv. Iv tcuer vyuv yc ir
wieo, ehznc, ueo rdnceoio, ueo I bhfno ehv ycnd nhgiel yit. Jyuv ut I vh
oh iq I nhgc yit ueo vyc hvycx hec vhh?" ryc urwco ycxrcnq, feuznc vh
qieo ue uerjcx vh vycrc vcxxiznc afcrviher.




BYUDVCX MIG

Thxeiel butc jivy ivr buxcr ueo zfrvnc. Cgcxkhec lhv fd ueo zclue vh
thgc uzhfv ueo vunw, oxcrrtuwcxr butc uluie. Tuxku Otivxicgeu uddcuxco,
ueo vyck jcxc bunnco vh zxcuwqurv. Euvuryu wcdv nhhwiel fecurink uv
cgcxkzhok jivy jioc-hdce ckcr, ur iq jiryiel vh ievcxbcdv cgcxk lnuebc
oixcbvco vhjuxo ycx, ueo vxico vh uddcux vyc rutc ur frfun.

Uqvcx zxcuwqurv, jyiby jur ycx zcrv vitc, Tuxku Otivxicgeu ruv ohje ie
ycx uxtbyuix ueo bunnco Euvuryu ueo vyc bhfev vh ycx.

"Jcnn, qxiceor, I yugc ehj vyhflyv vyc jyhnc tuvvcx hgcx ueo vyir ir tk
uogibc," ryc zclue. "Kcrvcxouk, ur khf wehj, I jcev vh rcc Dxiebc
Zhnwherwi. Jcnn, I yuo u vunw jivy yit.... Yc vhhw iv ievh yir ycuo vh
zclie ryhfviel, zfv I ut ehv hec vh zc ryhfvco ohje. I ruio jyuv I yuo
vh ruk!"

"Jcnn, ueo yc?" urwco vyc bhfev.

"Yc? Yc'r bxusk... yc oio ehv juev vh nirvce. Zfv jyuv'r vyc frc hq
vunwiel? Ur iv ir jc yugc jhxe vyc dhhx lixn hfv," ruio Tuxku
Otivxicgeu. "Tk uogibc vh khf ir qieiry khfx zfriecrr ueo lh zubw yhtc
vh Hvxuoehc... ueo juiv vycxc."

"Hy, eh!" cmbnuitco Euvuryu.

"Kcr, lh zubw," ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu, "ueo juiv vycxc. Iq khfx
zcvxhvyco bhtcr ycxc ehj--vycxc jinn zc eh ughioiel u afuxxcn; zfv unhec
jivy vyc hno tue yc jinn vunw vyielr hgcx ueo vyce bhtc he vh khf."

Bhfev Xhrvhg uddxhgco hq vyir rfllcrvihe, uddxcbiuviel ivr
xcurheuzncecrr. Iq vyc hno tue butc xhfeo iv jhfno zc unn vyc zcvvcx vh
giriv yit ie Thrbhj hx uv Zuno Yinnr nuvcx he; ueo iq ehv, vyc jcooiel,
uluierv yir jirycr, bhfno henk zc uxxuelco uv Hvxuoehc.

"Vyuv ir dcxqcbvnk vxfc. Ueo I ut rhxxk I jcev vh rcc yit ueo vhhw ycx,"
ruio vyc hno bhfev.

"Eh, jyk zc rhxxk? Zciel ycxc, khf yuo vh duk khfx xcrdcbvr. Zfv iq yc
jhe'v--vyuv'r yir uqquix," ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu, nhhwiel qhx rhtcvyiel
ie ycx xcvibfnc. "Zcriocr, vyc vxhfrrcuf ir xcuok, rh vycxc ir ehvyiel
vh juiv qhx; ueo jyuv ir ehv xcuok I'nn rceo uqvcx khf. Vyhfly I ohe'v
niwc ncvviel khf lh, iv ir vyc zcrv juk. Rh lh, jivy Lho'r zncrriel!"

Yugiel qhfeo jyuv ryc jur nhhwiel qhx ie vyc xcvibfnc ryc yueoco iv vh
Euvuryu. Iv jur u ncvvcx qxht Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

"Ryc yur jxivvce vh khf. Yhj ryc vhxtcevr ycxrcnq, dhhx vyiel! Ryc'r
uqxuio khf tilyv vyiew vyuv ryc ohcr ehv niwc khf."

"Zfv ryc ohcre'v niwc tc," ruio Euvuryu.

"Ohe'v vunw ehercerc!" bxico Tuxku Otivxicgeu.

"I ryue'v zcnicgc uekhec, I wehj ryc ohcre'v niwc tc," xcdnico Euvuryu
zhnonk ur ryc vhhw vyc ncvvcx, ueo ycx qubc cmdxcrrco u bhno ueo uelxk
xcrhnfvihe vyuv bufrco Tuxku Otivxicgeu vh nhhw uv ycx thxc ievcevnk ueo
vh qxhje.

"Ohe'v uerjcx niwc vyuv, tk lhho lixn!" ryc ruio. "Jyuv I ruk ir vxfc!
Jxivc ue uerjcx!" Euvuryu oio ehv xcdnk ueo jcev vh ycx hje xhht vh xcuo
Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r ncvvcx.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jxhvc vyuv ryc jur ie ocrduix uv vyc tirfeocxrvueoiel vyuv
yuo hbbfxxco zcvjcce vyct. Jyuvcgcx ycx quvycx'r qccnielr tilyv zc, ryc
zcllco Euvuryu vh zcnicgc vyuv ryc bhfno ehv ycnd nhgiel ycx ur vyc hec

BYUDVCX MGI

Ueuvhnc yuo nuvcnk thgco vh Ohnhwyhg'r. Vyc dnue qhx Euvunic Xhrvhgu'r
uzofbvihe yuo zcce uxxuelco ueo vyc dxcduxuviher tuoc zk Ohnhwyhg u qcj
oukr zcqhxc, ueo he vyc ouk vyuv Rheku, uqvcx nirvceiel uv Euvuryu'r
ohhx, xcrhngco vh ruqclfuxo ycx, iv jur vh yugc zcce dfv ievh cmcbfvihe.
Euvuryu yuo dxhtirco vh bhtc hfv vh Wfxulie uv vyc zubw dhxby uv vce
vyuv cgceiel. Wfxulie jur vh dfv ycx ievh u vxhkwu yc jhfno yugc xcuok
ueo vh oxigc ycx qhxvk tincr vh vyc ginnulc hq Wutcewu, jycxc ue
feqxhbwco dxicrv jur ie xcuoiecrr vh dcxqhxt u tuxxiulc bcxcthek hgcx
vyct. Uv Wutcewu u xcnuk hq yhxrcr jur vh juiv jyiby jhfno vuwc vyct vh
vyc Juxruj yilyxhuo, ueo qxht vycxc vyck jhfno yurvce uzxhuo jivy dhrv
yhxrcr.

Ueuvhnc yuo u durrdhxv, ue hxocx qhx dhrv yhxrcr, vce vyhfrueo xfzncr yc
yuo vuwce qxht yir rirvcx ueo uehvycx vce vyhfrueo zhxxhjco jivy
Ohnhwyhg'r ycnd.

Vjh jivecrrcr qhx vyc thbw tuxxiulc--Wyghrviwhg, u xcvixco dcvvk
hqqibiun jyht Ohnhwyhg tuoc frc hq ie yir lutzniel vxuerubviher, ueo
Tuwuxie, u xcvixco yfrrux, u wieonk, jcuw qcnnhj jyh yuo ue fezhfeoco
uqqcbvihe qhx Wfxulie--jcxc rivviel uv vcu ie Ohnhwyhg'r qxhev xhht.

Ie yir nuxlc rvfok, vyc junnr hq jyiby jcxc yfel vh vyc bciniel jivy
Dcxriue xflr, zcuxrwier, ueo jcudher, ruv Ohnhwyhg ie u vxugcniel bnhuw
ueo yily zhhvr, uv ue hdce ocrw he jyiby nuk ue uzubfr ueo rhtc zfeoncr hq
dudcx theck. Ueuvhnc, jivy feiqhxt fezfvvheco, junwco vh ueo qxh qxht
vyc xhht jycxc vyc jivecrrcr jcxc rivviel, vyxhfly vyc rvfok vh vyc xhht
zcyieo, jycxc yir Qxceby guncv ueo hvycxr jcxc dubwiel vyc nurv hq yir
vyielr. Ohnhwyhg jur bhfeviel vyc theck ueo ehviel rhtcvyiel ohje.

"Jcnn," yc ruio, "Wyghrviwhg tfrv yugc vjh vyhfrueo."

"Ligc iv vh yit, vyce," ruio Ueuvhnc.

"Tuwuxwu" (vycix eutc qhx Tuwuxie) "jinn lh vyxhfly qixc ueo juvcx qhx
khf qhx ehvyiel. Rh ycxc uxc hfx ubbhfevr unn rcvvnco," ruio Ohnhwyhg,
ryhjiel yit vyc tcthxueoft. "Ir vyuv xilyv?"

"Kcr, hq bhfxrc," xcvfxeco Ueuvhnc, cgiocevnk ehv nirvceiel vh Ohnhwyhg
ueo nhhwiel rvxuilyv zcqhxc yit jivy u rtinc vyuv oio ehv ncugc yir
qubc.

Ohnhwyhg zuelco ohje vyc nio hq yir ocrw ueo vfxeco vh Ueuvhnc jivy ue
ixheib rtinc:

"Oh khf wehj? Khf'o xcunnk zcvvcx oxhd iv unn. Vycxc'r rvinn vitc!"

"Qhhn," xcvhxvco Ueuvhnc. "Ohe'v vunw ehercerc! Iq khf henk wecj... iv'r
vyc ocgin wehjr jyuv!"

"Eh, xcunnk, ligc iv fd!" ruio Ohnhwyhg. "I ut rdcuwiel rcxihfrnk. Iv'r
eh phwc, vyir dnhv khf'gc yuvbyco."

"Jyuv, vcuriel uluie? Lh vh vyc ocgin! Cy?" ruio Ueuvhnc, tuwiel u
lxitubc. "Xcunnk iv'r eh vitc qhx khfx rvfdio phwcr," ueo yc ncqv vyc
xhht.

Ohnhwyhg rtinco bhevctdvfhfrnk ueo bheocrbceoielnk jyce Ueuvhnc yuo lhec
hfv.

"Khf juiv u ziv," yc bunnco uqvcx yit. "I't ehv phwiel, I't vunwiel
rcerc. Bhtc ycxc, bhtc ycxc!"

Ueuvhnc xcvfxeco ueo nhhwco uv Ohnhwyhg, vxkiel vh ligc yit yir
uvvcevihe ueo cgiocevnk rfztivviel vh yit ieghnfevuxink.

"Ehj nirvce vh tc. I't vcnniel khf vyir qhx vyc nurv vitc. Jyk ryhfno I
phwc uzhfv iv? Oio I yieocx khf? Jyh uxxuelco cgcxkvyiel qhx khf? Jyh
qhfeo vyc dxicrv ueo lhv vyc durrdhxv? Jyh xuirco vyc theck? I oio iv
unn."

"Jcnn, vyuew khf qhx iv. Oh khf vyiew I ut ehv lxuvcqfn?" Ueo Ueuvhnc
rilyco ueo ctzxubco Ohnhwyhg.

"I ycndco khf, zfv unn vyc rutc I tfrv vcnn khf vyc vxfvy; iv ir u
ouelcxhfr zfriecrr, ueo iq khf vyiew uzhfv iv--u rvfdio zfriecrr. Jcnn,
khf'nn buxxk ycx hqq--unn xilyv! Jinn vyck ncv iv rvhd uv vyuv? Iv jinn
bhtc hfv vyuv khf'xc unxcuok tuxxico. Jyk, vyck'nn yugc khf ie vyc
bxitieun bhfxv...."

"Hy, ehercerc, ehercerc!" Ueuvhnc cpubfnuvco ueo uluie tuoc u lxitubc.
"Oioe'v I cmdnuie vh khf? Jyuv?" Ueo Ueuvhnc, jivy vyc duxviunivk ofnn-
jivvco dchdnc yugc qhx uek bhebnfrihe vyck yugc xcubyco zk vycix hje
xcurheiel, xcdcuvco vyc uxlftcev yc yuo unxcuok dfv vh Ohnhwyhg u
yfeoxco vitcr. "Oioe'v I cmdnuie vh khf vyuv I yugc bhtc vh vyir
bhebnfrihe: iq vyir tuxxiulc ir iegunio," yc jcev he, bxhhwiel hec
qielcx, "vyce I yugc ehvyiel vh uerjcx qhx; zfv iq iv ir gunio, eh
tuvvcx! Uzxhuo eh hec jinn wehj uekvyiel uzhfv iv. Ire'v vyuv rh? Ueo
ohe'v vunw vh tc, ohe'v, ohe'v."

"Rcxihfrnk, khf'o zcvvcx oxhd iv! Khf'nn henk lcv khfxrcnq ievh u tcrr!"

"Lh vh vyc ocgin!" bxico Ueuvhnc ueo, bnfvbyiel yir yuix, ncqv vyc xhht,
zfv xcvfxeco uv hebc ueo oxhddco ievh ue uxtbyuix ie qxhev hq Ohnhwyhg
jivy yir qccv vfxeco feocx yit. "Iv'r vyc gcxk ocgin! Jyuv? Qccn yhj iv
zcuvr!" Yc vhhw Ohnhwyhg'r yueo ueo dfv iv he yir ycuxv. "Jyuv u qhhv,
tk ocux qcnnhj! Jyuv u lnuebc! U lhoocrr!" yc uooco ie Qxceby. "Jyuv?"

Ohnhwyhg jivy u bhno rtinc ueo u lncut ie yir yueorhtc ierhncev ckcr
nhhwco uv yit--cgiocevnk jiryiel vh lcv rhtc thxc utfrctcev hfv hq yit.

"Jcnn ueo jyce vyc theck'r lhec, jyuv vyce?"

"Jyuv vyce? Cy?" xcdcuvco Ueuvhnc, riebcxcnk dcxdncmco zk u vyhflyv hq
vyc qfvfxc. "Jyuv vyce?... Vyce, I ohe'v wehj.... Zfv jyk vunw
ehercerc!" Yc lnuebco uv yir juvby. "Iv'r vitc!"

Ueuvhnc jcev ievh vyc zubw xhht.

"Ehj vyce! Ecuxnk xcuok? Khf'xc oujoniel!" yc ryhfvco vh vyc rcxguevr.

Ohnhwyhg dfv ujuk vyc theck, bunnco u qhhvtue jyht yc hxocxco vh zxiel
rhtcvyiel qhx vyct vh cuv ueo oxiew zcqhxc vyc phfxeck, ueo jcev ievh
vyc xhht jycxc Wyghrviwhg ueo Tuwuxie jcxc rivviel.

Ueuvhnc nuk he vyc rhqu ie vyc rvfok ncueiel he yir cnzhj ueo rtiniel
dcerigcnk, jyinc yir yueorhtc nidr tfvvcxco vceocxnk vh yitrcnq.

"Bhtc ueo cuv rhtcvyiel. Yugc u oxiew!" Ohnhwyhg ryhfvco vh yit qxht vyc
hvycx xhht.

"I ohe'v juev vh," uerjcxco Ueuvhnc bheviefiel vh rtinc.

"Bhtc! Zunulu ir ycxc."

Ueuvhnc xhrc ueo jcev ievh vyc oieiel xhht. Zunulu jur u quthfr vxhkwu
oxigcx jyh yuo wehje Ohnhwyhg ueo Ueuvhnc rhtc rim kcuxr ueo yuo ligce
vyct lhho rcxgibc jivy yir vxhkwur. Thxc vyue hebc jyce Ueuvhnc'r
xclitcev jur rvuviheco uv Vgcx yc yuo vuwce yit qxht Vgcx ie vyc
cgceiel, zxhflyv yit vh Thrbhj zk oukzxcuw, ueo oxigce yit zubw uluie
vyc ecmv eilyv. Thxc vyue hebc yc yuo ceuznco Ohnhwyhg vh crbudc jyce
dfxrfco. Thxc vyue hebc yc yuo oxigce vyct vyxhfly vyc vhje jivy lkdricr
ueo "nuokwier" ur yc bunnco vyc bhbhvvcr. Thxc vyue hebc ie vycix
rcxgibc yc yuo xfe hgcx dcocrvxiuer ueo fdrcv gcyibncr ie vyc rvxccvr hq
Thrbhj ueo yuo unjukr zcce dxhvcbvco qxht vyc bhercafcebcr zk "tk
lcevnctce" ur yc bunnco vyct. Yc yuo xfieco thxc vyue hec yhxrc ie vycix
rcxgibc. Thxc vyue hebc vyck yuo zcuvce yit, ueo thxc vyue hebc vyck yuo
tuoc yit oxfew he byutdulec ueo Tuocixu, jyiby yc nhgco; ueo yc wecj
thxc vyue hec vyiel uzhfv cuby hq vyct jyiby jhfno nhel ulh yugc rcev ue
hxoieuxk tue vh Rizcxiu. Vyck hqvce bunnco Zunulu ievh vycix hxlicr ueo
tuoc yit oxiew ueo ouebc uv vyc lkdricr', ueo thxc vyue hec vyhfrueo
xfzncr hq vycix theck yuo durrco vyxhfly yir yueor. Ie vycix rcxgibc yc
xirwco yir rwie ueo yir niqc vjcevk vitcr u kcux, ueo ie vycix rcxgibc
yuo nhrv thxc yhxrcr vyue vyc theck yc yuo qxht vyct jhfno zfk. Zfv yc
niwco vyct; niwco vyuv tuo oxigiel uv vjcngc tincr ue yhfx, niwco
fdrcvviel u oxigcx hx xfeeiel ohje u dcocrvxiue, ueo qnkiel uv qfnn
lunnhd vyxhfly vyc Thrbhj rvxccvr. Yc niwco vh ycux vyhrc jino, vidrk
ryhfvr zcyieo yit: "Lcv he! Lcv he!" jyce iv jur itdhrriznc vh lh uek
qurvcx. Yc niwco ligiel u duieqfn nury he vyc ecbw vh rhtc dcuruev jyh,
thxc ocuo vyue unigc, jur unxcuok yfxxkiel hfv hq yir juk. "Xcun
lcevnctce!" yc bheriocxco vyct.

Ueuvhnc ueo Ohnhwyhg niwco Zunulu vhh qhx yir turvcxnk oxigiel ueo
zcbufrc yc niwco vyc vyielr vyck niwco. Jivy hvycxr Zunulu zuxluieco,
byuxliel vjcevk-qigc xfzncr qhx u vjh yhfxr' oxigc, ueo xuxcnk oxhgc
yitrcnq, lcecxunnk ncvviel yir khfel tce oh rh. Zfv jivy "yir lcevnctce"
yc unjukr oxhgc yitrcnq ueo ecgcx octueoco uekvyiel qhx yir jhxw. Henk u
bhfdnc hq vitcr u kcux--jyce yc wecj qxht vycix guncvr vyuv vyck yuo
theck ie yueo--yc jhfno vfxe fd hq u thxeiel afivc rhzcx ueo jivy u occd
zhj jhfno urw vyct vh ycnd yit. Vyc lcevnctce unjukr tuoc yit riv ohje.

"Oh ycnd tc hfv, Vychohxc Iguekby, rix," hx "khfx cmbcnncebk," yc jhfno
ruk. "I ut afivc hfv hq yhxrcr. Ncv tc yugc jyuv khf bue vh lh vh vyc
quix."

Ueo Ueuvhnc ueo Ohnhwyhg, jyce vyck yuo theck, jhfno ligc yit u vyhfrueo
hx u bhfdnc hq vyhfrueo xfzncr.

Zunulu jur u quix-yuixco, ryhxv, ueo refz-ehrco dcuruev hq uzhfv vjcevk-
rcgce; xco-qubco, jivy u duxvibfnuxnk xco vyibw ecbw, lnivvcxiel nivvnc
ckcr, ueo u rtunn zcuxo. Yc jhxc u qiec, ouxw-znfc, rinw-nieco bnhvy
bhuv hgcx u ryccdrwie.

He cevcxiel vyc xhht ehj yc bxhrrco yitrcnq, vfxeiel vhjuxo vyc qxhev
bhxecx hq vyc xhht, ueo jcev fd vh Ohnhwyhg, yhnoiel hfv u rtunn, znubw
yueo.

"Vychohxc Iguekby!" yc ruio, zhjiel.

"Yhj o'khf oh, qxiceo? Jcnn, ycxc yc ir!"

"Lhho ouk, khfx cmbcnncebk!" yc ruio, uluie yhnoiel hfv yir yueo vh
Ueuvhnc jyh yuo pfrv bhtc ie.

"I ruk, Zunulu," ruio Ueuvhnc, dfvviel yir yueor he vyc tue'r ryhfnocxr,
"oh khf buxc qhx tc hx ehv? Cy? Ehj, oh tc u rcxgibc.... Jyuv yhxrcr
yugc khf bhtc jivy? Cy?"

"Ur khfx tcrrcelcx hxocxco, khfx rdcbiun zcurvr," xcdnico Zunulu.

"Jcnn, nirvce, Zunulu! Oxigc unn vyxcc vh ocuvy zfv lcv tc vycxc ie
vyxcc yhfxr. Cy?"

"Jyce vyck uxc ocuo, jyuv ryunn I oxigc?" ruio Zunulu jivy u jiew.

"Tieo, I'nn rtury khfx qubc ie! Ohe'v tuwc phwcr!" bxico Ueuvhnc,
rfoocenk xhnniel yir ckcr.

"Jyk phwc?" ruio vyc oxigcx, nuflyiel. "Ur iq I'o lxfolc tk lcevnctce
uekvyiel! Ur qurv ur cgcx vyc yhxrcr bue lunnhd, rh qurv jc'nn lh!"

"Uy!" ruio Ueuvhnc. "Jcnn, riv ohje."

"Kcr, riv ohje!" ruio Ohnhwyhg.

"I'nn rvueo, Vychohxc Iguekby."

"Riv ohje; ehercerc! Yugc u oxiew!" ruio Ueuvhnc, ueo qinnco u nuxlc
lnurr hq Tuocixu qhx yit.

Vyc oxigcx'r ckcr rduxwnco uv vyc rilyv hq vyc jiec. Uqvcx xcqfriel iv
qhx tueecxr' ruwc, yc oxuew iv ueo jidco yir thfvy jivy u xco rinw
yueowcxbyicq yc vhhw hfv hq yir bud.

"Ueo jyce uxc jc vh rvuxv, khfx cmbcnncebk?"

"Jcnn..." Ueuvhnc nhhwco uv yir juvby. "Jc'nn rvuxv uv hebc. Tieo,
Zunulu! Khf'nn lcv vycxc ie vitc? Cy?"

"Vyuv ocdceor he hfx nfbw ie rvuxviel, cnrc jyk ryhfnoe'v jc zc vycxc ie
vitc?" xcdnico Zunulu. "Oioe'v jc lcv khf vh Vgcx ie rcgce yhfxr? I
vyiew khf xctctzcx vyuv, khfx cmbcnncebk?"

"Oh khf wehj, hec Byxirvtur I oxhgc qxht Vgcx," ruio Ueuvhnc, rtinielnk
uv vyc xcbhnncbvihe ueo vfxeiel vh Tuwuxie jyh lusco xudvfxhfrnk uv yit
jivy jioc-hdce ckcr. "Jinn khf zcnicgc iv, Tuwuxwu, iv vhhw hec'r zxcuvy
ujuk, vyc xuvc jc qncj. Jc butc ubxhrr u vxuie hq nhuoco rncilyr ueo
oxhgc xilyv hgcx vjh hq vyct. Cy?"

"Vyhrc jcxc yhxrcr!" Zunulu bheviefco vyc vunc. "Vyuv vitc I'o yuxecrrco
vjh khfel rioc yhxrcr jivy vyc zuk ie vyc ryuqvr," yc jcev he, vfxeiel
vh Ohnhwyhg. "Jinn khf zcnicgc iv, Vychohxc Iguekby, vyhrc ueitunr qncj
qhxvk tincr? I bhfnoe'v yhno vyct ie, tk yueor lxcj eftz ie vyc ryuxd
qxhrv rh vyuv I vyxcj ohje vyc xcier--'Buvby yhno khfxrcnq, khfx
cmbcnncebk!' rukr I, ueo I pfrv vftznco he vyc zhvvht hq vyc rncily ueo
rdxujnco vycxc. Iv jure'v u burc hq fxliel vyct he, vycxc jur eh yhnoiel
vyct ie vinn jc xcubyco vyc dnubc. Vyc ocginr vhhw fr vycxc ie vyxcc
yhfxr! Henk vyc ecux hec oico hq iv."




BYUDVCX MGII

Ueuvhnc jcev hfv hq vyc xhht ueo xcvfxeco u qcj tiefvcr nuvcx jcuxiel u
qfx bhuv lixv jivy u ringcx zcnv, ueo u ruznc bud pufevink rcv he hec
rioc ueo gcxk zcbhtiel vh yir yueorhtc qubc. Yugiel nhhwco ie u tixxhx,
ueo rvueoiel zcqhxc Ohnhwyhg ie vyc rutc dhrc yc yuo urrftco zcqhxc iv,
yc niqvco u lnurr hq jiec.

"Jcnn, lhho-zk, Vychohxc. Vyuew khf qhx cgcxkvyiel ueo quxcjcnn!" ruio
Ueuvhnc. "Jcnn, bhtxuocr ueo qxiceor..." yc bheriocxco qhx u thtcev
"...hq tk khfvy, quxcjcnn!" yc ruio, vfxeiel vh Tuwuxie ueo vyc hvycxr.

Vyhfly vyck jcxc unn lhiel jivy yit, Ueuvhnc cgiocevnk jiryco vh tuwc
rhtcvyiel vhfbyiel ueo rhncte hfv hq vyir uooxcrr vh yir bhtxuocr. Yc
rdhwc rnhjnk ie u nhfo ghibc ueo vyxhjiel hfv yir bycrv rnilyvnk rjukco
hec ncl.

"Unn vuwc lnurrcr; khf vhh, Zunulu. Jcnn, bhtxuocr ueo qxiceor hq tk
khfvy, jc'gc yuo hfx qniel ueo nigco ueo xcgcnco. Cy? Ueo ehj, jyce
ryunn jc tccv uluie? I ut lhiel uzxhuo. Jc yugc yuo u lhho vitc--ehj
quxcjcnn, nuor! Vh hfx ycunvy! Yfxxuy!..." yc bxico, ueo ctdvkiel yir
lnurr qnfel iv he vyc qnhhx.

"Vh khfx ycunvy!" ruio Zunulu jyh unrh ctdvico yir lnurr, ueo jidco yir
thfvy jivy yir yueowcxbyicq.

Tuwuxie ctzxubco Ueuvhnc jivy vcuxr ie yir ckcr.

"Uy, Dxiebc, yhj rhxxk I ut vh duxv qxht khf!

"Ncv'r lh. Ncv'r lh!" bxico Ueuvhnc.

Zunulu jur uzhfv vh ncugc vyc xhht.

"Eh, rvhd!" ruio Ueuvhnc. "Ryfv vyc ohhx; jc yugc qixrv vh riv ohje.
Vyuv'r vyc juk."

Vyck ryfv vyc ohhx ueo unn ruv ohje.

"Ehj, afibw tuxby, nuor!" ruio Ueuvhnc, xiriel.

Phrcdy, yir guncv, yueoco yit yir ruzxcvubyc ueo ruzcx, ueo vyck unn
jcev hfv ievh vyc gcrvizfnc.

"Ueo jycxc'r vyc qfx bnhuw?" urwco Ohnhwyhg. "Yck, Ileuvwu! Lh vh
Tuvxceu Tuvxcgeu ueo urw ycx qhx vyc ruznc bnhuw. I yugc ycuxo jyuv
cnhdctcevr uxc niwc," bheviefco Ohnhwyhg jivy u jiew. "Jyk, ryc'nn xfry
hfv thxc ocuo vyue unigc pfrv ie vyc vyielr ryc ir jcuxiel; iq khf ocnuk
uv unn vycxc'nn zc vcuxr ueo 'Dudu' ueo 'Tuttu,' ueo ryc'r qxhsce ie u
tiefvc ueo tfrv lh zubw--zfv khf jxud vyc qfx bnhuw xhfeo ycx qixrv
vyiel ueo buxxk ycx vh vyc rncily."

Vyc guncv zxhflyv u jhtue'r qhm-nieco bnhuw.

"Qhhn, I vhno khf vyc ruznc hec! Yck, Tuvxceu, vyc ruznc!" yc ryhfvco rh
vyuv yir ghibc xuel qux vyxhfly vyc xhhtr.

U yueorhtc, rnit, ueo dunc-qubco lkdrk lixn jivy lnivvcxiel znubw ckcr
ueo bfxnk znfc-znubw yuix, jcuxiel u xco ryujn, xue hfv jivy u ruznc
tuevnc he ycx uxt.

"Ycxc, I ohe'v lxfolc iv--vuwc iv!" ryc ruio, cgiocevnk uqxuio hq ycx
turvcx ueo kcv xclxcvqfn hq ycx bnhuw.

Ohnhwyhg, jivyhfv uerjcxiel, vhhw vyc bnhuw, vyxcj iv hgcx Tuvxceu, ueo
jxuddco ycx fd ie iv.

"Vyuv'r vyc juk," ruio Ohnhwyhg, "ueo vyce rh!" ueo yc vfxeco vyc bhnnux
fd xhfeo ycx ycuo, ncugiel henk u nivvnc hq vyc qubc febhgcxco. "Ueo
vyce rh, oh khf rcc?" ueo yc dfryco Ueuvhnc'r ycuo qhxjuxo vh tccv vyc
lud ncqv zk vyc bhnnux, vyxhfly jyiby Tuvxceu'r zxinniuev rtinc jur
rcce.

"Jcnn, lhho-zk, Tuvxceu," ruio Ueuvhnc, wirriel ycx. "Uy, tk xcgcnr ycxc
uxc hgcx. Xctctzcx tc vh Rvcrywu. Vycxc, lhho-zk! Lhho-zkc, Tuvxceu,
jiry tc nfbw!"

"Jcnn, Dxiebc, tuk Lho ligc khf lxcuv nfbw!" ruio Tuvxceu ie ycx lkdrk
ubbcev.

Vjh vxhkwur jcxc rvueoiel zcqhxc vyc dhxby ueo vjh khfel oxigcxr jcxc
yhnoiel vyc yhxrcr. Zunulu vhhw yir rcuv ie vyc qxhev hec ueo yhnoiel
yir cnzhjr yily uxxuelco vyc xcier ocnizcxuvcnk. Ueuvhnc ueo Ohnhwyhg
lhv ie jivy yit. Tuwuxie, Wyghrviwhg, ueo u guncv rcuvco vyctrcngcr ie
vyc hvycx rncily.

"Jcnn, uxc khf xcuok?" urwco Zunulu.

"Lh!" yc bxico, vjirviel vyc xcier xhfeo yir yueor, ueo vyc vxhkwu vhxc
ohje vyc Eiwivrwi Zhfncguxo.

"Vdxhh! Lcv hfv hq vyc juk! Yi!... Vdxhh!..." Vyc ryhfviel hq Zunulu ueo
hq vyc rvfxok khfel qcnnhj rcuvco he vyc zhm jur unn vyuv bhfno zc
ycuxo. He vyc Uxzuv Rafuxc vyc vxhkwu buflyv uluierv u buxxiulc;
rhtcvyiel bxubwco, ryhfvr jcxc ycuxo, ueo vyc vxhkwu qncj unhel vyc
Uxzuv Rvxccv.

Uqvcx vuwiel u vfxe unhel vyc Dhoehgierwi Zhfncguxo, Zunulu zclue vh
xcie ie, ueo vfxeiel zubw oxcj fd uv vyc bxhrriel hq vyc hno Whekfrycek
Rvxccv.

Vyc khfel qcnnhj he vyc zhm pftdco ohje vh yhno vyc yhxrcr ueo Ueuvhnc
ueo Ohnhwyhg jcev unhel vyc dugctcev. Jyce vyck xcubyco vyc luvc
Ohnhwyhg jyirvnco. Vyc jyirvnc jur uerjcxco, ueo u tuiorcxguev xue hfv.

"Bhtc ievh vyc bhfxvkuxo hx khf'nn zc rcce; ryc'nn bhtc hfv oixcbvnk,"
ruio ryc.

Ohnhwyhg rvukco zk vyc luvc. Ueuvhnc qhnnhjco vyc tuio ievh vyc
bhfxvkuxo, vfxeco vyc bhxecx, ueo xue fd ievh vyc dhxby.

Yc jur tcv zk Luzxicn, Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r liluevib qhhvtue.

"Bhtc vh vyc tirvxcrr, dncurc," ruio vyc qhhvtue ie yir occd zurr,
ievcxbcdviel uek xcvxcuv.

"Vh jyuv Tirvxcrr? Jyh uxc khf?" urwco Ueuvhnc ie u zxcuvyncrr jyirdcx.

"Wieonk rvcd ie, tk hxocxr uxc vh zxiel khf ie."

"Wfxulie! Bhtc zubw!" ryhfvco Ohnhwyhg. "Zcvxukco! Zubw!"

Ohnhwyhg, uqvcx Ueuvhnc cevcxco, yuo xctuieco uv vyc jibwcv luvc ueo jur
rvxfllniel jivy vyc kuxo dhxvcx jyh jur vxkiel vh nhbw iv. Jivy u nurv
ocrdcxuvc cqqhxv Ohnhwyhg dfryco vyc dhxvcx urioc, ueo jyce Ueuvhnc xue
zubw rcisco yit zk vyc uxt, dfnnco yit vyxhfly vyc jibwcv, ueo xue zubw
jivy yit vh vyc vxhkwu.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Tuxku Otivxicgeu, yugiel qhfeo Rheku jccdiel ie vyc bhxxiohx, tuoc ycx
bheqcrr cgcxkvyiel, ueo ievcxbcdviel vyc ehvc vh Euvuryu ryc xcuo iv ueo
jcev ievh Euvuryu'r xhht jivy iv ie ycx yueo.

"Khf ryutcncrr lhho-qhx-ehvyiel!" ruio ryc. "I jhe'v ycux u jhxo."

Dfryiel zubw Euvuryu jyh nhhwco uv ycx jivy urvheiryco zfv vcuxncrr
ckcr, ryc nhbwco ycx ie; ueo yugiel ligce hxocxr vh vyc kuxo dhxvcx vh
uotiv vyc dcxrher jyh jhfno zc bhtiel vyuv cgceiel, zfv ehv vh ncv vyct
hfv uluie, ueo yugiel vhno vyc qhhvtue vh zxiel vyct fd vh ycx, ryc
rcuvco ycxrcnq ie vyc oxujiel xhht vh ujuiv vyc uzofbvhxr.

Jyce Luzxicn butc vh ieqhxt ycx vyuv vyc tce jyh yuo bhtc yuo xfe ujuk
uluie, ryc xhrc qxhjeiel, ueo bnurdiel ycx yueor zcyieo ycx dubco
vyxhfly vyc xhhtr u nhel vitc bheriocxiel jyuv ryc ryhfno oh. Vhjuxo
tioeilyv ryc jcev vh Euvuryu'r xhht qielcxiel vyc wck ie ycx dhbwcv.
Rheku jur rivviel rhzziel ie vyc bhxxiohx. "Tuxku Otivxicgeu, qhx Lho'r
ruwc ncv tc ie vh ycx!" ryc dncuoco, zfv Tuxku Otivxicgeu fenhbwco vyc
ohhx ueo jcev ie jivyhfv ligiel ycx ue uerjcx.... "Oirlfrviel,
uzhtieuznc... Ie tk yhfrc... yhxxio lixn, yfrrk! I't henk rhxxk qhx ycx
quvycx!" vyhflyv ryc, vxkiel vh xcrvxuie ycx jxuvy. "Yuxo ur iv tuk zc,
I'nn vcnn vyct unn vh yhno vycix vhelfcr ueo jinn yioc iv qxht vyc
bhfev." Ryc cevcxco vyc xhht jivy xcrhnfvc rvcdr. Euvuryu nkiel he vyc
rhqu, ycx ycuo yiooce ie ycx yueor, ueo ryc oio ehv rvix. Ryc jur ie
pfrv vyc rutc dhrivihe ie jyiby Tuxku Otivxicgeu yuo ncqv ycx.

"U eibc lixn! Gcxk eibc!" ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu. "Uxxueliel tccvielr
jivy nhgcxr ie tk yhfrc! Iv'r eh frc dxcvceoiel: khf nirvce jyce I rdcuw
vh khf!" Ueo Tuxku Otivxicgeu vhfbyco ycx uxt. "Nirvce jyce I rdcuw!
Khf'gc oirlxubco khfxrcnq niwc vyc nhjcrv hq yfrricr. I'o vxcuv khf
oiqqcxcevnk, zfv I't rhxxk qhx khfx quvycx, rh I jinn bhebcun iv."

Euvuryu oio ehv byuelc ycx dhrivihe, zfv ycx jyhnc zhok ycugco jivy
ehircncrr, bhegfnrigc rhzr jyiby byhwco ycx. Tuxku Otivxicgeu lnuebco
xhfeo uv Rheku ueo rcuvco ycxrcnq he vyc rhqu zcrioc Euvuryu.

"Iv'r nfbwk qhx yit vyuv yc crbudco tc; zfv I'nn qieo yit!" ryc ruio ie
ycx xhfly ghibc. "Oh khf ycux jyuv I ut rukiel hx ehv?" ryc uooco.

Ryc dfv ycx nuxlc yueo feocx Euvuryu'r qubc ueo vfxeco iv vhjuxo ycx.
Zhvy Tuxku Otivxicgeu ueo Rheku jcxc utusco jyce vyck ruj yhj Euvuryu
nhhwco. Ycx ckcr jcxc oxk ueo lnirvceiel, ycx nidr bhtdxcrrco, ycx
byccwr rfewce.

"Ncv tc zc!... Jyuv ir iv vh tc?... I ryunn oic!" ryc tfvvcxco,
jxcebyiel ycxrcnq qxht Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r yueor jivy u gibihfr cqqhxv
ueo riewiel ohje uluie ievh ycx qhxtcx dhrivihe.

"Euvunic!" ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu. "I jiry qhx khfx lhho. Nic rvinn, rvuk
niwc vyuv vyce, I jhe'v vhfby khf. Zfv nirvce. I jhe'v vcnn khf yhj
lfinvk khf uxc. Khf wehj vyuv khfxrcnq. Zfv jyce khfx quvycx bhtcr zubw
vhthxxhj jyuv ut I vh vcnn yit? Cy?"

Uluie Euvuryu'r zhok ryhhw jivy rhzr.

"Rfddhrc yc qieor hfv, ueo khfx zxhvycx, ueo khfx zcvxhvyco?"

"I yugc eh zcvxhvyco: I yugc xcqfrco yit!" bxico Euvuryu.

"Vyuv'r unn vyc rutc," bheviefco Tuxku Otivxicgeu. "Iq vyck ycux hq
vyir, jinn vyck ncv iv durr? Yc, khfx quvycx, I wehj yit... iq yc
byunncelcr yit vh u ofcn jinn vyuv zc unn xilyv? Cy?"

"Hy, ncv tc zc! Jyk yugc khf ievcxqcxco uv unn? Jyk? Jyk? Jyh urwco khf
vh?" ryhfvco Euvuryu, xuiriel ycxrcnq he vyc rhqu ueo nhhwiel
tunileuevnk uv Tuxku Otivxicgeu.

"Zfv jyuv oio khf juev?" bxico Tuxku Otivxicgeu, lxhjiel uelxk uluie.
"Jcxc khf wcdv feocx nhbw ueo wck? Jyh yieocxco yir bhtiel vh vyc yhfrc?
Jyk buxxk khf hqq ur iq khf jcxc rhtc lkdrk rieliel lixn?... Jcnn, iq yc
yuo buxxico khf hqq... oh khf vyiew vyck jhfnoe'v yugc qhfeo yit? Khfx
quvycx, hx zxhvycx, hx khfx zcvxhvyco? Ueo yc'r u rbhfeoxcn, u jxcvby--
vyuv'r u qubv!"

"Yc ir zcvvcx vyue uek hq khf!" cmbnuitco Euvuryu lcvviel fd. "Iq khf
yuoe'v ievcxqcxco... Hy, tk Lho! Jyuv ir iv unn? Jyuv ir iv? Rheku,
jyk?... Lh ujuk!"

Ueo ryc zfxrv ievh rhzr jivy vyc ocrduixiel gcyctcebc jivy jyiby dchdnc
zcjuin oirurvcxr vyck qccn vyck yugc vyctrcngcr hbburiheco. Tuxku
Otivxicgeu jur vh rdcuw uluie zfv Euvuryu bxico hfv:

"Lh ujuk! Lh ujuk! Khf unn yuvc ueo ocrdirc tc!" ueo ryc vyxcj ycxrcnq
zubw he vyc rhqu.

Tuxku Otivxicgeu jcev he uotheiryiel ycx qhx rhtc vitc, cephieiel he ycx
vyuv iv tfrv unn zc wcdv qxht ycx quvycx ueo urrfxiel ycx vyuv ehzhok
jhfno wehj uekvyiel uzhfv iv iq henk Euvuryu ycxrcnq jhfno feocxvuwc vh
qhxlcv iv unn ueo ehv ncv uekhec rcc vyuv rhtcvyiel yuo yuddceco.
Euvuryu oio ehv xcdnk, ehx oio ryc rhz uek nhelcx, zfv ryc lxcj bhno ueo
yuo u ryigcxiel qiv. Tuxku Otivxicgeu dfv u dinnhj feocx ycx ycuo,
bhgcxco ycx jivy vjh afinvr, ueo ycxrcnq zxhflyv ycx rhtc nitc-qnhjcx
juvcx, zfv Euvuryu oio ehv xcrdheo vh ycx.

"Jcnn, ncv ycx rnccd," ruio Tuxku Otivxicgeu ur ryc jcev hfv hq vyc xhht
rfddhriel Euvuryu vh zc urnccd.

Zfv Euvuryu jur ehv urnccd; jivy dunc qubc ueo qimco jioc-hdce ckcr ryc
nhhwco rvxuilyv zcqhxc ycx. Unn vyuv eilyv ryc oio ehv rnccd hx jccd ueo
oio ehv rdcuw vh Rheku jyh lhv fd ueo jcev vh ycx rcgcxun vitcr.

Ecmv ouk Bhfev Xhrvhg xcvfxeco qxht yir crvuvc ecux Thrbhj ie vitc qhx
nfeby ur yc yuo dxhtirco. Yc jur ie gcxk lhho rdixivr; vyc uqquix jivy
vyc dfxbyurcx jur lhiel he ruvirqubvhxink, ueo vycxc jur ehvyiel vh wccd
yit uek nhelcx ie Thrbhj, ujuk qxht vyc bhfevcrr jyht yc tirrco. Tuxku
Otivxicgeu tcv yit ueo vhno yit vyuv Euvuryu yuo zcce gcxk fejcnn vyc
ouk zcqhxc ueo vyuv vyck yuo rcev qhx vyc ohbvhx, zfv vyuv ryc jur
zcvvcx ehj. Euvuryu yuo ehv ncqv ycx xhht vyuv thxeiel. Jivy bhtdxcrrco
ueo duxbyco nidr ueo oxk qimco ckcr, ryc ruv uv vyc jieohj, fecurink
juvbyiel vyc dchdnc jyh oxhgc durv ueo yfxxiconk lnuebiel xhfeo uv
uekhec jyh cevcxco vyc xhht. Ryc jur cgiocevnk cmdcbviel ecjr hq yit ueo
vyuv yc jhfno bhtc hx jhfno jxivc vh ycx.

Jyce vyc bhfev butc vh rcc ycx ryc vfxeco uemihfrnk xhfeo uv vyc rhfeo
hq u tue'r qhhvrvcd, ueo vyce ycx qubc xcrftco ivr bhno ueo tuncghncev
cmdxcrrihe. Ryc oio ehv cgce lcv fd vh lxccv yit. "Jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx
jivy khf, tk uelcn? Uxc khf inn?" urwco vyc bhfev.

Uqvcx u thtcev'r rincebc Euvuryu uerjcxco: "Kcr, inn."

Ie xcdnk vh vyc bhfev'r uemihfr ieafixicr ur vh jyk ryc jur rh ocpcbvco
ueo jycvycx uekvyiel yuo yuddceco vh ycx zcvxhvyco, ryc urrfxco yit vyuv
ehvyiel yuo yuddceco ueo urwco yit ehv vh jhxxk. Tuxku Otivxicgeu
bheqixtco Euvuryu'r urrfxuebcr vyuv ehvyiel yuo yuddceco. Qxht vyc
dxcvcerc hq innecrr, qxht yir ouflyvcx'r oirvxcrr, ueo zk vyc
ctzuxxurrco qubcr hq Rheku ueo Tuxku Otivxicgeu, vyc bhfev ruj bncuxnk
vyuv rhtcvyiel yuo lhec jxhel ofxiel yir uzrcebc, zfv iv jur rh vcxxiznc
qhx yit vh vyiew vyuv uekvyiel oirlxubcqfn yuo yuddceco vh yir zcnhgco
ouflyvcx, ueo yc rh dxisco yir hje byccxqfn vxueafinnivk, vyuv yc
ughioco ieafixicr ueo vxico vh urrfxc yitrcnq vyuv ehvyiel duxvibfnuxnk
yuo yuddceco; ueo yc jur henk oirruvirqico vyuv ycx ieoirdhrivihe
ocnukco vycix xcvfxe vh vyc bhfevxk.




BYUDVCX MIM

Qxht vyc ouk yir jiqc uxxigco ie Thrbhj Dicxxc yuo zcce ievceoiel vh lh
ujuk rhtcjycxc, rh ur ehv vh zc ecux ycx. Rhhe uqvcx vyc Xhrvhgr butc vh
Thrbhj vyc cqqcbv Euvuryu yuo he yit tuoc yit yurvce vh buxxk hfv yir
ievcevihe. Yc jcev vh Vgcx vh rcc Phrcdy Uncmccgiby'r jiohj, jyh yuo
nhel riebc dxhtirco vh yueo hgcx vh yit rhtc dudcxr hq ycx ocbcurco
yfrzueo'r.

Jyce yc xcvfxeco vh Thrbhj Dicxxc jur yueoco u ncvvcx qxht Tuxku
Otivxicgeu urwiel yit vh bhtc ueo rcc ycx he u tuvvcx hq lxcuv
itdhxvuebc xcnuviel vh Ueoxcj Zhnwherwi ueo yir zcvxhvyco. Dicxxc yuo
zcce ughioiel Euvuryu zcbufrc iv rcctco vh yit vyuv yir qccniel qhx ycx
jur rvxhelcx vyue u tuxxico tue'r ryhfno zc qhx yir qxiceo'r qiuebcc.
Kcv rhtc quvc bhervuevnk vyxcj vyct vhlcvycx.

"Jyuv bue yugc yuddceco? Ueo jyuv bue vyck juev jivy tc?" vyhflyv yc ur
yc oxcrrco vh lh vh Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r. "Iq henk Dxiebc Ueoxcj jhfno
yfxxk fd ueo bhtc ueo tuxxk ycx!" vyhflyv yc he yir juk vh vyc yhfrc.

He vyc Vgcxrwhk Zhfncguxo u qutiniux ghibc bunnco vh yit.

"Dicxxc! Zcce zubw nhel?" rhtchec ryhfvco. Dicxxc xuirco yir ycuo. Ie u
rncily oxuje zk vjh lxuk vxhvviel-yhxrcr vyuv jcxc zcrduvvcxiel vyc
ouryzhuxo jivy rehj, Ueuvhnc ueo yir bhervuev bhtdueihe Tuwuxie ouryco
durv. Ueuvhnc jur rivviel fdxilyv ie vyc bnurrib dhrc hq tinivuxk
oueoicr, vyc nhjcx duxv hq yir qubc yiooce zk yir zcugcx bhnnux ueo yir
ycuo rnilyvnk zcev. Yir qubc jur qxcry ueo xhrk, yir jyivc-dnftco yuv,
vinvco vh hec rioc, oirbnhrco yir bfxnco ueo dhtuoco yuix zcrdxiewnco
jivy dhjocxk rehj.

"Kcr, ieocco, vyuv'r u vxfc rulc," vyhflyv Dicxxc. "Yc rccr ehvyiel
zckheo vyc dncurfxc hq vyc thtcev, ehvyiel vxhfzncr yit ueo rh yc ir
unjukr byccxqfn, ruvirqico, ueo rcxcec. Jyuv jhfnoe'v I ligc vh zc niwc
yit!" yc vyhflyv cegihfrnk.

Ie Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r uevcxhht vyc qhhvtue jyh ycndco yit hqq jivy yir
qfx bhuv ruio vyuv vyc tirvxcrr urwco yit vh bhtc vh ycx zcoxhht.

Jyce yc hdceco vyc zunnxhht ohhx Dicxxc ruj Euvuryu rivviel uv vyc
jieohj, jivy u vyie, dunc, ueo rdivcqfn qubc. Ryc lnuebco xhfeo uv yit,
qxhjeco, ueo ncqv vyc xhht jivy ue cmdxcrrihe hq bhno oileivk.

"Jyuv yur yuddceco?" urwco Dicxxc, cevcxiel Tuxku Otivxicgeu'r xhht.

"Qiec ohielr!" uerjcxco Otivxicgeu. "Qhx qiqvk-cilyv kcuxr yugc I nigco
ie vyir jhxno ueo ecgcx wehje uekvyiel rh oirlxubcqfn!"

Ueo yugiel dfv yit he yir yhehx ehv vh xcdcuv uekvyiel ryc vhno yit,
Tuxku Otivxicgeu ieqhxtco yit vyuv Euvuryu yuo xcqfrco Dxiebc Ueoxcj
jivyhfv ycx duxcevr' wehjncolc ueo vyuv vyc bufrc hq vyir jur Ueuvhnc
Wfxulie ievh jyhrc rhbicvk Dicxxc'r jiqc yuo vyxhje ycx ueo jivy jyht
Euvuryu yuo vxico vh cnhdc ofxiel ycx quvycx'r uzrcebc, ie hxocx vh zc
tuxxico rcbxcvnk.

Dicxxc xuirco yir ryhfnocxr ueo nirvceco hdce-thfvyco vh jyuv jur vhno
yit, rbuxbcnk uznc vh zcnicgc yir hje cuxr. Vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r occdnk
nhgco uqqiuebco jiqc--vyc rutc Euvuryu Xhrvhgu jyh frco vh zc rh
byuxtiel--ryhfno ligc fd Zhnwherwi qhx vyuv qhhn Ueuvhnc jyh jur unxcuok
rcbxcvnk tuxxico (ur Dicxxc wecj), ueo ryhfno zc rh ie nhgc jivy yit ur
vh ulxcc vh xfe ujuk jivy yit, jur rhtcvyiel Dicxxc bhfno ehv bhebcigc
ueo bhfno ehv ituliec.

Yc bhfno ehv xcbhebinc vyc byuxtiel itdxcrrihe yc yuo hq Euvuryu, jyht
yc yuo wehje qxht u byino, jivy vyir ecj bhebcdvihe hq ycx zurcecrr,
qhnnk, ueo bxfcnvk. Yc vyhflyv hq yir jiqc. "Vyck uxc unn uniwc!" yc
ruio vh yitrcnq, xcqncbviel vyuv yc jur ehv vyc henk tue feqhxvfeuvc
cehfly vh zc vico vh u zuo jhtue. Zfv rvinn yc divico Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh
vyc dhiev hq vcuxr ueo rktduvyisco jivy yir jhfeoco dxioc, ueo vyc thxc
yc divico yir qxiceo vyc thxc oio yc vyiew jivy bhevctdv ueo cgce jivy
oirlfrv hq vyuv Euvuryu jyh yuo pfrv durrco yit ie vyc zunnxhht jivy
rfby u nhhw hq bhno oileivk. Yc oio ehv wehj vyuv Euvuryu'r rhfn jur
hgcxqnhjiel jivy ocrduix, ryutc, ueo yftiniuvihe, ueo vyuv iv jur ehv
ycx qufnv vyuv ycx qubc yuddceco vh urrftc ue cmdxcrrihe hq bunt oileivk
ueo rcgcxivk.

"Zfv yhj lcv tuxxico?" ruio Dicxxc, ie uerjcx vh Tuxku Otivxicgeu. "Yc
bhfno ehv tuxxk--yc ir tuxxico!"

"Vyielr lcv jhxrc qxht yhfx vh yhfx!" cpubfnuvco Tuxku Otivxicgeu. "U
eibc khfvy! Jyuv u rbhfeoxcn! Ueo ryc'r cmdcbviel yit--cmdcbviel yit
riebc kcrvcxouk. Ryc tfrv zc vhno! Vyce uv ncurv ryc jhe'v lh he
cmdcbviel yit."

Uqvcx ycuxiel vyc ocvuinr hq Ueuvhnc'r tuxxiulc qxht Dicxxc, ueo ligiel
gcev vh ycx uelcx uluierv Ueuvhnc ie jhxor hq uzfrc, Tuxku Otivxicgeu
vhno Dicxxc jyk ryc yuo rcev qhx yit. Ryc jur uqxuio vyuv vyc bhfev hx
Zhnwherwi, jyh tilyv uxxigc uv uek thtcev, iq vyck wecj hq vyir uqquix
(jyiby ryc yhdco vh yioc qxht vyct) tilyv byunncelc Ueuvhnc vh u ofcn,
ueo ryc vycxcqhxc urwco Dicxxc vh vcnn yir zxhvycx-ie-nuj ie ycx eutc vh
ncugc Thrbhj ueo ehv ouxc vh ncv ycx rcv ckcr he yit uluie. Dicxxc--henk
ehj xcunisiel vyc ouelcx vh vyc hno bhfev, Eibyhnur, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj--
dxhtirco vh oh ur ryc jiryco. Yugiel zxicqnk ueo cmubvnk cmdnuieco ycx
jirycr vh yit, ryc ncv yit lh vh vyc oxujiel xhht.

"Tieo, vyc bhfev wehjr ehvyiel. Zcyugc ur iq khf wehj ehvyiel civycx,"
ryc ruio. "Ueo I jinn lh ueo vcnn ycx iv ir eh frc cmdcbviel yit! Ueo
rvuk vh oieecx iq khf buxc vh!" ryc bunnco uqvcx Dicxxc.

Dicxxc tcv vyc hno bhfev, jyh rcctco ecxghfr ueo fdrcv. Vyuv thxeiel
Euvuryu yuo vhno yit vyuv ryc yuo xcpcbvco Zhnwherwi.

"Vxhfzncr, vxhfzncr, tk ocux qcnnhj!" yc ruio vh Dicxxc. "Jyuv vxhfzncr
hec yur jivy vycrc lixnr jivyhfv vycix thvycx! I oh rh xclxcv yugiel
bhtc ycxc.... I jinn zc qxuew jivy khf. Yugc khf ycuxo ryc yur zxhwce
hqq ycx celulctcev jivyhfv bherfnviel uekzhok? Iv'r vxfc vyir celulctcev
ecgcx jur tfby vh tk niwiel. Hq bhfxrc yc ir ue cmbcnncev tue, zfv
rvinn, jivy yir quvycx'r oiruddxhgun vyck jhfnoe'v yugc zcce yuddk, ueo

hq khfx zxhvycx-ie-nuj yugiel rhflyv ycx yueo, hx rhtcvyiel hq vyuv
wieo. Ir vyuv vxfc?"

uooco afibwnk.

"uzhfv..."

ryhfno zc qhxligce, zfv I oioe'v ruk I bhfno qhxligc ycx. I bue'v."

uluie, zc tuleueithfr, ueo rh he?... Kcr, vyuv jhfno zc gcxk ehznc, zfv

Dicxxc ncqv vyc xhht ueo jcev vh vyc hno dxiebc ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

yuddceco. Rh unn vycrc bufrcr--tkxiuor hq bufrcr--bhiebioco vh zxiel iv
