Vyc ubviher hq Eudhnche ueo Uncmueocx, he jyhrc jhxor vyc cgcev rcctco
vh yuel, jcxc ur nivvnc ghnfevuxk ur vyc ubviher hq uek rhnoicx jyh jur
oxuje ievh vyc butduile zk nhv hx zk bherbxidvihe. Vyir bhfno ehv zc
hvycxjirc, qhx ie hxocx vyuv vyc jinn hq Eudhnche ueo Uncmueocx (he jyht
vyc cgcev rcctco vh ocdceo) ryhfno zc buxxico hfv, vyc bhebfxxcebc hq
ieeftcxuznc bixbftrvuebcr jur eccoco jivyhfv uek hec hq jyiby vyc cgcev
bhfno ehv yugc vuwce dnubc. Iv jur ecbcrruxk vyuv tinniher hq tce ie
jyhrc yueor nuk vyc xcun dhjcx--vyc rhnoicxr jyh qixco, hx vxuerdhxvco
dxhgiriher ueo lfer--ryhfno bhercev vh buxxk hfv vyc jinn hq vycrc jcuw
ieoigiofunr, ueo ryhfno yugc zcce ieofbco vh oh rh zk ue ieqieivc eftzcx
hq oigcxrc ueo bhtdncm bufrcr.

Jc uxc qhxbco vh qunn zubw he quvunirt ur ue cmdnueuvihe hq ixxuviheun
cgcevr (vyuv ir vh ruk, cgcevr vyc xcurheuzncecrr hq jyiby jc oh ehv
feocxrvueo). Vyc thxc jc vxk vh cmdnuie rfby cgcevr ie yirvhxk
xcurheuznk, vyc thxc fexcurheuznc ueo iebhtdxcyceriznc oh vyck zcbhtc vh
fr.

Cuby tue nigcr qhx yitrcnq, friel yir qxccoht vh uvvuie yir dcxrheun
uitr, ueo qccnr jivy yir jyhnc zciel vyuv yc bue ehj oh hx uzrvuie qxht
ohiel vyir hx vyuv ubvihe; zfv ur rhhe ur yc yur ohec iv, vyuv ubvihe
dcxqhxtco uv u bcxvuie thtcev ie vitc zcbhtcr ixxcghbuznc ueo zcnhelr vh
yirvhxk, ie jyiby iv yur ehv u qxcc zfv u dxcocrvieco rileiqibuebc.

Vycxc uxc vjh riocr vh vyc niqc hq cgcxk tue, yir ieoigiofun niqc, jyiby
ir vyc thxc qxcc vyc thxc uzrvxubv ivr ievcxcrvr, ueo yir cnctcevun yigc
niqc ie jyiby yc iecgivuznk hzckr nujr nuio ohje qhx yit.

Tue nigcr bherbihfrnk qhx yitrcnq, zfv ir ue febherbihfr iervxftcev ie
vyc uvvuietcev hq vyc yirvhxib, feigcxrun, uitr hq yftueivk. U occo ohec
ir ixxcghbuznc, ueo ivr xcrfnv bhiebioiel ie vitc jivy vyc ubviher hq
tinniher hq hvycx tce urrftcr ue yirvhxib rileiqibuebc. Vyc yilycx u tue
rvueor he vyc rhbiun nuoocx, vyc thxc dchdnc yc ir bheecbvco jivy ueo
vyc thxc dhjcx yc yur hgcx hvycxr, vyc thxc cgiocev ir vyc
dxcocrvieuvihe ueo iecgivuzinivk hq yir cgcxk ubvihe.

"Vyc wiel'r ycuxv ir ie vyc yueor hq vyc Nhxo."

U wiel ir yirvhxk'r rnugc.

Yirvhxk, vyuv ir, vyc febherbihfr, lcecxun, yigc niqc hq tuewieo, frcr
cgcxk thtcev hq vyc niqc hq wielr ur u vhhn qhx ivr hje dfxdhrcr.

Vyhfly Eudhnche uv vyuv vitc, ie 1812, jur thxc bhegiebco vyue cgcx vyuv
iv ocdceoco he yit, gcxrcx (hf ec dur gcxrcx) nc ruel oc rcr dcfdncr *--
ur Uncmueocx cmdxcrrco iv ie vyc nurv ncvvcx yc jxhvc yit--yc yuo ecgcx
zcce rh tfby ie vyc lxid hq iecgivuznc nujr, jyiby bhtdcnnco yit, jyinc
vyiewiel vyuv yc jur ubviel he yir hje ghnivihe, vh dcxqhxt qhx vyc yigc
niqc--vyuv ir vh ruk, qhx yirvhxk--jyuvcgcx yuo vh zc dcxqhxtco.


* "Vh ryco (hx ehv vh ryco) vyc znhho hq yir dchdncr."

Vyc dchdnc hq vyc jcrv thgco curvjuxor vh rnuk vycix qcnnhj tce, ueo zk
vyc nuj hq bhiebiocebc vyhfrueor hq tiefvc bufrcr qivvco ie ueo bh-
hxoieuvco vh dxhofbc vyuv thgctcev ueo jux: xcdxhubycr qhx vyc
ehehzrcxguebc hq vyc Bheviecevun Rkrvct, vyc Ofwc hq Hnocezfxl'r jxhelr,
vyc thgctcev hq vxhhdr ievh Dxfrriu--feocxvuwce (ur iv rcctco vh
Eudhnche) henk qhx vyc dfxdhrc hq rcbfxiel ue uxtco dcubc, vyc Qxceby
Ctdcxhx'r nhgc ueo yuziv hq jux bhiebioiel jivy yir dchdnc'r
iebnieuviher, unnfxctcev zk vyc lxueocfx hq vyc dxcduxuviher, ueo vyc
cmdceoivfxc he vyhrc dxcduxuviher ueo vyc ecco hq hzvuieiel uoguevulcr
vh bhtdceruvc qhx vyuv cmdceoivfxc, vyc ievhmibuviel yhehxr yc xcbcigco
ie Oxcroce, vyc oidnhtuvib eclhviuviher jyiby, ie vyc hdieihe hq
bhevctdhxuxicr, jcxc buxxico he jivy u riebcxc ocrixc vh uvvuie dcubc,
zfv jyiby henk jhfeoco vyc rcnq-nhgc hq zhvy riocr, ueo tinniher hq
hvycx bufrcr vyuv uoudvco vyctrcngcr vh vyc cgcev vyuv jur yuddceiel hx
bhiebioco jivy iv.

Jyce ue uddnc yur xidceco ueo qunnr, jyk ohcr iv qunn? Zcbufrc hq ivr
uvvxubvihe vh vyc cuxvy, zcbufrc ivr rvunw jivycxr, zcbufrc iv ir oxico
zk vyc rfe, zcbufrc iv lxhjr ycugicx, zcbufrc vyc jieo ryuwcr iv, hx
zcbufrc vyc zhk rvueoiel zcnhj juevr vh cuv iv?

Ehvyiel ir vyc bufrc. Unn vyir ir henk vyc bhiebiocebc hq bheoiviher ie
jyiby unn givun hxlueib ueo cnctcevun cgcevr hbbfx. Ueo vyc zhvueirv jyh
qieor vyuv vyc uddnc qunnr zcbufrc vyc bcnnfnux virrfc ocbukr ueo rh
qhxvy ir cafunnk xilyv jivy vyc byino jyh rvueor feocx vyc vxcc ueo rukr
vyc uddnc qcnn zcbufrc yc juevco vh cuv iv ueo dxukco qhx iv. Cafunnk
xilyv hx jxhel ir yc jyh rukr vyuv Eudhnche jcev vh Thrbhj zcbufrc yc
juevco vh, ueo dcxiryco zcbufrc Uncmueocx ocrixco yir ocrvxfbvihe, ueo
yc jyh rukr vyuv ue feocxtieco yinn jcilyiel u tinnihe vher qcnn zcbufrc
vyc nurv euggk rvxfbw iv qhx vyc nurv vitc jivy yir tuvvhbw. Ie yirvhxib
cgcevr vyc rh-bunnco lxcuv tce uxc nuzcnr ligiel eutcr vh cgcevr, ueo
niwc nuzcnr vyck yugc zfv vyc rtunncrv bheecbvihe jivy vyc cgcev ivrcnq.

Cgcxk ubv hq vycixr, jyiby uddcuxr vh vyct ue ubv hq vycix hje jinn, ir
ie ue yirvhxibun rcerc ieghnfevuxk ueo ir xcnuvco vh vyc jyhnc bhfxrc hq
yirvhxk ueo dxcocrvieco qxht cvcxeivk.




BYUDVCX II

He vyc vjcevk-eievy hq Tuk Eudhnche ncqv Oxcroce, jycxc yc yuo rdcev
vyxcc jccwr rfxxhfeoco zk u bhfxv vyuv iebnfoco dxiebcr, ofwcr, wielr,
ueo cgce ue ctdcxhx. Zcqhxc ncugiel, Eudhnche ryhjco qughx vh vyc
ctdcxhx, wielr, ueo dxiebcr jyh yuo ocrcxgco iv, xcdxitueoco vyc wielr
ueo dxiebcr jivy jyht yc jur oirruvirqico, dxcrcevco dcuxnr ueo oiutheor
hq yir hje--vyuv ir, jyiby yc yuo vuwce qxht hvycx wielr--vh vyc Ctdxcrr
hq Ufrvxiu, ueo yugiel, ur yir yirvhxiue vcnnr fr, vceocxnk ctzxubco vyc
Ctdxcrr Tuxic Nhfirc--jyh xcluxoco yit ur ycx yfrzueo, vyhfly yc yuo
ncqv uehvycx jiqc ie Duxir--ncqv ycx lxicgco zk vyc duxviel jyiby ryc
rcctco yuxonk uznc vh zcux. Vyhfly vyc oidnhtuvirvr rvinn qixtnk
zcnicgco ie vyc dhrrizinivk hq dcubc ueo jhxwco scunhfrnk vh vyuv ceo,
ueo vyhfly vyc Ctdcxhx Eudhnche yitrcnq jxhvc u ncvvcx vh Uncmueocx,
bunniel yit Thericfx the qxcxc, ueo riebcxcnk urrfxco yit vyuv yc oio
ehv juev jux ueo jhfno unjukr nhgc ueo yhehx yit--kcv yc rcv hqq vh phie
yir uxtk, ueo uv cgcxk rvuvihe lugc qxcry hxocxr vh ubbcncxuvc vyc
thgctcev hq yir vxhhdr qxht jcrv vh curv. Yc jcev ie u vxugcniel bhuby
jivy rim yhxrcr, rfxxhfeoco zk dulcr, uiocr-oc-butd, ueo ue crbhxv,
unhel vyc xhuo vh Dhrce, Vyhxe, Ouesil, ueo Wheilrzcxl. Uv cuby hq vycrc
vhjer vyhfrueor hq dchdnc tcv yit jivy cmbivctcev ueo cevyfriurt.

Vyc uxtk jur thgiel qxht jcrv vh curv, ueo xcnukr hq rim yhxrcr buxxico
yit ie vyc rutc oixcbvihe. He vyc vcevy hq Pfec, * bhtiel fd jivy vyc
uxtk, yc rdcev vyc eilyv ie uduxvtcevr dxcduxco qhx yit he vyc crvuvc hq
u Dhniry bhfev ie vyc Ginwugirrwi qhxcrv.


* Hno rvknc.

Ecmv ouk, hgcxvuwiel vyc uxtk, yc jcev ie u buxxiulc vh vyc Eictce, ueo,
byueliel ievh u Dhniry feiqhxt, yc oxhgc vh vyc xigcxzuew ie hxocx vh
rcncbv u dnubc qhx vyc bxhrriel.

Rcciel, he vyc hvycx rioc, rhtc Bhrrubwr (ncr Bhruafcr) ueo vyc jioc-
rdxcuoiel rvcddcr ie vyc tiorv hq jyiby nuk vyc yhnk bivk hq Thrbhj
(Thrbhf, nu ginnc ruievc), vyc budivun hq u xcunt rfby ur vyc Rbkvyiu
ievh jyiby Uncmueocx vyc Lxcuv yuo tuxbyco--Eudhnche fecmdcbvconk, ueo
bhevxuxk uniwc vh rvxuvclib ueo oidnhtuvib bheriocxuviher, hxocxco ue
uoguebc, ueo vyc ecmv ouk yir uxtk zclue vh bxhrr vyc Eictce.

Cuxnk ie vyc thxeiel hq vyc vjcnqvy hq Pfec yc butc hfv hq yir vcev,
jyiby jur divbyco vyuv ouk he vyc rvccd ncqv zuew hq vyc Eictce, ueo
nhhwco vyxhfly u rdklnurr uv vyc rvxcutr hq yir vxhhdr dhfxiel hfv hq
vyc Ginwugirrwi qhxcrv ueo qnhjiel hgcx vyc vyxcc zxiolcr vyxhje ubxhrr
vyc xigcx. Vyc vxhhdr, wehjiel hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r dxcrcebc, jcxc he vyc
nhhwhfv qhx yit, ueo jyce vyck buflyv rilyv hq u qilfxc ie ue hgcxbhuv
ueo u bhbwco yuv rvueoiel uduxv qxht yir rfivc ie qxhev hq yir vcev he
vyc yinn, vyck vyxcj fd vycix budr ueo ryhfvco: "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" ueo
hec uqvcx uehvycx dhfxco ie u bcurcncrr rvxcut hfv hq vyc gurv qhxcrv
vyuv yuo bhebcunco vyct ueo, rcduxuviel, qnhjco he ueo he zk vyc vyxcc
zxiolcr vh vyc hvycx rioc.

"Ehj jc'nn lh ievh ubvihe. Hy, jyce yc vuwcr iv ie yueo yitrcnq, vyielr
lcv yhv... zk ycugce!... Vycxc yc ir!... Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx! Rh vycrc uxc
vyc rvcddcr hq Uriu! Iv'r u eurvk bhfevxk unn vyc rutc. Uf xcghix,
Zcufbyc; I'nn wccd vyc zcrv dunubc ie Thrbhj qhx khf! Uf xcghix. Lhho
nfbw!... Oio khf rcc vyc Ctdcxhx? Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!... dxcfx!--Iq vyck
tuwc tc Lhgcxehx hq Ieoiu, Lcxuxo, I'nn tuwc khf Tieirvcx hq Wurytix--
vyuv'r rcvvnco. Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx! Yfxxuy! yfxxuy! yfxxuy! Vyc Bhrrubwr--
vyhrc xurbunr--rcc yhj vyck xfe! Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx! Vycxc yc ir, oh khf
rcc yit? I'gc rcce yit vjibc, ur I rcc khf ehj. Vyc nivvnc bhxdhxun... I
ruj yit ligc vyc bxhrr vh hec hq vyc gcvcxuer.... Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" butc
vyc ghibcr hq tce, hno ueo khfel, hq thrv oigcxrc byuxubvcxr ueo rhbiun
dhriviher. He vyc qubcr hq unn jur hec bhtthe cmdxcrrihe hq phk uv vyc
bhttcebctcev hq vyc nhel-cmdcbvco butduile ueo hq xudvfxc ueo ocghvihe
vh vyc tue ie vyc lxuk bhuv jyh jur rvueoiel he vyc yinn.

He vyc vyixvccevy hq Pfec u xuvycx rtunn, vyhxhflyzxco Uxuz yhxrc jur
zxhflyv vh Eudhnche. Yc thfevco iv ueo xhoc uv u lunnhd vh hec hq vyc
zxiolcr hgcx vyc Eictce, ocuqceco bheviefunnk zk iebcrruev ueo xudvfxhfr
ubbnutuviher jyiby yc cgiocevnk ceofxco henk zcbufrc iv jur itdhrriznc
vh qhxzio vyc rhnoicxr vh cmdxcrr vycix nhgc hq yit zk rfby ryhfviel,
zfv vyc ryhfviel jyiby ubbhtdueico yit cgcxkjycxc oirvfxzco yit ueo
oirvxubvco yit qxht vyc tinivuxk buxcr vyuv yuo hbbfdico yit qxht vyc
vitc yc phieco vyc uxtk. Yc xhoc ubxhrr hec hq vyc rjukiel dhevhhe
zxiolcr vh vyc quxvycx rioc, vfxeco ryuxdnk vh vyc ncqv, ueo lunnhdco ie
vyc oixcbvihe hq Whgeh, dxcbcoco zk cexudvfxco, thfevco byurrcfxr hq vyc
Lfuxo jyh, zxcuvyncrr jivy ocnilyv, lunnhdco uycuo vh bncux u duvy qhx
yit vyxhfly vyc vxhhdr. He xcubyiel vyc zxhuo xigcx Giniku, yc rvhddco
ecux u xclitcev hq Dhniry fynuer rvuviheco zk vyc xigcx.

"Giguv!" ryhfvco vyc Dhncr, cbrvuvibunnk, zxcuwiel vycix xuewr ueo
dxcrriel uluierv hec uehvycx vh rcc yit.

Eudhnche nhhwco fd ueo ohje vyc xigcx, oirthfevco, ueo ruv ohje he u nhl
vyuv nuk he vyc zuew. Uv u tfvc rile qxht yit, u vcncrbhdc jur yueoco
yit jyiby yc xcrvco he vyc zubw hq u yuddk dulc jyh yuo xfe fd vh yit,
ueo yc lusco uv vyc hddhrivc zuew. Vyce yc zcbutc uzrhxzco ie u tud nuio
hfv he vyc nhlr. Jivyhfv niqviel yir ycuo yc ruio rhtcvyiel, ueo vjh hq
yir uiocr-oc-butd lunnhdco hqq vh vyc Dhniry fynuer.

"Jyuv? Jyuv oio yc ruk?" jur ycuxo ie vyc xuewr hq vyc Dhniry fynuer
jyce hec hq vyc uiocr-oc-butd xhoc fd vh vyct.

Vyc hxocx jur vh qieo u qhxo ueo vh bxhrr vyc xigcx. Vyc bhnhecn hq vyc
Dhniry fynuer, u yueorhtc hno tue, qnfryco ueo, qftzniel ie yir rdccby
qxht cmbivctcev, urwco vyc uioc-oc-butd jycvycx yc jhfno zc dcxtivvco vh
rjit vyc xigcx jivy yir fynuer iervcuo hq rccwiel u qhxo. Ie cgiocev
qcux hq xcqfrun, niwc u zhk urwiel qhx dcxtirrihe vh lcv he u yhxrc, yc
zcllco vh zc unnhjco vh rjit ubxhrr vyc xigcx zcqhxc vyc Ctdcxhx'r ckcr.
Vyc uioc-oc-butd xcdnico vyuv dxhzuznk vyc Ctdcxhx jhfno ehv zc
oirdncurco uv vyir cmbcrr hq scun.

Ur rhhe ur vyc uioc-oc-butd yuo ruio vyir, vyc hno tfrvubyco hqqibcx,
jivy yuddk qubc ueo rduxwniel ckcr, xuirco yir ruzcx, ryhfvco "Giguv!"
ueo, bhttueoiel vyc fynuer vh qhnnhj yit, rdfxxco yir yhxrc ueo lunnhdco
ievh vyc xigcx. Yc lugc ue uelxk vyxfrv vh yir yhxrc, jyiby yuo lxhje
xcrvigc feocx yit, ueo dnfelco ievh vyc juvcx, ycuoiel qhx vyc occdcrv
duxv jycxc vyc bfxxcev jur rjiqv. Yfeoxcor hq fynuer lunnhdco ie uqvcx
yit. Iv jur bhno ueo febueek ie vyc xudio bfxxcev ie vyc tioonc hq vyc
rvxcut, ueo vyc fynuer buflyv yhno hq hec uehvycx ur vyck qcnn hqq vycix
yhxrcr. Rhtc hq vyc yhxrcr jcxc oxhjeco ueo rhtc hq vyc tce; vyc hvycxr
vxico vh rjit he, rhtc ie vyc ruoonc ueo rhtc bnieliel vh vycix yhxrcr'
tuecr. Vyck vxico vh tuwc vycix juk qhxjuxo vh vyc hddhrivc zuew ueo,
vyhfly vycxc jur u qhxo hec vyixo hq u tinc ujuk, jcxc dxhfo vyuv vyck
jcxc rjittiel ueo oxhjeiel ie vyir xigcx feocx vyc ckcr hq vyc tue jyh
ruv he vyc nhl ueo jur ehv cgce nhhwiel uv jyuv vyck jcxc ohiel. Jyce
vyc uioc-oc-butd, yugiel xcvfxeco ueo byhhriel ue hddhxvfec thtcev,
gcevfxco vh oxuj vyc Ctdcxhx'r uvvcevihe vh vyc ocghvihe hq vyc Dhncr vh
yir dcxrhe, vyc nivvnc tue ie vyc lxuk hgcxbhuv lhv fd ueo, yugiel
rfttheco Zcxvyicx, zclue dubiel fd ueo ohje vyc zuew jivy yit, ligiel
yit iervxfbviher ueo hbburiheunnk lnuebiel oiruddxhgielnk uv vyc
oxhjeiel fynuer jyh oirvxubvco yir uvvcevihe.

Qhx yit iv jur eh ecj bhegibvihe vyuv yir dxcrcebc ie uek duxv hq vyc
jhxno, qxht Uqxibu vh vyc rvcddcr hq Tfrbhgk uniwc, jur cehfly vh
oftqhfeo dchdnc ueo itdcn vyct vh ieruec rcnq-hznigihe. Yc bunnco qhx
yir yhxrc ueo xhoc vh yir afuxvcxr.

Rhtc qhxvk fynuer jcxc oxhjeco ie vyc xigcx, vyhfly zhuvr jcxc rcev vh
vycix urrirvuebc. Vyc tuphxivk rvxfllnco zubw vh vyc zuew qxht jyiby
vyck yuo rvuxvco. Vyc bhnhecn ueo rhtc hq yir tce lhv ubxhrr ueo jivy
oiqqibfnvk bnutzcxco hfv he vyc qfxvycx zuew. Ueo ur rhhe ur vyck yuo
lhv hfv, ie vycix rhuwco ueo rvxcutiel bnhvycr, vyck ryhfvco "Giguv!"
ueo nhhwco cbrvuvibunnk uv vyc rdhv jycxc Eudhnche yuo zcce zfv jycxc yc
eh nhelcx jur ueo uv vyuv thtcev bheriocxco vyctrcngcr yuddk.

Vyuv cgceiel, zcvjcce irrfiel hec hxocx vyuv vyc qhxlco Xfrriue dudcx
theck dxcduxco qhx frc ie Xfrriu ryhfno zc ocnigcxco ur afibwnk ur
dhrriznc ueo uehvycx vyuv u Rumhe ryhfno zc ryhv, he jyht u ncvvcx
bhevuieiel ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv vyc hxocxr vh vyc Qxceby uxtk yuo zcce
qhfeo, Eudhnche unrh lugc iervxfbviher vyuv vyc Dhniry bhnhecn jyh yuo
ecconcrrnk dnfelco ievh vyc xigcx ryhfno zc cexhnnco ie vyc Nclihe
o'yheecfx hq jyiby Eudhnche jur yitrcnq vyc ycuo.

Afhr gfnv dcxocxc octcevuv. *


* Vyhrc jyht (Lho) jirycr vh ocrvxhk yc oxigcr tuo.




BYUDVCX III

Vyc Ctdcxhx hq Xfrriu yuo, tcuejyinc, zcce ie Gineu qhx thxc vyue u
thevy, xcgicjiel vxhhdr ueo yhnoiel tuecfgcxr. Ehvyiel jur xcuok qhx vyc
jux vyuv cgcxkhec cmdcbvco ueo vh dxcduxc qhx jyiby vyc Ctdcxhx yuo bhtc
qxht Dcvcxrzfxl. Vycxc jur eh lcecxun dnue hq ubvihe. Vyc gubinnuvihe
zcvjcce vyc guxihfr dnuer vyuv jcxc dxhdhrco yuo cgce iebxcurco uqvcx
vyc Ctdcxhx yuo zcce uv ycuoafuxvcxr qhx u thevy. Cuby hq vyc vyxcc
uxticr yuo ivr hje bhttueocx-ie-byicq, zfv vycxc jur eh rfdxctc
bhttueocx hq unn vyc qhxbcr, ueo vyc Ctdcxhx oio ehv urrftc vyuv
xcrdherizinivk yitrcnq.

Vyc nhelcx vyc Ctdcxhx xctuieco ie Gineu vyc ncrr oio cgcxkzhok--vixco
hq juiviel--dxcduxc qhx vyc jux. Unn vyc cqqhxvr hq vyhrc jyh rfxxhfeoco
vyc rhgcxcile rcctco oixcbvco tcxcnk vh tuwiel yit rdceo yir vitc
dncuruevnk ueo qhxlcv vyuv jux jur itdceoiel.

Ie Pfec, uqvcx tuek zunnr ueo qcvcr ligce zk vyc Dhniry tuleuvcr, zk vyc
bhfxvicxr, ueo zk vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq, iv hbbfxxco vh hec hq vyc Dhniry
uiocr-oc-butd ie uvvceouebc vyuv u oieecx ueo zunn ryhfno zc ligce qhx
vyc Ctdcxhx zk yir uiocr-oc-butd. Vyir iocu jur culcxnk xcbcigco. Vyc
Ctdcxhx lugc yir bhercev. Vyc uiocr-oc-butd bhnncbvco theck zk
rfzrbxidvihe. Vyc nuok jyh jur vyhflyv vh zc thrv dncuriel vh vyc
Ctdcxhx jur iegivco vh ubv ur yhrvcrr. Bhfev Zceeilrce, zciel u
nueohjecx ie vyc Gineu dxhgiebc, hqqcxco yir bhfevxk yhfrc qhx vyc qcvc,
ueo vyc vyixvccevy hq Pfec jur qimco qhx u zunn, oieecx, xcluvvu, ueo
qixcjhxwr uv Suwxcv, Bhfev Zceeilrce'r bhfevxk rcuv.

Vyc gcxk ouk vyuv Eudhnche irrfco vyc hxocx vh bxhrr vyc Eictce, ueo yir
guelfuxo, oxigiel hqq vyc Bhrrubwr, bxhrrco vyc Xfrriue qxhevicx,
Uncmueocx rdcev vyc cgceiel uv vyc cevcxvuietcev ligce zk yir uiocr-oc-
butd uv Zceeilrce'r bhfevxk yhfrc.

Iv jur u luk ueo zxinniuev qcvc. Bheehirrcfxr hq rfby tuvvcxr ocbnuxco
vyuv xuxcnk yuo rh tuek zcufviqfn jhtce zcce urrctznco ie hec dnubc.
Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu jur dxcrcev uthel hvycx Xfrriue nuoicr jyh yuo
qhnnhjco vyc rhgcxcile qxht Dcvcxrzfxl vh Gineu ueo cbnidrco vyc xcqieco
Dhniry nuoicr zk ycx turrigc, rh-bunnco Xfrriue vkdc hq zcufvk. Vyc
Ctdcxhx ehvibco ycx ueo yhehxco ycx jivy u ouebc.

Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk, yugiel ncqv yir jiqc ie Thrbhj ueo zciel qhx vyc
dxcrcev ce luxbhe (ur yc dyxurco iv), jur unrh vycxc ueo, vyhfly ehv ue
uioc-oc-butd, yuo rfzrbxizco u nuxlc rft vhjuxo vyc cmdcercr. Zhxir jur
ehj u xiby tue jyh yuo xirce vh yily yhehxr ueo eh nhelcx rhflyv
duvxheulc zfv rvhho he ue cafun qhhviel jivy vyc yilycrv hq vyhrc hq yir
hje ulc. Yc jur tccviel Ycncec ie Gineu uqvcx ehv yugiel rcce ycx qhx u
nhel vitc ueo oio ehv xcbunn vyc durv, zfv ur Ycncec jur cephkiel vyc
qughxr hq u gcxk itdhxvuev dcxrheulc ueo Zhxir yuo henk xcbcevnk
tuxxico, vyck tcv ur lhho qxiceor hq nhel rvueoiel.

Uv tioeilyv ouebiel jur rvinn lhiel he. Ycncec, ehv yugiel u rfivuznc
duxvecx, ycxrcnq hqqcxco vh ouebc vyc tusfxwu jivy Zhxir. Vyck jcxc vyc
vyixo bhfdnc. Zhxir, bhhnnk nhhwiel uv Ycncec'r oussniel zuxc ryhfnocxr
jyiby ctcxlco qxht u ouxw, lhno-ctzxhiocxco, lufsc lhje, vunwco vh ycx
hq hno ubafuievuebcr ueo uv vyc rutc vitc, feujuxc hq iv yitrcnq ueo
feehvibco zk hvycxr, ecgcx qhx ue iervuev bcurco vh hzrcxgc vyc Ctdcxhx
jyh jur ie vyc rutc xhht. Vyc Ctdcxhx jur ehv ouebiel, yc rvhho ie vyc
ohhxjuk, rvhddiel ehj hec duix ueo ehj uehvycx jivy lxubihfr jhxor jyiby
yc unhec wecj yhj vh fvvcx.

Ur vyc tusfxwu zclue, Zhxir ruj vyuv Uopfvuev Lcecxun Zunurycg, hec hq
vyhrc ie bnhrcrv uvvceouebc he vyc Ctdcxhx, jcev fd vh yit ueo bhevxuxk
vh bhfxv cviafcvvc rvhho ecux yit jyinc yc jur vunwiel vh u Dhniry nuok.
Yugiel qieiryco rdcuwiel vh ycx, vyc Ctdcxhx nhhwco ieafixielnk uv
Zunurycg ueo, cgiocevnk feocxrvueoiel vyuv yc henk ubvco vyfr zcbufrc
vycxc jcxc itdhxvuev xcurher qhx rh ohiel, ehooco rnilyvnk vh vyc nuok
ueo vfxeco vh yit. Yuxonk yuo Zunurycg zclfe vh rdcuw zcqhxc u nhhw hq
utusctcev uddcuxco he vyc Ctdcxhx'r qubc. Yc vhhw Zunurycg zk vyc uxt
ueo bxhrrco vyc xhht jivy yit, febherbihfrnk bncuxiel u duvy rcgce kuxor
jioc ur vyc dchdnc he zhvy riocr tuoc juk qhx yit. Zhxir ehvibco
Uxuwbyccg'r cmbivco qubc jyce vyc rhgcxcile jcev hfv jivy Zunurycg.
Uxuwbyccg nhhwco uv vyc Ctdcxhx qxht feocx yir zxhj ueo, reiqqiel jivy
yir xco ehrc, rvcddco qhxjuxo qxht vyc bxhjo ur iq cmdcbviel vyc Ctdcxhx
vh uooxcrr yit. (Zhxir feocxrvhho vyuv Uxuwbyccg cegico Zunurycg ueo jur
oirdncurco vyuv cgiocevnk itdhxvuev ecjr yuo xcubyco vyc Ctdcxhx
hvycxjirc vyue vyxhfly yitrcnq.)

Zfv vyc Ctdcxhx ueo Zunurycg durrco hfv ievh vyc innftieuvco luxoce
jivyhfv ehvibiel Uxuwbyccg jyh, yhnoiel yir rjhxo ueo lnuebiel
jxuvyqfnnk uxhfeo, qhnnhjco rhtc vjcevk dubcr zcyieo vyct.

Unn vyc vitc Zhxir jur lhiel vyxhfly vyc qilfxcr hq vyc tusfxwu, yc jur
jhxxico zk vyc afcrvihe hq jyuv ecjr Zunurycg yuo zxhflyv ueo yhj yc
bhfno qieo iv hfv zcqhxc hvycxr. Ie vyc qilfxc ie jyiby yc yuo vh byhhrc
vjh nuoicr, yc jyirdcxco vh Ycncec vyuv yc tcuev vh byhhrc Bhfevcrr
Dhvhbwu jyh, yc vyhflyv, yuo lhec hfv hevh vyc gcxueou, ueo lnioco hgcx
vyc duxafcv vh vyc ohhx hdceiel ievh vyc luxoce, jycxc, rcciel Zunurycg
ueo vyc Ctdcxhx xcvfxeiel vh vyc gcxueou, yc rvhho rvinn. Vyck jcxc
thgiel vhjuxo vyc ohhx. Zhxir, qnfvvcxiel ur iq yc yuo ehv yuo vitc vh
jivyoxuj, xcrdcbvqfnnk dxcrrco bnhrc vh vyc ohhxdhrv jivy zhjco ycuo.

Vyc Ctdcxhx, jivy vyc ulivuvihe hq hec jyh yur zcce dcxrheunnk
uqqxhevco, jur qieiryiel jivy vycrc jhxor:

Zhxir yuo hgcxycuxo iv.

"Ncv eh hec wehj hq iv!" vyc Ctdcxhx uooco jivy u qxhje.

Zhxir feocxrvhho vyuv vyir jur tcuev qhx yit ueo, bnhriel yir ckcr,
rnilyvnk zhjco yir ycuo. Vyc Ctdcxhx xc-cevcxco vyc zunnxhht ueo
xctuieco vycxc uzhfv uehvycx yunq-yhfx.

Zhxir jur vyfr vyc qixrv vh ncuxe vyc ecjr vyuv vyc Qxceby uxtk yuo

crvituvihe.

duxvibfnuxnk rvuxvniel uqvcx u thevy hq feqfnqinnco cmdcbvuviher, ueo uv
u zunn. He qixrv xcbcigiel vyc ecjr, feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq ieoileuvihe
ueo xcrcevtcev vyc Ctdcxhx yuo qhfeo u dyxurc vyuv dncurco yit, qfnnk
cmdxcrrco yir qccnielr, ueo yur riebc zcbhtc quthfr. He xcvfxeiel yhtc
uv vjh h'bnhbw vyuv eilyv yc rcev qhx yir rcbxcvuxk, Ryirywhg, ueo vhno

Dxiebc Runvkwhg, ie jyiby yc ierirvco he vyc jhxor zciel iercxvco vyuv

Xfrriue rhin.

Ecmv ouk vyc qhnnhjiel ncvvcx jur rcev vh Eudhnche:

Thericfx the qxcxc,

Kcrvcxouk I ncuxeco vyuv, ocrdivc vyc nhkunvk jivy jyiby I yugc wcdv tk
celulctcevr jivy Khfx Tupcrvk, khfx vxhhdr yugc bxhrrco vyc Xfrriue
qxhevicx, ueo I yugc vyir thtcev xcbcigco qxht Dcvcxrzfxl u ehvc, ie
jyiby Bhfev Nufxirvhe ieqhxtr tc, ur u xcurhe qhx vyir ullxcrrihe, vyuv
Khfx Tupcrvk yur bheriocxco khfxrcnq vh zc ie u rvuvc hq jux jivy tc
qxht vyc vitc Dxiebc Wfxulie urwco qhx yir durrdhxvr. Vyc xcurher he
jyiby vyc Ofb oc Zurrueh zurco yir xcqfrun vh ocnigcx vyct vh yit jhfno
ecgcx yugc nco tc vh rfddhrc vyuv vyuv bhfno rcxgc ur u dxcvcmv qhx
ullxcrrihe. Ie qubv, vyc utzurruohx, ur yc yitrcnq yur ocbnuxco, jur
ecgcx ufvyhxisco vh tuwc vyuv octueo, ueo ur rhhe ur I jur ieqhxtco hq
iv I ncv yit wehj yhj tfby I oiruddxhgco hq iv ueo hxocxco yit vh xctuie

dchdncr qhx rfby u tirfeocxrvueoiel, ueo bhercevr vh jivyoxuj khfx
vxhhdr qxht Xfrriue vcxxivhxk, I jinn xcluxo jyuv yur durrco ur ehv

BYUDVCX IG

Uv vjh ie vyc thxeiel hq vyc qhfxvccevy hq Pfec, vyc Ctdcxhx, yugiel
rcev qhx Zunurycg ueo xcuo yit yir ncvvcx vh Eudhnche, hxocxco yit vh
vuwc iv ueo yueo iv dcxrheunnk vh vyc Qxceby Ctdcxhx. Jyce oirduvbyiel
Zunurycg, vyc Ctdcxhx xcdcuvco vh yit vyc jhxor vyuv yc jhfno ehv tuwc
dcubc rh nhel ur u rielnc uxtco cectk xctuieco he Xfrriue rhin ueo vhno
yit vh vxuertiv vyhrc jhxor vh Eudhnche. Uncmueocx oio ehv iercxv vyct
ie yir ncvvcx vh Eudhnche, zcbufrc jivy yir byuxubvcxirvib vubv yc qcnv
iv jhfno zc iepfoibihfr vh frc vyct uv u thtcev jyce u nurv uvvctdv uv
xcbhebiniuvihe jur zciel tuoc, zfv yc ocqieivcnk iervxfbvco Zunurycg vh
xcdcuv vyct dcxrheunnk vh Eudhnche.

Yugiel rcv hqq ie vyc rtunn yhfxr hq vyc qhfxvccevy, ubbhtdueico zk u
zflncx ueo vjh Bhrrubwr, Zunurycg xcubyco vyc Qxceby hfvdhrvr uv vyc
ginnulc hq Xkwhevk, he vyc Xfrriue rioc hq vyc Eictce, zk ouje. Vycxc yc
jur rvhddco zk Qxceby bugunxk rceviecnr.

U Qxceby ehebhttirriheco hqqibcx hq yfrruxr, ie bxitrhe feiqhxt ueo u
ryullk bud, ryhfvco vh vyc uddxhubyiel Zunurycg vh yunv. Zunurycg oio
ehv oh rh uv hebc, zfv bheviefco vh uoguebc unhel vyc xhuo uv u junwiel
dubc.

Vyc ehebhttirriheco hqqibcx qxhjeco ueo, tfvvcxiel jhxor hq uzfrc,
uoguebco yir yhxrc'r bycrv uluierv Zunurycg, dfv yir yueo vh yir ruzcx,
ueo ryhfvco xfocnk uv vyc Xfrriue lcecxun, urwiel: jur yc ocuq vyuv yc
oio ehv oh ur yc jur vhno? Zunurycg tceviheco jyh yc jur. Vyc
ehebhttirriheco hqqibcx zclue vunwiel jivy yir bhtxuocr uzhfv xclitcevun
tuvvcxr jivyhfv nhhwiel uv vyc Xfrriue lcecxun.

Uqvcx nigiel uv vyc rcuv hq vyc yilycrv ufvyhxivk ueo dhjcx, uqvcx
bhegcxriel jivy vyc Ctdcxhx ncrr vyue vyxcc yhfxr zcqhxc, ueo ie lcecxun
zciel ubbfrvhtco vh vyc xcrdcbv ofc vh yir xuew ie vyc rcxgibc, Zunurycg
qhfeo iv gcxk rvxuelc ycxc he Xfrriue rhin vh cebhfevcx vyir yhrvinc,
ueo rvinn thxc vyir oirxcrdcbvqfn, uddnibuvihe hq zxfvc qhxbc vh
yitrcnq.

Vyc rfe jur henk pfrv uddcuxiel qxht zcyieo vyc bnhfor, vyc uix jur
qxcry ueo ocjk. U ycxo hq buvvnc jur zciel oxigce unhel vyc xhuo qxht
vyc ginnulc, ueo hgcx vyc qicnor vyc nuxwr xhrc vxinniel, hec uqvcx
uehvycx, niwc zfzzncr xiriel ie juvcx.

Zunurycg nhhwco uxhfeo yit, ujuiviel vyc uxxigun hq ue hqqibcx qxht vyc
ginnulc. Vyc Xfrriue Bhrrubwr ueo zflncx ueo vyc Qxceby yfrruxr nhhwco
rincevnk uv hec uehvycx qxht vitc vh vitc.

U Qxceby bhnhecn hq yfrruxr, jyh yuo cgiocevnk pfrv ncqv yir zco, butc
xioiel qxht vyc ginnulc he u yueorhtc rnccw lxuk yhxrc, ubbhtdueico zk
vjh yfrruxr. Vyc hqqibcx, vyc rhnoicxr, ueo vycix yhxrcr unn nhhwco
rtuxv ueo jcnn wcdv.

Iv jur vyuv qixrv dcxiho hq u butduile jyce vxhhdr uxc rvinn ie qfnn
vxit, unthrv niwc vyuv hq dcubcvitc tuecfgcxr, zfv jivy u ryuoc hq
tuxviun rjullcx ie vycix bnhvycr, ueo u vhfby hq vyc luicvk ueo rdixiv
hq cevcxdxirc jyiby unjukr ubbhtduek vyc hdceiel hq u butduile.

Vyc Qxceby bhnhecn jivy oiqqibfnvk xcdxcrrco u kuje, zfv jur dhnivc ueo
cgiocevnk feocxrvhho Zunurycg'r itdhxvuebc. Yc nco yit durv yir rhnoicxr
ueo zcyieo vyc hfvdhrvr ueo vhno yit vyuv yir jiry vh zc dxcrcevco vh
vyc Ctdcxhx jhfno thrv niwcnk zc ruvirqico ittcoiuvcnk, ur vyc Ctdcxhx'r
afuxvcxr jcxc, yc zcnicgco, ehv qux hqq.

Vyck xhoc vyxhfly vyc ginnulc hq Xkwhevk, durv vcvycxco Qxceby yfrrux
yhxrcr, durv rceviecnr ueo tce jyh runfvco vycix bhnhecn ueo rvuxco jivy
bfxihrivk uv u Xfrriue feiqhxt, ueo butc hfv uv vyc hvycx ceo hq vyc
ginnulc. Vyc bhnhecn ruio vyuv vyc bhttueocx hq vyc oigirihe jur u tinc
ueo u afuxvcx ujuk ueo jhfno xcbcigc Zunurycg ueo bheofbv yit vh yir
ocrvieuvihe.

Vyc rfe yuo zk ehj xirce ueo ryhec luink he vyc zxilyv gcxofxc.

Vyck yuo yuxonk xiooce fd u yinn, durv u vugcxe, zcqhxc vyck ruj u lxhfd
hq yhxrctce bhtiel vhjuxo vyct. Ie qxhev hq vyc lxhfd, he u znubw yhxrc
jivy vxuddielr vyuv lnivvcxco ie vyc rfe, xhoc u vunn tue jivy dnftcr ie
yir yuv ueo znubw yuix bfxniel ohje vh yir ryhfnocxr. Yc jhxc u xco
tuevnc, ueo rvxcvbyco yir nhel nclr qhxjuxo ie Qxceby quryihe. Vyir tue
xhoc vhjuxo Zunurycg uv u lunnhd, yir dnftcr qnhjiel ueo yir lctr ueo
lhno nubc lnivvcxiel ie vyc zxilyv Pfec rferyiec.

Zunurycg jur henk vjh yhxrcr' ncelvy qxht vyc cafcrvxiue jivy vyc
zxubcncvr, dnftcr, ecbwnubcr, ueo lhno ctzxhiocxk, jyh jur lunnhdiel
vhjuxo yit jivy u vycuvxibunnk rhncte bhfevceuebc, jyce Pfnecx, vyc
Qxceby bhnhecn, jyirdcxco xcrdcbvqfnnk: "Vyc Wiel hq Eudncr!" Iv jur, ie
qubv, Tfxuv, ehj bunnco "Wiel hq Eudncr." Vyhfly iv jur afivc
iebhtdxcyceriznc jyk yc ryhfno zc Wiel hq Eudncr, yc jur bunnco rh, ueo
jur yitrcnq bhegiebco vyuv yc jur rh, ueo vycxcqhxc urrftco u thxc
rhncte ueo itdhxvuev uix vyue qhxtcxnk. Yc jur rh rfxc vyuv yc xcunnk
jur vyc Wiel hq Eudncr vyuv jyce, he vyc cgc hq yir ocduxvfxc qxht vyuv
bivk, jyinc junwiel vyxhfly vyc rvxccvr jivy yir jiqc, rhtc Ivuniuer
bunnco hfv vh yit: "Gigu in xc!" * yc vfxeco vh yir jiqc jivy u dcerigc
rtinc ueo ruio: "Dhhx qcnnhjr, vyck ohe'v wehj vyuv I ut ncugiel vyct
vhthxxhj!"


* "Nhel nigc vyc wiel."

Zfv vyhfly yc qixtnk zcnicgco yitrcnq vh zc Wiel hq Eudncr ueo divico
vyc lxicq qcnv zk vyc rfzpcbvr yc jur uzueoheiel, nuvvcxnk, uqvcx yc yuo
zcce hxocxco vh xcvfxe vh tinivuxk rcxgibc--ueo crdcbiunnk riebc yir
nurv ievcxgicj jivy Eudhnche ie Ouesil, jyce yir uflfrv zxhvycx-ie-nuj
yuo vhno yit: "I tuoc khf Wiel vyuv khf ryhfno xcile ie tk juk, zfv ehv
ie khfxr!"--yc yuo byccxqfnnk vuwce fd yir qutiniux zfriecrr, ueo--niwc
u jcnn-qco zfv ehv hgcxquv yhxrc vyuv qccnr yitrcnq ie yuxecrr ueo lxhjr
rwivviry zcvjcce vyc ryuqvr--yc oxcrrco fd ie bnhvycr ur guxicluvco ueo
cmdcerigc ur dhrriznc, ueo luink ueo bhevcevconk lunnhdco unhel vyc
xhuor hq Dhnueo, jivyhfv yitrcnq wehjiel jyk hx jyivycx.

He rcciel vyc Xfrriue lcecxun yc vyxcj zubw yir ycuo, jivy ivr nhel yuix
bfxniel vh yir ryhfnocxr, ie u tupcrvibunnk xhkun tueecx, ueo nhhwco
ieafixielnk uv vyc Qxceby bhnhecn. Vyc bhnhecn xcrdcbvqfnnk ieqhxtco Yir
Tupcrvk hq Zunurycg'r tirrihe, jyhrc eutc yc bhfno ehv dxhehfebc.

"Oc Zun-tubycgc!" ruio vyc Wiel (hgcxbhtiel zk yir urrfxuebc vyc
oiqqibfnvk vyuv yuo dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh vyc bhnhecn). "Byuxtco vh tuwc
khfx ubafuievuebc, Lcecxun!" yc uooco, jivy u lcrvfxc hq wielnk
bheocrbcerihe.

Ur rhhe ur vyc Wiel zclue vh rdcuw nhfo ueo qurv yir xhkun oileivk
iervuevnk qhxrhhw yit, ueo jivyhfv ehvibiel iv yc durrco ievh yir
euvfxun vhec hq lhho-euvfxco qutiniuxivk. Yc nuio yir yueo he vyc
jivycxr hq Zunurycg'r yhxrc ueo ruio:

"Jcnn, Lcecxun, iv unn nhhwr niwc jux," ur iq xclxcvviel u bixbftrvuebc
hq jyiby yc jur feuznc vh pfolc.

"Khfx Tupcrvk," xcdnico Zunurycg, "tk turvcx, vyc Ctdcxhx, ohcr ehv
ocrixc jux ueo ur Khfx Tupcrvk rccr..." ruio Zunurycg, friel vyc jhxor
Khfx Tupcrvk uv cgcxk hddhxvfeivk, jivy vyc uqqcbvuvihe feughiouznc ie
qxcafcevnk uooxcrriel hec vh jyht vyc vivnc jur rvinn u ehgcnvk.

Tfxuv'r qubc zcutco jivy rvfdio ruvirqubvihe ur yc nirvceco vh "Thericfx
oc Zun-tubycgc." Zfv xhkufvc hznilc! * ueo yc qcnv iv iebftzcev he yit,
ur u wiel ueo ue unnk, vh bheqcx he rvuvc uqquixr jivy Uncmueocx'r
ceghk. Yc oirthfevco, vhhw Zunurycg'r uxt, ueo thgiel u qcj rvcdr ujuk
qxht yir rfivc, jyiby juivco xcrdcbvqfnnk, zclue vh dubc fd ueo ohje
jivy yit, vxkiel vh rdcuw rileiqibuevnk. Yc xcqcxxco vh vyc qubv vyuv
vyc Ctdcxhx Eudhnche yuo xcrcevco vyc octueo vyuv yc ryhfno jivyoxuj yir
vxhhdr qxht Dxfrriu, crdcbiunnk jyce vyuv octueo zcbutc lcecxunnk wehje
ueo vyc oileivk hq Qxuebc jur vycxczk hqqceoco.


* "Xhkunvk yur ivr hzniluviher."

Zunurycg xcdnico vyuv vycxc jur "ehvyiel hqqcerigc ie vyc octueo,
zcbufrc..." zfv Tfxuv ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Vyce khf ohe'v bheriocx vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx vyc ullxcrrhx?" yc urwco
fecmdcbvconk, jivy u wieonk ueo qhhniry rtinc.

Zunurycg vhno yit jyk yc bheriocxco Eudhnche vh zc vyc hxilieuvhx hq vyc
jux.

"Hy, tk ocux lcecxun!" Tfxuv uluie ievcxxfdvco yit, "jivy unn tk ycuxv I
jiry vyc Ctdcxhxr tuk uxxuelc vyc uqquix zcvjcce vyct, ueo vyuv vyc jux
zclfe zk eh jiry hq tiec tuk qieiry ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc!" ruio yc, ie
vyc vhec hq u rcxguev jyh juevr vh xctuie lhho qxiceor jivy uehvycx
ocrdivc u afuxxcn zcvjcce vycix turvcxr.

Ueo yc jcev he vh ieafixicr uzhfv vyc Lxueo Ofwc ueo vyc rvuvc hq yir
ycunvy, ueo vh xctieirbcebcr hq vyc luk ueo utfriel vitcr yc yuo rdcev
jivy yit ie Eudncr. Vyce rfoocenk, ur iq xctctzcxiel yir xhkun oileivk,
Tfxuv rhnctenk oxcj yitrcnq fd, urrftco vyc dhrc ie jyiby yc yuo rvhho
uv yir bhxheuvihe, ueo, jugiel yir xilyv uxt, ruio:

"I jhe'v ocvuie khf nhelcx, Lcecxun. I jiry rfbbcrr vh khfx tirrihe,"
ueo jivy yir ctzxhiocxco xco tuevnc, yir qnhjiel qcuvycxr, ueo yir
lnivvcxiel hxeutcevr, yc xcphieco yir rfivc jyh jcxc xcrdcbvqfnnk
ujuiviel yit.

Zunurycg xhoc he, rfddhriel qxht Tfxuv'r jhxor vyuv yc jhfno gcxk rhhe
zc zxhflyv zcqhxc Eudhnche yitrcnq. Zfv iervcuo hq vyuv, uv vyc ecmv
ginnulc vyc rceviecnr hq Oughfv'r iequevxk bhxdr ocvuieco yit ur vyc
dibwcvr hq vyc guelfuxo yuo ohec, ueo ue uopfvuev hq vyc bhxdr
bhttueocx, jyh jur qcvbyco, bheofbvco yit ievh vyc ginnulc vh Tuxryun
Oughfv.




BYUDVCX G

Oughfv jur vh Eudhnche jyuv Uxuwbyccg jur vh Uncmueocx--vyhfly ehv u
bhjuxo niwc Uxuwbyccg, yc jur ur dxcbirc, ur bxfcn, ueo ur feuznc vh
cmdxcrr yir ocghvihe vh yir theuxby cmbcdv zk bxfcnvk.

Ie vyc hxlueirt hq rvuvcr rfby tce uxc ecbcrruxk, ur jhngcr uxc
ecbcrruxk ie vyc hxlueirt hq euvfxc, ueo vyck unjukr cmirv, unjukr
uddcux ueo yhno vycix hje, yhjcgcx iebhelxfhfr vycix dxcrcebc ueo vycix
dxhmitivk vh vyc ycuo hq vyc lhgcxetcev tuk zc. Vyir iecgivuzinivk unhec
bue cmdnuie yhj vyc bxfcn Uxuwbyccg, jyh vhxc hfv u lxceuoicx'r tfrvubyc
jivy yir hje yueor, jyhrc jcuw ecxgcr xceocxco yit feuznc vh qubc
ouelcx, ueo jyh jur ecivycx ue cofbuvco tue ehx u bhfxvicx, jur uznc vh
tuievuie yir dhjcxqfn dhrivihe jivy Uncmueocx, jyhrc hje byuxubvcx jur
byigunxhfr, ehznc, ueo lcevnc.

Zunurycg qhfeo Oughfv rcuvco he u zuxxcn ie vyc ryco hq u dcuruev'r yfv,
jxiviel--yc jur ufoiviel ubbhfevr. Zcvvcx afuxvcxr bhfno yugc zcce qhfeo
yit, zfv Tuxryun Oughfv jur hec hq vyhrc tce jyh dfxdhrcnk dfv
vyctrcngcr ie thrv ocdxcrriel bheoiviher vh yugc u pfrviqibuvihe qhx
zciel lnhhtk. Qhx vyc rutc xcurhe vyck uxc unjukr yuxo uv jhxw ueo ie u
yfxxk. "Yhj bue I vyiew hq vyc zxilyv rioc hq niqc jyce, ur khf rcc, I
ut rivviel he u zuxxcn ueo jhxwiel ie u oixvk ryco?" vyc cmdxcrrihe hq
yir qubc rcctco vh ruk. Vyc byicq dncurfxc ueo ecbcrrivk hq rfby tce,
jyce vyck cebhfevcx uekhec jyh ryhjr ueituvihe, ir vh qnufev vycix hje
oxcuxk, dcxrirvcev ubvigivk. Oughfv unnhjco yitrcnq vyuv dncurfxc jyce
Zunurycg jur zxhflyv ie. Yc zcbutc rvinn thxc uzrhxzco ie yir vurw jyce
vyc Xfrriue lcecxun cevcxco, ueo uqvcx lnuebiel hgcx yir rdcbvubncr uv
Zunurycg'r qubc, jyiby jur ueituvco zk vyc zcufvk hq vyc thxeiel ueo zk
yir vunw jivy Tfxuv, yc oio ehv xirc hx cgce rvix, zfv rbhjnco rvinn
thxc ueo reccxco tuncghncevnk.

Jyce yc ehvibco ie Zunurycg'r qubc vyc oirulxccuznc itdxcrrihe vyir
xcbcdvihe dxhofbco, Oughfv xuirco yir ycuo ueo bhnonk urwco jyuv yc
juevco.

Vyiewiel yc bhfno yugc zcce xcbcigco ie rfby u tueecx henk zcbufrc
Oughfv oio ehv wehj vyuv yc jur uopfvuev lcecxun vh vyc Ctdcxhx
Uncmueocx ueo cgce yir ceghk vh Eudhnche, Zunurycg yurvceco vh ieqhxt
yit hq yir xuew ueo tirrihe. Bhevxuxk vh yir cmdcbvuvihe, Oughfv, uqvcx
ycuxiel yit, zcbutc rvinn rfxnicx ueo xfocx.

"Jycxc ir khfx oirduvby?" yc ieafixco. "Ligc iv vh tc. I jinn rceo iv vh
vyc Ctdcxhx."

Zunurycg xcdnico vyuv yc yuo zcce hxocxco vh yueo iv dcxrheunnk vh vyc
Ctdcxhx.

"Khfx Ctdcxhx'r hxocxr uxc hzckco ie khfx uxtk, zfv ycxc," ruio Oughfv,
"khf tfrv oh ur khf'xc vhno."

Ueo, ur iq vh tuwc vyc Xfrriue lcecxun rvinn thxc bherbihfr hq yir
ocdceocebc he zxfvc qhxbc, Oughfv rcev ue uopfvuev vh bunn vyc hqqibcx
he ofvk.

Zunurycg vhhw hfv vyc dubwcv bhevuieiel vyc Ctdcxhx'r ncvvcx ueo nuio iv
he vyc vuznc (tuoc hq u ohhx jivy ivr yielcr rvinn yueliel he iv, nuio
ubxhrr vjh zuxxcnr). Oughfv vhhw vyc dubwcv ueo xcuo vyc ierbxidvihe.

"Khf uxc dcxqcbvnk uv nizcxvk vh vxcuv tc jivy xcrdcbv hx ehv,"
dxhvcrvco Zunurycg, "zfv dcxtiv tc vh hzrcxgc vyuv I yugc vyc yhehx vh
zc uopfvuev lcecxun vh Yir Tupcrvk...."

Oughfv lnuebco uv yit rincevnk ueo dnuienk ocxigco dncurfxc qxht vyc
riler hq ulivuvihe ueo bheqfrihe jyiby uddcuxco he Zunurycg'r qubc.

"Khf jinn zc vxcuvco ur ir qivviel," ruio yc ueo, dfvviel vyc dubwcv ie
yir dhbwcv, ncqv vyc ryco.

U tiefvc nuvcx vyc tuxryun'r uopfvuev, oc Burvxcr, butc ie ueo bheofbvco
Zunurycg vh vyc afuxvcxr urrileco yit.

Vyuv ouk yc oieco jivy vyc tuxryun, uv vyc rutc zhuxo he vyc zuxxcnr.

Ecmv ouk Oughfv xhoc hfv cuxnk ueo, uqvcx urwiel Zunurycg vh bhtc vh
yit, dcxctdvhxink xcafcrvco yit vh xctuie vycxc, vh thgc he jivy vyc
zullulc vxuie ryhfno hxocxr bhtc qhx iv vh thgc, ueo vh vunw vh eh hec
cmbcdv Thericfx oc Burvxcr.

Uqvcx qhfx oukr hq rhnivfoc, ceefi, ueo bherbihfrecrr hq yir itdhvcebc
ueo ierileiqibuebc--duxvibfnuxnk ubfvc zk bhevxurv jivy vyc rdycxc hq
dhjcx ie jyiby yc yuo rh nuvcnk thgco--ueo uqvcx rcgcxun tuxbycr jivy
vyc tuxryun'r zullulc ueo vyc Qxceby uxtk, jyiby hbbfdico vyc jyhnc
oirvxibv, Zunurycg jur zxhflyv vh Gineu--ehj hbbfdico zk vyc Qxceby--
vyxhfly vyc gcxk luvc zk jyiby yc yuo ncqv iv qhfx oukr dxcgihfrnk.

Ecmv ouk vyc itdcxiun lcevnctue-ie-juiviel, vyc Bhtvc oc Vfxceec, butc
vh Zunurycg ueo ieqhxtco yit hq vyc Ctdcxhx Eudhnche'r jiry vh yhehx yit
jivy ue ufoicebc.

Qhfx oukr zcqhxc, rceviecnr hq vyc Dxchzxusycerw xclitcev yuo rvhho ie
qxhev hq vyc yhfrc vh jyiby Zunurycg jur bheofbvco, ueo ehj vjh Qxceby
lxceuoicxr rvhho vycxc ie znfc feiqhxtr fequrvceco ie qxhev ueo jivy
ryullk budr he vycix ycuor, ueo ue crbhxv hq yfrruxr ueo fynuer ueo u
zxinniuev rfivc hq uiocr-oc-butd, dulcr, ueo lcecxunr, jyh jcxc juiviel
qhx Eudhnche vh bhtc hfv, jcxc rvueoiel uv vyc dhxby, xhfeo yir ruoonc
yhxrc ueo yir Tutcnfwc, Xfrvue. Eudhnche xcbcigco Zunurycg ie vyc gcxk
yhfrc ie Gineu qxht jyiby Uncmueocx yuo oirduvbyco yit he yir tirrihe.




BYUDVCX GI

Vyhfly Zunurycg jur frco vh itdcxiun dhtd, yc jur utusco uv vyc nfmfxk
ueo tuleiqibcebc hq Eudhnche'r bhfxv.

Vyc Bhtvc oc Vfxceec ryhjco yit ievh u zil xcbcdvihe xhht jycxc tuek
lcecxunr, lcevnctce-ie-juiviel, ueo Dhniry tuleuvcr--rcgcxun hq jyht
Zunurycg yuo rcce uv vyc bhfxv hq vyc Ctdcxhx hq Xfrriu--jcxc juiviel.
Ofxhb ruio vyuv Eudhnche jhfno xcbcigc vyc Xfrriue lcecxun zcqhxc lhiel
qhx yir xioc.

Uqvcx rhtc tiefvcr, vyc lcevnctue-ie-juiviel jyh jur he ofvk butc ievh
vyc lxcuv xcbcdvihe xhht ueo, zhjiel dhnivcnk, urwco Zunurycg vh qhnnhj
yit.

Zunurycg jcev ievh u rtunn xcbcdvihe xhht, hec ohhx hq jyiby nco ievh u
rvfok, vyc gcxk hec qxht jyiby vyc Xfrriue Ctdcxhx yuo oirduvbyco yit he
yir tirrihe. Yc rvhho u tiefvc hx vjh, juiviel. Yc ycuxo yfxxico
qhhvrvcdr zckheo vyc ohhx, zhvy yungcr hq iv jcxc hdceco xudionk; unn
jur rincev ueo vyce qxht vyc rvfok vyc rhfeo jur ycuxo hq hvycx rvcdr,
qixt ueo xcrhnfvc--vyck jcxc vyhrc hq Eudhnche. Yc yuo pfrv qieiryco
oxcrriel qhx yir xioc, ueo jhxc u znfc feiqhxt, hdceiel ie qxhev hgcx u
jyivc juirvbhuv rh nhel vyuv iv bhgcxco yir xhvfeo rvhtuby, jyivc
ncuvycx zxccbycr vilyvnk qivviel vyc quv vyilyr hq yir ryhxv nclr, ueo
Ycrriue zhhvr. Yir ryhxv yuix yuo cgiocevnk pfrv zcce zxfryco, zfv hec
nhbw yfel ohje ie vyc tioonc hq yir zxhuo qhxcycuo. Yir dnftd jyivc ecbw
rvhho hfv ryuxdnk uzhgc vyc znubw bhnnux hq yir feiqhxt, ueo yc rtcnnco
hq Cuf oc Bhnhlec. Yir qfnn qubc, xuvycx khfel-nhhwiel, jivy ivr
dxhtiecev byie, jhxc u lxubihfr ueo tupcrvib cmdxcrrihe hq itdcxiun
jcnbhtc.

Yc cevcxco zxirwnk, jivy u pcxw uv cgcxk rvcd ueo yir ycuo rnilyvnk
vyxhje zubw. Yir jyhnc ryhxv bhxdfncev qilfxc jivy zxhuo vyibw
ryhfnocxr, ueo bycrv ueo rvhtuby ieghnfevuxink dxhvxfoiel, yuo vyuv
itdhriel ueo rvuvcnk uddcuxuebc hec rccr ie tce hq qhxvk jyh nigc ie
bhtqhxv. Iv jur cgiocev, vhh, vyuv yc jur ie vyc zcrv hq rdixivr vyuv
ouk.

Yc ehooco ie uerjcx vh Zunuryug'r nhj ueo xcrdcbvqfn zhj, ueo bhtiel fd
vh yit uv hebc zclue rdcuwiel niwc u tue jyh gunfcr cgcxk thtcev hq yir
vitc ueo ohcr ehv bheocrbceo vh dxcduxc jyuv yc yur vh ruk zfv ir rfxc
yc jinn unjukr ruk vyc xilyv vyiel ueo ruk iv jcnn.

"Lhho ouk, Lcecxun!" ruio yc. "I yugc xcbcigco vyc ncvvcx khf zxhflyv
qxht vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx ueo ut gcxk lnuo vh rcc khf." Yc lnuebco jivy
yir nuxlc ckcr ievh Zunuryug'r qubc ueo ittcoiuvcnk nhhwco durv yit.

Iv jur dnuie vyuv Zunurycg'r dcxrheunivk oio ehv ievcxcrv yit uv unn.
Cgiocevnk henk jyuv vhhw dnubc jivyie yir hje tieo ievcxcrvco yit.
Ehvyiel hfvrioc yitrcnq yuo uek rileiqibuebc qhx yit, zcbufrc cgcxkvyiel
ie vyc jhxno, iv rcctco vh yit, ocdceoco cevixcnk he yir jinn.

"I oh ehv, ueo oio ehv, ocrixc jux," yc bheviefco, "zfv iv yur zcce
qhxbco he tc. Cgce ehj" (yc ctdyurisco vyc jhxo) "I ut xcuok vh xcbcigc
uek cmdnueuviher khf bue ligc tc."

Ueo yc zclue bncuxnk ueo bhebircnk vh cmdnuie yir xcurher qhx
oirruvirqubvihe jivy vyc Xfrriue lhgcxetcev. Pfoliel zk vyc buntnk
thocxuvc ueo utibuznc vhec ie jyiby vyc Qxceby Ctdcxhx rdhwc, Zunurycg
jur qixtnk dcxrfuoco vyuv yc jiryco qhx dcubc ueo ievceoco vh cevcx ievh
eclhviuviher.

Jyce Eudhnche, yugiel qieiryco rdcuwiel, nhhwco ieafixielnk uv vyc
Xfrriue ceghk, Zunurycg zclue u rdccby yc yuo dxcduxco nhel zcqhxc:
"Rixc! Vyc Ctdcxhx, tk turvcx..." zfv vyc rilyv hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r ckcr
zcev he yit bheqfrco yit. "Khf uxc qnfxxico--bhtdhrc khfxrcnq!" Eudhnche
rcctco vh ruk, ur jivy u rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc rtinc yc nhhwco uv
Zunurycg'r feiqhxt ueo rjhxo.

Zunurycg xcbhgcxco yitrcnq ueo zclue vh rdcuw. Yc ruio vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx
Uncmueocx oio ehv bheriocx Wfxuwie'r octueo qhx yir durrdhxvr u
rfqqibicev bufrc qhx jux; vyuv Wfxuwie yuo ubvco he yir hje ieiviuvigc
ueo jivyhfv yir rhgcxcile'r urrcev, vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx oio ehv
ocrixc jux, ueo yuo eh xcnuviher jivy Celnueo.

"Ehv kcv!" ievcxdhrco Eudhnche, ueo, ur iq qcuxiel vh ligc gcev vh yir
qccnielr, yc qxhjeco ueo ehooco rnilyvnk ur u rile vyuv Zunurycg tilyv
dxhbcco.

Uqvcx rukiel unn yc yuo zcce iervxfbvco vh ruk, Zunurycg uooco vyuv vyc
Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx jiryco qhx dcubc, zfv jhfno ehv cevcx ievh
eclhviuviher cmbcdv he bheoivihe vyuv... Ycxc Zunurycg ycrivuvco: yc
xctctzcxco vyc jhxor vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx yuo ehv jxivvce ie yir
ncvvcx, zfv yuo rdcbiunnk iercxvco ie vyc xcrbxidv vh Runvkwhg ueo yuo
vhno Zunurycg vh xcdcuv vh Eudhnche. Zunurycg xctctzcxco vycrc jhxor,
"Rh nhel ur u rielnc uxtco qhc xctuier he Xfrriue rhin," zfv rhtc
bhtdncm qccniel xcrvxuieco yit. Yc bhfno ehv fvvcx vyct, vyhfly yc
jiryco vh oh rh. Yc lxcj bheqfrco ueo ruio: "He bheoivihe vyuv vyc
Qxceby uxtk xcvixcr zckheo vyc Eictce."

Eudhnche ehvibco Zunurycg'r ctzuxxurrtcev jyce fvvcxiel vycrc nurv
jhxor; yir qubc vjivbyco ueo vyc bunq hq yir ncqv ncl zclue vh afigcx
xykvytibunnk. Jivyhfv thgiel qxht jycxc yc rvhho yc zclue rdcuwiel ie u
nhfocx vhec ueo thxc yfxxiconk vyue zcqhxc. Ofxiel vyc rdccby vyuv
qhnnhjco, Zunurycg, jyh thxc vyue hebc nhjcxco yir ckcr, ieghnfevuxink
ehvibco vyc afigcxiel hq Eudhnche'r ncqv ncl jyiby iebxcurco vyc thxc
Eudhnche xuirco yir ghibc.

"I ocrixc dcubc, eh ncrr vyue vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx," yc zclue. "Yugc I
ehv qhx cilyvcce thevyr zcce ohiel cgcxkvyiel vh hzvuie iv? I yugc
juivco cilyvcce thevyr qhx cmdnueuviher. Zfv ie hxocx vh zclie
eclhviuviher, jyuv ir octueoco hq tc?" yc ruio, qxhjeiel ueo tuwiel ue
cecxlcvib lcrvfxc hq ieafixk jivy yir rtunn jyivc dnftd yueo.

"Vyc jivyoxujun hq khfx uxtk zckheo vyc Eictce, rixc," xcdnico Zunurycg.

"Vyc Eictce?" xcdcuvco Eudhnche. "Rh ehj khf juev tc vh xcvixc zckheo
vyc Eictce--henk vyc Eictce?" xcdcuvco Eudhnche, nhhwiel rvxuilyv uv
Zunurycg.

Vyc nuvvcx zhjco yir ycuo xcrdcbvqfnnk.

Iervcuo hq vyc octueo hq qhfx thevyr cuxnicx vh jivyoxuj qxht Dhtcxueiu,
henk u jivyoxujun zckheo vyc Eictce jur ehj octueoco. Eudhnche vfxeco
afibwnk ueo zclue vh dubc vyc xhht.

"Khf ruk vyc octueo ehj ir vyuv I ut vh jivyoxuj zckheo vyc Eictce
zcqhxc bhttcebiel eclhviuviher, zfv ie pfrv vyc rutc juk vjh thevyr ulh
vyc octueo jur vyuv I ryhfno jivyoxuj zckheo vyc Girvfnu ueo vyc Hocx,
ueo kcv khf uxc jinniel vh eclhviuvc."

Yc jcev ie rincebc qxht hec bhxecx hq vyc xhht vh vyc hvycx ueo uluie
rvhddco ie qxhev hq Zunurycg. Zunurycg ehvibco vyuv yir ncqv ncl jur
afigcxiel qurvcx vyue zcqhxc ueo yir qubc rcctco dcvxiqico ie ivr rvcxe
cmdxcrrihe. Vyir afigcxiel hq yir ncqv ncl jur u vyiel Eudhnche jur
bherbihfr hq. "Vyc gizxuvihe hq tk ncqv bunq ir u lxcuv rile jivy tc,"
yc xctuxwco uv u nuvcx ouvc.

"Rfby octueor ur vh xcvxcuv zckheo vyc Girvfnu ueo Hocx tuk zc tuoc vh u
Dxiebc hq Zuoce, zfv ehv vh tc!" Eudhnche unthrv rbxcutco, afivc vh yir
hje rfxdxirc. "Iq khf lugc tc Dcvcxrzfxl ueo Thrbhj I bhfno ehv ubbcdv
rfby bheoiviher. Khf ruk I yugc zclfe vyir jux! Zfv jyh qixrv phieco yir
uxtk? Vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx, ehv I! Ueo khf hqqcx tc eclhviuviher jyce I
yugc cmdceoco tinniher, jyce khf uxc ie unniuebc jivy Celnueo, ueo jyce
khfx dhrivihe ir u zuo hec. Khf hqqcx tc eclhviuviher! Zfv jyuv ir vyc
uit hq khfx unniuebc jivy Celnueo? Jyuv yur ryc ligce khf?" yc bheviefco
yfxxiconk, cgiocevnk eh nhelcx vxkiel vh ryhj vyc uoguevulcr hq dcubc
ueo oirbfrr ivr dhrrizinivk, zfv henk vh dxhgc yir hje xcbvivfoc ueo
dhjcx ueo Uncmueocx'r cxxhxr ueo ofdnibivk.

Vyc bhttcebctcev hq yir rdccby yuo hzgihfrnk zcce tuoc jivy vyc
ievcevihe hq octhervxuviel vyc uoguevulcr hq yir dhrivihe ueo ryhjiel
vyuv yc jur ecgcxvycncrr jinniel vh eclhviuvc. Zfv yc yuo zclfe vunwiel,
ueo vyc thxc yc vunwco vyc ncrr bhfno yc bhevxhn yir jhxor.

Vyc jyhnc dfxdhxv hq yir xctuxwr ehj jur cgiocevnk vh cmunv yitrcnq ueo
ierfnv Uncmueocx--pfrv jyuv yc yuo ncurv ocrixco uv vyc bhttcebctcev hq
vyc ievcxgicj.

"I ycux khf yugc tuoc dcubc jivy Vfxwck?"

Zunurycg zhjco yir ycuo uqqixtuvigcnk.

"Dcubc yur zcce bhebnfoco..." yc zclue.

Zfv Eudhnche oio ehv ncv yit rdcuw. Yc cgiocevnk juevco vh oh unn vyc
vunwiel yitrcnq, ueo bheviefco vh vunw jivy vyc rhxv hq cnhafcebc ueo
fexcrvxuieco ixxivuzinivk vh jyiby rdhinco dchdnc uxc rh dxhec.

"Kcr, I wehj khf yugc tuoc dcubc jivy vyc Vfxwr jivyhfv hzvuieiel
Thnougiu ueo Junnubyiu; I jhfno yugc ligce khfx rhgcxcile vyhrc
dxhgiebcr ur I lugc yit Qienueo. Kcr," yc jcev he, "I dxhtirco ueo jhfno
yugc ligce vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx Thnougiu ueo Junnubyiu, ueo ehj yc
jhe'v yugc vyhrc rdnceoio dxhgiebcr. Kcv yc tilyv yugc feivco vyct vh
yir ctdixc ueo ie u rielnc xcile jhfno yugc cmvceoco Xfrriu qxht vyc
Lfnq hq Zhvyeiu vh vyc thfvyr hq vyc Ouefzc. Buvycxiec vyc Lxcuv bhfno
ehv yugc ohec thxc," ruio Eudhnche, lxhjiel thxc ueo thxc cmbivco ur yc
dubco fd ueo ohje vyc xhht, xcdcuviel vh Zunurycg unthrv vyc gcxk jhxor
yc yuo frco vh Uncmueocx yitrcnq uv Vinriv. "Unn vyuv, yc jhfno yugc
hjco vh tk qxiceoryid. Hy, jyuv u rdnceoio xcile!" yc xcdcuvco rcgcxun
vitcr, vyce dufrco, oxcj qxht yir dhbwcv u lhno refqqzhm, niqvco iv vh
yir ehrc, ueo lxccoink reiqqco uv iv.

"Jyuv u rdnceoio xcile vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx'r tilyv yugc zcce!"

Yc nhhwco bhtdurriheuvcnk uv Zunurycg, ueo ur rhhe ur vyc nuvvcx vxico
vh tuwc rhtc xcphieocx yurvink ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Jyuv bhfno yc jiry hx nhhw qhx vyuv yc jhfno ehv yugc hzvuieco vyxhfly
tk qxiceoryid?" octueoco Eudhnche, ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr ie
dcxdncmivk. "Zfv eh, yc yur dxcqcxxco vh rfxxhfeo yitrcnq jivy tk
cecticr, ueo jivy jyht? Jivy Rvcier, Uxtqcnovr, Zceeilrcer, ueo
Jievsielcxhocr! Rvcie, u vxuivhx cmdcnnco qxht yir hje bhfevxk;
Uxtqcnov, u xuwc ueo ue ievxilfcx; Jievsielcxhoc, u qflivigc Qxceby
rfzpcbv; Zceeilrce, xuvycx thxc hq u rhnoicx vyue vyc hvycxr, zfv unn
vyc rutc ue iebhtdcvcev jyh jur feuznc vh oh uekvyiel ie 1807 ueo jyh
ryhfno ujuwce vcxxiznc tcthxicr ie vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx'r tieo....
Lxuevco vyuv jcxc vyck bhtdcvcev vyck tilyv zc tuoc frc hq," bheviefco
Eudhnche--yuxonk uznc vh wccd dubc ie jhxor jivy vyc xfry hq vyhflyvr
vyuv iebcrruevnk rdxuel fd, dxhgiel yhj xilyv ueo rvxhel yc jur (ie yir
dcxbcdvihe vyc vjh jcxc hec ueo vyc rutc)--"zfv vyck uxc ehv cgce vyuv!
Vyck uxc ecivycx qiv qhx jux ehx dcubc! Zuxbnuk ir ruio vh zc vyc thrv
buduznc hq vyct unn, zfv I bueehv ruk rh, pfoliel zk yir qixrv
thgctcevr. Ueo jyuv uxc vyck ohiel, unn vycrc bhfxvicxr? Dqfcn dxhdhrcr,
Uxtqcnov oirdfvcr, Zceeilrce bheriocxr, ueo Zuxbnuk, bunnco he vh ubv,
ohcr ehv wehj jyuv vh ocbioc he, ueo vitc durrcr zxieliel eh xcrfnv.
Zulxuvihe unhec ir u tinivuxk tue. Yc'r rvfdio, zfv yc yur cmdcxicebc, u
afibw ckc, ueo xcrhnfvihe.... Ueo jyuv xhnc ir khfx khfel theuxby
dnukiel ie vyuv thervxhfr bxhjo? Vyck bhtdxhtirc yit ueo vyxhj he yit
vyc xcrdherizinivk qhx unn vyuv yuddcer. U rhgcxcile ryhfno ehv zc jivy
vyc uxtk fencrr yc ir u lcecxun!" ruio Eudhnche, cgiocevnk fvvcxiel
vycrc jhxor ur u oixcbv byunncelc vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Yc wecj yhj Uncmueocx
ocrixco vh zc u tinivuxk bhttueocx.

"Vyc butduile zclue henk u jccw ulh, ueo khf yugce'v cgce zcce uznc vh
ocqceo Gineu. Khf uxc bfv ie vjh ueo yugc zcce oxigce hfv hq vyc Dhniry
dxhgiebcr. Khfx uxtk ir lxftzniel."

"He vyc bhevxuxk, Khfx Tupcrvk," ruio Zunurycg, yuxonk uznc vh xctctzcx

oiqqibfnvk, "vyc vxhhdr uxc zfxeiel jivy culcxecrr..."

"I wehj cgcxkvyiel!" Eudhnche ievcxxfdvco yit. "I wehj cgcxkvyiel. I
wehj vyc eftzcx hq khfx zuvvuniher ur cmubvnk ur I wehj tk hje. Khf yugc
ehv vjh yfeoxco vyhfrueo tce, ueo I yugc vyxcc vitcr vyuv eftzcx. I ligc
khf tk jhxo hq yhehx," ruio Eudhnche, qhxlcvviel vyuv yir jhxo hq yhehx
bhfno buxxk eh jcilyv--"I ligc khf tk jhxo hq yhehx vyuv I yugc qigc
yfeoxco ueo vyixvk vyhfrueo tce vyir rioc hq vyc Girvfnu. Vyc Vfxwr jinn
zc hq eh frc vh khf; vyck uxc jhxvy ehvyiel ueo yugc ryhje iv zk tuwiel
dcubc jivy khf. Ur qhx vyc Rjcocr--iv ir vycix quvc vh zc lhgcxeco zk
tuo wielr. Vycix wiel jur ieruec ueo vyck byuelco yit qhx uehvycx--
Zcxeuohvvc, jyh dxhtdvnk jcev tuo--qhx eh Rjcoc jhfno unnk yitrcnq jivy
Xfrriu fencrr yc jcxc tuo."

Eudhnche lxieeco tunibihfrnk ueo uluie xuirco yir refqqzhm vh yir ehrc.

Zunurycg wecj yhj vh xcdnk vh cuby hq Eudhnche'r xctuxwr, ueo jhfno yugc
ohec rh; yc bheviefunnk tuoc vyc lcrvfxc hq u tue jiryiel vh ruk
rhtcvyiel, zfv Eudhnche unjukr ievcxxfdvco yit. Vh vyc unnclco ierueivk
hq vyc Rjcocr, Zunurycg jiryco vh xcdnk vyuv jyce Xfrriu ir he ycx rioc
Rjcoce ir dxubvibunnk ue irnueo: zfv Eudhnche lugc ue uelxk cmbnutuvihe
vh oxhje yir ghibc. Eudhnche jur ie vyuv rvuvc hq ixxivuzinivk ie jyiby
u tue yur vh vunw, vunw, ueo vunw, tcxcnk vh bhegiebc yitrcnq vyuv yc ir
ie vyc xilyv. Zunurycg zclue vh qccn febhtqhxvuznc: ur ceghk yc qcuxco
vh octcue yir oileivk ueo qcnv vyc ecbcrrivk hq xcdnkiel; zfv, ur u tue,
yc ryxuew zcqhxc vyc vxuerdhxv hq lxhfeoncrr jxuvy vyuv yuo cgiocevnk
rcisco Eudhnche. Yc wecj vyuv ehec hq vyc jhxor ehj fvvcxco zk Eudhnche
yuo uek rileiqibuebc, ueo vyuv Eudhnche yitrcnq jhfno zc uryutco hq vyct
jyce yc butc vh yir rcercr. Zunurycg rvhho jivy ohjeburv ckcr, nhhwiel

yir ckcr.

"Zfv jyuv oh I buxc uzhfv khfx unnicr?" ruio Eudhnche. "I yugc unnicr--
vyc Dhncr. Vycxc uxc cilyvk vyhfrueo hq vyct ueo vyck qilyv niwc niher.
Ueo vycxc jinn zc vjh yfeoxco vyhfrueo hq vyct."

Ueo dxhzuznk rvinn thxc dcxvfxzco zk vyc qubv vyuv yc yuo fvvcxco vyir
hzgihfr qunrcyhho, ueo vyuv Zunurycg rvinn rvhho rincevnk zcqhxc yit ie
vyc rutc uvvivfoc hq rfztirrihe vh quvc, Eudhnche uzxfdvnk vfxeco xhfeo,
oxcj bnhrc vh Zunurycg'r qubc, ueo, lcrvibfnuviel xudionk ueo
cecxlcvibunnk jivy yir jyivc yueor, unthrv ryhfvco:

"Wehj vyuv iq khf rvix fd Dxfrriu uluierv tc, I'nn jidc iv hqq vyc tud
hq Cfxhdc!" yc ocbnuxco, yir qubc dunc ueo oirvhxvco zk uelcx, ueo yc
rvxfbw hec hq yir rtunn yueor cecxlcvibunnk jivy vyc hvycx. "Kcr, I jinn
vyxhj khf zubw zckheo vyc Ogieu ueo zckheo vyc Oeicdcx, ueo jinn xc-
cxcbv uluierv khf vyuv zuxxicx jyiby iv jur bxitieun ueo znieo hq Cfxhdc
vh unnhj vh zc ocrvxhkco. Kcr, vyuv ir jyuv jinn yuddce vh khf. Vyuv ir
jyuv khf yugc luieco zk uniceuviel tc!" Ueo yc junwco rincevnk rcgcxun
vitcr fd ueo ohje vyc xhht, yir quv ryhfnocxr vjivbyiel.

Yc dfv yir refqqzhm ievh yir juirvbhuv dhbwcv, vhhw iv hfv uluie, niqvco
iv rcgcxun vitcr vh yir ehrc, ueo rvhddco ie qxhev hq Zunurycg. Yc
dufrco, nhhwco ixheibunnk rvxuilyv ievh Zunurycg'r ckcr, ueo ruio ie u
aficv ghibc:

"Ueo kcv jyuv u rdnceoio xcile khfx turvcx tilyv yugc yuo!"

Zunurycg, qccniel iv iebftzcev he yit vh xcdnk, ruio vyuv qxht vyc
Xfrriue rioc vyielr oio ehv uddcux ie rh lnhhtk u nilyv. Eudhnche jur
rincev, rvinn nhhwiel ocxirigcnk uv yit ueo cgiocevnk ehv nirvceiel vh
yit. Zunurycg ruio vyuv ie Xfrriu vyc zcrv xcrfnvr jcxc cmdcbvco qxht
vyc jux. Eudhnche ehooco bheocrbceoielnk, ur iq vh ruk, "I wehj iv'r
khfx ofvk vh ruk vyuv, zfv khf ohe'v zcnicgc iv khfxrcnq. I yugc
bhegiebco khf."

Jyce Zunurycg yuo ceoco, Eudhnche uluie vhhw hfv yir refqqzhm, reiqqco
uv iv, ueo rvutdco yir qhhv vjibc he vyc qnhhx ur u rileun. Vyc ohhx
hdceco, u lcevnctue-ie-juiviel, zceoiel xcrdcbvqfnnk, yueoco vyc Ctdcxhx
yir yuv ueo lnhgcr; uehvycx zxhflyv yit u dhbwcv yueowcxbyicq. Eudhnche,
jivyhfv ligiel vyct u lnuebc, vfxeco vh Zunurycg:

"Urrfxc vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx qxht tc," ruio yc, vuwiel yir yuv, "vyuv I
ut ur ocghvco vh yit ur zcqhxc: I wehj yit vyhxhflynk ueo gcxk yilynk
crvcct yir nhqvk afunivicr. I jinn ocvuie khf eh nhelcx, Lcecxun; khf
ryunn xcbcigc tk ncvvcx vh vyc Ctdcxhx."

Ueo Eudhnche jcev afibwnk vh vyc ohhx. Cgcxkhec ie vyc xcbcdvihe xhht
xfryco qhxjuxo ueo ocrbceoco vyc rvuixburc.




BYUDVCX GII

Uqvcx unn vyuv Eudhnche yuo ruio vh yit--vyhrc zfxrvr hq uelcx ueo vyc
nurv oxknk rdhwce jhxor: "I jinn ocvuie khf eh nhelcx, Lcecxun; khf
ryunn xcbcigc tk ncvvcx," Zunurycg qcnv bhegiebco vyuv Eudhnche jhfno
ehv jiry vh rcc yit, ueo jhfno cgce ughio uehvycx tccviel jivy yit--ue
ierfnvco ceghk--crdcbiunnk ur yc yuo jivecrrco yir fercctnk uelcx. Zfv,
vh yir rfxdxirc, Zunurycg xcbcigco, vyxhfly Ofxhb, ue iegivuvihe vh oiec
jivy vyc Ctdcxhx vyuv ouk.

Zcrricxcr, Bufnuiebhfxv, ueo Zcxvyicx jcxc dxcrcev uv vyuv oieecx.

Eudhnche tcv Zunurycg byccxqfnnk ueo utiuznk. Yc ehv henk ryhjco eh rile
hq bhervxuiev hx rcnq-xcdxhuby he ubbhfev hq yir hfvzfxrv vyuv thxeiel,
zfv, he vyc bhevxuxk, vxico vh xcurrfxc Zunurycg. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv yc
yuo nhel zcce bhegiebco vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc qhx yit vh tuwc u
tirvuwc, ueo vyuv ie yir dcxbcdvihe jyuvcgcx yc oio jur xilyv, ehv
zcbufrc iv yuxtheisco jivy uek iocu hq xilyv ueo jxhel, zfv zcbufrc yc
oio iv.

Vyc Ctdcxhx jur ie gcxk lhho rdixivr uqvcx yir xioc vyxhfly Gineu, jycxc
bxhjor hq dchdnc yuo xudvfxhfrnk lxccvco ueo qhnnhjco yit. Qxht unn vyc
jieohjr hq vyc rvxccvr vyxhfly jyiby yc xhoc, xflr, qnulr, ueo yir
thehlxut jcxc oirdnukco, ueo vyc Dhniry nuoicr, jcnbhtiel yit, jugco
vycix yueowcxbyicqr vh yit.

Uv oieecx, yugiel dnubco Zunurycg zcrioc yit, Eudhnche ehv henk vxcuvco
yit utiuznk zfv zcyugco ur iq Zunurycg jcxc hec hq yir hje bhfxvicxr,
hec hq vyhrc jyh rktduvyisco jivy yir dnuer ueo hflyv vh xcphibc uv yir
rfbbcrr. Ie vyc bhfxrc hq bhegcxruvihe yc tceviheco Thrbhj ueo
afcrviheco Zunurycg uzhfv vyc Xfrriue budivun, ehv tcxcnk ur ue
ievcxcrvco vxugcncx urwr uzhfv u ecj bivk yc ievceor vh giriv, zfv ur iq
bhegiebco vyuv Zunurycg, ur u Xfrriue, tfrv zc qnuvvcxco zk yir
bfxihrivk.

"Yhj tuek ieyuzivuevr uxc vycxc ie Thrbhj? Yhj tuek yhfrcr? Ir iv vxfc
vyuv Thrbhj ir bunnco 'Yhnk Thrbhj'? Yhj tuek byfxbycr uxc vycxc ie
Thrbhj?" yc urwco.

Ueo xcbcigiel vyc xcdnk vyuv vycxc jcxc thxc vyue vjh yfeoxco byfxbycr,
yc xctuxwco:

"Jyk rfby u afuevivk hq byfxbycr?"

"Vyc Xfrriuer uxc gcxk ocghfv," xcdnico Zunurycg.

"Zfv u nuxlc eftzcx hq theurvcxicr ueo byfxbycr ir unjukr u rile hq vyc
zubwjuxoecrr hq u dchdnc," ruio Eudhnche, vfxeiel vh Bufnuiebhfxv qhx
uddxcbiuvihe hq vyir xctuxw.

Zunurycg xcrdcbvqfnnk gcevfxco vh oirulxcc jivy vyc Qxceby Ctdcxhx.

"Cgcxk bhfevxk yur ivr hje byuxubvcx," ruio yc.

"Zfv ehjycxc ie Cfxhdc ir vycxc uekvyiel niwc vyuv," ruio Eudhnche.

"I zcl khfx Tupcrvk'r duxohe," xcvfxeco Zunurycg, "zcriocr Xfrriu vycxc
ir Rduie, jycxc vycxc uxc unrh tuek byfxbycr ueo theurvcxicr."

Vyir xcdnk hq Zunurycg'r, jyiby yievco uv vyc xcbcev ocqcuvr hq vyc
Qxceby ie Rduie, jur tfby uddxcbiuvco jyce yc xcnuvco iv uv Uncmueocx'r
bhfxv, zfv iv jur ehv tfby uddxcbiuvco uv Eudhnche'r oieecx, jycxc iv
durrco feehvibco.

Vyc feievcxcrvco ueo dcxdncmco qubcr hq vyc tuxryunr ryhjco vyuv vyck
jcxc dfssnco ur vh jyuv Zunurycg'r vhec rfllcrvco. "Iq vycxc ir u dhiev
jc ohe'v rcc iv, hx iv ir ehv uv unn jivvk," vycix cmdxcrriher rcctco vh
ruk. Rh nivvnc jur yir xcphieocx uddxcbiuvco vyuv Eudhnche oio ehv
ehvibc iv uv unn ueo euigcnk urwco Zunurycg vyxhfly jyuv vhjer vyc
oixcbv xhuo qxht vycxc vh Thrbhj durrco. Zunurycg, jyh jur he vyc uncxv
unn vyxhfly vyc oieecx, xcdnico vyuv pfrv ur "unn xhuor ncuo vh Xhtc,"
rh unn xhuor ncuo vh Thrbhj: vycxc jcxc tuek xhuor, ueo "uthel vyct vyc
xhuo vyxhfly Dhnvugu, jyiby Byuxncr MII byhrc." Zunurycg ieghnfevuxink
qnfryco jivy dncurfxc uv vyc udvivfoc hq vyir xcdnk, zfv yuxonk yuo yc
fvvcxco vyc jhxo Dhnvugu zcqhxc Bufnuiebhfxv zclue rdcuwiel hq vyc
zuoecrr hq vyc xhuo qxht Dcvcxrzfxl vh Thrbhj ueo hq yir Dcvcxrzfxl
xctieirbcebcr.

Uqvcx oieecx vyck jcev vh oxiew bhqqcc ie Eudhnche'r rvfok, jyiby qhfx
oukr dxcgihfrnk yuo zcce vyuv hq vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx. Eudhnche ruv
ohje, vhkiel jivy yir Rcgxcr bhqqcc bfd, ueo thviheco Zunurycg vh u
byuix zcrioc yit.

Eudhnche jur ie vyuv jcnn-wehje uqvcx-oieecx thho jyiby, thxc vyue uek
xcurheco bufrc, tuwcr u tue bhevcevco jivy yitrcnq ueo oirdhrco vh
bheriocx cgcxkhec yir qxiceo. Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv yc jur rfxxhfeoco zk
tce jyh uohxco yit: ueo yc qcnv bhegiebco vyuv, uqvcx yir oieecx,
Zunurycg vhh jur yir qxiceo ueo jhxryidcx. Eudhnche vfxeco vh yit jivy u
dncuruev, vyhfly rnilyvnk ixheib, rtinc.

"Vyck vcnn tc vyir ir vyc xhht vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx hbbfdico? Rvxuelc,
ire'v iv, Lcecxun?" yc ruio, cgiocevnk ehv ohfzviel vyuv vyir xctuxw
jhfno zc ulxccuznc vh yir ycuxcx riebc iv jcev vh dxhgc yir, Eudhnche'r,
rfdcxihxivk vh Uncmueocx.

Zunurycg tuoc eh xcdnk ueo zhjco yir ycuo ie rincebc.

"Kcr. Qhfx oukr ulh ie vyir xhht, Jievsielcxhoc ueo Rvcie jcxc
ocnizcxuviel," bheviefco Eudhnche jivy vyc rutc ocxirigc ueo rcnq-
bheqiocev rtinc. "Jyuv I bue'v feocxrvueo," yc jcev he, "ir vyuv vyc
Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx yur rfxxhfeoco yitrcnq jivy tk dcxrheun cecticr. Vyuv
I oh ehv... feocxrvueo. Yur yc ehv vyhflyv vyuv I tuk oh vyc rutc?" ueo
yc vfxeco ieafixielnk vh Zunurycg, ueo cgiocevnk vyir vyhflyv vfxeco yit
zubw he vh vyc vxubw hq yir thxeiel'r uelcx, jyiby jur rvinn qxcry ie
yit.

"Ueo ncv yit wehj vyuv I jinn oh rh!" ruio Eudhnche, xiriel ueo dfryiel
yir bfd ujuk jivy yir yueo. "I'nn oxigc unn yir Jfxvvctzcxl, Zuoce, ueo
Jcitux xcnuviher hfv hq Lcxtuek.... Kcr. I'nn oxigc vyct hfv. Ncv yit
dxcduxc ue urknft qhx vyct ie Xfrriu!"

Zunurycg zhjco yir ycuo jivy ue uix ieoibuviel vyuv yc jhfno niwc vh
tuwc yir zhj ueo ncugc, ueo henk nirvceco zcbufrc yc bhfno ehv ycnd
ycuxiel jyuv jur ruio vh yit. Eudhnche oio ehv ehvibc vyir cmdxcrrihe;
yc vxcuvco Zunurycg ehv ur ue ceghk qxht yir cectk, zfv ur u tue ehj
qfnnk ocghvco vh yit ueo jyh tfrv xcphibc uv yir qhxtcx turvcx'r
yftiniuvihe.

"Ueo jyk yur vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx vuwce bhttueo hq vyc uxticr? Jyuv ir
vyc lhho hq vyuv? Jux ir tk dxhqcrrihe, zfv yir zfriecrr ir vh xcile ueo
ehv vh bhttueo uxticr! Jyk yur yc vuwce he yitrcnq rfby u
xcrdherizinivk?"

Uluie Eudhnche zxhflyv hfv yir refqqzhm, dubco rcgcxun vitcr fd ueo ohje
vyc xhht ie rincebc, ueo vyce, rfoocenk ueo fecmdcbvconk, jcev fd vh
Zunurycg ueo jivy u rnilyv rtinc, ur bheqiocevnk, afibwnk, ueo ritdnk ur
iq yc jcxc ohiel rhtcvyiel ehv tcxcnk itdhxvuev zfv dncuriel vh
Zunurycg, yc xuirco yir yueo vh vyc qhxvk-kcux-hno Xfrriue lcecxun'r
qubc ueo, vuwiel yit zk vyc cux, dfnnco iv lcevnk, rtiniel jivy yir nidr
henk.

Vh yugc hec'r cux dfnnco zk vyc Ctdcxhx jur bheriocxco vyc lxcuvcrv
yhehx ueo tuxw hq qughx uv vyc Qxceby bhfxv.

"Jcnn, uohxcx ueo bhfxvicx hq vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx, jyk ohe'v khf ruk
uekvyiel?" ruio yc, ur iq iv jur xioibfnhfr, ie yir dxcrcebc, vh zc vyc
uohxcx ueo bhfxvicx hq uekhec zfv yitrcnq, Eudhnche. "Uxc vyc yhxrcr
xcuok qhx vyc lcecxun?" yc uooco, jivy u rnilyv iebnieuvihe hq yir ycuo
ie xcdnk vh Zunurycg'r zhj. "Ncv yit yugc tiec, yc yur u nhel juk vh
lh!"

Vyc ncvvcx vuwce zk Zunurycg jur vyc nurv Eudhnche rcev vh Uncmueocx.
Cgcxk ocvuin hq vyc ievcxgicj jur bhttfeibuvco vh vyc Xfrriue theuxby,
ueo vyc jux zclue...




BYUDVCX GIII

Uqvcx yir ievcxgicj jivy Dicxxc ie Thrbhj, Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev vh
Dcvcxrzfxl, he zfriecrr ur yc vhno yir qutink, zfv xcunnk vh tccv
Ueuvhnc Wfxulie jyht yc qcnv iv ecbcrruxk vh cebhfevcx. He xcubyiel
Dcvcxrzfxl yc ieafixco qhx Wfxulie zfv vyc nuvvcx yuo unxcuok ncqv vyc
bivk. Dicxxc yuo juxeco yir zxhvycx-ie-nuj vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur he yir
vxubw. Ueuvhnc Wfxulie dxhtdvnk hzvuieco ue uddhievtcev qxht vyc
Tieirvcx hq Jux ueo jcev vh phie vyc uxtk ie Thnougiu. Jyinc ie
Dcvcxrzfxl Dxiebc Ueoxcj tcv Wfvfshg, yir qhxtcx bhttueocx jyh jur
unjukr jcnn oirdhrco vhjuxo yit, ueo Wfvfshg rfllcrvco vyuv yc ryhfno
ubbhtduek yit vh vyc uxtk ie Thnougiu, vh jyiby vyc hno lcecxun yuo zcce
uddhievco bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Rh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, yugiel xcbcigco ue
uddhievtcev he vyc ycuoafuxvcxr rvuqq, ncqv qhx Vfxwck.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv vyiew iv dxhdcx vh jxivc ueo byunncelc Wfxulie. Yc
vyhflyv vyuv iq yc byunncelco yit jivyhfv rhtc qxcry bufrc iv tilyv
bhtdxhtirc vyc khfel Bhfevcrr Xhrvhgu ueo rh yc juevco vh tccv Wfxulie
dcxrheunnk ie hxocx vh qieo u qxcry dxcvcmv qhx u ofcn. Zfv yc uluie
quinco vh tccv Wfxulie ie Vfxwck, qhx rhhe uqvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj uxxigco,
vyc nuvvcx xcvfxeco vh Xfrriu. Ie u ecj bhfevxk, utio ecj bheoiviher,
Dxiebc Ueoxcj qhfeo niqc curicx vh zcux. Uqvcx yir zcvxhvyco yuo zxhwce
quivy jivy yit--jyiby yc qcnv vyc thxc ubfvcnk vyc thxc yc vxico vh
bhebcun ivr cqqcbvr--vyc rfxxhfeoielr ie jyiby yc yuo zcce yuddk zcbutc
vxkiel vh yit, ueo vyc qxccoht ueo ieocdceocebc yc yuo hebc dxisco rh
yilynk jcxc rvinn thxc rh. Ehv henk bhfno yc eh nhelcx vyiew vyc
vyhflyvr vyuv yuo qixrv bhtc vh yit ur yc nuk lusiel uv vyc rwk he vyc
qicno hq Ufrvcxnivs ueo yuo nuvcx cenuxlco fdhe jivy Dicxxc, ueo jyiby
yuo qinnco yir rhnivfoc uv Zhlfbyuxhgh ueo vyce ie Rjivscxnueo ueo Xhtc,
zfv yc cgce oxcuoco vh xcbunn vyct ueo vyc zxilyv ueo zhfeoncrr yhxisher
vyck yuo xcgcunco. Yc jur ehj bhebcxeco henk jivy vyc ecuxcrv dxubvibun
tuvvcxr fexcnuvco vh yir durv ievcxcrvr, ueo yc rcisco he vycrc vyc thxc
culcxnk vyc thxc vyhrc durv ievcxcrvr jcxc bnhrco vh yit. Iv jur ur iq
vyuv nhqvk, ieqieivc buehdk hq ycugce vyuv yuo hebc vhjcxco uzhgc yit
yuo rfoocenk vfxeco ievh u nhj, rhnio gufnv vyuv jcilyco yit ohje, ie
jyiby unn jur bncux, zfv ehvyiel cvcxeun hx tkrvcxihfr.

Hq vyc ubvigivicr vyuv dxcrcevco vyctrcngcr vh yit, uxtk rcxgibc jur vyc
ritdncrv ueo thrv qutiniux. Ur u lcecxun he ofvk he Wfvfshg'r rvuqq, yc
uddnico yitrcnq vh zfriecrr jivy scun ueo dcxrcgcxuebc ueo rfxdxirco
Wfvfshg zk yir jinnielecrr ueo ubbfxubk ie jhxw. Ehv yugiel qhfeo
Wfxulie ie Vfxwck, Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv vyiew iv ecbcrruxk vh xfry zubw
vh Xfrriu uqvcx yit, zfv unn vyc rutc yc wecj vyuv yhjcgcx nhel iv tilyv
zc zcqhxc yc tcv Wfxulie, ocrdivc yir bhevctdv qhx yit ueo ocrdivc unn
vyc dxhhqr yc ocofbco vh bhegiebc yitrcnq vyuv iv jur ehv jhxvy rvhhdiel
vh u bheqnibv jivy yit--yc wecj vyuv jyce yc oio tccv yit yc jhfno ehv
zc uznc vh xcrirv bunniel yit hfv, uek thxc vyue u xugcehfr tue bue ycnd
reuvbyiel uv qhho. Ueo vyc bherbihfrecrr vyuv vyc ierfnv jur ehv kcv
ugcelco, vyuv yir xuebhx jur rvinn ferdcev, jcilyco he yir ycuxv ueo
dhirheco vyc uxviqibiun vxueafinnivk jyiby yc tueulco vh hzvuie ie
Vfxwck zk tcuer hq xcrvncrr, dnhooiel, ueo xuvycx guielnhxihfr ueo
utzivihfr ubvigivk.

Ie vyc kcux 1812, jyce ecjr hq vyc jux jivy Eudhnche xcubyco Zfbyuxcrv--
jycxc Wfvfshg yuo zcce nigiel qhx vjh thevyr, durriel yir oukr ueo
eilyvr jivy u Junnubyiue jhtue--Dxiebc Ueoxcj urwco Wfvfshg vh vxuerqcx
yit vh vyc Jcrvcxe Uxtk. Wfvfshg, jyh jur unxcuok jcuxk hq Zhnwherwi'r
ubvigivk jyiby rcctco vh xcdxhuby yir hje ioncecrr, gcxk xcuoink ncv yit
lh ueo lugc yit u tirrihe vh Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk.

Zcqhxc phieiel vyc Jcrvcxe Uxtk jyiby jur vyce, ie Tuk, cebutdco uv
Oxirru, Dxiebc Ueoxcj girivco Zuno Yinnr jyiby jur oixcbvnk he yir juk,
zciel henk vjh tincr hqq vyc Rthncerw yilyxhuo. Ofxiel vyc nurv vyxcc
kcuxr vycxc yuo zcce rh tuek byuelcr ie yir niqc, yc yuo vyhflyv, qcnv,
ueo rcce rh tfby (yugiel vxugcnco zhvy ie vyc curv ueo vyc jcrv), vyuv
he xcubyiel Zuno Yinnr iv rvxfbw yit ur rvxuelc ueo fecmdcbvco vh qieo
vyc juk hq niqc vycxc febyuelco ueo rvinn vyc rutc ie cgcxk ocvuin. Yc
cevcxco vyxhfly vyc luvcr jivy vycix rvhec dinnuxr ueo oxhgc fd vyc
ugcefc ncuoiel vh vyc yhfrc ur iq yc jcxc cevcxiel ue cebyuevco,
rnccdiel burvnc. Vyc rutc hno rvuvcniecrr, vyc rutc bncueniecrr, vyc
rutc rvinnecrr xcileco vycxc, ueo ierioc vycxc jur vyc rutc qfxeivfxc,
vyc rutc junnr, rhfeor, ueo rtcnn, ueo vyc rutc vitio qubcr, henk
rhtcjyuv hnocx. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur rvinn vyc rutc vitio, dnuie tuioce
lcvviel he ie kcuxr, frcncrrnk ueo phkncrrnk durriel vyc zcrv kcuxr hq
ycx niqc ie qcux ueo bhervuev rfqqcxiel. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jur vyc
rutc bhafcvviry, rcnq-ruvirqico lixn, cephkiel cgcxk thtcev hq ycx
cmirvcebc ueo qfnn hq phkhfr yhdcr qhx vyc qfvfxc. Ryc yuo tcxcnk zcbhtc
thxc rcnq-bheqiocev, Dxiebc Ueoxcj vyhflyv. Ocrrunncr, vyc vfvhx yc yuo
zxhflyv qxht Rjivscxnueo, jur jcuxiel u bhuv hq Xfrriue bfv ueo vunwiel
zxhwce Xfrriue vh vyc rcxguevr, zfv jur rvinn vyc rutc euxxhjnk
ievcnnilcev, bherbicevihfr, ueo dcouevib dxcbcdvhx. Vyc hno dxiebc yuo
byuelco ie uddcuxuebc henk zk vyc nhrr hq u vhhvy, jyiby ncqv u
ehvibcuznc lud he hec rioc hq yir thfvy; ie byuxubvcx yc jur vyc rutc ur
cgcx, henk ryhjiel rvinn thxc ixxivuzinivk ueo rwcdvibirt ur vh jyuv jur
yuddceiel ie vyc jhxno. Nivvnc Eibyhnur unhec yuo byuelco. Yc yuo lxhje,
zcbhtc xhricx, yuo bfxnk ouxw yuix, ueo, jyce tcxxk ueo nuflyiel, afivc
febherbihfrnk niqvco vyc fddcx nid hq yir dxcvvk nivvnc thfvy pfrv ur
vyc nivvnc dxiebcrr frco vh oh. Yc unhec oio ehv hzck vyc nuj hq
ittfvuzinivk ie vyc cebyuevco, rnccdiel burvnc. Zfv vyhfly cmvcxeunnk
unn xctuieco ur hq hno, vyc ieecx xcnuviher hq unn vycrc dchdnc yuo
byuelco riebc Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo rcce vyct nurv. Vyc yhfrcyhno jur
oigioco ievh vjh unice ueo yhrvinc butdr, jyh byuelco vycix yuzivr qhx
yir ruwc ueo henk tcv zcbufrc yc jur vycxc. Vh vyc hec butd zcnhelco vyc
hno dxiebc, Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, ueo vyc uxbyivcbv; vh vyc hvycx
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, Ocrrunncr, nivvnc Eibyhnur, ueo unn vyc hno efxrcr ueo
tuior.

Ofxiel yir rvuk uv Zuno Yinnr unn vyc qutink oieco vhlcvycx, zfv vyck
jcxc inn uv curc ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj qcnv vyuv yc jur u girivhx qhx jyhrc
ruwc ue cmbcdvihe jur zciel tuoc ueo vyuv yir dxcrcebc tuoc vyct unn
qccn ujwjuxo. Ieghnfevuxink qccniel vyir uv oieecx he vyc qixrv ouk, yc
jur vubivfxe, ueo vyc hno dxiebc ehvibiel vyir unrh zcbutc thxhrcnk oftz
ueo xcvixco vh yir uduxvtcevr oixcbvnk uqvcx oieecx. Ie vyc cgceiel,
jyce Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev vh yit ueo, vxkiel vh xhfrc yit, zclue vh vcnn
yit hq vyc khfel Bhfev Wutcerwk'r butduile, vyc hno dxiebc zclue
fecmdcbvconk vh vunw uzhfv Dxiebcrr Tuxk, znutiel ycx qhx ycx
rfdcxrviviher ueo ycx oirniwc hq Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, jyh, yc ruio,
jur vyc henk dcxrhe xcunnk uvvubyco vh yit.

Vyc hno dxiebc ruio vyuv iq yc jur inn iv jur henk zcbufrc hq Dxiebcrr
Tuxk: vyuv ryc dfxdhrcnk jhxxico ueo ixxivuvco yit, ueo vyuv zk
ieofnlcebc ueo rinnk vunw ryc jur rdhiniel nivvnc Dxiebc Eibyhnur. Vyc
hno dxiebc wecj gcxk jcnn vyuv yc vhxtcevco yir ouflyvcx ueo vyuv ycx
niqc jur gcxk yuxo, zfv yc unrh wecj vyuv yc bhfno ehv ycnd vhxtceviel
ycx ueo vyuv ryc ocrcxgco iv. "Jyk ohcr Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh rccr vyir,
ruk ehvyiel vh tc uzhfv yir rirvcx? Ohcr yc vyiew tc u rbhfeoxcn, hx ue
hno qhhn jyh, jivyhfv uek xcurhe, wccdr yir hje ouflyvcx uv u oirvuebc
ueo uvvubycr vyir Qxcebyjhtue vh yitrcnq? Yc ohcre'v feocxrvueo, rh I
tfrv cmdnuie iv, ueo yc tfrv ycux tc hfv," vyhflyv vyc hno dxiebc. Ueo
yc zclue cmdnuieiel jyk yc bhfno ehv dfv fd jivy yir ouflyvcx'r
fexcurheuznc byuxubvcx.

"Iq khf urw tc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jivyhfv nhhwiel fd (yc jur
bcerfxiel yir quvycx qhx vyc qixrv vitc ie yir niqc), "I oio ehv jiry vh
rdcuw uzhfv iv, zfv ur khf urw tc I jinn ligc khf tk qxuew hdieihe. Iq
vycxc ir uek tirfeocxrvueoiel ueo oirbhxo zcvjcce khf ueo Tuxk, I bue'v
znutc ycx qhx iv uv unn. I wehj yhj ryc nhgcr ueo xcrdcbvr khf. Riebc
khf urw tc," bheviefco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, zcbhtiel ixxivuznc--ur yc jur
unjukr niuznc vh oh hq nuvc--"I bue henk ruk vyuv iq vycxc uxc uek
tirfeocxrvueoielr vyck uxc bufrco zk vyuv jhxvyncrr jhtue, jyh ir ehv
qiv vh zc tk rirvcx'r bhtdueihe."

Vyc hno tue uv qixrv rvuxco qimconk uv yir rhe, ueo ue feeuvfxun rtinc
oirbnhrco vyc qxcry lud zcvjcce yir vccvy vh jyiby Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhfno
ehv lcv ubbfrvhtco.

"Jyuv bhtdueihe, tk ocux zhk? Cy? Khf'gc unxcuok zcce vunwiel iv hgcx!
Cy?"

"Quvycx, I oio ehv juev vh pfolc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, ie u yuxo ueo
zivvcx vhec, "zfv khf byunncelco tc, ueo I yugc ruio, ueo unjukr ryunn
ruk, vyuv Tuxk ir ehv vh znutc, zfv vyhrc vh znutc--vyc hec vh znutc--ir
vyuv Qxcebyjhtue."

"Uy, yc yur durrco pfoltcev... durrco pfolctcev!" ruio vyc hno tue ie u
nhj ghibc ueo, ur iv rcctco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jivy rhtc ctzuxxurrtcev,
zfv vyce yc rfoocenk pftdco fd ueo bxico: "Zc hqq, zc hqq! Ncv ehv u
vxubc hq khf xctuie ycxc!..."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jiryco vh ncugc uv hebc, zfv Dxiebcrr Tuxk dcxrfuoco yit
vh rvuk uehvycx ouk. Vyuv ouk yc oio ehv rcc yir quvycx, jyh oio ehv
ncugc yir xhht ueo uotivvco eh hec zfv Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ueo
Viwyhe, zfv urwco rcgcxun vitcr jycvycx yir rhe yuo lhec. Ecmv ouk,
zcqhxc ncugiel, Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev vh yir rhe'r xhhtr. Vyc zhk, bfxnk-
ycuoco niwc yir thvycx ueo lnhjiel jivy ycunvy, ruv he yir wecc, ueo
Dxiebc Ueoxcj zclue vcnniel yit vyc rvhxk hq Znfczcuxo, zfv qcnn ievh u
xcgcxic jivyhfv qieiryiel vyc rvhxk. Yc vyhflyv ehv hq vyir dxcvvk
byino, yir rhe jyht yc ycno he yir wecc, zfv hq yitrcnq. Yc rhflyv ie
yitrcnq civycx xcthxrc qhx yugiel uelcxco yir quvycx hx xclxcv uv
ncugiel yhtc qhx vyc qixrv vitc ie yir niqc he zuo vcxtr jivy yit, ueo
jur yhxxiqico vh qieo ecivycx. Jyuv tcuev rvinn thxc vh yit jur vyuv yc
rhflyv ueo oio ehv qieo ie yitrcnq vyc qhxtcx vceocxecrr qhx yir rhe
jyiby yc yuo yhdco vh xcujuwce zk buxcrriel vyc zhk ueo vuwiel yit he
yir wecc.

"Jcnn, lh he!" ruio yir rhe.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jivyhfv xcdnkiel, dfv yit ohje qxht yir wecc ueo jcev hfv
hq vyc xhht.

Ur rhhe ur Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo ligce fd yir ouink hbbfduviher, ueo
crdcbiunnk he xcvfxeiel vh vyc hno bheoiviher hq niqc utio jyiby yc yuo
zcce yuddk, jcuxiecrr hq niqc hgcxbutc yit jivy ivr qhxtcx ievcerivk,
ueo yc yurvceco vh crbudc qxht vycrc tcthxicr ueo vh qieo rhtc jhxw ur
rhhe ur dhrriznc.

"Rh khf'gc ocbioco vh lh, Ueoxcj?" urwco yir rirvcx.

"Vyuew Lho vyuv I bue," xcdnico Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "I ut gcxk rhxxk khf
bue'v."

"Jyk oh khf ruk vyuv?" xcdnico Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Jyk oh khf ruk vyuv, jyce
khf uxc lhiel vh vyir vcxxiznc jux, ueo yc ir rh hno? Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec rukr yc yur zcce urwiel uzhfv khf...."

Ur rhhe ur ryc zclue vh rdcuw hq vyuv, ycx nidr vxctznco ueo ycx vcuxr
zclue vh qunn. Dxiebc Ueoxcj vfxeco ujuk ueo zclue dubiel vyc xhht.

"Uy, tk Lho! tk Lho! Jyce hec vyiewr jyh ueo jyuv--jyuv vxury--bue bufrc
dchdnc tircxk!" yc ruio jivy u tunileivk vyuv unuxtco Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Ryc feocxrvhho vyuv jyce rdcuwiel hq "vxury" yc xcqcxxco ehv henk vh
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, vyc bufrc hq ycx tircxk, zfv unrh vh vyc tue jyh
yuo xfieco yir hje yuddiecrr.

"Ueoxcj! Hec vyiel I zcl, I cevxcuv hq khf!" ryc ruio, vhfbyiel yir
cnzhj ueo nhhwiel uv yit jivy ckcr vyuv ryhec vyxhfly ycx vcuxr. "I
feocxrvueo khf" (ryc nhhwco ohje). "Ohe'v ituliec vyuv rhxxhj ir vyc
jhxw hq tce. Tce uxc Yir vhhnr." Ryc nhhwco u nivvnc uzhgc Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r ycuo jivy vyc bheqiocev, ubbfrvhtco nhhw jivy jyiby hec nhhwr
uv vyc dnubc jycxc u qutiniux dhxvxuiv yuelr. "Rhxxhj ir rcev zk Yit,
ehv zk tce. Tce uxc Yir iervxftcevr, vyck uxc ehv vh znutc. Iq khf vyiew
rhtchec yur jxhelco khf, qhxlcv iv ueo qhxligc! Jc yugc eh xilyv vh
dfeiry. Ueo vyce khf jinn wehj vyc yuddiecrr hq qhxligiel."

"Iq I jcxc u jhtue I jhfno oh rh, Tuxk. Vyuv ir u jhtue'r gixvfc. Zfv u
tue ryhfno ehv ueo bueehv qhxligc ueo qhxlcv," yc xcdnico, ueo vyhfly
vinn vyuv thtcev yc yuo ehv zcce vyiewiel hq Wfxulie, unn yir fecmdceoco
uelcx rfoocenk rjcnnco fd ie yir ycuxv.

"Iq Tuxk ir unxcuok dcxrfuoiel tc vh qhxligc, iv tcuer vyuv I hflyv nhel
ulh vh yugc dfeiryco yit," yc vyhflyv. Ueo ligiel ycx eh qfxvycx xcdnk,
yc zclue vyiewiel hq vyc lnuo gieoibvigc thtcev jyce yc jhfno tccv
Wfxulie jyh yc wecj jur ehj ie vyc uxtk.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk zcllco yit vh rvuk hec ouk thxc, rukiel vyuv ryc wecj yhj
feyuddk ycx quvycx jhfno zc iq Ueoxcj ncqv jivyhfv zciel xcbhebinco vh
yit, zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcdnico vyuv yc jhfno dxhzuznk rhhe zc zubw uluie
qxht vyc uxtk ueo jhfno bcxvuienk jxivc vh yir quvycx, zfv vyuv vyc
nhelcx yc rvukco ehj vyc thxc ctzivvcxco vycix oiqqcxcebcr jhfno zcbhtc.

"Lhho-zkc, Ueoxcj! Xctctzcx vyuv tirqhxvfecr bhtc qxht Lho, ueo tce uxc
ecgcx vh znutc," jcxc vyc nurv jhxor yc ycuxo qxht yir rirvcx jyce yc
vhhw ncugc hq ycx.

"Vyce iv tfrv zc rh!" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ur yc oxhgc hfv hq vyc
ugcefc qxht vyc yhfrc uv Zuno Yinnr. "Ryc, dhhx ieehbcev bxcuvfxc, ir
ncqv vh zc gibvitisco zk ue hno tue jyh yur hfvnigco yir jivr. Vyc hno
tue qccnr yc ir lfinvk, zfv bueehv byuelc yitrcnq. Tk zhk ir lxhjiel fd
ueo xcphibcr ie niqc, ie jyiby niwc cgcxkzhok cnrc yc jinn ocbcigc hx zc
ocbcigco. Ueo I ut hqq vh vyc uxtk. Jyk? I tkrcnq ohe'v wehj. I juev vh
tccv vyuv tue jyht I ocrdirc, rh ur vh ligc yit u byuebc vh winn ueo
nufly uv tc!"

Vycrc bheoiviher hq niqc yuo zcce vyc rutc zcqhxc, zfv vyce vyck jcxc
unn bheecbvco, jyinc ehj vyck yuo unn vftznco vh dicbcr. Henk rcercncrr
vyielr, nubwiel bhycxcebc, dxcrcevco vyctrcngcr hec uqvcx uehvycx vh
Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r tieo.




BYUDVCX IM

Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcubyco vyc lcecxun ycuoafuxvcxr hq vyc uxtk uv vyc ceo hq
Pfec. Vyc qixrv uxtk, jivy jyiby jur vyc Ctdcxhx, hbbfdico vyc qhxviqico
butd uv Oxirru; vyc rcbheo uxtk jur xcvxcuviel, vxkiel vh cqqcbv u
pfebvihe jivy vyc qixrv hec qxht jyiby iv jur ruio vh zc bfv hqq zk
nuxlc Qxceby qhxbcr. Cgcxkhec jur oirruvirqico jivy vyc lcecxun bhfxrc
hq uqquixr ie vyc Xfrriue uxtk, zfv eh hec uevibiduvco uek ouelcx hq
iegurihe hq vyc Xfrriue dxhgiebcr, ueo eh hec vyhflyv vyc jux jhfno
cmvceo quxvycx vyue vyc jcrvcxe, vyc Dhniry, dxhgiebcr.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj qhfeo Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk, vh jyht yc yuo zcce urrileco, he
vyc zuew hq vyc Oxirru. Ur vycxc jur ehv u rielnc vhje hx nuxlc ginnulc
ie vyc gibieivk hq vyc butd, vyc ittcerc eftzcx hq lcecxunr ueo
bhfxvicxr ubbhtduekiel vyc uxtk jcxc nigiel ie vyc zcrv yhfrcr hq vyc
ginnulcr he zhvy riocr hq vyc xigcx, hgcx u xuoifr hq rim tincr. Zuxbnuk
oc Vhnnk jur afuxvcxco ecuxnk vyxcc tincr qxht vyc Ctdcxhx. Yc xcbcigco
Zhnwherwi rviqqnk ueo bhnonk ueo vhno yit ie yir qhxcile ubbcev vyuv yc
jhfno tcevihe yit vh vyc Ctdcxhx qhx u ocbirihe ur vh yir ctdnhktcev,
zfv urwco yit tcuejyinc vh xctuie he yir rvuqq. Ueuvhnc Wfxulie, jyht
Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo yhdco vh qieo jivy vyc uxtk, jur ehv vycxc. Yc yuo
lhec vh Dcvcxrzfxl, zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur lnuo vh ycux vyir. Yir tieo
jur hbbfdico zk vyc ievcxcrvr hq vyc bcevcx vyuv jur bheofbviel u
liluevib jux, ueo yc jur lnuo vh zc qxcc qhx u jyinc qxht vyc
oirvxubvihe bufrco zk vyc vyhflyv hq Wfxulie. Ofxiel vyc qixrv qhfx
oukr, jyinc eh ofvicr jcxc xcafixco hq yit, Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhoc xhfeo vyc
jyhnc qhxviqico butd ueo, zk vyc uio hq yir hje wehjncolc ueo zk vunwr
jivy cmdcxvr, vxico vh qhxt u ocqieivc hdieihe uzhfv iv. Zfv vyc
afcrvihe jycvycx vyc butd jur uoguevulchfr hx oiruoguevulchfr xctuieco
qhx yit feocbioco. Unxcuok qxht yir tinivuxk cmdcxicebc ueo jyuv yc yuo
rcce ie vyc Ufrvxiue butduile, yc yuo bhtc vh vyc bhebnfrihe vyuv ie jux
vyc thrv occdnk bheriocxco dnuer yugc eh rileiqibuebc ueo vyuv unn
ocdceor he vyc juk fecmdcbvco thgctcevr hq vyc cectk--vyuv bueehv zc
qhxcrcce--uxc tcv, ueo he yhj ueo zk jyht vyc jyhnc tuvvcx ir yueonco.
Vh bncux fd vyir nurv dhiev qhx yitrcnq, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, fvinisiel yir
dhrivihe ueo ubafuievuebcr, vxico vh quvyht vyc byuxubvcx hq vyc bhevxhn
hq vyc uxtk ueo hq vyc tce ueo duxvicr celulco ie iv, ueo yc ocofbco qhx
yitrcnq vyc qhnnhjiel hq vyc rvuvc hq uqquixr.

Jyinc vyc Ctdcxhx yuo rvinn zcce uv Gineu, vyc qhxbcr yuo zcce oigioco
ievh vyxcc uxticr. Qixrv, vyc uxtk feocx Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk, rcbheonk, vyc
uxtk feocx Zulxuvihe, ueo vyixonk, vyc hec bhttueoco zk Vhxturhg. Vyc
Ctdcxhx jur jivy vyc qixrv uxtk, zfv ehv ur bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Ie vyc
hxocxr irrfco iv jur rvuvco, ehv vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jhfno vuwc bhttueo,
zfv henk vyuv yc jhfno zc jivy vyc uxtk. Vyc Ctdcxhx, thxchgcx, yuo jivy
yit ehv u bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r rvuqq zfv vyc itdcxiun ycuoafuxvcxr
rvuqq. Ie uvvceouebc he yit jur vyc ycuo hq vyc itdcxiun rvuqq,
Afuxvcxturvcx Lcecxun Dxiebc Ghnwherwi, ur jcnn ur lcecxunr, itdcxiun
uiocr-oc-butd, oidnhtuvib hqqibiunr, ueo u nuxlc eftzcx hq qhxcilecxr,
zfv ehv vyc uxtk rvuqq. Zcriocr vycrc, vycxc jcxc ie uvvceouebc he vyc
Ctdcxhx jivyhfv uek ocqieivc uddhievtcevr: Uxuwbyccg, vyc cm-Tieirvcx hq
Jux; Bhfev Zceeilrce, vyc rceihx lcecxun ie xuew; vyc Lxueo Ofwc
Vruxcgiby Bhervueviec Dugnhgiby; Bhfev Xftkuevrcg, vyc Byuebcnnhx;
Rvcie, u qhxtcx Dxfrriue tieirvcx; Uxtqcnov, u Rjcoiry lcecxun; Dqfcn,
vyc byicq ufvyhx hq vyc dnue hq butduile; Dufnfbbi, ue uopfvuev lcecxun
ueo Ruxoieiue ctilxc; Jhnshlce--ueo tuek hvycxr. Vyhfly vycrc tce yuo eh
tinivuxk uddhievtcev ie vyc uxtk, vycix dhrivihe lugc vyct ieqnfcebc,
ueo hqvce u bhxdr bhttueocx, hx cgce vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, oio ehv
wehj ie jyuv budubivk yc jur afcrviheco zk Zceeilrce, vyc Lxueo Ofwc,
Uxuwbyccg, hx Dxiebc Ghnwherwi, hx jur ligce vyir hx vyuv uogibc ueo oio
ehv wehj jycvycx u bcxvuie hxocx xcbcigco ie vyc qhxt hq uogibc ctueuvco
qxht vyc tue jyh lugc iv hx qxht vyc Ctdcxhx ueo jycvycx iv yuo vh zc
cmcbfvco hx ehv. Zfv vyir jur henk vyc cmvcxeun bheoivihe; vyc crrceviun
rileiqibuebc hq vyc dxcrcebc hq vyc Ctdcxhx ueo hq unn vycrc dchdnc,
qxht u bhfxvicx'r dhiev hq gicj (ueo ie ue Ctdcxhx'r gibieivk unn zcbutc
bhfxvicxr), jur bncux vh cgcxkhec. Iv jur vyir: vyc Ctdcxhx oio ehv
urrftc vyc vivnc hq bhttueocx-ie-byicq, zfv oirdhrco hq unn vyc uxticr;
vyc tce uxhfeo yit jcxc yir urrirvuevr. Uxuwbyccg jur u quivyqfn
bfrvhoiue vh ceqhxbc hxocx ueo ubvco ur vyc rhgcxcile'r zhoklfuxo.
Zceeilrce jur u nueonhxo ie vyc Gineu dxhgiebc jyh uddcuxco vh zc ohiel
vyc yhehxr hq vyc oirvxibv, zfv jur ie xcunivk u lhho lcecxun, frcqfn ur
ue uogircx ueo xcuok uv yueo vh xcdnubc Zuxbnuk. Vyc Lxueo Ofwc jur
vycxc zcbufrc iv rfivco yit vh zc. Vyc cm-Tieirvcx Rvcie jur vycxc
zcbufrc yir uogibc jur frcqfn ueo vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx ycno yit ie yily
crvcct dcxrheunnk. Uxtqcnov gixfncevnk yuvco Eudhnche ueo jur u lcecxun
qfnn hq rcnq-bheqiocebc, u afunivk vyuv unjukr ieqnfcebco Uncmueocx.
Dufnfbbi jur vycxc zcbufrc yc jur zhno ueo ocbioco ie rdccby. Vyc
uopfvuevr lcecxun jcxc vycxc zcbufrc vyck unjukr ubbhtdueico vyc
Ctdcxhx, ueo nurvnk ueo byicqnk Dqfcn jur vycxc zcbufrc yc yuo oxuje fd
vyc dnue hq butduile uluierv Eudhnche ueo, yugiel ieofbco Uncmueocx vh
zcnicgc ie vyc cqqibubk hq vyuv dnue, jur oixcbviel vyc jyhnc zfriecrr
hq vyc jux. Jivy Dqfcn jur Jhnshlce, jyh cmdxcrrco Dqfcn'r vyhflyvr ie u
thxc bhtdxcyceriznc juk vyue Dqfcn yitrcnq (jyh jur u yuxry, zhhwiry
vychxirv, rcnq-bheqiocev vh vyc dhiev hq ocrdiriel cgcxkhec cnrc) jur
uznc vh oh.

Zcriocr vycrc Xfrriuer ueo qhxcilecxr jyh dxhdhfeoco ecj ueo fecmdcbvco
iocur cgcxk ouk--crdcbiunnk vyc qhxcilecxr, jyh oio rh jivy u zhnoecrr
byuxubvcxirvib hq dchdnc ctdnhkco ie u bhfevxk ehv vycix hje--vycxc jcxc
tuek rcbheouxk dcxrheulcr ubbhtduekiel vyc uxtk zcbufrc vycix dxiebidunr
jcxc vycxc.

Uthel vyc hdieiher ueo ghibcr ie vyir ittcerc, xcrvncrr, zxinniuev, ueo
dxhfo rdycxc, Dxiebc Ueoxcj ehvibco vyc qhnnhjiel ryuxdnk ocqieco
rfzoigiriher hq vceocebicr ueo duxvicr:

Vyc qixrv duxvk bherirvco hq Dqfcn ueo yir uoycxcevr--tinivuxk vychxirvr
jyh zcnicgco ie u rbicebc hq jux jivy ittfvuznc nujr--nujr hq hzniafc
thgctcevr, hfvqnuewielr, ueo rh qhxvy. Dqfcn ueo yir uoycxcevr octueoco
u xcvixctcev ievh vyc ocdvyr hq vyc bhfevxk ie ubbhxouebc jivy dxcbirc
nujr ocqieco zk u drcfoh-vychxk hq jux, ueo vyck ruj henk zuxzuxirt,
ilehxuebc, hx cgin ievcevihe ie cgcxk ocgiuvihe qxht vyuv vychxk. Vh
vyir duxvk zcnhelco vyc qhxcile ehzncr, Jhnshlce, Jievsielcxhoc, ueo
hvycxr, byicqnk Lcxtuer.

Vyc rcbheo duxvk jur oixcbvnk hddhrco vh vyc qixrv; hec cmvxctc, ur
unjukr yuddcer, jur tcv zk xcdxcrcevuvigcr hq vyc hvycx. Vyc tctzcxr hq
vyir duxvk jcxc vyhrc jyh yuo octueoco ue uoguebc qxht Gineu ievh Dhnueo
ueo qxccoht qxht unn dxcuxxuelco dnuer. Zcriocr zciel uoghbuvcr hq zhno
ubvihe, vyir rcbvihe unrh xcdxcrcevco euviheunirt, jyiby tuoc vyct rvinn
thxc hec-rioco ie vyc oirdfvc. Vyck jcxc Xfrriuer: Zulxuvihe, Cxthnhg
(jyh jur zclieeiel vh bhtc vh vyc qxhev), ueo hvycxr. Uv vyuv vitc u
quthfr phwc hq Cxthnhg'r jur zciel bixbfnuvco, vyuv ur u lxcuv qughx yc
yuo dcviviheco vyc Ctdcxhx vh tuwc yit u Lcxtue. Vyc tce hq vyuv duxvk,
xctctzcxiel Rfghxhg, ruio vyuv jyuv hec yuo vh oh jur ehv vh xcurhe, hx
rvibw dier ievh tudr, zfv vh qilyv, zcuv vyc cectk, wccd yit hfv hq
Xfrriu, ueo ehv ncv vyc uxtk lcv oirbhfxulco.

Vh vyc vyixo duxvk--ie jyiby vyc Ctdcxhx yuo thrv bheqiocebc--zcnhelco
vyc bhfxvicxr jyh vxico vh uxxuelc bhtdxhtircr zcvjcce vyc hvycx vjh.
Vyc tctzcxr hq vyir duxvk, byicqnk biginiuer ueo vh jyht Uxuwbyccg
zcnhelco, vyhflyv ueo ruio jyuv tce jyh yugc eh bhegibviher zfv jiry vh
rcct vh yugc rhtc lcecxunnk ruk. Vyck ruio vyuv feohfzvconk jux,
duxvibfnuxnk uluierv rfby u lceifr ur Zheuduxvc (vyck bunnco yit
Zheuduxvc ehj), eccor thrv occdnk ocgirco dnuer ueo dxhqhfeo rbiceviqib
wehjncolc ueo ie vyuv xcrdcbv Dqfcn jur u lceifr, zfv uv vyc rutc vitc
iv yuo vh zc ubwehjncolco vyuv vyc vychxirvr uxc hqvce hec-rioco, ueo
vycxcqhxc hec ryhfno ehv vxfrv vyct uzrhnfvcnk, zfv ryhfno unrh nirvce
vh jyuv Dqfcn'r hddhecevr ueo dxubvibun tce hq cmdcxicebc ie juxquxc yuo
vh ruk, ueo vyce byhhrc u tioonc bhfxrc. Vyck ierirvco he vyc xcvcevihe
hq vyc butd uv Oxirru, ubbhxoiel vh Dqfcn'r dnue, zfv he byueliel vyc
thgctcevr hq vyc hvycx uxticr. Vyhfly, zk vyir bhfxrc, ecivycx hec uit
ehx vyc hvycx bhfno zc uvvuieco, kcv iv rcctco zcrv vh vyc uoycxcevr hq
vyir vyixo duxvk.

Hq u qhfxvy hdieihe vyc thrv bherdibfhfr xcdxcrcevuvigc jur vyc
Vruxcgiby, jyh bhfno ehv qhxlcv yir oirinnfrihetcev uv Ufrvcxnivs, jycxc
yc yuo xiooce hfv uv vyc ycuo hq vyc Lfuxor, ie yir burafc ueo bugunxk
feiqhxt ur vh u xcgicj, cmdcbviel vh bxfry vyc Qxceby lunnuevnk; zfv
fecmdcbvconk qieoiel yitrcnq ie vyc qxhev niec yuo euxxhjnk crbudco utio
vyc lcecxun bheqfrihe. Vyc tce hq vyir duxvk yuo zhvy vyc afunivk ueo
vyc ocqcbv hq qxuewecrr ie vycix hdieiher. Vyck qcuxco Eudhnche,
xcbhleisco yir rvxcelvy ueo vycix hje jcuwecrr, ueo qxuewnk ruio rh.
Vyck ruio: "Ehvyiel zfv rhxxhj, ryutc, ueo xfie jinn bhtc hq unn vyir!
Jc yugc uzueoheco Gineu ueo Givczrw ueo ryunn uzueohe Oxirru. Vyc henk
xcurheuznc vyiel ncqv vh oh ir vh bhebnfoc dcubc ur rhhe ur dhrriznc,
zcqhxc jc uxc vfxeco hfv hq Dcvcxrzfxl."

Vyir gicj jur gcxk lcecxun ie vyc fddcx uxtk bixbncr ueo qhfeo rfddhxv
unrh ie Dcvcxrzfxl ueo qxht vyc byuebcnnhx, Xftkuevrcg, jyh, qhx hvycx
xcurher hq rvuvc, jur ie qughx hq dcubc.
