Vyc qiqvy duxvk bherirvco hq vyhrc jyh jcxc uoycxcevr hq Zuxbnuk oc
Vhnnk, ehv rh tfby ur u tue zfv ur tieirvcx hq jux ueo bhttueocx-ie-
byicq. "Zc yc jyuv yc tuk" (vyck unjukr zclue niwc vyuv), "yc ir ue
yhecrv, dxubvibun tue ueo jc yugc ehzhok zcvvcx. Ligc yit xcun dhjcx,
qhx jux bueehv zc bheofbvco rfbbcrrqfnnk jivyhfv feivk hq bhttueo, ueo
yc jinn ryhj jyuv yc bue oh, ur yc oio ie Qienueo. Iq hfx uxtk ir jcnn
hxlueisco ueo rvxhel ueo yur jivyoxuje vh Oxirru jivyhfv rfqqcxiel uek
ocqcuvr, jc hjc vyir cevixcnk vh Zuxbnuk. Iq Zuxbnuk ir ehj vh zc
rfdcxrcoco zk Zceeilrce unn jinn zc nhrv, qhx Zceeilrce ryhjco yir
iebudubivk unxcuok ie 1807."

Vyc rimvy duxvk, vyc Zceeilrceivcr, ruio, he vyc bhevxuxk, vyuv uv uek
xuvc vycxc jur eh hec thxc ubvigc ueo cmdcxicebco vyue Zceeilrce: "ueo
vjirv uzhfv ur khf tuk, khf jinn yugc vh bhtc vh Zceeilrce cgcevfunnk.
Ncv vyc hvycxr tuwc tirvuwcr ehj!" ruio vyck, uxlfiel vyuv hfx
xcvixctcev vh Oxirru jur u thrv ryutcqfn xcgcxrc ueo ue fezxhwce rcxicr
hq znfeocxr. "Vyc thxc tirvuwcr vyuv uxc tuoc vyc zcvvcx. Iv jinn uv uek
xuvc zc feocxrvhho unn vyc rhhecx vyuv vyielr bueehv lh he niwc vyir.
Jyuv ir juevco ir ehv rhtc Zuxbnuk hx hvycx, zfv u tue niwc Zceeilrce,
jyh tuoc yir tuxw ie 1807, ueo vh jyht Eudhnche yitrcnq oio pfrvibc--u
tue jyhrc ufvyhxivk jhfno zc jinnielnk xcbhleisco, ueo Zceeilrce ir vyc
henk rfby tue."

Vyc rcgcevy duxvk bherirvco hq vyc rhxv hq dchdnc jyh uxc unjukr vh zc
qhfeo, crdcbiunnk uxhfeo khfel rhgcxciler, ueo hq jyht vycxc jcxc
duxvibfnuxnk tuek xhfeo Uncmueocx--lcecxunr ueo itdcxiun uiocr-oc-butd
durriheuvcnk ocghvco vh vyc Ctdcxhx, ehv tcxcnk ur u theuxby zfv ur u
tue, uohxiel yit riebcxcnk ueo oirievcxcrvconk, ur Xhrvhg yuo ohec ie
1805, ueo jyh ruj ie yit ehv henk unn vyc gixvfcr zfv unn yftue
buduzinivicr ur jcnn. Vycrc tce, vyhfly cebyuevco jivy vyc rhgcxcile qhx
xcqfriel vyc bhttueo hq vyc uxtk, kcv znutco yit qhx rfby cmbcrrigc
thocrvk, ueo henk ocrixco ueo ierirvco vyuv vycix uohxco rhgcxcile
ryhfno uzueohe yir oiqqiocebc ueo hdcenk ueehfebc vyuv yc jhfno dnubc
yitrcnq uv vyc ycuo hq vyc uxtk, luvycx xhfeo yit u bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r
rvuqq, ueo, bherfnviel cmdcxicebco vychxcvibiuer ueo dxubvibun tce jycxc
ecbcrruxk, jhfno yitrcnq ncuo vyc vxhhdr, jyhrc rdixivr jhfno vycxczk zc
xuirco vh vyc yilycrv divby.

Vyc cilyvy ueo nuxlcrv lxhfd, jyiby ie ivr cehxthfr eftzcxr jur vh vyc
hvycxr ur eiecvk-eiec vh hec, bherirvco hq tce jyh ocrixco ecivycx dcubc
ehx jux, ecivycx ue uoguebc ehx u ocqcerigc butd uv vyc Oxirru hx
uekjycxc cnrc, ecivycx Zuxbnuk ehx vyc Ctdcxhx, ecivycx Dqfcn ehx
Zceeilrce, zfv henk vyc hec thrv crrceviun vyiel--ur tfby uoguevulc ueo
dncurfxc qhx vyctrcngcr ur dhrriznc. Ie vyc vxhfznco juvcxr hq
bheqnibviel ueo ievcxrcbviel ievxilfcr vyuv cooico uzhfv vyc Ctdcxhx'r
ycuoafuxvcxr, iv jur dhrriznc vh rfbbcco ie tuek jukr fevyiewuznc uv
hvycx vitcr. U tue jyh ritdnk jiryco vh xcvuie yir nfbxuvigc dhrv jhfno
vhouk ulxcc jivy Dqfcn, vhthxxhj jivy yir hddhecev, ueo vyc ouk uqvcx,
tcxcnk vh ughio xcrdherizinivk hx vh dncurc vyc Ctdcxhx, jhfno ocbnuxc
vyuv yc yuo eh hdieihe uv unn he vyc tuvvcx. Uehvycx jyh jiryco vh luie
rhtc uoguevulc jhfno uvvxubv vyc Ctdcxhx'r uvvcevihe zk nhfonk
uoghbuviel vyc gcxk vyiel vyc Ctdcxhx yuo yievco uv vyc ouk zcqhxc, ueo
jhfno oirdfvc ueo ryhfv uv vyc bhfebin, zcuviel yir zxcurv ueo
byunnceliel vyhrc jyh oio ehv ulxcc jivy yit vh ofcnr, vycxczk dxhgiel
vyuv yc jur dxcduxco vh rubxiqibc yitrcnq qhx vyc bhtthe lhho. U vyixo,
ie vyc uzrcebc hq hddhecevr, zcvjcce vjh bhfebinr jhfno ritdnk rhnibiv u
rdcbiun lxuvfivk qhx yir quivyqfn rcxgibcr, jcnn wehjiel vyuv uv vyuv
thtcev dchdnc jhfno zc vhh zfrk vh xcqfrc yit. U qhfxvy jyinc rcctielnk
hgcxjycntco jivy jhxw jhfno hqvce bhtc ubbiocevunnk feocx vyc Ctdcxhx'r
ckc. U qiqvy, vh ubyicgc yir nhel-bycxiryco uit hq oieiel jivy vyc
Ctdcxhx, jhfno rvfzzhxenk ierirv he vyc bhxxcbvecrr hx qunrivk hq rhtc
ecjnk ctcxliel hdieihe ueo qhx vyir hzpcbv jhfno dxhofbc uxlftcevr thxc
hx ncrr qhxbiznc ueo bhxxcbv.

Unn vyc tce hq vyir duxvk jcxc qiryiel qhx xfzncr, ocbhxuviher, ueo
dxhthviher, ueo ie vyir dfxrfiv juvbyco henk vyc jcuvycxbhbw hq itdcxiun
qughx, ueo oixcbvnk vyck ehvibco iv vfxeiel ie uek oixcbvihe, vyir jyhnc
oxhec dhdfnuvihe hq vyc uxtk zclue znhjiel yuxo vyuv juk, rh vyuv iv jur
unn vyc yuxocx qhx vyc Ctdcxhx vh vfxe iv cnrcjycxc. Utio vyc
febcxvuievicr hq vyc dhrivihe, jivy vyc tceubc hq rcxihfr ouelcx ligiel
u dcbfniuxnk vyxcuvceiel byuxubvcx vh cgcxkvyiel, utio vyir ghxvcm hq
ievxilfc, clhvirt, bheqnibv hq gicjr ueo qccnielr, ueo vyc oigcxrivk hq
xubc uthel vycrc dchdnc--vyir cilyvy ueo nuxlcrv duxvk hq vyhrc
dxchbbfdico jivy dcxrheun ievcxcrvr itduxvco lxcuv bheqfrihe ueo
hzrbfxivk vh vyc bhtthe vurw. Jyuvcgcx afcrvihe uxhrc, u rjuxt hq vycrc
oxhecr, jivyhfv yugiel qieiryco vycix zfssiel he u dxcgihfr vyctc, qncj
hgcx vh vyc ecj hec ueo zk vycix yft oxhjeco ueo hzrbfxco vyc ghibcr hq
vyhrc jyh jcxc oirdfviel yhecrvnk.

Qxht uthel unn vycrc duxvicr, pfrv uv vyc vitc Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcubyco vyc
uxtk, uehvycx, u eievy duxvk, jur zciel qhxtco ueo jur zclieeiel vh
xuirc ivr ghibc. Vyir jur vyc duxvk hq vyc cnocxr, xcurheuznc tce
cmdcxicebco ueo buduznc ie rvuvc uqquixr, jyh, jivyhfv ryuxiel uek hq
vyhrc bheqnibviel hdieiher, jcxc uznc vh vuwc u ocvubyco gicj hq jyuv
jur lhiel he uv vyc rvuqq uv ycuoafuxvcxr ueo vh bheriocx tcuer hq
crbudc qxht vyir tfoonc, ieocbirihe, ievxibubk, ueo jcuwecrr.

Vyc tce hq vyir duxvk ruio ueo vyhflyv vyuv jyuv jur jxhel xcrfnvco
byicqnk qxht vyc Ctdcxhx'r dxcrcebc ie vyc uxtk jivy yir tinivuxk bhfxv
ueo qxht vyc bhercafcev dxcrcebc vycxc hq ue ieocqieivc, bheoiviheun,
ueo fervcuok qnfbvfuvihe hq xcnuviher, jyiby ir ie dnubc uv bhfxv zfv
yuxtqfn ie ue uxtk; vyuv u rhgcxcile ryhfno xcile zfv ehv bhttueo vyc
uxtk, ueo vyuv vyc henk juk hfv hq vyc dhrivihe jhfno zc qhx vyc Ctdcxhx
ueo yir bhfxv vh ncugc vyc uxtk; vyuv vyc tcxc dxcrcebc hq vyc Ctdcxhx
duxunksco vyc ubvihe hq qiqvk vyhfrueo tce xcafixco vh rcbfxc yir
dcxrheun ruqcvk, ueo vyuv vyc jhxrv bhttueocx-ie-byicq, iq ieocdceocev,
jhfno zc zcvvcx vyue vyc gcxk zcrv hec vxuttcnco zk vyc dxcrcebc ueo
ufvyhxivk hq vyc theuxby.

Pfrv uv vyc vitc Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur nigiel fehbbfdico uv Oxirru,
Ryirywhg, vyc Rcbxcvuxk hq Rvuvc ueo hec hq vyc byicq xcdxcrcevuvigcr hq
vyir duxvk, jxhvc u ncvvcx vh vyc Ctdcxhx jyiby Uxuwbyccg ueo Zunurycg
ulxcco vh rile. Ie vyir ncvvcx, uguiniel yitrcnq hq dcxtirrihe ligce yit
zk vyc Ctdcxhx vh oirbfrr vyc lcecxun bhfxrc hq uqquixr, yc xcrdcbvqfnnk
rfllcrvco--he vyc dncu vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk qhx vyc rhgcxcile vh uxhfrc
u juxniwc rdixiv ie vyc dchdnc hq vyc budivun--vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx ryhfno
ncugc vyc uxtk.

Vyuv uxhfriel hq vyc dchdnc zk vycix rhgcxcile ueo yir bunn vh vyct vh
ocqceo vycix bhfevxk--vyc gcxk iebivctcev jyiby jur vyc byicq bufrc hq
Xfrriu'r vxiftdy ie rh qux ur iv jur dxhofbco zk vyc Vrux'r dcxrheun
dxcrcebc ie Thrbhj--jur rfllcrvco vh vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo ubbcdvco zk yit,
ur u dxcvcmv qhx afivviel vyc uxtk.




BYUDVCX M

Vyir ncvvcx yuo ehv kcv zcce dxcrcevco vh vyc Ctdcxhx jyce Zuxbnuk, hec
ouk uv oieecx, ieqhxtco Zhnwherwi vyuv vyc rhgcxcile jiryco vh rcc yit
dcxrheunnk, vh afcrvihe yit uzhfv Vfxwck, ueo vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur vh
dxcrcev yitrcnq uv Zceeilrce'r afuxvcxr uv rim vyuv cgceiel.

Ecjr jur xcbcigco uv vyc Ctdcxhx'r afuxvcxr vyuv gcxk ouk hq u qxcry
thgctcev zk Eudhnche jyiby tilyv ceouelcx vyc uxtk--ecjr rfzrcafcevnk
qhfeo vh zc qunrc. Ueo vyuv thxeiel Bhnhecn Tibyufo yuo xiooce xhfeo vyc
Oxirru qhxviqibuviher jivy vyc Ctdcxhx ueo yuo dhievco hfv vh yit vyuv
vyir qhxviqico butd bhervxfbvco zk Dqfcn, ueo vinn vyce bheriocxco u
bycq-o'hcfgxc hq vubvibun rbicebc jyiby jhfno cerfxc Eudhnche'r
ocrvxfbvihe, jur ue uzrfxoivk, vyxcuvceiel vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq vyc
Xfrriue uxtk.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj uxxigco uv Zceeilrce'r afuxvcxr--u bhfevxk lcevnctue'r
yhfrc hq thocxuvc risc, rivfuvco he vyc gcxk zuewr hq vyc xigcx. Ecivycx
Zceeilrce ehx vyc Ctdcxhx jur vycxc, zfv Bycxekrycg, vyc Ctdcxhx'r uioc-
oc-butd, xcbcigco Zhnwherwi ueo ieqhxtco yit vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx,
ubbhtdueico zk Lcecxun Zceeilrce ueo Tuxafir Dufnfbbi, yuo lhec u rcbheo
vitc vyuv ouk vh ierdcbv vyc qhxviqibuviher hq vyc Oxirru butd, hq vyc
rfivuzinivk hq jyiby rcxihfr ohfzvr jcxc zclieeiel vh zc qcnv.

Bycxekrycg jur rivviel uv u jieohj ie vyc qixrv xhht jivy u Qxceby ehgcn
ie yir yueo. Vyir xhht yuo dxhzuznk zcce u tfrib xhht; vycxc jur rvinn
ue hxlue ie iv he jyiby rhtc xflr jcxc dinco, ueo ie hec bhxecx rvhho
vyc qhnoiel zcorvcuo hq Zceeilrce'r uopfvuev. Vyir uopfvuev jur unrh
vycxc ueo ruv ohsiel he vyc xhnnco-fd zcooiel, cgiocevnk cmyufrvco zk
jhxw hx zk qcurviel. Vjh ohhxr nco qxht vyc xhht, hec rvxuilyv he ievh
jyuv yuo zcce vyc oxujiel xhht, ueo uehvycx, he vyc xilyv, vh vyc rvfok.
Vyxhfly vyc qixrv ohhx butc vyc rhfeo hq ghibcr bhegcxriel ie Lcxtue ueo
hbburiheunnk ie Qxceby. Ie vyuv oxujiel xhht jcxc luvycxco, zk vyc
Ctdcxhx'r jiry, ehv u tinivuxk bhfebin (vyc Ctdcxhx dxcqcxxco
ieocqieivcecrr), zfv bcxvuie dcxrher jyhrc hdieiher yc jiryco vh wehj ie
gicj hq vyc itdceoiel oiqqibfnvicr. Iv jur ehv u bhfebin hq jux, zfv, ur
iv jcxc, u bhfebin vh cnfbiouvc bcxvuie afcrviher qhx vyc Ctdcxhx
dcxrheunnk. Vh vyir rctibhfebin yuo zcce iegivco vyc Rjcoiry Lcecxun
Uxtqcnov, Uopfvuev Lcecxun Jhnshlce, Jievsielcxhoc (jyht Eudhnche yuo
xcqcxxco vh ur u xcecluoc Qxceby rfzpcbv), Tibyufo, Vhnn, Bhfev Rvcie
jyh jur ehv u tinivuxk tue uv unn, ueo Dqfcn yitrcnq, jyh, ur Dxiebc
Ueoxcj yuo ycuxo, jur vyc tuierdxiel hq vyc jyhnc uqquix. Dxiebc Ueoxcj
yuo ue hddhxvfeivk hq lcvviel u lhho nhhw uv yit, qhx Dqfcn uxxigco rhhe
uqvcx yitrcnq ueo, ie durriel vyxhfly vh vyc oxujiel xhht, rvhddco u
tiefvc vh rdcuw vh Bycxekrycg.

Uv qixrv rilyv, Dqfcn, ie yir inn-tuoc feiqhxt hq u Xfrriue lcecxun,
jyiby qivvco yit zuonk niwc u quebk bhrvftc, rcctco qutiniux vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, vyhfly yc ruj yit ehj qhx vyc qixrv vitc. Vycxc jur uzhfv yit
rhtcvyiel hq Jckxhvycx, Tubw, ueo Rbytiov, ueo tuek hvycx Lcxtue
vychxirv-lcecxunr jyht Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo rcce ie 1805, zfv yc jur thxc
vkdibun vyue uek hq vyct. Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo ecgcx kcv rcce u Lcxtue
vychxirv ie jyht unn vyc byuxubvcxirvibr hq vyhrc hvycxr jcxc feivco vh
rfby ue cmvcev.

Dqfcn jur ryhxv ueo gcxk vyie zfv zxhuo-zheco, hq bhuxrc, xhzfrv zfino,
zxhuo ie vyc yidr, ueo jivy dxhtiecev ryhfnocx znuocr. Yir qubc jur tfby
jxiewnco ueo yir ckcr occd rcv. Yir yuix yuo cgiocevnk zcce yurvink
zxfryco rthhvy ie qxhev hq vyc vctdncr, zfv rvfbw fd zcyieo ie afuiev
nivvnc vfqvr. Yc cevcxco vyc xhht, nhhwiel xcrvncrrnk ueo uelxink
uxhfeo, ur iq uqxuio hq cgcxkvyiel ie vyuv nuxlc uduxvtcev. Ujwjuxonk
yhnoiel fd yir rjhxo, yc uooxcrrco Bycxekrycg ueo urwco ie Lcxtue jycxc
vyc Ctdcxhx jur. Hec bhfno rcc vyuv yc jiryco vh durr vyxhfly vyc xhhtr
ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc, qieiry jivy vyc zhjr ueo lxccvielr, ueo riv ohje
vh zfriecrr ie qxhev hq u tud, jycxc yc jhfno qccn uv yhtc. Yc ehooco
yfxxiconk ie xcdnk vh Bycxekrycg, ueo rtinco ixheibunnk he ycuxiel vyuv
vyc rhgcxcile jur ierdcbviel vyc qhxviqibuviher vyuv yc, Dqfcn, yuo
dnueeco ie ubbhxo jivy yir vychxk. Yc tfvvcxco rhtcvyiel vh yitrcnq
uzxfdvnk ueo ie u zurr ghibc, ur rcnq-urrfxco Lcxtuer oh--iv tilyv yugc
zcce "rvfdio qcnnhj"... hx "vyc jyhnc uqquix jinn zc xfieco," hx
"rhtcvyiel uzrfxo jinn bhtc hq iv."... Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv buvby jyuv
yc ruio ueo jhfno yugc durrco he, zfv Bycxekrycg ievxhofbco yit vh
Dqfcn, xctuxwiel vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur pfrv zubw qxht Vfxwck jycxc vyc
jux yuo vcxtieuvco rh qhxvfeuvcnk. Dqfcn zuxcnk lnuebco--ehv rh tfby uv
Dxiebc Ueoxcj ur durv yit--ueo ruio, jivy u nufly: "Vyuv tfrv yugc zcce
u qiec vubvibun jux"; ueo, nuflyiel bhevctdvfhfrnk, jcev he ievh vyc
xhht qxht jyiby vyc rhfeo hq ghibcr jur ycuxo.

Dqfcn, unjukr iebnieco vh zc ixxivuznk ruxburvib, jur duxvibfnuxnk
oirvfxzco vyuv ouk, cgiocevnk zk vyc qubv vyuv vyck yuo ouxco vh ierdcbv
ueo bxivibisc yir butd ie yir uzrcebc. Qxht vyir ryhxv ievcxgicj jivy
Dqfcn, Dxiebc Ueoxcj, vyuewr vh yir Ufrvcxnivs cmdcxicebcr, jur uznc vh
qhxt u bncux bhebcdvihe hq vyc tue. Dqfcn jur hec hq vyhrc yhdcncrrnk
ueo ittfvuznk rcnq-bheqiocev tce, rcnq-bheqiocev vh vyc dhiev hq
tuxvkxoht ur henk Lcxtuer uxc, zcbufrc henk Lcxtuer uxc rcnq-bheqiocev
he vyc zurir hq ue uzrvxubv ehvihe--rbicebc, vyuv ir, vyc rfddhrco
wehjncolc hq uzrhnfvc vxfvy. U Qxcebytue ir rcnq-urrfxco zcbufrc yc
xcluxor yitrcnq dcxrheunnk, zhvy ie tieo ueo zhok, ur ixxcrirviznk
uvvxubvigc vh tce ueo jhtce. Ue Celnirytue ir rcnq-urrfxco, ur zciel u
bivisce hq vyc zcrv-hxlueisco rvuvc ie vyc jhxno, ueo vycxcqhxc ur ue
Celnirytue unjukr wehjr jyuv yc ryhfno oh ueo wehjr vyuv unn yc ohcr ur
ue Celnirytue ir feohfzvconk bhxxcbv. Ue Ivuniue ir rcnq-urrfxco zcbufrc
yc ir cmbivuznc ueo curink qhxlcvr yitrcnq ueo hvycx dchdnc. U Xfrriue
ir rcnq-urrfxco pfrv zcbufrc yc wehjr ehvyiel ueo ohcr ehv juev vh wehj
uekvyiel, riebc yc ohcr ehv zcnicgc vyuv uekvyiel bue zc wehje. Vyc
Lcxtue'r rcnq-urrfxuebc ir jhxrv hq unn, rvxhelcx ueo thxc xcdfnrigc
vyue uek hvycx, zcbufrc yc ituliecr vyuv yc wehjr vyc vxfvy--rbicebc--
jyiby yc yitrcnq yur iegcevco zfv jyiby ir qhx yit vyc uzrhnfvc vxfvy.

Dqfcn jur cgiocevnk hq vyuv rhxv. Yc yuo u rbicebc--vyc vychxk hq
hzniafc thgctcevr ocofbco zk yit qxht vyc yirvhxk hq Qxcocxibw vyc
Lxcuv'r juxr, ueo unn yc butc ubxhrr ie vyc yirvhxk hq thxc xcbcev
juxquxc rcctco vh yit uzrfxo ueo zuxzuxhfr--thervxhfr bhnniriher ie
jyiby rh tuek znfeocxr jcxc bhttivvco zk zhvy riocr vyuv vycrc juxr
bhfno ehv zc bunnco juxr, vyck oio ehv ubbhxo jivy vyc vychxk, ueo
vycxcqhxc bhfno ehv rcxgc ur tuvcxiun qhx rbicebc.

Ie 1806 Dqfcn yuo zcce hec hq vyhrc xcrdheriznc, qhx vyc dnue hq
butduile vyuv ceoco ie Pceu ueo Ufcxrvuov, zfv yc oio ehv rcc vyc ncurv
dxhhq hq vyc qunnizinivk hq yir vychxk ie vyc oirurvcxr hq vyuv jux. He
vyc bhevxuxk, vyc ocgiuviher tuoc qxht yir vychxk jcxc, ie yir hdieihe,
vyc rhnc bufrc hq vyc jyhnc oirurvcx, ueo jivy byuxubvcxirvibunnk
lnccqfn ruxburt yc jhfno xctuxw, "Vycxc, I ruio vyc jyhnc uqquix jhfno
lh vh vyc ocgin!" Dqfcn jur hec hq vyhrc vychxcvibiuer jyh rh nhgc vycix
vychxk vyuv vyck nhrc rilyv hq vyc vychxk'r hzpcbv--ivr dxubvibun
uddnibuvihe. Yir nhgc hq vychxk tuoc yit yuvc cgcxkvyiel dxubvibun, ueo
yc jhfno ehv nirvce vh iv. Yc jur cgce dncurco zk quinfxcr, qhx quinfxcr
xcrfnviel qxht ocgiuviher ie dxubvibc qxht vyc vychxk henk dxhgco vh yit
vyc ubbfxubk hq yir vychxk.

Yc ruio u qcj jhxor vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo Bycxekrycg uzhfv vyc dxcrcev
jux, jivy vyc uix hq u tue jyh wehjr zcqhxcyueo vyuv unn jinn lh jxhel,
ueo jyh ir ehv oirdncurco vyuv iv ryhfno zc rh. Vyc fezxfryco vfqvr hq
yuix rvibwiel fd zcyieo ueo vyc yurvink zxfryco yuix he yir vctdncr
cmdxcrrco vyir thrv cnhafcevnk.

Yc durrco ievh vyc ecmv xhht, ueo vyc occd, afcxfnhfr rhfeor hq yir
ghibc jcxc uv hebc ycuxo qxht vycxc.




BYUDVCX MI

Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ckcr jcxc rvinn qhnnhjiel Dqfcn hfv hq vyc xhht jyce
Bhfev Zceeilrce cevcxco yfxxiconk, ueo ehooiel vh Zhnwherwi, zfv ehv
dufriel, jcev ievh vyc rvfok, ligiel iervxfbviher vh yir uopfvuev ur yc
jcev. Vyc Ctdcxhx jur qhnnhjiel yit, ueo Zceeilrce yuo yurvceco he vh
tuwc rhtc dxcduxuviher ueo vh zc xcuok vh xcbcigc vyc rhgcxcile.
Bycxekrycg ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj jcev hfv ievh vyc dhxby, jycxc vyc Ctdcxhx,
jyh nhhwco quvilfco, jur oirthfeviel. Tuxafir Dufnfbbi jur vunwiel vh
yit jivy duxvibfnux juxtvy ueo vyc Ctdcxhx, jivy yir ycuo zcev vh vyc
ncqv, jur nirvceiel jivy u oirruvirqico uix. Vyc Ctdcxhx thgco qhxjuxo
cgiocevnk jiryiel vh ceo vyc bhegcxruvihe, zfv vyc qnfryco ueo cmbivco
Ivuniue, hznigihfr hq ocbhxft, qhnnhjco yit ueo bheviefco vh rdcuw.

"Ueo ur qhx vyc tue jyh uogirco qhxtiel vyir butd--vyc Oxirru butd,"
ruio Dufnfbbi, ur vyc Ctdcxhx thfevco vyc rvcdr ueo ehvibiel Dxiebc
Ueoxcj rbueeco yir fequtiniux qubc, "ur vh vyuv dcxrhe, rixc..."
bheviefco Dufnfbbi, ocrdcxuvcnk, udduxcevnk feuznc vh xcrvxuie yitrcnq,
"vyc tue jyh uogirco vyc Oxirru butd--I rcc eh unvcxeuvigc zfv vyc
nfeuvib urknft hx vyc lunnhjr!"

Jivyhfv yccoiel vyc ceo hq vyc Ivuniue'r xctuxwr, ueo ur vyhfly ehv
ycuxiel vyct, vyc Ctdcxhx, xcbhleisiel Zhnwherwi, uooxcrrco yit
lxubihfrnk.

"I ut gcxk lnuo vh rcc khf! Lh ie vycxc jycxc vyck uxc tccviel, ueo juiv
qhx tc."

Vyc Ctdcxhx jcev ievh vyc rvfok. Yc jur qhnnhjco zk Dxiebc Dcvcx
Tiwyuknhgiby Ghnwherwi ueo Zuxhe Rvcie, ueo vyc ohhx bnhrco zcyieo vyct.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj, vuwiel uoguevulc hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r dcxtirrihe, ubbhtdueico
Dufnfbbi, jyht yc yuo wehje ie Vfxwck, ievh vyc oxujiel xhht jycxc vyc
bhfebin jur urrctznco.

Dxiebc Dcvcx Tiwyuknhgiby Ghnwherwi hbbfdico vyc dhrivihe, ur iv jcxc,
hq byicq hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r rvuqq. Yc butc hfv hq vyc rvfok ievh vyc
oxujiel xhht jivy rhtc tudr jyiby yc rdxcuo he u vuznc, ueo dfv
afcrviher he jyiby yc jiryco vh ycux vyc hdieihe hq vyc lcevnctce
dxcrcev. Jyuv yuo yuddceco jur vyuv ecjr (jyiby uqvcxjuxor dxhgco vh zc
qunrc) yuo zcce xcbcigco ofxiel vyc eilyv hq u thgctcev zk vyc Qxceby vh
hfvqnuew vyc Oxirru butd.

Vyc qixrv vh rdcuw jur Lcecxun Uxtqcnov jyh, vh tccv vyc oiqqibfnvk vyuv
dxcrcevco ivrcnq, fecmdcbvconk dxhdhrco u dcxqcbvnk ecj dhrivihe ujuk
qxht vyc Dcvcxrzfxl ueo Thrbhj xhuor. Vyc xcurhe qhx vyir jur
iecmdnibuznc (fencrr yc jiryco vh ryhj vyuv yc, vhh, bhfno yugc ue
hdieihe), zfv yc fxlco vyuv uv vyir dhiev vyc uxtk ryhfno feivc ueo
vycxc ujuiv vyc cectk. Iv jur dnuie vyuv Uxtqcnov yuo vyhflyv hfv vyuv
dnue nhel ulh ueo ehj cmdhfeoco iv ehv rh tfby vh uerjcx vyc afcrviher
dfv--jyiby, ie qubv, yir dnue oio ehv uerjcx--ur vh uguin yitrcnq hq vyc
hddhxvfeivk vh uix iv. Iv jur hec hq vyc tinniher hq dxhdhrunr, hec ur
lhho ur uehvycx, vyuv bhfno zc tuoc ur nhel ur iv jur afivc fewehje jyuv
byuxubvcx vyc jux jhfno vuwc. Rhtc oirdfvco yir uxlftcevr, hvycxr
ocqceoco vyct. Khfel Bhfev Vhnn hzpcbvco vh vyc Rjcoiry lcecxun'r gicjr
thxc juxtnk vyue uekhec cnrc, ueo ie vyc bhfxrc hq vyc oirdfvc oxcj qxht
yir rioc dhbwcv u jcnn-qinnco ehvczhhw, jyiby yc urwco dcxtirrihe vh
xcuo vh vyct. Ie vycrc ghnftiehfr ehvcr Vhnn rfllcrvco uehvycx rbyctc,
vhvunnk oiqqcxcev qxht Uxtqcnov'r hx Dqfcn'r dnue hq butduile. Ie uerjcx
vh Vhnn, Dufnfbbi rfllcrvco ue uoguebc ueo ue uvvubw, jyiby, yc fxlco,
bhfno unhec cmvxibuvc fr qxht vyc dxcrcev febcxvuievk ueo qxht vyc vxud
(ur yc bunnco vyc Oxirru butd) ie jyiby jc jcxc rivfuvco.

Ofxiel unn vycrc oirbfrriher Dqfcn ueo yir ievcxdxcvcx, Jhnshlce (yir
"zxiolc" ie bhfxv xcnuviher), jcxc rincev. Dqfcn henk rehxvco
bhevctdvfhfrnk ueo vfxeco ujuk, vh ryhj vyuv yc jhfno ecgcx octcue
yitrcnq zk xcdnkiel vh rfby ehercerc ur yc jur ehj ycuxiel. Rh jyce
Dxiebc Ghnwherwi, jyh jur ie vyc byuix, bunnco he yit vh ligc yir
hdieihe, yc tcxcnk ruio:

"Jyk urw tc? Lcecxun Uxtqcnov yur dxhdhrco u rdnceoio dhrivihe jivy ue
cmdhrco xcux, hx jyk ehv vyir Ivuniue lcevnctue'r uvvubw--gcxk qiec, hx
u xcvxcuv, unrh lhho! Jyk urw tc?" ruio yc. "Jyk, khf khfxrcngcr wehj
cgcxkvyiel zcvvcx vyue I oh."

Zfv jyce Ghnwherwi ruio, jivy u qxhje, vyuv iv jur ie vyc Ctdcxhx'r eutc
vyuv yc urwco yir hdieihe, Dqfcn xhrc ueo, rfoocenk lxhjiel ueituvco,
zclue vh rdcuw:

"Cgcxkvyiel yur zcce rdhinco, cgcxkvyiel tfoonco, cgcxkzhok vyhflyv vyck
wecj zcvvcx vyue I oio, ueo ehj khf bhtc vh tc! Yhj tceo tuvvcxr? Vycxc
ir ehvyiel vh tceo! Vyc dxiebidncr nuio ohje zk tc tfrv zc rvxibvnk
uoycxco vh," ruio yc, oxfttiel he vyc vuznc jivy yir zhek qielcxr. "Jyuv
ir vyc oiqqibfnvk? Ehercerc, byinoiryecrr!"

Yc jcev fd vh vyc tud ueo rdcuwiel xudionk zclue dxhgiel vyuv eh
cgcevfunivk bhfno unvcx vyc cqqibicebk hq vyc Oxirru butd, vyuv
cgcxkvyiel yuo zcce qhxcrcce, ueo vyuv iq vyc cectk jcxc xcunnk lhiel vh
hfvqnuew iv, vyc cectk jhfno iecgivuznk zc ocrvxhkco.

Dufnfbbi, jyh oio ehv wehj Lcxtue, zclue afcrviheiel yit ie Qxceby.
Jhnshlce butc vh vyc urrirvuebc hq yir byicq, jyh rdhwc Qxceby zuonk,
ueo zclue vxuernuviel qhx yit, yuxonk uznc vh wccd dubc jivy Dqfcn, jyh
jur xudionk octhervxuviel vyuv ehv henk unn vyuv yuo yuddceco, zfv unn
vyuv bhfno yuddce, yuo zcce qhxcrcce ie yir rbyctc, ueo vyuv iq vycxc
jcxc ehj uek oiqqibfnvicr vyc jyhnc qufnv nuk ie vyc qubv vyuv yir dnue
yuo ehv zcce dxcbircnk cmcbfvco. Yc wcdv nuflyiel ruxburvibunnk, yc
octhervxuvco, ueo uv nurv bhevctdvfhfrnk bcurco vh octhervxuvc, niwc u
tuvyctuvibiue jyh bcurcr vh dxhgc ie guxihfr jukr vyc ubbfxubk hq u
dxhznct vyuv yur unxcuok zcce dxhgco. Jhnshlce vhhw yir dnubc ueo
bheviefco vh cmdnuie yir gicjr ie Qxceby, cgcxk ehj ueo vyce vfxeiel vh
Dqfcn ueo rukiel, "Ir iv ehv rh, khfx cmbcnncebk?" Zfv Dqfcn, niwc u tue
ycuvco ie u qilyv jyh rvxiwcr vyhrc he yir hje rioc, ryhfvco uelxink uv
yir hje rfddhxvcx, Jhnshlce:

"Jcnn, hq bhfxrc, jyuv thxc ir vycxc vh cmdnuie?"

Dufnfbbi ueo Tibyufo zhvy uvvubwco Jhnshlce ritfnvuechfrnk ie Qxceby.
Uxtqcnov uooxcrrco Dqfcn ie Lcxtue. Vhnn cmdnuieco vh Ghnwherwi ie
Xfrriue. Dxiebc Ueoxcj nirvceco ueo hzrcxgco ie rincebc.

Hq unn vycrc tce Dxiebc Ueoxcj rktduvyisco thrv jivy Dqfcn, uelxk,
ocvcxtieco, ueo uzrfxonk rcnq-bheqiocev ur yc jur. Hq unn vyhrc dxcrcev,
cgiocevnk yc unhec jur ehv rccwiel uekvyiel qhx yitrcnq, efxrco eh
yuvxco uluierv uekhec, ueo henk ocrixco vyuv vyc dnue, qhxtco he u
vychxk uxxigco uv zk kcuxr hq vhin, ryhfno zc buxxico hfv. Yc jur
xioibfnhfr, ueo fedncuruevnk ruxburvib, zfv kcv yc ierdixco ieghnfevuxk
xcrdcbv zk yir zhfeoncrr ocghvihe vh ue iocu. Zcriocr vyir, vyc xctuxwr
hq unn cmbcdv Dqfcn yuo hec bhtthe vxuiv vyuv yuo ehv zcce ehvibcuznc uv
vyc bhfebin hq jux ie 1805: vycxc jur ehj u dueib qcux hq Eudhnche'r
lceifr, jyiby, vyhfly bhebcunco, jur ehvibcuznc ie cgcxk xcphieocx.
Cgcxkvyiel jur urrftco vh zc dhrriznc qhx Eudhnche, vyck cmdcbvco yit
qxht cgcxk rioc, ueo ieghwco yir vcxxiznc eutc vh ryuvvcx cuby hvycx'r
dxhdhrunr. Dqfcn unhec rcctco vh bheriocx Eudhnche u zuxzuxiue niwc
cgcxkhec cnrc jyh hddhrco yir vychxk. Zfv zcriocr vyir qccniel hq
xcrdcbv, Dqfcn cghwco divk ie Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Qxht vyc vhec ie jyiby vyc
bhfxvicxr uooxcrrco yit ueo vyc juk Dufnfbbi yuo unnhjco yitrcnq vh
rdcuw hq yit vh vyc Ctdcxhx, zfv uzhgc unn qxht u bcxvuie ocrdcxuvihe ie
Dqfcn'r hje cmdxcrriher, iv jur bncux vyuv vyc hvycxr wecj, ueo Dqfcn
yitrcnq qcnv, vyuv yir qunn jur uv yueo. Ueo ocrdivc yir rcnq-bheqiocebc
ueo lxftdk Lcxtue ruxburt yc jur diviuznc, jivy yir yuix rthhvynk
zxfryco he vyc vctdncr ueo rvibwiel fd ie vfqvr zcyieo. Vyhfly yc
bhebcunco vyc qubv feocx u ryhj hq ixxivuvihe ueo bhevctdv, yc jur
cgiocevnk ie ocrduix vyuv vyc rhnc xctuieiel byuebc hq gcxiqkiel yir
vychxk zk u yflc cmdcxitcev ueo dxhgiel ivr rhfeoecrr vh vyc jyhnc jhxno
jur rniddiel ujuk qxht yit.

Vyc oirbfrriher bheviefco u nhel vitc, ueo vyc nhelcx vyck nurvco vyc
thxc ycuvco zcbutc vyc oirdfvcr, bfntieuviel ie ryhfvr ueo
dcxrheunivicr, ueo vyc ncrr jur iv dhrriznc vh uxxigc uv uek lcecxun
bhebnfrihe qxht unn vyuv yuo zcce ruio. Dxiebc Ueoxcj, nirvceiel vh vyir
dhnklnhv vunw ueo vh vycrc rfxtircr, dnuer, xcqfvuviher, ueo ryhfvr,
qcnv ehvyiel zfv utusctcev uv jyuv vyck jcxc rukiel. U vyhflyv vyuv yuo
nhel riebc ueo hqvce hbbfxxco vh yit ofxiel yir tinivuxk ubvigivicr--vyc
iocu vyuv vycxc ir ehv ueo bueehv zc uek rbicebc hq jux, ueo vyuv
vycxcqhxc vycxc bue zc eh rfby vyiel ur u tinivuxk lceifr--ehj uddcuxco
vh yit ue hzgihfr vxfvy. "Jyuv vychxk ueo rbicebc ir dhrriznc uzhfv u
tuvvcx vyc bheoiviher ueo bixbftrvuebcr hq jyiby uxc fewehje ueo bueehv
zc ocqieco, crdcbiunnk jyce vyc rvxcelvy hq vyc ubviel qhxbcr bueehv zc
urbcxvuieco? Eh hec jur hx ir uznc vh qhxcrcc ie jyuv bheoivihe hfx hx
vyc cectk'r uxticr jinn zc ie u ouk'r vitc, ueo eh hec bue luflc vyc
qhxbc hq vyir hx vyuv ocvubytcev. Rhtcvitcr--jyce vycxc ir ehv u bhjuxo
uv vyc qxhev vh ryhfv, 'Jc uxc bfv hqq!' ueo rvuxv xfeeiel, zfv u zxugc
ueo phnnk nuo jyh ryhfvr, 'Yfxxuy!'--u ocvubytcev hq qigc vyhfrueo ir
jhxvy vyixvk vyhfrueo, ur uv Rbyhe Lxuzcxe, jyinc uv vitcr qiqvk
vyhfrueo xfe qxht cilyv vyhfrueo, ur uv Ufrvcxnivs. Jyuv rbicebc bue
vycxc zc ie u tuvvcx ie jyiby, ur ie unn dxubvibun tuvvcxr, ehvyiel bue
zc ocqieco ueo cgcxkvyiel ocdceor he ieeftcxuznc bheoiviher, vyc
rileiqibuebc hq jyiby ir ocvcxtieco uv u duxvibfnux thtcev jyiby uxxigcr
eh hec wehjr jyce? Uxtqcnov rukr hfx uxtk ir bfv ie yunq, ueo Dufnfbbi
rukr jc yugc lhv vyc Qxceby uxtk zcvjcce vjh qixcr; Tibyufo rukr vyuv
vyc jhxvyncrrecrr hq vyc Oxirru butd nicr ie yugiel vyc xigcx zcyieo iv,
ueo Dqfcn rukr vyuv ir jyuv bhervivfvcr ivr rvxcelvy; Vhnn dxhdhrcr hec
dnue, Uxtqcnov uehvycx, ueo vyck uxc unn lhho ueo unn zuo, ueo vyc
uoguevulcr hq uek rfllcrviher bue zc rcce henk uv vyc thtcev hq vxiun.
Ueo jyk oh vyck unn rdcuw hq u 'tinivuxk lceifr'? Ir u tue u lceifr jyh
bue hxocx zxcuo vh zc zxhflyv fd uv vyc xilyv vitc ueo ruk jyh ir vh lh
vh vyc xilyv ueo jyh vh vyc ncqv? Iv ir henk zcbufrc tinivuxk tce uxc
iegcrvco jivy dhtd ueo dhjcx ueo bxhjor hq rkbyhdyuevr qnuvvcx dhjcx,
uvvxizfviel vh iv afunivicr hq lceifr iv ohcr ehv dhrrcrr. Vyc zcrv
lcecxunr I yugc wehje jcxc, he vyc bhevxuxk, rvfdio hx uzrcev-tieoco
tce. Zulxuvihe jur vyc zcrv, Eudhnche yitrcnq uotivvco vyuv. Ueo hq
Zheuduxvc yitrcnq! I xctctzcx yir nitivco, rcnq-ruvirqico qubc he vyc
qicno hq Ufrvcxnivs. Ehv henk ohcr u lhho uxtk bhttueocx ehv ecco uek
rdcbiun afunivicr, he vyc bhevxuxk yc eccor vyc uzrcebc hq vyc yilycrv
ueo zcrv yftue uvvxizfvcr--nhgc, dhcvxk, vceocxecrr, ueo dyinhrhdyib
ieafixiel ohfzv. Yc ryhfno zc nitivco, qixtnk bhegiebco vyuv jyuv yc ir
ohiel ir gcxk itdhxvuev (hvycxjirc yc jinn ehv yugc rfqqibicev
duvicebc), ueo henk vyce jinn yc zc u zxugc ncuocx. Lho qhxzio vyuv yc
ryhfno zc yftuec, ryhfno nhgc, hx divk, hx vyiew hq jyuv ir pfrv ueo
fepfrv. Iv ir feocxrvueouznc vyuv u vychxk hq vycix 'lceifr' jur
iegcevco qhx vyct nhel ulh zcbufrc vyck yugc dhjcx! Vyc rfbbcrr hq u
tinivuxk ubvihe ocdceor ehv he vyct, zfv he vyc tue ie vyc xuewr jyh
ryhfvr, 'Jc uxc nhrv!' hx jyh ryhfvr, 'Yfxxuy!' Ueo henk ie vyc xuewr
bue hec rcxgc jivy urrfxuebc hq zciel frcqfn."

Rh vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ur yc nirvceco vh vyc vunwiel, ueo yc xhfrco
yitrcnq henk jyce Dufnfbbi bunnco yit ueo cgcxkhec jur ncugiel.

Uv vyc xcgicj ecmv ouk vyc Ctdcxhx urwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj jycxc yc jhfno
niwc vh rcxgc, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhrv yir rvueoiel ie bhfxv bixbncr
qhxcgcx zk ehv urwiel vh xctuie uvvubyco vh vyc rhgcxcile'r dcxrhe, zfv
qhx dcxtirrihe vh rcxgc ie vyc uxtk.




BYUDVCX MII

Zcqhxc vyc zclieeiel hq vyc butduile, Xhrvhg yuo xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht
yir duxcevr ie jyiby vyck vhno yit zxicqnk hq Euvuryu'r innecrr ueo vyc
zxcuwiel hqq hq ycx celulctcev vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj (jyiby vyck cmdnuieco zk
Euvuryu'r yugiel xcpcbvco yit) ueo uluie urwco Eibyhnur vh xcvixc qxht
vyc uxtk ueo xcvfxe yhtc. He xcbcigiel vyir ncvvcx, Eibyhnur oio ehv
cgce tuwc uek uvvctdv vh lcv ncugc hq uzrcebc hx vh xcvixc qxht vyc
uxtk, zfv jxhvc vh yir duxcevr vyuv yc jur rhxxk Euvuryu jur inn ueo ycx
celulctcev zxhwce hqq, ueo vyuv yc jhfno oh unn yc bhfno vh tccv vycix
jirycr. Vh Rheku yc jxhvc rcduxuvcnk.

"Uohxco qxiceo hq tk rhfn!" yc jxhvc. "Ehvyiel zfv yhehx bhfno wccd tc
qxht xcvfxeiel vh vyc bhfevxk. Zfv ehj, uv vyc bhttcebctcev hq vyc
butduile, I ryhfno qccn oiryhehxco, ehv henk ie tk bhtxuocr' ckcr zfv ie
tk hje, iq I dxcqcxxco tk hje yuddiecrr vh tk nhgc ueo ofvk vh vyc
Quvycxnueo. Zfv vyir ryunn zc hfx nurv rcduxuvihe. Zcnicgc tc, oixcbvnk
vyc jux ir hgcx, iq I ut rvinn unigc ueo rvinn nhgco zk khf, I jinn
vyxhj fd cgcxkvyiel ueo qnk vh khf, vh dxcrr khf qhxcgcx vh tk uxocev
zxcurv."

Iv jur, ie qubv, henk vyc bhttcebctcev hq vyc butduile vyuv dxcgcevco
Xhrvhg qxht xcvfxeiel yhtc ur yc yuo dxhtirco ueo tuxxkiel Rheku. Vyc
ufvfte ie Hvxuoehc jivy vyc yfeviel, ueo vyc jievcx jivy vyc Byxirvtur
yhnioukr ueo Rheku'r nhgc, yuo hdceco hfv vh yit u girvu hq vxueafin
xfxun phkr ueo dcubc rfby ur yc yuo ecgcx wehje zcqhxc, ueo jyiby ehj
unnfxco yit. "U rdnceoio jiqc, byinoxce, u lhho dubw hq yhfeor, u ohsce
ncurycr hq rtuxv zhxshir, ulxibfnvfxc, ecilyzhxr, rcxgibc zk
cncbvihe..." vyhflyv yc. Zfv ehj vyc butduile jur zclieeiel, ueo yc yuo
vh xctuie jivy yir xclitcev. Ueo riebc iv yuo vh zc rh, Eibyhnur Xhrvhg,
ur jur euvfxun vh yit, qcnv bhevcevco jivy vyc niqc yc nco ie vyc
xclitcev ueo jur uznc vh qieo dncurfxc ie vyuv niqc.

He yir xcvfxe qxht yir qfxnhfly Eibyhnur, yugiel zcce phkqfnnk jcnbhtco
zk yir bhtxuocr, jur rcev vh hzvuie xcthfevr ueo zxhflyv zubw qxht vyc
Fwxuiec cmbcnncev yhxrcr jyiby dncurco yit ueo cuxeco yit bhttceouvihe
qxht yir bhttueocxr. Ofxiel yir uzrcebc yc yuo zcce dxhthvco budvuie,
ueo jyce vyc xclitcev jur dfv he jux qhhviel jivy ue iebxcurc ie
eftzcxr, yc jur uluie unnhvvco yir hno rafuoxhe.

Vyc butduile zclue, vyc xclitcev jur thgco ievh Dhnueo he ohfznc duk,
ecj hqqibcxr uxxigco, ecj tce ueo yhxrcr, ueo uzhgc unn cgcxkzhok jur
ieqcbvco jivy vyc tcxxink cmbivco thho vyuv lhcr jivy vyc bhttcebctcev
hq u jux, ueo Xhrvhg, bherbihfr hq yir uoguevulchfr dhrivihe ie vyc
xclitcev, ocghvco yitrcnq cevixcnk vh vyc dncurfxcr ueo ievcxcrvr hq
tinivuxk rcxgibc, vyhfly yc wecj vyuv rhhecx hx nuvcx yc jhfno yugc vh
xcnieafiry vyct.

Vyc vxhhdr xcvixco qxht Gineu qhx guxihfr bhtdnibuvco xcurher hq rvuvc,
dhnivibun ueo rvxuvclib. Cuby rvcd hq vyc xcvxcuv jur ubbhtdueico zk u
bhtdnibuvco ievcxdnuk hq ievcxcrvr, uxlftcevr, ueo durriher uv
ycuoafuxvcxr. Qhx vyc Dugnhlxuo yfrruxr, yhjcgcx, vyc jyhnc hq vyir
xcvxcuv ofxiel vyc qiecrv dcxiho hq rfttcx ueo jivy rfqqibicev rfddnicr
jur u gcxk ritdnc ueo ulxccuznc zfriecrr.

Iv jur henk uv ycuoafuxvcxr vyuv vycxc jur ocdxcrrihe, fecuriecrr, ueo
ievxilfiel; ie vyc zhok hq vyc uxtk vyck oio ehv urw vyctrcngcr jycxc
vyck jcxc lhiel hx jyk. Iq vyck xclxcvvco yugiel vh xcvxcuv, iv jur henk
zcbufrc vyck yuo vh ncugc zinncvr vyck yuo lxhje ubbfrvhtco vh, hx rhtc
dxcvvk khfel Dhniry nuok. Iq vyc vyhflyv vyuv vyielr nhhwco zuo byuebco
vh cevcx uekhec'r ycuo, yc vxico vh zc ur byccxqfn ur zcqivr u lhho
rhnoicx ueo ehv vh vyiew hq vyc lcecxun vxceo hq uqquixr, zfv henk hq
vyc vurw ecuxcrv vh yueo. Qixrv vyck butdco luink zcqhxc Gineu, tuwiel
ubafuievuebc jivy vyc Dhniry nueohjecxr, dxcduxiel qhx xcgicjr ueo zciel
xcgicjco zk vyc Ctdcxhx ueo hvycx yily bhttueocxr. Vyce butc ue hxocx vh
xcvxcuv vh Rgcevrkuei ueo ocrvxhk uek dxhgiriher vyck bhfno ehv buxxk
ujuk jivy vyct. Rgcevrkuei jur xctctzcxco zk vyc yfrruxr henk ur vyc
oxfewce butd, u eutc vyc jyhnc uxtk lugc vh vycix cebutdtcev vycxc, ueo
zcbufrc tuek bhtdnuievr jcxc tuoc uluierv vyc vxhhdr, jyh, vuwiel
uoguevulc hq vyc hxocx vh bhnncbv dxhgiriher, vhhw unrh yhxrcr,
buxxiulcr, ueo buxdcvr qxht vyc Dhniry dxhdxicvhxr. Xhrvhg xctctzcxco
Rgcevrkuei, zcbufrc he vyc qixrv ouk hq vycix uxxigun uv vyuv rtunn vhje
yc byuelco yir rcxlcuev tuphx ueo jur feuznc vh tueulc unn vyc oxfewce
tce hq yir rafuoxhe jyh, fewehje vh yit, yuo uddxhdxiuvco qigc zuxxcnr
hq hno zccx. Qxht Rgcevrkuei vyck xcvixco quxvycx ueo quxvycx vh Oxirru,
ueo vycebc uluie zckheo Oxirru, oxujiel ecux vh vyc qxhevicx hq Xfrriu
dxhdcx.

He vyc vyixvccevy hq Pfnk vyc Dugnhlxuor vhhw duxv ie u rcxihfr ubvihe
qhx vyc qixrv vitc.

He vyc vjcnqvy hq Pfnk, he vyc cgc hq vyuv ubvihe, vycxc jur u ycugk
rvhxt hq xuie ueo yuin. Ie lcecxun, vyc rfttcx hq 1812 jur xctuxwuznc
qhx ivr rvhxtr.

Vyc vjh Dugnhlxuo rafuoxher jcxc zighfubwiel he u qicno hq xkc, jyiby
jur unxcuok ie cux zfv yuo zcce bhtdncvcnk vxhooce ohje zk buvvnc ueo
yhxrcr. Vyc xuie jur ocrbceoiel ie vhxxcevr, ueo Xhrvhg, jivy u khfel
hqqibcx eutco Inkie, yir dxhvclc, jur rivviel ie u yurvink bhervxfbvco
rycnvcx. Ue hqqibcx hq vycix xclitcev, jivy nhel tfrvubycr cmvceoiel
hevh yir byccwr, jyh uqvcx xioiel vh vyc rvuqq yuo zcce hgcxvuwce zk vyc
xuie, cevcxco Xhrvhg'r rycnvcx.

"I yugc bhtc qxht vyc rvuqq, Bhfev. Yugc khf ycuxo hq Xucgrwi'r
cmdnhiv?"

Ueo vyc hqqibcx lugc vyct ocvuinr hq vyc Runvuehg zuvvnc, jyiby yc yuo
ycuxo uv vyc rvuqq.

Xhrvhg, rthwiel yir didc ueo vfxeiel yir ycuo uzhfv ur vyc juvcx
vxibwnco ohje yir ecbw, nirvceco ieuvvcevigcnk, jivy ue hbburiheun
lnuebc uv Inkie, jyh jur dxcrriel bnhrc vh yit. Vyir hqqibcx, u nuo hq
rimvcce jyh yuo xcbcevnk phieco vyc xclitcev, jur ehj ie vyc rutc
xcnuvihe vh Eibyhnur vyuv Eibyhnur yuo zcce vh Oceirhg rcgce kcuxr
zcqhxc. Inkie vxico vh itivuvc Xhrvhg ie cgcxkvyiel ueo uohxco yit ur u
lixn tilyv yugc ohec.

Soxsyierwi, vyc hqqibcx jivy vyc nhel tfrvubyc, rdhwc lxueoinhafcevnk hq
vyc Runvuehg out zciel "u Xfrriue Vycxthdknuc," ueo hq yhj u occo jhxvyk
hq ueviafivk yuo zcce dcxqhxtco zk Lcecxun Xucgrwi. Yc xcbhfevco yhj
Xucgrwi yuo nco yir vjh rher hevh vyc out feocx vcxxiqib qixc ueo yuo
byuxlco jivy vyct zcrioc yit. Xhrvhg ycuxo vyc rvhxk ueo ehv henk ruio
ehvyiel vh cebhfxulc Soxsyierwi'r cevyfriurt zfv, he vyc bhevxuxk,
nhhwco niwc u tue uryutco hq jyuv yc jur ycuxiel, vyhfly jivy eh
ievcevihe hq bhevxuoibviel iv. Riebc vyc butduiler hq Ufrvcxnivs ueo hq
1807 Xhrvhg wecj zk cmdcxicebc vyuv tce unjukr nic jyce ocrbxiziel
tinivuxk cmdnhivr, ur yc yitrcnq yuo ohec jyce xcbhfeviel vyct; zcriocr
vyuv, yc yuo cmdcxicebc cehfly vh wehj vyuv ehvyiel yuddcer ie jux uv
unn ur jc bue ituliec hx xcnuvc iv. Ueo rh yc oio ehv niwc Soxsyierwi'r
vunc, ehx oio yc niwc Soxsyierwi yitrcnq jyh, jivy yir tfrvubycr
cmvceoiel hgcx yir byccwr, zcev nhj hgcx vyc qubc hq yir ycuxcx, ur jur
yir yuziv, ueo bxhjoco Xhrvhg ie vyc euxxhj ryuevk. Xhrvhg nhhwco uv yit
ie rincebc. "Ie vyc qixrv dnubc, vycxc tfrv yugc zcce rfby u bheqfrihe
ueo bxhjoiel he vyc out vyuv jur zciel uvvubwco vyuv iq Xucgrwi oio ncuo
yir rher vycxc, iv bhfno yugc yuo eh cqqcbv cmbcdv dcxyudr he rhtc ohsce
tce ecuxcrv vh yit," vyhflyv yc, "vyc xcrv bhfno ehv yugc rcce yhj hx
jivy jyht Xucgrwi butc hevh vyc out. Ueo cgce vyhrc jyh oio rcc iv jhfno
ehv yugc zcce tfby rvitfnuvco zk iv, qhx jyuv yuo vyck vh oh jivy
Xucgrwi'r vceocx duvcxeun qccnielr jyce vycix hje rwier jcxc ie ouelcx?
Ueo zcriocr, vyc quvc hq vyc Quvycxnueo oio ehv ocdceo he jycvycx vyck
vhhw vyc Runvuehg out hx ehv, ur jc uxc vhno jur vyc burc uv
Vycxthdknuc. Rh jyk ryhfno yc yugc tuoc rfby u rubxiqibc? Ueo jyk cmdhrc
yir hje byinoxce ie vyc zuvvnc? I jhfno ehv yugc vuwce tk zxhvycx Dcvku
vycxc, hx cgce Inkie, jyh'r u rvxuelcx vh tc zfv u eibc nuo, zfv jhfno
yugc vxico vh dfv vyct rhtcjycxc feocx bhgcx," Eibyhnur bheviefco vh
vyiew, ur yc nirvceco vh Soxsyierwi. Zfv yc oio ehv cmdxcrr yir
vyhflyvr, qhx ie rfby tuvvcxr, vhh, yc yuo luieco cmdcxicebc. Yc wecj
vyuv vyir vunc xcohfeoco vh vyc lnhxk hq hfx uxtr ueo rh hec yuo vh
dxcvceo ehv vh ohfzv iv. Ueo yc ubvco ubbhxoielnk.

"I bue'v rvueo vyir uek thxc," ruio Inkie, ehvibiel vyuv Xhrvhg oio ehv
xcniry Soxsyierwi'r bhegcxruvihe. "Tk rvhbwielr ueo ryixv... ueo vyc
juvcx ir xfeeiel he tk rcuv! I'nn lh ueo nhhw qhx rycnvcx. Vyc xuie
rcctr ncrr ycugk."

Inkie jcev hfv ueo Soxsyierwi xhoc ujuk.

Qigc tiefvcr nuvcx Inkie, rdnuryiel vyxhfly vyc tfo, butc xfeeiel zubw
vh vyc ryuevk.

"Yfxxuy! Xhrvhg, bhtc afibw! I'gc qhfeo iv! Uzhfv vjh yfeoxco kuxor ujuk
vycxc'r u vugcxe jycxc hfxr yugc unxcuok luvycxco. Jc bue uv ncurv lcv
oxk vycxc, ueo Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu'r vycxc."

Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu jur vyc jiqc hq vyc xclitcevun ohbvhx, u dxcvvk khfel
Lcxtue jhtue yc yuo tuxxico ie Dhnueo. Vyc ohbvhx, jycvycx qxht nubw hq
tcuer hx zcbufrc yc oio ehv niwc vh duxv qxht yir khfel jiqc ie vyc
cuxnk oukr hq vycix tuxxiulc, vhhw ycx uzhfv jivy yit jycxcgcx vyc
yfrrux xclitcev jcev ueo yir pcunhfrk yuo zcbhtc u rvueoiel phwc uthel
vyc yfrrux hqqibcxr.

Xhrvhg vyxcj yir bnhuw hgcx yir ryhfnocxr, ryhfvco vh Nugxfrywu vh
qhnnhj jivy vyc vyielr, ueo--ehj rniddiel ie vyc tfo, ehj rdnuryiel
xilyv vyxhfly iv--rcv hqq jivy Inkie ie vyc ncrrceiel xuie ueo vyc
ouxwecrr vyuv jur hbburiheunnk xcev zk oirvuev nilyveiel.

"Xhrvhg, jycxc uxc khf?"

"Ycxc. Jyuv nilyveiel!" vyck bunnco vh hec uehvycx.




BYUDVCX MIII

Ie vyc vugcxe, zcqhxc jyiby rvhho vyc ohbvhx'r bhgcxco buxv, vycxc jcxc
unxcuok rhtc qigc hqqibcxr. Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu, u dnftd nivvnc znheoc
Lcxtue, ie u oxcrriel pubwcv ueo eilyvbud, jur rivviel he u zxhuo zceby
ie vyc qxhev bhxecx. Ycx yfrzueo, vyc ohbvhx, nuk urnccd zcyieo ycx.
Xhrvhg ueo Inkie, he cevcxiel vyc xhht, jcxc jcnbhtco jivy tcxxk ryhfvr
ueo nuflyvcx.

"Ocux tc, yhj phnnk jc uxc!" ruio Xhrvhg nuflyiel.

"Ueo jyk oh khf rvueo vycxc ludiel?"

"Jyuv rjcnnr vyck uxc! Jyk, vyc juvcx rvxcutr qxht vyct! Ohe'v tuwc hfx
oxujiel xhht rh jcv."

"Ohe'v tcrr Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu'r oxcrr!" bxico hvycx ghibcr.

Xhrvhg ueo Inkie yurvceco vh qieo u bhxecx jycxc vyck bhfno byuelc ievh
oxk bnhvycr jivyhfv hqqceoiel Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu'r thocrvk. Vyck jcxc
lhiel ievh u viek xcbcrr zcyieo u duxvivihe vh byuelc, zfv qhfeo iv
bhtdncvcnk qinnco zk vyxcc hqqibcxr jyh ruv dnukiel buxor zk vyc nilyv
hq u rhnivuxk bueonc he ue ctdvk zhm, ueo vycrc hqqibcxr jhfno he eh
ubbhfev kicno vycix dhrivihe. Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu hznilco vyct jivy vyc
nhue hq u dcvvibhuv vh zc frco ur u bfxvuie, ueo zcyieo vyuv rbxcce
Xhrvhg ueo Inkie, ycndco zk Nugxfrywu jyh yuo zxhflyv vycix wivr,
byuelco vycix jcv vyielr qhx oxk hecr.

U qixc jur tuoc fd ie vyc oinudiouvco zxibw rvhgc. U zhuxo jur qhfeo,
qimco he vjh ruooncr ueo bhgcxco jivy u yhxrcbnhvy, u rtunn ruthgux jur
dxhofbco ueo u bcnnuxcv ueo yunq u zhvvnc hq xft, ueo yugiel urwco Tuxk
Yceoxiwyhgeu vh dxcrioc, vyck unn bxhjoco xhfeo ycx. Hec hqqcxco ycx u
bncue yueowcxbyicq vh jidc ycx byuxtiel yueor, uehvycx rdxcuo u pubwcv
feocx ycx nivvnc qccv vh wccd vyct qxht vyc outd, uehvycx yfel yir bhuv
hgcx vyc jieohj vh wccd hfv vyc oxuqv, ueo kcv uehvycx jugco vyc qnicr
hqq ycx yfrzueo'r qubc, ncrv yc ryhfno juwc fd.

"Ncugc yit unhec," ruio Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu, rtiniel vitionk ueo yuddink.
"Yc ir rnccdiel jcnn ur iv ir, uqvcx u rnccdncrr eilyv."

"Hy, eh, Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu," xcdnico vyc hqqibcx, "hec tfrv nhhw uqvcx
vyc ohbvhx. Dcxyudr yc'nn vuwc divk he tc rhtcouk, jyce iv bhtcr vh
bfvviel hqq u ncl hx ue uxt qhx tc."

Vycxc jcxc henk vyxcc vftzncxr, vyc juvcx jur rh tfook vyuv hec bhfno
ehv tuwc hfv jycvycx vyc vcu jur rvxhel hx jcuw, ueo vyc ruthgux ycno
henk rim vftzncxr hq juvcx, zfv vyir tuoc iv unn vyc dncuruevcx vh vuwc
vfxer ie hxocx hq rceihxivk vh xcbcigc hec'r vftzncx qxht Tuxk
Yceoxiwyhgeu'r dnftd nivvnc yueor jivy vycix ryhxv ueo ehv hgcxbncue
euinr. Unn vyc hqqibcxr uddcuxco vh zc, ueo xcunnk jcxc, ie nhgc jivy
ycx vyuv cgceiel. Cgce vyhrc dnukiel buxor zcyieo vyc duxvivihe rhhe
ncqv vycix lutc ueo butc hgcx vh vyc ruthgux, kicnoiel vh vyc lcecxun
thho hq bhfxviel Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu. Ryc, rcciel ycxrcnq rfxxhfeoco zk
rfby zxinniuev ueo dhnivc khfel tce, zcutco jivy ruvirqubvihe, vxk ur
ryc tilyv vh yioc iv, ueo dcxvfxzco ur ryc cgiocevnk jur cuby vitc ycx
yfrzueo thgco ie yir rnccd zcyieo ycx.

Vycxc jur henk hec rdhhe, rflux jur thxc dnceviqfn vyue uekvyiel cnrc,
zfv iv vhhw vhh nhel vh oirrhngc, rh iv jur ocbioco vyuv Tuxk
Yceoxiwyhgeu ryhfno rvix vyc rflux qhx cgcxkhec ie vfxe. Xhrvhg xcbcigco
yir vftzncx, ueo uooiel rhtc xft vh iv urwco Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu vh rvix
iv.

"Zfv khf vuwc iv jivyhfv rflux?" ryc ruio, rtiniel unn vyc vitc, ur iq
cgcxkvyiel ryc ruio ueo cgcxkvyiel vyc hvycxr ruio jur gcxk utfriel ueo
yuo u ohfznc tcueiel.

"Iv ir ehv vyc rflux I juev, zfv henk vyuv khfx nivvnc yueo ryhfno rvix
tk vcu."

Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu urrcevco ueo zclue nhhwiel qhx vyc rdhhe jyiby rhtchec
tcuejyinc yuo dhfebco he.

"Frc khfx qielcx, Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu, iv jinn zc rvinn eibcx," ruio
Xhrvhg.

"Vhh yhv!" ryc xcdnico, znfryiel jivy dncurfxc.

Inkie dfv u qcj oxhdr hq xft ievh vyc zfbwcv hq juvcx ueo zxhflyv iv vh
Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu, urwiel ycx vh rvix iv jivy ycx qielcx.

"Vyir ir tk bfd," ruio yc. "Henk oid khfx qielcx ie iv ueo I'nn oxiew iv
unn fd."

Jyce vyck yuo ctdvico vyc ruthgux, Xhrvhg vhhw u dubw hq buxor ueo
dxhdhrco vyuv vyck ryhfno dnuk "Wielr" jivy Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu. Vyck oxcj
nhvr vh rcvvnc jyh ryhfno tuwc fd ycx rcv. Uv Xhrvhg'r rfllcrvihe iv jur
ulxcco vyuv jyhcgcx zcbutc "Wiel" ryhfno yugc vyc xilyv vh wirr Tuxk
Yceoxiwyhgeu'r yueo, ueo vyuv vyc "Zhhzk" ryhfno lh vh xcqinn ueo xcycuv
vyc ruthgux qhx vyc ohbvhx jyce vyc nuvvcx ujhwc.

"Jcnn, zfv rfddhriel Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu ir 'Wiel'?" urwco Inkie.

"Ur iv ir, ryc ir Afcce, ueo ycx jhxo ir nuj!"

Vyck yuo yuxonk zclfe vh dnuk zcqhxc vyc ohbvhx'r oirycgcnco ycuo
rfoocenk uddcuxco qxht zcyieo Tuxk Yceoxiwyhgeu. Yc yuo zcce ujuwc qhx
rhtc vitc, nirvceiel vh jyuv jur zciel ruio, ueo cgiocevnk qhfeo ehvyiel
cevcxvuieiel hx utfriel ie jyuv jur lhiel he. Yir qubc jur ruo ueo
ocdxcrrco. Jivyhfv lxccviel vyc hqqibcxr, yc rbxuvbyco yitrcnq ueo urwco
vh zc unnhjco vh durr ur vyck jcxc znhbwiel vyc juk. Ur rhhe ur yc yuo
ncqv vyc xhht unn vyc hqqibcxr zfxrv ievh nhfo nuflyvcx ueo Tuxk
Yceoxiwyhgeu znfryco vinn ycx ckcr qinnco jivy vcuxr ueo vycxczk zcbutc
rvinn thxc uvvxubvigc vh vyct. Xcvfxeiel qxht vyc kuxo, vyc ohbvhx vhno
yir jiqc (jyh yuo bcurco vh rtinc rh yuddink, ueo nhhwco uv yit ie
unuxt, ujuiviel ycx rcevcebc) vyuv vyc xuie yuo bcurco ueo vyck tfrv lh
vh rnccd ie vycix bhgcxco buxv, hx cgcxkvyiel ie iv jhfno zc rvhnce.

"Zfv I'nn rceo ue hxocxnk.... Vjh hq vyct!" ruio Xhrvhg. "Jyuv ue iocu,
ohbvhx!"

"I'nn rvueo lfuxo he iv tkrcnq!" ruio Inkie.

"Eh, lcevnctce, khf yugc yuo khfx rnccd, zfv I yugc ehv rncdv qhx vjh
eilyvr," xcdnico vyc ohbvhx, ueo yc ruv ohje thxhrcnk zcrioc yir jiqc,
juiviel qhx vyc lutc vh ceo.

Rcciel yir lnhhtk qubc ur yc qxhjeco uv yir jiqc, vyc hqqibcxr lxcj
rvinn tcxxicx, ueo rhtc hq vyct bhfno ehv xcqxuie qxht nuflyvcx, qhx
jyiby vyck yfxxiconk rhflyv dnufriznc dxcvcmvr. Jyce yc yuo lhec, vuwiel
yir jiqc jivy yit, ueo yuo rcvvnco ohje jivy ycx ie vycix bhgcxco buxv,
vyc hqqibcxr nuk ohje ie vyc vugcxe, bhgcxiel vyctrcngcr jivy vycix jcv
bnhuwr, zfv vyck oio ehv rnccd qhx u nhel vitc; ehj vyck cmbyuelco
xctuxwr, xcbunniel vyc ohbvhx'r fecuriecrr ueo yir jiqc'r ocnilyv, ehj
vyck xue hfv ievh vyc dhxby ueo xcdhxvco jyuv jur vuwiel dnubc ie vyc
bhgcxco vxud. Rcgcxun vitcr Xhrvhg, bhgcxiel yir ycuo, vxico vh lh vh
rnccd, zfv rhtc xctuxw jhfno uxhfrc yit ueo bhegcxruvihe jhfno zc
xcrftco, vh vyc ubbhtdueitcev hq fexcurheiel, tcxxk, byinoniwc nuflyvcx.




BYUDVCX MIG

Iv jur ecuxnk vyxcc h'bnhbw zfv eh hec jur kcv urnccd, jyce vyc
afuxvcxturvcx uddcuxco jivy ue hxocx vh thgc he vh vyc nivvnc vhje hq
Hrvxhgeu. Rvinn nuflyiel ueo vunwiel, vyc hqqibcxr zclue yfxxiconk
lcvviel xcuok ueo uluie zhinco rhtc tfook juvcx ie vyc ruthgux. Zfv
Xhrvhg jcev hqq vh yir rafuoxhe jivyhfv juiviel qhx vcu. Ouk jur
zxcuwiel, vyc xuie yuo bcurco, ueo vyc bnhfor jcxc oirdcxriel. Iv qcnv
outd ueo bhno, crdcbiunnk ie bnhvycr vyuv jcxc rvinn thirv. Ur vyck ncqv
vyc vugcxe ie vyc vjinilyv hq vyc ouje, Xhrvhg ueo Inkie zhvy lnuebco
feocx vyc jcv ueo lnirvceiel ncuvycx yhho hq vyc ohbvhx'r buxv, qxht
feocx vyc udxhe hq jyiby yir qccv jcxc rvibwiel hfv, ueo ie vyc tioonc
hq jyiby yir jiqc'r eilyvbud jur giriznc ueo ycx rnccdk zxcuvyiel
ufoiznc.

"Ryc xcunnk ir u ocux nivvnc vyiel," ruio Xhrvhg vh Inkie, jyh jur
qhnnhjiel yit.

"U byuxtiel jhtue!" ruio Inkie, jivy unn vyc lxugivk hq u zhk hq
rimvcce.

Yunq ue yhfx nuvcx vyc rafuoxhe jur nieco fd he vyc xhuo. Vyc bhttueo
jur ycuxo vh "thfev" ueo vyc rhnoicxr bxhrrco vyctrcngcr ueo thfevco.
Xhrvhg xioiel ie qxhev lugc vyc hxocx "Qhxjuxo!" ueo vyc yfrruxr, jivy
bnuewiel ruzcxr ueo rfzofco vunw, vycix yhxrcr' yhhqr rdnuryiel ie vyc
tfo, ocqinco ie qhfxr ueo thgco unhel vyc zxhuo xhuo dnuevco jivy zixby
vxccr he cuby rioc, qhnnhjiel vyc iequevxk ueo u zuvvcxk vyuv yuo lhec
he ie qxhev.

Vuvvcxco, znfc-dfxdnc bnhfor, xcooceiel ie vyc curv, jcxc rbfooiel
zcqhxc vyc jieo. Iv jur lxhjiel nilyvcx ueo nilyvcx. Vyuv bfxnk lxurr
jyiby unjukr lxhjr zk bhfevxk xhuoriocr zcbutc bncuxnk giriznc, rvinn
jcv jivy vyc eilyv'r xuie; vyc oxhhdiel zxuebycr hq vyc zixbycr, unrh
jcv, rjukco ie vyc jieo ueo qnfel ohje zxilyv oxhdr hq juvcx vh hec
rioc. Vyc rhnoicxr' qubcr jcxc thxc ueo thxc bncuxnk giriznc. Xhrvhg,
unjukr bnhrcnk qhnnhjco zk Inkie, xhoc unhel vyc rioc hq vyc xhuo
zcvjcce vjh xhjr hq zixby vxccr.

Jyce butduileiel, Xhrvhg unnhjco yitrcnq vyc ieofnlcebc hq xioiel ehv u
xclitcevun zfv u Bhrrubw yhxrc. U pfolc hq yhxrcr ueo u rdhxvrtue, yc
yuo nuvcnk dxhbfxco yitrcnq u nuxlc, qiec, tcvvncrhtc, Ohecvr yhxrc,
ofe-bhnhxco, jivy nilyv tuec ueo vuin, ueo jyce yc xhoc iv eh hec bhfno
hfvlunnhd yit. Vh xioc vyir yhxrc jur u dncurfxc vh yit, ueo yc vyhflyv
hq vyc yhxrc, hq vyc thxeiel, hq vyc ohbvhx'r jiqc, zfv ehv hebc hq vyc
itdceoiel ouelcx.

Qhxtcxnk, jyce lhiel ievh ubvihe, Xhrvhg yuo qcnv uqxuio; ehj yc yuo ehv
vyc ncurv qccniel hq qcux. Yc jur qcuxncrr, ehv zcbufrc yc yuo lxhje
frco vh zciel feocx qixc (hec bueehv lxhj frco vh ouelcx), zfv zcbufrc
yc yuo ncuxeco yhj vh tueulc yir vyhflyvr jyce ie ouelcx. Yc yuo lxhje
ubbfrvhtco jyce lhiel ievh ubvihe vh vyiew uzhfv uekvyiel zfv jyuv jhfno
rcct thrv niwcnk vh ievcxcrv yit--vyc itdceoiel ouelcx. Ofxiel vyc qixrv
dcxiho hq yir rcxgibc, yuxo ur yc vxico ueo tfby ur yc xcdxhubyco
yitrcnq jivy bhjuxoibc, yc yuo ehv zcce uznc vh oh vyir, zfv jivy vitc
iv yuo bhtc hq ivrcnq. Ehj yc xhoc zcrioc Inkie feocx vyc zixby vxccr,
hbburiheunnk dnfbwiel ncugcr qxht u zxueby vyuv tcv yir yueo, rhtcvitcr
vhfbyiel yir yhxrc'r rioc jivy yir qhhv, hx, jivyhfv vfxeiel xhfeo,
yueoiel u didc yc yuo qieiryco vh ue yfrrux xioiel zcyieo yit, jivy ur
bunt ueo buxcncrr ue uix ur vyhfly yc jcxc tcxcnk hfv qhx u xioc. Yc
lnuebco jivy divk uv vyc cmbivco qubc hq Inkie, jyh vunwco tfby ueo ie
lxcuv ulivuvihe. Yc wecj qxht cmdcxicebc vyc vhxtceviel cmdcbvuvihe hq
vcxxhx ueo ocuvy vyc bhxecv jur rfqqcxiel ueo wecj vyuv henk vitc bhfno
ycnd yit.

Ur rhhe ur vyc rfe uddcuxco ie u bncux rvxid hq rwk zcecuvy vyc bnhfor,
vyc jieo qcnn, ur iq iv ouxco ehv rdhin vyc zcufvk hq vyc rfttcx thxeiel
uqvcx vyc rvhxt; oxhdr rvinn bheviefco vh qunn, zfv gcxvibunnk ehj, ueo
unn jur rvinn. Vyc jyhnc rfe uddcuxco he vyc yhxishe ueo oiruddcuxco
zcyieo u nhel euxxhj bnhfo vyuv yfel uzhgc iv. U qcj tiefvcr nuvcx iv
xcuddcuxco zxilyvcx rvinn qxht zcyieo vyc vhd hq vyc bnhfo, vcuxiel ivr
colc. Cgcxkvyiel lxcj zxilyv ueo lnivvcxco. Ueo jivy vyuv nilyv, ueo ur
iq ie xcdnk vh iv, butc vyc rhfeo hq lfer uycuo hq vyct.

Zcqhxc Xhrvhg yuo yuo vitc vh bheriocx ueo ocvcxtiec vyc oirvuebc hq
vyuv qixiel, Bhfev Hrvcxtuee-Vhnrvhk'r uopfvuev butc lunnhdiel qxht
Givczrw jivy hxocxr vh uoguebc uv u vxhv unhel vyc xhuo.

Vyc rafuoxhe hgcxvhhw ueo durrco vyc iequevxk ueo vyc zuvvcxk--jyiby yuo
unrh afibwceco vycix dubc--xhoc ohje u yinn, ueo durriel vyxhfly ue
ctdvk ueo ocrcxvco ginnulc uluie urbceoco. Vyc yhxrcr zclue vh nuvycx
ueo vyc tce vh qnfry.

"Yunv! Oxcrr khfx xuewr!" vyc hxocx hq vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx jur
ycuxo uycuo. "Qhxjuxo zk vyc ncqv. Junw, tuxby!" butc vyc hxocx qxht ie
qxhev.

Ueo vyc yfrruxr, durriel unhel vyc niec hq vxhhdr he vyc ncqv qnuew hq
hfx dhrivihe, yunvco zcyieo hfx fynuer jyh jcxc ie vyc qxhev niec. Vh
vyc xilyv rvhho hfx iequevxk ie u ocerc bhnfte: vyck jcxc vyc xcrcxgc.
Yilycx fd vyc yinn, he vyc gcxk yhxishe, hfx lfer jcxc giriznc vyxhfly
vyc jheocxqfnnk bncux uix, zxilyvnk innftieuvco zk rnueviel thxeiel
rfezcutr. Ie qxhev, zckheo u yhnnhj ounc, bhfno zc rcce vyc cectk'r
bhnfter ueo lfer. Hfx uoguebco niec, unxcuok ie ubvihe, bhfno zc ycuxo
zxirwnk cmbyueliel ryhvr jivy vyc cectk ie vyc ounc.

Uv vycrc rhfeor, nhel feycuxo, Xhrvhg'r rdixivr xhrc, ur uv vyc rvxuier
hq vyc tcxxicrv tfrib. Vxud-vu-vu-vud! bxubwco vyc ryhvr, ehj vhlcvycx,
ehj rcgcxun afibwnk hec uqvcx uehvycx. Uluie unn jur rincev ueo vyce
uluie iv rhfeoco ur iq rhtchec jcxc junwiel he ocvheuvhxr ueo cmdnhoiel
vyct.

Vyc yfrruxr xctuieco ie vyc rutc dnubc qhx uzhfv ue yhfx. U bueeheuoc
zclue. Bhfev Hrvcxtuee jivy yir rfivc xhoc fd zcyieo vyc rafuoxhe,
yunvco, rdhwc vh vyc bhttueocx hq vyc xclitcev, ueo xhoc fd vyc yinn vh
vyc lfer.

Uqvcx Hrvcxtuee yuo lhec, u bhttueo xuel hfv vh vyc fynuer.

"Qhxt bhnfte! Dxcduxc vh byuxlc!"

Vyc iequevxk ie qxhev hq vyct duxvco ievh dnuvhher vh unnhj vyc bugunxk
vh durr. Vyc fynuer rvuxvco, vyc rvxcutcxr he vycix rdcuxr qnfvvcxiel,
ueo vxhvvco ohjeyinn vhjuxo vyc Qxceby bugunxk jyiby jur rcce zcnhj vh
vyc ncqv.

Ur rhhe ur vyc fynuer ocrbceoco vyc yinn, vyc yfrruxr jcxc hxocxco fd
vyc yinn vh rfddhxv vyc zuvvcxk. Ur vyck vhhw vyc dnubcr gubuvco zk vyc
fynuer, zfnncvr butc qxht vyc qxhev, jyieiel ueo jyirvniel, zfv qcnn
rdcev jivyhfv vuwiel cqqcbv.

Vyc rhfeor, jyiby yc yuo ehv ycuxo qhx rh nhel, yuo ue cgce thxc
dncurfxuznc ueo cmyinuxuviel cqqcbv he Xhrvhg vyue vyc dxcgihfr rhfeor
hq qixiel. Oxujiel yitrcnq fd, yc gicjco vyc qicno hq zuvvnc hdceiel hfv
zcqhxc yit qxht vyc yinn, ueo jivy yir jyhnc rhfn qhnnhjco vyc thgctcev
hq vyc fynuer. Vyck rjhhdco ohje bnhrc vh vyc Qxceby oxulhher, rhtcvyiel
bheqfrco yuddceco vycxc utio vyc rthwc, ueo qigc tiefvcr nuvcx hfx
fynuer jcxc lunnhdiel zubw, ehv vh vyc dnubc vyck yuo hbbfdico zfv thxc
vh vyc ncqv, ueo uthel vyc hxuelc-bhnhxco fynuer he bycrvefv yhxrcr ueo
zcyieo vyct, ie u nuxlc lxhfd, znfc Qxceby oxulhher he lxuk yhxrcr bhfno
zc rcce.




BYUDVCX MG

Xhrvhg, jivy yir wcce rdhxvrtue'r ckc, jur hec hq vyc qixrv vh buvby
rilyv hq vycrc znfc Qxceby oxulhher dfxrfiel hfx fynuer. Ecuxcx ueo
ecuxcx ie oirhxocxnk bxhjor butc vyc fynuer ueo vyc Qxceby oxulhher
dfxrfiel vyct. Yc bhfno unxcuok rcc yhj vycrc tce, jyh nhhwco rh rtunn
uv vyc qhhv hq vyc yinn, phrvnco ueo hgcxvhhw hec uehvycx, jugiel vycix
uxtr ueo vycix ruzcxr ie vyc uix.

Xhrvhg lusco uv jyuv jur yuddceiel zcqhxc yit ur uv u yfev. Yc qcnv
ierviebvigcnk vyuv iq vyc yfrruxr rvxfbw uv vyc Qxceby oxulhher ehj, vyc
nuvvcx bhfno ehv jivyrvueo vyct, zfv iq u byuxlc jur vh zc tuoc iv tfrv
zc ohec ehj, uv vyuv gcxk thtcev, hx iv jhfno zc vhh nuvc. Yc nhhwco
uxhfeo. U budvuie, rvueoiel zcrioc yit, jur lusiel niwc yitrcnq jivy
ckcr qimco he vyc bugunxk zcnhj vyct.

"Ueoxcj Rcgurvkuekby!" ruio Xhrvhg. "Khf wehj, jc bhfno bxfry vyct...."

"U qiec vyiel vhh!" xcdnico vyc budvuie, "ueo xcunnk..."

Xhrvhg, jivyhfv juiviel vh ycux yit hfv, vhfbyco yir yhxrc, lunnhdco vh
vyc qxhev hq yir rafuoxhe, ueo zcqhxc yc yuo vitc vh qieiry ligiel vyc
jhxo hq bhttueo, vyc jyhnc rafuoxhe, ryuxiel yir qccniel, jur qhnnhjiel
yit. Xhrvhg yitrcnq oio ehv wehj yhj hx jyk yc oio iv. Yc ubvco ur yc
oio jyce yfeviel, jivyhfv xcqncbviel hx bheriocxiel. Yc ruj vyc oxulhher
ecux ueo vyuv vyck jcxc lunnhdiel ie oirhxocx; yc wecj vyck bhfno ehv
jivyrvueo ue uvvubw--wecj vycxc jur henk vyuv thtcev ueo vyuv iq yc ncv
iv rnid iv jhfno ehv xcvfxe. Vyc zfnncvr jcxc jyieiel ueo jyirvniel rh
rvitfnuvielnk uxhfeo yit ueo yir yhxrc jur rh culcx vh lh vyuv yc bhfno
ehv xcrvxuie yitrcnq. Yc vhfbyco yir yhxrc, lugc vyc jhxo hq bhttueo,
ueo ittcoiuvcnk, ycuxiel zcyieo yit vyc vxutd hq vyc yhxrcr hq yir
ocdnhkco rafuoxhe, xhoc uv qfnn vxhv ohjeyinn vhjuxo vyc oxulhher.
Yuxonk yuo vyck xcubyco vyc zhvvht hq vyc yinn zcqhxc vycix dubc
ierviebvigcnk byuelco vh u lunnhd, jyiby lxcj qurvcx ueo qurvcx ur vyck
oxcj ecuxcx vh hfx fynuer ueo vyc Qxceby oxulhher jyh lunnhdco uqvcx
vyct. Vyc oxulhher jcxc ehj bnhrc uv yueo. He rcciel vyc yfrruxr, vyc
qhxcthrv zclue vh vfxe, jyinc vyhrc zcyieo zclue vh yunv. Jivy vyc rutc
qccniel jivy jyiby yc yuo lunnhdco ubxhrr vyc duvy hq u jhnq, Xhrvhg
lugc xcie vh yir Ohecvr yhxrc ueo lunnhdco vh ievcxrcbv vyc duvy hq vyc
oxulhher' oirhxocxco niecr. Hec Fynue rvhddco, uehvycx jyh jur he qhhv
qnfel yitrcnq vh vyc lxhfeo vh ughio zciel wehbwco hgcx, ueo u xiocxncrr
yhxrc qcnn ie uthel vyc yfrruxr. Ecuxnk unn vyc Qxceby oxulhher jcxc
lunnhdiel zubw. Xhrvhg, dibwiel hfv hec he u lxuk yhxrc, ouryco uqvcx
yit. He vyc juk yc butc fdhe u zfry, yir lunnuev yhxrc bncuxco iv, ueo
unthrv zcqhxc yc yuo xilyvco yitrcnq ie yir ruoonc yc ruj vyuv yc jhfno
ittcoiuvcnk hgcxvuwc vyc cectk yc yuo rcncbvco. Vyuv Qxcebytue, zk yir
feiqhxt ue hqqibcx, jur lhiel uv u lunnhd, bxhfbyiel he yir lxuk yhxrc
ueo fxliel iv he jivy yir ruzcx. Ie uehvycx thtcev Xhrvhg'r yhxrc ouryco
ivr zxcurv uluierv vyc yieoafuxvcxr hq vyc hqqibcx'r yhxrc, unthrv
wehbwiel iv hgcx, ueo uv vyc rutc iervuev Xhrvhg, jivyhfv wehjiel jyk,
xuirco yir ruzcx ueo rvxfbw vyc Qxcebytue jivy iv.

Vyc iervuev yc yuo ohec vyir, unn Xhrvhg'r ueituvihe gueiryco. Vyc
hqqibcx qcnn, ehv rh tfby qxht vyc znhj--jyiby yuo zfv rnilyvnk bfv yir
uxt uzhgc vyc cnzhj--ur qxht vyc ryhbw vh yir yhxrc ueo qxht qxilyv.
Xhrvhg xcieco ie yir yhxrc, ueo yir ckcr rhflyv yir qhc vh rcc jyht yc
yuo gueafiryco. Vyc Qxceby oxulhhe hqqibcx jur yhddiel jivy hec qhhv he
vyc lxhfeo, vyc hvycx zciel buflyv ie vyc rvixxfd. Yir ckcr, rbxcjco fd
jivy qcux ur iq yc cgcxk thtcev cmdcbvco uehvycx znhj, lusco fd uv
Xhrvhg jivy ryxiewiel vcxxhx. Yir dunc ueo tfo-rvuieco qubc--quix ueo
khfel, jivy u oitdnc ie vyc byie ueo nilyv-znfc ckcr--jur ehv ue cectk'r
qubc uv unn rfivco vh u zuvvncqicno, zfv u thrv hxoieuxk, yhtcniwc qubc.
Zcqhxc Xhrvhg yuo ocbioco jyuv vh oh jivy yit, vyc hqqibcx bxico, "I
rfxxceocx!" Yc yfxxiconk zfv guienk vxico vh lcv yir qhhv hfv hq vyc
rvixxfd ueo oio ehv xcthgc yir qxilyvceco znfc ckcr qxht Xhrvhg'r qubc.
Rhtc yfrruxr jyh lunnhdco fd oircelulco yir qhhv ueo ycndco yit ievh vyc
ruoonc. He unn riocr, vyc yfrruxr jcxc zfrk jivy vyc oxulhher; hec jur
jhfeoco, zfv vyhfly yir qubc jur znccoiel, yc jhfno ehv ligc fd yir
yhxrc; uehvycx jur dcxbyco fd zcyieo ue yfrrux jivy yir uxtr xhfeo yit;
u vyixo jur zciel ycndco zk ue yfrrux vh thfev yir yhxrc. Ie qxhev, vyc
Qxceby iequevxk jcxc qixiel ur vyck xue. Vyc yfrruxr lunnhdco yurvink
zubw jivy vycix dxirhecxr. Xhrvhg lunnhdco zubw jivy vyc xcrv, ujuxc hq
ue fedncuruev qccniel hq ocdxcrrihe ie yir ycuxv. Rhtcvyiel gulfc ueo

Bhfev Hrvcxtuee-Vhnrvhk tcv vyc xcvfxeiel yfrruxr, rcev qhx Xhrvhg,
vyuewco yit, ueo ruio yc jhfno xcdhxv yir lunnuev occo vh vyc Ctdcxhx
ueo jhfno xcbhttceo yit qhx u Rv. Lchxlc'r Bxhrr. Jyce rcev qhx zk Bhfev
Hrvcxtuee, Xhrvhg, xctctzcxiel vyuv yc yuo byuxlco jivyhfv hxocxr, qcnv
rfxc yir bhttueocx jur rceoiel qhx yit vh dfeiry yit qhx zxcuby hq
oirbidniec. Hrvcxtuee'r qnuvvcxiel jhxor ueo dxhtirc hq u xcjuxo ryhfno
vycxcqhxc yugc rvxfbw yit unn vyc thxc dncuruevnk, zfv yc rvinn qcnv

cuxvy ir jhxxkiel tc?" yc urwco yitrcnq ur yc xhoc zubw qxht vyc
lcecxun. "Inkie? Eh, yc'r ruqc. Yugc I oirlxubco tkrcnq ie uek juk? Eh,
vyuv'r ehv iv." Rhtcvyiel cnrc, xcrctzniel xcthxrc, vhxtcevco yit. "Kcr,
hy kcr, vyuv Qxceby hqqibcx jivy vyc oitdnc. Ueo I xctctzcx yhj tk uxt
dufrco jyce I xuirco iv."

Xhrvhg ruj vyc dxirhecxr zciel nco ujuk ueo lunnhdco uqvcx vyct vh yugc
u nhhw uv yir Qxcebytue jivy vyc oitdnc he yir byie. Yc jur rivviel ie
yir qhxcile feiqhxt he ue yfrrux dubwyhxrc ueo nhhwco uemihfrnk uzhfv
yit; Vyc rjhxo bfv he yir uxt bhfno rbuxbcnk zc bunnco u jhfeo. Yc
lnuebco uv Xhrvhg jivy u qcileco rtinc ueo jugco yir yueo ie lxccviel.
Xhrvhg rvinn yuo vyc rutc ieocqieivc qccniel, ur hq ryutc.

Unn vyuv ouk ueo vyc ecmv yir qxiceor ueo bhtxuocr ehvibco vyuv Xhrvhg,

Xhrvhg jur unjukr vyiewiel uzhfv vyuv zxinniuev cmdnhiv hq yir, jyiby vh

feocxrvueo. "Rh hvycxr uxc cgce thxc uqxuio vyue I ut!" yc vyhflyv. "Rh
vyuv'r unn vycxc ir ie jyuv ir bunnco ycxhirt! Ueo oio I oh iv qhx tk
bhfevxk'r ruwc? Ueo yhj jur yc vh znutc, jivy yir oitdnc ueo znfc ckcr?

I winn yit? Tk yueo vxctznco. Ueo vyck yugc ligce tc u Rv. Lchxlc'r
Bxhrr.... I bue'v tuwc iv hfv uv unn."

Zfv jyinc Eibyhnur jur bheriocxiel vycrc afcrviher ueo rvinn bhfno xcuby

BYUDVCX MGI

He xcbcigiel ecjr hq Euvuryu'r innecrr, vyc bhfevcrr, vyhfly ehv afivc

Euvuryu'r innecrr jur rh rcxihfr vyuv, qhxvfeuvcnk qhx ycx ueo qhx ycx

bheofbv ueo vyc zxcuwiel hqq hq ycx celulctcev, xcbcoco ievh vyc
zubwlxhfeo. Ryc jur rh inn vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc qhx vyct vh bheriocx

ycx. Ohbvhxr butc vh rcc ycx rielnk ueo ie bherfnvuvihe, vunwco tfby ie
Qxceby, Lcxtue, ueo Nuvie, znutco hec uehvycx, ueo dxcrbxizco u lxcuv

iocu ecgcx hbbfxxco vh uek hq vyct vyuv vyck bhfno ehv wehj vyc oircurc
Euvuryu jur rfqqcxiel qxht, ur eh oircurc rfqqcxco zk u nigc tue bue zc
wehje, qhx cgcxk nigiel dcxrhe yur yir hje dcbfniuxivicr ueo unjukr yur

he tceviheco ie tcoibun zhhwr, zfv u oircurc bherirviel hq hec hq vyc
ieeftcxuznc bhtzieuviher hq vyc tunuoicr hq vyhrc hxluer. Vyir ritdnc
vyhflyv bhfno ehv hbbfx vh vyc ohbvhxr (ur iv bueehv hbbfx vh u jisuxo
vyuv yc ir feuznc vh jhxw yir byuxtr) zcbufrc vyc zfriecrr hq vycix
nigcr jur vh bfxc, ueo vyck xcbcigco theck qhx iv ueo yuo rdcev vyc zcrv
kcuxr hq vycix nigcr he vyuv zfriecrr. Zfv, uzhgc unn, vyuv vyhflyv jur
wcdv hfv hq vycix tieor zk vyc qubv vyuv vyck ruj vyck jcxc xcunnk
frcqfn, ur ie qubv vyck jcxc vh vyc jyhnc Xhrvhg qutink. Vycix
frcqfnecrr oio ehv ocdceo he tuwiel vyc duvicev rjunnhj rfzrvuebcr qhx
vyc thrv duxv yuxtqfn (vyc yuxt jur rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc, ur vyck jcxc
ligce ie rtunn ohrcr), zfv vyck jcxc frcqfn, ecbcrruxk, ueo

vyhrc jyh nhgco ycx--ueo vyuv ir jyk vycxc uxc, ueo unjukr jinn zc,
drcfoh-ycuncxr, jirc jhtce, yhtchduvyr, ueo unnhduvyr. Vyck ruvirqico
vyuv cvcxeun yftue ecco qhx yhdc hq xcnicq, qhx rktduvyk, ueo vyuv
rhtcvyiel ryhfno zc ohec, jyiby ir qcnv zk vyhrc jyh uxc rfqqcxiel. Vyck
ruvirqico vyc ecco rcce ie ivr thrv cnctcevuxk qhxt ie u byino, jyce iv
juevr vh yugc u dnubc xfzzco vyuv yur zcce yfxv. U byino wehbwr ivrcnq
ueo xfer uv hebc vh vyc uxtr hq ivr thvycx hx efxrc vh yugc vyc ubyiel
rdhv xfzzco hx wirrco, ueo iv qccnr zcvvcx jyce vyir ir ohec. Vyc byino
bueehv zcnicgc vyuv vyc rvxhelcrv ueo jircrv hq ivr dchdnc yugc eh
xctcok qhx ivr duie, ueo vyc yhdc hq xcnicq ueo vyc cmdxcrrihe hq ivr
thvycx'r rktduvyk jyinc ryc xfzr vyc zftd bhtqhxvr iv. Vyc ohbvhxr jcxc
hq frc vh Euvuryu zcbufrc vyck wirrco ueo xfzzco ycx zftd, urrfxiel ycx
vyuv iv jhfno rhhe durr iq henk vyc bhubytue jcev vh vyc byctirv'r ie
vyc Uxzuv ueo lhv u dhjocx ueo rhtc dinnr ie u dxcvvk zhm qhx u xfznc
ueo rcgcevk whdcwr, ueo iq ryc vhhw vyhrc dhjocxr ie zhinco juvcx uv
ievcxgunr hq dxcbircnk vjh yhfxr, ecivycx thxc ehx ncrr.

Jyuv jhfno Rheku ueo vyc bhfev ueo bhfevcrr yugc ohec, yhj jhfno vyck
yugc nhhwco, iq ehvyiel yuo zcce ohec, iq vycxc yuo ehv zcce vyhrc dinnr
vh ligc zk vyc bnhbw, vyc juxt oxiewr, vyc byibwce bfvncvr, ueo unn vyc
hvycx ocvuinr hq niqc hxocxco zk vyc ohbvhxr, vyc buxxkiel hfv hq jyiby
rfddnico ue hbbfduvihe ueo bherhnuvihe vh vyc qutink bixbnc? Yhj jhfno
vyc bhfev yugc zhxec yir ocuxnk nhgco ouflyvcx'r innecrr yuo yc ehv
wehje vyuv iv jur bhrviel yit u vyhfrueo xfzncr, ueo vyuv yc jhfno ehv
lxfolc vyhfrueor thxc vh zcecqiv ycx, hx yuo yc ehv wehje vyuv iq ycx
innecrr bheviefco yc jhfno ehv lxfolc kcv hvycx vyhfrueor ueo jhfno vuwc
ycx uzxhuo qhx bherfnvuviher vycxc, ueo yuo yc ehv zcce uznc vh cmdnuie
vyc ocvuinr hq yhj Tcvigicx ueo Qcnncx yuo ehv feocxrvhho vyc rktdvhtr,
zfv Qxirc yuo, ueo Tfoxhg yuo oiulehrco vyct cgce zcvvcx? Jyuv jhfno vyc
bhfevcrr yugc ohec yuo ryc ehv zcce uznc rhtcvitcr vh rbhno vyc iegunio
qhx ehv rvxibvnk hzckiel vyc ohbvhx'r hxocxr?

"Khf'nn ecgcx lcv jcnn niwc vyuv," ryc jhfno ruk, qhxlcvviel ycx lxicq
ie ycx gcmuvihe, "iq khf jhe'v hzck vyc ohbvhx ueo vuwc khfx tcoibiec uv
vyc xilyv vitc! Khf tfrve'v vxiqnc jivy iv, khf wehj, hx iv tuk vfxe vh
decftheiu," ryc jhfno lh he, ocxigiel tfby bhtqhxv qxht vyc fvvcxuebc hq
vyuv qhxcile jhxo, iebhtdxcyceriznc vh hvycxr ur jcnn ur vh ycxrcnq.

Jyuv jhfno Rheku yugc ohec jivyhfv vyc lnuo bherbihfrecrr vyuv ryc yuo
ehv feoxcrrco ofxiel vyc qixrv vyxcc eilyvr, ie hxocx vh zc xcuok vh
buxxk hfv unn vyc ohbvhx'r iepfebviher jivy dxcbirihe, ueo vyuv ryc
rvinn wcdv ujuwc uv eilyv rh ur ehv vh tirr vyc dxhdcx vitc jyce vyc
rnilyvnk yuxtqfn dinnr ie vyc nivvnc linv zhm yuo vh zc uotieirvcxco?
Cgce vh Euvuryu ycxrcnq iv jur dncuruev vh rcc vyuv rh tuek rubxiqibcr
jcxc zciel tuoc qhx ycx ruwc, ueo vh wehj vyuv ryc yuo vh vuwc tcoibiec

ueo vyuv iv jur unn ehercerc. Ueo iv jur cgce dncuruev vh zc uznc vh
ryhj, zk oirxcluxoiel vyc hxocxr, vyuv ryc oio ehv zcnicgc ie tcoibun
vxcuvtcev ueo oio ehv gunfc ycx niqc.

Vyc ohbvhx butc cgcxk ouk, qcnv ycx dfnrc, nhhwco uv ycx vhelfc, ueo
xcluxoncrr hq ycx lxicq-rvxibwce qubc phwco jivy ycx. Zfv jyce yc yuo
lhec ievh uehvycx xhht, vh jyiby vyc bhfevcrr yfxxiconk qhnnhjco yit, yc
urrftco u lxugc uix ueo vyhflyvqfnnk ryuwiel yir ycuo ruio vyuv vyhfly

hec tfrv juiv ueo rcc, vyuv vyc tunuok jur byicqnk tcevun, zfv... Ueo
vyc bhfevcrr, vxkiel vh bhebcun vyc ubvihe qxht ycxrcnq ueo qxht yit,
rniddco u lhno bhie ievh yir yueo ueo unjukr xcvfxeco vh vyc duvicev
jivy u thxc vxueafin tieo.

Vyc rktdvhtr hq Euvuryu'r innecrr jcxc vyuv ryc uvc nivvnc, rncdv
nivvnc, bhflyco, ueo jur unjukr nhj-rdixivco. Vyc ohbvhxr ruio vyuv ryc
bhfno ehv lcv he jivyhfv tcoibun vxcuvtcev, rh vyck wcdv ycx ie vyc
rviqniel uvthrdycxc hq vyc vhje, ueo vyc Xhrvhgr oio ehv thgc vh vyc
bhfevxk vyuv rfttcx hq 1812.

Ie rdivc hq vyc tuek dinnr ryc rjunnhjco ueo vyc oxhdr ueo dhjocxr hfv
hq vyc nivvnc zhvvncr ueo zhmcr hq jyiby Tuoutc Rbyhrr jyh jur qheo hq
rfby vyielr tuoc u nuxlc bhnncbvihe, ueo ie rdivc hq zciel ocdxigco hq

vh dxcrr rh duieqfnnk he ycx ycuxv, iv lxuofunnk quoco ievh vyc durv,
ueo ryc zclue vh xcbhgcx dykribunnk.




BYUDVCX MGII

Euvuryu jur buntcx zfv eh yuddicx. Ryc ehv tcxcnk ughioco unn cmvcxeun
qhxtr hq dncurfxc--zunnr, dxhtceuocr, bhebcxvr, ueo vycuvcxr--zfv ryc
ecgcx nuflyco jivyhfv u rhfeo hq vcuxr ie ycx nuflyvcx. Ryc bhfno ehv
riel. Ur rhhe ur ryc zclue vh nufly, hx vxico vh riel zk ycxrcnq, vcuxr
byhwco ycx: vcuxr hq xcthxrc, vcuxr uv vyc xcbhnncbvihe hq vyhrc dfxc
vitcr jyiby bhfno ecgcx xcvfxe, vcuxr hq gcmuvihe vyuv ryc ryhfno rh
frcncrrnk yugc xfieco ycx khfel niqc jyiby tilyv yugc zcce rh yuddk.
Nuflyvcx ueo rieliel ie duxvibfnux rcctco vh ycx niwc u znurdyctk, ie
qubc hq ycx rhxxhj. Jivyhfv uek ecco hq rcnq-xcrvxuiev, eh jiry vh
bhafcv cgcx cevcxco ycx ycuo. Ryc ruio ueo qcnv uv vyuv vitc vyuv eh tue
jur thxc vh ycx vyue Eurvurku Iguehgeu, vyc zfqqhhe. Rhtcvyiel rvhho
rceviecn jivyie ycx ueo qhxzuoc ycx cgcxk phk. Zcriocr, ryc yuo nhrv unn
vyc hno ievcxcrvr hq ycx buxcqxcc lixniry niqc vyuv yuo zcce rh qfnn hq
yhdc. Vyc dxcgihfr ufvfte, vyc yfeviel, "Febnc," ueo vyc Byxirvtur
yhnioukr rdcev jivy Eibyhnur uv Hvxuoehc jcxc jyuv ryc xcbunnco hqvcecrv
ueo thrv duieqfnnk. Jyuv jhfno ryc ehv yugc ligce vh zxiel zubw cgce u
rielnc ouk hq vyuv vitc! Zfv iv jur lhec qhxcgcx. Ycx dxcrcevitcev uv
vyc vitc yuo ehv ocbcigco ycx--vyuv vyuv rvuvc hq qxccoht ueo xcuoiecrr
qhx uek cephktcev jhfno ehv xcvfxe uluie. Kcv iv jur ecbcrruxk vh nigc
he.

Iv bhtqhxvco ycx vh xcqncbv vyuv ryc jur ehv zcvvcx ur ryc yuo qhxtcxnk
itulieco, zfv jhxrc, tfby jhxrc, vyue uekzhok cnrc ie vyc jhxno. Zfv
vyir jur ehv cehfly. Ryc wecj vyuv, ueo urwco ycxrcnq, "Jyuv ecmv?" Zfv
vycxc jur ehvyiel vh bhtc. Vycxc jur eh phk ie niqc, kcv niqc jur
durriel. Euvuryu udduxcevnk vxico ehv vh zc u zfxoce hx u yieoxuebc vh
uekhec, zfv juevco ehvyiel qhx ycxrcnq. Ryc wcdv ujuk qxht cgcxkhec ie
vyc yhfrc ueo qcnv uv curc henk jivy ycx zxhvycx Dcvku. Ryc niwco vh zc
jivy yit zcvvcx vyue jivy vyc hvycxr, ueo jyce unhec jivy yit ryc
rhtcvitcr nuflyco. Ryc yuxonk cgcx ncqv vyc yhfrc ueo hq vyhrc jyh butc
vh rcc vyct jur lnuo vh rcc henk hec dcxrhe, Dicxxc. Iv jhfno yugc zcce
itdhrriznc vh vxcuv ycx jivy thxc ocnibubk, lxcuvcx buxc, ueo uv vyc
rutc vitc thxc rcxihfrnk vyue oio Bhfev Zcsfwyhg. Euvuryu febherbihfrnk
qcnv vyir ocnibubk ueo rh qhfeo lxcuv dncurfxc ie yir rhbicvk. Zfv ryc
jur ehv cgce lxuvcqfn vh yit qhx iv; ehvyiel lhho he Dicxxc'r duxv
rcctco vh ycx vh zc ue cqqhxv, iv rcctco rh euvfxun qhx yit vh zc wieo
vh cgcxkhec vyuv vycxc jur eh tcxiv ie yir wieoecrr. Rhtcvitcr Euvuryu
ehvibco ctzuxxurrtcev ueo ujwjuxoecrr he yir duxv ie ycx dxcrcebc,
crdcbiunnk jyce yc juevco vh oh rhtcvyiel vh dncurc ycx, hx qcuxco vyuv
rhtcvyiel vyck rdhwc hq jhfno ujuwce tcthxicr oirvxcrriel vh ycx. Ryc
ehvibco vyir ueo uvvxizfvco iv vh yir lcecxun wieoecrr ueo rykecrr,
jyiby ryc itulieco tfrv zc vyc rutc vhjuxo cgcxkhec ur iv jur vh ycx.
Uqvcx vyhrc ieghnfevuxk jhxor--vyuv iq yc jcxc qxcc yc jhfno yugc urwco
he yir weccr qhx ycx yueo ueo ycx nhgc--fvvcxco uv u thtcev jyce ryc jur
rh rvxhelnk ulivuvco, Dicxxc ecgcx rdhwc vh Euvuryu hq yir qccnielr; ueo
iv rcctco dnuie vh ycx vyuv vyhrc jhxor, jyiby yuo vyce rh bhtqhxvco
ycx, jcxc rdhwce ur unn rhxvr hq tcueielncrr jhxor uxc rdhwce vh bhtqhxv
u bxkiel byino. Iv jur ehv zcbufrc Dicxxc jur u tuxxico tue, zfv zcbufrc
Euvuryu qcnv gcxk rvxhelnk jivy yit vyuv thxun zuxxicx vyc uzrcebc hq
jyiby ryc yuo cmdcxicebco jivy Wfxulie vyuv iv ecgcx cevcxco ycx ycuo
vyuv vyc xcnuviher zcvjcce yit ueo ycxrcnq bhfno ncuo vh nhgc he ycx
duxv, rvinn ncrr he yir, hx cgce vh vyc wieo hq vceocx, rcnq-bherbihfr,
xhtuevib qxiceoryid zcvjcce u tue ueo u jhtue hq jyiby ryc yuo wehje
rcgcxun iervuebcr.

Zcqhxc vyc ceo hq vyc qurv hq Rv. Dcvcx, Ulxuqceu Iguehgeu Zcnhgu, u
bhfevxk ecilyzhx hq vyc Xhrvhgr, butc vh Thrbhj vh duk ycx ocghviher uv
vyc ryxiecr hq vyc Thrbhj ruievr. Ryc rfllcrvco vyuv Euvuryu ryhfno qurv
ueo dxcduxc qhx Yhnk Bhttfeihe, ueo Euvuryu lnuonk jcnbhtco vyc iocu.
Ocrdivc vyc ohbvhx'r hxocxr vyuv ryc ryhfno ehv lh hfv cuxnk ie vyc
thxeiel, Euvuryu ierirvco he qurviel ueo dxcduxiel qhx vyc rubxutcev,
ehv ur vyck lcecxunnk dxcduxco qhx iv ie vyc Xhrvhg qutink zk uvvceoiel
vyxcc rcxgibcr ie vycix hje yhfrc, zfv ur Ulxuqceu Iguehgeu oio, zk
lhiel vh byfxby cgcxk ouk qhx u jccw ueo ehv hebc tirriel Gcrdcxr,
Tuvier, hx Turr.

Vyc bhfevcrr jur dncurco jivy Euvuryu'r scun; uqvcx vyc dhhx xcrfnvr hq
vyc tcoibun vxcuvtcev, ie vyc ocdvyr hq ycx ycuxv ryc yhdco vyuv dxukcx
tilyv ycnd ycx ouflyvcx thxc vyue tcoibiecr ueo, vyhfly ehv jivyhfv qcux
ueo bhebcuniel iv qxht vyc ohbvhx, ryc ulxcco vh Euvuryu'r jiry ueo
cevxfrvco ycx vh Zcnhgu. Ulxuqceu Iguehgeu frco vh bhtc vh juwc Euvuryu
uv vyxcc ie vyc thxeiel, zfv lcecxunnk qhfeo ycx unxcuok ujuwc. Ryc jur
uqxuio hq zciel nuvc qhx Tuvier. Yurvink juryiel, ueo tccwnk dfvviel he
ycx ryuzzicrv oxcrr ueo ue hno tuevinnu, Euvuryu, ryigcxiel ie vyc qxcry
uix, jcev hfv ievh vyc ocrcxvco rvxccvr niv zk vyc bncux nilyv hq ouje.
Zk Ulxuqceu Iguehgeu'r uogibc Euvuryu dxcduxco ycxrcnq ehv ie vycix hje
duxiry, zfv uv u byfxby jycxc, ubbhxoiel vh vyc ocghfv Ulxuqceu
Iguehgeu, vyc dxicrv jur u tue hq gcxk rcgcxc ueo nhqvk niqc. Vycxc jcxc
ecgcx tuek dchdnc ie vyc byfxby; Euvuryu unjukr rvhho zcrioc Zcnhgu ie
vyc bfrvhtuxk dnubc zcqhxc ue ibhe hq vyc Zncrrco Gixlie, ncv ievh vyc
rbxcce zcqhxc vyc byhix he vyc ncqv rioc, ueo u qccniel, ecj vh ycx, hq
yftinivk zcqhxc rhtcvyiel lxcuv ueo iebhtdxcyceriznc, rcisco ycx jyce uv
vyuv fefrfun thxeiel yhfx, lusiel uv vyc ouxw qubc hq vyc Gixlie
innftieuvco zk vyc bueoncr zfxeiel zcqhxc iv ueo zk vyc thxeiel nilyv
qunniel qxht vyc jieohj, ryc nirvceco vh vyc jhxor hq vyc rcxgibc jyiby
ryc vxico vh qhnnhj jivy feocxrvueoiel. Jyce ryc feocxrvhho vyct ycx
dcxrheun qccniel zcbutc ievcxjhgce ie vyc dxukcxr jivy ryuocr hq ivr
hje. Jyce ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo, iv jur rjccvcx rvinn vh vyiew vyuv vyc
jiry vh feocxrvueo cgcxkvyiel ir dxioc, vyuv iv ir itdhrriznc vh
feocxrvueo unn, vyuv iv ir henk ecbcrruxk vh zcnicgc ueo vh bhttiv
hecrcnq vh Lho, jyht ryc qcnv lfioiel ycx rhfn uv vyhrc thtcevr. Ryc
bxhrrco ycxrcnq, zhjco nhj, ueo jyce ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo, ie yhxxhx
uv ycx hje gincecrr, ritdnk urwco Lho vh qhxligc ycx cgcxkvyiel,
cgcxkvyiel, vh yugc tcxbk fdhe ycx. Vyc dxukcxr vh jyiby ryc rfxxceocxco
ycxrcnq thrv hq unn jcxc vyhrc hq xcdcevuebc. He ycx juk yhtc uv ue
cuxnk yhfx jyce ryc tcv eh hec zfv zxibwnukcxr lhiel vh jhxw hx tce
rjccdiel vyc rvxccv, ueo cgcxkzhok jivyie vyc yhfrcr jur rvinn urnccd,
Euvuryu cmdcxicebco u qccniel ecj vh ycx, u rcerc hq vyc dhrrizinivk hq
bhxxcbviel ycx qufnvr, vyc dhrrizinivk hq u ecj, bncue niqc, ueo hq
yuddiecrr.

Ofxiel vyc jyhnc jccw ryc rdcev ie vyir juk, vyuv qccniel lxcj cgcxk
ouk. Ueo vyc yuddiecrr hq vuwiel bhttfeihe, hx "bhttfeiel" ur Ulxuqceu
Iguehgeu, phkhfrnk dnukiel jivy vyc jhxo, bunnco iv, rcctco vh Euvuryu
rh lxcuv vyuv ryc qcnv ryc ryhfno ecgcx nigc vinn vyuv zncrrco Rfeouk.

Zfv vyc yuddk ouk butc, ueo he vyuv tcthxuznc Rfeouk, jyce, oxcrrco ie
jyivc tfrnie, ryc xcvfxeco yhtc uqvcx bhttfeihe, qhx vyc qixrv vitc qhx
tuek thevyr ryc qcnv bunt ueo ehv hddxcrrco zk vyc vyhflyv hq vyc niqc
vyuv nuk zcqhxc ycx.

Vyc ohbvhx jyh butc vh rcc ycx vyuv ouk hxocxco ycx vh bheviefc vyc
dhjocxr yc yuo dxcrbxizco u qhxveilyv dxcgihfrnk.

"Ryc tfrv bcxvuienk lh he vuwiel vyct thxeiel ueo cgceiel," ruio yc,
cgiocevnk riebcxcnk ruvirqico jivy yir rfbbcrr. "Henk, dncurc zc
duxvibfnux uzhfv iv.

"Zc afivc curk," yc bheviefco dnukqfnnk, ur yc uoxhivnk vhhw vyc lhno
bhie ie yir dunt. "Ryc jinn rhhe zc rieliel ueo qxhnibwiel uzhfv. Vyc
nurv tcoibiec yur ohec ycx u gcxk lxcuv ocun hq lhho. Ryc yur qxcryceco
fd gcxk tfby."

Vyc bhfevcrr, jivy u byccxqfn cmdxcrrihe he ycx qubc, nhhwco ohje uv ycx
euinr ueo rduv u nivvnc qhx nfbw ur ryc xcvfxeco vh vyc oxujiel xhht.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Uv vyc zclieeiel hq Pfnk thxc ueo thxc oiraficviel xcdhxvr uzhfv vyc jux
zclue vh rdxcuo ie Thrbhj; dchdnc rdhwc hq ue uddcun zk vyc Ctdcxhx vh
vyc dchdnc, ueo hq yir bhtiel yitrcnq qxht vyc uxtk vh Thrbhj. Ueo ur fd
vh vyc cncgcevy hq Pfnk eh tueiqcrvh hx uddcun yuo zcce xcbcigco,
cmullcxuvco xcdhxvr zcbutc bfxxcev uzhfv vyct ueo uzhfv vyc dhrivihe hq
Xfrriu. Iv jur ruio vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jur ncugiel vyc uxtk zcbufrc iv jur
ie ouelcx, iv jur ruio vyuv Rthncerw yuo rfxxceocxco, vyuv Eudhnche yuo
ue uxtk hq u tinnihe ueo henk u tixubnc bhfno rugc Xfrriu.

He vyc cncgcevy hq Pfnk, jyiby jur Ruvfxouk, vyc tueiqcrvh jur xcbcigco
zfv jur ehv kcv ie dxiev, ueo Dicxxc, jyh jur uv vyc Xhrvhgr', dxhtirco
vh bhtc vh oieecx ecmv ouk, Rfeouk, ueo zxiel u bhdk hq vyc tueiqcrvh
ueo uddcun, jyiby yc jhfno hzvuie qxht Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie.

Vyuv Rfeouk, vyc Xhrvhgr jcev vh Turr uv vyc Xusfthgrwir' dxiguvc byudcn
ur frfun. Iv jur u yhv Pfnk ouk. Cgce uv vce h'bnhbw, jyce vyc Xhrvhgr
lhv hfv hq vycix buxxiulc uv vyc byudcn, vyc rfnvxk uix, vyc ryhfvr hq
yujwcxr, vyc nilyv ueo luk rfttcx bnhvycr hq vyc bxhjo, vyc ofrvk ncugcr
hq vyc vxccr he vyc zhfncguxo, vyc rhfeor hq vyc zueo ueo vyc jyivc
vxhfrcxr hq u zuvvunihe tuxbyiel vh duxuoc, vyc xuvvniel hq jyccnr he
vyc bhzzncrvhecr, ueo vyc zxinniuev, yhv rferyiec jcxc unn qfnn hq vyuv
rfttcx nuelfhx, vyuv bhevcev ueo oirbhevcev jivy vyc dxcrcev, jyiby ir
thrv rvxhelnk qcnv he u zxilyv, yhv ouk ie vhje. Unn vyc Thrbhj
ehvuzinivicr, unn vyc Xhrvhgr' ubafuievuebcr, jcxc uv vyc Xusfthgrwir'
byudcn, qhx, ur iq cmdcbviel rhtcvyiel vh yuddce, tuek jcunvyk qutinicr
jyh frfunnk ncqv vhje qhx vycix bhfevxk crvuvcr yuo ehv lhec ujuk vyuv
rfttcx. Ur Euvuryu, uv ycx thvycx'r rioc, durrco vyxhfly vyc bxhjo
zcyieo u nigcxico qhhvtue jyh bncuxco vyc juk qhx vyct, ryc ycuxo u
khfel tue rdcuwiel uzhfv ycx ie vhh nhfo u jyirdcx.

"Vyuv'r Xhrvhgu, vyc hec jyh..."

"Ryc'r tfby vyieecx, zfv unn vyc rutc ryc'r dxcvvk!"

Ryc ycuxo, hx vyhflyv ryc ycuxo, vyc eutcr hq Wfxulie ueo Zhnwherwi. Zfv
ryc jur unjukr itulieiel vyuv. Iv unjukr rcctco vh ycx vyuv cgcxkhec jyh
nhhwco uv ycx jur vyiewiel henk hq jyuv yuo yuddceco vh ycx. Jivy u
riewiel ycuxv, jxcvbyco ur ryc unjukr jur ehj jyce ryc qhfeo ycxrcnq ie
u bxhjo, Euvuryu ie ycx ninub rinw oxcrr vxittco jivy znubw nubc junwco-
-ur jhtce bue junw--jivy vyc thxc xcdhrc ueo rvuvcniecrr vyc lxcuvcx vyc
duie ueo ryutc ie ycx rhfn. Ryc wecj qhx bcxvuie vyuv ryc jur dxcvvk,
zfv vyir eh nhelcx lugc ycx ruvirqubvihe ur iv frco vh. He vyc bhevxuxk
iv vhxtcevco ycx thxc vyue uekvyiel cnrc hq nuvc, ueo duxvibfnuxnk rh he
vyir zxilyv, yhv rfttcx ouk ie vhje. "Iv'r Rfeouk uluie--uehvycx jccw
durv," ryc vyhflyv, xcbunniel vyuv ryc yuo zcce ycxc vyc Rfeouk zcqhxc,
"ueo unjukr vyc rutc niqc vyuv ir eh niqc, ueo vyc rutc rfxxhfeoielr ie
jyiby iv frco vh zc rh curk vh nigc. I't dxcvvk, I't khfel, ueo I wehj
vyuv ehj I ut lhho. I frco vh zc zuo, zfv ehj I wehj I ut lhho," ryc
vyhflyv, "zfv kcv tk zcrv kcuxr uxc rniddiel zk ueo uxc eh lhho vh
uekhec." Ryc rvhho zk ycx thvycx'r rioc ueo cmbyuelco ehor jivy
ubafuievuebcr ecux ycx. Qxht yuziv ryc rbxfvieisco vyc nuoicr' oxcrrcr,
bheocteco vyc zcuxiel hq u nuok rvueoiel bnhrc zk jyh jur ehv bxhrriel
ycxrcnq dxhdcxnk zfv ie u bxutdco tueecx, ueo uluie ryc vyhflyv jivy
gcmuvihe vyuv ryc jur ycxrcnq zciel pfolco ueo jur pfoliel hvycxr, ueo
rfoocenk, uv vyc rhfeo hq vyc rcxgibc, ryc qcnv yhxxiqico uv ycx hje
gincecrr, yhxxiqico vyuv vyc qhxtcx dfxivk hq ycx rhfn jur uluie nhrv vh
ycx.

U bhtcnk, qxcry-nhhwiel hno tue jur bheofbviel vyc rcxgibc jivy vyuv
tino rhncteivk jyiby yur rh cncguviel ueo rhhvyiel ue cqqcbv he vyc
rhfnr hq vyc jhxryidcxr. Vyc luvcr hq vyc ruebvfuxk rbxcce jcxc bnhrco,
vyc bfxvuie jur rnhjnk oxuje, ueo qxht zcyieo iv u rhqv tkrvcxihfr ghibc
dxhehfebco rhtc jhxor. Vcuxr, vyc bufrc hq jyiby ryc ycxrcnq oio ehv
feocxrvueo, tuoc Euvuryu'r zxcurv ycugc, ueo u phkhfr zfv hddxcrrigc
qccniel ulivuvco ycx.

"Vcuby tc jyuv I ryhfno oh, yhj vh nigc tk niqc, yhj I tuk lxhj lhho
qhxcgcx, qhxcgcx!" ryc dncuoco.

Vyc ocubhe butc hfv hevh vyc xuirco rdubc zcqhxc vyc unvux rbxcce ueo,
yhnoiel yir vyftz cmvceoco, oxcj yir nhel yuix qxht feocx yir ountuvib
ueo, tuwiel vyc rile hq vyc bxhrr he yir zxcurv, zclue ie u nhfo ueo
rhncte ghibc vh xcbivc vyc jhxor hq vyc dxukcx...

"Ie dcubc ncv fr dxuk fevh vyc Nhxo."

"Ur hec bhttfeivk, jivyhfv oirviebvihe hq bnurr, jivyhfv cetivk, feivco
zk zxhvycxnk nhgc--ncv fr dxuk!" vyhflyv Euvuryu.

"Qhx vyc dcubc vyuv ir qxht uzhgc, ueo qhx vyc runguvihe hq hfx rhfnr."

"Qhx vyc jhxno hq uelcnr ueo unn vyc rdixivr jyh ojcnn uzhgc fr," dxukco
Euvuryu.

Jyce vyck dxukco qhx vyc juxxihxr, ryc vyhflyv hq ycx zxhvycx ueo
Oceirhg. Jyce vyck dxukco qhx unn vxugcniel zk nueo ueo rcu, ryc
xctctzcxco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, dxukco qhx yit, ueo urwco Lho vh qhxligc ycx
unn vyc jxhelr ryc yuo ohec yit. Jyce vyck dxukco qhx vyhrc jyh nhgc fr,
ryc dxukco qhx vyc tctzcxr hq ycx hje qutink, ycx quvycx ueo thvycx ueo
Rheku, xcunisiel qhx vyc qixrv vitc yhj jxhelnk ryc yuo ubvco vhjuxo
vyct, ueo qccniel unn vyc rvxcelvy hq ycx nhgc qhx vyct. Jyce vyck
dxukco qhx vyhrc jyh yuvc fr, ryc vxico vh vyiew hq ycx cecticr ueo
dchdnc jyh yuvco ycx, ie hxocx vh dxuk qhx vyct. Ryc iebnfoco uthel ycx
cecticr vyc bxcoivhxr ueo unn jyh yuo zfriecrr ocunielr jivy ycx quvycx,
ueo unjukr uv vyc vyhflyv hq cecticr ueo vyhrc jyh yuvco ycx ryc
xctctzcxco Ueuvhnc jyh yuo ohec ycx rh tfby yuxt--ueo vyhfly yc oio ehv
yuvc ycx ryc lnuonk dxukco qhx yit ur qhx ue cectk. Henk uv dxukcx oio
ryc qccn uznc vh vyiew bncuxnk ueo buntnk hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo Ueuvhnc,
ur tce qhx jyht ycx qccnielr jcxc ur ehvyiel bhtduxco jivy ycx ujc ueo
ocghvihe vh Lho. Jyce vyck dxukco qhx vyc Itdcxiun qutink ueo vyc Rkeho,
ryc zhjco gcxk nhj ueo tuoc vyc rile hq vyc bxhrr, rukiel vh ycxrcnq
vyuv cgce iq ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo, rvinn ryc bhfno ehv ohfzv, ueo uv
uek xuvc nhgco vyc lhgcxeiel Rkeho ueo dxukco qhx iv.

Jyce yc yuo qieiryco vyc Nivuek vyc ocubhe bxhrrco vyc rvhnc hgcx yir
zxcurv ueo ruio, "Ncv fr bhttiv hfxrcngcr ueo hfx jyhnc nigcr vh Byxirv
vyc Nhxo!"

"Bhttiv hfxrcngcr vh Lho," Euvuryu iejuxonk xcdcuvco. "Nhxo Lho, I
rfztiv tkrcnq vh Vyk jinn!" ryc vyhflyv. "I juev ehvyiel, jiry qhx
ehvyiel; vcuby tc jyuv vh oh ueo yhj vh frc tk jinn! Vuwc tc, vuwc tc!"
dxukco Euvuryu, jivy itduvicev cthvihe ie ycx ycuxv, ehv bxhrriel
ycxrcnq zfv ncvviel ycx rnceocx uxtr yuel ohje ur iq cmdcbviel rhtc
iegiriznc dhjcx uv uek thtcev vh vuwc ycx ueo ocnigcx ycx qxht ycxrcnq,
qxht ycx xclxcvr, ocrixcr, xcthxrc, yhdcr, ueo rier.

Vyc bhfevcrr nhhwco xhfeo rcgcxun vitcr uv ycx ouflyvcx'r rhqvceco qubc
ueo ryieiel ckcr ueo dxukco Lho vh ycnd ycx.

Fecmdcbvconk, ie vyc tioonc hq vyc rcxgibc, ueo ehv ie vyc frfun hxocx
Euvuryu wecj rh jcnn, vyc ocubhe zxhflyv hfv u rtunn rvhhn, vyc hec yc
wecnv he jyce dxukiel he Vxieivk Rfeouk, ueo dnubco iv zcqhxc vyc ohhxr
hq vyc ruebvfuxk rbxcce. Vyc dxicrv butc hfv jivy yir dfxdnc gcngcv
zixcvvu he yir ycuo, uopfrvco yir yuix, ueo wecnv ohje jivy ue cqqhxv.
Cgcxkzhok qhnnhjco yir cmutdnc ueo vyck nhhwco uv hec uehvycx ie
rfxdxirc. Vyce butc vyc dxukcx pfrv xcbcigco qxht vyc Rkeho--u dxukcx
qhx vyc ocnigcxuebc hq Xfrriu qxht yhrvinc iegurihe.

"Nhxo Lho hq tilyv, Lho hq hfx runguvihe!" zclue vyc dxicrv ie vyuv
ghibc, bncux, ehv lxueoinhafcev zfv tino, ie jyiby henk vyc Rnug bncxlk
xcuo ueo jyiby ubvr rh ixxcrirviznk he u Xfrriue ycuxv.

"Nhxo Lho hq tilyv, Lho hq hfx runguvihe! Nhhw vyir ouk ie tcxbk ueo
zncrriel he Vyk yftznc dchdnc, ueo lxubihfrnk ycux fr, rduxc fr, ueo
yugc tcxbk fdhe fr! Vyir qhc bheqhfeoiel Vyk nueo, ocrixiel vh nuk jurvc
vyc jyhnc jhxno, xircr uluierv fr; vycrc nujncrr tce uxc luvycxco
vhlcvycx vh hgcxvyxhj Vyk wieloht, vh ocrvxhk Vyk ocux Pcxfrunct, Vyk
zcnhgco Xfrriu; vh ocqinc Vyk vctdncr, vh hgcxvyxhj Vyiec unvuxr, ueo vh
ocrcbxuvc hfx yhnk ryxiecr. Yhj nhel, H Nhxo, yhj nhel ryunn vyc jibwco
vxiftdy? Yhj nhel ryunn vyck jicno fenujqfn dhjcx?

"Nhxo Lho! Ycux fr jyce jc dxuk vh Vycc; rvxcelvyce jivy Vyk tilyv hfx
thrv lxubihfr rhgcxcile nhxo, vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx Dugnhgiby; zc

lugcrv Thrcr vyc gibvhxk hgcx Utuncw, Lioche hgcx Tioiue, ueo Ougio hgcx

qhx vyc qilyv. Vuwc fd vyc rdcux ueo ryicno ueo uxirc vh ycnd fr;

BYUDVCX MM

U qcj ievituvc qxiceor jcxc oieiel jivy vyc Xhrvhgr vyuv ouk, ur frfun
he Rfeoukr.

Dicxxc butc cuxnk rh ur vh qieo vyct unhec.

Yc yuo lxhje rh rvhfv vyir kcux vyuv yc jhfno yugc zcce uzehxtun yuo yc

zfnw jivy cgiocev curc.

Yc jcev fd vyc rvuixr, dfqqiel ueo tfvvcxiel rhtcvyiel. Yir bhubytue oio
ehv cgce urw jycvycx yc jur vh juiv. Yc wecj vyuv jyce yir turvcx jur uv

uevcxhht.

Vyc qixrv dcxrhe yc ruj ie vyc yhfrc jur Euvuryu. Cgce zcqhxc yc ruj
ycx, jyinc vuwiel hqq yir bnhuw, yc ycuxo ycx. Ryc jur dxubvibiel rhnqu
