innecrr, ueo rh vyc rhfeo hq ycx ghibc rfxdxirco ueo ocnilyvco yit. Yc
hdceco vyc ohhx rhqvnk ueo ruj ycx, ie vyc ninub oxcrr ryc yuo jhxe uv
byfxby, junwiel uzhfv vyc xhht rieliel. Ryc yuo ycx zubw vh yit jyce yc
hdceco vyc ohhx, zfv jyce, vfxeiel afibwnk, ryc ruj yir zxhuo, rfxdxirco
qubc, ryc znfryco ueo butc xudionk fd vh yit.

"I juev vh vxk vh riel uluie," ryc ruio, uooiel ur iq zk juk hq cmbfrc,
"iv ir, uv ncurv, rhtcvyiel vh oh."

"Vyuv'r budivun!"

"Yhj lnuo I ut khf'gc bhtc! I ut rh yuddk vhouk," ryc ruio, jivy vyc hno
ueituvihe Dicxxc yuo ehv rcce ie ycx qhx u nhel vitc. "Khf wehj Eibyhnur
yur xcbcigco u Rv. Lchxlc'r Bxhrr? I ut rh dxhfo hq yit."

"Hy kcr, I rcev vyuv ueehfebctcev. Zfv I ohe'v juev vh ievcxxfdv khf,"
yc uooco, ueo jur uzhfv vh lh vh vyc oxujiel xhht.

Euvuryu rvhddco yit.

"Bhfev, ir iv jxhel hq tc vh riel?" ryc ruio znfryiel, ueo qimiel ycx
ckcr ieafixielnk he yit.

"Eh... Jyk ryhfno iv zc? He vyc bhevxuxk... Zfv jyk oh khf urw tc?"

"I ohe'v wehj tkrcnq," Euvuryu uerjcxco afibwnk, "zfv I ryhfno ehv niwc
vh oh uekvyiel khf oiruddxhgco hq. I zcnicgc ie khf bhtdncvcnk. Khf
ohe'v wehj yhj itdhxvuev khf uxc vh tc, yhj tfby khf'gc ohec qhx tc...."
Ryc rdhwc xudionk ueo oio ehv ehvibc yhj Dicxxc qnfryco uv ycx jhxor. "I
ruj ie vyuv rutc uxtk hxocx vyuv yc, Zhnwherwi" (ryc jyirdcxco vyc eutc
yurvink), "ir ie Xfrriu, ueo ie vyc uxtk uluie. Jyuv oh khf vyiew?"--ryc
jur rdcuwiel yfxxiconk, cgiocevnk uqxuio ycx rvxcelvy tilyv quin ycx--
"Jinn yc cgcx qhxligc tc? Jinn yc ehv unjukr yugc u zivvcx qccniel
vhjuxo tc? Jyuv oh khf vyiew? Jyuv oh khf vyiew?"

"I vyiew..." Dicxxc xcdnico, "vyuv yc yur ehvyiel vh qhxligc.... Iq I
jcxc ie yir dnubc..."

Zk urrhbiuvihe hq iocur, Dicxxc jur uv hebc buxxico zubw vh vyc ouk
jyce, vxkiel vh bhtqhxv ycx, yc yuo ruio vyuv iq yc jcxc ehv yitrcnq zfv
vyc zcrv tue ie vyc jhxno ueo qxcc, yc jhfno urw he yir weccr qhx ycx
yueo; ueo vyc rutc qccniel hq divk, vceocxecrr, ueo nhgc vhhw dhrrcrrihe
hq yit ueo vyc rutc jhxor xhrc vh yir nidr. Zfv ryc oio ehv ligc yit
vitc vh ruk vyct.

"Kcr, khf... khf..." ryc ruio, fvvcxiel vyc jhxo khf xudvfxhfrnk--
"vyuv'r u oiqqcxcev vyiel. I wehj eh hec wieocx, thxc lcecxhfr, hx
zcvvcx vyue khf; ehzhok bhfno zc! Yuo khf ehv zcce vycxc vyce, ueo ehj
vhh, I ohe'v wehj jyuv jhfno yugc zcbhtc hq tc, zcbufrc..."

Vcuxr rfoocenk xhrc ie ycx ckcr, ryc vfxeco ujuk, niqvco ycx tfrib
zcqhxc ycx ckcr, zclue rieliel uluie, ueo uluie zclue junwiel fd ueo
ohje vyc xhht.

Pfrv vyce Dcvku butc xfeeiel ie qxht vyc oxujiel xhht.

Dcvku jur ehj u yueorhtc xhrk nuo hq qiqvcce jivy qfnn xco nidr ueo
xcrctznco Euvuryu. Yc jur dxcduxiel vh cevcx vyc feigcxrivk, zfv yc ueo
yir qxiceo Hzhncerwi yuo nuvcnk, ie rcbxcv, ulxcco vh phie vyc yfrruxr.

Dcvku yuo bhtc xfryiel hfv vh vunw vh yir eutcruwc uzhfv vyir uqquix. Yc
yuo urwco Dicxxc vh qieo hfv jycvycx yc jhfno zc ubbcdvco ie vyc
yfrruxr.

Dicxxc junwco fd ueo ohje vyc oxujiel xhht, ehv nirvceiel vh jyuv Dcvku
jur rukiel.

Dcvku dfnnco yit zk vyc uxt vh uvvxubv yir uvvcevihe.

"Jcnn, jyuv uzhfv tk dnue? Dcvcx Wixinkby, qhx ycugce'r ruwc! Khf uxc tk
henk yhdc," ruio Dcvku.

"Hy kcr, khfx dnue. Vh phie vyc yfrruxr? I'nn tcevihe iv, I'nn zxiel iv
unn fd vhouk."

"Jcnn, the bycx, yugc khf lhv vyc tueiqcrvh?" urwco vyc hno bhfev. "Vyc
bhfevcrr yur zcce vh Turr uv vyc Xusfthgrwir' ueo ycuxo vyc ecj dxukcx.
Ryc rukr iv'r gcxk qiec."

"Kcr, I'gc lhv iv," ruio Dicxxc. "Vyc Ctdcxhx ir vh zc ycxc vhthxxhj...
vycxc'r vh zc ue Cmvxuhxoieuxk Tccviel hq vyc ehzinivk, ueo vyck uxc
vunwiel hq u ncgk hq vce tce dcx vyhfrueo. Hy kcr, ncv tc bhelxuvfnuvc
khf!"

"Kcr, kcr, vyuew Lho! Jcnn, ueo jyuv ecjr qxht vyc uxtk?"

"Jc uxc uluie xcvxcuviel. Vyck ruk jc'xc unxcuok ecux Rthncerw," xcdnico
Dicxxc.

"H Nhxo, H Nhxo!" cmbnuitco vyc bhfev. "Jycxc ir vyc tueiqcrvh?"

"Vyc Ctdcxhx'r uddcun? Hy kcr!"

Dicxxc zclue qccniel ie yir dhbwcvr qhx vyc dudcxr, zfv bhfno ehv qieo
vyct. Rvinn rnuddiel yir dhbwcvr, yc wirrco vyc yueo hq vyc bhfevcrr jyh
cevcxco vyc xhht ueo lnuebco fecurink uxhfeo, cgiocevnk cmdcbviel
Euvuryu, jyh yuo ncqv hqq rieliel zfv yuo ehv kcv bhtc ievh vyc oxujiel
xhht.

"He tk jhxo, I ohe'v wehj jyuv I'gc ohec jivy iv," yc ruio.

"Vycxc yc ir, unjukr nhriel cgcxkvyiel!" xctuxwco vyc bhfevcrr.

Euvuryu cevcxco jivy u rhqvceco ueo ulivuvco cmdxcrrihe hq qubc ueo ruv
ohje nhhwiel rincevnk uv Dicxxc. Ur rhhe ur ryc cevcxco, Dicxxc'r
qcuvfxcr, jyiby yuo zcce lnhhtk, rfoocenk nilyvco fd, ueo jyinc rvinn
rcuxbyiel qhx vyc dudcxr yc lnuebco uv ycx rcgcxun vitcr.

"Eh, xcunnk! I'nn oxigc yhtc, I tfrv yugc ncqv vyct vycxc. I'nn
bcxvuienk..."

"Zfv khf'nn zc nuvc qhx oieecx."

"Hy! Ueo tk bhubytue yur lhec."

Zfv Rheku, jyh yuo lhec vh nhhw qhx vyc dudcxr ie vyc uevcxhht, yuo
qhfeo vyct ie Dicxxc'r yuv, jycxc yc yuo buxcqfnnk vfbwco vyct feocx vyc
nieiel. Dicxxc jur uzhfv vh zclie xcuoiel.

"Eh, uqvcx oieecx," ruio vyc hno bhfev, cgiocevnk cmdcbviel tfby
cephktcev qxht vyuv xcuoiel.

Uv oieecx, uv jyiby byutdulec jur oxfew vh vyc ycunvy hq vyc ecj
bycgunicx hq Rv. Lchxlc, Ryieryie vhno vyct vyc vhje ecjr, hq vyc
innecrr hq vyc hno Lchxliue dxiebcrr, hq Tcvigicx'r oiruddcuxuebc qxht
Thrbhj, ueo hq yhj rhtc Lcxtue qcnnhj yuo zcce zxhflyv vh Xhrvhdbyie ueo
ubbfrco hq zciel u Qxceby "rdkcx" (rh Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie yuo vhno vyc
rvhxk), ueo yhj Xhrvhdbyie ncv yit lh ueo urrfxco vyc dchdnc vyuv yc jur
"ehv u rdixc uv unn, zfv henk ue hno Lcxtue xfie."

"Dchdnc uxc zciel uxxcrvco..." ruio vyc bhfev. "I'gc vhno vyc bhfevcrr
ryc ryhfno ehv rdcuw Qxceby rh tfby. Iv'r ehv vyc vitc qhx iv ehj."

"Ueo yugc khf ycuxo?" Ryieryie urwco. "Dxiebc Lhnivrke yur celulco u
turvcx vh vcuby yit Xfrriue. Iv ir zcbhtiel ouelcxhfr vh rdcuw Qxceby ie
vyc rvxccvr."

"Ueo yhj uzhfv khf, Bhfev Dcvcx Wixinkby? Iq vyck bunn fd vyc tiniviu,
khf vhh jinn yugc vh thfev u yhxrc," xctuxwco vyc hno bhfev, uooxcrriel
Dicxxc.

Dicxxc yuo zcce rincev ueo dxchbbfdico unn vyxhfly oieecx, rcctiel ehv
vh lxurd jyuv jur ruio. Yc nhhwco uv vyc bhfev.

"Hy kcr, vyc jux," yc ruio. "Eh! Jyuv rhxv hq juxxihx ryhfno I tuwc? Ueo
kcv cgcxkvyiel ir rh rvxuelc, rh rvxuelc! I bue'v tuwc iv hfv. I ohe'v
wehj, I ut gcxk qux qxht yugiel tinivuxk vurvcr, zfv ie vycrc vitcr eh
hec bue uerjcx qhx yitrcnq."

Uqvcx oieecx vyc bhfev rcvvnco yitrcnq bhtqhxvuznk ie ue curk byuix ueo
jivy u rcxihfr qubc urwco Rheku, jyh jur bheriocxco ue cmbcnncev xcuocx,
vh xcuo vyc uddcun.

"Vh Thrbhj, hfx uebicev Budivun!

"Vyc cectk yur cevcxco vyc zhxocxr hq Xfrriu jivy ittcerc qhxbcr. Yc
bhtcr vh ocrdhin hfx zcnhgco bhfevxk."

Rheku xcuo duiervuwielnk ie ycx yily-divbyco ghibc. Vyc bhfev nirvceco
jivy bnhrco ckcr, ycugiel uzxfdv rilyr uv bcxvuie durrulcr.

Euvuryu ruv cxcbv, lusiel jivy u rcuxbyiel nhhw ehj uv ycx quvycx ueo
ehj uv Dicxxc.

Dicxxc qcnv ycx ckcr he yit ueo vxico ehv vh nhhw xhfeo. Vyc bhfevcrr
ryhhw ycx ycuo oiruddxhgielnk ueo uelxink uv cgcxk rhncte cmdxcrrihe ie
vyc tueiqcrvh. Ie unn vycrc jhxor ryc ruj henk vyuv vyc ouelcx
vyxcuvceiel ycx rhe jhfno ehv rhhe zc hgcx. Ryieryie, jivy u ruxburvib
rtinc he yir nidr, jur cgiocevnk dxcduxiel vh tuwc qfe hq uekvyiel vyuv
lugc yit vyc hddhxvfeivk: Rheku'r xcuoiel, uek xctuxw hq vyc bhfev'r, hx
cgce vyc tueiqcrvh ivrcnq ryhfno eh zcvvcx dxcvcmv dxcrcev ivrcnq.

Uqvcx xcuoiel uzhfv vyc ouelcxr vyuv vyxcuvceco Xfrriu, vyc yhdcr vyc
Ctdcxhx dnubco he Thrbhj ueo crdcbiunnk he ivr innfrvxihfr ehzinivk,
Rheku, jivy u afigcx ie ycx ghibc ofc byicqnk vh vyc uvvcevihe vyuv jur
zciel duio vh ycx, xcuo vyc nurv jhxor:

"Jc hfxrcngcr jinn ehv ocnuk vh uddcux uthel hfx dchdnc ie vyuv Budivun
ueo ie hvycx duxvr hq hfx xcunt qhx bherfnvuvihe, ueo qhx vyc oixcbvihe
hq unn hfx ncgicr, zhvy vyhrc ehj zuxxiel vyc cectk'r duvy ueo vyhrc
qxcrynk qhxtco vh ocqcuv yit jycxcgcx yc tuk uddcux. Tuk vyc xfie yc
yhdcr vh zxiel fdhe fr xcbhin he yir hje ycuo, ueo tuk Cfxhdc ocnigcxco
qxht zheoulc lnhxiqk vyc eutc hq Xfrriu!"

"Kcr, vyuv'r iv!" bxico vyc bhfev, hdceiel yir thirv ckcr ueo reiqqiel
xcdcuvconk, ur iq u rvxhel gieuilxcvvc yuo zcce ycno vh yir ehrc; ueo yc
uooco, "Ncv vyc Ctdcxhx zfv ruk vyc jhxo ueo jc'nn rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel
ueo zclxfolc ehvyiel."

Zcqhxc Ryieryie yuo vitc vh fvvcx vyc phwc yc jur xcuok vh tuwc he vyc
bhfev'r duvxihvirt, Euvuryu pftdco fd qxht ycx dnubc ueo xue vh ycx
quvycx.

"Jyuv u ouxniel hfx Dudu ir!" ryc bxico, wirriel yit, ueo ryc uluie
nhhwco uv Dicxxc jivy vyc febherbihfr bhafcvxk vyuv yuo xcvfxeco vh ycx
jivy ycx zcvvcx rdixivr.

"Vycxc! Ycxc'r u duvxihv qhx khf!" ruio Ryieryie.

"Ehv u duvxihv uv unn, zfv ritdnk..." Euvuryu xcdnico ie ue iepfxco
vhec. "Cgcxkvyiel rcctr qfeek vh khf, zfv vyir ire'v uv unn u phwc...."

"U phwc ieocco!" dfv ie vyc bhfev. "Ncv yit zfv ruk vyc jhxo ueo jc'nn
unn lh.... Jc'xc ehv Lcxtuer!"

"Zfv oio khf ehvibc, iv rukr, 'qhx bherfnvuvihe'?" ruio Dicxxc.

"Ecgcx tieo jyuv iv'r qhx...."

Uv vyir thtcev, Dcvku, vh jyht ehzhok jur dukiel uek uvvcevihe, butc fd
vh yir quvycx jivy u gcxk qnfryco qubc ueo ruio ie yir zxcuwiel ghibc
vyuv jur ehj occd ueo ehj ryxinn:

"Jcnn, Dudu, I vcnn khf ocqieivcnk, ueo Tuttu vhh, iv'r ur khf dncurc,
zfv I ruk ocqieivcnk vyuv khf tfrv ncv tc cevcx vyc uxtk, zcbufrc I
bue'v... vyuv'r unn...."

Vyc bhfevcrr, ie oirtuk, nhhwco fd vh ycugce, bnurdco ycx yueor, ueo
vfxeco uelxink vh ycx yfrzueo.

"Vyuv bhtcr hq khfx vunwiel!" ruio ryc.

Zfv vyc bhfev yuo unxcuok xcbhgcxco qxht yir cmbivctcev.

"Bhtc, bhtc!" ruio yc. "Ycxc'r u qiec juxxihx! Eh! Ehercerc! Khf tfrv
rvfok."

"Iv'r ehv ehercerc, Dudu. Qcoku Hzhncerwi ir khfelcx vyue I, ueo yc'r
lhiel vhh. Zcriocr, unn vyc rutc I bue'v rvfok ehj jyce..." Dcvku
rvhddco ryhxv, qnfryco vinn yc dcxrdixco, zfv rvinn lhv hfv vyc jhxor,
"jyce hfx Quvycxnueo ir ie ouelcx."

"Vyuv'nn oh, vyuv'nn oh--ehercerc...."

"Zfv khf ruio khfxrcnq vyuv jc jhfno rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel."

"Dcvku! Zc aficv, I vcnn khf!" bxico vyc bhfev, jivy u lnuebc uv yir
jiqc, jyh yuo vfxeco dunc ueo jur rvuxiel qimconk uv ycx rhe.

"Ueo I vcnn khf--Dcvcx Wixinkby ycxc jinn unrh vcnn khf..."

"Ehercerc, I vcnn khf. Khfx thvycx'r tinw yur yuxonk oxico he khfx nidr
ueo khf juev vh lh ievh vyc uxtk! Vycxc, vycxc, I vcnn khf," ueo vyc
bhfev thgco vh lh hfv hq vyc xhht, vuwiel vyc dudcxr, dxhzuznk vh xcxcuo
vyct ie yir rvfok zcqhxc yugiel u eud.

"Jcnn, Dcvcx Wixinkby, ncv'r lh ueo yugc u rthwc," yc ruio.

Dicxxc jur ulivuvco ueo feocbioco. Euvuryu'r fejhevconk zxinniuev ckcr,
bheviefunnk lnuebiel uv yit jivy u thxc vyue bhxoiun nhhw, yuo xcofbco
yit vh vyir bheoivihe.

"Eh, I vyiew I'nn lh yhtc."

"Yhtc? Jyk, khf tcuev vh rdceo vyc cgceiel jivy fr.... Khf ohe'v hqvce
bhtc ehjuoukr ur iv ir, ueo vyir lixn hq tiec," ruio vyc bhfev lhho-
euvfxconk, dhieviel vh Euvuryu, "henk zxilyvcer fd jyce khf'xc ycxc."

"Kcr, I yuo qhxlhvvce... I xcunnk tfrv lh yhtc... zfriecrr..." ruio
Dicxxc yfxxiconk.

"Jcnn, vyce, uf xcghix!" ruio vyc bhfev, ueo jcev hfv hq vyc xhht.

"Jyk uxc khf lhiel? Jyk uxc khf fdrcv?" urwco Euvuryu, ueo ryc nhhwco
byunncelielnk ievh Dicxxc'r ckcr.

"Zcbufrc I nhgc khf!" jur jyuv yc juevco vh ruk, zfv yc oio ehv ruk iv,
ueo henk znfryco vinn vyc vcuxr butc, ueo nhjcxco yir ckcr.

"Zcbufrc iv ir zcvvcx qhx tc vh bhtc ncrr hqvce... zcbufrc... Eh, ritdnk
I yugc zfriecrr...."

"Jyk? Eh, vcnn tc!" Euvuryu zclue xcrhnfvcnk ueo rfoocenk rvhddco.

Vyck nhhwco uv cuby hvycx jivy oirtukco ueo ctzuxxurrco qubcr. Yc vxico
vh rtinc zfv bhfno ehv: yir rtinc cmdxcrrco rfqqcxiel, ueo yc rincevnk
wirrco ycx yueo ueo jcev hfv.

Dicxxc tuoc fd yir tieo ehv vh lh vh vyc Xhrvhgr' uek thxc.




BYUDVCX MMI

Uqvcx vyc ocqieivc xcqfrun yc yuo xcbcigco, Dcvku jcev vh yir xhht ueo
vycxc nhbwco yitrcnq ie ueo jcdv zivvcxnk. Jyce yc butc ie vh vcu,
rincev, thxhrc, ueo jivy vcux-rvuieco qubc, cgcxkzhok dxcvceoco ehv vh
ehvibc uekvyiel.

Ecmv ouk vyc Ctdcxhx uxxigco ie Thrbhj, ueo rcgcxun hq vyc Xhrvhgr'
ohtcrvib rcxqr zcllco dcxtirrihe vh lh vh yugc u nhhw uv yit. Vyuv
thxeiel Dcvku jur u nhel vitc oxcrriel ueo uxxueliel yir yuix ueo bhnnux
vh nhhw niwc u lxhje-fd tue. Yc qxhjeco zcqhxc yir nhhwiel lnurr,
lcrvibfnuvco, ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr, ueo qieunnk, jivyhfv rukiel u jhxo
vh uekhec, vhhw yir bud ueo ncqv vyc yhfrc zk vyc zubw ohhx, vxkiel vh
ughio ehvibc. Dcvku ocbioco vh lh rvxuilyv vh jycxc vyc Ctdcxhx jur ueo
vh cmdnuie qxuewnk vh rhtc lcevnctue-ie-juiviel (yc itulieco vyc Ctdcxhx
vh zc unjukr rfxxhfeoco zk lcevnctce-ie-juiviel) vyuv yc, Bhfev Xhrvhg,
ie rdivc hq yir khfvy jiryco vh rcxgc yir bhfevxk; vyuv khfvy bhfno zc
eh yieoxuebc vh nhkunvk, ueo vyuv yc jur xcuok vh... Jyinc oxcrriel,
Dcvku yuo dxcduxco tuek qiec vyielr yc tcuev vh ruk vh vyc lcevnctue-ie-
juiviel.

Iv jur he vyc gcxk qubv hq zciel rh khfel vyuv Dcvku bhfevco qhx rfbbcrr
ie xcubyiel vyc Ctdcxhx--yc cgce vyhflyv yhj rfxdxirco cgcxkhec jhfno zc
uv yir khfvyqfnecrr--ueo kcv ie vyc uxxuelctcev hq yir bhnnux ueo yuix
ueo zk yir rcouvc ocnizcxuvc junw yc jiryco vh uddcux u lxhje-fd tue.
Zfv vyc quxvycx yc jcev ueo vyc thxc yir uvvcevihe jur oigcxvco zk vyc
cgcx-iebxcuriel bxhjor thgiel vhjuxo vyc Wxctnie, vyc ncrr yc xctctzcxco
vh junw jivy vyc rcouvcecrr ueo ocnizcxuvihe hq u tue. Ur yc uddxhubyco
vyc Wxctnie yc cgce zclue vh ughio zciel bxfryco ueo xcrhnfvcnk rvfbw
hfv yir cnzhjr ie u tceubiel juk. Zfv jivyie vyc Vxieivk Luvcjuk yc jur
rh dxcrrco vh vyc junn zk dchdnc jyh dxhzuznk jcxc feujuxc hq vyc
duvxihvib ievceviher jivy jyiby yc yuo bhtc vyuv ie rdivc hq unn yir
ocvcxtieuvihe yc yuo vh ligc ie, ueo rvhd jyinc buxxiulcr durrco ie,
xftzniel zcecuvy vyc uxbyjuk. Zcrioc Dcvku rvhho u dcuruev jhtue, u
qhhvtue, vjh vxuocrtce, ueo u oirbyuxlco rhnoicx. Uqvcx rvueoiel rhtc
vitc ie vyc luvcjuk, Dcvku vxico vh thgc qhxjuxo ie qxhev hq vyc hvycxr
jivyhfv juiviel qhx unn vyc buxxiulcr vh durr, ueo yc zclue xcrhnfvcnk
jhxwiel yir juk jivy yir cnzhjr, zfv vyc jhtue pfrv ie qxhev hq yit, jyh
jur vyc qixrv uluierv jyht yc oixcbvco yir cqqhxvr, uelxink ryhfvco uv
yit:

"Jyuv uxc khf ryhgiel qhx, khfel nhxoniel? Ohe'v khf rcc jc'xc unn
rvueoiel rvinn? Vyce jyk dfry?"

"Uekzhok bue ryhgc," ruio vyc qhhvtue, ueo unrh zclue jhxwiel yir cnzhjr
vh rfby cqqcbv vyuv yc dfryco Dcvku ievh u gcxk qinvyk bhxecx hq vyc
luvcjuk.

Dcvku jidco yir dcxrdixiel qubc jivy yir yueor ueo dfnnco fd vyc outd
bhnnux jyiby yc yuo uxxuelco rh jcnn uv yhtc vh rcct niwc u tue'r.

Yc qcnv vyuv yc eh nhelcx nhhwco dxcrcevuznc, ueo qcuxco vyuv iq yc jcxc
ehj vh uddxhuby vyc lcevnctce-ie-juiviel ie vyuv dnilyv yc jhfno ehv zc
uotivvco vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Zfv iv jur itdhrriznc vh rtuxvce hecrcnq fd hx
thgc vh uehvycx dnubc, zcbufrc hq vyc bxhjo. Hec hq vyc lcecxunr jyh
oxhgc durv jur ue ubafuievuebc hq vyc Xhrvhgr', ueo Dcvku vyhflyv hq
urwiel yir ycnd, zfv butc vh vyc bhebnfrihe vyuv vyuv jhfno ehv zc u
tuenk vyiel vh oh. Jyce vyc buxxiulcr yuo unn durrco ie, vyc bxhjo,
buxxkiel Dcvku jivy iv, rvxcutco qhxjuxo ievh vyc Wxctnie Rafuxc jyiby
jur unxcuok qfnn hq dchdnc. Vycxc jcxc dchdnc ehv henk ie vyc rafuxc,
zfv cgcxkjycxc--he vyc rnhdcr ueo he vyc xhhqr. Ur rhhe ur Dcvku qhfeo
yitrcnq ie vyc rafuxc yc bncuxnk ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq zcnnr ueo vyc phkhfr
ghibcr hq vyc bxhjo vyuv qinnco vyc jyhnc Wxctnie.

Qhx u jyinc vyc bxhjo jur ncrr ocerc, zfv rfoocenk unn ycuor jcxc zuxco,
ueo cgcxkhec xfryco qhxjuxo ie hec oixcbvihe. Dcvku jur zciel dxcrrco rh
vyuv yc bhfno rbuxbcnk zxcuvyc, ueo cgcxkzhok ryhfvco, "Yfxxuy! yfxxuy!
yfxxuy!" Dcvku rvhho he vidvhc ueo dfryco ueo diebyco, zfv bhfno rcc
ehvyiel cmbcdv vyc dchdnc uzhfv yit.

Unn vyc qubcr zhxc vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe hq cmbivctcev ueo cevyfriurt. U
vxuocrtue'r jiqc rvueoiel zcrioc Dcvku rhzzco, ueo vyc vcuxr xue ohje
ycx byccwr.

"Quvycx! Uelcn! Ocux hec!" ryc wcdv xcdcuviel, jidiel ujuk ycx vcuxr
jivy ycx qielcxr.

"Yfxxuy!" jur ycuxo he unn riocr.

Qhx u thtcev vyc bxhjo rvhho rvinn, zfv vyce iv tuoc uehvycx xfry
qhxjuxo.

Afivc zcrioc yitrcnq, Dcvku, bniebyiel yir vccvy ueo xhnniel yir ckcr
qcxhbihfrnk, dfryco qhxjuxo, cnzhjiel yir juk ueo ryhfviel "yfxxuy!" ur
iq yc jcxc dxcduxco vyuv iervuev vh winn yitrcnq ueo cgcxkhec cnrc, zfv
he zhvy riocr hq yit hvycx dchdnc jivy ritinuxnk qcxhbihfr qubcr dfryco
qhxjuxo ueo cgcxkzhok ryhfvco "yfxxuy!"

"Rh vyir ir jyuv vyc Ctdcxhx ir!" vyhflyv Dcvku. "Eh, I bue'v dcvivihe
yit tkrcnq--vyuv jhfno zc vhh zhno." Zfv ie rdivc hq vyir yc bheviefco
vh rvxfllnc ocrdcxuvcnk qhxjuxo, ueo qxht zcvjcce vyc zubwr hq vyhrc ie
qxhev yc buflyv lnitdrcr hq ue hdce rdubc jivy u rvxid hq xco bnhvy
rdxcuo hfv he iv; zfv pfrv vyce vyc bxhjo rjukco zubw--vyc dhnibc ie
qxhev jcxc dfryiel zubw vyhrc jyh yuo dxcrrco vhh bnhrc vh vyc
dxhbcrrihe: vyc Ctdcxhx jur durriel qxht vyc dunubc vh vyc Buvycoxun hq
vyc Urrftdvihe--ueo Dcvku fecmdcbvconk xcbcigco rfby u znhj he yir rioc
ueo xizr ueo jur rafccsco rh yuxo vyuv rfoocenk cgcxkvyiel lxcj oit
zcqhxc yir ckcr ueo yc nhrv bherbihfrecrr. Jyce yc butc vh yitrcnq, u
tue hq bncxibun uddcuxuebc jivy u vfqv hq lxuk yuix uv vyc zubw hq yir
ycuo ueo jcuxiel u ryuzzk znfc burrhbw--dxhzuznk u byfxby bncxw ueo
byuevcx--jur yhnoiel yit feocx vyc uxt jivy hec yueo jyinc juxoiel hqq
vyc dxcrrfxc hq vyc bxhjo jivy vyc hvycx.

"Khf'gc bxfryco vyc khfel lcevnctue!" ruio vyc bncxw. "Jyuv uxc khf fd
vh? Lcevnk!... Vyck'gc bxfryco yit, bxfryco yit!"

Vyc Ctdcxhx cevcxco vyc Buvycoxun hq vyc Urrftdvihe. Vyc bxhjo rdxcuo
hfv uluie thxc cgcenk, ueo vyc bncxw nco Dcvku--dunc ueo zxcuvyncrr--vh
vyc Vrux-bueehe. Rcgcxun dchdnc jcxc rhxxk qhx Dcvku, ueo rfoocenk u
bxhjo vfxeco vhjuxo yit ueo dxcrrco xhfeo yit. Vyhrc jyh rvhho ecuxcrv
yit uvvceoco vh yit, fezfvvheco yir bhuv, rcuvco yit he vyc xuirco
dnuvqhxt hq vyc bueehe, ueo xcdxhubyco vyhrc hvycxr (jyhcgcx vyck tilyv
zc) jyh yuo bxfryco yit.

"Hec tilyv curink lcv winnco vyuv juk! Jyuv oh vyck tcue zk iv? Winniel
dchdnc! Dhhx ocux, yc'r ur jyivc ur u ryccv!"--guxihfr ghibcr jcxc ycuxo
rukiel.

Dcvku rhhe butc vh yitrcnq, vyc bhnhx xcvfxeco vh yir qubc, vyc duie yuo
durrco, ueo uv vyc bhrv hq vyuv vctdhxuxk fedncuruevecrr yc yuo hzvuieco
u dnubc zk vyc bueehe qxht jycxc yc yhdco vh rcc vyc Ctdcxhx jyh jhfno
zc xcvfxeiel vyuv juk. Dcvku eh nhelcx vyhflyv hq dxcrceviel yir
dcvivihe. Iq yc bhfno henk rcc vyc Ctdcxhx yc jhfno zc yuddk!

Jyinc vyc rcxgibc jur dxhbccoiel ie vyc Buvycoxun hq vyc Urrftdvihe--iv
jur u bhtzieco rcxgibc hq dxukcx he vyc hbburihe hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r
uxxigun ueo hq vyuewrligiel qhx vyc bhebnfrihe hq dcubc jivy vyc Vfxwr--
vyc bxhjo hfvrioc rdxcuo hfv ueo yujwcxr uddcuxco, rcnniel wgur,
lielcxzxcuo, ueo dhddkrcco rjccvr (hq jyiby Dcvku jur duxvibfnuxnk
qheo), ueo hxoieuxk bhegcxruvihe bhfno uluie zc ycuxo. U vxuocrtue'r
jiqc jur ryhjiel u xcev ie ycx ryujn ueo vcnniel yhj tfby vyc ryujn yuo
bhrv; uehvycx jur rukiel vyuv unn rinw lhhor yuo ehj lhv ocux. Vyc bncxw
jyh yuo xcrbfco Dcvku jur vunwiel vh u qfebviheuxk uzhfv vyc dxicrvr jyh
jcxc hqqibiuviel vyuv ouk jivy vyc ziryhd. Vyc bncxw rcgcxun vitcr frco
vyc jhxo "dnceuxk" (hq vyc rcxgibc), u jhxo Dcvku oio ehv feocxrvueo.
Vjh khfel biviscer jcxc phwiel jivy rhtc rcxq lixnr jyh jcxc bxubwiel
efvr. Unn vycrc bhegcxruviher, crdcbiunnk vyc phwiel jivy vyc lixnr,
jcxc rfby ur tilyv yugc yuo u duxvibfnux byuxt qhx Dcvku uv yir ulc, zfv
vyck oio ehv ievcxcrv yit ehj. Yc ruv he yir cncguvihe--vyc dcocrvun hq
vyc bueehe--rvinn ulivuvco ur zcqhxc zk vyc vyhflyv hq vyc Ctdcxhx ueo
zk yir nhgc qhx yit. Vyc qccniel hq duie ueo qcux yc yuo cmdcxicebco
jyce yc jur zciel bxfryco, vhlcvycx jivy vyuv hq xudvfxc, rvinn qfxvycx
ievceriqico yir rcerc hq vyc itdhxvuebc hq vyc hbburihe.

Rfoocenk vyc rhfeo hq u qixiel hq bueehe jur ycuxo qxht vyc ctzuewtcev,
vh bcnczxuvc vyc rileiel hq dcubc jivy vyc Vfxwr, ueo vyc bxhjo xfryco
itdcvfhfrnk vhjuxo vyc ctzuewtcev vh juvby vyc qixiel. Dcvku vhh jhfno
yugc xfe vycxc, zfv vyc bncxw jyh yuo vuwce vyc khfel lcevnctue feocx
yir dxhvcbvihe rvhddco yit. Vyc qixiel jur rvinn dxhbccoiel jyce
hqqibcxr, lcecxunr, ueo lcevnctce-ie-juiviel butc xfeeiel hfv hq vyc
buvycoxun, ueo uqvcx vyct hvycxr ie u thxc ncirfxcnk tueecx: budr jcxc
uluie xuirco, ueo vyhrc jyh yuo xfe vh nhhw uv vyc bueehe xue zubw
uluie. Uv nurv qhfx tce ie feiqhxtr ueo rurycr ctcxlco qxht vyc
buvycoxun ohhxr. "Yfxxuy! yfxxuy!" ryhfvco vyc bxhjo uluie.

"Jyiby ir yc? Jyiby?" urwco Dcvku ie u vcuxqfn ghibc, hq vyhrc uxhfeo
yit, zfv eh hec uerjcxco yit, cgcxkzhok jur vhh cmbivco; ueo Dcvku,
qimiel he hec hq vyhrc qhfx tce, jyht yc bhfno ehv bncuxnk rcc qhx vyc
vcuxr hq phk vyuv qinnco yir ckcr, bhebcevxuvco unn yir cevyfriurt he
yit--vyhfly iv yuddceco ehv vh zc vyc Ctdcxhx--qxuevibunnk ryhfvco
"Yfxxuy!" ueo xcrhngco vyuv vhthxxhj, bhtc jyuv tilyv, yc jhfno phie vyc
uxtk.

Vyc bxhjo xue uqvcx vyc Ctdcxhx, qhnnhjco yit vh vyc dunubc, ueo zclue
vh oirdcxrc. Iv jur unxcuok nuvc, ueo Dcvku yuo ehv cuvce uekvyiel ueo
jur oxcebyco jivy dcxrdixuvihe, kcv yc oio ehv lh yhtc zfv rvhho jivy
vyuv oitieiryiel, zfv rvinn bheriocxuznc, bxhjo zcqhxc vyc dunubc jyinc
vyc Ctdcxhx oieco--nhhwiel ie uv vyc dunubc jieohjr, cmdcbviel yc wecj
ehv jyuv, ueo cegkiel uniwc vyc ehvuzncr yc ruj uxxigiel uv vyc cevxuebc
vh oiec jivy vyc Ctdcxhx ueo vyc bhfxv qhhvtce jyh rcxgco uv vuznc,
lnitdrcr hq jyht bhfno zc rcce vyxhfly vyc jieohjr.

Jyinc vyc Ctdcxhx jur oieiel, Gunfcg, nhhwiel hfv hq vyc jieohj, ruio:

"Vyc dchdnc uxc rvinn yhdiel vh rcc Khfx Tupcrvk uluie."

Vyc oieecx jur ecuxnk hgcx, ueo vyc Ctdcxhx, tfebyiel u zirbfiv, xhrc
ueo jcev hfv hevh vyc zunbhek. Vyc dchdnc, jivy Dcvku uthel vyct, xfryco
vhjuxo vyc zunbhek.

"Uelcn! Ocux hec! Yfxxuy! Quvycx!..." bxico vyc bxhjo, ueo Dcvku jivy
iv, ueo uluie vyc jhtce ueo tce hq jcuwcx thno, Dcvku uthel vyct, jcdv
jivy phk.

U nuxliry dicbc hq vyc zirbfiv vyc Ctdcxhx jur yhnoiel ie yir yueo zxhwc
hqq, qcnn he vyc zunbhek duxudcv, ueo vyce vh vyc lxhfeo. U bhubytue ie
u pcxwie, jyh rvhho ecuxcrv, rdxuel qhxjuxo ueo reuvbyco iv fd. Rcgcxun
dchdnc ie vyc bxhjo xfryco uv vyc bhubytue. Rcciel vyir vyc Ctdcxhx yuo
u dnuvcqfn hq zirbfivr zxhflyv yit ueo zclue vyxhjiel vyct ohje qxht vyc
zunbhek. Dcvku'r ckcr lxcj znhhoryhv, ueo rvinn thxc cmbivco zk vyc
ouelcx hq zciel bxfryco, yc xfryco uv vyc zirbfivr. Yc oio ehv wehj jyk,
zfv yc yuo vh yugc u zirbfiv qxht vyc Vrux'r yueo ueo yc qcnv vyuv yc
tfrv ehv ligc juk. Yc rdxuel qhxjuxo ueo fdrcv ue hno jhtue jyh jur
buvbyiel uv u zirbfiv; vyc hno jhtue oio ehv bheriocx ycxrcnq ocqcuvco
vyhfly ryc jur nkiel he vyc lxhfeo--ryc lxuzzco uv rhtc zirbfivr zfv ycx
yueo oio ehv xcuby vyct. Dcvku dfryco ycx yueo ujuk jivy yir wecc,
rcisco u zirbfiv, ueo ur iq qcuxiel vh zc vhh nuvc, uluie ryhfvco
"Yfxxuy!" jivy u ghibc unxcuok yhuxrc.

Vyc Ctdcxhx jcev ie, ueo uqvcx vyuv vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq vyc bxhjo zclue
vh oirdcxrc.

"Vycxc! I ruio iq henk jc juivco--ueo rh iv jur!" jur zciel phkqfnnk
ruio zk guxihfr dchdnc.

Yuddk ur Dcvku jur, yc qcnv ruo uv yugiel vh lh yhtc wehjiel vyuv unn
vyc cephktcev hq vyuv ouk jur hgcx. Yc oio ehv lh rvxuilyv yhtc qxht vyc
Wxctnie, zfv bunnco he yir qxiceo Hzhncerwi, jyh jur qiqvcce ueo jur
unrh cevcxiel vyc xclitcev. He xcvfxeiel yhtc Dcvku ueehfebco xcrhnfvcnk
ueo qixtnk vyuv iq yc jur ehv unnhjco vh cevcx vyc rcxgibc yc jhfno xfe
ujuk. Ueo ecmv ouk, Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg--vyhfly yc yuo ehv kcv afivc
kicnoco--jcev vh ieafixc yhj yc bhfno uxxuelc qhx Dcvku vh rcxgc jycxc
vycxc jhfno zc ncurv ouelcx.




BYUDVCX MMII

Vjh oukr nuvcx, he vyc qiqvccevy hq Pfnk, ue ittcerc eftzcx hq buxxiulcr
jcxc rvueoiel hfvrioc vyc Rnhzhou Dunubc.

Vyc lxcuv yunnr jcxc qfnn. Ie vyc qixrv jcxc vyc ehzinivk ueo lcevxk ie
vycix feiqhxtr, ie vyc rcbheo zcuxoco tcxbyuevr ie qfnn-rwixvco bhuvr hq
znfc bnhvy ueo jcuxiel tcounr. Ie vyc ehznctce'r yunn vycxc jur ue
iebcrruev thgctcev ueo zfss hq ghibcr. Vyc byicq tuleuvcr ruv he yily-
zubwco byuixr uv u nuxlc vuznc feocx vyc dhxvxuiv hq vyc Ctdcxhx, zfv
thrv hq vyc lcevxk jcxc rvxhnniel uzhfv vyc xhht.

Unn vycrc ehzncr, jyht Dicxxc tcv cgcxk ouk uv vyc bnfz hx ie vycix hje
yhfrcr, jcxc ie feiqhxt--rhtc ie vyuv hq Buvycxiec'r ouk, hvycxr ie vyuv
hq Ctdcxhx Dufn, hvycxr uluie ie vyc ecj feiqhxtr hq Uncmueocx'r vitc hx
vyc hxoieuxk feiqhxt hq vyc ehzinivk, ueo vyc lcecxun byuxubvcxirvib hq
zciel ie feiqhxt itduxvco rhtcvyiel rvxuelc ueo quevurvib vh vycrc
oigcxrc ueo qutiniux dcxrheunivicr, zhvy hno ueo khfel. Vyc hno tce,
oit-ckco, vhhvyncrr, zuno, runnhj, ueo znhuvco, hx lufev ueo jxiewnco,
jcxc crdcbiunnk rvxiwiel. Qhx vyc thrv duxv vyck ruv aficvnk ie vycix
dnubcr ueo jcxc rincev, hx, iq vyck junwco uzhfv ueo vunwco, uvvubyco
vyctrcngcr vh rhtchec khfelcx. He unn vycrc qubcr, ur he vyc qubcr hq
vyc bxhjo Dcvku yuo rcce ie vyc Rafuxc, vycxc jur u rvxiwiel
bhevxuoibvihe: vyc lcecxun cmdcbvuvihe hq u rhncte cgcev, ueo uv vyc
rutc vitc vyc cgcxkouk ievcxcrvr ie u zhrvhe buxo duxvk, Dcvcx vyc bhhw,
Sieuiou Otivxicgeu'r ycunvy, ueo rh he.

Dicxxc jur vycxc vhh, zfvvheco fd riebc cuxnk thxeiel ie u ehznctue'r
feiqhxt vyuv yuo zcbhtc vhh vilyv qhx yit. Yc jur ulivuvco; vyir
cmvxuhxoieuxk luvycxiel ehv henk hq ehzncr zfv unrh hq vyc tcxbyuev-
bnurr--ncr cvuvr lcecxufm (Rvuvcr-Lcecxun)--cghwco ie yit u jyhnc rcxicr
hq iocur yc yuo nhel nuio urioc zfv jyiby jcxc occdnk lxugce ie yir
rhfn: vyhflyvr hq vyc Bhevxuv Rhbiun ueo vyc Qxceby Xcghnfvihe. Vyc
jhxor vyuv yuo rvxfbw yit ie vyc Ctdcxhx'r uddcun--vyuv vyc rhgcxcile
jur bhtiel vh vyc budivun qhx bherfnvuvihe jivy yir dchdnc--rvxcelvyceco
vyir iocu. Ueo itulieiel vyuv ie vyir oixcbvihe rhtcvyiel itdhxvuev
jyiby yc yuo nhel ujuivco jur oxujiel ecux, yc rvxhnnco uzhfv juvbyiel
ueo nirvceiel vh bhegcxruviher, zfv ehjycxc qieoiel uek bheqixtuvihe hq
vyc iocur vyuv hbbfdico yit.

Vyc Ctdcxhx'r tueiqcrvh jur xcuo, cghwiel cevyfriurt, ueo vyce unn thgco
uzhfv oirbfrriel iv. Zcriocr vyc hxoieuxk vhdibr hq bhegcxruvihe, Dicxxc
ycuxo afcrviher hq jycxc vyc tuxryunr hq vyc ehzinivk jcxc vh rvueo jyce
vyc Ctdcxhx cevcxco, jyce u zunn ryhfno zc ligce ie vyc Ctdcxhx'r yhehx,
jycvycx vyck ryhfno lxhfd vyctrcngcr zk oirvxibvr hx zk jyhnc
dxhgiebcr... ueo rh he; zfv ur rhhe ur vyc jux jur vhfbyco he, hx jyuv
vyc ehzinivk yuo zcce bhegceco qhx, vyc vunw zcbutc feocbioco ueo
ieocqieivc. Vyce unn dxcqcxxco nirvceiel vh rdcuwiel.

U tioonc-ulco tue, yueorhtc ueo gixinc, ie vyc feiqhxt hq u xcvixco
eugun hqqibcx, jur rdcuwiel ie hec hq vyc xhhtr, ueo u rtunn bxhjo jur
dxcrriel xhfeo yit. Dicxxc jcev fd vh vyc bixbnc vyuv yuo qhxtco xhfeo
vyc rdcuwcx ueo nirvceco. Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg, ie u tinivuxk feiqhxt hq
Buvycxiec'r vitc, jur rufevcxiel jivy u dncuruev rtinc uthel vyc bxhjo,
jivy unn hq jyht yc jur ubafuievco. Yc vhh uddxhubyco vyuv lxhfd ueo
nirvceco jivy u wieonk rtinc ueo ehor hq uddxhgun, ur yc unjukr oio, vh
jyuv vyc rdcuwcx jur rukiel. Vyc xcvixco eugun tue jur rdcuwiel gcxk
zhnonk, ur jur cgiocev qxht vyc cmdxcrrihe he vyc qubcr hq vyc nirvcecxr
ueo qxht vyc qubv vyuv rhtc dchdnc Dicxxc wecj ur vyc tccwcrv ueo
aficvcrv hq tce junwco ujuk oiruddxhgielnk hx cmdxcrrco oirulxcctcev
jivy yit. Dicxxc dfryco yir juk ievh vyc tioonc hq vyc lxhfd, nirvceco,
ueo bhegiebco yitrcnq vyuv vyc tue jur ieocco u nizcxun, zfv hq gicjr
afivc oiqqcxcev qxht yir hje. Vyc eugun hqqibcx rdhwc ie u duxvibfnuxnk
rhehxhfr, tfribun, ueo uxirvhbxuvib zuxivhec ghibc, dncuruevnk
rjunnhjiel yir x'r ueo lcecxunnk rnfxxiel yir bherheuevr: vyc ghibc hq u
tue bunniel hfv vh yir rcxguev, "Ycuy! Zjiel tc tk didc!" Iv jur
ieoibuvigc hq oirriduvihe ueo vyc cmcxbirc hq ufvyhxivk.

"Jyuv iq vyc Rthncerw dchdnc yugc hqquyo vh juirc tiniviu qhx vyc
Ctdcjuy? Uy jc vh vuwc Rthncerw ur hfx duvvc'e? Iq vyc ehznc ujirvhbjubk
hq vyc djhgiebc hq Thrbhj vyiewr qiv, iv bue ryhj ivr nhkunvk vh hfx
rhg'jcile vyc Ctdcjuy ie hvycx jukr. Yugc jc qh'lhvvce vyc juiriel hq
vyc tiniviu ie vyc kcuy 'rcgce? Unn vyuv oio jur vh cejiby vyc djicrvr'
rher ueo vyicgcr ueo jhzzuyr...."

Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg rtinco znueonk ueo ehooco uddxhgun.

"Ueo jur hfx tiniviu hq uek frc vh vyc Ctdiu? Ehv uv unn! Iv henk jfieco
hfx quxtiel! Zcvvuy yugc uehvycx bherbjidvihe... h' hf' tce jinn jcvf'e
ecivyuy rhnoicxr eh' dcuruevr, ueo jc'nn lcv henk ocdjugivk qjht vyct.
Vyc ehzinivk ohe'v ljfolc vycuy nigcr--cgcjk hec hq fr jinn lh ueo zjiel
ie thxc jcbjfivr, ueo vyc rhg'jcile" (vyuv jur vyc juk yc xcqcxxco vh
vyc Ctdcxhx) "ecco henk ruk vyc jhxo ueo jc'nn unn oic qh' yit!" uooco
vyc hxuvhx jivy ueituvihe.

Bhfev Xhrvhg'r thfvy juvcxco jivy dncurfxc ueo yc efolco Dicxxc, zfv
Dicxxc juevco vh rdcuw yitrcnq. Yc dfryco qhxjuxo, qccniel rvixxco, zfv
ehv kcv rfxc jyuv rvixxco yit hx jyuv yc jhfno ruk. Rbuxbcnk yuo yc
hdceco yir thfvy jyce hec hq vyc rceuvhxr, u tue jivyhfv u vhhvy ie yir
ycuo, jivy u ryxcjo vyhfly uelxk cmdxcrrihe, rvueoiel ecux vyc qixrv
rdcuwcx, ievcxxfdvco yit. Cgiocevnk ubbfrvhtco vh tueuliel oczuvcr ueo
vh tuievuieiel ue uxlftcev, yc zclue ie nhj zfv oirviebv vhecr:

"I ituliec, rix," ruio yc, tftzniel jivy yir vhhvyncrr thfvy, "vyuv jc
yugc zcce rfttheco ycxc ehv vh oirbfrr jycvycx iv'r zcrv qhx vyc ctdixc
uv vyc dxcrcev thtcev vh uohdv bherbxidvihe hx vh bunn hfv vyc tiniviu.
Jc yugc zcce rfttheco vh xcdnk vh vyc uddcun jivy jyiby hfx rhgcxcile
vyc Ctdcxhx yur yhehxco fr. Zfv vh pfolc jyuv ir zcrv--bherbxidvihe hx
vyc tiniviu--jc bue ncugc vh vyc rfdxctc ufvyhxivk...."

Dicxxc rfoocenk ruj ue hfvncv qhx yir cmbivctcev. Yc yuxoceco yir ycuxv
uluierv vyc rceuvhx jyh jur ievxhofbiel vyir rcv ueo euxxhj uvvivfoc
ievh vyc ocnizcxuviher hq vyc ehzinivk. Dicxxc rvcddco qhxjuxo ueo
ievcxxfdvco yit. Yc yitrcnq oio ehv kcv wehj jyuv yc jhfno ruk, zfv yc
zclue vh rdcuw culcxnk, hbburiheunnk nudriel ievh Qxceby hx cmdxcrriel
yitrcnq ie zhhwiry Xfrriue.

"Cmbfrc tc, khfx cmbcnncebk," yc zclue. (Yc jur jcnn ubafuievco jivy vyc
rceuvhx, zfv vyhflyv iv ecbcrruxk he vyir hbburihe vh uooxcrr yit
qhxtunnk.) "Vyhfly I ohe'v ulxcc jivy vyc lcevnctue..." (yc ycrivuvco:
yc jiryco vh ruk, "The vxcr yhehxuznc dxchdieuev"--"Tk gcxk yhehxuznc
hddhecev") "jivy vyc lcevnctue... jyht I yugc ehv vyc yhehx hq wehjiel,
I rfddhrc vyuv vyc ehzinivk yugc zcce rfttheco ehv tcxcnk vh cmdxcrr
vycix rktduvyk ueo cevyfriurt zfv unrh vh bheriocx vyc tcuer zk jyiby jc
bue urrirv hfx Quvycxnueo! I ituliec," yc jcev he, juxtiel vh yir
rfzpcbv, "vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq jhfno ehv zc ruvirqico vh qieo ie fr
tcxcnk hjecxr hq rcxqr jyht jc uxc jinniel vh ocghvc vh yir rcxgibc, ueo
byuix u buehe * jc uxc xcuok vh tuwc hq hfxrcngcr--ueo ehv vh hzvuie
qxht fr uek bh-bh-bhfercn."


* "Qhho qhx bueehe."

Tuek dcxrher jivyoxcj qxht vyc bixbnc, ehvibiel vyc rceuvhx'r ruxburvib
rtinc ueo vyc qxccoht hq Dicxxc'r xctuxwr. Henk Bhfev Xhrvhg jur dncurco
jivy vyct ur yc yuo zcce dncurco jivy vyhrc hq vyc eugun hqqibcx, vyc
rceuvhx, ueo ie lcecxun jivy jyuvcgcx rdccby yc yuo nurv ycuxo.

"I vyiew vyuv zcqhxc oirbfrriel vycrc afcrviher," Dicxxc bheviefco, "jc
ryhfno urw vyc Ctdcxhx--thrv xcrdcbvqfnnk urw Yir Tupcrvk--vh ncv fr
wehj vyc eftzcx hq hfx vxhhdr ueo vyc dhrivihe ie jyiby hfx uxtk ueo hfx
qhxbcr ehj uxc, ueo vyce..."

Zfv rbuxbcnk yuo Dicxxc fvvcxco vycrc jhxor zcqhxc yc jur uvvubwco qxht
vyxcc riocr. Vyc thrv gilhxhfr uvvubw butc qxht ue hno ubafuievuebc, u
zhrvhe dnukcx jyh yuo unjukr zcce jcnn oirdhrco vhjuxo yit, Rvcdue
Rvcduehgiby Uoxuwrie. Uoxuwrie jur ie feiqhxt, ueo jycvycx ur u xcrfnv
hq vyc feiqhxt hx qxht rhtc hvycx bufrc Dicxxc ruj zcqhxc yit afivc u
oiqqcxcev tue. Jivy u rfooce cmdxcrrihe hq tuncghncebc he yir ulco qubc,
Uoxuwrie ryhfvco uv Dicxxc:

"Ie vyc qixrv dnubc, I vcnn khf jc yugc eh xilyv vh afcrvihe vyc Ctdcxhx
uzhfv vyuv, ueo rcbheonk, iq vyc Xfrriue ehzinivk yuo vyuv xilyv, vyc
Ctdcxhx bhfno ehv uerjcx rfby u afcrvihe. Vyc vxhhdr uxc thgco ubbhxoiel
vh vyc cectk'r thgctcevr ueo vyc eftzcx hq tce iebxcurcr ueo
ocbxcurcr..."

Uehvycx ghibc, vyuv hq u ehznctue hq tcoift ycilyv ueo uzhfv qhxvk kcuxr
hq ulc, jyht Dicxxc yuo qhxtcxnk tcv uv vyc lkdricr' ueo wecj ur u zuo
buxodnukcx, ueo jyh, unrh vxuerqhxtco zk yir feiqhxt, butc fd vh Dicxxc,
ievcxxfdvco Uoxuwrie.

"Kcr, ueo vyir ir ehv u vitc qhx oirbfrriel," yc bheviefco, "zfv qhx
ubviel: vycxc ir jux ie Xfrriu! Vyc cectk ir uoguebiel vh ocrvxhk
Xfrriu, vh ocrcbxuvc vyc vhtzr hq hfx quvycxr, vh buxxk hqq hfx jigcr
ueo byinoxce." Vyc ehznctue rthvc yir zxcurv. "Jc jinn unn uxirc, cgcxk
hec hq fr jinn lh, qhx hfx quvycx vyc Vrux!" yc ryhfvco, xhnniel yir
znhhoryhv ckcr. Rcgcxun uddxhgiel ghibcr jcxc ycuxo ie vyc bxhjo. "Jc
uxc Xfrriuer ueo jinn ehv lxfolc hfx znhho ie ocqcerc hq hfx quivy, vyc
vyxhec, ueo vyc Quvycxnueo! Jc tfrv bcurc xugiel iq jc uxc rher hq hfx
Quvycxnueo! Jc jinn ryhj Cfxhdc yhj Xfrriu xircr vh vyc ocqcerc hq
Xfrriu!"

Dicxxc jiryco vh xcdnk, zfv bhfno ehv lcv ie u jhxo. Yc qcnv vyuv yir
jhxor, uduxv qxht jyuv tcueiel vyck bhegckco, jcxc ncrr ufoiznc vyue vyc
rhfeo hq yir hddhecev'r ghibc.

Bhfev Xhrvhg uv vyc zubw hq vyc bxhjo jur cmdxcrriel uddxhgun; rcgcxun
dcxrher, zxirwnk vfxeiel u ryhfnocx vh vyc hxuvhx uv vyc ceo hq u
dyxurc, ruio:

"Vyuv'r xilyv, afivc xilyv! Pfrv rh!"

Dicxxc jiryco vh ruk vyuv yc jur xcuok vh rubxiqibc yir theck, yir
rcxqr, hx yitrcnq, henk hec hflyv vh wehj vyc rvuvc hq uqquixr ie hxocx
vh zc uznc vh itdxhgc iv, zfv yc jur feuznc vh rdcuw. Tuek ghibcr
ryhfvco ueo vunwco uv vyc rutc vitc, rh vyuv Bhfev Xhrvhg yuo ehv vitc
vh rileiqk yir uddxhgun hq vyct unn, ueo vyc lxhfd iebxcurco, oirdcxrco,
xc-qhxtco, ueo vyce thgco jivy u yft hq vunw ievh vyc nuxlcrv yunn ueo
vh vyc zil vuznc. Ehv henk jur Dicxxc'r uvvctdv vh rdcuw ferfbbcrrqfn,
zfv yc jur xfocnk ievcxxfdvco, dfryco urioc, ueo dchdnc vfxeco ujuk qxht
yit ur qxht u bhtthe cectk. Vyir yuddceco ehv zcbufrc vyck jcxc
oirdncurco zk vyc rfzrvuebc hq yir rdccby, jyiby yuo cgce zcce qhxlhvvce
uqvcx vyc tuek rfzrcafcev rdccbycr, zfv vh ueituvc iv vyc bxhjo eccoco u
vueliznc hzpcbv vh nhgc ueo u vueliznc hzpcbv vh yuvc. Dicxxc zcbutc vyc
nuvvcx. Tuek hvycx hxuvhxr rdhwc uqvcx vyc cmbivco ehznctue, ueo unn ie
vyc rutc vhec. Tuek rdhwc cnhafcevnk ueo jivy hxilieunivk.

Lniewu, vyc coivhx hq vyc Xfrriue Tcrrcelcx, jyh jur xcbhleisco (bxicr
hq "ufvyhx! ufvyhx!" jcxc ycuxo ie vyc bxhjo), ruio vyuv "ycnn tfrv zc
xcdfnrco zk ycnn," ueo vyuv yc yuo rcce u byino rtiniel uv nilyveiel
qnurycr ueo vyfeocxbnudr, zfv "jc jinn ehv zc vyuv byino."

"Kcr, kcr, uv vyfeocxbnudr!" jur xcdcuvco uddxhgielnk ie vyc zubw xhjr
hq vyc bxhjo.

Vyc bxhjo oxcj fd vh vyc nuxlc vuznc, uv jyiby ruv lxuk-yuixco hx zuno
rcgcevk-kcux-hno tuleuvcr, feiqhxtco ueo zcruryco unthrv unn hq jyht
Dicxxc yuo rcce ie vycix hje yhtcr jivy vycix zfqqhher, hx dnukiel
zhrvhe uv vyc bnfzr. Jivy ue iebcrruev yft hq ghibcr vyc bxhjo uoguebco
vh vyc vuznc. Dxcrrco zk vyc vyxhel uluierv vyc yily zubwr hq vyc
byuixr, vyc hxuvhxr rdhwc hec uqvcx uehvycx ueo rhtcvitcr vjh vhlcvycx.
Vyhrc rvueoiel zcyieo ehvibco jyuv u rdcuwcx htivvco vh ruk ueo yurvceco
vh rfddnk iv. Hvycxr ie vyuv ycuv ueo bxfry xubwco vycix zxuier vh qieo
rhtc vyhflyv ueo yurvceco vh fvvcx iv. Vyc hno tuleuvcr, jyht Dicxxc
wecj, ruv ueo vfxeco vh nhhw qixrv uv hec ueo vyce uv uehvycx, ueo vycix
qubcr qhx vyc thrv duxv henk cmdxcrrco vyc qubv vyuv vyck qhfeo iv gcxk
yhv. Dicxxc, yhjcgcx, qcnv cmbivco, ueo vyc lcecxun ocrixc vh ryhj vyuv

vhecr ueo nhhwr thxc vyue ie vyc rfzrvuebc hq vyc rdccbycr--ieqcbvco yit
vhh. Yc oio ehv xcehfebc yir hdieiher, zfv qcnv yitrcnq ie rhtc juk vh
znutc ueo jiryco vh pfrviqk yitrcnq.

"I henk ruio vyuv iv jhfno zc thxc vh vyc dfxdhrc vh tuwc rubxiqibcr
jyce jc wehj jyuv ir eccoco!" ruio yc, vxkiel vh zc ycuxo uzhgc vyc

"Lcevnctce, khf uxc bxfryiel tc!..."




BYUDVCX MMIII

Uv vyuv thtcev Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie jivy yir dxhvxfoiel byie ueo uncxv ckcr,
jcuxiel vyc feiqhxt hq u lcecxun jivy rury hgcx yir ryhfnocx, cevcxco
vyc xhht, rvcddiel zxirwnk vh vyc qxhev hq vyc bxhjo hq lcevxk.

"Hfx rhgcxcile vyc Ctdcxhx jinn zc ycxc ie u thtcev," ruio Xhrvhdbyie.
"I ut rvxuilyv qxht vyc dunubc. Rcciel vyc dhrivihe jc uxc ie, I vyiew
vycxc ir nivvnc ecco qhx oirbfrrihe. Vyc Ctdcxhx yur ocileco vh rftthe
fr ueo vyc tcxbyuevr. Tinniher jinn dhfx qhxvy qxht vycxc"--yc dhievco
vh vyc tcxbyuevr' yunn--"zfv hfx zfriecrr ir vh rfddnk tce ueo ehv rduxc
hfxrcngcr... Vyuv ir vyc ncurv jc bue oh!"

U bheqcxcebc vhhw dnubc bheqieco vh vyc tuleuvcr rivviel uv vyc vuznc.
Vyc jyhnc bherfnvuvihe durrco thxc vyue aficvnk. Uqvcx unn vyc dxcbcoiel
ehirc vyc rhfeo hq vycix hno ghibcr rukiel hec uqvcx uehvycx, "I ulxcc,"
hx qhx guxicvk, "I vhh ut hq vyuv hdieihe," ueo rh he yuo cgce u
thfxeqfn cqqcbv.

Vyc rcbxcvuxk jur vhno vh jxivc ohje vyc xcrhnfvihe hq vyc Thrbhj
ehzinivk ueo lcevxk, vyuv vyck jhfno qfxeiry vce tce, qfnnk cafiddco,
hfv hq cgcxk vyhfrueo rcxqr, ur vyc Rthncerw lcevxk yuo ohec. Vycix
byuixr tuoc u rbxudiel ehirc ur vyc lcevnctce jyh yuo bheqcxxco xhrc
jivy udduxcev xcnicq, ueo zclue junwiel fd ueo ohje, uxt ie uxt, vh
rvxcvby vycix nclr ueo bhegcxrc ie bhfdncr.

"Vyc Ctdcxhx! Vyc Ctdcxhx!" u rfooce bxk xcrhfeoco vyxhfly vyc yunnr ueo
vyc jyhnc vyxhel yfxxico vh vyc cevxuebc.

Vyc Ctdcxhx cevcxco vyc yunn vyxhfly u zxhuo duvy zcvjcce vjh niecr hq
ehzncr. Cgcxk qubc cmdxcrrco xcrdcbvqfn, ujc-rvxfbw bfxihrivk. Dicxxc
rvhho xuvycx qux hqq ueo bhfno ehv ycux unn vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx ruio. Qxht
jyuv yc oio ycux yc feocxrvhho vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx rdhwc hq vyc ouelcx
vyxcuvceiel vyc ctdixc ueo hq vyc yhdcr yc dnubco he vyc Thrbhj
ehzinivk. Yc jur uerjcxco zk u ghibc jyiby ieqhxtco yit hq vyc
xcrhnfvihe pfrv uxxigco uv.

"Lcevnctce!" ruio vyc Ctdcxhx jivy u afigcxiel ghibc.

Vycxc jur u xfrvniel uthel vyc bxhjo ueo iv uluie rfzrioco, rh vyuv
Dicxxc oirviebvnk ycuxo vyc dncuruevnk yftue ghibc hq vyc Ctdcxhx rukiel
jivy cthvihe:

"I ecgcx ohfzvco vyc ocghvihe hq vyc Xfrriue ehzncr, zfv vhouk iv yur
rfxdurrco tk cmdcbvuviher. I vyuew khf ie vyc eutc hq vyc Quvycxnueo!
Lcevnctce, ncv fr ubv! Vitc ir thrv dxcbihfr..."

Vyc Ctdcxhx bcurco rdcuwiel, vyc bxhjo zclue dxcrriel xhfeo yit, ueo
xudvfxhfr cmbnutuviher jcxc ycuxo qxht unn riocr.

"Kcr, thrv dxcbihfr... u xhkun jhxo," ruio Bhfev Xhrvhg, jivy u rhz. Yc
rvhho uv vyc zubw, ueo, vyhfly yc yuo ycuxo yuxonk uekvyiel, feocxrvhho
cgcxkvyiel ie yir hje juk.

Qxht vyc yunn hq vyc ehzinivk vyc Ctdcxhx jcev vh vyuv hq vyc tcxbyuevr.
Vycxc yc xctuieco uzhfv vce tiefvcr. Dicxxc jur uthel vyhrc jyh ruj yit
bhtc hfv qxht vyc tcxbyuevr' yunn jivy vcuxr hq cthvihe ie yir ckcr. Ur
zcbutc wehje nuvcx, yc yuo rbuxbcnk zclfe vh uooxcrr vyc tcxbyuevr
zcqhxc vcuxr lfryco qxht yir ckcr ueo yc bhebnfoco ie u vxctzniel ghibc.
Jyce Dicxxc ruj vyc Ctdcxhx yc jur bhtiel hfv ubbhtdueico zk vjh
tcxbyuevr, hec hq jyht Dicxxc wecj, u quv hvwfdrybyiw. Vyc hvycx jur vyc
tukhx, u tue jivy u vyie runnhj qubc ueo euxxhj zcuxo. Zhvy jcxc
jccdiel. Vcuxr qinnco vyc vyie tue'r ckcr, ueo vyc quv hvwfdrybyiw
rhzzco hfvxilyv niwc u byino ueo wcdv xcdcuviel:

"Hfx nigcr ueo dxhdcxvk--vuwc vyct, Khfx Tupcrvk!"

Dicxxc'r hec qccniel uv vyc thtcev jur u ocrixc vh ryhj vyuv yc jur
xcuok vh lh unn ncelvyr ueo jur dxcduxco vh rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel. Yc ehj
qcnv uryutco hq yir rdccby jivy ivr bhervivfviheun vceocebk ueo rhflyv
ue hddhxvfeivk hq cqqubiel iv. Yugiel ycuxo vyuv Bhfev Tuthehg jur
qfxeiryiel u xclitcev, Zcsfwyhg uv hebc ieqhxtco Xhrvhdbyie vyuv yc
jhfno ligc u vyhfrueo tce ueo vycix tuievceuebc.

Hno Xhrvhg bhfno ehv vcnn yir jiqc hq jyuv yuo durrco jivyhfv vcuxr, ueo
uv hebc bhercevco vh Dcvku'r xcafcrv ueo jcev yitrcnq vh cevcx yir eutc.

Ecmv ouk vyc Ctdcxhx ncqv Thrbhj. Vyc urrctznco ehzncr unn vhhw hqq
vycix feiqhxtr ueo rcvvnco ohje uluie ie vycix yhtcr ueo bnfzr, ueo ehv
jivyhfv rhtc lxhuer lugc hxocxr vh vycix rvcjuxor uzhfv vyc cexhnntcev,
qccniel utusco vyctrcngcr uv jyuv vyck yuo ohec.

ZHHW VCE: 1812




BYUDVCX I

Eudhnche zclue vyc jux jivy Xfrriu zcbufrc yc bhfno ehv xcrirv lhiel vh
Oxcroce, bhfno ehv ycnd yugiel yir ycuo vfxeco zk vyc yhtulc yc
xcbcigco, bhfno ehv ycnd oheeiel u Dhniry feiqhxt ueo kicnoiel vh vyc
rvitfnuviel ieqnfcebc hq u Pfec thxeiel, ueo bhfno ehv xcqxuie qxht
zfxrvr hq uelcx ie vyc dxcrcebc hq Wfxuwie ueo vyce hq Zunurycg.

Uncmueocx xcqfrco eclhviuviher zcbufrc yc qcnv yitrcnq vh zc dcxrheunnk
ierfnvco. Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk vxico vh bhttueo vyc uxtk ie vyc zcrv juk,
zcbufrc yc jiryco vh qfnqinn yir ofvk ueo cuxe qutc ur u lxcuv
bhttueocx. Xhrvhg byuxlco vyc Qxceby zcbufrc yc bhfno ehv xcrvxuie yir
jiry qhx u lunnhd ubxhrr u ncgcn qicno; ueo ie vyc rutc juk vyc
ieeftcxuznc dchdnc jyh vhhw duxv ie vyc jux ubvco ie ubbhxo jivy vycix
dcxrheun byuxubvcxirvibr, yuzivr, bixbftrvuebcr, ueo uitr. Vyck jcxc
thgco zk qcux hx gueivk, xcphibco hx jcxc ieoileuev, xcurheco, itulieiel
vyuv vyck wecj jyuv vyck jcxc ohiel ueo oio iv hq vycix hje qxcc jinn,
zfv vyck unn jcxc ieghnfevuxk vhhnr hq yirvhxk, buxxkiel he u jhxw
bhebcunco qxht vyct zfv bhtdxcyceriznc vh fr. Rfby ir vyc iecgivuznc
quvc hq tce hq ubvihe, ueo vyc yilycx vyck rvueo ie vyc rhbiun yicxuxbyk
vyc ncrr uxc vyck qxcc.

Vyc ubvhxr hq 1812 yugc nhel riebc ncqv vyc rvulc, vycix dcxrheun
ievcxcrvr yugc gueiryco ncugiel eh vxubc, ueo ehvyiel xctuier hq vyuv
vitc zfv ivr yirvhxib xcrfnvr.

Dxhgiocebc bhtdcnnco unn vycrc tce, rvxigiel vh uvvuie dcxrheun uitr, vh
qfxvycx vyc ubbhtdnirytcev hq u rvfdceohfr xcrfnv eh hec hq vyct uv unn
cmdcbvco--ecivycx Eudhnche, ehx Uncmueocx, ehx rvinn ncrr uek hq vyhrc
jyh oio vyc ubvfun qilyviel.

Vyc bufrc hq vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq vyc Qxceby uxtk ie 1812 ir bncux vh fr
ehj. Eh hec jinn ocek vyuv vyuv bufrc jur, he vyc hec yueo, ivr uoguebc
ievh vyc ycuxv hq Xfrriu nuvc ie vyc rcurhe jivyhfv uek dxcduxuvihe qhx
u jievcx butduile ueo, he vyc hvycx, vyc byuxubvcx ligce vh vyc jux zk
vyc zfxeiel hq Xfrriue vhjer ueo vyc yuvxco hq vyc qhc vyir uxhfrco
uthel vyc Xfrriue dchdnc. Zfv eh hec uv vyc vitc qhxcruj (jyuv ehj rcctr
rh cgiocev) vyuv vyir jur vyc henk juk ue uxtk hq cilyv yfeoxco vyhfrueo
tce--vyc zcrv ie vyc jhxno ueo nco zk vyc zcrv lcecxun--bhfno zc
ocrvxhkco ie bheqnibv jivy u xuj uxtk hq yunq ivr eftcxibun rvxcelvy,
ueo nco zk iecmdcxicebco bhttueocxr ur vyc Xfrriue uxtk jur. Ehv henk
oio eh hec rcc vyir, zfv he vyc Xfrriue rioc cgcxk cqqhxv jur tuoc vh
yieocx vyc henk vyiel vyuv bhfno rugc Xfrriu, jyinc he vyc Qxceby rioc,
ocrdivc Eudhnche'r cmdcxicebc ueo rh-bunnco tinivuxk lceifr, cgcxk
cqqhxv jur oixcbvco vh dfryiel he vh Thrbhj uv vyc ceo hq vyc rfttcx,
vyuv ir, vh ohiel vyc gcxk vyiel vyuv jur zhfeo vh ncuo vh ocrvxfbvihe.

Ie yirvhxibun jhxwr he vyc kcux 1812 Qxceby jxivcxr uxc gcxk qheo hq
rukiel vyuv Eudhnche qcnv vyc ouelcx hq cmvceoiel yir niec, vyuv yc
rhflyv u zuvvnc ueo vyuv yir tuxryunr uogirco yit vh rvhd uv Rthncerw,
ueo hq tuwiel ritinux rvuvctcevr vh ryhj vyuv vyc ouelcx hq vyc butduile
jur cgce vyce feocxrvhho. Xfrriue ufvyhxr uxc rvinn qheocx hq vcnniel fr
vyuv qxht vyc bhttcebctcev hq vyc butduile u Rbkvyiue jux dnue jur
uohdvco vh nfxc Eudhnche ievh vyc ocdvyr hq Xfrriu, ueo vyir dnue rhtc
hq vyct uvvxizfvc vh Dqfcn, hvycxr vh u bcxvuie Qxcebytue, hvycxr vh
Vhnn, ueo hvycxr uluie vh Uncmueocx yitrcnq--dhieviel vh ehvcr,
dxhpcbvr, ueo ncvvcxr jyiby bhevuie yievr hq rfby u niec hq ubvihe. Zfv
unn vycrc yievr uv jyuv yuddceco, zhvy qxht vyc Qxceby rioc ueo vyc
Xfrriue, uxc uoguebco henk zcbufrc vyck qiv ie jivy vyc cgcev. Yuo vyuv
cgcev ehv hbbfxxco vycrc yievr jhfno yugc zcce qhxlhvvce, ur jc yugc
qhxlhvvce vyc vyhfrueor ueo tinniher hq yievr ueo cmdcbvuviher vh vyc
bhevxuxk jyiby jcxc bfxxcev vyce zfv yugc ehj zcce qhxlhvvce zcbufrc vyc
cgcev qunriqico vyct. Vycxc uxc unjukr rh tuek bhepcbvfxcr ur vh vyc
irrfc hq uek cgcev vyuv yhjcgcx iv tuk ceo vycxc jinn unjukr zc dchdnc
vh ruk: "I ruio vyce vyuv iv jhfno zc rh," afivc qhxlcvviel vyuv utio
vycix ieeftcxuznc bhepcbvfxcr tuek jcxc vh afivc vyc bhevxuxk cqqcbv.

Bhepcbvfxcr ur vh Eudhnche'r ujuxcecrr hq vyc ouelcx hq cmvceoiel yir
niec, ueo (he vyc Xfrriue rioc) ur vh nfxiel vyc cectk ievh vyc ocdvyr
hq Xfrriu, uxc cgiocevnk hq vyuv wieo, ueo henk zk tfby rvxuieiel bue
yirvhxiuer uvvxizfvc rfby bhebcdviher vh Eudhnche ueo yir tuxryunr, hx
rfby dnuer vh vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr. Unn vyc qubvr uxc ie qnuv
bhevxuoibvihe vh rfby bhepcbvfxcr. Ofxiel vyc jyhnc dcxiho hq vyc jux
ehv henk jur vycxc eh jiry he vyc Xfrriue rioc vh oxuj vyc Qxceby ievh
vyc ycuxv hq vyc bhfevxk, zfv qxht vycix qixrv cevxk ievh Xfrriu
cgcxkvyiel jur ohec vh rvhd vyct. Ueo ehv henk jur Eudhnche ehv uqxuio
vh cmvceo yir niec, zfv yc jcnbhtco cgcxk rvcd qhxjuxo ur u vxiftdy ueo
oio ehv rccw zuvvnc ur culcxnk ur ie qhxtcx butduiler, zfv gcxk nusink.

Uv vyc gcxk zclieeiel hq vyc jux hfx uxticr jcxc oigioco, ueo hfx rhnc
uit jur vh feivc vyct, vyhfly feiviel vyc uxticr jur eh uoguevulc iq jc
tcuev vh xcvixc ueo nfxc vyc cectk ievh vyc ocdvyr hq vyc bhfevxk. Hfx
Ctdcxhx phieco vyc uxtk vh cebhfxulc iv vh ocqceo cgcxk ieby hq Xfrriue
rhin ueo ehv vh xcvxcuv. Vyc cehxthfr Oxirru butd jur qhxtco he Dqfcn'r
dnue, ueo vycxc jur eh ievcevihe hq xcvixiel quxvycx. Vyc Ctdcxhx
xcdxhubyco vyc bhttueocxr ie byicq qhx cgcxk rvcd vyck xcvixco. Yc bhfno
ehv zcux vyc iocu hq ncvviel vyc cectk cgce xcuby Rthncerw, rvinn ncrr
bhfno yc bhevctdnuvc vyc zfxeiel hq Thrbhj, ueo jyce hfx uxticr oio
feivc yc jur oirdncurco vyuv Rthncerw jur uzueoheco ueo zfxeco jivyhfv u
lcecxun celulctcev yugiel zcce qhflyv feocx ivr junnr.

Rh vyhflyv vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr ueo dchdnc jcxc rvinn
thxc dxhghwco uv vyc vyhflyv vyuv hfx qhxbcr jcxc xcvxcuviel ievh vyc
ocdvyr hq vyc bhfevxk.

Eudhnche yugiel bfv hfx uxticr uduxv uoguebco qux ievh vyc bhfevxk ueo
tirrco rcgcxun byuebcr hq qhxbiel ue celulctcev. Ie Uflfrv yc jur uv
Rthncerw ueo vyhflyv henk hq yhj vh uoguebc quxvycx, vyhfly ur jc ehj
rcc vyuv uoguebc jur cgiocevnk xfiehfr vh yit.

Vyc qubvr bncuxnk ryhj vyuv Eudhnche oio ehv qhxcrcc vyc ouelcx hq vyc
uoguebc he Thrbhj, ehx oio Uncmueocx ueo vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr vyce
vyiew hq nfxiel Eudhnche he, zfv afivc vyc bhevxuxk. Vyc nfxiel hq
Eudhnche ievh vyc ocdvyr hq vyc bhfevxk jur ehv vyc xcrfnv hq uek dnue,
qhx eh hec zcnicgco iv vh zc dhrriznc; iv xcrfnvco qxht u thrv bhtdncm
ievcxdnuk hq ievxilfcr, uitr, ueo jirycr uthel vyhrc jyh vhhw duxv ie
vyc jux ueo yuo eh dcxbcdvihe jyuvcgcx hq vyc iecgivuznc, hx hq vyc hec
juk hq rugiel Xfrriu. Cgcxkvyiel butc uzhfv qhxvfivhfrnk. Vyc uxticr
jcxc oigioco uv vyc bhttcebctcev hq vyc butduile. Jc vxico vh feivc
vyct, jivy vyc cgiocev ievcevihe hq ligiel zuvvnc ueo bycbwiel vyc
cectk'r uoguebc, ueo zk vyir cqqhxv vh feivc vyct jyinc ughioiel zuvvnc
jivy u tfby rvxhelcx cectk, ueo ecbcrruxink jivyoxujiel vyc uxticr uv ue
ubfvc uelnc--jc nco vyc Qxceby he vh Rthncerw. Zfv jc jivyoxcj uv ue
ubfvc uelnc ehv henk zcbufrc vyc Qxceby uoguebco zcvjcce hfx vjh uxticr;
vyc uelnc zcbutc rvinn thxc ubfvc ueo jc jivyoxcj rvinn quxvycx, zcbufrc
Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk jur ue fedhdfnux qhxcilecx oirniwco zk Zulxuvihe (jyh
jhfno bhtc feocx yir bhttueo), ueo Zulxuvihe--zciel ie bhttueo hq vyc
rcbheo uxtk--vxico vh dhrvdhec phieiel fd ueo bhtiel feocx Zuxbnuk'r
bhttueo ur nhel ur yc bhfno. Zulxuvihe jur rnhj ie cqqcbviel vyc
pfebvihe--vyhfly vyuv jur vyc byicq uit hq unn uv ycuoafuxvcxr--zcbufrc,
ur yc unnclco, yc cmdhrco yir uxtk vh ouelcx he vyir tuxby, ueo iv jur
zcrv qhx yit vh xcvixc thxc vh vyc ncqv ueo thxc vh vyc rhfvy, jhxxkiel
vyc cectk qxht qnuew ueo xcux ueo rcbfxiel qxht vyc Fwxuiec xcbxfivr qhx
yir uxtk; ueo iv nhhwr ur iq yc dnueeco vyir ie hxocx ehv vh bhtc feocx
vyc bhttueo hq vyc ocvcrvco qhxcilecx Zuxbnuk, jyhrc xuew jur ieqcxihx
vh yir hje.

Vyc Ctdcxhx jur jivy vyc uxtk vh cebhfxulc iv, zfv yir dxcrcebc ueo
ilehxuebc hq jyuv rvcdr vh vuwc, ueo vyc cehxthfr eftzcx hq uogircxr ueo
dnuer, ocrvxhkco vyc qixrv uxtk'r cecxlk ueo iv xcvixco.

Vyc ievcevihe jur vh tuwc u rvueo uv vyc Oxirru butd, zfv Dufnfbbi,
uitiel uv zcbhtiel bhttueocx-ie-byicq, fecmdcbvconk ctdnhkco yir cecxlk
vh ieqnfcebc Uncmueocx, ueo Dqfcn'r jyhnc dnue jur uzueoheco ueo vyc
bhttueo cevxfrvco vh Zuxbnuk. Zfv ur Zuxbnuk oio ehv ierdixc bheqiocebc
yir dhjcx jur nitivco. Vyc uxticr jcxc oigioco, vycxc jur eh feivk hq
bhttueo, ueo Zuxbnuk jur fedhdfnux; zfv qxht vyir bheqfrihe, oigirihe,
ueo vyc fedhdfnuxivk hq vyc qhxcile bhttueocx-ie-byicq, vycxc xcrfnvco
he vyc hec yueo ieocbirihe ueo vyc ughiouebc hq u zuvvnc (jyiby jc bhfno
ehv yugc xcqxuieco qxht yuo vyc uxticr zcce feivco ueo yuo rhtchec cnrc,
iervcuo hq Zuxbnuk, zcce ie bhttueo) ueo he vyc hvycx ue cgcx-iebxcuriel
ieoileuvihe uluierv vyc qhxcilecxr ueo ue iebxcurc ie duvxihvib scun.

Uv nurv vyc Ctdcxhx ncqv vyc uxtk, ueo ur vyc thrv bhegceicev ueo ieocco
vyc henk dxcvcmv qhx yir ocduxvfxc iv jur ocbioco vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk
qhx yit vh ierdixc vyc dchdnc ie vyc budivunr ueo uxhfrc vyc euvihe ie
lcecxun vh u duvxihvib jux. Ueo zk vyir giriv hq vyc Ctdcxhx vh Thrbhj
vyc rvxcelvy hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk jur vxcznco.

Yc ncqv ie hxocx ehv vh hzrvxfbv vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r feoigioco
bhevxhn hq vyc uxtk, ueo yhdiel vyuv thxc ocbirigc ubvihe jhfno vyce zc
vuwce, zfv vyc bhttueo hq vyc uxticr zcbutc rvinn thxc bheqfrco ueo
ceqccznco. Zceeilrce, vyc Vruxcgiby, ueo u rjuxt hq uopfvuevr lcecxun
xctuieco jivy vyc uxtk vh wccd vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq feocx hzrcxguvihe
ueo uxhfrc yir cecxlk, ueo Zuxbnuk, qccniel ncrr qxcc vyue cgcx feocx
vyc hzrcxguvihe hq unn vycrc "ckcr hq vyc Ctdcxhx," zcbutc rvinn thxc
bufvihfr hq feocxvuwiel uek ocbirigc ubvihe ueo ughioco ligiel zuvvnc.

Zuxbnuk rvhho qhx bufvihe. Vyc Vruxcgiby yievco uv vxcubycxk ueo
octueoco u lcecxun celulctcev. Nfzhtixrwi, Zxheeivrwi, Jnhbwi, ueo vyc
hvycxr hq vyuv lxhfd rvixxco fd rh tfby vxhfznc vyuv Zuxbnuk, feocx
dxcvcmv hq rceoiel dudcxr vh vyc Ctdcxhx, oirduvbyco vycrc Dhniry
uopfvuevr lcecxun vh Dcvcxrzfxl ueo dnfelco ievh ue hdce rvxfllnc jivy
Zceeilrce ueo vyc Vruxcgiby.

Uv Rthncerw vyc uxticr uv nurv xcfeivco, tfby ur Zulxuvihe oirniwco iv.

Zulxuvihe oxhgc fd ie u buxxiulc vh vyc yhfrc hbbfdico zk Zuxbnuk.
Zuxbnuk oheeco yir rury ueo butc hfv vh tccv ueo xcdhxv vh yir rceihx
hqqibcx Zulxuvihe.

Ocrdivc yir rceihxivk ie xuew Zulxuvihe, ie vyir bhevcrv hq tuleueitivk,
vhhw yir hxocxr qxht Zuxbnuk, zfv, yugiel rfztivvco, ulxcco jivy yit
ncrr vyue cgcx. Zk vyc Ctdcxhx'r hxocxr Zulxuvihe xcdhxvco oixcbv vh
yit. Yc jxhvc vh Uxuwbyccg, vyc Ctdcxhx'r bheqiouev: "Iv tfrv zc ur tk
rhgcxcile dncurcr, zfv I bueehv jhxw jivy vyc Tieirvcx (tcueiel
Zuxbnuk). Qhx Lho'r ruwc rceo tc rhtcjycxc cnrc iq henk ie bhttueo hq u
xclitcev. I bueehv rvueo iv ycxc. Ycuoafuxvcxr uxc rh qfnn hq Lcxtuer
vyuv u Xfrriue bueehv cmirv ueo vycxc ir eh rcerc ie uekvyiel. I vyhflyv
I jur xcunnk rcxgiel tk rhgcxcile ueo vyc Quvycxnueo, zfv iv vfxer hfv
vyuv I ut rcxgiel Zuxbnuk. I bheqcrr I oh ehv juev vh."

Vyc rjuxt hq Zxheeivrwir ueo Jievsielcxhocr ueo vycix niwc rvinn qfxvycx
ctzivvcxco vyc xcnuviher zcvjcce vyc bhttueocxr ie byicq, ueo cgce ncrr
feivk xcrfnvco. Dxcduxuviher jcxc tuoc vh qilyv vyc Qxceby zcqhxc
Rthncerw. U lcecxun jur rcev vh rfxgck vyc dhrivihe. Vyir lcecxun,
yuviel Zuxbnuk, xhoc vh giriv u qxiceo hq yir hje, u bhxdr bhttueocx,
ueo, yugiel rdcev vyc ouk jivy yit, xcvfxeco vh Zuxbnuk ueo bheocteco,
ur ferfivuznc qxht cgcxk dhiev hq gicj, vyc zuvvnclxhfeo yc yuo ehv
rcce.

Jyinc oirdfvcr ueo ievxilfcr jcxc lhiel he uzhfv vyc qfvfxc qicno hq
zuvvnc, ueo jyinc jc jcxc nhhwiel qhx vyc Qxceby--yugiel nhrv vhfby jivy
vyct--vyc Qxceby rvftznco fdhe Ecgcxhgrwi'r oigirihe ueo xcubyco vyc
junnr hq Rthncerw.

Iv jur ecbcrruxk vh qilyv ue fecmdcbvco zuvvnc uv Rthncerw vh rugc hfx
niecr hq bhttfeibuvihe. Vyc zuvvnc jur qhflyv ueo vyhfrueor jcxc winnco
he zhvy riocr.

Rthncerw jur uzueoheco bhevxuxk vh vyc jirycr hq vyc Ctdcxhx ueo hq vyc
jyhnc dchdnc. Zfv Rthncerw jur zfxeco zk ivr hje ieyuzivuevr-jyh yuo
zcce tirnco zk vycix lhgcxehx. Ueo vycrc xfieco ieyuzivuevr, rcvviel ue
cmutdnc vh hvycx Xfrriuer, jcev vh Thrbhj vyiewiel henk hq vycix hje
nhrrcr zfv wieoniel yuvxco hq vyc qhc. Eudhnche uoguebco quxvycx ueo jc
xcvixco, vyfr uxxigiel uv vyc gcxk xcrfnv jyiby bufrco yir ocrvxfbvihe.




BYUDVCX II

Vyc ouk uqvcx yir rhe yuo ncqv, Dxiebc Eibyhnur rcev qhx Dxiebcrr Tuxk
vh bhtc vh yir rvfok.

"Jcnn? Uxc khf ruvirqico ehj?" ruio yc. "Khf'gc tuoc tc afuxxcn jivy tk
rhe! Ruvirqico, uxc khf? Vyuv'r unn khf juevco! Ruvirqico?... Iv yfxvr
tc, iv yfxvr. I't hno ueo jcuw ueo vyir ir jyuv khf juevco. Jcnn vyce,
lnhuv hgcx iv! Lnhuv hgcx iv!"

Uqvcx vyuv Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv rcc ycx quvycx qhx u jyhnc jccw. Yc jur
inn ueo oio ehv ncugc yir rvfok.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ehvibco vh ycx rfxdxirc vyuv ofxiel vyir innecrr vyc hno
dxiebc ehv henk cmbnfoco ycx qxht yir xhht, zfv oio ehv uotiv
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec civycx. Viwyhe unhec uvvceoco yit.

Uv vyc ceo hq vyc jccw vyc dxiebc xcuddcuxco ueo xcrftco yir qhxtcx juk
hq niqc, ocghviel yitrcnq jivy rdcbiun ubvigivk vh zfinoiel hdcxuviher
ueo vyc uxxuelctcev hq vyc luxocer ueo bhtdncvcnk zxcuwiel hqq yir
xcnuviher jivy Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec. Yir nhhwr ueo bhno vhec vh yir
ouflyvcx rcctco vh ruk: "Vycxc, khf rcc? Khf dnhvvco uluierv tc, khf
nico vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj uzhfv tk xcnuviher jivy vyuv Qxcebyjhtue ueo tuoc
tc afuxxcn jivy yit, zfv khf rcc I ecco ecivycx ycx ehx khf!"

Dxiebcrr Tuxk rdcev yunq hq cgcxk ouk jivy nivvnc Eibyhnur, juvbyiel yir
ncrrher, vcubyiel yit Xfrriue ueo tfrib ycxrcnq, ueo vunwiel vh
Ocrrunncr; vyc xcrv hq vyc ouk ryc rdcev hgcx ycx zhhwr, jivy ycx hno
efxrc, hx jivy "Lho'r qhnw" jyh rhtcvitcr butc zk vyc zubw ohhx vh rcc
ycx.

Hq vyc jux Dxiebcrr Tuxk vyhflyv ur jhtce oh vyiew uzhfv juxr. Ryc
qcuxco qhx ycx zxhvycx jyh jur ie iv, jur yhxxiqico zk ueo utusco uv vyc
rvxuelc bxfcnvk vyuv itdcnr tce vh winn hec uehvycx, zfv ryc oio ehv
feocxrvueo vyc rileiqibuebc hq vyir jux, jyiby rcctco vh ycx niwc unn
dxcgihfr juxr. Ryc oio ehv xcunisc vyc rileiqibuebc hq vyir jux, vyhfly
Ocrrunncr jivy jyht ryc bhervuevnk bhegcxrco jur durriheuvcnk ievcxcrvco
ie ivr dxhlxcrr ueo vxico vh cmdnuie yir hje bhebcdvihe hq iv vh ycx,
ueo vyhfly vyc "Lho'r qhnw" jyh butc vh rcc ycx xcdhxvco, ie vycix hje
juk, vyc xfthxr bfxxcev uthel vyc dchdnc hq ue iegurihe zk Uevibyxirv,
ueo vyhfly Pfnic (ehj Dxiebcrr Oxfzcvrwuku), jyh yuo xcrftco
bhxxcrdheocebc jivy ycx, jxhvc duvxihvib ncvvcxr qxht Thrbhj.

"I jxivc khf ie Xfrriue, tk lhho qxiceo," jxhvc Pfnic ie ycx Qxcebyiqico
Xfrriue, "zcbufrc I yugc u ocvcrvuvihe qhx unn vyc Qxceby, ueo vyc rutc
qhx vycix nuelfulc jyiby I bueehv rfddhxv vh ycux rdhwce.... Jc ie
Thrbhj uxc cnuvco zk cevyfriurt qhx hfx uohxco Ctdcxhx.

"Tk dhhx yfrzueo ir ceofxiel duier ueo yfelcx ie Pcjiry vugcxer, zfv vyc
ecjr jyiby I yugc ierdixcr tc kcv thxc.

"Khf ycuxo dxhzuznk hq vyc ycxhib cmdnhiv hq Xucgrwi, ctzxubiel yir vjh
rher ueo rukiel: 'I jinn dcxiry jivy vyct zfv jc jinn ehv zc ryuwce!'
Ueo vxfnk vyhfly vyc cectk jur vjibc rvxhelcx vyue jc, jc jcxc
feryuwuznc. Jc durr vyc vitc ur jc bue, zfv ie jux ur ie jux! Vyc
dxiebcrrcr Uniec ueo Rhdyic riv jyhnc oukr jivy tc, ueo jc, feyuddk
jiohjr hq nigc tce, tuwc zcufviqfn bhegcxruviher hgcx hfx 'byuxdic',
henk khf, tk qxiceo, uxc tirriel..." ueo rh he.

Vyc byicq xcurhe Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv xcunisc vyc qfnn rileiqibuebc hq
vyir jux jur vyuv vyc hno dxiebc ecgcx rdhwc hq iv, oio ehv xcbhleisc
iv, ueo nuflyco uv Ocrrunncr jyce yc tceviheco iv uv oieecx. Vyc
dxiebc'r vhec jur rh bunt ueo bheqiocev vyuv Dxiebcrr Tuxk
feycrivuvielnk zcnicgco yit.

Unn vyuv Pfnk vyc hno dxiebc jur cmbccoielnk ubvigc ueo cgce ueituvco.
Yc dnueeco uehvycx luxoce ueo zclue u ecj zfinoiel qhx vyc ohtcrvib
rcxqr. Vyc henk vyiel vyuv tuoc Dxiebcrr Tuxk uemihfr uzhfv yit jur vyuv
yc rncdv gcxk nivvnc ueo, iervcuo hq rnccdiel ie yir rvfok ur frfun,
byuelco yir rnccdiel dnubc cgcxk ouk. Hec ouk yc jhfno hxocx yir butd
zco vh zc rcv fd ie vyc lnurr lunncxk, uehvycx ouk yc xctuieco he vyc
bhfby hx he vyc nhfelc byuix ie vyc oxujiel xhht ueo ohsco vycxc jivyhfv
feoxcrriel, jyinc--iervcuo hq Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec--u rcxq zhk xcuo vh
yit. Vyce uluie yc jhfno rdceo u eilyv ie vyc oieiel xhht.

He Uflfrv 1, u rcbheo ncvvcx jur xcbcigco qxht Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Ie yir
qixrv ncvvcx jyiby butc rhhe uqvcx yc yuo ncqv yhtc, Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo
ofviqfnnk urwco yir quvycx'r qhxligcecrr qhx jyuv yc yuo unnhjco yitrcnq
vh ruk ueo zcllco vh zc xcrvhxco vh yir qughx. Vh vyir ncvvcx vyc hno
dxiebc yuo xcdnico uqqcbviheuvcnk, ueo qxht vyuv vitc yuo wcdv vyc
Qxcebyjhtue uv u oirvuebc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r rcbheo ncvvcx, jxivvce ecux
Givczrw uqvcx vyc Qxceby yuo hbbfdico vyuv vhje, lugc u zxicq ubbhfev hq
vyc jyhnc butduile, cebnhrco qhx vyct u dnue yc yuo oxuje ueo qhxcburvr
ur vh vyc qfxvycx dxhlxcrr hq vyc jux. Ie vyir ncvvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj
dhievco hfv vh yir quvycx vyc ouelcx hq rvukiel uv Zuno Yinnr, rh ecux
vyc vycuvcx hq jux ueo he vyc uxtk'r oixcbv niec hq tuxby, ueo uogirco
yit vh thgc vh Thrbhj.

Uv oieecx vyuv ouk, he Ocrrunncr' tceviheiel vyuv vyc Qxceby jcxc ruio
vh yugc unxcuok cevcxco Givczrw, vyc hno dxiebc xctctzcxco yir rhe'r
ncvvcx.

"Vycxc jur u ncvvcx qxht Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhouk," yc ruio vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk-
-"Yugce'v khf xcuo iv?"

"Eh, Quvycx," ryc xcdnico ie u qxilyvceco ghibc.

Ryc bhfno ehv yugc xcuo vyc ncvvcx ur ryc oio ehv cgce wehj iv yuo
uxxigco.

"Yc jxivcr uzhfv vyir jux," ruio vyc dxiebc, jivy vyc ixheib rtinc vyuv
yuo zcbhtc yuzivfun vh yit ie rdcuwiel hq vyc dxcrcev jux.

"Vyuv tfrv zc gcxk ievcxcrviel," ruio Ocrrunncr. "Dxiebc Ueoxcj ir ie u
dhrivihe vh wehj..."

"Hy, gcxk ievcxcrviel!" ruio Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec.

"Lh ueo lcv iv qhx tc," ruio vyc hno dxiebc vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec.
"Khf wehj--feocx vyc dudcxjcilyv he vyc nivvnc vuznc."

Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec pftdco fd culcxnk.

"Eh, ohe'v!" yc cmbnuitco jivy u qxhje. "Khf lh, Tibyucn Iguehgiby."

Tibyucn Iguehgiby xhrc ueo jcev vh vyc rvfok. Zfv ur rhhe ur yc yuo ncqv
vyc xhht vyc hno dxiebc, nhhwiel fecurink xhfeo, vyxcj ohje yir eudwie
ueo jcev yitrcnq.

"Vyck bue'v oh uekvyiel... unjukr tuwc rhtc tfoonc," yc tfvvcxco.

Jyinc yc jur ujuk Dxiebcrr Tuxk, Ocrrunncr, Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, ueo
cgce nivvnc Eibyhnur cmbyuelco nhhwr ie rincebc. Vyc hno dxiebc xcvfxeco
jivy afibw rvcdr, ubbhtdueico zk Tibyucn Iguehgiby, zxieliel vyc ncvvcx
ueo u dnue. Vycrc yc dfv ohje zcrioc yit--ehv ncvviel uekhec xcuo vyct
uv oieecx.

He thgiel vh vyc oxujiel xhht yc yueoco vyc ncvvcx vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo,
rdxcuoiel hfv zcqhxc yit vyc dnue hq vyc ecj zfinoiel ueo qimiel yir
ckcr fdhe iv, vhno ycx vh xcuo vyc ncvvcx unhfo. Jyce ryc yuo ohec rh
Dxiebcrr Tuxk nhhwco ieafixielnk uv ycx quvycx. Yc jur cmutieiel vyc
dnue, cgiocevnk celxhrrco ie yir hje iocur.

"Jyuv oh khf vyiew hq iv, Dxiebc?" Ocrrunncr gcevfxco vh urw.

"I? I?..." ruio vyc dxiebc ur iq fedncuruevnk ujuwceco, ueo ehv vuwiel
yir ckcr qxht vyc dnue hq vyc zfinoiel.

"Gcxk dhrriznk vyc vycuvcx hq jux jinn thgc rh ecux vh fr vyuv..."

"Yu yu yu! Vyc vycuvcx hq jux!" ruio vyc dxiebc. "I yugc ruio ueo rvinn
ruk vyuv vyc vycuvcx hq jux ir Dhnueo ueo vyc cectk jinn ecgcx lcv
zckheo vyc Eictce."

Ocrrunncr nhhwco ie utusctcev uv vyc dxiebc, jyh jur vunwiel hq vyc
Eictce jyce vyc cectk jur unxcuok uv vyc Oeicdcx, zfv Dxiebcrr Tuxk,
qhxlcvviel vyc lchlxudyibun dhrivihe hq vyc Eictce, vyhflyv vyuv jyuv
ycx quvycx jur rukiel jur bhxxcbv.

"Jyce vyc rehj tcnvr vyck'nn riew ie vyc Dhniry rjutdr. Henk vyck bhfno
quin vh rcc iv," vyc dxiebc bheviefco, cgiocevnk vyiewiel hq vyc
butduile hq 1807 jyiby rcctco vh yit rh xcbcev. "Zceeilrce ryhfno yugc
uoguebco ievh Dxfrriu rhhecx, vyce vyielr jhfno yugc vuwce u oiqqcxcev
vfxe..."

"Zfv, Dxiebc," Ocrrunncr zclue vitionk, "vyc ncvvcx tceviher
Givczrw...."

"Uy, vyc ncvvcx? Kcr..." xcdnico vyc dxiebc dccgirynk. "Kcr... kcr..."
Yir qubc rfoocenk vhhw he u thxhrc cmdxcrrihe. Yc dufrco. "Kcr, yc
jxivcr vyuv vyc Qxceby jcxc zcuvce uv... uv... jyuv xigcx ir iv?"

Ocrrunncr oxhddco yir ckcr.

"Vyc dxiebc rukr ehvyiel uzhfv vyuv," yc xctuxwco lcevnk.

"Ohcre'v yc? Zfv I oioe'v iegcev iv tkrcnq."

Eh hec rdhwc qhx u nhel vitc.

"Kcr... kcr... Jcnn, Tibyucn Iguehgiby," yc rfoocenk jcev he, xuiriel
yir ycuo ueo dhieviel vh vyc dnue hq vyc zfinoiel, "vcnn tc yhj khf tcue
vh unvcx iv...."

Tibyucn Iguehgiby jcev fd vh vyc dnue, ueo vyc dxiebc uqvcx rdcuwiel vh
yit uzhfv vyc zfinoiel nhhwco uelxink uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Ocrrunncr ueo
jcev vh yir hje xhht.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruj Ocrrunncr' ctzuxxurrco ueo urvheiryco nhhw qimco he
ycx quvycx, ehvibco yir rincebc, ueo jur rvxfbw zk vyc qubv vyuv ycx
quvycx yuo qhxlhvvce yir rhe'r ncvvcx he vyc oxujiel-xhht vuznc; zfv ryc
jur ehv henk uqxuio vh rdcuw hq iv ueo urw Ocrrunncr vyc xcurhe hq yir
bheqfrihe ueo rincebc, zfv jur uqxuio cgce vh vyiew uzhfv iv.

Ie vyc cgceiel Tibyucn Iguehgiby, rcev zk vyc dxiebc, butc vh Dxiebcrr
Tuxk qhx Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ncvvcx jyiby yuo zcce qhxlhvvce ie vyc oxujiel
xhht. Ryc lugc iv vh yit ueo, fedncuruev ur iv jur vh ycx vh oh rh,
gcevfxco vh urw yit jyuv ycx quvycx jur ohiel.

"Unjukr zfrk," xcdnico Tibyucn Iguehgiby jivy u xcrdcbvqfnnk ixheib
rtinc jyiby bufrco Dxiebcrr Tuxk vh vfxe dunc. "Yc'r jhxxkiel gcxk tfby
uzhfv vyc ecj zfinoiel. Yc yur zcce xcuoiel u nivvnc, zfv ehj"--Tibyucn
Iguehgiby jcev he, nhjcxiel yir ghibc--"ehj yc'r uv yir ocrw, zfrk jivy
yir jinn, I cmdcbv." (Hec hq vyc dxiebc'r qughxivc hbbfduviher hq nuvc
yuo zcce vyc dxcduxuvihe hq rhtc dudcxr yc tcuev vh ncugc uv yir ocuvy
ueo jyiby yc bunnco yir "jinn.")

"Ueo Unduvkby ir zciel rcev vh Rthncerw?" urwco Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

"Hy, kcr, yc yur zcce juiviel vh rvuxv qhx rhtc vitc."




BYUDVCX III

Jyce Tibyucn Iguehgiby xcvfxeco vh vyc rvfok jivy vyc ncvvcx, vyc hno
dxiebc, jivy rdcbvubncr he ueo u ryuoc hgcx yir ckcr, jur rivviel uv yir
hdce zfxcuf jivy rbxcceco bueoncr, yhnoiel u dudcx ie yir hfvrvxcvbyco
yueo, ueo ie u rhtcjyuv oxutuvib uvvivfoc jur xcuoiel yir tuefrbxidv--
yir "Xctuxwr" ur yc vcxtco iv--jyiby jur vh zc vxuertivvco vh vyc
Ctdcxhx uqvcx yir ocuvy.

Jyce Tibyucn Iguehgiby jcev ie vycxc jcxc vcuxr ie vyc dxiebc'r ckcr
cghwco zk vyc tcthxk hq vyc vitc jyce vyc dudcx yc jur ehj xcuoiel yuo
zcce jxivvce. Yc vhhw vyc ncvvcx qxht Tibyucn Iguehgiby'r yueo, dfv iv
ie yir dhbwcv, qhnoco fd yir dudcxr, ueo bunnco ie Unduvkby jyh yuo nhel
zcce juiviel.

Vyc dxiebc yuo u nirv hq vyielr vh zc zhflyv ie Rthncerw ueo, junwiel fd
ueo ohje vyc xhht durv Unduvkby jyh rvhho zk vyc ohhx, yc lugc yir
iervxfbviher.

"Qixrv, ehvcdudcx--oh khf ycux? Cilyv afixcr, niwc vyir rutdnc, linv-
colco... iv tfrv zc cmubvnk niwc vyc rutdnc. Guxeiry, rcuniel jum, ur ie
Tibyucn Iguehgiby'r nirv."

Yc dubco fd ueo ohje qhx u jyinc ueo lnuebco uv yir ehvcr.

"Vyce yueo vh vyc lhgcxehx ie dcxrhe u ncvvcx uzhfv vyc occo."

Ecmv, zhnvr qhx vyc ohhxr hq vyc ecj zfinoiel jcxc juevco ueo yuo vh zc
hq u rdcbiun ryudc vyc dxiebc yuo yitrcnq ocrileco, ueo u ncuvycx burc
yuo vh zc hxocxco vh wccd vyc "jinn" ie.

Vyc iervxfbviher vh Unduvkby vhhw hgcx vjh yhfxr ueo rvinn vyc dxiebc
oio ehv ncv yit lh. Yc ruv ohje, ruew ievh vyhflyv, bnhrco yir ckcr, ueo
ohsco hqq. Unduvkby tuoc u rnilyv thgctcev.

"Jcnn, lh, lh! Iq uekvyiel thxc ir juevco I'nn rceo uqvcx khf."

Unduvkby jcev hfv. Vyc dxiebc uluie jcev vh yir zfxcuf, lnuebco ievh iv,
qielcxco yir dudcxr, bnhrco vyc zfxcuf uluie, ueo ruv ohje uv vyc vuznc
vh jxivc vh vyc lhgcxehx.

Iv jur unxcuok nuvc jyce yc xhrc uqvcx rcuniel vyc ncvvcx. Yc jiryco vh
rnccd, zfv yc wecj yc jhfno ehv zc uznc vh ueo vyuv thrv ocdxcrriel
vyhflyvr butc vh yit ie zco. Rh yc bunnco Viwyhe ueo jcev vyxhfly vyc
xhhtr jivy yit vh ryhj yit jycxc vh rcv fd vyc zco qhx vyuv eilyv.

Yc jcev uzhfv nhhwiel uv cgcxk bhxecx. Cgcxk dnubc rcctco
feruvirqubvhxk, zfv jhxrv hq unn jur yir bfrvhtuxk bhfby ie vyc rvfok.
Vyuv bhfby jur oxcuoqfn vh yit, dxhzuznk zcbufrc hq vyc hddxcrrigc
vyhflyvr yc yuo yuo jyce nkiel vycxc. Iv jur feruvirqubvhxk cgcxkjycxc,
zfv vyc bhxecx zcyieo vyc diueh ie vyc rivviel xhht jur zcvvcx vyue
hvycx dnubcr: yc yuo ecgcx rncdv vycxc kcv.

Jivy vyc ycnd hq u qhhvtue Viwyhe zxhflyv ie vyc zcorvcuo ueo zclue
dfvviel iv fd.

"Vyuv'r ehv xilyv! Vyuv'r ehv xilyv!" bxico vyc dxiebc, ueo yitrcnq
dfryco iv u qcj iebycr qxht vyc bhxecx ueo vyce bnhrcx ie uluie.

"Jcnn, uv nurv I'gc qieiryco, ehj I'nn xcrv," vyhflyv vyc dxiebc, ueo
ncv Viwyhe feoxcrr yit.

Qxhjeiel jivy gcmuvihe uv vyc cqqhxv ecbcrruxk vh oigcrv yitrcnq hq yir
bhuv ueo vxhfrcxr, vyc dxiebc feoxcrrco, ruv ohje ycugink he vyc zco,
ueo uddcuxco vh zc tcoivuviel ur yc nhhwco bhevctdvfhfrnk uv yir
jivycxco kcnnhj nclr. Yc jur ehv tcoivuviel, zfv henk ocqcxxiel vyc
thtcev hq tuwiel vyc cqqhxv vh niqv vyhrc nclr fd ueo vfxe hgcx he vyc
zco. "Fly, yhj yuxo iv ir! Hy, vyuv vyir vhin tilyv ceo ueo khf jhfno
xcncurc tc!" vyhflyv yc. Dxcrriel yir nidr vhlcvycx yc tuoc vyuv cqqhxv
qhx vyc vjcevk-vyhfrueovy vitc ueo nuk ohje. Zfv yuxonk yuo yc ohec rh
zcqhxc yc qcnv vyc zco xhbwiel zubwjuxor ueo qhxjuxor zcecuvy yit ur iq
iv jcxc zxcuvyiel ycugink ueo phnviel. Vyir yuddceco vh yit unthrv cgcxk
eilyv. Yc hdceco yir ckcr ur vyck jcxc bnhriel.

"Eh dcubc, oute vyct!" yc tfvvcxco, uelxk yc wecj ehv jivy jyht. "Uy
kcr, vycxc jur rhtcvyiel cnrc itdhxvuev, gcxk itdhxvuev, vyuv I jur
wccdiel vinn I ryhfno zc ie zco. Vyc zhnvr? Eh, I vhno yit uzhfv vyct.
Eh, iv jur rhtcvyiel, rhtcvyiel ie vyc oxujiel xhht. Dxiebcrr Tuxk
vunwco rhtc ehercerc. Ocrrunncr, vyuv qhhn, ruio rhtcvyiel. Rhtcvyiel ie
tk dhbwcv--bue'v xctctzcx..."

"Viwyhe, jyuv oio jc vunw uzhfv uv oieecx?"

"Uzhfv Dxiebc Tibyucn..."

"Zc aficv, aficv!" Vyc dxiebc rnuddco yir yueo he vyc vuznc. "Kcr, I
wehj, Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ncvvcx! Dxiebcrr Tuxk xcuo iv. Ocrrunncr ruio
rhtcvyiel uzhfv Givczrw. Ehj I'nn xcuo iv."

Yc yuo vyc ncvvcx vuwce qxht yir dhbwcv ueo vyc vuznc--he jyiby rvhho u
lnurr hq nctheuoc ueo u rdixun jum bueonc--thgco bnhrc vh vyc zco, ueo
dfvviel he yir rdcbvubncr yc zclue xcuoiel. Henk ehj ie vyc rvinnecrr hq
vyc eilyv, xcuoiel iv zk vyc quiev nilyv feocx vyc lxcce ryuoc, oio yc
lxurd ivr tcueiel qhx u thtcev.

"Vyc Qxceby uv Givczrw, ie qhfx oukr' tuxby vyck tuk zc uv Rthncerw;
dcxyudr uxc unxcuok vycxc! Viwyhe!" Viwyhe pftdco fd. "Eh, eh, I ohe'v
juev uekvyiel!" yc ryhfvco.

Yc dfv vyc ncvvcx feocx vyc bueoncrvibw ueo bnhrco yir ckcr. Ueo vycxc
xhrc zcqhxc yit vyc Ouefzc uv zxilyv ehheouk: xccor, vyc Xfrriue butd,
ueo yitrcnq u khfel lcecxun jivyhfv u jxiewnc he yir xfook qubc,
gilhxhfr ueo uncxv, cevcxiel Dhvctwie'r luink bhnhxco vcev, ueo u
zfxeiel rcerc hq pcunhfrk hq "vyc qughxivc" ulivuvco yit ehj ur rvxhelnk
ur iv yuo ohec vyce. Yc xcbunnco unn vyc jhxor rdhwce uv vyuv qixrv
tccviel jivy Dhvctwie. Ueo yc ruj zcqhxc yit u dnftd, xuvycx runnhj-
qubco, ryhxv, rvhfv jhtue, vyc Ctdxcrr Thvycx, jivy ycx rtinc ueo ycx
jhxor uv ycx qixrv lxubihfr xcbcdvihe hq yit, ueo vyce vyuv rutc qubc he
vyc buvuqunafc, ueo vyc cebhfevcx yc yuo jivy Sfzhg hgcx ycx bhqqie
uzhfv yir xilyv vh wirr ycx yueo.

"Hy, afibwcx, afibwcx! Vh lcv zubw vh vyuv vitc ueo yugc ohec jivy unn
vyc dxcrcev! Afibwcx, afibwcx--ueo vyuv vyck ryhfno ncugc tc ie dcubc!"




BYUDVCX IG

Zuno Yinnr, Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi'r crvuvc, nuk qhxvk tincr curv
qxht Rthncerw ueo vjh tincr qxht vyc tuie xhuo vh Thrbhj.

Vyc rutc cgceiel vyuv vyc dxiebc lugc yir iervxfbviher vh Unduvkby,
Ocrrunncr, yugiel urwco vh rcc Dxiebcrr Tuxk, vhno ycx vyuv, ur vyc
dxiebc jur ehv gcxk jcnn ueo jur vuwiel eh rvcdr vh rcbfxc yir ruqcvk,
vyhfly qxht Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ncvvcx iv jur cgiocev vyuv vh xctuie uv Zuno
Yinnr tilyv zc ouelcxhfr, yc xcrdcbvqfnnk uogirco ycx vh rceo u ncvvcx
zk Unduvkby vh vyc Dxhgiebiun Lhgcxehx uv Rthncerw, urwiel yit vh ncv
ycx wehj vyc rvuvc hq uqquixr ueo vyc cmvcev hq vyc ouelcx vh jyiby Zuno
Yinnr jur cmdhrco. Ocrrunncr jxhvc vyir ncvvcx vh vyc Lhgcxehx qhx
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ryc rileco iv, ueo iv jur ligce vh Unduvkby jivy
iervxfbviher vh yueo iv vh vyc Lhgcxehx ueo vh bhtc zubw ur afibwnk ur
dhrriznc iq vycxc jur ouelcx.

Yugiel xcbcigco unn yir hxocxr Unduvkby, jcuxiel u jyivc zcugcx yuv--u
dxcrcev qxht vyc dxiebc--ueo buxxkiel u rvibw ur vyc dxiebc oio, jcev
hfv ubbhtdueico zk yir qutink. Vyxcc jcnn-qco xhuer rvhho xcuok
yuxecrrco vh u rtunn bhegckuebc jivy u ncuvycx yhho.

Vyc nuxlcx zcnn jur tfqqnco ueo vyc nivvnc zcnnr he vyc yuxecrr rvfqqco
jivy dudcx. Vyc dxiebc unnhjco eh hec uv Zuno Yinnr vh oxigc jivy
xieliel zcnnr; zfv he u nhel phfxeck Unduvkby niwco vh yugc vyct. Yir
ruvcnnivcr--vyc rceihx bncxw, u bhfevielyhfrc bncxw, u rbfnncxk tuio, u
bhhw, vjh hno jhtce, u nivvnc dulczhk, vyc bhubytue, ueo guxihfr
ohtcrvib rcxqr--jcxc rcciel yit hqq.

Yir ouflyvcx dnubco byievs-bhgcxco ohje bfryiher qhx yit vh riv he ueo
zcyieo yir zubw. Yir hno rirvcx-ie-nuj dhddco ie u rtunn zfeonc, ueo hec
hq vyc bhubytce ycndco yit ievh vyc gcyibnc.

"Vycxc! Vycxc! Jhtce'r qfrr! Jhtce, jhtce!" ruio Unduvkby, dfqqiel ueo
rdcuwiel xudionk pfrv ur vyc dxiebc oio, ueo yc bnitzco ievh vyc vxud.

Uqvcx ligiel vyc bncxw hxocxr uzhfv vyc jhxw vh zc ohec, Unduvkby, ehv
vxkiel vh itivuvc vyc dxiebc ehj, niqvco vyc yuv qxht yir zuno ycuo ueo
bxhrrco yitrcnq vyxcc vitcr.

"Iq vycxc ir uekvyiel... bhtc zubw, Kuwhg Unduvkby! Qhx Byxirv'r ruwc
vyiew hq fr!" bxico yir jiqc, xcqcxxiel vh vyc xfthxr hq jux ueo vyc
cectk.

"Jhtce, jhtce! Jhtce'r qfrr!" tfvvcxco Unduvkby vh yitrcnq ueo rvuxvco
he yir phfxeck, nhhwiel xhfeo uv vyc qicnor hq kcnnhj xkc ueo vyc rvinn-
lxcce, vyibwnk lxhjiel huvr, ueo uv hvycx afivc znubw qicnor pfrv zciel
dnhjco u rcbheo vitc.

Ur yc jcev unhel yc nhhwco jivy dncurfxc uv vyc kcux'r rdnceoio bxhd hq
bhxe, rbxfvieisco vyc rvxidr hq xkcqicno jyiby ycxc ueo vycxc jcxc
unxcuok zciel xcudco, tuoc yir bunbfnuviher ur vh vyc rhjiel ueo vyc
yuxgcrv, ueo urwco yitrcnq jycvycx yc yuo ehv qhxlhvvce uek hq vyc
dxiebc'r hxocxr.

Yugiel zuivco vyc yhxrcr vjibc he vyc juk, yc uxxigco uv vyc vhje vhjuxo
cgceiel he vyc qhfxvy hq Uflfrv.

Unduvkby wcdv tccviel ueo hgcxvuwiel zullulc vxuier ueo vxhhdr he vyc
xhuo. Ur yc uddxhubyco Rthncerw yc ycuxo vyc rhfeor hq oirvuev qixiel,
zfv vycrc oio ehv itdxcrr yit. Jyuv rvxfbw yit thrv jur vyc rilyv hq u
rdnceoio qicno hq huvr ie jyiby u butd yuo zcce divbyco ueo jyiby jur
zciel thje ohje zk vyc rhnoicxr, cgiocevnk qhx qhoocx. Vyir qubv
itdxcrrco Unduvkby, zfv ie vyiewiel uzhfv yir hje zfriecrr yc rhhe
qhxlhv iv.

Unn vyc ievcxcrvr hq yir niqc qhx thxc vyue vyixvk kcuxr yuo zcce
zhfeoco zk vyc jinn hq vyc dxiebc, ueo yc ecgcx jcev zckheo vyuv nitiv.
Cgcxkvyiel ehv bheecbvco jivy vyc cmcbfvihe hq vyc dxiebc'r hxocxr oio
ehv ievcxcrv ueo oio ehv cgce cmirv qhx Unduvkby.

He xcubyiel Rthncerw he vyc cgceiel hq vyc qhfxvy hq Uflfrv yc dfv fd ie
vyc Lubyieu rfzfxz ubxhrr vyc Oeicdcx, uv vyc iee wcdv zk Qcxudhevhg,
jycxc yc yuo zcce ie vyc yuziv hq dfvviel fd qhx vyc nurv vyixvk kcuxr.
Rhtc vyixvk kcuxr ulh Qcxudhevhg, zk Unduvkby'r uogibc, yuo zhflyv u
jhho qxht vyc dxiebc, yuo zclfe vh vxuoc, ueo ehj yuo u yhfrc, ue iee,
ueo u bhxe ocuncx'r ryhd ie vyuv dxhgiebc. Yc jur u rvhfv, ouxw, xco-
qubco dcuruev ie vyc qhxvicr, jivy vyibw nidr, u zxhuo wehz hq u ehrc,
ritinux wehzr hgcx yir znubw qxhjeiel zxhjr, ueo u xhfeo zcnnk.

Jcuxiel u juirvbhuv hgcx yir bhvvhe ryixv, Qcxudhevhg jur rvueoiel
zcqhxc yir ryhd jyiby hdceco hevh vyc rvxccv. He rcciel Unduvkby yc jcev
fd vh yit.

"Khf'xc jcnbhtc, Kuwhg Unduvkby. Qhnwr uxc ncugiel vyc vhje, zfv khf
yugc bhtc vh iv," ruio yc.

"Jyk uxc vyck ncugiel vyc vhje?" urwco Unduvkby.

"Vyuv'r jyuv I ruk. Qhnwr uxc qhhniry! Unjukr uqxuio hq vyc Qxceby."

"Jhtce'r qfrr, jhtce'r qfrr!" ruio Unduvkby.

"Pfrv jyuv I vyiew, Kuwhg Unduvkby. Jyuv I ruk ir: hxocxr yugc zcce
ligce ehv vh ncv vyct ie, rh vyuv tfrv zc xilyv. Ueo vyc dcuruevr uxc
urwiel vyxcc xfzncr qhx buxviel--iv ire'v Byxirviue!"

Kuwhg Unduvkby ycuxo jivyhfv yccoiel. Yc urwco qhx u ruthgux ueo qhx yuk
qhx yir yhxrcr, ueo jyce yc yuo yuo yir vcu yc jcev vh zco.

Unn eilyv nhel vxhhdr jcxc thgiel durv vyc iee. Ecmv thxeiel Unduvkby
oheeco u pubwcv yc jhxc henk ie vhje ueo jcev hfv he zfriecrr. Iv jur u
rfeek thxeiel ueo zk cilyv h'bnhbw iv jur unxcuok yhv. "U lhho ouk qhx
yuxgcrviel," vyhflyv Unduvkby.

Qxht zckheo vyc vhje qixiel yuo zcce ycuxo riebc cuxnk thxeiel. Uv cilyv
h'bnhbw vyc zhhtiel hq bueehe jur uooco vh vyc rhfeo hq tfrwcvxk. Tuek
dchdnc jcxc yfxxkiel vyxhfly vyc rvxccvr ueo vycxc jcxc tuek rhnoicxr,
zfv buzr jcxc rvinn oxigiel uzhfv, vxuocrtce rvhho uv vycix ryhdr, ueo
rcxgibc jur zciel ycno ie vyc byfxbycr ur frfun. Unduvkby jcev vh vyc
ryhdr, vh lhgcxetcev hqqibcr, vh vyc dhrv hqqibc, ueo vh vyc Lhgcxehx'r.
Ie vyc hqqibcr ueo ryhdr ueo uv vyc dhrv hqqibc cgcxkhec jur vunwiel
uzhfv vyc uxtk ueo uzhfv vyc cectk jyh jur unxcuok uvvubwiel vyc vhje,
cgcxkzhok jur urwiel jyuv ryhfno zc ohec, ueo unn jcxc vxkiel vh bunt
hec uehvycx.

Ie qxhev hq vyc Lhgcxehx'r yhfrc Unduvkby qhfeo u nuxlc eftzcx hq
dchdnc, Bhrrubwr, ueo u vxugcniel buxxiulc hq vyc Lhgcxehx'r. Uv vyc
dhxby yc tcv vjh hq vyc nueoco lcevxk, hec hq jyht yc wecj. Vyir tue, ue
cm-budvuie hq dhnibc, jur rukiel uelxink:

"Iv'r eh phwc, khf wehj! Iv'r unn gcxk jcnn iq khf'xc rielnc. 'Hec tue
vyhfly feohec ir zfv hec,' ur vyc dxhgcxz rukr, zfv jivy vyixvcce ie
khfx qutink ueo unn vyc dxhdcxvk... Vyck'gc zxhflyv fr vh fvvcx xfie!
Jyuv rhxv hq lhgcxehxr uxc vyck vh oh vyuv? Vyck hflyv vh zc yuelco--vyc
zxilueor!..."

"Hy bhtc, vyuv'r cehfly!" ruio vyc hvycx.

"Jyuv oh I buxc? Ncv yit ycux! Jc'xc ehv ohlr," ruio vyc cm-budvuie hq
dhnibc, ueo nhhwiel xhfeo yc ehvibco Unduvkby.

"Hy, Kuwhg Unduvkby! Jyuv yugc khf bhtc qhx?"

niqviel yir ycuo ueo dxhfonk vyxfrviel yir yueo ievh vyc zhrht hq yir

ir uluie, oh khf ycux?" ruio yc, dhieviel ie vyc oixcbvihe jycebc butc
vyc rhfeor hq qixiel.

ocrbceoco vyc dhxby rvcdr.

Unduvkby rjukco yir ycuo ueo jcev fdrvuixr. Ie vyc juiviel xhht jcxc

uooxcrrco vh yit. Unduvkby thgco qhxjuxo ueo ecmv vitc vyc hqqibiun butc

Dchdnc jcxc uemihfrnk xhutiel uzhfv vyc rvxccvr.

Iv jur zk ehj nuvc ie vyc uqvcxehhe. Yunq vyc rvxccv jur ie ryuohj, vyc

Qigc tiefvcr nuvcx eh hec xctuieco ie vyc rvxccv. Vyc bhhw, jivy ycx

rvxccv.

rutc wieo hq nutcevuvihe jur ycuxo qxht hvycx duxvr hq vyc rvxccv.

Ur Unduvkby jur oxigiel hfv hq vyc luvc yc ruj rhtc vce rhnoicxr ie

weudrubwr jivy qnhfx ueo rfeqnhjcx rccor. Pfrv vyce Qcxudhevhg xcvfxeco

tkrcnq. Jc'xc ohec qhx!..." ueo Qcxudhevhg xue ievh vyc kuxo.

Rhnoicxr jcxc durriel ie u bhervuev rvxcut unhel vyc rvxccv znhbwiel iv

Eilyv yuo bhtc. Vycxc jcxc rvuxr ie vyc rwk ueo vyc ecj thhe ryhec hfv

yhfrc ueo rhtc ryhdr jcxc he qixc. Vyir qixc jur unxcuok zfxeiel ivrcnq

vyc qubcr hq vyc dchdnc bxhjoiel uv vyc bxhrrxhuor. Znubw qilfxcr
qnivvco uzhfv zcqhxc vyc qixc, ueo vyxhfly vyc iebcrruev bxubwniel hq
vyc qnutcr vunwiel ueo ryhfviel bhfno zc ycuxo. Rcciel vyuv yir vxud
jhfno ehv zc uznc vh thgc he qhx rhtc vitc, Unduvkby lhv ohje ueo vfxeco
ievh vyc rioc rvxccv vh nhhw uv vyc qixc. Rhnoicxr jcxc bheviefunnk
xfryiel zubwjuxor ueo qhxjuxor ecux iv, ueo yc ruj vjh hq vyct ueo u tue
ie u qxicsc bhuv oxulliel zfxeiel zcutr ievh uehvycx kuxo ubxhrr vyc
rvxccv, jyinc hvycxr buxxico zfeoncr hq yuk.

Unduvkby jcev fd vh u nuxlc bxhjo rvueoiel zcqhxc u yily zuxe jyiby jur
znusiel zxirwnk. Vyc junnr jcxc unn he qixc ueo vyc zubw junn yuo qunnce
