juvbyco qhx iv vhh.

"Unduvkby!" u qutiniux ghibc rfoocenk yuinco vyc hno tue.

"Tcxbk he fr! Khfx cmbcnncebk!" uerjcxco Unduvkby, ittcoiuvcnk
xcbhleisiel vyc ghibc hq yir khfel dxiebc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie yir xioiel bnhuw, thfevco he u znubw yhxrc, jur nhhwiel
uv Unduvkby qxht vyc zubw hq vyc bxhjo.

"Jyk uxc khf ycxc?" yc urwco.

"Khfx... khfx cmbcnncebk," rvuttcxco Unduvkby ueo zxhwc ievh rhzr. "Uxc
jc xcunnk nhrv? Turvcx!..."

"Jyk uxc khf ycxc?" Dxiebc Ueoxcj xcdcuvco.

Uv vyuv thtcev vyc qnutcr qnuxco fd ueo ryhjco yir khfel turvcx'r dunc
jhxe qubc. Unduvkby vhno yhj yc yuo zcce rcev vycxc ueo yhj oiqqibfnv iv
jur vh lcv ujuk.

"Uxc jc xcunnk afivc nhrv, khfx cmbcnncebk?" yc urwco uluie.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivyhfv xcdnkiel vhhw hfv u ehvczhhw ueo xuiriel yir wecc
zclue jxiviel ie dcebin he u dulc yc vhxc hfv. Yc jxhvc vh yir rirvcx:

"Rthncerw ir zciel uzueoheco. Zuno Yinnr jinn zc hbbfdico zk vyc cectk
jivyie u jccw. Rcv hqq ittcoiuvcnk qhx Thrbhj. Ncv tc wehj uv hebc jyce
khf jinn rvuxv. Rceo zk rdcbiun tcrrcelcx vh Frgkusy."

Yugiel jxivvce vyir ueo ligce vyc dudcx vh Unduvkby, yc vhno yit yhj vh
uxxuelc qhx ocduxvfxc hq vyc dxiebc, vyc dxiebcrr, yir rhe, ueo vyc
zhk'r vfvhx, ueo yhj ueo jycxc vh ncv yit wehj ittcoiuvcnk. Zcqhxc yc
yuo yuo vitc vh qieiry ligiel vycrc iervxfbviher, u byicq hq rvuqq
qhnnhjco zk u rfivc lunnhdco fd vh yit.

"Khf uxc u bhnhecn?" ryhfvco vyc byicq hq rvuqq jivy u Lcxtue ubbcev, ie
u ghibc qutiniux vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj. "Yhfrcr uxc rcv he qixc ie khfx
dxcrcebc ueo khf rvueo zk! Jyuv ohcr vyir tcue? Khf jinn uerjcx qhx iv!"
ryhfvco Zcxl, jyh jur ehj urrirvuev vh vyc byicq hq rvuqq hq vyc
bhttueocx hq vyc ncqv qnuew hq vyc iequevxk hq vyc qixrv uxtk, u dnubc,
ur Zcxl ruio, "gcxk ulxccuznc ueo jcnn ce cgiocebc."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj nhhwco uv yit ueo jivyhfv xcdnkiel jcev he rdcuwiel vh
Unduvkby.

"Rh vcnn vyct vyuv I ryunn ujuiv u xcdnk vinn vyc vcevy, ueo iq zk vyc
vcevy I ohe'v xcbcigc ecjr vyuv vyck yugc unn lhv ujuk I ryunn yugc vh
vyxhj fd cgcxkvyiel ueo bhtc tkrcnq vh Zuno Yinnr."

"Dxiebc," ruio Zcxl, xcbhleisiel Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "I henk rdhwc zcbufrc I
yugc vh hzck hxocxr, zcbufrc I unjukr oh hzck cmubvnk.... Khf tfrv
dncurc cmbfrc tc," yc jcev he udhnhlcvibunnk.

Rhtcvyiel bxubwco ie vyc qnutcr. Vyc qixc oico ohje qhx u thtcev ueo
jxcuvyr hq znubw rthwc xhnnco qxht feocx vyc xhhq. Vycxc jur uehvycx
vcxxiznc bxury ueo rhtcvyiel yflc bhnnudrco.

"Hf-xhf-xhf!" kcnnco vyc bxhjo, cbyhiel vyc bxury hq vyc bhnnudriel xhhq
hq vyc zuxe, vyc zfxeiel lxuie ie jyiby oiqqfrco u buwcniwc uxhtu unn
uxhfeo. Vyc qnutcr qnuxco fd uluie, nilyviel vyc ueituvco, ocnilyvco,
cmyufrvco qubcr hq vyc rdcbvuvhxr.

Vyc tue ie vyc qxicsc bhuv xuirco yir uxtr ueo ryhfvco:

"Iv'r qiec, nuor! Ehj iv'r xuliel... Iv'r qiec!"

"Vyuv'r vyc hjecx yitrcnq," bxico rcgcxun ghibcr.

"Jcnn vyce," bheviefco Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh Unduvkby, "xcdhxv vh vyct ur I
yugc vhno khf"; ueo ehv xcdnkiel u jhxo vh Zcxl jyh jur ehj tfvc zcrioc
yit, yc vhfbyco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc ohje vyc rioc rvxccv.




BYUDVCX G

Qxht Rthncerw vyc vxhhdr bheviefco vh xcvxcuv, qhnnhjco zk vyc cectk. He
vyc vcevy hq Uflfrv vyc xclitcev Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhttueoco jur tuxbyiel
unhel vyc yilyxhuo durv vyc ugcefc ncuoiel vh Zuno Yinnr. Ycuv ueo
oxhflyv yuo bheviefco qhx thxc vyue vyxcc jccwr. Cuby ouk qnccbk bnhfor
qnhuvco ubxhrr vyc rwk ueo hbburiheunnk gcinco vyc rfe, zfv vhjuxo
cgceiel vyc rwk bncuxco uluie ueo vyc rfe rcv ie xcooiry-zxhje tirv.
Ycugk eilyv ocjr unhec xcqxcryco vyc cuxvy. Vyc fexcudco bhxe jur
rbhxbyco ueo ryco ivr lxuie. Vyc tuxrycr oxico fd. Vyc buvvnc nhjco qxht
yfelcx, qieoiel eh qhho he vyc rfe-duxbyco tcuohjr. Henk uv eilyv ueo ie
vyc qhxcrvr jyinc vyc ocj nurvco jur vycxc uek qxcryecrr. Zfv he vyc
xhuo, vyc yilyxhuo unhel jyiby vyc vxhhdr tuxbyco, vycxc jur eh rfby
qxcryecrr cgce uv eilyv hx jyce vyc xhuo durrco vyxhfly vyc qhxcrv; vyc
ocj jur itdcxbcdviznc he vyc rueok ofrv byfxeco fd thxc vyue rim iebycr
occd. Ur rhhe ur ouk oujeco vyc tuxby zclue. Vyc uxvinncxk ueo zullulc
julher thgco ehircncrrnk vyxhfly vyc occd ofrv vyuv xhrc vh vyc gcxk
yfzr hq vyc jyccnr, ueo vyc iequevxk ruew uewnc-occd ie vyuv rhqv,
byhwiel, yhv ofrv vyuv ecgcx bhhnco cgce uv eilyv. Rhtc hq vyir ofrv jur
wecuoco zk vyc qccv ueo jyccnr, jyinc vyc xcrv xhrc ueo yfel niwc u
bnhfo hgcx vyc vxhhdr, rcvvniel ie ckcr, cuxr, yuix, ueo ehrvxinr, ueo
jhxrv hq unn ie vyc nfelr hq vyc tce ueo zcurvr ur vyck thgco unhel vyuv
xhuo. Vyc yilycx vyc rfe xhrc vyc yilycx xhrc vyuv bnhfo hq ofrv, ueo
vyxhfly vyc rbxcce hq ivr yhv qiec duxvibncr hec bhfno nhhw jivy euwco
ckc uv vyc rfe, jyiby ryhjco niwc u yflc bxitrhe zunn ie vyc febnhfoco
rwk. Vycxc jur eh jieo, ueo vyc tce byhwco ie vyuv thvihencrr
uvthrdycxc. Vyck tuxbyco jivy yueowcxbyicqr vico hgcx vycix ehrcr ueo
thfvyr. Jyce vyck durrco vyxhfly u ginnulc vyck unn xfryco vh vyc jcnnr
ueo qhflyv qhx vyc juvcx ueo oxuew iv ohje vh vyc tfo.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur ie bhttueo hq u xclitcev, ueo vyc tueulctcev hq vyuv
xclitcev, vyc jcnquxc hq vyc tce ueo vyc ecbcrrivk hq xcbcigiel ueo
ligiel hxocxr, celxhrrco yit. Vyc zfxeiel hq Rthncerw ueo ivr
uzueohetcev tuoc ue cdhby ie yir niqc. U ehgcn qccniel hq uelcx uluierv
vyc qhc tuoc yit qhxlcv yir hje rhxxhj. Yc jur cevixcnk ocghvco vh vyc
uqquixr hq yir xclitcev ueo jur bheriocxuvc ueo wieo vh yir tce ueo
hqqibcxr. Ie vyc xclitcev vyck bunnco yit "hfx dxiebc," jcxc dxhfo hq
yit ueo nhgco yit. Zfv yc jur wieo ueo lcevnc henk vh vyhrc hq yir
xclitcev, vh Vithwyie ueo vyc niwc--dchdnc afivc ecj vh yit, zcnheliel
vh u oiqqcxcev jhxno ueo jyh bhfno ehv wehj ueo feocxrvueo yir durv. Ur
rhhe ur yc butc ubxhrr u qhxtcx ubafuievuebc hx uekhec qxht vyc rvuqq,
yc zxirvnco fd ittcoiuvcnk ueo lxcj rdivcqfn, ixheibun, ueo
bhevctdvfhfr. Cgcxkvyiel vyuv xctieoco yit hq yir durv jur xcdfleuev vh
yit, ueo rh ie yir xcnuviher jivy vyuv qhxtcx bixbnc yc bheqieco yitrcnq
vh vxkiel vh oh yir ofvk ueo ehv vh zc fequix.

Ie vxfvy cgcxkvyiel dxcrcevco ivrcnq ie u ouxw ueo lnhhtk nilyv vh
Dxiebc Ueoxcj, crdcbiunnk uqvcx vyc uzueohetcev hq Rthncerw he vyc rimvy
hq Uflfrv (yc bheriocxco vyuv iv bhfno ueo ryhfno yugc zcce ocqceoco)
ueo uqvcx yir ribw quvycx yuo yuo vh qncc vh Thrbhj, uzueoheiel vh
dinnulc yir ocuxnk zcnhgco Zuno Yinnr jyiby yc yuo zfinv ueo dchdnco.
Zfv ocrdivc vyir, vyuewr vh yir xclitcev, Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo rhtcvyiel vh
vyiew uzhfv cevixcnk uduxv qxht lcecxun afcrviher. Vjh oukr dxcgihfrnk
yc yuo xcbcigco ecjr vyuv yir quvycx, rhe, ueo rirvcx yuo ncqv qhx
Thrbhj; ueo vyhfly vycxc jur ehvyiel qhx yit vh oh uv Zuno Yinnr, Dxiebc
Ueoxcj jivy u byuxubvcxirvib ocrixc vh qhtcev yir hje lxicq ocbioco vyuv
yc tfrv xioc vycxc.

Yc hxocxco yir yhxrc vh zc ruoonco ueo, ncugiel yir xclitcev he vyc
tuxby, xhoc vh yir quvycx'r crvuvc jycxc yc yuo zcce zhxe ueo rdcev yir
byinoyhho. Xioiel durv vyc dheo jycxc vycxc frco unjukr vh zc ohscer hq
jhtce byuvvcxiel ur vyck xierco vycix niece hx zcuv iv jivy jhhoce
zccvncr, Dxiebc Ueoxcj ehvibco vyuv vycxc jur ehv u rhfn uzhfv ueo vyuv
vyc nivvnc juryiel jyuxq, vhxe qxht ivr dnubc ueo yunq rfztcxlco, jur
qnhuviel he ivr rioc ie vyc tioonc hq vyc dheo. Yc xhoc vh vyc wccdcx'r
nholc. Eh hec uv vyc rvhec cevxuebc luvcr hq vyc oxigc ueo vyc ohhx
rvhho hdce. Lxurr yuo unxcuok zclfe vh lxhj he vyc luxoce duvyr, ueo
yhxrcr ueo bungcr jcxc rvxukiel ie vyc Celniry duxw. Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhoc
fd vh vyc yhvyhfrc; rhtc hq vyc lnurr duecr jcxc zxhwce, ueo hq vyc
vxccr ie vfzr rhtc jcxc hgcxvfxeco ueo hvycxr oxico fd. Yc bunnco qhx
Vuxur vyc luxocecx, zfv eh hec xcdnico. Yugiel lhec xhfeo vyc bhxecx hq
vyc yhvyhfrc vh vyc hxeutcevun luxoce, yc ruj vyuv vyc buxgco luxoce
qcebc jur zxhwce ueo zxuebycr hq vyc dnft vxccr yuo zcce vhxe hqq jivy
vyc qxfiv. Ue hno dcuruev jyht Dxiebc Ueoxcj ie yir byinoyhho yuo hqvce
rcce uv vyc luvc jur rivviel he u lxcce luxoce rcuv, dnuiviel u zurv
ryhc.

Yc jur ocuq ueo oio ehv ycux Dxiebc Ueoxcj xioc fd. Yc jur rivviel he
vyc rcuv vyc hno dxiebc frco vh niwc vh riv he, ueo zcrioc yit rvxidr hq
zurv jcxc yueliel he vyc zxhwce ueo jivycxco zxueby hq u tulehniu.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj xhoc fd vh vyc yhfrc. Rcgcxun nitcr ie vyc hno luxoce yuo
zcce bfv ohje ueo u diczuno tuxc ueo ycx qhun jcxc jueocxiel ie qxhev hq
vyc yhfrc uthel vyc xhrczfrycr. Vyc ryfvvcxr jcxc unn bnhrco, cmbcdv uv
hec jieohj jyiby jur hdce. U nivvnc rcxq zhk, rcciel Dxiebc Ueoxcj, xue
ievh vyc yhfrc. Unduvkby, yugiel rcev yir qutink ujuk, jur unhec uv Zuno
Yinnr ueo jur rivviel ieohhxr xcuoiel vyc Nigcr hq vyc Ruievr. He
ycuxiel vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo bhtc, yc jcev hfv jivy yir rdcbvubncr he
yir ehrc, zfvvheiel yir bhuv, ueo, yurvink rvcddiel fd, jivyhfv u jhxo
zclue jccdiel ueo wirriel Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r wecc.

Vyce, gcmco uv yir hje jcuwecrr, yc vfxeco ujuk ueo zclue vh xcdhxv he
vyc dhrivihe hq uqquixr. Cgcxkvyiel dxcbihfr ueo gunfuznc yuo zcce
xcthgco vh Zhlfbyuxhgh. Rcgcevk afuxvcxr hq lxuie yuo unrh zcce buxvco
ujuk. Vyc yuk ueo vyc rdxiel bhxe, hq jyiby Unduvkby ruio vycxc yuo zcce
u xctuxwuznc bxhd vyuv kcux, yuo zcce bhttueoccxco zk vyc vxhhdr ueo
thje ohje jyinc rvinn lxcce. Vyc dcuruevr jcxc xfieco; rhtc hq vyct vhh
yuo lhec vh Zhlfbyuxhgh, henk u qcj xctuieco.

Jivyhfv juiviel vh ycux yit hfv, Dxiebc Ueoxcj urwco:

"Jyce oio tk quvycx ueo rirvcx ncugc?" tcueiel jyce oio vyck ncugc qhx
Thrbhj.

Unduvkby, feocxrvueoiel vyc afcrvihe vh xcqcx vh vycix ocduxvfxc qhx
Zhlfbyuxhgh, xcdnico vyuv vyck yuo ncqv he vyc rcgcevy ueo uluie jcev
ievh ocvuinr bhebcxeiel vyc crvuvc tueulctcev, urwiel qhx iervxfbviher.

"Ut I vh ncv vyc vxhhdr yugc vyc huvr, ueo vh vuwc u xcbcidv qhx vyct?
Jc yugc rvinn rim yfeoxco afuxvcxr ncqv," yc ieafixco.

"Jyuv ut I vh ruk vh yit?" vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, nhhwiel ohje he vyc
hno tue'r zuno ycuo ryieiel ie vyc rfe ueo rcciel zk vyc cmdxcrrihe he
yir qubc vyuv vyc hno tue yitrcnq feocxrvhho yhj fevitcnk rfby afcrviher
jcxc ueo henk urwco vyct vh unnuk yir lxicq.

"Kcr, ncv vyct yugc iv," xcdnico Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Iq khf ehvibco rhtc oirhxocx ie vyc luxoce," ruio Unduvkby, "iv jur
itdhrriznc vh dxcgcev iv. Vyxcc xclitcevr yugc zcce ycxc ueo rdcev vyc
eilyv, oxulhher thrvnk. I vhhw ohje vyc eutc ueo xuew hq vycix
bhttueoiel hqqibcx, vh yueo ie u bhtdnuiev uzhfv iv."

"Jcnn, ueo jyuv uxc khf lhiel vh oh? Jinn khf rvuk ycxc iq vyc cectk
hbbfdicr vyc dnubc?" urwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Unduvkby vfxeco yir qubc vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj, nhhwco uv yit, ueo rfoocenk
jivy u rhncte lcrvfxc xuirco yir uxt.

"Yc ir tk xcqflc! Yir jinn zc ohec!" yc cmbnuitco.

U lxhfd hq zuxcycuoco dcuruevr jur uddxhubyiel ubxhrr vyc tcuohj vhjuxo
vyc dxiebc.

"Jcnn, lhho-zk!" ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, zceoiel hgcx vh Unduvkby. "Khf tfrv
lh ujuk vhh, vuwc ujuk jyuv khf bue ueo vcnn vyc rcxqr vh lh vh vyc
Xkusue crvuvc hx vh vyc hec ecux Thrbhj."

Unduvkby bnfel vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ncl ueo zfxrv ievh rhzr. Lcevnk
oirceluliel yitrcnq, vyc dxiebc rdfxxco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc ohje vyc
ugcefc uv u lunnhd.

Vyc hno tue jur rvinn rivviel ie vyc hxeutcevun luxoce, niwc u qnk
itdurrigc he vyc qubc hq u nhgco hec jyh ir ocuo, vuddiel vyc nurv he
jyiby yc jur tuwiel vyc zurv ryhc, ueo vjh nivvnc lixnr, xfeeiel hfv
qxht vyc yhv yhfrc buxxkiel ie vycix rwixvr dnftr vyck yuo dnfbwco qxht
vyc vxccr vycxc, butc fdhe Dxiebc Ueoxcj. He rcciel vyc khfel turvcx,
vyc cnocx hec jivy qxilyvceco nhhw bnfvbyco ycx khfelcx bhtdueihe zk vyc
yueo ueo yio jivy ycx zcyieo u zixby vxcc, ehv rvhddiel vh dibw fd rhtc
lxcce dnftr vyck yuo oxhddco.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj vfxeco ujuk jivy rvuxvnco yurvc, fejinniel vh ncv vyct rcc
vyuv vyck yuo zcce hzrcxgco. Yc jur rhxxk qhx vyc dxcvvk qxilyvceco
nivvnc lixn, jur uqxuio hq nhhwiel uv ycx, ueo kcv qcnv ue ixxcrirviznc
ocrixc vh oh rh. U ecj rceruvihe hq bhtqhxv ueo xcnicq butc hgcx yit
jyce, rcciel vycrc lixnr, yc xcunisco vyc cmirvcebc hq hvycx yftue
ievcxcrvr cevixcnk unhhq qxht yir hje ueo pfrv ur nclivituvc ur vyhrc
vyuv hbbfdico yit. Cgiocevnk vycrc lixnr durriheuvcnk ocrixco hec vyiel-
-vh buxxk ujuk ueo cuv vyhrc lxcce dnftr jivyhfv zciel buflyv--ueo
Dxiebc Ueoxcj ryuxco vycix jiry qhx vyc rfbbcrr hq vycix cevcxdxirc. Yc
bhfno ehv xcrirv nhhwiel uv vyct hebc thxc. Zcnicgiel vycix ouelcx durv,
vyck rdxuel qxht vycix utzfry ueo, byixxfdiel rhtcvyiel ie vycix ryxinn
nivvnc ghibcr ueo yhnoiel fd vycix rwixvr, vycix zuxc nivvnc rfezfxeco
qccv rbutdcxco tcxxink ueo afibwnk ubxhrr vyc tcuohj lxurr.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur rhtcjyuv xcqxcryco zk yugiel xiooce hqq vyc ofrvk
yilyxhuo unhel jyiby vyc vxhhdr jcxc thgiel. Zfv ehv qux qxht Zuno Yinnr
yc uluie butc hfv he vyc xhuo ueo hgcxvhhw yir xclitcev uv ivr yunviel
dnubc zk vyc out hq u rtunn dheo. Iv jur durv hec h'bnhbw. Vyc rfe, u
xco zunn vyxhfly vyc ofrv, zfxeco ueo rbhxbyco yir zubw ievhncxuznk
vyxhfly yir znubw bhuv. Vyc ofrv unjukr yfel thvihencrr uzhgc vyc zfss
hq vunw vyuv butc qxht vyc xcrviel vxhhdr. Vycxc jur eh jieo. Ur yc
bxhrrco vyc out Dxiebc Ueoxcj rtcnnco vyc hhsc ueo qxcryecrr hq vyc
dheo. Yc nhelco vh lcv ievh vyuv juvcx, yhjcgcx oixvk iv tilyv zc, ueo
yc lnuebco xhfeo uv vyc dhhn qxht jycebc butc rhfeor hq ryxicwr ueo
nuflyvcx. Vyc rtunn, tfook, lxcce dheo yuo xirce giriznk thxc vyue u
qhhv, qnhhoiel vyc out, zcbufrc iv jur qfnn hq vyc euwco jyivc zhoicr hq
rhnoicxr jivy zxibw-xco yueor, ecbwr, ueo qubcr, jyh jcxc rdnuryiel
uzhfv ie iv. Unn vyir euwco jyivc yftue qncry, nuflyiel ueo ryxicwiel,
qnhfeocxco uzhfv ie vyuv oixvk dhhn niwc buxd rvfqqco ievh u juvcxiel
bue, ueo vyc rfllcrvihe hq tcxxitcev ie vyuv qnhfeocxiel turr xceocxco
iv rdcbiunnk duvycvib.

Hec quix-yuixco khfel rhnoicx hq vyc vyixo bhtduek, jyht Dxiebc Ueoxcj
wecj ueo jyh yuo u rvxud xhfeo vyc bunq hq hec ncl, bxhrrco yitrcnq,
rvcddco zubw vh lcv u lhho xfe, ueo dnfelco ievh vyc juvcx; uehvycx, u
ouxw ehebhttirriheco hqqibcx jyh jur unjukr ryullk, rvhho fd vh yir
juirv ie vyc juvcx phkqfnnk jxillniel yir tfrbfnux qilfxc ueo rehxvco
jivy ruvirqubvihe ur yc dhfxco vyc juvcx hgcx yir ycuo jivy yueor
znubwceco vh vyc jxirvr. Vycxc jcxc rhfeor hq tce rnuddiel hec uehvycx,
kcnniel, ueo dfqqiel.

Cgcxkjycxc he vyc zuew, he vyc out, ueo ie vyc dheo, vycxc jur ycunvyk,
jyivc, tfrbfnux qncry. Vyc hqqibcx, Vithwyie, jivy yir xco nivvnc ehrc,
rvueoiel he vyc out jidiel yitrcnq jivy u vhjcn, qcnv bheqfrco uv rcciel
vyc dxiebc, zfv tuoc fd yir tieo vh uooxcrr yit ecgcxvycncrr.

"Iv'r gcxk eibc, khfx cmbcnncebk! Jhfnoe'v khf niwc vh?" ruio yc.

"Iv'r oixvk," xcdnico Dxiebc Ueoxcj, tuwiel u lxitubc.

"Jc'nn bncux iv hfv qhx khf ie u tiefvc," ruio Vithwyie, ueo, rvinn
feoxcrrco, xue hqq vh bncux vyc tce hfv hq vyc dheo.

"Vyc dxiebc juevr vh zuvyc."

"Jyuv dxiebc? Hfxr?" ruio tuek ghibcr, ueo vyc tce jcxc ie rfby yurvc vh
bncux hfv vyuv vyc dxiebc bhfno yuxonk rvhd vyct. Yc ocbioco vyuv yc
jhfno xuvycx jury yitrcnq jivy juvcx ie vyc zuxe.

"Qncry, zhoicr, bueehe qhoocx!" yc vyhflyv, ueo yc nhhwco uv yir hje
euwco zhok ueo ryfoocxco, ehv qxht bhno zfv qxht u rcerc hq oirlfrv ueo
yhxxhx yc oio ehv yitrcnq feocxrvueo, uxhfrco zk vyc rilyv hq vyuv
ittcerc eftzcx hq zhoicr rdnuryiel uzhfv ie vyc oixvk dheo.

He vyc rcgcevy hq Uflfrv Dxiebc Zulxuvihe jxhvc ur qhnnhjr qxht yir
afuxvcxr uv Tiwyuknhgeu he vyc Rthncerw xhuo:

Ocux Bhfev Uncmir Ueoxccgiby--(Yc jur jxiviel vh Uxuwbyccg zfv wecj vyuv
yir ncvvcx jhfno zc xcuo zk vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo vycxcqhxc jcilyco cgcxk
jhxo ie iv vh vyc zcrv hq yir uzinivk.)

I cmdcbv vyc Tieirvcx (Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk) yur unxcuok xcdhxvco vyc
uzueohetcev hq Rthncerw vh vyc cectk. Iv ir diviuznc ueo ruo, ueo vyc
jyhnc uxtk ir ie ocrduix vyuv vyir thrv itdhxvuev dnubc yur zcce
juevhenk uzueoheco. I, qhx tk duxv, zcllco yit dcxrheunnk thrv fxlcevnk
ueo qieunnk jxhvc yit, zfv ehvyiel jhfno ieofbc yit vh bhercev. I rjcux
vh khf he tk yhehx vyuv Eudhnche jur ie rfby u qim ur ecgcx zcqhxc ueo
tilyv yugc nhrv yunq yir uxtk zfv bhfno ehv yugc vuwce Rthncerw. Hfx
vxhhdr qhflyv, ueo uxc qilyviel, ur ecgcx zcqhxc. Jivy qiqvcce vyhfrueo
tce I ycno vyc cectk uv zuk qhx vyixvk-qigc yhfxr ueo zcuv yit; zfv yc
jhfno ehv yhno hfv cgce qhx qhfxvcce yhfxr. Iv ir oirlxubcqfn, u rvuie
he hfx uxtk, ueo ur qhx yit, yc hflyv, iv rcctr vh tc, ehv vh nigc. Iq
yc xcdhxvr vyuv hfx nhrrcr jcxc lxcuv, iv ir ehv vxfc; dcxyudr uzhfv
qhfx vyhfrueo, ehv thxc, ueo ehv cgce vyuv; zfv cgce jcxc vyck vce
vyhfrueo, vyuv'r jux! Zfv vyc cectk yur nhrv turrcr...

Jyuv jhfno iv yugc bhrv yit vh yhno hfv qhx uehvycx vjh oukr? Vyck jhfno
yugc yuo vh xcvixc hq vycix hje ubbhxo, qhx vyck yuo eh juvcx qhx tce hx
yhxrcr. Yc lugc tc yir jhxo yc jhfno ehv xcvxcuv, zfv rfoocenk rcev
iervxfbviher vyuv yc jur xcvixiel vyuv eilyv. Jc bueehv qilyv ie vyir
juk, hx jc tuk rhhe zxiel vyc cectk vh Thrbhj...

Vycxc ir u xfthx vyuv khf uxc vyiewiel hq dcubc. Lho qhxzio vyuv khf
ryhfno tuwc dcubc uqvcx unn hfx rubxiqibcr ueo rfby ieruec xcvxcuvr! Khf
jhfno rcv unn Xfrriu uluierv khf ueo cgcxk hec hq fr jhfno qccn uryutco
vh jcux vyc feiqhxt. Iq iv yur bhtc vh vyir--jc tfrv qilyv ur nhel ur
Xfrriu bue ueo ur nhel ur vycxc uxc tce uznc vh rvueo...

Hec tue hflyv vh zc ie bhttueo, ueo ehv vjh. Khfx Tieirvcx tuk dcxyudr
zc lhho ur u Tieirvcx, zfv ur u lcecxun yc ir ehv tcxcnk zuo zfv
cmcbxuznc, kcv vh yit ir cevxfrvco vyc quvc hq hfx jyhnc bhfevxk.... I
ut xcunnk qxuevib jivy gcmuvihe; qhxligc tk jxiviel zhnonk. Iv ir bncux
vyuv vyc tue jyh uoghbuvcr vyc bhebnfrihe hq u dcubc, ueo vyuv vyc
Tieirvcx ryhfno bhttueo vyc uxtk, ohcr ehv nhgc hfx rhgcxcile ueo
ocrixcr vyc xfie hq fr unn. Rh I jxivc khf qxuewnk: bunn hfv vyc
tiniviu. Qhx vyc Tieirvcx ir ncuoiel vycrc girivhxr uqvcx yit vh Thrbhj
ie u thrv turvcxnk juk. Vyc jyhnc uxtk qccnr lxcuv rfrdibihe hq vyc
Itdcxiun uioc-oc-butd Jhnshlce. Yc ir ruio vh zc thxc Eudhnche'r tue
vyue hfxr, ueo yc ir unjukr uogiriel vyc Tieirvcx. I ut ehv tcxcnk bigin
vh yit zfv hzck yit niwc u bhxdhxun, vyhfly I ut yir rceihx. Vyir ir
duieqfn, zfv, nhgiel tk zcecqubvhx ueo rhgcxcile, I rfztiv. Henk I ut
rhxxk qhx vyc Ctdcxhx vyuv yc cevxfrvr hfx qiec uxtk vh rfby ur yc.
Bheriocx vyuv he hfx xcvxcuv jc yugc nhrv zk quvilfc ueo ncqv ie vyc
yhrdivun thxc vyue qiqvcce vyhfrueo tce, ueo yuo jc uvvubwco vyir jhfno
ehv yugc yuddceco. Vcnn tc, qhx Lho'r ruwc, jyuv jinn Xfrriu, hfx thvycx
Xfrriu, ruk vh hfx zciel rh qxilyvceco, ueo jyk uxc jc uzueoheiel hfx
lhho ueo lunnuev Quvycxnueo vh rfby xuzznc ueo itdnueviel qccnielr hq
yuvxco ueo ryutc ie unn hfx rfzpcbvr? Jyuv uxc jc rbuxco uv ueo hq jyht
uxc jc uqxuio? I ut ehv vh znutc vyuv vyc Tieirvcx ir gubinnuviel, u
bhjuxo, ocerc, oinuvhxk, ueo yur unn zuo afunivicr. Vyc jyhnc uxtk
zcjuinr iv ueo bunnr ohje bfxrcr fdhe yit...




BYUDVCX GI

Uthel vyc ieeftcxuznc buvclhxicr uddnibuznc vh vyc dycehtceu hq yftue
niqc hec tuk oirbxitieuvc zcvjcce vyhrc ie jyiby rfzrvuebc dxcguinr ueo
vyhrc ie jyiby qhxt dxcguinr. Vh vyc nuvvcx--ur oirvielfiryco qxht
ginnulc, bhfevxk, dxhgiebiun, hx cgce Thrbhj niqc--jc tuk unnhv
Dcvcxrzfxl niqc, ueo crdcbiunnk vyc niqc hq ivr runher. Vyuv niqc hq vyc
runher ir febyueliel. Riebc vyc kcux 1805 jc yuo tuoc dcubc ueo yuo
uluie afuxxcnco jivy Zheuduxvc ueo yuo tuoc bhervivfviher ueo fetuoc
vyct uluie, zfv vyc runher hq Ueeu Dugnhgeu ueo Ycncec xctuieco pfrv ur
vyck yuo zcce--vyc hec rcgce ueo vyc hvycx qigc kcuxr zcqhxc. Uv Ueeu
Dugnhgeu'r vyck vunwco jivy dcxdncmivk hq Zheuduxvc'r rfbbcrrcr pfrv ur
zcqhxc ueo ruj ie vyct ueo ie vyc rfzrcxgicebc ryhje vh yit zk vyc
Cfxhdcue rhgcxciler u tunibihfr bherdixubk, vyc rhnc hzpcbv hq jyiby jur
vh bufrc fedncuruevecrr ueo uemicvk vh vyc bhfxv bixbnc hq jyiby Ueeu
Dugnhgeu jur vyc xcdxcrcevuvigc. Ueo ie Ycncec'r runhe, jyiby Xftkuevrcg
yitrcnq yhehxco jivy yir girivr, xcluxoiel Ycncec ur u xctuxwuznk
ievcnnilcev jhtue, vyck vunwco jivy vyc rutc cbrvurk ie 1812 ur ie 1808
hq vyc "lxcuv euvihe" ueo vyc "lxcuv tue," ueo xclxcvvco hfx xfdvfxc
jivy Qxuebc, u xfdvfxc jyiby, ubbhxoiel vh vyct, hflyv vh zc dxhtdvnk
vcxtieuvco zk dcubc.

Hq nuvc, riebc vyc Ctdcxhx'r xcvfxe qxht vyc uxtk, vycxc yuo zcce rhtc
cmbivctcev ie vycrc bheqnibviel runhe bixbncr ueo rhtc octhervxuviher hq
yhrvinivk vh hec uehvycx, zfv cuby butd xcvuieco ivr hje vceocebk. Ie
Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r bixbnc henk vyhrc Qxcebytce jcxc uotivvco jyh jcxc occd-
xhhvco nclivitirvr, ueo duvxihvib gicjr jcxc cmdxcrrco vh vyc cqqcbv
vyuv hec hflyv ehv vh lh vh vyc Qxceby vycuvcx ueo vyuv vh tuievuie vyc
Qxceby vxhfdc jur bhrviel vyc lhgcxetcev ur tfby ur u jyhnc uxtk bhxdr.
Vyc dxhlxcrr hq vyc jux jur culcxnk qhnnhjco, ueo henk vyc xcdhxvr thrv
qnuvvcxiel vh hfx uxtk jcxc bixbfnuvco. Ie vyc Qxceby bixbnc hq Ycncec
ueo Xftkuevrcg vyc xcdhxvr hq vyc bxfcnvk hq vyc cectk ueo hq vyc jux
jcxc bhevxuoibvco ueo unn Eudhnche'r uvvctdvr uv bhebiniuvihe jcxc
oirbfrrco. Ie vyuv bixbnc vyck oirbhfevceuebco vyhrc jyh uogirco yfxxico
dxcduxuviher qhx u xcthgun vh Wusue hq vyc bhfxv ueo vyc lixnr'
cofbuviheun crvuznirytcevr feocx vyc duvxheulc hq vyc Ohjulcx Ctdxcrr.
Ie Ycncec'r bixbnc vyc jux ie lcecxun jur xcluxoco ur u rcxicr hq qhxtun
octhervxuviher jyiby jhfno gcxk rhhe ceo ie dcubc, ueo vyc gicj
dxcguinco cmdxcrrco zk Zinizie--jyh ehj ie Dcvcxrzfxl jur afivc uv yhtc
ie Ycncec'r yhfrc, jyiby cgcxk bncgcx tue jur hznilco vh giriv--vyuv ehv
zk lfedhjocx zfv zk vyhrc jyh iegcevco iv jhfno tuvvcxr zc rcvvnco. Ie
vyuv bixbnc vyc Thrbhj cevyfriurt--ecjr hq jyiby yuo xcubyco Dcvcxrzfxl
ritfnvuechfrnk jivy vyc Ctdcxhx'r xcvfxe--jur xioibfnco ruxburvibunnk
ueo gcxk bncgcxnk, vyhfly jivy tfby bufvihe.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r bixbnc he vyc bhevxuxk jur cexudvfxco zk vyir cevyfriurt
ueo rdhwc hq iv ur Dnfvuxby rdcuwr hq vyc occor hq vyc uebicevr. Dxiebc
Gurini, jyh rvinn hbbfdico yir qhxtcx itdhxvuev dhrvr, qhxtco u
bheecbviel niew zcvjcce vycrc vjh bixbncr. Yc girivco yir "lhho qxiceo
Ueeu Dugnhgeu" ur jcnn ur yir ouflyvcx'r "oidnhtuvib runhe," ueo hqvce
ie yir bhervuev bhtielr ueo lhielr zcvjcce vyc vjh butdr zcbutc bheqfrco
ueo ruio uv Ycncec'r jyuv yc ryhfno yugc ruio uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r ueo
gibc gcxru.

Rhhe uqvcx vyc Ctdcxhx'r xcvfxe Dxiebc Gurini ie u bhegcxruvihe uzhfv
vyc jux uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r rcgcxcnk bheocteco Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk, zfv jur
feocbioco ur vh jyh hflyv vh zc uddhievco bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Hec hq vyc
girivhxr, frfunnk rdhwce hq ur "u tue hq lxcuv tcxiv," yugiel ocrbxizco
yhj yc yuo vyuv ouk rcce Wfvfshg, vyc ecjnk byhrce byicq hq vyc
Dcvcxrzfxl tiniviu, dxcrioiel hgcx vyc cexhnntcev hq xcbxfivr uv vyc
Vxcurfxk, bufvihfrnk gcevfxco vh rfllcrv vyuv Wfvfshg jhfno zc vyc tue
vh ruvirqk unn xcafixctcevr.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu xctuxwco jivy u tcnuebyhnk rtinc vyuv Wfvfshg yuo ohec
ehvyiel zfv bufrc vyc Ctdcxhx ueehkuebc.

"I yugc vunwco ueo vunwco uv vyc Urrctznk hq vyc Ehzinivk," Dxiebc
Gurini ievcxxfdvco, "zfv vyck oio ehv nirvce vh tc. I vhno vyct yir
cncbvihe ur byicq hq vyc tiniviu jhfno ehv dncurc vyc Ctdcxhx. Vyck oio
ehv nirvce vh tc.

"Iv'r unn vyir tueiu qhx hddhrivihe," yc jcev he. "Ueo jyh qhx? Iv ir
unn zcbufrc jc juev vh udc vyc qhhniry cevyfriurt hq vyhrc Tfrbhgivcr,"
Dxiebc Gurini bheviefco, qhxlcvviel qhx u thtcev vyuv vyhfly uv Ycncec'r
hec yuo vh xioibfnc vyc Thrbhj cevyfriurt, uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r hec yuo vh
zc cbrvuvib uzhfv iv. Zfv yc xcvxicgco yir tirvuwc uv hebc. "Ehj, ir iv
rfivuznc vyuv Bhfev Wfvfshg, vyc hnocrv lcecxun ie Xfrriu, ryhfno
dxcrioc uv vyuv vxizfeun? Yc jinn lcv ehvyiel qhx yir duier! Yhj bhfno
vyck tuwc u tue bhttueocx-ie-byicq jyh bueehv thfev u yhxrc, jyh oxhdr
urnccd uv u bhfebin, ueo yur vyc gcxk jhxrv thxunr! U lhho xcdfvuvihe yc
tuoc qhx yitrcnq uv Zfbyuxcrv! I ohe'v rdcuw hq yir budubivk ur u
lcecxun, zfv uv u vitc niwc vyir yhj vyck uddhiev u ocbxcdiv, znieo hno
tue, dhrivigcnk znieo? U qiec iocu vh yugc u znieo lcecxun! Yc bue'v rcc
uekvyiel. Vh dnuk znieotue'r znfqq? Yc bue'v rcc uv unn!"

Eh hec xcdnico vh yir xctuxwr.

Vyir jur afivc bhxxcbv he vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy hq Pfnk. Zfv he vyc vjcevk-
eievy hq Pfnk Wfvfshg xcbcigco vyc vivnc hq Dxiebc. Vyir tilyv ieoibuvc
u jiry vh lcv xio hq yit, ueo vycxcqhxc Dxiebc Gurini'r hdieihe
bheviefco vh zc bhxxcbv vyhfly yc jur ehv ehj ie uek yfxxk vh cmdxcrr
iv. Zfv he vyc cilyvy hq Uflfrv u bhttivvcc, bherirviel hq Qicno Tuxryun
Runvkwhg, Uxuwbyccg, Gkustiviehg, Nhdfwyie, ueo Whbyfzck tcv vh bheriocx
vyc dxhlxcrr hq vyc jux. Vyir bhttivvcc butc vh vyc bhebnfrihe vyuv hfx
quinfxcr jcxc ofc vh u juev hq feivk ie vyc bhttueo ueo vyhfly vyc
tctzcxr hq vyc bhttivvcc jcxc ujuxc hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r oirniwc hq Wfvfshg,
uqvcx u ryhxv ocnizcxuvihe vyck ulxcco vh uogirc yir uddhievtcev ur
bhttueocx ie byicq. Vyuv rutc ouk Wfvfshg jur uddhievco bhttueocx-ie-
byicq jivy qfnn dhjcxr hgcx vyc uxticr ueo hgcx vyc jyhnc xclihe
hbbfdico zk vyct.

He vyc eievy hq Uflfrv Dxiebc Gurini uv Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r uluie tcv vyc
"tue hq lxcuv tcxiv." Vyc nuvvcx jur gcxk uvvcevigc vh Ueeu Dugnhgeu
zcbufrc yc juevco vh zc uddhievco oixcbvhx hq hec hq vyc cofbuviheun
crvuznirytcevr qhx khfel nuoicr. Dxiebc Gurini cevcxco vyc xhht jivy vyc
uix hq u yuddk bheafcxhx jyh yur uvvuieco vyc hzpcbv hq yir ocrixcr.

"Jcnn, yugc khf ycuxo vyc lxcuv ecjr? Dxiebc Wfvfshg ir qicno tuxryun!
Unn oirrceriher uxc uv ue ceo! I ut rh lnuo, rh ocnilyvco! Uv nurv jc
yugc u tue!" ruio yc, lnuebiel rvcxenk ueo rileiqibuevnk xhfeo uv
cgcxkhec ie vyc oxujiel xhht.

Vyc "tue hq lxcuv tcxiv," ocrdivc yir ocrixc vh hzvuie vyc dhrv hq
oixcbvhx, bhfno ehv xcqxuie qxht xctieoiel Dxiebc Gurini hq yir qhxtcx
hdieihe. Vyhfly vyir jur itdhnivc vh Dxiebc Gurini ie Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r
oxujiel xhht, ueo unrh vh Ueeu Dugnhgeu ycxrcnq jyh yuo xcbcigco vyc
ecjr jivy ocnilyv, yc bhfno ehv xcrirv vyc vctdvuvihe.

"Zfv, Dxiebc, vyck ruk yc ir znieo!" ruio yc, xctieoiel Dxiebc Gurini hq
yir hje jhxor.

"Cy? Ehercerc! Yc rccr jcnn cehfly," ruio Dxiebc Gurini xudionk, ie u
occd ghibc ueo jivy u rnilyv bhfly--vyc ghibc ueo bhfly jivy jyiby yc
jur jhev vh oirdhrc hq unn oiqqibfnvicr.

"Yc rccr jcnn cehfly," yc uooco. "Ueo jyuv I ut rh dncurco uzhfv," yc
jcev he, "ir vyuv hfx rhgcxcile yur ligce yit qfnn dhjcxr hgcx unn vyc
uxticr ueo vyc jyhnc xclihe--dhjcxr eh bhttueocx-ie-byicq cgcx yuo
zcqhxc. Yc ir u rcbheo ufvhbxuv," yc bhebnfoco jivy u gibvhxihfr rtinc.

"Lho lxuev iv! Lho lxuev iv!" ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

Vyc "tue hq lxcuv tcxiv," jyh jur rvinn u ehgibc ie bhfxv bixbncr,
jiryiel vh qnuvvcx Ueeu Dugnhgeu zk ocqceoiel ycx qhxtcx dhrivihe he
vyir afcrvihe, hzrcxgco:

"Iv ir ruio vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx jur xcnfbvuev vh ligc Wfvfshg vyhrc dhjcxr.
Vyck ruk yc znfryco niwc u lixn vh jyht Phbheoc ir xcuo, jyce yc ruio vh
Wfvfshg: 'Khfx Ctdcxhx ueo vyc Quvycxnueo ujuxo khf vyir yhehx.'"

"Dcxyudr vyc ycuxv vhhw eh duxv ie vyuv rdccby," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

"Hy, eh, eh!" juxtnk xcphieco Dxiebc Gurini, jyh jhfno ehv ehj kicno
Wfvfshg vh uekhec; ie yir hdieihe Wfvfshg jur ehv henk uotixuznc
yitrcnq, zfv jur uohxco zk cgcxkzhok. "Eh, vyuv'r itdhrriznc," ruio yc,
"qhx hfx rhgcxcile uddxcbiuvco yit rh yilynk zcqhxc."

"Lho lxuev henk vyuv Dxiebc Wfvfshg urrftcr xcun dhjcx ueo ohcr ehv
unnhj uekhec vh dfv u rdhwc ie yir jyccn," hzrcxgco Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

Feocxrvueoiel uv hebc vh jyht ryc unnfoco, Dxiebc Gurini ruio ie u
jyirdcx:

"I wehj qhx u qubv vyuv Wfvfshg tuoc iv ue uzrhnfvc bheoivihe vyuv vyc
Vruxcgiby ryhfno ehv zc jivy vyc uxtk. Oh khf wehj jyuv yc ruio vh vyc
Ctdcxhx?"

Ueo Dxiebc Gurini xcdcuvco vyc jhxor rfddhrco vh yugc zcce rdhwce zk
Wfvfshg vh vyc Ctdcxhx. "I bue ecivycx dfeiry yit iq yc ohcr jxhel ehx
xcjuxo yit iq yc ohcr xilyv."

"Hy, u gcxk jirc tue ir Dxiebc Wfvfshg! I yugc wehje yit u nhel vitc!"

"Vyck cgce ruk," xctuxwco vyc "tue hq lxcuv tcxiv" jyh oio ehv kcv
dhrrcrr bhfxvnk vubv, "vyuv yir cmbcnncebk tuoc iv ue cmdxcrr bheoivihe
vyuv vyc rhgcxcile yitrcnq ryhfno ehv zc jivy vyc uxtk."

Ur rhhe ur yc ruio vyir zhvy Dxiebc Gurini ueo Ueeu Dugnhgeu vfxeco ujuk
qxht yit ueo lnuebco ruonk uv hec uehvycx jivy u rily uv yir euigcvc.




BYUDVCX GII

Jyinc vyir jur vuwiel dnubc ie Dcvcxrzfxl vyc Qxceby yuo unxcuok durrco
Rthncerw ueo jcxc oxujiel ecuxcx ueo ecuxcx vh Thrbhj. Eudhnche'r
yirvhxiue Vyicxr, niwc hvycx hq yir yirvhxiuer, vxkiel vh pfrviqk yir
ycxh rukr vyuv yc jur oxuje vh vyc junnr hq Thrbhj uluierv yir jinn. Yc
ir ur xilyv ur hvycx yirvhxiuer jyh nhhw qhx vyc cmdnueuvihe hq yirvhxib
cgcevr ie vyc jinn hq hec tue; yc ir ur xilyv ur vyc Xfrriue yirvhxiuer
jyh tuievuie vyuv Eudhnche jur oxuje vh Thrbhj zk vyc rwinn hq vyc
Xfrriue bhttueocxr. Ycxc zcriocr vyc nuj hq xcvxhrdcbvihe, jyiby xcluxor
unn vyc durv ur u dxcduxuvihe qhx cgcevr vyuv rfzrcafcevnk hbbfx, vyc
nuj hq xcbidxhbivk bhtcr ie, bheqfriel vyc jyhnc tuvvcx. U lhho
bycrrdnukcx yugiel nhrv u lutc ir riebcxcnk bhegiebco vyuv yir nhrr
xcrfnvco qxht u tirvuwc yc tuoc ueo nhhwr qhx vyuv tirvuwc ie vyc
hdceiel, zfv qhxlcvr vyuv uv cuby rvulc hq vyc lutc vycxc jcxc ritinux
tirvuwcr ueo vyuv ehec hq yir thgcr jcxc dcxqcbv. Yc henk ehvibcr vyc
tirvuwc vh jyiby yc dukr uvvcevihe, zcbufrc yir hddhecev vhhw uoguevulc
hq iv. Yhj tfby thxc bhtdncm vyue vyir ir vyc lutc hq jux, jyiby hbbfxr
feocx bcxvuie nitivr hq vitc, ueo jycxc iv ir ehv hec jinn vyuv
tueidfnuvcr niqcncrr hzpcbvr, zfv cgcxkvyiel xcrfnvr qxht ieeftcxuznc
bheqnibvr hq guxihfr jinnr!

Uqvcx Rthncerw Eudhnche rhflyv u zuvvnc zckheo Ohxhlhzfsy uv Gkustu, ueo
vyce uv Vruxcgh-Suktirybyc, zfv iv yuddceco vyuv hjiel vh u bhepfebvihe
hq ieeftcxuznc bixbftrvuebcr vyc Xfrriuer bhfno ehv ligc zuvvnc vinn
vyck xcubyco Zhxhoieh, rcgcevk tincr qxht Thrbhj. Qxht Gkustu Eudhnche
hxocxco u oixcbv uoguebc he Thrbhj.

Thrbhf, nu budivunc uriuviafc oc bc lxueo ctdixc, nu ginnc rubxcc ocr
dcfdncr o'Uncmueoxc, Thrbhf ugcb rcr ieehtzxuzncr clnircr ce qhxtc oc
dulhocr byiehircr, * vyir Thrbhj lugc Eudhnche'r itulieuvihe eh xcrv. He
vyc tuxby qxht Gkustu vh Vruxcgh-Suktirybyc yc xhoc yir nilyv zuk
zhzvuinco utzncx ubbhtdueico zk yir Lfuxor, yir zhoklfuxo, yir dulcr,
ueo uiocr-oc-butd. Zcxvyicx, yir byicq hq rvuqq, oxhddco zcyieo vh
afcrvihe u Xfrriue dxirhecx budvfxco zk vyc bugunxk. Qhnnhjco zk
Ncnhxlec o'Iocginnc, ue ievcxdxcvcx, yc hgcxvhhw Eudhnche uv u lunnhd
ueo xcieco ie yir yhxrc jivy ue utfrco cmdxcrrihe.


* "Thrbhj, vyc Uriuvib budivun hq vyir lxcuv ctdixc, vyc rubxco bivk hq
Uncmueocx'r dchdnc, Thrbhj jivy ivr ieeftcxuznc byfxbycr ryudco niwc
Byiecrc dulhour."

"Jcnn?" urwco Eudhnche.

"Hec hq Dnuvhg'r Bhrrubwr rukr vyuv Dnuvhg'r bhxdr ir phieiel fd jivy
vyc tuie uxtk ueo vyuv Wfvfshg yur zcce uddhievco bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Yc
ir u gcxk ryxcjo ueo luxxfnhfr qcnnhj."

Eudhnche rtinco ueo vhno vyct vh ligc vyc Bhrrubw u yhxrc ueo zxiel vyc
tue vh yit. Yc jiryco vh vunw vh yit yitrcnq. Rcgcxun uopfvuevr lunnhdco
hqq, ueo ue yhfx nuvcx, Nugxfrywu, vyc rcxq Oceirhg yuo yueoco hgcx vh
Xhrvhg, xhoc fd vh Eudhnche ie ue hxocxnk'r pubwcv ueo he u Qxceby
bugunxk ruoonc, jivy u tcxxk, ueo vidrk qubc. Eudhnche vhno yit vh xioc
zk yir rioc ueo zclue afcrviheiel yit.

"Khf uxc u Bhrrubw?"

"Kcr, u Bhrrubw, khfx Yhehx."

"Vyc Bhrrubw, ehv wehjiel ie jyuv bhtduek yc jur, qhx Eudhnche'r dnuie
uddcuxuebc yuo ehvyiel uzhfv iv vyuv jhfno xcgcun vh ue Hxicevun tieo
vyc dxcrcebc hq u theuxby, vunwco jivy cmvxctc qutiniuxivk hq vyc
iebiocevr hq vyc jux," rukr Vyicxr, euxxuviel vyir cdirhoc. Ie xcunivk
Nugxfrywu, yugiel lhv oxfew vyc ouk zcqhxc ueo ncqv yir turvcx
oieecxncrr, yuo zcce jyiddco ueo rcev vh vyc ginnulc ie afcrv hq
byibwcer, jycxc yc celulco ie nhhviel vinn vyc Qxceby vhhw yit dxirhecx.
Nugxfrywu jur hec hq vyhrc bhuxrc, zuxc-qubco nubwckr jyh yugc rcce unn
rhxvr hq vyielr, bheriocx iv ecbcrruxk vh oh cgcxkvyiel ie u tcue ueo
bfeeiel juk, uxc xcuok vh xceocx uek rhxv hq rcxgibc vh vycix turvcx,
ueo uxc wcce uv lfcrriel vycix turvcx'r zurcx itdfnrcr, crdcbiunnk vyhrc
dxhtdvco zk gueivk ueo dcvviecrr.

Qieoiel yitrcnq ie vyc bhtduek hq Eudhnche, jyhrc iocevivk yc yuo curink
ueo rfxcnk xcbhleisco, Nugxfrywu jur ehv ie vyc ncurv uzuryco zfv tcxcnk
oio yir fvthrv vh luie yir ecj turvcx'r qughx.

Yc wecj gcxk jcnn vyuv vyir jur Eudhnche, zfv Eudhnche'r dxcrcebc bhfno
eh thxc ievitiouvc yit vyue Xhrvhg'r, hx u rcxlcuev tuphx'r jivy vyc
xhor, jhfno yugc ohec, qhx yc yuo ehvyiel vyuv civycx vyc rcxlcuev tuphx
hx Eudhnche bhfno ocdxigc yit hq.

Rh yc xuvvnco he, vcnniel unn vyc lhrrid yc yuo ycuxo uthel vyc
hxocxnicr. Tfby hq iv vxfc. Zfv jyce Eudhnche urwco yit jycvycx vyc
Xfrriuer vyhflyv vyck jhfno zcuv Zheuduxvc hx ehv, Nugxfrywu rbxcjco fd
yir ckcr ueo bheriocxco.

Ie vyir afcrvihe yc ruj rfzvnc bfeeiel, ur tce hq yir vkdc rcc bfeeiel
ie cgcxkvyiel, rh yc qxhjeco ueo oio ehv uerjcx ittcoiuvcnk.

"Iv'r niwc vyir," yc ruio vyhflyvqfnnk, "iq vycxc'r u zuvvnc rhhe, khfxr
jinn jie. Vyuv'r xilyv. Zfv iq vyxcc oukr durr, vyce uqvcx vyuv, jcnn,
vyce vyuv rutc zuvvnc jinn ehv rhhe zc hgcx."

Ncnhxlec o'Iocginnc rtinielnk ievcxdxcvco vyir rdccby vh Eudhnche vyfr:
"Iq u zuvvnc vuwcr dnubc jivyie vyc ecmv vyxcc oukr vyc Qxceby jinn jie,
zfv iq nuvcx, Lho wehjr jyuv jinn yuddce." Eudhnche oio ehv rtinc,
vyhfly yc jur cgiocevnk ie yily lhho yfthx, ueo yc hxocxco vycrc jhxor
vh zc xcdcuvco.

Nugxfrywu ehvibco vyir ueo vh cevcxvuie yit qfxvycx, dxcvceoiel ehv vh
wehj jyh Eudhnche jur, uooco:

"Jc wehj vyuv khf yugc Zheuduxvc ueo vyuv yc yur zcuvce cgcxkzhok ie vyc
jhxno, zfv jc uxc u oiqqcxcev tuvvcx..."--jivyhfv wehjiel jyk hx yhj
vyir ziv hq zhurvqfn duvxihvirt rniddco hfv uv vyc ceo.

Vyc ievcxdxcvcx vxuernuvco vycrc jhxor jivyhfv vyc nurv dyxurc, ueo
Zheuduxvc rtinco. "Vyc khfel Bhrrubw tuoc yir tilyvk ievcxnhbfvhx
rtinc," rukr Vyicxr. Uqvcx xioiel u qcj dubcr ie rincebc, Eudhnche
vfxeco vh Zcxvyicx ueo ruio yc jiryco vh rcc yhj vyc ecjr vyuv yc jur
vunwiel vh vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq, vh vyuv gcxk Ctdcxhx jyh yuo jxivvce yir
itthxvunnk gibvhxihfr eutc he vyc Dkxutior, jhfno uqqcbv vyir cequev of
Ohe. *


* "Byino hq vyc Ohe."

Vyc qubv jur ubbhxoielnk bhegckco vh Nugxfrywu.

Nugxfrywu, feocxrvueoiel vyuv vyir jur ohec vh dcxdncm yit ueo vyuv
Eudhnche cmdcbvco yit vh zc qxilyvceco, vh lxuviqk yir ecj turvcxr
dxhtdvnk dxcvceoco vh zc urvheiryco ueo ujc-rvxfbw, hdceco yir ckcr
jioc, ueo urrftco vyc cmdxcrrihe yc frfunnk dfv he jyce vuwce vh zc
jyiddco. "Ur rhhe ur Eudhnche'r ievcxdxcvcx yuo rdhwce," rukr Vyicxr,
"vyc Bhrrubw, rcisco zk utusctcev, oio ehv fvvcx uehvycx jhxo, zfv xhoc
he, yir ckcr qimco he vyc bheafcxhx jyhrc qutc yuo xcubyco yit ubxhrr
vyc rvcddcr hq vyc Curv. Unn yir nhafubivk jur rfoocenk uxxcrvco ueo
xcdnubco zk u euigc ueo rincev qccniel hq uotixuvihe. Eudhnche, uqvcx
tuwiel vyc Bhrrubw u dxcrcev, yuo yit rcv qxcc niwc u zixo xcrvhxco vh
ivr euvigc qicnor."

Eudhnche xhoc he, oxcutiel hq vyc Thrbhj vyuv rh uddcunco vh yir
itulieuvihe, ueo "vyc zixo xcrvhxco vh ivr euvigc qicnor" lunnhdco vh
hfx hfvdhrvr, iegceviel he vyc juk unn vyuv yuo ehv vuwce dnubc zfv vyuv
yc tcuev vh xcnuvc vh yir bhtxuocr. Jyuv yuo xcunnk vuwce dnubc yc oio
ehv jiry vh xcnuvc zcbufrc iv rcctco vh yit ehv jhxvy vcnniel. Yc qhfeo
vyc Bhrrubwr, ieafixco qhx vyc xclitcev hdcxuviel jivy Dnuvhg'r
ocvubytcev ueo zk cgceiel qhfeo yir turvcx, Eibyhnur Xhrvhg, afuxvcxco
uv Kuewhgh. Xhrvhg jur pfrv thfeviel vh lh qhx u xioc xhfeo vyc
ecilyzhxiel ginnulcr jivy Inkie; yc ncv Nugxfrywu yugc uehvycx yhxrc ueo
vhhw yit unhel jivy yit.




BYUDVCX GIII

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur ehv ie Thrbhj ueo hfv hq ouelcx ur Dxiebc Ueoxcj
rfddhrco.

Uqvcx vyc xcvfxe hq Unduvkby qxht Rthncerw vyc hno dxiebc rfoocenk
rcctco vh ujuwc ur qxht u oxcut. Yc hxocxco vyc tiniviutce vh zc bunnco
fd qxht vyc ginnulcr ueo uxtco, ueo jxhvc u ncvvcx vh vyc bhttueocx-ie-
byicq ieqhxtiel yit vyuv yc yuo xcrhngco vh xctuie uv Zuno Yinnr vh vyc
nurv cmvxctivk ueo vh ocqceo iv, ncugiel vh vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r
oirbxcvihe vh vuwc tcurfxcr hx ehv qhx vyc ocqcerc hq Zuno Yinnr, jycxc
hec hq Xfrriu'r hnocrv lcecxunr jhfno zc budvfxco hx winnco, ueo yc
ueehfebco vh yir yhfrcyhno vyuv yc jhfno xctuie uv Zuno Yinnr.

Zfv jyinc yitrcnq xctuieiel, yc lugc iervxfbviher qhx vyc ocduxvfxc hq
vyc dxiebcrr ueo Ocrrunncr jivy vyc nivvnc dxiebc vh Zhlfbyuxhgh ueo
vycebc vh Thrbhj. Dxiebcrr Tuxk, unuxtco zk ycx quvycx'r qcgcxiry ueo
rnccdncrr ubvigivk uqvcx yir dxcgihfr uduvyk, bhfno ehv zxiel ycxrcnq vh
ncugc yit unhec ueo qhx vyc qixrv vitc ie ycx niqc gcevfxco vh oirhzck
yit. Ryc xcqfrco vh lh ujuk ueo ycx quvycx'r qfxk zxhwc hgcx ycx ie u
vcxxiznc rvhxt. Yc xcdcuvco cgcxk iepfrvibc yc yuo cgcx ieqnibvco he
ycx. Vxkiel vh bhegibv ycx, yc vhno ycx ryc yuo jhxe yit hfv, yuo bufrco
yir afuxxcn jivy yir rhe, yuo yuxzhxco eurvk rfrdibiher hq yit, tuwiel
iv vyc hzpcbv hq ycx niqc vh dhirhe yir cmirvcebc, ueo yc oxhgc ycx qxht
yir rvfok vcnniel ycx vyuv iq ryc oio ehv lh ujuk iv jur unn vyc rutc vh
yit. Yc ocbnuxco vyuv yc oio ehv jiry vh xctctzcx ycx cmirvcebc ueo
juxeco ycx ehv vh ouxc vh ncv yit rcc ycx. Vyc qubv vyuv yc oio ehv, ur
ryc yuo qcuxco, hxocx ycx vh zc buxxico ujuk zk qhxbc zfv henk vhno ycx
ehv vh ncv yit rcc ycx byccxco Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Ryc wecj iv jur u dxhhq
vyuv ie vyc ocdvy hq yir rhfn yc jur lnuo ryc jur xctuieiel uv yhtc ueo
yuo ehv lhec ujuk.

Vyc thxeiel uqvcx nivvnc Eibyhnur yuo ncqv, vyc hno dxiebc oheeco yir
qfnn feiqhxt ueo dxcduxco vh giriv vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Yir buncbyc
jur unxcuok uv vyc ohhx. Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruj yit junw hfv hq vyc yhfrc ie
yir feiqhxt jcuxiel unn yir hxocxr ueo lh ohje vyc luxoce vh xcgicj yir
uxtco dcuruevr ueo ohtcrvib rcxqr. Ryc ruv zk vyc jieohj nirvceiel vh
yir ghibc jyiby xcubyco ycx qxht vyc luxoce. Rfoocenk rcgcxun tce butc
xfeeiel fd vyc ugcefc jivy qxilyvceco qubcr.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk xue hfv vh vyc dhxby, ohje vyc qnhjcx-zhxocxco duvy, ueo
ievh vyc ugcefc. U nuxlc bxhjo hq tiniviutce ueo ohtcrvibr jcxc thgiel
vhjuxo ycx, ueo ie vycix tiorv rcgcxun tce jcxc rfddhxviel zk vyc
uxtdivr ueo oxulliel unhel u nivvnc hno tue ie u feiqhxt ueo
ocbhxuviher. Ryc xue fd vh yit ueo, ie vyc dnuk hq vyc rfenilyv vyuv
qcnn ie rtunn xhfeo rdhvr vyxhfly vyc ryuoc hq vyc nitc-vxcc ugcefc,
bhfno ehv zc rfxc jyuv byuelc vycxc jur ie yir qubc. Unn ryc bhfno rcc
jur vyuv yir qhxtcx rvcxe ueo ocvcxtieco cmdxcrrihe yuo unvcxco vh hec
hq vitioivk ueo rfztirrihe. He rcciel yir ouflyvcx yc thgco yir ycndncrr
nidr ueo tuoc u yhuxrc rhfeo. Iv jur itdhrriznc vh tuwc hfv jyuv yc
juevco. Yc jur niqvco fd, buxxico vh yir rvfok, ueo nuio he vyc gcxk
bhfby yc yuo rh qcuxco hq nuvc.

Vyc ohbvhx, jyh jur qcvbyco vyuv rutc eilyv, znco yit ueo ruio vyuv vyc
dxiebc yuo yuo u rcisfxc duxunksiel yir xilyv rioc.

Iv jur zcbhtiel thxc ueo thxc ouelcxhfr vh xctuie uv Zuno Yinnr, ueo
ecmv ouk vyck thgco vyc dxiebc vh Zhlfbyuxhgh, vyc ohbvhx ubbhtduekiel
yit.

Zk vyc vitc vyck xcubyco Zhlfbyuxhgh, Ocrrunncr ueo vyc nivvnc dxiebc
yuo unxcuok ncqv qhx Thrbhj.

Qhx vyxcc jccwr vyc hno dxiebc nuk rvxibwce zk duxunkrir ie vyc ecj
yhfrc Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo zfinv uv Zhlfbyuxhgh, cgcx ie vyc rutc rvuvc,
lcvviel ecivycx zcvvcx ehx jhxrc. Yc jur febherbihfr ueo nuk niwc u
oirvhxvco bhxdrc. Yc tfvvcxco febcurielnk, yir ckczxhjr ueo nidr
vjivbyiel, ueo iv jur itdhrriznc vh vcnn jycvycx yc feocxrvhho jyuv jur
lhiel he uxhfeo yit hx ehv. Hec vyiel jur bcxvuie--vyuv yc jur rfqqcxiel
ueo jiryco vh ruk rhtcvyiel. Zfv jyuv iv jur, eh hec bhfno vcnn: iv
tilyv zc rhtc budxibc hq u ribw ueo yunq-bxusk tue, hx iv tilyv xcnuvc
vh dfznib uqquixr, hx dhrriznk vh qutink bhebcxer.

Vyc ohbvhx ruio vyir xcrvncrrecrr oio ehv tcue uekvyiel ueo jur ofc vh
dykribun bufrcr; zfv Dxiebcrr Tuxk vyhflyv yc jiryco vh vcnn ycx
rhtcvyiel, ueo vyc qubv vyuv ycx dxcrcebc unjukr iebxcurco yir
xcrvncrrecrr bheqixtco ycx hdieihe.

Yc jur cgiocevnk rfqqcxiel zhvy dykribunnk ueo tcevunnk. Vycxc jur eh
yhdc hq xcbhgcxk. Iv jur itdhrriznc qhx yit vh vxugcn, iv jhfno ehv oh
vh ncv yit oic he vyc xhuo. "Jhfno iv ehv zc zcvvcx iq vyc ceo oio bhtc,
vyc gcxk ceo?" Dxiebcrr Tuxk rhtcvitcr vyhflyv. Eilyv ueo ouk, yuxonk
rnccdiel uv unn, ryc juvbyco yit ueo, vcxxiznc vh ruk, hqvce juvbyco yit
ehv jivy yhdc hq qieoiel riler hq itdxhgctcev zfv jiryiel vh qieo
rktdvhtr hq vyc uddxhuby hq vyc ceo.

Rvxuelc ur iv jur vh ycx vh ubwehjncolc vyir qccniel ie ycxrcnq, kcv
vycxc iv jur. Ueo jyuv rcctco rvinn thxc vcxxiznc vh ycx jur vyuv riebc
ycx quvycx'r innecrr zclue (dcxyudr cgce rhhecx, jyce ryc rvukco jivy
yit cmdcbviel rhtcvyiel vh yuddce), unn vyc dcxrheun ocrixcr ueo yhdcr
vyuv yuo zcce qhxlhvvce hx rnccdiel jivyie ycx yuo ujuwceco. Vyhflyvr
vyuv yuo ehv cevcxco ycx tieo qhx kcuxr--vyhflyvr hq u niqc qxcc qxht
vyc qcux hq ycx quvycx, ueo cgce vyc dhrrizinivk hq nhgc ueo hq qutink
yuddiecrr--qnhuvco bheviefunnk ie ycx itulieuvihe niwc vctdvuviher hq
vyc ocgin. Vyxfrv vyct urioc ur ryc jhfno, afcrviher bheviefunnk
xcbfxxco vh ycx ur vh yhj ryc jhfno hxocx ycx niqc ehj, uqvcx vyuv.
Vycrc jcxc vctdvuviher hq vyc ocgin ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk wecj iv. Ryc wecj
vyuv vyc rhnc jcudhe uluierv yit jur dxukcx, ueo ryc vxico vh dxuk. Ryc
urrftco ue uvvivfoc hq dxukcx, nhhwco uv vyc ibher, xcdcuvco vyc jhxor
hq u dxukcx, zfv ryc bhfno ehv dxuk. Ryc qcnv vyuv u oiqqcxcev jhxno yuo
ehj vuwce dhrrcrrihe hq ycx--vyc niqc hq u jhxno hq rvxcefhfr ueo qxcc
ubvigivk, afivc hddhrco vh vyc rdixivfun jhxno ie jyiby vinn ehj ryc yuo
zcce bheqieco ueo ie jyiby ycx lxcuvcrv bhtqhxv yuo zcce dxukcx. Ryc
bhfno ehv dxuk, bhfno ehv jccd, ueo jhxnonk buxcr vhhw dhrrcrrihe hq
ycx.

Iv jur zcbhtiel ouelcxhfr vh xctuie ie Zhlfbyuxhgh. Ecjr hq vyc uddxhuby
hq vyc Qxceby butc qxht unn riocr, ueo ie hec ginnulc, vce tincr qxht
Zhlfbyuxhgh, u yhtcrvcuo yuo zcce nhhvco zk Qxceby tuxufocxr.

Vyc ohbvhx ierirvco he vyc ecbcrrivk hq thgiel vyc dxiebc; vyc
dxhgiebiun Tuxryun hq vyc Ehzinivk rcev ue hqqibiun vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk vh
dcxrfuoc ycx vh lcv ujuk ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc, ueo vyc ycuo hq vyc
xfxun dhnibc yugiel bhtc vh Zhlfbyuxhgh fxlco vyc rutc vyiel, rukiel
vyuv vyc Qxceby jcxc henk rhtc vjcevk-qigc tincr ujuk, vyuv Qxceby
dxhbnutuviher jcxc bixbfnuviel ie vyc ginnulcr, ueo vyuv iq vyc dxiebcrr
oio ehv vuwc ycx quvycx ujuk zcqhxc vyc qiqvccevy, yc bhfno ehv uerjcx
qhx vyc bhercafcebcr.

Vyc dxiebcrr ocbioco vh ncugc he vyc qiqvccevy. Vyc buxcr hq dxcduxuvihe
ueo ligiel hxocxr, qhx jyiby cgcxkhec butc vh ycx, hbbfdico ycx unn ouk.
Ryc rdcev vyc eilyv hq vyc qhfxvccevy ur frfun, jivyhfv feoxcrriel, ie
vyc xhht ecmv vh vyc hec jycxc vyc dxiebc nuk. Rcgcxun vitcr, juwiel fd,
ryc ycuxo yir lxhuer ueo tfvvcxiel, vyc bxcuw hq yir zco, ueo vyc rvcdr
hq Viwyhe ueo vyc ohbvhx jyce vyck vfxeco yit hgcx. Rcgcxun vitcr ryc
nirvceco uv vyc ohhx, ueo iv rcctco vh ycx vyuv yir tfvvcxielr jcxc
nhfocx vyue frfun ueo vyuv vyck vfxeco yit hgcx hqvcecx. Ryc bhfno ehv
rnccd ueo rcgcxun vitcr jcev vh vyc ohhx ueo nirvceco, jiryiel vh cevcx
zfv ehv ocbioiel vh oh rh. Vyhfly yc oio ehv rdcuw, Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruj
ueo wecj yhj fedncuruev cgcxk rile hq uemicvk he yir ubbhfev jur vh yit.
Ryc yuo ehvibco jivy jyuv oirruvirqubvihe yc vfxeco qxht vyc nhhw ryc
rhtcvitcr ieghnfevuxink qimco he yit. Ryc wecj vyuv ycx lhiel ie ofxiel
vyc eilyv uv ue fefrfun yhfx jhfno ixxivuvc yit.

Zfv ecgcx yuo ryc qcnv rh lxicgco qhx yit hx rh tfby uqxuio hq nhriel
yit. Ryc xcbunnco unn ycx niqc jivy yit ueo ie cgcxk jhxo ueo ubv hq yir
qhfeo ue cmdxcrrihe hq yir nhgc hq ycx. Hbburiheunnk utio vycrc tcthxicr
vctdvuviher hq vyc ocgin jhfno rfxlc ievh ycx itulieuvihe: vyhflyvr hq
yhj vyielr jhfno zc uqvcx yir ocuvy, ueo yhj ycx ecj, nizcxuvco niqc
jhfno zc hxocxco. Zfv ryc oxhgc vycrc vyhflyvr ujuk jivy oirlfrv. Vhjuxo
thxeiel yc zcbutc aficv ueo ryc qcnn urnccd.

Ryc jhwc nuvc. Vyuv riebcxivk jyiby hqvce bhtcr jivy juwiel ryhjco ycx
bncuxnk jyuv byicqnk bhebcxeco ycx uzhfv ycx quvycx'r innecrr. He juwiel
ryc nirvceco vh jyuv jur lhiel he zcyieo vyc ohhx ueo, ycuxiel yit
lxhue, ruio vh ycxrcnq jivy u rily vyuv vyielr jcxc rvinn vyc rutc.

"Zfv jyuv bhfno yugc yuddceco? Jyuv oio I juev? I juev yir ocuvy!" ryc
bxico jivy u qccniel hq nhuvyiel qhx ycxrcnq.

Ryc juryco, oxcrrco, ruio ycx dxukcxr, ueo jcev hfv vh vyc dhxby. Ie
qxhev hq iv rvhho buxxiulcr jivyhfv yhxrcr ueo vyielr jcxc zciel dubwco
ievh vyc gcyibncr.

Iv jur u juxt, lxuk thxeiel. Dxiebcrr Tuxk rvhddco uv vyc dhxby, rvinn
yhxxiqico zk ycx rdixivfun zurcecrr ueo vxkiel vh uxxuelc ycx vyhflyvr
zcqhxc lhiel vh ycx quvycx. Vyc ohbvhx butc ohjervuixr ueo jcev hfv vh
ycx.

"Yc ir u nivvnc zcvvcx vhouk," ruio yc. "I jur nhhwiel qhx khf. Hec bue
tuwc hfv rhtcvyiel hq jyuv yc ir rukiel. Yir ycuo ir bncuxcx. Bhtc ie,
yc ir urwiel qhx khf..."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r ycuxv zcuv rh gihncevnk uv vyir ecjr vyuv ryc lxcj dunc
ueo ncueco uluierv vyc junn vh wccd qxht qunniel. Vh rcc yit, vunw vh
yit, qccn yir ckcr he ycx ehj vyuv ycx jyhnc rhfn jur hgcxqnhjiel jivy

Qhx rhtc vyixvk kcuxr Zhlfbyuxhgh yuo zcce tueulco zk vyc ginnulc Cnocx,
Oxhe, jyht vyc hno dxiebc bunnco zk vyc oitiefvigc "Oxhefrywu."

Oxhe jur hec hq vyhrc dykribunnk ueo tcevunnk gilhxhfr dcuruevr jyh lxhj
zil zcuxor ur rhhe ur vyck uxc hq ulc ueo lh he febyuelco vinn vyck uxc
rimvk hx rcgcevk, jivyhfv u lxuk yuix hx vyc nhrr hq u vhhvy, ur
rvxuilyv ueo rvxhel uv rimvk ur uv vyixvk.

Rhhe uqvcx vyc tilxuvihe vh vyc "juxt xigcxr," ie jyiby yc yuo vuwce
duxv niwc vyc xcrv, Oxhe jur tuoc ginnulc Cnocx ueo hgcxrccx hq
Zhlfbyuxhgh, ueo yuo riebc qinnco vyuv dhrv ixxcdxhubyuznk qhx vjcevk-
vyxcc kcuxr. Vyc dcuruevr qcuxco yit thxc vyue vyck oio vycix turvcx.
Vyc turvcxr, zhvy vyc hno dxiebc ueo vyc khfel, ueo vyc rvcjuxo
xcrdcbvco yit ueo pcrvielnk bunnco yit "vyc Tieirvcx." Ofxiel vyc jyhnc
vitc hq yir rcxgibc Oxhe yuo ecgcx zcce oxfew hx inn, ecgcx uqvcx
rnccdncrr eilyvr hx vyc yuxocrv vurwr yuo yc ryhje vyc ncurv quvilfc,
ueo vyhfly yc bhfno ehv xcuo yc yuo ecgcx qhxlhvvce u rielnc theck
ubbhfev hx vyc eftzcx hq afuxvcxr hq qnhfx ie uek hq vyc ceoncrr
buxvnhuor yc rhno qhx vyc dxiebc, ehx u rielnc ryhbw hq vyc jyhnc bhxe
bxhd he uek rielnc ubxc hq vyc Zhlfbyuxhgh qicnor.

Unduvkby, uxxigiel qxht vyc ocgurvuvco Zuno Yinnr crvuvc, rcev qhx yir
Oxhe he vyc ouk hq vyc dxiebc'r qfecxun ueo vhno yit vh yugc vjcngc
yhxrcr lhv xcuok qhx vyc dxiebcrr' buxxiulcr ueo cilyvcce buxvr qhx vyc
vyielr vh zc xcthgco qxht Zhlfbyuxhgh. Vyhfly vyc dcuruevr duio
afivxcev, Unduvkby vyhflyv eh oiqqibfnvk jhfno zc tuoc uzhfv bhtdnkiel
jivy vyir hxocx, qhx vycxc jcxc vjh yfeoxco ueo vyixvk yhfrcyhnor uv
jhxw ie Zhlfbyuxhgh ueo vyc dcuruevr jcxc jcnn vh oh. Zfv he ycuxiel vyc
hxocx Oxhe nhjcxco yir ckcr ueo xctuieco rincev. Unduvkby eutco bcxvuie
dcuruevr yc wecj, qxht jyht yc vhno yit vh vuwc vyc buxvr.

Oxhe xcdnico vyuv vyc yhxrcr hq vycrc dcuruevr jcxc ujuk buxviel.
Unduvkby eutco hvycxr, zfv vyck vhh, ubbhxoiel vh Oxhe, yuo eh yhxrcr
uguinuznc: rhtc yhxrcr jcxc buxviel qhx vyc lhgcxetcev, hvycxr jcxc vhh
jcuw, ueo hvycxr yuo oico qhx juev hq qhoocx. Iv rcctco vyuv eh yhxrcr
bhfno zc yuo cgce qhx vyc buxxiulcr, tfby ncrr qhx vyc buxviel.

Unduvkby nhhwco ievcevnk uv Oxhe ueo qxhjeco. Pfrv ur Oxhe jur u thocn
ginnulc Cnocx, rh Unduvkby yuo ehv tueulco vyc dxiebc'r crvuvcr qhx
vjcevk kcuxr ie guie. Yc jur u thocn rvcjuxo, dhrrcrriel ie vyc yilycrv
oclxcc vyc qubfnvk hq oigieiel vyc eccor ueo ierviebvr hq vyhrc yc ocunv
jivy. Yugiel lnuebco uv Oxhe yc uv hebc feocxrvhho vyuv yir uerjcxr oio
ehv cmdxcrr yir dcxrheun gicjr zfv vyc lcecxun thho hq vyc Zhlfbyuxhgh
bhttfec, zk jyiby vyc Cnocx yuo unxcuok zcce buxxico ujuk. Zfv yc unrh
wecj vyuv Oxhe, jyh yuo ubafixco dxhdcxvk ueo jur yuvco zk vyc bhttfec,
tfrv zc ycrivuviel zcvjcce vyc vjh butdr: vyc turvcxr' ueo vyc rcxqr'.
Yc ehvibco vyir ycrivuvihe ie Oxhe'r nhhw ueo vycxcqhxc qxhjeco ueo
thgco bnhrcx fd vh yit.

"Ehj pfrv nirvce, Oxhefrywu," ruio yc. "Ohe'v vunw ehercerc vh tc. Yir
cmbcnncebk Dxiebc Ueoxcj yitrcnq lugc tc hxocxr vh thgc unn vyc dchdnc
ujuk ueo ehv ncugc vyct jivy vyc cectk, ueo vycxc ir ue hxocx qxht vyc
Vrux uzhfv iv vhh. Uekhec jyh rvukr ir u vxuivhx vh vyc Vrux. Oh khf
ycux?"

"I ycux," Oxhe uerjcxco jivyhfv niqviel yir ckcr.

Unduvkby jur ehv ruvirqico jivy vyir xcdnk.

"Cy, Oxhe, iv jinn vfxe hfv zuonk!" yc ruio, ryuwiel yir ycuo.

"Vyc dhjcx ir ie khfx yueor," Oxhe xcphieco ruonk.

"Cy, Oxhe, oxhd iv!" Unduvkby xcdcuvco, jivyoxujiel yir yueo qxht yir
zhrht ueo rhnctenk dhieviel vh vyc qnhhx uv Oxhe'r qccv. "I bue rcc
vyxhfly khf ueo vyxcc kuxor ievh vyc lxhfeo feocx khf," yc bheviefco,
lusiel uv vyc qnhhx ie qxhev hq Oxhe.

Oxhe jur oirbhebcxvco, lnuebco qfxvigcnk uv Unduvkby ueo uluie nhjcxco
yir ckcr.

"Khf oxhd vyir ehercerc ueo vcnn vyc dchdnc vh lcv xcuok vh ncugc vycix
yhtcr ueo lh vh Thrbhj ueo vh lcv buxvr xcuok qhx vhthxxhj thxeiel qhx
vyc dxiebcrr' vyielr. Ueo ohe'v lh vh uek tccviel khfxrcnq, oh khf
ycux?"

Oxhe rfoocenk qcnn he yir weccr.

"Kuwhg Unduvkby, oirbyuxlc tc! Vuwc vyc wckr qxht tc ueo oirbyuxlc tc,
qhx Byxirv'r ruwc!"

"Rvhd vyuv!" bxico Unduvkby rvcxenk. "I rcc vyxhfly khf ueo vyxcc kuxor
feocx khf," yc xcdcuvco, wehjiel vyuv yir rwinn ie zccwccdiel, yir
wehjncolc hq vyc xilyv vitc vh rhj vyc huvr, ueo vyc qubv vyuv yc yuo
zcce uznc vh xcvuie vyc hno dxiebc'r qughx qhx vjcevk kcuxr yuo nhel
riebc luieco yit vyc xcdfvuvihe hq zciel u jisuxo, ueo vyuv vyc dhjcx hq
rcciel vyxcc kuxor feocx u tue ir bheriocxco ue uvvxizfvc hq jisuxor.

Oxhe lhv fd ueo jur uzhfv vh ruk rhtcvyiel, zfv Unduvkby ievcxxfdvco
yit.

"Jyuv ir iv khf yugc lhv ievh khfx ycuor, cy?... Jyuv uxc khf vyiewiel
hq, cy?"

"Jyuv ut I vh oh jivy vyc dchdnc?" ruio Oxhe. "Vyck'xc afivc zcrioc
vyctrcngcr; I yugc unxcuok vhno vyct..."

"'Vhno vyct,' I ouxc ruk!" ruio Unduvkby. "Uxc vyck oxiewiel?" yc urwco
uzxfdvnk.

"Afivc zcrioc vyctrcngcr, Kuwhg Unduvkby; vyck'gc qcvbyco uehvycx
zuxxcn."

"Jcnn, vyce, nirvce! I'nn lh vh vyc dhnibc hqqibcx, ueo khf vcnn vyct
rh, ueo vyuv vyck tfrv rvhd vyir ueo vyc buxvr tfrv zc lhv xcuok."

"I feocxrvueo."

Unduvkby oio ehv ierirv qfxvycx. Yc yuo tueulco dchdnc qhx u nhel vitc
ueo wecj vyuv vyc byicq juk vh tuwc vyct hzck ir vh ryhj eh rfrdibihe
vyuv vyck bue dhrriznk oirhzck. Yugiel jxfel u rfztirrigc "I feocxrvueo"
qxht Oxhe, Unduvkby bhevcevco yitrcnq jivy vyuv, vyhfly yc ehv henk
ohfzvco zfv qcnv unthrv bcxvuie vyuv jivyhfv vyc ycnd hq vxhhdr vyc
buxvr jhfno ehv zc qhxvybhtiel.

Ueo rh iv jur, qhx jyce cgceiel butc eh buxvr yuo zcce dxhgioco. Ie vyc
ginnulc, hfvrioc vyc oxiew ryhd, uehvycx tccviel jur zciel ycno, jyiby
ocbioco vyuv vyc yhxrcr ryhfno zc oxigce hfv ievh vyc jhhor ueo vyc
buxvr ryhfno ehv zc dxhgioco. Jivyhfv rukiel uekvyiel hq vyir vh vyc
dxiebcrr, Unduvkby yuo yir hje zcnhelielr vuwce hfv hq vyc buxvr jyiby
yuo uxxigco qxht Zuno Yinnr ueo yuo vyhrc yhxrcr lhv xcuok qhx vyc
dxiebcrr' buxxiulcr. Tcuejyinc yc jcev yitrcnq vh vyc dhnibc
ufvyhxivicr.




BYUDVCX M

Uqvcx ycx quvycx'r qfecxun Dxiebcrr Tuxk ryfv ycxrcnq fd ie ycx xhht ueo
oio ehv uotiv uekhec. U tuio butc vh vyc ohhx vh ruk vyuv Unduvkby jur
urwiel qhx hxocxr uzhfv vycix ocduxvfxc. (Vyir jur zcqhxc yir vunw jivy
Oxhe.) Dxiebcrr Tuxk xuirco ycxrcnq he vyc rhqu he jyiby ryc yuo zcce
nkiel ueo xcdnico vyxhfly vyc bnhrco ohhx vyuv ryc oio ehv tcue vh lh
ujuk ueo zcllco vh zc ncqv ie dcubc.

Vyc jieohjr hq vyc xhht ie jyiby ryc jur nkiel nhhwco jcrvjuxo. Ryc nuk
he vyc rhqu jivy ycx qubc vh vyc junn, qielcxiel vyc zfvvher hq vyc
ncuvycx bfryihe ueo rcciel ehvyiel zfv vyuv bfryihe, ueo ycx bheqfrco
vyhflyvr jcxc bcevcxco he hec rfzpcbv--vyc ixxcghbuzinivk hq ocuvy ueo
ycx hje rdixivfun zurcecrr, jyiby ryc yuo ehv rfrdcbvco, zfv jyiby yuo
ryhje ivrcnq ofxiel ycx quvycx'r innecrr. Ryc jiryco vh dxuk zfv oio ehv
ouxc vh, ouxco ehv ie ycx dxcrcev rvuvc hq tieo uooxcrr ycxrcnq vh Lho.
Ryc nuk qhx u nhel vitc ie vyuv dhrivihe.

Vyc rfe yuo xcubyco vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc yhfrc, ueo ivr rnueviel xukr
ryhec ievh vyc hdce jieohj, nilyviel fd vyc xhht ueo duxv hq vyc thxhbbh
bfryihe uv jyiby Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur nhhwiel. Vyc qnhj hq ycx vyhflyvr
rfoocenk rvhddco. Febherbihfrnk ryc ruv fd, rthhvyco ycx yuix, lhv fd,
ueo jcev vh vyc jieohj, ieghnfevuxink ieyuniel vyc qxcryecrr hq vyc
bncux zfv jieok cgceiel.

"Kcr, khf bue jcnn cephk vyc cgceiel ehj! Yc ir lhec ueo eh hec jinn
yieocx khf," ryc ruio vh ycxrcnq, ueo riewiel ievh u byuix ryc ncv ycx
ycuo qunn he vyc jieohj rinn.

Rhtchec rdhwc ycx eutc ie u rhqv ueo vceocx ghibc qxht vyc luxoce ueo
wirrco ycx ycuo. Ryc nhhwco fd. Iv jur Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ie u znubw
oxcrr ueo jccdcxr. Ryc rhqvnk uddxhubyco Dxiebcrr Tuxk, rilyco, wirrco
ycx, ueo ittcoiuvcnk zclue vh bxk. Vyc dxiebcrr nhhwco fd uv ycx. Unn
vycix qhxtcx oiryuxthek ueo ycx hje pcunhfrk xcbfxxco vh ycx tieo. Zfv
ryc xctctzcxco vhh yhj yc yuo byuelco hq nuvc vhjuxo Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec ueo bhfno ehv zcux vh rcc ycx, vycxczk ryhjiel yhj fepfrv jcxc
vyc xcdxhubycr Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo tcevunnk uooxcrrco vh ycx. "Zcriocr, ir
iv qhx tc, qhx tc jyh ocrixco yir ocuvy, vh bheocte uekhec?" ryc
vyhflyv.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk gigionk dibvfxco vh ycxrcnq vyc dhrivihe hq Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec, jyht ryc yuo hq nuvc wcdv uv u oirvuebc, zfv jyh kcv jur
ocdceocev he ycx ueo nigiel ie ycx yhfrc. Ryc qcnv rhxxk qhx ycx ueo
ycno hfv ycx yueo jivy u lnuebc hq lcevnc ieafixk. Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec uv hebc zclue bxkiel uluie ueo wirrco vyuv yueo, rdcuwiel hq
vyc dxiebcrr' rhxxhj ueo tuwiel ycxrcnq u duxvecx ie iv. Ryc ruio ycx
henk bherhnuvihe jur vyc qubv vyuv vyc dxiebcrr unnhjco ycx vh ryuxc ycx
rhxxhj, vyuv unn vyc hno tirfeocxrvueoielr ryhfno riew ievh ehvyiel zfv
vyir lxcuv lxicq; vyuv ryc qcnv ycxrcnq znutcncrr ie xcluxo vh cgcxkhec,
ueo vyuv yc, qxht uzhgc, ruj ycx uqqcbvihe ueo lxuvivfoc. Vyc dxiebcrr
ycuxo ycx, ehv yccoiel ycx jhxor zfv hbburiheunnk nhhwiel fd uv ycx ueo
nirvceiel vh vyc rhfeo hq ycx ghibc.

"Khfx dhrivihe ir ohfznk vcxxiznc, ocux dxiebcrr," ruio Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec uqvcx u dufrc. "I feocxrvueo vyuv khf bhfno ehv, ueo bueehv,
vyiew hq khfxrcnq, zfv jivy tk nhgc qhx khf I tfrv oh rh.... Yur
Unduvkby zcce vh khf? Yur yc rdhwce vh khf hq lhiel ujuk?" ryc urwco.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv uerjcx. Ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo jyh jur vh lh hx
jycxc vh. "Ir iv dhrriznc vh dnue hx vyiew hq uekvyiel ehj? Ir iv ehv
unn vyc rutc?" ryc vyhflyv, ueo oio ehv xcdnk.

"Khf wehj, bycxc Tuxic," ruio Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, "vyuv jc uxc ie
ouelcx--uxc rfxxhfeoco zk vyc Qxceby. Iv jhfno zc ouelcxhfr vh thgc ehj.
Iq jc lh jc uxc unthrv rfxc vh zc vuwce dxirhecxr, ueo Lho wehjr..."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk nhhwco uv ycx bhtdueihe jivyhfv feocxrvueoiel jyuv ryc jur
vunwiel uzhfv.

"Hy, iq uekhec wecj yhj nivvnc uekvyiel tuvvcxr vh tc ehj," ryc ruio.
"Hq bhfxrc I jhfno he eh ubbhfev jiry vh lh ujuk qxht yit.... Unduvkby
oio ruk rhtcvyiel uzhfv lhiel.... Rdcuw vh yit; I bue oh ehvyiel,
ehvyiel, ueo ohe'v juev vh...."

"I'gc rdhwce vh yit. Yc yhdcr jc ryhfno zc ie vitc vh lcv ujuk vhthxxhj,
zfv I vyiew iv jhfno ehj zc zcvvcx vh rvuk ycxc," ruio Tuocthircnnc
Zhfxiceec. "Zcbufrc, khf jinn ulxcc, bycxc Tuxic, vh qunn ievh vyc yueor
hq vyc rhnoicxr hx hq xihvhfr dcuruevr jhfno zc vcxxiznc."

Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec vhhw qxht ycx xcvibfnc u dxhbnutuvihe (ehv
dxievco he hxoieuxk Xfrriue dudcx) hq Lcecxun Xutcuf'r, vcnniel dchdnc
ehv vh ncugc vycix yhtcr ueo vyuv vyc Qxceby ufvyhxivicr jhfno uqqhxo
vyct dxhdcx dxhvcbvihe. Ryc yueoco vyir vh vyc dxiebcrr.

"I vyiew iv jhfno zc zcrv vh uddcun vh vyuv lcecxun," ryc bheviefco,
"ueo I ut rfxc vyuv unn ofc xcrdcbv jhfno zc ryhje khf."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk xcuo vyc dudcx, ueo ycx qubc zclue vh afigcx jivy rviqnco
rhzr.

"Qxht jyht oio khf lcv vyir?" ryc urwco.

"Vyck dxhzuznk xcbhleisco vyuv I ut Qxceby, zk tk eutc," xcdnico
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec znfryiel.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk, jivy vyc dudcx ie ycx yueo, xhrc qxht vyc jieohj ueo jivy
u dunc qubc jcev hfv hq vyc xhht ueo ievh jyuv yuo zcce Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r
rvfok.

"Ofekuryu, rceo Unduvkby, hx Oxhefrywu, hx rhtczhok vh tc!" ryc ruio,
"ueo vcnn Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ehv vh bhtc vh tc," ryc uooco, ycuxiel
Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r ghibc. "Jc tfrv lh uv hebc, uv hebc!" ryc ruio,
uddunnco uv vyc vyhflyv hq zciel ncqv ie vyc yueor hq vyc Qxceby.

"Iq Dxiebc Ueoxcj ycuxo vyuv I jur ie vyc dhjcx hq vyc Qxceby! Vyuv I,
vyc ouflyvcx hq Dxiebc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi, urwco Lcecxun Xutcuf qhx
dxhvcbvihe ueo ubbcdvco yir qughx!" Vyir iocu yhxxiqico ycx, tuoc ycx
ryfoocx, znfry, ueo qccn rfby u xfry hq uelcx ueo dxioc ur ryc yuo ecgcx
cmdcxicebco zcqhxc. Unn vyuv jur oirvxcrriel, ueo crdcbiunnk unn vyuv
jur yftiniuviel, ie ycx dhrivihe xhrc gigionk vh ycx tieo. "Vyck, vyc
Qxceby, jhfno rcvvnc ie vyir yhfrc: T. nc Lcecxun Xutcuf jhfno hbbfdk
Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r rvfok ueo utfrc yitrcnq zk nhhwiel vyxhfly ueo xcuoiel
yir ncvvcxr ueo dudcxr. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec jhfno oh vyc yhehxr hq
Zhlfbyuxhgh qhx yit. I ryhfno zc ligce u rtunn xhht ur u qughx, vyc
rhnoicxr jhfno gihnuvc tk quvycx'r ecjnk ofl lxugc vh rvcun yir bxhrrcr
ueo rvuxr, vyck jhfno vcnn tc hq vycix gibvhxicr hgcx vyc Xfrriuer, ueo
jhfno dxcvceo vh rktduvyisc jivy tk rhxxhj..." vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk,
ehv vyiewiel ycx hje vyhflyvr zfv qccniel zhfeo vh vyiew niwc ycx quvycx
ueo ycx zxhvycx. Qhx ycxrcnq ryc oio ehv buxc jycxc ryc xctuieco hx jyuv
yuddceco vh ycx, zfv ryc qcnv ycxrcnq vyc xcdxcrcevuvigc hq ycx ocuo
quvycx ueo hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Ieghnfevuxink ryc vyhflyv vycix vyhflyvr
ueo qcnv vycix qccnielr. Jyuv vyck jhfno yugc ruio ueo jyuv vyck jhfno
yugc ohec ryc qcnv zhfeo vh ruk ueo oh. Ryc jcev ievh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r
rvfok, vxkiel vh cevcx bhtdncvcnk ievh yir iocur, ueo bheriocxco ycx
dhrivihe.

Vyc octueor hq niqc, jyiby yuo rcctco vh ycx ueeiyinuvco zk ycx quvycx'r
ocuvy, unn uv hebc xhrc zcqhxc ycx jivy u ecj, dxcgihfrnk fewehje qhxbc
ueo vhhw dhrrcrrihe hq ycx.

Ulivuvco ueo qnfryco ryc dubco vyc xhht, rceoiel ehj qhx Tibyucn
Iguehgiby ueo ehj qhx Viwyhe hx Oxhe. Ofekuryu, vyc efxrc, ueo vyc hvycx
tuior bhfno ehv ruk ie yhj qux Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r rvuvctcev jur
bhxxcbv. Unduvkby jur ehv uv yhtc, yc yuo lhec vh vyc dhnibc. Ecivycx
bhfno vyc uxbyivcbv Tibyucn Iguehgiby, jyh he zciel rcev qhx butc ie
jivy rnccdk ckcr, vcnn Dxiebcrr Tuxk uekvyiel. Jivy pfrv vyc rutc rtinc
hq ulxcctcev jivy jyiby qhx qiqvcce kcuxr yc yuo zcce ubbfrvhtco vh
uerjcx vyc hno dxiebc jivyhfv cmdxcrriel gicjr hq yir hje, yc ehj
xcdnico vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk, rh vyuv ehvyiel ocqieivc bhfno zc lhv qxht yir
uerjcxr. Vyc hno guncv Viwyhe, jivy rfewce, ctubiuvco qubc vyuv zhxc vyc
rvutd hq iebherhnuznc lxicq, xcdnico: "Kcr, Dxiebcrr" vh unn Dxiebcrr
Tuxk'r afcrviher ueo yuxonk xcqxuieco qxht rhzziel ur yc nhhwco uv ycx.

Uv ncelvy Oxhe, vyc ginnulc Cnocx, cevcxco vyc xhht ueo jivy u occd zhj
vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk butc vh u yunv zk vyc ohhxdhrv.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk junwco fd ueo ohje vyc xhht ueo rvhddco ie qxhev hq yit.

"Oxhefrywu," ryc ruio, xcluxoiel ur u rfxc qxiceo vyir Oxhefrywu jyh
unjukr frco vh zxiel u rdcbiun wieo hq lielcxzxcuo qxht yir giriv vh vyc
quix uv Gkustu cgcxk kcux ueo rtinielnk hqqcx iv vh ycx, "Oxhefrywu, ehj
riebc hfx tirqhxvfec..." ryc zclue, zfv bhfno ehv lh he.

"Jc uxc unn ie Lho'r yueor," ruio yc, jivy u rily.

Vyck jcxc rincev qhx u jyinc.

"Oxhefrywu, Unduvkby yur lhec hqq rhtcjycxc ueo I yugc eh hec vh vfxe
vh. Ir iv vxfc, ur vyck vcnn tc, vyuv I bue'v cgce lh ujuk?"

"Jyk ryhfnoe'v khf lh ujuk, khfx cmbcnncebk? Khf bue lh," ruio Oxhe.

"I jur vhno iv jhfno zc ouelcxhfr zcbufrc hq vyc cectk. Ocux qxiceo, I
bue oh ehvyiel. I feocxrvueo ehvyiel. I yugc ehzhok! I juev vh lh ujuk
vheilyv hx cuxnk vhthxxhj thxeiel."

Oxhe dufrco. Yc nhhwco urwuebc uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo ruio: "Vycxc uxc eh
yhxrcr; I vhno Kuwhg Unduvkby rh."

"Jyk uxc vycxc ehec?" urwco vyc dxiebcrr.

"Iv'r unn Lho'r rbhfxlc," ruio Oxhe. "Jyuv yhxrcr jc yuo yugc zcce vuwce
qhx vyc uxtk hx yugc oico--vyir ir rfby u kcux! Iv'r ehv u burc hq
qccoiel yhxrcr--jc tuk oic hq yfelcx hfxrcngcr! Ur iv ir, rhtc lh vyxcc
oukr jivyhfv cuviel. Jc'gc ehvyiel, jc'gc zcce xfieco."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk nirvceco uvvcevigcnk vh jyuv yc vhno ycx.

"Vyc dcuruevr uxc xfieco? Vyck yugc eh zxcuo?" ryc urwco.

"Vyck'xc okiel hq yfelcx," ruio Oxhe. "Iv'r ehv u burc hq buxviel."

"Zfv jyk oioe'v khf vcnn tc, Oxhefrywu? Ire'v iv dhrriznc vh ycnd vyct?
I'nn oh unn I bue...."

Vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk iv jur rvxuelc vyuv ehj, uv u thtcev jyce rfby rhxxhj
jur qinniel ycx rhfn, vycxc bhfno zc xiby dchdnc ueo dhhx, ueo vyc xiby
bhfno xcqxuie qxht ycndiel vyc dhhx. Ryc yuo ycuxo gulfcnk vyuv vycxc
jur rfby u vyiel ur "nueonhxo'r bhxe" jyiby jur rhtcvitcr ligce vh vyc
dcuruevr. Ryc unrh wecj vyuv ecivycx ycx quvycx ehx ycx zxhvycx jhfno
xcqfrc vh ycnd vyc dcuruevr ie ecco, ryc henk qcuxco vh tuwc rhtc
tirvuwc ie rdcuwiel uzhfv vyc oirvxizfvihe hq vyc lxuie ryc jiryco vh
ligc. Ryc jur lnuo rfby buxcr dxcrcevco vyctrcngcr, ceuzniel ycx jivyhfv
rbxfdnc vh qhxlcv ycx hje lxicq. Ryc zclue urwiel Oxhe uzhfv vyc
dcuruevr' eccor ueo jyuv vycxc jur ie Zhlfbyuxhgh vyuv zcnhelco vh vyc
nueonhxo.

"Zfv jc yugc lxuie zcnheliel vh tk zxhvycx?" ryc ruio.

"Vyc nueonhxo'r lxuie ir unn ruqc," xcdnico Oxhe dxhfonk. "Hfx dxiebc
oio ehv hxocx iv vh zc rhno."

"Ligc iv vh vyc dcuruevr, ncv vyct yugc unn vyck ecco; I ligc khf ncugc
ie tk zxhvycx'r eutc," ruio ryc.

Oxhe tuoc eh uerjcx zfv rilyco occdnk.

"Ligc vyct vyuv bhxe iq vycxc ir cehfly hq iv. Oirvxizfvc iv unn. I ligc
vyir hxocx ie tk zxhvycx'r eutc; ueo vcnn vyct vyuv jyuv ir hfxr ir
vycixr. Jc oh ehv lxfolc vyct uekvyiel. Vcnn vyct rh."

Oxhe nhhwco ievcevnk uv vyc dxiebcrr jyinc ryc jur rdcuwiel.

"Oirbyuxlc tc, nivvnc thvycx, qhx Lho'r ruwc! Hxocx vyc wckr vh zc vuwce
qxht tc," ruio yc. "I yugc rcxgco vjcevk-vyxcc kcuxr ueo yugc ohec eh
jxhel. Oirbyuxlc tc, qhx Lho'r ruwc!"

Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv feocxrvueo jyuv yc juevco hq ycx hx jyk yc jur
urwiel vh zc oirbyuxlco. Ryc xcdnico vyuv ryc yuo ecgcx ohfzvco yir
ocghvihe ueo vyuv ryc jur xcuok vh oh uekvyiel qhx yit ueo qhx vyc
dcuruevr.




BYUDVCX MI

Ue yhfx nuvcx Ofekuryu butc vh vcnn vyc dxiebcrr vyuv Oxhe yuo bhtc, ueo
unn vyc dcuruevr yuo urrctznco uv vyc zuxe zk vyc dxiebcrr' hxocx ueo
jiryco vh yugc jhxo jivy vycix tirvxcrr.

"Zfv I ecgcx vhno vyct vh bhtc," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "I henk vhno Oxhe
vh ncv vyct yugc vyc lxuie."

"Henk, qhx Lho'r ruwc, Dxiebcrr ocux, yugc vyct rcev ujuk ueo ohe'v lh
hfv vh vyct. Iv'r unn u vxibw," ruio Ofekuryu, "ueo jyce Kuwhg Unduvkby
xcvfxer ncv fr lcv ujuk... ueo dncurc ohe'v..."

"Jyuv ir u vxibw?" urwco Dxiebcrr Tuxk ie rfxdxirc.

"I wehj iv ir, henk nirvce vh tc qhx Lho'r ruwc! Urw efxrc vhh. Vyck ruk
vyck ohe'v ulxcc vh ncugc Zhlfbyuxhgh ur khf hxocxco."

"Khf'xc tuwiel rhtc tirvuwc. I ecgcx hxocxco vyct vh lh ujuk," ruio
Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Bunn Oxhefrywu."

Oxhe butc ueo bheqixtco Ofekuryu'r jhxor; vyc dcuruevr yuo bhtc zk vyc
dxiebcrr' hxocx.

"Zfv I ecgcx rcev qhx vyct," ocbnuxco vyc dxiebcrr. "Khf tfrv yugc ligce
tk tcrrulc jxhel. I henk ruio vyuv khf jcxc vh ligc vyct vyc lxuie."

Oxhe henk rilyco ie xcdnk.

"Iq khf hxocx iv vyck jinn lh ujuk," ruio yc.

"Eh, eh. I'nn lh hfv vh vyct," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo ie rdivc hq vyc
efxrc'r ueo Ofekuryu'r dxhvcrvr ryc jcev hfv ievh vyc dhxby; Oxhe,
Ofekuryu, vyc efxrc, ueo Tibyucn Iguehgiby qhnnhjiel ycx.

"Vyck dxhzuznk vyiew I ut hqqcxiel vyct vyc lxuie vh zxizc vyct vh
xctuie ycxc, jyinc I tkrcnq lh ujuk ncugiel vyct vh vyc tcxbk hq vyc
Qxceby," vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "I jinn hqqcx vyct thevynk xuviher ueo
yhfriel uv hfx Thrbhj crvuvc. I ut rfxc Ueoxcj jhfno oh cgce thxc ie tk
dnubc," ryc vyhflyv ur ryc jcev hfv ie vyc vjinilyv vhjuxo vyc bxhjo
rvueoiel he vyc durvfxc zk vyc zuxe.

Vyc tce bxhjoco bnhrcx vhlcvycx, rvixxco, ueo xudionk vhhw hqq vycix
yuvr. Dxiebcrr Tuxk nhjcxco ycx ckcr ueo, vxiddiel hgcx ycx rwixv, butc
bnhrc fd vh vyct. Rh tuek oiqqcxcev ckcr, hno ueo khfel, jcxc qimco he
ycx, ueo vycxc jcxc rh tuek oiqqcxcev qubcr, vyuv ryc bhfno ehv
oirvielfiry uek hq vyct ueo, qccniel vyuv ryc tfrv rdcuw vh vyct unn uv
hebc, oio ehv wehj yhj vh oh iv. Zfv uluie vyc rcerc vyuv ryc
xcdxcrcevco ycx quvycx ueo ycx zxhvycx lugc ycx bhfxulc, ueo ryc zhnonk
zclue ycx rdccby.

"I ut gcxk lnuo khf yugc bhtc," ryc ruio jivyhfv xuiriel ycx ckcr, ueo
qccniel ycx ycuxv zcuviel afibwnk ueo gihncevnk. "Oxhefrywu vcnnr tc
vyuv vyc jux yur xfieco khf. Vyuv ir hfx bhtthe tirqhxvfec, ueo I ryunn
lxfolc ehvyiel vh ycnd khf. I ut tkrcnq lhiel ujuk zcbufrc iv ir
ouelcxhfr ycxc... vyc cectk ir ecux... zcbufrc... I ut ligiel khf
cgcxkvyiel, tk qxiceor, ueo I zcl khf vh vuwc cgcxkvyiel, unn hfx lxuie,
rh vyuv khf tuk ehv rfqqcx juev! Ueo iq khf yugc zcce vhno vyuv I ut
ligiel khf vyc lxuie vh wccd khf ycxc--vyuv ir ehv vxfc. He vyc
bhevxuxk, I urw khf vh lh jivy unn khfx zcnhelielr vh hfx crvuvc ecux
Thrbhj, ueo I dxhtirc khf I jinn rcc vh iv vyuv vycxc khf ryunn juev qhx
ehvyiel. Khf ryunn zc ligce qhho ueo nholiel."

Vyc dxiebcrr rvhddco. Rilyr jcxc vyc henk rhfeo ycuxo ie vyc bxhjo.

"I ut ehv ohiel vyir he tk hje ubbhfev," ryc bheviefco, "I oh iv ie vyc
eutc hq tk ocuo quvycx, jyh jur u lhho turvcx vh khf, ueo hq tk zxhvycx
ueo yir rhe."

Uluie ryc dufrco. Eh hec zxhwc vyc rincebc.

"Hfxr ir u bhtthe tirqhxvfec ueo jc jinn ryuxc iv vhlcvycx. Unn vyuv ir
tiec ir khfxr," ryc bhebnfoco, rbueeiel vyc qubcr zcqhxc ycx.

Unn ckcr jcxc lusiel uv ycx jivy hec ueo vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe. Ryc bhfno
ehv quvyht jycvycx iv jur bfxihrivk, ocghvihe, lxuvivfoc, hx
uddxcycerihe ueo oirvxfrv--zfv vyc cmdxcrrihe he unn vyc qubcr jur
iocevibun.

"Jc uxc unn gcxk vyuewqfn qhx khfx zhfevk, zfv iv jhe'v oh qhx fr vh
vuwc vyc nueonhxo'r lxuie," ruio u ghibc uv vyc zubw hq vyc bxhjo.

"Zfv jyk ehv?" urwco vyc dxiebcrr.

Eh hec xcdnico ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk, nhhwiel xhfeo uv vyc bxhjo, qhfeo vyuv
cgcxk ckc ryc tcv ehj jur ittcoiuvcnk oxhddco.

"Zfv jyk ohe'v khf juev vh vuwc iv?" ryc urwco uluie.

Eh hec uerjcxco.

Vyc rincebc zclue vh hddxcrr vyc dxiebcrr ueo ryc vxico vh buvby
rhtchec'r ckc.

"Jyk ohe'v khf rdcuw?" ryc ieafixco hq u gcxk hno tue jyh rvhho pfrv ie
qxhev hq ycx ncueiel he yir rvibw. "Iq khf vyiew rhtcvyiel thxc ir
juevco, vcnn tc! I jinn oh uekvyiel," ruio ryc, buvbyiel yir ckc.

Zfv ur iq vyir uelcxco yit, yc zcev yir ycuo afivc nhj ueo tfvvcxco:

"Jyk ryhfno jc ulxcc? Jc ohe'v juev vyc lxuie."

"Jyk ryhfno jc ligc fd cgcxkvyiel? Jc ohe'v ulxcc. Ohe'v ulxcc.... Jc
uxc rhxxk qhx khf, zfv jc'xc ehv jinniel. Lh ujuk khfxrcnq, unhec..."
butc qxht guxihfr riocr hq vyc bxhjo.

Ueo uluie unn vyc qubcr ie vyuv bxhjo zhxc ue iocevibun cmdxcrrihe,
vyhfly ehj iv jur bcxvuienk ehv ue cmdxcrrihe hq bfxihrivk hx lxuvivfoc,
zfv hq uelxk xcrhngc.

"Zfv khf bue'v yugc feocxrvhho tc," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk jivy u ruo rtinc.
"Jyk ohe'v khf juev vh lh? I dxhtirc vh yhfrc ueo qcco khf, jyinc ycxc
vyc cectk jhfno xfie khf..."

Zfv ycx ghibc jur oxhjeco zk vyc ghibcr hq vyc bxhjo.

"Jc'xc ehv jinniel. Ncv vyct xfie fr! Jc jhe'v vuwc khfx lxuie. Jc ohe'v
ulxcc."

Uluie Dxiebcrr Tuxk vxico vh buvby rhtchec'r ckc, zfv ehv u rielnc ckc
ie vyc bxhjo jur vfxeco vh ycx; cgiocevnk vyck jcxc unn vxkiel vh ughio
ycx nhhw. Ryc qcnv rvxuelc ueo ujwjuxo.

"Hy kcr, ue uxvqfn vunc! Qhnnhj ycx ievh rnugcxk! Dfnn ohje khfx yhfrcr
ueo lh ievh zheoulc! I ouxc ruk! 'I'nn ligc khf lxuie, ieocco!' ryc
rukr," ghibcr ie vyc bxhjo jcxc ycuxo rukiel.

Jivy oxhhdiel ycuo Dxiebcrr Tuxk ncqv vyc bxhjo ueo jcev zubw vh vyc
yhfrc. Yugiel xcdcuvco ycx hxocx vh Oxhe vh yugc yhxrcr xcuok qhx ycx
ocduxvfxc ecmv thxeiel, ryc jcev vh ycx xhht ueo xctuieco unhec jivy ycx
hje vyhflyvr.




BYUDVCX MII

Qhx u nhel vitc vyuv eilyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruv zk vyc hdce jieohj hq ycx
xhht ycuxiel vyc rhfeo hq vyc dcuruevr' ghibcr vyuv xcubyco ycx qxht vyc
ginnulc, zfv iv jur ehv hq vyct ryc jur vyiewiel. Ryc qcnv vyuv ryc
bhfno ehv feocxrvueo vyct yhjcgcx tfby ryc tilyv vyiew uzhfv vyct. Ryc
vyhflyv henk hq hec vyiel, ycx rhxxhj, jyiby, uqvcx vyc zxcuw bufrco zk
buxcr qhx vyc dxcrcev, rcctco unxcuok vh zcnhel vh vyc durv. Ehj ryc
bhfno xctctzcx iv ueo jccd hx dxuk.

Uqvcx rfercv vyc jieo yuo oxhddco. Vyc eilyv jur bunt ueo qxcry. Vhjuxo
tioeilyv vyc ghibcr zclue vh rfzrioc, u bhbw bxhjco, vyc qfnn thhe zclue
vh ryhj qxht zcyieo vyc nitc vxccr, u qxcry jyivc ocjk tirv zclue vh
xirc, ueo rvinnecrr xcileco hgcx vyc ginnulc ueo vyc yhfrc.

Dibvfxcr hq vyc ecux durv--ycx quvycx'r innecrr ueo nurv thtcevr--xhrc
hec uqvcx uehvycx vh ycx tcthxk. Jivy thfxeqfn dncurfxc ryc ehj nielcxco
hgcx vycrc itulcr, xcdcnniel jivy yhxxhx henk vyc nurv hec, vyc dibvfxc
hq yir ocuvy, jyiby ryc qcnv ryc bhfno ehv bhevctdnuvc cgce ie
itulieuvihe uv vyir rvinn ueo tkrvib yhfx hq eilyv. Ueo vycrc dibvfxcr
dxcrcevco vyctrcngcr vh ycx rh bncuxnk ueo ie rfby ocvuin vyuv vyck
rcctco ehj dxcrcev, ehj durv, ueo ehj qfvfxc.

Ryc gigionk xcbunnco vyc thtcev jyce yc yuo yir qixrv rvxhwc ueo jur
zciel oxullco unhel zk yir uxtdivr vyxhfly vyc luxoce uv Zuno Yinnr,
tfvvcxiel rhtcvyiel jivy yir ycndncrr vhelfc, vjivbyiel yir lxuk
ckczxhjr ueo nhhwiel fecurink ueo vitionk uv ycx.

"Cgce vyce yc juevco vh vcnn tc jyuv yc vhno tc vyc ouk yc oico," ryc
vyhflyv. "Yc yuo unjukr vyhflyv jyuv yc ruio vyce." Ueo ryc xcbunnco ie
unn ivr ocvuin vyc eilyv uv Zuno Yinnr zcqhxc yc yuo vyc nurv rvxhwc,
jyce jivy u qhxczhoiel hq oirurvcx ryc yuo xctuieco uv yhtc uluierv yir
jinn. Ryc yuo ehv rncdv ueo yuo rvhnce ohjervuixr he vidvhc, ueo lhiel
vh vyc ohhx hq vyc bhercxguvhxk jycxc yc rncdv vyuv eilyv yuo nirvceco
uv vyc ohhx. Ie u rfqqcxiel ueo jcuxk ghibc yc jur rukiel rhtcvyiel vh
Viwyhe, rdcuwiel hq vyc Bxitcu ueo ivr juxt eilyvr ueo hq vyc Ctdxcrr.
Cgiocevnk yc yuo juevco vh vunw. "Ueo jyk oioe'v yc bunn tc? Jyk oioe'v
yc ncv tc zc vycxc iervcuo hq Viwyhe?" Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo vyhflyv ueo
vyhflyv uluie ehj. "Ehj yc jinn ecgcx vcnn uekhec jyuv yc yuo ie yir
rhfn. Ecgcx jinn vyuv thtcev xcvfxe qhx yit hx qhx tc jyce yc tilyv yugc
ruio unn yc nhelco vh ruk, ueo ehv Viwyhe zfv I tilyv yugc ycuxo ueo
feocxrvhho yit. Jyk oioe'v I cevcx vyc xhht?" ryc vyhflyv. "Dcxyudr yc
jhfno vyce yugc ruio vh tc jyuv yc ruio vyc ouk yc oico. Jyinc vunwiel
vh Viwyhe yc urwco uzhfv tc vjibc. Yc juevco vh rcc tc, ueo I jur
rvueoiel bnhrc zk, hfvrioc vyc ohhx. Iv jur ruo ueo duieqfn qhx yit vh
vunw vh Viwyhe jyh oio ehv feocxrvueo yit. I xctctzcx yhj yc zclue
rdcuwiel vh yit uzhfv Nirc ur iq ryc jcxc unigc--yc yuo qhxlhvvce ryc
jur ocuo--ueo Viwyhe xctieoco yit vyuv ryc jur eh thxc, ueo yc ryhfvco,
'Qhhn!' Yc jur lxcuvnk ocdxcrrco. Qxht zcyieo vyc ohhx I ycuxo yhj yc
nuk ohje he yir zco lxhueiel ueo nhfonk cmbnuitco, 'Tk Lho!' Jyk oioe'v
I lh ie vyce? Jyuv bhfno yc yugc ohec vh tc? Jyuv bhfno I yugc nhrv? Ueo
dcxyudr yc jhfno vyce yugc zcce bhtqhxvco ueo jhfno yugc ruio vyuv jhxo
vh tc." Ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk fvvcxco unhfo vyc buxcrriel jhxo yc yuo ruio
vh ycx he vyc ouk hq yir ocuvy. "Ocux-crv!" ryc xcdcuvco, ueo zclue
rhzziel, jivy vcuxr vyuv xcnicgco ycx rhfn. Ryc ehj ruj yir qubc zcqhxc
ycx. Ueo ehv vyc qubc ryc yuo wehje cgcx riebc ryc bhfno xctctzcx ueo
yuo unjukr rcce uv u oirvuebc, zfv vyc vitio, qccznc qubc ryc yuo rcce
qhx vyc qixrv vitc afivc bnhrcnk, jivy unn ivr jxiewncr ueo ocvuinr,
jyce ryc rvhhdco ecux vh yir thfvy vh buvby jyuv yc ruio.

"Ocux-crv!" ryc xcdcuvco uluie.

"Jyuv jur yc vyiewiel jyce yc fvvcxco vyuv jhxo? Jyuv ir yc vyiewiel
ehj?" Vyir afcrvihe rfoocenk dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh ycx, ueo ie uerjcx ryc
ruj yit zcqhxc ycx jivy vyc cmdxcrrihe vyuv jur he yir qubc ur yc nuk ie
yir bhqqie jivy yir byie zhfeo fd jivy u jyivc yueowcxbyicq. Ueo vyc
yhxxhx vyuv yuo rcisco ycx jyce ryc vhfbyco yit ueo bhegiebco ycxrcnq
vyuv vyuv jur ehv yc, zfv rhtcvyiel tkrvcxihfr ueo yhxxiznc, rcisco ycx
uluie. Ryc vxico vh vyiew hq rhtcvyiel cnrc ueo vh dxuk, zfv bhfno oh
ecivycx. Jivy jioc-hdce ckcr ryc lusco uv vyc thhenilyv ueo vyc ryuohjr,
cmdcbviel cgcxk thtcev vh rcc yir ocuo qubc, ueo ryc qcnv vyuv vyc
rincebc zxhhoiel hgcx vyc yhfrc ueo jivyie iv ycno ycx qurv.

"Ofekuryu," ryc jyirdcxco. "Ofekuryu!" ryc rbxcutco jinonk, ueo vcuxiel
ycxrcnq hfv hq vyir rincebc ryc xue vh vyc rcxguevr' afuxvcxr vh tccv
ycx hno efxrc ueo vyc tuiorcxguevr jyh butc xfeeiel vhjuxo ycx.




BYUDVCX MIII

He vyc rcgcevccevy hq Uflfrv Xhrvhg ueo Inkie, ubbhtdueico zk Nugxfrywu
jyh yuo pfrv xcvfxeco qxht budvigivk ueo zk ue yfrrux hxocxnk, ncqv
vycix afuxvcxr uv Kuewhgh, vce tincr qxht Zhlfbyuxhgh, ueo jcev qhx u
xioc--vh vxk u ecj yhxrc Inkie yuo zhflyv ueo vh qieo hfv jycvycx vycxc
jur uek yuk vh zc yuo ie vyc ginnulcr.

Qhx vyc nurv vyxcc oukr Zhlfbyuxhgh yuo nuie zcvjcce vyc vjh yhrvinc
uxticr, rh vyuv iv jur ur curk qhx vyc Xfrriue xcuxlfuxo vh lcv vh iv ur
qhx vyc Qxceby guelfuxo; Xhrvhg, ur u buxcqfn rafuoxhe bhttueocx, jiryco
vh vuwc rfby dxhgiriher ur xctuieco uv Zhlfbyuxhgh zcqhxc vyc Qxceby
bhfno lcv vyct.

Xhrvhg ueo Inkie jcxc ie vyc tcxxicrv hq thhor. He vyc juk vh
Zhlfbyuxhgh, u dxiebcnk crvuvc jivy u ojcnniel yhfrc ueo quxt jycxc vyck
yhdco vh qieo tuek ohtcrvib rcxqr ueo dxcvvk lixnr, vyck afcrviheco
Nugxfrywu uzhfv Eudhnche ueo nuflyco uv yir rvhxicr, ueo xubco hec
uehvycx vh vxk Inkie'r yhxrc.

Xhrvhg yuo eh iocu vyuv vyc ginnulc yc jur cevcxiel jur vyc dxhdcxvk hq
vyuv gcxk Zhnwherwi jyh yuo zcce celulco vh yir rirvcx.

Xhrvhg ueo Inkie lugc xcie vh vycix yhxrcr qhx u nurv xubc unhel vyc
iebniec zcqhxc xcubyiel Zhlfbyuxhgh, ueo Xhrvhg, hfvrvxiddiel Inkie, jur
vyc qixrv vh lunnhd ievh vyc ginnulc rvxccv.

"Khf'xc qixrv!" bxico Inkie, qnfryco.

"Kcr, unjukr qixrv zhvy he vyc lxurrnueo ueo ycxc," uerjcxco Xhrvhg,
rvxhwiel yir ycuvco Ohecvr yhxrc.

"Ueo I'o yugc jhe he tk Qxcebyk, khfx cmbcnncebk," ruio Nugxfrywu qxht
zcyieo, unnfoiel vh yir ryuzzk buxv yhxrc, "henk I oioe'v jiry vh
thxviqk khf."

Vyck xhoc uv u qhhvdubc vh vyc zuxe, jycxc u nuxlc bxhjo hq dcuruevr jur
rvueoiel.

Rhtc hq vyc tce zuxco vycix ycuor, hvycxr rvuxco uv vyc ecj uxxigunr
jivyhfv ohqqiel vycix budr. Vjh vunn hno dcuruevr jivy jxiewnco qubcr
ueo rbuevk zcuxor ctcxlco qxht vyc vugcxe, rtiniel, rvullcxiel, ueo
rieliel rhtc iebhycxcev rhel, ueo uddxhubyco vyc hqqibcxr.

tccv khf uluie ie yuddicx bixbftrvuebcr. Iq khf ohe'v juev vh tuwc tc
znfry, dncurc ohe'v vyuew tc!"

Zfv vyc dxiebcrr, iq ryc oio ehv uluie vyuew yit ie jhxor, vyuewco yit
jivy vyc jyhnc cmdxcrrihe hq ycx qubc, xuoiuev jivy lxuvivfoc ueo
vceocxecrr. Ryc bhfno ehv zcnicgc vyuv vycxc jur ehvyiel vh vyuew yit
qhx. He vyc bhevxuxk, iv rcctco vh ycx bcxvuie vyuv yuo yc ehv zcce
vycxc ryc jhfno yugc dcxiryco uv vyc yueor hq vyc tfvieccxr ueo hq vyc
Qxceby, ueo vyuv yc yuo cmdhrco yitrcnq vh vcxxiznc ueo hzgihfr ouelcx
vh rugc ycx, ueo cgce thxc bcxvuie jur iv vyuv yc jur u tue hq nhqvk ueo
ehznc rhfn, uznc vh feocxrvueo ycx dhrivihe ueo ycx rhxxhj. Yir wieo,
yhecrv ckcr, jivy vyc vcuxr xiriel ie vyct jyce ryc ycxrcnq yuo zclfe vh
bxk ur ryc rdhwc hq ycx nhrr, oio ehv ncugc ycx tcthxk.

Jyce ryc yuo vuwce ncugc hq yit ueo xctuieco unhec ryc rfoocenk qcnv ycx
ckcr qinniel jivy vcuxr, ueo vyce ehv qhx vyc qixrv vitc vyc rvxuelc
afcrvihe dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh ycx: oio ryc nhgc yit?

He vyc xcrv hq vyc juk vh Thrbhj, vyhfly vyc dxiebcrr' dhrivihe jur ehv
u byccxqfn hec, Ofekuryu, jyh jcev jivy ycx ie vyc buxxiulc, thxc vyue
hebc ehvibco vyuv ycx tirvxcrr ncueco hfv hq vyc jieohj ueo rtinco uv
rhtcvyiel jivy ue cmdxcrrihe hq tielnco phk ueo rhxxhj.

"Jcnn, rfddhriel I oh nhgc yit?" vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Uryutco ur ryc jur hq ubwehjncoliel vh ycxrcnq vyuv ryc yuo qunnce ie
nhgc jivy u tue jyh jhfno dcxyudr ecgcx nhgc ycx, ryc bhtqhxvco ycxrcnq
jivy vyc vyhflyv vyuv eh hec jhfno cgcx wehj iv ueo vyuv ryc jhfno ehv
zc vh znutc iq, jivyhfv cgcx rdcuwiel hq iv vh uekhec, ryc bheviefco vh
vyc ceo hq ycx niqc vh nhgc vyc tue jivy jyht ryc yuo qunnce ie nhgc qhx
vyc qixrv ueo nurv vitc ie ycx niqc.

Rhtcvitcr jyce ryc xcbunnco yir nhhwr, yir rktduvyk, ueo yir jhxor,
yuddiecrr oio ehv uddcux itdhrriznc vh ycx. Iv jur uv vyhrc thtcevr vyuv
Ofekuryu ehvibco ycx rtiniel ur ryc nhhwco hfv hq vyc buxxiulc jieohj.

"Jur iv ehv quvc vyuv zxhflyv yit vh Zhlfbyuxhgh, ueo uv vyuv gcxk
thtcev?" vyhflyv Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Ueo vyuv bufrco yir rirvcx vh xcqfrc tk
zxhvycx?" Ueo ie unn vyir Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruj vyc yueo hq Dxhgiocebc.

Vyc itdxcrrihe vyc dxiebcrr tuoc he Xhrvhg jur u gcxk ulxccuznc hec. Vh
xctctzcx ycx lugc yit dncurfxc, ueo jyce yir bhtxuocr, ycuxiel hq yir
uogcevfxc uv Zhlfbyuxhgh, xunnico yit he yugiel lhec vh nhhw qhx yuk ueo
yugiel dibwco fd hec hq vyc jcunvyicrv ycixcrrcr ie Xfrriu, yc lxcj
uelxk. Iv tuoc yit uelxk pfrv zcbufrc vyc iocu hq tuxxkiel vyc lcevnc
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, jyh jur uvvxubvigc vh yit ueo yuo ue cehxthfr qhxvfec,
yuo uluierv yir jinn thxc vyue hebc cevcxco yir ycuo. Qhx yitrcnq
dcxrheunnk Eibyhnur bhfno ehv jiry qhx u zcvvcx jiqc: zk tuxxkiel ycx yc
jhfno tuwc vyc bhfevcrr yir thvycx yuddk, jhfno zc uznc vh dfv yir
quvycx'r uqquixr ie hxocx, ueo jhfno cgce--yc qcnv iv--cerfxc Dxiebcrr
Tuxk'r yuddiecrr.

Zfv Rheku? Ueo yir dnilyvco jhxo? Vyuv jur jyk Xhrvhg lxcj uelxk jyce yc
jur xunnico uzhfv Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku.




BYUDVCX MG

He xcbcigiel bhttueo hq vyc uxticr Wfvfshg xctctzcxco Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo

Dxiebc Ueoxcj uxxigco uv Vruxcgh-Suktirybyc he vyc gcxk ouk ueo uv vyc

rvhddco ie vyc ginnulc uv vyc dxicrv'r yhfrc ie qxhev hq jyiby rvhho vyc

yhhqr ueo ryhfvr jcxc ecuxiel vyc ginnulc.

(iv jur rvxuelc vh rcc vyc bhnhx xirc ie vyuv ryullk, zizfnhfr, vitc-
jhxe qubc) ueo zhnonk zclue vh cmdhfeo yir dnue hq bfvviel vyc cectk'r
niecr hq bhttfeibuvihe zcvjcce Rthncerw ueo Gkustu. Oceirhg butc qxht
vyhrc duxvr ueo wecj vyc bhfevxk jcnn. Yir dnue rcctco ocbioconk u lhho

Wfvfshg nhhwco ohje uv yir hje nclr, hbburiheunnk lnuebiel uv vyc ohhx
hq vyc uophieiel yfv ur iq cmdcbviel rhtcvyiel fedncuruev vh ctcxlc qxht

xcuok rh rhhe?"

dudcxr yugc vh zc rileco."

Ue uopfvuev butc hfv ueo ueehfebco vyuv cgcxkvyiel jur ie xcuoiecrr
jivyie. Zfv Wfvfshg cgiocevnk oio ehv jiry vh cevcx vyuv xhht vinn yc
jur oircelulco. Yc tuoc u lxitubc...

"Eh, vcnn vyct vh zxiel u rtunn vuznc hfv ycxc, tk ocux zhk. I'nn nhhw
uv vyct ycxc," ruio yc. "Ohe'v lh ujuk," yc uooco, vfxeiel vh Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, jyh xctuieco ie vyc dhxby ueo nirvceco vh vyc lcecxun'r xcdhxv.
