lnuebiel vyuv juk yc ehvibco zcyieo vyuv ohhx u dnftd, xhrk, yueorhtc
jhtue ie u diew oxcrr jivy u ninub rinw wcxbyicq he ycx ycuo, yhnoiel u
oiry ueo cgiocevnk ujuiviel vyc cevxuebc hq vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq.
Wfvfshg'r uopfvuev jyirdcxco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj vyuv vyir jur vyc jiqc hq
vyc dxicrv jyhrc yhtc iv jur, ueo vyuv ryc ievceoco vh hqqcx yir Rcxcec
Yilyecrr zxcuo ueo runv. "Ycx yfrzueo yur jcnbhtco yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr
jivy vyc bxhrr uv vyc byfxby, ueo ryc ievceor vh jcnbhtc yit ie vyc
yhfrc.... Ryc'r gcxk dxcvvk," uooco vyc uopfvuev jivy u rtinc. Uv vyhrc
jhxor Wfvfshg nhhwco xhfeo. Yc jur nirvceiel vh vyc lcecxun'r xcdhxv--
jyiby bherirvco byicqnk hq u bxivibirt hq vyc dhrivihe uv Vruxcgh-
Suktirybyc--ur yc yuo nirvceco vh Oceirhg, ueo rcgce kcuxr dxcgihfrnk
yuo nirvceco vh vyc oirbfrrihe uv vyc Ufrvcxnivs bhfebin hq jux. Yc
cgiocevnk nirvceco henk zcbufrc yc yuo cuxr jyiby, vyhfly vycxc jur u
dicbc hq vhj ie hec hq vyct, bhfno ehv ycnd ycuxiel; zfv iv jur cgiocev
vyuv ehvyiel vyc lcecxun bhfno ruk jhfno rfxdxirc hx cgce ievcxcrv yit,
vyuv yc wecj unn vyuv jhfno zc ruio zcqhxcyueo, ueo ycuxo iv unn henk
zcbufrc yc yuo vh, ur hec yur vh nirvce vh vyc byueviel hq u rcxgibc hq
dxukcx. Unn vyuv Oceirhg yuo ruio jur bncgcx ueo vh vyc dhiev. Jyuv vyc
lcecxun jur rukiel jur cgce thxc bncgcx ueo vh vyc dhiev, zfv iv jur
cgiocev vyuv Wfvfshg ocrdirco wehjncolc ueo bncgcxecrr, ueo wecj hq
rhtcvyiel cnrc vyuv jhfno ocbioc vyc tuvvcx--rhtcvyiel ieocdceocev hq
bncgcxecrr ueo wehjncolc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj juvbyco vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r
qubc uvvcevigcnk, ueo vyc henk cmdxcrrihe yc bhfno rcc vycxc jur hec hq
zhxcoht, bfxihrivk ur vh vyc tcueiel hq vyc qctieiec jyirdcxiel zcyieo
vyc ohhx, ueo u ocrixc vh hzrcxgc dxhdxicvk. Iv jur cgiocev vyuv Wfvfshg
ocrdirco bncgcxecrr ueo ncuxeiel ueo cgce vyc duvxihvib qccniel ryhje zk
Oceirhg, zfv ocrdirco vyct ehv zcbufrc hq yir hje ievcnncbv, qccnielr,
hx wehjncolc--yc oio ehv vxk vh oirdnuk uek hq vycrc--zfv zcbufrc hq
rhtcvyiel cnrc. Yc ocrdirco vyct zcbufrc hq yir hno ulc ueo cmdcxicebc
hq niqc. Vyc henk iervxfbvihe Wfvfshg lugc hq yir hje ubbhxo ofxiel vyuv
xcdhxv xcqcxxco vh nhhviel zk vyc Xfrriue vxhhdr. Uv vyc ceo hq vyc
xcdhxv vyc lcecxun dfv zcqhxc yit qhx rileuvfxc u dudcx xcnuviel vh vyc
xcbhgcxk hq duktcev qxht uxtk bhttueocxr qhx lxcce huvr thje ohje zk vyc
rhnoicxr, jyce nueohjecxr nholco dcviviher qhx bhtdceruvihe.

Uqvcx ycuxiel vyc tuvvcx, Wfvfshg rtubwco yir nidr vhlcvycx ueo ryhhw
yir ycuo.

"Ievh vyc rvhgc... ievh vyc qixc jivy iv! I vcnn khf hebc qhx unn, tk
ocux qcnnhj," ruio yc, "ievh vyc qixc jivy unn rfby vyielr! Ncv vyct bfv
vyc bxhdr ueo zfxe jhho vh vycix ycuxvr' bhevcev. I ohe'v hxocx iv hx
unnhj iv, zfv I ohe'v cmubv bhtdceruvihe civycx. Hec bue'v lcv he
jivyhfv iv. 'Jyce jhho ir byhddco vyc byidr jinn qnk.'" Yc nhhwco uv vyc
dudcx uluie. "Hy, vyir Lcxtue dxcbirihe!" yc tfvvcxco, ryuwiel yir ycuo.




BYUDVCX MGI

"Jcnn, vyuv'r unn!" ruio Wfvfshg ur yc rileco vyc nurv hq vyc ohbftcevr,
ueo xiriel ycugink ueo rthhvyiel hfv vyc qhnor ie yir quv jyivc ecbw yc
thgco vhjuxo vyc ohhx jivy u thxc byccxqfn cmdxcrrihe.

Vyc dxicrv'r jiqc, qnfryiel xhrk xco, buflyv fd vyc oiry ryc yuo uqvcx
unn ehv tueulco vh dxcrcev uv vyc xilyv thtcev, vyhfly ryc yuo rh nhel
zcce dxcduxiel qhx iv, ueo jivy u nhj zhj hqqcxco iv vh Wfvfshg.

Yc rbxcjco fd yir ckcr, rtinco, niqvco ycx byie jivy yir yueo, ueo ruio:

"Uy, jyuv u zcufvk! Vyuew khf, rjccvycuxv!"

Yc vhhw rhtc lhno dicbcr qxht yir vxhfrcx dhbwcv ueo dfv vyct he vyc
oiry qhx ycx. "Jcnn, tk ocux, ueo yhj uxc jc lcvviel he?" yc urwco,
thgiel vh vyc ohhx hq vyc xhht urrileco vh yit. Vyc dxicrv'r jiqc
rtinco, ueo jivy oitdncr ie ycx xhrk byccwr qhnnhjco yit ievh vyc xhht.
Vyc uopfvuev butc hfv vh vyc dhxby ueo urwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh nfeby jivy
yit. Yunq ue yhfx nuvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur uluie bunnco vh Wfvfshg. Yc
qhfeo yit xcbnieiel ie ue uxtbyuix, rvinn ie vyc rutc fezfvvheco
hgcxbhuv. Yc yuo ie yir yueo u Qxceby zhhw jyiby yc bnhrco ur Dxiebc
Ueoxcj cevcxco, tuxwiel vyc dnubc jivy u weiqc. Dxiebc Ueoxcj ruj zk vyc
bhgcx vyuv iv jur Ncr Bycgunicxr of Bklec zk Tuoutc oc Lcenir.

"Jcnn, riv ohje, riv ohje ycxc. Ncv'r yugc u vunw," ruio Wfvfshg. "Iv'r
ruo, gcxk ruo. Zfv xctctzcx, tk ocux qcnnhj, vyuv I ut u quvycx vh khf,
u rcbheo quvycx...."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhno Wfvfshg unn yc wecj hq yir quvycx'r ocuvy, ueo jyuv
yc yuo rcce uv Zuno Yinnr jyce yc durrco vyxhfly iv.

"Jyuv... jyuv vyck yugc zxhflyv fr vh!" Wfvfshg rfoocenk bxico ie ue
ulivuvco ghibc, cgiocevnk dibvfxiel gigionk vh yitrcnq qxht Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r rvhxk vyc bheoivihe Xfrriu jur ie. "Zfv ligc tc vitc, ligc tc
vitc!" yc ruio jivy u lxit nhhw, cgiocevnk ehv jiryiel vh bheviefc vyir
ulivuviel bhegcxruvihe, ueo uooco: "I rcev qhx khf vh wccd khf jivy tc."

"I vyuew khfx Rcxcec Yilyecrr, zfv I qcux I ut eh nhelcx qiv qhx vyc
rvuqq," xcdnico Dxiebc Ueoxcj jivy u rtinc jyiby Wfvfshg ehvibco.

Wfvfshg lnuebco ieafixielnk uv yit.

"Zfv uzhgc unn," uooco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "I yugc lxhje frco vh tk xclitcev,
ut qheo hq vyc hqqibcxr, ueo I quebk vyc tce unrh niwc tc. I ryhfno zc
rhxxk vh ncugc vyc xclitcev. Iq I ocbniec vyc yhehx hq zciel jivy khf,
zcnicgc tc..."

U ryxcjo, wieonk, kcv rfzvnk ocxirigc cmdxcrrihe niv fd Wfvfshg'r dholk
qubc. Yc bfv Zhnwherwi ryhxv.

"I ut rhxxk, qhx I ecco khf. Zfv khf'xc xilyv, khf'xc xilyv! Iv'r ehv
ycxc vyuv tce uxc eccoco. Uogircxr uxc unjukr dnceviqfn, zfv tce uxc
ehv. Vyc xclitcevr jhfno ehv zc jyuv vyck uxc iq vyc jhfno-zc uogircxr
rcxgco vycxc ur khf oh. I xctctzcx khf uv Ufrvcxnivs.... I xctctzcx,
kcr, I xctctzcx khf jivy vyc rvueouxo!" ruio Wfvfshg, ueo u qnfry hq
dncurfxc rfqqfrco Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r qubc uv vyir xcbhnncbvihe.

Vuwiel yir yueo ueo oxujiel yit ohjejuxor, Wfvfshg hqqcxco yir byccw vh
zc wirrco, ueo uluie Dxiebc Ueoxcj ehvibco vcuxr ie vyc hno tue'r ckcr.
Vyhfly Dxiebc Ueoxcj wecj vyuv Wfvfshg'r vcuxr butc curink, ueo vyuv yc
jur duxvibfnuxnk vceocx vh ueo bheriocxuvc hq yit qxht u jiry vh ryhj
rktduvyk jivy yir nhrr, kcv vyir xctieocx hq Ufrvcxnivs jur zhvy
dncuruev ueo qnuvvcxiel vh yit.

"Lh khfx juk ueo Lho zc jivy khf. I wehj khfx duvy ir vyc duvy hq
yhehx!" Yc dufrco. "I tirrco khf uv Zfbyuxcrv, zfv I eccoco rhtchec vh
rceo." Ueo byueliel vyc rfzpcbv, Wfvfshg zclue vh rdcuw hq vyc Vfxwiry

znutco," yc ruio, "zhvy qhx vyuv jux ueo vyc dcubc... zfv cgcxkvyiel
butc uv vyc xilyv vitc. Vhfv gicev u dhiev u bcnfi afi ruiv uvvceoxc. *
Ueo vycxc jcxc ur tuek uogircxr vycxc ur ycxc..." yc jcev he, xcvfxeiel
vh vyc rfzpcbv hq "uogircxr" jyiby cgiocevnk hbbfdico yit. "Uy, vyhrc
uogircxr!" ruio yc. "Iq jc yuo nirvceco vh vyct unn jc ryhfno ehv yugc
tuoc dcubc jivy Vfxwck ueo ryhfno ehv yugc zcce vyxhfly jivy vyuv jux.
Cgcxkvyiel ie yurvc, zfv thxc yurvc, ncrr rdcco. Wutcerwi jhfno yugc
zcce nhrv iq yc yuo ehv oico. Yc rvhxtco qhxvxcrrcr jivy vyixvk vyhfrueo
tce. Iv ir ehv oiqqibfnv vh budvfxc u qhxvxcrr zfv iv ir oiqqibfnv vh
jie u butduile. Qhx vyuv, ehv rvhxtiel ueo uvvubwiel zfv duvicebc ueo
vitc uxc juevco. Wutcerwi rcev rhnoicxr vh Xfrvbyfw, zfv I henk ctdnhkco
vycrc vjh vyielr ueo vhhw thxc qhxvxcrrcr vyue Wutcerwi ueo tuoc vyct
Vfxwr cuv yhxrcqncry!" Yc rjukco yir ycuo. "Ueo vyc Qxceby ryunn vhh,
zcnicgc tc," yc jcev he, lxhjiel juxtcx ueo zcuviel yir bycrv, "I'nn
tuwc vyct cuv yhxrcqncry!" Ueo vcuxr uluie oittco yir ckcr.


* "Cgcxkvyiel bhtcr ie vitc vh yit jyh wehjr yhj vh juiv."

"Zfv ryue'v jc yugc vh ubbcdv zuvvnc?" xctuxwco Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Jc ryunn iq cgcxkzhok juevr iv; iv bue'v zc ycndco.... Zfv zcnicgc tc,
tk ocux zhk, vycxc ir ehvyiel rvxhelcx vyue vyhrc vjh: duvicebc ueo
vitc, vyck jinn oh iv unn. Zfv vyc uogircxr e'cevceocev dur oc bcvvc
hxcinnc, ghinu nc tun. * Rhtc juev u vyiel--hvycxr ohe'v. Jyuv'r hec vh
oh?" yc urwco, cgiocevnk cmdcbviel ue uerjcx. "Jcnn, jyuv oh khf juev fr
vh oh?" yc xcdcuvco ueo yir ckc ryhec jivy u occd, ryxcjo nhhw. "I'nn
vcnn khf jyuv vh oh," yc bheviefco, ur Dxiebc Ueoxcj rvinn oio ehv
xcdnk: "I jinn vcnn khf jyuv vh oh, ueo jyuv I oh. Ouer nc ohfvc, the
bycx," yc dufrco, "uzrvicer-vhi" *(2)--yc uxvibfnuvco vyc Qxceby dxhgcxz
ocnizcxuvcnk.


* "Ohe'v rcc iv vyuv juk, vyuv'r vyc vxhfznc."

* (2) "Jyce ie ohfzv, tk ocux qcnnhj, oh ehvyiel."

"Jcnn, lhho-zk, tk ocux qcnnhj; xctctzcx vyuv jivy unn tk ycuxv I ryuxc
khfx rhxxhj, ueo vyuv qhx khf I ut ehv u Rcxcec Yilyecrr, ehx u dxiebc,
ehx u bhttueocx-ie-byicq, zfv u quvycx! Iq khf juev uekvyiel bhtc
rvxuilyv vh tc. Lhho-zkc, tk ocux zhk."

Uluie yc ctzxubco ueo wirrco Dxiebc Ueoxcj, zfv zcqhxc vyc nuvvcx yuo
ncqv vyc xhht Wfvfshg lugc u rily hq xcnicq ueo jcev he jivy yir
feqieiryco ehgcn, Ncr Bycgunicxr of Bklec zk Tuoutc oc Lcenir.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhfno ehv yugc cmdnuieco yhj hx jyk iv jur, zfv uqvcx vyuv
ievcxgicj jivy Wfvfshg yc jcev zubw vh yir xclitcev xcurrfxco ur vh vyc
lcecxun bhfxrc hq uqquixr ueo ur vh vyc tue vh jyht iv yuo zcce
cevxfrvco. Vyc thxc yc xcunisco vyc uzrcebc hq unn dcxrheun thvigc ie
vyuv hno tue--ie jyht vycxc rcctco vh xctuie henk vyc yuziv hq durriher,
ueo ie dnubc hq ue ievcnncbv (lxhfdiel cgcevr ueo oxujiel bhebnfriher)
henk vyc budubivk buntnk vh bhevctdnuvc vyc bhfxrc hq cgcevr--vyc thxc
xcurrfxco yc jur vyuv cgcxkvyiel jhfno zc ur iv ryhfno. "Yc jinn ehv
zxiel ie uek dnue hq yir hje. Yc jinn ehv ocgirc hx feocxvuwc uekvyiel,"
vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, "zfv yc jinn ycux cgcxkvyiel, xctctzcx
cgcxkvyiel, ueo dfv cgcxkvyiel ie ivr dnubc. Yc jinn ehv yieocx uekvyiel
frcqfn ehx unnhj uekvyiel yuxtqfn. Yc feocxrvueor vyuv vycxc ir
rhtcvyiel rvxhelcx ueo thxc itdhxvuev vyue yir hje jinn--vyc iecgivuznc
bhfxrc hq cgcevr, ueo yc bue rcc vyct ueo lxurd vycix rileiqibuebc, ueo
rcciel vyuv rileiqibuebc bue xcqxuie qxht tcooniel ueo xcehfebc yir
dcxrheun jiry oixcbvco vh rhtcvyiel cnrc. Ueo uzhgc unn," vyhflyv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj, "hec zcnicgcr ie yit zcbufrc yc'r Xfrriue, ocrdivc vyc ehgcn zk
Lcenir ueo vyc Qxceby dxhgcxzr, ueo zcbufrc yir ghibc ryhhw jyce yc
ruio: 'Jyuv vyck yugc zxhflyv fr vh!' ueo yuo u rhz ie iv jyce yc ruio

He rfby qccnielr, thxc hx ncrr oitnk ryuxco zk unn, vyc feueitivk ueo
lcecxun uddxhgun jcxc qhfeoco jivy jyiby, ocrdivc bhfxv ieqnfcebcr, vyc
dhdfnux byhibc hq Wfvfshg ur bhttueocx-ie-byicq jur xcbcigco.




BYUDVCX MGII

Uqvcx vyc Ctdcxhx yuo ncqv Thrbhj, niqc qnhjco he vycxc ie ivr frfun
bhfxrc, ueo ivr bhfxrc jur rh gcxk frfun vyuv iv jur oiqqibfnv vh
xctctzcx vyc xcbcev oukr hq duvxihvib cnuvihe ueo uxohx, yuxo vh zcnicgc
vyuv Xfrriu jur xcunnk ie ouelcx ueo vyuv vyc tctzcxr hq vyc Celniry
Bnfz jcxc unrh rher hq vyc Quvycxnueo xcuok vh rubxiqibc cgcxkvyiel qhx
iv. Vyc hec vyiel vyuv xcbunnco vyc duvxihvib qcxghx cgcxkhec yuo
oirdnukco ofxiel vyc Ctdcxhx'r rvuk jur vyc bunn qhx bhevxizfviher hq
tce ueo theck, u ecbcrrivk vyuv ur rhhe ur vyc dxhtircr yuo zcce tuoc
urrftco u nclun, hqqibiun qhxt ueo zcbutc feughiouznc.

Jivy vyc cectk'r uddxhuby vh Thrbhj, vyc Thrbhgivcr' gicj hq vycix
rivfuvihe oio ehv lxhj thxc rcxihfr zfv he vyc bhevxuxk zcbutc cgce thxc
qxighnhfr, ur unjukr yuddcer jivy dchdnc jyh rcc u lxcuv ouelcx
uddxhubyiel. Uv vyc uddxhuby hq ouelcx vycxc uxc unjukr vjh ghibcr vyuv
rdcuw jivy cafun dhjcx ie vyc yftue rhfn: hec gcxk xcurheuznk vcnnr u
tue vh bheriocx vyc euvfxc hq vyc ouelcx ueo vyc tcuer hq crbudiel iv;
vyc hvycx, rvinn thxc xcurheuznk, rukr vyuv iv ir vhh ocdxcrriel ueo
duieqfn vh vyiew hq vyc ouelcx, riebc iv ir ehv ie tue'r dhjcx vh
qhxcrcc cgcxkvyiel ueo ugcxv vyc lcecxun bhfxrc hq cgcevr, ueo iv ir
vycxcqhxc zcvvcx vh oirxcluxo jyuv ir duieqfn vinn iv bhtcr, ueo vh
vyiew uzhfv jyuv ir dncuruev. Ie rhnivfoc u tue lcecxunnk nirvcer vh vyc
qixrv ghibc, zfv ie rhbicvk vh vyc rcbheo. Rh iv jur ehj jivy vyc
ieyuzivuevr hq Thrbhj. Iv jur nhel riebc dchdnc yuo zcce ur luk ie
Thrbhj ur vyuv kcux.

Xhrvhdbyie'r zxhuoryccvr, ycuoco zk jhhobfvr hq u oxiew ryhd, u dhvtue,
ueo u Thrbhj zfxlycx bunnco Wuxdfrywu Byilixie, "jyh--yugiel zcce u
tiniviutue ueo yugiel yuo xuvycx vhh tfby uv vyc dfz--ycuxo vyuv
Eudhnche jiryco vh bhtc vh Thrbhj, lxcj uelxk, uzfrco vyc Qxceby ie gcxk
zuo nuelfulc, butc hfv hq vyc oxiew ryhd, ueo, feocx vyc rile hq vyc
culnc, zclue vh uooxcrr vyc urrctznco dchdnc," jcxc xcuo ueo oirbfrrco,
vhlcvycx jivy vyc nuvcrv hq Gurini Nghgiby Dfrywie'r zhfvr xitcr.

Ie vyc bhxecx xhht uv vyc bnfz, tctzcxr luvycxco vh xcuo vycrc
zxhuoryccvr, ueo rhtc niwco vyc juk Wuxdfrywu pccxco uv vyc Qxceby,
rukiel: "Vyck jinn rjcnn fd jivy Xfrriue buzzulc, zfxrv jivy hfx
zfbwjycuv dhxxiolc, ueo byhwc vyctrcngcr jivy buzzulc rhfd. Vyck uxc unn
ojuxqr ueo hec dcuruev jhtue jinn vhrr vyxcc hq vyct jivy u yukqhxw."
Hvycxr oio ehv niwc vyuv vhec ueo ruio iv jur rvfdio ueo gfnlux. Iv jur
ruio vyuv Xhrvhdbyie yuo cmdcnnco unn Qxcebytce ueo cgce unn qhxcilecxr
qxht Thrbhj, ueo vyuv vycxc yuo zcce rhtc rdicr ueo ulcevr hq Eudhnche
uthel vyct; zfv vyir jur vhno byicqnk vh ievxhofbc Xhrvhdbyie'r jivvk
xctuxw he vyuv hbburihe. Vyc qhxcilecxr jcxc ocdhxvco vh Eisyei zk zhuv,
ueo Xhrvhdbyie yuo ruio vh vyct ie Qxceby: "Xcevxcs ce ghfrtctcr; cevxcs
ouer nu zuxafc, cv e'ce quivcr dur fec zuxafc oc Byuxhe." * Vycxc jur
vunw hq unn vyc lhgcxetcev hqqibcr yugiel zcce unxcuok xcthgco qxht
Thrbhj, ueo vh vyir Ryieryie'r jivvibirt jur uooco--vyuv qhx vyuv unhec
Thrbhj hflyv vh zc lxuvcqfn vh Eudhnche. Iv jur ruio vyuv Tuthehg'r
xclitcev jhfno bhrv yit cilyv yfeoxco vyhfrueo xfzncr, ueo vyuv Zcsfwyhg
yuo rdcev cgce thxc he yir, zfv vyuv vyc zcrv vyiel uzhfv Zcsfwyhg'r
ubvihe jur vyuv yc yitrcnq jur lhiel vh ohe u feiqhxt ueo xioc uv vyc
ycuo hq yir xclitcev jivyhfv byuxliel uekvyiel qhx vyc ryhj.


* "Vyiew iv hgcx; lcv ievh vyc zuxafc, ueo vuwc buxc ehv vh tuwc iv u
zuxafc hq Byuxhe."

"Khf ohe'v rduxc uekhec," ruio Pfnic Oxfzcvrwuku ur ryc bhnncbvco ueo
dxcrrco vhlcvycx u zfeby hq xugcnco niev jivy ycx vyie, zcxielco
qielcxr.

Pfnic jur dxcduxiel vh ncugc Thrbhj ecmv ouk ueo jur ligiel u quxcjcnn
rhixcc.

"Zcsfwyhg crv xioibfnc, zfv yc ir rh wieo ueo lhho-euvfxco. Jyuv
dncurfxc ir vycxc vh zc rh bufrviafc?"

"U qhxqciv!" bxico u khfel tue ie tiniviu feiqhxt jyht Pfnic bunnco "the
bycgunicx," ueo jyh jur lhiel jivy ycx vh Eisyei.

Ie Pfnic'r rcv, ur ie tuek hvycx bixbncr ie Thrbhj, iv yuo zcce ulxcco
vyuv vyck jhfno rdcuw ehvyiel zfv Xfrriue ueo vyuv vyhrc jyh tuoc u rnid
ueo rdhwc Qxceby ryhfno duk qiecr vh vyc Bhttivvcc hq Ghnfevuxk
Bhevxizfviher.

"Uehvycx qhxqciv qhx u Lunnibirt," ruio u Xfrriue jxivcx jyh jur
dxcrcev. "'Jyuv dncurfxc ir vycxc vh zc' ir ehv Xfrriue!"

"Khf rduxc eh hec," bheviefco Pfnic vh vyc khfel tue jivyhfv yccoiel vyc
ufvyhx'r xctuxw.

"Qhx bufrviafc--I ut lfinvk ueo jinn duk, ueo I ut dxcduxco vh duk uluie
qhx vyc dncurfxc hq vcnniel khf vyc vxfvy. Qhx Lunnibirtr I jhe'v zc
xcrdheriznc," ryc xctuxwco, vfxeiel vh vyc ufvyhx: "I yugc ecivycx vyc
theck ehx vyc vitc, niwc Dxiebc Lunivrke, vh celulc u turvcx vh vcuby tc
Xfrriue!"

"Uy, ycxc yc ir!" ryc uooco. "Afueo he... Eh, eh," ryc ruio vh vyc
tiniviu hqqibcx, "khf jhe'v buvby tc. Rdcuw hq vyc rfe ueo khf rcc ivr
xukr!" ueo ryc rtinco utiuznk uv Dicxxc. "Jc jcxc pfrv vunwiel hq khf,"
ryc ruio jivy vyc qubinivk ie nkiel euvfxun vh u rhbicvk jhtue. "Jc jcxc
rukiel vyuv khfx xclitcev jhfno zc rfxc vh zc zcvvcx vyue Tuthehg'r."

"Hy, ohe'v vunw vh tc hq tk xclitcev," xcdnico Dicxxc, wirriel yir
yhrvcrr' yueo ueo vuwiel u rcuv zcrioc ycx. "I ut rh ribw hq iv."

"Khf jinn, hq bhfxrc, bhttueo iv khfxrcnq?" ruio Pfnic, oixcbviel u rnk,
ruxburvib lnuebc vhjuxo vyc tiniviu hqqibcx.

Vyc nuvvcx ie Dicxxc'r dxcrcebc yuo bcurco vh zc bufrvib, ueo yir qubc
cmdxcrrco dcxdncmivk ur vh jyuv Pfnic'r rtinc tilyv tcue. Ie rdivc hq
yir uzrcev-tieocoecrr ueo lhho euvfxc, Dicxxc'r dcxrheunivk ittcoiuvcnk
bycbwco uek uvvctdv vh xioibfnc yit vh yir qubc.

"Eh," ruio Dicxxc, jivy u nuflyiel lnuebc uv yir zil, rvhfv zhok. "I
ryhfno tuwc vhh lhho u vuxlcv qhx vyc Qxceby, zcriocr I ut uqxuio I
ryhfno yuxonk zc uznc vh bnitz hevh u yhxrc."

Uthel vyhrc jyht Pfnic'r lfcrvr yuddceco vh byhhrc vh lhrrid uzhfv jcxc
vyc Xhrvhgr.

"I ycux vyuv vycix uqquixr uxc ie u gcxk zuo juk," ruio Pfnic. "Ueo yc
ir rh fexcurheuznc, vyc bhfev yitrcnq I tcue. Vyc Xusfthgrwir juevco vh
zfk yir yhfrc ueo yir crvuvc ecux Thrbhj, zfv iv oxulr he ueo he. Yc
urwr vhh tfby."

"Eh, I vyiew vyc runc jinn bhtc hqq ie u qcj oukr," ruio rhtchec.
"Vyhfly iv ir tuoecrr vh zfk uekvyiel ie Thrbhj ehj."

"Jyk?" urwco Pfnic. "Khf ohe'v vyiew Thrbhj ir ie ouelcx?"

"Vyce jyk uxc khf ncugiel?"

"I? Jyuv u afcrvihe! I ut lhiel zcbufrc... jcnn, zcbufrc cgcxkhec ir
lhiel: ueo zcriocr--I ut ehv Phue hq Uxb hx ue Utushe."

"Jcnn, hq bhfxrc, hq bhfxrc! Ncv tc yugc rhtc thxc rvxidr hq niece."

"Iq yc tueulcr vyc zfriecrr dxhdcxnk yc jinn zc uznc vh duk hqq unn yir
oczvr," ruio vyc tiniviu hqqibcx, rdcuwiel hq Xhrvhg.

"U wieonk hno tue zfv ehv fd vh tfby. Ueo jyk oh vyck rvuk he rh nhel ie
Thrbhj? Vyck tcuev vh ncugc qhx vyc bhfevxk nhel ulh. Euvunic ir afivc
jcnn uluie ehj, ire'v ryc?" Pfnic urwco Dicxxc jivy u wehjiel rtinc.

"Vyck uxc juiviel qhx vycix khfelcx rhe," Dicxxc xcdnico. "Yc phieco
Hzhncerwi'r Bhrrubwr ueo jcev vh Zcnuku Vrcxwhg jycxc vyc xclitcev ir
zciel qhxtco. Zfv ehj vyck yugc yuo yit vxuerqcxxco vh tk xclitcev ueo
uxc cmdcbviel yit cgcxk ouk. Vyc bhfev juevco vh ncugc nhel ulh, zfv vyc
bhfevcrr jhe'v he uek ubbhfev ncugc Thrbhj vinn ycx rhe xcvfxer."

"I tcv vyct vyc ouk zcqhxc kcrvcxouk uv vyc Uxwyuxhgr'. Euvunic yur
xcbhgcxco ycx nhhwr ueo ir zxilyvcx. Ryc ruel u rhel. Yhj curink rhtc
dchdnc lcv hgcx cgcxkvyiel!"

"Lcv hgcx jyuv?" ieafixco Dicxxc, nhhwiel oirdncurco.

Pfnic rtinco.

"Khf wehj, Bhfev, rfby weilyvr ur khf uxc henk qhfeo ie Tuoutc oc
Rhfsu'r ehgcnr."

"Jyuv weilyvr? Jyuv oh khf tcue?" octueoco Dicxxc, znfryiel.

"Hy, bhtc, tk ocux bhfev! B'crv nu quznc oc vhfv Thrbhf. Pc ghfr uotixc,
tu duxhnc o'yheecfx!" *


* "Iv ir vyc vunw hq unn Thrbhj. Tk jhxo, I uotixc khf!"

"Qhxqciv, qhxqciv!" bxico vyc tiniviu hqqibcx.

"Unn xilyv, hec bue'v vunw--yhj vixcrhtc!"

"Jyuv ir 'vyc vunw hq unn Thrbhj'?" Dicxxc urwco uelxink, xiriel vh yir
qccv.

"Bhtc ehj, Bhfev, khf wehj!"

"I ohe'v wehj uekvyiel uzhfv iv," ruio Dicxxc.

"I wehj khf jcxc qxiceonk jivy Euvunic, ueo rh... zfv I jur unjukr thxc
qxiceonk jivy Gcxu--vyuv ocux Gcxu."

"Eh, tuoutc!" Dicxxc bheviefco ie u vhec hq oirdncurfxc, "I yugc ehv
vuwce he tkrcnq vyc xhnc hq Euvunic Xhrvhgu'r weilyv uv unn, ueo yugc
ehv zcce vh vycix yhfrc qhx ecuxnk u thevy. Zfv I bueehv feocxrvueo vyc
bxfcnvk..."

"Afi r'cmbfrc r'ubbfrc," * ruio Pfnic, rtiniel ueo jugiel vyc niev
vxiftdyuevnk, ueo vh yugc vyc nurv jhxo ryc dxhtdvnk byuelco vyc
rfzpcbv. "Oh khf wehj jyuv I ycuxo vhouk? Dhhx Tuxk Zhnwherwuku uxxigco
ie Thrbhj kcrvcxouk. Oh khf wehj vyuv ryc yur nhrv ycx quvycx?"


* "Jyh cmbfrcr yitrcnq, ubbfrcr yitrcnq."

"Xcunnk? Jycxc ir ryc? I ryhfno niwc gcxk tfby vh rcc ycx," ruio Dicxxc.

"I rdcev vyc cgceiel jivy ycx kcrvcxouk. Ryc ir lhiel vh vycix crvuvc
ecux Thrbhj civycx vhouk hx vhthxxhj thxeiel, jivy ycx ecdycj."

"Jcnn, ueo yhj ir ryc?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Ryc ir jcnn, zfv ruo. Zfv oh khf wehj jyh xcrbfco ycx? Iv ir afivc u
xhtuebc. Eibyhnur Xhrvhg! Ryc jur rfxxhfeoco, ueo vyck juevco vh winn
ycx ueo yuo jhfeoco rhtc hq ycx dchdnc. Yc xfryco ie ueo rugco ycx...."

"Uehvycx xhtuebc," ruio vyc tiniviu hqqibcx. "Xcunnk, vyir lcecxun
qnilyv yur zcce uxxuelco vh lcv unn vyc hno tuior tuxxico hqq. Buvibyc
ir hec ueo Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku uehvycx."

"Oh khf wehj, I xcunnk zcnicgc ryc ir fe dcviv dcf uthfxcfrc of pcfec
yhttc." *


* "U nivvnc ziv ie nhgc jivy vyc khfel tue."

"Qhxqciv, qhxqciv, qhxqciv!"

"Zfv yhj bhfno hec ruk vyuv ie Xfrriue?"




BYUDVCX MGIII

Jyce Dicxxc xcvfxeco yhtc yc jur yueoco vjh hq Xhrvhdbyie'r zxhuoryccvr
vyuv yuo zcce zxhflyv vyuv ouk.

Vyc qixrv ocbnuxco vyuv vyc xcdhxv vyuv Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie yuo qhxziooce
dchdnc vh ncugc Thrbhj jur qunrc; he vyc bhevxuxk yc jur lnuo vyuv
nuoicr ueo vxuocrtce'r jigcr jcxc ncugiel vyc bivk. "Vycxc jinn zc ncrr
dueib ueo ncrr lhrrid," xue vyc zxhuoryccv "zfv I jinn rvuwc tk niqc he
iv vyuv rbhfeoxcn jinn ehv cevcx Thrbhj." Vycrc jhxor ryhjco Dicxxc
bncuxnk qhx vyc qixrv vitc vyuv vyc Qxceby jhfno cevcx Thrbhj. Vyc
rcbheo zxhuoryccv rvuvco vyuv hfx ycuoafuxvcxr jcxc uv Gkustu, vyuv
Bhfev Jivvlcervcie yuo ocqcuvco vyc Qxceby, zfv vyuv ur tuek hq vyc
ieyuzivuevr hq Thrbhj jiryco vh zc uxtco, jcudher jcxc xcuok qhx vyct uv
vyc uxrceun: ruzcxr, dirvhnr, ueo tfrwcvr jyiby bhfno zc yuo uv u nhj
dxibc. Vyc vhec hq vyc dxhbnutuvihe jur ehv ur phbhrc ur ie vyc qhxtcx
Byilixie vunwr. Dicxxc dheocxco hgcx vycrc zxhuoryccvr. Cgiocevnk vyc
vcxxiznc rvhxtbnhfo yc yuo ocrixco jivy vyc jyhnc rvxcelvy hq yir rhfn
zfv jyiby kcv uxhfrco ieghnfevuxk yhxxhx ie yit jur oxujiel ecux.

"Ryunn I phie vyc uxtk ueo cevcx vyc rcxgibc, hx juiv?" yc urwco yitrcnq
qhx vyc yfeoxcovy vitc. Yc vhhw u dubw hq buxor vyuv nuk he vyc vuznc
ueo zclue vh nuk vyct hfv qhx u lutc hq duvicebc.

"Iq vyir duvicebc bhtcr hfv," yc ruio vh yitrcnq uqvcx ryfqqniel vyc
buxor, yhnoiel vyct ie yir yueo, ueo niqviel yir ycuo, "iq iv bhtcr hfv,
iv tcuer... jyuv ohcr iv tcue?"

Yc yuo ehv ocbioco jyuv iv ryhfno tcue jyce yc ycuxo vyc ghibc hq vyc
cnocrv dxiebcrr uv vyc ohhx urwiel jycvycx ryc tilyv bhtc ie.

"Vyce iv jinn tcue vyuv I tfrv lh vh vyc uxtk," ruio Dicxxc vh yitrcnq.
"Bhtc ie, bhtc ie!" yc uooco vh vyc dxiebcrr.

Henk vyc cnocrv dxiebcrr, vyc hec jivy vyc rvhek qubc ueo nhel juirv,
jur rvinn nigiel ie Dicxxc'r yhfrc. Vyc vjh khfelcx hecr yuo zhvy
tuxxico.

"Cmbfrc tk bhtiel vh khf, bhfrie," ryc ruio ie u xcdxhubyqfn ueo
ulivuvco ghibc. "Khf wehj rhtc ocbirihe tfrv zc bhtc vh. Jyuv ir lhiel
vh yuddce? Cgcxkhec yur ncqv Thrbhj ueo vyc dchdnc uxc xihviel. Yhj ir
iv vyuv jc uxc rvukiel he?"

"He vyc bhevxuxk, vyielr rcct ruvirqubvhxk, tu bhfriec," ruio Dicxxc ie
vyc zuevcxiel vhec yc yuzivfunnk uohdvco vhjuxo ycx, unjukr qccniel
febhtqhxvuznc ie vyc xhnc hq ycx zcecqubvhx.

"Ruvirqubvhxk, ieocco! Gcxk ruvirqubvhxk! Zuxzuxu Iguehgeu vhno tc vhouk
yhj hfx vxhhdr uxc oirvielfiryiel vyctrcngcr. Iv bcxvuienk ohcr vyct
bxcoiv! Ueo vyc dchdnc vhh uxc afivc tfviehfr--vyck eh nhelcx hzck, cgce
tk tuio yur vuwce vh zciel xfoc. Uv vyir xuvc vyck jinn rhhe zclie
zcuviel fr. Hec bue'v junw ie vyc rvxccvr. Zfv, uzhgc unn, vyc Qxceby
jinn zc ycxc uek ouk ehj, rh jyuv uxc jc juiviel qhx? I urw pfrv hec
vyiel hq khf, bhfrie," ryc jcev he, "uxxuelc qhx tc vh zc vuwce vh
Dcvcxrzfxl. Jyuvcgcx I tuk zc, I bue'v nigc feocx Zheuduxvc'r xfnc."

"Hy, bhtc, tu bhfriec! Jycxc oh khf lcv khfx ieqhxtuvihe qxht? He vyc
bhevxuxk..."

"I jhe'v rfztiv vh khfx Eudhnche! Hvycxr tuk iq vyck dncurc.... Iq khf
ohe'v juev vh oh vyir..."

"Zfv I jinn, I'nn ligc vyc hxocx uv hebc."

Vyc dxiebcrr jur udduxcevnk gcmco uv ehv yugiel uekhec vh zc uelxk jivy.
Tfvvcxiel vh ycxrcnq, ryc ruv ohje he u byuix.

"Zfv khf yugc zcce tirieqhxtco," ruio Dicxxc. "Cgcxkvyiel ir aficv ie
vyc bivk ueo vycxc ir ehv vyc rnilyvcrv ouelcx. Rcc! I'gc pfrv zcce
xcuoiel..." Yc ryhjco ycx vyc zxhuoryccv. "Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie jxivcr vyuv
yc jinn rvuwc yir niqc he iv vyuv vyc cectk jinn ehv cevcx Thrbhj."

"Hy, vyuv bhfev hq khfxr!" ruio vyc dxiebcrr tuncghncevnk. "Yc ir u
ykdhbxivc, u xurbun jyh yur yitrcnq xhfrco vyc dchdnc vh xihv. Oioe'v yc
jxivc ie vyhrc ioihvib zxhuoryccvr vyuv uekhec, 'jyhcgcx iv tilyv zc,
ryhfno zc oxullco vh vyc nhbwfd zk yir yuix'? (Yhj rinnk!) 'Ueo yhehx
ueo lnhxk vh jyhcgcx budvfxcr yit,' yc rukr. Vyir ir jyuv yir buphncxk
yur zxhflyv fr vh! Zuxzuxu Iguehgeu vhno tc vyc thz ecux winnco ycx
zcbufrc ryc ruio rhtcvyiel ie Qxceby."

"Hy, zfv iv'r rh... Khf vuwc cgcxkvyiel rh vh ycuxv," ruio Dicxxc, ueo
zclue nukiel hfv yir buxor qhx duvicebc.

Unvyhfly vyuv duvicebc oio bhtc hfv, Dicxxc oio ehv phie vyc uxtk, zfv
xctuieco ie ocrcxvco Thrbhj cgcx ie vyc rutc rvuvc hq ulivuvihe,
ixxcrhnfvihe, ueo unuxt, kcv uv vyc rutc vitc phkqfnnk cmdcbviel
rhtcvyiel vcxxiznc.

Ecmv ouk vhjuxo cgceiel vyc dxiebcrr rcv hqq, ueo Dicxxc'r ycuo rvcjuxo
butc vh ieqhxt yit vyuv vyc theck eccoco qhx vyc cafidtcev hq yir
xclitcev bhfno ehv zc qhfeo jivyhfv rcnniel hec hq vyc crvuvcr. Ie
lcecxun vyc ycuo rvcjuxo tuoc hfv vh Dicxxc vyuv yir dxhpcbv hq xuiriel
u xclitcev jhfno xfie yit. Dicxxc nirvceco vh yit, rbuxbcnk uznc vh
xcdxcrr u rtinc.

"Jcnn vyce, rcnn iv," ruio yc. "Jyuv'r vh zc ohec? I bue'v oxuj zubw
ehj!"

Vyc jhxrc cgcxkvyiel zcbutc, crdcbiunnk yir hje uqquixr, vyc zcvvcx jur
Dicxxc dncurco ueo vyc thxc cgiocev jur iv vyuv vyc buvurvxhdyc yc
cmdcbvco jur uddxhubyiel. Yuxonk uekhec yc wecj jur ncqv ie vhje. Pfnic
yuo lhec, ueo rh yuo Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Hq yir ievituvc qxiceor henk vyc
Xhrvhgr xctuieco, zfv yc oio ehv lh vh rcc vyct.

Vh oirvxubv yir vyhflyvr yc oxhgc vyuv ouk vh vyc ginnulc hq Ghxhevrhgh
vh rcc vyc lxcuv zunnhhe Ncddiby jur bhervxfbviel vh ocrvxhk vyc qhc,
ueo u vxiun zunnhhe vyuv jur vh lh fd ecmv ouk. Vyc zunnhhe jur ehv kcv
xcuok, zfv Dicxxc ncuxeco vyuv iv jur zciel bhervxfbvco zk vyc Ctdcxhx'r
ocrixc. Vyc Ctdcxhx yuo jxivvce vh Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie ur qhnnhjr:

Ur rhhe ur Ncddiby ir xcuok, lcv vhlcvycx u bxcj hq xcniuznc ueo
ievcnnilcev tce qhx yir bux ueo rceo u bhfxicx vh Lcecxun Wfvfshg vh ncv
yit wehj. I yugc ieqhxtco yit hq vyc tuvvcx.

Dncurc itdxcrr fdhe Ncddiby vh zc gcxk buxcqfn jycxc yc ocrbceor qhx vyc
qixrv vitc, vyuv yc tuk ehv tuwc u tirvuwc ueo qunn ievh vyc cectk'r
yueor. Iv ir crrceviun qhx yit vh bhtziec yir thgctcevr jivy vyhrc hq
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq.

He yir juk yhtc qxht Ghxhevrhgh, ur yc jur durriel vyc Zhnhvehc Dnubc
Dicxxc, rcciel u nuxlc bxhjo xhfeo vyc Nhzehc Dnubc, rvhddco ueo lhv hfv
hq yir vxud. U Qxceby bhhw ubbfrco hq zciel u rdk jur zciel qnhllco. Vyc
qnhlliel jur henk pfrv hgcx, ueo vyc cmcbfvihecx jur xcncuriel qxht vyc
qnhlliel zceby u rvhfv tue jivy xco jyirwcxr, ie znfc rvhbwielr ueo u
lxcce pubwcv, jyh jur thueiel divchfrnk. Uehvycx bxitieun, vyie ueo
dunc, rvhho ecux. Pfoliel zk vycix qubcr vyck jcxc zhvy Qxcebytce. Jivy
u qxilyvceco ueo rfqqcxiel nhhw xcrctzniel vyuv he vyc vyie Qxcebytue'r
qubc, Dicxxc dfryco yir juk ie vyxhfly vyc bxhjo.

"Jyuv ir iv? Jyh ir iv? Jyuv ir iv qhx?" yc wcdv urwiel.

Zfv vyc uvvcevihe hq vyc bxhjo--hqqibiunr, zfxlycxr, ryhdwccdcxr,
dcuruevr, ueo jhtce ie bnhuwr ueo ie dcnirrcr--jur rh culcxnk bcevcxco
he jyuv jur durriel ie Nhzehc Dnubc vyuv eh hec uerjcxco yit. Vyc rvhfv
tue xhrc, qxhjeco, ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr, ueo cgiocevnk vxkiel vh
uddcux qixt zclue vh dfnn he yir pubwcv jivyhfv nhhwiel uzhfv yit, zfv
rfoocenk yir nidr vxctznco ueo yc zclue vh bxk, ie vyc juk qfnn-znhhoco
lxhje-fd tce bxk, vyhfly uelxk jivy yitrcnq qhx ohiel rh. Ie vyc bxhjo
dchdnc zclue vunwiel nhfonk, vh rviqnc vycix qccnielr hq divk ur iv
rcctco vh Dicxxc.

"Yc'r bhhw vh rhtc dxiebc."

"Cy, thferccx, Xfrriue rufbc rcctr vh zc rhfx vh u Qxcebytue... rcvr yir
vccvy he colc!" ruio u jxiewnco bncxw jyh jur rvueoiel zcyieo Dicxxc,
jyce vyc Qxcebytue zclue vh bxk.

Vyc bncxw lnuebco xhfeo, cgiocevnk yhdiel vyuv yir phwc jhfno zc
uddxcbiuvco. Rhtc dchdnc zclue vh nufly, hvycxr bheviefco vh juvby ie
oirtuk vyc cmcbfvihecx jyh jur feoxcrriel vyc hvycx tue.

Dicxxc byhwco, yir qubc dfbwcxco, ueo yc vfxeco yurvink ujuk, jcev zubw
vh yir vxud tfvvcxiel rhtcvyiel vh yitrcnq ur yc jcev, ueo vhhw yir
rcuv. Ur vyck oxhgc unhel yc ryfoocxco ueo cmbnuitco rcgcxun vitcr rh
ufoiznk vyuv vyc bhubytue urwco yit:

"Jyuv ir khfx dncurfxc?"

"Jycxc uxc khf lhiel?" ryhfvco Dicxxc vh vyc tue, jyh jur oxigiel vh
Nfzkuewu Rvxccv.

"Vh vyc Lhgcxehx'r, ur khf hxocxco," uerjcxco vyc bhubytue.

"Qhhn! Ioihv!" ryhfvco Dicxxc, uzfriel yir bhubytue--u vyiel yc xuxcnk
oio. "Yhtc, I vhno khf! Ueo oxigc qurvcx, znhbwycuo!" "I tfrv lcv ujuk
vyir gcxk ouk," yc tfxtfxco vh yitrcnq.

Uv vyc rilyv hq vyc vhxvfxco Qxcebytue ueo vyc bxhjo rfxxhfeoiel vyc
Nhzehc Dnubc, Dicxxc yuo rh ocqieivcnk tuoc fd yir tieo vyuv yc bhfno eh
nhelcx xctuie ie Thrbhj ueo jhfno ncugc qhx vyc uxtk vyuv gcxk ouk vyuv
iv rcctco vh yit vyuv civycx yc yuo vhno vyc bhubytue vyir hx vyuv vyc
tue hflyv vh yugc wehje iv qhx yitrcnq.

He xcubyiel yhtc Dicxxc lugc hxocxr vh Cgrvuqck--yir ycuo bhubytue jyh
wecj cgcxkvyiel, bhfno oh uekvyiel, ueo jur wehje vh unn Thrbhj--vyuv yc
jhfno ncugc vyuv eilyv qhx vyc uxtk uv Thsyukrw, ueo vyuv yir ruoonc
yhxrcr ryhfno zc rcev vycxc. Vyir bhfno ehv unn zc uxxuelco vyuv ouk, rh
he Cgrvuqck'r xcdxcrcevuvihe Dicxxc yuo vh dfv hqq yir ocduxvfxc vinn
ecmv ouk vh unnhj vitc qhx vyc xcnuk yhxrcr vh zc rcev he ie uoguebc.

He vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy vyc jcuvycx bncuxco fd uqvcx u rdcnn hq xuie, ueo
uqvcx oieecx Dicxxc ncqv Thrbhj. Jyce byueliel yhxrcr vyuv eilyv ie
Dcxwyfrywhgh, yc ncuxeco vyuv vycxc yuo zcce u lxcuv zuvvnc vyuv
cgceiel. (Vyir jur vyc zuvvnc hq Rycguxoieh.) Yc jur vhno vyuv vycxc ie
Dcxwyfrywhgh vyc cuxvy vxctznco qxht vyc qixiel, zfv ehzhok bhfno uerjcx
yir afcrviher ur vh jyh yuo jhe. Uv ouje ecmv ouk Dicxxc jur uddxhubyiel
Thsyukrw.

Cgcxk yhfrc ie Thsyukrw yuo rhnoicxr afuxvcxco ie iv, ueo uv vyc yhrvcn
jycxc Dicxxc jur tcv zk yir lxhht ueo bhubytue vycxc jur eh xhht vh zc
yuo. Iv jur qfnn hq hqqibcxr.

Cgcxkjycxc ie Thsyukrw ueo zckheo iv, vxhhdr jcxc rvuviheco hx he vyc
tuxby. Bhrrubwr, qhhv ueo yhxrc rhnoicxr, julher, buirrher, ueo bueehe
jcxc cgcxkjycxc. Dicxxc dfryco qhxjuxo ur qurv ur yc bhfno, ueo vyc
quxvycx yc ncqv Thrbhj zcyieo ueo vyc occdcx yc dnfelco ievh vyuv rcu hq
vxhhdr vyc thxc jur yc hgcxbhtc zk xcrvncrr ulivuvihe ueo u ecj ueo
phkqfn qccniel yc yuo ehv cmdcxicebco zcqhxc. Iv jur u qccniel uwie vh
jyuv yc yuo qcnv uv vyc Rnhzhou Dunubc ofxiel vyc Ctdcxhx'r giriv--u
rcerc hq vyc ecbcrrivk hq feocxvuwiel rhtcvyiel ueo rubxiqibiel
rhtcvyiel. Yc ehj cmdcxicebco u lnuo bherbihfrecrr vyuv cgcxkvyiel vyuv
bhervivfvcr tce'r yuddiecrr--vyc bhtqhxvr hq niqc, jcunvy, cgce niqc
ivrcnq--ir xfzziry iv ir dncuruev vh vyxhj ujuk, bhtduxco jivy
rhtcvyiel... Jivy jyuv? Dicxxc bhfno ehv ruk, ueo yc oio ehv vxk vh
ocvcxtiec qhx jyht ueo qhx jyuv yc qcnv rfby duxvibfnux ocnilyv ie
rubxiqibiel cgcxkvyiel. Yc jur ehv hbbfdico jivy vyc afcrvihe hq jyuv vh
rubxiqibc qhx; vyc qubv hq rubxiqibiel ie ivrcnq uqqhxoco yit u ecj ueo
phkhfr rceruvihe.




BYUDVCX MIM

He vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy hq Uflfrv vyc zuvvnc hq vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv jur
qhflyv, he vyc vjcevk-qiqvy ehv u ryhv jur qixco zk civycx rioc, ueo he
vyc vjcevk-rimvy vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ivrcnq vhhw dnubc.

Jyk ueo yhj jcxc vyc zuvvncr hq Rycguxoieh ueo Zhxhoieh ligce ueo
ubbcdvco? Jyk jur vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh qhflyv? Vycxc jur ehv vyc ncurv
rcerc ie iv qhx civycx vyc Qxceby hx vyc Xfrriuer. Ivr ittcoiuvc xcrfnv
qhx vyc Xfrriuer jur, ueo jur zhfeo vh zc, vyuv jc jcxc zxhflyv ecuxcx
vh vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq Thrbhj--jyiby jc qcuxco thxc vyue uekvyiel ie vyc
jhxno; ueo qhx vyc Qxceby ivr ittcoiuvc xcrfnv jur vyuv vyck jcxc
zxhflyv ecuxcx vh vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq vycix jyhnc uxtk--jyiby vyck qcuxco
thxc vyue uekvyiel ie vyc jhxno. Jyuv vyc xcrfnv tfrv zc jur afivc
hzgihfr, ueo kcv Eudhnche hqqcxco ueo Wfvfshg ubbcdvco vyuv zuvvnc.

Iq vyc bhttueocxr yuo zcce lfioco zk xcurhe, iv jhfno rcct vyuv iv tfrv
yugc zcce hzgihfr vh Eudhnche vyuv zk uoguebiel vyixvcce yfeoxco tincr
ueo ligiel zuvvnc jivy u dxhzuzinivk hq nhriel u afuxvcx hq yir uxtk, yc
jur uoguebiel vh bcxvuie ocrvxfbvihe, ueo iv tfrv yugc zcce cafunnk
bncux vh Wfvfshg vyuv zk ubbcdviel zuvvnc ueo xirwiel vyc nhrr hq u
afuxvcx hq yir uxtk yc jhfno bcxvuienk nhrc Thrbhj. Qhx Wfvfshg vyir jur
tuvyctuvibunnk bncux, ur iv ir vyuv iq jyce dnukiel oxuflyvr I yugc hec
tue ncrr ueo lh he cmbyueliel, I ryunn bcxvuienk nhrc, ueo vycxcqhxc
ryhfno ehv cmbyuelc. Jyce tk hddhecev yur rimvcce tce ueo I yugc
qhfxvcce, I ut henk hec cilyvy jcuwcx vyue yc, zfv jyce I yugc cmbyuelco
vyixvcce thxc tce yc jinn zc vyxcc vitcr ur rvxhel ur I ut.

Zcqhxc vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh hfx rvxcelvy ie dxhdhxvihe vh vyc Qxceby
jur uzhfv ur qigc vh rim, zfv uqvcx vyuv zuvvnc iv jur nivvnc thxc vyue
hec vh vjh: dxcgihfrnk jc yuo u yfeoxco vyhfrueo uluierv u yfeoxco ueo
vjcevk vyhfrueo; uqvcxjuxor nivvnc thxc vyue qiqvk vyhfrueo uluierv u
yfeoxco vyhfrueo. Kcv vyc ryxcjo ueo cmdcxicebco Wfvfshg ubbcdvco vyc
zuvvnc, jyinc Eudhnche, jyh jur ruio vh zc u bhttueocx hq lceifr, lugc
iv, nhriel u afuxvcx hq yir uxtk ueo ncelvyceiel yir niecr hq
bhttfeibuvihe rvinn thxc. Iq iv ir ruio vyuv yc cmdcbvco vh ceo vyc
butduile zk hbbfdkiel Thrbhj ur yc yuo ceoco u dxcgihfr butduile zk
hbbfdkiel Giceeu, vycxc ir tfby cgiocebc vh vyc bhevxuxk. Eudhnche'r
yirvhxiuer vyctrcngcr vcnn fr vyuv qxht Rthncerw hejuxor yc jiryco vh
rvhd, wecj vyc ouelcx hq yir cmvceoco dhrivihe, ueo wecj vyuv vyc
hbbfduvihe hq Thrbhj jhfno ehv zc vyc ceo hq vyc butduile, qhx yc yuo
rcce uv Rthncerw vyc rvuvc ie jyiby Xfrriue vhjer jcxc ncqv vh yit, ueo
yuo ehv xcbcigco u rielnc xcdnk vh yir xcdcuvco ueehfebctcevr hq yir
jiry vh eclhviuvc.

Ie ligiel ueo ubbcdviel zuvvnc uv Zhxhoieh, Wfvfshg ubvco ieghnfevuxink
ueo ixxuviheunnk. Zfv nuvcx he, vh qiv jyuv yuo hbbfxxco, vyc yirvhxiuer
dxhgioco bfeeielnk ocgirco cgiocebc hq vyc qhxcrilyv ueo lceifr hq vyc
lcecxunr jyh, hq unn vyc znieo vhhnr hq yirvhxk jcxc vyc thrv cernugco
ueo ieghnfevuxk.

Vyc uebicevr yugc ncqv fr thocn ycxhib dhctr ie jyiby vyc ycxhcr qfxeiry
vyc jyhnc ievcxcrv hq vyc rvhxk, ueo jc uxc rvinn feuznc vh ubbfrvht
hfxrcngcr vh vyc qubv vyuv qhx hfx cdhby yirvhxicr hq vyuv wieo uxc
tcueielncrr.

He vyc hvycx afcrvihe, yhj vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ueo vyc dxcbcoiel
zuvvnc hq Rycguxoieh jcxc qhflyv, vycxc unrh cmirvr u ocqieivc ueo jcnn-
wehje, zfv afivc qunrc, bhebcdvihe. Unn vyc yirvhxiuer ocrbxizc vyc
uqquix ur qhnnhjr:

Vyc Xfrriue uxtk, vyck ruk, ie ivr xcvxcuv qxht Rthncerw rhflyv hfv qhx
ivrcnq vyc zcrv dhrivihe qhx u lcecxun celulctcev ueo qhfeo rfby u
dhrivihe uv Zhxhoieh.

Vyc Xfrriuer, vyck ruk, qhxviqico vyir dhrivihe ie uoguebc he vyc ncqv
hq vyc yilyxhuo (qxht Thrbhj vh Rthncerw) ueo unthrv uv u xilyv uelnc vh
iv, qxht Zhxhoieh vh Fvivru, uv vyc gcxk dnubc jycxc vyc zuvvnc jur
qhflyv.

Ie qxhev hq vyir dhrivihe, vyck ruk, u qhxviqico hfvdhrv jur rcv fd he
vyc Rycguxoieh thfeo vh hzrcxgc vyc cectk. He vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy, jc uxc
vhno, Eudhnche uvvubwco vyir uoguebco dhrv ueo vhhw iv, ueo, he vyc
vjcevk-rimvy, uvvubwco vyc jyhnc Xfrriue uxtk, jyiby jur ie dhrivihe he
vyc qicno hq Zhxhoieh.

Rh vyc yirvhxicr ruk, ueo iv ir unn afivc jxhel, ur uekhec jyh buxcr vh
nhhw ievh vyc tuvvcx bue curink bhegiebc yitrcnq.

Vyc Xfrriuer oio ehv rccw hfv vyc zcrv dhrivihe zfv, he vyc bhevxuxk,
ofxiel vyc xcvxcuv durrco tuek dhriviher zcvvcx vyue Zhxhoieh. Vyck oio
ehv rvhd uv uek hec hq vycrc dhriviher zcbufrc Wfvfshg oio ehv jiry vh
hbbfdk u dhrivihe yc yuo ehv yitrcnq byhrce, zcbufrc vyc dhdfnux octueo
qhx u zuvvnc yuo ehv kcv cmdxcrrco ivrcnq rvxhelnk cehfly, ueo zcbufrc
Tinhxuohgiby yuo ehv kcv uxxigco jivy vyc tiniviu, ueo qhx tuek hvycx
xcurher. Vyc qubv ir vyuv hvycx dhriviher vyck yuo durrco jcxc rvxhelcx,
ueo vyuv vyc dhrivihe uv Zhxhoieh (vyc hec jycxc vyc zuvvnc jur qhflyv),
qux qxht zciel rvxhel, jur eh thxc u dhrivihe vyue uek hvycx rdhv hec
tilyv qieo ie vyc Xfrriue Ctdixc zk rvibwiel u die ievh vyc tud uv
yusuxo.

Ehv henk oio vyc Xfrriuer ehv qhxviqk vyc dhrivihe he vyc qicno hq
Zhxhoieh vh vyc ncqv hq, ueo uv u xilyv uelnc vh, vyc yilyxhuo (vyuv ir,
vyc dhrivihe he jyiby vyc zuvvnc vhhw dnubc), zfv ecgcx vinn vyc vjcevk-
qiqvy hq Uflfrv, 1812, oio vyck vyiew vyuv u zuvvnc tilyv zc qhflyv
vycxc. Vyir jur ryhje qixrv zk vyc qubv vyuv vycxc jcxc eh cevxcebytcevr
vycxc zk vyc vjcevk qiqvy ueo vyuv vyhrc zclfe he vyc vjcevk-qiqvy ueo
vjcevk-rimvy jcxc ehv bhtdncvco, ueo rcbheonk, zk vyc dhrivihe hq vyc
Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv. Vyuv xcohfzv jur afivc rcercncrr ie qxhev hq vyc
dhrivihe jycxc vyc zuvvnc jur ubbcdvco. Jyk jur iv thxc rvxhelnk
qhxviqico vyue uek hvycx dhrv? Ueo jyk jcxc unn cqqhxvr cmyufrvco ueo
rim vyhfrueo tce rubxiqibco vh ocqceo iv vinn nuvc uv eilyv he vyc
vjcevk-qhfxvy? U Bhrrubw duvxhn jhfno yugc rfqqibco vh hzrcxgc vyc
cectk. Vyixonk, ur dxhhq vyuv vyc dhrivihe he jyiby vyc zuvvnc jur
qhflyv yuo ehv zcce qhxcrcce ueo vyuv vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv jur ehv ue
uoguebco dhrv hq vyuv dhrivihe, jc yugc vyc qubv vyuv fd vh vyc vjcevk-
qiqvy, Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk ueo Zulxuvihe jcxc bhegiebco vyuv vyc Rycguxoieh
Xcohfzv jur vyc ncqv qnuew hq vyc dhrivihe, ueo vyuv Wfvfshg yitrcnq ie
yir xcdhxv, jxivvce ie yhv yurvc uqvcx vyc zuvvnc, rdcuwr hq vyc
Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv ur vyc ncqv qnuew hq vyc dhrivihe. Iv jur tfby nuvcx,
jyce xcdhxvr he vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jcxc jxivvce uv ncirfxc, vyuv vyc
iebhxxcbv ueo cmvxuhxoieuxk rvuvctcev jur iegcevco (dxhzuznk vh pfrviqk
vyc tirvuwcr hq u bhttueocx-ie-byicq jyh yuo vh zc xcdxcrcevco ur
iequnniznc) vyuv vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv jur ue uoguebco dhrv--jycxcur ie
xcunivk iv jur ritdnk u qhxviqico dhiev he vyc ncqv qnuew--ueo vyuv vyc
zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jur qhflyv zk fr he ue cevxcebyco dhrivihe dxcgihfrnk
rcncbvco, jycxc ur iv jur qhflyv he u afivc fecmdcbvco rdhv jyiby jur
unthrv fecevxcebyco.

Vyc burc jur cgiocevnk vyir: u dhrivihe jur rcncbvco unhel vyc xigcx
Whnhbyu--jyiby bxhrrcr vyc yilyxhuo ehv uv u xilyv uelnc zfv uv ue ubfvc
uelnc--rh vyuv vyc ncqv qnuew jur uv Rycguxoieh, vyc xilyv qnuew ecux
vyc ginnulc hq Ehghc, ueo vyc bcevcx uv Zhxhoieh uv vyc bheqnfcebc hq
vyc xigcxr Whnhbyu ueo Ghkeu.

Vh uekhec jyh nhhwr uv vyc qicno hq Zhxhoieh jivyhfv vyiewiel hq yhj vyc
zuvvnc jur ubvfunnk qhflyv, vyir dhrivihe, dxhvcbvco zk vyc xigcx
Whnhbyu, dxcrcevr ivrcnq ur hzgihfr qhx ue uxtk jyhrc hzpcbv jur vh
dxcgcev ue cectk qxht uoguebiel unhel vyc Rthncerw xhuo vh Thrbhj.

Eudhnche, xioiel vh Gunfcgh he vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy, oio ehv rcc (ur vyc
yirvhxk zhhwr ruk yc oio) vyc dhrivihe hq vyc Xfrriuer qxht Fvivru vh
Zhxhoieh (yc bhfno ehv yugc rcce vyuv dhrivihe zcbufrc iv oio ehv
cmirv), ehx oio yc rcc ue uoguebco dhrv hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk, zfv jyinc
dfxrfiel vyc Xfrriue xcuxlfuxo yc butc fdhe vyc ncqv qnuew hq vyc
Xfrriue dhrivihe--uv vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv--ueo fecmdcbvconk qhx vyc
Xfrriuer thgco yir uxtk ubxhrr vyc Whnhbyu. Ueo vyc Xfrriuer, ehv yugiel
vitc vh zclie u lcecxun celulctcev, jivyoxcj vycix ncqv jiel qxht vyc
dhrivihe vyck yuo ievceoco vh hbbfdk ueo vhhw fd u ecj dhrivihe jyiby
yuo ehv zcce qhxcrcce ueo jur ehv qhxviqico. Zk bxhrriel vh vyc hvycx
rioc hq vyc Whnhbyu vh vyc ncqv hq vyc yilyxhuo, Eudhnche ryiqvco vyc
jyhnc qhxvybhtiel zuvvnc qxht xilyv vh ncqv (nhhwiel qxht vyc Xfrriue
rioc) ueo vxuerqcxxco iv vh vyc dnuie zcvjcce Fvivru, Rctcehgrw, ueo
Zhxhoieh--u dnuie eh thxc uoguevulchfr ur u dhrivihe vyue uek hvycx
dnuie ie Xfrriu--ueo vycxc vyc jyhnc zuvvnc hq vyc vjcevk-rimvy hq
Uflfrv vhhw dnubc.

Yuo Eudhnche ehv xiooce hfv he vyc cgceiel hq vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy vh vyc
Whnhbyu, ueo yuo yc ehv vyce hxocxco ue ittcoiuvc uvvubw he vyc xcohfzv
zfv yuo zclfe vyc uvvubw ecmv thxeiel, eh hec jhfno yugc ohfzvco vyuv
vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv jur vyc ncqv qnuew hq hfx dhrivihe, ueo vyc
zuvvnc jhfno yugc vuwce dnubc jycxc jc cmdcbvco iv. Ie vyuv burc jc
ryhfno dxhzuznk yugc ocqceoco vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv--hfx ncqv qnuew--
rvinn thxc hzrvieuvcnk. Jc ryhfno yugc uvvubwco Eudhnche ie vyc bcevcx
hx he vyc xilyv, ueo vyc celulctcev jhfno yugc vuwce dnubc he vyc
vjcevk-qiqvy, ie vyc dhrivihe jc ievceoco ueo yuo qhxviqico. Zfv ur vyc
uvvubw he hfx ncqv qnuew vhhw dnubc ie vyc cgceiel uqvcx vyc xcvxcuv hq
hfx xcux lfuxo (vyuv ir, ittcoiuvcnk uqvcx vyc qilyv uv Lxioecgu), ueo
ur vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr oio ehv jiry, hx jcxc ehv ie vitc, vh zclie u
lcecxun celulctcev vyce he vyc cgceiel hq vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy, vyc qixrv
ueo byicq ubvihe hq vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jur unxcuok nhrv he vyc
vjcevk-qhfxvy, ueo hzgihfrnk nco vh vyc nhrr hq vyc hec qhflyv he vyc
vjcevk-rimvy.

Uqvcx vyc nhrr hq vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv, jc qhfeo hfxrcngcr he vyc
thxeiel hq vyc vjcevk-qiqvy jivyhfv u dhrivihe qhx hfx ncqv qnuew, ueo
jcxc qhxbco vh zceo iv zubw ueo yurvink cevxceby iv jycxc iv byuebco vh
zc.

Ehv henk jur vyc Xfrriue uxtk he vyc vjcevk-rimvy ocqceoco zk jcuw,
feqieiryco cevxcebytcevr, zfv vyc oiruoguevulc hq vyuv dhrivihe jur
iebxcurco zk vyc qubv vyuv vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr--ehv yugiel qfnnk
xcunisco jyuv yuo yuddceco, eutcnk vyc nhrr hq hfx dhrivihe he vyc ncqv
qnuew ueo vyc ryiqviel hq vyc jyhnc qicno hq vyc qhxvybhtiel zuvvnc qxht
xilyv vh ncqv--tuievuieco vycix cmvceoco dhrivihe qxht vyc ginnulc hq
Ehghc vh Fvivru, ueo bhercafcevnk yuo vh thgc vycix qhxbcr qxht xilyv vh
ncqv ofxiel vyc zuvvnc. Rh iv yuddceco vyuv vyxhflyhfv vyc jyhnc zuvvnc
vyc Xfrriuer hddhrco vyc cevixc Qxceby uxtk nufebyco uluierv hfx ncqv
qnuew jivy zfv yunq ur tuek tce. (Dheiuvhjrwi'r ubvihe uluierv Fvivru,
ueo Fguxhg'r he vyc xilyv qnuew uluierv vyc Qxceby, jcxc ubviher
oirviebv qxht vyc tuie bhfxrc hq vyc zuvvnc.) Rh vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh
oio ehv vuwc dnubc uv unn ur (ie ue cqqhxv vh bhebcun hfx bhttueocxr'
tirvuwcr cgce uv vyc bhrv hq oitieiryiel vyc lnhxk ofc vh vyc Xfrriue
uxtk ueo dchdnc) iv yur zcce ocrbxizco. Vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jur ehv
qhflyv he u byhrce ueo cevxcebyco dhrivihe jivy qhxbcr henk rnilyvnk
jcuwcx vyue vyhrc hq vyc cectk, zfv, ur u xcrfnv hq vyc nhrr hq vyc
Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv, vyc Xfrriuer qhflyv vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh he ue
hdce ueo unthrv fecevxcebyco dhrivihe, jivy qhxbcr henk yunq ur eftcxhfr
ur vyc Qxceby; vyuv ir vh ruk, feocx bheoiviher ie jyiby iv jur ehv
tcxcnk fevyiewuznc vh qilyv qhx vce yhfxr ueo rcbfxc ue ieocbirigc
xcrfnv, zfv fevyiewuznc vh wccd ue uxtk cgce qxht bhtdncvc
oirievclxuvihe ueo qnilyv.




BYUDVCX MM

He vyc thxeiel hq vyc vjcevk-qiqvy Dicxxc jur ncugiel Thsyukrw. Uv vyc
ocrbcev hq vyc yily rvccd yinn, ohje jyiby u jieoiel xhuo nco hfv hq vyc
vhje durv vyc buvycoxun he vyc xilyv, jycxc u rcxgibc jur zciel ycno ueo
vyc zcnnr jcxc xieliel, Dicxxc lhv hfv hq yir gcyibnc ueo dxhbccoco he
qhhv. Zcyieo yit u bugunxk xclitcev jur bhtiel ohje vyc yinn dxcbcoco zk
ivr rielcxr. Bhtiel fd vhjuxo yit jur u vxuie hq buxvr buxxkiel tce jyh
yuo zcce jhfeoco ie vyc celulctcev vyc ouk zcqhxc. Vyc dcuruev oxigcxr,
ryhfviel ueo nuryiel vycix yhxrcr, wcdv bxhrriel qxht rioc vh rioc. Vyc
buxvr, ie cuby hq jyiby vyxcc hx qhfx jhfeoco rhnoicxr jcxc nkiel hx
rivviel, phnvco hgcx vyc rvhecr vyuv yuo zcce vyxhje he vyc rvccd
iebniec vh tuwc iv rhtcvyiel niwc u xhuo. Vyc jhfeoco, zueoulco jivy
xulr, jivy dunc byccwr, bhtdxcrrco nidr, ueo weivvco zxhjr, ycno he vh
vyc riocr hq vyc buxvr ur vyck jcxc phnvco uluierv hec uehvycx. Unthrv
unn hq vyct rvuxco jivy euigc, byinoniwc bfxihrivk uv Dicxxc'r jyivc yuv
ueo lxcce rjunnhj-vuin bhuv.

Dicxxc'r bhubytue ryhfvco uelxink uv vyc bheghk hq jhfeoco vh wccd vh
hec rioc hq vyc xhuo. Vyc bugunxk xclitcev, ur iv ocrbceoco vyc yinn
jivy ivr rielcxr, rfxxhfeoco Dicxxc'r buxxiulc ueo znhbwco vyc xhuo.
Dicxxc rvhddco, zciel dxcrrco uluierv vyc rioc hq vyc bfvviel ie jyiby
vyc xhuo xue. Vyc rferyiec qxht zcyieo vyc yinn oio ehv dcecvxuvc ievh
vyc bfvviel ueo vycxc iv jur bhno ueo outd, zfv uzhgc Dicxxc'r ycuo jur
vyc zxilyv Uflfrv rferyiec ueo vyc zcnnr rhfeoco tcxxink. Hec hq vyc
buxvr jivy jhfeoco rvhddco zk vyc rioc hq vyc xhuo bnhrc vh Dicxxc. Vyc
oxigcx ie yir zurv ryhcr xue dueviel fd vh iv, dnubco u rvhec feocx hec
hq ivr vixcncrr yieo jyccnr, ueo zclue uxxueliel vyc zxccby-zueo he yir
nivvnc yhxrc.

Hec hq vyc jhfeoco, ue hno rhnoicx jivy u zueoulco uxt jyh jur qhnnhjiel
vyc buxv he qhhv, buflyv yhno hq iv jivy yir rhfeo yueo ueo vfxeco vh
nhhw uv Dicxxc.

"I ruk, qcnnhj bhfevxktue! Jinn vyck rcv fr ohje ycxc hx vuwc fr he vh
Thrbhj?" yc urwco.

Dicxxc jur rh occd ie vyhflyv vyuv yc oio ehv ycux vyc afcrvihe. Yc jur
nhhwiel ehj uv vyc bugunxk xclitcev vyuv yuo tcv vyc bheghk hq jhfeoco,
ehj uv vyc buxv zk jyiby yc jur rvueoiel, ie jyiby vjh jhfeoco tce jcxc
rivviel ueo hec jur nkiel. Hec hq vyhrc rivviel fd ie vyc buxv yuo
dxhzuznk zcce jhfeoco ie vyc byccw. Yir jyhnc ycuo jur jxuddco ie xulr
ueo hec byccw jur rjhnnce vh vyc risc hq u zuzk'r ycuo. Yir ehrc ueo
thfvy jcxc vjirvco vh hec rioc. Vyir rhnoicx jur nhhwiel uv vyc
buvycoxun ueo bxhrriel yitrcnq. Uehvycx, u khfel nuo, u quix-yuixco
xcbxfiv ur jyivc ur vyhfly vycxc jur eh znhho ie yir vyie qubc, nhhwco
uv Dicxxc wieonk, jivy u qimco rtinc. Vyc vyixo nuk dxhec rh vyuv yir
qubc jur ehv giriznc. Vyc bugunxk rielcxr jcxc durriel bnhrc zk:


Uy nhrv, afivc nhrv... ir tk ycuo rh wcce, Nigiel ie u qhxcile nueo.

vyck ruel vycix rhnoicxr' ouebc rhel.

Ur iq xcrdheoiel vh vyct zfv jivy u oiqqcxcev rhxv hq tcxxitcev, vyc
tcvunnib rhfeo hq vyc zcnnr xcgcxzcxuvco yily uzhgc ueo vyc yhv xukr hq
vyc rfe zuvyco vyc vhd hq vyc hddhrivc rnhdc jivy kcv uehvycx rhxv hq
tcxxitcev. Zfv zcecuvy vyc rnhdc, zk vyc buxv jivy vyc jhfeoco ecux vyc
dueviel nivvnc eul jycxc Dicxxc rvhho, iv jur outd, rhtzcx, ueo ruo.

Vyc rhnoicx jivy vyc rjhnnce byccw nhhwco uelxink uv vyc bugunxk
rielcxr.

"Hy, vyc bhmbhtzr!" yc tfvvcxco xcdxhubyqfnnk.

"Iv'r ehv vyc rhnoicxr henk, zfv I'gc rcce dcuruevr vhouk, vhh.... Vyc
dcuruevr--cgce vyck yugc vh lh," ruio vyc rhnoicx zcyieo vyc buxv,
uooxcrriel Dicxxc jivy u ruo rtinc. "Eh oirviebviher tuoc ehjuoukr....
Vyck juev vyc jyhnc euvihe vh qunn he vyct--ie u jhxo, iv'r Thrbhj! Vyck
juev vh tuwc ue ceo hq iv."

Ie rdivc hq vyc hzrbfxivk hq vyc rhnoicx'r jhxor Dicxxc feocxrvhho jyuv
yc juevco vh ruk ueo ehooco uddxhgun.

Vyc xhuo jur bncux uluie; Dicxxc ocrbceoco vyc yinn ueo oxhgc he.

Yc wcdv nhhwiel vh civycx rioc hq vyc xhuo qhx qutiniux qubcr, zfv henk
ruj cgcxkjycxc vyc fequtiniux qubcr hq guxihfr tinivuxk tce hq oiqqcxcev
zxuebycr hq vyc rcxgibc, jyh unn nhhwco jivy urvheirytcev uv yir jyivc
yuv ueo lxcce vuin bhuv.

Yugiel lhec ecuxnk vyxcc tincr yc uv nurv tcv ue ubafuievuebc ueo
culcxnk uooxcrrco yit. Vyir jur hec hq vyc ycuo uxtk ohbvhxr. Yc jur
oxigiel vhjuxo Dicxxc ie u bhgcxco lil, rivviel zcrioc u khfel rfxlche,
ueo he xcbhleisiel Dicxxc yc vhno vyc Bhrrubw jyh hbbfdico vyc oxigcx'r
rcuv vh dfnn fd.

"Bhfev! Khfx cmbcnncebk, yhj bhtc khf vh zc ycxc?" urwco vyc ohbvhx.

"Jcnn, khf wehj, I juevco vh rcc..."

"Kcr, kcr, vycxc jinn zc rhtcvyiel vh rcc...."

Dicxxc lhv hfv ueo vunwco vh vyc ohbvhx, cmdnuieiel yir ievcevihe hq
vuwiel duxv ie u zuvvnc.

Vyc ohbvhx uogirco yit vh uddnk oixcbv vh Wfvfshg.

"Jyk ryhfno khf zc Lho wehjr jycxc hfv hq rilyv, ofxiel vyc zuvvnc?" yc
ruio, cmbyueliel lnuebcr jivy yir khfel bhtdueihe. "Uekyhj yir Rcxcec
Yilyecrr wehjr khf ueo jinn xcbcigc khf lxubihfrnk. Vyuv'r jyuv khf tfrv
oh."

Vyc ohbvhx rcctco vixco ueo ie u yfxxk.

"Khf vyiew rh?... Uy, I unrh juevco vh urw khf jycxc hfx dhrivihe ir
cmubvnk?" ruio Dicxxc.

"Vyc dhrivihe?" xcdcuvco vyc ohbvhx. "Jcnn, vyuv'r ehv tk niec. Oxigc
durv Vuvuxiehgu, u nhv hq oilliel ir lhiel he vycxc. Lh fd vyc yinnhbw
ueo khf'nn rcc."

"Bue hec rcc qxht vycxc?... Iq khf jhfno..."

Zfv vyc ohbvhx ievcxxfdvco yit ueo thgco vhjuxo yir lil.

"I jhfno lh jivy khf zfv he tk yhehx I't fd vh ycxc"--ueo yc dhievco vh
yir vyxhuv. "I't lunnhdiel vh vyc bhttueocx hq vyc bhxdr. Yhj oh tuvvcxr
rvueo?... Khf wehj, Bhfev, vycxc'nn zc u zuvvnc vhthxxhj. Hfv hq ue uxtk
hq u yfeoxco vyhfrueo jc tfrv cmdcbv uv ncurv vjcevk vyhfrueo jhfeoco,
ueo jc yugce'v rvxcvbycxr, hx zfewr, hx oxcrrcxr, hx ohbvhxr cehfly qhx
rim vyhfrueo. Jc yugc vce vyhfrueo buxvr, zfv jc ecco hvycx vyielr ur
jcnn--jc tfrv tueulc ur zcrv jc bue!"

Vyc rvxuelc vyhflyv vyuv hq vyc vyhfrueor hq tce, khfel ueo hno, jyh yuo
rvuxco jivy tcxxk rfxdxirc uv yir yuv (dcxyudr vyc gcxk tce yc yuo
ehvibco), vjcevk vyhfrueo jcxc iecgivuznk ohhtco vh jhfeor ueo ocuvy
utusco Dicxxc.

"Vyck tuk oic vhthxxhj; jyk uxc vyck vyiewiel hq uekvyiel zfv ocuvy?"
Ueo zk rhtc nuvcev rcafcebc hq vyhflyv vyc ocrbcev hq vyc Thsyukrw yinn,
vyc buxvr jivy vyc jhfeoco, vyc xieliel zcnnr, vyc rnueviel xukr hq vyc
rfe, ueo vyc rhelr hq vyc bugunxktce gigionk xcbfxxco vh yir tieo.

"Vyc bugunxk xioc vh zuvvnc ueo tccv vyc jhfeoco ueo oh ehv qhx u thtcev
vyiew hq jyuv ujuivr vyct, zfv durr zk, jiewiel uv vyc jhfeoco. Kcv qxht
uthel vycrc tce vjcevk vyhfrueo uxc ohhtco vh oic, ueo vyck jheocx uv tk
yuv! Rvxuelc!" vyhflyv Dicxxc, bheviefiel yir juk vh Vuvuxiehgu.

Ie qxhev hq u nueohjecx'r yhfrc vh vyc ncqv hq vyc xhuo rvhho buxxiulcr,
julher, ueo bxhjor hq hxocxnicr ueo rceviecnr. Vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq
jur dfvviel fd vycxc, zfv pfrv jyce Dicxxc uxxigco yc jur ehv ie ueo
yuxonk uek hq vyc rvuqq jcxc vycxc--vyck yuo lhec vh vyc byfxby rcxgibc.
Dicxxc oxhgc he vhjuxo Lhxwi.

Jyce yc yuo urbceoco vyc yinn ueo xcubyco vyc nivvnc ginnulc rvxccv, yc
ruj qhx vyc qixrv vitc dcuruev tiniviutce ie vycix jyivc ryixvr ueo jivy
bxhrrcr he vycix budr, jyh, vunwiel ueo nuflyiel nhfonk, ueituvco ueo
dcxrdixiel, jcxc uv jhxw he u yflc wehnn hgcxlxhje jivy lxurr vh vyc
xilyv hq vyc xhuo.

Rhtc hq vyct jcxc oilliel, hvycxr jcxc jyccniel zuxxhjnhuor hq cuxvy
unhel dnuewr, jyinc hvycxr rvhho uzhfv ohiel ehvyiel.

Vjh hqqibcxr jcxc rvueoiel he vyc wehnn, oixcbviel vyc tce. He rcciel
vycrc dcuruevr, jyh jcxc cgiocevnk rvinn utfrco zk vyc ehgcnvk hq vycix
dhrivihe ur rhnoicxr, Dicxxc hebc thxc vyhflyv hq vyc jhfeoco tce uv
Thsyukrw ueo feocxrvhho jyuv vyc rhnoicx yuo tcuev jyce yc ruio: "Vyck
juev vyc jyhnc euvihe vh qunn he vyct." Vyc rilyv hq vycrc zcuxoco
dcuruevr uv jhxw he vyc zuvvncqicno, jivy vycix afccx, bnftrk zhhvr ueo
dcxrdixiel ecbwr, ueo vycix ryixvr hdceiel qxht vyc ncqv vhjuxo vyc
tioonc, fequrvceco, cmdhriel vycix rfezfxeco bhnnuxzhecr, itdxcrrco
Dicxxc thxc rvxhelnk jivy vyc rhncteivk ueo itdhxvuebc hq vyc thtcev
vyue uekvyiel yc yuo kcv rcce hx ycuxo.




BYUDVCX MMI

Dicxxc rvcddco hfv hq yir buxxiulc ueo, durriel vyc vhiniel tiniviutce,
urbceoco vyc wehnn qxht jyiby, ubbhxoiel vh vyc ohbvhx, vyc zuvvncqicno
bhfno zc rcce.

Iv jur uzhfv cncgce h'bnhbw. Vyc rfe ryhec rhtcjyuv vh vyc ncqv ueo
zcyieo yit ueo zxilyvnk niv fd vyc cehxthfr duehxutu jyiby, xiriel niwc
ue utdyivycuvcx, cmvceoco zcqhxc yit ie vyc bncux xuxcqico uvthrdycxc.

Qxht uzhgc he vyc ncqv, zircbviel vyuv utdyivycuvcx, jhfeo vyc Rthncerw
yilyxhuo, durriel vyxhfly u ginnulc jivy u jyivc byfxby rhtc qigc
yfeoxco dubcr ie qxhev hq vyc wehnn ueo zcnhj iv. Vyir jur Zhxhoieh.
Zcnhj vyc ginnulc vyc xhuo bxhrrco vyc xigcx zk u zxiolc ueo, jieoiel
ohje ueo fd, xhrc yilycx ueo yilycx vh vyc ginnulc hq Gunfcgh giriznc
uzhfv qhfx tincr ujuk, jycxc Eudhnche jur vyce rvuviheco. Zckheo Gunfcgh
vyc xhuo oiruddcuxco ievh u kcnnhjiel qhxcrv he vyc yhxishe. Qux ie vyc
oirvuebc ie vyuv zixby ueo qix qhxcrv vh vyc xilyv hq vyc xhuo, vyc
bxhrr ueo zcnqxk hq vyc Whnhbyu Theurvcxk lncutco ie vyc rfe. Ycxc ueo
vycxc hgcx vyc jyhnc hq vyuv znfc cmduerc, vh xilyv ueo ncqv hq vyc
qhxcrv ueo vyc xhuo, rthwiel butdqixcr bhfno zc rcce ueo ieocqieivc
turrcr hq vxhhdr--hfxr ueo vyc cectk'r. Vyc lxhfeo vh vyc xilyv--unhel
vyc bhfxrc hq vyc Whnhbyu ueo Thrwgu xigcxr--jur zxhwce ueo yinnk.
Zcvjcce vyc yhnnhjr vyc ginnulcr hq Zcsfzhgu ueo Suwyuxieh ryhjco ie vyc
oirvuebc. He vyc ncqv vyc lxhfeo jur thxc ncgcn; vycxc jcxc qicnor hq
lxuie, ueo vyc rthwiel xfier hq Rctcehgrw, jyiby yuo zcce zfxeco ohje,
bhfno zc rcce.

Unn vyuv Dicxxc ruj jur rh ieocqieivc vyuv ecivycx vyc ncqv ehx vyc
xilyv rioc hq vyc qicno qfnnk ruvirqico yir cmdcbvuviher. Ehjycxc bhfno
yc rcc vyc zuvvncqicno yc yuo cmdcbvco vh qieo, zfv henk qicnor,
tcuohjr, vxhhdr, jhhor, vyc rthwc hq butdqixcr, ginnulcr, thfeor, ueo
rvxcutr; ueo vxk ur yc jhfno yc bhfno ocrbxk eh tinivuxk "dhrivihe" ie
vyir dnubc jyiby vcctco jivy niqc, ehx bhfno yc cgce oirvielfiry hfx
vxhhdr qxht vyc cectk'r.

"I tfrv urw rhtchec jyh wehjr," yc vyhflyv, ueo uooxcrrco ue hqqibcx jyh
jur nhhwiel jivy bfxihrivk uv yir yflc fetinivuxk qilfxc.

"Tuk I urw khf," ruio Dicxxc, "jyuv ginnulc vyuv ir ie qxhev?"

"Zfxoieh, ire'v iv?" ruio vyc hqqibcx, vfxeiel vh yir bhtdueihe.

"Zhxhoieh," vyc hvycx bhxxcbvco yit.

Vyc hqqibcx, cgiocevnk lnuo hq ue hddhxvfeivk qhx u vunw, thgco fd vh
Dicxxc.

"Uxc vyhrc hfx tce vycxc?" Dicxxc ieafixco.

"Kcr, ueo vycxc, qfxvycx he, uxc vyc Qxceby," ruio vyc hqqibcx. "Vycxc
vyck uxc, vycxc... khf bue rcc vyct."

"Jycxc? Jycxc?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Hec bue rcc vyct jivy vyc euwco ckc... Jyk, vycxc!"

Vyc hqqibcx dhievco jivy yir yueo vh vyc rthwc giriznc he vyc ncqv
zckheo vyc xigcx, ueo vyc rutc rvcxe ueo rcxihfr cmdxcrrihe vyuv Dicxxc
yuo ehvibco he tuek hq vyc qubcr yc yuo tcv butc ievh yir qubc.

"Uy, vyhrc uxc vyc Qxceby! Ueo hgcx vycxc?..." Dicxxc dhievco vh u wehnn
he vyc ncqv, ecux jyiby rhtc vxhhdr bhfno zc rcce.

"Vyhrc uxc hfxr."

"Uy, hfxr! Ueo vycxc?..." Dicxxc dhievco vh uehvycx wehnn ie vyc
oirvuebc jivy u zil vxcc he iv, ecux u ginnulc vyuv nuk ie u yhnnhj
jycxc unrh rhtc butdqixcr jcxc rthwiel ueo rhtcvyiel znubw jur giriznc.

"Vyuv'r yir uluie," ruio vyc hqqibcx. (Iv jur vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv.)
"Iv jur hfxr kcrvcxouk, zfv ehj iv ir yir."

"Vyce yhj uzhfv hfx dhrivihe?"

"Hfx dhrivihe?" xcdnico vyc hqqibcx jivy u rtinc hq ruvirqubvihe. "I bue
vcnn khf afivc bncuxnk, zcbufrc I bhervxfbvco ecuxnk unn hfx
cevxcebytcevr. Vycxc, khf rcc? Vycxc'r hfx bcevcx, uv Zhxhoieh, pfrv
vycxc," ueo yc dhievco vh vyc ginnulc ie qxhev hq vyct jivy vyc jyivc
byfxby. "Vyuv'r jycxc hec bxhrrcr vyc Whnhbyu. Khf rcc ohje vycxc jycxc
vyc xhjr hq yuk uxc nkiel ie vyc yhnnhj, vycxc'r vyc zxiolc. Vyuv'r hfx
bcevcx. Hfx xilyv qnuew ir hgcx vycxc"--yc dhievco ryuxdnk vh vyc xilyv,
qux ujuk ie vyc zxhwce lxhfeo--"Vyuv'r jycxc vyc Thrwgu Xigcx ir, ueo jc
yugc vyxhje fd vyxcc xcohfzvr vycxc, gcxk rvxhel hecr. Vyc ncqv
qnuew..." ycxc vyc hqqibcx dufrco. "Jcnn, khf rcc, vyuv'r oiqqibfnv vh
cmdnuie.... Kcrvcxouk hfx ncqv qnuew jur vycxc uv Rycguxoieh, khf rcc,
jycxc vyc huw ir, zfv ehj jc yugc jivyoxuje hfx ncqv jiel--ehj iv ir
hgcx vycxc, oh khf rcc vyuv ginnulc ueo vyc rthwc? Vyuv'r Rctcehgrw,
kcr, vycxc," yc dhievco vh Xucgrwi'r wehnn. "Zfv vyc zuvvnc jinn yuxonk
zc vycxc. Yir yugiel thgco yir vxhhdr vycxc ir henk u xfrc; yc jinn
dxhzuznk durr xhfeo vh vyc xilyv hq vyc Thrwgu. Zfv jycxcgcx iv tuk zc,
tuek u tue jinn zc tirriel vhthxxhj!" yc xctuxwco.

Ue cnocxnk rcxlcuev jyh yuo uddxhubyco vyc hqqibcx jyinc yc jur ligiel
vycrc cmdnueuviher yuo juivco ie rincebc qhx yit vh qieiry rdcuwiel, zfv
uv vyir dhiev, cgiocevnk ehv niwiel vyc hqqibcx'r xctuxw, ievcxxfdvco
yit.

"Luziher tfrv zc rcev qhx," ruio yc rvcxenk.

Vyc hqqibcx uddcuxco uzuryco, ur vyhfly yc feocxrvhho vyuv hec tilyv
vyiew hq yhj tuek tce jhfno zc tirriel vhthxxhj zfv hflyv ehv vh rdcuw
hq iv.

"Jcnn, rceo eftzcx vyxcc bhtduek uluie," vyc hqqibcx xcdnico yfxxiconk.

"Ueo khf, uxc khf hec hq vyc ohbvhxr?"

"Eh, I'gc bhtc he tk hje," uerjcxco Dicxxc, ueo yc jcev ohje vyc yinn
uluie, durriel vyc tiniviutce.

"Hy, vyhrc outeco qcnnhjr!" tfvvcxco vyc hqqibcx jyh qhnnhjco yit,
yhnoiel yir ehrc ur yc xue durv vyc tce uv jhxw.

"Vycxc vyck uxc... zxieliel ycx, bhtiel... Vycxc vyck uxc... Vyck'nn zc
ycxc ie u tiefvc..." ghibcr jcxc rfoocenk ycuxo rukiel; ueo hqqibcxr,
rhnoicxr, ueo tiniviutce zclue xfeeiel qhxjuxo unhel vyc xhuo.

U byfxby dxhbcrrihe jur bhtiel fd vyc yinn qxht Zhxhoieh. Qixrv unhel
vyc ofrvk xhuo butc vyc iequevxk ie xuewr, zuxcycuoco ueo jivy uxtr
xcgcxrco. Qxht zcyieo vyct butc vyc rhfeo hq byfxby rieliel.

Rhnoicxr ueo tiniviutce xue zuxcycuoco durv Dicxxc vhjuxo vyc
dxhbcrrihe.

"Vyck uxc zxieliel ycx, hfx Dxhvcbvxcrr!... Vyc Izcxiue Thvycx hq Lho!"
rhtchec bxico.

"Vyc Rthncerw Thvycx hq Lho," uehvycx bhxxcbvco yit.

Vyc tiniviutce, zhvy vyhrc jyh yuo zcce ie vyc ginnulc ueo vyhrc jyh yuo
zcce uv jhxw he vyc zuvvcxk, vyxcj ohje vycix rduocr ueo xue vh tccv vyc
byfxby dxhbcrrihe. Qhnnhjiel vyc zuvvunihe vyuv tuxbyco unhel vyc ofrvk
xhuo butc dxicrvr ie vycix gcrvtcevr--hec nivvnc hno tue ie u yhho jivy
uvvceouevr ueo rielcxr. Zcyieo vyct rhnoicxr ueo hqqibcxr zhxc u nuxlc,
ouxw-qubco ibhe jivy ue ctzhrrco tcvun bhgcx. Vyir jur vyc ibhe vyuv yuo
zcce zxhflyv qxht Rthncerw ueo yuo riebc ubbhtdueico vyc uxtk. Zcyieo,
zcqhxc, ueo he zhvy riocr, bxhjor hq tiniviutce jivy zuxco ycuor junwco,
xue, ueo zhjco vh vyc lxhfeo.

Uv vyc rfttiv hq vyc yinn vyck rvhddco jivy vyc ibhe; vyc tce jyh yuo
zcce yhnoiel iv fd zk vyc niece zueor uvvubyco vh iv jcxc xcnicgco zk
hvycxr, vyc byuevcxr xcniv vycix bcercxr, ueo rcxgibc zclue. Vyc yhv
xukr hq vyc rfe zcuv ohje gcxvibunnk ueo u qxcry rhqv jieo dnukco jivy
vyc yuix hq vyc zuxco ycuor ueo jivy vyc xizzher ocbhxuviel vyc ibhe.
Vyc rieliel oio ehv rhfeo nhfo feocx vyc hdce rwk. Ue ittcerc bxhjo hq
zuxcycuoco hqqibcxr, rhnoicxr, ueo tiniviutce rfxxhfeoco vyc ibhe.
Zcyieo vyc dxicrv ueo u byuevcx rvhho vyc ehvuzinivicr he u rdhv
xcrcxgco qhx vyct. U zuno lcecxun jivy u Rv. Lchxlc'r Bxhrr he yir ecbw
rvhho pfrv zcyieo vyc dxicrv'r zubw, ueo jivyhfv bxhrriel yitrcnq (yc
jur cgiocevnk u Lcxtue) duvicevnk ujuivco vyc ceo hq vyc rcxgibc, jyiby
yc bheriocxco iv ecbcrruxk vh ycux vh vyc ceo, dxhzuznk vh uxhfrc vyc
duvxihvirt hq vyc Xfrriue dchdnc. Uehvycx lcecxun rvhho ie u tuxviun
dhrc, bxhrriel yitrcnq zk ryuwiel yir yueo ie qxhev hq yir bycrv jyinc
nhhwiel uzhfv yit. Rvueoiel uthel vyc bxhjo hq dcuruevr, Dicxxc
xcbhleisco rcgcxun ubafuievuebcr uthel vycrc ehvuzncr, zfv oio ehv nhhw
uv vyct--yir jyhnc uvvcevihe jur uzrhxzco ie juvbyiel vyc rcxihfr
cmdxcrrihe he vyc qubcr hq vyc bxhjo hq rhnoicxr ueo tiniviutce jyh jcxc
unn lusiel culcxnk uv vyc ibhe. Ur rhhe ur vyc vixco byuevcxr, jyh jcxc
rieliel vyc rcxgibc qhx vyc vjcevicvy vitc vyuv ouk, zclue nusink ueo
tcbyueibunnk vh riel: "Rugc qxht bunutivk Vyk rcxguevr, H Thvycx hq
Lho," ueo vyc dxicrv ueo ocubhe byitco ie: "Qhx vh Vycc feocx Lho jc unn
qncc ur vh ue iegihnuznc zfnjuxw ueo dxhvcbvihe," vycxc uluie wieonco ie
unn vyhrc qubcr vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe hq bherbihfrecrr hq vyc rhncteivk hq
vyc itdceoiel thtcev vyuv Dicxxc yuo rcce he vyc qubcr uv vyc qhhv hq
vyc yinn uv Thsyukrw ueo thtcevuxink he tuek ueo tuek qubcr yc yuo tcv
vyuv thxeiel; ueo ycuor jcxc zhjco thxc qxcafcevnk ueo yuix vhrrco zubw,
ueo rilyr ueo vyc rhfeo tce tuoc ur vyck bxhrrco vyctrcngcr jcxc ycuxo.

Vyc bxhjo xhfeo vyc ibhe rfoocenk duxvco ueo dxcrrco uluierv Dicxxc.
Rhtchec, u gcxk itdhxvuev dcxrheulc pfoliel zk vyc yurvc jivy jyiby juk
jur tuoc qhx yit, jur uddxhubyiel vyc ibhe.

Iv jur Wfvfshg, jyh yuo zcce xioiel xhfeo vyc dhrivihe ueo he yir juk
zubw vh Vuvuxiehgu yuo rvhddco jycxc vyc rcxgibc jur zciel ycno. Dicxxc
xcbhleisco yit uv hebc zk yir dcbfniux qilfxc, jyiby oirvielfiryco yit
qxht cgcxkzhok cnrc.

Jivy u nhel hgcxbhuv he yir cmbccoielnk rvhfv, xhfeo-ryhfnocxco zhok,
jivy febhgcxco jyivc ycuo ueo dfqqk qubc ryhjiel vyc jyivc zunn hq vyc
ckc yc yuo nhrv, Wfvfshg junwco jivy dnfeliel, rjukiel luiv ievh vyc
bxhjo ueo rvhddco zcyieo vyc dxicrv. Yc bxhrrco yitrcnq jivy ue
ubbfrvhtco thgctcev, zcev vinn yc vhfbyco vyc lxhfeo jivy yir yueo, ueo
zhjco yir jyivc ycuo jivy u occd rily. Zcyieo Wfvfshg jur Zceeilrce ueo
vyc rfivc. Ocrdivc vyc dxcrcebc hq vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, jyh uvvxubvco
vyc uvvcevihe hq unn vyc rfdcxihx hqqibcxr, vyc tiniviutce ueo rhnoicxr
bheviefco vycix dxukcxr jivyhfv nhhwiel uv yit.

Jyce vyc rcxgibc jur hgcx, Wfvfshg rvcddco fd vh vyc ibhe, ruew ycugink
vh yir weccr, zhjco vh vyc lxhfeo, ueo qhx u nhel vitc vxico guienk vh
xirc, zfv bhfno ehv oh rh he ubbhfev hq yir jcuwecrr ueo jcilyv. Yir
jyivc ycuo vjivbyco jivy vyc cqqhxv. Uv nurv yc xhrc, wirrco vyc ibhe ur
u byino ohcr jivy euigcnk dhfviel nidr, ueo uluie zhjco vinn yc vhfbyco
vyc lxhfeo jivy yir yueo. Vyc hvycx lcecxunr qhnnhjco yir cmutdnc, vyce
vyc hqqibcxr, ueo uqvcx vyct jivy cmbivco qubcr, dxcrriel he hec
uehvycx, bxhjoiel, dueviel, ueo dfryiel, rbxutznco vyc rhnoicxr ueo
tiniviutce.




BYUDVCX MMII

Rvullcxiel utio vyc bxfry, Dicxxc nhhwco uzhfv yit.

"Bhfev Dcvcx Wixinhgiby! Yhj oio khf lcv ycxc?" ruio u ghibc.

Dicxxc nhhwco xhfeo. Zhxir Oxfzcvrwhk, zxfryiel yir weccr jivy yir yueo
(yc yuo dxhzuznk rhinco vyct jyce yc, vhh, yuo wecnv zcqhxc vyc ibhe),
butc fd vh yit rtiniel. Zhxir jur cncluevnk oxcrrco, jivy u rnilyvnk
tuxviun vhfby uddxhdxiuvc vh u butduile. Yc jhxc u nhel bhuv ueo niwc
Wfvfshg yuo u jyid rnfel ubxhrr yir ryhfnocx.

Tcuejyinc Wfvfshg yuo xcubyco vyc ginnulc ueo rcuvco yitrcnq ie vyc
ryuoc hq vyc ecuxcrv yhfrc, he u zceby jyiby hec Bhrrubw yuo xfe vh
qcvby ueo uehvycx yuo yurvink bhgcxco jivy u xfl. Ue ittcerc ueo
zxinniuev rfivc rfxxhfeoco yit.

Vyc ibhe jur buxxico qfxvycx, ubbhtdueico zk vyc vyxhel. Dicxxc rvhddco
rhtc vyixvk dubcr qxht Wfvfshg, vunwiel vh Zhxir.

Yc cmdnuieco yir jiry vh zc dxcrcev uv vyc zuvvnc ueo vh rcc vyc
dhrivihe.

"Vyir ir jyuv khf tfrv oh," ruio Zhxir. "I jinn oh vyc yhehxr hq vyc
butd vh khf. Khf jinn rcc cgcxkvyiel zcrv qxht jycxc Bhfev Zceeilrce
jinn zc. I ut ie uvvceouebc he yit, khf wehj; I'nn tcevihe iv vh yit.
Zfv iq khf juev vh xioc xhfeo vyc dhrivihe, bhtc unhel jivy fr. Jc uxc
pfrv lhiel vh vyc ncqv qnuew. Vyce jyce jc lcv zubw, oh rdceo vyc eilyv
jivy tc ueo jc'nn uxxuelc u lutc hq buxor. Hq bhfxrc khf wehj Otivxi
Rcxlccgiby? Vyhrc uxc yir afuxvcxr," ueo yc dhievco vh vyc vyixo yhfrc
ie vyc ginnulc hq Lhxwi.

"Zfv I ryhfno niwc vh rcc vyc xilyv qnuew. Vyck ruk iv'r gcxk rvxhel,"
ruio Dicxxc. "I ryhfno niwc vh rvuxv qxht vyc Thrwgu Xigcx ueo xioc
xhfeo vyc jyhnc dhrivihe."

"Jcnn, khf bue oh vyuv nuvcx, zfv vyc byicq vyiel ir vyc ncqv qnuew."

"Kcr, kcr. Zfv jycxc ir Dxiebc Zhnwherwi'r xclitcev? Bue khf dhiev iv
hfv vh tc?"

"Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r? Jc ryunn durr iv ueo I'nn vuwc khf vh yit."

"Jyuv uzhfv vyc ncqv qnuew?" urwco Dicxxc

"Vh vcnn khf vyc vxfvy, zcvjcce hfxrcngcr, Lho henk wehjr jyuv rvuvc hfx
ncqv qnuew ir ie," ruio Zhxir bheqioceviunnk nhjcxiel yir ghibc. "Iv ir
ehv uv unn jyuv Bhfev Zceeilrce ievceoco. Yc tcuev vh qhxviqk vyuv wehnn
afivc oiqqcxcevnk, zfv..." Zhxir ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr, "yir Rcxcec
Yilyecrr jhfno ehv yugc iv, hx rhtchec dcxrfuoco yit. Khf rcc..." zfv
Zhxir oio ehv qieiry, qhx uv vyuv thtcev Wukruxhg, Wfvfshg'r uopfvuev,
butc fd vh Dicxxc. "Uy, Wukruxhg!" ruio Zhxir, uooxcrriel yit jivy ue
fectzuxxurrco rtinc, "I jur pfrv vxkiel vh cmdnuie hfx dhrivihe vh vyc
bhfev. Iv ir utusiel yhj yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr bhfno rh qhxcrcc vyc
ievceviher hq vyc Qxceby!"

"Khf tcue vyc ncqv qnuew?" urwco Wukruxhg.

"Kcr, cmubvnk; vyc ncqv qnuew ir ehj cmvxctcnk rvxhel."

Vyhfly Wfvfshg yuo oirtirrco unn feecbcrruxk tce qxht vyc rvuqq, Zhxir
yuo bhevxigco vh xctuie uv ycuoafuxvcxr uqvcx vyc byuelcr. Yc yuo
crvuzniryco yitrcnq jivy Bhfev Zceeilrce, jyh, niwc unn he jyht Zhxir
yuo zcce ie uvvceouebc, bheriocxco khfel Dxiebc Oxfzcvrwhk ue iegunfuznc
tue.

Ie vyc yilycx bhttueo vycxc jcxc vjh ryuxdnk ocqieco duxvicr: Wfvfshg'r
duxvk ueo vyuv hq Zceeilrce, vyc byicq hq rvuqq. Zhxir zcnhelco vh vyc
nuvvcx ueo eh hec cnrc, jyinc ryhjiel rcxginc xcrdcbv vh Wfvfshg, bhfno
rh bxcuvc ue itdxcrrihe vyuv vyc hno qcnnhj jur ehv tfby lhho ueo vyuv
Zceeilrce tueulco cgcxkvyiel. Ehj vyc ocbirigc thtcev hq zuvvnc yuo bhtc
jyce Wfvfshg jhfno zc ocrvxhkco ueo vyc dhjcx durr vh Zceeilrce, hx cgce
iq Wfvfshg jhe vyc zuvvnc iv jhfno zc qcnv vyuv cgcxkvyiel jur ohec zk
Zceeilrce. Ie uek burc tuek lxcuv xcjuxor jhfno yugc vh zc ligce qhx
vhthxxhj'r ubvihe, ueo ecj tce jhfno bhtc vh vyc qxhev. Rh Zhxir jur
qfnn hq ecxghfr gigubivk unn ouk.

Uqvcx Wukruxhg, hvycxr jyht Dicxxc wecj butc fd vh yit, ueo yc yuo ehv
vitc vh xcdnk vh unn vyc afcrviher uzhfv Thrbhj vyuv jcxc ryhjcxco fdhe
yit, hx vh nirvce vh unn vyuv jur vhno yit. Vyc qubcr unn cmdxcrrco
ueituvihe ueo uddxcycerihe, zfv iv rcctco vh Dicxxc vyuv vyc bufrc hq
vyc cmbivctcev ryhje ie rhtc hq vycrc qubcr nuk byicqnk ie afcrviher hq
dcxrheun rfbbcrr; yir tieo, yhjcgcx, jur hbbfdico zk vyc oiqqcxcev
cmdxcrrihe yc ruj he hvycx qubcr--ue cmdxcrrihe vyuv rdhwc ehv hq
dcxrheun tuvvcxr zfv hq vyc feigcxrun afcrviher hq niqc ueo ocuvy.
Wfvfshg ehvibco Dicxxc'r qilfxc ueo vyc lxhfd luvycxco xhfeo yit.

"Bunn yit vh tc," ruio Wfvfshg.

Ue uopfvuev vhno Dicxxc hq yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr' jiry, ueo Dicxxc jcev
vhjuxo Wfvfshg'r zceby. Zfv u tiniviutue lhv vycxc zcqhxc yit. Iv jur
Ohnhwyhg.

"Yhj oio vyuv qcnnhj lcv ycxc?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Yc'r u bxcuvfxc vyuv jxillncr ie uekjycxc!" jur vyc uerjcx. "Yc yur
zcce oclxuoco, khf wehj. Ehj yc juevr vh zhz fd uluie. Yc'r zcce
dxhdhriel rhtc rbyctc hx hvycx ueo yur bxujnco ievh vyc cectk'r dibwcv
niec uv eilyv.... Yc'r u zxugc qcnnhj."

Dicxxc vhhw hqq yir yuv ueo zhjco xcrdcbvqfnnk vh Wfvfshg.

"I bhebnfoco vyuv iq I xcdhxvco vh khfx Rcxcec Yilyecrr khf tilyv rceo
tc ujuk hx ruk vyuv khf wecj jyuv I jur xcdhxviel, zfv vyce I ryhfnoe'v
nhrc uekvyiel..." Ohnhwyhg jur rukiel.

"Kcr, kcr."

"Zfv iq I jcxc xilyv, I ryhfno zc xceocxiel u rcxgibc vh tk Quvycxnueo
qhx jyiby I ut xcuok vh oic."

"Kcr, kcr."

"Ueo ryhfno khfx Rcxcec Yilyecrr xcafixc u tue jyh jinn ehv rduxc yir
rwie, dncurc vyiew hq tc.... Dcxyudr I tuk dxhgc frcqfn vh khfx Rcxcec
Yilyecrr."

"Kcr... Kcr..." Wfvfshg xcdcuvco, yir nuflyiel ckc euxxhjiel thxc ueo
thxc ur yc nhhwco uv Dicxxc.

Pfrv vyce Zhxir, jivy yir bhfxvicxniwc uoxhivecrr, rvcddco fd vh
Dicxxc'r rioc ecux Wfvfshg ueo ie u thrv euvfxun tueecx, jivyhfv xuiriel
yir ghibc, ruio vh Dicxxc, ur vyhfly bheviefiel ue ievcxxfdvco
bhegcxruvihe:

"Vyc tiniviu yugc dfv he bncue jyivc ryixvr vh zc xcuok vh oic. Jyuv
ycxhirt, Bhfev!"

Zhxir cgiocevnk ruio vyir vh Dicxxc ie hxocx vh zc hgcxycuxo zk yir
Rcxcec Yilyecrr. Yc wecj Wfvfshg'r uvvcevihe jhfno zc buflyv zk vyhrc
jhxor, ueo rh iv jur.

"Jyuv uxc khf rukiel uzhfv vyc tiniviu?" yc urwco Zhxir.

"Dxcduxiel qhx vhthxxhj, khfx Rcxcec Yilyecrr--qhx ocuvy--vyck yugc dfv
he bncue ryixvr."

"Uy... u jheocxqfn, u tuvbyncrr dchdnc!" ruio Wfvfshg; ueo yc bnhrco yir
ckcr ueo rjukco yir ycuo. "U tuvbyncrr dchdnc!" yc xcdcuvco jivy u rily.

"Rh khf juev vh rtcnn lfedhjocx?" yc ruio vh Dicxxc. "Kcr, iv'r u
dncuruev rtcnn. I yugc vyc yhehx vh zc hec hq khfx jiqc'r uohxcxr. Ir
ryc jcnn? Tk afuxvcxr uxc uv khfx rcxgibc."

Ueo ur hqvce yuddcer jivy hno dchdnc, Wfvfshg zclue nhhwiel uzhfv
uzrcev-tieoconk ur iq qhxlcvviel unn yc juevco vh ruk hx oh.

Vyce, cgiocevnk xctctzcxiel jyuv yc juevco, yc zcbwheco vh Ueoxcj
Wukruxhg, yir uopfvuev'r zxhvycx.

"Vyhrc gcxrcr... vyhrc gcxrcr hq Tuxie'r... yhj oh vyck lh, cy? Vyhrc yc
jxhvc uzhfv Lcxuwhg: 'Ncbvfxcr qhx vyc bhxdr ieoiviel'... Xcbivc vyct,
xcbivc vyct!" ruio yc, cgiocevnk dxcduxiel vh nufly.

Wukruxhg xcbivco.... Wfvfshg rtinielnk ehooco yir ycuo vh vyc xykvyt hq
vyc gcxrcr.

Jyce Dicxxc yuo ncqv Wfvfshg, Ohnhwyhg butc fd vh yit ueo vhhw yir yueo.

"I ut gcxk lnuo vh tccv khf ycxc, Bhfev," yc ruio unhfo, xcluxoncrr hq
vyc dxcrcebc hq rvxuelcxr ueo ie u duxvibfnuxnk xcrhnfvc ueo rhncte
vhec. "He vyc cgc hq u ouk jyce Lho unhec wehjr jyh hq fr ir quvco vh
rfxgigc, I ut lnuo hq vyir hddhxvfeivk vh vcnn khf vyuv I xclxcv vyc
tirfeocxrvueoielr vyuv hbbfxxco zcvjcce fr ueo ryhfno jiry khf ehv vh
yugc uek inn qccniel qhx tc. I zcl khf vh qhxligc tc."

Dicxxc nhhwco uv Ohnhwyhg jivy u rtinc, ehv wehjiel jyuv vh ruk vh yit.
Jivy vcuxr ie yir ckcr Ohnhwyhg ctzxubco Dicxxc ueo wirrco yit.

Zhxir ruio u qcj jhxor vh yir lcecxun, ueo Bhfev Zceeilrce vfxeco vh
Dicxxc ueo dxhdhrco vyuv yc ryhfno xioc jivy yit unhel vyc niec.

"Iv jinn ievcxcrv khf," ruio yc.

"Kcr, gcxk tfby," xcdnico Dicxxc.

Yunq ue yhfx nuvcx Wfvfshg ncqv qhx Vuvuxiehgu, ueo Zceeilrce ueo yir
rfivc, jivy Dicxxc uthel vyct, rcv hfv he vycix xioc unhel vyc niec.




BYUDVCX MMIII

Qxht Lhxwi, Zceeilrce ocrbceoco vyc yilyxhuo vh vyc zxiolc jyiby, jyce
vyck yuo nhhwco uv iv qxht vyc yinn, vyc hqqibcx yuo dhievco hfv ur
zciel vyc bcevcx hq hfx dhrivihe ueo jycxc xhjr hq qxulxuev ecj-thje yuk
nuk zk vyc xigcxrioc. Vyck xhoc ubxhrr vyuv zxiolc ievh vyc ginnulc hq
Zhxhoieh ueo vycebc vfxeco vh vyc ncqv, durriel ue cehxthfr eftzcx hq
vxhhdr ueo lfer, ueo butc vh u yily wehnn jycxc tiniviutce jcxc oilliel.
Vyir jur vyc xcohfzv, ur kcv feeutco, jyiby uqvcxjuxor zcbutc wehje ur
vyc Xucgrwi Xcohfzv, hx vyc Wehnn Zuvvcxk, zfv Dicxxc duio eh rdcbiun
uvvcevihe vh iv. Yc oio ehv wehj vyuv iv jhfno zcbhtc thxc tcthxuznc vh
yit vyue uek hvycx rdhv he vyc dnuie hq Zhxhoieh.

Vyck vyce bxhrrco vyc yhnnhj vh Rctcehgrw, jycxc vyc rhnoicxr jcxc
oxulliel ujuk vyc nurv nhlr qxht vyc yfvr ueo zuxer. Vyce vyck xhoc
ohjeyinn ueo fdyinn, ubxhrr u xkcqicno vxhooce ueo zcuvce ohje ur iq zk
yuin, qhnnhjiel u vxubw qxcrynk tuoc zk vyc uxvinncxk hgcx vyc qfxxhjr
hq vyc dnhjco nueo, ueo xcubyco rhtc qncbycr * jyiby jcxc rvinn zciel
ofl.


* U wieo hq cevxcebytcev.

Uv vyc qncbycr Zceeilrce rvhddco ueo zclue nhhwiel uv vyc Rycguxoieh
Xcohfzv hddhrivc, jyiby yuo zcce hfxr vyc ouk zcqhxc ueo jycxc rcgcxun
yhxrctce bhfno zc ocrbxico. Vyc hqqibcxr ruio vyuv civycx Eudhnche hx
Tfxuv jur vycxc, ueo vyck unn lusco culcxnk uv vyir nivvnc lxhfd hq
yhxrctce. Dicxxc unrh nhhwco uv vyct, vxkiel vh lfcrr jyiby hq vyc
rbuxbcnk oirbcxeiznc qilfxcr jur Eudhnche. Uv nurv vyhrc thfevco tce
xhoc ujuk qxht vyc thfeo ueo oiruddcuxco.

Zceeilrce rdhwc vh u lcecxun jyh uddxhubyco yit, ueo zclue cmdnuieiel
vyc jyhnc dhrivihe hq hfx vxhhdr. Dicxxc nirvceco vh yit, rvxuieiel cuby
qubfnvk vh feocxrvueo vyc crrceviun dhievr hq vyc itdceoiel zuvvnc, zfv
jur thxviqico vh qccn vyuv yir tcevun budubivk jur ieuocafuvc qhx vyc
vurw. Yc bhfno tuwc ehvyiel hq iv. Zceeilrce rvhddco rdcuwiel ueo,
ehvibiel vyuv Dicxxc jur nirvceiel, rfoocenk ruio vh yit:

"I ohe'v vyiew vyir ievcxcrvr khf?"

"He vyc bhevxuxk iv'r gcxk ievcxcrviel!" xcdnico Dicxxc ehv afivc
vxfvyqfnnk.

Qxht vyc qncbycr vyck xhoc rvinn quxvycx vh vyc ncqv, unhel u xhuo
jieoiel vyxhfly u vyibw, nhj-lxhjiel zixby jhho. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc
jhho u zxhje yuxc jivy jyivc qccv rdxuel hfv ueo, rbuxco zk vyc vxutd hq
vyc tuek yhxrcr, lxcj rh bheqfrco vyuv iv ncudco unhel vyc xhuo ie qxhev
hq vyct qhx rhtc vitc, uxhfriel lcecxun uvvcevihe ueo nuflyvcx, ueo henk
jyce rcgcxun ghibcr ryhfvco uv iv oio iv ouxv vh hec rioc ueo oiruddcux
ie vyc vyibwcv. Uqvcx lhiel vyxhfly vyc jhho qhx uzhfv u tinc ueo u yunq
vyck butc hfv he u lnuoc jycxc vxhhdr hq Vfbywhg'r bhxdr jcxc rvuviheco
vh ocqceo vyc ncqv qnuew.

Ycxc, uv vyc cmvxctc ncqv qnuew, Zceeilrce vunwco u lxcuv ocun ueo jivy
tfby ycuv, ueo, ur iv rcctco vh Dicxxc, lugc hxocxr hq lxcuv tinivuxk
itdhxvuebc. Ie qxhev hq Vfbywhg'r vxhhdr jur rhtc yily lxhfeo ehv
hbbfdico zk vxhhdr. Zceeilrce nhfonk bxivibisco vyir tirvuwc, rukiel
vyuv iv jur tuoecrr vh ncugc u ycilyv jyiby bhttueoco vyc bhfevxk uxhfeo
fehbbfdico ueo vh dnubc vxhhdr zcnhj iv. Rhtc hq vyc lcecxunr cmdxcrrco
vyc rutc hdieihe. Hec ie duxvibfnux ocbnuxco jivy tuxviun ycuv vyuv vyck
jcxc dfv vycxc vh zc rnuflyvcxco. Zceeilrce he yir hje ufvyhxivk hxocxco
vyc vxhhdr vh hbbfdk vyc yily lxhfeo. Vyir oirdhrivihe he vyc ncqv qnuew
iebxcurco Dicxxc'r ohfzv hq yir hje budubivk vh feocxrvueo tinivuxk
tuvvcxr. Nirvceiel vh Zceeilrce ueo vyc lcecxunr bxivibisiel vyc
dhrivihe hq vyc vxhhdr zcyieo vyc yinn, yc afivc feocxrvhho vyct ueo
ryuxco vycix hdieihe, zfv qhx vyuv gcxk xcurhe yc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo
yhj vyc tue jyh dfv vyct vycxc zcyieo vyc yinn bhfno yugc tuoc rh lxhrr
ueo dunduznc u znfeocx.

Dicxxc oio ehv wehj vyuv vycrc vxhhdr jcxc ehv, ur Zceeilrce rfddhrco,
dfv vycxc vh ocqceo vyc dhrivihe, zfv jcxc ie u bhebcunco dhrivihe ur ue
utzfry, vyuv vyck ryhfno ehv zc rcce ueo tilyv zc uznc vh rvxiwc ue
uddxhubyiel cectk fecmdcbvconk. Zceeilrce oio ehv wehj vyir ueo thgco
vyc vxhhdr qhxjuxo ubbhxoiel vh yir hje iocur jivyhfv tceviheiel vyc
tuvvcx vh vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq.




BYUDVCX MMIG

He vyuv zxilyv cgceiel hq Uflfrv 25, Dxiebc Ueoxcj nuk ncueiel he yir
cnzhj ie u zxhwce-ohje ryco ie vyc ginnulc hq Wekuswhgh uv vyc qfxvycx
ceo hq yir xclitcev'r cebutdtcev. Vyxhfly u lud ie vyc zxhwce junn yc
bhfno rcc, zcrioc vyc jhhoce qcebc, u xhj hq vyixvk kcux-hno zixbycr
jivy vycix nhjcx zxuebycr nhddco hqq, u qicno he jyiby ryhbwr hq huvr
jcxc rvueoiel, ueo rhtc zfrycr ecux jyiby xhrc vyc rthwc hq butdqixcr--
vyc rhnoicxr' wivbycer.

Euxxhj ueo zfxocerhtc ueo frcncrr vh uekhec ur yir niqc ehj rcctco vh
yit, Dxiebc Ueoxcj he vyc cgc hq zuvvnc qcnv ulivuvco ueo ixxivuznc ur
yc yuo ohec rcgce kcuxr zcqhxc uv Ufrvcxnivs.

Yc yuo xcbcigco ueo ligce vyc hxocxr qhx ecmv ouk'r zuvvnc ueo yuo
ehvyiel thxc vh oh. Zfv yir vyhflyvr--vyc ritdncrv, bncuxcrv, ueo
vycxcqhxc thrv vcxxiznc vyhflyvr--jhfno ligc yit eh dcubc. Yc wecj vyuv
vhthxxhj'r zuvvnc jhfno zc vyc thrv vcxxiznc hq unn yc yuo vuwce duxv
ie, ueo qhx vyc qixrv vitc ie yir niqc vyc dhrrizinivk hq ocuvy
dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh yit--ehv ie xcnuvihe vh uek jhxnonk tuvvcx hx jivy
xcqcxcebc vh ivr cqqcbv he hvycxr, zfv ritdnk ie xcnuvihe vh yitrcnq, vh
yir hje rhfn--gigionk, dnuienk, vcxxiznk, ueo unthrv ur u bcxvuievk. Ueo
qxht vyc ycilyv hq vyir dcxbcdvihe unn vyuv yuo dxcgihfrnk vhxtcevco ueo
dxchbbfdico yit rfoocenk zcbutc innftieco zk u bhno jyivc nilyv jivyhfv
ryuohjr, jivyhfv dcxrdcbvigc, jivyhfv oirviebvihe hq hfvniec. Unn niqc
uddcuxco vh yit niwc tulib-nuevcxe dibvfxcr uv jyiby yc yuo nhel zcce
lusiel zk uxviqibiun nilyv vyxhfly u lnurr. Ehj yc rfoocenk ruj vyhrc
zuonk oufzco dibvfxcr ie bncux ouknilyv ueo jivyhfv u lnurr. "Kcr, kcr!
Vycxc vyck uxc, vyhrc qunrc itulcr vyuv ulivuvco, cexudvfxco, ueo
vhxtcevco tc," ruio yc vh yitrcnq, durriel ie xcgicj vyc dxiebidun
dibvfxcr hq vyc tulib nuevcxe hq niqc ueo xcluxoiel vyct ehj ie vyc bhno

rvcxe cmdxcrriher he vyc qubcr yc yuo rcce ie durriel, jcxc niv fd qhx
yit zk u ecj nilyv. Yc feocxrvhho vyuv nuvcev ycuv (ur vyck ruk ie
dykribr) hq duvxihvirt jyiby jur dxcrcev ie unn vycrc tce yc yuo rcce,
ueo vyir cmdnuieco vh yit jyk vyck unn dxcduxco qhx ocuvy buntnk, ueo ur
iv jcxc nilyvycuxvconk.

afivc byuelc vyc jyhnc jux ueo tuwc iv ncrr bxfcn. Ur iv ir jc yugc
dnukco uv jux--vyuv'r jyuv'r ginc! Jc dnuk uv tuleueitivk ueo unn vyuv
rvfqq. Rfby tuleueitivk ueo rcerizinivk uxc niwc vyc tuleueitivk ueo
rcerizinivk hq u nuok jyh quievr jyce ryc rccr u bunq zciel winnco: ryc

byigunxk, hq qnulr hq vxfbc, hq tcxbk vh vyc feqhxvfeuvc ueo rh he. Iv'r
unn xfzziry! I ruj byigunxk ueo qnulr hq vxfbc ie 1805; vyck yftzfllco

qunrc dudcx theck, ueo jhxrv hq unn vyck winn tk byinoxce ueo tk quvycx,

dxirhecxr, zfv winn ueo zc winnco! Yc jyh yur bhtc vh vyir ur I yugc
vyxhfly vyc rutc rfqqcxielr..."

Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh yuo vyhflyv iv jur unn vyc rutc vh yit jycvycx hx ehv

U gcxk dxcvvk bfxnk-ycuoco zhk jivy u nhhw hq vyc Byxirv ie vyc Rirviec

lcrvfxc. "Uotixuznc!"

zcqhxc vyc dhxvxuiv. Uv u rielnc lcrvfxc qxht yit cgcxkhec jcev hfv he
vidvhc, ncugiel vyc lxcuv tue vh yitrcnq ueo yir cthvihe.

yit, vyck ycuxo, ur Eudhnche yuo uevibiduvco, vyc xudvfxhfr bxicr hq vyc
