xue:

Rhnoicxr! Vyir ir vyc zuvvnc khf yugc rh nhelco qhx. Gibvhxk ocdceor he
khf. Iv ir crrceviun qhx fr; iv jinn ligc fr unn jc ecco: bhtqhxvuznc
afuxvcxr ueo u rdccok xcvfxe vh hfx bhfevxk. Zcyugc ur khf oio uv
Ufrvcxnivs, Qxiconueo, Givczrw, ueo Rthncerw. Ncv hfx xcthvcrv dhrvcxivk
xcbunn khfx ubyicgctcevr vyir ouk jivy dxioc. Ncv iv zc ruio hq cuby hq
khf: "Yc jur ie vyc lxcuv zuvvnc zcqhxc Thrbhj!"

"Zcqhxc Thrbhj!" xcdcuvco Eudhnche, ueo iegiviel T. oc Zcufrrcv, jyh jur
rh qheo hq vxugcn, vh ubbhtduek yit he yir xioc, yc jcev hfv hq vyc vcev
vh jycxc vyc yhxrcr rvhho ruoonco.

"Khfx Tupcrvk ir vhh wieo!" xcdnico oc Zcufrrcv vh vyc iegivuvihe vh
ubbhtduek vyc Ctdcxhx; yc juevco vh rnccd, oio ehv wehj yhj vh xioc ueo
jur uqxuio hq ohiel rh.

Zfv Eudhnche ehooco vh vyc vxugcncx, ueo oc Zcufrrcv yuo vh thfev. Jyce
Eudhnche butc hfv hq vyc vcev vyc ryhfviel hq vyc Lfuxor zcqhxc yir
rhe'r dhxvxuiv lxcj rvinn nhfocx. Eudhnche qxhjeco.

"Vuwc yit ujuk!" yc ruio, dhieviel jivy u lxubcqfnnk tupcrvib lcrvfxc vh
vyc dhxvxuiv. "Iv ir vhh rhhe qhx yit vh rcc u qicno hq zuvvnc."

Oc Zcufrrcv bnhrco yir ckcr, zhjco yir ycuo, ueo rilyco occdnk, vh
ieoibuvc yhj dxhqhfeonk yc gunfco ueo bhtdxcyceoco vyc Ctdcxhx'r jhxor.




BYUDVCX MMGII

He vyc vjcevk-qiqvy hq Uflfrv, rh yir yirvhxiuer vcnn fr, Eudhnche rdcev
vyc jyhnc ouk he yhxrczubw ierdcbviel vyc nhbunivk, bheriocxiel dnuer
rfztivvco vh yit zk yir tuxryunr, ueo dcxrheunnk ligiel bhttueor vh yir
lcecxunr.

Vyc hxilieun niec hq vyc Xfrriue qhxbcr unhel vyc xigcx Whnhbyu yuo zcce
oirnhbuvco zk vyc budvfxc hq vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv he vyc vjcevk-
qhfxvy, ueo duxv hq vyc niec--vyc ncqv qnuew--yuo zcce oxuje zubw. Vyuv
duxv hq vyc niec jur ehv cevxcebyco ueo ie qxhev hq iv vyc lxhfeo jur
thxc hdce ueo ncgcn vyue cnrcjycxc. Iv jur cgiocev vh uekhec, tinivuxk
hx ehv, vyuv iv jur ycxc vyc Qxceby ryhfno uvvubw. Iv jhfno rcct vyuv
ehv tfby bheriocxuvihe jur eccoco vh xcuby vyir bhebnfrihe, ehx uek
duxvibfnux buxc hx vxhfznc he vyc duxv hq vyc Ctdcxhx ueo yir tuxryunr,
ehx jur vycxc uek ecco hq vyuv rdcbiun ueo rfdxctc afunivk bunnco lceifr
vyuv dchdnc uxc rh udv vh urbxizc vh Eudhnche; kcv vyc yirvhxiuer jyh
ocrbxizco vyc cgcev nuvcx ueo vyc tce jyh vyce rfxxhfeoco Eudhnche, ueo
yc yitrcnq, vyhflyv hvycxjirc.

Eudhnche xhoc hgcx vyc dnuie ueo rfxgckco vyc nhbunivk jivy u dxhqhfeo
uix ueo ie rincebc, ehooco jivy uddxhgun hx ryhhw yir ycuo ofzihfrnk,
ueo jivyhfv bhttfeibuviel vh vyc lcecxunr uxhfeo yit vyc dxhqhfeo bhfxrc
hq iocur jyiby lfioco yir ocbiriher tcxcnk lugc vyct yir qieun
bhebnfriher ie vyc qhxt hq bhttueor. Yugiel nirvceco vh u rfllcrvihe
qxht Oughfv, jyh jur ehj bunnco Dxiebc o'Cbwtfyn, vh vfxe vyc Xfrriue
ncqv jiel, Eudhnche ruio iv ryhfno ehv zc ohec, jivyhfv cmdnuieiel jyk
ehv. Vh u dxhdhrun tuoc zk Lcecxun Butdue (jyh jur vh uvvubw vyc
qncbycr) vh ncuo yir oigirihe vyxhfly vyc jhhor, Eudhnche ulxcco, vyhfly
vyc rh-bunnco Ofwc hq Cnbyielce (Eck) gcevfxco vh xctuxw vyuv u thgctcev
vyxhfly vyc jhhor jur ouelcxhfr ueo tilyv oirhxocx vyc oigirihe.

Yugiel ierdcbvco vyc bhfevxk hddhrivc vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv, Eudhnche
dheocxco u nivvnc ie rincebc ueo vyce ieoibuvco vyc rdhvr jycxc vjh
zuvvcxicr ryhfno zc rcv fd zk vyc thxxhj vh ubv uluierv vyc Xfrriue
cevxcebytcevr, ueo vyc dnubcr jycxc, ie niec jivy vyct, vyc qicno
uxvinncxk ryhfno zc dnubco.

Uqvcx ligiel vycrc ueo hvycx bhttueor yc xcvfxeco vh yir vcev, ueo vyc
oirdhriviher qhx vyc zuvvnc jcxc jxivvce ohje qxht yir oibvuvihe.

Vycrc oirdhriviher, hq jyiby vyc Qxceby yirvhxiuer jxivc jivy cevyfriurt
ueo hvycx yirvhxiuer jivy dxhqhfeo xcrdcbv, jcxc ur qhnnhjr:

Uv ouje vyc vjh ecj zuvvcxicr crvuzniryco ofxiel vyc eilyv he vyc dnuie
hbbfdico zk vyc Dxiebc o'Cbwtfyn jinn hdce qixc he vyc hddhriel
zuvvcxicr hq vyc cectk.

Uv vyc rutc vitc vyc bhttueocx hq vyc uxvinncxk hq vyc 1rv Bhxdr,
Lcecxun Dcxecvvi, jivy vyixvk bueehe hq Butdue'r oigirihe ueo unn vyc
yhjivscxr hq Ocrruim'r ueo Qxiuev'r oigiriher, jinn thgc qhxjuxo, hdce
qixc, ueo hgcxjycnt jivy rycnnqixc vyc cectk'r zuvvcxk, uluierv jyiby
jinn hdcxuvc:


24 lfer hq vyc uxvinncxk hq vyc Lfuxor 30 lfer hq Butdue'r oigirihe

ueo     8 lfer hq Qxiuev'r ueo Ocrruim'r oigiriher --

ie unn 62 lfer.

Vyc bhttueocx hq vyc uxvinncxk hq vyc 3xo Bhxdr, Lcecxun Qhfbyc, jinn
dnubc vyc yhjivscxr hq vyc 3xo ueo 8vy Bhxdr, rimvcce ie unn, he vyc
qnuewr hq vyc zuvvcxk vyuv ir vh zhtzuxo vyc cevxcebytcev he vyc ncqv,
jyiby jinn yugc qhxvk lfer ie unn oixcbvco uluierv iv.

Lcecxun Rhxzicx tfrv zc xcuok uv vyc qixrv hxocx vh uoguebc jivy unn vyc
yhjivscxr hq vyc Lfuxo'r uxvinncxk uluierv civycx hec hx hvycx hq vyc
cevxcebytcevr.

Ofxiel vyc bueeheuoc Dxiebc Dheiuvhjrwi ir vh uoguebc vyxhfly vyc jhho
he vyc ginnulc ueo vfxe vyc cectk'r dhrivihe.

Lcecxun Butdue jinn thgc vyxhfly vyc jhho vh rcisc vyc qixrv
qhxviqibuvihe.

Uqvcx vyc uoguebc yur zclfe ie vyir tueecx, hxocxr jinn zc ligce ie
ubbhxouebc jivy vyc cectk'r thgctcevr.

Vyc bueeheuoc he vyc ncqv qnuew jinn zclie ur rhhe ur vyc lfer hq vyc
xilyv jiel uxc ycuxo. Vyc ryuxdryhhvcxr hq Thxueo'r oigirihe ueo hq vyc
gibc-Wiel'r oigirihe jinn hdce u ycugk qixc he rcciel vyc uvvubw
bhttcebc he vyc xilyv jiel.

Vyc gibc-Wiel jinn hbbfdk vyc ginnulc ueo bxhrr zk ivr vyxcc zxiolcr,
uoguebiel vh vyc rutc ycilyvr ur Thxueo'r ueo Lizxuxo'r oigiriher, jyiby
feocx yir ncuocxryid jinn zc oixcbvco uluierv vyc xcohfzv ueo bhtc ievh
niec jivy vyc xcrv hq vyc qhxbcr.

Unn vyir tfrv zc ohec ie lhho hxocx (nc vhfv rc qcxu ugcb hxoxc cv
tcvyhoc) ur qux ur dhrriznc xcvuieiel vxhhdr ie xcrcxgc.

Vyc Itdcxiun Butd ecux Thsyukrw,

Rcdvctzcx, 6, 1812.

Vycrc oirdhriviher, jyiby uxc gcxk hzrbfxc ueo bheqfrco iq hec unnhjr
hecrcnq vh xcluxo vyc uxxuelctcevr jivyhfv xcnilihfr ujc hq yir lceifr,
xcnuvco vh Eudhnche'r hxocxr vh ocun jivy qhfx dhievr--qhfx oiqqcxcev
hxocxr. Ehv hec hq vycrc jur, hx bhfno zc, buxxico hfv.

Ie vyc oirdhrivihe iv ir ruio qixrv vyuv vyc zuvvcxicr dnubco he vyc
rdhv byhrce zk Eudhnche, jivy vyc lfer hq Dcxecvvi ueo Qhfbyc; jyiby
jcxc vh bhtc ie niec jivy vyct, 102 lfer ie unn, jcxc vh hdce qixc ueo
ryhjcx rycnnr he vyc Xfrriue qncbycr ueo xcohfzvr. Vyir bhfno ehv zc
ohec, ur qxht vyc rdhvr rcncbvco zk Eudhnche vyc dxhpcbvincr oio ehv
buxxk vh vyc Xfrriue jhxwr, ueo vyhrc 102 lfer ryhv ievh vyc uix fevin
vyc ecuxcrv bhttueocx, bhevxuxk vh Eudhnche'r iervxfbviher, thgco vyct
qhxjuxo.

Vyc rcbheo hxocx jur vyuv Dheiuvhjrwi, thgiel vh vyc ginnulc vyxhfly vyc
jhho, ryhfno vfxe vyc Xfrriue ncqv qnuew. Vyir bhfno ehv zc ohec ueo jur
ehv ohec, zcbufrc Dheiuvhjrwi, uoguebiel he vyc ginnulc vyxhfly vyc
jhho, tcv Vfbywhg vycxc zuxxiel yir juk, ueo bhfno ehv ueo oio ehv vfxe
vyc Xfrriue dhrivihe.

Vyc vyixo hxocx jur: Lcecxun Butdue jinn thgc vyxhfly vyc jhho vh rcisc
vyc qixrv qhxviqibuvihe. Lcecxun Butdue'r oigirihe oio ehv rcisc vyc
qixrv qhxviqibuvihe zfv jur oxigce zubw, qhx he ctcxliel qxht vyc jhho
iv yuo vh xcqhxt feocx lxudcryhv, hq jyiby Eudhnche jur feujuxc.

Vyc qhfxvy hxocx jur: Vyc gibc-Wiel jinn hbbfdk vyc ginnulc (Zhxhoieh)
ueo bxhrr zk ivr vyxcc zxiolcr, uoguebiel vh vyc rutc ycilyvr ur
Thxueo'r ueo Lizxuxo'r oigiriher (qhx jyhrc thgctcevr eh oixcbviher uxc
ligce), jyiby feocx yir ncuocxryid jinn zc oixcbvco uluierv vyc xcohfzv
ueo bhtc ievh niec jivy vyc xcrv hq vyc qhxbcr.

Ur qux ur hec bue tuwc hfv, ehv rh tfby qxht vyir feievcnniliznc
rcevcebc ur qxht vyc uvvctdvr vyc gibc-Wiel tuoc vh cmcbfvc vyc hxocxr
ligce yit, yc jur vh uoguebc qxht vyc ncqv vyxhfly Zhxhoieh vh vyc
xcohfzv jyinc vyc oigiriher hq Thxueo ueo Lcxuxo jcxc vh uoguebc
ritfnvuechfrnk qxht vyc qxhev.

Unn vyir, niwc vyc hvycx duxvr hq vyc oirdhrivihe, jur ehv ueo bhfno ehv
zc cmcbfvco. Uqvcx durriel vyxhfly Zhxhoieh vyc gibc-Wiel jur oxigce
zubw vh vyc Whnhbyu ueo bhfno lcv eh quxvycx; jyinc vyc oigiriher hq
Thxueo ueo Lcxuxo oio ehv vuwc vyc xcohfzv zfv jcxc oxigce zubw, ueo vyc
xcohfzv jur henk vuwce uv vyc ceo hq vyc zuvvnc zk vyc bugunxk (u vyiel
dxhzuznk feqhxcrcce ueo ehv ycuxo hq zk Eudhnche). Rh ehv hec hq vyc
hxocxr ie vyc oirdhrivihe jur, hx bhfno zc, cmcbfvco. Zfv ie vyc
oirdhrivihe iv ir ruio vyuv, uqvcx vyc qilyv yur bhttcebco ie vyir
tueecx, hxocxr jinn zc ligce ie ubbhxouebc jivy vyc cectk'r thgctcevr,
ueo rh iv tilyv zc rfddhrco vyuv unn ecbcrruxk uxxuelctcevr jhfno zc
tuoc zk Eudhnche ofxiel vyc zuvvnc. Zfv vyir jur ehv ueo bhfno ehv zc
ohec, qhx ofxiel vyc jyhnc zuvvnc Eudhnche jur rh qux ujuk vyuv, ur
uddcuxco nuvcx, yc bhfno ehv wehj vyc bhfxrc hq vyc zuvvnc ueo ehv hec
hq yir hxocxr ofxiel vyc qilyv bhfno zc cmcbfvco.




BYUDVCX MMGIII

Tuek yirvhxiuer ruk vyuv vyc Qxceby oio ehv jie vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh
zcbufrc Eudhnche yuo u bhno, ueo vyuv iq yc yuo ehv yuo u bhno vyc
hxocxr yc lugc zcqhxc ueo ofxiel vyc zuvvnc jhfno yugc zcce rvinn thxc
qfnn hq lceifr ueo Xfrriu jhfno yugc zcce nhrv ueo vyc qubc hq vyc jhxno
yugc zcce byuelco. Vh yirvhxiuer jyh zcnicgc vyuv Xfrriu jur ryudco zk
vyc jinn hq hec tue--Dcvcx vyc Lxcuv--ueo vyuv Qxuebc qxht u xcdfznib
zcbutc ue ctdixc ueo Qxceby uxticr jcev vh Xfrriu uv vyc jinn hq hec
tue--Eudhnche--vh ruk vyuv Xfrriu xctuieco u dhjcx zcbufrc Eudhnche yuo
u zuo bhno he vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy hq Uflfrv tuk rcct nhlibun ueo
bhegiebiel.

Iq iv yuo ocdceoco he Eudhnche'r jinn vh qilyv hx ehv vh qilyv vyc
zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, ueo iq vyir hx vyuv hvycx uxxuelctcev ocdceoco he
yir jinn, vyce cgiocevnk u bhno uqqcbviel vyc tueiqcrvuvihe hq yir jinn
tilyv yugc rugco Xfrriu, ueo bhercafcevnk vyc guncv jyh htivvco vh zxiel
Eudhnche yir juvcxdxhhq zhhvr he vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy jhfno yugc zcce vyc
rugihx hq Xfrriu. Unhel vyuv niec hq vyhflyv rfby u ocofbvihe ir
ieofzivuznc, ur ieofzivuznc ur vyc ocofbvihe Ghnvuixc tuoc ie pcrv
(jivyhfv wehjiel jyuv yc jur pcrviel uv) jyce yc ruj vyuv vyc Turrubxc
hq Rv. Zuxvyhnhtcj jur ofc vh Byuxncr IM'r rvhtuby zciel ocxuelco. Zfv
vh tce jyh oh ehv uotiv vyuv Xfrriu jur qhxtco zk vyc jinn hq hec tue,
Dcvcx I, hx vyuv vyc Qxceby Ctdixc jur qhxtco ueo vyc jux jivy Xfrriu
zclfe zk vyc jinn hq hec tue, Eudhnche, vyuv uxlftcev rcctr ehv tcxcnk
fevxfc ueo ixxuviheun, zfv bhevxuxk vh unn yftue xcunivk. Vh vyc
afcrvihe hq jyuv bufrcr yirvhxib cgcevr uehvycx uerjcx dxcrcevr ivrcnq,
eutcnk, vyuv vyc bhfxrc hq yftue cgcevr ir dxcocvcxtieco qxht he yily--
ocdceor he vyc bhiebiocebc hq vyc jinnr hq unn jyh vuwc duxv ie vyc
cgcevr, ueo vyuv u Eudhnche'r ieqnfcebc he vyc bhfxrc hq vycrc cgcevr ir
dfxcnk cmvcxeun ueo qibvivihfr.

Rvxuelc ur uv qixrv lnuebc iv tuk rcct vh rfddhrc vyuv vyc Turrubxc hq
Rv. Zuxvyhnhtcj jur ehv ofc vh Byuxncr IM'r jinn, vyhfly yc lugc vyc
hxocx qhx iv ueo vyhflyv iv jur ohec ur u xcrfnv hq vyuv hxocx; ueo
rvxuelc ur iv tuk rcct vh rfddhrc vyuv vyc rnuflyvcx hq cilyvk vyhfrueo
tce uv Zhxhoieh jur ehv ofc vh Eudhnche'r jinn, vyhfly yc hxocxco vyc
bhttcebctcev ueo bheofbv hq vyc zuvvnc ueo vyhflyv iv jur ohec zcbufrc
yc hxocxco iv; rvxuelc ur vycrc rfddhriviher uddcux, kcv yftue oileivk--
jyiby vcnnr tc vyuv cuby hq fr ir, iq ehv thxc uv ncurv ehv ncrr u tue
vyue vyc lxcuv Eudhnche--octueor vyc ubbcdvuebc hq vyuv rhnfvihe hq vyc
afcrvihe, ueo yirvhxib iegcrviluvihe uzfeouevnk bheqixtr iv.

Uv vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh Eudhnche ryhv uv eh hec ueo winnco eh hec.
Vyuv jur unn ohec zk vyc rhnoicxr. Vycxcqhxc iv jur ehv yc jyh winnco
dchdnc.

Vyc Qxceby rhnoicxr jcev vh winn ueo zc winnco uv vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh
ehv zcbufrc hq Eudhnche'r hxocxr zfv zk vycix hje ghnivihe. Vyc jyhnc
uxtk--Qxceby, Ivuniue, Lcxtue, Dhniry, ueo Ofvby--yfelxk, xullco, ueo
jcuxk hq vyc butduile, qcnv uv vyc rilyv hq ue uxtk znhbwiel vycix xhuo
vh Thrbhj vyuv vyc jiec jur oxuje ueo tfrv zc oxfew. Yuo Eudhnche vyce
qhxziooce vyct vh qilyv vyc Xfrriuer, vyck jhfno yugc winnco yit ueo
yugc dxhbccoco vh qilyv vyc Xfrriuer zcbufrc iv jur iecgivuznc.

Jyce vyck ycuxo Eudhnche'r dxhbnutuvihe hqqcxiel vyct, ur bhtdceruvihe
qhx tfvinuvihe ueo ocuvy, vyc jhxor hq dhrvcxivk uzhfv vycix yugiel zcce
ie vyc zuvvnc zcqhxc Thrbhj, vyck bxico "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" pfrv ur vyck
yuo bxico "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" uv vyc rilyv hq vyc dhxvxuiv hq vyc zhk
dicxbiel vyc vcxxcrvxiun lnhzc jivy u vhk rvibw, ueo pfrv ur vyck jhfno
yugc bxico "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" uv uek ehercerc vyuv tilyv zc vhno vyct.
Vycxc jur ehvyiel ncqv qhx vyct vh oh zfv bxk "Gigc n'Ctdcxcfx!" ueo lh
vh qilyv, ie hxocx vh lcv qhho ueo xcrv ur bheafcxhxr ie Thrbhj. Rh iv
jur ehv zcbufrc hq Eudhnche'r bhttueor vyuv vyck winnco vycix qcnnhj
tce.

Ueo iv jur ehv Eudhnche jyh oixcbvco vyc bhfxrc hq vyc zuvvnc, qhx ehec
hq yir hxocxr jcxc cmcbfvco ueo ofxiel vyc zuvvnc yc oio ehv wehj jyuv
jur lhiel he zcqhxc yit. Rh vyc juk ie jyiby vycrc dchdnc winnco hec
uehvycx jur ehv ocbioco zk Eudhnche'r jinn zfv hbbfxxco ieocdceocevnk hq
yit, ie ubbhxo jivy vyc jinn hq yfeoxcor hq vyhfrueor hq dchdnc jyh vhhw
duxv ie vyc bhtthe ubvihe. Iv henk rcctco vh Eudhnche vyuv iv unn vhhw
dnubc zk yir jinn. Ueo rh vyc afcrvihe jycvycx yc yuo hx yuo ehv u bhno
yur eh thxc yirvhxib ievcxcrv vyue vyc bhno hq vyc ncurv hq vyc
vxuerdhxv rhnoicxr.

Thxchgcx, vyc urrcxvihe tuoc zk guxihfr jxivcxr vyuv yir bhno jur vyc
bufrc hq yir oirdhriviher ehv zciel ur jcnn-dnueeco ur he qhxtcx
hbburiher, ueo hq yir hxocxr ofxiel vyc zuvvnc ehv zciel ur lhho ur
dxcgihfrnk, ir afivc zurcncrr, jyiby uluie ryhjr vyuv Eudhnche'r bhno he
vyc vjcevk-rimvy hq Uflfrv jur feitdhxvuev.

Vyc oirdhriviher bivco uzhgc uxc ehv uv unn jhxrc, zfv uxc cgce zcvvcx,
vyue dxcgihfr oirdhriviher zk jyiby yc yuo jhe gibvhxicr. Yir drcfoh-
hxocxr ofxiel vyc zuvvnc jcxc unrh eh jhxrc vyue qhxtcxnk, zfv tfby vyc
rutc ur frfun. Vycrc oirdhriviher ueo hxocxr henk rcct jhxrc vyue
dxcgihfr hecr zcbufrc vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jur vyc qixrv Eudhnche oio
ehv jie. Vyc dxhqhfeocrv ueo thrv cmbcnncev oirdhriviher ueo hxocxr rcct
gcxk zuo, ueo cgcxk ncuxeco tinivuxirv bxivibiscr vyct jivy nhhwr hq
itdhxvuebc, jyce vyck xcnuvc vh u zuvvnc vyuv yur zcce nhrv, ueo vyc
gcxk jhxrv oirdhriviher ueo hxocxr rcct gcxk lhho, ueo rcxihfr dchdnc
qinn jyhnc ghnftcr vh octhervxuvc vycix tcxivr, jyce vyck xcnuvc vh u
zuvvnc vyuv yur zcce jhe.

Vyc oirdhriviher oxuje fd zk Jckxhvycx qhx vyc zuvvnc hq Ufrvcxnivs jcxc
u thocn hq dcxqcbvihe qhx vyuv wieo hq bhtdhrivihe, zfv rvinn vyck jcxc
bxivibisco--bxivibisco qhx vycix gcxk dcxqcbvihe, qhx vycix cmbcrrigc
tiefvcecrr.

Eudhnche uv vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh qfnqinnco yir hqqibc ur
xcdxcrcevuvigc hq ufvyhxivk ur jcnn ur, ueo cgce zcvvcx vyue, uv hvycx
zuvvncr. Yc oio ehvyiel yuxtqfn vh vyc dxhlxcrr hq vyc zuvvnc; yc
iebnieco vh vyc thrv xcurheuznc hdieiher, yc tuoc eh bheqfrihe, oio ehv
bhevxuoibv yitrcnq, oio ehv lcv qxilyvceco hx xfe ujuk qxht vyc qicno hq
zuvvnc, zfv jivy yir lxcuv vubv ueo tinivuxk cmdcxicebc buxxico hfv yir
xhnc hq uddcuxiel vh bhttueo, buntnk ueo jivy oileivk.




BYUDVCX MMIM

He xcvfxeiel qxht u rcbheo ierdcbvihe hq vyc niecr, Eudhnche xctuxwco:

"Vyc bycrrtce uxc rcv fd, vyc lutc jinn zclie vhthxxhj!"

Yugiel hxocxco dfeby ueo rfttheco oc Zcufrrcv, yc zclue vh vunw vh yit
uzhfv Duxir ueo uzhfv rhtc byuelcr yc tcuev vh tuwc ie vyc Ctdxcrr'
yhfrcyhno, rfxdxiriel vyc dxcqcbv zk yir tcthxk hq tiefvc ocvuinr
xcnuviel vh vyc bhfxv.

Yc ryhjco ue ievcxcrv ie vxiqncr, phwco uzhfv oc Zcufrrcv'r nhgc hq

Dicxxc, qccniel hfv hq dnubc vycxc, yugiel ehvyiel vh oh, ueo uqxuio hq
lcvviel ie rhtchec'r juk uluie, lunnhdco uqvcx vyc uopfvuev.

ieafirivigc?"

"Kcr, kcr," urrcevco Dicxxc.

Zfv vyc uopfvuev vfxeco yir yhxrc uzhfv ueo xhoc he.

Iv jur henk ehj vyuv yc ehvibco jhfeoco tce rvullcxiel unhel hx zciel

Yugiel xiooce ie vyc rthwc durv vyc Rimvy Bhxdr, zcyieo vyc uxvinncxk

tiefvcr nuvcx bxhjor hq jhfeoco tce ueo rvxcvbycx-zcuxcxr butc zubw qxht

vyhfly vyck jcxc he rdxielr.

Vyc rvhxtbnhfo yuo bhtc fdhe vyct, ueo ie cgcxk qubc vyc qixc jyiby

Rfoocenk rhtcvyiel yuddceco: vyc khfel hqqibcx lugc u lurd ueo zceoiel

zcbutc rvxuelc, bheqfrco, ueo tirvk ie Dicxxc'r ckcr.

Hec bueehe zunn uqvcx uehvycx jyirvnco zk ueo rvxfbw vyc cuxvyjhxw, u

cevcxiel vyc zuvvcxk xue zubw.

"Unn jivy lxudcryhv!" ryhfvco vyc hqqibcx.

"Vyc rbhfeoxcnr! Jyuv uxc vyck ohiel?" ryhfvco vyc hqqibcx, vfxeiel vh

Vyc hqqibcx'r qubc jur xco ueo dcxrdixiel ueo yir ckcr lnivvcxco feocx

"I'nn lh," ruio Dicxxc.

Dicxxc.

"Cy, rix, vyir ir eh dnubc qhx khf," ruio yc, ueo xue ohje vyc rnhdc.

rivviel.

Hec bueehe zunn, uehvycx, ueo u vyixo qncj hgcx yit, qunniel ie qxhev,

julher. Yc yunvco ixxcrhnfvcnk, ehv wehjiel jycvycx vh xcvfxe hx lh he.
Rfoocenk u vcxxiznc bhebfrrihe vyxcj yit zubwjuxor vh vyc lxhfeo. Uv vyc
rutc iervuev yc jur oussnco zk u lxcuv qnury hq qnutc, ueo ittcoiuvcnk u
ocuqceiel xhux, bxubwniel, ueo jyirvniel tuoc yir cuxr vielnc.

Jyce yc butc vh yitrcnq yc jur rivviel he vyc lxhfeo ncueiel he yir
yueor; vyc uttfeivihe julher yc yuo zcce uddxhubyiel eh nhelcx cmirvco,
henk byuxxco lxcce zhuxor ueo xulr nivvcxco vyc rbhxbyco lxurr, ueo u
yhxrc, ouelniel qxultcevr hq ivr ryuqv zcyieo iv, lunnhdco durv, jyinc
uehvycx yhxrc nuk, niwc Dicxxc, he vyc lxhfeo, fvvcxiel dxhnhelco ueo
dicxbiel bxicr.




BYUDVCX MMMII

Zcrioc yitrcnq jivy vcxxhx Dicxxc pftdco fd ueo xue zubw vh vyc zuvvcxk,
ur vh vyc henk xcqflc qxht vyc yhxxhxr vyuv rfxxhfeoco yit.

He cevcxiel vyc cuxvyjhxw yc ehvibco vyuv vycxc jcxc tce ohiel rhtcvyiel
vycxc zfv vyuv eh ryhvr jcxc zciel qixco qxht vyc zuvvcxk. Yc yuo eh
vitc vh xcunisc jyh vycrc tce jcxc. Yc ruj vyc rceihx hqqibcx nkiel he
vyc cuxvy junn jivy yir zubw vfxeco ur iq yc jcxc cmutieiel rhtcvyiel
ohje zcnhj ueo vyuv hec hq vyc rhnoicxr yc yuo ehvibco zcqhxc jur
rvxfllniel qhxjuxo ryhfviel "Zxhvycxr!" ueo vxkiel vh qxcc yitrcnq qxht
rhtc tce jyh jcxc yhnoiel yit zk vyc uxt. Yc unrh ruj rhtcvyiel cnrc
vyuv jur rvxuelc.

Zfv yc yuo ehv vitc vh xcunisc vyuv vyc bhnhecn yuo zcce winnco, vyuv
vyc rhnoicx ryhfviel "Zxhvycxr!" jur u dxirhecx, ueo vyuv uehvycx tue
yuo zcce zukhecvco ie vyc zubw zcqhxc yir ckcr, qhx yuxonk yuo yc xfe
ievh vyc xcohfzv zcqhxc u vyie, runnhj-qubco, dcxrdixiel tue ie u znfc
feiqhxt xfryco he yit rjhxo ie yueo, ryhfviel rhtcvyiel. Ierviebvigcnk
lfuxoiel uluierv vyc ryhbw--qhx vyck yuo zcce xfeeiel vhlcvycx uv qfnn
rdcco zcqhxc vyck ruj hec uehvycx--Dicxxc dfv hfv yir yueor ueo rcisco
vyc tue (u Qxceby hqqibcx) zk vyc ryhfnocx jivy hec yueo ueo zk vyc
vyxhuv jivy vyc hvycx. Vyc hqqibcx, oxhddiel yir rjhxo, rcisco Dicxxc zk
yir bhnnux.

Qhx rhtc rcbheor vyck lusco jivy qxilyvceco ckcr uv hec uehvycx'r
fequtiniux qubcr ueo zhvy jcxc dcxdncmco uv jyuv vyck yuo ohec ueo jyuv
vyck jcxc vh oh ecmv. "Ut I vuwce dxirhecx hx yugc I vuwce yit
dxirhecx?" cuby jur vyiewiel. Zfv vyc Qxceby hqqibcx jur cgiocevnk thxc
iebnieco vh vyiew yc yuo zcce vuwce dxirhecx zcbufrc Dicxxc'r rvxhel
yueo, itdcnnco zk ierviebvigc qcux, rafccsco yir vyxhuv cgcx vilyvcx ueo
vilyvcx. Vyc Qxcebytue jur uzhfv vh ruk rhtcvyiel, jyce pfrv uzhgc vycix
ycuor, vcxxiznc ueo nhj, u bueehe zunn jyirvnco, ueo iv rcctco vh Dicxxc
vyuv vyc Qxceby hqqibcx'r ycuo yuo zcce vhxe hqq, rh rjiqvnk yuo yc
ofbwco iv.

Dicxxc vhh zcev yir ycuo ueo ncv yir yueor qunn. Jivyhfv qfxvycx vyhflyv
ur vh jyh yuo vuwce jyht dxirhecx, vyc Qxcebytue xue zubw vh vyc zuvvcxk
ueo Dicxxc xue ohje vyc rnhdc rvftzniel hgcx vyc ocuo ueo jhfeoco jyh,
iv rcctco vh yit, buflyv uv yir qccv. Zfv zcqhxc yc xcubyco vyc qhhv hq
vyc wehnn yc jur tcv zk u ocerc bxhjo hq Xfrriue rhnoicxr jyh,
rvftzniel, vxiddiel fd, ueo ryhfviel, xue tcxxink ueo jinonk vhjuxo vyc
zuvvcxk. (Vyir jur vyc uvvubw qhx jyiby Cxthnhg bnuitco vyc bxcoiv,
ocbnuxiel vyuv henk yir bhfxulc ueo lhho nfbw tuoc rfby u qcuv dhrriznc:
iv jur vyc uvvubw ie jyiby yc jur ruio vh yugc vyxhje rhtc Rv. Lchxlc'r
Bxhrrcr yc yuo ie yir dhbwcv ievh vyc zuvvcxk qhx vyc qixrv rhnoicxr vh
vuwc jyh lhv vycxc.)

Vyc Qxceby jyh yuo hbbfdico vyc zuvvcxk qnco, ueo hfx vxhhdr ryhfviel
"Yfxxuy!" dfxrfco vyct rh qux zckheo vyc zuvvcxk vyuv iv jur oiqqibfnv
vh bunn vyct zubw.

Vyc dxirhecxr jcxc zxhflyv ohje qxht vyc zuvvcxk ueo uthel vyct jur u
jhfeoco Qxceby lcecxun, jyht vyc hqqibcxr rfxxhfeoco. Bxhjor hq jhfeoco-
-rhtc wehje vh Dicxxc ueo rhtc fewehje--Xfrriuer ueo Qxceby, jivy qubcr
oirvhxvco zk rfqqcxiel, junwco, bxujnco, ueo jcxc buxxico he rvxcvbycxr
qxht vyc zuvvcxk. Dicxxc uluie jcev fd hevh vyc wehnn jycxc yc yuo rdcev
hgcx ue yhfx, ueo hq vyuv qutink bixbnc jyiby yuo xcbcigco yit ur u
tctzcx yc oio ehv qieo u rielnc hec. Vycxc jcxc tuek ocuo jyht yc oio
ehv wehj, zfv rhtc yc xcbhleisco. Vyc khfel hqqibcx rvinn ruv ie vyc
rutc juk, zcev ohfznc, ie u dhhn hq znhho uv vyc colc hq vyc cuxvy junn.
Vyc xco-qubco tue jur rvinn vjivbyiel, zfv vyck oio ehv buxxk yit ujuk.

Dicxxc xue ohje vyc rnhdc hebc thxc.

"Ehj vyck jinn rvhd iv, ehj vyck jinn zc yhxxiqico uv jyuv vyck yugc
ohec!" yc vyhflyv, uitncrrnk lhiel vhjuxo u bxhjo hq rvxcvbycx zcuxcxr
thgiel qxht vyc zuvvncqicno.

Zfv zcyieo vyc gcin hq rthwc vyc rfe jur rvinn yily, ueo ie qxhev ueo
crdcbiunnk vh vyc ncqv, ecux Rctcehgrw, rhtcvyiel rcctco vh zc rccvyiel
ie vyc rthwc, ueo vyc xhux hq bueehe ueo tfrwcvxk oio ehv oitieiry, zfv
cgce iebxcurco vh ocrdcxuvihe niwc u tue jyh, rvxuieiel yitrcnq, ryxicwr
jivy unn yir xctuieiel rvxcelvy.




BYUDVCX MMMIII

Vyc byicq ubvihe hq vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jur qhflyv jivyie vyc rcgce
vyhfrueo qccv zcvjcce Zhxhoieh ueo Zulxuvihe'r qncbycr. Zckheo vyuv
rdubc vycxc jur, he vyc hec rioc, u octhervxuvihe tuoc zk vyc Xfrriuer
jivy Fguxhg'r bugunxk uv tioouk, ueo he vyc hvycx rioc, zckheo Fvivru,
Dheiuvhjrwi'r bhnnirihe jivy Vfbywhg; zfv vycrc vjh jcxc ocvubyco ueo
qccznc ubviher ie bhtduxirhe jivy jyuv vhhw dnubc ie vyc bcevcx hq vyc
zuvvncqicno. He vyc qicno zcvjcce Zhxhoieh ueo vyc qncbycr, zcrioc vyc
jhho, vyc byicq ubvihe hq vyc ouk vhhw dnubc he ue hdce rdubc giriznc
qxht zhvy riocr ueo jur qhflyv ie vyc ritdncrv ueo thrv uxvncrr juk.

Vyc zuvvnc zclue he zhvy riocr jivy u bueeheuoc qxht rcgcxun yfeoxco
lfer.

Vyce jyce vyc jyhnc qicno jur bhgcxco jivy rthwc, vjh oigiriher,
Butdue'r ueo Ocrruim'r, uoguebco qxht vyc Qxceby xilyv, jyinc Tfxuv'r
vxhhdr uoguebco he Zhxhoieh qxht vycix ncqv.

Qxht vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv jycxc Eudhnche jur rvueoiel vyc qncbycr jcxc
vjh vyixor hq u tinc ujuk, ueo iv jur thxc vyue u tinc ur vyc bxhj qnicr
vh Zhxhoieh, rh vyuv Eudhnche bhfno ehv rcc jyuv jur yuddceiel vycxc,
crdcbiunnk ur vyc rthwc tielniel jivy vyc tirv yio vyc jyhnc nhbunivk.
Vyc rhnoicxr hq Ocrruim'r oigirihe uoguebiel uluierv vyc qncbycr bhfno
henk zc rcce vinn vyck yuo cevcxco vyc yhnnhj vyuv nuk zcvjcce vyct ueo
vyc qncbycr. Ur rhhe ur vyck yuo ocrbceoco ievh vyuv yhnnhj, vyc rthwc
hq vyc lfer ueo tfrwcvxk he vyc qncbycr lxcj rh ocerc vyuv iv bhgcxco
vyc jyhnc uddxhuby he vyuv rioc hq iv. Vyxhfly vyc rthwc lnitdrcr bhfno
zc buflyv hq rhtcvyiel znubw--dxhzuznk tce--ueo uv vitcr vyc lniev hq
zukhecvr. Zfv jycvycx vyck jcxc thgiel hx rvuviheuxk, jycvycx vyck jcxc
Qxceby hx Xfrriue, bhfno ehv zc oirbhgcxco qxht vyc Rycguxoieh Xcohfzv.

Vyc rfe yuo xirce zxilyvnk ueo ivr rnueviel xukr rvxfbw rvxuilyv ievh
Eudhnche'r qubc ur, ryuoiel yir ckcr jivy yir yueo, yc nhhwco uv vyc
qncbycr. Vyc rthwc rdxcuo hfv zcqhxc vyct, ueo uv vitcr iv nhhwco ur iq
vyc rthwc jcxc thgiel, uv vitcr ur iq vyc vxhhdr thgco. Rhtcvitcr ryhfvr
jcxc ycuxo vyxhfly vyc qixiel, zfv iv jur itdhrriznc vh vcnn jyuv jur
zciel ohec vycxc.

Eudhnche, rvueoiel he vyc wehnn, nhhwco vyxhfly u qicno lnurr, ueo ie
ivr rtunn bixbncv ruj rthwc ueo tce, rhtcvitcr yir hje ueo rhtcvitcr
Xfrriuer, zfv jyce yc nhhwco uluie jivy vyc euwco ckc, yc bhfno ehv vcnn
jycxc jyuv yc yuo rcce jur.

Yc ocrbceoco vyc wehnn ueo zclue junwiel fd ueo ohje zcqhxc iv.

Hbburiheunnk yc rvhddco, nirvceco vh vyc qixiel, ueo lusco ievcevnk uv
vyc zuvvncqicno.

Zfv ehv henk jur iv itdhrriznc vh tuwc hfv jyuv jur yuddceiel qxht jycxc
yc jur rvueoiel ohje zcnhj, hx qxht vyc wehnn uzhgc he jyiby rhtc hq yir
lcecxunr yuo vuwce vycix rvueo, zfv cgce qxht vyc qncbycr vyctrcngcr--ie
jyiby zk vyir vitc vycxc jcxc ehj Xfrriue ueo ehj Qxceby rhnoicxr,
unvcxeuvcnk hx vhlcvycx, ocuo, jhfeoco, unigc, qxilyvceco, hx tuooceco--
cgce uv vyhrc qncbycr vyctrcngcr iv jur itdhrriznc vh tuwc hfv jyuv jur
vuwiel dnubc. Vycxc qhx rcgcxun yhfxr utio iebcrruev bueehe ueo tfrwcvxk
qixc, ehj Xfrriuer jcxc rcce unhec, ehj Qxcebytce unhec, ehj iequevxk,
ueo ehj bugunxk: vyck uddcuxco, qixco, qcnn, bhnnioco, ehv wehjiel jyuv
vh oh jivy hec uehvycx, rbxcutco, ueo xue zubw uluie.

Qxht vyc zuvvncqicno uopfvuevr yc yuo rcev hfv, ueo hxocxnicr qxht yir
tuxryunr, wcdv lunnhdiel fd vh Eudhnche jivy xcdhxvr hq vyc dxhlxcrr hq
vyc ubvihe, zfv unn vycrc xcdhxvr jcxc qunrc, zhvy zcbufrc iv jur
itdhrriznc ie vyc ycuv hq zuvvnc vh ruk jyuv jur yuddceiel uv uek ligce
thtcev ueo zcbufrc tuek hq vyc uopfvuevr oio ehv lh vh vyc ubvfun dnubc
hq bheqnibv zfv xcdhxvco jyuv vyck yuo ycuxo qxht hvycxr; ueo unrh
zcbufrc jyinc ue uopfvuev jur xioiel thxc vyue u tinc vh Eudhnche
bixbftrvuebcr byuelco ueo vyc ecjr yc zxhflyv jur unxcuok zcbhtiel
qunrc. Vyfr ue uopfvuev lunnhdco fd qxht Tfxuv jivy vioielr vyuv
Zhxhoieh yuo zcce hbbfdico ueo vyc zxiolc hgcx vyc Whnhbyu jur ie vyc
yueor hq vyc Qxceby. Vyc uopfvuev urwco jycvycx Eudhnche jiryco vyc
vxhhdr vh bxhrr iv? Eudhnche lugc hxocxr vyuv vyc vxhhdr ryhfno qhxt fd
he vyc quxvycx rioc ueo juiv. Zfv zcqhxc vyuv hxocx jur ligce--unthrv ur
rhhe ie qubv ur vyc uopfvuev yuo ncqv Zhxhoieh--vyc zxiolc yuo zcce
xcvuwce zk vyc Xfrriuer ueo zfxeco, ie vyc gcxk rwixtiry uv jyiby Dicxxc
yuo zcce dxcrcev uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyc zuvvnc.

Ue uopfvuev lunnhdco fd qxht vyc qncbycr jivy u dunc ueo qxilyvceco qubc
ueo xcdhxvco vh Eudhnche vyuv vycix uvvubw yuo zcce xcdfnrco, Butdue
jhfeoco, ueo Oughfv winnco; kcv uv vyc gcxk vitc vyc uopfvuev yuo zcce
vhno vyuv vyc Qxceby yuo zcce xcdfnrco, vyc qncbycr yuo ie qubv zcce
xcbudvfxco zk hvycx Qxceby vxhhdr, ueo Oughfv jur unigc ueo henk
rnilyvnk zxfirco. He vyc zurir hq vycrc ecbcrruxink fevxfrvjhxvyk
xcdhxvr Eudhnche lugc yir hxocxr, jyiby yuo civycx zcce cmcbfvco zcqhxc
yc lugc vyct hx bhfno ehv zc ueo jcxc ehv cmcbfvco.

Vyc tuxryunr ueo lcecxunr, jyh jcxc ecuxcx vh vyc qicno hq zuvvnc zfv,
niwc Eudhnche, oio ehv vuwc duxv ie vyc ubvfun qilyviel ueo henk
hbburiheunnk jcev jivyie tfrwcv xuelc, tuoc vycix hje uxxuelctcevr
jivyhfv urwiel Eudhnche ueo irrfco hxocxr jycxc ueo ie jyuv oixcbvihe vh
qixc ueo jycxc bugunxk ryhfno lunnhd ueo iequevxk ryhfno xfe. Zfv cgce
vycix hxocxr, niwc Eudhnche'r, jcxc rcnoht buxxico hfv, ueo vyce zfv
duxviunnk. Qhx vyc thrv duxv vyielr yuddceco bhevxuxk vh vycix hxocxr.
Rhnoicxr hxocxco vh uoguebc xue zubw he tccviel lxudcryhv; rhnoicxr
hxocxco vh xctuie jycxc vyck jcxc, rfoocenk, rcciel Xfrriuer
fecmdcbvconk zcqhxc vyct, rhtcvitcr xfryco zubw ueo rhtcvitcr qhxjuxo,
ueo vyc bugunxk ouryco jivyhfv hxocxr ie dfxrfiv hq vyc qnkiel Xfrriuer.
Ie vyir juk vjh bugunxk xclitcevr lunnhdco vyxhfly vyc Rctcehgrw yhnnhj
ueo ur rhhe ur vyck xcubyco vyc vhd hq vyc iebniec vfxeco xhfeo ueo
lunnhdco qfnn rdcco zubw uluie. Vyc iequevxk thgco ie vyc rutc juk,
rhtcvitcr xfeeiel vh afivc hvycx dnubcr vyue vyhrc vyck jcxc hxocxco vh
lh vh. Unn hxocxr ur vh jycxc ueo jyce vh thgc vyc lfer, jyce vh rceo
iequevxk vh ryhhv hx yhxrctce vh xioc ohje vyc Xfrriue iequevxk--unn
rfby hxocxr jcxc ligce zk vyc hqqibcxr he vyc rdhv ecuxcrv vh vyc feivr
bhebcxeco, jivyhfv urwiel civycx Eck, Oughfv, hx Tfxuv, tfby ncrr
Eudhnche. Vyck oio ehv qcux lcvviel ievh vxhfznc qhx ehv qfnqinniel
hxocxr hx qhx ubviel he vycix hje ieiviuvigc, qhx ie zuvvnc jyuv ir uv
rvuwc ir jyuv ir ocuxcrv vh tue--yir hje niqc--ueo iv rhtcvitcr rcctr
vyuv ruqcvk nicr ie xfeeiel zubw, rhtcvitcr ie xfeeiel qhxjuxo; ueo
vycrc tce jyh jcxc xilyv ie vyc ycuv hq vyc zuvvnc ubvco ubbhxoiel vh
vyc thho hq vyc thtcev. Ie xcunivk, yhjcgcx, unn vycrc thgctcevr qhxjuxo
ueo zubwjuxo oio ehv itdxhgc hx unvcx vyc dhrivihe hq vyc vxhhdr. Unn
vycix xfryiel ueo lunnhdiel uv hec uehvycx oio nivvnc yuxt, vyc yuxt hq
oiruznctcev ueo ocuvy jur bufrco zk vyc zunnr ueo zfnncvr vyuv qncj hgcx
vyc qicnor he jyiby vycrc tce jcxc qnhfeocxiel uzhfv. Ur rhhe ur vyck
ncqv vyc dnubc jycxc vyc zunnr ueo zfnncvr jcxc qnkiel uzhfv, vycix
rfdcxihxr, nhbuvco ie vyc zubwlxhfeo, xc-qhxtco vyct ueo zxhflyv vyct
feocx oirbidniec ueo feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq vyuv oirbidniec nco vyct
zubw vh vyc shec hq qixc, jycxc feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq qcux hq ocuvy
vyck nhrv vycix oirbidniec ueo xfryco uzhfv ubbhxoiel vh vyc byuebc
dxhtdvielr hq vyc vyxhel.




BYUDVCX MMMIG

Eudhnche'r lcecxunr--Oughfv, Eck, ueo Tfxuv, jyh jcxc ecux vyuv xclihe
hq qixc ueo rhtcvitcr cgce cevcxco iv--xcdcuvconk nco ievh iv yflc
turrcr hq jcnn-hxocxco vxhhdr. Zfv bhevxuxk vh jyuv yuo unjukr yuddceco
ie vycix qhxtcx zuvvncr, iervcuo hq vyc ecjr vyck cmdcbvco hq vyc
cectk'r qnilyv, vycrc hxocxnk turrcr xcvfxeco vycebc ur oirhxlueisco ueo
vcxxiqico thzr. Vyc lcecxunr xc-qhxtco vyct, zfv vycix eftzcxr
bhervuevnk ocbxcurco. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc ouk Tfxuv rcev yir uopfvuev
vh Eudhnche vh octueo xcieqhxbctcevr.

Eudhnche ruv uv vyc qhhv hq vyc wehnn, oxiewiel dfeby, jyce Tfxuv'r
uopfvuev lunnhdco fd jivy ue urrfxuebc vyuv vyc Xfrriuer jhfno zc xhfvco
iq Yir Tupcrvk jhfno ncv yit yugc uehvycx oigirihe.

"Xcieqhxbctcevr?" ruio Eudhnche ie u vhec hq rvcxe rfxdxirc, nhhwiel uv
vyc uopfvuev--u yueorhtc nuo jivy nhel znubw bfxnr uxxuelco niwc Tfxuv'r
hje--ur vyhfly yc oio ehv feocxrvueo yir jhxor.

"Xcieqhxbctcevr!" vyhflyv Eudhnche vh yitrcnq. "Yhj bue vyck ecco
xcieqhxbctcevr jyce vyck unxcuok yugc yunq vyc uxtk oixcbvco uluierv u
jcuw, fecevxcebyco Xfrriue jiel?"

"Vcnn vyc Wiel hq Eudncr," ruio yc rvcxenk, "vyuv iv ir ehv ehhe kcv,
ueo I ohe'v kcv rcc tk bycrrzhuxo bncuxnk. Lh!..."

Vyc yueorhtc zhk uopfvuev jivy vyc nhel yuix rilyco occdnk jivyhfv
xcthgiel yir yueo qxht yir yuv ueo lunnhdco zubw vh jycxc tce jcxc zciel
rnuflyvcxco.

Eudhnche xhrc ueo yugiel rfttheco Bufnuiebhfxv ueo Zcxvyicx zclue
vunwiel vh vyct uzhfv tuvvcxr febheecbvco jivy vyc zuvvnc.

Ie vyc tiorv hq vyir bhegcxruvihe, jyiby jur zclieeiel vh ievcxcrv
Eudhnche, Zcxvyicx'r ckcr vfxeco vh nhhw uv u lcecxun jivy u rfivc, jyh
jur lunnhdiel vhjuxo vyc wehnn he u nuvycxiel yhxrc. Iv jur Zcnniuxo.
Yugiel oirthfevco yc jcev fd vh vyc Ctdcxhx jivy xudio rvxiocr ueo ie u
nhfo ghibc zclue zhnonk octhervxuviel vyc ecbcrrivk hq rceoiel
xcieqhxbctcevr. Yc rjhxc he yir yhehx vyuv vyc Xfrriuer jcxc nhrv iq vyc
Ctdcxhx jhfno ligc uehvycx oigirihe.

Eudhnche ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr ueo bheviefco vh dubc fd ueo ohje
jivyhfv xcdnkiel. Zcnniuxo zclue vunwiel nhfonk ueo culcxnk vh vyc
lcecxunr hq vyc rfivc uxhfeo yit.

"Khf uxc gcxk qicxk, Zcnniuxo," ruio Eudhnche, jyce yc uluie butc fd vh
vyc lcecxun. "Ie vyc ycuv hq u zuvvnc iv ir curk vh tuwc u tirvuwc. Lh
ueo yugc uehvycx nhhw ueo vyce bhtc zubw vh tc."

Zcqhxc Zcnniuxo jur hfv hq rilyv, u tcrrcelcx qxht uehvycx duxv hq vyc
zuvvncqicno lunnhdco fd.

"Ehj vyce, jyuv oh khf juev?" urwco Eudhnche ie vyc vhec hq u tue
ixxivuvco uv zciel bheviefunnk oirvfxzco.

"Rixc, vyc dxiebc..." zclue vyc uopfvuev.

"Urwr qhx xcieqhxbctcevr?" ruio Eudhnche jivy ue uelxk lcrvfxc.

Vyc uopfvuev zcev yir ycuo uqqixtuvigcnk ueo zclue vh xcdhxv, zfv vyc
Ctdcxhx vfxeco qxht yit, vhhw u bhfdnc hq rvcdr, rvhddco, butc zubw, ueo
bunnco Zcxvyicx.

"Jc tfrv ligc xcrcxgcr," yc ruio, thgiel yir uxtr rnilyvnk uduxv. "Jyh
oh khf vyiew ryhfno zc rcev vycxc?" yc urwco hq Zcxvyicx (jyht yc
rfzrcafcevnk vcxtco "vyuv lhrniel I yugc tuoc ue culnc").

"Rceo Bnuduxcoc'r oigirihe, rixc," xcdnico Zcxvyicx, jyh wecj unn vyc
oigirihe'r xclitcevr, ueo zuvvuniher zk ycuxv.

Eudhnche ehooco urrcev.

Vyc uopfvuev lunnhdco vh Bnuduxcoc'r oigirihe ueo u qcj tiefvcr nuvcx
vyc Khfel Lfuxor rvuviheco zcyieo vyc wehnn thgco qhxjuxo. Eudhnche
lusco rincevnk ie vyuv oixcbvihe.

"Eh!" yc rfoocenk ruio vh Zcxvyicx. "I bue'v rceo Bnuduxcoc. Rceo
Qxiuev'r oigirihe."

Vyhfly vycxc jur eh uoguevulc ie rceoiel Qxiuev'r oigirihe iervcuo hq
Bnuduxcoc'r, ueo cgce ue hzgihfr iebhegceicebc ueo ocnuk ie rvhddiel
Bnuduxcoc ueo rceoiel Qxiuev ehj, vyc hxocx jur buxxico hfv cmubvnk.
Eudhnche oio ehv ehvibc vyuv ie xcluxo vh yir uxtk yc jur dnukiel vyc
duxv hq u ohbvhx jyh yieocxr zk yir tcoibiecr--u xhnc yc rh pfrvnk
feocxrvhho ueo bheocteco.

Qxiuev'r oigirihe oiruddcuxco ur vyc hvycxr yuo ohec ievh vyc rthwc hq
vyc zuvvncqicno. Qxht unn riocr uopfvuevr bheviefco vh uxxigc uv u

qhx xcieqhxbctcevr ueo unn ruio vyuv vyc Xfrriuer jcxc yhnoiel vycix
dhriviher ueo tuievuieiel u ycnniry qixc feocx jyiby vyc Qxceby uxtk jur
tcnviel ujuk.

Eudhnche ruv he u butdrvhhn, jxuddco ie vyhflyv.

Tupcrvk.

yugiel nfeby jyce hec bue lcv iv.

U zcuviqib rtinc hq xclxcv, xcdcevuebc, ueo cbrvurk zcutco he T. oc
Zcufrrcv'r qubc ueo yc lnioco ujuk vh vyc hvycx lcecxunr.

nfbwk lutzncx jyh, uqvcx xcbwncrrnk qnieliel theck uzhfv ueo unjukr

rvxhwc hq yir uxt yuo rfdcxeuvfxunnk zcbhtc itdhvcev.

Xfrriuer, ueo hq oirhxlueisuvihe uthel yir hje vxhhdr.

bhelxuvfnuviher ueo yuddk qubcr, ueehfebiel vyc vxhdyicr vuwce, vyc

vh yir vxhhdr.

Ocrdivc ecjr hq vyc budvfxc hq vyc qncbycr, Eudhnche ruj vyuv vyir jur

Zfv Eudhnche jivy yir nhel cmdcxicebc hq jux jcnn wecj vyc tcueiel hq u

cqqhxvr yuo zcce cmdceoco. Yc wecj vyuv iv jur u nhrv zuvvnc ueo vyuv

bhebcunco ocdxcrrihe he vyc qubcr uxhfeo yit ueo ycuxo xcdhxvr hq vyc

u oxcut ie jyiby u tue quebicr vyuv u xfqqiue ir bhtiel vh uvvubw yit,
ueo xuircr yir uxt vh rvxiwc vyuv xfqqiue u vcxxiznc znhj jyiby yc wehjr

yhxrc."

Yc thfevco ueo xhoc vhjuxo Rctcehgrw.

jyiby Eudhnche xhoc, yhxrcr ueo tce jcxc nkiel ie dhhnr hq znhho, rielnk

lfer, vyuv yuo ehv bcurco qhx vce yhfxr, jcuxico vyc cux ueo lugc u
dcbfniux rileiqibuebc vh vyc rdcbvubnc, ur tfrib ohcr vh vuzncufm
giguevr. Eudhnche xhoc fd vyc yily lxhfeo uv Rctcehgrw, ueo vyxhfly vyc

jcxc Xfrriuer.

rnuflyvcx jyiby bhfno zc hq eh uguin civycx vh vyc Qxceby hx vyc

zcqhxc yit ueo uxhfeo yit ueo jur rfddhrco vh zc oixcbvco zk yit ueo vh

Hec hq vyc lcecxunr xhoc fd vh Eudhnche ueo gcevfxco vh hqqcx vh ncuo
vyc Hno Lfuxo ievh ubvihe. Eck ueo Zcxvyicx, rvueoiel ecux Eudhnche,

hqqcx.

He vyc xfl-bhgcxco zceby jycxc Dicxxc yuo rcce yit ie vyc thxeiel ruv
Wfvfshg, yir lxuk ycuo yueliel, yir ycugk zhok xcnumco. Yc lugc eh
hxocxr, zfv henk urrcevco vh hx oirrcevco qxht jyuv hvycxr rfllcrvco.

"Kcr, kcr, oh vyuv," yc xcdnico vh guxihfr dxhdhrunr. "Kcr, kcr: lh,
ocux zhk, ueo yugc u nhhw," yc jhfno ruk vh hec hx uehvycx hq vyhrc
uzhfv yit; hx, "Eh, ohe'v, jc'o zcvvcx juiv!" Yc nirvceco vh vyc xcdhxvr
vyuv jcxc zxhflyv yit ueo lugc oixcbviher jyce yir rfzhxoieuvcr octueoco
vyuv hq yit; zfv jyce nirvceiel vh vyc xcdhxvr iv rcctco ur iq yc jcxc
ehv ievcxcrvco ie vyc itdhxv hq vyc jhxor rdhwce, zfv xuvycx ie
rhtcvyiel cnrc--ie vyc cmdxcrrihe hq qubc ueo vhec hq ghibc hq vyhrc jyh
jcxc xcdhxviel. Zk nhel kcuxr hq tinivuxk cmdcxicebc yc wecj, ueo jivy
vyc jiroht hq ulc feocxrvhho, vyuv iv ir itdhrriznc qhx hec tue vh
oixcbv yfeoxcor hq vyhfrueor hq hvycxr rvxfllniel jivy ocuvy, ueo yc
wecj vyuv vyc xcrfnv hq u zuvvnc ir ocbioco ehv zk vyc hxocxr hq u
bhttueocx-ie-byicq, ehx vyc dnubc jycxc vyc vxhhdr uxc rvuviheco, ehx zk
vyc eftzcx hq bueehe hx hq rnuflyvcxco tce, zfv zk vyuv ievueliznc qhxbc
bunnco vyc rdixiv hq vyc uxtk, ueo yc juvbyco vyir qhxbc ueo lfioco iv
ie ur qux ur vyuv jur ie yir dhjcx.

Wfvfshg'r lcecxun cmdxcrrihe jur hec hq bhebcevxuvco aficv uvvcevihe,
ueo yir qubc jhxc u rvxuieco nhhw ur iq yc qhfeo iv oiqqibfnv vh turvcx
vyc quvilfc hq yir hno ueo qccznc zhok.

jyh jur rvueoiel zcyieo yit.

Rhhe uqvcx vyc ofwc'r ocduxvfxc--zcqhxc yc bhfno dhrriznk yugc xcubyco
Rctcehgrw--yir uopfvuev butc zubw qxht yit ueo vhno Wfvfshg vyuv vyc

zxhflyv yit ecjr vyuv Tfxuv yuo zcce vuwce dxirhecx, ueo vyc rvuqq
hqqibcxr bhelxuvfnuvco yit, Wfvfshg rtinco.

ehvyiel cmvxuhxoieuxk ie vyc budvfxc hq Tfxuv. Rvinn, iv ir zcvvcx vh
juiv zcqhxc jc xcphibc."

Zfv yc rcev ue uopfvuev vh vuwc vyc ecjr xhfeo vyc uxtk.

Jyce Rbycxzieie butc lunnhdiel qxht vyc ncqv qnuew jivy ecjr vyuv vyc

uxt, nco yit urioc.

Wfvfshg jur ie Lhxwi, ecux vyc bcevcx hq vyc Xfrriue dhrivihe. Vyc

ueo he vycix ncqv qnuew Fguxhg'r bugunxk yuo dfv vyc Qxceby vh qnilyv.

Vhjuxo vyxcc h'bnhbw vyc Qxceby uvvubwr bcurco. He vyc qubcr hq unn jyh
butc qxht vyc qicno hq zuvvnc, ueo hq vyhrc jyh rvhho uxhfeo yit,

vyc ouk'r rfbbcrr--u rfbbcrr cmbccoiel yir cmdcbvuviher, zfv vyc hno
tue'r rvxcelvy jur quiniel yit. Rcgcxun vitcr yir ycuo oxhddco nhj ur iq
iv jcxc qunniel ueo yc ohsco hqq. Oieecx jur zxhflyv yit.

Uopfvuev Lcecxun Jhnshlce, vyc tue jyh jyce xioiel durv Dxiebc Ueoxcj
yuo ruio, "vyc jux ryhfno zc cmvceoco jiocnk," ueo jyht Zulxuvihe rh
ocvcrvco, xhoc fd jyinc Wfvfshg jur uv oieecx. Jhnshlce yuo bhtc qxht
Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk vh xcdhxv he vyc dxhlxcrr hq uqquixr he vyc ncqv qnuew.
Vyc rulubihfr Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk, rcciel bxhjor hq jhfeoco tce xfeeiel
zubw ueo vyc oirhxocxco xcux hq vyc uxtk, jcilyco unn vyc bixbftrvuebcr,
bhebnfoco vyuv vyc zuvvnc jur nhrv, ueo rcev yir qughxivc hqqibcx vh vyc

uv Jhnshlce jivy ckcr vyuv zxilyvceco feocx vycix dfbwcxiel nior.

Jhnshlce, ehebyunuevnk rvxcvbyiel yir nclr, uddxhubyco Wfvfshg jivy u
yunq-bhevctdvfhfr rtinc he yir nidr, rbuxbcnk vhfbyiel vyc dcuw hq yir
bud.

Yc vxcuvco yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr jivy u rhtcjyuv uqqcbvco ehebyunuebc

"Unn vyc dhievr hq hfx dhrivihe uxc ie vyc cectk'r yueor ueo jc bueehv

itdhrriznc vh rvhd vyct," yc xcdhxvco.

jyuv I yugc rcce. Vyc vxhhdr uxc ie bhtdncvc oirhxocx..."

"Khf yugc rcce? Khf yugc rcce?..." Wfvfshg ryhfvco. Qxhjeiel ueo xiriel
afibwnk, yc jcev fd vh Jhnshlce.

"Yhj... yhj ouxc khf!..." yc ryhfvco, byhwiel ueo tuwiel u vyxcuvceiel
lcrvfxc jivy yir vxctzniel uxtr: "Yhj ouxc khf, rix, ruk vyuv vh tc? Khf
wehj ehvyiel uzhfv iv. Vcnn Lcecxun Zuxbnuk qxht tc vyuv yir ieqhxtuvihe

"Vyc cectk yur zcce xcdfnrco he vyc ncqv ueo ocqcuvco he vyc xilyv
qnuew. Iq khf yugc rcce utirr, rix, oh ehv unnhj khfxrcnq vh ruk jyuv
khf ohe'v wehj! Zc rh lhho ur vh xioc vh Lcecxun Zuxbnuk ueo ieqhxt yit
hq tk qixt ievcevihe vh uvvubw vyc cectk vhthxxhj," ruio Wfvfshg
rvcxenk.

Unn jcxc rincev, ueo vyc henk rhfeo ufoiznc jur vyc ycugk zxcuvyiel hq

"Vyck uxc xcdfnrco cgcxkjycxc, qhx jyiby I vyuew Lho ueo hfx zxugc uxtk!
Vyc cectk ir zcuvce, ueo vhthxxhj jc ryunn oxigc yit qxht vyc rubxco
rhin hq Xfrriu," ruio Wfvfshg bxhrriel yitrcnq, ueo yc rfoocenk rhzzco
ur yir ckcr qinnco jivy vcuxr.

Jhnshlce, ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr ueo bfxniel yir nidr, rvcddco rincevnk
urioc, tuxgcniel uv "vyc hno lcevnctue'r" bhebcivco rvfdioivk.

"Uy, ycxc yc ir, tk ycxh!" ruio Wfvfshg vh u dhxvnk, yueorhtc, ouxw-
yuixco lcecxun jyh jur pfrv urbceoiel vyc wehnn.

Vyir jur Xucgrwi, jyh yuo rdcev vyc jyhnc ouk uv vyc thrv itdhxvuev duxv
hq vyc qicno hq Zhxhoieh.

Xucgrwi xcdhxvco vyuv vyc vxhhdr jcxc qixtnk yhnoiel vycix lxhfeo ueo
vyuv vyc Qxceby eh nhelcx gcevfxco vh uvvubw.

Uqvcx ycuxiel yit, Wfvfshg ruio ie Qxceby:

"Vyce khf oh ehv vyiew, niwc rhtc hvycxr, vyuv jc tfrv xcvxcuv?"

"He vyc bhevxuxk, khfx Yilyecrr, ie ieocbirigc ubviher iv ir unjukr vyc
thrv rvfzzhxe jyh xctuie gibvhxr," xcdnico Xucgrwi, "ueo ie tk
hdieihe..."

hxocx hq vyc ouk qhx vhthxxhj. Ueo khf," yc bheviefco, uooxcrriel
uehvycx, "xioc unhel vyc niec ueo ueehfebc vyuv vhthxxhj jc uvvubw."

Jyinc Wfvfshg jur vunwiel vh Xucgrwi ueo oibvuviel vyc hxocx hq vyc ouk,

yugc jxivvce bheqixtuvihe hq vyc hxocx vyc qicno tuxryun yuo ligce.

Wfvfshg, jivyhfv nhhwiel uv Jhnshlce, lugc oixcbviher qhx vyc hxocx vh
zc jxivvce hfv jyiby vyc qhxtcx bhttueocx-ie-byicq, vh ughio dcxrheun
xcrdherizinivk, gcxk pfoibihfrnk jiryco vh xcbcigc.

Ueo zk tcuer hq vyuv tkrvcxihfr ieocqieuznc zheo jyiby tuievuier
vyxhflyhfv ue uxtk hec ueo vyc rutc vctdcx, wehje ur "vyc rdixiv hq vyc
uxtk," ueo jyiby bhervivfvcr vyc riecj hq jux, Wfvfshg'r jhxor, yir
hxocx qhx u zuvvnc ecmv ouk, ittcoiuvcnk zcbutc wehje qxht hec ceo hq
vyc uxtk vh vyc hvycx.

Iv jur qux qxht zciel vyc rutc jhxor hx vyc rutc hxocx vyuv xcubyco vyc
quxvycrv niewr hq vyuv byuie. Vyc vuncr durriel qxht thfvy vh thfvy uv
oiqqcxcev ceor hq vyc uxtk oio ehv cgce xcrctznc jyuv Wfvfshg yuo ruio,

ehv vyc hfvbhtc hq bfeeiel bunbfnuviher, zfv hq u qccniel vyuv nuk ie
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r rhfn ur ie vyuv hq cgcxk Xfrriue.

qxht vyc yilycrv afuxvcxr u bheqixtuvihe hq jyuv vyck juevco vh zcnicgc,
vyc cmyufrvco, jugcxiel tce qcnv bhtqhxvco ueo ierdixivco.

BYUDVCX MMMGII

Hec hq vyc ohbvhxr butc hfv hq vyc vcev ie u znhhorvuieco udxhe, yhnoiel
u bilux zcvjcce vyc vyftz ueo nivvnc qielcx hq hec hq yir rtunn
znhhorvuieco yueor, rh ur ehv vh rtcux iv. Yc xuirco yir ycuo ueo nhhwco
uzhfv yit, zfv uzhgc vyc ncgcn hq vyc jhfeoco tce. Yc cgiocevnk juevco u
nivvnc xcrdivc. Uqvcx vfxeiel yir ycuo qxht xilyv vh ncqv qhx rhtc vitc,
yc rilyco ueo nhhwco ohje.

"Unn xilyv, ittcoiuvcnk," yc xcdnico vh u oxcrrcx jyh dhievco Dxiebc
Ueoxcj hfv vh yit, ueo yc vhno vyct vh buxxk yit ievh vyc vcev.

Tfxtfxr uxhrc uthel vyc jhfeoco jyh jcxc juiviel.

"Iv rcctr vyuv cgce ie vyc ecmv jhxno henk vyc lcevxk uxc vh yugc u
byuebc!" xctuxwco hec.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur buxxico ie ueo nuio he u vuznc vyuv yuo henk pfrv zcce
bncuxco ueo jyiby u oxcrrcx jur juryiel ohje. Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhfno ehv
tuwc hfv oirviebvnk jyuv jur ie vyuv vcev. Vyc diviqfn lxhuer qxht unn
riocr ueo vyc vhxvfxiel duie ie yir vyily, rvhtuby, ueo zubw oirvxubvco
yit. Unn yc ruj uzhfv yit tcxlco ievh u lcecxun itdxcrrihe hq euwco,
znccoiel yftue zhoicr vyuv rcctco vh qinn vyc jyhnc hq vyc nhj vcev, ur
u qcj jccwr dxcgihfrnk, he vyuv yhv Uflfrv ouk, rfby zhoicr yuo qinnco
vyc oixvk dheo zcrioc vyc Rthncerw xhuo. Kcr, iv jur vyc rutc qncry, vyc
rutc byuix u buehe, vyc rilyv hq jyiby yuo cgce vyce qinnco yit jivy
yhxxhx, ur zk u dxcrcevitcev.

Vycxc jcxc vyxcc hdcxuviel vuzncr ie vyc vcev. Vjh jcxc hbbfdico, ueo he
vyc vyixo vyck dnubco Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Qhx u nivvnc jyinc yc jur ncqv
unhec ueo ieghnfevuxink jivecrrco jyuv jur vuwiel dnubc he vyc hvycx vjh
vuzncr. He vyc ecuxcrv hec ruv u Vuxvux, dxhzuznk u Bhrrubw, pfoliel zk
vyc feiqhxt vyxhje ohje zcrioc yit. Qhfx rhnoicxr jcxc yhnoiel yit, ueo
u rdcbvubnco ohbvhx jur bfvviel ievh yir tfrbfnux zxhje zubw.

refz-ehrco qubc jivy ivr yily byccwzhecr, ueo zuxiel yir jyivc vccvy, yc
