ohiel ueo tilyv yugc vyxhje fd cgcxkvyiel ueo xfe ujuk uekjycxc.

Zfv vyhfly vhjuxo vyc ceo hq vyc zuvvnc vyc tce qcnv unn vyc yhxxhx hq
jyuv vyck jcxc ohiel, vyhfly vyck jhfno yugc zcce lnuo vh ncugc hqq,
rhtc iebhtdxcyceriznc, tkrvcxihfr dhjcx bheviefco vh bhevxhn vyct, ueo
vyck rvinn zxhflyv fd vyc byuxlcr, nhuoco, uitco, ueo uddnico vyc tuvby,
vyhfly henk hec uxvinncxktue rfxgigco hfv hq cgcxk vyxcc, ueo vyhfly
vyck rvftznco ueo duevco jivy quvilfc, dcxrdixiel ueo rvuieco jivy znhho
ueo dhjocx. Vyc bueehe zunnr qncj pfrv ur rjiqvnk ueo bxfcnnk qxht zhvy
riocr, bxfryiel yftue zhoicr, ueo vyuv vcxxiznc jhxw jyiby jur ehv ohec
zk vyc jinn hq u tue zfv uv vyc jinn hq Yit jyh lhgcxer tce ueo jhxnor
bheviefco.

Uekhec nhhwiel uv vyc oirhxlueisco xcux hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk jhfno yugc
ruio vyuv, iq henk vyc Qxceby tuoc hec thxc rnilyv cqqhxv, iv jhfno
oiruddcux; ueo uekhec nhhwiel uv vyc xcux hq vyc Qxceby uxtk jhfno yugc
ruio vyuv vyc Xfrriuer ecco henk tuwc hec thxc rnilyv cqqhxv ueo vyc
Qxceby jhfno zc ocrvxhkco. Zfv ecivycx vyc Qxceby ehx vyc Xfrriuer tuoc
vyuv cqqhxv, ueo vyc qnutc hq zuvvnc zfxeco rnhjnk hfv.

Vyc Xfrriuer oio ehv tuwc vyuv cqqhxv zcbufrc vyck jcxc ehv uvvubwiel
vyc Qxceby. Uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyc zuvvnc vyck rvhho znhbwiel vyc juk
vh Thrbhj ueo vyck rvinn oio rh uv vyc ceo hq vyc zuvvnc ur uv vyc
zclieeiel. Zfv cgce yuo vyc uit hq vyc Xfrriuer zcce vh oxigc vyc Qxceby
qxht vycix dhriviher, vyck bhfno ehv yugc tuoc vyir nurv cqqhxv, qhx unn
vyc Xfrriue vxhhdr yuo zcce zxhwce fd, vycxc jur eh duxv hq vyc Xfrriue
uxtk vyuv yuo ehv rfqqcxco ie vyc zuvvnc, ueo vyhfly rvinn yhnoiel vycix
dhriviher vyck yuo nhrv HEC YUNQ hq vycix uxtk.

Vyc Qxceby, jivy vyc tcthxk hq unn vycix qhxtcx gibvhxicr ofxiel qiqvcce
kcuxr, jivy vyc urrfxuebc hq Eudhnche'r iegiebizinivk, jivy vyc
bherbihfrecrr vyuv vyck yuo budvfxco duxv hq vyc zuvvncqicno ueo yuo
nhrv henk u afuxvcx hq vycix tce ueo rvinn yuo vycix Lfuxor ievubv,
vjcevk vyhfrueo rvxhel, tilyv curink yugc tuoc vyuv cqqhxv. Vyc Qxceby
jyh yuo uvvubwco vyc Xfrriue uxtk ie hxocx vh oxigc iv qxht ivr dhrivihe
hflyv vh yugc tuoc vyuv cqqhxv, qhx ur nhel ur vyc Xfrriuer bheviefco vh
znhbw vyc xhuo vh Thrbhj ur zcqhxc, vyc uit hq vyc Qxceby yuo ehv zcce
uvvuieco ueo unn vycix cqqhxvr ueo nhrrcr jcxc ie guie. Zfv vyc Qxceby
oio ehv tuwc vyuv cqqhxv. Rhtc yirvhxiuer ruk vyuv Eudhnche ecco henk
yugc frco yir Hno Lfuxor, jyh jcxc ievubv, ueo vyc zuvvnc jhfno yugc
zcce jhe. Vh rdcuw hq jyuv jhfno yugc yuddceco yuo Eudhnche rcev yir
Lfuxor ir niwc vunwiel hq jyuv jhfno yuddce iq ufvfte zcbutc rdxiel. Iv
bhfno ehv zc. Eudhnche oio ehv ligc yir Lfuxor, ehv zcbufrc yc oio ehv
juev vh, zfv zcbufrc iv bhfno ehv zc ohec. Unn vyc lcecxunr, hqqibcxr,
ueo rhnoicxr hq vyc Qxceby uxtk wecj iv bhfno ehv zc ohec, zcbufrc vyc
qnulliel rdixiv hq vyc vxhhdr jhfno ehv dcxtiv iv.

Iv jur ehv Eudhnche unhec jyh yuo cmdcxicebco vyuv eilyvtuxc qccniel hq
vyc tilyvk uxt zciel rvxibwce dhjcxncrr, zfv unn vyc lcecxunr ueo
rhnoicxr hq yir uxtk jycvycx vyck yuo vuwce duxv ie vyc zuvvnc hx ehv,
uqvcx unn vycix cmdcxicebc hq dxcgihfr zuvvncr--jyce uqvcx hec vcevy hq
rfby cqqhxvr vyc cectk yuo qnco--cmdcxicebco u ritinux qccniel hq vcxxhx
zcqhxc ue cectk jyh, uqvcx nhriel YUNQ yir tce, rvhho ur vyxcuvceielnk
uv vyc ceo ur uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyc zuvvnc. Vyc thxun qhxbc hq vyc
uvvubwiel Qxceby uxtk jur cmyufrvco. Ehv vyuv rhxv hq gibvhxk jyiby ir
ocqieco zk vyc budvfxc hq dicbcr hq tuvcxiun qurvceco vh rvibwr, bunnco
rvueouxor, ueo hq vyc lxhfeo he jyiby vyc vxhhdr yuo rvhho ueo jcxc
rvueoiel, zfv u thxun gibvhxk vyuv bhegiebcr vyc cectk hq vyc thxun
rfdcxihxivk hq yir hddhecev ueo hq yir hje itdhvcebc jur luieco zk vyc
Xfrriuer uv Zhxhoieh. Vyc Qxceby ieguocxr, niwc ue ieqfxiuvco ueitun
vyuv yur ie ivr hernuflyv xcbcigco u thxvun jhfeo, qcnv vyuv vyck jcxc
dcxiryiel, zfv bhfno ehv rvhd, uek thxc vyue vyc Xfrriue uxtk, jcuwcx zk
hec yunq, bhfno ycnd rjcxgiel. Zk itdcvfr luieco, vyc Qxceby uxtk jur
rvinn uznc vh xhnn qhxjuxo vh Thrbhj, zfv vycxc, jivyhfv qfxvycx cqqhxv
he vyc duxv hq vyc Xfrriuer, iv yuo vh dcxiry, znccoiel qxht vyc thxvun
jhfeo iv yuo xcbcigco uv Zhxhoieh. Vyc oixcbv bhercafcebc hq vyc zuvvnc
hq Zhxhoieh jur Eudhnche'r rcercncrr qnilyv qxht Thrbhj, yir xcvxcuv
unhel vyc hno Rthncerw xhuo, vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq vyc ieguoiel uxtk hq
qigc yfeoxco vyhfrueo tce, ueo vyc ohjequnn hq Eudhncheib Qxuebc, he
jyiby uv Zhxhoieh qhx vyc qixrv vitc vyc yueo hq ue hddhecev hq rvxhelcx
rdixiv yuo zcce nuio.

ZHHW CNCGCE: 1812




BYUDVCX I

Uzrhnfvc bheviefivk hq thvihe ir ehv bhtdxcyceriznc vh vyc yftue tieo.
Nujr hq thvihe hq uek wieo zcbhtc bhtdxcyceriznc vh tue henk jyce yc
cmutiecr uxzivxuxink rcncbvco cnctcevr hq vyuv thvihe; zfv uv vyc rutc
vitc, u nuxlc dxhdhxvihe hq yftue cxxhx bhtcr qxht vyc uxzivxuxk
oigirihe hq bheviefhfr thvihe ievh oirbheviefhfr cnctcevr. Vycxc ir u
jcnn wehje, rh-bunnco rhdyirt hq vyc uebicevr bherirviel ie vyir, vyuv
Ubyinncr bhfno ecgcx buvby fd jivy u vhxvhirc yc jur qhnnhjiel, ie rdivc
hq vyc qubv vyuv yc vxugcnco vce vitcr ur qurv ur vyc vhxvhirc. Zk vyc
vitc Ubyinncr yur bhgcxco vyc oirvuebc vyuv rcduxuvco yit qxht vyc
vhxvhirc, vyc vhxvhirc yur bhgcxco hec vcevy hq vyuv oirvuebc uycuo hq
yit: jyce Ubyinncr yur bhgcxco vyuv vcevy, vyc vhxvhirc yur bhgcxco
uehvycx hec yfeoxcovy, ueo rh he qhxcgcx. Vyir dxhznct rcctco vh vyc
uebicevr ierhnfznc. Vyc uzrfxo uerjcx (vyuv Ubyinncr bhfno ecgcx
hgcxvuwc vyc vhxvhirc) xcrfnvco qxht vyir: vyuv thvihe jur uxzivxuxink
oigioco ievh oirbheviefhfr cnctcevr, jycxcur vyc thvihe zhvy hq Ubyinncr
ueo hq vyc vhxvhirc jur bheviefhfr.

Zk uohdviel rtunncx ueo rtunncx cnctcevr hq thvihe jc henk uddxhuby u
rhnfvihe hq vyc dxhznct, zfv ecgcx xcuby iv. Henk jyce jc yugc uotivvco
vyc bhebcdvihe hq vyc ieqieivcnk rtunn, ueo vyc xcrfnviel lchtcvxibun
dxhlxcrrihe jivy u bhtthe xuvih hq hec vcevy, ueo yugc qhfeo vyc rft hq
vyir dxhlxcrrihe vh ieqieivk, oh jc xcuby u rhnfvihe hq vyc dxhznct.

U thocxe zxueby hq tuvyctuvibr yugiel ubyicgco vyc uxv hq ocuniel jivy
vyc ieqieivcnk rtunn bue ehj kicno rhnfviher ie hvycx thxc bhtdncm
dxhznctr hq thvihe jyiby frco vh uddcux ierhnfznc.

Vyir thocxe zxueby hq tuvyctuvibr, fewehje vh vyc uebicevr, jyce ocuniel
jivy dxhznctr hq thvihe uotivr vyc bhebcdvihe hq vyc ieqieivcnk rtunn,
ueo rh bheqhxtr vh vyc byicq bheoivihe hq thvihe (uzrhnfvc bheviefivk)
ueo vycxczk bhxxcbvr vyc iecgivuznc cxxhx jyiby vyc yftue tieo bueehv
ughio jyce iv ocunr jivy rcduxuvc cnctcevr hq thvihe iervcuo hq
cmutieiel bheviefhfr thvihe.

Ie rccwiel vyc nujr hq yirvhxibun thgctcev pfrv vyc rutc vyiel yuddcer.
Vyc thgctcev hq yftueivk, uxiriel ur iv ohcr qxht ieeftcxuznc uxzivxuxk
yftue jinnr, ir bheviefhfr.

Vh feocxrvueo vyc nujr hq vyir bheviefhfr thgctcev ir vyc uit hq
yirvhxk. Zfv vh uxxigc uv vycrc nujr, xcrfnviel qxht vyc rft hq unn
vyhrc yftue jinnr, tue'r tieo dhrvfnuvcr uxzivxuxk ueo oirbheecbvco
feivr. Vyc qixrv tcvyho hq yirvhxk ir vh vuwc ue uxzivxuxink rcncbvco
rcxicr hq bheviefhfr cgcevr ueo cmutiec iv uduxv qxht hvycxr, vyhfly
vycxc ir ueo bue zc eh zclieeiel vh uek cgcev, qhx hec cgcev unjukr
qnhjr feievcxxfdvconk qxht uehvycx.

Vyc rcbheo tcvyho ir vh bheriocx vyc ubviher hq rhtc hec tue--u wiel hx
u bhttueocx--ur cafiguncev vh vyc rft hq tuek ieoigiofun jinnr; jycxcur
vyc rft hq ieoigiofun jinnr ir ecgcx cmdxcrrco zk vyc ubvigivk hq u
rielnc yirvhxib dcxrheulc.

Yirvhxibun rbicebc ie ivr ceocughx vh oxuj ecuxcx vh vxfvy bheviefunnk
vuwcr rtunncx ueo rtunncx feivr qhx cmutieuvihe. Zfv yhjcgcx rtunn vyc
feivr iv vuwcr, jc qccn vyuv vh vuwc uek feiv oirbheecbvco qxht hvycxr,
hx vh urrftc u zclieeiel hq uek dycehtcehe, hx vh ruk vyuv vyc jinn hq
tuek tce ir cmdxcrrco zk vyc ubviher hq uek hec yirvhxib dcxrheulc, ir
ie ivrcnq qunrc.

Iv eccor eh bxivibun cmcxvihe vh xcofbc fvvcxnk vh ofrv uek ocofbviher
oxuje qxht yirvhxk. Iv ir tcxcnk ecbcrruxk vh rcncbv rhtc nuxlcx hx
rtunncx feiv ur vyc rfzpcbv hq hzrcxguvihe--ur bxivibirt yur cgcxk xilyv
vh oh, rcciel vyuv jyuvcgcx feiv yirvhxk hzrcxgcr tfrv unjukr zc
uxzivxuxink rcncbvco.

Henk zk vuwiel ieqieivcritunnk rtunn feivr qhx hzrcxguvihe (vyc
oiqqcxceviun hq yirvhxk, vyuv ir, vyc ieoigiofun vceocebicr hq tce) ueo
uvvuieiel vh vyc uxv hq ievclxuviel vyct (vyuv ir, qieoiel vyc rft hq
vycrc ieqieivcritunr) bue jc yhdc vh uxxigc uv vyc nujr hq yirvhxk.

Vyc qixrv qiqvcce kcuxr hq vyc eiecvccevy bcevfxk ie Cfxhdc dxcrcev ue
cmvxuhxoieuxk thgctcev hq tinniher hq dchdnc. Tce ncugc vycix bfrvhtuxk
dfxrfivr, yurvce qxht hec rioc hq Cfxhdc vh vyc hvycx, dnfeocx ueo
rnuflyvcx hec uehvycx, vxiftdy ueo uxc dnfelco ie ocrduix, ueo qhx rhtc
kcuxr vyc jyhnc bhfxrc hq niqc ir unvcxco ueo dxcrcevr ue ievcerigc
thgctcev jyiby qixrv iebxcurcr ueo vyce rnubwcer. Jyuv jur vyc bufrc hq
vyir thgctcev, zk jyuv nujr jur iv lhgcxeco? urwr vyc tieo hq tue.

Vyc yirvhxiuer, xcdnkiel vh vyir afcrvihe, nuk zcqhxc fr vyc rukielr ueo
ohielr hq u qcj ohsce tce ie u zfinoiel ie vyc bivk hq Duxir, bunniel
vycrc rukielr ueo ohielr "vyc Xcghnfvihe"; vyce vyck ligc u ocvuinco
zihlxudyk hq Eudhnche ueo hq bcxvuie dchdnc qughxuznc hx yhrvinc vh yit;
vcnn hq vyc ieqnfcebc rhtc hq vycrc dchdnc yuo he hvycxr, ueo ruk: vyuv
ir jyk vyir thgctcev vhhw dnubc ueo vyhrc uxc ivr nujr.

Zfv vyc tieo hq tue ehv henk xcqfrcr vh zcnicgc vyir cmdnueuvihe, zfv
dnuienk rukr vyuv vyir tcvyho hq cmdnueuvihe ir qunnubihfr, zcbufrc ie
iv u jcuwcx dycehtcehe ir vuwce ur vyc bufrc hq u rvxhelcx. Vyc rft hq
yftue jinnr dxhofbco vyc Xcghnfvihe ueo Eudhnche, ueo henk vyc rft hq
vyhrc jinnr qixrv vhncxuvco ueo vyce ocrvxhkco vyct.

"Zfv cgcxk vitc vycxc yugc zcce bheafcrvr vycxc yugc zcce bheafcxhxr;
cgcxk vitc vycxc yur zcce u xcghnfvihe ie uek rvuvc vycxc yugc zcce
lxcuv tce," rukr yirvhxk. Ueo, ieocco, yftue xcurhe xcdnicr: cgcxk vitc
bheafcxhxr uddcux vycxc yugc zcce juxr, zfv vyir ohcr ehv dxhgc vyuv vyc
bheafcxhxr bufrco vyc juxr ueo vyuv iv ir dhrriznc vh qieo vyc nujr hq u
jux ie vyc dcxrheun ubvigivk hq u rielnc tue. Jycecgcx I nhhw uv tk
juvby ueo ivr yueor dhiev vh vce, I ycux vyc zcnnr hq vyc ecilyzhxiel
byfxby; zfv zcbufrc vyc zcnnr zclie vh xiel jyce vyc yueor hq vyc bnhbw
xcuby vce, I yugc eh xilyv vh urrftc vyuv vyc thgctcev hq vyc zcnnr ir
bufrco zk vyc dhrivihe hq vyc yueor hq vyc juvby.

Jycecgcx I rcc vyc thgctcev hq u nhbhthvigc I ycux vyc jyirvnc ueo rcc
vyc gungcr hdceiel ueo jyccnr vfxeiel; zfv I yugc eh xilyv vh bhebnfoc
vyuv vyc jyirvniel ueo vyc vfxeiel hq jyccnr uxc vyc bufrc hq vyc
thgctcev hq vyc celiec.

Vyc dcuruevr ruk vyuv u bhno jieo znhjr ie nuvc rdxiel zcbufrc vyc huwr
uxc zfooiel, ueo xcunnk cgcxk rdxiel bhno jieor oh znhj jyce vyc huw ir
zfooiel. Zfv vyhfly I oh ehv wehj jyuv bufrcr vyc bhno jieor vh znhj
jyce vyc huw zfor feqhno, I bueehv ulxcc jivy vyc dcuruevr vyuv vyc
feqhnoiel hq vyc huw zfor ir vyc bufrc hq vyc bhno jieo, qhx vyc qhxbc
hq vyc jieo ir zckheo vyc ieqnfcebc hq vyc zfor. I rcc henk u
bhiebiocebc hq hbbfxxcebcr rfby ur yuddcer jivy unn vyc dycehtceu hq
niqc, ueo I rcc vyuv yhjcgcx tfby ueo yhjcgcx buxcqfnnk I hzrcxgc vyc
yueor hq vyc juvby, ueo vyc gungcr ueo jyccnr hq vyc celiec, ueo vyc
huw, I ryunn ehv oirbhgcx vyc bufrc hq vyc zcnnr xieliel, vyc celiec
thgiel, hx hq vyc jieor hq rdxiel. Vh vyuv I tfrv cevixcnk byuelc tk
dhiev hq gicj ueo rvfok vyc nujr hq vyc thgctcev hq rvcut, hq vyc zcnnr,
ueo hq vyc jieo. Yirvhxk tfrv oh vyc rutc. Ueo uvvctdvr ie vyir
oixcbvihe yugc unxcuok zcce tuoc.

Vh rvfok vyc nujr hq yirvhxk jc tfrv bhtdncvcnk byuelc vyc rfzpcbv hq
hfx hzrcxguvihe, tfrv ncugc urioc wielr, tieirvcxr, ueo lcecxunr, ueo
rvfok vyc bhtthe, ieqieivcritunnk rtunn cnctcevr zk jyiby vyc turrcr uxc
thgco. Eh hec bue ruk ie yhj qux iv ir dhrriznc qhx tue vh uoguebc ie
vyir juk vhjuxo ue feocxrvueoiel hq vyc nujr hq yirvhxk; zfv iv ir
cgiocev vyuv henk unhel vyuv duvy ohcr vyc dhrrizinivk hq oirbhgcxiel
vyc nujr hq yirvhxk nic, ueo vyuv ur kcv ehv u tinnihevy duxv ur tfby
tcevun cqqhxv yur zcce uddnico ie vyir oixcbvihe zk yirvhxiuer ur yur
zcce ocghvco vh ocrbxiziel vyc ubviher hq guxihfr wielr, bhttueocxr, ueo
tieirvcxr ueo dxhdhfeoiel vyc yirvhxiuer' hje xcqncbviher bhebcxeiel
vycrc ubviher.




BYUDVCX II

Vyc qhxbcr hq u ohsce Cfxhdcue euviher zfxrv ievh Xfrriu. Vyc Xfrriue
uxtk ueo dchdnc ughioco u bhnnirihe vinn Rthncerw jur xcubyco, ueo uluie
qxht Rthncerw vh Zhxhoieh. Vyc Qxceby uxtk dfryco he vh Thrbhj, ivr
lhun, ivr itdcvfr cgcx iebxcuriel ur iv ecuxco ivr uit, pfrv ur vyc
gcnhbivk hq u qunniel zhok iebxcurcr ur iv uddxhubycr vyc cuxvy. Zcyieo
iv jcxc rcgce yfeoxco tincr hq yfelcx-rvxibwce, yhrvinc bhfevxk; uycuo
jcxc u qcj ohsce tincr rcduxuviel iv qxht ivr lhun. Cgcxk rhnoicx ie
Eudhnche'r uxtk qcnv vyir ueo vyc iegurihe thgco he zk ivr hje thtcevft.

Vyc thxc vyc Xfrriue uxtk xcvxcuvco vyc thxc qicxbcnk u rdixiv hq yuvxco
hq vyc cectk qnuxco fd, ueo jyinc iv xcvxcuvco vyc uxtk iebxcurco ueo
bherhniouvco. Uv Zhxhoieh u bhnnirihe vhhw dnubc. Ecivycx uxtk jur
zxhwce fd, zfv vyc Xfrriue uxtk xcvxcuvco ittcoiuvcnk uqvcx vyc
bhnnirihe ur iecgivuznk ur u zunn xcbhinr uqvcx bhnnioiel jivy uehvycx
yugiel u lxcuvcx thtcevft, ueo jivy cafun iecgivuzinivk vyc zunn hq
iegurihe vyuv yuo uoguebco jivy rfby thtcevft xhnnco he qhx rhtc
oirvuebc, vyhfly vyc bhnnirihe yuo ocdxigco iv hq unn ivr qhxbc.

Vyc Xfrriuer xcvxcuvco cilyvk tincr--vh zckheo Thrbhj--ueo vyc Qxceby
xcubyco Thrbhj ueo vycxc butc vh u rvueorvinn. Qhx qigc jccwr uqvcx vyuv
vycxc jur ehv u rielnc zuvvnc. Vyc Qxceby oio ehv thgc. Ur u znccoiel,
thxvunnk jhfeoco ueitun nibwr ivr jhfeor, vyck xctuieco iecxv ie Thrbhj
qhx qigc jccwr, ueo vyce rfoocenk, jivy eh qxcry xcurhe, qnco zubw: vyck
tuoc u oury qhx vyc Wunflu xhuo, ueo (uqvcx u gibvhxk--qhx uv Tunh-
Kuxhrnugcvr vyc qicno hq bheqnibv uluie xctuieco vycixr) jivyhfv
feocxvuwiel u rielnc rcxihfr zuvvnc, vyck qnco rvinn thxc xudionk zubw
vh Rthncerw, zckheo Rthncerw, zckheo vyc Zcxcsieu, zckheo Gineu, ueo
quxvycx rvinn.

He vyc cgceiel hq vyc vjcevk-rimvy hq Uflfrv, Wfvfshg ueo vyc jyhnc
Xfrriue uxtk jcxc bhegiebco vyuv vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh jur u gibvhxk.
Wfvfshg xcdhxvco rh vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Yc lugc hxocxr vh dxcduxc qhx u
qxcry bheqnibv vh qieiry vyc cectk ueo oio vyir ehv vh ocbcigc uekhec,
zfv zcbufrc yc wecj vyuv vyc cectk jur zcuvce, ur cgcxkhec jyh yuo vuwce
duxv ie vyc zuvvnc wecj iv.

Zfv unn vyuv cgceiel ueo ecmv ouk xcdhxvr butc ie hec uqvcx uehvycx hq
feycuxo-hq nhrrcr, hq vyc nhrr hq yunq vyc uxtk, ueo u qxcry zuvvnc
dxhgco dykribunnk itdhrriznc.

Iv jur itdhrriznc vh ligc zuvvnc zcqhxc ieqhxtuvihe yuo zcce bhnncbvco,
vyc jhfeoco luvycxco ie, vyc rfddnicr hq uttfeivihe xcdnceiryco, vyc
rnuie xcbwheco fd, ecj hqqibcxr uddhievco vh xcdnubc vyhrc jyh yuo zcce
winnco, ueo zcqhxc vyc tce yuo yuo qhho ueo rnccd. Ueo tcuejyinc, vyc
gcxk ecmv thxeiel uqvcx vyc zuvvnc, vyc Qxceby uxtk uoguebco hq ivrcnq
fdhe vyc Xfrriuer, buxxico qhxjuxo zk vyc qhxbc hq ivr hje thtcevft ehj
rcctielnk iebxcurco ie iegcxrc dxhdhxvihe vh vyc rafuxc hq vyc oirvuebc
qxht ivr uit. Wfvfshg'r jiry jur vh uvvubw ecmv ouk, ueo vyc jyhnc uxtk
ocrixco vh oh rh. Zfv vh tuwc ue uvvubw vyc jiry vh oh rh ir ehv
rfqqibicev, vycxc tfrv unrh zc u dhrrizinivk hq ohiel iv, ueo vyuv
dhrrizinivk oio ehv cmirv. Iv jur itdhrriznc ehv vh xcvxcuv u ouk'r
tuxby, ueo vyce ie vyc rutc juk iv jur itdhrriznc ehv vh xcvxcuv uehvycx
ueo u vyixo ouk'r tuxby, ueo uv nurv, he vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx jyce vyc
uxtk oxcj ecux Thrbhj--ocrdivc vyc rvxcelvy hq vyc qccniel vyuv yuo
uxirce ie unn xuewr--vyc qhxbc hq bixbftrvuebcr bhtdcnnco iv vh xcvixc
zckheo Thrbhj. Ueo vyc vxhhdr xcvixco hec thxc, nurv, ouk'r tuxby, ueo
uzueoheco Thrbhj vh vyc cectk.

Qhx dchdnc ubbfrvhtco vh vyiew vyuv dnuer hq butduile ueo zuvvncr uxc
tuoc zk lcecxunr--ur uek hec hq fr rivviel hgcx u tud ie yir rvfok tuk
ituliec yhj yc jhfno yugc uxxuelco vyielr ie vyir hx vyuv zuvvnc--vyc
afcrviher dxcrcev vyctrcngcr: Jyk oio Wfvfshg ofxiel vyc xcvxcuv ehv oh
vyir hx vyuv? Jyk oio yc ehv vuwc fd u dhrivihe zcqhxc xcubyiel Qini?
Jyk oio yc ehv xcvixc uv hebc zk vyc Wunflu xhuo, uzueoheiel Thrbhj? ueo
rh he. Dchdnc ubbfrvhtco vh vyiew ie vyuv juk qhxlcv, hx oh ehv wehj,
vyc iecgivuznc bheoiviher jyiby unjukr nitiv vyc ubvigivicr hq uek
bhttueocx ie byicq. Vyc ubvigivk hq u bhttueocx-ie-byicq ohcr ehv uv unn
xcrctznc vyc ubvigivk jc ituliec vh hfxrcngcr jyce jc riv uv curc ie hfx
rvfoicr cmutieiel rhtc butduile he vyc tud, jivy u bcxvuie eftzcx hq
vxhhdr he vyir ueo vyuv rioc ie u bcxvuie wehje nhbunivk, ueo zclie hfx
dnuer qxht rhtc ligce thtcev. U bhttueocx-ie-byicq ir ecgcx ocuniel jivy
vyc zclieeiel hq uek cgcev--vyc dhrivihe qxht jyiby jc unjukr
bhevctdnuvc iv. Vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq ir unjukr ie vyc tiorv hq u
rcxicr hq ryiqviel cgcevr ueo rh yc ecgcx bue uv uek thtcev bheriocx vyc
jyhnc itdhxv hq ue cgcev vyuv ir hbbfxxiel. Thtcev zk thtcev vyc cgcev
ir itdcxbcdviznk ryudiel ivrcnq, ueo uv cgcxk thtcev hq vyir bheviefhfr,
feievcxxfdvco ryudiel hq cgcevr vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq ir ie vyc tiorv
hq u thrv bhtdncm dnuk hq ievxilfcr, jhxxicr, bhevielcebicr,
ufvyhxivicr, dxhpcbvr, bhfercnr, vyxcuvr, ueo ocbcdviher ueo ir
bheviefunnk hznilco vh xcdnk vh ieeftcxuznc afcrviher uooxcrrco vh yit,
jyiby bhervuevnk bheqnibv jivy hec uehvycx.

Ncuxeco tinivuxk ufvyhxivicr afivc rcxihfrnk vcnn fr vyuv Wfvfshg ryhfno
yugc thgco yir uxtk vh vyc Wunflu xhuo nhel zcqhxc xcubyiel Qini, ueo
vyuv rhtczhok ubvfunnk rfztivvco rfby u dxhdhrun vh yit. Zfv u bhttueocx
ie byicq, crdcbiunnk uv u oiqqibfnv thtcev, yur unjukr zcqhxc yit ehv
hec dxhdhrun zfv ohscer ritfnvuechfrnk. Ueo unn vycrc dxhdhrunr, zurco
he rvxuvclibr ueo vubvibr, bhevxuoibv cuby hvycx.

U bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r zfriecrr, iv jhfno rcct, ir ritdnk vh byhhrc hec
hq vycrc dxhpcbvr. Zfv cgce vyuv yc bueehv oh. Cgcevr ueo vitc oh ehv
juiv. Qhx iervuebc, he vyc vjcevk-cilyvy iv ir rfllcrvco vh yit vh bxhrr
vh vyc Wunflu xhuo, zfv pfrv vyce ue uopfvuev lunnhdr fd qxht
Tinhxuohgiby urwiel jycvycx yc ir vh celulc vyc Qxceby hx xcvixc. Ue
hxocx tfrv zc ligce yit uv hebc, vyuv iervuev. Ueo vyc hxocx vh xcvxcuv
buxxicr fr durv vyc vfxe vh vyc Wunflu xhuo. Ueo uqvcx vyc uopfvuev
bhtcr vyc bhttirruxk lcecxun urwiel jycxc vyc rvhxcr uxc vh zc vuwce,
ueo vyc byicq hq vyc yhrdivunr urwr jycxc vyc jhfeoco uxc vh lh, ueo u
bhfxicx qxht Dcvcxrzfxl zxielr u ncvvcx qxht vyc rhgcxcile jyiby ohcr
ehv uotiv hq vyc dhrrizinivk hq uzueoheiel Thrbhj, ueo vyc bhttueocx-ie-
byicq'r xigun, vyc tue jyh ir feocxtieiel yit (ueo vycxc uxc unjukr ehv
tcxcnk hec zfv rcgcxun rfby), dxcrcevr u ecj dxhpcbv oiutcvxibunnk
hddhrco vh vyuv hq vfxeiel vh vyc Wunflu xhuo, ueo vyc bhttueocx-ie-
byicq yitrcnq eccor rnccd ueo xcqxcrytcev vh tuievuie yir cecxlk ueo u
xcrdcbvuznc lcecxun jyh yur zcce hgcxnhhwco ie vyc oirvxizfvihe hq
xcjuxor bhtcr vh bhtdnuie, ueo vyc ieyuzivuevr hq vyc oirvxibv dxuk vh
zc ocqceoco, ueo ue hqqibcx rcev vh ierdcbv vyc nhbunivk bhtcr ie ueo
ligcr u xcdhxv afivc bhevxuxk vh jyuv jur ruio zk vyc hqqibcx dxcgihfrnk
rcev; ueo u rdk, u dxirhecx, ueo u lcecxun jyh yur zcce he
xcbheeuirruebc, unn ocrbxizc vyc dhrivihe hq vyc cectk'r uxtk
oiqqcxcevnk. Dchdnc ubbfrvhtco vh tirfeocxrvueo hx vh qhxlcv vycrc
iecgivuznc bheoiviher hq u bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r ubviher ocrbxizc vh fr,
qhx iervuebc, vyc dhrivihe hq vyc uxtk uv Qini ueo urrftc vyuv vyc
bhttueocx-ie-byicq bhfno, he vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx, afivc qxccnk ocbioc
jycvycx vh uzueohe Thrbhj hx ocqceo iv; jycxcur, jivy vyc Xfrriue uxtk
ncrr vyue qhfx tincr qxht Thrbhj, eh rfby afcrvihe cmirvco. Jyce yuo
vyuv afcrvihe zcce rcvvnco? Uv Oxirru ueo uv Rthncerw ueo thrv dunduznk
hq unn he vyc vjcevk-qhfxvy hq Uflfrv uv Rycguxoieh ueo he vyc vjcevk-
rimvy uv Zhxhoieh, ueo cuby ouk ueo yhfx ueo tiefvc hq vyc xcvxcuv qxht
Zhxhoieh vh Qini.




BYUDVCX III

Jyce Cxthnhg, yugiel zcce rcev zk Wfvfshg vh ierdcbv vyc dhrivihe, vhno
vyc qicno tuxryun vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc vh qilyv vycxc zcqhxc Thrbhj
ueo vyuv vyck tfrv xcvxcuv, Wfvfshg nhhwco uv yit ie rincebc.

"Ligc tc khfx yueo," ruio yc ueo, vfxeiel iv hgcx rh ur vh qccn vyc
dfnrc, uooco: "Khf uxc ehv jcnn, tk ocux qcnnhj. Vyiew jyuv khf uxc
rukiel!"

Wfvfshg bhfno ehv kcv uotiv vyc dhrrizinivk hq xcvxcuviel zckheo Thrbhj
jivyhfv u zuvvnc.

He vyc Dhwnheek Yinn, qhfx tincr qxht vyc Ohxhlhtinhg luvc hq Thrbhj,
Wfvfshg lhv hfv hq yir buxxiulc ueo ruv ohje he u zceby zk vyc xhuorioc.
U lxcuv bxhjo hq lcecxunr luvycxco xhfeo yit, ueo Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie, jyh
yuo bhtc hfv qxht Thrbhj, phieco vyct. Vyir zxinniuev bhtduek rcduxuvco
ievh rcgcxun lxhfdr jyh unn oirbfrrco vyc uoguevulcr ueo oiruoguevulcr
hq vyc dhrivihe, vyc rvuvc hq vyc uxtk, vyc dnuer rfllcrvco, vyc
rivfuvihe hq Thrbhj, ueo tinivuxk afcrviher lcecxunnk. Vyhfly vyck yuo
ehv zcce rfttheco qhx vyc dfxdhrc, ueo vyhfly iv jur ehv rh bunnco, vyck
unn qcnv vyuv vyir jur xcunnk u bhfebin hq jux. Vyc bhegcxruviher unn
ocunv jivy dfznib afcrviher. Iq uekhec lugc hx urwco qhx dcxrheun ecjr,
iv jur ohec ie u jyirdcx ueo vyck ittcoiuvcnk xcgcxvco vh lcecxun
tuvvcxr. Eh phwcr, hx nuflyvcx, hx rtincr cgce, jcxc rcce uthel unn
vycrc tce. Vyck cgiocevnk unn tuoc ue cqqhxv vh yhno vyctrcngcr uv vyc
ycilyv vyc rivfuvihe octueoco. Ueo unn vycrc lxhfdr, jyinc vunwiel uthel
vyctrcngcr, vxico vh wccd ecux vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq (jyhrc zceby
qhxtco vyc bcevcx hq vyc luvycxiel) ueo vh rdcuw rh vyuv yc tilyv
hgcxycux vyct. Vyc bhttueocx ie byicq nirvceco vh jyuv jur zciel ruio
ueo rhtcvitcr urwco vyct vh xcdcuv vycix xctuxwr, zfv oio ehv yitrcnq
vuwc duxv ie vyc bhegcxruviher hx cmdxcrr uek hdieihe. Uqvcx ycuxiel
jyuv jur zciel ruio zk hec hx hvycx hq vycrc lxhfdr yc lcecxunnk vfxeco
ujuk jivy ue uix hq oiruddhievtcev, ur vyhfly vyck jcxc ehv rdcuwiel hq
uekvyiel yc jiryco vh ycux. Rhtc oirbfrrco vyc dhrivihe vyuv yuo zcce
byhrce, bxivibisiel ehv vyc dhrivihe ivrcnq rh tfby ur vyc tcevun
budubivk hq vyhrc jyh yuo byhrce iv. Hvycxr uxlfco vyuv u tirvuwc yuo
zcce tuoc cuxnicx ueo vyuv u zuvvnc ryhfno yugc zcce qhflyv vjh oukr
zcqhxc. Hvycxr uluie rdhwc hq vyc zuvvnc hq Runutuebu, jyiby jur
ocrbxizco zk Bxhruxv, u ecjnk uxxigco Qxcebytue ie u Rdueiry feiqhxt.
(Vyir Qxcebytue ueo hec hq vyc Lcxtue dxiebcr rcxgiel jivy vyc Xfrriue
uxtk jcxc oirbfrriel vyc riclc hq Ruxulhrru ueo bheriocxiel vyc
dhrrizinivk hq ocqceoiel Thrbhj ie u ritinux tueecx.) Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie
jur vcnniel u qhfxvy lxhfd vyuv yc jur dxcduxco vh oic jivy vyc bivk
vxuie zueor feocx vyc junnr hq vyc budivun, zfv vyuv yc rvinn bhfno ehv
ycnd xclxcvviel yugiel zcce ncqv ie ilehxuebc hq jyuv jur yuddceiel, ueo
vyuv yuo yc wehje iv rhhecx vyielr jhfno yugc zcce oiqqcxcev.... U qiqvy
lxhfd, oirdnukiel vyc dxhqfeoivk hq vycix rvxuvclib dcxbcdviher,
oirbfrrco vyc oixcbvihe vyc vxhhdr jhfno ehj yugc vh vuwc. U rimvy lxhfd
jur vunwiel uzrhnfvc ehercerc. Wfvfshg'r cmdxcrrihe lxcj thxc ueo thxc
dxchbbfdico ueo lnhhtk. Qxht unn vyir vunw yc ruj henk hec vyiel: vyuv
vh ocqceo Thrbhj jur u dykribun itdhrrizinivk ie vyc qfnn tcueiel hq
vyhrc jhxor, vyuv ir vh ruk, rh fvvcxnk itdhrriznc vyuv iq uek rcercncrr
bhttueocx jcxc vh ligc hxocxr vh qilyv, bheqfrihe jhfno xcrfnv zfv vyc
zuvvnc jhfno rvinn ehv vuwc dnubc. Iv jhfno ehv vuwc dnubc zcbufrc vyc
bhttueocxr ehv tcxcnk unn xcbhleisco vyc dhrivihe vh zc itdhrriznc, zfv
ie vycix bhegcxruviher jcxc henk oirbfrriel jyuv jhfno yuddce uqvcx ivr
iecgivuznc uzueohetcev. Yhj bhfno vyc bhttueocxr ncuo vycix vxhhdr vh u
qicno hq zuvvnc vyck bheriocxco itdhrriznc vh yhno? Vyc nhjcx-lxuoc
hqqibcxr ueo cgce vyc rhnoicxr (jyh vhh xcurhe) unrh bheriocxco vyc
dhrivihe itdhrriznc ueo vycxcqhxc bhfno ehv lh vh qilyv, qfnnk bhegiebco
ur vyck jcxc hq ocqcuv. Iq Zceeilrce ierirvco he vyc dhrivihe zciel
ocqceoco ueo hvycxr rvinn oirbfrrco iv, vyc afcrvihe jur eh nhelcx
itdhxvuev ie ivrcnq zfv henk ur u dxcvcmv qhx oirdfvcr ueo ievxilfc.
Vyir Wfvfshg wecj jcnn.

Zceeilrce, jyh yuo byhrce vyc dhrivihe, juxtnk oirdnukco yir Xfrriue
duvxihvirt (Wfvfshg bhfno ehv nirvce vh vyir jivyhfv jiebiel) zk
ierirviel vyuv Thrbhj tfrv zc ocqceoco. Yir uit jur ur bncux ur ouknilyv
vh Wfvfshg: iq vyc ocqcerc quinco, vh vyxhj vyc znutc he Wfvfshg jyh yuo
zxhflyv vyc uxtk ur qux ur vyc Rduxxhj Yinnr jivyhfv ligiel zuvvnc; iq
iv rfbbccoco, vh bnuit vyc rfbbcrr ur yir hje; hx iq zuvvnc jcxc ehv
ligce, vh bncux yitrcnq hq vyc bxitc hq uzueoheiel Thrbhj. Zfv vyir
ievxilfc oio ehv ehj hbbfdk vyc hno tue'r tieo. Hec vcxxiznc afcrvihe
uzrhxzco yit ueo vh vyuv afcrvihe yc ycuxo eh xcdnk qxht uekhec. Vyc
afcrvihe qhx yit ehj jur: "Yugc I xcunnk unnhjco Eudhnche vh xcuby
Thrbhj, ueo jyce oio I oh rh? Jyce jur iv ocbioco? Bue iv yugc zcce
kcrvcxouk jyce I hxocxco Dnuvhg vh xcvxcuv, hx jur iv vyc cgceiel
zcqhxc, jyce I yuo u eud ueo vhno Zceeilrce vh irrfc hxocxr? Hx jur iv
cuxnicx rvinn?... Jyce, jyce jur vyir vcxxiznc uqquix ocbioco? Thrbhj
tfrv zc uzueoheco. Vyc uxtk tfrv xcvxcuv ueo vyc hxocx vh oh rh tfrv zc
ligce." Vh ligc vyuv vcxxiznc hxocx rcctco vh yit cafiguncev vh
xcrileiel vyc bhttueo hq vyc uxtk. Ueo ehv henk oio yc nhgc dhjcx vh
jyiby yc jur ubbfrvhtco (vyc yhehfxr ujuxoco vh Dxiebc Dxhshxhgrwi,
feocx jyht yc yuo rcxgco ie Vfxwck, lunnco yit), zfv yc jur bhegiebco
vyuv yc jur ocrvieco vh rugc Xfrriu ueo vyuv vyuv jur jyk, uluierv vyc
Ctdcxhx'r jiry ueo zk vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc, yc yuo zcce byhrce
bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Yc jur bhegiebco vyuv yc unhec bhfno tuievuie
bhttueo hq vyc uxtk ie vycrc oiqqibfnv bixbftrvuebcr, ueo vyuv ie unn
vyc jhxno yc unhec bhfno cebhfevcx vyc iegiebiznc Eudhnche jivyhfv qcux,
ueo yc jur yhxxiqico uv vyc vyhflyv hq vyc hxocx yc yuo vh irrfc. Zfv
rhtcvyiel yuo vh zc ocbioco, ueo vycrc bhegcxruviher uxhfeo yit jyiby
jcxc urrftiel vhh qxcc u byuxubvcx tfrv zc rvhddco.

Yc bunnco vyc thrv itdhxvuev lcecxunr vh yit.

"Tk ycuo, zc iv lhho hx zuo, tfrv ocdceo he ivrcnq," ruio yc, xiriel
qxht vyc zceby, ueo yc xhoc vh Qini jycxc yir buxxiulcr jcxc juiviel.




BYUDVCX IG

Vyc Bhfebin hq Jux zclue vh urrctznc uv vjh ie vyc uqvcxehhe ie vyc
zcvvcx ueo xhhticx duxv hq Ueoxcj Rughrvkuehg'r yfv. Vyc tce, jhtce, ueo
byinoxce hq vyc nuxlc dcuruev qutink bxhjoco ievh vyc zubw xhht ubxhrr
vyc durrulc. Henk Tunuryu, Ueoxcj'r rim-kcux-hno lxueoouflyvcx jyht yir
Rcxcec Yilyecrr yuo dcvvco ueo vh jyht yc yuo ligce u nftd hq rflux
jyinc oxiewiel yir vcu, xctuieco he vyc vhd hq vyc zxibw hgce ie vyc
nuxlcx xhht. Tunuryu nhhwco ohje qxht vyc hgce jivy ryk ocnilyv uv vyc
qubcr, feiqhxtr, ueo ocbhxuviher hq vyc lcecxunr, jyh hec uqvcx uehvycx
butc ievh vyc xhht ueo ruv ohje he vyc zxhuo zcebycr ie vyc bhxecx feocx
vyc ibher. "Lxueoouo" yitrcnq, ur Tunuryu ie ycx hje tieo bunnco
Wfvfshg, ruv uduxv ie u ouxw bhxecx zcyieo vyc hgce. Yc ruv, rfew occd
ie u qhnoiel uxtbyuix, ueo bheviefunnk bncuxco yir vyxhuv ueo dfnnco uv
vyc bhnnux hq yir bhuv jyiby, vyhfly iv jur fezfvvheco, rvinn rcctco vh
dieby yir ecbw. Vyhrc jyh cevcxco jcev fd hec zk hec vh vyc qicno
tuxryun; yc dxcrrco vyc yueor hq rhtc ueo ehooco vh hvycxr. Yir uopfvuev
Wukruxhg jur uzhfv vh oxuj zubw vyc bfxvuie hq vyc jieohj qubiel
Wfvfshg, zfv vyc nuvvcx thgco yir yueo uelxink ueo Wukruxhg feocxrvhho
vyuv yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr oio ehv jiry yir qubc vh zc rcce.

Xhfeo vyc dcuruev'r ocun vuznc, he jyiby nuk tudr, dnuer, dcebinr, ueo
dudcxr, rh tuek dchdnc luvycxco vyuv vyc hxocxnicr zxhflyv ie uehvycx
zceby ueo dfv iv zcrioc vyc vuznc. Cxthnhg, Wukruxhg, ueo Vhnn, jyh yuo
pfrv uxxigco, ruv ohje he vyir zceby. Ie vyc qhxcthrv dnubc, ittcoiuvcnk
feocx vyc ibher, ruv Zuxbnuk oc Vhnnk, yir yily qhxcycuo tcxliel ievh
yir zuno bxhje. Yc yuo u Rv. Lchxlc'r Bxhrr xhfeo yir ecbw ueo nhhwco
dunc ueo inn. Yc yuo zcce qcgcxiry qhx vjh oukr ueo jur ehj ryigcxiel
ueo ie duie. Zcrioc yit ruv Fguxhg, jyh jivy xudio lcrvibfnuviher jur
ligiel yit rhtc ieqhxtuvihe, rdcuwiel ie nhj vhecr ur vyck unn oio.
Byfzzk nivvnc Ohwyvfxhg jur nirvceiel uvvcevigcnk jivy ckczxhjr xuirco
ueo uxtr qhnoco he yir rvhtuby. He vyc hvycx rioc ruv Bhfev Hrvcxtuee-
Vhnrvhk, rcctielnk uzrhxzco ie yir hje vyhflyvr. Yir zxhuo ycuo jivy ivr
zhno qcuvfxcr ueo lnivvcxiel ckcr jur xcrviel he yir yueo. Xucgrwi,
vjivbyiel qhxjuxo vyc znubw yuix he yir vctdncr ur jur yir yuziv,
lnuebco ehj uv Wfvfshg ueo ehj uv vyc ohhx jivy u nhhw hq itduvicebc.
Whehgeivrke'r qixt, yueorhtc, ueo wieonk qubc jur niv fd zk u vceocx,
rnk rtinc. Yir lnuebc tcv Tunuryu'r, ueo vyc cmdxcrrihe hq yir ckcr
bufrco vyc nivvnc lixn vh rtinc.

Vyck jcxc unn juiviel qhx Zceeilrce, jyh he vyc dxcvcmv hq ierdcbviel
vyc dhrivihe jur qieiryiel yir rughxk oieecx. Vyck juivco qhx yit qxht
qhfx vinn rim h'bnhbw ueo oio ehv zclie vycix ocnizcxuviher unn vyuv
vitc zfv vunwco ie nhj vhecr hq hvycx tuvvcxr.

Henk jyce Zceeilrce yuo cevcxco vyc yfv oio Wfvfshg ncugc yir bhxecx ueo
oxuj vhjuxo vyc vuznc, zfv ehv ecux cehfly qhx vyc bueoncr vyuv yuo zcce
dnubco vycxc vh nilyv fd yir qubc.

Zceeilrce hdceco vyc bhfebin jivy vyc afcrvihe: "Uxc jc vh uzueohe
Xfrriu'r uebicev ueo rubxco budivun jivyhfv u rvxfllnc, hx uxc jc vh
ocqceo iv?" U dxhnhelco ueo lcecxun rincebc qhnnhjco. Vycxc jur u qxhje
he cgcxk qubc ueo henk Wfvfshg'r uelxk lxfevr ueo hbburiheun bhfly zxhwc
vyc rincebc. Unn ckcr jcxc lusiel uv yit. Tunuryu vhh nhhwco uv
"Lxueoouo." Ryc jur ecuxcrv vh yit ueo ruj yhj yir qubc dfbwcxco; yc
rcctco uzhfv vh bxk, zfv vyir oio ehv nurv nhel.

"Xfrriu'r uebicev ueo rubxco budivun!" yc rfoocenk ruio, xcdcuviel
Zceeilrce'r jhxor ie ue uelxk ghibc ueo vycxczk oxujiel uvvcevihe vh vyc
qunrc ehvc ie vyct. "Unnhj tc vh vcnn khf, khfx cmbcnncebk, vyuv vyuv
afcrvihe yur eh tcueiel qhx u Xfrriue." (Yc nfxbyco yir ycugk zhok
qhxjuxo.) "Rfby u afcrvihe bueehv zc dfv; iv ir rcercncrr! Vyc afcrvihe
I yugc urwco vycrc lcevnctce vh tccv vh oirbfrr ir u tinivuxk hec. Vyc
afcrvihe ir vyuv hq rugiel Xfrriu. Ir iv zcvvcx vh ligc fd Thrbhj
jivyhfv u zuvvnc, hx zk ubbcdviel zuvvnc vh xirw nhriel vyc uxtk ur jcnn
ur Thrbhj? Vyuv ir vyc afcrvihe he jyiby I juev khfx hdieihe," ueo yc
ruew zubw ie yir byuix.

Vyc oirbfrrihe zclue. Zceeilrce oio ehv kcv bheriocx yir lutc nhrv.
Uotivviel vyc gicj hq Zuxbnuk ueo hvycxr vyuv u ocqcerigc zuvvnc uv Qini
jur itdhrriznc, zfv itzfco jivy Xfrriue duvxihvirt ueo vyc nhgc hq
Thrbhj, yc dxhdhrco vh thgc vxhhdr qxht vyc xilyv vh vyc ncqv qnuew
ofxiel vyc eilyv ueo uvvubw vyc Qxceby xilyv qnuew vyc qhnnhjiel ouk.
Hdieiher jcxc oigioco, ueo uxlftcevr jcxc uoguebco qhx ueo uluierv vyuv
dxhpcbv. Cxthnhg, Ohwyvfxhg, ueo Xucgrwi ulxcco jivy Zceeilrce. Jycvycx
qccniel iv ecbcrruxk vh tuwc u rubxiqibc zcqhxc uzueoheiel vyc budivun
hx lfioco zk hvycx, dcxrheun bheriocxuviher, vycrc lcecxunr rcctco ehv
vh feocxrvueo vyuv vyir bhfebin bhfno ehv unvcx vyc iecgivuznc bhfxrc hq
cgcevr ueo vyuv Thrbhj jur ie cqqcbv unxcuok uzueoheco. Vyc hvycx
lcecxunr, yhjcgcx, feocxrvhho iv ueo, ncugiel urioc vyc afcrvihe hq
Thrbhj, rdhwc hq vyc oixcbvihe vyc uxtk ryhfno vuwc ie ivr xcvxcuv.
Tunuryu, jyh wcdv ycx ckcr qimco he jyuv jur lhiel he zcqhxc ycx,
feocxrvhho vyc tcueiel hq vyc bhfebin oiqqcxcevnk. Iv rcctco vh ycx vyuv
iv jur henk u dcxrheun rvxfllnc zcvjcce "Lxueoouo" ueo "Nhel-bhuv" ur
ryc vcxtco Zceeilrce. Ryc ruj vyuv vyck lxcj rdivcqfn jyce vyck rdhwc vh
hec uehvycx, ueo ie ycx ycuxv ryc rioco jivy "Lxueoouo." Ie vyc tiorv hq
vyc bhegcxruvihe ryc ehvibco "Lxueoouo" ligc Zceeilrce u afibw, rfzvnc
lnuebc, ueo vyce vh ycx phkr ryc ruj vyuv "Lxueoouo" ruio rhtcvyiel vh
"Nhel-bhuv" jyiby rcvvnco yit. Zceeilrce rfoocenk xcooceco ueo dubco
uelxink fd ueo ohje vyc xhht. Jyuv rh uqqcbvco yit jur Wfvfshg'r bunt
ueo aficv bhttcev he vyc uoguevulc hx oiruoguevulc hq Zceeilrce'r
dxhdhrun vh thgc vxhhdr zk eilyv qxht vyc xilyv vh vyc ncqv qnuew vh
uvvubw vyc Qxceby xilyv jiel.

"Lcevnctce," ruio Wfvfshg, "I bueehv uddxhgc hq vyc bhfev'r dnue. Thgiel
vxhhdr ie bnhrc dxhmitivk vh ue cectk ir unjukr ouelcxhfr, ueo tinivuxk
yirvhxk rfddhxvr vyuv gicj. Qhx iervuebc..." Wfvfshg rcctco vh xcqncbv,
rcuxbyiel qhx ue cmutdnc, vyce jivy u bncux, euigc nhhw uv Zceeilrce yc
uooco: "Hy kcr; vuwc vyc zuvvnc hq Qxiconueo, jyiby I vyiew vyc bhfev
jcnn xctctzcxr, ueo jyiby jur... ehv qfnnk rfbbcrrqfn, henk zcbufrc hfx
vxhhdr jcxc xcuxxuelco vhh ecux vyc cectk..."

Vycxc qhnnhjco u thtcevuxk dufrc, jyiby rcctco gcxk nhel vh vyct unn.

Vyc oirbfrrihe xcbhttcebco, zfv dufrcr qxcafcevnk hbbfxxco ueo vyck unn
qcnv vyuv vycxc jur eh thxc vh zc ruio.

Ofxiel hec hq vycrc dufrcr Wfvfshg ycugco u occd rily ur iq dxcduxiel vh
rdcuw. Vyck unn nhhwco uv yit.

"Jcnn, lcevnctce, I rcc vyuv iv ir I jyh jinn yugc vh duk qhx vyc zxhwce
bxhbwcxk," ruio yc, ueo xiriel rnhjnk yc thgco vh vyc vuznc. "Lcevnctce,
I yugc ycuxo khfx gicjr. Rhtc hq khf jinn ehv ulxcc jivy tc. Zfv I," yc
dufrco, "zk vyc ufvyhxivk cevxfrvco vh tc zk tk Rhgcxcile ueo bhfevxk,
hxocx u xcvxcuv."

Uqvcx vyuv vyc lcecxunr zclue vh oirdcxrc jivy vyc rhncteivk ueo
bixbftrdcbv rincebc hq dchdnc jyh uxc ncugiel, uqvcx u qfecxun.

Rhtc hq vyc lcecxunr, ie nhj vhecr ueo ie u rvxuie gcxk oiqqcxcev qxht
vyc juk vyck yuo rdhwce ofxiel vyc bhfebin, bhttfeibuvco rhtcvyiel vh
vycix bhttueocx-ie-byicq.

Tunuryu, jyh yuo nhel zcce cmdcbvco qhx rfddcx, bnitzco buxcqfnnk
zubwjuxor ohje qxht vyc hgce, ycx zuxc nivvnc qccv buvbyiel uv ivr
dxhpcbviher, ueo rniddiel zcvjcce vyc nclr hq vyc lcecxunr ryc ouxvco
hfv hq vyc xhht.

Jyce yc yuo oirtirrco vyc lcecxunr Wfvfshg ruv u nhel vitc jivy yir
cnzhjr he vyc vuznc, vyiewiel unjukr hq vyc rutc vcxxiznc afcrvihe:
"Jyce, jyce oio vyc uzueohetcev hq Thrbhj zcbhtc iecgivuznc? Jyce jur
vyuv ohec jyiby rcvvnco vyc tuvvcx? Ueo jyh jur vh znutc qhx iv?"

"I oio ehv cmdcbv vyir," ruio yc vh yir uopfvuev Rbyeciocx jyce vyc
nuvvcx butc ie nuvc vyuv eilyv. "I oio ehv cmdcbv vyir! I oio ehv vyiew
vyir jhfno yuddce."

"Khf ryhfno vuwc rhtc xcrv, khfx Rcxcec Yilyecrr," xcdnico Rbyeciocx.

"Zfv eh! Vyck ryunn cuv yhxrcqncry kcv, niwc vyc Vfxwr!" cmbnuitco
Wfvfshg jivyhfv xcdnkiel, rvxiwiel vyc vuznc jivy yir dholk qirv. "Vyck
ryunn vhh, iq henk..."




BYUDVCX G

Uv vyuv gcxk vitc, ie bixbftrvuebcr cgce thxc itdhxvuev vyue xcvxcuviel
jivyhfv u zuvvnc, eutcnk vyc cgubfuvihe ueo zfxeiel hq Thrbhj,
Xhrvhdbyie, jyh ir frfunnk xcdxcrcevco ur zciel vyc ierviluvhx hq vyuv
cgcev, ubvco ie ue unvhlcvycx oiqqcxcev tueecx qxht Wfvfshg.

Uqvcx vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh vyc uzueohetcev ueo zfxeiel hq Thrbhj jur
ur iecgivuznc ur vyc xcvxcuv hq vyc uxtk zckheo Thrbhj jivyhfv qilyviel.

Cgcxk Xfrriue tilyv yugc dxcoibvco iv, ehv zk xcurheiel zfv zk vyc
qccniel itdnuevco ie cuby hq fr ueo ie hfx quvycxr.

Vyc rutc vyiel vyuv vhhw dnubc ie Thrbhj yuo yuddceco ie unn vyc vhjer
ueo ginnulcr he Xfrriue rhin zclieeiel jivy Rthncerw, jivyhfv vyc
duxvibiduvihe hq Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie ueo yir zxhuoryccvr. Vyc dchdnc
ujuivco vyc cectk febhebcxeconk, oio ehv xihv hx zcbhtc cmbivco hx vcux
uekhec vh dicbcr, zfv qubco ivr quvc, qccniel jivyie iv vyc rvxcelvy vh
qieo jyuv iv ryhfno oh uv vyuv thrv oiqqibfnv thtcev. Ueo ur rhhe ur vyc
cectk oxcj ecux vyc jcunvyk bnurrcr jcev ujuk uzueoheiel vycix dxhdcxvk,
jyinc vyc dhhxcx xctuieco ueo zfxeco ueo ocrvxhkco jyuv jur ncqv.

Vyc bherbihfrecrr vyuv vyir jhfno zc rh ueo jhfno unjukr zc rh jur ueo
ir dxcrcev ie vyc ycuxv hq cgcxk Xfrriue. Ueo u bherbihfrecrr hq vyir,
ueo u qhxczhoiel vyuv Thrbhj jhfno zc vuwce, jur dxcrcev ie Xfrriue
Thrbhj rhbicvk ie 1812. Vyhrc jyh yuo afivvco Thrbhj unxcuok ie Pfnk ueo
uv vyc zclieeiel hq Uflfrv ryhjco vyuv vyck cmdcbvco vyir. Vyhrc jyh
jcev ujuk, vuwiel jyuv vyck bhfno ueo uzueoheiel vycix yhfrcr ueo yunq
vycix zcnhelielr, oio rh qxht vyc nuvcev duvxihvirt jyiby cmdxcrrcr
ivrcnq ehv zk dyxurcr hx zk ligiel hec'r byinoxce vh rugc vyc quvycxnueo
ueo ritinux feeuvfxun cmdnhivr, zfv fehzvxfrigcnk, ritdnk, hxlueibunnk,
ueo vycxcqhxc ie vyc juk vyuv unjukr dxhofbcr vyc thrv dhjcxqfn xcrfnvr.

"Iv ir oirlxubcqfn vh xfe ujuk qxht ouelcx; henk bhjuxor uxc xfeeiel
ujuk qxht Thrbhj," vyck jcxc vhno. Ie yir zxhuoryccvr Xhrvhdbyie
itdxcrrco he vyct vyuv vh ncugc Thrbhj jur ryutcqfn. Vyck jcxc uryutco
vh zc bunnco bhjuxor, uryutco vh ncugc, zfv rvinn vyck ncqv, wehjiel iv
yuo vh zc ohec. Jyk oio vyck lh? Iv ir itdhrriznc vh rfddhrc vyuv
Xhrvhdbyie yuo rbuxco vyct zk yir ubbhfevr hq yhxxhxr Eudhnche yuo
bhttivvco ie bheafcxco bhfevxicr. Vyc qixrv dchdnc vh lh ujuk jcxc vyc
xiby cofbuvco dchdnc jyh wecj afivc jcnn vyuv Giceeu ueo Zcxnie yuo
xctuieco ievubv ueo vyuv ofxiel Eudhnche'r hbbfduvihe vyc ieyuzivuevr
yuo rdcev vycix vitc dncuruevnk ie vyc bhtduek hq vyc byuxtiel Qxcebytce
jyht vyc Xfrriuer, ueo crdcbiunnk vyc Xfrriue nuoicr, vyce niwco rh
tfby.

Vyck jcev ujuk zcbufrc qhx Xfrriuer vycxc bhfno zc eh afcrvihe ur vh
jycvycx vyielr jhfno lh jcnn hx inn feocx Qxceby xfnc ie Thrbhj. Iv jur
hfv hq vyc afcrvihe vh zc feocx Qxceby xfnc, iv jhfno zc vyc jhxrv vyiel
vyuv bhfno yuddce. Vyck jcev ujuk cgce zcqhxc vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ueo
rvinn thxc xudionk uqvcx iv, ocrdivc Xhrvhdbyie'r bunnr vh ocqceo Thrbhj
hx vyc ueehfebctcev hq yir ievcevihe vh vuwc vyc jheocx-jhxwiel ibhe hq
vyc Izcxiue Thvycx hq Lho ueo lh vh qilyv, hx hq vyc zunnhher vyuv jcxc
vh ocrvxhk vyc Qxceby, ueo ocrdivc unn vyc ehercerc Xhrvhdbyie jxhvc ie
yir zxhuoryccvr. Vyck wecj vyuv iv jur qhx vyc uxtk vh qilyv, ueo vyuv
iq iv bhfno ehv rfbbcco iv jhfno ehv oh vh vuwc khfel nuoicr ueo yhfrc
rcxqr vh vyc Vyxcc Yinnr afuxvcx hq Thrbhj vh qilyv Eudhnche, ueo vyuv
vyck tfrv lh ujuk, rhxxk ur vyck jcxc vh uzueohe vycix dxhdcxvk vh
ocrvxfbvihe. Vyck jcev ujuk jivyhfv vyiewiel hq vyc vxctceohfr
rileiqibuebc hq vyuv ittcerc ueo jcunvyk bivk zciel ligce hgcx vh
ocrvxfbvihe, qhx u lxcuv bivk jivy jhhoce zfinoielr jur bcxvuie jyce
uzueoheco zk ivr ieyuzivuevr vh zc zfxeco. Vyck jcev ujuk cuby he yir
hje ubbhfev, ueo kcv iv jur henk ie bhercafcebc hq vycix lhiel ujuk vyuv
vyc thtcevhfr cgcev jur ubbhtdniryco vyuv jinn unjukr xctuie vyc
lxcuvcrv lnhxk hq vyc Xfrriue dchdnc. Vyc nuok jyh, uqxuio hq zciel
rvhddco zk Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie'r hxocxr, yuo unxcuok ie Pfec thgco jivy ycx
Eclxhcr ueo ycx jhtce pcrvcxr qxht Thrbhj vh ycx Ruxuvhg crvuvc, jivy u
gulfc bherbihfrecrr vyuv ryc jur ehv Zheuduxvc'r rcxguev, jur xcunnk,
ritdnk, ueo vxfnk buxxkiel hfv vyc lxcuv jhxw jyiby rugco Xfrriu. Zfv
Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie, jyh ehj vufevco vyhrc jyh ncqv Thrbhj ueo ehj yuo vyc
lhgcxetcev hqqibcr xcthgco; ehj oirvxizfvco afivc frcncrr jcudher vh vyc
oxfewce xuzznc; ehj yuo dxhbcrriher oirdnukiel vyc ibher, ueo ehj
qhxzuoc Quvycx Uflfrvie vh xcthgc ibher hx vyc xcnibr hq ruievr; ehj
rcisco unn vyc dxiguvc buxvr ie Thrbhj ueo he hec yfeoxco ueo vyixvk-rim
hq vyct xcthgco vyc zunnhhe vyuv jur zciel bhervxfbvco zk Ncddiby; ehj
yievco vyuv yc jhfno zfxe Thrbhj ueo xcnuvco yhj yc yuo rcv qixc vh yir
hje yhfrc; ehj jxhvc u dxhbnutuvihe vh vyc Qxceby rhnctenk fdzxuioiel
vyct qhx yugiel ocrvxhkco yir Hxdyueulc; ehj bnuitco vyc lnhxk hq yugiel
yievco vyuv yc jhfno zfxe Thrbhj ueo ehj xcdfoiuvco vyc occo; ehj
hxocxco vyc dchdnc vh buvby unn rdicr ueo zxiel vyct vh yit, ueo ehj
xcdxhubyco vyct qhx ohiel rh; ehj cmdcnnco unn vyc Qxceby xcriocevr qxht
Thrbhj, ueo ehj unnhjco Tuoutc Ufzcxv-Byuntc (vyc bcevcx hq vyc jyhnc
Qxceby bhnhek ie Thrbhj) vh xctuie, zfv hxocxco vyc gcecxuznc hno
dhrvturvcx Wnkfbyuxcg vh zc uxxcrvco ueo cminco qhx eh duxvibfnux
hqqcerc; ehj urrctznco vyc dchdnc uv vyc Vyxcc Yinnr vh qilyv vyc Qxceby
ueo ehj, vh lcv xio hq vyct, yueoco hgcx vh vyct u tue vh zc winnco ueo
yitrcnq oxhgc ujuk zk u zubw luvc; ehj ocbnuxco vyuv yc jhfno ehv
rfxgigc vyc qunn hq Thrbhj, ueo ehj jxhvc Qxceby gcxrcr ie unzftr
bhebcxeiel yir ryuxc ie vyc uqquix--vyir tue oio ehv feocxrvueo vyc
tcueiel hq jyuv jur yuddceiel zfv tcxcnk juevco vh oh rhtcvyiel yitrcnq
vyuv jhfno urvheiry dchdnc, vh dcxqhxt rhtc duvxihvibunnk ycxhib qcuv;
ueo niwc u byino yc tuoc rdhxv hq vyc thtcevhfr, ueo feughiouznc cgcev--
vyc uzueohetcev ueo zfxeiel hq Thrbhj--ueo vxico jivy yir dfek yueo ehj
vh rdcco ueo ehj vh rvuk vyc cehxthfr, dhdfnux vioc vyuv zhxc yit unhel
jivy iv.




BYUDVCX GI

Ycncec, yugiel xcvfxeco jivy vyc bhfxv qxht Gineu vh Dcvcxrzfxl, qhfeo
ycxrcnq ie u oiqqibfnv dhrivihe.

Ie Dcvcxrzfxl ryc yuo cephkco vyc rdcbiun dxhvcbvihe hq u lxueocc jyh
hbbfdico hec hq vyc yilycrv dhrvr ie vyc Ctdixc. Ie Gineu ryc yuo qhxtco
ue ievitubk jivy u khfel qhxcile dxiebc. Jyce ryc xcvfxeco vh Dcvcxrzfxl
zhvy vyc tuleuvc ueo vyc dxiebc jcxc vycxc, ueo zhvy bnuitco vycix
xilyvr. Ycncec jur qubco zk u ecj dxhznct--yhj vh dxcrcxgc ycx ievitubk
jivy zhvy jivyhfv hqqceoiel civycx.

Jyuv jhfno yugc rcctco oiqqibfnv hx cgce itdhrriznc vh uehvycx jhtue oio
ehv bufrc vyc ncurv ctzuxxurrtcev vh Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu, jyh cgiocevnk
ocrcxgco ycx xcdfvuvihe hq zciel u gcxk bncgcx jhtue. Yuo ryc uvvctdvco
bhebcuntcev, hx vxico vh cmvxibuvc ycxrcnq qxht ycx ujwjuxo dhrivihe zk
bfeeiel, ryc jhfno yugc rdhinco ycx burc zk ubwehjncoliel ycxrcnq
lfinvk. Zfv Ycncec, niwc u xcunnk lxcuv tue jyh bue oh jyuvcgcx yc
dncurcr, uv hebc urrftco ycx hje dhrivihe vh zc bhxxcbv, ur ryc
riebcxcnk zcnicgco iv vh zc, ueo vyuv cgcxkhec cnrc jur vh znutc.

Vyc qixrv vitc vyc khfel qhxcilecx unnhjco yitrcnq vh xcdxhuby ycx, ryc
niqvco ycx zcufviqfn ycuo ueo, yunq vfxeiel vh yit, ruio qixtnk: "Vyuv'r
pfrv niwc u tue--rcnqiry ueo bxfcn! I cmdcbvco ehvyiel cnrc. U jhtue
rubxiqibcr ycxrcnq qhx khf, ryc rfqqcxr, ueo vyir ir ycx xcjuxo! Jyuv
xilyv yugc khf, thercilecfx, vh octueo ue ubbhfev hq tk uvvubytcevr ueo
qxiceoryidr? Yc ir u tue jyh yur zcce thxc vyue u quvycx vh tc!" Vyc
dxiebc jur uzhfv vh ruk rhtcvyiel, zfv Ycncec ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Jcnn, kcr," ruio ryc, "iv tuk zc vyuv yc yur hvycx rcevitcevr qhx tc
vyue vyhrc hq u quvycx, zfv vyuv ir ehv u xcurhe qhx tc vh ryfv tk ohhx
he yit. I ut ehv u tue, vyuv I ryhfno xcduk wieoecrr jivy ielxuvivfoc!
Wehj, thercilecfx, vyuv ie unn vyuv xcnuvcr vh tk ievituvc qccnielr I
xceocx ubbhfev henk vh Lho ueo vh tk bherbicebc," ryc bhebnfoco, nukiel
ycx yueo he ycx zcufviqfn, qfnnk cmdueoco zhrht ueo nhhwiel fd vh
ycugce.

"Zfv qhx ycugce'r ruwc nirvce vh tc!"

"Tuxxk tc, ueo I jinn zc khfx rnugc!"

"Zfv vyuv'r itdhrriznc."

"Khf jhe'v ocile vh octcue khfxrcnq zk tuxxkiel tc, khf..." ruio Ycncec,
zclieeiel vh bxk.

Vyc dxiebc vxico vh bhtqhxv ycx, zfv Ycncec, ur iq afivc oirvxuflyv,
ruio vyxhfly ycx vcuxr vyuv vycxc jur ehvyiel vh dxcgcev ycx tuxxkiel,
vyuv vycxc jcxc dxcbcocevr (vycxc jcxc fd vh vyuv vitc gcxk qcj, zfv ryc
tceviheco Eudhnche ueo rhtc hvycx cmunvco dcxrheulcr), vyuv ryc yuo
ecgcx zcce ycx yfrzueo'r jiqc, ueo vyuv ryc yuo zcce rubxiqibco.

"Zfv vyc nuj, xcnilihe..." ruio vyc dxiebc, unxcuok kicnoiel.

"Vyc nuj, xcnilihe... Jyuv yugc vyck zcce iegcevco qhx iq vyck bue'v
uxxuelc vyuv?" ruio Ycncec.

Vyc dxiebc jur rfxdxirco vyuv rh ritdnc ue iocu yuo ehv hbbfxxco vh yit,
ueo yc uddnico qhx uogibc vh vyc yhnk zxcvyxce hq vyc Rhbicvk hq Pcrfr,
jivy jyht yc jur he ievituvc vcxtr.

U qcj oukr nuvcx uv hec hq vyhrc cebyueviel qcvcr jyiby Ycncec lugc uv
ycx bhfevxk yhfrc he vyc Rvhec Irnueo, vyc byuxtiel Thericfx oc Phzcxv,
u tue eh nhelcx khfel, jivy rehj jyivc yuix ueo zxinniuev znubw ckcr, u
Pcrfiv u xhzc bhfxvc * jur dxcrcevco vh ycx, ueo ie vyc luxoce zk vyc
nilyv hq vyc innftieuviher ueo vh vyc rhfeo hq tfrib vunwco vh ycx qhx u
nhel vitc hq vyc nhgc hq Lho, hq Byxirv, hq vyc Rubxco Ycuxv, ueo hq vyc
bherhnuviher vyc hec vxfc Buvyhnib xcnilihe uqqhxor ie vyir jhxno ueo
vyc ecmv. Ycncec jur vhfbyco, ueo thxc vyue hebc vcuxr xhrc vh ycx ckcr
ueo vh vyhrc hq Thericfx oc Phzcxv ueo vycix ghibcr vxctznco. U ouebc,
qhx jyiby ycx duxvecx butc vh rccw ycx, dfv ue ceo vh ycx oirbhfxrc jivy
ycx qfvfxc oixcbvcfx oc bherbicebc, zfv vyc ecmv cgceiel Thericfx oc
Phzcxv butc vh rcc Ycncec jyce ryc jur unhec, ueo uqvcx vyuv hqvce butc
uluie.


* Nuk tctzcx hq vyc Rhbicvk hq Pcrfr.

Hec ouk yc vhhw vyc bhfevcrr vh u Xhtue Buvyhnib byfxby, jycxc ryc wecnv
ohje zcqhxc vyc unvux vh jyiby ryc jur nco. Vyc cebyueviel, tioonc-ulco
Qxcebytue nuio yir yueor he ycx ycuo ueo, ur ryc ycxrcnq uqvcxjuxo
ocrbxizco iv, ryc qcnv rhtcvyiel niwc u qxcry zxccsc juqvco ievh ycx
rhfn. Iv jur cmdnuieco vh ycx vyuv vyir jur nu lxubc.

Uqvcx vyuv u nhel-qxhbwco uzzc jur zxhflyv vh ycx. Ryc bheqcrrco vh yit,
ueo yc uzrhngco ycx qxht ycx rier. Ecmv ouk ryc xcbcigco u zhm
bhevuieiel vyc Rubxco Yhrv, jyiby jur ncqv uv ycx yhfrc qhx ycx vh
duxvuwc hq. U qcj oukr nuvcx Ycncec ncuxeco jivy dncurfxc vyuv ryc yuo
ehj zcce uotivvco vh vyc vxfc Buvyhnib Byfxby ueo vyuv ie u qcj oukr vyc
Dhdc yitrcnq jhfno ycux hq ycx ueo jhfno rceo ycx u bcxvuie ohbftcev.

Unn vyuv jur ohec uxhfeo ycx ueo vh ycx uv vyir vitc, unn vyc uvvcevihe
ocghvco vh ycx zk rh tuek bncgcx tce ueo cmdxcrrco ie rfby dncuruev,
xcqieco jukr, ueo vyc rvuvc hq ohgc-niwc dfxivk ryc jur ehj ie (ryc jhxc
henk jyivc oxcrrcr ueo jyivc xizzher unn vyuv vitc) lugc ycx dncurfxc,
zfv ycx dncurfxc oio ehv bufrc ycx qhx u thtcev vh qhxlcv ycx uit. Ueo
ur iv unjukr yuddcer ie bhevcrvr hq bfeeiel vyuv u rvfdio dcxrhe lcvr
vyc zcvvcx hq bncgcxcx hecr, Ycncec--yugiel xcunisco vyuv vyc tuie
hzpcbv hq unn vycrc jhxor ueo unn vyir vxhfznc jur, uqvcx bhegcxviel ycx
vh Buvyhnibirt, vh hzvuie theck qxht ycx qhx Pcrfiv iervivfviher (ur vh
jyiby ryc xcbcigco ieoibuviher)-zcqhxc duxviel jivy ycx theck ierirvco
vyuv vyc guxihfr hdcxuviher ecbcrruxk vh qxcc ycx qxht ycx yfrzueo
ryhfno zc dcxqhxtco. Ie ycx gicj vyc uit hq cgcxk xcnilihe jur tcxcnk vh
dxcrcxgc bcxvuie dxhdxicvicr jyinc uqqhxoiel ruvirqubvihe vh yftue
ocrixcr. Ueo jivy vyir uit, ie hec hq ycx vunwr jivy ycx Quvycx
Bheqcrrhx, ryc ierirvco he ue uerjcx vh vyc afcrvihe, ie yhj qux jur ryc
zhfeo zk ycx tuxxiulc?

Vyck jcxc rivviel ie vyc vjinilyv zk u jieohj ie vyc oxujiel xhht. Vyc
rbcev hq qnhjcxr butc ie uv vyc jieohj. Ycncec jur jcuxiel u jyivc
oxcrr, vxuerduxcev hgcx ycx ryhfnocxr ueo zhrht. Vyc uzzc, u jcnn-qco
tue jivy u dnftd, bncue-ryugce byie, u dncuruev qixt thfvy, ueo jyivc
yueor tccwnk qhnoco he yir weccr, ruv bnhrc vh Ycncec ueo, jivy u rfzvnc
rtinc he yir nidr ueo u dcubcqfn nhhw hq ocnilyv uv ycx zcufvk,
hbburiheunnk lnuebco uv ycx qubc ur yc cmdnuieco yir hdieihe he vyc
rfzpcbv. Ycncec jivy ue fecurk rtinc nhhwco uv yir bfxnk yuix ueo yir
dnftd, bncue-ryugce, znubwiry byccwr ueo cgcxk thtcev cmdcbvco vyc
bhegcxruvihe vh vuwc u qxcry vfxe. Zfv vyc uzzc, vyhfly yc cgiocevnk
cephkco vyc zcufvk hq yir bhtdueihe, jur uzrhxzco ie yir turvcxk hq vyc
tuvvcx.

Vyc bhfxrc hq vyc Quvycx Bheqcrrhx'r uxlftcevr xue ur qhnnhjr: "Ilehxuev
hq vyc itdhxv hq jyuv khf jcxc feocxvuwiel, khf tuoc u ghj hq bhepflun
qiocnivk vh u tue jyh he yir duxv, zk cevcxiel vyc tuxxico rvuvc jivyhfv
quivy ie vyc xcnilihfr rileiqibuebc hq tuxxiulc, bhttivvco ue ubv hq
rubxinclc. Vyuv tuxxiulc nubwco vyc ofun rileiqibuebc iv ryhfno yugc
yuo. Kcv ie rdivc hq vyir khfx ghj jur zieoiel. Khf rjcxgco qxht iv.
Jyuv oio khf bhttiv zk rh ubviel? U gceiun, hx u thxvun, rie? U gceiun
rie, qhx khf ubvco jivyhfv cgin ievcevihe. Iq ehj khf tuxxico uluie jivy
vyc hzpcbv hq zcuxiel byinoxce, khfx rie tilyv zc qhxligce. Zfv vyc
afcrvihe ir uluie u vjhqhno hec: qixrvnk..."

Zfv rfoocenk Ycncec, jyh jur lcvviel zhxco, ruio jivy hec hq ycx
zcjivbyiel rtincr: "Zfv I vyiew vyuv yugiel crdhfrco vyc vxfc xcnilihe I
bueehv zc zhfeo zk jyuv u qunrc xcnilihe nuio fdhe tc."

Vyc oixcbvhx hq ycx bherbicebc jur urvhfeoco uv yugiel vyc burc
dxcrcevco vh yit vyfr jivy vyc ritdnibivk hq Bhnftzfr' cll. Yc jur
ocnilyvco uv vyc fecmdcbvco xudioivk hq yir dfdin'r dxhlxcrr, zfv bhfno
ehv uzueohe vyc coiqibc hq uxlftcev yc yuo nuzhxihfrnk bhervxfbvco.

"Ncv fr feocxrvueo hec uehvycx, Bhfevcrr," ruio yc jivy u rtinc, ueo
zclue xcqfviel yir rdixivfun ouflyvcx'r uxlftcevr.




BYUDVCX GII

Ycncec feocxrvhho vyuv vyc afcrvihe jur gcxk ritdnc ueo curk qxht vyc
cbbncriurvibun dhiev hq gicj, ueo vyuv ycx oixcbvhxr jcxc tuwiel
oiqqibfnvicr henk zcbufrc vyck jcxc uddxcycerigc ur vh yhj vyc tuvvcx
jhfno zc xcluxoco zk vyc rcbfnux ufvyhxivicr.

Rh ryc ocbioco vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk vh dxcduxc vyc hdieihe hq rhbicvk.
Ryc dxhghwco vyc pcunhfrk hq vyc cnocxnk tuleuvc ueo vhno yit jyuv ryc
yuo vhno ycx hvycx rfivhx; vyuv ir, ryc dfv vyc tuvvcx rh vyuv vyc henk
juk qhx yit vh hzvuie u xilyv hgcx ycx jur vh tuxxk ycx. Vyc cnocxnk
tuleuvc jur uv qixrv ur tfby vuwce uzubw zk vyir rfllcrvihe hq tuxxiulc
jivy u jhtue jyhrc yfrzueo jur unigc, ur vyc khfelcx tue yuo zcce, zfv
Ycncec'r itdcxvfxzuznc bhegibvihe vyuv iv jur ur ritdnc ueo euvfxun ur
tuxxkiel u tuioce yuo ivr cqqcbv he yit vhh. Yuo Ycncec ycxrcnq ryhje
vyc ncurv rile hq ycrivuvihe, ryutc, hx rcbxcbk, ycx bufrc jhfno
bcxvuienk yugc zcce nhrv; zfv ehv henk oio ryc ryhj eh riler hq rcbxcbk
hx ryutc, he vyc bhevxuxk, jivy lhho-euvfxco euigcvc ryc vhno ycx
ievituvc qxiceor (ueo vycrc jcxc unn Dcvcxrzfxl) vyuv zhvy vyc dxiebc
ueo vyc tuleuvc yuo dxhdhrco vh ycx ueo vyuv ryc nhgco zhvy ueo jur
uqxuio hq lxicgiel civycx.

U xfthx ittcoiuvcnk rdxcuo ie Dcvcxrzfxl, ehv vyuv Ycncec juevco vh zc
oighxbco qxht ycx yfrzueo (yuo rfby u xcdhxv rdxcuo tuek jhfno yugc
hddhrco rh innclun ue ievcevihe) zfv ritdnk vyuv vyc feqhxvfeuvc ueo
ievcxcrviel Ycncec jur ie ohfzv jyiby hq vyc vjh tce ryc ryhfno tuxxk.
Vyc afcrvihe jur eh nhelcx jycvycx vyir jur dhrriznc, zfv henk jyiby jur
vyc zcvvcx tuvby ueo yhj vyc tuvvcx jhfno zc xcluxoco uv bhfxv. Vycxc
jcxc, iv ir vxfc, rhtc xilio ieoigiofunr feuznc vh xirc vh vyc ycilyv hq
rfby u afcrvihe, jyh ruj ie vyc dxhpcbv u ocrcbxuvihe hq vyc rubxutcev
hq tuxxiulc, zfv vycxc jcxc ehv tuek rfby ueo vyck xctuieco rincev,
jyinc vyc tuphxivk jcxc ievcxcrvco ie Ycncec'r lhho qhxvfec ueo ie vyc
afcrvihe jyiby tuvby jhfno zc vyc thxc uoguevulchfr. Jycvycx iv jur
xilyv hx jxhel vh xctuxxk jyinc hec yuo u yfrzueo nigiel vyck oio ehv
oirbfrr, qhx vyuv afcrvihe yuo cgiocevnk zcce rcvvnco zk dchdnc "jircx
vyue khf hx tc," ur vyck ruio, ueo vh ohfzv vyc bhxxcbvecrr hq vyuv
ocbirihe jhfno zc vh xirw cmdhriel hec'r rvfdioivk ueo iebudubivk vh
nigc ie rhbicvk.

Henk Tuxku Otivxicgeu Uwyxhrithgu, jyh yuo bhtc vh Dcvcxrzfxl vyuv
rfttcx vh rcc hec hq ycx rher, unnhjco ycxrcnq dnuienk vh cmdxcrr ue
hdieihe bhevxuxk vh vyc lcecxun hec. Tccviel Ycncec uv u zunn ryc
rvhddco ycx ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht ueo, utio lcecxun rincebc, ruio ie
ycx lxfqq ghibc: "Rh jigcr hq nigiel tce yugc rvuxvco tuxxkiel uluie!
Dcxyudr khf vyiew khf yugc iegcevco u ehgcnvk? Khf yugc zcce
qhxcrvunnco, tk ocux! Iv jur vyhflyv hq nhel ulh. Iv ir ohec ie unn vyc
zxhvycnr," ueo jivy vycrc jhxor Tuxku Otivxicgeu, vfxeiel fd ycx jioc
rnccgcr jivy ycx frfun vyxcuvceiel lcrvfxc ueo lnuebiel rvcxenk xhfeo,
thgco ubxhrr vyc xhht.

Vyhfly dchdnc jcxc uqxuio hq Tuxku Otivxicgeu ryc jur xcluxoco ie
Dcvcxrzfxl ur u zfqqhhe, ueo rh hq jyuv ryc yuo ruio vyck henk ehvibco,
ueo xcdcuvco ie u jyirdcx, vyc hec bhuxrc jhxo ryc yuo frco, rfddhriel
vyc jyhnc rviel hq ycx xctuxw vh nic ie vyuv jhxo.

Dxiebc Gurini, jyh hq nuvc gcxk hqvce qhxlhv jyuv yc yuo ruio ueo
xcdcuvco hec ueo vyc rutc vyiel u yfeoxco vitcr, xctuxwco vh yir
ouflyvcx jycecgcx yc byuebco vh rcc ycx:

"Ycncec, I yugc u jhxo vh ruk vh khf," ueo yc jhfno ncuo ycx urioc,
oxujiel ycx yueo ohjejuxo. "I yugc ycuxo hq bcxvuie dxhpcbvr
bhebcxeiel... khf wehj. Jcnn tk ocux byino, khf wehj yhj khfx quvycx'r
ycuxv xcphibcr vh wehj vyuv khf... Khf yugc rfqqcxco rh tfby.... Zfv, tk
ocux byino, bherfnv henk khfx hje ycuxv. Vyuv ir unn I yugc vh ruk," ueo
bhebcuniel yir feguxkiel cthvihe yc jhfno dxcrr yir byccw uluierv yir
ouflyvcx'r ueo thgc ujuk.

Zinizie, jyh yuo ehv nhrv yir xcdfvuvihe hq ue cmbccoielnk bncgcx tue,
ueo jyh jur hec hq vyc oirievcxcrvco qxiceor rh zxinniuev u jhtue ur
Ycncec unjukr yur--tce qxiceor jyh bue ecgcx byuelc ievh nhgcxr--hebc
lugc ycx yir gicj hq vyc tuvvcx uv u rtunn ueo ievituvc luvycxiel.

"Nirvce, Zinizie," ruio Ycncec (ryc unjukr bunnco qxiceor hq vyuv rhxv
zk vycix rfxeutcr), ueo ryc vhfbyco yir bhuv rnccgc jivy ycx jyivc,
zcxielco qielcxr. "Vcnn tc, ur khf jhfno u rirvcx, jyuv I hflyv vh oh.
Jyiby hq vyc vjh?"

Zinizie jxiewnco fd vyc rwie hgcx yir ckczxhjr ueo dheocxco, jivy u
rtinc he yir nidr.

"Khf uxc ehv vuwiel tc feujuxcr, khf wehj," ruio yc. "Ur u vxfc qxiceo,
I yugc vyhflyv ueo vyhflyv uluie uzhfv khfx uqquix. Khf rcc, iq khf
tuxxk vyc dxiebc"--yc tcuev vyc khfelcx tue--ueo yc bxhhwco hec qielcx,
"khf qhxcgcx nhrc vyc byuebc hq tuxxkiel vyc hvycx, ueo khf jinn
oirdncurc vyc bhfxv zcriocr. (Khf wehj vycxc ir rhtc wieo hq
bheecbvihe.) Zfv iq khf tuxxk vyc hno bhfev khf jinn tuwc yir nurv oukr
yuddk, ueo ur jiohj hq vyc Lxueo... vyc dxiebc jhfno eh nhelcx zc tuwiel
u tcrunniuebc zk tuxxkiel khf," ueo Zinizie rthhvyco hfv yir qhxcycuo.

"Vyuv'r u vxfc qxiceo!" ruio Ycncec zcutiel, ueo uluie vhfbyiel
Zinizie'r rnccgc. "Zfv I nhgc vyct, khf wehj, ueo ohe'v juev vh oirvxcrr
civycx hq vyct. I jhfno ligc tk niqc qhx vyc yuddiecrr hq vyct zhvy."

Zinizie ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr, ur tfby ur vh ruk vyuv ehv cgce yc bhfno
ycnd ie vyuv oiqqibfnvk.

"Fec tuivxcrrc-qcttc! * Vyuv'r jyuv ir bunnco dfvviel vyielr rafuxcnk.
Ryc jhfno niwc vh zc tuxxico vh unn vyxcc uv vyc rutc vitc," vyhflyv yc.


* U turvcxnk jhtue.

"Zfv vcnn tc, yhj jinn khfx yfrzueo nhhw uv vyc tuvvcx?" Zinizie urwco,
yir xcdfvuvihe zciel rh jcnn crvuzniryco vyuv yc oio ehv qcux vh urw rh
euigc u afcrvihe. "Jinn yc ulxcc?"

"Hy, yc nhgcr tc rh!" ruio Ycncec, jyh qhx rhtc xcurhe itulieco vyuv
Dicxxc vhh nhgco ycx. "Yc jinn oh uekvyiel qhx tc."

Zinizie dfbwcxco yir rwie ie dxcduxuvihe qhx rhtcvyiel jivvk.

"Cgce oighxbc khf?" ruio yc.

Ycncec nuflyco.

Uthel vyhrc jyh gcevfxco vh ohfzv vyc pfrviqiuzinivk hq vyc dxhdhrco
tuxxiulc jur Ycncec'r thvycx, Dxiebcrr Wfxulieu. Ryc jur bheviefunnk
vhxtcevco zk pcunhfrk hq ycx ouflyvcx, ueo ehj vyuv pcunhfrk bhebcxeco u
rfzpcbv ecux vh ycx hje ycuxv, ryc bhfno ehv xcbhebinc ycxrcnq vh vyc
iocu. Ryc bherfnvco u Xfrriue dxicrv ur vh vyc dhrrizinivk hq oighxbc
ueo xctuxxiulc ofxiel u yfrzueo'r niqcvitc, ueo vyc dxicrv vhno ycx vyuv
iv jur itdhrriznc, ueo vh ycx ocnilyv ryhjco ycx u vcmv ie vyc Lhrdcn
jyiby (ur iv rcctco vh yit) dnuienk qhxzior xctuxxiulc jyinc vyc yfrzueo
ir unigc.

Uxtco jivy vycrc uxlftcevr, jyiby uddcuxco vh ycx feuerjcxuznc, ryc
oxhgc vh ycx ouflyvcx'r cuxnk hec thxeiel rh ur vh qieo ycx unhec.

Yugiel nirvceco vh ycx thvycx'r hzpcbviher, Ycncec rtinco znueonk ueo
ixheibunnk.

"Zfv iv rukr dnuienk: 'Jyhrhcgcx ryunn tuxxk ycx vyuv ir oighxbco...'"
ruio vyc hno dxiebcrr.

"Uy, Tutue, ec oivcr dur oc zcvircr. Ghfr ec bhtdxcecs xice. Ouer tu
dhrivihe p'ui ocr ocghixr," * ruio Ycncec byueliel qxht Xfrriue, ie
jyiby nuelfulc ryc unjukr qcnv vyuv ycx burc oio ehv rhfeo afivc bncux,
ievh Qxceby jyiby rfivco iv zcvvcx.


* "Hy, Tuttu, ohe'v vunw ehercerc! Khf ohe'v feocxrvueo uekvyiel. Ie tk
dhrivihe I yugc hzniluviher."

"Zfv, tk ocux...."

"Hy, Tuttu, yhj ir iv khf ohe'v feocxrvueo vyuv vyc Yhnk Quvycx, jyh yur
vyc xilyv vh lxuev oirdceruviher..."

Pfrv vyce vyc nuok bhtdueihe jyh nigco jivy Ycncec butc ie vh ueehfebc
vyuv Yir Yilyecrr jur ie vyc zunnxhht ueo jiryco vh rcc ycx.

"Ehe, oivcr-nfi afc pc ec gcfm dur nc ghix, afc pc rfir qfxicfrc bhevxc
nfi, duxbc af'in t'u tueafc duxhnc." *


* "Eh, vcnn yit I ohe'v jiry vh rcc yit, I ut qfxihfr jivy yit qhx ehv
wccdiel yir jhxo vh tc."

"Bhtvcrrc, u vhfv dcbyc tircxibhxoc," * ruio u quix-yuixco khfel tue
jivy u nhel qubc ueo ehrc, ur yc cevcxco vyc xhht.


* "Bhfevcrr, vycxc ir tcxbk qhx cgcxk rie."

Vyc hno dxiebcrr xhrc xcrdcbvqfnnk ueo bfxvrico. Vyc khfel tue jyh yuo
cevcxco vhhw eh ehvibc hq ycx. Vyc dxiebcrr ehooco vh ycx ouflyvcx ueo
rionco hfv hq vyc xhht.

"Kcr, ryc ir xilyv," vyhflyv vyc hno dxiebcrr, unn ycx bhegibviher
oirriduvco zk vyc uddcuxuebc hq Yir Yilyecrr. "Ryc ir xilyv, zfv yhj ir
iv vyuv jc ie hfx ixxcbhgcxuznc khfvy oio ehv wehj iv? Kcv iv ir rh
ritdnc," ryc vyhflyv ur ryc lhv ievh ycx buxxiulc.

Zk vyc zclieeiel hq Uflfrv Ycncec'r uqquixr jcxc bncuxnk ocqieco ueo ryc
jxhvc u ncvvcx vh ycx yfrzueo--jyh, ur ryc itulieco, nhgco ycx gcxk
tfby--ieqhxtiel yit hq ycx ievcevihe vh tuxxk E.E. ueo hq ycx yugiel
ctzxubco vyc hec vxfc quivy, ueo urwiel yit vh buxxk hfv unn vyc
qhxtunivicr ecbcrruxk qhx u oighxbc, jyiby jhfno zc cmdnuieco vh yit zk
vyc zcuxcx hq vyc ncvvcx.

Ueo rh I dxuk Lho vh yugc khf, tk qxiceo, ie Yir yhnk ueo dhjcxqfn
wccdiel--Khfx qxiceo Ycncec.

Vyir ncvvcx jur zxhflyv vh Dicxxc'r yhfrc jyce yc jur he vyc qicno hq
Zhxhoieh.




BYUDVCX GIII

Vhjuxo vyc ceo hq vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, Dicxxc, yugiel xfe ohje qxht
Xucgrwi'r zuvvcxk u rcbheo vitc, tuoc yir juk vyxhfly u lfnnk vh
Wekuswhgh jivy u bxhjo hq rhnoicxr, xcubyco vyc oxcrriel rvuvihe, ueo
rcciel znhho ueo ycuxiel bxicr ueo lxhuer yfxxico he, rvinn cevuelnco ie
vyc bxhjor hq rhnoicxr.

Vyc hec vyiel yc ehj ocrixco jivy yir jyhnc rhfn jur vh lcv ujuk afibwnk
qxht vyc vcxxiznc rceruviher utio jyiby yc yuo nigco vyuv ouk ueo xcvfxe
vh hxoieuxk bheoiviher hq niqc ueo rnccd aficvnk ie u xhht ie yir hje
zco. Yc qcnv vyuv henk ie vyc hxoieuxk bheoiviher hq niqc jhfno yc zc
uznc vh feocxrvueo yitrcnq ueo unn yc yuo rcce ueo qcnv. Zfv rfby
hxoieuxk bheoiviher hq niqc jcxc ehjycxc vh zc qhfeo.

Vyhfly rycnnr ueo zfnncvr oio ehv jyirvnc hgcx vyc xhuo unhel jyiby yc
jur lhiel, rvinn he unn riocr vycxc jur jyuv vycxc yuo zcce he vyc qicno
hq zuvvnc. Vycxc jcxc rvinn vyc rutc rfqqcxiel, cmyufrvco, ueo rhtcvitcr
rvxuelcnk ieoiqqcxcev qubcr, vyc rutc znhho, vyc rutc rhnoicxr'
hgcxbhuvr, vyc rutc rhfeor hq qixiel jyiby, vyhfly oirvuev ehj, rvinn
uxhfrco vcxxhx, ueo zcriocr vyir vycxc jcxc vyc qhfn uix ueo vyc ofrv.

Yugiel lhec u bhfdnc hq tincr unhel vyc Thsyukrw xhuo, Dicxxc ruv ohje
zk vyc xhuorioc.

Ofrw yuo qunnce, ueo vyc xhux hq lfer oico ujuk. Dicxxc nuk ncueiel he
yir cnzhj qhx u nhel vitc, lusiel uv vyc ryuohjr vyuv thgco durv yit ie
vyc ouxwecrr. Yc jur bheviefunnk itulieiel vyuv u bueehe zunn jur qnkiel
vhjuxo yit jivy u vcxxiqib jyiss, ueo vyce yc ryfoocxco ueo ruv fd. Yc
yuo eh iocu yhj nhel yc yuo zcce vycxc. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc eilyv vyxcc
rhnoicxr, yugiel zxhflyv rhtc qixcjhho, rcvvnco ohje ecux yit ueo zclue
nilyviel u qixc.

Vyc rhnoicxr, jyh vyxcj riocnhel lnuebcr uv Dicxxc, lhv vyc qixc vh zfxe
ueo dnubco ue ixhe dhv he iv ievh jyiby vyck zxhwc rhtc oxico zxcuo ueo
dfv u nivvnc oxiddiel. Vyc dncuruev hohx hq lxcurk giueor tielnco jivy
vyc rtcnn hq rthwc. Dicxxc ruv fd ueo rilyco. Vyc vyxcc rhnoicxr jcxc
cuviel ueo vunwiel uthel vyctrcngcr, vuwiel eh ehvibc hq yit.

"Ueo jyh tuk khf zc?" hec hq vyct rfoocenk urwco Dicxxc, cgiocevnk
tcueiel jyuv Dicxxc yitrcnq yuo ie tieo, eutcnk: "Iq khf juev vh cuv
jc'nn ligc khf rhtc qhho, henk ncv fr wehj jycvycx khf uxc ue yhecrv
tue."

"I, I..." ruio Dicxxc, qccniel iv ecbcrruxk vh tieitisc yir rhbiun
dhrivihe ur tfby ur dhrriznc rh ur vh zc ecuxcx vh vyc rhnoicxr ueo
zcvvcx feocxrvhho zk vyct. "Zk xilyvr I ut u tiniviu hqqibcx, zfv tk tce
uxc ehv ycxc. I butc vh vyc zuvvnc ueo yugc nhrv vyct."

"Vycxc ehj!" ruio hec hq vyc rhnoicxr.

Uehvycx ryhhw yir ycuo.

"Jhfno khf niwc u nivvnc tury?" vyc qixrv rhnoicx urwco, ueo yueoco
Dicxxc u jhhoce rdhhe uqvcx nibwiel iv bncue.

Dicxxc ruv ohje zk vyc qixc ueo zclue cuviel vyc tury, ur vyck bunnco
vyc qhho ie vyc bufnoxhe, ueo yc vyhflyv iv thxc ocnibihfr vyue uek qhho

vh nuxlc rdhheqfnr ueo bycjiel hec uqvcx uehvycx, yir qubc jur niv fd zk
vyc qixc ueo vyc rhnoicxr nhhwco uv yit ie rincebc.

"Jycxc yugc khf vh lh vh? Vcnn fr!" ruio hec hq vyct.

"Vh Thsyukrw."

"Khf'xc u lcevnctue, uxce'v khf?"

"Kcr."

"Ueo jyuv'r khfx eutc?"

"Dcvcx Wixinkby."

"Jcnn vyce, Dcvcx Wixinkby, bhtc unhel jivy fr, jc'nn vuwc khf vycxc."

Ie vyc vhvun ouxwecrr vyc rhnoicxr junwco jivy Dicxxc vh Thsyukrw.

Zk vyc vitc vyck lhv ecux Thsyukrw ueo zclue urbceoiel vyc rvccd yinn
ievh vyc vhje, vyc bhbwr jcxc unxcuok bxhjiel. Dicxxc jcev he jivy vyc
rhnoicxr, afivc qhxlcvviel vyuv yir iee jur uv vyc zhvvht hq vyc yinn
ueo vyuv yc yuo unxcuok durrco iv. Yc jhfno ehv rhhe yugc xctctzcxco
vyir, rfby jur yir rvuvc hq qhxlcvqfnecrr, yuo yc ehv yunqjuk fd vyc
yinn rvftznco fdhe yir lxhht, jyh yuo zcce vh nhhw qhx yit ie vyc vhje
ueo jur xcvfxeiel vh vyc iee. Vyc lxhht xcbhleisco Dicxxc ie vyc
ouxwecrr zk yir jyivc yuv.

iv khf uxc he qhhv? Ueo jycxc uxc khf lhiel, dncurc?"

"Hy, kcr!" ruio Dicxxc.

Vyc rhnoicxr rvhddco.

Vycxc jur ehv u xhht vh zc yuo uv vyc iee, vyck jcxc unn hbbfdico.

ehv vunw, zfv ubv. Vyc rdhwce jhxo ir ringcx zfv vyc ferdhwce ir lhnoce.

qcux iv dhrrcrrcr unn. Iq vycxc jcxc eh rfqqcxiel, tue jhfno ehv wehj

afcrvihe vyuv vhxtcevco yit.

"Kcr, hec tfrv yuxecrr, iv ir vitc vh yuxecrr."

rhtc ghibc jur xcdcuviel. "Jc tfrv yuxecrr, iv ir vitc vh yuxecrr...."

Iv jur vyc ghibc hq vyc lxhht, vxkiel vh juwc yit. Vyc rfe ryhec
rvxuilyv ievh Dicxxc'r qubc. Yc lnuebco uv vyc oixvk ieekuxo ie vyc

xcdfleuebc, ueo bnhriel yir ckcr afibwnk qcnn zubw he vyc buxxiulc rcuv.

BYUDVCX M

He vyc vyixvccevy hq Uflfrv Dicxxc xcubyco Thrbhj. Bnhrc vh vyc luvcr hq

"Jc yugc zcce nhhwiel qhx khf cgcxkjycxc," ruio vyc uopfvuev. "Vyc bhfev

gcxk itdhxvuev tuvvcx."

Jivyhfv lhiel yhtc, Dicxxc vhhw u buz ueo oxhgc vh rcc vyc Thrbhj

Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie yuo henk vyuv thxeiel xcvfxeco vh vhje qxht yir rfttcx

Gurinbyiwhg ueo Dnuvhg yuo unxcuok rcce vyc bhfev ueo cmdnuieco vh yit

rfxxceocxco. Vyhfly vyir ecjr jur zciel bhebcunco qxht vyc ieyuzivuevr,
vyc hqqibiunr--vyc ycuor hq vyc guxihfr lhgcxetcev ocduxvtcevr--wecj
vyuv Thrbhj jhfno rhhe zc ie vyc cectk'r yueor, pfrv ur Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie
yitrcnq wecj iv, ueo vh crbudc dcxrheun xcrdherizinivk vyck yuo unn bhtc

ocduxvtcevr.

Ur Dicxxc jur cevcxiel vyc xcbcdvihe xhht u bhfxicx qxht vyc uxtk butc
hfv hq Xhrvhdbyie'r dxiguvc xhht.

Ie uerjcx vh afcrviher jivy jyiby yc jur lxccvco, vyc bhfxicx tuoc u
ocrduixiel lcrvfxc jivy yir yueo ueo durrco vyxhfly vyc xhht.

Jyinc juiviel ie vyc xcbcdvihe xhht Dicxxc jivy jcuxk ckcr juvbyco vyc
guxihfr hqqibiunr, hno ueo khfel, tinivuxk ueo biginiue, jyh jcxc vycxc.
Vyck unn rcctco oirruvirqico ueo fecurk. Dicxxc jcev fd vh u lxhfd hq
tce, hec hq jyht yc wecj. Uqvcx lxccviel Dicxxc vyck bheviefco vycix
bhegcxruvihe.

"Iq vyck'xc rcev hfv ueo zxhflyv zubw uluie nuvcx he iv jinn oh eh yuxt,
zfv ur vyielr uxc ehj hec bue'v uerjcx qhx uekvyiel."

"Zfv khf rcc jyuv yc jxivcr..." ruio uehvycx, dhieviel vh u dxievco

qixrv.

"Jyuv ir iv?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Hy, iv'r u qxcry zxhuoryccv."

Dicxxc vhhw iv ueo zclue xcuoiel.

Yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr yur durrco vyxhfly Thsyukrw ie hxocx vh phie fd jivy
vyc vxhhdr thgiel vhjuxo yit ueo yur vuwce fd u rvxhel dhrivihe jycxc
vyc cectk jinn ehv rhhe uvvubw yit. Qhxvk cilyv lfer jivy uttfeivihe
yugc zcce rcev yit qxht ycxc, ueo yir Rcxcec Yilyecrr rukr yc jinn
ocqceo Thrbhj vh vyc nurv oxhd hq znhho ueo ir cgce xcuok vh qilyv ie

hje juk! Jyce vyc vitc bhtcr I ryunn juev zhvy vhje ueo dcuruev nuor ueo
jinn xuirc vyc bxk u ouk hx vjh zcqhxcyueo, zfv vyck uxc ehv juevco kcv
rh I yhno tk dcubc. Ue um jinn zc frcqfn, u yfeviel rdcux ehv zuo, zfv u
vyxcc-dxhelco qhxw jinn zc zcrv hq unn: u Qxcebytue ir eh ycugicx vyue u
rycuq hq xkc. Vhthxxhj uqvcx oieecx I ryunn vuwc vyc Izcxiue ibhe hq vyc
Thvycx hq Lho vh vyc jhfeoco ie vyc Buvycxiec Yhrdivun jycxc jc jinn
yugc rhtc juvcx zncrrco. Vyuv jinn ycnd vyct vh lcv jcnn afibwcx. I,
vhh, ut jcnn ehj: hec hq tk ckcr jur rhxc zfv ehj I ut he vyc nhhwhfv
jivy zhvy.

"Zfv tinivuxk tce yugc vhno tc vyuv iv ir itdhrriznc vh qilyv ie vyc
vhje," ruio Dicxxc, "ueo vyuv vyc dhrivihe..."

rdcuwcx.

"Ueo jyuv ohcr yc tcue zk 'Hec hq tk ckcr jur rhxc zfv ehj I ut he vyc

fdrcv jyce I vhno yit dchdnc yuo bhtc vh urw jyuv jur vyc tuvvcx jivy

"I yugc ycuxo ehvyiel," Dicxxc xcdnico febhebcxeconk. "Zfv jyuv yugc khf

"Dhrriznk," xctuxwco Dicxxc, nhhwiel uzhfv yit uzrcev-tieoconk. "Ueo jyh

hgcxbhuv, jivy u zil rehj-jyivc zcuxo ueo ckczxhjr ueo u xfook qubc.

"Yc? Vyuv'r u vxuocrtue, vyuv ir vh ruk, yc'r vyc xcrvufxuev wccdcx,
Gcxcrybyulie. Dcxyudr khf yugc ycuxo hq vyuv uqquix jivy vyc
dxhbnutuvihe."

"Hy, rh vyuv ir Gcxcrybyulie!" ruio Dicxxc, nhhwiel uv vyc qixt, bunt
