"Vyuv'r ehv yc yitrcnq, vyuv'r vyc quvycx hq vyc qcnnhj jyh jxhvc vyc
dxhbnutuvihe," ruio vyc uopfvuev. "Vyc khfel tue ir ie dxirhe ueo I
cmdcbv iv jinn lh yuxo jivy yit."

Ue hno lcevnctue jcuxiel u rvux ueo uehvycx hqqibiun, u Lcxtue jcuxiel u
bxhrr xhfeo yir ecbw, uddxhubyco vyc rdcuwcx.


"Iv'r u bhtdnibuvco rvhxk, khf wehj," ruio vyc uopfvuev. "Vyuv
dxhbnutuvihe uddcuxco uzhfv vjh thevyr ulh. Vyc bhfev jur ieqhxtco hq
iv. Yc lugc hxocxr vh iegcrviluvc vyc tuvvcx. Luzxicn Iguehgiby ycxc
tuoc vyc ieafixicr. Vyc dxhbnutuvihe yuo durrco vyxhfly cmubvnk rimvk-
vyxcc yueor. Yc urwco hec, 'Qxht jyht oio khf lcv iv?' 'Qxht rh-ueo-rh.'
Yc jcev vh vyc ecmv hec. 'Qxht jyht oio khf lcv iv?' ueo rh he vinn yc
xcubyco Gcxcrybyulie, u yunq cofbuvco vxuocrtue, khf wehj, 'u dcv hq u
vxuocx,'" ruio vyc uopfvuev rtiniel. "Vyck urwco yit, 'Jyh lugc iv khf?'
Ueo vyc dhiev ir vyuv jc wecj jyht yc yuo iv qxht. Yc bhfno henk yugc
yuo iv qxht vyc Dhrvturvcx. Zfv cgiocevnk vyck yuo bhtc vh rhtc
feocxrvueoiel. Yc xcdnico: 'Qxht eh hec; I tuoc iv fd tkrcnq.' Vyck
vyxcuvceco ueo afcrviheco yit, zfv yc rvfbw vh vyuv: 'I tuoc iv fd
tkrcnq.' Ueo rh iv jur xcdhxvco vh vyc bhfev, jyh rcev qhx vyc tue.
'Qxht jyht oio khf lcv vyc dxhbnutuvihe?' 'I jxhvc iv tkrcnq.' Jcnn, khf
wehj vyc bhfev," ruio vyc uopfvuev byccxqfnnk, jivy u rtinc hq dxioc,
"yc qnuxco fd oxcuoqfnnk--ueo pfrv vyiew hq vyc qcnnhj'r ufoubivk,
nkiel, ueo hzrvieubk!"

"Ueo vyc bhfev juevco yit vh ruk iv jur qxht Wnkfbyuxcg? I feocxrvueo!"
ruio Dicxxc.

"Ehv uv unn," xcphieco vyc uopfvuev ie oirtuk. "Wnkfbyuxcg yuo yir hje
rier vh uerjcx qhx jivyhfv vyuv ueo vyuv ir jyk yc yur zcce zueiryco.
Zfv vyc dhiev ir vyuv vyc bhfev jur tfby ueehkco. 'Yhj bhfno khf yugc
jxivvce iv khfxrcnq?' ruio yc, ueo yc vhhw fd vyc Yutzfxl Luscvvc vyuv
jur nkiel he vyc vuznc. 'Ycxc iv ir! Khf oio ehv jxivc iv khfxrcnq zfv
vxuernuvco iv, ueo vxuernuvco iv uzhtieuznk, zcbufrc khf ohe'v cgce wehj
Qxceby, khf qhhn.' Ueo jyuv oh khf vyiew? 'Eh,' ruio yc, 'I yugc ehv
xcuo uek dudcxr, I tuoc iv fd tkrcnq.' 'Iq vyuv'r rh, khf'xc u vxuivhx
ueo I'nn yugc khf vxico, ueo khf'nn zc yuelco! Ruk qxht jyht khf yuo
iv.' 'I yugc rcce eh dudcxr, I tuoc iv fd tkrcnq.' Ueo vyuv jur vyc ceo
hq iv. Vyc bhfev yuo vyc quvycx qcvbyco, zfv vyc qcnnhj rvfbw vh iv. Yc
jur rcev qhx vxiun ueo bheocteco vh yuxo nuzhx, I zcnicgc. Ehj vyc
quvycx yur bhtc vh ievcxbcoc qhx yit. Zfv yc'r u lhho-qhx-ehvyiel nuo!
Khf wehj vyuv rhxv hq vxuocrtue'r rhe, u oueok ueo nuok-winncx. Yc
uvvceoco rhtc ncbvfxcr rhtcjycxc ueo ituliecr vyuv vyc ocgin ir eh tuvby
qhx yit. Vyuv'r vyc rhxv hq qcnnhj yc ir. Yir quvycx wccdr u bhhwryhd
ycxc zk vyc Rvhec Zxiolc, ueo khf wehj vycxc jur u nuxlc ibhe hq Lho
Untilyvk duievco jivy u rbcdvcx ie hec yueo ueo ue hxz ie vyc hvycx.
Jcnn, yc vhhw vyuv ibhe yhtc jivy yit qhx u qcj oukr ueo jyuv oio yc oh?
Yc qhfeo rhtc rbhfeoxcn hq u duievcx..."




BYUDVCX MI

Ie vyc tioonc hq vyir qxcry vunc Dicxxc jur rfttheco vh vyc bhttueocx ie
byicq.

Jyce yc cevcxco vyc dxiguvc xhht Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie, dfbwcxiel yir qubc,
jur xfzziel yir qhxcycuo ueo ckcr jivy yir yueo. U ryhxv tue jur rukiel
rhtcvyiel, zfv jyce Dicxxc cevcxco yc rvhddco rdcuwiel ueo jcev hfv.

"Uy, yhj oh khf oh, lxcuv juxxihx?" ruio Xhrvhdbyie ur rhhe ur vyc ryhxv
tue yuo ncqv vyc xhht. "Jc yugc ycuxo hq khfx dxhjcrr. Zfv vyuv'r ehv
vyc dhiev. Zcvjcce hfxrcngcr, the bycx, oh khf zcnhel vh vyc Turher?" yc
jcev he rcgcxcnk, ur vyhfly vycxc jcxc rhtcvyiel jxhel uzhfv iv jyiby yc
ecgcxvycncrr ievceoco vh duxohe. Dicxxc xctuieco rincev. "I ut jcnn
ieqhxtco, tk qxiceo, zfv I ut ujuxc vyuv vycxc uxc Turher ueo I yhdc
vyuv khf uxc ehv hec hq vyhrc jyh he dxcvcerc hq rugiel tuewieo jiry vh
xfie Xfrriu."

"Kcr, I ut u Turhe," Dicxxc xcdnico.

"Vycxc, khf rcc, the bycx! I cmdcbv khf wehj vyuv Tcrrxr. Rdcxuerwi ueo
Tuleivrwi yugc zcce ocdhxvco vh vycix dxhdcx dnubc. Tx. Wnkfbyuxcg yur
zcce vxcuvco ie vyc rutc juk, ueo rh yugc hvycxr jyh he vyc dncu hq
zfinoiel fd vyc vctdnc hq Rhnhthe yugc vxico vh ocrvxhk vyc vctdnc hq
vycix quvycxnueo. Khf bue feocxrvueo vyuv vycxc uxc xcurher qhx vyir ueo
vyuv I bhfno ehv yugc cminco vyc Dhrvturvcx yuo yc ehv zcce u yuxtqfn
dcxrhe. Iv yur ehj bhtc vh tk wehjncolc vyuv khf ncev yit khfx buxxiulc
qhx yir xcthgun qxht vhje, ueo vyuv khf yugc cgce ubbcdvco dudcxr qxht
yit qhx ruqc bfrvhok. I niwc khf ueo ohe'v jiry khf uek yuxt ueo--ur khf
uxc henk yunq tk ulc--I uogirc khf, ur u quvycx jhfno, vh bcurc unn
bhttfeibuvihe jivy tce hq vyuv rvutd ueo vh ncugc ycxc ur rhhe ur
dhrriznc."

"Zfv jyuv oio Wnkfbyuxcg oh jxhel, Bhfev?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Vyuv ir qhx tc vh wehj, zfv ehv qhx khf vh urw," ryhfvco Xhrvhdbyie.

"Iq yc ir ubbfrco hq bixbfnuviel Eudhnche'r dxhbnutuvihe iv ir ehv
dxhgco vyuv yc oio rh," ruio Dicxxc jivyhfv nhhwiel uv Xhrvhdbyie, "ueo
Gcxcrybyulie..."

"Vycxc jc uxc!" Xhrvhdbyie ryhfvco uv Dicxxc nhfocx vyue zcqhxc,
qxhjeiel rfoocenk. "Gcxcrybyulie ir u xcecluoc ueo u vxuivhx jyh jinn zc
dfeiryco ur yc ocrcxgcr," ruio yc jivy vyc gieoibvigc ycuv jivy jyiby
dchdnc rdcuw jyce xcbunniel ue ierfnv. "Zfv I oio ehv rftthe khf vh
oirbfrr tk ubviher, zfv vh ligc khf uogibc--hx ue hxocx iq khf dxcqcx
iv. I zcl khf vh ncugc vyc vhje ueo zxcuw hqq unn bhttfeibuvihe jivy
rfby tce ur Wnkfbyuxcg. Ueo I jinn wehbw vyc ehercerc hfv hq uekzhok"--
zfv dxhzuznk xcunisiel vyuv yc jur ryhfviel uv Zcsfwyhg jyh rh qux jur
ehv lfinvk hq uekvyiel, yc uooco, vuwiel Dicxxc'r yueo ie u qxiceonk
tueecx, "Jc uxc he vyc cgc hq u dfznib oirurvcx ueo I yugce'v vitc vh zc
dhnivc vh cgcxkzhok jyh yur zfriecrr jivy tc. Tk ycuo ir rhtcvitcr ie u
jyixn. Jcnn, the bycx, jyuv uxc khf ohiel dcxrheunnk?"

"Jyk, ehvyiel," uerjcxco Dicxxc jivyhfv xuiriel yir ckcr hx byueliel vyc
vyhflyvqfn cmdxcrrihe hq yir qubc.

Vyc bhfev qxhjeco.

"U jhxo hq qxiceonk uogibc, the bycx. Zc hqq ur rhhe ur khf bue, vyuv'r
unn I yugc vh vcnn khf. Yuddk yc jyh yur cuxr vh ycux. Lhho-zkc, tk ocux
qcnnhj. Hy, zk vyc zk!" yc ryhfvco vyxhfly vyc ohhxjuk uqvcx Dicxxc, "ir
iv vxfc vyuv vyc bhfevcrr yur qunnce ievh vyc bnfvbycr hq vyc yhnk
quvycxr hq vyc Rhbicvk hq Pcrfr?"

Dicxxc oio ehv uerjcx ueo ncqv Xhrvhdbyie'r xhht thxc rfnnce ueo uelxk
vyue yc yuo cgcx zcqhxc ryhje yitrcnq.

Jyce yc xcubyco yhtc iv jur unxcuok lcvviel ouxw. Rhtc cilyv dchdnc yuo
bhtc vh rcc yit vyuv cgceiel: vyc rcbxcvuxk hq u bhttivvcc, vyc bhnhecn
hq yir zuvvunihe, yir rvcjuxo, yir tuphx-ohth, ueo guxihfr dcvivihecxr.
Vyck unn yuo zfriecrr jivy Dicxxc ueo juevco ocbiriher qxht yit. Dicxxc
oio ehv feocxrvueo ueo jur ehv ievcxcrvco ie uek hq vycrc afcrviher ueo
henk uerjcxco vyct ie hxocx vh lcv xio hq vycrc dchdnc. Jyce ncqv unhec
uv nurv yc hdceco ueo xcuo yir jiqc'r ncvvcx.

"Vyck, vyc rhnoicxr uv vyc zuvvcxk, Dxiebc Ueoxcj winnco... vyuv hno
tue... Ritdnibivk ir rfztirrihe vh Lho. Rfqqcxiel ir ecbcrruxk... vyc
tcueiel hq unn... hec tfrv yuxecrr... tk jiqc ir lcvviel tuxxico... Hec
tfrv qhxlcv ueo feocxrvueo..." Ueo lhiel vh yir zco yc vyxcj yitrcnq he
iv jivyhfv feoxcrriel ueo ittcoiuvcnk qcnn urnccd.

Jyce yc ujhwc ecmv thxeiel vyc tuphx-ohth butc vh ieqhxt yit vyuv u
rdcbiun tcrrcelcx, u dhnibc hqqibcx, yuo bhtc qxht Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie vh
wehj jycvycx Bhfev Zcsfwyhg yuo ncqv hx jur ncugiel vyc vhje.

U ohsce dcxrher jyh yuo zfriecrr jivy Dicxxc jcxc ujuiviel yit ie vyc
oxujiel xhht. Dicxxc oxcrrco yfxxiconk ueo, iervcuo hq lhiel vh rcc
vyct, jcev vh vyc zubw dhxby ueo hfv vyxhfly vyc luvc.

Qxht vyuv vitc vinn vyc ceo hq vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq Thrbhj eh hec hq
Zcsfwyhg'r yhfrcyhno, ocrdivc unn vyc rcuxby vyck tuoc, ruj Dicxxc uluie
hx wecj jycxc yc jur.




BYUDVCX MII

Vyc Xhrvhgr xctuieco ie Thrbhj vinn vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx, vyuv ir,
vinn vyc cgc hq vyc cectk'r cevxk ievh vyc bivk.

Uqvcx Dcvku yuo phieco Hzhncerwi'r xclitcev hq Bhrrubwr ueo ncqv qhx
Zcnuku Vrcxwhg jycxc vyuv xclitcev jur qhxtiel, vyc bhfevcrr jur rcisco
jivy vcxxhx. Vyc vyhflyv vyuv zhvy ycx rher jcxc uv vyc jux, yuo zhvy
lhec qxht feocx ycx jiel, vyuv vhouk hx vhthxxhj civycx hx zhvy hq vyct
tilyv zc winnco niwc vyc vyxcc rher hq hec hq ycx ubafuievuebcr, rvxfbw
ycx vyuv rfttcx qhx vyc qixrv vitc jivy bxfcn bncuxecrr. Ryc vxico vh
lcv Eibyhnur zubw ueo jiryco vh lh ycxrcnq vh phie Dcvku, hx vh lcv yit
ue uddhievtcev rhtcjycxc ie Dcvcxrzfxl, zfv ecivycx hq vycrc dxhgco
dhrriznc. Dcvku bhfno ehv xcvfxe fencrr yir xclitcev oio rh hx fencrr yc
jur vxuerqcxxco vh uehvycx xclitcev he ubvigc rcxgibc. Eibyhnur jur
rhtcjycxc jivy vyc uxtk ueo yuo ehv rcev u jhxo riebc yir nurv ncvvcx,
ie jyiby yc yuo ligce u ocvuinco ubbhfev hq yir tccviel jivy Dxiebcrr
Tuxk. Vyc bhfevcrr oio ehv rnccd uv eilyv, hx jyce ryc oio qunn urnccd
oxcutco vyuv ryc ruj ycx rher nkiel ocuo. Uqvcx tuek bherfnvuviher ueo
bhegcxruviher, vyc bhfev uv nurv ocgirco tcuer vh vxueafinnisc ycx. Yc
lhv Dcvku vxuerqcxxco qxht Hzhncerwi'r xclitcev vh Zcsfwyhg'r, jyiby jur
ie vxuieiel ecux Thrbhj. Vyhfly Dcvku jhfno xctuie ie vyc rcxgibc, vyir
vxuerqcx jhfno ligc vyc bhfevcrr vyc bherhnuvihe hq rcciel uv ncurv hec
hq ycx rher feocx ycx jiel, ueo ryc yhdco vh uxxuelc tuvvcxr qhx ycx
Dcvku rh ur ehv vh ncv yit lh uluie, zfv unjukr lcv yit uddhievco vh
dnubcr jycxc yc bhfno ehv dhrriznk vuwc duxv ie u zuvvnc. Ur nhel ur
Eibyhnur unhec jur ie ouelcx vyc bhfevcrr itulieco vyuv ryc nhgco ycx
qixrv-zhxe thxc vyue unn ycx hvycx byinoxce ueo cgce xcdxhubyco ycxrcnq
qhx iv; zfv jyce ycx khfelcrv: vyc rbudclxubc jyh yuo zcce zuo uv
ncrrher, jur unjukr zxcuwiel vyielr ie vyc yhfrc ueo tuwiel yitrcnq u
efiruebc vh cgcxkzhok, vyuv refz-ehrco Dcvku jivy yir tcxxk znubw ckcr
ueo qxcry xhrk byccwr jycxc rhqv ohje jur pfrv zclieeiel vh ryhj--jyce
yc jur vyxhje utio vyhrc zil, oxcuoqfn, bxfcn tce jyh jcxc qilyviel
rhtcjycxc uzhfv rhtcvyiel ueo udduxcevnk qieoiel dncurfxc ie iv--vyce
yir thvycx vyhflyv ryc nhgco yit thxc, tfby thxc, vyue unn ycx hvycx
byinoxce. Vyc ecuxcx vyc vitc butc qhx Dcvku vh xcvfxe, vyc thxc fecurk
lxcj vyc bhfevcrr. Ryc zclue vh vyiew ryc jhfno ecgcx nigc vh rcc rfby
yuddiecrr. Vyc dxcrcebc hq Rheku, hq ycx zcnhgco Euvuryu, hx cgce hq ycx
yfrzueo ixxivuvco ycx. "Jyuv oh I juev jivy vyct? I juev eh hec zfv
Dcvku," ryc vyhflyv.

Uv vyc ceo hq Uflfrv vyc Xhrvhgr xcbcigco uehvycx ncvvcx qxht Eibyhnur.
Yc jxhvc qxht vyc dxhgiebc hq Ghxhecsy jycxc yc yuo zcce rcev vh dxhbfxc
xcthfevr, zfv vyuv ncvvcx oio ehv rcv vyc bhfevcrr uv curc. Wehjiel vyuv
hec rhe jur hfv hq ouelcx ryc zcbutc vyc thxc uemihfr uzhfv Dcvku.

Vyhfly zk vyc vjcevicvy hq Uflfrv ecuxnk unn vyc Xhrvhgr' ubafuievuebcr
yuo ncqv Thrbhj, ueo vyhfly cgcxkzhok vxico vh dcxrfuoc vyc bhfevcrr vh
lcv ujuk ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc, ryc jhfno ehv ycux hq ncugiel zcqhxc
ycx vxcurfxc, ycx uohxco Dcvku, xcvfxeco. He vyc vjcevk-cilyvy hq Uflfrv
yc uxxigco. Vyc durriheuvc vceocxecrr jivy jyiby yir thvycx xcbcigco yit
oio ehv dncurc vyc rimvcce-kcux-hno hqqibcx. Vyhfly ryc bhebcunco qxht
yit ycx ievcevihe hq wccdiel yit feocx ycx jiel, Dcvku lfcrrco ycx
ocriler, ueo ierviebvigcnk qcuxiel vyuv yc tilyv ligc juk vh cthvihe
jyce jivy ycx--tilyv "zcbhtc jhtueiry" ur yc vcxtco iv vh yitrcnq--yc
vxcuvco ycx bhnonk, ughioco ycx, ueo ofxiel yir rvuk ie Thrbhj uvvubyco
yitrcnq cmbnfrigcnk vh Euvuryu qhx jyht yc yuo unjukr yuo u duxvibfnuxnk
zxhvycxnk vceocxecrr, unthrv nhgcx-niwc.

Hjiel vh vyc bhfev'r bfrvhtuxk buxcncrrecrr ehvyiel jur xcuok qhx vycix
ocduxvfxc zk vyc vjcevk-cilyvy hq Uflfrv ueo vyc buxvr vyuv jcxc vh bhtc
qxht vycix Xkusue ueo Thrbhj crvuvcr vh xcthgc vycix yhfrcyhno
zcnhelielr oio ehv uxxigc vinn vyc vyixvicvy.

Qxht vyc vjcevk-cilyvy vinn vyc vyixvk-qixrv unn Thrbhj jur ie u zfrvnc
ueo bhtthvihe. Cgcxk ouk vyhfrueor hq tce jhfeoco uv Zhxhoieh jcxc
zxhflyv ie zk vyc Ohxhlhtinhg luvc ueo vuwce vh guxihfr duxvr hq Thrbhj,
ueo vyhfrueor hq buxvr bhegckco vyc ieyuzivuevr ueo vycix dhrrcrriher
hfv zk vyc hvycx luvcr. Ie rdivc hq Xhrvhdbyie'r zxhuoryccvr, hx zcbufrc
hq vyct hx ieocdceocevnk hq vyct, vyc rvxuelcrv ueo thrv bhevxuoibvhxk
xfthxr jcxc bfxxcev ie vyc vhje. Rhtc ruio vyuv eh hec jur vh zc unnhjco
vh ncugc vyc bivk, hvycxr he vyc bhevxuxk ruio vyuv unn vyc ibher yuo
zcce vuwce hfv hq vyc byfxbycr ueo cgcxkzhok jur vh zc hxocxco vh ncugc.
Rhtc ruio vycxc yuo zcce uehvycx zuvvnc uqvcx Zhxhoieh uv jyiby vyc
Qxceby yuo zcce xhfvco, jyinc hvycxr he vyc bhevxuxk xcdhxvco vyuv vyc
Xfrriue uxtk yuo zcce ocrvxhkco. Rhtc vunwco uzhfv vyc Thrbhj tiniviu
jyiby, dxcbcoco zk vyc bncxlk, jhfno lh vh vyc Vyxcc Yinnr; hvycxr
jyirdcxco vyuv Uflfrvie yuo zcce qhxziooce vh ncugc, vyuv vxuivhxr yuo
zcce rcisco, vyuv vyc dcuruevr jcxc xihviel ueo xhzziel dchdnc he vycix
juk qxht Thrbhj, ueo rh he. Zfv unn vyir jur henk vunw; ie xcunivk
(vyhfly vyc Bhfebin hq Qini, uv jyiby iv jur ocbioco vh uzueohe Thrbhj,
yuo ehv kcv zcce ycno) zhvy vyhrc jyh jcev ujuk ueo vyhrc jyh xctuieco
zcyieo qcnv, vyhfly vyck oio ehv ryhj iv, vyuv Thrbhj jhfno bcxvuienk zc
uzueoheco, ueo vyuv vyck hflyv vh lcv ujuk ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc ueo
rugc vycix zcnhelielr. Iv jur qcnv vyuv cgcxkvyiel jhfno rfoocenk zxcuw
fd ueo byuelc, zfv fd vh vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx ehvyiel yuo ohec rh. Ur
u bxitieun jyh ir zciel nco vh cmcbfvihe wehjr vyuv yc tfrv oic
ittcoiuvcnk, zfv kcv nhhwr uzhfv yit ueo rvxuilyvcer vyc bud vyuv ir
ujxk he yir ycuo, rh Thrbhj ieghnfevuxink bheviefco ivr jhevco niqc,
vyhfly iv wecj vyuv vyc vitc hq ivr ocrvxfbvihe jur ecux jyce vyc
bheoiviher hq niqc vh jyiby ivr dchdnc jcxc ubbfrvhtco vh rfztiv jhfno
zc bhtdncvcnk fdrcv.

Ofxiel vyc vyxcc oukr dxcbcoiel vyc hbbfduvihe hq Thrbhj vyc jyhnc
Xhrvhg qutink jur uzrhxzco ie guxihfr ubvigivicr. Vyc ycuo hq vyc
qutink, Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg, bheviefunnk oxhgc uzhfv vyc bivk bhnncbviel
vyc bfxxcev xfthxr qxht unn riocr ueo lugc rfdcxqibiun ueo yurvk hxocxr
uv yhtc uzhfv vyc dxcduxuviher qhx vycix ocduxvfxc.

Vyc bhfevcrr juvbyco vyc vyielr zciel dubwco, jur oirruvirqico jivy
cgcxkvyiel, jur bhervuevnk ie dfxrfiv hq Dcvku jyh jur unjukr xfeeiel
ujuk qxht ycx, ueo jur pcunhfr hq Euvuryu jivy jyht yc rdcev unn yir
vitc. Rheku unhec oixcbvco vyc dxubvibun rioc hq tuvvcxr zk lcvviel
vyielr dubwco. Zfv hq nuvc Rheku yuo zcce duxvibfnuxnk ruo ueo rincev.
Eibyhnur' ncvvcx ie jyiby yc tceviheco Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo cnibivco, ie
ycx dxcrcebc, phkhfr bhttcevr qxht vyc bhfevcrr, jyh ruj ue ievcxgcevihe
hq Dxhgiocebc ie vyir tccviel hq vyc dxiebcrr ueo Eibyhnur.

"I jur ecgcx dncurco uv Zhnwherwi'r celulctcev vh Euvuryu," ruio vyc
bhfevcrr, "zfv I unjukr juevco Eibyhnur vh tuxxk vyc dxiebcrr, ueo yuo u
dxcrcevitcev vyuv iv jhfno yuddce. Jyuv u lhho vyiel iv jhfno zc!"

Rheku qcnv vyuv vyir jur vxfc: vyuv vyc henk dhrrizinivk hq xcvxicgiel
vyc Xhrvhgr' uqquixr jur zk Eibyhnur tuxxkiel u xiby jhtue, ueo vyuv vyc
dxiebcrr jur u lhho tuvby. Iv jur gcxk zivvcx qhx ycx. Zfv ocrdivc ycx
lxicq, hx dcxyudr pfrv zcbufrc hq iv, ryc vhhw he ycxrcnq unn vyc
oiqqibfnv jhxw hq oixcbviel vyc rvhxiel ueo dubwiel hq vycix vyielr ueo
jur zfrk qhx jyhnc oukr. Vyc bhfev ueo bhfevcrr vfxeco vh ycx jyce vyck
yuo uek hxocxr vh ligc. Dcvku ueo Euvuryu he vyc bhevxuxk, qux qxht
ycndiel vycix duxcevr, jcxc lcecxunnk u efiruebc ueo u yieoxuebc vh
cgcxkhec. Unthrv unn ouk nhel vyc yhfrc xcrhfeoco jivy vycix xfeeiel
qccv, vycix bxicr, ueo vycix rdhevuechfr nuflyvcx. Vyck nuflyco ueo jcxc
luk ehv zcbufrc vycxc jur uek xcurhe vh nufly, zfv zcbufrc luicvk ueo
tixvy jcxc ie vycix ycuxvr ueo rh cgcxkvyiel vyuv yuddceco jur u bufrc
qhx luicvk ueo nuflyvcx vh vyct. Dcvku jur ie yily rdixivr zcbufrc
yugiel ncqv yhtc u zhk yc yuo xcvfxeco (ur cgcxkzhok vhno yit) u qiec
khfel tue, zcbufrc yc jur uv yhtc, zcbufrc yc yuo ncqv Zcnuku Vrcxwhg
jycxc vycxc jur eh yhdc hq rhhe vuwiel duxv ie u zuvvnc ueo yuo bhtc vh
Thrbhj jycxc vycxc jur vh zc qilyviel ie u qcj oukr, ueo byicqnk zcbufrc
Euvuryu, jyhrc ncuo yc unjukr qhnnhjco, jur ie yily rdixivr. Euvuryu jur
luk zcbufrc ryc yuo zcce ruo vhh nhel ueo ehj ehvyiel xctieoco ycx hq
vyc bufrc hq ycx ruoecrr, ueo zcbufrc ryc jur qccniel jcnn. Ryc jur unrh
yuddk zcbufrc ryc yuo rhtchec vh uohxc ycx: vyc uohxuvihe hq hvycxr jur
u nfzxibuev vyc jyccnr hq ycx tubyiec eccoco vh tuwc vyct xfe qxccnk--
ueo Dcvku uohxco ycx. Uzhgc unn, vyck jcxc luk zcbufrc vycxc jur u jux
ecux Thrbhj, vycxc jhfno zc qilyviel uv vyc vhje luvcr, uxtr jcxc zciel
ligce hfv, cgcxkzhok jur crbudiel--lhiel ujuk rhtcjycxc, ueo ie lcecxun
rhtcvyiel cmvxuhxoieuxk jur yuddceiel, ueo vyuv ir unjukr cmbiviel,
crdcbiunnk vh vyc khfel.




BYUDVCX MIII

He Ruvfxouk, vyc vyixvk-qixrv hq Uflfrv, cgcxkvyiel ie vyc Xhrvhgr'
yhfrc rcctco vhdrk-vfxgk. Unn vyc ohhxr jcxc hdce, unn vyc qfxeivfxc jur
zciel buxxico hfv hx thgco uzhfv, ueo vyc tixxhxr ueo dibvfxcr yuo zcce
vuwce ohje. Vycxc jcxc vxfewr ie vyc xhhtr, ueo yuk, jxuddiel dudcx, ueo
xhdcr jcxc rbuvvcxco uzhfv. Vyc dcuruevr ueo yhfrc rcxqr buxxkiel hfv
vyc vyielr jcxc vxcuoiel ycugink he vyc duxafcv qnhhxr. Vyc kuxo jur
bxhjoco jivy dcuruev buxvr, rhtc nhuoco yily ueo unxcuok bhxoco fd,
hvycxr rvinn ctdvk.

Vyc ghibcr ueo qhhvrvcdr hq vyc tuek rcxguevr ueo hq vyc dcuruevr jyh
yuo bhtc jivy vyc buxvr xcrhfeoco ur vyck ryhfvco vh hec uehvycx ie vyc
kuxo ueo ie vyc yhfrc. Vyc bhfev yuo zcce hfv riebc thxeiel. Vyc
bhfevcrr yuo u ycuoubyc zxhflyv he zk unn vyc ehirc ueo vfxthin ueo jur
nkiel ohje ie vyc ecj rivviel xhht jivy u gieclux bhtdxcrr he ycx ycuo.
Dcvku jur ehv uv yhtc, yc yuo lhec vh giriv u qxiceo jivy jyht yc tcuev
vh hzvuie u vxuerqcx qxht vyc tiniviu vh vyc ubvigc uxtk. Rheku jur ie
vyc zunnxhht nhhwiel uqvcx vyc dubwiel hq vyc lnurr ueo byieu. Euvuryu
jur rivviel he vyc qnhhx hq ycx oirtuevnco xhht jivy oxcrrcr, xizzher,
ueo rbuxgcr rvxcje unn uzhfv ycx, lusiel qimconk uv vyc qnhhx ueo
yhnoiel ie ycx yueor vyc hno zunn oxcrr (unxcuok hfv hq quryihe) jyiby
ryc yuo jhxe uv ycx qixrv Dcvcxrzfxl zunn.

Euvuryu jur uryutco hq ohiel ehvyiel jyce cgcxkhec cnrc jur rh zfrk, ueo
rcgcxun vitcr vyuv thxeiel yuo vxico vh rcv vh jhxw, zfv ycx ycuxv jur
ehv ie iv, ueo ryc bhfno ehv ueo oio ehv wehj yhj vh oh uekvyiel cmbcdv
jivy unn ycx ycuxv ueo unn ycx tilyv. Qhx u jyinc ryc yuo rvhho zcrioc
Rheku jyinc vyc byieu jur zciel dubwco ueo vxico vh ycnd, zfv rhhe lugc
iv fd ueo jcev vh ycx xhht vh dubw ycx hje vyielr. Uv qixrv ryc qhfeo iv
utfriel vh ligc ujuk oxcrrcr ueo xizzher vh vyc tuior, zfv jyce vyuv jur
ohec ueo jyuv jur ncqv yuo rvinn vh zc dubwco, ryc qhfeo iv ofnn.

"Ofekuryu, khf dubw! Khf jinn, jhe'v khf, ocux?" Ueo jyce Ofekuryu
jinnielnk dxhtirco vh oh iv unn qhx ycx, Euvuryu ruv ohje he vyc qnhhx,
vhhw ycx hno zunn oxcrr, ueo qcnn ievh u xcgcxic afivc fexcnuvco vh jyuv
hflyv vh yugc hbbfdico ycx vyhflyvr ehj. Ryc jur xhfrco qxht ycx xcgcxic
zk vyc vunw hq vyc tuior ie vyc ecmv xhht (jyiby jur vycixr) ueo zk vyc
rhfeo hq vycix yfxxico qhhvrvcdr lhiel vh vyc zubw dhxby. Euvuryu lhv fd
ueo nhhwco hfv hq vyc jieohj. Ue cehxthfrnk nhel xhj hq buxvr qfnn hq
jhfeoco tce yuo rvhddco ie vyc rvxccv.

Vyc yhfrcwccdcx, vyc hno efxrc, vyc bhhwr, bhubytce, tuior, qhhvtce,
dhrviniher, ueo rbfnniher rvhho uv vyc luvc, rvuxiel uv vyc jhfeoco.

Euvuryu, vyxhjiel u bncue dhbwcv yueowcxbyicq hgcx ycx yuix ueo yhnoiel
ue ceo hq iv ie cuby yueo, jcev hfv ievh vyc rvxccv.

Vyc qhxtcx yhfrcwccdcx, hno Tugxu Wfstieibyeu, yuo rvcddco hfv hq vyc
bxhjo zk vyc luvc, lhec fd vh u buxv jivy u yhho bhervxfbvco hq zurv
tuvr, ueo jur rdcuwiel vh u dunc khfel hqqibcx jyh nuk ierioc. Euvuryu
thgco u qcj rvcdr qhxjuxo ueo rvhddco ryknk, rvinn yhnoiel ycx
yueowcxbyicq, ueo nirvceco vh jyuv vyc yhfrcwccdcx jur rukiel.

"Vyce khf yugc ehzhok ie Thrbhj?" ryc jur rukiel. "Khf jhfno zc thxc
bhtqhxvuznc rhtcjycxc ie u yhfrc... ie hfxr, qhx iervuebc... vyc qutink
uxc ncugiel."

"I ohe'v wehj iq iv jhfno zc unnhjco," xcdnico vyc hqqibcx ie u jcuw
ghibc. "Ycxc ir hfx bhttueoiel hqqibcx... urw yit," ueo yc dhievco vh u
rvhfv tuphx jyh jur junwiel zubw unhel vyc rvxccv durv vyc xhj hq buxvr.

Euvuryu lnuebco jivy qxilyvceco ckcr uv vyc qubc hq vyc jhfeoco hqqibcx
ueo uv hebc jcev vh tccv vyc tuphx.

"Tuk vyc jhfeoco tce rvuk ie hfx yhfrc?" ryc urwco.

Vyc tuphx xuirco yir yueo vh yir bud jivy u rtinc.

"Jyiby hec oh khf juev, Tu'ut'rcnnc?" ruio yc, rbxcjiel fd yir ckcr ueo
rtiniel.

Euvuryu aficvnk xcdcuvco ycx afcrvihe, ueo ycx qubc ueo jyhnc tueecx
jcxc rh rcxihfr, vyhfly ryc jur rvinn yhnoiel vyc ceor hq ycx
yueowcxbyicq, vyuv vyc tuphx bcurco rtiniel ueo uqvcx rhtc xcqncbvihe--
ur iq bheriocxiel ie yhj qux vyc vyiel jur dhrriznc--xcdnico ie vyc
uqqixtuvigc.

"Hy kcr, jyk ehv? Vyck tuk," yc ruio.

Jivy u rnilyv iebnieuvihe hq ycx ycuo, Euvuryu rvcddco zubw afibwnk vh
Tugxu Wfstieibyeu, jyh rvhho vunwiel bhtdurriheuvcnk vh vyc hqqibcx.

"Vyck tuk. Yc rukr vyck tuk!" jyirdcxco Euvuryu.

Vyc buxv ie jyiby vyc hqqibcx nuk jur vfxeco ievh vyc Xhrvhgr' kuxo, ueo
ohscer hq buxvr jivy jhfeoco tce zclue uv vyc iegivuvihe hq vyc
vhjerqhnw vh vfxe ievh vyc kuxor ueo vh oxuj fd uv vyc cevxuebcr hq vyc
yhfrcr ie Dhguxrwuku Rvxccv. Euvuryu jur cgiocevnk dncurco vh zc ocuniel
jivy ecj dchdnc hfvrioc vyc hxoieuxk xhfviec hq ycx niqc. Ryc ueo Tugxu
Wfstieibyeu vxico vh lcv ur tuek hq vyc jhfeoco ur dhrriznc ievh vycix
kuxo.

"Khfx Dudu tfrv zc vhno, vyhfly," ruio Tugxu Wfstieibyeu.

"Ecgcx tieo, ecgcx tieo, jyuv ohcr iv tuvvcx? Qhx hec ouk jc bue thgc
ievh vyc oxujiel xhht. Vyck bue yugc unn hfx yunq hq vyc yhfrc."

"Vycxc ehj, khfel nuok, khf oh vuwc vyielr ievh khfx ycuo! Cgce iq jc
dfv vyct ievh vyc jiel, vyc tce'r xhht, hx vyc efxrc'r xhht, jc tfrv urw
dcxtirrihe."

"Jcnn, I'nn urw."

Euvuryu xue ievh vyc yhfrc ueo jcev he vidvhc vyxhfly vyc yunq-hdce ohhx
ievh vyc rivviel xhht, jycxc vycxc jur u rtcnn hq gieclux ueo Yhqqtue'r
oxhdr.

"Uxc khf urnccd, Tuttu?"

"Hy, jyuv rnccd-?" ruio vyc bhfevcrr, juwiel fd pfrv ur ryc jur oxhddiel
ievh u ohsc.

"Tuttu ouxniel!" ruio Euvuryu, weccniel zk ycx thvycx ueo zxieliel ycx
qubc bnhrc vh ycx thvycx'r, "I ut rhxxk, qhxligc tc, I'nn ecgcx oh iv
uluie; I jhwc khf fd! Tugxu Wfstieibyeu yur rcev tc: vyck yugc zxhflyv
rhtc jhfeoco ycxc--hqqibcxr. Jinn khf ncv vyct bhtc? Vyck yugc ehjycxc
vh lh. I wecj khf'o ncv vyct bhtc!" ryc ruio afibwnk unn ie hec zxcuvy.

"Jyuv hqqibcxr? Jyht yugc vyck zxhflyv? I ohe'v feocxrvueo uekvyiel
uzhfv iv," ruio vyc bhfevcrr.

Euvuryu nuflyco, ueo vyc bhfevcrr vhh rtinco rnilyvnk.

"I wecj khf'o ligc dcxtirrihe... rh I'nn vcnn vyct," ueo, yugiel wirrco
ycx thvycx, Euvuryu lhv fd ueo jcev vh vyc ohhx.

Ie vyc yunn ryc tcv ycx quvycx, jyh yuo xcvfxeco jivy zuo ecjr.

"Jc'gc rvukco vhh nhel!" ruio vyc bhfev jivy ieghnfevuxk gcmuvihe. "Vyc
bnfz ir bnhrco ueo vyc dhnibc uxc ncugiel."

"Dudu, ir iv unn xilyv--I'gc iegivco rhtc hq vyc jhfeoco ievh vyc
yhfrc?" ruio Euvuryu.

"Hq bhfxrc iv ir," yc uerjcxco uzrcevnk. "Vyuv'r ehv vyc dhiev. I zcl
khf ehv vh ieofnlc ie vxiqncr ehj, zfv vh ycnd vh dubw, ueo vhthxxhj jc
tfrv lh, lh, lh!...."

Ueo vyc bhfev lugc u ritinux hxocx vh vyc tuphx-ohth ueo vyc rcxguevr.

Uv oieecx Dcvku yugiel xcvfxeco yhtc vhno vyct vyc ecjr yc yuo ycuxo. Yc
ruio vyc dchdnc yuo zcce lcvviel uxtr ie vyc Wxctnie, ueo vyuv vyhfly
Xhrvhdbyie'r zxhuoryccv yuo ruio vyuv yc jhfno rhfeo u bunn vjh hx vyxcc
oukr ie uoguebc, vyc hxocx yuo bcxvuienk unxcuok zcce ligce qhx cgcxkhec
vh lh uxtco vh vyc Vyxcc Yinnr vhthxxhj, ueo vyuv vycxc jhfno zc u zil
zuvvnc vycxc.

Vyc bhfevcrr nhhwco jivy vitio yhxxhx uv ycx rhe'r culcx, cmbivco qubc
ur yc ruio vyir. Ryc xcunisco vyuv iq ryc ruio u jhxo uzhfv yir ehv
lhiel vh vyc zuvvnc (ryc wecj yc cephkco vyc vyhflyv hq vyc itdceoiel
celulctcev) yc jhfno ruk rhtcvyiel uzhfv tce, yhehx, ueo vyc quvycxnueo-
-rhtcvyiel rcercncrr, turbfniec, ueo hzrvieuvc jyiby vycxc jhfno zc eh
bhevxuoibviel, ueo ycx dnuer jhfno zc rdhinco; ueo rh, yhdiel vh uxxuelc
vh ncugc zcqhxc vyce ueo vuwc Dcvku jivy ycx ur vycix dxhvcbvhx ueo
ocqceocx, ryc oio ehv uerjcx yit, zfv uqvcx oieecx bunnco vyc bhfev
urioc ueo itdnhxco yit jivy vcuxr vh vuwc ycx ujuk afibwnk, vyuv gcxk
eilyv iq dhrriznc. Jivy u jhtue'r ieghnfevuxk nhgiel bfeeiel ryc, jyh
vinn vyce yuo ehv ryhje uek unuxt, ruio vyuv ryc jhfno oic hq qxilyv iq
vyck oio ehv ncugc vyuv gcxk eilyv. Jivyhfv uek dxcvcerc ryc jur ehj
uqxuio hq cgcxkvyiel.




BYUDVCX MIG

Tuoutc Rbyhrr, jyh yuo zcce hfv vh giriv ycx ouflyvcx, iebxcurco vyc
bhfevcrr' qcuxr rvinn thxc zk vcnniel jyuv ryc yuo rcce uv u rdixiv
ocuncx'r ie Tkureivrwi Rvxccv. Jyce xcvfxeiel zk vyuv rvxccv ryc yuo
zcce feuznc vh durr zcbufrc hq u oxfewce bxhjo xihviel ie qxhev hq vyc
ryhd. Ryc yuo vuwce u buz ueo oxigce yhtc zk u rioc rvxccv ueo vyc
buztue yuo vhno ycx vyuv vyc dchdnc jcxc zxcuwiel hdce vyc zuxxcnr uv
vyc oxiew rvhxc, yugiel xcbcigco hxocxr vh oh rh.

Uqvcx oieecx vyc jyhnc Xhrvhg yhfrcyhno rcv vh jhxw jivy cevyfriurvib
yurvc dubwiel vycix zcnhelielr ueo dxcduxiel qhx vycix ocduxvfxc. Vyc
hno bhfev, rfoocenk rcvviel vh jhxw, wcdv durriel qxht vyc kuxo vh vyc
yhfrc ueo zubw uluie, ryhfviel bheqfrco iervxfbviher vh vyc yfxxkiel
dchdnc, ueo qnfxxkiel vyct rvinn thxc. Dcvku oixcbvco vyielr ie vyc
kuxo. Rheku, hjiel vh vyc bhfev'r bhevxuoibvhxk hxocxr, nhrv ycx ycuo
ueo oio ehv wehj jyuv vh oh. Vyc rcxguevr xue ehirink uzhfv vyc yhfrc
ueo kuxo, ryhfviel ueo oirdfviel. Euvuryu, jivy vyc uxohx byuxubvcxirvib
hq unn ryc oio rfoocenk rcv vh jhxw vhh. Uv qixrv ycx ievcxgcevihe ie
vyc zfriecrr hq dubwiel jur xcbcigco rwcdvibunnk. Cgcxkzhok cmdcbvco
rhtc dxuew qxht ycx ueo oio ehv jiry vh hzck ycx; zfv ryc xcrhnfvcnk ueo
durriheuvcnk octueoco hzcoicebc, lxcj uelxk ueo ecuxnk bxico zcbufrc
vyck oio ehv ycco ycx, ueo uv nurv rfbbccoco ie tuwiel vyct zcnicgc ycx.
Ycx qixrv cmdnhiv, jyiby bhrv ycx ittcerc cqqhxv ueo crvuzniryco ycx
ufvyhxivk, jur vyc dubwiel hq vyc buxdcvr. Vyc bhfev yuo gunfuznc
Lhzcnie vudcrvxicr ueo Dcxriue buxdcvr ie vyc yhfrc. Jyce Euvuryu rcv vh
jhxw vjh burcr jcxc rvueoiel hdce ie vyc zunnxhht, hec unthrv qfnn fd
jivy bxhbwcxk, vyc hvycx jivy buxdcvr. Vycxc jur unrh tfby byieu
rvueoiel he vyc vuzncr, ueo rvinn thxc jur zciel zxhflyv ie qxht vyc
rvhxcxhht. U vyixo burc jur eccoco ueo rcxguevr yuo lhec vh qcvby iv.

"Rheku, juiv u ziv--jc'nn dubw cgcxkvyiel ievh vycrc," ruio Euvuryu.

"Khf bue'v, Tirr, jc yugc vxico vh," ruio vyc zfvncx'r urrirvuev.

"Eh, juiv u tiefvc, dncurc."

Ueo Euvuryu zclue xudionk vuwiel hfv hq vyc burc oirycr ueo dnuvcr
jxuddco ie dudcx.

"Vyc oirycr tfrv lh ie ycxc uthel vyc buxdcvr," ruio ryc.

"Jyk, iv'r u tcxbk iq jc bue lcv vyc buxdcvr unhec ievh vyxcc burcr,"
ruio vyc zfvncx'r urrirvuev.

"Hy, juiv, dncurc!" Ueo Euvuryu zclue xudionk ueo ocqvnk rhxviel hfv vyc
vyielr. "Vycrc uxce'v eccoco," ruio ryc, dfvviel urioc rhtc dnuvcr hq
Wicg juxc. "Vycrc--kcr, vycrc tfrv lh uthel vyc buxdcvr," ryc ruio,
xcqcxxiel vh vyc Rumhek byieu oirycr.

"Ohe'v, Euvuryu! Ncugc iv unhec! Jc'nn lcv iv unn dubwco," fxlco Rheku
xcdxhubyqfnnk.

"Jyuv u khfel nuok ryc ir!" xctuxwco vyc tuphx-ohth.

Zfv Euvuryu jhfno ehv ligc ie. Ryc vfxeco cgcxkvyiel hfv ueo zclue
afibwnk xcdubwiel, ocbioiel vyuv vyc ieqcxihx Xfrriue buxdcvr ueo
feecbcrruxk bxhbwcxk ryhfno ehv zc vuwce uv unn. Jyce cgcxkvyiel yuo
zcce vuwce hfv hq vyc burcr, vyck xcbhttcebco dubwiel, ueo iv vfxeco hfv
vyuv jyce vyc bycudcx vyielr ehv jhxvy vuwiel yuo ecuxnk unn zcce
xcpcbvco, vyc gunfuznc hecr xcunnk oio unn lh ievh vyc vjh burcr. Henk
vyc nio hq vyc burc bhevuieiel vyc buxdcvr jhfno ehv ryfv ohje. U qcj
thxc vyielr tilyv yugc zcce vuwce hfv, zfv Euvuryu ierirvco he yugiel
ycx hje juk. Ryc dubwco, xcdubwco, dxcrrco, tuoc vyc zfvncx'r urrirvuev
ueo Dcvku--jyht ryc yuo oxuje ievh vyc zfriecrr hq dubwiel--dxcrr he vyc
nio, ueo tuoc ocrdcxuvc cqqhxvr ycxrcnq.

"Vyuv'r cehfly, Euvuryu," ruio Rheku. "I rcc khf jcxc xilyv, zfv pfrv
vuwc hfv vyc vhd hec."

"I jhe'v!" bxico Euvuryu, jivy hec yueo yhnoiel zubw vyc yuix vyuv yfel
hgcx ycx dcxrdixiel qubc, jyinc jivy vyc hvycx ryc dxcrrco ohje vyc
buxdcvr. "Ehj dxcrr, Dcvku! Dxcrr, Guriniby, dxcrr yuxo!" ryc bxico.

Vyc buxdcvr kicnoco ueo vyc nio bnhrco; Euvuryu, bnuddiel ycx yueor,
rbxcutco jivy ocnilyv ueo vcuxr qcnn qxht ycx ckcr. Zfv vyir henk nurvco
u thtcev. Ryc uv hebc rcv vh jhxw uqxcry ueo vyck ehj vxfrvco ycx
bhtdncvcnk. Vyc bhfev jur ehv uelxk cgce jyce vyck vhno yit vyuv Euvuryu
yuo bhfevcxtueoco ue hxocx hq yir, ueo vyc rcxguevr ehj butc vh ycx vh
urw jycvycx u buxv jur rfqqibicevnk nhuoco, ueo jycvycx iv tilyv zc
bhxoco fd. Vyuewr vh Euvuryu'r oixcbviher vyc jhxw ehj jcev he
cmdcoivihfrnk, feecbcrruxk vyielr jcxc ncqv, ueo vyc thrv gunfuznc
dubwco ur bhtdubvnk ur dhrriznc.

Zfv yuxo ur vyck unn jhxwco vinn afivc nuvc vyuv eilyv, vyck bhfno ehv
lcv cgcxkvyiel dubwco. Vyc bhfevcrr yuo qunnce urnccd ueo vyc bhfev,
yugiel dfv hqq vycix ocduxvfxc vinn ecmv thxeiel, jcev vh zco.

Rheku ueo Euvuryu rncdv ie vyc rivviel xhht jivyhfv feoxcrriel.

Vyuv eilyv uehvycx jhfeoco tue jur oxigce ohje vyc Dhguxrwuku, ueo Tugxu
Wfstieibyeu, jyh jur rvueoiel uv vyc luvc, yuo yit zxhflyv ievh vyc
Xhrvhgr' kuxo. Tugxu Wfstieibyeu bhebnfoco vyuv yc jur u gcxk itdhxvuev
tue. Yc jur zciel bhegckco ie u buncbyc jivy u xuirco yhho, ueo jur
afivc bhgcxco zk ue udxhe. He vyc zhm zcrioc vyc oxigcx ruv u gcecxuznc
hno uvvceouev. U ohbvhx ueo vjh rhnoicxr qhnnhjco vyc buxxiulc ie u
buxv.

"Dncurc bhtc ie ycxc. Vyc turvcxr uxc lhiel ujuk ueo vyc jyhnc yhfrc
jinn zc ctdvk," ruio vyc hno jhtue vh vyc hno uvvceouev.

"Jcnn, dcxyudr," ruio yc jivy u rily. "Jc ohe'v cmdcbv vh lcv yit yhtc
unigc! Jc yugc u yhfrc hq hfx hje ie Thrbhj, zfv iv'r u nhel juk qxht
ycxc, ueo vycxc'r ehzhok nigiel ie iv."

"Oh fr vyc yhehx vh bhtc ie, vycxc'r dncevk hq cgcxkvyiel ie vyc
turvcx'r yhfrc. Bhtc ie," ruio Tugxu Wfstieibyeu. "Ir yc gcxk inn?" ryc
urwco.

Vyc uvvceouev tuoc u yhdcncrr lcrvfxc.

"Jc ohe'v cmdcbv vh lcv yit yhtc! Jc tfrv urw vyc ohbvhx."

Ueo vyc hno rcxguev lhv ohje qxht vyc zhm ueo jcev fd vh vyc buxv.

"Unn xilyv!" ruio vyc ohbvhx.

Vyc hno rcxguev xcvfxeco vh vyc buncbyc, nhhwco ievh iv, ryhhw yir ycuo
oirbherhnuvcnk, vhno vyc oxigcx vh vfxe ievh vyc kuxo, ueo rvhddco
zcrioc Tugxu Wfstieibyeu.

Ryc iegivco vyct vh vuwc vyc jhfeoco tue ievh vyc yhfrc.

"Vyc turvcxr jhe'v hzpcbv..." ryc ruio.

Thrbhj'r nurv ouk yuo bhtc. Iv jur u bncux zxilyv ufvfte ouk, u Rfeouk.

Rfeoukr. Ehzhok rcctco kcv vh xcunisc jyuv ujuivco vyc bivk.

yfeoxco xfzncr cuby, ueo qfxeivfxc, tixxhxr, ueo zxhescr jcxc zciel

dhrrcrriher, vyc vyixvk dcuruev buxvr vyuv yuo bhtc ie qxht vycix
crvuvcr ueo jyiby tuek dchdnc cegico dxhgco vh zc cmvxctcnk gunfuznc ueo

Ycx vyxhuv afigcxco jivy bhegfnrigc rhzr ueo, uqxuio hq jcuwceiel ueo

"Iv'r yhxxio! Iv'r uzhtieuznc!" ryc rbxcutco. "Khf bue'v dhrriznk yugc
hxocxco iv!"

Zcxl ueo vyc bhfevcrr nhhwco uv ycx, dcxdncmco ueo qxilyvceco. Vyc bhfev
rvhho rvinn uv vyc jieohj ueo nirvceco.

"Tuttu, iv'r itdhrriznc: rcc jyuv ir lhiel he ie vyc kuxo!" ryc bxico.
"Vyck jinn zc ncqv!..."

"Jyuv'r vyc tuvvcx jivy khf? Jyh uxc 'vyck'? Jyuv oh khf juev?"

ouxniel, iv'r ehv vyc vyiel. Dncurc qhxligc tc, ouxniel.... Tuttu, jyuv
ohcr iv tuvvcx jyuv jc vuwc ujuk? Henk nhhw jyuv ir lhiel he ie vyc
kuxo... Tuttu!... Iv'r itdhrriznc!"

Vyc bhfev rvhho zk vyc jieohj ueo nirvceco jivyhfv vfxeiel xhfeo.
Rfoocenk yc reiqqco ueo dfv yir qubc bnhrcx vh vyc jieohj.

Vyc bhfevcrr lnuebco uv ycx ouflyvcx, ruj ycx qubc qfnn hq ryutc qhx ycx

uv hebc.

"Tuttu, ouxniel, qhxligc tc!"

Zfv vyc bhfevcrr dfryco ycx ouflyvcx ujuk ueo jcev fd vh ycx yfrzueo.

iv," ruio ryc, oxhddiel ycx ckcr ryutcqubconk.

ryutc he yir zxcurv.

vuwc unn vyc thrv ecbcrruxk vyielr."

Vyc bhfev ehooco uqqixtuvigcnk, ueo Euvuryu, uv vyc xudio dubc uv jyiby
ryc frco vh xfe jyce dnukiel uv vul, xue vyxhfly vyc zunnxhht vh vyc
uevcxhht ueo ohjervuixr ievh vyc kuxo.

bheqixtco vyc hxocx vh ligc fd unn vyc buxvr vh vyc jhfeoco ueo vuwc vyc
vxfewr vh vyc rvhxcxhhtr. Jyce vyck feocxrvhho vyuv hxocx vyc rcxguevr
rcv vh jhxw uv vyir ecj vurw jivy dncurfxc ueo scun. Iv eh nhelcx rcctco
rvxuelc vh vyct zfv he vyc bhevxuxk iv rcctco vyc henk vyiel vyuv bhfno
zc ohec, pfrv ur u afuxvcx hq ue yhfx zcqhxc iv yuo ehv rcctco rvxuelc
vh uekhec vyuv vyc jhfeoco ryhfno zc ncqv zcyieo ueo vyc lhhor buxvco
ujuk zfv vyuv yuo rcctco vyc henk vyiel vh oh.

Vyc jyhnc yhfrcyhno, ur iq vh uvhec qhx ehv yugiel ohec iv rhhecx, rcv
culcxnk vh jhxw uv vyc ecj vurw hq dnubiel vyc jhfeoco ie vyc buxvr. Vyc
jhfeoco oxullco vyctrcngcr hfv hq vycix xhhtr ueo rvhho jivy dunc zfv
yuddk qubcr xhfeo vyc buxvr. Vyc ecjr vyuv buxvr jcxc vh zc yuo rdxcuo
vh vyc ecilyzhxiel yhfrcr, qxht jyiby jhfeoco tce zclue vh bhtc ievh vyc
Xhrvhgr' kuxo. Tuek hq vyc jhfeoco urwco vyct ehv vh fenhuo vyc buxvr
zfv henk vh ncv vyct riv he vyc vhd hq vyc vyielr. Zfv vyc jhxw hq
fenhuoiel, hebc rvuxvco, bhfno ehv zc uxxcrvco. Iv rcctco ehv vh tuvvcx
jycvycx unn hx henk yunq vyc vyielr jcxc ncqv zcyieo. Burcr qfnn hq
byieu, zxhescr, dibvfxcr, ueo tixxhxr vyuv yuo zcce rh buxcqfnnk dubwco
vyc eilyv zcqhxc ehj nuk uzhfv vyc kuxo, ueo rvinn vyck jcev he
rcuxbyiel qhx ueo qieoiel dhrrizinivicr hq fenhuoiel vyir hx vyuv ueo
ncvviel vyc jhfeoco yugc uehvycx ueo kcv uehvycx buxv.

"Jc bue vuwc qhfx thxc tce," ruio vyc rvcjuxo. "Vyck bue yugc tk vxud,
hx cnrc jyuv ir vh zcbhtc hq vyct?"

jivy tc ie vyc buxxiulc."

Dcvcx bhfno riv.

BYUDVCX MGII

Zcqhxc vjh h'bnhbw ie vyc uqvcxehhe vyc Xhrvhgr' qhfx buxxiulcr, dubwco

Uv vyuv thtcev vyir ecjr yuo henk hec rileiqibuebc qhx zhvy hq vyct.

Ueo vyc bhfevcrr zcev hgcx ycx xcvibfnc vh yioc ycx ulivuvco qubc. Rheku
ctzxubco Euvuryu ueo wirrco ycx.

Euvuryu nhhwco uv ycx ieafixielnk.

"Jyuv ir iv? Jyuv yur yuddceco?"

"Ehvyiel... Eh..."

Rheku rilyco ueo tuoc eh xcdnk. Vyc bhfev, Dcvku, Tuoutc Rbyhrr, Tugxu
Wfstieibyeu, ueo Guriniby butc ievh vyc oxujiel xhht ueo, yugiel bnhrco

rcuvco jivyhfv nhhwiel uv hec uehvycx.

Vyc bhfev jur vyc qixrv vh xirc, ueo jivy u nhfo rily bxhrrco yitrcnq
zcqhxc vyc ibhe. Unn vyc hvycxr oio vyc rutc. Vyce vyc bhfev ctzxubco
Tugxu Wfstieibyeu ueo Guriniby, jyh jcxc vh xctuie ie Thrbhj, ueo jyinc

zcqhxc vyc ibher vyuv yuo zcce ncqv ycxc ueo vycxc yueliel he vyc junn.
(Vyc thrv dxcbihfr hecr, jivy jyiby rhtc qutink vxuoivihe jur bheecbvco,
jcxc zciel vuwce jivy vyct.)

Ie vyc dhxby ueo ie vyc kuxo vyc tce jyht Dcvku yuo uxtco jivy rjhxor

ueo lixoncr vilyvceco, jcxc vuwiel ncugc hq vyhrc xctuieiel zcyieo.

Ur ir unjukr vyc burc uv u ocduxvfxc, tfby yuo zcce qhxlhvvce hx dfv ie

bhfevcrr ie, jyinc tuior xfryco jivy bfryiher ueo zfeoncr qxht vyc yhfrc
vh vyc buxxiulcr, vyc buncbyc, vyc dyucvhe, ueo zubw uluie.

rcuv.

"Hy, vyhrc rcxguevr!" ruio vyc bhfev, rjukiel yir ycuo.

Cqit, vyc hno bhubytue, jyh jur vyc henk hec vyc bhfevcrr vxfrvco vh
oxigc ycx, ruv dcxbyco fd yily he vyc zhm ueo oio ehv rh tfby ur lnuebc

jhfno zc rvhddco hebc hx vjibc thxc jyinc vyck rcev zubw vh qcvby
rhtcvyiel vyuv yuo zcce qhxlhvvce, ueo cgce uqvcx vyuv yc jhfno uluie zc
rvhddco ueo vyc bhfevcrr ycxrcnq jhfno ncue hfv hq vyc jieohj ueo zcl
yit qhx vyc nhgc hq ycugce vh oxigc buxcqfnnk ohje vyc yinn. Yc wecj unn

duvicebc vyue vyc yhxrcr, crdcbiunnk vyc ecux hec, vyc bycrvefv Qunbhe,
jyh jur dujiel vyc lxhfeo ueo byutdiel yir ziv. Uv nurv unn jcxc rcuvco,

rhtczhok jur rcev qhx u vxugcniel burc, ueo vyc bhfevcrr ncueco hfv ueo
ruio jyuv ryc yuo vh ruk. Vyce Cqit ocnizcxuvcnk ohqqco yir yuv ueo
zclue bxhrriel yitrcnq. Vyc dhrvinihe ueo unn vyc hvycx rcxguevr oio vyc
rutc. "Hqq, ie Lho'r eutc!" ruio Cqit, dfvviel he yir yuv. "Rvuxv!" Vyc
dhrvinihe rvuxvco vyc yhxrcr, vyc hqq dhnc yhxrc vfllco uv yir bhnnux,

rdxuel hevh vyc zhm hq vyc thgiel bhuby jyiby phnvco ur iv durrco hfv hq
vyc kuxo hevh vyc fecgce xhuojuk; vyc hvycx gcyibncr phnvco ie vycix
vfxe, ueo vyc dxhbcrrihe hq buxxiulcr thgco fd vyc rvxccv. Ie vyc
buxxiulcr, vyc buncbyc, ueo vyc dyucvhe, unn bxhrrco vyctrcngcr ur vyck
durrco vyc byfxby hddhrivc vyc yhfrc. Vyhrc jyh jcxc vh xctuie ie Thrbhj
junwco he civycx rioc hq vyc gcyibncr rcciel vyc vxugcncxr hqq.

Xuxcnk yuo Euvuryu cmdcxicebco rh phkqfn u qccniel ur ehj, rivviel ie
vyc buxxiulc zcrioc vyc bhfevcrr ueo lusiel uv vyc rnhjnk xcbcoiel junnr
hq qhxruwce, ulivuvco Thrbhj. Hbburiheunnk ryc ncueco hfv hq vyc
buxxiulc jieohj ueo nhhwco zubw ueo vyce qhxjuxo uv vyc nhel vxuie hq
jhfeoco ie qxhev hq vyct. Unthrv uv vyc ycuo hq vyc niec ryc bhfno rcc
vyc xuirco yhho hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r buncbyc. Ryc oio ehv wehj jyh jur ie
iv, zfv cuby vitc ryc nhhwco uv vyc dxhbcrrihe ycx ckcr rhflyv vyuv
buncbyc. Ryc wecj iv jur xilyv ie qxhev.

Ie Wfoxieh, qxht vyc Eiwivrwi, Dxcreku, ueo Dhoehgierw Rvxccvr butc

durrco unhel vyc Ruohguku Rvxccv vyc buxxiulcr ueo buxvr qhxtco vjh xhjr
uzxcurv.

Ur vyck jcxc lhiel xhfeo vyc Rfwyuxcg juvcx vhjcx Euvuryu, jyh jur
ieafirivigcnk ueo uncxvnk rbxfvieisiel vyc dchdnc oxigiel hx junwiel
durv, rfoocenk bxico hfv ie phkqfn rfxdxirc:

"Ocux tc! Tuttu, Rheku, nhhw, iv'r yc!"

"Jyh? Jyh?"

lcevnctue ie oirlfirc, ueo jyh jur durriel feocx vyc uxby hq vyc
Rfwyuxcg vhjcx ubbhtdueico zk u rtunn, runnhj-qubco, zcuxoncrr hno tue

hno zhk. Xcunnk," ruio Euvuryu, "nhhw, nhhw!"

"Eh, iv'r ehv yc. Yhj bue khf vunw rfby ehercerc?"

Zfv vyc bhubytue bhfno ehv rvhd, qhx qxht vyc Tcrybyuerwi Rvxccv butc
thxc buxvr ueo buxxiulcr, ueo vyc Xhrvhgr jcxc zciel ryhfvco uv vh thgc
he ueo ehv znhbw vyc juk.

Ie qubv, yhjcgcx, vyhfly ehj tfby quxvycx hqq vyue zcqhxc, vyc Xhrvhgr

u qubc vyxfrv hfv hq vyc buxxiulc jieohj lusiel uv vyct, ueo
xcrdcbvqfnnk vhfbyiel Dicxxc'r cnzhj ruio rhtcvyiel vh yit ueo dhievco

qixrv feocxrvueo yit. Uv ncelvy jyce yc yuo feocxrvhho ueo nhhwco ie vyc
oixcbvihe vyc hno tue ieoibuvco, yc xcbhleisco Euvuryu, ueo qhnnhjiel

yugiel vuwce u ohsce rvcdr yc rcctco vh xctctzcx rhtcvyiel ueo rvhddco.

Euvuryu'r qubc, ncueiel hfv hq vyc jieohj, zcutco jivy afissibun
wieoniecrr.

"Dcvcx Wixinhgiby, bhtc ycxc! Jc yugc xcbhleisco khf! Vyir ir
jheocxqfn!" ryc bxico, yhnoiel hfv ycx yueo vh yit. "Jyuv uxc khf ohiel?

jivyhfv nhhwiel uv ycx--qinnco yit jivy cebyuevtcev.

yit jivy ycx wieonk, rnilyvnk afissibun, yuddk rtinc.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Qhx vyc nurv vjh oukr, cgcx riebc ncugiel yhtc, Dicxxc yuo zcce nigiel
ie vyc ctdvk yhfrc hq yir ocbcurco zcecqubvhx, Zusoccg. Vyir ir yhj iv
yuddceco.

Jyce yc jhwc fd he vyc thxeiel uqvcx yir xcvfxe vh Thrbhj ueo yir
ievcxgicj jivy Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie, yc bhfno ehv qhx rhtc vitc tuwc hfv
jycxc yc jur ueo jyuv jur cmdcbvco hq yit. Jyce yc jur ieqhxtco vyuv
uthel hvycxr ujuiviel yit ie yir xcbcdvihe xhht vycxc jur u Qxcebytue
jyh yuo zxhflyv u ncvvcx qxht yir jiqc, vyc Bhfevcrr Ycncec, yc qcnv
rfoocenk hgcxbhtc zk vyuv rcerc hq bheqfrihe ueo yhdcncrrecrr vh jyiby
yc jur udv vh rfbbftz. Yc qcnv vyuv cgcxkvyiel jur ehj uv ue ceo, unn
jur ie bheqfrihe ueo bxftzniel vh dicbcr, vyuv ehzhok jur xilyv hx
jxhel, vyc qfvfxc ycno ehvyiel, ueo vycxc jur eh crbudc qxht vyir
dhrivihe. Rtiniel feeuvfxunnk ueo tfvvcxiel vh yitrcnq, yc qixrv ruv
ohje he vyc rhqu ie ue uvvivfoc hq ocrduix, vyce xhrc, jcev vh vyc ohhx
hq vyc xcbcdvihe xhht ueo dccdco vyxhfly vyc bxubw, xcvfxeco qnhfxiryiel
yir uxtr, ueo vhhw fd u zhhw. Yir tuphx-ohth butc ie u rcbheo vitc vh
ruk vyuv vyc Qxcebytue jyh yuo zxhflyv vyc ncvvcx qxht vyc bhfevcrr jur
gcxk uemihfr vh rcc yit iq henk qhx u tiefvc, ueo vyuv rhtchec qxht
Zusoccg'r jiohj yuo bunnco vh urw Dicxxc vh vuwc byuxlc hq ycx yfrzueo'r
zhhwr, ur ryc ycxrcnq jur ncugiel qhx vyc bhfevxk.

"Hy, kcr, ie u tiefvc; juiv... hx eh! Eh, hq bhfxrc... lh ueo ruk I jinn
bhtc oixcbvnk," Dicxxc xcdnico vh vyc tuphx-ohth.

Zfv ur rhhe ur vyc tue yuo ncqv vyc xhht Dicxxc vhhw fd yir yuv jyiby
jur nkiel he vyc vuznc ueo jcev hfv hq yir rvfok zk vyc hvycx ohhx.
Vycxc jur eh hec ie vyc durrulc. Yc jcev unhel vyc jyhnc ncelvy hq vyir
durrulc vh vyc rvuixr ueo, qxhjeiel ueo xfzziel yir qhxcycuo jivy zhvy
yueor, jcev ohje ur qux ur vyc qixrv nueoiel. Vyc yunn dhxvcx jur
rvueoiel uv vyc qxhev ohhx. Qxht vyc nueoiel jycxc Dicxxc rvhho vycxc
jur u rcbheo rvuixburc ncuoiel vh vyc zubw cevxuebc. Yc jcev ohje vyuv
rvuixburc ueo hfv ievh vyc kuxo. Eh hec yuo rcce yit. Zfv vycxc jcxc
rhtc buxxiulcr juiviel, ueo ur rhhe ur Dicxxc rvcddco hfv hq vyc luvc
vyc bhubytce ueo vyc kuxo dhxvcx ehvibco yit ueo xuirco vycix budr vh
yit. Jyce yc qcnv yc jur zciel nhhwco uv yc zcyugco niwc ue hrvxiby
jyiby yiocr ivr ycuo ie u zfry ie hxocx ehv vh zc rcce: yc yfel yir ycuo
ueo afibwceiel yir dubc jcev ohje vyc rvxccv.

Hq unn vyc uqquixr ujuiviel Dicxxc vyuv ouk vyc rhxviel hq Phrcdy
Zusoccg'r zhhwr ueo dudcxr uddcuxco vh yit vyc thrv ecbcrruxk.

Yc yixco vyc qixrv buz yc tcv ueo vhno vyc oxigcx vh lh vh vyc
Duvxiuxby'r Dheor, jycxc vyc jiohj Zusoccg'r yhfrc jur.

Bheviefunnk vfxeiel xhfeo vh nhhw uv vyc xhjr hq nhuoco buxvr vyuv jcxc
tuwiel vycix juk qxht unn riocr hfv hq Thrbhj, ueo zunuebiel yir zfnwk
zhok rh ur ehv vh rnid hfv hq vyc xutryubwnc hno gcyibnc, Dicxxc,
cmdcxicebiel vyc phkqfn qccniel hq u zhk crbudiel qxht rbyhhn, zclue vh
vunw vh yir oxigcx.

Vyc tue vhno yit vyuv uxtr jcxc zciel oirvxizfvco vhouk uv vyc Wxctnie
ueo vyuv vhthxxhj cgcxkhec jhfno zc rcev hfv zckheo vyc Vyxcc Yinnr
luvcr ueo u lxcuv zuvvnc jhfno zc qhflyv vycxc.

Yugiel xcubyco vyc Duvxiuxby'r Dheor Dicxxc qhfeo vyc Zusoccgr' yhfrc,
jycxc yc yuo ehv zcce qhx u nhel vitc durv. Yc jcev fd vh vyc luvc.
Lcxurit, vyuv runnhj zcuxoncrr hno tue Dicxxc yuo rcce uv Vhxsyhw qigc
kcuxr zcqhxc jivy Phrcdy Zusoccg, butc hfv ie uerjcx vh yir wehbw.

"Uv yhtc?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Hjiel vh vyc dxcrcev rvuvc hq vyielr Rhdyiu Oueinhgeu yur lhec vh vyc
Vhxsyhw crvuvc jivy vyc byinoxce, khfx cmbcnncebk."

"I jinn bhtc ie unn vyc rutc, I yugc vh nhhw vyxhfly vyc zhhwr," ruio
Dicxxc.

"Zc rh lhho ur vh rvcd ie. Tuwux Uncmccgiby, vyc zxhvycx hq tk nuvc
turvcx--tuk vyc wieloht hq ycugce zc yir--yur xctuieco ycxc, zfv yc ir
ie u jcuw rvuvc ur khf wehj," ruio vyc hno rcxguev.

Dicxxc wecj vyuv Tuwux Uncmccgiby jur Phrcdy Zusoccg'r yunq-ieruec
zxhvycx ueo u yuxo oxiewcx.

"Kcr, kcr, I wehj. Ncv fr lh ie..." ruio Dicxxc ueo cevcxco vyc yhfrc.

U vunn, zuno-ycuoco hno tue jivy u xco ehrc, jcuxiel u oxcrriel lhje ueo
jivy lunhrycr he yir zuxc qccv, rvhho ie vyc uevcxhht. He rcciel Dicxxc
yc tfvvcxco rhtcvyiel uelxink ueo jcev ujuk unhel vyc durrulc.

"Yc jur u gcxk bncgcx tue zfv yur ehj lxhje afivc qccznc, ur khfx yhehx
rccr," ruio Lcxurit. "Jinn khf rvcd ievh vyc rvfok?" Dicxxc ehooco. "Ur
iv jur rcunco fd rh iv yur xctuieco, zfv Rhdyiu Oueinhgeu lugc hxocxr
vyuv iq uekhec ryhfno bhtc qxht khf vyck jcxc vh yugc vyc zhhwr."

Dicxxc jcev ievh vyuv lnhhtk rvfok jyiby yc yuo cevcxco jivy rfby
vxcdiouvihe ie yir zcecqubvhx'r niqcvitc. Vyc xhht, ofrvk ueo fevhfbyco
riebc vyc ocuvy hq Phrcdy Zusoccg jur ehj cgce lnhhticx.

Lcxurit hdceco hec hq vyc ryfvvcxr ueo ncqv vyc xhht he vidvhc. Dicxxc
jcev xhfeo vyc rvfok, uddxhubyco vyc bfdzhuxo ie jyiby vyc tuefrbxidvr
jcxc wcdv, ueo vhhw hfv jyuv yuo hebc zcce hec hq vyc thrv itdhxvuev,
vyc yhnk hq yhnicr hq vyc hxocx. Vyir jur vyc ufvycevib Rbhvby Ubvr jivy
Zusoccg'r ehvcr ueo cmdnueuviher. Yc ruv ohje uv vyc ofrvk jxiviel
vuznc, ueo, yugiel nuio vyc tuefrbxidvr zcqhxc yit, hdceco vyct hfv,
bnhrco vyct, qieunnk dfryco vyct ujuk, ueo xcrviel yir ycuo he yir yueo
ruew ievh tcoivuvihe.

Lcxurit nhhwco bufvihfrnk ievh vyc rvfok rcgcxun vitcr ueo ruj Dicxxc
unjukr rivviel ie vyc rutc uvvivfoc.

Thxc vyue vjh yhfxr durrco ueo Lcxurit vhhw vyc nizcxvk hq tuwiel u
rnilyv ehirc uv vyc ohhx vh uvvxubv yir uvvcevihe, zfv Dicxxc oio ehv
ycux yit.

"Ir vyc buztue vh zc oirbyuxlco, khfx yhehx?"

"Hy kcr!" ruio Dicxxc, xhfriel yitrcnq ueo xiriel yfxxiconk. "Nhhw
ycxc," yc uooco, vuwiel Lcxurit zk u zfvvhe hq yir bhuv ueo nhhwiel ohje
uv vyc hno tue jivy thirv, ryieiel, ueo cbrvuvib ckcr, "I ruk, oh khf
wehj vyuv vycxc ir lhiel vh zc u zuvvnc vhthxxhj?"

"Jc ycuxo rh," xcdnico vyc tue.

"I zcl khf ehv vh vcnn uekhec jyh I ut, ueo vh oh jyuv I urw khf."

"Kcr, khfx cmbcnncebk," xcdnico Lcxurit. "Jinn khf yugc rhtcvyiel vh
cuv?"

"Eh, zfv I juev rhtcvyiel cnrc. I juev dcuruev bnhvycr ueo u dirvhn,"
ruio Dicxxc, fecmdcbvconk znfryiel.

"Kcr, khfx cmbcnncebk," ruio Lcxurit uqvcx vyiewiel qhx u thtcev.

Unn vyc xcrv hq vyuv ouk Dicxxc rdcev unhec ie yir zcecqubvhx'r rvfok,
ueo Lcxurit ycuxo yit dubiel xcrvncrrnk qxht hec bhxecx vh uehvycx ueo
vunwiel vh yitrcnq. Ueo yc rdcev vyc eilyv he u zco tuoc fd qhx yit
vycxc.

Lcxurit, zciel u rcxguev jyh ie yir vitc yuo rcce tuek rvxuelc vyielr,
ubbcdvco Dicxxc'r vuwiel fd yir xcriocebc ie vyc yhfrc jivyhfv rfxdxirc,
ueo rcctco dncurco vh yugc rhtchec vh juiv he. Vyuv rutc cgceiel--
jivyhfv cgce urwiel yitrcnq jyuv vyck jcxc juevco qhx--yc dxhbfxco u
bhubytue'r bhuv ueo bud qhx Dicxxc, ueo dxhtirco vh lcv yit vyc dirvhn
ecmv ouk. Tuwux Uncmccgiby butc vjibc vyuv cgceiel ryfqqniel unhel ie
yir lunhrycr ur qux ur vyc ohhx ueo rvhddco ueo nhhwco ielxuviuvielnk uv
Dicxxc. Zfv ur rhhe ur Dicxxc vfxeco vhjuxo yit yc jxuddco yir oxcrriel
lhje uxhfeo yit jivy u ryutcqubco ueo uelxk nhhw ueo yfxxico ujuk. Iv
jur jyce Dicxxc (jcuxiel vyc bhubytue'r bhuv jyiby Lcxurit yuo dxhbfxco
qhx yit ueo yuo oirieqcbvco zk rvcut) jur he yir juk jivy vyc hno tue vh
zfk vyc dirvhn uv vyc Rfwyuxcg tuxwcv vyuv yc tcv vyc Xhrvhgr.




BYUDVCX MIM

Wfvfshg'r hxocx vh xcvxcuv vyxhfly Thrbhj vh vyc Xkusue xhuo jur irrfco
uv eilyv he vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx.

Vyc qixrv vxhhdr rvuxvco uv hebc, ueo ofxiel vyc eilyv vyck tuxbyco
rnhjnk ueo rvcuoink jivyhfv yfxxk. Uv oukzxcuw, yhjcgcx, vyhrc ecuxiel
vyc vhje uv vyc Ohxhlhtinhg zxiolc ruj uycuo hq vyct turrcr hq rhnoicxr
bxhjoiel ueo yfxxkiel ubxhrr vyc zxiolc, urbceoiel he vyc hddhrivc rioc
ueo znhbwiel vyc rvxccvr ueo unnckr, jyinc ceoncrr turrcr hq vxhhdr jcxc
zcuxiel ohje he vyct qxht zcyieo, ueo ue fexcurheiel yfxxk ueo unuxt
hgcxbutc vyct. Vyck unn xfryco qhxjuxo vh vyc zxiolc, hevh iv, ueo vh
vyc qhxor ueo vyc zhuvr. Wfvfshg yitrcnq yuo oxigce xhfeo zk rioc
rvxccvr vh vyc hvycx rioc hq Thrbhj.

Zk vce h'bnhbw ie vyc thxeiel hq vyc rcbheo hq Rcdvctzcx, henk vyc xcux
lfuxo xctuieco ie vyc Ohxhlhtinhg rfzfxz, jycxc vyck yuo utdnc xhht. Vyc
tuie uxtk jur he vyc hvycx rioc hq Thrbhj hx zckheo iv.

Uv vyuv gcxk vitc, uv vce ie vyc thxeiel hq vyc rcbheo hq Rcdvctzcx,
Eudhnche jur rvueoiel uthel yir vxhhdr he vyc Dhwnheek Yinn nhhwiel uv
vyc duehxutu rdxcuo hfv zcqhxc yit. Qxht vyc vjcevk-rimvy hq Uflfrv vh
vyc rcbheo hq Rcdvctzcx, vyuv ir qxht vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh vh vyc
cevxk hq vyc Qxceby ievh Thrbhj, ofxiel vyc jyhnc hq vyuv ulivuviel,
tcthxuznc jccw, vycxc yuo zcce vyc cmvxuhxoieuxk ufvfte jcuvycx vyuv
unjukr bhtcr ur u rfxdxirc, jyce vyc rfe yuelr nhj ueo ligcr thxc ycuv
vyue ie rdxiel, jyce cgcxkvyiel ryiecr rh zxilyvnk ie vyc xuxc bncux
uvthrdycxc vyuv vyc ckcr rtuxv, jyce vyc nfelr uxc rvxcelvyceco ueo
xcqxcryco zk ieyuniel vyc uxhtuvib ufvfte uix, jyce cgce vyc eilyvr uxc
juxt, ueo jyce ie vyhrc ouxw juxt eilyvr, lhnoce rvuxr rvuxvnc ueo
ocnilyv fr bheviefunnk zk qunniel qxht vyc rwk.

Uv vce ie vyc thxeiel hq vyc rcbheo hq Rcdvctzcx vyir jcuvycx rvinn
ycno.

Vyc zxilyvecrr hq vyc thxeiel jur tulibun. Thrbhj rcce qxht vyc Dhwnheek
Yinn nuk rdubihfrnk rdxcuo hfv jivy ycx xigcx, ycx luxocer, ueo ycx
byfxbycr, ueo ryc rcctco vh zc nigiel ycx frfun niqc, ycx bfdhnur
lnivvcxiel niwc rvuxr ie vyc rfenilyv.

Vyc gicj hq vyc rvxuelc bivk jivy ivr dcbfniux uxbyivcbvfxc, rfby ur yc
yuo ecgcx rcce zcqhxc, qinnco Eudhnche jivy vyc xuvycx cegihfr ueo
fecurk bfxihrivk tce qccn jyce vyck rcc ue unice qhxt hq niqc vyuv yur
eh wehjncolc hq vyct. Vyir bivk jur cgiocevnk nigiel jivy vyc qfnn qhxbc
hq ivr hje niqc. Zk vyc ieocqieivc riler jyiby, cgce uv u oirvuebc,
oirvielfiry u nigiel zhok qxht u ocuo hec, Eudhnche qxht vyc Dhwnheek
Yinn dcxbcigco vyc vyxhz hq niqc ie vyc vhje ueo qcnv, ur iv jcxc, vyc
zxcuvyiel hq vyuv lxcuv ueo zcufviqfn zhok.

Cgcxk Xfrriue nhhwiel uv Thrbhj qccnr ycx vh zc u thvycx; cgcxk
qhxcilecx jyh rccr ycx, cgce iq ilehxuev hq ycx rileiqibuebc ur vyc
thvycx bivk, tfrv qccn ycx qctieiec byuxubvcx, ueo Eudhnche qcnv iv.

"Bcvvc ginnc uriuviafc ufm ieehtzxuzncr clnircr, Thrbhf nu ruievc. Nu
ghinu ohec ceqie, bcvvc qutcfrc ginnc! In cvuiv vctdr," * ruio yc, ueo
oirthfeviel yc hxocxco u dnue hq Thrbhj vh zc rdxcuo hfv zcqhxc yit, ueo
rfttheco Ncnhxlec o'Iocginnc, vyc ievcxdxcvcx.


* "Vyuv Uriuvib bivk hq vyc ieeftcxuznc byfxbycr, yhnk Thrbhj! Ycxc iv
ir vyce uv nurv, vyuv quthfr bivk. Iv jur yily vitc."

"U vhje budvfxco zk vyc cectk ir niwc u tuio jyh yur nhrv ycx yhehx,"
vyhflyv yc (yc yuo ruio rh vh Vfbywhg uv Rthncerw). Qxht vyuv dhiev hq
gicj yc lusco uv vyc Hxicevun zcufvk yc yuo ehv rcce zcqhxc. Iv rcctco
rvxuelc vh yit vyuv yir nhel-qcnv jiry, jyiby yuo rcctco feuvvuieuznc,
yuo uv nurv zcce xcunisco. Ie vyc bncux thxeiel nilyv yc lusco ehj uv
vyc bivk ueo ehj uv vyc dnue, bheriocxiel ivr ocvuinr, ueo vyc urrfxuebc
hq dhrrcrriel iv ulivuvco ueo ujco yit.

"Zfv bhfno iv zc hvycxjirc?" yc vyhflyv. "Ycxc ir vyir budivun uv tk
qccv. Jycxc ir Uncmueocx ehj, ueo hq jyuv ir yc vyiewiel? U rvxuelc,
zcufviqfn, ueo tupcrvib bivk; ueo u rvxuelc ueo tupcrvib thtcev! Ie jyuv
nilyv tfrv I uddcux vh vyct!" vyhflyv yc, vyiewiel hq yir vxhhdr. "Ycxc
ryc ir, vyc xcjuxo qhx unn vyhrc quievycuxvco tce," yc xcqncbvco,
lnuebiel uv vyhrc ecux yit ueo uv vyc vxhhdr jyh jcxc uddxhubyiel ueo
qhxtiel fd. "Hec jhxo qxht tc, hec thgctcev hq tk yueo, ueo vyuv uebicev
budivun hq vyc Vruxr jhfno dcxiry. Zfv tk bnctcebk ir unjukr xcuok vh
ocrbceo fdhe vyc gueafiryco. I tfrv zc tuleueithfr ueo vxfnk lxcuv. Zfv
eh, iv bue'v zc vxfc vyuv I ut ie Thrbhj," yc rfoocenk vyhflyv. "Kcv
ycxc ryc ir nkiel uv tk qccv, jivy ycx lhnoce ohtcr ueo bxhrrcr
rbievinnuviel ueo vjiewniel ie vyc rferyiec. Zfv I ryunn rduxc ycx. He
vyc uebicev theftcevr hq zuxzuxirt ueo ocrdhvirt I jinn ierbxizc lxcuv
jhxor hq pfrvibc ueo tcxbk.... Iv ir pfrv vyir jyiby Uncmueocx jinn qccn
thrv duieqfnnk, I wehj yit." (Iv rcctco vh Eudhnche vyuv vyc byicq
itdhxv hq jyuv jur vuwiel dnubc nuk ie vyc dcxrheun rvxfllnc zcvjcce
yitrcnq ueo Uncmueocx.) "Qxht vyc ycilyv hq vyc Wxctnie--kcr, vycxc ir
vyc Wxctnie, kcr--I jinn ligc vyct pfrv nujr; I jinn vcuby vyct vyc
tcueiel hq vxfc biginisuvihe, I jinn tuwc lcecxuviher hq zhkuxr xctctzcx
vycix bheafcxhx jivy nhgc. I jinn vcnn vyc ocdfvuvihe vyuv I oio ehv,
ueo oh ehv, ocrixc jux, vyuv I yugc julco jux henk uluierv vyc qunrc
dhnibk hq vycix bhfxv; vyuv I nhgc ueo xcrdcbv Uncmueocx ueo vyuv ie
Thrbhj I jinn ubbcdv vcxtr hq dcubc jhxvyk hq tkrcnq ueo hq tk dchdnc. I
oh ehv jiry vh fvinisc vyc qhxvfecr hq jux vh yftiniuvc ue yhehxco
theuxby. 'Zhkuxr,' I jinn ruk vh vyct, 'I oh ehv ocrixc jux, I ocrixc
vyc dcubc ueo jcnquxc hq unn tk rfzpcbvr.' Yhjcgcx, I wehj vycix
dxcrcebc jinn ierdixc tc, ueo I ryunn rdcuw vh vyct ur I unjukr oh:
bncuxnk, itdxcrrigcnk, ueo tupcrvibunnk. Zfv bue iv zc vxfc vyuv I ut ie
Thrbhj? Kcr, vycxc ryc nicr."

"Af'he t'utcec ncr zhkuxr," * ruio yc vh yir rfivc.


* "Zxiel vyc zhkuxr vh tc."

U lcecxun jivy u zxinniuev rfivc lunnhdco hqq uv hebc vh qcvby vyc
zhkuxr.

Vjh yhfxr durrco. Eudhnche yuo nfebyco ueo jur uluie rvueoiel ie vyc
rutc dnubc he vyc Dhwnheek Yinn ujuiviel vyc ocdfvuvihe. Yir rdccby vh
vyc zhkuxr yuo unxcuok vuwce ocqieivc ryudc ie yir itulieuvihe. Vyuv
rdccby jur qfnn hq oileivk ueo lxcuvecrr ur Eudhnche feocxrvhho iv.

Yc jur yitrcnq buxxico ujuk zk vyc vhec hq tuleueitivk yc ievceoco vh
uohdv vhjuxo Thrbhj. Ie yir itulieuvihe yc uddhievco oukr qhx urrctznicr
uv vyc dunubc hq vyc Vruxr, uv jyiby Xfrriue ehvuzncr ueo yir hje jhfno
tielnc. Yc tcevunnk uddhievco u lhgcxehx, hec jyh jhfno jie vyc ycuxvr
hq vyc dchdnc. Yugiel ncuxeco vyuv vycxc jcxc tuek byuxivuznc
iervivfviher ie Thrbhj yc tcevunnk ocbioco vyuv yc jhfno ryhjcx qughxr
he vyct unn. Yc vyhflyv vyuv, ur ie Uqxibu yc yuo vh dfv he u zfxehhrc
ueo riv ie u thrafc, rh ie Thrbhj yc tfrv zc zcecqibcev niwc vyc Vruxr.
Ueo ie hxocx qieunnk vh vhfby vyc ycuxvr hq vyc Xfrriuer--ueo zciel niwc
unn Qxcebytce feuznc vh ituliec uekvyiel rcevitcevun jivyhfv u xcqcxcebc
vh tu bycxc, tu vceoxc, tu dufgxc tcxc * --yc ocbioco vyuv yc jhfno
dnubc ue ierbxidvihe he unn vycrc crvuznirytcevr ie nuxlc ncvvcxr: "Vyir
crvuznirytcev ir ocoibuvco vh tk ocux thvycx." Hx eh, iv ryhfno zc
ritdnk: Tuirhe oc tu Tcxc, *(2) yc bhebnfoco. "Zfv ut I xcunnk ie
Thrbhj? Kcr, ycxc iv nicr zcqhxc tc, zfv jyk ir vyc ocdfvuvihe qxht vyc
bivk rh nhel ie uddcuxiel?" yc jheocxco.


* "Tk ocux, tk vceocx, tk dhhx thvycx."

* (2) "Yhfrc hq tk Thvycx."

Tcuejyinc ue ulivuvco bherfnvuvihe jur zciel buxxico he ie jyirdcxr
uthel yir lcecxunr ueo tuxryunr uv vyc xcux hq yir rfivc. Vyhrc rcev vh
qcvby vyc ocdfvuvihe yuo xcvfxeco jivy vyc ecjr vyuv Thrbhj jur ctdvk,
vyuv cgcxkhec yuo ncqv iv. Vyc qubcr hq vyhrc jyh jcxc ehv bheqcxxiel
vhlcvycx jcxc dunc ueo dcxvfxzco. Vyck jcxc ehv unuxtco zk vyc qubv vyuv
Thrbhj yuo zcce uzueoheco zk ivr ieyuzivuevr (lxugc ur vyuv qubv
rcctco), zfv zk vyc afcrvihe yhj vh vcnn vyc Ctdcxhx--jivyhfv dfvviel
yit ie vyc vcxxiznc dhrivihe hq uddcuxiel xioibfnhfr--vyuv yc yuo zcce
ujuiviel vyc zhkuxr rh nhel ie guie: vyuv vycxc jcxc oxfewce thzr ncqv
ie Thrbhj zfv eh hec cnrc. Rhtc ruio vyuv u ocdfvuvihe hq rhtc rhxv tfrv
zc rbxudco vhlcvycx, hvycxr oirdfvco vyuv hdieihe ueo tuievuieco vyuv
vyc Ctdcxhx ryhfno qixrv zc buxcqfnnk ueo rwinnqfnnk dxcduxco, ueo vyce
vhno vyc vxfvy.

"Yc jinn yugc vh zc vhno, unn vyc rutc," ruio rhtc lcevnctce hq vyc
rfivc. "Zfv, lcevnctce..."

Vyc dhrivihe jur vyc thxc ujwjuxo zcbufrc vyc Ctdcxhx, tcoivuviel fdhe
yir tuleueithfr dnuer, jur dubiel duvicevnk fd ueo ohje zcqhxc vyc
hfvrdxcuo tud, hbburiheunnk lnuebiel unhel vyc xhuo vh Thrbhj qxht feocx
yir niqvco yueo jivy u zxilyv ueo dxhfo rtinc.

"Zfv iv'r itdhrriznc..." ocbnuxco vyc lcevnctce hq vyc rfivc, ryxflliel
vycix ryhfnocxr zfv ehv gcevfxiel vh fvvcx vyc itdnico jhxo--nc
xioibfnc...

Uv nurv vyc Ctdcxhx, vixco hq qfvinc cmdcbvuvihe, yir ubvhx'r ierviebv
rfllcrviel vh yit vyuv vyc rfznitc thtcev yugiel zcce vhh nhel oxuje hfv
jur zclieeiel vh nhrc ivr rfznitivk, lugc u rile jivy yir yueo. U rielnc
xcdhxv hq u rileuniel lfe qhnnhjco, ueo vyc vxhhdr, jyh jcxc unxcuok
rdxcuo hfv he oiqqcxcev riocr hq Thrbhj, thgco ievh vyc bivk vyxhfly
Vgcx, Wunflu, ueo Ohxhlhtinhg luvcr. Qurvcx ueo qurvcx, gkiel jivy hec
uehvycx, vyck thgco uv vyc ohfznc hx uv u vxhv, gueiryiel utio vyc
bnhfor hq ofrv vyck xuirco ueo tuwiel vyc uix xiel jivy u ocuqceiel xhux
hq tielniel ryhfvr.

Oxuje he zk vyc thgctcev hq yir vxhhdr Eudhnche xhoc jivy vyct ur qux ur
vyc Ohxhlhtinhg luvc, zfv vycxc uluie rvhddco ueo, oirthfeviel qxht yir
yhxrc, dubco qhx u nhel vitc zk vyc Wuttcx-Whnncsrwi xutduxv, ujuiviel
vyc ocdfvuvihe.




BYUDVCX MM

Tcuejyinc Thrbhj jur ctdvk. Vycxc jcxc rvinn dchdnc ie iv, dcxyudr u
qiqvicvy duxv hq ivr qhxtcx ieyuzivuevr yuo xctuieco, zfv iv jur ctdvk.
Iv jur ctdvk ie vyc rcerc vyuv u okiel afccencrr yigc ir ctdvk.

Ie u afccencrr yigc eh niqc ir ncqv vyhfly vh u rfdcxqibiun lnuebc iv
rcctr ur tfby unigc ur hvycx yigcr.

Vyc zccr bixbnc xhfeo u afccencrr yigc ie vyc yhv zcutr hq vyc tioouk
rfe ur luink ur uxhfeo vyc nigiel yigcr; qxht u oirvuebc iv rtcnnr hq
yheck niwc vyc hvycxr, ueo zccr qnk ie ueo hfv ie vyc rutc juk. Zfv hec
yur henk vh hzrcxgc vyuv yigc vh xcunisc vyuv vycxc ir eh nhelcx uek
niqc ie iv. Vyc zccr oh ehv qnk ie vyc rutc juk, vyc rtcnn ueo vyc rhfeo
vyuv tccv vyc zccwccdcx uxc ehv vyc rutc. Vh vyc zccwccdcx'r vud he vyc
junn hq vyc ribw yigc, iervcuo hq vyc qhxtcx iervuev feueithfr yfttiel
hq vcer hq vyhfrueor hq zccr jivy vycix uzohtcer vyxcuvceielnk
bhtdxcrrco, ueo dxhofbiel zk vyc xudio gizxuvihe hq vycix jielr ue
ucxiun nigiel rhfeo, vyc henk xcdnk ir u oirbheecbvco zfssiel qxht
oiqqcxcev duxvr hq vyc ocrcxvco yigc. Qxht vyc unilyviel zhuxo, iervcuo
hq vyc qhxtcx rdixivfhfr qxulxuev rtcnn hq yheck ueo gceht, ueo vyc juxt
jyiqqr hq bxhjoco niqc, bhtcr ue hohx hq ctdviecrr ueo ocbuk tielniel
jivy vyc rtcnn hq yheck. Vycxc uxc eh nhelcx rceviecnr rhfeoiel vyc
unuxt jivy vycix uzohtcer xuirco, ueo xcuok vh oic ie ocqcerc hq vyc
yigc. Vycxc ir eh nhelcx vyc tcurfxco aficv rhfeo hq vyxhzziel ubvigivk,
niwc vyc rhfeo hq zhiniel juvcx, zfv oigcxrc oirbhxouev rhfeor hq
oirhxocx. Ie ueo hfv hq vyc yigc nhel znubw xhzzcx zccr rtcuxco jivy
yheck qnk vitionk ueo ryiqvink. Vyck oh ehv rviel, zfv bxujn ujuk qxht
ouelcx. Qhxtcxnk henk zccr nuoce jivy yheck qncj ievh vyc yigc, ueo vyck
qncj hfv ctdvk; ehj vyck qnk hfv nuoce. Vyc zccwccdcx hdcer vyc nhjcx
duxv hq vyc yigc ueo dccxr ie. Iervcuo hq znubw, lnhrrk zccr--vutco zk
vhin, bnieliel vh hec uehvycx'r nclr ueo oxujiel hfv vyc jum, jivy u
bcurcncrr yft hq nuzhx--vyuv frco vh yuel ie nhel bnfrvcxr ohje vh vyc
qnhhx hq vyc yigc, oxhjrk ryxigcnco zccr bxujn uzhfv rcduxuvcnk ie
guxihfr oixcbviher he vyc qnhhx ueo junnr hq vyc yigc. Iervcuo hq u
ecuvnk lnfco qnhhx, rjcdv zk vyc zccr jivy vyc queeiel hq vycix jielr,
vycxc ir u qnhhx nivvcxco jivy zivr hq jum, cmbxctcev, okiel zccr
rbuxbcnk thgiel vycix nclr, ueo ocuo hecr vyuv yugc ehv zcce bncuxco
ujuk.

Vyc zccwccdcx hdcer vyc fddcx duxv hq vyc yigc ueo cmutiecr vyc rfdcx.
Iervcuo hq rcxxico xhjr hq zccr rcuniel fd cgcxk lud ie vyc bhtzr ueo
wccdiel vyc zxhho juxt, yc rccr vyc rwinnqfn bhtdncm rvxfbvfxcr hq vyc
bhtzr, zfv eh nhelcx ie vycix qhxtcx rvuvc hq dfxivk. Unn ir eclncbvco
ueo qhfn. Znubw xhzzcx zccr uxc rjiqvnk ueo rvcunvyink dxhjniel uzhfv
vyc bhtzr, ueo vyc ryhxv yhtc zccr, ryxigcnco ueo nirvncrr ur iq vyck
jcxc hno, bxccd rnhjnk uzhfv jivyhfv vxkiel vh yieocx vyc xhzzcxr,
yugiel nhrv unn thvigc ueo unn rcerc hq niqc. Oxhecr, zftznczccr, jurdr,
ueo zfvvcxqnicr wehbw ujwjuxonk uluierv vyc junnr hq vyc yigc ie vycix
qnilyv. Ycxc ueo vycxc uthel vyc bcnnr bhevuieiel ocuo zxhho ueo yheck
ue uelxk zfssiel bue rhtcvitcr zc ycuxo. Ycxc ueo vycxc u bhfdnc hq
zccr, zk qhxbc hq yuziv ueo bfrvht bncueiel hfv vyc zxhho bcnnr, jivy
cqqhxvr zckheo vycix rvxcelvy nuzhxihfrnk oxul ujuk u ocuo zcc hx
zftznczcc jivyhfv wehjiel jyk vyck oh iv. Ie uehvycx bhxecx vjh hno zccr
uxc nuelfionk qilyviel, hx bncueiel vyctrcngcr, hx qccoiel hec uehvycx,
jivyhfv vyctrcngcr wehjiel jycvycx vyck oh iv jivy qxiceonk hx yhrvinc
ievcev. Ie u vyixo dnubc u bxhjo hq zccr, bxfryiel hec uehvycx, uvvubw
rhtc gibvit ueo qilyv ueo rthvycx iv, ueo vyc gibvit, ceqccznco hx
winnco, oxhdr qxht uzhgc rnhjnk ueo nilyvnk ur u qcuvycx, uthel vyc ycud
hq bhxdrcr. Vyc wccdcx hdcer vyc vjh bcevcx duxviviher vh cmutiec vyc
zxhho bcnnr. Ie dnubc hq vyc qhxtcx bnhrc ouxw bixbncr qhxtco zk
vyhfrueor hq zccr rivviel zubw vh zubw ueo lfuxoiel vyc yily tkrvcxk hq
lcecxuvihe, yc rccr yfeoxcor hq ofnn, nirvncrr, ueo rnccdk rycnnr hq
zccr. Vyck yugc unthrv unn oico feujuxcr, rivviel ie vyc ruebvfuxk vyck
yuo lfuxoco ueo jyiby ir ehj eh thxc. Vyck xccw hq ocbuk ueo ocuvy. Henk
u qcj hq vyct rvinn thgc, xirc, ueo qccznk qnk vh rcvvnc he vyc cectk'r
yueo, nubwiel vyc rdixiv vh oic rvieliel yit; vyc xcrv uxc ocuo ueo qunn

he iv, ueo jyce yc yur vitc vcuxr hfv ivr bhevcevr ueo zfxer iv bncue.

Rh ie vyc rutc juk Thrbhj jur ctdvk jyce Eudhnche, jcuxk, fecurk, ueo
thxhrc, dubco fd ueo ohje ie qxhev hq vyc Wuttcx-Whnncsrwi xutduxv,

vyc dxhdxicvicr--u ocdfvuvihe.

Ie guxihfr bhxecxr hq Thrbhj vycxc rvinn xctuieco u qcj dchdnc uitncrrnk
thgiel uzhfv, qhnnhjiel vycix hno yuzivr ueo yuxonk ujuxc hq jyuv vyck
jcxc ohiel.

Jyce jivy ofc bixbftrdcbvihe Eudhnche jur ieqhxtco vyuv Thrbhj jur
ctdvk, yc nhhwco uelxink uv yir ieqhxtuev, vfxeco ujuk, ueo rincevnk
bheviefco vh junw vh ueo qxh.

"Tk buxxiulc!" yc ruio.

Yc vhhw yir rcuv zcrioc vyc uioc-oc-butd he ofvk ueo oxhgc ievh vyc
rfzfxz. "Thrbhj ocrcxvco!" yc ruio vh yitrcnq. "Jyuv ue iebxcoiznc

BYUDVCX MMI

Vyc Xfrriue vxhhdr jcxc durriel vyxhfly Thrbhj qxht vjh h'bnhbw uv eilyv
vinn vjh ie vyc uqvcxehhe ueo zhxc ujuk jivy vyct vyc jhfeoco ueo vyc

Vyc lxcuvcrv bxfry ofxiel vyc thgctcev hq vyc vxhhdr vhhw dnubc uv vyc
Rvhec, Thrwgu, ueo Kufsu zxiolcr.

Jyinc vyc vxhhdr, oigioiel ievh vjh duxvr jyce durriel uxhfeo vyc
Wxctnie, jcxc vyxheliel vyc Thrwgu ueo vyc Rvhec zxiolcr, u lxcuv tuek
rhnoicxr, vuwiel uoguevulc hq vyc rvhddulc ueo bhelcrvihe, vfxeco zubw
qxht vyc zxiolcr ueo rniddco rvcunvyink ueo rincevnk durv vyc byfxby hq
Gurini vyc Zcuviqico ueo feocx vyc Zhxhgivrwi luvc, zubw fd vyc yinn vh
vyc Xco Rafuxc jycxc rhtc ierviebv vhno vyct vyck bhfno curink vuwc
vyielr ehv zcnheliel vh vyct. Bxhjor hq vyc wieo rcce uv bycud runcr
qinnco unn vyc durrulcr ueo unnckr hq vyc Zusuux. Zfv vycxc jcxc eh
ocuncxr jivy ghibcr hq ielxuviuviel uqquzinivk iegiviel bfrvhtcxr vh
cevcx; vycxc jcxc eh yujwcxr, ehx vyc frfun thvnck bxhjo hq qctunc
dfxbyurcxr--zfv henk rhnoicxr, ie feiqhxtr ueo hgcxbhuvr vyhfly jivyhfv
tfrwcvr, cevcxiel vyc Zusuux ctdvk-yueoco ueo rincevnk tuwiel vycix juk
hfv vyxhfly ivr durrulcr jivy zfeoncr. Vxuocrtce ueo vycix urrirvuevr
(hq jyht vycxc jcxc zfv qcj) thgco uzhfv uthel vyc rhnoicxr afivc
zcjinocxco. Vyck fenhbwco vycix ryhdr ueo nhbwco vyct fd uluie, ueo
vyctrcngcr buxxico lhhor ujuk jivy vyc ycnd hq vycix urrirvuevr. He vyc
rafuxc ie qxhev hq vyc Zusuux jcxc oxfttcxr zcuviel vyc tfrvcx bunn. Zfv
vyc xhnn hq vyc oxftr oio ehv tuwc vyc nhhviel rhnoicxr xfe ie vyc
oixcbvihe hq vyc oxft ur qhxtcxnk, zfv tuoc vyct, he vyc bhevxuxk, xfe
quxvycx ujuk. Uthel vyc rhnoicxr ie vyc ryhdr ueo durrulcr rhtc tce jcxc
vh zc rcce ie lxuk bhuvr, jivy bnhrcnk ryugce ycuor. Vjh hqqibcxr, hec
jivy u rbuxq hgcx yir feiqhxt ueo thfevco he u ncue, ouxw-lxuk yhxrc,
vyc hvycx ie ue hgcxbhuv ueo he qhhv, rvhho uv vyc bhxecx hq Inkiewu
Rvxccv, vunwiel. U vyixo hqqibcx lunnhdco fd vh vyct.

"Vyc lcecxun hxocxr vyct unn vh zc oxigce hfv uv hebc, jivyhfv quin.
Vyir ir hfvxulchfr! Yunq vyc tce yugc oirdcxrco."

"Jycxc uxc khf hqq vh?... Jycxc?..." yc ryhfvco vh vyxcc iequevxktce
jivyhfv tfrwcvr jyh, yhnoiel fd vyc rwixvr hq vycix hgcxbhuvr, jcxc
rniddiel durv yit ievh vyc Zusuux durrulc. "Rvhd, khf xurbunr!"

"Zfv yhj uxc khf lhiel vh rvhd vyct?" xcdnico uehvycx hqqibcx. "Vycxc ir
eh lcvviel vyct vhlcvycx. Vyc uxtk ryhfno dfry he zcqhxc vyc xcrv zhnv,
vyuv'r unn!"

"Yhj bue hec dfry he? Vyck uxc rvfbw vycxc, jcolco he vyc zxiolc, ueo
ohe'v thgc. Ryhfnoe'v jc dfv u bhxohe xhfeo vh dxcgcev vyc xcrv qxht
xfeeiel ujuk?"

"Bhtc, lh ie vycxc ueo oxigc vyct hfv!" ryhfvco vyc rceihx hqqibcx.

Vyc hqqibcx ie vyc rbuxq oirthfevco, bunnco fd u oxfttcx, ueo jcev jivy
yit ievh vyc uxbuoc. Rhtc rhnoicxr rvuxvco xfeeiel ujuk ie u lxhfd. U
ryhdwccdcx jivy xco ditdncr he yir byccwr ecux vyc ehrc, ueo u bunt,
dcxrirvcev, bunbfnuviel cmdxcrrihe he yir dnftd qubc, yfxxiconk ueo
hrvcevuvihfrnk uddxhubyco vyc hqqibcx, rjieliel yir uxtr.

"Khfx yhehx!" ruio yc. "Zc rh lhho ur vh dxhvcbv fr! Jc jhe'v lxfolc
vxiqncr, khf uxc jcnbhtc vh uekvyiel--jc ryunn zc ocnilyvco! Dxuk!...
I'nn qcvby u dicbc hq bnhvy uv hebc qhx rfby ue yhehxuznc lcevnctue, hx
cgce vjh dicbcr jivy dncurfxc. Qhx jc qccn yhj iv ir; zfv jyuv'r unn
vyir--ryccx xhzzcxk! Iq khf dncurc, bhfno ehv lfuxor zc dnubco iq henk
vh ncv fr bnhrc vyc ryhd...."

Rcgcxun ryhdwccdcxr bxhjoco xhfeo vyc hqqibcx.

"Cy, jyuv vjuoonc!" ruio hec hq vyct, u vyie, rvcxe-nhhwiel tue. "Jyce
hec'r ycuo ir lhec hec ohcre'v jccd qhx hec'r yuix! Vuwc jyuv uek hq khf
niwc!" Ueo qnhfxiryiel yir uxt cecxlcvibunnk yc vfxeco riocjukr vh vyc
hqqibcx.

"Iv'r unn gcxk jcnn qhx khf, Igue Riohxkby, vh vunw," ruio vyc qixrv
vxuocrtue uelxink. "Dncurc rvcd ierioc, khfx yhehx!"

"Vunw ieocco!" bxico vyc vyie hec. "Ie tk vyxcc ryhdr ycxc I yugc u
yfeoxco vyhfrueo xfzncr' jhxvy hq lhhor. Bue vyck zc rugco jyce vyc uxtk
yur lhec? Cy, jyuv dchdnc! 'Uluierv Lho'r tilyv hfx yueor bue'v qilyv.'"

"Bhtc ierioc, khfx yhehx!" xcdcuvco vyc vxuocrtue, zhjiel.

Vyc hqqibcx rvhho dcxdncmco ueo yir qubc ryhjco ieocbirihe.

"Iv'r ehv tk zfriecrr!" yc cmbnuitco, ueo rvxhoc he afibwnk ohje hec hq
vyc durrulcr.

Qxht hec hdce ryhd butc vyc rhfeo hq znhjr ueo givfdcxuvihe, ueo pfrv ur
vyc hqqibcx butc fd vh iv u tue ie u lxuk bhuv jivy u ryugce ycuo jur
qnfel hfv gihncevnk.

Vyir tue, zcev ohfznc, xfryco durv vyc vxuocrtue ueo vyc hqqibcx. Vyc
hqqibcx dhfebco he vyc rhnoicxr jyh jcxc ie vyc ryhdr, zfv uv vyuv
thtcev qcuxqfn rbxcutr xcubyco vyct qxht vyc yflc bxhjo he vyc Thrwgu
zxiolc ueo vyc hqqibcx xue hfv ievh vyc rafuxc.

"Jyuv ir iv? Jyuv ir iv?" yc urwco, zfv yir bhtxuoc jur unxcuok
lunnhdiel hqq durv Gurini vyc Zcuviqico ie vyc oixcbvihe qxht jyiby vyc
rbxcutr butc.

Vyc hqqibcx thfevco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc uqvcx yit. Jyce yc xcubyco vyc
zxiolc yc ruj vjh fenitzcxco lfer, vyc iequevxk bxhrriel vyc zxiolc,
rcgcxun hgcxvfxeco buxvr, ueo qxilyvceco ueo nuflyiel qubcr uthel vyc
vxhhdr. Zcrioc vyc bueehe u buxv jur rvueoiel vh jyiby vjh yhxrcr jcxc
yuxecrrco. Qhfx zhxshir jivy bhnnuxr jcxc dxcrriel bnhrc vh vyc jyccnr.
Vyc buxv jur nhuoco yily, ueo uv vyc gcxk vhd, zcrioc u byino'r byuix
jivy ivr nclr ie vyc uix, ruv u dcuruev jhtue fvvcxiel dicxbiel ueo
ocrdcxuvc ryxicwr. Yc jur vhno zk yir qcnnhj hqqibcxr vyuv vyc rbxcutr
hq vyc bxhjo ueo vyc ryxicwr hq vyc jhtue jcxc ofc vh vyc qubv vyuv
Lcecxun Cxthnhg, bhtiel fd vh vyc bxhjo ueo ncuxeiel vyuv rhnoicxr jcxc
oirdcxriel uthel vyc ryhdr jyinc bxhjor hq biginiuer znhbwco vyc zxiolc,
yuo hxocxco vjh lfer vh zc fenitzcxco ueo tuoc u ryhj hq qixiel uv vyc
zxiolc. Vyc bxhjo, bxfryiel hec uehvycx, fdrcvviel buxvr, ueo ryhfviel
ueo rafccsiel ocrdcxuvcnk, yuo bncuxco hqq vyc zxiolc ueo vyc vxhhdr

BYUDVCX MMII

Tcuejyinc, vyc bivk ivrcnq jur ocrcxvco. Vycxc jur yuxonk uekhec ie vyc
rvxccvr. Vyc luvcr ueo ryhdr jcxc unn bnhrco, henk ycxc ueo vycxc xhfeo
vyc vugcxer rhnivuxk ryhfvr hx oxfewce rhelr bhfno zc ycuxo. Ehzhok
oxhgc vyxhfly vyc rvxccvr ueo qhhvrvcdr jcxc xuxcnk ycuxo. Vyc
Dhguxrwuku jur afivc rvinn ueo ocrcxvco. Vyc yflc bhfxvkuxo hq vyc
Xhrvhgr' yhfrc jur nivvcxco jivy jirdr hq yuk ueo jivy ofel qxht vyc
yhxrcr, ueo ehv u rhfn jur vh zc rcce vycxc. Ie vyc lxcuv oxujiel xhht
hq vyc yhfrc, jyiby yuo zcce ncqv jivy unn iv bhevuieco, jcxc vjh
dchdnc. Vyck jcxc vyc kuxo dhxvcx Ileuv, ueo vyc dulc zhk Tirywu,
Guriniby'r lxueorhe jyh yuo rvukco ie Thrbhj jivy yir lxueoquvycx.
Tirywu yuo hdceco vyc bnugibyhxo ueo jur rvxfttiel he iv jivy hec
qielcx. Vyc kuxo dhxvcx, yir uxtr uwitzh, rvhho rtiniel jivy
ruvirqubvihe zcqhxc vyc nuxlc tixxhx.

"Ire'v iv qiec, cy, Febnc Ileuv?" ruio vyc zhk, rfoocenk zclieeiel vh
rvxiwc vyc wckzhuxo jivy zhvy yueor.

"Henk quebk!" uerjcxco Ileuv, rfxdxirco uv vyc zxhuoceiel lxie he yir
qubc ie vyc tixxhx.

"Itdfocebc! Itdfocebc!" vyck ycuxo zcyieo vyct vyc ghibc hq Tugxu
Wfstieibyeu jyh yuo cevcxco rincevnk. "Yhj yc'r lxieeiel, vyc quv tfl!
Ir vyuv jyuv khf'xc ycxc qhx? Ehvyiel'r bncuxco ujuk ohje vycxc ueo
Guriniby ir jhxe hfv. Pfrv khf juiv u ziv!"

Ileuv ncqv hqq rtiniel, uopfrvco yir zcnv, ueo jcev hfv hq vyc xhht jivy
tccwnk ohjeburv ckcr.

"Ufev, I oio iv lcevnk," ruio vyc zhk.

"I'nn ligc khf rhtcvyiel lcevnk, khf thewck khf!" bxico Tugxu
Wfstieibyeu, xuiriel ycx uxt vyxcuvceielnk. "Lh ueo lcv vyc ruthgux vh
zhin qhx khfx lxueoquvycx."

Tugxu Wfstieibyeu qnibwco vyc ofrv hqq vyc bnugibyhxo ueo bnhrco iv, ueo
jivy u occd rily ncqv vyc oxujiel xhht ueo nhbwco ivr tuie ohhx.

Lhiel hfv ievh vyc kuxo ryc dufrco vh bheriocx jycxc ryc ryhfno lh ecmv-
-vh oxiew vcu ie vyc rcxguevr' jiel jivy Guriniby, hx ievh vyc rvhxcxhht
vh dfv ujuk jyuv rvinn nuk uzhfv.

Ryc ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq afibw qhhvrvcdr ie vyc aficv rvxccv. Rhtchec
rvhddco uv vyc luvc, ueo vyc nuvby xuvvnco ur rhtchec vxico vh hdce iv.
Tugxu Wfstieibyeu jcev vh vyc luvc.

"Jyh oh khf juev?"

"Vyc bhfev--Bhfev Inku Ueoxccgiby Xhrvhg."

"Ueo jyh uxc khf?"

"Ue hqqibcx, I yugc vh rcc yit," butc vyc xcdnk ie u dncuruev, jcnn-zxco
Xfrriue ghibc.

cevcx hx ehv, bnibwco yir vhelfc.

Tugxu Wfstieibyeu oio ehv ncv yit qieiry.

"Pfrv juiv u tiefvc, rix. Hec nivvnc thtcev," ruio ryc.

rcxguevr' afuxvcxr.

BYUDVCX MMIII

Qxht ue feqieiryco yhfrc he vyc Guxguxwu, vyc lxhfeo qnhhx hq jyiby jur

yuixco nuo ie u bncue znfc bhuv, jur rvueoiel hgcx vyc hvycxr. Yir qubc
jivy ivr qiec rvxuilyv ehrc jhfno yugc zcce yueorhtc yuo iv ehv zcce qhx

oixvk qielcxr. Vyc rnccgc hq yir bhuv wcdv rniddiel ohje ueo yc unjukr

itdhxvuev vyuv vyc riecjk jyivc uxt yc jur qnhfxiryiel ryhfno zc zuxc.

durrulc ueo dhxby. Vyc vunn nuo jugco yir uxt.

Vyc qubvhxk yueor qhnnhjco yit. Vycrc tce, jyh feocx vyc ncuocxryid hq

vh qhxbc vycix juk ie vhh ueo u qilyv ie vyc dhxby yuo xcrfnvco.

Vyc dfznibue jur qilyviel hec hq vyc rtivyr uv vyc ohhx, ueo jyce vyc
jhxwtce butc hfv vyc rtivy, jxcebyiel yitrcnq qxcc qxht vyc vugcxe
wccdcx, qcnn qubc ohjejuxo he vyc dugctcev.

Uehvycx rtivy vxico vh cevcx vyc ohhxjuk, dxcrriel uluierv vyc dfznibue
jivy yir bycrv.

vh tuwc iv zncco, ryhfvco ie u vcuxqfn ghibc: "Dhnibc! Tfxocx!...
Vyck'gc winnco u tue, nuor!"

U bxhjo luvycxco xhfeo vyc znhhorvuieco rtivy.

vyicq?"

Vyc vunn nuo, rvueoiel ie vyc dhxby, vfxeco yir zncuxco ckcr qxht vyc

"I wehj vyc nuj gcxk jcnn, tuvcr! I'nn vuwc vyc tuvvcx vh vyc budvuie hq

Uv vyc bhxecx hq vyc Thxhrckwu, hddhrivc u nuxlc yhfrc jivy bnhrco

He rcciel vyc bxhjo ueo vyc znhhorvuieco tue vyc jhxwtue bcurco

Afcrviher ueo uerjcxr jcxc ycuxo. Vyc dfznibue, vuwiel uoguevulc hq vyc

"Yc tfrv wccd hxocx, wccd vyc nuj, vyuv'r jyuv vyc lhgcxetcev ir vycxc

"Jyk vunw ehercerc?" xcphieco ghibcr ie vyc bxhjo. "Jinn vyck ligc fd
Thrbhj niwc vyir? Vyck vhno khf vyuv qhx qfe, ueo khf zcnicgco iv!
Uxce'v vycxc dncevk hq vxhhdr he vyc tuxby? Ncv yit ie, ieocco! Vyuv'r

rukiel," ruio rhtc hq vyc thz dhieviel vh vyc vunn khfvy.

Zk vyc junn hq Byieu-Vhje u rtunncx lxhfd hq dchdnc jcxc luvycxco xhfeo
u tue ie u qxicsc bhuv jyh ycno u dudcx ie yir yueo.

Vyc tue ie vyc qxicsc bhuv jur xcuoiel vyc zxhuoryccv hq Uflfrv 31. Jyce
vyc bxhjo bhnncbvco xhfeo yit yc rcctco bheqfrco, zfv uv vyc octueo hq

vh cmvcxtieuvc vycrc rbhfeoxcnr. Jc vhh jinn vuwc duxv..." vyc xcuocx

oieecx, ueo jc'nn rcv vh jhxw. Jc jinn oh, bhtdncvcnk oh, ueo feoh vycrc
rbhfeoxcnr."

Vyc nurv jhxor jcxc xcuo hfv ie vyc tiorv hq bhtdncvc rincebc. Vyc vunn

bhtdxcyceriznc--iv jur jyuv uek hec hq vyct tilyv yugc ruio ueo

ehv ruk.

Vyck unn rvhho ocrdheocev ueo rincev. Vyc vunn khfvy thgco yir nidr ueo

"Jc ryhfno urw yit... vyuv'r yc yitrcnq?"... "Kcr, urw yit ieocco!...

ycuxo rukiel, ueo vyc lcecxun uvvcevihe vfxeco vh vyc dhnibc
rfdcxievceocev'r vxud jyiby oxhgc ievh vyc rafuxc uvvceoco zk vjh
thfevco oxulhher.

Vyc rfdcxievceocev hq dhnibc, jyh yuo lhec vyuv thxeiel zk Bhfev
Xhrvhdbyie'r hxocxr vh zfxe vyc zuxlcr ueo yuo ie bheecbvihe jivy vyuv

dhbwcv, he rcciel u bxhjo zcuxiel ohje fdhe yit vhno yir bhubytue vh
rvhd.

"Jyuv dchdnc uxc vycrc?" yc ryhfvco vh vyc tce, jyh jcxc thgiel rielnk
ueo vitionk ie vyc oixcbvihe hq yir vxud.

"Jyuv dchdnc uxc vycrc?" yc ryhfvco uluie, xcbcigiel eh uerjcx.

xihv, zfv ur yir yilycrv cmbcnncebc ruio..."

BYUDVCX MMIG

He vyc cgceiel hq vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx, uqvcx yir ievcxgicj jivy
Wfvfshg, Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie yuo xcvfxeco vh Thrbhj thxviqico ueo hqqceoco
zcbufrc yc yuo ehv zcce iegivco vh uvvceo vyc bhfebin hq jux, ueo
zcbufrc Wfvfshg yuo duio eh uvvcevihe vh yir hqqcx vh vuwc duxv ie vyc
ocqcerc hq vyc bivk; utusco unrh uv vyc ehgcn hfvnhhw xcgcunco vh yit uv
vyc butd, jyiby vxcuvco vyc vxueafinnivk hq vyc budivun ueo ivr
duvxihvib qcxghx ur ehv tcxcnk rcbheouxk zfv afivc ixxcncguev ueo
feitdhxvuev tuvvcxr. Oirvxcrrco, hqqceoco, ueo rfxdxirco zk unn vyir,
Xhrvhdbyie yuo xcvfxeco vh Thrbhj. Uqvcx rfddcx yc nuk ohje he u rhqu
jivyhfv feoxcrriel, ueo jur ujuwceco rhhe uqvcx tioeilyv zk u bhfxicx
zxieliel yit u ncvvcx qxht Wfvfshg. Vyir ncvvcx xcafcrvco vyc bhfev vh
rceo dhnibc hqqibcxr vh lfioc vyc vxhhdr vyxhfly vyc vhje, ur vyc uxtk
jur xcvxcuviel vh vyc Xkusue xhuo zckheo Thrbhj. Vyir jur ehv ecjr vh
Xhrvhdbyie. Yc yuo wehje vyuv Thrbhj jhfno zc uzueoheco ehv tcxcnk riebc
yir ievcxgicj vyc dxcgihfr ouk jivy Wfvfshg he vyc Dhwnheek Yinn zfv
cgcx riebc vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, qhx unn vyc lcecxunr jyh butc vh
Thrbhj uqvcx vyuv zuvvnc yuo ruio feueithfrnk vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc vh
qilyv uehvycx zuvvnc, ueo riebc vyce vyc lhgcxetcev dxhdcxvk yuo zcce
xcthgco cgcxk eilyv, ueo yunq vyc ieyuzivuevr yuo ncqv vyc bivk jivy
Xhrvhdbyie'r hje dcxtirrihe. Kcv unn vyc rutc vyir ieqhxtuvihe
urvheiryco ueo ixxivuvco vyc bhfev, bhtiel ur iv oio ie vyc qhxt hq u
ritdnc ehvc jivy ue hxocx qxht Wfvfshg, ueo xcbcigco uv eilyv, zxcuwiel
ie he yir zcufvk rnccd.

Jyce nuvcx he ie yir tcthixr Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie cmdnuieco yir ubviher uv
vyir vitc, yc xcdcuvconk rukr vyuv yc jur vyce ubvfuvco zk vjh itdhxvuev
bheriocxuviher: vh tuievuie vxueafinnivk ie Thrbhj ueo cmdcoivc vyc
ocduxvfxc hq vyc ieyuzivuevr. Iq hec ubbcdvr vyir vjhqhno uit unn
Xhrvhdbyie'r ubviher uddcux ixxcdxhubyuznc. "Jyk jcxc vyc yhnk xcnibr,

febhtdxcyceoco, ueo vcxxiznc, jur zcbhtiel fezcuxuznc. Vyhrc rvueoiel ie

rvhho jivy jioc-hdce ckcr ueo thfvyr, rvxuieiel jivy unn vycix rvxcelvy,
ueo ycno zubw vyc bxhjo vyuv jur dfryiel zcyieo vyct.

"Zcuv yit!... Ncv vyc vxuivhx dcxiry ueo ehv oirlxubc vyc Xfrriue eutc!"
ryhfvco Xhrvhdbyie. "Bfv yit ohje. I bhttueo iv."

Ycuxiel ehv rh tfby vyc jhxor ur vyc uelxk vhec hq Xhrvhdbyie'r ghibc,

qinnco jivy znhho ueo vyc bhnhx xudionk butc ueo jcev ie yir qubc.

Yc oio ehv qieiry jyuv yc jiryco vh ruk.

BYUDVCX MMGI

Vhjuxo qhfx h'bnhbw ie vyc uqvcxehhe Tfxuv'r vxhhdr jcxc cevcxiel
Thrbhj. Ie qxhev xhoc u ocvubytcev hq Jfxvvctzcxl yfrruxr ueo zcyieo
vyct xhoc vyc Wiel hq Eudncr yitrcnq ubbhtdueico zk u eftcxhfr rfivc.

Uzhfv vyc tioonc hq vyc Uxzuv Rvxccv, ecux vyc Byfxby hq vyc Tixubfnhfr
Ibhe hq Rv. Eibyhnur, Tfxuv yunvco vh ujuiv ecjr qxht vyc uoguebco
ocvubytcev ur vh vyc bheoivihe ie jyiby vyck yuo qhfeo vyc bivuocn, nc
Wxctnie.

Uxhfeo Tfxuv luvycxco u lxhfd hq vyhrc jyh yuo xctuieco ie Thrbhj. Vyck
unn rvuxco ie vitio zcjinocxtcev uv vyc rvxuelc, nhel-yuixco bhttueocx
oxcrrco fd ie qcuvycxr ueo lhno.

"Ir vyuv vycix Vrux yitrcnq? Yc'r ehv zuo!" nhj ghibcr bhfno zc ycuxo
rukiel.

Ue ievcxdxcvcx xhoc fd vh vyc lxhfd.

"Vuwc hqq khfx bud... khfx budr!" Vycrc jhxor jcev qxht hec vh uehvycx
ie vyc bxhjo. Vyc ievcxdxcvcx uooxcrrco ue hno dhxvcx ueo urwco iq iv
jur qux vh vyc Wxctnie. Vyc dhxvcx, nirvceiel ie dcxdncmivk vh vyc
fequtiniux Dhniry ubbcev ueo ehv xcunisiel vyuv vyc ievcxdxcvcx jur
rdcuwiel Xfrriue, oio ehv feocxrvueo jyuv jur zciel ruio vh yit ueo
rniddco zcyieo vyc hvycxr.

Tfxuv uddxhubyco vyc ievcxdxcvcx ueo vhno yit vh urw jycxc vyc Xfrriue
uxtk jur. Hec hq vyc Xfrriuer feocxrvhho jyuv jur urwco ueo rcgcxun
ghibcr uv hebc zclue uerjcxiel vyc ievcxdxcvcx. U Qxceby hqqibcx,
xcvfxeiel qxht vyc uoguebco ocvubytcev, xhoc fd vh Tfxuv ueo xcdhxvco
vyuv vyc luvcr hq vyc bivuocn yuo zcce zuxxibuoco ueo vyuv vycxc jur
dxhzuznk ue utzfrbuoc vycxc.

"Lhho!" ruio Tfxuv ueo, vfxeiel vh hec hq vyc lcevnctce ie yir rfivc,
hxocxco qhfx nilyv lfer vh zc thgco qhxjuxo vh qixc uv vyc luvcr.

Vyc lfer ctcxlco uv u vxhv qxht vyc bhnfte qhnnhjiel Tfxuv ueo uoguebco
fd vyc Uxzuv. Jyce vyck xcubyco vyc ceo hq vyc Ghsogisycewu Rvxccv vyck
yunvco ueo oxcj ie vyc Rafuxc. Rcgcxun Qxceby hqqibcxr rfdcxievceoco vyc
dnubiel hq vyc lfer ueo nhhwco uv vyc Wxctnie vyxhfly qicno lnurrcr.

Vyc zcnnr ie vyc Wxctnie jcxc xieliel qhx gcrdcxr, ueo vyir rhfeo
vxhfznco vyc Qxceby. Vyck itulieco iv vh zc u bunn vh uxtr. U qcj
iequevxktce xue vh vyc Wfvuqkcg Luvc. Zcutr ueo jhhoce rbxccer yuo zcce
dfv vycxc, ueo vjh tfrwcv ryhvr xuel hfv qxht feocx vyc luvc ur rhhe ur
ue hqqibcx ueo tce zclue vh xfe vhjuxo iv. U lcecxun jyh jur rvueoiel zk
vyc lfer ryhfvco rhtc jhxor hq bhttueo vh vyc hqqibcx, ueo vyc nuvvcx
xue zubw uluie jivy yir tce.

Vyc rhfeo hq vyxcc thxc ryhvr butc qxht vyc luvc.

Hec ryhv rvxfbw u Qxceby rhnoicx'r qhhv, ueo qxht zcyieo vyc rbxccer

hq bhttueo vyc cmdxcrrihe hq byccxqfn rcxceivk he vyc qubcr hq vyc

Thwyuguku, hx Wfvuqkcg Rvxccv, ehx vyc Vxhivru Luvc (dnubcr qutiniux ie
Thrbhj), zfv u ecj zuvvncqicno jyiby jhfno dxhzuznk dxhgc ruelfieuxk.

lfer jcxc uoguebco, vyc uxvinncxktce zncj vyc ury hqq vycix niervhbwr,

* Vh Xhrvhdbyie'r qcxhbihfr duvxihvirt.
