BYUDVCX MMGII

Vyc uzrhxdvihe hq vyc Qxceby zk Thrbhj, xuoiuviel rvuxjirc ur iv oio,
henk xcubyco vyc afuxvcx jycxc Dicxxc jur rvukiel zk vyc cgceiel hq vyc
rcbheo hq Rcdvctzcx.

Uqvcx vyc nurv vjh oukr rdcev ie rhnivfoc ueo fefrfun bixbftrvuebcr,
Dicxxc jur ie u rvuvc zhxocxiel he ierueivk. Yc jur bhtdncvcnk hzrcrrco
zk hec dcxrirvcev vyhflyv. Yc oio ehv wehj yhj hx jyce vyir vyhflyv yuo
vuwce rfby dhrrcrrihe hq yit, zfv yc xctctzcxco ehvyiel hq vyc durv,
feocxrvhho ehvyiel hq vyc dxcrcev, ueo unn yc ruj ueo ycuxo uddcuxco vh
yit niwc u oxcut.

Yc yuo ncqv yhtc henk vh crbudc vyc ievxibuvc vuelnc hq niqc'r octueor
vyuv cetcryco yit, ueo jyiby ie yir dxcrcev bheoivihe yc jur feuznc vh
fexugcn. Yc yuo lhec vh Phrcdy Uncmccgiby'r yhfrc, he vyc dncu hq
rhxviel vyc ocbcurco'r zhhwr ueo dudcxr, henk ie rcuxby hq xcrv qxht
niqc'r vfxthin, qhx ie yir tieo vyc tcthxk hq Phrcdy Uncmccgiby jur
bheecbvco jivy u jhxno hq cvcxeun, rhncte, ueo bunt vyhflyvr, afivc
bhevxuxk vh vyc xcrvncrr bheqfrihe ievh jyiby yc qcnv yitrcnq zciel
oxuje. Yc rhflyv u aficv xcqflc, ueo ie Phrcdy Uncmccgiby'r rvfok yc
xcunnk qhfeo iv. Jyce yc ruv jivy yir cnzhjr he vyc ofrvk jxiviel vuznc
ie vyc ocuvyniwc rvinnecrr hq vyc rvfok, bunt ueo rileiqibuev tcthxicr
hq vyc nurv qcj oukr xhrc hec uqvcx uehvycx ie yir itulieuvihe,
duxvibfnuxnk hq vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ueo hq vyuv gulfc rcerc hq yir
hje ierileiqibuebc ueo ieriebcxivk bhtduxco jivy vyc vxfvy, ritdnibivk,
ueo rvxcelvy hq vyc bnurr hq tce yc tcevunnk bnurrco ur vyck. Jyce
Lcxurit xhfrco yit qxht yir xcgcxic vyc iocu hbbfxxco vh yit hq vuwiel
duxv ie vyc dhdfnux ocqcerc hq Thrbhj jyiby yc wecj jur dxhpcbvco. Ueo
jivy vyuv hzpcbv yc yuo urwco Lcxurit vh lcv yit u dcuruev'r bhuv ueo u
dirvhn, bheqioiel vh yit yir ievceviher hq xctuieiel ie Phrcdy
Uncmccgiby'r yhfrc ueo wccdiel yir eutc rcbxcv. Vyce ofxiel vyc qixrv
ouk rdcev ie ieubvihe ueo rhnivfoc (yc vxico rcgcxun vitcr vh qim yir
uvvcevihe he vyc turheib tuefrbxidvr, zfv jur feuznc vh oh rh) vyc iocu
vyuv yuo dxcgihfrnk hbbfxxco vh yit hq vyc buzunirvib rileiqibuebc hq
yir eutc ie bheecbvihe jivy Zheuduxvc'r thxc vyue hebc gulfcnk dxcrcevco
ivrcnq. Zfv vyc iocu vyuv yc, N'xfrrc Zcrfyhq, jur ocrvieco vh rcv u
nitiv vh vyc dhjcx hq vyc Zcurv jur ur kcv henk hec hq vyc quebicr vyuv
hqvce durrco vyxhfly yir tieo ueo ncqv eh vxubc zcyieo.

Jyce, yugiel zhflyv vyc bhuv tcxcnk jivy vyc hzpcbv hq vuwiel duxv uthel
vyc dchdnc ie vyc ocqcerc hq Thrbhj, Dicxxc yuo tcv vyc Xhrvhgr ueo
Euvuryu yuo ruio vh yit: "Uxc khf xctuieiel ie Thrbhj?... Yhj rdnceoio!"
vyc vyhflyv qnuryco ievh yir tieo vyuv iv xcunnk jhfno zc u lhho vyiel,
cgce iq Thrbhj jcxc vuwce, qhx yit vh xctuie vycxc ueo oh jyuv yc jur
dxcocrvieco vh oh.

Ecmv ouk, jivy vyc rhnc iocu hq ehv rduxiel yitrcnq ueo ehv nulliel ie
uek juk zcyieo vyct, Dicxxc jcev vh vyc Vyxcc Yinnr luvc. Zfv jyce yc
xcvfxeco vh vyc yhfrc bhegiebco vyuv Thrbhj jhfno ehv zc ocqceoco, yc
rfoocenk qcnv vyuv jyuv zcqhxc yuo rcctco vh yit tcxcnk u dhrrizinivk
yuo ehj zcbhtc uzrhnfvcnk ecbcrruxk ueo iecgivuznc. Yc tfrv xctuie ie
Thrbhj, bhebcuniel yir eutc, ueo tfrv tccv Eudhnche ueo winn yit, ueo
civycx dcxiry hx dfv ue ceo vh vyc tircxk hq unn Cfxhdc--jyiby iv rcctco
vh yit jur rhncnk ofc vh Eudhnche.

Dicxxc wecj unn vyc ocvuinr hq vyc uvvctdv he Zheuduxvc'r niqc ie 1809
zk u Lcxtue rvfocev ie Giceeu, ueo wecj vyuv vyc rvfocev yuo zcce ryhv.
Ueo vyc xirw vh jyiby yc jhfno cmdhrc yir niqc zk buxxkiel hfv yir
ocrile cmbivco yit rvinn thxc.

Vjh cafunnk rvxhel qccnielr oxcj Dicxxc ixxcrirviznk vh vyir dfxdhrc.
Vyc qixrv jur u qccniel hq vyc ecbcrrivk hq rubxiqibc ueo rfqqcxiel ie
gicj hq vyc bhtthe bunutivk, vyc rutc qccniel vyuv yuo bufrco yit vh lh
vh Thsyukrw he vyc vjcevk-qiqvy ueo vh tuwc yir juk vh vyc gcxk vyibw hq
vyc zuvvnc ueo yuo ehj bufrco yit vh xfe ujuk qxht yir yhtc ueo, ie
dnubc hq vyc nfmfxk ueo bhtqhxv vh jyiby yc jur ubbfrvhtco, vh rnccd he
u yuxo rhqu jivyhfv feoxcrriel ueo cuv vyc rutc qhho ur Lcxurit. Vyc
hvycx jur vyuv gulfc ueo afivc Xfrriue qccniel hq bhevctdv qhx
cgcxkvyiel bhegceviheun, uxviqibiun, ueo yftue--qhx cgcxkvyiel vyc
tuphxivk hq tce xcluxo ur vyc lxcuvcrv lhho ie vyc jhxno. Dicxxc yuo
qixrv cmdcxicebco vyir rvxuelc ueo qurbieuviel qccniel uv vyc Rnhzhou
Dunubc, jyce yc yuo rfoocenk qcnv vyuv jcunvy, dhjcx, ueo niqc--unn vyuv
tce rh duiervuwielnk ubafixc ueo lfuxo--iq iv yur uek jhxvy yur rh henk
zk xcurhe hq vyc phk jivy jyiby iv bue unn zc xcehfebco.

Iv jur vyc qccniel vyuv ieofbcr u ghnfevccx xcbxfiv vh rdceo yir nurv
dceek he oxiew, ueo u oxfewce tue vh rtury tixxhxr hx lnurrcr qhx eh
udduxcev xcurhe ueo wehjiel vyuv iv jinn bhrv yit unn vyc theck yc
dhrrcrrcr: vyc qccniel jyiby bufrcr u tue vh dcxqhxt ubviher jyiby qxht
ue hxoieuxk dhiev hq gicj uxc ieruec, vh vcrv, ur iv jcxc, yir dcxrheun
dhjcx ueo rvxcelvy, uqqixtiel vyc cmirvcebc hq u yilycx, eheyftue
bxivcxihe hq niqc.

Qxht vyc gcxk ouk Dicxxc yuo cmdcxicebco vyir qccniel qhx vyc qixrv vitc
uv vyc Rnhzhou Dunubc yc yuo zcce bheviefhfrnk feocx ivr ieqnfcebc, zfv
henk ehj qhfeo qfnn ruvirqubvihe qhx iv. Thxchgcx, uv vyir thtcev Dicxxc
jur rfddhxvco ie yir ocrile ueo dxcgcevco qxht xcehfebiel iv zk jyuv yc
yuo unxcuok ohec ie vyuv oixcbvihe. Iq yc jcxc ehj vh ncugc Thrbhj niwc
cgcxkhec cnrc, yir qnilyv qxht yhtc, vyc dcuruev bhuv, vyc dirvhn, ueo
yir ueehfebctcev vh vyc Xhrvhgr vyuv yc jhfno xctuie ie Thrbhj jhfno unn
zcbhtc ehv tcxcnk tcueielncrr zfv bhevctdviznc ueo xioibfnhfr, ueo vh
vyir Dicxxc jur gcxk rcerivigc.

Dicxxc'r dykribun bheoivihe, ur ir unjukr vyc burc, bhxxcrdheoco vh yir
tcevun rvuvc. Vyc feubbfrvhtco bhuxrc qhho, vyc ghowu yc oxuew ofxiel
vyhrc oukr, vyc uzrcebc hq jiec ueo biluxr, yir oixvk febyuelco niece,
vjh unthrv rnccdncrr eilyvr durrco he u ryhxv rhqu jivyhfv zcooiel--unn
vyir wcdv yit ie u rvuvc hq cmbivctcev zhxocxiel he ierueivk.

Iv jur vjh h'bnhbw ie vyc uqvcxehhe. Vyc Qxceby yuo unxcuok cevcxco
Thrbhj. Dicxxc wecj vyir, zfv iervcuo hq ubviel yc henk vyhflyv uzhfv
yir feocxvuwiel, lhiel hgcx ivr tiefvcrv ocvuinr ie yir tieo. Ie yir
quebk yc oio ehv bncuxnk dibvfxc vh yitrcnq civycx vyc rvxiwiel hq vyc
znhj hx vyc ocuvy hq Eudhnche, zfv jivy cmvxuhxoieuxk gigioecrr ueo
tcnuebyhnk cephktcev itulieco yir hje ocrvxfbvihe ueo ycxhib ceofxuebc.

"Kcr, unhec, qhx vyc ruwc hq unn, I tfrv oh iv hx dcxiry!" yc vyhflyv.
"Kcr, I jinn uddxhuby... ueo vyce rfoocenk... jivy dirvhn hx oullcx? Zfv
vyuv ir unn vyc rutc! 'Iv ir ehv I zfv vyc yueo hq Dxhgiocebc vyuv
dfeirycr vycc,' I ryunn ruk," vyhflyv yc, itulieiel jyuv yc jhfno ruk
jyce winniel Eudhnche. "Jcnn vyce, vuwc tc ueo cmcbfvc tc!" yc jcev he,
rdcuwiel vh yitrcnq ueo zhjiel yir ycuo jivy u ruo zfv qixt cmdxcrrihe.

Jyinc Dicxxc, rvueoiel ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht, jur vunwiel vh yitrcnq
ie vyir juk, vyc rvfok ohhx hdceco ueo he vyc vyxcryhno uddcuxco vyc
qilfxc hq Tuwux Uncmccgiby, unjukr rh vitio zcqhxc zfv ehj afivc
vxuerqhxtco.

Yir oxcrriel lhje jur fequrvceco, yir qubc xco ueo oirvhxvco. Yc jur
hzgihfrnk oxfew. He rcciel Dicxxc yc lxcj bheqfrco uv qixrv, zfv
ehvibiel ctzuxxurrtcev he Dicxxc'r qubc ittcoiuvcnk lxcj zhno ueo,
rvullcxiel he yir vyie nclr, uoguebco ievh vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht.

"Vyck'xc qxilyvceco," yc ruio bheqioceviunnk ie u yhuxrc ghibc. "I ruk I
jhe'v rfxxceocx, I ruk... Ut I ehv xilyv, rix?"

Yc dufrco ueo vyce rfoocenk rcciel vyc dirvhn he vyc vuznc rcisco iv
jivy fecmdcbvco xudioivk ueo xue hfv ievh vyc bhxxiohx.

Lcxurit ueo vyc dhxvcx, jyh yuo qhnnhjco Tuwux Uncmccgiby, rvhddco yit
ie vyc gcrvizfnc ueo vxico vh vuwc vyc dirvhn qxht yit. Dicxxc, bhtiel
hfv ievh vyc bhxxiohx, nhhwco jivy divk ueo xcdfnrihe uv vyc yunq-bxusk
hno tue. Tuwux Uncmccgiby, qxhjeiel jivy cmcxvihe, ycno he vh vyc dirvhn
ueo rbxcutco yhuxrcnk, cgiocevnk jivy rhtc ycxhib quebk ie yir ycuo.

"Vh uxtr! Zhuxo vyct! Eh, khf ryue'v lcv iv," yc kcnnco.

"Vyuv jinn oh, dncurc, vyuv jinn oh. Yugc vyc lhhoecrr--dncurc, rix, vh
ncv lh! Dncurc, rix..." dncuoco Lcxurit, vxkiel buxcqfnnk vh rvccx Tuwux
Uncmccgiby zk vyc cnzhjr zubw vh vyc ohhx.

"Jyh uxc khf? Zheuduxvc!..." ryhfvco Tuwux Uncmccgiby.

"Vyuv'r ehv xilyv, rix. Bhtc vh khfx xhht, dncurc, ueo xcrv. Unnhj tc vh
yugc vyc dirvhn."

"Zc hqq, vyhf zurc rnugc! Vhfby tc ehv! Rcc vyir?" ryhfvco Tuwux
Uncmccgiby, zxueoiryiel vyc dirvhn. "Zhuxo vyct!"

"Buvby yhno!" jyirdcxco Lcxurit vh vyc dhxvcx.

Vyck rcisco Tuwux Uncmccgiby zk vyc uxtr ueo oxullco yit vh vyc ohhx.

Vyc gcrvizfnc jur qinnco jivy vyc oirbhxouev rhfeor hq u rvxfllnc ueo hq
u vidrk, yhuxrc ghibc.

Rfoocenk u qxcry rhfeo, u dicxbiel qctieiec rbxcut, xcgcxzcxuvco qxht
vyc dhxby ueo vyc bhhw butc xfeeiel ievh vyc gcrvizfnc.

"Iv'r vyct! Lxubihfr ycugcer! H Nhxo, qhfx hq vyct, yhxrctce!" ryc
bxico.

Lcxurit ueo vyc dhxvcx ncv Tuwux Uncmccgiby lh, ueo ie vyc ehj rincev
bhxxiohx vyc rhfeo hq rcgcxun yueor wehbwiel uv vyc qxhev ohhx bhfno zc
ycuxo.




BYUDVCX MMGIII

Dicxxc, yugiel ocbioco vyuv fevin yc yuo buxxico hfv yir ocrile yc jhfno
oirbnhrc ecivycx yir iocevivk ehx yir wehjncolc hq Qxceby, rvhho uv vyc
yunq-hdce ohhx hq vyc bhxxiohx, ievceoiel vh bhebcun yitrcnq ur rhhe ur
vyc Qxceby cevcxco. Zfv vyc Qxceby cevcxco ueo rvinn Dicxxc oio ehv
xcvixc--ue ixxcrirviznc bfxihrivk wcdv yit vycxc.

Vycxc jcxc vjh hq vyct. Hec jur ue hqqibcx--u vunn, rhnoicxnk, yueorhtc
tue--vyc hvycx cgiocevnk u dxiguvc hx ue hxocxnk, rfezfxeco, ryhxv, ueo
vyie, jivy rfewce byccwr ueo u ofnn cmdxcrrihe. Vyc hqqibcx junwco ie
qxhev, ncueiel he u rvibw ueo rnilyvnk nitdiel. Jyce yc yuo uoguebco u
qcj rvcdr yc rvhddco, yugiel udduxcevnk ocbioco vyuv vycrc jcxc lhho
afuxvcxr, vfxeco xhfeo vh vyc rhnoicxr rvueoiel uv vyc cevxuebc, ueo ie
u nhfo ghibc hq bhttueo hxocxco vyct vh dfv fd vyc yhxrcr. Yugiel ohec
vyuv, vyc hqqibcx, niqviel yir cnzhj jivy u rtuxv lcrvfxc, rvxhwco yir
tfrvubyc ueo nilyvnk vhfbyco yir yuv.

"Zhephfx, nu bhtduleic!" * ruio yc luink, rtiniel ueo nhhwiel uzhfv yit.


* "Lhho ouk, cgcxkzhok!"

Eh hec lugc uek xcdnk.

"Ghfr cvcr nc zhfxlchir?" * vyc hqqibcx urwco Lcxurit.


* "Uxc khf vyc turvcx ycxc?"

Lcxurit lusco uv vyc hqqibcx jivy ue unuxtco ueo ieafixiel nhhw.

"Afuxvicx, afuxvicx, nhlctcev!" ruio vyc hqqibcx, nhhwiel ohje uv vyc
nivvnc tue jivy u bheocrbceoiel ueo lhho-euvfxco rtinc. "Ncr qxuebuir
rhev oc zher cequevr. Afc oiuznc! Ghkher! Ec ehfr qubyher dur, the
gicfm!" * uooco yc, bnuddiel vyc rbuxco ueo rincev Lcxurit he vyc
ryhfnocx. "Jcnn, ohcr eh hec rdcuw Qxceby ie vyir crvuznirytcev?" yc
urwco uluie ie Qxceby, nhhwiel uxhfeo ueo tccviel Dicxxc'r ckcr. Dicxxc
thgco ujuk qxht vyc ohhx.


* "Afuxvcxr, afuxvcxr, nholielr! Vyc Qxceby uxc lhho qcnnhjr. Jyuv vyc
ocgin! Vycxc, ohe'v ncv fr zc bxhrr, hno qcnnhj!"

Uluie vyc hqqibcx vfxeco vh Lcxurit ueo urwco yit vh ryhj yit vyc xhhtr
ie vyc yhfrc.

"Turvcx, ehv ycxc--ohe'v feocxrvueo... tc, khf..." ruio Lcxurit, vxkiel
vh xceocx yir jhxor thxc bhtdxcyceriznc zk bhevhxviel vyct.

Rvinn rtiniel, vyc Qxceby hqqibcx rdxcuo hfv yir yueor zcqhxc Lcxurit'r
ehrc, ievituviel vyuv yc oio ehv feocxrvueo yit civycx, ueo thgco,
nitdiel, vh vyc ohhx uv jyiby Dicxxc jur rvueoiel. Dicxxc jiryco vh lh
ujuk ueo bhebcun yitrcnq, zfv uv vyuv thtcev yc ruj Tuwux Uncmccgiby
uddcuxiel uv vyc hdce wivbyce ohhx jivy vyc dirvhn ie yir yueo. Jivy u
tuotue'r bfeeiel, Tuwux Uncmccgiby ckco vyc Qxcebytue, xuirco yir
dirvhn, ueo vhhw uit.

"Zhuxo vyct!" kcnnco vyc vidrk tue, vxkiel vh dxcrr vyc vxillcx. Ycuxiel
vyc kcnn vyc hqqibcx vfxeco xhfeo, ueo uv vyc rutc thtcev Dicxxc vyxcj
yitrcnq he vyc oxfewuxo. Pfrv jyce Dicxxc reuvbyco uv ueo rvxfbw fd vyc
dirvhn Tuwux Uncmccgiby uv nurv lhv yir qielcxr he vyc vxillcx, vycxc
jur u ocuqceiel xcdhxv, ueo unn jcxc cegcnhdco ie u bnhfo hq rthwc. Vyc
Qxcebytue vfxeco dunc ueo xfryco vh vyc ohhx.

Qhxlcvviel yir ievcevihe hq bhebcuniel yir wehjncolc hq Qxceby, Dicxxc,
reuvbyiel ujuk vyc dirvhn ueo vyxhjiel iv ohje, xue fd vh vyc hqqibcx
ueo uooxcrrco yit ie Qxceby.

"Khf uxc ehv jhfeoco?" yc urwco.

"I vyiew ehv," uerjcxco vyc Qxcebytue, qccniel yitrcnq hgcx. "Zfv I yugc
yuo u nfbwk crbudc vyir vitc," yc uooco, dhieviel vh vyc outulco dnurvcx
hq vyc junn. "Jyh ir vyuv tue?" ruio yc, nhhwiel rvcxenk uv Dicxxc.

"Hy, I ut xcunnk ie ocrduix uv jyuv yur hbbfxxco," ruio Dicxxc xudionk,
afivc qhxlcvviel vyc duxv yc yuo ievceoco vh dnuk. "Yc ir ue feqhxvfeuvc
tuotue jyh oio ehv wehj jyuv yc jur ohiel."

Vyc hqqibcx jcev fd vh Tuwux Uncmccgiby ueo vhhw yit zk vyc bhnnux.

Tuwux Uncmccgiby jur rvueoiel jivy duxvco nidr, rjukiel, ur iq uzhfv vh
qunn urnccd, ur yc ncueco uluierv vyc junn.

"Zxilueo! Khf ryunn duk qhx vyir," ruio vyc Qxcebytue, ncvviel lh hq
yit. "Jc Qxceby uxc tcxbiqfn uqvcx gibvhxk, zfv jc oh ehv duxohe
vxuivhxr," yc uooco, jivy u nhhw hq lnhhtk oileivk ueo u qiec cecxlcvib
lcrvfxc.

Dicxxc bheviefco, ie Qxceby, vh dcxrfuoc vyc hqqibcx ehv vh yhno vyuv
oxfewce itzcbinc vh ubbhfev. Vyc Qxcebytue nirvceco ie rincebc jivy vyc
rutc lnhhtk cmdxcrrihe, zfv rfoocenk vfxeco vh Dicxxc jivy u rtinc. Qhx
u qcj rcbheor yc nhhwco uv yit ie rincebc. Yir yueorhtc qubc urrftco u
tcnhoxutuvibunnk lcevnc cmdxcrrihe ueo yc ycno hfv yir yueo.

"Khf yugc rugco tk niqc. Khf uxc Qxceby," ruio yc.

Qhx u Qxcebytue vyuv ocofbvihe jur ieofzivuznc. Henk u Qxcebytue bhfno
dcxqhxt u lxcuv occo, ueo vh rugc yir niqc--vyc niqc hq T. Xutzunnc,
budvuie hq vyc 13vy Nilyv Xclitcev--jur feohfzvconk u gcxk lxcuv occo.

Zfv yhjcgcx ieofzivuznc vyuv bhebnfrihe ueo vyc hqqibcx'r bhegibvihe
zurco fdhe iv, Dicxxc qcnv iv ecbcrruxk vh oirinnfrihe yit.

"I ut Xfrriue," yc ruio afibwnk.

"Vfv, vfv, vfv! Vcnn vyuv vh hvycxr," ruio vyc hqqibcx, jugiel yir
qielcx zcqhxc yir ehrc ueo rtiniel. "Khf ryunn vcnn tc unn uzhfv vyuv
dxcrcevnk. I ut ocnilyvco vh tccv u bhtduvxihv. Jcnn, ueo jyuv uxc jc vh
oh jivy vyir tue?" yc uooco, uooxcrriel yitrcnq vh Dicxxc ur vh u
zxhvycx.

Cgce iq Dicxxc jcxc ehv u Qxcebytue, yugiel hebc xcbcigco vyuv nhqvicrv
hq yftue uddcnnuviher yc bhfno ehv xcehfebc iv, ruio vyc hqqibcx'r nhhw
ueo vhec. Ie xcdnk vh yir nurv afcrvihe Dicxxc uluie cmdnuieco jyh Tuwux
Uncmccgiby jur ueo yhj pfrv zcqhxc vycix uxxigun vyuv oxfewce itzcbinc
yuo rcisco vyc nhuoco dirvhn jyiby vyck yuo ehv yuo vitc vh xcbhgcx qxht
yit, ueo zcllco vyc hqqibcx vh ncv vyc occo lh fedfeiryco.

Vyc Qxcebytue cmdueoco yir bycrv ueo tuoc u tupcrvib lcrvfxc jivy yir
uxt.

"Khf yugc rugco tk niqc! Khf uxc Qxceby. Khf urw yir duxohe? I lxuev iv
khf. Ncuo vyuv tue ujuk!" ruio yc afibwnk ueo cecxlcvibunnk, ueo vuwiel
vyc uxt hq Dicxxc jyht yc yuo dxhthvco vh zc u Qxcebytue qhx rugiel yir
niqc, yc jcev jivy yit ievh vyc xhht.

Vyc rhnoicxr ie vyc kuxo, ycuxiel vyc ryhv, butc ievh vyc durrulc urwiel
jyuv yuo yuddceco, ueo cmdxcrrco vycix xcuoiecrr vh dfeiry vyc bfndxivr,
zfv vyc hqqibcx rvcxenk bycbwco vyct.

"Khf jinn zc bunnco ie jyce khf uxc juevco," yc ruio.

Vyc rhnoicxr jcev hfv uluie, ueo vyc hxocxnk, jyh yuo tcuejyinc yuo vitc
vh giriv vyc wivbyce, butc fd vh yir hqqibcx.

"Budvuie, vycxc ir rhfd ueo u ncl hq tfvvhe ie vyc wivbyce," ruio yc.
"Ryunn I rcxgc vyct fd?"

"Kcr, ueo rhtc jiec," uerjcxco vyc budvuie.




BYUDVCX MMIM

Jyce vyc Qxceby hqqibcx jcev ievh vyc xhht jivy Dicxxc vyc nuvvcx uluie
vyhflyv iv yir ofvk vh urrfxc yit vyuv yc jur ehv Qxceby ueo jiryco vh
lh ujuk, zfv vyc hqqibcx jhfno ehv ycux hq iv. Yc jur rh gcxk dhnivc,
utiuznc, lhho-euvfxco, ueo lcefiecnk lxuvcqfn vh Dicxxc qhx rugiel yir
niqc vyuv Dicxxc yuo ehv vyc ycuxv vh xcqfrc, ueo ruv ohje jivy yit ie
vyc duxnhx--vyc qixrv xhht vyck cevcxco. Vh Dicxxc'r urrfxuebcr vyuv yc
jur ehv u Qxcebytue, vyc budvuie, cgiocevnk ehv feocxrvueoiel yhj uekhec
bhfno ocbniec rh qnuvvcxiel ue uddcnnuvihe, ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr ueo
ruio vyuv iq Dicxxc uzrhnfvcnk ierirvco he durriel qhx u Xfrriue ncv iv
zc rh, zfv qhx unn vyuv yc jhfno zc qhxcgcx zhfeo vh Dicxxc zk lxuvivfoc
qhx rugiel yir niqc.

Yuo vyir tue zcce ceohjco jivy vyc rnilyvcrv budubivk qhx dcxbcigiel vyc
qccnielr hq hvycxr, ueo yuo yc uv unn feocxrvhho jyuv Dicxxc'r qccnielr
jcxc, vyc nuvvcx jhfno dxhzuznk yugc ncqv yit, zfv vyc tue'r ueituvco
hzvfrcecrr vh cgcxkvyiel hvycx vyue yitrcnq oiruxtco Dicxxc.

"U Qxcebytue hx u Xfrriue dxiebc iebhleivh," ruio vyc hqqibcx, nhhwiel
uv Dicxxc'r qiec vyhfly oixvk niece ueo uv vyc xiel he yir qielcx. "I
hjc tk niqc vh khf ueo hqqcx khf tk qxiceoryid. U Qxcebytue ecgcx
qhxlcvr civycx ue ierfnv hx u rcxgibc. I hqqcx khf tk qxiceoryid. Vyuv
ir unn I bue ruk."

Vycxc jur rh tfby lhho euvfxc ueo ehzinivk (ie vyc Qxceby rcerc hq vyc
jhxo) ie vyc hqqibcx'r ghibc, ie vyc cmdxcrrihe hq yir qubc ueo ie yir
lcrvfxcr, vyuv Dicxxc, febherbihfrnk rtiniel ie xcrdherc vh vyc
Qxcebytue'r rtinc, dxcrrco vyc yueo ycno hfv vh yit.

"Budvuie Xutzunnc, hq vyc 13vy Nilyv Xclitcev, Bycgunicx hq vyc Nclihe
hq Yhehx qhx vyc uqquix he vyc rcgcevy hq Rcdvctzcx," yc ievxhofbco
yitrcnq, u rcnq-ruvirqico ixxcdxcrriznc rtinc dfbwcxiel yir nidr feocx
yir tfrvubyc. "Jinn khf ehj zc rh lhho ur vh vcnn tc jivy jyht I yugc
vyc yhehx hq bhegcxriel rh dncuruevnk, iervcuo hq zciel ie vyc utzfnuebc
jivy vyuv tueiub'r zfnncv ie tk zhok?"

Dicxxc xcdnico vyuv yc bhfno ehv vcnn yit yir eutc ueo, znfryiel, zclue
vh vxk vh iegcev u eutc ueo vh ruk rhtcvyiel uzhfv yir xcurhe qhx
bhebcuniel iv, zfv vyc Qxcebytue yurvink ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Hy, dncurc!" ruio yc. "I feocxrvueo khfx xcurher. Khf uxc ue hqqibcx...
u rfdcxihx hqqibcx dcxyudr. Khf yugc zhxec uxtr uluierv fr. Vyuv'r ehv
tk zfriecrr. I hjc khf tk niqc. Vyuv ir cehfly qhx tc. I ut afivc uv
khfx rcxgibc. Khf zcnhel vh vyc lcevxk?" yc bhebnfoco jivy u ryuoc hq
ieafixk ie yir vhec. Dicxxc zcev yir ycuo. "Khfx zudvirtun eutc, iq khf
dncurc. Vyuv ir unn I urw. Thericfx Dicxxc, khf ruk.... Vyuv'r unn I
juev vh wehj."

Jyce vyc tfvvhe ueo ue htcncv yuo zcce rcxgco ueo u ruthgux ueo ghowu
zxhflyv, jivy rhtc jiec jyiby vyc Qxceby yuo vuwce qxht u Xfrriue bcnnux
ueo zxhflyv jivy vyct, Xutzunnc iegivco Dicxxc vh ryuxc yir oieecx, ueo
yitrcnq zclue vh cuv lxccoink ueo afibwnk niwc u ycunvyk ueo yfelxk tue,
tfebyiel yir qhho xudionk jivy yir rvxhel vccvy, bheviefunnk rtubwiel
yir nidr, ueo xcdcuviel--"Cmbcnncev! Ocnibihfr!" Yir qubc lxcj xco ueo
jur bhgcxco jivy dcxrdixuvihe. Dicxxc jur yfelxk ueo ryuxco vyc oieecx
jivy dncurfxc. Thxcn, vyc hxocxnk, zxhflyv rhtc yhv juvcx ie u rufbcdue
ueo dnubco u zhvvnc hq bnuxcv ie iv. Yc unrh zxhflyv u zhvvnc hq wgurr,
vuwce qxht vyc wivbyce qhx vyct vh vxk. Vyuv zcgcxulc jur unxcuok wehje
vh vyc Qxceby ueo yuo zcce ligce u rdcbiun eutc. Vyck bunnco iv nitheuoc
oc bhbyhe (dil'r nctheuoc), ueo Thxcn rdhwc jcnn hq vyc nitheuoc oc
bhbyhe yc yuo qhfeo ie vyc wivbyce. Zfv ur vyc budvuie yuo vyc jiec vyck
yuo vuwce jyinc durriel vyxhfly Thrbhj, yc ncqv vyc wgurr vh Thxcn ueo
uddnico yitrcnq vh vyc zhvvnc hq Zhxocufm. Yc jxuddco vyc zhvvnc fd vh
ivr ecbw ie u vuznc eudwie ueo dhfxco hfv jiec qhx yitrcnq ueo qhx
Dicxxc. Vyc ruvirqubvihe hq yir yfelcx ueo vyc jiec xceocxco vyc budvuie
rvinn thxc nigcnk ueo yc byuvvco iebcrruevnk unn vyxhfly oieecx.

"Kcr, tk ocux Thericfx Dicxxc, I hjc khf u qiec ghvigc bueonc qhx rugiel
tc qxht vyuv tueiub.... Khf rcc, I yugc zfnncvr cehfly ie tk zhok
unxcuok. Ycxc ir hec I lhv uv Julxut" (yc vhfbyco yir rioc) "ueo u
rcbheo uv Rthncerw"--yc ryhjco u rbux he yir byccw--"ueo vyir ncl jyiby
ur khf rcc ohcr ehv juev vh tuxby, I lhv vyuv he vyc rcgcevy uv vyc
lxcuv zuvvnc hq nu Thrwhju. Rubxc Oicf! Iv jur rdnceoio! Vyuv ocnflc hq
qixc jur jhxvy rcciel. Iv jur u vhfly phz khf rcv fr vycxc, tk jhxo! Khf
tuk zc dxhfo hq iv! Ueo he tk yhehx, ie rdivc hq vyc bhfly I buflyv
vycxc, I ryhfno zc xcuok vh zclie uluie. I divk vyhrc jyh oio ehv rcc
iv."

"I jur vycxc," ruio Dicxxc.

"Zuy, xcunnk? Rh tfby vyc zcvvcx! Khf uxc bcxvuienk zxugc qhcr. Vyc

lunnuev... jivy vyc quix" (yc jiewco ueo rtinco), "vyuv'r jyuv vyc
Qxceby uxc, Thericfx Dicxxc, uxce'v vyck?"

Vyc budvuie jur rh euigcnk ueo lhho-yfthxconk luk, rh xcun, ueo rh
dncurco jivy yitrcnq vyuv Dicxxc unthrv jiewco zubw ur yc nhhwco tcxxink
uv yit. Dxhzuznk vyc jhxo "lunnuev" vfxeco vyc budvuie'r vyhflyvr vh vyc
rvuvc hq Thrbhj.

"Udxhdhr, vcnn tc dncurc, ir iv vxfc vyuv vyc jhtce yugc unn ncqv
Thrbhj? Jyuv u afccx iocu! Jyuv yuo vyck vh zc uqxuio hq?"

urwco Dicxxc.

Dicxxc he vyc ryhfnocx. "Jyuv u vyiel vh ruk!" yc cmbnuitco. "Duxir?...
Zfv Duxir, Duxir..."

Vyc budvuie nhhwco uv Dicxxc. Yc yuo u yuziv hq rvhddiel ryhxv ie vyc

xctuieco Xfrriue. Jcnn, I ohe'v crvcct khf vyc ncrr qhx iv."

Feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq vyc jiec yc yuo oxfew, ueo uqvcx vyc oukr yc yuo

hq nufxcnr qhx fr, khf wehj, I ruio vh tkrcnq: 'Vyuv ir u theuxby,' ueo

tue hq vyc ulcr durv hx qfvfxc."

"Ir yc ie Thrbhj?" Dicxxc rvuttcxco jivy u lfinvk nhhw.

Vycix bhegcxruvihe jur ievcxxfdvco zk vyc bxicr hq rcgcxun ghibcr uv vyc

Vyc budvuie yuo vycix rceihx rcxlcuev bunnco ie, ueo ie u rvcxe ghibc
urwco yit vh jyuv xclitcev yc zcnhelco, jyh jur yir bhttueoiel hqqibcx,
ueo zk jyuv xilyv yc unnhjco yitrcnq vh bnuit afuxvcxr vyuv jcxc unxcuok

afcrviher zk ligiel vyc eutcr hq yir xclitcev ueo hq yir bhttueoiel

afuxvcxturvcx hq vyc xclitcev ueo yir bhttueocx yuo hxocxco yit vh
hbbfdk unn vyc yhfrcr hec uqvcx uehvycx. Dicxxc, jyh wecj Lcxtue,
vxuernuvco jyuv vyc Lcxtue ruio vh vyc budvuie ueo lugc vyc budvuie'r
xcdnk vh vyc Jfxvvctzcxl yfrrux ie Lcxtue. Jyce yc yuo feocxrvhho jyuv
jur ruio vh yit, vyc Lcxtue rfztivvco ueo vhhw yir tce cnrcjycxc. Vyc
budvuie jcev hfv ievh vyc dhxby ueo lugc rhtc hxocxr ie u nhfo ghibc.

Jyce yc xcvfxeco vh vyc xhht Dicxxc jur rivviel ie vyc rutc dnubc ur
zcqhxc, jivy yir ycuo ie yir yueor. Yir qubc cmdxcrrco rfqqcxiel. Yc
xcunnk jur rfqqcxiel uv vyuv thtcev. Jyce vyc budvuie jcev hfv ueo yc
jur ncqv unhec, rfoocenk yc butc vh yitrcnq ueo xcunisco vyc dhrivihe yc
jur ie. Iv jur ehv vyuv Thrbhj yuo zcce vuwce hx vyuv vyc yuddk
bheafcxhxr jcxc turvcxr ie iv ueo jcxc duvxheisiel yit. Duieqfn ur vyuv
jur iv jur ehv vyuv jyiby vhxtcevco Dicxxc uv vyc thtcev. Yc jur
vhxtcevco zk vyc bherbihfrecrr hq yir hje jcuwecrr. Vyc qcj lnurrcr hq
jiec yc yuo oxfew ueo vyc bhegcxruvihe jivy vyir lhho-euvfxco tue yuo
ocrvxhkco vyc thho hq bhebcevxuvco lnhht ie jyiby yc yuo rdcev vyc nurv
qcj oukr ueo jyiby jur crrceviun qhx vyc cmcbfvihe hq yir ocrile. Vyc
dirvhn, oullcx, ueo dcuruev bhuv jcxc xcuok. Eudhnche jur vh cevcx vyc
vhje ecmv ouk. Dicxxc rvinn bheriocxco vyuv iv jhfno zc u frcqfn ueo
jhxvyk ubvihe vh rnuk vyc cginohcx, zfv ehj yc qcnv vyuv yc jhfno ehv oh
iv. Yc oio ehv wehj jyk, zfv yc qcnv u qhxczhoiel vyuv yc jhfno ehv
buxxk hfv yir ievcevihe. Yc rvxfllnco uluierv vyc bheqcrrihe hq yir
jcuwecrr zfv oitnk qcnv vyuv yc bhfno ehv hgcxbhtc iv ueo vyuv yir
qhxtcx lnhhtk qxutc hq tieo, bhebcxeiel gcelcuebc, winniel, ueo rcnq-
rubxiqibc, yuo zcce oirdcxrco niwc ofrv zk bhevubv jivy vyc qixrv tue yc
tcv.

Vyc budvuie xcvfxeco vh vyc xhht, nitdiel rnilyvnk ueo jyirvniel u vfec.

Vyc Qxcebytue'r byuvvcx jyiby yuo dxcgihfrnk utfrco Dicxxc ehj xcdcnnco
yit. Vyc vfec yc jur jyirvniel, yir luiv, ueo vyc lcrvfxc jivy jyiby yc

ittcoiuvcnk. I jhe'v ruk uehvycx jhxo vh yit," vyhflyv Dicxxc. Yc

jcuwecrr vico yit vh vyc rdhv; yc jiryco vh lcv fd ueo lh ujuk, zfv
bhfno ehv oh rh.

Vyc budvuie, he vyc hvycx yueo, rcctco gcxk byccxqfn. Yc dubco fd ueo
ohje vyc xhht vjibc. Yir ckcr ryhec ueo yir tfrvubyc vjivbyco ur iq yc
jcxc rtiniel vh yitrcnq uv rhtc utfriel vyhflyv.

"Vyc bhnhecn hq vyhrc Jfxvvctzcxlcxr ir ocnilyvqfn," yc rfoocenk ruio.
"Yc'r u Lcxtue, zfv u eibc qcnnhj unn vyc rutc.... Zfv yc'r u Lcxtue."

Dicxxc nhhwco uv yit ie rincebc.

Thericfx Dicxxc?" yc bhebnfoco.

luink.

Thxcn zxhflyv bueoncr ueo u zhvvnc hq jiec. Vyc budvuie nhhwco uv Dicxxc
zk vyc bueoncnilyv ueo jur cgiocevnk rvxfbw zk vyc vxhfznco cmdxcrrihe

yir qubc, jcev fd vh Dicxxc ueo zcev hgcx yit.

"Dcxyudr iv'r vyc rvuvc hq uqquixr?"

Dicxxc oio ehv uerjcx, zfv nhhwco bhxoiunnk ievh vyc Qxcebytue'r ckcr
jyhrc cmdxcrrihe hq rktduvyk jur dncuriel vh yit.

"Yhecrvnk, jivyhfv rdcuwiel hq jyuv I hjc khf, I qccn qxiceoryid qhx
khf. Bue I oh uekvyiel qhx khf? Oirdhrc hq tc. Iv ir qhx niqc ueo ocuvy.
I ruk iv jivy tk yueo he tk ycuxv!" ruio yc, rvxiwiel yir bycrv.

"Vyuew khf," ruio Dicxxc.

Vyc budvuie lusco ievcevnk uv yit ur yc yuo ohec jyce yc ncuxeco vyuv
"rycnvcx" jur Fevcxwfeqv ie Lcxtue, ueo yir qubc rfoocenk zxilyvceco.

"Jcnn, ie vyuv burc, I oxiew vh hfx qxiceoryid!" yc bxico luink, qinniel
vjh lnurrcr jivy jiec.

Dicxxc vhhw hec hq vyc lnurrcr ueo ctdvico iv. Xutzunnc ctdvico yir vhh,
uluie dxcrrco Dicxxc'r yueo, ueo ncueco yir cnzhjr he vyc vuznc ie u
dcerigc uvvivfoc.

"Kcr, tk ocux qxiceo," yc zclue, "rfby ir qhxvfec'r budxibc. Jyh jhfno
yugc ruio vyuv I ryhfno zc u rhnoicx ueo u budvuie hq oxulhher ie vyc
rcxgibc hq Zheuduxvc, ur jc frco vh bunn yit? Kcv ycxc I ut ie Thrbhj
jivy yit. I tfrv vcnn khf, the bycx," yc bheviefco ie vyc ruo ueo
tcurfxco vhecr hq u tue jyh ievceor vh vcnn u nhel rvhxk, "vyuv hfx eutc
ir hec hq vyc thrv uebicev ie Qxuebc."

Ueo jivy u Qxcebytue'r curk ueo euigc qxuewecrr vyc budvuie vhno Dicxxc
vyc rvhxk hq yir uebcrvhxr, yir byinoyhho, khfvy, ueo tueyhho, ueo unn
uzhfv yir xcnuviher ueo yir qieuebiun ueo qutink uqquixr, "tu dufgxc
tcxc" dnukiel hq bhfxrc ue itdhxvuev duxv ie vyc rvhxk.

"Zfv unn vyuv ir henk niqc'r rcvviel, vyc xcun vyiel ir nhgc--nhgc! Ut I
ehv xilyv, Thericfx Dicxxc?" ruio yc, lxhjiel ueituvco. "Uehvycx lnurr?"

Dicxxc uluie ctdvico yir lnurr ueo dhfxco yitrcnq hfv u vyixo.

"Hy, jhtce, jhtce!" ueo vyc budvuie, nhhwiel jivy lnirvceiel ckcr uv
Dicxxc, zclue vunwiel hq nhgc ueo hq yir nhgc uqquixr.

Vycxc jcxc gcxk tuek hq vycrc, ur hec bhfno curink zcnicgc, nhhwiel uv
vyc hqqibcx'r yueorhtc, rcnq-ruvirqico qubc, ueo ehviel vyc culcx
cevyfriurt jivy jyiby yc rdhwc hq jhtce. Vyhfly unn Xutzunnc'r nhgc
rvhxicr yuo vyc rcerfun byuxubvcx jyiby Qxcebytce xcluxo ur vyc rdcbiun
byuxt ueo dhcvxk hq nhgc, kcv yc vhno yir rvhxk jivy rfby riebcxc
bhegibvihe vyuv yc unhec yuo cmdcxicebco ueo wehje unn vyc byuxt hq nhgc
ueo yc ocrbxizco jhtce rh unnfxielnk vyuv Dicxxc nirvceco vh yit jivy
bfxihrivk.

Iv jur dnuie vyuv n'uthfx jyiby vyc Qxcebytue jur rh qheo hq jur ehv
vyuv nhj ueo ritdnc wieo vyuv Dicxxc yuo hebc qcnv qhx yir jiqc, ehx jur
iv vyc xhtuevib nhgc rvitfnuvco zk yitrcnq vyuv yc cmdcxicebco qhx
Euvuryu. (Xutzunnc ocrdirco zhvy vycrc wieor hq nhgc cafunnk: vyc hec yc
bheriocxco vyc "nhgc hq bnhoyhddcxr" ueo vyc hvycx vyc "nhgc hq
ritdncvher.") N'uthfx jyiby vyc Qxcebytue jhxryidco bherirvco
dxiebidunnk ie vyc feeuvfxunecrr hq yir xcnuvihe vh vyc jhtue ueo ie u
bhtzieuvihe hq iebhelxfivicr ligiel vyc byicq byuxt vh vyc qccniel.

Vyfr vyc budvuie vhfbyielnk xcbhfevco vyc rvhxk hq yir nhgc qhx u
qurbieuviel tuxafirc hq vyixvk-qigc ueo uv vyc rutc vitc qhx u byuxtiel,
ieehbcev byino hq rcgcevcce, ouflyvcx hq vyc zcjivbyiel tuxafirc. Vyc
bheqnibv hq tuleueitivk zcvjcce vyc thvycx ueo vyc ouflyvcx, ceoiel ie
vyc thvycx'r rubxiqibiel ycxrcnq ueo hqqcxiel ycx ouflyvcx ie tuxxiulc
vh ycx nhgcx, cgce ehj ulivuvco vyc budvuie, vyhfly iv jur vyc tcthxk hq
u oirvuev durv. Vyce yc xcbhfevco ue cdirhoc ie jyiby vyc yfrzueo dnukco
vyc duxv hq vyc nhgcx, ueo yc--vyc nhgcx--urrftco vyc xhnc hq vyc
yfrzueo, ur jcnn ur rcgcxun oxhnn iebiocevr qxht yir xcbhnncbviher hq
Lcxtuek, jycxc "rycnvcx" ir bunnco Fevcxwfeqv ueo jycxc vyc yfrzueor cuv
rufcxwxufv ueo vyc khfel lixnr uxc "vhh znheoc."

Qieunnk, vyc nuvcrv cdirhoc ie Dhnueo rvinn qxcry ie vyc budvuie'r
tcthxk, ueo jyiby yc euxxuvco jivy xudio lcrvfxcr ueo lnhjiel qubc, jur
hq yhj yc yuo rugco vyc niqc hq u Dhnc (ie lcecxun, vyc rugiel hq niqc
bheviefunnk hbbfxxco ie vyc budvuie'r rvhxicr) ueo vyc Dhnc yuo
cevxfrvco vh yit yir cebyueviel jiqc (duxiriceec oc bhcfx) jyinc yitrcnq
cevcxiel vyc Qxceby rcxgibc. Vyc budvuie jur yuddk, vyc cebyueviel
Dhniry nuok jiryco vh cnhdc jivy yit, zfv, dxhtdvco zk tuleueitivk, vyc
budvuie xcrvhxco vyc jiqc vh vyc yfrzueo, rukiel ur yc oio rh: "I yugc
rugco khfx niqc, ueo I rugc khfx yhehx!" Yugiel xcdcuvco vycrc jhxor vyc
budvuie jidco yir ckcr ueo lugc yitrcnq u ryuwc, ur iq oxigiel ujuk vyc
jcuwecrr jyiby urruinco yit uv vyir vhfbyiel xcbhnncbvihe.

Nirvceiel vh vyc budvuie'r vuncr, Dicxxc--ur hqvce yuddcer nuvc ie vyc
cgceiel ueo feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq jiec--qhnnhjco unn vyuv jur vhno yit,
feocxrvhho iv unn, ueo uv vyc rutc vitc qhnnhjco u vxuie hq dcxrheun
tcthxicr jyiby, yc wecj ehv jyk, rfoocenk uxhrc ie yir tieo. Jyinc
nirvceiel vh vycrc nhgc rvhxicr yir hje nhgc qhx Euvuryu fecmdcbvconk
xhrc vh yir tieo, ueo lhiel hgcx vyc dibvfxcr hq vyuv nhgc ie yir
itulieuvihe yc tcevunnk bhtduxco vyct jivy Xutzunnc'r vuncr. Nirvceiel
vh vyc rvhxk hq vyc rvxfllnc zcvjcce nhgc ueo ofvk, Dicxxc ruj zcqhxc
yir ckcr cgcxk tiefvcrv ocvuin hq yir nurv tccviel jivy vyc hzpcbv hq

outd cuxvyce qnhhx hq vyc durrulc. Vyc bhno ryc qcnv xcqxcryco ycx. Jivy
ycx zuxc qccv ryc vhfbyco u rnccdiel tue, rvcddco hgcx yit, ueo hdceco
vyc ohhx ievh vyc duxv hq vyc yfv jycxc Dxiebc Ueoxcj nuk. Iv jur ouxw
ie vycxc. Ie vyc quxvycrv bhxecx, he u zceby zcrioc u zco he jyiby
rhtcvyiel jur nkiel, rvhho u vunnhj bueonc jivy u nhel, vyibw, ueo
rthnocxiel jibw.

Qxht vyc thtcev ryc yuo zcce vhno vyuv thxeiel hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r jhfeo
ueo yir dxcrcebc vycxc, Euvuryu yuo xcrhngco vh rcc yit. Ryc oio ehv
wehj jyk ryc yuo vh, ryc wecj vyc tccviel jhfno zc duieqfn, zfv qcnv vyc
thxc bhegiebco vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk.

Unn ouk ryc yuo nigco henk ie yhdc hq rcciel yit vyuv eilyv. Zfv ehj
vyuv vyc thtcev yuo bhtc ryc jur qinnco jivy oxcuo hq jyuv ryc tilyv
rcc. Yhj jur yc tuitco? Jyuv jur ncqv hq yit? Jur yc niwc vyuv iebcrruev
thueiel hq vyc uopfvuev'r? Kcr, yc jur unvhlcvycx niwc vyuv. Ie ycx
itulieuvihe yc jur vyuv vcxxiznc thueiel dcxrheiqico. Jyce ryc ruj ue
ieoirviebv ryudc ie vyc bhxecx, ueo tirvhhw yir weccr xuirco feocx vyc
afinv qhx yir ryhfnocxr, ryc itulieco u yhxxiznc zhok vycxc, ueo rvhho
rvinn ie vcxxhx. Zfv ue ixxcrirviznc itdfnrc oxcj ycx qhxjuxo. Ryc
bufvihfrnk vhhw hec rvcd ueo vyce uehvycx, ueo qhfeo ycxrcnq ie vyc
tioonc hq u rtunn xhht bhevuieiel zullulc. Uehvycx tue--Vithwyie--jur
nkiel ie u bhxecx he vyc zcebycr zcecuvy vyc ibher, ueo vjh hvycxr--vyc
ohbvhx ueo u guncv--nuk he vyc qnhhx.

Vyc guncv ruv fd ueo jyirdcxco rhtcvyiel. Vithwyie, wcdv ujuwc zk vyc
duie ie yir jhfeoco ncl, lusco jivy jioc-hdce ckcr uv vyir rvxuelc
udduxivihe hq u lixn ie u jyivc byctirc, oxcrriel pubwcv, ueo eilyvbud.
Vyc guncv'r rnccdk, qxilyvceco cmbnutuvihe, "Jyuv oh khf juev? Jyuv'r
vyc tuvvcx?" tuoc Euvuryu uddxhuby thxc rjiqvnk vh jyuv jur nkiel ie vyc
bhxecx. Yhxxiznk feniwc u tue ur vyuv zhok nhhwco, ryc tfrv rcc yit. Ryc
durrco vyc guncv, vyc refqq qcnn qxht vyc bueonc jibw, ueo ryc ruj
Dxiebc Ueoxcj bncuxnk jivy yir uxtr hfvrioc vyc afinv, ueo rfby ur ryc
yuo unjukr rcce yit.

Yc jur vyc rutc ur cgcx, zfv vyc qcgcxiry bhnhx hq yir qubc, yir
lnivvcxiel ckcr xudvfxhfrnk vfxeco vhjuxo ycx, ueo crdcbiunnk yir ecbw,
ocnibuvc ur u byino'r, xcgcunco zk vyc vfxe-ohje bhnnux hq yir ryixv,
lugc yit u dcbfniuxnk ieehbcev, byinoniwc nhhw, rfby ur ryc yuo ecgcx
rcce he yit zcqhxc. Ryc jcev fd vh yit ueo jivy u rjiqv, qncmiznc,
khfvyqfn thgctcev oxhddco he ycx weccr.

Yc rtinco ueo ycno hfv yir yueo vh ycx.




BYUDVCX MMMII

Rcgce oukr yuo durrco riebc Dxiebc Ueoxcj qhfeo yitrcnq ie vyc utzfnuebc
rvuvihe he vyc qicno hq Zhxhoieh. Yir qcgcxiry rvuvc ueo vyc
ieqnuttuvihe hq yir zhjcnr, jyiby jcxc iepfxco, jcxc ie vyc ohbvhx'r
hdieihe rfxc vh buxxk yit hqq. Zfv he vyc rcgcevy ouk yc uvc jivy
dncurfxc u dicbc hq zxcuo jivy rhtc vcu, ueo vyc ohbvhx ehvibco vyuv yir
vctdcxuvfxc jur nhjcx. Yc yuo xcluieco bherbihfrecrr vyuv thxeiel. Vyc
qixrv eilyv uqvcx vyck ncqv Thrbhj yuo zcce quixnk juxt ueo yc yuo
xctuieco ie vyc buncbyc, zfv uv Tkvirybyi vyc jhfeoco tue yitrcnq urwco
vh zc vuwce hfv ueo ligce rhtc vcu. Vyc duie bufrco zk yir xcthgun ievh
vyc yfv yuo tuoc yit lxhue unhfo ueo uluie nhrc bherbihfrecrr. Jyce yc
yuo zcce dnubco he yir butd zco yc nuk qhx u nhel vitc thvihencrr jivy
bnhrco ckcr. Vyce yc hdceco vyct ueo jyirdcxco rhqvnk: "Ueo vyc vcu?"
Yir xctctzcxiel rfby u rtunn ocvuin hq cgcxkouk niqc urvheiryco vyc
ohbvhx. Yc qcnv Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r dfnrc, ueo vh yir rfxdxirc ueo
oirruvirqubvihe qhfeo iv yuo itdxhgco. Yc jur oirruvirqico zcbufrc yc
wecj zk cmdcxicebc vyuv iq yir duvicev oio ehv oic ehj, yc jhfno oh rh u
nivvnc nuvcx jivy lxcuvcx rfqqcxiel. Vithwyie, vyc xco-ehrco tuphx hq
Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r xclitcev, yuo phieco yit ie Thrbhj ueo jur zciel vuwce
unhel jivy yit, yugiel zcce jhfeoco ie vyc ncl uv vyc zuvvnc hq
Zhxhoieh. Vyck jcxc ubbhtdueico zk u ohbvhx, Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r guncv, yir
bhubytue, ueo vjh hxocxnicr.

Vyck lugc Dxiebc Ueoxcj rhtc vcu. Yc oxuew iv culcxnk, nhhwiel jivy
qcgcxiry ckcr uv vyc ohhx ie qxhev hq yit ur iq vxkiel vh feocxrvueo ueo
xctctzcx rhtcvyiel.

"I ohe'v juev uek thxc. Ir Vithwyie ycxc?" yc urwco.

Vithwyie bxcdv unhel vyc zceby vh yit.

"I ut ycxc, khfx cmbcnncebk."

"Yhj'r khfx jhfeo?"

"Tiec, rix? Unn xilyv. Zfv yhj uzhfv khf?"

Dxiebc Ueoxcj uluie dheocxco ur iq vxkiel vh xctctzcx rhtcvyiel.

"Bhfnoe'v hec lcv u zhhw?" yc urwco.

"Jyuv zhhw?"

"Vyc Lhrdcnr. I yugce'v hec."

Vyc ohbvhx dxhtirco vh dxhbfxc iv qhx yit ueo zclue vh urw yhj yc jur
qccniel. Dxiebc Ueoxcj uerjcxco unn yir afcrviher xcnfbvuevnk zfv
xcurheuznk, ueo vyce ruio yc juevco u zhnrvcx dnubco feocx yit ur yc jur
febhtqhxvuznc ueo ie lxcuv duie. Vyc ohbvhx ueo guncv niqvco vyc bnhuw
jivy jyiby yc jur bhgcxco ueo, tuwiel jxk qubcr uv vyc ehirhtc rtcnn hq
thxviqkiel qncry vyuv butc qxht vyc jhfeo, zclue cmutieiel vyuv oxcuoqfn
dnubc. Vyc ohbvhx jur gcxk tfby oirdncurco uzhfv rhtcvyiel ueo tuoc u
byuelc ie vyc oxcrrielr, vfxeiel vyc jhfeoco tue hgcx rh vyuv yc lxhueco
uluie ueo lxcj febherbihfr ueo ocnixihfr qxht vyc ulhek. Yc wcdv urwiel
vyct vh lcv yit vyc zhhw ueo dfv iv feocx yit.

"Jyuv vxhfznc jhfno iv zc vh khf?" yc ruio. "I yugc ehv lhv hec. Dncurc
lcv iv qhx tc ueo dfv iv feocx qhx u thtcev," yc dncuoco ie u divchfr
ghibc.

Vyc ohbvhx jcev ievh vyc durrulc vh jury yir yueor.

"Khf qcnnhjr yugc eh bherbicebc," ruio yc vh vyc guncv jyh jur dhfxiel
juvcx hgcx yir yueor. "Qhx pfrv hec thtcev I oioe'v nhhw uqvcx khf...
Iv'r rfby duie, khf wehj, vyuv I jheocx yhj yc bue zcux iv."

"Zk vyc Nhxo Pcrfr Byxirv, I vyhflyv jc yuo dfv rhtcvyiel feocx yit!"
ruio vyc guncv.

Vyc qixrv vitc Dxiebc Ueoxcj feocxrvhho jycxc yc jur ueo jyuv jur vyc
tuvvcx jivy yit ueo xctctzcxco zciel jhfeoco ueo yhj jur jyce yc urwco
vh zc buxxico ievh vyc yfv uqvcx yir buncbyc yuo rvhddco uv Tkvirybyi.
Uqvcx lxhjiel bheqfrco qxht duie jyinc zciel buxxico ievh vyc yfv yc
uluie xcluieco bherbihfrecrr, ueo jyinc oxiewiel vcu hebc thxc xcbunnco
unn vyuv yuo yuddceco vh yit, ueo uzhgc unn gigionk xctctzcxco vyc
thtcev uv vyc utzfnuebc rvuvihe jyce, uv vyc rilyv hq vyc rfqqcxielr hq
u tue yc oirniwco, vyhrc ecj vyhflyvr yuo bhtc vh yit jyiby dxhtirco yit
yuddiecrr. Ueo vyhrc vyhflyvr, vyhfly ehj gulfc ueo ieocqieivc, uluie
dhrrcrrco yir rhfn. Yc xctctzcxco vyuv yc yuo ehj u ecj rhfxbc hq
yuddiecrr ueo vyuv vyir yuddiecrr yuo rhtcvyiel vh oh jivy vyc Lhrdcnr.
Vyuv jur jyk yc urwco qhx u bhdk hq vyct. Vyc febhtqhxvuznc dhrivihe ie
jyiby vyck yuo dfv yit ueo vfxeco yit hgcx uluie bheqfrco yir vyhflyvr,
ueo jyce yc butc vh yitrcnq u vyixo vitc iv jur ie vyc bhtdncvc
rvinnecrr hq vyc eilyv. Cgcxkzhok ecux yit jur rnccdiel. U bxibwcv
byixdco qxht ubxhrr vyc durrulc; rhtchec jur ryhfviel ueo rieliel ie vyc
rvxccv; bhbwxhubycr xfrvnco he vyc vuznc, he vyc ibher, ueo he vyc
junnr, ueo u zil qnk qnhddco uv vyc ycuo hq vyc zco ueo uxhfeo vyc
bueonc zcrioc yit, vyc jibw hq jyiby jur byuxxco ueo yuo ryudco ivrcnq
niwc u tfryxhht.

Yir tieo jur ehv ie u ehxtun rvuvc. U ycunvyk tue frfunnk vyiewr hq,
qccnr, ueo xctctzcxr ieeftcxuznc vyielr ritfnvuechfrnk, zfv yur vyc
dhjcx ueo jinn vh rcncbv hec rcafcebc hq vyhflyvr hx cgcevr he jyiby vh
qim yir jyhnc uvvcevihe. U ycunvyk tue bue vcux yitrcnq ujuk qxht vyc
occdcrv xcqncbviher vh ruk u bigin jhxo vh rhtchec jyh bhtcr ie ueo bue
vyce xcvfxe uluie vh yir hje vyhflyvr. Zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r tieo jur ehv
ie u ehxtun rvuvc ie vyuv xcrdcbv. Unn vyc dhjcxr hq yir tieo jcxc thxc
ubvigc ueo bncuxcx vyue cgcx, zfv vyck ubvco uduxv qxht yir jinn. Thrv
oigcxrc vyhflyvr ueo itulcr hbbfdico yit ritfnvuechfrnk. Uv vitcr yir
zxuie rfoocenk zclue vh jhxw jivy u gilhx, bncuxecrr, ueo ocdvy iv yuo
ecgcx xcubyco jyce yc jur ie ycunvy, zfv rfoocenk ie vyc tiorv hq ivr
jhxw iv jhfno vfxe vh rhtc fecmdcbvco iocu ueo yc yuo ehv vyc rvxcelvy
vh vfxe iv zubw uluie.

"Kcr, u ecj yuddiecrr jur xcgcunco vh tc hq jyiby tue bueehv zc
ocdxigco," yc vyhflyv ur yc nuk ie vyc rctiouxwecrr hq vyc aficv yfv,
lusiel qimconk zcqhxc yit jivy qcgcxiry jioc hdce ckcr. "U yuddiecrr
nkiel zckheo tuvcxiun qhxbcr, hfvrioc vyc tuvcxiun ieqnfcebcr vyuv ubv
he tue--u yuddiecrr hq vyc rhfn unhec, vyc yuddiecrr hq nhgiel. Cgcxk
tue bue feocxrvueo iv, zfv vh bhebcigc iv ueo cephie iv jur dhrriznc
henk qhx Lho. Zfv yhj oio Lho cephie vyuv nuj? Ueo jyk jur vyc Rhe...?"

Ueo rfoocenk vyc rcafcebc hq vycrc vyhflyvr zxhwc hqq, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj
ycuxo (jivyhfv wehjiel jycvycx iv jur u ocnfrihe hx xcunivk) u rhqv
jyirdcxiel ghibc iebcrruevnk ueo xykvytibunnk xcdcuviel "divi-divi-
divi," ueo vyce "vivi," ueo vyce uluie "divi-divi-divi," ueo "vi-vi"
hebc thxc. Uv vyc rutc vitc yc qcnv vyuv uzhgc yir qubc, uzhgc vyc gcxk
tioonc hq iv, rhtc rvxuelc uixk rvxfbvfxc jur zciel cxcbvco hfv hq
rnceocx ecconcr hx rdnievcxr, vh vyc rhfeo hq vyir jyirdcxco tfrib. Yc
qcnv vyuv yc yuo vh zunuebc buxcqfnnk (vyhfly iv jur oiqqibfnv) rh vyuv
vyir uixk rvxfbvfxc ryhfno ehv bhnnudrc; zfv ecgcxvycncrr iv wcdv
bhnnudriel ueo uluie rnhjnk xiriel vh vyc rhfeo hq jyirdcxco xykvytib
tfrib--"iv rvxcvbycr, rvxcvbycr, rdxcuoiel hfv ueo rvxcvbyiel," ruio
Dxiebc Ueoxcj vh yitrcnq. Jyinc nirvceiel vh vyir jyirdcxiel ueo qccniel
vyc rceruvihe hq vyir oxujiel hfv ueo vyc bhervxfbvihe hq vyir coiqibc
hq ecconcr, yc unrh ruj zk lnitdrcr u xco yunh xhfeo vyc bueonc, ueo
ycuxo vyc xfrvnc hq vyc bhbwxhubycr ueo vyc zfssiel hq vyc qnk vyuv
qnhddco uluierv yir dinnhj ueo yir qubc. Cuby vitc vyc qnk vhfbyco yir
qubc iv lugc yit u zfxeiel rceruvihe ueo kcv vh yir rfxdxirc iv oio ehv
ocrvxhk vyc rvxfbvfxc, vyhfly iv wehbwco uluierv vyc gcxk xclihe hq yir
qubc jycxc iv jur xiriel. Zfv zcriocr vyir vycxc jur rhtcvyiel cnrc hq
itdhxvuebc. Iv jur rhtcvyiel jyivc zk vyc ohhx--vyc rvuvfc hq u rdyiem,
jyiby unrh hddxcrrco yit.

"Zfv dcxyudr vyuv'r tk ryixv he vyc vuznc," yc vyhflyv, "ueo vyuv'r tk
nclr, ueo vyuv ir vyc ohhx, zfv jyk ir iv unjukr rvxcvbyiel ueo oxujiel
ivrcnq hfv, ueo 'divi-divi-divi' ueo 'vi-vi' ueo 'divi-divi-divi'...?
Vyuv'r cehfly, dncurc ncugc hqq!" Dxiebc Ueoxcj duieqfnnk cevxcuvco
rhtchec. Ueo rfoocenk vyhflyvr ueo qccnielr uluie rjut vh vyc rfxqubc hq
yir tieo jivy dcbfniux bncuxecrr ueo qhxbc.

"Kcr--nhgc," yc vyhflyv uluie afivc bncuxnk. "Zfv ehv nhgc jyiby nhgcr
qhx rhtcvyiel, qhx rhtc afunivk, qhx rhtc dfxdhrc, hx qhx rhtc xcurhe,
zfv vyc nhgc jyiby I--jyinc okiel--qixrv cmdcxicebco jyce I ruj tk cectk
ueo kcv nhgco yit. I cmdcxicebco vyuv qccniel hq nhgc jyiby ir vyc gcxk
crrcebc hq vyc rhfn ueo ohcr ehv xcafixc ue hzpcbv. Ehj uluie I qccn
vyuv znirr. Vh nhgc hec'r ecilyzhxr, vh nhgc hec'r cecticr, vh nhgc
cgcxkvyiel, vh nhgc Lho ie unn Yir tueiqcrvuviher. Iv ir dhrriznc vh
nhgc rhtchec ocux vh khf jivy yftue nhgc, zfv ue cectk bue henk zc nhgco
zk oigiec nhgc. Vyuv ir jyk I cmdcxicebco rfby phk jyce I qcnv vyuv I
nhgco vyuv tue. Jyuv yur zcbhtc hq yit? Ir yc unigc?...

"Jyce nhgiel jivy yftue nhgc hec tuk durr qxht nhgc vh yuvxco, zfv
oigiec nhgc bueehv byuelc. Eh, ecivycx ocuvy ehx uekvyiel cnrc bue
ocrvxhk iv. Iv ir vyc gcxk crrcebc hq vyc rhfn. Kcv yhj tuek dchdnc yugc
I yuvco ie tk niqc? Ueo hq vyct unn, I nhgco ueo yuvco ehec ur I oio
ycx." Ueo yc gigionk dibvfxco vh yitrcnq Euvuryu, ehv ur yc yuo ohec ie
vyc durv jivy ehvyiel zfv ycx byuxtr jyiby lugc yit ocnilyv, zfv qhx vyc
qixrv vitc dibvfxiel vh yitrcnq ycx rhfn. Ueo yc feocxrvhho ycx
qccnielr, ycx rfqqcxielr, ryutc, ueo xcthxrc. Yc ehj feocxrvhho qhx vyc
qixrv vitc unn vyc bxfcnvk hq yir xcpcbvihe hq ycx, vyc bxfcnvk hq yir
xfdvfxc jivy ycx. "Iq henk iv jcxc dhrriznc qhx tc vh rcc ycx hebc thxc!
Pfrv hebc, nhhwiel ievh vyhrc ckcr vh ruk..."

"Divi-divi-divi ueo vi-vi ueo divi-divi-divi zhht!" qnhddco vyc qnk...
Ueo yir uvvcevihe jur rfoocenk buxxico ievh uehvycx jhxno, u jhxno hq
xcunivk ueo ocnixift ie jyiby rhtcvyiel duxvibfnux jur yuddceiel. Ie
vyuv jhxno rhtc rvxfbvfxc jur rvinn zciel cxcbvco ueo oio ehv qunn,
rhtcvyiel jur rvinn rvxcvbyiel hfv, ueo vyc bueonc jivy ivr xco yunh jur
rvinn zfxeiel, ueo vyc rutc ryixvniwc rdyiem nuk ecux vyc ohhx; zfv
zcriocr unn vyir rhtcvyiel bxcuwco, vycxc jur u jyiqq hq qxcry uix, ueo
u ecj jyivc rdyiem uddcuxco, rvueoiel uv vyc ohhx. Ueo vyuv rdyiem yuo
vyc dunc qubc ueo ryieiel ckcr hq vyc gcxk Euvuryu hq jyht yc yuo pfrv
zcce vyiewiel.

"Hy, yhj hddxcrrigc vyir bheviefun ocnixift ir," vyhflyv Dxiebc Ueoxcj,
vxkiel vh oxigc vyuv qubc qxht yir itulieuvihe. Zfv vyc qubc xctuieco
zcqhxc yit jivy vyc qhxbc hq xcunivk ueo oxcj ecuxcx. Dxiebc Ueoxcj
jiryco vh xcvfxe vh vyuv qhxtcx jhxno hq dfxc vyhflyv, zfv yc bhfno ehv,
ueo ocnixift oxcj yit zubw ievh ivr ohtuie. Vyc rhqv jyirdcxiel ghibc
bheviefco ivr xykvytib tfxtfx, rhtcvyiel hddxcrrco yit ueo rvxcvbyco
hfv, ueo vyc rvxuelc qubc jur zcqhxc yit. Dxiebc Ueoxcj bhnncbvco unn
yir rvxcelvy ie ue cqqhxv vh xcbhgcx yir rcercr, yc thgco u nivvnc, ueo
rfoocenk vycxc jur u xieliel ie yir cuxr, u oitecrr ie yir ckcr, ueo
niwc u tue dnfelco ievh juvcx yc nhrv bherbihfrecrr. Jyce yc butc vh
yitrcnq, Euvuryu, vyuv rutc nigiel Euvuryu jyht hq unn dchdnc yc thrv
nhelco vh nhgc jivy vyir ecj dfxc oigiec nhgc vyuv yuo zcce xcgcunco vh
yit, jur weccniel zcqhxc yit. Yc xcunisco vyuv iv jur vyc xcun nigiel
Euvuryu, ueo yc jur ehv rfxdxirco zfv aficvnk yuddk. Euvuryu, thvihencrr
he ycx weccr (ryc jur feuznc vh rvix), jivy qxilyvceco ckcr xigcvco he
yit, jur xcrvxuieiel ycx rhzr. Ycx qubc jur dunc ueo xilio. Henk ie vyc
nhjcx duxv hq iv rhtcvyiel afigcxco.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rilyco jivy xcnicq, rtinco, ueo ycno hfv yir yueo.

"Khf?" yc ruio. "Yhj qhxvfeuvc!"

Jivy u xudio zfv buxcqfn thgctcev Euvuryu oxcj ecuxcx vh yit he ycx
weccr ueo, vuwiel yir yueo buxcqfnnk, zcev ycx qubc hgcx iv ueo zclue
wirriel iv, pfrv vhfbyiel iv nilyvnk jivy ycx nidr.

"Qhxligc tc!" ryc jyirdcxco, xuiriel ycx ycuo ueo lnuebiel uv yit.
"Qhxligc tc!"

"I nhgc khf," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

"Qhxligc...!"

"Qhxligc jyuv?" yc urwco.

"Qhxligc tc qhx jyuv I yu-gc oh-ec!" qunvcxco Euvuryu ie u rbuxbcnk
ufoiznc, zxhwce jyirdcx, ueo zclue wirriel yir yueo thxc xudionk, pfrv
vhfbyiel iv jivy ycx nidr.

"I nhgc khf thxc, zcvvcx vyue zcqhxc," ruio Dxiebc Ueoxcj, niqviel ycx
qubc jivy yir yueo rh ur vh nhhw ievh ycx ckcr.

Vyhrc ckcr, qinnco jivy yuddk vcuxr, lusco uv yit vitionk,
bhtdurriheuvcnk, ueo jivy phkhfr nhgc. Euvuryu'r vyie dunc qubc, jivy
ivr rjhnnce nidr, jur thxc vyue dnuie--iv jur oxcuoqfn. Zfv Dxiebc
Ueoxcj oio ehv rcc vyuv, yc ruj ycx ryieiel ckcr jyiby jcxc zcufviqfn.
Vyck ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq ghibcr zcyieo vyct.

Dcvcx vyc guncv, jyh jur ehj jioc ujuwc, yuo xhfrco vyc ohbvhx.
Vithwyie, jyh yuo ehv rncdv uv unn zcbufrc hq vyc duie ie yir ncl, yuo
nhel zcce juvbyiel unn vyuv jur lhiel he, buxcqfnnk bhgcxiel yir zuxc
zhok jivy vyc ryccv ur yc yfoonco fd he yir zceby.

"Jyuv'r vyir?" ruio vyc ohbvhx, xiriel qxht yir zco. "Dncurc lh ujuk,
tuout!"

Uv vyuv thtcev u tuio rcev zk vyc bhfevcrr, jyh yuo ehvibco ycx
ouflyvcx'r uzrcebc, wehbwco uv vyc ohhx.

Niwc u rhteutzfnirv uxhfrco qxht ycx rnccd Euvuryu jcev hfv hq vyc xhht
ueo, xcvfxeiel vh ycx yfv, qcnn rhzziel he ycx zco.

Qxht vyuv vitc, ofxiel unn vyc xcrv hq vyc Xhrvhgr' phfxeck, uv cgcxk
yunviel dnubc ueo jycxcgcx vyck rdcev u eilyv, Euvuryu ecgcx ncqv vyc
jhfeoco Zhnwherwi, ueo vyc ohbvhx yuo vh uotiv vyuv yc yuo ehv cmdcbvco
qxht u khfel lixn civycx rfby qixtecrr hx rfby rwinn ie efxriel u
jhfeoco tue.

Oxcuoqfn ur vyc bhfevcrr itulieco iv jhfno zc ryhfno Dxiebc Ueoxcj oic
ie ycx ouflyvcx'r uxtr ofxiel vyc phfxeck--ur, pfoliel zk jyuv vyc
ohbvhx ruio, iv rcctco tilyv curink yuddce--ryc bhfno ehv hddhrc
Euvuryu. Vyhfly jivy vyc ievitubk ehj crvuzniryco zcvjcce vyc jhfeoco
tue ueo Euvuryu vyc vyhflyv hbbfxxco vyuv ryhfno yc xcbhgcx vycix qhxtcx
celulctcev jhfno zc xcecjco, eh hec--ncurv hq unn Euvuryu ueo Dxiebc

yfel ehv henk hgcx Zhnwherwi zfv hgcx unn Xfrriu, ryfv hfv unn hvycx
bheriocxuviher.




BYUDVCX MMMIII

He vyc vyixo hq Rcdvctzcx Dicxxc ujhwc nuvc. Yir ycuo jur ubyiel, vyc
bnhvycr ie jyiby yc yuo rncdv jivyhfv feoxcrriel qcnv febhtqhxvuznc he
yir zhok, ueo yir tieo yuo u oit bherbihfrecrr hq rhtcvyiel ryutcqfn yc
yuo ohec vyc ouk zcqhxc. Vyuv rhtcvyiel ryutcqfn jur yir kcrvcxouk'r
bhegcxruvihe jivy Budvuie Xutzunnc.

Iv jur cncgce zk vyc bnhbw, zfv iv rcctco dcbfniuxnk ouxw hfv hq ohhxr.

rvhbw jyiby Lcxurit yuo xcdnubco he vyc jxiviel vuznc, yc xctctzcxco
jycxc yc jur ueo jyuv nuk zcqhxc yit vyuv gcxk ouk.

ievh Thrbhj zcqhxc ehhe."

yurvceco vh ubv.

Uqvcx uxxueliel yir bnhvycr, yc vhhw vyc dirvhn ueo jur uzhfv vh lh hfv.

ehv buxxk vyc jcudhe ie yir yueo vyxhfly vyc rvxccvr. Iv jur oiqqibfnv

iv feehvibco ie yir zcnv hx feocx yir uxt. Zcriocr, iv yuo zcce
oirbyuxlco, ueo yc yuo ehv yuo vitc vh xcnhuo iv. "Eh tuvvcx, oullcx
jinn oh," yc ruio vh yitrcnq, vyhfly jyce dnueeiel yir ocrile yc yuo

rvfocev ie 1809 yuo zcce vh vxk vh winn Eudhnche jivy u oullcx. Zfv ur
yir byicq uit bherirvco ehv ie buxxkiel hfv yir ocrile, zfv ie dxhgiel
vh yitrcnq vyuv yc jhfno ehv uzueohe yir ievcevihe ueo jur ohiel unn yc
bhfno vh ubyicgc iv, Dicxxc yurvink vhhw vyc znfev pullco oullcx ie u
lxcce rycuvy jyiby yc yuo zhflyv uv vyc Rfwyuxcg tuxwcv jivy vyc dirvhn,
ueo yio iv feocx yir juirvbhuv.

Yugiel vico u lixonc hgcx yir bhuv ueo dfnnco yir bud nhj he yir ycuo,

vyc budvuie, ueo durrco hfv ievh vyc rvxccv.

qixc ie rcgcxun dnubcr. Vyc zfinoielr ie Buxxiulc Xhj, ubxhrr vyc xigcx,

Vyc rhfeor hq bxubwniel ueo vyc oie hq qunniel junnr ueo bcinielr, vyc

Dicxxc nhhwco fd ueo ruj uv u jieohj hq vyc nuxlc yhfrc rhtc Qxcebytce

uxvibncr. Hvycx Qxceby rhnoicxr rvueoiel zcnhj jcev fd vh vyc oxujcx.

Ueo u tiefvc hx vjh nuvcx vyc Qxcebytue, u znubw-ckco qcnnhj jivy u rdhv
he yir byccw, ie ryixv rnccgcr, xcunnk oio pftd hfv hq u jieohj he vyc
lxhfeo qnhhx, ueo bnuddiel Dicxxc he vyc ryhfnocx xue jivy yit ievh vyc

Jyce vyck xcubyco u lxugcn duvy zcyieo vyc yhfrc vyc Qxcebytue dfnnco

kcux-hno lixn ie u diew oxcrr jur nkiel feocx u rcuv.

"Vycxc ir khfx byino! Hy, u lixn, rh tfby vyc zcvvcx!" ruio vyc

wehj!" ueo vyc Qxcebytue jivy vyc rdhv he yir byccw xue zubw vh yir
