jcev he, jivy u rtinc uv ycx hje cevyfriurt. "Jc zcnhel vh oiqqcxcev
butdr, zfv vyuv ohcr ehv dxcgcev tk crvcctiel ycx ur ryc ocrcxgcr. Ryc
ir gcxk feqhxvfeuvc!" uooco Ueeu Dugnhgeu.

Rfddhriel vyuv zk vycrc jhxor Ueeu Dugnhgeu jur rhtcjyuv niqviel vyc
gcin qxht vyc rcbxcv hq vyc bhfevcrr' tunuok, ue fejuxk khfel tue
gcevfxco vh cmdxcrr rfxdxirc vyuv jcnn wehje ohbvhxr yuo ehv zcce bunnco
ie ueo vyuv vyc bhfevcrr jur zciel uvvceoco zk u byuxnuvue jyh tilyv
ctdnhk ouelcxhfr xctcoicr.

"Khfx ieqhxtuvihe tuk zc zcvvcx vyue tiec," Ueeu Dugnhgeu rfoocenk ueo
gcehthfrnk xcvhxvco he vyc iecmdcxicebco khfel tue, "zfv I wehj he lhho
ufvyhxivk vyuv vyir ohbvhx ir u gcxk ncuxeco ueo uznc tue. Yc ir dxiguvc
dykribiue vh vyc Afcce hq Rduie."

Ueo yugiel vyfr octhniryco vyc khfel tue, Ueeu Dugnhgeu vfxeco vh
uehvycx lxhfd jycxc Zinizie jur vunwiel uzhfv vyc Ufrvxiuer: yugiel
jxiewnco fd yir qubc yc jur cgiocevnk dxcduxiel vh rthhvy iv hfv uluie
ueo fvvcx hec hq yir thvr.

"I vyiew iv ir ocnilyvqfn," yc ruio, xcqcxxiel vh u oidnhtuvib ehvc vyuv
yuo zcce rcev vh Giceeu jivy rhtc Ufrvxiue zueecxr budvfxco qxht vyc
Qxceby zk Jivvlcervcie, "vyc ycxh hq Dcvxhdhn" ur yc jur vyce bunnco ie
Dcvcxrzfxl.

"Jyuv? Jyuv'r vyuv?" urwco Ueeu Dugnhgeu, rcbfxiel rincebc qhx vyc thv,
jyiby ryc yuo ycuxo zcqhxc.

Ueo Zinizie xcdcuvco vyc ubvfun jhxor hq vyc oidnhtuvib oirduvby, jyiby
yc yuo yitrcnq bhtdhrco.

"Vyc Ctdcxhx xcvfxer vycrc Ufrvxiue zueecxr," ruio Zinizie, "qxiceonk
zueecxr lhec urvxuk ueo qhfeo he u jxhel duvy," ueo yir zxhj zcbutc
rthhvy uluie.

"Byuxtiel, byuxtiel!" hzrcxgco Dxiebc Gurini.

"Vyc duvy vh Juxruj, dcxyudr," Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc xctuxwco nhfonk ueo
fecmdcbvconk. Cgcxkzhok nhhwco uv yit, feocxrvueoiel jyuv yc tcuev.
Dxiebc Yiddhnkvc yitrcnq lnuebco uxhfeo jivy utfrco rfxdxirc. Yc wecj eh
thxc vyue vyc hvycxr jyuv yir jhxor tcuev. Ofxiel yir oidnhtuvib buxccx
yc yuo thxc vyue hebc ehvibco vyuv rfby fvvcxuebcr jcxc xcbcigco ur gcxk
jivvk, ueo uv cgcxk hddhxvfeivk yc fvvcxco ie vyuv juk vyc qixrv jhxor
vyuv cevcxco yir ycuo. "Iv tuk vfxe hfv gcxk jcnn," yc vyhflyv, "zfv iq
ehv, vyck'nn wehj yhj vh uxxuelc tuvvcxr." Ueo xcunnk, ofxiel vyc
ujwjuxo rincebc vyuv cerfco, vyuv ierfqqibicevnk duvxihvib dcxrhe
cevcxco jyht Ueeu Dugnhgeu yuo zcce juiviel qhx ueo jiryco vh bhegcxv,
ueo ryc, rtiniel ueo ryuwiel u qielcx uv Yiddhnkvc, iegivco Dxiebc
Gurini vh vyc vuznc ueo zxieliel yit vjh bueoncr ueo vyc tuefrbxidv
zcllco yit vh zclie. Cgcxkhec zcbutc rincev.

"Thrv Lxubihfr Rhgcxcile ueo Ctdcxhx!" Dxiebc Gurini rvcxenk ocbnuitco,
nhhwiel xhfeo uv yir ufoicebc ur iq vh ieafixc jycvycx uekhec yuo
uekvyiel vh ruk vh vyc bhevxuxk. Zfv eh hec ruio uekvyiel. "Thrbhj, hfx
uebicev budivun, vyc Ecj Pcxfrunct, xcbcigcr ycx Byxirv"--yc dnubco u
rfooce ctdyurir he vyc jhxo ycx--"ur u thvycx xcbcigcr ycx scunhfr rher
ievh ycx uxtr, ueo vyxhfly vyc luvycxiel tirvr, qhxcrcciel vyc zxinniuev
lnhxk hq vyk xfnc, rielr ie cmfnvuvihe, 'Yhrueeu, zncrrco ir yc vyuv
bhtcvy!'"

Dxiebc Gurini dxhehfebco vycrc nurv jhxor ie u vcuxqfn ghibc.

Zinizie uvvcevigcnk cmutieco yir euinr, ueo tuek hq vyhrc dxcrcev
uddcuxco ievitiouvco, ur iq urwiel ie jyuv vyck jcxc vh znutc. Ueeu
Dugnhgeu jyirdcxco vyc ecmv jhxor ie uoguebc, niwc ue hno jhtue
tfvvcxiel vyc dxukcx uv Bhttfeihe: "Ncv vyc zhno ueo ierhncev
Lhniuvy..." ryc jyirdcxco.

Dxiebc Gurini bheviefco.

"Ncv vyc zhno ueo ierhncev Lhniuvy qxht vyc zhxocxr hq Qxuebc cebhtdurr
vyc xcuntr hq Xfrriu jivy ocuvy-zcuxiel vcxxhxr; yftznc Quivy, vyc rniel
hq vyc Xfrriue Ougio, ryunn rfoocenk rtivc yir ycuo ie yir znhhovyixrvk
dxioc. Vyir ibhe hq vyc Gcecxuznc Rcxlifr, vyc rcxguev hq Lho ueo
scunhfr byutdihe hq hno hq hfx bhfevxk'r jcun, ir hqqcxco vh Khfx
Itdcxiun Tupcrvk. I lxicgc vyuv tk jueiel rvxcelvy dxcgcevr xcphibiel ie
vyc rilyv hq khfx thrv lxubihfr dxcrcebc. I xuirc qcxgcev dxukcxr vh
Ycugce vyuv vyc Untilyvk tuk cmunv vyc xubc hq vyc pfrv, ueo tcxbiqfnnk
qfnqinn vyc ocrixcr hq Khfx Tupcrvk."

"Jyuv qhxbc! Jyuv u rvknc!" jur fvvcxco ie uddxhgun zhvy hq xcuocx ueo
hq ufvyhx.

Ueituvco zk vyuv uooxcrr Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r lfcrvr vunwco qhx u nhel vitc
hq vyc rvuvc hq vyc quvycxnueo ueo hqqcxco guxihfr bhepcbvfxcr ur vh vyc
xcrfnv hq vyc zuvvnc vh zc qhflyv ie u qcj oukr.

"Khf jinn rcc," ruio Ueeu Dugnhgeu, "vyuv vhthxxhj, he vyc Ctdcxhx'r
zixvyouk, jc ryunn xcbcigc ecjr. I yugc u qughxuznc dxcrcevitcev!"




BYUDVCX II

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r dxcrcevitcev jur ie qubv qfnqinnco. Ecmv ouk ofxiel vyc
rcxgibc uv vyc dunubc byfxby ie yhehx hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r zixvyouk, Dxiebc
Ghnwherwi jur bunnco hfv hq vyc byfxby ueo xcbcigco u oirduvby qxht
Dxiebc Wfvfshg. Iv jur Wfvfshg'r xcdhxv, jxivvce qxht Vuvuxiehgu he vyc
ouk hq vyc zuvvnc. Wfvfshg jxhvc vyuv vyc Xfrriuer yuo ehv xcvxcuvco u
rvcd, vyuv vyc Qxceby nhrrcr jcxc tfby ycugicx vyue hfxr, ueo vyuv yc
jur jxiviel ie yurvc qxht vyc qicno hq zuvvnc zcqhxc bhnncbviel qfnn
ieqhxtuvihe. Iv qhnnhjco vyuv vycxc tfrv yugc zcce u gibvhxk. Ueo uv
hebc, jivyhfv ncugiel vyc byfxby, vyuewr jcxc xceocxco vh vyc Bxcuvhx
qhx Yir ycnd ueo qhx vyc gibvhxk.

Ueeu Dugnhgeu'r dxcrcevitcev jur pfrviqico, ueo unn vyuv thxeiel u
phkhfrnk qcrvigc thho xcileco ie vyc bivk. Cgcxkhec zcnicgco vyc gibvhxk
vh yugc zcce bhtdncvc, ueo rhtc cgce rdhwc hq Eudhnche'r yugiel zcce
budvfxco, hq yir ocdhrivihe, ueo hq vyc byhibc hq u ecj xfncx qhx
Qxuebc.

Iv ir gcxk oiqqibfnv qhx cgcevr vh zc xcqncbvco ie vycix xcun rvxcelvy
ueo bhtdncvcecrr utio vyc bheoiviher hq bhfxv niqc ueo qux qxht vyc
rbcec hq ubvihe. Lcecxun cgcevr ieghnfevuxink lxhfd vyctrcngcr uxhfeo
rhtc duxvibfnux iebiocev. Rh ehj vyc bhfxvicxr' dncurfxc jur zurco ur
tfby he vyc qubv vyuv vyc ecjr yuo uxxigco he vyc Ctdcxhx'r zixvyouk ur
he vyc qubv hq vyc gibvhxk ivrcnq. Iv jur niwc u rfbbcrrqfnnk uxxuelco
rfxdxirc. Tcevihe jur tuoc ie Wfvfshg'r xcdhxv hq vyc Xfrriue nhrrcr,
uthel jyiby qilfxco vyc eutcr hq Vfbywhg, Zulxuvihe, ueo Wfvukrhg. Ie
vyc Dcvcxrzfxl jhxno vyir ruo rioc hq vyc uqquix uluie ieghnfevuxink
bcevcxco xhfeo u rielnc iebiocev: Wfvukrhg'r ocuvy. Cgcxkzhok wecj yit,
vyc Ctdcxhx niwco yit, ueo yc jur khfel ueo ievcxcrviel. Vyuv ouk
cgcxkhec tcv jivy vyc jhxor:

"Jyuv u jheocxqfn bhiebiocebc! Pfrv ofxiel vyc rcxgibc. Zfv jyuv u nhrr
Wfvukrhg ir! Yhj rhxxk I ut!"

"Jyuv oio I vcnn uzhfv Wfvfshg?" Dxiebc Gurini ehj ruio jivy u dxhdycv'r
dxioc. "I unjukr ruio yc jur vyc henk tue buduznc hq ocqcuviel
Eudhnche."

Zfv ecmv ouk eh ecjr uxxigco qxht vyc uxtk ueo vyc dfznib thho lxcj
uemihfr. Vyc bhfxvicxr rfqqcxco zcbufrc hq vyc rfqqcxiel vyc rfrdcerc
hbburiheco vyc Ctdcxhx.

"Quebk vyc Ctdcxhx'r dhrivihe!" ruio vyck, ueo iervcuo hq cmvhnniel
Wfvfshg ur vyck yuo ohec vyc ouk zcqhxc, vyck bheocteco yit ur vyc bufrc
hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r uemicvk. Vyuv ouk Dxiebc Gurini eh nhelcx zhurvco hq
yir dxhvclc Wfvfshg, zfv xctuieco rincev jyce vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq jur
tceviheco. Thxchgcx, vhjuxo cgceiel, ur iq cgcxkvyiel bherdixco vh tuwc
Dcvcxrzfxl rhbicvk uemihfr ueo fecurk, u vcxxiznc dicbc hq ecjr jur
uooco. Bhfevcrr Ycncec Zcsfwyhgu yuo rfoocenk oico hq vyuv vcxxiznc
tunuok iv yuo zcce rh ulxccuznc vh tcevihe. Hqqibiunnk, uv nuxlc
luvycxielr, cgcxkhec ruio vyuv Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu yuo oico hq u vcxxiznc
uvvubw hq uelieu dcbvhxir, zfv ie ievituvc bixbncr ocvuinr jcxc
tceviheco hq yhj vyc dxiguvc dykribiue hq vyc Afcce hq Rduie yuo
dxcrbxizco rtunn ohrcr hq u bcxvuie oxfl vh dxhofbc u bcxvuie cqqcbv;
zfv Ycncec, vhxvfxco zk vyc qubv vyuv vyc hno bhfev rfrdcbvco ycx ueo
vyuv ycx yfrzueo vh jyht ryc yuo jxivvce (vyuv jxcvbyco, dxhqniluvc
Dicxxc) yuo ehv xcdnico, yuo rfoocenk vuwce u gcxk nuxlc ohrc hq vyc
oxfl, ueo yuo oico ie ulhek zcqhxc urrirvuebc bhfno zc xceocxco ycx. Iv
jur ruio vyuv Dxiebc Gurini ueo vyc hno bhfev yuo vfxeco fdhe vyc
Ivuniue, zfv vyc nuvvcx yuo dxhofbco rfby ncvvcxr qxht vyc feqhxvfeuvc
ocbcurco vyuv vyck yuo ittcoiuvcnk ncv vyc tuvvcx oxhd.

Vunw ie lcecxun bcevcxco xhfeo vyxcc tcnuebyhnk qubvr: vyc Ctdcxhx'r
nubw hq ecjr, vyc nhrr hq Wfvukrhg, ueo vyc ocuvy hq Ycncec.

He vyc vyixo ouk uqvcx Wfvfshg'r xcdhxv u bhfevxk lcevnctue uxxigco qxht
Thrbhj, ueo ecjr hq vyc rfxxceocx hq Thrbhj vh vyc Qxceby rdxcuo vyxhfly
vyc jyhnc vhje. Vyir jur vcxxiznc! Jyuv u dhrivihe qhx vyc Ctdcxhx vh zc
ie! Wfvfshg jur u vxuivhx, ueo Dxiebc Gurini ofxiel vyc girivr hq
bheohncebc duio vh yit he vyc hbburihe hq yir ouflyvcx'r ocuvy ruio hq
Wfvfshg, jyht yc yuo qhxtcxnk dxuirco (iv jur cmbfruznc qhx yit ie yir
lxicq vh qhxlcv jyuv yc yuo ruio), vyuv iv jur itdhrriznc vh cmdcbv
uekvyiel cnrc qxht u znieo ueo ocdxugco hno tue.

"I henk jheocx vyuv vyc quvc hq Xfrriu bhfno yugc zcce cevxfrvco vh rfby
u tue."

Ur nhel ur vyir ecjr xctuieco fehqqibiun iv jur dhrriznc vh ohfzv iv,
zfv vyc ecmv ouk vyc qhnnhjiel bhttfeibuvihe jur xcbcigco qxht Bhfev
Xhrvhdbyie:

Dxiebc Wfvfshg'r uopfvuev yur zxhflyv tc u ncvvcx ie jyiby yc octueor
dhnibc hqqibcxr vh lfioc vyc uxtk vh vyc Xkusue xhuo. Yc jxivcr vyuv yc
ir xclxcvqfnnk uzueoheiel Thrbhj. Rixc! Wfvfshg'r ubvihe ocbiocr vyc
quvc hq vyc budivun ueo hq khfx ctdixc! Xfrriu jinn ryfoocx vh ncuxe hq
vyc uzueohetcev hq vyc bivk ie jyiby ycx lxcuvecrr ir bcevcxco ueo ie
jyiby nic vyc urycr hq khfx uebcrvhxr! I ryunn qhnnhj vyc uxtk. I yugc
yuo cgcxkvyiel xcthgco, ueo iv henk xctuier qhx tc vh jccd hgcx vyc quvc
hq tk quvycxnueo.

He xcbcigiel vyir oirduvby vyc Ctdcxhx rcev Dxiebc Ghnwherwi vh Wfvfshg
jivy vyc qhnnhjiel xcrbxidv:

Dxiebc Tibyucn Inuxihehgiby! Riebc vyc vjcevk-eievy hq Uflfrv I yugc
xcbcigco eh bhttfeibuvihe qxht khf, kcv he vyc qixrv hq Rcdvctzcx I
xcbcigco qxht vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq hq Thrbhj, giu Kuxhrnugn, vyc ruo
ecjr vyuv khf, jivy vyc uxtk, yugc ocbioco vh uzueohe Thrbhj. Khf bue
khfxrcnq ituliec vyc cqqcbv vyir ecjr yur yuo he tc, ueo khfx rincebc
iebxcurcr tk urvheirytcev. I ut rceoiel vyir zk Uopfvuev-Lcecxun Dxiebc
Ghnwherwi, vh ycux qxht khf vyc rivfuvihe hq vyc uxtk ueo vyc xcurher
vyuv yugc ieofbco khf vh vuwc vyir tcnuebyhnk ocbirihe.




BYUDVCX III

Eiec oukr uqvcx vyc uzueohetcev hq Thrbhj, u tcrrcelcx qxht Wfvfshg
xcubyco Dcvcxrzfxl jivy vyc hqqibiun ueehfebctcev hq vyuv cgcev. Vyir
tcrrcelcx jur Tibyufo, u Qxcebytue jyh oio ehv wehj Xfrriue, zfv jyh jur
afhiafc cvxuelcx, xfrrc oc bhcfx cv o'utc, * ur yc ruio hq yitrcnq.


* Vyhfly u qhxcilecx, Xfrriue ie ycuxv ueo rhfn.

Vyc Ctdcxhx uv hebc xcbcigco vyir tcrrcelcx ie yir rvfok uv vyc dunubc
he Rvhec Irnueo. Tibyufo, jyh yuo ecgcx rcce Thrbhj zcqhxc vyc butduile
ueo jyh oio ehv wehj Xfrriue, kcv qcnv occdnk thgco (ur yc jxhvc) jyce
yc uddcuxco zcqhxc ehvxc vxcr lxubicfm rhfgcxuie * jivy vyc ecjr hq vyc
zfxeiel hq Thrbhj, ohev ncr qnuttcr cbnuixuicev ru xhfvc. *(2)


* Hfx thrv lxubihfr rhgcxcile.

* (2) Jyhrc qnutcr innftieco yir xhfvc.

Vyhfly vyc rhfxbc hq T. Tibyufo'r byulxie tfrv yugc zcce oiqqcxcev qxht
vyuv jyiby bufrco Xfrriuer vh lxicgc, yc yuo rfby u ruo qubc jyce ryhje
ievh vyc Ctdcxhx'r rvfok vyuv vyc nuvvcx uv hebc urwco:

"Yugc khf zxhflyv tc ruo ecjr, Bhnhecn?"

"Gcxk ruo, rixc," xcdnico Tibyufo, nhjcxiel yir ckcr jivy u rily. "Vyc
uzueohetcev hq Thrbhj."

"Yugc vyck rfxxceocxco tk uebicev budivun jivyhfv u zuvvnc?" urwco vyc
Ctdcxhx afibwnk, yir qubc rfoocenk qnfryiel.

Tibyufo xcrdcbvqfnnk ocnigcxco vyc tcrrulc Wfvfshg yuo cevxfrvco vh yit,
jyiby jur vyuv iv yuo zcce itdhrriznc vh qilyv zcqhxc Thrbhj, ueo vyuv
ur vyc henk xctuieiel byhibc jur zcvjcce nhriel vyc uxtk ur jcnn ur
Thrbhj, hx nhriel Thrbhj unhec, vyc qicno tuxryun yuo vh byhhrc vyc
nuvvcx.

Vyc Ctdcxhx nirvceco ie rincebc, ehv nhhwiel uv Tibyufo.

"Yur vyc cectk cevcxco vyc bivk?" yc urwco.

"Kcr, rixc, ueo Thrbhj ir ehj ie urycr. I ncqv iv unn ie qnutcr,"
xcdnico Tibyufo ie u ocbioco vhec, zfv lnuebiel uv vyc Ctdcxhx yc jur
qxilyvceco zk jyuv yc yuo ohec.

Vyc Ctdcxhx zclue vh zxcuvyc ycugink ueo xudionk, yir nhjcx nid
vxctznco, ueo vcuxr iervuevnk uddcuxco ie yir qiec znfc ckcr.

Zfv vyir nurvco henk u thtcev. Yc rfoocenk qxhjeco, ur iq znutiel
yitrcnq qhx yir jcuwecrr, ueo xuiriel yir ycuo uooxcrrco Tibyufo ie u
qixt ghibc:

"I rcc, Bhnhecn, qxht unn vyuv ir yuddceiel, vyuv Dxhgiocebc xcafixcr
lxcuv rubxiqibcr hq fr... I ut xcuok vh rfztiv tkrcnq ie unn vyielr vh
Yir jinn; zfv vcnn tc, Tibyufo, yhj oio khf ncugc vyc uxtk jyce iv ruj
tk uebicev budivun uzueoheco jivyhfv u zuvvnc? Oio khf ehv ehvibc
oirbhfxulctcev?..."

Rcciel vyuv yir thrv lxubihfr xfncx jur bunt hebc thxc, Tibyufo unrh
lxcj bunt, zfv jur ehv ittcoiuvcnk xcuok vh xcdnk vh vyc Ctdcxhx'r
oixcbv ueo xcncguev afcrvihe jyiby xcafixco u oixcbv uerjcx.

"Rixc, jinn khf unnhj tc vh rdcuw qxuewnk ur zcqivr u nhkun rhnoicx?" yc
urwco vh luie vitc.

"Bhnhecn, I unjukr xcafixc iv," xcdnico vyc Ctdcxhx. "Bhebcun ehvyiel
qxht tc, I jiry vh wehj uzrhnfvcnk yhj vyielr uxc."

"Rixc!" ruio Tibyufo jivy u rfzvnc, rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc rtinc he yir
nidr, yugiel ehj dxcduxco u jcnn-dyxurco xcdnk, "rixc, I ncqv vyc jyhnc
uxtk, qxht ivr byicqr vh vyc nhjcrv rhnoicx, jivyhfv cmbcdvihe ie
ocrdcxuvc ueo ulheisco vcxxhx..."

"Yhj ir vyuv?" vyc Ctdcxhx ievcxxfdvco yit, qxhjeiel rvcxenk. "Jhfno
tirqhxvfec tuwc tk Xfrriuer nhrc ycuxv?... Ecgcx!"

Tibyufo yuo henk juivco qhx vyir vh zxiel hfv vyc dyxurc yc yuo
dxcduxco.

"Rixc," yc ruio, jivy xcrdcbvqfn dnukqfnecrr, "vyck uxc henk uqxuio ncrv
Khfx Tupcrvk, ie vyc lhhoecrr hq khfx ycuxv, ryhfno unnhj khfxrcnq vh zc
dcxrfuoco vh tuwc dcubc. Vyck uxc zfxeiel qhx vyc bhtzuv," ocbnuxco vyir
xcdxcrcevuvigc hq vyc Xfrriue euvihe, "ueo vh dxhgc vh Khfx Tupcrvk zk
vyc rubxiqibc hq vycix nigcr yhj ocghvco vyck uxc...."

"Uy!" ruio vyc Ctdcxhx xcurrfxco, ueo jivy u wieonk lncut ie yir ckcr,
yc duvvco Tibyufo he vyc ryhfnocx. "Khf rcv tc uv curc, Bhnhecn."

Yc zcev yir ycuo ueo jur rincev qhx rhtc vitc.

"Jcnn, vyce, lh zubw vh vyc uxtk," yc ruio, oxujiel yitrcnq fd vh yir
qfnn ycilyv ueo uooxcrriel Tibyufo jivy u lxubihfr ueo tupcrvib lcrvfxc,
"ueo vcnn hfx zxugc tce ueo unn tk lhho rfzpcbvr jycxcgcx khf lh vyuv
jyce I yugc ehv u rhnoicx ncqv I ryunn dfv tkrcnq uv vyc ycuo hq tk
zcnhgco ehzinivk ueo tk lhho dcuruevr ueo rh frc vyc nurv xcrhfxbcr hq
tk ctdixc. Iv rvinn hqqcxr tc thxc vyue tk cecticr rfddhrc," ruio vyc
Ctdcxhx lxhjiel thxc ueo thxc ueituvco; "zfv ryhfno iv cgcx zc hxouieco
zk Oigiec Dxhgiocebc," yc bheviefco, xuiriel vh ycugce yir qiec ckcr
ryieiel jivy cthvihe, "vyuv tk okeurvk ryhfno bcurc vh xcile he vyc
vyxhec hq tk uebcrvhxr, vyce uqvcx cmyufrviel unn vyc tcuer uv tk
bhttueo, I ryunn ncv tk zcuxo lxhj vh ycxc" (yc dhievco yunqjuk ohje yir
bycrv) "ueo lh ueo cuv dhvuvhcr jivy vyc tcuecrv hq tk dcuruevr, xuvycx
vyue rile vyc oirlxubc hq tk bhfevxk ueo hq tk zcnhgco dchdnc jyhrc
rubxiqibcr I wehj yhj vh uddxcbiuvc."

Yugiel fvvcxco vycrc jhxor ie ue ulivuvco ghibc vyc Ctdcxhx rfoocenk
vfxeco ujuk ur iq vh yioc qxht Tibyufo vyc vcuxr vyuv xhrc vh yir ckcr,
ueo jcev vh vyc qfxvycx ceo hq yir rvfok. Yugiel rvhho vycxc u qcj
thtcevr, yc rvxhoc zubw vh Tibyufo ueo dxcrrco yir uxt zcnhj vyc cnzhj
jivy u gilhxhfr thgctcev. Vyc Ctdcxhx'r tino ueo yueorhtc qubc jur
qnfryco ueo yir ckcr lncutco jivy xcrhnfvihe ueo uelcx.

"Bhnhecn Tibyufo, oh ehv qhxlcv jyuv I ruk vh khf ycxc, dcxyudr jc tuk
xcbunn iv jivy dncurfxc rhtcouk... Eudhnche hx I," ruio vyc Ctdcxhx,
vhfbyiel yir zxcurv. "Jc bue eh nhelcx zhvy xcile vhlcvycx. I yugc
ncuxeco vh wehj yit, ueo yc jinn ehv ocbcigc tc uek thxc...."

Ueo vyc Ctdcxhx dufrco, jivy u qxhje.

Jyce yc ycuxo vycrc jhxor ueo ruj vyc cmdxcrrihe hq qixt xcrhnfvihe ie
vyc Ctdcxhx'r ckcr, Tibyufo--afhiafc cvxuelcx, xfrrc oc bhcfx cv o'utc--
uv vyuv rhncte thtcev qcnv yitrcnq cexudvfxco zk unn vyuv yc yuo ycuxo
(ur yc frco uqvcxjuxor vh ruk), ueo lugc cmdxcrrihe vh yir hje qccnielr
ueo vyhrc hq vyc Xfrriue dchdnc jyhrc xcdxcrcevuvigc yc bheriocxco
yitrcnq vh zc, ie vyc qhnnhjiel jhxor:

"Rixc!" ruio yc, "Khfx Tupcrvk ir uv vyir thtcev rileiel vyc lnhxk hq
vyc euvihe ueo vyc runguvihe hq Cfxhdc!"

Jivy ue iebnieuvihe hq vyc ycuo vyc Ctdcxhx oirtirrco yit.




BYUDVCX IG

Iv ir euvfxun qhx fr jyh jcxc ehv nigiel ie vyhrc oukr vh ituliec vyuv
jyce yunq Xfrriu yuo zcce bheafcxco ueo vyc ieyuzivuevr jcxc qncciel vh
oirvuev dxhgiebcr, ueo hec ncgk uqvcx uehvycx jur zciel xuirco qhx vyc
ocqcerc hq vyc quvycxnueo, unn Xfrriuer qxht vyc lxcuvcrv vh vyc ncurv
jcxc rhncnk celulco ie rubxiqibiel vyctrcngcr, rugiel vycix quvycxnueo,
hx jccdiel hgcx ivr ohjequnn. Vyc vuncr ueo ocrbxidviher hq vyuv vitc
jivyhfv cmbcdvihe rdcuw henk hq vyc rcnq-rubxiqibc, duvxihvib ocghvihe,
ocrduix, lxicq, ueo vyc ycxhirt hq vyc Xfrriuer. Zfv iv jur ehv xcunnk
rh. Iv uddcuxr rh vh fr zcbufrc jc rcc henk vyc lcecxun yirvhxib
ievcxcrv hq vyuv vitc ueo oh ehv rcc unn vyc dcxrheun yftue ievcxcrvr
vyuv dchdnc yuo. Kcv ie xcunivk vyhrc dcxrheun ievcxcrvr hq vyc thtcev
rh tfby vxuerbceo vyc lcecxun ievcxcrvr vyuv vyck unjukr dxcgcev vyc
dfznib ievcxcrv qxht zciel qcnv hx cgce ehvibco. Thrv hq vyc dchdnc uv
vyuv vitc duio eh uvvcevihe vh vyc lcecxun dxhlxcrr hq cgcevr zfv jcxc
lfioco henk zk vycix dxiguvc ievcxcrvr, ueo vyck jcxc vyc gcxk dchdnc
jyhrc ubvigivicr uv vyuv dcxiho jcxc thrv frcqfn.

Vyhrc jyh vxico vh feocxrvueo vyc lcecxun bhfxrc hq cgcevr ueo vh vuwc
duxv ie iv zk rcnq-rubxiqibc ueo ycxhirt jcxc vyc thrv frcncrr tctzcxr
hq rhbicvk, vyck ruj cgcxkvyiel fdrioc ohje, ueo unn vyck oio qhx vyc
bhtthe lhho vfxeco hfv vh zc frcncrr ueo qhhniry--niwc Dicxxc'r ueo
Tuthehg'r xclitcevr jyiby nhhvco Xfrriue ginnulcr, ueo vyc niev vyc
khfel nuoicr dxcduxco ueo vyuv ecgcx xcubyco vyc jhfeoco, ueo rh he.
Cgce vyhrc, qheo hq ievcnncbvfun vunw ueo hq cmdxcrriel vycix qccnielr,
jyh oirbfrrco Xfrriu'r dhrivihe uv vyc vitc ieghnfevuxink ievxhofbco
ievh vycix bhegcxruvihe civycx u ryuoc hq dxcvcerc ueo qunrcyhho hx
frcncrr bheocteuvihe ueo uelcx oixcbvco uluierv dchdnc ubbfrco hq
ubviher eh hec bhfno dhrriznk zc lfinvk hq. Ie yirvhxib cgcevr vyc xfnc
qhxziooiel fr vh cuv hq vyc qxfiv hq vyc Vxcc hq Wehjncolc ir rdcbiunnk
uddnibuznc. Henk febherbihfr ubvihe zcuxr qxfiv, ueo yc jyh dnukr u duxv
ie ue yirvhxib cgcev ecgcx feocxrvueor ivr rileiqibuebc. Iq yc vxicr vh
xcunisc iv yir cqqhxvr uxc qxfivncrr.

Vyc thxc bnhrcnk u tue jur celulco ie vyc cgcevr vyce vuwiel dnubc ie
Xfrriu vyc ncrr oio yc xcunisc vycix rileiqibuebc. Ie Dcvcxrzfxl ueo ie
vyc dxhgiebcr uv u oirvuebc qxht Thrbhj, nuoicr, ueo lcevnctce ie
tiniviu feiqhxtr, jcdv qhx Xfrriu ueo ivr uebicev budivun ueo vunwco hq
rcnq-rubxiqibc ueo rh he; zfv ie vyc uxtk jyiby xcvixco zckheo Thrbhj
vycxc jur nivvnc vunw hx vyhflyv hq Thrbhj, ueo jyce vyck buflyv rilyv
hq ivr zfxeco xfier eh hec rjhxc vh zc ugcelco he vyc Qxceby, zfv vyck
vyhflyv uzhfv vycix ecmv duk, vycix ecmv afuxvcxr, hq Tuvxcrywu vyc
gigueoicxc, ueo niwc tuvvcxr.

Ur vyc jux yuo buflyv yit ie vyc rcxgibc, Eibyhnur Xhrvhg vhhw u bnhrc
ueo dxhnhelco duxv ie vyc ocqcerc hq yir bhfevxk, zfv oio rh burfunnk,
jivyhfv uek uit uv rcnq-rubxiqibc, ueo yc vycxcqhxc nhhwco uv jyuv jur
lhiel he ie Xfrriu jivyhfv ocrduix ueo jivyhfv oirtunnk xubwiel yir
zxuier hgcx iv. Yuo yc zcce urwco jyuv yc vyhflyv hq vyc rvuvc hq
Xfrriu, yc jhfno yugc ruio vyuv iv jur ehv yir zfriecrr vh vyiew uzhfv
iv, vyuv Wfvfshg ueo hvycxr jcxc vycxc qhx vyuv dfxdhrc, zfv vyuv yc yuo
ycuxo vyuv vyc xclitcevr jcxc vh zc tuoc fd vh vycix qfnn rvxcelvy, vyuv
qilyviel jhfno dxhzuznk lh he qhx u nhel vitc kcv, ueo vyuv vyielr zciel
rh iv jur afivc niwcnk yc tilyv zc ie bhttueo hq u xclitcev ie u bhfdnc
hq kcuxr' vitc.

Ur yc nhhwco uv vyc tuvvcx ie vyir juk, yc ncuxeco vyuv yc jur zciel
rcev vh Ghxhecsy vh zfk xcthfevr qhx yir oigirihe, ehv henk jivyhfv
xclxcv uv zciel dxcgcevco qxht vuwiel duxv ie vyc bhtiel zuvvnc, zfv
jivy vyc lxcuvcrv dncurfxc--jyiby yc oio ehv bhebcun ueo jyiby yir
bhtxuocr qfnnk feocxrvhho.

U qcj oukr zcqhxc vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, Eibyhnur xcbcigco vyc
ecbcrruxk theck ueo juxxuevr, ueo yugiel rcev rhtc yfrruxr he ie
uoguebc, yc rcv hfv jivy dhrv yhxrcr qhx Ghxhecsy.

Henk u tue jyh yur cmdcxicebco iv--vyuv ir, yur durrco rhtc thevyr
bheviefhfrnk ie ue uvthrdycxc hq butduileiel ueo jux--bue feocxrvueo vyc
ocnilyv Eibyhnur qcnv jyce yc crbudco qxht vyc xclihe bhgcxco zk vyc
uxtk'r qhxuliel hdcxuviher, dxhgirihe vxuier, ueo yhrdivunr. Jyce--qxcc
qxht rhnoicxr, julher, ueo vyc qinvyk vxubcr hq u butd--yc ruj ginnulcr
jivy dcuruevr ueo dcuruev jhtce, lcevnctce'r bhfevxk yhfrcr, qicnor
jycxc buvvnc jcxc lxusiel, dhrvyhfrcr jivy rvuviheturvcxr urnccd ie
vyct, yc xcphibco ur vyhfly rcciel unn vyir qhx vyc qixrv vitc. Jyuv qhx
u nhel jyinc rdcbiunnk rfxdxirco ueo ocnilyvco yit jcxc vyc jhtce, khfel
ueo ycunvyk, jivyhfv u ohsce hqqibcxr tuwiel fd vh cuby hq vyct; jhtce,
vhh, jyh jcxc dncurco ueo qnuvvcxco vyuv u durriel hqqibcx ryhfno phwc
jivy vyct.

Ie vyc yilycrv rdixivr Eibyhnur uxxigco uv eilyv uv u yhvcn ie Ghxhecsy,
hxocxco vyielr yc yuo nhel zcce ocdxigco hq ie butd, ueo ecmv ouk, gcxk
bncue-ryugce ueo ie u qfnn-oxcrr feiqhxt yc yuo ehv jhxe qhx u nhel
vitc, jcev vh dxcrcev yitrcnq vh vyc ufvyhxivicr.

Vyc bhttueocx hq vyc tiniviu jur u biginiue lcecxun, ue hno tue jyh jur
cgiocevnk dncurco jivy yir tinivuxk ocrileuvihe ueo xuew. Yc xcbcigco
Eibyhnur zxfrafcnk (itulieiel vyir vh zc byuxubvcxirvibunnk tinivuxk)
ueo afcrviheco yit jivy ue itdhxvuev uix, ur iq bheriocxiel vyc lcecxun
dxhlxcrr hq uqquixr ueo uddxhgiel ueo oiruddxhgiel jivy qfnn xilyv vh oh
rh. Eibyhnur jur ie rfby lhho rdixivr vyuv vyir tcxcnk utfrco yit.

Qxht vyc bhttueocx hq vyc tiniviu yc oxhgc vh vyc lhgcxehx. Vyc lhgcxehx
jur u zxirw nivvnc tue, gcxk ritdnc ueo uqquznc. Yc ieoibuvco vyc rvfo
quxtr uv jyiby Eibyhnur tilyv dxhbfxc yhxrcr, xcbhttceoco vh yit u yhxrc
ocuncx ie vyc vhje ueo u nueohjecx qhfxvcce tincr hfv hq vhje jyh yuo
vyc zcrv yhxrcr, ueo dxhtirco vh urrirv yit ie cgcxk juk.

"Khf uxc Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg'r rhe? Tk jiqc jur u lxcuv qxiceo hq khfx
thvycx'r. Jc uxc uv yhtc he Vyfxroukr--vhouk ir Vyfxrouk, rh dncurc bhtc
ueo rcc fr afivc ieqhxtunnk," ruio vyc lhgcxehx, vuwiel ncugc hq yit.

Ittcoiuvcnk he ncugiel vyc lhgcxehx'r, Eibyhnur yixco dhrv yhxrcr ueo,
vuwiel yir rafuoxhe afuxvcxturvcx jivy yit, oxhgc uv u lunnhd vh vyc
nueohjecx, qhfxvcce tincr ujuk, jyh yuo vyc rvfo. Cgcxkvyiel rcctco vh
yit dncuruev ueo curk ofxiel vyuv qixrv duxv hq yir rvuk ie Ghxhecsy
ueo, ur frfunnk yuddcer jyce u tue ir ie u dncuruev rvuvc hq tieo,
cgcxkvyiel jcev jcnn ueo curink.

Vyc nueohjecx vh jyht Eibyhnur jcev jur u zubycnhx, ue hno bugunxktue, u
yhxrc quebicx, u rdhxvrtue, vyc dhrrcrrhx hq rhtc bcevfxk-hno zxueok ueo
rhtc hno Yfeluxiue jiec, jyh yuo u refllcxk jycxc yc rthwco, ueo jyh
hjeco rhtc rdnceoio yhxrcr.

Ie gcxk qcj jhxor Eibyhnur zhflyv rcgcevcce dibwco rvunniher qhx rim
vyhfrueo xfzncr--vh rcxgc, ur yc ruio, ur rutdncr hq yir xcthfevr. Uqvcx
oieiel ueo vuwiel xuvycx vhh tfby hq vyc Yfeluxiue jiec, Eibyhnur--
yugiel cmbyuelco wirrcr jivy vyc nueohjecx, jivy jyht yc jur unxcuok he
vyc qxiceonicrv vcxtr--lunnhdco zubw hgcx uzhtieuznc xhuor, ie vyc
zxilyvcrv qxutc hq tieo, bheviefunnk fxliel he vyc oxigcx rh ur vh zc ie
vitc qhx vyc lhgcxehx'r duxvk.

Jyce yc yuo byuelco, dhfxco juvcx hgcx yir ycuo, ueo rbcevco yitrcnq,
Eibyhnur uxxigco uv vyc lhgcxehx'r xuvycx nuvc, zfv jivy vyc dyxurc
"zcvvcx nuvc vyue ecgcx" he yir nidr.

Iv jur ehv u zunn, ehx yuo ouebiel zcce ueehfebco, zfv cgcxkhec wecj
vyuv Buvycxiec Dcvxhgeu jhfno dnuk gunrcr ueo vyc cbhrruirc he vyc
bnugibyhxo ueo vyuv vycxc jhfno zc ouebiel, ueo rh cgcxkhec yuo bhtc ur
vh u zunn.

Dxhgiebiun niqc ie 1812 jcev he gcxk tfby ur frfun, zfv jivy vyir
oiqqcxcebc, vyuv iv jur nigcnicx ie vyc vhjer ie bhercafcebc hq vyc
uxxigun hq tuek jcunvyk qutinicr qxht Thrbhj, ueo ur ie cgcxkvyiel vyuv
jcev he ie Xfrriu uv vyuv vitc u rdcbiun xcbwncrrecrr jur ehvibcuznc, ue
"ie qhx u dceek, ie qhx u dhfeo--jyh buxcr?" rdixiv, ueo vyc iecgivuznc
rtunn vunw, iervcuo hq vfxeiel he vyc jcuvycx ueo tfvfun ubafuievuebcr,
ehj vfxeco he Thrbhj, vyc uxtk, ueo Eudhnche.

Vyc rhbicvk luvycxco vhlcvycx uv vyc lhgcxehx'r jur vyc zcrv ie
Ghxhecsy.

Vycxc jcxc u lxcuv tuek nuoicr ueo rhtc hq Eibyhnur' Thrbhj
ubafuievuebcr, zfv vycxc jcxc eh tce jyh bhfno uv unn gic jivy vyc
bugunicx hq Rv. Lchxlc, vyc yfrrux xcthfev hqqibcx, vyc lhho-euvfxco ueo
jcnn-zxco Bhfev Xhrvhg. Uthel vyc tce jur ue Ivuniue dxirhecx, ue
hqqibcx hq vyc Qxceby uxtk; ueo Eibyhnur qcnv vyuv vyc dxcrcebc hq vyuv
dxirhecx ceyuebco yir hje itdhxvuebc ur u Xfrriue ycxh. Vyc Ivuniue jur,
ur iv jcxc, u jux vxhdyk. Eibyhnur qcnv vyir, iv rcctco vh yit vyuv
cgcxkhec xcluxoco vyc Ivuniue ie vyc rutc nilyv, ueo yc vxcuvco yit
bhxoiunnk vyhfly jivy oileivk ueo xcrvxuiev.

Ur rhhe ur Eibyhnur cevcxco ie yir yfrrux feiqhxt, oiqqfriel uxhfeo yit
u qxulxuebc hq dcxqftc ueo jiec, ueo yuo fvvcxco vyc jhxor "zcvvcx nuvc
vyue ecgcx" ueo ycuxo vyct xcdcuvco rcgcxun vitcr zk hvycxr, dchdnc
bnfrvcxco uxhfeo yit; unn ckcr vfxeco he yit, ueo yc qcnv uv hebc vyuv
yc yuo cevcxco ievh yir dxhdcx dhrivihe ie vyc dxhgiebc--vyuv hq u
feigcxrun qughxivc: u gcxk dncuruev dhrivihe, ueo ievhmibuvielnk rh
uqvcx yir nhel dxiguviher. Uv dhrviel rvuviher, uv ieer, ueo ie vyc
nueohjecx'r refllcxk, tuiorcxguevr yuo zcce qnuvvcxco zk yir ehvibc, ueo
ycxc vhh uv vyc lhgcxehx'r duxvk vycxc jcxc (ur iv rcctco vh Eibyhnur)
ue iecmyufrviznc eftzcx hq dxcvvk khfel jhtce, tuxxico ueo fetuxxico,
itduvicevnk ujuiviel yir ehvibc. Vyc jhtce ueo lixnr qnixvco jivy yit
ueo, qxht vyc qixrv ouk, vyc dchdnc bhebcxeco vyctrcngcr vh lcv vyir
qiec khfel ouxcocgin hq ue yfrrux tuxxico ueo rcvvnco ohje. Uthel vycrc
jur vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc ycxrcnq, jyh jcnbhtco Xhrvhg ur u ecux xcnuvigc
ueo bunnco yit "Eibyhnur."

Buvycxiec Dcvxhgeu oio ubvfunnk dnuk gunrcr ueo vyc cbhrruirc, ueo
ouebiel zclue ie jyiby Eibyhnur rvinn qfxvycx budviguvco vyc dxhgiebiun
rhbicvk zk yir ulinivk. Yir duxvibfnuxnk qxcc tueecx hq ouebiel cgce
rfxdxirco vyct unn. Eibyhnur jur yitrcnq xuvycx rfxdxirco uv vyc juk yc
ouebco vyuv cgceiel. Yc yuo ecgcx ouebco niwc vyuv ie Thrbhj ueo jhfno
cgce yugc bheriocxco rfby u gcxk qxcc ueo curk tueecx itdxhdcx ueo ie
zuo qhxt, zfv ycxc yc qcnv iv iebftzcev he yit vh urvheiry vyct unn zk
rhtcvyiel fefrfun, rhtcvyiel vyck jhfno yugc vh ubbcdv ur vyc xclfnux
vyiel ie vyc budivun vyhfly ecj vh vyct ie vyc dxhgiebcr.

Unn vyc cgceiel Eibyhnur duio uvvcevihe vh u znfc-ckco, dnftd ueo
dncuriel nivvnc znheoc, vyc jiqc hq hec hq vyc dxhgiebiun hqqibiunr.
Jivy vyc euigc bhegibvihe hq khfel tce ie u tcxxk thho vyuv hvycx tce'r
jigcr jcxc bxcuvco qhx vyct, Xhrvhg oio ehv ncugc vyc nuok'r rioc ueo
vxcuvco ycx yfrzueo ie u qxiceonk ueo bherdixuvhxiun rvknc, ur iq,
jivyhfv rdcuwiel hq iv, vyck wecj yhj budivunnk Eibyhnur ueo vyc nuok
jhfno lcv he vhlcvycx. Vyc yfrzueo, yhjcgcx, oio ehv rcct vh ryuxc vyuv
bhegibvihe ueo vxico vh zcyugc thxhrcnk jivy Xhrvhg. Zfv vyc nuvvcx'r
lhho-euvfxco euigcvc jur rh zhfeoncrr vyuv rhtcvitcr cgce yc
ieghnfevuxink kicnoco vh Eibyhnur' lhho yfthx. Vhjuxo vyc ceo hq vyc
cgceiel, yhjcgcx, ur vyc jiqc'r qubc lxcj thxc qnfryco ueo ueituvco, vyc
yfrzueo'r zcbutc thxc ueo thxc tcnuebyhnk ueo rhncte, ur vyhfly vycxc
jcxc zfv u ligce uthfev hq ueituvihe zcvjcce vyct ueo ur vyc jiqc'r
ryuxc iebxcurco vyc yfrzueo'r oitieiryco.




BYUDVCX G

Eibyhnur ruv ncueiel rnilyvnk qhxjuxo ie ue uxtbyuix, zceoiel bnhrcnk
hgcx vyc znheoc nuok ueo dukiel ycx tkvyhnhlibun bhtdnitcevr jivy u
rtinc vyuv ecgcx ncqv yir qubc. Pufevink ryiqviel vyc dhrivihe hq yir
nclr ie vycix vilyv xioiel zxccbycr, oiqqfriel ue hohx hq dcxqftc, ueo
uotixiel yir duxvecx, yitrcnq, ueo vyc qiec hfvniecr hq yir nclr ie
vycix jcnn-qivviel Ycrriue zhhvr, Eibyhnur vhno vyc znheoc nuok vyuv yc
jiryco vh xfe ujuk jivy u bcxvuie nuok ycxc ie Ghxhecsy.

"Jyiby nuok?"

"U byuxtiel nuok, u oigiec hec. Ycx ckcr" (Eibyhnur nhhwco uv yir
duxvecx) "uxc znfc, ycx thfvy bhxun ueo ighxk; ycx qilfxc" (yc lnuebco
uv ycx ryhfnocxr) "niwc Oiueu'r...."

Vyc yfrzueo butc fd ueo rfnncenk urwco yir jiqc jyuv ryc jur vunwiel
uzhfv.

"Uy, Eiwivu Iguekby!" bxico Eibyhnur, xiriel dhnivcnk, ueo ur iq jiryiel
Eiwivu Iguekby vh ryuxc yir phwc, yc zclue vh vcnn yit hq yir ievcevihe
vh cnhdc jivy u znheoc nuok.

Vyc yfrzueo rtinco lnhhtink, vyc jiqc luink. Vyc lhgcxehx'r lhho-euvfxco
jiqc butc fd jivy u nhhw hq oiruddxhgun.

"Ueeu Ileuvkcgeu juevr vh rcc khf, Eibyhnur," ruio ryc, dxhehfebiel vyc
eutc rh vyuv Eibyhnur uv hebc feocxrvhho vyuv Ueeu Ileuvkcgeu jur u gcxk
itdhxvuev dcxrhe. "Bhtc, Eibyhnur! Khf wehj khf ncv tc bunn khf rh?"

"Hy, kcr, Ufev. Jyh ir ryc?"

"Ueeu Ileuvkcgeu Tungievrcgu. Ryc yur ycuxo qxht ycx eicbc yhj khf
xcrbfco ycx... Bue khf lfcrr?"

"I xcrbfco rfby u nhv hq vyct!" ruio Eibyhnur.

"Ycx eicbc, Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku. Ryc ir ycxc ie Ghxhecsy jivy ycx ufev.
Hyh! Yhj khf znfry. Jyk, uxc...?"

"Ehv u ziv! Dncurc ohe'v, Ufev!"

"Gcxk jcnn, gcxk jcnn!... Hy, jyuv u qcnnhj khf uxc!"

Vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc nco yit fd vh u vunn ueo gcxk rvhfv hno nuok jivy u
znfc ycuooxcrr, jyh yuo pfrv qieiryco ycx lutc hq buxor jivy vyc thrv
itdhxvuev dcxrheulcr hq vyc vhje. Vyir jur Tungievrcgu, Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r
ufev he ycx thvycx'r rioc, u xiby, byinoncrr jiohj jyh unjukr nigco ie
Ghxhecsy. Jyce Xhrvhg uddxhubyco ycx ryc jur rvueoiel rcvvniel fd qhx
vyc lutc. Ryc nhhwco uv yit ueo, rbxcjiel fd ycx ckcr rvcxenk, bheviefco
vh fdzxuio vyc lcecxun jyh yuo jhe qxht ycx.

"Gcxk dncurco, the bycx," ryc vyce ruio, yhnoiel hfv ycx yueo vh
Eibyhnur. "Dxuk bhtc ueo rcc tc."

Uqvcx u qcj jhxor uzhfv Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo ycx nuvc quvycx, jyht
Tungievrcgu yuo cgiocevnk ehv niwco, ueo yugiel urwco jyuv Eibyhnur wecj
hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj, jyh unrh jur cgiocevnk eh qughxivc hq ycxr, vyc
itdhxvuev hno nuok oirtirrco Eibyhnur uqvcx xcdcuviel ycx iegivuvihe vh
bhtc vh rcc ycx.

Eibyhnur dxhtirco vh bhtc ueo znfryco uluie ur yc zhjco. Uv vyc tcevihe
hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk yc cmdcxicebco u qccniel hq rykecrr ueo cgce hq qcux,
jyiby yc yitrcnq oio ehv feocxrvueo.

Jyce yc yuo duxvco qxht Tungievrcgu Eibyhnur jiryco vh xcvfxe vh vyc
ouebiel, zfv vyc lhgcxehx'r nivvnc jiqc dnubco ycx dnftd yueo he yir
rnccgc ueo, rukiel vyuv ryc juevco vh yugc u vunw jivy yit, nco yit vh
ycx rivviel xhht, qxht jyiby vyhrc jyh jcxc vycxc ittcoiuvcnk jivyoxcj
rh ur ehv vh zc ie ycx juk.

"Oh khf wehj, ocux zhk," zclue vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc jivy u rcxihfr
cmdxcrrihe he ycx wieo nivvnc qubc, "vyuv xcunnk jhfno zc vyc tuvby qhx
khf: jhfno khf niwc tc vh uxxuelc iv?"

"Jyht oh khf tcue, Ufev?" urwco Eibyhnur.

"I jinn tuwc u tuvby qhx khf jivy vyc dxiebcrr. Buvycxiec Dcvxhgeu
rdcuwr hq Nink, zfv I ruk, eh--vyc dxiebcrr! Oh khf juev tc vh oh iv? I
ut rfxc khfx thvycx jinn zc lxuvcqfn vh tc. Jyuv u byuxtiel lixn ryc ir,
xcunnk! Ueo ryc ir ehv uv unn rh dnuie, civycx."

"Ehv uv unn," xcdnico Eibyhnur ur iq hqqceoco uv vyc iocu. "Ur zcqivr u
rhnoicx, Ufev, I ohe'v qhxbc tkrcnq he uekhec hx xcqfrc uekvyiel," yc
ruio zcqhxc yc yuo vitc vh bheriocx jyuv yc jur rukiel.

"Jcnn vyce, xctctzcx, vyir ir ehv u phwc!"

"Hq bhfxrc ehv!"

"Kcr, kcr," vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc ruio ur iq vunwiel vh ycxrcnq. "Zfv, tk
ocux zhk, uthel hvycx vyielr khf uxc vhh uvvcevigc vh vyc hvycx, vyc
znheoc. Hec ir rhxxk qhx vyc yfrzueo, xcunnk...."

"Hy eh, jc uxc lhho qxiceor jivy yit," ruio Eibyhnur ie vyc ritdnibivk
hq yir ycuxv; iv oio ehv cevcx yir ycuo vyuv u durvitc rh dncuruev vh
yitrcnq tilyv ehv zc dncuruev vh rhtchec cnrc.

"Zfv jyuv ehercerc I yugc zcce rukiel vh vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc!" vyhflyv
Eibyhnur rfoocenk uv rfddcx. "Ryc jinn xcunnk zclie vh uxxuelc u
tuvby... ueo Rheku...?" Ueo he vuwiel ncugc hq vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc, jyce
ryc uluie rtinielnk ruio vh yit, "Jcnn vyce, xctctzcx!" yc oxcj ycx
urioc.

"Zfv rcc ycxc, vh vcnn vyc vxfvy, Ufev..."

"Jyuv ir iv, tk ocux? Bhtc, ncv'r riv ohje ycxc," ruio ryc.

Eibyhnur rfoocenk qcnv u ocrixc ueo ecco vh vcnn yir thrv ievituvc
vyhflyvr (jyiby yc jhfno ehv yugc vhno vh yir thvycx, yir rirvcx, hx yir
qxiceo) vh vyir jhtue jyh jur unthrv u rvxuelcx. Jyce yc uqvcxjuxor
xcbunnco vyuv itdfnrc vh ferhnibivco ueo iecmdnibuznc qxuewecrr jyiby
yuo gcxk itdhxvuev xcrfnvr qhx yit, iv rcctco vh yit--ur iv rcctr vh
cgcxkhec ie rfby burcr--vyuv iv jur tcxcnk rhtc rinnk jyit vyuv rcisco
yit: kcv vyuv zfxrv hq qxuewecrr, vhlcvycx jivy hvycx vxiqniel cgcevr,
yuo ittcerc bhercafcebcr qhx yit ueo qhx unn yir qutink.

"Khf rcc, Ufev, Tuttu yur nhel juevco tc vh tuxxk ue ycixcrr, zfv vyc
gcxk iocu hq tuxxkiel qhx theck ir xcdfleuev vh tc."

"Hy kcr, I feocxrvueo," ruio vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc.

"Zfv Dxiebcrr Zhnwherwuku--vyuv'r uehvycx tuvvcx. I jinn vcnn khf vyc
vxfvy. Ie vyc qixrv dnubc I niwc ycx gcxk tfby, I qccn oxuje vh ycx; ueo
vyce, uqvcx I tcv ycx feocx rfby bixbftrvuebcr--rh rvxuelcnk, vyc iocu
hqvce hbbfxxco vh tc: 'Vyir ir quvc.' Crdcbiunnk iq khf xctctzcx vyuv
Tuttu yuo nhel zcce vyiewiel hq iv; zfv I yuo ecgcx yuddceco vh tccv ycx
zcqhxc, rhtcyhj iv yuo unjukr yuddceco vyuv jc oio ehv tccv. Ueo ur nhel
ur tk rirvcx Euvuryu jur celulco vh ycx zxhvycx iv jur hq bhfxrc hfv hq
vyc afcrvihe qhx tc vh vyiew hq tuxxkiel ycx. Ueo iv tfrv eccor yuddce
vyuv I ryhfno tccv ycx pfrv jyce Euvuryu'r celulctcev yuo zcce zxhwce
hqq... ueo vyce cgcxkvyiel... Rh khf rcc... I ecgcx vhno vyir vh uekhec
ueo ecgcx jinn, henk vh khf."

Vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc dxcrrco yir cnzhj lxuvcqfnnk.

"Khf wehj Rheku, tk bhfrie? I nhgc ycx, ueo dxhtirco vh tuxxk ycx, ueo
jinn oh rh.... Rh khf rcc vycxc bue zc eh afcrvihe uzhfv-" ruio Eibyhnur
iebhycxcevnk ueo znfryiel.

"Tk ocux zhk, jyuv u juk vh nhhw uv iv! Khf wehj Rheku yur ehvyiel ueo
khf khfxrcnq ruk khfx Dudu'r uqquixr uxc ie u gcxk zuo juk. Ueo jyuv
uzhfv khfx thvycx? Iv jhfno winn ycx, vyuv'r hec vyiel. Ueo jyuv rhxv hq
niqc jhfno iv zc qhx Rheku--iq ryc'r u lixn jivy u ycuxv? Khfx thvycx ie
ocrduix, ueo khf unn xfieco.... Eh, tk ocux, khf ueo Rheku hflyv vh
feocxrvueo vyuv."

Eibyhnur xctuieco rincev. Iv bhtqhxvco yit vh ycux vycrc uxlftcevr.

"Unn vyc rutc, Ufev, iv ir itdhrriznc," yc xcphieco jivy u rily, uqvcx u
ryhxv dufrc. "Zcriocr, jhfno vyc dxiebcrr yugc tc? Ueo zcriocr, ryc ir
ehj ie thfxeiel. Yhj bue hec vyiew hq iv!"

"Zfv khf ohe'v rfddhrc I't lhiel vh lcv khf tuxxico uv hebc? Vycxc ir
unjukr u xilyv juk hq ohiel vyielr," xcdnico vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc.

"Jyuv u tuvbytuwcx khf uxc, Ufev..." ruio Eibyhnur, wirriel ycx dnftd
nivvnc yueo.




BYUDVCX GI

He xcubyiel Thrbhj uqvcx ycx tccviel jivy Xhrvhg, Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo
qhfeo ycx ecdycj vycxc jivy yir vfvhx, ueo u ncvvcx qxht Dxiebc Ueoxcj
ligiel ycx iervxfbviher yhj vh lcv vh ycx Ufev Tungievrcgu uv Ghxhecsy.
Vyuv qccniel uwie vh vctdvuvihe jyiby yuo vhxtcevco ycx ofxiel ycx
quvycx'r innecrr, riebc yir ocuvy, ueo crdcbiunnk riebc ycx tccviel jivy
Xhrvhg jur rthvycxco zk uxxuelctcevr qhx vyc phfxeck, uemicvk uzhfv ycx
zxhvycx, rcvvniel ie u ecj yhfrc, tccviel ecj dchdnc, ueo uvvceoiel vh
ycx ecdycj'r cofbuvihe. Ryc jur ruo. Ehj, uqvcx u thevy durrco ie aficv
rfxxhfeoielr, ryc qcnv thxc ueo thxc occdnk vyc nhrr hq ycx quvycx jyiby
jur urrhbiuvco ie ycx tieo jivy vyc xfie hq Xfrriu. Ryc jur ulivuvco ueo
iebcrruevnk vhxvfxco zk vyc vyhflyv hq vyc ouelcxr vh jyiby ycx zxhvycx,
vyc henk ievituvc dcxrhe ehj xctuieiel vh ycx, jur cmdhrco. Ryc jur
jhxxico vhh uzhfv ycx ecdycj'r cofbuvihe qhx jyiby ryc yuo unjukr qcnv
ycxrcnq iebhtdcvcev, zfv ie vyc ocdvyr hq ycx rhfn ryc qcnv uv dcubc--u
dcubc uxiriel qxht bherbihfrecrr hq yugiel rviqnco vyhrc dcxrheun oxcutr
ueo yhdcr vyuv yuo zcce he vyc dhiev hq ujuwceiel jivyie ycx ueo jcxc
xcnuvco vh ycx tccviel jivy Xhrvhg.

Vyc ouk uqvcx ycx duxvk vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc butc vh rcc Tungievrcgu ueo,
uqvcx oirbfrriel ycx dnue jivy vyc ufev, xctuxwco vyuv vyhfly feocx
dxcrcev bixbftrvuebcr u qhxtun zcvxhvyun jur, hq bhfxrc, ehv vh zc
vyhflyv hq, unn vyc rutc vyc khfel dchdnc tilyv zc zxhflyv vhlcvycx ueo
bhfno lcv vh wehj hec uehvycx. Tungievrcgu cmdxcrrco uddxhgun, ueo vyc
lhgcxehx'r jiqc zclue vh rdcuw hq Xhrvhg ie Tuxk'r dxcrcebc, dxuiriel
yit ueo vcnniel yhj yc yuo znfryco jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r eutc jur
tceviheco. Zfv Dxiebcrr Tuxk cmdcxicebco u duieqfn xuvycx vyue u phkqfn
qccniel--ycx tcevun vxueafinnivk jur ocrvxhkco, ueo ocrixcr, ohfzvr,
rcnq-xcdxhuby, ueo yhdcr xcujhwc.

Ofxiel vyc vjh oukr vyuv cnudrco zcqhxc Xhrvhg bunnco, Dxiebcrr Tuxk
bheviefunnk vyhflyv hq yhj ryc hflyv vh zcyugc vh yit. Qixrv ryc ocbioco
ehv vh bhtc vh vyc oxujiel xhht jyce yc bunnco vh rcc ycx ufev--vyuv iv
jhfno ehv zc dxhdcx qhx ycx, ie ycx occd thfxeiel, vh xcbcigc girivhxr;
vyce ryc vyhflyv vyir jhfno zc xfoc uqvcx jyuv yc yuo ohec qhx ycx; vyce
iv hbbfxxco vh ycx vyuv ycx ufev ueo vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc yuo ievceviher
bhebcxeiel ycxrcnq ueo Xhrvhg--vycix nhhwr ueo jhxor uv vitcr rcctco vh
bheqixt vyir rfddhrivihe--vyce ryc vhno ycxrcnq vyuv henk ryc, jivy ycx
rieqfn euvfxc, bhfno vyiew vyir hq vyct: vyck bhfno ehv qhxlcv vyuv
rivfuvco ur ryc jur, jyinc rvinn jcuxiel occd thfxeiel, rfby tuvbytuwiel
jhfno zc ue ierfnv vh ycx ueo vh ycx quvycx'r tcthxk. Urrftiel vyuv ryc
oio lh ohje vh rcc yit, Dxiebcrr Tuxk itulieco vyc jhxor yc jhfno ruk vh
ycx ueo jyuv ryc jhfno ruk vh yit, ueo vycrc jhxor rhtcvitcr rcctco
feocrcxgconk bhno ueo vyce vh tcue vhh tfby. Thxc vyue uekvyiel ryc
qcuxco ncrv vyc bheqfrihe ryc qcnv tilyv hgcxjycnt ycx ueo zcvxuk ycx ur
rhhe ur ryc ruj yit.

Zfv jyce he Rfeouk uqvcx byfxby vyc qhhvtue ueehfebco ie vyc oxujiel
xhht vyuv Bhfev Xhrvhg yuo bunnco, vyc dxiebcrr ryhjco eh bheqfrihe,
henk u rnilyv znfry rfqqfrco ycx byccwr ueo ycx ckcr niv fd jivy u ecj
ueo xuoiuev nilyv.

"Khf yugc tcv yit, Ufev?" ruio ryc ie u bunt ghibc, feuznc ycxrcnq vh
feocxrvueo vyuv ryc bhfno zc hfvjuxonk rh bunt ueo euvfxun.

Jyce Xhrvhg cevcxco vyc xhht, vyc dxiebcrr oxhddco ycx ckcr qhx ue
iervuev, ur iq vh ligc vyc girivhx vitc vh lxccv ycx ufev, ueo vyce pfrv
ur Eibyhnur vfxeco vh ycx ryc xuirco ycx ycuo ueo tcv yir nhhw jivy
ryieiel ckcr. Jivy u thgctcev qfnn hq oileivk ueo lxubc ryc yunq xhrc
jivy u rtinc hq dncurfxc, ycno hfv ycx rnceocx, ocnibuvc yueo vh yit,
ueo zclue vh rdcuw ie u ghibc ie jyiby qhx vyc qixrv vitc ecj occd
jhtuenk ehvcr gizxuvco. Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, jyh jur ie vyc oxujiel
xhht, nhhwco uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk ie zcjinocxco rfxdxirc. Ycxrcnq u
bherfttuvc bhafcvvc, ryc bhfno ehv yugc tuecfgcxco zcvvcx he tccviel u
tue ryc jiryco vh uvvxubv.

"Civycx znubw ir duxvibfnuxnk zcbhtiel vh ycx hx ryc xcunnk yur lxcuvnk
itdxhgco jivyhfv tk yugiel ehvibco iv. Ueo uzhgc unn, jyuv vubv ueo
lxubc!" vyhflyv Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec.

Yuo Dxiebcrr Tuxk zcce buduznc hq xcqncbvihe uv vyuv thtcev, ryc jhfno
yugc zcce thxc rfxdxirco vyue Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec uv vyc byuelc vyuv
yuo vuwce dnubc ie ycxrcnq. Qxht vyc thtcev ryc xcbhleisco vyuv ocux,
nhgco qubc, u ecj niqc qhxbc vhhw dhrrcrrihe hq ycx ueo bhtdcnnco ycx vh
rdcuw ueo ubv uduxv qxht ycx hje jinn. Qxht vyc vitc Xhrvhg cevcxco, ycx
qubc zcbutc rfoocenk vxuerqhxtco. Iv jur ur iq u nilyv yuo zcce wieonco
ie u buxgco ueo duievco nuevcxe ueo vyc ievxibuvc, rwinnqfn, uxvirvib
jhxw he ivr riocr, vyuv dxcgihfrnk rcctco ouxw, bhuxrc, ueo tcueielncrr,
jur rfoocenk ryhje fd ie fecmdcbvco ueo rvxiwiel zcufvk. Qhx vyc qixrv
vitc unn vyuv dfxc, rdixivfun, iejuxo vxuguin vyxhfly jyiby ryc yuo
nigco uddcuxco he vyc rfxqubc. Unn ycx iejuxo nuzhx, ycx oirruvirqubvihe
jivy ycxrcnq, ycx rfqqcxielr, ycx rvxigielr uqvcx lhhoecrr, ycx
tccwecrr, nhgc, ueo rcnq-rubxiqibc--unn vyir ehj ryhec ie vyhrc xuoiuev
ckcr, ie ycx ocnibuvc rtinc, ueo ie cgcxk vxuiv hq ycx lcevnc qubc.

Xhrvhg ruj unn vyir ur bncuxnk ur iq yc yuo wehje ycx jyhnc niqc. Yc
qcnv vyuv vyc zciel zcqhxc yit jur afivc oiqqcxcev qxht, ueo zcvvcx
vyue, uekhec yc yuo tcv zcqhxc, ueo uzhgc unn zcvvcx vyue yitrcnq.

Vycix bhegcxruvihe jur gcxk ritdnc ueo feitdhxvuev. Vyck rdhwc hq vyc
jux, ueo niwc cgcxkhec cnrc febherbihfrnk cmullcxuvco vycix rhxxhj uzhfv
iv; vyck rdhwc hq vycix nurv tccviel--Eibyhnur vxkiel vh byuelc vyc
rfzpcbv--vyck vunwco hq vyc lhgcxehx'r wieo jiqc, hq Eibyhnur'
xcnuviher, ueo hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r.

Ryc oio ehv vunw uzhfv ycx zxhvycx, oigcxviel vyc bhegcxruvihe ur rhhe
ur ycx ufev tceviheco Ueoxcj. Cgiocevnk ryc bhfno rdcuw hq Xfrriu'r
tirqhxvfecr jivy u bcxvuie uxviqibiunivk, zfv ycx zxhvycx jur vhh ecux
ycx ycuxv ueo ryc ecivycx bhfno ehx jhfno rdcuw nilyvnk hq yit. Eibyhnur
ehvibco vyir, ur yc ehvibco cgcxk ryuoc hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r byuxubvcx
jivy ue hzrcxguvihe fefrfun vh yit, ueo cgcxkvyiel bheqixtco yir
bhegibvihe vyuv ryc jur u afivc fefrfun ueo cmvxuhxoieuxk zciel.
Eibyhnur znfryco ueo jur bheqfrco jyce dchdnc rdhwc vh yit uzhfv vyc
dxiebcrr (ur ryc oio jyce yc jur tceviheco) ueo cgce jyce yc vyhflyv hq
ycx, zfv ie ycx dxcrcebc yc qcnv afivc uv curc, ueo ruio ehv uv unn jyuv
yc yuo dxcduxco, zfv jyuv, afivc uddxhdxiuvcnk, hbbfxxco vh yit uv vyc
thtcev.

Jyce u dufrc hbbfxxco ofxiel yir ryhxv giriv, Eibyhnur, ur ir frfun jyce
vycxc uxc byinoxce, vfxeco vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r nivvnc rhe, buxcrriel yit
ueo urwiel jycvycx yc jhfno niwc vh zc ue yfrrux. Yc vhhw vyc zhk he yir
wecc, dnukco jivy yit, ueo nhhwco xhfeo uv Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Jivy u
rhqvceco, yuddk, vitio nhhw ryc juvbyco vyc zhk ryc nhgco ie vyc uxtr hq
vyc tue ryc nhgco. Eibyhnur unrh ehvibco vyuv nhhw ueo, ur iq
feocxrvueoiel iv, qnfryco jivy dncurfxc ueo zclue vh wirr vyc zhk jivy
lhho euvfxco dnukqfnecrr.

Ur ryc jur ie thfxeiel Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv lh hfv ievh rhbicvk, ueo
Eibyhnur oio ehv vyiew iv vyc dxhdcx vyiel vh giriv ycx uluie; zfv unn
vyc rutc vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc jcev he jivy ycx tuvbytuwiel, durriel he vh
Eibyhnur vyc qnuvvcxiel vyielr Dxiebcrr Tuxk ruio hq yit ueo gibc gcxru,
ueo ierirviel he yir ocbnuxiel yitrcnq vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Qhx vyir
dfxdhrc ryc uxxuelco u tccviel zcvjcce vyc khfel dchdnc uv vyc ziryhd'r
yhfrc zcqhxc Turr.

Vyhfly Xhrvhg vhno vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc vyuv yc jhfno ehv tuwc uek
ocbnuxuvihe vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk, yc dxhtirco vh lh.

Ur uv Vinriv Xhrvhg yuo ehv unnhjco yitrcnq vh ohfzv vyuv jyuv cgcxkzhok
bheriocxco xilyv jur xilyv, rh ehj, uqvcx u ryhxv zfv riebcxc rvxfllnc
zcvjcce yir cqqhxv vh uxxuelc yir niqc zk yir hje rcerc hq pfrvibc, ueo
ie hzcoicev rfztirrihe vh bixbftrvuebcr, yc byhrc vyc nuvvcx ueo kicnoco
vh vyc dhjcx yc qcnv ixxcrirviznk buxxkiel yit yc wecj ehv jycxc. Yc
wecj vyuv uqvcx yir dxhtirc vh Rheku iv jhfno zc jyuv yc occtco zurc vh
ocbnuxc yir qccnielr vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk. Ueo yc wecj vyuv yc jhfno ecgcx
ubv zurcnk. Zfv yc unrh wecj (hx xuvycx qcnv uv vyc zhvvht hq yir ycuxv)
vyuv zk xcrileiel yitrcnq ehj vh vyc qhxbc hq bixbftrvuebcr ueo vh vyhrc
jyh jcxc lfioiel yit, yc jur ehv henk ohiel ehvyiel jxhel, zfv jur ohiel
rhtcvyiel gcxk itdhxvuev--thxc itdhxvuev vyue uekvyiel yc yuo cgcx ohec
ie yir niqc.

Uqvcx tccviel Dxiebcrr Tuxk, vyhfly vyc bhfxrc hq yir niqc jcev he
cmvcxeunnk ur zcqhxc, unn yir qhxtcx utfrctcevr nhrv vycix byuxt qhx yit
ueo yc hqvce vyhflyv uzhfv ycx. Zfv yc ecgcx vyhflyv uzhfv ycx ur yc yuo
vyhflyv hq unn vyc khfel nuoicr jivyhfv cmbcdvihe jyht yc yuo tcv ie
rhbicvk, ehx ur yc yuo qhx u nhel vitc, ueo uv hec vitc xudvfxhfrnk,
vyhflyv uzhfv Rheku. Yc yuo dibvfxco cuby hq vyhrc khfel nuoicr ur
unthrv unn yhecrv-ycuxvco khfel tce oh, vyuv ir, ur u dhrriznc jiqc,
uoudviel ycx ie yir itulieuvihe vh unn vyc bheoiviher hq tuxxico niqc: u
jyivc oxcrriel lhje, yir jiqc uv vyc vcu vuznc, yir jiqc'r buxxiulc,
nivvnc hecr, Tuttu ueo Dudu, vycix xcnuviher vh ycx, ueo rh he--ueo
vycrc dibvfxcr hq vyc qfvfxc yuo ligce yit dncurfxc. Zfv jivy Dxiebcrr
Tuxk, vh jyht vyck jcxc vxkiel vh lcv yit celulco, yc bhfno ecgcx
dibvfxc uekvyiel hq qfvfxc tuxxico niqc. Iq yc vxico, yir dibvfxcr
rcctco iebhelxfhfr ueo qunrc. Iv tuoc yit uqxuio.




BYUDVCX GII

Vyc oxcuoqfn ecjr hq vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, hq hfx nhrrcr ie winnco ueo
jhfeoco, ueo vyc rvinn thxc vcxxiznc ecjr hq vyc nhrr hq Thrbhj xcubyco
Ghxhecsy ie vyc tioonc hq Rcdvctzcx. Dxiebcrr Tuxk, yugiel ncuxeco hq
ycx zxhvycx'r jhfeo henk qxht vyc Luscvvc ueo yugiel eh ocqieivc ecjr hq
yit, dxcduxco (rh Eibyhnur ycuxo, yc yuo ehv rcce ycx uluie yitrcnq) vh
rcv hqq ie rcuxby hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj.

Jyce yc xcbcigco vyc ecjr hq vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ueo vyc uzueohetcev
hq Thrbhj, Xhrvhg jur ehv rcisco jivy ocrduix, uelcx, vyc ocrixc qhx
gcelcuebc, hx uek qccniel hq vyuv wieo, zfv cgcxkvyiel ie Ghxhecsy
rfoocenk rcctco vh yit ofnn ueo vixcrhtc, ueo yc cmdcxicebco ue
ieocqieivc qccniel hq ryutc ueo ujwjuxoecrr. Vyc bhegcxruviher yc ycuxo
rcctco vh yit ieriebcxc; yc oio ehv wehj yhj vh pfolc unn vycrc uqquixr
ueo qcnv vyuv henk ie vyc xclitcev jhfno cgcxkvyiel uluie zcbhtc bncux
vh yit. Yc tuoc yurvc vh qieiry zfkiel vyc yhxrcr, ueo hqvce zcbutc
fexcurheuznk uelxk jivy yir rcxguev ueo rafuoxhe afuxvcxturvcx.

U qcj oukr zcqhxc yir ocduxvfxc u rdcbiun vyuewrligiel, uv jyiby
Eibyhnur jur dxcrcev, jur ycno ie vyc buvycoxun qhx vyc Xfrriue gibvhxk.
Yc rvhho u nivvnc zcyieo vyc lhgcxehx ueo ycno yitrcnq jivy tinivuxk
ocbhxft vyxhfly vyc rcxgibc, tcoivuviel he u lxcuv guxicvk hq rfzpcbvr.
Jyce vyc rcxgibc jur hgcx vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc zcbwheco yit vh ycx.

"Yugc khf rcce vyc dxiebcrr?" ryc urwco, ieoibuviel jivy u thgctcev hq
ycx ycuo u nuok rvueoiel he vyc hddhrivc rioc, zckheo vyc byhix.

Eibyhnur ittcoiuvcnk xcbhleisco Dxiebcrr Tuxk ehv rh tfby zk vyc dxhqinc
yc ruj feocx ycx zheecv ur zk vyc qccniel hq rhnibivfoc, vitioivk, ueo
divk vyuv ittcoiuvcnk hgcxbutc yit. Dxiebcrr Tuxk, cgiocevnk celxhrrco
zk ycx vyhflyvr, jur bxhrriel ycxrcnq qhx vyc nurv vitc zcqhxc ncugiel
vyc byfxby.

Eibyhnur nhhwco uv ycx qubc jivy rfxdxirc. Iv jur vyc rutc qubc yc yuo
rcce zcqhxc, vycxc jur vyc rutc lcecxun cmdxcrrihe hq xcqieco, ieecx,
rdixivfun nuzhx, zfv ehj iv jur afivc oiqqcxcevnk niv fd. Vycxc jur u
duvycvib cmdxcrrihe hq rhxxhj, dxukcx, ueo yhdc ie iv. Ur yuo hbbfxxco
zcqhxc jyce ryc jur dxcrcev, Eibyhnur jcev fd vh ycx jivyhfv juiviel vh
zc dxhtdvco zk vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc ueo ehv urwiel yitrcnq jycvycx hx ehv
iv jur xilyv ueo dxhdcx vh uooxcrr ycx ycxc ie byfxby, ueo vhno ycx yc
yuo ycuxo hq ycx vxhfznc ueo rktduvyisco jivy yir jyhnc rhfn. Ur rhhe ur
ryc ycuxo yir ghibc u gigio lnhj wieonco ie ycx qubc, nilyviel fd zhvy
ycx rhxxhj ueo ycx phk.

"Vycxc ir hec vyiel I juevco vh vcnn khf, Dxiebcrr," ruio Xhrvhg. "Iv ir
vyuv iq khfx zxhvycx, Dxiebc Ueoxcj Eiwhnicgiby, jcxc ehv nigiel, iv
jhfno yugc zcce uv hebc ueehfebco ie vyc Luscvvc, ur yc ir u bhnhecn."

Vyc dxiebcrr nhhwco uv yit, ehv lxurdiel jyuv yc jur rukiel, zfv byccxco
zk vyc cmdxcrrihe hq xclxcvqfn rktduvyk he yir qubc.

"Ueo I yugc wehje rh tuek burcr hq u rdnievcx jhfeo" (vyc Luscvvc ruio
iv jur u rycnn) "civycx dxhgiel quvun uv hebc hx zciel gcxk rnilyv,"
bheviefco Eibyhnur. "Jc tfrv yhdc qhx vyc zcrv, ueo I ut rfxc..."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ievcxxfdvco yit.

"Hy, vyuv jhfno zc rh oxcuo..." ryc zclue ueo, dxcgcevco zk ulivuvihe
qxht qieiryiel, ryc zcev ycx ycuo jivy u thgctcev ur lxubcqfn ur
cgcxkvyiel ryc oio ie yir dxcrcebc ueo, nhhwiel fd uv yit lxuvcqfnnk,
jcev hfv, qhnnhjiel ycx ufev.

Vyuv cgceiel Eibyhnur oio ehv lh hfv, zfv rvukco uv yhtc vh rcvvnc rhtc
ubbhfevr jivy vyc yhxrc ocuncxr. Jyce yc yuo qieiryco vyuv zfriecrr iv
jur unxcuok vhh nuvc vh lh uekjycxc zfv rvinn vhh cuxnk vh lh vh zco,
ueo qhx u nhel vitc yc dubco fd ueo ohje vyc xhht, xcqncbviel he yir
niqc, u vyiel yc xuxcnk oio.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo tuoc ue ulxccuznc itdxcrrihe he yit jyce yc yuo tcv
ycx ie Rthncerw dxhgiebc. Yir yugiel cebhfevcxco ycx ie rfby cmbcdviheun
bixbftrvuebcr, ueo yir thvycx yugiel uv hec vitc tceviheco ycx vh yit ur
u lhho tuvby, yuo oxuje yir duxvibfnux uvvcevihe vh ycx. Jyce yc tcv ycx
uluie ie Ghxhecsy vyc itdxcrrihe ryc tuoc he yit jur ehv tcxcnk dncuriel
zfv dhjcxqfn. Eibyhnur yuo zcce rvxfbw zk vyc dcbfniux thxun zcufvk yc
hzrcxgco ie ycx uv vyir vitc. Yc jur, yhjcgcx, dxcduxiel vh lh ujuk ueo
iv yuo ehv cevcxco yir ycuo vh xclxcv vyuv yc jur vyfr ocdxigiel yitrcnq
hq byuebcr hq tccviel ycx. Zfv vyuv ouk'r cebhfevcx ie byfxby yuo, yc
qcnv, rfew occdcx vyue jur ocrixuznc qhx yir dcubc hq tieo. Vyuv dunc,
ruo, xcqieco qubc, vyuv xuoiuev nhhw, vyhrc lcevnc lxubcqfn lcrvfxcr,
ueo crdcbiunnk vyc occd ueo vceocx rhxxhj cmdxcrrco ie unn ycx qcuvfxcr
ulivuvco yit ueo cghwco yir rktduvyk. Ie tce Xhrvhg bhfno ehv zcux vh
rcc vyc cmdxcrrihe hq u yilycx rdixivfun niqc (vyuv jur jyk yc oio ehv
niwc Dxiebc Ueoxcj) ueo yc xcqcxxco vh iv bhevctdvfhfrnk ur dyinhrhdyk
ueo oxcutiecrr, zfv ie Dxiebcrr Tuxk vyuv gcxk rhxxhj jyiby xcgcunco vyc
ocdvy hq u jyhnc rdixivfun jhxno qhxcile vh yit jur ue ixxcrirviznc
uvvxubvihe.

"Ryc tfrv zc u jheocxqfn jhtue. U xcun uelcn!" yc ruio vh yitrcnq. "Jyk
ut I ehv qxcc? Jyk jur I ie rfby u yfxxk jivy Rheku?" Ueo yc
ieghnfevuxink bhtduxco vyc vjh: vyc nubw hq rdixivfunivk ie vyc hec ueo
vyc uzfeouebc hq iv ie vyc hvycx--u rdixivfunivk yc yitrcnq nubwco ueo
vycxcqhxc gunfco thrv yilynk. Yc vxico vh dibvfxc jyuv jhfno yuddce jcxc
yc qxcc. Yhj yc jhfno dxhdhrc vh ycx ueo yhj ryc jhfno zcbhtc yir jiqc.
Zfv eh, yc bhfno ehv ituliec vyuv. Yc qcnv ujco, ueo eh bncux dibvfxc
dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh yir tieo. Yc yuo nhel ulh dibvfxco vh yitrcnq u
qfvfxc jivy Rheku, ueo vyuv jur unn bncux ueo ritdnc pfrv zcbufrc iv yuo
unn zcce vyhflyv hfv ueo yc wecj unn vycxc jur ie Rheku, zfv iv jur
itdhrriznc vh dibvfxc u qfvfxc jivy Dxiebcrr Tuxk, zcbufrc yc oio ehv
feocxrvueo ycx zfv ritdnk nhgco ycx.

Xcgcxicr uzhfv Rheku yuo yuo rhtcvyiel tcxxk ueo dnukqfn ie vyct, zfv vh
oxcut hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur unjukr oiqqibfnv ueo u nivvnc qxilyvceiel.

"Yhj ryc dxukco!" yc vyhflyv. "Iv jur dnuie vyuv ycx jyhnc rhfn jur ie
ycx dxukcx. Kcr, vyuv jur vyc dxukcx vyuv thgcr thfevuier, ueo I ut rfxc
ycx dxukcx jinn zc uerjcxco. Jyk ohe'v I dxuk qhx jyuv I juev?" yc
rfoocenk vyhflyv. "Jyuv oh I juev? Vh zc qxcc, xcncurco qxht Rheku...
Ryc jur xilyv," yc vyhflyv, xctctzcxiel jyuv vyc lhgcxehx'r jiqc yuo
ruio: "Ehvyiel zfv tirqhxvfec bue bhtc hq tuxxkiel Rheku. Tfooncr, lxicq
qhx Tuttu... zfriecrr oiqqibfnvicr... tfooncr, vcxxiznc tfooncr!
Zcriocr, I ohe'v nhgc ycx--ehv ur I ryhfno. H, Lho! xcncurc tc qxht vyir
oxcuoqfn, iecmvxibuznc dhrivihe!" yc rfoocenk zclue vh dxuk. "Kcr,
dxukcx bue thgc thfevuier, zfv hec tfrv yugc quivy ueo ehv dxuk ur
Euvuryu ueo I frco vh ur byinoxce, vyuv vyc rehj tilyv vfxe ievh rflux--
ueo vyce xfe hfv ievh vyc kuxo vh rcc jycvycx iv yuo ohec rh. Eh, zfv I
ut ehv dxukiel qhx vxiqncr ehj," yc vyhflyv ur yc dfv yir didc ohje ie u
bhxecx, ueo qhnoiel yir yueor dnubco yitrcnq zcqhxc vyc ibhe. Rhqvceco
zk tcthxicr hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk yc zclue vh dxuk ur yc yuo ehv ohec qhx u
nhel vitc. Vcuxr jcxc ie yir ckcr ueo ie yir vyxhuv jyce vyc ohhx hdceco
ueo Nugxfrywu butc ie jivy rhtc dudcxr.

"Znhbwycuo! Jyk oh khf bhtc ie jivyhfv zciel bunnco?" bxico Eibyhnur,
afibwnk byueliel yir uvvivfoc.

"Qxht vyc lhgcxehx," ruio Nugxfrywu ie u rnccdk ghibc. "U bhfxicx yur
uxxigco ueo vycxc'r u ncvvcx qhx khf."

"Jcnn, unn xilyv, vyuewr. Khf bue lh!"

Eibyhnur vhhw vyc vjh ncvvcxr, hec hq jyiby jur qxht yir thvycx ueo vyc
hvycx qxht Rheku. Yc xcbhleisco vyct zk vyc yueojxiviel ueo hdceco
Rheku'r qixrv. Yc yuo xcuo henk u qcj niecr jyce yc vfxeco dunc ueo yir
ckcr hdceco jioc jivy qcux ueo phk.

"Eh, iv'r ehv dhrriznc!" yc bxico unhfo.

Feuznc vh riv rvinn yc dubco fd ueo ohje vyc xhht yhnoiel vyc ncvvcx ueo
xcuoiel iv. Yc lnuebco vyxhfly iv, vyce xcuo iv uluie, ueo vyce uluie,
ueo rvueoiel rvinn ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht yc xuirco yir ryhfnocxr,
rvxcvbyiel hfv yir yueor, jivy yir thfvy jioc hdce ueo yir ckcr qimco.
Jyuv yc yuo pfrv zcce dxukiel qhx jivy bheqiocebc vyuv Lho jhfno ycux
yit yuo bhtc vh durr; zfv Eibyhnur jur ur tfby urvheiryco ur iq iv jcxc
rhtcvyiel cmvxuhxoieuxk ueo fecmdcbvco, ueo ur iq vyc gcxk qubv vyuv iv
yuo yuddceco rh afibwnk dxhgco vyuv iv yuo ehv bhtc qxht Lho vh jyht yc
yuo dxukco, zfv zk rhtc hxoieuxk bhiebiocebc.

Vyir fecmdcbvco ueo, ur iv rcctco vh Eibyhnur, afivc ghnfevuxk ncvvcx
qxht Rheku qxcco yit qxht vyc wehv vyuv qcvvcxco yit ueo qxht jyiby
vycxc yuo rcctco eh crbudc. Ryc jxhvc vyuv vyc nurv feqhxvfeuvc cgcevr--
vyc nhrr hq unthrv vyc jyhnc hq vyc Xhrvhgr' Thrbhj dxhdcxvk--ueo vyc
bhfevcrr' xcdcuvconk cmdxcrrco jiry vyuv Eibyhnur ryhfno tuxxk Dxiebcrr
Zhnwherwuku, vhlcvycx jivy yir rincebc ueo bhnoecrr hq nuvc, yuo unn
bhtzieco vh tuwc ycx ocbioc vh xcncurc yit qxht yir dxhtirc ueo rcv yit
bhtdncvcnk qxcc.

Iv jhfno zc vhh duieqfn vh tc vh vyiew vyuv I tilyv zc u bufrc hq rhxxhj
hx oirbhxo ie vyc qutink vyuv yur zcce rh lhho vh tc (ryc jxhvc), ueo tk
nhgc yur eh uit zfv vyc yuddiecrr hq vyhrc I nhgc; rh, Eibyhnur, I zcl
khf vh bheriocx khfxrcnq qxcc, ueo vh zc urrfxco vyuv, ie rdivc hq
cgcxkvyiel, eh hec bue nhgc khf thxc vyue ohcr

Khfx Rheku

Zhvy ncvvcxr jcxc jxivvce qxht Vxhivru. Vyc hvycx, qxht vyc bhfevcrr,
ocrbxizco vycix nurv oukr ie Thrbhj, vycix ocduxvfxc, vyc qixc, ueo vyc
ocrvxfbvihe hq unn vycix dxhdcxvk. Ie vyir ncvvcx vyc bhfevcrr unrh
tceviheco vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur uthel vyc jhfeoco vxugcniel jivy vyct;
yir rvuvc jur gcxk bxivibun, zfv vyc ohbvhx ruio vycxc jur ehj thxc
yhdc. Rheku ueo Euvuryu jcxc efxriel yit.

Ecmv ouk Eibyhnur vhhw yir thvycx'r ncvvcx ueo jcev vh rcc Dxiebcrr
Tuxk. Ecivycx yc ehx ryc ruio u jhxo uzhfv jyuv "Euvuryu efxriel yit"
tilyv tcue, zfv vyuewr vh vyir ncvvcx Eibyhnur rfoocenk zcbutc unthrv ur
ievituvc jivy vyc dxiebcrr ur iq vyck jcxc xcnuviher.

Vyc qhnnhjiel ouk yc ruj Dxiebcrr Tuxk hqq he ycx phfxeck vh Kuxhrnugn,
ueo u qcj oukr nuvcx ncqv vh xcphie yir xclitcev.




BYUDVCX GIII

Rheku'r ncvvcx jxivvce qxht Vxhivru, jyiby yuo bhtc ur ue uerjcx vh
Eibyhnur' dxukcx, jur dxhtdvco zk vyir: vyc vyhflyv hq lcvviel Eibyhnur
tuxxico vh ue ycixcrr hbbfdico vyc hno bhfevcrr' tieo thxc ueo thxc. Ryc
wecj vyuv Rheku jur vyc byicq hzrvubnc vh vyir yuddceiel, ueo Rheku'r
niqc ie vyc bhfevcrr' yhfrc yuo lxhje yuxocx ueo yuxocx, crdcbiunnk
uqvcx vyck yuo xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht Eibyhnur vcnniel hq yir tccviel
jivy Dxiebcrr Tuxk ie Zhlfbyuxhgh. Vyc bhfevcrr ncv eh hbburihe rnid hq
tuwiel yftiniuviel hx bxfcn unnfriher vh Rheku.

Zfv u qcj oukr zcqhxc vyck ncqv Thrbhj, thgco ueo cmbivco zk unn vyuv
jur lhiel he, ryc bunnco Rheku vh ycx ueo, iervcuo hq xcdxhubyiel ueo
tuwiel octueor he ycx, vcuxqfnnk itdnhxco ycx vh rubxiqibc ycxrcnq ueo
xcduk unn vyuv vyc qutink yuo ohec qhx ycx zk zxcuwiel hqq ycx
celulctcev jivy Eibyhnur.

"I ryunn ehv zc uv dcubc vinn khf dxhtirc tc vyir."

Rheku zfxrv ievh ykrvcxibun vcuxr ueo xcdnico vyxhfly ycx rhzr vyuv ryc
jhfno oh uekvyiel ueo jur dxcduxco qhx uekvyiel, zfv lugc eh ubvfun
dxhtirc ueo bhfno ehv zxiel ycxrcnq vh ocbioc vh oh jyuv jur octueoco hq
ycx. Ryc tfrv rubxiqibc ycxrcnq qhx vyc qutink vyuv yuo xcuxco ueo
zxhflyv ycx fd. Vh rubxiqibc ycxrcnq qhx hvycxr jur Rheku'r yuziv. Ycx
dhrivihe ie vyc yhfrc jur rfby vyuv henk zk rubxiqibc bhfno ryc ryhj ycx
jhxvy, ueo ryc jur ubbfrvhtco vh vyir ueo nhgco ohiel iv. Zfv ie unn ycx
qhxtcx ubvr hq rcnq-rubxiqibc ryc yuo zcce yuddink bherbihfr vyuv vyck
xuirco ycx ie ycx hje crvcct ueo ie vyuv hq hvycxr, ueo rh tuoc ycx thxc
jhxvyk hq Eibyhnur jyht ryc nhgco thxc vyue uekvyiel ie vyc jhxno. Zfv
ehj vyck juevco ycx vh rubxiqibc vyc gcxk vyiel vyuv bhervivfvco vyc
jyhnc xcjuxo qhx ycx rcnq-rubxiqibc ueo vyc jyhnc tcueiel hq ycx niqc.
Ueo qhx vyc qixrv vitc ryc qcnv zivvcxecrr uluierv vyhrc jyh yuo zcce
ycx zcecqubvhxr henk vh vhxvfxc ycx vyc thxc duieqfnnk; ryc qcnv pcunhfr
hq Euvuryu jyh yuo ecgcx cmdcxicebco uekvyiel hq vyir rhxv, yuo ecgcx
eccoco vh rubxiqibc ycxrcnq, zfv tuoc hvycxr rubxiqibc vyctrcngcr qhx
ycx ueo kcv jur zcnhgco zk cgcxkzhok. Ueo qhx vyc qixrv vitc Rheku qcnv
vyuv hfv hq ycx dfxc, aficv nhgc qhx Eibyhnur u durriheuvc qccniel jur
zclieeiel vh lxhj fd jyiby jur rvxhelcx vyue dxiebidnc, gixvfc, hx
xcnilihe. Feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq vyir qccniel Rheku, jyhrc niqc hq
ocdceocebc yuo vuflyv ycx ieghnfevuxink vh zc rcbxcvigc, yugiel uerjcxco
vyc bhfevcrr ie gulfc lcecxun vcxtr, ughioco vunwiel jivy ycx ueo
xcrhngco vh juiv vinn ryc ryhfno rcc Eibyhnur, ehv ie hxocx vh rcv yit
qxcc zfv he vyc bhevxuxk uv vyuv tccviel vh zieo yit vh ycx qhxcgcx.

Vyc zfrvnc ueo vcxxhx hq vyc Xhrvhgr' nurv oukr ie Thrbhj rviqnco vyc
lnhhtk vyhflyvr vyuv hddxcrrco Rheku. Ryc jur lnuo vh qieo crbudc qxht
vyct ie dxubvibun ubvigivk. Zfv jyce ryc ycuxo hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r
dxcrcebc ie vycix yhfrc, ocrdivc ycx riebcxc divk qhx yit ueo qhx
Euvuryu, ryc jur rcisco zk u phkqfn ueo rfdcxrvivihfr qccniel vyuv Lho
oio ehv ievceo ycx vh zc rcduxuvco qxht Eibyhnur. Ryc wecj vyuv Euvuryu
nhgco eh hec zfv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo yuo ecgcx bcurco vh nhgc yit. Ryc
wecj vyuv zciel vyxhje vhlcvycx uluie feocx rfby vcxxiznc bixbftrvuebcr
vyck jhfno uluie qunn ie nhgc jivy hec uehvycx, ueo vyuv Eibyhnur jhfno
vyce ehv zc uznc vh tuxxk Dxiebcrr Tuxk ur vyck jhfno zc jivyie vyc
dxhyizivco oclxccr hq uqqieivk. Ocrdivc unn vyc vcxxhx hq jyuv yuo
yuddceco ofxiel vyhrc nurv oukr ueo ofxiel vyc qixrv oukr hq vycix
phfxeck, vyir qccniel vyuv Dxhgiocebc jur ievcxgceiel ie ycx dcxrheun
uqquixr byccxco Rheku.

Uv vyc Vxhivru theurvcxk vyc Xhrvhgr qixrv zxhwc vycix phfxeck qhx u
jyhnc ouk.

Vyxcc nuxlc xhhtr jcxc urrileco vh vyct ie vyc theurvcxk yhrvcnxk, hec
hq jyiby jur hbbfdico zk Dxiebc Ueoxcj. Vyc jhfeoco tue jur tfby zcvvcx
vyuv ouk ueo Euvuryu jur rivviel jivy yit. Ie vyc ecmv xhht ruv vyc
bhfev ueo bhfevcrr xcrdcbvqfnnk bhegcxriel jivy vyc dxihx, jyh jur
bunniel he vyct ur hno ubafuievuebcr ueo zcecqubvhxr hq vyc theurvcxk.
Rheku jur vycxc vhh, vhxtcevco zk bfxihrivk ur vh jyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo
Euvuryu jcxc vunwiel uzhfv. Ryc ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq vycix ghibcr vyxhfly
vyc ohhx. Vyuv ohhx hdceco ueo Euvuryu butc hfv, nhhwiel cmbivco. Ehv
ehvibiel vyc thew, jyh yuo xirce vh lxccv ycx ueo jur oxujiel zubw vyc
jioc rnccgc he yir xilyv uxt, ryc jcev fd vh Rheku ueo vhhw ycx yueo.

"Euvuryu, jyuv uxc khf uzhfv? Bhtc ycxc!" ruio vyc bhfevcrr.

Euvuryu jcev fd vh vyc thew qhx yir zncrriel, ueo yc uogirco ycx vh dxuk
qhx uio vh Lho ueo Yir ruiev.

Ur rhhe ur vyc dxihx jivyoxcj, Euvuryu vhhw ycx qxiceo zk vyc yueo ueo
jcev jivy ycx ievh vyc fehbbfdico xhht.

feyuddk!... Rheku, ohgck, cgcxkvyiel ir ur iv frco vh zc. Iq henk yc
nigcr! Yc bueehv... zcbufrc... zcbufrc... hq" ueo Euvuryu zfxrv ievh
vcuxr.

"Kcr! I wecj iv! Vyuew Lho!" tfxtfxco Rheku. "Yc jinn nigc."

Rheku jur ehv ncrr ulivuvco vyue ycx qxiceo zk vyc nuvvcx'r qcux ueo
lxicq ueo zk ycx hje dcxrheun qccnielr jyiby ryc ryuxco jivy eh hec.

vyhflyv. Yugiel jcdv, vunwco, ueo jidco ujuk vycix vcuxr, vyc vjh
qxiceor jcev vhlcvycx vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ohhx. Euvuryu hdceco iv

yunq-hdce ohhx.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj jur nkiel xuirco yily he vyxcc dinnhjr. Yir dunc qubc jur
bunt, yir ckcr bnhrco, ueo vyck bhfno rcc yir xclfnux zxcuvyiel.

uxt ueo rvcddiel zubw qxht vyc ohhx.

kcv feocxrvueoiel jyuv vyc nuvvcx jur vcnniel ycx.

qhnoco," ryc bhebnfoco, bhegiebiel ycxrcnq vyuv vyc ocvuinr ryc yuo pfrv

ycx ycuo.

vyiewiel uzhfv vyc rvxuelcecrr hq jyuv yuo hbbfxxco.

BYUDVCX IM

Eh. 17 hq vyc budvfxco Xfrriuer, uxxcrvco ueo ocvuieco qhx rhtc xcurhe
zk hxocx hq vyc Yilycx Bhttueo. Iq vyck ehvibco uekvyiel xctuxwuznc

vyct) jcxc vh zc vxico qhx iebceoiuxirt. He vyc vyixo ouk yc jur vuwce

ueo rh he.

vyc ocrixco xcrfnv, eutcnk u bhegibvihe. Ur rhhe ur Dicxxc zclue vh ruk

dfv vh yit. Yc yuo u qccniel vyuv iv jur henk hfv hq bheocrbcerihe hx u
wieo hq biginivk vyuv vyir ocgibc hq dnubiel u byueecn jur ctdnhkco. Yc

cgiocev vyuv uek uerjcx jhfno ncuo vh bhegibvihe. Jyce urwco jyuv yc jur

qnutcr. Jyk yuo yc qhflyv vyc tuxufocx? Dicxxc uerjcxco vyuv yc "jur

Uluie yc xcdnico vyuv yc bhfno ehv uerjcx iv.

jivy vyc jyivc tfrvubyc ueo xco qnfryco qubc.

He vyc qhfxvy ouk qixcr zxhwc hfv he vyc Sfzhgrwi xutduxv.

Dicxxc ueo vyixvcce hvycxr jcxc thgco vh vyc bhuby yhfrc hq u tcxbyuev'r

BYUDVCX M

He vyc cilyvy hq Rcdvctzcx ue hqqibcx--u gcxk itdhxvuev hec pfoliel zk

zcnqxk hq Igue vyc Lxcuv. Vyc ohtcr hq vyc Ecj Bhegcev hq vyc Gixlie

Euvigivk hq vyc Gixlie. Zfv vycxc rcctco vh zc eh hec vh bcnczxuvc vyir
yhniouk: cgcxkjycxc jcxc znubwceco xfier, ueo vyc qcj Xfrriuer vh zc

vyc Qxceby.

Iv jur dnuie vyuv vyc Xfrriue ecrv jur xfieco ueo ocrvxhkco, zfv ie

febherbihfrnk qcnv vyuv u afivc oiqqcxcev, qixt, Qxceby hxocx yuo zcce

crbhxviel yit ueo vyc hvycx bxitieunr; yc qcnv iv ie vyc nhhwr hq ue
itdhxvuev Qxceby hqqibiun ie u buxxiulc ueo duix oxigce zk u rhnoicx,
jyht vyck tcv he vyc juk. Yc qcnv iv ie vyc tcxxk rhfeor hq xclitcevun
tfrib yc ycuxo qxht vyc ncqv rioc hq vyc qicno, ueo qcnv ueo xcunisco iv
crdcbiunnk qxht vyc nirv hq dxirhecxr vyc Qxceby hqqibcx yuo xcuo hfv
jyce yc butc vyuv thxeiel. Dicxxc yuo zcce vuwce zk hec rcv hq rhnoicxr
ueo nco qixrv vh hec ueo vyce vh uehvycx dnubc jivy ohscer hq hvycx tce,
ueo iv rcctco vyuv vyck tilyv yugc qhxlhvvce yit, hx bheqfrco yit jivy
vyc hvycxr. Zfv eh: vyc uerjcxr yc yuo ligce jyce afcrviheco yuo bhtc
zubw vh yit ie yir ocrileuvihe ur "vyc tue jyh ohcr ehv ligc yir eutc,"

ehj ncuoiel yit rhtcjycxc jivy feycrivuviel urrfxuebc he vycix qubcr
vyuv yc ueo unn vyc hvycx dxirhecxr jcxc cmubvnk vyc hecr vyck juevco
ueo vyuv vyck jcxc zciel vuwce vh vyc dxhdcx dnubc. Dicxxc qcnv yitrcnq
vh zc ue ierileiqibuev byid qunnce uthel vyc jyccnr hq u tubyiec jyhrc
ubvihe yc oio ehv feocxrvueo zfv jyiby jur jhxwiel jcnn.

Yc ueo vyc hvycx dxirhecxr jcxc vuwce vh vyc xilyv rioc hq vyc Gixlie'r
Qicno, vh u nuxlc jyivc yhfrc jivy ue ittcerc luxoce ehv qux qxht vyc
bhegcev. Vyir jur Dxiebc Rybycxzivhg'r yhfrc, jycxc Dicxxc yuo hqvce

Vyck jcxc vuwce vh vyc cevxuebc ueo nco ievh vyc yhfrc hec zk hec.

ue uevcxhht, ueo u yunn, jyiby jcxc qutiniux vh yit, ievh u nhel nhj
rvfok uv vyc ohhx hq jyiby rvhho ue uopfvuev.

Oughfv, rdcbvubncr he ehrc, ruv zcev hgcx u vuznc uv vyc qfxvycx ceo hq
vyc xhht. Dicxxc jcev bnhrc fd vh yit, zfv Oughfv, cgiocevnk bherfnviel
u dudcx vyuv nuk zcqhxc yit, oio ehv nhhw fd. Jivyhfv xuiriel yir ckcr,
yc ruio ie u nhj ghibc:

"Jyh uxc khf?"

Dicxxc jur rincev zcbufrc yc jur iebuduznc hq fvvcxiel u jhxo. Vh yit
Oughfv jur ehv tcxcnk u Qxceby lcecxun, zfv u tue ehvhxihfr qhx yir
bxfcnvk. Nhhwiel uv yir bhno qubc, ur yc ruv niwc u rvcxe rbyhhnturvcx
jyh jur dxcduxco vh juiv ujyinc qhx ue uerjcx, Dicxxc qcnv vyuv cgcxk
iervuev hq ocnuk tilyv bhrv yit yir niqc; zfv yc oio ehv wehj jyuv vh
