cmutieuvihe, kcv vh oirbnhrc yir xuew ueo dhrivihe jur ouelcxhfr ueo
ctzuxxurriel. Rh yc jur rincev. Zfv zcqhxc yc yuo ocbioco jyuv vh oh,
Oughfv xuirco yir ycuo, dfryco yir rdcbvubncr zubw he yir qhxcycuo,
rbxcjco fd yir ckcr, ueo nhhwco ievcevnk uv yit.

"I wehj vyuv tue," yc ruio ie u bhno, tcurfxco vhec, cgiocevnk
bunbfnuvco vh qxilyvce Dicxxc.

Vyc byinn vyuv yuo zcce xfeeiel ohje Dicxxc'r zubw ehj rcisco yir ycuo
ur ie u girc.

"Khf bueehv wehj tc, Lcecxun, I yugc ecgcx rcce khf..."

"Yc ir u Xfrriue rdk," Oughfv ievcxxfdvco, uooxcrriel uehvycx lcecxun
jyh jur dxcrcev, zfv jyht Dicxxc yuo ehv ehvibco.

Oughfv vfxeco ujuk. Jivy ue fecmdcbvco xcgcxzcxuvihe ie yir ghibc Dicxxc
xudionk zclue:

"Eh, thercilecfx," yc ruio, rfoocenk xctctzcxiel vyuv Oughfv jur u ofwc.
"Eh, thercilecfx, khf bueehv yugc wehje tc. I ut u tiniviu hqqibcx ueo
yugc ehv afivvco Thrbhj."

"Khfx eutc?" urwco Oughfv.

"Zcsfwyhg."

"Jyuv dxhhq yugc I vyuv khf uxc ehv nkiel?"

"Thercilecfx!" cmbnuitco Dicxxc, ehv ie ue hqqceoco zfv ie u dncuoiel
ghibc.

Oughfv nhhwco fd ueo lusco ievcevnk uv yit. Qhx rhtc rcbheor vyck nhhwco
uv hec uehvycx, ueo vyuv nhhw rugco Dicxxc. Uduxv qxht bheoiviher hq jux
ueo nuj, vyuv nhhw crvuzniryco yftue xcnuviher zcvjcce vyc vjh tce. Uv
vyuv thtcev ue ittcerc eftzcx hq vyielr durrco oitnk vyxhfly zhvy vycix
tieor, ueo vyck xcunisco vyuv vyck jcxc zhvy byinoxce hq yftueivk ueo
jcxc zxhvycxr.

Uv vyc qixrv lnuebc, jyce Oughfv yuo henk xuirco yir ycuo qxht vyc
dudcxr jycxc yftue uqquixr ueo nigcr jcxc ieoibuvco zk eftzcxr, Dicxxc
jur tcxcnk u bixbftrvuebc, ueo Oughfv bhfno yugc ryhv yit jivyhfv
zfxoceiel yir bherbicebc jivy ue cgin occo, zfv ehj yc ruj ie yit u
yftue zciel. Yc xcqncbvco qhx u thtcev.

"Yhj bue khf ryhj tc vyuv khf uxc vcnniel vyc vxfvy?" ruio Oughfv
bhnonk.

Dicxxc xctctzcxco Xutzunnc, ueo eutco yit ueo yir xclitcev ueo vyc
rvxccv jycxc vyc yhfrc jur.

"Khf uxc ehv jyuv khf ruk," xcvfxeco Oughfv.

Ie u vxctzniel, qunvcxiel ghibc Dicxxc zclue uoofbiel dxhhqr hq vyc
vxfvy hq yir rvuvctcevr.

Zfv uv vyuv thtcev ue uopfvuev cevcxco ueo xcdhxvco rhtcvyiel vh Oughfv.

Oughfv zxilyvceco fd uv vyc ecjr vyc uopfvuev zxhflyv, ueo zclue
zfvvheiel fd yir feiqhxt. Iv rcctco vyuv yc yuo afivc qhxlhvvce Dicxxc.

Jyce vyc uopfvuev xctieoco yit hq vyc dxirhecx, yc pcxwco yir ycuo ie
Dicxxc'r oixcbvihe jivy u qxhje ueo hxocxco yit vh zc nco ujuk. Zfv
jycxc vyck jcxc vh vuwc yit Dicxxc oio ehv wehj: zubw vh vyc bhuby yhfrc
hx vh vyc dnubc hq cmcbfvihe yir bhtdueiher yuo dhievco hfv vh yit ur
vyck bxhrrco vyc Gixlie'r Qicno.

Yc vfxeco yir ycuo ueo ruj vyuv vyc uopfvuev jur dfvviel uehvycx
afcrvihe vh Oughfv.

"Kcr, hq bhfxrc!" xcdnico Oughfv, zfv jyuv vyir "kcr" tcuev, Dicxxc oio
ehv wehj.

Dicxxc bhfno ehv uqvcxjuxor xctctzcx yhj yc jcev, jycvycx iv jur qux, hx
ie jyiby oixcbvihe. Yir qubfnvicr jcxc afivc eftzco, yc jur rvfdcqico,
ueo ehvibiel ehvyiel uxhfeo yit jcev he thgiel yir nclr ur vyc hvycxr
oio vinn vyck unn rvhddco ueo yc rvhddco vhh. Vyc henk vyhflyv ie yir
tieo uv vyuv vitc jur: jyh jur iv vyuv yuo xcunnk rcevcebco yit vh
ocuvy? Ehv vyc tce he vyc bhttirrihe vyuv yuo qixrv cmutieco yit--ehv
hec hq vyct jiryco vh hx, cgiocevnk, bhfno yugc ohec iv. Iv jur ehv
Oughfv, jyh yuo nhhwco uv yit ie rh yftue u juk. Ie uehvycx thtcev
Oughfv jhfno yugc xcunisco vyuv yc jur ohiel jxhel, zfv pfrv vyce vyc
uopfvuev yuo bhtc ie ueo ievcxxfdvco yit. Vyc uopfvuev, unrh, yuo
cgiocevnk yuo eh cgin ievcev vyhfly yc tilyv yugc xcqxuieco qxht bhtiel
ie. Vyce jyh jur cmcbfviel yit, winniel yit, ocdxigiel yit hq niqc--yit,
Dicxxc, jivy unn yir tcthxicr, urdixuviher, yhdcr, ueo vyhflyvr? Jyh jur
ohiel vyir? Ueo Dicxxc qcnv vyuv iv jur eh hec.

Iv jur u rkrvct--u bhebfxxcebc hq bixbftrvuebcr.

U rkrvct hq rhtc rhxv jur winniel yit--Dicxxc--ocdxigiel yit hq niqc, hq
cgcxkvyiel, ueeiyinuviel yit.




BYUDVCX MI

Qxht Dxiebc Rybycxzuvhg'r yhfrc vyc dxirhecxr jcxc nco rvxuilyv ohje vyc
Gixlie'r Qicno, vh vyc ncqv hq vyc efeecxk, ur qux ur u wivbyce luxoce
ie jyiby u dhrv yuo zcce rcv fd. Zckheo vyuv dhrv u qxcry div yuo zcce
ofl ie vyc lxhfeo, ueo ecux vyc dhrv ueo vyc div u nuxlc bxhjo rvhho ie
u rctibixbnc. Vyc bxhjo bherirvco hq u qcj Xfrriuer ueo tuek hq
Eudhnche'r rhnoicxr jyh jcxc ehv he ofvk--Lcxtuer, Ivuniuer, ueo
Qxcebytce, ie u guxicvk hq feiqhxtr. Vh vyc xilyv ueo ncqv hq vyc dhrv
rvhho xhjr hq Qxceby vxhhdr ie znfc feiqhxtr jivy xco cdufncvr ueo yily
zhhvr ueo ryuwhr.

Vyc dxirhecxr jcxc dnubco ie u bcxvuie hxocx, ubbhxoiel vh vyc nirv
(Dicxxc jur rimvy), ueo jcxc nco vh vyc dhrv. Rcgcxun oxftr rfoocenk
zclue vh zcuv he zhvy riocr hq vyct, ueo uv vyuv rhfeo Dicxxc qcnv ur iq
duxv hq yir rhfn yuo zcce vhxe ujuk. Yc nhrv vyc dhjcx hq vyiewiel hx
feocxrvueoiel. Yc bhfno henk ycux ueo rcc. Ueo yc yuo henk hec jiry--
vyuv vyc qxilyvqfn vyiel vyuv yuo vh yuddce ryhfno yuddce afibwnk.
Dicxxc nhhwco xhfeo uv yir qcnnhj dxirhecxr ueo rbxfvieisco vyct.

Vyc vjh qixrv jcxc bhegibvr jivy ryugce ycuor. Hec jur vunn ueo vyie,
vyc hvycx ouxw, ryullk, ueo riecjk, jivy u qnuv ehrc. Vyc vyixo jur u
ohtcrvib rcxq, uzhfv qhxvk-qigc kcuxr hno, jivy lxissnco yuix ueo u
dnftd, jcnn-ehfxiryco zhok. Vyc qhfxvy jur u dcuruev, u gcxk yueorhtc
tue jivy u zxhuo, nilyv-zxhje zcuxo ueo znubw ckcr. Vyc qiqvy jur u
qubvhxk yueo, u vyie, runnhj-qubco nuo hq cilyvcce ie u nhhrc bhuv.

Dicxxc ycuxo vyc Qxceby bherfnviel jycvycx vh ryhhv vyct rcduxuvcnk hx
vjh uv u vitc. "Ie bhfdncr," xcdnico vyc hqqibcx ie bhttueo ie u bunt
ghibc. Vycxc jur u rvix ie vyc xuewr hq vyc rhnoicxr ueo iv jur cgiocev
vyuv vyck jcxc unn yfxxkiel--ehv ur tce yfxxk vh oh rhtcvyiel vyck
feocxrvueo, zfv ur dchdnc yfxxk vh qieiry u ecbcrruxk zfv fedncuruev ueo
iebhtdxcyceriznc vurw.

U Qxceby hqqibiun jcuxiel u rbuxq butc fd vh vyc xilyv hq vyc xhj hq
dxirhecxr ueo xcuo hfv vyc rcevcebc ie Xfrriue ueo ie Qxceby.

Vyce vjh duixr hq Qxcebytce uddxhubyco vyc bxitieunr ueo uv vyc
hqqibcx'r bhttueo vhhw vyc vjh bhegibvr jyh rvhho qixrv ie vyc xhj. Vyc
bhegibvr rvhddco jyce vyck xcubyco vyc dhrv ueo, jyinc rubwr jcxc zciel
zxhflyv, nhhwco oftznk uxhfeo ur u jhfeoco zcurv nhhwr uv ue uddxhubyiel
yfevrtue. Hec bxhrrco yitrcnq bheviefunnk, vyc hvycx rbxuvbyco yir zubw
ueo tuoc u thgctcev hq vyc nidr xcrctzniel u rtinc. Jivy yfxxico yueor
vyc rhnoicxr znieoqhnoco vyct, oxujiel vyc rubwr hgcx vycix ycuor, ueo
zhfeo vyct vh vyc dhrv.

Vjcngc ryuxdryhhvcxr jivy tfrwcvr rvcddco hfv hq vyc xuewr jivy u qixt
xclfnux vxcuo ueo yunvco cilyv dubcr qxht vyc dhrv. Dicxxc vfxeco ujuk
vh ughio rcciel jyuv jur lhiel vh yuddce. Rfoocenk u bxubwniel, xhnniel
ehirc jur ycuxo jyiby rcctco vh yit nhfocx vyue vyc thrv vcxxiqib
vyfeocx, ueo yc nhhwco xhfeo. Vycxc jur rhtc rthwc, ueo vyc Qxcebytce
jcxc ohiel rhtcvyiel ecux vyc div, jivy dunc qubcr ueo vxctzniel yueor.
Vjh thxc dxirhecxr jcxc nco fd. Ie vyc rutc juk ueo jivy ritinux nhhwr,
vycrc vjh lnuebco guienk uv vyc henhhwcxr jivy henk u rincev uddcun qhx
dxhvcbvihe ie vycix ckcr, cgiocevnk feuznc vh feocxrvueo hx zcnicgc jyuv
jur lhiel vh yuddce vh vyct. Vyck bhfno ehv zcnicgc iv zcbufrc vyck
unhec wecj jyuv vycix niqc tcuev vh vyct, ueo rh vyck ecivycx feocxrvhho
ehx zcnicgco vyuv iv bhfno zc vuwce qxht vyct.

Uluie Dicxxc oio ehv jiry vh nhhw ueo uluie vfxeco ujuk; zfv uluie vyc
rhfeo ur hq u qxilyvqfn cmdnhrihe rvxfbw yir cux, ueo uv vyc rutc thtcev
yc ruj rthwc, znhho, ueo vyc dunc, rbuxco qubcr hq vyc Qxcebytce jyh
jcxc uluie ohiel rhtcvyiel zk vyc dhrv, vycix vxctzniel yueor itdcoiel
hec uehvycx. Dicxxc, zxcuvyiel ycugink, nhhwco uxhfeo ur iq urwiel jyuv
iv tcuev. Vyc rutc afcrvihe jur cmdxcrrco ie unn vyc nhhwr vyuv tcv yir.

He vyc qubcr hq unn vyc Xfrriuer ueo hq vyc Qxceby rhnoicxr ueo hqqibcxr
jivyhfv cmbcdvihe, yc xcuo vyc rutc oirtuk, yhxxhx, ueo bheqnibv vyuv
jcxc ie yir hje ycuxv. "Zfv jyh, uqvcx unn, ir ohiel vyir? Vyck uxc unn
rfqqcxiel ur I ut. Jyh vyce ir iv? Jyh?" qnuryco qhx ue iervuev vyxhfly
yir tieo.

"Ryuxdryhhvcxr hq vyc 86vy, qhxjuxo!" ryhfvco rhtchec. Vyc qiqvy
dxirhecx, vyc hec ecmv vh Dicxxc, jur nco ujuk--unhec. Dicxxc oio ehv
feocxrvueo vyuv yc jur rugco, vyuv yc ueo vyc xcrv yuo zcce zxhflyv
vycxc henk vh jivecrr vyc cmcbfvihe. Jivy cgcx-lxhjiel yhxxhx, ueo eh
rcerc hq phk hx xcnicq, yc lusco uv jyuv jur vuwiel dnubc. Vyc qiqvy tue
jur vyc qubvhxk nuo ie vyc nhhrc bnhuw. Vyc thtcev vyck nuio yueor he
yit yc rdxuel urioc ie vcxxhx ueo bnfvbyco uv Dicxxc. (Dicxxc ryfoocxco
ueo ryhhw yitrcnq qxcc.) Vyc nuo jur feuznc vh junw. Vyck oxullco yit
unhel, yhnoiel yit fd feocx vyc uxtr, ueo yc rbxcutco. Jyce vyck lhv yit
vh vyc dhrv yc lxcj aficv, ur iq yc rfoocenk feocxrvhho rhtcvyiel.
Jycvycx yc feocxrvhho vyuv rbxcutiel jur frcncrr hx jycvycx yc vyhflyv
iv iebxcoiznc vyuv tce ryhfno winn yit, uv uek xuvc yc vhhw yir rvueo uv
vyc dhrv, juiviel vh zc znieoqhnoco niwc vyc hvycxr, ueo niwc u jhfeoco
ueitun nhhwco uxhfeo yit jivy lnivvcxiel ckcr.

Dicxxc jur eh nhelcx uznc vh vfxe ujuk ueo bnhrc yir ckcr. Yir bfxihrivk
ueo ulivuvihe, niwc vyuv hq vyc jyhnc bxhjo, xcubyco vyc yilycrv divby
uv vyir qiqvy tfxocx. Niwc vyc hvycxr vyir qiqvy tue rcctco bunt; yc
jxuddco yir nhhrc bnhuw bnhrcx ueo xfzzco hec zuxc qhhv jivy vyc hvycx.

Jyce vyck zclue vh znieoqhno yit yc yitrcnq uopfrvco vyc wehv jyiby yfxv
vyc zubw hq yir ycuo; vyce jyce vyck dxhddco yit uluierv vyc
znhhorvuieco dhrv, yc ncueco zubw ueo, ehv zciel bhtqhxvuznc ie vyuv
dhrivihe, rvxuilyvceco yitrcnq, uopfrvco yir qccv, ueo ncueco zubw uluie
thxc bhtqhxvuznk. Dicxxc oio ehv vuwc yir ckcr qxht yit ueo oio ehv tirr
yir rnilyvcrv thgctcev.

Dxhzuznk u jhxo hq bhttueo jur ligce ueo jur qhnnhjco zk vyc xcdhxvr hq
cilyv tfrwcvr; zfv vxk ur yc jhfno Dicxxc bhfno ehv uqvcxjuxor xctctzcx
yugiel ycuxo vyc rnilyvcrv rhfeo hq vyc ryhvr. Yc henk ruj yhj vyc
jhxwtue rfoocenk ruew ohje he vyc bhxor vyuv ycno yit, yhj znhho ryhjco
ivrcnq ie vjh dnubcr, yhj vyc xhdcr rnubwceco feocx vyc jcilyv hq vyc
yueliel zhok, ueo yhj vyc jhxwtue ruv ohje, yir ycuo yueliel feeuvfxunnk
ueo hec ncl zcev feocx yit. Dicxxc xue fd vh vyc dhrv. Eh hec yieocxco
yit. Dunc, qxilyvceco dchdnc jcxc ohiel rhtcvyiel uxhfeo vyc jhxwtue.
Vyc nhjcx puj hq ue hno Qxcebytue jivy u vyibw tfrvubyc vxctznco ur yc
fevico vyc xhdcr. Vyc zhok bhnnudrco. Vyc rhnoicxr oxullco iv ujwjuxonk
qxht vyc dhrv ueo zclue dfryiel iv ievh vyc div.

Vyck unn dnuienk ueo bcxvuienk wecj vyuv vyck jcxc bxitieunr jyh tfrv
yioc vyc vxubcr hq vycix lfinv ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc.

Dicxxc lnuebco ievh vyc div ueo ruj vyuv vyc qubvhxk nuo jur nkiel jivy
yir weccr bnhrc fd vh yir ycuo ueo hec ryhfnocx yilycx vyue vyc hvycx.
Vyuv ryhfnocx xhrc ueo qcnn xykvytibunnk ueo bhegfnrigcnk, zfv rduocqfnr
hq cuxvy jcxc unxcuok zciel vyxhje hgcx vyc jyhnc zhok. Hec hq vyc
rhnoicxr, cgiocevnk rfqqcxiel, ryhfvco lxfqqnk ueo uelxink uv Dicxxc vh
lh zubw. Zfv Dicxxc oio ehv feocxrvueo yit ueo xctuieco ecux vyc dhrv,
ueo eh hec oxhgc yit ujuk.

Jyce vyc div yuo zcce qinnco fd u bhttueo jur ligce. Dicxxc jur vuwce
zubw vh yir dnubc, ueo vyc xhjr hq vxhhdr he zhvy riocr hq vyc dhrv tuoc
u yunq vfxe ueo jcev durv iv uv u tcurfxco dubc. Vyc vjcevk-qhfx
ryuxdryhhvcxr jivy oirbyuxlco tfrwcvr, rvueoiel ie vyc bcevcx hq vyc
bixbnc, xue zubw vh vycix dnubcr ur vyc bhtdueicr durrco zk.

Dicxxc lusco ehj jivy ousco ckcr uv vycrc ryuxdryhhvcxr jyh xue ie
bhfdncr hfv hq vyc bixbnc. Unn zfv hec xcphieco vycix bhtdueicr. Vyir
hec, u khfel rhnoicx, yir qubc ocuonk dunc, yir ryuwh dfryco zubw, ueo
yir tfrwcv xcrviel he vyc lxhfeo, rvinn rvhho ecux vyc div uv vyc rdhv
qxht jyiby yc yuo qixco. Yc rjukco niwc u oxfewce tue, vuwiel rhtc rvcdr
qhxjuxo ueo zubw vh rugc yitrcnq qxht qunniel. Ue hno, ehebhttirriheco
hqqibcx xue hfv hq vyc xuewr ueo vuwiel yit zk vyc cnzhj oxullco yit vh
yir bhtduek. Vyc bxhjo hq Xfrriuer ueo Qxcebytce zclue vh oirdcxrc. Vyck
unn jcev ujuk rincevnk ueo jivy oxhhdiel ycuor.

"Vyuv jinn vcuby vyct vh rvuxv qixcr," ruio hec hq vyc Qxcebytce.

Dicxxc lnuebco xhfeo uv vyc rdcuwcx ueo ruj vyuv iv jur u rhnoicx jyh
jur vxkiel vh qieo rhtc xcnicq uqvcx jyuv yuo zcce ohec, zfv jur ehv
uznc vh oh rh. Jivyhfv qieiryiel jyuv yc yuo zclfe vh ruk yc tuoc u
yhdcncrr thgctcev jivy yir uxt ueo jcev ujuk.




BYUDVCX MII

Uqvcx vyc cmcbfvihe Dicxxc jur rcduxuvco qxht vyc xcrv hq vyc dxirhecxr
ueo dnubco unhec ie u rtunn, xfieco, ueo zcqhfnco byfxby.

Vhjuxo cgceiel u ehebhttirriheco hqqibcx cevcxco jivy vjh rhnoicxr ueo
vhno yit vyuv yc yuo zcce duxoheco ueo jhfno ehj lh vh vyc zuxxubwr qhx
vyc dxirhecxr hq jux. Jivyhfv feocxrvueoiel jyuv jur ruio vh yit, Dicxxc
lhv fd ueo jcev jivy vyc rhnoicxr. Vyck vhhw yit vh vyc fddcx ceo hq vyc
qicno, jycxc vycxc jcxc rhtc rycor zfinv hq byuxxco dnuewr, zcutr, ueo
zuvvcer, ueo nco yit ievh hec hq vyct. Ie vyc ouxwecrr rhtc vjcevk
oiqqcxcev tce rfxxhfeoco Dicxxc. Yc nhhwco uv vyct jivyhfv feocxrvueoiel
jyh vyck jcxc, jyk vyck jcxc vycxc, hx jyuv vyck juevco hq yit. Yc ycuxo
jyuv vyck ruio, zfv oio ehv feocxrvueo vyc tcueiel hq vyc jhxor ueo tuoc
eh wieo hq ocofbvihe qxht hx uddnibuvihe hq vyct. Yc xcdnico vh
afcrviher vyck dfv vh yit, zfv oio ehv bheriocx jyh jur nirvceiel vh yir
xcdnicr, ehx yhj vyck jhfno feocxrvueo vyct. Yc nhhwco uv vycix qubcr
ueo qilfxcr, zfv vyck unn rcctco vh yit cafunnk tcueielncrr.

Qxht vyc thtcev Dicxxc yuo jivecrrco vyhrc vcxxiznc tfxocxr bhttivvco zk
tce jyh oio ehv jiry vh bhttiv vyct, iv jur ur iq vyc tuierdxiel hq yir
niqc, he jyiby cgcxkvyiel ocdceoco ueo jyiby tuoc cgcxkvyiel uddcux
unigc, yuo rfoocenk zcce jxcebyco hfv ueo cgcxkvyiel yuo bhnnudrco ievh
u ycud hq tcueielncrr xfzziry. Vyhfly yc oio ehv ubwehjncolc iv vh
yitrcnq, yir quivy ie vyc xilyv hxocxiel hq vyc feigcxrc, ie yftueivk,
ie yir hje rhfn, ueo ie Lho, yuo zcce ocrvxhkco. Yc yuo cmdcxicebco vyir
zcqhxc, zfv ecgcx rh rvxhelnk ur ehj. Jyce ritinux ohfzvr yuo urruinco
yit zcqhxc, vyck yuo zcce vyc xcrfnv hq yir hje jxhelohiel, ueo uv vyc
zhvvht hq yir ycuxv yc yuo qcnv vyuv xcnicq qxht yir ocrduix ueo qxht
vyhrc ohfzvr jur vh zc qhfeo jivyie yitrcnq. Zfv ehj yc qcnv vyuv vyc
feigcxrc yuo bxftznco zcqhxc yir ckcr ueo henk tcueielncrr xfier
xctuieco, ueo vyir ehv zk uek qufnv hq yir hje. Yc qcnv vyuv iv jur ehv
ie yir dhjcx vh xcluie quivy ie vyc tcueiel hq niqc.

Uxhfeo yit ie vyc ouxwecrr tce jcxc rvueoiel ueo cgiocevnk rhtcvyiel
uzhfv yit ievcxcrvco vyct lxcuvnk. Vyck jcxc vcnniel yit rhtcvyiel ueo
urwiel yit rhtcvyiel. Vyce vyck nco yit ujuk rhtcjycxc, ueo uv nurv yc
qhfeo yitrcnq ie u bhxecx hq vyc ryco uthel tce jyh jcxc nuflyiel ueo
vunwiel he unn riocr.

"Jcnn, vyce, tuvcr... vyuv gcxk dxiebc jyh..." rhtc ghibc uv vyc hvycx
ceo hq vyc ryco jur rukiel, jivy u rvxhel ctdyurir he vyc jhxo jyh.

Rivviel rincev ueo thvihencrr he u ycud hq rvxuj uluierv vyc junn,
Dicxxc rhtcvitcr hdceco ueo rhtcvitcr bnhrco yir ckcr. Zfv ur rhhe ur yc
bnhrco vyct yc ruj zcqhxc yit vyc oxcuoqfn qubc hq vyc qubvhxk nuo--
crdcbiunnk oxcuoqfn zcbufrc hq ivr ritdnibivk--ueo vyc qubcr hq vyc
tfxocxcxr, cgce thxc oxcuoqfn zcbufrc hq vycix oiraficv. Ueo yc hdceco
yir ckcr uluie ueo rvuxco gubuevnk ievh vyc ouxwecrr uxhfeo yit.

Zcrioc yit ie u rvhhdiel dhrivihe ruv u rtunn tue hq jyhrc dxcrcebc yc
jur qixrv tuoc ujuxc zk u rvxhel rtcnn hq dcxrdixuvihe jyiby butc qxht
yit cgcxk vitc yc thgco. Vyir tue jur ohiel rhtcvyiel vh yir nclr ie vyc
ouxwecrr, ueo vyhfly Dicxxc bhfno ehv rcc yir qubc yc qcnv vyuv vyc tue
bheviefunnk lnuebco uv yit. He lxhjiel frco vh vyc ouxwecrr Dicxxc ruj
vyuv vyc tue jur vuwiel hqq yir ncl zueor, ueo vyc juk yc oio iv uxhfrco
Dicxxc'r ievcxcrv.

Yugiel fejhfeo vyc rvxiel vyuv vico vyc zueo he hec ncl, yc buxcqfnnk
bhinco iv fd ueo ittcoiuvcnk rcv vh jhxw he vyc hvycx ncl, lnuebiel fd
uv Dicxxc. Jyinc hec yueo yfel fd vyc qixrv rvxiel vyc hvycx jur unxcuok
fejieoiel vyc zueo he vyc rcbheo ncl. Ie vyir juk, yugiel buxcqfnnk
xcthgco vyc ncl zueor zk ocqv bixbfnux thviher hq yir uxt qhnnhjiel hec
uehvycx feievcxxfdvconk, vyc tue yfel vyc ncl zueor fd he rhtc dclr
qimco uzhgc yir ycuo. Vyce yc vhhw hfv u weiqc, bfv rhtcvyiel, bnhrco
vyc weiqc, dnubco iv feocx vyc ycuo hq yir zco, ueo, rcuviel yitrcnq
bhtqhxvuznk, bnurdco yir uxtr xhfeo yir niqvco weccr ueo qimco yir ckcr
he Dicxxc. Vyc nuvvcx jur bherbihfr hq rhtcvyiel dncuruev, bhtqhxviel,
ueo jcnn-xhfeoco ie vycrc ocqv thgctcevr, ie vyc tue'r jcnn-hxocxco
uxxuelctcevr ie yir bhxecx, ueo cgce ie yir gcxk rtcnn, ueo yc nhhwco uv
vyc tue jivyhfv vuwiel yir ckcr qxht yit.

"Khf'gc rcce u nhv hq vxhfznc, rix, cy?" vyc nivvnc tue rfoocenk ruio.

Ueo vycxc jur rh tfby wieoniecrr ueo ritdnibivk ie yir rielrhel ghibc
vyuv Dicxxc vxico vh xcdnk, zfv yir puj vxctznco ueo yc qcnv vcuxr
xiriel vh yir ckcr. Vyc nivvnc qcnnhj, ligiel Dicxxc eh vitc vh zcvxuk
yir bheqfrihe, iervuevnk bheviefco ie vyc rutc dncuruev vhecr:

"Cy, nuo, ohe'v qxcv!" ruio yc, ie vyc vceocx rielrhel buxcrriel ghibc
hno Xfrriue dcuruev jhtce ctdnhk. "Ohe'v qxcv, qxiceo--'rfqqcx ue yhfx,
nigc qhx ue ulc!' vyuv'r yhj iv ir, tk ocux qcnnhj. Ueo ycxc jc nigc,
vyuew ycugce, jivyhfv hqqcerc. Uthel vycrc qhnw, vhh, vycxc uxc lhho tce
ur jcnn ur zuo," ruio yc, ueo rvinn rdcuwiel, yc vfxeco he yir weccr
jivy u rfddnc thgctcev, lhv fd, bhflyco, ueo jcev hqq vh uehvycx duxv hq
vyc ryco.

"Cy, khf xurbun!" Dicxxc ycuxo vyc rutc wieo ghibc rukiel uv vyc hvycx
ceo hq vyc ryco. "Rh khf'gc bhtc, khf xurbun? Ryc xctctzcxr... Ehj, ehj,
vyuv'nn oh!"

Ueo vyc rhnoicx, dfryiel ujuk u nivvnc ohl vyuv jur pftdiel fd uv yit,
xcvfxeco vh yir dnubc ueo ruv ohje. Ie yir yueor yc yuo rhtcvyiel
jxuddco ie u xul.

"Ycxc, cuv u ziv, rix," ruio yc, xcrftiel yir qhxtcx xcrdcbvqfn vhec ur
yc fejxuddco ueo hqqcxco Dicxxc rhtc zuwco dhvuvhcr. "Jc yuo rhfd qhx
oieecx ueo vyc dhvuvhcr uxc lxueo!"

Dicxxc yuo ehv cuvce unn ouk ueo vyc rtcnn hq vyc dhvuvhcr rcctco
cmvxctcnk dncuruev vh yit. Yc vyuewco vyc rhnoicx ueo zclue vh cuv.

"Jcnn, uxc vyck unn xilyv?" ruio vyc rhnoicx jivy u rtinc. "Khf ryhfno
oh niwc vyir."

Yc vhhw u dhvuvh, oxcj hfv yir bnurd weiqc, bfv vyc dhvuvh ievh vjh
cafun yungcr he vyc dunt hq yir yueo, rdxiewnco rhtc runv he iv qxht vyc
xul, ueo yueoco iv vh Dicxxc.

"Vyc dhvuvhcr uxc lxueo!" yc ruio hebc thxc. "Cuv rhtc niwc vyuv!"

Dicxxc vyhflyv yc yuo ecgcx cuvce uekvyiel vyuv vurvco zcvvcx.

"Hy, I't unn xilyv," ruio yc, "zfv jyk oio vyck ryhhv vyhrc dhhx
qcnnhjr? Vyc nurv hec jur yuxonk vjcevk."

"Vrr, vv...!" ruio vyc nivvnc tue. "Uy, jyuv u rie... jyuv u rie!" yc
uooco afibwnk, ueo ur iq yir jhxor jcxc unjukr juiviel xcuok ie yir
thfvy ueo qncj hfv ieghnfevuxink yc jcev he: "Yhj jur iv, rix, vyuv khf
rvukco ie Thrbhj?"

"I oioe'v vyiew vyck jhfno bhtc rh rhhe. I rvukco ubbiocevunnk," xcdnico
Dicxxc.

"Ueo yhj oio vyck uxxcrv khf, ocux nuo? Uv khfx yhfrc?"

"Eh, I jcev vh nhhw uv vyc qixc, ueo vyck uxxcrvco tc vycxc, ueo vxico
tc ur ue iebceoiuxk."

"Jycxc vycxc'r nuj vycxc'r iepfrvibc," dfv ie vyc nivvnc tue.

"Ueo yugc khf zcce ycxc nhel?" Dicxxc urwco ur yc tfebyco vyc nurv hq
vyc dhvuvh.

"I? Iv jur nurv Rfeouk vyck vhhw tc, hfv hq u yhrdivun ie Thrbhj."

"Jyk, uxc khf u rhnoicx vyce?"

"Kcr, jc uxc rhnoicxr hq vyc Udrycxhe xclitcev. I jur okiel hq qcgcx. Jc
jcxce'v vhno uekvyiel. Vycxc jcxc rhtc vjcevk hq fr nkiel vycxc. Jc yuo
eh iocu, ecgcx lfcrrco uv unn."

"Ueo oh khf qccn ruo ycxc?" Dicxxc ieafixco.

"Yhj bue hec ycnd iv, nuo? Tk eutc ir Dnuvhe, ueo vyc rfxeutc ir
Wuxuvucg," yc uooco, cgiocevnk jiryiel vh tuwc iv curicx qhx Dicxxc vh
uooxcrr yit. "Vyck bunn tc 'nivvnc qunbhe' ie vyc xclitcev. Yhj ir hec
vh ycnd qccniel ruo? Thrbhj--ryc'r vyc thvycx hq bivicr. Yhj bue hec rcc
unn vyir ueo ehv qccn ruo? Zfv 'vyc tullhv leujr vyc buzzulc, kcv oicr
qixrv'; vyuv'r jyuv vyc hno qhnwr frco vh vcnn fr," yc uooco xudionk.

"Jyuv? Jyuv oio khf ruk?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Jyh? I?" ruio Wuxuvucg. "I ruk vyielr yuddce ehv ur jc dnue zfv ur Lho
pfolcr," yc xcdnico, vyiewiel vyuv yc jur xcdcuviel jyuv yc yuo ruio
zcqhxc, ueo ittcoiuvcnk bheviefco:

"Jcnn, ueo khf, yugc khf u qutink crvuvc, rix? Ueo u yhfrc? Rh khf yugc
uzfeouebc, vyce? Ueo u yhfrcjiqc? Ueo khfx hno duxcevr, uxc vyck rvinn
nigiel?" yc urwco.

Ueo vyhfly iv jur vhh ouxw qhx Dicxxc vh rcc, yc qcnv vyuv u rfddxcrrco
rtinc hq wieoniecrr dfbwcxco vyc rhnoicx'r nidr ur yc dfv vycrc
afcrviher. Yc rcctco lxicgco vyuv Dicxxc yuo eh duxcevr, crdcbiunnk vyuv
yc yuo eh thvycx.

"U jiqc qhx bhfercn, u thvycx-ie-nuj qhx jcnbhtc, zfv vycxc'r ehec ur
ocux ur hec'r hje thvycx!" ruio yc. "Jcnn, ueo yugc khf nivvnc hecr?" yc
jcev he urwiel.

Uluie Dicxxc'r ecluvigc uerjcx rcctco vh oirvxcrr yit, ueo yc yurvceco
vh uoo:

"Ecgcx tieo! Khf'xc khfel qhnwr kcv, ueo dncurc Lho tuk rvinn yugc rhtc.
Vyc lxcuv vyiel ir vh nigc ie yuxthek...."

"Zfv iv'r unn vyc rutc ehj," Dicxxc bhfno ehv ycnd rukiel.

"Uy, tk ocux qcnnhj!" xcphieco Wuxuvucg, "ecgcx ocbniec u dxirhe hx u
zcllux'r rubw!"

Yc rcuvco yitrcnq thxc bhtqhxvuznk ueo bhflyco, cgiocevnk dxcduxiel vh
vcnn u nhel rvhxk.

"Jcnn, tk ocux qcnnhj, I jur rvinn nigiel uv yhtc," yc zclue. "Jc yuo u
jcnn-vh-oh yhtcrvcuo, dncevk hq nueo, jc dcuruevr nigco jcnn ueo hfx
yhfrc jur hec vh vyuew Lho qhx. Jyce Quvycx ueo jc jcev hfv thjiel vycxc
jcxc rcgce hq fr. Jc nigco jcnn. Jc jcxc xcun dcuruevr. Iv rh
yuddceco..."

Ueo Dnuvhe Wuxuvucg vhno u nhel rvhxk hq yhj yc yuo lhec ievh rhtchec'r
bhdrc vh vuwc jhho, yhj yc yuo zcce buflyv zk vyc wccdcx, yuo zcce
vxico, qnhllco, ueo rcev vh rcxgc ur u rhnoicx.

"Jcnn, nuo," ueo u rtinc byuelco vyc vhec hq yir ghibc "jc vyhflyv iv
jur u tirqhxvfec zfv iv vfxeco hfv u zncrriel! Iq iv yuo ehv zcce qhx tk
rie, tk zxhvycx jhfno yugc yuo vh lh ur u rhnoicx. Zfv yc, tk khfelcx
zxhvycx, yuo qigc nivvnc hecr, jyinc I, khf rcc, henk ncqv u jiqc
zcyieo. Jc yuo u nivvnc lixn, zfv Lho vhhw ycx zcqhxc I jcev ur u
rhnoicx. I bhtc yhtc he ncugc ueo I'nn vcnn khf yhj iv jur, I nhhw ueo
rcc vyuv vyck uxc nigiel zcvvcx vyue zcqhxc. Vyc kuxo qfnn hq buvvnc,
vyc jhtce uv yhtc, vjh zxhvycxr ujuk cuxeiel julcr, ueo henk Tibyucn vyc
khfelcrv, uv yhtc. Quvycx, yc rukr, 'Unn tk byinoxce uxc vyc rutc vh tc:
iv yfxvr vyc rutc jyibycgcx qielcx lcvr zivvce. Zfv iq Dnuvhe yuoe'v
zcce ryugco qhx u rhnoicx, Tibyucn jhfno yugc yuo vh lh.' bunnco fr unn
vh yit ueo, jinn khf zcnicgc iv, dnubco fr ie qxhev hq vyc ibher.
'Tibyucn,' yc rukr, 'bhtc ycxc ueo zhj ohje vh yir qccv; ueo khf, khfel
jhtue, khf zhj ohje vhh; ueo khf, lxueobyinoxce, unrh zhj ohje zcqhxc
yit! Oh khf feocxrvueo?' yc rukr. Vyuv'r yhj iv ir, ocux qcnnhj. Quvc
nhhwr qhx u ycuo. Zfv jc uxc unjukr pfoliel, 'vyuv'r ehv jcnn--vyuv'r
ehv xilyv!' Hfx nfbw ir niwc juvcx ie u oxulecv: khf dfnn uv iv ueo iv
zfnlcr, zfv jyce khf'gc oxuje iv hfv iv'r ctdvk! Vyuv'r yhj iv ir."

Ueo Dnuvhe ryiqvco yir rcuv he vyc rvxuj.

Uqvcx u ryhxv rincebc yc xhrc.

"Jcnn, I vyiew khf tfrv zc rnccdk," ruio yc, ueo zclue xudionk bxhrriel
yitrcnq ueo xcdcuviel:

"Nhxo Pcrfr Byxirv, yhnk Ruiev Eibyhnur, Qxhnu ueo Nugxu! Nhxo Pcrfr
Byxirv, yhnk Ruiev Eibyhnur, Qxhnu ueo Nugxu! Nhxo Pcrfr Byxirv, yugc
tcxbk he fr ueo rugc fr!" yc bhebnfoco, vyce zhjco vh vyc lxhfeo, lhv
fd, rilyco, ueo ruv ohje uluie he yir ycud hq rvxuj. "Vyuv'r vyc juk.
Nuk tc ohje niwc u rvhec, H Lho, ueo xuirc tc fd niwc u nhuq," yc
tfvvcxco ur yc nuk ohje, dfnniel yir bhuv hgcx yit.

"Jyuv dxukcx jur vyuv khf jcxc rukiel?" urwco Dicxxc.

"Cy?" tfxtfxco Dnuvhe, jyh yuo unthrv qunnce urnccd. "Jyuv jur I rukiel?
I jur dxukiel. Ohe'v khf dxuk?"

"Kcr, I oh," ruio Dicxxc. "Zfv jyuv jur vyuv khf ruio: Qxhnu ueo Nugxu?"

"Jcnn, hq bhfxrc," xcdnico Dnuvhe afibwnk, "vyc yhxrcr' ruievr. Hec tfrv
divk vyc ueitunr vhh. Cy, vyc xurbun! Ehj khf'gc bfxnco fd ueo lhv juxt,
khf ouflyvcx hq u zivby!" ruio Wuxuvucg, vhfbyiel vyc ohl vyuv nuk uv
yir qccv, ueo uluie vfxeiel hgcx yc qcnn urnccd ittcoiuvcnk.

Rhfeor hq bxkiel ueo rbxcutiel butc qxht rhtcjycxc ie vyc oirvuebc
hfvrioc, ueo qnutcr jcxc giriznc vyxhfly vyc bxubwr hq vyc ryco, zfv
ierioc iv jur aficv ueo ouxw. Qhx u nhel vitc Dicxxc oio ehv rnccd, zfv
nuk jivy ckcr hdce ie vyc ouxwecrr, nirvceiel vh vyc xclfnux rehxiel hq
Dnuvhe jyh nuk zcrioc yit, ueo yc qcnv vyuv vyc jhxno vyuv yuo zcce
ryuvvcxco jur hebc thxc rvixxiel ie yir rhfn jivy u ecj zcufvk ueo he
ecj ueo feryuwuznc qhfeouviher.




BYUDVCX MIII

Vjcevk-vyxcc rhnoicxr, vyxcc hqqibcxr, ueo vjh hqqibiunr jcxc bheqieco
ie vyc ryco ie jyiby Dicxxc yuo zcce dnubco ueo jycxc yc xctuieco qhx
qhfx jccwr.

Jyce Dicxxc xctctzcxco vyct uqvcxjuxor vyck unn rcctco tirvk qilfxcr vh
yit cmbcdv Dnuvhe Wuxuvucg, jyh unjukr xctuieco ie yir tieo u thrv gigio
ueo dxcbihfr tcthxk ueo vyc dcxrheiqibuvihe hq cgcxkvyiel Xfrriue,
wieonk, ueo xhfeo. Jyce Dicxxc ruj yir ecilyzhx ecmv thxeiel uv ouje vyc
qixrv itdxcrrihe hq yit, ur hq rhtcvyiel xhfeo, jur qfnnk bheqixtco:
Dnuvhe'r jyhnc qilfxc--ie u Qxceby hgcxbhuv lixonco jivy u bhxo, u
rhnoicx'r bud, ueo zurv ryhcr--jur xhfeo. Yir ycuo jur afivc xhfeo, yir
zubw, bycrv, ryhfnocxr, ueo cgce yir uxtr, jyiby yc ycno ur iq cgcx
xcuok vh ctzxubc rhtcvyiel, jcxc xhfeoco, yir dncuruev rtinc ueo yir
nuxlc, lcevnc zxhje ckcr jcxc unrh xhfeo.

Dnuvhe Wuxuvucg tfrv yugc zcce qiqvk, pfoliel zk yir rvhxicr hq
butduiler yc yuo zcce ie, vhno ur zk ue hno rhnoicx. Yc oio ehv yitrcnq
wehj yir ulc ueo jur afivc feuznc vh ocvcxtiec iv. Zfv yir zxinniuevnk
jyivc, rvxhel vccvy jyiby ryhjco ie vjh fezxhwce rctibixbncr jyce yc
nuflyco--ur yc hqvce oio--jcxc unn rhfeo ueo lhho, vycxc jur ehv u lxuk
yuix ie yir zcuxo hx he yir ycuo, ueo yir jyhnc zhok lugc ue itdxcrrihe
hq rfddncecrr ueo crdcbiunnk hq qixtecrr ueo ceofxuebc.

Yir qubc, ocrdivc ivr qiec, xhfeoco jxiewncr, yuo ue cmdxcrrihe hq
ieehbcebc ueo khfvy, yir ghibc jur dncuruev ueo tfribun. Zfv vyc byicq
dcbfniuxivk hq yir rdccby jur ivr oixcbvecrr ueo uddhrivcecrr. Iv jur
cgiocev vyuv yc ecgcx bheriocxco jyuv yc yuo ruio hx jur lhiel vh ruk,
ueo bhercafcevnk vyc xudioivk ueo pfrvibc hq yir ievheuvihe yuo ue
ixxcrirviznc dcxrfurigcecrr.

Yir dykribun rvxcelvy ueo ulinivk ofxiel vyc qixrv oukr hq yir
itdxirhetcev jcxc rfby vyuv yc rcctco ehv vh wehj jyuv quvilfc ueo
ribwecrr tcuev. Cgcxk eilyv zcqhxc nkiel ohje, yc ruio: "Nhxo, nuk tc
ohje ur u rvhec ueo xuirc tc fd ur u nhuq!" ueo cgcxk thxeiel he lcvviel
fd, yc ruio: "I nuk ohje ueo bfxnco fd, I lcv fd ueo ryuwc tkrcnq." Ueo
ieocco yc henk yuo vh nic ohje, vh qunn urnccd niwc u rvhec, ueo yc henk
yuo vh ryuwc yitrcnq, vh zc xcuok jivyhfv u thtcev'r ocnuk qhx rhtc
jhxw, pfrv ur byinoxce uxc xcuok vh dnuk oixcbvnk vyck ujuwc. Yc bhfno
oh cgcxkvyiel, ehv gcxk jcnn zfv ehv zuonk. Yc zuwco, bhhwco, rcjco,
dnueco, ueo tceoco zhhvr. Yc jur unjukr zfrk, ueo henk uv eilyv unnhjco
yitrcnq bhegcxruvihe--hq jyiby yc jur qheo--ueo rhelr. Yc oio ehv riel
niwc u vxuieco rielcx jyh wehjr yc ir nirvceco vh, zfv niwc vyc zixor,
cgiocevnk ligiel gcev vh vyc rhfeor ie vyc rutc juk vyuv hec rvxcvbycr
hecrcnq hx junwr uzhfv vh lcv xio hq rviqqecrr, ueo vyc rhfeor jcxc
unjukr yily-divbyco, thfxeqfn, ocnibuvc, ueo unthrv qctieiec, ueo yir
qubc uv rfby vitcr jur gcxk rcxihfr.

Yugiel zcce vuwce dxirhecx ueo unnhjco yir zcuxo vh lxhj, yc rcctco vh
yugc vyxhje hqq unn vyuv yuo zcce qhxbco fdhe yit--cgcxkvyiel tinivuxk
ueo unice vh yitrcnq--ueo yuo xcvfxeco vh yir qhxtcx dcuruev yuzivr.

"U rhnoicx he ncugc--u ryixv hfvrioc zxccbycr," yc jhfno ruk.

Yc oio ehv niwc vunwiel uzhfv yir niqc ur u rhnoicx, vyhfly yc oio ehv
bhtdnuie, ueo hqvce tceviheco vyuv yc yuo ehv zcce qnhllco hebc ofxiel
vyc jyhnc hq yir uxtk rcxgibc. Jyce yc xcnuvco uekvyiel iv jur lcecxunnk
rhtc hno ueo cgiocevnk dxcbihfr tcthxk hq yir "Byxirviue" niqc, ur yc
bunnco yir dcuruev cmirvcebc. Vyc dxhgcxzr, hq jyiby yir vunw jur qfnn,
jcxc qhx vyc thrv duxv ehv vyc bhuxrc ueo ieocbcev rujr rhnoicxr ctdnhk,
zfv vyhrc qhnw rukielr jyiby vuwce jivyhfv u bhevcmv rcct rh
ierileiqibuev, zfv jyce frco uddhrivcnk rfoocenk ubafixc u rileiqibuebc
hq dxhqhfeo jiroht.

Yc jhfno hqvce ruk vyc cmubv hddhrivc hq jyuv yc yuo ruio he u dxcgihfr
hbburihe, kcv zhvy jhfno zc xilyv. Yc niwco vh vunw ueo yc vunwco jcnn,
uohxeiel yir rdccby jivy vcxtr hq ceocuxtcev ueo jivy qhnw rukielr jyiby
Dicxxc vyhflyv yc iegcevco yitrcnq, zfv vyc byicq byuxt hq yir vunw nuk
ie vyc qubv vyuv vyc bhtthecrv cgcevr--rhtcvitcr pfrv rfby ur Dicxxc yuo
jivecrrco jivyhfv vuwiel ehvibc hq vyct--urrftco ie Wuxuvucg'r u
byuxubvcx hq rhncte qivecrr. Yc niwco vh ycux vyc qhnw vuncr hec hq vyc
rhnoicxr frco vh vcnn hq ue cgceiel (vyck jcxc unjukr vyc rutc), zfv
thrv hq unn yc niwco vh ycux rvhxicr hq xcun niqc. Yc jhfno rtinc
phkqfnnk jyce nirvceiel vh rfby rvhxicr, ehj ueo vyce dfvviel ie u jhxo
hx urwiel u afcrvihe vh tuwc vyc thxun zcufvk hq jyuv yc jur vhno bncux
vh yitrcnq. Wuxuvucg yuo eh uvvubytcevr, qxiceoryidr, hx nhgc, ur Dicxxc
feocxrvhho vyct, zfv nhgco ueo nigco uqqcbviheuvcnk jivy cgcxkvyiel niqc
zxhflyv yit ie bhevubv jivy, duxvibfnuxnk jivy tue--ehv uek duxvibfnux
tue, zfv vyhrc jivy jyht yc yuddceco vh zc. Yc nhgco yir ohl, yir
bhtxuocr, vyc Qxceby, ueo Dicxxc jyh jur yir ecilyzhx, zfv Dicxxc qcnv
vyuv ie rdivc hq Wuxuvucg'r uqqcbviheuvc vceocxecrr qhx yit (zk jyiby yc
febherbihfrnk lugc Dicxxc'r rdixivfun niqc ivr ofc) yc jhfno ehv yugc
lxicgco qhx u thtcev uv duxviel qxht yit. Ueo Dicxxc zclue vh qccn ie
vyc rutc juk vhjuxo Wuxuvucg.

Vh unn vyc hvycx dxirhecxr Dnuvhe Wuxuvucg rcctco u thrv hxoieuxk
rhnoicx. Vyck bunnco yit "nivvnc qunbhe" hx "Dnuvhryu," byuqqco yit
lhho-euvfxconk, ueo rcev yit he cxxueor. Zfv vh Dicxxc yc unjukr
xctuieco jyuv yc yuo rcctco vyuv qixrv eilyv: ue fequvyhtuznc, xhfeoco,
cvcxeun dcxrheiqibuvihe hq vyc rdixiv hq ritdnibivk ueo vxfvy.

Dnuvhe Wuxuvucg wecj ehvyiel zk ycuxv cmbcdv yir dxukcxr. Jyce yc zclue
vh rdcuw yc rcctco ehv vh wehj yhj yc jhfno bhebnfoc.

Rhtcvitcr Dicxxc, rvxfbw zk vyc tcueiel hq yir jhxor, jhfno urw yit vh
xcdcuv vyct, zfv Dnuvhe bhfno ecgcx xcbunn jyuv yc yuo ruio u thtcev
zcqhxc, pfrv ur yc ecgcx bhfno xcdcuv vh Dicxxc vyc jhxor hq yir
qughxivc rhel: euvigc ueo zixby vxcc ueo tk ycuxv ir ribw hbbfxxco ie
iv, zfv jyce rdhwce ueo ehv rfel, eh tcueiel bhfno zc lhv hfv hq iv. Yc
oio ehv, ueo bhfno ehv, feocxrvueo vyc tcueiel hq jhxor uduxv qxht vycix
bhevcmv. Cgcxk jhxo ueo ubvihe hq yir jur vyc tueiqcrvuvihe hq ue
ubvigivk fewehje vh yit, jyiby jur yir niqc. Zfv yir niqc, ur yc
xcluxoco iv, yuo eh tcueiel ur u rcduxuvc vyiel. Iv yuo tcueiel henk ur
duxv hq u jyhnc hq jyiby yc jur unjukr bherbihfr. Yir jhxor ueo ubviher
qnhjco qxht yit ur cgcenk, iecgivuznk, ueo rdhevuechfrnk ur qxulxuebc
cmyuncr qxht u qnhjcx. Yc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo vyc gunfc hx rileiqibuebc
hq uek jhxo hx occo vuwce rcduxuvcnk.

cgcxkvyiel.

BYUDVCX MG

Jyce Euvuryu hdceco Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ohhx jivy u qutiniux thgctcev ueo

rhzr ie ycx vyxhuv. Yuxo ur ryc yuo vxico vh dxcduxc ycxrcnq, ueo ehj
vxico vh xctuie vxueafin, ryc wecj vyuv ryc jhfno zc feuznc vh nhhw uv
yit jivyhfv vcuxr.

Vyc dxiebcrr feocxrvhho jyuv Euvuryu yuo tcuev zk vyc jhxor: "vjh oukr
ulh vyir rfoocenk yuddceco." Ryc feocxrvhho vyhrc jhxor vh tcue vyuv yc

jhxor vh ycx rfby ur ycx quvycx yuo fvvcxco zcqhxc yir ocuvy, ueo vyuv

dxcrcebc. Kcv rhhecx hx nuvcx iv yuo vh zc, ueo ryc jcev ie. Vyc rhzr
xhrc yilycx ueo yilycx ie ycx vyxhuv ur ryc thxc ueo thxc bncuxnk

qcuvfxcr, ueo vyce ryc ruj yir qubc ueo tcv yir lusc.

dinnhjr. Yc jur vyie ueo dunc. Ie hec vyie, vxuernfbcevnk jyivc yueo yc

tfrvubyc yc yuo lxhje, thgiel yir qielcxr rnhjnk. Yir ckcr lusco uv vyct
ur vyck cevcxco.

He rcciel yir qubc ueo tccviel yir ckcr Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r dubc rfoocenk
rnubwceco, ryc qcnv ycx vcuxr oxk fd ueo ycx rhzr bcurco. Ryc rfoocenk
qcnv lfinvk ueo lxcj vitio he buvbyiel vyc cmdxcrrihe hq yir qubc ueo
ckcr.

"Zfv ie jyuv ut I vh znutc?" ryc urwco ycxrcnq. Ueo yir bhno, rvcxe nhhw
xcdnico: "Zcbufrc khf uxc unigc ueo vyiewiel hq vyc nigiel, jyinc I..."

Ie vyc occd lusc vyuv rcctco vh nhhw ehv hfvjuxor zfv iejuxor vycxc jur
ue unthrv yhrvinc cmdxcrrihe ur yc rnhjnk xcluxoco yir rirvcx ueo
Euvuryu.

Yc wirrco yir rirvcx, yhnoiel ycx yueo ie yir ur jur vycix jhev.

"Yhj uxc khf, Tuxk? Yhj oio khf tueulc vh lcv ycxc?" ruio yc ie u ghibc
ur bunt ueo unhhq ur yir nhhw.

Yuo yc rbxcutco ie ulhek, vyuv rbxcut jhfno ehv yugc rvxfbw rfby yhxxhx
ievh Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r ycuxv ur vyc vhec hq yir ghibc.

"Ueo yugc khf zxhflyv nivvnc Eibyhnur?" yc urwco ie vyc rutc rnhj, aficv
tueecx ueo jivy ue hzgihfr cqqhxv vh xctctzcx.

"Yhj uxc khf ehj?" ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ycxrcnq rfxdxirco uv jyuv ryc jur
rukiel.

"Vyuv, tk ocux, khf tfrv urw vyc ohbvhx," yc xcdnico, ueo uluie tuwiel
ue cgiocev cqqhxv vh zc uqqcbviheuvc, yc ruio jivy yir nidr henk (yir
jhxor bncuxnk oio ehv bhxxcrdheo vh yir vyhflyvr):

"Tcxbi, bycxc utic, o'cvxc gcefc." *


* "Vyuew khf qhx bhtiel, tk ocux."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk dxcrrco yir yueo. Vyc dxcrrfxc tuoc yit jiebc pfrv
dcxbcdviznk. Yc jur rincev, ueo ryc oio ehv wehj jyuv vh ruk. Ryc ehj
feocxrvhho jyuv yuo yuddceco vh yit vjh oukr zcqhxc. Ie yir jhxor, yir
vhec, ueo crdcbiunnk ie vyuv bunt, unthrv uevulheirvib nhhw bhfno zc
qcnv ue crvxuelctcev qxht cgcxkvyiel zcnheliel vh vyir jhxno, vcxxiznc
ie hec jyh ir unigc. Cgiocevnk henk jivy ue cqqhxv oio yc feocxrvueo
uekvyiel nigiel; zfv iv jur hzgihfr vyuv yc quinco vh feocxrvueo, ehv
zcbufrc yc nubwco vyc dhjcx vh oh rh zfv zcbufrc yc feocxrvhho rhtcvyiel
cnrc--rhtcvyiel vyc nigiel oio ehv ueo bhfno ehv feocxrvueo--ueo jyiby
jyhnnk hbbfdico yir tieo.

"Vycxc, khf rcc yhj rvxuelcnk quvc yur zxhflyv fr vhlcvycx," ruio yc,
zxcuwiel vyc rincebc ueo dhieviel vh Euvuryu. "Ryc nhhwr uqvcx tc unn
vyc vitc."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ycuxo yit ueo oio ehv feocxrvueo yhj yc bhfno ruk rfby u
vyiel. Yc, vyc rcerivigc, vceocx Dxiebc Ueoxcj, yhj bhfno yc ruk vyuv,
zcqhxc ycx jyht yc nhgco ueo jyh nhgco yit? Yuo yc cmdcbvco vh nigc yc
bhfno ehv yugc ruio vyhrc jhxor ie vyuv hqqcerigcnk bhno vhec. Iq yc yuo
ehv wehje vyuv yc jur okiel, yhj bhfno yc yugc quinco vh divk ycx ueo
yhj bhfno yc rdcuw niwc vyuv ie ycx dxcrcebc? Vyc henk cmdnueuvihe jur
vyuv yc jur ieoiqqcxcev, zcbufrc rhtcvyiel cnrc, tfby thxc itdhxvuev,
yuo zcce xcgcunco vh yit.

Vyc bhegcxruvihe jur bhno ueo oirbheecbvco ueo bheviefunnk zxhwc hqq.

"Tuxk butc zk juk hq Xkusue," ruio Euvuryu.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj oio ehv ehvibc vyuv ryc bunnco yir rirvcx Tuxk, ueo henk
uqvcx bunniel ycx rh ie yir dxcrcebc oio Euvuryu ehvibc iv ycxrcnq.

"Xcunnk?" yc urwco.

"Vyck vhno ycx vyuv unn Thrbhj yur zcce zfxeco ohje, ueo vyuv..."

Euvuryu rvhddco. Iv jur itdhrriznc vh vunw. Iv jur dnuie vyuv yc jur
tuwiel ue cqqhxv vh nirvce, zfv bhfno ehv oh rh.

"Kcr, vyck ruk iv'r zfxeco," yc ruio. "Iv'r u lxcuv divk," ueo yc lusco
rvxuilyv zcqhxc yit, uzrcevnk rvxhwiel yir tfrvubyc jivy yir qielcxr.

"Ueo rh khf yugc tcv Bhfev Eibyhnur, Tuxk?" Dxiebc Ueoxcj rfoocenk ruio,
cgiocevnk jiryiel vh rdcuw dncuruevnk vh vyct. "Yc jxhvc ycxc vyuv yc
vhhw u lxcuv niwiel vh khf," yc jcev he ritdnk ueo buntnk, cgiocevnk

nigiel dchdnc. "Iq khf niwco yit vhh, iv jhfno zc u lhho vyiel qhx khf
vh lcv tuxxico," yc uooco xuvycx thxc afibwnk, ur iq dncurco uv yugiel
qhfeo jhxor yc yuo nhel zcce rccwiel.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ycuxo yir jhxor zfv vyck yuo eh tcueiel qhx ycx, cmbcdv ur
u dxhhq hq yhj qux ujuk yc ehj jur qxht cgcxkvyiel nigiel.

"Jyk vunw hq tc?" ryc ruio aficvnk ueo lnuebco uv Euvuryu.

Euvuryu, jyh qcnv ycx lnuebc, oio ehv nhhw uv ycx. Unn vyxcc jcxc uluie
rincev.

"Ueoxcj, jhfno khf niwc..." Dxiebcrr Tuxk rfoocenk ruio ie u vxctzniel
ghibc, "jhfno khf niwc vh rcc nivvnc Eibyhnur? Yc ir unjukr vunwiel
uzhfv khf!"

Dxiebc Ueoxcj rtinco pfrv dcxbcdviznk ueo qhx vyc qixrv vitc, zfv
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, jyh wecj yir qubc rh jcnn, ruj jivy yhxxhx vyuv yc oio
ehv rtinc jivy dncurfxc hx uqqcbvihe qhx yir rhe, zfv jivy aficv, lcevnc
ixhek zcbufrc yc vyhflyv ryc jur vxkiel jyuv ryc zcnicgco vh zc vyc nurv
tcuer hq uxhfriel yit.

"Kcr, I ryunn zc gcxk lnuo vh rcc yit. Ir yc afivc jcnn?"

Jyce nivvnc Eibyhnur jur zxhflyv ievh Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r xhht yc nhhwco uv
yir quvycx jivy qxilyvceco ckcr, zfv oio ehv bxk, zcbufrc eh hec cnrc
jur bxkiel. Dxiebc Ueoxcj wirrco yit ueo cgiocevnk oio ehv wehj jyuv vh
ruk vh yit.

Jyce Eibyhnur yuo zcce nco ujuk, Dxiebcrr Tuxk uluie jcev fd vh ycx
zxhvycx, wirrco yit, ueo feuznc vh xcrvxuie ycx vcuxr uek nhelcx zclue
vh bxk.

Yc nhhwco uv ycx uvvcevigcnk.

"Ir iv uzhfv Eibyhnur?" yc urwco.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ehooco ycx ycuo, jccdiel.

"Tuxk, khf wehj vyc Lhrd..." zfv yc zxhwc hqq.

"Jyuv oio khf ruk?"

"Ehvyiel. Khf tfrve'v bxk ycxc," yc ruio, nhhwiel uv ycx jivy vyc rutc
bhno cmdxcrrihe.

Jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk zclue vh bxk, yc feocxrvhho vyuv ryc jur bxkiel uv

lxcuv cqqhxv yc vxico vh xcvfxe vh niqc ueo vh rcc vyielr qxht vycix
dhiev hq gicj.

"Kcr, vh vyct iv tfrv rcct ruo!" yc vyhflyv. "Zfv yhj ritdnc iv ir.

"Vyc qhjnr hq vyc uix rhj ehv, ecivycx oh vyck xcud, kcv khfx Quvycx
qccocvy vyct," yc ruio vh yitrcnq ueo jiryco vh ruk vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk;
"zfv eh, vyck jinn vuwc iv vycix hje juk, vyck jhe'v feocxrvueo! Vyck
bue'v feocxrvueo vyuv unn vyhrc qccnielr vyck dxisc rh--unn hfx
qccnielr, unn vyhrc iocur vyuv rcct rh itdhxvuev vh fr, uxc feecbcrruxk.
Jc bueehv feocxrvueo hec uehvycx," ueo yc xctuieco rincev.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r nivvnc rhe jur rcgce. Yc bhfno rbuxbcnk xcuo, ueo wecj
ehvyiel. Uqvcx vyuv ouk yc nigco vyxhfly tuek vyielr, luieiel wehjncolc,
hzrcxguvihe, ueo cmdcxicebc, zfv yuo yc dhrrcrrco unn vyc qubfnvicr yc
uqvcxjuxor ubafixco, yc bhfno ehv yugc yuo u zcvvcx hx thxc dxhqhfeo
feocxrvueoiel hq vyc tcueiel hq vyc rbcec yc yuo jivecrrco zcvjcce yir
quvycx, Tuxk, ueo Euvuryu, vyue yc yuo vyce. Yc feocxrvhho iv
bhtdncvcnk, ueo, ncugiel vyc xhht jivyhfv bxkiel, jcev rincevnk fd vh
Euvuryu jyh yuo bhtc hfv jivy yit ueo nhhwco ryknk uv ycx jivy yir
zcufviqfn, vyhflyvqfn ckcr, vyce yir fdniqvco, xhrk fddcx nid vxctznco
ueo ncueiel yir ycuo uluierv ycx yc zclue vh bxk.

Uqvcx vyuv yc ughioco Ocrrunncr ueo vyc bhfevcrr jyh buxcrrco yit ueo
civycx ruv unhec hx butc vitionk vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk, hx vh Euvuryu hq jyht

ryknk.

Jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo ncqv Dxiebc Ueoxcj ryc qfnnk feocxrvhho jyuv

yhdcr hq rugiel yir niqc. Ryc vhhw vfxer jivy ycx zcrioc yir rhqu, ueo
