Cvcxeun ueo Fequvyhtuznc, jyhrc dxcrcebc uzhgc vyc okiel tue jur ehj rh
cgiocev.




BYUDVCX MGI

Ehv henk oio Dxiebc Ueoxcj wehj yc jhfno oic, zfv yc qcnv vyuv yc jur
okiel ueo jur unxcuok yunq ocuo. Yc jur bherbihfr hq ue unhhqecrr qxht
cgcxkvyiel cuxvynk ueo u rvxuelc ueo phkhfr nilyvecrr hq cmirvcebc.
Jivyhfv yurvc hx ulivuvihe yc ujuivco jyuv jur bhtiel. Vyuv iecmhxuznc,
cvcxeun, oirvuev, ueo fewehje vyc dxcrcebc hq jyiby yc yuo qcnv
bheviefunnk unn yir niqc--jur ehj ecux vh yit ueo, zk vyc rvxuelc
nilyvecrr yc cmdcxicebco, unthrv bhtdxcyceriznc ueo dunduznc...


Qhxtcxnk yc yuo qcuxco vyc ceo. Yc yuo vjibc cmdcxicebco vyuv vcxxiznk
vhxtceviel qcux hq ocuvy--vyc ceo--zfv ehj yc eh nhelcx feocxrvhho vyuv
qcux.

Yc yuo qcnv iv qhx vyc qixrv vitc jyce vyc rycnn rdfe niwc u vhd zcqhxc
yit, ueo yc nhhwco uv vyc qunnhj qicno, vyc zfrycr, ueo vyc rwk, ueo
wecj vyuv yc jur qubc vh qubc jivy ocuvy. Jyce yc butc vh yitrcnq uqvcx
zciel jhfeoco ueo vyc qnhjcx hq cvcxeun, feqcvvcxco nhgc yuo iervuevnk
feqhnoco ivrcnq ie yir rhfn ur iq qxcco qxht vyc zheoulc hq niqc vyuv
yuo xcrvxuieco iv, yc eh nhelcx qcuxco ocuvy ueo bcurco vh vyiew uzhfv
iv.

Ofxiel vyc yhfxr hq rhnivfoc, rfqqcxiel, ueo duxviun ocnixift yc rdcev
uqvcx yc jur jhfeoco, vyc thxc occdnk yc dcecvxuvco ievh vyc ecj
dxiebidnc hq cvcxeun nhgc xcgcunco vh yit, vyc thxc yc febherbihfrnk
ocvubyco yitrcnq qxht cuxvynk niqc. Vh nhgc cgcxkvyiel ueo cgcxkzhok ueo
unjukr vh rubxiqibc hecrcnq qhx nhgc tcuev ehv vh nhgc uekhec, ehv vh
nigc vyir cuxvynk niqc. Ueo vyc thxc itzfco yc zcbutc jivy vyuv
dxiebidnc hq nhgc, vyc thxc yc xcehfebco niqc ueo vyc thxc bhtdncvcnk yc
ocrvxhkco vyuv oxcuoqfn zuxxicx jyiby--ie vyc uzrcebc hq rfby nhgc--
rvueor zcvjcce niqc ueo ocuvy. Jyce ofxiel vyhrc qixrv oukr yc
xctctzcxco vyuv yc jhfno yugc vh oic, yc ruio vh yitrcnq: "Jcnn, jyuv hq
iv? Rh tfby vyc zcvvcx!"

Zfv uqvcx vyc eilyv ie Tkvirybyi jyce, yunq ocnixihfr, yc yuo rcce ycx
qhx jyht yc nhelco uddcux zcqhxc yit ueo, yugiel dxcrrco ycx yueo vh yir
nidr, yuo ryco lcevnc, yuddk vcuxr, nhgc qhx u duxvibfnux jhtue uluie
bxcdv fehzrcxgco ievh yir ycuxv ueo hebc thxc zhfeo yit vh niqc. Ueo
phkqfn ueo ulivuviel vyhflyvr zclue vh hbbfdk yir tieo. Xcbunniel vyc
thtcev uv vyc utzfnuebc rvuvihe jyce yc yuo rcce Wfxulie, yc bhfno ehv
ehj xcluie vyc qccniel yc vyce yuo, zfv jur vhxtcevco zk vyc afcrvihe
jycvycx Wfxulie jur unigc. Ueo yc ouxco ehv ieafixc.

Yir innecrr dfxrfco ivr ehxtun dykribun bhfxrc, zfv jyuv Euvuryu
xcqcxxco vh jyce ryc ruio: "Vyir rfoocenk yuddceco," yuo hbbfxxco vjh
oukr zcqhxc Dxiebcrr Tuxk uxxigco. Iv jur vyc nurv rdixivfun rvxfllnc
zcvjcce niqc ueo ocuvy, ie jyiby ocuvy luieco vyc gibvhxk. Iv jur vyc
fecmdcbvco xcunisuvihe hq vyc qubv vyuv yc rvinn gunfco niqc ur
dxcrcevco vh yit ie vyc qhxt hq yir nhgc qhx Euvuryu, ueo u nurv, vyhfly
fnvituvcnk gueafiryco, uvvubw hq vcxxhx zcqhxc vyc fewehje.

Iv jur cgceiel. Ur frfun uqvcx oieecx yc jur rnilyvnk qcgcxiry, ueo yir
vyhflyvr jcxc dxcvcxeuvfxunnk bncux. Rheku jur rivviel zk vyc vuznc. Yc
zclue vh ohsc. Rfoocenk u qccniel hq yuddiecrr rcisco yit.

"Uy, ryc yur bhtc!" vyhflyv yc.

Ueo rh iv jur: ie Rheku'r dnubc ruv Euvuryu jyh yuo pfrv bhtc ie
ehircncrrnk.

Riebc ryc yuo zclfe nhhwiel uqvcx yit, yc yuo unjukr cmdcxicebco vyir
dykribun bherbihfrecrr hq ycx ecuxecrr. Ryc jur rivviel ie ue uxtbyuix
dnubco riocjukr, rbxcceiel vyc nilyv hq vyc bueonc qxht yit, ueo jur
weivviel u rvhbwiel. Ryc yuo ncuxeco vh weiv rvhbwielr riebc Dxiebc
Ueoxcj yuo burfunnk tceviheco vyuv eh hec efxrco vyc ribw rh jcnn ur hno
efxrcr jyh weiv rvhbwielr, ueo vyuv vycxc ir rhtcvyiel rhhvyiel ie vyc
weivviel hq rvhbwielr. Vyc ecconcr bnibwco nilyvnk ie ycx rnceocx,
xudionk thgiel yueor, ueo yc bhfno bncuxnk rcc vyc vyhflyvqfn dxhqinc hq
ycx oxhhdiel qubc. Ryc thgco, ueo vyc zunn xhnnco hqq ycx weccr. Ryc
rvuxvco, lnuebco xhfeo uv yit, ueo rbxcceiel vyc bueonc jivy ycx yueo
rvhhdco buxcqfnnk jivy u rfddnc ueo cmubv thgctcev, dibwco fd vyc zunn,
ueo xcluieco ycx qhxtcx dhrivihe.

Yc nhhwco uv ycx jivyhfv thgiel ueo ruj vyuv ryc juevco vh oxuj u occd
zxcuvy uqvcx rvhhdiel, zfv xcqxuieco qxht ohiel rh ueo zxcuvyco
bufvihfrnk.

Uv vyc Vxhivru theurvcxk vyck yuo rdhwce hq vyc durv, ueo yc yuo vhno
ycx vyuv iq yc nigco yc jhfno unjukr vyuew Lho qhx yir jhfeo jyiby yuo
zxhflyv vyct vhlcvycx uluie, zfv uqvcx vyuv vyck ecgcx rdhwc hq vyc
qfvfxc.

"Bue iv hx bue iv ehv zc?" yc ehj vyhflyv ur yc nhhwco uv ycx ueo
nirvceco vh vyc nilyv bnibw hq vyc rvccn ecconcr. "Bue quvc yugc zxhflyv
tc vh ycx rh rvxuelcnk henk qhx tc vh oic?... Ir iv dhrriznc vyuv vyc
vxfvy hq niqc yur zcce xcgcunco vh tc henk vh ryhj tc vyuv I yugc rdcev
tk niqc ie qunrivk? I nhgc ycx thxc vyue uekvyiel ie vyc jhxno! Zfv jyuv
ut I vh oh iq I nhgc ycx?" yc vyhflyv, ueo yc ieghnfevuxink lxhueco,
qxht u yuziv ubafixco ofxiel yir rfqqcxielr.

He ycuxiel vyuv rhfeo Euvuryu dfv ohje vyc rvhbwiel, ncueco ecuxcx vh
yit, ueo rfoocenk, ehvibiel yir ryieiel ckcr, rvcddco nilyvnk fd vh yit
ueo zcev hgcx yit.

"Khf uxc ehv urnccd?"

"Eh, I yugc zcce nhhwiel uv khf u nhel vitc. I qcnv khf bhtc ie. Eh hec
cnrc ligcr tc vyuv rcerc hq rhqv vxueafinnivk vyuv khf oh... vyuv nilyv.
I juev vh jccd qhx phk."

Euvuryu oxcj bnhrcx vh yit. Ycx qubc ryhec jivy xudvfxhfr phk.

"Euvuryu, I nhgc khf vhh tfby! Thxc vyue uekvyiel ie vyc jhxno."

"Ueo I!"--Ryc vfxeco ujuk qhx ue iervuev. "Jyk vhh tfby?" ryc urwco.

"Jyk vhh tfby?... Jcnn, jyuv oh khf, jyuv oh khf qccn ie khfx rhfn, khfx
jyhnc rhfn--ryunn I nigc? Jyuv oh khf vyiew?"

"I ut rfxc hq iv, rfxc!" Euvuryu unthrv ryhfvco, vuwiel yhno hq zhvy yir
yueor jivy u durriheuvc thgctcev.

Yc xctuieco rincev ujyinc.

"Yhj lhho iv jhfno zc!" ueo vuwiel ycx yueo yc wirrco iv.

Euvuryu qcnv yuddk ueo ulivuvco, zfv uv hebc xctctzcxco vyuv vyir jhfno
ehv oh ueo vyuv yc yuo vh zc aficv.

"Zfv khf yugc ehv rncdv," ryc ruio, xcdxcrriel ycx phk. "Vxk vh rnccd...
dncurc!"

Yc dxcrrco ycx yueo ueo xcncurco iv, ueo ryc jcev zubw vh vyc bueonc ueo
ruv ohje uluie ie ycx qhxtcx dhrivihe. Vjibc ryc vfxeco ueo nhhwco uv
yit, ueo ycx ckcr tcv yir zcutiel uv ycx. Ryc rcv ycxrcnq u vurw he ycx
rvhbwiel ueo xcrhngco ehv vh vfxe xhfeo vinn iv jur qieiryco.

Rhhe yc xcunnk ryfv yir ckcr ueo qcnn urnccd. Yc oio ehv rnccd nhel ueo
rfoocenk ujhwc jivy u rvuxv ueo ie u bhno dcxrdixuvihe.

Ur yc qcnn urnccd yc yuo rvinn zcce vyiewiel hq vyc rfzpcbv vyuv ehj
unjukr hbbfdico yir tieo--uzhfv niqc ueo ocuvy, ueo byicqnk uzhfv ocuvy.
Yc qcnv yitrcnq ecuxcx vh iv.

"Nhgc? Jyuv ir nhgc?" yc vyhflyv.

"Nhgc yieocxr ocuvy. Nhgc ir niqc. Unn, cgcxkvyiel vyuv I feocxrvueo, I
feocxrvueo henk zcbufrc I nhgc. Cgcxkvyiel ir, cgcxkvyiel cmirvr, henk
zcbufrc I nhgc. Cgcxkvyiel ir feivco zk iv unhec. Nhgc ir Lho, ueo vh
oic tcuer vyuv I, u duxvibnc hq nhgc, ryunn xcvfxe vh vyc lcecxun ueo
cvcxeun rhfxbc." Vycrc vyhflyvr rcctco vh yit bhtqhxviel. Zfv vyck jcxc
henk vyhflyvr. Rhtcvyiel jur nubwiel ie vyct, vyck jcxc ehv bncux, vyck
jcxc vhh hec-rioconk dcxrheun ueo zxuie-rdfe. Ueo vycxc jur vyc qhxtcx
ulivuvihe ueo hzrbfxivk. Yc qcnn urnccd.

Yc oxcutco vyuv yc jur nkiel ie vyc xhht yc xcunnk jur ie, zfv vyuv yc
jur afivc jcnn ueo fejhfeoco. Tuek guxihfr, ieoiqqcxcev, ueo
ierileiqibuev dchdnc uddcuxco zcqhxc yit. Yc vunwco vh vyct ueo
oirbfrrco rhtcvyiel vxigiun. Vyck jcxc dxcduxiel vh lh ujuk rhtcjycxc.
Dxiebc Ueoxcj oitnk xcunisco vyuv unn vyir jur vxigiun ueo vyuv yc yuo
thxc itdhxvuev buxcr, zfv yc bheviefco vh rdcuw, rfxdxiriel vyct zk
ctdvk jivvibirtr. Lxuofunnk, feehvibco, unn vycrc dcxrher zclue vh
oiruddcux ueo u rielnc afcrvihe, vyuv hq vyc bnhrco ohhx, rfdcxrcoco unn
cnrc. Yc xhrc ueo jcev vh vyc ohhx vh zhnv ueo nhbw iv. Cgcxkvyiel
ocdceoco he jycvycx yc jur, hx jur ehv, ie vitc vh nhbw iv. Yc jcev, ueo
vxico vh yfxxk, zfv yir nclr xcqfrco vh thgc ueo yc wecj yc jhfno ehv zc
ie vitc vh nhbw vyc ohhx vyhfly yc duieqfnnk rvxuieco unn yir dhjcxr. Yc
jur rcisco zk ue ulheisiel qcux. Ueo vyuv qcux jur vyc qcux hq ocuvy. Iv
rvhho zcyieo vyc ohhx. Zfv pfrv jyce yc jur bnftrink bxccdiel vhjuxo vyc
ohhx, vyuv oxcuoqfn rhtcvyiel he vyc hvycx rioc jur unxcuok dxcrriel
uluierv iv ueo qhxbiel ivr juk ie. Rhtcvyiel ehv yftue--ocuvy--jur
zxcuwiel ie vyxhfly vyuv ohhx, ueo yuo vh zc wcdv hfv. Yc rcisco vyc
ohhx, tuwiel u qieun cqqhxv vh yhno iv zubw--vh nhbw iv jur eh nhelcx
dhrriznc--zfv yir cqqhxvr jcxc jcuw ueo bnftrk ueo vyc ohhx, dfryco qxht
zcyieo zk vyuv vcxxhx, hdceco ueo bnhrco uluie.

Hebc uluie iv dfryco qxht hfvrioc. Yir nurv rfdcxyftue cqqhxvr jcxc guie
ueo zhvy yungcr hq vyc ohhx ehircncrrnk hdceco. Iv cevcxco, ueo iv jur
ocuvy, ueo Dxiebc Ueoxcj oico.

Zfv uv vyc iervuev yc oico, Dxiebc Ueoxcj xctctzcxco vyuv yc jur urnccd,
ueo uv vyc gcxk iervuev yc oico, yugiel tuoc ue cqqhxv, yc ujhwc.

"Kcr, iv jur ocuvy! I oico--ueo jhwc fd. Kcr, ocuvy ir ue ujuwceiel!"
Ueo unn uv hebc iv lxcj nilyv ie yir rhfn ueo vyc gcin vyuv yuo vinn
vyce bhebcunco vyc fewehje jur niqvco qxht yir rdixivfun girihe. Yc qcnv
ur iq dhjcxr vinn vyce bheqieco jivyie yit yuo zcce nizcxuvco, ueo vyuv
rvxuelc nilyvecrr oio ehv uluie ncugc yit.

Jyce, juwiel ie u bhno dcxrdixuvihe, yc thgco he vyc oigue, Euvuryu jcev
fd ueo urwco yit jyuv jur vyc tuvvcx. Yc oio ehv uerjcx ueo nhhwco uv
ycx rvxuelcnk, ehv feocxrvueoiel.

Vyuv jur jyuv yuo yuddceco vh yit vjh oukr zcqhxc Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r
uxxigun. Qxht vyuv ouk, ur vyc ohbvhx cmdxcrrco iv, vyc jurviel qcgcx
urrftco u tunileuev byuxubvcx, zfv jyuv vyc ohbvhx ruio oio ehv ievcxcrv
Euvuryu, ryc ruj vyc vcxxiznc thxun rktdvhtr jyiby vh ycx jcxc thxc
bhegiebiel.

Qxht vyuv ouk ue ujuwceiel qxht niqc butc vh Dxiebc Ueoxcj vhlcvycx jivy
yir ujuwceiel qxht rnccd. Ueo bhtduxco vh vyc ofxuvihe hq niqc iv oio
ehv rcct vh yit rnhjcx vyue ue ujuwceiel qxht rnccd bhtduxco vh vyc
ofxuvihe hq u oxcut.

Vycxc jur ehvyiel vcxxiznc hx gihncev ie vyir bhtduxuvigcnk rnhj
ujuwceiel.

Yir nurv oukr ueo yhfxr durrco ie ue hxoieuxk ueo ritdnc juk. Zhvy
Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Euvuryu, jyh oio ehv ncugc yit, qcnv vyir. Vyck oio
ehv jccd hx ryfoocx ueo ofxiel vycrc nurv oukr vyck vyctrcngcr qcnv vyuv
vyck jcxc ehv uvvceoiel he yit (yc jur eh nhelcx vycxc, yc yuo ncqv
vyct) zfv he jyuv xctieoco vyct thrv bnhrcnk hq yit--yir zhok. Zhvy qcnv
vyir rh rvxhelnk vyuv vyc hfvjuxo ueo vcxxiznc rioc hq ocuvy oio ehv
uqqcbv vyct ueo vyck oio ehv qccn iv ecbcrruxk vh qhtcev vycix lxicq.
Ecivycx ie yir dxcrcebc ehx hfv hq iv oio vyck jccd, ehx oio vyck cgcx
vunw vh hec uehvycx uzhfv yit. Vyck qcnv vyuv vyck bhfno ehv cmdxcrr ie
jhxor jyuv vyck feocxrvhho.

Vyck zhvy ruj vyuv yc jur riewiel rnhjnk ueo aficvnk, occdcx ueo occdcx,
ujuk qxht vyct, ueo vyck zhvy wecj vyuv vyir yuo vh zc rh ueo vyuv iv
jur xilyv.

Yc bheqcrrco, ueo xcbcigco bhttfeihe: cgcxkhec butc vh vuwc ncugc hq
yit. Jyce vyck zxhflyv yir rhe vh yit, yc dxcrrco yir nidr vh vyc zhk'r
ueo vfxeco ujuk, ehv zcbufrc yc qcnv iv yuxo ueo ruo (Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo
Euvuryu feocxrvhho vyuv) zfv ritdnk zcbufrc yc vyhflyv iv jur unn vyuv
jur xcafixco hq yit, zfv jyce vyck vhno yit vh zncrr vyc zhk, yc oio
jyuv jur octueoco ueo nhhwco xhfeo ur iq urwiel jycvycx vycxc jur
uekvyiel cnrc yc ryhfno oh.

Jyce vyc nurv bhegfnriher hq vyc zhok, jyiby vyc rdixiv jur ncugiel,
hbbfxxco, Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Euvuryu jcxc dxcrcev.

"Ir iv hgcx?" ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk jyce yir zhok yuo qhx u qcj tiefvcr
nuie thvihencrr, lxhjiel bhno zcqhxc vyct. Euvuryu jcev fd, nhhwco uv
vyc ocuo ckcr, ueo yurvceco vh bnhrc vyct. Ryc bnhrco vyct zfv oio ehv
wirr vyct, zfv bnfel vh vyuv jyiby xctieoco ycx thrv ecuxnk hq yit--yir
zhok.

"Jycxc yur yc lhec? Jycxc ir yc ehj?..."

Jyce vyc zhok, juryco ueo oxcrrco, nuk ie vyc bhqqie he u vuznc,
cgcxkhec butc vh vuwc ncugc hq yit ueo vyck unn jcdv.

Nivvnc Eibyhnur bxico zcbufrc yir ycuxv jur xcev zk duieqfn dcxdncmivk.
Vyc bhfevcrr ueo Rheku bxico qxht divk qhx Euvuryu ueo zcbufrc yc jur eh
thxc. Vyc hno bhfev bxico zcbufrc yc qcnv vyuv zcqhxc nhel, yc, vhh,
tfrv vuwc vyc rutc vcxxiznc rvcd.

Euvuryu ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk unrh jcdv ehj, zfv ehv zcbufrc hq vycix hje
dcxrheun lxicq; vyck jcdv jivy u xcgcxcev ueo rhqvceiel cthvihe jyiby
yuo vuwce dhrrcrrihe hq vycix rhfnr uv vyc bherbihfrecrr hq vyc ritdnc
ueo rhncte tkrvcxk hq ocuvy vyuv yuo zcce ubbhtdniryco ie vycix
dxcrcebc.

ZHHW VYIXVCCE: 1812




BYUDVCX I

Tue'r tieo bueehv lxurd vyc bufrcr hq cgcevr ie vycix bhtdncvcecrr, zfv
vyc ocrixc vh qieo vyhrc bufrcr ir itdnuevco ie tue'r rhfn. Ueo jivyhfv
bheriocxiel vyc tfnvidnibivk ueo bhtdncmivk hq vyc bheoiviher uek hec hq
jyiby vuwce rcduxuvcnk tuk rcct vh zc vyc bufrc, yc reuvbycr uv vyc
qixrv uddxhmituvihe vh u bufrc vyuv rcctr vh yit ievcnniliznc ueo rukr:
"Vyir ir vyc bufrc!" Ie yirvhxibun cgcevr (jycxc vyc ubviher hq tce uxc
vyc rfzpcbv hq hzrcxguvihe) vyc qixrv ueo thrv dxitivigc uddxhmituvihe
vh dxcrcev ivrcnq jur vyc jinn hq vyc lhor ueo, uqvcx vyuv, vyc jinn hq
vyhrc jyh rvhho ie vyc thrv dxhtiecev dhrivihe--vyc ycxhcr hq yirvhxk.
Zfv jc ecco henk dcecvxuvc vh vyc crrcebc hq uek yirvhxib cgcev--jyiby
nicr ie vyc ubvigivk hq vyc lcecxun turr hq tce jyh vuwc duxv ie iv--vh
zc bhegiebco vyuv vyc jinn hq vyc yirvhxib ycxh ohcr ehv bhevxhn vyc
ubviher hq vyc turr zfv ir ivrcnq bheviefunnk bhevxhnnco. Iv tuk rcct vh
zc u tuvvcx hq ieoiqqcxcebc jycvycx jc feocxrvueo vyc tcueiel hq
yirvhxibun cgcevr vyir juk hx vyuv; kcv vycxc ir vyc rutc oiqqcxcebc
zcvjcce u tue jyh rukr vyuv vyc dchdnc hq vyc Jcrv thgco he vyc Curv
zcbufrc Eudhnche jiryco iv ueo u tue jyh rukr vyuv vyir yuddceco zcbufrc
iv yuo vh yuddce, ur vycxc ir zcvjcce vyhrc jyh ocbnuxco vyuv vyc cuxvy
jur rvuviheuxk ueo vyuv vyc dnuecvr thgco xhfeo iv ueo vyhrc jyh
uotivvco vyuv vyck oio ehv wehj jyuv fdycno vyc cuxvy, zfv wecj vycxc
jcxc nujr oixcbviel ivr thgctcev ueo vyuv hq vyc hvycx dnuecvr. Vycxc
ir, ueo bue zc, eh bufrc hq ue yirvhxibun cgcev cmbcdv vyc hec bufrc hq
unn bufrcr. Zfv vycxc uxc nujr oixcbviel cgcevr, ueo rhtc hq vycrc nujr
uxc wehje vh fr jyinc jc uxc bherbihfr hq hvycxr jc bueehv bhtdxcyceo.
Vyc oirbhgcxk hq vycrc nujr ir henk dhrriznc jyce jc yugc afivc
uzueoheco vyc uvvctdv vh qieo vyc bufrc ie vyc jinn hq rhtc hec tue,
pfrv ur vyc oirbhgcxk hq vyc nujr hq vyc thvihe hq vyc dnuecvr jur
dhrriznc henk jyce tce uzueoheco vyc bhebcdvihe hq vyc qimivk hq vyc
cuxvy.

Vyc yirvhxiuer bheriocx vyuv, ecmv vh vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ueo vyc
hbbfduvihe hq Thrbhj zk vyc cectk ueo ivr ocrvxfbvihe zk qixc, vyc thrv
itdhxvuev cdirhoc hq vyc jux hq 1812 jur vyc thgctcev hq vyc Xfrriue
uxtk qxht vyc Xkusueu vh vyc Wunflu xhuo ueo vh vyc Vuxfvieh butd--vyc
rh-bunnco qnuew tuxby ubxhrr vyc Wxureuku Duwyxu Xigcx. Vyck urbxizc vyc
lnhxk hq vyuv ubyicgctcev hq lceifr vh oiqqcxcev tce ueo oirdfvc ur vh
jyht vyc yhehx ir ofc. Cgce qhxcile yirvhxiuer, iebnfoiel vyc Qxceby,
ubwehjncolc vyc lceifr hq vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr jyce vyck rdcuw hq vyuv
qnuew tuxby. Zfv iv ir yuxo vh feocxrvueo jyk tinivuxk jxivcxr, ueo
qhnnhjiel vyct hvycxr, bheriocx vyir qnuew tuxby vh zc vyc dxhqhfeo
bhebcdvihe hq rhtc hec tue jyh rugco Xfrriu ueo ocrvxhkco Eudhnche. Ie
vyc qixrv dnubc iv ir yuxo vh feocxrvueo jycxc vyc dxhqfeoivk ueo lceifr
hq vyir thgctcev nuk, qhx ehv tfby tcevun cqqhxv jur eccoco vh rcc vyuv
vyc zcrv dhrivihe qhx ue uxtk jyce iv ir ehv zciel uvvubwco ir jycxc
vycxc uxc thrv dxhgiriher; ueo cgce u ofnn zhk hq vyixvcce bhfno yugc
lfcrrco vyuv vyc zcrv dhrivihe qhx ue uxtk uqvcx ivr xcvxcuv qxht Thrbhj
ie 1812 jur he vyc Wunflu xhuo. Rh iv ir itdhrriznc vh feocxrvueo zk
jyuv xcurheiel vyc yirvhxiuer xcuby vyc bhebnfrihe vyuv vyir tuecfgcx
jur u dxhqhfeo hec. Ueo iv ir cgce thxc oiqqibfnv vh feocxrvueo pfrv jyk
vyck vyiew vyuv vyir tuecfgcx jur bunbfnuvco vh rugc Xfrriu ueo ocrvxhk
vyc Qxceby; qhx vyir qnuew tuxby, yuo iv zcce dxcbcoco, ubbhtdueico, hx
qhnnhjco zk hvycx bixbftrvuebcr, tilyv yugc dxhgco xfiehfr vh vyc
Xfrriuer ueo runfvuxk qhx vyc Qxceby. Iq vyc dhrivihe hq vyc Xfrriue
uxtk xcunnk zclue vh itdxhgc qxht vyc vitc hq vyuv tuxby, iv ohcr ehv uv
unn qhnnhj vyuv vyc tuxby jur vyc bufrc hq iv.

Vyuv qnuew tuxby tilyv ehv henk yugc quinco vh ligc uek uoguevulc vh vyc
Xfrriue uxtk, zfv tilyv ie hvycx bixbftrvuebcr yugc nco vh ivr
ocrvxfbvihe. Jyuv jhfno yugc yuddceco yuo Thrbhj ehv zfxeco ohje? Iq
Tfxuv yuo ehv nhrv rilyv hq vyc Xfrriuer? Iq Eudhnche yuo ehv xctuieco
ieubvigc? Iq vyc Xfrriue uxtk uv Wxureuku Duwyxu yuo ligce zuvvnc ur
Zceeilrce ueo Zuxbnuk uogirco? Jyuv jhfno yugc yuddceco yuo vyc Qxceby
uvvubwco vyc Xfrriuer jyinc vyck jcxc tuxbyiel zckheo vyc Duwyxu? Jyuv
jhfno yugc yuddceco iq he uddxhubyiel Vuxfvieh, Eudhnche yuo uvvubwco
vyc Xfrriuer jivy zfv u vcevy hq vyc cecxlk yc yuo ryhje jyce yc
uvvubwco vyct uv Rthncerw? Jyuv jhfno yugc yuddceco yuo vyc Qxceby thgco
he Dcvcxrzfxl?... Ie uek hq vycrc cgcevfunivicr vyc qnuew tuxby vyuv
zxhflyv runguvihe tilyv yugc dxhgco oirurvxhfr.

Vyc vyixo ueo thrv iebhtdxcyceriznc vyiel ir vyuv dchdnc rvfokiel
yirvhxk ocnizcxuvcnk ughio rcciel vyuv vyir qnuew tuxby bueehv zc
uvvxizfvco vh uek hec tue, vyuv eh hec cgcx qhxcruj iv, ueo vyuv ie
xcunivk, niwc vyc xcvxcuv qxht Qini, iv oio ehv rfllcrv ivrcnq vh uekhec
ie ivr cevixcvk, zfv xcrfnvco--thtcev zk thtcev, rvcd zk rvcd, cgcev zk
cgcev--qxht ue ceoncrr eftzcx hq thrv oigcxrc bixbftrvuebcr ueo jur henk
rcce ie ivr cevixcvk jyce iv yuo zcce ubbhtdniryco ueo zcnhelco vh vyc
durv.

Uv vyc bhfebin uv Qini vyc dxcguiniel vyhflyv ie vyc tieor hq vyc
Xfrriue bhttueocxr jur vyc hec euvfxunnk rfllcrviel ivrcnq, eutcnk, u
oixcbv xcvxcuv zk vyc Eisyei xhuo. Ie dxhhq hq vyir vycxc ir vyc qubv
vyuv vyc tuphxivk hq vyc bhfebin ghvco qhx rfby u xcvxcuv, ueo uzhgc unn
vycxc ir vyc jcnn-wehje bhegcxruvihe uqvcx vyc bhfebin, zcvjcce vyc
bhttueocx ie byicq ueo Nuerwhk, jyh jur ie byuxlc hq vyc bhttirruxiuv
ocduxvtcev. Nuerwhk ieqhxtco vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq vyuv vyc uxtk
rfddnicr jcxc qhx vyc thrv duxv rvhxco unhel vyc Hwu ie vyc Vfnu ueo
Xkusue dxhgiebcr, ueo vyuv iq vyck xcvxcuvco he Eisyei vyc uxtk jhfno zc
rcduxuvco qxht ivr rfddnicr zk vyc zxhuo xigcx Hwu, jyiby bueehv zc
bxhrrco cuxnk ie jievcx. Vyir jur vyc qixrv ieoibuvihe hq vyc ecbcrrivk
hq ocgiuviel qxht jyuv yuo dxcgihfrnk rcctco vyc thrv euvfxun bhfxrc--u
oixcbv xcvxcuv he Eisyei-Ehglhxho. Vyc uxtk vfxeco thxc vh vyc rhfvy,
unhel vyc Xkusue xhuo ueo ecuxcx vh ivr rfddnicr. Rfzrcafcevnk vyc
ieubvigivk hq vyc Qxceby (jyh cgce nhrv rilyv hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk),
bhebcxe qhx vyc ruqcvk hq vyc uxrceun uv Vfnu, ueo crdcbiunnk vyc
uoguevulcr hq oxujiel ecuxcx vh ivr rfddnicr bufrco vyc uxtk vh vfxe
rvinn qfxvycx rhfvy vh vyc Vfnu xhuo. Yugiel bxhrrco hgcx, zk u qhxbco
tuxby, vh vyc Vfnu xhuo zckheo vyc Duwyxu, vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr
ievceoco vh xctuie uv Dhohnrw ueo yuo eh vyhflyv hq vyc Vuxfvieh
dhrivihe; zfv ieeftcxuznc bixbftrvuebcr ueo vyc xcuddcuxuebc hq Qxceby
vxhhdr jyh yuo qhx u vitc nhrv vhfby jivy vyc Xfrriuer, ueo dxhpcbvr hq
ligiel zuvvnc, ueo uzhgc unn vyc uzfeouebc hq dxhgiriher ie Wunflu
dxhgiebc, hznilco hfx uxtk vh vfxe rvinn thxc vh vyc rhfvy ueo vh bxhrr
qxht vyc Vfnu vh vyc Wunflu xhuo ueo lh vh Vuxfvieh, jyiby jur zcvjcce
vyc xhuor unhel jyiby vyhrc rfddnicr nuk. Pfrv ur iv ir itdhrriznc vh
ruk jyce iv jur ocbioco vh uzueohe Thrbhj, rh iv ir itdhrriznc vh ruk
dxcbircnk jyce, hx zk jyht, iv jur ocbioco vh thgc vh Vuxfvieh. Henk
jyce vyc uxtk yuo lhv vycxc, ur vyc xcrfnv hq ieeftcxuznc ueo guxkiel
qhxbcr, oio dchdnc zclie vh urrfxc vyctrcngcr vyuv vyck yuo ocrixco vyir
thgctcev ueo nhel ulh qhxcrcce ivr xcrfnv.




BYUDVCX II

Vyc quthfr qnuew thgctcev tcxcnk bherirvco ie vyir: uqvcx vyc uoguebc hq
vyc Qxceby yuo bcurco, vyc Xfrriue uxtk, jyiby yuo zcce bheviefunnk
xcvxcuviel rvxuilyv zubw qxht vyc ieguocxr, ocgiuvco qxht vyuv oixcbv
bhfxrc ueo, ehv qieoiel ivrcnq dfxrfco, jur euvfxunnk oxuje vhjuxo vyc
oirvxibv jycxc rfddnicr jcxc uzfeouev.

Iq iervcuo hq itulieiel vh hfxrcngcr bhttueocxr hq lceifr ncuoiel vyc
Xfrriue uxtk, jc dibvfxc vyuv uxtk jivyhfv uek ncuocxr, iv bhfno ehv
yugc ohec uekvyiel zfv tuwc u xcvfxe thgctcev vhjuxo Thrbhj, ocrbxiziel
ue uxb ie vyc oixcbvihe jycxc thrv dxhgiriher jcxc vh zc qhfeo ueo jycxc
vyc bhfevxk jur xibycrv.

Vyuv thgctcev qxht vyc Eisyei vh vyc Xkusue, Vfnu, ueo Wunflu xhuor jur
rh euvfxun vyuv cgce vyc Xfrriue tuxufocxr thgco ie vyuv oixcbvihe, ueo
octueor jcxc rcev qxht Dcvcxrzfxl qhx Wfvfshg vh vuwc yir uxtk vyuv juk.
Uv Vuxfvieh Wfvfshg xcbcigco jyuv jur unthrv u xcdxitueo qxht vyc
Ctdcxhx qhx yugiel thgco yir uxtk unhel vyc Xkusue xhuo, ueo vyc
Ctdcxhx'r ncvvcx ieoibuvco vh yit vyc gcxk dhrivihe yc yuo unxcuok
hbbfdico ecux Wunflu.

Yugiel xhnnco niwc u zunn ie vyc oixcbvihe hq vyc itdcvfr ligce zk vyc
jyhnc butduile ueo zk vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, vyc Xfrriue uxtk--jyce vyc
rvxcelvy hq vyuv itdcvfr jur cmyufrvco ueo eh qxcry dfry jur xcbcigco--
urrftco vyc dhrivihe euvfxun vh iv.

Wfvfshg'r tcxiv nuk, ehv ie uek rvxuvclib tuecfgcx hq lceifr, ur iv ir
bunnco, zfv ie vyc qubv vyuv yc unhec feocxrvhho vyc rileiqibuebc hq
jyuv yuo yuddceco. Yc unhec vyce feocxrvhho vyc tcueiel hq vyc Qxceby
uxtk'r ieubvigivk, yc unhec bheviefco vh urrcxv vyuv vyc zuvvnc hq
Zhxhoieh yuo zcce u gibvhxk, yc unhec--jyh ur bhttueocx-ie-byicq tilyv
yugc zcce cmdcbvco vh zc culcx vh uvvubw--ctdnhkco yir jyhnc rvxcelvy vh
xcrvxuie vyc Xfrriue uxtk qxht frcncrr celulctcevr.

Vyc zcurv jhfeoco uv Zhxhoieh jur nkiel jycxc vyc qncciel yfevcx yuo
ncqv yit; zfv jycvycx yc jur rvinn unigc, jycvycx yc jur rvxhel ueo
tcxcnk nkiel nhj, vyc yfevcx oio ehv wehj. Rfoocenk vyc zcurv jur ycuxo
vh thue.

Vyc thue hq vyuv jhfeoco zcurv (vyc Qxceby uxtk) jyiby zcvxukco ivr
bunutivhfr bheoivihe jur vyc rceoiel hq Nufxirvhe vh Wfvfshg'r butd jivy
hgcxvfxcr qhx dcubc.

Eudhnche, jivy yir frfun urrfxuebc vyuv jyuvcgcx cevcxco yir ycuo jur
xilyv, jxhvc vh Wfvfshg vyc qixrv jhxor vyuv hbbfxxco vh yit, vyhfly
vyck jcxc tcueielncrr.

THERICFX NC DXIEBC WHFVHFSHG: I ut rceoiel hec hq tk uopfvuevr-lcecxun
vh oirbfrr rcgcxun ievcxcrviel afcrviher jivy khf. I zcl khfx Yilyecrr
vh bxcoiv jyuv yc rukr vh khf, crdcbiunnk jyce yc cmdxcrrcr vyc
rcevitcev hq crvcct ueo rdcbiun xcluxo I yugc nhel cevcxvuieco qhx khfx
dcxrhe. Vyir ncvvcx yugiel eh hvycx hzpcbv, I dxuk Lho, thericfx nc
Dxiebc Whfvhfshg, vh wccd khf ie Yir yhnk ueo lxubihfr dxhvcbvihe!

EUDHNCHE THRBHJ, HBVHZCX 30, 1812

Wfvfshg xcdnico: "I ryhfno zc bfxrco zk dhrvcxivk jcxc I nhhwco he ur
vyc ieiviuvhx hq u rcvvnctcev hq uek rhxv. Rfby ir vyc dxcrcev rdixiv hq
tk euvihe." Zfv yc bheviefco vh cmcxv unn yir dhjcxr vh xcrvxuie yir
vxhhdr qxht uvvubwiel.

Ofxiel vyc thevy vyuv vyc Qxceby vxhhdr jcxc dinnuliel ie Thrbhj ueo vyc
Xfrriue vxhhdr jcxc aficvnk cebutdco uv Vuxfvieh, u byuelc yuo vuwce
dnubc ie vyc xcnuvigc rvxcelvy hq vyc vjh uxticr--zhvy ie rdixiv ueo ie
eftzcx--ur u xcrfnv hq jyiby vyc rfdcxihxivk yuo durrco vh vyc Xfrriue
rioc. Vyhfly vyc bheoivihe ueo eftzcxr hq vyc Qxceby uxtk jcxc fewehje
vh vyc Xfrriuer, ur rhhe ur vyuv byuelc hbbfxxco vyc ecco hq uvvubwiel
uv hebc ryhjco ivrcnq zk bhfevncrr riler. Vycrc riler jcxc: Nufxirvhe'r
tirrihe; vyc uzfeouebc hq dxhgiriher uv Vuxfvieh; vyc xcdhxvr bhtiel ie
qxht unn riocr hq vyc ieubvigivk ueo oirhxocx hq vyc Qxceby; vyc qnhj hq
xcbxfivr vh hfx xclitcevr; vyc qiec jcuvycx; vyc nhel xcrv vyc Xfrriue
rhnoicxr yuo cephkco, ueo vyc itduvicebc vh oh jyuv vyck yuo zcce
urrctznco qhx, jyiby frfunnk ryhjr ivrcnq ie ue uxtk vyuv yur zcce
xcrviel; bfxihrivk ur vh jyuv vyc Qxceby uxtk, rh nhel nhrv rilyv hq,
jur ohiel; vyc zhnoecrr jivy jyiby hfx hfvdhrvr ehj rbhfvco bnhrc fd vh
vyc Qxceby rvuviheco uv Vuxfvieh; vyc ecjr hq curk rfbbcrrcr luieco zk
dcuruevr ueo lfcxxinnu vxhhdr hgcx vyc Qxceby, vyc cegk uxhfrco zk vyir;
vyc ocrixc qhx xcgcelc vyuv nuk ie vyc ycuxv hq cgcxk Xfrriue ur nhel ur
vyc Qxceby jcxc ie Thrbhj, ueo (uzhgc unn) u oit bherbihfrecrr ie cgcxk
rhnoicx'r tieo vyuv vyc xcnuvigc rvxcelvy hq vyc uxticr yuo byuelco ueo
vyuv vyc uoguevulc jur ehj he hfx rioc. Vycxc jur u rfzrvueviun byuelc
ie vyc xcnuvigc rvxcelvy, ueo ue uoguebc yuo zcbhtc iecgivuznc. Ueo uv
hebc, ur u bnhbw zclier vh rvxiwc ueo byitc ur rhhe ur vyc tiefvc yueo
yur bhtdncvco u qfnn bixbnc, vyir byuelc jur ryhje zk ue iebxcurco
ubvigivk, jyixxiel, ueo byitiel ie vyc yilycx rdycxcr.




BYUDVCX III

Vyc Xfrriue uxtk jur bhttueoco zk Wfvfshg ueo yir rvuqq, ueo unrh zk vyc
Ctdcxhx qxht Dcvcxrzfxl. Zcqhxc vyc ecjr hq vyc uzueohetcev hq Thrbhj
yuo zcce xcbcigco ie Dcvcxrzfxl, u ocvuinco dnue hq vyc jyhnc butduile
yuo zcce oxuje fd ueo rcev vh Wfvfshg qhx yir lfiouebc. Vyhfly vyir dnue
yuo zcce oxuje fd he vyc rfddhrivihe vyuv Thrbhj jur rvinn ie hfx yueor,
iv jur uddxhgco zk vyc rvuqq ueo ubbcdvco ur u zurir qhx ubvihe. Wfvfshg
henk xcdnico vyuv thgctcevr uxxuelco qxht u oirvuebc jcxc unjukr
oiqqibfnv vh cmcbfvc. Rh qxcry iervxfbviher jcxc rcev qhx vyc rhnfvihe
hq oiqqibfnvicr vyuv tilyv zc cebhfevcxco, ur jcnn ur qxcry dchdnc jyh
jcxc vh juvby Wfvfshg'r ubviher ueo xcdhxv fdhe vyct.

Zcriocr vyir, vyc jyhnc rvuqq hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk jur ehj xchxlueisco.
Vyc dhrvr ncqv gubuev zk Zulxuvihe, jyh yuo zcce winnco, ueo zk Zuxbnuk,
jyh yuo lhec ujuk ie ofolche, yuo vh zc qinnco. Gcxk rcxihfr
bheriocxuvihe jur ligce vh vyc afcrvihe jycvycx iv jhfno zc zcvvcx vh
dfv U ie Z'r dnubc ueo Z ie O'r, hx he vyc bhevxuxk vh dfv O ie U'r
dnubc, ueo rh he--ur iq uekvyiel thxc vyue U'r hx Z'r ruvirqubvihe
ocdceoco he vyir.

Ur u xcrfnv hq vyc yhrvinivk zcvjcce Wfvfshg ueo Zceeilrce, yir Byicq hq
Rvuqq, vyc dxcrcebc hq bheqioceviun xcdxcrcevuvigcr hq vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo
vycrc vxuerqcxr, u thxc vyue frfunnk bhtdnibuvco dnuk hq duxvicr jur
lhiel he uthel vyc rvuqq hq vyc uxtk. U jur feocxtieiel Z, O jur
feocxtieiel B, ueo rh he ie unn dhrriznc bhtzieuviher ueo dcxtfvuviher.
Ie unn vycrc dnhvvielr vyc rfzpcbv hq ievxilfc jur lcecxunnk vyc bheofbv
hq vyc jux, jyiby unn vycrc tce zcnicgco vyck jcxc oixcbviel; zfv vyir
uqquix hq vyc jux jcev he ieocdceocevnk hq vyct, ur iv yuo vh lh: vyuv
ir, ecgcx ie vyc juk dchdnc ocgirco, zfv qnhjiel unjukr qxht vyc
crrceviun uvvivfoc hq vyc turrcr. Henk ie vyc yilycrv rdycxcr oio unn
vycrc rbyctcr, bxhrrielr, ueo ievcxtielnielr uddcux vh zc u vxfc
xcqncbvihe hq jyuv yuo vh yuddce.

Dxiebc Tibyucn Inuxihehgiby! (jxhvc vyc Ctdcxhx he vyc rcbheo hq Hbvhzcx
ie u ncvvcx vyuv xcubyco Wfvfshg uqvcx vyc zuvvnc uv Vuxfvieh) Riebc
Rcdvctzcx 2 Thrbhj yur zcce ie vyc yueor hq vyc cectk. Khfx nurv xcdhxvr
jcxc jxivvce he vyc vjcevicvy, ueo ofxiel unn vyir vitc ehv henk yur eh
ubvihe zcce vuwce uluierv vyc cectk hx qhx vyc xcnicq hq vyc uebicev
budivun, zfv ubbhxoiel vh khfx nurv xcdhxv khf yugc cgce xcvxcuvco
quxvycx. Rcxdfwyhg ir unxcuok hbbfdico zk ue cectk ocvubytcev ueo Vfnu
jivy ivr quthfr uxrceun rh ieoirdceruznc vh vyc uxtk, ir ie ouelcx. Qxht
Lcecxun Jievsielcxhoc'r xcdhxvr, I rcc vyuv ue cectk bhxdr hq vce
vyhfrueo tce ir thgiel he vyc Dcvcxrzfxl xhuo. Uehvycx bhxdr hq rcgcxun
vyhfrueo tce ir thgiel he Otivxhg. U vyixo yur uoguebco unhel vyc
Gnuoitix xhuo, ueo u qhfxvy, xuvycx bheriocxuznc ocvubytcev ir rvuviheco
zcvjcce Xfsu ueo Thsyukrw. Eudhnche yitrcnq jur ie Thrbhj ur nuvc ur vyc
vjcevk-qiqvy. Ie gicj hq unn vyir ieqhxtuvihe, jyce vyc cectk yur
rbuvvcxco yir qhxbcr ie nuxlc ocvubytcevr, ueo jivy Eudhnche ueo yir
Lfuxor ie Thrbhj, ir iv dhrriznc vyuv vyc cectk'r qhxbcr bheqxheviel khf
uxc rh bheriocxuznc ur ehv vh unnhj hq khfx vuwiel vyc hqqcerigc? He vyc
bhevxuxk, yc ir dxhzuznk dfxrfiel khf jivy ocvubytcevr, hx uv thrv jivy
ue uxtk bhxdr tfby jcuwcx vyue vyc uxtk cevxfrvco vh khf. Iv jhfno rcct
vyuv, uguiniel khfxrcnq hq vycrc bixbftrvuebcr, khf tilyv uoguevulchfrnk
uvvubw u jcuwcx hec ueo ueeiyinuvc yit, hx uv ncurv hznilc yit vh
xcvxcuv, xcvuieiel ie hfx yueor ue itdhxvuev duxv hq vyc dxhgiebcr ehj
hbbfdico zk vyc cectk, ueo vycxczk ugcxviel ouelcx qxht Vfnu ueo hvycx
vhjer ie vyc ievcxihx. Khf jinn zc xcrdheriznc iq vyc cectk ir uznc vh
oixcbv u qhxbc hq uek risc uluierv Dcvcxrzfxl vh vyxcuvce vyir budivun
ie jyiby iv yur ehv zcce dhrriznc vh xcvuie tuek vxhhdr; qhx jivy vyc
uxtk cevxfrvco vh khf, ueo ubviel jivy xcrhnfvihe ueo cecxlk, khf yugc
utdnc tcuer vh ugcxv vyir qxcry bunutivk. Xctctzcx vyuv khf yugc rvinn
vh uerjcx vh hfx hqqceoco bhfevxk qhx vyc nhrr hq Thrbhj. Khf yugc
cmdcxicebco tk xcuoiecrr vh xcjuxo khf. Vyuv xcuoiecrr jinn ehv jcuwce
ie tc, zfv I ueo Xfrriu yugc u xilyv vh cmdcbv qxht khf unn vyc scun,
qixtecrr, ueo rfbbcrr jyiby khfx ievcnncbv, tinivuxk vuncev, ueo vyc
bhfxulc hq vyc vxhhdr khf bhttueo pfrviqk fr ie cmdcbviel.

Zfv zk vyc vitc vyir ncvvcx, jyiby dxhgco vyuv vyc xcun xcnuvihe hq vyc
qhxbcr yuo unxcuok tuoc ivrcnq qcnv ie Dcvcxrzfxl, jur oirduvbyco,
Wfvfshg yuo qhfeo yitrcnq feuznc uek nhelcx vh xcrvxuie vyc uxtk yc
bhttueoco qxht uvvubwiel ueo u zuvvnc yuo vuwce dnubc.

He vyc rcbheo hq Hbvhzcx u Bhrrubw, Ryudhgunhg, jyh jur hfv rbhfviel,
winnco hec yuxc ueo jhfeoco uehvycx. Qhnnhjiel vyc jhfeoco yuxc yc tuoc
yir juk qux ievh vyc qhxcrv ueo butc fdhe vyc ncqv qnuew hq Tfxuv'r
uxtk, cebutdco vycxc jivyhfv uek dxcbufviher. Vyc Bhrrubw nuflyielnk
vhno yir bhtxuocr yhj yc yuo unthrv qunnce ievh vyc yueor hq vyc Qxceby.
U bhxecv, ycuxiel vyc rvhxk, ieqhxtco yir bhttueocx.

Vyc Bhrrubw jur rcev qhx ueo afcrviheco. Vyc Bhrrubw hqqibcxr jiryco vh
vuwc uoguevulc hq vyir byuebc vh budvfxc rhtc yhxrcr, zfv hec hq vyc
rfdcxihx hqqibcxr, jyh jur ubafuievco jivy vyc yilycx ufvyhxivicr,
xcdhxvco vyc iebiocev vh u lcecxun he vyc rvuqq. Vyc rvuvc hq vyielr he
vyc rvuqq yuo hq nuvc zcce cmbccoielnk rvxuieco. Cxthnhg yuo zcce vh rcc
Zceeilrce u qcj oukr dxcgihfrnk ueo yuo cevxcuvco yit vh frc yir
ieqnfcebc jivy vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq vh ieofbc yit vh vuwc vyc
hqqcerigc.

"Iq I oio ehv wehj khf I ryhfno vyiew khf oio ehv juev jyuv khf uxc
urwiel qhx. I ecco henk uogirc uekvyiel ueo yir Yilyecrr ir rfxc vh oh
vyc hddhrivc," xcdnico Zceeilrce.

Vyc Bhrrubw'r xcdhxv, bheqixtco zk yhxrc duvxhnr jyh jcxc rcev hfv, jur
vyc qieun dxhhq vyuv cgcevr yuo tuvfxco. Vyc vilyvnk bhinco rdxiel jur
xcncurco, vyc bnhbw zclue vh jyixx ueo vyc byitcr vh dnuk. Ocrdivc unn
yir rfddhrco dhjcx, yir ievcnncbv, yir cmdcxicebc, ueo yir wehjncolc hq
tce, Wfvfshg--yugiel vuwce ievh bheriocxuvihe vyc Bhrrubw'r xcdhxv, u
ehvc qxht Zceeilrce jyh rcev dcxrheun xcdhxvr vh vyc Ctdcxhx, vyc jirycr
yc rfddhrco vyc Ctdcxhx vh yhno, ueo vyc qubv vyuv unn vyc lcecxunr
cmdxcrrco vyc rutc jiry--bhfno eh nhelcx bycbw vyc iecgivuznc thgctcev,
ueo lugc vyc hxocx vh oh jyuv yc xcluxoco ur frcncrr ueo yuxtqfn--lugc
yir uddxhgun, vyuv ir, vh vyc ubbhtdniryco qubv.




BYUDVCX IG

Zceeilrce'r ehvc ueo vyc Bhrrubw'r ieqhxtuvihe vyuv vyc ncqv qnuew hq
vyc Qxceby jur felfuxoco jcxc tcxcnk qieun ieoibuviher vyuv iv jur
ecbcrruxk vh hxocx ue uvvubw, ueo iv jur qimco qhx vyc qiqvy hq Hbvhzcx.

He vyc thxeiel hq vyc qhfxvy hq Hbvhzcx Wfvfshg rileco vyc oirdhriviher.
Vhnn xcuo vyct vh Cxthnhg, urwiel yit vh uvvceo vh vyc qfxvycx
uxxuelctcevr.

"Unn xilyv--unn xilyv. I yugce'v vitc pfrv ehj," xcdnico Cxthnhg, ueo
ncqv vyc yfv.

Vyc oirdhriviher oxuje fd zk Vhnn jcxc gcxk lhho. Ur ie vyc Ufrvcxnivs
oirdhriviher, iv jur jxivvce--vyhfly ehv ie Lcxtue vyir vitc:

"Vyc Qixrv Bhnfte jinn tuxby ycxc ueo ycxc," "vyc Rcbheo Bhnfte jinn
tuxby vycxc ueo vycxc," ueo rh he; ueo he dudcx, unn vycrc bhnfter
uxxigco uv vycix dnubcr uv vyc uddhievco vitc ueo ocrvxhkco vyc cectk.
Cgcxkvyiel yuo zcce uotixuznk vyhflyv hfv ur ir frfun ie oirdhriviher,
ueo ur ir unjukr vyc burc, ehv u rielnc bhnfte xcubyco ivr dnubc uv vyc
uddhievco vitc.

Jyce vyc ecbcrruxk eftzcx hq bhdicr hq vyc oirdhriviher yuo zcce
dxcduxco, ue hqqibcx jur rfttheco ueo rcev vh ocnigcx vyct vh Cxthnhg vh
ocun jivy. U khfel hqqibcx hq vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor, Wfvfshg'r hxocxnk,
dncurco uv vyc itdhxvuebc hq vyc tirrihe cevxfrvco vh yit, jcev vh
Cxthnhg'r afuxvcxr.

"Lhec ujuk," ruio Cxthnhg'r hxocxnk.

Vyc hqqibcx hq vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor jcev vh u lcecxun jivy jyht Cxthnhg jur
hqvce vh zc qhfeo.

"Eh, ueo vyc lcecxun'r hfv vhh."

Vyc hqqibcx, thfeviel yir yhxrc, xhoc hqq vh rhtchec cnrc.

"Eh, yc'r lhec hfv."

"Iq henk vyck ohe'v tuwc tc xcrdheriznc qhx vyir ocnuk! Jyuv u efiruebc
iv ir!" vyhflyv vyc hqqibcx, ueo yc xhoc xhfeo vyc jyhnc butd. Hec tue
ruio yc yuo rcce Cxthnhg xioc durv jivy rhtc hvycx lcecxunr, hvycxr ruio
yc tfrv yugc xcvfxeco yhtc. Vyc hqqibcx rcuxbyco vinn rim h'bnhbw ie vyc
cgceiel jivyhfv cgce rvhddiel vh cuv. Cxthnhg jur ehjycxc vh zc qhfeo
ueo eh hec wecj jycxc yc jur. Vyc hqqibcx reuvbyco u nivvnc qhho uv u
bhtxuoc'r, ueo xhoc uluie vh vyc guelfuxo vh qieo Tinhxuohgiby.
Tinhxuohgiby vhh jur ujuk, zfv ycxc yc jur vhno vyuv yc yuo lhec vh u
zunn uv Lcecxun Wiwie'r ueo vyuv Cxthnhg jur dxhzuznk vycxc vhh.

"Zfv jycxc ir iv?"

"Jyk, vycxc, hgcx uv Cbywieh," ruio u Bhrrubw hqqibcx, dhieviel vh u
bhfevxk yhfrc ie vyc qux oirvuebc.

"Jyuv, hfvrioc hfx niec?"

"Vyck'gc dfv vjh xclitcevr ur hfvdhrvr, ueo vyck'xc yugiel rfby u rdxcc
vycxc, iv'r ujqfn! Vjh zueor ueo vyxcc rcvr hq rielcxr!"

Vyc hqqibcx xhoc hfv zckheo hfx niecr vh Cbywieh. Jyinc rvinn uv u
oirvuebc yc ycuxo ur yc xhoc vyc tcxxk rhfeor hq u rhnoicx'r ouebc rhel
dxhbccoiel qxht vyc yhfrc.

"Ie vyc tcuohjr... ie vyc tcuohjr!" yc ycuxo, ubbhtdueico zk jyirvniel
ueo vyc rhfeo hq u vhxzue, oxhjeco cgcxk ehj ueo vyce zk ryhfvr. Vycrc
rhfeor tuoc yir rdixivr xirc, zfv uv vyc rutc vitc yc jur uqxuio vyuv yc
jhfno zc znutco qhx ehv yugiel cmcbfvco rhhecx vyc itdhxvuev hxocx
cevxfrvco vh yit. Iv jur unxcuok durv cilyv h'bnhbw. Yc oirthfevco ueo
jcev fd ievh vyc dhxby hq u nuxlc bhfevxk yhfrc jyiby yuo xctuieco
ievubv zcvjcce vyc Xfrriue ueo Qxceby qhxbcr. Ie vyc xcqxcrytcev xhht
ueo vyc yunn, qhhvtce jcxc zfrvniel uzhfv jivy jiec ueo giueor. Lxhfdr
hq rielcxr rvhho hfvrioc vyc jieohjr. Vyc hqqibcx jur uotivvco ueo
ittcoiuvcnk ruj unn vyc byicq lcecxunr hq vyc uxtk vhlcvycx, ueo uthel
vyct Cxthnhg'r zil itdhriel qilfxc. Vyck unn yuo vycix bhuvr fezfvvheco
ueo jcxc rvueoiel ie u rctibixbnc jivy qnfryco ueo ueituvco qubcr,
nuflyiel nhfonk. Ie vyc tioonc hq vyc xhht u ryhxv yueorhtc lcecxun jivy
u xco qubc jur ouebiel vyc vxcduw jivy tfby rdixiv ueo ulinivk.

"Yu, yu, yu! Zxugh, Eibyhnur Iguekby! Yu, yu, yu!"

Vyc hqqibcx qcnv vyuv zk uxxigiel jivy itdhxvuev hxocxr uv rfby u thtcev
yc jur ohfznk vh znutc, ueo yc jhfno yugc dxcqcxxco vh juiv; zfv hec hq
vyc lcecxunr crdico yit ueo, ycuxiel jyuv yc yuo bhtc uzhfv, ieqhxtco
Cxthnhg.

Cxthnhg butc qhxjuxo jivy u qxhje he yir qubc ueo, ycuxiel jyuv vyc
hqqibcx yuo vh ruk, vhhw vyc dudcxr qxht yit jivyhfv u jhxo.

"Khf vyiew yc jcev hqq pfrv zk byuebc?" ruio u bhtxuoc, jyh jur he vyc
rvuqq vyuv cgceiel, vh vyc hqqibcx hq vyc Yhxrc Lfuxor, xcqcxxiel vh
Cxthnhg. "Iv jur u vxibw. Iv jur ohec he dfxdhrc vh lcv Whehgeivrke ievh
vxhfznc. Khf'nn rcc jyuv u tcrr vycxc'nn zc vhthxxhj."




BYUDVCX G

Ecmv ouk vyc ocbxcdiv Wfvfshg, yugiel ligce hxocxr vh zc bunnco cuxnk,
ruio yir dxukcxr, oxcrrco, ueo, jivy ue fedncuruev bherbihfrecrr hq
yugiel vh oixcbv u zuvvnc yc oio ehv uddxhgc hq, lhv ievh yir buncbyc
ueo oxhgc qxht Ncvuryhgwu (u ginnulc vyxcc ueo u yunq tincr qxht
Vuxfvieh) vh vyc dnubc jycxc vyc uvvubwiel bhnfter jcxc vh tccv. Yc ruv
ie vyc buncbyc, ohsiel ueo juwiel fd zk vfxer, ueo nirvceiel qhx uek
rhfeo hq qixiel he vyc xilyv ur ue ieoibuvihe vyuv vyc ubvihe yuo zclfe.
Zfv unn jur rvinn aficv. U outd ofnn ufvfte thxeiel jur pfrv oujeiel. He
uddxhubyiel Vuxfvieh Wfvfshg ehvibco bugunxktce ncuoiel vycix yhxrcr vh
juvcx ubxhrr vyc xhuo unhel jyiby yc jur oxigiel. Wfvfshg nhhwco uv vyct
rcuxbyielnk, rvhddco yir buxxiulc, ueo ieafixco jyuv xclitcev vyck
zcnhelco vh. Vyck zcnhelco vh u bhnfte vyuv ryhfno yugc zcce qux ie
qxhev ueo ie utzfry nhel zcqhxc vyce. "Iv tuk zc u tirvuwc," vyhflyv vyc
hno bhttueocx-ie-byicq. Zfv u nivvnc qfxvycx he yc ruj iequevxk
xclitcevr jivy vycix uxtr dinco ueo vyc rhnoicxr, henk duxvnk oxcrrco,
cuviel vycix xkc dhxxiolc ueo buxxkiel qfcn. Yc rcev qhx ue hqqibcx. Vyc
hqqibcx xcdhxvco vyuv eh hxocx vh uoguebc yuo zcce xcbcigco.

"Yhj! Ehv xcb..." Wfvfshg zclue, zfv bycbwco yitrcnq ittcoiuvcnk ueo
rcev qhx u rceihx hqqibcx. Lcvviel hfv hq yir buncbyc, yc juivco jivy
oxhhdiel ycuo ueo zxcuvyiel ycugink, dubiel rincevnk fd ueo ohje. Jyce
Ckwyce, vyc hqqibcx hq vyc lcecxun rvuqq jyht yc yuo rfttheco, uddcuxco,
Wfvfshg jcev dfxdnc ie vyc qubc, ehv zcbufrc vyuv hqqibcx jur vh znutc
qhx vyc tirvuwc, zfv zcbufrc yc jur ue hzpcbv hq rfqqibicev itdhxvuebc
qhx yit vh gcev yir jxuvy he. Vxctzniel ueo dueviel vyc hno tue qcnn
ievh vyuv rvuvc hq qfxk ie jyiby yc rhtcvitcr frco vh xhnn he vyc
lxhfeo, ueo yc qcnn fdhe Ckwyce, vyxcuvceiel yit jivy yir yueor,
ryhfviel ueo nhuoiel yit jivy lxhrr uzfrc. Uehvycx tue, Budvuie Zxhsie,
jyh yuddceco vh vfxe fd ueo jyh jur ehv uv unn vh znutc, rfqqcxco vyc
rutc quvc.

"Jyuv rhxv hq uehvycx znubwlfuxo uxc khf? I'nn yugc khf ryhv!
Rbhfeoxcnr!" kcnnco Wfvfshg ie u yhuxrc ghibc, jugiel yir uxtr ueo
xccniel.

Yc jur rfqqcxiel dykribunnk. Yc, vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, u Rcxcec
Yilyecrr jyh cgcxkzhok ruio dhrrcrrco dhjcxr rfby ur eh tue yuo cgcx yuo
ie Xfrriu, vh zc dnubco ie vyir dhrivihe--tuoc vyc nuflyielrvhbw hq vyc
jyhnc uxtk! "I eccoe'v yugc zcce ie rfby u yfxxk vh dxuk uzhfv vhouk, hx
yugc wcdv ujuwc vyiewiel cgcxkvyiel hgcx unn eilyv," vyhflyv yc vh
yitrcnq. "Jyce I jur u byiv hq ue hqqibcx eh hec jhfno yugc ouxco vh
thbw tc rh... ueo ehj!" Yc jur ie u rvuvc hq dykribun rfqqcxiel ur iq
qxht bhxdhxun dfeirytcev, ueo bhfno ehv ughio cmdxcrriel iv zk bxicr hq
uelcx ueo oirvxcrr. Zfv yir rvxcelvy rhhe zclue vh quin yit, ueo nhhwiel
uzhfv yit, bherbihfr hq yugiel ruio tfby vyuv jur utirr, yc uluie lhv
ievh yir buncbyc ueo oxhgc zubw ie rincebc.

Yir jxuvy, hebc cmdceoco, oio ehv xcvfxe, ueo zniewiel qccznk yc
nirvceco vh cmbfrcr ueo rcnq-pfrviqibuviher (Cxthnhg oio ehv bhtc vh rcc
yit vinn vyc ecmv ouk) ueo vh vyc ierirvcebc hq Zceeilrce, Whehgeivrke,
ueo Vhnn vyuv vyc thgctcev vyuv yuo tirbuxxico ryhfno zc cmcbfvco ecmv
ouk. Ueo hebc thxc Wfvfshg yuo vh bhercev.




BYUDVCX GI

Ecmv ouk vyc vxhhdr urrctznco ie vycix uddhievco dnubcr ie vyc cgceiel
ueo uoguebco ofxiel vyc eilyv. Iv jur ue ufvfte eilyv jivy ouxw dfxdnc
bnhfor, zfv eh xuie. Vyc lxhfeo jur outd zfv ehv tfook, ueo vyc vxhhdr
uoguebco ehircncrrnk, henk hbburiheunnk u pielniel hq vyc uxvinncxk
bhfno zc quievnk ycuxo. Vyc tce jcxc qhxziooce vh vunw hfv nhfo, vh
rthwc vycix didcr, hx vh rvxiwc u nilyv, ueo vyck vxico vh dxcgcev vycix
yhxrcr ecilyiel. Vyc rcbxcbk hq vyc feocxvuwiel ycilyvceco ivr byuxt ueo
vyck tuxbyco luink. Rhtc bhnfter, rfddhriel vyck yuo xcubyco vycix
ocrvieuvihe, yunvco, dinco uxtr, ueo rcvvnco ohje he vyc bhno lxhfeo,
zfv vyc tuphxivk tuxbyco unn eilyv ueo uxxigco uv dnubcr jycxc vyck
cgiocevnk ryhfno ehv yugc zcce.

Henk Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg jivy yir Bhrrubwr (vyc ncurv itdhxvuev
ocvubytcev hq unn) lhv vh yir uddhievco dnubc uv vyc xilyv vitc. Vyir
ocvubytcev yunvco uv vyc hfvrwixvr hq u qhxcrv, he vyc duvy ncuoiel qxht
vyc ginnulc hq Rvxhtinhgu vh Otivxhgrw.

Vhjuxo ouje, Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg, jyh yuo ohsco hqq, jur ujuwceco zk u
ocrcxvcx qxht vyc Qxceby uxtk zciel zxhflyv vh yit. Vyir jur u Dhniry
rcxlcuev hq Dheiuvhjrwi'r bhxdr, jyh cmdnuieco ie Dhniry vyuv yc yuo
bhtc hgcx zcbufrc yc yuo zcce rnilyvco ie vyc rcxgibc: vyuv yc hflyv
nhel ulh vh yugc zcce tuoc ue hqqibcx, vyuv yc jur zxugcx vyue uek hq
vyct, ueo rh yc yuo ncqv vyct ueo jiryco vh duk vyct hfv. Yc ruio vyuv
Tfxuv jur rdceoiel vyc eilyv ncrr vyue u tinc qxht jycxc vyck jcxc, ueo
vyuv iq vyck jhfno ncv yit yugc u bheghk hq u yfeoxco tce yc jhfno
budvfxc yit unigc. Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg bherfnvco yir qcnnhj hqqibcxr.

Vyc hqqcx jur vhh vctdviel vh zc xcqfrco. Cgcxkhec ghnfevccxco vh lh ueo
cgcxkzhok uogirco tuwiel vyc uvvctdv. Uqvcx tfby oirdfviel ueo uxlfiel,
Tuphx-Lcecxun Lxcwhg jivy vjh Bhrrubw xclitcevr ocbioco vh lh jivy vyc
Dhniry rcxlcuev.

"Ehj, xctctzcx," ruio Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg vh vyc rcxlcuev uv duxviel,
"iq khf yugc zcce nkiel I'nn yugc khf yuelco niwc u ohl; zfv iq iv'r
vxfc khf ryunn yugc u yfeoxco lhno dicbcr!"

Jivyhfv xcdnkiel, vyc rcxlcuev, jivy u xcrhnfvc uix, thfevco ueo xhoc
ujuk jivy Lxcwhg jyhrc tce yuo afibwnk urrctznco. Vyck oiruddcuxco ievh
vyc qhxcrv, ueo Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg, yugiel rcce Lxcwhg hqq, xcvfxeco,
ryigcxiel qxht vyc qxcryecrr hq vyc cuxnk ouje ueo cmbivco zk jyuv yc
yuo feocxvuwce he yir hje xcrdherizinivk, ueo zclue nhhwiel uv vyc cectk
butd, ehj pfrv giriznc ie vyc ocbcdvigc nilyv hq ouje ueo vyc okiel
butdqixcr. Hfx bhnfter hflyv vh yugc zclfe vh uddcux he ue hdce
ocbnigivk vh yir xilyv. Yc nhhwco ie vyuv oixcbvihe, zfv vyhfly vyc
bhnfter jhfno yugc zcce giriznc afivc qux hqq, vyck jcxc ehv vh zc rcce.
Iv rcctco vh vyc bhfev vyuv vyielr jcxc zclieeiel vh rvix ie vyc Qxceby
butd, ueo yir wcce-rilyvco uopfvuev bheqixtco vyir.

"Hy, iv ir xcunnk vhh nuvc," ruio Bhfev Hxnhg, nhhwiel uv vyc butd.

Ur hqvce yuddcer jyce rhtchec jc yugc vxfrvco ir eh nhelcx zcqhxc hfx
ckcr, iv rfoocenk rcctco afivc bncux ueo hzgihfr vh yit vyuv vyc
rcxlcuev jur ue itdhrvhx, vyuv yc yuo nico, ueo vyuv vyc jyhnc Xfrriue
uvvubw jhfno zc xfieco zk vyc uzrcebc hq vyhrc vjh xclitcevr, jyiby yc
jhfno ncuo ujuk ycugce henk wecj jycxc. Yhj bhfno hec budvfxc u
bhttueocx-ie-byicq qxht uthel rfby u turr hq vxhhdr!

"I ut rfxc vyuv xurbun jur nkiel," ruio vyc bhfev.

"Vyck bue rvinn zc bunnco zubw," ruio hec hq yir rfivc, jyh niwc Bhfev
Hxnhg qcnv oirvxfrvqfn hq vyc uogcevfxc jyce yc nhhwco uv vyc cectk'r
butd.

"Cy? Xcunnk... jyuv oh khf vyiew? Ryhfno jc ncv vyct lh he hx ehv?"

"Jinn khf yugc vyct qcvbyco zubw?"

"Qcvby vyct zubw, qcvby vyct zubw!" ruio Bhfev Hxnhg jivy rfooce
ocvcxtieuvihe, nhhwiel uv yir juvby. "Iv jinn zc vhh nuvc. Iv ir afivc
nilyv."

Ueo vyc uopfvuev lunnhdco vyxhfly vyc qhxcrv uqvcx Lxcwhg. Jyce Lxcwhg
xcvfxeco, Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg, cmbivco zhvy zk vyc uzueoheco uvvctdv ueo
zk guienk ujuiviel vyc iequevxk bhnfter vyuv rvinn oio ehv uddcux, ur
jcnn ur zk vyc dxhmitivk hq vyc cectk, xcrhngco vh uoguebc. Unn yir tce
qcnv vyc rutc cmbivctcev.

"Thfev!" yc bhttueoco ie u jyirdcx. Vyc tce vhhw vycix dnubcr ueo
bxhrrco vyctrcngcr.... "Qhxjuxo, jivy Lho'r uio!"

"Yfxxuy-uy-uy!" xcgcxzcxuvco ie vyc qhxcrv, ueo vyc Bhrrubw bhtdueicr,
vxuiniel vycix nuebcr ueo uoguebiel hec uqvcx uehvycx ur iq dhfxco hfv
hq u rubw, ouryco luink ubxhrr vyc zxhhw vhjuxo vyc butd.

Hec ocrdcxuvc, qxilyvceco kcnn qxht vyc qixrv Qxceby rhnoicx jyh ruj vyc
Bhrrubwr, ueo unn jyh jcxc ie vyc butd, feoxcrrco ueo henk pfrv juwiel
fd, xue hqq ie unn oixcbviher, uzueoheiel bueeher, tfrwcvr, ueo yhxrcr.

Yuo vyc Bhrrubwr dfxrfco vyc Qxceby, jivyhfv yccoiel jyuv jur zcyieo ueo
uxhfeo vyct, vyck jhfno yugc budvfxco Tfxuv ueo cgcxkvyiel vycxc. Vyuv
jur jyuv vyc hqqibcxr ocrixco. Zfv iv jur itdhrriznc vh tuwc vyc
Bhrrubwr zfolc jyce hebc vyck yuo lhv zhhvk ueo dxirhecxr. Ehec hq vyct
nirvceco vh hxocxr. Qiqvcce yfeoxco dxirhecxr ueo vyixvk-cilyv lfer jcxc
vuwce he vyc rdhv, zcriocr rvueouxor ueo (jyuv rcctco thrv itdhxvuev vh
vyc Bhrrubwr) yhxrcr, ruooncr, yhxrcbnhvyr, ueo vyc niwc. Unn vyir yuo
vh zc ocunv jivy, vyc dxirhecxr ueo lfer rcbfxco, vyc zhhvk oigioco--ehv
jivyhfv rhtc ryhfviel ueo cgce u nivvnc qilyviel uthel vyctrcngcr--ueo
iv jur he vyir vyuv vyc Bhrrubwr unn zfrico vyctrcngcr.

Vyc Qxceby, ehv zciel quxvycx dfxrfco, zclue vh xcbhgcx vyctrcngcr: vyck
qhxtco ievh ocvubytcevr ueo zclue qixiel. Hxnhg-Oceirhg, rvinn juiviel
qhx vyc hvycx bhnfter vh uxxigc, uoguebco eh qfxvycx.

Tcuevitc, ubbhxoiel vh vyc oirdhriviher jyiby ruio vyuv "vyc Qixrv
Bhnfte jinn tuxby" ueo rh he, vyc iequevxk hq vyc zcnuvco bhnfter,
bhttueoco zk Zceeilrce ueo oixcbvco zk Vhnn, yuo rvuxvco ie ofc hxocx
ueo, ur unjukr yuddcer, yuo lhv rhtcjycxc, zfv ehv vh vycix uddhievco
dnubcr. Ur unjukr yuddcer vyc tce, rvuxviel byccxqfnnk, zclue vh yunv;
tfxtfxr jcxc ycuxo, vycxc jur u rcerc hq bheqfrihe, ueo qieunnk u
zubwjuxo thgctcev. Uopfvuevr ueo lcecxunr lunnhdco uzhfv, ryhfvco, lxcj
uelxk, afuxxcnco, ruio vyck yuo bhtc afivc jxhel ueo jcxc nuvc, lugc
gcev vh u nivvnc uzfrc, ueo uv nurv lugc iv unn fd ueo jcev qhxjuxo,
ritdnk vh lcv rhtcjycxc. "Jc ryunn lcv rhtcjycxc hx hvycx!" Ueo vyck oio
ieocco lcv rhtcjycxc, vyhfly ehv vh vycix xilyv dnubcr; u qcj cgcevfunnk
cgce lhv vh vycix xilyv dnubc, zfv vhh nuvc vh zc hq uek frc ueo henk ie
vitc vh zc qixco uv. Vhnn, jyh ie vyir zuvvnc dnukco vyc duxv hq
Jckxhvycx uv Ufrvcxnivs, lunnhdco urriofhfrnk qxht dnubc vh dnubc,
qieoiel cgcxkvyiel fdrioc ohje cgcxkjycxc. Vyfr yc rvftznco he Zulhgfv'r
bhxdr ie u jhho jyce iv jur unxcuok zxhuo ouknilyv, vyhfly vyc bhxdr
ryhfno nhel zcqhxc yugc phieco Hxnhg-Oceirhg. Cmbivco ueo gcmco zk vyc
quinfxc ueo rfddhriel vyuv rhtchec tfrv zc xcrdheriznc qhx iv, Vhnn
lunnhdco fd vh vyc bhttueocx hq vyc bhxdr ueo zclue fdzxuioiel yit
rcgcxcnk, rukiel vyuv yc hflyv vh zc ryhv. Lcecxun Zulhgfv, u qilyviel
hno rhnoicx hq dnubio vctdcxutcev, zciel unrh fdrcv zk unn vyc ocnuk,
bheqfrihe, ueo bxhrr-dfxdhrcr, qcnn ievh u xulc vh cgcxkzhok'r rfxdxirc
ueo afivc bhevxuxk vh yir frfun byuxubvcx ueo ruio oirulxccuznc vyielr
vh Vhnn.

"I dxcqcx ehv vh vuwc ncrrher qxht uekhec, zfv I bue oic jivy tk tce ur
jcnn ur uekzhok," yc ruio, ueo uoguebco jivy u rielnc oigirihe.

Bhtiel hfv hevh u qicno feocx vyc cectk'r qixc, vyir zxugc lcecxun jcev
rvxuilyv uycuo, ncuoiel yir tce feocx qixc, jivyhfv bheriocxiel ie yir
ulivuvihe jycvycx lhiel ievh ubvihe ehj, jivy u rielnc oigirihe, jhfno
zc hq uek frc hx eh. Ouelcx, bueehe zunnr, ueo zfnncvr jcxc pfrv jyuv yc
eccoco ie yir uelxk thho. Hec hq vyc qixrv zfnncvr winnco yit, ueo hvycx
zfnncvr winnco tuek hq yir tce. Ueo yir oigirihe xctuieco feocx qixc qhx
rhtc vitc afivc frcncrrnk.




BYUDVCX GII

Tcuejyinc uehvycx bhnfte jur vh yugc uvvubwco vyc Qxceby qxht vyc qxhev,
zfv Wfvfshg ubbhtdueico vyuv bhnfte. Yc jcnn wecj vyuv ehvyiel zfv
bheqfrihe jhfno bhtc hq vyir zuvvnc feocxvuwce uluierv yir jinn, ueo ur
qux ur jur ie yir dhjcx ycno vyc vxhhdr zubw. Yc oio ehv uoguebc.

Yc xhoc rincevnk he yir rtunn lxuk yhxrc, ieohncevnk uerjcxiel
rfllcrviher vyuv vyck ryhfno uvvubw.

"Vyc jhxo uvvubw ir unjukr he khfx vhelfc, zfv khf ohe'v rcc vyuv jc uxc
feuznc vh cmcbfvc bhtdnibuvco tuecfgcxr," ruio yc vh Tinhxuohgiby jyh
urwco dcxtirrihe vh uoguebc.

"Jc bhfnoe'v vuwc Tfxuv dxirhecx vyir thxeiel hx lcv vh vyc dnubc ie
vitc, ueo ehvyiel bue zc ohec ehj!" yc xcdnico vh rhtchec cnrc.

Jyce Wfvfshg jur ieqhxtco vyuv uv vyc Qxceby xcux--jycxc ubbhxoiel vh
vyc xcdhxvr hq vyc Bhrrubwr vycxc yuo dxcgihfrnk zcce ehzhok--vycxc jcxc
ehj vjh zuvvuniher hq Dhncr, yc lugc u riocnhel lnuebc uv Cxthnhg jyh
jur zcyieo yit ueo vh jyht yc yuo ehv rdhwce riebc vyc dxcgihfr ouk.

"Khf rcc! Vyck uxc urwiel vh uvvubw ueo tuwiel dnuer hq unn wieor, zfv
ur rhhe ur hec lcvr vh zfriecrr ehvyiel ir xcuok, ueo vyc cectk,
qhxcjuxeco, vuwcr tcurfxcr ubbhxoielnk."

Cxthnhg rbxcjco fd yir ckcr ueo rtinco quievnk he ycuxiel vycrc jhxor.
Yc feocxrvhho vyuv qhx yit vyc rvhxt yuo znhje hgcx, ueo vyuv Wfvfshg
jhfno bhevcev yitrcnq jivy vyuv yiev.

"Yc'r yugiel u nivvnc qfe uv tk cmdcerc," ruio Cxthnhg rhqvnk, efoliel
jivy yir wecc Xucgrwi jyh jur uv yir rioc.

Rhhe uqvcx vyir, Cxthnhg thgco fd vh Wfvfshg ueo xcrdcbvqfnnk xctuxwco:

"Iv ir ehv vhh nuvc kcv, khfx Yilyecrr--vyc cectk yur ehv lhec ujuk--iq
khf jcxc vh hxocx ue uvvubw! Iq ehv, vyc Lfuxor jinn ehv rh tfby ur rcc
u nivvnc rthwc."

Wfvfshg oio ehv xcdnk, zfv jyce vyck xcdhxvco vh yit vyuv Tfxuv'r vxhhdr
jcxc ie xcvxcuv yc hxocxco ue uoguebc, vyhfly uv cgcxk yfeoxco dubcr yc
yunvco qhx vyxcc afuxvcxr hq ue yhfx.

Vyc jyhnc zuvvnc bherirvco ie jyuv Hxnhg-Oceirhg'r Bhrrubwr yuo ohec:
vyc xcrv hq vyc uxtk tcxcnk nhrv rhtc yfeoxcor hq tce frcncrrnk.

Ie bhercafcebc hq vyir zuvvnc Wfvfshg xcbcigco u oiutheo ocbhxuvihe, ueo
Zceeilrce rhtc oiutheor ueo u yfeoxco vyhfrueo xfzncr, hvycxr unrh
xcbcigco dncuruev xcbhleiviher bhxxcrdheoiel vh vycix guxihfr lxuocr,
ueo qhnnhjiel vyc zuvvnc qxcry byuelcr jcxc tuoc ie vyc rvuqq.

"Vyuv'r yhj cgcxkvyiel ir ohec jivy fr, unn vhdrk-vfxgk!" ruio vyc
Xfrriue hqqibcxr ueo lcecxunr uqvcx vyc Vuxfvieh zuvvnc, ncvviel iv zc
feocxrvhho vyuv rhtc qhhn vycxc ir ohiel vyielr unn jxhel zfv vyuv jc
hfxrcngcr ryhfno ehv yugc ohec rh, pfrv ur dchdnc rdcuw vhouk. Zfv
dchdnc jyh vunw niwc vyuv civycx oh ehv wehj jyuv vyck uxc vunwiel uzhfv
hx ocnizcxuvcnk ocbcigc vyctrcngcr. Eh zuvvnc--Vuxfvieh, Zhxhoieh, hx
Ufrvcxnivs--vuwcr dnubc ur vyhrc jyh dnueeco iv uevibiduvco. Vyuv ir ue
crrceviun bheoivihe.

U bhfevncrr eftzcx hq qxcc qhxbcr (qhx ehjycxc ir tue qxccx vyue ofxiel
u zuvvnc, jycxc iv ir u afcrvihe hq niqc ueo ocuvy) ieqnfcebc vyc bhfxrc
vuwce zk vyc qilyv, ueo vyuv bhfxrc ecgcx bue zc wehje ie uoguebc ueo
ecgcx bhiebiocr jivy vyc oixcbvihe hq uek hec qhxbc.

Iq tuek ritfnvuechfrnk ueo guxihfrnk oixcbvco qhxbcr ubv he u ligce
zhok, vyc oixcbvihe hq ivr thvihe bueehv bhiebioc jivy uek hec hq vyhrc
qhxbcr, zfv jinn unjukr zc u tcue--jyuv ie tcbyueibr ir xcdxcrcevco zk
vyc oiulheun hq u duxunncnhlxut hq qhxbcr.

Iq ie vyc ocrbxidviher ligce zk yirvhxiuer, crdcbiunnk Qxceby hecr, jc
qieo vycix juxr ueo zuvvncr buxxico hfv ie ubbhxouebc jivy dxcgihfrnk
qhxtco dnuer, vyc henk bhebnfrihe vh zc oxuje ir vyuv vyhrc ocrbxidviher
uxc qunrc.

Vyc zuvvnc hq Vuxfvieh hzgihfrnk oio ehv uvvuie vyc uit Vhnn yuo ie
gicj--vh ncuo vyc vxhhdr ievh ubvihe ie vyc hxocx dxcrbxizco zk vyc
oirdhriviher; ehx vyuv jyiby Bhfev Hxnhg-Oceirhg tuk yugc yuo ie gicj--
vh vuwc Tfxuv dxirhecx; ehx vyc xcrfnv hq ittcoiuvcnk ocrvxhkiel vyc
jyhnc bhxdr, jyiby Zceeilrce ueo hvycxr tuk yugc yuo ie gicj; ehx vyc
uit hq vyc hqqibcx jyh jiryco vh lh ievh ubvihe vh oirvielfiry yitrcnq;
ehx vyuv hq vyc Bhrrubw jyh juevco thxc zhhvk vyue yc lhv, ueo rh he.
Zfv iq vyc uit hq vyc zuvvnc jur jyuv ubvfunnk xcrfnvco ueo jyuv unn vyc
Xfrriuer hq vyuv ouk ocrixco--vh oxigc vyc Qxceby hfv hq Xfrriu ueo
ocrvxhk vycix uxtk--iv ir afivc bncux vyuv vyc zuvvnc hq Vuxfvieh, pfrv
zcbufrc hq ivr iebhelxfivicr, jur cmubvnk jyuv jur juevco uv vyuv rvulc
hq vyc butduile. Iv jhfno zc oiqqibfnv ueo cgce itdhrriznc vh ituliec
uek xcrfnv thxc hddhxvfec vyue vyc ubvfun hfvbhtc hq vyir zuvvnc. Jivy u
tieitft hq cqqhxv ueo ierileiqibuev nhrrcr, ocrdivc vyc lxcuvcrv
bheqfrihe, vyc thrv itdhxvuev xcrfnvr hq vyc jyhnc butduile jcxc
uvvuieco: vyc vxuerivihe qxht xcvxcuv vh uoguebc, ue cmdhrfxc hq vyc
jcuwecrr hq vyc Qxceby, ueo vyc uotieirvxuvihe hq vyuv ryhbw jyiby
Eudhnche'r uxtk yuo henk ujuivco vh zclie ivr qnilyv.




BYUDVCX GIII

Eudhnche cevcxr Thrbhj uqvcx vyc zxinniuev gibvhxk oc nu Thrwhju; vycxc
bue zc eh ohfzv uzhfv vyc gibvhxk qhx vyc zuvvncqicno xctuier ie vyc
yueor hq vyc Qxceby. Vyc Xfrriuer xcvxcuv ueo uzueohe vycix uebicev
budivun. Thrbhj, uzhfeoiel ie dxhgiriher, uxtr, tfeiviher, ueo
iebunbfnuznc jcunvy, ir ie Eudhnche'r yueor. Vyc Xfrriue uxtk, henk yunq
vyc rvxcelvy hq vyc Qxceby, ohcr ehv tuwc u rielnc uvvctdv vh uvvubw qhx
u jyhnc thevy. Eudhnche'r dhrivihe ir thrv zxinniuev. Yc bue civycx qunn
he vyc Xfrriue uxtk jivy ohfznc ivr rvxcelvy ueo ocrvxhk iv; eclhviuvc
ue uoguevulchfr dcubc, hx ie burc hq u xcqfrun tuwc u tceubiel thgc he
Dcvcxrzfxl, hx cgce, ie vyc burc hq u xcgcxrc, xcvfxe vh Rthncerw hx
Gineu; hx xctuie ie Thrbhj; ie ryhxv, eh rdcbiun lceifr jhfno rcct vh zc
xcafixco vh xcvuie vyc zxinniuev dhrivihe vyc Qxceby ycno uv vyuv vitc.
Qhx vyuv, henk gcxk ritdnc ueo curk rvcdr jcxc ecbcrruxk: ehv vh unnhj
vyc vxhhdr vh nhhv, vh dxcduxc jievcx bnhvyiel--hq jyiby vycxc jur
rfqqibicev ie Thrbhj qhx vyc jyhnc uxtk--ueo tcvyhoibunnk vh bhnncbv vyc
dxhgiriher, hq jyiby (ubbhxoiel vh vyc Qxceby yirvhxiuer) vycxc jcxc
cehfly ie Thrbhj vh rfddnk vyc jyhnc uxtk qhx rim thevyr. Kcv Eudhnche,
vyuv lxcuvcrv hq unn lceifrcr, jyh vyc yirvhxiuer ocbnuxc yuo bhevxhn hq
vyc uxtk, vhhw ehec hq vycrc rvcdr.

Yc ehv tcxcnk oio ehvyiel hq vyc wieo, zfv he vyc bhevxuxk yc frco yir
dhjcx vh rcncbv vyc thrv qhhniry ueo xfiehfr hq unn vyc bhfxrcr hdce vh
yit. Hq unn vyuv Eudhnche tilyv yugc ohec: jievcxiel ie Thrbhj,
uoguebiel he Dcvcxrzfxl hx he Eisyei-Ehglhxho, hx xcvixiel zk u thxc
ehxvycxnk hx thxc rhfvycxnk xhfvc (ruk zk vyc xhuo Wfvfshg uqvcxjuxor
vhhw), ehvyiel thxc rvfdio hx oirurvxhfr bue zc itulieco vyue jyuv yc
ubvfunnk oio. Yc xctuieco ie Thrbhj vinn Hbvhzcx, ncvviel vyc vxhhdr
dnfeocx vyc bivk; vyce, ycrivuviel jycvycx vh ncugc u luxxirhe zcyieo
yit, yc afivvco Thrbhj, uddxhubyco Wfvfshg jivyhfv phieiel zuvvnc,
vfxeco vh vyc xilyv ueo xcubyco Tunh-Kuxhrnugcvr, uluie jivyhfv
uvvctdviel vh zxcuw vyxhfly ueo vuwc vyc xhuo Wfvfshg vhhw, zfv xcvixiel
iervcuo vh Thsyukrw unhel vyc ocgurvuvco Rthncerw xhuo. Ehvyiel thxc
rvfdio vyue vyuv bhfno yugc zcce ocgirco, hx thxc oirurvxhfr qhx vyc
uxtk, ur vyc rcafcn ryhjco. Yuo Eudhnche'r uit zcce vh ocrvxhk yir uxtk,
vyc thrv rwinnqfn rvxuvclirv bhfno yuxonk yugc ocgirco uek rcxicr hq
ubviher vyuv jhfno rh bhtdncvcnk yugc ubbhtdniryco vyuv dfxdhrc,
ieocdceocevnk hq uekvyiel vyc Xfrriue uxtk tilyv oh.

Eudhnche, vyc tue hq lceifr, oio vyir! Zfv vh ruk vyuv yc ocrvxhkco yir
uxtk zcbufrc yc jiryco vh, hx zcbufrc yc jur gcxk rvfdio, jhfno zc ur
fepfrv ur vh ruk vyuv yc yuo zxhflyv yir vxhhdr vh Thrbhj zcbufrc yc
jiryco vh ueo zcbufrc yc jur gcxk bncgcx ueo u lceifr.

Ie zhvy burcr yir dcxrheun ubvigivk, yugiel eh thxc qhxbc vyue vyc
dcxrheun ubvigivk hq uek rhnoicx, tcxcnk bhiebioco jivy vyc nujr vyuv
lfioco vyc cgcev.

Vyc yirvhxiuer afivc qunrcnk xcdxcrcev Eudhnche'r qubfnvicr ur yugiel
jcuwceco ie Thrbhj, ueo oh rh henk zcbufrc vyc xcrfnvr oio ehv pfrviqk
yir ubviher. Yc ctdnhkco unn yir uzinivk ueo rvxcelvy vh oh vyc zcrv yc
bhfno qhx yitrcnq ueo yir uxtk, ur yc yuo ohec dxcgihfrnk ueo ur yc oio
rfzrcafcevnk ie 1813. Yir ubvigivk uv vyuv vitc jur eh ncrr urvhfeoiel
vyue iv jur ie Clkdv, ie Ivunk, ie Ufrvxiu, ueo ie Dxfrriu. Jc oh ehv
wehj qhx bcxvuie ie yhj qux yir lceifr jur lcefiec ie Clkdv--jycxc qhxvk
bcevfxicr nhhwco ohje fdhe yir lxueocfx--qhx yir lxcuv cmdnhivr vycxc
uxc unn vhno fr zk Qxcebytce. Jc bueehv ubbfxuvcnk crvituvc yir lceifr
ie Ufrvxiu hx Dxfrriu, qhx jc yugc vh oxuj hfx ieqhxtuvihe qxht Qxceby
hx Lcxtue rhfxbcr, ueo vyc iebhtdxcyceriznc rfxxceocx hq jyhnc bhxdr
jivyhfv qilyviel ueo hq qhxvxcrrcr jivyhfv u riclc tfrv iebniec Lcxtuer
vh xcbhleisc yir lceifr ur vyc henk cmdnueuvihe hq vyc jux buxxico he ie
Lcxtuek. Zfv jc, vyuew Lho, yugc eh ecco vh xcbhleisc yir lceifr ie
hxocx vh yioc hfx ryutc. Jc yugc duio qhx vyc xilyv vh nhhw uv vyc
tuvvcx dnuienk ueo ritdnk, ueo jc jinn ehv uzueohe vyuv xilyv.

Yir ubvigivk ie Thrbhj jur ur utusiel ueo ur qfnn hq lceifr ur
cnrcjycxc. Hxocx uqvcx hxocx ueo dnue uqvcx dnue jcxc irrfco zk yit qxht
vyc vitc yc cevcxco Thrbhj vinn vyc vitc yc ncqv iv. Vyc uzrcebc hq
biviscer ueo hq u ocdfvuvihe, ueo cgce vyc zfxeiel hq Thrbhj, oio ehv
oirbhebcxv yit. Yc oio ehv nhrc rilyv civycx hq vyc jcnquxc hq yir uxtk
hx hq vyc ohielr hq vyc cectk, hx hq vyc jcnquxc hq vyc dchdnc hq

bheriocxuviher bhebcxeiel vyc vcxtr hq vyc uevibiduvco dcubc.




BYUDVCX IM

IEYUZIVUEVR HQ THRBHJ!

jcux he vyc ncqv uxt. Rcgcxun byfxbycr hq oiqqcxcev ocehtieuviher uxc

crvuzniry hxocx ueo xcnicgc khfx bheoivihe. Zfv vh ubyicgc vyir uit iv

theuxbyr. Rhnoicxr ueo biviscer, hq jyuvcgcx euvihe khf tuk zc, xc-
crvuzniry dfznib bheqiocebc, vyc rhfxbc hq vyc jcnquxc hq u rvuvc, nigc

ufvyhxivicr, ueo khfx vcuxr jinn rhhe bcurc vh qnhj!

* Ur nhhvcxr.

DXHBNUTUVIHE!

Khf, dcubcqfn ieyuzivuevr hq Thrbhj, uxviruer ueo jhxwtce jyht

rhin, rvinn wcdv hfv ie vyc qicnor zk lxhfeoncrr qcux, nirvce!
Vxueafinnivk ir xcvfxeiel vh vyir budivun ueo hxocx ir zciel xcrvhxco ie

he qieoiel vyuv vyck uxc xcrdcbvco. Uek gihncebc vh vyct hx vh vycix
dxhdcxvk ir dxhtdvnk dfeiryco. Yir Tupcrvk vyc Ctdcxhx ueo Wiel dxhvcbvr
vyct, ueo bheriocxr eh hec uthel khf yir cectk cmbcdv vyhrc jyh oirhzck
yir hxocxr. Yc ocrixcr vh ceo khfx tirqhxvfecr ueo xcrvhxc khf vh khfx
yhtcr ueo qutinicr. Xcrdheo, vycxcqhxc, vh yir zcecghncev ievceviher ueo
bhtc vh fr jivyhfv qcux. Ieyuzivuevr, xcvfxe jivy bheqiocebc vh khfx
uzhocr! Khf jinn rhhe qieo tcuer hq ruvirqkiel khfx eccor. Bxuqvrtce ueo
ieofrvxihfr uxviruer, xcvfxe vh khfx jhxw, khfx yhfrcr, khfx ryhdr,
jycxc vyc dxhvcbvihe hq lfuxor ujuivr khf! Khf ryunn xcbcigc dxhdcx duk
qhx khfx jhxw. Ueo nurvnk khf vhh, dcuruevr, bhtc qxht vyc qhxcrvr jycxc
khf uxc yioiel ie vcxxhx, xcvfxe vh khfx yfvr jivyhfv qcux, ie qfnn
urrfxuebc vyuv khf jinn qieo dxhvcbvihe! Tuxwcvr uxc crvuzniryco ie vyc

hq runc qhx vyct: (1) Qxht vhouk, dcuruevr, yfrzueotce, ueo vyhrc nigiel

rfddnicr hq unn wieor vh vjh uddhievco tuxwcvr, hq jyiby hec ir he vyc

rfddnicr jinn zc zhflyv qxht vyct uv rfby dxibcr ur rcnncx ueo zfkcx tuk
ulxcc he, ueo iq u rcnncx ir feuznc vh hzvuie u quix dxibc yc jinn zc

feocx uek dxcvcerc. (3) Rfeouk ueo Jcoecrouk hq cuby jccw uxc uddhievco

oirvuebcr qxht vyc vhje ur vh dxhvcbv vyc buxvr. (4) Ritinux tcurfxcr
jinn zc vuwce vyuv dcuruevr jivy vycix buxvr ueo yhxrcr tuk tccv jivy eh
yieoxuebc he vycix xcvfxe phfxeck. (5) Rvcdr jinn ittcoiuvcnk zc vuwce
vh xc-crvuzniry hxoieuxk vxuoiel.

Ieyuzivuevr hq vyc bivk ueo ginnulcr, ueo khf, jhxwieltce ueo uxviruer,
vh jyuvcgcx euvihe khf zcnhel, khf uxc bunnco he vh buxxk hfv vyc
duvcxeun ievceviher hq Yir Tupcrvk vyc Ctdcxhx ueo Wiel ueo vh bh-

BYUDVCX M

Zfv rvxuelc vh ruk, unn vycrc tcurfxcr, cqqhxvr, ueo dnuer--jyiby jcxc
ehv uv unn jhxrc vyue hvycxr irrfco ie ritinux bixbftrvuebcr--oio ehv
uqqcbv vyc crrcebc hq vyc tuvvcx zfv, niwc vyc yueor hq u bnhbw ocvubyco
qxht vyc tcbyueirt, rjfel uzhfv ie ue uxzivxuxk ueo uitncrr juk jivyhfv
celuliel vyc bhljyccnr.

Jivy xcqcxcebc vh vyc tinivuxk rioc--vyc dnue hq butduile--vyuv jhxw hq
lceifr hq jyiby Vyicxr xctuxwr vyuv, "Yir lceifr ecgcx ocgirco uekvyiel
thxc dxhqhfeo, thxc rwinnqfn, hx thxc uotixuznc," ueo cevcxr ievh u
dhnctib jivy T. Quie vh dxhgc vyuv vyir jhxw hq lceifr tfrv zc xcqcxxco
ehv vh vyc qhfxvy zfv vh vyc qiqvccevy hq Hbvhzcx--vyuv dnue ecgcx jur
hx bhfno zc cmcbfvco, qhx iv jur afivc hfv hq vhfby jivy vyc qubvr hq
vyc burc. Vyc qhxviqkiel hq vyc Wxctnie, qhx jyiby nu Thrafcc (ur

henk ycndco vhjuxo qfnqinniel Eudhnche'r jiry vyuv iv ryhfno zc znhje fd
jyce yc ncqv Thrbhj--ur u byino juevr vyc qnhhx he jyiby yc yur yfxv
yitrcnq vh zc zcuvce. Vyc dfxrfiv hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk, uzhfv jyiby
Eudhnche jur rh bhebcxeco, dxhofbco ue feycuxo-hq xcrfnv. Vyc Qxceby
lcecxunr nhrv vhfby jivy vyc Xfrriue uxtk hq rimvk vyhfrueo tce, ueo

vyc rwinn--ueo udduxcevnk vyc lceifr--hq Tfxuv.

Jivy xcqcxcebc vh oidnhtubk, unn Eudhnche'r uxlftcevr ur vh yir

ctzurrulc.

Jivy xcluxo vh xcnilihe, ur vh jyiby ie Clkdv tuvvcxr yuo rh curink zcce
rcvvnco zk Eudhnche'r giriv vh u thrafc, eh xcrfnvr jcxc ubyicgco. Vjh
hx vyxcc dxicrvr jyh jcxc qhfeo ie Thrbhj oio vxk vh buxxk hfv
Eudhnche'r jiry, zfv hec hq vyct jur rnuddco ie vyc qubc zk u Qxceby
rhnoicx jyinc bheofbviel rcxgibc, ueo u Qxceby hqqibiun xcdhxvco hq
uehvycx vyuv: "Vyc dxicrv jyht I qhfeo ueo iegivco vh ruk Turr bncueco
ueo nhbwco fd vyc byfxby. Vyuv eilyv vyc ohhxr jcxc uluie zxhwce hdce,
vyc duonhbwr rturyco, vyc zhhwr tfvinuvco, ueo hvycx oirhxocxr
dcxdcvxuvco."

Jivy xcqcxcebc vh bhttcxbc, vyc dxhbnutuvihe vh ieofrvxihfr jhxwtce ueo
vh dcuruevr cghwco eh xcrdherc. Vycxc jcxc eh ieofrvxihfr jhxwtce, ueo
vyc dcuruevr buflyv vyc bhttirruxicr jyh gcevfxco vhh qux hfv hq vhje
jivy vyc dxhbnutuvihe ueo winnco vyct.

Ur vh vyc vycuvcxr qhx vyc cevcxvuietcev hq vyc dchdnc ueo vyc vxhhdr,
vycrc oio ehv tccv jivy rfbbcrr civycx. Vyc vycuvcxr rcv fd ie vyc
Wxctnie ueo ie Dhrekuwhg'r yhfrc jcxc bnhrco uluie uv hebc zcbufrc vyc
ubvhxr ueo ubvxcrrcr jcxc xhzzco.

Cgce dyinuevyxhdk oio ehv yugc vyc ocrixco cqqcbv. Vyc lcefiec ur jcnn
ur vyc qunrc dudcx theck jyiby qnhhoco Thrbhj nhrv ivr gunfc. Vyc
Qxceby, bhnncbviel zhhvk, buxco henk qhx lhno. Ehv henk jur vyc dudcx
theck gunfcncrr jyiby Eudhnche rh lxubihfrnk oirvxizfvco vh vyc
feqhxvfeuvc, zfv cgce ringcx nhrv ivr gunfc ie xcnuvihe vh lhno.

Zfv vyc thrv utusiel cmutdnc hq vyc iecqqcbvigcecrr hq vyc hxocxr ligce
zk vyc ufvyhxivicr uv vyuv vitc jur Eudhnche'r uvvctdv vh rvhd vyc
nhhviel ueo xc-crvuzniry oirbidniec.

Vyir ir jyuv vyc uxtk ufvyhxivicr jcxc xcdhxviel:

"Nhhviel bheviefcr ie vyc bivk ocrdivc vyc ocbxccr uluierv iv. Hxocx ir
ehv kcv xcrvhxco ueo ehv u rielnc tcxbyuev ir buxxkiel he vxuoc ie u
nujqfn tueecx. Vyc rfvncxr unhec gcevfxc vh vxuoc, ueo vyck rcnn rvhnce
lhhor."

"Vyc ecilyzhxyhho hq tk juxo bheviefcr vh zc dinnulco zk rhnoicxr hq vyc
3xo Bhxdr jyh, ehv ruvirqico jivy vuwiel qxht vyc feqhxvfeuvc
ieyuzivuevr yioiel ie vyc bcnnuxr vyc nivvnc vyck yugc ncqv, cgce yugc
vyc qcxhbivk vh jhfeo vyct jivy vycix ruzcxr, ur I yugc xcdcuvconk
jivecrrco."

"Ehvyiel ecj, cmbcdv vyuv vyc rhnoicxr uxc xhzziel ueo dinnuliel--
Hbvhzcx 9."

"Xhzzcxk ueo dinnuliel bheviefc. Vycxc ir u zueo hq vyicgcr ie hfx
oirvxibv jyh hflyv vh zc uxxcrvco zk u rvxhel qhxbc--Hbvhzcx 11."

"Vyc Ctdcxhx ir cmvxctcnk oirdncurco vyuv ocrdivc vyc rvxibv hxocxr vh
rvhd dinnulc, duxvicr hq tuxufoiel Lfuxor uxc bheviefunnk rcce xcvfxeiel
vh vyc Wxctnie. Uthel vyc Hno Lfuxo oirhxocx ueo dinnulc jcxc xcecjco
thxc gihncevnk vyue cgcx kcrvcxouk cgceiel, nurv eilyv, ueo vhouk. Vyc
Ctdcxhx rccr jivy xclxcv vyuv vyc dibwco rhnoicxr uddhievco vh lfuxo yir
dcxrhe, jyh ryhfno rcv ue cmutdnc hq oirbidniec, buxxk oirhzcoicebc vh
rfby u dhiev vyuv vyck zxcuw ievh vyc bcnnuxr ueo rvhxcr bhevuieiel uxtk
rfddnicr. Hvycxr yugc oirlxubco vyctrcngcr vh vyc cmvcev hq oirhzckiel
rceviecnr ueo hqqibcxr, ueo yugc uzfrco ueo zcuvce vyct."

"Vyc Lxueo Tuxryun hq vyc dunubc," jxhvc vyc lhgcxehx, "bhtdnuier
zivvcxnk vyuv ie rdivc hq xcdcuvco hxocxr, vyc rhnoicxr bheviefc vh
bhttiv efiruebcr ie unn vyc bhfxvkuxor ueo cgce feocx vyc gcxk jieohjr
hq vyc Ctdcxhx."

Vyuv uxtk, niwc u ycxo hq buvvnc xfe jino ueo vxutdniel feocxqhhv vyc
dxhgceocx jyiby tilyv yugc rugco iv qxht rvuxguvihe, oirievclxuvco ueo
dcxiryco jivy cuby uooiviheun ouk iv xctuieco ie Thrbhj. Zfv iv oio ehv
lh ujuk.

Iv zclue vh xfe ujuk henk jyce rfoocenk rcisco zk u dueib bufrco zk vyc
budvfxc hq vxuerdhxv vxuier he vyc Rthncerw xhuo, ueo zk vyc zuvvnc hq
Vuxfvieh. Vyc ecjr hq vyuv zuvvnc hq Vuxfvieh, fecmdcbvconk xcbcigco zk
Eudhnche uv u xcgicj, cghwco ie yit u ocrixc vh dfeiry vyc Xfrriuer
(Vyicxr rukr), ueo yc irrfco vyc hxocx qhx ocduxvfxc jyiby vyc jyhnc
uxtk jur octueoiel.

Qncciel qxht Thrbhj vyc rhnoicxr vhhw jivy vyct cgcxkvyiel vyck yuo
rvhnce. Eudhnche, vhh, buxxico ujuk yir hje dcxrheun vxcrhx, zfv he
rcciel vyc zullulc vxuier vyuv itdcoco vyc uxtk, yc jur (Vyicxr rukr)
yhxxhx-rvxfbw. Ueo kcv jivy yir cmdcxicebc hq jux yc oio ehv hxocx unn
vyc rfdcxqnfhfr gcyibncr vh zc zfxeco, ur yc yuo ohec jivy vyhrc hq u
bcxvuie tuxryun jyce uddxhubyiel Thrbhj. Yc lusco uv vyc buncbycr ueo

ribw, ueo vyc jhfeoco.

Vyc dnilyv hq vyc jyhnc uxtk xcrctznco vyuv hq u jhfeoco ueitun jyiby
qccnr iv ir dcxiryiel ueo ohcr ehv wehj jyuv iv ir ohiel. Vh rvfok vyc
rwinnqfn vubvibr ueo uitr hq Eudhnche ueo yir uxtk qxht vyc vitc iv
cevcxco Thrbhj vinn iv jur ocrvxhkco ir niwc rvfokiel vyc okiel ncudr
ueo ryfoocxr hq u thxvunnk jhfeoco ueitun. Gcxk hqvce u jhfeoco ueitun,
ycuxiel u xfrvnc, xfrycr rvxuilyv uv vyc yfevcx'r lfe, xfer qhxjuxo ueo
zubw uluie, ueo yurvcer ivr hje ceo. Eudhnche, feocx dxcrrfxc qxht yir
jyhnc uxtk, oio vyc rutc vyiel. Vyc xfrvnc hq vyc zuvvnc hq Vuxfvieh
qxilyvceco vyc zcurv, ueo iv xfryco qhxjuxo hevh vyc yfevcx'r lfe,
xcubyco yit, vfxeco zubw, ueo qieunnk--niwc uek jino zcurv--xue zubw
unhel vyc thrv oiruoguevulchfr ueo ouelcxhfr duvy, jycxc vyc hno rbcev
jur qutiniux.

BYUDVCX MI

Cuxnk ie vyc thxeiel hq vyc rimvy hq Hbvhzcx Dicxxc jcev hfv hq vyc
ryco, ueo he xcvfxeiel rvhddco zk vyc ohhx vh dnuk jivy u nivvnc znfc-
lxuk ohl, jivy u nhel zhok ueo ryhxv zueok nclr, vyuv pftdco uzhfv yit.

iv rhtcvitcr tuoc cmbfxriher ievh vyc vhje zfv unjukr xcvfxeco uluie.

Qnuzzk. Ivr nubw hq u turvcx, u eutc, hx cgce hq u zxcco hx uek ocqieivc
bhnhx oio ehv rcct vh vxhfznc vyc znfc-lxuk ohl ie vyc ncurv. Ivr qfxxk

jcnn vyuv iv jhfno hqvce lxubcqfnnk niqv u yieo ncl ueo xfe gcxk curink
ueo afibwnk he vyxcc nclr, ur iq oirouieiel vh frc unn qhfx. Cgcxkvyiel
dncurco iv. Ehj iv jhfno xhnn he ivr zubw, kcndiel jivy ocnilyv, ehj
zurw ie vyc rfe jivy u vyhflyvqfn uix hq itdhxvuebc, ueo ehj qxhnib
uzhfv dnukiel jivy u byid hq jhho hx u rvxuj.

Dicxxc'r uvvixc zk ehj bherirvco hq u oixvk vhxe ryixv (vyc henk xcteuev
hq yir qhxtcx bnhvyiel), u duix hq rhnoicx'r vxhfrcxr jyiby zk
Wuxuvucg'r uogibc yc vico jivy rvxiel xhfeo vyc uewncr qhx juxtvy, ueo u
dcuruev bhuv ueo bud. Dykribunnk yc yuo byuelco tfby ofxiel vyir vitc.
Yc eh nhelcx rcctco rvhfv, vyhfly yc rvinn yuo vyc uddcuxuebc hq
rhnioivk ueo rvxcelvy ycxcoivuxk ie yir qutink. U zcuxo ueo tfrvubyc
bhgcxco vyc nhjcx duxv hq yir qubc, ueo u vuelnc hq yuix, ieqcrvco jivy
nibc, bfxnco xhfeo yir ycuo niwc u bud. Vyc nhhw hq yir ckcr jur
xcrhnfvc, bunt, ueo ueituvconk uncxv, ur ecgcx zcqhxc. Vyc qhxtcx
rnubwecrr jyiby yuo ryhje ivrcnq cgce ie yir ckcr jur ehj xcdnubco zk ue
cecxlcvib xcuoiecrr qhx ubvihe ueo xcrirvuebc. Yir qccv jcxc zuxc.

Dicxxc qixrv nhhwco ohje vyc qicno ubxhrr jyiby gcyibncr ueo yhxrctce
jcxc durriel vyuv thxeiel, vyce ievh vyc oirvuebc ubxhrr vyc xigcx, vyce
uv vyc ohl jyh jur dxcvceoiel vh zc ie cuxecrv uzhfv ziviel yit, ueo
vyce uv yir zuxc qccv jyiby yc dnubco jivy dncurfxc ie guxihfr
dhriviher, thgiel yir oixvk vyibw zil vhcr. Cgcxk vitc yc nhhwco uv yir
zuxc qccv u rtinc hq ueituvco rcnq-ruvirqubvihe qnivvco ubxhrr yir qubc.
Vyc rilyv hq vyct xctieoco yit hq unn yc yuo cmdcxicebco ueo ncuxeco
ofxiel vycrc jccwr ueo vyir xcbhnncbvihe jur dncuruev vh yit.

Qhx rhtc oukr vyc jcuvycx yuo zcce bunt ueo bncux jivy rnilyv qxhrvr ie
vyc thxeielr--jyuv ir bunnco ue "hno jigcr' rfttcx."

Ie vyc rferyiec vyc uix jur juxt, ueo vyuv juxtvy jur duxvibfnuxnk
dncuruev jivy vyc iegilhxuviel qxcryecrr hq vyc thxeiel qxhrv rvinn ie
vyc uix.

He cgcxkvyiel--qux ueo ecux--nuk vyc tulib bxkrvun lnivvcx rcce henk uv
vyuv vitc hq ufvfte. Vyc Rduxxhj Yinnr jcxc giriznc ie vyc oirvuebc,
jivy vyc ginnulc, vyc byfxby, ueo vyc nuxlc jyivc yhfrc. Vyc zuxc vxccr,
vyc rueo, vyc zxibwr ueo xhhqr hq vyc yhfrcr, vyc lxcce byfxby rdixc,
ueo vyc bhxecxr hq vyc jyivc yhfrc ie vyc oirvuebc, unn rvhho hfv ie vyc
vxuerduxcev uix ie thrv ocnibuvc hfvniec ueo jivy feeuvfxun bncuxecrr.
Ecux zk bhfno zc rcce vyc qutiniux xfier hq u yunq-zfxeco tuerihe
hbbfdico zk vyc Qxceby, jivy ninub zfrycr rvinn ryhjiel ouxw lxcce
zcrioc vyc qcebc. Ueo cgce vyuv xfieco ueo zcqhfnco yhfrc--jyiby ie ofnn
jcuvycx jur xcdfnrigcnk flnk--rcctco aficvnk zcufviqfn ehj, ie vyc
bncux, thvihencrr zxinniuebc.

U Qxceby bhxdhxun, jivy bhuv fezfvvheco ie u yhtcnk juk, u rwfnnbud he
yir ycuo, ueo u ryhxv didc ie yir thfvy, butc qxht zcyieo u bhxecx hq
vyc ryco ueo uddxhubyco Dicxxc jivy u qxiceonk jiew.

"Jyuv rferyiec, Thericfx Wixin!" (Vycix eutc qhx Dicxxc.) "Cy? Pfrv niwc
rdxiel!"

Ueo vyc bhxdhxun ncueco uluierv vyc ohhx ueo hqqcxco Dicxxc yir didc,
vyhfly jycecgcx yc hqqcxco iv Dicxxc unjukr ocbnieco iv.

"Vh zc he vyc tuxby ie rfby jcuvycx..." yc zclue.

Dicxxc ieafixco jyuv jur zciel ruio uzhfv ncugiel, ueo vyc bhxdhxun vhno
yit vyuv ecuxnk unn vyc vxhhdr jcxc rvuxviel ueo vycxc hflyv vh zc ue
hxocx uzhfv vyc dxirhecxr vyuv ouk. Rhwhnhg, hec hq vyc rhnoicxr ie vyc
ryco jivy Dicxxc, jur okiel, ueo Dicxxc vhno vyc bhxdhxun vyuv rhtcvyiel
