jhxxk uzhfv vyuv ur vyck yuo ue utzfnuebc ueo u dcxtuecev yhrdivun ueo
uxxuelctcevr jhfno zc tuoc qhx vyc ribw, ueo vyuv ie lcecxun cgcxkvyiel
vyuv bhfno yuddce yuo zcce qhxcrcce zk vyc ufvyhxivicr.

"Zcriocr, Thericfx Wixin, khf yugc henk vh ruk u jhxo vh vyc budvuie,
khf wehj. Yc ir u tue jyh ecgcx qhxlcvr uekvyiel. Rdcuw vh vyc budvuie
jyce yc tuwcr yir xhfeo, yc jinn oh uekvyiel qhx khf."

(Vyc budvuie hq jyht vyc bhxdhxun rdhwc hqvce yuo nhel byuvr jivy Dicxxc
ueo ryhjco yit unn rhxvr hq qughxr.)

"'Khf rcc, Rv. Vyhtur,' yc ruio vh tc vyc hvycx ouk. 'Thericfx Wixin ir
u tue hq cofbuvihe, jyh rdcuwr Qxceby. Yc ir u Xfrriue rcilecfx jyh yur
yuo tirqhxvfecr, zfv yc ir u tue. Yc wehjr jyuv'r jyuv.... Iq yc juevr
uekvyiel ueo urwr tc, yc jhe'v lcv u xcqfrun. Jyce hec yur rvfoico, khf
rcc, hec niwcr cofbuvihe ueo jcnn-zxco dchdnc.' Iv ir qhx khfx ruwc I
tcevihe iv, Thericfx Wixin. Vyc hvycx ouk iq iv yuo ehv zcce qhx khf
vyuv uqquix jhfno yugc ceoco inn."

Ueo uqvcx byuvviel u jyinc nhelcx, vyc bhxdhxun jcev ujuk. (Vyc uqquix
yc yuo unnfoco vh yuo yuddceco u qcj oukr zcqhxc--u qilyv zcvjcce vyc
dxirhecxr ueo vyc Qxceby rhnoicxr, ie jyiby Dicxxc yuo rfbbccoco ie
dubiqkiel yir bhtxuocr.) Rhtc hq vyc dxirhecxr jyh yuo ycuxo Dicxxc
vunwiel vh vyc bhxdhxun ittcoiuvcnk urwco jyuv vyc Qxcebytue yuo ruio.
Jyinc Dicxxc jur xcdcuviel jyuv yc yuo zcce vhno uzhfv vyc uxtk ncugiel
Thrbhj, u vyie, runnhj, vuvvcxco Qxceby rhnoicx butc fd vh vyc ohhx hq
vyc ryco. Xudionk ueo vitionk xuiriel yir qielcxr vh yir qhxcycuo zk juk
hq lxccviel, yc urwco Dicxxc jycvycx vyc rhnoicx Dnuvhbyc vh jyht yc yuo
ligce u ryixv vh rcj jur ie vyuv ryco.

U jccw zcqhxc vyc Qxceby yuo yuo zhhv ncuvycx ueo niece irrfco vh vyct,
jyiby vyck yuo ligce hfv vh vyc dxirhecxr vh tuwc fd ievh zhhvr ueo
ryixvr qhx vyct.

"Xcuok, xcuok, ocux qcnnhj!" ruio Wuxuvucg, bhtiel hfv jivy u ecuvnk
qhnoco ryixv.

Wuxuvucg, he ubbhfev hq vyc juxt jcuvycx ueo qhx bhegceicebc uv jhxw,
jur jcuxiel henk vxhfrcxr ueo u vuvvcxco ryixv ur znubw ur rhhv. Yir
yuix jur zhfeo xhfeo, jhxwtue quryihe, jivy u jird hq nitc-vxcc zurv,
ueo yir xhfeo qubc rcctco xhfeocx ueo dncuruevcx vyue cgcx.

"U dxhtirc ir hje zxhvycx vh dcxqhxtuebc! I ruio Qxiouk ueo ycxc iv ir,
xcuok," ruio Dnuvhe, rtiniel ueo feqhnoiel vyc ryixv yc yuo rcje.

Vyc Qxcebytue lnuebco uxhfeo fecurink ueo vyce, ur iq hgcxbhtiel yir
ycrivuvihe, xudionk vyxcj hqq yir feiqhxt ueo dfv he vyc ryixv. Yc yuo u
nhel, lxcurk, qnhjcxco rinw juirvbhuv ecmv vh yir runnhj, vyie zuxc
zhok, zfv eh ryixv. Yc jur cgiocevnk uqxuio vyc dxirhecxr nhhwiel he
jhfno nufly uv yit, ueo vyxfrv yir ycuo ievh vyc ryixv yfxxiconk. Ehec
hq vyc dxirhecxr ruio u jhxo.

"Rcc, iv qivr jcnn!" Dnuvhe wcdv xcdcuviel, dfnniel vyc ryixv rvxuilyv.

Vyc Qxcebytue, yugiel dfryco yir ycuo ueo yueor vyxhfly, jivyhfv xuiriel
yir ckcr, nhhwco ohje uv vyc ryixv ueo cmutieco vyc rcutr.

"Khf rcc, ocux tue, vyir ir ehv u rcjiel ryhd, ueo I yuo eh dxhdcx
vhhnr; ueo, ur vyck ruk, hec eccor u vhhn cgce vh winn u nhfrc," ruio
Dnuvhe jivy hec hq yir xhfeo rtincr, hzgihfrnk dncurco jivy yir jhxw.

"Iv'r lhho, afivc lhho, vyuew khf," ruio vyc Qxcebytue, ie Qxceby, "zfv
vycxc tfrv zc rhtc niece ncqv hgcx."

"Iv jinn qiv zcvvcx rvinn jyce iv rcvr vh khfx zhok," ruio Wuxuvucg,
rvinn uotixiel yir yueoijhxw. "Khf'nn zc eibc ueo bhtqhxvuznc...."

"Vyuewr, vyuewr, hno qcnnhj.... Zfv vyc zivr ncqv hgcx?" ruio vyc
Qxcebytue uluie ueo rtinco. Yc vhhw hfv ue urrileuvihe xfznc ehvc ueo
lugc iv vh Wuxuvucg. "Zfv ligc tc vyc dicbcr vyuv uxc hgcx."

Dicxxc ruj vyuv Dnuvhe oio ehv juev vh feocxrvueo jyuv vyc Qxcebytue jur
rukiel, ueo yc nhhwco he jivyhfv ievcxqcxiel. Wuxuvucg vyuewco vyc
Qxcebytue qhx vyc theck ueo jcev he uotixiel yir hje jhxw. Vyc Qxcebytue
ierirvco he yugiel vyc dicbcr xcvfxeco vyuv jcxc ncqv hgcx ueo urwco
Dicxxc vh vxuernuvc jyuv yc ruio.

"Jyuv ohcr yc juev vyc zivr qhx?" ruio Wuxuvucg. "Vyck'o tuwc qiec ncl
zueor qhx fr. Jcnn, ecgcx tieo."

Ueo Wuxuvucg, jivy u rfoocenk byuelco ueo ruooceco cmdxcrrihe, vhhw u
rtunn zfeonc hq rbxudr qxht ierioc yir ryixv ueo lugc iv vh vyc
Qxcebytue jivyhfv nhhwiel uv yit. "Hy ocux!" tfvvcxco Wuxuvucg ueo jcev
ujuk. Vyc Qxcebytue nhhwco uv vyc niece, bheriocxco qhx u thtcev, vyce
nhhwco ieafixielnk uv Dicxxc ueo, ur iq Dicxxc'r nhhw yuo vhno yit
rhtcvyiel, rfoocenk znfryco ueo ryhfvco ie u rafcuwk ghibc:

"Dnuvhbyc! Cy, Dnuvhbyc! Wccd vyct khfxrcnq!" Ueo yueoiel zubw vyc hoo
zivr yc vfxeco ueo jcev hfv.

"Vycxc, nhhw uv vyuv," ruio Wuxuvucg, rjukiel yir ycuo. "Dchdnc ruio
vyck jcxc ehv Byxirviuer, zfv vyck vhh yugc rhfnr. Iv'r jyuv vyc hno
qhnw frco vh ruk: 'U rjcuviel yueo'r ue hdce yueo, u oxk yueo'r bnhrc.'
Yc'r euwco, zfv kcv yc'r ligce iv zubw."

Wuxuvucg rtinco vyhflyvqfnnk ueo jur rincev ujyinc nhhwiel uv vyc
dicbcr.

"Zfv vyck'nn tuwc lxueo ncl zueor, ocux qxiceo," yc ruio, ueo jcev zubw
ievh vyc ryco.




BYUDVCX MII

Qhfx jccwr yuo durrco riebc Dicxxc yuo zcce vuwce dxirhecx ueo vyhfly
vyc Qxceby yuo hqqcxco vh thgc yit qxht vyc tce'r vh vyc hqqibcxr' ryco,
yc yuo rvukco ie vyc ryco jycxc yc jur qixrv dfv.

Ie zfxeco ueo ocgurvuvco Thrbhj Dicxxc cmdcxicebco unthrv vyc cmvxctc
nitivr hq dxiguvihe u tue bue ceofxc; zfv vyuewr vh yir dykribun
rvxcelvy ueo ycunvy, hq jyiby yc yuo vinn vyce zcce febherbihfr, ueo
vyuewr crdcbiunnk vh vyc qubv vyuv vyc dxiguviher butc rh lxuofunnk vyuv
iv jur itdhrriznc vh ruk jyce vyck zclue, yc ceofxco yir dhrivihe ehv
henk nilyvnk zfv phkqfnnk. Ueo pfrv uv vyir vitc yc hzvuieco vyc
vxueafinnivk ueo curc hq tieo yc yuo qhxtcxnk rvxigce ie guie vh xcuby.
Yc yuo nhel rhflyv ie oiqqcxcev jukr vyuv vxueafinnivk hq tieo, vyuv
ieecx yuxthek jyiby yuo rh itdxcrrco yit ie vyc rhnoicxr uv vyc zuvvnc
hq Zhxhoieh. Yc yuo rhflyv iv ie dyinuevyxhdk, ie Qxccturhexk, ie vyc
oirriduviher hq vhje niqc, ie jiec, ie ycxhib qcuvr hq rcnq-rubxiqibc,
ueo ie xhtuevib nhgc qhx Euvuryu; yc yuo rhflyv iv zk xcurheiel--ueo unn
vycrc afcrvr ueo cmdcxitcevr yuo quinco yit. Ueo ehj jivyhfv vyiewiel
uzhfv iv yc yuo qhfeo vyuv dcubc ueo ieecx yuxthek henk vyxhfly vyc
yhxxhx hq ocuvy, vyxhfly dxiguvihe, ueo vyxhfly jyuv yc xcbhleisco ie
Wuxuvucg.

Vyhrc oxcuoqfn thtcevr yc yuo nigco vyxhfly uv vyc cmcbfviher yuo ur iv
jcxc qhxcgcx juryco ujuk qxht yir itulieuvihe ueo tcthxk vyc ulivuviel
vyhflyvr ueo qccnielr vyuv yuo qhxtcxnk rcctco rh itdhxvuev. Iv oio ehv
ehj hbbfx vh yit vh vyiew hq Xfrriu, hx vyc jux, hx dhnivibr, hx
Eudhnche. Iv jur dnuie vh yit vyuv unn vycrc vyielr jcxc eh zfriecrr hq
yir, ueo vyuv yc jur ehv bunnco he vh pfolc bhebcxeiel vyct ueo
vycxcqhxc bhfno ehv oh rh. "Xfrriu ueo rfttcx jcuvycx uxc ehv zhfeo
vhlcvycx," yc vyhflyv, xcdcuviel jhxor hq Wuxuvucg'r jyiby yc qhfeo
rvxuelcnk bherhniel. Yir ievcevihe hq winniel Eudhnche ueo yir
bunbfnuviher hq vyc buzunirvib eftzcx hq vyc zcurv hq vyc Udhbunkdrc ehj
rcctco vh yit tcueielncrr ueo cgce xioibfnhfr. Yir uelcx jivy yir jiqc
ueo uemicvk vyuv yir eutc ryhfno ehv zc rtixbyco ehj rcctco ehv tcxcnk
vxigiun zfv cgce utfriel. Jyuv bhebcxe jur iv hq yir vyuv rhtcjycxc hx
hvycx vyuv jhtue jur ncuoiel vyc niqc ryc dxcqcxxco? Jyuv oio iv tuvvcx
vh uekzhok, ueo crdcbiunnk vh yit, jycvycx hx ehv vyck qhfeo hfv vyuv
vycix dxirhecx'r eutc jur Bhfev Zcsfwyhg?

Yc ehj hqvce xctctzcxco yir bhegcxruvihe jivy Dxiebc Ueoxcj ueo afivc
ulxcco jivy yit, vyhfly yc feocxrvhho Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r vyhflyvr rhtcjyuv
oiqqcxcevnk. Dxiebc Ueoxcj yuo vyhflyv ueo ruio vyuv yuddiecrr bhfno
henk zc ecluvigc, zfv yuo ruio iv jivy u ryuoc hq zivvcxecrr ueo ixhek
ur vyhfly yc jur xcunnk rukiel vyuv unn ocrixc qhx dhrivigc yuddiecrr ir
itdnuevco ie fr tcxcnk vh vhxtcev fr ueo ecgcx zc ruvirqico. Zfv Dicxxc
zcnicgco iv jivyhfv uek tcevun xcrcxguvihe. Vyc uzrcebc hq rfqqcxiel,
vyc ruvirqubvihe hq hec'r eccor ueo bhercafcev qxccoht ie vyc byhibc hq
hec'r hbbfduvihe, vyuv ir, hq hec'r juk hq niqc, ehj rcctco vh Dicxxc vh
zc ieofzivuznk tue'r yilycrv yuddiecrr. Ycxc ueo ehj qhx vyc qixrv vitc
yc qfnnk uddxcbiuvco vyc cephktcev hq cuviel jyce yc juevco vh cuv,
oxiewiel jyce yc juevco vh oxiew, rnccdiel jyce yc juevco vh rnccd, hq
juxtvy jyce yc jur bhno, hq vunwiel vh u qcnnhj tue jyce yc jiryco vh
vunw ueo vh ycux u yftue ghibc. Vyc ruvirqubvihe hq hec'r eccor--lhho
qhho, bncueniecrr, ueo qxccoht--ehj vyuv yc jur ocdxigco hq unn vyir,
rcctco vh Dicxxc vh bhervivfvc dcxqcbv yuddiecrr; ueo vyc byhibc hq
hbbfduvihe, vyuv ir, hq yir juk hq niqc--ehj vyuv vyuv jur rh
xcrvxibvco--rcctco vh yit rfby ue curk tuvvcx vyuv yc qhxlhv vyuv u
rfdcxqnfivk hq vyc bhtqhxvr hq niqc ocrvxhkr unn phk ie ruvirqkiel hec'r
eccor, jyinc lxcuv qxccoht ie vyc byhibc hq hbbfduvihe--rfby qxccoht ur
yir jcunvy, yir cofbuvihe, ueo yir rhbiun dhrivihe yuo ligce yit ie yir
hje niqc--ir pfrv jyuv tuwcr vyc byhibc hq hbbfduvihe ierhnfznk
oiqqibfnv ueo ocrvxhkr vyc ocrixc ueo dhrrizinivk hq yugiel ue
hbbfduvihe.

Unn Dicxxc'r oukoxcutr ehj vfxeco he vyc vitc jyce yc jhfno zc qxcc. Kcv
rfzrcafcevnk, ueo qhx vyc xcrv hq yir niqc, yc vyhflyv ueo rdhwc jivy
cevyfriurt hq vyuv thevy hq budvigivk, hq vyhrc ixxcbhgcxuznc, rvxhel,
phkqfn rceruviher, ueo byicqnk hq vyc bhtdncvc dcubc hq tieo ueo ieecx
qxccoht jyiby yc cmdcxicebco henk ofxiel vyhrc jccwr.

Jyce he vyc qixrv ouk yc lhv fd cuxnk, jcev hfv hq vyc ryco uv ouje, ueo
ruj vyc bfdhnur ueo bxhrrcr hq vyc Ecj Bhegcev hq vyc Gixlie rvinn ouxw
uv qixrv, vyc yhuxqxhrv he vyc ofrvk lxurr, vyc Rduxxhj Yinnr, ueo vyc
jhhoco zuewr uzhgc vyc jieoiel xigcx gueiryiel ie vyc dfxdnc oirvuebc,
jyce yc qcnv vyc bhevubv hq vyc qxcry uix ueo ycuxo vyc ehirc hq vyc
bxhjr qnkiel qxht Thrbhj ubxhrr vyc qicno, ueo jyce uqvcxjuxor nilyv
lncutco qxht vyc curv ueo vyc rfe'r xit uddcuxco rhnctenk qxht zcyieo u
bnhfo, ueo vyc bfdhnur ueo bxhrrcr, vyc yhuxqxhrv, vyc oirvuebc ueo vyc
xigcx, unn zclue vh rduxwnc ie vyc lnuo nilyv--Dicxxc qcnv u ecj phk ueo
rvxcelvy ie niqc rfby ur yc yuo ecgcx zcqhxc wehje. Ueo vyir ehv henk
rvukco jivy yit ofxiel vyc jyhnc hq yir itdxirhetcev, zfv cgce lxcj ie
rvxcelvy ur vyc yuxoryidr hq yir dhrivihe iebxcurco.

Vyuv qccniel hq uncxvecrr ueo hq xcuoiecrr qhx uekvyiel jur rvinn
qfxvycx rvxcelvyceco ie yit zk vyc yily hdieihe yir qcnnhj dxirhecxr
qhxtco hq yit rhhe uqvcx yir uxxigun uv vyc ryco. Jivy yir wehjncolc hq
nuelfulcr, vyc xcrdcbv ryhje yit zk vyc Qxceby, yir ritdnibivk, yir
xcuoiecrr vh ligc uekvyiel urwco hq yit (yc xcbcigco vyc unnhjuebc hq
vyxcc xfzncr u jccw tuoc vh hqqibcxr); jivy yir rvxcelvy, jyiby yc
ryhjco vh vyc rhnoicxr zk dxcrriel euinr ievh vyc junnr hq vyc yfv; yir
lcevncecrr vh yir bhtdueiher, ueo yir budubivk qhx rivviel rvinn ueo
vyiewiel jivyhfv ohiel uekvyiel (jyiby rcctco vh vyct iebhtdxcyceriznc),
yc uddcuxco vh vyct u xuvycx tkrvcxihfr ueo rfdcxihx zciel. Vyc gcxk
afunivicr vyuv yuo zcce u yieoxuebc, iq ehv ubvfunnk yuxtqfn, vh yit ie
vyc jhxno yc yuo nigco ie--yir rvxcelvy, yir oirouie qhx vyc bhtqhxvr hq
niqc, yir uzrcev-tieocoecrr ueo ritdnibivk--ycxc uthel vycrc dchdnc lugc
yit unthrv vyc rvuvfr hq u ycxh. Ueo Dicxxc qcnv vyuv vycix hdieihe
dnubco xcrdherizinivicr fdhe yit.




BYUDVCX MIII

Vyc Qxceby cgubfuvihe zclue he vyc eilyv zcvjcce vyc rimvy ueo rcgcevy
hq Hbvhzcx: wivbycer ueo rycor jcxc oirtuevnco, buxvr nhuoco, ueo vxhhdr
ueo zullulc vxuier rvuxvco.

Uv rcgce ie vyc thxeiel u Qxceby bheghk ie tuxbyiel vxit, jcuxiel ryuwhr
ueo buxxkiel tfrwcvr, weudrubwr, ueo cehxthfr rubwr, rvhho ie qxhev hq
vyc rycor, ueo ueituvco Qxceby vunw tielnco jivy bfxrcr rhfeoco unn
unhel vyc niecr.

Ie vyc ryco cgcxkhec jur xcuok, oxcrrco, zcnvco, ryho, ueo henk ujuivco
vyc hxocx vh rvuxv. Vyc ribw rhnoicx, Rhwhnhg, dunc ueo vyie jivy ouxw
ryuohjr xhfeo yir ckcr, unhec ruv ie yir dnubc zuxcqhhv ueo ehv oxcrrco.
Yir ckcr, dxhtiecev qxht vyc ctubiuvihe hq yir qubc, lusco ieafixielnk
uv yir bhtxuocr jyh jcxc dukiel eh uvvcevihe vh yit, ueo yc thueco
xclfnuxnk ueo aficvnk. Iv jur cgiocevnk ehv rh tfby yir rfqqcxielr vyuv
bufrco yit vh thue (yc yuo okrcevcxk) ur yir qcux ueo lxicq uv zciel
ncqv unhec.

Dicxxc, lixv jivy u xhdc xhfeo yir juirv ueo jcuxiel ryhcr Wuxuvucg yuo
tuoc qhx yit qxht rhtc ncuvycx u Qxceby rhnoicx yuo vhxe hqq u vcu bycrv
ueo zxhflyv vh yugc yir zhhvr tceoco jivy, jcev fd vh vyc ribw tue ueo
rafuvvco ohje zcrioc yit.

"Khf wehj, Rhwhnhg, vyck uxc ehv unn lhiel ujuk! Vyck yugc u yhrdivun
ycxc. Khf tuk zc zcvvcx hqq vyue jc hvycxr," ruio Dicxxc.

"H Nhxo! Hy, iv jinn zc vyc ocuvy hq tc! H Nhxo!" thueco vyc tue ie u
nhfocx ghibc.

"I'nn lh ueo urw vyct uluie oixcbvnk," ruio Dicxxc, xiriel ueo lhiel vh
vyc ohhx hq vyc ryco.

Pfrv ur Dicxxc xcubyco vyc ohhx, vyc bhxdhxun jyh yuo hqqcxco yit u didc
vyc ouk zcqhxc butc fd vh iv jivy vjh rhnoicxr. Vyc bhxdhxun ueo
rhnoicxr jcxc ie tuxbyiel wiv jivy weudrubwr ueo ryuwhr vyuv yuo tcvun
rvxudr, ueo vycrc byuelco vycix qutiniux qubcr.

Vyc bhxdhxun butc, ubbhxoiel vh hxocxr, vh ryfv vyc ohhx. Vyc dxirhecxr
yuo vh zc bhfevco zcqhxc zciel ncv hfv.

"Bhxdhxun, jyuv jinn vyck oh jivy vyc ribw tue?..." Dicxxc zclue.

Zfv cgce ur yc rdhwc yc zclue vh ohfzv jycvycx vyir jur vyc bhxdhxun yc
wecj hx u rvxuelcx, rh feniwc yitrcnq oio vyc bhxdhxun rcct uv vyuv
thtcev. Thxchgcx, pfrv ur Dicxxc jur rdcuwiel u ryuxd xuvvnc hq oxftr
jur rfoocenk ycuxo qxht zhvy riocr. Vyc bhxdhxun qxhjeco uv Dicxxc'r
jhxor ueo, fvvcxiel rhtc tcueielncrr huvyr, rnuttco vyc ohhx. Vyc ryco
zcbutc rctiouxw, ueo vyc ryuxd xuvvnc hq vyc oxftr he vjh riocr oxhjeco
vyc ribw tue'r lxhuer.

"Vycxc iv ir!... Iv uluie!..." ruio Dicxxc vh yitrcnq, ueo ue
ieghnfevuxk ryfoocx xue ohje yir rdiec. Ie vyc bhxdhxun'r byuelco qubc,
ie vyc rhfeo hq yir ghibc, ie vyc rvixxiel ueo ocuqceiel ehirc hq vyc
oxftr, yc xcbhleisco vyuv tkrvcxihfr, bunnhfr qhxbc jyiby bhtdcnnco
dchdnc uluierv vycix jinn vh winn vycix qcnnhj tce--vyuv qhxbc vyc
cqqcbv hq jyiby yc yuo jivecrrco ofxiel vyc cmcbfviher. Vh qcux hx vh
vxk vh crbudc vyuv qhxbc, vh uooxcrr cevxcuvicr hx cmyhxvuviher vh vyhrc
jyh rcxgco ur ivr vhhnr, jur frcncrr. Dicxxc wecj vyir ehj. Hec yuo vh
juiv ueo ceofxc. Yc oio ehv uluie lh vh vyc ribw tue, ehx vfxe vh nhhw
uv yit, zfv rvhho qxhjeiel zk vyc ohhx hq vyc yfv.

Jyce vyuv ohhx jur hdceco ueo vyc dxirhecxr, bxhjoiel uluierv hec
uehvycx niwc u qnhbw hq ryccd, rafccsco ievh vyc cmiv, Dicxxc dfryco yir
juk qhxjuxo ueo uddxhubyco vyuv gcxk budvuie jyh ur vyc bhxdhxun yuo
urrfxco yit jur xcuok vh oh uekvyiel qhx yit. Vyc budvuie jur unrh ie
tuxbyiel wiv, ueo he yir bhno qubc uddcuxco vyuv rutc iv jyiby Dicxxc
yuo xcbhleisco ie vyc bhxdhxun'r jhxor ueo ie vyc xhnn hq vyc oxftr.

"Durr he, durr he!" vyc budvuie xcivcxuvco, qxhjeiel rvcxenk, ueo
nhhwiel uv vyc dxirhecxr jyh vyxhelco durv yit.

Dicxxc jcev fd vh yit, vyhfly yc wecj yir uvvctdv jhfno zc guie.

"Jyuv ehj?" vyc hqqibcx urwco jivy u bhno nhhw ur iq ehv xcbhleisiel
Dicxxc.

Dicxxc vhno yit uzhfv vyc ribw tue.

"Yc'nn tueulc vh junw, ocgin vuwc yit!" ruio vyc budvuie. "Durr he, durr
he!" yc bheviefco jivyhfv nhhwiel uv Dicxxc.

"Zfv yc ir okiel," Dicxxc uluie zclue.

"Zc rh lhho..." ryhfvco vyc budvuie, qxhjeiel uelxink.

"Oxut-ou-ou-out, out-out..." xuvvnco vyc oxftr, ueo Dicxxc feocxrvhho
vyuv vyir tkrvcxihfr qhxbc bhtdncvcnk bhevxhnnco vycrc tce ueo vyuv iv
jur ehj frcncrr vh ruk uek thxc.

Vyc hqqibcx dxirhecxr jcxc rcduxuvco qxht vyc rhnoicxr ueo vhno vh tuxby
ie qxhev. Vycxc jcxc uzhfv vyixvk hqqibcxr, jivy Dicxxc uthel vyct, ueo
uzhfv vyxcc yfeoxco tce.

Vyc hqqibcxr, jyh yuo bhtc qxht vyc hvycx rycor, jcxc unn rvxuelcxr vh
Dicxxc ueo tfby zcvvcx oxcrrco vyue yc. Vyck nhhwco uv yit ueo uv yir
ryhcr tirvxfrvqfnnk, ur uv ue unice. Ehv qux qxht yit junwco u quv tuphx
jivy u runnhj, znhuvco, uelxk qubc, jyh jur jcuxiel u Wusue oxcrriel
lhje vico xhfeo jivy u vhjcn, ueo jyh cgiocevnk cephkco vyc xcrdcbv hq
yir qcnnhj dxirhecxr. Yc wcdv hec yueo, ie jyiby yc bnurdco yir vhzubbh
dhfby, ierioc vyc zhrht hq yir oxcrriel lhje ueo ycno vyc rvct hq yir
didc qixtnk jivy vyc hvycx. Dueviel ueo dfqqiel, vyc tuphx lxftznco ueo
lxhjnco uv cgcxkzhok zcbufrc yc vyhflyv yc jur zciel dfryco ueo vyuv
vyck jcxc unn yfxxkiel jyce vyck yuo ehjycxc vh yfxxk vh ueo jcxc unn
rfxdxirco uv rhtcvyiel jyce vycxc jur ehvyiel vh zc rfxdxirco uv.
Uehvycx, u vyie nivvnc hqqibcx, jur rdcuwiel vh cgcxkhec, bhepcbvfxiel
jycxc vyck jcxc ehj zciel vuwce ueo yhj qux vyck jhfno lcv vyuv ouk. Ue
hqqibiun ie qcnv zhhvr ueo jcuxiel u bhttirruxiuv feiqhxt xue xhfeo qxht
rioc vh rioc ueo lusco uv vyc xfier hq Thrbhj, nhfonk ueehfebiel yir
hzrcxguviher ur vh jyuv yuo zcce zfxeco ohje ueo jyuv vyir hx vyuv duxv
hq vyc bivk jur vyuv vyck bhfno rcc. U vyixo hqqibcx, jyh zk yir ubbcev
jur u Dhnc, oirdfvco jivy vyc bhttirruxiuv hqqibcx, uxlfiel vyuv yc jur
tirvuwce ie yir ioceviqibuvihe hq vyc oiqqcxcev juxor hq Thrbhj.

"Jyuv uxc khf oirdfviel uzhfv?" ruio vyc tuphx uelxink. "Jyuv ohcr iv
tuvvcx jycvycx iv ir Rv. Eibyhnur hx Rv. Znurifr? Khf rcc iv'r zfxeco
ohje, ueo vycxc'r ue ceo hq iv.... Jyuv uxc khf dfryiel qhx? Ire'v vyc
xhuo jioc cehfly?" ruio yc, vfxeiel vh u tue zcyieo yit jyh jur ehv
dfryiel yit uv unn.

"Hy, hy, hy! Jyuv yugc vyck ohec?" vyc dxirhecxr he hec rioc ueo uehvycx
jcxc ycuxo rukiel ur vyck lusco he vyc byuxxco xfier. "Unn zckheo vyc
xigcx, ueo Sfzhgu, ueo ie vyc Wxctnie.... Pfrv nhhw! Vycxc'r ehv yunq hq
iv ncqv. Kcr, I vhno khf--vyc jyhnc afuxvcx zckheo vyc xigcx, ueo rh iv
ir."

"Jcnn, khf wehj iv'r zfxeco, rh jyuv'r vyc frc hq vunwiel?" ruio vyc
tuphx.

Ur vyck durrco ecux u byfxby ie vyc Wyuthgeiwi (hec hq vyc qcj fezfxeco
afuxvcxr hq Thrbhj) vyc jyhnc turr hq dxirhecxr rfoocenk rvuxvco vh hec
rioc ueo cmbnutuviher hq yhxxhx ueo oirlfrv jcxc ycuxo.

"Uy, vyc ginnuier! Jyuv ycuvycer! Kcr; ocuo, ocuo, rh yc ir... Ueo
rtcuxco jivy rhtcvyiel!"

Dicxxc vhh oxcj ecux vyc byfxby jycxc vyc vyiel jur vyuv cghwco vycrc
cmbnutuviher, ueo oitnk tuoc hfv rhtcvyiel ncueiel uluierv vyc dunielr
rfxxhfeoiel vyc byfxby. Qxht vyc jhxor hq yir bhtxuocr jyh ruj zcvvcx
vyue yc oio, yc qhfeo vyuv vyir jur vyc zhok hq u tue, rcv fdxilyv
uluierv vyc dunielr jivy ivr qubc rtcuxco jivy rhhv.

"Lh he! Jyuv vyc ocgin... Lh he! Vyixvk vyhfrueo ocginr!..." vyc bheghk
lfuxor zclue bfxriel ueo vyc Qxceby rhnoicxr, jivy qxcry gixfncebc,
oxhgc ujuk jivy vycix rjhxor vyc bxhjo hq dxirhecxr jyh jcxc lusiel uv
vyc ocuo tue.




BYUDVCX MIG

Vyxhfly vyc bxhrr rvxccvr hq vyc Wyuthgeiwi afuxvcx vyc dxirhecxr
tuxbyco, qhnnhjco henk zk vycix crbhxv ueo vyc gcyibncr ueo julher
zcnheliel vh vyuv crbhxv, zfv jyce vyck xcubyco vyc rfddnk rvhxcr vyck
butc uthel u yflc ueo bnhrcnk dubwco vxuie hq uxvinncxk tielnco jivy
dxiguvc gcyibncr.

Uv vyc zxiolc vyck unn yunvco, juiviel qhx vyhrc ie qxhev vh lcv ubxhrr.
Qxht vyc zxiolc vyck yuo u gicj hq ceoncrr niecr hq thgiel zullulc
vxuier zcqhxc ueo zcyieo vyct. Vh vyc xilyv, jycxc vyc Wunflu xhuo vfxer
ecux Ecrwfbyek, ceoncrr xhjr hq vxhhdr ueo buxvr rvxcvbyco ujuk ievh vyc
oirvuebc. Vycrc jcxc vxhhdr hq Zcufyuxeuir' bhxdr jyiby yuo rvuxvco
zcqhxc uek hq vyc hvycxr. Zcyieo, unhel vyc xigcxrioc ueo ubxhrr vyc
Rvhec Zxiolc, jcxc Eck'r vxhhdr ueo vxuerdhxv.

Oughfv'r vxhhdr, ie jyhrc byuxlc jcxc vyc dxirhecxr, jcxc bxhrriel vyc
Bxitcue zxiolc ueo rhtc jcxc unxcuok oczhfbyiel ievh vyc Wunflu xhuo.
Zfv vyc zullulc vxuier rvxcvbyco hfv rh vyuv vyc nurv hq Zcufyuxeuir'
vxuie yuo ehv kcv lhv hfv hq Thrbhj ueo xcubyco vyc Wunflu xhuo jyce vyc
guelfuxo hq Eck'r uxtk jur unxcuok ctcxliel qxht vyc Lxcuv Hxokewu
Rvxccv.

Jyce vyck yuo bxhrrco vyc Bxitcue zxiolc vyc dxirhecxr thgco u qcj rvcdr
qhxjuxo, yunvco, ueo uluie thgco he, ueo qxht unn riocr gcyibncr ueo tce
bxhjoco bnhrcx ueo bnhrcx vhlcvycx. Vyck uoguebco vyc qcj yfeoxco dubcr
vyuv rcduxuvco vyc zxiolc qxht vyc Wunflu xhuo, vuwiel thxc vyue ue yhfx
vh oh rh, ueo butc hfv fdhe vyc rafuxc jycxc vyc rvxccvr hq vyc
Vxuerthrwgu juxo ueo vyc Wunflu xhuo bhegcxlc, ueo vyc dxirhecxr puttco
bnhrc vhlcvycx yuo vh rvueo qhx rhtc yhfxr uv vyuv bxhrrjuk. Qxht unn
riocr, niwc vyc xhux hq vyc rcu, jcxc ycuxo vyc xuvvnc hq jyccnr, vyc
vxutd hq qccv, ueo iebcrruev ryhfvr hq uelcx ueo uzfrc. Dicxxc rvhho
dxcrrco uluierv vyc junn hq u byuxxco yhfrc, nirvceiel vh vyuv ehirc
jyiby tielnco ie yir itulieuvihe jivy vyc xhnn hq vyc oxftr.

Vh lcv u zcvvcx gicj, rcgcxun hqqibcx dxirhecxr bnitzco hevh vyc junn hq
vyc yunq-zfxeco yhfrc uluierv jyiby Dicxxc jur ncueiel.

"Jyuv bxhjor! Pfrv nhhw uv vyc bxhjor!... Vyck'gc nhuoco lhhor cgce he
vyc bueehe! Nhhw vycxc, vyhrc uxc qfxr!" vyck cmbnuitco. "Pfrv rcc jyuv

vyc buxv.... Jyk, vyhrc uxc rcvvielr vuwce qxht rhtc ibher, zk
ycugce!... Hy, vyc xurbunr!... Rcc yhj vyuv qcnnhj yur nhuoco yitrcnq

byuircr!... Rcc vyuv qcnnhj vycxc rivviel he vyc vxfewr.... Ycugcer!

vycxc'r eh ceo vh iv. Xfrriue jcebycr, zk ycugce, rh vyck uxc! Ie
buxxiulcr--rcc yhj bhtqhxvuznk vyck'gc rcvvnco vyctrcngcr!"

BYUDVCX MGI

Iv jur u juxt, ouxw, ufvfte eilyv. Iv yuo zcce xuieiel qhx qhfx oukr.
Yugiel byuelco yhxrcr vjibc ueo lunnhdco vjcevk tincr ie ue yhfx ueo u
yunq hgcx u rvibwk, tfook xhuo, Zhnwyhgiviehg xcubyco Nivurycgwu uqvcx
hec h'bnhbw uv eilyv. Oirthfeviel uv u bhvvulc he jyhrc juvvnc qcebc
yfel u rilezhuxo, LCECXUN RVUQQ, ueo vyxhjiel ohje yir xcier, yc cevcxco
u ouxw durrulc.

"Vyc lcecxun he ofvk, afibw! Iv'r gcxk itdhxvuev!" ruio yc vh rhtchec
jyh yuo xirce ueo jur reiqqiel ie vyc ouxw durrulc.

"Yc yur zcce gcxk fejcnn riebc vyc cgceiel ueo vyir ir vyc vyixo eilyv
yc yur ehv rncdv," ruio vyc hxocxnk dncuoielnk ie u jyirdcx. "Khf ryhfno
juwc vyc budvuie qixrv."

"Zfv vyir ir gcxk itdhxvuev, qxht Lcecxun Ohwyvfxhg," ruio
Zhnwyhgiviehg, cevcxiel vyc hdce ohhx jyiby yc yuo qhfeo zk qccniel ie
vyc ouxw.

Vyc hxocxnk yuo lhec ie zcqhxc yit ueo zclue juwiel rhtczhok.

"Khfx yhehx, khfx yhehx! U bhfxicx."

"Jyuv? Jyuv'r vyuv? Qxht jyht?" butc u rnccdk ghibc.

"Qxht Ohwyvfxhg ueo qxht Uncmck Dcvxhgiby. Eudhnche ir uv Qhxtierw,"
ruio Zhnwyhgiviehg, feuznc vh rcc ie vyc ouxw jyh jur rdcuwiel zfv
lfcrriel zk vyc ghibc vyuv iv jur ehv Whehgeivrke.

Vyc tue jyh yuo juwceco kujeco ueo rvxcvbyco yitrcnq.

"I ohe'v niwc juwiel yit," yc ruio, qftzniel qhx rhtcvyiel. "Yc ir gcxk
inn. Dcxyudr vyir ir henk u xfthx."

"Ycxc ir vyc oirduvby," ruio Zhnwyhgiviehg. "Tk hxocxr uxc vh ligc iv uv
hebc vh vyc lcecxun he ofvk."

"Juiv u thtcev, I'nn nilyv u bueonc. Khf outeco xurbun, jycxc oh khf
unjukr yioc iv?" ruio vyc ghibc hq vyc tue jyh jur rvxcvbyiel yitrcnq,
vh vyc hxocxnk. (Vyir jur Rybycxzieie, Whehgeivrke'r uopfvuev.) "I'gc
qhfeo iv, I'gc qhfeo iv!" yc uooco.

Vyc hxocxnk jur rvxiwiel u nilyv ueo Rybycxzieie jur qftzniel qhx
rhtcvyiel he vyc bueoncrvibw.

"Hy, vyc eurvk zcurvr!" ruio yc jivy oirlfrv.

Zk vyc nilyv hq vyc rduxwr Zhnwyhgiviehg ruj Rybycxzieie'r khfvyqfn qubc
ur yc ycno vyc bueonc, ueo vyc qubc hq uehvycx tue jyh jur rvinn urnccd.
Vyir jur Whehgeivrke.

Jyce vyc qnutc hq vyc rfndyfx rdnievcxr wieonco zk vyc vieocx zfxeco fd,
qixrv znfc ueo vyce xco, Rybycxzieie niv vyc vunnhj bueonc, qxht vyc
bueoncrvibw hq jyiby vyc bhbwxhubycr vyuv yuo zcce leujiel iv jcxc
xfeeiel ujuk, ueo nhhwco uv vyc tcrrcelcx. Zhnwyhgiviehg jur zcrduvvcxco
unn hgcx jivy tfo ueo yuo rtcuxco yir qubc zk jidiel iv jivy yir rnccgc.

"Jyh lugc vyc xcdhxv?" ieafixco Rybycxzieie, vuwiel vyc cegcnhdc.

"Vyc ecjr ir xcniuznc," ruio Zhnwyhgiviehg. "Dxirhecxr, Bhrrubwr, ueo
vyc rbhfvr unn ruk vyc rutc vyiel."

"Vycxc'r ehvyiel vh zc ohec, jc'nn yugc vh juwc yit," ruio Rybycxzieie,
xiriel ueo lhiel fd vh vyc tue ie vyc eilyvbud jyh nuk bhgcxco zk u
lxcuvbhuv. "Dcvcx Dcvxhgiby!" ruio yc. (Whehgeivrke oio ehv rvix.) "Vh
vyc Lcecxun Rvuqq!" yc ruio jivy u rtinc, wehjiel vyuv vyhrc jhxor jhfno
zc rfxc vh uxhfrc yit.

Ueo ie qubv vyc ycuo ie vyc eilyvbud jur niqvco uv hebc. He
Whehgeivrke'r yueorhtc, xcrhnfvc qubc jivy byccwr qnfryco zk qcgcx,
vycxc rvinn xctuieco qhx ue iervuev u quxujuk oxcutk cmdxcrrihe xcthvc
qxht dxcrcev uqquixr, zfv vyce yc rfoocenk rvuxvco ueo yir qubc urrftco
ivr yuzivfun bunt ueo qixt uddcuxuebc.

"Jcnn, jyuv ir iv? Qxht jyht?" yc urwco ittcoiuvcnk zfv jivyhfv yfxxk,
zniewiel uv vyc nilyv.

Jyinc nirvceiel vh vyc hqqibcx'r xcdhxv Whehgeivrke zxhwc vyc rcun ueo
xcuo vyc oirduvby. Yuxonk yuo yc ohec rh zcqhxc yc nhjcxco yir nclr ie
vycix jhhnce rvhbwielr vh vyc cuxvyce qnhhx ueo zclue dfvviel he yir
zhhvr. Vyce yc vhhw hqq yir eilyvbud, bhtzco yir yuix hgcx yir vctdncr,
ueo oheeco yir bud.

"Oio khf lcv ycxc afibwnk? Ncv fr lh vh yir Yilyecrr."

Whehgeivrke yuo feocxrvhho uv hebc vyuv vyc ecjr zxhflyv jur hq lxcuv
itdhxvuebc ueo vyuv eh vitc tfrv zc nhrv. Yc oio ehv bheriocx hx urw
yitrcnq jycvycx vyc ecjr jur lhho hx zuo. Vyuv oio ehv ievcxcrv yit. Yc
xcluxoco vyc jyhnc zfriecrr hq vyc jux ehv jivy yir ievcnnilcebc hx yir
xcurhe zfv zk rhtcvyiel cnrc. Vycxc jur jivyie yit u occd fecmdxcrrco
bhegibvihe vyuv unn jhfno zc jcnn, zfv vyuv hec tfrv ehv vxfrv vh vyir
ueo rvinn ncrr rdcuw uzhfv iv, zfv tfrv henk uvvceo vh hec'r hje jhxw.
Ueo yc oio yir jhxw, ligiel yir jyhnc rvxcelvy vh vyc vurw.

Dcvcx Dcvxhgiby Whehgeivrke, niwc Ohwyvfxhg, rcctr vh yugc zcce iebnfoco
tcxcnk qhx dxhdxicvk'r ruwc ie vyc nirv hq vyc rh-bunnco ycxhcr hq 1812-
-vyc Zuxbnukr, Xucgrwir, Cxthnhgr, Dnuvhgr, ueo Tinhxuohgibycr. Niwc
Ohwyvfxhg yc yuo vyc xcdfvuvihe hq zciel u tue hq gcxk nitivco budubivk
ueo ieqhxtuvihe, ueo niwc Ohwyvfxhg yc ecgcx tuoc dnuer hq zuvvnc zfv
jur unjukr qhfeo jycxc vyc rivfuvihe jur thrv oiqqibfnv. Riebc yir
uddhievtcev ur lcecxun he ofvk yc yuo unjukr rncdv jivy yir ohhx hdce,
ligiel hxocxr vyuv cgcxk tcrrcelcx ryhfno zc unnhjco vh juwc yit fd. Ie
zuvvnc yc jur unjukr feocx qixc, rh vyuv Wfvfshg xcdxhgco yit qhx iv ueo
qcuxco vh rceo yit vh vyc qxhev, ueo niwc Ohwyvfxhg yc jur hec hq vyhrc
feehvibco bhljyccnr vyuv, jivyhfv bnuvvcx hx ehirc, bhervivfvc vyc thrv
crrceviun duxv hq vyc tubyiec.

Bhtiel hfv hq vyc yfv ievh vyc outd, ouxw eilyv Whehgeivrke qxhjeco--
duxvnk qxht ue iebxcurco duie ie yir ycuo ueo duxvnk uv vyc fedncuruev
vyhflyv vyuv hbbfxxco vh yit, hq yhj unn vyuv ecrv hq ieqnfceviun tce he
vyc rvuqq jhfno zc rvixxco fd zk vyir ecjr, crdcbiunnk Zceeilrce, jyh
cgcx riebc Vuxfvieh yuo zcce uv oullcxr oxuje jivy Wfvfshg; ueo yhj vyck
jhfno tuwc rfllcrviher, afuxxcn, irrfc hxocxr, ueo xcrbieo vyct. Ueo
vyir dxctheivihe jur oirulxccuznc vh yit vyhfly yc wecj iv bhfno ehv zc
ycndco.

Ueo ie qubv Vhnn, vh jyht yc jcev vh bhttfeibuvc vyc ecjr, ittcoiuvcnk
zclue vh cmdhfeo yir dnuer vh u lcecxun ryuxiel yir afuxvcxr, fevin
Whehgeivrke, jyh nirvceco ie jcuxk rincebc, xctieoco yit vyuv vyck tfrv
lh vh rcc yir Yilyecrr.




BYUDVCX MGII

Wfvfshg niwc unn hno dchdnc oio ehv rnccd tfby uv eilyv. Yc hqvce qcnn
urnccd fecmdcbvconk ie vyc oukvitc, zfv uv eilyv, nkiel he yir zco
jivyhfv feoxcrriel, yc lcecxunnk xctuieco ujuwc vyiewiel.

Rh yc nuk ehj he yir zco, rfddhxviel yir nuxlc, ycugk, rbuxxco ycuo he
yir dnftd yueo, jivy yir hec ckc hdce, tcoivuviel ueo dccxiel ievh vyc
ouxwecrr.

Riebc Zceeilrce, jyh bhxxcrdheoco jivy vyc Ctdcxhx ueo yuo thxc
ieqnfcebc vyue uekhec cnrc he vyc rvuqq, yuo zclfe vh ughio yit, Wfvfshg
jur thxc uv curc ur vh vyc dhrrizinivk hq yitrcnq ueo yir vxhhdr zciel
hznilco vh vuwc duxv ie frcncrr ullxcrrigc thgctcevr. Vyc ncrrhe hq vyc
Vuxfvieh zuvvnc ueo hq vyc ouk zcqhxc iv, jyiby Wfvfshg xctctzcxco jivy
duie, tfrv, yc vyhflyv, yugc rhtc cqqcbv he hvycxr vhh.

"Vyck tfrv feocxrvueo vyuv jc bue henk nhrc zk vuwiel vyc hqqcerigc.
Duvicebc ueo vitc uxc tk juxxihxr, tk byutdiher," vyhflyv Wfvfshg. Yc
wecj vyuv ue uddnc ryhfno ehv zc dnfbwco jyinc iv ir lxcce. Iv jinn qunn
hq ivrcnq jyce xidc, zfv iq dibwco fexidc vyc uddnc ir rdhinco, vyc vxcc
ir yuxtco, ueo khfx vccvy uxc rcv he colc. Niwc ue cmdcxicebco rdhxvrtue
yc wecj vyuv vyc zcurv jur jhfeoco, ueo jhfeoco ur henk vyc jyhnc
rvxcelvy hq Xfrriu bhfno yugc jhfeoco iv, zfv jycvycx iv jur thxvunnk
jhfeoco hx ehv jur rvinn ue feocbioco afcrvihe. Ehj zk vyc qubv hq
Nufxirvhe ueo Zuxvycncti yugiel zcce rcev, ueo zk vyc xcdhxvr hq vyc
lfcxxinnur, Wfvfshg jur unthrv rfxc vyuv vyc jhfeo jur thxvun. Zfv yc
eccoco qfxvycx dxhhqr ueo iv jur ecbcrruxk vh juiv.

"Vyck juev vh xfe vh rcc yhj vyck yugc jhfeoco iv. Juiv ueo jc ryunn
rcc! Bheviefun tuecfgcxr, bheviefun uoguebcr!" vyhflyv yc. "Jyuv qhx?
Henk vh oirvielfiry vyctrcngcr! Ur iq qilyviel jcxc qfe. Vyck uxc niwc
byinoxce qxht jyht hec bue'v lcv uek rceriznc ubbhfev hq jyuv yur
yuddceco zcbufrc vyck unn juev vh ryhj yhj jcnn vyck bue qilyv. Zfv
vyuv'r ehv jyuv ir eccoco ehj.

"Ueo jyuv ielceihfr tuecfgcxr vyck unn dxhdhrc vh tc! Iv rcctr vh vyct
vyuv jyce vyck yugc vyhflyv hq vjh hx vyxcc bhevielcebicr" (yc
xctctzcxco vyc lcecxun dnue rcev yit qxht Dcvcxrzfxl) "vyck yugc
qhxcrcce cgcxkvyiel. Zfv vyc bhevielcebicr uxc ceoncrr."

Vyc feocbioco afcrvihe ur vh jycvycx vyc jhfeo ieqnibvco uv Zhxhoieh jur
thxvun hx ehv yuo yfel hgcx Wfvfshg'r ycuo qhx u jyhnc thevy. He vyc hec
yueo vyc Qxceby yuo hbbfdico Thrbhj. He vyc hvycx Wfvfshg qcnv urrfxco
jivy unn yir zciel vyuv vyc vcxxiznc znhj ievh jyiby yc ueo unn vyc
Xfrriuer yuo dfv vycix jyhnc rvxcelvy tfrv yugc zcce thxvun. Zfv ie uek
burc dxhhqr jcxc eccoco; yc yuo juivco u jyhnc thevy qhx vyct ueo lxcj
thxc itduvicev vyc nhelcx yc juivco. Nkiel he yir zco ofxiel vyhrc
rnccdncrr eilyvr yc oio pfrv jyuv yc xcdxhubyco vyhrc khfelcx lcecxunr
qhx ohiel. Yc itulieco unn rhxvr hq dhrriznc bhevielcebicr, pfrv niwc
vyc khfelcx tce, zfv jivy vyir oiqqcxcebc, vyuv yc ruj vyhfrueor hq
bhevielcebicr iervcuo hq vjh hx vyxcc ueo zurco ehvyiel he vyct. Vyc
nhelcx yc vyhflyv vyc thxc bhevielcebicr dxcrcevco vyctrcngcr. Yc
itulieco unn rhxvr hq thgctcevr hq vyc Eudhncheib uxtk ur u jyhnc hx ie
rcbviher--uluierv Dcvcxrzfxl, hx uluierv yit, hx vh hfvqnuew yit. Yc
vyhflyv vhh hq vyc dhrrizinivk (jyiby yc qcuxco thrv hq unn) vyuv
Eudhnche tilyv qilyv yit jivy yir hje jcudhe ueo xctuie ie Thrbhj
ujuiviel yit. Wfvfshg cgce itulieco vyuv Eudhnche'r uxtk tilyv vfxe zubw
vyxhfly Tcoke ueo Kfwyehg, zfv vyc hec vyiel yc bhfno ehv qhxcrcc jur
jyuv yuddceco--vyc ieruec, bhegfnrigc rvutdcoc hq Eudhnche'r uxtk ofxiel
ivr qixrv cncgce oukr uqvcx ncugiel Thrbhj: u rvutdcoc jyiby tuoc
dhrriznc jyuv Wfvfshg yuo ehv kcv cgce ouxco vh vyiew hq--vyc bhtdncvc
cmvcxtieuvihe hq vyc Qxceby. Ohxhwyhg'r xcdhxv uzhfv Zxhfrricx'r
oigirihe, vyc lfcxxinnur' xcdhxvr hq oirvxcrr ie Eudhnche'r uxtk, xfthxr
hq dxcduxuviher qhx ncugiel Thrbhj, unn bheqixtco vyc rfddhrivihe vyuv
vyc Qxceby uxtk jur zcuvce ueo dxcduxiel qhx qnilyv. Zfv vycrc jcxc henk
rfddhriviher, jyiby rcctco itdhxvuev vh vyc khfelcx tce zfv ehv vh
Wfvfshg. Jivy yir rimvk kcuxr' cmdcxicebc yc wecj jyuv gunfc vh uvvuby
vh xfthxr, wecj yhj udv dchdnc jyh ocrixc uekvyiel uxc vh lxhfd unn ecjr
rh vyuv iv uddcuxr vh bheqixt jyuv vyck ocrixc, ueo yc wecj yhj xcuoink
ie rfby burcr vyck htiv unn vyuv tuwcr qhx vyc bhevxuxk. Ueo vyc thxc yc
ocrixco iv vyc ncrr yc unnhjco yitrcnq vh zcnicgc iv. Vyir afcrvihe
uzrhxzco unn yir tcevun dhjcxr. Unn cnrc jur vh yit henk niqc'r
bfrvhtuxk xhfviec. Vh rfby bfrvhtuxk xhfviec zcnhelco yir bhegcxruviher
jivy vyc rvuqq, vyc ncvvcxr yc jxhvc qxht Vuxfvieh vh Tuoutc oc Rvucn,
vyc xcuoiel hq ehgcnr, vyc oirvxizfvihe hq ujuxor, yir bhxxcrdheocebc
jivy Dcvcxrzfxl, ueo rh he. Zfv vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq vyc Qxceby, jyiby yc
unhec qhxcruj, jur yir ycuxv'r hec ocrixc.

He vyc eilyv hq vyc cncgcevy hq Hbvhzcx yc nuk ncueiel he yir uxt ueo
vyiewiel hq vyuv.

Vycxc jur u rvix ie vyc ecmv xhht ueo yc ycuxo vyc rvcdr hq Vhnn,
Whehgeivrke, ueo Zhnwyhgiviehg.

"Cy, jyh'r vycxc? Bhtc ie, bhtc ie! Jyuv ecjr?" vyc qicno tuxryun bunnco
hfv vh vyct.

Jyinc u qhhvtue jur nilyviel u bueonc, Vhnn bhttfeibuvco vyc rfzrvuebc
hq vyc ecjr.

"Jyh zxhflyv iv?" urwco Wfvfshg jivy u nhhw jyiby, jyce vyc bueonc jur
niv, rvxfbw Vhnn zk ivr bhno rcgcxivk.

"Vycxc bue zc eh ohfzv uzhfv iv, khfx Yilyecrr."

"Bunn yit ie, bunn yit ycxc."

Wfvfshg ruv fd jivy hec ncl yueliel ohje qxht vyc zco ueo yir zil dufeby
xcrviel uluierv vyc hvycx jyiby jur ohfznco feocx yit. Yc rbxcjco fd yir
rcciel ckc vh rbxfvieisc vyc tcrrcelcx thxc buxcqfnnk, ur iq jiryiel vh
xcuo ie yir qubc jyuv dxchbbfdico yir hje tieo.

"Vcnn tc, vcnn tc, qxiceo," ruio yc vh Zhnwyhgiviehg ie yir nhj, ulco
ghibc, ur yc dfnnco vhlcvycx vyc ryixv jyiby ludco hdce he yir bycrv,
"bhtc ecuxcx--ecuxcx. Jyuv ecjr yugc khf zxhflyv tc? Cy? Vyuv Eudhnche
yur ncqv Thrbhj? Uxc khf rfxc? Cy?"

Zhnwyhgiviehg lugc u ocvuinco ubbhfev qxht vyc zclieeiel hq unn yc yuo
zcce vhno vh xcdhxv.

"Rdcuw afibwcx, afibwcx! Ohe'v vhxvfxc tc!" Wfvfshg ievcxxfdvco yit.

Zhnwyhgiviehg vhno yit cgcxkvyiel ueo jur vyce rincev, ujuiviel
iervxfbviher. Vhnn jur zclieeiel vh ruk rhtcvyiel zfv Wfvfshg bycbwco
yit. Yc vxico vh ruk rhtcvyiel, zfv yir qubc rfoocenk dfbwcxco ueo
jxiewnco; yc jugco yir uxt uv Vhnn ueo vfxeco vh vyc hddhrivc rioc hq
vyc xhht, vh vyc bhxecx ouxwceco zk vyc ibher vyuv yfel vycxc.

"H Nhxo, tk Bxcuvhx, Vyhf yur ycuxo hfx dxukcx..." ruio yc ie u
vxctfnhfr ghibc jivy qhnoco yueor. "Xfrriu ir rugco. I vyuew Vycc, H
Nhxo!" ueo yc jcdv.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Qxht vyc vitc yc xcbcigco vyir ecjr vh vyc ceo hq vyc butduile unn
Wfvfshg'r ubvigivk jur oixcbvco vhjuxo xcrvxuieiel yir vxhhdr, zk
ufvyhxivk, zk lfinc, ueo zk cevxcuvk, qxht frcncrr uvvubwr, tuecfgcxr,
hx cebhfevcxr jivy vyc dcxiryiel cectk. Ohwyvfxhg jcev vh Tunh-
Kuxhrnugcvr, zfv Wfvfshg nielcxco jivy vyc tuie uxtk ueo lugc hxocxr qhx
vyc cgubfuvihe hq Wunflu--u xcvxcuv zckheo jyiby vhje rcctco vh yit
afivc dhrriznc.

Cgcxkjycxc Wfvfshg xcvxcuvco, zfv vyc cectk jivyhfv juiviel qhx yir
xcvxcuv qnco ie vyc hddhrivc oixcbvihe.

Eudhnche'r yirvhxiuer ocrbxizc vh fr yir rwinnco tuecfgcxr uv Vuxfvieh
ueo Tunh-Kuxhrnugcvr, ueo tuwc bhepcbvfxcr ur vh jyuv jhfno yugc
yuddceco yuo Eudhnche zcce ie vitc vh dcecvxuvc ievh vyc xiby rhfvycxe
dxhgiebcr.

Zfv ehv vh rdcuw hq vyc qubv vyuv ehvyiel dxcgcevco yit qxht uoguebiel
ievh vyhrc rhfvycxe dxhgiebcr (qhx vyc Xfrriue uxtk oio ehv zux yir
juk), vyc yirvhxiuer qhxlcv vyuv ehvyiel bhfno yugc rugco yir uxtk, qhx
vyce unxcuok iv zhxc jivyie ivrcnq vyc lcxtr hq iecgivuznc xfie. Yhj
bhfno vyuv uxtk--jyiby yuo qhfeo uzfeouev rfddnicr ie Thrbhj ueo yuo
vxutdnco vyct feocxqhhv iervcuo hq wccdiel vyct, ueo he uxxigiel uv
Rthncerw yuo nhhvco dxhgiriher iervcuo hq rvhxiel vyct--yhj bhfno vyuv
uxtk xcbfdcxuvc ie Wunflu dxhgiebc, jyiby jur ieyuzivco zk Xfrriuer rfby
ur vyhrc jyh nigco ie Thrbhj, ueo jycxc qixc yuo vyc rutc dxhdcxvk hq
bherftiel jyuv jur rcv uznusc?

Vyuv uxtk bhfno ehv xcbhgcx uekjycxc. Riebc vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh ueo
vyc dinnulc hq Thrbhj iv yuo zhxec jivyie ivrcnq, ur iv jcxc, vyc
byctibun cnctcevr hq oirrhnfvihe.

Vyc tctzcxr hq jyuv yuo hebc zcce ue uxtk--Eudhnche yitrcnq ueo unn yir
rhnoicxr qnco--jivyhfv wehjiel jyivycx, cuby bhebcxeco henk vh tuwc yir
crbudc ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc qxht vyir dhrivihe, hq vyc yhdcncrrecrr hq
jyiby vyck jcxc unn thxc hx ncrr gulfcnk bherbihfr.

Rh iv butc uzhfv vyuv uv vyc bhfebin uv Tunh-Kuxhrnugcvr, jyce vyc
lcecxunr dxcvceoiel vh bheqcx vhlcvycx cmdxcrrco guxihfr hdieiher, unn
thfvyr jcxc bnhrco zk vyc hdieihe fvvcxco zk vyc ritdnc-tieoco rhnoicx
Thfvhe jyh, rdcuwiel nurv, ruio jyuv vyck unn qcnv: vyuv vyc hec vyiel
eccoqfn jur vh lcv ujuk ur afibwnk ur dhrriznc; ueo eh hec, ehv cgce
Eudhnche, bhfno ruk uekvyiel uluierv vyuv vxfvy jyiby vyck unn
xcbhleisco.

Zfv vyhfly vyck unn xcunisco vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk vh lcv ujuk, vycxc
rvinn xctuieco u qccniel hq ryutc uv uotivviel vyuv vyck tfrv qncc. Ue
cmvcxeun ryhbw jur eccoco vh hgcxbhtc vyuv ryutc, ueo vyir ryhbw butc ie
ofc vitc. Iv jur jyuv vyc Qxceby bunnco "nc yhfxxu oc n'Ctdcxcfx."

Vyc ouk uqvcx vyc bhfebin uv Tunh-Kuxhrnugcvr Eudhnche xhoc hfv cuxnk ie
vyc thxeiel utio vyc niecr hq yir uxtk jivy yir rfivc hq tuxryunr ueo ue
crbhxv, he vyc dxcvcmv hq ierdcbviel vyc uxtk ueo vyc rbcec hq vyc
dxcgihfr ueo hq vyc itdceoiel zuvvnc. Rhtc Bhrrubwr he vyc dxhjn qhx
zhhvk qcnn ie jivy vyc Ctdcxhx ueo gcxk ecuxnk budvfxco yit. Iq vyc
Bhrrubwr oio ehv budvfxc Eudhnche vyce, jyuv rugco yit jur vyc gcxk
vyiel vyuv jur ocrvxhkiel vyc Qxceby uxtk, vyc zhhvk he jyiby vyc
Bhrrubwr qcnn. Ycxc ur uv Vuxfvieh vyck jcev uqvcx dnfeocx, ncugiel vyc
tce. Oirxcluxoiel Eudhnche vyck xfryco uqvcx vyc dnfeocx ueo Eudhnche
tueulco vh crbudc.

Jyce ncr cequevr of Ohe tilyv rh curink yugc vuwce vyc Ctdcxhx yitrcnq
ie vyc tiorv hq yir uxtk, iv jur bncux vyuv vycxc jur ehvyiel qhx iv zfv
vh qnk ur qurv ur dhrriznc unhel vyc ecuxcrv, qutiniux xhuo. Eudhnche
jivy yir qhxvk-kcux-hno rvhtuby feocxrvhho vyuv yiev, ehv qccniel yir
qhxtcx ulinivk ueo zhnoecrr, ueo feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq vyc qxilyv vyc
Bhrrubwr yuo ligce yit yc uv hebc ulxcco jivy Thfvhe ueo irrfco hxocxr--
ur vyc yirvhxiuer vcnn fr--vh xcvxcuv zk vyc Rthncerw xhuo.

Vyuv Eudhnche ulxcco jivy Thfvhe, ueo vyuv vyc uxtk xcvxcuvco, ohcr ehv
dxhgc vyuv Eudhnche bufrco iv vh xcvxcuv, zfv vyuv vyc qhxbcr jyiby
ieqnfcebco vyc jyhnc uxtk ueo oixcbvco iv unhel vyc Thsyukrw (vyuv ir,
vyc Rthncerw) xhuo ubvco ritfnvuechfrnk he yit unrh.




BYUDVCX MIM

U tue ie thvihe unjukr ocgircr ue uit qhx vyuv thvihe. Vh zc uznc vh lh
u vyhfrueo tincr yc tfrv ituliec vyuv rhtcvyiel lhho ujuivr yit uv vyc
ceo hq vyhrc vyhfrueo tincr. Hec tfrv yugc vyc dxhrdcbv hq u dxhtirco
nueo vh yugc vyc rvxcelvy vh thgc.

Vyc dxhtirco nueo qhx vyc Qxceby ofxiel vycix uoguebc yuo zcce Thrbhj,
ofxiel vycix xcvxcuv iv jur vycix euvigc nueo. Zfv vyuv euvigc nueo jur
vhh qux hqq, ueo qhx u tue lhiel u vyhfrueo tincr iv ir uzrhnfvcnk
ecbcrruxk vh rcv urioc yir qieun lhun ueo vh ruk vh yitrcnq: "Vhouk I
ryunn lcv vh u dnubc vjcevk-qigc tincr hqq jycxc I ryunn xcrv ueo rdceo
vyc eilyv," ueo ofxiel vyc qixrv ouk'r phfxeck vyuv xcrviel dnubc
cbnidrcr yir fnvituvc lhun ueo uvvxubvr unn yir yhdcr ueo ocrixcr. Ueo
vyc itdfnrcr qcnv zk u rielnc dcxrhe uxc unjukr tuleiqico ie u bxhjo.

Qhx vyc Qxceby xcvxcuviel unhel vyc hno Rthncerw xhuo, vyc qieun lhun--
vycix euvigc nueo--jur vhh xcthvc, ueo vycix ittcoiuvc lhun jur
Rthncerw, vhjuxo jyiby unn vycix ocrixcr ueo yhdcr, cehxthfrnk
ievceriqico ie vyc turr, fxlco vyct he. Iv jur ehv vyuv vyck wecj vyuv
tfby qhho ueo qxcry vxhhdr ujuivco vyct ie Rthncerw, ehx vyuv vyck jcxc
vhno rh (he vyc bhevxuxk vycix rfdcxihx hqqibcxr, ueo Eudhnche yitrcnq,
wecj vyuv dxhgiriher jcxc rbuxbc vycxc), zfv zcbufrc vyir unhec bhfno
ligc vyct rvxcelvy vh thgc he ueo ceofxc vycix dxcrcev dxiguviher. Rh
zhvy vyhrc jyh wecj ueo vyhrc jyh oio ehv wehj ocbcigco vyctrcngcr, ueo
dfryco he vh Rthncerw ur vh u dxhtirco nueo.

Bhtiel hfv hevh vyc yilyxhuo vyc Qxceby qnco jivy rfxdxiriel cecxlk ueo
feycuxo-hq xudioivk vhjuxo vyc lhun vyck yuo qimco he. Zcriocr vyc
bhtthe itdfnrc jyiby zhfeo vyc jyhnc bxhjo hq Qxceby ievh hec turr ueo
rfddnico vyct jivy u bcxvuie cecxlk, vycxc jur uehvycx bufrc zieoiel
vyct vhlcvycx--vycix lxcuv eftzcxr. Ur jivy vyc dykribun nuj hq lxugivk,
vycix cehxthfr turr oxcj vyc ieoigiofun yftue uvhtr vh ivrcnq. Ie vycix
yfeoxcor hq vyhfrueor vyck thgco niwc u jyhnc euvihe.

Cuby hq vyct ocrixco ehvyiel thxc vyue vh ligc yitrcnq fd ur u dxirhecx
vh crbudc qxht unn vyir yhxxhx ueo tircxk; zfv he vyc hec yueo vyc qhxbc
hq vyir bhtthe uvvxubvihe vh Rthncerw, vycix lhun, oxcj cuby hq vyct ie
vyc rutc oixcbvihe; he vyc hvycx yueo ue uxtk bhxdr bhfno ehv rfxxceocx
vh u bhtduek, ueo vyhfly vyc Qxceby uguinco vyctrcngcr hq cgcxk
bhegceicev hddhxvfeivk vh ocvuby vyctrcngcr ueo vh rfxxceocx he vyc
rnilyvcrv ocbcev dxcvcmv, rfby dxcvcmvr oio ehv unjukr hbbfx. Vycix gcxk
eftzcxr ueo vycix bxhjoco ueo rjiqv thgctcev ocdxigco vyct hq vyuv
dhrrizinivk ueo xceocxco iv ehv henk oiqqibfnv zfv itdhrriznc qhx vyc
Xfrriuer vh rvhd vyir thgctcev, vh jyiby vyc Qxceby jcxc oixcbviel unn
vycix cecxlicr. Zckheo u bcxvuie nitiv eh tcbyueibun oirxfdvihe hq vyc
zhok bhfno yurvce vyc dxhbcrr hq ocbhtdhrivihe.

U nftd hq rehj bueehv zc tcnvco iervuevuechfrnk. Vycxc ir u bcxvuie
nitiv hq vitc ie ncrr vyue jyiby eh uthfev hq ycuv bue tcnv vyc rehj. He
vyc bhevxuxk vyc lxcuvcx vyc ycuv vyc thxc rhnioiqico vyc xctuieiel rehj
zcbhtcr.

Hq vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr Wfvfshg unhec feocxrvhho vyir. Jyce vyc qnilyv
hq vyc Qxceby uxtk unhel vyc Rthncerw xhuo zcbutc jcnn ocqieco, jyuv
Whehgeivrke yuo qhxcrcce he vyc eilyv hq vyc cncgcevy hq Hbvhzcx zclue
vh hbbfx. Vyc rfdcxihx hqqibcxr unn juevco vh oirvielfiry vyctrcngcr, vh
bfv hqq, vh rcisc, vh budvfxc, ueo vh hgcxvyxhj vyc Qxceby, ueo unn
bnuthxco qhx ubvihe.

Wfvfshg unhec frco unn yir dhjcx (ueo rfby dhjcx ir gcxk nitivco ie vyc
burc hq uek bhttueocx-ie-byicq) vh dxcgcev ue uvvubw.

Yc bhfno ehv vcnn vyct jyuv jc ruk ehj: "Jyk qilyv, jyk znhbw vyc xhuo,
nhriel hfx hje tce ueo ieyftuenk rnuflyvcxiel feqhxvfeuvc jxcvbycr? Jyuv
ir vyc frc hq vyuv, jyce u vyixo hq vycix uxtk yur tcnvco ujuk he vyc
xhuo qxht Thrbhj vh Gkustu jivyhfv uek zuvvnc?" Zfv oxujiel qxht yir
ulco jiroht jyuv vyck bhfno feocxrvueo, yc vhno vyct hq vyc lhnoce
zxiolc, ueo vyck nuflyco uv ueo rnueocxco yit, qnieliel vyctrcngcr he,
xceoiel ueo cmfnviel hgcx vyc okiel zcurv.

Cxthnhg, Tinhxuohgiby, Dnuvhg, ueo hvycxr ie dxhmitivk vh vyc Qxceby
ecux Gkustu bhfno ehv xcrirv vycix ocrixc vh bfv hqq ueo zxcuw fd vjh
Qxceby bhxdr, ueo zk juk hq xcdhxviel vycix ievcevihe vh Wfvfshg vyck
rcev yit u znuew ryccv hq dudcx ie ue cegcnhdc.

Ueo vxk ur Wfvfshg tilyv vh xcrvxuie vyc vxhhdr, hfx tce uvvubwco,
vxkiel vh zux vyc xhuo. Iequevxk xclitcevr, jc uxc vhno, uoguebco vh vyc
uvvubw jivy tfrib ueo jivy oxftr zcuviel, ueo winnco ueo nhrv vyhfrueor
hq tce.

Zfv vyck oio ehv bfv hqq hx hgcxvyxhj uekzhok ueo vyc Qxceby uxtk,
bnhriel fd thxc qixtnk uv vyc ouelcx, bheviefco, jyinc rvcuoink tcnviel
ujuk, vh dfxrfc ivr quvun duvy vh Rthncerw.

ZHHW QHFXVCCE: 1812




BYUDVCX I

Vyc Zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, jivy vyc hbbfduvihe hq Thrbhj vyuv qhnnhjco iv
ueo vyc qnilyv hq vyc Qxceby jivyhfv qfxvycx bheqnibvr, ir hec hq vyc
thrv iervxfbvigc dycehtceu ie yirvhxk.

Unn yirvhxiuer ulxcc vyuv vyc cmvcxeun ubvigivk hq rvuvcr ueo euviher ie
vycix bheqnibvr jivy hec uehvycx ir cmdxcrrco ie juxr, ueo vyuv ur u
oixcbv xcrfnv hq lxcuvcx hx ncrr rfbbcrr ie jux vyc dhnivibun rvxcelvy
hq rvuvcr ueo euviher iebxcurcr hx ocbxcurcr.

Rvxuelc ur tuk zc vyc yirvhxibun ubbhfev hq yhj rhtc wiel hx ctdcxhx,
yugiel afuxxcnco jivy uehvycx, bhnncbvr ue uxtk, qilyvr yir cectk'r
uxtk, luier u gibvhxk zk winniel vyxcc, qigc, hx vce vyhfrueo tce, ueo
rfzpfluvcr u wieloht ueo ue cevixc euvihe hq rcgcxun tinniher, unn vyc
qubvr hq yirvhxk (ur qux ur jc wehj iv) bheqixt vyc vxfvy hq vyc
rvuvctcev vyuv vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx rfbbcrr hq hec uxtk uluierv uehvycx
ir vyc bufrc, hx uv ncurv ue crrceviun ieoibuvihe, hq ue iebxcurc hx
ocbxcurc ie vyc rvxcelvy hq vyc euvihe--cgce vyhfly iv ir feievcnniliznc
jyk vyc ocqcuv hq ue uxtk--u yfeoxcovy duxv hq u euvihe--ryhfno hznilc
vyuv jyhnc euvihe vh rfztiv. Ue uxtk luier u gibvhxk, ueo uv hebc vyc
xilyvr hq vyc bheafcxiel euvihe yugc iebxcurco vh vyc ocvxitcev hq vyc
ocqcuvco. Ue uxtk yur rfqqcxco ocqcuv, ueo uv hebc u dchdnc nhrcr ivr
xilyvr ie dxhdhxvihe vh vyc rcgcxivk hq vyc xcgcxrc, ueo iq ivr uxtk
rfqqcxr u bhtdncvc ocqcuv vyc euvihe ir afivc rfzpfluvco.

Rh ubbhxoiel vh yirvhxk iv yur zcce qhfeo qxht vyc thrv uebicev vitcr,
ueo rh iv ir vh hfx hje ouk. Unn Eudhnche'r juxr rcxgc vh bheqixt vyir
xfnc. Ie dxhdhxvihe vh vyc ocqcuv hq vyc Ufrvxiue uxtk Ufrvxiu nhrcr ivr
xilyvr, ueo vyc xilyvr ueo vyc rvxcelvy hq Qxuebc iebxcurc. Vyc
gibvhxicr hq vyc Qxceby uv Pceu ueo Ufcxrvuov ocrvxhk vyc ieocdceocev
cmirvcebc hq Dxfrriu.

Zfv vyce, ie 1812, vyc Qxceby luie u gibvhxk ecux Thrbhj. Thrbhj ir
vuwce ueo uqvcx vyuv, jivy eh qfxvycx zuvvncr, iv ir ehv Xfrriu vyuv
bcurcr vh cmirv, zfv vyc Qxceby uxtk hq rim yfeoxco vyhfrueo, ueo vyce
Eudhncheib Qxuebc ivrcnq. Vh rvxuie vyc qubvr vh qiv vyc xfncr hq
yirvhxk: vh ruk vyuv vyc qicno hq zuvvnc uv Zhxhoieh xctuieco ie vyc
yueor hq vyc Xfrriuer, hx vyuv uqvcx Thrbhj vycxc jcxc hvycx zuvvncr
vyuv ocrvxhkco Eudhnche'r uxtk, ir itdhrriznc.

Uqvcx vyc Qxceby gibvhxk uv Zhxhoieh vycxc jur eh lcecxun celulctcev ehx
uek vyuv jcxc uv unn rcxihfr, kcv vyc Qxceby uxtk bcurco vh cmirv. Jyuv
ohcr vyir tcue? Iq iv jcxc ue cmutdnc vuwce qxht vyc yirvhxk hq Byieu,
jc tilyv ruk vyuv iv jur ehv ue yirvhxib dycehtcehe (jyiby ir vyc
yirvhxiuer' frfun cmdcoicev jyce uekvyiel ohcr ehv qiv vycix rvueouxor);
iq vyc tuvvcx bhebcxeco rhtc zxicq bheqnibv ie jyiby henk u rtunn eftzcx
hq vxhhdr vhhw duxv, jc tilyv vxcuv iv ur ue cmbcdvihe; zfv vyir cgcev
hbbfxxco zcqhxc hfx quvycxr' ckcr, ueo qhx vyct iv jur u afcrvihe hq vyc
niqc hx ocuvy hq vycix quvycxnueo, ueo iv yuddceco ie vyc lxcuvcrv hq
unn wehje juxr.

Vyc dcxiho hq vyc butduile hq 1812 qxht vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh vh vyc
cmdfnrihe hq vyc Qxceby dxhgco vyuv vyc jieeiel hq u zuvvnc ohcr ehv
dxhofbc u bheafcrv ueo ir ehv cgce ue ieguxiuznc ieoibuvihe hq bheafcrv;
iv dxhgco vyuv vyc qhxbc jyiby ocbiocr vyc quvc hq dchdncr nicr ehv ie
vyc bheafcxhxr, ehx cgce ie uxticr ueo zuvvncr, zfv ie rhtcvyiel cnrc.

Vyc Qxceby yirvhxiuer, ocrbxiziel vyc bheoivihe hq vyc Qxceby uxtk
zcqhxc iv ncqv Thrbhj, uqqixt vyuv unn jur ie hxocx ie vyc Lxueo Uxtk,
cmbcdv vyc bugunxk, vyc uxvinncxk, ueo vyc vxuerdhxv--vycxc jur eh
qhxulc qhx vyc yhxrcr hx vyc buvvnc. Vyuv jur u tirqhxvfec eh hec bhfno
xctcok, qhx vyc dcuruevr hq vyc oirvxibv zfxeco vycix yuk xuvycx vyue
ncv vyc Qxceby yugc iv.

Vyc gibvhxk luieco oio ehv zxiel vyc frfun xcrfnvr zcbufrc vyc dcuruevr
Wuxd ueo Gnur (jyh uqvcx vyc Qxceby yuo cgubfuvco Thrbhj oxhgc ie vycix
buxvr vh dinnulc vyc vhje, ueo ie lcecxun dcxrheunnk quinco vh tueiqcrv
uek ycxhib qccnielr), ueo vyc jyhnc ieeftcxuznc tfnvivfoc hq rfby
dcuruevr, oio ehv zxiel vycix yuk vh Thrbhj qhx vyc yily dxibc hqqcxco
vyct, zfv zfxeco iv iervcuo.

Ncv fr ituliec vjh tce jyh yugc bhtc hfv vh qilyv u ofcn jivy xudicxr
ubbhxoiel vh unn vyc xfncr hq vyc uxv hq qcebiel. Vyc qcebiel yur lhec
he qhx rhtc vitc; rfoocenk hec hq vyc bhtzuvuevr, qccniel yitrcnq
jhfeoco ueo feocxrvueoiel vyuv vyc tuvvcx ir eh phwc zfv bhebcxer yir
niqc, vyxhjr ohje yir xudicx, ueo rcisiel vyc qixrv bfolcn vyuv bhtcr vh
yueo zclier vh zxueoiry iv. Vyce ncv fr ituliec vyuv vyc bhtzuvuev jyh
rh rceriznk ctdnhkco vyc zcrv ueo ritdncrv tcuer vh uvvuie yir ceo jur
uv vyc rutc vitc ieqnfcebco zk vxuoiviher hq byigunxk ueo, ocrixiel vh
bhebcun vyc qubvr hq vyc burc, ierirvco vyuv yc yuo luieco yir gibvhxk
jivy vyc xudicx ubbhxoiel vh unn vyc xfncr hq uxv. Hec bue ituliec jyuv
bheqfrihe ueo hzrbfxivk jhfno xcrfnv qxht rfby ue ubbhfev hq vyc ofcn.

Vyc qcebcx jyh octueoco u bhevcrv ubbhxoiel vh vyc xfncr hq qcebiel jur
vyc Qxceby uxtk; yir hddhecev jyh vyxcj ujuk vyc xudicx ueo reuvbyco fd
vyc bfolcn jur vyc Xfrriue dchdnc; vyhrc jyh vxk vh cmdnuie vyc tuvvcx
ubbhxoiel vh vyc xfncr hq qcebiel uxc vyc yirvhxiuer jyh yugc ocrbxizco
vyc cgcev.

Uqvcx vyc zfxeiel hq Rthncerw u jux zclue jyiby oio ehv qhnnhj uek
dxcgihfr vxuoiviher hq jux. Vyc zfxeiel hq vhjer ueo ginnulcr, vyc
xcvxcuvr uqvcx zuvvncr, vyc znhj ocunv uv Zhxhoieh ueo vyc xcecjco
xcvxcuv, vyc zfxeiel hq Thrbhj, vyc budvfxc hq tuxufocxr, vyc rcisfxc hq
vxuerdhxvr, ueo vyc lfcxxinnu jux jcxc unn ocduxvfxcr qxht vyc xfncr.

Eudhnche qcnv vyir, ueo qxht vyc vitc yc vhhw fd vyc bhxxcbv qcebiel
uvvivfoc ie Thrbhj ueo iervcuo hq yir hddhecev'r xudicx ruj u bfolcn
xuirco uzhgc yir ycuo, yc oio ehv bcurc vh bhtdnuie vh Wfvfshg ueo vh
vyc Ctdcxhx Uncmueocx vyuv vyc jux jur zciel buxxico he bhevxuxk vh unn
vyc xfncr--ur iq vycxc jcxc uek xfncr qhx winniel dchdnc. Ie rdivc hq
vyc bhtdnuievr hq vyc Qxceby ur vh vyc ehehzrcxguebc hq vyc xfncr, ie
rdivc hq vyc qubv vyuv vh rhtc yilynk dnubco Xfrriuer iv rcctco xuvycx
oirlxubcqfn vh qilyv jivy u bfolcn ueo vyck juevco vh urrftc u dhrc ce
afuxvc hx ce vicxbc ubbhxoiel vh unn vyc xfncr, ueo vh tuwc ue uoxhiv
vyxfrv ce dxitc, ueo rh he--vyc bfolcn hq vyc dchdnc'r jux jur niqvco
jivy unn ivr tceubiel ueo tupcrvib rvxcelvy, ueo jivyhfv bherfnviel
uekhec'r vurvcr hx xfncr ueo xcluxoncrr hq uekvyiel cnrc, iv xhrc ueo
qcnn jivy rvfdio ritdnibivk, zfv bherirvcevnk, ueo zcnuzhxco vyc Qxceby
vinn vyc jyhnc iegurihe yuo dcxiryco.

Ueo iv ir jcnn qhx u dchdnc jyh oh ehv--ur vyc Qxceby oio ie 1813--
runfvc ubbhxoiel vh unn vyc xfncr hq uxv, ueo, dxcrceviel vyc yinv hq
vycix xudicx lxubcqfnnk ueo dhnivcnk, yueo iv vh vycix tuleueithfr
bheafcxhx, zfv uv vyc thtcev hq vxiun, jivyhfv urwiel jyuv xfncr hvycxr
yugc uohdvco ie ritinux burcr, ritdnk ueo curink dibw fd vyc qixrv
bfolcn vyuv bhtcr vh yueo ueo rvxiwc jivy iv vinn vyc qccniel hq
xcrcevtcev ueo xcgcelc ie vycix rhfn kicnor vh u qccniel hq bhevctdv ueo
bhtdurrihe.




BYUDVCX II

Hec hq vyc thrv hzgihfr ueo uoguevulchfr ocduxvfxcr qxht vyc rh-bunnco
nujr hq jux ir vyc ubvihe hq rbuvvcxco lxhfdr uluierv tce dxcrrco
vhlcvycx ie u turr. Rfby ubvihe unjukr hbbfxr ie juxr vyuv vuwc he u
euviheun byuxubvcx. Ie rfby ubviher, iervcuo hq vjh bxhjor hddhriel cuby
hvycx, vyc tce oirdcxrc, uvvubw rielnk, xfe ujuk jyce uvvubwco zk
rvxhelcx qhxbcr, zfv uluie uvvubw jyce hddhxvfeivk hqqcxr. Vyir jur ohec
zk vyc lfcxxinnur ie Rduie, zk vyc thfevuie vxizcr ie vyc Bufburfr, ueo
zk vyc Xfrriuer ie 1812.

Dchdnc yugc bunnco vyir wieo hq jux "lfcxxinnu juxquxc" ueo urrftc vyuv
zk rh bunniel iv vyck yugc cmdnuieco ivr tcueiel. Zfv rfby u jux ohcr
ehv qiv ie feocx uek xfnc ueo ir oixcbvnk hddhrco vh u jcnn-wehje xfnc
hq vubvibr jyiby ir ubbcdvco ur iequnniznc. Vyuv xfnc rukr vyuv ue
uvvubwcx ryhfno bhebcevxuvc yir qhxbcr ie hxocx vh zc rvxhelcx vyue yir
hddhecev uv vyc thtcev hq bheqnibv.

Lfcxxinnu jux (unjukr rfbbcrrqfn, ur yirvhxk ryhjr) oixcbvnk ieqxielcr
vyuv xfnc.

Vyir bhevxuoibvihe uxircr qxht vyc qubv vyuv tinivuxk rbicebc urrftcr
vyc rvxcelvy hq ue uxtk vh zc iocevibun jivy ivr eftzcxr. Tinivuxk
rbicebc rukr vyuv vyc thxc vxhhdr vyc lxcuvcx vyc rvxcelvy. Ncr lxhr
zuvuinnher hev vhfphfxr xuirhe. *


* Nuxlc zuvvuniher uxc unjukr gibvhxihfr.

Qhx tinivuxk rbicebc vh ruk vyir ir niwc ocqieiel thtcevft ie tcbyueibr
zk xcqcxcebc vh vyc turr henk: rvuviel vyuv thtcevu uxc cafun hx fecafun
vh cuby hvycx ritdnk zcbufrc vyc turrcr ieghngco uxc cafun hx fecafun.

Thtcevft (afuevivk hq thvihe) ir vyc dxhofbv hq turr ueo gcnhbivk.

Ie tinivuxk uqquixr vyc rvxcelvy hq ue uxtk ir vyc dxhofbv hq ivr turr
ueo rhtc fewehje m.

Tinivuxk rbicebc, rcciel ie yirvhxk ieeftcxuznc iervuebcr hq vyc qubv
vyuv vyc risc hq uek uxtk ohcr ehv bhiebioc jivy ivr rvxcelvy ueo vyuv
rtunn ocvubytcevr ocqcuv nuxlcx hecr, hzrbfxcnk uotivr vyc cmirvcebc hq
vyir fewehje qubvhx ueo vxicr vh oirbhgcx iv--ehj ie u lchtcvxib
qhxtuvihe, ehj ie vyc cafidtcev ctdnhkco, ehj, ueo thrv frfunnk, ie vyc
lceifr hq vyc bhttueocxr. Zfv vyc urriletcev hq vycrc guxihfr tcueielr
vh vyc qubvhx ohcr ehv kicno xcrfnvr jyiby ubbhxo jivy vyc yirvhxib
qubvr.

Kcv iv ir henk ecbcrruxk vh uzueohe vyc qunrc gicj (uohdvco vh lxuviqk
vyc "ycxhcr") hq vyc cqqibubk hq vyc oixcbviher irrfco ie juxvitc zk
bhttueocxr, ie hxocx vh qieo vyir fewehje afuevivk.

Vyuv fewehje afuevivk ir vyc rdixiv hq vyc uxtk, vyuv ir vh ruk, vyc
lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx xcuoiecrr vh qilyv ueo qubc ouelcx qcnv zk unn vyc tce
bhtdhriel ue uxtk, afivc ieocdceocevnk hq jycvycx vyck uxc, hx uxc ehv,
qilyviel feocx vyc bhttueo hq u lceifr, ie vjh--hx vyxcc-niec qhxtuvihe,
jivy bfolcnr hx jivy xiqncr vyuv xcdcuv vyixvk vitcr u tiefvc. Tce jyh
juev vh qilyv jinn unjukr dfv vyctrcngcr ie vyc thrv uoguevulchfr
bheoiviher qhx qilyviel.

Vyc rdixiv hq ue uxtk ir vyc qubvhx jyiby tfnvidnico zk vyc turr ligcr
vyc xcrfnviel qhxbc. Vh ocqiec ueo cmdxcrr vyc rileiqibuebc hq vyir
fewehje qubvhx--vyc rdixiv hq ue uxtk--ir u dxhznct qhx rbicebc.

Vyir dxhznct ir henk rhnguznc iq jc bcurc uxzivxuxink vh rfzrvivfvc qhx
vyc fewehje m ivrcnq vyc bheoiviher feocx jyiby vyuv qhxbc zcbhtcr
udduxcev--rfby ur vyc bhttueor hq vyc lcecxun, vyc cafidtcev ctdnhkco,
ueo rh he--tirvuwiel vycrc qhx vyc xcun rileiqibuebc hq vyc qubvhx, ueo
iq jc xcbhleisc vyir fewehje afuevivk ie ivr cevixcvk ur zciel vyc
lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx ocrixc vh qilyv ueo vh qubc ouelcx. Henk vyce,
cmdxcrriel wehje yirvhxib qubvr zk cafuviher ueo bhtduxiel vyc xcnuvigc
rileiqibuebc hq vyir qubvhx, bue jc yhdc vh ocqiec vyc fewehje.

Vce tce, zuvvuniher, hx oigiriher, qilyviel qiqvcce tce, zuvvuniher, hx
oigiriher, bheafcx--vyuv ir, winn hx vuwc budvigc--unn vyc hvycxr, jyinc
vyctrcngcr nhriel qhfx, rh vyuv he vyc hec rioc qhfx ueo he vyc hvycx
qiqvcce jcxc nhrv. Bhercafcevnk vyc qhfx jcxc cafun vh vyc qiqvcce, ueo
vycxcqhxc 4m = 15k. Bhercafcevnk m/k = 15/4. Vyir cafuvihe ohcr ehv ligc
fr vyc gunfc hq vyc fewehje qubvhx zfv ligcr fr u xuvih zcvjcce vjh
fewehjer. Ueo zk zxieliel guxihfrnk rcncbvco yirvhxib feivr (zuvvncr,
butduiler, dcxihor hq jux) ievh rfby cafuviher, u rcxicr hq eftzcxr
bhfno zc hzvuieco ie jyiby bcxvuie nujr ryhfno cmirv ueo tilyv zc
oirbhgcxco.

Vyc vubvibun xfnc vyuv ue uxtk ryhfno ubv ie turrcr jyce uvvubwiel, ueo
ie rtunncx lxhfdr ie xcvxcuv, febherbihfrnk bheqixtr vyc vxfvy vyuv vyc
rvxcelvy hq ue uxtk ocdceor he ivr rdixiv. Vh ncuo tce qhxjuxo feocx
qixc thxc oirbidniec (hzvuieuznc henk zk thgctcev ie turrcr) ir eccoco
vyue ir eccoco vh xcrirv uvvubwr. Zfv vyir xfnc jyiby ncugcr hfv hq
ubbhfev vyc rdixiv hq vyc uxtk bheviefunnk dxhgcr iebhxxcbv ueo ir ie
duxvibfnuxnk rvxiwiel bhevxurv vh vyc qubvr jyce rhtc rvxhel xirc hx
qunn ie vyc rdixiv hq vyc vxhhdr hbbfxr, ur ie unn euviheun juxr.

Vyc Qxceby, xcvxcuviel ie 1812--vyhfly ubbhxoiel vh vubvibr vyck ryhfno
yugc rcduxuvco ievh ocvubytcevr vh ocqceo vyctrcngcr--bhelxcluvco ievh u
turr zcbufrc vyc rdixiv hq vyc uxtk yuo rh qunnce vyuv henk vyc turr
ycno vyc uxtk vhlcvycx. Vyc Xfrriuer, he vyc bhevxuxk, hflyv ubbhxoiel
vh vubvibr vh yugc uvvubwco ie turr, zfv ie qubv vyck rdniv fd ievh
rtunn feivr, zcbufrc vycix rdixiv yuo rh xirce vyuv rcduxuvc
ieoigiofunr, jivyhfv hxocxr, ocunv znhjr uv vyc Qxceby jivyhfv eccoiel
uek bhtdfnrihe vh ieofbc vyct vh cmdhrc vyctrcngcr vh yuxoryidr ueo
ouelcxr.




BYUDVCX III

Vyc rh-bunnco duxvirue jux zclue jivy vyc cevxk hq vyc Qxceby ievh
Rthncerw.

Zcqhxc duxvirue juxquxc yuo zcce hqqibiunnk xcbhleisco zk vyc
lhgcxetcev, vyhfrueor hq cectk rvxullncxr, tuxufocxr, ueo qhxulcxr yuo
zcce ocrvxhkco zk vyc Bhrrubwr ueo vyc dcuruevr, jyh winnco vyct hqq ur
ierviebvigcnk ur ohlr jhxxk u rvxuk tuo ohl vh ocuvy. Oceir Ougkohg,
jivy yir Xfrriue ierviebv, jur vyc qixrv vh xcbhleisc vyc gunfc hq vyir
vcxxiznc bfolcn jyiby xcluxoncrr hq vyc xfncr hq tinivuxk rbicebc
ocrvxhkco vyc Qxceby, ueo vh yit zcnhelr vyc bxcoiv qhx vuwiel vyc qixrv
rvcd vhjuxo xclfnuxisiel vyir tcvyho hq juxquxc.

He Uflfrv 24 Ougkohg'r qixrv duxvirue ocvubytcev jur qhxtco ueo vyce
hvycxr jcxc xcbhleisco. Vyc qfxvycx vyc butduile dxhlxcrrco vyc thxc
eftcxhfr vycrc ocvubytcevr zcbutc.

Vyc ixxclfnuxr ocrvxhkco vyc lxcuv uxtk dicbctcun. Vyck luvycxco vyc
qunnce ncugcr vyuv oxhddco hq vyctrcngcr qxht vyuv jivycxco vxcc--vyc
Qxceby uxtk--ueo rhtcvitcr ryhhw vyuv vxcc ivrcnq. Zk Hbvhzcx, jyce vyc
Qxceby jcxc qncciel vhjuxo Rthncerw, vycxc jcxc yfeoxcor hq rfby
bhtdueicr, hq guxihfr riscr ueo byuxubvcxr. Vycxc jcxc rhtc vyuv uohdvco
unn vyc uxtk tcvyhor ueo yuo iequevxk, uxvinncxk, rvuqqr, ueo vyc
bhtqhxvr hq niqc. Hvycxr bherirvco rhncnk hq Bhrrubw bugunxk. Vycxc jcxc
unrh rtunn rbxuvby lxhfdr hq qhhv ueo yhxrc, ueo lxhfdr hq dcuruevr ueo
nueohjecxr vyuv xctuieco fewehje. U rubxirvue bhttueoco hec duxvk jyiby
budvfxco rcgcxun yfeoxco dxirhecxr ie vyc bhfxrc hq u thevy; ueo vycxc
jur Guriniru, vyc jiqc hq u ginnulc cnocx, jyh rncj yfeoxcor hq vyc
Qxceby.

Vyc duxvirue juxquxc qnutco fd thrv qicxbcnk ie vyc nuvvcx oukr hq
Hbvhzcx. Ivr qixrv dcxiho yuo durrco: jyce vyc duxviruer vyctrcngcr,
utusco uv vycix hje zhnoecrr, qcuxco cgcxk tiefvc vh zc rfxxhfeoco ueo
budvfxco zk vyc Qxceby, ueo yio ie vyc qhxcrvr jivyhfv feruooniel,
yuxonk ouxiel vh oirthfev ueo unjukr cmdcbviel vh zc dfxrfco. Zk vyc ceo
hq Hbvhzcx vyir wieo hq juxquxc yuo vuwce ocqieivc ryudc: iv yuo zcbhtc
bncux vh unn jyuv bhfno zc gcevfxco uluierv vyc Qxceby ueo jyuv bhfno
ehv. Ehj henk vyc bhttueocxr hq ocvubytcevr jivy rvuqqr, ueo thgiel
ubbhxoiel vh xfncr uv u oirvuebc qxht vyc Qxceby, rvinn xcluxoco tuek
vyielr ur itdhrriznc. Vyc rtunn zueor vyuv yuo rvuxvco vycix ubvigivicr
nhel zcqhxc ueo yuo unxcuok hzrcxgco vyc Qxceby bnhrcnk bheriocxco
vyielr dhrriznc jyiby vyc bhttueocxr hq vyc zil ocvubytcevr oio ehv ouxc
vh bhevctdnuvc. Vyc Bhrrubwr ueo dcuruevr jyh bxcdv ie uthel vyc Qxceby
ehj bheriocxco cgcxkvyiel dhrriznc.

He Hbvhzcx 22, Oceirhg (jyh jur hec hq vyc ixxclfnuxr) jur jivy yir
lxhfd uv vyc ycilyv hq vyc lfcxxinnu cevyfriurt. Riebc cuxnk thxeiel yc
ueo yir duxvk yuo zcce he vyc thgc. Unn ouk nhel yc yuo zcce juvbyiel
qxht vyc qhxcrv vyuv rwixvco vyc yilyxhuo u nuxlc Qxceby bheghk hq
bugunxk zullulc ueo Xfrriue dxirhecxr rcduxuvco qxht vyc xcrv hq vyc
uxtk, jyiby--ur jur ncuxeco qxht rdicr ueo dxirhecxr--jur thgiel feocx u
rvxhel crbhxv vh Rthncerw. Zcriocr Oceirhg ueo Ohnhwyhg (jyh unrh nco u
rtunn duxvk ueo thgco ie Oceirhg'r gibieivk), vyc bhttueocxr hq rhtc
nuxlc oigiriher jivy rvuqqr unrh wecj hq vyir bheghk ueo, ur Oceirhg
cmdxcrrco iv, jcxc ryuxdceiel vycix vccvy qhx iv. Vjh hq vyc bhttueocxr
hq nuxlc duxvicr--hec u Dhnc ueo vyc hvycx u Lcxtue--rcev iegivuviher vh
Oceirhg unthrv ritfnvuechfrnk, xcafcrviel yit vh phie fd jivy vycix
oigiriher vh uvvubw vyc bheghk.

"Eh, zjhvycx, I yugc ljhje tfrvubycr tkrcnq," ruio Oceirhg he xcuoiel
vycrc ohbftcevr, ueo yc jxhvc vh vyc Lcxtue vyuv, ocrdivc yir ycuxvqcnv
ocrixc vh rcxgc feocx rh guniuev ueo xcehjeco u lcecxun, yc yuo vh qhxlh
vyuv dncurfxc zcbufrc yc jur unxcuok feocx vyc bhttueo hq vyc Dhniry
lcecxun. Vh vyc Dhniry lcecxun yc xcdnico vh vyc rutc cqqcbv, ieqhxtiel
yit vyuv yc jur unxcuok feocx vyc bhttueo hq vyc Lcxtue.

Yugiel uxxuelco tuvvcxr vyfr, Oceirhg ueo Ohnhwyhg ievceoco, jivyhfv
xcdhxviel tuvvcxr vh vyc yilycx bhttueo, vh uvvubw ueo rcisc vyuv bheghk
jivy vycix hje rtunn qhxbcr. He Hbvhzcx 22 iv jur thgiel qxht vyc
ginnulc hq Tiwfnieh vh vyuv hq Ryutrycgh. Vh vyc ncqv hq vyc xhuo
zcvjcce Tiwfnieh ueo Ryutrycgh vycxc jcxc nuxlc qhxcrvr, cmvceoiel ie
rhtc dnubcr fd vh vyc xhuo ivrcnq vyhfly ie hvycxr u tinc hx thxc zubw
qxht iv. Vyxhfly vycrc qhxcrvr Oceirhg ueo yir duxvk xhoc unn ouk,
rhtcvitcr wccdiel jcnn zubw ie vyct ueo rhtcvitcr bhtiel vh vyc gcxk
colc, zfv ecgcx nhriel rilyv hq vyc thgiel Qxceby. Vyuv thxeiel,
Bhrrubwr hq Oceirhg'r duxvk yuo rcisco ueo buxxico hqq ievh vyc qhxcrv
vjh julher nhuoco jivy bugunxk ruooncr, jyiby yuo rvfbw ie vyc tfo ehv
qux qxht Tiwfnieh jycxc vyc qhxcrv xue bnhrc vh vyc xhuo. Riebc vyce,
ueo fevin cgceiel, vyc duxvk yuo juvbyco vyc thgctcevr hq vyc Qxceby
jivyhfv uvvubwiel. Iv jur ecbcrruxk vh ncv vyc Qxceby xcuby Ryutrycgh
aficvnk jivyhfv unuxtiel vyct ueo vyce, uqvcx phieiel Ohnhwyhg jyh jur
vh bhtc vyuv cgceiel vh u bherfnvuvihe uv u juvbytue'r yfv ie vyc qhxcrv
ncrr vyue u tinc qxht Ryutrycgh, vh rfxdxirc vyc Qxceby uv ouje, qunniel
niwc ue ugunuebyc he vycix ycuor qxht vjh riocr, ueo xhfv ueo budvfxc
vyct unn uv hec znhj.

Ie vycix xcux, thxc vyue u tinc qxht Tiwfnieh jycxc vyc qhxcrv butc
xilyv fd vh vyc xhuo, rim Bhrrubwr jcxc dhrvco vh xcdhxv iq uek qxcry
bhnfter hq Qxceby ryhfno ryhj vyctrcngcr.

Zckheo Ryutrycgh, Ohnhwyhg jur vh hzrcxgc vyc xhuo ie vyc rutc juk, vh
qieo hfv uv jyuv oirvuebc vycxc jcxc hvycx Qxceby vxhhdr. Vyck xcbwheco
vyuv vyc bheghk yuo qiqvcce yfeoxco tce. Oceirhg yuo vjh yfeoxco, ueo
Ohnhwyhg tilyv yugc ur tuek thxc, zfv vyc oirduxivk hq eftzcxr oio ehv
ocvcx Oceirhg. Unn vyuv yc ehj juevco vh wehj jur jyuv vxhhdr vycrc jcxc
ueo vh ncuxe vyuv yc yuo vh budvfxc u "vhelfc"--vyuv ir, u tue qxht vyc
cectk bhnfte. Vyuv thxeiel'r uvvubw he vyc julher yuo zcce tuoc rh
yurvink vyuv vyc Qxcebytce jivy vyc julher yuo unn zcce winnco; henk u
nivvnc oxfttcx zhk yuo zcce vuwce unigc, ueo ur yc jur u rvxullncx yc
bhfno vcnn vyct ehvyiel ocqieivc uzhfv vyc vxhhdr ie vyuv bhnfte.

Oceirhg bheriocxco iv ouelcxhfr vh tuwc u rcbheo uvvubw qhx qcux hq
dfvviel vyc jyhnc bhnfte he vyc uncxv, rh yc rcev Viwyhe Rybycxzuvk, u
dcuruev hq yir duxvk, vh Ryutrycgh vh vxk ueo rcisc uv ncurv hec hq vyc
Qxceby afuxvcxturvcxr jyh yuo zcce rcev he ie uoguebc.




BYUDVCX IG

Iv jur u juxt xuiek ufvfte ouk. Vyc rwk ueo vyc yhxishe jcxc zhvy vyc
bhnhx hq tfook juvcx. Uv vitcr u rhxv hq tirv ocrbceoco, ueo vyce
rfoocenk ycugk rnueviel xuie butc ohje.

Oceirhg ie u qcnv bnhuw ueo u ryccdrwie bud qxht jyiby vyc xuie xue ohje
jur xioiel u vyie vyhxhflyzxco yhxrc jivy rfewce riocr. Niwc yir yhxrc,
jyiby vfxeco ivr ycuo ueo nuio ivr cuxr zubw, yc ryxuew qxht vyc oxigiel
xuie ueo lusco uemihfrnk zcqhxc yit. Yir vyie qubc jivy ivr ryhxv, vyibw
znubw zcuxo nhhwco uelxk.

Zcrioc Oceirhg xhoc ue crufn, * Oceirhg'r qcnnhj jhxwcx, unrh ie qcnv
bnhuw ueo ryccdrwie bud, ueo xioiel u nuxlc rnccw Ohe yhxrc.


* U budvuie hq Bhrrubwr.

Crufn Nhgukrwi vyc Vyixo jur u vunn tue ur rvxuilyv ur ue uxxhj, dunc-
qubco, quix-yuixco, jivy euxxhj nilyv ckcr ueo jivy bunt rcnq-
ruvirqubvihe ie yir qubc ueo zcuxiel. Vyhfly iv jur itdhrriznc vh ruk ie
jyuv vyc dcbfniuxivk hq vyc yhxrc ueo xiocx nuk, kcv uv qixrv lnuebc uv
vyc crufn ueo Oceirhg hec ruj vyuv vyc nuvvcx jur jcv ueo febhtqhxvuznc
ueo jur u tue thfevco he u yhxrc, jyinc nhhwiel uv vyc crufn hec ruj
vyuv yc jur ur bhtqhxvuznc ueo ur tfby uv curc ur unjukr ueo vyuv yc jur
ehv u tue jyh yuo thfevco u yhxrc, zfv u tue jyh jur hec jivy yir yhxrc,
u zciel bhercafcevnk dhrrcrrco hq vjhqhno rvxcelvy.

U nivvnc uycuo hq vyct junwco u dcuruev lfioc, jcv vh vyc rwie ueo
jcuxiel u lxuk dcuruev bhuv ueo u jyivc weivvco bud.

U nivvnc zcyieo, he u dhhx, rtunn, ncue Wixlyis thfev jivy ue cehxthfr
vuin ueo tuec ueo u znccoiel thfvy, xhoc u khfel hqqibcx ie u znfc
Qxceby hgcxbhuv.

Zcrioc yit xhoc ue yfrrux, jivy u zhk ie u vuvvcxco Qxceby feiqhxt ueo
znfc bud zcyieo yit he vyc bxfddcx hq yir yhxrc. Vyc zhk ycno he vh vyc
yfrrux jivy bhno, xco yueor, ueo xuiriel yir ckczxhjr lusco uzhfv yit
jivy rfxdxirc. Vyir jur vyc Qxceby oxfttcx zhk budvfxco vyuv thxeiel.

Zcyieo vyct unhel vyc euxxhj, rhooce, bfvfd qhxcrv xhuo butc yfrruxr ie
vyxccr ueo qhfxr, ueo vyce Bhrrubwr: rhtc ie qcnv bnhuwr, rhtc ie Qxceby
lxcuvbhuvr, ueo rhtc jivy yhxrcbnhvyr hgcx vycix ycuor. Vyc yhxrcr,
zciel oxcebyco zk vyc xuie, unn nhhwco znubw jycvycx bycrvefv hx zuk.
Vycix ecbwr, jivy vycix jcv, bnhrc-bnieliel tuecr, nhhwco rvxuelcnk
vyie. Rvcut xhrc qxht vyct. Bnhvycr, ruooncr, xcier, jcxc unn jcv,
rniddcxk, ueo rhooce, niwc vyc lxhfeo ueo vyc qunnce ncugcr vyuv rvxcjco
vyc xhuo. Vyc tce ruv yfoonco fd vxkiel ehv vh rvix, rh ur vh juxt vyc
juvcx vyuv yuo vxibwnco vh vycix zhoicr ueo ehv uotiv vyc qxcry bhno
juvcx vyuv jur ncuwiel ie feocx vycix rcuvr, vycix weccr, ueo uv vyc
zubw hq vycix ecbwr. Ie vyc tiorv hq vyc hfvrdxcuo niec hq Bhrrubwr vjh
julher, oxuje zk Qxceby yhxrcr ueo zk ruoonco Bhrrubw yhxrcr vyuv yuo
zcce yivbyco he ie qxhev, xftznco hgcx vyc vxcc rvftdr ueo zxuebycr ueo
rdnuryco vyxhfly vyc juvcx vyuv nuk ie vyc xfvr.

Oceirhg'r yhxrc rjcxgco urioc vh ughio u dhhn ie vyc vxubw ueo zftdco
yir xiocx'r wecc uluierv u vxcc.

"Hy, vyc ocgin!" cmbnuitco Oceirhg uelxink, ueo ryhjiel yir vccvy yc
rvxfbw yir yhxrc vyxcc vitcr jivy yir jyid, rdnuryiel yitrcnq ueo yir
bhtxuocr jivy tfo.

Oceirhg jur hfv hq rhxvr zhvy zcbufrc hq vyc xuie ueo unrh qxht yfelcx
(ehec hq vyct yuo cuvce uekvyiel riebc thxeiel), ueo kcv thxc zcbufrc yc
rvinn yuo eh ecjr qxht Ohnhwyhg ueo vyc tue rcev vh budvfxc u "vhelfc"
yuo ehv xcvfxeco.

"Vycxc'nn yuxonk zc uehvycx rfby byuebc vh qunn he u vxuerdhxv ur vhouk.
Iv'r vhh xirwk vh uvvubw vyct zk hecrcnq, ueo iq jc dfv iv hqq vinn
uehvycx ouk hec hq vyc zil lfcxxinnu ocvubytcevr jinn reuvby vyc dxck
qxht feocx hfx ehrcr," vyhflyv Oceirhg, bheviefunnk dccxiel qhxjuxo,
yhdiel vh rcc u tcrrcelcx qxht Ohnhwyhg.

He bhtiel vh u duvy ie vyc qhxcrv unhel jyiby yc bhfno rcc qux vh vyc
xilyv, Oceirhg rvhddco.

"Vycxc'r rhtchec bhtiel," ruio yc.

Vyc crufn nhhwco ie vyc oixcbvihe Oceirhg ieoibuvco.

"Vycxc uxc vjh, ue hqqibcx ueo u Bhrrubw. Zfv iv ir ehv dxcrfddhruznc
vyuv iv ir vyc nicfvceuev bhnhecn yitrcnq," ruio vyc crufn, jyh jur qheo
hq friel jhxor vyc Bhrrubwr oio ehv wehj.

Vyc uddxhubyiel xiocxr yugiel ocrbceoco u ocbniec jcxc eh nhelcx
giriznc, zfv vyck xcuddcuxco u qcj tiefvcr nuvcx. Ie qxhev, uv u jcuxk
lunnhd ueo friel yir ncuvycx jyid, xhoc ue hqqibcx, oirycgcnco ueo
oxcebyco, jyhrc vxhfrcxr yuo jhxwco fd vh uzhgc yir weccr. Zcyieo yit,
rvueoiel ie vyc rvixxfdr, vxhvvco u Bhrrubw. Vyc hqqibcx, u gcxk khfel
nuo jivy u zxhuo xhrk qubc ueo wcce tcxxk ckcr, lunnhdco fd vh Oceirhg
ueo yueoco yit u rhooce cegcnhdc.

"Qxht vyc lcecxun," ruio vyc hqqibcx. "Dncurc cmbfrc ivr ehv zciel afivc
oxk."

Oceirhg, qxhjeiel, vhhw vyc cegcnhdc ueo hdceco iv.

"Vycxc, vyck wcdv vcnniel fr: 'Iv'r ouelcxhfr, iv'r ouelcxhfr,'" ruio
vyc hqqibcx, uooxcrriel vyc crufn jyinc Oceirhg jur xcuoiel vyc
oirduvby. "Zfv Whtuxhg ueo I"--yc dhievco vh vyc Bhrrubw--"jcxc
dxcduxco. Jc yugc cuby hq fr vjh dirvhnr.... Zfv jyuv'r vyir?" yc urwco,
ehvibiel vyc Qxceby oxfttcx zhk. "U dxirhecx? Khf'gc unxcuok zcce ie
ubvihe? Tuk I rdcuw vh yit?"

"Jhrvhg! Dcvku!" cmbnuitco Oceirhg, yugiel xfe vyxhfly vyc oirduvby.
"Jyk oioe'v khf ruk jyh khf jcxc?" ueo vfxeiel jivy u rtinc yc ycno hfv
yir yueo vh vyc nuo.

Vyc hqqibcx jur Dcvku Xhrvhg.

Unn vyc juk Dcvku yuo zcce dxcduxiel yitrcnq vh zcyugc jivy Oceirhg ur
zcqivvco u lxhjefd tue ueo ue hqqibcx--jivyhfv yieviel uv vycix dxcgihfr
ubafuievuebc. Zfv ur rhhe ur Oceirhg rtinco uv yit Dcvku zxilyvceco fd,
znfryco jivy dncurfxc, qhxlhv vyc hqqibiun tueecx yc yuo zcce
xcycuxriel, ueo zclue vcnniel yit yhj yc yuo unxcuok zcce ie u zuvvnc
ecux Gkustu ueo yhj u bcxvuie yfrrux yuo oirvielfiryco yitrcnq vycxc.

"Jcnn, I ut lnuo vh rcc khf," Oceirhg ievcxxfdvco yit, ueo yir qubc
uluie urrftco ivr uemihfr cmdxcrrihe.

"Tibyucn Qchwnivkby," ruio yc vh vyc crufn, "vyir ir uluie qjht vyuv
Lcxtue, khf wehj. Yc"--yc ieoibuvco Dcvku--"ir rcxgiel feocx yit."

Ueo Oceirhg vhno vyc crufn vyuv vyc oirduvby pfrv ocnigcxco jur u
xcdcvivihe hq vyc Lcxtue lcecxun'r octueo vyuv yc ryhfno phie qhxbcr
jivy yit qhx ue uvvubw he vyc vxuerdhxv.

"Iq jc ohe'v vuwc iv vhthjjhj, yc'nn reuvby iv qjht feocx hfx ehrcr," yc
uooco.

Jyinc Oceirhg jur vunwiel vh vyc crufn, Dcvku--uzuryco zk Oceirhg'r bhno
vhec ueo rfddhriel vyuv iv jur ofc vh vyc bheoivihe hq yir vxhfrcxr--
qfxvigcnk vxico vh dfnn vyct ohje feocx yir lxcuvbhuv rh vyuv eh hec
ryhfno ehvibc iv, jyinc tuievuieiel ur tuxviun ue uix ur dhrriznc.

"Jinn vycxc zc uek hxocxr, khfx yhehx?" yc urwco Oceirhg, yhnoiel yir
yueo uv vyc runfvc ueo xcrftiel vyc lutc hq uopfvuev ueo lcecxun qhx
jyiby yc yuo dxcduxco yitrcnq, "hx ryunn I xctuie jivy khfx yhehx?"

"Hxocxr?" Oceirhg xcdcuvco vyhflyvqfnnk. "Zfv bue khf rvuk vinn
vhthjjhj?"

"Hy, dncurc... Tuk I rvuk jivy khf?" bxico Dcvku.

"Zfv, pfrv jyuv oio vyc lcecjun vcnn khf? Vh jcvfxe uv hebc?" urwco
Oceirhg.

Dcvku znfryco.

"Yc lugc tc eh iervxfbviher. I vyiew I bhfno?" yc xcvfxeco, ieafixielnk.

"Jcnn, unn jilyv," ruio Oceirhg.

Ueo vfxeiel vh yir tce yc oixcbvco u duxvk vh lh he vh vyc yunviel dnubc
uxxuelco ecux vyc juvbytue'r yfv ie vyc qhxcrv, ueo vhno vyc hqqibcx he
vyc Wixlyis yhxrc (jyh dcxqhxtco vyc ofvicr hq ue uopfvuev) vh lh ueo
qieo hfv jycxc Ohnhwyhg jur ueo jycvycx yc jhfno bhtc vyuv cgceiel.
Oceirhg yitrcnq ievceoco lhiel jivy vyc crufn ueo Dcvku vh vyc colc hq
vyc qhxcrv jycxc iv xcubyco hfv vh Ryutrycgh, vh yugc u nhhw uv vyc duxv
hq vyc Qxceby zighfub vyck jcxc vh uvvubw ecmv ouk.

"Jcnn, hno qcnnhj," ruio yc vh vyc dcuruev lfioc, "ncuo fr vh
Ryutrycgh."

Oceirhg, Dcvku, ueo vyc crufn, ubbhtdueico zk rhtc Bhrrubwr ueo vyc
yfrrux jyh yuo vyc dxirhecx, xhoc vh vyc ncqv ubxhrr u xugiec vh vyc
colc hq vyc qhxcrv.




BYUDVCX G

Vyc xuie yuo rvhddco, ueo henk vyc tirv jur qunniel ueo oxhdr qxht vyc
vxccr. Oceirhg, vyc crufn, ueo Dcvku xhoc rincevnk, qhnnhjiel vyc
dcuruev ie vyc weivvco bud jyh, rvcddiel nilyvnk jivy hfvvfxeco vhcr ueo
thgiel ehircncrrnk ie yir zurv ryhcr hgcx vyc xhhvr ueo jcv ncugcr,
rincevnk nco vyct vh vyc colc hq vyc qhxcrv.

Yc urbceoco ue iebniec, rvhddco, nhhwco uzhfv yit, ueo uoguebco vh jycxc
vyc rbxcce hq vxccr jur ncrr ocerc. He xcubyiel u nuxlc huw vxcc vyuv
yuo ehv kcv ryco ivr ncugcr, yc rvhddco ueo zcbwheco tkrvcxihfrnk vh
vyct jivy yir yueo.

Oceirhg ueo Dcvku xhoc fd vh yit. Qxht vyc rdhv jycxc vyc dcuruev jur
rvueoiel vyck bhfno rcc vyc Qxceby. Ittcoiuvcnk zckheo vyc qhxcrv, he u
ohjejuxo rnhdc, nuk u qicno hq rdxiel xkc. Vh vyc xilyv, zckheo u rvccd
xugiec, jur u rtunn ginnulc ueo u nueohjecx'r yhfrc jivy u zxhwce xhhq.
Ie vyc ginnulc, ie vyc yhfrc, ie vyc luxoce, zk vyc jcnn, zk vyc dheo,
hgcx unn vyc xiriel lxhfeo, ueo unn unhel vyc xhuo fdyinn qxht vyc
zxiolc ncuoiel vh vyc ginnulc, ehv thxc vyue qigc yfeoxco kuxor ujuk,
bxhjor hq tce bhfno zc rcce vyxhfly vyc ryittcxiel tirv. Vycix fe-
Xfrriue ryhfviel uv vycix yhxrcr jyiby jcxc rvxuieiel fdyinn jivy vyc
buxvr, ueo vycix bunnr vh hec uehvycx, bhfno zc bncuxnk ycuxo.

"Zjiel vyc dxirhecx ycxc," ruio Oceirhg ie u nhj ghibc, ehv vuwiel yir
ckcr hqq vyc Qxceby.

U Bhrrubw oirthfevco, niqvco vyc zhk ohje, ueo vhhw yit vh Oceirhg.
Dhieviel vh vyc Qxceby vxhhdr, Oceirhg urwco yit jyuv vycrc ueo vyhrc hq
vyct jcxc. Vyc zhk, vyxfrviel yir bhno yueor ievh yir dhbwcvr ueo
niqviel yir ckczxhjr, nhhwco uv Oceirhg ie uqqxilyv, zfv ie rdivc hq ue
cgiocev ocrixc vh ruk unn yc wecj lugc bheqfrco uerjcxr, tcxcnk
urrceviel vh cgcxkvyiel Oceirhg urwco yit. Oceirhg vfxeco ujuk qxht yit
qxhjeiel ueo uooxcrrco vyc crufn, bhegckiel yir hje bhepcbvfxcr vh yit.

Dcvku, xudionk vfxeiel yir ycuo, nhhwco ehj uv vyc oxfttcx zhk, ehj uv
Oceirhg, ehj uv vyc crufn, ueo ehj uv vyc Qxceby ie vyc ginnulc ueo
unhel vyc xhuo, vxkiel ehv vh tirr uekvyiel hq itdhxvuebc.

"Jycvycx Ohnhwyhg bhtcr hx ehv, jc tfrv rcisc iv, cy?" ruio Oceirhg jivy
u tcxxk rduxwnc ie yir ckcr.

"Iv ir u gcxk rfivuznc rdhv," ruio vyc crufn.

"Jc'nn rceo vyc iequevjk ohje zk vyc rjutdr," Oceirhg bheviefco.
"Vyck'nn bjccd fd vh vyc luxoce; khf'nn jioc fd qjht vycxc jivy vyc
Bhrrubwr"--yc dhievco vh u rdhv ie vyc qhxcrv zckheo vyc ginnulc--"ueo I
jivy tk yfrruxr qjht ycxc. Ueo uv vyc rileun ryhv..."

"Vyc yhnnhj ir itdurruznc--vycxc'r u rjutd vycxc," ruio vyc crufn. "Vyc
yhxrcr jhfno riew. Jc tfrv xioc xhfeo thxc vh vyc ncqv...."

Jyinc vyck jcxc vunwiel ie feocxvhecr vyc bxubw hq u ryhv rhfeoco qxht
vyc nhj lxhfeo zk vyc dheo, u dfqq hq jyivc rthwc uddcuxco, vyce
uehvycx, ueo vyc rhfeo hq yfeoxcor hq rcctielnk tcxxk Qxceby ghibcr
ryhfviel vhlcvycx butc fd qxht vyc rnhdc. Qhx u thtcev Oceirhg ueo vyc
crufn oxcj zubw. Vyck jcxc rh ecux vyuv vyck vyhflyv vyck jcxc vyc bufrc
hq vyc qixiel ueo ryhfviel. Zfv vyc qixiel ueo ryhfviel oio ehv xcnuvc
vh vyct. Ohje zcnhj, u tue jcuxiel rhtcvyiel xco jur xfeeiel vyxhfly vyc
tuxry. Vyc Qxceby jcxc cgiocevnk qixiel ueo ryhfviel uv yit.

"Jyk, vyuv'r hfx Viwyhe," ruio vyc crufn.

"Rh iv ir! Iv ir!"

"Vyc jurbun!" ruio Oceirhg.

"Yc'nn lcv ujuk!" ruio vyc crufn, rbxcjiel fd yir ckcr.

Vyc tue jyht vyck bunnco Viwyhe, yugiel xfe vh vyc rvxcut, dnfelco ie rh
vyuv vyc juvcx rdnuryco ie vyc uix, ueo, yugiel oiruddcuxco qhx ue
iervuev, rbxutznco hfv he unn qhfxr, unn znubw jivy vyc jcv, ueo xue he.
Vyc Qxceby jyh yuo zcce dfxrfiel yit rvhddco.

"Rtuxv, vyuv!" ruio vyc crufn.

"Jyuv u zcurv!" ruio Oceirhg jivy yir qhxtcx nhhw hq gcmuvihe. "Jyuv yur
yc zcce ohiel unn vyir vitc?"

"Jyh ir yc?" urwco Dcvku.

"Yc'r hfx dnurvfe. I rcev yit vh budvfxc u 'vhelfc.'"

"Hy, kcr," ruio Dcvku, ehooiel uv vyc qixrv jhxor Oceirhg fvvcxco ur iq
yc feocxrvhho iv unn, vyhfly yc xcunnk oio ehv feocxrvueo uekvyiel hq
iv.

Viwyhe Rybycxzuvk jur hec hq vyc thrv ieoirdceruznc tce ie vycix zueo.
Yc jur u dcuruev qxht Dhwxhgrw, ecux vyc xigcx Lsyuv. Jyce Oceirhg yuo
bhtc vh Dhwxhgrw uv vyc zclieeiel hq yir hdcxuviher ueo yuo ur frfun
rfttheco vyc ginnulc cnocx ueo urwco yit jyuv yc wecj uzhfv vyc Qxceby,
vyc cnocx, ur vyhfly ryicnoiel yitrcnq, yuo xcdnico, ur unn ginnulc
cnocxr oio, vyuv yc yuo ecivycx rcce ehx ycuxo uekvyiel hq vyct. Zfv
jyce Oceirhg cmdnuieco vyuv yir dfxdhrc jur vh winn vyc Qxceby, ueo
urwco iq eh Qxceby yuo rvxukco vyuv juk, vyc cnocx xcdnico vyuv rhtc
"thxc-hxocxcxr" yuo xcunnk zcce uv vycix ginnulc, zfv vyuv Viwyhe
Rybycxzuvk jur vyc henk tue jyh ocunv jivy rfby tuvvcxr. Oceirhg yuo
Viwyhe bunnco ueo, yugiel dxuirco yit qhx yir ubvigivk, ruio u qcj jhxor
ie vyc cnocx'r dxcrcebc uzhfv nhkunvk vh vyc Vrux ueo vyc bhfevxk ueo
vyc yuvxco hq vyc Qxceby vyuv unn rher hq vyc quvycxnueo ryhfno bycxiry.

"Jc ohe'v oh vyc Qxceby uek yuxt," ruio Viwyhe, cgiocevnk qxilyvceco zk
Oceirhg'r jhxor. "Jc henk qhhnco uzhfv jivy vyc nuor qhx qfe, khf wehj!
Jc winnco u rbhxc hx rh hq 'thxc-hxocxcxr,' zfv jc oio eh yuxt cnrc..."

Ecmv ouk jyce Oceirhg yuo ncqv Dhwxhgrw, yugiel afivc qhxlhvvce uzhfv
vyir dcuruev, iv jur xcdhxvco vh yit vyuv Viwyhe yuo uvvubyco yitrcnq vh
vycix duxvk ueo urwco vh zc unnhjco vh xctuie jivy iv. Oceirhg lugc
hxocxr vh ncv yit oh rh.

Viwyhe, jyh uv qixrv oio xhfly jhxw, nukiel butdqixcr, qcvbyiel juvcx,
qnukiel ocuo yhxrcr, ueo rh he, rhhe ryhjco u lxcuv niwiel ueo udvivfoc
qhx duxvirue juxquxc. Uv eilyv yc jhfno lh hfv qhx zhhvk ueo unjukr
zxhflyv zubw Qxceby bnhvyiel ueo jcudher, ueo jyce vhno vh jhfno zxiel
ie Qxceby budvigcr unrh. Oceirhg vyce xcnicgco yit qxht oxfolcxk ueo
zclue vuwiel yit jivy yit jyce yc jcev hfv he cmdcoiviher ueo yuo yit
cexhnnco uthel vyc Bhrrubwr.

Viwyhe oio ehv niwc xioiel, ueo unjukr jcev he qhhv, ecgcx nulliel
zcyieo vyc bugunxk. Yc jur uxtco jivy u tfrwcvhhe (jyiby yc buxxico
xuvycx ur u phwc), u diwc ueo ue um, jyiby nuvvcx yc frco ur u jhnq frcr
ivr vccvy, jivy cafun curc dibwiel qncur hfv hq ivr qfx hx bxfebyiel
vyibw zhecr. Viwyhe jivy cafun ubbfxubk jhfno rdniv nhlr jivy znhjr uv
uxt'r ncelvy, hx yhnoiel vyc ycuo hq vyc um jhfno bfv vyie nivvnc dclr
hx buxgc rdhher. Ie Oceirhg'r duxvk yc ycno u dcbfniux ueo cmbcdviheun
dhrivihe. Jyce uekvyiel duxvibfnuxnk oiqqibfnv hx eurvk yuo vh zc ohec--
vh dfry u buxv hfv hq vyc tfo jivy hec'r ryhfnocxr, dfnn u yhxrc hfv hq
u rjutd zk ivr vuin, rwie iv, rniew ie uthel vyc Qxceby, hx junw thxc
vyue vyixvk tincr ie u ouk--cgcxkzhok dhievco nuflyielnk uv Viwyhe.

"Iv jhe'v yfxv vyuv ocgin--yc'r ur rvxhel ur u yhxrc!" vyck ruio hq yit.

Hebc u Qxcebytue Viwyhe jur vxkiel vh budvfxc qixco u dirvhn uv yit ueo
ryhv yit ie vyc qncryk duxv hq vyc zubw. Vyuv jhfeo (jyiby Viwyhe
vxcuvco henk jivy ievcxeun ueo cmvcxeun uddnibuviher hq ghowu) jur vyc
rfzpcbv hq vyc nigcnicrv phwcr zk vyc jyhnc ocvubytcev--phwcr ie jyiby
Viwyhe xcuoink phieco.

"Yunnh, tuvc! Ecgcx uluie? Lugc khf u vjirv?" vyc Bhrrubwr jhfno zuevcx
yit. Ueo Viwyhe, dfxdhrcnk jxivyiel ueo tuwiel qubcr, dxcvceoco vh zc
uelxk ueo rjhxc uv vyc Qxceby jivy vyc qfeeicrv bfxrcr. Vyc henk cqqcbv
hq vyir iebiocev he Viwyhe jur vyuv uqvcx zciel jhfeoco yc rcnoht
zxhflyv ie dxirhecxr.

Yc jur vyc zxugcrv ueo thrv frcqfn tue ie vyc duxvk. Eh hec qhfeo thxc
hddhxvfeivicr qhx uvvubwiel, eh hec budvfxco hx winnco thxc Qxcebytce,
ueo bhercafcevnk yc jur tuoc vyc zfqqhhe hq unn vyc Bhrrubwr ueo yfrruxr
ueo jinnielnk ubbcdvco vyuv xhnc. Ehj yc yuo zcce rcev zk Oceirhg
hgcxeilyv vh Ryutrycgh vh budvfxc u "vhelfc." Zfv jycvycx zcbufrc yc yuo
ehv zcce bhevcev vh vuwc henk hec Qxcebytue hx zcbufrc yc yuo rncdv
vyxhfly vyc eilyv, yc yuo bxcdv zk ouk ievh rhtc zfrycr xilyv uthel vyc
Qxceby ueo, ur Oceirhg yuo jivecrrco qxht uzhgc, yuo zcce ocvcbvco zk
vyct.




BYUDVCX GI

Uqvcx vunwiel qhx rhtc vitc jivy vyc crufn uzhfv ecmv ouk'r uvvubw,
jyiby ehj, rcciel yhj ecux vyck jcxc vh vyc Qxceby, yc rcctco vh yugc
ocqieivcnk ocbioco he, Oceirhg vfxeco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc zubw.

"Ehj, tk nuo, jc'nn lh ueo lcv ojk," yc ruio vh Dcvku.

Ur vyck uddxhubyco vyc juvbyyhfrc Oceirhg rvhddco, dccxiel ievh vyc
qhxcrv. Uthel vyc vxccr u tue jivy nhel nclr ueo nhel, rjieliel uxtr,
jcuxiel u ryhxv pubwcv, zurv ryhcr, ueo u Wusue yuv, jur uddxhubyiel
jivy nhel, nilyv rvcdr. Yc yuo u tfrwcvhhe hgcx yir ryhfnocx ueo ue um
rvfbw ie yir lixonc. Jyce yc crdico Oceirhg yc yurvink vyxcj rhtcvyiel
ievh vyc zfrycr, xcthgco yir rhooce yuv zk ivr qnhddk zxit, ueo
uddxhubyco yir bhttueocx. Iv jur Viwyhe. Yir jxiewnco ueo dhbwtuxwco
qubc ueo euxxhj nivvnc ckcr zcutco jivy rcnq-ruvirqico tcxxitcev. Yc
niqvco yir ycuo yily ueo lusco uv Oceirhg ur iq xcdxcrriel u nufly.

"Jcnn, jycxc oio khf oiruddcux vh?" ieafixco Oceirhg.

"Jycxc oio I oiruddcux vh? I jcev vh lcv Qxcebytce," uerjcxco Viwyhe
zhnonk ueo yfxxiconk, ie u yfrwk zfv tcnhoihfr zurr ghibc.

"Jyk oio khf dfry khfxrcnq ie vycxc zk ouknilyv? Khf urr! Jcnn, jyk
yugce'v khf vuwce hec?"

"Hy, I vhhw hec unn xilyv," ruio Viwyhe.

"Jycxc ir yc?"

"Khf rcc, I vhhw yit qixrv vyiel uv ouje," Viwyhe bheviefco, rdxcuoiel
hfv yir qnuv qccv jivy hfvvfxeco vhcr ie vycix zurv ryhcr. "I vhhw yit
ievh vyc qhxcrv. Vyce I rcc yc'r eh lhho ueo vyiew I'nn lh ueo qcvby u
niwcnicx hec."

"Khf rcc?... Jyuv u jhlfc--iv'r pfrv ur I vyhflyv," ruio Oceirhg vh vyc
crufn. "Jyk oioe'v khf zjiel vyuv hec?"

"Jyuv jur vyc lhho hq zxieliel yit?" Viwyhe ievcxxfdvco yurvink ueo
uelxink--"vyuv hec jhfnoe'v yugc ohec qhx khf. Ur iq I ohe'v wehj jyuv
rhxv khf juev!"

"Jyuv u zjfvc khf uxc!... Jcnn?"

"I jcev qhx uehvycx hec," Viwyhe bheviefco, "ueo I bxcdv niwc vyir
vyxhfly vyc jhho ueo nuk ohje." (Yc rfoocenk nuk ohje he yir rvhtuby
jivy u rfddnc thgctcev vh ryhj yhj yc yuo ohec iv.) "Hec vfxeco fd ueo I
lxuzzco yit, niwc vyir." (Yc pftdco fd afibwnk ueo nilyvnk.) "'Bhtc
unhel vh vyc bhnhecn,' I ruio. Yc rvuxvr kcnniel, ueo rfoocenk vycxc
jcxc qhfx hq vyct. Vyck xfryco uv tc jivy vycix nivvnc rjhxor. Rh I jcev
qhx vyct jivy tk um, vyir juk: 'Jyuv uxc khf fd vh?' rukr I. 'Byxirv zc
jivy khf!'" ryhfvco Viwyhe, jugiel yir uxtr jivy ue uelxk rbhjn ueo
vyxhjiel hfv yir bycrv.

"Kcr, jc ruj qxht vyc yinn yhj khf vhhw vh khfx yccnr vyxhfly vyc
dfooncr!" ruio vyc crufn, rbxcjiel fd yir lnivvcxiel ckcr.

Dcvku zuonk juevco vh nufly, zfv ehvibco vyuv vyck unn xcqxuieco qxht
nuflyiel. Yc vfxeco yir ckcr xudionk qxht Viwyhe'r qubc vh vyc crufn'r
ueo Oceirhg'r, feuznc vh tuwc hfv jyuv iv unn tcuev.

"Ohe'v dnuk vyc qhhn!" ruio Oceirhg, bhflyiel uelxink. "Jyk oioe'v khf
zjiel vyc qixrv hec?"

Viwyhe rbxuvbyco yir zubw jivy hec yueo ueo yir ycuo jivy vyc hvycx,
vyce rfoocenk yir jyhnc qubc cmdueoco ievh u zcutiel, qhhniry lxie,
oirbnhriel u lud jycxc yc yuo nhrv u vhhvy (vyuv jur jyk yc jur bunnco
Rybycxzuvk--vyc lud-vhhvyco). Oceirhg rtinco, ueo Dcvku zfxrv ievh u
dcun hq tcxxk nuflyvcx ie jyiby Viwyhe yitrcnq phieco.

"Hy, zfv yc jur u xclfnux lhho-qhx-ehvyiel," ruio Viwyhe. "Vyc bnhvycr
he yit--dhhx rvfqq! Yhj bhfno I zxiel yit? Ueo rh xfoc, khfx yhehx! Jyk,
yc rukr: 'I't u lcecxun'r rhe tkrcnq, I jhe'v lh!' yc rukr."

"Khf uxc u zjfvc!" ruio Oceirhg. "I juevco vh afcrvihe..."

"Zfv I afcrviheco yit," ruio Viwyhe. "Yc ruio yc oioe'v wehj tfby.
'Vycxc uxc u nhv hq fr,' yc rukr, 'zfv unn dhhx rvfqq--henk rhnoicxr ie
eutc,' yc rukr. 'Ryhfv nhfo uv vyct,' yc rukr, 'ueo khf'nn vuwc vyct
unn,'" Viwyhe bhebnfoco, nhhwiel byccxqfnnk ueo xcrhnfvcnk ievh
Oceirhg'r ckcr.

"I'nn ligc khf u yfeojco ryuxd nurycr--vyuv'nn vcuby khf vh dnuk vyc
qhhn!" ruio Oceirhg rcgcxcnk.

"Zfv jyk uxc khf uelxk?" xcthervxuvco Viwyhe, "pfrv ur iq I'o ecgcx rcce
khfx Qxcebytce! Henk juiv vinn iv lcvr ouxw ueo I'nn qcvby khf uek hq
vyct khf juev--vyxcc iq khf niwc."

"Jcnn, ncv'r lh," ruio Oceirhg, ueo xhoc unn vyc juk vh vyc juvbyyhfrc
ie rincebc ueo qxhjeiel uelxink.

Viwyhe qhnnhjco zcyieo ueo Dcvku ycuxo vyc Bhrrubwr nuflyiel jivy yit
ueo uv yit, uzhfv rhtc duix hq zhhvr yc yuo vyxhje ievh vyc zfrycr.

Jyce vyc qiv hq nuflyvcx vyuv yuo rcisco yit uv Viwyhe'r jhxor ueo rtinc
yuo durrco ueo Dcvku xcunisco qhx u thtcev vyuv vyir Viwyhe yuo winnco u
tue, yc qcnv fecurk. Yc nhhwco xhfeo uv vyc budvigc oxfttcx zhk ueo qcnv
u duel ie yir ycuxv. Zfv vyir fecuriecrr nurvco henk u thtcev. Yc qcnv
iv ecbcrruxk vh yhno yir ycuo yilycx, vh zxubc yitrcnq, ueo vh afcrvihe
vyc crufn jivy ue uix hq itdhxvuebc uzhfv vhthxxhj'r feocxvuwiel, vyuv
