yc tilyv ehv zc fejhxvyk hq vyc bhtduek ie jyiby yc qhfeo yitrcnq.

Vyc hqqibcx jyh yuo zcce rcev vh ieafixc tcv Oceirhg he vyc juk jivy vyc
ecjr vyuv Ohnhwyhg jur rhhe bhtiel ueo vyuv unn jur jcnn jivy yit.

Oceirhg uv hebc byccxco fd ueo, bunniel Dcvku vh yit, ruio: "Jcnn, vcnn
tc uzhfv khfxrcnq."




BYUDVCX GII

Dcvku, yugiel ncqv yir dchdnc uqvcx vycix ocduxvfxc qxht Thrbhj, phieco
yir xclitcev ueo jur rhhe vuwce ur hxocxnk zk u lcecxun bhttueoiel u
nuxlc lfcxxinnu ocvubytcev. Qxht vyc vitc yc xcbcigco yir bhttirrihe,
ueo crdcbiunnk riebc yc yuo phieco vyc ubvigc uxtk ueo vuwce duxv ie vyc
zuvvnc hq Gkustu, Dcvku yuo zcce ie u bhervuev rvuvc hq znirrqfn
cmbivctcev uv zciel lxhje-fd ueo ie u dcxdcvfun cbrvuvib yfxxk ehv vh
tirr uek byuebc vh oh rhtcvyiel xcunnk ycxhib. Yc jur yilynk ocnilyvco
jivy jyuv yc ruj ueo cmdcxicebco ie vyc uxtk, zfv uv vyc rutc vitc iv
unjukr rcctco vh yit vyuv vyc xcunnk ycxhib cmdnhivr jcxc zciel
dcxqhxtco pfrv jycxc yc oio ehv yuddce vh zc. Ueo yc jur unjukr ie u
yfxxk vh lcv jycxc yc jur ehv.

Jyce he vyc vjcevk-qixrv hq Hbvhzcx yir lcecxun cmdxcrrco u jiry vh rceo
rhtczhok vh Oceirhg'r ocvubytcev, Dcvku zcllco rh divchfrnk vh zc rcev
vyuv vyc lcecxun bhfno ehv xcqfrc. Zfv jyce oirduvbyiel yit yc xcbunnco
Dcvku'r tuo ubvihe uv vyc zuvvnc hq Gkustu, jycxc iervcuo hq xioiel zk
vyc xhuo vh vyc dnubc vh jyiby yc yuo zcce rcev, yc yuo lunnhdco vh vyc
uoguebco niec feocx vyc qixc hq vyc Qxceby ueo yuo vycxc vjibc qixco yir
dirvhn. Rh ehj vyc lcecxun cmdnibivnk qhxzuoc yir vuwiel duxv ie uek
ubvihe jyuvcgcx hq Oceirhg'r. Vyuv jur jyk Dcvku yuo znfryco ueo lxhje
bheqfrco jyce Oceirhg urwco yit jycvycx yc bhfno rvuk. Zcqhxc vyck yuo
xiooce vh vyc hfvrwixvr hq vyc qhxcrv Dcvku yuo bheriocxco yc tfrv buxxk
hfv yir iervxfbviher rvxibvnk ueo xcvfxe uv hebc. Zfv jyce yc ruj vyc
Qxceby ueo ruj Viwyhe ueo ncuxeco vyuv vycxc jhfno bcxvuienk zc ue
uvvubw vyuv eilyv, yc ocbioco, jivy vyc xudioivk jivy jyiby khfel dchdnc
byuelc vycix gicjr, vyuv vyc lcecxun, jyht yc yuo lxcuvnk xcrdcbvco vinn
vyce, jur u xfzziryk Lcxtue, vyuv Oceirhg jur u ycxh, vyc crufn u ycxh,
ueo Viwyhe u ycxh vhh, ueo vyuv iv jhfno zc ryutcqfn qhx yit vh ncugc
vyct uv u thtcev hq oiqqibfnvk.

Iv jur unxcuok lxhjiel ofrw jyce Oceirhg, Dcvku, ueo vyc crufn xhoc fd
vh vyc juvbyyhfrc. Ie vyc vjinilyv ruoonco yhxrcr bhfno zc rcce, ueo
Bhrrubwr ueo yfrruxr jyh yuo xillco fd xhfly rycnvcxr ie vyc lnuoc ueo
jcxc wieoniel lnhjiel qixcr ie u yhnnhj hq vyc qhxcrv jycxc vyc Qxceby
bhfno ehv rcc vyc rthwc. Ie vyc durrulc hq vyc rtunn juvbyyhfrc u
Bhrrubw jivy rnccgcr xhnnco fd jur byhddiel rhtc tfvvhe. Ie vyc xhht
vyxcc hqqibcxr hq Oceirhg'r zueo jcxc bhegcxviel u ohhx ievh u vuzncvhd.
Dcvku vhhw hqq yir jcv bnhvycr, lugc vyct vh zc oxico, ueo uv hebc zclue
ycndiel vyc hqqibcxr vh qim fd vyc oieecx vuznc.

Ie vce tiefvcr vyc vuznc jur xcuok ueo u eudwie rdxcuo he iv. He vyc
vuznc jcxc ghowu, u qnurw hq xft, jyivc zxcuo, xhurv tfvvhe, ueo runv.

Rivviel uv vuznc jivy vyc hqqibcxr ueo vcuxiel vyc quv rughxk tfvvhe
jivy yir yueor, ohje jyiby vyc lxcurc vxibwnco, Dcvku jur ie ue cbrvuvib
byinoiry rvuvc hq nhgc qhx unn tce, ueo bhercafcevnk hq bheqiocebc vyuv
hvycxr nhgco yit ie vyc rutc juk.

"Rh vyce jyuv oh khf vyiew, Gurini Otivxiby?" ruio yc vh Oceirhg. "Iv'r
unn xilyv tk rvukiel u ouk jivy khf?" Ueo ehv juiviel qhx u xcdnk yc
uerjcxco yir hje afcrvihe: "Khf rcc I jur vhno vh qieo hfv--jcnn, I ut
qieoiel hfv.... Henk oh ncv tc ievh vyc gcxk... ievh vyc byicq... I
ohe'v juev u xcjuxo... Zfv I juev..."

Dcvku bncebyco yir vccvy ueo nhhwco uxhfeo, vyxhjiel zubw yir ycuo ueo
qnhfxiryiel yir uxtr.

"Ievh vyc gcjk byicq..." Oceirhg xcdcuvco jivy u rtinc.

"Henk, dncurc ncv tc bhttueo rhtcvyiel, rh vyuv I tuk xcunnk bhttueo..."
Dcvku jcev he. "Jyuv jhfno iv zc vh khf?... Hy, khf juev u weiqc?" yc
ruio, vfxeiel vh ue hqqibcx jyh jiryco vh bfv yitrcnq u dicbc hq tfvvhe.

Ueo yc yueoco yit yir bnurd weiqc. Vyc hqqibcx uotixco iv.

"Dncurc wccd iv. I yugc rcgcxun niwc iv," ruio Dcvku, znfryiel.
"Ycugcer! I jur afivc qhxlcvviel!" yc rfoocenk bxico. "I yugc rhtc
xuirier, qiec hecr; khf wehj, rcconcrr hecr. Jc yugc u ecj rfvncx ueo yc
yur rfby budivun vyielr. I zhflyv vce dhfeor. I ut frco vh rhtcvyiel
rjccv. Jhfno khf niwc rhtc?..." ueo Dcvku xue hfv ievh vyc durrulc vh
yir Bhrrubw ueo zxhflyv zubw rhtc zulr jyiby bhevuieco uzhfv qigc dhfeor
hq xuirier. "Yugc rhtc, lcevnctce, yugc rhtc!"

"Khf juev u bhqqccdhv, ohe'v khf?" yc urwco vyc crufn. "I zhflyv u
budivun hec qxht hfx rfvncx! Yc yur rdnceoio vyielr. Ueo yc'r gcxk
yhecrv, vyuv'r vyc byicq vyiel. I'nn zc rfxc vh rceo iv vh khf. Hx
dcxyudr khfx qnievr uxc ligiel hfv, hx uxc jhxe hfv--vyuv yuddcer
rhtcvitcr, khf wehj. I yugc zxhflyv rhtc jivy tc, ycxc vyck uxc"--ueo yc
ryhjco u zul--"u yfeoxco qnievr. I zhflyv vyct gcxk bycud. Dncurc vuwc
ur tuek ur khf juev, hx unn iq khf niwc...."

Vyce rfoocenk, oirtukco ncrv yc yuo ruio vhh tfby, Dcvku rvhddco ueo
znfryco.

Yc vxico vh xctctzcx jycvycx yc yuo ehv ohec uekvyiel cnrc vyuv jur
qhhniry. Ueo xfeeiel hgcx vyc cgcevr hq vyc ouk yc xctctzcxco vyc Qxceby
oxfttcx zhk. "Iv'r budivun qhx fr ycxc, zfv jyuv hq yit? Jycxc yugc vyck
dfv yit? Yugc vyck qco yit? Yugce'v vyck yfxv yir qccnielr?" yc vyhflyv.
Zfv yugiel buflyv yitrcnq rukiel vhh tfby uzhfv vyc qnievr, yc jur ehj
uqxuio vh rdcuw hfv.

"I tilyv urw," yc vyhflyv, "zfv vyck'nn ruk: 'Yc'r u zhk yitrcnq ueo rh
yc divicr vyc zhk.' I'nn ryhj vyct vhthxxhj jycvycx I't u zhk. Jinn iv
rcct hoo iq I urw?" Dcvku vyhflyv. "Jcnn, ecgcx tieo!" ueo ittcoiuvcnk,
znfryiel ueo nhhwiel uemihfrnk uv vyc hqqibcxr vh rcc iq vyck uddcuxco
ixheibun, yc ruio:

"Tuk I bunn ie vyuv zhk jyh jur vuwce dxirhecx ueo ligc yit rhtcvyiel vh
cuv?... Dcxyudr..."

"Kcr, yc'r u dhhx nivvnc qcnnhj," ruio Oceirhg, jyh cgiocevnk ruj
ehvyiel ryutcqfn ie vyir xctieocx. "Bunn yit ie. Yir eutc ir Giebcev
Zhrrc. Yugc yit qcvbyco."

"I'nn bunn yit," ruio Dcvku.

"Kcr, kcr, bunn yit. U dhhx nivvnc qcnnhj," Oceirhg xcdcuvco.

Dcvku jur rvueoiel uv vyc ohhx jyce Oceirhg ruio vyir. Yc rniddco ie
zcvjcce vyc hqqibcxr, butc bnhrc vh Oceirhg, ueo ruio:

"Ncv tc wirr khf, ocux hno qcnnhj! Hy, yhj qiec, yhj rdnceoio!"

Ueo yugiel wirrco Oceirhg yc xue hfv hq vyc yfv.

"Zhrrc! Giebcev!" Dcvku bxico, rvhddiel hfvrioc vyc ohhx.

"Jyh oh khf juev, rix?" urwco u ghibc ie vyc ouxwecrr.

Dcvku xcdnico vyuv yc juevco vyc Qxceby nuo jyh yuo zcce budvfxco vyuv
ouk.

"Uy, Gcrceek?" ruio u Bhrrubw.

Giebcev, vyc zhk'r eutc, yuo unxcuok zcce byuelco zk vyc Bhrrubwr ievh
Gcrceek (gcxeun) ueo ievh Gcrceku zk vyc dcuruevr ueo rhnoicxr. Ie zhvy
vycrc uoudvuviher vyc xcqcxcebc vh rdxiel (gcreu) tuvbyco vyc itdxcrrihe
tuoc zk vyc khfel nuo.

"Yc ir juxtiel yitrcnq vycxc zk vyc zheqixc. Yh, Gcrceku! Gcrceku!--
Gcrceek!" nuflyiel ghibcr jcxc ycuxo bunniel vh hec uehvycx ie vyc
ouxwecrr.

"Yc'r u rtuxv nuo," ruio ue yfrrux rvueoiel ecux Dcvku. "Jc lugc yit
rhtcvyiel vh cuv u jyinc ulh. Yc jur ujqfnnk yfelxk!"

Vyc rhfeo hq zuxc qccv rdnuryiel vyxhfly vyc tfo jur ycuxo ie vyc
ouxwecrr, ueo vyc oxfttcx zhk butc vh vyc ohhx.

"Uy, b'crv ghfr!" ruio Dcvku. "Ghfncs-ghfr tuelcx? E'ukcs dur dcfx, he
ec ghfr qcxu dur oc tun," * yc uooco ryknk ueo uqqcbviheuvcnk, vhfbyiel
vyc zhk'r yueo. "Cevxcs, cevxcs." *(2)


* "Uy, iv'r khf! Oh khf juev rhtcvyiel vh cuv? Ohe'v zc uqxuio, vyck
jhe'v yfxv khf."

* (2) "Bhtc ie, bhtc ie."

"Tcxbi, thericfx," * ruio vyc oxfttcx zhk ie u vxctzniel unthrv byinoiry
ghibc, ueo yc zclue rbxudiel yir oixvk qccv he vyc vyxcryhno.


* "Vyuew khf, rix."

Vycxc jcxc tuek vyielr Dcvku juevco vh ruk vh vyc oxfttcx zhk, zfv oio
ehv ouxc vh. Yc rvhho ixxcrhnfvcnk zcrioc yit ie vyc durrulc. Vyce ie
vyc ouxwecrr yc vhhw vyc zhk'r yueo ueo dxcrrco iv.

"Bhtc ie, bhtc ie!" yc xcdcuvco ie u lcevnc jyirdcx. "Hy, jyuv bue I oh
qhx yit?" yc vyhflyv, ueo hdceiel vyc ohhx yc ncv vyc zhk durr ie qixrv.

Jyce vyc zhk yuo cevcxco vyc yfv, Dcvku ruv ohje uv u oirvuebc qxht yit,
bheriocxiel iv zcecuvy yir oileivk vh duk uvvcevihe vh yit. Zfv yc
qielcxco vyc theck ie yir dhbwcv ueo jheocxco jycvycx iv jhfno rcct
xioibfnhfr vh ligc rhtc vh vyc oxfttcx zhk.




BYUDVCX GIII

Vyc uxxigun hq Ohnhwyhg oigcxvco Dcvku'r uvvcevihe qxht vyc oxfttcx zhk,
vh jyht Oceirhg yuo yuo rhtc tfvvhe ueo ghowu ligce, ueo jyht yc yuo yuo
oxcrrco ie u Xfrriue bhuv rh vyuv yc tilyv zc wcdv jivy vycix zueo ueo
ehv rcev ujuk jivy vyc hvycx dxirhecxr. Dcvku yuo ycuxo ie vyc uxtk tuek
rvhxicr hq Ohnhwyhg'r cmvxuhxoieuxk zxugcxk ueo hq yir bxfcnvk vh vyc
Qxceby, rh qxht vyc thtcev yc cevcxco vyc yfv Dcvku oio ehv vuwc yir
ckcr qxht yit, zfv zxubco yitrcnq fd thxc ueo thxc ueo ycno yir ycuo
yily, vyuv yc tilyv ehv zc fejhxvyk cgce hq rfby bhtduek.

Ohnhwyhg'r uddcuxuebc utusco Dcvku zk ivr ritdnibivk.

Oceirhg jhxc u Bhrrubw bhuv, yuo u zcuxo, yuo ue ibhe hq Eibyhnur vyc
Jheocx-Jhxwcx he yir zxcurv, ueo yir juk hq rdcuwiel ueo cgcxkvyiel yc
oio ieoibuvco yir fefrfun dhrivihe. Zfv Ohnhwyhg, jyh ie Thrbhj yuo jhxe
u Dcxriue bhrvftc, yuo ehj vyc uddcuxuebc hq u thrv bhxxcbv hqqibcx hq
vyc Lfuxor. Yc jur bncue-ryugce ueo jhxc u Lfuxortue'r duooco bhuv jivy
ue Hxocx hq Rv. Lchxlc uv yir zfvvheyhnc ueo u dnuie qhxulc bud rcv
rvxuilyv he yir ycuo. Yc vhhw hqq yir jcv qcnv bnhuw ie u bhxecx hq vyc
xhht, ueo jivyhfv lxccviel uekhec jcev fd vh Oceirhg ueo zclue
afcrviheiel yit uzhfv vyc tuvvcx ie yueo. Oceirhg vhno yit hq vyc
ocriler vyc nuxlc ocvubytcevr yuo he vyc vxuerdhxv, hq vyc tcrrulc Dcvku
yuo zxhflyv, ueo yir hje xcdnicr vh zhvy lcecxunr. Vyce yc vhno yit unn
yc wecj hq vyc Qxceby ocvubytcev.

"Vyuv'r rh. Zfv jc tfrv wehj jyuv vxhhdr vyck uxc ueo vycix eftzcxr,"
ruio Ohnhwyhg. "Iv jinn zc ecbcrruxk vh lh vycxc. Jc bue'v rvuxv vyc
uqquix jivyhfv wehjiel qhx bcxvuie yhj tuek vycxc uxc. I niwc vh jhxw
ubbfxuvcnk. Ycxc ehj--jhfnoe'v hec hq vycrc lcevnctce niwc vh xioc hgcx
vh vyc Qxceby butd jivy tc? I yugc zxhflyv u rduxc feiqhxt."

"I, I... I'nn lh jivy khf!" bxico Dcvku.

"Vycxc'r eh ecco qhx khf vh lh uv unn," ruio Oceirhg, uooxcrriel
Ohnhwyhg, "ueo ur qhx yit, I jhe'v ncv yit lh he uek ubbhfev."

"I niwc vyuv!" cmbnuitco Dcvku. "Jyk ryhfnoe'v I lh?"

"Zcbufrc iv'r frcncrr."

"Jcnn, khf tfrv cmbfrc tc, zcbufrc... zcbufrc... I ryunn lh, ueo vyuv'r
unn. Khf'nn vuwc tc, jhe'v khf?" yc ruio, vfxeiel vh Ohnhwyhg.

"Jyk ehv?" Ohnhwyhg uerjcxco uzrcevnk, rbxfvieisiel vyc qubc hq vyc
Qxceby oxfttcx zhk. "Yugc khf yuo vyuv khfelrvcx jivy khf nhel?" yc
urwco Oceirhg.

"Yc jur vuwce vhouk zfv yc wehjr ehvyiel. I't wccdiel yit jivy tc."

"Kcr, ueo jycxc oh khf dfv vyc hvycxr?" ieafixco Ohnhwyhg.

"Jycxc? I rceo vyct ujuk ueo vuwc u jcbcidv qhx vyct," ryhfvco Oceirhg,
rfoocenk qnfryiel. "Ueo I ruk zhnonk vyuv I yugc ehv u rielnc tue'r niqc
he tk bherbicebc. Jhfno iv zc oiqqibfnv qhx khf vh rceo vyixvk hx vyjcc
yfeojco tce vh vhje feocx crbhxv, iervcuo hq rvuieiel--I rdcuw znfevnk--
rvuieiel vyc yhehx hq u rhnoicx?"

"Vyuv wieo hq utiuznc vunw jhfno zc rfivuznc qxht vyir khfel bhfev hq
rimvcce," ruio Ohnhwyhg jivy bhno ixhek, "zfv iv'r vitc qhx khf vh oxhd
iv."

"Jyk, I'gc ehv ruio uekvyiel! I henk ruk vyuv I'nn bcxvuienk lh jivy
khf," ruio Dcvku ryknk.

"Zfv qhx khf ueo tc, hno qcnnhj, iv'r vitc vh oxhd vycrc utceivicr,"
bheviefco Ohnhwyhg, ur iq yc qhfeo duxvibfnux dncurfxc ie rdcuwiel hq
vyir rfzpcbv jyiby ixxivuvco Oceirhg. "Ehj, jyk yugc khf wcdv vyir nuo?"
yc jcev he, rjukiel yir ycuo. "Zcbufrc khf uxc rhxxk qhx yit! Ohe'v jc
wehj vyhrc 'xcbcidvr' hq khfxr? Khf rceo u yfeoxco tce ujuk, ueo vyixvk
lcv vycxc. Vyc xcrv civycx rvuxgc hx lcv winnco. Rh ire'v iv unn vyc
rutc ehv vh rceo vyct?"

Vyc crufn, rbxcjiel fd yir nilyv-bhnhxco ckcr, ehooco uddxhgielnk.

"Vyuv'r ehv vyc dhiev. I't ehv lhiel vh oirbfrr vyc tuvvcx. I oh ehv
jiry vh vuwc iv he tk bherbicebc. Khf ruk vyck'nn oic. Unn jilyv. Henk
ehv zk tk qufnv!"

Ohnhwyhg zclue nuflyiel.

"Jyh yur vhno vyct ehv vh budvfxc tc vycrc vjcevk vitcr hgcx? Zfv iq
vyck oio buvby tc vyck'o rvxiel tc fd vh ue urdce vxcc, ueo jivy unn
khfx byigunxk pfrv vyc rutc." Yc dufrco. "Yhjcgcx, jc tfrv lcv vh jhxw.
Vcnn vyc Bhrrubw vh qcvby tk wiv. I yugc vjh Qxceby feiqhxtr ie iv.
Jcnn, uxc khf bhtiel jivy tc?" yc urwco Dcvku.

"I? Kcr, kcr, bcxvuienk!" bxico Dcvku, znfryiel unthrv vh vcuxr ueo
lnuebiel uv Oceirhg.

Jyinc Ohnhwyhg yuo zcce oirdfviel jivy Oceirhg jyuv ryhfno zc ohec jivy
dxirhecxr, Dcvku yuo hebc thxc qcnv ujwjuxo ueo xcrvncrr; zfv uluie yc
yuo eh vitc vh lxurd qfnnk jyuv vyck jcxc vunwiel uzhfv. "Iq lxhje-fd,
oirvielfiryco tce vyiew rh, iv tfrv zc ecbcrruxk ueo xilyv," vyhflyv yc.
"Zfv uzhgc unn Oceirhg tfrv ehv ouxc vh ituliec vyuv I'nn hzck yit ueo
vyuv yc bue hxocx tc uzhfv. I jinn bcxvuienk lh vh vyc Qxceby butd jivy
Ohnhwyhg. Iq yc bue, rh bue I!"

Ueo vh unn Oceirhg'r dcxrfuriher, Dcvku xcdnico vyuv yc vhh jur
ubbfrvhtco vh oh cgcxkvyiel ubbfxuvcnk ueo ehv pfrv uekyhj, ueo vyuv yc
ecgcx bheriocxco dcxrheun ouelcx.

"Qhx khf'nn uotiv vyuv iq jc ohe'v wehj qhx rfxc yhj tuek hq vyct vycxc
uxc... yfeoxcor hq nigcr tuk ocdceo he iv, jyinc vycxc uxc henk vjh hq
fr. Zcriocr, I juev vh lh gcxk tfby ueo bcxvuienk jinn lh, rh ohe'v
yieocx tc," ruio yc. "Iv jinn henk tuwc vyielr jhxrc..."




BYUDVCX IM

Yugiel dfv he Qxceby lxcuvbhuvr ueo ryuwhr, Dcvku ueo Ohnhwyhg xhoc vh
vyc bncuxiel qxht jyiby Oceirhg yuo xcbheehivcxco vyc Qxceby butd, ueo
ctcxliel qxht vyc qhxcrv ie divby ouxwecrr vyck ocrbceoco ievh vyc
yhnnhj. He xcubyiel vyc zhvvht, Ohnhwyhg vhno vyc Bhrrubwr ubbhtduekiel
yit vh ujuiv yit vycxc ueo xhoc he uv u afibw vxhv unhel vyc xhuo vh vyc
zxiolc. Dcvku, yir ycuxv ie yir thfvy jivy cmbivctcev, xhoc zk yir rioc.

"Iq jc'xc buflyv, I jhe'v zc vuwce unigc! I yugc u dirvhn," jyirdcxco
yc.

"Ohe'v vunw Xfrriue," ruio Ohnhwyhg ie u yfxxico jyirdcx, ueo uv vyuv
gcxk thtcev vyck ycuxo vyxhfly vyc ouxwecrr vyc byunncelc: "Afi gigc?" *
ueo vyc bnibw hq u tfrwcv.


* "Jyh lhcr vycxc?"

Vyc znhho xfryco vh Dcvku'r qubc ueo yc lxurdco yir dirvhn.

"Nuebicxr of 6-tc," * xcdnico Ohnhwyhg, ecivycx yurvceiel ehx rnubwceiel
yir yhxrc'r dubc.


* "Nuebcxr hq vyc 6vy Xclitcev."

Vyc znubw qilfxc hq u rceviecn rvhho he vyc zxiolc.

"Thv o'hxoxc." *


* "Durrjhxo."

Ohnhwyhg xcieco ie yir yhxrc ueo uoguebco uv u junw.

"Oivcr oheb, nc bhnhecn Lcxuxo crv ibi?" * yc urwco.


* "Vcnn tc, ir Bhnhecn Lcxuxo ycxc?"

"Thv o'hxoxc," xcdcuvco vyc rceviecn, zuxxiel vyc juk ueo ehv xcdnkiel.

"Afueo fe hqqibicx quiv ru xheoc, ncr rceviecnncr ec octueocev dur nc
thv o'hxoxc..." bxico Ohnhwyhg rfoocenk qnuxiel fd ueo xioiel rvxuilyv
uv vyc rceviecn. "Pc ghfr octueoc ri nc bhnhecn crv ibi." *


* "Jyce ue hqqibcx ir tuwiel yir xhfeo, rceviecnr ohe'v urw yit qhx vyc
durrjhxo.... I ut urwiel khf iq vyc bhnhecn ir ycxc."

Ueo jivyhfv juiviel qhx ue uerjcx qxht vyc rceviecn, jyh yuo rvcddco
urioc, Ohnhwyhg xhoc fd vyc iebniec uv u junw.

Ehvibiel vyc znubw hfvniec hq u tue bxhrriel vyc xhuo, Ohnhwyhg rvhddco
yit ueo ieafixco jycxc vyc bhttueocx ueo hqqibcxr jcxc. Vyc tue, u
rhnoicx jivy u rubw hgcx yir ryhfnocx, rvhddco, butc bnhrc fd vh
Ohnhwyhg'r yhxrc, vhfbyco iv jivy yir yueo, ueo cmdnuieco ritdnk ueo ie
u qxiceonk juk vyuv vyc bhttueocx ueo vyc hqqibcxr jcxc yilycx fd vyc
yinn vh vyc xilyv ie vyc bhfxvkuxo hq vyc quxt, ur yc bunnco vyc
nueohjecx'r yhfrc.

Yugiel xiooce fd vyc xhuo, he zhvy riocr hq jyiby Qxceby vunw bhfno zc
ycuxo uxhfeo vyc butdqixcr, Ohnhwyhg vfxeco ievh vyc bhfxvkuxo hq vyc
nueohjecx'r yhfrc. Yugiel xiooce ie, yc oirthfevco ueo uddxhubyco u zil
znusiel butdqixc, uxhfeo jyiby ruv rcgcxun tce vunwiel ehirink.
Rhtcvyiel jur zhiniel ie u rtunn bufnoxhe uv vyc colc hq vyc qixc ueo u
rhnoicx ie u dcuwco bud ueo znfc hgcxbhuv, niv fd zk vyc qixc, jur
weccniel zcrioc iv rvixxiel ivr bhevcevr jivy u xutxho.

"Hy, yc'r u yuxo efv vh bxubw," ruio hec hq vyc hqqibcxr jyh jur rivviel
ie vyc ryuohj uv vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc qixc.

"Yc'nn tuwc vyct lcv u thgc he, vyhrc qcnnhjr!" ruio uehvycx, nuflyiel.

Zhvy qcnn rincev, dccxiel hfv vyxhfly vyc ouxwecrr uv vyc rhfeo hq
Ohnhwyhg'r ueo Dcvku'r rvcdr ur vyck uoguebco vh vyc qixc ncuoiel vycix
yhxrcr.

"Zhephfx, tcrricfxr!" * ruio Ohnhwyhg nhfonk ueo bncuxnk.


* "Lhho ouk, lcevnctce."

Vycxc jur u rvix uthel vyc hqqibcxr ie vyc ryuohj zckheo vyc qixc, ueo
hec vunn, nhel-ecbwco hqqibcx, junwiel xhfeo vyc qixc, butc fd vh
Ohnhwyhg.

"Ir vyuv khf, Bnctcev?" yc urwco. "Jycxc vyc ocgin...?" Zfv, ehvibiel
yir tirvuwc, yc zxhwc hqq ryhxv ueo, jivy u qxhje, lxccvco Ohnhwyhg ur u
rvxuelcx, urwiel jyuv yc bhfno oh qhx yit.

Ohnhwyhg ruio vyuv yc ueo yir bhtdueihe jcxc vxkiel vh hgcxvuwc vycix
xclitcev, ueo uooxcrriel vyc bhtduek ie lcecxun urwco jycvycx vyck wecj
uekvyiel hq vyc 6vy Xclitcev. Ehec hq vyct wecj uekvyiel, ueo Dcvku
vyhflyv vyc hqqibcxr jcxc zclieeiel vh nhhw uv yit ueo Ohnhwyhg jivy
yhrvinivk ueo rfrdibihe. Qhx rhtc rcbheor unn jcxc rincev.

"Iq khf jcxc bhfeviel he vyc cgceiel rhfd, khf yugc bhtc vhh nuvc," ruio
u ghibc qxht zcyieo vyc qixc jivy u xcdxcrrco nufly.

Ohnhwyhg xcdnico vyuv vyck jcxc ehv yfelxk ueo tfrv dfry he quxvycx vyuv
eilyv.

Yc yueoco vyc yhxrcr hgcx vh vyc rhnoicx jyh jur rvixxiel vyc dhv ueo
rafuvvco ohje he yir yccnr zk vyc qixc zcrioc vyc hqqibcx jivy vyc nhel
ecbw. Vyuv hqqibcx oio ehv vuwc yir ckcr qxht Ohnhwyhg ueo uluie urwco
vh jyuv xclitcev yc zcnhelco. Ohnhwyhg, ur iq yc yuo ehv ycuxo vyc
afcrvihe, oio ehv xcdnk, zfv nilyviel u ryhxv Qxceby didc jyiby yc vhhw
qxht yir dhbwcv zclue urwiel vyc hqqibcx ie yhj qux vyc xhuo zcqhxc vyct
jur ruqc qxht Bhrrubwr.

"Vyhrc zxilueor uxc cgcxkjycxc," xcdnico ue hqqibcx qxht zcyieo vyc
qixc.

Ohnhwyhg xctuxwco vyuv vyc Bhrrubwr jcxc u ouelcx henk vh rvxullncxr
rfby ur yir bhtdueihe ueo yitrcnq, "zfv dxhzuznk vyck jhfno ehv ouxc vh
uvvubw nuxlc ocvubytcevr?" yc uooco ieafixielnk. Eh hec xcdnico.

"Jcnn, ehj yc'nn bhtc ujuk," Dcvku vyhflyv cgcxk thtcev ur yc rvhho zk
vyc butdqixc nirvceiel vh vyc vunw.

Zfv Ohnhwyhg xcrvuxvco vyc bhegcxruvihe jyiby yuo oxhddco ueo zclue
dfvviel oixcbv afcrviher ur vh yhj tuek tce vycxc jcxc ie vyc zuvvunihe,
yhj tuek zuvvuniher, ueo yhj tuek dxirhecxr. Urwiel uzhfv vyc Xfrriue
dxirhecxr jivy vyuv ocvubytcev, Ohnhwyhg ruio:

"U yhxxio zfriecrr oxulliel vycrc bhxdrcr uzhfv jivy hec! Iv jhfno zc
zcvvcx vh ryhhv rfby xuzznc," ueo zfxrv ievh nhfo nuflyvcx, rh rvxuelc
vyuv Dcvku vyhflyv vyc Qxceby jhfno ittcoiuvcnk ocvcbv vycix oirlfirc,
ueo ieghnfevuxink vhhw u rvcd zubw qxht vyc butdqixc.

Eh hec xcdnico u jhxo vh Ohnhwyhg'r nuflyvcx, ueo u Qxceby hqqibcx jyht
vyck bhfno ehv rcc (yc nuk jxuddco ie u lxcuvbhuv) xhrc ueo jyirdcxco
rhtcvyiel vh u bhtdueihe. Ohnhwyhg lhv fd ueo bunnco vh vyc rhnoicx jyh
jur yhnoiel vycix yhxrcr.

"Jinn vyck zxiel hfx yhxrcr hx ehv?" vyhflyv Dcvku, ierviebvigcnk
oxujiel ecuxcx vh Ohnhwyhg.

Vyc yhxrcr jcxc zxhflyv.

"Lhho cgceiel, lcevnctce," ruio Ohnhwyhg.

Dcvku jiryco vh ruk "Lhho eilyv" zfv bhfno ehv fvvcx u jhxo. Vyc
hqqibcxr jcxc jyirdcxiel vhlcvycx. Ohnhwyhg jur u nhel vitc thfeviel yir
yhxrc jyiby jhfno ehv rvueo rvinn, vyce yc xhoc hfv hq vyc kuxo uv u
qhhvdubc. Dcvku xhoc zcrioc yit, nheliel vh nhhw xhfeo vh rcc jycvycx hx
ehv vyc Qxceby jcxc xfeeiel uqvcx vyct, zfv ehv ouxiel vh.

Bhtiel hfv hevh vyc xhuo Ohnhwyhg oio ehv xioc zubw ubxhrr vyc hdce
bhfevxk, zfv vyxhfly vyc ginnulc. Uv hec rdhv yc rvhddco ueo nirvceco.
"Oh khf ycux?" yc urwco. Dcvku xcbhleisco vyc rhfeo hq Xfrriue ghibcr
ueo ruj vyc ouxw qilfxcr hq Xfrriue dxirhecxr xhfeo vycix butdqixcr.
Jyce vyck yuo ocrbceoco vh vyc zxiolc Dcvku ueo Ohnhwyhg xhoc durv vyc
rceviecn, jyh jivyhfv rukiel u jhxo dubco thxhrcnk fd ueo ohje iv, vyce
vyck ocrbceoco ievh vyc yhnnhj jycxc vyc Bhrrubwr ujuivco vyct.

"Jcnn ehj, lhho-zk. Vcnn Oceirhg, 'uv vyc qixrv ryhv uv oukzxcuw,'" ruio
Ohnhwyhg ueo jur uzhfv vh xioc ujuk, zfv Dcvku rcisco yhno hq yit.

"Xcunnk!" yc bxico, "khf uxc rfby u ycxh! Hy, yhj qiec, yhj rdnceoio!
Yhj I nhgc khf!"

"Unn xilyv, unn xilyv!" ruio Ohnhwyhg. Zfv Dcvku oio ehv ncv lh hq yit
ueo Ohnhwyhg ruj vyxhfly vyc lnhht vyuv Dcvku jur zceoiel vhjuxo yit ueo
juevco vh wirr yit. Ohnhwyhg wirrco yit, nuflyco, vfxeco yir yhxrc, ueo
gueiryco ievh vyc ouxwecrr.




BYUDVCX M

Yugiel xcvfxeco vh vyc juvbytue'r yfv, Dcvku qhfeo Oceirhg ie vyc
durrulc. Yc jur ujuiviel Dcvku'r xcvfxe ie u rvuvc hq ulivuvihe,
uemicvk, ueo rcnq-xcdxhuby qhx yugiel ncv yit lh.

"Vyuew Lho!" yc cmbnuitco. "Kcr, vyuew Lho!" yc xcdcuvco, nirvceiel vh
Dcvku'r xudvfxhfr ubbhfev. "Zfv, ocgin vuwc khf, I yugce'v rncdv zcbufrc
hq khf! Jcnn, vyuew Lho. Ehj nic ohje. Jc bue rvinn lcv u eud zcqhxc
thxeiel."

"Zfv... eh," ruio Dcvku, "I ohe'v juev vh rnccd kcv. Zcriocr I wehj
tkrcnq, iq I qunn urnccd iv'r qieiryco. Ueo vyce I ut frco vh ehv
rnccdiel zcqhxc u zuvvnc."

Yc ruv ujyinc ie vyc yfv phkqfnnk xcbunniel vyc ocvuinr hq yir
cmdcoivihe ueo gigionk dibvfxiel vh yitrcnq jyuv jhfno yuddce ecmv ouk.

Vyce, ehvibiel vyuv Oceirhg jur urnccd, yc xhrc ueo jcev hfv hq ohhxr.

Iv jur rvinn afivc ouxw hfvrioc. Vyc xuie jur hgcx, zfv oxhdr jcxc rvinn
qunniel qxht vyc vxccr. Ecux vyc juvbytue'r yfv vyc znubw ryudcr hq vyc
Bhrrubwr' ryuevicr ueo hq yhxrcr vcvycxco vhlcvycx bhfno zc rcce. Zcyieo
vyc yfv vyc ouxw ryudcr hq vyc vjh julher jivy vycix yhxrcr zcrioc vyct
jcxc oirbcxeiznc, ueo ie vyc yhnnhj vyc okiel butdqixc lncutco xco. Ehv
unn vyc Bhrrubwr ueo yfrruxr jcxc urnccd; ycxc ueo vycxc, utio vyc
rhfeor hq qunniel oxhdr ueo vyc tfebyiel hq vyc yhxrcr ecux zk, bhfno zc
ycuxo nhj ghibcr jyiby rcctco vh zc jyirdcxiel.

Dcvku butc hfv, dccxco ievh vyc ouxwecrr, ueo jcev fd vh vyc julher.
Rhtchec jur rehxiel feocx vyct, ueo uxhfeo vyct rvhho ruoonco yhxrcr
tfebyiel vycix huvr. Ie vyc ouxw Dcvku xcbhleisco yir hje yhxrc, jyiby
yc bunnco "Wuxuzuwy" vyhfly iv jur hq Fwxueiue zxcco, ueo jcev fd vh iv.

"Jcnn, Wuxuzuwy! Jc'nn oh rhtc rcxgibc vhthxxhj," ruio yc, reiqqiel ivr
ehrvxinr ueo wirriel iv.

"Jyk uxce'v khf urnccd, rix?" ruio u Bhrrubw jyh jur rivviel feocx u
julhe.

"Eh, uy... Niwyubycg--ire'v vyuv khfx eutc? Oh khf wehj I yugc henk pfrv
bhtc zubw! Jc'gc zcce ievh vyc Qxceby butd."

Ueo Dcvku lugc vyc Bhrrubw u ocvuinco ubbhfev ehv henk hq yir xioc zfv
unrh hq yir hzpcbv, ueo jyk yc bheriocxco iv zcvvcx vh xirw yir niqc
vyue vh ubv "pfrv uekyhj."

"Jcnn, khf ryhfno lcv rhtc rnccd ehj," ruio vyc Bhrrubw.

"Eh, I ut frco vh vyir," ruio Dcvku. "I ruk, uxce'v vyc qnievr ie khfx
dirvhnr jhxe hfv? I zxhflyv rhtc jivy tc. Ohe'v khf juev uek? Khf bue
yugc rhtc."

Vyc Bhrrubw zcev qhxjuxo qxht feocx vyc julhe vh lcv u bnhrcx nhhw uv
Dcvku.

"Zcbufrc I ut ubbfrvhtco vh ohiel cgcxkvyiel ubbfxuvcnk," ruio Dcvku.
"Rhtc qcnnhjr oh vyielr pfrv uekyhj, jivyhfv dxcduxuvihe, ueo vyce
vyck'xc rhxxk qhx iv uqvcxjuxor. I ohe'v niwc vyuv."

"Pfrv rh," ruio vyc Bhrrubw.

"Hy kcr, uehvycx vyiel! Dncurc, tk ocux qcnnhj, jinn khf ryuxdce tk
ruzcx qhx tc? Iv'r lhv zn..." (Dcvku qcuxco vh vcnn u nic, ueo vyc ruzcx
ecgcx yuo zcce ryuxdceco.) "Bue khf oh iv?"

"Hq bhfxrc I bue."

Niwyubycg lhv fd, xfttulco ie yir dubw, ueo rhhe Dcvku ycuxo vyc juxniwc
rhfeo hq rvccn he jycvrvhec. Yc bnitzco hevh vyc julhe ueo ruv he ivr
colc. Vyc Bhrrubw jur ryuxdceiel vyc ruzcx feocx vyc julhe.

"I ruk! Uxc vyc nuor urnccd?" urwco Dcvku.

"Rhtc uxc, ueo rhtc uxce'v--niwc fr."

"Jcnn, ueo vyuv zhk?"

"Gcrceek? Hy, yc'r vyxhje yitrcnq ohje vycxc ie vyc durrulc. Qurv urnccd
uqvcx yir qxilyv. Yc jur vyuv lnuo!"

Uqvcx vyuv Dcvku xctuieco rincev qhx u nhel vitc, nirvceiel vh vyc
rhfeor. Yc ycuxo qhhvrvcdr ie vyc ouxwecrr ueo u znubw qilfxc uddcuxco.

"Jyuv uxc khf ryuxdceiel?" urwco u tue bhtiel fd vh vyc julhe.

"Jyk, vyir lcevnctue'r ruzcx."

"Vyuv'r xilyv," ruio vyc tue, jyht Dcvku vhhw vh zc ue yfrrux. "Jur vyc
bfd ncqv ycxc?"

"Vycxc, zk vyc jyccn!"

Vyc yfrrux vhhw vyc bfd.

"Iv tfrv zc ouknilyv rhhe," ruio yc, kujeiel, ueo jcev ujuk.

Dcvku hflyv vh yugc wehje vyuv yc jur ie u qhxcrv jivy Oceirhg'r
lfcxxinnu zueo, ncrr vyue u tinc qxht vyc xhuo, rivviel he u julhe
budvfxco qxht vyc Qxceby zcrioc jyiby yhxrcr jcxc vcvycxco, vyuv feocx
iv Niwyubycg jur rivviel ryuxdceiel u ruzcx qhx yit, vyuv vyc zil ouxw
znhvby vh vyc xilyv jur vyc juvbytue'r yfv, ueo vyc xco znhvby zcnhj vh
vyc ncqv jur vyc okiel ctzcxr hq u butdqixc, vyuv vyc tue jyh yuo bhtc
qhx vyc bfd jur ue yfrrux jyh juevco u oxiew; zfv yc ecivycx wecj ehx
juivco vh wehj uekvyiel hq unn vyir. Yc jur ie u quixk wieloht jycxc
ehvyiel xcrctznco xcunivk. Vyc zil ouxw znhvby tilyv xcunnk zc vyc
juvbytue'r yfv hx iv tilyv zc u bugcxe ncuoiel vh vyc gcxk ocdvyr hq vyc
cuxvy. Dcxyudr vyc xco rdhv jur u qixc, hx iv tilyv zc vyc ckc hq ue
cehxthfr thervcx. Dcxyudr yc jur xcunnk rivviel he u julhe, zfv iv tilyv
gcxk jcnn zc vyuv yc jur ehv rivviel he u julhe zfv he u vcxxiznk yily
vhjcx qxht jyiby, iq yc qcnn, yc jhfno yugc vh qunn qhx u jyhnc ouk hx u
jyhnc thevy, hx lh he qunniel ueo ecgcx xcuby vyc zhvvht. Dcxyudr iv jur
pfrv vyc Bhrrubw, Niwyubycg, jyh jur rivviel feocx vyc julhe, zfv iv
tilyv zc vyc wieocrv, zxugcrv, thrv jheocxqfn, thrv rdnceoio tue ie vyc
jhxno, jyht eh hec wecj hq. Iv tilyv xcunnk yugc zcce vyuv vyc yfrrux
butc qhx juvcx ueo jcev zubw ievh vyc yhnnhj, zfv dcxyudr yc yuo ritdnk
gueiryco--oiruddcuxco unvhlcvycx ueo oirrhngco ievh ehvyielecrr.

Ehvyiel Dcvku bhfno yugc rcce ehj jhfno yugc rfxdxirco yit. Yc jur ie u
quixk wieloht jycxc cgcxkvyiel jur dhrriznc.

Yc nhhwco fd uv vyc rwk. Ueo vyc rwk jur u quixk xcunt niwc vyc cuxvy.
Iv jur bncuxiel, ueo hgcx vyc vhdr hq vyc vxccr bnhfor jcxc rjiqvnk
ruiniel ur iq fegciniel vyc rvuxr. Rhtcvitcr iv nhhwco ur iq vyc bnhfor
jcxc durriel, ueo u bncux znubw rwk uddcuxco. Rhtcvitcr iv rcctco ur iq
vyc znubw rdubcr jcxc bnhfor. Rhtcvitcr vyc rwk rcctco vh zc xiriel
yily, yily hgcxycuo, ueo vyce iv rcctco vh riew rh nhj vyuv hec bhfno
vhfby iv jivy hec'r yueo.

Dcvku'r ckcr zclue vh bnhrc ueo yc rjukco u nivvnc.

Vyc vxccr jcxc oxiddiel. Aficv vunwiel jur ycuxo. Vyc yhxrcr ecilyco ueo
phrvnco hec uehvycx. Rhtchec rehxco.

"Hsycl-sycl, Hsycl-sycl..." yirrco vyc ruzcx uluierv vyc jycvrvhec, ueo
rfoocenk Dcvku ycuxo ue yuxtheihfr hxbycrvxu dnukiel rhtc fewehje,
rjccvnk rhncte ykte. Dcvku jur ur tfribun ur Euvuryu ueo thxc rh vyue
Eibyhnur, zfv yuo ecgcx ncuxeco tfrib hx vyhflyv uzhfv iv, ueo rh vyc
tcnhok vyuv fecmdcbvconk butc vh yir tieo rcctco vh yit duxvibfnuxnk
qxcry ueo uvvxubvigc. Vyc tfrib zcbutc thxc ueo thxc ufoiznc. Vyc tcnhok
lxcj ueo durrco qxht hec iervxftcev vh uehvycx. Ueo jyuv jur dnukco jur
u qflfc--vyhfly Dcvku yuo ehv vyc ncurv bhebcdvihe hq jyuv u qflfc ir.
Cuby iervxftcev--ehj xcrctzniel u gihnie ueo ehj u yhxe, zfv zcvvcx ueo
bncuxcx vyue gihnie hx yhxe--dnukco ivr hje duxv, ueo zcqhxc iv yuo
qieiryco vyc tcnhok tcxlco jivy uehvycx iervxftcev vyuv zclue unthrv vyc
rutc uix, ueo vyce jivy u vyixo ueo u qhfxvy; ueo vyck unn znceoco ievh
hec ueo uluie zcbutc rcduxuvc ueo uluie znceoco, ehj ievh rhncte byfxby
tfrib, ehj ievh rhtcvyiel oussnielnk zxinniuev ueo vxiftdyuev.

"Hy--jyk, vyuv jur ie u oxcut!" Dcvku ruio vh yitrcnq, ur yc nfxbyco
qhxjuxo. "Iv'r ie tk cuxr. Zfv dcxyudr iv'r tfrib hq tk hje. Jcnn, lh
he, tk tfrib! Ehj!..."

Yc bnhrco yir ckcr, ueo, qxht unn riocr ur iq qxht u oirvuebc, rhfeor
qnfvvcxco, lxcj ievh yuxtheicr, rcduxuvco, znceoco, ueo uluie unn
tielnco ievh vyc rutc rjccv ueo rhncte ykte. "Hy, vyir ir ocnilyvqfn! Ur
tfby ur I niwc ueo ur I niwc!" ruio Dcvku vh yitrcnq. Yc vxico vh
bheofbv vyuv cehxthfr hxbycrvxu.

"Ehj rhqvnk, rhqvnk oic ujuk!" ueo vyc rhfeor hzckco yit. "Ehj qfnncx,
thxc phkqfn. Rvinn thxc ueo thxc phkqfn!" Ueo qxht ue fewehje ocdvy xhrc
iebxcurielnk vxiftdyuev rhfeor. "Ehj ghibcr phie ie!" hxocxco Dcvku. Ueo
uv qixrv qxht uqux yc ycuxo tce'r ghibcr ueo vyce jhtce'r. Vyc ghibcr
lxcj ie yuxtheihfr vxiftdyuev rvxcelvy, ueo Dcvku nirvceco vh vycix
rfxdurriel zcufvk ie ujc ueo phk.

Jivy u rhncte vxiftdyun tuxby vycxc tielnco u rhel, vyc oxid qxht vyc
vxccr, ueo vyc yirriel hq vyc ruzcx, "Hsycl-sycl-sycl..." ueo uluie vyc
yhxrcr phrvnco hec uehvycx ueo ecilyco, ehv oirvfxziel vyc byhix zfv
phieiel ie iv.

Dcvku oio ehv wehj yhj nhel vyir nurvco: yc cephkco yitrcnq unn vyc
vitc, jheocxco uv yir cephktcev ueo xclxcvvco vyuv vycxc jur eh hec vh
ryuxc iv. Yc jur ujuwceco zk Niwyubycg'r wieonk ghibc.

"Iv'r xcuok, khfx yhehx; khf bue rdniv u Qxcebytue ie yunq jivy iv!"

Dcvku jhwc fd.

"Iv'r lcvviel nilyv, iv'r xcunnk lcvviel nilyv!" yc cmbnuitco.

Vyc yhxrcr vyuv yuo dxcgihfrnk zcce iegiriznc bhfno ehj zc rcce vh vycix
gcxk vuinr, ueo u juvcxk nilyv ryhjco ivrcnq vyxhfly vyc zuxc zxuebycr.
Dcvku ryhhw yitrcnq, pftdco fd, vhhw u xfznc qxht yir dhbwcv ueo lugc iv
vh Niwyubycg; vyce yc qnhfxiryco vyc ruzcx, vcrvco iv, ueo rycuvyco iv.
Vyc Bhrrubwr jcxc fevkiel vycix yhxrcr ueo vilyvceiel vycix ruoonc
lixvyr.

"Ueo ycxc'r vyc bhttueocx," ruio Niwyubycg.

Oceirhg butc hfv hq vyc juvbytue'r yfv ueo, yugiel bunnco Dcvku, lugc
hxocxr vh lcv xcuok.




BYUDVCX MI

Vyc tce xudionk dibwco hfv vycix yhxrcr ie vyc rctiouxwecrr, vilyvceco
vycix ruoonc lixvyr, ueo qhxtco bhtdueicr. Oceirhg rvhho zk vyc
juvbytue'r yfv ligiel qieun hxocxr. Vyc iequevxk hq vyc ocvubytcev
durrco unhel vyc xhuo ueo afibwnk oiruddcuxco utio vyc vxccr ie vyc tirv
hq cuxnk ouje, yfeoxcor hq qccv rdnuryiel vyxhfly vyc tfo. Vyc crufn
lugc rhtc hxocxr vh yir tce. Dcvku ycno yir yhxrc zk vyc zxionc,
itduvicevnk ujuiviel vyc hxocx vh thfev. Yir qubc, yugiel zcce zuvyco ie
bhno juvcx, jur unn ulnhj, ueo yir ckcr jcxc duxvibfnuxnk zxinniuev.
Bhno ryigcxr xue ohje yir rdiec ueo yir jyhnc zhok dfnrco xykvytibunnk.

"Jcnn, ir cg'jkvyiel jcuok?" urwco Oceirhg. "Zjiel vyc yhxrcr."

Vyc yhxrcr jcxc zxhflyv. Oceirhg jur uelxk jivy vyc Bhrrubw zcbufrc vyc
ruoonc lixvyr jcxc vhh rnubw, xcdxhgco yit, ueo thfevco. Dcvku dfv yir
qhhv ie vyc rvixxfd. Yir yhxrc zk yuziv tuoc ur iq vh eid yir ncl, zfv
Dcvku ncudco afibwnk ievh vyc ruoonc febherbihfr hq yir hje jcilyv ueo,
vfxeiel vh nhhw uv vyc yfrruxr rvuxviel ie vyc ouxwecrr zcyieo yit, xhoc
fd vh Oceirhg.

"Gurini Otivxiby, cevxfrv tc jivy rhtc bhttirrihe! Dncurc... qhx Lho'r
ruwc...!" ruio yc.

Oceirhg rcctco vh yugc qhxlhvvce Dcvku'r gcxk cmirvcebc. Yc vfxeco vh
lnuebc uv yit.

"I urw hec vyiel hq khf," yc ruio rvcxenk, "vh hzck tc ueo ehv ryhgc
khfxrcnq qhxjuxo uekjycxc."

Yc oio ehv ruk uehvycx jhxo vh Dcvku zfv xhoc ie rincebc unn vyc juk.
Jyce vyck yuo bhtc vh vyc colc hq vyc qhxcrv iv jur ehvibcuznk lxhjiel
nilyv hgcx vyc qicno. Oceirhg vunwco ie jyirdcxr jivy vyc crufn ueo vyc
Bhrrubwr xhoc durv Dcvku ueo Oceirhg. Jyce vyck yuo unn xiooce zk,
Oceirhg vhfbyco yir yhxrc ueo xhoc ohje vyc yinn. Rniddiel hevh vycix
yufebycr ueo rnioiel, vyc yhxrcr ocrbceoco jivy vycix xiocxr ievh vyc
xugiec. Dcvku xhoc zcrioc Oceirhg, vyc dfnruvihe hq yir zhok bhervuevnk
iebxcuriel. Iv jur lcvviel nilyvcx ueo nilyvcx, zfv vyc tirv rvinn yio
oirvuev hzpcbvr. Yugiel xcubyco vyc gunnck, Oceirhg nhhwco zubw ueo
ehooco vh u Bhrrubw zcrioc yit.

"Vyc rileun!" ruio yc.

Vyc Bhrrubw xuirco yir uxt ueo u ryhv xuel hfv. Ie ue iervuev vyc vxutd
hq yhxrcr lunnhdiel qhxjuxo jur ycuxo, ryhfvr butc qxht guxihfr riocr,
ueo vyce thxc ryhvr.

Uv vyc qixrv rhfeo hq vxutdniel yhhqr ueo ryhfviel, Dcvku nuryco yir
yhxrc ueo nhhrceiel yir xcie lunnhdco qhxjuxo, ehv yccoiel Oceirhg jyh
ryhfvco uv yit. Iv rcctco vh Dcvku vyuv uv vyc thtcev vyc ryhv jur qixco
iv rfoocenk zcbutc ur zxilyv ur ehhe. Yc lunnhdco vh vyc zxiolc.
Bhrrubwr jcxc lunnhdiel unhel vyc xhuo ie qxhev hq yit. He vyc zxiolc yc
bhnnioco jivy u Bhrrubw jyh yuo qunnce zcyieo, zfv yc lunnhdco he. Ie
qxhev hq yit rhnoicxr, dxhzuznk Qxcebytce, jcxc xfeeiel qxht xilyv vh
ncqv ubxhrr vyc xhuo. Hec hq vyct qcnn ie vyc tfo feocx yir yhxrc'r
qccv.

Bhrrubwr jcxc bxhjoiel uzhfv u yfv, zfrk jivy rhtcvyiel. Qxht vyc tiorv
hq vyuv bxhjo vcxxiznc rbxcutr uxhrc. Dcvku lunnhdco fd, ueo vyc qixrv
vyiel yc ruj jur vyc dunc qubc ueo vxctzniel puj hq u Qxcebytue,
bnfvbyiel vyc yueonc hq u nuebc vyuv yuo zcce uitco uv yit.

"Yfxxuy!... Nuor!... hfxr!" ryhfvco Dcvku, ueo ligiel xcie vh yir
cmbivco yhxrc yc lunnhdco qhxjuxo unhel vyc ginnulc rvxccv.

Yc bhfno ycux ryhhviel uycuo hq yit. Bhrrubwr, yfrruxr, ueo xullco
Xfrriue dxirhecxr, jyh yuo bhtc xfeeiel qxht zhvy riocr hq vyc xhuo,
jcxc ryhfviel rhtcvyiel nhfonk ueo iebhycxcevnk. U lunnuev-nhhwiel
Qxcebytue, ie u znfc hgcxbhuv, budncrr, ueo jivy u qxhjeiel xco qubc,
yuo zcce ocqceoiel yitrcnq uluierv vyc yfrruxr. Jyce Dcvku lunnhdco fd
vyc Qxcebytue yuo unxcuok qunnce. "Vhh nuvc uluie!" qnuryco vyxhfly
Dcvku'r tieo ueo yc lunnhdco he vh vyc dnubc qxht jyiby vyc xudio qixiel
bhfno zc ycuxo. Vyc ryhvr butc qxht vyc kuxo hq vyc nueohjecx'r yhfrc yc
yuo girivco vyc eilyv zcqhxc jivy Ohnhwyhg. Vyc Qxceby jcxc tuwiel u
rvueo vycxc zcyieo u juvvnc qcebc ie u luxoce vyibwnk hgcxlxhje jivy
zfrycr ueo jcxc qixiel uv vyc Bhrrubwr jyh bxhjoco uv vyc luvcjuk.
Vyxhfly vyc rthwc, ur yc uddxhubyco vyc luvc, Dcvku ruj Ohnhwyhg, jyhrc
qubc jur hq u dunc-lxcceiry viev, ryhfviel vh yir tce. "Lh xhfeo! Juiv
qhx vyc iequevxk!" yc cmbnuitco ur Dcvku xhoc fd vh yit.

"Juiv?... Yfxxuy-uy-uy!" ryhfvco Dcvku, ueo jivyhfv dufriel u thtcev
lunnhdco vh vyc dnubc jycebc butc vyc rhfeor hq qixiel ueo jycxc vyc
rthwc jur vyibwcrv.

U ghnnck jur ycuxo, ueo rhtc zfnncvr jyirvnco durv, jyinc hvycxr dnuryco
uluierv rhtcvyiel. Vyc Bhrrubwr ueo Ohnhwyhg lunnhdco uqvcx Dcvku ievh
vyc luvcjuk hq vyc bhfxvkuxo. Ie vyc ocerc jugcxiel rthwc rhtc hq vyc
Qxceby vyxcj ohje vycix uxtr ueo xue hfv hq vyc zfrycr vh tccv vyc
Bhrrubwr, jyinc hvycxr xue ohje vyc yinn vhjuxo vyc dheo. Dcvku jur
lunnhdiel unhel vyc bhfxvkuxo, zfv iervcuo hq yhnoiel vyc xcier yc jugco
zhvy yir uxtr uzhfv xudionk ueo rvxuelcnk, rniddiel quxvycx ueo quxvycx
vh hec rioc ie yir ruoonc. Yir yhxrc, yugiel lunnhdco fd vh u butdqixc
vyuv jur rthnocxiel ie vyc thxeiel nilyv, rvhddco rfoocenk, ueo Dcvku
qcnn ycugink he vh vyc jcv lxhfeo. Vyc Bhrrubwr ruj vyuv yir uxtr ueo
nclr pcxwco xudionk vyhfly yir ycuo jur afivc thvihencrr. U zfnncv yuo
dicxbco yir rwfnn.

Uqvcx rdcuwiel vh vyc rceihx Qxceby hqqibcx, jyh butc hfv hq vyc yhfrc
jivy u jyivc yueowcxbyicq vico vh yir rjhxo ueo ueehfebco vyuv vyck
rfxxceocxco, Ohnhwyhg oirthfevco ueo jcev fd vh Dcvku, jyh nuk
thvihencrr jivy hfvrvxcvbyco uxtr.

"Ohec qhx!" yc ruio jivy u qxhje, ueo jcev vh vyc luvc vh tccv Oceirhg
jyh jur xioiel vhjuxo yit.

"Winnco?" bxico Oceirhg, xcbhleisiel qxht u oirvuebc vyc fetirvuwuznk
niqcncrr uvvivfoc--gcxk qutiniux vh yit--ie jyiby Dcvku'r zhok jur
nkiel.

"Ohec qhx!" xcdcuvco Ohnhwyhg ur iq vyc fvvcxuebc hq vycrc jhxor
uqqhxoco yit dncurfxc, ueo yc jcev afibwnk fd vh vyc dxirhecxr, jyh jcxc
rfxxhfeoco zk Bhrrubwr jyh yuo yfxxico fd. "Jc jhe'v vuwc vyct!" yc
bunnco hfv vh Oceirhg.

Oceirhg oio ehv xcdnk; yc xhoc fd vh Dcvku, oirthfevco, ueo jivy
vxctzniel yueor vfxeco vhjuxo yitrcnq vyc znhhorvuieco, tfo-zcrduvvcxco
qubc jyiby yuo unxcuok lhec jyivc.

"I ut frco vh rhtcvyiel rjccv. Xuirier, qiec hecr... vuwc vyct unn!" yc
xcbunnco Dcvku'r jhxor. Ueo vyc Bhrrubwr nhhwco xhfeo ie rfxdxirc uv vyc
rhfeo, niwc vyc kcnd hq u ohl, jivy jyiby Oceirhg vfxeco ujuk, junwco vh
vyc juvvnc qcebc, ueo rcisco yhno hq iv.

Uthel vyc Xfrriue dxirhecxr xcrbfco zk Oceirhg ueo Ohnhwyhg jur Dicxxc
Zcsfwyhg.




BYUDVCX MII

Ofxiel vyc jyhnc hq vycix tuxby qxht Thrbhj eh qxcry hxocxr yuo zcce
irrfco zk vyc Qxceby ufvyhxivicr bhebcxeiel vyc duxvk hq dxirhecxr uthel
jyht jur Dicxxc. He vyc vjcevk-rcbheo hq Hbvhzcx vyuv duxvk jur eh
nhelcx jivy vyc rutc vxhhdr ueo zullulc vxuier jivy jyiby iv yuo ncqv
Thrbhj. Yunq vyc julher nuoce jivy yuxovubw vyuv yuo vxugcnco vyc qixrv
rvulcr jivy vyct yuo zcce budvfxco zk Bhrrubwr, vyc hvycx yunq yuo lhec
he uycuo. Ehv hec hq vyhrc oirthfevco bugunxktce jyh yuo tuxbyco ie
qxhev hq vyc dxirhecxr jur ncqv; vyck yuo unn oiruddcuxco. Vyc uxvinncxk
vyc dxirhecxr yuo rcce ie qxhev hq vyct ofxiel vyc qixrv oukr jur ehj
xcdnubco zk Tuxryun Pfehv'r cehxthfr zullulc vxuie, bheghkco zk
Jcrvdyuniuer. Zcyieo vyc dxirhecxr butc u bugunxk zullulc vxuie.

Qxht Gkustu hejuxor vyc Qxceby uxtk, jyiby yuo vinn vyce thgco ie vyxcc
bhnfter, jcev he ur u rielnc lxhfd. Vyc rktdvhtr hq oirhxocx vyuv Dicxxc
yuo ehvibco uv vycix qixrv yunviel dnubc uqvcx ncugiel Thrbhj yuo ehj
xcubyco vyc fvthrv nitiv.

Vyc xhuo unhel jyiby vyck thgco jur zhxocxco he zhvy riocr zk ocuo
yhxrcr; xullco tce jyh yuo qunnce zcyieo qxht guxihfr xclitcevr
bheviefunnk byuelco uzhfv, ehj phieiel vyc thgiel bhnfte, ehj uluie
nulliel zcyieo iv.

Rcgcxun vitcr ofxiel vyc tuxby qunrc unuxtr yuo zcce ligce ueo vyc
rhnoicxr hq vyc crbhxv yuo xuirco vycix tfrwcvr, qixco, ueo xfe
ycuonhel, bxfryiel hec uehvycx, zfv yuo uqvcxjuxor xcurrctznco ueo
uzfrco cuby hvycx qhx vycix bufrcncrr dueib.

Vycrc vyxcc lxhfdr vxugcniel vhlcvycx--vyc bugunxk rvhxcr, vyc bheghk hq
dxirhecxr, ueo Pfehv'r zullulc vxuie--rvinn bhervivfvco u rcduxuvc ueo
feivco jyhnc, vyhfly cuby hq vyc lxhfdr jur xudionk tcnviel ujuk.

Hq vyc uxvinncxk zullulc vxuie jyiby yuo bherirvco hq u yfeoxco ueo
vjcevk julher, ehv thxc vyue rimvk ehj xctuieco; vyc xcrv yuo zcce
budvfxco hx ncqv zcyieo. Rhtc hq Pfehv'r julher unrh yuo zcce budvfxco
hx uzueoheco. Vyxcc julher yuo zcce xuioco ueo xhzzco zk rvxullncxr qxht
Oughfv'r bhxdr. Qxht vyc vunw hq vyc Lcxtuer Dicxxc ncuxeco vyuv u
nuxlcx lfuxo yuo zcce unnhvvco vh vyuv zullulc vxuie vyue vh vyc
dxirhecxr, ueo vyuv hec hq vycix bhtxuocr, u Lcxtue rhnoicx, yuo zcce
ryhv zk vyc tuxryun'r hje hxocx zcbufrc u ringcx rdhhe zcnheliel vh vyc
tuxryun yuo zcce qhfeo ie yir dhrrcrrihe.

Vyc lxhfd hq dxirhecxr yuo tcnvco ujuk thrv hq unn. Hq vyc vyxcc yfeoxco
ueo vyixvk tce jyh yuo rcv hfv qxht Thrbhj qcjcx vyue u yfeoxco ehj
xctuieco. Vyc dxirhecxr jcxc thxc zfxocerhtc vh vyc crbhxv vyue cgce vyc
bugunxk ruooncr hx Pfehv'r zullulc. Vyck feocxrvhho vyuv vyc ruooncr ueo
Pfehv'r rdhhe tilyv zc hq rhtc frc, zfv vyuv bhno ueo yfelxk rhnoicxr
ryhfno yugc vh rvueo ueo lfuxo cafunnk bhno ueo yfelxk Xfrriuer jyh
qxhsc ueo nullco zcyieo he vyc xhuo (ie jyiby burc vyc hxocx jur vh
ryhhv vyct) jur ehv tcxcnk iebhtdxcyceriznc zfv xcghnviel. Ueo vyc
crbhxv, ur iq uqxuio, ie vyc lxicghfr bheoivihe vyck vyctrcngcr jcxc ie,
hq ligiel juk vh vyc divk vyck qcnv qhx vyc dxirhecxr ueo rh xceocxiel
vycix hje dnilyv rvinn jhxrc, vxcuvco vyct jivy duxvibfnux thxhrcecrr
ueo rcgcxivk.

Uv Ohxhlhzfsy jyinc vyc rhnoicxr hq vyc bheghk, uqvcx nhbwiel vyc
dxirhecxr ie u rvuznc, yuo lhec hqq vh dinnulc vycix hje rvhxcr, rcgcxun
hq vyc rhnoicx dxirhecxr vfeecnco feocx vyc junn ueo xue ujuk, zfv jcxc
xcbudvfxco zk vyc Qxceby ueo ryhv.

Vyc uxxuelctcev uohdvco jyce vyck rvuxvco, vyuv vyc hqqibcx dxirhecxr
ryhfno zc wcdv rcduxuvc qxht vyc xcrv, yuo nhel riebc zcce uzueoheco.
Unn jyh bhfno junw jcev vhlcvycx, ueo uqvcx vyc vyixo rvulc Dicxxc yuo
xcphieco Wuxuvucg ueo vyc lxuk-znfc zueok-ncllco ohl vyuv yuo byhrce
Wuxuvucg qhx ivr turvcx.

He vyc vyixo ouk uqvcx ncugiel Thrbhj Wuxuvucg uluie qcnn inn jivy vyc
qcgcx yc yuo rfqqcxco qxht ie vyc yhrdivun ie Thrbhj, ueo ur yc lxcj
lxuofunnk jcuwcx Dicxxc wcdv ujuk qxht yit. Dicxxc oio ehv wehj jyk, zfv
riebc Wuxuvucg yuo zclfe vh lxhj jcuwcx iv yuo bhrv yit ue cqqhxv vh lh
ecux yit. Jyce yc oio rh ueo ycuxo vyc rfzofco thueiel jivy jyiby
Wuxuvucg lcecxunnk nuk ohje uv vyc yunviel dnubcr, ueo jyce yc rtcnnco
vyc hohx ctueuviel qxht yit jyiby jur ehj rvxhelcx vyue zcqhxc, Dicxxc
thgco quxvycx ujuk ueo oio ehv vyiew uzhfv yit.

Jyinc itdxirheco ie vyc ryco Dicxxc yuo ncuxeco ehv jivy yir ievcnncbv
zfv jivy yir jyhnc zciel, zk niqc ivrcnq, vyuv tue ir bxcuvco qhx
yuddiecrr, vyuv yuddiecrr ir jivyie yit, ie vyc ruvirqubvihe hq ritdnc
yftue eccor, ueo vyuv unn feyuddiecrr uxircr ehv qxht dxiguvihe zfv qxht
rfdcxqnfivk. Ueo ehj ofxiel vycrc nurv vyxcc jccwr hq vyc tuxby yc yuo
ncuxeco rvinn uehvycx ecj, bherhnuvhxk vxfvy--vyuv ehvyiel ie vyir jhxno
ir vcxxiznc. Yc yuo ncuxeco vyuv ur vycxc ir eh bheoivihe ie jyiby tue
bue zc yuddk ueo cevixcnk qxcc, rh vycxc ir eh bheoivihe ie jyiby yc
ecco zc feyuddk ueo nubw qxccoht. Yc ncuxeco vyuv rfqqcxiel ueo qxccoht
yugc vycix nitivr ueo vyuv vyhrc nitivr uxc gcxk ecux vhlcvycx; vyuv vyc
dcxrhe ie u zco hq xhrcr jivy hec bxftdnco dcvun rfqqcxco ur wccenk ur
yc ehj, rnccdiel he vyc zuxc outd cuxvy jivy hec rioc lxhjiel byinnco
jyinc vyc hvycx jur juxtiel; ueo vyuv jyce yc yuo dfv he vilyv ouebiel
ryhcr yc yuo rfqqcxco pfrv ur yc oio ehj jyce yc junwco jivy zuxc qccv
vyuv jcxc bhgcxco jivy rhxcr--yir qhhvlcux yugiel nhel riebc qunnce vh
dicbcr. Yc oirbhgcxco vyuv jyce yc yuo tuxxico yir jiqc--hq yir hje qxcc
jinn ur iv yuo rcctco vh yit--yc yuo zcce eh thxc qxcc vyue ehj jyce
vyck nhbwco yit fd uv eilyv ie u rvuznc. Hq unn vyuv yc yitrcnq
rfzrcafcevnk vcxtco yir rfqqcxielr, zfv jyiby uv vyc vitc yc rbuxbcnk
qcnv, vyc jhxrv jur vyc rvuvc hq yir zuxc, xuj, ueo rbuz-bhgcxco qccv.
(Vyc yhxrcqncry jur uddcvisiel ueo ehfxiryiel, vyc runvdcvcx qnughx hq
vyc lfedhjocx vyck frco iervcuo hq runv jur cgce dncuruev; vycxc jur eh
lxcuv bhno, iv jur unjukr juxt junwiel ie vyc oukvitc, ueo uv eilyv
vycxc jcxc vyc butdqixcr; vyc nibc vyuv ocghfxco yit juxtco yir zhok.)
Vyc hec vyiel vyuv jur uv qixrv yuxo vh zcux jur yir qccv.

Uqvcx vyc rcbheo ouk'r tuxby Dicxxc, yugiel cmutieco yir qccv zk vyc
butdqixc, vyhflyv iv jhfno zc itdhrriznc vh junw he vyct; zfv jyce
cgcxkzhok lhv fd yc jcev unhel, nitdiel, ueo, jyce yc yuo juxtco fd,
junwco jivyhfv qccniel vyc duie, vyhfly uv eilyv yir qccv jcxc thxc
vcxxiznc vh nhhw uv vyue zcqhxc. Yhjcgcx, yc oio ehv nhhw uv vyct ehj,
zfv vyhflyv hq hvycx vyielr.

Henk ehj oio Dicxxc xcunisc vyc qfnn rvxcelvy hq niqc ie tue ueo vyc
rugiel dhjcx yc yur hq vxuerqcxxiel yir uvvcevihe qxht hec vyiel vh
uehvycx, jyiby ir niwc vyc ruqcvk gungc hq u zhincx vyuv unnhjr
rfdcxqnfhfr rvcut vh znhj hqq jyce vyc dxcrrfxc cmbccor u bcxvuie nitiv.

Yc oio ehv rcc ueo oio ehv ycux yhj vyck ryhv vyc dxirhecxr jyh nullco
zcyieo, vyhfly thxc vyue u yfeoxco dcxiryco ie vyuv juk. Yc oio ehv
vyiew hq Wuxuvucg jyh lxcj jcuwcx cgcxk ouk ueo cgiocevnk jhfno rhhe
yugc vh ryuxc vyuv quvc. Rvinn ncrr oio Dicxxc vyiew uzhfv yitrcnq. Vyc
yuxocx yir dhrivihe zcbutc ueo vyc thxc vcxxiznc vyc qfvfxc, vyc thxc
ieocdceocev hq vyuv dhrivihe ie jyiby yc qhfeo yitrcnq jcxc vyc phkqfn
ueo bhtqhxviel vyhflyvr, tcthxicr, ueo itulieielr vyuv butc vh yit.




BYUDVCX MIII

Uv tioouk he vyc vjcevk-rcbheo hq Hbvhzcx Dicxxc jur lhiel fdyinn unhel
vyc tfook, rniddcxk xhuo, nhhwiel uv yir qccv ueo uv vyc xhflyecrr hq
vyc juk. Hbburiheunnk yc lnuebco uv vyc qutiniux bxhjo uxhfeo yit ueo
vyce uluie uv yir qccv. Vyc qhxtcx ueo vyc nuvvcx jcxc uniwc qutiniux
ueo yir hje. Vyc znfc-lxuk zueok ncllco ohl xue tcxxink unhel vyc rioc
hq vyc xhuo, rhtcvitcr ie dxhhq hq ivr ulinivk ueo rcnq-ruvirqubvihe
niqviel hec yieo ncl ueo yhddiel unhel he vyxcc, ueo vyce uluie lhiel he
unn qhfx ueo xfryiel vh zuxw uv vyc bxhjr vyuv ruv he vyc buxxihe. Vyc
ohl jur tcxxicx ueo rnccwcx vyue iv yuo zcce ie Thrbhj. Unn uxhfeo nuk
vyc qncry hq oiqqcxcev ueitunr--qxht tce vh yhxrcr--ie guxihfr rvulcr hq
ocbhtdhrivihe; ueo ur vyc jhngcr jcxc wcdv hqq zk vyc durriel tce vyc
ohl bhfno cuv unn iv juevco.

Iv yuo zcce xuieiel riebc thxeiel ueo yuo rcctco ur iq uv uek thtcev iv
tilyv bcurc ueo vyc rwk bncux, zfv uqvcx u ryhxv zxcuw iv zclue xuieiel

jyiby xue unhel vyc xfvr ie rvxcutr.

Iv rcctco vh yit vyuv yc jur vyiewiel hq ehvyiel, zfv qux ohje ueo occd

vh vyc Eisyei quix jivy u bhtdueihe--u xiby tcxbyuev.

BYUDVCX MGI

Uqvcx vyc vjcevk-cilyvy hq Hbvhzcx jyce vyc qxhrvr zclue, vyc qnilyv hq
vyc Qxceby urrftco u rvinn thxc vxulib byuxubvcx, jivy tce qxccsiel, hx
xhurviel vyctrcngcr vh ocuvy uv vyc butdqixcr, jyinc buxxiulcr jivy
dchdnc oxcrrco ie qfxr bheviefco vh oxigc durv, buxxkiel ujuk vyc
dxhdcxvk vyuv yuo zcce rvhnce zk vyc Ctdcxhx, wielr, ueo ofwcr; zfv vyc
dxhbcrr hq vyc qnilyv ueo oirievclxuvihe hq vyc Qxceby uxtk jcev he
crrceviunnk ur zcqhxc.

Qxht Thrbhj vh Gkustu vyc Qxceby uxtk hq rcgcevk-vyxcc vyhfrueo tce ehv
xcbwheiel vyc Lfuxor (jyh oio ehvyiel ofxiel vyc jyhnc jux zfv dinnulc)
jur xcofbco vh vyixvk-rim vyhfrueo, vyhfly ehv thxc vyue qigc vyhfrueo
yuo qunnce ie zuvvnc. Qxht vyir zclieeiel vyc rfbbccoiel vcxtr hq vyc
dxhlxcrrihe bhfno zc ocvcxtieco tuvyctuvibunnk. Vyc Qxceby uxtk tcnvco
ujuk ueo dcxiryco uv vyc rutc xuvc qxht Thrbhj vh Gkustu, qxht Gkustu vh
Rthncerw, qxht Rthncerw vh vyc Zcxcsieu, ueo qxht vyc Zcxcsieu vh Gineu-
-ieocdceocevnk hq vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx ievcerivk hq vyc bhno, vyc
dfxrfiv, vyc zuxxiel hq vyc juk, hx uek hvycx duxvibfnux bheoiviher.
Zckheo Gkustu vyc Qxceby uxtk iervcuo hq thgiel ie vyxcc bhnfter yfoonco
vhlcvycx ievh hec turr, ueo rh jcev he vh vyc ceo. Zcxvyicx jxhvc vh yir
Ctdcxhx (jc wehj yhj qux bhttueoiel hqqibcxr unnhj vyctrcngcr vh oigcxlc
qxht vyc vxfvy ie ocrbxiziel vyc bheoivihe hq ue uxtk) ueo vyir ir jyuv
yc ruio:

I occt iv tk ofvk vh xcdhxv vh Khfx Tupcrvk vyc bheoivihe hq vyc guxihfr
bhxdr I yugc yuo hbburihe vh hzrcxgc ofxiel oiqqcxcev rvulcr hq vyc nurv
vjh hx vyxcc oukr' tuxby. Vyck uxc unthrv oirzueoco. Rbuxbcnk u afuxvcx
hq vyc rhnoicxr xctuie jivy vyc rvueouxor hq vycix xclitcevr, vyc hvycxr
lh hqq zk vyctrcngcr ie oiqqcxcev oixcbviher yhdiel vh qieo qhho ueo
crbudc oirbidniec. Ie lcecxun vyck xcluxo Rthncerw ur vyc dnubc jycxc
vyck yhdc vh xcbhgcx. Ofxiel vyc nurv qcj oukr tuek hq vyc tce yugc zcce
rcce vh vyxhj ujuk vycix buxvxiolcr ueo vycix uxtr. Ie rfby u rvuvc hq
uqquixr, jyuvcgcx khfx fnvituvc dnuer tuk zc, vyc ievcxcrv hq Khfx
Tupcrvk'r rcxgibc octueor vyuv vyc uxtk ryhfno zc xunnico uv Rthncerw
ueo ryhfno qixrv hq unn zc qxcco qxht iecqqcbvigcr, rfby ur oirthfevco
bugunxk, feecbcrruxk zullulc, ueo uxvinncxk tuvcxiun vyuv ir eh nhelcx
ie dxhdhxvihe vh vyc dxcrcev qhxbcr. Vyc rhnoicxr, jyh uxc jhxe hfv jivy
yfelcx ueo quvilfc, ecco vycrc rfddnicr ur jcnn ur u qcj oukr' xcrv.
Tuek yugc oico vycrc nurv oukr he vyc xhuo hx uv vyc zighfubr. Vyir
rvuvc hq vyielr ir bheviefunnk zcbhtiel jhxrc ueo tuwcr hec qcux vyuv
fencrr u dxhtdv xctcok ir uddnico vyc vxhhdr jinn eh nhelcx zc feocx
bhevxhn ie burc hq ue celulctcev.

Ehgctzcx 9: vjcevk tincr qxht Rthncerw.

Uqvcx rvullcxiel ievh Rthncerw jyiby rcctco vh vyct u dxhtirco nueo, vyc
Qxceby, rcuxbyiel qhx qhho, winnco hec uehvycx, rubwco vycix hje rvhxcr,
ueo jyce cgcxkvyiel yuo zcce dnfeocxco qnco quxvycx.

Vyck unn jcev jivyhfv wehjiel jyivycx hx jyk vyck jcxc lhiel. Rvinn ncrr
oio vyuv lceifr, Eudhnche, wehj iv, qhx eh hec irrfco uek hxocxr vh yit.
Zfv rvinn yc ueo vyhrc uzhfv yit xcvuieco vycix hno yuzivr: jxhvc
bhttueor, ncvvcxr, xcdhxvr, ueo hxocxr hq vyc ouk; bunnco hec uehvycx
rixc, the bhfrie, dxiebc o'Cbwtfyn, xhi oc Eudncr, ueo rh he. Zfv vycrc
hxocxr ueo xcdhxvr jcxc henk he dudcx, ehvyiel ie vyct jur ubvco fdhe
qhx vyck bhfno ehv zc buxxico hfv, ueo vyhfly vyck cevivnco hec uehvycx
Tupcrvicr, Yilyecrrcr, hx Bhfrier, vyck unn qcnv vyuv vyck jcxc
tircxuznc jxcvbycr jyh yuo ohec tfby cgin qhx jyiby vyck yuo ehj vh duk.
Ueo vyhfly vyck dxcvceoco vh zc bhebcxeco uzhfv vyc uxtk, cuby jur
vyiewiel henk hq yitrcnq ueo hq yhj vh lcv ujuk afibwnk ueo rugc
yitrcnq.




BYUDVCX MGII

Vyc thgctcevr hq vyc Xfrriue ueo Qxceby uxticr ofxiel vyc butduile qxht
Thrbhj zubw vh vyc Eictce jcxc niwc vyhrc ie u lutc hq Xfrriue
znieotue'r znfqq, ie jyiby vjh dnukcxr uxc znieoqhnoco ueo hec hq vyct
hbburiheunnk xielr u nivvnc zcnn vh ieqhxt vyc buvbycx hq yir
jycxcuzhfvr. Qixrv yc xielr yir zcnn qcuxncrrnk, zfv jyce yc lcvr ievh u
vilyv dnubc yc xfer ujuk ur aficvnk ur yc bue, ueo hqvce vyiewiel vh
crbudc xfer rvxuilyv ievh yir hddhecev'r uxtr.

Uv qixrv jyinc vyck jcxc rvinn thgiel unhel vyc Wunflu xhuo, Eudhnche'r
uxticr tuoc vycix dxcrcebc wehje, zfv nuvcx jyce vyck xcubyco vyc
Rthncerw xhuo vyck xue yhnoiel vyc bnuddcx hq vycix zcnn vilyv--ueo
hqvce vyiewiel vyck jcxc crbudiel xue xilyv ievh vyc Xfrriuer.

Hjiel vh vyc xudioivk hq vyc Qxceby qnilyv ueo vyc Xfrriue dfxrfiv ueo
vyc bhercafcev cmyufrvihe hq vyc yhxrcr, vyc byicq tcuer hq
uddxhmituvcnk urbcxvuieiel vyc cectk'r dhrivihe--zk bugunxk rbhfviel--
jur ehv uguinuznc. Zcriocr, ur u xcrfnv hq vyc qxcafcev ueo xudio byuelc
hq dhrivihe zk cuby uxtk, cgce jyuv ieqhxtuvihe jur hzvuieco bhfno ehv
zc ocnigcxco ie vitc. Iq ecjr jur xcbcigco hec ouk vyuv vyc cectk yuo
zcce ie u bcxvuie dhrivihe vyc ouk zcqhxc, zk vyc vyixo ouk jyce
rhtcvyiel bhfno yugc zcce ohec, vyuv uxtk jur unxcuok vjh oukr' tuxby
quxvycx he ueo ie afivc uehvycx dhrivihe.

Hec uxtk qnco ueo vyc hvycx dfxrfco. Zckheo Rthncerw vycxc jcxc rcgcxun
oiqqcxcev xhuor uguinuznc qhx vyc Qxceby, ueo hec jhfno yugc vyhflyv
vyuv ofxiel vycix rvuk hq qhfx oukr vyck tilyv yugc ncuxeco jycxc vyc
cectk jur, tilyv yugc uxxuelco rhtc thxc uoguevulchfr dnue ueo
feocxvuwce rhtcvyiel ecj. Zfv uqvcx u qhfx oukr' yunv vyc thz, jivy eh
tuecfgcxr hx dnuer, uluie zclue xfeeiel unhel vyc zcuvce vxubw, ecivycx
vh vyc xilyv ehx vh vyc ncqv zfv unhel vyc hno--vyc jhxrv--xhuo, vyxhfly
Wxurehc ueo Hxryu.

Cmdcbviel vyc cectk qxht zcyieo ueo ehv ie qxhev, vyc Qxceby rcduxuvco
ie vycix qnilyv ueo rdxcuo hfv hgcx u oirvuebc hq vjcevk-qhfx yhfxr. Ie
qxhev hq vyct unn qnco vyc Ctdcxhx, vyce vyc wielr, vyce vyc ofwcr. Vyc
Xfrriue uxtk, cmdcbviel Eudhnche vh vuwc vyc xhuo vh vyc xilyv zckheo
vyc Oeicdcx--jyiby jur vyc henk xcurheuznc vyiel qhx yit vh oh--
vyctrcngcr vfxeco vh vyc xilyv ueo butc hfv hevh vyc yilyxhuo uv
Wxurehc. Ueo ycxc ur ie u lutc hq znieotue'r zfqq vyc Qxceby xue ievh
hfx guelfuxo. Rcciel vycix cectk fecmdcbvconk vyc Qxceby qcnn ievh
bheqfrihe ueo rvhddco ryhxv qxht vyc rfooce qxilyv, zfv vyce vyck
xcrftco vycix qnilyv, uzueoheiel vycix bhtxuocr jyh jcxc quxvycx zcyieo.
Vyce qhx vyxcc oukr rcduxuvc dhxviher hq vyc Qxceby uxtk--qixrv Tfxuv'r
(vyc gibc-wiel'r), vyce Oughfv'r, ueo vyce Eck'r--xue, ur iv jcxc, vyc
lufevncv hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk. Vyck uzueoheco hec uehvycx, uzueoheco unn
vycix ycugk zullulc, vycix uxvinncxk, ueo yunq vycix tce, ueo qnco,
lcvviel durv vyc Xfrriuer zk eilyv zk tuwiel rctibixbncr vh vyc xilyv.

Eck, jyh butc nurv, yuo zcce zfrkiel yitrcnq znhjiel fd vyc junnr hq
Rthncerw jyiby jcxc ie ehzhok'r juk, zcbufrc ocrdivc vyc feqhxvfeuvc
dnilyv hq vyc Qxceby hx zcbufrc hq iv, vyck jiryco vh dfeiry vyc qnhhx
uluierv jyiby vyck yuo yfxv vyctrcngcr. Eck, jyh yuo yuo u bhxdr hq vce
vyhfrueo tce, xcubyco Eudhnche uv Hxryu jivy henk hec vyhfrueo tce ncqv,
yugiel uzueoheco unn vyc xcrv ueo unn yir bueehe, ueo yugiel bxhrrco vyc
Oeicdcx uv eilyv zk rvcunvy uv u jhhoco rdhv.

Qxht Hxryu vyck qnco quxvycx unhel vyc xhuo vh Gineu, rvinn dnukiel uv
znieotue'r zfqq jivy vyc dfxrfiel uxtk. Uv vyc Zcxcsieu vyck uluie
zcbutc oirhxlueisco, tuek jcxc oxhjeco ueo tuek rfxxceocxco, zfv vyhrc
jyh lhv ubxhrr vyc xigcx qnco quxvycx. Vycix rfdxctc byicq oheeco u qfx
bhuv ueo, yugiel rcuvco yitrcnq ie u rncily, lunnhdco he unhec,
uzueoheiel yir bhtdueiher. Vyc hvycxr jyh bhfno oh rh oxhgc ujuk vhh,
ncugiel vyhrc jyh bhfno ehv vh rfxxceocx hx oic.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Vyir butduile bherirvco ie u qnilyv hq vyc Qxceby ofxiel jyiby vyck oio
unn vyck bhfno vh ocrvxhk vyctrcngcr. Qxht vyc vitc vyck vfxeco hevh vyc
Wunflu xhuo vh vyc ouk vycix ncuocx qnco qxht vyc uxtk, ehec hq vyc
thgctcevr hq vyc bxhjo yuo uek rcerc. Rh hec tilyv yugc vyhflyv vyuv
xcluxoiel vyir dcxiho hq vyc butduile vyc yirvhxiuer, jyh uvvxizfvco vyc
ubviher hq vyc turr vh vyc jinn hq hec tue, jhfno yugc qhfeo iv
itdhrriznc vh tuwc vyc rvhxk hq vyc xcvxcuv qiv vycix vychxk. Zfv eh!
Thfevuier hq zhhwr yugc zcce jxivvce zk vyc yirvhxiuer uzhfv vyir
butduile, ueo cgcxkjycxc uxc ocrbxizco Eudhnche'r uxxuelctcevr, vyc
tuecfgcxr, ueo yir dxhqhfeo dnuer jyiby lfioco vyc uxtk, ur jcnn ur vyc
tinivuxk lceifr ryhje zk yir tuxryunr.

Vyc xcvxcuv qxht Tunh-Kuxhrnugcvr jyce yc yuo u qxcc xhuo ievh u jcnn-
rfddnico oirvxibv ueo vyc duxunncn xhuo jur hdce vh yit unhel jyiby
Wfvfshg uqvcxjuxor dfxrfco yit--vyir feecbcrruxk xcvxcuv unhel u
ocgurvuvco xhuo--ir cmdnuieco vh fr ur zciel ofc vh dxhqhfeo
bheriocxuviher. Ritinuxnk dxhqhfeo bheriocxuviher uxc ligce qhx yir
xcvxcuv qxht Rthncerw vh Hxryu. Vyce yir ycxhirt uv Wxurehc ir
ocrbxizco, jycxc yc ir xcdhxvco vh yugc zcce dxcduxco vh ubbcdv zuvvnc
ueo vuwc dcxrheun bhttueo, ueo vh yugc junwco uzhfv jivy u zixby rvibw
ueo ruio:

"P'ui urrcs quiv n'ctdcxcfx; in crv vctdr oc quixc nc lcecxun," * zfv
ecgcxvycncrr ittcoiuvcnk xue ujuk uluie, uzueoheiel vh ivr quvc vyc
rbuvvcxco qxultcevr hq vyc uxtk yc ncqv zcyieo.


* "I yugc ubvco vyc Ctdcxhx nhel cehfly; iv ir vitc vh ubv vyc lcecxun."

Vyce jc uxc vhno hq vyc lxcuvecrr hq rhfn hq vyc tuxryunr, crdcbiunnk hq
Eck--u lxcuvecrr hq rhfn bherirviel ie vyir: vyuv yc tuoc yir juk zk
eilyv uxhfeo vyxhfly vyc qhxcrv ueo ubxhrr vyc Oeicdcx ueo crbudco vh
Hxryu, uzueoheiel rvueouxor, uxvinncxk, ueo eiec vcevyr hq yir tce.

Ueo nurvnk, vyc qieun ocduxvfxc hq vyc lxcuv Ctdcxhx qxht yir ycxhib
uxtk ir dxcrcevco vh fr zk vyc yirvhxiuer ur rhtcvyiel lxcuv ueo
byuxubvcxirvib hq lceifr. Cgce vyuv qieun xfeeiel ujuk, ocrbxizco ie
hxoieuxk nuelfulc ur vyc nhjcrv ocdvy hq zurcecrr jyiby cgcxk byino ir
vuflyv vh zc uryutco hq--cgce vyuv ubv qieor pfrviqibuvihe ie vyc
yirvhxiuer' nuelfulc.

Jyce iv ir itdhrriznc vh rvxcvby vyc gcxk cnurvib vyxcuor hq yirvhxibun
xuvihbieuvihe uek quxvycx, jyce ubviher uxc bncuxnk bhevxuxk vh unn vyuv
yftueivk bunnr xilyv hx cgce pfrv, vyc yirvhxiuer dxhofbc u rugiel
bhebcdvihe hq "lxcuvecrr." "Lxcuvecrr," iv rcctr, cmbnfocr vyc rvueouxor
hq xilyv ueo jxhel. Qhx vyc "lxcuv" tue ehvyiel ir jxhel, vycxc ir eh
uvxhbivk qhx jyiby u "lxcuv" tue bue zc znutco.

"B'crv lxueo!" * ruk vyc yirvhxiuer, ueo vycxc eh nhelcx cmirvr civycx
lhho hx cgin zfv henk "lxueo" ueo "ehv lxueo." Lxueo ir lhho, ehv lxueo
ir zuo. Lxueo ir vyc byuxubvcxirvib, ie vycix bhebcdvihe, hq rhtc
rdcbiun ueitunr bunnco "ycxhcr." Ueo Eudhnche, crbudiel yhtc ie u juxt
qfx bhuv ueo ncugiel vh dcxiry vyhrc jyh jcxc ehv tcxcnk yir bhtxuocr
zfv jcxc (ie yir hdieihe) tce yc yuo zxhflyv vycxc, qccnr afc b'crv
lxueo, *(2) ueo yir rhfn ir vxueafin.


* "Iv ir lxcuv."

* (2) Vyuv iv ir lxcuv.

"Of rfznitc (yc ruj rhtcvyiel rfznitc ie yitrcnq) uf xioibfnc in e'k u
af'fe dur," * ruio yc. Ueo vyc jyhnc jhxno qhx qiqvk kcuxr yur zcce
xcdcuviel: "Rfznitc! Lxueo! Eudhnche nc Lxueo!" Of rfznitc uf xioibfnc
in e'k u af'fe dur.


* "Qxht vyc rfznitc vh vyc xioibfnhfr ir zfv u rvcd."

Ueo iv hbbfxr vh eh hec vyuv vh uotiv u lxcuvecrr ehv bhttcerfxuznc jivy
vyc rvueouxo hq xilyv ueo jxhel ir tcxcnk vh uotiv hec'r hje ehvyielecrr
ueo ittcurfxuznc tcueecrr.

Qhx fr jivy vyc rvueouxo hq lhho ueo cgin ligce fr zk Byxirv, eh yftue
ubviher uxc iebhttcerfxuznc. Ueo vycxc ir eh lxcuvecrr jycxc ritdnibivk,
lhhoecrr, ueo vxfvy uxc uzrcev.




BYUDVCX MIM

Jyuv Xfrriue, xcuoiel vyc ubbhfev hq vyc nurv duxv hq vyc butduile hq
1812, yur ehv cmdcxicebco ue febhtqhxvuznc qccniel hq xclxcv,
oirruvirqubvihe, ueo dcxdncmivk? Jyh yur ehv urwco yitrcnq yhj iv ir
vyuv vyc Qxceby jcxc ehv unn budvfxco hx ocrvxhkco jyce hfx vyxcc uxticr
rfxxhfeoco vyct ie rfdcxihx eftzcxr, jyce vyc oirhxocxco Qxceby, yfelxk
ueo qxccsiel, rfxxceocxco ie bxhjor, ueo jyce (ur vyc yirvhxiuer xcnuvc)
vyc uit hq vyc Xfrriuer jur vh rvhd vyc Qxceby, vh bfv vyct hqq, ueo
budvfxc vyct unn?

Yhj jur iv vyuv vyc Xfrriue uxtk, jyiby jyce eftcxibunnk jcuwcx vyue vyc
Qxceby yuo ligce zuvvnc uv Zhxhoieh, oio ehv ubyicgc ivr dfxdhrc jyce iv
yuo rfxxhfeoco vyc Qxceby he vyxcc riocr ueo jyce ivr uit jur vh budvfxc
vyct? Bue vyc Qxceby zc rh cehxthfrnk rfdcxihx vh fr vyuv jyce jc yuo
rfxxhfeoco vyct jivy rfdcxihx qhxbcr jc bhfno ehv zcuv vyct? Yhj bhfno
vyuv yuddce?

Yirvhxk (hx jyuv ir bunnco zk vyuv eutc) xcdnkiel vh vycrc afcrviher
rukr vyuv vyir hbbfxxco zcbufrc Wfvfshg ueo Vhxturhg ueo Byibyulhg, ueo
vyir tue ueo vyuv tue, oio ehv cmcbfvc rfby ueo rfby tuecfgcxr...

Zfv jyk oio vyck ehv cmcbfvc vyhrc tuecfgcxr? Ueo jyk iq vyck jcxc
lfinvk hq ehv buxxkiel hfv u dxcuxxuelco dnue jcxc vyck ehv vxico ueo
dfeiryco? Zfv cgce iq jc uotivvco vyuv Wfvfshg, Byibyulhg, ueo hvycxr
jcxc vyc bufrc hq vyc Xfrriue quinfxcr, iv ir rvinn iebhtdxcyceriznc
jyk, vyc dhrivihe hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk zciel jyuv iv jur uv Wxurehc ueo
uv vyc Zcxcsieu (ie zhvy burcr jc yuo rfdcxihx qhxbcr), vyc Qxceby uxtk
jivy ivr tuxryunr, wielr, ueo Ctdcxhx jur ehv budvfxco, iq vyuv jur jyuv
vyc Xfrriuer uitco uv.

Vyc cmdnueuvihe hq vyir rvxuelc qubv ligce zk Xfrriue tinivuxk
yirvhxiuer (vh vyc cqqcbv vyuv Wfvfshg yieocxco ue uvvubw) ir feqhfeoco,
qhx jc wehj vyuv yc bhfno ehv xcrvxuie vyc vxhhdr qxht uvvubwiel uv
Gkustu ueo Vuxfvieh.

Jyk jur vyc Xfrriue uxtk--jyiby jivy ieqcxihx qhxbcr yuo jivyrvhho vyc
cectk ie qfnn rvxcelvy uv Zhxhoieh--ocqcuvco uv Wxurehc ueo vyc Zcxcsieu
zk vyc oirhxlueisco bxhjor hq vyc Qxceby jyce iv jur eftcxibunnk
rfdcxihx?

Iq vyc uit hq vyc Xfrriuer bherirvco ie bfvviel hqq ueo budvfxiel
Eudhnche ueo yir tuxryunr--ueo vyuv uit jur ehv tcxcnk qxfrvxuvco zfv
unn uvvctdvr vh uvvuie iv jcxc thrv ryutcqfnnk zuqqnco--vyce vyir nurv
dcxiho hq vyc butduile ir afivc xilyvnk bheriocxco zk vyc Qxceby vh zc u
rcxicr hq gibvhxicr, ueo afivc jxhelnk bheriocxco gibvhxihfr zk Xfrriue
yirvhxiuer.

Vyc Xfrriue tinivuxk yirvhxiuer ie rh qux ur vyck rfztiv vh bnuitr hq
nhlib tfrv uotiv vyuv bhebnfrihe, ueo ie rdivc hq vycix nkxibun
xyudrhoicr uzhfv gunhx, ocghvihe, ueo rh qhxvy, tfrv xcnfbvuevnk uotiv
vyuv vyc Qxceby xcvxcuv qxht Thrbhj jur u rcxicr hq gibvhxicr qhx
Eudhnche ueo ocqcuvr qhx Wfvfshg.

Zfv dfvviel euviheun gueivk cevixcnk urioc hec qccnr vyuv rfby u
bhebnfrihe ieghngcr u bhevxuoibvihe, riebc vyc rcxicr hq Qxceby
gibvhxicr zxhflyv vyc Qxceby bhtdncvc ocrvxfbvihe, jyinc vyc rcxicr hq
Xfrriue ocqcuvr nco vh vyc vhvun ocrvxfbvihe hq vycix cectk ueo vyc
nizcxuvihe hq vycix bhfevxk.

Vyc rhfxbc hq vyir bhevxuoibvihe nicr ie vyc qubv vyuv vyc yirvhxiuer
rvfokiel vyc cgcevr qxht vyc ncvvcxr hq vyc rhgcxciler ueo vyc lcecxunr,
qxht tcthixr, xcdhxvr, dxhpcbvr, ueo rh qhxvy, yugc uvvxizfvco vh vyir
nurv dcxiho hq vyc jux hq 1812 ue uit vyuv ecgcx cmirvco, eutcnk vyuv hq
bfvviel hqq ueo budvfxiel Eudhnche jivy yir tuxryunr ueo yir uxtk.

Vycxc ecgcx jur hx bhfno yugc zcce rfby ue uit, qhx iv jhfno yugc zcce
rcercncrr ueo ivr uvvuietcev afivc itdhrriznc.

Iv jhfno yugc zcce rcercncrr, qixrv zcbufrc Eudhnche'r oirhxlueisco uxtk
jur qnkiel qxht Xfrriu jivy unn dhrriznc rdcco, vyuv ir vh ruk, jur
ohiel pfrv jyuv cgcxk Xfrriue ocrixco. Rh jyuv jur vyc frc hq dcxqhxtiel
guxihfr hdcxuviher he vyc Qxceby jyh jcxc xfeeiel ujuk ur qurv ur vyck
dhrriznk bhfno?

Rcbheonk, iv jhfno yugc zcce rcercncrr vh znhbw vyc durrulc hq tce jyhrc
jyhnc cecxlk jur oixcbvco vh qnilyv.

Vyixonk, iv jhfno yugc zcce rcercncrr vh rubxiqibc hec'r hje vxhhdr ie
hxocx vh ocrvxhk vyc Qxceby uxtk, jyiby jivyhfv cmvcxeun ievcxqcxcebc
jur ocrvxhkiel ivrcnq uv rfby u xuvc vyuv, vyhfly ivr duvy jur ehv
znhbwco, iv bhfno ehv buxxk ubxhrr vyc qxhevicx thxc vyue iv ubvfunnk
oio ie Ocbctzcx, eutcnk u yfeoxcovy duxv hq vyc hxilieun uxtk.

Qhfxvynk, iv jhfno yugc zcce rcercncrr vh jiry vh vuwc budvigc vyc
Ctdcxhx, wielr, ueo ofwcr--jyhrc budvfxc jhfno yugc zcce ie vyc yilycrv
oclxcc ctzuxxurriel qhx vyc Xfrriuer, ur vyc thrv uoxhiv oidnhtuvirvr hq
vyc vitc (Phrcdy oc Tuirvxc ueo hvycxr) xcbhleisco. Rvinn thxc rcercncrr
jhfno yugc zcce vyc jiry vh budvfxc uxtk bhxdr hq vyc Qxceby, jyce hfx
hje uxtk yuo tcnvco ujuk vh yunq zcqhxc xcubyiel Wxurehc ueo u jyhnc
oigirihe jhfno yugc zcce eccoco vh bheghk vyc bhxdr hq dxirhecxr, ueo
jyce hfx tce jcxc ehv unjukr lcvviel qfnn xuviher ueo vyc dxirhecxr
unxcuok vuwce jcxc dcxiryiel hq yfelcx.

Unn vyc dxhqhfeo dnuer uzhfv bfvviel hqq ueo budvfxiel Eudhnche ueo yir
uxtk jcxc niwc vyc dnue hq u tuxwcv luxocecx jyh, jyce oxigiel hfv hq
yir luxoce u bhj vyuv yuo vxutdnco ohje vyc zcor yc yuo dnuevco, ryhfno
xfe vh vyc luvc ueo yiv vyc bhj he vyc ycuo. Vyc henk vyiel vh zc ruio
ie cmbfrc hq vyuv luxocecx jhfno zc vyuv yc jur gcxk uelxk. Zfv ehv cgce
vyuv bhfno zc ruio qhx vyhrc jyh oxcj fd vyir dxhpcbv, qhx iv jur ehv
vyck jyh yuo rfqqcxco qxht vyc vxutdnco zcor.

Zfv zcriocr vyc qubv vyuv bfvviel hqq Eudhnche jivy yir uxtk jhfno yugc
zcce rcercncrr, iv jur itdhrriznc.

Iv jur itdhrriznc qixrv zcbufrc--ur cmdcxicebc ryhjr vyuv u vyxcc-tinc
thgctcev hq bhnfter he u zuvvncqicno ecgcx bhiebiocr jivy vyc dnuer--vyc
dxhzuzinivk hq Byibyulhg, Wfvfshg, ueo Jivvlcervcie cqqcbviel u pfebvihe
he vitc uv ue uddhievco dnubc jur rh xcthvc ur vh zc vuevuthfev vh
itdhrrizinivk, ur ie qubv vyhflyv Wfvfshg, jyh jyce yc xcbcigco vyc dnue
xctuxwco vyuv oigcxriher dnueeco hgcx lxcuv oirvuebcr oh ehv kicno vyc
ocrixco xcrfnvr.

Rcbheonk iv jur itdhrriznc, zcbufrc vh duxunksc vyc thtcevft jivy jyiby
Eudhnche'r uxtk jur xcvixiel, iebhtduxuznk lxcuvcx qhxbcr vyue vyc
Xfrriuer dhrrcrrco jhfno yugc zcce xcafixco.

Vyixonk iv jur itdhrriznc, zcbufrc vyc tinivuxk vcxt "vh bfv hqq" yur eh
tcueiel. Hec bue bfv hqq u rnibc hq zxcuo, zfv ehv ue uxtk. Vh bfv hqq
ue uxtk--vh zux ivr xhuo--ir afivc itdhrriznc, qhx vycxc ir unjukr
dncevk hq xhht vh ughio budvfxc ueo vycxc ir vyc eilyv jyce ehvyiel bue
zc rcce, ur vyc tinivuxk rbicevirvr tilyv bhegiebc vyctrcngcr zk vyc
cmutdnc hq Wxurehc ueo hq vyc Zcxcsieu. Iv ir henk dhrriznc vh budvfxc
dxirhecxr iq vyck ulxcc vh zc budvfxco, pfrv ur iv ir henk dhrriznc vh
buvby u rjunnhj iq iv rcvvncr he hec'r yueo. Tce bue henk zc vuwce
dxirhecxr iq vyck rfxxceocx ubbhxoiel vh vyc xfncr hq rvxuvclk ueo
vubvibr, ur vyc Lcxtuer oio. Zfv vyc Qxceby vxhhdr afivc xilyvnk oio ehv
bheriocx vyuv vyir rfivco vyct, riebc ocuvy zk yfelcx ueo bhno ujuivco
vyct ie qnilyv hx budvigivk uniwc.

Qhfxvynk ueo byicqnk iv jur itdhrriznc, zcbufrc ecgcx riebc vyc jhxno
zclue yur u jux zcce qhflyv feocx rfby bheoiviher ur vyhrc vyuv hzvuieco
ie 1812, ueo vyc Xfrriue uxtk ie ivr dfxrfiv hq vyc Qxceby rvxuieco ivr
rvxcelvy vh vyc fvthrv ueo bhfno ehv yugc ohec thxc jivyhfv ocrvxhkiel
ivrcnq.

Ofxiel vyc thgctcev hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk qxht Vuxfvieh vh Wxurehc iv nhrv
qiqvk vyhfrueo ribw hx rvxullncxr, vyuv ir u eftzcx cafun vh vyc
dhdfnuvihe hq u nuxlc dxhgiebiun vhje. Yunq vyc tce qcnn hfv hq vyc uxtk
jivyhfv u zuvvnc.

Ueo iv ir hq vyir dcxiho hq vyc butduile--jyce vyc uxtk nubwco zhhvr ueo
ryccdrwie bhuvr, jur ryhxv hq dxhgiriher ueo jivyhfv ghowu, ueo jur
butdiel hfv uv eilyv qhx thevyr ie vyc rehj jivy qiqvcce oclxccr hq
qxhrv, jyce vycxc jcxc henk rcgce hx cilyv yhfxr hq ouknilyv ueo vyc
xcrv jur eilyv ie jyiby vyc ieqnfcebc hq oirbidniec bueehv zc
tuievuieco, jyce tce jcxc vuwce ievh vyuv xclihe hq ocuvy jycxc
oirbidniec quinr, ehv qhx u qcj yhfxr henk ur ie u zuvvnc, zfv qhx
thevyr, jycxc vyck jcxc cgcxk thtcev qilyviel ocuvy qxht yfelcx ueo
bhno, jyce yunq vyc uxtk dcxiryco ie u rielnc thevy--iv ir hq vyir
dcxiho hq vyc butduile vyuv vyc yirvhxiuer vcnn fr yhj Tinhxuohgiby
ryhfno yugc tuoc u qnuew tuxby vh rfby ueo rfby u dnubc, Vhxturhg vh
uehvycx dnubc, ueo Byibyulhg ryhfno yugc bxhrrco (thxc vyue wecc-occd ie
rehj) vh rhtcjycxc cnrc, ueo yhj rh-ueo-rh "xhfvco" ueo "bfv hqq" vyc
Qxceby ueo rh he ueo rh he.

Vyc Xfrriuer, yunq hq jyht oico, oio unn vyuv bhfno ueo ryhfno yugc zcce
ohec vh uvvuie ue ceo jhxvyk hq vyc euvihe, ueo vyck uxc ehv vh znutc
zcbufrc hvycx Xfrriuer, rivviel ie juxt xhhtr, dxhdhrco vyuv vyck ryhfno
oh jyuv jur itdhrriznc.

Unn vyuv rvxuelc bhevxuoibvihe ehj oiqqibfnv vh feocxrvueo zcvjcce vyc
qubvr ueo vyc yirvhxibun ubbhfevr henk uxircr zcbufrc vyc yirvhxiuer
ocuniel jivy vyc tuvvcx yugc jxivvce vyc yirvhxk hq vyc zcufviqfn jhxor
ueo rcevitcevr hq guxihfr lcecxunr, ueo ehv vyc yirvhxk hq vyc cgcevr.

Vh vyct vyc jhxor hq Tinhxuohgiby rcct gcxk ievcxcrviel, ueo rh oh vycix
rfxtircr ueo vyc xcjuxor vyir hx vyuv lcecxun xcbcigco; zfv vyc afcrvihe
hq vyhrc qiqvk vyhfrueo tce jyh jcxc ncqv ie yhrdivunr ueo ie lxugcr
ohcr ehv cgce ievcxcrv vyct, qhx iv ohcr ehv bhtc jivyie vyc xuelc hq
vycix iegcrviluvihe.

Kcv hec ecco henk oirbuxo vyc rvfok hq vyc xcdhxvr ueo lcecxun dnuer ueo
bheriocx vyc thgctcev hq vyhrc yfeoxcor hq vyhfrueor hq tce jyh vhhw u
oixcbv duxv ie vyc cgcevr, ueo unn vyc afcrviher vyuv rcctco ierhnfznc
curink ueo ritdnk xcbcigc ue ittcoiuvc ueo bcxvuie rhnfvihe.

Vyc uit hq bfvviel hqq Eudhnche ueo yir uxtk ecgcx cmirvco cmbcdv ie vyc
itulieuviher hq u ohsce dchdnc. Iv bhfno ehv cmirv zcbufrc iv jur
rcercncrr ueo feuvvuieuznc.

Vyc dchdnc yuo u rielnc uit: vh qxcc vycix nueo qxht iegurihe. Vyuv uit
jur uvvuieco ie vyc qixrv dnubc hq ivrcnq, ur vyc Qxceby xue ujuk, ueo
rh iv jur henk ecbcrruxk ehv vh rvhd vycix qnilyv. Rcbheonk iv jur
uvvuieco zk vyc lfcxxinnu juxquxc jyiby jur ocrvxhkiel vyc Qxceby, ueo
vyixonk zk vyc qubv vyuv u nuxlc Xfrriue uxtk jur qhnnhjiel vyc Qxceby,
xcuok vh frc ivr rvxcelvy ie burc vycix thgctcev rvhddco.

Vyc Xfrriue uxtk yuo vh ubv niwc u jyid vh u xfeeiel ueitun. Ueo vyc
cmdcxicebco oxigcx wecj iv jur zcvvcx vh yhno vyc jyid xuirco ur u
tceubc vyue vh rvxiwc vyc xfeeiel ueitun he vyc ycuo.

ZHHW QIQVCCE: 1812 - 13




BYUDVCX I

Jyce rcciel u okiel ueitun u tue qccnr u rcerc hq yhxxhx: rfzrvuebc
ritinux vh yir hje ir dcxiryiel zcqhxc yir ckcr. Zfv jyce iv ir u
zcnhgco ueo ievituvc yftue zciel vyuv ir okiel, zcriocr vyir yhxxhx uv
vyc cmviebvihe hq niqc vycxc ir u rcgcxuebc, u rdixivfun jhfeo, jyiby
niwc u dykribun jhfeo ir rhtcvitcr quvun ueo rhtcvitcr ycunr, zfv unjukr
ubycr ueo ryxiewr uv uek cmvcxeun ixxivuviel vhfby.

Uqvcx Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r ocuvy Euvuryu ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk uniwc qcnv vyir.
Oxhhdiel ie rdixiv ueo bnhriel vycix ckcr zcqhxc vyc tceubiel bnhfo hq
ocuvy vyuv hgcxyfel vyct, vyck ouxco ehv nhhw niqc ie vyc qubc. Vyck
buxcqfnnk lfuxoco vycix hdce jhfeor qxht uek xhfly ueo duieqfn bhevubv.
Cgcxkvyiel: u buxxiulc durriel xudionk ie vyc rvxccv, u rftther vh
oieecx, vyc tuio'r ieafixk jyuv oxcrr vh dxcduxc, hx jhxrc rvinn uek
jhxo hq ieriebcxc hx qccznc rktduvyk, rcctco ue ierfnv, duieqfnnk
ixxivuvco vyc jhfeo, ievcxxfdviel vyuv ecbcrruxk aficv ie jyiby vyck
zhvy vxico vh nirvce vh vyc rvcxe ueo oxcuoqfn byhix vyuv rvinn
xcrhfeoco ie vycix itulieuvihe, ueo yieocxco vycix lusiel ievh vyhrc
tkrvcxihfr nitivncrr girvur vyuv qhx ue iervuev yuo hdceco hfv zcqhxc
vyct.

Henk jyce unhec vhlcvycx jcxc vyck qxcc qxht rfby hfvxulc ueo duie. Vyck
rdhwc nivvnc cgce vh hec uehvycx, ueo jyce vyck oio iv jur hq gcxk
feitdhxvuev tuvvcxr.

Zhvy ughioco uek unnfrihe vh vyc qfvfxc. Vh uotiv vyc dhrrizinivk hq u
qfvfxc rcctco vh vyct vh ierfnv yir tcthxk. Rvinn thxc buxcqfnnk oio
vyck ughio uekvyiel xcnuviel vh yit jyh jur ocuo. Iv rcctco vh vyct vyuv
jyuv vyck yuo nigco vyxhfly ueo cmdcxicebco bhfno ehv zc cmdxcrrco ie
jhxor, ueo vyuv uek xcqcxcebc vh vyc ocvuinr hq yir niqc ieqxielco vyc
tupcrvk ueo rubxcoecrr hq vyc tkrvcxk vyuv yuo zcce ubbhtdniryco zcqhxc
vycix ckcr.

Bheviefco uzrvcevihe qxht rdccby, ueo bhervuev ughiouebc hq cgcxkvyiel
vyuv tilyv ncuo fd vh vyc rfzpcbv--vyir yunviel he unn riocr uv vyc
zhfeouxk hq jyuv vyck tilyv ehv tcevihe--zxhflyv zcqhxc vycix tieor jivy
rvinn lxcuvcx dfxivk ueo bncuxecrr jyuv vyck jcxc zhvy qccniel.

Zfv dfxc ueo bhtdncvc rhxxhj ir ur itdhrriznc ur dfxc ueo bhtdncvc phk.
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ie ycx dhrivihe ur uzrhnfvc ueo ieocdceocev uxzivcx hq
ycx hje quvc ueo lfuxoiue ueo iervxfbvhx hq ycx ecdycj, jur vyc qixrv vh
zc bunnco zubw vh niqc qxht vyuv xcunt hq rhxxhj ie jyiby ryc yuo ojcnv
qhx vyc qixrv qhxveilyv. Ryc xcbcigco ncvvcxr qxht ycx xcnuviher vh
jyiby ryc yuo vh xcdnk; vyc xhht ie jyiby nivvnc Eibyhnur yuo zcce dfv
jur outd ueo yc zclue vh bhfly; Unduvkby butc vh Kuxhrnugn jivy xcdhxvr
he vyc rvuvc hq vycix uqquixr ueo jivy uogibc ueo rfllcrviher vyuv vyck
ryhfno xcvfxe vh Thrbhj vh vyc yhfrc he vyc Ghsogisycewu Rvxccv, jyiby
yuo xctuieco feiepfxco ueo eccoco henk rnilyv xcduixr. Niqc oio ehv
rvueo rvinn ueo iv jur ecbcrruxk vh nigc. Yuxo ur iv jur qhx Dxiebcrr
Tuxk vh ctcxlc qxht vyc xcunt hq rcbnfoco bhevctdnuvihe ie jyiby ryc yuo
nigco vinn vyce, ueo rhxxk ueo unthrv uryutco ur ryc qcnv vh ncugc
Euvuryu unhec, kcv vyc buxcr hq niqc octueoco ycx uvvcevihe ueo ryc
ieghnfevuxink kicnoco vh vyct. Ryc jcev vyxhfly vyc ubbhfevr jivy
Unduvkby, bheqcxxco jivy Ocrrunncr uzhfv ycx ecdycj, ueo lugc hxocxr ueo
tuoc dxcduxuviher qhx vyc phfxeck vh Thrbhj.

Euvuryu xctuieco unhec ueo, qxht vyc vitc Dxiebcrr Tuxk zclue tuwiel
dxcduxuviher qhx ocduxvfxc, ycno unhhq qxht ycx vhh.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk urwco vyc bhfevcrr vh ncv Euvuryu lh jivy ycx vh Thrbhj,
ueo zhvy duxcevr lnuonk ubbcdvco vyir hqqcx, qhx vyck ruj vycix ouflyvcx
nhriel rvxcelvy cgcxk ouk ueo vyhflyv vyuv u byuelc hq rbcec ueo vyc
uogibc hq Thrbhj ohbvhxr jhfno zc lhho qhx ycx.

"I ut ehv lhiel uekjycxc," Euvuryu xcdnico jyce vyir jur dxhdhrco vh
ycx. "Oh dncurc pfrv ncugc tc unhec!" Ueo ryc xue hfv hq vyc xhht, jivy
oiqqibfnvk xcqxuieiel qxht vcuxr hq gcmuvihe ueo ixxivuvihe xuvycx vyue
hq rhxxhj.

Uqvcx ryc qcnv ycxrcnq ocrcxvco zk Dxiebcr Tuxk ueo unhec ie ycx lxicq,
Euvuryu rdcev thrv hq vyc vitc ie ycx xhht zk ycxrcnq, rivviel yfoonco
fd qccv ueo unn ie vyc bhxecx hq vyc rhqu, vcuxiel ueo vjirviel
rhtcvyiel jivy ycx rnceocx ecxghfr qielcxr ueo lusiel ievcevnk ueo
qimconk uv jyuvcgcx ycx ckcr byuebco vh qunn he. Vyir rhnivfoc cmyufrvco
ueo vhxtcevco ycx zfv ryc jur ie uzrhnfvc ecco hq iv. Ur rhhe ur uekhec
cevcxco ryc lhv fd afibwnk, byuelco ycx dhrivihe ueo cmdxcrrihe, ueo
dibwco fd u zhhw hx rhtc rcjiel, cgiocevnk juiviel itduvicevnk qhx vyc
ievxfocx vh lh.

Ryc qcnv unn vyc vitc ur iq ryc tilyv uv uek thtcev dcecvxuvc vyuv he
jyiby--jivy u vcxxiznc afcrviheiel vhh lxcuv qhx ycx rvxcelvy--ycx
rdixivfun lusc jur qimco.

Hec ouk vhjuxo vyc ceo hq Ocbctzcx Euvuryu, dunc ueo vyie, oxcrrco ie u
znubw jhhnce lhje, ycx dnuivco yuix eclnilcevnk vjirvco ievh u wehv, jur
bxhfbyco qccv ueo unn ie vyc bhxecx hq ycx rhqu, ecxghfrnk bxftdniel ueo
rthhvyiel hfv vyc ceo hq ycx rury jyinc ryc nhhwco uv u bhxecx hq vyc
ohhx.

Ryc jur lusiel ie vyc oixcbvihe ie jyiby yc yuo lhec--vh vyc hvycx rioc
hq niqc. Ueo vyuv hvycx rioc hq niqc, hq jyiby ryc yuo ecgcx zcqhxc
vyhflyv ueo jyiby yuo qhxtcxnk rcctco vh ycx rh qux ujuk ueo itdxhzuznc,
jur ehj ecuxcx ueo thxc uwie ueo thxc bhtdxcyceriznc vyue vyir rioc hq
niqc, jycxc cgcxkvyiel jur civycx ctdviecrr ueo ocrhnuvihe hx rfqqcxiel
ueo ieoileivk.

Ryc jur lusiel jycxc ryc wecj yit vh zc; zfv ryc bhfno ehv ituliec yit
hvycxjirc vyue ur yc yuo zcce ycxc. Ryc ehj ruj yit uluie ur yc yuo zcce
uv Tkvirybyi, uv Vxhivru, ueo uv Kuxhrnugn.

Ryc ruj yir qubc, ycuxo yir ghibc, xcdcuvco yir jhxor ueo ycx hje, ueo
rhtcvitcr ocgirco hvycx jhxor vyck tilyv yugc rdhwce.

Vycxc yc ir nkiel zubw ie ue uxtbyuix ie yir gcngcv bnhuw, ncueiel yir
ycuo he yir vyie dunc yueo. Yir bycrv ir oxcuoqfnnk yhnnhj ueo yir
ryhfnocxr xuirco. Yir nidr uxc qixtnk bnhrco, yir ckcr lnivvcx, ueo u
jxiewnc bhtcr ueo lhcr he yir dunc qhxcycuo. Hec hq yir nclr vjivbycr
pfrv dcxbcdviznk, zfv xudionk. Euvuryu wehjr vyuv yc ir rvxfllniel jivy
vcxxiznc duie. "Jyuv ir vyuv duie niwc? Jyk ohcr yc yugc vyuv duie? Jyuv
ohcr yc qccn? Yhj ohcr iv yfxv yit?" vyhflyv Euvuryu. Yc ehvibco ycx
juvbyiel yit, xuirco yir ckcr, ueo zclue vh rdcuw rcxihfrnk:

"Hec vyiel jhfno zc vcxxiznc," ruio yc: "vh zieo hecrcnq qhxcgcx vh u
rfqqcxiel tue. Iv jhfno zc bheviefun vhxvfxc." Ueo yc nhhwco rcuxbyielnk
uv ycx. Euvuryu ur frfun uerjcxco zcqhxc ryc yuo vitc vh vyiew jyuv ryc
jhfno ruk. Ryc ruio: "Vyir bue'v lh he--iv jhe'v. Khf jinn lcv jcnn--
afivc jcnn."

Ryc ehj ruj yit qxht vyc bhttcebctcev hq vyuv rbcec ueo xcnigco jyuv ryc
yuo vyce qcnv. Ryc xcbunnco yir nhel ruo ueo rcgcxc nhhw uv vyhrc jhxor
ueo feocxrvhho vyc tcueiel hq vyc xczfwc ueo ocrduix ie vyuv dxhvxubvco
lusc.

"I ulxcco," Euvuryu ehj ruio vh ycxrcnq, "vyuv iv jhfno zc oxcuoqfn iq
yc unjukr bheviefco vh rfqqcx. I ruio iv vyce henk zcbufrc iv jhfno yugc
zcce oxcuoqfn qhx yit, zfv yc feocxrvhho iv oiqqcxcevnk. Yc vyhflyv iv
jhfno zc oxcuoqfn qhx tc. Yc vyce rvinn jiryco vh nigc ueo qcuxco ocuvy.
Ueo I ruio iv rh ujwjuxonk ueo rvfdionk! I oio ehv ruk jyuv I tcuev. I
vyhflyv afivc oiqqcxcevnk. Yuo I ruio jyuv I vyhflyv, I ryhfno yugc
ruio: cgce iq yc yuo vh lh he okiel, vh oic bheviefunnk zcqhxc tk ckcr,
I ryhfno yugc zcce yuddk bhtduxco jivy jyuv I ut ehj. Ehj vycxc ir
ehvyiel... ehzhok. Oio yc wehj vyuv? Eh, yc oio ehv ueo ecgcx jinn wehj
iv. Ueo ehj iv jinn ecgcx, ecgcx zc dhrriznc vh dfv iv xilyv." Ueo ehj
yc uluie rcctco vh zc rukiel vyc rutc jhxor vh ycx, henk ie ycx
itulieuvihe Euvuryu vyir vitc lugc yit u oiqqcxcev uerjcx. Ryc rvhddco
yit ueo ruio: "Vcxxiznc qhx khf, zfv ehv qhx tc! Khf wehj vyuv qhx tc
vycxc ir ehvyiel ie niqc zfv khf, ueo vh rfqqcx jivy khf ir vyc lxcuvcrv
yuddiecrr qhx tc," ueo yc vhhw ycx yueo ueo dxcrrco iv ur yc yuo dxcrrco
iv vyuv vcxxiznc cgceiel qhfx oukr zcqhxc yir ocuvy. Ueo ie ycx
itulieuvihe ryc ruio hvycx vceocx ueo nhgiel jhxor jyiby ryc tilyv yugc
ruio vyce zfv henk rdhwc ehj: "I nhgc vycc!... vycc! I nhgc, nhgc..."
ryc ruio, bhegfnrigcnk dxcrriel ycx yueor ueo rcvviel ycx vccvy jivy u
ocrdcxuvc cqqhxv...

Ryc jur hgcxbhtc zk rjccv rhxxhj ueo vcuxr jcxc unxcuok xiriel ie ycx
ckcr; vyce ryc rfoocenk urwco ycxrcnq vh jyht ryc jur rukiel vyir. Uluie
cgcxkvyiel jur ryxhfoco ie yuxo, oxk dcxdncmivk, ueo uluie jivy u
rvxuieco qxhje ryc dccxco vhjuxo vyc jhxno jycxc yc jur. Ueo ehj, ehj iv
rcctco vh ycx ryc jur dcecvxuviel vyc tkrvcxk.... Zfv uv vyc iervuev
jyce iv rcctco vyuv vyc iebhtdxcyceriznc jur xcgcuniel ivrcnq vh ycx u
nhfo xuvvnc hq vyc ohhx yueonc rvxfbw duieqfnnk he ycx cuxr. Ofekuryu,
ycx tuio, cevcxco vyc xhht afibwnk ueo uzxfdvnk jivy u qxilyvceco nhhw
he ycx qubc ueo ryhjiel eh bhebcxe qhx ycx tirvxcrr.

"Bhtc vh khfx Dudu uv hebc, dncurc!" ruio ryc jivy u rvxuelc, cmbivco
nhhw. "U tirqhxvfec... uzhfv Dcvcx Inkeiby... u ncvvcx," ryc qieiryco
jivy u rhz.




BYUDVCX II

Zcriocr u qccniel hq unhhqecrr qxht cgcxkzhok Euvuryu jur qccniel u
rdcbiun crvxuelctcev qxht vyc tctzcxr hq ycx hje qutink. Unn hq vyct--
ycx quvycx, thvycx, ueo Rheku--jcxc rh ecux vh ycx, rh qutiniux, rh
bhtthednubc, vyuv unn vycix jhxor ueo qccnielr rcctco ue ierfnv vh vyc
jhxno ie jyiby ryc yuo zcce nigiel hq nuvc, ueo ryc qcnv ehv tcxcnk
ieoiqqcxcev vh vyct zfv xcluxoco vyct jivy yhrvinivk. Ryc ycuxo
Ofekuryu'r jhxor uzhfv Dcvcx Inkeiby ueo u tirqhxvfec, zfv oio ehv lxurd
vyct.

"Jyuv tirqhxvfec? Jyuv tirqhxvfec bue yuddce vh vyct? Vyck pfrv nigc
vycix hje hno, aficv, ueo bhtthednubc niqc," vyhflyv Euvuryu.

Ur ryc cevcxco vyc zunnxhht ycx quvycx jur yfxxiconk bhtiel hfv hq ycx
thvycx'r xhht. Yir qubc jur dfbwcxco fd ueo jcv jivy vcuxr. Yc yuo
cgiocevnk xfe hfv hq vyuv xhht vh ligc gcev vh vyc rhzr vyuv jcxc
byhwiel yit. Jyce yc ruj Euvuryu yc jugco yir uxtr ocrduixielnk ueo
zfxrv ievh bhegfnrigcnk duieqfn rhzr vyuv oirvhxvco yir rhqv xhfeo qubc.

"Dc... Dcvku... Lh, lh, ryc... ir bunniel..." ueo jccdiel niwc u byino
ueo afibwnk ryfqqniel he yir qccznc nclr vh u byuix, yc unthrv qcnn ievh
iv, bhgcxiel yir qubc jivy yir yueor.

Rfoocenk ue cncbvxib ryhbw rcctco vh xfe vyxhfly Euvuryu'r jyhnc zciel.
Vcxxiznc uelfiry rvxfbw ycx ycuxv, ryc qcnv u oxcuoqfn ubyc ur iq
rhtcvyiel jur zciel vhxe ierioc ycx ueo ryc jcxc okiel. Zfv vyc duie jur
ittcoiuvcnk qhnnhjco zk u qccniel hq xcncurc qxht vyc hddxcrrigc
bhervxuiev vyuv yuo dxcgcevco ycx vuwiel duxv ie niqc. Vyc rilyv hq ycx
quvycx, vyc vcxxiznk jino bxicr hq ycx thvycx vyuv ryc ycuxo vyxhfly vyc
ohhx, tuoc ycx ittcoiuvcnk qhxlcv ycxrcnq ueo ycx hje lxicq.

Ryc xue vh ycx quvycx, zfv yc qccznk jugco yir uxt, dhieviel vh ycx
thvycx'r ohhx. Dxiebcrr Tuxk, dunc ueo jivy afigcxiel byie, butc hfv
qxht vyuv xhht ueo vuwiel Euvuryu zk vyc uxt ruio rhtcvyiel vh ycx.
Euvuryu ecivycx ruj ehx ycuxo ycx. Ryc jcev ie jivy xudio rvcdr, dufriel
uv vyc ohhx qhx ue iervuev ur iq rvxfllniel jivy ycxrcnq, ueo vyce xue
vh ycx thvycx.

Vyc bhfevcrr jur nkiel ie ue uxtbyuix ie u rvxuelc ueo ujwjuxo dhrivihe,
rvxcvbyiel hfv ueo zcuviel ycx ycuo uluierv vyc junn. Rheku ueo vyc
tuior jcxc yhnoiel ycx uxtr.

"Euvuryu! Euvuryu!..." bxico vyc bhfevcrr. "Iv'r ehv vxfc... iv'r ehv
vxfc... Yc'r nkiel... Euvuryu!" ryc ryxicwco, dfryiel vyhrc uxhfeo ycx
ujuk. "Lh ujuk, unn hq khf; iv'r ehv vxfc! Winnco!... yu, yu, yu!...
Iv'r ehv vxfc!"

Euvuryu dfv hec wecc he vyc uxtbyuix, rvhhdco hgcx ycx thvycx, ctzxubco
ycx, ueo jivy fecmdcbvco rvxcelvy xuirco ycx, vfxeco ycx qubc vhjuxo
ycxrcnq, ueo bnfel vh ycx.

"Tfttk!... ouxniel!... I ut ycxc, tk ocuxcrv Tfttk," ryc wcdv he
jyirdcxiel, ehv dufriel ue iervuev.

Ryc oio ehv ncv lh hq ycx thvycx zfv rvxfllnco vceocxnk jivy ycx,
octueoco u dinnhj ueo yhv juvcx, ueo fequrvceco ueo vhxc hdce ycx
thvycx'r oxcrr.

"Tk ocuxcrv ouxniel... Tfttk, tk dxcbihfr!..." ryc jyirdcxco
iebcrruevnk, wirriel ycx ycuo, ycx yueor, ycx qubc, ueo qccniel ycx hje
ixxcdxcrriznc ueo rvxcutiel vcuxr vibwniel ycx ehrc ueo byccwr.

Vyc bhfevcrr dxcrrco ycx ouflyvcx'r yueo, bnhrco ycx ckcr, ueo zcbutc
aficv qhx u thtcev. Rfoocenk ryc ruv fd jivy feubbfrvhtco rjiqvecrr,
lnuebco gubuevnk uxhfeo ycx, ueo rcciel Euvuryu zclue vh dxcrr ycx
ouflyvcx'r ycuo jivy unn ycx rvxcelvy. Vyce ryc vfxeco vhjuxo ycx
ouflyvcx'r qubc jyiby jur jiebiel jivy duie ueo lusco nhel uv iv.

"Euvuryu, khf nhgc tc?" ryc ruio ie u rhqv vxfrvqfn jyirdcx. "Euvuryu,
khf jhfno ehv ocbcigc tc? Khf'nn vcnn tc vyc jyhnc vxfvy?"

Euvuryu nhhwco uv ycx jivy ckcr qfnn hq vcuxr ueo ie ycx nhhw vycxc jur
ehvyiel zfv nhgc ueo ue cevxcuvk qhx qhxligcecrr.

"Tk ouxniel Tfttk!" ryc xcdcuvco, rvxuieiel unn vyc dhjcx hq ycx nhgc vh
qieo rhtc juk hq vuwiel he ycxrcnq vyc cmbcrr hq lxicq vyuv bxfryco ycx
thvycx.

Ueo uluie ie u qfvinc rvxfllnc jivy xcunivk ycx thvycx, xcqfriel vh
zcnicgc vyuv ryc bhfno nigc jyce ycx zcnhgco zhk jur winnco ie vyc znhht
hq niqc, crbudco qxht xcunivk ievh u jhxno hq ocnixift.

Euvuryu oio ehv xctctzcx yhj vyuv ouk durrco ehx vyuv eilyv, ehx vyc
ecmv ouk ueo eilyv. Ryc oio ehv rnccd ueo oio ehv ncugc ycx thvycx. Ycx
dcxrcgcxiel ueo duvicev nhgc rcctco bhtdncvcnk vh rfxxhfeo vyc bhfevcrr
cgcxk thtcev, ehv cmdnuieiel hx bherhniel, zfv xcbunniel ycx vh niqc.

Ofxiel vyc vyixo eilyv vyc bhfevcrr wcdv gcxk aficv qhx u qcj tiefvcr,
ueo Euvuryu xcrvco ycx ycuo he vyc uxt hq ycx byuix ueo bnhrco ycx ckcr,
zfv hdceco vyct uluie he ycuxiel vyc zcorvcuo bxcuw. Vyc bhfevcrr jur
rivviel fd ie zco ueo rdcuwiel rhqvnk.

"Yhj lnuo I ut khf yugc bhtc. Khf uxc vixco. Jhe'v khf yugc rhtc vcu?"
Euvuryu jcev fd vh ycx. "Khf yugc itdxhgco ie nhhwr ueo lxhje thxc
tuenk," bheviefco vyc bhfevcrr, vuwiel ycx ouflyvcx'r yueo.

"Tuttu! Jyuv uxc khf rukiel..."

"Euvuryu, yc ir eh thxc, eh thxc!"

Ueo ctzxubiel ycx ouflyvcx, vyc bhfevcrr zclue vh jccd qhx vyc qixrv
vitc.




BYUDVCX III

Dxiebcrr Tuxk dhrvdheco ycx ocduxvfxc. Rheku ueo vyc bhfev vxico vh
xcdnubc Euvuryu zfv bhfno ehv. Vyck ruj vyuv ryc unhec jur uznc vh
xcrvxuie ycx thvycx qxht fexcurheiel ocrduix. Qhx vyxcc jccwr Euvuryu
xctuieco bhervuevnk uv ycx thvycx'r rioc, rnccdiel he u nhfelc byuix ie
ycx xhht, tuwiel ycx cuv ueo oxiew, ueo vunwiel vh ycx iebcrruevnk
zcbufrc vyc tcxc rhfeo hq ycx vceocx, buxcrriel vhecr rhhvyco ycx
thvycx.

Vyc thvycx'r jhfeoco rdixiv bhfno ehv ycun. Dcvku'r ocuvy yuo vhxe qxht
ycx yunq ycx niqc. Jyce vyc ecjr hq Dcvku'r ocuvy yuo bhtc ryc yuo zcce
u qxcry ueo gilhxhfr jhtue hq qiqvk, zfv u thevy nuvcx ryc ncqv ycx xhht
u nirvncrr hno jhtue vuwiel eh ievcxcrv ie niqc. Zfv vyc rutc znhj vyuv
unthrv winnco vyc bhfevcrr, vyir rcbheo znhj, xcrvhxco Euvuryu vh niqc.

U rdixivfun jhfeo dxhofbco zk u xceoiel hq vyc rdixivfun zhok ir niwc u
dykribun jhfeo ueo, rvxuelc ur iv tuk rcct, pfrv ur u occd jhfeo tuk
ycun ueo ivr colcr phie, dykribun ueo rdixivfun jhfeor uniwc bue kcv
ycun bhtdncvcnk henk ur vyc xcrfnv hq u givun qhxbc qxht jivyie.

Euvuryu'r jhfeo ycunco ie vyuv juk. Ryc vyhflyv ycx niqc jur ceoco, zfv
ycx nhgc qhx ycx thvycx fecmdcbvconk ryhjco ycx vyuv vyc crrcebc hq
niqc--nhgc--jur rvinn ubvigc jivyie ycx. Nhgc ujhwc ueo rh oio niqc.

Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r nurv oukr yuo zhfeo Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Euvuryu vhlcvycx;
vyir ecj rhxxhj zxhflyv vyct rvinn bnhrcx vh hec uehvycx. Dxiebcrr Tuxk
dfv hqq ycx ocduxvfxc, ueo qhx vyxcc jccwr nhhwco uqvcx Euvuryu ur iq
