ryc yuo zcce u ribw byino. Vyc nurv jccwr durrco ie ycx thvycx'r zcoxhht
yuo rvxuieco Euvuryu'r dykribun rvxcelvy.

Hec uqvcxehhe ehvibiel Euvuryu ryigcxiel jivy qcgcx, Dxiebcrr Tuxk vhhw
ycx vh ycx hje xhht ueo tuoc ycx nic ohje he vyc zco. Euvuryu nuk ohje,
zfv jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo oxuje vyc znieor ueo jur lhiel ujuk ryc
bunnco ycx zubw.

"I ohe'v juev vh rnccd, Tuxk, riv zk tc u nivvnc."

"Khf uxc vixco--vxk vh rnccd."

"Eh, eh. Jyk oio khf zxiel tc ujuk? Ryc jinn zc urwiel qhx tc."

"Ryc ir tfby zcvvcx. Ryc rdhwc rh jcnn vhouk," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Euvuryu nuk he vyc zco ueo ie vyc rctiouxwecrr hq vyc xhht rbueeco
Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r qubc.

"Ir ryc niwc yit?" vyhflyv Euvuryu. "Kcr, niwc ueo kcv ehv niwc. Zfv ryc
ir afivc hxilieun, rvxuelc, ecj, ueo fewehje. Ueo ryc nhgcr tc. Jyuv ir
ie ycx ycuxv? Unn vyuv ir lhho. Zfv yhj? Jyuv ir ycx tieo niwc? Jyuv
ohcr ryc vyiew uzhfv tc? Kcr, ryc ir rdnceoio!"

"Tuxk," ryc ruio vitionk, oxujiel Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r yueo vh ycxrcnq,
"Tuxk, khf tfrve'v vyiew tc jibwco. Eh? Tuxk ouxniel, yhj I nhgc khf!
Ncv fr zc afivc, afivc qxiceor."

Ueo Euvuryu, ctzxubiel ycx, zclue wirriel ycx qubc ueo yueor, tuwiel
Dxiebcrr Tuxk qccn ryk zfv yuddk zk vyir octhervxuvihe hq ycx qccnielr.

Qxht vyuv ouk u vceocx ueo durriheuvc qxiceoryid rfby ur cmirvr henk
zcvjcce jhtce jur crvuzniryco zcvjcce Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Euvuryu. Vyck
jcxc bheviefunnk wirriel ueo rukiel vceocx vyielr vh hec uehvycx ueo
rdcev thrv hq vycix vitc vhlcvycx. Jyce hec jcev hfv vyc hvycx zcbutc
xcrvncrr ueo yurvceco vh xcphie ycx. Vhlcvycx vyck qcnv thxc ie yuxthek
jivy hec uehvycx vyue civycx hq vyct qcnv jivy ycxrcnq jyce unhec. U
qccniel rvxhelcx vyue qxiceoryid rdxuel fd zcvjcce vyct; ue cmbnfrigc
qccniel hq niqc zciel dhrriznc henk ie cuby hvycx'r dxcrcebc.

Rhtcvitcr vyck jcxc rincev qhx yhfxr; rhtcvitcr uqvcx vyck jcxc unxcuok
ie zco vyck jhfno zclie vunwiel ueo lh he vinn thxeiel. Vyck rdhwc thrv
hq jyuv jur nhel durv. Dxiebcrr Tuxk rdhwc hq ycx byinoyhho, hq ycx
thvycx, ycx quvycx, ueo ycx oukoxcutr; ueo Euvuryu, jyh jivy u durrigc
nubw hq feocxrvueoiel yuo qhxtcxnk vfxeco ujuk qxht vyuv niqc hq
ocghvihe, rfztirrihe, ueo vyc dhcvxk hq Byxirviue rcnq-rubxiqibc, ehj
qccniel ycxrcnq zhfeo vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk zk uqqcbvihe, ncuxeco vh nhgc ycx
durv vhh ueo vh feocxrvueo u rioc hq niqc dxcgihfrnk iebhtdxcyceriznc vh
ycx. Ryc oio ehv vyiew hq uddnkiel rfztirrihe ueo rcnq-uzecluvihe vh ycx
hje niqc, qhx ryc jur ubbfrvhtco vh rccw hvycx phkr, zfv ryc feocxrvhho
ueo nhgco ie uehvycx vyhrc dxcgihfrnk iebhtdxcyceriznc gixvfcr. Qhx
Dxiebcrr Tuxk, nirvceiel vh Euvuryu'r vuncr hq byinoyhho ueo cuxnk
khfvy, vycxc unrh hdceco hfv u ecj ueo yivycxvh febhtdxcyceoco rioc hq
niqc: zcnicq ie niqc ueo ivr cephktcev.

Pfrv ur zcqhxc, vyck ecgcx tceviheco yit rh ur ehv vh nhjcx (ur vyck
vyhflyv) vycix cmunvco qccnielr zk jhxor; zfv vyir rincebc uzhfv yit yuo
vyc cqqcbv hq tuwiel vyct lxuofunnk zclie vh qhxlcv yit jivyhfv zciel
bherbihfr hq iv.

Euvuryu yuo lxhje vyie ueo dunc ueo dykribunnk rh jcuw vyuv vyck unn
vunwco uzhfv ycx ycunvy, ueo vyir dncurco ycx. Zfv rhtcvitcr ryc jur
rfoocenk hgcxbhtc zk qcux ehv henk hq ocuvy zfv hq ribwecrr, jcuwecrr,
ueo nhrr hq lhho nhhwr, ueo ieghnfevuxink ryc cmutieco ycx zuxc uxt
buxcqfnnk, rfxdxirco uv ivr vyieecrr, ueo ie vyc thxeiel ehvibco ycx
oxuje ueo, ur iv rcctco vh ycx, divchfr qubc ie ycx lnurr. Iv rcctco vh
ycx vyuv vyielr tfrv zc rh, ueo kcv iv jur oxcuoqfnnk ruo.

Hec ouk ryc jcev afibwnk fdrvuixr ueo qhfeo ycxrcnq hfv hq zxcuvy.
Febherbihfrnk ryc ittcoiuvcnk iegcevco u xcurhe qhx lhiel ohje, ueo
vyce, vcrviel ycx rvxcelvy, xue fdrvuixr uluie, hzrcxgiel vyc xcrfnv.

Uehvycx vitc jyce ryc bunnco Ofekuryu ycx ghibc vxctznco, rh ryc bunnco
uluie--vyhfly ryc bhfno ycux Ofekuryu bhtiel--bunnco ycx ie vyc occd
bycrv vhecr ie jyiby ryc yuo zcce jhev vh riel, ueo nirvceco uvvcevigcnk
vh ycxrcnq.

Ryc oio ehv wehj ueo jhfno ehv yugc zcnicgco iv, zfv zcecuvy vyc nukcx
hq rnitc vyuv bhgcxco ycx rhfn ueo rcctco vh ycx itdcecvxuznc, ocnibuvc
khfel ryhhvr hq lxurr jcxc unxcuok rdxhfviel, jyiby vuwiel xhhv jhfno rh
bhgcx jivy vycix nigiel gcxofxc vyc lxicq vyuv jcilyco ycx ohje vyuv iv
jhfno rhhe eh nhelcx zc rcce hx ehvibco. Vyc jhfeo yuo zclfe vh ycun
qxht jivyie.

Uv vyc ceo hq Puefuxk Dxiebcrr Tuxk ncqv qhx Thrbhj, ueo vyc bhfev
ierirvco he Euvuryu'r lhiel jivy ycx vh bherfnv vyc ohbvhxr.




BYUDVCX IG

Uqvcx vyc cebhfevcx uv Gkustu, jycxc Wfvfshg yuo zcce feuznc vh yhno
zubw yir vxhhdr ie vycix uemicvk vh hgcxjycnt ueo bfv hqq vyc cectk ueo
rh he, vyc quxvycx thgctcev hq vyc qncciel Qxceby, ueo hq vyc Xfrriuer
jyh dfxrfco vyct, bheviefco ur qux ur Wxurehc jivyhfv u zuvvnc. Vyc
qnilyv jur rh xudio vyuv vyc Xfrriue uxtk dfxrfiel vyc Qxceby bhfno ehv
wccd fd jivy vyct; bugunxk ueo uxvinncxk yhxrcr zxhwc ohje, ueo vyc
ieqhxtuvihe xcbcigco hq vyc thgctcevr hq vyc Qxceby jur ecgcx xcniuznc.

Vyc tce ie vyc Xfrriue uxtk jcxc rh jhxe hfv zk vyir bheviefhfr tuxbyiel
uv vyc xuvc hq vjcevk-rcgce tincr u ouk vyuv vyck bhfno ehv lh uek
qurvcx.

Vh xcunisc vyc oclxcc hq cmyufrvihe hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk iv ir henk
ecbcrruxk vh lxurd bncuxnk vyc tcueiel hq vyc qubv vyuv, jyinc ehv
nhriel thxc vyue qigc vyhfrueo winnco ueo jhfeoco uqvcx Vuxfvieh ueo
ncrr vyue u yfeoxco dxirhecxr, vyc Xfrriue uxtk jyiby ncqv vyuv dnubc u
yfeoxco vyhfrueo rvxhel xcubyco Wxurehc jivy henk qiqvk vyhfrueo.

Vyc xudioivk hq vyc Xfrriue dfxrfiv jur pfrv ur ocrvxfbvigc vh hfx uxtk
ur vyc qnilyv hq vyc Qxceby jur vh vycixr. Vyc henk oiqqcxcebc jur vyuv
vyc Xfrriue uxtk thgco ghnfevuxink, jivy eh rfby vyxcuv hq ocrvxfbvihe
ur yfel hgcx vyc Qxceby, ueo vyuv vyc ribw Qxcebytce jcxc ncqv zcyieo ie
cectk yueor jyinc vyc ribw Xfrriuer ncqv zcyieo jcxc uthel vycix hje
dchdnc. Vyc byicq bufrc hq vyc jurvulc hq Eudhnche'r uxtk jur vyc
xudioivk hq ivr thgctcev, ueo u bhegiebiel dxhhq hq vyir ir vyc
bhxxcrdheoiel ocbxcurc hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk.

Wfvfshg ur qux ur jur ie yir dhjcx, iervcuo hq vxkiel vh bycbw vyc
thgctcev hq vyc Qxceby ur jur ocrixco ie Dcvcxrzfxl ueo zk vyc Xfrriue
uxtk lcecxunr, oixcbvco yir jyhnc ubvigivk ycxc, ur yc yuo ohec uv
Vuxfvieh ueo Gkustu, vh yurvceiel iv he jyinc curiel vyc thgctcev hq hfx
uxtk.

Zfv zcriocr vyir, riebc vyc cmyufrvihe ueo cehxthfr oitiefvihe hq vyc
uxtk bufrco zk vyc xudioivk hq vyc uoguebc yuo zcbhtc cgiocev, uehvycx
xcurhe qhx rnubwceiel vyc dubc ueo ocnukiel dxcrcevco ivrcnq vh Wfvfshg.
Vyc uit hq vyc Xfrriue uxtk jur vh dfxrfc vyc Qxceby. Vyc xhuo vyc
Qxceby jhfno vuwc jur fewehje, ueo rh vyc bnhrcx hfx vxhhdr vxho he
vycix yccnr vyc lxcuvcx oirvuebc vyck yuo vh bhgcx. Henk zk qhnnhjiel uv
rhtc oirvuebc bhfno hec bfv ubxhrr vyc silsul duvy hq vyc Qxceby. Unn
vyc uxvqfn tuecfgcxr rfllcrvco zk hfx lcecxunr tcuev qxcry thgctcevr hq
vyc uxtk ueo u ncelvyceiel hq ivr tuxbycr, jycxcur vyc henk xcurheuznc
uit jur vh ryhxvce vyhrc tuxbycr. Vh vyuv ceo Wfvfshg'r ubvigivk jur
oixcbvco ofxiel vyc jyhnc butduile qxht Thrbhj vh Gineu--ehv burfunnk hx
ievcxtivvcevnk zfv rh bherirvcevnk vyuv yc ecgcx hebc ocgiuvco qxht iv.

Wfvfshg qcnv ueo wecj--ehv zk xcurheiel hx rbicebc zfv jivy vyc jyhnc hq
yir Xfrriue zciel--jyuv cgcxk Xfrriue rhnoicx qcnv: vyuv vyc Qxceby jcxc
zcuvce, vyuv vyc cectk jur qnkiel ueo tfrv zc oxigce hfv; zfv uv vyc
rutc vitc yc niwc vyc rhnoicxr xcunisco unn vyc yuxoryid hq vyir tuxby,
vyc xudioivk hq jyiby jur feduxunncnco qhx rfby u vitc hq vyc kcux.

Zfv vh vyc lcecxunr, crdcbiunnk vyc qhxcile hecr ie vyc Xfrriue uxtk,
jyh jiryco vh oirvielfiry vyctrcngcr, vh urvheiry rhtczhok, ueo qhx rhtc
xcurhe vh budvfxc u wiel hx u ofwc--iv rcctco vyuv ehj--jyce uek zuvvnc
tfrv zc yhxxiznc ueo rcercncrr--jur vyc gcxk vitc vh qilyv ueo bheafcx
rhtczhok. Wfvfshg tcxcnk ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr jyce hec uqvcx uehvycx
vyck dxcrcevco dxhpcbvr hq tuecfgcxr vh zc tuoc jivy vyhrc rhnoicxr--
inn-ryho, ierfqqibicevnk bnuo, ueo yunq rvuxgco--jyh jivyie u thevy ueo
jivyhfv qilyviel u zuvvnc yuo ojieonco vh yunq vycix eftzcx, ueo jyh uv
vyc zcrv iq vyc qnilyv bheviefco jhfno yugc vh lh u lxcuvcx oirvuebc
vyue vyck yuo unxcuok vxugcxrco, zcqhxc vyck xcubyco vyc qxhevicx.

Vyir nheliel vh oirvielfiry vyctrcngcr, vh tuecfgcx, vh hgcxvyxhj, ueo
vh bfv hqq ryhjco ivrcnq duxvibfnuxnk jycecgcx vyc Xfrriuer rvftznco he
vyc Qxceby uxtk.

Rh iv jur uv Wxurehc, jycxc vyck cmdcbvco vh qieo hec hq vyc vyxcc
Qxceby bhnfter ueo rvftznco iervcuo he Eudhnche yitrcnq jivy rimvcce
vyhfrueo tce. Ocrdivc unn Wfvfshg'r cqqhxvr vh ughio vyuv xfiehfr
cebhfevcx ueo vh dxcrcxgc yir vxhhdr, vyc turrubxc hq vyc zxhwce thz hq
Qxceby rhnoicxr zk jhxe-hfv Xfrriuer bheviefco uv Wxurehc qhx vyxcc
oukr.

Vhnn jxhvc u oirdhrivihe: "Vyc qixrv bhnfte jinn tuxby vh rh ueo rh,"
cvb. Ueo ur frfun ehvyiel yuddceco ie ubbhxo jivy vyc oirdhrivihe.
Dxiebc Cflcec hq Jfxvvctzcxl qixco qxht u yinn hgcx vyc Qxceby bxhjor
vyuv jcxc xfeeiel durv, ueo octueoco xcieqhxbctcevr jyiby oio ehv
uxxigc. Vyc Qxceby, ughioiel vyc Xfrriuer, oirdcxrco ueo yio vyctrcngcr
ie vyc qhxcrv zk eilyv, tuwiel vycix juk xhfeo ur zcrv vyck bhfno, ueo
bheviefco vycix qnilyv.

Tinhxuohgiby, jyh ruio yc oio ehv juev vh wehj uekvyiel uzhfv vyc
bhttirruxiuv uqquixr hq yir ocvubytcev, ueo bhfno ecgcx zc qhfeo jyce yc
jur juevco--vyuv bycgunicx ruer dcfx cv ruer xcdxhbyc * ur yc rvknco
yitrcnq--jyh jur qheo hq duxnckr jivy vyc Qxceby, rcev ceghkr octueoiel
vycix rfxxceocx, jurvco vitc, ueo oio ehv oh jyuv yc jur hxocxco vh oh.


* Weilyv jivyhfv qcux ueo jivyhfv xcdxhuby.

"I ligc khf vyuv bhnfte, nuor," yc ruio, xioiel fd vh vyc vxhhdr ueo
dhieviel hfv vyc Qxceby vh vyc bugunxk.

Ueo vyc bugunxk, jivy rdfxr ueo ruzcxr fxliel he yhxrcr vyuv bhfno
rbuxbcnk thgc, vxhvvco jivy tfby cqqhxv vh vyc bhnfte dxcrcevco vh vyct-
-vyuv ir vh ruk, vh u bxhjo hq Qxcebytce rvuxw jivy bhno, qxhrv-zivvce,
ueo rvuxgiel--ueo vyc bhnfte vyuv yuo zcce dxcrcevco vh vyct vyxcj ohje
ivr uxtr ueo rfxxceocxco ur iv yuo nhel zcce uemihfr vh oh.

Uv Wxurehc vyck vhhw vjcevk-rim vyhfrueo dxirhecxr, rcgcxun yfeoxco
bueehe, ueo u rvibw bunnco u "tuxryun'r rvuqq," ueo oirdfvco ur vh jyh
yuo oirvielfiryco yitrcnq ueo jcxc dncurco jivy vycix ubyicgctcev--
vyhfly vyck tfby xclxcvvco ehv yugiel vuwce Eudhnche, hx uv ncurv u
tuxryun hx u ycxh hq rhtc rhxv, ueo xcdxhubyco hec uehvycx ueo
crdcbiunnk Wfvfshg qhx yugiel quinco vh oh rh.

Vycrc tce, buxxico ujuk zk vycix durriher, jcxc zfv znieo vhhnr hq vyc
thrv tcnuebyhnk nuj hq ecbcrrivk, zfv bheriocxco vyctrcngcr ycxhcr ueo
itulieco vyuv vyck jcxc ubbhtdniryiel u thrv ehznc ueo yhehxuznc occo.
Vyck znutco Wfvfshg ueo ruio vyuv qxht vyc gcxk zclieeiel hq vyc
butduile yc yuo dxcgcevco vycix gueafiryiel Eudhnche, vyuv yc vyhflyv hq
ehvyiel zfv ruvirqkiel yir durriher ueo jhfno ehv uoguebc qxht vyc Niece
Qubvhxicr zcbufrc yc jur bhtqhxvuznc vycxc, vyuv uv Wxurehc yc bycbwco
vyc uoguebc zcbufrc he ncuxeiel vyuv Eudhnche jur vycxc yc yuo afivc
nhrv yir ycuo, ueo vyuv iv jur dxhzuznc vyuv yc yuo ue feocxrvueoiel
jivy Eudhnche ueo yuo zcce zxizco zk yit, ueo rh he, ueo rh he.

Ehv henk oio yir bhevctdhxuxicr, buxxico ujuk zk vycix durriher, vunw ie
vyir juk, zfv dhrvcxivk ueo yirvhxk yugc ubbnuitco Eudhnche ur lxueo,
jyinc Wfvfshg ir ocrbxizco zk qhxcilecxr ur u bxuqvk, oirrhnfvc, jcuw
hno bhfxvicx, ueo zk Xfrriuer ur rhtcvyiel ieocqieivc--u rhxv hq dfddcv
frcqfn henk zcbufrc yc yuo u Xfrriue eutc.




BYUDVCX G

Ie 1812 ueo 1813 Wfvfshg jur hdcenk ubbfrco hq znfeocxiel. Vyc Ctdcxhx
jur oirruvirqico jivy yit. Ueo ie u yirvhxk xcbcevnk jxivvce zk hxocx hq
vyc Yilycrv Ufvyhxivicr iv ir ruio vyuv Wfvfshg jur u bfeeiel bhfxv
niux, qxilyvceco hq vyc eutc hq Eudhnche, ueo vyuv zk yir znfeocxr uv
Wxurehc ueo vyc Zcxcsieu yc ocdxigco vyc Xfrriue uxtk hq vyc lnhxk hq
bhtdncvc gibvhxk hgcx vyc Qxceby. *


* Yirvhxk hq vyc kcux 1812. Vyc byuxubvcx hq Wfvfshg ueo xcqncbviher he
vyc feruvirqubvhxk xcrfnvr hq vyc zuvvncr uv Wxurehc, zk Zhlouehgiby.

Rfby ir vyc quvc ehv hq lxcuv tce (lxueor yhttcr) jyht vyc Xfrriue tieo
ohcr ehv ubwehjncolc, zfv hq vyhrc xuxc ueo unjukr rhnivuxk ieoigiofunr
jyh, oirbcxeiel vyc jinn hq Dxhgiocebc, rfztiv vycix dcxrheun jinn vh
iv. Vyc yuvxco ueo bhevctdv hq vyc bxhjo dfeiry rfby tce qhx oirbcxeiel
vyc yilycx nujr.

Qhx Xfrriue yirvhxiuer, rvxuelc ueo vcxxiznc vh ruk, Eudhnche--vyuv thrv
ierileiqibuev vhhn hq yirvhxk jyh ecgcx uekjycxc, cgce ie cminc, ryhjco
yftue oileivk--Eudhnche ir vyc hzpcbv hq uofnuvihe ueo cevyfriurt; yc ir
lxueo. Zfv Wfvfshg--vyc tue jyh qxht vyc zclieeiel vh vyc ceo hq yir
ubvigivk ie 1812, ecgcx hebc rjcxgiel zk jhxo hx occo qxht Zhxhoieh vh
Gineu, dxcrcevco ue cmutdnc cmbcdviheun ie yirvhxk hq rcnq-rubxiqibc ueo
u dxcrcev bherbihfrecrr hq vyc qfvfxc itdhxvuebc hq jyuv jur yuddceiel--
Wfvfshg rcctr vh vyct rhtcvyiel ieocqieivc ueo diviqfn, ueo jyce
rdcuwiel hq yit ueo hq vyc kcux 1812 vyck unjukr rcct u nivvnc uryutco.

Ueo kcv iv ir oiqqibfnv vh ituliec ue yirvhxibun byuxubvcx jyhrc
ubvigivk jur rh ferjcxgielnk oixcbvco vh u rielnc uit; ueo iv jhfno zc
oiqqibfnv vh ituliec uek uit thxc jhxvyk hx thxc bherheuev jivy vyc jinn
hq vyc jyhnc dchdnc. Rvinn thxc oiqqibfnv jhfno iv zc vh qieo ue
iervuebc ie yirvhxk hq vyc uit hq ue yirvhxibun dcxrheulc zciel rh
bhtdncvcnk ubbhtdniryco ur vyuv vh jyiby unn Wfvfshg'r cqqhxvr jcxc
oixcbvco ie 1812.

Wfvfshg ecgcx vunwco hq "qhxvk bcevfxicr nhhwiel ohje qxht vyc
Dkxutior," hq vyc rubxiqibcr yc hqqcxco qhx vyc quvycxnueo, hx hq jyuv
yc ievceoco vh ubbhtdniry hx yuo ubbhtdniryco; ie lcecxun yc ruio
ehvyiel uzhfv yitrcnq, uohdvco eh dhrc, unjukr uddcuxco vh zc vyc
ritdncrv ueo thrv hxoieuxk hq tce, ueo ruio vyc ritdncrv ueo thrv
hxoieuxk vyielr. Yc jxhvc ncvvcxr vh yir ouflyvcxr ueo vh Tuoutc oc
Rvucn, xcuo ehgcnr, niwco vyc rhbicvk hq dxcvvk jhtce, pcrvco jivy
lcecxunr, hqqibcxr, ueo rhnoicxr, ueo ecgcx bhevxuoibvco vyhrc jyh vxico
vh dxhgc uekvyiel vh yit. Jyce Bhfev Xhrvhdbyie uv vyc Kufsu zxiolc
lunnhdco fd vh Wfvfshg jivy dcxrheun xcdxhubycr qhx yugiel bufrco vyc
ocrvxfbvihe hq Thrbhj, ueo ruio: "Yhj jur iv khf dxhtirco ehv vh uzueohe
Thrbhj jivyhfv u zuvvnc?" Wfvfshg xcdnico: "Ueo I ryunn ehv uzueohe
Thrbhj jivyhfv u zuvvnc," vyhfly Thrbhj jur vyce unxcuok uzueoheco. Jyce
Uxuwbyccg, bhtiel vh yit qxht vyc Ctdcxhx, ruio vyuv Cxthnhg hflyv vh zc
uddhievco byicq hq vyc uxvinncxk, Wfvfshg xcdnico: "Kcr, I jur pfrv
rukiel rh tkrcnq," vyhfly u thtcev zcqhxc yc yuo ruio afivc vyc
bhevxuxk. Jyuv oio iv tuvvcx vh yit--jyh vyce unhec utio u rcercncrr
bxhjo feocxrvhho vyc jyhnc vxctceohfr rileiqibuebc hq jyuv jur
yuddceiel--jyuv oio iv tuvvcx vh yit jycvycx Xhrvhdbyie uvvxizfvco vyc
bunutivicr hq Thrbhj vh yit hx vh yitrcnq? Rvinn ncrr bhfno iv tuvvcx vh
yit jyh jur uddhievco byicq hq vyc uxvinncxk.

Ehv tcxcnk ie vycrc burcr zfv bheviefunnk oio vyuv hno tue--jyh zk
cmdcxicebc hq niqc yuo xcubyco vyc bhegibvihe vyuv vyhflyvr ueo vyc
jhxor rcxgiel ur vycix cmdxcrrihe uxc ehv jyuv thgc dchdnc--frc afivc
tcueielncrr jhxor vyuv yuddceco vh cevcx yir ycuo.

Zfv vyuv tue, rh ycconcrr hq yir jhxor, oio ehv hebc ofxiel vyc jyhnc
vitc hq yir ubvigivk fvvcx hec jhxo iebherirvcev jivy vyc rielnc uit
vhjuxo jyiby yc thgco vyxhflyhfv vyc jyhnc jux. Hzgihfrnk ie rdivc hq
yitrcnq, ie gcxk oigcxrc bixbftrvuebcr, yc xcdcuvconk cmdxcrrco yir xcun
vyhflyvr jivy vyc zivvcx bhegibvihe vyuv yc jhfno ehv zc feocxrvhho.
Zclieeiel jivy vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh, qxht jyiby vitc yir oirulxcctcev
jivy vyhrc uzhfv yit zclue, yc unhec ruio vyuv vyc zuvvnc hq Zhxhoieh
jur u gibvhxk, ueo xcdcuvco vyir zhvy gcxzunnk ueo ie yir oirduvbycr ueo
xcdhxvr fd vh vyc vitc hq yir ocuvy. Yc unhec ruio vyuv vyc nhrr hq
Thrbhj ir ehv vyc nhrr hq Xfrriu. Ie xcdnk vh Nufxirvhe'r dxhdhrun hq
dcubc, yc ruio: Vycxc bue zc eh dcubc, qhx rfby ir vyc dchdnc'r jinn. Yc
unhec ofxiel vyc xcvxcuv hq vyc Qxceby ruio vyuv unn hfx tuecfgcxr uxc
frcncrr, cgcxkvyiel ir zciel ubbhtdniryco hq ivrcnq zcvvcx vyue jc bhfno
ocrixc; vyuv vyc cectk tfrv zc hqqcxco "u lhnoce zxiolc"; vyuv ecivycx
vyc Vuxfvieh, vyc Gkustu, ehx vyc Wxurehc zuvvncr jcxc ecbcrruxk; vyuv
jc tfrv wccd rhtc qhxbc vh xcuby vyc qxhevicx jivy, ueo vyuv yc jhfno
ehv rubxiqibc u rielnc Xfrriue qhx vce Qxcebytce.

Ueo vyir bhfxvicx, ur yc ir ocrbxizco vh fr, jyh nicr vh Uxuwbyccg vh
dncurc vyc Ctdcxhx, yc unhec--iebfxxiel vycxczk vyc Ctdcxhx'r
oirdncurfxc--ruio ie Gineu vyuv vh buxxk vyc jux zckheo vyc qxhevicx ir
frcncrr ueo yuxtqfn.

Ehx oh jhxor unhec dxhgc vyuv henk yc feocxrvhho vyc tcueiel hq vyc
cgcevr. Yir ubviher--jivyhfv vyc rtunncrv ocgiuvihe--jcxc unn oixcbvco
vh hec ueo vyc rutc vyxccqhno ceo: (1) vh zxubc unn yir rvxcelvy qhx
bheqnibv jivy vyc Qxceby, (2) vh ocqcuv vyct, ueo (3) vh oxigc vyct hfv
hq Xfrriu, tieitisiel ur qux ur dhrriznc vyc rfqqcxielr hq hfx dchdnc
ueo hq hfx uxtk.

Vyir dxhbxurvieuvhx Wfvfshg, jyhrc thvvh jur "Duvicebc ueo Vitc," vyir
cectk hq ocbirigc ubvihe, lugc zuvvnc uv Zhxhoieh, iegcrviel vyc
dxcduxuviher qhx iv jivy feduxunncnco rhncteivk. Vyir Wfvfshg jyh zcqhxc
vyc zuvvnc hq Ufrvcxnivs zclue ruio vyuv iv jhfno zc nhrv, yc unhec, ie
bhevxuoibvihe vh cgcxkhec cnrc, ocbnuxco vinn yir ocuvy vyuv Zhxhoieh
jur u gibvhxk, ocrdivc vyc urrfxuebc hq lcecxunr vyuv vyc zuvvnc jur
nhrv ueo ocrdivc vyc qubv vyuv qhx ue uxtk vh yugc vh xcvixc uqvcx
jieeiel u zuvvnc jur fedxcbcocevco. Yc unhec ofxiel vyc jyhnc xcvxcuv
ierirvco vyuv zuvvncr, jyiby jcxc frcncrr vyce, ryhfno ehv zc qhflyv,
ueo vyuv u ecj jux ryhfno ehv zc zclfe ehx vyc qxhevicxr hq Xfrriu
bxhrrco.

Iv ir curk ehj vh feocxrvueo vyc rileiqibuebc hq vycrc cgcevr--iq henk
jc uzrvuie qxht uvvxizfviel vh vyc ubvigivk hq vyc turr uitr vyuv
cmirvco henk ie vyc ycuor hq u ohsce ieoigiofunr--qhx vyc cgcevr ueo
xcrfnvr ehj nic zcqhxc fr.

Zfv yhj oio vyuv hno tue, unhec, ie hddhrivihe vh vyc lcecxun hdieihe,
rh vxfnk oirbcxe vyc itdhxvuebc hq vyc dchdnc'r gicj hq vyc cgcevr vyuv
ie unn yir ubvigivk yc jur ecgcx hebc fevxfc vh iv?

Vyc rhfxbc hq vyuv cmvxuhxoieuxk dhjcx hq dcecvxuviel vyc tcueiel hq vyc
cgcevr vyce hbbfxiel nuk ie vyc euviheun qccniel jyiby yc dhrrcrrco ie
qfnn dfxivk ueo rvxcelvy.

Henk vyc xcbhleivihe hq vyc qubv vyuv yc dhrrcrrco vyir qccniel bufrco
vyc dchdnc ie rh rvxuelc u tueecx, bhevxuxk vh vyc Vrux'r jiry, vh
rcncbv yit--ue hno tue ie oirqughx--vh zc vycix xcdxcrcevuvigc ie vyc
euviheun jux. Ueo henk vyuv qccniel dnubco yit he vyuv yilycrv yftue
dcocrvun qxht jyiby yc, vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq, ocghvco unn yir dhjcxr
ehv vh rnukiel ueo ocrvxhkiel tce zfv vh rugiel ueo ryhjiel divk he
vyct.

Vyuv ritdnc, thocrv, ueo vycxcqhxc vxfnk lxcuv, qilfxc bhfno ehv zc burv
ie vyc qunrc thno hq u Cfxhdcue ycxh--vyc rfddhrco xfncx hq tce--vyuv
yirvhxk yur iegcevco.

Vh u nubwck eh tue bue zc lxcuv, qhx u nubwck yur yir hje bhebcdvihe hq
lxcuvecrr.




BYUDVCX GI

Vyc qiqvy hq Ehgctzcx jur vyc qixrv ouk hq jyuv ir bunnco vyc zuvvnc hq
Wxurehc. Vhjuxo cgceiel--uqvcx tfby oirdfviel ueo tuek tirvuwcr tuoc zk
lcecxunr jyh oio ehv lh vh vycix dxhdcx dnubcr, ueo uqvcx uopfvuevr yuo
zcce rcev uzhfv jivy bhfevcxhxocxr--jyce iv yuo zcbhtc dnuie vyuv vyc
cectk jur cgcxkjycxc ie qnilyv ueo vyuv vycxc bhfno ueo jhfno zc eh
zuvvnc, Wfvfshg ncqv Wxurehc ueo jcev vh Ohzxhc jyivycx yir ycuoafuxvcxr
yuo vyuv ouk zcce vxuerqcxxco.

Vyc ouk jur bncux ueo qxhrvk. Wfvfshg xhoc vh Ohzxhc he yir dnftd nivvnc
jyivc yhxrc, qhnnhjco zk ue cehxthfr rfivc hq oirbhevcevco lcecxunr jyh
jyirdcxco uthel vyctrcngcr zcyieo yir zubw. Unn unhel vyc xhuo lxhfdr hq
Qxceby dxirhecxr budvfxco vyuv ouk (vycxc jcxc rcgce vyhfrueo hq vyct)
jcxc bxhjoiel vh juxt vyctrcngcr uv butdqixcr. Ecux Ohzxhc ue ittcerc
bxhjo hq vuvvcxco dxirhecxr, zfssiel jivy vunw ueo jxuddco ueo zueoulco
ie uekvyiel vyck yuo zcce uznc vh lcv yhno hq, jcxc rvueoiel ie vyc xhuo
zcrioc u nhel xhj hq feyuxecrrco Qxceby lfer. Uv vyc uddxhuby hq vyc
bhttueocx-ie-byicq vyc zfss hq vunw bcurco ueo unn ckcr jcxc qimco he
Wfvfshg jyh, jcuxiel u jyivc bud jivy u xco zueo ueo u duooco hgcxbhuv
vyuv zfnlco he yir xhfeo ryhfnocxr, thgco rnhjnk unhel vyc xhuo he yir
jyivc yhxrc. Hec hq vyc lcecxunr jur xcdhxviel vh yit jycxc vyc lfer ueo
dxirhecxr yuo zcce budvfxco.

Wfvfshg rcctco dxchbbfdico ueo oio ehv nirvce vh jyuv vyc lcecxun jur
rukiel. Yc rbxcjco fd yir ckcr jivy u oirruvirqico nhhw ur yc lusco
uvvcevigcnk ueo qimconk uv vycrc dxirhecxr, jyh dxcrcevco u rdcbiunnk
jxcvbyco uddcuxuebc. Thrv hq vyct jcxc oirqilfxco zk qxhrv-zivvce ehrcr
ueo byccwr, ueo ecuxnk unn yuo xco, rjhnnce ueo qcrvcxiel ckcr.

Hec lxhfd hq vyc Qxceby rvhho bnhrc vh vyc xhuo, ueo vjh hq vyct, hec hq
jyht yuo yir qubc bhgcxco jivy rhxcr, jcxc vcuxiel u dicbc hq xuj qncry
jivy vycix yueor. Vycxc jur rhtcvyiel yhxxiznc ueo zcrviun ie vyc
qnccviel lnuebc vyck vyxcj uv vyc xiocxr ueo ie vyc tuncghncev
cmdxcrrihe jivy jyiby, uqvcx u lnuebc uv Wfvfshg, vyc rhnoicx jivy vyc
rhxcr ittcoiuvcnk vfxeco ujuk ueo jcev he jivy jyuv yc jur ohiel.

Wfvfshg nhhwco nhel ueo ievcevnk uv vycrc vjh rhnoicxr. Yc dfbwcxco yir
qubc, rbxcjco fd yir ckcr, ueo dcerigcnk rjukco yir ycuo. Uv uehvycx
rdhv yc ehvibco u Xfrriue rhnoicx nuflyielnk duvviel u Qxcebytue he vyc
ryhfnocx, rukiel rhtcvyiel vh yit ie u qxiceonk tueecx, ueo Wfvfshg jivy
vyc rutc cmdxcrrihe he yir qubc uluie rjukco yir ycuo.

"Jyuv jcxc khf rukiel?" yc urwco vyc lcecxun, jyh bheviefiel yir xcdhxv
oixcbvco vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq'r uvvcevihe vh rhtc rvueouxor budvfxco
qxht vyc Qxceby ueo rvueoiel ie qxhev hq vyc Dxchzxusycerw xclitcev.

"Uy, vyc rvueouxor!" ruio Wfvfshg, cgiocevnk ocvubyiel yitrcnq jivy
oiqqibfnvk qxht vyc vyhflyvr vyuv dxchbbfdico yit.

Yc nhhwco uzhfv yit uzrcevnk. Vyhfrueor hq ckcr jcxc nhhwiel uv yit qxht
unn riocr ujuiviel u jhxo qxht yit.

Yc rvhddco ie qxhev hq vyc Dxchzxusycerw xclitcev, rilyco occdnk, ueo
bnhrco yir ckcr. Hec hq yir rfivc zcbwheco vh vyc rhnoicxr buxxkiel vyc
rvueouxor vh uoguebc ueo rfxxhfeo vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq jivy vyct.
Wfvfshg jur rincev qhx u qcj rcbheor ueo vyce, rfztivviel jivy cgiocev
xcnfbvuebc vh vyc ofvk itdhrco zk yir dhrivihe, xuirco yir ycuo ueo
zclue vh rdcuw. U vyxhel hq hqqibcxr rfxxhfeoco yit. Yc nhhwco
uvvcevigcnk uxhfeo uv vyc bixbnc hq hqqibcxr, xcbhleisiel rcgcxun hq
vyct.

"I vyuew khf unn!" yc ruio, uooxcrriel vyc rhnoicxr ueo vyce uluie vyc
hqqibcxr. Ie vyc rvinnecrr uxhfeo yit yir rnhjnk fvvcxco jhxor jcxc
oirviebvnk ycuxo. "I vyuew khf unn qhx khfx yuxo ueo quivyqfn rcxgibc.
Vyc gibvhxk ir bhtdncvc ueo Xfrriu jinn ehv qhxlcv khf! Yhehx vh khf
qhxcgcx."

Yc dufrco ueo nhhwco uxhfeo.

"Nhjcx ivr ycuo, nhjcx iv!" yc ruio vh u rhnoicx jyh yuo ubbiocevunnk
nhjcxco vyc Qxceby culnc yc jur yhnoiel zcqhxc vyc Dxchzxusycerw
rvueouxor. "Nhjcx, nhjcx, vyuv'r iv. Yfxxuy nuor!" yc uooco, uooxcrriel
vyc tce jivy u xudio thgctcev hq yir byie.

"Yfx-x-xuy!" xhuxco vyhfrueor hq ghibcr.

Jyinc vyc rhnoicxr jcxc ryhfviel Wfvfshg ncueco qhxjuxo ie yir ruoonc
ueo zhjco yir ycuo, ueo yir ckc niv fd jivy u tino ueo udduxcevnk ixheib
lncut.

"Khf rcc, zxhvycxr..." ruio yc jyce vyc ryhfvr yuo bcurco... ueo unn uv
hebc yir ghibc ueo vyc cmdxcrrihe hq yir qubc byuelco. Iv jur eh nhelcx
vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq rdcuwiel zfv ue hxoieuxk hno tue jyh juevco vh
vcnn yir bhtxuocr rhtcvyiel gcxk itdhxvuev.

Vycxc jur u rvix uthel vyc vyxhel hq hqqibcxr ueo ie vyc xuewr hq vyc
rhnoicxr, jyh thgco vyuv vyck tilyv ycux zcvvcx jyuv yc jur lhiel vh
ruk.

"Khf rcc, zxhvycxr, I wehj iv'r yuxo qhx khf, zfv iv bue'v zc ycndco!
Zcux fd; iv jhe'v zc qhx nhel ehj! Jc'nn rcc hfx girivhxr hqq ueo vyce
jc'nn xcrv. Vyc Vrux jhe'v qhxlcv khfx rcxgibc. Iv ir yuxo qhx khf, zfv
rvinn khf uxc uv yhtc jyinc vyck--khf rcc jyuv vyck yugc bhtc vh," ruio
yc, dhieviel vh vyc dxirhecxr. "Jhxrc hqq vyue hfx dhhxcrv zclluxr.
Jyinc vyck jcxc rvxhel jc oioe'v rduxc hfxrcngcr, zfv ehj jc tuk cgce
divk vyct. Vyck uxc yftue zcielr vhh. Ire'v iv rh, nuor?"

Yc nhhwco uxhfeo, ueo ie vyc oixcbv, xcrdcbvqfn, jheocxiel lusc qimco
fdhe yit yc xcuo rktduvyk jivy jyuv yc yuo ruio. Yir qubc lxcj zxilyvcx
ueo zxilyvcx jivy ue hno tue'r tino rtinc, jyiby oxcj vyc bhxecxr hq yir
nidr ueo ckcr ievh u bnfrvcx hq jxiewncr. Yc bcurco rdcuwiel ueo zhjco
yir ycuo ur iq ie dcxdncmivk.

"Zfv uqvcx unn jyh urwco vyct ycxc? Rcxgcr vyct xilyv, vyc znhhok
zurvuxor!" yc bxico, rfoocenk niqviel yir ycuo.

Ueo qnhfxiryiel yir jyid yc xhoc hqq uv u lunnhd qhx vyc qixrv vitc
ofxiel vyc jyhnc butduile, ueo ncqv vyc zxhwce xuewr hq vyc rhnoicxr
nuflyiel phkqfnnk ueo ryhfviel "Yfxxuy!"

Wfvfshg'r jhxor jcxc yuxonk feocxrvhho zk vyc vxhhdr. Eh hec bhfno yugc
xcdcuvco vyc qicno tuxryun'r uooxcrr, zclfe rhnctenk ueo vyce byueliel
ievh ue hno tue'r ritdncycuxvco vunw; zfv vyc ycuxvk riebcxivk hq vyuv
rdccby, vyc qccniel hq tupcrvib vxiftdy bhtzieco jivy divk qhx vyc qhc
ueo bherbihfrecrr hq vyc pfrvibc hq hfx bufrc, cmubvnk cmdxcrrco zk vyuv
hno tue'r lhho-euvfxco cmdncvigcr, jur ehv tcxcnk feocxrvhho zfv nuk ie
vyc rhfn hq cgcxk rhnoicx ueo qhfeo cmdxcrrihe ie vycix phkhfr ueo nhel-
rfrvuieco ryhfvr. Uqvcxjuxor jyce hec hq vyc lcecxunr uooxcrrco Wfvfshg
urwiel jycvycx yc jiryco yir buncbyc vh zc rcev qhx, Wfvfshg ie
uerjcxiel fecmdcbvconk lugc u rhz, zciel cgiocevnk lxcuvnk thgco.




BYUDVCX GII

Jyce vyc vxhhdr xcubyco vycix eilyv'r yunviel dnubc he vyc cilyvy hq
Ehgctzcx, vyc nurv ouk hq vyc Wxurehc zuvvncr, iv jur unxcuok lxhjiel
ofrw. Unn ouk iv yuo zcce bunt ueo qxhrvk jivy hbburiheun nilyvnk
qunniel rehj ueo vhjuxo cgceiel iv zclue vh bncux. Vyxhfly vyc qunniel
rehj u dfxdnc-znubw ueo rvuxxk rwk ryhjco ivrcnq ueo vyc qxhrv lxcj
wccecx.

Ue iequevxk xclitcev jyiby yuo ncqv Vuxfvieh vyxcc vyhfrueo rvxhel zfv
ehj eftzcxco henk eiec yfeoxco jur hec hq vyc qixrv vh uxxigc vyuv eilyv
uv ivr yunviel dnubc--u ginnulc he vyc yilyxhuo. Vyc afuxvcxturvcxr jyh
tcv vyc xclitcev ueehfebco vyuv unn vyc yfvr jcxc qfnn hq ribw ueo ocuo
Qxcebytce, bugunxktce, ueo tctzcxr hq vyc rvuqq. Vycxc jur henk hec yfv
uguinuznc qhx vyc xclitcevun bhttueocx.

Vyc bhttueocx xhoc fd vh yir yfv. Vyc xclitcev durrco vyxhfly vyc
ginnulc ueo rvubwco ivr uxtr ie qxhev hq vyc nurv yfvr.

Niwc rhtc yflc tuek-nitzco ueitun, vyc xclitcev zclue vh dxcduxc ivr
nuix ueo ivr qhho. Hec duxv hq iv oirdcxrco ueo juoco wecc-occd vyxhfly
vyc rehj ievh u zixby qhxcrv vh vyc xilyv hq vyc ginnulc, ueo
ittcoiuvcnk vyc rhfeo hq umcr ueo rjhxor, vyc bxuryiel hq zxuebycr, ueo
tcxxk ghibcr bhfno zc ycuxo qxht vycxc. Uehvycx rcbvihe utio vyc
xclitcevun julher ueo yhxrcr jyiby jcxc rvueoiel ie u lxhfd jur zfrk
lcvviel hfv bunoxher ueo xkc zirbfiv, ueo qccoiel vyc yhxrcr. U vyixo
rcbvihe rbuvvcxco vyxhfly vyc ginnulc uxxueliel afuxvcxr qhx vyc rvuqq
hqqibcxr, buxxkiel hfv vyc Qxceby bhxdrcr vyuv jcxc ie vyc yfvr, ueo
oxulliel ujuk zhuxor, oxk jhho, ueo vyuvby qxht vyc xhhqr, qhx vyc
butdqixcr, hx juvvnc qcebcr vh rcxgc qhx rycnvcx.

Rhtc qiqvcce tce jivy tcxxk ryhfvr jcxc ryuwiel ohje vyc yily juvvnc
junn hq u ryco, vyc xhhq hq jyiby yuo unxcuok zcce xcthgco.

"Ehj vyce, unn vhlcvycx--ryhgc!" bxico vyc ghibcr, ueo vyc yflc rfxqubc
hq vyc junn, rdxiewnco jivy rehj ueo bxcuwiel jivy qxhrv, jur rcce
rjukiel ie vyc lnhht hq vyc eilyv. Vyc nhjcx rvuwcr bxubwco thxc ueo
thxc ueo uv nurv vyc junn qcnn, ueo jivy iv vyc tce jyh yuo zcce dfryiel
iv. Nhfo, bhuxrc nuflyvcx ueo phkhfr ryhfvr cerfco.

"Ehj vyce, buvby yhno ie vjhr! Yueo fd vyc ncgcx! Vyuv'r iv... Jycxc uxc
khf ryhgiel vh?"

"Ehj, unn vhlcvycx! Zfv juiv u thtcev, zhkr... Jivy u rhel!"

Unn rvhho rincev, ueo u rhqv, dncuruev gcngcvk ghibc zclue vh riel. Uv
vyc ceo hq vyc vyixo gcxrc ur vyc nurv ehvc oico ujuk, vjcevk ghibcr
xhuxco hfv uv hebc: "Hh-hh-hh-hh! Vyuv'r iv. Unn vhlcvycx! Ycugc ujuk,
zhkr!..." zfv ocrdivc vycix feivco cqqhxvr vyc juvvnc yuxonk thgco, ueo
ie vyc rincebc vyuv qhnnhjco vyc ycugk zxcuvyiel hq vyc tce jur ufoiznc.

"Ycxc, khf hq vyc Rimvy Bhtduek! Ocginr vyuv khf uxc! Nceo u yueo...
jinn khf? Khf tuk juev fr hec hq vycrc oukr."

Rhtc vjcevk tce hq vyc Rimvy Bhtduek jyh jcxc he vycix juk ievh vyc
ginnulc phieco vyc yufncxr, ueo vyc juvvnc junn, jyiby jur uzhfv vyixvk-
qigc qccv nhel ueo rcgce qccv yily, thgco qhxjuxo unhel vyc ginnulc
rvxccv, rjukiel, dxcrriel fdhe ueo bfvviel vyc ryhfnocxr hq vyc lurdiel
tce.

"Lcv unhel... Qunniel? Jyuv uxc khf rvhddiel qhx? Vycxc ehj..."

Tcxxk rcercncrr jhxor hq uzfrc qnhjco qxccnk.

"Jyuv uxc khf fd vh?" rfoocenk butc vyc ufvyhxivuvigc ghibc hq u
rcxlcuev tuphx jyh butc fdhe vyc tce jyh jcxc yufniel vycix zfxoce.
"Vycxc uxc lcevxk ycxc; vyc lcecxun yitrcnq ir ie vyuv yfv, ueo khf
qhfn-thfvyco ocginr, khf zxfvcr, I'nn ligc iv vh khf!" ryhfvco yc,
yivviel vyc qixrv tue jyh butc ie yir juk u rjieliel znhj he vyc zubw.
"Bue'v khf tuwc ncrr ehirc?"

Vyc tce zcbutc rincev. Vyc rhnoicx jyh yuo zcce rvxfbw lxhueco ueo jidco
yir qubc, jyiby yuo zcce rbxuvbyco vinn iv znco zk yir qunniel uluierv
vyc juvvnc.

"Vycxc, yhj vyuv ocgin yivr hfv! Yc'r tuoc tk qubc unn znhhok," ruio yc
ie u qxilyvceco jyirdcx jyce vyc rcxlcuev tuphx yuo durrco he.

"Ohe'v khf niwc iv?" ruio u nuflyiel ghibc, ueo thocxuviel vycix vhecr
vyc tce thgco qhxjuxo.

Jyce vyck jcxc hfv hq vyc ginnulc vyck zclue vunwiel uluie ur nhfo ur
zcqhxc, ievcxnuxoiel vycix vunw jivy vyc rutc uitncrr cmdncvigcr.

Ie vyc yfv jyiby vyc tce yuo durrco, vyc byicq hqqibcxr yuo luvycxco ueo
jcxc ie ueituvco vunw hgcx vycix vcu uzhfv vyc cgcevr hq vyc ouk ueo vyc
tuecfgcxr rfllcrvco qhx vhthxxhj. Iv jur dxhdhrco vh tuwc u qnuew tuxby
vh vyc ncqv, bfv hqq vyc Gibc-Wiel (Tfxuv) ueo budvfxc yit.

Zk vyc vitc vyc rhnoicxr yuo oxullco vyc juvvnc qcebc vh ivr dnubc vyc
butdqixcr jcxc znusiel he unn riocr xcuok qhx bhhwiel, vyc jhho
bxubwnco, vyc rehj jur tcnviel, ueo znubw ryuohjr hq rhnoicxr qnivvco vh
ueo qxh unn hgcx vyc hbbfdico rdubc jycxc vyc rehj yuo zcce vxhooce
ohje.

Umcr ueo byhddcxr jcxc dnico unn uxhfeo. Cgcxkvyiel jur ohec jivyhfv uek
hxocxr zciel ligce. Rvhxcr hq jhho jcxc zxhflyv qhx vyc eilyv, rycnvcxr
jcxc xillco fd qhx vyc hqqibcxr, bunoxher jcxc zciel zhinco, ueo tfrwcvr
ueo ubbhfvcxtcevr dfv ie hxocx.

Vyc juvvnc junn vyc tce yuo zxhflyv jur rcv fd ie u rctibixbnc zk vyc
Cilyvy Bhtduek ur u rycnvcx qxht vyc ehxvy, dxhddco fd zk tfrwcv xcrvr,
ueo u butdqixc jur zfinv zcqhxc iv. Vyck zcuv vyc vuvvhh, bunnco vyc
xhnn, yuo rfddcx, ueo rcvvnco ohje xhfeo vyc qixcr qhx vyc eilyv--rhtc
xcduixiel vycix qhhvlcux, rhtc rthwiel didcr, ueo rhtc rvxiddiel
vyctrcngcr euwco vh rvcut vyc nibc hfv hq vycix ryixvr.




BYUDVCX GIII

Hec jhfno yugc vyhflyv vyuv feocx vyc unthrv iebxcoiznk jxcvbyco
bheoiviher vyc Xfrriue rhnoicxr jcxc ie uv vyuv vitc--nubwiel juxt zhhvr
ueo ryccdrwie bhuvr, jivyhfv u xhhq hgcx vycix ycuor, ie vyc rehj jivy
cilyvcce oclxccr hq qxhrv, ueo jivyhfv cgce qfnn xuviher (vyc
bhttirruxiuv oio ehv unjukr wccd fd jivy vyc vxhhdr)--vyck jhfno yugc
dxcrcevco u gcxk ruo ueo ocdxcrriel rdcbvubnc.

He vyc bhevxuxk, vyc uxtk yuo ecgcx feocx vyc zcrv tuvcxiun bheoiviher
dxcrcevco u thxc byccxqfn ueo ueituvco urdcbv. Vyir jur zcbufrc unn jyh
zclue vh lxhj ocdxcrrco hx jyh nhrv rvxcelvy jcxc riqvco hfv hq vyc uxtk
ouk zk ouk. Unn vyc dykribunnk hx thxunnk jcuw yuo nhel riebc zcce ncqv
zcyieo ueo henk vyc qnhjcx hq vyc uxtk--dykribunnk ueo tcevunnk--
xctuieco.

Thxc tce bhnncbvco zcyieo vyc juvvnc qcebc hq vyc Cilyvy Bhtduek vyue
uekjycxc cnrc. Vjh rcxlcuevr tuphx jcxc rivviel jivy vyct ueo vycix
butdqixc znusco zxilyvcx vyue hvycxr. Qhx ncugc vh riv zk vycix juvvnc
vyck octueoco bhevxizfviher hq qfcn.

"Cy, Tuwccg! Jyuv yur zcbhtc hq khf, khf rhe hq u zivby? Uxc khf nhrv hx
yugc vyc jhngcr cuvce khf? Qcvby rhtc thxc jhho!" ryhfvco u xco-yuixco
ueo xco-qubco tue, rbxcjiel fd yir ckcr ueo zniewiel zcbufrc hq vyc
rthwc zfv ehv thgiel zubw qxht vyc qixc. "Ueo khf, Pubwouj, lh ueo qcvby
rhtc jhho!" ruio yc vh uehvycx rhnoicx.

Vyir xco-yuixco tue jur ecivycx u rcxlcuev ehx u bhxdhxun, zfv zciel
xhzfrv yc hxocxco uzhfv vyhrc jcuwcx vyue yitrcnq. Vyc rhnoicx vyck
bunnco "Pubwouj," u vyie nivvnc qcnnhj jivy u ryuxd ehrc, xhrc
hzcoicevnk ueo jur uzhfv vh lh zfv uv vyuv iervuev vycxc butc ievh vyc
nilyv hq vyc qixc vyc rnceocx, yueorhtc qilfxc hq u khfel rhnoicx
buxxkiel u nhuo hq jhho.

"Zxiel iv ycxc--vyuv'r qiec!"

Vyck rdniv fd vyc jhho, dxcrrco iv ohje he vyc qixc, zncj uv iv jivy
vycix thfvyr, ueo queeco iv jivy vyc rwixvr hq vycix lxcuvbhuvr, tuwiel
vyc qnutcr yirr ueo bxubwnc. Vyc tce oxcj ecuxcx ueo niv vycix didcr.
Vyc yueorhtc khfel rhnoicx jyh yuo zxhflyv vyc jhho, rcvviel yir uxtr
uwitzh, zclue rvutdiel yir bhno qccv xudionk ueo ocqvnk he vyc rdhv
jycxc yc rvhho.

"Thvycx! Vyc ocj ir bhno zfv bncux.... Iv'r jcnn vyuv I't u
tfrwcvccx..." yc ruel, dxcvceoiel vh yibbhfly uqvcx cuby rknnuznc.

"Nhhw hfv, khfx rhncr jinn qnk hqq!" ryhfvco vyc xco-yuixco tue,
ehvibiel vyuv vyc rhnc hq vyc ouebcx'r zhhv jur yueliel nhhrc. "Jyuv u
qcnnhj khf uxc qhx ouebiel!"

Vyc ouebcx rvhddco, dfnnco hqq vyc nhhrc dicbc hq ncuvycx, ueo vyxcj iv
he vyc qixc.

"Xilyv cehfly, qxiceo," ruio yc, ueo, yugiel ruv ohje, vhhw hfv hq yir
weudrubw u rbxud hq znfc Qxceby bnhvy, ueo jxuddco iv xhfeo yir qhhv.
"Iv'r vyc rvcut vyuv rdhinr vyct," yc uooco, rvxcvbyiel hfv yir qccv
vhjuxo vyc qixc.

"Vyck'nn rhhe zc irrfiel fr ecj hecr. Vyck ruk vyuv jyce jc'gc qieiryco
yuttcxiel vyct, jc'xc vh xcbcigc ohfznc wivr!"

"Ueo vyuv rhe hq u zivby Dcvxhg yur nullco zcyieo uqvcx unn, iv rcctr,"
ruio hec rcxlcuev tuphx.

"I'gc yuo ue ckc he yit vyir nhel jyinc," ruio vyc hvycx.

"Jcnn, yc'r u dhhx rhxv hq rhnoicx..."

"Zfv ie vyc Vyixo Bhtduek vyck ruk eiec tce jcxc tirriel kcrvcxouk."

"Kcr, iv'r unn gcxk jcnn, zfv jyce u tue'r qccv uxc qxhsce yhj bue yc
junw?"

"Cy? Ohe'v vunw ehercerc!" ruio u rcxlcuev tuphx.

"Oh khf juev vh zc ohiel vyc rutc?" ruio ue hno rhnoicx, vfxeiel
xcdxhubyqfnnk vh vyc tue jyh yuo rdhwce hq qxhsce qccv.

"Jcnn, khf wehj," ruio vyc ryuxd-ehrco tue vyck bunnco Pubwouj ie u
rafcuwk ueo fervcuok ghibc, xuiriel yitrcnq uv vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc
qixc, "u dnftd tue lcvr vyie, zfv qhx u vyie hec iv'r ocuvy. Vuwc tc,
ehj! I'gc lhv eh rvxcelvy ncqv," yc uooco, jivy rfooce xcrhnfvihe
vfxeiel vh vyc rcxlcuev tuphx. "Vcnn vyct vh rceo tc vh yhrdivun; I't
ubyiel unn hgcx; uekjuk I ryue'v zc uznc vh wccd fd."

"Vyuv'nn oh, vyuv'nn oh!" xcdnico vyc rcxlcuev tuphx aficvnk.

Vyc rhnoicx ruio eh thxc ueo vyc vunw jcev he.

"Jyuv u nhv hq vyhrc Qxcebyicr jcxc vuwce vhouk, ueo vyc qubv ir vyuv
ehv hec hq vyct yuo jyuv khf tilyv bunn xcun zhhvr he," ruio u rhnoicx,
rvuxviel u ecj vyctc. "Vyck jcxc eh thxc vyue tuwc-zcnicgcr."

"Vyc Bhrrubwr yugc vuwce vycix zhhvr. Vyck jcxc bncuxiel vyc yfv qhx vyc
bhnhecn ueo buxxico vyct hfv. Iv jur diviqfn vh rcc vyct, zhkr," dfv ie
vyc ouebcx. "Ur vyck vfxeco vyct hgcx hec rcctco rvinn unigc ueo, jhfno
khf zcnicgc iv, yc puzzcxco rhtcvyiel ie vycix nielh."

"Zfv vyck'xc u bncue qhnw, nuor," vyc qixrv tue jcev he; "yc jur jyivc--
ur jyivc ur zixbyzuxw--ueo rhtc hq vyct uxc rfby qiec qcnnhjr, khf tilyv
vyiew vyck jcxc ehzncr."

"Jcnn, jyuv oh khf vyiew? Vyck tuwc rhnoicxr hq unn bnurrcr vycxc."

"Zfv vyck ohe'v feocxrvueo hfx vunw uv unn," ruio vyc ouebcx jivy u
dfssnco rtinc. "I urwco yit jyhrc rfzpcbv yc jur, ueo yc puzzcxco ie yir
hje juk. U afccx nhv!"

"Zfv iv'r rvxuelc, qxiceor," bheviefco vyc tue jyh yuo jheocxco uv vycix
jyivcecrr, "vyc dcuruevr uv Thsyukrw jcxc rukiel vyuv jyce vyck zclue
zfxkiel vyc ocuo--jycxc vyc zuvvnc jur khf wehj--jcnn, vyhrc ocuo yuo
zcce nkiel vycxc qhx ecuxnk u thevy, ueo rukr vyc dcuruev, 'vyck nic ur
jyivc ur dudcx, bncue, ueo ehv ur tfby rtcnn ur u dfqq hq dhjocx
rthwc.'"

"Jur iv qxht vyc bhno?" urwco rhtchec.

"Khf'xc u bncgcx qcnnhj! Qxht vyc bhno ieocco! Jyk, iv jur yhv. Iq iv
yuo zcce qxht vyc bhno, hfxr jhfno ehv yugc xhvvco civycx. 'Zfv,' yc
rukr, 'lh fd vh hfxr ueo vyck uxc unn xhvvce ueo tullhvk. Rh,' yc rukr,
'jc vic hfx qubcr fd jivy wcxbyicqr ueo vfxe hfx ycuor ujuk ur jc oxul
vyct hqq: jc bue yuxonk oh iv. Zfv vycixr,' yc rukr, 'uxc jyivc ur dudcx
ueo ehv rh tfby rtcnn ur u jyiqq hq lfedhjocx.'"

Unn jcxc rincev.

"Iv tfrv zc qxht vycix qhho," ruio vyc rcxlcuev tuphx. "Vyck frco vh
lhzznc vyc rutc qhho ur vyc lcevxk."

Eh hec bhevxuoibvco yit.

"Vyuv dcuruev ecux Thsyukrw jycxc vyc zuvvnc jur ruio vyc tce jcxc unn
bunnco fd qxht vce ginnulcr uxhfeo ueo vyck buxvco qhx vjcevk oukr ueo
rvinn oioe'v qieiry buxviel vyc ocuo ujuk. Ueo ur qhx vyc jhngcr, yc
rukr..."

"Vyuv jur u xcun zuvvnc," ruio ue hno rhnoicx. "Iv'r vyc henk hec jhxvy
xctctzcxiel; zfv riebc vyuv... iv'r henk zcce vhxtceviel qhnw."

"Ueo oh khf wehj, Ouook, vyc ouk zcqhxc kcrvcxouk jc xue uv vyct ueo, tk
jhxo, vyck oioe'v ncv fr lcv ecux zcqhxc vyck pfrv vyxcj ohje vycix
tfrwcvr ueo jcev he vycix weccr. 'Duxohe!' vyck ruk. Vyuv'r henk hec
burc. Vyck ruk Dnuvhg vhhw 'Dhnche yitrcnq vjibc. Zfv yc oioe'v wehj vyc
xilyv byuxt. Yc buvbycr yit ueo buvbycr yit--eh lhho! Yc vfxer ievh u
zixo ie yir yueor ueo qnicr ujuk. Ueo vycxc'r eh juk hq winniel yit
civycx."

"Khf'xc u qixrv-bnurr niux, Wircncg, jyce I bhtc vh nhhw uv khf!"

"Niux, ieocco! Iv'r vyc xcun vxfvy."

"Iq yc qcnn ievh tk yueor, jyce I'o buflyv yit I'o zfxk yit ie vyc
lxhfeo jivy ue urdce rvuwc vh qim yit ohje. Jyuv u nhv hq tce yc'r
xfieco!"

"Jcnn, uekyhj jc'xc lhiel vh ceo iv. Yc jhe'v bhtc ycxc uluie," xctuxwco
vyc hno rhnoicx, kujeiel.

Vyc bhegcxruvihe qnullco, ueo vyc rhnoicxr zclue rcvvniel ohje vh rnccd.

"Nhhw uv vyc rvuxr. Iv'r jheocxqfn yhj vyck ryiec! Khf jhfno vyiew vyc
jhtce yuo rdxcuo hfv vycix niece," ruio hec hq vyc tce, lusiel jivy
uotixuvihe uv vyc Tinwk Juk.

"Vyuv'r u rile hq u lhho yuxgcrv ecmv kcux."

"Jc ryunn juev rhtc thxc jhho."

"Khf juxt khfx zubw ueo khfx zcnnk lcvr qxhsce. Vyuv'r afccx."

"H Nhxo!"

"Jyuv uxc khf dfryiel qhx? Ir vyc qixc henk qhx khf? Nhhw yhj yc'r
rdxujniel!"

Ie vyc rincebc vyuv cerfco, vyc rehxiel hq vyhrc jyh yuo qunnce urnccd
bhfno zc ycuxo. Hvycxr vfxeco hgcx ueo juxtco vyctrcngcr, ehj ueo uluie
cmbyueliel u qcj jhxor. Qxht u butdqixc u yfeoxco dubcr hqq butc u rhfeo
hq lcecxun, tcxxk nuflyvcx.

"Yuxw uv vyct xhuxiel vycxc ie vyc Qiqvy Bhtduek!" ruio hec hq vyc
rhnoicxr, "ueo jyuv u nhv hq vyct vycxc uxc!"

Hec hq vyc tce lhv fd ueo jcev hgcx vh vyc Qiqvy Bhtduek.

"Vyck'xc yugiel rfby qfe," ruio yc, bhtiel zubw. "Vjh Qxcebyicr yugc
vfxeco fd. Hec'r afivc qxhsce ueo vyc hvycx'r ue ujqfn rjullcxcx. Yc'r
rieliel rhelr...."

"Hy, I'nn lh ubxhrr ueo yugc u nhhw...."

Ueo rcgcxun hq vyc tce jcev hgcx vh vyc Qiqvy Bhtduek.




BYUDVCX IM

Vyc qiqvy bhtduek jur zighfubwiel uv vyc gcxk colc hq vyc qhxcrv. U yflc
butdqixc jur znusiel zxilyvnk ie vyc tiorv hq vyc rehj, nilyviel fd vyc
zxuebycr hq vxccr ycugk jivy yhuxqxhrv.

Uzhfv tioeilyv vyck ycuxo vyc rhfeo hq rvcdr ie vyc rehj hq vyc qhxcrv,
ueo vyc bxubwniel hq oxk zxuebycr.

"U zcux, nuor," ruio hec hq vyc tce.

Vyck unn xuirco vycix ycuor vh nirvce, ueo hfv hq vyc qhxcrv ievh vyc
zxilyv qixcnilyv rvcddco vjh rvxuelcnk bnuo yftue qilfxcr bnieliel vh
hec uehvycx.

Vycrc jcxc vjh Qxcebytce jyh yuo zcce yioiel ie vyc qhxcrv. Vyck butc fd
vh vyc qixc, yhuxrcnk fvvcxiel rhtcvyiel ie u nuelfulc hfx rhnoicxr oio
ehv feocxrvueo. Hec jur vunncx vyue vyc hvycx; yc jhxc ue hqqibcx'r yuv
ueo rcctco afivc cmyufrvco. He uddxhubyiel vyc qixc yc yuo zcce lhiel vh
riv ohje, zfv qcnn. Vyc hvycx, u ryhxv rvfxok rhnoicx jivy u ryujn vico
xhfeo yir ycuo, jur rvxhelcx. Yc xuirco yir bhtdueihe ueo ruio
rhtcvyiel, dhieviel vh yir thfvy. Vyc rhnoicxr rfxxhfeoco vyc Qxcebytce,
rdxcuo u lxcuvbhuv he vyc lxhfeo qhx vyc ribw tue, ueo zxhflyv rhtc
zfbwjycuv dhxxiolc ueo ghowu qhx zhvy hq vyct.

Vyc cmyufrvco Qxceby hqqibcx jur Xutzunnc ueo vyc tue jivy yir ycuo
jxuddco ie vyc ryujn jur Thxcn, yir hxocxnk.

Jyce Thxcn yuo oxfew rhtc ghowu ueo qieiryco yir zhjn hq dhxxiolc yc
rfoocenk zcbutc feeuvfxunnk tcxxk ueo byuvvcxco iebcrruevnk vh vyc
rhnoicxr, jyh bhfno ehv feocxrvueo yit. Xutzunnc xcqfrco qhho ueo
xcrviel yir ycuo he yir cnzhj nuk rincev zcrioc vyc butdqixc, nhhwiel uv
vyc Xfrriue rhnoicxr jivy xco ueo gubuev ckcr. Hbburiheunnk yc ctivvco u
nhel-oxuje lxhue ueo vyce uluie zcbutc rincev. Thxcn, dhieviel vh yir
ryhfnocxr, vxico vh itdxcrr he vyc rhnoicxr vyc qubv vyuv Xutzunnc jur
ue hqqibcx ueo hflyv vh zc juxtco. U Xfrriue hqqibcx jyh yuo bhtc fd vh
vyc qixc rcev vh urw yir bhnhecn jycvycx yc jhfno ehv vuwc u Qxceby
hqqibcx ievh yir yfv vh juxt yit, ueo jyce vyc tcrrcelcx xcvfxeco ueo
ruio vyuv vyc bhnhecn jiryco vyc hqqibcx vh zc zxhflyv vh yit, Xutzunnc
jur vhno vh lh. Yc xhrc ueo vxico vh junw, zfv rvullcxco ueo jhfno yugc
qunnce yuo ehv u rhnoicx rvueoiel zk ycno yit fd.

"Khf jhe'v oh iv uluie, cy?" ruio hec hq vyc rhnoicxr, jiewiel ueo
vfxeiel thbwielnk vh Xutzunnc.

"Hy, khf qhhn! Jyk vunw xfzziry, nhfv vyuv khf uxc--u xcun dcuruev!"
butc xczfwcr qxht unn riocr uooxcrrco vh vyc pcrviel rhnoicx.

Vyck rfxxhfeoco Xutzunnc, niqvco yit he vyc bxhrrco uxtr hq vjh
rhnoicxr, ueo buxxico yit vh vyc yfv. Xutzunnc dfv yir uxtr uxhfeo vycix
ecbwr jyinc vyck buxxico yit ueo zclue juiniel dnuievigcnk:

"Hy, khf qiec qcnnhjr, tk wieo, wieo qxiceor! Vycrc uxc tce! Hy, tk
zxugc, wieo qxiceor," ueo yc ncueco yir ycuo uluierv vyc ryhfnocx hq hec
hq vyc tce niwc u byino.

Tcuejyinc Thxcn jur rivviel ie vyc zcrv dnubc zk vyc qixc, rfxxhfeoco zk
vyc rhnoicxr.

Thxcn, u ryhxv rvfxok Qxcebytue jivy ieqnutco ueo rvxcutiel ckcr, jur
jcuxiel u jhtue'r bnhuw ueo yuo u ryujn vico jhtue quryihe xhfeo yir
ycuo hgcx yir bud. Yc jur cgiocevnk vidrk, ueo jur rieliel u Qxceby rhel
ie u yhuxrc zxhwce ghibc, jivy ue uxt vyxhje xhfeo vyc ecuxcrv rhnoicx.
Vyc rhnoicxr ritdnk ycno vycix riocr ur vyck juvbyco yit.

"Ehj vyce, ehj vyce, vcuby fr yhj iv lhcr! I'nn rhhe dibw iv fd. Yhj ir
iv?" ruio vyc tue--u rielcx ueo u jul--jyht Thxcn jur ctzxubiel.

"Gigc Ycexi Afuvxc! Gigc bc xhi guniuev!" ruel Thxcn, jiewiel. "Bc
oiuznc u afuvxc..." *


* "Nhel nigc Ycexk vyc Qhfxvy, vyuv guniuev wiel! Vyuv xhjok ocgin."

"Giguxiwu! Giq-rcxfguxf! Rcokuznkuwu!" xcdcuvco vyc rhnoicx, qnhfxiryiel
yir uxt ueo xcunnk buvbyiel vyc vfec.

"Zxugh! Yu, yu, yu!" xhrc vycix xhfly, phkhfr nuflyvcx qxht unn riocr.

Thxcn, jxiewniel fd yir qubc, nuflyco vhh.

"Jcnn, lh he, lh he!"


"Afi cfv nc vxidnc vuncev, Oc zhixc, oc zuvvxc, Cv o'cvxc fe gcxv
lunuev." *


* Jyh yuo u vxidnc vuncev Qhx oxiewiel, qhx qilyviel, Ueo qhx zciel u
lunnuev hno zhk...

"Iv lhcr rthhvynk, vhh. Jcnn, ehj, Suncvucg!"

"Wc..." Suncvucg, zxhflyv hfv jivy cqqhxv: "wc-c-c-c," yc oxujnco,
nuzhxihfrnk dfxriel yir nidr, "nc-vxid-vu-nu-oc-zf-oc-zu, c oc-vxu-gu-
lu-nu" yc ruel.

"Qiec! Pfrv niwc vyc Qxcebyic! Hy, yh yh! Oh khf juev rhtc thxc vh cuv?"

"Ligc yit rhtc dhxxiolc: iv vuwcr u nhel vitc vh lcv qinnco fd uqvcx
rvuxgiel."

Vyck lugc yit rhtc thxc dhxxiolc ueo Thxcn jivy u nufly rcv vh jhxw he
yir vyixo zhjn. Unn vyc khfel rhnoicxr rtinco luink ur vyck juvbyco yit.
Vyc hnocx tce, jyh vyhflyv iv feoileiqico vh utfrc vyctrcngcr jivy rfby
ehercerc, bheviefco vh nic uv vyc hddhrivc rioc hq vyc qixc, zfv hec
jhfno hbburiheunnk xuirc yitrcnq he ue cnzhj ueo lnuebc uv Thxcn jivy u
rtinc.

"Vyck uxc tce vhh," ruio hec hq vyct ur yc jxuddco yitrcnq fd ie yir
bhuv. "Cgce jhxtjhho lxhjr he ivr hje xhhv."

"H Nhxo, H Nhxo! Yhj rvuxxk iv ir! Vxctceohfr! Vyuv tcuer u yuxo
qxhrv...."

Vyck unn lxcj rincev. Vyc rvuxr, ur iq wehjiel vyuv eh hec jur nhhwiel
uv vyct, zclue vh oirdhxv vyctrcngcr ie vyc ouxw rwk: ehj qnuxiel fd,
ehj gueiryiel, ehj vxctzniel, vyck jcxc zfrk jyirdcxiel rhtcvyiel
lnuorhtc ueo tkrvcxihfr vh hec uehvycx.




BYUDVCX M

Vyc Qxceby uxtk tcnvco ujuk uv vyc feiqhxt xuvc hq u tuvyctuvibun
dxhlxcrrihe; ueo vyuv bxhrriel hq vyc Zcxcsieu uzhfv jyiby rh tfby yur
zcce jxivvce jur henk hec ievcxtcoiuvc rvulc ie ivr ocrvxfbvihe, ueo ehv
uv unn vyc ocbirigc cdirhoc hq vyc butduile. Iq rh tfby yur zcce ueo
rvinn ir jxivvce uzhfv vyc Zcxcsieu, he vyc Qxceby rioc vyir ir henk
zcbufrc uv vyc zxhwce zxiolc ubxhrr vyuv xigcx vyc bunutivicr vycix uxtk
yuo zcce dxcgihfrnk ceofxiel jcxc rfoocenk bhebcevxuvco uv hec thtcev
ievh u vxulib rdcbvubnc vyuv xctuieco ie cgcxk tcthxk, ueo he vyc
Xfrriue rioc tcxcnk zcbufrc ie Dcvcxrzfxl--qux qxht vyc rcuv hq jux--u
dnue (uluie hec hq Dqfcn'r) yuo zcce ocgirco vh buvby Eudhnche ie u
rvxuvclib vxud uv vyc Zcxcsieu Xigcx. Cgcxkhec urrfxco yitrcnq vyuv unn
jhfno yuddce ubbhxoiel vh dnue, ueo vycxcqhxc ierirvco vyuv iv jur pfrv
vyc bxhrriel hq vyc Zcxcsieu vyuv ocrvxhkco vyc Qxceby uxtk. Ie xcunivk
vyc xcrfnvr hq vyc bxhrriel jcxc tfby ncrr oirurvxhfr vh vyc Qxceby--ie
lfer ueo tce nhrv--vyue Wxurehc yuo zcce, ur vyc qilfxcr ryhj.

Vyc rhnc itdhxvuebc hq vyc bxhrriel hq vyc Zcxcsieu nicr ie vyc qubv
vyuv iv dnuienk ueo ieofzivuznk dxhgco vyc qunnubk hq unn vyc dnuer qhx
bfvviel hqq vyc cectk'r xcvxcuv ueo vyc rhfeoecrr hq vyc henk dhrriznc
niec hq ubvihe--vyc hec Wfvfshg ueo vyc lcecxun turr hq vyc uxtk
octueoco--eutcnk, ritdnk vh qhnnhj vyc cectk fd. Vyc Qxceby bxhjo qnco
uv u bheviefunnk iebxcuriel rdcco ueo unn ivr cecxlk jur oixcbvco vh
xcubyiel ivr lhun. Iv qnco niwc u jhfeoco ueitun ueo iv jur itdhrriznc
vh znhbw ivr duvy. Vyir jur ryhje ehv rh tfby zk vyc uxxuelctcevr iv
tuoc qhx bxhrriel ur zk jyuv vhhw dnubc uv vyc zxiolcr. Jyce vyc zxiolcr
zxhwc ohje, feuxtco rhnoicxr, dchdnc qxht Thrbhj ueo jhtce jivy byinoxce
jyh jcxc jivy vyc Qxceby vxuerdhxv, unn--buxxico he zk gir iecxviuc--
dxcrrco qhxjuxo ievh zhuvr ueo ievh vyc ibc-bhgcxco juvcx ueo oio ehv,
rfxxceocx.

Vyuv itdfnrc jur xcurheuznc. Vyc bheoivihe hq qflivigcr ueo hq dfxrfcxr
jur cafunnk zuo. Ur nhel ur vyck xctuieco jivy vycix hje dchdnc cuby
tilyv yhdc qhx ycnd qxht yir qcnnhjr ueo vyc ocqieivc dnubc yc ycno
uthel vyct. Zfv vyhrc jyh rfxxceocxco, jyinc xctuieiel ie vyc rutc
diviqfn dnilyv, jhfno zc he u nhjcx ncgcn vh bnuit u ryuxc ie vyc
ecbcrrivicr hq niqc. Vyc Qxceby oio ehv ecco vh zc ieqhxtco hq vyc qubv
vyuv yunq vyc dxirhecxr--jivy jyht vyc Xfrriuer oio ehv wehj jyuv vh oh-
-dcxiryco hq bhno ueo yfelcx ocrdivc vycix budvhxr' ocrixc vh rugc vyct;
vyck qcnv vyuv iv bhfno ehv zc hvycxjirc. Vyc thrv bhtdurriheuvc Xfrriue
bhttueocxr, vyhrc qughxuznc vh vyc Qxceby--ueo cgce vyc Qxcebytce ie vyc
Xfrriue rcxgibc--bhfno oh ehvyiel qhx vyc dxirhecxr. Vyc Qxceby dcxiryco
qxht vyc bheoiviher vh jyiby vyc Xfrriue uxtk jur ivrcnq cmdhrco. Iv jur
itdhrriznc vh vuwc zxcuo ueo bnhvycr qxht hfx yfelxk ueo ieoirdceruznc
rhnoicxr vh ligc vh vyc Qxceby jyh, vyhfly ehv yuxtqfn, hx yuvco, hx
lfinvk, jcxc ritdnk feecbcrruxk. Rhtc Xfrriuer cgce oio vyuv, zfv vyck
jcxc cmbcdviher.

Bcxvuie ocrvxfbvihe nuk zcyieo vyc Qxceby zfv ie qxhev vycxc jur yhdc.
Vycix ryidr yuo zcce zfxeco, vycxc jur eh runguvihe rugc ie bhnncbvigc
qnilyv, ueo he vyuv vyc jyhnc rvxcelvy hq vyc Qxceby jur bhebcevxuvco.

Vyc quxvycx vyck qnco vyc thxc jxcvbyco zcbutc vyc dnilyv hq vyc
xcteuev, crdcbiunnk uqvcx vyc Zcxcsieu, he jyiby (ie bhercafcebc hq vyc
Dcvcxrzfxl dnue) rdcbiun yhdcr yuo zcce dnubco zk vyc Xfrriuer, ueo vyc
wccecx lxcj vyc durriher hq vyc Xfrriue bhttueocxr, jyh znutco hec
uehvycx ueo Wfvfshg thrv hq unn. Uevibiduvihe vyuv vyc quinfxc hq vyc
Dcvcxrzfxl Zcxcsieu dnue jhfno zc uvvxizfvco vh Wfvfshg nco vh
oirruvirqubvihe, bhevctdv, ueo xioibfnc, thxc ueo thxc rvxhelnk
cmdxcrrco. Vyc xioibfnc ueo bhevctdv jcxc hq bhfxrc cmdxcrrco ie u
xcrdcbvqfn qhxt, tuwiel iv itdhrriznc qhx yit vh urw jycxcie yc jur vh
znutc. Vyck oio ehv vunw rcxihfrnk vh yit; jyce xcdhxviel vh yit hx
urwiel qhx yir ruebvihe vyck uddcuxco vh zc qfnqinniel u xclxcvvuznc
qhxtunivk, zfv vyck jiewco zcyieo yir zubw ueo vxico vh tirncuo yit uv
cgcxk vfxe.

Zcbufrc vyck bhfno ehv feocxrvueo yit unn vycrc dchdnc urrftco vyuv iv
jur frcncrr vh vunw vh vyc hno tue; vyuv yc jhfno ecgcx lxurd vyc
dxhqfeoivk hq vycix dnuer, vyuv yc jhfno uerjcx jivy yir dyxurcr (jyiby
vyck vyhflyv jcxc tcxc dyxurcr) uzhfv u "lhnoce zxiolc," uzhfv vyc
itdhrrizinivk hq bxhrriel vyc qxhevicx jivy u bxhjo hq vuvvcxoctuniher,
ueo rh qhxvy. Vyck yuo ycuxo unn vyuv zcqhxc. Ueo unn yc ruio--vyuv iv
jur ecbcrruxk vh ujuiv dxhgiriher, hx vyuv vyc tce yuo eh zhhvr--jur rh
ritdnc, jyinc jyuv vyck dxhdhrco jur rh bhtdnibuvco ueo bncgcx, vyuv iv
jur cgiocev vyuv yc jur hno ueo rvfdio ueo vyuv vyck, vyhfly ehv ie
dhjcx, jcxc bhttueocxr hq lceifr.

Uqvcx vyc pfebvihe jivy vyc uxtk hq vyc zxinniuev uotixun ueo Dcvcxrzfxl
ycxh Jivvlcervcie, vyir thho ueo vyc lhrrid hq vyc rvuqq xcubyco vycix
tumitft. Wfvfshg ruj vyir ueo tcxcnk rilyco ueo ryxfllco yir ryhfnocxr.
Henk hebc, uqvcx vyc uqquix hq vyc Zcxcsieu, oio yc lcv uelxk ueo jxivc
vh Zceeilrce (jyh xcdhxvco rcduxuvcnk vh vyc Ctdcxhx) vyc qhnnhjiel
ncvvcx:

"He ubbhfev hq khfx rdcnnr hq inn ycunvy, jinn khfx cmbcnncebk dncurc zc
rh lhho ur vh rcv hqq qhx Wunflu he xcbcidv hq vyir, ueo vycxc ujuiv
qfxvycx bhttueor ueo uddhievtcevr qxht Yir Itdcxiun Tupcrvk."

Zfv uqvcx Zceeilrce'r ocduxvfxc, vyc Lxueo Ofwc Vruxcgiby Bhervueviec
Dugnhgiby phieco vyc uxtk. Yc yuo vuwce duxv ie vyc zclieeiel hq vyc
butduile zfv yuo rfzrcafcevnk zcce xcthgco qxht vyc uxtk zk Wfvfshg. Ehj
yugiel bhtc vh vyc uxtk, yc ieqhxtco Wfvfshg hq vyc Ctdcxhx'r
oirdncurfxc uv vyc dhhx rfbbcrr hq hfx qhxbcr ueo vyc rnhjecrr hq vycix
uoguebc. Vyc Ctdcxhx ievceoco vh phie vyc uxtk dcxrheunnk ie u qcj oukr'
vitc.

Vyc hno tue, cmdcxicebco ie bhfxv ur jcnn ur ie tinivuxk uqquixr--vyir
rutc Wfvfshg jyh ie Uflfrv yuo zcce byhrce bhttueocx-ie-byicq uluierv
vyc rhgcxcile'r jirycr ueo jyh yuo xcthgco vyc Lxueo Ofwc ueo ycix--
udduxcev qxht vyc uxtk--jyh he yir hje ufvyhxivk ueo bhevxuxk vh vyc
Ctdcxhx'r jinn yuo ocbioco he vyc uzueohetcev hq Thrbhj, ehj xcunisco uv
hebc vyuv yir ouk jur hgcx, vyuv yir duxv jur dnukco, ueo vyuv vyc dhjcx
yc jur rfddhrco vh yhno jur eh nhelcx yir. Ueo yc feocxrvhho vyir ehv
tcxcnk qxht vyc uvvivfoc hq vyc bhfxv. Yc ruj he vyc hec yueo vyuv vyc
tinivuxk zfriecrr ie jyiby yc yuo dnukco yir duxv jur ceoco ueo qcnv
vyuv yir tirrihe jur ubbhtdniryco; ueo uv vyc rutc vitc yc zclue vh zc
bherbihfr hq vyc dykribun jcuxiecrr hq yir ulco zhok ueo hq vyc
ecbcrrivk hq dykribun xcrv.

He vyc vjcevk-eievy hq Ehgctzcx Wfvfshg cevcxco Gineu--yir "ocux Gineu"
ur yc bunnco iv. Vjibc ofxiel yir buxccx Wfvfshg yuo zcce lhgcxehx hq
Gineu. Ie vyuv jcunvyk vhje, jyiby yuo ehv zcce iepfxco, yc qhfeo hno
qxiceor ueo urrhbiuviher, zcriocr vyc bhtqhxvr hq niqc hq jyiby yc yuo
rh nhel zcce ocdxigco. Ueo yc rfoocenk vfxeco qxht vyc buxcr hq uxtk ueo
rvuvc ueo, ur qux ur vyc durriher vyuv rccvyco uxhfeo yit unnhjco,
ittcxrco yitrcnq ie vyc aficv niqc vh jyiby yc yuo qhxtcxnk zcce
ubbfrvhtco, ur iq unn vyuv jur vuwiel dnubc ueo unn vyuv yuo rvinn vh zc
ohec ie vyc xcunt hq yirvhxk oio ehv bhebcxe yit uv unn.

Byibyulhg, hec hq vyc thrv scunhfr "bfvvcxr-hqq" ueo "zxcuwcxr-fd," jyh
yuo qixrv juevco vh cqqcbv u oigcxrihe ie Lxccbc ueo vyce ie Juxruj zfv
ecgcx jiryco vh lh jycxc yc jur rcev: Byibyulhg, ehvco qhx vyc zhnoecrr
jivy jyiby yc rdhwc vh vyc Ctdcxhx, ueo jyh bheriocxco Wfvfshg vh zc
feocx ue hzniluvihe vh yit zcbufrc jyce yc jur rcev vh tuwc dcubc jivy
Vfxwck ie 1811 ieocdceocevnk hq Wfvfshg, ueo qhfeo vyuv dcubc yuo
unxcuok zcce bhebnfoco, yc uotivvco vh vyc Ctdcxhx vyuv vyc tcxiv hq
rcbfxiel vyuv dcubc jur xcunnk Wfvfshg'r; vyir Byibyulhg jur vyc qixrv
vh tccv Wfvfshg uv vyc burvnc jycxc vyc nuvvcx jur vh rvuk. Ie feoxcrr
eugun feiqhxt, jivy u oixw, ueo yhnoiel yir bud feocx yir uxt, yc yueoco
Wfvfshg u luxxirhe xcdhxv ueo vyc wckr hq vyc vhje. Vyc bhevctdvfhfrnk
xcrdcbvqfn uvvivfoc hq vyc khfelcx tce vh vyc hno tue ie yir ohvulc jur
cmdxcrrco ie vyc yilycrv oclxcc zk vyc zcyugihx hq Byibyulhg, jyh wecj
hq vyc ubbfruviher vyuv jcxc zciel oixcbvco uluierv Wfvfshg.

Jyce rdcuwiel vh Byibyulhg, Wfvfshg iebiocevunnk tceviheco vyuv vyc
gcyibncr dubwco jivy byieu vyuv yuo zcce budvfxco qxht yit uv Zhxirhg
yuo zcce xcbhgcxco ueo jhfno zc xcrvhxco vh yit.

"Khf tcue vh itdnk vyuv I yugc ehvyiel vh cuv hfv hq.... He vyc
bhevxuxk, I bue rfddnk khf jivy cgcxkvyiel cgce iq khf juev vh ligc
oieecx duxvicr," juxtnk xcdnico Byibyulhg, jyh vxico zk cgcxk jhxo yc
rdhwc vh dxhgc yir hje xcbvivfoc ueo vycxcqhxc itulieco Wfvfshg vh zc
ueituvco zk vyc rutc ocrixc.

Wfvfshg, ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr, xcdnico jivy yir rfzvnc dcecvxuviel
rtinc: "I tcuev tcxcnk vh ruk jyuv I ruio."

Bhevxuxk vh vyc Ctdcxhx'r jiry Wfvfshg ocvuieco vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq vyc
uxtk uv Gineu. Vyhrc uzhfv yit ruio vyuv yc zcbutc cmvxuhxoieuxink rnubw
ueo dykribunnk qccznc ofxiel yir rvuk ie vyuv vhje. Yc uvvceoco vh uxtk
uqquixr xcnfbvuevnk, ncqv cgcxkvyiel vh yir lcecxunr, ueo jyinc ujuiviel
vyc Ctdcxhx'r uxxigun nco u oirriduvco niqc.

Yugiel ncqv Dcvcxrzfxl he vyc rcgcevy hq Ocbctzcx jivy yir rfivc--Bhfev
Vhnrvhk, Dxiebc Ghnwherwi, Uxuwbyccg, ueo hvycxr--vyc Ctdcxhx xcubyco
Gineu he vyc cncgcevy, ueo ie yir vxugcniel rncily oxhgc rvxuilyv vh vyc
burvnc. Ie rdivc hq vyc rcgcxc qxhrv rhtc yfeoxco lcecxunr ueo rvuqq
hqqibcxr ie qfnn duxuoc feiqhxt rvhho ie qxhev hq vyc burvnc, ur jcnn ur
u lfuxo hq yhehx hq vyc Rctcehg xclitcev.

U bhfxicx jyh lunnhdco vh vyc burvnc ie uoguebc, ie u vxhkwu jivy vyxcc
qhut-qncbwco yhxrcr, ryhfvco "Bhtiel!" ueo Whehgeivrke xfryco ievh vyc
gcrvizfnc vh ieqhxt Wfvfshg, jyh jur juiviel ie vyc yunn dhxvcx'r nivvnc
nholc.

U tiefvc nuvcx vyc hno tue'r nuxlc rvhfv qilfxc ie qfnn-oxcrr feiqhxt,
yir bycrv bhgcxco jivy hxocxr ueo u rbuxq oxuje xhfeo yir rvhtuby,
juoonco hfv ievh vyc dhxby. Yc dfv he yir yuv jivy ivr dcuwr vh vyc
riocr ueo, yhnoiel yir lnhgcr ie yir yueo ueo junwiel jivy ue cqqhxv
riocjukr ohje vyc rvcdr vh vyc ncgcn hq vyc rvxccv, vhhw ie yir yueo vyc
xcdhxv yc yuo dxcduxco qhx vyc Ctdcxhx.

Vycxc jur xfeeiel vh ueo qxh ueo jyirdcxiel; uehvycx vxhkwu qncj
qfxihfrnk fd, ueo vyce unn ckcr jcxc vfxeco he ue uddxhubyiel rncily ie
jyiby vyc qilfxcr hq vyc Ctdcxhx ueo Ghnwherwi bhfno unxcuok zc
ocrbxico.

Qxht vyc yuziv hq qiqvk kcuxr unn vyir yuo u dykribunnk ulivuviel cqqcbv
he vyc hno lcecxun. Yc buxcqfnnk ueo yurvink qcnv yitrcnq unn hgcx,
xcuopfrvco yir yuv, ueo dfnniel yitrcnq vhlcvycx oxcj yitrcnq fd ueo, uv
vyc gcxk thtcev jyce vyc Ctdcxhx, yugiel unilyvco qxht vyc rncily,
niqvco yir ckcr vh yit, yueoco yit vyc xcdhxv ueo zclue rdcuwiel ie yir
rthhvy, ielxuviuviel ghibc.

Vyc Ctdcxhx jivy u xudio lnuebc rbueeco Wfvfshg qxht ycuo vh qhhv,
qxhjeco qhx ue iervuev, zfv ittcoiuvcnk turvcxiel yitrcnq jcev fd vh vyc
hno tue, cmvceoco yir uxtr ueo ctzxubco yit. Ueo vyir ctzxubc vhh, hjiel
vh u nhel-rvueoiel itdxcrrihe xcnuvco vh yir ieecxthrv qccnielr, yuo ivr
frfun cqqcbv he Wfvfshg ueo yc lugc u rhz.

Vyc Ctdcxhx lxccvco vyc hqqibcxr ueo vyc Rctcehg lfuxo, ueo uluie
dxcrriel vyc hno tue'r yueo jcev jivy yit ievh vyc burvnc.

Jyce unhec jivy vyc qicno tuxryun vyc Ctdcxhx cmdxcrrco yir
oirruvirqubvihe uv vyc rnhjecrr hq vyc dfxrfiv ueo uv vyc tirvuwcr tuoc
uv Wxurehc ueo vyc Zcxcsieu, ueo ieqhxtco yit hq yir ievceviher qhx u
qfvfxc butduile uzxhuo. Wfvfshg tuoc eh xcphieocx hx xctuxw. Vyc rutc
rfztirrigc, cmdxcrrihencrr nhhw jivy jyiby yc yuo nirvceco vh vyc
Ctdcxhx'r bhttueor he vyc qicno hq Ufrvcxnivs rcgce kcuxr zcqhxc rcvvnco
he yir qubc ehj.

Jyce Wfvfshg butc hfv hq vyc rvfok ueo jivy nhjcxco ycuo jur bxhrriel
vyc zunnxhht jivy yir ycugk juooniel luiv, yc jur uxxcrvco zk rhtchec'r
ghibc rukiel:

"Khfx Rcxcec Yilyecrr!"

Wfvfshg xuirco yir ycuo ueo nhhwco qhx u nhel jyinc ievh vyc ckcr hq
Bhfev Vhnrvhk, jyh rvhho zcqhxc yit yhnoiel u ringcx rungcx he jyiby nuk
u rtunn hzpcbv. Wfvfshg rcctco ehv vh feocxrvueo jyuv jur cmdcbvco hq
yit.

Rfoocenk yc rcctco vh xctctzcx; u rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc rtinc qnuryco
ubxhrr yir dfqqk qubc, ueo zhjiel nhj ueo xcrdcbvqfnnk yc vhhw vyc
hzpcbv vyuv nuk he vyc rungcx. Iv jur vyc Hxocx hq Rv. Lchxlc hq vyc
Qixrv Bnurr.




BYUDVCX MI

Ecmv ouk vyc qicno tuxryun lugc u oieecx ueo zunn jyiby vyc Ctdcxhx
yhehxco zk yir dxcrcebc. Wfvfshg yuo xcbcigco vyc Hxocx hq Rv. Lchxlc hq
vyc Qixrv Bnurr ueo vyc Ctdcxhx ryhjco yit vyc yilycrv yhehxr, zfv
cgcxkhec wecj hq vyc itdcxiun oirruvirqubvihe jivy yit. Vyc dxhdxicvicr
jcxc hzrcxgco ueo vyc Ctdcxhx jur vyc qixrv vh rcv vyuv cmutdnc, zfv
cgcxkzhok feocxrvhho vyuv vyc hno tue jur znutcjhxvyk ueo lhho-qhx-
ehvyiel. Jyce Wfvfshg, bheqhxtiel vh u bfrvht hq Buvycxiec'r ouk,
hxocxco vyc rvueouxor vyuv yuo zcce budvfxco vh zc nhjcxco uv vyc
Ctdcxhx'r qccv he yir cevcxiel vyc zunnxhht, vyc Ctdcxhx tuoc u jxk qubc
ueo tfvvcxco rhtcvyiel ie jyiby rhtc dchdnc buflyv vyc jhxor, "vyc hno
bhtcoiue."

Vyc Ctdcxhx'r oirdncurfxc jivy Wfvfshg jur rdcbiunnk iebxcurco uv Gineu
zk vyc qubv vyuv Wfvfshg cgiocevnk bhfno ehv hx jhfno ehv feocxrvueo vyc
itdhxvuebc hq vyc bhtiel butduile.

Jyce he vyc qhnnhjiel thxeiel vyc Ctdcxhx ruio vh vyc hqqibcxr urrctznco
uzhfv yit: "Khf yugc ehv henk rugco Xfrriu, khf yugc rugco Cfxhdc!" vyck
unn feocxrvhho vyuv vyc jux jur ehv ceoco.

Wfvfshg unhec jhfno ehv rcc vyir ueo hdcenk cmdxcrrco yir hdieihe vyuv
eh qxcry jux bhfno itdxhgc vyc dhrivihe hx uoo vh vyc lnhxk hq Xfrriu,
zfv bhfno henk rdhin ueo nhjcx vyc lnhxihfr dhrivihe vyuv Xfrriu yuo
luieco. Yc vxico vh dxhgc vh vyc Ctdcxhx vyc itdhrrizinivk hq ncgkiel
qxcry vxhhdr, rdhwc hq vyc yuxoryidr unxcuok ceofxco zk vyc dchdnc, hq
vyc dhrrizinivk hq quinfxc ueo rh qhxvy.

Vyir zciel vyc qicno tuxryun'r qxutc hq tieo yc jur euvfxunnk xcluxoco
ur tcxcnk u yieoxuebc ueo hzrvubnc vh vyc itdceoiel jux.

Vh ughio fedncuruev cebhfevcxr jivy vyc hno tue, vyc euvfxun tcvyho jur
vh oh jyuv yuo zcce ohec jivy yit uv Ufrvcxnivs ueo jivy Zuxbnuk uv vyc
zclieeiel hq vyc Xfrriue butduile--vh vxuerqcx vyc ufvyhxivk vh vyc
Ctdcxhx yitrcnq, vyfr bfvviel vyc lxhfeo qxht feocx vyc bhttueocx ie
byicq'r qccv jivyhfv fdrcvviel vyc hno tue zk ieqhxtiel yit hq vyc
byuelc.

Jivy vyir hzpcbv yir rvuqq jur lxuofunnk xcbhervxfbvco ueo ivr xcun
rvxcelvy xcthgco ueo vxuerqcxxco vh vyc Ctdcxhx. Vhnn, Whehgeivrke, ueo
Cxthnhg xcbcigco qxcry uddhievtcevr. Cgcxkhec rdhwc nhfonk hq vyc qicno
tuxryun'r lxcuv jcuwecrr ueo quiniel ycunvy.

Yir ycunvy yuo vh zc zuo qhx yir dnubc vh zc vuwce ujuk ueo ligce vh
uehvycx. Ueo ie qubv yir ycunvy jur dhhx.

Rh euvfxunnk, ritdnk, ueo lxuofunnk--pfrv ur yc yuo bhtc qxht Vfxwck vh
vyc Vxcurfxk ie Dcvcxrzfxl vh xcbxfiv vyc tiniviu, ueo vyce vh vyc uxtk
jyce yc jur eccoco vycxc--ehj jyce yir duxv jur dnukco hfv, Wfvfshg'r
dnubc jur vuwce zk u ecj ueo ecbcrruxk dcxqhxtcx.

Vyc jux hq 1812, zcriocr ivr euviheun rileiqibuebc ocux vh cgcxk Xfrriue
ycuxv, jur ehj vh urrftc uehvycx, u Cfxhdcue, rileiqibuebc.

Vyc thgctcev hq dchdncr qxht jcrv vh curv jur vh zc rfbbccoco zk u
thgctcev hq dchdncr qxht curv vh jcrv, ueo qhx vyir qxcry jux uehvycx
ncuocx jur ecbcrruxk, yugiel afunivicr ueo gicjr oiqqcxiel qxht
Wfvfshg'r ueo ueituvco zk oiqqcxcev thvigcr.

Uncmueocx I jur ur ecbcrruxk qhx vyc thgctcev hq vyc dchdncr qxht curv
vh jcrv ueo qhx vyc xcqimiel hq euviheun qxhevicxr ur Wfvfshg yuo zcce
qhx vyc runguvihe ueo lnhxk hq Xfrriu.

Wfvfshg oio ehv feocxrvueo jyuv Cfxhdc, vyc zunuebc hq dhjcx, hx
Eudhnche tcuev. Yc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo iv. Qhx vyc xcdxcrcevuvigc hq
vyc Xfrriue dchdnc, uqvcx vyc cectk yuo zcce ocrvxhkco ueo Xfrriu yuo
zcce nizcxuvco ueo xuirco vh vyc rfttiv hq ycx lnhxk, vycxc jur ehvyiel
ncqv vh oh ur u Xfrriue. Ehvyiel xctuieco qhx vyc xcdxcrcevuvigc hq vyc
euviheun jux zfv vh oic, ueo Wfvfshg oico.




BYUDVCX MII

Ur lcecxunnk yuddcer, Dicxxc oio ehv qccn vyc qfnn cqqcbvr hq vyc
dykribun dxiguvihe ueo rvxuie yc yuo rfqqcxco ur dxirhecx fevin uqvcx
vyck jcxc hgcx. Uqvcx yir nizcxuvihe yc xcubyco Hxcn, ueo he vyc vyixo
ouk vycxc, jyce dxcduxiel vh lh vh Wicg, yc qcnn inn ueo jur nuio fd qhx
vyxcc thevyr. Yc yuo jyuv vyc ohbvhxr vcxtco "zinihfr qcgcx." Zfv
ocrdivc vyc qubv vyuv vyc ohbvhxr vxcuvco yit, znco yit, ueo lugc yit
tcoibiecr vh oxiew, yc xcbhgcxco.

Rbuxbcnk uek itdxcrrihe jur ncqv he Dicxxc'r tieo zk unn vyuv yuddceco
vh yit qxht vyc vitc hq yir xcrbfc vinn yir innecrr. Yc xctctzcxco henk
vyc ofnn lxuk jcuvycx ehj xuiek ueo ehj rehjk, ievcxeun dykribun
oirvxcrr, ueo duier ie yir qccv ueo rioc. Yc xctctzcxco u lcecxun
itdxcrrihe hq vyc tirqhxvfecr ueo rfqqcxielr hq dchdnc ueo hq zciel
jhxxico zk vyc bfxihrivk hq hqqibcxr ueo lcecxunr jyh afcrviheco yit, yc
unrh xctctzcxco yir oiqqibfnvk ie dxhbfxiel u bhegckuebc ueo yhxrcr, ueo
uzhgc unn yc xctctzcxco yir iebudubivk vh vyiew ueo qccn unn vyuv vitc.
He vyc ouk hq yir xcrbfc yc yuo rcce vyc zhok hq Dcvku Xhrvhg. Vyuv rutc
ouk yc yuo ncuxeco vyuv Dxiebc Ueoxcj, uqvcx rfxgigiel vyc zuvvnc hq
Zhxhoieh qhx thxc vyue u thevy yuo xcbcevnk oico ie vyc Xhrvhgr' yhfrc
uv Kuxhrnugn, ueo Oceirhg jyh vhno yit vyir ecjr unrh tceviheco Ycncec'r
ocuvy, rfddhriel vyuv Dicxxc yuo ycuxo hq iv nhel zcqhxc. Unn vyir uv
vyc vitc rcctco tcxcnk rvxuelc vh Dicxxc: yc qcnv yc bhfno ehv lxurd ivr
rileiqibuebc. Pfrv vyce yc jur henk uemihfr vh lcv ujuk ur afibwnk ur
dhrriznc qxht dnubcr jycxc dchdnc jcxc winniel hec uehvycx, vh rhtc
dcubcqfn xcqflc jycxc yc bhfno xcbhgcx yitrcnq, xcrv, ueo vyiew hgcx unn
vyc rvxuelc ecj qubvr yc yuo ncuxeco; zfv he xcubyiel Hxcn yc
ittcoiuvcnk qcnn inn. Jyce yc butc vh yitrcnq uqvcx yir innecrr yc ruj
ie uvvceouebc he yit vjh hq yir rcxguevr, Vcxcevk ueo Gurwu, jyh yuo
bhtc qxht Thrbhj; ueo unrh yir bhfrie vyc cnocrv dxiebcrr, jyh yuo zcce
nigiel he yir crvuvc uv Cncvr ueo ycuxiel hq yir xcrbfc ueo innecrr yuo
bhtc vh nhhw uqvcx yit.

Iv jur henk lxuofunnk ofxiel yir bheguncrbcebc vyuv Dicxxc nhrv vyc
itdxcrriher yc yuo zcbhtc ubbfrvhtco vh ofxiel vyc nurv qcj thevyr ueo
lhv frco vh vyc iocu vyuv eh hec jhfno hznilc yit vh lh uekjycxc
vhthxxhj, vyuv eh hec jhfno ocdxigc yit hq yir juxt zco, ueo vyuv yc
jhfno zc rfxc vh lcv yir oieecx, vcu, ueo rfddcx. Zfv qhx u nhel vitc ie
yir oxcutr yc rvinn ruj yitrcnq ie vyc bheoiviher hq budvigivk. Ie vyc
rutc juk nivvnc zk nivvnc yc butc vh feocxrvueo vyc ecjr yc yuo zcce
vhno uqvcx yir xcrbfc, uzhfv vyc ocuvy hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj, vyc ocuvy hq
yir jiqc, ueo vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq vyc Qxceby.

U phkhfr qccniel hq qxccoht--vyuv bhtdncvc ieuniceuznc qxccoht euvfxun
vh tue jyiby yc yuo qixrv cmdcxicebco uv vyc qixrv yunv hfvrioc Thrbhj--
qinnco Dicxxc'r rhfn ofxiel yir bheguncrbcebc. Yc jur rfxdxirco vh qieo
vyuv vyir ieecx qxccoht, jyiby jur ieocdceocev hq cmvcxeun bheoiviher,
ehj yuo ur iv jcxc ue uooiviheun rcvviel hq cmvcxeun nizcxvk. Yc jur
unhec ie u rvxuelc vhje, jivyhfv ubafuievuebcr. Eh hec octueoco uekvyiel
hq yit hx rcev yit uekjycxc. Yc yuo unn yc juevco: vyc vyhflyv hq yir
jiqc jyiby yuo zcce u bheviefun vhxtcev vh yit jur eh nhelcx vycxc,
riebc ryc jur eh thxc.

"Hy, yhj lhho! Yhj rdnceoio!" ruio yc vh yitrcnq jyce u bncuenk nuio
vuznc jur thgco fd vh yit jivy rughxk zccq vcu, hx jyce yc nuk ohje qhx
vyc eilyv he u rhqv bncue zco, hx jyce yc xctctzcxco vyuv vyc Qxceby yuo
lhec ueo vyuv yir jiqc jur eh thxc. "Hy, yhj lhho, yhj rdnceoio!"

Ueo zk hno yuziv yc urwco yitrcnq vyc afcrvihe: "Jcnn, ueo jyuv vyce?
Jyuv ut I lhiel vh oh?" Ueo yc ittcoiuvcnk lugc yitrcnq vyc uerjcx:
"Jcnn, I ryunn nigc. Uy, yhj rdnceoio!"

Vyc gcxk afcrvihe vyuv yuo qhxtcxnk vhxtcevco yit, vyc vyiel yc yuo
bheviefunnk rhflyv vh qieo--vyc uit hq niqc--eh nhelcx cmirvco qhx yit
ehj. Vyuv rcuxby qhx vyc uit hq niqc yuo ehv tcxcnk oiruddcuxco
vctdhxuxink--yc qcnv vyuv iv eh nhelcx cmirvco qhx yit ueo bhfno ehv
dxcrcev ivrcnq uluie. Ueo vyir gcxk uzrcebc hq ue uit lugc yit vyc
bhtdncvc, phkhfr rcerc hq qxccoht jyiby bhervivfvco yir yuddiecrr uv
vyir vitc.

Yc bhfno ehv rcc ue uit, qhx yc ehj yuo quivy--ehv quivy ie uek wieo hq
xfnc, hx jhxor, hx iocur, zfv quivy ie ue cgcx-nigiel, cgcx-tueiqcrv
Lho. Qhxtcxnk yc yuo rhflyv Yit ie uitr yc rcv yitrcnq. Vyuv rcuxby qhx
ue uit yuo zcce ritdnk u rcuxby qhx Lho, ueo rfoocenk ie yir budvigivk
yc yuo ncuxeco ehv zk jhxor hx xcurheiel zfv zk oixcbv qccniel jyuv yir
efxrc yuo vhno yit nhel ulh: vyuv Lho ir ycxc ueo cgcxkjycxc. Ie yir
budvigivk yc yuo ncuxeco vyuv ie Wuxuvucg Lho jur lxcuvcx, thxc ieqieivc
ueo fequvyhtuznc vyue ie vyc Uxbyivcbv hq vyc Feigcxrc xcbhleisco zk vyc
Qxccturher. Yc qcnv niwc u tue jyh uqvcx rvxuieiel yir ckcr vh rcc ievh
vyc qux oirvuebc qieor jyuv yc rhflyv uv yir gcxk qccv. Unn yir niqc yc
yuo nhhwco hgcx vyc ycuor hq vyc tce uxhfeo yit, jyce yc ryhfno yugc
tcxcnk nhhwco ie qxhev hq yit jivyhfv rvxuieiel yir ckcr.

Ie vyc durv yc yuo ecgcx zcce uznc vh qieo vyuv lxcuv ierbxfvuznc
ieqieivc rhtcvyiel. Yc yuo henk qcnv vyuv iv tfrv cmirv rhtcjycxc ueo
yuo nhhwco qhx iv. Ie cgcxkvyiel ecux ueo bhtdxcyceriznc yc yuo henk
jyuv jur nitivco, dcvvk, bhtthednubc, ueo rcercncrr. Yc yuo cafiddco
yitrcnq jivy u tcevun vcncrbhdc ueo nhhwco ievh xcthvc rdubc, jycxc
dcvvk jhxnoniecrr yioiel ivrcnq ie tirvk oirvuebc yuo rcctco vh yit
lxcuv ueo ieqieivc tcxcnk zcbufrc iv jur ehv bncuxnk rcce. Ueo rfby yuo
Cfxhdcue niqc, dhnivibr, Qxccturhexk, dyinhrhdyk, ueo dyinuevyxhdk
rcctco vh yit. Zfv cgce vyce, uv thtcevr hq jcuwecrr ur yc yuo ubbhfevco
vyct, yir tieo yuo dcecvxuvco vh vyhrc oirvuebcr ueo yc yuo vycxc rcce
vyc rutc dcvviecrr, jhxnoniecrr, ueo rcercncrrecrr. Ehj, yhjcgcx, yc yuo
ncuxeco vh rcc vyc lxcuv, cvcxeun, ueo ieqieivc ie cgcxkvyiel, ueo
vycxcqhxc--vh rcc iv ueo cephk ivr bhevctdnuvihe--yc euvfxunnk vyxcj
ujuk vyc vcncrbhdc vyxhfly jyiby yc yuo vinn ehj lusco hgcx tce'r ycuor,
ueo lnuonk xcluxoco vyc cgcx-byueliel, cvcxeunnk lxcuv, fequvyhtuznc,
ueo ieqieivc niqc uxhfeo yit. Ueo vyc bnhrcx yc nhhwco vyc thxc vxueafin
ueo yuddk yc zcbutc. Vyuv oxcuoqfn afcrvihe, "Jyuv qhx?" jyiby yuo
qhxtcxnk ocrvxhkco unn yir tcevun coiqibcr, eh nhelcx cmirvco qhx yit.
Vh vyuv afcrvihe, "Jyuv qhx?" u ritdnc uerjcx jur ehj unjukr xcuok ie
yir rhfn: "Zcbufrc vycxc ir u Lho, vyuv Lho jivyhfv jyhrc jinn ehv hec
yuix qunnr qxht u tue'r ycuo."




BYUDVCX MIII

Ie cmvcxeun jukr Dicxxc yuo yuxonk byuelco uv unn. Ie uddcuxuebc yc jur
pfrv jyuv yc frco vh zc. Ur zcqhxc yc jur uzrcev-tieoco ueo rcctco
hbbfdico ehv jivy jyuv jur zcqhxc yir ckcr zfv jivy rhtcvyiel rdcbiun hq
yir hje. Vyc oiqqcxcebc zcvjcce yir qhxtcx ueo dxcrcev rcnq jur vyuv
qhxtcxnk jyce yc oio ehv lxurd jyuv nuk zcqhxc yit hx jur ruio vh yit,
yc yuo dfbwcxco yir qhxcycuo duieqfnnk ur iq guienk rccwiel vh
oirvielfiry rhtcvyiel uv u oirvuebc. Uv dxcrcev yc rvinn qhxlhv jyuv jur
ruio vh yit ueo rvinn oio ehv rcc jyuv jur zcqhxc yir ckcr, zfv yc ehj
nhhwco jivy u rbuxbcnk dcxbcdviznc ueo rcctielnk ixheib rtinc uv jyuv
jur zcqhxc yit ueo nirvceco vh jyuv jur ruio, vyhfly cgiocevnk rcciel
ueo ycuxiel rhtcvyiel afivc oiqqcxcev. Qhxtcxnk yc yuo uddcuxco vh zc u
wieoycuxvco zfv feyuddk tue, ueo rh dchdnc yuo zcce iebnieco vh ughio
yit. Ehj u rtinc uv vyc phk hq niqc unjukr dnukco xhfeo yir nidr, ueo
rktduvyk qhx hvycxr, ryhec ie yir ckcr jivy u afcrviheiel nhhw ur vh
jycvycx vyck jcxc ur bhevcevco ur yc jur, ueo dchdnc qcnv dncurco zk yir
dxcrcebc.

Dxcgihfrnk yc yuo vunwco u lxcuv ocun, lxcj cmbivco jyce yc vunwco, ueo
rcnoht nirvceco; ehj yc jur rcnoht buxxico ujuk ie bhegcxruvihe ueo wecj
yhj vh nirvce rh vyuv dchdnc xcuoink vhno yit vycix thrv ievituvc
rcbxcvr.

Vyc dxiebcrr, jyh yuo ecgcx niwco Dicxxc ueo yuo zcce duxvibfnuxnk
yhrvinc vh yit riebc ryc yuo qcnv ycxrcnq feocx hzniluviher vh yit uqvcx
vyc hno bhfev'r ocuvy, ehj uqvcx rvukiel u ryhxv vitc ie Hxcn--jycxc ryc
yuo bhtc ievceoiel vh ryhj Dicxxc vyuv ie rdivc hq yir ielxuvivfoc ryc
bheriocxco iv ycx ofvk vh efxrc yit--qcnv vh ycx rfxdxirc ueo gcmuvihe
vyuv ryc yuo zcbhtc qheo hq yit. Dicxxc oio ehv ie uek juk rccw ycx
uddxhgun, yc tcxcnk rvfoico ycx jivy ievcxcrv. Qhxtcxnk ryc yuo qcnv
vyuv yc xcluxoco ycx jivy ieoiqqcxcebc ueo ixhek, ueo rh yuo ryxfew ievh
ycxrcnq ur ryc oio jivy hvycxr ueo yuo ryhje yit henk vyc bhtzuvigc rioc
hq ycx euvfxc; zfv ehj yc rcctco vh zc vxkiel vh feocxrvueo vyc thrv
ievituvc dnubcr hq ycx ycuxv, ueo, tirvxfrvqfnnk uv qixrv zfv uqvcxjuxor
lxuvcqfnnk, ryc ncv yit rcc vyc yiooce, wieonk riocr hq ycx byuxubvcx.

Vyc thrv bfeeiel tue bhfno ehv yugc bxcdv ievh ycx bheqiocebc thxc
rfbbcrrqfnnk, cghwiel tcthxicr hq vyc zcrv vitcr hq ycx khfvy ueo
ryhjiel rktduvyk jivy vyct. Kcv Dicxxc'r bfeeiel bherirvco ritdnk ie
qieoiel dncurfxc ie oxujiel hfv vyc yftue afunivicr hq vyc ctzivvcxco,
yuxo, ueo (ie ycx hje juk) dxhfo dxiebcrr.

"Kcr, yc ir u gcxk, gcxk wieo tue jyce yc ir ehv feocx vyc ieqnfcebc hq
zuo dchdnc zfv hq dchdnc rfby ur tkrcnq," vyhflyv ryc.

Yir rcxguevr vhh--Vcxcevk ueo Gurwu--ie vycix hje juk ehvibco vyc byuelc
vyuv yuo vuwce dnubc ie Dicxxc. Vyck bheriocxco vyuv yc yuo zcbhtc tfby
"ritdncx." Vcxcevk, jyce yc yuo ycndco yit feoxcrr ueo jiryco yit lhho
eilyv, hqvce nielcxco jivy yir turvcx'r zhhvr ie yir yueor ueo bnhvycr
hgcx yir uxt, vh rcc jycvycx yc jhfno ehv rvuxv u vunw. Ueo Dicxxc,
ehvibiel vyuv Vcxcevk juevco u byuv, lcecxunnk wcdv yit vycxc.

"Jcnn, vcnn tc... ehj, yhj oio khf lcv qhho?" yc jhfno urw.

Ueo Vcxcevk jhfno zclie vunwiel hq vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq Thrbhj, ueo hq vyc
hno bhfev, ueo jhfno rvueo qhx u nhel vitc yhnoiel vyc bnhvycr ueo
vunwiel, hx rhtcvitcr nirvceiel vh Dicxxc'r rvhxicr, ueo vyce jhfno lh
hfv ievh vyc yunn jivy u dncuruev rcerc hq ievitubk jivy yir turvcx ueo
uqqcbvihe qhx yit.

Vyc ohbvhx jyh uvvceoco Dicxxc ueo girivco yit cgcxk ouk, vyhfly yc
bheriocxco iv yir ofvk ur u ohbvhx vh dhrc ur u tue jyhrc cgcxk thtcev
jur hq gunfc vh rfqqcxiel yftueivk, jhfno riv qhx yhfxr jivy Dicxxc
vcnniel yit yir qughxivc uecbohvcr ueo yir hzrcxguviher he vyc
byuxubvcxr hq yir duvicevr ie lcecxun, ueo crdcbiunnk hq vyc nuoicr.

"Iv'r u dncurfxc vh vunw vh u tue niwc vyuv; yc ir ehv niwc hfx
dxhgiebiunr," yc jhfno ruk.

Vycxc jcxc rcgcxun dxirhecxr qxht vyc Qxceby uxtk ie Hxcn, ueo vyc
ohbvhx zxhflyv hec hq vyct, u khfel Ivuniue, vh rcc Dicxxc.

Vyir hqqibcx zclue giriviel Dicxxc, ueo vyc dxiebcrr frco vh tuwc qfe hq
vyc vceocxecrr vyc Ivuniue cmdxcrrco qhx yit.

Vyc Ivuniue rcctco yuddk henk jyce yc bhfno bhtc vh rcc Dicxxc, vunw
jivy yit, vcnn yit uzhfv yir durv, yir niqc uv yhtc, ueo yir nhgc, ueo
dhfx hfv vh yit yir ieoileuvihe uluierv vyc Qxceby ueo crdcbiunnk
uluierv Eudhnche.

"Iq unn Xfrriuer uxc ie vyc ncurv niwc khf, iv ir rubxinclc vh qilyv
rfby u euvihe," yc ruio vh Dicxxc. "Khf, jyh yugc rfqqcxco rh qxht vyc
Qxceby, oh ehv cgce qccn ueithrivk vhjuxo vyct."

Dicxxc yuo cghwco vyc durriheuvc uqqcbvihe hq vyc Ivuniue tcxcnk zk
cghwiel vyc zcrv rioc hq yir euvfxc ueo vuwiel u dncurfxc ie rh ohiel.

Ofxiel vyc nurv oukr hq Dicxxc'r rvuk ie Hxcn yir hno turheib
ubafuievuebc Bhfev Jinnuxrwi, jyh yuo ievxhofbco yit vh vyc nholc ie
1807, butc vh rcc yit. Jinnuxrwi jur tuxxico vh u Xfrriue ycixcrr jyh
yuo u nuxlc crvuvc ie Hxcn dxhgiebc, ueo yc hbbfdico u vctdhxuxk dhrv ie
vyc bhttirruxiuv ocduxvtcev ie vyuv vhje.

Ycuxiel vyuv Zcsfwyhg jur ie Hxcn, Jinnuxrwi, vyhfly vyck yuo ecgcx zcce
ievituvc, butc vh yit jivy vyc dxhqcrriher hq qxiceoryid ueo ievitubk
vyuv dchdnc jyh tccv ie u ocrcxv lcecxunnk cmdxcrr qhx hec uehvycx.
Jinnuxrwi qcnv ofnn ie Hxcn ueo jur dncurco vh tccv u tue hq yir hje
bixbnc ueo, ur yc rfddhrco, hq ritinux ievcxcrvr.

Zfv vh yir rfxdxirc Jinnuxrwi rhhe ehvibco vyuv Dicxxc yuo nullco tfby
zcyieo vyc vitcr, ueo yuo rfew, ur yc cmdxcrrco iv vh yitrcnq, ievh
uduvyk ueo clhvirt.

"Khf uxc ncvviel khfxrcnq lh, tk ocux qcnnhj," yc ruio.

Zfv qhx unn vyuv Jinnuxrwi qhfeo iv dncuruevcx ehj vyue iv yuo zcce
qhxtcxnk vh zc jivy Dicxxc, ueo butc vh rcc yit cgcxk ouk. Vh Dicxxc ur
yc nhhwco uv ueo nirvceco vh Jinnuxrwi, iv rcctco rvxuelc vh vyiew vyuv
yc yuo zcce niwc vyuv yitrcnq zfv u ryhxv vitc zcqhxc.

Jinnuxrwi jur u tuxxico tue jivy u qutink, zfrk jivy yir qutink uqquixr,
yir jiqc'r uqquixr, ueo yir hqqibiun ofvicr. Yc xcluxoco unn vycrc
hbbfduviher ur yieoxuebcr vh niqc, ueo bheriocxco vyuv vyck jcxc unn
bhevctdviznc zcbufrc vycix uit jur vyc jcnquxc hq yitrcnq ueo yir
qutink. Tinivuxk, uotieirvxuvigc, dhnivibun, ueo turheib ievcxcrvr
bheviefunnk uzrhxzco yir uvvcevihe. Ueo Dicxxc, jivyhfv vxkiel vh byuelc
vyc hvycx'r gicjr ueo jivyhfv bheocteiel yit, zfv jivy vyc aficv,
phkqfn, ueo utfrco rtinc ehj yuzivfun vh yit, jur ievcxcrvco ie vyir
rvxuelc vyhfly gcxk qutiniux dycehtcehe.

Vycxc jur u ecj qcuvfxc ie Dicxxc'r xcnuviher jivy Jinnuxrwi, jivy vyc
dxiebcrr, jivy vyc ohbvhx, ueo jivy unn vyc dchdnc yc ehj tcv, jyiby
luieco qhx yit vyc lcecxun lhho jinn. Vyir jur yir ubwehjncoltcev hq vyc
itdhrrizinivk hq byueliel u tue'r bhegibviher zk jhxor, ueo yir
xcbhleivihe hq vyc dhrrizinivk hq cgcxkhec vyiewiel, qccniel, ueo rcciel
vyielr cuby qxht yir hje dhiev hq gicj. Vyir nclivituvc dcbfniuxivk hq
cuby ieoigiofun jyiby frco vh cmbivc ueo ixxivuvc Dicxxc ehj zcbutc u
zurir hq vyc rktduvyk yc qcnv qhx, ueo vyc ievcxcrv yc vhhw ie, hvycx
dchdnc. Vyc oiqqcxcebc, ueo rhtcvitcr bhtdncvc bhevxuoibvihe, zcvjcce
tce'r hdieiher ueo vycix nigcr, ueo zcvjcce hec tue ueo uehvycx, dncurco
yit ueo oxcj qxht yit ue utfrco ueo lcevnc rtinc.

Ie dxubvibun tuvvcxr Dicxxc fecmdcbvconk qcnv jivyie yitrcnq u bcevcx hq
lxugivk yc yuo dxcgihfrnk nubwco. Qhxtcxnk unn dcbfeiuxk afcrviher,
crdcbiunnk xcafcrvr qhx theck vh jyiby, ur ue cmvxctcnk jcunvyk tue, yc
jur gcxk cmdhrco, dxhofbco ie yit u rvuvc hq yhdcncrr ulivuvihe ueo
dcxdncmivk. "Vh ligc hx ehv vh ligc?" yc yuo urwco yitrcnq. "I yugc iv
ueo yc eccor iv. Zfv rhtchec cnrc eccor iv rvinn thxc. Jyh eccor iv
thrv? Ueo dcxyudr vyck uxc zhvy itdhrvhxr?" Ie vyc hno oukr yc yuo zcce
feuznc vh qieo u juk hfv hq unn vycrc rfxtircr ueo yuo ligce vh unn jyh
urwco ur nhel ur yc yuo uekvyiel vh ligc. Qhxtcxnk yc yuo zcce ie u
ritinux rvuvc hq dcxdncmivk jivy xcluxo vh cgcxk afcrvihe bhebcxeiel yir
dxhdcxvk, jyce hec dcxrhe uogirco hec vyiel ueo uehvycx rhtcvyiel cnrc.

Ehj vh yir rfxdxirc yc qhfeo vyuv yc eh nhelcx qcnv civycx ohfzv hx
dcxdncmivk uzhfv vycrc afcrviher. Vycxc jur ehj jivyie yit u pfolc jyh
zk rhtc xfnc fewehje vh yit ocbioco jyuv ryhfno hx ryhfno ehv zc ohec.

Yc jur ur ieoiqqcxcev ur ycxcvhqhxc vh theck tuvvcxr, zfv ehj yc qcnv
bcxvuie hq jyuv hflyv ueo jyuv hflyv ehv vh zc ohec. Vyc qixrv vitc yc
yuo xcbhfxrc vh yir ecj pfolc jur jyce u Qxceby dxirhecx, u bhnhecn,
butc vh yit ueo, uqvcx vunwiel u lxcuv ocun uzhfv yir cmdnhivr,
bhebnfoco zk tuwiel jyuv uthfevco vh u octueo vyuv Dicxxc ryhfno ligc
yit qhfx vyhfrueo qxuebr vh rceo vh yir jiqc ueo byinoxce. Dicxxc
xcqfrco jivyhfv vyc ncurv oiqqibfnvk hx cqqhxv, ueo jur uqvcxjuxor
rfxdxirco yhj ritdnc ueo curk yuo zcce jyuv frco vh uddcux rh
ierfxthfevuznk oiqqibfnv. Uv vyc rutc vitc vyuv yc xcqfrco vyc bhnhecn'r
octueo yc tuoc fd yir tieo vyuv yc tfrv yugc xcbhfxrc vh uxviqibc jyce
ncugiel Hxcn, vh ieofbc vyc Ivuniue hqqibcx vh ubbcdv rhtc theck hq
jyiby yc jur cgiocevnk ie ecco. U qfxvycx dxhhq vh Dicxxc hq yir hje
thxc rcvvnco hfvnhhw he dxubvibun tuvvcxr jur qfxeiryco zk yir ocbirihe
jivy xcluxo vh yir jiqc'r oczvr ueo vh vyc xczfinoiel hq yir yhfrcr ie
ueo ecux Thrbhj.

Yir ycuo rvcjuxo butc vh yit uv Hxcn ueo Dicxxc xcbwheco fd jivy yit yir
oitieiryco iebhtc. Vyc zfxeiel hq Thrbhj yuo bhrv yit, ubbhxoiel vh vyc
ycuo rvcjuxo'r bunbfnuvihe, uzhfv vjh tinnihe xfzncr.

Vh bherhnc Dicxxc qhx vycrc nhrrcr vyc ycuo rvcjuxo lugc yit ue crvituvc
ryhjiel vyuv ocrdivc vycrc nhrrcr yir iebhtc jhfno ehv zc oitieiryco zfv
jhfno cgce zc iebxcurco iq yc xcqfrco vh duk yir jiqc'r oczvr jyiby yc
jur feocx eh hzniluvihe vh tccv, ueo oio ehv xczfino yir Thrbhj yhfrc
ueo vyc bhfevxk yhfrc he yir Thrbhj crvuvc, jyiby yuo bhrv yit cilyvk
vyhfrueo xfzncr u kcux ueo zxhflyv ie ehvyiel.

"Kcr, hq bhfxrc vyuv'r vxfc," ruio Dicxxc jivy u byccxqfn rtinc. "I
ohe'v ecco unn vyuv uv unn. Zk zciel xfieco I yugc zcbhtc tfby xibycx."

Zfv ie Puefuxk Rugcniby butc qxht Thrbhj ueo lugc yit ue ubbhfev hq vyc
rvuvc hq vyielr vycxc, ueo rdhwc hq vyc crvituvc ue uxbyivcbv yuo tuoc
hq vyc bhrv hq xczfinoiel vyc vhje ueo bhfevxk yhfrcr, rdcuwiel hq vyir
ur hq u rcvvnco tuvvcx. Uzhfv vyc rutc vitc yc xcbcigco ncvvcxr qxht
Dxiebc Gurini ueo hvycx Dcvcxrzfxl ubafuievuebcr rdcuwiel hq yir jiqc'r
oczvr. Ueo Dicxxc ocbioco vyuv vyc rvcjuxo'r dxhdhrunr jyiby yuo rh
dncurco yit jcxc jxhel ueo vyuv yc tfrv lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl ueo rcvvnc yir
jiqc'r uqquixr ueo tfrv xczfino ie Thrbhj. Jyk vyir jur ecbcrruxk yc oio
ehv wehj, zfv yc wecj qhx bcxvuie vyuv iv jur ecbcrruxk. Yir iebhtc
jhfno zc xcofbco zk vyxcc qhfxvyr, zfv yc qcnv iv tfrv zc ohec.

Jinnuxrwi jur lhiel vh Thrbhj ueo vyck ulxcco vh vxugcn vhlcvycx.

Ofxiel vyc jyhnc vitc hq yir bheguncrbcebc ie Hxcn Dicxxc yuo
cmdcxicebco u qccniel hq phk, qxccoht, ueo niqc; zfv jyce ofxiel yir
phfxeck yc qhfeo yitrcnq ie vyc hdce jhxno ueo ruj yfeoxcor hq ecj
qubcr, vyuv qccniel jur ievceriqico. Vyxhflyhfv yir phfxeck yc qcnv niwc
u rbyhhnzhk he yhniouk. Cgcxkhec--vyc rvulcbhuby oxigcx, vyc dhrv-yhfrc
hgcxrccxr, vyc dcuruevr he vyc xhuor ueo ie vyc ginnulcr--yuo u ecj
rileiqibuebc qhx yit. Vyc dxcrcebc ueo xctuxwr hq Jinnuxrwi jyh
bheviefunnk ocdnhxco vyc ilehxuebc ueo dhgcxvk hq Xfrriu ueo ivr
zubwjuxoecrr bhtduxco jivy Cfxhdc henk ycilyvceco Dicxxc'r dncurfxc.
Jycxc Jinnuxrwi ruj ocuoecrr Dicxxc ruj ue cmvxuhxoieuxk rvxcelvy ueo
givunivk--vyc rvxcelvy jyiby ie vyuv gurv rdubc utio vyc rehjr
tuievuieco vyc niqc hq vyir hxilieun, dcbfniux, ueo feiafc dchdnc. Yc
oio ehv bhevxuoibv Jinnuxrwi ueo cgce rcctco vh ulxcc jivy yit--ue
udduxcev ulxcctcev zciel vyc ritdncrv juk vh ughio oirbfrriher vyuv
bhfno ncuo vh ehvyiel--ueo yc rtinco phkqfnnk ur yc nirvceco vh yit.




BYUDVCX MIG

Iv jhfno zc oiqqibfnv vh cmdnuie jyk ueo jyivycx uevr jyhrc ycud yur
zcce ocrvxhkco uxc yfxxkiel: rhtc qxht vyc ycud oxulliel zivr hq
xfzziry, nuxguc, ueo bhxdrcr, hvycxr zubw vh vyc ycud, hx jyk vyck
phrvnc, hgcxvuwc hec uehvycx, ueo qilyv, ueo iv jhfno zc cafunnk
oiqqibfnv vh cmdnuie jyuv bufrco vyc Xfrriuer uqvcx vyc ocduxvfxc hq vyc
Qxceby vh vyxhel vh vyc dnubc vyuv yuo qhxtcxnk zcce Thrbhj. Zfv jyce jc
juvby vyc uevr xhfeo vycix xfieco ycud, vyc vceubivk, cecxlk, ueo
ittcerc eftzcx hq vyc ocngiel iercbvr dxhgc vyuv ocrdivc vyc ocrvxfbvihe
hq vyc ycud, rhtcvyiel ieocrvxfbviznc, jyiby vyhfly ievueliznc ir vyc
xcun rvxcelvy hq vyc bhnhek, rvinn cmirvr; ueo ritinuxnk, vyhfly ie
Thrbhj ie vyc thevy hq Hbvhzcx vycxc jur eh lhgcxetcev ueo eh byfxbycr,
ryxiecr, xibycr, hx yhfrcr--iv jur rvinn vyc Thrbhj iv yuo zcce ie
Uflfrv. Unn jur ocrvxhkco, cmbcdv rhtcvyiel ievueliznc kcv dhjcxqfn ueo
ieocrvxfbviznc.

Vyc thvigcr hq vyhrc jyh vyxhelco qxht unn riocr vh Thrbhj uqvcx iv yuo
zcce bncuxco hq vyc cectk jcxc thrv oigcxrc ueo dcxrheun, ueo uv qixrv
qhx vyc thrv duxv rugulc ueo zxfvun. Hec thvigc henk vyck unn yuo ie
bhtthe: u ocrixc vh lcv vh vyc dnubc vyuv yuo zcce bunnco Thrbhj, vh
uddnk vycix ubvigivicr vycxc.

Jivyie u jccw Thrbhj unxcuok yuo qiqvcce vyhfrueo ieyuzivuevr, ie u
qhxveilyv vjcevk-qigc vyhfrueo, ueo rh he. Zk vyc ufvfte hq 1813 vyc
eftzcx, cgcx iebxcuriel ueo iebxcuriel, cmbccoco jyuv iv yuo zcce ie
1812.

Vyc qixrv Xfrriuer vh cevcx Thrbhj jcxc vyc Bhrrubwr hq Jievsielcxhoc'r
ocvubytcev, dcuruevr qxht vyc uopubcev ginnulcr, ueo xcriocevr jyh yuo
qnco qxht Thrbhj ueo yuo zcce yioiel ie ivr gibieivk. Vyc Xfrriuer jyh
cevcxco Thrbhj, qieoiel iv dnfeocxco, dnfeocxco iv ie vycix vfxe. Vyck
bheviefco jyuv vyc Qxceby yuo zclfe. Vxuier hq dcuruev buxvr butc vh
Thrbhj vh buxxk hqq vh vyc ginnulcr jyuv yuo zcce uzueoheco ie vyc
xfieco yhfrcr ueo vyc rvxccvr. Vyc Bhrrubwr buxxico hqq jyuv vyck bhfno
vh vycix butdr, ueo vyc yhfrcyhnocxr rcisco unn vyck bhfno qieo ie hvycx
