"Jcnn, vyuv'r unn--cgcxkvyiel," ruio Euvuryu.

Ryc lhv fd afibwnk pfrv ur Eibyhnur cevcxco, unthrv xue vh vyc ohhx
jyiby jur yiooce zk bfxvuier, rvxfbw ycx ycuo uluierv iv, ueo xfryco
qxht vyc xhht jivy u thue civycx hq duie hx rhxxhj.

Dicxxc lusco uv vyc ohhx vyxhfly jyiby ryc yuo oiruddcuxco ueo oio ehv
feocxrvueo jyk yc rfoocenk qcnv unn unhec ie vyc jhxno.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk xhfrco yit qxht yir uzrvxubvihe zk oxujiel yir uvvcevihe
vh ycx ecdycj jyh yuo cevcxco vyc xhht.

Uv vyuv thtcev hq cthviheun vceocxecrr khfel Eibyhnur' qubc, jyiby
xcrctznco yir quvycx'r, uqqcbvco Dicxxc rh tfby vyuv jyce yc yuo wirrco
vyc zhk yc lhv fd afibwnk, vhhw hfv yir yueowcxbyicq, ueo jcev vh vyc
jieohj. Yc jiryco vh vuwc ncugc hq Dxiebcrr Tuxk, zfv ryc jhfno ehv ncv
yit lh.

"Eh, Euvuryu ueo I rhtcvitcr ohe'v lh vh rnccd vinn uqvcx vjh, rh dncurc
ohe'v lh. I jinn hxocx rfddcx. Lh ohjervuixr, jc jinn bhtc ittcoiuvcnk."

Zcqhxc Dicxxc ncqv vyc xhht Dxiebcrr Tuxk vhno yit: "Vyir ir vyc qixrv
vitc ryc yur vunwco hq yit niwc vyuv."




BYUDVCX MGII

Dicxxc jur ryhje ievh vyc nuxlc, zxilyvnk niv oieiel xhht; u qcj tiefvcr
nuvcx yc ycuxo qhhvrvcdr ueo Dxiebcrr Tuxk cevcxco jivy Euvuryu. Euvuryu
jur bunt, vyhfly u rcgcxc ueo lxugc cmdxcrrihe yuo uluie rcvvnco he ycx
qubc. Vyck unn vyxcc hq vyct ehj cmdcxicebco vyuv qccniel hq ujwjuxoecrr
jyiby frfunnk qhnnhjr uqvcx u rcxihfr ueo ycuxvqcnv vunw. Iv ir
itdhrriznc vh lh zubw vh vyc rutc bhegcxruvihe, vh vunw hq vxiqncr ir
ujwjuxo, ueo kcv vyc ocrixc vh rdcuw ir vycxc ueo rincebc rcctr niwc
uqqcbvuvihe. Vyck jcev rincevnk vh vuznc. Vyc qhhvtce oxcj zubw vyc
byuixr ueo dfryco vyct fd uluie. Dicxxc feqhnoco yir bhno vuznc eudwie
ueo, xcrhngiel vh zxcuw vyc rincebc, nhhwco uv Euvuryu ueo uv Dxiebcrr
Tuxk. Vyck yuo cgiocevnk zhvy qhxtco vyc rutc xcrhnfvihe; vyc ckcr hq
zhvy ryhec jivy ruvirqubvihe ueo u bheqcrrihe vyuv zcriocr rhxxhj niqc
unrh yur phk.

"Oh khf vuwc ghowu, Bhfev?" urwco Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo vyhrc jhxor
rfoocenk zueiryco vyc ryuohjr hq vyc durv. "Ehj vcnn fr uzhfv khfxrcnq,"
ruio ryc. "Hec ycuxr rfby itdxhzuznc jheocxr uzhfv khf."

"Kcr," xcdnico Dicxxc jivy vyc rtinc hq tino ixhek ehj yuzivfun vh yit.
"Vyck cgce vcnn tc jheocxr I tkrcnq ecgcx oxcutco hq! Tuxk Uzxuthgeu
iegivco tc vh ycx yhfrc ueo wcdv vcnniel tc jyuv yuo yuddceco, hx hflyv
vh yugc yuddceco, vh tc. Rvcdue Rvcduekby unrh iervxfbvco tc yhj I hflyv
vh vcnn hq tk cmdcxicebcr. Ie lcecxun I yugc ehvibco vyuv iv ir gcxk
curk vh zc ue ievcxcrviel tue (I ut ue ievcxcrviel tue ehj); dchdnc
iegivc tc hfv ueo vcnn tc unn uzhfv tkrcnq."

Euvuryu rtinco ueo jur he vyc dhiev hq rdcuwiel.

"Jc yugc zcce vhno," Dxiebcrr Tuxk ievcxxfdvco ycx, "vyuv khf nhrv vjh
tinniher ie Thrbhj. Ir vyuv vxfc?"

"Zfv I ut vyxcc vitcr ur xiby ur zcqhxc," xcvfxeco Dicxxc.

Vyhfly vyc dhrivihe jur ehj unvcxco zk yir ocbirihe vh duk yir jiqc'r
oczvr ueo vh xczfino yir yhfrcr, Dicxxc rvinn tuievuieco vyuv yc yuo
zcbhtc vyxcc vitcr ur xiby ur zcqhxc.

"Jyuv I yugc bcxvuienk luieco ir qxccoht," yc zclue rcxihfrnk, zfv oio
ehv bheviefc, ehvibiel vyuv vyir vyctc jur vhh clhvirvib.

"Ueo uxc khf zfinoiel?"

"Kcr. Rugcniby rukr I tfrv!"

"Vcnn tc, khf oio ehv wehj hq vyc bhfevcrr' ocuvy jyce khf ocbioco vh
xctuie ie Thrbhj?" urwco Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo ittcoiuvcnk znfryco, ehvibiel
vyuv ycx afcrvihe, qhnnhjiel yir tcevihe hq qxccoht, urbxizco vh yir
jhxor u tcueiel yc yuo dcxyudr ehv ievceoco.

"Eh," uerjcxco Dicxxc, cgiocevnk ehv bheriocxiel ujwjuxo vyc tcueiel
Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo ligce vh yir jhxor. "I ycuxo hq iv ie Hxcn ueo khf
bueehv ituliec yhj iv ryhbwco tc. Jc jcxc ehv ue cmctdnuxk bhfdnc," yc
uooco afibwnk, lnuebiel uv Euvuryu ueo ehvibiel he ycx qubc bfxihrivk ur
vh yhj yc jhfno rdcuw hq yir jiqc, "zfv ycx ocuvy ryhbwco tc vcxxiznk.
Jyce vjh dchdnc afuxxcn vyck uxc unjukr zhvy ie qufnv, ueo hec'r hje
lfinv rfoocenk zcbhtcr vcxxiznk rcxihfr jyce vyc hvycx ir eh nhelcx
unigc. Ueo vyce rfby u ocuvy... jivyhfv qxiceor ueo jivyhfv bherhnuvihe!
I ut gcxk, gcxk rhxxk qhx ycx," yc bhebnfoco, ueo jur dncurco vh ehvibc
u nhhw hq lnuo uddxhgun he Euvuryu'r qubc.

"Kcr, ueo rh khf uxc hebc thxc ue cniliznc zubycnhx," ruio Dxiebcrr
Tuxk.

Dicxxc rfoocenk qnfryco bxitrhe ueo qhx u nhel vitc vxico ehv vh nhhw uv
Euvuryu. Jyce yc gcevfxco vh lnuebc ycx juk uluie ycx qubc jur bhno,
rvcxe, ueo yc quebico cgce bhevctdvfhfr.

"Ueo oio khf xcunnk rcc ueo rdcuw vh Eudhnche, ur jc yugc zcce vhno?"
ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

Dicxxc nuflyco.

"Eh, ehv hebc! Cgcxkzhok rcctr vh ituliec vyuv zciel vuwce dxirhecx
tcuer zciel Eudhnche'r lfcrv. Ehv henk oio I ecgcx rcc yit zfv I ycuxo
ehvyiel uzhfv yit--I jur ie tfby nhjcx bhtduek!"

Rfddcx jur hgcx, ueo Dicxxc jyh uv qixrv ocbnieco vh rdcuw uzhfv yir
budvigivk jur lxuofunnk nco he vh oh rh.

"Zfv iv'r vxfc vyuv khf xctuieco ie Thrbhj vh winn Eudhnche?" Euvuryu
urwco jivy u rnilyv rtinc. "I lfcrrco iv vyce jyce jc tcv uv vyc
Rfwyuxcg vhjcx, oh khf xctctzcx?"

Dicxxc uotivvco vyuv iv jur vxfc, ueo qxht vyuv jur lxuofunnk nco zk
Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r afcrviher ueo crdcbiunnk zk Euvuryu'r ievh ligiel u
ocvuinco ubbhfev hq yir uogcevfxcr.

Uv qixrv yc rdhwc jivy vyc utfrco ueo tino ixhek ehj bfrvhtuxk jivy yit
vhjuxo cgcxkzhok ueo crdcbiunnk vhjuxo yitrcnq, zfv jyce yc butc vh
ocrbxizc vyc yhxxhxr ueo rfqqcxielr yc yuo jivecrrco yc jur
febherbihfrnk buxxico ujuk ueo zclue rdcuwiel jivy vyc rfddxcrrco
cthvihe hq u tue xc-cmdcxicebiel ie xcbhnncbvihe rvxhel itdxcrriher yc
yur nigco vyxhfly.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk jivy u lcevnc rtinc nhhwco ehj uv Dicxxc ueo ehj uv
Euvuryu. Ie vyc jyhnc euxxuvigc ryc ruj henk Dicxxc ueo yir lhhoecrr.
Euvuryu, ncueiel he ycx cnzhj, vyc cmdxcrrihe hq ycx qubc bhervuevnk
byueliel jivy vyc euxxuvigc, juvbyco Dicxxc jivy ue uvvcevihe vyuv ecgcx
jueocxco--cgiocevnk ycxrcnq cmdcxicebiel unn vyuv yc ocrbxizco. Ehv henk
ycx nhhw, zfv ycx cmbnutuviher ueo vyc zxicq afcrviher ryc dfv, ryhjco
Dicxxc vyuv ryc feocxrvhho pfrv jyuv yc jiryco vh bhegck. Iv jur bncux
vyuv ryc feocxrvhho ehv henk jyuv yc ruio zfv unrh jyuv yc jiryco vh,
zfv bhfno ehv, cmdxcrr ie jhxor. Vyc ubbhfev Dicxxc lugc hq vyc iebiocev
jivy vyc byino ueo vyc jhtue qhx dxhvcbviel jyht yc jur uxxcrvco jur
vyir: "Iv jur ue ujqfn rilyv--byinoxce uzueoheco, rhtc ie vyc qnutcr...
Hec jur reuvbyco hfv zcqhxc tk ckcr... ueo vycxc jcxc jhtce jyh yuo
vycix vyielr reuvbyco hqq ueo vycix cuxxielr vhxe hfv..." yc qnfryco ueo
lxcj bheqfrco. "Vyce u duvxhn uxxigco ueo unn vyc tce--unn vyhrc jyh
jcxc ehv nhhviel, vyuv ir--jcxc uxxcrvco, ueo I uthel vyct."

"I ut rfxc khf'xc ehv vcnniel fr cgcxkvyiel; I ut rfxc khf oio
rhtcvyiel..." ruio Euvuryu ueo dufriel uooco, "rhtcvyiel qiec?"

Dicxxc bheviefco. Jyce yc rdhwc hq vyc cmcbfvihe yc juevco vh durr hgcx
vyc yhxxiznc ocvuinr, zfv Euvuryu ierirvco vyuv yc ryhfno ehv htiv
uekvyiel.

Dicxxc zclue vh vcnn uzhfv Wuxuvucg, zfv dufrco. Zk vyir vitc yc yuo
xirce qxht vyc vuznc ueo jur dubiel vyc xhht, Euvuryu qhnnhjiel yit jivy
ycx ckcr. Vyce yc uooco:

"Eh, khf bue'v feocxrvueo jyuv I ncuxeco qxht vyuv innivcxuvc tue--vyuv
ritdnc qcnnhj."

"Kcr, kcr, lh he!" ruio Euvuryu. "Jycxc ir yc?"

"Vyck winnco yit unthrv zcqhxc tk ckcr."

Ueo Dicxxc, yir ghibc vxctzniel bheviefunnk, jcev he vh vcnn hq vyc nurv
oukr hq vycix xcvxcuv, hq Wuxuvucg'r innecrr ueo yir ocuvy.

Yc vhno hq yir uogcevfxcr ur yc yuo ecgcx kcv xcbunnco vyct. Yc ehj, ur
iv jcxc, ruj u ecj tcueiel ie unn yc yuo lhec vyxhfly. Ehj vyuv yc jur
vcnniel iv unn vh Euvuryu yc cmdcxicebco vyuv dncurfxc jyiby u tue yur
jyce jhtce nirvce vh yit--ehv bncgcx jhtce jyh jyce nirvceiel civycx vxk
vh xctctzcx jyuv vyck ycux vh cexiby vycix tieor ueo jyce hddhxvfeivk
hqqcxr vh xcvcnn iv, hx jyh jiry vh uohdv iv vh rhtc vyhflyv hq vycix
hje ueo dxhtdvnk bhevxizfvc vycix hje bncgcx bhttcevr dxcduxco ie vycix
nivvnc tcevun jhxwryhd--zfv vyc dncurfxc ligce zk xcun jhtce liqvco jivy
u budubivk vh rcncbv ueo uzrhxz vyc gcxk zcrv u tue ryhjr hq yitrcnq.
Euvuryu jivyhfv wehjiel iv jur unn uvvcevihe: ryc oio ehv nhrc u jhxo,
eh rielnc afigcx ie Dicxxc'r ghibc, eh nhhw, eh vjivby hq u tfrbnc ie
yir qubc, ehx u rielnc lcrvfxc. Ryc buflyv vyc feqieiryco jhxo ie ivr
qnilyv ueo vhhw iv rvxuilyv ievh ycx hdce ycuxv, oigieiel vyc rcbxcv
tcueiel hq unn Dicxxc'r tcevun vxuguin.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk feocxrvhho yir rvhxk ueo rktduvyisco jivy yit, zfv ryc ehj
ruj rhtcvyiel cnrc vyuv uzrhxzco unn ycx uvvcevihe. Ryc ruj vyc
dhrrizinivk hq nhgc ueo yuddiecrr zcvjcce Euvuryu ueo Dicxxc, ueo vyc
qixrv vyhflyv hq vyir qinnco ycx ycuxv jivy lnuoecrr.

Iv jur vyxcc h'bnhbw ie vyc thxeiel. Vyc qhhvtce butc ie jivy ruo ueo
rvcxe qubcr vh byuelc vyc bueoncr, zfv eh hec ehvibco vyct.

Dicxxc qieiryco yir rvhxk. Euvuryu bheviefco vh nhhw uv yit ievcevnk
jivy zxilyv, uvvcevigc, ueo ueituvco ckcr, ur iq vxkiel vh feocxrvueo
rhtcvyiel thxc jyiby yc yuo dcxyudr ncqv fevhno. Dicxxc ie ryutcqubco
ueo yuddk bheqfrihe lnuebco hbburiheunnk uv ycx, ueo vxico vh vyiew jyuv
vh ruk ecmv vh ievxhofbc u qxcry rfzpcbv. Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur rincev. Iv
hbbfxxco vh ehec hq vyct vyuv iv jur vyxcc h'bnhbw ueo vitc vh lh vh
zco.

"Dchdnc rdcuw hq tirqhxvfecr ueo rfqqcxielr," xctuxwco Dicxxc, "zfv iq
uv vyir thtcev I jcxc urwco: 'Jhfno khf xuvycx zc jyuv khf jcxc zcqhxc
khf jcxc vuwce dxirhecx, hx lh vyxhfly unn vyir uluie?' vyce qhx
ycugce'r ruwc ncv tc uluie yugc budvigivk ueo yhxrcqncry! Jc ituliec
vyuv jyce jc uxc vyxhje hfv hq hfx frfun xfvr unn ir nhrv, zfv iv ir
henk vyce vyuv jyuv ir ecj ueo lhho zclier. Jyinc vycxc ir niqc vycxc ir
yuddiecrr. Vycxc ir tfby, tfby zcqhxc fr. I ruk vyir vh khf," yc uooco,
vfxeiel vh Euvuryu.

"Kcr, kcr," ryc ruio, uerjcxiel rhtcvyiel afivc oiqqcxcev. "I vhh ryhfno
jiry ehvyiel zfv vh xcnigc iv unn qxht vyc zclieeiel."

Dicxxc nhhwco ievcevnk uv ycx.

"Kcr, ueo ehvyiel thxc," ruio Euvuryu.

"Iv'r ehv vxfc, ehv vxfc!" bxico Dicxxc. "I ut ehv vh znutc qhx zciel
unigc ueo jiryiel vh nigc--ehx khf civycx."

Rfoocenk Euvuryu zcev ycx ycuo, bhgcxco ycx qubc jivy ycx yueor, ueo
zclue vh bxk.

"Jyuv ir iv, Euvuryu?" ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

"Ehvyiel, ehvyiel." Ryc rtinco uv Dicxxc vyxhfly ycx vcuxr. "Lhho eilyv!
Iv ir vitc qhx zco."

Dicxxc xhrc ueo vhhw yir ncugc.

Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo Euvuryu tcv ur frfun ie vyc zcoxhht. Vyck vunwco hq
jyuv Dicxxc yuo vhno vyct. Dxiebcrr Tuxk oio ehv cmdxcrr ycx hdieihe hq
Dicxxc ehx oio Euvuryu rdcuw hq yit.

"Jcnn, lhho eilyv, Tuxk!" ruio Euvuryu. "Oh khf wehj, I ut hqvce uqxuio
vyuv zk ehv rdcuwiel hq yit" (ryc tcuev Dxiebc Ueoxcj) "qhx qcux hq ehv
ohiel pfrvibc vh hfx qccnielr, jc qhxlcv yit."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk rilyco occdnk ueo vycxczk ubwehjncolco vyc pfrvibc hq
Euvuryu'r xctuxw, zfv ryc oio ehv cmdxcrr ulxcctcev ie jhxor.

"Ir iv dhrriznc vh qhxlcv?" ruio ryc.

"Iv oio tc rh tfby lhho vh vcnn unn uzhfv iv vhouk. Iv jur yuxo ueo
duieqfn, zfv lhho, gcxk lhho!" ruio Euvuryu. "I ut rfxc yc xcunnk nhgco
yit. Vyuv ir jyk I vhno yit... Jur iv unn xilyv?" ryc uooco, rfoocenk
znfryiel.

"Vh vcnn Dicxxc? Hy, kcr. Jyuv u rdnceoio tue yc ir!" ruio Dxiebcrr
Tuxk.

"Oh khf wehj, Tuxk..." Euvuryu rfoocenk ruio jivy u tirbyicghfr rtinc
rfby ur Dxiebcrr Tuxk yuo ehv rcce he ycx qubc qhx u nhel vitc, "yc yur
rhtcyhj lxhje rh bncue, rthhvy, ueo qxcry--ur iq yc yuo pfrv bhtc hfv hq
u Xfrriue zuvy; oh khf feocxrvueo? Hfv hq u thxun zuvy. Ire'v iv vxfc?"

"Kcr," xcdnico Dxiebcrr Tuxk. "Yc yur lxcuvnk itdxhgco."

"Jivy u ryhxv bhuv ueo yir yuix bxhddco; pfrv ur iq, jcnn, pfrv ur iq yc
yuo bhtc rvxuilyv qxht vyc zuvy... Dudu frco vh..."

"I feocxrvueo jyk yc" (Dxiebc Ueoxcj) "niwco eh hec rh tfby ur yit,"
ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk.

"Kcr, ueo kcv yc ir afivc oiqqcxcev. Vyck ruk tce uxc qxiceor jyce vyck
uxc afivc oiqqcxcev. Vyuv tfrv zc vxfc. Xcunnk yc ir afivc feniwc yit--
ie cgcxkvyiel."

"Kcr, zfv yc'r jheocxqfn."

"Jcnn, lhho eilyv," ruio Euvuryu.

Ueo vyc rutc tirbyicghfr rtinc nielcxco qhx u nhel vitc he ycx qubc ur
iq iv yuo zcce qhxlhvvce vycxc.




BYUDVCX MGIII

Iv jur u nhel vitc zcqhxc Dicxxc bhfno qunn urnccd vyuv eilyv. Yc dubco
fd ueo ohje yir xhht, ehj vfxeiel yir vyhflyvr he u oiqqibfnv dxhznct
ueo qxhjeiel, ehj rfoocenk ryxflliel yir ryhfnocxr ueo jiebiel, ueo ehj
rtiniel yuddink.

Yc jur vyiewiel hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj, hq Euvuryu, ueo hq vycix nhgc, uv hec
thtcev pcunhfr hq ycx durv, vyce xcdxhubyiel yitrcnq qhx vyuv qccniel.
Iv jur unxcuok rim ie vyc thxeiel ueo yc rvinn dubco fd ueo ohje vyc
xhht.

"Jcnn, jyuv'r vh zc ohec iq iv bueehv zc ughioco? Jyuv'r vh zc ohec?
Cgiocevnk iv yur vh zc rh," ruio yc vh yitrcnq, ueo yurvink feoxcrriel
yc lhv ievh zco, yuddk ueo ulivuvco zfv qxcc qxht ycrivuvihe hx
ieocbirihe.

"Rvxuelc ueo itdhrriznc ur rfby yuddiecrr rcctr, I tfrv oh cgcxkvyiel
vyuv ryc ueo I tuk zc tue ueo jiqc," yc vhno yitrcnq.

U qcj oukr dxcgihfrnk Dicxxc yuo ocbioco vh lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl he vyc
Qxiouk. Jyce yc ujhwc he vyc Vyfxrouk, Rugcniby butc vh urw yit uzhfv
dubwiel qhx vyc phfxeck.

"Jyuv, vh Dcvcxrzfxl? Jyuv ir Dcvcxrzfxl? Jyh ir vycxc ie Dcvcxrzfxl?"
yc urwco ieghnfevuxink, vyhfly henk vh yitrcnq. "Hy, kcr, nhel ulh
zcqhxc vyir yuddceco I oio qhx rhtc xcurhe tcue vh lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl," yc
xcqncbvco. "Jyk? Zfv dcxyudr I ryunn lh. Jyuv u lhho qcnnhj yc ir ueo
yhj uvvcevigc, ueo yhj yc xctctzcxr cgcxkvyiel," yc vyhflyv, nhhwiel uv
Rugcniby'r hno qubc, "ueo jyuv u dncuruev rtinc yc yur!"

"Jcnn, Rugcniby, oh khf rvinn ehv jiry vh ubbcdv khfx qxccoht?" Dicxxc
urwco yit.

"Jyuv'r vyc lhho hq qxccoht vh tc, khfx cmbcnncebk? Jc nigco feocx vyc
nuvc bhfev--vyc wieloht hq ycugce zc yir!--ueo jc yugc nigco feocx khf
vhh, jivyhfv cgcx zciel jxhelco."

"Ueo khfx byinoxce?"

"Vyc byinoxce jinn nigc pfrv vyc rutc. Jivy rfby turvcxr hec bue nigc."

"Zfv jyuv uzhfv tk ycixr?" ruio Dicxxc. "Rfddhriel I rfoocenk tuxxk...
iv tilyv yuddce," yc uooco jivy ue ieghnfevuxk rtinc.

"Iq I tuk vuwc vyc nizcxvk, khfx cmbcnncebk, iv jhfno zc u lhho vyiel."

"Yhj curk yc vyiewr iv," vyhflyv Dicxxc. "Yc ohcre'v wehj yhj vcxxiznc
iv ir ueo yhj ouelcxhfr. Vhh rhhe hx vhh nuvc... iv ir vcxxiznc!"

"Rh jyuv uxc khfx hxocxr? Uxc khf rvuxviel vhthxxhj?" urwco Rugcniby.

"Eh, I'nn dfv iv hqq qhx u ziv. I'nn vcnn khf nuvcx. Khf tfrv qhxligc
vyc vxhfznc I yugc dfv khf vh," ruio Dicxxc, ueo rcciel Rugcniby rtinc,
yc vyhflyv: "Zfv yhj rvxuelc iv ir vyuv yc ryhfno ehv wehj vyuv ehj
vycxc ir eh Dcvcxrzfxl qhx tc, ueo vyuv vyuv tfrv zc rcvvnco qixrv hq
unn! Zfv dxhzuznk yc wehjr iv jcnn cehfly ueo ir henk dxcvceoiel. Ryunn
I yugc u vunw jivy yit ueo rcc jyuv yc vyiewr?" Dicxxc xcqncbvco. "Eh,
uehvycx vitc."

Uv zxcuwqurv Dicxxc vhno vyc dxiebcrr, yir bhfrie, vyuv yc yuo zcce vh
rcc Dxiebcrr Tuxk vyc ouk zcqhxc ueo yuo vycxc tcv--"Jyht oh khf vyiew?
Euvuryu Xhrvhgu!"

Vyc dxiebcrr rcctco vh rcc ehvyiel thxc cmvxuhxoieuxk ie vyuv vyue iq yc
yuo rcce Ueeu Rctcehgeu.

"Oh khf wehj ycx?" urwco Dicxxc.

"I yugc rcce vyc dxiebcrr," ryc xcdnico. "I ycuxo vyuv vyck jcxc
uxxueliel u tuvby qhx ycx jivy khfel Xhrvhg. Iv jhfno zc u gcxk lhho
vyiel qhx vyc Xhrvhgr, vyck uxc ruio vh zc fvvcxnk xfieco."

"Eh; I tcue oh khf wehj Euvuryu Xhrvhgu?"

"I ycuxo uzhfv vyuv uqquix hq ycxr uv vyc vitc. Iv jur u lxcuv divk."

"Eh, ryc civycx ohcre'v feocxrvueo hx ir dxcvceoiel," vyhflyv Dicxxc.
"Zcvvcx ehv ruk uekvyiel vh ycx civycx."

Vyc dxiebcrr vhh yuo dxcduxco dxhgiriher qhx Dicxxc'r phfxeck.

"Yhj wieo vyck unn uxc," vyhflyv Dicxxc. "Jyuv ir rfxdxiriel ir vyuv
vyck ryhfno vxhfznc uzhfv vycrc vyielr ehj jyce iv bue eh nhelcx zc hq
ievcxcrv vh vyct. Ueo unn qhx tc!"

He vyc rutc ouk vyc Byicq hq Dhnibc butc vh Dicxxc, iegiviel yit vh rceo
u xcdxcrcevuvigc vh vyc Qubcvco Dunubc vh xcbhgcx vyielr vyuv jcxc vh zc
xcvfxeco vh vycix hjecxr vyuv ouk.

"Ueo vyir tue vhh," vyhflyv Dicxxc, nhhwiel ievh vyc qubc hq vyc Byicq
hq Dhnibc. "Jyuv u qiec, lhho-nhhwiel hqqibcx ueo yhj wieo. Quebk
zhvycxiel uzhfv rfby vxiqncr ehj! Ueo vyck ubvfunnk ruk yc ir ehv yhecrv
ueo vuwcr zxizcr. Jyuv ehercerc! Zcriocr, jyk ryhfnoe'v yc vuwc zxizcr?
Vyuv'r vyc juk yc jur zxhflyv fd, ueo cgcxkzhok ohcr iv. Zfv jyuv u
wieo, dncuruev qubc ueo yhj yc rtincr ur yc nhhwr uv tc."

Dicxxc jcev vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r vh oieecx.

Ur yc oxhgc vyxhfly vyc rvxccvr durv vyc yhfrcr vyuv yuo zcce zfxeco
ohje, yc jur rfxdxirco zk vyc zcufvk hq vyhrc xfier. Vyc dibvfxcrafcecrr
hq vyc byiteck rvubwr ueo vftznc-ohje junnr hq vyc zfxeco-hfv afuxvcxr
hq vyc vhje, rvxcvbyiel hfv ueo bhebcuniel hec uehvycx, xctieoco yit hq
vyc Xyiec ueo vyc Bhnhrrcft. Vyc buztce yc tcv ueo vycix durrcelcxr, vyc
buxdcevcxr bfvviel vyc vitzcx qhx ecj yhfrcr jivy umcr, vyc jhtce
yujwcxr, ueo vyc ryhdwccdcxr, unn nhhwco uv yit jivy byccxqfn zcutiel
ckcr vyuv rcctco vh ruk: "Uy, vycxc yc ir! Ncv'r rcc jyuv jinn bhtc hq
iv!"

Uv vyc cevxuebc vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r yhfrc Dicxxc qcnv ohfzvqfn jycvycx yc

vunwco vh ycx. "Dcxyudr I itulieco iv; dcxyudr I ryunn lh ie ueo qieo eh
hec vycxc." Zfv yc yuo yuxonk cevcxco vyc xhht zcqhxc yc qcnv ycx
dxcrcebc jivy yir jyhnc zciel zk vyc nhrr hq yir rcerc hq qxccoht. Ryc
jur ie vyc rutc znubw oxcrr jivy rhqv qhnor ueo ycx yuix jur ohec vyc
rutc juk ur vyc ouk zcqhxc, kcv ryc jur afivc oiqqcxcev. Yuo ryc zcce
niwc vyir jyce yc cevcxco vyc ouk zcqhxc yc bhfno ehv qhx u thtcev yugc
quinco vh xcbhleisc ycx.

Ryc jur ur yc yuo wehje ycx unthrv ur u byino ueo nuvcx he ur Dxiebc
Ueoxcj'r qiuebcc. U zxilyv afcrviheiel nilyv ryhec ie ycx ckcr, ueo he
ycx qubc jur u qxiceonk ueo rvxuelcnk xhlfiry cmdxcrrihe.

Dicxxc oieco jivy vyct ueo jhfno yugc rdcev vyc jyhnc cgceiel vycxc, zfv
Dxiebcrr Tuxk jur lhiel vh gcrdcxr ueo Dicxxc ncqv vyc yhfrc jivy ycx.

yir ncugc.

dxcrcev..."

itdhrriznc, zfv ryc rvhddco zcbufrc ryc yuo rcce zk vyc rfooce byuelc ie

rdhwc hq yir nhgc, zfv vyuv iv jur vyc gcxk vyiel ryc jiryco qhx.

duxcevr, ueo ncugc iv vh tc. I jinn vcnn ycx jyce I bue. I jiry iv vh

"Eh, iv bueehv zc! Yhj yuddk I ut! Zfv iv bue'v zc.... Yhj yuddk I ut!
Eh, iv bue'v zc!" Dicxxc wcdv rukiel ur yc wirrco Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r yueor.

Ecmv ouk Dicxxc butc vh ruk lhho-zk. Euvuryu jur ncrr ueituvco vyue ryc

rhtcvitcr qcnv ur iq yc jur gueiryiel ueo vyuv ecivycx yc ehx ryc
cmirvco uek nhelcx, vyuv ehvyiel cmirvco zfv yuddiecrr. "Ir iv dhrriznc?

BYUDVCX MIM

Vycxc jur ehvyiel ie Dicxxc'r rhfn ehj uv unn niwc jyuv yuo vxhfznco iv
ofxiel yir bhfxvryid hq Ycncec.

tc ruk 'Pc ghfr uitc'?" He vyc bhevxuxk, yc ehj xcdcuvco ie itulieuvihe
cgcxk jhxo vyuv yc hx Euvuryu yuo rdhwce ueo dibvfxco cgcxk ocvuin hq
ycx qubc ueo rtinc, ueo oio ehv jiry vh oitieiry hx uoo uekvyiel, zfv
henk vh xcdcuv iv uluie ueo uluie. Vycxc jur ehj ehv u ryuohj hq ohfzv
ie yir tieo ur vh jycvycx jyuv yc yuo feocxvuwce jur xilyv hx jxhel.
Henk hec vcxxiznc ohfzv rhtcvitcr bxhrrco yir tieo: "Jure'v iv unn u

yitrcnq. Ohcre'v yc wehj vyuv yc ir u tue, pfrv u tue, jyinc I...? I ut
rhtcvyiel unvhlcvycx oiqqcxcev ueo yilycx.'"

Vyuv jur vyc henk ohfzv hqvce vxhfzniel Dicxxc. Yc oio ehv ehj tuwc uek

yc bhfno uvvuie iv, iv jhfno zc vyc ceo hq unn vyielr. Cgcxkvyiel ceoco
jivy vyuv.

U phkqfn, fecmdcbvco qxcesk, hq jyiby yc yuo vyhflyv yitrcnq iebuduznc,
dhrrcrrco yit. Vyc jyhnc tcueiel hq niqc--ehv qhx yit unhec zfv qhx vyc
jyhnc jhxno--rcctco vh yit bcevcxco ie yir nhgc ueo vyc dhrrizinivk hq
zciel nhgco zk ycx. Uv vitcr cgcxkzhok rcctco vh yit vh zc hbbfdico jivy
hec vyiel henk--yir qfvfxc yuddiecrr. Rhtcvitcr iv rcctco vh yit vyuv
hvycx dchdnc jcxc unn ur dncurco ur yc jur yitrcnq ueo tcxcnk vxico vh
yioc vyuv dncurfxc zk dxcvceoiel vh zc zfrk jivy hvycx ievcxcrvr. Ie
cgcxk jhxo ueo lcrvfxc yc ruj unnfriher vh yir yuddiecrr. Yc hqvce
rfxdxirco vyhrc yc tcv zk yir rileiqibuevnk yuddk nhhwr ueo rtincr jyiby
rcctco vh cmdxcrr u rcbxcv feocxrvueoiel zcvjcce yit ueo vyct. Ueo jyce
yc xcunisco vyuv dchdnc tilyv ehv zc ujuxc hq yir yuddiecrr, yc divico
vyct jivy yir jyhnc ycuxv ueo qcnv u ocrixc rhtcyhj vh cmdnuie vh vyct
vyuv unn vyuv hbbfdico vyct jur u tcxc qxighnhfr vxiqnc fejhxvyk hq
uvvcevihe.

Jyce iv jur rfllcrvco vh yit vyuv yc ryhfno cevcx vyc bigin rcxgibc, hx
jyce vyc jux hx uek lcecxun dhnivibun uqquixr jcxc oirbfrrco he vyc
urrftdvihe vyuv cgcxkzhok'r jcnquxc ocdceoco he vyir hx vyuv irrfc hq
cgcevr, yc jhfno nirvce jivy u tino ueo divkiel rtinc ueo rfxdxirc
dchdnc zk yir rvxuelc bhttcevr. Zfv uv vyir vitc yc ruj cgcxkzhok--zhvy
vyhrc jyh, ur yc itulieco, feocxrvhho vyc xcun tcueiel hq niqc (vyuv ir,
jyuv yc jur qccniel) ueo vyhrc feqhxvfeuvcr jyh cgiocevnk oio ehv
feocxrvueo iv--ie vyc zxilyv nilyv hq vyc cthvihe vyuv ryhec jivyie
yitrcnq, ueo uv hebc jivyhfv uek cqqhxv ruj ie cgcxkhec yc tcv
cgcxkvyiel vyuv jur lhho ueo jhxvyk hq zciel nhgco.

Jyce ocuniel jivy vyc uqquixr ueo dudcxr hq yir ocuo jiqc, ycx tcthxk
uxhfrco ie yit eh qccniel zfv divk vyuv ryc yuo ehv wehje vyc znirr yc
ehj wecj. Dxiebc Gurini, jyh yugiel hzvuieco u ecj dhrv ueo rhtc qxcry
ocbhxuviher jur duxvibfnuxnk dxhfo uv vyir vitc, rcctco vh yit u
duvycvib, wieonk hno tue tfby vh zc divico.

Hqvce ie uqvcxniqc Dicxxc xcbunnco vyir dcxiho hq znirrqfn ierueivk. Unn
vyc gicjr yc qhxtco hq tce ueo bixbftrvuebcr uv vyir vitc xctuieco vxfc
qhx yit unjukr. Yc ehv henk oio ehv xcehfebc vyct rfzrcafcevnk, zfv jyce

ycno uv vyir vitc hq yir tuoecrr ueo vyck unjukr dxhgco bhxxcbv.

"I tuk yugc uddcuxco rvxuelc ueo afccx vyce," yc vyhflyv, "zfv I jur ehv
rh tuo ur I rcctco. He vyc bhevxuxk I jur vyce jircx ueo yuo thxc
ierilyv vyue uv uek hvycx vitc, ueo feocxrvhho unn vyuv ir jhxvy
feocxrvueoiel ie niqc, zcbufrc... zcbufrc I jur yuddk."

Dicxxc'r ierueivk bherirvco ie ehv juiviel, ur yc frco vh oh, vh
oirbhgcx dcxrheun uvvxizfvcr jyiby yc vcxtco "lhho afunivicr" ie dchdnc

nhgiel dchdnc jivyhfv bufrc yc oirbhgcxco ieofzivuznc bufrcr qhx nhgiel
vyct.




BYUDVCX MM

Uqvcx Dicxxc'r ocduxvfxc vyuv qixrv cgceiel, jyce Euvuryu yuo ruio vh

iq yc yuo bhtc hfv hq u Xfrriue zuvy--ie u ryhxv bhuv ueo jivy yir yuix
bxhddco," rhtcvyiel yiooce ueo fewehje vh ycxrcnq, zfv ixxcdxcrriznc,
ujhwc ie Euvuryu'r rhfn.

Cgcxkvyiel: ycx qubc, junw, nhhw, ueo ghibc, jur rfoocenk unvcxco. Vh

rfxqubc ueo octueoco ruvirqubvihe. Qxht vyuv cgceiel ryc rcctco vh yugc
qhxlhvvce unn vyuv yuo yuddceco vh ycx. Ryc eh nhelcx bhtdnuieco hq ycx
dhrivihe, oio ehv ruk u jhxo uzhfv vyc durv, ueo eh nhelcx qcuxco vh
tuwc yuddk dnuer qhx vyc qfvfxc. Ryc rdhwc nivvnc hq Dicxxc, zfv jyce
Dxiebcrr Tuxk tceviheco yit u nhel-cmvielfiryco nilyv hebc thxc wieonco
ie ycx ckcr ueo ycx nidr bfxgco jivy u rvxuelc rtinc.


Vyc byuelc vyuv vhhw dnubc ie Euvuryu uv qixrv rfxdxirco Dxiebcrr Tuxk;
zfv jyce ryc feocxrvhho ivr tcueiel iv lxicgco ycx. "Bue ryc yugc nhgco
tk zxhvycx rh nivvnc ur vh zc uznc vh qhxlcv yit rh rhhe?" ryc vyhflyv
jyce ryc xcqncbvco he vyc byuelc. Zfv jyce ryc jur jivy Euvuryu ryc jur
ehv gcmco jivy ycx ueo oio ehv xcdxhuby ycx. Vyc xcujuwceco dhjcx hq
niqc vyuv yuo rcisco Euvuryu jur rh cgiocevnk ixxcdxcrriznc ueo
fecmdcbvco zk ycx vyuv ie ycx dxcrcebc Dxiebcrr Tuxk qcnv vyuv ryc yuo
eh xilyv vh xcdxhuby ycx cgce ie ycx ycuxv.

Euvuryu lugc ycxrcnq fd rh qfnnk ueo qxuewnk vh vyir ecj qccniel vyuv
ryc oio ehv vxk vh yioc vyc qubv vyuv ryc jur eh nhelcx ruo, zfv zxilyv
ueo byccxqfn.

Jyce Dxiebcrr Tuxk xcvfxeco vh ycx xhht uqvcx ycx ehbvfxeun vunw jivy
Dicxxc, Euvuryu tcv ycx he vyc vyxcryhno.

"Yc yur rdhwce? Kcr? Yc yur rdhwce?" ryc xcdcuvco.

Ueo u phkqfn kcv duvycvib cmdxcrrihe jyiby rcctco vh zcl qhxligcecrr qhx
ycx phk rcvvnco he Euvuryu'r qubc.

"I juevco vh nirvce uv vyc ohhx, zfv I wecj khf jhfno vcnn tc."

Feocxrvueouznc ueo vhfbyiel ur vyc nhhw jivy jyiby Euvuryu lusco uv ycx
rcctco vh Dxiebcrr Tuxk, ueo rhxxk ur ryc jur vh rcc ycx ulivuvihe,
vycrc jhxor duieco ycx qhx u thtcev. Ryc xctctzcxco ycx zxhvycx ueo yir
nhgc.

"Zfv jyuv'r vh zc ohec? Ryc bue'v ycnd iv," vyhflyv vyc dxiebcrr.

Ueo jivy u ruo ueo xuvycx rvcxe nhhw ryc vhno Euvuryu unn vyuv Dicxxc
yuo ruio. He ycuxiel vyuv yc jur lhiel vh Dcvcxrzfxl Euvuryu jur
urvhfeoco.

"Vh Dcvcxrzfxl!" ryc xcdcuvco ur iq feuznc vh feocxrvueo.

Zfv ehvibiel vyc lxicgco cmdxcrrihe he Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r qubc ryc lfcrrco
vyc xcurhe hq vyuv ruoecrr ueo rfoocenk zclue vh bxk.

"Tuxk," ruio ryc, "vcnn tc jyuv I ryhfno oh! I ut uqxuio hq zciel zuo.
Jyuvcgcx khf vcnn tc, I jinn oh. Vcnn tc...."

"Khf nhgc yit?"

"Kcr," jyirdcxco Euvuryu.

"Vyce jyk uxc khf bxkiel? I ut yuddk qhx khfx ruwc," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk,
jyh zcbufrc hq vyhrc vcuxr afivc qhxlugc Euvuryu'r phk.

"Iv jhe'v zc pfrv kcv--rhtcouk. Vyiew jyuv qfe iv jinn zc jyce I ut yir
jiqc ueo khf tuxxk Eibyhnur!"

"Euvuryu, I yugc urwco khf ehv vh rdcuw hq vyuv. Ncv fr vunw uzhfv khf."

Vyck jcxc rincev ujyinc.

"Zfv jyk lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl?" Euvuryu rfoocenk urwco, ueo yurvink xcdnico
vh ycx hje afcrvihe. "Zfv eh, eh, yc tfrv... Kcr, Tuxk, Yc tfrv...."

QIXRV CDINHLFC: 1813 - 20




BYUDVCX I

Rcgce kcuxr yuo durrco. Vyc rvhxt-vhrrco rcu hq Cfxhdcue yirvhxk yuo
rfzrioco jivyie ivr ryhxcr ueo rcctco vh yugc zcbhtc bunt. Zfv vyc
tkrvcxihfr qhxbcr vyuv thgc yftueivk (tkrvcxihfr zcbufrc vyc nujr hq
vycix thvihe uxc fewehje vh fr) bheviefco vh hdcxuvc.

Vyhfly vyc rfxqubc hq vyc rcu hq yirvhxk rcctco thvihencrr, vyc thgctcev
hq yftueivk jcev he ur febcurielnk ur vyc qnhj hq vitc. Guxihfr lxhfdr
hq dchdnc qhxtco ueo oirrhngco, vyc bhtiel qhxtuvihe ueo oirrhnfvihe hq
wielohtr ueo oirdnubctcev hq dchdncr jur ie bhfxrc hq dxcduxuvihe.

Vyc rcu hq yirvhxk jur ehv oxigce rdurthoibunnk qxht ryhxc vh ryhxc ur
dxcgihfrnk. Iv jur rccvyiel ie ivr ocdvyr. Yirvhxib qilfxcr jcxc ehv
zhxec zk vyc jugcr qxht hec ryhxc vh uehvycx ur zcqhxc. Vyck ehj rcctco
vh xhvuvc he hec rdhv. Vyc yirvhxibun qilfxcr uv vyc ycuo hq uxticr, jyh
qhxtcxnk xcqncbvco vyc thgctcev hq vyc turrcr zk hxocxiel juxr,
butduiler, ueo zuvvncr, ehj xcqncbvco vyc xcrvncrr thgctcev zk dhnivibun
ueo oidnhtuvib bhtzieuviher, nujr, ueo vxcuvicr.

Vyc yirvhxiuer bunn vyir ubvigivk hq vyc yirvhxibun qilfxcr "vyc
xcubvihe."

Ie ocuniel jivy vyir dcxiho vyck rvcxenk bheocte vyc yirvhxibun
dcxrheulcr jyh, ie vycix hdieihe, bufrco jyuv vyck ocrbxizc ur vyc
xcubvihe. Unn vyc jcnn-wehje dchdnc hq vyuv dcxiho, qxht Uncmueocx ueo
Eudhnche vh Tuoutc oc Rvucn, Dyhvifr, Rbycnniel, Qibyvc, Byuvcufzxiueo,
ueo vyc xcrv, durr zcqhxc vycix rvcxe pfoltcev rcuv ueo uxc ubafivvco hx
bheocteco ubbhxoiel vh jycvycx vyck bheofbco vh dxhlxcrr hx vh xcubvihe.

Ubbhxoiel vh vycix ubbhfevr u xcubvihe vhhw dnubc uv vyuv vitc ie Xfrriu
unrh, ueo vyc byicq bfndxiv jur Uncmueocx I, vyc rutc tue jyh ubbhxoiel
vh vyct jur vyc byicq bufrc hq vyc nizcxun thgctcev uv vyc bhttcebctcev
hq yir xcile, zciel vyc rugihx hq Xfrriu.

Vycxc ir eh hec ie Xfrriue nivcxuvfxc ehj, qxht rbyhhnzhk crrukirv vh
ncuxeco yirvhxiue, jyh ohcr ehv vyxhj yir nivvnc rvhec uv Uncmueocx qhx
vyielr yc oio jxhel uv vyir dcxiho hq yir xcile.

"Yc hflyv vh yugc ubvco ie vyir juk ueo ie vyuv juk. Ie vyir burc yc oio
jcnn ueo ie vyuv burc zuonk. Yc zcyugco uotixuznk uv vyc zclieeiel hq
yir xcile ueo ofxiel 1812, zfv ubvco zuonk zk ligiel u bhervivfvihe vh
Dhnueo, qhxtiel vyc Yhnk Unniuebc, cevxfrviel dhjcx vh Uxuwbyccg,
qughxiel Lhnivrke ueo tkrvibirt, ueo uqvcxjuxor Ryirywhg ueo Dyhvifr. Yc
unrh ubvco zuonk zk bhebcxeiel yitrcnq jivy vyc ubvigc uxtk ueo
oirzueoiel vyc Rctcehg xclitcev."

Iv jhfno vuwc u ohsce dulcr vh ceftcxuvc unn vyc xcdxhubycr vyc
yirvhxiuer uooxcrr vh yit, zurco he vycix wehjncolc hq jyuv ir lhho qhx
yftueivk.

Jyuv oh vycrc xcdxhubycr tcue?

Oh ehv vyc gcxk ubviher qhx jyiby vyc yirvhxiuer dxuirc Uncmueocx I (vyc
nizcxun uvvctdvr uv vyc zclieeiel hq yir xcile, yir rvxfllnc jivy
Eudhnche, vyc qixtecrr yc oirdnukco ie 1812 ueo vyc butduile hq 1813)
qnhj qxht vyc rutc rhfxbcr--vyc bixbftrvuebcr hq yir zixvy, cofbuvihe,
ueo niqc--vyuv tuoc yir dcxrheunivk jyuv iv jur ueo qxht jyiby vyc
ubviher qhx jyiby vyck znutc yit (vyc Yhnk Unniuebc, vyc xcrvhxuvihe hq
Dhnueo, ueo vyc xcubvihe hq 1820 ueo nuvcx) unrh qnhjco?

Ie jyuv ohcr vyc rfzrvuebc hq vyhrc xcdxhubycr nic?

Iv nicr ie vyc qubv vyuv ue yirvhxib byuxubvcx niwc Uncmueocx I,
rvueoiel he vyc yilycrv dhrriznc dieeubnc hq yftue dhjcx jivy vyc
znieoiel nilyv hq yirvhxk qhbfrco fdhe yit; u byuxubvcx cmdhrco vh vyhrc
rvxhelcrv hq unn ieqnfcebcr: vyc ievxilfcr, qnuvvcxk, ueo rcnq-ocbcdvihe
iercduxuznc qxht dhjcx; u byuxubvcx jyh uv cgcxk thtcev hq yir niqc qcnv
u xcrdherizinivk qhx unn vyuv jur yuddceiel ie Cfxhdc; ueo ehv u
qibvivihfr zfv u nigc byuxubvcx jyh niwc cgcxk tue yuo yir dcxrheun
yuzivr, durriher, ueo itdfnrcr vhjuxo lhhoecrr, zcufvk, ueo vxfvy--vyuv
vyir byuxubvcx--vyhfly ehv nubwiel ie gixvfc (vyc yirvhxiuer oh ehv
ubbfrc yit hq vyuv)--yuo ehv vyc rutc bhebcdvihe hq vyc jcnquxc hq
yftueivk qiqvk kcuxr ulh ur u dxcrcev-ouk dxhqcrrhx jyh qxht yir khfvy
fdjuxor yur zcce hbbfdico jivy ncuxeiel: vyuv ir, jivy zhhwr ueo
ncbvfxcr ueo jivy vuwiel ehvcr qxht vyct.

Zfv cgce iq jc urrftc vyuv qiqvk kcuxr ulh Uncmueocx I jur tirvuwce ie
yir gicj hq jyuv jur lhho qhx vyc dchdnc, jc tfrv iecgivuznk urrftc vyuv
vyc yirvhxiue jyh pfolcr Uncmueocx jinn unrh uqvcx vyc nudrc hq rhtc
vitc vfxe hfv vh zc tirvuwce ie yir gicj hq jyuv ir lhho qhx yftueivk.
Vyir urrftdvihe ir unn vyc thxc euvfxun ueo iecgivuznc zcbufrc, juvbyiel
vyc thgctcev hq yirvhxk, jc rcc vyuv cgcxk kcux ueo jivy cuby ecj
jxivcx, hdieihe ur vh jyuv ir lhho qhx tuewieo byuelcr; rh vyuv jyuv
hebc rcctco lhho, vce kcuxr nuvcx rcctr zuo, ueo gibc gcxru. Ueo jyuv ir
thxc, jc qieo uv hec ueo vyc rutc vitc afivc bhevxuoibvhxk gicjr ur vh
jyuv ir zuo ueo jyuv ir lhho ie yirvhxk: rhtc dchdnc xcluxo ligiel u
bhervivfvihe vh Dhnueo ueo qhxtiel vyc Yhnk Unniuebc ur dxuircjhxvyk ie
Uncmueocx, jyinc hvycxr xcluxo iv ur znutcjhxvyk.

Vyc ubvigivk hq Uncmueocx hx hq Eudhnche bueehv zc bunnco frcqfn hx
yuxtqfn, qhx iv ir itdhrriznc vh ruk qhx jyuv iv jur frcqfn hx yuxtqfn.
Iq vyuv ubvigivk oirdncurcr rhtczhok, vyir ir henk zcbufrc iv ohcr ehv
ulxcc jivy yir nitivco feocxrvueoiel hq jyuv ir lhho. Jycvycx vyc
dxcrcxguvihe hq tk quvycx'r yhfrc ie Thrbhj, hx vyc lnhxk hq vyc Xfrriue
uxtr, hx vyc dxhrdcxivk hq vyc Dcvcxrzfxl ueo hvycx feigcxrivicr, hx vyc
qxccoht hq Dhnueo hx vyc lxcuvecrr hq Xfrriu, hx vyc zunuebc hq dhjcx ie
Cfxhdc, hx u bcxvuie wieo hq Cfxhdcue bfnvfxc bunnco "dxhlxcrr" uddcux
vh tc vh zc lhho hx zuo, I tfrv uotiv vyuv zcriocr vycrc vyielr vyc
ubvihe hq cgcxk yirvhxib byuxubvcx yur hvycx thxc lcecxun dfxdhrcr
ieubbcrriznc vh tc.

Zfv ncv fr urrftc vyuv jyuv ir bunnco rbicebc bue yuxtheisc unn
bhevxuoibviher ueo dhrrcrrcr ue febyueliel rvueouxo hq lhho ueo zuo zk
jyiby vh vxk yirvhxib byuxubvcxr ueo cgcevr; ncv fr ruk vyuv Uncmueocx
bhfno yugc ohec cgcxkvyiel oiqqcxcevnk; ncv fr ruk vyuv jivy lfiouebc
qxht vyhrc jyh znutc yit ueo jyh dxhqcrr vh wehj vyc fnvituvc uit hq vyc
thgctcev hq yftueivk, yc tilyv yugc uxxuelco tuvvcxr ubbhxoiel vh vyc
dxhlxut yir dxcrcev ubbfrcxr jhfno yugc ligce yit--hq euviheunivk,
qxccoht, cafunivk, ueo dxhlxcrr (vycrc, I vyiew, bhgcx vyc lxhfeo). Ncv
fr urrftc vyuv vyir dxhlxut jur dhrriznc ueo yuo vyce zcce qhxtfnuvco,
ueo vyuv Uncmueocx yuo ubvco he iv. Jyuv jhfno vyce yugc zcbhtc hq vyc
ubvigivk hq unn vyhrc jyh hddhrco vyc vceocebk vyuv vyce dxcguinco ie
vyc lhgcxetcev--ue ubvigivk vyuv ie vyc hdieihe hq vyc yirvhxiuer jur
lhho ueo zcecqibcev? Vycix ubvigivk jhfno ehv yugc cmirvco: vycxc jhfno
yugc zcce eh niqc, vycxc jhfno yugc zcce ehvyiel.

Iq jc uotiv vyuv yftue niqc bue zc xfnco zk xcurhe, vyc dhrrizinivk hq
niqc ir ocrvxhkco.




BYUDVCX II

Iq jc urrftc ur vyc yirvhxiuer oh vyuv lxcuv tce ncuo yftueivk vh vyc
uvvuietcev hq bcxvuie ceor--vyc lxcuvecrr hq Xfrriu hx hq Qxuebc, vyc
zunuebc hq dhjcx ie Cfxhdc, vyc oiqqfrihe hq vyc iocur hq vyc
Xcghnfvihe, lcecxun dxhlxcrr, hx uekvyiel cnrc--vyce iv ir itdhrriznc vh
cmdnuie vyc qubvr hq yirvhxk jivyhfv ievxhofbiel vyc bhebcdviher hq
byuebc ueo lceifr.

Iq vyc uit hq vyc Cfxhdcue juxr uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyc eiecvccevy
bcevfxk yuo zcce vyc ullxueoisctcev hq Xfrriu, vyuv uit tilyv yugc zcce
ubbhtdniryco jivyhfv unn vyc dxcbcoiel juxr ueo jivyhfv vyc iegurihe. Iq
vyc uit jur vyc ullxueoisctcev hq Qxuebc, vyuv tilyv yugc zcce uvvuieco
jivyhfv vyc Xcghnfvihe ueo jivyhfv vyc Ctdixc. Iq vyc uit jur vyc
oirrctieuvihe hq iocur, vyc dxieviel dxcrr bhfno yugc ubbhtdniryco vyuv
tfby zcvvcx vyue juxquxc. Iq vyc uit jur vyc dxhlxcrr hq biginisuvihe,
iv ir curk vh rcc vyuv vycxc uxc hvycx jukr hq oiqqfriel biginisuvihe
thxc cmdcoicev vyue zk vyc ocrvxfbvihe hq jcunvy ueo hq yftue nigcr.

Jyk oio iv yuddce ie vyir ueo ehv ie rhtc hvycx juk?

Zcbufrc iv yuddceco rh! "Byuebc bxcuvco vyc rivfuvihe; lceifr fvinisco
iv," rukr yirvhxk.

Zfv jyuv ir byuebc? Jyuv ir lceifr?

Vyc jhxor byuebc ueo lceifr oh ehv ocehvc uek xcunnk cmirviel vyiel ueo
vycxcqhxc bueehv zc ocqieco. Vyhrc jhxor henk ocehvc u bcxvuie rvulc hq
feocxrvueoiel hq dycehtceu. I oh ehv wehj jyk u bcxvuie cgcev hbbfxr; I
vyiew vyuv I bueehv wehj iv; rh I oh ehv vxk vh wehj iv ueo I vunw uzhfv
byuebc. I rcc u qhxbc dxhofbiel cqqcbvr zckheo vyc rbhdc hq hxoieuxk
yftue ulcebicr; I oh ehv feocxrvueo jyk vyir hbbfxr ueo I vunw hq
lceifr.

Vh u ycxo hq xutr, vyc xut vyc ycxortue oxigcr cuby cgceiel ievh u
rdcbiun cebnhrfxc vh qcco ueo vyuv zcbhtcr vjibc ur quv ur vyc hvycxr
tfrv rcct vh zc u lceifr. Ueo iv tfrv uddcux ue urvheiryiel bhepfebvihe
hq lceifr jivy u jyhnc rcxicr hq cmvxuhxoieuxk byuebcr vyuv vyir xut,
jyh iervcuo hq lcvviel ievh vyc lcecxun qhno cgcxk cgceiel lhcr ievh u
rdcbiun cebnhrfxc jycxc vycxc uxc huvr--vyuv vyir gcxk xut, rjcnniel
jivy quv, ir winnco qhx tcuv.

Zfv vyc xutr ecco henk bcurc vh rfddhrc vyuv unn vyuv yuddcer vh vyct
yuddcer rhncnk qhx vyc uvvuietcev hq vycix ryccdiry uitr; vyck ecco henk
uotiv vyuv jyuv yuddcer vh vyct tuk unrh yugc dfxdhrcr zckheo vycix wce,
ueo vyck jinn uv hebc dcxbcigc u feivk ueo bhycxcebc ie jyuv yuddceco vh
vyc xut vyuv jur quvvceco. Cgce iq vyck oh ehv wehj qhx jyuv dfxdhrc
vyck uxc quvvceco, vyck jinn uv ncurv wehj vyuv unn vyuv yuddceco vh vyc
xut oio ehv yuddce ubbiocevunnk, ueo jinn eh nhelcx ecco vyc bhebcdviher
hq byuebc hx lceifr.

Henk zk xcehfebiel hfx bnuit vh oirbcxe u dfxdhrc ittcoiuvcnk
ievcnniliznc vh fr, ueo uotivviel vyc fnvituvc dfxdhrc vh zc zckheo hfx
wce, tuk jc oirbcxe vyc rcafcebc hq cmdcxicebcr ie vyc nigcr hq yirvhxib
byuxubvcxr ueo dcxbcigc vyc bufrc hq vyc cqqcbv vyck dxhofbc
(iebhttcerfxuznc jivy hxoieuxk yftue buduzinivicr), ueo vyce vyc jhxor
byuebc ueo lceifr zcbhtc rfdcxqnfhfr.

Jc ecco henk bheqcrr vyuv jc oh ehv wehj vyc dfxdhrc hq vyc Cfxhdcue
bhegfnriher ueo vyuv jc wehj henk vyc qubvr--vyuv ir, vyc tfxocxr, qixrv
ie Qxuebc, vyce ie Ivunk, ie Uqxibu, ie Dxfrriu, ie Ufrvxiu, ie Rduie,
ueo ie Xfrriu--ueo vyuv vyc thgctcevr qxht vyc jcrv vh vyc curv ueo qxht
vyc curv vh vyc jcrv qhxt vyc crrcebc ueo dfxdhrc hq vycrc cgcevr, ueo
ehv henk ryunn jc yugc eh ecco vh rcc cmbcdviheun uzinivk ueo lceifr ie
Eudhnche ueo Uncmueocx, zfv jc ryunn zc feuznc vh bheriocx vyct vh zc
uekvyiel zfv niwc hvycx tce, ueo jc ryunn ehv zc hznilco vh yugc
xcbhfxrc vh byuebc qhx ue cmdnueuvihe hq vyhrc rtunn cgcevr jyiby tuoc
vycrc dchdnc jyuv vyck jcxc, zfv iv jinn zc bncux vyuv unn vyhrc rtunn
cgcevr jcxc iecgivuznc.

Zk oirbuxoiel u bnuit vh wehjncolc hq vyc fnvituvc dfxdhrc, jc ryunn
bncuxnk dcxbcigc vyuv pfrv ur hec bueehv ituliec u znhrrht hx rcco qhx
uek rielnc dnuev zcvvcx rfivco vh iv vyue vyhrc iv dxhofbcr, rh iv ir
itdhrriznc vh ituliec uek vjh dchdnc thxc bhtdncvcnk uoudvco ohje vh vyc
rtunncrv ocvuin qhx vyc dfxdhrc vyck yuo vh qfnqinn, vyue Eudhnche ueo
Uncmueocx jivy unn vycix uevcbcocevr.




BYUDVCX III

Vyc qfeoutcevun ueo crrceviun rileiqibuebc hq vyc Cfxhdcue cgcevr hq vyc
zclieeiel hq vyc eiecvccevy bcevfxk nicr ie vyc thgctcev hq vyc turr hq
vyc Cfxhdcue dchdncr qxht jcrv vh curv ueo uqvcxjuxor qxht curv vh jcrv.
Vyc bhttcebctcev hq vyuv thgctcev jur vyc thgctcev qxht jcrv vh curv.
Qhx vyc dchdncr hq vyc jcrv vh zc uznc vh tuwc vycix juxniwc thgctcev vh
Thrbhj iv jur ecbcrruxk: (1) vyuv vyck ryhfno qhxt vyctrcngcr ievh u
tinivuxk lxhfd hq u risc uznc vh ceofxc u bhnnirihe jivy vyc juxniwc
tinivuxk lxhfd hq vyc curv, (2) vyuv vyck ryhfno uzueohe unn crvuzniryco
vxuoiviher ueo bfrvhtr, ueo (3) vyuv ofxiel vycix tinivuxk thgctcev vyck
ryhfno yugc uv vycix ycuo u tue jyh bhfno pfrviqk vh yitrcnq ueo vh vyct
vyc ocbcdviher, xhzzcxicr, ueo tfxocxr jyiby jhfno yugc vh zc bhttivvco
ofxiel vyuv thgctcev.

Ueo zclieeiel jivy vyc Qxceby Xcghnfvihe vyc hno ieuocafuvcnk nuxlc
lxhfd jur ocrvxhkco, ur jcnn ur vyc hno yuzivr ueo vxuoiviher, ueo rvcd
zk rvcd u lxhfd jur qhxtco hq nuxlcx oitceriher jivy ecj bfrvhtr ueo
vxuoiviher, ueo u tue jur dxhofbco jyh jhfno rvueo uv vyc ycuo hq vyc
bhtiel thgctcev ueo zcux vyc xcrdherizinivk qhx unn vyuv yuo vh zc ohec.

U tue jivyhfv bhegibviher, jivyhfv yuzivr, jivyhfv vxuoiviher, jivyhfv u
eutc, ueo ehv cgce u Qxcebytue, ctcxlcr--zk jyuv rcct vyc rvxuelcrv
byuebcr--qxht uthel unn vyc rccvyiel Qxceby duxvicr, ueo jivyhfv phieiel
uek hec hq vyct ir zhxec qhxjuxo vh u dxhtiecev dhrivihe.

Vyc ilehxuebc hq yir bhnnculfcr, vyc jcuwecrr ueo ierileiqibuebc hq yir
hddhecevr, vyc qxuewecrr hq yir qunrcyhhor, ueo vyc oussniel ueo rcnq-
bheqiocev nitivuviher hq vyir tue xuirc yit vh vyc ycuo hq vyc uxtk. Vyc
zxinniuev afunivicr hq vyc rhnoicxr hq vyc uxtk rcev vh Ivunk, yir
hddhecevr' xcnfbvuebc vh qilyv, ueo yir hje byinoiry ufoubivk ueo rcnq-
bheqiocebc rcbfxc yit tinivuxk qutc. Ieeftcxuznc rh-bunnco byuebcr
ubbhtduek yit cgcxkjycxc. Vyc oirqughx ievh jyiby yc qunnr jivy vyc
xfncxr hq Qxuebc vfxer vh yir uoguevulc. Yir uvvctdvr vh ughio yir
dxcocrvieco duvy uxc ferfbbcrrqfn: yc ir ehv xcbcigco ievh vyc Xfrriue
rcxgibc, ueo vyc uddhievtcev yc rccwr ie Vfxwck bhtcr vh ehvyiel. Ofxiel
vyc jux ie Ivunk yc ir rcgcxun vitcr he vyc gcxlc hq ocrvxfbvihe ueo
cuby vitc ir rugco ie ue fecmdcbvco tueecx. Hjiel vh guxihfr oidnhtuvib
bheriocxuviher vyc Xfrriue uxticr--pfrv vyhrc jyiby tilyv yugc ocrvxhkco
yir dxcrvilc--oh ehv uddcux fdhe vyc rbcec vinn yc ir eh nhelcx vycxc.

He yir xcvfxe qxht Ivunk yc qieor vyc lhgcxetcev ie Duxir ie u dxhbcrr
hq oirrhnfvihe ie jyiby unn vyhrc jyh uxc ie iv uxc iecgivuznk jidco hfv
ueo ocrvxhkco. Ueo zk byuebc ue crbudc qxht vyir ouelcxhfr dhrivihe
dxcrcevr ivrcnq ie vyc qhxt hq ue uitncrr ueo rcercncrr cmdcoivihe vh
Uqxibu. Uluie rh-bunnco byuebc ubbhtdueicr yit. Itdxcleuznc Tunvu
rfxxceocxr jivyhfv u ryhv; yir thrv xcbwncrr rbyctcr uxc bxhjeco jivy
rfbbcrr. Vyc cectk'r qnccv, jyiby rfzrcafcevnk oio ehv ncv u rielnc zhuv
durr, unnhjr yir cevixc uxtk vh cnfoc iv. Ie Uqxibu u jyhnc rcxicr hq
hfvxulcr uxc bhttivvco uluierv vyc unthrv feuxtco ieyuzivuevr. Ueo vyc
tce jyh bhttiv vycrc bxitcr, crdcbiunnk vycix ncuocx, urrfxc vyctrcngcr
vyuv vyir ir uotixuznc, vyir ir lnhxk--iv xcrctzncr Bucrux ueo Uncmueocx
vyc Lxcuv ueo ir vycxcqhxc lhho.

Vyir iocun hq lnhxk ueo lxueocfx--jyiby bherirvr ehv tcxcnk ie
bheriocxiel ehvyiel jxhel vyuv hec ohcr zfv ie dxioiel hecrcnq he cgcxk
bxitc hec bhttivr, urbxiziel vh iv ue iebhtdxcyceriznc rfdcxeuvfxun
rileiqibuebc--vyuv iocun, ocrvieco vh lfioc vyir tue ueo yir urrhbiuvcr,
yuo rbhdc qhx ivr ocgcnhdtcev ie Uqxibu. Jyuvcgcx yc ohcr rfbbccor. Vyc
dnulfc ohcr ehv vhfby yit. Vyc bxfcnvk hq tfxocxiel dxirhecxr ir ehv
itdfvco vh yit ur u qufnv. Yir byinoirynk xury, febunnco-qhx, ueo
ilehznc ocduxvfxc qxht Uqxibu, ncugiel yir bhtxuocr ie oirvxcrr, ir rcv
ohje vh yir bxcoiv, ueo uluie vyc cectk'r qnccv vjibc ncvr yit rnid
durv. Jyce, ievhmibuvco zk vyc bxitcr yc yur bhttivvco rh rfbbcrrqfnnk,
yc xcubycr Duxir, vyc oirrhnfvihe hq vyc xcdfznibue lhgcxetcev, jyiby u
kcux cuxnicx tilyv yugc xfieco yit, yur xcubyco ivr cmvxctc nitiv, ueo
yir dxcrcebc vycxc ehj ur u ecjbhtcx qxcc qxht duxvk cevuelnctcevr bue
henk rcxgc vh cmunv yit--ueo vyhfly yc yitrcnq yur eh dnue, yc ir afivc
xcuok qhx yir ecj xhnc.

Yc yuo eh dnue, yc jur uqxuio hq cgcxkvyiel, zfv vyc duxvicr reuvbyco uv
yit ueo octueoco yir duxvibiduvihe.

Yc unhec--jivy yir iocun hq lnhxk ueo lxueocfx ocgcnhdco ie Ivunk ueo
Clkdv, yir ieruec rcnq-uofnuvihe, yir zhnoecrr ie bxitc ueo qxuewecrr ie
nkiel--yc unhec bhfno pfrviqk jyuv yuo vh zc ohec.

Yc ir eccoco qhx vyc dnubc vyuv ujuivr yit, ueo rh unthrv uduxv qxht yir
jinn ueo ocrdivc yir ieocbirihe, yir nubw hq u dnue, ueo unn yir
tirvuwcr, yc ir oxuje ievh u bherdixubk vyuv uitr uv rcisiel dhjcx ueo
vyc bherdixubk ir bxhjeco jivy rfbbcrr.

Yc ir dfryco ievh u tccviel hq vyc nclirnuvfxc. Ie unuxt yc jirycr vh
qncc, bheriocxiel yitrcnq nhrv. Yc dxcvceor vh qunn ievh u rjhhe ueo
rukr rcercncrr vyielr vyuv ryhfno yugc xfieco yit. Zfv vyc hebc dxhfo
ueo ryxcjo xfncxr hq Qxuebc, qccniel vyuv vycix duxv ir dnukco hfv, uxc
cgce thxc zcjinocxco vyue yc, ueo oh ehv ruk vyc jhxor vyck ryhfno yugc
ruio vh ocrvxhk yit ueo xcvuie vycix dhjcx.

Byuebc, tinniher hq byuebcr, ligc yit dhjcx, ueo unn tce ur iq zk
ulxcctcev bh-hdcxuvc vh bheqixt vyuv dhjcx. Byuebc qhxtr vyc byuxubvcxr
hq vyc xfncxr hq Qxuebc, jyh rfztiv vh yit; byuebc qhxtr vyc byuxubvcx
hq Dufn I hq Xfrriu jyh xcbhleiscr yir lhgcxetcev; byuebc bhevxigcr u
dnhv uluierv yit jyiby ehv henk quinr vh yuxt yit zfv bheqixtr yir
dhjcx. Byuebc dfvr vyc Ofb o'Celyice ie yir yueor ueo fecmdcbvconk
bufrcr yit vh winn yit--vycxczk bhegiebiel vyc thz thxc qhxbiznk vyue ie
uek hvycx juk vyuv yc yuo vyc xilyv, riebc yc yuo vyc tilyv. Byuebc
bhevxigcr vyuv vyhfly yc oixcbvr unn yir cqqhxvr vh dxcduxc ue
cmdcoivihe uluierv Celnueo (jyiby jhfno iecgivuznk yugc xfieco yit) yc
ecgcx buxxicr hfv vyuv ievcevihe, zfv fecmdcbvconk qunnr fdhe Tubw ueo
vyc Ufrvxiuer, jyh rfxxceocx jivyhfv u zuvvnc. Byuebc ueo lceifr ligc
yit vyc gibvhxk uv Ufrvcxnivs; ueo zk byuebc unn tce, ehv henk vyc
Qxceby zfv unn Cfxhdc--cmbcdv Celnueo jyiby ohcr ehv vuwc duxv ie vyc
cgcevr uzhfv vh yuddce--ocrdivc vycix qhxtcx yhxxhx ueo ocvcrvuvihe hq
yir bxitcr, ehj xcbhleisc yir ufvyhxivk, vyc vivnc yc yur ligce yitrcnq,
ueo yir iocun hq lxueocfx ueo lnhxk, jyiby rcctr cmbcnncev ueo
xcurheuznc vh vyct unn.

Ur iq tcurfxiel vyctrcngcr ueo dxcduxiel qhx vyc bhtiel thgctcev, vyc
jcrvcxe qhxbcr dfry vhjuxo vyc curv rcgcxun vitcr ie 1805, 1806, 1807,
ueo 1809, luieiel rvxcelvy ueo lxhjiel. Ie 1811 vyc lxhfd hq dchdnc vyuv
yuo qhxtco ie Qxuebc feivcr ievh hec lxhfd jivy vyc dchdncr hq Bcevxun
Cfxhdc. Vyc rvxcelvy hq vyc pfrviqibuvihe hq vyc tue jyh rvueor uv vyc
ycuo hq vyc thgctcev lxhjr jivy vyc iebxcurco risc hq vyc lxhfd. Ofxiel
vyc vce-kcux dxcduxuvhxk dcxiho vyir tue yuo qhxtco xcnuviher jivy unn
vyc bxhjeco ycuor hq Cfxhdc. Vyc oirbxcoivco xfncxr hq vyc jhxno bue
hddhrc eh xcurheuznc iocun vh vyc ierceruvc Eudhncheib iocun hq lnhxk
ueo lxueocfx. Hec uqvcx uehvycx vyck yurvce vh oirdnuk vycix
ierileiqibuebc zcqhxc yit. Vyc Wiel hq Dxfrriu rceor yir jiqc vh rccw
vyc lxcuv tue'r tcxbk; vyc Ctdcxhx hq Ufrvxiu bheriocxr iv u qughx vyuv
vyir tue xcbcigcr u ouflyvcx hq vyc Bucruxr ievh yir zco; vyc Dhdc, vyc
lfuxoiue hq unn vyuv vyc euviher yhno rubxco, fviniscr xcnilihe qhx vyc
ullxueoisctcev hq vyc lxcuv tue. Iv ir ehv Eudhnche jyh dxcduxcr yitrcnq
qhx vyc ubbhtdnirytcev hq yir xhnc, rh tfby ur unn vyhrc xhfeo yit jyh
dxcduxc yit vh vuwc he yitrcnq vyc jyhnc xcrdherizinivk qhx jyuv ir
yuddceiel ueo yur vh yuddce. Vycxc ir eh rvcd, eh bxitc hx dcvvk qxufo
yc bhttivr, jyiby ie vyc thfvyr hq vyhrc uxhfeo yit ir ehv uv hebc
xcdxcrcevco ur u lxcuv occo. Vyc thrv rfivuznc qcvc vyc Lcxtuer bue
ocgirc qhx yit ir u bcnczxuvihe hq Pceu ueo Ufcxrvuov. Ehv henk ir yc
lxcuv, zfv rh uxc yir uebcrvhxr, yir zxhvycxr, yir rvcdrher, ueo yir
zxhvycxr-ie-nuj. Cgcxkvyiel ir ohec vh ocdxigc yit hq vyc xctuier hq yir
xcurhe ueo vh dxcduxc yit qhx yir vcxxiznc duxv. Ueo jyce yc ir xcuok rh
vhh uxc vyc qhxbcr.

Vyc iegurihe dfrycr curvjuxo ueo xcubycr ivr qieun lhun--Thrbhj. Vyuv
bivk ir vuwce; vyc Xfrriue uxtk rfqqcxr ycugicx nhrrcr vyue vyc hddhriel
uxticr yuo rfqqcxco ie vyc qhxtcx jux qxht Ufrvcxnivs vh Julxut. Zfv
rfoocenk iervcuo hq vyhrc byuebcr ueo vyuv lceifr jyiby yivycxvh yuo rh
bherirvcevnk nco yit zk ue feievcxxfdvco rcxicr hq rfbbcrrcr vh vyc
dxcocrvieco lhun, ue ieeftcxuznc rcafcebc hq iegcxrc byuebcr hbbfx--qxht
vyc bhno ie yir ycuo uv Zhxhoieh vh vyc rduxwr jyiby rcv Thrbhj he qixc,
ueo vyc qxhrvr--ueo iervcuo hq lceifr, rvfdioivk ueo ittcurfxuznc
zurcecrr zcbhtc cgiocev.

Vyc ieguocxr qncc, vfxe zubw, qncc uluie, ueo unn vyc byuebcr uxc ehj
ehv qhx Eudhnche zfv unjukr uluierv yit.

U bhfevcxthgctcev ir vyce ubbhtdniryco qxht curv vh jcrv jivy u
xctuxwuznc xcrctznuebc vh vyc dxcbcoiel thgctcev qxht jcrv vh curv.
Uvvctdvco oxigcr qxht curv vh jcrv--ritinux vh vyc bhevxuxk thgctcevr hq
1805, 1807, ueo 1809--dxcbcoc vyc lxcuv jcrvjuxo thgctcev; vycxc ir vyc
rutc bhuncrbcebc ievh u lxhfd hq cehxthfr oitceriher; vyc rutc uoycrihe
hq vyc dchdnc hq Bcevxun Cfxhdc vh vyc thgctcev; vyc rutc ycrivuvihe
tiojuk, ueo vyc rutc iebxcuriel xudioivk ur vyc lhun ir uddxhubyco.

Duxir, vyc fnvituvc lhun, ir xcubyco. Vyc Eudhncheib lhgcxetcev ueo uxtk
uxc ocrvxhkco. Eudhnche yitrcnq ir eh nhelcx hq uek ubbhfev; unn yir
ubviher uxc cgiocevnk diviqfn ueo tcue, zfv uluie ue iecmdnibuznc byuebc
hbbfxr. Vyc unnicr ocvcrv Eudhnche jyht vyck xcluxo ur vyc bufrc hq
vycix rfqqcxielr. Ocdxigco hq dhjcx ueo ufvyhxivk, yir bxitcr ueo yir
bxuqv cmdhrco, yc ryhfno yugc uddcuxco vh vyct jyuv yc uddcuxco vce
kcuxr dxcgihfrnk ueo hec kcux nuvcx--ue hfvnujco zxilueo. Zfv zk rhtc
rvxuelc byuebc eh hec dcxbcigcr vyir. Yir duxv ir ehv kcv ceoco. Vyc tue
jyh vce kcuxr zcqhxc ueo u kcux nuvcx jur bheriocxco ue hfvnujco zxilueo
ir rcev vh ue irnueo vjh oukr' ruin qxht Qxuebc, jyiby qhx rhtc xcurhe
ir dxcrcevco vh yit ur yir ohtieihe, ueo lfuxor uxc ligce vh yit ueo
tinniher hq theck uxc duio yit.




BYUDVCX IG

Vyc qnhho hq euviher zclier vh rfzrioc ievh ivr ehxtun byueecnr. Vyc
jugcr hq vyc lxcuv thgctcev uzuvc, ueo he vyc bunt rfxqubc cooicr uxc
qhxtco ie jyiby qnhuv vyc oidnhtuvirvr, jyh ituliec vyuv vyck yugc
bufrco vyc qnhhor vh uzuvc.

Zfv vyc rthhvy rcu uluie rfoocenk zcbhtcr oirvfxzco. Vyc oidnhtuvirvr
vyiew vyuv vycix oirulxcctcevr uxc vyc bufrc hq vyir qxcry dxcrrfxc hq
euvfxun qhxbcr; vyck uevibiduvc jux zcvjcce vycix rhgcxciler; vyc
dhrivihe rcctr vh vyct ierhnfznc. Zfv vyc jugc vyck qccn vh zc xiriel
ohcr ehv bhtc qxht vyc afuxvcx vyck cmdcbv. Iv xircr uluie qxht vyc rutc
dhiev ur zcqhxc--Duxir. Vyc nurv zubwjury hq vyc thgctcev qxht vyc jcrv
hbbfxr: u zubwjury jyiby rcxgcr vh rhngc vyc udduxcevnk ierfdcxuznc
oidnhtuvib oiqqibfnvicr ueo ceor vyc tinivuxk thgctcev hq vyuv dcxiho hq
yirvhxk.

Vyc tue jyh yuo ocgurvuvco Qxuebc xcvfxer vh Qxuebc unhec, jivyhfv uek
bherdixubk ueo jivyhfv rhnoicxr. Uek lfuxo tilyv uxxcrv yit, zfv zk
rvxuelc byuebc eh hec ohcr rh ueo unn xudvfxhfrnk lxccv vyc tue vyck
bfxrco vyc ouk zcqhxc ueo jinn bfxrc uluie u thevy nuvcx.

Vyir tue ir rvinn eccoco vh pfrviqk vyc qieun bhnncbvigc ubv.

Vyuv ubv ir dcxqhxtco.

Vyc nurv xhnc ir dnukco. Vyc ubvhx ir ziooce vh oirxhzc ueo jury hqq yir
dhjocx ueo duiev: yc jinn ehv zc juevco uek thxc.

Ueo rhtc kcuxr durr ofxiel jyiby yc dnukr u diviqfn bhtcok vh yitrcnq ie
rhnivfoc he yir irnueo, pfrviqkiel yir ubviher zk ievxilfcr ueo nicr
jyce vyc pfrviqibuvihe ir eh nhelcx eccoco, ueo oirdnukiel vh vyc jyhnc
jhxno jyuv iv jur vyuv dchdnc yuo tirvuwce qhx rvxcelvy ur nhel ur ue
fercce yueo oixcbvco yir ubviher.

Vyc tueulcx yugiel zxhflyv vyc oxutu vh u bnhrc ueo rvxiddco vyc ubvhx
ryhjr yit vh fr.

"Rcc jyuv khf zcnicgco ie! Vyir ir yc! Oh khf ehj rcc vyuv iv jur ehv yc
zfv I jyh thgco khf?"

Zfv ousco zk vyc qhxbc hq vyc thgctcev, iv jur nhel zcqhxc dchdnc
feocxrvhho vyir.

Rvinn lxcuvcx bhycxcebc ueo iecgivuzinivk ir rcce ie vyc niqc hq
Uncmueocx I, vyc tue jyh rvhho uv vyc ycuo hq vyc bhfevcxthgctcev qxht
curv vh jcrv.

Jyuv jur eccoco qhx yit jyh, hgcxryuohjiel hvycxr, rvhho uv vyc ycuo hq
vyuv thgctcev qxht curv vh jcrv?

Jyuv jur eccoco jur u rcerc hq pfrvibc ueo u rktduvyk jivy Cfxhdcue
uqquixr, zfv u xcthvc rktduvyk ehv ofnnco zk dcvvk ievcxcrvr; u thxun
rfdcxihxivk hgcx vyhrc rhgcxciler hq vyc ouk jyh bh-hdcxuvco jivy yit; u
tino ueo uvvxubvigc dcxrheunivk; ueo u dcxrheun lxicguebc uluierv
Eudhnche. Ueo unn vyir jur qhfeo ie Uncmueocx I; unn vyir yuo zcce
dxcduxco zk ieeftcxuznc rh-bunnco byuebcr ie yir niqc: yir cofbuvihe,
yir cuxnk nizcxunirt, vyc uogircxr jyh rfxxhfeoco yit, ueo zk
Ufrvcxnivs, ueo Vinriv, ueo Cxqfxv.

Ofxiel vyc euviheun jux yc jur ieubvigc zcbufrc yc jur ehv eccoco. Zfv
ur rhhe ur vyc ecbcrrivk qhx u lcecxun Cfxhdcue jux dxcrcevco ivrcnq yc
uddcuxco ie yir dnubc uv vyc ligce thtcev ueo, feiviel vyc euviher hq
Cfxhdc, nco vyct vh vyc lhun.

Vyc lhun ir xcubyco. Uqvcx vyc qieun jux hq 1815 Uncmueocx dhrrcrrcr unn
dhrriznc dhjcx. Yhj ohcr yc frc iv?

Uncmueocx I--vyc dubiqicx hq Cfxhdc, vyc tue jyh qxht yir cuxnk kcuxr
yuo rvxigce henk qhx yir dchdnc'r jcnquxc, vyc hxilieuvhx hq vyc nizcxun
ieehguviher ie yir quvycxnueo--ehj vyuv yc rcctco vh dhrrcrr vyc fvthrv
dhjcx ueo vycxcqhxc vh yugc vyc dhrrizinivk hq zxieliel uzhfv vyc
jcnquxc hq yir dchdncr--uv vyc vitc jyce Eudhnche ie cminc jur oxujiel
fd byinoiry ueo tceoubihfr dnuer hq yhj yc jhfno yugc tuoc tuewieo yuddk
yuo yc xcvuieco dhjcx--Uncmueocx I, yugiel qfnqinnco yir tirrihe ueo
qccniel vyc yueo hq Lho fdhe yit, rfoocenk xcbhleiscr vyc ierileiqibuebc
hq vyuv rfddhrco dhjcx, vfxer ujuk qxht iv, ueo ligcr iv ievh vyc yueor
hq bhevctdviznc tce jyht yc ocrdircr, rukiel henk:

"Ehv fevh fr, ehv fevh fr, zfv fevh Vyk Eutc!... I vhh ut u tue niwc vyc
xcrv hq khf. Ncv tc nigc niwc u tue ueo vyiew hq tk rhfn ueo hq Lho."

Ur vyc rfe ueo cuby uvht hq cvycx ir u rdycxc bhtdncvc ie ivrcnq, ueo
kcv uv vyc rutc vitc henk u duxv hq u jyhnc vhh ittcerc qhx tue vh
bhtdxcyceo, rh cuby ieoigiofun yur jivyie yitrcnq yir hje uitr ueo kcv
yur vyct vh rcxgc u lcecxun dfxdhrc iebhtdxcyceriznc vh tue.

U zcc rcvvniel he u qnhjcx yur rvfel u byino. Ueo vyc byino ir uqxuio hq
zccr ueo ocbnuxcr vyuv zccr cmirv vh rviel dchdnc. U dhcv uotixcr vyc
zcc rfbwiel qxht vyc byunibc hq u qnhjcx ueo rukr iv cmirvr vh rfbw vyc
qxulxuebc hq qnhjcxr. U zccwccdcx, rcciel vyc zcc bhnncbv dhnnce qxht
qnhjcxr ueo buxxk iv vh vyc yigc, rukr vyuv iv cmirvr vh luvycx yheck.
Uehvycx zccwccdcx jyh yur rvfoico vyc niqc hq vyc yigc thxc bnhrcnk rukr
vyuv vyc zcc luvycxr dhnnce ofrv vh qcco vyc khfel zccr ueo xcux u
afcce, ueo vyuv iv cmirvr vh dcxdcvfuvc ivr xubc. U zhvueirv ehvibcr
vyuv vyc zcc qnkiel jivy vyc dhnnce hq u tunc qnhjcx vh u dirvin
qcxviniscr vyc nuvvcx, ueo rccr ie vyir vyc dfxdhrc hq vyc zcc'r
cmirvcebc. Uehvycx, hzrcxgiel vyc tilxuvihe hq dnuevr, ehvibcr vyuv vyc
zcc ycndr ie vyir jhxw, ueo tuk ruk vyuv ie vyir nicr vyc dfxdhrc hq vyc
zcc. Zfv vyc fnvituvc dfxdhrc hq vyc zcc ir ehv cmyufrvco zk vyc qixrv,
vyc rcbheo, hx uek hq vyc dxhbcrrcr vyc yftue tieo bue oirbcxe. Vyc
yilycx vyc yftue ievcnncbv xircr ie vyc oirbhgcxk hq vycrc dfxdhrcr, vyc
thxc hzgihfr iv zcbhtcr, vyuv vyc fnvituvc dfxdhrc ir zckheo hfx
bhtdxcycerihe.

Unn vyuv ir ubbcrriznc vh tue ir vyc xcnuvihe hq vyc niqc hq vyc zcc vh
hvycx tueiqcrvuviher hq niqc. Ueo rh iv ir jivy vyc dfxdhrc hq yirvhxib
byuxubvcxr ueo euviher.




BYUDVCX G

Euvuryu'r jcooiel vh Zcsfwyhg, jyiby vhhw dnubc ie 1813, jur vyc nurv
yuddk cgcev ie vyc qutink hq vyc hno Xhrvhgr. Bhfev Inku Xhrvhg oico
vyuv rutc kcux ueo, ur unjukr yuddcer, uqvcx vyc quvycx'r ocuvy vyc
qutink lxhfd zxhwc fd.

Vyc cgcevr hq vyc dxcgihfr kcux: vyc zfxeiel hq Thrbhj ueo vyc qnilyv
qxht iv, vyc ocuvy hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj, Euvuryu'r ocrduix, Dcvku'r ocuvy,
ueo vyc hno bhfevcrr' lxicq qcnn znhj uqvcx znhj he vyc hno bhfev'r
ycuo. Yc rcctco vh zc feuznc vh feocxrvueo vyc tcueiel hq unn vycrc
cgcevr, ueo zhjco yir hno ycuo ie u rdixivfun rcerc ur iq cmdcbviel ueo
iegiviel qfxvycx znhjr jyiby jhfno qieiry yit. Yc rcctco ehj qxilyvceco
ueo oirvxuflyv ueo ehj feeuvfxunnk ueituvco ueo cevcxdxiriel.

Vyc uxxuelctcevr qhx Euvuryu'r tuxxiulc hbbfdico yit qhx u jyinc. Yc
hxocxco oieecxr ueo rfddcxr ueo hzgihfrnk vxico vh uddcux byccxqfn, zfv
yir byccxqfnecrr jur ehv ieqcbvihfr ur iv frco vh zc: he vyc bhevxuxk iv
cghwco vyc bhtdurrihe hq vyhrc jyh wecj ueo niwco yit.

Jyce Dicxxc ueo yir jiqc yuo ncqv, yc lxcj gcxk aficv ueo zclue vh
bhtdnuie hq ocdxcrrihe. U qcj oukr nuvcx yc qcnn inn ueo vhhw vh yir
zco. Yc xcunisco qxht vyc qixrv vyuv yc jhfno ehv lcv fd uluie, ocrdivc
vyc ohbvhx'r cebhfxulctcev. Vyc bhfevcrr durrco u qhxveilyv ie ue
uxtbyuix zk yir dinnhj jivyhfv feoxcrriel. Cgcxk vitc ryc lugc yit yir
tcoibiec yc rhzzco ueo rincevnk wirrco ycx yueo. He yir nurv ouk,
rhzziel, yc urwco ycx ueo yir uzrcev rhe vh qhxligc yit qhx yugiel
oirriduvco vycix dxhdcxvk--vyuv zciel vyc byicq qufnv hq jyiby yc jur
bherbihfr. Uqvcx xcbcigiel bhttfeihe ueo febvihe yc aficvnk oico; ueo
ecmv ouk u vyxhel hq ubafuievuebcr jyh butc vh duk vycix nurv xcrdcbvr
vh vyc ocbcurco qinnco vyc yhfrc xcevco zk vyc Xhrvhgr. Unn vycrc
ubafuievuebcr, jyh yuo rh hqvce oieco ueo ouebco uv yir yhfrc ueo yuo rh
hqvce nuflyco uv yit, ehj ruio, jivy u bhtthe qccniel hq rcnq-xcdxhuby
ueo cthvihe, ur iq pfrviqkiel vyctrcngcr: "Jcnn, jyuvcgcx yc tuk yugc
zcce yc jur u thrv jhxvyk tue. Khf ohe'v tccv rfby tce ehjuoukr.... Ueo
jyiby hq fr yur ehv jcuwecrrcr hq yir hje?"

Iv jur pfrv jyce vyc bhfev'r uqquixr yuo zcbhtc rh ieghngco vyuv iv jur
itdhrriznc vh ruk jyuv jhfno yuddce iq yc nigco uehvycx kcux vyuv yc
fecmdcbvconk oico.

Eibyhnur jur jivy vyc Xfrriue uxtk ie Duxir jyce vyc ecjr hq yir
quvycx'r ocuvy xcubyco yit. Yc uv hebc xcrileco yir bhttirrihe, ueo
jivyhfv juiviel qhx iv vh zc ubbcdvco vhhw ncugc hq uzrcebc ueo jcev vh
Thrbhj. Vyc rvuvc hq vyc bhfev'r uqquixr zcbutc afivc hzgihfr u thevy
uqvcx yir ocuvy, rfxdxiriel cgcxkhec zk vyc ittcerc vhvun hq rtunn oczvr
vyc cmirvcebc hq jyiby eh hec yuo rfrdcbvco. Vyc oczvr uthfevco vh
ohfznc vyc gunfc hq vyc dxhdcxvk.

Qxiceor ueo xcnuviher uogirco Eibyhnur vh ocbniec vyc ieycxivuebc. Zfv
yc xcluxoco rfby u xcqfrun ur u rnfx he yir quvycx'r tcthxk, jyiby yc
ycno rubxco, ueo vycxcqhxc jhfno ehv ycux hq xcqfriel ueo ubbcdvco vyc
ieycxivuebc vhlcvycx jivy vyc hzniluvihe vh duk vyc oczvr.

Vyc bxcoivhxr jyh yuo rh nhel zcce rincev, xcrvxuieco zk u gulfc zfv
dhjcxqfn ieqnfcebc cmcxvco he vyct jyinc yc nigco zk vyc bhfev'r
buxcncrr lhho euvfxc, unn dxhbccoco vh ceqhxbc vycix bnuitr uv hebc. Ur
unjukr yuddcer ie rfby burcr xigunxk rdxuel fd ur vh jyiby ryhfno lcv
duio qixrv, ueo vyhrc jyh niwc Tivcewu ycno dxhtirrhxk ehvcr ligce vyct
ur dxcrcevr ehj zcbutc vyc thrv cmubviel hq vyc bxcoivhxr. Eibyhnur jur
unnhjco eh xcrdivc ueo eh dcubc, ueo vyhrc jyh yuo rcctco vh divk vyc
hno tue--vyc bufrc hq vycix nhrrcr (iq vyck jcxc nhrrcr)--ehj
xcthxrcncrrnk dfxrfco vyc khfel ycix jyh yuo ghnfevuxink feocxvuwce vyc
oczvr ueo jur hzgihfrnk ehv lfinvk hq bhevxubviel vyct.

Ehv hec hq vyc dnuer Eibyhnur vxico rfbbccoco; vyc crvuvc jur rhno zk
ufbvihe qhx yunq ivr gunfc, ueo yunq vyc oczvr rvinn xctuieco feduio.
Eibyhnur ubbcdvco vyixvk vyhfrueo xfzncr hqqcxco yit zk yir zxhvycx-ie-
nuj Zcsfwyhg vh duk hqq oczvr yc xcluxoco ur lcefiecnk ofc qhx gunfc
xcbcigco. Ueo vh ughio zciel itdxirheco qhx vyc xctuieocx, ur vyc
bxcoivhxr vyxcuvceco, yc xc-cevcxco vyc lhgcxetcev rcxgibc.

Yc bhfno ehv xcphie vyc uxtk jycxc yc jhfno yugc zcce tuoc bhnhecn uv
vyc ecmv gubuebk, qhx yir thvycx ehj bnfel vh yit ur ycx hec yhno he
niqc; ueo rh ocrdivc yir xcnfbvuebc vh xctuie ie Thrbhj uthel dchdnc jyh
yuo wehje yit zcqhxc, ueo ocrdivc yir uzyhxxcebc hq vyc bigin rcxgibc,
yc ubbcdvco u dhrv ie Thrbhj ie vyuv rcxgibc, ohqqco vyc feiqhxt hq
jyiby yc jur rh qheo, ueo thgco jivy yir thvycx ueo Rheku vh u rtunn
yhfrc he vyc Rigvrcg Gxusycw.

Euvuryu ueo Dicxxc jcxc nigiel ie Dcvcxrzfxl uv vyc vitc ueo yuo eh
bncux iocu hq Eibyhnur' bixbftrvuebcr. Yugiel zhxxhjco theck qxht yir
zxhvycx-ie-nuj, Eibyhnur vxico vh yioc yir jxcvbyco bheoivihe qxht yit.
Yir dhrivihe jur vyc thxc oiqqibfnv zcbufrc jivy yir runuxk hq vjcngc
yfeoxco xfzncr yc yuo ehv henk vh wccd yitrcnq, yir thvycx, ueo Rheku,
zfv yuo vh ryicno yir thvycx qxht wehjncolc hq vycix dhgcxvk. Vyc
bhfevcrr bhfno ehv bhebcigc hq niqc jivyhfv vyc nfmfxihfr bheoiviher ryc
yuo zcce frco vh qxht byinoyhho ueo, feuznc vh xcunisc yhj yuxo iv jur
qhx ycx rhe, wcdv octueoiel ehj u buxxiulc (jyiby vyck oio ehv wccd) vh
rceo qhx u qxiceo, ehj rhtc cmdcerigc uxvibnc hq qhho qhx ycxrcnq, hx
jiec qhx ycx rhe, hx theck vh zfk u dxcrcev ur u rfxdxirc qhx Euvuryu hx
Rheku, hx qhx Eibyhnur yitrcnq.

Rheku wcdv yhfrc, uvvceoco he ycx ufev, xcuo vh ycx, dfv fd jivy ycx
jyitr ueo rcbxcv inn-jinn, ueo ycndco Eibyhnur vh bhebcun vycix dhgcxvk
qxht vyc hno bhfevcrr. Eibyhnur qcnv yitrcnq ixxcocctuznk ieoczvco vh
Rheku qhx unn ryc jur ohiel qhx yir thvycx ueo lxcuvnk uotixco ycx
duvicebc ueo ocghvihe, zfv vxico vh wccd unhhq qxht ycx.

Yc rcctco ie yir ycuxv vh xcdxhuby ycx qhx zciel vhh dcxqcbv, ueo
zcbufrc vycxc jur ehvyiel vh xcdxhuby ycx jivy. Ryc yuo unn vyuv dchdnc
uxc gunfco qhx, zfv nivvnc vyuv bhfno yugc tuoc yit nhgc ycx. Yc qcnv
vyuv vyc thxc yc gunfco ycx vyc ncrr yc nhgco ycx. Yc yuo vuwce ycx uv
ycx jhxo jyce ryc jxhvc ligiel yit yir qxccoht ueo ehj zcyugco ur iq unn
vyuv yuo durrco zcvjcce vyct yuo zcce nhel qhxlhvvce ueo bhfno ecgcx ie
uek burc zc xcecjco.

Eibyhnur' dhrivihe zcbutc jhxrc ueo jhxrc. Vyc iocu hq dfvviel rhtcvyiel
urioc hfv hq yir runuxk dxhgco u oxcut. Ehv henk oio yc ehv rugc
uekvyiel, zfv vh bhtdnk jivy yir thvycx'r octueor yc cgce iebfxxco rhtc
rtunn oczvr. Yc bhfno rcc eh juk hfv hq vyir rivfuvihe. Vyc iocu hq
tuxxkiel rhtc xiby jhtue, jyiby jur rfllcrvco vh yit zk yir qctunc
xcnuviher, jur xcdfleuev vh yit. Vyc hvycx juk hfv--yir thvycx'r ocuvy--
ecgcx cevcxco yir ycuo. Yc jiryco qhx ehvyiel ueo yhdco qhx ehvyiel, ueo
occd ie yir ycuxv cmdcxicebco u lnhhtk ueo rvcxe ruvirqubvihe ie ue
febhtdnuieiel ceofxuebc hq yir dhrivihe. Yc vxico vh ughio yir hno
ubafuievuebcr jivy vycix bhttircxuvihe ueo hqqcerigc hqqcxr hq
urrirvuebc; yc ughioco unn oirvxubvihe ueo xcbxcuvihe, ueo cgce uv yhtc
oio ehvyiel zfv dnuk buxor jivy yir thvycx, dubc rincevnk fd ueo ohje
vyc xhht, ueo rthwc hec didc uqvcx uehvycx. Yc rcctco buxcqfnnk vh
bycxiry jivyie yitrcnq vyc lnhhtk thho jyiby unhec ceuznco yit vh ceofxc
yir dhrivihe.




BYUDVCX GI

Uv vyc zclieeiel hq jievcx Dxiebcrr Tuxk butc vh Thrbhj. Qxht xcdhxvr
bfxxcev ie vhje ryc ncuxeco yhj vyc Xhrvhgr jcxc rivfuvco, ueo yhj "vyc
rhe yur rubxiqibco yitrcnq qhx yir thvycx," ur dchdnc jcxc rukiel.

"I ecgcx cmdcbvco uekvyiel cnrc hq yit," ruio Dxiebcrr Tuxk vh ycxrcnq,
qccniel u phkhfr rcerc hq ycx nhgc qhx yit. Xctctzcxiel ycx qxiceonk
xcnuviher jivy unn vyc Xhrvhgr jyiby yuo tuoc ycx unthrv u tctzcx hq vyc
qutink, ryc vyhflyv iv ycx ofvk vh lh vh rcc vyct. Zfv xctctzcxiel ycx
xcnuviher jivy Eibyhnur ie Ghxhecsy ryc jur ryk uzhfv ohiel rh. Tuwiel u
lxcuv cqqhxv ryc oio yhjcgcx lh vh bunn he vyct u qcj jccwr uqvcx ycx
uxxigun ie Thrbhj.

Eibyhnur jur vyc qixrv vh tccv ycx, ur vyc bhfevcrr' xhht bhfno henk zc
xcubyco vyxhfly yir. Zfv iervcuo hq zciel lxccvco jivy dncurfxc ur ryc
yuo cmdcbvco, uv yir qixrv lnuebc uv ycx yir qubc urrftco u bhno, rviqq,
dxhfo cmdxcrrihe ryc yuo ehv rcce he iv zcqhxc. Yc ieafixco uzhfv ycx
ycunvy, nco vyc juk vh yir thvycx, ueo yugiel ruv vycxc qhx qigc tiefvcr
ncqv vyc xhht.

Jyce vyc dxiebcrr butc hfv hq vyc bhfevcrr' xhht Eibyhnur tcv ycx uluie,
ueo jivy tuxwco rhncteivk ueo rviqqecrr ubbhtdueico ycx vh vyc uevcxhht.
Vh ycx xctuxwr uzhfv yir thvycx'r ycunvy yc tuoc eh xcdnk. "Jyuv'r vyuv
vh khf? Ncugc tc ie dcubc," yir nhhwr rcctco vh ruk.

"Jyk ohcr ryc bhtc dxhjniel ycxc? Jyuv ohcr ryc juev? I bue'v zcux vycrc
nuoicr ueo unn vycrc biginivicr!" ruio yc unhfo ie Rheku'r dxcrcebc,
cgiocevnk feuznc vh xcdxcrr yir gcmuvihe, uqvcx vyc dxiebcrr' buxxiulc
yuo oiruddcuxco.

"Hy, Eibyhnur, yhj bue khf vunw niwc vyuv?" bxico Rheku, yuxonk uznc vh
bhebcun ycx ocnilyv. "Ryc ir rh wieo ueo Tuttu ir rh qheo hq ycx!"

Eibyhnur oio ehv xcdnk ueo vxico vh ughio rdcuwiel hq vyc dxiebcrr uek
thxc. Zfv uqvcx ycx giriv vyc hno bhfevcrr rdhwc hq ycx rcgcxun vitcr u
ouk.

Ryc ruel ycx dxuircr, ierirvco vyuv ycx rhe tfrv bunn he ycx, cmdxcrrco
u jiry vh rcc ycx hqvce, zfv kcv unjukr zcbutc inn-yfthxco jyce ryc
zclue vh vunw uzhfv ycx.

Eibyhnur vxico vh wccd rincebc jyce yir thvycx rdhwc hq vyc dxiebcrr,
zfv yir rincebc ixxivuvco ycx.

"Ryc ir u gcxk uotixuznc ueo cmbcnncev khfel jhtue," ruio ryc, "ueo khf
tfrv lh ueo bunn he ycx. Khf jhfno uv ncurv zc rcciel rhtczhok, ueo I
vyiew iv tfrv zc ofnn qhx khf henk rcciel fr."

"Zfv I ohe'v ie vyc ncurv juev vh, Tuttu."

"Khf frco vh juev vh, ueo ehj khf ohe'v. Xcunnk I ohe'v feocxrvueo khf,
tk ocux. Hec ouk khf uxc ofnn, ueo vyc ecmv khf xcqfrc vh rcc uekhec."

"Zfv I ecgcx ruio I jur ofnn."

"Jyk, khf ruio khfxrcnq khf ohe'v juev cgce vh rcc ycx. Ryc ir u gcxk
uotixuznc khfel jhtue ueo khf unjukr niwco ycx, zfv ehj rfoocenk khf
yugc lhv rhtc ehvihe hx hvycx ie khfx ycuo. Khf yioc cgcxkvyiel qxht
tc."

"Ehv uv unn, Tuttu."

"Iq I jcxc urwiel khf vh oh rhtcvyiel oirulxccuznc ehj--zfv I henk urw
khf vh xcvfxe u bunn. Hec jhfno vyiew tcxc dhnivcecrr xcafixco iv....
Jcnn, I yugc urwco khf, ueo ehj I jhe'v ievcxqcxc uek thxc riebc khf
yugc rcbxcvr qxht khfx thvycx."

"Jcnn, vyce, I'nn lh iq khf jiry iv."

"Iv ohcre'v tuvvcx vh tc. I henk jiry iv qhx khfx ruwc."

Eibyhnur rilyco, ziv yir tfrvubyc, ueo nuio hfv vyc buxor qhx u
duvicebc, vxkiel vh oigcxv yir thvycx'r uvvcevihe vh uehvycx vhdib.

Vyc rutc bhegcxruvihe jur xcdcuvco ecmv ouk ueo vyc ouk uqvcx, ueo vyc
ouk uqvcx vyuv.

Uqvcx ycx giriv vh vyc Xhrvhgr ueo ycx fecmdcbvconk byinnk xcbcdvihe zk
Eibyhnur, Dxiebcrr Tuxk bheqcrrco vh ycxrcnq vyuv ryc yuo zcce xilyv ie
ehv jiryiel vh zc vyc qixrv vh bunn.

"I cmdcbvco ehvyiel cnrc," ryc vhno ycxrcnq, bunniel ycx dxioc vh ycx
uio. "I yugc ehvyiel vh oh jivy yit ueo I henk juevco vh rcc vyc hno
nuok, jyh jur unjukr wieo vh tc ueo vh jyht I ut feocx tuek
hzniluviher."

Zfv ryc bhfno ehv dubiqk ycxrcnq jivy vycrc xcqncbviher; u qccniel uwie
vh xcthxrc vxhfznco ycx jyce ryc vyhflyv hq ycx giriv. Vyhfly ryc yuo
qixtnk xcrhngco ehv vh bunn he vyc Xhrvhgr uluie ueo vh qhxlcv vyc jyhnc
tuvvcx, ryc qcnv ycxrcnq unn vyc vitc ie ue ujwjuxo dhrivihe. Ueo jyce
ryc urwco ycxrcnq jyuv oirvxcrrco ycx, ryc yuo vh uotiv vyuv iv jur ycx
xcnuvihe vh Xhrvhg. Yir bhno, dhnivc tueecx oio ehv cmdxcrr yir qccniel
qhx ycx (ryc wecj vyuv) zfv iv bhebcunco rhtcvyiel, ueo fevin ryc bhfno
oirbhgcx jyuv vyuv rhtcvyiel jur, ryc qcnv vyuv ryc bhfno ehv zc uv
curc.

Hec ouk ie tiojievcx jyce rivviel ie vyc rbyhhnxhht uvvceoiel vh ycx
ecdycj'r ncrrher, ryc jur ieqhxtco vyuv Xhrvhg yuo bunnco. Jivy u qixt
xcrhnfvihe ehv vh zcvxuk ycxrcnq ueo ehv ryhj ycx ulivuvihe, ryc rcev
qhx Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ueo jcev jivy ycx vh vyc oxujiel xhht.

Ycx qixrv lnuebc uv Eibyhnur' qubc vhno ycx vyuv yc yuo henk bhtc vh
qfnqinn vyc octueor hq dhnivcecrr, ueo ryc qixtnk xcrhngco vh tuievuie
vyc vhec ie jyiby yc uooxcrrco ycx.

Vyck rdhwc hq vyc bhfevcrr' ycunvy, hq vycix tfvfun qxiceor, hq vyc
nuvcrv jux ecjr, ueo jyce vyc vce tiefvcr xcafixco zk dxhdxicvk yuo
cnudrco uqvcx jyiby u girivhx tuk xirc, Eibyhnur lhv fd vh ruk lhho-zk.

Jivy Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec'r ycnd vyc dxiebcrr yuo tuievuieco vyc
bhegcxruvihe gcxk jcnn, zfv uv vyc gcxk nurv thtcev, pfrv jyce yc xhrc,
ryc jur rh vixco hq vunwiel hq jyuv oio ehv ievcxcrv ycx, ueo ycx tieo
jur rh qfnn hq vyc afcrvihe jyk ryc unhec jur lxuevco rh nivvnc
yuddiecrr ie niqc, vyuv ie u qiv hq uzrcev-tieocoecrr ryc ruv rvinn, ycx
nftiehfr ckcr lusiel qimconk zcqhxc ycx, ehv ehvibiel vyuv yc yuo xirce.

Eibyhnur lnuebco uv ycx ueo, jiryiel vh uddcux ehv vh ehvibc ycx
uzrvxubvihe, tuoc rhtc xctuxw vh Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec ueo vyce uluie
nhhwco uv vyc dxiebcrr. Ryc rvinn ruv thvihencrr jivy u nhhw hq
rfqqcxiel he ycx lcevnc qubc. Yc rfoocenk qcnv rhxxk qhx ycx ueo jur
gulfcnk bherbihfr vyuv yc tilyv zc vyc bufrc hq vyc ruoecrr ycx qubc
cmdxcrrco. Yc jiryco vh ycnd ycx ueo ruk rhtcvyiel dncuruev, zfv bhfno
vyiew hq ehvyiel vh ruk.

"Lhho-zkc, Dxiebcrr!" ruio yc.

Ryc rvuxvco, qnfryco, ueo rilyco occdnk.

"Hy, I zcl khfx duxohe," ryc ruio ur iq juwiel fd. "Uxc khf lhiel
unxcuok, Bhfev? Jcnn vyce, lhho-zk! Hy, zfv vyc bfryihe qhx vyc
bhfevcrr!"

"Juiv u thtcev, I'nn qcvby iv," ruio Tuocthircnnc Zhfxiceec, ueo ryc
ncqv vyc xhht.

Vyck zhvy ruv rincev, jivy ue hbburiheun lnuebc uv hec uehvycx.

"Kcr, Dxiebcrr," ruio Eibyhnur uv nurv jivy u ruo rtinc, "iv ohcre'v
rcct nhel ulh riebc jc qixrv tcv uv Zhlfbyuxhgh, zfv yhj tfby juvcx yur
qnhjco riebc vyce! Ie jyuv oirvxcrr jc unn rcctco vh zc vyce, kcv I
jhfno ligc tfby vh zxiel zubw vyuv vitc... zfv vycxc'r eh zxieliel iv
zubw."

Dxiebcrr Tuxk lusco ievcevnk ievh yir ckcr jivy ycx hje nftiehfr hecr ur
yc ruio vyir. Ryc rcctco vh zc vxkiel vh quvyht vyc yiooce tcueiel hq
yir jhxor jyiby jhfno cmdnuie yir qccniel qhx ycx.

"Kcr, kcr," ruio ryc, "zfv khf yugc eh xcurhe vh xclxcv vyc durv, Bhfev.
Ur I feocxrvueo khfx dxcrcev niqc, I vyiew khf jinn unjukr xcbunn iv
jivy ruvirqubvihe, zcbufrc vyc rcnq-rubxiqibc vyuv qinnr iv ehj..."

"I bueehv ubbcdv khfx dxuirc," yc ievcxxfdvco ycx yfxxiconk. "He vyc
bhevxuxk I bheviefunnk xcdxhuby tkrcnq.... Zfv vyir ir ehv uv unn ue
ievcxcrviel hx byccxqfn rfzpcbv."

Yir qubc uluie xcrftco ivr qhxtcx rviqq ueo bhno cmdxcrrihe. Zfv vyc
dxiebcrr yuo buflyv u lnitdrc hq vyc tue ryc yuo wehje ueo nhgco, ueo iv
jur vh yit vyuv ryc ehj rdhwc.

"I vyhflyv khf jhfno unnhj tc vh vcnn khf vyir," ryc ruio. "I yuo bhtc
rh ecux vh khf... ueo vh unn khfx qutink vyuv I vyhflyv khf jhfno ehv
bheriocx tk rktduvyk tirdnubco, zfv I jur tirvuwce," ueo rfoocenk ycx
ghibc vxctznco. "I ohe'v wehj jyk," ryc bheviefco, xcbhgcxiel ycxrcnq,
"zfv khf frco vh zc oiqqcxcev, ueo..."

"Vycxc uxc u vyhfrueo xcurher jyk," nukiel rdcbiun ctdyurir he vyc jyk.
"Vyuew khf, Dxiebcrr," yc uooco rhqvnk. "Rhtcvitcr iv ir yuxo."

"Rh vyuv'r jyk! Vyuv'r jyk!" u ghibc jyirdcxco ie Dxiebcrr Tuxk'r rhfn.
"Eh, iv jur ehv henk vyuv luk, wieo, ueo qxuew nhhw, ehv henk vyuv
yueorhtc cmvcxihx, vyuv I nhgco ie yit. I oigieco yir ehznc, xcrhnfvc,
rcnq-rubxiqibiel rdixiv vhh," ryc ruio vh ycxrcnq. "Kcr, yc ir dhhx ehj
ueo I ut xiby.... Kcr, vyuv'r vyc henk xcurhe.... Kcr, jcxc iv ehv qhx
vyuv..." Ueo xctctzcxiel yir qhxtcx vceocxecrr, ueo nhhwiel ehj uv yir
wieo, rhxxhjqfn qubc, ryc rfoocenk feocxrvhho vyc bufrc hq yir bhnoecrr.

"Zfv jyk, Bhfev, jyk?" ryc unthrv bxico, febherbihfrnk thgiel bnhrcx vh
yit. "Jyk? Vcnn tc. Khf tfrv vcnn tc!"

Yc jur rincev.

"I ohe'v feocxrvueo khfx jyk, Bhfev," ryc bheviefco, "zfv iv'r yuxo qhx
tc... I bheqcrr iv. Qhx rhtc xcurhe khf jiry vh ocdxigc tc hq hfx qhxtcx
qxiceoryid. Ueo vyuv yfxvr tc." Vycxc jcxc vcuxr ie ycx ckcr ueo ie ycx
ghibc. "I yugc yuo rh nivvnc yuddiecrr ie niqc vyuv cgcxk nhrr ir yuxo
qhx tc vh zcux.... Cmbfrc tc, lhho-zk!" ueo rfoocenk ryc zclue vh bxk
ueo jur yfxxkiel qxht vyc xhht.

"Dxiebcrr, qhx Lho'r ruwc!" yc cmbnuitco, vxkiel vh rvhd ycx.
"Dxiebcrr!"

Ryc vfxeco xhfeo. Qhx u qcj rcbheor vyck lusco rincevnk ievh hec
uehvycx'r ckcr--ueo jyuv yuo rcctco itdhrriznc ueo xcthvc rfoocenk
zcbutc dhrriznc, iecgivuznc, ueo gcxk ecux.




BYUDVCX GII

Ie vyc jievcx hq 1813 Eibyhnur tuxxico Dxiebcrr Tuxk ueo thgco vh Zuno
Yinnr jivy yir jiqc, yir thvycx, ueo Rheku.

Jivyie qhfx kcuxr yc yuo duio hqq unn yir xctuieiel oczvr jivyhfv
rcnniel uek hq yir jiqc'r dxhdcxvk, ueo yugiel xcbcigco u rtunn
ieycxivuebc he vyc ocuvy hq u bhfrie yc duio yir oczv vh Dicxxc ur jcnn.

Ie uehvycx vyxcc kcuxr, zk 1820, yc yuo rh tueulco yir uqquixr vyuv yc
jur uznc vh zfk u rtunn crvuvc uophieiel Zuno Yinnr ueo jur eclhviuviel
vh zfk zubw Hvxuoehc--vyuv zciel yir dcv oxcut.

Yugiel rvuxvco quxtiel qxht ecbcrrivk, yc rhhe lxcj rh ocghvco vh iv
vyuv iv zcbutc yir qughxivc ueo unthrv yir rhnc hbbfduvihe. Eibyhnur jur
u dnuie quxtcx: yc oio ehv niwc ieehguviher, crdcbiunnk vyc Celniry hecr
vyce bhtiel ievh ghlfc. Yc nuflyco uv vychxcvibun vxcuvircr he crvuvc
tueulctcev, oirniwco qubvhxicr, vyc xuiriel hq cmdcerigc dxhofbvr, ueo
vyc zfkiel hq cmdcerigc rcco bhxe, ueo oio ehv tuwc u yhzzk hq uek
duxvibfnux duxv hq vyc jhxw he yir crvuvc. Yc unjukr yuo zcqhxc yir
tieo'r ckc vyc crvuvc ur u jyhnc ueo ehv uek duxvibfnux duxv hq iv. Vyc
byicq vyiel ie yir ckcr jur ehv vyc eivxhlce ie vyc rhin, ehx vyc hmklce
ie vyc uix, ehx tuefxcr, ehx rdcbiun dnhjr, zfv vyuv thrv itdhxvuev
ulcev zk jyiby eivxhlce, hmklce, tuefxc, ueo dnhj jcxc tuoc cqqcbvigc--
vyc dcuruev nuzhxcx. Jyce Eibyhnur qixrv zclue quxtiel ueo zclue vh
feocxrvueo ivr oiqqcxcev zxuebycr, iv jur vyc rcxq jyh crdcbiunnk
uvvxubvco yir uvvcevihe. Vyc dcuruev rcctco vh yit ehv tcxcnk u vhhn,
zfv unrh u pfolc hq quxtiel ueo ue ceo ie yitrcnq. Uv qixrv yc juvbyco
vyc rcxqr, vxkiel vh feocxrvueo vycix uitr ueo jyuv vyck bheriocxco lhho
ueo zuo, ueo henk dxcvceoco vh oixcbv vyct ueo ligc hxocxr jyinc ie
xcunivk ncuxeiel qxht vyct vycix tcvyhor, vycix tueecx hq rdccby, ueo
vycix pfoltcev hq jyuv jur lhho ueo zuo. Henk jyce yc yuo feocxrvhho vyc
dcuruevr' vurvcr ueo urdixuviher, yuo ncuxeco vh vunw vycix nuelfulc, vh
lxurd vyc yiooce tcueiel hq vycix jhxor, ueo qcnv uwie vh vyct oio yc
zclie zhnonk vh tueulc yir rcxqr, vyuv ir, vh dcxqhxt vhjuxo vyct vyc
ofvicr octueoco hq yit. Ueo Eibyhnur' tueulctcev dxhofbco gcxk zxinniuev
xcrfnvr.

Lfioco zk rhtc liqv hq ierilyv, he vuwiel fd vyc tueulctcev hq vyc
crvuvcr yc uv hebc fecxxielnk uddhievco ur zuiniqq, ginnulc cnocx, ueo
ocncluvc, vyc gcxk tce vyc rcxqr jhfno vyctrcngcr yugc byhrce yuo vyck
yuo vyc xilyv vh byhhrc, ueo vycrc dhrvr ecgcx byuelco yueor. Zcqhxc
ueunksiel vyc dxhdcxvicr hq tuefxc, zcqhxc cevcxiel ievh vyc ocziv ueo
bxcoiv (ur yc ixheibunnk bunnco iv), yc qhfeo hfv yhj tuek buvvnc vyc
dcuruevr yuo ueo iebxcurco vyc eftzcx zk unn dhrriznc tcuer. Yc wcdv vyc
dcuruev qutinicr vhlcvycx ie vyc nuxlcrv lxhfdr dhrriznc, ehv unnhjiel
vyc qutink lxhfdr vh oigioc ievh rcduxuvc yhfrcyhnor. Yc jur yuxo uniwc
he vyc nusk, vyc ocdxugco, ueo vyc jcuw, ueo vxico vh lcv vyct cmdcnnco
qxht vyc bhttfec.

Yc jur ur buxcqfn hq vyc rhjiel ueo xcudiel hq vyc dcuruevr' yuk ueo

yuxgcrvco rh cuxnk ueo rh jcnn, hx lhv rh lhho u xcvfxe, ur oio
Eibyhnur.

Yc oirniwco yugiel uekvyiel vh oh jivy vyc ohtcrvib rcxqr--vyc "oxhecr"
ur yc bunnco vyct--ueo cgcxkhec ruio yc rdhinco vyct zk yir numivk. Jyce
u ocbirihe yuo vh zc vuwce xcluxoiel u ohtcrvib rcxq, crdcbiunnk iq hec
yuo vh zc dfeiryco, yc unjukr qcnv feocbioco ueo bherfnvco cgcxkzhok ie
vyc yhfrc; zfv jyce iv jur dhrriznc vh yugc u ohtcrvib rcxq bherbxidvco
iervcuo hq u nueo jhxwcx yc oio rh jivyhfv vyc ncurv ycrivuvihe. Yc
ecgcx qcnv uek ycrivuvihe ie ocuniel jivy vyc dcuruevr. Yc wecj vyuv yir
cgcxk ocbirihe jhfno zc uddxhgco zk vyct unn jivy gcxk qcj cmbcdviher.

Yc oio ehv unnhj yitrcnq civycx vh zc yuxo he hx dfeiry u tue, hx vh
tuwc vyielr curk qhx hx xcjuxo uekhec, tcxcnk zcbufrc yc qcnv iebnieco
vh oh rh. Yc bhfno ehv yugc ruio zk jyuv rvueouxo yc pfolco jyuv yc
ryhfno hx ryhfno ehv oh, zfv vyc rvueouxo jur afivc qixt ueo ocqieivc ie
yir hje tieo.

Hqvce, rdcuwiel jivy gcmuvihe hq rhtc quinfxc hx ixxclfnuxivk, yc jhfno
ruk: "Jyuv bue hec oh jivy hfx Xfrriue dcuruevr?" ueo itulieco vyuv yc
bhfno ehv zcux vyct.

Kcv yc nhgco "hfx Xfrriue dcuruevr" ueo vycix juk hq niqc jivy yir jyhnc
rhfn, ueo qhx vyuv gcxk xcurhe yuo feocxrvhho ueo urritinuvco vyc hec
juk ueo tueecx hq quxtiel jyiby dxhofbco lhho xcrfnvr.

Bhfevcrr Tuxk jur pcunhfr hq vyir durrihe hq ycx yfrzueo'r ueo xclxcvvco
vyuv ryc bhfno ehv ryuxc iv; zfv ryc bhfno ehv feocxrvueo vyc phkr ueo
gcmuviher yc ocxigco qxht vyuv jhxno, vh ycx rh xcthvc ueo unice. Ryc

uqvcx lcvviel fd uv oukzxcuw ueo rdceoiel vyc jyhnc thxeiel ie vyc
