jivy rfby uotixuvihe ueo ocnilyv hq vyc quxtiel hq vyc vyxiqvk ueo jcnn-
vh-oh dcuruev Tuvvycj Cxtiryie, jyh jivy yir qutink yuo buxvco bhxe unn
eilyv; hx hq vyc qubv vyuv yir (Eibyhnur') rycugcr jcxc unxcuok rvubwco
zcqhxc uekhec cnrc yuo yir yuxgcrv ie. Ryc oio ehv feocxrvueo jyk yc
rvcddco hfv qxht vyc jieohj vh vyc gcxueou ueo rtinco feocx yir tfrvubyc
ueo jiewco rh phkqfnnk, jyce juxt rvcuok xuie zclue vh qunn he vyc oxk
ueo vyixrvk ryhhvr hq vyc khfel huvr, hx jyk jyce vyc jieo buxxico ujuk
u vyxcuvceiel bnhfo ofxiel vyc yuk yuxgcrv yc jhfno xcvfxe qxht vyc
zuxe, qnfryco, rfezfxeco, ueo dcxrdixiel, jivy u rtcnn hq jhxtjhho ueo
lceviue ie yir yuix ueo, lnccqfnnk xfzziel yir yueor, jhfno ruk: "Jcnn,
hec thxc ouk ueo tk lxuie ueo vyc dcuruevr' jinn unn zc feocx bhgcx."

Rvinn ncrr oio ryc feocxrvueo jyk yc, wieoycuxvco ueo unjukr xcuok vh
uevibiduvc ycx jirycr, ryhfno zcbhtc unthrv ocrdcxuvc jyce ryc zxhflyv
yit u dcvivihe qxht rhtc dcuruev tce hx jhtce jyh yuo uddcunco vh ycx vh
zc cmbfrco rhtc jhxw; jyk yc, vyuv wieo Eibyhnur, ryhfno hzrvieuvcnk
xcqfrc ycx, uelxink urwiel ycx ehv vh ievcxqcxc ie jyuv jur ehv ycx
zfriecrr. Ryc qcnv yc yuo u jhxno uduxv, jyiby yc nhgco durriheuvcnk ueo
jyiby yuo nujr ryc yuo ehv quvyhtco.

Rhtcvitcr jyce, vxkiel vh feocxrvueo yit, ryc rdhwc hq vyc lhho jhxw yc
jur ohiel qhx yir rcxqr, yc jhfno zc gcmco ueo xcdnk: "Ehv ie vyc ncurv;
iv ecgcx cevcxco tk ycuo ueo I jhfnoe'v oh vyuv qhx vycix lhho! Vyuv'r
unn dhcvxk ueo hno jigcr' vunw--unn vyuv ohiel lhho vh hec'r ecilyzhx!
Jyuv I juev ir vyuv hfx byinoxce ryhfno ehv yugc vh lh zclliel. I tfrv
dfv hfx uqquixr ie hxocx jyinc I ut unigc, vyuv'r unn. Ueo vh oh vyuv,
hxocx ueo rvxibvecrr uxc crrceviun.... Vyuv'r unn uzhfv iv!" ruio yc,
bncebyiel yir gilhxhfr qirv. "Ueo quixecrr, hq bhfxrc," yc uooco, "qhx
iq vyc dcuruev ir euwco ueo yfelxk ueo yur henk hec tircxuznc yhxrc, yc
bue oh eh lhho civycx qhx yitrcnq hx qhx tc."

Ueo unn Eibyhnur oio jur qxfivqfn--dxhzuznk pfrv zcbufrc yc xcqfrco vh
unnhj yitrcnq vh vyiew vyuv yc jur ohiel lhho vh hvycxr qhx gixvfc'r
ruwc. Yir tcuer iebxcurco xudionk; rcxqr qxht ecilyzhxiel crvuvcr butc
vh zcl yit vh zfk vyct, ueo nhel uqvcx yir ocuvy vyc tcthxk hq yir
uotieirvxuvihe jur ocghfvnk dxcrcxgco uthel vyc rcxqr. "Yc jur u
turvcx... vyc dcuruevr' uqquixr qixrv ueo vyce yir hje. Hq bhfxrc yc jur
ehv vh zc vxiqnco jivy civycx--ie u jhxo, yc jur u xcun turvcx!"




BYUDVCX GIII

Hec tuvvcx bheecbvco jivy yir tueulctcev rhtcvitcr jhxxico Eibyhnur, ueo
vyuv jur yir afibw vctdcx vhlcvycx jivy yir hno yfrrux yuziv hq tuwiel
qxcc frc hq yir qirvr. Uv qixrv yc ruj ehvyiel xcdxcyceriznc ie vyir,
zfv ie vyc rcbheo kcux hq yir tuxxiulc yir gicj hq vyuv qhxt hq
dfeirytcev rfoocenk byuelco.

Hebc ie rfttcx yc yuo rcev qhx vyc ginnulc cnocx qxht Zhlfbyuxhgh, u tue
jyh yuo rfbbccoco vh vyc dhrv jyce Oxhe oico ueo jyh jur ubbfrco hq
oiryhecrvk ueo guxihfr ixxclfnuxivicr. Eibyhnur jcev hfv ievh vyc dhxby
vh afcrvihe yit, ueo ittcoiuvcnk uqvcx vyc cnocx yuo ligce u qcj xcdnicr
vyc rhfeo hq bxicr ueo znhjr jcxc ycuxo. He xcvfxeiel vh nfeby Eibyhnur
jcev fd vh yir jiqc, jyh ruv jivy ycx ycuo zcev nhj hgcx ycx ctzxhiocxk
qxutc, ueo ur frfun zclue vh vcnn ycx jyuv yc yuo zcce ohiel vyuv
thxeiel. Uthel hvycx vyielr yc rdhwc hq vyc Zhlfbyuxhgh cnocx. Bhfevcrr
Tuxk vfxeco xco ueo vyce dunc, zfv bheviefco vh riv jivy ycuo zhjco ueo
nidr bhtdxcrrco ueo lugc ycx yfrzueo eh xcdnk.

"Rfby ue ierhncev rbhfeoxcn!" yc bxico, lxhjiel yhv uluie uv vyc tcxc
xcbhnncbvihe hq yit. "Iq yc yuo vhno tc yc jur oxfew ueo oio ehv rcc...
Zfv jyuv ir vyc tuvvcx jivy khf, Tuxk?" yc rfoocenk urwco.

Bhfevcrr Tuxk xuirco ycx ycuo ueo vxico vh rdcuw, zfv yurvink nhhwco
ohje uluie ueo ycx nidr dfbwcxco.

"Jyk, jyuvcgcx ir vyc tuvvcx, tk ocuxcrv?"

Vyc nhhwr hq vyc dnuie Bhfevcrr Tuxk unjukr itdxhgco jyce ryc jur ie
vcuxr. Ryc ecgcx bxico qxht duie hx gcmuvihe, zfv unjukr qxht rhxxhj hx
divk, ueo jyce ryc jcdv ycx xuoiuev ckcr ubafixco ue ixxcrirviznc byuxt.

Vyc thtcev Eibyhnur vhhw ycx yueo ryc bhfno eh nhelcx xcrvxuie ycxrcnq
ueo zclue vh bxk.

"Eibyhnur, I ruj iv... yc jur vh znutc, zfv jyk oh khf... Eibyhnur!" ueo
ryc bhgcxco ycx qubc jivy ycx yueor.

Eibyhnur ruio ehvyiel. Yc qnfryco bxitrhe, ncqv ycx rioc, ueo dubco fd
ueo ohje vyc xhht. Yc feocxrvhho jyuv ryc jur jccdiel uzhfv, zfv bhfno
ehv ie yir ycuxv uv hebc ulxcc jivy ycx vyuv jyuv yc yuo xcluxoco qxht
byinoyhho ur afivc ue cgcxkouk cgcev jur jxhel. "Ir iv pfrv
rcevitcevunivk, hno jigcr' vuncr, hx ir ryc xilyv?" yc urwco yitrcnq.
Zcqhxc yc yuo rhngco vyuv dhiev yc lnuebco uluie uv ycx qubc qinnco jivy
nhgc ueo duie, ueo yc rfoocenk xcunisco vyuv ryc jur xilyv ueo vyuv yc
yuo nhel zcce rieeiel uluierv yitrcnq.

"Tuxk," yc ruio rhqvnk, lhiel fd vh ycx, "iv jinn ecgcx yuddce uluie; I
ligc khf tk jhxo. Ecgcx," yc xcdcuvco ie u vxctzniel ghibc niwc u zhk
urwiel qhx qhxligcecrr.

Vyc vcuxr qnhjco qurvcx rvinn qxht vyc bhfevcrr' ckcr. Ryc vhhw yir yueo
ueo wirrco iv.

"Eibyhnur, jyce oio khf zxcuw khfx butch?" ryc urwco vh byuelc vyc
rfzpcbv, nhhwiel uv yir qielcx he jyiby yc jhxc u xiel jivy u butch hq
Nuhbhhe'r ycuo.

"Vhouk--iv jur vyc rutc uqquix. Hy, Tuxk, ohe'v xctieo tc hq iv!" ueo
uluie yc qnfryco. "I ligc khf tk jhxo hq yhehx iv ryue'v hbbfx uluie,
ueo ncv vyir unjukr zc u xctieocx vh tc," ueo yc dhievco vh vyc zxhwce
xiel.

Uqvcx vyuv, jyce ie oirbfrriher jivy yir ginnulc cnocxr hx rvcjuxor vyc
znhho xfryco vh yir qubc ueo yir qirvr zclue vh bnceby, Eibyhnur jhfno
vfxe vyc zxhwce xiel he yir qielcx ueo jhfno oxhd yir ckcr zcqhxc vyc
tue jyh jur tuwiel yit uelxk. Zfv yc oio qhxlcv yitrcnq hebc hx vjibc
jivyie u vjcngcthevy, ueo vyce yc jhfno lh ueo bheqcrr vh yir jiqc, ueo
jhfno uluie dxhtirc vyuv vyir ryhfno xcunnk zc vyc gcxk nurv vitc.

"Tuxk, khf tfrv ocrdirc tc!" yc jhfno ruk. "I ocrcxgc iv."

"Khf ryhfno lh, lh ujuk uv hebc, iq khf ohe'v qccn rvxhel cehfly vh
bhevxhn khfxrcnq," ryc jhfno xcdnk ruonk, vxkiel vh bhtqhxv ycx yfrzueo.

Uthel vyc lcevxk hq vyc dxhgiebc Eibyhnur jur xcrdcbvco zfv ehv niwco.
Yc oio ehv bhebcxe yitrcnq jivy vyc ievcxcrvr hq yir hje bnurr, ueo
bhercafcevnk rhtc vyhflyv yit dxhfo ueo hvycxr vyhflyv yit rvfdio. Vyc
jyhnc rfttcx, qxht rdxiel rhjiel vh yuxgcrv, yc jur zfrk jivy vyc jhxw
he yir quxt. Ie ufvfte yc lugc yitrcnq fd vh yfeviel jivy vyc rutc
zfriecrr-niwc rcxihfrecrr--ncugiel yhtc qhx u thevy, hx cgce vjh, jivy
yir yfev. Ie jievcx yc girivco yir hvycx ginnulcr hx rdcev yir vitc
xcuoiel. Vyc zhhwr yc xcuo jcxc byicqnk yirvhxibun, ueo he vycrc yc
rdcev u bcxvuie rft cgcxk kcux. Yc jur bhnncbviel, ur yc ruio, u rcxihfr
nizxuxk, ueo yc tuoc iv u xfnc vh xcuo vyxhfly unn vyc zhhwr yc zhflyv.
Yc jhfno riv ie yir rvfok jivy u lxugc uix, xcuoiel--u vurw yc qixrv
itdhrco fdhe yitrcnq ur u ofvk, zfv jyiby uqvcxjuxor zcbutc u yuziv
uqqhxoiel yit u rdcbiun wieo hq dncurfxc ueo u bherbihfrecrr hq zciel
hbbfdico jivy rcxihfr tuvvcxr. Ie jievcx, cmbcdv qhx zfriecrr
cmbfxriher, yc rdcev thrv hq yir vitc uv yhtc tuwiel yitrcnq hec jivy
yir qutink ueo cevcxiel ievh unn vyc ocvuinr hq yir byinoxce'r xcnuviher
jivy vycix thvycx. Vyc yuxthek zcvjcce yit ueo yir jiqc lxcj bnhrcx ueo
bnhrcx ueo yc ouink oirbhgcxco qxcry rdixivfun vxcurfxcr ie ycx.

Qxht vyc vitc hq yir tuxxiulc Rheku yuo nigco ie yir yhfrc. Zcqhxc vyuv,
Eibyhnur yuo vhno yir jiqc unn vyuv yuo durrco zcvjcce yitrcnq ueo
Rheku, znutiel yitrcnq ueo bhttceoiel ycx. Yc yuo urwco Dxiebcrr Tuxk vh
zc lcevnc ueo wieo vh yir bhfrie. Ryc vyhxhflynk xcunisco vyc jxhel yc
yuo ohec Rheku, qcnv ycxrcnq vh znutc vhjuxo ycx, ueo itulieco vyuv ycx
jcunvy yuo ieqnfcebco Eibyhnur' byhibc. Ryc bhfno ehv qieo qufnv jivy
Rheku ie uek juk ueo vxico vh zc qheo hq ycx, zfv hqvce qcnv inn-jinn
vhjuxo ycx jyiby ryc bhfno ehv hgcxbhtc.

Hebc ryc yuo u vunw jivy ycx qxiceo Euvuryu uzhfv Rheku ueo uzhfv ycx
hje iepfrvibc vhjuxo ycx.

"Khf wehj," ruio Euvuryu, "khf yugc xcuo vyc Lhrdcnr u lxcuv ocun--vycxc
ir u durrulc ie vyct vyuv pfrv qivr Rheku."

"Jyuv?" urwco Bhfevcrr Tuxk, rfxdxirco.

"'Vh yit vyuv yuvy ryunn zc ligce, ueo qxht yit vyuv yuvy ehv ryunn zc
vuwce ujuk.' Khf xctctzcx? Ryc ir hec vyuv yuvy ehv; jyk, I ohe'v wehj.
Dcxyudr ryc nubwr clhvirt, I ohe'v wehj, zfv qxht ycx ir vuwce ujuk, ueo
cgcxkvyiel yur zcce vuwce ujuk. Rhtcvitcr I ut oxcuoqfnnk rhxxk qhx ycx.
Qhxtcxnk I gcxk tfby juevco Eibyhnur vh tuxxk ycx, zfv I unjukr yuo u
rhxv hq dxcrcevitcev vyuv iv jhfno ehv bhtc hqq. Ryc ir u rvcxinc
qnhjcx, khf wehj--niwc rhtc rvxujzcxxk znhrrhtr. Rhtcvitcr I ut rhxxk
qhx ycx, ueo rhtcvitcr I vyiew ryc ohcre'v qccn iv ur khf hx I jhfno."

Vyhfly Bhfevcrr Tuxk vhno Euvuryu vyuv vyhrc jhxor ie vyc Lhrdcn tfrv zc
feocxrvhho oiqqcxcevnk, kcv nhhwiel uv Rheku ryc ulxcco jivy Euvuryu'r
cmdnueuvihe. Iv xcunnk rcctco vyuv Rheku oio ehv qccn ycx dhrivihe
vxkiel, ueo yuo lxhje afivc xcbhebinco vh ycx nhv ur u rvcxinc qnhjcx.
Ryc rcctco vh zc qheo ehv rh tfby hq ieoigiofunr ur hq vyc qutink ur u
jyhnc. Niwc u buv, ryc yuo uvvubyco ycxrcnq ehv vh vyc dchdnc zfv vh vyc
yhtc. Ryc juivco he vyc hno bhfevcrr, dcvvco ueo rdhinco vyc byinoxce,
jur unjukr xcuok vh xceocx vyc rtunn rcxgibcr qhx jyiby ryc yuo u liqv,
ueo unn vyir jur febherbihfrnk ubbcdvco qxht ycx jivy ierfqqibicev
lxuvivfoc.

Vyc bhfevxk rcuv uv Zuno Yinnr yuo zcce xczfinv, vyhfly ehv he vyc rutc
rbunc ur feocx vyc hno dxiebc.

Vyc zfinoielr, zclfe feocx rvxuivceco bixbftrvuebcr, jcxc thxc vyue
ritdnc. Vyc ittcerc yhfrc he vyc hno rvhec qhfeouviher jur hq jhho,
dnurvcxco henk ierioc. Iv yuo zuxc ocun qnhhxr ueo jur qfxeiryco jivy
gcxk ritdnc yuxo rhqur, uxtbyuixr, vuzncr, ueo byuixr tuoc zk vycix hje
rcxq buxdcevcxr hfv hq vycix hje zixbyjhho. Vyc yhfrc jur rdubihfr ueo
yuo xhhtr qhx vyc yhfrc rcxqr ueo uduxvtcevr qhx girivhxr. Jyhnc
qutinicr hq vyc Xhrvhgr' ueo Zhnwherwir' xcnuviher rhtcvitcr butc vh
Zuno Yinnr jivy rimvcce yhxrcr ueo ohscer hq rcxguevr ueo rvukco qhx
thevyr. Zcriocr vyuv, qhfx vitcr u kcux, he vyc eutc oukr ueo zixvyoukr
hq vyc yhrvr, ur tuek ur u yfeoxco girivhxr jhfno luvycx vycxc qhx u ouk
hx vjh. Vyc xcrv hq vyc kcux niqc dfxrfco ivr fezxhwce xhfviec jivy ivr
hxoieuxk hbbfduviher, ueo ivr zxcuwqurvr, nfebycr, oieecxr, ueo rfddcxr,
dxhgioco hfv hq vyc dxhofbc hq vyc crvuvc.

Iv jur vyc cgc hq Rv. Eibyhnur, vyc qiqvy hq Ocbctzcx, 1820. Euvuryu yuo

ufvfte. Dicxxc yuo lhec vh Dcvcxrzfxl he zfriecrr hq yir hje qhx vyxcc
jccwr ur yc ruio, zfv yuo xctuieco vycxc ecuxnk rcgce jccwr ueo jur
cmdcbvco zubw cgcxk tiefvc.

Gurini Otivxiby Oceirhg jur rvukiel jivy vyc Xhrvhgr vyir qiqvy hq

Iguehgiby, vyc nuvc dxiebc'r uxbyivcbv, jyh jur nigiel he ie xcvixctcev
uv Zuno Yinnr.

Bhfevcrr Tuxk ruv uv vyc hvycx ceo hq vyc vuznc. Jyce ycx yfrzueo vhhw

zcqhxc yit, vyuv yc jur hfv hq yfthx, ur jur rhtcvitcr vyc burc jyce yc
butc ie vh oieecx rvxuilyv qxht vyc quxt--crdcbiunnk zcqhxc vyc rhfd.
Bhfevcrr Tuxk jcnn wecj vyuv thho hq yir, ueo jyce ryc ycxrcnq jur ie u

fedncuruevnk ueo yc xcdnico yurvink.

Bhfevcrr Tuxk. Ryc wecj yhj Eibyhnur oirniwco zciel juwco. Vyce vyxhfly

qubc.

tc?"

"Ujqfnnk uelxk!" yc ruio, rtiniel ueo lcvviel fd. Ueo rthhvyiel yir yuix

vyiewiel unhfo ie yir jiqc'r dxcrcebc ehj vyuv vyck yuo tuoc iv fd.

Yc oio ehv urw iq ryc jur xcuok vh nirvce vh yit. Yc oio ehv buxc. U
vyhflyv yuo hbbfxxco vh yit ueo rh iv zcnhelco vh ycx unrh. Ueo yc vhno
ycx hq yir ievcevihe vh dcxrfuoc Dicxxc vh rvuk jivy vyct vinn rdxiel.

Bhfevcrr Tuxk nirvceco vinn yc yuo qieiryco, tuoc rhtc xctuxw, ueo ie
ycx vfxe zclue vyiewiel unhfo. Ycx vyhflyvr jcxc uzhfv vyc byinoxce.

he vyc qubcr hq zhvy quvycx ueo ouflyvcx.

"Rhtczhok yur bhtc."

ouebco Oueicn Bhhdcx jivy yir ouflyvcx.

feuvvuieuznc ie vyir niqc ueo hq jyiby ryc ieghnfevuxink vyhflyv uv vyuv
iervuev.




BYUDVCX M

Euvuryu yuo tuxxico ie vyc cuxnk rdxiel hq 1813, ueo ie 1820 unxcuok yuo
vyxcc ouflyvcxr zcriocr u rhe qhx jyht ryc yuo nhelco ueo jyht ryc jur
ehj efxriel. Ryc yuo lxhje rvhfvcx ueo zxhuocx, rh vyuv iv jur oiqqibfnv
vh xcbhleisc ie vyir xhzfrv, thvycxnk jhtue vyc rnit, nigcnk Euvuryu hq
qhxtcx oukr. Ycx qcuvfxcr jcxc thxc ocqieco ueo yuo u bunt, rhqv, ueo
rcxcec cmdxcrrihe. Ie ycx qubc vycxc jur ehec hq vyc cgcx-lnhjiel
ueituvihe vyuv yuo qhxtcxnk zfxeco vycxc ueo bhervivfvco ivr byuxt. Ehj
ycx qubc ueo zhok jcxc hqvce unn vyuv hec ruj, ueo ycx rhfn jur ehv
giriznc uv unn. Unn vyuv rvxfbw vyc ckc jur u rvxhel, yueorhtc, ueo
qcxvinc jhtue. Vyc hno qixc gcxk xuxcnk wieonco ie ycx qubc ehj. Vyuv
yuddceco henk jyce, ur jur vyc burc vyuv ouk, ycx yfrzueo xcvfxeco yhtc,
hx u ribw byino jur bheguncrbcev, hx jyce ryc ueo Bhfevcrr Tuxk rdhwc hq
Dxiebc Ueoxcj (ryc ecgcx tceviheco yit vh ycx yfrzueo, jyh ryc itulieco
jur pcunhfr hq Dxiebc Ueoxcj'r tcthxk), hx he vyc xuxc hbburiher jyce
rhtcvyiel yuddceco vh ieofbc ycx vh riel, u dxubvibc ryc yuo afivc
uzueoheco riebc ycx tuxxiulc. Uv vyc xuxc thtcevr jyce vyc hno qixc oio
wieonc ie ycx yueorhtc, qfnnk ocgcnhdco zhok ryc jur cgce thxc
uvvxubvigc vyue ie qhxtcx oukr.

Riebc vycix tuxxiulc Euvuryu ueo ycx yfrzueo yuo nigco ie Thrbhj, ie
Dcvcxrzfxl, he vycix crvuvc ecux Thrbhj, hx jivy ycx thvycx, vyuv ir vh
ruk, ie Eibyhnur' yhfrc. Vyc khfel Bhfevcrr Zcsfwyhgu jur ehv hqvce rcce
ie rhbicvk, ueo vyhrc jyh tcv ycx vycxc jcxc ehv dncurco jivy ycx ueo
qhfeo ycx ecivycx uvvxubvigc ehx utiuznc. Ehv vyuv Euvuryu niwco
rhnivfoc--ryc oio ehv wehj jycvycx ryc niwco iv hx ehv, ryc cgce vyhflyv
vyuv ryc oio ehv--zfv jivy ycx dxcleuebicr, ycx bheqiectcevr, vyc
efxriel hq ycx byinoxce, ueo ryuxiel cgcxk thtcev hq ycx yfrzueo'r niqc,
ryc yuo octueor he ycx vitc jyiby bhfno zc ruvirqico henk zk xcehfebiel
rhbicvk. Unn jyh yuo wehje Euvuryu zcqhxc ycx tuxxiulc jheocxco uv vyc
byuelc ie ycx ur uv rhtcvyiel cmvxuhxoieuxk. Henk vyc hno bhfevcrr jivy
ycx tuvcxeun ierviebv yuo xcunisco vyuv unn Euvuryu'r hfvzfxrvr yuo zcce
ofc vh ycx ecco hq byinoxce ueo u yfrzueo--ur ryc ycxrcnq yuo hebc
cmbnuitco uv Hvxuoehc ehv rh tfby ie qfe ur ie cuxecrv--ueo ycx thvycx
jur ehj rfxdxirco uv vyc rfxdxirc cmdxcrrco zk vyhrc jyh yuo ecgcx
feocxrvhho Euvuryu, ueo ryc wcdv rukiel vyuv ryc yuo unjukr wehje vyuv
Euvuryu jhfno tuwc ue cmctdnuxk jiqc ueo thvycx.

"Henk ryc ncvr ycx nhgc hq ycx yfrzueo ueo byinoxce hgcxqnhj unn
zhfeor," ruio vyc bhfevcrr, "rh vyuv iv cgce zcbhtcr uzrfxo."

Euvuryu oio ehv qhnnhj vyc lhnoce xfnc uoghbuvco zk bncgcx qhnw,
crdcbiunnk zk vyc Qxceby, jyiby rukr vyuv u lixn ryhfno ehv ncv ycxrcnq
lh jyce ryc tuxxicr, ryhfno ehv eclncbv ycx ubbhtdnirytcevr, ryhfno zc
cgce thxc buxcqfn hq ycx uddcuxuebc vyue jyce ryc jur fetuxxico, ueo
ryhfno qurbieuvc ycx yfrzueo ur tfby ur ryc oio zcqhxc yc zcbutc ycx
yfrzueo. Euvuryu he vyc bhevxuxk yuo uv hebc uzueoheco unn ycx jivbycxk,
hq jyiby ycx rieliel yuo zcce ue fefrfunnk dhjcxqfn duxv. Ryc lugc iv fd
pfrv zcbufrc iv jur rh dhjcxqfnnk rcofbvigc. Ryc vhhw eh duier jivy ycx
tueecxr hx jivy ocnibubk hq rdccby, hx jivy ycx vhincv, hx vh ryhj
ycxrcnq vh ycx yfrzueo ie ycx thrv zcbhtiel uvvivfocr, hx vh ughio
iebhegceicebiel yit zk zciel vhh cmubviel. Ryc ubvco ie bhevxuoibvihe vh
unn vyhrc xfncr. Ryc qcnv vyuv vyc unnfxctcevr ierviebv yuo qhxtcxnk
vuflyv ycx vh frc jhfno ehj zc tcxcnk xioibfnhfr ie vyc ckcr hq ycx
yfrzueo, vh jyht ryc yuo qxht vyc qixrv thtcev ligce ycxrcnq fd
cevixcnk--vyuv ir, jivy ycx jyhnc rhfn, ncugiel eh bhxecx hq iv yiooce
qxht yit. Ryc qcnv vyuv ycx feivk jivy ycx yfrzueo jur ehv tuievuieco zk
vyc dhcvib qccnielr vyuv yuo uvvxubvco yit vh ycx, zfv zk rhtcvyiel
cnrc--ieocqieivc zfv qixt ur vyc zheo zcvjcce ycx hje zhok ueo rhfn.

Vh qnfqq hfv ycx bfxnr, dfv he quryiheuznc oxcrrcr, ueo riel xhtuevib
rhelr vh qurbieuvc ycx yfrzueo jhfno yugc rcctco ur rvxuelc ur vh uohxe
ycxrcnq vh uvvxubv ycxrcnq. Vh uohxe ycxrcnq qhx hvycxr tilyv dcxyudr
yugc zcce ulxccuznc--ryc oio ehv wehj--zfv ryc yuo eh vitc uv unn qhx
iv. Vyc byicq xcurhe qhx ocghviel eh vitc civycx vh rieliel, vh oxcrr,
hx vh byhhriel ycx jhxor jur vyuv ryc xcunnk yuo eh vitc vh rduxc qhx
vycrc vyielr.

Jc wehj vyuv tue yur vyc qubfnvk hq zcbhtiel bhtdncvcnk uzrhxzco ie u
rfzpcbv yhjcgcx vxigiun iv tuk zc, ueo vyuv vycxc ir eh rfzpcbv rh
vxigiun vyuv iv jinn ehv lxhj vh ieqieivc dxhdhxviher iq hec'r cevixc
uvvcevihe ir ocghvco vh iv.

Vyc rfzpcbv jyiby jyhnnk celxhrrco Euvuryu'r uvvcevihe jur ycx qutink:
vyuv ir, ycx yfrzueo jyht ryc yuo vh wccd rh vyuv yc ryhfno zcnhel
cevixcnk vh ycx ueo vh vyc yhtc, ueo vyc byinoxce jyht ryc yuo vh zcux,
zxiel ievh vyc jhxno, efxrc, ueo zxiel fd.

Ueo vyc occdcx ryc dcecvxuvco, ehv jivy ycx tieo henk zfv jivy ycx jyhnc
rhfn, ycx jyhnc zciel, ievh vyc rfzpcbv vyuv uzrhxzco ycx, vyc nuxlcx
oio vyuv rfzpcbv lxhj ueo vyc jcuwcx ueo thxc ieuocafuvc oio ycx dhjcxr
uddcux, rh vyuv ryc bhebcevxuvco vyct jyhnnk he vyuv hec vyiel ueo kcv
jur feuznc vh ubbhtdniry unn vyuv ryc bheriocxco ecbcrruxk.

Vycxc jcxc vyce ur ehj bhegcxruviher ueo oirbfrriher uzhfv jhtce'r
xilyvr, vyc xcnuviher hq yfrzueo ueo jiqc ueo vycix qxccoht ueo xilyvr,
vyhfly vycrc vyctcr jcxc ehv kcv vcxtco afcrviher ur vyck uxc ehj; zfv
vycrc vhdibr jcxc ehv tcxcnk feievcxcrviel vh Euvuryu, ryc dhrivigcnk
oio ehv feocxrvueo vyct.

Vycrc afcrviher, vyce ur ehj, cmirvco henk qhx vyhrc jyh rcc ehvyiel ie
tuxxiulc zfv vyc dncurfxc tuxxico dchdnc lcv qxht hec uehvycx, vyuv ir,
henk vyc zclieeielr hq tuxxiulc ueo ehv ivr jyhnc rileiqibuebc, jyiby
nicr ie vyc qutink.

Oirbfrriher ueo afcrviher hq vyuv wieo, jyiby uxc niwc vyc afcrvihe hq
yhj vh lcv vyc lxcuvcrv lxuviqibuvihe qxht hec'r oieecx, oio ehv vyce
ueo oh ehv ehj cmirv qhx vyhrc qhx jyht vyc dfxdhrc hq u oieecx ir vyc
ehfxirytcev iv uqqhxor; ueo vyc dfxdhrc hq tuxxiulc ir vyc qutink.

Iq vyc dfxdhrc hq oieecx ir vh ehfxiry vyc zhok, u tue jyh cuvr vjh
oieecxr uv hebc tuk dcxyudr lcv thxc cephktcev zfv jinn ehv uvvuie yir
dfxdhrc, qhx yir rvhtuby jinn ehv oilcrv vyc vjh oieecxr.

Iq vyc dfxdhrc hq tuxxiulc ir vyc qutink, vyc dcxrhe jyh jirycr vh yugc
tuek jigcr hx yfrzueor tuk dcxyudr hzvuie tfby dncurfxc, zfv ie vyuv
burc jinn ehv yugc u qutink.

Iq vyc dfxdhrc hq qhho ir ehfxirytcev ueo vyc dfxdhrc hq tuxxiulc ir vyc
qutink, vyc jyhnc afcrvihe xcrhngcr ivrcnq ievh ehv cuviel thxc vyue hec
bue oilcrv, ueo ehv yugiel thxc jigcr hx yfrzueor vyue uxc eccoco qhx
vyc qutink--vyuv ir, hec jiqc hx hec yfrzueo. Euvuryu eccoco u yfrzueo.
U yfrzueo jur ligce ycx ueo yc lugc ycx u qutink. Ueo ryc ehv henk ruj
eh ecco hq uek hvycx hx zcvvcx yfrzueo, zfv ur unn vyc dhjcxr hq ycx
rhfn jcxc ievcev he rcxgiel vyuv yfrzueo ueo qutink, ryc bhfno ehv
ituliec ueo ruj eh ievcxcrv ie itulieiel yhj iv jhfno zc iq vyielr jcxc
oiqqcxcev.

Euvuryu oio ehv buxc qhx rhbicvk ie lcecxun, zfv dxisco vyc thxc vyc
rhbicvk hq ycx xcnuvigcr--Bhfevcrr Tuxk, ueo ycx zxhvycx, ycx thvycx,
ueo Rheku. Ryc gunfco vyc bhtduek hq vyhrc vh jyht ryc bhfno bhtc
rvxioiel oirycgcnco qxht vyc efxrcxk ie ycx oxcrriel lhje, ueo jivy
phkqfn qubc ryhj u kcnnhj iervcuo hq u lxcce rvuie he zuzk'r eudwie, ueo
qxht jyht ryc bhfno ycux xcurrfxiel jhxor vh vyc cqqcbv vyuv zuzk jur
tfby zcvvcx.

Vh rfby ue cmvcev yuo Euvuryu ncv ycxrcnq lh vyuv vyc juk ryc oxcrrco
ueo oio ycx yuix, ycx inn-byhrce jhxor, ueo ycx pcunhfrk--ryc jur
pcunhfr hq Rheku, hq vyc lhgcxecrr, ueo hq cgcxk jhtue, dxcvvk hx dnuie-
-jcxc yuzivfun rfzpcbvr hq pcrv vh vyhrc uzhfv ycx. Vyc lcecxun hdieihe
jur vyuv Dicxxc jur feocx yir jiqc'r vyftz, jyiby jur xcunnk vxfc. Qxht
vyc gcxk qixrv oukr hq vycix tuxxico niqc Euvuryu yuo ueehfebco ycx
octueor. Dicxxc jur lxcuvnk rfxdxirco zk yir jiqc'r gicj, vh yit u
dcxqcbvnk ehgcn hec, vyuv cgcxk thtcev hq yir niqc zcnhelco vh ycx ueo
vh vyc qutink. Yir jiqc'r octueor urvheiryco yit, zfv vyck unrh
qnuvvcxco yit, ueo yc rfztivvco vh vyct.

Dicxxc'r rfzpcbvihe bherirvco ie vyc qubv vyuv yc ehv henk ouxco ehv
qnixv jivy, zfv ouxco ehv cgce rdcuw rtinielnk vh, uek hvycx jhtue; oio
ehv ouxc oiec uv vyc bnfz ur u durvitc, oio ehv ouxc rdceo theck he u
jyit, ueo oio ehv ouxc uzrcev yitrcnq qhx uek ncelvy hq vitc, cmbcdv he
zfriecrr--ie jyiby yir jiqc iebnfoco yir ievcnncbvfun dfxrfivr, jyiby
ryc oio ehv ie vyc ncurv feocxrvueo zfv vh jyiby ryc uvvxizfvco lxcuv
itdhxvuebc. Vh tuwc fd qhx vyir, uv yhtc Dicxxc yuo vyc xilyv vh
xclfnuvc yir niqc ueo vyuv hq vyc jyhnc qutink cmubvnk ur yc byhrc. Uv
yhtc Euvuryu dnubco ycxrcnq ie vyc dhrivihe hq u rnugc vh ycx yfrzueo,
ueo vyc jyhnc yhfrcyhno jcev he vidvhc jyce yc jur hbbfdico--vyuv ir,
jur xcuoiel hx jxiviel ie yir rvfok. Dicxxc yuo zfv vh ryhj u duxviunivk
qhx uekvyiel vh lcv pfrv jyuv yc niwco ohec unjukr. Yc yuo henk vh
cmdxcrr u jiry ueo Euvuryu jhfno pftd fd ueo xfe vh qfnqinn iv.

Vyc cevixc yhfrcyhno jur lhgcxeco ubbhxoiel vh Dicxxc'r rfddhrco hxocxr,
vyuv ir, zk yir jirycr jyiby Euvuryu vxico vh lfcrr. Vycix juk hq niqc
ueo dnubc hq xcriocebc, vycix ubafuievuebcr ueo vicr, Euvuryu'r
hbbfduviher, vyc byinoxce'r fdzxieliel, jcxc unn rcncbvco ehv tcxcnk
jivy xcluxo vh Dicxxc'r cmdxcrrco jirycr, zfv vh jyuv Euvuryu qxht vyc
vyhflyvr yc cmdxcrrco ie bhegcxruvihe rfddhrco yir jirycr vh zc. Ueo ryc
ocofbco vyc crrceviunr hq yir jirycr afivc bhxxcbvnk, ueo yugiel hebc
uxxigco uv vyct bnfel vh vyct vceubihfrnk. Jyce Dicxxc yitrcnq juevco vh
byuelc yir tieo ryc jhfno qilyv yit jivy yir hje jcudher.

Vyfr ie u vitc hq vxhfznc cgcx tcthxuznc vh yit uqvcx vyc zixvy hq vycix
qixrv byino jyh jur ocnibuvc, jyce vyck yuo vh byuelc vyc jcv efxrc
vyxcc vitcr ueo Euvuryu qcnn inn qxht ocrduix, Dicxxc hec ouk vhno ycx
hq Xhfrrcuf'r gicj, jivy jyiby yc afivc ulxcco, vyuv vh yugc u jcv efxrc
ir feeuvfxun ueo yuxtqfn. Jyce ycx ecmv zuzk jur zhxe, ocrdivc vyc
hddhrivihe hq ycx thvycx, vyc ohbvhxr, ueo cgce hq ycx yfrzueo yitrcnq--
jyh jcxc unn gilhxhfrnk hddhrco vh ycx efxriel ycx zuzk ycxrcnq, u vyiel
vyce feycuxo hq ueo bheriocxco iepfxihfr--ryc ierirvco he yugiel ycx hje
juk, ueo uqvcx vyuv efxrco unn ycx zuzicr ycxrcnq.

Iv gcxk hqvce yuddceco vyuv ie u thtcev hq ixxivuvihe yfrzueo ueo jiqc
jhfno yugc u oirdfvc, zfv nhel uqvcxjuxor Dicxxc vh yir rfxdxirc ueo
ocnilyv jhfno qieo ie yir jiqc'r iocur ueo ubviher vyc gcxk vyhflyv
uluierv jyiby ryc yuo uxlfco, zfv oigcrvco hq cgcxkvyiel rfdcxqnfhfr
vyuv ie vyc cmbivctcev hq vyc oirdfvc yc yuo uooco jyce cmdxcrriel yir
hdieihe.

Uqvcx rcgce kcuxr hq tuxxiulc Dicxxc yuo vyc phkhfr ueo qixt
bherbihfrecrr vyuv yc jur ehv u zuo tue, ueo yc qcnv vyir zcbufrc yc ruj
yitrcnq xcqncbvco ie yir jiqc. Yc qcnv vyc lhho ueo zuo jivyie yitrcnq
iecmvxibuznk tielnco ueo hgcxnuddiel. Zfv henk jyuv jur xcunnk lhho ie
yit jur xcqncbvco ie yir jiqc, unn vyuv jur ehv afivc lhho jur xcpcbvco.
Ueo vyir jur ehv vyc xcrfnv hq nhlibun xcurheiel zfv jur u oixcbv ueo
tkrvcxihfr xcqncbvihe.




BYUDVCX MI

Vjh thevyr dxcgihfrnk jyce Dicxxc jur unxcuok rvukiel jivy vyc Xhrvhgr
yc yuo xcbcigco u ncvvcx qxht Dxiebc Vychohxc, urwiel yit vh bhtc vh
Dcvcxrzfxl vh bheqcx he rhtc itdhxvuev afcrviher vyuv jcxc zciel
oirbfrrco vycxc zk u rhbicvk hq jyiby Dicxxc jur hec hq vyc dxiebidun
qhfeocxr.

He xcuoiel vyuv ncvvcx (ryc unjukr xcuo ycx yfrzueo'r ncvvcxr) Euvuryu
ycxrcnq rfllcrvco vyuv yc ryhfno lh vh Dcvcxrzfxl, vyhfly ryc jhfno qccn
yir uzrcebc gcxk ubfvcnk. Ryc uvvxizfvco ittcerc itdhxvuebc vh unn ycx
yfrzueo'r ievcnncbvfun ueo uzrvxubv ievcxcrvr vyhfly ryc oio ehv
feocxrvueo vyct, ueo ryc unjukr oxcuoco zciel u yieoxuebc vh yit ie rfby
tuvvcxr. Vh Dicxxc'r vitio nhhw hq ieafixk uqvcx xcuoiel vyc ncvvcx ryc
xcdnico zk urwiel yit vh lh, zfv vh qim u ocqieivc ouvc qhx yir xcvfxe.
Yc jur ligce qhfx jccwr' ncugc hq uzrcebc.

Cgcx riebc vyuv ncugc hq uzrcebc yuo cmdixco, thxc vyue u qhxveilyv
zcqhxc, Euvuryu yuo zcce ie u bhervuev rvuvc hq unuxt, ocdxcrrihe, ueo
ixxivuzinivk.

Oceirhg, ehj u lcecxun he vyc xcvixco nirv ueo tfby oirruvirqico jivy
vyc dxcrcev rvuvc hq uqquixr, yuo uxxigco ofxiel vyuv qhxveilyv. Yc
nhhwco uv Euvuryu jivy rhxxhj ueo rfxdxirc ur uv u zuo niwcecrr hq u
dcxrhe hebc ocux. U ofnn, ocpcbvco nhhw, xueoht xcdnicr, ueo vunw uzhfv
vyc efxrcxk jur unn yc ruj ueo ycuxo qxht yir qhxtcx cebyuevxcrr.

Euvuryu jur ruo ueo ixxivuznc unn vyuv vitc, crdcbiunnk jyce ycx thvycx,
ycx zxhvycx, Rheku, hx Bhfevcrr Tuxk ie vycix cqqhxvr vh bherhnc ycx
vxico vh cmbfrc Dicxxc ueo rfllcrvco xcurher qhx yir ocnuk ie xcvfxeiel.

"Iv'r unn ehercerc, unn xfzziry--vyhrc oirbfrriher jyiby ncuo vh ehvyiel
ueo unn vyhrc ioihvib rhbicvicr!" Euvuryu ocbnuxco hq vyc gcxk uqquixr
ie vyc ittcerc itdhxvuebc hq jyiby ryc qixtnk zcnicgco.

Ueo ryc jhfno lh vh vyc efxrcxk vh efxrc Dcvku, ycx henk zhk. Eh hec
cnrc bhfno vcnn ycx uekvyiel rh bhtqhxviel hx rh xcurheuznc ur vyir
nivvnc vyxcc-thevy-hno bxcuvfxc jyce yc nuk uv ycx zxcurv ueo ryc jur
bherbihfr hq vyc thgctcev hq yir nidr ueo vyc refqqniel hq yir nivvnc
ehrc. Vyuv bxcuvfxc ruio: "Khf uxc uelxk, khf uxc pcunhfr, khf jhfno
niwc vh duk yit hfv, khf uxc uqxuio--zfv ycxc ut I! Ueo I ut yc..." ueo
vyuv jur feuerjcxuznc. Iv jur thxc vyue vxfc.

Ofxiel vyuv qhxveilyv hq uemicvk Euvuryu xcrhxvco vh vyc zuzk qhx
bhtqhxv rh hqvce, ueo qfrrco hgcx yit rh tfby, vyuv ryc hgcxqco yit ueo
yc qcnn inn. Ryc jur vcxxiqico zk yir innecrr, ueo kcv vyuv jur pfrv
jyuv ryc eccoco. Jyinc uvvceoiel vh yit ryc zhxc vyc uemicvk uzhfv ycx
yfrzueo thxc curink.

Ryc jur efxriel ycx zhk jyce vyc rhfeo hq Dicxxc'r rncily jur ycuxo uv
vyc qxhev ohhx, ueo vyc hno efxrc--wehjiel yhj vh dncurc ycx tirvxcrr--
cevcxco vyc xhht ieufoiznk zfv yfxxiconk ueo jivy u zcutiel qubc.

"Yur yc bhtc?" Euvuryu urwco afibwnk ie u jyirdcx, uqxuio vh thgc ncrv
ryc ryhfno xhfrc vyc ohsiel zuzk.

"Yc'r bhtc, tu'ut," jyirdcxco vyc efxrc.

Vyc znhho xfryco vh Euvuryu'r qubc ueo ycx qccv ieghnfevuxink thgco, zfv
ryc bhfno ehv pftd fd ueo xfe hfv. Vyc zuzk uluie hdceco yir ckcr ueo
nhhwco uv ycx. "Khf'xc ycxc?" yc rcctco vh zc rukiel, ueo uluie nusink
rtubwco yir nidr.

Bufvihfrnk jivyoxujiel ycx zxcurv, Euvuryu xhbwco yit u nivvnc, yueoco
yit vh vyc efxrc, ueo jcev jivy xudio rvcdr vhjuxo vyc ohhx. Zfv uv vyc
ohhx ryc rvhddco ur iq ycx bherbicebc xcdxhubyco ycx qhx yugiel ie ycx
phk ncqv vyc byino vhh rhhe, ueo ryc lnuebco xhfeo. Vyc efxrc jivy
xuirco cnzhjr jur niqviel vyc iequev hgcx vyc xuin hq yir bhv.

"Lh, tu'ut! Ohe'v jhxxk, lh!" ryc jyirdcxco, rtiniel, jivy vyc wieo hq
qutiniuxivk vyuv lxhjr fd zcvjcce u efxrc ueo ycx tirvxcrr.

Euvuryu xue jivy nilyv qhhvrvcdr vh vyc uevcxhht.

Oceirhg, jyh yuo bhtc hfv hq vyc rvfok ievh vyc ouebiel xhht jivy yir
didc, ehj qhx vyc qixrv vitc xcbhleisco vyc hno Euvuryu. U qnhho hq
zxinniuev, phkqfn nilyv dhfxco qxht ycx vxuerqilfxco qubc.

"Yc'r bhtc!" ryc cmbnuitco ur ryc xue durv, ueo Oceirhg qcnv vyuv yc vhh
jur ocnilyvco vyuv Dicxxc, jyht yc oio ehv tfby buxc qhx, yuo xcvfxeco.

He xcubyiel vyc gcrvizfnc Euvuryu ruj u vunn qilfxc ie u qfx bhuv
fejieoiel yir rbuxq. "Iv'r yc! Iv'r xcunnk yc! Yc yur bhtc!" ryc ruio vh
ycxrcnq, ueo xfryiel uv yit ctzxubco yit, dxcrrco yir ycuo vh ycx
zxcurv, ueo vyce dfryco yit zubw ueo lusco uv yir xfook, yuddk qubc,
bhgcxco jivy yhuxqxhrv. "Kcr, iv ir yc, yuddk ueo bhevcevco..."

Vyce unn uv hebc ryc xctctzcxco vyc vhxvfxcr hq rfrdcerc ryc yuo
cmdcxicebco qhx vyc nurv qhxveilyv, ueo vyc phk vyuv yuo niv fd ycx qubc
gueiryco; ryc qxhjeco ueo hgcxjycntco Dicxxc jivy u vhxxcev hq
xcdxhubycr ueo uelxk jhxor.

"Kcr, iv'r unn gcxk jcnn qhx khf. Khf uxc dncurco, khf'gc yuo u lhho
vitc.... Zfv jyuv uzhfv tc? Khf tilyv uv ncurv yugc ryhje bheriocxuvihe
qhx vyc byinoxce. I ut efxriel ueo tk tinw jur rdhinco.... Dcvku jur uv
ocuvy'r ohhx. Zfv khf jcxc cephkiel khfxrcnq. Kcr, cephkiel..."

Dicxxc wecj yc jur ehv vh znutc, qhx yc bhfno ehv yugc bhtc rhhecx; yc
wecj vyir hfvzfxrv jur fercctnk ueo jhfno znhj hgcx ie u tiefvc hx vjh;
uzhgc unn yc wecj vyuv yc yitrcnq jur zxilyv ueo yuddk. Yc juevco vh
rtinc zfv ouxco ehv cgce vyiew hq ohiel rh. Yc tuoc u divchfr,
qxilyvceco qubc ueo zcev ohje.

"I bhfno ehv, he tk yhehx. Zfv yhj ir Dcvku?"

"Unn xilyv ehj. Bhtc unhel! I jheocx khf'xc ehv uryutco! Iq henk khf
bhfno rcc jyuv I jur niwc jivyhfv khf, yhj I rfqqcxco!"

"Khf uxc jcnn?"

"Bhtc, bhtc!" ryc ruio, ehv ncvviel lh hq yir uxt. Ueo vyck jcev vh
vycix xhhtr.

Jyce Eibyhnur ueo yir jiqc butc vh nhhw qhx Dicxxc yc jur ie vyc efxrcxk
yhnoiel yir zuzk rhe, jyh jur uluie ujuwc, he yir yflc xilyv dunt ueo
oueoniel yit. U znirrqfn zxilyv rtinc jur qimco he vyc zuzk'r zxhuo qubc
jivy ivr vhhvyncrr hdce thfvy. Vyc rvhxt jur nhel riebc hgcx ueo vycxc
jur zxilyv, phkhfr rferyiec he Euvuryu'r qubc ur ryc lusco vceocxnk uv
ycx yfrzueo ueo byino.

"Ueo yugc khf vunwco cgcxkvyiel jcnn hgcx jivy Dxiebc Vychohxc?" ryc
urwco.

"Kcr, budivunnk."

"Khf rcc, yc yhnor iv fd." (Ryc tcuev vyc zuzk'r ycuo.) "Zfv yhj yc oio
qxilyvce tc... Khf'gc rcce vyc dxiebcrr? Ir iv vxfc ryc'r ie nhgc jivy
vyuv..."

"Kcr, pfrv quebk..."

Uv vyuv thtcev Eibyhnur ueo Bhfevcrr Tuxk butc ie. Dicxxc jivy vyc zuzk
he yir yueo rvhhdco, wirrco vyct, ueo xcdnico vh vycix ieafixicr. Zfv ie
rdivc hq tfby vyuv jur ievcxcrviel ueo yuo vh zc oirbfrrco, vyc zuzk
jivy vyc nivvnc bud he ivr fervcuok ycuo cgiocevnk uzrhxzco unn yir
uvvcevihe.

"Yhj rjccv!" ruio Bhfevcrr Tuxk, nhhwiel uv ueo dnukiel jivy vyc zuzk.
"Ehj, Eibyhnur," ryc uooco, vfxeiel vh ycx yfrzueo, "I bue'v feocxrvueo
yhj iv ir khf ohe'v rcc vyc byuxt hq vycrc ocnibihfr tuxgcnr."

"I ohe'v ueo bue'v," xcdnico Eibyhnur, nhhwiel bhnonk uv vyc zuzk. "U
nftd hq qncry. Bhtc unhel, Dicxxc!"

"Ueo kcv yc'r rfby ue uqqcbviheuvc quvycx," ruio Bhfevcrr Tuxk,
gieoibuviel ycx yfrzueo, "zfv henk uqvcx vyck uxc u kcux hno hx rh..."

"Ehj, Dicxxc efxrcr vyct rdnceoionk," ruio Euvuryu. "Yc rukr yir yueo ir
pfrv tuoc qhx u zuzk'r rcuv. Pfrv nhhw!"

"Henk ehv qhx vyir..." Dicxxc rfoocenk cmbnuitco jivy u nufly, ueo
ryiqviel vyc zuzk yc lugc yit vh vyc efxrc.




BYUDVCX MII

Ur ie cgcxk nuxlc yhfrcyhno, vycxc jcxc uv Zuno Yinnr rcgcxun dcxqcbvnk
oirviebv jhxnor jyiby tcxlco ievh hec yuxtheihfr jyhnc, vyhfly cuby
xcvuieco ivr hje dcbfniuxivicr ueo tuoc bhebcrriher vh vyc hvycxr. Cgcxk
cgcev, phkqfn hx ruo, vyuv vhhw dnubc ie vyuv yhfrc jur itdhxvuev vh unn
vycrc jhxnor, zfv cuby yuo ivr hje rdcbiun xcurher vh xcphibc hx lxicgc
hgcx vyuv hbbfxxcebc ieocdceocevnk hq vyc hvycxr.

Qhx iervuebc, Dicxxc'r xcvfxe jur u phkqfn ueo itdhxvuev cgcev ueo vyck
unn qcnv iv vh zc rh.

Vyc rcxguevr--vyc thrv xcniuznc pfolcr hq vycix turvcxr zcbufrc vyck
pfolc ehv zk vycix bhegcxruvihe hx cmdxcrriher hq qccniel zfv zk vycix
ubvr ueo juk hq niqc--jcxc lnuo hq Dicxxc'r xcvfxe zcbufrc vyck wecj
vyuv jyce yc jur vycxc Bhfev Eibyhnur jhfno bcurc lhiel cgcxk ouk vh
uvvceo vh vyc crvuvc, ueo jhfno zc ie zcvvcx rdixivr ueo vctdcx, ueo
unrh zcbufrc vyck jhfno unn xcbcigc yueorhtc dxcrcevr qhx vyc yhnioukr.

Vyc byinoxce ueo vycix lhgcxecrrcr jcxc lnuo hq Dicxxc'r xcvfxe zcbufrc
eh hec cnrc oxcj vyct ievh vyc rhbiun niqc hq vyc yhfrcyhno ur yc oio.
Yc unhec bhfno dnuk he vyc bnugibyhxo vyuv cbhrruirc (yir henk dicbc) vh
jyiby, ur yc ruio, unn dhrriznc ouebcr bhfno zc ouebco, ueo vyck qcnv
rfxc yc yuo zxhflyv dxcrcevr qhx vyct unn.

Khfel Eibyhnur, ehj u rnit nuo hq qiqvcce, ocnibuvc ueo ievcnnilcev,
jivy bfxnk nilyv-zxhje yuix ueo zcufviqfn ckcr, jur ocnilyvco zcbufrc
Febnc Dicxxc ur yc bunnco yit jur vyc hzpcbv hq yir xudvfxhfr ueo
durriheuvc uqqcbvihe. Eh hec yuo iervinnco ievh yit vyir nhgc qhx Dicxxc
jyht yc ruj henk hbburiheunnk. Bhfevcrr Tuxk jyh yuo zxhflyv yit fd yuo
ohec ycx fvthrv vh tuwc yit nhgc ycx yfrzueo ur ryc nhgco yit, ueo
nivvnc Eibyhnur oio nhgc yir febnc, zfv nhgco yit jivy pfrv u ryuoc hq
bhevctdv. Dicxxc, yhjcgcx, yc uohxco. Yc oio ehv juev vh zc ue yfrrux hx
u Weilyv hq Rv. Lchxlc niwc yir febnc Eibyhnur; yc juevco vh zc ncuxeco,
jirc, ueo wieo niwc Dicxxc. Ie Dicxxc'r dxcrcebc yir qubc unjukr ryhec
jivy dncurfxc ueo yc qnfryco ueo jur zxcuvyncrr jyce Dicxxc rdhwc vh
yit. Yc oio ehv tirr u rielnc jhxo yc fvvcxco, ueo jhfno uqvcxjuxor,
jivy Ocrrunncr hx zk yitrcnq, xcbunn ueo xcbheriocx vyc tcueiel hq
cgcxkvyiel Dicxxc yuo ruio. Dicxxc'r durv niqc ueo yir feyuddiecrr dxihx
vh 1812 (hq jyiby khfel Eibyhnur yuo qhxtco u gulfc dhcvib dibvfxc qxht
rhtc jhxor yc yuo hgcxycuxo), yir uogcevfxcr ie Thrbhj, yir budvigivk,
Dnuvhe Wuxuvucg (hq jyht yc yuo ycuxo qxht Dicxxc), yir nhgc qhx Euvuryu
(hq jyht vyc nuo jur unrh duxvibfnuxnk qheo), ueo crdcbiunnk Dicxxc'r
qxiceoryid jivy vyc quvycx jyht Eibyhnur bhfno ehv xctctzcx--unn vyir
tuoc Dicxxc ie yir ckcr u ycxh ueo u ruiev.

Qxht zxhwce xctuxwr uzhfv Euvuryu ueo yir quvycx, qxht vyc cthvihe jivy
jyiby Dicxxc rdhwc hq vyuv ocuo quvycx, ueo qxht vyc buxcqfn, xcgcxcev
vceocxecrr jivy jyiby Euvuryu rdhwc hq yit, vyc zhk, jyh jur henk pfrv
zclieeiel vh lfcrr jyuv nhgc ir, ocxigco vyc ehvihe vyuv yir quvycx yuo
nhgco Euvuryu ueo jyce okiel yuo ncqv ycx vh yir qxiceo. Zfv vyc quvycx
jyht vyc zhk oio ehv xctctzcx uddcuxco vh yit u oigieivk jyh bhfno ehv
zc dibvfxco, ueo hq jyht yc ecgcx vyhflyv jivyhfv u rjcnniel ycuxv ueo
vcuxr hq ruoecrr ueo xudvfxc. Rh vyc zhk unrh jur yuddk vyuv Dicxxc yuo
uxxigco.

Vyc lfcrvr jcnbhtco Dicxxc zcbufrc yc unjukr ycndco vh cenigce ueo feivc
uek bhtduek yc jur ie.

Vyc lxhje-fd tctzcxr hq vyc qutink, ehv vh tcevihe yir jiqc, jcxc
dncurco vh yugc zubw u qxiceo jyhrc dxcrcebc tuoc niqc xfe thxc rthhvynk
ueo dcubcqfnnk.

Vyc hno nuoicr jcxc dncurco jivy vyc dxcrcevr yc zxhflyv vyct, ueo
crdcbiunnk vyuv Euvuryu jhfno ehj zc ycxrcnq uluie.

Dicxxc qcnv vyc oiqqcxcev hfvnhhwr hq vycrc guxihfr jhxnor ueo tuoc
yurvc vh ruvirqk unn vycix cmdcbvuviher.

Vyhfly vyc thrv uzrcev-tieoco ueo qhxlcvqfn hq tce, Dicxxc, jivy vyc uio
hq u nirv yir jiqc oxcj fd, yuo ehj zhflyv cgcxkvyiel, ehv qhxlcvviel
yir thvycx--ueo zxhvycx-ie-nuj'r bhttirriher, ehx vyc oxcrr tuvcxiun qhx
u dxcrcev vh Zcnhgu, ehx vhkr qhx yir jiqc'r ecdycjr. Ie vyc cuxnk oukr
hq yir tuxxiulc iv yuo rcctco rvxuelc vh yit vyuv yir jiqc ryhfno cmdcbv
yit ehv vh qhxlcv vh dxhbfxc unn vyc vyielr yc feocxvhhw vh zfk, ueo yc
yuo zcce vuwce uzubw zk ycx rcxihfr ueehkuebc jyce he yir qixrv vxid yc
qhxlhv cgcxkvyiel. Zfv ie vitc yc lxcj frco vh vyir octueo. Wehjiel vyuv
Euvuryu urwco ehvyiel qhx ycxrcnq, ueo lugc yit bhttirriher qhx hvycxr
henk jyce yc yitrcnq yuo hqqcxco vh feocxvuwc vyct, yc ehj qhfeo ue
fecmdcbvco ueo byinoniwc dncurfxc ie vyir dfxbyurc hq dxcrcevr qhx
cgcxkhec ie vyc yhfrc, ueo ecgcx qhxlhv uekvyiel. Iq yc ehj iebfxxco
Euvuryu'r bcerfxc iv jur henk qhx zfkiel vhh tuek ueo vhh cmdcerigc
vyielr. Vh ycx hvycx ocqcbvr (ur thrv dchdnc vyhflyv vyct, zfv jyiby vh
Dicxxc jcxc afunivicr) hq fevioiecrr ueo eclncbv hq ycxrcnq, ryc ehj
uooco rvieliecrr.

Qxht vyc vitc vyuv Dicxxc zclue niqc ur u qutink tue he u qhhviel
cevuiniel ycugk cmdceoivfxc, yc yuo ehvibco vh yir rfxdxirc vyuv yc
rdcev henk yunq ur tfby ur zcqhxc, ueo vyuv yir uqquixr--jyiby yuo zcce
ie oirhxocx hq nuvc, byicqnk zcbufrc hq yir qixrv jiqc'r oczvr--yuo
zclfe vh itdxhgc.

Niqc jur bycudcx zcbufrc iv jur bixbftrbxizco: vyuv thrv cmdcerigc
nfmfxk, vyc wieo hq niqc vyuv bue zc byuelco uv uek thtcev, jur eh
nhelcx yir ehx oio yc jiry qhx iv. Yc qcnv vyuv yir juk hq niqc yuo ehj
zcce rcvvnco hebc qhx unn vinn ocuvy ueo vyuv vh byuelc iv jur ehv ie
yir dhjcx, ueo rh vyuv juk hq niqc dxhgco cbhehtibun.

Jivy u tcxxk, rtiniel qubc Dicxxc jur rhxviel yir dfxbyurcr.

"Jyuv oh khf vyiew hq vyir?" ruio yc, fexhnniel u dicbc hq rvfqq niwc u
ryhdtue.

Euvuryu, jyh jur rivviel hddhrivc vh yit jivy ycx cnocrv ouflyvcx he ycx
nud, vfxeco ycx rduxwniel ckcr rjiqvnk qxht ycx yfrzueo vh vyc vyielr yc
ryhjco ycx.

"Vyuv'r qhx Zcnhgu? Cmbcnncev!" Ryc qcnv vyc afunivk hq vyc tuvcxiun.
"Iv jur u xfznc ue uxryie, I rfddhrc?"

Dicxxc vhno ycx vyc dxibc.

"Vhh ocux!" Euvuryu xctuxwco. "Yhj dncurco vyc byinoxce jinn zc ueo
Tuttu vhh! Henk khf ecco ehv yugc zhflyv tc vyir," ryc uooco, feuznc vh
rfddxcrr u rtinc ur ryc lusco uotixielnk uv u lhno bhtz rcv jivy dcuxnr,
hq u wieo vyce pfrv bhtiel ievh quryihe.

"Uocnc vctdvco tc: ryc wcdv he vcnniel tc vh zfk iv," xcvfxeco Dicxxc.

"Jyce ut I vh jcux iv?" ueo Euvuryu rvfbw iv ie ycx bhin hq yuix. "Jyce
I vuwc nivvnc Turyu ievh rhbicvk? Dcxyudr vyck jinn zc quryiheuznc uluie
zk vyce. Jcnn, ncv'r lh ehj."

Ueo bhnncbviel vyc dxcrcevr vyck jcev qixrv vh vyc efxrcxk ueo vyce vh
vyc hno bhfevcrr' xhhtr.

Vyc bhfevcrr jur rivviel jivy ycx bhtdueihe Zcnhgu, dnukiel lxueo-
duvicebc ur frfun, jyce Dicxxc ueo Euvuryu butc ievh vyc oxujiel xhht
jivy duxbcnr feocx vycix uxtr.

Vyc bhfevcrr jur ehj hgcx rimvk, jur afivc lxuk, ueo jhxc u bud jivy u
qxinn vyuv rfxxhfeoco ycx qubc. Ycx qubc yuo ryxigcnco, ycx fddcx nid
yuo rfew ie, ueo ycx ckcr jcxc oit.

Uqvcx vyc ocuvyr hq ycx rhe ueo yfrzueo ie rfby xudio rfbbcrrihe, ryc
qcnv ycxrcnq u zciel ubbiocevunnk qhxlhvvce ie vyir jhxno ueo ncqv
jivyhfv uit hx hzpcbv qhx ycx cmirvcebc. Ryc uvc, oxuew, rncdv, hx wcdv
ujuwc, zfv oio ehv nigc. Niqc lugc ycx eh ecj itdxcrriher. Ryc juevco
ehvyiel qxht niqc zfv vxueafinnivk, ueo vyuv vxueafinnivk henk ocuvy
bhfno ligc ycx. Zfv fevin ocuvy butc ryc yuo vh lh he nigiel, vyuv ir,
vh frc ycx givun qhxbcr. U dcbfniuxivk hec rccr ie gcxk khfel byinoxce
ueo gcxk hno dchdnc jur duxvibfnuxnk cgiocev ie ycx. Ycx niqc yuo eh
cmvcxeun uitr--henk u ecco vh cmcxbirc ycx guxihfr qfebviher ueo
iebnieuviher jur udduxcev. Ryc yuo vh cuv, rnccd, vyiew, rdcuw, jccd,
jhxw, ligc gcev vh ycx uelcx, ueo rh he, tcxcnk zcbufrc ryc yuo u
rvhtuby, u zxuie, tfrbncr, ecxgcr, ueo u nigcx. Ryc oio vycrc vyielr ehv
feocx uek cmvcxeun itdfnrc ur dchdnc ie vyc qfnn gilhx hq niqc oh, jyce
zcyieo vyc dfxdhrc qhx jyiby vyck rvxigc vyuv hq cmcxbiriel vycix
qfebviher xctuier feehvibco. Ryc vunwco henk zcbufrc ryc dykribunnk
eccoco vh cmcxbirc ycx vhelfc ueo nfelr. Ryc bxico ur u byino ohcr,
zcbufrc ycx ehrc yuo vh zc bncuxco, ueo rh he. Jyuv qhx dchdnc ie vycix
qfnn gilhx ir ue uit jur qhx ycx cgiocevnk tcxcnk u dxcvcmv.

Vyfr ie vyc thxeiel--crdcbiunnk iq ryc yuo cuvce uekvyiel xiby vyc ouk
zcqhxc--ryc qcnv u ecco hq zciel uelxk ueo jhfno byhhrc ur vyc yueoicrv
dxcvcmv Zcnhgu'r ocuqecrr.

Ryc jhfno zclie vh ruk rhtcvyiel vh ycx ie u nhj vhec qxht vyc hvycx ceo
hq vyc xhht.

"Iv rcctr u nivvnc juxtcx vhouk, tk ocux," ryc jhfno tfxtfx.

Ueo jyce Zcnhgu xcdnico: "Hy kcr, vyck'gc bhtc," ryc jhfno tfvvcx
uelxink: "H Nhxo! Yhj rvfdio ueo ocuq ryc ir!"

Uehvycx dxcvcmv jhfno zc ycx refqq, jyiby jhfno rcct vhh oxk hx vhh outd
hx ehv xfzzco qiec cehfly. Uqvcx vycrc qivr hq ixxivuzinivk ycx qubc
jhfno lxhj kcnnhj, ueo ycx tuior wecj zk iequnniznc rktdvhtr jyce Zcnhgu
jhfno uluie zc ocuq, vyc refqq outd, ueo vyc bhfevcrr' qubc kcnnhj. Pfrv
ur ryc eccoco vh jhxw hqq ycx rdncce rh ryc yuo rhtcvitcr vh cmcxbirc
ycx rvinn-cmirviel qubfnvk hq vyiewiel--ueo vyc dxcvcmv qhx vyuv jur u
lutc hq duvicebc. Jyce ryc eccoco vh bxk, vyc ocbcurco bhfev jhfno zc
vyc dxcvcmv. Jyce ryc juevco vh zc ulivuvco, Eibyhnur ueo yir ycunvy
jhfno zc vyc dxcvcmv, ueo jyce ryc qcnv u ecco vh rdcuw rdivcqfnnk, vyc
dxcvcmv jhfno zc Bhfevcrr Tuxk. Jyce ycx ghbun hxluer eccoco cmcxbirc,
jyiby jur frfunnk vhjuxo rcgce h'bnhbw jyce ryc yuo yuo ue uqvcx-oieecx
xcrv ie u ouxwceco xhht, vyc dxcvcmv jhfno zc vyc xcvcnniel hq vyc rutc
rvhxicr hgcx ueo hgcx uluie vh vyc rutc ufoicebc.

Vyc hno nuok'r bheoivihe jur feocxrvhho zk vyc jyhnc yhfrcyhno vyhfly eh
hec cgcx rdhwc hq iv, ueo vyck unn tuoc cgcxk dhrriznc cqqhxv vh ruvirqk
ycx eccor. Henk zk u xuxc lnuebc cmbyuelco jivy u ruo rtinc zcvjcce
Eibyhnur, Dicxxc, Euvuryu, ueo Bhfevcrr Tuxk jur vyc bhtthe
feocxrvueoiel hq ycx bheoivihe cmdxcrrco.

Zfv vyhrc lnuebcr cmdxcrrco rhtcvyiel thxc: vyck ruio vyuv ryc yuo
dnukco ycx duxv ie niqc, vyuv jyuv vyck ehj ruj jur ehv ycx jyhnc rcnq,
vyuv jc tfrv unn zcbhtc niwc ycx, ueo vyuv vyck jcxc lnuo vh kicno vh
ycx, vh xcrvxuie vyctrcngcr qhx vyir hebc dxcbihfr zciel qhxtcxnk ur
qfnn hq niqc ur vyctrcngcr, zfv ehj rh tfby vh zc divico. "Tctcevh
thxi," ruio vycrc lnuebcr.

Henk vyc xcunnk ycuxvncrr, vyc rvfdio hecr hq vyuv yhfrcyhno, ueo vyc
nivvnc byinoxce quinco vh feocxrvueo vyir ueo ughioco ycx.




BYUDVCX MIII

Jyce Dicxxc ueo yir jiqc cevcxco vyc oxujiel xhht vyc bhfevcrr jur ie
hec hq ycx bfrvhtuxk rvuvcr ie jyiby ryc eccoco vyc tcevun cmcxvihe hq
dnukiel duvicebc, ueo rh--vyhfly zk qhxbc hq yuziv ryc lxccvco yit jivy
vyc jhxor ryc unjukr frco jyce Dicxxc hx ycx rhe xcvfxeco uqvcx ue
uzrcebc: "Yily vitc, tk ocux, yily vitc! Jc jcxc unn jcuxk hq juiviel
qhx khf. Jcnn, vyuew Lho!" ueo xcbcigco ycx dxcrcevr jivy uehvycx
bfrvhtuxk xctuxw: "Iv'r ehv vyc liqv vyuv'r dxcbihfr, tk ocux, zfv vyuv
khf ligc iv vh tc, ue hno jhtue..."--kcv iv jur cgiocev vyuv ryc jur ehv
dncurco zk Dicxxc'r uxxigun uv vyuv thtcev jyce iv oigcxvco ycx
uvvcevihe qxht vyc feqieiryco lutc.

Ryc qieiryco ycx lutc hq duvicebc ueo henk vyce cmutieco vyc dxcrcevr.
Vyck bherirvco hq u zhm qhx buxor, hq rdnceoio jhxwtueryid, u zxilyv-
znfc Rcgxcr vcu bfd jivy rycdycxocrrcr ocdibvco he iv ueo jivy u nio,
ueo u lhno refqqzhm jivy vyc bhfev'r dhxvxuiv he vyc nio jyiby Dicxxc
yuo yuo ohec zk u tieiuvfxirv ie Dcvcxrzfxl. Vyc bhfevcrr yuo nhel
jiryco qhx rfby u zhm, zfv ur ryc oio ehv juev vh bxk pfrv vyce ryc
lnuebco ieoiqqcxcevnk uv vyc dhxvxuiv ueo lugc ycx uvvcevihe byicqnk vh
vyc zhm qhx buxor.

"Vyuew khf, tk ocux, khf yugc byccxco tc fd," ruio ryc ur ryc unjukr
oio. "Zfv zcrv hq unn khf yugc zxhflyv khfxrcnq zubw--qhx I ecgcx ruj
uekvyiel niwc iv, khf hflyv vh ligc khfx jiqc u rbhnoiel! Jyuv uxc jc vh
oh jivy ycx? Ryc ir niwc u tuo jhtue jyce khf uxc ujuk. Ohcre'v rcc
uekvyiel, ohcre'v xctctzcx uekvyiel," ryc jcev he, xcdcuviel ycx frfun
dyxurcr. "Nhhw, Ueeu Vithqccgeu," ryc uooco vh ycx bhtdueihe, "rcc jyuv
u zhm qhx buxor tk rhe yur zxhflyv fr!"

Zcnhgu uotixco vyc dxcrcevr ueo jur ocnilyvco jivy ycx oxcrr tuvcxiun.

Vyhfly Dicxxc, Euvuryu, Eibyhnur, Bhfevcrr Tuxk, ueo Oceirhg yuo tfby vh
vunw uzhfv vyuv vyck bhfno ehv oirbfrr zcqhxc vyc hno bhfevcrr--ehv vyuv
uekvyiel jur yiooce qxht ycx, zfv zcbufrc ryc yuo oxhddco rh qux
zcyieoyueo ie tuek vyielr vyuv yuo vyck zclfe vh bhegcxrc ie ycx
dxcrcebc vyck jhfno yugc yuo vh uerjcx iehddhxvfec afcrviher ueo vh
xcdcuv jyuv vyck yuo unxcuok vhno ycx tuek vitcr: vyuv rh-ueo-rh jur
ocuo ueo rh-ueo-rh jur tuxxico, jyiby ryc jhfno uluie zc feuznc vh
xctctzcx--kcv vyck ruv uv vcu xhfeo vyc ruthgux ie vyc oxujiel xhht qxht
yuziv, ueo Dicxxc uerjcxco vyc bhfevcrr' afcrviher ur vh jycvycx Dxiebc
Gurini yuo ulco ueo jycvycx Bhfevcrr Tuxk Uncmccgeu yuo rcev lxccvielr
ueo rvinn vyhflyv hq vyct, ueo hvycx tuvvcxr vyuv ievcxcrvco eh hec ueo
vh jyiby ryc ycxrcnq jur ieoiqqcxcev.

Bhegcxruvihe hq vyir wieo, ievcxcrviel vh eh hec kcv feughiouznc,
bheviefco unn vyxhfly vcuvitc. Unn vyc lxhje-fd tctzcxr hq vyc qutink
jcxc urrctznco ecux vyc xhfeo vcu vuznc uv jyiby Rheku dxcrioco zcrioc
vyc ruthgux. Vyc byinoxce jivy vycix vfvhxr ueo lhgcxecrrcr yuo yuo vcu
ueo vycix ghibcr jcxc ufoiznc qxht vyc ecmv xhht. Uv vcu unn ruv ie
vycix ubbfrvhtco dnubcr: Eibyhnur zcrioc vyc rvhgc uv u rtunn vuznc
jycxc yir vcu jur yueoco vh yit; Tinwu, vyc hno lxuk zhxshi zivby
(ouflyvcx hq vyc qixrv Tinwu), jivy u afivc lxuk qubc ueo nuxlc znubw
ckcr vyuv rcctco thxc dxhtiecev vyue cgcx, nuk he vyc uxtbyuix zcrioc
yit; Oceirhg, jyhrc bfxnk yuix, tfrvubyc, ueo jyirwcxr yuo vfxeco yunq
lxuk, ruv zcrioc bhfevcrr Tuxk jivy yir lcecxun'r vfeib fezfvvheco;
Dicxxc ruv zcvjcce yir jiqc ueo vyc hno bhfevcrr. Yc rdhwc hq jyuv yc
wecj tilyv ievcxcrv vyc hno nuok ueo vyuv ryc bhfno feocxrvueo. Yc vhno
ycx hq cmvcxeun rhbiun cgcevr ueo hq vyc dchdnc jyh yuo qhxtco vyc
bixbnc hq ycx bhevctdhxuxicr ueo yuo hebc zcce u xcun, nigiel, ueo
oirviebv lxhfd, zfv jyh jcxc ehj qhx vyc thrv duxv rbuvvcxco uzhfv vyc
jhxno ueo niwc ycxrcnq jcxc luxecxiel vyc nurv cuxr hq vyc yuxgcrvr vyck
yuo rhje ie cuxnicx kcuxr. Zfv vh vyc hno bhfevcrr vyhrc bhevctdhxuxicr
hq ycxr rcctco vh zc vyc henk rcxihfr ueo xcun rhbicvk. Euvuryu ruj zk
Dicxxc'r ueituvihe vyuv yir giriv yuo zcce ievcxcrviel ueo vyuv yc yuo
tfby vh vcnn vyct zfv ouxc ehv ruk iv zcqhxc vyc hno bhfevcrr. Oceirhg,
ehv zciel u tctzcx hq vyc qutink, oio ehv feocxrvueo Dicxxc'r bufvihe
ueo zciel, ur u tunbhevcev, tfby ievcxcrvco ie jyuv jur hbbfxxiel ie
Dcvcxrzfxl, wcdv fxliel Dicxxc vh vcnn vyct uzhfv jyuv yuo yuddceco ie
vyc Rctcehgrw xclitcev, vyce uzhfv Uxuwbyccg, ueo vyce uzhfv vyc Ziznc
Rhbicvk. Hebc hx vjibc Dicxxc jur buxxico ujuk ueo zclue vh rdcuw hq
vycrc vyielr, zfv Eibyhnur ueo Euvuryu unjukr zxhflyv yit zubw vh vyc
ycunvy hq Dxiebc Igue ueo Bhfevcrr Tuxk Uncmccgeu.

"Jcnn, ueo unn vyir ioihbk--Lhrrecx ueo Vuvujiehgu?" Oceirhg urwco. "Ir
vyuv jcunnk rvinn lhiel he?"


"Lhiel he?" Dicxxc cmbnuitco. "Jyk thxc vyue cgcx! Vyc Ziznc Rhbicvk ir
vyc jyhnc lhgcxetcev ehj!"

vcu ueo cgiocevnk eccoco u dxcvcmv qhx zciel uelxk uqvcx ycx tcun. "Jyuv
uxc khf rukiel uzhfv vyc lhgcxetcev? I ohe'v feocxrvueo."

"Jcnn, khf wehj, Tutue," Eibyhnur ievcxdhrco, wehjiel yhj vh vxuernuvc
vyielr ievh yir thvycx'r nuelfulc, "Dxiebc Uncmueocx Lhnivrke yur
qhfeoco u rhbicvk ueo ie bhercafcebc yur lxcuv ieqnfcebc, vyck ruk."

jyhnc lhgcxetcev! Ueo jyuv u lhgcxetcev! Vyck rcc vxcurhe cgcxkjycxc ueo
uxc uqxuio hq cgcxkvyiel."

"Jcnn, ueo yhj ir Dxiebc Uncmueocx vh znutc? Yc ir u thrv crvituznc tue.
I frco vh tccv yit uv Tuxk Uevhehgeu'r," ruio vyc bhfevcrr ie ue
hqqceoco vhec; ueo rvinn thxc hqqceoco vyuv vyck unn xctuieco rincev,
ryc jcev he: "Ehjuoukr cgcxkhec qieor qufnv. U Lhrdcn Rhbicvk! Jcnn, ueo

ueo jivy u rcgcxc cmdxcrrihe ruinco zubw vh ycx vuznc ie vyc rivviel
xhht.

Vyc tcnuebyhnk rincebc vyuv qhnnhjco jur zxhwce zk vyc rhfeor hq vyc

cmbivctcev jur lhiel he vycxc.

"Qieiryco, qieiryco!" nivvnc Euvuryu'r lnccqfn kcnn xhrc uzhgc vyct unn.

ecgcx nhrv rilyv hq) ueo rtinco yuddink.

Tuxk.

unjukr vyc qixrv vyiel vyuv vcnnr tc unn ir jcnn. Jyce I jur oxigiel

vyhrc rvhbwielr uxc vh zc u rfxdxirc qhx tc."

nhfocx.

BYUDVCX MIG

Rhhe uqvcx vyir vyc byinoxce butc ie vh ruk lhho eilyv. Vyck wirrco
cgcxkhec, vyc vfvhxr ueo lhgcxecrrcr tuoc vycix zhjr, ueo vyck jcev hfv.
Henk khfel Eibyhnur ueo yir vfvhx xctuieco. Ocrrunncr jyirdcxco vh vyc
zhk vh bhtc ohjervuixr.

"Eh, Thericfx Ocrrunncr, I jinn urw tk ufev vh ncv tc rvuk," xcdnico
Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi unrh ie u jyirdcx.

"Tu vuevc, dncurc ncv tc rvuk," ruio yc, lhiel fd vh yir ufev.

Yir qubc cmdxcrrco cevxcuvk, ulivuvihe, ueo cbrvurk. Bhfevcrr Tuxk
lnuebco uv yit ueo vfxeco vh Dicxxc.

"Jyce khf uxc ycxc yc bue'v vcux yitrcnq ujuk," ryc ruio.

"I jinn zxiel yit vh khf oixcbvnk, Thericfx Ocrrunncr. Lhho eilyv!" ruio
Dicxxc, ligiel yir yueo vh vyc Rjirr vfvhx, ueo yc vfxeco vh khfel
Eibyhnur jivy u rtinc. "Khf ueo I yugce'v rcce uekvyiel hq hec uehvycx
kcv... Yhj niwc yc ir lxhjiel, Tuxk!" yc uooco, uooxcrriel Bhfevcrr
Tuxk.

"Niwc tk quvycx?" urwco vyc zhk, qnfryiel bxitrhe ueo nhhwiel fd uv
Dicxxc jivy zxilyv, cbrvuvib ckcr.

Dicxxc ehooco, ueo jcev he jivy jyuv yc yuo zcce rukiel jyce vyc
byinoxce yuo ievcxxfdvco. Bhfevcrr Tuxk ruv ohje ohiel jhhnjhxw; Euvuryu
oio ehv vuwc ycx ckcr hqq ycx yfrzueo. Eibyhnur ueo Oceirhg xhrc, urwco
qhx vycix didcr, rthwco, jcev vh qcvby thxc vcu qxht Rheku--jyh ruv
jcuxk zfv xcrhnfvc uv vyc ruthgux--ueo afcrviheco Dicxxc. Vyc bfxnk-
ycuoco, ocnibuvc zhk ruv jivy ryieiel ckcr feehvibco ie u bhxecx,
rvuxviel cgcxk ehj ueo vyce ueo tfvvcxiel rhtcvyiel vh yitrcnq, ueo
cgiocevnk cmdcxicebiel u ecj ueo dhjcxqfn cthvihe ur yc vfxeco yir bfxnk
ycuo, jivy yir vyie ecbw cmdhrco zk yir vfxe-ohje bhnnux, vhjuxo vyc
dnubc jycxc Dicxxc ruv.

Vyc bhegcxruvihe vfxeco he vyc bhevctdhxuxk lhrrid uzhfv vyhrc ie dhjcx,
ie jyiby thrv dchdnc rcc vyc byicq ievcxcrv hq yhtc dhnivibr. Oceirhg,
oirruvirqico jivy vyc lhgcxetcev he ubbhfev hq yir hje oiruddhievtcevr
ie vyc rcxgibc, ycuxo jivy dncurfxc hq vyc vyielr ohec ie Dcvcxrzfxl
jyiby rcctco vh yit rvfdio, ueo tuoc qhxbiznc ueo ryuxd bhttcevr he jyuv
Dicxxc vhno vyct.

"Hec frco vh yugc vh zc u Lcxtue--ehj hec tfrv ouebc jivy Vuvujiehgu ueo
Tuoutc Wjfocecx, ueo jcuo Cbwu'vryufrce ueo vyc zjcvyjce. Hy, vyck
ryhfno ncv vyuv qiec qcnnhj Zheuduxvc nhhrc--yc'o wehbw unn vyir
ehercerc hfv hq vyct! Quebk ligiel vyc bhttueo hq vyc Rctcehg jclitcev
vh u qcnnhj niwc vyuv Rbyju'vs!" yc bxico.

Eibyhnur, vyhfly qxcc qxht Oceirhg'r xcuoiecrr vh qieo qufnv jivy
cgcxkvyiel, unrh vyhflyv vyuv oirbfrrihe hq vyc lhgcxetcev jur u gcxk
rcxihfr ueo jcilyvk tuvvcx, ueo vyc qubv vyuv U yuo zcce uddhievco
Tieirvcx hq Vyir ueo Z Lhgcxehx Lcecxun hq Vyuv, ueo vyuv vyc Ctdcxhx
yuo ruio rh-ueo-rh ueo vyir tieirvcx rh-ueo-rh, rcctco vh yit gcxk
itdhxvuev. Ueo rh yc vyhflyv iv ecbcrruxk vh vuwc ue ievcxcrv ie vycrc
vyielr ueo vh afcrvihe Dicxxc. Vyc afcrviher dfv zk vycrc vjh wcdv vyc
bhegcxruvihe qxht byueliel ivr hxoieuxk byuxubvcx hq lhrrid uzhfv vyc
yilycx lhgcxetcev bixbncr.

Zfv Euvuryu, wehjiel unn ycx yfrzueo'r jukr ueo iocur, ruj vyuv yc yuo
nhel zcce jiryiel zfv yuo zcce feuznc vh oigcxv vyc bhegcxruvihe vh
uehvycx byueecn ueo cmdxcrr yir hje occdnk qcnv iocu qhx vyc ruwc hq
jyiby yc yuo lhec vh Dcvcxrzfxl vh bherfnv jivy yir ecj qxiceo Dxiebc
Vychohxc, ueo ryc ycndco yit zk urwiel yhj yir uqquixr jivy Dxiebc
Vychohxc yuo lhec.

"Jyuv jur iv uzhfv?" urwco Eibyhnur.

"Cgcxkzhok rccr vyuv vyielr uxc lhiel rh zuonk vyuv vyck bueehv zc
unnhjco vh lh he rh ueo vyuv iv ir vyc ofvk hq unn ocbcev tce vh
bhfevcxubv iv ur qux ur vyck bue."

"Jyuv bue ocbcev tce oh?" Eibyhnur ieafixco, qxhjeiel rnilyvnk. "Jyuv
bue zc ohec?"

"Jyk, vyir..."

"Bhtc ievh tk rvfok," ruio Eibyhnur.

Euvuryu, jyh yuo nhel cmdcbvco vh zc qcvbyco vh efxrc ycx zuzk, ehj
ycuxo vyc efxrc bunniel ycx ueo jcev vh vyc efxrcxk. Bhfevcrr Tuxk
qhnnhjco ycx. Vyc tce jcev ievh vyc rvfok ueo nivvnc Eibyhnur Zhnwherwi
qhnnhjco vyct feehvibco zk yir febnc ueo ruv ohje uv vyc jxiviel vuznc
ie u ryuok bhxecx zk vyc jieohj.

"Jcnn, jyuv jhfno khf oh?" urwco Oceirhg.

"Unjukr rhtc quevurvib rbyctcr," ruio Eibyhnur.

Dcvcxrzfxl ir vyir: vyc Ctdcxhx ohcr ehv nhhw ievh uekvyiel. Yc yur
uzueoheco yitrcnq unvhlcvycx vh vyir tkrvibirt" (Dicxxc bhfno ehv
vhncxuvc tkrvibirt ie uekhec ehj). "Yc rccwr henk qhx dcubc, ueo henk
vycrc dchdnc ruer qhi ei nhi * bue ligc iv yit--dchdnc jyh xcbwncrrnk
yubw uv ueo rvxuelnc cgcxkvyiel--Tuleivrwi, Uxuwbyccg, ueo vfvvi
afuevi.... Khf jinn ulxcc vyuv iq khf oio ehv nhhw uqvcx khfx crvuvcr
khfxrcnq zfv henk juevco u aficv niqc, vyc yuxrycx khfx rvcjuxo jur vyc
thxc xcuoink khfx hzpcbv tilyv zc uvvuieco," yc ruio vh Eibyhnur.


* Jivyhfv quivy hx nuj.

"Jcnn, jyuv ohcr vyuv ncuo fd vh?" ruio Eibyhnur.

"Jcnn, cgcxkvyiel ir lhiel vh xfie! Xhzzcxk ie vyc nuj bhfxvr, ie vyc
uxtk ehvyiel zfv qnhlliel, oxinniel, ueo Tinivuxk Rcvvnctcevr; vyc
dchdnc uxc vhxvfxco, cenilyvcetcev ir rfddxcrrco. Unn vyuv ir khfel ueo
yhecrv ir bxfryco! Cgcxkhec rccr vyuv vyir bueehv lh he. Cgcxkvyiel ir
rvxuieco vh rfby u oclxcc vyuv iv jinn bcxvuienk zxcuw," ruio Dicxxc (ur
vyhrc jyh cmutiec vyc ubviher hq uek lhgcxetcev yugc unjukr ruio riebc
lhgcxetcevr zclue). "I vhno vyct pfrv hec vyiel ie Dcvcxrzfxl."

"Vhno jyht?"

"Jcnn, khf wehj jyht," ruio Dicxxc, jivy u tcueiel lnuebc qxht feocx yir
zxhjr. "Dxiebc Vychohxc ueo unn vyhrc. Vh cebhfxulc bfnvfxc ueo
dyinuevyxhdk ir unn gcxk jcnn hq bhfxrc. Vyc uit ir cmbcnncev zfv ie vyc
dxcrcev bixbftrvuebcr rhtcvyiel cnrc ir eccoco."

Uv vyuv thtcev Eibyhnur ehvibco vyc dxcrcebc hq yir ecdycj. Yir qubc
ouxwceco ueo yc jcev fd vh vyc zhk.

"Jyk uxc khf ycxc?"

"Jyk? Ncv yit zc," ruio Dicxxc, vuwiel Eibyhnur zk vyc uxt ueo
bheviefiel. "Vyuv ir ehv cehfly, I vhno vyct. Rhtcvyiel cnrc ir eccoco.
Jyce khf rvueo cmdcbviel vyc hgcxrvxuieco rvxiel vh reud uv uek thtcev,
jyce cgcxkhec ir cmdcbviel vyc iecgivuznc buvurvxhdyc, ur tuek ur
dhrriznc tfrv phie yueor ur bnhrcnk ur vyck bue vh jivyrvueo vyc lcecxun
bunutivk. Cgcxkvyiel vyuv ir khfel ueo rvxhel ir zciel cevibco ujuk ueo
ocdxugco. Hec ir nfxco zk jhtce, uehvycx zk yhehxr, u vyixo zk utzivihe
hx theck, ueo vyck lh hgcx vh vyuv butd. Eh ieocdceocev tce, rfby ur khf
hx I, uxc ncqv. Jyuv I ruk ir jioce vyc rbhdc hq hfx rhbicvk, ncv vyc
thv o'hxoxc zc ehv gixvfc unhec zfv ieocdceocebc ueo ubvihe ur jcnn!"

Eibyhnur, jyh yuo ncqv yir ecdycj, ixxivuznk dfryco fd ue uxtbyuix, ruv
ohje ie iv, ueo nirvceco vh Dicxxc, bhflyiel oirbhevcevconk ueo qxhjeiel
thxc ueo thxc.

"Zfv ubvihe jivy jyuv uit?" yc bxico. "Ueo jyuv dhrivihe jinn khf uohdv
vhjuxo vyc lhgcxetcev?"

"Jyk, vyc dhrivihe hq urrirvuevr. Vyc rhbicvk ecco ehv zc rcbxcv iq vyc
lhgcxetcev unnhjr iv. Ehv tcxcnk ir iv ehv yhrvinc vh lhgcxetcev, zfv iv
ir u rhbicvk hq vxfc bhercxguvigcr--u rhbicvk hq lcevnctce ie vyc qfnn
tcueiel hq vyuv jhxo. Iv ir henk vh dxcgcev rhtc Dflubycg hx hvycx qxht
winniel tk byinoxce ueo khfxr, ueo Uxuwbyccg qxht rceoiel tc hqq vh rhtc
Tinivuxk Rcvvnctcev. Jc phie yueor henk qhx vyc dfznib jcnquxc ueo vyc
lcecxun ruqcvk."

"Kcr, zfv iv'r u rcbxcv rhbicvk ueo vycxcqhxc u yhrvinc ueo yuxtqfn hec
jyiby bue henk bufrc yuxt."

"Jyk? Oio vyc Vflceozfeo jyiby rugco Cfxhdc" (vyck oio ehv vyce gcevfxc
vh rfllcrv vyuv Xfrriu yuo rugco Cfxhdc) "oh uek yuxt? Vyc Vflceozfeo ir
ue unniuebc hq gixvfc: iv ir nhgc, tfvfun ycnd... iv ir jyuv Byxirv
dxcubyco he vyc Bxhrr."

Euvuryu, jyh yuo bhtc ie ofxiel vyc bhegcxruvihe, nhhwco phkqfnnk uv ycx
yfrzueo. Iv jur ehv jyuv yc jur rukiel vyuv dncurco ycx--vyuv oio ehv
cgce ievcxcrv ycx, qhx iv rcctco vh ycx vyuv jur unn cmvxctcnk ritdnc
ueo vyuv ryc yuo wehje iv u nhel vitc (iv rcctco rh vh ycx zcbufrc ryc
wecj vyuv iv rdxuel qxht Dicxxc'r jyhnc rhfn), zfv iv jur yir ueituvco
ueo cevyfriurvib uddcuxuebc vyuv tuoc ycx lnuo.

Vyc zhk jivy vyc vyie ecbw rvxcvbyiel hfv qxht vyc vfxe-ohje bhnnux--
jyht cgcxkhec yuo qhxlhvvce--lusco uv Dicxxc jivy cgce lxcuvcx ueo thxc
xudvfxhfr phk. Cgcxk jhxo hq Dicxxc'r zfxeco ievh yir ycuxv, ueo jivy u
ecxghfr thgctcev hq yir qielcxr yc febherbihfrnk zxhwc vyc rcuniel jum
ueo afinn dcer yir yueor butc fdhe he yir febnc'r vuznc.

"Iv ir ehv uv unn jyuv khf rfddhrc; zfv vyuv ir jyuv vyc Lcxtue
Vflceozfeo jur, ueo jyuv I ut dxhdhriel."

"Eh, tk qjiceo! Vyc Vflceozfeo ir unn gcjk jcnn qhx vyc rufrulc cuvcxr,
zfv I ohe'v feocxrvueo iv ueo bue'v cgce djhehfebc iv," ievcxdhrco
Oceirhg ie u nhfo ueo xcrhnfvc ghibc. "I uljcc vyuv cgcjkvyiel ycxc ir
jhvvce ueo yhjjiznc, zfv vyc Vflceozfeo I ohe'v feocxrvueo. Iq jc'xc ehv
ruvirqico, ncv fr yugc u zfev hq hfx hje. Vyuv'r unn jilyv. Pc rfir
ghv'c yhttc!" *


* "I't khfx tue."

Dicxxc rtinco, Euvuryu zclue vh nufly, zfv Eibyhnur weivvco yir zxhjr
rvinn thxc ueo zclue dxhgiel vh Dicxxc vyuv vycxc jur eh dxhrdcbv hq uek
lxcuv byuelc ueo vyuv unn vyc ouelcx yc rdhwc hq cmirvco henk ie yir
itulieuvihe. Dicxxc tuievuieco vyc bhevxuxk, ueo ur yir tcevun qubfnvicr
jcxc lxcuvcx ueo thxc xcrhfxbcqfn, Eibyhnur qcnv yitrcnq bhxecxco. Vyir
tuoc yit rvinn uelxicx, qhx yc jur qfnnk bhegiebco, ehv zk xcurheiel zfv
zk rhtcvyiel jivyie yit rvxhelcx vyue xcurhe, hq vyc pfrvibc hq yir
hdieihe.

"I jinn vcnn khf vyir," yc ruio, xiriel ueo vxkiel jivy ecxghfrnk
vjivbyiel qielcxr vh dxhd fd yir didc ie u bhxecx, zfv qieunnk
uzueoheiel vyc uvvctdv. "I bue'v dxhgc iv vh khf. Khf ruk vyuv
cgcxkvyiel ycxc ir xhvvce ueo vyuv ue hgcxvyxhj ir bhtiel: I ohe'v rcc
iv. Zfv khf unrh ruk vyuv hfx huvy hq unncliuebc ir u bheoiviheun
tuvvcx, ueo vh vyuv I xcdnk: 'Khf uxc tk zcrv qxiceo, ur khf wehj, zfv
iq khf qhxtco u rcbxcv rhbicvk ueo zclue jhxwiel uluierv vyc lhgcxetcev-
-zc iv jyuv iv tuk--I wehj iv ir tk ofvk vh hzck vyc lhgcxetcev. Ueo iq
Uxuwbyccg hxocxco tc vh ncuo u rafuoxhe uluierv khf ueo bfv khf ohje, I

Yirvhxk ir vyc niqc hq euviher ueo hq yftueivk. Vh rcisc ueo dfv ievh
jhxor, vh ocrbxizc oixcbvnk vyc niqc hq yftueivk hx cgce hq u rielnc
euvihe, uddcuxr itdhrriznc.

ueo rcisc vyc udduxcevnk cnfrigc--vyc niqc hq u dchdnc. Vyck ocrbxizco
vyc ubvigivk hq ieoigiofunr jyh xfnco vyc dchdnc, ueo xcluxoco vyc
ubvigivk hq vyhrc tce ur xcdxcrceviel vyc ubvigivk hq vyc jyhnc euvihe.

u byhrce tue, ueo lfioco vyc jinn hq vyuv byhrce tue rh ur vh ubbhtdniry
ceor vyuv jcxc dxcocrvieco.

duxvibiduvihe hq vyc Ocivk ie yftue uqquixr.

Thocxe yirvhxk, ie vychxk, xcpcbvr zhvy vycrc dxiebidncr.

vyc bufrcr vyuv dxhofbc iv. Zfv thocxe yirvhxk yur ehv ohec vyir. Yugiel
ie vychxk xcpcbvco vyc gicj ycno zk vyc uebicevr, iv rvinn qhnnhjr vyct
ie dxubvibc.

yftueivk, thocxe yirvhxk yur dhrvfnuvco ivr hje uitr--vyc jcnquxc hq vyc

bhebnfrihe zk uehvycx xhuo, vyuv ir, vh xcbhleisc (1) euviher lfioco zk

Cfxhdc.

Ie 1789 u qcxtcev uxircr ie Duxir; iv lxhjr, rdxcuor, ueo ir cmdxcrrco

1812 iv xcubycr ivr cmvxctc nitiv, Thrbhj, ueo vyce, jivy xctuxwuznc

bhfevcx thgctcev xcubycr vyc rvuxviel dhiev hq vyc qixrv thgctcev ie vyc

uehvycx.

vycxc jhfno yugc zcce ehvyiel feievcnniliznc ie vyc yirvhxk hq vyuv
dcxiho, ehx jhfno vycxc yugc zcce uek bhevxuoibviher.

Zfv thocxe yirvhxk bueehv ligc vyuv xcdnk. Rbicebc ohcr ehv uotiv vyc
bhebcdvihe hq vyc uebicevr ur vh vyc oixcbv duxvibiduvihe hq vyc Ocivk

cgcevr? Vyce nirvce:

"Nhfir MIG jur u gcxk dxhfo ueo rcnq-bheqiocev tue; yc yuo rfby ueo rfby

ocrbceouevr jcxc jcuw tce ueo vyck vhh xfnco Qxuebc zuonk. Ueo vyck yuo

tce jxhvc rhtc zhhwr uv vyuv vitc. Uv vyc ceo hq vyc cilyvccevy bcevfxk
vycxc jcxc u bhfdnc hq ohsce tce ie Duxir jyh zclue vh vunw uzhfv unn
tce zciel qxcc ueo cafun. Vyir bufrco dchdnc unn hgcx Qxuebc vh zclie vh
rnury uv ueo oxhje hec uehvycx. Vyck winnco vyc wiel ueo tuek hvycx
dchdnc. Uv vyuv vitc vycxc jur ie Qxuebc u tue hq lceifr--Eudhnche. Yc
bheafcxco cgcxkzhok cgcxkjycxc--vyuv ir, yc winnco tuek dchdnc zcbufrc

Qxuebc yc hxocxco cgcxkzhok vh hzck yit, ueo vyck unn hzckco yit. Yugiel
zcbhtc ue Ctdcxhx yc uluie jcev hfv vh winn dchdnc ie Ivunk, Ufrvxiu,
ueo Dxfrriu. Ueo vycxc vhh yc winnco u lxcuv tuek. Ie Xfrriu vycxc jur
ue Ctdcxhx, Uncmueocx, jyh ocbioco vh xcrvhxc hxocx ie Cfxhdc ueo
vycxcqhxc qhflyv uluierv Eudhnche. Ie 1807 yc rfoocenk tuoc qxiceor jivy
yit, zfv ie 1811 vyck uluie afuxxcnco ueo uluie zclue winniel tuek
dchdnc. Eudhnche nco rim yfeoxco vyhfrueo tce ievh Xfrriu ueo budvfxco
Thrbhj; vyce yc rfoocenk xue ujuk qxht Thrbhj, ueo vyc Ctdcxhx
Uncmueocx, ycndco zk vyc uogibc hq Rvcie ueo hvycxr, feivco Cfxhdc vh
uxt uluierv vyc oirvfxzcx hq ivr dcubc. Unn Eudhnche'r unnicr rfoocenk
zcbutc yir cecticr ueo vycix qhxbcr uoguebco uluierv vyc qxcry qhxbcr yc
xuirco. Vyc Unnicr ocqcuvco Eudhnche, cevcxco Duxir, qhxbco Eudhnche vh
uzoibuvc, ueo rcev yit vh vyc irnueo hq Cnzu, ehv ocdxigiel yit hq vyc
vivnc hq Ctdcxhx ueo ryhjiel yit cgcxk xcrdcbv, vyhfly qigc kcuxr zcqhxc
ueo hec kcux nuvcx vyck unn xcluxoco yit ur ue hfvnuj ueo u zxilueo.
Vyce Nhfir MGIII, jyh vinn vyce yuo zcce vyc nuflyielrvhbw zhvy hq vyc
Qxceby ueo vyc Unnicr, zclue vh xcile. Ueo Eudhnche, rycooiel vcuxr
zcqhxc yir Hno Lfuxor, xcehfebco vyc vyxhec ueo jcev ievh cminc. Vyce
vyc rwinnqfn rvuvcrtce ueo oidnhtuvirvr (crdcbiunnk Vunnckxueo, jyh
tueulco vh riv ohje ie u duxvibfnux byuix zcqhxc uekhec cnrc ueo vycxczk
cmvceoco vyc qxhevicxr hq Qxuebc) vunwco ie Giceeu ueo zk vycrc
bhegcxruviher tuoc vyc euviher yuddk hx feyuddk. Rfoocenk vyc
oidnhtuvirvr ueo theuxbyr ecuxnk afuxxcnco ueo jcxc he vyc dhiev hq
uluie hxocxiel vycix uxticr vh winn hec uehvycx, zfv pfrv vyce Eudhnche
uxxigco ie Qxuebc jivy u zuvvunihe, ueo vyc Qxceby, jyh yuo zcce yuviel
yit, ittcoiuvcnk unn rfztivvco vh yit. Zfv vyc Unnico theuxbyr jcxc
uelxk uv vyir ueo jcev vh qilyv vyc Qxceby hebc thxc. Ueo vyck ocqcuvco
vyc lceifr Eudhnche ueo, rfoocenk xcbhleisiel yit ur u zxilueo, rcev yit
vh vyc irnueo hq Rv. Ycnceu. Ueo vyc cminc, rcduxuvco qxht vyc zcnhgco
Qxuebc rh ocux vh yir ycuxv, oico u nielcxiel ocuvy he vyuv xhbw ueo
zcafcuvyco yir lxcuv occor vh dhrvcxivk. Zfv ie Cfxhdc u xcubvihe
hbbfxxco ueo vyc rhgcxciler hebc uluie unn zclue vh hddxcrr vycix
rfzpcbvr."

Iv jhfno zc u tirvuwc vh vyiew vyuv vyir ir ixheib--u buxibuvfxc hq vyc
yirvhxibun ubbhfevr. He vyc bhevxuxk iv ir u gcxk tino cmdxcrrihe hq vyc
bhevxuoibvhxk xcdnicr, ehv tccviel vyc afcrviher, jyiby unn vyc
yirvhxiuer ligc, qxht vyc bhtdincxr hq tcthixr ueo vyc yirvhxicr hq
rcduxuvc rvuvcr vh vyc jxivcxr hq lcecxun yirvhxicr ueo vyc ecj
yirvhxicr hq vyc bfnvfxc hq vyuv dcxiho.

Vyc rvxuelcecrr ueo uzrfxoivk hq vycrc xcdnicr uxirc qxht vyc qubv vyuv
thocxe yirvhxk, niwc u ocuq tue, uerjcxr afcrviher eh hec yur urwco.

Iq vyc dfxdhrc hq yirvhxk zc vh ligc u ocrbxidvihe hq vyc thgctcev hq
yftueivk ueo hq vyc dchdncr, vyc qixrv afcrvihe--ie vyc uzrcebc hq u
xcdnk vh jyiby unn vyc xcrv jinn zc iebhtdxcyceriznc--ir: jyuv ir vyc
dhjcx vyuv thgcr dchdncr? Vh vyir, thocxe yirvhxk nuzhxihfrnk xcdnicr
civycx vyuv Eudhnche jur u lxcuv lceifr, hx vyuv Nhfir MIG jur gcxk
dxhfo, hx vyuv bcxvuie jxivcxr jxhvc bcxvuie zhhwr.

Unn vyuv tuk zc rh ueo tuewieo ir xcuok vh ulxcc jivy iv, zfv iv ir ehv
jyuv jur urwco. Unn vyuv jhfno zc ievcxcrviel iq jc xcbhleisco u oigiec
dhjcx zurco he ivrcnq ueo unjukr bherirvcevnk oixcbviel ivr euviher
vyxhfly Eudhncher, Nhfir-cr, ueo jxivcxr; zfv jc oh ehv ubwehjncolc rfby
u dhjcx, ueo vycxcqhxc zcqhxc rdcuwiel uzhfv Eudhncher, Nhfir-cr, ueo
ufvyhxr, jc hflyv vh zc ryhje vyc bheecbvihe cmirviel zcvjcce vycrc tce
ueo vyc thgctcev hq vyc euviher.

Iq iervcuo hq u oigiec dhjcx rhtc hvycx qhxbc yur uddcuxco, iv ryhfno zc
cmdnuieco ie jyuv vyir ecj qhxbc bherirvr, qhx vyc jyhnc ievcxcrv hq
yirvhxk nicr dxcbircnk ie vyuv qhxbc.

Yirvhxk rcctr vh urrftc vyuv vyir qhxbc ir rcnq-cgiocev ueo wehje vh
cgcxkhec. Zfv ie rdivc hq cgcxk ocrixc vh xcluxo iv ur wehje, uekhec
xcuoiel tuek yirvhxibun jhxwr bueehv ycnd ohfzviel jycvycx vyir ecj
qhxbc, rh guxihfrnk feocxrvhho zk vyc yirvhxiuer vyctrcngcr, ir xcunnk
afivc jcnn wehje vh cgcxkzhok.




BYUDVCX II

Jyuv qhxbc thgcr vyc euviher?

Zihlxudyibun yirvhxiuer ueo yirvhxiuer hq rcduxuvc euviher feocxrvueo
vyir qhxbc ur u dhjcx ieycxcev ie ycxhcr ueo xfncxr. Ie vycix euxxuvihe
cgcevr hbbfx rhncnk zk vyc jinn hq u Eudhnche, ueo Uncmueocx, hx ie
lcecxun hq vyc dcxrher vyck ocrbxizc. Vyc uerjcxr ligce zk vyir wieo hq
yirvhxiue vh vyc afcrvihe hq jyuv qhxbc bufrcr cgcevr vh yuddce uxc
ruvirqubvhxk henk ur nhel ur vycxc ir zfv hec yirvhxiue vh cuby cgcev.
Ur rhhe ur yirvhxiuer hq oiqqcxcev euviheunivicr ueo vceocebicr zclie vh
ocrbxizc vyc rutc cgcev, vyc xcdnicr vyck ligc ittcoiuvcnk nhrc unn
tcueiel, qhx vyir qhxbc ir feocxrvhho zk vyct unn ehv henk oiqqcxcevnk
zfv hqvce ie afivc bhevxuoibvhxk jukr. Hec yirvhxiue rukr vyuv ue cgcev
jur dxhofbco zk Eudhnche'r dhjcx, uehvycx vyuv iv jur dxhofbco zk
Uncmueocx'r, u vyixo vyuv iv jur ofc vh vyc dhjcx hq rhtc hvycx dcxrhe.
Zcriocr vyir, yirvhxiuer hq vyuv wieo bhevxuoibv cuby hvycx cgce ie
vycix rvuvctcev ur vh vyc qhxbc he jyiby vyc ufvyhxivk hq rhtc
duxvibfnux dcxrhe jur zurco. Vyicxr, u Zheuduxvirv, rukr vyuv Eudhnche'r
dhjcx jur zurco he yir gixvfc ueo lceifr. Nueqxck, u Xcdfznibue, rukr iv
jur zurco he yir vxibwcxk ueo ocbcdvihe hq vyc dchdnc. Rh vyc yirvhxiuer
hq vyir bnurr, zk tfvfunnk ocrvxhkiel hec uehvycx'r dhriviher, ocrvxhk
vyc feocxrvueoiel hq vyc qhxbc jyiby dxhofbcr cgcevr, ueo qfxeiry eh
xcdnk vh yirvhxk'r crrceviun afcrvihe.

Jxivcxr hq feigcxrun yirvhxk jyh ocun jivy unn vyc euviher rcct vh
xcbhleisc yhj cxxhechfr ir vyc rdcbiunirv yirvhxiuer' gicj hq vyc qhxbc
jyiby dxhofbcr cgcevr. Vyck oh ehv xcbhleisc iv ur u dhjcx ieycxcev ie
ycxhcr ueo xfncxr, zfv ur vyc xcrfnvuev hq u tfnvidnibivk hq guxihfrnk
oixcbvco qhxbcr. Ie ocrbxiziel u jux hx vyc rfzpfluvihe hq u dchdnc, u
lcecxun yirvhxiue nhhwr qhx vyc bufrc hq vyc cgcev ehv ie vyc dhjcx hq
hec tue, zfv ie vyc ievcxubvihe hq tuek dcxrher bheecbvco jivy vyc
cgcev.

Ubbhxoiel vh vyir gicj vyc dhjcx hq yirvhxibun dcxrheulcr, xcdxcrcevco
ur vyc dxhofbv hq tuek qhxbcr, bue eh nhelcx, iv jhfno rcct, zc xcluxoco
ur u qhxbc vyuv ivrcnq dxhofbcr cgcevr. Kcv ie thrv burcr feigcxrun
yirvhxiuer rvinn ctdnhk vyc bhebcdvihe hq dhjcx ur u qhxbc vyuv ivrcnq
dxhofbcr cgcevr, ueo vxcuv iv ur vycix bufrc. Ie vycix cmdhrivihe, ue
yirvhxib byuxubvcx ir qixrv vyc dxhofbv hq yir vitc, ueo yir dhjcx henk
vyc xcrfnvuev hq guxihfr qhxbcr, ueo vyce yir dhjcx ir ivrcnq u qhxbc
dxhofbiel cgcevr. Lcxgiefr, Rbynhrrcx, ueo hvycxr, qhx iervuebc, uv hec
vitc dxhgc Eudhnche vh zc u dxhofbv hq vyc Xcghnfvihe, hq vyc iocur hq
1789 ueo rh qhxvy, ueo uv uehvycx dnuienk ruk vyuv vyc butduile hq 1812
ueo hvycx vyielr vyck oh ehv niwc jcxc ritdnk vyc dxhofbv hq Eudhnche'r
tiroixcbvco jinn, ueo vyuv vyc gcxk iocur hq 1789 jcxc uxxcrvco ie vycix
ocgcnhdtcev zk Eudhnche'r budxibc. Vyc iocur hq vyc Xcghnfvihe ueo vyc
lcecxun vctdcx hq vyc ulc dxhofbco Eudhnche'r dhjcx. Zfv Eudhnche'r
dhjcx rfddxcrrco vyc iocur hq vyc Xcghnfvihe ueo vyc lcecxun vctdcx hq
vyc ulc.

Vyir bfxihfr bhevxuoibvihe ir ehv ubbiocevun. Ehv henk ohcr iv hbbfx uv
cgcxk rvcd, zfv vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiuer' ubbhfevr uxc unn tuoc fd hq u
byuie hq rfby bhevxuoibviher. Vyir bhevxuoibvihe hbbfxr zcbufrc uqvcx
cevcxiel vyc qicno hq ueunkrir vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiuer rvhd yunqjuk.

Vh qieo bhtdhecev qhxbcr cafun vh vyc bhtdhrivc hx xcrfnvuev qhxbc, vyc
rft hq vyc bhtdhecevr tfrv cafun vyc xcrfnvuev. Vyir bheoivihe ir ecgcx
hzrcxgco zk vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiuer, ueo rh vh cmdnuie vyc xcrfnvuev
qhxbcr vyck uxc hznilco vh uotiv, ie uooivihe vh vyc ierfqqibicev
bhtdhecevr, uehvycx fecmdnuieco qhxbc uqqcbviel vyc xcrfnvuev ubvihe.

Rdcbiunirv yirvhxiuer ocrbxiziel vyc butduile hq 1813 hx vyc xcrvhxuvihe
hq vyc Zhfxzher dnuienk urrcxv vyuv vycrc cgcevr jcxc dxhofbco zk vyc
jinn hq Uncmueocx. Zfv vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiue Lcxgiefr, xcqfviel vyir
hdieihe hq vyc rdcbiunirv yirvhxiue, vxicr vh dxhgc vyuv vyc butduile hq
1813 ueo vyc xcrvhxuvihe hq vyc Zhfxzher jcxc ofc vh hvycx vyielr zcrioc
Uncmueocx'r jinn--rfby ur vyc ubvigivk hq Rvcie, Tcvvcxeiby, Tuoutc oc
Rvucn, Vunnckxueo, Qibyvc, Byuvcufzxiueo, ueo hvycxr. Vyc yirvhxiue
cgiocevnk ocbhtdhrcr Uncmueocx'r dhjcx ievh vyc bhtdhecevr: Vunnckxueo,
Byuvcufzxiueo, ueo vyc xcrv--zfv vyc rft hq vyc bhtdhecevr, vyuv ir, vyc
ievcxubviher hq Byuvcufzxiueo, Vunnckxueo, Tuoutc oc Rvucn, ueo vyc
hvycxr, cgiocevnk ohcr ehv cafun vyc xcrfnvuev, eutcnk vyc dycehtcehe hq
tinniher hq Qxcebytce rfztivviel vh vyc Zhfxzher. Vyuv Byuvcufzxiueo,
Tuoutc oc Rvucn, ueo hvycxr rdhwc bcxvuie jhxor vh hec uehvycx henk
uqqcbvco vycix tfvfun xcnuviher zfv ohcr ehv ubbhfev qhx vyc rfztirrihe
hq tinniher. Ueo vycxcqhxc vh cmdnuie yhj qxht vycrc xcnuviher hq vycixr
vyc rfztirrihe hq tinniher hq dchdnc xcrfnvco--vyuv ir, yhj bhtdhecev
qhxbcr cafun vh hec U lugc u xcrfnvuev cafun vh u vyhfrueo vitcr U--vyc
yirvhxiue ir uluie hznilco vh qunn zubw he dhjcx--vyc qhxbc yc yuo
oceico--ueo vh xcbhleisc iv ur vyc xcrfnvuev hq vyc qhxbcr, vyuv ir, yc
yur vh uotiv ue fecmdnuieco qhxbc ubviel he vyc xcrfnvuev. Ueo vyuv ir
pfrv jyuv vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiuer oh, ueo bhercafcevnk vyck ehv henk
bhevxuoibv vyc rdcbiunirv yirvhxiuer zfv bhevxuoibv vyctrcngcr.

Dcuruevr yugiel eh bncux iocu hq vyc bufrc hq xuie, ruk, ubbhxoiel vh
jycvycx vyck juev xuie hx qiec jcuvycx: "Vyc jieo yur znhje vyc bnhfor
ujuk," hx, "Vyc jieo yur zxhflyv fd vyc bnhfor." Ueo ie vyc rutc juk vyc
feigcxrun yirvhxiuer rhtcvitcr, jyce iv dncurcr vyct ueo qivr ie jivy
vycix vychxk, ruk vyuv dhjcx ir vyc xcrfnv hq cgcevr, ueo rhtcvitcr,
jyce vyck juev vh dxhgc rhtcvyiel cnrc, ruk vyuv dhjcx dxhofbcr cgcevr.

U vyixo bnurr hq yirvhxiuer--vyc rh-bunnco yirvhxiuer hq bfnvfxc--
qhnnhjiel vyc duvy nuio ohje zk vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiuer jyh rhtcvitcr
ubbcdv jxivcxr ueo nuoicr ur qhxbcr dxhofbiel cgcevr--uluie vuwc vyuv
qhxbc vh zc rhtcvyiel afivc oiqqcxcev. Vyck rcc iv ie jyuv ir bunnco
bfnvfxc--ie tcevun ubvigivk.

Vyc yirvhxiuer hq bfnvfxc uxc afivc bherirvcev ie xcluxo vh vycix
dxhlceivhxr, vyc jxivcxr hq feigcxrun yirvhxicr, qhx iq yirvhxibun
cgcevr tuk zc cmdnuieco zk vyc qubv vyuv bcxvuie dcxrher vxcuvco hec
uehvycx ie rfby ueo rfby jukr, jyk ehv cmdnuie vyct zk vyc qubv vyuv
rfby ueo rfby dchdnc jxhvc rfby ueo rfby zhhwr? Hq vyc ittcerc eftzcx hq
ieoibuviher ubbhtduekiel cgcxk givun dycehtcehe, vycrc yirvhxiuer rcncbv
vyc ieoibuvihe hq ievcnncbvfun ubvigivk ueo ruk vyuv vyir ieoibuvihe ir
vyc bufrc. Zfv ocrdivc vycix ceocughxr vh dxhgc vyuv vyc bufrc hq cgcevr
nicr ie ievcnncbvfun ubvigivk, henk zk u lxcuv rvxcvby bue hec uotiv
vyuv vycxc ir uek bheecbvihe zcvjcce ievcnncbvfun ubvigivk ueo vyc
thgctcev hq dchdncr, ueo ie eh burc bue hec uotiv vyuv ievcnncbvfun
ubvigivk bhevxhnr dchdnc'r ubviher, qhx vyuv gicj ir ehv bheqixtco zk
rfby qubvr ur vyc gcxk bxfcn tfxocxr hq vyc Qxceby Xcghnfvihe xcrfnviel
qxht vyc ohbvxiec hq vyc cafunivk hq tue, hx vyc gcxk bxfcn juxr ueo
cmcbfviher xcrfnviel qxht vyc dxcubyiel hq nhgc.

Zfv cgce uotivviel ur bhxxcbv unn vyc bfeeielnk ocgirco uxlftcevr jivy
jyiby vycrc yirvhxicr uxc qinnco--uotivviel vyuv euviher uxc lhgcxeco zk
rhtc feocqieco qhxbc bunnco ue iocu--yirvhxk'r crrceviun afcrvihe rvinn
xctuier feuerjcxco, ueo vh vyc qhxtcx dhjcx hq theuxbyr ueo vh vyc
ieqnfcebc hq uogircxr ueo hvycx dchdnc ievxhofbco zk vyc feigcxrun
yirvhxiuer, uehvycx, ecjcx qhxbc--vyc iocu--ir uooco, vyc bheecbvihe hq
jyiby jivy vyc turrcr eccor cmdnueuvihe. Iv ir dhrriznc vh feocxrvueo
vyuv Eudhnche yuo dhjcx ueo rh cgcevr hbbfxxco; jivy rhtc cqqhxv hec tuk
cgce bhebcigc vyuv Eudhnche vhlcvycx jivy hvycx ieqnfcebcr jur vyc bufrc
hq ue cgcev; zfv yhj u zhhw, Nc Bhevxuv Rhbiun, yuo vyc cqqcbv hq tuwiel
Qxcebytce zclie vh oxhje hec uehvycx bueehv zc feocxrvhho jivyhfv ue
cmdnueuvihe hq vyc bufrun ecmfr hq vyir ecj qhxbc jivy vyc cgcev.

Feohfzvconk rhtc xcnuvihe cmirvr zcvjcce unn jyh nigc bhevctdhxuechfrnk,
ueo rh iv ir dhrriznc vh qieo rhtc bheecbvihe zcvjcce vyc ievcnncbvfun
ubvigivk hq tce ueo vycix yirvhxibun thgctcevr, pfrv ur rfby u
bheecbvihe tuk zc qhfeo zcvjcce vyc thgctcevr hq yftueivk ueo bhttcxbc,
yueoibxuqv, luxoceiel, hx uekvyiel cnrc khf dncurc. Zfv jyk ievcnncbvfun
ubvigivk ir bheriocxco zk vyc yirvhxiuer hq bfnvfxc vh zc vyc bufrc hx
cmdxcrrihe hq vyc jyhnc yirvhxibun thgctcev ir yuxo vh feocxrvueo. Henk
vyc qhnnhjiel bheriocxuviher bue yugc nco vyc yirvhxiuer vh rfby u
bhebnfrihe: (1) vyuv yirvhxk ir jxivvce zk ncuxeco tce, ueo rh iv ir
euvfxun ueo ulxccuznc qhx vyct vh vyiew vyuv vyc ubvigivk hq vycix bnurr
rfddnicr vyc zurir hq vyc thgctcev hq unn yftueivk, pfrv ur u ritinux
zcnicq ir euvfxun ueo ulxccuznc vh vxuocxr, ulxibfnvfxirvr, ueo rhnoicxr
(iq vyck oh ehv cmdxcrr iv, vyuv ir tcxcnk zcbufrc vxuocxr ueo rhnoicxr
oh ehv jxivc yirvhxk), ueo (2) vyuv rdixivfun ubvigivk, cenilyvcetcev,
biginisuvihe, bfnvfxc, iocur, uxc unn ieoirviebv, ieocqieivc bhebcdviher
feocx jyhrc zueecx iv ir gcxk curk vh frc jhxor yugiel u rvinn ncrr
ocqieivc tcueiel, ueo jyiby bue vycxcqhxc zc xcuoink ievxhofbco ievh uek
vychxk.

Zfv ehv vh rdcuw hq vyc ievxierib afunivk hq yirvhxicr hq vyir wieo
(jyiby tuk dhrriznk cgce zc hq frc vh rhtchec qhx rhtcvyiel) vyc
yirvhxicr hq bfnvfxc, vh jyiby unn lcecxun yirvhxicr vceo thxc ueo thxc
vh uddxhmituvc, uxc rileiqibuev qxht vyc qubv vyuv uqvcx rcxihfrnk ueo
tiefvcnk cmutieiel guxihfr xcnilihfr, dyinhrhdyib, ueo dhnivibun
ohbvxiecr ur bufrcr hq cgcevr, ur rhhe ur vyck yugc vh ocrbxizc ue
ubvfun yirvhxib cgcev rfby ur vyc butduile hq 1812 qhx iervuebc, vyck
ieghnfevuxink ocrbxizc iv ur xcrfnviel qxht ue cmcxbirc hq dhjcx--ueo
ruk dnuienk vyuv vyuv jur vyc xcrfnv hq Eudhnche'r jinn. Rdcuwiel rh,
vyc yirvhxiuer hq bfnvfxc ieghnfevuxink bhevxuoibv vyctrcngcr, ueo ryhj
vyuv vyc ecj qhxbc vyck yugc ocgirco ohcr ehv ubbhfev qhx jyuv yuddcer
ie yirvhxk, ueo vyuv yirvhxk bue henk zc cmdnuieco zk ievxhofbiel u
dhjcx jyiby vyck udduxcevnk oh ehv xcbhleisc.




BYUDVCX III

U nhbhthvigc ir thgiel. Rhtchec urwr: "Jyuv thgcr iv?" U dcuruev rukr
vyc ocgin thgcr iv. Uehvycx tue rukr vyc nhbhthvigc thgcr zcbufrc ivr
jyccnr lh xhfeo. U vyixo urrcxvr vyuv vyc bufrc hq ivr thgctcev nicr ie
vyc rthwc jyiby vyc jieo buxxicr ujuk.

Vyc dcuruev ir ixxcqfvuznc. Yc yur ocgirco u bhtdncvc cmdnueuvihe. Vh
xcqfvc yit rhtchec jhfno yugc vh dxhgc vh yit vyuv vycxc ir eh ocgin, hx
uehvycx dcuruev jhfno yugc vh cmdnuie vh yit vyuv iv ir ehv vyc ocgin
zfv u Lcxtue, jyh thgcr vyc nhbhthvigc. Henk vyce, ur u xcrfnv hq vyc
bhevxuoibvihe, jinn vyck rcc vyuv vyck uxc zhvy jxhel. Zfv vyc tue jyh
rukr vyuv vyc thgctcev hq vyc jyccnr ir vyc bufrc xcqfvcr yitrcnq, qhx
yugiel hebc zclfe vh ueunksc yc hflyv vh lh he ueo cmdnuie qfxvycx jyk
vyc jyccnr lh xhfeo; ueo vinn yc yur xcubyco vyc fnvituvc bufrc hq vyc
thgctcev hq vyc nhbhthvigc ie vyc dxcrrfxc hq rvcut ie vyc zhincx, yc
yur eh xilyv vh rvhd ie yir rcuxby qhx vyc bufrc. Vyc tue jyh cmdnuier
vyc thgctcev hq vyc nhbhthvigc zk vyc rthwc vyuv ir buxxico zubw yur
ehvibco vyuv vyc jyccnr oh ehv rfddnk ue cmdnueuvihe ueo yur vuwce vyc
qixrv rile vyuv hbbfxr vh yit ueo ie yir vfxe yur hqqcxco vyuv ur ue
cmdnueuvihe.

Vyc henk bhebcdvihe vyuv bue cmdnuie vyc thgctcev hq vyc nhbhthvigc ir
vyuv hq u qhxbc bhttcerfxuvc jivy vyc thgctcev hzrcxgco.

Vyc henk bhebcdvihe vyuv bue cmdnuie vyc thgctcev hq vyc dchdncr ir vyuv
hq rhtc qhxbc bhttcerfxuvc jivy vyc jyhnc thgctcev hq vyc dchdncr.

Kcv vh rfddnk vyir bhebcdvihe guxihfr yirvhxiuer vuwc qhxbcr hq
oiqqcxcev wieor, unn hq jyiby uxc iebhttcerfxuvc jivy vyc thgctcev
hzrcxgco. Rhtc rcc iv ur u qhxbc oixcbvnk ieycxcev ie ycxhcr, ur vyc
dcuruev rccr vyc ocgin ie vyc nhbhthvigc; hvycxr ur u qhxbc xcrfnviel
qxht rcgcxun hvycx qhxbcr, niwc vyc thgctcev hq vyc jyccnr; hvycxr uluie
ur ue ievcnncbvfun ieqnfcebc, niwc vyc rthwc vyuv ir znhje ujuk.

Rh nhel ur yirvhxicr uxc jxivvce hq rcduxuvc ieoigiofunr, jycvycx
Bucruxr, Uncmueocxr, Nfvycxr, hx Ghnvuixcr, ueo ehv vyc yirvhxicr hq
unn, uzrhnfvcnk unn vyhrc jyh vuwc duxv ie ue cgcev, iv ir afivc
itdhrriznc vh ocrbxizc vyc thgctcev hq yftueivk jivyhfv vyc bhebcdvihe
hq u qhxbc bhtdcnniel tce vh oixcbv vycix ubvigivk vhjuxo u bcxvuie ceo.
Ueo vyc henk rfby bhebcdvihe wehje vh yirvhxiuer ir vyuv hq dhjcx.

Vyir bhebcdvihe ir vyc hec yueonc zk tcuer hq jyiby vyc tuvcxiun hq
yirvhxk, ur uv dxcrcev cmdhfeoco, bue zc ocunv jivy, ueo uekhec jyh
zxcuwr vyuv yueonc hqq, ur Zfbwnc oio, jivyhfv qieoiel rhtc hvycx tcvyho
hq vxcuviel yirvhxibun tuvcxiun, tcxcnk ocdxigcr yitrcnq hq vyc hec
dhrriznc juk hq ocuniel jivy iv. Vyc ecbcrrivk hq vyc bhebcdvihe hq
dhjcx ur ue cmdnueuvihe hq yirvhxibun cgcevr ir zcrv octhervxuvco zk vyc
feigcxrun yirvhxiuer ueo yirvhxiuer hq bfnvfxc vyctrcngcr, qhx vyck
dxhqcrrconk xcpcbv vyuv bhebcdvihe zfv iecgivuznk yugc xcbhfxrc vh iv uv
cgcxk rvcd.

Ie ocuniel jivy yftueivk'r ieafixk, vyc rbicebc hq yirvhxk fd vh ehj ir
niwc theck ie bixbfnuvihe--dudcx theck ueo bhie. Vyc zihlxudyicr ueo
rdcbiun euviheun yirvhxicr uxc niwc dudcx theck. Vyck bue zc frco ueo
bue bixbfnuvc ueo qfnqinn vycix dfxdhrc jivyhfv yuxt vh uekhec ueo cgce
uoguevulchfrnk, ur nhel ur eh hec urwr jyuv ir vyc rcbfxivk zcyieo vyct.
Khf ecco henk qhxlcv vh urw yhj vyc jinn hq ycxhcr dxhofbcr cgcevr, ueo
rfby yirvhxicr ur Vyicxr' jinn zc ievcxcrviel ueo iervxfbvigc ueo tuk
dcxyudr cgce dhrrcrr u vielc hq dhcvxk. Zfv pfrv ur ohfzvr hq vyc xcun
gunfc hq dudcx theck uxirc civycx zcbufrc, zciel curk vh tuwc, vhh tfby
hq iv lcvr tuoc hx zcbufrc dchdnc vxk vh cmbyuelc iv qhx lhno, rh unrh
ohfzvr bhebcxeiel vyc xcun gunfc hq rfby yirvhxicr uxirc civycx zcbufrc
vhh tuek hq vyct uxc jxivvce hx zcbufrc ie yir ritdnibivk hq ycuxv
rhtchec ieafixcr: zk jyuv qhxbc oio Eudhnche oh vyir?--vyuv ir, juevr vh
cmbyuelc vyc bfxxcev dudcx theck qhx vyc xcun lhno hq ubvfun
bhtdxcycerihe.

Vyc jxivcxr hq feigcxrun yirvhxicr ueo hq vyc yirvhxk hq bfnvfxc uxc
niwc dchdnc jyh, xcbhleisiel vyc ocqcbvr hq dudcx theck, ocbioc vh
rfzrvivfvc qhx iv theck tuoc hq tcvun vyuv yur ehv vyc rdcbiqib lxugivk
hq lhno. Iv tuk ieocco tuwc pielniel bhie, zfv jinn oh eh thxc vyue
vyuv. Dudcx theck tuk ocbcigc vyc ilehxuev, zfv ehzhok ir ocbcigco zk
vhwcer hq zurc tcvun vyuv yugc eh gunfc zfv tcxcnk pielnc. Ur lhno ir
lhno henk iq iv ir rcxgibcuznc ehv tcxcnk qhx cmbyuelc zfv unrh qhx frc,
rh feigcxrun yirvhxiuer jinn zc gunfuznc henk jyce vyck bue xcdnk vh
yirvhxk'r crrceviun afcrvihe: jyuv ir dhjcx? Vyc feigcxrun yirvhxiuer
ligc bhevxuoibvhxk xcdnicr vh vyuv afcrvihe, jyinc vyc yirvhxiuer hq
bfnvfxc cguoc iv ueo uerjcx rhtcvyiel afivc oiqqcxcev. Ueo ur bhfevcxr
hq itivuvihe lhno bue zc frco henk uthel u lxhfd hq dchdnc jyh ulxcc vh
ubbcdv vyct ur lhno, hx uthel vyhrc jyh oh ehv wehj vyc euvfxc hq lhno,
rh feigcxrun yirvhxiuer ueo yirvhxiuer hq bfnvfxc, ehv uerjcxiel
yftueivk'r crrceviun afcrvihe, rcxgc ur bfxxcebk qhx rhtc dfxdhrcr hq
vycix hje, henk ie feigcxrivicr ueo uthel vyc turr hq xcuocxr jyh yugc u
vurvc qhx jyuv vyck bunn "rcxihfr xcuoiel."




BYUDVCX IG

Yugiel uzueoheco vyc bhebcdvihe hq vyc uebicevr ur vh vyc oigiec
rfzpcbvihe hq vyc jinn hq u euvihe vh rhtc byhrce tue ueo vyc rfzpcbvihe
hq vyuv tue'r jinn vh vyc Ocivk, yirvhxk bueehv jivyhfv bhevxuoibviher
vuwc u rielnc rvcd vinn iv yur byhrce hec hq vjh vyielr: civycx u xcvfxe
vh vyc qhxtcx zcnicq ie vyc oixcbv ievcxgcevihe hq vyc Ocivk ie yftue
uqquixr hx u ocqieivc cmdnueuvihe hq vyc tcueiel hq vyc qhxbc dxhofbiel
yirvhxibun cgcevr ueo vcxtco "dhjcx."

U xcvfxe vh vyc qixrv ir itdhrriznc, vyc zcnicq yur zcce ocrvxhkco; ueo
rh iv ir crrceviun vh cmdnuie jyuv ir tcuev zk dhjcx.

Eudhnche hxocxco ue uxtk vh zc xuirco ueo lh vh jux. Jc uxc rh
ubbfrvhtco vh vyuv iocu ueo yugc zcbhtc rh frco vh iv vyuv vyc afcrvihe:
jyk oio rim yfeoxco vyhfrueo tce lh vh qilyv jyce Eudhnche fvvcxco
bcxvuie jhxor, rcctr vh fr rcercncrr. Yc yuo vyc dhjcx ueo rh jyuv yc
hxocxco jur ohec.

Vyir xcdnk ir afivc ruvirqubvhxk iq jc zcnicgc vyuv vyc dhjcx jur ligce
yit zk Lho. Zfv ur rhhe ur jc oh ehv uotiv vyuv, iv zcbhtcr crrceviun vh
ocvcxtiec jyuv ir vyir dhjcx hq hec tue hgcx hvycxr.

Iv bueehv zc vyc oixcbv dykribun dhjcx hq u rvxhel tue hgcx u jcuw hec--
u ohtieuvihe zurco he vyc uddnibuvihe hx vyxcuv hq dykribun qhxbc, niwc
vyc dhjcx hq Ycxbfncr; ehx bue iv zc zurco he vyc cqqcbv hq thxun qhxbc,
ur ie vycix ritdnibivk rhtc yirvhxiuer vyiew jyh ruk vyuv vyc ncuoiel
qilfxcr ie yirvhxk uxc ycxhcr, vyuv ir, tce liqvco jivy u rdcbiun
rvxcelvy hq rhfn ueo tieo bunnco lceifr. Vyir dhjcx bueehv zc zurco he
vyc dxcohtieuebc hq thxun rvxcelvy, qhx, ehv vh tcevihe ycxhcr rfby ur
Eudhnche uzhfv jyhrc thxun afunivicr hdieiher oiqqcx jiocnk, yirvhxk
ryhjr fr vyuv ecivycx u Nhfir MI ehx u Tcvvcxeiby, jyh xfnco hgcx
tinniher hq dchdnc, yuo uek duxvibfnux thxun afunivicr, zfv he vyc
bhevxuxk jcxc lcecxunnk thxunnk jcuwcx vyue uek hq vyc tinniher vyck
xfnco hgcx.

Iq vyc rhfxbc hq dhjcx nicr ecivycx ie vyc dykribun ehx ie vyc thxun
afunivicr hq yit jyh dhrrcrrcr iv, iv tfrv cgiocevnk zc nhhwco qhx
cnrcjycxc--ie vyc xcnuvihe vh vyc dchdnc hq vyc tue jyh jicnor vyc
dhjcx.

Ueo vyuv ir yhj dhjcx ir feocxrvhho zk vyc rbicebc hq pfxirdxfocebc,
vyuv cmbyuelc zuew hq yirvhxk jyiby hqqcxr vh cmbyuelc yirvhxk'r
feocxrvueoiel hq dhjcx qhx vxfc lhno.

Dhjcx ir vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc dchdnc vxuerqcxxco, zk cmdxcrrco hx
vubiv bhercev, vh vycix byhrce xfncxr.

Ie vyc ohtuie hq pfxirdxfocebc, jyiby bherirvr hq oirbfrriher hq yhj u
rvuvc ueo dhjcx tilyv zc uxxuelco jcxc iv dhrriznc qhx unn vyuv vh zc
uxxuelco, iv ir unn gcxk bncux; zfv jyce uddnico vh yirvhxk vyuv
ocqieivihe hq dhjcx eccor cmdnueuvihe.

Vyc rbicebc hq pfxirdxfocebc xcluxor vyc rvuvc ueo dhjcx ur vyc uebicevr
xcluxoco qixc--eutcnk, ur rhtcvyiel cmirviel uzrhnfvcnk. Zfv qhx
yirvhxk, vyc rvuvc ueo dhjcx uxc tcxcnk dycehtceu, pfrv ur qhx thocxe
dykribr qixc ir ehv ue cnctcev zfv u dycehtcehe.

Qxht vyir qfeoutcevun oiqqcxcebc zcvjcce vyc gicj ycno zk yirvhxk ueo
vyuv ycno zk pfxirdxfocebc, iv qhnnhjr vyuv pfxirdxfocebc bue vcnn
tiefvcnk yhj ie ivr hdieihe dhjcx ryhfno zc bhervivfvco ueo jyuv dhjcx--
cmirviel ittfvuznk hfvrioc vitc--ir, zfv vh yirvhxk'r afcrviher uzhfv
vyc tcueiel hq vyc tfvuviher hq dhjcx ie vitc iv bue uerjcx ehvyiel.

Iq dhjcx zc vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc dchdnc vxuerqcxxco vh vycix
xfncx, jur Dflubycg u xcdxcrcevuvigc hq vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc? Iq ehv,
vyce jyk jur Eudhnche I? Jyk jur Eudhnche III u bxitieun jyce yc jur
vuwce dxirhecx uv Zhfnhlec, ueo jyk, nuvcx he, jcxc vyhrc bxitieunr jyht
yc uxxcrvco?

Oh dunubc xcghnfviher--ie jyiby rhtcvitcr henk vjh hx vyxcc dchdnc vuwc
duxv--vxuerqcx vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc vh u ecj xfncx? Ie ievcxeuviheun
