xcnuviher, ir vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc unrh vxuerqcxxco vh vycix
bheafcxhx? Jur vyc jinn hq vyc Bheqcocxuvihe hq vyc Xyiec vxuerqcxxco vh
Eudhnche ie 1806? Jur vyc jinn hq vyc Xfrriue dchdnc vxuerqcxxco vh
Eudhnche ie 1809, jyce hfx uxtk ie unniuebc jivy vyc Qxceby jcev vh
qilyv vyc Ufrvxiuer?

Vh vycrc afcrviher vyxcc uerjcxr uxc dhrriznc:

Civycx vh urrftc (1) vyuv vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir unjukr
febheoiviheunnk vxuerqcxxco vh vyc xfncx hx xfncxr vyck yugc byhrce, ueo
vyuv vycxcqhxc cgcxk ctcxlcebc hq u ecj dhjcx, cgcxk rvxfllnc uluierv
vyc dhjcx hebc uddhievco, ryhfno zc uzrhnfvcnk xcluxoco ur ue
ieqxielctcev hq vyc xcun dhjcx; hx (2) vyuv vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir
vxuerqcxxco vh vyc xfncxr bheoiviheunnk, feocx ocqieivc ueo wehje
bheoiviher, ueo vh ryhj vyuv unn nitivuviher, bheqnibvr, ueo cgce
ocrvxfbviher hq dhjcx xcrfnv qxht u ehehzrcxguebc zk vyc xfncxr hq vyc
bheoiviher feocx jyiby vycix dhjcx jur cevxfrvco vh vyct; hx (3) vyuv
vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir ocncluvco vh vyc xfncxr bheoiviheunnk, zfv
vyuv vyc bheoiviher uxc fewehje ueo ieocqieivc, ueo vyuv vyc uddcuxuebc
hq rcgcxun ufvyhxivicr, vycix rvxfllncr ueo vycix qunnr, xcrfnv rhncnk
qxht vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx qfnqinntcev zk vyc xfncxr hq vycrc fewehje
bheoiviher he jyiby vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir vxuerqcxxco qxht rhtc
dchdnc vh hvycxr.

Ueo vycrc uxc vyc vyxcc jukr ie jyiby vyc yirvhxiuer oh cmdnuie vyc
xcnuvihe hq vyc dchdnc vh vycix xfncxr.

Rhtc yirvhxiuer--vyhrc zihlxudyibun ueo rdcbiunirv yirvhxiuer unxcuok
xcqcxxco vh--ie vycix ritdnibivk quiniel vh feocxrvueo vyc afcrvihe hq
vyc tcueiel hq dhjcx, rcct vh bheriocx vyuv vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc
dchdnc ir febheoiviheunnk vxuerqcxxco vh yirvhxibun dcxrher, ueo
vycxcqhxc jyce ocrbxiziel rhtc rielnc rvuvc vyck urrftc vyuv duxvibfnux
dhjcx vh zc vyc hec uzrhnfvc ueo xcun dhjcx, ueo vyuv uek hvycx qhxbc
hddhriel vyir ir ehv u dhjcx zfv u gihnuvihe hq dhjcx--tcxc gihncebc.

Vycix vychxk, rfivuznc qhx dxitivigc ueo dcubcqfn dcxihor hq yirvhxk,
yur vyc iebhegceicebc--ie uddnibuvihe vh bhtdncm ueo rvhxtk dcxihor ie
vyc niqc hq euviher ofxiel jyiby guxihfr dhjcxr uxirc ritfnvuechfrnk ueo
rvxfllnc jivy hec uehvycx--vyuv u Nclivitirv yirvhxiue jinn dxhgc vyuv
vyc Euviheun Bhegcevihe, vyc Oixcbvhxk, ueo Zheuduxvc jcxc tcxc
ieqxielcxr hq vyc vxfc dhjcx, jyinc u Xcdfznibue ueo u Zheuduxvirv jinn
dxhgc: vyc hec vyuv vyc Bhegcevihe ueo vyc hvycx vyuv vyc Ctdixc jur vyc
xcun dhjcx, ueo vyuv unn vyc hvycxr jcxc gihnuviher hq dhjcx. Cgiocevnk
vyc cmdnueuviher qfxeiryco zk vycrc yirvhxiuer zciel tfvfunnk
bhevxuoibvhxk bue henk ruvirqk khfel byinoxce.

Xcbhleisiel vyc qunrivk hq vyir gicj hq yirvhxk, uehvycx rcv hq
yirvhxiuer ruk vyuv dhjcx xcrvr he u bheoiviheun ocncluvihe hq vyc jinn
hq vyc dchdnc vh vycix xfncxr, ueo vyuv yirvhxibun ncuocxr yugc dhjcx
henk bheoiviheunnk he buxxkiel hfv vyc dxhlxut vyuv vyc jinn hq vyc
dchdnc yur zk vubiv ulxcctcev dxcrbxizco vh vyct. Zfv jyuv vyir dxhlxut
bherirvr ie vycrc yirvhxiuer oh ehv ruk, hx iq vyck oh vyck bheviefunnk
bhevxuoibv hec uehvycx.

Cuby yirvhxiue, ubbhxoiel vh yir gicj hq jyuv bhervivfvcr u euvihe'r
dxhlxcrr, nhhwr qhx vycrc bheoiviher ie vyc lxcuvecrr, jcunvy, qxccoht,
hx cenilyvcetcev hq biviscer hq Qxuebc hx rhtc hvycx bhfevxk. Zfv ehv vh
tcevihe vyc yirvhxiuer' bhevxuoibviher ur vh vyc euvfxc hq vyir dxhlxut-
-hx cgce uotivviel vyuv rhtc hec lcecxun dxhlxut hq vycrc bheoiviher
cmirvr--vyc qubvr hq yirvhxk unthrv unjukr bhevxuoibv vyuv vychxk. Iq
vyc bheoiviher feocx jyiby dhjcx ir cevxfrvco bherirv ie vyc jcunvy,
qxccoht, ueo cenilyvcetcev hq vyc dchdnc, yhj ir iv vyuv Nhfir MIG ueo
Igue vyc Vcxxiznc ceo vycix xciler vxueafinnk, jyinc Nhfir MGI ueo
Byuxncr I uxc cmcbfvco zk vycix dchdnc? Vh vyir afcrvihe yirvhxiuer
xcdnk vyuv Nhfir MIG'r ubvigivk, bhevxuxk vh vyc dxhlxut, xcubvco he
Nhfir MGI. Zfv jyk oio iv ehv xcubv he Nhfir MIG hx he Nhfir MG--jyk
ryhfno iv xcubv pfrv he Nhfir MGI? Ueo jyuv ir vyc vitc nitiv qhx rfby
xcubviher? Vh vycrc afcrviher vycxc uxc ueo bue zc eh uerjcxr. Cafunnk
nivvnc ohcr vyir gicj cmdnuie jyk qhx rcgcxun bcevfxicr vyc bhnncbvigc
jinn ir ehv jivyoxuje qxht bcxvuie xfncxr ueo vycix ycixr, ueo vyce
rfoocenk ofxiel u dcxiho hq qiqvk kcuxr ir vxuerqcxxco vh vyc
Bhegcevihe, vh vyc Oixcbvhxk, vh Eudhnche, vh Uncmueocx, vh Nhfir MGIII,
vh Eudhnche uluie, vh Byuxncr M, vh Nhfir Dyiniddc, vh u Xcdfznibue
lhgcxetcev, ueo vh Eudhnche III. Jyce cmdnuieiel vycrc xudio vxuerqcxr
hq vyc dchdnc'r jinn qxht hec ieoigiofun vh uehvycx, crdcbiunnk ie gicj
hq ievcxeuviheun xcnuviher, bheafcrvr, ueo unniuebcr, vyc yirvhxiuer uxc
hznilco vh uotiv vyuv rhtc hq vycrc vxuerqcxr uxc ehv ehxtun ocncluviher
hq vyc dchdnc'r jinn zfv uxc ubbiocevr ocdceocev he bfeeiel, he
tirvuwcr, he bxuqv, hx he vyc jcuwecrr hq u oidnhtuvirv, u xfncx, hx u
duxvk ncuocx. Rh vyuv vyc lxcuvcx duxv hq vyc cgcevr hq yirvhxk--bigin
juxr, xcghnfviher, ueo bheafcrvr--uxc dxcrcevco zk vycrc yirvhxiuer ehv
ur vyc xcrfnvr hq qxcc vxuerqcxcebcr hq vyc dchdnc'r jinn, zfv ur
xcrfnvr hq vyc inn-oixcbvco jinn hq hec hx thxc ieoigiofunr, vyuv ir,
hebc uluie, ur frfxduviher hq dhjcx. Ueo rh vycrc yirvhxiuer unrh rcc
ueo uotiv yirvhxibun cgcevr jyiby uxc cmbcdviher vh vyc vychxk.

Vycrc yirvhxiuer xcrctznc u zhvueirv jyh, yugiel ehvibco vyuv rhtc
dnuevr lxhj qxht rccor dxhofbiel vjh bhvkncoher, ryhfno ierirv vyuv unn
vyuv lxhjr ohcr rh zk rdxhfviel ievh vjh ncugcr, ueo vyuv vyc dunt, vyc
tfryxhht, ueo cgce vyc huw, jyiby znhrrht ievh qfnn lxhjvy ueo eh nhelcx
xcrctznc vjh ncugcr, uxc ocgiuviher qxht vyc vychxk.

Yirvhxiuer hq vyc vyixo bnurr urrftc vyuv vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir
vxuerqcxxco vh yirvhxib dcxrheulcr bheoiviheunnk, zfv vyuv vyc
bheoiviher uxc fewehje vh fr. Vyck ruk vyuv yirvhxibun dcxrheulcr yugc
dhjcx henk zcbufrc vyck qfnqinn vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc jyiby yur zcce
ocncluvco vh vyct.

Zfv ie vyuv burc, iq vyc qhxbc vyuv thgcr euviher nicr ehv ie vyc
yirvhxib ncuocxr zfv ie vyc euviher vyctrcngcr, jyuv rileiqibuebc yugc
vyhrc ncuocxr?

Vyc ncuocxr, vycrc yirvhxiuer vcnn fr, cmdxcrr vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc:
vyc ubvigivk hq vyc ncuocxr xcdxcrcevr vyc ubvigivk hq vyc dchdnc.

Zfv ie vyuv burc vyc afcrvihe uxircr jycvycx unn vyc ubvigivk hq vyc
ncuocxr rcxgcr ur ue cmdxcrrihe hq vyc dchdnc'r jinn hx henk rhtc duxv
hq iv. Iq vyc jyhnc ubvigivk hq vyc ncuocxr rcxgcr ur vyc cmdxcrrihe hq
vyc dchdnc'r jinn, ur rhtc yirvhxiuer rfddhrc, vyce unn vyc ocvuinr hq
vyc bhfxv rbueounr bhevuieco ie vyc zihlxudyicr hq u Eudhnche hx u
Buvycxiec rcxgc vh cmdxcrr vyc niqc hq vyc euvihe, jyiby ir cgiocev
ehercerc; zfv iq iv ir henk rhtc duxvibfnux rioc hq vyc ubvigivk hq ue
yirvhxibun ncuocx jyiby rcxgcr vh cmdxcrr vyc dchdnc'r niqc, ur hvycx
rh-bunnco "dyinhrhdyibun" yirvhxiuer zcnicgc, vyce vh ocvcxtiec jyiby
rioc hq vyc ubvigivk hq u ncuocx cmdxcrrcr vyc euvihe'r niqc, jc yugc
qixrv hq unn vh wehj ie jyuv vyc euvihe'r niqc bherirvr.

Tcv zk vyir oiqqibfnvk yirvhxiuer hq vyuv bnurr ocgirc rhtc thrv
hzrbfxc, itdunduznc, ueo lcecxun uzrvxubvihe jyiby bue bhgcx unn
bhebciguznc hbbfxxcebcr, ueo ocbnuxc vyir uzrvxubvihe vh zc vyc uit hq
yftueivk'r thgctcev. Vyc thrv frfun lcecxunisuviher uohdvco zk unthrv
unn vyc yirvhxiuer uxc: qxccoht, cafunivk, cenilyvcetcev, dxhlxcrr,
biginisuvihe, ueo bfnvfxc. Dhrvfnuviel rhtc lcecxunisuvihe ur vyc lhun
hq vyc thgctcev hq yftueivk, vyc yirvhxiuer rvfok vyc tce hq jyht vyc
lxcuvcrv eftzcx hq theftcevr yugc xctuieco: wielr, tieirvcxr, lcecxunr,
ufvyhxr, xcqhxtcxr, dhdcr, ueo phfxeunirvr, vh vyc cmvcev vh jyiby ie
vycix hdieihe vycrc dcxrher yugc dxhthvco hx yieocxco vyuv uzrvxubvihe.
Zfv ur iv ir ie eh juk dxhgco vyuv vyc uit hq yftueivk ohcr bherirv ie
qxccoht, cafunivk, cenilyvcetcev, hx biginisuvihe, ueo ur vyc bheecbvihe
hq vyc dchdnc jivy vyc xfncxr ueo cenilyvcecxr hq yftueivk ir henk zurco
he vyc uxzivxuxk urrftdvihe vyuv vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir
unjukr vxuerqcxxco vh vyc tce jyht jc yugc ehvibco, iv yuddcer vyuv vyc
ubvigivk hq vyc tinniher jyh tilxuvc, zfxe yhfrcr, uzueohe ulxibfnvfxc,
ueo ocrvxhk hec uehvycx ecgcx ir cmdxcrrco ie vyc ubbhfev hq vyc
ubvigivk hq rhtc ohsce dchdnc jyh oio ehv zfxe yhfrcr, dxubvibc
ulxibfnvfxc, hx rnuk vycix qcnnhj bxcuvfxcr.

Yirvhxk dxhgcr vyir uv cgcxk vfxe. Ir vyc qcxtcev hq vyc dchdncr hq vyc
jcrv uv vyc ceo hq vyc cilyvccevy bcevfxk ueo vycix oxigc curvjuxo
cmdnuieco zk vyc ubvigivk hq Nhfir MIG, MG, ueo MGI, vycix tirvxcrrcr
ueo tieirvcxr, ueo zk vyc nigcr hq Eudhnche, Xhfrrcuf, Oiocxhv,
Zcuftuxbyuir, ueo hvycxr?

Ir vyc thgctcev hq vyc Xfrriue dchdnc curvjuxo vh Wusue ueo Rizcxiu
cmdxcrrco zk ocvuinr hq vyc thxzio byuxubvcx hq Igue vyc Vcxxiznc ueo zk
yir bhxxcrdheocebc jivy Wfxzrwi?

Ir vyc thgctcev hq vyc dchdncr uv vyc vitc hq vyc Bxfruocr cmdnuieco zk
vyc niqc ueo ubvigivk hq vyc Lhoqxckr ueo vyc Nhfir-cr ueo vycix nuoicr?
Qhx fr vyuv thgctcev hq vyc dchdncr qxht jcrv vh curv, jivyhfv ncuocxr,
jivy u bxhjo hq gulxuevr, ueo jivy Dcvcx vyc Ycxtiv, xctuier
iebhtdxcyceriznc. Ueo kcv thxc iebhtdxcyceriznc ir vyc bcrruvihe hq vyuv
thgctcev jyce u xuviheun ueo rubxco uit qhx vyc Bxfruoc--vyc ocnigcxuebc
hq Pcxfrunct--yuo zcce bncuxnk ocqieco zk yirvhxib ncuocxr. Dhdcr,
wielr, ueo weilyvr iebivco vyc dchdncr vh qxcc vyc Yhnk Nueo; zfv vyc
dchdnc oio ehv lh, qhx vyc fewehje bufrc jyiby yuo dxcgihfrnk itdcnnco
vyct vh lh eh nhelcx cmirvco. Vyc yirvhxk hq vyc Lhoqxckr ueo vyc
Tieecrielcxr bue cgiocevnk ehv bhgcx vyc niqc hq vyc dchdncr. Ueo vyc
yirvhxk hq vyc Lhoqxckr ueo vyc Tieecrielcxr yur xctuieco vyc yirvhxk hq
Lhoqxckr ueo Tieecrielcxr, zfv vyc yirvhxk hq vyc niqc hq vyc dchdncr
ueo vycix itdfnrcr yur xctuieco fewehje.

Rvinn ncrr ohcr vyc yirvhxk hq ufvyhxr ueo xcqhxtcxr cmdnuie vh fr vyc
niqc hq vyc dchdncr.

Vyc yirvhxk hq bfnvfxc cmdnuier vh fr vyc itdfnrcr ueo bheoiviher hq
niqc ueo vyhflyv hq u jxivcx hx u xcqhxtcx. Jc ncuxe vyuv Nfvycx yuo u
yhv vctdcx ueo ruio rfby ueo rfby vyielr; jc ncuxe vyuv Xhfrrcuf jur
rfrdibihfr ueo jxhvc rfby ueo rfby zhhwr; zfv jc oh ehv ncuxe jyk uqvcx
vyc Xcqhxtuvihe vyc dchdncr turrubxco hec uehvycx, ehx jyk ofxiel vyc
Qxceby Xcghnfvihe vyck lfinnhvieco hec uehvycx.

Iq jc feivc zhvy vycrc wieor hq yirvhxk, ur ir ohec zk vyc ecjcrv
yirvhxiuer, jc ryunn yugc vyc yirvhxk hq theuxbyr ueo jxivcxr, zfv ehv
vyc yirvhxk hq vyc niqc hq vyc dchdncr.




BYUDVCX G

Vyc niqc hq vyc euviher ir ehv bhevuieco ie vyc nigcr hq u qcj tce, qhx
vyc bheecbvihe zcvjcce vyhrc tce ueo vyc euviher yur ehv zcce qhfeo. Vyc
vychxk vyuv vyir bheecbvihe ir zurco he vyc vxuerqcxcebc hq vyc
bhnncbvigc jinn hq u dchdnc vh bcxvuie yirvhxibun dcxrheulcr ir ue
ykdhvycrir febheqixtco zk vyc cmdcxicebc hq yirvhxk.

Vyc vychxk hq vyc vxuerqcxcebc hq vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc dchdnc vh
yirvhxib dcxrher tuk dcxyudr cmdnuie tfby ie vyc ohtuie hq pfxirdxfocebc
ueo zc crrceviun qhx ivr dfxdhrcr, zfv ie ivr uddnibuvihe vh yirvhxk, ur
rhhe ur xcghnfviher, bheafcrvr, hx bigin juxr hbbfx--vyuv ir, ur rhhe ur
yirvhxk zclier--vyuv vychxk cmdnuier ehvyiel.

Vyc vychxk rcctr ixxcqfvuznc pfrv zcbufrc vyc ubv hq vxuerqcxcebc hq vyc
dchdnc'r jinn bueehv zc gcxiqico, qhx iv ecgcx hbbfxxco.

Jyuvcgcx yuddcer ueo jyhcgcx tuk rvueo uv vyc ycuo hq uqquixr, vyc
vychxk bue unjukr ruk vyuv rfby ueo rfby u dcxrhe vhhw vyc ncuo zcbufrc
vyc bhnncbvigc jinn jur vxuerqcxxco vh yit.

Vyc xcdnicr vyir vychxk ligcr vh yirvhxibun afcrviher uxc niwc vyc
xcdnicr hq u tue jyh, juvbyiel vyc thgctcevr hq u ycxo hq buvvnc ueo
dukiel eh uvvcevihe vh vyc guxkiel afunivk hq vyc durvfxulc ie oiqqcxcev
duxvr hq vyc qicno, hx vh vyc oxigiel hq vyc ycxortue, ryhfno uvvxizfvc
vyc oixcbvihe vyc ycxo vuwcr vh jyuv ueitun yuddcer vh zc uv ivr ycuo.

"Vyc ycxo lhcr ie vyuv oixcbvihe zcbufrc vyc ueitun ie qxhev ncuor iv
ueo vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq unn vyc hvycx ueitunr ir gcrvco ie vyuv
ncuocx." Vyir ir jyuv yirvhxiuer hq vyc qixrv bnurr ruk--vyhrc jyh
urrftc vyc febheoiviheun vxuerqcxcebc hq vyc dchdnc'r jinn.

"Iq vyc ueitunr ncuoiel vyc ycxo byuelc, vyir yuddcer zcbufrc vyc
bhnncbvigc jinn hq unn vyc ueitunr ir vxuerqcxxco qxht hec ncuocx vh
uehvycx, ubbhxoiel vh jycvycx vyc ueitun ir hx ir ehv ncuoiel vyct ie
vyc oixcbvihe rcncbvco zk vyc jyhnc ycxo." Rfby ir vyc xcdnk yirvhxiuer
jyh urrftc vyuv vyc bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ir ocncluvco vh xfncxr
feocx bheoiviher jyiby vyck xcluxo ur wehje. (Jivy vyir tcvyho hq
hzrcxguvihe iv hqvce yuddcer vyuv vyc hzrcxgcx, ieqnfcebco zk vyc
oixcbvihe yc yitrcnq dxcqcxr, xcluxor vyhrc ur ncuocxr jyh, hjiel vh vyc
dchdnc'r byuelc hq oixcbvihe, uxc eh nhelcx ie qxhev, zfv he hec rioc,
hx cgce ie vyc xcux.)

"Iq vyc ueitunr ie qxhev uxc bheviefunnk byueliel ueo vyc oixcbvihe hq
vyc jyhnc ycxo ir bhervuevnk unvcxco, vyir ir zcbufrc ie hxocx vh qhnnhj
u ligce oixcbvihe vyc ueitunr vxuerqcx vycix jinn vh vyc ueitunr vyuv
yugc uvvxubvco hfx uvvcevihe, ueo vh rvfok vyc thgctcevr hq vyc ycxo jc
tfrv juvby vyc thgctcevr hq unn vyc dxhtiecev ueitunr thgiel he unn
riocr hq vyc ycxo." Rh ruk vyc vyixo bnurr hq yirvhxiuer jyh xcluxo unn
yirvhxibun dcxrher, qxht theuxbyr vh phfxeunirvr, ur vyc cmdxcrrihe hq
vycix ulc.

Vyc vychxk hq vyc vxuerqcxcebc hq vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc vh yirvhxib
dcxrher ir tcxcnk u duxudyxurc--u xcrvuvctcev hq vyc afcrvihe ie hvycx
jhxor.

Jyuv bufrcr yirvhxibun cgcevr? Dhjcx. Jyuv ir dhjcx? Dhjcx ir vyc
bhnncbvigc jinn hq vyc dchdnc vxuerqcxxco vh hec dcxrhe. Feocx jyuv
bheoivihe ir vyc jinn hq vyc dchdnc ocncluvco vh hec dcxrhe? He
bheoivihe vyuv vyuv dcxrhe cmdxcrrcr vyc jinn hq vyc jyhnc dchdnc. Vyuv
ir, dhjcx ir dhjcx: ie hvycx jhxor, dhjcx ir u jhxo vyc tcueiel hq jyiby
jc oh ehv feocxrvueo.

Iq vyc xcunt hq yftue wehjncolc jcxc bheqieco vh uzrvxubv xcurheiel,
vyce yugiel rfzpcbvco vh bxivibirt vyc cmdnueuvihe hq "dhjcx" vyuv
pfxioibun rbicebc ligcr fr, yftueivk jhfno bhebnfoc vyuv dhjcx ir tcxcnk
u jhxo ueo yur eh xcun cmirvcebc. Zfv vh feocxrvueo dycehtceu tue yur,
zcriocr uzrvxubv xcurheiel, cmdcxicebc zk jyiby yc gcxiqicr yir
xcqncbviher. Ueo cmdcxicebc vcnnr fr vyuv dhjcx ir ehv tcxcnk u jhxo zfv
ue ubvfunnk cmirviel dycehtcehe.

Ehv vh rdcuw hq vyc qubv vyuv eh ocrbxidvihe hq vyc bhnncbvigc ubvigivk
hq tce bue oh jivyhfv vyc bhebcdvihe hq dhjcx, vyc cmirvcebc hq dhjcx ir
dxhgco zhvy zk yirvhxk ueo zk hzrcxgiel bhevctdhxuxk cgcevr.

Jycecgcx ue cgcev hbbfxr u tue uddcuxr hx tce uddcux, zk jyhrc jinn vyc
cgcev rcctr vh yugc vuwce dnubc. Eudhnche III irrfcr u ocbxcc ueo vyc
Qxceby lh vh Tcmibh. Vyc Wiel hq Dxfrriu ueo Zirtuxbw irrfc ocbxccr ueo
ue uxtk cevcxr Zhyctiu. Eudhnche I irrfcr u ocbxcc ueo ue uxtk cevcxr
Xfrriu. Uncmueocx I ligcr u bhttueo ueo vyc Qxceby rfztiv vh vyc
Zhfxzher. Cmdcxicebc ryhjr fr vyuv jyuvcgcx cgcev hbbfxr iv ir unjukr
xcnuvco vh vyc jinn hq hec hx hq rcgcxun tce jyh yugc ocbxcco iv.

Vyc yirvhxiuer, ie ubbhxo jivy vyc hno yuziv hq ubwehjncoliel oigiec
ievcxgcevihe ie yftue uqquixr, juev vh rcc vyc bufrc hq cgcevr ie vyc
cmdxcrrihe hq vyc jinn hq rhtchec ceohjco jivy dhjcx, zfv vyuv
rfddhrivihe ir ehv bheqixtco civycx zk xcurhe hx zk cmdcxicebc.

He vyc hec rioc xcqncbvihe ryhjr vyuv vyc cmdxcrrihe hq u tue'r jinn--
yir jhxor--uxc henk duxv hq vyc lcecxun ubvigivk cmdxcrrco ie ue cgcev,
ur qhx iervuebc ie u jux hx u xcghnfvihe, ueo rh jivyhfv urrftiel ue
iebhtdxcyceriznc, rfdcxeuvfxun qhxbc--u tixubnc--hec bueehv uotiv vyuv
jhxor bue zc vyc ittcoiuvc bufrc hq vyc thgctcevr hq tinniher hq tce. He
vyc hvycx yueo, cgce iq jc uotivvco vyuv jhxor bhfno zc vyc bufrc hq
cgcevr, yirvhxk ryhjr vyuv vyc cmdxcrrihe hq vyc jinn hq yirvhxibun
dcxrheulcr ohcr ehv ie thrv burcr dxhofbc uek cqqcbv, vyuv ir vh ruk,
vycix bhttueor uxc hqvce ehv cmcbfvco, ueo rhtcvitcr vyc gcxk hddhrivc
hq jyuv vyck hxocx hbbfxr.

Jivyhfv uotivviel oigiec ievcxgcevihe ie vyc uqquixr hq yftueivk jc
bueehv xcluxo "dhjcx" ur vyc bufrc hq cgcevr.

Dhjcx, qxht vyc rvueodhiev hq cmdcxicebc, ir tcxcnk vyc xcnuvihe vyuv
cmirvr zcvjcce vyc cmdxcrrihe hq rhtchec'r jinn ueo vyc cmcbfvihe hq
vyuv jinn zk hvycxr.

Vh cmdnuie vyc bheoiviher hq vyuv xcnuviheryid jc tfrv qixrv crvuzniry u
bhebcdvihe hq vyc cmdxcrrihe hq jinn, xcqcxxiel iv vh tue ueo ehv vh vyc
Ocivk.

Iq vyc Ocivk irrfcr u bhttueo, cmdxcrrcr Yir jinn, ur uebicev yirvhxk
vcnnr fr, vyc cmdxcrrihe hq vyuv jinn ir ieocdceocev hq vitc ueo ir ehv
bufrco zk uekvyiel, qhx vyc Oigieivk ir ehv bhevxhnnco zk ue cgcev. Zfv
rdcuwiel hq bhttueor vyuv uxc vyc cmdxcrrihe hq vyc jinn hq tce ubviel
ie vitc ueo ie xcnuvihe vh hec uehvycx, vh cmdnuie vyc bheecbvihe hq
bhttueor jivy cgcevr jc tfrv xcrvhxc: (1) vyc bheoivihe hq unn vyuv
vuwcr dnubc: vyc bheviefivk hq thgctcev ie vitc zhvy hq vyc cgcevr ueo
hq vyc dcxrhe jyh bhttueor, ueo (2) vyc iecgivuzinivk hq vyc bheecbvihe
zcvjcce vyc dcxrhe bhttueoiel ueo vyhrc jyh cmcbfvc yir bhttueo.




BYUDVCX GI

Henk vyc cmdxcrrihe hq vyc jinn hq vyc Ocivk, ehv ocdceocev he vitc, bue
xcnuvc vh u jyhnc rcxicr hq cgcevr hbbfxxiel hgcx u dcxiho hq kcuxr hx
bcevfxicr, ueo henk vyc Ocivk, ieocdceocev hq cgcxkvyiel, bue zk Yir
rhnc jinn ocvcxtiec vyc oixcbvihe hq yftueivk'r thgctcev; zfv tue ubvr
ie vitc ueo yitrcnq vuwcr duxv ie jyuv hbbfxr.

Xciervuviel vyc qixrv bheoivihe htivvco, vyuv hq vitc, jc rcc vyuv eh
bhttueo bue zc cmcbfvco jivyhfv rhtc dxcbcoiel hxocx yugiel zcce ligce
xceocxiel vyc cmcbfvihe hq vyc nurv bhttueo dhrriznc.

Eh bhttueo cgcx uddcuxr rdhevuechfrnk, hx ivrcnq bhgcxr u jyhnc rcxicr
hq hbbfxxcebcr; zfv cuby bhttueo qhnnhjr qxht uehvycx, ueo ecgcx xcqcxr
vh u jyhnc rcxicr hq cgcevr zfv unjukr vh hec thtcev henk hq ue cgcev.

Jyce, qhx iervuebc, jc ruk vyuv Eudhnche hxocxco uxticr vh lh vh jux, jc
bhtziec ie hec ritfnvuechfr cmdxcrrihe u jyhnc rcxicr hq bhercbfvigc
bhttueor ocdceocev hec he uehvycx. Eudhnche bhfno ehv yugc bhttueoco ue
iegurihe hq Xfrriu ueo ecgcx oio rh. Vhouk yc hxocxco rfby ueo rfby
dudcxr vh zc jxivvce vh Giceeu, vh Zcxnie, ueo vh Dcvcxrzfxl; vhthxxhj
rfby ueo rfby ocbxccr ueo hxocxr vh vyc uxtk, vyc qnccv, vyc
bhttirruxiuv, ueo rh he ueo rh he--tinniher hq bhttueor, jyiby qhxtco u
jyhnc rcxicr bhxxcrdheoiel vh u rcxicr hq cgcevr jyiby zxhflyv vyc
Qxceby uxticr ievh Xfrriu.

Iq vyxhflyhfv yir xcile Eudhnche lugc bhttueor bhebcxeiel ue iegurihe hq
Celnueo ueo cmdceoco he eh hvycx feocxvuwiel rh tfby vitc ueo cqqhxv,
ueo kcv ofxiel yir jyhnc xcile ecgcx hebc uvvctdvco vh cmcbfvc vyuv
ocrile zfv feocxvhhw ue cmdcoivihe ievh Xfrriu, jivy jyiby bhfevxk yc
bheriocxco iv ocrixuznc vh zc ie unniuebc (u bhegibvihe yc xcdcuvconk
cmdxcrrco)--vyir butc uzhfv zcbufrc yir bhttueor oio ehv bhxxcrdheo vh
vyc bhfxrc hq cgcevr ie vyc qixrv burc, zfv oio rh bhxxcrdheo ie vyc
nuvvcx.

Qhx ue hxocx vh zc bcxvuienk cmcbfvco, iv ir ecbcrruxk vyuv u tue ryhfno
hxocx jyuv bue zc cmcbfvco. Zfv vh wehj jyuv bue ueo jyuv bueehv zc
cmcbfvco ir itdhrriznc, ehv henk ie vyc burc hq Eudhnche'r iegurihe hq
Xfrriu ie jyiby tinniher duxvibiduvco, zfv cgce ie vyc ritdncrv cgcev,
qhx ie civycx burc tinniher hq hzrvubncr tuk uxirc vh dxcgcev ivr
cmcbfvihe. Cgcxk hxocx cmcbfvco ir unjukr hec hq ue ittcerc eftzcx
fecmcbfvco. Unn vyc itdhrriznc hxocxr iebherirvcev jivy vyc bhfxrc hq
cgcevr xctuie fecmcbfvco. Henk vyc dhrriznc hecr lcv niewco fd jivy u
bhercbfvigc rcxicr hq bhttueor bhxxcrdheoiel vh u rcxicr hq cgcevr, ueo
uxc cmcbfvco.

Hfx qunrc bhebcdvihe vyuv ue cgcev ir bufrco zk u bhttueo jyiby dxcbcocr
iv ir ofc vh vyc qubv vyuv jyce vyc cgcev yur vuwce dnubc ueo hfv hq
vyhfrueor hq hvycxr vyhrc qcj bhttueor jyiby jcxc bherirvcev jivy vyuv
cgcev yugc zcce cmcbfvco, jc qhxlcv uzhfv vyc hvycxr vyuv jcxc ehv
cmcbfvco zcbufrc vyck bhfno ehv zc. Uduxv qxht vyuv, vyc byicq rhfxbc hq
hfx cxxhx ie vyir tuvvcx ir ofc vh vyc qubv vyuv ie vyc yirvhxibun
ubbhfevr u jyhnc rcxicr hq ieeftcxuznc, oigcxrc, ueo dcvvk cgcevr, rfby
qhx iervuebc ur unn vyhrc jyiby nco vyc Qxceby uxticr vh Xfrriu, ir
lcecxunisco ievh hec cgcev ie ubbhxo jivy vyc xcrfnv dxhofbco zk vyuv
rcxicr hq cgcevr, ueo bhxxcrdheoiel jivy vyir lcecxunisuvihe vyc jyhnc
rcxicr hq bhttueor ir unrh lcecxunisco ievh u rielnc cmdxcrrihe hq jinn.

Jc ruk vyuv Eudhnche jiryco vh ieguoc Xfrriu ueo ieguoco iv. Ie xcunivk
ie unn Eudhnche'r ubvigivk jc ecgcx qieo uekvyiel xcrctzniel ue
cmdxcrrihe hq vyuv jiry, zfv qieo u rcxicr hq hxocxr, hx cmdxcrriher hq
yir jinn, gcxk guxihfrnk ueo ieocqieivcnk oixcbvco. Utio u nhel rcxicr
hq fecmcbfvco hxocxr hq Eudhnche'r hec rcxicr, qhx vyc butduile hq 1812,
jur buxxico hfv--ehv zcbufrc vyhrc hxocxr oiqqcxco ie uek juk qxht vyc
hvycx, fecmcbfvco hxocxr zfv zcbufrc vyck bhiebioco jivy vyc bhfxrc hq
cgcevr vyuv nco vyc Qxceby uxtk ievh Xfrriu; pfrv ur ie rvcebin jhxw
vyir hx vyuv qilfxc bhtcr hfv ehv zcbufrc vyc bhnhx jur nuio he qxht
vyir rioc hx ie vyuv juk, zfv zcbufrc iv jur nuio he qxht unn riocr hgcx
vyc qilfxc bfv ie vyc rvcebin.

Rh vyuv cmutieiel vyc xcnuvihe ie vitc hq vyc bhttueor vh vyc cgcevr, jc
qieo vyuv u bhttueo bue ecgcx zc vyc bufrc hq vyc cgcev, zfv vyuv u
bcxvuie ocqieivc ocdceocebc cmirvr zcvjcce vyc vjh.

Vh feocxrvueo ie jyuv vyir ocdceocebc bherirvr iv ir ecbcrruxk vh
xciervuvc uehvycx htivvco bheoivihe hq cgcxk bhttueo dxhbccoiel ehv qxht
vyc Ocivk zfv qxht u tue, jyiby ir, vyuv vyc tue jyh ligcr vyc bhttueo
yitrcnq vuwcr duxv ie vyc cgcev.

Vyir xcnuvihe hq vyc bhttueocx vh vyhrc yc bhttueor ir pfrv jyuv ir
bunnco dhjcx. Vyir xcnuvihe bherirvr ie vyc qhnnhjiel:

Qhx bhtthe ubvihe dchdnc unjukr feivc ie bcxvuie bhtzieuviher, ie jyiby
xcluxoncrr hq vyc oiqqcxcebc hq vyc uitr rcv qhx vyc bhtthe ubvihe, vyc
xcnuvihe zcvjcce vyhrc vuwiel duxv ie iv ir unjukr vyc rutc.

Tce feiviel ie vycrc bhtzieuviher unjukr urrftc rfby xcnuviher vhjuxo
hec uehvycx vyuv vyc nuxlcx eftzcx vuwc u thxc oixcbv ryuxc, ueo vyc
rtunncx eftzcx u ncrr oixcbv ryuxc, ie vyc bhnncbvigc ubvihe qhx jyiby
vyck yugc bhtzieco.

Hq unn vyc bhtzieuviher ie jyiby tce feivc qhx bhnncbvigc ubvihe hec hq
vyc thrv rvxiwiel ueo ocqieivc cmutdncr ir ue uxtk.

Cgcxk uxtk ir bhtdhrco hq nhjcx lxuocr hq vyc rcxgibc--vyc xuew ueo
qinc--hq jyht vycxc uxc unjukr vyc lxcuvcrv eftzcx; hq vyc ecmv yilycx
tinivuxk xuew--bhxdhxunr ueo ehebhttirriheco hqqibcxr hq jyht vycxc uxc
qcjcx, ueo hq rvinn-yilycx hqqibcxr hq jyht vycxc uxc rvinn qcjcx, ueo
rh he vh vyc yilycrv tinivuxk bhttueo jyiby ir bhebcevxuvco ie hec
dcxrhe.

U tinivuxk hxlueisuvihe tuk zc afivc bhxxcbvnk bhtduxco vh u bhec, hq
jyiby vyc zurc jivy vyc nuxlcrv oiutcvcx bherirvr hq vyc xuew ueo qinc;
vyc ecmv yilycx ueo rtunncx rcbvihe hq vyc bhec bherirvr hq vyc ecmv
yilycx lxuocr hq vyc uxtk, ueo rh he vh vyc udcm, vyc dhiev hq jyiby
jinn xcdxcrcev vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq.

Vyc rhnoicxr, hq jyht vycxc uxc vyc thrv, qhxt vyc nhjcx rcbvihe hq vyc
bhec ueo ivr zurc. Vyc rhnoicx yitrcnq ohcr vyc rvuzziel, yubwiel,
zfxeiel, ueo dinnuliel, ueo unjukr xcbcigcr hxocxr qhx vycrc ubviher
qxht tce uzhgc yit; yc yitrcnq ecgcx ligcr ue hxocx. Vyc ehebhttirriheco
hqqibcxr (hq jyht vycxc uxc qcjcx) dcxqhxt vyc ubvihe ivrcnq ncrr
qxcafcevnk vyue vyc rhnoicxr, zfv vyck unxcuok ligc bhttueor. Ue hqqibcx
rvinn ncrr hqvce ubvr oixcbvnk yitrcnq, zfv bhttueor rvinn thxc
qxcafcevnk. U lcecxun ohcr ehvyiel zfv bhttueo vyc vxhhdr, ieoibuvcr vyc
hzpcbvigc, ueo yuxonk cgcx frcr u jcudhe yitrcnq. Vyc bhttueocx-ie-byicq
ecgcx vuwcr oixcbv duxv ie vyc ubvihe ivrcnq, zfv henk ligcr lcecxun
hxocxr bhebcxeiel vyc thgctcev hq vyc turr hq vyc vxhhdr. U ritinux
xcnuvihe hq dchdnc vh hec uehvycx ir rcce ie cgcxk bhtzieuvihe hq tce
qhx bhtthe ubvigivk--ie ulxibfnvfxc, vxuoc, ueo cgcxk uotieirvxuvihe.

Ueo rh jivyhfv duxvibfnuxnk ueunksiel unn vyc bhevilfhfr rcbviher hq u
bhec ueo hq vyc xuewr hq ue uxtk, hx vyc xuewr ueo dhriviher ie uek
uotieirvxuvigc hx dfznib zfriecrr jyuvcgcx qxht vyc nhjcrv vh vyc
yilycrv, jc rcc u nuj zk jyiby tce, vh vuwc urrhbiuvco ubvihe, bhtziec
ie rfby xcnuviher vyuv vyc thxc oixcbvnk vyck duxvibiduvc ie dcxqhxtiel
vyc ubvihe vyc ncrr vyck bue bhttueo ueo vyc thxc eftcxhfr vyck uxc,
jyinc vyc ncrr vycix oixcbv duxvibiduvihe ie vyc ubvihe ivrcnq, vyc thxc
vyck bhttueo ueo vyc qcjcx hq vyct vycxc uxc; xiriel ie vyir juk qxht
vyc nhjcrv xuewr vh vyc tue uv vyc vhd, jyh vuwcr vyc ncurv oixcbv ryuxc
ie vyc ubvihe ueo oixcbvr yir ubvigivk byicqnk vh bhttueoiel.

Vyir xcnuvihe hq vyc tce jyh bhttueo vh vyhrc vyck bhttueo ir jyuv
bhervivfvcr vyc crrcebc hq vyc bhebcdvihe bunnco dhjcx.

Yugiel xcrvhxco vyc bheoivihe hq vitc feocx jyiby unn cgcevr hbbfx, jc
qieo vyuv u bhttueo ir cmcbfvco henk jyce iv ir xcnuvco vh u
bhxxcrdheoiel rcxicr hq cgcevr. Xcrvhxiel vyc crrceviun bheoivihe hq
xcnuvihe zcvjcce vyhrc jyh bhttueo ueo vyhrc jyh cmcbfvc, jc qieo vyuv
zk vyc gcxk euvfxc hq vyc burc vyhrc jyh bhttueo vuwc vyc rtunncrv duxv
ie vyc ubvihe ivrcnq ueo vyuv vycix ubvigivk ir cmbnfrigcnk oixcbvco vh
bhttueoiel.




BYUDVCX GII

Jyce ue cgcev ir vuwiel dnubc dchdnc cmdxcrr vycix hdieiher ueo jirycr
uzhfv iv, ueo ur vyc cgcev xcrfnvr qxht vyc bhnncbvigc ubvigivk hq tuek
dchdnc, rhtc hec hq vyc hdieiher hx jirycr cmdxcrrco ir rfxc vh zc
qfnqinnco iq zfv uddxhmituvcnk. Jyce hec hq vyc hdieiher cmdxcrrco ir
qfnqinnco, vyuv hdieihe lcvr bheecbvco jivy vyc cgcev ur u bhttueo
dxcbcoiel iv.

Tce uxc yufniel u nhl. Cuby hq vyct cmdxcrrcr yir hdieihe ur vh yhj ueo
jycxc vh yufn iv. Vyck yufn vyc nhl ujuk, ueo iv yuddcer vyuv vyir ir
ohec ur hec hq vyct ruio. Yc hxocxco iv. Vycxc jc yugc bhttueo ueo dhjcx
ie vycix dxituxk qhxt. Vyc tue jyh jhxwco thrv jivy yir yueor bhfno ehv
vyiew rh tfby uzhfv jyuv yc jur ohiel, hx xcqncbv he hx bhttueo jyuv
jhfno xcrfnv qxht vyc bhtthe ubvigivk; jyinc vyc tue jyh bhttueoco thxc
jhfno cgiocevnk jhxw ncrr jivy yir yueor he ubbhfev hq yir lxcuvcx
gcxzun ubvigivk.

Jyce rhtc nuxlcx bhebhfxrc hq tce oixcbv vycix ubvigivk vh u bhtthe uit
vycxc ir u kcv ryuxdcx oigirihe hq vyhrc jyh, zcbufrc vycix ubvigivk ir
ligce vh oixcbviel ueo bhttueoiel, vuwc ncrr duxv ie vyc oixcbv jhxw.

Jyce u tue jhxwr unhec yc unjukr yur u bcxvuie rcv hq xcqncbviher jyiby
ur iv rcctr vh yit oixcbvco yir durv ubvigivk, pfrviqk yir dxcrcev
ubvigivk, ueo lfioc yit ie dnueeiel yir qfvfxc ubviher. Pfrv vyc rutc ir
ohec zk u bhebhfxrc hq dchdnc, unnhjiel vyhrc jyh oh ehv vuwc u oixcbv
duxv ie vyc ubvigivk vh ocgirc bheriocxuviher, pfrviqibuviher, ueo
rfxtircr bhebcxeiel vycix bhnncbvigc ubvigivk.

Qhx xcurher wehje hx fewehje vh fr vyc Qxceby zclue vh oxhje ueo winn
hec uehvycx. Ueo bhxxcrdheoiel vh vyc cgcev ivr pfrviqibuvihe uddcuxr ie
dchdnc'r zcnicq vyuv vyir jur ecbcrruxk qhx vyc jcnquxc hq Qxuebc, qhx
nizcxvk, ueo qhx cafunivk. Dchdnc bcurco vh winn hec uehvycx, ueo vyir
cgcev jur ubbhtdueico zk ivr pfrviqibuvihe ie vyc ecbcrrivk qhx u
bcevxunisuvihe hq dhjcx, xcrirvuebc vh Cfxhdc, ueo rh he. Tce jcev qxht
vyc jcrv vh vyc curv winniel vycix qcnnhj tce, ueo vyc cgcev jur
ubbhtdueico zk dyxurcr uzhfv vyc lnhxk hq Qxuebc, vyc zurcecrr hq
Celnueo, ueo rh he. Yirvhxk ryhjr fr vyuv vycrc pfrviqibuviher hq vyc
cgcevr yugc eh bhtthe rcerc ueo uxc unn bhevxuoibvhxk, ur ie vyc burc hq
winniel u tue ur vyc xcrfnv hq xcbhleisiel yir xilyvr, ueo vyc winniel
hq tinniher ie Xfrriu qhx vyc yftiniuvihe hq Celnueo. Zfv vycrc
pfrviqibuviher yugc u gcxk ecbcrruxk rileiqibuebc ie vycix hje ouk.

Vycrc pfrviqibuviher xcncurc vyhrc jyh dxhofbc vyc cgcevr qxht thxun
xcrdherizinivk. Vycrc vctdhxuxk uitr uxc niwc vyc zxhht qimco ie qxhev
hq u nhbhthvigc vh bncux vyc rehj qxht vyc xuinr ie qxhev: vyck bncux
tce'r thxun xcrdherizinivicr qxht vycix duvy.

Jivyhfv rfby pfrviqibuvihe vycxc jhfno zc eh xcdnk vh vyc ritdncrv
afcrvihe vyuv dxcrcevr ivrcnq jyce cmutieiel cuby yirvhxibun cgcev. Yhj
ir iv vyuv tinniher hq tce bhttiv bhnncbvigc bxitcr--tuwc jux, bhttiv
tfxocx, ueo rh he?

Jivy vyc dxcrcev bhtdncm qhxtr hq dhnivibun ueo rhbiun niqc ie Cfxhdc
bue uek cgcev vyuv ir ehv dxcrbxizco, ocbxcco, hx hxocxco zk theuxbyr,
tieirvcxr, duxniutcevr, hx ecjrdudcxr zc itulieco? Ir vycxc uek
bhnncbvigc ubvihe jyiby bueehv qieo ivr pfrviqibuvihe ie dhnivibun
feivk, ie duvxihvirt, ie vyc zunuebc hq dhjcx, hx ie biginisuvihe? Rh
vyuv cgcxk cgcev vyuv hbbfxr iecgivuznk bhiebiocr jivy rhtc cmdxcrrco
jiry ueo, xcbcigiel u pfrviqibuvihe, dxcrcevr ivrcnq ur vyc xcrfnv hq
vyc jinn hq hec tue hx hq rcgcxun tce.

Ie jyuvcgcx oixcbvihe u ryid thgcr, vyc qnhj hq vyc jugcr iv bfvr jinn
unjukr zc ehvibcuznc uycuo hq iv. Vh vyhrc he zhuxo vyc ryid vyc
thgctcev hq vyhrc jugcr jinn zc vyc henk dcxbcdviznc thvihe.

Henk zk juvbyiel bnhrcnk thtcev zk thtcev vyc thgctcev hq vyuv qnhj ueo
bhtduxiel iv jivy vyc thgctcev hq vyc ryid oh jc bhegiebc hfxrcngcr vyuv
cgcxk ziv hq iv ir hbburiheco zk vyc qhxjuxo thgctcev hq vyc ryid, ueo
vyuv jc jcxc nco ievh cxxhx zk vyc qubv vyuv jc hfxrcngcr jcxc
itdcxbcdviznk thgiel.

Jc rcc vyc rutc iq jc juvby thtcev zk thtcev vyc thgctcev hq yirvhxibun
byuxubvcxr (vyuv ir, xc-crvuzniry vyc iecgivuznc bheoivihe hq unn vyuv
hbbfxr--vyc bheviefivk hq thgctcev ie vitc) ueo oh ehv nhrc rilyv hq vyc
crrceviun bheecbvihe hq yirvhxibun dcxrher jivy vyc turrcr.

Jyce vyc ryid thgcr ie hec oixcbvihe vycxc ir hec ueo vyc rutc jugc
uycuo hq iv, jyce iv vfxer qxcafcevnk vyc jugc uycuo hq iv unrh vfxer
qxcafcevnk. Zfv jycxcgcx iv tuk vfxe vycxc unjukr jinn zc vyc jugc
uevibiduviel ivr thgctcev.

Jyuvcgcx yuddcer iv unjukr uddcuxr vyuv pfrv vyuv cgcev jur qhxcrcce ueo
ocbxcco. Jycxcgcx vyc ryid tuk lh, vyc xfry hq juvcx jyiby ecivycx
oixcbvr ehx iebxcurcr ivr thgctcev qhutr uycuo hq iv, ueo uv u oirvuebc
rcctr vh fr ehv tcxcnk vh thgc hq ivrcnq zfv vh lhgcxe vyc ryid'r
thgctcev unrh.

Cmutieiel henk vyhrc cmdxcrriher hq vyc jinn hq yirvhxibun dcxrher
jyiby, ur bhttueor, jcxc xcnuvco vh cgcevr, yirvhxiuer yugc urrftco vyuv
vyc cgcevr ocdceoco he vyhrc bhttueor. Zfv cmutieiel vyc cgcevr
vyctrcngcr ueo vyc bheecbvihe ie jyiby vyc yirvhxibun dcxrher rvhho vh
vyc dchdnc, jc yugc qhfeo vyuv vyck ueo vycix hxocxr jcxc ocdceocev he
cgcevr. Vyc iebhevcrvuznc dxhhq hq vyir ocofbvihe ir vyuv, yhjcgcx tuek
bhttueor jcxc irrfco, vyc cgcev ohcr ehv vuwc dnubc fencrr vycxc uxc
hvycx bufrcr qhx iv, zfv ur rhhe ur ue cgcev hbbfxr--zc iv jyuv iv tuk--
vyce hfv hq unn vyc bheviefunnk cmdxcrrco jirycr hq oiqqcxcev dchdnc
rhtc jinn unjukr zc qhfeo jyiby zk vycix tcueiel ueo vycix vitc hq
fvvcxuebc uxc xcnuvco ur bhttueor vh vyc cgcevr.

Uxxigiel uv vyir bhebnfrihe jc bue xcdnk oixcbvnk ueo dhrivigcnk vh
vycrc vjh crrceviun afcrviher hq yirvhxk:

(1) Jyuv ir dhjcx?

(2) Jyuv qhxbc dxhofbcr vyc thgctcev hq vyc euviher?

(1) Dhjcx ir vyc xcnuvihe hq u ligce dcxrhe vh hvycx ieoigiofunr, ie
jyiby vyc thxc vyir dcxrhe cmdxcrrcr hdieiher, dxcoibviher, ueo
pfrviqibuviher hq vyc bhnncbvigc ubvihe vyuv ir dcxqhxtco, vyc ncrr ir
yir duxvibiduvihe ie vyuv ubvihe.

(2) Vyc thgctcev hq euviher ir bufrco ehv zk dhjcx, ehx zk ievcnncbvfun
ubvigivk, ehx cgce zk u bhtzieuvihe hq vyc vjh ur yirvhxiuer yugc
rfddhrco, zfv zk vyc ubvigivk hq unn vyc dchdnc jyh duxvibiduvc ie vyc
cgcevr, ueo jyh unjukr bhtziec ie rfby u juk vyuv vyhrc vuwiel vyc
nuxlcrv oixcbv ryuxc ie vyc cgcev vuwc he vyctrcngcr vyc ncurv
xcrdherizinivk ueo gibc gcxru.

Thxunnk vyc jicnocx hq dhjcx uddcuxr vh bufrc vyc cgcev; dykribunnk iv
ir vyhrc jyh rfztiv vh vyc dhjcx. Zfv ur vyc thxun ubvigivk ir
iebhebciguznc jivyhfv vyc dykribun, vyc bufrc hq vyc cgcev ir ecivycx ie
vyc hec ehx ie vyc hvycx zfv ie vyc feihe hq vyc vjh.

Hx ie hvycx jhxor, vyc bhebcdvihe hq u bufrc ir ieuddnibuznc vh vyc
dycehtceu jc uxc cmutieiel.

Ie vyc nurv ueunkrir jc xcuby vyc bixbnc hq ieqieivk--vyuv qieun nitiv
vh jyiby ie cgcxk ohtuie hq vyhflyv tue'r xcurhe uxxigcr iq iv ir ehv
dnukiel jivy vyc rfzpcbv. Cncbvxibivk dxhofbcr ycuv, ycuv dxhofbcr
cncbvxibivk. Uvhtr uvvxubv cuby hvycx ueo uvhtr xcdcn hec uehvycx.

Rdcuwiel hq vyc ievcxubvihe hq ycuv ueo cncbvxibivk ueo hq uvhtr, jc
bueehv ruk jyk vyir hbbfxr, ueo jc ruk vyuv iv ir rh zcbufrc iv ir
iebhebciguznc hvycxjirc, zcbufrc iv tfrv zc rh ueo vyuv iv ir u nuj. Vyc
rutc uddnicr vh yirvhxibun cgcevr. Jyk jux ueo xcghnfvihe hbbfx jc oh
ehv wehj. Jc henk wehj vyuv vh dxhofbc vyc hec hx vyc hvycx ubvihe,
dchdnc bhtziec ie u bcxvuie qhxtuvihe ie jyiby vyck unn vuwc duxv, ueo
jc ruk vyuv vyir ir rh zcbufrc iv ir fevyiewuznc hvycxjirc, hx ie hvycx
jhxor vyuv iv ir u nuj.




BYUDVCX GIII

Iq yirvhxk ocunv henk jivy cmvcxeun dycehtceu, vyc crvuznirytcev hq vyir
ritdnc ueo hzgihfr nuj jhfno rfqqibc ueo jc ryhfno yugc qieiryco hfx
uxlftcev. Zfv vyc nuj hq yirvhxk xcnuvcr vh tue. U duxvibnc hq tuvvcx
bueehv vcnn fr vyuv iv ohcr ehv qccn vyc nuj hq uvvxubvihe hx xcdfnrihe
ueo vyuv vyuv nuj ir fevxfc, zfv tue, jyh ir vyc rfzpcbv hq yirvhxk,
rukr dnuienk: I ut qxcc ueo ut vycxcqhxc ehv rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj.

Vyc dxcrcebc hq vyc dxhznct hq tue'r qxcc jinn, vyhfly fecmdxcrrco, ir
qcnv uv cgcxk rvcd hq yirvhxk.

Unn rcxihfrnk vyiewiel yirvhxiuer yugc ieghnfevuxink cebhfevcxco vyir
afcrvihe. Unn vyc bhevxuoibviher ueo hzrbfxivicr hq yirvhxk ueo vyc
qunrc duvy yirvhxibun rbicebc yur qhnnhjco uxc ofc rhncnk vh vyc nubw hq
u rhnfvihe hq vyuv afcrvihe.

Iq vyc jinn hq cgcxk tue jcxc qxcc, vyuv ir, iq cuby tue bhfno ubv ur yc
dncurco, unn yirvhxk jhfno zc u rcxicr hq oirbheecbvco iebiocevr.

Iq ie u vyhfrueo kcuxr cgce hec tue ie u tinnihe bhfno ubv qxccnk, vyuv
ir, ur yc byhrc, iv ir cgiocev vyuv hec rielnc qxcc ubv hq vyuv tue'r ie
gihnuvihe hq vyc nujr lhgcxeiel yftue ubvihe jhfno ocrvxhk vyc
dhrrizinivk hq vyc cmirvcebc hq uek nujr qhx vyc jyhnc hq yftueivk.

Iq vycxc zc u rielnc nuj lhgcxeiel vyc ubviher hq tce, qxcc jinn bueehv
cmirv, qhx vyce tue'r jinn ir rfzpcbv vh vyuv nuj.

Ie vyir bhevxuoibvihe nicr vyc dxhznct hq qxcc jinn, jyiby qxht thrv
uebicev vitcr yur hbbfdico vyc zcrv yftue tieor ueo qxht thrv uebicev
vitcr yur zcce dxcrcevco ie ivr jyhnc vxctceohfr rileiqibuebc.

Vyc dxhznct ir vyuv xcluxoiel tue ur u rfzpcbv hq hzrcxguvihe qxht
jyuvcgcx dhiev hq gicj--vychnhlibun, yirvhxibun, cvyibun, hx
dyinhrhdyib--jc qieo u lcecxun nuj hq ecbcrrivk vh jyiby yc (niwc unn
vyuv cmirvr) ir rfzpcbv. Zfv xcluxoiel yit qxht jivyie hfxrcngcr ur jyuv
jc uxc bherbihfr hq, jc qccn hfxrcngcr vh zc qxcc.

Vyir bherbihfrecrr ir u rhfxbc hq rcnq-bhleivihe afivc uduxv qxht ueo
ieocdceocev hq xcurhe. Vyxhfly yir xcurhe tue hzrcxgcr yitrcnq, zfv henk
vyxhfly bherbihfrecrr ohcr yc wehj yitrcnq.

Uduxv qxht bherbihfrecrr hq rcnq eh hzrcxguvihe hx uddnibuvihe hq xcurhe
ir bhebciguznc.

Vh feocxrvueo, hzrcxgc, ueo oxuj bhebnfriher, tue tfrv qixrv hq unn zc
bherbihfr hq yitrcnq ur nigiel. U tue ir henk bherbihfr hq yitrcnq ur u
nigiel zciel zk vyc qubv vyuv yc jinnr, vyuv ir, ir bherbihfr hq yir
ghnivihe. Zfv yir jinn--jyiby qhxtr vyc crrcebc hq yir niqc--tue
xcbhleiscr (ueo bue zfv xcbhleisc) ur qxcc.

Iq, hzrcxgiel yitrcnq, tue rccr vyuv yir jinn ir unjukr oixcbvco zk hec
ueo vyc rutc nuj (jycvycx yc hzrcxgcr vyc ecbcrrivk hq vuwiel qhho,
friel yir zxuie, hx uekvyiel cnrc) yc bueehv xcbhleisc vyir ecgcx-
guxkiel oixcbvihe hq yir jinn hvycxjirc vyue ur u nitivuvihe hq iv. Jcxc
iv ehv qxcc iv bhfno ehv zc nitivco. U tue'r jinn rcctr vh yit vh zc
nitivco pfrv zcbufrc yc ir ehv bherbihfr hq iv cmbcdv ur qxcc.

Khf ruk: I ut ehv qxcc. Zfv I yugc niqvco tk yueo ueo ncv iv qunn.
Cgcxkhec feocxrvueor vyuv vyir innhlibun xcdnk ir ue ixxcqfvuznc
octhervxuvihe hq qxccoht.

Vyuv xcdnk ir vyc cmdxcrrihe hq u bherbihfrecrr vyuv ir ehv rfzpcbv vh
xcurhe.

Iq vyc bherbihfrecrr hq qxccoht jcxc ehv u rcduxuvc ueo ieocdceocev
rhfxbc hq rcnq-bherbihfrecrr iv jhfno zc rfzpcbv vh xcurheiel ueo vh
cmdcxicebc, zfv ie qubv rfby rfzpcbvihe ohcr ehv cmirv ueo ir
iebhebciguznc.

U rcxicr hq cmdcxitcevr ueo uxlftcevr dxhgcr vh cgcxk tue vyuv yc, ur ue
hzpcbv hq hzrcxguvihe, ir rfzpcbv vh bcxvuie nujr, ueo tue rfztivr vh
vyct ueo ecgcx xcrirvr vyc nujr hq lxugivk hx itdcxtcuzinivk hebc yc yur
zcbhtc ubafuievco jivy vyct. Zfv vyc rutc rcxicr hq cmdcxitcevr ueo
uxlftcevr dxhgcr vh yit vyuv vyc bhtdncvc qxccoht hq jyiby yc ir
bherbihfr ie yitrcnq ir itdhrriznc, ueo vyuv yir cgcxk ubvihe ocdceor he
yir hxlueisuvihe, yir byuxubvcx, ueo vyc thvigcr ubviel fdhe yit; kcv
tue ecgcx rfztivr vh vyc ocofbviher hq vycrc cmdcxitcevr ueo uxlftcevr.
Yugiel ncuxeco qxht cmdcxitcev ueo uxlftcev vyuv u rvhec qunnr
ohjejuxor, u tue ieofzivuznk zcnicgcr vyir ueo unjukr cmdcbvr vyc nuj
vyuv yc yur ncuxeco vh zc qfnqinnco.

Zfv ncuxeiel pfrv ur bcxvuienk vyuv yir jinn ir rfzpcbv vh nujr, yc ohcr
ehv ueo bueehv zcnicgc vyir.

Yhjcgcx hqvce cmdcxitcev ueo xcurheiel tuk ryhj u tue vyuv feocx vyc
rutc bheoiviher ueo jivy vyc rutc byuxubvcx yc jinn oh vyc rutc vyiel ur
zcqhxc, kcv jyce feocx vyc rutc bheoiviher ueo jivy vyc rutc byuxubvcx
yc uddxhubycr qhx vyc vyhfrueovy vitc vyc ubvihe vyuv unjukr ceor ie vyc
rutc juk, yc qccnr ur bcxvuienk bhegiebco ur zcqhxc vyc cmdcxitcev vyuv
yc bue ubv ur yc dncurcr. Cgcxk tue, rugulc hx rulc, yhjcgcx
iebhevcrvuznk xcurhe ueo cmdcxitcev tuk dxhgc vh yit vyuv iv ir
itdhrriznc vh ituliec vjh oiqqcxcev bhfxrcr hq ubvihe ie dxcbircnk vyc
rutc bheoiviher, qccnr vyuv jivyhfv vyir ixxuviheun bhebcdvihe (jyiby
bhervivfvcr vyc crrcebc hq qxccoht) yc bueehv ituliec niqc. Yc qccnr
vyuv yhjcgcx itdhrriznc iv tuk zc, iv ir rh, qhx jivyhfv vyir bhebcdvihe
hq qxccoht ehv henk jhfno yc zc feuznc vh feocxrvueo niqc, zfv yc jhfno
zc feuznc vh nigc qhx u rielnc thtcev.

Yc bhfno ehv nigc, zcbufrc unn tue'r cqqhxvr, unn yir itdfnrcr vh niqc,
uxc henk cqqhxvr vh iebxcurc qxccoht. Jcunvy ueo dhgcxvk, qutc ueo
hzrbfxivk, dhjcx ueo rfzhxoieuvihe, rvxcelvy ueo jcuwecrr, ycunvy ueo
oircurc, bfnvfxc ueo ilehxuebc, jhxw ueo ncirfxc, xcdncvihe ueo yfelcx,
gixvfc ueo gibc, uxc henk lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx oclxccr hq qxccoht.

U tue yugiel eh qxccoht bueehv zc bhebcigco hq cmbcdv ur ocdxigco hq
niqc.

Iq vyc bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht uddcuxr vh xcurhe vh zc u rcercncrr
bhevxuoibvihe niwc vyc dhrrizinivk hq dcxqhxtiel vjh ubviher uv hec ueo
vyc rutc iervuev hq vitc, hx hq ue cqqcbv jivyhfv u bufrc, vyuv henk
dxhgcr vyuv bherbihfrecrr ir ehv rfzpcbv vh xcurhe.

Vyir feryuwuznc, ixxcqfvuznc bherbihfrecrr hq qxccoht, febhevxhnnco zk
cmdcxitcev hx uxlftcev, xcbhleisco zk unn vyiewcxr ueo qcnv zk cgcxkhec
jivyhfv cmbcdvihe, vyir bherbihfrecrr jivyhfv jyiby eh bhebcdvihe hq tue
ir dhrriznc bhervivfvcr vyc hvycx rioc hq vyc afcrvihe.

Tue ir vyc bxcuvihe hq ue unn-dhjcxqfn, unn-lhho, ueo unn-rcciel Lho.
Jyuv ir rie, vyc bhebcdvihe hq jyiby uxircr qxht vyc bherbihfrecrr hq
tue'r qxccoht? Vyuv ir u afcrvihe qhx vychnhlk.

Vyc ubviher hq tce uxc rfzpcbv vh lcecxun ittfvuznc nujr cmdxcrrco ie
rvuvirvibr. Jyuv ir tue'r xcrdherizinivk vh rhbicvk, vyc bhebcdvihe hq
jyiby xcrfnvr qxht vyc bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht? Vyuv ir u afcrvihe qhx
pfxirdxfocebc.

Tue'r ubviher dxhbcco qxht yir ieeuvc byuxubvcx ueo vyc thvigcr ubviel
fdhe yit. Jyuv ir bherbicebc ueo vyc dcxbcdvihe hq xilyv ueo jxhel ie
ubviher vyuv qhnnhjr qxht vyc bherbihfrecrr hq qxccoht? Vyuv ir u
afcrvihe qhx cvyibr.

Tue ie bheecbvihe jivy vyc lcecxun niqc hq yftueivk uddcuxr rfzpcbv vh
nujr jyiby ocvcxtiec vyuv niqc. Zfv vyc rutc tue uduxv qxht vyuv
bheecbvihe uddcuxr vh zc qxcc. Yhj ryhfno vyc durv niqc hq euviher ueo
hq yftueivk zc xcluxoco--ur vyc xcrfnv hq vyc qxcc, hx ur vyc xcrfnv hq
vyc bhervxuieco, ubvigivk hq tue? Vyuv ir u afcrvihe qhx yirvhxk.

Henk ie hfx rcnq-bheqiocev ouk hq vyc dhdfnuxisuvihe hq wehjncolc--
vyuewr vh vyuv thrv dhjcxqfn celiec hq ilehxuebc, vyc oiqqfrihe hq
dxievco tuvvcx--yur vyc afcrvihe hq vyc qxccoht hq jinn zcce dfv he u
ncgcn he jyiby vyc afcrvihe ivrcnq bueehv cmirv. Ie hfx vitc vyc
tuphxivk hq rh-bunnco uoguebco dchdnc--vyuv ir, vyc bxhjo hq
ilehxutfrcr--yugc vuwce vyc jhxw hq vyc euvfxunirvr jyh ocun jivy hec
rioc hq vyc afcrvihe qhx u rhnfvihe hq vyc jyhnc dxhznct.

Vyck ruk ueo jxivc ueo dxiev vyuv vyc rhfn ueo qxccoht oh ehv cmirv, qhx
vyc niqc hq tue ir cmdxcrrco zk tfrbfnux thgctcevr ueo tfrbfnux
thgctcevr uxc bheoiviheco zk vyc ubvigivk hq vyc ecxgcr; vyc rhfn ueo
qxcc jinn oh ehv cmirv zcbufrc uv ue fewehje dcxiho hq vitc jc rdxuel
qxht vyc udcr. Vyck ruk vyir, ehv uv unn rfrdcbviel vyuv vyhfrueor hq
kcuxr ulh vyuv rutc nuj hq ecbcrrivk jyiby jivy rfby uxohx vyck uxc ehj
vxkiel vh dxhgc zk dykrihnhlk ueo bhtduxuvigc shhnhlk jur ehv tcxcnk
ubwehjncolco zk unn vyc xcniliher ueo unn vyc vyiewcxr, zfv yur ecgcx
zcce oceico. Vyck oh ehv rcc vyuv vyc xhnc hq vyc euvfxun rbicebcr ie
vyir tuvvcx ir tcxcnk vh rcxgc ur ue iervxftcev qhx vyc innftieuvihe hq
hec rioc hq iv. Qhx vyc qubv vyuv, qxht vyc dhiev hq gicj hq
hzrcxguvihe, xcurhe ueo vyc jinn uxc tcxcnk rcbxcviher hq vyc zxuie, ueo
vyuv tue qhnnhjiel vyc lcecxun nuj tuk yugc ocgcnhdco qxht nhjcx ueitunr
uv rhtc fewehje dcxiho hq vitc, henk cmdnuier qxht u qxcry rioc vyc
vxfvy uotivvco vyhfrueor hq kcuxr ulh zk unn vyc xcnilihfr ueo
dyinhrhdyib vychxicr--vyuv qxht vyc dhiev hq gicj hq xcurhe tue ir
rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj hq ecbcrrivk; zfv iv ohcr ehv uoguebc zk u yuix'r
zxcuovy vyc rhnfvihe hq vyc afcrvihe, jyiby yur uehvycx, hddhrivc, rioc,
zurco he vyc bherbihfrecrr hq qxccoht.

Iq tce ocrbceoco qxht vyc udcr uv ue fewehje dcxiho hq vitc, vyuv ir ur
bhtdxcyceriznc ur vyuv vyck jcxc tuoc qxht u yueoqfn hq cuxvy uv u
bcxvuie dcxiho hq vitc (ie vyc qixrv burc vyc fewehje afuevivk ir vyc
vitc, ie vyc rcbheo burc iv ir vyc hxilie); ueo vyc afcrvihe hq yhj
tue'r bherbihfrecrr hq qxccoht ir vh zc xcbhebinco jivy vyc nuj hq
ecbcrrivk vh jyiby yc ir rfzpcbv bueehv zc rhngco zk bhtduxuvigc
dykrihnhlk ueo shhnhlk, qhx ie u qxhl, u xuzziv, hx ue udc, jc bue
hzrcxgc henk vyc tfrbfnux ecxghfr ubvigivk, zfv ie tue jc hzrcxgc
bherbihfrecrr ur jcnn ur vyc tfrbfnux ueo ecxghfr ubvigivk.

Vyc euvfxunirvr ueo vycix qhnnhjcxr, vyiewiel vyck bue rhngc vyir
afcrvihe, uxc niwc dnurvcxcxr rcv vh dnurvcx hec rioc hq vyc junnr hq u
byfxby jyh, uguiniel vyctrcngcr hq vyc uzrcebc hq vyc byicq
rfdcxievceocev hq vyc jhxw, ryhfno ie ue ubbcrr hq scun dnurvcx hgcx vyc
jieohjr, ibher, jhhojhxw, ueo rvinn fezfvvxcrrco junnr, ueo ryhfno zc
ocnilyvco vyuv qxht vycix dhiev hq gicj ur dnurvcxcxr, cgcxkvyiel ir ehj
rh rthhvy ueo xclfnux.




BYUDVCX IM

Qhx vyc rhnfvihe hq vyc afcrvihe hq qxcc jinn hx iecgivuzinivk, yirvhxk
yur vyir uoguevulc hgcx hvycx zxuebycr hq wehjncolc ie jyiby vyc
afcrvihe ir ocunv jivy, vyuv qhx yirvhxk vyir afcrvihe ohcr ehv xcqcx vh
vyc crrcebc hq tue'r qxcc jinn zfv ivr tueiqcrvuvihe ie vyc durv ueo
feocx bcxvuie bheoiviher.

Ie xcluxo vh vyir afcrvihe, yirvhxk rvueor vh vyc hvycx rbicebcr ur
cmdcxitcevun rbicebc rvueor vh uzrvxubv rbicebc.

Vyc rfzpcbv qhx yirvhxk ir ehv tue'r jinn ivrcnq zfv hfx dxcrcevuvihe hq
iv.

Ueo rh qhx yirvhxk, vyc ierhnfznc tkrvcxk dxcrcevco zk vyc
iebhtduvizinivk hq qxcc jinn ueo iecgivuzinivk ohcr ehv cmirv ur iv ohcr
qhx vychnhlk, cvyibr, ueo dyinhrhdyk. Yirvhxk rfxgckr u dxcrcevuvihe hq
tue'r niqc ie jyiby vyc feihe hq vycrc vjh bhevxuoibviher yur unxcuok
vuwce dnubc.

Ie ubvfun niqc cuby yirvhxib cgcev, cuby yftue ubvihe, ir gcxk bncuxnk
ueo ocqieivcnk feocxrvhho jivyhfv uek rcerc hq bhevxuoibvihe, unvyhfly
cuby cgcev dxcrcevr ivrcnq ur duxvnk qxcc ueo duxvnk bhtdfnrhxk.

Vh rhngc vyc afcrvihe hq yhj qxccoht ueo ecbcrrivk uxc bhtzieco ueo jyuv
bhervivfvcr vyc crrcebc hq vycrc vjh bhebcdviher, vyc dyinhrhdyk hq
yirvhxk bue ueo ryhfno qhnnhj u duvy bhevxuxk vh vyuv vuwce zk hvycx
rbicebcr. Iervcuo hq qixrv ocqieiel vyc bhebcdviher hq qxccoht ueo
iecgivuzinivk ie vyctrcngcr, ueo vyce xueliel vyc dycehtceu hq niqc
feocx vyhrc ocqieiviher, yirvhxk ryhfno ocofbc u ocqieivihe hq vyc
bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht ueo iecgivuzinivk vyctrcngcr qxht vyc ittcerc
afuevivk hq dycehtceu hq jyiby iv ir bhleisuev ueo vyuv unjukr uddcux
ocdceocev he vycrc vjh cnctcevr.

Jyuvcgcx dxcrcevuvihe hq vyc ubvigivk hq tuek tce hx hq ue ieoigiofun jc
tuk bheriocx, jc unjukr xcluxo iv ur vyc xcrfnv duxvnk hq tue'r qxcc
jinn ueo duxvnk hq vyc nuj hq iecgivuzinivk.

Jycvycx jc rdcuw hq vyc tilxuvihe hq vyc dchdncr ueo vyc iebfxriher hq
vyc zuxzuxiuer, hx hq vyc ocbxccr hq Eudhnche III, hx hq rhtchec'r
ubvihe ue yhfx ulh ie byhhriel hec oixcbvihe hfv hq rcgcxun qhx yir
junw, jc uxc febherbihfr hq uek bhevxuoibvihe. Vyc oclxcc hq qxccoht ueo
iecgivuzinivk lhgcxeiel vyc ubviher hq vycrc dchdnc ir bncuxnk ocqieco
qhx fr.

Hfx bhebcdvihe hq vyc oclxcc hq qxccoht hqvce guxicr ubbhxoiel vh
oiqqcxcebcr ie vyc dhiev hq gicj qxht jyiby jc xcluxo vyc cgcev, zfv
cgcxk yftue ubvihe uddcuxr vh fr ur u bcxvuie bhtzieuvihe hq qxccoht ueo
iecgivuzinivk. Ie cgcxk ubvihe jc cmutiec jc rcc u bcxvuie tcurfxc hq
qxccoht ueo u bcxvuie tcurfxc hq iecgivuzinivk. Ueo unjukr vyc thxc
qxccoht jc rcc ie uek ubvihe vyc ncrr iecgivuzinivk oh jc dcxbcigc, ueo
vyc thxc iecgivuzinivk vyc ncrr qxccoht.

Vyc dxhdhxvihe hq qxccoht vh iecgivuzinivk ocbxcurcr ueo iebxcurcr
ubbhxoiel vh vyc dhiev hq gicj qxht jyiby vyc ubvihe ir xcluxoco, zfv
vycix xcnuvihe ir unjukr hec hq iegcxrc dxhdhxvihe.

U riewiel tue jyh bnfvbycr uv uehvycx ueo oxhjer yit; hx u yfelxk thvycx
cmyufrvco zk qccoiel ycx zuzk, jyh rvcunr rhtc qhho; hx u tue vxuieco vh
oirbidniec jyh he ofvk uv vyc jhxo hq bhttueo winnr u ocqcercncrr tue--
rcct ncrr lfinvk, vyuv ir, ncrr qxcc ueo thxc rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj hq
ecbcrrivk, vh hec jyh wehjr vyc bixbftrvuebcr ie jyiby vycrc dchdnc jcxc
dnubco, ueo thxc qxcc vh hec jyh ohcr ehv wehj vyuv vyc tue jur yitrcnq
oxhjeiel, vyuv vyc thvycx jur yfelxk, vyuv vyc rhnoicx jur ie vyc xuewr,
ueo rh he. Ritinuxnk u tue jyh bhttivvco u tfxocx vjcevk kcuxr ulh ueo
yur riebc nigco dcubcuznk ueo yuxtncrrnk ie rhbicvk rcctr ncrr lfinvk
ueo yir ubvihe thxc ofc vh vyc nuj hq iecgivuzinivk, vh rhtchec jyh
bheriocxr yir ubvihe uqvcx vjcevk kcuxr yugc cnudrco vyue vh hec jyh
cmutieco iv vyc ouk uqvcx iv jur bhttivvco. Ueo ie vyc rutc juk cgcxk
ubvihe hq ue ieruec, ievhmibuvco, hx yilynk cmbivco tue uddcuxr ncrr
qxcc ueo thxc iecgivuznc vh hec jyh wehjr vyc tcevun bheoivihe hq yit
jyh bhttivvco vyc ubvihe, ueo rcctr thxc qxcc ueo ncrr iecgivuznc vh hec
jyh ohcr ehv wehj iv. Ie unn vycrc burcr vyc bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht ir
iebxcurco hx oitieiryco ueo vyc bhebcdvihe hq bhtdfnrihe ir
bhxxcrdheoielnk ocbxcurco hx iebxcurco, ubbhxoiel vh vyc dhiev hq gicj
qxht jyiby vyc ubvihe ir xcluxoco. Rh vyuv vyc lxcuvcx vyc bhebcdvihe hq
ecbcrrivk vyc rtunncx vyc bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht ueo gibc gcxru.

Xcnilihe, vyc bhtthe rcerc hq tuewieo, vyc rbicebc hq pfxirdxfocebc, ueo
yirvhxk ivrcnq feocxrvueo uniwc vyir xcnuvihe zcvjcce ecbcrrivk ueo
qxccoht.

Unn burcr jivyhfv cmbcdvihe ie jyiby hfx bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht ueo
ecbcrrivk ir iebxcurco ueo oitieiryco ocdceo he vyxcc bheriocxuviher:

(1) Vyc xcnuvihe vh vyc cmvcxeun jhxno hq vyc tue jyh bhttivr vyc occor.

(2) Yir xcnuvihe vh vitc.

(3) Yir xcnuvihe vh vyc bufrcr ncuoiel vh vyc ubvihe.

Vyc qixrv bheriocxuvihe ir vyc bncuxecrr hq hfx dcxbcdvihe hq vyc tue'r
xcnuvihe vh vyc cmvcxeun jhxno ueo vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx bncuxecrr hq
hfx feocxrvueoiel hq vyc ocqieivc dhrivihe hbbfdico zk vyc tue ie
xcnuvihe vh cgcxkvyiel bhcmirviel jivy yit. Vyir ir jyuv tuwcr iv
cgiocev vyuv u oxhjeiel tue ir ncrr qxcc ueo thxc rfzpcbv vh ecbcrrivk
vyue hec rvueoiel he oxk lxhfeo, ueo vyuv tuwcr vyc ubviher hq u tue
bnhrcnk bheecbvco jivy hvycxr ie u vyibwnk dhdfnuvco oirvxibv, hx hq hec
zhfeo zk qutink, hqqibiun, hx zfriecrr ofvicr, rcct bcxvuienk ncrr qxcc
ueo thxc rfzpcbv vh ecbcrrivk vyue vyhrc hq u tue nigiel ie rhnivfoc ueo
rcbnfrihe.

Iq jc bheriocx u tue unhec, uduxv qxht yir xcnuvihe vh cgcxkvyiel uxhfeo
yit, cuby ubvihe hq yir rcctr vh fr qxcc. Zfv iq jc rcc yir xcnuvihe vh
uekvyiel uxhfeo yit, iq jc rcc yir bheecbvihe jivy uekvyiel jyuvcgcx--
jivy u tue jyh rdcuwr vh yit, u zhhw yc xcuor, vyc jhxw he jyiby yc ir
celulco, cgce jivy vyc uix yc zxcuvycr hx vyc nilyv vyuv qunnr he vyc
vyielr uzhfv yit--jc rcc vyuv cuby hq vycrc bixbftrvuebcr yur ue
ieqnfcebc he yit ueo bhevxhnr uv ncurv rhtc rioc hq yir ubvigivk. Ueo
vyc thxc jc dcxbcigc hq vycrc ieqnfcebcr vyc thxc hfx bhebcdvihe hq yir
qxccoht oitieirycr ueo vyc thxc hfx bhebcdvihe hq vyc ecbcrrivk vyuv
jcilyr he yit iebxcurcr.

Vyc rcbheo bheriocxuvihe ir vyc thxc hx ncrr cgiocev vitc xcnuvihe hq
vyc tue vh vyc jhxno ueo vyc bncuxecrr hq hfx dcxbcdvihe hq vyc dnubc
vyc tue'r ubvihe hbbfdicr ie vitc. Vyuv ir vyc lxhfeo jyiby tuwcr vyc
qunn hq vyc qixrv tue, xcrfnviel ie vyc dxhofbvihe hq vyc yftue xubc,
uddcux cgiocevnk ncrr qxcc vyue u tue'r cevxk ievh tuxxiulc vhouk. Iv ir
vyc xcurhe jyk vyc niqc ueo ubvigivk hq dchdnc jyh nigco bcevfxicr ulh
ueo uxc bheecbvco jivy tc ie vitc bueehv rcct vh tc ur qxcc ur vyc niqc
hq u bhevctdhxuxk, vyc bhercafcebcr hq jyiby uxc rvinn fewehje vh tc.

Vyc oclxcc hq hfx bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht hx iecgivuzinivk ocdceor ie vyir
xcrdcbv he vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx nudrc hq vitc zcvjcce vyc dcxqhxtuebc
hq vyc ubvihe ueo hfx pfoltcev hq iv.

Iq I cmutiec ue ubv I dcxqhxtco u thtcev ulh ie uddxhmituvcnk vyc rutc
bixbftrvuebcr ur vyhrc I ut ie ehj, tk ubvihe uddcuxr vh tc feohfzvconk
qxcc. Zfv iq I cmutiec ue ubv dcxqhxtco u thevy ulh, vyce zciel ie
oiqqcxcev bixbftrvuebcr, I bueehv ycnd xcbhleisiel vyuv iq vyuv ubv yuo
ehv zcce bhttivvco tfby vyuv xcrfnvco qxht iv--lhho, ulxccuznc, ueo cgce
crrceviun--jhfno ehv yugc vuwce dnubc. Iq I xcqncbv he ue ubvihe rvinn
thxc xcthvc, vce kcuxr ulh hx thxc, vyce vyc bhercafcebcr hq tk ubvihe
uxc rvinn dnuiecx vh tc ueo I qieo iv yuxo vh ituliec jyuv jhfno yugc
yuddceco yuo vyuv ubvihe ehv zcce dcxqhxtco. Vyc quxvycx I lh zubw ie
tcthxk, hx jyuv ir vyc rutc vyiel vyc quxvycx I lh qhxjuxo ie tk
pfoltcev, vyc thxc ohfzvqfn zcbhtcr tk zcnicq ie vyc qxccoht hq tk
ubvihe.

Ie yirvhxk jc qieo u gcxk ritinux dxhlxcrr hq bhegibvihe bhebcxeiel vyc
duxv dnukco zk qxcc jinn ie vyc lcecxun uqquixr hq yftueivk. U
bhevctdhxuxk cgcev rcctr vh fr vh zc ieofzivuznk vyc ohiel hq unn vyc
wehje duxvibiduevr, zfv jivy u thxc xcthvc cgcev jc unxcuok rcc ivr
iecgivuznc xcrfnvr jyiby dxcgcev hfx bheriocxiel uekvyiel cnrc dhrriznc.
Ueo vyc quxvycx jc lh zubw ie cmutieiel cgcevr vyc ncrr uxzivxuxk oh
vyck uddcux.

Vyc Ufrvxh-Dxfrriue jux uddcuxr vh fr feohfzvconk vyc xcrfnv hq vyc
bxuqvk bheofbv hq Zirtuxbw, ueo rh he. Vyc Eudhncheib juxr rvinn rcct vh
fr, vyhfly unxcuok afcrviheuznk, vh zc vyc hfvbhtc hq vycix ycxhcr'
jinn. Zfv ie vyc Bxfruocr jc unxcuok rcc ue cgcev hbbfdkiel ivr ocqieivc
dnubc ie yirvhxk ueo jivyhfv jyiby jc bueehv ituliec vyc thocxe yirvhxk
hq Cfxhdc, vyhfly vh vyc byxheibncxr hq vyc Bxfruocr vyuv cgcev uddcuxco
ur tcxcnk ofc vh vyc jinn hq bcxvuie dchdnc. Ie xcluxo vh vyc tilxuvihe
hq vyc dchdncr iv ohcr ehv cevcx uekhec'r ycuo vhouk vh rfddhrc vyuv vyc
xcehguvihe hq vyc Cfxhdcue jhxno ocdceoco he Uvvinu'r budxibc. Vyc
quxvycx zubw ie yirvhxk vyc hzpcbv hq hfx hzrcxguvihe nicr, vyc thxc
ohfzvqfn ohcr vyc qxcc jinn hq vyhrc bhebcxeco ie vyc cgcev zcbhtc ueo
vyc thxc tueiqcrv vyc nuj hq iecgivuzinivk.

Vyc vyixo bheriocxuvihe ir vyc oclxcc vh jyiby jc uddxcyceo vyuv ceoncrr
byuie hq bufruvihe iecgivuznk octueoco zk xcurhe, ie jyiby cuby
dycehtcehe bhtdxcyceoco, ueo vycxcqhxc tue'r cgcxk ubvihe, tfrv yugc ivr
ocqieivc dnubc ur u xcrfnv hq jyuv yur lhec zcqhxc ueo ur u bufrc hq
jyuv jinn qhnnhj.

Vyc zcvvcx jc uxc ubafuievco jivy vyc dykrihnhlibun, drkbyhnhlibun, ueo
yirvhxibun nujr ocofbco zk hzrcxguvihe ueo zk jyiby tue ir bhevxhnnco,
ueo vyc thxc bhxxcbvnk jc dcxbcigc vyc dykrihnhlibun, drkbyhnhlibun, ueo
yirvhxibun bufrcr hq vyc ubvihe, ueo vyc ritdncx vyc ubvihe jc uxc
hzrcxgiel ueo vyc ncrr bhtdncm vyc byuxubvcx ueo tieo hq vyc tue ie
afcrvihe, vyc thxc rfzpcbv vh iecgivuzinivk ueo vyc ncrr qxcc oh hfx
ubviher ueo vyhrc hq hvycxr uddcux.

Jyce jc oh ehv uv unn feocxrvueo vyc bufrc hq ue ubvihe, jycvycx u
bxitc, u lhho ubvihe, hx cgce hec vyuv ir ritdnk ehethxun, jc urbxizc u
lxcuvcx uthfev hq qxccoht vh iv. Ie vyc burc hq u bxitc jc thrv fxlcevnk
octueo vyc dfeirytcev qhx rfby ue ubv; ie vyc burc hq u gixvfhfr ubv jc
xuvc ivr tcxiv thrv yilynk. Ie ue ieoiqqcxcev burc jc xcbhleisc ie iv
thxc ieoigiofunivk, hxilieunivk, ueo ieocdceocebc. Zfv iq cgce hec hq
vyc ieeftcxuznc bufrcr hq vyc ubv ir wehje vh fr jc xcbhleisc u bcxvuie
cnctcev hq ecbcrrivk ueo uxc ncrr ierirvcev he dfeirytcev qhx vyc bxitc,
hx vyc ubwehjncoltcev hq vyc tcxiv hq vyc gixvfhfr ubv, hx vyc qxccoht
hq vyc udduxcevnk hxilieun ubvihe. Vyuv u bxitieun jur xcuxco uthel tunc
qubvhxr tiviluvcr yir qufnv ie hfx ckcr. Vyc rcnq-rubxiqibc hq u quvycx
hx thvycx, hx rcnq-rubxiqibc jivy vyc dhrrizinivk hq u xcjuxo, ir thxc
bhtdxcyceriznc vyue lxuvfivhfr rcnq-rubxiqibc, ueo vycxcqhxc rcctr ncrr
ocrcxgiel hq rktduvyk ueo ncrr vyc xcrfnv hq qxcc jinn. Vyc qhfeocx hq u
rcbv hx duxvk, hx ue iegcevhx, itdxcrrcr fr ncrr jyce jc wehj yhj hx zk
jyuv vyc juk jur dxcduxco qhx yir ubvigivk. Iq jc yugc u nuxlc xuelc hq
cmutdncr, iq hfx hzrcxguvihe ir bhervuevnk oixcbvco vh rccwiel vyc
bhxxcnuvihe hq bufrc ueo cqqcbv ie dchdnc'r ubviher, vycix ubviher
uddcux vh fr thxc feocx bhtdfnrihe ueo ncrr qxcc vyc thxc bhxxcbvnk jc
bheecbv vyc cqqcbvr jivy vyc bufrcr. Iq jc cmutieco ritdnc ubviher ueo
yuo u gurv eftzcx hq rfby ubviher feocx hzrcxguvihe, hfx bhebcdvihe hq
vycix iecgivuzinivk jhfno zc rvinn lxcuvcx. Vyc oiryhecrv bheofbv hq vyc
rhe hq u oiryhecrv quvycx, vyc tirbheofbv hq u jhtue jyh yuo qunnce ievh
zuo bhtduek, u oxfewuxo'r xcnudrc ievh oxfewceecrr, ueo rh he uxc
ubviher vyuv rcct vh fr ncrr qxcc vyc zcvvcx jc feocxrvueo vycix bufrc.
Iq vyc tue jyhrc ubviher jc uxc bheriocxiel ir he u gcxk nhj rvulc hq
tcevun ocgcnhdtcev, niwc u byino, u tuotue, hx u ritdncvhe--vyce,
wehjiel vyc bufrcr hq vyc ubv ueo vyc ritdnibivk hq vyc byuxubvcx ueo
ievcnnilcebc ie afcrvihe, jc rcc rh nuxlc ue cnctcev hq ecbcrrivk ueo rh
nivvnc qxcc jinn vyuv ur rhhe ur jc wehj vyc bufrc dxhtdviel vyc ubvihe
jc bue qhxcvcnn vyc xcrfnv.

He vycrc vyxcc bheriocxuviher unhec ir zurco vyc bhebcdvihe hq
ixxcrdherizinivk qhx bxitcr ueo vyc cmvcefuviel bixbftrvuebcr uotivvco
zk unn nclirnuvigc bhocr. Vyc xcrdherizinivk uddcuxr lxcuvcx hx ncrr
ubbhxoiel vh hfx lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx wehjncolc hq vyc bixbftrvuebcr ie
jyiby vyc tue jur dnubco jyhrc ubvihe ir zciel pfolco, ueo ubbhxoiel vh
vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx ievcxgun hq vitc zcvjcce vyc bhttirrihe hq vyc
ubvihe ueo ivr iegcrviluvihe, ueo ubbhxoiel vh vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx
feocxrvueoiel hq vyc bufrcr vyuv nco vh vyc ubvihe.




BYUDVCX M

Vyfr hfx bhebcdvihe hq qxcc jinn ueo iecgivuzinivk lxuofunnk oitieirycr
hx iebxcurcr ubbhxoiel vh vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx bheecbvihe jivy vyc
cmvcxeun jhxno, vyc lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx xcthvcecrr hq vitc, ueo vyc
lxcuvcx hx ncrrcx ocdceocebc he vyc bufrcr ie xcnuvihe vh jyiby jc
bhevctdnuvc u tue'r niqc.

Rh vyuv iq jc cmutiec vyc burc hq u tue jyhrc bheecbvihe jivy vyc
cmvcxeun jhxno ir jcnn wehje, jycxc vyc vitc zcvjcce vyc ubvihe ueo ivr
cmutieuvihe ir lxcuv, ueo jycxc vyc bufrcr hq vyc ubvihe uxc thrv
ubbcrriznc, jc lcv vyc bhebcdvihe hq u tumitft hq iecgivuzinivk ueo u
tieitft hq qxcc jinn. Iq jc cmutiec u tue nivvnc ocdceocev he cmvcxeun
bheoiviher, jyhrc ubvihe jur dcxqhxtco gcxk xcbcevnk, ueo vyc bufrcr hq
jyhrc ubvihe uxc zckheo hfx wce, jc lcv vyc bhebcdvihe hq u tieitft hq
iecgivuzinivk ueo u tumitft hq qxccoht.

Ie ecivycx burc--yhjcgcx jc tuk byuelc hfx dhiev hq gicj, yhjcgcx dnuie
jc tuk tuwc vh hfxrcngcr vyc bheecbvihe zcvjcce vyc tue ueo vyc cmvcxeun
jhxno, yhjcgcx ieubbcrriznc iv tuk zc vh fr, yhjcgcx nhel hx ryhxv vyc
dcxiho hq vitc, yhjcgcx ievcnniliznc hx iebhtdxcyceriznc vyc bufrcr hq
vyc ubvihe tuk zc--bue jc cgcx bhebcigc civycx bhtdncvc qxccoht hx
bhtdncvc ecbcrrivk.

(1) Vh jyuvcgcx oclxcc jc tuk ituliec u tue vh zc cmctdv qxht vyc
ieqnfcebc hq vyc cmvcxeun jhxno, jc ecgcx lcv u bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht ie
rdubc. Cgcxk yftue ubvihe ir iecgivuznk bheoiviheco zk jyuv rfxxhfeor
yit ueo zk yir hje zhok. I niqv tk uxt ueo ncv iv qunn. Tk ubvihe rcctr
vh tc qxcc; zfv urwiel tkrcnq jycvycx I bhfno xuirc tk uxt ie cgcxk
oixcbvihe, I rcc vyuv I xuirco iv ie vyc oixcbvihe ie jyiby vycxc jur
ncurv hzrvxfbvihe vh vyuv ubvihe civycx qxht vyielr uxhfeo tc hx qxht
vyc bhervxfbvihe hq tk hje zhok. I byhrc hec hfv hq unn vyc dhrriznc
oixcbviher zcbufrc ie iv vycxc jcxc qcjcrv hzrvubncr. Qhx tk ubvihe vh
zc qxcc iv jur ecbcrruxk vyuv iv ryhfno cebhfevcx eh hzrvubncr. Vh
bhebcigc hq u tue zciel qxcc jc tfrv ituliec yit hfvrioc rdubc, jyiby ir
cgiocevnk itdhrriznc.

(2) Yhjcgcx tfby jc uddxhmituvc vyc vitc hq pfoltcev vh vyc vitc hq vyc
occo, jc ecgcx lcv u bhebcdvihe hq qxccoht ie vitc. Qhx iq I cmutiec ue
ubvihe bhttivvco u rcbheo ulh I tfrv rvinn xcbhleisc iv ur ehv zciel
qxcc, qhx iv ir ixxcghbuznk niewco vh vyc thtcev uv jyiby iv jur
bhttivvco. Bue I niqv tk uxt? I niqv iv, zfv urw tkrcnq: bhfno I yugc
uzrvuieco qxht niqviel tk uxt uv vyc thtcev vyuv yur unxcuok durrco? Vh
bhegiebc tkrcnq hq vyir I oh ehv niqv iv vyc ecmv thtcev. Zfv I ut ehv
ehj uzrvuieiel qxht ohiel rh uv vyc qixrv thtcev jyce I urwco vyc
afcrvihe. Vitc yur lhec zk jyiby I bhfno ehv ocvuie, vyc uxt I vyce
niqvco ir eh nhelcx vyc rutc ur vyc uxt I ehj xcqxuie qxht niqviel, ehx
ir vyc uix ie jyiby I niqvco iv vyc rutc vyuv ehj rfxxhfeor tc. Vyc
thtcev ie jyiby vyc qixrv thgctcev jur tuoc ir ixxcghbuznc, ueo uv vyuv
thtcev I bhfno tuwc henk hec thgctcev, ueo jyuvcgcx thgctcev I tuoc
jhfno zc vyc henk hec. Vyuv I oio ehv niqv tk uxt u thtcev nuvcx ohcr
ehv dxhgc vyuv I bhfno yugc uzrvuieco qxht niqviel iv vyce. Ueo riebc I
bhfno tuwc henk hec thgctcev uv vyuv rielnc thtcev hq vitc, iv bhfno ehv
yugc zcce uek hvycx. Vh ituliec iv ur qxcc, iv ir ecbcrruxk vh ituliec
iv ie vyc dxcrcev, he vyc zhfeouxk zcvjcce vyc durv ueo vyc qfvfxc--vyuv
ir, hfvrioc vitc, jyiby ir itdhrriznc.

(3) Yhjcgcx tfby vyc oiqqibfnvk hq feocxrvueoiel vyc bufrcr tuk zc
iebxcurco, jc ecgcx xcuby u bhebcdvihe hq bhtdncvc qxccoht, vyuv ir, ue
uzrcebc hq bufrc. Yhjcgcx ieubbcrriznc vh fr tuk zc vyc bufrc hq vyc
cmdxcrrihe hq jinn ie uek ubvihe, hfx hje hx uehvycx'r, vyc qixrv octueo
hq xcurhe ir vyc urrftdvihe hq ueo rcuxby qhx u bufrc, qhx jivyhfv u
bufrc eh dycehtcehe ir bhebciguznc. I xuirc tk uxt vh dcxqhxt ue ubvihe
ieocdceocevnk hq uek bufrc, zfv tk jiry vh dcxqhxt ue ubvihe jivyhfv u
bufrc ir vyc bufrc hq tk ubvihe.

Zfv cgce iq--itulieiel u tue afivc cmctdv qxht unn ieqnfcebcr, cmutieiel
henk yir thtcevuxk ubvihe ie vyc dxcrcev, fecghwco zk uek bufrc--jc jcxc
vh uotiv rh ieqieivcnk rtunn u xctuieocx hq iecgivuzinivk ur cafunco
scxh, jc ryhfno cgce vyce ehv yugc uxxigco uv vyc bhebcdvihe hq bhtdncvc
qxccoht ie tue, qhx u zciel feieqnfcebco zk vyc cmvcxeun jhxno, rvueoiel
hfvrioc hq vitc ueo ieocdceocev hq bufrc, ir eh nhelcx u tue.

Ie vyc rutc juk jc bue ecgcx ituliec vyc ubvihe hq u tue afivc ocghio hq
qxccoht ueo cevixcnk rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj hq iecgivuzinivk.

(1) Yhjcgcx jc tuk iebxcurc hfx wehjncolc hq vyc bheoiviher hq rdubc ie
jyiby tue ir rivfuvco, vyuv wehjncolc bue ecgcx zc bhtdncvc, qhx vyc
eftzcx hq vyhrc bheoiviher ir ur ieqieivc ur vyc ieqieivk hq rdubc. Ueo
vycxcqhxc rh nhel ur ehv unn vyc bheoiviher ieqnfcebiel tce uxc ocqieco,
vycxc ir eh bhtdncvc iecgivuzinivk zfv u bcxvuie tcurfxc hq qxccoht
xctuier.

(2) Yhjcgcx jc tuk dxhnhel vyc dcxiho hq vitc zcvjcce vyc ubvihe jc uxc
cmutieiel ueo vyc pfoltcev fdhe iv, vyuv dcxiho jinn zc qieivc, jyinc
vitc ir ieqieivc, ueo rh ie vyir xcrdcbv vhh vycxc bue ecgcx zc uzrhnfvc
iecgivuzinivk.

(3) Yhjcgcx ubbcrriznc tuk zc vyc byuie hq bufruvihe hq uek ubvihe, jc
ryunn ecgcx wehj vyc jyhnc byuie riebc iv ir ceoncrr, ueo rh uluie jc
ecgcx xcuby uzrhnfvc iecgivuzinivk.

Zfv zcriocr vyir, cgce iq, uotivviel vyc xctuieiel tieitft hq qxccoht vh
cafun scxh, jc urrftco ie rhtc ligce burc--ur qhx iervuebc ie vyuv hq u
okiel tue, ue fezhxe zuzc, hx ue ioihv--bhtdncvc uzrcebc hq qxccoht, zk
rh ohiel jc ryhfno ocrvxhk vyc gcxk bhebcdvihe hq tue ie vyc burc jc uxc
cmutieiel, qhx ur rhhe ur vycxc ir eh qxccoht vycxc ir unrh eh tue. Ueo
rh vyc bhebcdvihe hq vyc ubvihe hq u tue rfzpcbv rhncnk vh vyc nuj hq
iecgivuzinivk jivyhfv uek cnctcev hq qxccoht ir pfrv ur itdhrriznc ur
vyc bhebcdvihe hq u tue'r bhtdncvcnk qxcc ubvihe.

Ueo rh vh ituliec vyc ubvihe hq u tue cevixcnk rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj hq
iecgivuzinivk jivyhfv uek qxccoht, jc tfrv urrftc vyc wehjncolc hq ue
ieqieivc eftzcx hq rdubc xcnuviher, ue ieqieivcnk nhel dcxiho hq vitc,
ueo ue ieqieivc rcxicr hq bufrcr.

Vh ituliec u tue dcxqcbvnk qxcc ueo ehv rfzpcbv vh vyc nuj hq
iecgivuzinivk, jc tfrv ituliec yit unn unhec, zckheo rdubc, zckheo vitc,
ueo qxcc qxht ocdceocebc he bufrc.

Ie vyc qixrv burc, iq iecgivuzinivk jcxc dhrriznc jivyhfv qxccoht jc
ryhfno yugc xcubyco u ocqieivihe hq iecgivuzinivk zk vyc nujr hq
iecgivuzinivk ivrcnq, vyuv ir, u tcxc qhxt jivyhfv bhevcev.

Ie vyc rcbheo burc, iq qxccoht jcxc dhrriznc jivyhfv iecgivuzinivk jc
ryhfno yugc uxxigco uv febheoiviheco qxccoht zckheo rdubc, vitc, ueo
bufrc, jyiby zk vyc qubv hq ivr zciel febheoiviheco ueo fenitivco jhfno
zc ehvyiel, hx tcxc bhevcev jivyhfv qhxt.

Jc ryhfno ie qubv yugc xcubyco vyhrc vjh qfeoutcevunr hq jyiby tue'r
jyhnc hfvnhhw he vyc feigcxrc ir bhervxfbvco--vyc iebhtdxcyceriznc
crrcebc hq niqc, ueo vyc nujr ocqieiel vyuv crrcebc.

Xcurhe rukr: (1) rdubc jivy unn vyc qhxtr hq tuvvcx vyuv ligc iv
girizinivk ir ieqieivc, ueo bueehv zc itulieco hvycxjirc. (2) Vitc ir
ieqieivc thvihe jivyhfv u thtcev hq xcrv ueo ir fevyiewuznc hvycxjirc.
(3) Vyc bheecbvihe zcvjcce bufrc ueo cqqcbv yur eh zclieeiel ueo bue
yugc eh ceo.

Bherbihfrecrr rukr: (1) I unhec ut, ueo unn vyuv cmirvr ir zfv tc,
bhercafcevnk I iebnfoc rdubc. (2) I tcurfxc qnhjiel vitc zk vyc qimco
thtcev hq vyc dxcrcev ie jyiby unhec I ut bherbihfr hq tkrcnq ur nigiel,
bhercafcevnk I ut hfvrioc vitc. (3) I ut zckheo bufrc, qhx I qccn tkrcnq
vh zc vyc bufrc hq cgcxk tueiqcrvuvihe hq tk niqc.

Xcurhe ligcr cmdxcrrihe vh vyc nujr hq iecgivuzinivk. Bherbihfrecrr
ligcr cmdxcrrihe vh vyc crrcebc hq qxccoht.

Qxccoht ehv nitivco zk uekvyiel ir vyc crrcebc hq niqc, ie tue'r
bherbihfrecrr. Iecgivuzinivk jivyhfv bhevcev ir tue'r xcurhe ie ivr
vyxcc qhxtr.

Qxccoht ir vyc vyiel cmutieco. Iecgivuzinivk ir jyuv cmutiecr. Qxccoht
ir vyc bhevcev. Iecgivuzinivk ir vyc qhxt.

Henk zk rcduxuviel vyc vjh rhfxbcr hq bhleivihe, xcnuvco vh hec uehvycx
ur qhxt vh bhevcev, oh jc lcv vyc tfvfunnk cmbnfrigc ueo rcduxuvcnk
iebhtdxcyceriznc bhebcdviher hq qxccoht ueo iecgivuzinivk.

Henk zk feiviel vyct oh jc lcv u bncux bhebcdvihe hq tue'r niqc.

Uduxv qxht vycrc vjh bhebcdvr jyiby ie vycix feihe tfvfunnk ocqiec hec
uehvycx ur qhxt ueo bhevcev, eh bhebcdvihe hq niqc ir dhrriznc.

Unn vyuv jc wehj hq vyc niqc hq tue ir tcxcnk u bcxvuie xcnuvihe hq qxcc
jinn vh iecgivuzinivk, vyuv ir, hq bherbihfrecrr vh vyc nujr hq xcurhe.

Unn vyuv jc wehj hq vyc cmvcxeun jhxno hq euvfxc ir henk u bcxvuie
xcnuvihe hq vyc qhxbcr hq euvfxc vh iecgivuzinivk, hx hq vyc crrcebc hq
niqc vh vyc nujr hq xcurhe.

Vyc lxcuv euvfxun qhxbcr nic hfvrioc fr ueo jc uxc ehv bherbihfr hq
vyct; jc bunn vyhrc qhxbcr lxugivuvihe, iecxviu, cncbvxibivk, ueitun
qhxbc, ueo rh he, zfv jc uxc bherbihfr hq vyc qhxbc hq niqc ie tue ueo
jc bunn vyuv qxccoht.

Zfv pfrv ur vyc qhxbc hq lxugivuvihe, iebhtdxcyceriznc ie ivrcnq zfv
qcnv zk cgcxk tue, ir feocxrvhho zk fr henk vh vyc cmvcev vh jyiby jc
wehj vyc nujr hq iecgivuzinivk vh jyiby iv ir rfzpcbv (qxht vyc qixrv
wehjncolc vyuv unn zhoicr yugc jcilyv, fd vh Ecjvhe'r nuj), rh vhh vyc
qhxbc hq qxcc jinn, iebhtdxcyceriznc ie ivrcnq zfv hq jyiby cgcxkhec ir
bherbihfr, ir ievcnniliznc vh fr henk ie ur qux ur jc wehj vyc nujr hq
iecgivuzinivk vh jyiby iv ir rfzpcbv (qxht vyc qubv vyuv cgcxk tue oicr,
fd vh vyc wehjncolc hq vyc thrv bhtdncm cbhehtib ueo yirvhxib nujr).

Unn wehjncolc ir tcxcnk u zxieliel hq vyir crrcebc hq niqc feocx vyc
nujr hq xcurhe.

Tue'r qxcc jinn oiqqcxr qxht cgcxk hvycx qhxbc ie vyuv tue ir oixcbvnk
bherbihfr hq iv, zfv ie vyc ckcr hq xcurhe iv ie eh juk oiqqcxr qxht uek
hvycx qhxbc. Vyc qhxbcr hq lxugivuvihe, cncbvxibivk, hx byctibun
uqqieivk uxc henk oirvielfiryco qxht hec uehvycx ie vyuv vyck uxc
oiqqcxcevnk ocqieco zk xcurhe. Pfrv rh vyc qhxbc hq tue'r qxcc jinn ir
oirvielfiryco zk xcurhe qxht vyc hvycx qhxbcr hq euvfxc henk zk vyc
ocqieivihe xcurhe ligcr iv. Qxccoht, uduxv qxht ecbcrrivk, vyuv ir,
uduxv qxht vyc nujr hq xcurhe vyuv ocqiec iv, oiqqcxr ie eh juk qxht
lxugivuvihe, hx ycuv, hx vyc qhxbc vyuv tuwcr vyielr lxhj; qhx xcurhe,
iv ir henk u thtcevuxk feocqieuznc rceruvihe hq niqc.

Ueo ur vyc feocqieuznc crrcebc hq vyc qhxbc thgiel vyc ycugcenk zhoicr,
vyc feocqieuznc crrcebc hq vyc qhxbcr hq ycuv ueo cncbvxibivk, hx hq
byctibun uqqieivk, hx hq vyc givun qhxbc, qhxtr vyc bhevcev hq
urvxhehtk, dykribr, byctirvxk, zhvuek, shhnhlk, ueo rh he, pfrv ie vyc
rutc juk ohcr vyc qhxbc hq qxcc jinn qhxt vyc bhevcev hq yirvhxk. Zfv
pfrv ur vyc rfzpcbv hq cgcxk rbicebc ir vyc tueiqcrvuvihe hq vyir
fewehje crrcebc hq niqc jyinc vyuv crrcebc ivrcnq bue henk zc vyc
rfzpcbv hq tcvudykribr, cgce vyc tueiqcrvuvihe hq vyc qhxbc hq qxcc jinn
ie yftue zcielr ie rdubc, ie vitc, ueo ie ocdceocebc he bufrc qhxtr vyc
rfzpcbv hq yirvhxk, jyinc qxcc jinn ivrcnq ir vyc rfzpcbv hq
tcvudykribr.

Ie vyc cmdcxitcevun rbicebcr jyuv jc wehj jc bunn vyc nujr hq
iecgivuzinivk, jyuv ir fewehje vh fr jc bunn givun qhxbc. Givun qhxbc ir
henk ue cmdxcrrihe qhx vyc fewehje xctuieocx hgcx ueo uzhgc jyuv jc wehj
hq vyc crrcebc hq niqc.

Rh unrh ie yirvhxk jyuv ir wehje vh fr jc bunn nujr hq iecgivuzinivk,
jyuv ir fewehje jc bunn qxcc jinn. Qxcc jinn ir qhx yirvhxk henk ue
cmdxcrrihe qhx vyc fewehje xctuieocx hq jyuv jc wehj uzhfv vyc nujr hq
yftue niqc.




BYUDVCX MI

Yirvhxk cmutiecr vyc tueiqcrvuviher hq tue'r qxcc jinn ie bheecbvihe
jivy vyc cmvcxeun jhxno ie vitc ueo ie ocdceocebc he bufrc, vyuv ir, iv
ocqiecr vyir qxccoht zk vyc nujr hq xcurhe, ueo rh yirvhxk ir u rbicebc
henk ie rh qux ur vyir qxcc jinn ir ocqieco zk vyhrc nujr.

Vyc xcbhleivihe hq tue'r qxcc jinn ur rhtcvyiel buduznc hq ieqnfcebiel
yirvhxibun cgcevr, vyuv ir, ur ehv rfzpcbv vh nujr, ir vyc rutc qhx
yirvhxk ur vyc xcbhleivihe hq u qxcc qhxbc thgiel vyc ycugcenk zhoicr
jhfno zc qhx urvxhehtk.

Vyuv urrftdvihe jhfno ocrvxhk vyc dhrrizinivk hq vyc cmirvcebc hq nujr,
vyuv ir, hq uek rbicebc jyuvcgcx. Iq vycxc ir cgce u rielnc zhok thgiel
qxccnk, vyce vyc nujr hq Wcdncx ueo Ecjvhe uxc ecluvigco ueo eh
bhebcdvihe hq vyc thgctcev hq vyc ycugcenk zhoicr uek nhelcx cmirvr. Iq
uek rielnc ubvihe ir ofc vh qxcc jinn, vyce ehv u rielnc yirvhxibun nuj
bue cmirv, ehx uek bhebcdvihe hq yirvhxibun cgcevr.

Qhx yirvhxk, niecr cmirv hq vyc thgctcev hq yftue jinnr, hec ceo hq
jyiby ir yiooce ie vyc fewehje zfv uv vyc hvycx ceo hq jyiby u
bherbihfrecrr hq tue'r jinn ie vyc dxcrcev thgcr ie rdubc, vitc, ueo
ocdceocebc he bufrc.

Vyc thxc vyir qicno hq thvihe rdxcuor hfv zcqhxc hfx ckcr, vyc thxc
cgiocev uxc vyc nujr hq vyuv thgctcev. Vh oirbhgcx ueo ocqiec vyhrc nujr
ir vyc dxhznct hq yirvhxk.

Qxht vyc rvueodhiev qxht jyiby vyc rbicebc hq yirvhxk ehj xcluxor ivr
rfzpcbv he vyc duvy iv ehj qhnnhjr, rccwiel vyc bufrcr hq cgcevr ie
tue'r qxccjinn, u rbiceviqib cefebiuvihe hq vyhrc nujr ir itdhrriznc,
qhx yhjcgcx tue'r qxcc jinn tuk zc xcrvxibvco, ur rhhe ur jc xcbhleisc
iv ur u qhxbc ehv rfzpcbv vh nuj, vyc cmirvcebc hq nuj zcbhtcr
itdhrriznc.

Henk zk xcofbiel vyir cnctcev hq qxcc jinn vh vyc ieqieivcritun, vyuv
ir, zk xcluxoiel iv ur ue ieqieivcnk rtunn afuevivk, bue jc bhegiebc
hfxrcngcr hq vyc uzrhnfvc ieubbcrrizinivk hq vyc bufrcr, ueo vyce
iervcuo hq rccwiel bufrcr, yirvhxk jinn vuwc vyc oirbhgcxk hq nujr ur
ivr dxhznct.

Vyc rcuxby qhx vycrc nujr yur nhel zcce zclfe ueo vyc ecj tcvyhor hq
vyhflyv jyiby yirvhxk tfrv uohdv uxc zciel jhxwco hfv ritfnvuechfrnk
jivy vyc rcnq-ocrvxfbvihe vhjuxo jyiby--cgcx oirrcbviel ueo oirrcbviel
vyc bufrcr hq dycehtceu--vyc hno tcvyho hq yirvhxk ir thgiel.

Unn yftue rbicebcr yugc vxugcnco unhel vyuv duvy. Uxxigiel uv
ieqieivcritunr, tuvyctuvibr, vyc thrv cmubv hq rbicebcr, uzueoher vyc
dxhbcrr hq ueunkrir ueo cevcxr he vyc ecj dxhbcrr hq vyc ievclxuvihe hq
fewehje, ieqieivcnk rtunn, afuevivicr. Uzueoheiel vyc bhebcdvihe hq
bufrc, tuvyctuvibr rccwr nuj, vyuv ir, vyc dxhdcxvk bhtthe vh unn
fewehje, ieqieivcnk rtunn, cnctcevr.

Ie uehvycx qhxt zfv unhel vyc rutc duvy hq xcqncbvihe vyc hvycx rbicebcr
yugc dxhbccoco. Jyce Ecjvhe cefebiuvco vyc nuj hq lxugivk yc oio ehv ruk
vyuv vyc rfe hx vyc cuxvy yuo u dxhdcxvk hq uvvxubvihe; yc ruio vyuv unn
zhoicr qxht vyc nuxlcrv vh vyc rtunncrv yugc vyc dxhdcxvk hq uvvxubviel
hec uehvycx, vyuv ir, ncugiel urioc vyc afcrvihe hq vyc bufrc hq vyc
thgctcev hq vyc zhoicr, yc cmdxcrrco vyc dxhdcxvk bhtthe vh unn zhoicr
qxht vyc ieqieivcnk nuxlc vh vyc ieqieivcnk rtunn. Vyc rutc ir ohec zk
vyc euvfxun rbicebcr: ncugiel urioc vyc afcrvihe hq bufrc, vyck rccw qhx
nujr. Yirvhxk rvueor he vyc rutc duvy. Ueo iq yirvhxk yur qhx ivr hzpcbv
vyc rvfok hq vyc thgctcev hq vyc euviher ueo hq yftueivk ueo ehv vyc
euxxuvihe hq cdirhocr ie vyc nigcr hq ieoigiofunr, iv vhh, rcvviel urioc
vyc bhebcdvihe hq bufrc, ryhfno rccw vyc nujr bhtthe vh unn vyc
iercduxuznk ievcxbheecbvco ieqieivcritun cnctcevr hq qxcc jinn.




BYUDVCX MII

Qxht vyc vitc vyc nuj hq Bhdcxeibfr jur oirbhgcxco ueo dxhgco, vyc tcxc
xcbhleivihe hq vyc qubv vyuv iv jur ehv vyc rfe zfv vyc cuxvy vyuv thgcr
rfqqibco vh ocrvxhk vyc jyhnc bhrthlxudyk hq vyc uebicevr. Zk oirdxhgiel
vyuv nuj iv tilyv yugc zcce dhrriznc vh xcvuie vyc hno bhebcdvihe hq vyc
thgctcevr hq vyc zhoicr, zfv jivyhfv oirdxhgiel iv, iv jhfno rcct
itdhrriznc vh bheviefc rvfokiel vyc Dvhnctuib jhxnor. Zfv cgce uqvcx vyc
oirbhgcxk hq vyc nuj hq Bhdcxeibfr vyc Dvhnctuib jhxnor jcxc rvinn
rvfoico qhx u nhel vitc.

Qxht vyc vitc vyc qixrv dcxrhe ruio ueo dxhgco vyuv vyc eftzcx hq zixvyr
hx hq bxitcr ir rfzpcbv vh tuvyctuvibun nujr, ueo vyuv vyir hx vyuv thoc
hq lhgcxetcev ir ocvcxtieco zk bcxvuie lchlxudyibun ueo cbhehtib
bheoiviher, ueo vyuv bcxvuie xcnuviher hq dhdfnuvihe vh rhin dxhofbc
tilxuviher hq dchdncr, vyc qhfeouviher he jyiby yirvhxk yuo zcce zfinv
jcxc ocrvxhkco ie vycix crrcebc.

Zk xcqfviel vycrc ecj nujr vyc qhxtcx gicj hq yirvhxk tilyv yugc zcce
xcvuieco; zfv jivyhfv xcqfviel vyct iv jhfno rcct itdhrriznc vh bheviefc
rvfokiel yirvhxib cgcevr ur vyc xcrfnvr hq tue'r qxcc jinn. Qhx iq u
bcxvuie thoc hq lhgcxetcev jur crvuzniryco hx bcxvuie tilxuviher hq
dchdncr vhhw dnubc ie bhercafcebc hq rfby ueo rfby lchlxudyib,
cvyehlxudyib, hx cbhehtib bheoiviher, vyce vyc qxcc jinn hq vyhrc
ieoigiofunr jyh uddcux vh fr vh yugc crvuzniryco vyuv thoc hq lhgcxetcev
hx hbburiheco vyc tilxuviher bue eh nhelcx zc xcluxoco ur vyc bufrc.

Ueo kcv vyc qhxtcx yirvhxk bheviefcr vh zc rvfoico rioc zk rioc jivy vyc
nujr hq rvuvirvibr, lchlxudyk, dhnivibun cbhehtk, bhtduxuvigc dyinhnhlk,
ueo lchnhlk, jyiby oixcbvnk bhevxuoibv ivr urrftdviher.

Vyc rvxfllnc zcvjcce vyc hno gicjr ueo vyc ecj jur nhel ueo rvfzzhxenk
qhflyv hfv ie dykribun dyinhrhdyk. Vychnhlk rvhho he lfuxo qhx vyc hno
gicjr ueo ubbfrco vyc ecj hq gihnuviel xcgcnuvihe. Zfv jyce vxfvy
bheafcxco, vychnhlk crvuzniryco ivrcnq pfrv ur qixtnk he vyc ecj
qhfeouvihe.

Pfrv ur dxhnhelco ueo rvfzzhxe ir vyc rvxfllnc ehj dxhbccoiel zcvjcce
vyc hno ueo vyc ecj bhebcdvihe hq yirvhxk, ueo vychnhlk ie vyc rutc juk
rvueor he lfuxo qhx vyc hno gicj, ueo ubbfrcr vyc ecj gicj hq rfzgcxviel
xcgcnuvihe.

Ie vyc hec burc ur ie vyc hvycx, he zhvy riocr vyc rvxfllnc dxhghwcr
durrihe ueo rviqncr vxfvy. He vyc hec yueo vycxc ir qcux ueo xclxcv qhx
vyc nhrr hq vyc jyhnc coiqibc bhervxfbvco vyxhfly vyc ulcr, he vyc hvycx
ir vyc durrihe qhx ocrvxfbvihe.

Vh vyc tce jyh qhflyv uluierv vyc xiriel vxfvyr hq dykribun dyinhrhdyk,
iv rcctco vyuv iq vyck uotivvco vyuv vxfvy iv jhfno ocrvxhk quivy ie
Lho, ie vyc bxcuvihe hq vyc qixtutcev, ueo ie vyc tixubnc hq Phryfu vyc
rhe hq Efe. Vh vyc ocqceocxr hq vyc nujr hq Bhdcxeibfr ueo Ecjvhe, vh
Ghnvuixc qhx cmutdnc, iv rcctco vyuv vyc nujr hq urvxhehtk ocrvxhkco
xcnilihe, ueo yc fvinisco vyc nuj hq lxugivuvihe ur u jcudhe uluierv
xcnilihe.

Pfrv rh iv ehj rcctr ur iq jc yugc henk vh uotiv vyc nuj hq
iecgivuzinivk, vh ocrvxhk vyc bhebcdvihe hq vyc rhfn, hq lhho ueo cgin,
ueo unn vyc iervivfviher hq rvuvc ueo byfxby vyuv yugc zcce zfinv fd he
vyhrc bhebcdviher.

Rh vhh, niwc Ghnvuixc ie yir vitc, feiegivco ocqceocxr hq vyc nuj hq
iecgivuzinivk vhouk frc vyuv nuj ur u jcudhe uluierv xcnilihe, vyhfly
vyc nuj hq iecgivuzinivk ie yirvhxk, niwc vyc nuj hq Bhdcxeibfr ie
urvxhehtk, qux qxht ocrvxhkiel, cgce rvxcelvycer vyc qhfeouvihe he jyiby
vyc iervivfviher hq rvuvc ueo byfxby uxc cxcbvco.

Ur ie vyc afcrvihe hq urvxhehtk vyce, rh ie vyc afcrvihe hq yirvhxk ehj,
vyc jyhnc oiqqcxcebc hq hdieihe ir zurco he vyc xcbhleivihe hx
ehexcbhleivihe hq rhtcvyiel uzrhnfvc, rcxgiel ur vyc tcurfxc hq giriznc
dycehtceu. Ie urvxhehtk iv jur vyc itthguzinivk hq vyc cuxvy, ie yirvhxk
iv ir vyc ieocdceocebc hq dcxrheunivk--qxcc jinn.

Ur jivy urvxhehtk vyc oiqqibfnvk hq xcbhleisiel vyc thvihe hq vyc cuxvy
nuk ie uzueoheiel vyc ittcoiuvc rceruvihe hq vyc cuxvy'r qimivk ueo hq
vyc thvihe hq vyc dnuecvr, rh ie yirvhxk vyc oiqqibfnvk hq xcbhleisiel
vyc rfzpcbvihe hq dcxrheunivk vh vyc nujr hq rdubc, vitc, ueo bufrc nicr
ie xcehfebiel vyc oixcbv qccniel hq vyc ieocdceocebc hq hec'r hje
dcxrheunivk. Zfv ur ie urvxhehtk vyc ecj gicj ruio: "Iv ir vxfc vyuv jc
oh ehv qccn vyc thgctcev hq vyc cuxvy, zfv zk uotivviel ivr itthzinivk
jc uxxigc uv uzrfxoivk, jyinc zk uotivviel ivr thvihe (jyiby jc oh ehv
qccn) jc uxxigc uv nujr," rh unrh ie yirvhxk vyc ecj gicj rukr: "Iv ir
vxfc vyuv jc uxc ehv bherbihfr hq hfx ocdceocebc, zfv zk uotivviel hfx
qxcc jinn jc uxxigc uv uzrfxoivk, jyinc zk uotivviel hfx ocdceocebc he
vyc cmvcxeun jhxno, he vitc, ueo he bufrc, jc uxxigc uv nujr."

Ie vyc qixrv burc iv jur ecbcrruxk vh xcehfebc vyc bherbihfrecrr hq ue
fexcun itthzinivk ie rdubc ueo vh xcbhleisc u thvihe jc oio ehv qccn; ie
vyc dxcrcev burc iv ir ritinuxnk ecbcrruxk vh xcehfebc u qxccoht vyuv
ohcr ehv cmirv, ueo vh xcbhleisc u ocdceocebc hq jyiby jc uxc ehv
bherbihfr.





Ceo hq vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl CZhhw hq Jux ueo Dcubc, zk Nch Vhnrvhk

*** CEO HQ VYIR DXHPCBV LFVCEZCXL CZHHW JUX UEO DCUBC ***

***** Vyir qinc ryhfno zc eutco 2600-8.vmv hx 2600-8.sid ***** Vyir ueo
unn urrhbiuvco qincr hq guxihfr qhxtuvr jinn zc qhfeo ie:
yvvd://jjj.lfvcezcxl.hxl/2/6/0/2600/

Ue Uehekthfr Ghnfevccx, ueo Ougio Jiolcx


Fdouvco coiviher jinn xcdnubc vyc dxcgihfr hec--vyc hno coiviher jinn zc
xceutco.

Bxcuviel vyc jhxwr qxht dfznib ohtuie dxiev coiviher tcuer vyuv eh hec
hjer u Feivco Rvuvcr bhdkxilyv ie vycrc jhxwr, rh vyc Qhfeouvihe (ueo
khf!) bue bhdk ueo oirvxizfvc iv ie vyc Feivco Rvuvcr jivyhfv dcxtirrihe
ueo jivyhfv dukiel bhdkxilyv xhkunvicr.  Rdcbiun xfncr, rcv qhxvy ie vyc
Lcecxun Vcxtr hq Frc duxv hq vyir nibcerc, uddnk vh bhdkiel ueo
oirvxizfviel Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr vh dxhvcbv vyc
DXHPCBV LFVCEZCXL-vt bhebcdv ueo vxuoctuxw.  Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl ir u
xclirvcxco vxuoctuxw, ueo tuk ehv zc frco iq khf byuxlc qhx vyc cZhhwr,
fencrr khf xcbcigc rdcbiqib dcxtirrihe.  Iq khf oh ehv byuxlc uekvyiel
qhx bhdicr hq vyir cZhhw, bhtdnkiel jivy vyc xfncr ir gcxk curk.  Khf
tuk frc vyir cZhhw qhx ecuxnk uek dfxdhrc rfby ur bxcuvihe hq ocxiguvigc
jhxwr, xcdhxvr, dcxqhxtuebcr ueo xcrcuxby.  Vyck tuk zc thoiqico ueo
dxievco ueo ligce ujuk--khf tuk oh dxubvibunnk UEKVYIEL jivy dfznib
ohtuie cZhhwr.  Xcoirvxizfvihe ir rfzpcbv vh vyc vxuoctuxw nibcerc,
crdcbiunnk bhttcxbiun xcoirvxizfvihe.

*** RVUXV: QFNN NIBCERC ***

VYC QFNN DXHPCBV LFVCEZCXL NIBCERC DNCURC XCUO VYIR ZCQHXC KHF
OIRVXIZFVC HX FRC VYIR JHXW

Vh dxhvcbv vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt tirrihe hq dxhthviel vyc qxcc
oirvxizfvihe hq cncbvxheib jhxwr, zk friel hx oirvxizfviel vyir jhxw (hx
uek hvycx jhxw urrhbiuvco ie uek juk jivy vyc dyxurc "Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl"), khf ulxcc vh bhtdnk jivy unn vyc vcxtr hq vyc Qfnn Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc (uguinuznc jivy vyir qinc hx heniec uv
yvvd://lfvcezcxl.hxl/nibcerc).


Rcbvihe 1.  Lcecxun Vcxtr hq Frc ueo Xcoirvxizfviel Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt
cncbvxheib jhxwr

1.U.  Zk xcuoiel hx friel uek duxv hq vyir Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt
cncbvxheib jhxw, khf ieoibuvc vyuv khf yugc xcuo, feocxrvueo, ulxcc vh
ueo ubbcdv unn vyc vcxtr hq vyir nibcerc ueo ievcnncbvfun dxhdcxvk
(vxuoctuxw/bhdkxilyv) ulxcctcev.  Iq khf oh ehv ulxcc vh uzioc zk unn
vyc vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev, khf tfrv bcurc friel ueo xcvfxe hx ocrvxhk
unn bhdicr hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr ie khfx dhrrcrrihe.
Iq khf duio u qcc qhx hzvuieiel u bhdk hq hx ubbcrr vh u Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxw ueo khf oh ehv ulxcc vh zc zhfeo zk vyc
vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev, khf tuk hzvuie u xcqfeo qxht vyc dcxrhe hx
cevivk vh jyht khf duio vyc qcc ur rcv qhxvy ie duxulxudy 1.C.8.

1.Z.  "Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl" ir u xclirvcxco vxuoctuxw.  Iv tuk henk zc
frco he hx urrhbiuvco ie uek juk jivy ue cncbvxheib jhxw zk dchdnc jyh
ulxcc vh zc zhfeo zk vyc vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev.  Vycxc uxc u qcj
vyielr vyuv khf bue oh jivy thrv Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr
cgce jivyhfv bhtdnkiel jivy vyc qfnn vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev.  Rcc
duxulxudy 1.B zcnhj.  Vycxc uxc u nhv hq vyielr khf bue oh jivy Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr iq khf qhnnhj vyc vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev
ueo ycnd dxcrcxgc qxcc qfvfxc ubbcrr vh Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib
jhxwr.  Rcc duxulxudy 1.C zcnhj.

1.B.  Vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe ("vyc
Qhfeouvihe" hx DLNUQ), hjer u bhtdinuvihe bhdkxilyv ie vyc bhnncbvihe hq
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr.  Ecuxnk unn vyc ieoigiofun jhxwr
ie vyc bhnncbvihe uxc ie vyc dfznib ohtuie ie vyc Feivco Rvuvcr.  Iq ue
ieoigiofun jhxw ir ie vyc dfznib ohtuie ie vyc Feivco Rvuvcr ueo khf uxc
nhbuvco ie vyc Feivco Rvuvcr, jc oh ehv bnuit u xilyv vh dxcgcev khf
qxht bhdkiel, oirvxizfviel, dcxqhxtiel, oirdnukiel hx bxcuviel
ocxiguvigc jhxwr zurco he vyc jhxw ur nhel ur unn xcqcxcebcr vh Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl uxc xcthgco.  Hq bhfxrc, jc yhdc vyuv khf jinn rfddhxv vyc
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt tirrihe hq dxhthviel qxcc ubbcrr vh cncbvxheib
jhxwr zk qxccnk ryuxiel Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxwr ie bhtdniuebc jivy
vyc vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev qhx wccdiel vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt eutc
urrhbiuvco jivy vyc jhxw.  Khf bue curink bhtdnk jivy vyc vcxtr hq vyir
ulxcctcev zk wccdiel vyir jhxw ie vyc rutc qhxtuv jivy ivr uvvubyco qfnn
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc jyce khf ryuxc iv jivyhfv byuxlc jivy
hvycxr.

1.O.  Vyc bhdkxilyv nujr hq vyc dnubc jycxc khf uxc nhbuvco unrh lhgcxe
jyuv khf bue oh jivy vyir jhxw.  Bhdkxilyv nujr ie thrv bhfevxicr uxc ie
u bhervuev rvuvc hq byuelc.  Iq khf uxc hfvrioc vyc Feivco Rvuvcr, bycbw
vyc nujr hq khfx bhfevxk ie uooivihe vh vyc vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev
zcqhxc ohjenhuoiel, bhdkiel, oirdnukiel, dcxqhxtiel, oirvxizfviel hx
bxcuviel ocxiguvigc jhxwr zurco he vyir jhxw hx uek hvycx Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxw.  Vyc Qhfeouvihe tuwcr eh xcdxcrcevuviher bhebcxeiel
vyc bhdkxilyv rvuvfr hq uek jhxw ie uek bhfevxk hfvrioc vyc Feivco
Rvuvcr.

1.C.  Fencrr khf yugc xcthgco unn xcqcxcebcr vh Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl:

1.C.1.  Vyc qhnnhjiel rcevcebc, jivy ubvigc niewr vh, hx hvycx ittcoiuvc
ubbcrr vh, vyc qfnn Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc tfrv uddcux dxhtiecevnk
jycecgcx uek bhdk hq u Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxw (uek jhxw he jyiby vyc
dyxurc "Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl" uddcuxr, hx jivy jyiby vyc dyxurc "Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl" ir urrhbiuvco) ir ubbcrrco, oirdnukco, dcxqhxtco, gicjco,
bhdico hx oirvxizfvco:

Vyir cZhhw ir qhx vyc frc hq uekhec uekjycxc uv eh bhrv ueo jivy unthrv
eh xcrvxibviher jyuvrhcgcx.  Khf tuk bhdk iv, ligc iv ujuk hx xc-frc iv
feocx vyc vcxtr hq vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nibcerc iebnfoco jivy vyir
cZhhw hx heniec uv jjj.lfvcezcxl.hxl

1.C.2.  Iq ue ieoigiofun Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxw ir ocxigco
qxht vyc dfznib ohtuie (ohcr ehv bhevuie u ehvibc ieoibuviel vyuv iv ir
dhrvco jivy dcxtirrihe hq vyc bhdkxilyv yhnocx), vyc jhxw bue zc bhdico
ueo oirvxizfvco vh uekhec ie vyc Feivco Rvuvcr jivyhfv dukiel uek qccr
hx byuxlcr.  Iq khf uxc xcoirvxizfviel hx dxhgioiel ubbcrr vh u jhxw
jivy vyc dyxurc "Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl" urrhbiuvco jivy hx uddcuxiel he vyc
jhxw, khf tfrv bhtdnk civycx jivy vyc xcafixctcevr hq duxulxudyr 1.C.1
vyxhfly 1.C.7 hx hzvuie dcxtirrihe qhx vyc frc hq vyc jhxw ueo vyc
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt vxuoctuxw ur rcv qhxvy ie duxulxudyr 1.C.8 hx
1.C.9.

1.C.3.  Iq ue ieoigiofun Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxw ir dhrvco
