jivy vyc dcxtirrihe hq vyc bhdkxilyv yhnocx, khfx frc ueo oirvxizfvihe
tfrv bhtdnk jivy zhvy duxulxudyr 1.C.1 vyxhfly 1.C.7 ueo uek uooiviheun
vcxtr itdhrco zk vyc bhdkxilyv yhnocx.  Uooiviheun vcxtr jinn zc niewco
vh vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc qhx unn jhxwr dhrvco jivy vyc
dcxtirrihe hq vyc bhdkxilyv yhnocx qhfeo uv vyc zclieeiel hq vyir jhxw.

1.C.4.  Oh ehv feniew hx ocvuby hx xcthgc vyc qfnn Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt
Nibcerc vcxtr qxht vyir jhxw, hx uek qincr bhevuieiel u duxv hq vyir
jhxw hx uek hvycx jhxw urrhbiuvco jivy Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt.

1.C.5.  Oh ehv bhdk, oirdnuk, dcxqhxt, oirvxizfvc hx xcoirvxizfvc vyir
cncbvxheib jhxw, hx uek duxv hq vyir cncbvxheib jhxw, jivyhfv
dxhtiecevnk oirdnukiel vyc rcevcebc rcv qhxvy ie duxulxudy 1.C.1 jivy
ubvigc niewr hx ittcoiuvc ubbcrr vh vyc qfnn vcxtr hq vyc Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc.

1.C.6.  Khf tuk bhegcxv vh ueo oirvxizfvc vyir jhxw ie uek zieuxk,
bhtdxcrrco, tuxwco fd, ehedxhdxicvuxk hx dxhdxicvuxk qhxt, iebnfoiel uek
jhxo dxhbcrriel hx ykdcxvcmv qhxt.  Yhjcgcx, iq khf dxhgioc ubbcrr vh hx
oirvxizfvc bhdicr hq u Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxw ie u qhxtuv hvycx vyue
"Dnuie Gueinnu URBII" hx hvycx qhxtuv frco ie vyc hqqibiun gcxrihe
dhrvco he vyc hqqibiun Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jcz rivc
(jjj.lfvcezcxl.hxl), khf tfrv, uv eh uooiviheun bhrv, qcc hx cmdcerc vh
vyc frcx, dxhgioc u bhdk, u tcuer hq cmdhxviel u bhdk, hx u tcuer hq
hzvuieiel u bhdk fdhe xcafcrv, hq vyc jhxw ie ivr hxilieun "Dnuie
Gueinnu URBII" hx hvycx qhxt.  Uek unvcxeuvc qhxtuv tfrv iebnfoc vyc
qfnn Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc ur rdcbiqico ie duxulxudy 1.C.1.

1.C.7.  Oh ehv byuxlc u qcc qhx ubbcrr vh, gicjiel, oirdnukiel,
dcxqhxtiel, bhdkiel hx oirvxizfviel uek Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxwr
fencrr khf bhtdnk jivy duxulxudy 1.C.8 hx 1.C.9.

1.C.8.  Khf tuk byuxlc u xcurheuznc qcc qhx bhdicr hq hx dxhgioiel
ubbcrr vh hx oirvxizfviel Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr dxhgioco
vyuv

- Khf duk u xhkunvk qcc hq 20% hq vyc lxhrr dxhqivr khf ocxigc qxht vyc
frc hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxwr bunbfnuvco friel vyc tcvyho khf
unxcuok frc vh bunbfnuvc khfx uddnibuznc vumcr.  Vyc qcc ir hjco vh vyc
hjecx hq vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt vxuoctuxw, zfv yc yur ulxcco vh oheuvc
xhkunvicr feocx vyir duxulxudy vh vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc
Qhfeouvihe.  Xhkunvk duktcevr tfrv zc duio jivyie 60 oukr qhnnhjiel cuby
ouvc he jyiby khf dxcduxc (hx uxc nclunnk xcafixco vh dxcduxc) khfx
dcxihoib vum xcvfxer.  Xhkunvk duktcevr ryhfno zc bncuxnk tuxwco ur rfby
ueo rcev vh vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe uv vyc
uooxcrr rdcbiqico ie Rcbvihe 4, "Ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv oheuviher vh vyc
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe."

- Khf dxhgioc u qfnn xcqfeo hq uek theck duio zk u frcx jyh ehviqicr khf
ie jxiviel (hx zk c-tuin) jivyie 30 oukr hq xcbcidv vyuv r/yc ohcr ehv
ulxcc vh vyc vcxtr hq vyc qfnn Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt Nibcerc.  Khf tfrv
xcafixc rfby u frcx vh xcvfxe hx ocrvxhk unn bhdicr hq vyc jhxwr
dhrrcrrco ie u dykribun tcoift ueo oirbheviefc unn frc hq ueo unn ubbcrr
vh hvycx bhdicr hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxwr.

- Khf dxhgioc, ie ubbhxouebc jivy duxulxudy 1.Q.3, u qfnn xcqfeo hq uek
theck duio qhx u jhxw hx u xcdnubctcev bhdk, iq u ocqcbv ie vyc
cncbvxheib jhxw ir oirbhgcxco ueo xcdhxvco vh khf jivyie 90 oukr hq
xcbcidv hq vyc jhxw.

- Khf bhtdnk jivy unn hvycx vcxtr hq vyir ulxcctcev qhx qxcc
oirvxizfvihe hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxwr.

1.C.9.  Iq khf jiry vh byuxlc u qcc hx oirvxizfvc u Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt
cncbvxheib jhxw hx lxhfd hq jhxwr he oiqqcxcev vcxtr vyue uxc rcv qhxvy
ie vyir ulxcctcev, khf tfrv hzvuie dcxtirrihe ie jxiviel qxht zhvy vyc
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe ueo Tibyucn Yuxv, vyc
hjecx hq vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt vxuoctuxw.  Bhevubv vyc Qhfeouvihe ur
rcv qhxvy ie Rcbvihe 3 zcnhj.

1.Q.

1.Q.1.  Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl ghnfevccxr ueo ctdnhkccr cmdceo bheriocxuznc
cqqhxv vh ioceviqk, oh bhdkxilyv xcrcuxby he, vxuerbxizc ueo dxhhqxcuo
dfznib ohtuie jhxwr ie bxcuviel vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt bhnncbvihe.
Ocrdivc vycrc cqqhxvr, Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr, ueo vyc
tcoift he jyiby vyck tuk zc rvhxco, tuk bhevuie "Ocqcbvr," rfby ur, zfv
ehv nitivco vh, iebhtdncvc, ieubbfxuvc hx bhxxfdv ouvu, vxuerbxidvihe
cxxhxr, u bhdkxilyv hx hvycx ievcnncbvfun dxhdcxvk ieqxielctcev, u
ocqcbvigc hx outulco oirw hx hvycx tcoift, u bhtdfvcx gixfr, hx bhtdfvcx
bhocr vyuv outulc hx bueehv zc xcuo zk khfx cafidtcev.

1.Q.2.  NITIVCO JUXXUEVK, OIRBNUITCX HQ OUTULCR - Cmbcdv qhx vyc "Xilyv
hq Xcdnubctcev hx Xcqfeo" ocrbxizco ie duxulxudy 1.Q.3, vyc Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe, vyc hjecx hq vyc Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt vxuoctuxw, ueo uek hvycx duxvk oirvxizfviel u Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxw feocx vyir ulxcctcev, oirbnuit unn
niuzinivk vh khf qhx outulcr, bhrvr ueo cmdcercr, iebnfoiel nclun qccr.
KHF ULXCC VYUV KHF YUGC EH XCTCOICR QHX ECLNILCEBC, RVXIBV NIUZINIVK,
ZXCUBY HQ JUXXUEVK HX ZXCUBY HQ BHEVXUBV CMBCDV VYHRC DXHGIOCO IE
DUXULXUDY Q3.  KHF ULXCC VYUV VYC QHFEOUVIHE, VYC VXUOCTUXW HJECX, UEO
UEK OIRVXIZFVHX FEOCX VYIR ULXCCTCEV JINN EHV ZC NIUZNC VH KHF QHX
UBVFUN, OIXCBV, IEOIXCBV, BHERCAFCEVIUN, DFEIVIGC HX IEBIOCEVUN OUTULCR
CGCE IQ KHF LIGC EHVIBC HQ VYC DHRRIZINIVK HQ RFBY OUTULC.

1.Q.3.  NITIVCO XILYV HQ XCDNUBCTCEV HX XCQFEO - Iq khf oirbhgcx u
ocqcbv ie vyir cncbvxheib jhxw jivyie 90 oukr hq xcbcigiel iv, khf bue
xcbcigc u xcqfeo hq vyc theck (iq uek) khf duio qhx iv zk rceoiel u
jxivvce cmdnueuvihe vh vyc dcxrhe khf xcbcigco vyc jhxw qxht.  Iq khf
xcbcigco vyc jhxw he u dykribun tcoift, khf tfrv xcvfxe vyc tcoift jivy
khfx jxivvce cmdnueuvihe.  Vyc dcxrhe hx cevivk vyuv dxhgioco khf jivy
vyc ocqcbvigc jhxw tuk cncbv vh dxhgioc u xcdnubctcev bhdk ie nicf hq u
xcqfeo.  Iq khf xcbcigco vyc jhxw cncbvxheibunnk, vyc dcxrhe hx cevivk
dxhgioiel iv vh khf tuk byhhrc vh ligc khf u rcbheo hddhxvfeivk vh
xcbcigc vyc jhxw cncbvxheibunnk ie nicf hq u xcqfeo.  Iq vyc rcbheo bhdk
ir unrh ocqcbvigc, khf tuk octueo u xcqfeo ie jxiviel jivyhfv qfxvycx
hddhxvfeivicr vh qim vyc dxhznct.

1.Q.4.  Cmbcdv qhx vyc nitivco xilyv hq xcdnubctcev hx xcqfeo rcv qhxvy
ie duxulxudy 1.Q.3, vyir jhxw ir dxhgioco vh khf 'UR-IR' JIVY EH HVYCX
JUXXUEVICR HQ UEK WIEO, CMDXCRR HX ITDNICO, IEBNFOIEL ZFV EHV NITIVCO VH
JUXXUEVICR HQ TCXBYUEVIZINIVK HX QIVECRR QHX UEK DFXDHRC.

1.Q.5.  Rhtc rvuvcr oh ehv unnhj oirbnuitcxr hq bcxvuie itdnico
juxxuevicr hx vyc cmbnfrihe hx nitivuvihe hq bcxvuie vkdcr hq outulcr.
Iq uek oirbnuitcx hx nitivuvihe rcv qhxvy ie vyir ulxcctcev gihnuvcr vyc
nuj hq vyc rvuvc uddnibuznc vh vyir ulxcctcev, vyc ulxcctcev ryunn zc
ievcxdxcvco vh tuwc vyc tumitft oirbnuitcx hx nitivuvihe dcxtivvco zk
vyc uddnibuznc rvuvc nuj.  Vyc iegunioivk hx feceqhxbcuzinivk hq uek
dxhgirihe hq vyir ulxcctcev ryunn ehv ghio vyc xctuieiel dxhgiriher.

1.Q.6.  IEOCTEIVK - Khf ulxcc vh ieocteiqk ueo yhno vyc Qhfeouvihe, vyc
vxuoctuxw hjecx, uek ulcev hx ctdnhkcc hq vyc Qhfeouvihe, uekhec
dxhgioiel bhdicr hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr ie ubbhxouebc
jivy vyir ulxcctcev, ueo uek ghnfevccxr urrhbiuvco jivy vyc dxhofbvihe,
dxhthvihe ueo oirvxizfvihe hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib jhxwr,
yuxtncrr qxht unn niuzinivk, bhrvr ueo cmdcercr, iebnfoiel nclun qccr,
vyuv uxirc oixcbvnk hx ieoixcbvnk qxht uek hq vyc qhnnhjiel jyiby khf oh
hx bufrc vh hbbfx: (u) oirvxizfvihe hq vyir hx uek Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt
jhxw, (z) unvcxuvihe, thoiqibuvihe, hx uooiviher hx ocncviher vh uek
Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt jhxw, ueo (b) uek Ocqcbv khf bufrc.


Rcbvihe  2.  Ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv vyc Tirrihe hq Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt

Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt ir rkehekthfr jivy vyc qxcc oirvxizfvihe hq
cncbvxheib jhxwr ie qhxtuvr xcuouznc zk vyc jiocrv guxicvk hq bhtdfvcxr
iebnfoiel hzrhncvc, hno, tioonc-ulco ueo ecj bhtdfvcxr.  Iv cmirvr
zcbufrc hq vyc cqqhxvr hq yfeoxcor hq ghnfevccxr ueo oheuviher qxht
dchdnc ie unn junwr hq niqc.

Ghnfevccxr ueo qieuebiun rfddhxv vh dxhgioc ghnfevccxr jivy vyc
urrirvuebc vyck ecco, uxc bxivibun vh xcubyiel Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt'r
lhunr ueo cerfxiel vyuv vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt bhnncbvihe jinn xctuie
qxccnk uguinuznc qhx lcecxuviher vh bhtc.  Ie 2001, vyc Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe jur bxcuvco vh dxhgioc u rcbfxc
ueo dcxtuecev qfvfxc qhx Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt ueo qfvfxc lcecxuviher. Vh
ncuxe thxc uzhfv vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe ueo
yhj khfx cqqhxvr ueo oheuviher bue ycnd, rcc Rcbviher 3 ueo 4 ueo vyc
Qhfeouvihe jcz dulc uv yvvd://jjj.dlnuq.hxl.


Rcbvihe 3.  Ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc
Qhfeouvihe

Vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe ir u ehe dxhqiv
501(b)(3) cofbuviheun bhxdhxuvihe hxlueisco feocx vyc nujr hq vyc rvuvc
hq Tirrirriddi ueo lxuevco vum cmctdv rvuvfr zk vyc Ievcxeun Xcgcefc
Rcxgibc.  Vyc Qhfeouvihe'r CIE hx qcocxun vum ioceviqibuvihe eftzcx ir
64-6221541.  Ivr 501(b)(3) ncvvcx ir dhrvco uv
yvvd://dlnuq.hxl/qfeoxuiriel.  Bhevxizfviher vh vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl
Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe uxc vum ocofbviznc vh vyc qfnn cmvcev
dcxtivvco zk F.R. qcocxun nujr ueo khfx rvuvc'r nujr.

Vyc Qhfeouvihe'r dxiebidun hqqibc ir nhbuvco uv 4557 Tcnue Ox. R.
Quixzuewr, UW, 99712., zfv ivr ghnfevccxr ueo ctdnhkccr uxc rbuvvcxco
vyxhflyhfv eftcxhfr nhbuviher.  Ivr zfriecrr hqqibc ir nhbuvco uv 809
Ehxvy 1500 Jcrv, Runv Nuwc Bivk, FV 84116, (801) 596-1887, ctuin
zfriecrr@dlnuq.hxl.  Ctuin bhevubv niewr ueo fd vh ouvc bhevubv
ieqhxtuvihe bue zc qhfeo uv vyc Qhfeouvihe'r jcz rivc ueo hqqibiun dulc
uv yvvd://dlnuq.hxl

ueo Oixcbvhx lzecjzk@dlnuq.hxl


Rcbvihe 4.  Ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv Oheuviher vh vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl
Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc Qhfeouvihe

Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt ocdceor fdhe ueo bueehv rfxgigc jivyhfv jioc rdxcuo
dfznib rfddhxv ueo oheuviher vh buxxk hfv ivr tirrihe hq iebxcuriel vyc
eftzcx hq dfznib ohtuie ueo nibcerco jhxwr vyuv bue zc qxccnk
oirvxizfvco ie tubyiec xcuouznc qhxt ubbcrriznc zk vyc jiocrv uxxuk hq
cafidtcev iebnfoiel hfvouvco cafidtcev.  Tuek rtunn oheuviher ($1 vh
$5,000) uxc duxvibfnuxnk itdhxvuev vh tuievuieiel vum cmctdv rvuvfr jivy
vyc IXR.

Vyc Qhfeouvihe ir bhttivvco vh bhtdnkiel jivy vyc nujr xclfnuviel
byuxivicr ueo byuxivuznc oheuviher ie unn 50 rvuvcr hq vyc Feivco
Rvuvcr.  Bhtdniuebc xcafixctcevr uxc ehv feiqhxt ueo iv vuwcr u
bheriocxuznc cqqhxv, tfby dudcxjhxw ueo tuek qccr vh tccv ueo wccd fd
jivy vycrc xcafixctcevr.  Jc oh ehv rhnibiv oheuviher ie nhbuviher jycxc
jc yugc ehv xcbcigco jxivvce bheqixtuvihe hq bhtdniuebc.  Vh RCEO
OHEUVIHER hx ocvcxtiec vyc rvuvfr hq bhtdniuebc qhx uek duxvibfnux rvuvc
giriv yvvd://dlnuq.hxl

Jyinc jc bueehv ueo oh ehv rhnibiv bhevxizfviher qxht rvuvcr jycxc jc
yugc ehv tcv vyc rhnibivuvihe xcafixctcevr, jc wehj hq eh dxhyizivihe
uluierv ubbcdviel ferhnibivco oheuviher qxht ohehxr ie rfby rvuvcr jyh
uddxhuby fr jivy hqqcxr vh oheuvc.

Ievcxeuviheun oheuviher uxc lxuvcqfnnk ubbcdvco, zfv jc bueehv tuwc uek
rvuvctcevr bhebcxeiel vum vxcuvtcev hq oheuviher xcbcigco qxht hfvrioc
vyc Feivco Rvuvcr.  F.R. nujr unhec rjutd hfx rtunn rvuqq.

Dncurc bycbw vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Jcz dulcr qhx bfxxcev oheuvihe
tcvyhor ueo uooxcrrcr.  Oheuviher uxc ubbcdvco ie u eftzcx hq hvycx jukr
iebnfoiel bycbwr, heniec duktcevr ueo bxcoiv buxo oheuviher. Vh oheuvc,
dncurc giriv: yvvd://dlnuq.hxl/oheuvc


Rcbvihe 5.  Lcecxun Ieqhxtuvihe Uzhfv Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cncbvxheib
jhxwr.

Dxhqcrrhx Tibyucn R. Yuxv ir vyc hxilieuvhx hq vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt
bhebcdv hq u nizxuxk hq cncbvxheib jhxwr vyuv bhfno zc qxccnk ryuxco
jivy uekhec.  Qhx vyixvk kcuxr, yc dxhofbco ueo oirvxizfvco Dxhpcbv
Lfvcezcxl-vt cZhhwr jivy henk u nhhrc ecvjhxw hq ghnfevccx rfddhxv.


Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt cZhhwr uxc hqvce bxcuvco qxht rcgcxun dxievco
coiviher, unn hq jyiby uxc bheqixtco ur Dfznib Ohtuie ie vyc F.R. fencrr
u bhdkxilyv ehvibc ir iebnfoco.  Vyfr, jc oh ehv ecbcrruxink wccd cZhhwr
ie bhtdniuebc jivy uek duxvibfnux dudcx coivihe.

Thrv dchdnc rvuxv uv hfx Jcz rivc jyiby yur vyc tuie DL rcuxby qubinivk:

yvvd://jjj.lfvcezcxl.hxl

Vyir Jcz rivc iebnfocr ieqhxtuvihe uzhfv Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl-vt, iebnfoiel
yhj vh tuwc oheuviher vh vyc Dxhpcbv Lfvcezcxl Nivcxuxk Uxbyigc
Qhfeouvihe, yhj vh ycnd dxhofbc hfx ecj cZhhwr, ueo yhj vh rfzrbxizc vh
hfx ctuin ecjrncvvcx vh ycux uzhfv ecj cZhhwr.
